original: tair eva kusumaiḥ pūrvam asakṛtkṛtaśekharāḥ /

original: apūrvaracane dāmni dadhaty eva kutūhalam //
analyzed: apūrva racane dāmni dadhati eva kutūhalam

original: praṇayiprārthanābhaṅgasaṃvidhānam aśikṣitāḥ //
analyzed: praṇayi prārthanā bhaṅga saṃvidhānam a śikṣitāḥ

original: tad iyam vāṅmayodyānalīlāviharaṇodyataiḥ /
analyzed: tat iyam vāc maya udyāna līlā viharaṇa udyataiḥ

original: vidagdhaiḥ kriyatāṃ karṇe cirāya nyāyamañjarī //
analyzed: vidagdhaiḥ kriyatām karṇe cirāya nyāyamañjarī

original: akṣapādapraṇīto hi vitato nyāyapādapaḥ /

vayaṃ mṛduparispandāḥ tadārohaṇapaṅgavaḥ /

original: na tadvibhūtiprāgbhāram ālokayitum apy alam //

original: asaṅkhyair api prahṛṣyanti citram eṣāṃ viceṣṭitam /
analyzed: asaṅkhyaiḥ api prahṛṣyanti citram eṣām viceṣṭitam

original: guṇais santaḥ prahṛṣyanti citram eṣāṃ viceṣṭitam //
analyzed: guṇaiḥ santaḥ prahṛṣyanti citram eṣām viceṣṭitam

svakṛtīḥ prakāśayantaḥ paśyanti satāṃ mukhaṃ dhanyāḥ //
analyzed: svakṛtīḥ prakāśayantaḥ paśyanti satām mukham dhanyāḥ

original: iha prekṣāpūrvakāriṇaḥ puruṣārthasaṃpadam abhivāñchantaḥ tatsādhanādhigamopāyam antareṇa tadavāptimam anyamānāḥ tadupāyāvagamanimittam eva prathamam anveṣante /
analyzed: iha prekṣā pūrva kāriṇaḥ puruṣa artha saṃpadam abhivāñchantaḥ tad sādhana adhigama upāyam antareṇa tad avāptim anya mānāḥ tad upāya avagama nimittam eva prathamam anveṣante

original: dṛṣṭādṛṣṭabhedena ca dvividhaḥ puruṣātrhasya panthāḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa bhedena ca dvividhaḥ puruṣa atrhasya panthāḥ

original: tatra dṛṣṭe viṣaye suciraprarūḍhavṛddhavyavahārasiddhānvayavyatirekādhigatasādhanabhāve bhojanādāv anapekṣitaśāstrasyaiva bhavati pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: tatra dṛṣṭe viṣaye su cira prarūḍha vṛddha vyavahāra siddha anvaya vyatireka adhigata sādhana bhāve bhojana ādau anapekṣita śāstrasya eva bhavati pravṛttiḥ

original: na hi [malinaḥ snāyāt] [bubhukṣito vā 'śnīyāt] iti śāstram upayujyate /
analyzed: na hi malinaḥ snāyāt bubhukṣitaḥ vā śnīyāt iti śāstram upayujyate

original: adṛṣṭe tu svargāpavargamātre naisārgikamohāndhatamasaviluptālokasya lokasya śāstram eva prakāśaḥ /
analyzed: adṛṣṭe tu svarga apavarga mātre naisārgika moha andha tamasa vilupta alokasya lokasya śāstram eva prakāśaḥ

original: tad eva sakalasadupāyadarśane divyaṃ cakṣur asmadādeḥ na yoginām iva yogasamādhijajñānādyupāyāntaram apīti /
analyzed: tat eva sakala sat upāya darśane divyam cakṣuḥ asmat ādeḥ na yoginām iva yoga samādhi ja jñāna ādi upāya antaram api iti

original: tasmād asmadādeḥ śāstram evādhigantavyam //
analyzed: tasmāt asmad ādeḥ śāstram eva adhigantavyam

original: tac ca caturdaśavidhaṃ yāni vidvāṃsaḥ caturdaśavidyāsthānāny ācakṣate //
analyzed: tat ca caturdaśavidham yāni vidvāṃsaḥ caturdaśa vidyā sthānāni ācakṣate

original: tatra vedāś catvāraḥ /
analyzed: tatra vedāḥ catvāraḥ

original: prathamo 'tharvavedo dvitīya ṛgvedas tṛtīyo yajurvedaś caturthaḥ sāmavedaḥ /
analyzed: prathamaḥ tharvavedaḥ dvitīyaḥ ṛgvedaḥ tṛtīyaḥ yajurvedaḥ caturthaḥ sāmavedaḥ

original: ete catvāro vedāḥ sākṣād eva puruṣārthasādhanopadeśasvabhāvāḥ [agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ] [ātmā jñātavyaḥ] ityādiśruteḥ //
analyzed: ete catvāraḥ vedāḥ sākṣāt eva puruṣa artha sādhana upadeśa svabhāvāḥ agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ ātmā jñātavyaḥ ityādi śruteḥ

original: smṛtiśāstram api manvādyupanibaddham aṣṭakāśikhākarmaprapāpravartanādipuruṣārthasādhanopadeśy eva dṛśyate /
analyzed: smṛti śāstram api manu ādi upanibaddham aṣṭakā śikhā karma prapā pravartana ādi puruṣa artha sādhana upadeśī eva dṛśyate

original: aśrūyamāṇaphalānām api karmaṇāṃ phalavattā vidhivṛttaparīkṣāyāṃ vakṣyate sarvo hi śāstrārthaḥ puruṣārthaparyavasāyī na svarūpaniṣṭha iti //
analyzed: a śrūyamāṇa phalānām api karmaṇām phalavat tā vidhi vṛtta parīkṣāyām vakṣyate sarvaḥ hi śāstra arthaḥ puruṣa artha paryavasāyī na svarūpa niṣṭhaḥ iti

original: itihāsapurāṇābhyām api upākhyānādivarṇanena vaidika evārthaḥ prāyaḥ pratanyate /
analyzed: itihāsa purāṇābhyām api upākhyāna ādi varṇanena vaidikaḥ eva arthaḥ prāyas pratanyate

original: yathoktam [itihāsapurāṇābhyāṃ vedaṃ samupabṛṃhayet /
analyzed: yathoktam itihāsa purāṇābhyām vedam samupabṛṃhayet

original: bibhety alpaśrutād vedaḥ mām ayaṃ pratariṣyati] iti /% MaBhā 1.124; =Brāhmāṇḍa-Pūrvabhāga tad evaṃ vedapurāṇadharmaśāstrāṇāṃ svata eva puruṣārthasādhanopadeśasvabhāvatvād vidyāsthānatvam //% so in that way...  aṅgāni vyākaraṇakalpajyotiśśikṣāchandoniruktāni vedārthopayogipadādivyutpādanadvāreṇa vidyāsthānatvaṃ pratipadyante /
analyzed: bibheti alpa śrutāt vedaḥ mām ayam pratariṣyati iti  brāhmāṇḍa pūrva bhāga tat evam veda purāṇa dharma śāstrāṇām svatas eva puruṣa artha sādhana upadeśa svabhāva tvāt vidyā sthāna tvam aṅgāni vyākaraṇa kalpa jyotiḥ śikṣā chandaḥ niruktāni veda artha upayogi pada ādi vyutpādana dvāreṇa vidyā sthāna tvam pratipadyante

original: teṣām aṅgasamākhyaiva tadanugāmitāṃ prakaṭayati //
analyzed: teṣām aṅga samākhyā eva tad anugāmi tām prakaṭayati

original: vicāram antareṇāvyavasthitavedavākyārthānavadhāraṇāt mīmāṃsā vedavākyārthavicārātmikā vedākarasyetikartavyatārūpam anubhavantī vidyāsthānatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: vicāram antareṇa avyavasthita veda vākya artha anavadhāraṇāt mīmāṃsā veda vākya artha vicāra ātmikā veda ākarasya itikartavya tā rūpam anubhavantī vidyā sthāna tām pratipadyate

original: tathā ca bhaṭṭaḥ % or bhāṭṭaḥ [dharme pramīyamāṇe tu vedena karaṇātmanā /
analyzed: tathā ca bhaṭṭaḥ bhāṭṭaḥ dharme pramīyamāṇe tu vedena karaṇa ātmanā

original: itikartavyatābhāgaṃ mīmāṃsā pūrayiṣyati] iti //
analyzed: itikartavya tā bhāgam mīmāṃsā pūrayiṣyati iti

original: ata eva saptamam aṅgam iti na gaṇyate mīmāṃsā pratyāsannatvena vedaikadeśabhūtatvāt /
analyzed: atas eva saptamam aṅgam iti na gaṇyate mīmāṃsā pratyāsanna tvena veda eka deśa bhūta tvāt

original: vicārasahāyo hi śabdaḥ svārthanirākāṅkṣaṃ prabodhayituṃ kṣamaḥ //
analyzed: vicāra sahāyaḥ hi śabdaḥ sva artha nirākāṅkṣam prabodhayitum kṣamaḥ

original: nyāyavistaras tu mūlastambhabhūtaḥ sarvavidyānāṃ vedaprāmāṇyarakṣāhetutvāt vedeṣu hi dustārkikaracitakutarkaviplāvitaprāmāṇyeṣu śithilitāsthāḥ katham iva bahuvittavyayāyāsādisādhyaṃ vedārthānuṣṭhānam ādriyeran sādhavaḥ /
analyzed: nyāya vistaraḥ tu mūla stambha bhūtaḥ sarva vidyānām veda prāmāṇya rakṣā hetu tvāt vedeṣu hi dustārkika racita kutarka viplāvita prāmāṇyeṣu śithilita āsthāḥ katham iva bahu vitta vyaya āyāsa ādi sādhyam veda artha anuṣṭhānam ādriyeran sādhavaḥ

original: kiṃ vā svāmini parimlāne tadanuyāyinā mīmāṃsādividyāsthānaparijanena kṛtyam iti /
analyzed: kim vā svāmini parimlāne tad anuyāyinā mīmāṃsā ādi vidyā sthāna parijanena kṛtyam iti

original: tasmād aśeṣaduṣṭatārkikopamardadvārakadṛḍhataravedaprāmāṇyapratyayādhāyinyāyopadeśa kṣamam akṣapādopadopadiṣṭam idaṃ nyāyavistarākhyaṃ śāstraṃ śāstrapratiṣṭhānanibandhanaṃ iti dhuryaṃ vidyāsthānam //
analyzed: tasmāt aśeṣa duṣṭa tārkika upamarda dvāraka dṛḍhatara veda prāmāṇya pratyaya ādhāyi nyāya upadeśa kṣamam akṣapāda upada upadiṣṭam idam nyāyavistara ākhyam śāstram śāstra pratiṣṭhāna nibandhanam iti dhuryam vidyā sthānam

original: vidyāsthānatvaṃ nāma caturdaśānāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ puruṣārthasādhanajñānopāyatvam evocyate /
analyzed: vidyā sthāna tvam nāma caturdaśānām śāstrāṇām puruṣa artha sādhana jñāna upāya tvam eva ucyate

original: vedanaṃ vidyā tac ca na ghaṭādivedanaṃ api tu puruṣārthasādhanavedanaṃ vidyāyāḥ sthānaṃ āśrayaḥ upāya ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: vedanam vidyā tat ca na ghaṭa ādi vedanam api tu puruṣa artha sādhana vedanam vidyāyāḥ sthānam āśrayaḥ upāyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tac ca puruṣārthasādhanaparijñānopāyatvaṃ kasyacit sākṣāt kasyacid upāyadvāreṇa /
analyzed: tat ca puruṣa artha sādhana parijñāna upāya tvam kasyacid sākṣāt kasyacid upāya dvāreṇa

original: tānīmāni caturdaśa vidyāsthānānīty ācakṣate /
analyzed: tāni imāni caturdaśa vidyāsthānāni iti ācakṣate

original: yathoktam [purāṇatarkamīmāṃsāsādharmaśāstrāṅgamiśritāḥ /
analyzed: yathoktam purāṇa tarka mīmāṃsā sādharma śāstra aṅga miśritāḥ

original: %YājñavalkyaSmṛ 1.3 vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānāṃ dharmasya ca caturdaśa] iti /
analyzed: vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānām dharmasya ca caturdaśa iti

original: ānyatrāpy uktam [aṅgāni vedāś catvāro mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥ /
analyzed: ā anyatra api uktam aṅgāni vedāḥ catvāraḥ mīmāṃsā nyāya vistaraḥ

original: purāṇaṃ dharmaśāstraṃ ca vidyā hy etāś caturdaśa] iti //
analyzed: purāṇam dharma śāstram ca vidyāḥ hi etāḥ caturdaśa iti

original: pūrvatra tarkaśabdenopāttaṃ uttaratra ca nyāyavistaraśabdenaitad eva śāstram ucyate /
analyzed: pūrvatra tarka śabdena upāttam uttaratra ca nyāya vistara śabdena etat eva śāstram ucyate

original: nyāyaḥ tarkaḥ anumānam so 'sminn eva śāstre vyutpādyate //
analyzed: nyāyaḥ tarkaḥ anumānam saḥ u smin eva śāstre vyutpādyate

original: yataḥ sāṅkhyārhatānāṃ tāvat kṣapaṇakānāṃ kīdṛśam anumānopadeśakauśalaṃ ? kiyad eva tattarkeṇa vedaprāmāṇyaṃ rakṣyate iti nāsāv iha gaṇanārhaḥ //
analyzed: yatas sāṅkhya ārhatānām tāvat kṣapaṇakānām kīdṛśam anumāna upadeśa kauśalam kiyat eva tad tarkeṇa veda prāmāṇyam rakṣyate iti na asau iha gaṇanā arhaḥ

original: %to what extent does their logic uphold the authority of the Veda? bauddhās tu yady api anumānamārgāvagāhananaipuṇoddhurāṃ kandharām udvahanti tathāpi vedāviruddhatvāt tattarkasya kathaṃ vedādividyāsthānamadhye pāṭhaḥ /
analyzed: to what extent does their logic uphold the authority of the veda bauddhāḥ tu yadi api anumāna mārga avagāhana naipuṇa uddhurām kandharām udvahanti tathā api veda aviruddha tvāt tad tarkasya katham veda ādi vidyā sthāna madhye pāṭhaḥ

original: anumānakauśalam api kīdṛśaṃ śākyānām iti pade pade darśayiṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: anumāna kauśalam api kīdṛśam śākyānām iti pade pade darśayiṣyāmaḥ

original: cārvākās tu varākāḥ pratikṣeptavyā eva kaḥ kṣudratarkasya tadīyasyeha gaṇanāvasaraḥ /
analyzed: cārvākāḥ tu varākāḥ pratikṣeptavyāḥ eva kaḥ kṣudra tarkasya tadīyasya iha gaṇanā avasaraḥ

original: vaiśeṣikāḥ punar asmadanuyāyina evety evam asyāṃ janatāsu prasiddhāyām api ṣaṭtarkyāṃ idam eva tarkanyāyavistaraśabdābhyāṃ śāstram uktam //
analyzed: vaiśeṣikāḥ punar asmad anuyāyinaḥ evā iti evam asyām janatāsu prasiddhāyām api ṣaṭtarkyām idam eva tarka nyāya vistara śabdābhyām śāstram uktam

original: iyam evānvīkṣikī catas•ṇāṃ vidyānāṃ madhye nyāyavidyā gaṇyate [ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītiś ca śāśvatī] iti //
analyzed: iyam eva ānvīkṣikī catasṇām vidyānām madhye nyāya vidyā gaṇyate ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītiḥ ca śāśvatī iti

original: pratyakṣāgamābhyām īkṣitasya anvīkṣaṇaṃ anvīkṣā anumānam ity arthaḥ tadvyutpādakaṃ śāstram anvīkṣikī //

nanu catasraś ced vidyāḥ tat kathaṃ caturdaśa darśitāḥ ? naiṣa virodhaḥ vārtādaṇḍanītyor dṛṣṭaikaprayojanatvena sarvapuruṣārthopadeśividyāvarge gaṇanānarhatvāt trayyānvīkṣikyoś ca tatra nirdeśāc caturdaśaiva vidyāḥ //
analyzed: nanu catasraḥ ced vidyāḥ tat katham caturdaśa darśitāḥ  na eṣa virodhaḥ vārtā daṇḍanītyoḥ dṛṣṭa eka prayojana tvena sarva puruṣa artha upadeśi vidyā varge gaṇanā anarha tvāt trayī ānvīkṣikyoḥ ca tatra nirdeśāt caturdaśā eva vidyāḥ

original: nanu vedaprāmāṇyanirṇayaprayojanaś cen nyāyavistaraḥ kṛtam anena %kṛtam anena ``have done with it!'' mīmāṃsāta eva tatsiddheḥ /
analyzed: nanu veda prāmāṇya nirṇaya prayojanaḥ ced nyāya vistaraḥ kṛtam anena kṛtam anena have done with it mīmāṃsātaḥ eva tad siddheḥ

original: tatra hy arthavicāravat prāmāṇyavicāro 'pi kṛta eva satyam sa tv ānuṣaṅgikaḥ /
analyzed: tatra hi artha vicāra vat kṛtaḥ eva satyam sa tu ānuṣaṅgikaḥ

original: tatra mukhyas tv arthavicāra eva /
analyzed: tatra mukhyaḥ tu artha vicāraḥ eva

original: pṛthakprasthānā hīmā vidyāḥ /
analyzed: pṛthak prasthānāḥ hi imāḥ vidyāḥ

original: sā ca vākyārthavidyā na pramāṇavidyeti /
analyzed: sā ca vākya artha vidyā na pramāṇa vidyā iti

original: na ca mīmāṃsakāḥ samyak vedaprāmāṇyarakṣaṇakṣamāṃ saraṇim avalokayituṃ kuśalāḥ /
analyzed: na ca mīmāṃsakāḥ samyak veda prāmāṇya rakṣaṇa kṣamām saraṇim avalokayitum kuśalāḥ

original: kutarkakaṇṭakanikaraniruddhasañcāramārgābhāsaparibhrāntāḥ khalu te iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: kutarka kaṇṭaka nikara niruddha sañcāra mārga ābhāsa paribhrāntāḥ khalu te iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: na hi pramāṇāntarasaṃvādadārḍhyam antareṇa pratyakṣādīny api pramāṇabhāvaṃ bhajante kim uta tadadhīnavṛttir eṣa śabdaḥ ? śabdasya hi samayopakṛtasya bodhakatvamātraṃ svādhīnaṃ,  arthatathātvetaratvapariniścaye tu puruṣamukhaprekṣitvam asyāparihāryam /
analyzed: na hi pramāṇa antara saṃvāda dārḍhyam antareṇa pratyakṣa ādīni api pramāṇa bhāvam bhajante kim uta tad adhīna vṛttiḥ eṣa śabdaḥ śabdasya hi samaya upakṛtasya bodhaka tva mātram svādhīnam artha tathātva itaratva pariniścaye tu puruṣa mukha prekṣi tvam asya aparihāryam

original: tasmād āptoktatvād eva śabdaḥ pramāṇībhavati nānyathety etac cāsminn eva śāstre vyutpādayiṣyate //
analyzed: tasmāt āpta ukta tvāt eva śabdaḥ pramāṇībhavati na anyathā iti etat ca asmin eva śāstre vyutpādayiṣyate

original: nanu akṣapādāt pūrvaṃ kuto vedaprāmāṇyaniścaya āsīt ? atyalpam idam ucyate :  jaimineḥ pūrvaṃ kena vedārtho vyākhyātaḥ ?   pāṇineḥ pūrvaṃ kena padāni vyutpāditāni piṅgalāt pūrvaṃ kena chandāṃsi racitāni ādisargāt prabhṛti vedavad imā vidyāḥ pravṛttāḥ /
analyzed: nanu akṣapādāt pūrvam kutas veda prāmāṇya niścayaḥ āsīt ati alpam idam ucyate    jaimineḥ pūrvam kena veda arthaḥ vyākhyātaḥ     pāṇineḥ pūrvam kena padāni vyutpāditāni piṅgalāt pūrvam kena chandāṃsi racitāni ādi sargāt prabhṛti veda vat imāḥ vidyāḥ pravṛttāḥ

original: saṃkṣepavistaravivakṣayā tu tāṃs tāṃs tatra tatra kart•n ācakṣate //% kart•n em. to kartāraḥ   nanu vedaprāmāṇyaṃ nirvicārasiddham eva sādhavo manyate iti kim atra vicārayatnena ? na saṃśayaviparyāsanirāsārthatvāt /
analyzed: saṃkṣepa vistara vivakṣayā tu tān tān tatra tatra ācakṣate kartṛ ācakṣ    nanu veda prāmāṇyam nirvicāra siddham eva sādhavaḥ manyate iti kim atra vicāra yatnena na saṃśaya viparyāsa nirāsa artha tvāt

original: yasya hi vedaprāmāṇye saṃśayānā viparyastā vā matiḥ taṃ prati śāstrārambhaḥ /
analyzed: yasya hi veda prāmāṇye saṃśayānā viparyastā vā matiḥ tam prati śāstra ārambhaḥ

original: na hi viditavedārthaṃ prati mīmāṃsā prastūyate /
analyzed: na hi vidita veda artham prati mīmāṃsā prastūyate

original: taduktam [nānyato vedavidbhyaś ca sūtravṛttikriyeṣyate] iti //%Ślokavārttika 1.4.43 bhavati ca catuṣprakāraḥ puruṣaḥ ajñaḥ sandigdhaḥ viparyastaḥ niścitamatiś ceti /
analyzed: tat uktam na anyatas veda vidbhyaḥ ca sūtra vṛtti kriyā iṣyate iti ślokavārttika bhavati ca catuṣprakāraḥ puruṣaḥ ajñaḥ sandigdhaḥ viparyastaḥ niścita matiḥ ca iti

original: tatra niścitamatir eṣa muniḥ amunā śāstreṇa ajñasya jñānam upajanayati saṃśayānasya saṃśayam upahanti viparyasyato viparyāsaṃ vyudasyatīti tān prati yuktaḥ śāstrārambhaḥ //
analyzed: tatra niścita matiḥ eṣa muniḥ amunā śāstreṇa ajñasya jñānam upajanayati saṃśayānasya saṃśayam upahanti viparyasyataḥ viparyāsam vyudasyati iti tān prati yuktaḥ śāstra ārambhaḥ

original: kutaḥ punar asya muneḥ niścitamatitvaṃ jātam ?  ucyate-bhavati tāvad eṣa niścitamatiḥ sa tu tapaḥprabhāvād vā devatārādhanād vā śāstrāntarābhyāsād vā bhavatu /
analyzed: kutas punar asya muneḥ niścita mati tvam jātam     ucyate bhavati tāvat eṣa niścita matiḥ sa tu tapaḥ prabhāvāt vā devatā ārādhanāt vā śāstra antara abhyāsāt vā bhavatu

original: kim anena ? tatraitat syāt tata eva śāstrāntarād asmadāder api tattvādhigamo bhaviṣyatīti . kim akṣapādapraṇītena śāstreṇa ?   parihṛtam etat -saṅkṣepavistaravivakṣayā śāstrapraṇayanasya sāphalyāt /
analyzed: kim anena tatra etat syāt tatas eva śāstra antarāt asmat ādeḥ api tattva adhigamaḥ bhaviṣyati iti kim akṣapāda praṇītena śāstreṇa     parihṛtam etat saṅkṣepa vistara vivakṣayā śāstra praṇayanasya sāphalyāt

original: vicitracetasaś ca bhavanti puruṣā ity uktam /
analyzed: vicitra cetasaḥ ca bhavanti puruṣāḥ iti uktam

original: yeṣām ita evājñānasaṃśayaviparyayā vinivartante tān praty etat praṇayanaṃ saphalam itīdaṃ praṇītavān ācāryaḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām itas eva ajñāna saṃśaya viparyayāḥ vinivartante tān prati etat praṇayanam saphalam iti idam praṇītavān ācāryaḥ

original: tatredam ādimaṃ sūtram %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% Till here, cf. Kataoka 2007   pramāṇaprameyasaṃśayaprayojanadṛṣṭāntasiddhāntāvayavatarkanirṇayavādajalpavitaṇḍāhetvābhāsacchalajātinigrahasthānānāṃ tattvajñānān niḥśreyasādhigamaḥ //1.1.1  nanu kim artho 'yamādivākyārambhaḥ ko 'yaṃ praśnaḥ śāstraṃ ced ārambhaṇīyaṃ kramavṛttitvād vācaḥ dvitīyādivākyapraṇayanam upapadyata iti granthakaraṇam evāghaṭamānaṃ syāt //
analyzed: tatra idam ādima sūtram

original: āha na khalv evaṃ na jāne kintu yad eva śāstre vyutpādyatvena sthitaṃ tad eva vyutpādyatām /
analyzed: āha na khalu evam na jāne kintu yat eva śāstre vyutpādya tvena sthitam tat eva vyutpādyatām

original: kimādau tadabhidheyaprayojanakīrtanena ucyate ādivākyaṃ prayoktavyam abhidheyaprayojane /

original: pratipādayituṃ śrotṛpravāhotsāhasiddhaye //
analyzed: pratipādayitum śrotṛ pravāha utsāha siddhaye

original: abhidheyaphalajñānavirahāstamitodyamāḥ /
analyzed: abhidheya phala jñāna viraha astamita udyamāḥ

original: śrotum alpam api grantham ādriyeran na sūrayaḥ //
analyzed: śrotum alpam api grantham ādriyeran na sūrayaḥ

original: ko hi nāma vidvān aviditaviṣaye niṣprayojane ca karmaṇi pravarteta /
analyzed: kaḥ hi nāma vidvān a vidita viṣaye niṣprayojane ca karmaṇi pravarteta

original: āha ca bhaṭṭaḥ [sarvasyaiva hi śāstrasya karmaṇo vā 'pi kasyacit /
analyzed: āha ca bhaṭṭaḥ sarvasya eva hi śāstrasya karmaṇaḥ vā kasyacid

original: yāvat prayojanaṃ noktaṃ tāvat tat kena gṛhyate] iti //%Ślokavārttika 1.12 nanu prayojanaparijñānamādau śrotr•ṇāṃ kutastyam iti cintyam kim asmād eva vākyāt uta yuktitaḥ vākyam tāvad aniścitaprāmāṇyaṃ kathaṃ prayojananiścayāya prabhavati /
analyzed: yāvat prayojanam na uktam tāvat tat kena gṛhyate iti śloka vārttika nanu prayojana parijñānam ādau śrotrṇām kutastyam iti cintyam kim asmāt eva vākyāt uta yuktitaḥ vākyam tāvat aniścita prāmāṇyam katham prayojana niścayāya prabhavati

original: saṃśayād vā pravṛttau vedārthe 'pi tathaiva syād iti śāstram anārabdhavyaṃ syāt //
analyzed: saṃśayāt vā pravṛttau veda arthe tathā eva syāt iti śāstram anārabdhavyam syāt

original: yuktitaḥ prayojanāvagamaḥ śāstre sarvasminn adhītaṃ sati sambhavati netaratheti tadavagamapūrvikāyāṃ pravṛttav itaretarāśrayaḥ śāstrādhigamāt prayojanaparijñānaṃ prayojanaparijñānāc ca śāstraprayojanaparijñānaṃ arthasaṃśayāc ca śravaṇe pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: yuktitaḥ prayojana avagamaḥ śāstre sarvasmin adhītam sati sambhavati na itarathā iti tad avagama pūrvikāyām pravṛttau itaretara āśrayaḥ śāstra adhigamāt prayojana parijñānam prayojana parijñānāt ca śāstra prayojana parijñānam artha saṃśayāt ca śravaṇe pravṛttiḥ

original: vede hy asiddhaprāmāṇye mahākleśeṣu karmasu /
analyzed: vede hi asiddha prāmāṇye mahā kleśeṣu karmasu

original: nānarthaśaṅkayā yuktaṃ anuṣṭānapravartanam //
analyzed: na anartha śaṅkayā yuktam anuṣṭāna pravartanam

original: bahuvittavyayāyāsaviyogasugame 'dhvani /
analyzed: bahu vitta vyaya āyāsa viyoga sugame dhvani

analyzed: pravṛttiḥ ucita udāra phale laghu pariśrame

original: śṛṇvanta eva jānanti santaḥ katipayair dinaiḥ /
analyzed: śṛṇvantaḥ eva jānanti santaḥ katipayaiḥ dinaiḥ

original: kim etat saphalaṃ śāstram uta mandaprayojanam //
analyzed: kim etat saphalam śāstram uta manda prayojanam

original: sūkṣmekṣikā tu yady atra kriyate prathamodyame /
analyzed: sūkṣmā īkṣikā tu yadi atra kriyate prathama udyame

original: asau sakalakartavyavipralopāya kalpate //
analyzed: asau sakala kartavya vipralopāya kalpate

original: ārto hi bhiṣajaṃ pṛṣṭvā taduktam anitiṣṭhate /
analyzed: ārtaḥ hi bhiṣajam pṛṣṭvā tat uktam anitiṣṭhate

original: tasmin savicikitsas tu vyādher ādhikyam āpnuyāt //
analyzed: tasmin sa vicikitsaḥ tu vyādheḥ ādhikyam āpnuyāt

original: tenādivākyād vijñāya sābhidheyaṃ prayojanam /
analyzed: tena ādi vākyāt vijñāya sa abhidheyam prayojanam

original: tatsambhāvanayā kāryaḥ tacchāstraśravaṇādaraḥ //
analyzed: tad sambhāvanayā kāryaḥ tad śāstra śravaṇa ādaraḥ

original: yair apy ādivākyam itthaṃ vyākhyāyate kila [ananvitapadārthakaṃ vākyam anupādeyaṃ daśadāḍim ādivākyavat /
analyzed: yaiḥ api ādi vākyam ittham vyākhyāyate kila ananvita pada arthakam vākyam anupādeyam daśa dāḍim ādi vākya vat

original: anvitapadārthakam api niṣprayojanam anupādeyam eva sadasadvāyasadaśanavimarśavākyam iva /
analyzed: anvita padārthakam api niṣprayojanam anupādeyam eva sat asat vāyasa daśana vimarśa vākyam iva

original: tad iha upādeyatāvyāpakaprayojanādyanupalambhād anādaraṇīyam iti vyāpakānupalabdhyā pratyavatiṣṭhamānaḥ paraḥ prayojanādyabhidhāyinā ādivākyasyārtha ity uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tat iha upādeya tā vyāpaka prayojana ādi anupalambhāt an ādaraṇīyam iti vyāpaka anupalabdhyā pratyavatiṣṭhamānaḥ paraḥ prayojana ādi abhidhāyinā ādi vākyasya arthaḥ iti uktam bhavati

original: tatpratipādanenaiva vyāpakānupalabdhiparihārād āśaṅkā nivāritā bhavatīti //
analyzed: tad pratipādanena eva vyāpaka anupalabdhi parihārāt āśaṅkā nivāritā bhavati iti

original: yad api pravṛttihetor arthasaṃśayasya tarkāparanāmna aucityasya vā samutpādanam ādivākyena kriyata iti kecid ācakṣate tad api prayojanābhidhānadvārakam eva /
analyzed: yat api pravṛtti hetoḥ artha saṃśayasya tarka apara nāmnaḥ aucityasya vā samutpādanam ādi vākyena kriyate iti kecid ācakṣate tat api prayojana abhidhāna dvārakam eva

original: prayojanaviṣayo hi saṃśayo vā saṃbhāvanāpratyayo vā pravṛttyaṅgabhūtas tenotpādanīya iti tadutpattau prayojanābhidhānam evādivākyasya vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: prayojana viṣayaḥ hi saṃśayaḥ vā saṃbhāvanā pratyayaḥ vā pravṛtti aṅga bhūtaḥ tena utpādanīyaḥ iti tad utpattau prayojana abhidhānam eva ādi vākyasya vyāpāraḥ

original: saṃśayas tu vastuvṛttopanata eva puruṣavacasāṃ dvaividhyadarśanāt /
analyzed: saṃśayaḥ tu vastu vṛtta upanataḥ eva puruṣa vacasām dvaividhya darśanāt

original: śaucasam ācārasādhutādinā tu tasmin sambhāvanāpratyayo 'pi lokasya bhavatīti /
analyzed: ācāra sādhu tā ādinā tu tasmin sambhāvanā pratyayaḥ lokasya bhavati iti

original: tasmāt prayojanapratipādanārtham evādivākyam iti sūktam //
analyzed: tasmāt prayojana pratipādana artham eva ādi vākyam iti sūktam

original: yac ca śrotṛpravṛttyaṅgaṃ tadvaktuṃ yuktam āditaḥ /
analyzed: yat ca śrotṛ pravṛtti aṅgam tat vaktum yuktam āditas

original: na ca prayojanajñānād anyad asti pravartakam //
analyzed: na ca prayojana jñānāt anyat asti pravartakam

original: abhidheyakathanam api tatsādhyaprayojanopapādanāya śrotṛbuddhisamādhānāya ca kartavyam eva //
analyzed: abhidheya kathanam api tad sādhya prayojana upapādanāya śrotṛ buddhi samādhānāya ca kartavyam eva

original: arthākṣiptas tu sambandhaḥ phalaśāstrābhidheyagaḥ /
analyzed: artha ākṣiptaḥ tu sambandhaḥ phala śāstra abhidheya gaḥ

original: tannirdeśena siddhatvāt na svakaṇṭhena kathyate //
analyzed: tad nirdeśena siddha tvāt na sva kaṇṭhena kathyate

original: abhidheyasya śāstrasya ca vācyavācakabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ śāstrārthasya niḥśreyasya ca sādhyasādhanabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ tadāśrayanirdeśād eva siddhaḥ //
analyzed: abhidheyasya śāstrasya ca vācya vācaka bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ śāstra arthasya niḥśreyasya ca sādhya sādhana bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ tad āśraya nirdeśāt eva siddhaḥ

original: abhidheyās tu pramānādayo nigrahasthānaparyantāḥ ṣoḍaśa padārthāḥ prathamasūtre nirdiṣṭāḥ teṣāṃ svarūpam upariṣṭhād vakṣyate //
analyzed: abhidheyāḥ tu pramāna ādayaḥ nigrahasthāna paryantāḥ ṣoḍaśa padārthāḥ prathama sūtre nirdiṣṭāḥ teṣām svarūpam upariṣṭhāt vakṣyate

original: arthaparicchittisādhanāni pratyakṣādīni pramāṇāni /
analyzed: artha paricchitti sādhanāni pratyakṣa ādīni pramāṇāni

original: tatparicchedyam ātmādi prameyam /
analyzed: tat paricchedyam ātma ādi prameyam

original: nānārthāvamarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: nānā artha avamarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ

original: hitāhitaprāptiparihārau tatsādhanaṃ ca prayojanam /
analyzed: hita ahita prāpti parihārau tad sādhanam ca prayojanam

original: pramāṇato 'bhyupagamyamānaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣavān arthaḥ siddhāntaḥ /

vītarāgakathā vastunirṇayaphalā vādaḥ /
analyzed: vīta rāga kathā vastu nirṇaya phalā vādaḥ

original: vijigīṣukathā tu puruṣaśaktiparīkṣaṇaphalā jalpaḥ /
analyzed: vijigīṣu kathā tu puruṣa śakti parīkṣaṇa phalā jalpaḥ

original: tadviśeṣo vitaṇḍā /
analyzed: tad viśeṣaḥ vitaṇḍā

original: ahetavo hetuvad ābhāsamānāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ /
analyzed: ahetavaḥ hetu vat ābhāsamānāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ

original: arthavikalpair vacanavighātaḥ chalam /
analyzed: artha vikalpaiḥ vacana vighātaḥ chalam

original: hetupratibimbanaprāyaṃ pratyavasthānaṃ jātiḥ /
analyzed: hetu pratibimbana prāyam pratyavasthānam jātiḥ

original: satyavastvapratibhāsaḥ viparītapratibhāsaś ca nigrahasthānam //
analyzed: satya vastu apratibhāsaḥ viparīta pratibhāsaḥ ca nigrahasthānam

original: tatra vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇasūtranirdeśānusāreṇa kānicit ekavacanāntāni kānicid vahuvacanāntāni padāni vigṛhītavyāni /
analyzed: tatra vakṣyamāṇa lakṣaṇa sūtra nirdeśa anusāreṇa kānicid ekavacana antāni kānicid vahuvacana antāni padāni vigṛhītavyāni

original: pramāṇāvayavahetvābhāsānāṃ bahuvacanena vigraho darśayitavyaḥ śeṣāṇām ekavacanena lakṣaṇasūtraṣu tathā nirdeśāt /
analyzed: pramāṇa avayava hetvābhāsānām bahuvacanena vigrahaḥ darśayitavyaḥ śeṣāṇām ekavacanena lakṣaṇa sūtraṣu tathā nirdeśāt

original: evañ coddeśalakṣaṇayor ekaviṣayatā nitarāṃ darśitā bhavati /
analyzed: evam ca uddeśa lakṣaṇayoḥ eka viṣaya tā nitarām darśitā bhavati

original: itaretarayoge dvandvas samāsaḥ /
analyzed: itaretara yoge dvandvaḥ samāsaḥ

original: pramāṇādīnāṃ tattvam iti sambandhamātre ṣaṣṭhī /

original: tattvasya jñānaṃ niḥśreyasasyādhigama iti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭyau tattvasya jñāyamānatvena niḥśreyasasya cādhigamyamānatvena karmatvāt //
analyzed: tattvasya jñānam niḥśreyasasya adhigamaḥ iti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭyau tattvasya jñāyamāna tvena niḥśreyasasya ca adhigamyamāna tvena karma tvāt

original: nanv evaṃ vyākhyāyamāne tattvapadasya pramāṇādipadasāpekṣatvenāsamarthatvāt asamāsaḥ prāpnoti /
analyzed: nanu evam vyākhyāyamāne tattva padasya pramāṇa ādi pada sāpekṣa tvena asamartha tvāt asamāsaḥ prāpnoti

original: sāpekṣam asamarthaṃ bhavatīty āhuḥ /
analyzed: sa apekṣam asamartham bhavati iti āhuḥ

original: na cedaṃ pradhānam sāpekṣam yena bhavati vai pradhānasya sāpekṣasyāpi samāsa iti rājapuruṣaḥ śobhana itivat samasyate uttarapadārthapradhānatvāt ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣasya /
analyzed: na ca idam pradhānam sāpekṣam yena bhavati vai pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ iti rāja puruṣaḥ śobhanaḥ iti vat samasyate uttara padārtha pradhāna tvāt ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣasya

original: jñānam evātra pradhānaṃ tattvam upasarjanam ataś ca ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣa itivad asamāsa eva yuktaḥ //
analyzed: jñānam eva atra pradhānam tattvam upasarjanam atas ca ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti vat asamāsaḥ eva yuktaḥ

original: nanu jñānam api pramāṇādisāpekṣaṃ bhavaty eva tadviṣayaṃ hi tad iti na tattvapadenāsya nirākāṅkṣīkṛtatvāt tattvasya jñānam iti /
analyzed: nanu jñānam api pramāṇa ādi sāpekṣam bhavati eva tad viṣayam hi tat iti na tattva padena asya nirākāṅkṣīkṛta tvāt tattvasya jñānam iti

original: tadidānīṃ tattvam eva sāpekṣaṃ vartate kasya tattvam iti /
analyzed: tat idānīm tattvam eva sa apekṣam vartate kasya tattvam iti

original: tasmāt tattvasyopasarjanasya sataḥ sāpekṣatvād asamāsa eva //
analyzed: tasmāt tattvasya upasarjanasya sataḥ sāpekṣa tvāt asamāsaḥ eva

original: ity evam abhiśaṅkamānā kecana tattvaṃ ca tat jñānaṃ ca iti karmadhārayaṃ vyācacakṣire tat punar ayuktam jñānasya svatas tattvātattvavibhāgābhāvāt /
analyzed: iti evam abhiśaṅkamānā kecana tattvam ca tat jñānam ca iti karmadhārayam vyācacakṣire tat punar ayuktam jñānasya svatas tattva atattva vibhāga abhāvāt

original: viṣayakṛto hi jñānānāṃ tathābhāvo 'tathābhāvo vā /
analyzed: viṣaya kṛtaḥ hi jñānānām tathābhāvaḥ tathābhāvaḥ vā

original: tadetat tattvaviṣayajñānaṃ bhavati na svatas tattvasvabhāvam //
analyzed: tat etat tattva viṣaya jñānam bhavati na svatas tattva svabhāvam

original: kiṃ punar idaṃ tattvaṃ nāma sato 'sato vā vastunaḥ pramāṇapariniścitasvarūpaṃ śabdapravṛttinimittaṃ tad ity ucyate /
analyzed: kim punar idam tattvam nāma sataḥ sataḥ vā vastunaḥ pramāṇa pariniścita svarūpam śabda pravṛtti nimittam tat iti ucyate

original: tasya bhāvas tattvam iti /
analyzed: tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam iti

original: tac ca jñānena niścīyate /
analyzed: tat ca jñānena niścīyate

original: tat paricchindyat jñānaṃ tattvajñānam ity ucyate /
analyzed: tat paricchindyat jñānam tattva jñānam iti ucyate

original: jñānasyāpi tadrūpaṃ jñānāntaraparicchedyam eva bhavati /
analyzed: jñānasya api tad rūpam jñāna antara paricchedyam eva bhavati

original: nirṇītatattvāś ca pramāṇādaya iti vyatirekanirdeśa eva yuktaḥ /
analyzed: nirṇīta tattvāḥ ca pramāṇa ādayaḥ iti vyatireka nirdeśaḥ eva yuktaḥ

original: na cāsamāsaprasaṅgamātrāt anyathā varṇanam ucitam /
analyzed: na ca asamāsa prasaṅga mātrāt anyathā varṇanam ucitam

original: īdṛśānāṃ samāsānāṃ sāmarthyānapāyena bahuśo dṛṣṭatvāt devadattasya gurukulam iti /
analyzed: īdṛśānām samāsānām sāmarthya anapāyena bahuśas dṛṣṭa tvāt devadattasya guru kulam iti

original: upasarjanaṃ nopasarjanam iti na kāraṇam etat samāse /
analyzed: upasarjanam na upasarjanam iti na kāraṇam etat samāse

original: vigrahavākyasamānārthatayā samāso bhavati sā ceha vidyata eva /
analyzed: vigraha vākya samāna artha tayā samāsaḥ bhavati sā ca iha vidyate eva

original: vaiyyākaraṇā api īdṛśi padāni samasyanty eva /
analyzed: vaiyyākaraṇāḥ api īdṛśi padāni samasyanti eva

original: [atha śabdānuśāsanaṃ keṣāṃ śabdānām laukikānāṃ vaidikānāṃ ca] iti /
analyzed: atha śabda anuśāsanam keṣām śabdānām laukikānām vaidikānām ca iti

original: tasmād yathābhāṣyam eva ṣaṣṭhītrayavyākhyānam anavadyam //
analyzed: tasmāt yathābhāṣyam eva ṣaṣṭhī traya vyākhyānam anavadyam

original: nanu ṣoḍaśapadārthatattvajñānasya kathaṃ niḥśreyasādhigamahetutvam iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: nanu ṣoḍaśa padārtha tattva jñānasya katham niḥśreyasa adhigama hetu tvam iti vaktavyam

original: vedaprāmāṇyasiddhyarthaṃ cedaṃ śāstram iti tāvan mātram eva vyutpādyatāṃ kiṃ ṣodaśapadārthakanthāgranthanena ucyate ātmāpavargaparyantadvādaśavidhaprameyajñānaṃ tāvat anyajñānānaupayikam eva sākṣād apavargasādhanam iti vkṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: veda prāmāṇya siddhi artham ca idam śāstram iti tāvat mātram eva vyutpādyatām kim ṣodaśa padārtha kanthā granthanena ucyate ātma apavarga paryanta dvādaśavidha prameya jñānam tāvat anya jñāna anaupayikam eva sākṣāt apavarga sādhanam iti

original: tattvajñānān mithyājñānanirāse sati tanmūlaḥ saṃsāro nivartata iti prameyaṃ tāvad avaśyopādeyam //
tasya tu prameyasyātmāder apavargasādhanatvādhigama āgamaikanibandhanaḥ //
analyzed: tasya tu prameyasya ātma ādeḥ apavarga sādhana tva adhigamaḥ āgama eka nibandhanaḥ

original: tasya prāmānyanirṇītir anumānanivandhanā /
āptoktatvaṃ ca talliṅgam avinābhāvi vikṣyate //
analyzed: āpta ukta tvam ca tat liṅgam avinābhāvi vikṣyate

original: pratibandhagrahe tasya pratyakṣam upayujyate /
analyzed: pratibandha grahe tasya pratyakṣam upayujyate

original: ko 'nyas santaraṇe hetur anavasthāmahodadheḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ santaraṇe hetuḥ anavasthā mahā udadheḥ

original: āyurvedādivākyeṣu dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣataḥ phalam /
analyzed: āyurveda ādi vākyeṣu dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣataḥ phalam

original: vacaḥ pramāṇam āptoktam iti nirnīyate yataḥ //
analyzed: vacaḥ pramāṇam āpta uktam iti nirnīyate yatas

original: upamānaṃ tu kvacit karmaṇi sopayogaṃ ity evaṃ catuṣprakāram api pramāṇaṃ prameyavad upadeṣṭavyam //
analyzed: upamānam tu kvacid karmaṇi sa upayogam iti evam catuṣprakāram api pramāṇam prameya vat upadeṣṭavyam

original: saṃśayādayas tu padārthā yathāsambhavaṃ pramāṇeṣu prameyeṣu cāntarbhavanto 'pi nyāyapravṛttihetutvāt pṛthag upadiśyante /
analyzed: saṃśaya ādayaḥ tu padārthāḥ yathāsambhavam pramāṇeṣu prameyeṣu ca antarbhavantaḥ nyāya pravṛtti hetu tvāt pṛthak upadiśyante

original: nyāyaś ca vedaprāmāṇyapratiṣṭhāpanapūrvakatvena puruṣārthopayogitvam upayātīti darśitam //
analyzed: nyāyaḥ ca veda prāmāṇya pratiṣṭhāpana pūrvaka tvena puruṣa artha upayogi tvam upayāti iti darśitam

original: tatra nānupalabdhe 'rthe na nirṇīte pravartate /
analyzed: tatra na anupalabdhe rthe na nirṇīte pravartate

original: kin tu saṃśayite nyāyaḥ tadaṅgaṃ tena saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: kim tu saṃśayite nyāyaḥ tad aṅgam tena saṃśayaḥ

original: prayojanam anuddiśya na ca nyāyaṃ prayuñjate /
analyzed: prayojanam an uddiśya na ca nyāyam prayuñjate

original: dṛṣṭāntaḥ punar etasya sambandhagrahaṇāspadam //
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntaḥ punar etasya sambandha grahaṇa āspadam

original: siddhānto 'pi dharmaprāpaṇenāśrayāsiddhatām apoddharat nyāyaṃ pravartayati //
analyzed: dharma prāpaṇena āśraya asiddha tām apoddharat nyāyam pravartayati

original: nanu saṃśayapadena nyāyaviṣayaṃ sandigdhaṃ dharmaṇam abhidadhatā āśrayāsiddhir apoddhṛtaiva satyam kvacit tu viṣaye saṃśayam antareṇāpi nyāyapravṛttir darśayisyata iti saṃśayitaikaviṣayanyāyaniyamābhāvāt siddhānto 'pi vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: nanu saṃśaya padena nyāya viṣayam sandigdham abhidadhatā āśraya asiddhiḥ apoddhṛtā eva satyam kvacid tu viṣaye saṃśayam antareṇa api nyāya pravṛttiḥ darśayisyate iti saṃśayita eka viṣaya nyāya niyama abhāvāt vaktavyaḥ

original: nyāyābhidhāne 'vayavāḥ paraṃ pratyupayoginaḥ /
analyzed: nyāya abhidhāne vayavāḥ param pratyupayoginaḥ

original: parārtham anumānaṃ ca tad āhur nyāyavādinaḥ //
analyzed: para artham anumānam ca tat āhuḥ nyāya vādinaḥ

original: nanu pratijñodāharaṇābhyāṃ tadabhidheyau siddhāntadṛṣṭāntau gamyete eva kiṃ pṛthag upādānena na yady evaṃ hetvākhyenāvayavena tadabhidheyasiddher anumānam api pṛthak na vaktavyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: nanu pratijñā udāharaṇābhyām tad abhidheyau siddhānta dṛṣṭāntau gamyete eva kim pṛthak upādānena na yadi evam hetu ākhyena avayavena tad abhidheya siddheḥ anumānam api pṛthak na vaktavyam syāt

original: evaṃ bhavatu kiṃ niścchinnam maivam abhidheye nyāye nirūpaṇīye tadabhidheyinām avayavānām avasara iti tadarthaḥ pṛthak pratipādanārho bhavati /
analyzed: evam bhavatu kim niścchinnam mā evam abhidheye nyāye nirūpaṇīye tad abhidheyinām avayavānām avasaraḥ iti tad arthaḥ pṛthak pratipādana arhaḥ bhavati

original: itarathā avayavamātropadeśa eva śāstraṃ samāpyeta //
analyzed: itarathā avayava mātra upadeśe eva śāstram samāpyeta

original: tarkaḥ saṃśayavijñānaviṣayīkṛtatulyakalpapakṣadvaye 'nyatarapakṣaśaithilyasamutpādanena taditarapakṣaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ akleśasaṃpadyamānapratipakṣavyudāsam anugṛhṇāti mārgaśuddhim ādadhāna iti pṛthag upadiśyate /
analyzed: tarkaḥ saṃśaya vijñāna viṣayīkṛta tulya kalpa pakṣa dvaye nyatara pakṣa śaithilya samutpādanena tad itara pakṣa viṣayam pramāṇam a kleśa saṃpadyamāna pratipakṣa vyudāsam anugṛhṇāti mārga śuddhim ādadhānaḥ iti pṛthak upadiśyate

original: sa cāśayaśuddhim upadarśayituṃ vāde prayokṣyate //
analyzed: sa ca āśaya śuddhim upadarśayitum vāde prayokṣyate

original: anyatarādhikaraṇanirṇayam antareṇa na paryavasyati nyāya iti nyāyoparamakāraṇatvena tasya pravartako nirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: anyatara adhikaraṇa nirṇayam antareṇa na paryavasyati nyāyaḥ iti nyāya uparama kāraṇa tvena tasya pravartakaḥ nirṇayaḥ

original: itarathā niavasānam anāsāditaphalaṃ ko nāma nyāyam ārabheta //
analyzed: itarathā an āsādita phalam kaḥ nāma nyāyam ārabheta

original: nanu tattvajñānapadena gatārthatvān na pṛthak vaktavyo nirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: nanu tattva jñāna padena gatārtha tvāt na pṛthak vaktavyaḥ nirṇayaḥ

original: nirṇayo hi tattvajñānam eva asty etat kin tu ṣoḍaśapadārthatattvajñānaṃ pramāṇāntarakaraṇam api bhavati /
analyzed: nirṇayaḥ hi tattva jñānam eva asti etat kin tu ṣoḍaśa padārtha tattva jñānam pramāṇa antara karaṇam api bhavati

original: na tasya nyāyoparamahetutvam /
analyzed: na tasya nyāya uparama hetu tvam

original: eṣa tu sādhanadūṣaṇasaraṇikṣodajanmā nirṇayaḥ taduparamahetuḥ pṛthag upādānam antareṇa na labhyate //
analyzed: eṣa tu sādhana dūṣaṇa saraṇi kṣoda janmā nirṇayaḥ tad uparama hetuḥ pṛthak upādānam antareṇa na labhyate

original: nanu anumānapadād eṣa tarhi yathābhilaṣito lapsyate nirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: nanu anumāna padāt eṣa tarhi yathā abhilaṣitaḥ lapsyate nirṇayaḥ

original: pratibaddhāl liṅgāl liṅgini jñānam anumānaṃ sa eva ca nirṇayaḥ tad ayuktam anumānaphalaṃ nirṇayaḥ nānumānam /
analyzed: pratibaddhāt liṅgāt liṅgini jñānam anumānam saḥ eva ca nirṇayaḥ tat ayuktam anumāna phalam nirṇayaḥ na anumānam

original: kāraṇasya pramāṇatvān nirṇayopādānam antareṇa tadanumānam aphalam aparyavasitaṃ syāt //
analyzed: kāraṇasya pramāṇa tvāt nirṇaya upādānam antareṇa tat anumānam aphalam aparyavasitam syāt

original: ubhābhyāṃ tarhi tattvajñānānumānapadābhyāṃ ayam ākṣepsyate nirṇayaḥ anumānasya tattvajñānāntatvāt na nirṇayopādānād vinā tadantatvāsiddheḥ liṅgābhāsasamutthatattvajñānābhāsasambhavāt //
analyzed: ubhābhyām tarhi tattva jñāna anumāna padābhyām ayam ākṣepsyate nirṇayaḥ anumānasya tattva jñāna anta tvāt na nirṇaya upādānāt vinā tad anta tva asiddheḥ liṅga ābhāsa samuttha tattva jñāna ābhāsa sambhavāt

original: nanu saṃśayapūrvakatvād anumānasya sāmarthyāt nirṇayāntataiva bhaviṣyati iti saṃśayānumānatattvajñānapadair gatārtho nirṇayaḥ maivam saṃśayapūrvakatve 'py anumānasya tadābhasopajanitanirṇayābhāsasambhavāt //
analyzed: nanu saṃśaya pūrvaka tvāt anumānasya sāmarthyāt nirṇaya anta tā eva bhaviṣyati iti saṃśaya anumāna tattva jñāna padaiḥ gatārthaḥ nirṇayaḥ mā evam saṃśaya pūrvaka tve pi anumānasya tad ābhasa upajanita nirṇaya ābhāsa sambhavāt

original: naiṣa niyamaḥ saṃśayapūrvakam anumānam iti /
analyzed: na eṣa niyamaḥ saṃśaya pūrvakam anumānam iti

original: tasmād anumānasya viśiṣṭanirṇayāvasānatvalābhāya nirṇayapadam upādeyam ity alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: tasmāt anumānasya viśiṣṭa nirṇaya avasāna tva lābhāya nirṇaya padam upādeyam iti alam prasaṅgena

original: vāde tu vicāryamāṇo nyāyaḥ saṃśayacchedanenādhyavasitāvabodhaṃ adhyavasitābhyanujñānaṃ ca vidadhat tattvapariśuddhim ādadhātīti vītarāgaiḥ śiṣyasabrahmacāribhis saha vādaḥ prayoktavyaḥ //
analyzed: vāde tu vicāryamāṇaḥ nyāyaḥ saṃśaya chedanena adhyavasita avabodham adhyavasita abhyanujñānam ca vidadhat tattva pariśuddhim ādadhāti iti vīta rāgaiḥ śiṣya sabrahmacāribhiḥ saha vādaḥ prayoktavyaḥ

original: jalpavitaṇḍe tu duṣṭatārkikoparacitakapaṭadūsaṇāḍambarasantrāsyamānasaralam atisamāśvāsanena taddhṛdayasthatattvajñānasaṃrakṣaṇāya kvacid avasare vītarāgasyāpy upayujyete iti vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: jalpa vitaṇḍe tu duṣṭa tārkika uparacita kapaṭa dūsaṇa āḍambara santrāsyamāna saralam ati samāśvāsanena tad hṛdaya stha tattva jñāna saṃrakṣaṇāya kvacid avasare vīta rāgasya api upayujyete iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: hetvābhāsāḥ samyaṅ nyāyapravivekopakāradvāreṇa tadupayoginaḥ /
analyzed: hetvābhāsāḥ samyak nyāya praviveka upakāra dvāreṇa tad upayoginaḥ

original: hetvābhāsasvarūpāvadhāraṇe hi sati tadvilakṣaṇatayā hetavas sukham avagamyante //
analyzed: hetvābhāsa svarūpa avadhāraṇe hi sati tad vilakṣaṇa tayā hetavaḥ sukham avagamyante

original: nanv atra viparyayo dṛśyate hetvavagame sati taditarahetvābhāsavyavasthānāt saty evam tathā 'pi proktuṃ parihartuṃ ca dvayam api jñeyam /
analyzed: nanu atra viparyayaḥ dṛśyate hetu avagame sati tad itara hetvābhāsa vyavasthānāt satī evam tathā pi proktum parihartum ca dvayam api jñeyam

original: hetavaḥ prayujyante hetvābhāsāś ca parihriyanta iti //
analyzed: hetavaḥ prayujyante hetvābhāsāḥ ca parihriyante iti

original: yac ca nigrahasthānaparigaṇitā api hetvābhāsāḥ punar apadiśyante tat vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyantīty āśayena //
analyzed: yat ca nigrahasthāna parigaṇitāḥ api hetvābhāsāḥ punar apadiśyante tat vāde codanīyāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti āśayena

original: chalajātinigrahasthānāni jalpavitaṇḍopakaraṇāni /
analyzed: chala jāti nigrahasthānāni jalpa vitaṇḍā upakaraṇāni

original: tesām avadhṛtasvarūpāṇāṃ svavākye parivarjanaṃ kvacid avasare prayogaḥ parayuktānāṃ ca pratisamādhānaṃ ityādi śakyakriyam /
analyzed: tesām avadhṛta svarūpāṇām sva vākye parivarjanam kvacid avasare prayogaḥ para yuktānām ca pratisamādhānam ityādi śakya kriyam

original: atas tāny āpi jalpavitaṇḍāṅgatvāt jñātavyānīti pṛthag upadiśyante //
analyzed: atas tāni ā api jalpa vitaṇḍā aṅga tvāt jñātavyāni iti pṛthak upadiśyante

original: duśśikṣitakutarkāṃśaleśavācālitānanāḥ /
analyzed: duśśikṣita kutarka aṃśa leśa vācālita ānanāḥ

original: śakyāḥ kim anyathā jetuṃ vitaṇḍāṭopapaṇḍitāḥ //
analyzed: śakyāḥ kim anyathā jetum vitaṇḍā āṭopa paṇḍitāḥ

original: gatānugatiko lokaḥ kumārgaṃ tatpratāritaḥ /
analyzed: gatānugatikaḥ lokaḥ ku mārgam tad pratāritaḥ

original: mā gād iti chalādīni prāha kāruṇiko muniḥ //
analyzed: mā gāt iti chala ādīni prāha kāruṇikaḥ muniḥ

original: tad evam upadeṣṭavyāḥ padārthāḥ saṃśayādayaḥ /
analyzed: tat evam upadeṣṭavyāḥ padārthāḥ saṃśaya ādayaḥ

original: tanmūlanyāyanirṇeyavedaprāmāṇyasiddhaye //
analyzed: tad mūla nyāya nirṇeya veda prāmāṇya siddhaye

original: tenāgamapramāṇatvadvārā 'khilaphalapradā /
analyzed: tena āgama pramāṇa tva dvārā khila phala pradā

original: iyam ānvīkṣikī vidyā vidyāsthāneṣu gaṇyate //
analyzed: iyam ānvīkṣikī vidyā vidyā sthāneṣu gaṇyate

original: āha ca bhāṣyakāraḥ [pradīpaḥ sarvavidyānām upāyaḥ sarvakarmaṇām /
analyzed: āha ca bhāṣyakāraḥ pradīpaḥ sarva vidyānām upāyaḥ sarva karmaṇām

original: āśrayas sarvadharmāṇāṃ vidyoddeśe parīkṣitā //] ity eṣa ṣoḍaśapadārthanibandhanena niḥśreyasasya muninā nirdeśi panthāḥ /
analyzed: āśrayaḥ sarva dharmāṇām vidyā uddeśe parīkṣitā iti eṣa ṣoḍaśa padārtha nibandhanena niḥśreyasasya muninā panthāḥ

original: anyas tu sann api padārthagaṇo 'pavargamārgopayogavirahād iha nopadiṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: anyaḥ tu san api padārtha gaṇaḥ upavarga mārga upayoga virahāt iha nā upadiṣṭaḥ

original: trividhā cāsya śāstrasya pravṛttiḥ uddeśaḥ lakṣaṇaṃ parīkṣā ceti /
analyzed: trividhā ca asya śāstrasya pravṛttiḥ uddeśaḥ lakṣaṇam parīkṣā ca iti

original: nāmadheyena padārthābhidhānam uddeśaḥ /
analyzed: nāmadheyena padārtha abhidhānam uddeśaḥ

original: uddiṣṭasya tattvavyavasthāpako dharmo lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: uddiṣṭasya tattva vyavasthāpakaḥ dharmaḥ lakṣaṇam

original: lākṣetasya tallakṣaṇam upapadyate na veti vicāraḥ parīkṣā //
analyzed: lākṣetasya tat lakṣaṇam upapadyate na vā iti vicāraḥ parīkṣā

original: nanu ca vibhāgalakṣaṇā caturthy api pravṛttir asty eva /
analyzed: nanu ca vibhāga lakṣaṇā caturthī api pravṛttiḥ asti eva

original: bhedavatsu pramāṇasiddhāntacchalādiṣu tathā vyavahārāt satyam prathamasūtroddiṣṭe bhedavati padārthe bhavaty eva vibhāgaḥ uddeśarūpānapāyāt tu uddeśa evāsau /
analyzed: bhedavatsu pramāṇa siddhānta chala ādiṣu tathā vyavahārāt satyam prathama sūtra uddiṣṭe bhedavati padārthe bhavati eva vibhāgaḥ uddeśa rūpa anapāyāt tu uddeśaḥ eva asau

original: sāmānyasaṃjñayā kīrtanam uddeśaḥ prakārabhedasaṃjñayā kīrtanaṃ vibhāga iti /
analyzed: sāmānya saṃjñayā kīrtanam uddeśaḥ prakāra bheda saṃjñayā kīrtanam vibhāgaḥ iti

original: tathā coddeśatayaiva tatra tatra bhāṣyakāro vyavaharati [ayathārthaḥ pramāṇoddeśaḥ] ity ākṣepe [tasmād yathārtha eva pramāṇoddeśaḥ] iti samādhānam abhidadhānaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca uddeśa tayā eva tatra tatra bhāṣyakāraḥ vyavaharati ayathārthaḥ pramāṇa uddeśaḥ iti ākṣepe tasmāt yathārthaḥ eva pramāṇa uddeśaḥ iti samādhānam abhidadhānaḥ

original: tasmāt trividhaiva pravṛttiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt trividhā eva pravṛttiḥ

original: tatroddeśaḥ prathamam avaśyaṃ kartavyaḥ /
analyzed: tatra uddeśaḥ prathamam avaśyam kartavyaḥ

original: anuddiṣṭasya lakṣaṇaparīkṣānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: an uddiṣṭasya lakṣaṇa parīkṣā anupapatteḥ

original: sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇayor api paurvāparyaniyamo 'sty eva /
analyzed: sāmānya viśeṣa lakṣaṇayoḥ api paurvāparya niyamaḥ sti eva

original: alakṣite sāmānye viśeṣalakṣaṇāvasarābhāvāt /
analyzed: alakṣite sāmānye viśeṣa lakṣaṇa avasara abhāvāt

original: parīkṣā tu lakṣaṇottarakālabhāvibīti tatsvarūpanirūpaṇād eva gamyate /
analyzed: parīkṣā tu tad svarūpa nirūpaṇāt eva gamyate

original: vibhāgasāmānyalakṣaṇayos tu nāsti paurvāparyaniyamaḥ /
analyzed: vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇayoḥ tu na asti paurvāparya niyamaḥ

original: pūrva vā sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tato vibhāgaḥ pūrvaṃ vā vibhāgaḥ tatas sāmānyalakṣaṇam ucyata iti /
analyzed: vā sāmānya lakṣaṇam tatas vibhāgaḥ pūrvam vā vibhāgaḥ tatas sāmānya lakṣaṇam ucyate iti

original: tad ihoddeśas tāvad vyākhyātaḥ /
analyzed: tat iha uddeśaḥ tāvat vyākhyātaḥ

original: asmābhis tu lakṣaṇasūtrāny eva vyākhyāsyante /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ tu lakṣaṇa sūtrāni eva vyākhyāsyante

original: parīkṣāsūtrasūcitaṃ tu vastu sopayogalakṣaṇavarṇanāvasara eva yathābuddhi darśayiṣyate na pṛthak parīkṣāsūtravivaraṇaśramaḥ kariṣyate /
analyzed: parīkṣā sūtra sūcitam tu vastu sa upayoga lakṣaṇa varṇanā avasare eva yathābuddhi darśayiṣyate na pṛthak parīkṣā sūtra vivaraṇa śramaḥ kariṣyate

original: ata eva prathamasūtrānantaraṃ [duḥkhajanma] ityādidvitīyasūtraṃ lakṣaṇān aupāyokatvān neha vivṛtam /
analyzed: atas eva prathama sūtra anantaram duḥkha janma ityādi dvitīya sūtram na iha vivṛtam

original: apavargaparīkṣāśeṣabhūtatvāt tu tadavasara eva nirṇayiṣyate //
analyzed: apavarga parīkṣā śeṣa bhūta tvāt tu tad avasare eva

original: pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇavibhāgasūtraṃ tv avasaraprāptatvād idānīm eva vivriyate pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdāḥ pramāṇāni //1.1.3 atredaṃ tāvad vicāryate kiṃ pramāṇaṃ nāma kim asya svarūpam kiṃ vā lakṣaṇam iti tataḥ sūtraṃ yojayiṣyate //
analyzed: pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇa vibhāga sūtram tu avasara prāpta tvāt idānīm eva vivriyate pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabdāḥ pramāṇāni atra idam tāvat vicāryate kim pramāṇam nāma kim asya svarūpam kim vā lakṣaṇam iti tatas sūtram yojayiṣyate

original: tad ucyate avyabhicāriṇīm asandigdhām arthopalabdhiṃ vidadhatī bodhābodhasvabhāvā sāmagrī pramāṇam /
analyzed: tat ucyate avyabhicāriṇīm asandigdhām artha upalabdhim vidadhatī bodha abodha svabhāvā sāmagrī pramāṇam

original: bodhābodhasvabhāvā sāmagrī hi tasya svarūpam /
analyzed: bodha abodha svabhāvā sāmagrī hi tasya svarūpam

original: avyabhicārādiviśeṣārthopalabdhisādhanatvaṃ lakṣaṇam //
nanu ca pramīyate yena tat pramānam iti karaṇasādhano 'yaṃ pramāṇaśabdaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ca pramīyate yena tat pramānam iti karaṇa sādhanaḥ yam pramāṇa śabdaḥ

original: karaṇaṃ ca sādhakatamam /
analyzed: karaṇam ca sādhakatamam

original: tam abarthaś cātiśayaḥ /
analyzed: tam ap arthaḥ ca atiśayaḥ

original: sa cāpekṣikaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca āpekṣikaḥ

original: sādhakāntarasaṃbhave hi tadapekṣayā 'tiśayayogat kiñcit sādhakatamam ucyate /
analyzed: sādhaka antara saṃbhave hi tad apekṣayā tiśaya yogat kiñcid sādhakatamam ucyate

original: sāmagryāś caikatvāt tadatiriktasādhakāntarānupalmbhāt kim apekṣam asyātiśayaṃ brūmaḥ //
analyzed: sāmagryāḥ ca eka tvāt tad atirikta sādhaka antara anupalmbhāt kim asya atiśayam brūmaḥ

original: api ca kasmin viṣaye sāmagryāḥ pramāṇatvam pramīyamāṇo hi karmabhūto viṣayaḥ sāmagryantarbhūtatvāt sāmagry eveti karaṇatām eva yāyāt /
analyzed: api ca kasmin viṣaye sāmagryāḥ pramāṇa tvam pramīyamāṇaḥ hi karma bhūtaḥ viṣayaḥ sāmagrī antarbhūta tvāt sāmagrī eva iti karaṇa tām eva yāyāt

original: nirālambanāś cedānīṃ sarvapramitayo bhaveyuḥ ālambanakārakasya cakṣurādivat pramāṇāntaḥpātitvāt //
analyzed: nirālambanāḥ ca idānīm sarva pramitayaḥ bhaveyuḥ ālambana kārakasya cakṣuḥ ādi vat pramāṇa antaḥpāti tvāt

original: kaś ca sāmagryā prameyaṃ pramimīte pramātā 'pi tasyām eva līnaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ ca sāmagryā prameyam pramimīte pramātā tasyām eva līnaḥ

original: evañ ca yad ucyate [pramātā pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ pramitir iti catasṛṣu vidhāsu tattvaṃ parisamāpyate] iti tad vyāhanyate /
analyzed: evam ca yat ucyate pramātā pramāṇam prameyam pramitiḥ iti catasṛṣu vidhāsu tattvam parisamāpyate iti tat vyāhanyate

original: na ca loko 'pi sāmagryāḥ karaṇabhāvam anumanyate tasyāṃ karaṇavibhaktim aprayuñjānaḥ /
analyzed: na ca sāmagryāḥ karaṇa bhāvam anumanyate tasyām karaṇa vibhaktim a prayuñjānaḥ

original: na hy evaṃ vaktāro bhavanti laukikāḥ sāmagryā paśyāma iti kin tu dīpena paśyāmaḥ cakṣuṣā nirīkṣāmaha ity ācakṣate /
analyzed: na hi evam vaktāraḥ bhavanti laukikāḥ sāmagryā paśyāmaḥ iti kin tu dīpena paśyāmaḥ cakṣuṣā nirīkṣāmahe iti ācakṣate

original: tasmān na sāmagrī kāraṇam akāraṇatvāc ca na pramāṇam iti nedaṃ sādhu pramāṇasvarūpam //
analyzed: tasmāt na sāmagrī kāraṇam akāraṇa tvāt ca na pramāṇam iti na idam sādhu pramāṇa svarūpam

original: atrocyate yata eva sādhakatamaṃ karaṇaṃ karaṇasādhanaś ca pramāṇaśabdaḥ tata eva sāmagryāḥ pramāṇatvaṃ yuktam tadvyatirekeṇa kārakāntare kvacid api tam abarthasaṃsparśānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: atrā ucyate yatas eva sādhakatamam karaṇam karaṇa sādhanaḥ ca pramāṇa śabdaḥ tatas eva sāmagryāḥ pramāṇa tvam yuktam tad vyatirekeṇa kāraka antare kvacid api tam ap artha saṃsparśa anupapatteḥ

original: anekakārakasannidhāne kāryaṃ ghaṭamānaṃ anyataravyapagame ca vighaṭamānaṃ kasmai atiśayaṃ prayacchet na cātiśayaḥ kāryajanmani kasyacid avadhāryate sarveṣāṃ tatra vyāpriyamāṇatvāt //
analyzed: aneka kāraka sannidhāne kāryam ghaṭamānam anyatara vyapagame ca vighaṭamānam kasmai atiśayam prayacchet na ca atiśayaḥ kārya janmani kasyacid avadhāryate sarveṣām tatra vyāpriyamāṇa tvāt

original: sannipattyajanakatvam atiśaya iti cen na ārādupakārakāṇām api kārakatvānapāyāt /
analyzed: sannipatti ajanaka tvam atiśayaḥ iti ced na ārāt upakārakāṇām api kāraka tva anapāyāt

original: jñāne ca janye kim asannipatyajanakam sarveṣām indriyamano 'rthādīnām itaretarasaṃsarge sati jñānaniṣpatteḥ //
analyzed: jñāne ca janye kim asannipatyajanakam sarveṣām indriya manaḥ rtha ādīnām itaretara saṃsarge sati jñāna niṣpatteḥ

original: atha sahasaiva kāryajananam atiśayaḥ so 'pi kasyāñ cid avasthāyāṃ karaṇasyeva karmaṇo 'pi śakyate vaktuṃ yathā aviralajaladharadhārāprabandhabaddhāndhakāranivahe bahulaniśīthe sahasaiva sphuratā vidyul latā ''lokena kāminījñānam ādadhānena saty api sīmantinīm antareṇa taddarśanaṃ na saṃpadyate āgatamātrāyām eva tasyāṃ bhavatīti tad api karmakārakam atiśayayogitvāt karaṇaṃ syāt //
analyzed: atha sahasā eva kārya jananam atiśayaḥ saḥ pi kasyām cit avasthāyām karaṇasya iva karmaṇaḥ śakyate vaktum yathā avirala jaladhara dhārā prabandha baddha andhakāra nivahe bahula niśīthe sahasā eva sphuratā vidyut latā lokena kāminī jñānam ādadhānena satī api sīmantinīm antareṇa tat darśanam na saṃpadyate āgata mātrāyām eva tasyām bhavati iti tat api karma kārakam atiśaya yogi tvāt karaṇam syāt

original: tasmāt phalotpādāvinābhāvisvabhāvatvam avaśyatayā kāryajanakatvam atiśayaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt phala utpāda avinābhāvi svabhāva tvam avaśya tayā kārya janaka tvam atiśayaḥ

original: sa ca sāmagrantargatasya na kasyacid ekasya kārakasya kathayituṃ pāryate /
analyzed: sa ca sāmagrā antargatasya na kasyacid ekasya kārakasya kathayitum pāryate

original: sāmagryās tu so 'tiśayaḥ suvacaḥ /
analyzed: sāmagryāḥ tu saḥ tiśayaḥ suvacaḥ

original: sannihitā cet sāmagrī saṃpannam eva phalam iti saivātiśayavatī //
analyzed: sannihitā ced sāmagrī saṃpannam eva phalam iti sā eva atiśayavatī

original: nanu mukhyayoḥ pramātṛprameyayor api tadavinābhāvitvam atiśayo 'sty eva pramitisambandham antareṇa tayos tathātvābhāvat /
analyzed: nanu mukhyayoḥ pramātṛ prameyayoḥ api tad avinābhāvi tvam atiśayaḥ sti eva pramiti sambandham antareṇa tayoḥ tathātva abhāvat

original: pramiṇotīti pramātā bhavati pramīyata iti ca prameyam satyam etat kin tu sākalyaprasādalabdhapramitisambandhanaḥ pramātṛprameyayor mukhyasvarūpalābhaḥ /
analyzed: pramiṇoti iti pramātā bhavati pramīyate iti ca prameyam satyam etat kin tu sākalya prasāda labdha pramiti sambandhanaḥ pramātṛ prameyayoḥ mukhya svarūpa lābhaḥ

original: sākalyāpacaye pramityabhāvāt gauṇe pramātṛprameye saṃpadyete /
analyzed: sākalya apacaye pramiti abhāvāt gauṇe pramātṛ prameye saṃpadyete

original: evañ ca sākalyam antareṇa yadi pramitir avakalpeta bhaved vyabhicāraḥ na tv asau tathā dṛśyate iti pramityavyabhicārāt sākalyam eva sātiśayam iti tam abarthayogāt tad eva karaṇam //
analyzed: evam ca sākalyam antareṇa yadi pramitiḥ avakalpeta bhavet vyabhicāraḥ na tu asau tathā dṛśyate iti pramiti avyabhicārāt sākalyam eva sa atiśayam iti tam ap artha yogāt tat eva karaṇam

original: yat tu kim apekṣaṃ sāmagryāḥ karaṇatvam iti tat antargatakārakāpekṣam iti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu kim apekṣam sāmagryāḥ karaṇa tvam iti tat antargata kāraka apekṣam iti brūmaḥ

original: kārakāṇāṃ dharmaḥ sāmagrī na svarūpahānāya teṣāṃ kalpate sākalyadaśāyām api tatsvarūpapratyabhijñānāt //
analyzed: kārakāṇām dharmaḥ sāmagrī na svarūpa hānāya teṣām kalpate sākalya daśāyām api tad svarūpa pratyabhijñānāt

original: nanu samagryebhyaḥ sāmagrī bhinnā cet kathaṃ pṛthaṅ nopalabhyate abhede tu sarvakārakāṇi karaṇībhūtāntānyeveti kartṛkarmavyavahārocchedaprasaṅgaḥ maivam samagrasannidhānākhyadharmasya pratyakṣam upalmbhāt /
analyzed: nanu samagryebhyaḥ sāmagrī bhinnā ced katham pṛthak nā upalabhyate abhede tu sarva kārakāṇi karaṇībhūta antāni eva iti kartṛ karma vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ mā evam samagra sannidhāna ākhya dharmasya pratyakṣam upalmbhāt

original: pṛthag avasthiteṣu hi sthālījalajvalanataṇḍulādiṣu na samagratāpratyayaḥ samuditeṣu tu bhavatīty ataḥ tantupaṭalaparighaṭitapaṭādyavayavivat kārakakalāpaniṣpādyadravyāntarābhāve 'pi samudāyātmikā sāmagrī vidyata eveti samudāyyapekṣayā karaṇatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: pṛthak avasthiteṣu hi sthālī jala jvalana taṇḍula ādiṣu na samagra tā pratyayaḥ samuditeṣu tu bhavati iti atas tantu paṭala parighaṭita paṭa ādi avayavi vat kāraka kalāpa niṣpādya dravya antara abhāve pi samudāya ātmikā sāmagrī vidyate eva iti samudāyi apekṣayā karaṇa tām pratipadyate

original: tasmān na paricodanīyam idaṃ kasmin karmaṇi sāmagrī karaṇam iti /
analyzed: tasmāt na paricodanīyam idam kasmin karmaṇi sāmagrī karaṇam iti

original: samuddāyināṃ sāmagryavasthāyām api svarūpānapāyāt samudrāyiviśeṣe karmaṇi sāmagrī karaṇam /
analyzed: samuddāyinām sāmagrī avasthāyām api sva rūpa anapāyāt samudrāyi viśeṣe karmaṇi sāmagrī karaṇam

original: ata eva pramiter na nirālambanatvam //
analyzed: atas eva pramiteḥ na nirālambana tvam

original: etena pramātrādiḥ pṛthag upadarśita iti vidhācatuṣṭayam api samāhitam //
analyzed: etena pramātṛ ādiḥ pṛthak upadarśitaḥ iti vidhā catuṣṭayam api samāhitam

original: yat tv abhyadhāyi sāmagryāḥ karaṇavibhaktinirdeśo na dṛśyata iti tatrocyate sāmagrī hi saṃhatiḥ /
analyzed: yat tu abhyadhāyi sāmagryāḥ karaṇa vibhakti nirdeśaḥ na dṛśyate iti tatra ucyate sāmagrī hi saṃhatiḥ

original: sā hi saṃhanyamānavyatirekeṇa na vyavahārapadavīm avatarati tena sāmagryā paśyāmīti na vyapadeśaḥ //
analyzed: sā hi saṃhanyamāna vyatirekeṇa na vyavahāra padavīm avatarati tena sāmagryā paśyāmi iti na vyapadeśaḥ

original: yas tu dīpendriyāṇāṃ tṛtīyānirdeśaḥ sa phalopajananāvinābhāvisvabhātvākhyasāmagrīsarūpasamāropaṇanibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu dīpa indriyāṇām tṛtīyā nirdeśaḥ sa phala upajanana avinābhāvi svabhā tu ākhya sāmagrī sarūpa samāropaṇa nibandhanaḥ

original: anyatrāpi ca tadrūpasamāropeṇa sthālyā pacatīti vyapadeśo dṛśyate eva /
analyzed: anyatra api ca tad rūpa samāropeṇa sthālyā pacati iti vyapadeśaḥ dṛśyate eva

original: tasmād antargatakārakāpekṣayā labdhakaraṇabhāvā sāmagrī pramāṇam //
analyzed: tasmāt antargata kāraka apekṣayā labdha karaṇa bhāvā sāmagrī pramāṇam

original: apare punar ācakṣate sāmagrī nāma samuditāni kārakāṇi /
analyzed: apare punar ācakṣate sāmagrī nāma samuditāni kārakāṇi

original: teṣāṃ dvairūpyam ahṛdayaṅgamam /
analyzed: teṣām dvairūpyam a hṛdayaṅgamam

original: atha ca tāny eva pṛthag avasthitāni karmādibhāvaṃ bhajante atha ca tāny eva samuditāni karaṇībhavantīti ko 'yaṃ nayaḥ tasmāt kartṛkarmavyatiriktam avyabhicārādiviśeṣaṇakārthapramājanakam kārakaṃ karaṇam ucyate /
analyzed: atha ca tāni eva pṛthak avasthitāni karma ādi bhāvam bhajante atha ca tāni eva samuditāni karaṇībhavanti iti kaḥ yam nayaḥ tasmāt kartṛ karma vyatiriktam avyabhicāra ādi viśeṣaṇaka artha pramā janakam kārakam karaṇam ucyate

original: tad eva tṛtīyayā vyapadiśantidīpena paśyāmi cakṣuṣā nirīkṣe liṅgena buddhye śabdena jānāmi manasā niścinomīti //
analyzed: tat eva tṛtīyayā vyapadiśanti dīpena paśyāmi cakṣuṣā nirīkṣe liṅgena buddhye śabdena jānāmi manasā niścinomi iti

original: nanu trīṇy eva kārakāṇy asmin pakṣe bhaveyuḥ jñānakriyāyāṃ tāvat evam evaitat yathā bhavān āha /
analyzed: nanu trīṇi eva kārakāṇi asmin pakṣe bhaveyuḥ jñāna kriyāyām tāvat evam eva etat yathā bhavān āha

original: pākādiktiyāsu ktiyāśrayadhāraṇādyupakārabhedaparyālocanayā bhavatv adhikaraṇādikārakāntaravyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: pāka ādi ktiyāsu ktiyā āśraya dhāraṇa ādi upakāra bheda paryālocanayā bhavatu adhikaraṇa ādi kāraka antara vyavahāraḥ

original: pramitau tu manodīpacakṣurādeḥ na lakṣyate viśeṣa iti tatsarvaṃ karaṇatvena sammatam //
analyzed: pramitau tu manaḥ dīpa cakṣuḥ ādeḥ na lakṣyate viśeṣaḥ iti tat sarvam karaṇa tvena sammatam

original: kas teṣu tamabartha iti cet asti kaścit yad ayaṃ lokaḥ [ahaṃ mayā jānāmi] [ghaṭena ghaṭaṃ jānāmi] iti na kartṛkarmaṇī vismṛtyāpi karaṇatvena vyapadiśati nayanamanodīpaśabdaśabdaliṅgāni tu tathā vyapadiśati so 'yam eṣāṃ paśyati kartṛkarmavailakṣaṇyaṃ cakṣurādīnām /
analyzed: kaḥ teṣu tamap arthaḥ iti ced asti kaścid yat ayam lokaḥ aham mayā jānāmi ghaṭena ghaṭam jānāmi iti na kartṛ karmaṇī vismṛtya api karaṇa tvena vyapadiśati nayana manaḥ dīpa śabda śabda liṅgāni tu tathā vyapadiśati saḥ yam eṣām paśyati kartṛ karma vailakṣaṇyam cakṣuḥ ādīnām

original: tadvailakṣaṇyam eva ca teṣām atiśaya iti /
analyzed: tad vailakṣaṇyam eva ca teṣām atiśayaḥ iti

original: tad ayam iha pramāṇaṃ pramātā prameyaṃ pramitir iti caturvarga eva vyavahāraḥ parisamāpyate /
analyzed: tat ayam iha pramāṇam pramātā prameyam pramitiḥ iti caturvargaḥ eva vyavahāraḥ parisamāpyate

original: tasmāt kartṛkarmavilakṣaṇā saṃśayaviparyayarahitārthabodhavidhāyinī bodhābodhasvabhāvā sāmagrī pramāṇam iti yuktam //
analyzed: tasmāt kartṛ karma vilakṣaṇā saṃśaya viparyaya rahitā artha bodha vidhāyinī bodha abodha svabhāvā sāmagrī pramāṇam iti yuktam

original: ye tu bodhasyaiva pramāṇatvam ācakṣate na sūkṣmadarśinas te /
analyzed: ye tu bodhasya eva pramāṇa tvam ācakṣate na sūkṣma darśinaḥ te

original: bodhaḥ khalu pramāṇasya phalaṃ na sākṣātpramāṇam /
analyzed: bodhaḥ khalu pramāṇasya phalam na sākṣāt pramāṇam

original: karaṇārthābhidhāno hi pramāṇaśabdaḥ pramīyate aneneti pramāṇam /
analyzed: karaṇa artha abhidhānaḥ hi pramāṇa śabdaḥ pramīyate anena iti pramāṇam

original: pramīyata iti ko 'rthaḥ pramā janyata iti /
analyzed: pramīyate iti kaḥ rthaḥ pramā janyate iti

original: pramāṇād avagacchāma iti vadanto laukikāḥ karaṇasyaiva prāmānyam anumanyante /
analyzed: pramāṇāt avagacchāmaḥ iti vadantaḥ laukikāḥ karaṇasya eva prāmānyam anumanyante

original: yas tu pramā pramānam iti pramāṇaśabdaḥ sa pramāṇaphale draṣṭavyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu pramā pramānam iti pramāṇa śabdaḥ sa pramāṇa phale draṣṭavyaḥ

original: tathā ca saṃśayaviparyayātmakaṃ apramāṇaphalam api jñānaṃ ātmamano 'numāne tadviśeṣaṇārthaparicchede vā viśiṣṭapramājananāt pramāṇatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: tathā ca saṃśaya viparyaya ātmakam apramāṇa phalam api jñānam ātma manaḥ numāne tad viśeṣaṇa artha paricchede vā viśiṣṭa pramā jananāt pramāṇa tām pratipadyate

original: avyabhicārādiviśeṣaṇopapannam api jñānam aphalajanakam apramāṇam eva /
analyzed: avyabhicāra ādi viśeṣaṇa upapannam api jñānam aphala janakam apramāṇam eva

original: kevalapramāsvabhāvaṃ pramāṇād vibhinnaṃ phalam iti pratyakṣalakṣaṇe vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: kevala pramā svabhāvam pramāṇāt vibhinnam phalam iti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe vakṣyāmaḥ

original: atha vyatiriktaphalajanakam api bodharūpam eva pramāṇam ucyate tad ayuktam sakalajagadviditabodhetarasvabhāvaśabdaliṅgadīpendriyādiparihāraprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: atha vyatirikta phala janakam api bodha rūpam eva pramāṇam ucyate tat ayuktam sakala jagat vidita bodha itara svabhāva śabda liṅga dīpa indriya ādi parihāra prasaṅgāt

original: tasmāt sāmagryanupraviṣṭo bodhaḥ viśeṣaṇajñānam iva kvacitpratiyakṣe liṅgajñānam iva liṅgipramitau sārūpyadarśanam ivopamāne śabdaśravaṇam iva tadarthajñāne pramāṇatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: tasmāt sāmagrī anupraviṣṭaḥ bodhaḥ viśeṣaṇa jñānam iva kvacid pratiyakṣe liṅga jñānam iva liṅgi pramitau sārūpya darśanam iva upamāne śabda śravaṇam iva tad artha jñāne pramāṇa tām pratipadyate

original: ata eva bodhābodhasvabhāvā sāmagrī pramāṇam ity uktam //
analyzed: atas eva bodha abodha svabhāvā sāmagrī pramāṇam iti uktam

original: anye tu tulyasāmagryadhīnayoḥ jñānārthayoḥ grāhyagrāhakabhāvaṃ vadantaḥ bodhaṃ pramāṇam abhyupāgaman /
analyzed: anye tu tulya sāmagrī adhīnayoḥ jñāna arthayoḥ grāhya grāhaka bhāvam vadantaḥ bodham pramāṇam abhyupāgaman

original: kṣaṇabhaṅgiṣu padārtheṣu sahakāryupādānakāraṇāpekṣa kṣaṇāntarasantatijananena ca lokayātrām udvahatsu jñānajanmani jñānam upādānakāraṇam arthaḥ sahakārikāraṇam arthajanmani ca arthaḥ upādānakāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ ca sahakārikāraṇam iti jñānaṃ ca jñānārthajanyam arthaś ca arthajñānajanyo bhavatīty evam ekasāmagryadhīnatayā tam artham avyabhicarato jñānasya tatra prāmāṇyam iti //
analyzed: kṣaṇabhaṅgiṣu padārtheṣu kṣaṇa antara santati jananena ca lokayātrām udvahatsu jñāna janmani jñānam upādāna kāraṇam arthaḥ sahakāri kāraṇam artha janmani ca arthaḥ upādāna kāraṇam jñānam ca sahakāri kāraṇam iti jñānam ca jñāna artha janyam arthaḥ ca artha jñāna janyaḥ bhavati iti evam eka sāmagrī adhīna tayā tam artham avyabhicarataḥ jñānasya tatra prāmāṇyam iti

original: tad idam anupapannam aphalajanakasya pramāṇatvānupapatter ity uktatvāt /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam a phala janakasya pramāṇa tva anupapatteḥ iti ukta tvāt

original: api ca karmaṇi jñānaṃ pramāṇam iṣyate /
analyzed: api ca karmaṇi jñānam pramāṇam iṣyate

original: yathoutam ![savyāpāram ivābhāti vyāpāreṇa svakarmaṇi] iti /
analyzed: yathā ūutam sa vyāpāram iva ābhāti vyāpāreṇa sva karmaṇi iti

original: sa cāyam arthakṣaṇo jñānasamakālaḥ tataḥpūrvābhyāṃ jñānārthalakṣaṇābhyām upajanita iti tatkarmatāṃ pratipadyatāṃ na punaḥ svasamānakālaprasūtajñānakṣaṇakarmatām iti //
analyzed: sa ca ayam artha kṣaṇaḥ jñāna sama kālaḥ tatas pūrvābhyām jñāna artha lakṣaṇābhyām upajanitaḥ iti tad karma tām pratipadyatām na punar sva samāna kāla prasūta jñāna kṣaṇa karma tām iti

original: nanu ca tulyasāmagryadhīnatayā samānakālatayā ca tadavyabhicārasiddhau satyāṃ kva karmatvam upayujyate hanta tarhi sahotpannayoḥ samānasāmagrīkayoḥ grāhyagrāhakaniyamaḥ kiṃkṛta iti vaktavyam jñānaṃ svaprakāśasvabhāvam iti grāhakam artho jaḍātmeti grāhyam iti cet ayam api viśeṣas tulyakālayoḥ kutastyaḥ upādānasahakārikāraṇabhedād iti cet na tasya kṣaṇabhaṅge nirākariṣyamāṇatvāt //
analyzed: nanu ca tulya sāmagrī adhīna tayā samāna kāla tayā ca tad avyabhicāra siddhau satyām kva karma tvam upayujyate hanta tarhi saha utpannayoḥ samāna sāmagrīkayoḥ grāhya grāhaka niyamaḥ kim kṛtaḥ iti vaktavyam jñānam sva prakāśa svabhāvam iti grāhakam arthaḥ jaḍa ātmā iti grāhyam iti ced ayam api viśeṣaḥ tulya kālayoḥ kutastyaḥ upādāna sahakāri kāraṇa bhedāt iti ced na tasya kṣaṇa bhaṅge nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: ye 'pi nirākārasya bodhasvarūpasya nīlapītādyanekaviṣayasādhāraṇatvāt janakatvasya ca cakṣutādāv api bhāvenātiprasaṅgāt tadākāratvākṛtam eva jñānakarmaniyamam avagacchantaḥ sākāraṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇam iti pratipedire te 'pi vijñānādvaitasiṣādhayiṣayaivam abhidadhānāḥ tannirāsaprasaṅga eva nirasiṣyante /
analyzed: ye pi nirākārasya bodha svarūpasya nīla pīta ādi aneka viṣaya sādhāraṇa tvāt janaka tvasya ca cakṣu tā ādau api bhāvena atiprasaṅgāt tad ākāra tva akṛtam eva jñāna karma niyamam avagacchantaḥ sa ākāram jñānam pramāṇam iti pratipedire te pi vijñāna advaita siṣādhayiṣayā evam abhidadhānāḥ tad nirāsa prasaṅge eva nirasiṣyante

original: na hy ekam eva sākāraṃ jñānaṃ grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ ca bhavitum arhatīti vakṣyate //
analyzed: na hi ekam eva sa ākāram jñānam grāhyam grāhakam ca bhavitum arhati iti vakṣyate

original: arthas tu sākārajñānavādino na samasty eva /
analyzed: arthaḥ tu sa ākāra jñāna vādinaḥ na samasti eva

original: sa hy anumeyo vā syāt pratyakṣo vā nānumeyaḥ sambandhagrahaṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: sa hi anumeyaḥ vā syāt pratyakṣaḥ vā na anumeyaḥ sambandha grahaṇa abhāvāt

original: arthe hi sati sākāraṃ nirākāraṃ tadatyaye /
analyzed: arthe hi sati sa ākāram nirākāram tad atyaye

original: nityānumeya bāhyārthavādī jñānaṃ kva dṛṣṭavān //
analyzed: nitya anumeya bāhya artha vādī jñānam kva dṛṣṭavān

original: nāpi pratyakṣo 'rthaḥ ākāradvayānupalambhāt /
analyzed: na api pratyakṣaḥ rthaḥ ākāra dvaya anupalambhāt

original: abhyupagame cānavasthāprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: abhyupagame ca anavasthā prasaṅgāt

original: arthākāro hi nirākārajñānagamyo na bhavatīti jñānenākāravatā gṛhyate so ' yam idānīṃ jñānākāro 'pi grāhyatvāt anyenākāravatā gṛhyate so 'py anyeneti //
analyzed: artha ākāraḥ hi nirākāra jñāna gamyaḥ na bhavati iti jñānena ākāravatā gṛhyate saḥ yam idānīm grāhya tvāt anyena ākāravatā gṛhyate saḥ u pi anyena iti

original: atha vā artho nirākārajñānagrāhyatāṃ nopayātīti svagrāhake jñānātmani samarpitātmā bhavatīti sākāraṃ jñānam evedaṃ saṃpannam iti punar artho 'nyaḥ kalpanīyaḥ so 'pi grāhyatvāt svagrāhakasya sākāratvasiddhaye tatraiva līyata iti sākāraṃ jñānam evāvaśiṣyata iti punar anyo 'rtha iti ittham anavasthā /
analyzed: atha vā arthaḥ nirākāra jñāna grāhya tām na upayāti iti sva grāhake jñāna ātmani samarpita ātmā bhavati iti sa ākāram jñānam eva idam saṃpannam iti punar arthaḥ nyaḥ kalpanīyaḥ grāhya tvāt sva grāhakasya sa ākāra tva siddhaye tatra eva līyate iti sa ākāram jñānam eva avaśiṣyate iti punar anyaḥ rthaḥ iti ittham anavasthā

original: pratikarmavyavasthā tu janakatvanibandhanā bhaviṣyati vastusvabhāvasyāparyanuyojyatvāt /
analyzed: prati karma vyavasthā tu janaka tva nibandhanā bhaviṣyati vastu svabhāvasya a paryanuyojya tvāt

original: sākārapakṣe 'pi paryanuyogasāmyam ityādi sarvaṃ upariṣṭāt savistaram abhidhāsyate /
analyzed: sa ākāra pakṣe pi paryanuyoga sāmyam ityādi sarvam upariṣṭāt sa vistaram abhidhāsyate

original: sākārapakṣe 'pi ca na pramāṇāt vyatiriktaṃ phalam upadarśitam ity asatpakṣa evāyam //
analyzed: sa ākāra pakṣe ca na pramāṇāt vyatiriktam phalam upadarśitam iti asat pakṣaḥ eva ayam

original: śābarās tu bruvate ya ete bodhaprāmāṇyavādino vijñānād abhinnam eva phalam abhidadhati te bāḍhaṃ nirasanīyā bhavanty eva vayaṃ tu vijñānāt bhinnam eva phalaṃ dṛṣṭākhyam abhyupagacchāmaḥ /
analyzed: śābarāḥ tu bruvate ye ete bodha prāmāṇya vādinaḥ vijñānāt abhinnam eva phalam abhidadhati te bāḍham nirasanīyāḥ bhavanti eva vayam tu vijñānāt bhinnam eva phalam dṛṣṭa ākhyam abhyupagacchāmaḥ

original: tenaiva tadanumīyate jñānaṃ hi nāma kriyātmakaṃ kriyā ca phalānumeyāḥ jñātṛvyāpāram antareṇa phalāniṣpatteḥ //
analyzed: tena eva tat anumīyate jñānam hi nāma kriyā ātmakam kriyā ca phala anumeyāḥ jñātṛ vyāpāram antareṇa phala aniṣpatteḥ

original: saṃsargo 'pi kārakāṇāṃ kriyāgarbha eva bhavati /
analyzed: saṃsargaḥ pi kārakāṇām kriyā garbhaḥ eva bhavati

original: tadanabhyupagame kim adhikṛtya kārakāṇi sāṃsṛjyeran /
analyzed: tad anabhyupagame kim adhikṛtya kārakāṇi sāṃsṛjyeran

original: na cāsaṃsṛṣṭāni tāni phalavanti /
analyzed: na ca a saṃsṛṣṭāni tāni phalavanti

original: kriyāveśāc ca kārakaṃ kārakaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: kriyā āveśāt ca kārakam kārakam bhavati

original: aparathā hi tat vastusvarūpamātram eva syāt na kārakam /
analyzed: aparathā hi tat vastu svarūpa mātram eva syāt na kārakam

original: tataś ca na phalārthibhir upādīyeteti vyavahāravilopaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca na phala arthibhiḥ upādīyeta iti vyavahāra vilopaḥ

original: tasmāt yathā hi kārakāṇi taṇḍulasalilānalasthālyādīni siddhasvabhāvāni sādhyaṃ dhātvartham ekaṃ pākalakṣaṇam urarīkṛtya sasṛjyante saṃsṛṣṭāni ca kriyām utpādayanti tathā ''tmendriyamano 'rthasannikarṣe sati jñānākhyo vyāpāra upajāyate /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā hi kārakāṇi taṇḍula salila anala sthālī ādīni siddha svabhāvāni sādhyam dhātvartham ekam pāka lakṣaṇam urarīkṛtya sasṛjyante saṃsṛṣṭāni ca kriyām utpādayanti tathā tma indriya manaḥ rtha sannikarṣe sati jñāna ākhyaḥ vyāpāraḥ upajāyate

original: sa ca na pratyakṣaḥ arthasyaiva bahirdeśasambaddhasya grahaṇāt ākāradvayapratibhāsābhāvāt agṛhītasyāpi tasya cakṣurādivad upāyarvāt parokṣo 'pi cāsau viṣayaprakāśatālakṣaṇena phalena kalpyate /
analyzed: sa ca na pratyakṣaḥ arthasya eva bahis deśa sambaddhasya grahaṇāt ākāra dvaya pratibhāsa abhāvāt agṛhītasya api tasya cakṣuḥ ādi vat ca asau viṣaya prakāśa tā lakṣaṇena phalena kalpyate

original: tadāha bhāṣyakāraḥ [na hy ajñāne 'rthe kaścid buddhim upalabhate jñāte tu anumānād avagacchati] iti /
analyzed: tat āha bhāṣyakāraḥ na hi ajñāne rthe kaścid buddhim upalabhate jñāte tu anumānāt avagacchati iti

original: vārtikakṛtā 'py uktam [nānyathā hy arthasadbhāvo dṛṣṭas sann upapadyate /
analyzed: vārtika kṛtā pi uktam na anyathā hi artha sadbhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ san upapadyate

original: jñānaṃ cen nety ataḥ paścāt pramāṇam upakalpyate] //
analyzed: jñānam ced na iti atas paścāt pramāṇam upakalpyate

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: tad eṣa phalānumeyo jñātṛvyāpāro jñānādiśabdavāyaḥ pramāṇam /
analyzed: tat eṣa phala anumeyaḥ jñātṛ vyāpāraḥ jñāna ādi śabda vāyaḥ pramāṇam

original: indriyādīnāṃ tu tadutpādakatayā indriyavyāpāre jñānam upacarati na sākṣād iti //
analyzed: indriya ādīnām tu tad utpādaka tayā indriya vyāpāre jñānam upacarati na sākṣāt iti

original: atra pratividhīyate aho bata ime kebhyo bibhyataḥ śrotriyāḥ paraṃ kim api vaiklavyam upāgatāḥ na khalu nityaṃ parokṣaṃ jñānaṃ bhavitum arhati jñāto 'rtha iti kvacit tadviśisṭārthapratyavamarśadarśanāt viśeṣaṇāgrahaṇe śuklaḥ paṭa itivat viśiṣṭapratiter anutpādāt //
analyzed: atra pratividhīyate aho bata ime kebhyaḥ bibhyataḥ śrotriyāḥ param kim api vaiklavyam upāgatāḥ na khalu nityam parokṣam jñānam bhavitum arhati jñātaḥ rthaḥ iti kvacid tad viśisṭa artha pratyavamarśa darśanāt viśeṣaṇa agrahaṇe śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti vat viśiṣṭa pratiteḥ anutpādāt

original: kaścāyam iyān saṃtrāsaḥ viṣayagrahaṇalāle vijñānāgrahaṇamātrakeṇa bāhyārthanihnavavādinaḥ śākyāḥ śakyāḥ śamayitum //
analyzed: kaḥ ca ayam iyān saṃtrāsaḥ viṣaya grahaṇa lāle vijñāna agrahaṇa mātrakeṇa bāhya artha nihnava vādinaḥ śākyāḥ śakyāḥ śamayitum

original: yat tu kriyāsvabhāvatvāt tasya parokṣatvaṃ tad ayuktam na hi kriyāsvabhāvaṃ jñānam api tu phalasvabhāvam eva //
analyzed: yat tu kriyā svabhāva tvāt tasya parokṣa tvam tat ayuktam na hi kriyā svabhāvam jñānam api tu phala svabhāvam eva

original: api ca kriyā 'pi pratyakṣadravyavartinī pratyakṣaiva bhāṭṭānāṃ pratyakṣaś cātmā tat kim anenāparāddhaṃ yad etadīyakriyāyā apratyakṣatvam ucyate /
analyzed: api ca kriyā pratyakṣa dravya vartinī pratyakṣā eva bhāṭṭānām pratyakṣaḥ ca ātmā tat kim anena aparāddham yat etadīya kriyāyāḥ a pratyakṣa tvam ucyate

original: na cotkṣepaṇādibhedabhinnaparispandātmakavyāpāravyatirekeṇa bāhyakārakeṣv api sūkṣmā nāma kācid asti kriyā /
analyzed: na ca utkṣepaṇa ādi bheda bhinna parispanda ātmaka vyāpāra vyatirekeṇa bāhya kārakeṣu api sūkṣmā nāma kācid asti kriyā

original: sā hi yadi nityā jātivat athānityā rūpavat vastudharma iṣyeta /
analyzed: sā hi yadi nityā jātivat atha anityā rūpavat vastu dharmaḥ iṣyeta

original: tatra yadi nityā tarhi sarvadā vastunaḥ kriyāyogāt sarvadā phalaniṣpattiprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: tatra yadi nityā tarhi sarvadā vastunaḥ kriyā yogāt sarvadā phala niṣpatti prasaṅgaḥ

original: atha kārakanirvartyā kriyā sā 'pīdānīṃ kāryatvāt savyāpārakārakakāryā bhaved ity anavasthā /
analyzed: atha kāraka nirvartyā kriyā sā pi idānīm kārya tvāt sa vyāpāra kāraka kāryā bhavet iti anavasthā

original: niṣkriyakārakakāryatve tu kriyām iva phalam api niṣkriyāṇy eva kārakāṇi kuryur iti kiṃ kriyayā nanu karotīti kārakam /
analyzed: niṣkriya kāraka kārya tve tu kriyām iva phalam api niṣkriyāṇi eva kārakāṇi kuryuḥ iti kim kriyayā nanu karoti iti kārakam

original: kriyā ''veśam antareṇa ca kārakatvānupapattiḥ satyaṃ karotīti yad brūṣe seyam uktaiva kriyā bhavati /
analyzed: kriyā veśam antareṇa ca kāraka tva anupapattiḥ satyam karoti iti yat brūṣe sā iyam uktā eva kriyā bhavati

original: caitraḥ kaṭaṃ karotīti caitrasyaiva kaṭasyeva karotyarthasyāpratyākhyeyatvāt tatkṛtam eva caitrādīnāṃ kārakatvam ucyate nātīndriyakriyāyoganibandhanaḥ kārakabhāvaḥ kriyāyā atīndriyatvena tadyogakṛtakārakatvānadhigame vyavahāravipralopaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: caitraḥ kaṭam karoti iti caitrasya eva kaṭasya iva karoti arthasya apratyākhyeya tvāt tad kṛtam eva caitra ādīnām kāraka tvam ucyate na atīndriya kriyā yoga nibandhanaḥ kāraka bhāvaḥ kriyāyāḥ atīndriya tvena tad yoga kṛta kāraka tva anadhigame vyavahāra vipralopa prasaṅgāt

original: kriyā ''veśakṛtaṃ hi tatkārakarvam anavagacchantaḥ kathaṃ phlārthinas tadupādadīran //
analyzed: kriyā veśa kṛtam hi an avagacchantaḥ katham phlā arthinaḥ tat upādadīran

original: matpakṣe kārakatvaṃ hi nāsti kiñcid atīndriyam /
analyzed: mad pakṣe kāraka tvam hi nā asti kiñcid atīndriyam

original: kārakatvaṃ svarūpasya sahakāryādisannidhiḥ //
tāvad eva viniścitya tadupādīyate 'rthibhiḥ /
analyzed: tāvat eva viniścitya tat upādīyate rthibhiḥ

original: tad evopādadānaiś ca phalam apy adhigamyate //
analyzed: tat eva upādadānaiḥ ca phalam api adhigamyate

original: nirvyāpārasya sattvasya ko guṇaḥ sahakāribhiḥ /
analyzed: nirvyāpārasya sattvasya kaḥ guṇaḥ sahakāribhiḥ

original: savyāpārasya sattvasya ko guṇaḥ sahakāribhiḥ //
analyzed: sa vyāpārasya sattvasya kaḥ guṇaḥ sahakāribhiḥ

original: atha vyāpāra evaiṣa sarvais sambhūya sādhyate /
analyzed: atha vyāpāraḥ eva eṣa sarvaiḥ sambhūya sādhyate

original: kiṃ phalenāparāddhaṃ vaḥ tad dhi sambhūya sādhyatām //
analyzed: kim phalena aparāddham vaḥ tat hi sambhūya sādhyatām

original: yat tu karotyarthasyāpratyākhyeyatvād ity uktaṃ tatrocyate parispanda eva bhautiko vyāpāraḥ karotyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu karoti arthasya a pratyākhyeya tvāt iti uktam tatra ucyate parispandaḥ eva bhautikaḥ vyāpāraḥ karoti arthaḥ

original: na hi vayaṃ parispandātmakaṃ paridṛśyamānaṃ vyāpāram apahnumahe pratikārakaṃ vicitrasya jvalanāder vyāpārasya pratyakṣam upalambhāt /
analyzed: na hi vayam parispanda ātmakam paridṛśyamānam vyāpāram apahnumahe pratikārakam vicitrasya jvalana ādeḥ vyāpārasya pratyakṣam upalambhāt

original: atīndriyas tu vyāpāro nāstīti brūmahe //
analyzed: atīndriyaḥ tu vyāpāraḥ na asti iti brūmahe

original: nanu pāko nāma dhātvarthaḥ paridṛśyamānajvalanādivyāpāravyatirikta eṣitavya eva tam antareṇa phalaniṣpatter abhāvāt /
analyzed: nanu pākaḥ nāma dhātvarthaḥ paridṛśyamāna jvalana ādi vyāpāra vyatiriktaḥ eṣitavyaḥ eva tam antareṇa phala niṣpatteḥ abhāvāt

original: asati ca tasmin kimadhikṛtya kārakāṇi saṃsṛjyerann ity uktam tad ayuktam yaṃ tam ekaṃ dhātvarthaṃ sādhyaṃ budhyase sa kiṃ samuditasakala kārakasampādyaḥ ekaikakārakanirvartyo vā tatrādyapakṣa ekaikaṃ bhavet kārakam akriyam /
analyzed: asati ca tasmin kim adhikṛtya kārakāṇi saṃsṛjyeran iti uktam tat ayuktam yam tam ekam dhātvartham sādhyam budhyase sa kim samudita sakala kāraka sampādyaḥ ekaika kāraka nirvartyaḥ vā tatra ādya pakṣe ekaikam bhavet kārakam akriyam

original: ekaikaniṣkriyatve ca sākalye 'pi kutaḥ kriyā //
analyzed: ekaika niṣkriya tve ca sākalye pi kutas kriyā

original: uttarasmin pakṣe pratyekam api pākakriyāyogāt kārakāntaranirapekṣād ekasmāt kārakāt phalaniṣpattiprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: uttarasmin pakṣe pratyekam api pāka kriyā yogāt kāraka antara nirapekṣāt ekasmāt kārakāt phala niṣpatti prasaṅgaḥ

original: na ca tathāvidhadhātvarhapurastaraḥ kārakāṇāṃ saṃsargaḥ //
analyzed: na ca tathāvidha dhātu arha purastaraḥ kārakāṇām saṃsargaḥ

original: kriyānimittasaṃsargavādino hi dvayī gatiḥ /
analyzed: kriyā nimitta saṃsarga vādinaḥ hi dvayī gatiḥ

original: satyāṃ kriyāyāṃ sambandhaḥ sambandhe sati vā kriyā //
analyzed: satyām kriyāyām sambandhaḥ sambandhe sati vā kriyā

original: melanāt pūrvasiddhāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ melanena kim tathā ca janyate phalaṃ vibhaktair api kārakaiḥ //
analyzed: melanāt pūrva siddhāyām kriyāyām melanena kim tathā ca janyate phalam vibhaktaiḥ api kārakaiḥ

original: melanāt tu kriyāsiddhau punar ekaikam akriyam /
analyzed: melanāt tu kriyā siddhau punar ekaikam akriyam

original: tathā sati na kāṣṭhāni jvaleyuḥ puṭharād vinā //
analyzed: tathā sati na kāṣṭhāni jvaleyuḥ puṭharāt vinā

original: nanu piṭharād vinā kāṣṭhāni jvalanti na tu pacanti maivam saty api piṭhare jvalanty eva kāṣṭhāni nānyat kurvanti dṛśyante /
analyzed: nanu piṭharāt vinā kāṣṭhāni jvalanti na tu pacanti mā evam sati api piṭhare jvalanti eva kāṣṭhāni na anyat kurvanti dṛśyante

original: tasmāt kriyāntarābhāvāt phalam evorarīkṛtya kārakāṇi saṃsṛjyante //
analyzed: tasmāt kriyā antara abhāvāt phalam eva urarīkṛtya kārakāṇi saṃsṛjyante

original: nanu phalam api siddhaṃ cet kaḥ sarveṣāṃ siddhasvabhāvānāṃ sambandhaḥ phalaṃ siddhaṃ kārakāṇi siddhānīti sambandhābhāvaḥ /
analyzed: nanu phalam api siddham ced kaḥ sarveṣām siddha svabhāvānām sambandhaḥ phalam siddham kārakāṇi siddhāni iti sambandha abhāvaḥ

original: sādhyaṃ cet phalaṃ saiva kriyā parispandavyatirikteti maivaṃ vocaḥ phalasya kriyātvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: sādhyam ced phalam sā eva kriyā parispanda vyatiriktā iti mā evam vocaḥ phalasya kriyā tva anupapatteḥ

original: odanaṃ hi phalaṃ na kriyā kriyānāmni tu kriyamāṇe na vivadāmahe //
analyzed: odanam hi phalam na kriyā kriyā nāmni tu kriyamāṇe na vivadāmahe

original: nanu pāka idānīṃ kaḥ na ca pacer vācyaśūnyataiva yuktā ucyate samuditadevadattādisakalakārakanikaraparispanda eva viśiṣṭaphalāvacchinnaḥ pāka ity ucyate sa eva hi pacer arthaḥ /
analyzed: nanu pākaḥ idānīm kaḥ na ca paceḥ vācya śūnyatā eva yuktā ucyate samudita devadatta ādi sakala kāraka nikara parispandaḥ eva viśiṣṭa phala avacchinnaḥ pākaḥ iti ucyate saḥ eva hi paceḥ arthaḥ

original: tā eva kāṣṭhapiṭharādikriyā jvalanabharaṇādisvabhāvāḥ pṛthak tayā vyavasthitāḥ tathātvenaivāvabhāsante samuditās tu satyaḥ phalāntarāvacchedāt rūpāntareṇa pākādinā parisphuranti vyapadiśyante ca /
analyzed: tāḥ eva kāṣṭha piṭhara ādi kriyāḥ jvalana bharaṇa ādi svabhāvāḥ pṛthak tayā vyavasthitāḥ tathātvena eva avabhāsante samuditāḥ tu satyaḥ phala antara avacchedāt rūpa antareṇa pāka ādinā parisphuranti vyapadiśyante ca

original: tathā ca devadattaḥ pacatītivat kāṣṭhāni pacanti sthālī pacatīti vyapadeśo dṛśyate /
analyzed: tathā ca devadattaḥ pacati iti vat kāṣṭhāni pacanti sthālī pacati iti vyapadeśaḥ dṛśyate

original: devadattasyāpi darvīvighaṭṭanādir eva paridṛśyamānas tatra vyāpāraḥ na tato 'nyaḥ sūkṣmaḥ //
analyzed: devadattasya api darvī vighaṭṭana ādiḥ eva paridṛśyamānaḥ tatra vyāpāraḥ na tatas nyaḥ sūkṣmaḥ

original: nanu devadattāder bhautiko vyāpāraḥ ātmavyāpārapūrvako bhavitum arhati naitad evam na hy ātmano vyāpāraḥ kaścid asti /
analyzed: nanu devadatta ādeḥ bhautikaḥ vyāpāraḥ ātma vyāpāra pūrvakaḥ bhavitum arhati na etat evam na hi ātmanaḥ vyāpāraḥ kaścid asti

original: icchādveṣapūrvakaprayatnavaśād eva sa bhautikavyāpārakaraṇatāṃ pratipadyate //
analyzed: icchā dveṣa pūrvaka prayatna vaśāt eva sa bhautika vyāpāra karaṇatām pratipadyate

original: tasmāt kārakacakreṇa calatā janyate phalam /
analyzed: tasmāt kāraka cakreṇa calatā janyate phalam

original: na punaś calanād anyo vyāpāra upalabhyate //
analyzed: na punar calanāt anyaḥ vyāpāraḥ upalabhyate

original: calanto devadattādyāḥ tadanantaramodanaḥ /
analyzed: calantaḥ devadatta ādyāḥ tad anantaram odanaḥ

original: etāvad dṛśyate tv atra na tv anyā kācana kriyā //
analyzed: etāvat dṛśyate tu atra na tu anyā kācana kriyā

original: etena bhāvanākhyaḥ karotyarthaḥ puruṣavyāpāro vākyārtha iti yo 'bhyupagataḥ so 'pi pratyukto veditavyaḥ /
analyzed: etena bhāvanā ākhyaḥ karoti arthaḥ puruṣa vyāpāraḥ vākya arthaḥ iti yaḥ bhyupagataḥ saḥ pi pratyuktaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: na hi puruṣavyāpāraḥ kaścid upalabhyate /
analyzed: na hi puruṣa vyāpāraḥ kaścid upalabhyate

original: viśiṣṭaguṇasamavāya evāsya kartṛtvam /
analyzed: viśiṣṭa guṇa samavāyaḥ eva asya kartṛ tvam

original: na ca jñānādayo guṇā eva vyāpārasaṃjñāvācyaḥ siddhasvabhāvatvāt //
analyzed: na ca jñāna ādayaḥ guṇāḥ eva vyāpāra saṃjñā vācyaḥ siddha svabhāva tvāt

original: nanu kriyāvacano dhātur iti jānāter api kriyaiva vācyā syāt /
analyzed: nanu kriyā vacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti jānāteḥ api kriyā eva vācyā syāt

original: sā ca kriyā jñānātmā puruṣavyāpāraḥ nāyaṃ niyamaḥ kriyāvacano dhātur iti /
analyzed: sā ca kriyā jñāna ātmā puruṣa vyāpāraḥ na ayam niyamaḥ kriyā vacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti

original: [gaḍi vadanaikadeśe] ity api darśanāt //
analyzed: vadana eka deśe iti api darśanāt

original: api ca [ghaṭam ahaṃ jānāmi] ity atra bhavataḥ kiṃ pratibhāsate /
analyzed: api ca ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti atra bhavataḥ kim pratibhāsate
