original: ghaṭam iti tāvad viṣayaḥ aham ity ātmā jānāmīti tu cintyaṃ kim atra prakāśata iti /
analyzed: ghaṭam iti tāvat viṣayaḥ aham iti ātmā jānāmi iti tu cintyam kim atra prakāśate iti

original: na vyāpāraḥ parokṣatvāt /
analyzed: na vyāpāraḥ parokṣa tvāt

original: phalaṃ yady atra prakāśate tad eva tarhi dhātuvācyam abhyupagataṃ bhavati /
analyzed: phalam yadi atra prakāśate tat eva tarhi dhātu vācyam abhyupagatam bhavati

original: tasmān na kriyātmakaṃ jñānam //
analyzed: tasmāt na kriyā ātmakam jñānam

original: yadi ca kriyārmakaṃ jñānam abhaviṣyat na bhāṣyakāraḥ kriyātaḥ pṛthag enaṃ nirdekṣyata nirdiśati ca [buddhikarmaṇī api hi pratyabhijñāyete te api nitye prāpnutaḥ] iti tasmāt anyat jñānaṃ anyā ca kriyeti na kriyāsvabhāvatvān nityaṃ parokṣaṃ jñānam //
analyzed: yadi ca kriyā armakam jñānam abhaviṣyat na bhāṣyakāraḥ kriyātaḥ pṛthak enam nirdekṣyata nirdiśati ca buddhi karmaṇī api hi pratyabhijñāyete te api nitye prāpnutaḥ iti tasmāt anyat jñānam anyā ca kriyā iti na kriyā svabhāva tvāt nityam parokṣam jñānam

original: yadi ca nityaparokṣo jñātṛvyāpāraḥ sa tarhi pratibandhāgrahaṇād anumātum api na śakyaḥ /
analyzed: yadi ca nitya parokṣaḥ jñātṛ vyāpāraḥ sa tarhi pratibandha agrahaṇāt anumātum api na śakyaḥ

original: kriyāviśiṣṭabāhyakārakasiddhāntasya nirastatvāt //
ātmādyanumāne kā vārtā iti cet na tatra sāmānyato vyāptigrahaṇasya saṃbhavād iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: ātma ādi anumāne kā vārtā iti ced na tatra sāmānyatas vyāpti grahaṇasya saṃbhavāt iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: iha tu bāhyakārakeṣv api na tatpūrvakaṃ phalaṃ dṛṣṭam ity uktam //
analyzed: iha tu bāhya kārakeṣu api na tad pūrvakam phalam dṛṣṭam iti uktam

original: na cārthāpattir api jñātṛvyāpārakalpanāyaiva prabhavati indriyārthasannikarṣavaśād evārthadṛṣṭatāyā ghaṭamānatvāt //
analyzed: na ca arthāpattiḥ api jñātṛ vyāpāra kalpanāya eva prabhavati indriya artha sannikarṣa vaśāt eva artha dṛṣṭa tāyāḥ ghaṭamāna tvāt

original: kā ceyam arthasya dṛṣṭatā nāma kiṃ darśanakarmatā kiṃ vā prakāśasvabhāvateti tatra darśanasya prokṣatvāt kathaṃ tatkarmatā arthasya dṛṣṭatā gṛhyeta /
analyzed: kā ca iyam arthasya dṛṣṭatā nāma kim darśana karmatā kim vā prakāśa svabhāva tā iti tatra darśanasya prokṣa tvāt katham tad karmatā arthasya dṛṣṭatā gṛhyeta

original: viśeṣaṇāgrahaṇe viśiṣṭapratīter anutpādāt /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa agrahaṇe viśiṣṭa pratīteḥ anutpādāt

original: arthaprakāśatāyās tu sarvān ptatyaviśeṣāt sarve sarvajñāḥ syuḥ //
analyzed: artha prakāśa tāyāḥ tu sarvān ptati aviśeṣāt sarve sarvajñāḥ syuḥ

original: na syuḥ sambandhitayotpādād iti cet akāraṇam etat arthasyaiva hi prakāśatvam atiśayaḥ dīpāder iva na puruṣaniyamena vyavatiṣṭhate //
analyzed: na syuḥ sambandhi tayā utpādāt iti ced akāraṇam etat arthasya eva hi prakāśa tvam atiśayaḥ dīpa ādeḥ iva na puruṣa niyamena vyavatiṣṭhate

original: na ca dvitvādinā sāmyaṃ tasmin niyamadarśanāt /
analyzed: na ca dvi tva ādinā sāmyam tasmin niyama darśanāt

original: prakāśe tu na dīpādau sambandhaniyamaḥ kvacit //
analyzed: prakāśe tu na dīpa ādau sambandha niyamaḥ kvacid

original: yad apekṣādhiyā jātaṃ dvitvaṃ tasyaiva tadgrahaḥ /
analyzed: yat apekṣā dhiyā jātam dvi tvam tasya eva tad grahaḥ

original: saṃvedanam api prājñaiḥ kasyātiśaya ucyate //
analyzed: saṃvedanam api prājñaiḥ kasya atiśayaḥ ucyate

original: jñātuś ced antarā 'nyena vyāpāreṇāsya ko guṇaḥ /
analyzed: jñātuḥ ced antarā nyena vyāpāreṇa asya kaḥ guṇaḥ

original: nanu naiva kriyāśūnyaṃ kārakaṃ phalasiddhaye //
analyzed: nanu nā eva kriyā śūnyam kārakam phala siddhaye

original: uktam atra kriyā hy eṣā yathādarśanam iṣyatām /
analyzed: uktam atra kriyā hi eṣā yathādarśanam iṣyatām

original: jñānaṃ saṃvedanaṃ ceti vidmaḥ paryāyaśabdatām //
analyzed: jñānam saṃvedanam ca iti vidmaḥ paryāya śabda tām

original: saṃvedanaṃ tu jñānasya phalatvena na manmahe /
analyzed: saṃvedanam tu jñānasya phala tvena na manmahe

original: arthātiśayapakṣe ca sarvasarvajñatā punaḥ //
analyzed: artha atiśaya pakṣe ca sarva sarvajña tā punar

original: bhaṭṭapakṣāt viśeṣaś ca na kaścit kathito bhavet /
analyzed: bhaṭṭa pakṣāt viśeṣaḥ ca na kaścid kathitaḥ bhavet

original: nobhayātiśayo 'py eṣaḥ doṣadvitayasambhavāt //
analyzed: na ubhaya atiśayaḥ pi eṣaḥ doṣa dvitaya sambhavāt

original: saṃvedanaṃ ca tat kena grāhyaṃ jñānānumāpakam /
analyzed: saṃvedanam ca tat kena grāhyam jñāna anumāpakam

original: anavasthā bhaved asya jñāne saṃvedanāntarāt //
analyzed: anavasthā bhavet asya jñāne saṃvedana antarāt

original: svasaṃvedyā ca saṃvittiḥ upariṣṭān niṣetsyate /
analyzed: sva saṃvedyā ca saṃvittiḥ upariṣṭāt niṣetsyate

original: smṛtipramoṣavāde ca rajatasmaraṇātmikā //
analyzed: smṛti pramoṣa vāde ca rajata smaraṇa ātmikā

original: kathaṃ te phalasaṃvittiḥ svaprakāśā bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: katham te phala saṃvittiḥ sva prakāśā bhaviṣyati

original: nābhāti smṛtirūpeṇa na cāpy anubhavātmanā //
analyzed: na ābhāti smṛti rūpeṇa na ca api anubhava ātmanā

original: na tṛtīyaḥ prakāro 'sti tat kathaṃ sā prakāśatām /
analyzed: na tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ sti tat katham sā prakāśatām

original: na ca kvacid anākārā saṃvittir anubhūyate //
analyzed: na ca kvacid an ākārā saṃvittiḥ anubhūyate

original: iyaṃ saṃvidayaṃ cārtha iti nāsti hi bhedadhīḥ /
analyzed: iyam saṃvid ayam ca arthaḥ iti nā asti hi bheda dhīḥ

original: arthākārānuraktā tu yadi saṃvit prakāśate //
analyzed: artha ākāra anuraktā tu yadi saṃvid prakāśate

original: bāhyārthanihnavas tarhi tvayā saugatavat kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: bāhya artha nihnavaḥ tarhi tvayā saugata vat kṛtaḥ

original: svaprakāśamate yuktaṃ na phalaṃ saṃvidātmakam //
analyzed: sva prakāśa mate yuktam na phalam saṃvid ātmakam

original: tasmāt phalānumeyasya vyāpārasya na mānatā //
analyzed: tasmāt phala anumeyasya vyāpārasya na māna tā

original: yad api pramāṇaviśeṣaṇam anadhigatārthagrāhitvam abhidhīyate paraiḥ tad api na sāṃpratam pramāṇasya gṛhītataditaraviṣayapravṛttasya prāmāṇye viśeṣābhāvāt //
analyzed: yat api pramāṇa viśeṣaṇam anadhigata artha grāhi tvam abhidhīyate paraiḥ tat api na sāṃpratam pramāṇasya gṛhīta tad itara viṣaya pravṛttasya prāmāṇye viśeṣa abhāvāt

original: nanu gṛhītaviṣaye pravṛttaṃ pramāṇaṃ kiṃ kuryāt agṛhīte 'pi kiṃ kuryāt pramāṇam iti cet gṛhīte 'pi tām eva vidhattām /
analyzed: nanu gṛhīta viṣaye pravṛttam pramāṇam kim kuryāt agṛhīte kim kuryāt pramāṇam iti ced gṛhīte pi tām eva vidhattām

original: kṛtāyāṃ karaṇāyogād iti cet na pramāntarakaranāt /
analyzed: kṛtāyām karaṇa ayogāt iti ced na pramā antara karanāt

original: pramāntarakarane kiṃ phalam iti cet pramāntarakaraṇam eva phalam na ca phalasya phalaṃ mṛgyam /
analyzed: pramā antara karane kim phalam iti ced pramā antara karaṇam eva phalam na ca phalasya phalam mṛgyam

original: na ca prayojanānuvarti pramāṇaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: na ca prayojana anuvarti pramāṇam bhavati

original: kasya caiṣa paryanuyogaḥ na pramānasya acetanatvāt /
analyzed: kasya ca eṣa paryanuyogaḥ na pramānasya acetana tvāt

original: puṃsas tu sannihite viṣaye karaṇe ca saṃbhavanti jñānānīti so 'pi kim anuyojyatām kim akṣiṇī nimīlya nāste kasmāt dṛṣṭaṃ viṣayaṃ paśyasīti pramāṇasya tu na kiñcid vādhaṃ paśyāmaḥ yena tadapramāṇam iti vyavasthāpayāmaḥ /
analyzed: puṃsaḥ tu sannihite viṣaye karaṇe ca saṃbhavanti jñānāni iti saḥ u pi kim anuyojyatām kim akṣiṇī nimīlya na āste kasmāt dṛṣṭam viṣayam paśyasi iti pramāṇasya tu na kiñcid vādham paśyāmaḥ yena tat apramāṇam iti vyavasthāpayāmaḥ

original: na ca sarvātmanā vaiphalyaṃ heye ahikaṇṭakavṛkamakaraviṣadharādau viṣaye punaḥpunar upalabhyamāne manaśantāpāt satvaraṃ tadapahānāya pravṛttiḥ upādeye 'pi candanaghanasārahāram amahilādau paridṛśyamāne prītyatiśayaḥ svasaṃvedya eva bhavati //
analyzed: na ca sarva ātmanā vaiphalyam heye ahi kaṇṭaka vṛka makara viṣadhara ādau viṣaye punar punar upalabhyamāne manaḥ śantāpāt satvaram tad apahānāya pravṛttiḥ upādeye pi candana ghanasāra hāram a mahilā ādau paridṛśyamāne prīti atiśayaḥ sva saṃvedyaḥ eva bhavati

original: yac cedam ucyate yatrāpi syāt paricchedaḥ pramāṇair uttaraiḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: yat ca idam ucyate yatra api syāt paricchedaḥ pramāṇaiḥ uttaraiḥ punar

original: nūnaṃ tatrāpi pūrveṇa so 'rtho nāvadhṛtas tathā //
analyzed: nūnam tatra api pūrveṇa saḥ rthaḥ na avadhṛtaḥ tathā

original: iti tad api na hṛdayaṅgamam /
analyzed: iti tat api na hṛdayaṅgamam

original: yataḥ naivādhikaparicchedaḥ pramāṇair uttarair dhruvam /
analyzed: yatas na eva adhika paricchedaḥ pramāṇaiḥ uttaraiḥ dhruvam

original: dhārāvāhikabodheṣu ko 'dhiko 'rthaḥ prakāśate //
analyzed: dhārāvāhika bodheṣu kaḥ dhikaḥ rthaḥ prakāśate

original: na hi svahaste 'pi viṣaye pravartamānaṃ pramāṇaṃ kadā viramet na hi tasya viratau kañcid avadhim adhigacchāmaḥ /
analyzed: na hi sva haste viṣaye pravartamānam pramāṇam kadā viramet na hi tasya viratau kañcid avadhim adhigacchāmaḥ

original: pramotpādas tv avadhiranena laṅghita eva ucyate viṣayāntarasamparkād vā śramād vā upāyasaṅkṣayād vā virāmo bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: pramā utpādaḥ tu avadhiḥ anena laṅghitaḥ eva ucyate viṣaya antara samparkāt vā śramāt vā upāya saṅkṣayāt vā virāmaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: anavasthāpi ceyaṃ na mūlaghātinī /
analyzed: anavasthā api ca iyam na mūla ghātinī

original: na hy uttarottaravijñānopajananaṃ vinā prathamajñānotpādo vihanyate //
analyzed: na hi uttara uttara vijñāna upajananam vinā prathama jñāna utpādaḥ vihanyate

original: mūlakṣatikarīm āhur anavasthāṃ hi dūṣaṇam /
analyzed: mūla kṣati karīm āhuḥ anavasthām hi dūṣaṇam

original: mūlasiddhau tv arucyā 'pi nānavasthā nivāryate //
analyzed: mūla siddhau tu arucyā nā anavasthā nivāryate

original: yadi cānupalabdhārthagrāhi mānam upeyate /
analyzed: yadi ca anupalabdha artha grāhi mānam upeyate

original: tad ayaṃ pratyabhijñāyāḥ spaṣṭa eva jalāñjaliḥ //
analyzed: tat ayam pratyabhijñāyāḥ spaṣṭaḥ eva jala añjaliḥ

original: yaś cedānīntanāstitvaprameyādhikyalipsayā /
analyzed: yaḥ ca idānīntana astitva prameya ādhikya lipsayā

original: tayāḥ pramāṇatām āha so 'pi vañcayatīva naḥ //
analyzed: tayāḥ pramāṇatām āha saḥ pi vañcayati iva naḥ

original: āvināśakasadbhāvāt astitvaṃ pūrvayā dhiyā /
analyzed: ā vināśaka sadbhāvāt astitvam pūrvayā dhiyā

original: spaṣṭam eva tathā cāha cirasthāyīti gṛhyate //
analyzed: spaṣṭam eva tathā ca āha cira sthāyī iti gṛhyate

original: tasmād anupalabdhārthagrāhitve tyajyatāṃ grahaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt anupalabdha artha grāhi tve tyajyatām grahaḥ

original: nanv etasmin parityakte prāmāṇyaṃ syāt smṛter api //
analyzed: nanu etasmin parityakte prāmāṇyam syāt smṛteḥ api

original: smṛter apramāṇatvaṃ gṛhītagrāhitākṛtam /
analyzed: smṛteḥ apramāṇa tvam gṛhīta grāhi tā kṛtam

original: api tv anarthajanyatvam tad apramāṇyakāraṇam //
analyzed: api tu anartha janya tvam tat apramāṇya kāraṇam

original: nanu katham anarthajā smṛtiḥ tadārūḍhasya vastunaḥ tadānīm asattvāt /
analyzed: nanu katham anartha jā smṛtiḥ tad ārūḍhasya vastunaḥ tadānīm asattvāt

original: kathaṃ tarhi bhūtavṛṣṭyanumānaṃ nānarthajam tatra dharmiṇo 'numeyatvāt tasya ca jñānajanakasya tatra bhāvāt /
analyzed: katham tarhi bhūta vṛṣṭi anumānam na anartha jam tatra dharmiṇaḥ numeya tvāt tasya ca jñāna janakasya tatra bhāvāt

original: nādyākhya eva dharmī vṛṣṭimad uparitanadeśasaṃsargalakṣaṇena dharmeṇa tadvānanumīyate viśiṣṭasalilapūrayogitvāt /
analyzed: na ādi ākhyaḥ eva dharmī vṛṣṭimat uparitana deśa saṃsarga lakṣaṇena dharmeṇa tadvān anumīyate viśiṣṭa salilapūra yogi tvāt

original: sa cānumānagrāhyo dharmī vidyata eveti nānarthajam anumānam //
analyzed: sa ca anumāna grāhyaḥ dharmī vidyate eva iti na anartha jam anumānam

original: kathaṃ tarhi pratibhaṃ anāgatārthagrāhi [śve me bhrātā ''gantā] iti pratyakṣam arthajam iṣyate bhavadbhiḥ tatra deśāntare vartamānasya bhrātuḥ śvobhāvyāgamanaviśeṣitasyaiva tathaiva grahaṇam tena ca rūpeṇa gṛhyamāṇasya satas tasya jñānajanakatvam iti arthajam eva prātibham /
analyzed: katham tarhi pratibham anāgata artha grāhi śve me bhrātā gantā iti pratyakṣam artha jam iṣyate bhavadbhiḥ tatra deśa antare vartamānasya bhrātuḥ śvobhāvya āgamana viśeṣitasya eva tathā eva grahaṇam tena ca rūpeṇa gṛhyamāṇasya sataḥ tasya jñāna janaka tvam iti artha jam eva prātibham

original: smaraṇaṃ tu nirdagdhapitrādiviśayam anapekṣitārtham eva jāyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam iti anyatra deśāntarasthitārthasmaraṇe tadarthasattvam akāraṇam eva //
analyzed: smaraṇam tu nirdagdha pitṛ ādi viśayam an apekṣita artham eva jāyamānam dṛṣṭam iti anyatra deśa antara sthita artha smaraṇe tad artha sattvam akāraṇam eva

original: tasmād anarthajatvena smṛtiprāmāṇyavāraṇāt /
agṛhītārthagantṛtvaṃ na pramāṇaviśeṣaṇam //
analyzed: agṛhīta artha gantṛ tvam na pramāṇa viśeṣaṇam

original: śabdasyānupalabdhe 'rthe prāmāṇyaṃ cāha jaiminiḥ /
analyzed: śabdasya anupalabdheḥ rthe prāmāṇyam ca āha jaiminiḥ

original: sarvapramāṇaviṣayaṃ bhavadbhir varṇyate katham //
analyzed: sarva pramāṇa viṣayam bhavadbhiḥ varṇyate katham

original: apare punaḥ avisaṃvādakatvaṃ pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇam ācakṣate /
analyzed: apare punar avisaṃvādaka tvam pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇam ācakṣate

original: tad ukram [pramāṇam avisaṃvādi jñānam] iti //
analyzed: tat ukram pramāṇam avisaṃvādi jñānam iti

original: avisaṃvādakatvaṃ ca prāpakatvam ucyate /
analyzed: avisaṃvādaka tvam ca prāpaka tvam ucyate

original: jñānasya prāpakatvaṃ sukhaduḥkhasādhanasamarthapadārthaprāptiparihārahetubhūtāyāḥ pravṛtter nimittapradarśakatvam eva jñānapradarśite hi viṣaye pravṛttau satyāṃ prāptir bhavatīti prāptiṃ prati pramāṇasya pradarśakatvam eva vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: jñānasya prāpaka tvam sukha duḥkha sādhana samartha padārtha prāpti parihāra hetu bhūtāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ nimitta pradarśaka tvam eva jñāna pradarśite hi viṣaye pravṛttau satyām prāptiḥ bhavati iti prāptim prati pramāṇasya pradarśaka tvam eva vyāpāraḥ

original: pradarśayatā hi tena so 'rthaḥ prāpito bhavati yathā hantavyaṃ prati rājñāmājñādānam eva hantṛtvam /
analyzed: pradarśayatā hi tena saḥ rthaḥ prāpitaḥ bhavati yathā hantavyam prati rājñām ājñā dānam eva hantṛ tvam

original: tad uktaṃ [prāpaṇaśaktiḥ prāmāṇyam] iti /
analyzed: tat uktam prāpaṇa śaktiḥ prāmāṇyam iti

original: loke 'pi ca pradaiśitaṃ vastu prāpayataḥ pramāṇatvavyavahāraḥ //
analyzed: loke ca pradaiśitam vastu prāpayataḥ pramāṇa tva vyavahāraḥ

original: tac ca prāpakatvaṃ pratyakṣānumānayor ubhayor apy astīti pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: tat ca prāpaka tvam pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ ubhayoḥ api asti iti pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇam

original: tatra pratyakṣasya vastusvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt tasya ca kṣaṇikatvena prāptyasambhave 'pi tatsantānaprāptreḥ santānādhyavasāyajananam eva prāpakatvam /
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣasya vastu sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tvāt tasya ca kṣaṇika tvena prāpti asambhave tad santāna prāptreḥ santāna adhyavasāya jananam eva prāpaka tvam

original: anumānasya tv āropitārthaviṣayatve 'pi mūlabhūtavastulakṣaṇapāramparyaprabhavatvāt maṇiprabhāmaṇibuddhivat tatprāptyā prāpakatvam /
analyzed: anumānasya tu āropita artha viṣaya tve pi mūla bhūta vastu lakṣaṇa pāramparya prabhava tvāt maṇi prabhā maṇi buddhi vat tad prāptyā prāpaka tvam

original: tad idam adhyavasitaprāpakatvaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ adhyavasitasyāvastutve 'pi tanmūlavastuprāptyā nirvahati yathā 'dhyavasitaprāpakaṃ ca pramāṇam iti matam /
analyzed: tat idam adhyavasita prāpaka tvam prāmāṇyam adhyavasitasya avastu tve tat mūla vastu prāptyā nirvahati yathā dhyavasita prāpakam ca pramāṇam iti matam

original: ataś ca pītaśaṅkhādigrāhiṇāṃ śaṅkhādimātraprāptau satyām api na prāmāṇyam yathā 'dhyavasitasyāprāptaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca pīta śaṅkha ādi grāhiṇām śaṅkha ādi mātra prāptau satyām api na prāmāṇyam yathā dhyavasitasya aprāptaḥ

original: avagato hi pītaś śaṅkhaḥ prāpyate ca śveta iti /
analyzed: avagataḥ hi pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ prāpyate ca śvetaḥ iti

original: tasmād yathā 'vagatārthaprāpakatvaṃ avisaṃvādakatvaṃ prāmāṇyam iti //
analyzed: tasmāt yathā vagata artha prāpaka tvam avisaṃvādaka tvam prāmāṇyam iti

original: tad etad anupapannam idam eva tāvad bhavān vyācaṣṭām kiṃ pradarśitaprāpakaṃ pramāṇam utādhyavasitaprāpakam tatrānumāne pradarśanam eva nāsti kā kathā tatprāpaṇasya pratyakṣe tu bāḍhaṃ pradarśanam asti na tu pradarśitaṃ prāpyate kṣaṇikatvenātikrāntatvāt //
analyzed: tat etat anupapannam idam eva tāvat bhavān vyācaṣṭām kim pradarśita prāpakam pramāṇam uta adhyavasita prāpakam tatra anumāne pradarśanam eva na asti kā kathā tad prāpaṇasya pratyakṣe tu bāḍham pradarśanam asti na tu pradarśitam prāpyate kṣaṇika tvena atikrānta tvāt

original: adhyavasitaprāpakatvam api durghaṭam /
analyzed: adhyavasita prāpaka tvam api durghaṭam

original: adhyavasāyasya bhavanmate vastuviṣayatvābhāvāt avastunaś ca prāptum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: adhyavasāyasya bhavat mate vastu viṣaya tva abhāvāt avastunaḥ ca prāptum aśakya tvāt

original: tad uktaṃ bhavadbhiḥ [yathā 'dhyavasāyamatattvatvāt yathātattvaṃ cānadhyavasāyāt] iti //
analyzed: tat uktam bhavadbhiḥ yathā dhyavasāyam atattva tvāt yathātattvam ca anadhyavasāyāt iti

original: mūlabhūtavastuprāptis tu kākatālīyam /
analyzed: mūla bhūta vastu prāptiḥ tu kākatālīyam

original: na tu tadanyatareṇāpi pramāṇenāpi spṛṣṭam yad gatvā prāpyate //
analyzed: na tu tad anyatareṇa api pramāṇena api spṛṣṭam yat gatvā prāpyate

original: santānaprāptyā tatprāptir ity api na yuktam santānasya bhedābhedavikalpābhyām anupapannatvāt /
analyzed: santāna prāptyā tad prāptiḥ iti api na yuktam santānasya bheda abheda vikalpābhyām anupapanna tvāt

original: etac ca savistaraṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge nirūpayiṣyate //
analyzed: etat ca sa vistaram kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge nirūpayiṣyate

original: nanu kālpanike 'pi santāne sati saṃvṛttyā pramāṇalakṣaṇam idaṃ nirvakṣyate yathoktaṃ [sāṃvyavahārikasyaitatpramāṇasya lakṣaṇam vastutas tv anādyavidyāvāsanā ''ropitagrāhyagrāhakādibhedaprapañcaṃ jñānamātram evedam iti kiṃ prāpyate ko vā prāpayati] iti //
analyzed: nanu kālpanike santāne sati saṃvṛttyā pramāṇa lakṣaṇam idam nirvakṣyate yathā uktam sāṃvyavahārikasya etat pramāṇasya lakṣaṇam vastutas tu anādya vidyā vāsanā ropita grāhya grāhaka ādi bheda prapañcam jñāna mātram eva idam iti kim prāpyate kaḥ vā prāpayati iti

original: so 'yaṃ palāyanaprakāra iva prastūyate keyaṃ saṃvṛtir nāma sā 'pi satī asatī veti vikalpyamānā naiva vyavahārahetur bhavati //
analyzed: saḥ yam palāyana prakāraḥ iva prastūyate kā iyam saṃvṛtiḥ nāma sā pi satī asatī vā iti vikalpyamānā nā eva vyavahāra hetuḥ bhavati

original: avidyāvāsanākṛtaś ca na bhedavyavahāraḥ kintu pāramārthika eveti sādhayiṣyate //
analyzed: avidyā vāsanā kṛtaḥ ca na bheda vyavahāraḥ kintu pāramārthikaḥ evā iti sādhayiṣyate

original: sāṃvṛtasantānakalpanāyāṃ vā jātyavayaviprabhṛtayo 'pi sāṃvṛtāḥ kim iti neṣyante vṛttivikalpādibādhakopahatatvād iti cet santāne 'pi samānaḥ panthā iti kadāśālambanam etat /
analyzed: sāṃvṛta santāna kalpanāyām vā jāti avayavi prabhṛtayaḥ api sāṃvṛtāḥ kim iti na iṣyante vṛtti vikalpa ādi bādhaka upahata tvāt iti ced santāne pi samānaḥ panthāḥ iti kadāśā ālambanam etat

original: tasmād asambhavi darśitaprāpakatvam ity alakṣaṇam etat //
analyzed: tasmāt asambhavi darśita prāpaka tvam iti alakṣaṇam etat

original: avyāpakaṃ cedaṃ lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: avyāpakam ca idam lakṣaṇam

original: upekṣaṇīyaviṣayabodhasyāvyabhicārādiviśeṣaṇayogena labdhapramāṇabhāvasyāpy anenāsaṅgrahāt //
analyzed: upekṣaṇīya viṣaya bodhasya avyabhicāra ādi viśeṣaṇa yogena labdha pramāṇa bhāvasya api anena asaṅgrahāt

original: nanu ko 'yam upekṣaṇīyo nāma viṣayaḥ sa hy apekṣanīyatvād eva nopādīyate cet sa tarhi heya eva anupādeyatvād iti naitadyuktam upekṣaṇīyaviṣayasya svasaṃvedyatvenāpratyākhyeyatvāt //
analyzed: nanu kaḥ yam upekṣaṇīyaḥ nāma viṣayaḥ sa hi apekṣanīya tvāt eva na upādīyate ced sa tarhi heyaḥ eva anupādeya tvāt iti na etat yuktam upekṣaṇīya viṣayasya sva saṃvedya tvena apratyākhyeya tvāt

original: heyopādeyayor asti duḥkhaprītinimittatā /
analyzed: heya upādeyayoḥ asti duḥkha prīti nimitta tā

original: yatnena hānopādāne bhavatas tatra dehinām /
analyzed: yatnena hāna upādāne bhavataḥ tatra dehinām

original: tābhyāṃ visadṛśaṃ vastu svasaṃviditam asti naḥ //
analyzed: tābhyām visadṛśam vastu sva saṃviditam asti naḥ

original: upādeye ca viṣaye dṛṣṭe rāgāḥ pravartate /
analyzed: upādeye ca viṣaye dṛṣṭe rāgāḥ pravartate

original: itaratra tu vidveṣaḥ tatrobhāv api durlabhau //
analyzed: itaratra tu vidveṣaḥ tatra ubhau api durlabhau

original: yat tu anupādeyatvāt heya eveti tad aprayojakam /
analyzed: yat tu anupādeya tvāt heyaḥ eva iti tat aprayojakam

original: na hy evaṃ bhavati yad etann apuṃsakaṃ sa pumān astrītvāt strī vā napuṃsakaṃ apuṃstvād iti /
analyzed: na hi evam bhavati yat etat apuṃsakam sa pumān a strī tvāt strī vā napuṃsakam a pum tvāt iti

original: strīpuṃbhyām anyad eva napuṃsakaṃ tathopalambhāt /
analyzed: strī puṃbhyām anyat eva napuṃsakam tathā upalambhāt

original: evam upekṣaṇīyo 'pi viṣayo heyopādeyābhyām arthāntaraṃ tathopalambhād iti //
analyzed: evam viṣayaḥ heya upādeyābhyām artha antaram tathā upalambhāt iti

original: yad etat tṛṇaparṇādi cakāsti pathi gacchataḥ /
analyzed: yat etat tṛṇa parṇa ādi cakāsti pathi gacchataḥ

original: na dhīś chatrādivat tatra na ca kākodarādivat //
analyzed: na dhīḥ chatra ādi vat tatra na ca kākodara ādi vat

original: tasmād upekṣaṇīyajñānasya tam aprāpayato 'pi prāmāṇyadarśanāt na prāpakatvaṃ tallakṣaṇam //
analyzed: tasmāt upekṣaṇīya jñānasya tam a prāpayataḥ pi prāmāṇya darśanāt na prāpaka tvam tad lakṣaṇam

original: nanu yāvān pramāṇasya vyāpāraḥ prāpaṇaṃ prati /
analyzed: nanu yāvān pramāṇasya vyāpāraḥ prāpaṇam prati

original: tāvān upekṣaṇīye 'pi viṣaye tena sādhitaḥ //
analyzed: tāvān upekṣaṇīye pi viṣaye tena sādhitaḥ

original: uktaṃ hi rājñām ādeṣṭṛtvam eva hantṛtvaṃ pradarśakatvam eva jñānasya prāpakatvam iti maivam evaṃ pradarśakatvaṃ syāt kevalaṃ tasya lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: uktam hi rājñām ādeṣṭṛ tvam eva hantṛ tvam pradarśaka tvam eva jñānasya prāpaka tvam iti mā evam evam pradarśaka tvam syāt kevalam tasya lakṣaṇam

original: tac ca pracaladarkāṃśujalajñāne 'pi dṛśyate //
analyzed: tat ca pracalat arka aṃśu jala jñāne dṛśyate

original: nanu tatra viparītādhyāsāyajananād aprāmāṇyam /
analyzed: nanu tatra aprāmāṇyam

original: darśanaṃ hi marīcisvalakṣaṇaviṣayam eva salilādhyavasāyaṃ tu janayad apramaṇībhavati /
analyzed: darśanam hi marīci sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam eva salila adhyavasāyam tu janayat a pramaṇībhavati

original: tathā hy ekam eva darśanaṃ anukūletaravikalpopajananatadanutpādabhedāt tridhā kathyate pramāṇaṃ apramāṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca na bhavatīti /
analyzed: tathā hi ekam eva darśanam anukūla itara vikalpa upajanana tad anutpāda bhedāt tridhā kathyate pramāṇam apramāṇam pramāṇam ca na bhavati iti

original: nīlajñānaṃ hi nīlaṃ prati pramāṇam nīlam idam ity anukūlavikalpopajananāt /
analyzed: nīla jñānam hi nīlam prati pramāṇam nīlam idam iti anukūla vikalpa upajananāt

original: nīlāvyatireki kṣaṇikatvam api tena gṛhītam eva /
analyzed: nīla avyatireki kṣaṇikatvam api tena gṛhītam eva

original: tatra tu pramāṇaṃ na bhavati anukūletaravikalpānutpādāt /
analyzed: tatra tu pramāṇam na bhavati anukūla itara vikalpa anutpādāt

original: sthairye tu tadapramāṇaṃ viparītādhyavasāyakaluṣitatvād iti //
analyzed: sthairye tu tat apramāṇam viparīta adhyavasāya kaluṣita tvāt iti

original: yady evam asmin prakrame sutarām idaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ duśtham santānādhyavasāyaḥ prāpaṇaṃ prati prāṇasya vyāpāra iti ca varṇitavān asi /
analyzed: yadi evam asmin prakrame sutarām idam pramāṇa lakṣaṇam duśtham santāna adhyavasāyaḥ prāpaṇam prati prāṇasya vyāpāraḥ iti ca varṇitavān asi

original: ataś ca yathā marīcisvalakṣaṇadarśanam udakādhyavasāyajananād apramāṇam evaṃ svalakṣaṇadarśanam api tadviparītasantānādhyavasāyajananād apramāṇī bhaved iti /
analyzed: atas ca yathā marīci sva lakṣaṇa darśanam udaka adhyavasāya jananāt apramāṇam evam sva lakṣaṇa darśanam api tad viparīta santāna adhyavasāya jananāt apramāṇī bhavet iti

original: santāne ca kalpanike vyavasite dṛśyābhimukhaḥ kim iti pravartate dṛśyavikalpyāv arthāv ekīkṛtya pravartate yadi vā /
analyzed: santāne ca kalpanike vyavasite dṛśya abhimukhaḥ kim iti pravartate dṛśya vikalpyau arthau ekīkṛtya pravartate yadi vā

original: avivekāt prāptiḥ syāt pramāṇam api dūratas tasyāḥ //
analyzed: avivekāt prāptiḥ syāt pramāṇam api dūratas tasyāḥ

original: tasmān na prāpakaṃ pramāṇam //
analyzed: tasmāt na prāpakam pramāṇam

original: api ca prāptyaprāptī puruṣecchāmātrahetuke bhavataḥ /
analyzed: api ca prāpti aprāptī puruṣa icchā mātra hetuke bhavataḥ

original: arthapratītir eva pramāṇakāryā 'vadhāryate tasmāt //
analyzed: artha pratītiḥ eva pramāṇa kāryā avadhāryate tasmāt

original: mānasya lakṣaṇamataḥ kathayadbhis tadviśeṣaṇaṃ vācyam /
analyzed: mānasya lakṣaṇam atas kathayadbhiḥ tat viśeṣaṇam vācyam

original: sāṅkhyās tu buddhivṛttiḥ pramāṇaṃ iti pratipannāḥ /
analyzed: sāṅkhyāḥ tu buddhi vṛttiḥ pramāṇam iti pratipannāḥ

original: viṣayākārapariṇatendriyādivṛttyanupātinī buddhir eva puruṣam uparañjayantī pramāṇam /
analyzed: viṣaya ākāra pariṇata indriya ādi vṛtti anupātinī buddhiḥ eva puruṣam uparañjayantī pramāṇam

original: taduparakto hi puruṣaḥ pratiniyataviṣayadraṣṭā saṃpadyate //
analyzed: tad uparaktaḥ hi puruṣaḥ pratiniyata viṣaya draṣṭā saṃpadyate

original: tad etad ahṛdayaṅgamam yo hi jānāti budhyate adhyavasyati na tasya tatphalam arthadarśanaṃ acetanatvān mahataḥ /
analyzed: tat etat a hṛdayaṅgamam yaḥ hi jānāti budhyate adhyavasyati na tasya tad phalam artha darśanam acetana tvāt mahataḥ

original: yasya cārthadarśanaṃ na sa jānāti na budhyate nādhyavasyati iti bhinnādhikaraṇatvaṃ pramāṇaphalayoḥ /
analyzed: yasya ca artha darśanam na sa jānāti na budhyate na adhyavasyati iti bhinna adhikaraṇa tvam pramāṇa phalayoḥ

original: jñānādidharmayogaḥ pramāṇaṃ puṃsi na vidyate tatphalam arthadarśanaṃ buddhau nāstīti //
analyzed: jñāna ādi dharma yogaḥ pramāṇam puṃsi na vidyate tad phalam artha darśanam buddhau na asti iti

original: atha svacchatayā puṃso buddhivṛttyanupātinaḥ /
analyzed: atha svaccha tayā puṃsaḥ buddhi vṛtti anupātinaḥ

original: buddher vā cetanākārasaṃsparśa iva lakṣyate //
analyzed: buddheḥ vā cetanā ākāra saṃsparśaḥ iva lakṣyate

original: evaṃ sati svavācaiva mithyātvaṃ kathitaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: evam sati sva vācā eva mithyātvam kathitam bhavet

original: ciddharmo hi mṛṣā buddhau buddhidharmaś citau mṛṣā //
analyzed: cit dharmaḥ hi mṛṣā buddhau buddhi dharmaḥ citau mṛṣā

original: sākārajñānavādāc ca nātīvaiṣa viśiṣyate /
analyzed: sa ākāra jñāna vādāt ca na atīva eṣa viśiṣyate

original: tvatpakṣa ity ato 'muṣya tannniṣedhān niṣedhanam //
analyzed: tvad pakṣaḥ iti atas muṣya tad niṣedhāt niṣedhanam

original: nirasiṣyate ca sakalaḥ kapilamuniprakriyāprapañco 'yam /
analyzed: nirasiṣyate ca sakalaḥ kapila muni prakriyā prapañcaḥ yam

original: tasmān na tanmate 'pi pramāṇam avakalpate kiñcit //
analyzed: tasmāt na tad mate pi pramāṇam avakalpate kiñcid

original: tīrthāntarābhihitarūpam ataḥ pramāṇaṃ naivāpavādarahitaṃ pratitarkayāmaḥ /
analyzed: tīrtha antara abhihita rūpam atas pramāṇam na eva apavāda rahitam pratitarkayāmaḥ

original: tenāmalapratisādhanam indriyādisākalyam eva niravadyam uśanti mānam //
analyzed: tena amala pratisādhanam indriya ādi sākalyam eva niravadyam uśanti mānam

original: tac caturvidhaṃ pramāṇam /
analyzed: tat caturvidham pramāṇam

original: tad āha sūtrakāraḥ pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdāḥ pramāṇāni //
analyzed: tat āha sūtrakāraḥ pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabdāḥ pramāṇāni

original: iha hi bhedavataḥ prathamasūtroddiṣṭasya trayaṃ vaktavyaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāgaḥ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca /
analyzed: iha hi bhedavataḥ prathama sūtra uddiṣṭasya trayam vaktavyam sāmānya lakṣaṇam vibhāgaḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇam ca

original: tatra viśeṣalakṣaṇapratipādakāni catvāri sūtrāṇi bhaviṣyanti [indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam] ityādīni /
analyzed: tatra viśeṣa lakṣaṇa pratipādakāni catvāri sūtrāṇi bhaviṣyanti indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam ityādīni

original: iha tu vibhāgasāmānyalakṣaṇe pratipādyete //
analyzed: iha tu vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇe pratipādyete

original: ekenānena sūtreṇa dvayaṃ cāha mahāmuniḥ /
analyzed: ekena anena sūtreṇa dvayam ca āha mahā muniḥ

original: pramāṇeṣu catuśaṅkhyaṃ tathā sāmānyalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: pramāṇeṣu catur śaṅkhyam tathā sāmānya lakṣaṇam

original: pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdasannidhāne pramāṇaśrutir uccarantī catvāry eva pramāṇānīti darśayati /
analyzed: pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabda sannidhāne pramāṇa śrutiḥ uccarantī catvāri eva pramāṇāni iti darśayati

original: nanu na [catvāri pramāṇāni] iti saṅkhyāvacanaḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate nāpi pratyakṣādiny evety avadhāraṇaśrutir asti /
analyzed: nanu na catvāri pramāṇāni iti saṅkhyā vacanaḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate na api pratyakṣa ādinī eva iti avadhāraṇa śrutiḥ asti

original: tatkuta iyattāniyamāvagamaḥ śabdaśaktisvabhāvād iti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: tat kutas iyat tā niyama avagamaḥ śabda śakti svabhāvāt iti brūmaḥ

original: gargān bhojaya yajñadattadevadattāv ānaya iti vinā saṅkhyāśabdam ekavāraṃ ca bhavaty eva dvitvādiniyamāvagamaḥ /
analyzed: gargān bhojaya yajñadatta devadattau ānaya iti vinā saṅkhyā śabdam eka vāram ca bhavati eva dvi tva ādi niyama avagamaḥ

original: evam ihāpi [pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdāḥ pramāṇāni] ity ukte sāmarthyāt nyūnādhikasaṅkhyāvyavacchedo 'vadhāryate ity evaṃ tāvat vibhāgāvagamaḥ //
analyzed: evam iha api pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabdāḥ pramāṇāni iti ukte sāmarthyāt nyūna adhika saṅkhyā vyavacchedaḥ vadhāryate iti evam tāvat vibhāga avagamaḥ

original: sāmānyalakṣaṇan tu pramāṇapadād eva samākhyānirvacanasāmarthyasahitād avagamyate //
analyzed: sāmānya lakṣaṇam tu pramāṇa padāt eva samākhyā nirvacana sāmarthya sahitāt avagamyate

original: pramīyate yena tat pramāṇam iti karaṇārthābhidhāyinaḥ pramāṇaśabdāt pramākaraṇaṃ pramāṇam ity avagamyate /
analyzed: pramīyate yena tat pramāṇam iti karaṇa artha abhidhāyinaḥ pramāṇa śabdāt pramā karaṇam pramāṇam iti avagamyate

original: tac ca prāg eva darśitam //
analyzed: tat ca prāk eva darśitam

original: [prasiddhasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanam upamānam] iti ca madhye sādhyasādhanagrahaṇam upādadānaḥ sūtrakāraḥ sarvapramāṇasādhāraṇaṃ rūpam idaṃ paribhāṣate yatsādhyasādhanasya pramākaraṇasya pramāṇatvam iti //
analyzed: prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam iti ca madhye sādhya sādhana grahaṇam upādadānaḥ sūtra kāraḥ sarva pramāṇa sādhāraṇam rūpam idam paribhāṣate yat sādhya sādhanasya pramā karaṇasya pramāṇa tvam iti

original: aśuddhapramitividhāyinas tu prāmāṇyaṃ prasajyata iti smṛtisaṃśayaviparyayajanakavyavacchedāya pratyakṣasūtrāt arthotpannam iti avyabhicārīti vyavasāyātmakam iti ca padatrayam ākṛṣyate tad dhi pramāṇacaruṣṭayasādhāraṇam /
analyzed: aśuddha pramiti vidhāyinaḥ tu prāmāṇyam prasajyate iti smṛti saṃśaya viparyaya janaka vyavacchedāya pratyakṣa sūtrāt artha utpannam iti avyabhicāri iti vyavasāya ātmakam iti ca pada trayam ākṛṣyate tat hi pramāṇa caruṣṭaya sādhāraṇam

original: arthotpannapadena phalaviśeṣaṇena smṛtijanakam avyabhicāripadena viparyayādhāyi vyavasāyātmakapadena saṃśayajanakaṃ pramāṇaṃ vyudasyate //
analyzed: artha utpanna padena phala viśeṣaṇena smṛti janakam avyabhicāri padena viparyaya ādhāyi vyavasāya ātmaka padena saṃśaya janakam pramāṇam vyudasyate

original: ataś caivam uktaṃ bhavati arthaviṣayam asandigdhaṃ avyabhicāri ca jñānaṃ yena janyate tat pramāṇaṃ ity evam ekasmād eva sūtrāt sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāgaś cāvagamyate //
analyzed: atas ca evam uktam bhavati artha viṣayam asandigdham avyabhicāri ca jñānam yena janyate tat pramāṇam iti evam ekasmāt eva sūtrāt sāmānya lakṣaṇam vibhāgaḥ ca avagamyate

original: nanu ekasya sūtrasya vibhāgasāmānyalakṣaṇaparatvena vākyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ekasya sūtrasya vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇa para tvena vākya bhedaḥ

original: arthaiktvāc caikaṃ vākyaṃ yuktam ucyate śrutyarthadvārakānekavastusūcanaśāliṣu /
analyzed: artha eka tvāt ca ekam vākyam yuktam ucyate śruti artha dvārakā aneka vastu sūcana śāliṣu

original: sūtreṣv anekārthavidheḥ vākyabhedo na dūṣaṇam //
analyzed: sūtreṣu aneka artha vidheḥ vākya bhedaḥ na dūṣaṇam

original: pramāṇāntarasaṃsparśaśūnye śabdaikagocare /
analyzed: pramāṇa antara saṃsparśa śūnye śabda eka gocare

original: prameye vākyabhedādidūṣaṇaṃ kila dūṣaṇam /
analyzed: prameye vākya bheda ādi dūṣaṇam kila dūṣaṇam

original: arthadvayavidhānaṃ hi tatraikasya na yujyate //
analyzed: artha dvaya vidhānam hi tatra ekasya na yujyate

original: [rājā svārājyakāmo vājapeyena yajeta] iti guṇavidhipakṣe svārājyaṃ prati yāgo vidhātavyaḥ yāgaṃ prati ca vājapeyaguṇo vidhātavyaḥ ity ekasya vākyasya parasparaviruddhavidhyanuvādādirūpāpatteḥ arthadvayavidhānam atidurghaṭam //
analyzed: rājā svārājya kāmaḥ vājapeyena yajeta iti guṇa vidhi pakṣe svārājyam prati yāgaḥ vidhātavyaḥ yāgam prati ca vājapeya guṇaḥ vidhātavyaḥ iti ekasya vākyasya paraspara viruddha vidhi anuvāda ādi rūpa āpatteḥ artha dvaya vidhānam ati durghaṭam

original: iha punaḥ pramāṇāntarapariniścitārthasūcanacāturyamahārgheṣu sūtreṣu nānārthavidhānaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ bhavati na dūṣaṇam /
analyzed: iha punar pramāṇa antara pariniścita artha sūcana cāturya mahārgheṣu sūtreṣu nānā artha vidhānam bhūṣaṇam bhavati na dūṣaṇam

original: anekārthasūcanād eva sūtram ucyate /
analyzed: aneka artha sūcanāt eva sūtram ucyate

original: etad eva sūtrakārāṇāṃ paraṃ kauśalaṃ yat ekenaiva vākyena svalpair evākṣaraiḥ anekavastusamarpaṇam /
analyzed: etat eva sūtrakārāṇām param kauśalam yat ekena eva vākyena su alpaiḥ eva akṣaraiḥ aneka vastu samarpaṇam

original: adhyāhāreṇa vā tantreṇa vā āvṛttyā vā tam arthaṃ pratyāyayiṣyati sūtram idam iti na doṣaḥ //
analyzed: adhyāhāreṇa vā tantreṇa vā āvṛttyā vā tam artham pratyāyayiṣyati sūtram idam iti na doṣaḥ

original: vibhāgasāmānyalakṣaṇayor vidhāne paurvāparyaniyamo viśeṣalakṣaṇavan nāstīti tantreṇa yugapad ubhayābhidhānam api na viruddhyate /
analyzed: vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇayoḥ vidhāne paurvāparya niyamaḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇa vat na asti iti tantreṇa yugapad ubhaya abhidhānam api na viruddhyate

original: viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ anukte sāmānyalakṣaṇe vaktum ayuktam iti tatraiṣa niyamaḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣa lakṣaṇam anukte sāmānya lakṣaṇe vaktum ayuktam iti tatra eṣa niyamaḥ

original: sāmānyalakṣaṇavibhāgayos tu yathāruci pratipādanam ādau vibhāgaḥ tataḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇam ādau vā sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tato vibhāgaḥ /
analyzed: sāmānya lakṣaṇa vibhāgayoḥ tu yathāruci pratipādanam ādau vibhāgaḥ tatas sāmānya lakṣaṇam ādau vā sāmānya lakṣaṇam tatas vibhāgaḥ

original: siddhāntacchelavad ubhayaṃ vā yugapad eva pratipādyate iti tantreṇa āvṛttyā vā tadupapādane na kaścid doṣa iti //
analyzed: ubhayam vā yugapad eva pratipādyate iti tantreṇa āvṛttyā vā tad upapādane na kaścid doṣaḥ iti

original: āstāṃ tāvad idaṃ sūtre tantrāvṛttyādicintanam /
analyzed: āstām tāvat idam sūtre tantra āvṛtti ādi cintanam

original: catuśaṅkhyā pramāṇeṣu nanu na kṣamyate paraiḥ //
analyzed: catur śaṅkhyā pramāṇeṣu nanu na kṣamyate paraiḥ

original: nyūnādhikasaṅkhyāpratiṣedhena hi catvāri pramāṇāni pratiṣṭhāpyeran sa ca durupapādaḥ /
analyzed: nyūnādhika saṅkhyā pratiṣedhena hi catvāri pramāṇāni pratiṣṭhāpyeran sa ca durupapādaḥ

original: tathā hi pratyakṣam evaikaṃ pramāṇam iti cārvākāḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi pratyakṣam eva ekam pramāṇam iti cārvākāḥ

original: pratyakṣānumāne dve eveti bauddhāḥ /
analyzed: pratyakṣa anumāne dve eva iti bauddhāḥ

original: pratyakṣam anumānam āptavacanaṃ ceti trīṇi pramāṇānīti sāṅkhyāḥ /
analyzed: pratyakṣam anumānam āpta vacanam ca iti trīṇi pramāṇāni iti sāṅkhyāḥ

original: ādhikyam api pramāṇāṇīti vibhāganiyamaḥ ucyate anumānaprāmāṇyaṃ varṇayantaḥ bārhaspatyaṃ tāvat upariṣṭāt pratikṣepsyāmaḥ /
analyzed: ādhikyam api pramāṇāṇi iti vibhāga niyamaḥ ucyate anumāna prāmāṇyam varṇayantaḥ bārhaspatyam tāvat upariṣṭāt pratikṣepsyāmaḥ

original: śabdasya cānumānavailakṣaṇyaṃ tallakṣaṇāvasa eva vakṣyata iti śākyapatho 'pi na yuktaḥ //
analyzed: śabdasya ca anumāna vailakṣaṇyam tad lakṣaṇā vasaḥ eva vakṣyate iti śākyapathaḥ pi na yuktaḥ

original: nanv etat bhikṣavo na kṣamante te hi prameyadvaividhyāt pramāṇaṃ dvividhaṃ jaguḥ /
analyzed: nanu etat bhikṣavaḥ na kṣamante te hi prameya dvaividhyāt pramāṇam dvividham jaguḥ

original: nānyaḥ pramāṇabhedasya hetur viṣayabhedataḥ //
analyzed: na anyaḥ pramāṇa bhedasya hetuḥ viṣaya bhedataḥ

original: viṣayaś ca pratyakṣaparokṣabhedena svalakṣaṇasāmānyabhedena vā dvividha eva /
analyzed: viṣayaḥ ca pratyakṣa parokṣa bhedena sva lakṣaṇa sāmānya bhedena vā dvividhaḥ eva

original: parasparaparihāravyavasthitātmasu padārtheṣu tṛtīyarāśyanupraveśābhāvāt //
analyzed: paraspara parihāra vyavasthita ātmasu padārtheṣu tṛtīya rāśi anupraveśa abhāvāt

original: tṛtīyaviṣayāsattvapariccheda eva kutastya iti cet pratyakṣamahimna eveti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: tṛtīya viṣaya asattva paricchedaḥ eva kutastyaḥ iti ced pratyakṣa mahimnaḥ evā iti brūmaḥ

original: nīle pravartamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nīlaṃ nīlatayā paricchinattīti tāvad avivāda eva /
analyzed: nīle pravartamānam pratyakṣam nīlam nīla tayā paricchinatti iti tāvat avivādaḥ eva

original: tad eva pratyakṣam anīlam api vyavacchinatti nīlasaṃvidi tasyāpratibhāsāt /
analyzed: tat eva pratyakṣam anīlam api vyavacchinatti nīla saṃvidi tasya apratibhāsāt

original: nīlajñānapratibhāsyaṃ hi nīlam iti taditarad anīlam eva bhavati //
analyzed: nīla jñāna pratibhāsyam hi nīlam iti tat itarat a nīlam eva bhavati

original: tṛtīyam api rāśiṃ ata eva tad apākaroti /
analyzed: tṛtīyam api rāśim atas eva tat apākaroti

original: so 'pi hi rāśiḥ nīlasaṃvidi bhāti na vā bhāti cen nīlam eva syāt na prakārāntaraṃ tu tat /
analyzed: saḥ pi hi rāśiḥ nīla saṃvidi bhāti na vā bhāti ced nīlam eva syāt na prakāra antaram tu tat

original: no cet tathā 'py anīlaṃ syāt na prakārāntaraṃ hi tat //
analyzed: no ced tathā pi anīlam syāt na prakāra antaram hi tat

original: idam eva hi nīlānīlayor lakṣaṇam yat nīlajñānāvabhāsyatvānavabhāsyatve nāma //
analyzed: idam eva hi nīla anīlayoḥ lakṣaṇam yat nīla jñāna avabhāsya tva anavabhāsya tve nāma

original: evaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ svaviṣaye pravṛttaṃ taṃ pratyakṣatayā vyavasthāpayati tatrāpratibhāsamānaṃ parokṣatayā tṛtīyam api prakāraṃ pūrvavad eva pratikṣipatīti //
analyzed: evam ca pratyakṣam sva viṣaye pravṛttam tam pratyakṣa tayā vyavasthāpayati tatra apratibhāsamānam parokṣa tayā tṛtīyam api prakāram pūrvavat eva pratikṣipati iti

original: evaṃ svalakṣaṇasāmānyavyatiriktaviṣayaniṣedhe 'py eṣa eva mārgo 'nugantavyaḥ /
analyzed: evam sva lakṣaṇa sāmānya vyatirikta viṣaya niṣedhe pi eṣaḥ eva mārgaḥ nugantavyaḥ

original: evaṃ hi pratyakṣeṇa svaviṣayaḥ pariniścito bhavati /
analyzed: evam hi pratyakṣeṇa sva viṣayaḥ pariniścitaḥ bhavati

original: tad uktaṃ [tat paricchinatti anyat vyavacchinatti tṛtīyaprakārābhāvaṃ ca sūcayatīty ekapramāṇavyāpāraḥ] iti //
analyzed: tat uktam tat paricchinatti anyat vyavacchinatti tṛtīya prakāra abhāvam ca sūcayati iti eka pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ iti

original: anyathā viṣayasyaiva svarūpāpariniścayāt /
analyzed: anyathā viṣayasya eva svarūpa apariniścayāt

original: kvopādānaparityāgau kuryur arthakriyārthinaḥ //
analyzed: kva upādāna parityāgau kuryuḥ artha kriyā arthinaḥ

original: tad uktam [analārthyanalaṃ paśyann api na tiṣṭhen na pratiṣṭheta] iti //
analyzed: tat uktam anala arthī analam paśyan api na tiṣṭhet na pratiṣṭheta iti

original: yady api nirvikalpakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ puro 'vasthitavastusvalakṣaṇapradarśanamātraniṣṭhitavyāpāraṃ avicārakam eva tathāpi tatpṛṣṭhabhāvināṃ vikalpānām eva ca darśanaviṣaye kṛtapariccheda taditaraviṣayavyavacchedatṛtīyaprakārābhāvavyavasthāpanaparyantavyāpārapāṭavam avagantavyam itarathā vyavahārābhāvāt //
analyzed: yadi api nirvikalpakam pratyakṣam puras vasthita vastu sva lakṣaṇa pradarśana mātra niṣṭhita vyāpāram avicārakam eva tathā api tad pṛṣṭha bhāvinām vikalpānām eva ca darśana viṣaye kṛta pariccheda tad itara viṣaya vyavaccheda tṛtīya prakāra abhāva vyavasthāpana paryanta vyāpāra pāṭavam avagantavyam itarathā vyavahāra abhāvāt

original: evaṃ ca parasparaparihāravyavasthitasvarūpapadārthavyavacchedipratyakṣaprabhāvāvagatavirodhitvāt pratyakṣetaraviṣayayoḥ tṛtīyaviṣayāsattvapariniścaye 'numānam api pravartitum utsahate viruddhayor ekataraparicchedasamaye dvitīyanirasanam avaśyaṃ bhāti viruddhatvād eva śītoṣṇavat /
analyzed: evam ca paraspara parihāra vyavasthita sva rūpa padārtha vyavacchedi pratyakṣa prabhāva avagata virodhi tvāt pratyakṣa itara viṣayayoḥ tṛtīya viṣaya asattva pariniścaye numānam api pravartitum utsahate viruddhayoḥ ekatara pariccheda samaye dvitīya nirasanam avaśyam bhāti viruddha tvāt eva śīta uṣṇa vat

original: tṛtīyaviṣayo 'pi tadviruddha eva tadvṛddhāv apratibhāsamānatvāt //
analyzed: tṛtīya viṣayaḥ api tad viruddhaḥ eva tad vṛddhau apratibhāsamāna tvāt

original: nanu na tvaṃ dvitīyam iva tṛtīyaṃ kadācid api viṣayam agrahīḥ grahaṇe hi viṣayadvayavat tasyāpi sattvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: nanu na tvam dvitīyam iva tṛtīyam kadācid api viṣayam agrahīḥ grahaṇe hi viṣaya dvaya vat tasya api sattvam syāt

original: agṛhītasya ca virodham avirodhaṃ vā kathaṃ niścetum arhasīti //
analyzed: agṛhītasya ca virodham avirodham vā katham niścetum arhasi iti

original: bhoḥ sādho nātra pṛthak grahaṇam upayujyate tadbuddhyanavabhāsamātreṇaiva tadvirodhasiddheḥ /
analyzed: bhoḥ sādho na atra pṛthak grahaṇam upayujyate tad buddhi anavabhāsa mātreṇa eva tad virodha siddheḥ

original: viruddhaṃ hi tad ucyate yat tasmin gṛhyamāṇe na gṛhyate /
analyzed: viruddham hi tat ucyate yat tasmin gṛhyamāṇe na gṛhyate

original: tad idam agrahaṇam eva virodhāv aham iti na pṛthaggrahaṇam anveṣaṇīyam //
analyzed: tat idam agrahaṇam eva virodhau aham iti na pṛthak grahaṇam anveṣaṇīyam

original: evaṃ itaretaraparihāravyavasthitānām arthānāṃ na tṛtīyo rāśir astīti sarvathā siddhaṃ viṣayadvaividhyam //
analyzed: evam itaretara parihāra vyavasthitānām arthānām na tṛtīyaḥ rāśiḥ asti iti sarvathā siddham viṣaya dvaividhyam

original: evam eva sadasannityānityakramayaugapadyādiṣu prakārāntaraparākaraṇam avagantavyam //
analyzed: evam eva sat asat nitya anitya krama yaugapadya ādiṣu prakāra antara parākaraṇam avagantavyam

original: tatra pratyakṣe svalakṣaṇātmani viṣaye pratyakṣaṃ pravartate parokṣe tu sāmānyākāre 'numānam iti pramāṇadvayasiddhe ca viṣayadvayavedane /
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣe sva lakṣaṇa ātmani viṣaye pratyakṣam pravartate parokṣe tu sāmānya ākāre numānam iti pramāṇa dvaya siddhe ca viṣaya dvaya vedane

original: vada kasyānurodhena tṛtīyaṃ mānam iṣyatām //
analyzed: vada kasya anurodhena tṛtīyam mānam iṣyatām

original: na cāsminn eva parokṣe sāmānyātmani viṣaye 'numānam iva śabdādy api pramāṇāntaraṃ pravartate iti vaktuṃ yuktam ekasmin viṣaye virodhaviphalatvābhyāṃ anekapramāṇapravṛttyanupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca asmin eva parokṣe sāmānya ātmani viṣaye numānam iva śabda ādi api pramāṇa antaram pravartate iti vaktum yuktam ekasmin viṣaye virodha viphala tvābhyām aneka pramāṇa pravṛtti anupapatteḥ

original: pūrvapramāṇāvagatarūpayogitayā tasmin vastuni punaḥ paricchidyamāne pramāṇam uttaram aphalam eva syāt /
analyzed: pūrva pramāṇa avagata rūpa yogitayā tasmin vastuni punar paricchidyamāne pramāṇam uttaram aphalam eva syāt

original: evaṃ hy āhuḥ [adhigatam artham adhigamayatā pramāṇena piṣṭaṃ piṣtaṃ syāt] iti /
analyzed: evam hi āhuḥ adhigatam artham adhigamayatā pramāṇena piṣṭam piṣtam syāt iti

original: anyarūpatayā tu tadgrahaṇaṃ uttarapramāṇena duśśakam ādyapramāṇaviruddhatvād iti //
analyzed: anya rūpa tayā tu tad grahaṇam uttara pramāṇena duśśakam ādya pramāṇa viruddha tvāt iti

original: ata eva na saṃplavam abhyupagacchanti nītividaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva na saṃplavam abhyupagacchanti nīti vidaḥ

original: ekasmin viṣaye anekapramāṇapravṛttiḥ saṃplavaḥ /
analyzed: ekasmin viṣaye aneka pramāṇa pravṛttiḥ saṃplavaḥ

original: sa ca tathāvidhaviṣayanirāsād eva nirastaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca tathāvidha viṣaya nirāsāt eva nirastaḥ

original: na ca pratyakṣānumāne parasparam api saṃplavete svalakṣaṇe 'numānasya sāmānye pratyakṣasya ca pravṛttyabhāvāt //
analyzed: na ca pratyakṣa anumāne parasparam api saṃplavete sva lakṣaṇe numānasya sāmānye pratyakṣasya ca pravṛtti abhāvāt

original: sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣam anumānaṃ svalakṣaṇe /
analyzed: sambandha grahaṇa apekṣam anumānam sva lakṣaṇe

original: sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛtte vartatāṃ katham //
analyzed: sajātīya vijātīya vyāvṛtte vartatām katham

original: pratyakṣam api sadvastusaṃsparśaniyatavratam /
analyzed: pratyakṣam api sat vastu saṃsparśa niyata vratam

original: vikalpāropitākārasāmānyagrāhakaṃ katham //
analyzed: vikalpa āropita ākāra sāmānya grāhakam katham

original: yac ca śabdopamānādi pramāṇāntaram iṣyate /
analyzed: yat ca śabda upamāna ādi pramāṇa antaram iṣyate

original: tad evaṃ sati kutrāṃśe pratiṣṭhām adhigacchatu //
analyzed: tat evam sati kutra aṃśe pratiṣṭhām adhigacchatu

original: vastu svalakṣaṇaṃ tāvat pratyakṣeṇaiva mudritam /
analyzed: vastu sva lakṣaṇam tāvat pratyakṣeṇa eva mudritam

original: tato 'nyadanumānena sambandhāpekṣavṛttitā //
analyzed: tatas sambandha apekṣa vṛtti tā

original: nānāpramāṇagamyaś ca viṣayo nāsti vāstavaḥ /
analyzed: nānā pramāṇa gamyaḥ ca viṣayaḥ nā asti vāstavaḥ

original: tadvānavayavī jātir iti vārtaikabhadrikā //
yadi ca pratyakṣaviṣaye śabdānumānayor api vṛttir iṣyate tarhi pratyakṣasaṃvitsadṛśīm eva te api buddhiṃ vidadhātām na caivam asti /
analyzed: yadi ca pratyakṣa viṣaye śabda anumānayoḥ api vṛttiḥ iṣyate tarhi pratyakṣa saṃvid sadṛśīm eva te api buddhim vidadhātām na ca evam asti

original: tad āhuḥ samānaviṣayatve ca jāyate sadṛśī matiḥ /
analyzed: tat āhuḥ samāna viṣaya tve ca jāyate sadṛśī matiḥ

original: na cādhyakṣadhiyā sāmyaṃ eti śabdānumānadhīḥ //
analyzed: na ca adhyakṣa dhiyā sāmyam eti śabda anumāna dhīḥ

original: tejo 'nyad eva nakṣatraśaśāṅkaśakalādiṣu /
analyzed: tejaḥ nyat eva nakṣatra śaśāṅka śakala ādiṣu

original: uddhāṭitajagatkośam anyad eva raver mahaḥ //
analyzed: uddhāṭita jagat kośam anyat eva raveḥ mahaḥ

original: āha ca anyad evendriyagrāhyam anyaḥ śabdasya gocaraḥ /
analyzed: āha ca anyat eva indriya grāhyam anyaḥ śabdasya gocaraḥ

original: śabdāt pratyeti bhinnākṣe na tu pratyakṣam ikṣate //
analyzed: śabdāt pratyeti bhinna akṣe na tu pratyakṣam ikṣate

original: api ca anyathaivāgnisambandhāt dāhaṃ dagdho 'bhimanyate /
analyzed: api ca anyathā eva agni sambandhāt dāham dagdhaḥ bhimanyate

original: anyathā dāhaśabdena dāhārthaḥ saṃpratīyate //
analyzed: anyathā dāha śabdena dāha arthaḥ saṃpratīyate

original: tasmād uktena vartmanā viṣayadvaividhyaniścayāt na tṛtīyaṃ pramāṇam asti na ca samplava iti //
analyzed: tasmāt uktena vartmanā viṣaya dvaividhya niścayāt na tṛtīyam pramāṇam asti na ca samplavaḥ iti

original: atrābhidhīyate yat tāvad idam ākhyāyi rāśyantaranirākṛtau /
analyzed: atra abhidhīyate yat tāvat idam ākhyāyi rāśi antara nirākṛtau

original: pratyakṣasyaiva sāmarthyaṃ ity etan nopapadyate //
analyzed: pratyakṣasya eva sāmarthyam iti etat na upapadyate

original: pūrvāparānusandhānasāmarthyarahitātmanā /
analyzed: pūrva apara anusandhāna sāmarthya rahita ātmanā

original: bhāraḥ katham ayaṃ voḍhuṃ avikalpena pāryate //
analyzed: bhāraḥ katham ayam voḍhum avikalpena pāryate

original: vikalpāḥ punar utprekṣāmātraniṣṭhitaśaktayaḥ /
analyzed: vikalpāḥ punar utprekṣā mātra niṣṭhita śaktayaḥ

original: tebhyo vastuvyavasthāyāḥ kā kathā bhavatāṃ mate //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ vastu vyavasthāyāḥ kā kathā bhavatām mate

original: atha vā bhavatu nāma nīlādav uktena prakāreṇa rāśyantaranirākaraṇam /
analyzed: atha vā bhavatu nāma uktena prakāreṇa rāśi antara nirākaraṇam

original: pratyakṣaparokṣabhāvanirṇayeta naiṣa prakāra yojayituṃ śakyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣa parokṣa bhāva nirṇayā ita na eṣa prakāra yojayitum śakyate

original: viṣaye hi pravṛttaṃ pratyakṣaṃ viṣayasvarūpam eva paricchinatti na punas tasya pratyakṣatām api /
analyzed: viṣaye hi pravṛttam pratyakṣam viṣaya svarūpam eva paricchinatti na punar tasya pratyakṣa tām api

original: nīlam idam iti hi saṃvedyate na punaḥ pratyakṣam idam iti /
analyzed: nīlam idam iti hi saṃvedyate na punar pratyakṣam idam iti

original: tathā hi kim idaṃ viṣayasya pratyakṣatvaṃ nāma kim askṣaviṣayatvam uta akṣajajñānaviṣayatvam iti tatrākṣaviṣayatvaṃ tāvad anvayavyatirekasamadhigamyam eva na pratyakṣagamyam /
analyzed: tathā hi kim idam viṣayasya pratyakṣa tvam nāma kim akṣa ja jñāna viṣaya tvam iti tatra akṣa viṣaya tvam tāvat anvaya vyatireka samadhigamyam eva na pratyakṣa gamyam

original: tathā ''ha bhaṭṭaḥ [na hi śrāvaṇatā nāma pratyakseṇāvagamyate /
analyzed: tathā ha bhaṭṭaḥ na hi śrāvaṇa tā nāma pratyakseṇa avagamyate

original: sā 'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ jñāyate badhirādiṣu] iti //
analyzed: sā nvaya vyatirekābhyām jñāyate badhira ādiṣu iti

original: akṣajajñānakarmatvam api pratyakṣatvaṃ tadānīṃ paricchettum aśakyam eva viṣayapratibhāsakāle tatpratibhāsyāpratibhāsāt /
analyzed: akṣa ja jñāna karma tvam api pratyakṣa tvam tadānīm paricchettum aśakyam eva viṣaya pratibhāsa kāle tad pratibhāsya apratibhāsāt

original: tadgrahaṇam antareṇa ca tatkarmatāgrahaṇāsaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: tad grahaṇam antareṇa ca tad karmatā grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt

original: kathaṃ punar viṣayagrahaṇakāle tatpratibhāsasyāpratibhāsaḥ naiva yugapad ākāradvitayaṃ pratibhāsate idaṃ jñānaṃ ayaṃ cārthaḥ iti bhedānupagrahāt /
analyzed: katham punar viṣaya grahaṇa kāle tad pratibhāsasya apratibhāsaḥ na eva yugapad ākāra dvitayam pratibhāsate idam jñānam ayam ca arthaḥ iti bheda anupagrahāt

original: ekaś cāyam ākāraḥ pratibhāsyamānaḥ grāhyasyaiva bhavitum arhati na grāhakasyeti vakṣyate //
analyzed: ekaḥ ca ayam ākāraḥ pratibhāsyamānaḥ grāhyasya eva bhavitum arhati na grāhakasya iti vakṣyate

original: nanu ca nāgṛhītaṃ jñānam arthaprakāśanakuśalaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: nanu ca na agṛhītam jñānam artha prakāśana kuśalam bhavati

original: āhuḥ [apratyakṣopalaṃbhasya nārthadṛṣṭiḥ prasiddhyati] iti /
analyzed: āhuḥ apratyakṣa upalaṃbhasya na artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasiddhyati iti

original: tad ayuktam /
analyzed: tat ayuktam

original: apratyaksopalaṃbhasyaivārthadṛṣṭiḥ prasiddhyati /
analyzed: apratyak sa upalaṃbhasya eva artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasiddhi ati

original: pratyakṣopalambhasya tu nārtadṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: pratyakṣa upalambhasya tu na ārta dṛṣṭiḥ

original: upalambha eva pratyakṣa iti dvitīyākārānavabhāsāt kuto 'rthadṛṣṭiḥ yadi ca gṛhītaṃ jñānaṃ arthaṃ prakāśayet na dvayīṃ gatim ativarteta /
analyzed: upalambhaḥ eva pratyakṣaḥ iti dvitīya ākāra anavabhāsāt kutas rtha dṛṣṭiḥ yadi ca gṛhītam jñānam artham prakāśayet na dvayīm gatim ativarteta

original: tad dhi jñānaṃ jñānāntaragrāhyaṃ vā bhavet svaprakāśaṃ vā /
analyzed: tat hi jñānam jñāna antara grāhyam vā bhavet sva prakāśam vā

original: jñānāntaragrāhyatve tv anavasthā mūlakṣatikarī ceyam ity andhamūkaṃ jagat syāt upalambhapratyakṣatāpūrvakārthapratyakṣavādinaḥ /
analyzed: jñāna antara grāhya tve tu anavasthā mūla kṣati karī ca iyam iti andha mūkam jagat syāt upalambha pratyakṣa tā pūrvaka artha pratyakṣa vādinaḥ

original: nāpi svaprakāśaṃ jñānaṃ jñeyatvāt nīlapītādivat /
analyzed: nā api svaprakāśam jñānam jñeya tvāt nīla pīta ādi vat

original: vistaratas tu svaprakāśaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānavādinirākaraṇe nirākariṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: vistarataḥ tu svaprakāśam vijñānam vijñāna vādi nirākaraṇe nirākariṣyāmaḥ

original: na ca jñānasyāpratyakṣatāyāṃ tadutpādānutpādayor aviśeṣāt ajñatvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ vā pariśaṅkanīyam vijñānotpādamātreṇa jñātuḥ jñātṛtvasiddheḥ /
analyzed: na ca jñānasya apratyakṣa tāyām tad utpāda anutpādayoḥ aviśeṣāt ajña tvam sarvajña tvam vā pariśaṅkanīyam vijñāna utpāda mātreṇa jñātuḥ jñātṛ tva siddheḥ

original: viṣayaprakāśanasvabhāvam eva jñānam utpadyata iti katham utpannam anutpannān na viśiṣyate yathā ca nīlādiviṣayajñānotpattyā asya jñātṛtvaṃ tathā sukhādiviṣayajñānotpattyā bhoktṛtvam iti tatrāpi nātiprasaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: viṣaya prakāśana svabhāvam eva jñānam utpadyate iti katham utpannam anutpannāt na viśiṣyate yathā ca nīla ādi viṣaya jñāna utpattyā asya jñātṛ tvam tathā sukha ādi viṣaya jñāna utpattyā bhoktṛ tvam iti tatra api na atiprasaṅgaḥ

original: tasmāt viṣayavijñānakāle tadvijñānāgrahaṇāt na tatkarmatvakṛtaṃ viṣayapratyakṣatvam avabhāsate tadapratibhāse ca na parokṣavyavacchedaḥ na ca tṛtīyaprakārāsattvasūcanam iti kathaṃ pratyakṣaṃ viṣayadvitvasiddhau pramāṇam yac cānumānam apy uktaṃ viṣayadvayasiddhaye /
analyzed: tasmāt viṣaya vijñāna kāle tad vijñāna agrahaṇāt na tad karma tva kṛtam viṣaya pratyakṣa tvam avabhāsate tad apratibhāse ca na parokṣa vyavacchedaḥ na ca tṛtīya prakāra asattva sūcanam iti katham pratyakṣam viṣaya dvi tva siddhau pramāṇam yat ca anumānam api uktam viṣaya dvaya siddhaye

original: tat pratyakṣaparicchinnatadvirodhanibandhanam //
virodhabodhasāmarthyaṃ pratyakṣasya ca dūṣitam /
analyzed: virodha bodha sāmarthyam pratyakṣasya ca dūṣitam

original: tadagrahe ca tanmūlam anumānaṃ na siddhyati //
analyzed: tad agrahe ca tad mūlam anumānam na siddhi ati

original: evañ ca viṣayadvitvasādhanānupapattitaḥ /
analyzed: evam ca viṣaya dvi tva sādhana anupapattitaḥ

original: tatkṛtas tyajyatām eṣa pramāṇadvitvadohadaḥ //
analyzed: tad kṛtaḥ tyajyatām eṣa pramāṇa dvi tva dohadaḥ

original: atha vā saty api viṣayadvaividhye sāmagrībhedāt phalabhedāc ca pramāṇabhedo bhavan katham apākriyate anye eva hi sāmagrīphale pratyakṣaliṅgayoḥ /
analyzed: atha vā sati api viṣaya dvaividhye sāmagrī bhedāt phala bhedāt ca pramāṇa bhedaḥ bhavan katham apākriyate anye eva hi sāmagrī phale pratyakṣa liṅgayoḥ

original: anye eva ca sāmagrīphale śabdopamānayoḥ //
analyzed: anye eva ca sāmagrī phale śabda upamānayoḥ

original: iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: tena tadbhedād api pramāṇabhedasiddheḥ na dve eva pramāṇe //
analyzed: tena tad bhedāt api pramāṇa bheda siddheḥ na dve eva pramāṇe

original: etena trīṇi pramāṇāṇīti sāṅkhyākhyātā 'pi tatsaṅkhyā pratyākhyātā sāmagrīphalabhedena upamānasya caturthapramāṇasya pratipādayiṣyamāṇatvāt //
analyzed: etena trīṇi pramāṇāṇi iti sāṅkhya ākhyātā tad saṅkhyā pratyākhyātā sāmagrī phala bhedena upamānasya caturtha pramāṇasya pratipādayiṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: yat punaḥ ekasmin viṣaye anekapramāṇaprasaraṃ nirasyatā saugatena saṃplavaparākaraṇamakāri tad api matimohavilasitam asati saṃplave anumānaprāmāṇyapratiṣṭhāpanānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: yat punar ekasmin viṣaye aneka pramāṇa prasaram nirasyatā saugatena saṃplava parākaraṇam akāri tat api mati moha vilasitam asati saṃplave anumāna prāmāṇya pratiṣṭhāpana anupapatteḥ

original: na hy avijñātasambandhaṃ liṅgaṃ gamakam iṣyate /
analyzed: na hi avijñāta sambandham liṅgam gamakam iṣyate

original: sambandhadhīś ca sambandhidvayāvagatipūrvikā //
analyzed: sambandha dhīḥ ca sambandhi dvaya avagati pūrvikā

original: sāmānyātmakasambandhigrahaṇaṃ cānumānataḥ /
analyzed: sāmānya ātmaka sambandhi grahaṇam ca anumānataḥ

original: tasmād eva yad īṣyeta vyaktam anyonyasaṃśrayam //
analyzed: tasmāt eva yat vyaktam anyonya saṃśrayam

original: anumānāntarādhīnā sambandhigrahapūrvikā /
sambandhādhigatir na syāt manvantaraśatair api //
analyzed: sambandha adhigatiḥ na syāt manvantara śataiḥ api

original: tena dūre 'pi sambandhagrāhakaṃ liṅgaliṅginoḥ /
analyzed: tena dūre sambandha grāhakam liṅga liṅginoḥ

original: pratyakṣam upagantavyaṃ tathā ca sati saṃplavaḥ //
analyzed: pratyakṣam upagantavyam tathā ca sati saṃplavaḥ

original: tatraitat syāt aviditasaugatakṛtāntānām etac codyam /
analyzed: tatra etat syāt avidita saugata kṛtāntānām etat codyam

original: te hi vikalpaviṣaye vṛttim āhuḥ śabdānumānayoḥ /
analyzed: te hi vikalpa viṣaye vṛttim āhuḥ śabda anumānayoḥ

original: tebhyaḥ saṃbandhasiddhau ca nānavasthā na saṃplavaḥ //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ saṃbandha siddhau ca nā anavasthā na saṃplavaḥ

original: tathā hi darśanasamantarotpattyavāptadarśanacchāyā 'nurajyamānavapuṣo vikalpāḥ pratyakṣāyante /
analyzed: tathā hi darśana samantara utpatti avāpta darśana chāyāḥ nurajyamāna vapuṣaḥ vikalpāḥ pratyakṣāyante

original: tadullikhitakālpanikataditaraparāvṛttasvabhāvasāmānyākārapratiṣṭo 'yam anumānavyvahāraḥ pāramparyeṇa maṇiprabhāmaṇibuddhivat tanmūla iti tatprāptaye 'vakalpate na punaḥ pratyakṣaikasamadhigamyaṃ vastu spṛśatīti kutaḥ saṃplava kuto vā 'navasthā tad etad vañcanāmātram /
analyzed: tad ullikhita kālpanika tad itara parāvṛtta svabhāva sāmānya ākāra pratiṣṭaḥ yam anumāna vyvahāraḥ pāramparyeṇa maṇi prabhā maṇi buddhi vat tad mūlaḥ iti tad prāptaye na punar pratyakṣa eka samadhigamyam vastu spṛśati iti kutas saṃplava kutas vā navasthā tat etat vañcanā mātram

original: yo hi tādātmyatadutpattisvabhāva pratibandha iṣyate sa kiṃ vastudharmaḥ vikalpāropitākāradharmo vā tatra nāyam āropitadharmo bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: yaḥ hi tādātmya tad utpatti svabhāva pratibandhaḥ iṣyate sa kim vastu dharmaḥ vikalpa āropita ākāra dharmaḥ vā tatra na ayam āropita dharmaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: vastu vastunā janyate vastu ca vastumvabhāvaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: vastu vastunā janyate vastu ca bhavet

original: tasmād vastudharmaḥ pratibandhaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt vastu dharmaḥ pratibandhaḥ

original: vikalpaiś ca vastu na spṛśyate tatpratibandhaś ca niścīyata iti citram //
analyzed: vikalpaiḥ ca vastu na spṛśyate tad pratibandhaḥ ca niścīyate iti citram

original: idaṃ ca subhāṣitam vastunoḥ pratibandhaḥ tādātmyādiḥ gamyagamakatvaṃ ca vikalpāropitayor apohayoḥ tad evaṃ anyatra pratibandhaḥ anyatra tadgrahaṇopāyaḥ anyatra pratītiḥ anyatra pravṛttiprāptī iti sarvaṃ ketavam /
analyzed: idam ca subhāṣitam vastunoḥ pratibandhaḥ tādātmya ādiḥ gamya gamaka tvam ca vikalpa āropitayoḥ apohayoḥ tat evam anyatra pratibandhaḥ anyatra tad grahaṇa upāyaḥ anyatra pratītiḥ anyatra pravṛtti prāptī iti sarvam ketavam

original: na ca dṛśyasaṃsparśaśūnyātmanāṃ vikalpānāṃ darśanacchāyā kācana saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na ca dṛśya saṃsparśa śūnya ātmanām vikalpānām darśana chāyā kācana saṃbhavati

original: idantāgrāhitvasaṃspaṣṭatvādy api vastusaṃsparśarahitam akiñcitkaram apramāṇatvānapāyāt //
apramāṇaparicchinnaḥ pratibandhaś ca tattvataḥ /
analyzed: apramāṇa paricchinnaḥ pratibandhaḥ ca tattvataḥ

original: na paricchinna eveti tato mithyā 'numeyadhīḥ //
analyzed: na paricchinnaḥ evā iti tatas mithyā numeya dhīḥ

original: athābhimatam evedaṃ buddhyārūḍhatvavarṇanāt /
analyzed: atha abhimatam evā idam buddhi ārūḍha tva varṇanāt

original: hanta tāttvikasaṃbandhasādhanavyasanena kim //
analyzed: hanta tāttvika saṃbandha sādhana vyasanena kim

original: yathā ca sāmānyaviṣaye pratyakṣābhyupagamam antareṇa sambandhagrahaṇam aghaṭamānam iti visaṃṣṭhulam anumānaṃ evaṃ avagatasaṃbandhasya dvitīyaliṅgadarśanam api durupapādam iti tato 'pi saṃplavāpalāpinām anumānam utsīdet //
analyzed: yathā ca sāmānya viṣaye pratyakṣa abhyupagamam antareṇa sambandha grahaṇam aghaṭamānam iti visaṃṣṭhulam anumānam evam avagata saṃbandhasya dvitīya liṅga darśanam api durupapādam iti saṃplava apalāpinām anumānam utsīdet

original: na hy asādhāraṇāṃśasya liṅgatvam upapadyate /
analyzed: na hi asādhāraṇa aṃśasya liṅga tvam upapadyate

original: vinā na cānumānena sāmānyam avagamyate //
analyzed: vinā na ca anumānena sāmānyam avagamyate

original: saivānavasthā tatrāpi sa evānyo 'nyasaṃśrayaḥ /
analyzed: sā eva anavasthā tatra api saḥ eva anyaḥ nya saṃśrayaḥ

original: sa eva ca vikalpānāṃ sāmarthyaśamanakramaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ eva ca vikalpānām sāmarthya śamana kramaḥ

original: ataḥ sambandhavijñānaliṅgagrahaṇapūrvakam /
analyzed: atas sambandha vijñāna liṅga grahaṇa pūrvakam

original: anumānam anihatya kathaṃ saṃplavanihnavaḥ //
analyzed: anumānam a nihatya katham saṃplava nihnavaḥ

original: api ca viṣayadvaividhyasiddhāv api pratyakṣānumāne eva parasparam api saṃplaveyātām /
analyzed: api ca viṣaya dvaividhya siddhau api pratyakṣa anumāne eva parasparam api saṃplaveyātām

original: yataḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ parokṣo 'pi pratyakṣo 'pi parokṣatām /
analyzed: yatas pratyakṣa tvam parokṣaḥ pi pratyakṣaḥ pi parokṣa tām

original: deśakālādibhedena viṣayaḥ pratipadyate //
analyzed: deśa kāla ādi bhedena viṣayaḥ pratipadyate

original: kṣaṇabhaṅgaṃ niṣetsyāmaḥ santāno yaś ca kalpitaḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇa bhaṅgam niṣetsyāmaḥ santānaḥ yaḥ ca kalpitaḥ

original: darśitaprāptisiddhyādau saṃplave 'pi sa tādṛśaḥ //
analyzed: darśita prāpti siddhi ādau saṃplave pi sa tādṛśaḥ

original: yad api jātyādiviṣayaniṣedhamanorathaiḥ saṃplavaparākaraṇamadhyavasitaṃ tatra jātyādisamarthanam evottarīkariṣyati /
analyzed: yat api jāti ādi viṣaya niṣedha manorathaiḥ saṃplava parākaraṇam adhyavasitam tatra jāti ādi samarthanam evā uttarīkariṣyati

original: tāvakair dūṣaṇagaṇaiḥ kāluṣyam apanīyate /
analyzed: tāvakaiḥ dūṣaṇa gaṇaiḥ kāluṣyam apanīyate

original: tadvānavayavī jātir iti vārtaiva bhadrikā //
analyzed: tadvān avayavī jātiḥ iti vārttā eva bhadrikā

original: yad api virodhavaiphalyābhyāṃ na saṃplava ity uktaṃ tatra vaiphalyaṃ anadhigatārthagantṛtvaviśeṣaṇanivāraṇenaiva pratisamāhitam /
analyzed: yat api virodha vaiphalyābhyām na saṃplavaḥ iti uktam tatra vaiphalyam anadhigata artha gantṛ tva viśeṣaṇa nivāraṇena eva pratisamāhitam

original: virodho 'pi nāsti pūrvajñānopamardena [nedaṃ rajatam] itivat uttaravijñānānutpādāt /
analyzed: virodhaḥ pi nā asti pūrva jñāna upamardena na idam rajatam iti vat uttara vijñāna anutpādāt

original: anekadharmavisaraviśeṣitavapiṣi dharmiṇi kadācit kenacit kaścin niścīyate dharmaviśeṣa iti ko virodhārthaḥ yad api pratyakṣasya śabdaliṅgayoś ca samānaviṣayatve sati sadṛśapratītijanakatvam āśaṅgitam tatra kecid ācakṣate viṣayasāmye 'py upāyabhedāt pratītibhedo bhavaty eva dūrāvidūradeśavyavasthitapadārthapratītivat //
analyzed: aneka dharma visara viśeṣita vapiṣi dharmiṇi kadācid kenacid kaścid niścīyate dharma viśeṣaḥ iti kaḥ virodha arthaḥ yat api pratyakṣasya śabda liṅgayoḥ ca samāna viṣaya tve sati sadṛśa pratīti janaka tvam āśaṅgitam tatra kecid ācakṣate viṣaya sāmye pi upāya bhedāt pratīti bhedaḥ bhavati eva dūra avidūra deśa vyavasthita padārtha pratīti vat

original: anye tu manyante nopāyabhedāt pratītibhedo bhavati api tu viṣayabhedād eva /
analyzed: anye tu manyante na upāya bhedāt pratīti bhedaḥ bhavati api tu viṣaya bhedāt eva

original: sannikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭagrahaṇe 'pi viṣayau bhidyete /
analyzed: sannikṛṣṭa viprakṛṣṭa grahaṇe viṣayau bhidyete

original: dūrāt sāmānyadharmamātraviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇo grahaṇam adūrāt tu sakalatadgataviśeṣasākṣātkaraṇam /
analyzed: dūrāt sāmānya dharma mātra viśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ grahaṇam adūrāt tu sakala tad gata viśeṣa sākṣātkaraṇam

original: tad imāḥ pratyakṣānumānaśabdapramitayaḥ prameyabhedāt bhidyante //
analyzed: tat imāḥ pratyakṣa anumāna śabda pramitayaḥ prameya bhedāt bhidyante

original: viśeṣadharmasaṃbaddhaṃ bastu spṛśati netradhīḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣa dharma saṃbaddham bastu spṛśati netra dhīḥ

original: vyāptibodhānusāreṇa tadvanmātraṃ tu laiṅgikī //
analyzed: vyāpti bodha anusāreṇa tadvat mātram tu laiṅgikī

original: śabdāt tattadavacchinnā vācye sañjāyate matiḥ /
analyzed: śabdāt tad tad avacchinnā vācye sañjāyate matiḥ

original: śabdānuvedhaśūnyā hi na śabdārthe matibhavat //
analyzed: śabda anuvedha śūnyā hi na śabda arthe mati bhavat

original: kathaṃ tarhi teṣāṃ saṃplavaḥ sarvatra viṣayabhedasya darśitatvāt satyam dharmyabhiprāyeṇa saṃplavaḥ kathyate /
analyzed: katham tarhi teṣām saṃplavaḥ sarvatra viṣaya bhedasya darśita tvāt satyam dharmi abhiprāyeṇa saṃplavaḥ kathyate

original: imau tu pakṣau pratyakṣalakṣaṇe vistaraśo vicārayiṣyete /
analyzed: imau tu pakṣau pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe vistaraśaḥ vicārayiṣyete

original: sarvathā tāvad asti pramāṇānāṃ saṃplava iti siddham //
analyzed: sarvathā tāvat asti pramāṇānām saṃplavaḥ iti siddham

original: tad udāharaṇaṃ tu bhāṣyakāraḥ pradarśitavān [agnir āptopadeśāt pratīyate anumtreti pratyāsīdatā dhūmadarśanenānumīyate pratyāsannatareṇa upalabhyate] ityādi //
analyzed: tat udāharaṇam tu bhāṣyakāraḥ pradarśitavān agniḥ āpta upadeśāt pratīyate pratyāsīdatā dhūma darśanena anumīyate pratyāsannatareṇa upalabhyate ityādi

original: kvacit tu vyavasthā dṛśyate yathā [agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ ity asmadāder āgamād eva jñānaṃ na pratyakṣānumānābhyām /
analyzed: kvacid tu vyavasthā dṛśyate yathā agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti asmad ādeḥ āgamāt eva jñānam na pratyakṣa anumānābhyām

original: stanayitnuśabdaśravaṇāt taddhetuparijñānam anumānād eva na pratyakṣāgamābhyām /
analyzed: stanayitnu śabda śravaṇāt tad hetu parijñānam anumānāt eva na pratyakṣa āgamābhyām

original: svahastādau pratyakṣād eva pratītiḥ na śabdānumānābhyām] iti /
analyzed: sva hasta ādau pratyakṣāt eva pratītiḥ na śabda anumānābhyām iti

original: tasmāt sthitam etat prāyeṇa pramāṇāni prameyam abhisaṃplavante kvacit tu prameye vyavatiṣṭhante 'pīti //
analyzed: tasmāt sthitam etat prāyeṇa pramāṇāni prameyam abhisaṃplavante kvacid tu prameye vyavatiṣṭhante

original: ity uddhṛtākhilaparoditadoṣajātasaṃpātabhīttir iha saṃplava eva siddhaḥ /
analyzed: iti uddhṛta akhila para udita doṣa jāta saṃpāta bhīttiḥ iha saṃplavaḥ eva siddhaḥ

original: sarvāś ca saugatamanaśu viraprarūḍhāḥ bhagnāḥ pramāṇaviṣayadvayasiddhivāñchāḥ //
analyzed: sarvāḥ ca bhagnāḥ pramāṇa viṣaya dvaya siddhi vāñchāḥ

original: evaṃ tāvat nyūnatvaṃ saṅkhyāyāḥ parīkṣitam ādhikyam idānīṃ parīkṣyate //
analyzed: evam tāvat nyūna tvam saṅkhyāyāḥ parīkṣitam ādhikyam idānīm parīkṣyate

original: tatra arthāpattyā saha pratyakṣādīni pañca pramāṇānīti prabhākaraḥ //
analyzed: tatra arthāpattyā saha pratyakṣa ādīni pañca pramāṇāni iti prabhākaraḥ

original: abhāvena saha ṣaḍ iti bhāṭṭaḥ //
analyzed: abhāvena saha ṣaṣ iti bhāṭṭaḥ

original: saṃbhavaitihyābhyām aṣṭāv iti kecit //
analyzed: saṃbhava aitihyābhyām aṣṭau iti kecid

original: aśakya eva pramāṇasaṅkhyāniyama iti suśikṣitacārvākāḥ //
analyzed: aśakyaḥ eva pramāṇa saṅkhyā niyamaḥ iti suśikṣita cārvākāḥ

original: tatra bhāṭṭās tāvad ittham arthāpattim ācakṣate dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā 'rtho 'nyathā nopapadyata ity arthāntarakalpanā arthāpattiḥ /
analyzed: tatra bhāṭṭāḥ tāvat ittham arthāpattim ācakṣate dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā rthaḥ nyathā na upapadyate iti artha antara kalpanā arthāpattiḥ

original: dṛṣṭa iti pratyakṣādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ śruta iti kutaś cana laukikād vaidikād vā śabdād avagamo 'rthaḥ tato 'nyathā 'nupapadyamānārthāntarakalpanā 'rthāpattiḥ ity evaṃ ṣaṭpramāṇaprabhavatvena ṣaḍvidhā 'sau bhavatīti //
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ iti pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ śrutaḥ iti kutas cana laukikāt vaidikāt vā śabdāt avagamaḥ rthaḥ tatas nyathā nupapadyamāna artha antara kalpanā rthāpattiḥ iti evam ṣaṣ pramāṇa prabhava tvena ṣaḍvidhā sau bhavati iti

original: dṛṣṭavacanenopalabdhavācinā gatārthatve 'pi śrutārthāpatteḥ pṛthagabhidhānaṃ pramāṇaikadeśaviṣayatvena prameyaviṣayārthāpattipañcakavilakṣaṇatvāt //
analyzed: dṛṣṭa vacanena upalabdha vācinā gatārtha tve pi śruta arthāpatteḥ pṛthak abhidhānam pramāṇa eka deśa viṣaya tvena prameya viṣaya arthāpatti pañcaka vilakṣaṇa tvāt

original: tatra pratyakṣapūrvikā tāvad arthāpattiḥ pratyakṣāvagatadahanasaṃsargodgatadāhākhyakāryānyathā 'nupapattyā vahner dāhaśaktikalpanā //
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣa pūrvikā tāvat arthāpattiḥ pratyakṣa avagata dahana saṃsarga udgata dāha ākhya kārya anyathā nupapattyā vahneḥ dāha śakti kalpanā

original: anumānapūrvikā deśāntaraprāptiliṅgānumitamarīcimāligaty anyathā 'nupapattyā tasya gamanaśaktikalpanā //
analyzed: anumāna pūrvikā anyathā tasya gamana śakti kalpanā

original: upamānapūrvikā upamānajñānāvagatagopiṇḍādisārūpyaviśiṣṭagavayādiprameyā 'nyathā 'nupapattyā tasya tajjñānagrāhyatvaśaktikalpanā iti //
analyzed: upamāna pūrvikā upamāna jñāna avagata go piṇḍa ādi sārūpya viśiṣṭa gavaya ādi prameyā nyathā nupapattyā tasya tad jñāna grāhya tva śakti kalpanā iti

original: tad imās tāvad atīndriyaśaktiviṣayatvād arthāpattayaḥ pramāṇāntaram /
analyzed: tat imāḥ tāvat atīndriya śakti viṣaya tvāt arthāpattayaḥ pramāṇa antaram

original: śakteḥ pratyakṣaparicchedyatvā 'nupapatteḥ tadadhīnapratibandhādhigamavaidhuryeṇānumānaviṣayatvāyogāt //
analyzed: śakteḥ pratyakṣa paricchedya tva anupapatteḥ tad adhīna pratibandha adhigama vaidhuryeṇa anumāna viṣaya tva ayogāt

original: anvayavyatirekau hi dravyarūpānuvartinau /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekau hi dravya rūpa anuvartinau

original: śaktis tu tadgatā sūkṣmā na tābhyām avagamyate //
analyzed: śaktiḥ tu tadgatā sūkṣmā na tābhyām avagamyate

original: śabdopamānayos tu atra saṃbhāvanaiva nāstīti arthāpatter evaiṣa viṣayaḥ //
analyzed: śabda upamānayoḥ tu atra saṃbhāvanā eva na asti iti artha āpatteḥ eva eṣa viṣayaḥ

original: arthāpattipūrvikā yathā śabdakaraṇikārthapratītyanyathā 'nupapattyā śabdasya vācakaśaktim avagatya tadanyathā 'nupapattyā tasya nityatvakalpanā /
analyzed: arthāpatti pūrvikā yathā śabda karaṇikā artha pratīti anyathā nupapattyā śabdasya vācaka śaktim avagatya tad anyathā nupapattyā tasya nitya tva kalpanā

original: sa ceyaṃ śabdaparīkṣāyāṃ vakṣyate //
analyzed: sa ca iyam śabda parīkṣāyām vakṣyate

original: abhāvapūrvikā tu bhāṣyakāreṇodāhṛtā jīvataś caitrasya gṛhābhāvam avasāya tadanyathā 'nupapattyā bahirbhāvakalpanā iti //
analyzed: abhāva pūrvikā tu bhāṣyakāreṇa udāhṛtā jīvataḥ caitrasya gṛha abhāvam avasāya tad anyathā nupapattyā bahirbhāva kalpanā iti

original: nanu dṛṣṭena adṛṣṭasiddher anumānam evedaṃ syāt nānumānaṃ sāmagryabhāvāt /
analyzed: nanu dṛṣṭena adṛṣṭa siddheḥ anumānam eva idam syāt na anumānam sāmagrī abhāvāt

original: pakṣadharmatādisāmagryā yaj jñānam utpadyate tad anumānam iti tārkikasthitaḥ /
analyzed: pakṣa dharma tā ādi sāmagryā yat jñānam utpadyate tat anumānam iti tārkika sthitaḥ

original: sā ceha nāsti /
analyzed: sā ca iha na asti

original: bahirbhāvaviśiṣṭe caitre caitraviśiṣṭe bahirbhāve vā 'numeye kasya liṅgatvam iti cintyam /
analyzed: bahirbhāva viśiṣṭe caitre caitra viśiṣṭe bahirbhāve vā numeye kasya liṅga tvam iti cintyam

original: gṛhābhāvaviśiṣṭasya vā caitrasya caitrābhāvaviśiṣṭasya vā gṛhasya gṛhe caitrābhāvasya vā tatra caitrādarśanasya vā na caiṣām anyatamasyāpi pakṣadharmatvam asti /
analyzed: gṛha abhāva viśiṣṭasya vā caitrasya caitra abhāva viśiṣṭasya vā gṛhasya gṛhe caitra abhāvasya vā tatra caitra adarśanasya vā na ca eṣām anyatamasya api pakṣa dharma tvam asti

original: na hi gṛhaṃ vā caitro vā tadabhāvo vā tadadarśanaṃ vā caitrasya dharmaḥ tadbahirbhāvasya vety apakṣadharmatvād anyatamasyāpi na liṅgitvam //
analyzed: na hi gṛham vā caitraḥ vā tad abhāvaḥ vā tad adarśanam vā caitrasya dharmaḥ tad bahirbhāvasya vā iti apakṣa dharma tvāt anyatamasya api na liṅgi tvam

original: api ca prameyānupraveśaprasaṅgād api nedam anumānam /
analyzed: api ca prameya anupraveśa prasaṅgāt api na idam anumānam

original: tathā hi āgamāvagatajīvanasya gṛhābhāvena caitrasya bahirbhāvaḥ parikalpyate itarathā mṛtenānaikāntiko hetuḥ syāt /
analyzed: tathā hi āgama avagata jīvanasya gṛha abhāvena caitrasya bahirbhāvaḥ parikalpyate itarathā mṛtena anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ syāt

original: abhāvaś ca gṛhītaḥ san bahirbhāvam avagamayati nāgṛhītaḥ dhūmavat /
analyzed: abhāvaḥ ca gṛhītaḥ san bahirbhāvam avagamayati na a gṛhītaḥ dhūma vat

original: abhāvagrahaṇaṃ ca sakalasadupalambhakapramāṇapratyastamayapūrvakam /
analyzed: abhāva grahaṇam ca sakala sat upalambhaka pramāṇa prati astamaya pūrvakam

original: iha tu sadupalambhakam asty eva jīvanagrāhi pramāṇam /
analyzed: iha tu sat upalambhakam asti eva jīvana grāhi pramāṇam

original: jīvanaṃ hi kvacid astitvam ucyate /
analyzed: jīvanam hi kvacid astitvam ucyate

original: apratyastamite tu sadupalambhake pramāṇe katham abhāvaḥ pravarteta iti pravartamāna evāsau sadupalambhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pṛthagviṣayam upasthāpayati vahirasya bhāvaḥ gṛhe tv abhāva iti /
analyzed: apratyastamite tu sat upalambhake pramāṇe katham abhāvaḥ pravarteta iti pravartamānaḥ eva asau sat upalambhakam pramāṇam pṛthak viṣayam upasthāpayati vahis asya bhāvaḥ gṛhe tu abhāvaḥ iti

original: tena jīvato bahirbhāvavyavasthāpanapūrvakagṛhābhāvagrahaṇopapatteḥ prameyānupraveśaḥ //
analyzed: tena jīvataḥ bahirbhāva vyavasthāpana pūrvaka gṛha abhāva grahaṇa upapatteḥ prameya anupraveśaḥ

original: anumāne tu dhūmādiliṅgagrahaṇasamaye na manāg api tadanumeyadahanaliṅgyanupraveśasparśo vidyata iti //
analyzed: anumāne tu dhūma ādi liṅga grahaṇa samaye na manāk api tad anumeya dahana liṅgi anupraveśa sparśaḥ vidyate iti

original: nanu arthāpattāv api kiṃ prameyānupraveśo na doṣaḥ na doṣa iti brūmaḥ pramāṇadvayasamarpitaikavastuviṣayābhāvasamarthanārtham arthāpattiḥ pravartamānā prameyadvayaṃ parāmṛśaty eva anyathā tadghaṭanāyogāt /
analyzed: nanu arthāpattau api kim prameya anupraveśaḥ na doṣaḥ na doṣaḥ iti brūmaḥ pramāṇa dvaya samarpita eka vastu viṣaya abhāva samarthana artham arthāpattiḥ pravartamānā prameya dvayam parāmṛśati eva anyathā tad ghaṭana ayogāt

original: ataś ca yeyam āgamād aniyatadeśatayā kvacid astīti saṃvittir abhūt saiveyaṃ gṛhābhāve gṛhīte bahir astīti saṃvittir adhunā saṃvṛttā /
analyzed: atas ca yā iyam āgamāt aniyata deśa tayā kvacid asti iti saṃvittiḥ abhūt sā eva iyam gṛha abhāve gṛhīte bahis asti iti saṃvittiḥ adhunā saṃvṛttā

original: tad ato vailakṣaṇyāt nānumānam arthāpattiḥ //
analyzed: tat atas vailakṣaṇyāt na anumānam arthāpattiḥ

original: ataś caivaṃ sambandhagrahaṇābhāvāt bhāvābhāvau hi naikena yugapad vahnidhūmavat /
analyzed: atas ca evam sambandha grahaṇa abhāvāt bhāva abhāvau hi na ekena yugapad vahni dhūma vat

original: pratibaddhatayā boddhuṃ śaktyau gṛhabahiḥsthitau //
analyzed: pratibaddha tayā boddhum śaktyau gṛha bahis sthitau

original: anyathā 'nupapattyā ca prathamaṃ pratibandhadhīḥ /
analyzed: anyathā nupapattyā ca prathamam pratibandha dhīḥ

original: paścād yady anumānatvaṃ ucyate kāmam ucyatām //
analyzed: paścāt yadi anumāna tvam ucyate kāmam ucyatām

original: nanv asty eva gṛhadvāre vartinaḥ saṅgatigrahaḥ /
analyzed: nanu asti eva gṛha dvāre vartinaḥ saṅgati grahaḥ

original: bhāvenābhāvasiddhau tu katham eṣa bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: bhāvena abhāva siddhau tu katham eṣa bhaviṣyati

original: yatra gṛhe caitrasya bhāvam avagamya tadanyathā 'nupapattyā tadanyadeśeṣu nāstitvam avagamyate tatra deśānām ānantyāt duradhigamaḥ pratibandhaḥ //
analyzed: yatra gṛhe caitrasya bhāvam avagamya tad anyathā nupapattyā tad anya deśeṣu nāstitvam avagamyate tatra deśānām ānantyāt duradhigamaḥ pratibandhaḥ

original: anagnivyatirekasya niścaye dhūmasya kā vārteti cet ucyate tatra dhūmajvalanayoḥ anvayagrahaṇasaṃbhavāt na vyatirekagrahaṇam adriyeran /
analyzed: anagni vyatirekasya niścaye dhūmasya kā vārttā iti ced ucyate tatra dhūma jvalanayoḥ anvaya grahaṇa saṃbhavāt na vyatireka grahaṇam

original: bhūyodarśanasulabhaniyamajñānasaṃpādyamānasādhyādhigamanirvṛttamanasāṃ kin anagnivyatirekaniścayena iha punar anvayāvasāyasamaya eva gamyadharmasya duravagamatvam uktaṃ anantadeśavṛttitvāt //
analyzed: bhūyas darśana sulabha niyama jñāna saṃpādyamāna sādhya adhigama nirvṛtta manasām kin anagni vyatireka niścayena iha punar anvaya avasāya samaye eva gamya dharmasya duravagama tvam uktam ananta deśa vṛtti tvāt

original: anupalabdhyā tan niścaya iti cet na mandiravyatiriktasakalabhuvanatalagatatadabhāvaniścayasya niyatadeśayā 'nupalabdhyā tadabhāvaṃ niśceṣyāmīti cet maivam gatvā gatvā 'pi tān deśān nāsya jānāmi nāstitām /
analyzed: anupalabdhyā tat niścayaḥ iti ced na mandira vyatirikta sakala bhuvana tala gata tad abhāva niścayasya niyata deśayā nupalabdhyā tad abhāvam niśceṣyāmi iti ced mā evam gatvā gatvā tān deśān na asya jānāmi nāstitām

original: kauśāmbyās tvayi niṣkrānte tatpraveśādiśaṅkayā //
analyzed: kauśāmbyāḥ tvayi niṣkrānte tad praveśa ādi śaṅkayā

original: tasmād abhūmir iyam asarvajñānām ity arthāpattyaiva tan niścayaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt abhūmiḥ iyam asarvajñānām iti arthāpattyā eva tat niścayaḥ

original: nanu ittham amum artham anumānān niśceṣyāmaḥ deśāntarāṇi caitraśūnyāni caitrādhiṣṭhitadeśavyatiriktatvāt tatsamīpaseśavad iti na pratyanumānopahatarvāt deśāntarāṇi caitrāvyatiriktāni tatsamīpadeśavyatiriktatvāt caitrādhiṣṭhitadeśavat iti /
analyzed: nanu ittham amum artham anumānāt niśceṣyāmaḥ deśa antarāṇi caitra śūnyāni caitra adhiṣṭhita deśa vyatirikta tvāt iti na pratyanumāna upahata rvāt deśa antarāṇi caitra avyatiriktāni tad samīpa deśa vyatirikta tvāt caitra adhiṣṭhita deśa vat iti

original: tasmān niyatadeśopalabhyamānaparimitaparimāṇapuruṣaśarīrānyathā 'nupapattyaiva taditarasakaladeśanāstitvāvadhāraṇaṃ tasyeti siddhaṃ //
analyzed: tasmāt niyata deśa upalabhyamāna parimita parimāṇa puruṣa śarīra anyathā nupapattyā eva tad itara sakala deśanā astitva avadhāraṇam tasya iti siddham

original: pīno divā ca nāstīti sākāṅkṣavacanaśruteḥ /
analyzed: pīnaḥ divā ca na asti iti sākāṅkṣa vacana śruteḥ

original: tad ekadeśavijñānaṃ śrutārthāpattir ucyate //
analyzed: tat eka deśa vijñānam śruta arthāpattiḥ ucyate

original: ihaivaṃvidhasākāṅkṣavacanasravaṇe sati samupajāyamānaṃ rajanībhojanavijñānaṃ pramāṇantarakaraṇakaṃ bhavitum arhati pratyakṣāder asannidhānāt /
analyzed: iha evaṃvidha sākāṅkṣa vacana sravaṇe sati samupajāyamānam rajanī bhojana vijñānam pramāṇa antara karaṇakam bhavitum arhati pratyakṣa ādeḥ asannidhānāt

original: na pratyakṣaṃ kṣapābhakṣaṇapratītikṣamam parokṣatvāt /
analyzed: na pratyakṣam kṣapā bhakṣaṇa pratīti kṣamam parokṣa tvāt

original: nānumānaṃ anavagatasambandhasyāpi tatpratīteḥ /
analyzed: na anumānam anavagata sambandhasya api tad pratīteḥ

original: upamānādes tu śaṅkaiva nodeti /
analyzed: upamāna ādeḥ tu śaṅkā eva nā udeti

original: tasmāt śabda eva rātribhojanapratyayaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt śabdaḥ eva rātri bhojana pratyayaḥ

original: śabdaś ca na śrūyamāṇa imam artham abhivaditum alam ekasya vākyasya vidhiniṣedharūpārthadvayasamarthanaśūnyatvāt /
analyzed: śabdaḥ ca na śrūyamāṇaḥ imam artham abhivaditum alam ekasya vākyasya vidhi niṣedha rūpa artha dvaya samarthana śūnya tvāt

original: atra ca rātryādipadānām aśravaṇāt apadārthasya vākyārthatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: atra ca rātri ādi padānām aśravaṇāt apadārthasya vākya artha tva anupapatteḥ

original: na ca vibhāvarībhojanalakṣaṇo 'rthaḥ divāvākyapadārthānāṃ bhedaḥ saṃsargo vā yenāyam apadārtho 'pi pratīyeta //
analyzed: na ca vibhāvarī bhojana lakṣaṇaḥ rthaḥ divā vākya padārthānām bhedaḥ saṃsargaḥ vā yena ayam pratīyeta

original: tasmāt kalpyāgamakṛtaṃ naktamattīti vedanam /
analyzed: tasmāt kalpya āgama kṛtam naktam atti iti vedanam

original: tadvākyakalpanāyāṃ ca pramāṇaṃ paricintyatām //
analyzed: tad vākya kalpanāyām ca pramāṇam paricintyatām

original: nā 'dhyakṣam anabhivyaktaśabdagrahaṇaśaktimat /
analyzed: na adhyakṣam an abhivyakta śabda grahaṇa śaktimat

original: na liṅgam aṛhītvā 'pi vyāpiṃ tadavadhāraṇāt //
analyzed: na liṅgam a ṛhītvā vyāpim tad avadhāraṇāt

original: kvacin nityaparokṣatvāt vyāptibodho 'pi durghaṭaḥ /
analyzed: kvacid nitya parokṣa tvāt vyāpti bodhaḥ durghaṭaḥ

original: viniyoktrī śrutir yatra kalpyā prakaraṇādibhiḥ //
analyzed: viniyoktrī śrutiḥ yatra kalpyā prakaraṇa ādibhiḥ

original: viniyoktrī hi śrutiḥ satvatra prakaraṇādau vākyavidbhir abhyupagamyate /
analyzed: viniyoktrī hi śrutiḥ prakaraṇa ādau vākya vidbhiḥ abhyupagamyate

original: yathoktam [viniyoktrī hi śrutis tāvat sarveṣv eteṣu sammatā] iti /
analyzed: yathā uktam viniyoktrī hi śrutiḥ tāvat sarveṣu eteṣu sammatā iti

original: tasyāś ca nityaparokṣatvāt duradhigamas tatra liṅgasya pratibandhaḥ /
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca nitya parokṣa tvāt duradhigamaḥ tatra liṅgasya pratibandhaḥ

original: na ca niśāpadavacanasya sattā 'numātum api śakyā tasyāṃ sādyāyāṃ bhāvābhāvobhayadharmakasya hetor asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikatvenāhetutvāt /
analyzed: na ca niśā pada vacanasya sattā numātum api śakyā tasyām sādyāyām bhāva abhāva ubhaya dharmakasya hetoḥ asiddha viruddha anaikāntika tvena ahetu tvāt

original: na cātra dharmaḥ kaścid upalabhyate yas tena tadvān parvata ivāgnimān anumīyate //
analyzed: na ca atra dharmaḥ kaścid upalabhyate yaḥ tena tadvān parvataḥ iva agnimān anumīyate

original: na ca divāvākyaṃ tadartho vā niśāvacanānumāne liṅgatāṃ pratipattum arhati aśrute hi niśāvākye kathaṃ taddharmatāgrahaḥ /
analyzed: na ca divāvākyam tad arthaḥ vā niśā vacana anumāne liṅga tām pratipattum arhati a śrute hi niśā vākye katham tad dharma tā grahaḥ

original: śrute tu tasmin taddharmagrahaṇe kiṃ prayojanam //
analyzed: śrute tu tasmin tad dharma grahaṇe kim prayojanam

original: divāvākyapadārthānāṃ tiṣṭhatu liṅgatvaṃ anupapadyamānatayā 'pi na niśāvākyapratyākatvam avakalpate /
analyzed: divāvākya padārthānām tiṣṭhatu liṅga tvam anupapadyamāna tayā pi na niśā vākya pratyāka tvam avakalpate

original: padārthānāṃ hi sāmānyātmakatvāt viśeṣam antareṇānupapattiḥ syāt na vākyāntaram antareṇa /
analyzed: padārthānām hi sāmānya ātmaka tvāt viśeṣam antareṇa anupapattiḥ syāt na vākya antaram antareṇa
