original: tasmāt śrūyamāṇaṃ vākyam eva tadekadeśam antareṇa nirākāṅkṣapratyayotpādakasvavyāpāranirvahaṇasandhim anadhigacchat tadekadeśam ākṣipatīti seyaṃ pramāṇaikadeśaviṣayā śrutārthāpattiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt śrūyamāṇam vākyam eva tad eka deśam antareṇa nirākāṅkṣa pratyaya utpādaka sva vyāpāra nirvahaṇa sandhim anadhigacchat tad eka deśam ākṣipati iti sā iyam pramāṇa eka deśa viṣayā śruta arthāpattiḥ

original: nanu arthād eva katham arthāntaraṃ kalpyate pīvaratvaṃ hi nāma bhojanakāryam upalabhyamānaṃ svakāraṇaṃ bhojanaṃ analam iva dhūmaḥ samupasthāpayatu /
analyzed: nanu arthāt eva katham artha antaram kalpyate pīvara tvam hi nāma bhojana kāryam upalabhyamānam sva kāraṇam bhojanam analam iva dhūmaḥ samupasthāpayatu

original: tac ca vacasā kālaviśeṣe niṣiddhaṃ taditarakālaviśeṣaviṣayaṃ bhaviṣyatīti kiṃ vacanānumānena vacanam api nādṛṣṭārthaṃ api tu arthagatyartham eva /
analyzed: tat ca vacasā kāla viśeṣe niṣiddham tad itara kāla viśeṣa viṣayam bhaviṣyati iti kim vacana anumānena vacanam api na adṛṣṭa artham api tu artha gati artham eva

original: tat asya sākṣād arthasyaiva kalpyamānasya ko doṣaḥ yad vyavadhānam āśrīyate ucyate śabdapramāṇamārge 'smin anabhijño 'si bālaka /
analyzed: tat asya sākṣāt arthasya eva kalpyamānasya kaḥ doṣaḥ yat vyavadhānam āśrīyate ucyate śabda pramāṇa mārge smin anabhijñaḥ si bālaka

original: pramāṇataiva na hy asya sākāṅkṣajñānakāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: pramāṇa tā eva na hi asya sākāṅkṣa jñāna kāriṇaḥ

original: puro 'vasthitavastvaṃśadarśanaprāptinirvṛti /
analyzed: puras

original: pratyakṣādi yathā mānaṃ na tathā śābdam iṣyate //
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādi yathā mānam na tathā śābdam iṣyate

original: vākyārthe hi samagrāṅgaparipūraṇasuthita /
analyzed: vākya arthe hi samagra aṅga paripūraṇa suthita

original: avidhāya dhiyaṃ nāsya vyāpāraḥ paryavasyati //
analyzed: a vidhāya dhiyam na asya vyāpāraḥ paryavasyati

original: tāvantaṃ bodham ādhāya prāmāṇyaṃ labhate vacaḥ /
analyzed: tāvantam bodham ādhāya prāmāṇyam labhate vacaḥ

original: tadarthavācakatvāc ca tadvākyaṃ vākyam iṣyate //
analyzed: tad artha vācaka tvāt ca tat vākyam vākyam iṣyate

original: śabdaikadeśaśrutyā 'taḥ tadaṃśaparipūraṇam /
analyzed: śabda eka deśa śrutyā taḥ tad aṃśa paripūraṇam

original: kalpyaṃ prathamam arthasya kutas tena vinā gatiḥ //
analyzed: kalpyam prathamam arthasya kutas tena vinā gatiḥ

original: prāyaḥ śrutārthāpattyā ca vedaḥ kāryeṣu pūryate /
analyzed: prāyas śruta artha āpattyā ca vedaḥ kāryeṣu pūryate

original: tatrārthaḥ kalpyamānas tu na bhaved eva vaidikaḥ //
analyzed: tatra arthaḥ kalpyamānaḥ tu na bhavet eva vaidikaḥ

original: yo mantrair aṣṭakāliṅgaiḥ tadviddhiḥ parikalpyate /
analyzed: yaḥ mantraiḥ aṣṭakā liṅgaiḥ tad viddhiḥ parikalpyate

original: śrutir liṅgādibhir yā ca kalpyate viniyojikā //
analyzed: śrutiḥ liṅga ādibhiḥ yā ca kalpyate viniyojikā

original: viśvajityadhikāraś ca yāgakartavyatāśruteḥ /
analyzed: viśvajiti adhikāraḥ ca yāga kartavya tā śruteḥ

original: utpattivākyaṃ sauryādāv adhikāravidhiśruteḥ //
analyzed: utpatti vākyam saurya ādau adhikāra vidhi śruteḥ

original: aindrāgnādivikāreṣu kāryamātropadeśataḥ /
analyzed: aindrāgna ādi vikāreṣu kārya mātra upadeśataḥ

original: yaś ca prakṛtivadbhāvo vidhyanta upapādyate //
analyzed: yaḥ ca prakṛtivat bhāvaḥ vidhi ante upapādyate

original: tad evamādau sambandhagrahaṇānupapattitaḥ /
analyzed: tat evamādau sambandha grahaṇa anupapattitaḥ

original: śrutārthāpattir evaiṣā niśapatnaṃ vijṛmbhate //
analyzed: śruta artha āpattiḥ eva eṣā niśapatnam vijṛmbhate

original: tayā śrutyaikadeśaś ca sarvatra parikalpyate /
analyzed: tayā śrutyā eka deśaḥ ca sarvatra parikalpyate

original: arthakalpanapakṣe tu na syād vedaikagamyatā //
analyzed: artha kalpana pakṣe tu na syāt veda eka gamya tā

original: ity arthāpattir uktaiṣā ṣaṭpramāṇasamudbhavā /
analyzed: iti arthāpattiḥ uktā eṣā ṣaṣ pramāṇa samudbhavā

original: eṣā vicāryamāṇā tu bhidyate nānumānataḥ //
analyzed: eṣā vicāryamāṇā tu bhidyate na anumānataḥ

original: pratibandhād vinā vastu na vastvantarabodhakam /
analyzed: pratibandhāt vinā vastu na vastu antara bodhakam

original: yaṃ kañcidartham ālokya na yaḥ kaścit pratīyate //
analyzed: yam kañcid artham ālokya na yaḥ kaścid pratīyate

original: pratibandho 'pi nājñātaḥ prayāti matihetutām /
analyzed: pratibandhaḥ pi na ajñātaḥ prayāti mati hetu tām

original: na sadyojātabālādeḥ udbhavanti tathā dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: na sadyas jāta bāla ādeḥ udbhavanti tathā dhiyaḥ

original: na viśeṣātmanā yatra saṃbandhajñānasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: na viśeṣa ātmanā yatra saṃbandha jñāna saṃbhavaḥ

original: tatrāpy asty eva sāmānyarūpeṇa tadupagrahaḥ //
analyzed: tatra api asti eva sāmānya rūpeṇa tad upagrahaḥ

original: api ca tena vinā nopapadyata iti kalpanam arthāpattiḥ /
analyzed: api ca tena vinā na upapadyate iti kalpanam arthāpattiḥ

original: tena vinā nopapadyata iti ca vyatirekabhaṇitiriyam /
analyzed: tena vinā nā upapadyate iti ca vyatireka bhaṇitiḥ iyam

original: vyatirekaś ca pratītaḥ tasmin saty upapadyate ity anvayam ākṣipati /
analyzed: vyatirekaḥ ca pratītaḥ tasmin sati upapadyate iti anvayam ākṣipati

original: anvayavyatirekau ca gamakasya liṅgasya dharma iti katham arthāpattiḥ nānumānam kevalavyatirekī hetur anvayamūla eva gamaka iti vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekau ca gamakasya liṅgasya dharmaḥ iti katham arthāpattiḥ na anumānam kevala vyatirekī hetuḥ anvaya mūlaḥ eva gamakaḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: yāś ca pratyakṣādipūrvikāḥ śaktikalpanāyām arthāpattaya udahṛtāḥ tāś ca śakter atīndriyāyā abhāvāt nirviṣayā eva //
analyzed: yāḥ ca pratyakṣa ādi pūrvikāḥ śakti kalpanāyām arthāpattayaḥ uda hṛtāḥ tāḥ ca śakteḥ atīndriyāyāḥ abhāvāt nirviṣayāḥ eva

original: svarūpād udbhavat kāryaṃ sahakāryupabṛhmitāt /
analyzed: svarūpāt udbhavat kāryam sahakāri upabṛhmitāt

original: na hi kalpayituṃ śaktaṃ śaktim anyām atīndriyām //
analyzed: na hi kalpayitum śaktam śaktim anyām atīndriyām

original: nanu śaktim antareṇa kārakaṃ kārakam eva na bhavet /
analyzed: nanu śaktim antareṇa kārakam kārakam eva na bhavet

original: yathā pādapaṃ chettumanasā paraśurudyamyate tathā pādukādyudyamyeta /
analyzed: yathā pādapam chettu manasā paraśuḥ udyamyate tathā pādukā ādi udyamyeta

original: śakter anabhyupagame hi dravyasvarūpāviśeṣāt sarvasmāt sarvadā sarvakāryodayaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: śakteḥ an abhyupagame hi dravya sva rūpa aviśeṣāt sarvasmāt sarvadā sarva kārya udaya prasaṅgaḥ

original: tathā hi viṣadahanayor māraṇe dāhe ca śaktāv aniṣymāṇāyāṃ mantrapratibaddhāyāṃ svarūpapratyabhijñāyāṃ satyām api svakāryaudāsīnyaṃ yat dṛśyate tatra kā yuktiḥ na hi na hi mantreṇa svarūpasahakārisānnidhyaṃ pratibadhyate tasya pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt /
analyzed: tathā hi viṣa dahanayoḥ māraṇe dāhe ca śaktau mantra pratibaddhāyām sva rūpa pratyabhijñāyām satyām api sva kārī audāsīnyam yat dṛśyate tatra kā yuktiḥ na hi na hi mantreṇa sva rūpa sahakāri sānnidhyam pratibadhyate tasya pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt

original: śaktis tu pratibadhyata iti saty api svarūpe satsv api sahakāriṣu kāryānutpādo yuktaḥ //
analyzed: śaktiḥ tu pratibadhyate iti sati api svarūpe satsu api sahakāriṣu kārya anutpādaḥ yuktaḥ

original: kiñca sevādhyayanādisāmye 'pi phalavaicitryadarśanāt atīndriyaṃ kim api kāraṇaṃ kalpitam eva dharmādi bhavadbhiḥ /
analyzed: kiñca sevā adhyayana ādi sāmye pi phala vaicitrya darśanāt atīndriyam kim api kāraṇam kalpitam eva dharma ādi bhavadbhiḥ

original: ataḥ śaktir atīndriyā tathā 'bhyupagamyatām iti //
analyzed: atas śaktiḥ atīndriyā tathā bhyupagamyatām iti

original: tad etad anupapannam yat tāvad upādānaniyamād ity uktaṃ tatrocyate na hi vayam adya kiñcid abhinavaṃ bhāvānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvam utthāpayituṃ śaknumaḥ kintu yathāpravṛttam anusaranto vyavaharāmaḥ /
analyzed: tat etat anupapannam yat tāvat upādāna niyamāt iti uktam tatra ucyate na hi vayam adya kiñcid abhinavam bhāvānām kārya kāraṇa bhāvam utthāpayitum śaknumaḥ kintu yathāpravṛttam anusarantaḥ vyavaharāmaḥ

original: na hy asmadicchayā āpaḥ śītaṃ śamayanti kṛśānur vā pipāsām //
analyzed: na hi asmad icchayā āpaḥ śītam śamayanti kṛśānuḥ vā pipāsām

original: tatra chedanādāv anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vā vṛddhavyavahārād vā paraśvadhāder eva kāraṇatvam adhyavagacchāma iti tad eva tadarthina upādadmahe na pādukādīti //
analyzed: tatra chedana ādau anvaya vyatirekābhyām vā vṛddha vyavahārāt vā paraśvadha ādeḥ eva kāraṇa tvam adhyavagacchāmaḥ iti tat eva tad arthinaḥ upādadmahe na pādukā ādi iti

original: na ca paraśvadhādeḥ svarūpasannidhāne saty api sarvadā kāryodayaḥ svarūpavat sahakāriṇām apy apekṣaṇīyatvāt sahakārisannidhānasya sarvadā 'nupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca paraśvadha ādeḥ sva rūpa sannidhāne sati api sarvadā kārya udayaḥ sva rūpa vat sahakāriṇām api apekṣaṇīya tvāt sahakāri sannidhānasya sarvadā nupapatteḥ

original: sahakārivarge ca dharmādikam api nipatati tadapekṣe kāryotpāde kathaṃ sarvadā tatsaṃbhavaḥ dharmādharmayoś ca jagadvaicitryakāryabalena kalpanam aparihāryam /
analyzed: sahakāri varge ca dharma ādikam api nipatati tad apekṣe kārya utpāde katham sarvadā tad saṃbhavaḥ dharma adharmayoḥ ca jagat vaicitrya kārya balena kalpanam aparihāryam

original: tayoś ca na śaktitvād atīndriyatvam api tu svarūpamahimnaiva manaḥparamāṇvādivat //
analyzed: tayoḥ ca na śakti tvāt atīndriya tvam api tu svarūpa mahimnā eva manaḥ paramāṇu ādi vat

original: yad api viṣadahanasannidhāne saty api mantraprayogāt tatkāryādarśanam tad api na śaktipratibandhananibandhanam api tu sāmagryantarānupraveśahetukam //
analyzed: yat api viṣa dahana sannidhāne sati api mantra prayogāt tad kārya adarśanam tat api na śakti pratibandhana nibandhanam api tu sāmagrī antara anupraveśa hetukam

original: nanu mantreṇa praviśatā tatra kiṃ kṛtam na kiñcit kṛtam sāmagryantaraṃ tu saṃpāditam /
analyzed: nanu mantreṇa praviśatā tatra kim kṛtam na kiñcid kṛtam sāmagrī antaram tu saṃpāditam

original: kācid dhi sāmagrī kasyacit kāryasya hetuḥ //
analyzed: kācid hi sāmagrī kasyacid kāryasya hetuḥ

original: svarūpaṃ tadavastham eveti cet yady evaṃ abhikṣitam api viṣaṃ kathaṃ na hanyāt tatrā ''syasaṃyogādyapekṣaṇīyam astīti cet mantrābhāvo ' py apekṣyatām /
analyzed: sva rūpam tad avastham eva iti ced yadi evam abhikṣitam api viṣam katham na hanyāt tatra ā sya saṃyoga ādi apekṣaṇīyam asti iti ced apekṣyatām

original: divyakaraṇakāle dharma iva mantro 'py anupaviṣṭaḥ kāryaṃ pratihanti //
analyzed: divya karaṇa kāle dharmaḥ iva an upaviṣṭaḥ kāryam pratihanti

original: śaktipakṣe 'pi vā mantraya ko vyāpāraḥ mantreṇa hi śakter nāśo vā kriyate pratibandho vā na tāvat nāśaḥ mantrāpagame punastatkāryadarśanāt //
analyzed: śakti pakṣe vā kaḥ vyāpāraḥ mantreṇa hi śakteḥ nāśaḥ vā kriyate pratibandhaḥ vā na tāvat nāśaḥ mantra apagame punar tad kārya darśanāt

original: pratibandhas tu svarūpasyaiva śakter ivāstu //
analyzed: pratibandhaḥ tu svarūpasya eva śakteḥ iva astu

original: svarūpasya kiṃ jātam śakter api kiṃ jātam kāryaudāsīnyam iti cet taditaratrāpi samānam //
analyzed: svarūpasya kim jātam śakteḥ api kim jātam kārya audāsīnyam iti ced tat itaratra api samānam

original: svarūpam asty eva dṛśyamānatvāt iti cet śaktir apy asty eva punaḥ kāryadarśanenānumīyamānatvād iti //
analyzed: svarūpam asti eva dṛśyamāna tvāt iti ced śaktiḥ api asti eva punar kārya darśanena anumīyamāna tvāt iti

original: kiñca śaktir abhyupagamyamānā padārthasvarūpavan nityā abhyupagamyeta kāryā vā nityatve sarvadā kāryodayaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: kiñca śaktiḥ abhyupagamyamānā padārtha svarūpa vat nityā abhyupagamyeta kāryā vā nitya tve sarvadā kārya udaya prasaṅgaḥ

original: sahakāryapekṣāyāṃ tu svarūpasyaiva tadapekṣā 'stu kiṃ śaktyā kāryatve tu śakteḥ padārthasvarūpamātrakāryatvaṃ vā syāt sahakāryādisāmagrīkāryatvaṃ vā svarūpamātrakāryatve punar api sarvadā kāryotpādaprasaṅgaḥ sarvadā śakter utpādāt /
analyzed: sahakāri apekṣāyām tu svarūpasya eva tad apekṣā stu kim śaktyā kārya tve tu śakteḥ padārtha svarūpa mātra kārya tvam vā syāt sahakāri ādi sāmagrī kārya tvam vā svarūpa mātra kārya tve punar api sarvadā kārya utpāda prasaṅgaḥ sarvadā śakteḥ utpādāt

original: sāmagrīkāryatve tu kāryam eva sāmagrīkāryam astu kiṃ antarālavartinyā śaktyā aśaktāt kārakāt kāryaṃ na niṣpadya iti cet śaktir api kāryaṃ tadutpattāv apy evaṃ śaktyantarakalpanād anavasthā //
analyzed: sāmagrī kārya tve tu kāryam eva sāmagrī kāryam astu kim antarāla vartinyā śaktyā aśaktāt kārakāt kāryam na niṣpadye iti ced śaktiḥ api kāryam tad utpattau api evam śakti antara kalpanāt anavasthā

original: āha dṛṣṭasiddhaye hy adṛṣṭaṃ kalpyate na tu dṛṣṭavighātāya /
analyzed: āha dṛṣṭa siddhaye hi adṛṣṭam kalpyate na tu dṛṣṭa vighātāya

original: śaktyantarakalpanāyāṃ śaktiśreṇīnirmāṇa eva kṣīṇatvāt kārakāṇāṃ kāryavighātaḥ syād iti ekaiva śaktiḥ kalpyate tat kuto 'navasthā atrocyate yady adṛṣṭam antareṇa dṛṣṭaṃ na siddhyati kāmam adṛṣṭaṃ kalpyatām /
analyzed: śakti antara kalpanāyām śakti śreṇī nirmāṇe eva kṣīṇa tvāt kārakāṇām kārya vighātaḥ syāt iti ekā eva śaktiḥ kalpyate tat kutas navasthā atrā ucyate yadi adṛṣṭam antareṇa dṛṣṭam na siddhi ati kāmam adṛṣṭam kalpyatām

original: anyathā 'pi tadutpattau kiṃ tadupakalpanena darśitā cānyathā 'py upapattiḥ //
analyzed: anyathā pi tad utpattau kim tad upakalpanena darśitā ca anyathā pi upapattiḥ

original: kalpyamānam api cādṛṣtaṃ tat kalpyatāṃ /
analyzed: kalpyamānam api ca adṛṣtam tat kalpyatām

original: yat anavasthāṃ nāvaheta dharmādivat //
analyzed: yat anavasthām na āvaheta dharma ādi vat

original: api ca vyāpāro 'py atīndriyaḥ śaktivad iṣyate bhavadbhiḥ anyatarakalpanayaiva kāryopapatteḥ kim ubhayakalpanāgauraveṇa //
analyzed: api ca vyāpāraḥ api atīndriyaḥ śakti vat iṣyate bhavadbhiḥ anyatara kalpanayā eva kārya upapatteḥ kim ubhaya kalpanā gauraveṇa

original: śaktam avyāpriyamāṇaṃ na kārakaṃ kārakam iti cet tacchaktam iti tadā kathaṃ jānāmi kāryadarśanāt jñāsyāmīti cet vyāpārād eva kāryaṃ setsyati //
analyzed: śaktam a vyāpriyamāṇam na kārakam kārakam iti ced tat śaktam iti tadā katham jānāmi kārya darśanāt jñāsyāmi iti ced vyāpārāt eva kāryam setsyati

original: pādukāder vyāpriyamāṇād api na pādapacchedo dṛśyata iti cet pratyakṣas tarhi vyāpāraḥ nātīndriyaḥ yataḥ kāryadarśanāt pūrvam api vyāpriyamāṇatvaṃ jñātam āyuṣmatā /
analyzed: pādukā ādeḥ vyāpriyamāṇāt api na pādapa chedaḥ dṛśyate iti ced pratyakṣaḥ tarhi vyāpāraḥ na atīndriyaḥ yatas kārya darśanāt pūrvam api vyāpriyamāṇa tvam jñātam āyuṣmatā

original: kāryānumeyo hi vyāpāraḥ kārya vinā na jñāyetaiva /
analyzed: kārya anumeyaḥ hi vyāpāraḥ kārya vinā na jñāyeta eva

original: kāryaṃ tv anyatarasmād api ghaṭamānaṃ nobhayaṃ kalpayituṃ prabhavati ity alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: kāryam tu anyatarasmāt api ghaṭamānam na ubhayam kalpayitum prabhavati iti alam prasaṅgena

original: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ

original: tasmād atīndriyāyāḥ śakter abhāvāt nirviṣayā yathodāhṛtāḥ tā arthāpattayo bhavanti //
analyzed: tasmāt atīndriyāyāḥ śakteḥ abhāvāt nirviṣayāḥ yathā udāhṛtāḥ tāḥ arthāpattayaḥ bhavanti

original: api vā śaktir atīndriyā anumānasyaiva viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: api vā śaktiḥ atīndriyā anumānasya eva viṣayaḥ

original: kāryasya kāraṇapūrvakarvena vyāptigrahaṇāt svarūpamātrasya ca kāraṇatvānirvahaṇāt adhikaṃ kim apy anumāsyate sā śaktir iti //
analyzed: kāryasya kāraṇa pūrvaka rvena vyāpti grahaṇāt svarūpa mātrasya ca kāraṇa tva anirvahaṇāt adhikam kim api anumāsyate sā śaktiḥ iti

original: śabdnityatvasiddhau tu yā 'rthāpattir udāhṛtā /
analyzed: śabda nitya tva siddhau tu yā rthāpattiḥ udāhṛtā

original: tasyāḥ śabdaparīkṣāyāṃ samādhir abhidhāsyate //
analyzed: tasyāḥ śabda parīkṣāyām samādhiḥ abhidhāsyate

original: abhāvapūrvikā 'py arthāpattir anumānam eva /
analyzed: abhāva pūrvikā pi arthāpattiḥ anumānam eva

original: jīvato gṛhābhāvena liṅgabhūtena bahirbhāvāvagamāt /
analyzed: jīvataḥ gṛha abhāvena liṅga bhūtena bahirbhāva avagamāt

original: caitrasya gṛhābhāvo dharmī bahirbhāvena tadvān iti sādhyo dharmaḥ jīvanmanuṣyagṛhābhāvatvāt pūrvopalabdhaivaṃvidhagṛhābhāvavat /
analyzed: caitrasya gṛha abhāvaḥ dharmī bahirbhāvena tadvān iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ jīvat manuṣya gṛha abhāva tvāt pūrva upalabdha evaṃvidha gṛha abhāva vat

original: yathā dhūmo dharmī vahnimān iti sādhyo dharmaḥ dhūmatvāt pūrvopalabdhadhūmavad iti //
analyzed: yathā dhūmaḥ dharmī vahnimān iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ dhūma tvāt pūrva upalabdha dhūma vat iti

original: ataś ca gṛhādīnāṃ liṅgatvāśaṅkanaṃ apākaraṇaṃ ca āḍambaramātram //
analyzed: atas ca gṛha ādīnām liṅga tva āśaṅkanam apākaraṇam ca āḍambara mātram

original: yat punaḥ prameyānupraveśadūṣaṇam abhyadhāyi tad api na sāṃpratam //
analyzed: yat punar prameya anupraveśa dūṣaṇam abhyadhāyi tat api na sāṃpratam

original: kiṃ prameyam abhimatam atra bhavatām kiṃ sattāmātram uta bahirdeśaviśeṣitaṃ sattvam sattāmātraṃ tāvad āgamād evāvagatam iti na pramāṇāntaraprameyatām avalambate /
analyzed: kim prameyam abhimatam atra bhavatām kim sattā mātram uta bahis deśa viśeṣitam sattvam sattā mātram tāvat āgamāt eva avagatam iti na pramāṇa antara prameya tām avalambate

original: bahirdeśaviśeṣitaṃ tu sattvaṃ bhavati prameyam /
analyzed: bahis deśa viśeṣitam tu sattvam bhavati prameyam

original: tasya tu tadānīm anupraveśaḥ kutastyaḥ gṛhābhāvagrāhakaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ gṛha eva sadupalambhakapramāṇāvakāśam apākaroti na bahiśadasattvacintāṃ prastauti //
analyzed: tasya tu tadānīm anupraveśaḥ kutastyaḥ gṛha abhāva grāhakam hi pramāṇam gṛhe eva sat upalambhaka pramāṇa avakāśam apākaroti na bahiśada sattva cintām prastauti

original: mṛtasya jīvato dūre tiṣṭhataḥ prāṅgaṇe 'pi vā /
analyzed: mṛtasya jīvataḥ dūre tiṣṭhataḥ prāṅgaṇe vā

original: gṛhābhāvaparicchede na viśeṣo 'sti kiś cana //
analyzed: gṛha abhāva paricchede na viśeṣaḥ sti kim cana

original: jīvanaviśiṣṭas tv asau gṛhyamāṇo liṅgatām aśnute vyabhicāranirāsāt /
analyzed: jīvana viśiṣṭaḥ tu asau gṛhyamāṇaḥ liṅga tām aśnute vyabhicāra nirāsāt

original: na ca viśeṣaṇagrahaṇam eva prameyagrahaṇam /
analyzed: na ca viśeṣaṇa grahaṇam eva prameya grahaṇam

original: jīvanam anyat anyac ca gahirbhāvākhyaṃ prameyam //
analyzed: jīvanam anyat anyat ca gahirbhāva ākhyam prameyam

original: nanu jīvanaviśiṣṭagṛhābhāvapratītir eva bahirbhāvapratītiḥ /
analyzed: nanu jīvana viśiṣṭa gṛha abhāva pratītiḥ eva bahirbhāva pratītiḥ

original: naitad evam jīvanaviśiṣṭagṛhābhāvapratīteḥ bahirbhāvasya pratītiḥ na tatpratītir eva bahirbhāvapratītiḥ na hi dahanādhikaraṇe dhūmapratītir eva dahanapratītiḥ //
analyzed: na etat evam jīvana viśiṣṭa gṛha abhāva pratīteḥ bahirbhāvasya pratītiḥ na tad pratītiḥ eva bahirbhāva pratītiḥ na hi dahana adhikaraṇe dhūma pratītiḥ eva dahana pratītiḥ

original: nanu dhūmād anya eva dahanaḥ ihāpi gṛhābhāvañivanābhyām anya eva bahirbhāvaḥ //
analyzed: nanu dhūmāt anyaḥ eva dahanaḥ iha api anyaḥ eva bahirbhāvaḥ

original: parvatahutabahayoḥ siddhatvāt mattvarthamātraṃ tatrāpūrvam anumeyam evam ihāpi bahirdeśayogamātram apūrvam anumeyam //
analyzed: siddha tvāt mattu artha mātram tatra apūrvam anumeyam evam iha api bahis deśa yoga mātram apūrvam anumeyam

original: yadi tu tadadhikaṃ prameyam iha neṣyate tadā gṛhābhāvajīvanayoḥ svapramāṇābhyām avadhāraṇād ānarthakyam arthāpatteḥ /
analyzed: yadi tu tad adhikam prameyam iha na iṣyate tadā gṛha abhāva jīvanayoḥ sva pramāṇābhyām avadhāraṇāt ānarthakyam arthāpatteḥ

original: tasmāt prameyāntarasadbhāvāt tasya ca tadānīm ananupraveśāt na prameyānupraveśo doṣaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt prameya antara sadbhāvāt tasya ca tadānīm ananupraveśāt na prameya anupraveśaḥ doṣaḥ

original: arthāpattāv api ca tulya evāyaṃ doṣaḥ tatrāpy arthāt arthāntarakalpanā 'bhyupagamāt /
analyzed: arthāpattau api ca tulyaḥ eva ayam doṣaḥ tatra api arthāt artha antara kalpanā abhyupagamāt

original: [dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā 'rtho 'nyathā nopapadyate ity arthakalpanā] ity evaṃ granthopanibandhāt /
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā rthaḥ nyathā nā upapadyate iti artha kalpanā iti evam grantha upanibandhāt

original: tasya tasmāt pratītir iti yatra vyavahāraḥ tatrāvaśyaṃ tatpratītau tadanupraveśo doṣa eva /
analyzed: tasya tasmāt pratītiḥ iti yatra vyavahāraḥ tatra avaśyam tad pratītau tad anupraveśaḥ doṣaḥ eva

original: svabhāvahetav iva tadbuddhisiddhyā tatsiddheḥ pramāṇāntaravaiphalyād iti //
analyzed: svabhāva hetau iva tad buddhi siddhyā tad siddheḥ pramāṇa antara vaiphalyāt iti

original: prabhākarās tu prakārāntareṇānumānād bhedamātrācakṣate /
analyzed: prabhākarāḥ tu prakāra antareṇa anumānāt bheda mātrā ācakṣate

original: anumāne gamakaviśeṣaṇam anyathā 'nupapannam analaṃ vinā dhūmo hi nopapadyate iha tu viparyayaḥ gamyo gamakena vinā nopapadyate gṛhān nirgato jīvan bahirbhavatīti //
analyzed: anumāne gamaka viśeṣaṇam anyathā anupapannam analam vinā dhūmaḥ hi nā upapadyate iha tu viparyayaḥ gamyaḥ gamakena vinā nā upapadyate gṛhāt nirgataḥ jīvan bahis bhavati iti

original: bhāṣyam apy evaṃ yojayanti dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārthaḥ arthakalpanāḥ arthāntaraṃ kalpayatīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: bhāṣyam api evam yojayanti dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā arthaḥ artha kalpanāḥ artha antaram kalpayati iti arthaḥ

original: yataḥ sā kalpnā prameyadvārikā 'nyathā 'nupapadyata ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: yatas sā prameya dvārikā nyathā iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ gamyagamakayor anupapadyamānatvaviparyayāt anumānāt pramāṇāntaram iyam arthāpattir iti bahirbhāvo 'nyathānopapadyatesa ca gamya iti //
analyzed: evam gamya gamakayoḥ anupapadyamāna tva viparyayāt anumānāt pramāṇa antaram iyam arthāpattiḥ iti bahirbhāvaḥ nyathā nā upapadyate sa ca gamyaḥ iti

original: etad api granthavaiṣamyopapādanamātraṃ na tu nūtanaviśeṣotprekṣaṇam /
analyzed: etat api grantha vaiṣamya upapādana mātram na tu nūtana viśeṣa utprekṣaṇam

original: gamye tāvad agṛhīte sati tadgatam anupapadyamānatvaṃ katham avadhāryeta gṛhīte tu gamye kiṃ tadgatānupapadyamānatvagrahaṇena sādhyasya siddhatvāt //
analyzed: gamye tāvat agṛhīte sati tad gatam anupapadyamāna tvam katham avadhāryeta gṛhīte tu gamye kim tad gata anupapadyamāna tva grahaṇena sādhyasya siddha tvāt

original: purā tadgatam anyathā 'nupapadyamānatvaṃ gṛhītam āsīd iti cet aho mahān anumānād viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: purā tad gatam anyathā nupapadyamāna tvam gṛhītam āsīt iti ced aho mahān anumānāt viśeṣaḥ

original: idaṃ hi pūrvaṃ pratibandhagrahaṇam uktaṃ syāt //
analyzed: idam hi pūrvam pratibandha grahaṇam uktam syāt

original: api ca bahirbhāvasya gṛhābhāvaṃ vinā 'nupapattir ity ukte tasmin sati tasyopapattir vaktavyā /
analyzed: api ca bahirbhāvasya gṛha abhāvam vinā nupapattiḥ iti ukte tasmin sati tasya upapattiḥ vaktavyā

original: sā ca kā kim utpattiḥ jñaptir vā yadi jñaptih sā cānumāne 'pi /
analyzed: sā ca kā kim utpattiḥ jñaptiḥ vā yadi jñaptiḥ sā ca anumāne pi

original: gamyaṃ gamakaṃ vinā nāsti tasmin saty astīti samānaḥ panthāḥ /
analyzed: gamyam gamakam vinā na asti tasmin sati asti iti samānaḥ panthāḥ

original: utpattis tu gṛhābhāvāt bahirbhāvasya durbhaṇā /
analyzed: utpattiḥ tu gṛha abhāvāt bahirbhāvasya durbhaṇā

original: prāksiddhe hi gṛhābhāve tadutpādaḥ kṣaṇāntare //
analyzed: prāk siddhe hi gṛha abhāve tad utpādaḥ kṣaṇa antare

original: kāraṇaṃ pūrvasiddhaṃ hi kāryotpādāya kalpate /
analyzed: kāraṇam pūrva siddham hi kārya utpādāya kalpate

original: tenaiva kṣaṇe jīvan na gṛhe na bahirbhavet //
analyzed: tena eva kṣaṇe jīvan na gṛhe na bahis bhavet

original: tasmād yatkiñcid etat //
analyzed: tasmāt yat kiñcid etat

original: evañ ca yad eke jñaptyutpattikṛtam iha vailakṣaṇyam utprekṣitavantaḥ dhūmenāgnir gamyata eva gṛhābhāvena bahirbhāvo janyate 'pīti tad api pratyuktaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: evam ca yat eke jñapti utpatti kṛtam iha vailakṣaṇyam utprekṣitavantaḥ dhūmena agniḥ gamyate eva gṛha abhāvena bahirbhāvaḥ janyate tat api pratyuktam bhavati

original: yat tu sambandhagrahaṇābhāvād ity uktaṃ tad api na sundaram mandiradvāravartinas tadutpatteḥ //
analyzed: yat tu sambandha grahaṇa abhāvāt iti uktam tat api na sundaram mandira dvāra vartinaḥ tad utpatteḥ

original: etac ca svayam āśaṅkya na taiḥ pratisamāhitam /
analyzed: etat ca svayam āśaṅkya na taiḥ pratisamāhitam

original: udāharaṇam anyat tu vyatyayena pradarśitam //
analyzed: udāharaṇam anyat tu vyatyayena pradarśitam

original: gṛhabhāvena bahirabhāvakalpanam iti tatraitad eva vaktavyam /
analyzed: gṛha bhāvena bahis abhāva kalpanam iti tatra etat eva vaktavyam

original: iyam abhāvapūrvikā na bhavaty evārthāpattiḥ /
analyzed: iyam abhāva pūrvikā na bhavati eva arthāpattiḥ

original: ṣaḍarthāpattiḥ pratijñāya imām abhāvapūrvikāṃ arthāpattim uktvā upanaiyyāyikakesarikaṭākṣapātabhītāṃ iha gahane hariṇīm iva yad upekṣya gamyate tad atyantam atrabhāvatām anārthajanocitaṃ ceṣṭitam //
analyzed: ṣaḍarthāpattiḥ pratijñāya imām abhāva pūrvikām arthāpattim uktvā upanaiyyāyika kesari kaṭākṣa pāta bhītām iha gahane hariṇīm iva yat upekṣya gamyate tat atyantam atrabhāva tām anārtha jana ucitam ceṣṭitam

original: tvadekaśaraṇāṃ bālām imām utsṛjya gacchataḥ /
analyzed: tvad eka śaraṇām bālām imām utsṛjya gacchataḥ

original: kathaṃ te tarkayiṣyanti mukham anyā api striyaḥ //
analyzed: katham te tarkayiṣyanti mukham anyāḥ api striyaḥ

original: bhāvenābhāvakalpanā tu pratyakṣapūrvikaivārthāpattiḥ /
analyzed: bhāvena abhāva kalpanā tu pratyakṣa pūrvikā eva arthāpattiḥ

original: tasyā api ca na duravagamaḥ sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: tasyāḥ api ca na duravagamaḥ sambandhaḥ

original: asarvagatasya dravyasya niyatadeśavṛtter akleśena taditaradeśanāstitvāvadhāraṇāt /
analyzed: asarvagatasya dravyasya niyata deśa vṛtteḥ akleśena tad itara deśa nāstitva avadhāraṇāt

original: agnivyatirekaniścaye ca dhūmasya bhavatāṃ kā gatiḥ yā tatra vārtā saivehāpi no bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: agni vyatireka niścaye ca dhūmasya bhavatām kā gatiḥ yā tatra vārtā sā evā iha api naḥ bhaviṣyati

original: na ca bhūyodarśanāvagamyamānānvayamātraikaśaraṇatayā [yasya vastvvantarābhāvo gamyas tasyaiva duṣyati /
analyzed: na ca bhūyas darśana avagamyamāna anvaya mātra eka śaraṇa tayā yasya vastu antara abhāvaḥ gamyaḥ tasya eva duṣyati

original: mama tv adṛṣṭimātreṇa gamakāḥ sahacātiṇaḥ //] iti kathayitum ucitam /
analyzed: mama tu adṛṣṭi mātreṇa gamakāḥ sahacātiṇaḥ iti kathayitum ucitam

original: aniścitavyatirekasya sādhyaniścayābhāvād iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: aniścita vyatirekasya sādhya niścaya abhāvāt iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ

original: pakṣadharmānvayavat vyatireko 'pi nāgṛhīto 'numānāṅgam /
analyzed: pakṣa dharma anvaya vat vyatirekaḥ pi na agṛhītaḥ numāna aṅgam

original: bahirbhāvasiddhau cānumānaprayogaḥ sa eva yas tvayā darśitaḥ /
analyzed: bahirbhāva siddhau ca anumāna prayogaḥ saḥ eva yaḥ tvayā darśitaḥ

original: tasya tu pratiprayogaḥ pratyakṣādiviruddhatvāt hetvābhāsa evety alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: tasya tu pratiprayogaḥ pratyakṣa ādi viruddha tvāt hetvābhāsaḥ eva iti alam prasaṅgena

original: śrutārthāpattir api varākī nānumānāt bhidyate /
analyzed: śrutā arthāpattiḥ api varākī na anumānāt bhidyate

original: vacanaikadeśakalpanāyā anupapannatvāt arthasya ca kāryaliṅgagamyasya sattvāt /
analyzed: vacana eka deśa kalpanāyāḥ anupapanna tvāt arthasya ca kārya liṅga gamyasya sattvāt

original: yathā kṣitidharakandharādhikaraṇaṃ dhūmam avalokya tatkāraṇam analam anuminoti bhavān evam āgamāt pīnatvākhyāṃ kāryam avadhārya tatkāraṇam api bhojanam anuminotu /
analyzed: yathā kṣitidhara kandhara adhikaraṇam dhūmam avalokya tad kāraṇam analam anuminoti bhavān evam āgamāt pīna tva ākhyām kāryam avadhārya tad kāraṇam api bhojanam anuminotu

original: ko 'tra viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ tra viśeṣaḥ

original: tatkāryatayā bhūyodarśanataḥ pratipannatvāt /
analyzed: tad kārya tayā bhūyas darśanataḥ pratipanna tvāt

original: liṅgasya tu kvacit pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam kvacit vacanataḥ pratipattir iti naiṣa mahān bhedaḥ /
analyzed: liṅgasya tu kvacid pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam kvacid vacanataḥ pratipattiḥ iti na eṣa mahān bhedaḥ

original: nanu vacanam aparipūrṇam iti pratītim eva yathocitāṃ janayitum asamartham kiṃ [pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte] ity ato na bhavati tatpīnatāpratītiḥ na na bhavati sākāṅkṣā tu bhavati /
analyzed: nanu vacanam a paripūrṇam iti pratītim eva yathā ucitām janayitum asamartham kim pīnaḥ devadattaḥ divā na bhuṅkte iti atas na bhavati tad pīna tā pratītiḥ na na bhavati sa ākāṅkṣā tu bhavati

original: na ca sākāṅkṣapratītikāriṇas tasya pramāṇyam iti tad eva tāvat pūrayituṃ yuktam //
analyzed: na ca sākāṅkṣa pratīti kāriṇaḥ tasya pramāṇyam iti tat eva tāvat pūrayitum yuktam

original: tad asat kasyātra sākāṅkṣātvam kiṃ śabdasya kiṃ vā tadarthasya uta svittadavagamasya iti śabdasya tāvad arthanirapekṣasya na kācid ākāṅkṣā anabhivyaktaśabdavat //
analyzed: tat asat kasya atra sākāṅkṣā tvam kim śabdasya kim vā tad arthasya uta svid tad avagamasya iti śabdasya tāvat artha nirapekṣasya na kācid ākāṅkṣā anabhivyakta śabda vat

original: arthas tu sākāṅkṣas san arthāntaram upakalpayatu ko 'vasaro vacanakalpanāyāḥ avagamo 'py arthaviṣaya eva sākāṅkṣo bhavati na śabdaviṣayaḥ śrotrakaraṇakaḥ /
analyzed: arthaḥ tu sākāṅkṣaḥ san artha antaram upakalpayatu kaḥ vasaraḥ vacana kalpanāyāḥ artha viṣayaḥ eva sākāṅkṣaḥ bhavati na śabda viṣayaḥ śrotra karaṇakaḥ

original: tasmād avagamanairākāṅkṣyasiddhaye tadarthakalpanam eva yuktam /
analyzed: tasmāt avagama nairākāṅkṣya siddhaye tad artha kalpanam eva yuktam

original: vacanaikadeśakalpanam api arthāvagatiddhayartham eveti tatkalpanam evāstu kiṃ sopānāntareṇa yat tu kalpyamānasyārthasyāvaidikatvaṃ prāpnotīti tatra vacanakalpanāpakṣe sutarām avaidikaḥ so 'rthaḥ syāt kalpyamānasya vacanasya vedād anyatvāt //
analyzed: vacana eka deśa kalpanam api artha avagati ddhai artham eva iti tad kalpanam evā astu kim sopāna antareṇa yat tu kalpyamānasya arthasya avaidika tvam prāpnoti iti tatra vacana kalpanā pakṣe sutarām avaidikaḥ saḥ ṛthaḥ syāt kalpyamānasya vacanasya vedāt anya tvāt

original: śrutaḥ anumitaś ca dvividhaḥ sa veda eveti cet śrautārthaḥ śrautārthānumitaḥ dvividhaḥ sa vedārtha eva bhaviṣyatīti kiṃ vacanasopānāntarakalpanayā tena śrūyamāṇavedavacanapratipādyārthasāmarthyalabhyatvād eva tasya vedārthatā bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: śrutaḥ anumitaḥ ca dvividhaḥ sa vedaḥ eva iti ced śrauta arthaḥ śrauta artha anumitaḥ dvividhaḥ sa veda arthaḥ eva bhaviṣyati iti kim vacana sopāna antara kalpanayā tena śrūyamāṇa veda vacana pratipādya artha sāmarthya labhya tvāt eva tasya veda artha tā bhaviṣyati

original: sarvathā na vacanaikadeśaviṣayā śrutārthāpattiḥ śreyasī /
analyzed: sarvathā na vacana eka deśa viṣayā śruta arthāpattiḥ śreyasī

original: śrutyekadeśakalpanāpakṣapratikṣepāc ca //
analyzed: śruti eka deśa kalpanā pakṣa pratikṣepāt ca

original: tad atīndriyatayā sambandhagrahaṇam aghaṭamānam iti yad uktaṃ tad api pratyuktam arthe tu sāmānyena sambandhagrahaṇam api sūpapādam /
analyzed: tat atīndriya tayā sambandha grahaṇam aghaṭamānam iti yat uktam tat api pratyuktam arthe tu sāmānyena sambandha grahaṇam api sūpapādam

original: tatra tatra yajyāder arthasyādhikārādyarthāntarasambaddhasya dṛṣṭatvād iti //
analyzed: tatra tatra yaji ādeḥ arthasya adhikāra ādi artha antara sambaddhasya dṛṣṭa tvāt iti

original: prabhākarās tu [dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā] iti bhāṣyaṃ [laukikam abhidhānāntaram evedam upalabdhivacanam] iti varṇayantaḥ śrutārthāpattiṃ pratyācakṣate /
analyzed: prabhākarāḥ tu dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā iti bhāṣyam laukikam abhidhāna antaram eva idam upalabdhi vacanam iti varṇayantaḥ śruta arthāpattim pratyācakṣate

original: śrūyamāṇasyaiva śabdasya tāvaty arthe sāmarthyam upagacchantaḥ tam arthaṃ śābdam eva pratijānate /
analyzed: śrūyamāṇasya eva śabdasya tāvati arthe sāmarthyam upagacchantaḥ tam artham śābdam eva pratijānate

original: vākyasya dūrāvidūravyavasthitaguṇāguṇakriyādyanekakārakakalāpoparaktakāryātmakavākyārthapratītau iṣor iva dīrghadīrgho vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: vākyasya dūra avidūra vyavasthita guṇa aguṇa kriyā ādi aneka kāraka kalāpa uparakta kārya ātmaka vākya artha pratītau iṣoḥ iva dīrgha dīrghaḥ vyāpāraḥ

original: aviratavyāpāre ca śabde sā pratītir udeti tadvyāpāraviratau nodeti /
analyzed: avirata vyāpāre ca śabde sā pratītiḥ udeti tad vyāpāra viratau na udeti

original: tadutpādakakārakābhāvāt /
analyzed: tad utpādaka kāraka abhāvāt

original: vṛddhavyavahāraś ca śabdeṣu vyutpadyamāno lokaḥ tathābhūtavākyavyavahariṇo vṛddhān paśyan vākyasyaiva tādṛś avākyārthe sāmarthyam avadhārayati /
analyzed: vṛddha vyavahāraḥ ca śabdeṣu vyutpadyamānaḥ lokaḥ tathābhūta vākya vyavahariṇaḥ vṛddhān paśyan vākyasya eva tādṛś a vākya arthe sāmarthyam avadhārayati

original: tadanuvartīni tu padāni tasmin naimittike nimittāni bhavanti //
analyzed: tad anuvartīni tu padāni tasmin naimittike nimittāni bhavanti

original: naimittikānukūlyaparyālocanayā kvacid aśrūyamāṇāny api tāni nimittatām bhajante viśvajidādau svargakāmādipadavat //
analyzed: naimittika ānukūlya paryālocanayā kvacid a śrūyamāṇāni api tāni nimitta tām bhajante viśvajit ādau svarga kāma ādi pada vat

original: kvacit śrūyamāṇāny api tadananukūlatvāt parityajyante [yasyobhayaṃ havir ārtim ārcchet] itivat //
analyzed: kvacid śrūyamāṇāni api tad an anukūla tvāt parityajyante yasya ubhayam haviḥ ārtim ārcchet itivat

original: kvacid anyathāsthitāni tadanurodhād anyathaiva sthāpyante [prayājaśeṣeṇa havīṃṣy abhighārayati] itivat //
analyzed: kvacid anyathā sthitāni tad anurodhāt anyathā eva sthāpyante prayāja śeṣeṇa havīṃṣi abhighārayati itivat

original: tasmāt prathamāvagataikaghanākāravākyārthānusāreṇa satām asatāṃ vā padānāṃ nimittabhāvavyavasthāpanāt aśrūyamāṇatathāvidhaikadeśād api vākyāt tadarthāvagatisaṃbhavāt kiṃ śrutārthāpattyā ata eva na sopānavyavahitaṃ tasyārthasya śābdatva sāksād eva tatsiddheḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt prathama avagata eka ghana ākāra vākya artha anusāreṇa satām asatām vā padānām nimitta bhāva vyavasthāpanāt aśrūyamāṇa tathāvidha eka deśāt api vākyāt tad artha avagati saṃbhavāt kim śruta arthāpattyā atas eva na sopāna vyavahitam tasya arthasya śābda tva sāksāt eva tad siddheḥ

original: nanu aśrūyamāṇeṣu nimitteṣu kutas tadartham avagacchāmaḥ anavagacchantaś ca kīdṛśaṃ naimittikam avakalpayāmaḥ ucyate śruteṣv api tad eṣu teṣāṃ nimittabhāvo na svamahimnā 'vakalpate kintu naimittikānusāradvāraka ity uktam /
analyzed: nanu aśrūyamāṇeṣu nimitteṣu kutas tad artham avagacchāmaḥ an avagacchantaḥ ca kīdṛśam naimittikam avakalpayāmaḥ ucyate śruteṣu api tat eṣu teṣām nimitta bhāvaḥ na sva mahimnā kintu naimittika anusāra dvārakaḥ iti uktam

original: evam aśruteṣv api bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: evam a śruteṣu api bhaviṣyati

original: na yajau karaṇavibhaktiṃ śṛṇumaḥ na svarge karmavibhaktim nāgnacidādiṣu kvippratyayam nādhunādiṣu prakṛtim na samāsataddhiteṣu yathocitāṃ vibhaktim api ca pratīma eva tadartham //
analyzed: na yajau karaṇa vibhaktim śṛṇumaḥ na svarge karma vibhaktim na agnacit ādiṣu kvip pratyayam na adhunā ādiṣu prakṛtim na samāsa taddhiteṣu yathā ucitām vibhaktim api ca pratīmaḥ eva tad artham

original: evaṃ viśvajidādāv api [yajeta] iti naimittikabalād eva svargakāmādipadārthaṃ pratyeṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: evam viśvajit ādau api yajeta iti naimittika balāt eva svarga kāma ādi padārtham pratyeṣyāmaḥ

original: niyogagarbhatvāc ca viniyogasya liṅgādīni śrutikalpanām antareṇāpi niyogavyāpāraṃ parigṛhya tena vastuni viniyojakatāṃ pratipatsyante //
analyzed: niyoga garbha tvāt ca viniyogasya liṅga ādīni śruti kalpanām antareṇa api niyoga vyāpāram parigṛhya tena vastuni viniyojaka tām pratipatsyante

original: nanv evaṃ sati sarvatra śabdavyāpārasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: nanu evam sati sarvatra śabda vyāpāra saṃbhavāt

original: mukhyasyāpi bhavet sāmyaṃ gauṇalākṣaṇikādibhiḥ //
analyzed: mukhyasya api bhavet sāmyam gauṇa lākṣaṇika ādibhiḥ

original: śrutiliṅgādimānānāṃ virodhe yac ca varṇyate /
analyzed: śruti liṅga ādi mānānām virodhe yat ca varṇyate

original: pūrvapūrvabalīyas tvaṃ tat kathaṃ vā bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: pūrva pūrva balīyaḥ tvam tat katham vā bhaviṣyati

original: ucyate saty api sarvatra śabdavyāpāre tatprakārabhedopapatter eṣa na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: ucyate sati api sarvatra śabda vyāpāre tad prakāra bheda upapatteḥ eṣa na doṣaḥ

original: na hi padānāṃ sarvātmanā nimittabhāvam apahāyaiva naimittikapratītir upaplavate /
analyzed: na hi padānām sarva ātmanā nimitta bhāvam apahāya eva naimittika pratītiḥ upaplavate

original: tadaparityāgāc ca tatsvarūpavaicitryam anuvartata eva //
analyzed: tad aparityāgāt ca tad svarūpa vaicitryam anuvartate eva

original: anyathā siṃhaśabdena matiḥ kesariṇīsute /
analyzed: anyathā siṃha śabdena matiḥ kesariṇīsute

original: anyathā devadattādau pratītir upajanyate //
analyzed: anyathā devadatta ādau pratītiḥ upajanyate

original: gaṅgāyāṃ majjatīty atra gaṅgāśabdo nimittatām /
analyzed: gaṅgāyām majjati iti atra gaṅgā śabdaḥ nimitta tām

original: upayāti yathā naivaṃ ghoṣādivasatau tathā //
analyzed: upayāti yathā nā evam ghoṣādivasatau tathā

original: śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānām api arthasannikarṣaviprakarṣakṛto 'sty eva viśeṣa iti tatrāpi na viniyogasāmyam //
analyzed: śruti liṅga vākya prakaraṇa sthāna samākhyānām api artha sannikarṣa viprakarṣa kṛtaḥ sti eva viśeṣaḥ iti tatra api na viniyoga sāmyam

original: śrutiliṅgādibhir yo 'pi kalpayed viniyojikām /
analyzed: śruti liṅga ādibhiḥ yaḥ kalpayet viniyojikām

original: tasyāpi tasyās tulyatvāt bādhyabādhakatā katham //
analyzed: tasya api tasyāḥ tulya tvāt bādhya bādhaka tā katham

original: atha tatkalpane teṣāṃ vidūrāntikavṛttitā /
analyzed: atha tad kalpane teṣām vidūra antika vṛtti tā

original: sa evārthagato nyāya iti tatkalpanena kim //
analyzed: saḥ eva artha gataḥ nyāyaḥ iti tad kalpanena kim

original: aindrāgnādiṣu vaikṛteṣu karmasu na prākṛtavidhyantavacanānumānam api tu codakavyāpāreṇa tasyaiva prāptiḥ /
analyzed: aindrāgna ādiṣu vaikṛteṣu karmasu na prākṛta vidhi anta vacana anumānam api tu codaka vyāpāreṇa tasya eva prāptiḥ

original: vaikṛtasya vidheḥ kācid ākāṅkṣā codaka ity ucyate //
analyzed: vaikṛtasya vidheḥ kācid ākāṅkṣā codake iti ucyate

original: nanv evam ubhayatra tadavagamāviśeṣāt upadeśātideśayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ na niyogāvagame kaścid viśeṣaḥ kintūpadeśe yathopadeśaṃ kāryam atideśe tu yathākāryam upadeśa ity etayor viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: nanu evam ubhayatra tad avagama aviśeṣāt upadeśa atideśayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ na niyoga avagame kaścid viśeṣaḥ kintu upadeśe yathopadeśam kāryam atideśe tu yathā kāryam upadeśaḥ iti etayoḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: nanu yathākāryam upadeśe 'nupayujyamānakṛṣṇalacarvavaghātādeḥ prāptir eva na bhaved iti ko bādhārthaḥ na akhaṇḍamaṇḍalavidhyantakāṇḍaprāpteḥ /
analyzed: nanu yathākāryam upadeśe nu upayujyamāna kṛṣṇala caru avaghāta ādeḥ prāptiḥ eva na bhavet iti kaḥ bādhā arthaḥ na akhaṇḍa maṇḍala vidhi anta kāṇḍa prāpteḥ

original: na hy aśāṃśikayā codakaḥ pravartata ity alam anayā prasaktānuprasaktyāgataśāstrāntaragarbhakathāvistaraprastāvanayā //
analyzed: na hi codakaḥ pravartate iti alam anayā prasakta anuprasakti āgata śāstra antara garbha kathā vistara prastāvanayā

original: iti prasaṅgād vyākhyātaṃ leśato vākyavin matam /
analyzed: iti prasaṅgāt vyākhyātam leśataḥ vākya vid matam

original: etasya yuktāyuktatvaparicchede tu ke vayam //
analyzed: etasya yukta ayukta tva paricchede tu ke vayam

original: śrutārthāpattir asmākaṃ dūṣaṇīyatayā sthitā /
analyzed: śrutā arthāpattiḥ asmākam dūṣaṇīya tayā sthitā

original: taddūṣaṇaṃ ca pūrvoktavīthyā 'nena pathā 'stu vā //
analyzed: tat dūṣaṇam ca pūrva ukta vīthyāḥ nena pathā stu vā

original: etena śabdasāmarthyamahimnā so 'pi vāritaḥ /
analyzed: etena śabda sāmarthya mahimnā saḥ pi vāritaḥ

original: yam anyaḥ paṇḍitaṃ manyaḥ prapede kaṃcana dhvanim //
analyzed: yam anyaḥ paṇḍitam manyaḥ prapede kaṃcana dhvanim

original: vidher niṣedhāvagatir vidhibuddhir nisedhataḥ /
analyzed: vidheḥ niṣedha avagatiḥ vidhi buddhiḥ

original: yathā bhava dhammiya vīsattho mā sma pāntha gṛhaṃ viśa //
analyzed: yathā bhava dhammiya vīsatthaḥ mā sma pāntha gṛham viśa

original: mānāntaraparicchedyavasturūpopadeśinām /
analyzed: māna antara paricchedya vastu rūpa upadeśinām

original: śabdānām eva sāmarthyaṃ tatra tatra tathā tathā //
analyzed: śabdānām eva sāmarthyam tatra tatra tathā tathā

original: athavā nedṛśī carcā kavibhiḥ saha śobhate /
analyzed: athavā nā īdṛśī carcā kavibhiḥ saha śobhate

original: vidvāṃso 'pi vimuhyanti vākyārthagahane 'dhvani //
analyzed: vidvāṃsaḥ pi vimuhyanti vākya artha gahane dhvani

original: tad alam anayā goṣṭhyā vidvajjanocitayā ciraṃ paramagahanas tarkajñānām abhūmir ayaṃ nayaḥ /
analyzed: tat alam anayā goṣṭhyā vidvas jana ucitayā ciram parama gahanaḥ tarka jñānām abhūmiḥ ayam nayaḥ

original: prakṛtam adhunā tasmāt brūmo na bhāty anumānataḥ tanur api satām arthāpatter viśeṣa iti sthitam //
analyzed: prakṛtam adhunā tasmāt brūmaḥ na bhāti anumānataḥ tanuḥ api satām arthāpatteḥ viśeṣaḥ iti sthitam

original: āha abhāvas tarhi pramāṇāntaram astu satparicchedakaṃ yatra na pramāṇaṃ pravartate /
analyzed: āha abhāvaḥ tarhi pramāṇa āntaram astu sat paricchedakam yatra na pramāṇam pravartate

original: tadabhāvamitau mānaṃ pramāṇābhāva ucyate //
analyzed: tad abhāva mitau mānam pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ucyate

original: iha ghaṭo nāstīti ghaṭaṃ prati sadupalambhakapramāṇapravṛttir nāstīti asau pramāṇābhāvaḥ ghaṭābhāvaṃ paricchinatti //
analyzed: iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti ghaṭam prati sat upalambhaka pramāṇa pravṛttiḥ na asti iti asau pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ghaṭa abhāvam paricchinatti

original: tatra ca ghaṭaviṣayajñātṛvyāpārānutpāda eva dṛśyādarśanavācyaḥ pramāṇaṃ nāstīti buddhiḥ phalam //
analyzed: tatra ca ghaṭa viṣaya jñātṛ vyāpāra anutpādaḥ eva dṛśya adarśana vācyaḥ pramāṇam na asti iti buddhiḥ phalam

original: atha vā ghaṭābhāvagrāhī grāhītṛvyāpāra sadupalambhakapramāṇabhāvajanito nāstīti pratyayasvabhāvaḥ pramāṇam phalaṃ tu hānādijñānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: atha vā ghaṭa abhāva grāhī grāhītṛ vyāpāra sat upalambhaka pramāṇa bhāva janitaḥ na asti iti pratyaya svabhāvaḥ pramāṇam phalam tu hāna ādi jñānam bhaviṣyati

original: tad uktam [pratyakṣāder anutpattiḥ pramāṇābhāva ucyate /
analyzed: tat uktam pratyakṣa ādeḥ anutpattiḥ pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ucyate

original: sā ''tmano 'pariṇāmo vā vijñānaṃ vā 'nyavastuni] iti /
analyzed: sā tmanaḥ pariṇāmaḥ vā vijñānam vā iti

original: anyavastuśabdena ghaṭābhāva evoktaḥ //
analyzed: anya vastu śabdena ghaṭa abhāvaḥ eva uktaḥ

original: tatra tāvad idaṃ nāstīti jñānaṃ na pratyakṣajanitam indriyārthasannikarṣābhāvāt /
analyzed: tatra tāvat idam na asti iti jñānam na pratyakṣa janitam indriya artha sannikarṣa abhāvāt

original: sannikarṣo hi saṃyogasamavāyasvabhāvaḥ tatprabhavabhedo vā saṃyuktasamavāyādir iha nāsty eva /
analyzed: sannikarṣaḥ hi saṃyoga samavāya svabhāvaḥ tad prabhava bhedaḥ vā saṃyukta samavāya ādiḥ iha na asti eva

original: saṃyuktaṃ viśeṣaṇabhāvo 'pi na saṃbhavati kumbhābhāvasya bhūpradeśaviśeṣaṇatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: saṃyuktam viśeṣaṇa bhāvaḥ na saṃbhavati kumbha abhāvasya bhū pradeśa viśeṣaṇa tva abhāvāt

original: na hy asaṃyuktam asamavetaṃ vā kiñcid viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na hi a saṃyuktam a samavetam vā kiñcid viśeṣaṇam bhavati

original: saṃyuktasya daṇḍādeḥ samavetasya śuklaguṇādeḥ tathābhāvadarśanāt /
analyzed: saṃyuktasya daṇḍa ādeḥ samavetasya śukla guṇa ādeḥ tathābhāva darśanāt

original: abhāvaś ca na kenacit saṃyujyate adravyabhāvāt /
analyzed: abhāvaḥ ca na kenacid saṃyujyate a dravya bhāvāt

original: na kvacit samavaiti guṇādivailakṣaṇyād iti //
analyzed: na kvacid samavaiti guṇa ādi vailakṣaṇyāt iti

original: yadi ca saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇabhāvasannikarṣopakṛtaṃ cakṣurabhāvaṃ gṛhṇāti tarhi tadaviśeṣāt saṃyuktadravyavṛttīn rasādīn api gṛhṇīyāt //
analyzed: yadi ca saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa bhāva sannikarṣa upakṛtam cakṣuḥ abhāvam gṛhṇāti tarhi tad aviśeṣāt saṃyukta dravya vṛttīn rasa ādīn api gṛhṇīyāt

original: ayogyatvān na gṛhṇātīti cet tadabhāvam api mā grahīt ayogyatvāviśeṣāt /
analyzed: ayogya tvāt na gṛhṇāti iti ced tad abhāvam api mā grahīt ayogya tva aviśeṣāt

original: yogyāyogyatvakṛtagrahaṇāgrahaṇaniyamavāde vā yogyataiva sannikarṣo bhavatu kiṃ ṣaṭkaghoṣeṇa tasmān na ghaṭābhāvajñānaṃ cākṣuṣam //
analyzed: yogya ayogya tva kṛta grahaṇa agrahaṇa niyama vāde vā yogyatā eva sannikarṣaḥ bhavatu kim ṣaṭka ghoṣeṇa tasmāt na ghaṭa abhāva jñānam cākṣuṣam

original: nanu bhūpradeśaṃ ca ghaṭābhāvaṃ ca viṣphārite cakṣuṣi nirīkṣāmahe nimīlite tu tasmiṃs tayor anyataram api na paśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: nanu bhū pradeśam ca ghaṭa abhāvam ca viṣphārite cakṣuṣi nirīkṣāmahe nimīlite tu tasmin tayoḥ anyataram api na paśyāmaḥ

original: tatra samāne ca tadbhāvabhāvitve bhūpradeśajñānaṃ cākṣuṣam abhāvajñānaṃ tu na cākṣuṣam iti kuto viśeṣam avagacchāmaḥ bāḍham avagacchāmaḥ sannikarṣābhāvād eva /
analyzed: tatra samāne ca tad bhāva bhāvi tve bhū pradeśa jñānam cākṣuṣam abhāva jñānam tu na cākṣuṣam iti kutas viśeṣam avagacchāmaḥ bāḍham avagacchāmaḥ sannikarṣa abhāvāt eva

original: na hy asannikṛṣṭaṃ cakṣuravagatijanmane prabhavati //
analyzed: na hi a sannikṛṣṭam cakṣuḥ avagati janmane prabhavati

original: tadbhāvabhāvitvaṃ tv idam anyathāsiddham vidūradeśavyavasthitasthūlajvālāvalījaṭilajvalanagatabhāsvararūpopalambhānuvartitadgatopṇasparśajñānavat /
analyzed: tad bhāva bhāvi tvam tu idam anyathā asiddham vidūra deśa vyavasthita sthūla jvālā āvalī jaṭila jvalana gata bhāsvara rūpa upalambha anuvarti tad gata upṇa sparśa jñāna vat

original: tatra yathā rūpānumīyamānasparśavedane nayanānvayavyatirekānuvidhānam anyathāsiddham evam ihāpi bhūpradeśopalambhāvinābhāvini kumbhābhāvagrahaṇe tatkṛtam indriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhānam iti na cākṣuṣo ghaṭābhāvapratibhāsaḥ /
analyzed: tatra yathā rūpa anumīyamāna sparśa vedane nayana anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam anyathā asiddham evam iha api bhū pradeśa upalambha avinābhāvini kumbha abhāva grahaṇe tat kṛtam indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam iti na cākṣuṣaḥ ghaṭa abhāva pratibhāsaḥ

original: tad uktam [gṛhītvā vastusadbhāvaṃ smṛtvā ca pratiyoginam /
analyzed: tat uktam gṛhītvā vastu sadbhāvam smṛtvā ca pratiyoginam

original: mānasaṃ nāstitājñānaṃ jāyate 'kṣānapekṣayā] iti //
analyzed: mānasam nāstitā jñānam jāyate kṣā an apekṣayā iti

original: ataś caiva asannihitasyāpi kvacid grahaṇam /
analyzed: atas ca eva asannihitasya api kvacid grahaṇam

original: svarūpamātrakeṇa gauramūlakam upalabdhavataḥ tato deśāntaraṃ gatasya tatra kenacit gargo 'sti vā nāsti vā itipṛṣṭasya sata svarūpamātraṃ gṛhītam /
analyzed: sva rūpa mātrakeṇa gaura mūlakam upalabdhavataḥ tatas deśa antaram gatasya tatra kenacid gargaḥ u sti vā na asti vā iti pṛṣṭasya sataḥ sva rūpa mātram gṛhītam

original: gauramūlakam anusmarataḥ tadānīm asannikṛṣṭe 'pi gargasya bhāve tadaiva tasya jñānam udeti /
analyzed: gauramūlakam anusmarataḥ tadānīm asannikṛṣṭe pi gargasya bhāve tadā eva tasya jñānam udeti

original: tatra indriyakathāpi nāstīti na tasya pratyakṣatvam /
analyzed: tatra indriya kathā api na asti iti na tasya pratyakṣa tvam

original: na cānumānagamyo 'yam abhāvaḥ bhūpradeśasya tadgataghaṭādarśanasya vā liṅgatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca anumāna gamyaḥ yam abhāvaḥ bhū pradeśasya tad gata ghaṭa adarśanasya vā liṅga tva anupapatteḥ

original: na bhūpradeśo liṅgam agṛhītasambandhasyāpi tatpratīteḥ anaikāntikatvāt apakṣadharmatvāt tadadhikaraṇābhāvānantyena sambandhagrahaṇāsaṃbhavāc ca /
analyzed: na bhū pradeśaḥ liṅgam agṛhīta sambandhasya api tad pratīteḥ anaikāntika tvāt apakṣa dharma tvāt tad adhikaraṇa abhāva ānantyena sambandha grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt ca

original: nāpi ghaṭādarśanaṃ liṅgam apakṣadharmatvāt /
analyzed: na api ghaṭa adarśanam liṅgam a pakṣa dharma tvāt

original: ghaṭādarśanaṃ ghaṭasya dharmaḥ na tadabhāvasya /
analyzed: ghaṭa adarśanam ghaṭasya dharmaḥ na tad abhāvasya

original: ghaṭābhāvapratītiṃ prati vyāpriyamāṇatvāt taddharmatvam asyeti cet na itaretarāśrayaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: ghaṭa abhāva pratītim prati vyāpriyamāṇa tvāt tad dharma tvam asya iti ced na itaretara āśraya prasaṅgāt

original: taddharmatve sati liṅgapratītijanakatvaṃ pratītijanmani sato taddharmatvam iti /
analyzed: tad dharma tve sati liṅga pratīti janaka tvam pratīti janmani tad dharma tvam iti

original: asiddhāyāṃ ca ghaṭābhāvapratītau taddharmatājñānam adarśanasya durghaṭam eva /
analyzed: asiddhāyām ca ghaṭa abhāva pratītau tad dharma tā jñānam adarśanasya durghaṭam eva

original: siddhāyāṃ tu kiṃ pakṣadharmatājñānena sādhyapratīteḥ siddhatvāt //
analyzed: siddhāyām tu kim pakṣa dharma tā jñānena sādhya pratīteḥ siddha tvāt

original: api cedam adarśanākhyaṃ liṅgam aviditavyāpti katham abhāvasyānumāpakaṃ bhavet vyāptigrahaṇaṃ ca dhūmāgnivat ubhayadharmigrahaṇapūrvakam /
analyzed: api ca idam adarśana ākhyam liṅgam avidita vyāpti katham abhāvasya anumāpakam bhavet vyāpti grahaṇam ca dhūma agni vat ubhaya dharmi grahaṇa pūrvakam

original: tatra vyāptigrahaṇavelāyām eva tāvat kutastyam abhāvākhyadharmigrahaṇam iti cintyam //
analyzed: tatra vyāpti grahaṇa velāyām eva tāvat kutastyam abhāva ākhya dharmi grahaṇam iti cintyam

original: tata evānumānād iti yady ucyate tad itaretarāśrayam /
analyzed: tatas eva anumānāt iti yadi ucyate tat itaretara āśrayam

original: anumānāntaranibandhane tu tadgrahaṇe 'navasthā //
analyzed: anumāna antara nibandhane tu tad grahaṇe navasthā

original: adarśanākhyaṃ liṅgam api darśanābhāvasvabhāvam iti tatsvarūpaparicchedacintāyām apy ayam eva panthāḥ /
analyzed: adarśana ākhyam liṅgam api darśana abhāva svabhāvam iti tad svarūpa pariccheda cintāyām api ayam eva panthāḥ

original: ato dūram api gatvā tadavagamasiddhaye pramāṇāntaram abhāvaparicchedanipuṇam avagantavyam iti tata eva tadavagamasiddher na tasyānumeyatvam //
analyzed: atas dūram api gatvā tad avagama siddhaye pramāṇa antaram abhāva pariccheda nipuṇam avagantavyam iti tatas eva tad avagama siddheḥ na tasya anumeya tvam

original: na cedaṃ iha ghaṭo nāsti iti jñānaṃ śabdopamānārthāpattyanyatamanimittam āśaṅkitum api yuktam iti sadupalambhakapramāṇātītatvād abhāvasyaiva bhūmir abhāva iti yuktam //
analyzed: na ca idam iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti jñānam śabda upamāna arthāpatti anyatama nimittam āśaṅkitum api yuktam iti sat upalambhaka pramāṇa atīta tvāt abhāvasya eva bhūmiḥ abhāvaḥ iti yuktam

original: api ca prameyaṃ anurūpeṇa pramāṇena pramātumucitam bhāvātmike prameye hi nābhāvasya pramāṇatā /
analyzed: api ca prameyam anurūpeṇa pramāṇena pramātum ucitam bhāva ātmike prameye hi na abhāvasya pramāṇa tā

original: abhāve 'pi prameye syāt na bhāvasya pramāṇatā //
analyzed: abhāve pi prameye syāt na bhāvasya pramāṇa tā

original: na prameyam abhāvākhyaṃ nihnutaṃ bauddhavat tvayā /
analyzed: na prameyam abhāva ākhyam nihnutam bauddha vat tvayā

original: pramāṇam api tenedaṃ abhāvātmakam iṣyatām //
analyzed: pramāṇam api tena idam abhāva ātmakam iṣyatām

original: atrābhidhīyate satyam abhāvaḥ prameyam abhyupagamyate pratyakṣādyavasīyamānasvarūpatvāt tu na pramāṇāntaram ātmaparicchittaye mṛgayate /
analyzed: atra abhidhīyate satyam abhāvaḥ prameyam abhyupagamyate pratyakṣa ādi avasīyamāna svarūpa tvāt tu na pramāṇa antaram ātma paricchittaye mṛgayate

original: adūramedinīdeśavartinas tasya cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: adūra medinī deśa vartinaḥ tasya cakṣuṣā

original: paricchedaḥ parokṣasya kvacin mānāntarair api //
analyzed: paricchedaḥ parokṣasya kvacid māna antaraiḥ api

original: tathā ca [iha ghaṭo nāsti] iti jñānam ekam evedam [iha kuṇḍe dadhi] iti jñānavat ubhayālambanam anuparatanayanavyāpārasya bhavati /
analyzed: tathā ca iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti jñānam ekam eva idam iha kuṇḍe dadhi iti jñāna vat ubhaya ālambanam anuparata nayana vyāpārasya bhavati

original: tatra bhūpradeśamātra eva nayanajaṃ jñānam itaratra pramāṇāntarajanitam iti kutastyo 'yaṃ vibhāgaḥ atrāgnir iti yukto 'yaṃ anakṣajaḥ pratibhāsaḥ /
analyzed: tatra bhū pradeśa mātre eva nayana jam jñānam itaratra pramāṇa antara janitam iti kutastyaḥ yam vibhāgaḥ atra agniḥ iti yuktaḥ yam an akṣa jaḥ pratibhāsaḥ

original: dhūmagrahaṇāntaraṃ avinābhāvasmaraṇādibuddhyantaravyavadhānasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: dhūma grahaṇa antaram avinābhāva smaraṇa ādi buddhi antara vyavadhāna saṃbhavāt

original: iha tu tathā nāsty eva /
analyzed: iha tu tathā na asti eva

original: avyavahitaiva hi bhūpradeśavat ghaṭanāstitā 'vagatir avicchedenānubhūyate /
analyzed: avyavahitā eva hi bhū pradeśa vat ghaṭana astitā vagatiḥ avicchedena anubhūyate

original: na ca kṣitidharādhikaraṇaparokṣāśuśulṣaṇivadanīkṣaṇaviṣayatā bhavaty abhāvasya tadvyāpārānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvāt tatpratīteḥ /
analyzed: na ca kṣitidhara adhikaraṇa parokṣa śuśulṣaṇi vat anīkṣaṇa viṣaya tā bhavati abhāvasya tad vyāpāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt tad pratīteḥ

original: tatra hi vyāpṛtākṣo 'pi na parvatavartinam analam avalokayitum utsahate iha tu ghaṭābhāvam aparimlānanayanavyāpāra eva paśyantīti cākṣuṣam abhāvajñānam tadbhāvabhāvitvānuvidhānāt //
analyzed: tatra hi vyāpṛta akṣaḥ na parvata vartinam analam avalokayitum utsahate iha tu ghaṭa abhāvam a parimlāna nayana vyāpāre eva paśyanti iti cākṣuṣam abhāva jñānam tad bhāva bhāvi tva anuvidhānāt

original: na ca dūrasthitahutavaharūpadarśanapūrvakasparśānumānavad idam anyathāsiddhaṃ tadbhāvabhāvitvam /
analyzed: na ca dūra sthita hutavaha rūpa darśana pūrvaka sparśa anumāna vat idam anyathā asiddham tad bhāva bhāvi tvam

original: tatra hi bahuśaḥ sparśadarśanakauśalaśūnyatvam avadhāritaṃ cakṣuṣaḥ sparśaparicchedi ca kāraṇāntaraṃ tvagindriyam avagatam //
analyzed: tatra hi bahuśas sparśa darśana kauśala śūnya tvam avadhāritam cakṣuṣaḥ sparśa paricchedi ca kāraṇa antaram tvac indriyam avagatam

original: avinābhāvitā ca parā tathāvidhayo rūpasparśayor upalabdhety anumeya evāsau sparśa iti yuktaṃ tatrānyathāsiddhatvaṃ cakṣurvyāpārasya //
analyzed: avinābhāvitā ca parā tathāvidhayoḥ rūpa sparśayoḥ upalabdhā iti anumeyaḥ eva asau sparśaḥ iti yuktam tatra anyathā asiddha tvam cakṣuḥ vyāpārasya

original: prakṛte tu nedṛśaḥ prakāraḥ samasti /
analyzed: prakṛte tu na īdṛśaḥ prakāraḥ samasti

original: na caikatra tadbhāvabhāvitvam anyathāsiddham iti sarvatra tathā kalpyate /
analyzed: na ca ekatra tad bhāva bhāvi tvam anyathā asiddham iti sarvatra tathā kalpyate

original: evaṃ hi rūpam api cākṣuṣatām avajahyāt //
analyzed: evam hi rūpam api cākṣuṣa tām avajahyāt

original: nanu nīrūpasyāsaṃbaddhasya ca cākṣuṣatvam abhāvasya katham abhidhīyate cakṣurjanitajñānavattvād dhi cākṣuṣatvam na rūpavattvena /
analyzed: nanu nīrūpasya asaṃbaddhasya ca cākṣuṣa tvam abhāvasya katham abhidhīyate cakṣuḥ janita jñānavat tvāt dhi cākṣuṣa tvam na rūpavat tvena

original: rūpavatām api paramāṇūnām acākṣuṣatvāt /
analyzed: rūpavatām api paramāṇūnām acākṣuṣa tvāt

original: nīrūpasyāpi rūpasya cākṣuṣatvāc ca //
analyzed: nīrūpasya api rūpasya cākṣuṣa tvāt ca

original: saṃbaddham api na sarvaṃ cākṣuṣam ākāśasya tathātve 'pi tadabhāvāt /
analyzed: saṃbaddham api na sarvam cākṣuṣam ākāśasya tathātve pi tad abhāvāt

original: na tu asambaddhasya cakṣuṣā grahaṇe dūravyavahitasya vibhīṣaṇāder api cākṣuṣatvaprasaṅgaḥ ucyate bhāve khalv ayaṃ niyamaḥ yat asambaddhasya cakṣuṣā 'grahaṇam abhāvas tv asambaddho 'pi cakṣuṣā gṛhīṣyate //
analyzed: na tu asambaddhasya cakṣuṣā grahaṇe dūra vyavahitasya vibhīṣaṇa ādeḥ api cākṣuṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ ucyate bhāve khalu ayam niyamaḥ yat asambaddhasya cakṣuṣā grahaṇam abhāvaḥ tu asambaddhaḥ api cakṣuṣā gṛhīṣyate

original: ṣaṭprakārasannikarṣavarṇanam api bhāvābhiprāyam eva sambaddha hi yat gṛhyate tat ṣaṇṇāṃ sannikarṣāṇām anyatamena sannikarṣeṇeti //
analyzed: ṣaṣ prakāra sannikarṣa varṇanam api bhāva abhiprāyam eva hi yat gṛhyate tat ṣaṇṇām sannikarṣāṇām anyatamena sannikarṣeṇa iti

original: prāpyakāritvam apīndriyāṇāṃ vastvabhiprāyam evocyate /
analyzed: prāpyakāri tvam api indriyāṇām vastu abhiprāyam evā ucyate

original: tasmād avastutvād abhāvasya tena sannikarṣam alabhamānam api nayanam upajanayati tadviṣayam avagaman iti na doṣaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt avastu tvāt abhāvasya tena sannikarṣam alabhamānam api nayanam upajanayati tad viṣayam avagaman iti na doṣaḥ

original: na cāsambaddhatvāviśeṣāt deśāntarādiṣu sarvābhāvagrahaṇam āśaṅkanīyam āśrayagrahaṇasāpekṣatvād abhāvapratītaḥ āśrayasya ca sannihitasyaiva pratyakṣatvāt //
analyzed: na ca asambaddha tva aviśeṣāt deśa antara ādiṣu sarva abhāva grahaṇam āśaṅkanīyam āśraya grahaṇa sāpekṣa tvāt abhāva pratītaḥ āśrayasya ca sannihitasya eva pratyakṣa tvāt

original: atha vā saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇabhāvākhyasannikarṣopakṛtaṃ cakṣurabhāvaṃ grahīṣyati /
analyzed: atha vā saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa bhāva ākhya sannikarṣa upakṛtam cakṣuḥ abhāvam grahīṣyati

original: yathā samavāyapratyakṣatvavādināṃ pakṣe samavāyam iti //
analyzed: yathā samavāya pratyakṣa tva vādinām pakṣe samavāyam iti

original: nanu tad idam asiddham asiddhasya dṛṣṭāntīkriyate maivam bhavatā 'pi dravyaguṇayor vṛtter aparihāryatvāt /
analyzed: nanu tat idam asiddham asiddhasya dṛṣṭāntīkriyate mā evam bhavatā pi dravya guṇayoḥ vṛtteḥ aparihārya tvāt

original: bhedabuddhyā siddhabhedayoḥ asambaddhayoś ca dravyaguṇayor adarśanāt avaśyaṃ kācid vṛttir eṣitavyeti alam arthāntaracintanena //
analyzed: bheda buddhyā siddha bhedayoḥ asambaddhayoḥ ca dravya guṇayoḥ adarśanāt avaśyam kācid vṛttiḥ eṣitavyā iti alam artha antara cintanena

original: yat tūktaṃ saṃyogasamavāyayor abhāvāt abhāvo na bhūpradeśasya viśeṣaṇam iti tad apy asādhu saṃyogasamavāyābhyām anyasyaiva viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvanāmnaḥ sambandhasya adūra eva pratītibalena darśayiṣyamāṇatvāt //
analyzed: yat tu uktam saṃyoga samavāyayoḥ abhāvāt abhāvaḥ na bhū pradeśasya viśeṣaṇam iti tat api asādhu saṃyoga samavāyābhyām anyasya eva viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva nāmnaḥ sambandhasya adūre eva pratīti balena darśayiṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: yas tu saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇabhāve sannikarṣe rasādibhir atiprasaṅga udbhāvitaḥ so 'yaṃ saṃyuktasamavāyākhye cakṣūrūpasannikarṣe 'pi samāno doṣaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ tu saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa bhāve sannikarṣe rasa ādibhiḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ udbhāvitaḥ saḥ yam saṃyukta samavāya ākhye cakṣuḥ rūpa sannikarṣe samānaḥ doṣaḥ

original: saṃyuktasamavāyo 'pi tarhi mā bhūt sannikarṣaḥ kiṃ naśchinnam tat kiṃ asambaddham eva rūpaṃ gṛhṇātu cakṣuḥ na hi saṃyuktasamavāyād anyaḥ cakṣūrūpayoḥ sambandhaḥ //
analyzed: saṃyukta samavāyaḥ u pi tarhi mā bhūt sannikarṣaḥ kim naḥ chinnam tat kim asambaddham eva rūpam gṛhṇātu cakṣuḥ na hi saṃyukta samavāyāt anyaḥ cakṣuḥ rūpayoḥ sambandhaḥ

original: nanu arthagrahaṇātmako vyāpāra eva cakṣuṣaḥ sannikarṣo yogyatā vā /
analyzed: nanu artha grahaṇa ātmakaḥ vyāpāraḥ eva cakṣuṣaḥ sannikarṣaḥ yogyatā vā

original: tadvaśād eva rūpasya tat grāhakam upeyate na ca saṃyuktasamavāyādineti sa tarhi vyāpāraḥ sā vā yogyatā katham abhāvam api prati tasya na syāt /
analyzed: tad vaśāt eva rūpasya tat grāhakam upeyate na ca saṃyukta samavāya ādinā iti sa tarhi vyāpāraḥ sā vā yogyatā katham abhāvam api prati tasya na syāt

original: prāpyakārīṇi cendriyāṇi kārakatvād iṣyante sannikarṣaś ca nihṇūyate iti vipratiṣiddham //
analyzed: prāpya kārīṇi ca indriyāṇi kāraka tvāt iṣyante sannikarṣaḥ ca nihṇūyate iti vipratiṣiddham

original: tasmāt ṣaṭprakārā sannikarṣānugāminī yogyatā vaktavyā na yogyatāmātra eva viśramya sthātavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt ṣaṣ prakārā sannikarṣa anugāminī yogyatā vaktavyā na yogyatā mātre eva viśramya sthātavyam

original: yatra yogyatā tatra sannikarṣo 'py asti na tu yatra sannikarṣaḥ tatrāvaśyaṃ yogyatety evam abhyupagacchatāṃ na rasādyatiprasaṅgacodanā dhunoti manaḥ /
analyzed: yatra yogyatā tatra sannikarṣaḥ api asti na tu yatra sannikarṣaḥ tatra avaśyam yogyatā iti evam abhyupagacchatām na rasa ādi atiprasaṅga codanā dhunoti manaḥ

original: rasādeḥ saty api sannikarṣe yogyatvābhāvād agrahaṇam //
analyzed: rasa ādeḥ sati api sannikarṣe yogya tva abhāvāt agrahaṇam

original: yogyatāmātravāde 'pi nābhāvasyāsty ayogyatā /
analyzed: yogyatā mātra vāde pi nā abhāvasya asti ayogyatā

original: bhavadbhir vastudharmo 'sya ko vā nābhyupagamyate //
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ kaḥ vā na abhyupagamyate

original: sarvopākhyaviyuktatvāt nāsty evety eṣa vocyatām /
analyzed: sarva upākhya viyukta tvāt na asti eva iti eṣa vā ucyatām

original: abhāvaś cākṣuṣajñānaviṣayo vā 'bhyupeyatām //
analyzed: abhāvaḥ cākṣuṣa jñāna viṣayaḥ vā bhyupeyatām

original: yad api [svarūpamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā 'pi paścāt kiñcit smarann api /
analyzed: yat api sva rūpa mātram dṛṣṭvā pi paścāt kiñcid smaran api

original: tatrānyanāstitāṃ pṛṣṭaḥ tadaiva pratipadyate //] ity uktaṃ tad api na yuktam vastvantaraviviktagauramūlakasvarūpagrahaṇasamaya eva tatrāsannihitasakalapadārthābhāvagrahaṇasya mecakabuddhyā siddhatvāt idānīṃ tadgatagargābhāvasmaraṇaṃ na tasya parokṣasyānubhavaḥ //
analyzed: tatra anya nāstitām pṛṣṭaḥ tadā eva pratipadyate iti uktam tat api na yuktam vastu antara vivikta gaura mūlaka sva rūpa grahaṇa samaye eva tatra asannihita sakala padārtha abhāva grahaṇasya mecaka buddhyā siddha tvāt idānīm tad gata garga abhāva smaraṇam na tasya parokṣasya anubhavaḥ

original: tathā hi [tadānīṃ gargas tatra nāsīt] ity evaṃ asau smṛtvā satyavādī vadati idānīm astitvanāstitve prati saṃśeta evāsau gargasya kutaścid āgatasyedānīṃ tatrāstitvasaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: tathā hi tadānīm gargaḥ tatra na āsīt iti evam asau smṛtvā satya vādī vadati idānīm astitva nāstitve prati saṃśete eva asau gargasya kutaścid āgatasya idānīm tatra astitva saṃbhavāt

original: nanu na pūrvaṃ sarvābhāvagrahaṇam anubhūtavān asau gauramūlake iti cet ananubhūyamānam api tad asya balāt kalpyate 'bhyastaviṣaye 'vinābhāvasmaraṇavat /
analyzed: nanu na pūrvam sarva abhāva grahaṇam anubhūtavān asau gauramūlake iti ced ananubhūyamānam api tat asya balāt kalpyate bhyasta viṣaye vinābhāva smaraṇa vat

original: tathā hi tena tenānuyuktaḥ tasya tasyābhāvaṃ smṛtvottaram asau sarvebhya ācaṣṭe //
analyzed: tathā hi tena tena anuyuktaḥ tasya tasya abhāvam smṛtvā uttaram asau sarvebhyaḥ ācaṣṭe

original: nanu mecakabuddhyā sakalābhāvagrahaṇe sahasaiva sakalābhāvasmṛtir upajāyeta maivam yatraiva praśnādismaraṇakāraṇam asya bhavati tad eva smarati na sarvam avidyamānasmaraṇanimittam /
analyzed: nanu mecaka buddhyā sakala abhāva grahaṇe sahasā eva sakala abhāva smṛtiḥ upajāyeta mā evam yatra eva praśna ādi smaraṇa kāraṇam asya bhavati tat eva smarati na sarvam avidyamāna smaraṇa nimittam

original: kramopalabdheṣv api varṇeṣu yugapad antyavarṇānubhavasamanantaraṃ smaraṇam anyatra tu yugapad upalabdhe 'pi krameṇa smaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti na mecakabuddhāv ayaṃ doṣaḥ //
analyzed: krama upalabdheṣu api varṇeṣu yugapad antya varṇa anubhava samanantaram smaraṇam anyatra tu yugapad upalabdhe krameṇa smaraṇam bhaviṣyati iti na mecaka buddhau ayam doṣaḥ

original: kiñ ca svarūpamātraṃ dṛṣṭam iti vadatā bhavatā 'pi mecakajñānam abhyupagatam eva mātragrahaṇena tadanyābhāvagrahaṇasiddheḥ /
analyzed: kim ca svarūpa mātram dṛṣṭam iti vadatā bhavatā mecaka jñānam abhyupagatam eva mātra grahaṇena tad anya abhāva grahaṇa siddheḥ

original: evaṃ hi bhavān evābhyadhāt [ayam eveti yo hy eṣa bhāve bhavati nirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: evam hi bhavān evā abhyadhāt ayam evā iti yaḥ hi eṣa bhāve bhavati nirṇayaḥ

original: naiṣa vastvantarābhāvasaṃvittyanugamād ṛte] iti //
analyzed: na eṣa vastu antara abhāva saṃvitti anugamāt ṛte iti

original: tasmāt gauramūlakāvagamasamaya eva tatrāsannihitasya gargāder abhāvagrahaṇāt nedānīṃ parokṣābhāvagrahaṇam abhāvakāraṇakam abhyupagantavyam iti pratyakṣagamya evāyam abhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt gaura mūlaka avagama samaye eva tatra asannihitasya garga ādeḥ abhāva grahaṇāt na idānīm parokṣa abhāva grahaṇam abhāva kāraṇakam abhyupagantavyam iti pratyakṣa gamyaḥ eva ayam abhāvaḥ

original: yat punar ananumeyatvaṃ [iha ghaṭo nāsti] iti prakṛtābhāvaviṣayam abhyadhāyi tat asmākam abhimatam eva /
analyzed: yat punar ananumeya tvam iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti prakṛta abhāva viṣayam abhyadhāyi tat asmākam abhimatam eva

original: kaścit punar asannikṛṣṭadeśavṛttir anumeyo 'pi bhavaty abhāvaḥ yathā santamase saliladhārāvisarasiktasasya mūlam abhivarṣati deve ghanapavanasaṃyogābhāvo 'numīyate yathā vā arthāpattāv udāhṛtaṃ gṛhābhāvena caitrasya bahirabhāvakalpanam iti //
analyzed: kaścid punar asat nikṛṣṭa deśa vṛttiḥ anumeyaḥ api bhavati abhāvaḥ yathā santamase salila dhārā visara sikta sasya mūlam abhivarṣati deve ghana pavana saṃyoga abhāvaḥ numīyate yathā vā arthāpattau udāhṛtam gṛha abhāvena caitrasya bahis abhāva kalpanam iti

original: āgamād apy abhāvasya kvacid bhavati niścayaḥ /
analyzed: āgamāt api abhāvasya kvacid bhavati niścayaḥ

original: corādināstitājñānaṃ adhvagānām ivāptataḥ //
analyzed: cora ādi nāstitā jñānam adhvagānām iva āptataḥ

original: yat punah anurūpeṇa pramāṇena prameyaṃ pramīyate prameyatvāt bhāvātmakaprameyavad iti etad apy aprayojakaṃ sādhanam //
analyzed: yat punar anurūpeṇa pramāṇena prameyam pramīyate prameya tvāt bhāva ātmaka prameya vat iti etat api aprayojakam sādhanam

original: abhāvaḥ paṭalādīnāṃ pratyakṣasya prapadyate /
analyzed: abhāvaḥ paṭala ādīnām pratyakṣasya prapadyate

original: vipakṣavṛttyabhāvaś ca liṅgasya sahakāritām //
analyzed: vipakṣa vṛtti abhāvaḥ ca liṅgasya sahakāri tām

original: puruṣoktiṣu doṣāṇām abhāvaś copayujyate /
analyzed: puruṣa uktiṣu doṣāṇām abhāvaḥ ca upayujyate

original: sāmagryantargatāt tasmāt abhāvād api bhāvadhīḥ //
analyzed: sāmagrī antargatāt tasmāt abhāvāt api bhāva dhīḥ

original: abhāvaś ca kvacil liṅgam iṣyate bhāvasaṃvidaḥ /
analyzed: abhāvaḥ ca kvacid liṅgam iṣyate bhāva saṃvidaḥ

original: vṛṣṭyabhāvo 'pi vāyvabhrasaṃyogasyānumāpakaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣṭi abhāvaḥ pi vāyu abhra saṃyogasya anumāpakaḥ

original: tasmād yuktam abhāvasya nābhāvenaiva vedanam /
analyzed: tasmāt yuktam abhāvasya na abhāvena eva vedanam

original: na nāma yādṛśo yakṣo balir apy asya tādṛśaḥ //
analyzed: na nāma yādṛśaḥ yakṣaḥ baliḥ api asya tādṛśaḥ

original: atra raktapaṭāḥ prāhuḥ prameye sati cintanam /
analyzed: atra rakta paṭāḥ prāhuḥ prameye sati cintanam

original: yuktaṃ nāma pramāṇasya tad eva tv atidurlabham //
analyzed: yuktam nāma pramāṇasya tat eva tu ati durlabham

original: abhāvo nāma pratīyamāno na tv atantratayā ghaṭādibhāvasvarūpavad anubhūyate api tu deśakālapratiyogiviśiṣṭatvena /
analyzed: abhāvaḥ nāma pratīyamānaḥ na tu atantra tayā ghaṭa ādi bhāva svarūpa vat anubhūyate api tu deśa kāla pratiyogi viśiṣṭa tvena

original: tathā hy evaṃ pratītiḥ [idam idānīm iha nāsti] iti /
analyzed: tathā hi evam pratītiḥ idam idānīm iha na asti iti

original: sa cettham avagamyamāno 'pi yadi taiḥ sambaddha eva bhaved abhāvaḥ ka enaṃ dviṣyāt /
analyzed: sa ca ittham avagamyamānaḥ u pi yadi taiḥ sambaddhaḥ eva bhavet abhāvaḥ kaḥ enam dviṣyāt

original: na tv asay tat saṃbaddhaḥ /
analyzed: na tu asau tat saṃbaddhaḥ

original: na hi deśena kālena pratiyoginā sahāsya kaścit sambandhaḥ saṃyogasamavāyāder anupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na hi deśena kālena pratiyoginā saha asya kaścid sambandhaḥ saṃyoga samavāya ādeḥ anupapatteḥ

original: na ca sambandharahitam eva viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: na ca sambandha rahitam eva viśeṣaṇam bhavati

original: nanu viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva eva sambandhaḥ kiṃ sambandhāntarāpekṣayā maivam sambandhāntaramūlakatvena tadavagamāt /
analyzed: nanu viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ eva sambandhaḥ kim sambandha antara apekṣayā mā evam sambandha antara mūlaka tvena tad avagamāt

original: saṃyuktaṃ samavetaṃvā viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati daṇḍī devadattaḥ nīlam utpalam iti /
analyzed: saṃyuktam samavetam vā viśeṣaṇam bhavati daṇḍī devadattaḥ nīlam utpalam iti

original: ataś ca na vāstavaḥ svatantra eva viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ //
analyzed: atas ca na vāstavaḥ svatantraḥ eva viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ

original: puruṣecchayā viparyasyantam apy enaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: puruṣa icchayā viparyasyantam api enam paśyāmaḥ

original: viśeṣaṇam api viśeṣyībhavati viśeṣyam api viśeṣaṇībhavatīti kālpanika evāyaṃ sambandhaḥ na vastudharmaḥ //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇam api viśeṣyībhavati viśeṣyam api viśeṣaṇībhavati iti kālpanikaḥ eva ayam sambandhaḥ na vastu dharmaḥ

original: pratiyoginā saha natarāmabhāvasya sambandhaḥ asamānakālatvāt /
analyzed: pratiyoginā saha natarām abhāvasya sambandhaḥ asamāna kāla tvāt

original: yadā hi ghaṭaḥ na tadā tadabhāvaḥ yadā vā tadabhāvaḥ na tadā ghaṭa iti //
analyzed: yadā hi ghaṭaḥ na tadā tad abhāvaḥ yadā vā tad abhāvaḥ na tadā ghaṭaḥ iti

original: virodhākhyaḥ sambandho bhaviṣyatīti cet ko virodhārthaḥ yadi hi prāk siddho ghaṭābhāvaḥ āgatya ghaṭaṃ virundhyāt bhaved api tadvirodhī ghaṭamudgarayor iva na tv evam asti tayor asamānakālatvāt /
analyzed: virodha ākhyaḥ sambandhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced kaḥ virodha arthaḥ yadi hi prāk siddhaḥ ghaṭa abhāvaḥ āgatya ghaṭam virundhyāt bhavet api tad virodhī ghaṭa mudgarayoḥ iva na tu evam asti tayoḥ asamāna kāla tvāt

original: abhyupagame vā ghaṭatadabhāvayoḥ ghaṭamudgarayor iva vadhyaghātukayoḥ sāhacaryam anubhūyeta /
analyzed: abhyupagame vā ghaṭa tad abhāvayoḥ ghaṭa mudgarayoḥ iva vadhya ghātukayoḥ sāhacaryam anubhūyeta

original: ghaṭābhāvaḥ kiṃ kurvan ghaṭaṃ virundhyāt akiñcitkarasya virodhitve 'tiprasaktiḥ /
analyzed: ghaṭa abhāvaḥ kim kurvan ghaṭam virundhyāt akiñcitkarasya virodhi tve ti prasaktiḥ

original: abhāvāntarakaraṇe tv anavasthā /
analyzed: abhāva antara karaṇe tu anavasthā

original: mudgarādayo ghaṭābhāvasya hetavo na bhavitum arhanti bhāvasya svata eva bhaṅguratvena vināśahetvanapekṣatvāt //
analyzed: mudgara ādayaḥ ghaṭa abhāvasya hetavaḥ na bhavitum arhanti bhāvasya svatas eva bhaṅgura tvena vināśa hetu anapekṣa tvāt

original: bhāvo vinaśvarātmā cet kṛtaṃ pralayahetubhiḥ /
analyzed: bhāvaḥ vinaśvara ātmā ced kṛtam pralaya hetubhiḥ

original: arthāpy anaśvarātmā cet kṛtaṃ pralayahetubhiḥ //
analyzed: arthā api anaśvara ātmā ced kṛtam pralaya hetubhiḥ

original: tasmād vijātīyakapālādisantatijanana eva mudgarādikārakavyāpāraḥ sāmagryantarānupraveśe sati santatyanarotpādaḥ na punar abhāvasya tato niṣpattiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt vijātīya kapāla ādi santati jananaḥ eva mudgara ādi kāraka vyāpāraḥ sāmagrī antara anupraveśe sati santati anara utpādaḥ na punar abhāvasya tatas niṣpattiḥ

original: sa hi ghaṭāt vastvantaraṃ cet kim āyātam yad asau na pūrvavad upalabhyate /
analyzed: sa hi ghaṭāt vastu antaram ced kim āyātam yat asau na pūrvavat upalabhyate

original: tadvirodhitvād iti cet pratyuktam etat /
analyzed: tad virodhi tvāt iti ced pratyuktam etat

original: anarthāntaratve tu ghaṭasyaiva mudgarakāryatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: anartha antara tve tu ghaṭasya eva mudgara kārya tvam syāt

original: nanu yāni mudgareṇa kapālāni janyante sa eva ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
analyzed: nanu yāni mudgareṇa kapālāni janyante saḥ eva ghaṭa abhāvaḥ

original: hanta tarhi kapālāsphoṭane sati ghaṭābhāvasya vinaṣṭatvāt ghaṭasyonmajjanaṃ prāpnoti //
analyzed: hanta tarhi kapāla āsphoṭane sati ghaṭa abhāvasya vinaṣṭa tvāt ghaṭasya unmajjanam prāpnoti

original: kiñca akiñcitkarāṇi kapālāni ghaṭasyābhāva iti yady ucyate paṭasyāpi tathocyeran /
analyzed: kiñca akiñcitkarāṇi kapālāni ghaṭasya abhāvaḥ iti yadi ucyate paṭasya api tathā ucyeran

original: kiñcitkārakatvaṃ teṣāṃ pūrvavat pratikṣeptavyam //
analyzed: kiñcid kāraka tvam teṣām pūrvavat pratikṣeptavyam

original: api cāyam abhāvo bhavanadharmā vā syāt abhavanadharmā vā bhavanadharmatve bhāvo 'sau bhavet ghaṭādivat /
analyzed: api ca ayam abhāvaḥ bhavana dharmā vā syāt a bhavana dharmā vā bhavana dharma tve bhāvaḥ sau bhavet ghaṭa ādi vat

original: abhavanadharmā tu yady abhāvo 'sti sa nitya evāsau tarhi bhavet //
analyzed: abhavana dharmā tu yadi abhāvaḥ sti sa nityaḥ evā asau tarhi bhavet

original: sa cāyam ekapadārthasambandhī vā syāt sarvapadārthasambandhī vā tatra ekabhāvasambandhitve na tasya nityam akāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ayam eka padārtha sambandhī vā syāt sarva padārtha sambandhī vā tatra eka bhāva sambandhi tve na tasya nityam akāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ

original: sarvabhāvasambandhitve tu sarvapadārthapratikūlasyābhāvasya nityatvāt nityasannihitatvāt sakṛd eva trailokyalopaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: sarva bhāva sambandhi tve tu sarva padārtha pratikūlasya abhāvasya nitya tvāt nitya sannihita tvāt sakṛt eva trailokya lopa prasaṅgaḥ

original: tasmāt na nityo 'nityo vā kaścid abhāvo nāmāsti //
analyzed: tasmāt na nityaḥ nityaḥ vā kaścid abhāvaḥ nāma asti

original: nanu abhāvānabhyupagame bhāvānām itaretarasaṅkarāt akhilavyavahāraviplavaḥ prāpnoti /
analyzed: nanu abhāva anabhyupagame bhāvānām itaretara saṅkarāt akhila vyavahāra viplavaḥ prāpnoti

original: yad āha [kṣīre dadhi bhaved evaṃ dadhni kṣīraṃ ghaṭe paṭaḥ /
analyzed: yat āha kṣīre dadhi bhavet evam dadhni kṣīram ghaṭe paṭaḥ

original: śaśe śṛṅgaṃ pṛthivyādau caitanyaṃ mūrtir ātmani //] iti //
analyzed: śaśe śṛṅgam pṛthivī ādau caitanyam mūrtiḥ ātmani iti

original: abhāvābhyupagame tu bhāvānām itaretarābhāvāt asaṅkīrṇatā setsyati tad etad asādhu svata eva bhāvānām asaṅkīrṇasvabhāvatvāt //
analyzed: abhāva abhyupagame tu bhāvānām itaretara abhāvāt asaṅkīrṇa tā setsyati tat etat asādhu svatas eva bhāvānām asaṅkīrṇa svabhāva tvāt

original: abhāvakāraṇakasaṅkaraparihārakathane tu sutarāṃ viplavaḥ bhāvo bhāvād ivānyasmāt abhāvāṃśād api dhruvam /
analyzed: abhāva kāraṇaka saṅkara parihāra kathane tu sutarām viplavaḥ bhāvaḥ bhāvāt iva anyasmāt abhāva aṃśāt api dhruvam

original: asaṅkīrṇo 'bhypetavyaḥ sa kathaṃ vā bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: a saṅkīrṇaḥ bhypetavyaḥ sa katham vā bhaviṣyati

original: anyonyam apy abhāvānāṃ yady asaṅkīrṇatā svataḥ /
analyzed: anyonyam api abhāvānām yadi asaṅkīrṇa tā svatas

original: bhāvaiḥ kim aparāddhaṃ vaḥ parataś cet kuto nu sā //
analyzed: bhāvaiḥ kim aparāddham vaḥ paratas ced kutas nu sā

original: bhāvebhyo yady upeyeta bhaved anyonyasaṃśrayam /
analyzed: bhāvebhyaḥ yadi upeyeta bhavet anyonya saṃśrayam

original: abhāvāntarajanyā cet anavasthā duruttarā //
abhāvasvabhāvatāyāś ca sarvān praty aviśeṣāt pratiṣedhyanibandhana eva tadbhedaḥ /
analyzed: abhāva svabhāva tāyāḥ ca sarvān prati aviśeṣāt pratiṣedhya nibandhanaḥ eva tad bhedaḥ

original: pratiṣedhyāś ca bhāvāḥ paraspareṇa bhidyamānas taṃ bhindantīti praty uta bhāvādhīnam abhāvānām asāṅkaryaṃ vaktum ucitam na tu viparyayo yuktaḥ /
analyzed: pratiṣedhyāḥ ca bhāvāḥ paraspareṇa bhidyamānaḥ tam bhindanti iti prati uta bhāva adhīnam abhāvānām asāṅkaryam vaktum ucitam na tu viparyayaḥ yuktaḥ

original: tat akhilapadārthavyavasthāvisaṃṣṭhulībhāvabhayād api nābhāvābhyupagamo yuktaḥ //
analyzed: tat akhila padārtha vyavasthā visaṃṣṭhulībhāva bhayāt api na abhāva abhyupagamaḥ yuktaḥ

original: nanv abhāvapratikṣepe nañaḥ kiṃ vācyaṃ ucyatām /
analyzed: nanu abhāva pratikṣepe nañaḥ kim vācyam ucyatām

original: naiva śabdānusāreṇa vācyasthitir upeyate //
analyzed: nā eva śabda anusāreṇa vācya sthitiḥ upeyate

original: bauddhāḥ khalu vayaṃ loke sarvatra khyātakīrtayaḥ /
analyzed: bauddhāḥ khalu vayam loke sarvatra khyāta kīrtayaḥ

original: vikalpamātraśabdārthaparikalpanapaṇḍitāḥ //
analyzed: vikalpa mātra śabda artha parikalpana paṇḍitāḥ

original: kvacin nāmapadaprāptavṛttinā janyate nañā /
analyzed: kvacid nāma pada prāpta vṛttinā janyate nañā

original: niṣedhaparyudastānyaviṣayollekhinī matiḥ //
kvacit tv ākhyātasambandham upetya vidadhāty asau /
analyzed: kvacid tu ākhyāta sambandham upetya vidadhāti asau

original: tadupāttikriyā ''raṃbhanivṛttyullekhamātrakam //
analyzed: tad upātti kriyā raṃbha nivṛtti ullekha mātrakam

original: nanu cānena mārgeṇa yady abhāvo nirasyate /
analyzed: nanu ca anena mārgeṇa yadi abhāvaḥ nirasyate

original: ekādaśaprakāraiṣā 'nupalabdhiḥ kva gacchatu //
analyzed: ekādaśa prakārā eṣā nupalabdhiḥ kva gacchatu

original: svabhāvānupalabdhir yathā neha ghaṭaḥ anupalabdheḥ iti //
analyzed: svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ yathā na iha ghaṭaḥ anupalabdheḥ iti

original: kāraṇānupalabdhir yathā nātra dhūmaḥ dahanānupalabdheḥ iti //
analyzed: kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ yathā na atra dhūmaḥ dahana anupalabdheḥ iti

original: vyāpakānupalabdhir yathā nātra śiṃśapā vṛkṣānupalabdeḥ iti //
analyzed: vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śiṃśapā vṛkṣa anupalabdeḥ iti

original: kāryānupalabdhir yathā nātra nirapavādā dhūmahetavaḥ santi dhūmānupalabdheḥ iti //
analyzed: kārya anupalabdhiḥ yathā na atra nirapavādāḥ dhūma hetavaḥ santi dhūma anupalabdheḥ iti

original: svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhir yathā nātra śītasparśaḥ pāvakopalabdheḥ iti //
analyzed: svabhāva viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śīta sparśaḥ pāvaka upalabdheḥ iti

original: svabhāvaviruddhakāryopalabdhir yathā nātra śītasparśaḥ dhūmopalabdheḥ iti //
analyzed: svabhāva viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śīta sparśaḥ dhūma upalabdheḥ iti

original: viruddhavyāptopalabdhir yathā na dhruvabhāvī bhūtasyāpi bhāvasya vināśaḥ hetvantarāpekṣaṇāt iti //
analyzed: viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ yathā na dhruva bhāvī bhūtasya api bhāvasya vināśaḥ hetu antara apekṣaṇāt iti

original: kāryaviruddhopalabdhir yathā nātra śītakāraṇam apratibaddhasāmarthyam asti jvalanopalabdheḥ iti //
analyzed: kārya viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śīta kāraṇam apratibaddha sāmarthyam asti jvalana upalabdheḥ iti

original: vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhir yathā nātra tuhinasparśaḥ kṛśānudarśanāt iti //
analyzed: vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra tuhina sparśaḥ kṛśānu darśanāt iti

original: kāraṇaviruddhopalabdhir yathā naitasya romaharṣadantavīṇādiviśeṣāḥ santi sannihitahutavahaviśeṣāt iti //
analyzed: kāraṇa viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na etasya roma harṣa danta vīṇā ādi viśeṣāḥ santi sannihita hutavaha viśeṣāt iti

original: kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhir yathā pravṛttadantavīṇādiviśeṣapuruṣādhiṣṭhita eṣa deśo na bhavati dhūmavattvāt iti //
analyzed: kāraṇa viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ yathā pravṛtta danta vīṇā ādi viśeṣa puruṣa dhiṣṭhitaḥ eṣa deśaḥ na bhavati dhūmavat tvāt iti

original: satyam ekādaśavidhā 'nupalabdhir iheṣyate /
analyzed: satyam ekādaśavidhā n upalabdhiḥ iha iṣyate

original: sā tv asadvyavahārasya hetuḥ nābhāvasaṃvidaḥ //
analyzed: sā tu asat vyavahārasya hetuḥ na abhāva saṃvidaḥ

original: nanu anupalabdheḥ svabhāvahetāv antarbhāva uktaḥ svabhāvahetau ca sādhyasādhanayor avyatireka iṣyate /
analyzed: nanu anupalabdheḥ svabhāva hetau antarbhāvaḥ uktaḥ svabhāva hetau ca sādhya sādhanayoḥ avyatirekaḥ iṣyate

original: asadvyavahāraś ca jñānābhidhānātmakatvāt tata eva pṛthag iti kathaṃ tadviṣayatāṃ yāyāt satyam evam kin tu nāsadvyavahāras tayā sādhyate api tu tadyogyatā /
analyzed: asat vyavahāraḥ ca jñāna abhidhāna ātmaka tvāt tatas eva pṛthak iti katham tad viṣaya tām yāyāt satyam evam kin tu na asat vyavahāraḥ tayā sādhyate api tu tad yogyatā

original: yogyatā ca na tato 'rthāntaram iti na svabhāvahetutvahāniḥ //
analyzed: yogyatā ca na tatas ṛtha antaram iti na svabhāva hetu tva hāniḥ

original: nanu yogyatā bhāvātmikā anupalabdhis tv abhāvasvabhāveti katham anarthāntaratvam naitad evam na hy upalabdhipratiṣedhātmikām abhāvasvabhāvām anupalabdhim anupalabdhivido vadanti kintu pratiṣedhaparyudastavastvantaropalabdhim evārthābhāvasvabhāvām iti //
analyzed: nanu yogyatā bhāva ātmikā anupalabdhiḥ tu abhāva svabhāvā iti katham anartha antara tvam na etat evam na hi upalabdhi pratiṣedha ātmikām abhāva svabhāvām anupalabdhim anupalabdhi vidaḥ vadanti kintu pratiṣedha paryudasta vastu antara upalabdhim eva artha abhāva svabhāvām iti

original: ata evedam api na codyam anupalabdher abhāvātmakatvāt anupalabdhyantaraparicchedyatvād anavastheti yasmāt vastvantaropalaṃbhātmikā 'nupalabdhiḥ svasaṃvedyaiveti //
analyzed: atas eva idam api na codyam anupalabdheḥ abhāva ātmaka tvāt anupalabdhi antara paricchedya tvāt anavasthā iti yasmāt vastu antara upalaṃbha ātmikā nupalabdhiḥ sva saṃvedyā eva iti

original: nanu anupalabdheḥ asadvyavahārasiddhau adṛśyasyāpi tathātvaṃ siddhyet na dṛśyatvaviśeṣaṇopādānād upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdher asadvyavahāraḥ na yasya kasyacid iti /
analyzed: nanu anupalabdheḥ asat vyavahāra siddhau adṛśyasya api tathātvam siddhyet na dṛśya tva viśeṣaṇa upādānāt upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdheḥ asat vyavahāraḥ na yasya kasyacid iti

original: tatra ghaṭādeḥ pūrvadṛṣṭasya dṛśyatvapariniścayāt /
analyzed: tatra ghaṭa ādeḥ pūrva dṛṣṭasya dṛśya tva pariniścayāt

original: asattvavyavahāro hi siddhyaty anupalabdhitaḥ //
analyzed: asattva vyavahāraḥ hi siddhi ati anupalabdhitaḥ

original: ekāntānupalabdheṣu vihāyaḥ kusumādiṣu /
analyzed: ekānta anupalabdheṣu vihāyaḥ kusuma ādiṣu

original: dṛśyatvayogyatāyogāt asattvapariniścayaḥ //
analyzed: dṛśya tva yogya tā yogāt asattva pariniścayaḥ

original: piśācādes tu dṛśyatvaniścayo 'navadhāraṇāt /
analyzed: piśāca ādeḥ tu dṛśya tva niścayaḥ nava dhāraṇāt

original: na śakyo 'nupalambhena kartuṃ nāstitvaniścayaḥ //
analyzed: na śakyaḥ nupalambhena kartum nāstitva niścayaḥ

original: tatrāpi tv apiśāco 'yaṃ caitra ity evamādiṣu /
analyzed: tatra api tu a piśācaḥ yam caitraḥ iti evamādiṣu

original: tādātmyapratiṣedheṣu dṛśyatvaṃ nopayujyate //
analyzed: tādātmya pratiṣedheṣu dṛśya tvam nā upayujyate

original: piśācetararūpo hi caitraḥ pratyakṣagocaraḥ /
analyzed: piśāca itara rūpaḥ hi caitraḥ pratyakṣa gocaraḥ

original: tādrūpyaniścaye tasya kiṃ phalaṃ tadviśeṣaṇam //
