analyzed: tādrūpya niścaye tasya kim phalam tad viśeṣaṇam

original: ity asadvyavahārasya siddher anupalabdhitaḥ /
analyzed: iti asat vyavahārasya siddheḥ anupalabdhitaḥ

original: na bhāvavad abhāvākhyaṃ prameyam avakalpate //
analyzed: na bhāva vat abhāva ākhyam prameyam avakalpate

original: atrābhidhīyate idaṃ tāvat sakalaprāṇisākṣikaṃ saṃvedanadvayam upajāyamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ [iha ghaṭo 'sti] [iha nāsti] iti /
analyzed: atra abhidhīyate idam tāvat sakala prāṇi sākṣikam saṃvedana dvayam upajāyamānam dṛṣṭam iha ghaṭaḥ sti iha na asti iti

original: tatra vikalpamātrasaṃvedanam anālambanam ātmāṃśāvalambanaṃ vā ityādi yad abhilapyate tat nāstitājñāna iva astitājñāne 'pi samānam /
analyzed: tatra vikalpa mātra saṃvedanam anālambanam ātma aṃśa avalambanam vā ityādi yat abhilapyate tat nāstitā jñāne iva astitā jñāne samānam

original: ato dvayor api prāmāṇyaṃ bhavatu dvayor api vā mā bhūt /
analyzed: atas dvayoḥ api prāmāṇyam bhavatu dvayoḥ api vā mā bhūt

original: yat tu astīti jñānaṃ pramāṇam itarattvapramāṇam iti kathyate tad icchāmātram /
analyzed: yat tu asti iti jñānam pramāṇam itarat tva pramāṇam iti kathyate tat icchā mātram

original: astītijñānasamānayogakṣematve ca nāstītijñānasya viṣayaś cintanīyaḥ //
analyzed: asti iti jñāna samāna yogakṣema tve ca na asti iti jñānasya viṣayaḥ cintanīyaḥ

original: nanu ghaṭaviviktabhūtalopalambhabhāve ghaṭānupalambha ity uktam tad ayuktam keyaṃ ghaṭaviviktatā sā bhūpradeśād abhinnā bhinnā vā abhede bhūpradeśāviśeṣāt ghaṭasannidhāne 'pi [ghaṭo nāsti] iti pratipattir jāyeta /
analyzed: nanu ghaṭa vivikta bhū tala upalambha bhāve ghaṭa anupalambhaḥ iti uktam tat ayuktam kā iyam ghaṭa vivikta tā sā bhū pradeśāt abhinnā bhinnā vā abhede bhū pradeśa aviśeṣāt ghaṭa sannidhāne pi ghaṭaḥ na asti iti pratipattiḥ jāyeta

original: bhede 'pi nāmni vivādaḥ syāt //
analyzed: bhede pi nāmni vivādaḥ syāt

original: bhedābhedena cintyā ca ghaṭād api viviktatā /
analyzed: bheda abhedena cintyā ca ghaṭāt api vivikta tā

original: abhede ghaṭa eva syāt bhede cābhāva eva sā //
analyzed: abhede ghaṭaḥ eva syāt bhede ca abhāvaḥ eva sā

original: tat [iha ghaṭo nāsti] iti ghaṭaviviktabhūtalālambanatāyām asyāḥ saṃvidaḥ [iha] iti tāvad asmin saṃvidaṃśe deśa ālambanam ity avivāda eva [iha ghaṭo 'sti] iti bhāvapratītisamaye 'pi tatra tadavabhāsābhyupagamāt /
analyzed: tat iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti ghaṭa vivikta bhū tala ālambana tāyām asyāḥ saṃvidaḥ iha iti tāvat asmin saṃvid aṃśe deśaḥ ālambanam iti avivādaḥ eva iha ghaṭaḥ sti iti bhāva pratīti samaye tatra tad avabhāsa abhyupagamāt

original: [ghaṭo nāsti] ity atra tu yad avabhāsate tat na bhūtalamātram eva bhāvapratītisamayavat tadatiriktapratibhāsasyāvaśyabhāvitvāt /
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ na asti iti atra tu yat avabhāsate tat na bhū tala mātram eva bhāva pratīti samaya vat tad atirikta pratibhāsasya avaśya bhāvi tvāt

original: tadatiriktaṃ tu pratibhāsamānaṃ ghaṭaviviktateti vā kathyatāṃ ghaṭābhāva iti vā nātra vastuni viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: tad atiriktam tu pratibhāsamānam ghaṭa vivikta tā iti vā kathyatām ghaṭa abhāvaḥ iti vā na atra vastuni viśeṣaḥ

original: nanu [ghaṭo nāsti] iti vikalpamātram etat na darśanānantarapravṛttatvena vidhivikalpatulyatvāt //
analyzed: nanu ghaṭaḥ na asti iti vikalpa mātram etat na darśana anantara pravṛtta tvena vidhi vikalpa tulya tvāt

original: yathā 'nubhavam utpattum arhanti kila kalpanāḥ /
analyzed: yathā nubhavam utpattum arhanti kila kalpanāḥ

original: pratiṣedhavikalpas tu na vidhyanubhavocitaḥ //
analyzed: pratiṣedha vikalpaḥ tu na vidhi anubhava ucitaḥ

original: nanu naiva vikalpānāṃ vayaṃ prāmāṇyavādinaḥ /
analyzed: nanu nā eva vikalpānām vayam prāmāṇya vādinaḥ

original: kāmaṃ vidhivikalpānām api mā bhūt pramāṇatā //
analyzed: kāmam vidhi vikalpānām api mā bhūt pramāṇa tā

original: prāmāṇyaṃ darśanānāṃ cet tv avikalpānusārataḥ /
analyzed: prāmāṇyam darśanānām ced tu avikalpa anusārataḥ

original: ihāpi teṣām evāsti tv avikalpānusārataḥ //
analyzed: iha api teṣām evā asti tu avikalpa anusārataḥ

original: vastuprāptyā vidhivikalpānāṃ pramāṇavyavahāra iti cet ihāpi tatprāptyaiva niṣedhavikalpānām astu prāmāṇyavyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: vastu prāptyā vidhi vikalpānām pramāṇa vyavahāraḥ iti ced iha api tad prāptyā eva niṣedha vikalpānām astu prāmāṇya vyavahāraḥ

original: kim atra vastu prāpyata iti cet tatrāpi kiṃ prāpyate nīlam iti cet seyam abhāvasyāpi prāptir bhavaty eva /
analyzed: kim atra vastu prāpyate iti ced tatra api kim prāpyate nīlam iti ced sā iyam abhāvasya api prāptiḥ bhavati eva

original: nīlaṃ hi prāpyamāṇaṃ tadabhāvāvinābhūtapītādivyavacchinnarūpaṃ prāpyate /
analyzed: nīlam hi prāpyamāṇam tad abhāva avinābhūta pīta ādi vyavacchinna rūpam prāpyate

original: sā ceyaṃ tathābhūtanīlaprāptir bhavantī itarābhāvaprāptir api bhavati anyathā hi nīlaprāptir eva na syād iti /
analyzed: sā ca iyam tathābhūta nīla prāptiḥ bhavantī itara abhāva prāptiḥ api bhavati anyathā hi nīla prāptiḥ eva na syāt iti

original: etac ca lākṣaṇikaṃ virodham ācakṣāṇair bhavadbhir evopagatam //
analyzed: etat ca lākṣaṇikam virodham ācakṣāṇaiḥ bhavadbhiḥ eva upagatam

original: sukhaduḥkhasamutpattir abhāve śatrumitrayoḥ /
analyzed: sukha duḥkha samutpattiḥ abhāve śatru mitrayoḥ

original: kaṇṭakābhāvam ālakṣya padaṃ pathi nidhīyate //
analyzed: kaṇṭaka abhāvam ālakṣya padam pathi nidhīyate

original: prāgutpatter ghaṭābhāvaṃ buddhvā tatkāraṇādaraḥ /
analyzed: prāk utpatteḥ ghaṭa abhāvam buddhvā tad kāraṇa ādaraḥ

original: vyādhyabhāvaparicchedāt bhaiṣajyavinivartanam //
analyzed: vyādhi abhāva paricchedāt bhaiṣajya vinivartanam

original: ihābhāvapratiṣṭhānavyavahāraparamparām /
analyzed: iha abhāva pratiṣṭhāna vyavahāra paramparām

original: paśyan abhāvaṃ ko nāma nihṇuvīta sacetanaḥ //
analyzed: paśyan abhāvam kaḥ nāma nihṇuvīta sa cetanaḥ

original: nanu nājanakam ālambanaṃ bhavati jñānasya /
analyzed: nanu na ajanakam ālambanam bhavati jñānasya

original: abhāvas tu sakalopākhyavinirmuktasvarūpa iti na jñānajananapaṭuḥ /
analyzed: abhāvaḥ tu sakala upākhya vinirmukta svarūpaḥ iti na jñāna janana paṭuḥ

original: ataḥ kathaṃ tadālambanam ucyate saugatānāṃ tāvat na kiñcijjanakaṃ vastu pratibhāsate /
analyzed: atas katham tat ālambanam ucyate saugatānām tāvat na kiñcid janakam vastu pratibhāsate

original: dvitrikṣaṇāvasthitiprasaṅgena kṣaṇabhaṅgavratavilopaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: dvi tri kṣaṇa avasthiti prasaṅgena kṣaṇabhaṅga vrata vilopa prasaṅgāt

original: utpadyate ca arthajñānaṃ ca janayati jātena tena gṛhyate ca ity āsāṃ kriyāṇām ekakālatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: utpadyate ca artha jñānam ca janayati jātena tena gṛhyate ca iti āsām kriyāṇām eka kāla tva abhāvāt

original: tasmāt akāraka eva bhāvaḥ pratibhāsate //
analyzed: tasmāt akārakaḥ eva bhāvaḥ pratibhāsate

original: ākārārpaṇapakṣaṃ ca pratikṣepsyāmaḥ /
analyzed: ākāra arpaṇa pakṣam ca pratikṣepsyāmaḥ

original: evaṃ bhāvavad abhāvo 'py ajanakaḥ pratibhāsatām //
analyzed: evam bhāva vat abhāvaḥ pi ajanakaḥ pratibhāsa tām

original: asmābhis tu bhāvavad abhāvo 'pi jñānajananasamartha iṣyate /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ tu bhāva vat abhāvaḥ jñāna janana samarthaḥ iṣyate

original: na hi niśśeṣasāmarthyarahitatvam abhāvalakṣaṇam api tu nāstītijñānagamyatvam /
analyzed: na hi niśśeṣa sāmarthya rahita tvam abhāva lakṣaṇam api tu

original: satpratyayagamyo hi bhāva iṣyate asatpratyayagamyas tv abhāva iti /
analyzed: sat pratyaya gamyaḥ hi bhāvaḥ iṣyate asat pratyaya gamyaḥ tu abhāvaḥ iti

original: tad idam uktam [sadasatī tattvam] iti //
analyzed: tat idam uktam sat asatī tattvam iti

original: nanu bhāvavad eṣa jñānajanakas san abhāvo na bhāvād viśiṣyate /
analyzed: nanu bhāva vat eṣa jñāna janakaḥ san abhāvaḥ na bhāvāt viśiṣyate

original: aho nipuṇadaśīṃ devānāṃpriyaḥ pratītibhedaś cāsti na ca pratīyamānau bhāvābhāvau bhidyate iti katham evaṃ bhavet api re mūḍha jñānajanakatvāviśeṣe 'pi rūparasau kathaṃ bhidyete pratītibhedād iti cet bhāvābhāvāv api janakatvadharmasāmānye 'pi pratītibhedād eva bhidyeyātām /
analyzed: aho nipuṇa daśīm devānāṃpriyaḥ pratīti bhedaḥ ca asti na ca pratīyamānau bhāva abhāvau bhidyate iti katham evam bhavet api re mūḍha jñāna janaka tva aviśeṣe pi rūpa rasau katham bhidyete pratīti bhedāt iti ced bhāva abhāvau api janaka tva dharma sāmānye pi pratīti bhedāt eva bhidyeyātām

original: na hi pratibhāsyabhedam antareṇa pratibhāsabhedo bhavatīti bhavatā 'py abhyupagatam /
analyzed: na hi pratibhāsya bhedam antareṇa pratibhāsa bhedaḥ bhavati iti bhavatā pi abhyupagatam

original: yathoktam prāmāṇyaṃ vastuviṣayaṃ dvayor arthabhidāṃ jagau /
analyzed: yathā uktam prāmāṇyam vastu viṣayam dvayoḥ artha bhidām jagau

original: pratibhāsasya citratvāt ekasmiṃs tadayogataḥ //
analyzed: pratibhāsasya citra tvāt ekasmin tad ayogataḥ

original: iti //
analyzed: iti

original: tasmāt [asti] iti pratītir iva bhāvaḥ [nāsti] iti pratīter abhāvo bhūmir ity abhyupagamyatām //
analyzed: tasmāt asti iti pratītiḥ iva bhāvaḥ na asti iti pratīteḥ abhāvaḥ bhūmiḥ iti abhyupagamyatām

original: atha vā vijñānavāda eva suspaṣṭam āsthīyatām antarāvasthānaṃ tu na sāṃpratam /
analyzed: atha vā vijñāna vādaḥ eva su spaṣṭam āsthīyatām antara avasthānam tu na sāṃpratam

original: arthakriyāsāmarthyam api tasya darśitam eva //
analyzed: artha kriyā sāmarthyam api tasya darśitam eva

original: svajñānākhyakriyāśaktir amuṣya durapahnavā /
analyzed: sva jñāna ākhya kriyā śaktiḥ amuṣya durapahnavā

original: arthakriyā 'nyajanyā tu na bhāvenāpi janyate //
analyzed: arthakriyā nya janyā tu na bhāvena api janyate

original: evaṃ ca sati yaḥ pūrvaṃ śaktivādo 'tra varṇitaḥ /
analyzed: evam ca sati yaḥ pūrvam varṇitaḥ

original: sa pratyakṣaviruddhatvāt kaṇṭhaśoṣāya kevalam //
analyzed: sa pratyakṣa viruddha tvāt kaṇṭha śoṣāya kevalam

original: tathā sambandhābhāvād iti yad uktam tatra deśena saha tāvat abhāvasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: tathā sambandha abhāvāt iti yat uktam tatra deśena saha tāvat abhāvasya viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ

original: sa tu sambandhāntaramūla iti bhāve 'yaṃ niyamaḥ nābhāve //
analyzed: sa tu sambandha antara mūlaḥ iti bhāve yam niyamaḥ na abhāve

original: yad vā bhāve 'py eṣa na niyamaḥ /
analyzed: yat vā bhāve pi eṣa na niyamaḥ

original: na hy evaṃ bhavati yat sambaddhaṃ tat viśeṣaṇam eva /
analyzed: na hi evam bhavati yat sambaddham tat viśeṣaṇam eva

original: pādapīḍite śirasi vā dhāryamāṇe daṇḍe [daṇḍī] iti pratyayānutpādāt /
analyzed: pāda pīḍite śirasi vā dhāryamāṇe daṇḍe daṇḍī iti pratyaya anutpādāt

original: nāpy evam yat viśeṣaṇaṃ tat sambandham eveti samavāyasya saty api viśeṣaṇatve sambandhāntarābhāvāt /
analyzed: nā api evam yat viśeṣaṇam tat sambandham eva iti samavāyasya sati api viśeṣaṇa tve sambandha antara abhāvāt

original: tasmāt sambandhāntararahito 'pi pratibandha iva vācyavācakabhāva iva viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ svatantra eva sambandhaḥ tathāpratīter avadhāryate //
analyzed: tasmāt pratibandhaḥ iva vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ iva viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ svatantraḥ eva sambandhaḥ tathā pratīteḥ avadhāryate

original: ubhayor ubhayātmakatvāt kadācit kasyacit tathā pratibhāsāt puruṣecchānuvartanena vyatyayapratyayasattve 'pi na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: ubhayoḥ ubhaya ātmaka tvāt kadācid kasyacid tathā pratibhāsāt puruṣa icchā anuvartanena vyatyaya pratyaya sattve pi na doṣaḥ

original: tasmāt viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva eva sambandho deśena bhūtalādinā sahābhāvasya //
analyzed: tasmāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ eva sambandhaḥ deśena bhū tala ādinā saha abhāvasya

original: evaṃ kālenāpi saha sa eva veditavyaḥ /
analyzed: evam kālena api saha saḥ eva veditavyaḥ

original: kriyayā kartṛstayā vā gamanādikayā karmasthayā vā bhedanādikayā saha saṃyogādyabhāve 'pi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva eva sambandhaḥ tadvad abhāvasyāpi bhaviṣyatīti //
analyzed: kriyayā kartṛḥ tayā vā gamana ādikayā karma sthayā vā bhedana ādikayā saha saṃyoga ādi abhāve pi viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ eva sambandhaḥ tadvat abhāvasya api bhaviṣyati iti

original: pratiyoginā tu saha virodho 'sya sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: pratiyoginā tu saha virodhaḥ sya sambandhaḥ

original: ayam eva ca virodhārthaḥ yad ekatrobhayor asamāveśaḥ /
analyzed: ayam eva ca virodha arthaḥ yat ekatra ubhayoḥ asamāveśaḥ

original: ataś caikavināśe na sarvavināśaḥ ghaṭābhāvasya ghaṭaikapratiyogikatvāt //
analyzed: atas ca eka vināśe na sarva vināśaḥ ghaṭa abhāvasya ghaṭa eka pratiyogika tvāt

original: yat tu bhavanadharmā abhavanadharmā vā iti vikalpitam tatra bhavanadharmaivābhāvo 'bhyupagamyate /
analyzed: yat tu bhavana dharmāḥ a bhavana dharmāḥ vā iti vikalpitam tatra bhavana dharma eva abhāvaḥ bhyupagamyate

original: bhavanadharmatve 'pi cābhāvo na bhāvān na bhidyate pratibhāsabhedasyarūparasādiṣūpadarśitatvāt /
analyzed: bhavana dharma tve pi ca abhāvaḥ na bhāvāt na bhidyate pratibhāsa bhedasya rūpa rasa ādiṣu upadarśita tvāt

original: bhavanadharmatvaṃ cāsya hetvanvayavyatirekitvāt bhavati /
analyzed: bhavana dharma tvam ca asya hetu anvaya vyatireki tvāt bhavati

original: ghaṭo hi mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍādīn iva janmani vināśe 'pi mudgarādīn anuvartate hetūn //
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ hi mṛd piṇḍa daṇḍa ādīn iva janmani vināśe mudgara ādīn anuvartate hetūn

original: vijātīyasantatijananapakṣe 'pi sadṛśasantānajanikāyāḥ śakter abhāvaḥ kriyata eva /
analyzed: vijātīya santati janana pakṣe sadṛśa santāna janikāyāḥ śakteḥ abhāvaḥ kriyate eva

original: anyathā mudgarādyupanipāte 'pi vijātīyeva sajātīyasantatir api jāyeta /
analyzed: anyathā mudgara ādi upanipāte vijātīyā iva sajātīya santatiḥ api jāyeta

original: sajātīyavijātīyobhayasantatijananaśaktiyukto ghaṭa iti cet mudgarādiyogāt pūrvam api kapālasantatijananam tadyoge 'pi vā sati ghaṭasantatijananam aniyamena dṛśyeteti /
analyzed: sajātīya vijātīya ubhaya santati janana śakti yuktaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti ced mudgara ādi yogāt pūrvam api kapāla santati jananam tad yoge vā sati ghaṭa santati jananam aniyamena dṛśyeta iti

original: vijātīyakṣaṇotpādanasvabhāve ca ghaṭe mudgarādivaiyyarthyam eva syāt //
analyzed: vijātīya kṣaṇa utpādana svabhāve ca ghaṭe mudgara ādi vaiyyarthyam eva syāt

original: tadutpādasvabhāvo hi na kiñcin mudgarādinā /
analyzed: tad utpāda svabhāvaḥ hi na kiñcid mudgara ādinā

original: atadutpādakatve 'pi na kiñcin mudgarādinā //
analyzed: a tad utpādaka tve pi na kiñcid mudgara ādinā

original: mudgaropanipātāc ca yad utpannaṃ kṣaṇāntaram /
analyzed: mudgara upanipātāt ca yat utpannam kṣaṇa antaram

original: ghaṭakṣaṇasya kiṃ vṛttaṃ yena nābhāti pūrvavat //
analyzed: ghaṭa kṣaṇasya kim vṛttam yena na ābhāti pūrvavat

original: nanv asyābhavanaṃ vṛttaṃ sa evārtho 'yam ucyate /
analyzed: nanu asya abhavanam vṛttam saḥ eva arthaḥ yam ucyate

original: ghañā kim aparāddhaṃ vaḥ kiṃ vā 'py upakṛtaṃ lyuṭā //
analyzed: ghañā kim aparāddham vaḥ kim vā pi upakṛtam lyuṭā

original: nanu uktaṃ na tasya kiñcid bhavati na bhavaty eva kevalam iti tad ayuktam yad asau na bhavati sa evāsyābhāvaḥ //
analyzed: nanu uktam na tasya kiñcid bhavati na bhavati eva kevalam iti tat ayuktam yat asau na bhavati saḥ eva asya abhāvaḥ

original: nanu sa na na tu tasyābhāvaḥ maivam sa netiśabdayor jñānayoś ca viṣayabhedāt /
analyzed: nanu sa na na tu tasya abhāvaḥ mā evam sa na iti śabdayoḥ jñānayoḥ ca viṣaya bhedāt

original: sa iti jñānasya smaryamāṇo ghaṭādir viṣayaḥ neti tu jñānasya abhāvo bhūmir ity alam alīkavidagdhaviracitaviphalavakravacanavimardena //
analyzed: saḥ iti jñānasya smaryamāṇaḥ ghaṭa ādiḥ viṣayaḥ na iti tu jñānasya abhāvaḥ bhūmiḥ iti alam alīka vidagdha viracita viphala vakra vacana vimardena

original: tasmād ittham abhāvasya prameyatvopapādanāt /
analyzed: tasmāt ittham abhāvasya prameya tva upapādanāt

original: na hy asadvyavahārāya kalpante 'nupalabdayaḥ //
analyzed: na hi asat vyavahārāya kalpante

original: na svabhāvānumāne ca tadantarbhāvasambhavaḥ /
analyzed: na svabhāva anumāne ca tad antar bhāva sambhavaḥ

original: meyaṃ pṛthagabhāvākhyaṃ amūṣām upapāditam //
analyzed: meyam pṛthak abhāva ākhyam amūṣām upapāditam

original: kāraṇānupalabdhyādeḥ bāḍham astv anumānatā /
analyzed: kāraṇa anupalabdhi ādeḥ bāḍham astu anumāna tā

original: svabhāvānupalabdhis tu pratyakṣam iti sādhitam //
analyzed: svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ tu pratyakṣam iti sādhitam

original: yā ceyam ekādaśānupalabdhivadhūśuddhāntamadhye viruddhavyāptopalabdhir udāhṛtā [na dhruvabhāvī bhūtasyāpi bhāvasya vināśaḥ hetvantarāpekṣaṇāt] iti seyaṃ idānīm eva sādhvī dūṣitā vistaras tu kṣaṇabhaṅgapakṣe dūṣayiṣyate //
analyzed: yā ca iyam ekādaśa anupalabdhi vadhū śuddhānta madhye viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ udāhṛtā na dhruva bhāvī bhūtasya api bhāvasya vināśaḥ hetu antara apekṣaṇāt iti sā iyam idānīm eva sādhvī dūṣitā vistaraḥ tu kṣaṇabhaṅga pakṣe dūṣayiṣyate

original: yais tu mīmāṃsakaiḥ sadbhir abhāvo nābhyupeyate /
analyzed: yaiḥ tu mīmāṃsakaiḥ sadbhiḥ abhāvaḥ na abhyupeyate

original: pramādenāmunā teṣāṃ vayam apy adya lajjitāḥ //
analyzed: pramādena amunā teṣām vayam api adya lajjitāḥ

original: ghaṭo hi na pratīyate na tu tadabhāvaḥ pratīyate ity evaṃ vadadbhir ebhir darśanādarśane eva padārthānāṃ sadasattve iti kathitaṃ syāt /
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ hi na pratīyate na tu tad abhāvaḥ pratīyate iti evam vadadbhiḥ ebhiḥ darśana adarśane eva padārthānām sat asat tve iti kathitam syāt

original: etac cāyuktam darśanādarśanābhyāṃ hi sadasattve niścīyete na tu darśanādarśane eva sadasattve //
analyzed: etat ca ayuktam darśana adarśanābhyām hi sat asat tve niścīyete na tu darśana adarśane eva sat asat tve

original: na cāpratītimātreṇa tadabhāvanibandhanāḥ /
analyzed: na ca apratīti mātreṇa tad abhāva nibandhanāḥ

original: vyavahārāḥ prakalpante mṛdantaritatoyavat //
analyzed: vyavahārāḥ prakalpante mṛd antarita toya vat

original: khapuṣpasya piśācasya mṛdantaritavāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: khapuṣpasya piśācasya mṛd antarita vāriṇaḥ

original: na khalv anupalabhyatve viśeṣaḥ pratibhāti naḥ //
analyzed: na khalu anupalabhya tve viśeṣaḥ pratibhāti naḥ

original: sarvadā 'nupalambho hi kurvan nāstitvaniścayam /
analyzed: sarvadā nupalambhaḥ hi kurvan nāstitva niścayam

original: viśiṣyate mṛdantaśthasalilānupalabdhitaḥ //
analyzed: viśiṣyate mṛd anta śtha salila anupalabdhitaḥ

original: āgamādyuktitaś cāpi sattvasaṃbhāvanāṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: āgama ādi uktitaḥ ca api sattva saṃbhāvanām gataḥ

original: sarvadā 'nupalabdho 'pi na piśācaḥ khapuṣpavat //
analyzed: sarvadā na upalabdhaḥ pi na piśācaḥ kha puṣpa vat

original: ataś ca yad ucyate anupalabdheḥ punaḥ anupalabdhir evānupalabdhir iti tadbhaṇitimātram /
analyzed: atas ca yat ucyate anupalabdheḥ punar anupalabdhiḥ eva anupalabdhiḥ iti tat bhaṇiti mātram

original: khapuṣpādes tu saviśeṣaṇatayā 'nupalabdhyā 'bhāva eva niścīyate na tasyānupalabdhimātram //
analyzed: kha puṣpa ādeḥ tu sa viśeṣaṇa tayā nupalabdhyā bhāvaḥ eva niścīyate na tasya anupalabdhi mātram

original: aniṣyamāṇe cābhāve bhāvānāṃ pratiyogini /
analyzed: an iṣyamāṇe ca abhāve bhāvānām pratiyogini

original: nityataiṣāṃ prasajyeta na hy ete kṣaṇikās tava //
analyzed: nitya tā eṣām prasajyeta na hi ete kṣaṇikāḥ tava

original: mudgarādeś ca kiṃ kāryaṃ kapālapaṭalīti cet /
analyzed: mudgara ādeḥ ca kim kāryam kapāla paṭalī iti ced

original: ghaṭas tarhy avinaṣṭatvāt svakāryaṃ na karoti kim //
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ tarhi a vinaṣṭa tvāt sva kāryam na karoti kim

original: adarśanād iti cet tadānīm eva dṛṣṭasya sthirasyāmuṣya kiṃ kṛtam sarvendriyādisāmagrīsannidhāne 'py adarśanam //
analyzed: adarśanāt iti ced tadānīm eva dṛṣṭasya sthirasya amuṣya kim kṛtam sarva indriya ādi sāmagrī sannidhāne pi adarśanam

original: tasmāt tadabhāvakṛtam eva tadānīṃ tasyādarśanam //
analyzed: tasmāt tad abhāva kṛtam eva tadānīm tasya adarśanam

original: svaprakāśā ca nāstīti saṃvittir bhavatāṃ mate /
analyzed: sva prakāśā ca na asti iti saṃvittiḥ bhavatām mate

original: na nirālambanā ceyaṃ astīti pratipattivat //
analyzed: na nirālambanā ca iyam asti iti pratipatti vat

original: vikalpaviṣayāḥ śabdā yathā śauddhodaner gṛhe /
analyzed: vikalpa viṣayāḥ śabdāḥ yathā śauddhodaneḥ gṛhe

original: gīyante bhavatā naivam iti nañvācyam ucyatām //
analyzed: gīyante bhavatā nā evam iti nañ vācyam ucyatām

original: prasiddhiś ca parityaktā na cābhāvaḥ parākṛtaḥ /
analyzed: prasiddhiḥ ca parityaktā na ca abhāvaḥ parākṛtaḥ

original: upekṣitaś ca bhāṣyārthaḥ ity aho nayanaipuṇam //
analyzed: upekṣitaḥ ca bhāṣya arthaḥ iti aho naya naipuṇam

original: alaṃ ca bahunoktena vimardo 'tra na śobhate /
analyzed: alam ca bahunā uktena vimardaḥ tra na śobhate

original: mahātmanāṃ pramādo 'pi marṣaṇīyo hi mādṛśaiḥ //
analyzed: mahātmanām pramādaḥ pi marṣaṇīyaḥ hi mādṛśaiḥ

original: tasmāt [nāsti] iti pratyayagamyo 'bhāva iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt na asti iti pratyaya gamyaḥ bhāvaḥ iti siddham

original: sa ca dvividhaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvaś ceti /
analyzed: sa ca dvividhaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsa abhāvaḥ ca iti

original: caturvidha ity anye itaretarābhāvaḥ atyantābhāvaḥ tau ca dvāv iti /
analyzed: caturvidhaḥ iti anye itaretarābhāvaḥ atyanta abhāvaḥ tau ca dvau iti

original: ṣaṭprakāra ity anye apekṣābhāvaḥ sāmarthyābhāvaḥ te ca catvāra iti //
analyzed: ṣaṣ prakāraḥ iti anye apekṣā bhāvaḥ sāmarthya abhāvaḥ te ca catvāraḥ iti

original: tatra ca prāgātmalābhān nāstitvaṃ prāgabhāvo 'bhidhīyate /
analyzed: tatra ca prāk ātmalābhāt nāstitvam prāgabhāvaḥ abhidhīyate

original: utpannasyātmahānaṃ tu pradhvaṃsa iti kathyate //
analyzed: utpannasya ātma hānam tu pradhvaṃsaḥ iti kathyate

original: na prāgabhāvād anye tu bhidyante paramārthataḥ /
analyzed: na prāgabhāvāt anye tu bhidyante paramārthataḥ

original: sa hi vastvantaropādhir anyo 'nyābhāva ucyate //
analyzed: sa hi vastu antara upādhiḥ anyaḥ nyābhāvaḥ ucyate

original: sa evāvadhiśūnyatvāt atyantābhāvatāṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva avadhi śūnya tvāt atyanta abhāva tām gataḥ

original: apekṣābhāvatā tasya deśopādhinibandhanā //
analyzed: apekṣā bhāva tā tasya deśa upādhi nibandhanā

original: sāmarthyaṃ pūrvasiddhaṃ cet pradhvaṃse tadabhāvadhīḥ /
analyzed: sāmarthyam pūrva siddham ced pradhvaṃse tad abhāva dhīḥ

original: no cet tarhi viśeṣo 'sya durlabhaḥ prāgabhāvataḥ //
analyzed: no ced tarhi durlabhaḥ prāgabhāvataḥ

original: utpannasya vināśo vā tadanutpāda eva vā /
analyzed: utpannasya vināśaḥ vā tad anutpādaḥ eva vā

original: abhāvas tattvataḥ anye tu bhedās tv aupādhikā matāḥ //
analyzed: abhāvaḥ tattvataḥ anye tu bhedāḥ tu aupādhikāḥ matāḥ

original: tasmād abhāvākhyam idaṃ prameyaṃ tasyendriyeṇa grahaṇaṃ ca siddham /
analyzed: tasmāt abhāva ākhyam idam prameyam tasya indriyeṇa grahaṇam ca siddham

original: ataḥ pramāṇeṣu jagāda yuktaṃ catuṣṭam eṣāṃ munir akṣapādaḥ //
analyzed: atas pramāṇeṣu jagāda yuktam eṣām muniḥ akṣapādaḥ

original: nanu nādyāpi catuṣṭvam eṣām avatiṣṭhate saṃbhavaitihye iti dvayoḥ pramāṇāntarabhāvāt //
analyzed: nanu na adya api catuṣṭvam eṣām avatiṣṭhate saṃbhava aitihye iti dvayoḥ pramāṇa antara bhāvāt

original: saṃbhavo nāma samudāyena samudāyino 'vagamaḥ saṃbhavati khāryāṃ droṇaḥ saṃbhavati śate sahasram iti //
analyzed: saṃbhavaḥ nāma samudāyena samudāyinaḥ vagamaḥ saṃbhavati khāryām droṇaḥ saṃbhavati śate sahasram iti

original: anirdiṣṭapravaktṛkapravādaparaṃparā caitihyam [iha vaṭe yakṣaḥ prativasati] iti na cāyam āgamaḥ āptasyopadeṣṭur aniścayād iti //
analyzed: anirdiṣṭa pravaktṛka pravāda paraṃparā caitihyam iha vaṭe yakṣaḥ prativasati iti na ca ayam āgamaḥ āptasya upadeṣṭuḥ aniścayāt iti

original: tad idam anupapannam bhinnaḥ saṃbhava eṣa na hy anumiter ākhyāyi khāryāṃ khalu droṇaḥ saṃbhavatīti seyam avinābhāvāt matir laiṅgikī /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam bhinnaḥ saṃbhavaḥ eṣa na hi anumiteḥ ākhyāyi khāryām khalu droṇaḥ saṃbhavati iti sā iyam avinābhāvāt matiḥ laiṅgikī

original: aitihyaṃ tu na satyam atra hi vaṭe yakṣo 'sti vā neti vā ko jānāti kadā kva kena kalitaṃ yakṣasya kīdṛg vapuḥ //
analyzed: aitihyam tu na satyam atra hi vaṭe yakṣaḥ sti vā nā iti vā kaḥ jānāti kadā kva kena kalitam yakṣasya kīdṛś vapuḥ

original: satyam api cāgamāt pṛthaṅ naitihyam upadeśarūpatvāt /
analyzed: satyam api ca āgamāt pṛthak na aitihyam upadeśa rūpa tvāt

original: āptagrahaṇaṃ sūtre na lakṣaṇāyeti vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: āpta grahaṇam sūtre na lakṣaṇāya iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: cārvākadhūrtas tu [athātas tattvaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ] iti pratijñāya pramāṇaprameyasaṅkhyālakṣaṇaniyamāśakyakaraṇīyatvam eva tattvaṃ vyākhyātavān /
analyzed: cārvāka dhūrtaḥ tu atha atas tattvam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ iti pratijñāya pramāṇa prameya saṅkhyā lakṣaṇa niyama aśakya karaṇīya tvam eva tattvam vyākhyātavān

original: pramāṇasaṅkhyāniyamāśakyakaraṇīyatvasiddhaye ca pramitibhedāt pratyakṣādipramāṇānupajanyān īdṛśān upādarśayat vakrāṅguliḥ praviralāṅgulir eṣa pāṇiḥ isyasti dhīḥ tamasi mīlitacakṣuṣo vā /
analyzed: pramāṇa saṅkhyā niyama aśakya karaṇīya tva siddhaye ca pramiti bhedāt pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇān upajanyān īdṛśān upādarśayat vakra aṅguliḥ pravirala aṅguliḥ eṣa pāṇiḥ isi asti dhīḥ tamasi mīlita cakṣuṣaḥ vā

original: neyaṃ tvagindriyakṛtā na hi tatkarasthaṃ tatraiva hi pramitim indriyam ādadhāti //
analyzed: na iyam tvac indriya kṛtā na hi tat kara stham tatra eva hi pramitim indriyam ādadhāti

original: dūrāt karoti niśi dīpaśikhā ca dṛṣṭā paryantadeśavisṛtāsu matiṃ prabhāsu /
analyzed: dūrāt karoti niśi dīpa śikhā ca dṛṣṭā paryanta deśa visṛtāsu matim prabhāsu

original: dhatte dhiyaṃ pavanakampitapuṇḍarīkaṣaṇḍe 'nuvātabhuvi dūragate 'pi gandhe //
analyzed: dhatte dhiyam pavana kampita puṇḍarīka ṣaṇḍe dūra gate pi gandhe

original: sa evaṃprāyasaṃvittisamutprekṣaṇapaṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ evaṃprāya saṃvitti samutprekṣaṇa paṇḍitaḥ

original: rūpaṃ tapasvī jānāti na pratyakṣānumānayoḥ //
analyzed: rūpam tapasvī jānāti na pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ

original: pratyakṣād viralakarāṅgulapratītiḥ vyāpitvād akuśalam indriyaṃ na tasyām /
analyzed: pratyakṣāt virala kara aṅgula pratītiḥ vyāpi tvāt akuśalam indriyam na tasyām

original: ānābhes tuhinajalaṃ janaiḥ pibadbhiḥ tatsparśaḥ śiśirataro 'nubhūyate 'ntaḥ //
analyzed: ānābheḥ tuhina jalam janaiḥ pibadbhiḥ tad sparśaḥ śiśirataraḥ nubhūyate

original: saṃyogabuddhiś ca yathā tadutthā tathaiva tajjā tadabhāvabuddhiḥ /
analyzed: saṃyoga buddhiḥ ca yathā tad utthā tathā eva tad jā tad abhāva buddhiḥ

original: kriyāviśeṣagrahaṇāc ca tasmāt ākuñcitatvāvagamo 'ṅgulīnām //
analyzed: kriyā viśeṣa grahaṇāt ca tasmāt ākuñcita tva avagamaḥ ṅgulīnām

original: padmāmodavidūradīpakavibhābuddhiḥ punar laiṅgikī vyāptijñānakṛteti kā khalu matir mānāntarāpekṣiṇī /
analyzed: padma āmoda vidūra dīpaka vibhā buddhiḥ punar laiṅgikī vyāpti jñāna kṛtā iti kā khalu matiḥ māna antara apekṣiṇī

original: saṅkhyāyā niyamaḥ pramāṇaviṣaye nāstīty ato nāstikaiḥ tatsāmarthyavivekaśūnyamatibhiḥ mithyaiva visphūrjitam //
analyzed: saṅkhyāyāḥ niyamaḥ pramāṇa viṣaye na asti iti atas nāstikaiḥ tad sāmarthya viveka śūnya matibhiḥ mithyā eva visphūrjitam

original: iyattvam avilakṣaṇaṃ niyatam asti māneṣu naḥ prameyam api lakṣaṇādiniyamānvitaṃ vakṣyate /
analyzed: iyattvam avilakṣaṇam niyatam asti māneṣu naḥ prameyam api lakṣaṇa ādi niyama anvitam vakṣyate

original: aśakyakaraṇīyatāṃ kathayatā tu tattvaṃ satāṃ samakṣam amunā ''tmano jaḍamatitvam uktaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: aśakya karaṇīya tām kathayatā tu tattvam satām samakṣam amunā tmanaḥ jaḍa mati tvam uktam bhavet

original: iti jayantabhaṭṭakṛtau nyāyamañjaryāṃ prathamam āhnikam dvitīyam āhnikam pratyakṣaparīkṣā evaṃ pramāṇānāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇe vibhāge ca nirṇīte sati adhunā viśeṣalakṣaṇavarṇanāvasara iti sakalapramāṇamūlabhūtatvena pūrvapaṭhitatvena jyaiṣṭhyāt prathamaṃ pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayitum āha [indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāyātmakaṃ pratyakṣam //
analyzed: iti jayanta bhaṭṭa kṛtau nyāyamañjaryām prathamam āhnikam dvitīyam āhnikam pratyakṣa parīkṣā evam pramāṇānām sāmānya lakṣaṇe vibhāge ca nirṇīte sati adhunā viśeṣa lakṣaṇa varṇanā avasaraḥ iti sakala pramāṇa mūla bhūta tvena pūrva paṭhita tvena jyaiṣṭhyāt prathamam pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam pratipādayitum āha indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam pratyakṣam

original: 1.1.4 //] pratyakṣam iti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ itarallakṣaṇam /
analyzed: iti

original: samānāsamānajātīyavyavacchedo lakṣaṇārthaḥ /
samānajātīyaṃ pramāṇatayā 'numānādi vijātīyaṃ prameyādi tato vyavacchinnaṃ pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam anena sūtreṇopapādyate //
analyzed: samāna jātīyam pramāṇa tayā numāna ādi vijātīyam prameya ādi tatas vyavacchinnam pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam anena sūtreṇa upapādyate

original: atra codayanti indriyārthasannikarṣotpannatvādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ svarūpaṃ vā viśeṣyate sāmagrī vā phalaṃ vā tatra svarūpaviśeṣaṇapakṣe yat evaṃsvarūpaṃ jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣam iti tatsvarūpasya viśeṣitatvāt phalaviśeṣaṇānupādānāc ca lakṣaṇam avyāptyativyāptibhyām upahataṃ syāt /
analyzed: atra codayanti indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tva ādi viśeṣaṇaiḥ svarūpam vā viśeṣyate sāmagrī vā phalam vā tatra svarūpa viśeṣaṇa pakṣe yat evaṃsvarūpam jñānam tat pratyakṣam iti tad svarūpasya viśeṣita tvāt phala viśeṣaṇa anupādānāt ca lakṣaṇam avyāpti ativyāptibhyām upahatam syāt

original: avyāptis tāvat atathāvidhasvarūpasya bodhasya indriyādeś ca nirmalaphalajanakatayā labdhapramāṇabhāvasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ noktaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: avyāptiḥ tāvat atathāvidha svarūpasya bodhasya indriya ādeḥ ca nirmala phala janaka tayā labdha pramāṇa bhāvasya api prāmāṇyam na uktam bhavet

original: ativyāptiś ca tathāvidhasvarūpasyāpi jñānasyākārakasya vā saṃskārakāriṇo vā smṛtiṃ janayato vā saṃśayam ādadhānasya vā viparyayam utpādayato vā pramāṇatvaṃ prāpnoti phalasyāviśeṣitatvāt //
analyzed: ativyāptiḥ ca tathāvidha svarūpasya api jñānasya akārakasya vā saṃskāra kāriṇaḥ vā smṛtim janayataḥ vā saṃśayam ādadhānasya vā viparyayam utpādayataḥ vā pramāṇa tvam prāpnoti phalasya aviśeṣita tvāt

original: tadviśeṣaṇābhidhāne punaḥ aśrutasūtrāntarādhyāhāraprasaktiḥ avyāptiś ca tadavastheti na svarūpaviśeṣaṇapakṣaḥ //
analyzed: tad viśeṣaṇa abhidhāne punar aśruta sūtra antara adhyāhāra prasaktiḥ avyāptiḥ ca tad avasthā iti na svarūpa viśeṣaṇa pakṣaḥ

original: nāpi sāmagrīviśeṣaṇapakṣaḥ tatra hi [indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam] iti indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ sāmagryaṃ iti vyākhyātavyam /
analyzed: na api sāmagrī viśeṣaṇa pakṣaḥ tatra hi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam sāmagryam iti vyākhyātavyam

original: jñānaṃ avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāyātmakam iti ca tajjanakatvād upacāreṇa tathā sākalyaṃ varṇanīyam iti kliṣṭakalpanā //
analyzed: jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam iti ca tad janaka tvāt upacāreṇa tathā sākalyam varṇanīyam iti kliṣṭa kalpanā

original: phalaviśeṣaṇapakṣo 'pi na saṅgacchate jñānapratyakṣaśabdayoḥ phalakaraṇavācinoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: phala viśeṣaṇa pakṣaḥ api na saṅgacchate jñāna pratyakṣa śabdayoḥ phala karaṇa vācinoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya prasaṅgāt

original: asamānādhikaraṇapramāṇalakṣaṇaprastāvāt /
analyzed: asamāna adhikaraṇa pramāṇa lakṣaṇa prastāvāt

original: pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam ucyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣam pramāṇam ucyate

original: tac ca karaṇam iti varṇitam /
analyzed: tat ca karaṇam iti varṇitam

original: jñānaṃ tu tadupajanitaṃ phalam iti katham aikādhikaraṇyam tasmāt pakṣatrayasyāpy ayuktatvāt pakṣāntarasyāpy asaṃbhavād ayuktaṃ sūtram iti //
analyzed: jñānam tu tad upajanitam phalam iti katham aikādhikaraṇyam tasmāt pakṣa trayasya api ayukta tvāt pakṣa antarasya api asaṃbhavāt ayuktam sūtram iti

original: atrocyate svarūpasāmagrīviśeṣaṇapakṣau tāvat yathoktadoṣopahatatvāt nābhyupagamyete /
analyzed: atrā ucyate svarūpa sāmagrī viśeṣaṇa pakṣau tāvat yathā ukta doṣa upahata tvāt na abhyupagamyete

original: phalaviśeṣaṇapakṣam eva saṃmanyāmahe /
analyzed: phala viśeṣaṇa pakṣam eva saṃmanyāmahe

original: tatra ca yat vaiyyadhikaraṇyaṃ coditaṃ tat [yataḥ] śabdādhyāhāreṇa parihariṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca yat vaiyyadhikaraṇyam coditam tat yatas śabda adhyāhāreṇa parihariṣyāmaḥ

original: yataḥ evaṃvidhaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaṃ jñānākhyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati tat pratyakṣam iti sūtrārthaḥ /
analyzed: yatas evaṃvidha viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭam jñāna ākhyam phalam bhavati tat pratyakṣam iti sūtra arthaḥ

original: itthaṃ ca na kvacid avyāptir ativyāptir vā na kācit kliṣṭakalpanā /
analyzed: ittham ca na kvacid avyāptiḥ ativyāptiḥ vā na kācid kliṣṭa kalpanā

original: [yataḥ] śabdādhyāhāramātreṇa niravadyalakṣaṇopavarṇanasamarthasūtrapadasaṅgatisaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: yatas śabda adhyāhāra mātreṇa niravadya lakṣaṇa upavarṇana samartha sūtra pada saṅgati saṃbhavāt

original: nanu samānādhikaraṇe eva jñānapratyakṣapade kathaṃ na vyākhyāyete kiṃ [yataḥ] śabdādhyāhāreṇa uktam atra karaṇasya pramāṇatvāt jñānasya ca tatphalatvāt phalakaraṇayoś ca svarūpabhedasya siddhatvāt //
analyzed: nanu samāna adhikaraṇe eva jñāna pratyakṣa pade katham na vyākhyāyete kim yatas śabda adhyāhāreṇa uktam atra karaṇasya pramāṇa tvāt jñānasya ca tad phala tvāt phala karaṇayoḥ ca svarūpa bhedasya siddha tvāt

original: tad atra pramāṇatāyāṃ sāmagryāḥ tajjñānaṃ phalam iṣyate /
analyzed: tat atra pramāṇa tāyām sāmagryāḥ tat jñānam phalam iṣyate

original: tasya pramāṇabhāve tu phalaṃ hānādibuddhayaḥ //
analyzed: tasya pramāṇa bhāve tu phalam hāna ādi buddhayaḥ

original: nanu smṛtyādyanekabuddhivyavadhānasaṃbhavāt katham indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam ālocanājñānaṃ hānādiphalaṃ bhavet tathā hi kapitthādijātīyam arthaṃ indriyādisannikarṣādisāmagrīta upalabhya tadgataṃ sukhasādhanatvam anusmarati [evaṃjātīyakena mama pūrvaṃ sukham upajanitam abhūt] iti /
analyzed: nanu smṛti ādi aneka buddhi vyavadhāna saṃbhavāt katham indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam ālocanā jñānam hāna ādi phalam bhavet tathā hi kapittha ādi jātīyam artham indriya ādi sannikarṣa ādi sāmagrītaḥ upalabhya tad gatam sukha sādhanatvam anusmarati evaṃjātīyakena mama pūrvam sukham upajanitam abhūt iti

original: tataḥ smṛtyanantaraṃ parāmarśajñānam asyopajāyate [ayaṃ sa kapitthajātīyaḥ] iti /
analyzed: tatas smṛti anantaram parāmarśa jñānam asya upajāyate ayam sa kapittha jātīyaḥ iti

original: tata upādeyatājñānam utpadyate [yata eṣa sukhasādhanaṃ kapitthādijātīyaḥ padārthaḥ tasmād upādeyaḥ] iti /
analyzed: tatas upādeya tā jñānam utpadyate yatas eṣa sukha sādhanam kapittha ādi jātīyaḥ padārthaḥ tasmāt upādeyaḥ iti

original: atrāntare prathamasyendriyasannikarṣajanmanaḥ kapitthālocanājñānasya nāmāpi nāvaśiṣyata iti katham asya tatphalatvam iti //
analyzed: atrā antare prathamasya indriya sannikarṣa janmanaḥ kapittha ālocanā jñānasya nāma api nā avaśiṣyate iti katham asya tad phala tvam iti

original: atrācāryās tāvad ācakṣate sādhu coditam /
analyzed: atra ācāryāḥ tāvat ācakṣate sādhu coditam

original: satyam īdṛśa evāyaṃ jñānānāṃ kramaḥ /
analyzed: satyam īdṛśaḥ eva ayam jñānānām kramaḥ

original: na vayaṃ prathamam ālocanājñānasya upādānādiṣu pramāṇatāṃ brūmaḥ /
analyzed: na vayam prathamam ālocanā jñānasya upādāna ādiṣu pramāṇa tām brūmaḥ

original: tathā hi prathamam indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam ālocanājñānaṃ indriyārthasannikarṣādisāmagrīsvabhāvasya pratyakṣasya pramāṇasya phalam eva na tu svayaṃ pramāṇatāṃ pratilabhate smṛtijanakatvāt /
analyzed: tathā hi prathamam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam ālocanā jñānam indriya artha sannikarṣa ādi sāmagrī svabhāvasya pratyakṣasya pramāṇasya phalam eva na tu svayam pramāṇa tām pratilabhate smṛti janaka tvāt

original: tadanantaraṃ hi sukhasādhanatvānusmṛtir bhavatīti seyam anusmṛtir apramāṇaphalam api satī pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ saṃpadyate [tathā 'yaṃ kapitthādijātīyaḥ] itīndriyaviṣayaparāmarśotpattau indriyārthasannikarṣeṇa saha vyāpriyamāṇatvāt //
analyzed: tad anantaram hi sukha sādhanatva anusmṛtiḥ bhavati iti sā iyam anusmṛtiḥ apramāṇa phalam api satī pratyakṣam pramāṇam saṃpadyate tathā yam kapittha ādi jātīyaḥ iti indriya viṣaya parāmarśa utpattau indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa saha vyāpriyamāṇa tvāt

original: sa punaḥ parāmarśapratyayaḥ pratyakṣajanitaḥ dhūmajñānavat anumānaṃ pramāṇam ucyate parokṣasyāgner iva sukhasādhanasāmarthyasya tataḥ avagateḥ //
analyzed: sa punar parāmarśa pratyayaḥ pratyakṣa janitaḥ dhūma jñāna vat anumānam pramāṇam ucyate parokṣasya agneḥ iva sukha sādhana sāmarthyasya tatas avagateḥ

original: yady api na kācid atīndriyā śaktir asmanmate vidyate tathā 'pi svarūpasahakāryādidṛṣṭādṛṣṭakāraṇasamūhasannidhānasvabhāvam api sāmarthyam atīndriyam eva //
analyzed: yadi api na kācid atīndriyā śaktiḥ asmad mate vidyate tathā svarūpa sahakārya ādi dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa kāraṇa samūha sannidhāna svabhāvam api sāmarthyam atīndriyam eva

original: tasmād eṣa kapitthādijātīyo 'rthah sukhasādhanam iti vahnimatparvatapratītivat tajjātīyaliṅgakam ānumānikam idaṃ jñānam /
analyzed: tasmāt eṣa kapittha ādi jātīyaḥ rthaḥ sukha sādhanam iti vahnimat parvata pratīti vat tad jātīya liṅgakam ānumānikam idam jñānam

original: tad idam anumānaphalam api sukhasādhanatvaniścayātmakaṃ jñānaṃ indriyaviṣaye kapitthādāv upādeyajñānaṃ indriyārthasannikarṣeṇa saha janayat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tat idam anumāna phalam api sukha sādhanatva niścaya ātmakam jñānam indriya viṣaye kapittha ādau upādeya jñānam indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa saha janayat pratyakṣam pramāṇam bhavati

original: tad eva ca hṛdi vyavasthāpya bhāṣyakṛt babhāṣe [yadā jñānaṃ vṛttiḥ tadā hānopādānopekṣābuddhayaḥ pramitiḥ] iti //
analyzed: tat eva ca hṛdi vyavasthāpya bhāṣyakṛt babhāṣe yadā jñānam vṛttiḥ tadā hāna upādāna upekṣā buddhayaḥ pramitiḥ iti

original: vyākhyātāras tu bruvate nāyam īdṛśo jñānānāṃ kramaḥ ādyam ālocanājñānaṃ sukhasādhanatvānusmṛtiṃ upajanayatīti satyam smṛtyā ca tasya vinaśyattā vinaśyadavasthaṃ cendriyaviṣaye kapitthādau sukhasādhanatvaniścayam ādadhāti sukhasādhanatvajñānam eva copādeyatājñānam ucyate nānyat /
analyzed: vyākhyātāraḥ tu bruvate na ayam īdṛśaḥ jñānānām kramaḥ ādyam ālocanā jñānam sukha sādhana tva anusmṛtim upajanayati iti satyam smṛtyā ca tasya vinaśyat tā vinaśyat avastham ca indriya viṣaye kapittha ādau sukha sādhana tva niścayam ādadhāti sukha sādhana tva jñānam eva ca upādeya tā jñānam ucyate na anyat

original: parāmarśas tu na kaścidantarāle saṃvedyate /
analyzed: parāmarśaḥ tu na kaścid antarāle saṃvedyate

original: tad eva sādhyaṃ darśitam /
analyzed: tat eva sādhyam darśitam

original: indriyārthasannikarṣajanitam upādeyatājñānaphalakaṃ avakalpate iti kim asaṃvedyamānajñānakanthākalpaneneti //
analyzed: indriya artha sannikarṣa janitam upādeya tā jñāna phalakam avakalpate iti kim a saṃvedyamāna jñāna kanthā kalpanena iti

original: nanu parāmarśo 'nubhūyata eva na tu kalpyate /
analyzed: nanu parāmarśaḥ nubhūyate eva na tu kalpyate

original: dhūmajñānānantaram avinābhāvaṃ [yatra dhūmas tatrāgniḥ] ity anusmṛtya parāmṛśati [tathā cāyaṃ dhūmaḥ] iti /
analyzed: dhūma jñāna anantaram avinābhāvam yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti anusmṛtya parāmṛśati tathā ca ayam dhūmaḥ iti

original: asati tu parāmarśe na liṅgajñānaṃ liṅgini pramāṇatāṃ pratipadyeta smaraṇajanakaṃ hi tat /
analyzed: asati tu parāmarśe na liṅga jñānam liṅgini pramāṇa tām pratipadyeta smaraṇa janakam hi tat

original: na ca smṛtijanakaṃ pramāṇam iṣyate /
analyzed: na ca smṛti janakam pramāṇam iṣyate

original: smaraṇānantaraṃ ca liṅgapratītir bhavantī nopalabhyānuvādena bhavet [ayam agnimān] iti //
analyzed: smaraṇa anantaram ca liṅga pratītiḥ bhavantī na upalabhya anuvādena bhavet ayam agnimān iti

original: api ca [tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ] iti yat upanayavacanam avayaveṣu paṭhyate tasya kiṃ vācyaṃ bhaviṣyati parāmarśāpalāpavādinām /
analyzed: api ca tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti yat upanaya vacanam avayaveṣu paṭhyate tasya kim vācyam bhaviṣyati parāmarśa apalāpa vādinām

original: svapratipattivac ca parapratipattir avayavair janyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: sva pratipatti vat ca para pratipattiḥ avayavaiḥ janyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: tasmād apratyākhyeyaḥ parāmarśa iti //
analyzed: tasmāt a pratyākhyeyaḥ parāmarśaḥ iti

original: atra vadanti na tāvad antarā kaścit parāmarśo 'nubhūyate /
analyzed: atra vadanti na tāvat antarā kaścid parāmarśaḥ nubhūyate

original: anumeyamiteḥ pūrvaṃ ūrdhvaṃ ca niyamasmṛteḥ //
analyzed: anumeya miteḥ pūrvam ūrdhvam ca niyama smṛteḥ

original: ata evārtham ālokya vinaiva hi devīyasā /
analyzed: atas eva artham ālokya vinā eva hi devīyasā

original: vilambena vyavasyanti grahaṇādiṣu laukikāḥ //
analyzed: vilambena vyavasyanti grahaṇa ādiṣu laukikāḥ

original: liṅgajñānaṃ ca vinaśyadavastham anumeyapratītau vyāpriyamāṇaṃ pramāṇatāṃ pratipatsyate /
analyzed: liṅga jñānam ca vinaśyat avastham anumeya pratītau vyāpriyamāṇam pramāṇa tām pratipatsyate

original: tatkṛtaivopalabhyānuvādena liṅgabuddhir bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tad kṛtā evā upalabhya anuvādena liṅga buddhiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tasmāt kapitthādipadārthadarśanasya parāmarśasopānam anārohata evopādeyajñānaphalatā vaktuṃ yukteti //
analyzed: tasmāt kapittha ādi padārtha darśanasya parāmarśa sopānam an ārohataḥ evā upādeya jñāna phala tā vaktum yuktā iti

original: api ca anumeyaviṣaye vahnyādau sukhasādhanatvānusmṛtikṛtam upādeyatājñānaṃ tava na samasty eva /
analyzed: api ca anumeya viṣaye vahni ādau sukha sādhanatva anusmṛti kṛtam upādeya tā jñānam tava na samasti eva

original: tataś ca tatrāpi [tathā cāyaṃ jvalanajātīyaḥ] iti parāmarśo bhavatā 'bhyupeya eva /
analyzed: tatas ca tatra api tathā ca ayam jvalana jātīyaḥ iti parāmarśaḥ bhavatā bhyupeyaḥ eva

original: sa ca kiṃkaraṇakaḥ iti nirūpaṇīyam /
analyzed: sa ca kiṃkaraṇakaḥ iti nirūpaṇīyam

original: na tāvad indriyadvārakaḥ pāvakasya parokṣatvāt /
analyzed: na tāvat indriya dvārakaḥ pāvakasya parokṣa tvāt

original: śabdopamāne tv āśaṅkitum api tatra na yukte /
analyzed: śabda upamāne tu āśaṅkitum api tatra na yukte

original: dhūmākhyāl liṅgād eva sa utpadyata iti cet na liṅgasya parāmarśāviṣayīkṛtasyānumeyam iti janananaipuṇyānabhyupagamāt /
analyzed: dhūma ākhyāt liṅgāt eva saḥ utpadyate iti ced na liṅgasya parāmarśa aviṣayīkṛtasya anumeyam iti janana naipuṇya anabhyupagamāt

original: dhūmāvamarśasya tadānīm atikrāntatvāt /
analyzed: dhūma avamarśasya tadānīm atikrānta tvāt

original: tathā hi prathamaṃ liṅgajñānaṃ tato vyāptismaraṇam tato dhūmaparāmarśaḥ tato vahnijñānam tena dhūmaparāmarśasya vinaśyattā tato 'gnau sukhasādhanatvānusmaraṇam /
analyzed: tathā hi prathamam liṅga jñānam tatas vyāpti smaraṇam tatas dhūma parāmarśaḥ tatas vahni jñānam tena dhūma parāmarśasya vinaśyat tā tatas gnau sukha sādhana tva anusmaraṇam

original: tadā ca dhūmaparāmarśasya vināśa eveti tasmin vinaṣṭe na kevalo dhūmas tadānīm analaparāmarśaṃ janayitum utsahate //
analyzed: tadā ca dhūma parāmarśasya vināśaḥ eva iti tasmin vinaṣṭe na kevalaḥ dhūmaḥ tadānīm anala parāmarśam janayitum utsahate

original: agnau sukhasādhanatvānusmaraṇānantaraṃ punaḥ dhūmajñānaṃ indriyād utpadyata iti cet maivam ananubhavāt /
analyzed: agnau sukha sādhanatva anusmaraṇa anantaram punar dhūma jñānam indriyāt utpadyate iti ced mā evam ananubhavāt

original: bhavatu vā dhūmajñānam tathā 'pi dhūmajñānānantaraṃ punar vyāptismṛtiḥ punaḥ dhūmaparāmarśaś cāvaśyaṃ bhavet ity atrāntare hutabhuji sukhasādhanatvānusmṛtir atikrānteti tatsahāyaparāmarśajanyasukhasādhanatvaniścayotpādo na syāt /
analyzed: bhavatu vā dhūma jñānam tathā dhūma jñāna anantaram punar vyāpti smṛtiḥ punar dhūma parāmarśaḥ ca avaśyam bhavet iti atra antare hutabhuji sukha sādhana tva anusmṛtiḥ atikrāntā iti tad sahāya parāmarśa janya sukha sādhana tva niścaya utpādaḥ na syāt

original: sukhasādhanatvānusmaraṇena hi vinaśyadavasthena janyamānaḥ pratyakṣaviṣayo 'sau dṛṣṭa iti //
analyzed: sukha sādhanatva anusmaraṇena hi vinaśyat avasthena janyamānaḥ pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ sau dṛṣṭaḥ iti

original: atha manyase na tadānīṃ punar dhūmajñānavyāptismaraṇatatparāmarśotpādādijñānaśṛṅkhalā 'bhyupeyate kintu prāktana eva dhūmaparāmarśaḥ kṛśānau sukhasādhanatvānusmaraṇānantaraṃ smariṣyate tena smṛtiviṣayavartinā satā [tathā cāyam agnijātīyaḥ] iti jvalanaparāmarśo janayiṣyate iti etad apy ayuktam agnijñānānantaraṃ yugapat smaraṇadvayodayaprasaṅgāt tadaiva sukhasādhanatā 'nusmṛtiḥ tadaiva dhūmaparāmarśasmṛtir iti /
analyzed: atha manyase na tadānīm punar dhūma jñāna vyāpti smaraṇa tad parāmarśa utpāda ādi jñāna śṛṅkhalā bhyupeyate kintu prāktanaḥ eva dhūma parāmarśaḥ kṛśānau sukha sādhana tva anusmaraṇa anantaram smariṣyate tena smṛti viṣaya vartinā satā tathā ca ayam agni jātīyaḥ iti jvalana parāmarśaḥ janayiṣyate iti etat api ayuktam agni jñāna anantaram yugapad smaraṇa dvaya udaya prasaṅgāt tadā eva sukha sādhana tā nusmṛtiḥ tadā eva dhūma parāmarśa sm

original: na hi kramotpāde kiñcit kāraṇam asti /
analyzed: na hi krama utpāde kiñcid kāraṇam asti

original: jñānayaugapadyaṃ ca śāstre pratiṣiddham //
analyzed: jñāna yaugapadyam ca śāstre pratiṣiddham

original: bhavatu vā kramotpādaḥ tathā 'pi smaraṇadvayasamanantaram upajāyamānaḥ pāvakaparāmarśo nopalabhyānuvādena jāyate /
analyzed: bhavatu vā krama utpādaḥ tathā pi smaraṇa dvaya samanantaram upajāyamānaḥ pāvaka parāmarśaḥ na upalabhya anuvādena jāyate

original: kramapakṣe 'pi ca vahnijñānānantaraṃ tadgatasukhasādhanatvānusmaraṇam eva pūrvaṃ bhavet tato dhūmaparāmarśasmaraṇam tena tasya vinaśyattā tato 'gnau tajjātīyatvaparāmarśaḥ tena sukhasādhanatvasmṛter vināśa eveti punar api sā vinaṣṭā satī sukhasādhanatvaniścayajanmani na vyāpriyeteti /
analyzed: krama pakṣe ca vahni jñāna anantaram tad gata sukha sādhanatva anusmaraṇam eva pūrvam bhavet tatas dhūma parāmarśa smaraṇam tena tasya vinaśyat tā tatas gnau tad jātīya tva parāmarśaḥ tena sukha sādhanatva smṛteḥ vināśaḥ eva iti punar api sā vinaṣṭā satī sukha sādhanatva niścaya janmani na vyāpriyeta iti

original: na ca dhūmaliṅgānumitavahnijñānānantaraṃ dhūmasmaraṇam ucitam analam upalabhya hi tadgatasukhasādhanatvam anusmarati lokaḥ na dhūmam iti /
analyzed: na ca dhūma liṅga anumita vahni jñāna anantaram dhūma smaraṇam ucitam analam upalabhya hi tad gata sukha sādhanatvam anusmarati lokaḥ na dhūmam iti

original: tenānumānaviṣaye parāmarśo 'tidurghaṭaḥ /
analyzed: tena anumāna viṣaye parāmarśaḥ ti durghaṭaḥ

original: pratyakṣaviṣaye 'py evaṃ kim anena śikhaṇḍinā //
analyzed: pratyakṣa viṣaye pi evam kim anena śikhaṇḍinā

original: yat punaḥ upanayavacanam abhidheyarahitam aprayojyaṃ prasajyata iti paricoditam tat avayaviprasaṅga eva nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: yat punar upanaya vacanam abhidheya rahitam aprayojyam prasajyate iti paricoditam tat avayavi prasaṅge eva nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ

original: tasmād antarāvartinaḥ parāmarśajñānasyābhāvāt ādyam ālocanājñānam eva heyādijñānaphalaṃ yathoktarītyā bhaviṣyatīti //
analyzed: tasmāt antara āvartinaḥ parāmarśa jñānasya abhāvāt ādyam ālocanā jñānam eva heya ādi jñāna phalam yathā ukta rītyā bhaviṣyati iti

original: nanu ca pratyakṣaphalam iha mīmāṃsyaṃ vartate sa cāyaṃ sukhasādhanatvāl liṅgād udgamyamānaḥ ānumānika iti na pratyakṣaphalatām avalambate satyam etat kintu sambandhagrahaṇasamaye sukhasādhanatvaniścayaḥ pratyakṣajanito 'pi samasti yato 'numānaṃ pravartate mahānasādau dhūmāgnidarśanavat /
analyzed: nanu ca pratyakṣa phalam iha mīmāṃsyam vartate sa ca ayam sukha sādhana tvāt liṅgāt udgamyamānaḥ ānumānikaḥ iti na pratyakṣa phala tām avalambate satyam etat kintu sambandha grahaṇa samaye sukha sādhana tva niścayaḥ samasti yatas numānam pravartate mahānasa ādau dhūma agni darśana vat

original: ataḥ sambandhagrahaṇakālabhāvinaṃ sukhasādhanatvaniścayaṃ cetasi vidhāya bhāṣyakāras tatphalatvaṃ pratyakṣajñānasya varṇitavān iti //
analyzed: atas sambandha grahaṇa kāla bhāvinam sukha sādhanatva niścayam cetasi vidhāya bhāṣyakāraḥ tad phala tvam pratyakṣa jñānasya varṇitavān iti

original: nanu sambandhagrahaṇakāle 'pi sukhasādhanatvaśakter atīndriyatvāt kathaṃ pratyakṣagamyatā tajjātīyatvāl liṅgād eva tadā 'pi tadgrahaṇe iṣyamāṇe tataḥ punaḥ sambandhagrahaṇād anavasthā /
analyzed: nanu sambandha grahaṇa kāle pi sukha sādhanatva śakteḥ atīndriya tvāt katham pratyakṣa gamya tā tad jātīya tvāt liṅgāt eva tadā pi tad grahaṇe iṣyamāṇe tatas punar sambandha grahaṇāt anavasthā

original: sukhād eva kāryāt tadā tadavagama iti cet tadā 'pi nājñātasambandham avagatijananasamartham iti tatsaṃbandhagrahaṇavelāyām api śaktigrahaṇe pratyakṣasyākṣamatvāt anumānāntarāpekṣāyām anavasthā tadavasthā ucyate na khalv atīndriyā śaktiḥ asmābhir upagamyate /
analyzed: sukhāt eva kāryāt tadā tad avagamaḥ iti ced tadā pi na ajñāta sambandham avagati janana samartham iti tad saṃbandha grahaṇa velāyām api śakti grahaṇe pratyakṣasya akṣama tvāt anumāna antara apekṣāyām anavasthā tad avasthā ucyate na khalu atīndriyā śaktiḥ asmābhiḥ upagamyate

original: yayā saha na kāryasya sambandhajñānasaṃbhavaḥ //
analyzed: yayā saha na kāryasya sambandha jñāna saṃbhavaḥ

original: svarūpasahakārisannidhānam eva śaktiḥ sā ca sugamaiva //
analyzed: svarūpa sahakāri sannidhānam eva śaktiḥ sā ca sugamā eva

original: nanu sahakāriṇāṃ madhye adṛṣṭam apy anupraviṣṭam /
analyzed: nanu sahakāriṇām madhye adṛṣṭam api anupraviṣṭam

original: na ca tat pratyakṣagamyam atīndriyatvād dharmasyeti sā 'pi na sugamā śaktiḥ naitat na dharmādi śaktitvād atīndriyam api tu tat naisargikam eva /
analyzed: na ca tat pratyakṣa gamyam atīndriya tvāt dharmasya iti sā na sugamā śaktiḥ na etat na dharma ādi śakti tvāt atīndriyam api tu tat naisargikam eva

original: jagadvaicitryeṇa tad anumānaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: jagat vaicitryeṇa tat anumānam vakṣyāmaḥ

original: tad evaṃ taditarasahakārisvarūpasannidhānātmikāyāḥ śakteḥ pratyakṣagrāhyatvasaṃbhavāt upapannaṃ tajjātīyatvaliṅgasya saṃbandhagrahaṇam //
analyzed: tat evam tad itara sahakāri sva rūpa sannidhāna ātmikāyāḥ śakteḥ pratyakṣa grāhya tva saṃbhavāt upapannam tad jātīya tva liṅgasya saṃbandha grahaṇam

original: nanu kapitthādikāryasya sukhasyedānīṃ na cakṣurgrāhyatvam iti tatsambandhagrahaṇābhāvāt kathaṃ cākṣuṣapratyayagamyaḥ sambandhaḥ na cākṣuṣagamyaḥ sambandhaḥ kintu mānasapratyakṣagamyaḥ /
analyzed: nanu kapittha ādi kāryasya sukhasya idānīm na cakṣuḥ grāhya tvam iti tad sambandha grahaṇa abhāvāt katham cākṣuṣa pratyaya gamyaḥ sambandhaḥ na cākṣuṣa gamyaḥ sambandhaḥ kintu mānasa pratyakṣa gamyaḥ

original: sukhādi manasā buddhvā kapitthādi ca cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: sukha ādi manasā buddhvā kapittha ādi ca cakṣuṣā

original: tasya kāraṇatā tatra manasaivāvagamyate //
analyzed: tasya kāraṇa tā tatra manasā eva avagamyate

original: nanu ca manasā kapitthādeḥ sukhasādhanatvagrahaṇābhyupagame bāhyaviṣayapramitiṣu mana eva niraṅkuśaṃ karaṇam idānīṃ saṃvṛttim iti kṛtaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ /
analyzed: nanu ca manasā kapittha ādeḥ sukha sādhanatva grahaṇa abhyupagame bāhya viṣaya pramitiṣu manaḥ eva niraṅkuśam karaṇam idānīm saṃvṛttim iti kṛtam cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ

original: ataś ca na kaścid andho vā badhiro vā syāt naiṣa doṣaḥ prathamapravṛttasamanaskabāhyendriyajanitavijñānaviṣayīkṛtavapuṣo bāhyasya vastuno manogrāhyatvābhyupagamāt tasyaiva niyāmakatvāt nocchṛṅkhalam antaḥkaraṇaṃ bāhyaviṣaye pravartate //
analyzed: atas ca na kaścid andhaḥ vā badhiraḥ vā syāt na eṣa doṣaḥ prathama pravṛtta sa manaska bāhya indriya janita vijñāna viṣayīkṛta vapuṣaḥ bāhyasya vastunaḥ manaḥ grāhya tva abhyupagamāt tasya eva niyāmaka tvāt na ucchṛṅkhalam antaḥkaraṇam bāhya viṣaye pravartate

original: nanu ca sambandhagrahaṇakāle yadi mānasena pratyakṣeṇa sukhasādhanatvāvadhāraṇaṃ tarhi tatkāla iva vyavahārakāle 'pi mānasapratyakṣa eva sukhasādhanatvaniścayo 'stu kiṃ tajjātīyatvaliṅgāpekṣaeṇeneti maivam śabdaliṅgendriyādyuparatau kevalam antaḥkaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ kalpyate paridṛśyamānāyāḥ pratīter apahnotum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: nanu ca sambandha grahaṇa kāle yadi mānasena pratyakṣeṇa sukha sādhanatva avadhāraṇam tarhi tad kāle iva vyavahāra kāle mānasa pratyakṣe eva sukha sādhanatva niścayaḥ u stu kim tad jātīya tva liṅga apekṣaeṇena iti mā evam śabda liṅga indriya ādi uparatau kevalam antaḥkaraṇam karaṇam kalpyate paridṛśyamānāyāḥ pratīteḥ apahnotum aśakya tvāt

original: liṅgādyupāyāntarasaṃbhave tu yadi mana eva kevalaṃ kāraṇam ucyate tanmānasam evaikaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt na catvāri pramāṇāni bhaveyur ity alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: liṅga ādi upāya antara saṃbhave tu yadi manaḥ eva kevalam kāraṇam ucyate tat mānasam eva ekam pramāṇam syāt na catvāri pramāṇāni bhaveyuḥ iti alam prasaṅgena

original: tasmāt sambandhagrahaṇakāle yat tat kapitthādiviṣayam akṣajaṃ jñānaṃ tat upādeyādijñānaphalam iti bhāṣyakṛtaś cetasi sthitam /
analyzed: tasmāt sambandha grahaṇa kāle yat tat kapittha ādi viṣayam akṣa jam jñānam tat upādeya ādi jñāna phalam iti bhāṣyakṛtaḥ cetasi sthitam

original: sukhasādhanatvajñānam evopādeyādijñānam ity uktam //
analyzed: sukha sādhana tva jñānam eva upādeya ādi jñānam iti uktam

original: āha kim artham ayam īdṛśaḥ kleśa āśrīyate pramāṇād abhinnam eva phalam astu tad eva cakṣurādijanitaṃ kapitthādipadārthadarśanaṃ viṣayaprakāśena vyāpriyamāṇam ivābhātīti karaṇam ucyatām tad eva viṣayānubhavasvabhāvatvāt phalam iti kathyatām /
analyzed: āha kim artham ayam īdṛśaḥ kleśaḥ āśrīyate pramāṇāt abhinnam eva phalam astu tat eva cakṣuḥ ādi janitam kapittha ādi padārtha darśanam viṣaya prakāśena vyāpriyamāṇam iva ābhāti iti karaṇam ucyatām tat eva viṣaya anubhava svabhāva tvāt phalam iti kathyatām

original: itthaṃ ca pramāṇaphale na bhinnādhikaraṇe bhaviṣyataḥ anyatra pramāṇaṃ anyatra phalam iti /
analyzed: ittham ca pramāṇa phale na bhinna adhikaraṇe bhaviṣyataḥ anyatra pramāṇam anyatra phalam iti

original: tad uktam [savyāpārapratītitvāt pramāṇaṃ phalam eva sat] iti //
analyzed: tat uktam sa vyāpāra pratīti tvāt pramāṇam phalam eva sat iti

original: tad idam anupapannam pramāṇasya svarūpahāniprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam pramāṇasya svarūpa hāni prasaṅgāt

original: karaṇaṃ hi pramāṇam ucyate pramīyate cāneneti /
analyzed: karaṇam hi pramāṇam ucyate pramīyate ca anena iti

original: na ca kriyaiva kvacit karaṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na ca kriyā eva kvacid karaṇam bhavati

original: kriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ kāraṇaṃ kim api karaṇam ucyate /
analyzed: kriyāyām sādhyāyām kāraṇam kim api karaṇam ucyate

original: tatra yathā [dātreṇa caitraḥ śālistambaṃ lunāti] iti kartṛkarmakaraṇāni kriyāto bhinnāny upalabhyante tathehāpi [cakṣuṣā ghaṭaṃ paśyati] iti darśanakriyātaḥ pṛthagbhāva eva teṣāṃ yuktaḥ na darśanaṃkaraṇam eveti /
analyzed: tatra yathā dātreṇa caitraḥ śāli stambam lunāti iti kartṛ karma karaṇāni kriyātaḥ bhinnāni upalabhyante tathā iha api cakṣuṣā ghaṭam paśyati iti darśana kriyātaḥ pṛthagbhāvaḥ eva teṣām yuktaḥ na darśanam karaṇam eva iti

original: pramā pramāṇam iti tu phale pramāṇaśabdasya sādhutvākhyānamātraṃ kṛtiḥ karaṇaṃ itivat //
analyzed: pramā pramāṇam iti tu phale pramāṇa śabdasya sādhu tva ākhyāna mātram kṛtiḥ karaṇam itivat

original: yat tu na bhinnādhikaraṇe pramāṇaphale itthaṃ bhaviṣyataḥ iti seyam apūrvavācoyuktiḥ /
analyzed: yat tu na bhinna adhikaraṇe pramāṇa phale ittham bhaviṣyataḥ iti sā iyam apūrva vācoyuktiḥ

original: kim atrādhikaraṇaṃ vivakṣitam yadi tāvad viṣayaḥ tad asty evaikaviṣayatvam /
analyzed: kim atra adhikaraṇam vivakṣitam yadi tāvat viṣayaḥ tat asti eva eka viṣayatvam

original: yad viṣayaṃ hi darśanam sa eva cakṣurādeḥ karaṇasya viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: yad viṣayam hi darśanam saḥ eva cakṣuḥ ādeḥ karaṇasya viṣayaḥ

original: āśrayo 'stv adhikaraṇam iti bauddhagṛhe tāvad avācako granthaḥ /
analyzed: āśrayaḥ astu adhikaraṇam iti bauddha gṛhe tāvat avācakaḥ granthaḥ

original: kṣaṇikatvena sarvakāryāṇāṃ nirādhāratvāt //
analyzed: kṣaṇika tvena sarva kāryāṇām nirādhāra tvāt

original: asmatpakṣe tu bhinnāśrayor api phalakaraṇabhāvaḥ pākakāṣṭhayor dṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: asmad pakṣe tu bhinna āśrayoḥ api phala karaṇa bhāvaḥ pāka kāṣṭhayoḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: tathā cakṣurjñānayor api bhaviṣyatīti /
analyzed: tathā cakṣuḥ jñānayoḥ api bhaviṣyati iti

original: kvacit tu bhinnayor api jñānayoḥ phalakaraṇatvena sthitayoḥ liṅgaliṅgijñānayor iva viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyajñānayor iva caikātmyāśrayatvam asti /
analyzed: kvacid tu bhinnayoḥ api jñānayoḥ phala karaṇa tvena sthitayoḥ liṅga liṅgi jñānayoḥ iva viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya jñānayoḥ iva ca aikātmya āśraya tvam asti

original: na tv anena samānāśrayatvena prayojanam cakṣurādāv anirvahaṇāt //
analyzed: na tu anena samāna āśraya tvena prayojanam cakṣuḥ ādau anirvahaṇāt

original: atha ekaphalaniṣpattau vyāpārasamānāśrayatvam ucyate tad api bhavatu kārakāntarāṇāṃ na tu phalasvabhāvasya jñānasya phalaniṣpattau vyāpāraḥ saṃbhavati //
analyzed: atha eka phala niṣpattau vyāpāra samāna āśraya tvam ucyate tat api bhavatu kāraka antarāṇām na tu phala svabhāvasya jñānasya phala niṣpattau vyāpāraḥ saṃbhavati

original: yad api savyāpārapratītitvād ity ucyate tad api pramāṇaphalayor bhinnatām eva sūcayati /
analyzed: yat api sa vyāpāra pratīti tvāt iti ucyate tat api pramāṇa phalayoḥ bhinna tām eva sūcayati

original: na hi svarūpaniṣpattau savyāpāratvam upapadyate api tu pṛthagbhūtaphalanirvṛttāv eveti //
analyzed: na hi svarūpa niṣpattau sa vyāpāra tvam upapadyate api tu pṛthak bhūta phala nirvṛttau eva iti

original: nanu vastusthityā phalam eva jñānaṃ phalam api tu bhavat viṣayānubhavaṃ prati vyāpṛtam iti /
analyzed: nanu vastu sthityā phalam eva jñānam phalam api tu bhavat viṣaya anubhavam prati vyāpṛtam iti

original: ayi mugdabuddhe viṣayānubhava eva jñānam ucyate na tu viṣayānubhavaḥ viṣayānubhave savyāpāro bhavati //
analyzed: ayi mugda buddhe viṣaya anubhavaḥ eva jñānam ucyate na tu viṣaya anubhavaḥ viṣaya anubhave sa vyāpāraḥ bhavati

original: athamanuṣe viṣayādhigamābhimānaḥ tasmin sati bhavatīti ko 'yam abhimāno nāma viṣayānubhavāt bhinnaḥ abhinno vā abhede sati tasmin sati bhavatīty asaṅgatā vāco yuktiḥ /
analyzed: viṣaya adhigama abhimānaḥ tasmin sati bhavati iti kaḥ yam abhimānaḥ nāma viṣaya anubhavāt bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ vā abhede sati tasmin sati bhavati iti asaṅga tā vācaḥ yuktiḥ

original: bhede tv asmanmatānupraveśaḥ //
analyzed: bhede tu asmad mata anupraveśaḥ

original: api tu jñānaṃ viṣayādhigame vyāpṛtam iti kṛtvā viṣayādhigamābhimānam upajanayati uta viṣayādhigamasvabhāvatvād eva iti vicāre viṣayādhigamāt pṛthagbhūtasya tatra vyāpriyamāṇasyānupalaṃbhāt viṣayādhigamasvabhāvam eva jñānam avadhāryate /
analyzed: api tu jñānam viṣaya adhigame vyāpṛtam iti kṛtvā viṣaya adhigama abhimānam upajanayati uta viṣaya adhigama svabhāva tvāt eva iti vicāre viṣaya adhigamāt pṛthak bhūtasya tatra vyāpriyamāṇasya anupalaṃbhāt viṣaya adhigama svabhāvam eva jñānam avadhāryate

original: tatkṛtaś cābhimāna iti phalam eva jñānam avakalpate na karaṇam iti /
analyzed: tad kṛtaḥ ca abhimānaḥ iti phalam eva jñānam avakalpate na karaṇam iti

original: tathā hy ayaṃ vadati cakṣuṣā paśyāmi liṅgena jānāmīti na tu jñānena jānāmīti vyapadiśan kaścid dṛśyate //
analyzed: tathā hi ayam vadati cakṣuṣā paśyāmi liṅgena jānāmi iti na tu jñānena jānāmi iti vyapadiśan kaścid dṛśyate

original: nanu satsv api cakṣurādiṣu viṣayajñānam anupajanayatsu na karaṇatāṃ vyapadiśati lokaḥ janayatsu ca vyapadiśatīti loke karaṇotpādakatvād eva teṣāṃ karaṇatvavyapadeśaḥ na sākṣāt karaṇatvād iti tad ayuktam cakṣurādy eva karaṇaṃ na tu tenānyat karaṇam upajanyate /
analyzed: nanu satsu api cakṣuḥ ādiṣu viṣaya jñānam anupajanayatsu na karaṇatām vyapadiśati lokaḥ janayatsu ca vyapadiśati iti loke karaṇa utpādaka tvāt eva teṣām karaṇa tva vyapadeśaḥ na sākṣāt karaṇa tvāt iti tat ayuktam cakṣuḥ ādi eva karaṇam na tu tena anyat karaṇam upajanyate

original: kiṃ hi tad anyat karaṇam jñānam iti cet kasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ tat karaṇam iti parīkṣyatām etat /
analyzed: kim hi tat anyat karaṇam jñānam iti ced kasyām kriyāyām tat karaṇam iti parīkṣyatām etat

original: na hy ātmany eva kiñcit karaṇaṃ karaṇaṃ bhavatīti //
analyzed: na hi ātmani eva kiñcid karaṇam karaṇam bhavati iti

original: yat tu jñānam upajanayati cakṣurādau na karaṇatām ācaṣṭe lokaḥ tad yuktam eva /
analyzed: yat tu jñānam upajanayati cakṣuḥ ādau na karaṇatām ācaṣṭe lokaḥ tat yuktam eva

original: na hi kriyotpattāv avyāpriyamāṇaṃ karaṇaṃ kārakaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na hi kriyā utpattau a vyāpriyamāṇam karaṇam kārakam bhavati

original: tena cakṣurāder jñānakriyām upajanayataḥ karaṇatvam jñānasya tu phalatvam eveti yuktas tathā vyapadeśaḥ //
analyzed: tena cakṣuḥ ādeḥ jñāna kriyām upajanayataḥ karaṇa tvam jñānasya tu phala tvam eva iti yuktaḥ tathā vyapadeśaḥ

original: pramāṇasya pramāṇatvaṃ tasmād abhyupagacchatām /
analyzed: pramāṇasya pramāṇa tvam tasmāt abhyupagacchatām

original: bhinnaṃ phalam upetavyaṃ ekatve tad asaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: bhinnam phalam upetavyam eka tve tad asaṃbhavāt

original: yas tu mūḍhataraḥ pramāṇaprameyaphalavyavahāram ekatraiva jñānātmani nirvāhayitum udyacchati [yad ābhāsaṃ prameyaṃ tat pramāṇaphalate punaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu mūḍhataraḥ pramāṇa prameya phala vyavahāram ekatra eva jñāna ātmani nirvāhayitum udyacchati yat ābhāsam prameyam tat pramāṇa phalate punar

original: grāhakākārasaṃvittyoḥ trayaṃ nātaḥ pṛthak kṛtam //] iti tam apavargāhnike jñānādvaitadalanaprasaṅgena durācāraṃ nirbhartsayiṣyāmaha ity alaṃ vistareṇa /
analyzed: grāhaka ākāra saṃvittyoḥ trayam na atas pṛthak kṛtam iti tam apavarga āhnike jñāna advaita dalana prasaṅgena durācāram nirbhartsayiṣyāmahe iti alam vistareṇa

original: tasmāt suṣṭhūktaṃ [yadā jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadā hānādibuddhayaḥ phalam] iti //
analyzed: tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam yadā jñānam pramāṇam tadā hāna ādi buddhayaḥ phalam iti

original: tad evaṃ phalaviśeṣaṇapakṣe [yataḥ] śabdādhyāhāreṇa vācakaṃ sūtraṃ yata indriyārthasannikarṣotpannatvādiviśeṣaṇaviśeṣitaṃ jñānākhyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati tat pratyakṣam iti //
analyzed: tat evam phala viśeṣaṇa pakṣe yatas śabda adhyāhāreṇa vācakam sūtram yatas indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tva ādi viśeṣaṇa viśeṣitam jñāna ākhyam phalam bhavati tat pratyakṣam iti

original: tatra indriyārthasannikarṣotpannapadaṃ arthānapekṣajanmanaḥ smṛtyādijñānasya arthajanitasyāpi ca parokṣaviṣayasyānumānādijñānasya vyavacchedārtham /
analyzed: tatra indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padam artha anapekṣa janmanaḥ smṛti ādi jñānasya artha janitasya api ca parokṣa viṣayasya anumāna ādi jñānasya vyavaccheda artham

original: ataḥ tajjanakasya na pratyakṣatā prasajyate //
analyzed: atas tad janakasya na pratyakṣa tā prasajyate

original: nanu indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam indriyagatyanumānam apy asti /
analyzed: nanu indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam indriya gati anumānam api asti

original: tad dhi indriyārthasannikarṣeṇa liṅgabhūtena janyate deśāntaraprāpty eva tapanagamanānumānam iti katham anena padenānumānam apākriyate naitad evam indriyeṇa svaviṣayasannikṛṣṭena satā tatraiva yad vijñānam utpadyate tat indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam iha brūmahe /
analyzed: tat hi indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa liṅga bhūtena janyate deśa antara prāptī eva tapana gamana anumānam iti katham anena padena anumānam apākriyate na etat evam indriyeṇa sva viṣaya sannikṛṣṭena satā tatra eva yat vijñānam utpadyate tat indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iha brūmahe

original: na ced dṛśam indriyagatyanumānam //
analyzed: na ced dṛśam indriya gati anumānam

original: kuto viśeṣapratilambha iti cet utpannagrahaṇād iti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: kutas viśeṣa pratilambhaḥ iti ced utpanna grahaṇāt iti brūmaḥ

original: utpannagrahaṇena hi sannikarṣasya kārakatvaṃ khyāpyate /
analyzed: utpanna grahaṇena hi sannikarṣasya kāraka tvam khyāpyate

original: tac cāpīndriyaviṣaye 'rthe jñānam utpādayato nirvahati /
analyzed: tat ca api indriya viṣaye rthe jñānam utpādayataḥ nirvahati

original: indriyagatyanumāne tu na sannikarṣaṃ kārakam āhuḥ api tu jñāpakam /
analyzed: indriya gati anumāne tu na sannikarṣam kārakam āhuḥ api tu jñāpakam

original: ata eva svagrahaṇasāpekṣaḥ tadanumāne 'sau vyāpriyate na rūpādipramitāv iva tannirapekṣa iti //
analyzed: atas eva sva grahaṇa sāpekṣaḥ tad anumāne sau vyāpriyate na rūpa ādi pramitau iva tad nirapekṣaḥ iti

original: indriyāṇi ghrāṇarasananayanasparśanaśrotrāṇi pṛthivyādibhūtapañcakaprakṛtīni vakṣyante /
analyzed: indriyāṇi ghrāṇa rasana nayana sparśana śrotrāṇi pṛthivī ādi bhūta pañcaka prakṛtīni vakṣyante

original: arthās tu gandharūparasasparśaśabdāḥ gandhatvādisvajātyavacchinnāḥ tadadhikaraṇāni pṛthivyaptejāṃsi dravyāṇi tadadhiṣṭhānāḥ saṅkhyādayo guṇāḥ utkṣepaṇādīni karmāṇi tadvṛttīni sāmānyāni yeṣāṃ sparśanena cakṣuṣā grahaṇaṃ kaṇavratamate nirūpitaṃ te 'rthāḥ /
analyzed: arthāḥ tu gandha rūpa rasa sparśa śabdāḥ gandha tva ādi sva jāti avacchinnāḥ tad adhikaraṇāni pṛthivī ap tejāṃsi dravyāṇi tad adhiṣṭhānāḥ saṅkhyā ādayaḥ guṇāḥ utkṣepaṇa ādīni karmāṇi tad vṛttīni sāmānyāni yeṣām sparśanena cakṣuṣā grahaṇam kaṇavrata mate nirūpitam te rthāḥ

original: prāguktaś cābhāvo 'py artha eva vicārya gamyamānatvāt //
analyzed: prāk uktaḥ ca abhāvaḥ pi arthaḥ eva vicārya gamyamāna tvāt

original: sannikarṣas tv indriyāṇām arthaiḥ saha ṣaṭprakāraḥ /
analyzed: sannikarṣaḥ tu indriyāṇām arthaiḥ saha ṣaṣ prakāraḥ

original: tatra dravyaṃ cakṣuṣā tvagindriyeṇa vā saṃyogāt gṛhyate /
analyzed: tatra dravyam cakṣuṣā tvac indriyeṇa vā saṃyogāt gṛhyate

original: tadgato rūpādir guṇaḥ saṃyuktasamavāyāt /
analyzed: tad gataḥ rūpa ādiḥ guṇaḥ saṃyukta samavāyāt

original: rūpatvādisāmānyāni saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyāt gṛhyante /
analyzed: rūpa tva ādi sāmānyāni saṃyukta samaveta samavāyāt gṛhyante

original: cakṣuṣā saṃyuktaṃ dravyaṃ tatra samavetaṃ rūpaṃ rūpe ca samavetaṃ rūpatvam iti /
analyzed: cakṣuṣā saṃyuktam dravyam tatra samavetam rūpam rūpe ca samavetam rūpa tvam iti

original: samavāyāc chabdo gṛhyate /
analyzed: samavāyāt śabdaḥ gṛhyate

original: śrotram ākāśadravyam tatra samavetaḥ śabdaḥ /
analyzed: śrotram ākāśa dravyam tatra samavetaḥ śabdaḥ

original: śabdatvaṃ samavetasamavāyāt gṛhyate śrotrākāśasamavete śabde tad dhi samavetam iti /
analyzed: śabda tvam samaveta samavāyāt gṛhyate śrotra ākāśa samavete śabde tat hi samavetam iti

original: saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇabhāvād abhāvagrahaṇaṃ vyākhyātam /
analyzed: saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa bhāvāt abhāva grahaṇam vyākhyātam

original: iha ghaṭo nāstīti cakṣuṣā saṃyukto bhūpradeśaḥ tadviśeṣaṇībhūtaś cābhāva iti //
analyzed: iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti cakṣuṣā saṃyuktaḥ bhū pradeśaḥ tad viśeṣaṇībhūtaḥ ca abhāvaḥ iti

original: nanu sannikarṣāvagame kiṃ pramāṇam vyavahitānupalabdhir iti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: nanu sannikarṣa avagame kim pramāṇam vyavahita anupalabdhiḥ iti brūmaḥ

original: yadi hy asannikṛṣṭam api cakṣurādīndriyaṃ arthaṃ gṛhṇīyāt vyavahito 'pi tato 'rtha upalabhyeta na copalabhyate tasmād asti sannikarṣaḥ //
analyzed: yadi hi asannikṛṣṭam api cakṣuḥ ādi indriyam artham gṛhṇīyāt vyavahitaḥ tatas rthaḥ upalabhyeta na ca upalabhyate tasmāt asti sannikarṣaḥ

original: nanu avyavadhānam evāstu kiṃ sannikarṣeṇa maivam indriyāṇāṃ kārakatvena prāpyakāritvāt /
analyzed: nanu avyavadhānam evā astu kim sannikarṣeṇa mā evam indriyāṇām kāraka tvena prāpya kāri tvāt

original: saṃsṛṣṭaṃ ca kārakaṃ phalāya kalpata iti kalpanīyaḥ saṃsargaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭam ca kārakam phalāya kalpate iti kalpanīyaḥ saṃsargaḥ

original: etac ca indriyaparīkṣāyāṃ nipuṇaṃ nirṇeṣyate iti neha vivicyate /
analyzed: etat ca indriya parīkṣāyām nipuṇam nirṇeṣyate iti na iha vivicyate

original: rasasparśanayoś ca spaṣṭaṃ prāpyakāritvam upalabhyate iti tatsāmānyād indriyāntareṣv api kalpanīyam iti //
analyzed: rasa sparśanayoḥ ca spaṣṭam prāpyakāri tvam upalabhyate iti tad sāmānyāt indriya antareṣu api kalpanīyam iti

original: nanu evaṃ saty arthākṣiptaḥ kārakatvād eva sannikarṣa iti svakaṇṭhena kasmād ucyate ṣaḍvidhatvajñāpanārtham ity uktam //
analyzed: nanu evam sati artha ākṣiptaḥ kāraka tvāt eva sannikarṣaḥ iti sva kaṇṭhena kasmāt ucyate ṣaḍvidha tva jñāpana artham iti uktam

original: utpannagrahaṇena indriyārthayor jñānajanakatvaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: utpanna grahaṇena indriya arthayoḥ jñāna janaka tvam darśayati

original: tatra indriyaṃ karaṇatvena janakam arthas tu karmatvena //
analyzed: tatra indriyam karaṇa tvena janakam arthaḥ tu karma tvena

original: nanu arthasya jñānajanakatvaṃ kuto 'vagamyate tadviṣayajñānotpādād eva /
analyzed: nanu arthasya jñāna janaka tvam kutas avagamyate tad viṣaya jñāna utpādāt eva

original: svatas sākāratvasya nirākṛtatvāt /
analyzed: svatas sa ākāra tvasya nirākṛta tvāt

original: prakārāntareṇa pratikarmavyavasthāyā asiddheḥ //
analyzed: prakāra antareṇa prati karma vyavasthāyāḥ asiddheḥ

original: nanu prayojanam etat pramāṇaṃ pṛṣṭo 'si tad brūhi ucyate etad eva pramāṇam anyasyāpi vīraṇādeḥ karmakārakasya kaṭādikāryotpattau pratyakṣānupalaṃbhapratipannābhyām anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ yathā kāraṇatvam avadhāryate tathā 'rthasyāpi jñānotpattau /
analyzed: nanu prayojanam etat pramāṇam tat brūhi ucyate etat eva pramāṇam anyasya api vīraṇa ādeḥ karma kārakasya kaṭa ādi kārya utpattau pratyakṣa anupalaṃbha pratipannābhyām anvaya vyatirekābhyām yathā kāraṇa tvam avadhāryate tathā rthasya api jñāna utpattau

original: yathā hi devadattārthī kaścit gṛhaṃ gataḥ tatrāsannihitaṃ na paśyati devadattam kṣaṇāntare cainam āyāntaṃ paśyati tatrānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ devadattasadasattvānuvartinau jñānotpādānutpādāv avadhārya mānasena pratyakṣeṇa candanasukhavad asya tatkāraṇatāṃ pratipadyate //
analyzed: yathā hi devadatta arthī kaścid gṛham gataḥ tatra asannihitam na paśyati devadattam kṣaṇa antare ca enam āyāntam paśyati tatra anvaya vyatirekābhyām devadatta sat asattva anuvartinau jñāna utpāda anutpādau avadhārya mānasena pratyakṣeṇa candana sukha vat asya tad kāraṇa tām pratipadyate

original: nanu vīraṇakaṭayoḥ pṛthag upalaṃbhāt yukta eṣa nyāyaḥ arthas tu jñānāt pṛthak na kadācid upalabhyata iti duradhigamau tatrānvayavyatirekau ucyate ayam eva pṛthag upalaṃbhaḥ yadasannihite 'rthe na tad viṣayam abādhitaṃ jñānam utpadyata iti /
analyzed: nanu vīraṇa kaṭayoḥ pṛthak upalaṃbhāt yuktaḥ eṣa nyāyaḥ arthaḥ tu jñānāt pṛthak na kadācid upalabhyate iti duradhigamau tatra anvaya vyatirekau ucyate ayam eva pṛthak upalaṃbhaḥ yat asannihite rthe na tat viṣayam abādhitam jñānam utpadyate iti

original: tad alam asminn avasare jñānavādagarbhacodyodbibhāvayiṣayā bhaviṣyaty etadavasare iti //
analyzed: tat alam asmin avasare jñāna vāda garbha codyā udbibhāvayiṣayā bhaviṣyati etad avasare iti

original: yathā cendriyāṇāṃ karaṇānāṃ anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ jñānakāraṇatvaṃ evam arthasya karmaṇo 'pīty utpannagrahaṇena darśitam //
analyzed: yathā ca indriyāṇām karaṇānām anvaya vyatirekābhyām jñāna kāraṇa tvam evam arthasya karmaṇaḥ pi iti utpanna grahaṇena darśitam

original: nanu indriyārthasannikarṣotpannapadena sukhādiviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na saṅgṛhītam na na saṅgṛhītam manasa indriyatvāt sukhāder arthasya tadgrāhyatvāt /
analyzed: nanu indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena sukha ādi viṣayam pratyakṣam na saṅgṛhītam na na saṅgṛhītam manasaḥ indriya tvāt sukha ādeḥ arthasya tad grāhya tvāt

original: bhautikagrāṇādīndriyadharmavailakṣaṇyāt tu manasas tadvarge parigaṇanaṃ na kṛtam iti //
analyzed: bhautika grāṇa ādi indriya dharma vailakṣaṇyāt tu manasaḥ tad varge parigaṇanam na kṛtam iti

original: tac cedaṃ pratyakṣaṃ catuṣṭayatrayadvayasannikarṣāt pravartate /
analyzed: tat ca idam pratyakṣam catuṣṭaya traya dvaya sannikarṣāt pravartate

original: tatra bāhye rūpādau viṣaye catuṣṭayasannikarṣāt jñānam utpadyate ātmā manasā saṃyujyate mana indriyeṇa indriyam artheneti /
analyzed: tatra bāhye rūpa ādau viṣaye catuṣṭaya sannikarṣāt jñānam utpadyate ātmā manasā saṃyujyate manaḥ indriyeṇa indriyam arthena iti

original: sukhādau tu trayasannikarṣāt jñānam utpadyate tatra cakṣurādivyāpārābhāvāt /
analyzed: sukha ādau tu traya sannikarṣāt jñānam utpadyate tatra cakṣuḥ ādi vyāpāra abhāvāt

original: ātmani tu yoginaḥ dvayor ātmamanasor eva saṃyogāt jñānam upajāyate tṛtīyasya grāhyasya grāhakasya vā tatrābhāvāt /
analyzed: ātmani tu yoginaḥ dvayoḥ ātma manasoḥ eva saṃyogāt jñānam upajāyate tṛtīyasya grāhyasya grāhakasya vā tatra abhāvāt

original: tasmāt sukhādijñānasaṅgrahāt indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam iti yuktam uktam /
analyzed: tasmāt sukha ādi jñāna saṅgrahāt indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti yuktam uktam

original: ātmamanasos tu sad api jñānajanakatvam iha na sūtritam sarvapramāṇasādhāraṇatvāt //
analyzed: ātma manasoḥ tu sat api jñāna janaka tvam iha na sūtritam sarva pramāṇa sādhāraṇa tvāt

original: jñānagrahaṇaṃ viśeṣyanirdeśārtham /
analyzed: jñāna grahaṇam viśeṣya nirdeśa artham

original: tasya hi indriyārthasannikarṣotpannatvādīni viśeṣaṇāni /
analyzed: tasya hi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tva ādīni viśeṣaṇāni

original: tāny asati viśeṣye kasya viśeṣaṇāni syur iti //
analyzed: tāni asati viśeṣye kasya viśeṣaṇāni syuḥ iti

original: atha vā sukhādivyāvṛttyarthaṃ jñānapadam /
analyzed: atha vā sukha ādi vyāvṛtti artham jñāna padam

original: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ hi sukham api bhavati /
analyzed: indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam hi sukham api bhavati

original: tatra tajjanakaṃ kārakacakraṃ pramāṇaṃ mā bhūt jñānajanakam eva pramāṇaṃ yathā syād iti jñānagrahaṇam //
analyzed: tatra tat janakam kāraka cakram pramāṇam mā bhūt jñāna janakam eva pramāṇam yathā syāt iti jñāna grahaṇam

original: atra śākyāś codayanti na jñānapadena sukhādivyavacchedaḥ kartuṃ yuktaḥ śakyo vā sukhādīnām api jñānasvabhāvatvāt /
analyzed: atra śākyāḥ codayanti na jñāna padena sukha ādi vyavacchedaḥ kartum yuktaḥ śakyaḥ vā sukha ādīnām api jñāna svabhāva tvāt

original: jñānasyaivāmī bhedāḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ icchā dveṣaḥ prayatna iti /
analyzed: jñānasya eva amī bhedāḥ sukham duḥkham icchā dveṣaḥ prayatnaḥ iti

original: kāraṇādhīno hi bhāvānāṃ bhedo bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: kāraṇa adhīnaḥ hi bhāvānām bhedaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: samānakāraṇānām api tu bhede 'bhidhīyamāne na kāraṇakṛtaṃ padārthānāṃ niyataṃ rūpam iti tadākasmikatvaprasaṅgaḥtad uktam [tadatadrūpiṇo bhāvāḥ tadatadrūpahetujāḥ /
analyzed: samāna kāraṇānām api tu bhede bhidhīyamāne na kāraṇa kṛtam padārthānām niyatam rūpam iti tad ākasmika tva prasaṅgaḥ tat uktam tad a tad rūpiṇaḥ bhāvāḥ tad a tad rūpa hetu jāḥ

original: tat sukhādi kim jñānaṃ vijñānābhinnahetujam] iti /
analyzed: tat sukha ādi kim jñānam vijñāna abhinna hetu jam iti

original: tasmāt jñānarūpāḥ sukhādayaḥ tadabhinnahetujatvāt iti //
analyzed: tasmāt jñāna rūpāḥ sukha ādayaḥ tad abhinna hetu ja tvāt iti

original: tad idam anupapannam pratyakṣaviruddhatvād dhetoḥ /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam pratyakṣa viruddha tvāt hetoḥ

original: sukhādisaṃvedyamānam ānandādirūpatayā 'nubhūyate jñānaṃ viṣayānubhavasvabhāvatayeti pratyakṣasiddhabhedatvāt katham abhede anumānaṃ kramate ata evedam api na vacanīyam ekam evedaṃ saṃvidrūpaṃ harṣaviṣādādyanekākāravivartaṃ paśyāmaḥ tatra yatheṣṭaṃ saṃjñāḥ kriyantām iti saṃvido viṣayānubhavasvabhāvatayaiva pratibhāsāt sukhādeś ca viṣayānubhavasvabhāvasyānusyūtasyāpratibhāsāt /
analyzed: sukha ādi saṃvedyamānam ānanda ādi rūpa tayā nubhūyate jñānam viṣaya anubhava svabhāva tayā iti pratyakṣa siddha bheda tvāt katham abhede anumānam kramate atas eva idam api na vacanīyam ekam eva idam saṃvid rūpam harṣa viṣāda ādi aneka ākāra vivartam paśyāmaḥ tatra yatheṣṭam saṃjñāḥ kriyantām iti saṃvidaḥ viṣaya anubhava svabhāva tayā eva pratibhāsāt sukha ādeḥ ca viṣaya anubhava svabhāvasya anusyūtasya a pratibhāsāt

original: jñānam eva viṣayagrahaṇarūpaṃ prakāśate na sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā //
analyzed: jñānam eva viṣaya grahaṇa rūpam prakāśate na sukham duḥkham vā

original: yas tu sukhajñānaṃ duḥkhajñānam iti pratibhāsaḥ saḥ jñānasvabhāvabhedakṛta eva saṃśayajñānaṃ viparyayajñānam itivat uktam atra saṃśayaviparyayādau viṣayānubhavasvabhāvatvam anusyūtam avabhāti /
analyzed: yaḥ tu sukha jñānam duḥkha jñānam iti pratibhāsaḥ saḥ jñāna svabhāva bheda kṛtaḥ eva saṃśaya jñānam viparyaya jñānam iti vat uktam atra saṃśaya viparyaya ādau viṣaya anubhava svabhāva tvam anusyūtam avabhāti

original: saṃśayo hi viṣayagrahaṇātmako 'nubhūyate aniścitaṃ tu viṣayaṃ gṛhṇāti /
analyzed: saṃśayaḥ hi viṣaya grahaṇa ātmakaḥ nubhūyate aniścitam tu viṣayam gṛhṇāti

original: viparyayo 'pi viṣayagrahaṇātmaka eva viparītam asantaṃ vā viṣayaṃ gṛhṇāti /
analyzed: viparyayaḥ viṣaya grahaṇa ātmakaḥ eva viparītam asantam vā viṣayam gṛhṇāti

original: na tu viṣayagrahaṇasvabhāvaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ cānubhūyate /
analyzed: na tu viṣaya grahaṇa svabhāvam sukham duḥkham ca anubhūyate

original: ataḥ anya evāyaṃ grāhyaikasvabhāvaḥ āntaro dharmaḥ sukhaduḥkhādir iti ghaṭajñānavad viṣayatayaiva jñānaṃ bhinatti na svabhāvabhedena saṃśayajñānavad iti //
analyzed: atas anyaḥ eva ayam grāhya eka svabhāvaḥ āntaraḥ dharmaḥ sukha duḥkha ādiḥ iti ghaṭa jñāna vat viṣaya tayā eva jñānam bhinatti na svabhāva bhedena saṃśaya jñāna vat iti

original: tatraitat syāt svaprakāśatvāt sukhādeḥ na grāhyaikasvabhāvatvam /
analyzed: tatra etat syāt sva prakāśa tvāt sukha ādeḥ na grāhya eka svabhāva tvam

original: ataś ca grāhyagrahaṇobhayasvabhāvatvāt jñānam eva tad iti maivaṃ vocaḥ svaprakāśatvaṃ jñāne 'pi pratikṣiptam pratikṣepsyate ca /
analyzed: atas ca grāhya grahaṇa ubhaya svabhāva tvāt jñānam eva tat iti mā evam vocaḥ sva prakāśa tvam jñāne pi pratikṣiptam pratikṣepsyate ca

original: tat kutaḥ sukhādau bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tat kutas sukha ādau bhaviṣyati

original: na hi grahaṇasvabhāvaṃ kaścit sukham anubhavati jñānavad iti //
analyzed: na hi grahaṇa svabhāvam kaścid sukham anubhavati jñāna vat iti

original: nanu asya prakāśatvānabhyupagame sukhāder utpādānutpādayor aviśeṣāt sarvadā sukhitvaṃ na kadācid vā syāt iti naitad eva utpannam eva sapadi sukhaṃ gṛhyate jñāneneti katham anutpannān na viśiṣyate /
analyzed: nanu asya prakāśa tva anabhyupagame sukha ādeḥ utpāda anutpādayoḥ aviśeṣāt sarvadā sukhi tvam na kadācid vā syāt iti na etat eva utpannam eva sapadi sukham gṛhyate jñānena iti katham anutpannāt na viśiṣyate

original: praty uta svaprakāśasukhavādinām eṣa doṣaḥ svaprakāśasukhotpādāt tenaiva svaprakāśena sukhenānyo 'pi sukhī syāt yasyāpi sukhaṃ notpannam iti //
analyzed: prati uta sva prakāśa sukha vādinām eṣa doṣaḥ sva prakāśa sukha utpādāt tena eva sva prakāśena sukhena anyaḥ api sukhī syāt yasya api sukham na utpannam iti

original: kiñca kim ekaṃ eva jñānaṃ sarvasukhaduḥkhādyaśeṣākārabhūṣitam iṣyate uta kiñcit sukhātmakaṃ kiñcid duḥkhātmakam iti ādye pakṣe sarvākārakhacitajñānopajananād ekasminn eva kṣaṇe parasparaviruddhasukhaduḥkhādidharmaprabandhasaṃvedanaprasaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: kiñca kim ekam eva jñānam sarva sukha duḥkha ādi aśeṣa ākāra bhūṣitam iṣyate uta kiñcid sukha ātmakam kiñcid duḥkha ātmakam iti ādye pakṣe sarva ākāra khacita jñāna upajananāt ekasmin eva kṣaṇe paraspara viruddha sukha duḥkha ādi dharma prabandha saṃvedana prasaṅgaḥ

original: uttarasmiṃs tu kiñcit sukhajñānaṃ kiñcid duḥkhajñānam iti yat kiñcid asukhaduḥkhakhacitaṃviṣayānubhavasvabhāvam api jñānam anubhūyamānam eṣitavyam eva /
analyzed: uttarasmin tu kiñcid sukha jñānam kiñcid duḥkha jñānam iti yat kiñcid asukha duḥkha khacitam viṣaya anubhava svabhāvam api jñānam anubhūyamānam eṣitavyam eva

original: tac ca na svaccham api tu kenacid ghaṭādinā viṣayeṇoparaktaṃ anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ ca ghaṭādyupajananāpāye 'pi bodhasvabhāvam anuvartamānaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: tat ca na svaccham api tu kenacid ghaṭa ādinā viṣayeṇa uparaktam anvaya vyatirekābhyām ca ghaṭa ādi upajanana apāye bodha svabhāvam anuvartamānam pratīyate

original: tad idānīṃ sukhajñānam apy anubhūyamānaṃ sukhena viṣayabhāvajuṣā ghaṭādinevoparajyate iti gamyate na svarūpeṇaiva sukhātmakam tato bhinnarūpasya bodhamātrasvabhāvasya jñānasyānyadā dṛṣṭatvād iti /
analyzed: tat idānīm sukha jñānam api anubhūyamānam sukhena viṣaya bhāva juṣā ghaṭa ādinā iva uparajyate iti gamyate na svarūpeṇa eva sukha ātmakam tatas bhinna rūpasya bodha mātra svabhāvasya jñānasya anyadā dṛṣṭa tvāt iti

original: tasmāt na bodharūpāḥ sukhādayaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na bodha rūpāḥ sukha ādayaḥ

original: abhinnahetujatvād iti cāyam asiddho hetuḥ samavāyikāraṇasyātmanaḥ asamavāyikāraṇasya cātmamanaśaṃyogasya cābhede 'pi nimittakāraṇasya sukhatvajñānatvāder bhinnatvāt //
analyzed: abhinna hetu ja tvāt iti ca ayam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ samavāyi kāraṇasya ātmanaḥ asamavāyi kāraṇasya ca ātma mana śaṃyogasya ca abhede pi nimitta kāraṇasya sukha tva jñāna tva ādeḥ bhinna tvāt

original: nanu sukhotpādāt pūrvam anāśrayaṃ sukhatvasāmānyaṃ kathaṃ tatra syāt kaś cāsya sukhahetubhiḥ kārakaiḥ saṃsargaḥ asaṃsṛṣṭaṃ vā kathaṃ kārakaṃ syāt ucyate sarvagatāni sāmānyāni sādhayiṣyanta iti santi tatrāpi sukhatvādīni /
analyzed: nanu sukha utpādāt pūrvam anāśrayam sukha tva sāmānyam katham tatra syāt kaḥ ca asya sukha hetubhiḥ kārakaiḥ saṃsargaḥ asaṃsṛṣṭam vā katham kārakam syāt ucyate sarva gatāni sāmānyāni sādhayiṣyantaḥ iti santi tatra api sukha tva ādīni

original: yogyatālakṣaṇa eva caiṣāṃ sukhahetubhiḥ kārakaiḥ saṃsargaḥ dharmādharmavat /
analyzed: yogyatā lakṣaṇaḥ eva ca eṣām sukha hetubhiḥ kārakaiḥ saṃsargaḥ dharma adharma vat

original: dharmādharmau hi sarvasya prāṇināṃ sukhaduḥkhahetoḥ jāyamānasya śālyādeḥ kāryasya kāraṇam /
analyzed: dharma adharmau hi sarvasya prāṇinām sukha duḥkha hetoḥ jāyamānasya śāli ādeḥ kāryasya kāraṇam

original: tayoś ca tatkāraṇaiḥ bījakṣitijalādibhis saha yogyataiva saṃsargaḥ /
