analyzed: tayoḥ ca tad kāraṇaiḥ bīja kṣiti jala ādibhiḥ saha yogyatā eva saṃsargaḥ

original: evaṃ sukhatvādīnām api syāt /
analyzed: evam sukha tva ādīnām api syāt

original: tasmāt nimittakāraṇabhedāt bhinnāni jñānasukhādīni kāryāṇi //
analyzed: tasmāt nimitta kāraṇa bhedāt bhinnāni jñāna sukha ādīni kāryāṇi

original: nimittakāraṇānyatvam api kāryasya bhedakam /
analyzed: nimitta kāraṇa anya tvam api kāryasya bhedakam

original: vilakṣaṇā hi dṛśyante ghaṭādau pākajā guṇāḥ //
analyzed: vilakṣaṇāḥ hi dṛśyante ghaṭa ādau pāka jāḥ guṇāḥ

original: api ca jñānam icchanti na sarve jñānapūrvakam /
analyzed: api ca jñānam icchanti na sarve jñāna pūrvakam

original: sukhaduḥkhādi sarvaṃ tu viṣayajñānapūrvakam //
analyzed: sukha duḥkha ādi sarvam tu viṣaya jñāna pūrvakam

original: viṣayānubhavotpādyāḥ yatrāpi na sukhādayaḥ /
analyzed: viṣaya anubhava utpādyāḥ yatra api na sukha ādayaḥ

original: tatrāpi teṣām utpattau kāraṇaṃ viṣayasmṛtiḥ //
analyzed: tatra api teṣām utpattau kāraṇam viṣaya smṛtiḥ

original: kvacit tu saṅkalpo 'pi sukhasya kāraṇatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: kvacid tu saṅkalpaḥ pi sukhasya kāraṇa tām pratipadyate

original: tasmāt sarvaṃ sukhādi jñānapūrvakam eva //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvam sukha ādi jñāna pūrvakam eva

original: jñānam api jñānapūrvakam eveti cet na upariṣṭān nirākariṣyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: jñānam api jñāna pūrvakam eva iti ced na upariṣṭāt nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: na hi garbhādau madamūrchādyanantaraṃ vā jñānam upajāyamānaṃ jñānāntarapūrvakaṃ bhavatīti vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: na hi garbha ādau mada mūrchā ādi anantaram vā jñānam upajāyamānam jñāna antara pūrvakam bhavati iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: tena jñānasukhādīnāṃ vailakṣaṇyopapādanāt sukhādinivṛttyarthaṃ jñānagrahaṇam arthavat //
analyzed: tena jñāna sukha ādīnām vailakṣaṇya upapādanāt sukha ādi nivṛtti artham jñāna grahaṇam arthavat

original: nanu evam api na jñānagrahaṇena kṛtyam avyabhicāripadād eva sukhādivyavacchedasya siddhatvāt /
analyzed: nanu evam api na jñāna grahaṇena kṛtyam avyabhicāri padāt eva sukha ādi vyavacchedasya siddha tvāt

original: vyabhicārāvyabhicārau hi jñānasya dharmau na sukhādeḥ /
analyzed: vyabhicāra avyabhicārau hi jñānasya dharmau na sukha ādeḥ

original: atas tadupādānāt taddharmayogi jñānaṃ labhyata eva /
analyzed: atas tad upādānāt tad dharma yogi jñānam labhyate eva

original: kiṃ jñānagrahaṇena naitad evam sukhasyāpi savyabhicārasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: kim jñāna grahaṇena na etat evam sukhasya api savyabhicārasya dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: kiṃ punas sukhaṃ vyabhicāravat dṛṣṭam yad etat paradārābhimarśādiniṣiddhācaraṇasaṃbhavaṃ sukhaṃ tadvyabhicāri //
analyzed: kim punar sukham vyabhicāravat dṛṣṭam yat etat para dāra abhimarśa ādi niṣiddha ācaraṇa saṃbhavam sukham tat vyabhicāri

original: nanu sukhasya kīdṛśo vyabhicāraḥ jñānasyāpi kīdṛśo vyabhicāraḥ atasmiṃs tathābhāvaḥ sukhasyāpi atasmiṃs tathābhāva eva //
analyzed: nanu sukhasya kīdṛśaḥ vyabhicāraḥ jñānasya api kīdṛśaḥ vyabhicāraḥ a tathābhāvaḥ sukhasya api a tathābhāvaḥ eva

original: kiṃ parapurandhrīpariraṃbhasaṃbhavaṃ sukhaṃ sukhaṃ na bhavati kiṃ śuktikāyāṃ rajatajñānaṃ jñānaṃ na bhavati jñānaṃ bhavati kintu mithyā idam api sukhaṃ bhavati kintu mithyā //
analyzed: kim para purandhrī pariraṃbha saṃbhavam sukham sukham na bhavati kim śuktikāyām rajata jñānam jñānam na bhavati jñānam bhavati kintu mithyā idam api sukham bhavati kintu mithyā

original: nanu na sukhaṃ mithyā tad api hy ānandasvabhāvam eva yady evaṃ śuktikāyāṃ rajatajñānam api na mithyā tad api hi viṣayānubhavasvabhāvam eva //
analyzed: nanu na sukham mithyā tat api hi ānanda svabhāvam eva yadi evam śuktikāyām rajata jñānam api na mithyā tat api hi viṣaya anubhava svabhāvam eva

original: nanu viṣayānubhavasvabhāvam api taj jñānaṃ viṣayaṃ vyabhicarati sukham api tarhīdam ānandasvabhāvam api svahetuṃ viṣayaṃ vyabhicaraty eva //
analyzed: nanu viṣaya anubhava svabhāvam api tat jñānam viṣayam vyabhicarati sukham api tarhi idam ānanda svabhāvam api sva hetum viṣayam vyabhicarati eva

original: kim asukhasādhanena tajjanitam jñānam api kiṃ ajñānasādhanena janitam nanu jñānaṃ jñānasādhanena janitaṃ asaty eva pratyakṣabādhitena rajatādinā sukham api sukhasādhanena janitaṃ asatyena tu śāstrabādhitena paravanitādinā //
analyzed: kim asukha sādhanena tat janitam jñānam api kim ajñāna sādhanena janitam nanu jñānam jñāna sādhanena janitam asatī eva pratyakṣa bādhitena rajata ādinā sukham api sukha sādhanena janitam asatyena tu śāstra bādhitena para vanitā ādinā

original: kiṃ paravanitādi na satyam tatrāpi jñānajanakaṃ na satyam asatyaṃ pratyakṣabādhitatvāt paravanitādy api sukhasādhanam asatyaṃ śāstrabādhitatvāt //
analyzed: kim para vanitā ādi na satyam tatra api jñāna janakam na satyam asatyam pratyakṣa bādhita tvāt para vanitā ādi api sukha sādhanam asatyam śāstra bādhita tvāt

original: nanu śāstreṇa kim atra bādhyate jñāne 'pi pratyakṣeṇa kiṃ bādhyate viṣayo mithyeti khyāpyate śāstreṇāpi sukhasya hetur mithyeti khyāpyate //
analyzed: nanu śāstreṇa kim atra bādhyate jñāne pi pratyakṣeṇa kim bādhyate viṣayaḥ mithyā iti khyāpyate śāstreṇa api sukhasya hetuḥ mithyā iti khyāpyate

original: kiṃ sa viṣayas sukhahetur na bhavati yathā tv eṣa viṣayaḥ kaluṣasya jñānasya hetuḥ tathā so 'pi kaluṣasya kaṭuvipākasya sukhasya hetur iti tathāvidhaṃ sukham api vyabhicāri bhavaty evety alam atikelinā //
analyzed: kim sa viṣayaḥ sukha hetuḥ na bhavati yathā tu eṣa viṣayaḥ kaluṣasya jñānasya hetuḥ tathā saḥ u pi kaluṣasya kaṭu vipākasya sukhasya hetuḥ iti tathāvidham sukham api vyabhicāri bhavati eva iti alam ati kelinā

original: tasmāt samānanyāyatvāt sukhe vyabhicāritā 'stīti avyabhicāripadāt jñānaṃ na labhyate //
analyzed: tasmāt samāna nyāya tvāt sukhe vyabhicāri tā sti iti avyabhicāri padāt jñānam na labhyate

original: apara āha kim anena ḍimbhakalahena mā bhūdavyabhicāripadāt jñānasya lābhaḥ tathā 'pi vyavasāyātmakapadāt labhyata eva jñānam /
analyzed: aparaḥ āha kim anena ḍimbha kalahena mā vyavasāya ātmaka padāt labhyate eva jñānam

original: na hi sukhaduḥkhādayo vyavasāyātmakāḥ bhavanti kintu jñānam eva tathāvidham iti //
analyzed: na hi sukha duḥkha ādayaḥ vyavasāya ātmakāḥ bhavanti kintu jñānam eva tathāvidham iti

original: saṃśayavyavacchedārthaṃ tatpadam iti cet satyam sukhādivyavacchedam api kartum alam eva bhavati vyavasāyātmakatvasya sukhādiṣv asaṃbhavād iti //
analyzed: saṃśaya vyavaccheda artham tat padam iti ced satyam sukha ādi vyavacchedam api kartum alam eva bhavati vyavasāya ātmaka tvasya sukha ādiṣu asaṃbhavāt iti

original: tad evaṃ siddhe 'pi sukhādivyavacchede kartavyam eva jñānagrahaṇam viśeṣyanirdeśārthatvāt tasya hi sarvāṇy amūni viśeṣaṇāny upāttāni tadanupādāne nirālambanāni bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: tat evam siddhe sukha ādi vyavacchede kartavyam eva jñāna grahaṇam viśeṣya nirdeśa artha tvāt tasya hi sarvāṇi amūni viśeṣaṇāni upāttāni tad anupādāne nirālambanāni bhaveyuḥ

original: śrotuś ca buddhir na samādhīyeteti /
analyzed: śrotuḥ ca buddhiḥ na samādhīyeta iti

original: tena balād gamyamānam eva kartavyam eva jñānagrahaṇam arthākṣiptasyāvacane pratyakṣaṃ pratyakṣam ity etāvanmātram abhidheyaṃ syāt anyadarthāl labhyata eva /
analyzed: tena balāt gamyamānam eva kartavyam eva jñāna grahaṇam artha ākṣiptasya avacane pratyakṣam pratyakṣam iti etāvat mātram abhidheyam syāt anyat arthāt labhyate eva

original: tasmāt dharminirdeśārthaṃ yuktaṃ jñānapadam //
analyzed: tasmāt dharmi nirdeśa artham yuktam jñāna padam

original: śabdānām arthasaṃsparśitvaṃ śākyamatanirāsena sādhayiṣyata iti śabdānupraveśavaśena vyapadeśyaṃ nāma jñānam upapadyata iti tadvyavacchedārtham avyapadeśyapadam //
analyzed: śabdānām artha saṃsparśi tvam śākya mata nirāsena sādhayiṣyate iti śabda anupraveśa vaśena vyapadeśyam nāma jñānam upapadyate iti tad vyavaccheda artham avyapadeśya padam

original: tatra vṛddhanaiyāyikās tāvad ācakṣate vyapadiśyata iti vyapadeśyaṃ śabdakarmatāpannaṃ jñānam ucyate /
analyzed: tatra vṛddha naiyāyikāḥ tāvat ācakṣate vyapadiśyate iti vyapadeśyam śabda karmatā āpannam jñānam ucyate

original: yat indriyārthasannikarṣād utpannaṃ sat viṣayanāmadheyena vyapadiśyate rūpajñānaṃ rasajñānam iti tat vyapadeśyaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaphalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ mābhūd iti avyapadeśyagrahaṇam tad idam anupapannam na hi nāmadheyavyapadeśyatvam aprāmāṇyakāraṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yat indriya artha sannikarṣāt utpannam sat viṣaya nāmadheyena vyapadiśyate rūpa jñānam rasa jñānam iti tat vyapadeśyam jñānam pratyakṣa phalam pratyakṣam mā abhūt iti avyapadeśya grahaṇam tat idam anupapannam na hi nāmadheya vyapadeśya tvam aprāmāṇya kāraṇam bhavati

original: yadi hi tat rūpajñānaṃ rasajñānaṃ ca viṣayāvyabhicāri niśaṃśayaṃ ca tat katham apramāṇaphalam ucyate /
analyzed: yadi hi tat rūpa jñānam rasa jñānam ca viṣaya avyabhicāri niśaṃśayam ca tat katham apramāṇa phalam ucyate

original: vyabhicārādidoṣayoge vā padāntareṇa tatpratikṣepāt kim avyapadeśyapadena pramāṇaphalaṃ ca tad vijñānaṃ idānīṃ kiṃ pramāṇaprabhavaṃ bhavatu na pratyakṣaphalam etat padapratikṣiptatvāt /
analyzed: vyabhicāra ādi doṣa yoge vā pada antareṇa tad pratikṣepāt kim avyapadeśya padena pramāṇa phalam ca tat vijñānam idānīm kim pramāṇa prabhavam bhavatu na pratyakṣa phalam etat pada pratikṣipta tvāt

original: nānumānādijanyam tadvailakṣaṇyāt /
analyzed: na anumāna ādi janyam tad vailakṣaṇyāt

original: nāsti kiñcit pañcamaṃ pramāṇam /
analyzed: na asti kiñcid pañcamam pramāṇam

original: asaṅgraho 'sya lakṣyasya lakṣaṇeneti prajñāpramādaḥ /
analyzed: a saṅgrahaḥ sya lakṣyasya lakṣaṇena iti prajñā pramādaḥ

original: tasmād apavyākhyānam etat //
analyzed: tasmāt apavyākhyānam etat

original: vyavacchedyāntaram avyapadeśyapadasya varṇayāñ cakrur ācāryāḥ /
analyzed: vyavacchedya antaram a vyapadeśya padasya varṇayām cakruḥ ācāryāḥ

original: śabdārtheṣu sthaviravyavahārataḥ vyutpadyamāno janaḥ saṃśayāvagamasamaye saṃjñopadeśakād ayaṃ panasa ucyata iti vṛddhodīritāt vākyāt purovamthitaśākhādimantam arthaṃ panasaśabdavācyatayā jānāti /
analyzed: śabda artheṣu sthavira vyavahārataḥ vyutpadyamānaḥ janaḥ saṃśaya avagama samaye saṃjñā upadeśakāt ayam panasaḥ ucyate iti vṛddha udīritāt vākyāt artham panasa śabda vācya tayā jānāti

original: tad asya jñānam indriyajam api na kevalendriyakaraṇakaṃ bhavitum ucitam asati saṃjñopadeśini śabde tadanutpādāt /
analyzed: tat asya jñānam indriya jam api na kevala indriya karaṇakam bhavitum ucitam asati saṃjñā upadeśini śabde tad anutpādāt

original: tena śabdendriyābhyāṃ saṃbhūya janitatvāt ubhayajam idaṃ jñānaṃ vyapadeśāj jātam iti vyapadeśyam ucyate /
analyzed: tena śabda indriyābhyām saṃbhūya janita tvāt ubhaya jam idam jñānam vyapadeśāt jātam iti vyapadeśyam ucyate

original: tat avyapadeśyapadena vyudasyate //
analyzed: tat avyapadeśya padena vyudasyate

original: na cedaṃ pañcamaṃ pramāṇam avatarati kintu śābdam ivaitad anumanyate lokaḥ tathā ca kathaṃ punar jānīte bhavān panaso 'yam iti iti pṛṣṭaḥ prativakti [mama devadattenākhyātaṃ panaso 'yam iti] iti /
analyzed: na ca idam pañcamam pramāṇam avatarati kintu śābdam iva etat anumanyate lokaḥ tathā ca katham punar jānīte bhavān panasaḥ yam iti iti pṛṣṭaḥ prativakti mama devadattena ākhyātam panasaḥ yam iti iti

original: na punar evaṃ vismṛtyāpi bravīti [cakṣuṣā mayā pratipannaṃ panaso 'yam ucyata iti] iti /
analyzed: na punar evam vismṛtya api bravīti cakṣuṣā mayā pratipannam panasaḥ yam ucyate iti iti

original: tat indriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāne saty api śabda evātra karaṇam //
analyzed: tat indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāne sati api śabdaḥ eva atra karaṇam

original: ata eva sūtrakṛtā śabdalakṣaṇaṃ varṇayatā nendriyānupraveśapratiṣedhāya kim api viśeṣaṇam uparacitam [upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ] ity etāvad eva lakṣaṇam abhihitam /
analyzed: atas eva sūtrakṛtā śabda lakṣaṇam varṇayatā na indriya anupraveśa pratiṣedhāya kim api viśeṣaṇam uparacitam upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti etāvat eva lakṣaṇam abhihitam

original: ataś cendriyānupraveśe 'pi śābdatām asya manyate sūtrakāraḥ //
analyzed: atas ca indriya anupraveśe śābda tām asya manyate sūtrakāraḥ

original: iha punaḥ avyapadeśyaviśeṣaṇapadopādānena śabdānupraveśapratiṣedhāt na pratyakṣam etat jñānam /
analyzed: iha punar a vyapadeśya viśeṣaṇa pada upādānena śabda anupraveśa pratiṣedhāt na pratyakṣam etat jñānam

original: tasmād evaṃvidhavyapadeśyavijñānavyavacchedārtham avyapadeśyapadam iti //
analyzed: tasmāt evaṃvidha vyapadeśya vijñāna vyavaccheda artham avyapadeśya padam iti

original: tad etat vyākhyātāro nānumanyante yady ubhayajaṃ jñānaṃ avyapadeśyapadena vyudasyate tad api nāpramāṇam apramāṇalakṣaṇātītatvād iti pramāṇaṃ bhavat kasmin anuviśatām iti cintyam nanu śābdam idaṃ jñānaṃ tadbhāvānuvidhānataḥ /
analyzed: tat etat vyākhyātāraḥ na anumanyante yadi ubhaya jam jñānam avyapadeśya padena vyudasyate tat api na apramāṇam apramāṇa lakṣaṇa atīta tvāt iti pramāṇam bhavat kasmin anuviśatām iti cintyam nanu śābdam idam jñānam tad bhāva anuvidhānataḥ

original: bhavatv akṣajam apy etat tadbhāvānuvidhānataḥ //
analyzed: bhavatu akṣa jam api etat tad bhāva anuvidhānataḥ

original: śābdaṃ cobhayajaṃ ceti viruddham abhidhīyate /
analyzed: śābdam ca ubhaya jam ca iti viruddham abhidhīyate

original: pramāṇāntaram eva syāt itthaṃ tad api pūrvavat //
analyzed: pramāṇa antaram eva syāt ittham tat api pūrvavat

original: nanu lokaḥ śābdatām asya vyapadiśati [devadattenākhyātaṃ panaso 'yam iti] iti vyavahārād ity uktam /
analyzed: nanu lokaḥ śābda tām asya vyapadiśati devadattena ākhyātam panasaḥ yam iti iti vyavahārāt iti uktam

original: aho lokavatsalaḥ śraddadhāno mahānubhāvaḥ na khalu lokasya vyapadeśaikaśaraṇā vastusthitayo bhavanti /
analyzed: aho loka vatsalaḥ śraddadhānaḥ mahā anubhāvaḥ na khalu lokasya vyapadeśa eka śaraṇāḥ vastu sthitayaḥ bhavanti

original: loko hi yathāruci vyapadiśati /
analyzed: lokaḥ hi yathāruci vyapadiśati

original: nānāmunijanasādhāraṇam api tīrthaṃ nandikuṇḍam iti kiṃ na śrutavān bhavān hanta tarhi sūtrakārāśayam anusarantaḥ śābdam idaṃ jñānaṃ pratipadyāmahe yad ayaṃ sūtrakāraḥ pratyakṣeśabdānupraveśavyavacchedāya viśeṣaṇam idam upadiśati śabde tu nendriyavyudāsāya kiñcid viśeṣaṇam upādatte sa paśyati kāraṇāntarānupraveśe 'pi śābdam etat jñānam iti /
analyzed: nānā muni jana sādhāraṇam api tīrtham nandikuṇḍam iti kim na śrutavān bhavān hanta tarhi sūtrakāra āśayam anusarantaḥ śābdam idam jñānam pratipadyāmahe yat ayam sūtrakāraḥ pratyakṣe śabda anupraveśa vyavacchedāya viśeṣaṇam idam upadiśati śabde tu na indriya vyudāsāya kiñcid viśeṣaṇam upādatte sa paśyati kāraṇa antara anupraveśe pi śābdam etat jñānam iti

original: ucyate manuvat sūtrakāro 'pi na dharmasyopadeśakaḥ /
analyzed: ucyate manu vat sūtrakāraḥ pi na dharmasya upadeśakaḥ

original: yenaitad anurodhena tasya brūyāma śābdatām //
analyzed: yena etat anurodhena tasya brūyāma śābda tām

original: vastusthityā tu nirūpyamāṇam indriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvād idaṃ vijñānaṃ na pratyakṣaphalatām ativartate /
analyzed: vastu sthityā tu nirūpyamāṇam indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt idam vijñānam na pratyakṣa phala tām ativartate

original: tataś ca vyudasyamānaṃ pramāṇāntaratām eva spṛśet //
analyzed: tatas ca vyudasyamānam pramāṇa antara tām eva spṛśet

original: tasmād ubhayajajñānavyudāsānupapattitaḥ /
vyākhyā bhaṅgyantareṇāsya padasyeyaṃ vidhīyate //
analyzed: vyākhyā bhaṅgī antareṇa asya padasya iyam vidhīyate

original: asambhavadoṣavyavacchedārtham avyapadeśyapadopādānam /
analyzed: asambhava doṣa vyavaccheda artham avyapadeśya pada upādānam

original: evaṃ hi paro manyate sati lakṣye lakṣaṇavarṇanam ucitam /
analyzed: evam hi paraḥ manyate sati lakṣye lakṣaṇa varṇanam ucitam

original: iha tu lakṣyamāṇaṃ pratyakṣam indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ nāma na kiñcid asti /
analyzed: iha tu lakṣyamāṇam pratyakṣam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam nāma na kiñcid asti

original: gaur ityādijñānānāṃ śabdāvacchinnavācyaviṣayatvena śābdatvāt /
analyzed: gauḥ ityādi jñānānām śabda avacchinna vācya viṣaya tvena śābda tvāt

original: iha hi viṣayavyatirekeṇa jñānānām atiśayo durupapādaḥ bodhasvabhāvasya sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: iha hi viṣaya vyatirekeṇa jñānānām atiśayaḥ durupapādaḥ bodha svabhāvasya sarvān prati a viśiṣṭa tvāt

original: tatra yathā daṇḍīti śukla iti vā pratyayo viśeṣaṇāvacchinnaviśeṣyaviṣayatayā sātiśayatvam aśnute tathā gaur ityādipratyayo 'pi vācakāvacchinnavācyaviṣayatvāt sātiśayatvaṃ bhajate śabdāvacchinnavācyaviṣayatvāc ca śābda eṣa pratyayaḥ tadvyatiriktakaraṇakāryatvānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: tatra yathā daṇḍī iti śuklaḥ iti vā pratyayaḥ viśeṣaṇa avacchinna viśeṣya viṣayatayā sātiśaya tvam aśnute tathā gauḥ ityādi pratyayaḥ vācaka avacchinna vācya viṣaya tvāt sātiśaya tvam bhajate śabda avacchinna vācya viṣayatvāt ca śābdaḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ tad vyatirikta karaṇa kāryatva anupapatteḥ

original: na hīndriyakaraṇakam idaṃ jñānaṃ bhavitum arhati cakṣuṣo viśeṣaṇāviṣayatvāt viśeṣye ca śrotrasyāsāmarthyāt /
analyzed: na hi indriya karaṇakam idam jñānam bhavitum arhati cakṣuṣaḥ viśeṣaṇa aviṣaya tvāt viśeṣye ca śrotrasya asāmarthyāt

original: na ca yugapad indriyadvayadvārakam ekam utpadyamānaṃ jñānaṃ kvacit dṛṣṭam //
analyzed: na ca yugapad indriya dvaya dvārakam ekam utpadyamānam jñānam kvacid dṛṣṭam

original: tatraitat syāt mānasam idaṃ jñānaṃ sugandhibandhūkabodhavad bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tatra etat syāt mānasam idam jñānam sugandhi bandhūka bodha vat bhaviṣyati

original: uktam atra śabdaliṅgādikaraṇāntaravyāpāraviratau kāryam upajāyamānaṃ kevalamanaḥkaraṇam iti kalpyate na tatsaṃbhave 'pi /
analyzed: uktam atra śabda liṅga ādi karaṇa antara vyāpāra viratau kāryam upajāyamānam kevala manaḥkaraṇam iti kalpyate na tad saṃbhave pi

original: tathā hi sati mānasam evaikaṃ pramāṇaṃ syād iti /
analyzed: tathā hi sati mānasam eva ekam pramāṇam syāt iti

original: asti cātra śabda eva karaṇam /
analyzed: asti ca atra śabdaḥ eva karaṇam

original: sa hi sahasrakiraṇavad ātmānaṃ ca viṣayaṃ ca prakāśayati iti /
analyzed: sa hi sahasra kiraṇa vat ātmānam ca viṣayam ca prakāśayati iti

original: tasmād indriyaviṣaye 'pi gaur ityādijñānam utpadyamānaṃ śābdam evety avadhāryate //
analyzed: tasmāt indriya viṣaye pi gauḥ ityādi jñānam utpadyamānam śābdam eva iti avadhāryate

original: nanu saṅketāvagamasamaye gaur ityādiśabdaḥ śruta āsīt /
analyzed: nanu saṅketa avagama samaye gauḥ ityādi śabdaḥ śrutaḥ āsīt

original: sa idānīm atikrānta iti kathaṃ tatkṛta eṣa pratyayaḥ syāt ucyate tadānīm aśrūyamāṇasya śabdasya smṛtyārūḍhasya tatpratyayahetutvāt //
analyzed: saḥ idānīm atikrāntaḥ iti katham tad kṛtaḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ syāt ucyate tadānīm a śrūyamāṇasya śabdasya smṛti ārūḍhasya tad pratyaya hetu tvāt

original: tacchrutāv api kiṃ sarve varṇāḥ pratyakṣagocarāḥ /
analyzed: tad śrutau api kim sarve varṇāḥ pratyakṣa gocarāḥ

original: viśeṣaḥ ko 'ntyavarṇena gṛhītena smṛtena vā //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ kaḥ ntya varṇena gṛhītena smṛtena vā

original: tad evaṃ smṛtiviṣayīkṛtaśabdajanita eṣa pratyaya ity abhyupetavyaḥ /
analyzed: tat evam smṛti viṣayīkṛta śabda janitaḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ iti abhyupetavyaḥ

original: yathā parokṣe 'pi śabda uccarita ātmānaṃ prakāśayati arthaṃ ca tathā pratyakṣe viṣaye sa eva smaryamāṇaḥ ātmānam arthaṃ ca prakāśayatīti vācakāvacchinnavācyapratibhāsaś caivaṃvidhāsu buddhiṣu nūnam eṣitavyaḥ /
analyzed: yathā parokṣe śabdaḥ uccaritaḥ ātmānam prakāśayati artham ca tathā pratyakṣe viṣaye saḥ eva smaryamāṇaḥ ātmānam artham ca prakāśayati iti vācaka avacchinna vācya pratibhāsaḥ ca evaṃvidhāsu buddhiṣu nūnam eṣitavyaḥ

original: yathā ''ha bhaṭṭaḥ [saṃjñitvaṃ kevalaṃ param] iti //
analyzed: yathā ha bhaṭṭaḥ saṃjñi tvam kevalam param iti

original: saṃjñitvam iti matvarthīyapratyayāntād utpannaḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ saṃbandham ācaṣṭe /
analyzed: saṃjñi tvam iti matvarthīya pratyaya antāt utpannaḥ bhāva pratyayaḥ saṃbandham ācaṣṭe

original: saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhaḥ saṃjñitvam iti /
analyzed: saṃjñā saṃjñi saṃbandhaḥ saṃjñi tvam iti

original: [kṛttaddhitasamāseṣu sambandhābhidhānaṃ bhāvapratyayena] ity abhiyuktasmaraṇāt /
analyzed: kṛt taddhita samāseṣu sambandha abhidhānam bhāva pratyayena iti abhiyukta smaraṇāt

original: saṃjñā ca śabdaḥ /
analyzed: saṃjñā ca śabdaḥ

original: so 'yaṃ śabdaviśiṣṭārthapratibhāsa ukto bhavati //
analyzed: saḥ yam śabda viśiṣṭa artha pratibhāsaḥ uktaḥ bhavati

original: na ca śabdānusandhānarahitaḥ kaścit pratyayo dṛśyate anullikhitaśabdakeṣv api pratyayeṣv antataḥ sāmānyaśabdasamunmeṣasaṃbhavāt tadullekhavyatirekeṇa prakāśātmikāyāḥ pratīter anutpādāt /
analyzed: na ca śabda anusandhāna rahitaḥ kaścid pratyayaḥ dṛśyate an ullikhita śabdakeṣu api pratyayeṣu antatas sāmānya śabda samunmeṣa saṃbhavāt tad ullekha vyatirekeṇa prakāśa ātmikāyāḥ pratīteḥ anutpādāt

original: tathā ''ha bhartṛhariḥ [na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaś śabdānugamād ṛte /
analyzed: tathā ha bhartṛhariḥ na saḥ sti pratyayaḥ loke yaḥ śabda anugamāt ṛte

original: anuviddham iva jñānaṃ sarvaṃ śabdena gṛhyate //] iti /
analyzed: anuviddham iva jñānam sarvam śabdena gṛhyate iti

original: tasmāt pratyakṣasya lakṣyasyābhāvāt kasyedaṃ lakṣaṇam upakrāntam iti asaṃbhavadoṣam āśaṅkyāha sūtrakāraḥ avyapadeśyam iti //
analyzed: tasmāt pratyakṣasya lakṣyasya abhāvāt kasya idam lakṣaṇam upakrāntam iti asaṃbhava doṣam āśaṅkya āha sūtrakāraḥ avyapadeśyam iti

original: yad idaṃ aviditapadapadārthasambandhasya jñānam utpadyate viditasambandhasyāpi vā yat prathamākṣāsannipātasamaya eva jñānam anullikhitaśabdakaṃ śabdānusmaraṇe hetubhūtam upajāyate tat aśabdam aśabdāvacchinnaviṣayam avyapadeśyam indriyārthasannikarṣaikakaraṇam avikalpaṃ pratyakṣam /
analyzed: yat idam avidita pada padārtha sambandhasya jñānam utpadyate vidita sambandhasya api vā yat prathama akṣā sannipāta samaye eva jñānam anullikhita śabdakam śabda anusmaraṇe hetu bhūtam upajāyate tat aśabdam a śabda avacchinna viṣayam avyapadeśyam indriya artha sannikarṣa eka karaṇam avikalpam pratyakṣam

original: na ca śabdakṛtā buddhīnāṃ prakāśasvabhāvatā svata eva tāsām evaṃrūpatvāt /
analyzed: na ca śabda kṛtā buddhīnām prakāśa svabhāva tā svatas eva tāsām evaṃrūpa tvāt

original: na ca nirvikalpakasamaye yat kiñcid idam ityādisāmānyaśabdollekhaḥ ko 'pi kaiścid anubhūyate /
analyzed: na ca nirvikalpaka samaye yat kiñcid idam ityādi sāmānya śabda ullekhaḥ kaiścid anubhūyate

original: tasmāt gaur ityādijñānānāṃ śābdatve 'pi tathāvidhasya jñānasya lakṣyasya sadbhāvāt na vyarthaṃ lakṣaṇam ity evam saṃbhavadoṣanirākaraṇārtham avyapadeśyapadam iti //
analyzed: tasmāt gauḥ ityādi jñānānām śābda tve tathāvidhasya jñānasya lakṣyasya sadbhāvāt na vyartham lakṣaṇam iti evam saṃbhava doṣa nirākaraṇa artham avyapadeśya padam iti

original: tad etad ācāryā na kṣamante /
analyzed: tat etat ācāryāḥ na kṣamante

original: na gaur ityādijñānam indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam api idaṃ śābdam iti vaktuṃ yuktam /
analyzed: na gauḥ ityādi jñānam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam api idam śābdam iti vaktum yuktam

original: na cātra śabdāvacchinnārthaḥ prakāśate tathāvidhārthagrahaṇe kāraṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca atra śabda avacchinna arthaḥ prakāśate tathāvidha artha grahaṇe kāraṇa abhāvāt

original: viśeṣyārthapramitau tāvat śabdaḥ karaṇam /
analyzed: viśeṣya artha pramitau tāvat śabdaḥ karaṇam

original: viśeṣaṇībhūtasya tu śabdasya grahaṇe kiṃ karaṇam iti nirūpyatām /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇībhūtasya tu śabdasya grahaṇe kim karaṇam iti nirūpyatām

original: na śrotram viramyavyāpārāsaṃvedanāt /
analyzed: na śrotram viramya vyāpāra asaṃvedanāt

original: sambandhagrahaṇād ūrdhvaṃ ca smaryamāṇaśabdayojanayā jāyamāne gaur ityādijñāne śrotraṃ karaṇam āśaṅkitum api na yuktam /
analyzed: sambandha grahaṇāt ūrdhvam ca smaryamāṇa śabda yojanayā jāyamāne gauḥ ityādi jñāne śrotram karaṇam āśaṅkitum api na yuktam

original: nāpi manaḥ bāhyakaraṇanirapekṣaṃ bāhye viṣaye dhiyam ādhātum alam andhādyabhāvaprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: nā api manaḥ bāhya karaṇa nirapekṣam bāhye viṣaye dhiyam ādhātum alam andha ādi abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: nanu śabda eva karaṇam ity uktam tat kim aparakaraṇāśaṅkanena maivam ekasya kārakasya ekasyām eva kriyāyāṃ karmakaraṇabhāvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: nanu śabdaḥ eva karaṇam iti uktam tat kim apara karaṇa āśaṅkanena mā evam ekasya kārakasya ekasyām eva kriyāyām karma karaṇa bhāva anupapatteḥ

original: savitṛprakāśavat iti cet na kriyābhedāt /
analyzed: savitṛ prakāśa vat iti ced na kriyā bhedāt

original: yatrāsau karaṇaṃ na tatra karma yatra vā karma na tatra karaṇam iti /
analyzed: yatra asau karaṇam na tatra karma yatra vā karma na tatra karaṇam iti

original: ghaṭādiviṣayapramitijanmani karaṇam eva taraṇiprakāśaḥ na karma tadgrahaṇakāle tu karmaivāsau na karaṇam //
analyzed: ghaṭa ādi viṣaya pramiti janmani karaṇam eva taraṇi prakāśaḥ na karma tad grahaṇa kāle tu karma eva asau na karaṇam

original: kiṃ tarhi tatra karaṇam iti cet kevalam eva cakṣur iti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: kim tarhi tatra karaṇam iti ced kevalam eva cakṣuḥ iti brūmaḥ

original: ālokagrahaṇe cakṣuṣaḥ prakāśāntaranirapekṣatvāt katham evam iti cet aparyanuyojyā hi vastuśaktiḥ /
analyzed: āloka grahaṇe cakṣuṣaḥ prakāśa antara nirapekṣa tvāt katham evam iti ced aparyanuyojyā hi vastu śaktiḥ

original: ghaṭādigrahaṇe cakṣurudyotam apekṣate nodyotagrahaṇa iti kam anuyuñjmahe /
analyzed: ghaṭa ādi grahaṇe cakṣuḥ udyotam apekṣate na udyota grahaṇe iti kam anuyuñjmahe

original: so 'yaṃ sūryaprakāśaḥ prakāśāntaranirapekṣacakṣurindriyaprathamagṛhītaḥ ciram avatiṣṭhamānaḥ tadindriyagrāhya eva viṣaye gṛhyamāṇe karaṇatām upayātīti yuktam //
analyzed: saḥ yam sūrya prakāśaḥ prakāśa antara nirapekṣa cakṣuḥ indriya prathama gṛhītaḥ ciram avatiṣṭhamānaḥ tad indriya grāhye eva viṣaye gṛhyamāṇe karaṇa tām upayāti iti yuktam

original: śabdas tu kṣaṇikaḥ śrotrendriyagrāhyaḥ taditaraparicchedye viṣaye tadavagamakriyāyāṃ karaṇībhūya bhūyas tasyām eva kruyāyāṃ katham iva karmabhāvam anubhavet /
analyzed: śabdaḥ tu kṣaṇikaḥ śrotra indriya grāhyaḥ tad itara paricchedye viṣaye tad avagama kriyāyām karaṇībhūya bhūyas tasyām eva katham iva karma bhāvam anubhavet

original: śabdo hi dhūmādivad upāya eva nopeyaḥ /
analyzed: śabdaḥ hi dhūma ādi vat upāyaḥ eva na upeyaḥ

original: sa upāyatvāt prathamaṃ gṛhyatāṃ nāma nopeyagrahaṇakāle punar grahaṇam arhati dhūmavad eveti /
analyzed: saḥ upāya tvāt prathamam gṛhyatām nāma na upeya grahaṇa kāle punar grahaṇam arhati dhūma vat eva iti

original: evaṃ smaryamāṇo 'pi śabdo yatrārthapratītikāraṇaṃ tatrāpi prathamaṃ śabdasmaraṇaṃ tataḥ śabdārthasampratyayo bhavati /
analyzed: evam smaryamāṇaḥ pi śabdaḥ yatra artha pratīti kāraṇam tatra api prathamam śabda smaraṇam tatas śabda artha sampratyayaḥ bhavati

original: na tarāṃ tatrārthapratītivelāyāṃ śabdagrahaṇaṃ saṃbhāvyate /
analyzed: na tarām tatra artha pratīti velāyām śabda grahaṇam saṃbhāvyate

original: tasmāt nāsti vācakaviśeṣitavācyapratibhāsaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na asti vācaka viśeṣita vācya pratibhāsaḥ

original: api ca gaur ityādijñānaṃ indriyārthasannikarṣānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyi prasabhaṃ tat kathaṃ śābdam ity ucyate //
analyzed: api ca gauḥ ityādi jñānam indriya artha sannikarṣa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi prasabham tat katham śābdam iti ucyate

original: śabdasmaraṇasāpekṣaṃ yasyotpādakam indriyam /
analyzed: śabda smaraṇa sāpekṣam yasya utpādakam indriyam

original: tad eva yadi te śābdaṃ aho naiyāyiko bhavān //
analyzed: tat eva yadi te śābdam aho naiyāyikaḥ bhavān

original: nanu śabdāvacchinnam arthaṃ na cakṣuḥśrotrayoḥ anyatarad api karaṇaṃ grahītum alam ity uktam /
analyzed: nanu śabda avacchinnam artham na cakṣuḥ śrotrayoḥ anyatarat api karaṇam grahītum alam iti uktam

original: bhoḥ sādho cakṣur evainaṃ grahīṣyatīti kathaṃ na brūṣe nanu nāviṣaye yuktam indriyasya pravartanam /
analyzed: bhoḥ sādho cakṣuḥ eva enam grahīṣyati iti katham na brūṣe nanu na aviṣaye yuktam indriyasya pravartanam

original: tena śabdaviśiṣṭārthajñānaṃ nendriyajaṃ bruve //
analyzed: tena śabda viśiṣṭa artha jñānam na indriya jam bruve

original: marīciṣu jalajñānaṃ katham indriyajaṃ tava tatrāpi hi na toyena sannikarṣo 'sti cakṣuṣaḥ //
analyzed: marīciṣu jala jñānam katham indriya jam tava tatra api hi na toyena sannikarṣaḥ sti cakṣuṣaḥ

original: nanu ca smṛtyupārūḍhaṃ udakaṃ tatra gṛhyate //
analyzed: nanu ca smṛti upārūḍham udakam tatra gṛhyate

original: ihāpi smṛtyupārūḍhaḥ śabdaḥ kasmān na gṛhyate //
analyzed: iha api smṛti upārūḍhaḥ śabdaḥ kasmāt na gṛhyate

original: nanu śabdo na netrasya kadācid api gocaraḥ /
analyzed: nanu śabdaḥ na netrasya kadācid api gocaraḥ

original: asannihitam apy ambu kiṃ vā bhavati gocaraḥ //
analyzed: asannihitam api ambu kim vā bhavati gocaraḥ

original: nanu ekendriyavādaḥ syāt cakṣuṣā śabdavedane /
analyzed: nanu eka indriya vādaḥ syāt cakṣuṣā śabda vedane

original: atrāpi sarvabodhaḥ syāt asannihitavedane //
analyzed: atra api sarva bodhaḥ syāt asannihita vedane

original: nanu ca marīcijalajñānaṃ bhrāntam iti katham iha dṛṣṭāntīkriyate katham asya bhrāntatvam kim anindriyajatvāt uta vyabhicāritvāt tatrānindriyajatvenāsya bhrāntāyāṃ indriyārthasannikarṣotpannapadenaiva nirāsāt avyabhicāripadam anupādeyam iti /
analyzed: nanu ca marīci jala jñānam bhrāntam iti katham iha dṛṣṭāntīkriyate katham asya bhrānta tvam kim anindriya ja tvāt uta vyabhicāri tvāt tatra anindriya ja tvena asya bhrāntāyām indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena eva nirāsāt avyabhicāri padam anupādeyam iti

original: tadupādānāt vyabhicāritvenāsya bhrāntatvam iti nūnam idam indriyajam asannihitasalilajñānam abhyupagantavyam //
analyzed: tad upādānāt vyabhicāri tvena asya bhrānta tvam iti nūnam idam indriya jam asannihita salila jñānam abhyupagantavyam

original: yathā cāviṣaye tasmin nīre nayanajā matiḥ /
analyzed: yathā ca aviṣaye tasmin nīre nayana jā matiḥ

original: tathā vācakasaṃspṛṣṭe vācye kimiti neṣyate //
analyzed: tathā vācaka saṃspṛṣṭe vācye kim iti nā iṣyate

original: yathā ca tava kālādi nīrūpam api cākṣuṣam /
analyzed: yathā ca tava kāla ādi nīrūpam api cākṣuṣam

original: tathā śabdānurakto 'pi kimity artho na cākṣuṣaḥ //
analyzed: tathā kim iti arthaḥ na cākṣuṣaḥ

original: evaṃ hi indriyavyatirekānuvidhānam atra na bādhitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: evam hi indriya vyatireka anuvidhānam atra na bādhitam bhaviṣyati

original: nanu cākṣuṣatāṃ śabde na jīvan vaktum utsahe /
analyzed: nanu cākṣuṣa tām śabde na jīvan vaktum utsahe

original: tyajainaṃ vācakopetavācyāvagamadurgraham //
analyzed: tyaja enam vācaka upeta vācya avagama durgraham

original: api cāmuṣya śābdatve sambandhagrahaṇaṃ katham na cāgṛhītasambandhaḥ śabdo bhavati vācakaḥ //
analyzed: api ca amuṣya śābda tve sambandha grahaṇam katham na ca agṛhīta sambandhaḥ śabdaḥ bhavati vācakaḥ

original: nirvikalpakavijñānaviṣaye na ca tadgrahaḥ /
analyzed: nirvikalpaka vijñāna viṣaye na ca tad grahaḥ

original: śābdapakṣe tu nikṣiptaṃ bhavatā savikalpakam //
analyzed: śābda pakṣe tu nikṣiptam bhavatā sa vikalpakam

original: sambandhaḥ śakyate boddhuṃ na ca mānāntarād vinā /
analyzed: sambandhaḥ śakyate boddhum na ca māna antarāt vinā

original: śābdajñānena tadbodhe bhaved anyonyasaṃśrayaḥ //
analyzed: śābda jñānena tad bodhe bhavet anyonya saṃśrayaḥ

original: na ca śabdoparakte 'rthe sambandhaṃ buddhyate janaḥ /
analyzed: na ca śabda uparakte rthe sambandham buddhyate janaḥ

original: gośabdavācyo gośabda iti hi grahaṇaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: go śabda vācyaḥ go śabdaḥ iti hi grahaṇam bhavet

original: vācyasya hi gavādeḥ gośabdaviśeṣitasya vācyatvāt vācyo 'rtha iva gośabdo 'pi vācyatām avalambate //
analyzed: vācyasya hi gavā ādeḥ go śabda viśeṣitasya vācya tvāt vācyaḥ rthaḥ iva go śabdaḥ api vācya tām avalambate

original: yadi ca svānurāgeṇa vācakāt vācyavedanam /
analyzed: yadi ca sva anurāgeṇa vācakāt vācya vedanam

original: liṅgād api bhavet buddhiḥ svāvacchedena liṅgini //
analyzed: api bhavet

original: atha dhūmānvitatvena na vahnir avagamyate /
analyzed: atha dhūma anvita tvena na vahniḥ avagamyate

original: ihāpi śabdayogena gavādir naiva gamyate //
analyzed: iha api śabda yogena gavādiḥ nā eva gamyate

original: na cāsti vastuno dharmo vācyatā nāma kiś cana /
analyzed: na ca asti vastunaḥ dharmaḥ vācya tā nāma kim cana

original: yadi syāt nirvikalpe 'pi pratibhāseta rūpavat //
analyzed: yadi syāt nirvikalpe pi pratibhāseta rūpavat

original: arthāsaṃsparśinaḥ śabdān kathayan duṣṭasaugataḥ /
analyzed: artha asaṃsparśinaḥ śabdān kathayan duṣṭa saugataḥ

original: pratyakṣāstreṇa bhettavyaḥ sa kathaṃ hanyate tvayā //
analyzed: pratyakṣa astreṇa bhettavyaḥ sa katham hanyate tvayā

original: pratyakṣaviṣaye vṛttiḥ śabdānāṃ bhavataḥ kutaḥ teṣāṃ yad viṣaye vṛttiḥ tad dhi śābdīkṛtaṃ tvayā //
analyzed: pratyakṣa viṣaye vṛttiḥ śabdānām bhavataḥ kutas teṣām yat viṣaye vṛttiḥ tat hi śābdīkṛtam tvayā

original: api ca viṣayabhedena pratibhāsabhedo bhavatīti durāśayā śabdaviśiṣṭam arthaṃ nirvikalpāt savikalpasya viṣayam adhikaṃ paśyati bhavān anenaiva ca vartmanā 'vataran paraṃ śabdādhyāsaṃ na paśyatīti ko 'yaṃ vyāmohaḥ sa tvaṃ vacanīyo 'si saṃvṛttaḥ [madhu paśyasi durbuddhe prapātaṃ naiva paśyasi] iti //
analyzed: api ca viṣaya bhedena pratibhāsa bhedaḥ bhavati iti durāśayā śabda viśiṣṭam artham nirvikalpāt sa vikalpasya viṣayam adhikam paśyati bhavān anena eva ca vartmanā vataran param śabda adhyāsam na paśyati iti kaḥ yam vyāmohaḥ sa tvam saṃvṛttaḥ madhu paśyasi durbuddhe prapātam nā eva paśyasi iti

original: tasmāt gaur iti vijñānaṃ pratyakṣam avadhāryatām /
analyzed: tasmāt gauḥ iti vijñānam pratyakṣam avadhāryatām

original: śabdasmaraṇasāpekṣacakṣurindriyanirmitam //
analyzed: śabda smaraṇa sāpekṣa cakṣuḥ indriya nirmitam

original: mānasatvaṃ tu yady asya neṣyate yuktam eva tat /
analyzed: mānasa tvam tu yadi asya na iṣyate yuktam eva tat

original: tadbhāvānuvidhāyitvāt bāhyendriyajam eva tat //
analyzed: tad bhāva anuvidhāyi tvāt bāhya indriya jam eva tat

original: atra punaḥ pravarāḥ prāhuḥ nanu evaṃ gaur ityādibodheṣu vācakāvacchinnavācyapratibhāse sarvaprakāram apākriyamāṇe prathamākṣasannipātasamayasamāsāditasadbhāvanirvikalpakavedanavailakṣaṇyaṃ katham eṣāṃ bhavet /
analyzed: atra punar pravarāḥ prāhuḥ nanu evam gauḥ ityādi bodheṣu vācaka avacchinna vācya pratibhāse sarva prakāram apākriyamāṇe prathama akṣa sannipāta samaya samāsādita sadbhāva nirvikalpaka vedana vailakṣaṇyam katham eṣām bhavet

original: na hi viṣayātiśayam antareṇa pratibhāsātiśayo bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: na hi viṣaya atiśayam antareṇa pratibhāsa atiśayaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: daṇḍīti daṇḍaviśiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ pratibhāsate itarathā na kevalapuruṣapratīter eṣā pratītir viśiṣyeta /
analyzed: daṇḍī iti daṇḍa viśiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ pratibhāsate itarathā na kevala puruṣa pratīteḥ eṣā pratītiḥ viśiṣyeta

original: ubhayapratibhāse 'pi na daṇḍapuruṣāv iti pratīteḥ /
analyzed: ubhaya pratibhāse pi na daṇḍa puruṣau iti pratīteḥ

original: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya niyāmaka tvāt

original: pūrvāparacirakṣiprakramādyavagameṣv api /
analyzed: pūrva apara cira kṣi pra krama ādi avagameṣu api

original: dikkālādiviśiṣṭo 'rthaḥ sphuraty atiśayagrahāt //
analyzed: diś kāla ādi viśiṣṭaḥ rthaḥ sphurati atiśaya grahāt

original: pratyakṣaḥ kiṃ sa kālādiḥ pratītiṃ pṛccha kiṃ mayā gṛhyate tad viśiṣṭo 'rthaḥ sa ca nety etad adbhutam //
analyzed: pratyakṣaḥ kim sa kāla ādiḥ pratītim pṛccha kim mayā gṛhyate tat viśiṣṭaḥ ṛthaḥ sa ca na iti etat adbhutam

original: etena samavāye 'pi pratyakṣatvaṃ prakāśitam /
analyzed: etena samavāye pi pratyakṣa tvam prakāśitam

original: iheti tantusambaddhapaṭapratyayadarśanāt //
analyzed: iha iti tantu sambaddha paṭa pratyaya darśanāt

original: ayaṃ paṭa iti pratyayāt iha tantuṣu paṭa iti vilakṣaṇa eṣa pratyayaḥ /
analyzed: ayam paṭaḥ iti pratyayāt iha tantuṣu paṭaḥ iti vilakṣaṇaḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ

original: tantupaṭasambandhasya viśeṣaṇasyāpratyakṣātāyāṃ na kevalapaṭapratyayāt viśiṣyeteti //
analyzed: tantu paṭa sambandhasya viśeṣaṇasya apratyakṣa atāyām na kevala paṭa pratyayāt viśiṣyeta iti

original: atha mataṃ upāyabhedāt pratītibhedo bhavati dūrāvidūradeśavyavasthitasthāṇvādipadārthapratītivat saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtākṣakaraṇaviṣayabodhavad veti tad asāṃpratam upāyabhede 'pi tadbhedāsiddheḥ /
analyzed: atha matam upāya bhedāt pratīti bhedaḥ bhavati dūra avidūra deśa vyavasthita sthāṇu ādi padārtha pratīti vat saṃskṛta asaṃskṛta akṣa karaṇa viṣaya bodha vat vā iti tat asāṃpratam upāya bhede pi tad bheda asiddheḥ

original: upāyo buddhāv atiśayam ādadhāti na viṣaye //
analyzed: upāyaḥ buddhau atiśayam ādadhāti na viṣaye

original: viṣayāvagatisamaye ca na buddhir avabhātīti naiyāyikāḥ /
analyzed: viṣaya avagati samaye ca na buddhiḥ avabhāti iti naiyāyikāḥ

original: tad ayam atiśayaḥ yad adhikaraṇaḥ sā na pratibhāsate buddhiḥ yac ca tadānīm avabhāsate viṣayaḥ tatrātiśayo nāsti dṛśyate cātiśayasaṃvedanam iti saṅkaṭaḥ panthāḥ /
analyzed: tat ayam atiśayaḥ yat adhikaraṇaḥ sā na pratibhāsate buddhiḥ yat ca tadānīm avabhāsate viṣayaḥ tatra atiśayaḥ na asti dṛśyate ca atiśaya saṃvedanam iti saṅkaṭaḥ panthāḥ

original: na ca dūrāvidūradeśavartini padārthe pratītir upāyabhedāt bhidyate /
analyzed: na ca dūra avidūra deśa vartini padārthe pratītiḥ upāya bhedāt bhidyate

original: sā 'pi hi viṣayabhedād eva bhidyate //
analyzed: sā pi hi viṣaya bhedāt eva bhidyate

original: dūrād dhi vastusāmānyaṃ dharmamātropalakṣitam /
analyzed: dūrāt hi vastu sāmānyam dharma mātra upalakṣitam

original: adūratas tu vispaṣṭaviśeṣam avasīyate //
analyzed: adūrataḥ tu vispaṣṭa viśeṣam avasīyate

original: yathā māghena varṇitam [cayas tviṣām ity avadhāritaṃ purā tataḥ śarīrīti vibhāvitākṛtim /
analyzed: yathā māghena varṇitam cayaḥ tviṣām iti avadhāritam purā tatas śarīrī iti vibhāvita ākṛtim

original: vibhur vibhaktāvayavaṃ pumān iti kramād amuṃ nārada ity abodhi saḥ] iti //
analyzed: vibhuḥ vibhakta avayavam pumān iti kramāt amum nāradaḥ iti abodhi saḥ iti

original: kriyāntarāṇāṃ vaicitrye yad vā tad vā 'stu kāraṇam /
analyzed: kriyā antarāṇām vaicitrye yat vā tat vā stu kāraṇam

original: bhedo jñānakriyāyās tu karmabhedanibandhanaḥ //
analyzed: bhedaḥ jñāna kriyāyāḥ tu karma bheda nibandhanaḥ

original: tad etad ācāryāḥ pratisamādadhate na viṣayabhedād eva pratibhāsabhedaḥ kintu upāyabhedāt bhavaty eva //
analyzed: tat etat ācāryāḥ pratisamādadhate na viṣaya bhedāt eva pratibhāsa bhedaḥ kintu upāya bhedāt bhavati eva

original: yac ca coditam viṣayapratibhāsakāle tatpratibhāsāpratibhāsāt atiśayavacane saṅkaṭaḥ panthā iti tadaviditanaiyāyikadarśanasyaiva codyam /
analyzed: yat ca coditam viṣaya pratibhāsa kāle tad pratibhāsa apratibhāsāt atiśaya vacane saṅkaṭaḥ panthāḥ iti tat avidita naiyāyika darśanasya eva codyam

original: jñānotpāda eva viṣayasya pratikṣateti no darśanaṃ na jñānagrahaṇam iti /
analyzed: jñāna utpādaḥ eva viṣayasya na u darśanam na jñāna grahaṇam iti

original: tatra yathā puruṣa iti niratiśayajñānamātrotpāde tāvanmātraviṣayapratyakṣatā bhavati na tatra jñānaṃ prakāśate agṛhyamāṇe 'pi jñāne viṣaya eva pratibhāsate evaṃ daṇḍīti śuklavāsā iti viśeṣaṇajñānābhyupāyavaśāt sātiśayapratyayajanane tadagrahaṇe sa eva viṣayo 'vabhāsate iti kiyān eṣa saṅkaṭaḥ panthāḥ tathā ca daṇḍīti puruṣapravaṇaiva matiḥ /
analyzed: tatra yathā puruṣaḥ iti niratiśaya jñāna mātra utpāde tāvat mātra viṣaya pratyakṣa tā bhavati na tatra jñānam prakāśate agṛhyamāṇe jñāne viṣayaḥ eva pratibhāsate evam daṇḍī iti śukla vāsāḥ iti viśeṣaṇa jñāna abhyupāya vaśāt sa atiśaya pratyaya janane tad agrahaṇe saḥ eva viṣayaḥ vabhāsate iti kiyān eṣa saṅkaṭaḥ panthāḥ tathā ca daṇḍī iti puruṣa pravaṇā eva matiḥ

original: ko daṇḍī puruṣaḥ kaḥ puruṣo daṇḍī iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena niśandigdhasya puṃsa eva pratibhāsāt /
analyzed: kaḥ daṇḍī puruṣaḥ kaḥ puruṣaḥ daṇḍī iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena niśandigdhasya puṃsaḥ eva pratibhāsāt

original: evaṃ daṇḍinaṃ bhojaya daṇḍine dehīti bhojanādikāryayogitvaṃ na daṇḍe dṛśyate api tu puṃsy eva //
analyzed: evam daṇḍinam bhojaya daṇḍine dehi iti bhojana ādi kārya yogi tvam na daṇḍe dṛśyate api tu puṃsi eva

original: nanu daṇḍī parvatam ārohatīti daṇḍe 'pi kāryānvayo dṛśyate loke vede 'pi [daṇḍī maitrāvaruṇaḥ praiṣānanvāha] iti praiṣānuvaṃcanasya vacanāntarataḥ prāpteḥ daṇḍavidhānārtham etad vākyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: nanu daṇḍī parvatam ārohati iti daṇḍe pi kārya anvayaḥ dṛśyate loke vede pi daṇḍī maitrāvaruṇaḥ praiṣān anvāha iti praiṣa anuvaṃcanasya vacana antarataḥ prāpteḥ daṇḍa vidhāna artham etat vākyam bhavati

original: yathā [lohitoṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti] iti śyenādau ṛtvijāṃ prakṛtivadbhāvena prāptānāṃ lohitoṣṇīṣavidhānamātram etat bhavati ucyate bhavatv evaṃ kintu daṇḍam avalambya puruṣaḥ parvatam ārohati na daṇḍo niścetanaḥ /
analyzed: yathā lohita uṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti śyena ādau ṛtvijām prakṛtivat bhāvena prāptānām lohita uṣṇīṣa vidhāna mātram etat bhavati ucyate bhavatu evam kintu daṇḍam avalambya puruṣaḥ parvatam ārohati na daṇḍaḥ niścetanaḥ

original: vede 'pi daṇḍapāṇiḥ puruṣaḥ praiṣān anubhāṣate na daṇḍaḥ na lohitā uṣṇīṣāś caranti kintu anyapadārthībhūtā ṛtvija eveti sarvatra viśeṣyapravaṇaiva matiḥ /
analyzed: vede pi daṇḍa pāṇiḥ puruṣaḥ praiṣān anubhāṣate na daṇḍaḥ na lohitāḥ uṣṇīṣāḥ caranti kintu anya padārthībhūtāḥ ṛtvijaḥ eva iti sarvatra viśeṣya pravaṇā eva matiḥ

original: ubhayapratipādane tu daṇḍapuruṣāv iti syāt na daṇḍīti //
analyzed: ubhaya pratipādane tu daṇḍa puruṣau iti syāt na daṇḍī iti

original: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasya niyāmakatvād iti cet seyaṃ viśeṣyapravaṇā matir uktaiva bhavati viśeṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇatvenaivopasarjanatvāt /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya niyāmaka tvāt iti ced sā iyam viśeṣya pravaṇā matiḥ uktā eva bhavati viśeṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇa tvena evā upasarjana tvāt

original: daṇḍaḥ asya astīti puruṣa evocyate na daṇḍapuruṣau //
analyzed: daṇḍaḥ asya asti iti puruṣaḥ eva ucyate na daṇḍa puruṣau

original: evaṃ pūrvāparādipratyayāḥ cirakṣiprādipratyayāḥ iha tantuṣu paṭa ityādipratyayāś ca dikkālasamavāyagrāhiṇaḥ /
analyzed: evam pūrva apara ādi pratyayāḥ cira kṣipra ādi pratyayāḥ iha tantuṣu paṭaḥ ityādi pratyayāḥ ca diś kāla samavāya grāhiṇaḥ

original: na ime dikkālasamavāyāḥ sāmagryantargatās santaḥ pratyayātiśayam ādadhati na tadviṣayībhavanti paṭādidravyavat //
analyzed: na ime diś kāla samavāyāḥ sāmagrī antargatāḥ santaḥ pratyaya atiśayam ādadhati na tad viṣayībhavanti paṭa ādi dravya vat

original: evaṃ patanādyanumeyagurutvādikāraṇabhedajanitāḥ [guruḥ pāṣāṇaḥ] ityādipratyayāḥ parokṣaviśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyam avalambante ity alaṃ vistareṇa //
analyzed: evam patana ādi anumeya guru tva ādi kāraṇa bheda janitāḥ guruḥ pāṣāṇaḥ ityādi pratyayāḥ parokṣa viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyam avalambante iti alam vistareṇa

original: tasmāt gaur ityādijñānaṃ na vācakāvacchinnavācyaviṣayam /
analyzed: tasmāt gauḥ ityādi jñānam na vācaka avacchinna vācya viṣayam

original: ataś ca na śābdaṃ tat /
analyzed: atas ca na śābdam tat

original: api tu suspaṣṭaṃ pratyakṣam eva /
analyzed: api tu su spaṣṭam pratyakṣam eva

original: tasmiṃś ca lakṣye sati lakṣaṇavaiyarthyaśaṅkākaraṇābhāvāt nāsaṃbhavadoṣanirākaraṇārtham avyapadeśyapadam //
analyzed: tasmin ca lakṣye sati lakṣaṇa vaiyarthya śaṅkā karaṇa abhāvāt na asaṃbhava doṣa nirākaraṇa artham avyapadeśya padam

original: kim arthaṃ tarhīdam astu uktam ācāryaiḥ ubhayajajñānavyavacchedārtham iti //
analyzed: kim artham tarhi idam astu uktam ācāryaiḥ ubhaya ja jñāna vyavaccheda artham iti

original: nanu tad api pratyakṣam eveti anapohyam uktam /
analyzed: nanu tat api pratyakṣam eva iti anapohyam uktam

original: parovasthitagavādipadārthasvarūpamātragrahaṇaniṣṭhitasāmarthyam atra pratyakṣam /
analyzed: parovasthita gav ādi padārtha sva rūpa mātra grahaṇa niṣṭhita sāmarthyam atra pratyakṣam

original: gośabdavācyatāyāṃ tu saṃjñākarmopadeśī śabda eva pramāṇam //
analyzed: go śabda vācya tāyām tu saṃjñā karma upadeśī śabdaḥ eva pramāṇam

original: yady api śabdārthasambandhaparicchede gatyantaram api saṃbhavati tathāpi yatra tāvat saṃjñitaṃ nirdiśya saṃjñā vṛddhair upadiśyate gośabdavācyo 'yaṃ panasaśabdavācyo 'yam iti tatra tadvācyatāparicchede sa eva karaṇam //
analyzed: yadi api śabda artha sambandha paricchede gati antaram api saṃbhavati tathā api yatra tāvat saṃjñitam nirdiśya saṃjñā vṛddhaiḥ upadiśyate go śabda vācyaḥ yam panasa śabda vācyaḥ yam iti tatra tad vācya tā paricchede saḥ eva karaṇam

original: ata eva ca loko 'pi śābdatvam iha manyate /
analyzed: atas eva ca śābda tvam iha manyate

original: śabdoparacitāpūrvajñānātiśayatoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: śabda uparacita apūrva jñāna atiśaya toṣitaḥ

original: tacchabdavācyatājñaptiḥ vinā saṃjñopadeśinaḥ /
analyzed: tad śabda vācya tā jñaptiḥ vinā saṃjñā upadeśinaḥ

original: śabdān neti sa evātra saty apy akṣe prakarṣabhāk //
analyzed: śabdāt na iti saḥ eva atra sati api akṣe prakarṣa bhāj

original: ataḥ sūtrakṛtā 'py atra śabdātiśayadarśinā /
analyzed: atas sūtrakṛtā pi atra śabda atiśaya darśinā

original: vyadhāyi tadvyavacchedaḥ na tu dharmopadeśinā //
analyzed: vyadhāyi tad vyavacchedaḥ na tu dharma upadeśinā

original: tasmāt ubhayajajñānavyavacchedārtham evedaṃ padam iti //
analyzed: tasmāt ubhaya ja jñāna vyavaccheda artham eva idam padam iti

original: anye tu manyante yadi saṅketagrahaṇakāle bhāvinaḥ saṃjñopadeśakavacanajanitasyobhayajajñānasya vyavacchedakam idaṃ varṇyate padam tadā tad vyavahārakāle 'pi yat [ayaṃ gauḥ] iti saṅketagrahaṇakālānubhūtadevadattādyudīritasaṃjñopadeśakavacanasmaraṇapūrvakaṃ vijñānam utpadyate tad apy ubhayajam eveti katham anena na vyudasyate //
analyzed: anye tu manyante yadi saṅketa grahaṇa kāle bhāvinaḥ saṃjñā upadeśaka vacana janitasya ubhaya ja jñānasya vyavacchedakam idam varṇyate padam tadā tat vyavahāra kāle yat ayam gauḥ iti saṅketa grahaṇa kāla anubhūta devadatta ādi udīrita saṃjñā upadeśaka vacana smaraṇa pūrvakam vijñānam utpadyate tat api ubhaya jam eva iti katham anena na vyudasyate

original: nanu tatra śabdasmaraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ na śabdaḥ /
analyzed: nanu tatra śabda smaraṇam kāraṇam na śabdaḥ

original: saṅketakāle 'pi śabdasmaraṇam eva kāraṇam /
analyzed: saṅketa kāle pi śabda smaraṇam eva kāraṇam

original: na hi kramabhāvino varṇā yugapad anubhavituṃ pāryante /
analyzed: na hi krama bhāvinaḥ varṇāḥ yugapad anubhavitum pāryante

original: antyavarṇe tu gṛhyamāṇe smaryamāṇe vā kiṃ śabdavyāpāro viśiṣyate nanu vyavahārakāle gavādinām adheyapadamātram eva smaryamāṇam indriyeṇa saha savikalpapratyayodaye vyāpriyate /
analyzed: antya varṇe tu gṛhyamāṇe smaryamāṇe vā kim śabda vyāpāraḥ viśiṣyate nanu vyavahāra kāle gavādinām adheya pada mātram eva smaryamāṇam indriyeṇa saha sa vikalpa pratyaya udaye vyāpriyate

original: saṅketakāle tu saṃjñopadeśivṛddhavākyaṃ iti cet maivam vyavahārakāle 'pi saṃjñopadeśakaṃ vṛddhavākyam eva smaryate tadasmaraṇe tacchabdavācyatā 'navagamāt /
analyzed: saṅketa kāle tu saṃjñā upadeśi vṛddha vākyam iti ced mā evam vyavahāra kāle saṃjñā upadeśakam vṛddha vākyam eva smaryate tad asmaraṇe tad śabda vācya tā na avagamāt

original: [asya gaur iti nāma devadattenopadiṣṭam āsīt] ity evam anusmṛtya gośabdavācyatayaivaṃ vyavaharatīti vākyasmaraṇajam evedaṃ jñānam tasmād asyāpi tad vākyaṃ saṃjñākarmopadeśakam /
analyzed: asya gauḥ iti nāma devadattena upadiṣṭam āsīt iti evam anusmṛtya go śabda vācya tayā evam vyavaharati iti vākya smaraṇa jam eva idam jñānam tasmāt asya api tat vākyam saṃjñā karma upadeśakam

original: hetutām upayātīti śābdam etad apīpyatām //
analyzed: hetutām upayāti iti śābdam etat api īpyatām

original: evam astv iti cet śāntam evaṃ sati tapasvinām /
analyzed: evam astu iti ced śāntam evam sati tapasvinām

original: naiyāyikānām utpannaṃ pratyakṣaṃ savikalpakam //
analyzed: naiyāyikānām utpannam pratyakṣam sa vikalpakam

original: yatra mārgāntareṇāpi saṅketajñānasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: yatra mārga antareṇa api saṅketa jñāna saṃbhavaḥ

original: tatrāpy anena nyāyena śābdatā na nivartate //
analyzed: tatra api anena nyāyena śābda tā na nivartate

original: naiyāyikānāṃ ca savikalpapratyakṣamayāḥ prāṇāḥ /
analyzed: naiyāyikānām ca sa vikalpa pratyakṣa mayāḥ prāṇāḥ

original: tasmān nobhayajasya śābdatvaṃ jñānasya vaktavyam //
analyzed: tasmāt na ubhaya jasya śābda tvam jñānasya vaktavyam

original: sambandhādhigamas tu nānāpramāṇakaḥ /
analyzed: sambandha adhigamaḥ tu nānā pramāṇakaḥ

original: tatra sve sve viṣaye tat tat pramāṇaṃ pravartate /
analyzed: tatra sve sve viṣaye tat tat pramāṇam pravartate

original: yathā ''ha bhaṭṭaḥ [sambandhaḥ tripramāṇakaḥ] iti /
analyzed: yathā ha bhaṭṭaḥ sambandhaḥ tri pramāṇakaḥ iti

original: tasmān naikasya śabdasya bhāraḥ āropaṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt na ekasya śabdasya bhāraḥ āropaṇīyaḥ

original: pratyakṣaṃ tu saṅketagrahaṇakāle 'pi svaviṣayagrāhakam iti nobhayajajñānavyavacchedapakṣo niravadyaḥ /
analyzed: pratyakṣam tu saṅketa grahaṇa kāle sva viṣaya grāhakam iti na ubhaya ja jñāna vyavaccheda pakṣaḥ niravadyaḥ

original: tasmād varaṃ jarannaiyāyikakathitaśabdakarmatāpannajñānavyavacchedapakṣa iti sa evāśrīyatām /
analyzed: tasmāt varam jarat naiyāyika kathita śabda karmatā āpanna jñāna vyavaccheda pakṣaḥ iti saḥ eva āśrīyatām

original: tatra tāvat karmaṇi kṛtye kṛte vyapadeśyaśabdo yathārthataro bhavati //
analyzed: tatra tāvat karmaṇi kṛtye kṛte vyapadeśya śabdaḥ yathārthataraḥ bhavati

original: nanu tatra coditaṃ na tādṛśaṃ jñānam apramāṇaṃ na pañcamaṃ pramāṇam iti satyam ayan tu teṣām āśayaḥ /
analyzed: nanu tatra coditam na tādṛśam jñānam apramāṇam na pañcamam pramāṇam iti satyam ayan tu teṣām āśayaḥ

original: rūpādiviṣayagrahaṇābhimukhaṃ hi tad akṣajaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ phalaṃ vocyate /
analyzed: rūpa ādi viṣaya grahaṇa abhimukham hi tat akṣa jam jñānam pramāṇam phalam vā ucyate

original: yadā tu tad eva śabdenocyate rūpajñānaṃ rasajñānam iti tadā rūpādijñānaviṣayagrahaṇavyāpāralabhyāṃ pramāṇatām apahāya śabdakarmatāpattikṛtāṃ prameyatām evāvalambata iti na tasyāṃ daśāyāṃ tat pramāṇam iti kutaḥ pañcamapramāṇaprasaṅga iti //
analyzed: yadā tu tat eva śabdena ucyate rūpa jñānam rasa jñānam iti tadā rūpa ādi jñāna viṣaya grahaṇa vyāpāra labhyām pramāṇa tām apahāya śabda karma tā āpatti kṛtām prameya tām eva avalambate iti na tasyām daśāyām tat pramāṇam iti kutas pañcama pramāṇa prasaṅgaḥ iti

original: apara āha savikalpakasya śabdasaṅkalpakasya śabdasaṃsargasāpekṣajanmanaḥ pratyakṣajñānasya śābdatāṃ pūrvavad āśaṅkya tasyaivāśābdatāṃ darśayaty avyapadeśyapadena sūtrakāraḥ /
analyzed: aparaḥ āha sa vikalpakasya śabda saṅkalpakasya śabda saṃsarga sāpekṣa janmanaḥ pratyakṣa jñānasya śābda tām pūrvavat āśaṅkya tasya eva a śābda tām darśayati avyapadeśya padena sūtrakāraḥ

original: pratyakṣam eva tat jñānam indriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvāt avyapadeśyaṃ aśābdam ity arthaḥ //
analyzed: pratyakṣam eva tat jñānam indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt avyapadeśyam aśābdam iti arthaḥ

original: spaṣṭatvāt vācakābhāvāt indriyānuvidhānataḥ /
analyzed: spaṣṭa tvāt vācaka abhāvāt indriya anuvidhānataḥ

original: lokasya sammatatvāc ca pratyakṣam idam iṣyate //
analyzed: lokasya sammata tvāt ca pratyakṣam idam iṣyate

original: śabdānusmṛtijatve 'pi na śābdaṃ jñānam īdṛśam /
analyzed: śabda anusmṛti ja tve na śābdam jñānam īdṛśam

original: śabdasmṛtiḥ sahāya syāt indriyasya pradīpavat //
analyzed: śabda smṛtiḥ sahāya syāt indriyasya pradīpa vat

original: nanv evaṃ savikalpasya pratyakṣatve prasādhite /
analyzed: nanu evam sa vikalpasya pratyakṣa tve prasādhite

original: nedānīṃ saṅgṛhītaṃ syāt pratyakṣaṃ nirvikalpakam //
analyzed: na idānīm saṅgṛhītam syāt pratyakṣam nirvikalpakam

original: yas tu śabdānuvedhe 'pi pratyakṣaṃ jñānam iṣyate /
analyzed: yaḥ tu śabda anuvedhe pratyakṣam jñānam iṣyate

original: tatra tatsparśaśūnyasya tathātve kā vicāraṇā //
analyzed: tatra tad sparśa śūnyasya tathātve kā vicāraṇā

original: nirvikalpakavat tasmāt pratyakṣaṃ savikalpakam /
analyzed: nirvikalpaka vat tasmāt pratyakṣam sa vikalpakam

original: samagrahīc ca tad idaṃ padenānena sūtrakṛt //
analyzed: samagrahīt ca tat idam padena anena sūtrakṛt

original: ity ācāryamatānīha darśitāni yathā ''gamam /
analyzed: iti ācārya matāni iha darśitāni yathā gamam

original: yad ebhyaḥ satyam ābhāti sabhyās tadavalambyatām //
analyzed: yat ebhyaḥ satyam ābhāti sabhyāḥ tat avalambyatām

original: avyabhicārigrahaṇaṃ vyabhicārijñānavyavacchedārtham /
analyzed: avyabhicāri grahaṇam vyabhicāri jñāna vyavaccheda artham

original: yathāgrīṣme tapati lalāṭantape tapane tanmarīciṣu caturamūṣarabhuvam abhihatya samutphaliteṣu taraṅgākāradhāriṣu yat vārijñānaṃ tat atasmiṃs tad iti grahaṇāt vyabhicāri bhavati /
analyzed: yathā grīṣme tapati lalāṭantape tapane tat marīciṣu caturam ūṣara bhuvam abhihatya samutphaliteṣu taraṅga ākāra dhāriṣu yat vāri jñānam tat a tasmin tat iti grahaṇāt vyabhicāri bhavati

original: tat anena padena vyavacchidyate na tat pratyakṣam iti //
analyzed: tat anena padena vyavacchidyate na tat pratyakṣam iti

original: tatra nirvikalpakam api prathamanayanasannipātajaṃ jñānam udakasavikalpakajñānajanakaṃ udakagrāhyeva na yathā tathā tathāgatāḥ kathayanti /
analyzed: tatra nirvikalpakam api prathama nayana sannipāta jam jñānam udaka sa vikalpaka jñāna janakam udaka grāhya iva na yathā tathā tathāgatāḥ kathayanti

original: marīciviṣayam avikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ udakavikalpakajananāt apramāṇam iti /
analyzed: marīci viṣayam avikalpakam jñānam udaka vikalpaka jananāt apramāṇam iti

original: nirvikalpāvasthāyām avicārayata eva prathamonmīlitacakṣuṣo jhaṭiti salilapratibhāsāt //
analyzed: nirvikalpa avasthāyām a vicārayataḥ eva prathama unmīlita cakṣuṣaḥ jhaṭiti salila pratibhāsāt

original: atha vā vācakollekhapūrvikā api saṃvidaḥ naivendriyārthajanyatvaṃ jahati ity upapāditam /
analyzed: atha vā vācaka ullekha pūrvikāḥ api saṃvidaḥ na eva indriyārtha janya tvam jahati iti upapāditam

original: tasmāt savikalpakam avikalpakaṃ vā yat atasmiṃs tad iti jñānam utpadyate tat vyabhicāti /
analyzed: tasmāt sa vikalpakam avikalpakam vā yat a tasmin tat iti jñānam utpadyate tat vyabhicāti

original: tac ceha vyāvartyam iti //
analyzed: tat ca iha vyāvartyam iti

original: nanu marīciṣu jalajñānam avidyamānasalilāvabhāsitvāt anindriyārthasannikarṣajam /
analyzed: nanu marīciṣu jala jñānam avidyamāna salila avabhāsi tvāt an indriya artha sannikarṣa jam

original: ataś cendriyārthasannikarṣotpannapadena tadvyudāsasiddheḥ kim avyabhicāripadena naitad evam tasyendriyārthajanyatvaṃ siddhaṃ tadbhāvabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: atas ca indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena tad vyudāsa siddheḥ kim avyabhicāri padena nā etat evam tasya indriya artha janya tvam siddham tad bhāva bhāvataḥ

original: na hy anunmīlitākṣasya marau salilavedanam //
analyzed: na hi an unmīlita akṣasya marau salila vedanam

original: artho 'pi janakas tasya vidyate nāsataḥ prathā /
analyzed: arthaḥ u pi janakaḥ tasya vidyate na asataḥ prathā

original: tadālambanacintāṃ tu tridhā ''cāryāḥ pracakrire //
analyzed: tad ālambana cintām tu tridhā cāryāḥ pracakrire

original: kaiścid ālambanaṃ tasmin uktaṃ sūryamarīcayaḥ /
analyzed: kaiścid ālambanam tasmin uktam sūrya marīcayaḥ

original: nigūhitanijākārāḥ salilākāradhāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: nigūhita nija ākārāḥ salila ākāra dhāriṇaḥ

original: tatra taraṅgādisāmānyadharmagrahaṇe sati na sthāṇupuruṣavat ubhayaviśeṣāḥ smaraṇapatham avataranti /
analyzed: tatra taraṅga ādi sāmānya dharma grahaṇe sati na sthāṇu puruṣa vat ubhaya viśeṣāḥ smaraṇa patham avataranti

original: na ca sannihitamarīciviśeṣāḥ smaraṇapatham avataranti /
analyzed: na ca sannihita marīci viśeṣāḥ smaraṇa patham avataranti

original: kintu pūrvopalabdhaviruddhasalilavartino viśeṣāḥ /
analyzed: kintu pūrva upalabdha viruddha salila vartinaḥ viśeṣāḥ

original: tatsmaraṇāc ca sthagiteṣu svaviśeṣeṣu marīcayaḥ svarūpam upadarśayitum aśaknuvantaḥ toyarūpeṇāvabhāsante //
analyzed: tad smaraṇāt ca sthagiteṣu sva viśeṣeṣu marīcayaḥ sva rūpam upadarśayitum a śaknuvantaḥ toya rūpeṇa avabhāsante

original: anye tv ālambanaṃ prāhuḥ puro 'vasthitadharmiṇaḥ /
analyzed: anye tu ālambanam prāhuḥ puras vasthita dharmiṇaḥ

original: sādṛśyadarśanodbhūtasmṛtyupasthāpitaṃ payaḥ //
analyzed: sādṛśya darśana udbhūta smṛti upasthāpitam payaḥ

original: yatra kila jñāne yat rūpam upaplavate tat tasyālambanam ucyate na sannihitam bhūpradeśasya tadāraṃbhakāṇāṃ ca paramāṇūnāṃ tadālambanatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: yatra kila jñāne yat rūpam upaplavate tat tasya ālambanam ucyate na sannihitam bhū pradeśasya tad āraṃbhakāṇām ca paramāṇūnām tad ālambana tva prasaṅgāt

original: idaṃ ca salilāvabhāsi vijñānam /
analyzed: idam ca salila avabhāsi vijñānam

original: atas tad evāsyālambanam /
analyzed: atas tat eva asya ālambanam

original: tac ca neha sannihitam /
analyzed: tat ca na iha sannihitam

original: na caikāntāsataḥ khapuṣpādeḥ khyātir avakalpata iti deśāntarādau vidyamānam eva salilaṃ sadṛśadarśanaprabuddhasaṃskāropajanitasmaraṇopārūḍham ihāvalambanībhavati //
analyzed: na ca ekānta asataḥ kha puṣpa ādeḥ khyātiḥ avakalpate iti deśa antara ādau vidyamānam eva salilam sadṛśa darśana prabuddha saṃskāra upajanita smaraṇa upārūḍham iha avalambanībhavati

original: anyadālambanaṃ cānyat pratibhātīti kecana /
analyzed: anyat ālambanam ca anyat pratibhāti iti kecana

original: ālambanaṃ dīghitayaḥ toyaṃ ca pratibhāsate //
analyzed: ālambanam dīghitayaḥ toyam ca pratibhāsate

original: kartṛkaraṇavyatiriktaṃ jñānajanakam ālambanam ucyata iti na paramāṇvādau prasaktir iti /
analyzed: kartṛ karaṇa vyatiriktam jñāna janakam ālambanam ucyate iti na paramāṇu ādau prasaktiḥ iti

original: tad idaṃ pakṣatrayam api upariṣṭān nipuṇataraṃ nirūpayiṣyate //
analyzed: tat idam pakṣa trayam api upariṣṭāt nipuṇataram nirūpayiṣyate

original: tad evaṃ bāhyendriyārthānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyināṃ vibhramāṇām indriyārthasannikarṣotpannapadena nirasitum aśakyatvāt yuktam avyabhicāripadopādānam //
analyzed: tat evam bāhya indriya artha anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinām vibhramāṇām indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena nirasitum aśakya tvāt yuktam avyabhicāri pada upādānam

original: ye tu mānasāḥ vibhramāḥ bāhyendriyānapekṣajanmānaḥ teṣām iṣyate evendriyārthasannikarṣapadena paryudasanam iti na tad artham avyabhicāripadopādānam /
analyzed: ye tu mānasāḥ vibhramāḥ bāhya indriya anapekṣa janmānaḥ teṣām iṣyate eva indriya artha sannikarṣa padena paryudasanam iti na tad artham avyabhicāri pada upādānam

original: tad yathā virahoddīpitoddāmakām ākulitadṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā viraha uddīpita uddāmakām ākulita dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: dūrasthām api paśyanti kāntām antikavartinīm //
analyzed: dūra sthām api paśyanti kāntām antika vartinīm

original: nanu evaṃprāyeṣu nirālambaneṣu vibhrameṣu kutastyaḥ ākāraḥ pratibhāti ucyate ākāraḥ smṛtyupārūḍhaḥ prāyeṇa sphurati bhrame /
analyzed: nanu evaṃprāyeṣu nirālambaneṣu vibhrameṣu kutastyaḥ ākāraḥ pratibhāti ucyate ākāraḥ smṛti upārūḍhaḥ prāyeṇa sphurati bhrame

original: smṛtes tu kāraṇaṃ kiñcit kadācit bhavati kvacit //
analyzed: smṛteḥ tu kāraṇam kiñcid kadācid bhavati kvacid

original: kvacit sadṛśavijñānaṃ kāmaśokādayaḥ kvacit /
analyzed: kvacid sadṛśa vijñānam kāma śoka ādayaḥ kvacid

original: kvacit tu darśanābhyāsaḥ timiraṃ cakṣuṣaḥ kvacit //
analyzed: kvacid tu darśana abhyāsaḥ timiram cakṣuṣaḥ kvacid

original: kvacin nidrā kvacic cintā dhātūnāṃ vikṛtiḥ kvacit /
analyzed: kvacid nidrā kvacid cintā dhātūnām vikṛtiḥ kvacid

original: alakṣyamāṇe tad dhetau adṛṣṭaṃ smṛtikāraṇam //
analyzed: a lakṣyamāṇe tat hetau adṛṣṭam smṛti kāraṇam

original: bālasyendudvayajñānam asti nāstīti vetti kaḥ /
analyzed: bālasya indu dvaya jñānam asti na asti iti vetti kaḥ

original: astitve 'pi smṛtau hetum adṛṣṭaṃ tasya manvate //
analyzed: astitve pi smṛtau hetum adṛṣṭam tasya manvate

original: nūnaṃ niyamasiddhyarthaṃ janakasyāvabhāsanam /
analyzed: nūnam niyama siddhi artham janakasya avabhāsanam

original: na caikāntāsato dṛṣṭā jñānotpādanayogyatā //
analyzed: na ca ekānta asataḥ dṛṣṭā jñāna utpādana yogya tā

original: na ca sannihitaṃ vastu tatrāsti vanitādikam /
analyzed: na ca sannihitam vastu tatra asti vanitā ādikam

original: tenedaṃ smṛtyupārūḍhaṃ avabhātīti manvate //
analyzed: tena idam smṛti upārūḍham avabhāti iti manvate

original: tatrādyena padenaitāḥ svāntaḥkaraṇasaṃbhavāḥ /
analyzed: tatra ādyena padena etāḥ sva antaḥkaraṇa saṃbhavāḥ

original: nirastā bhrāntayo 'kṣādisaṃsargarahitodayāḥ //
analyzed: nirastāḥ kṣā ādi saṃsarga rahita udayāḥ

original: yāḥ punaḥ pītaśaṅkhādimarunīrādibuddhayaḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ punar pīta śaṅkha ādi maru nīra ādi buddhayaḥ

original: akṣajās tad vyudāsāya sūtre padam idaṃ kṛtam //
analyzed: akṣajāḥ tat vyudāsāya sūtre padam idam kṛtam

original: dūrāt sthāṇupuruṣasādhāraṇaṃ dharmam ārohapariṇāharūpaṃ upalabhamānasya tayor anyataratra vartamānān vakrakoṭarādīn karacaraṇādīn vā viśeṣān apaśyataḥ samānadharmaprabuddhasaṃskāratayā cobhayavartino 'pi viśeṣān anusmarataḥ puro 'vasthitārthaviṣayaṃ sthāṇur vā puruṣo veti saṃśayajñānam upajāyate /
analyzed: dūrāt sthāṇu puruṣa sādhāraṇam dharmam āroha pariṇāha rūpam upalabhamānasya tayoḥ anyataratra vartamānān vakra koṭara ādīn kara caraṇa ādīn vā viśeṣān a paśyataḥ samāna dharma prabuddha saṃskāra tayā viśeṣān anusmarataḥ puras vasthita artha viṣayam sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti saṃśaya jñānam upajāyate

original: tat indriyārthasannikarṣotpannatvādiviśeṣaṇayuktam api na pratyakṣaphalam /
analyzed: tat indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tva ādi viśeṣaṇa yuktam api na pratyakṣa phalam

original: atas tad vyavacchedāya vyavasāyātmakagrahaṇam //
analyzed: atas tat vyavacchedāya vyavasāya ātmaka grahaṇam

original: nanu mānasatvāt saṃśayajñānasya indriyārthasannikarṣotpannagrahaṇena nirāsaḥ siddhyaty eva kiṃ padāntareṇa tathā ca bhāṣyakāraḥ [smṛtyanumānāgamasaṃśayapratibhāsvapnajñānohasukhādipratyakṣaṃ icchādayaś ca manaso liṅgāni] iti vakṣyati /
analyzed: nanu mānasa tvāt saṃśaya jñānasya indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna grahaṇena nirāsaḥ siddhi ati eva kim pada antareṇa tathā ca bhāṣyakāraḥ smṛti anumāna āgama saṃśaya pratibhā svapna jñāna ūha sukha ādi pratyakṣam icchā ādayaḥ ca manasaḥ liṅgāni iti vakṣyati

original: maivam sthāṇvādisaṃśayasya bāhyendriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvāt /
analyzed: mā evam sthāṇu ādi saṃśayasya bāhya indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt

original: kaścid dhi mānasaḥ saṃśayaḥ samasty eva yathā daiśikasya jyotirgaṇakādeḥ ekadā 'nyadā cāsamyagādiśya tṛtīye pade punarādiśataḥ saṃśayo bhavati [kim ayam asmad ādeśaḥ saṃvadet uta visaṃvadet] iti /
analyzed: kaścid hi mānasaḥ saṃśayaḥ samasti eva yathā daiśikasya jyotiḥ gaṇaka ādeḥ ekadā nyadā ca a samyak ādiśya tṛtīye pade punar ādiśataḥ saṃśayaḥ bhavati kim ayam asmat ādeśaḥ saṃvadet uta visaṃvadet iti

original: sa bhāṣyakṛtaś cetasi kevalamanaḥkaraṇa iti sthitaḥ /
analyzed: sa bhāṣyakṛtaḥ cetasi kevala manaḥkaraṇaḥ iti sthitaḥ

original: yas tu viṣphāritākṣasya [sthāṇur vā puruṣo vā] ityādiḥ saṃpadyate saṃśayaḥ tam anindriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ ko nāmācakṣīta nanu atasmiṃs tad iti jñānaṃ vyabhicāri vyākhyātam /
analyzed: yaḥ tu viṣphārita akṣasya sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā ityādiḥ saṃpadyate saṃśayaḥ tam an indriya artha sannikarṣa jam kaḥ nāma ācakṣīta nanu a tasmin tat iti jñānam vyabhicāri vyākhyātam

original: ekarūpaṃ ca puro 'vasthitam arthaṃ anekarūpatayā spṛśati saṃśayaḥ [sthāṇur vā puruṣo vā] iti /
analyzed: eka rūpam ca puras vasthitam artham aneka rūpa tayā spṛśati saṃśayaḥ sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti

original: so 'yam atasmiṃs tathābhāvāt viparyaya eveti pūrvapadavyudastatvāt na padāntaravyavacchedyatām arhatīti /
analyzed: saḥ yam a tasmin tathābhāvāt viparyayaḥ eva iti pūrva pada vyudasta tvāt na pada antara vyavacchedya tām arhati iti

original: naitad evam svarūpabhedāt kāraṇabhedāc ca /
analyzed: na etat evam svarūpa bhedāt kāraṇa bhedāt ca

original: ekam eva viruddham ākāram ullikhan viparyayo jāyate sthāṇau puruṣa iti puṃsi vā sthāṇur iti /
analyzed: ekam eva viruddham ākāram ullikhan viparyayaḥ jāyate sthāṇau puruṣaḥ iti puṃsi vā sthāṇuḥ iti

original: aniyatākāradvayollekhī tu saṃśayo bhavati sthāṇur vā syāt puruṣo veti /
analyzed: aniyata ākāra dvaya ullekhī tu saṃśayaḥ bhavati sthāṇuḥ vā syāt puruṣaḥ vā iti

original: so 'yaṃ svarūpabhedaḥ pratyātmasaṃvedyaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ yam sva rūpa bhedaḥ pratyātma saṃvedyaḥ

original: kāraṇabhedaś ca viruddhaviśeṣasmaraṇaprabhavo viparyayaḥ śuktikāyāṃ sannihitāyāṃ rajataviśeṣān marīciṣu sannihiteṣu salilagataviśeṣān anusmarataḥ viparyayo bhavati ubhayaviśeṣasmaraṇajanmā tu saṃśaya iti padāntaranirasanīya evāyam //
analyzed: kāraṇa bhedaḥ ca viruddha viśeṣa smaraṇa prabhavaḥ viparyayaḥ śuktikāyām sannihitāyām rajata viśeṣāt marīciṣu sannihiteṣu salila gata viśeṣān anusmarataḥ viparyayaḥ bhavati ubhaya viśeṣa smaraṇa janmā tu saṃśayaḥ iti pada antara nirasanīyaḥ eva ayam

original: nanu saṃśayaviparyayayor api nirvikalpayor asaṃbhavāt avyapadeśyapadenaiva pravarapakṣe pratikṣepaḥ siddhyet /
analyzed: nanu saṃśaya viparyayayoḥ api nirvikalpayoḥ asaṃbhavāt avyapadeśya padena eva pravara pakṣe pratikṣepaḥ siddhyet

original: puro 'vasthitasthāṇvādidharmidarśanamātram eva nirvikalpakam indriyavyāpārajam /
analyzed: puras vasthita sthāṇu ādi dharmi darśana mātram eva nirvikalpakam indriya vyāpāra jam

original: anantaran tu ubhayāntaraviśeṣaṇasmaraṇajanmanor ullikhitaśabdayor eva saṃśayaviparyayayor utpādaḥ /
analyzed: anantaran tu ubhaya antara viśeṣaṇa smaraṇa janmanoḥ ullikhita śabdayoḥ eva saṃśaya viparyayayoḥ utpādaḥ

original: tatra viśeṣasmṛtyaiva śabdānuvedhasyākṣepāt /
analyzed: tatra viśeṣa smṛtyā eva śabda anuvedhasya ākṣepāt

original: ataḥ padadvayam api tadvyudāsāya na kartavyam //
analyzed: atas pada dvayam api tad vyudāsāya na kartavyam

original: atraitad eva tāvad vaktavyam /
analyzed: atra etat eva tāvat vaktavyam

original: pravarapakṣaḥ pratikṣipta eva yataḥ śabdānuvedhajātam api pratyakṣam upapāditam //
analyzed: pravara pakṣaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ eva yatas śabda anuvedha jātam api pratyakṣam upapāditam

original: nanu bhavatu pravarapakṣaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ /
analyzed: nanu bhavatu pravara pakṣaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ

original: sadṛśadarśananiṣṭhite tu nayanavyāpāre viśeṣasmṛter ūrdhvam upajāyamānau saṃśayaviparyayau nendriyajāv iti prathamapadenaiva nirastau bhavataḥ tad asat smṛter ūrdhvam apīndriyavyāpārānuvṛtter ity uktatvāt /
analyzed: sadṛśa darśana niṣṭhite tu nayana vyāpāre viśeṣa smṛteḥ ūrdhvam upajāyamānau saṃśaya viparyayau na indriya jau iti prathama padena eva nirastau bhavataḥ tat asat smṛteḥ ūrdhvam api indriya vyāpāra anuvṛtteḥ iti ukta tvāt

original: etac cānvayavyatirekābhyām avagamyate nimīlitacakṣuṣas tadanupādāt /
analyzed: etat ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām avagamyate nimīlita cakṣuṣaḥ tad anupādāt

original: na ca tadānīm antaḥsaṅkalparūpeṇāpi śabdollekhaḥ /
analyzed: na ca tadānīm antar saṅkalpa rūpeṇa api śabda ullekhaḥ

original: utpanne tu saṃśaye viparyaye ca vācakasmaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti samyagjñānavat saṃśayaviparyayāv api śabdollekhaśūnyau saṃvedyete /
analyzed: utpanne tu saṃśaye viparyaye ca vācaka smaraṇam bhaviṣyati iti samyak jñāna vat saṃśaya viparyayau api śabda ullekha śūnyau saṃvedyete

original: viśeṣasmṛtis tu viśeṣaviṣayatvāt tān evākṣipatu /
analyzed: viśeṣa smṛtiḥ tu viśeṣa viṣaya tvāt tān eva ākṣipatu

original: śabdasya kiṃ vartate vācakaśabdasmṛtis tu śabdam upasthāpayati /
analyzed: śabdasya kim vartate vācaka śabda smṛtiḥ tu śabdam upasthāpayati

original: sā ca na tāvad utpanneti //
analyzed: sā ca na tāvat utpannā iti

original: samyakpratyayavat tasmāt vācakollekhavarjitau /
analyzed: samyak pratyaya vat tasmāt vācaka ullekha varjitau

original: akṣavyāpārajau na staḥ na saṃśayaviparyayau //
analyzed: akṣa vyāpāra jau na staḥ na saṃśaya viparyayau

original: īdṛśayoḥ katham anayor ādyapadavyudasanīyatā tasmāt /
analyzed: īdṛśayoḥ katham anayoḥ ādya pada vyudasanīya tā tasmāt

original: tad apākṛtaye yuktaṃ padadvayasyāpy upādānam //
analyzed: tat apākṛtaye yuktam pada dvayasya api upādānam

original: evaṃ lakṣaṇapadāni /
analyzed: evam lakṣaṇa padāni

original: lakṣyapadaṃ tu [pratyakṣam] iti jñānaviśeṣe rūḍhyaiva pravartate yogasya vyabhicārāt /
analyzed: lakṣya padam tu pratyakṣam iti jñāna viśeṣe rūḍhyā eva pravartate yogasya vyabhicārāt

original: pratigatam akṣaṃ pratyakṣam ity akṣarārthaḥ /
analyzed: pratigatam akṣam pratyakṣam iti akṣara arthaḥ

original: sa cāyaṃ sukhādāv api saṃbhavatīti rūḍhir eva sādhīyasī //
analyzed: sa ca ayam sukha ādau api saṃbhavati iti rūḍhiḥ eva sādhīyasī

original: atha vā jñānapadasya sūtre nirdeśāt yogapakṣo 'py astu /
analyzed: atha vā jñāna padasya sūtre nirdeśāt astu

original: na cāsau dṛśyamāno nihnotuṃ yuktaḥ /
analyzed: na ca asau dṛśyamānaḥ nihnotum yuktaḥ

original: yogarūḍhis tu nāma na sammataiva viduṣām /
analyzed: yoga rūḍhiḥ tu nāma na sammatā eva viduṣām

original: yatrāpi hi dvayaṃ dṛśyate tatrāpi śabdapravṛttau prayojakam eva bhavati //
analyzed: yatra api hi dvayam dṛśyate tatra api śabda pravṛttau prayojakam eva bhavati

original: kathaṃ punaḥ akṣaṃ pratigataṃ jñānam iṣyate na saṃyogitvena añjanādeḥ pratyakṣaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: katham punar akṣam pratigatam jñānam iṣyate na saṃyogi tvena añjana ādeḥ pratyakṣa prasaṅgāt

original: na samavāyitvena akṣavartināṃ rūpādīnāṃ tathātvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na samavāyi tvena akṣa vartinām rūpa ādīnām tathātva prasaṅgāt

original: na janakatvena akṣāraṃbhakāṇāṃ paramāṇūnām api tathābhāvaprasakteḥ /
analyzed: na janaka tvena akṣa āraṃbhakāṇām paramāṇūnām api tathā bhāva prasakteḥ

original: tasmāt janyatvenaiva jñānam akṣaṃ pratigatam iti vyākhyeyam //
analyzed: tasmāt janya tvena eva jñānam akṣam pratigatam iti vyākhyeyam

original: avyayībhāvavyākhyānaṃ tu na yuktam pratyakṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pratyakṣā strī ityādivyavahāradarśanāt ity alam atiprasaṅgena //
analyzed: avyayībhāva vyākhyānam tu na yuktam pratyakṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pratyakṣā strī ityādi vyavahāra darśanāt iti alam atiprasaṅgena

original: tenendriyārthajatvādiviśeṣaṇagaṇānvitam /
analyzed: tena indriya artha ja tva ādi viśeṣaṇa gaṇa anvitam

original: yato bhavati vijñānaṃ tat pratyakṣam iti sthitam //
analyzed: yatas bhavati vijñānam tat pratyakṣam iti sthitam

original: iti vigatakalaṅkam asya dhīmān akuruta lakṣaṇam etad akṣapādaḥ /
analyzed: iti vigata kalaṅkam asya dhīmān akuruta lakṣaṇam etat akṣapādaḥ

original: na tu pararacitāni lakṣaṇāni kṣaṇam api sūkṣmadṛśāṃ viśānti cetaḥ //
analyzed: na tu para racitāni lakṣaṇāni kṣaṇam api sūkṣma dṛśām viśānti cetaḥ

original: iti pratyakṣasūtravyākhyānaprakaraṇam yat tāvat kalpanā 'poḍham abhrāntam iti lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: iti pratyakṣa sūtra vyākhyāna prakaraṇam yat tāvat kalpanā poḍham abhra antam iti lakṣaṇam

original: pratyakṣasya jagau bhikṣuḥ tad atyantam asāṃpratam //
analyzed: pratyakṣasya jagau bhikṣuḥ tat atyantam asāṃpratam

original: śabdasaṃsargayogyārthapratītiḥ kila kalpanā /
analyzed: śabda saṃsarga yogya artha pratītiḥ kila kalpanā

original: asyāś ca kena doṣeṇa prāmāṇyaṃ na viṣahyate //
analyzed: asyāḥ ca kena doṣeṇa prāmāṇyam na viṣahyate

original: nanu abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsatvād api kam anyaṃ doṣaṃ mṛgayate bhavān asadarthaviṣayatvam evedam uktaṃ bhavati śabdārthasya vāstavasyābhāvāt /
analyzed: nanu abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsa tvāt api kam anyam doṣam mṛgayate bhavān asat artha viṣaya tvam evā idam uktam bhavati śabda arthasya vāstavasya abhāvāt

original: svalakṣaṇasya sajātīyetaravyāvṛttātmanaḥ sambandhādhigamasavyapekṣapravṛttinā śabdena viṣayīkartum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇasya sajātīya itara vyāvṛtta ātmanaḥ sambandha adhigama savyapekṣa pravṛttinā śabdena viṣayīkartum aśakya tvāt

original: tadvyatiriktasya vastuno 'nupalambhāt //
analyzed: tad vyatiriktasya vastunaḥ na upalambhāt

original: na cendriyārthasannikarṣānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyinī kalpanā buddhiḥ tam antareṇāpi bhāvāt tasmin saty api ca pūrvānubhūtavācakaśabdayojanaṃ vinā 'nutpādāt /
analyzed: na ca indriya artha sannikarṣa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinī kalpanā buddhiḥ tam antareṇa api bhāvāt tasmin sati api ca pūrva anubhūta vācaka śabda yojanam vinā n utpādāt

original: yadi ca indriyārthasannikarṣaḥ tajjanako bhavet prathamam eva tathāvidhāṃ dhiyaṃ janayet na ca janayati /
analyzed: yadi ca indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ tad janakaḥ bhavet prathamam eva tathāvidhām dhiyam janayet na ca janayati

original: tad ayaṃ śabdasmṛter ūrdhvam api na janaka iti manyāmahe //
analyzed: tat ayam śabda smṛteḥ ūrdhvam api na janakaḥ iti manyāmahe

original: tad uktam [yaḥ prāg ajanako buddheḥ upayogāviśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam yaḥ prāk ajanakaḥ buddheḥ upayoga aviśeṣataḥ

original: sa paścād api tena syād arthāpāye 'pi netradhīḥ //] iti //
analyzed: sa paścāt api tena syāt artha apāye pi netra dhīḥ iti

original: api ca saty apīndriyārthasaṃsarge smṛtyapekṣāyāṃ so 'rthas tayaiva vyavahitaḥ syāt /
analyzed: api ca sati api indriya artha saṃsarge smṛti apekṣāyām saḥ rthaḥ tayā eva vyavahitaḥ syāt

original: āha ca [arthopayoge 'pi punaḥ smārtaṃ śabdānuyojanam /
analyzed: āha ca artha upayoge pi punar smārtam śabda anuyojanam

original: akṣadhīr yady apekṣeta so 'rtho vyavahito bhavet //] iti //
analyzed: akṣa dhīḥ yadi apekṣeta saḥ rthaḥ vyavahitaḥ bhavet iti

original: saṅketasmaraṇasahakārisavyapekṣam akṣam īdṛśīṃ buddhiṃ janayatīti cet na vyatiriktāvyatiriktopakārādivikalpaiḥ sahakāriṇo nirastatvāt /
analyzed: saṅketa smaraṇa sahakāri sa vyapekṣam akṣam īdṛśīm buddhim janayati iti ced na vyatirikta avyatirikta upakāra ādi vikalpaiḥ sahakāriṇaḥ nirasta tvāt

original: kiñca daṇḍītyādivikalpavijñānaṃ nendriyāpātavelāyām eva jāyate kintu bahuprakriyāpekṣam /
analyzed: kiñca daṇḍī ityādi vikalpa vijñānam na indriya āpāta velāyām eva jāyate kintu bahu prakriyā apekṣam

original: yad āha [viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca saṃbandhaṃ laukikīṃ sthitim /
analyzed: yat āha viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyam ca saṃbandham laukikīm sthitim

original: gṛhītvā sakalaṃ caitat tathā pratyeti nānyathā //] iti //
analyzed: gṛhītvā sakalam ca etat tathā pratyeti na anyathā iti

original: na ceyatīṃ prakriyāṃ prathamanayanopanipātajātam avikalpakaṃ jñānam udvoḍhuṃ kṣamam ity āha [saṅketasmaraṇopāyaṃ dṛṣṭasaṅkalanātmakam /
analyzed: na ca iyatīm prakriyām prathama nayana upanipāta jātam avikalpakam jñānam udvoḍhum kṣamam iti āha saṅketa smaraṇa upāyam dṛṣṭa saṅkalana ātmakam

original: pūrvāparaparāmarśaśūnye tac cākṣuṣe katham] iti //
analyzed: pūrva apara parāmarśa śūnye tat cākṣuṣe katham iti

original: tatraitat syāt dvividhā vikalpāḥ chātramanorathaviracitāḥ idantāgrāhiṇaś ca nīlam ityādayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra etat syāt dvividhāḥ vikalpāḥ chātra manoratha viracitāḥ idanta a grāhiṇaḥ ca nīlam ityādayaḥ

original: tatra pūrve mā bhūvan pramāṇam /
analyzed: tatra pūrve mā bhūvan pramāṇam

original: kas teṣv arthanirapekṣajanmasu prāmāṇye 'bhiniviśeta idantāgrāhiṇāṃ tv arthāvinābhūtatvāt kathaṃ na prāmāṇyam iti ucyate sarva evāmī vikalpāḥ paramārthato 'rthaṃ na spṛśanty eva /
analyzed: kaḥ teṣu artha nirapekṣa janmasu prāmāṇye bhiniviśeta idantā grāhiṇām tu artha avinābhūta tvāt katham na prāmāṇyam iti ucyate sarve eva amī vikalpāḥ paramārthataḥ rtham na spṛśanti eva

original: sa hi nirvikalpakenaiva sarvātmanā paricchinnaḥ /
analyzed: sa hi nirvikalpakena eva sarva ātmanā paricchinnaḥ

original: tad uktam [ekasyārthasvabhāvasya pratyakṣasya sataḥ svayam /
analyzed: tat uktam ekasya artha svabhāvasya pratyakṣasya sataḥ svayam

original: ko 'nyo na dṛṣṭo bhāgaḥ syāt yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate] iti //
analyzed: kaḥ nyaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ bhāgaḥ syāt yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate iti

original: yat tu keṣāñcid vikalpānām idantāgrāhitvaspaṣṭatvādi rūpaṃ tat arthāvinābhāvinirvikalpakadarśanapṛṣṭhabhāvitvāvāptatacchāyāsaṃsargajanitaṃ na tu teṣām arthasparśaḥ kaścid asti /
analyzed: yat tu keṣāñcid vikalpānām idantā grāhi tva spaṣṭa tva ādi rūpam tat artha avinābhāvi nirvikalpaka darśana pṛṣṭha bhāvi tva avāpta tad chāyā saṃsarga janitam na tu teṣām artha sparśaḥ kaścid asti

original: arthātmano nirvikalpenaiva mudritatvāt //
analyzed: artha ātmanaḥ nirvikalpena eva mudrita tvāt

original: tasmād atāttvikākārasamullekhapuraśarāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt a tāttvika ākāra samullekha pura śarāḥ

original: na yathāvastu jāyante kadācid api kalpanāḥ //
analyzed: na yathāvastu jāyante kadācid api kalpanāḥ

original: pañca caite kalpanā bhavanti jātikalpanā guṇakalpanā kriyākalpanā nāmakalpanā dravyakalpanā ceti /
analyzed: pañca ca ete kalpanāḥ bhavanti jāti kalpanāḥ guṇa kalpanā kriyā kalpanāḥ nāma kalpanāḥ dravya kalpanā ca iti

original: tāś ca kvacid abhede 'pi bhedakalpanāt kvacic ca bhede 'py abhedakalpanāt kalpanā ucyante //
analyzed: tāḥ ca kvacid abhede pi bheda kalpanāt kvacid ca bhede pi abheda kalpanāt kalpanāḥ ucyante

original: jātijātimator bhedo na kaścit paramārthataḥ /
analyzed: jāti jātimatoḥ bhedaḥ na kaścid paramārthataḥ

original: bhedāropaṇarūpā ca jāyate jātikalpanā //
analyzed: bheda āropaṇa rūpā ca jāyate jāti kalpanā

original: idam asya gor gotvam iti na hi kaścid bhedaṃ paśyati /
analyzed: idam asya goḥ go tvam iti na hi kaścid bhedam paśyati

original: tenābhede bhedakalpanaiva //
analyzed: tena abhede bheda kalpanā eva

original: etayā sadṛśanyāyān mantavyā guṇakalpanā /
analyzed: etayā sadṛśa nyāyāt mantavyā guṇa kalpanā

original: tatrāpy abhinnayor bhedaḥ kalpyate guṇatadvatoḥ //
analyzed: tatra api abhinnayoḥ bhedaḥ kalpyate guṇa tadvatoḥ

original: tathā cāhuḥ eṣa guṇī rūpādibhyo 'rthāntaratvena nātmānaṃ no darśayati tebhyaś ca vyatirekaṃ vāñchasīti citram //
analyzed: tathā ca āhuḥ eṣa guṇī rūpa ādibhyaḥ rtha antara tvena na ātmānam no darśayati tebhyaḥ ca vyatirekam vāñchasi iti citram

original: bhedāropaṇarūpaiva guṇavat karmakalpanā /
analyzed: bheda āropaṇa rūpā eva guṇa vat karma kalpanā

original: tat svarūpātiriktā hi na kriyā nāma kācana //
analyzed: tat svarūpa atiriktā hi na kriyā nāma kācana

original: gacchati devadatta iti devadattasyaivānyūnānatiriktasya pratibhāsāt //
analyzed: gacchati devadattaḥ iti devadattasya eva anyūna anatiriktasya pratibhāsāt

original: vibhinnayos tv abhedena pravṛttā nāmakalpanā /
analyzed: vibhinnayoḥ tu abhedena pravṛttā nāma kalpanā

original: caitro 'yam ity abhedena niścayo nāmanāminoḥ //
analyzed: caitraḥ yam iti abhedena niścayaḥ nāma nāminoḥ

original: caitra ity ayaṃ śabdaḥ ayam ity arthaḥ kīdṛśam anayos sāmānādhikaraṇyam //
analyzed: caitraḥ iti ayam śabdaḥ ayam iti arthaḥ kīdṛśam anayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam

original: evaṃ daṇḍy ayam ityādir mantavyā dravyakalpanā /
analyzed: evam daṇḍī ayam ityādiḥ mantavyā dravya kalpanā

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhedinor grahaṇāt tayoḥ //
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhedinoḥ grahaṇāt tayoḥ

original: nanu yady abhede bhedaṃ bhede cābhedaṃ āropayantyaḥ kalpanāḥ pravartante tat katham āsu bhādakaḥ pratyayo na jāyate śuktikārajatabuddhivat ucyate yatra vastu vastvantarātmanā 'vabhāsate tatra bādhako bhavati marīciṣv iva jalabuddhau /
analyzed: nanu yadi abhede bhedam bhede ca abhedam āropayantyaḥ kalpanāḥ pravartante tat katham āsu bhādakaḥ pratyayaḥ na jāyate śuktikā rajata buddhi vat ucyate yatra vastu vastu antara ātmanā vabhāsate tatra bādhakaḥ bhavati marīciṣu iva jala buddhau

original: iha tu na jātyādivastvantaram asti yato vastvantarātmanā 'sya graho bhavet /
analyzed: iha tu na jāti ādi vastu antaram asti yatas vastu antara ātmanā sya grahaḥ bhavet

original: vyaktiviṣayā evaite sāmānyādivikalpāḥ /
analyzed: vyakti viṣayāḥ eva ete sāmānya ādi vikalpāḥ

original: tasmād vastvantarān avabhāsiṣv eṣu na bādhakaḥ pratyayo jāyate /
analyzed: tasmāt vastu antarān avabhāsiṣu eṣu na bādhakaḥ pratyayaḥ jāyate

original: tasmān na viparyayātmāno vikalpāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na viparyaya ātmānaḥ vikalpāḥ

original: na caite pramāṇam etad ullikhyamānasya jātyāder apāramārthikatvāt /
analyzed: na ca ete pramāṇam etat ullikhyamānasya jāti ādeḥ apāramārthika tvāt

original: ata eva pramāṇaviparyayābhyām ayam anya eva vikalpa ity ācakṣata ity alaṃ vistareṇa //
analyzed: atas eva pramāṇa viparyayābhyām ayam anyaḥ eva vikalpaḥ iti ācakṣate iti alam vistareṇa

original: evam etāḥ pravartante vāsanāmātranirmitāḥ /
analyzed: evam etāḥ pravartante vāsanā mātra nirmitāḥ

original: kalpitālīkabhedādiprapañcāḥ pañcakalpanāḥ //
analyzed: kalpita alīka bheda ādi prapañcāḥ pañca kalpanāḥ

original: evaṃ ca paśyatā tāsāṃ prāmāṇyāmodamandatām /
analyzed: evam ca paśyatā tāsām prāmāṇya āmoda manda tām

original: bhikṣuṇā lakṣaṇagranthe tadapoḍhapadaṃ kṛtam //
analyzed: bhikṣuṇā lakṣaṇa granthe tat apoḍha padam kṛtam

original: atra pratividhīyate tad idaṃ saṃkīrṇaprāyam atibahu vilapatā bhavatā na niyataṃ kim api vikalpānām aprāmāṇyakāraṇam iti spaṣṭam āveditam /
analyzed: atra pratividhīyate tat idam saṃkīrṇa prāyam ati bahu vilapatā bhavatā na niyatam kim api vikalpānām aprāmāṇya kāraṇam iti spaṣṭam āveditam
