original: tad ucyatām kiṃ śabdārthāvabhāsitvagarbhīkṛtam asadarthavācitvaṃ tad aprāmāṇyakāraṇam abhimatam uta saṅketasmṛtyapekṣopanatam anindriyārthasannikarṣajatvam uta viśeṣagrahaṇādyapekṣāvāptaṃ bahuprayāsasādhyatvam uta pūrvāparaparāmarśaśūnyacākṣuṣavailakṣaṇyavācoyuktisamarpitaṃ vicārakatvam uta nirvikalpakaparicchinnavastugrāhitānibandhanam adhigatādhigantṛtvam uta bhedābhedasamāropabhaṇitam atasmiṃs taditigrāhitvam uta vṛttivikalpādibādhitasāmānyagrahaṇasūcitaṃ bādhyatvam eveti //
analyzed: tat ucyatām kim śabda artha avabhāsi tva garbhīkṛtam asat artha vāci tvam tat aprāmāṇya kāraṇam abhimatam uta saṅketa smṛti apekṣā upanatam anindriya artha sannikarṣa ja tvam uta viśeṣa grahaṇa ādi apekṣā avāptam bahu prayāsa sādhya tvam uta pūrva apara parāmarśa śūnya cākṣuṣa vailakṣaṇya vācoyukti samarpitam vicāraka tvam uta nirvikalpaka paricchinna vastu grāhi tā nibandhanam adhigata adhigantṛ tvam uta bheda abheda samāropa bhaṇitam a tasmin tad

original: tatra tāvan na śabdasaṃsargayogyārthagrahaṇadvārakam asadarthagrāhitvam eṣām aprāmāṇyakāraṇam abhidhātuṃ yuktam śabdārthasya vāstavasya samarthayiṣyamāṇatvāt //
analyzed: tatra tāvat na śabda saṃsarga yogya artha grahaṇa dvārakam asat artha grāhi tvam eṣām aprāmāṇya kāraṇam abhidhātum yuktam śabda arthasya vāstavasya samarthayiṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: kaḥ punar asāv iti cet ya eva nirvikalpake pratibhāsate //
analyzed: kaḥ punar asau iti ced yaḥ eva nirvikalpake pratibhāsate

original: kiṃ nirvikalpake sāmānyādikam avabhāsate bāḍham avabhāsata iti vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: kim nirvikalpake sāmānya ādikam avabhāsate bāḍham avabhāsate iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: ata eva bādhyatvam api na prāmāṇyāpahārakāraṇam eṣāṃ vaktavyam vṛttivikalpāder bādhakasya parihariṣyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: atas eva bādhya tvam api na prāmāṇya apahāra kāraṇam eṣām vaktavyam vṛtti vikalpa ādeḥ bādhakasya parihariṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: bādhakāntarasya ca nedam iti pratyayasya śuktikārajatajñānādivat bhavataivānabhyupagamāt //
analyzed: bādhaka antarasya ca na idam iti pratyayasya śuktikā rajata jñāna ādi vat bhavatā eva anabhyupagamāt

original: nāpy anindriyārthasannikarṣajanyatvaṃ saṅketagrahaṇakālānubhūtaśabdasmaraṇāpekṣaṇād asya vaktavyam sahakāryapekṣāyām api tadvyāpārāvirateḥ //
analyzed: nā api an indriya artha sannikarṣa janya tvam saṅketa grahaṇa kāla anubhūta śabda smaraṇa apekṣaṇāt asya vaktavyam sahakāri apekṣāyām api tad vyāpāra avirateḥ

original: yaḥ prāg ajanako buddheḥ sa labdhvā sahakāriṇam /
analyzed: yaḥ prāk ajanakaḥ buddheḥ sa labdhvā sahakāriṇam

original: kālāntareṇa tāṃ buddhiṃ vidadhat kena vāryate //
analyzed: kāla antareṇa tām buddhim vidadhat kena vāryate

original: vyatiriktāvyatiriktopakārakaraṇādivikalpās tu kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge nirākariṣyante //
analyzed: vyatirikta avyatirikta upakāra karaṇa ādi vikalpāḥ tu kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge nirākariṣyante

original: rūpagrahaṇe ca cakṣuṣaḥ pradīpādyapekṣāyāṃ duṣparihārās te vikalpāḥ /
analyzed: rūpa grahaṇe ca cakṣuṣaḥ pradīpa ādi apekṣāyām duṣparihārāḥ te vikalpāḥ

original: [na vai kiñcid ekaṃ janakam] iti bhavanto 'pi paṭhanti iti bhavatpakṣe 'pi tulyās te /
analyzed: na vai kiñcid ekam janakam iti bhavantaḥ pi paṭhanti iti bhavat pakṣe pi tulyāḥ te

original: yady ubhayor doṣaḥ na tenaikaś codyo bhavati /
analyzed: yadi ubhayoḥ doṣaḥ na tena ekaḥ codyaḥ bhavati

original: tasmāt [upayogāviśeṣataḥ] ity asiddho hetuḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt upayoga aviśeṣataḥ iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ

original: ayam evopayogaviśeṣaḥ yat indriyālokamanaskāraviṣayavadvācakasmaraṇam api sāmagryantaram etatpratyayajanmani vyāpriyata iti na vācakasmaraṇajanitatvena smārtatvād apramāṇaṃ vikalpaḥ /
analyzed: ayam eva upayoga viśeṣaḥ yat indriya āloka manaskāra viṣayavat vācaka smaraṇam api sāmagrī antaram etad pratyaya janmani vyāpriyate iti na vācaka smaraṇa janita tvena smārta tvāt apramāṇam vikalpaḥ

original: rūpasmṛtyākhyasamanantarapratyayanirmitasya nirvikalpasya rūpajñānasyāpi tathātvaprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: rūpa smṛti ākhya samanantara pratyaya nirmitasya nirvikalpasya rūpa jñānasya api tathātva prasaṅgāt

original: yac cedam ucyate [so 'rtho vyavahito bhavet] iti tan na vidmaḥ kīdṛśaṃ vyavadhānam arthasyeti /
analyzed: yat ca idam ucyate saḥ rthaḥ vyavahitaḥ bhavet iti tat na vidmaḥ kīdṛśam vyavadhānam arthasya iti

original: na hi dīpena vā manasā vā vijñānahetunā kadācid artho vyavadhīyate /
analyzed: na hi dīpena vā manasā vā vijñāna hetunā kadācid arthaḥ vyavadhīyate

original: manovac ca vācakasmṛtir api sāmagryantargatā satī tatpratītau vyāpriyata iti katham arthaṃ vyavadadhīta //
analyzed: manaḥ vat ca vācaka smṛtiḥ api sāmagrī antargatā satī tad pratītau vyāpriyate iti katham artham vyavadadhīta

original: smṛtiviṣayīkṛtaḥ śabdaḥ tam arthaṃ vyavadhatta iti cet na śabdasya tatprakāśakatvena jñānavat dīpavad vā vyavadhāyakatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: smṛti viṣayīkṛtaḥ śabdaḥ tam artham vyavadhatte iti ced na śabdasya tad prakāśaka tvena jñāna vat dīpa vat vā vyavadhāyaka tva abhāvāt

original: na cendriyavyāpāratirodhānaṃ vyavadhānam tasyādhunāpy anuvartamānatvāt //
analyzed: na ca indriya vyāpāra tirodhānam vyavadhānam tasya adhunā api anuvartamāna tvāt

original: yathā tadbhāvabhāvitvād ādyaṃ vijñānam akṣajam /
analyzed: yathā tad bhāva bhāvi tvāt ādyam vijñānam akṣa jam

original: tathā tadbhāvabhāvitvād uttaraṃ jñānam akṣajam //
analyzed: tathā tad bhāva bhāvi tvāt uttaram jñānam akṣa jam

original: na hi vācakasmaraṇāntaraṃ akṣiṇī nimīlya vikalpayati paṭo 'yam iti //
analyzed: na hi vācaka smaraṇa antaram akṣiṇī nimīlya vikalpayati paṭaḥ yam iti

original: atha yāvad vācakavijñānaṃ hṛdayapatham avatarati tāvat so 'rthaḥ kṣaṇikatvād atikrānta iti vyavahita ucyate tad api durāśāmātram /
analyzed: atha yāvat vācaka vijñānam hṛdaya patham avatarati tāvat saḥ rthaḥ kṣaṇika tvāt atikrāntaḥ iti vyavahitaḥ ucyate tat api durāśā mātram

original: kṣaṇabhaṅgasyopariṣṭān nirākariṣyamāṇatvāt //
analyzed: kṣaṇabhaṅgasya upariṣṭāt nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: api ca pradarśitaprāptyādivyavahāravatsantānadvārakam ihāpi tadgrahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti sarvathā na vyavadhānam /
analyzed: api ca pradarśita prāpti ādi vyavahāravat santāna dvārakam iha api tat grahaṇam bhaviṣyati iti sarvathā na vyavadhānam

original: tad evaṃ samayasmaraṇasāpekṣatve 'pi nedriyārthasannikarṣotpannatām ativartate savikalpakaṃ vijñānam iti katham apratyakṣam yat punaḥ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyagrahaṇādisāmagryapekṣatvena bahuprayāsasādhyatvam aprāmāṇyakāraṇam abhidhīyate tadatīva subhāṣitam na hi bahukleśasādhyatvaṃ nāma prāmāṇyam upahanti /
analyzed: tat evam samaya smaraṇa sāpekṣa tve pi na idriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tām ativartate sa vikalpakam vijñānam iti katham apratyakṣam yat punar viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya grahaṇa ādi sāmagrī apekṣa tvena bahu prayāsa sādhya tvam aprāmāṇya kāraṇam abhidhīyate tat atīva subhāṣitam na hi bahu kleśa sādhya tvam nāma prāmāṇyam upahanti

original: uktaṃ ca [na hi giriśṛṅgam āruhya yad gṛhyate tad apratyakṣam] iti /
analyzed: uktam ca na hi giri śṛṅgam āruhya yat gṛhyate tat apratyakṣam iti

original: rasādijñānāpekṣayā ca rūpādijñānasya dīpādyālokāharaṇaprayāsasādhyatvād aprāmāṇyaṃ syāt //
analyzed: rasa ādi jñāna apekṣayā ca rūpa ādi jñānasya dīpa ādi āloka āharaṇa prayāsa sādhya tvāt aprāmāṇyam syāt

original: yad api pūrvāparaparāmarśarahitacākṣuṣavijñānavaiparītyena vikalpajñānānāṃ vicārakatvād aprāmāṇyam ucyate tad api na samyak /
analyzed: yat api pūrva apara parāmarśa rahita cākṣuṣa vijñāna vaiparītyena vikalpa jñānānām vicāraka tvāt aprāmāṇyam ucyate tat api na samyak

original: sarvatra jñānasya vicārakatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: sarvatra jñānasya vicāraka tva anupapatteḥ

original: vicārako hi pramātā /
analyzed: vicārakaḥ hi pramātā

original: sa hi praśyati smarati anusandhatte vicārayati icchati dveṣṭi yatate gṛhṇāti jahāti sukham anubhavatīti vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: sa hi praśyati smarati anusandhatte vicārayati icchati dveṣṭi yatate gṛhṇāti jahāti sukham anubhavati iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: arthaṃ ca spṛśato vijñānasya vicārayato 'pi katham aprāmāṇyaṃ syāt //
analyzed: artham ca spṛśataḥ vijñānasya vicārayataḥ katham a prāmāṇyam syāt

original: athāsya nirvikalpenaiva sarvātmanā spṛṣṭatvāt piṣṭapeṣaṇam ayuktam iti savikalpam adhigatārthagrāhitvād apramāṇam iti manyase tad api na sādhu pūrvam eva parihṛtatvāt /
analyzed: atha asya nirvikalpena eva sarva ātmanā spṛṣṭa tvāt piṣṭa peṣaṇam ayuktam iti sa vikalpam adhigata artha grāhi tvāt apramāṇam iti manyase tat api na sādhu pūrvam eva parihṛta tvāt

original: na hy adhigatādhigantṛtvaṃ prāmāṇyam ity uktam /
analyzed: na hi adhigata adhigantṛ tvam prāmāṇyam iti uktam

original: gṛhītagrahaṇe 'pi pramāṇasya pramāṇatvānativṛtteḥ //
analyzed: gṛhīta grahaṇe pi pramāṇasya pramāṇa tva an ativṛtteḥ

original: yat tv abhyadhāyi bhinneṣv abhedaṃ abhinneṣu ca bhedaṃ kalpayantyaḥ kalpanāḥ atasmiṃs tadgrahaṇe prāmāṇyam avahajatīti tad yuktam atasmiṃs tadgraho bhavaty apramāṇatvakāraṇam tat tv iha nāsti /
analyzed: yat tu abhyadhāyi bhinneṣu abhedam abhinneṣu ca bhedam kalpayantyaḥ kalpanāḥ a tasmin tad grahaṇe prāmāṇyam avahajati iti tat yuktam a tasmin tad grahaḥ bhavati a pramāṇa tva kāraṇam tat tu iha na asti

original: tasya hi bādhakapratyayopasannipātān niścayaḥ /
analyzed: tasya hi bādhaka pratyaya upasannipātāt niścayaḥ

original: na ca bhavadupavarṇitāsu pañcasv api jātyādikalpanāsu bādhakaṃ kiñcid astīti nātasmiṃs tadgrāhiṇyaḥ kalpanā bhavanti //
analyzed: na ca bhavat upavarṇitāsu pañcasu api jāti ādi kalpanāsu bādhakam kiñcid asti iti na a tasmin tad grāhiṇyaḥ kalpanāḥ bhavanti

original: jātir jātimato bhinnā guṇī guṇagaṇāt pṛthak /
analyzed: jātiḥ jātimataḥ bhinnā guṇī guṇa gaṇāt pṛthak

original: tathaiva tat pratīteś ca kalpanoktir abādhikā //
analyzed: tathā eva tat pratīteḥ ca kalpanā uktiḥ abādhikā

original: etac copariṣṭān nirṇeṣyate //
analyzed: etat ca upariṣṭāt nirṇeṣyate

original: dravyanāmno 'stu bhinnayor bhedenaiva pratītiḥ nābhedakalpanā /
analyzed: dravya nāmnoḥ stu bhinnayoḥ bhedena eva pratītiḥ na abheda kalpanā

original: na hi [devadattaśabdo 'yam] ity evaṃ tadvācyaḥ pratīyate //
analyzed: na hi devadatta śabdaḥ yam iti evam tad vācyaḥ pratīyate

original: nanu [devadatto 'yaṃ] iti saṃjñāsaṃjñyabhedavyavahāro dṛśyata eveti cet na śabdaviśiṣṭatadvācyāvagatir eṣā na śabdo 'syām arthārūḍho 'vabhāsate /
analyzed: nanu devadattaḥ yaṃ iti saṃjñā saṃjñya bheda vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate eva iti ced na śabda viśiṣṭa tad vācya avagatiḥ eṣā na artha ārūḍhaḥ vabhāsate

original: na śabdavivartarūpeṇārthaḥ parisphurati /
analyzed: na śabda vivarta rūpeṇa arthaḥ parisphurati

original: kiṃ tarhi śabdasmṛtyākhyasāmagryasāmarthyātiśayodbhavaḥ /
analyzed: kim tarhi śabda smṛti ākhya sāmagrya sāmarthya atiśaya udbhavaḥ

original: pratyayātiśayaḥ so 'yaṃ ity evaṃ prāk prasādhitam //
analyzed: pratyaya atiśayaḥ saḥ yaṃ iti evam prāk prasādhitam

original: daṇḍy ayam iti dravyābhedakalpanā tu mandamatibhir evodāhṛtā /
analyzed: daṇḍī ayam iti dravya abheda kalpanā tu manda matibhiḥ evā udāhṛtā

original: na hi daṇḍo 'yam iti devadatte pratītiḥ api tu daṇḍīti /
analyzed: na hi daṇḍaḥ yam iti devadatte pratītiḥ api tu daṇḍī iti

original: tatra ca prakṛtipratyayau pṛthag evopalabhyete daṇḍo 'syāstīti daṇḍīti /
analyzed: tatra ca prakṛti pratyayau pṛthak eva upalabhyete daṇḍaḥ sya asti iti daṇḍī iti

original: tad iha yathaiva vastu tathaiva tadavasāya iti nābhedāropaḥ //
analyzed: tat iha yathā eva vastu tathā eva tad avasāyaḥ iti na abheda āropaḥ

original: karmaṇi tu dvayam api nāsti nābhinne bhedakalpanā na ca bhinne 'py abhedakalpanā //
analyzed: karmaṇi tu dvayam api nā asti nā abhinne bheda kalpanā na ca bhinne pi abheda kalpanā

original: kriyā hi tadvato bhinnā bhedenaiva ca gṛhyate /
analyzed: kriyā hi tadvataḥ bhinnā bhedena eva ca gṛhyate

original: calatītyādibodheṣu tatsvarūpāvabhāsanāt //
analyzed: calati ityādi bodheṣu tad svarūpa avabhāsanāt

original: tena kriyāguṇadravyanāmajātyuparañjitam /
analyzed: tena kriyā guṇa dravya nāma jāti uparañjitam

original: viṣayaṃ darśayan neti vikalpo nāpramāṇatām //
analyzed: viṣayam darśayan na iti vikalpaḥ na apramāṇatām

original: viparyayāt samuttīrṇa iti sādhu sahāmahe /
analyzed: viparyayāt samuttīrṇaḥ iti sādhu sahāmahe

original: pramāṇāt tu bahirbhūtaṃ vikalpaṃ na kṣamāmahe //
analyzed: pramāṇāt tu bahis bhūtam vikalpam na kṣamāmahe

original: kvacid bādhakayogena yadi tasyāpramāṇatā /
analyzed: kvacid bādhaka yogena yadi tasya apramāṇa tā

original: nirvikalpe 'pi tulyā 'sau dvicandrādyavabhāsini //
analyzed: nirvikalpe tulyā sau dvi candra ādi avabhāsini

original: manorājyavikalpānāṃ kāmam astv apramāṇatā /
analyzed: manaḥ rājya vikalpānām kāmam astu apramāṇa tā

original: yathāvastu pravṛttānāṃ na tv asāv akṣajanmanām //
analyzed: yathāvastu pravṛttānām na tu asau akṣa janmanām

original: na ca nirvikalpapṛṣṭhabhāvitvakṛtam eṣām etad rūpam viṣayasaṃsparśam antareṇa svatas svaccharūpāṇāṃ jñānānām evam ākāratvānupapatteḥ kiṃ nirvikalpapṛṣṭhabhāvitā kariṣyati tadanantarabhāvinī hi smṛtir api kvacid dṛśyata eva na ca sā tacchāyāvatī iti durāśāmātram etat //
analyzed: na ca nirvikalpa pṛṣṭhabhāvi tva kṛtam eṣām etat rūpam viṣaya saṃsparśam antareṇa svatas su accha rūpāṇām jñānānām evam ākāra tva anupapatteḥ kim nirvikalpa pṛṣṭhabhāvi tā kariṣyati tad anantara bhāvinī hi smṛtiḥ api kvacid dṛśyate eva na ca sā tad chāyāvatī iti durāśā mātram etat

original: nanu nirvikalpakenaiva vastusarvasvaṃ gṛhītaṃ ekasyārthasvabhāvasyeti varṇitam prativihitam etat gṛhītagrahaṇe 'pi prāmāṇyānapāyāt //
analyzed: nanu nirvikalpakena eva vastu sarva svam gṛhītam ekasya artha svabhāvasya iti varṇitam prativihitam etat gṛhīta grahaṇe pi prāmāṇya anapāyāt

original: kiñca kiṃ nirvikalpakena gṛhyata ity etad eva na jānīmaḥ //
analyzed: kiñca kim nirvikalpakena gṛhyate iti etat eva na jānīmaḥ

original: bhavanto nirvikalpasya viṣayaṃ saṃpracakṣate /
analyzed: bhavantaḥ nirvikalpasya viṣayam saṃpracakṣate

original: sajātīyavijātīyaparāvṛttaṃ svalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: sajātīya vijātīya parāvṛttam sva lakṣaṇam

original: mahāsāmānyam anye tu sattāṃ tad viṣayaṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: mahāsāmānyam anye tu sattām tat viṣayam viduḥ

original: vāgrūpam apare tattvaṃ prameyaṃ tasya manvate //
analyzed: vāc rūpam apare tattvam prameyam tasya manvate

original: kecid guṇakriyādravyajātibhedādirūṣitam /
analyzed: kecid guṇa kriyā dravya jāti bheda ādi rūṣitam

original: śabalaṃ vastu manyante nirvikalpakagocaram //
analyzed: śabalam vastu manyante nirvikalpaka gocaram

original: pratyakṣaviṣaye 'py etāḥ citraṃ vipratipattayaḥ /
analyzed: pratyakṣa viṣaye pi etāḥ citram vipratipattayaḥ

original: parokṣārthe hi vimatiḥ pratyakṣeṇopaśāmyati /
analyzed: parokṣa arthe hi vimatiḥ pratyakṣeṇa upaśāmyati

original: pratyakṣe hi samutpannā vimatiḥ kena śāmyati idaṃ bhāti na bhātīti saṃvidvipratipattiṣu /
analyzed: pratyakṣe hi samutpannā vimatiḥ kena śāmyati idam bhāti na bhāti iti saṃvid vipratipattiṣu

original: parapratyāyane puṃsāṃ śaraṇaṃ śapathoktayaḥ //
analyzed: para pratyāyane puṃsām śaraṇam śapatha uktayaḥ

original: na tu śapathaśaraṇā eva nirudyamamāsmahe /
analyzed: na tu śapatha śaraṇāḥ eva nirudyamam āsmahe

original: mārgāntareṇāpi tat prameyaṃ niścinumaḥ //
analyzed: mārga antareṇa api tat prameyam niścinumaḥ

original: nirvikalpānusāreṇa savikalpakasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: nirvikalpa anusāreṇa savikalpaka saṃbhavāt

original: grāhyaṃ tadānuguṇyena nirvikalpasya manmahe //
analyzed: grāhyam tad ānuguṇyena nirvikalpasya manmahe

original: tatra na tāvat sakalasajātīyavyāvṛttaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ //
analyzed: tatra na tāvat sakala sajātīya vyāvṛttam sva lakṣaṇam pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ

original: gṛhīte nirvikalpena vyāvṛtte hi svalakṣaṇe /
analyzed: gṛhīte nirvikalpena vyāvṛtte hi sva lakṣaṇe

original: akasmād eva sāmānyavikalpollasanaṃ katham //
analyzed: akasmāt eva sāmānya vikalpa ullasanam katham

original: nirvikalpānusāreṇa hi vikalpāḥ prādurbhavitum arhanti /
analyzed: nirvikalpa anusāreṇa hi vikalpāḥ prādurbhavitum arhanti

original: api ca vijātīyaparāvṛttaviṣayā yadi kalpanā /
analyzed: api ca vijātīya parāvṛtta viṣayā yadi kalpanā

original: vyāvṛttirūpaṃ sāmānyaṃ gṛhītaṃ hanta darśanaiḥ //
analyzed: vyāvṛtti rūpam sāmānyam gṛhītam hanta darśanaiḥ

original: vyāvṛttān nanu naivānyā vyāvṛttiḥ paramārthataḥ /
analyzed: vyāvṛttāt nanu nā eva anyā vyāvṛttiḥ paramārthataḥ

original: vyāvṛttagrahaṇenaiva sutarāṃ tadgraho bhavet //
analyzed: vyāvṛtta grahaṇena eva sutarām tad grahaḥ bhavet

original: sāmānyagrahaṇe 'py evaṃ tadvyāpārāv akalpanāt /
analyzed: sāmānya grahaṇe pi evam tad vyāpārau akalpanāt

original: svalakṣaṇaparicchedaniṣṭhaṃ tan nāvatiṣṭhate //
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇa pariccheda niṣṭham tat na avatiṣṭhate

original: nāpi sattādvaitavādisammatasattākhyo nirvikalpasya viṣayo yuktaḥ //
analyzed: nā api sattā advaita vādi sammata sattā ākhyaḥ nirvikalpasya viṣayaḥ yuktaḥ

original: sattāgrahaṇapakṣe 'pi viśeṣāvagatiḥ kutaḥ /
analyzed: sattā grahaṇa pakṣe viśeṣa avagatiḥ kutas

original: sā bhāti bhedaspṛṣṭā cet siddham advaitadarśanam //
analyzed: sā bhāti bheda spṛṣṭā ced siddham advaita darśanam

original: na ca bhedaṃ vinā sattā gṛhītum api śakyate /
analyzed: na ca bhedam vinā sattā gṛhītum api śakyate

original: nāvidyāmātram evedam iti ca sthāpayiṣyate //
analyzed: na avidyā mātram eva idam iti ca sthāpayiṣyate

original: vāktattvapratibhāso 'pi pratikṣipto 'nayā diśā /
analyzed: vāc tattva pratibhāsaḥ pi pratikṣiptaḥ nayā diśā

original: kathaṃ ca cākṣuśe jñāne vāktattvam avabhāsate //
analyzed: katham ca cākṣuśe jñāne vāc tattvam avabhāsate

original: agṛhīte tu sambandhe gṛhīte vā 'pi vismṛte /
analyzed: agṛhīte tu sambandhe gṛhīte vā vismṛte

original: aprabuddhe 'pi saṃskāre vācakāvagatiḥ kutaḥ //
analyzed: aprabuddhe saṃskāre vācaka avagatiḥ kutas

original: citratā 'pi pṛthagbhūtair dharmais tatsamavāyibhiḥ /
analyzed: citra tā pi pṛthak bhūtaiḥ dharmaiḥ tad samavāyibhiḥ

original: jātyādibhir yadīṣyeta dharmiṇaḥ kāmam astu sā //
analyzed: jāti ādibhiḥ yadi iṣyeta dharmiṇaḥ kāmam astu sā

original: tadātmatā tu naikasya nityaṃ tattvānupragrahāt /
analyzed: tad ātma tā tu na ekasya nityam tattva anupragrahāt

original: aṃśaniṣkarṣapakṣe tu dharmabhedo balād bhavet //
analyzed: aṃśa niṣkarṣa pakṣe tu dharma bhedaḥ balāt bhavet

original: yatra yatra yadodbhūtiḥ jighṛkṣā ceti kathyate /
analyzed: yatra yatra yadā udbhūtiḥ jighṛkṣā ca iti kathyate

original: tadātmakatvaṃ dharmāṇām ucyate cety asaṅgatam //
analyzed: tad ātmaka tvam dharmāṇām ucyate ca iti asaṅgatam

original: deśabhedas tu dharmāṇāṃ asmābhir api neṣyate /
analyzed: deśa bhedaḥ tu dharmāṇām asmābhiḥ api na iṣyate

original: dharmī hi teṣām ādhāro na punas sa tadātmakaḥ //
analyzed: dharmī hi teṣām ādhāraḥ na punar sa tad ātmakaḥ

original: tasmād ya eva vastvātmā savikalpasya gocaraḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yaḥ eva vastu ātmā sa vikalpasya gocaraḥ

original: sa eva nirvikalpasya śabdollekhavivarjitaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ eva nirvikalpasya śabda ullekha vivarjitaḥ

original: kim ātmako 'sāv iti ced yad yadā pratibhāsate /
analyzed: sau iti ced yat yadā pratibhāsate

original: vastupramitayaś caiva praṣṭavyā na tu vādinaḥ //
analyzed: vastu pramitayaḥ ca eva praṣṭavyāḥ na tu vādinaḥ

original: kvacij jātiḥ kvacid dravyaṃ kvacit karma kvacid guṇaḥ /
analyzed: kvacid jātiḥ kvacid dravyam kvacid karma kvacid guṇaḥ

original: yad eva savikalpena tad evānena gṛhyate //
analyzed: yat eva sa vikalpena tat eva anena gṛhyate

original: iha śabdānusandhānavandhyaṃ tadanubandhi vā /
analyzed: iha śabda anusandhāna vandhyam tad anubandhi vā

original: jātyādiviṣayagrāhi sarvaṃ pratyakṣam iṣyate //
analyzed: jāti ādi viṣaya grāhi sarvam pratyakṣam iṣyate

original: tasmād yat kalpanāpoḍhapadaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇe /
analyzed: tasmāt yat kalpanā apoḍha padam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe

original: bhikṣuṇā paṭhitaṃ tasya vyavacchedyaṃ na vidyate //
analyzed: bhikṣuṇā paṭhitam tasya vyavacchedyam na vidyate

original: abhrāntapadasyāpi vyāvartyaṃ na kiñcana tanmate paśyāmaḥ //
analyzed: abhrānta padasya api vyāvartyam na kiñcana tad mate paśyāmaḥ

original: nanu timira-āśubhramaṇa-nauyāna-saṃkṣobhādyāhitavibhramaṃ dvicandraalātacakracalatpādapādidarśanam apohyam asya parair uktam satyam uktam ayuktaṃ tu kalpanā 'poḍhapadenaiva tadvyudāsasiddheḥ /
analyzed: nanu timira āśu bhramaṇa nau yāna saṃkṣobha ādi āhita vibhramam dvi candra alāta cakra calat pādapa ādi darśanam apohyam asya paraiḥ uktam satyam uktam ayuktam tu kalpanā poḍha padena eva tad vyudāsa siddheḥ

original: tatrāpi nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ ekacandrādiviṣayam eva vikalpās tu viparītākāragrāhiṇo bhavanti yathā marīcigrāhiṇi nirvikalpake salilāvasāyī vikalpa iti //
analyzed: tatra api nirvikalpakam jñānam eka candra ādi viṣayam eva vikalpāḥ tu viparīta ākāra grāhiṇaḥ bhavanti yathā marīci grāhiṇi nirvikalpake salila avasāyī vikalpaḥ iti

original: nanu timireṇa dvidhākṛtaṃ cakṣur ekatayā na śaknoti śaśinaṃ grahītuṃ iti nirvikalpakam api dvicandrādijñānam yady evaṃ taralataraṅgādisādṛśyarūṣitaṃ ūṣāre marīcicakraṃ cakṣuṣā paricchettum aśakyam iti tatrāpi nirvikalpakam udakagrāhi vijñānaṃ kimiti neṣyate abhyupagame vā sadasatkalpanotpātādikṛtaḥ pramāṇetaravyavahāro na syāt //
analyzed: nanu timireṇa dvidhākṛtam cakṣuḥ eka tayā na śaknoti śaśinam grahītum iti nirvikalpakam api dvi candra ādi jñānam yadi evam tarala taraṅga ādi sādṛśya rūṣitam ūṣāre marīci cakram cakṣuṣā paricchettum aśakyam iti tatra api nirvikalpakam udaka grāhi vijñānam kim iti nā iṣyate abhyupagame vā sat asat kalpanā utpāta ādi kṛtaḥ pramāṇa itara vyavahāraḥ na syāt

original: api ca na bādhakopanipātam antareṇa bhrāntatā 'vakalpate jñānānām /
analyzed: api ca na bādhaka upanipātam antareṇa bhrānta tā jñānānām

original: na ca kṣaṇikavādimate bādhyabādhakabhāvo buddhīnām upapadyata ity alaṃ vimardena //
analyzed: na ca kṣaṇika vādi mate bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ buddhīnām upapadyate iti alam vimardena

original: iti sunipuṇabuddhir lakṣaṇaṃ vaktukāmaḥ padayugalam apīdaṃ nirmame nānavadyam /
analyzed: iti su nipuṇa buddhiḥ lakṣaṇam vaktu kāmaḥ pada yugalam api idam nirmame na anavadyam

original: bhavatu matimahim naś ceṣṭitam etat jagadabhibhavadhīraṃ dhīmato dharmakīrteḥ //
analyzed: bhavatu mati mahim naḥ ceṣṭitam etat jagat abhibhava dhīram dhīmataḥ dharma kīrteḥ

original: śrotrādivṛttir aparair avikalpaketi pratyakṣalakṣaṇam avarṇi tad apy apāstam /
analyzed: śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ aparaiḥ avikalpakā iti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam avarṇi tat api apāstam

original: sāmyān nayasya na ca siddhyati buddhivṛttyā draṣṭṛtvam ātmana iti pratipāditaṃ prāk //
analyzed: sāmyāt nayasya na ca siddhi ati buddhi vṛttyā draṣṭṛ tvam ātmanaḥ iti pratipāditam prāk

original: [satsaṃpratyoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tatpratyakṣam animittaṃ vidyamānopalaṃbhanatvāt] ity etatsūtraṃ jaiminīyaiḥ sākṣātpratyakṣalakṣaṇaparatvena na vyākhyātam [codanālakṣaṇo 'rtho dharmaḥ] iti prakṛtapratijñāsaṅgatyabhāvāt /
analyzed: sat saṃpratyoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma tat pratyakṣam animittam vidyamāna upalaṃbhana tvāt iti etat sūtram jaiminīyaiḥ sākṣāt pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa paratvena na vyākhyātam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ rthaḥ dharmaḥ iti prakṛta pratijñā saṅgati abhāvāt

original: api tu dharmaṃ prati pratyakṣam animittaṃ evaṃ lakṣaṇakatvād iti anuvādabhaṅgyā lakṣaṇe yojitam /
analyzed: api tu dharmam prati pratyakṣam animittam evam lakṣaṇaka tvāt iti anuvāda bhaṅgyā lakṣaṇe yojitam

original: yathoktam[evaṃ saty anuvādatvaṃ lakṣaṇasyāpi saṃbhavet] iti /
analyzed: yathā uktam evam sati anuvāda tvam lakṣaṇasya api saṃbhavet iti

original: tad etallakṣaṇavarṇane sūtrayojanam asamīcīnam ativyāptidoṣānativṛtteḥ /
analyzed: tat etat lakṣaṇa varṇane sūtra yojanam asamīcīnam ativyāpti doṣa anativṛtteḥ

original: tathā hi indriyāṇāṃ sati saṃprayoge puruṣasya jāhamānā buddhiḥ pratyakṣam iti sūtrārthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi indriyāṇām sati saṃprayoge puruṣasya buddhiḥ pratyakṣam iti sūtra arthaḥ

original: tathā cātivyāptiḥ saṃśayaviparyayabuddhyor api indriyasaṃyogajarvena pratyakṣatvaprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: tathā ca ativyāptiḥ saṃśaya viparyaya buddhyoḥ api indriya saṃyoga jarvena pratyakṣa tva prasaṅgāt

original: atha satsaṃprayoga iti satāṃ saṃprayoga iti vyākhyāsyate tathā 'pi nirālambanavibhramā evārthanirapekṣajanmāno nirastā bhaveyuḥ na sālambanau saṃśayaviparyayau //
analyzed: atha sat saṃprayogaḥ iti satām saṃprayogaḥ iti vyākhyāsyate tathā nirālambana vibhramāḥ eva artha nirapekṣa janmānaḥ nirastāḥ bhaveyuḥ na sa ālambanau saṃśaya viparyayau

original: atha sati saṃprayoga iti saptamīpakṣa eva na tyajyate saṃśayaviparyayacchedī casaṃprayoga ity upasargo varṇyate /
analyzed: atha sati saṃprayoge iti saptamī pakṣaḥ eva na tyajyate saṃśaya viparyaya chedī ca saṃprayoge iti upasargaḥ varṇyate

original: yathāktam [samyagarthe ca saṃśabdo duṣprayoganivāraṇaḥ /
analyzed: yathā aktam samyak arthe ca saṃśabdaḥ duṣprayoga nivāraṇaḥ

original: duṣṭatvāc chuktikāyogo vāryatām akṣajekṣaṇāt //] iti /
analyzed: duṣṭa tvāt śuktikā yogaḥ vāryatām akṣaja īkṣaṇāt iti

original: tathā 'pi prayogasamyaktvasyātīndriyatvena pratyakṣānavagamyatvāt kāryato 'vagatir vaktavyā /
analyzed: tathā pi prayoga samyaktvasya atīndriya tvena pratyakṣa anavagamya tvāt kāryataḥ vagatiḥ vaktavyā

original: kāryaṃ ca jñānam /
analyzed: kāryam ca jñānam

original: na ca tad aviśeṣitam eva prayogasya samyaktām avagamayati /
analyzed: na ca tat aviśeṣitam eva prayogasya samyaktām avagamayati

original: na ca tadviśeṣaṇaparam iha padam api akṣaram api mātrām api vā sūtre paśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: na ca tad viśeṣaṇa param iha padam api akṣaram api mātrām api vā sūtre paśyāmaḥ

original: saṭāṃ samprayoga iti ca padaṃ nirālambanajñānanivṛttaye varṇitam /
analyzed: saṭām samprayogaḥ iti ca padam nirālambana jñāna nivṛttaye varṇitam

original: [sati] iti tu satisaptamyaiva gatārthatvād anarthakam //
analyzed: sati iti tu sati saptamyā eva gatārtha tvāt anarthakam

original: lokata eva kāryaviśeṣāvagamāt prayogasamyaktvam avagamiṣyāmaḥ iti cet lokata eva prtyakṣasya siddhatvāt kiṃ tallakṣaṇe sūtrasāmarthyayojnākleśena //
analyzed: lokataḥ eva kārya viśeṣa avagamāt prayoga samyaktvam avagamiṣyāmaḥ iti ced lokataḥ eva prtyakṣasya siddha tvāt kim tad lakṣaṇe sūtra sāmarthya yojnā kleśena

original: yad apy atra bhagavān vṛttikāraḥ prāha yat pratyakṣaṃ ma tad vyabhicarati [yat vyabhicāri na tat pratyakṣam /
analyzed: yat api atra bhagavān vṛtti kāraḥ prāha yat pratyakṣam mā tat vyabhicarati yat vyabhicāri na tat pratyakṣam

original: kiṃ tarhi pratyakṣam tat saṃprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma sat pratyakṣam /
analyzed: kim tarhi pratyakṣam tat saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma sat pratyakṣam

original: yadviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ tenaiva saṃprayoge indriyāṇāṃ puruṣasya buddhijanma sat pratyakṣam /
analyzed: yad viṣayam jñānam tena eva saṃprayoge indriyāṇām puruṣasya buddhi janma sat pratyakṣam

original: yat anyaviṣayakaṃ jñānam anyasaṃprayoge bhavati na tat pratyakṣam iti] tad api vṛthā 'ṭāṭyāmātran saṃśayajñānena vyabhicārānativṛtteḥ /
analyzed: yat anya viṣayakam jñānam anya saṃprayoge bhavati na tat pratyakṣam iti tat api vṛthā saṃśaya jñānena vyabhicāra anativṛtteḥ

original: tatra hi yadviṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ tena saṃprayoga indriyāṇām asty eva //
analyzed: tatra hi yad viṣayakam jñānam tena saṃprayogaḥ indriyāṇām asti eva

original: nanu ubhayaviṣayakaṃ jñānam na cobhābhyāṃ saṃprayuktam indriyam maivam na hi dhavakhadiravat dvāv api saṃśayasaṃvidi pratibhāsete /
analyzed: nanu ubhaya viṣayakam jñānam na ca ubhābhyām saṃprayuktam indriyam mā evam na hi dhava khadira vat dvau api saṃśaya saṃvidi pratibhāsete

original: kiṃ tu sthāṇur vā puruṣo veti anirdhāritaikatarapadārthatattvāvamarśī saṃśayo jāyate /
analyzed: kim tu sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti anirdhārita ekatara padārtha tattva avamarśī saṃśayaḥ jāyate

original: nūnaṃ ca tayor anyatareṇendriyaṃ saṃprayuktam eveti /
analyzed: nūnam ca tayoḥ anyatareṇa indriyam saṃprayuktam eva iti

original: ubhavāv abhavaty eveti nātivyāptiḥ parihṛtā bhavati //
analyzed: ubhavau a bhavati eva iti na ativyāptiḥ parihṛtā bhavati

original: atha brūyuḥ kim anena parikleśena na lakṣaṇavarṇanam asmākam abhimatam anuvādapakṣanikṣiptatvāt /
analyzed: atha brūyuḥ kim anena parikleśena na lakṣaṇa varṇanam asmākam abhimatam anuvāda pakṣa nikṣipta tvāt

original: api tu lokaprasiddhapratyakṣānuvādena dharmaṃ praty animittatvam eva vidhīyate na dharmaṇ prati pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvāt vidyamānārthagrāhitvād ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: api tu loka prasiddha pratyakṣa anuvādena dharmam prati animitta tvam eva vidhīyate na prati pramāṇam pratyakṣam vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt vidyamāna artha grāhi tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: dharmaś ca na vartamānaḥ trikālānavacchinnasya tasya [yajeta] [dadyāt] [juhuyāt] ityādiśabdebhyaḥ pratīteḥ //
analyzed: dharmaḥ ca na vartamānaḥ tri kāla anavacchinnasya tasya yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt ityādi śabdebhyaḥ pratīteḥ

original: tarhi [satsaṃprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣaṃ] iti kimartho grantha iti cet na vidyamānopalaṃbhanasamarthanārthatvāt /
analyzed: tarhi sat saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma tat pratyakṣam iti kimarthaḥ granthaḥ iti ced na vidyamāna upalaṃbhana samarthana artha tvāt

original: yadi vidyamānopalaṃbhanatvam asiddham iti paro brūyāt sa vaktavyaḥ vidyamānopalaṃbhanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ satsaṃprayogajatvād iti //
analyzed: yadi vidyamāna upalaṃbhana tvam asiddham iti paraḥ brūyāt sa vaktavyaḥ vidyamāna upalaṃbhanam pratyakṣam sat saṃprayoga ja tvāt iti

original: pratyakṣagrahaṇam api hetunirdeśārtham eva /
analyzed: pratyakṣa grahaṇam api hetu nirdeśa artham eva

original: satsaṃprayogasyāsiddhatāṃ brūvann anena pratyākhyāyate satsaṃprayogajaṃ pratyakāṣaṃ pratyakṣatvād iti tad uktam [pratyakṣatvamadohetuḥ śeṣam hetuprasiddhaye] iti /
analyzed: sat saṃprayogasya asiddha tām brūvan anena pratyākhyāyate sat saṃprayoga jam pratyakāṣam pratyakṣa tvāt iti tat uktam pratyakṣa tva madaḥ hetuḥ śeṣam hetu prasiddhaye iti

original: svātantryeṇāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ dharmagrāhakatvaniṣedhāya vaktavyam /
analyzed: svātantryeṇa api pratyakṣa tvam dharma grāhaka tva niṣedhāya vaktavyam

original: na sūtratātparyāt nātivyāptyādidoṣāvasara iheti //
analyzed: na sūtra tātparyāt na ativyāpti ādi doṣa avasaraḥ iha iti

original: tad etad api na pramāṇikamano 'nukūlam /
analyzed: tat etat api na pramāṇika manaḥ nukūlam

original: katarasya pratyakṣasya dharmaṃ praty animittatvaṃ pratipādyate kim asmadādipratyakṣasya yogipratyakṣasya vā tatra asmadādipratyakṣasya tathātve sarveṣām avivāda eveti kiṃ tatreyatā śrameṇa yogipratyakṣasya tu bhavatām asiddhatvāt kasya dharmaṃ praty animittatvapratipādanam evaṃ ca dharmiṇo 'bhāvād āśrayāsiddhatāṃ spṛśet /
analyzed: katarasya pratyakṣasya dharmam prati animitta tvam pratipādyate kim asmad ādi pratyakṣasya yogi pratyakṣasya vā tatra asmad ādi pratyakṣasya tathātve sarveṣām avivādaḥ eva iti kim tatra iyatā śrameṇa yogi pratyakṣasya tu bhavatām asiddha tvāt kasya dharmam prati animitta tva pratipādanam evam ca dharmiṇaḥ bhāvāt āśraya asiddha tām spṛśet

original: vidyamānopalaṃbhatvapratyakṣatvādisādhanam //117//
analyzed: vidyamāna upalaṃbha tva pratyakṣa tva ādi sādhanam

original: paraprasiddhyā tatsiddhir iti cet keyaṃ prasiddhir nāma pramāṇamūlā tadviparītā vā ādye pakṣe pramāṇasyāpakṣapātitvāt parasyeva tavāpi siddhir bhavatu /
analyzed: para prasiddhyā tad siddhiḥ iti ced kā iyam prasiddhiḥ nāma pramāṇa mūlā tad viparītā vā ādye pakṣe pramāṇasya apakṣapāti tvāt parasya iva tava api siddhiḥ bhavatu

original: apramāṇamūlatve tu kasyacid apy asau parsiddhiḥ //
analyzed: apramāṇa mūla tve tu kasyacid api asau

original: yogijñānaṃ pareṣāṃ yat siddhaṃ tadanubhāṣaṇe /
analyzed: yogi jñānam pareṣām yat siddham tat anubhāṣaṇe

original: pratijñāpadayor eva vyāghātas te prasajyate //118//
analyzed: pratijñā padayoḥ eva vyāghātaḥ te prasajyate

original: parair hi dharmagrāhi yogijñānam abhyupagatam /
analyzed: paraiḥ hi dharma grāhi yogi jñānam abhyupagatam

original: atas tadanubhāṣaṇe dharmagrāhakaṃ na dharmagrāhakam ity uktaṃ syāt //
analyzed: atas tad anubhāṣaṇe dharma grāhakam na dharma grāhakam iti uktam syāt

original: parasaṃsiddhamūaṃ ca nānumānaṃ prakalpate /
analyzed: ca na anumānam prakalpate

original: uktaṃ bhavadbhir evedaṃ nirālambanadūṣaṇe //
analyzed: uktam bhavadbhiḥ evā idam nirālambana dūṣaṇe

original: sādhyasiddhir yathā nāsti parasiddhena hetunā /
analyzed: sādhya siddhiḥ yathā na asti para siddhena hetunā

original: tathaiva dharmisiddhatvaṃ parasiddhyā na yujyate //120//
analyzed: tathā eva dharmi siddha tvam para siddhyā na yujyate

original: tatraitat syāt prasaṅgasādhanam idam /
analyzed: tatra etat syāt prasaṅga sādhanam idam

original: prasaṅgaś ca nāma parasiddhena parasyāniṣṭāpādanam ucyate /
analyzed: prasaṅgaḥ ca nāma para siddhena parasya aniṣṭa āpādanam ucyate

original: parasya ca vidyamānopalaṃbhanaṃ satsaṃprayogajanyaṃ ca prtyakṣaṃ siddham /
analyzed: parasya ca vidyamāna upalaṃbhanam sat saṃprayoga janyam ca prtyakṣam siddham

original: atas tenaiva hetunā dharmānimittatvaṃ tasyopapādyata iti ko doṣāḥ naitad evam prasaṅgsādhanaṃ nāma nāsty eva parmārthataḥ /
analyzed: atas tena eva hetunā dharma animitta tvam tasya upapādyate iti kaḥ doṣāḥ na etat evam prasaṅg sādhanam nāma na asti eva parma arthataḥ

original: tad dhi kuḍyaṃ vinā tatra citrakarmeva lakṣyate //121//
analyzed: tat hi kuḍyam vinā tatra citrakarmā iva lakṣyate

original: na hi nabhaḥkusumasya saurabhāsaurabhavicāro yuktaḥ //
analyzed: na hi nabhaḥ kusumasya saurabha asaurabha vicāraḥ yuktaḥ

original: athāpi kiṃ na etena bhavatv evaṃ prasaṅgasṣdhanam /
analyzed: atha api kim naḥ etena bhavatu evam prasaṅga sṣdhanam

original: tad api tu vyāptivūlaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: tat api tu vyāpti vūlam bhavati

original: na ca saṃbhavati vyāptipratītir iha mādṛśām /
analyzed: na ca saṃbhavati vyāpti pratītiḥ iha mādṛśām

original: na dharmagrāhi sarveṣāṃ patyakṣam iti vetti kaḥ //122//
analyzed: na dharma grāhi sarveṣām patyakṣam iti vetti kaḥ

original: matpratyakṣam akṣamaṃ dharmagrahaṇa iti bhavān na jānīte tvatpratyakṣam api na dharmagrāhīti nāhaṃ jāne anyasya pratyakṣam īdṛśam eveti ubhāv apy āvāṃ na jānīvahe //
analyzed: mad pratyakṣam akṣamam dharma grahaṇe iti bhavān na jānīte tvad pratyakṣam api na dharma grāhi iti na aham jāne anyasya pratyakṣam īdṛśam eva iti ubhau api āvām na jānīvahe

original: tvayā tu yadi sarveṣāṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñātam īdṛśām /
analyzed: tvayā tu yadi sarveṣām pratyakṣam jñātam īdṛśām

original: tarhi tvam eva yogīti yogino dvekṣi kiṃ vrthā //123//
analyzed: tarhi tvam eva yogī iti yoginaḥ dvekṣi kim vrthā

original: pramāṇikasthitiṃ tasmād itthaṃ śrotriya budhyase /
analyzed: pramāṇika sthitim tasmāt ittham śrotriya budhyase

original: parokte 'tīndriye hy arthe mā vādīr dūṣaṇaṃ punaḥ //124//
analyzed: para ukte tīndriye hi arthe mā vādīḥ dūṣaṇam punar

original: pramāṇasiddhe hataśakti dūṣaṇaṃ pramāṇaśūnye 'pi vṛthā taduktayaḥ /
analyzed: pramāṇa siddhe hata śakti dūṣaṇam pramāṇa śūnye vṛthā tad uktayaḥ

original: nirasya codyavyasanaṃ tu mṛgyatāṃ atīndriye vastuni sādhanaṃ punaḥ //125//
analyzed: nirasya codya vyasanam tu mṛgyatām atīndriye vastuni sādhanam punar

original: sa cet paryanuyuktaḥ san vaktuṃ śaknoti sādhanam /
analyzed: sa ced paryanuyuktaḥ san vaktum śaknoti sādhanam

original: om iti pratipattavyaṃ no cen nāsty eva tasya tat //
analyzed: om iti pratipattavyam na u ced na asti eva tasya tat

original: āha śikṣitāḥ smaḥ prāmāṇikavṛttam /
analyzed: āha śikṣitāḥ smaḥ prāmāṇika vṛttam

original: na dūṣaṇaṃ brūmaḥ /
analyzed: na dūṣaṇam brūmaḥ

original: bhavantam evānuyuñjmahe tad etarhi kathyatām dharmādhigamanipunayogipratyakṣasiddhau kiṃ pramāṇam iti idam ucyate darśamātiśaya eva pramāṇam /
analyzed: bhavantam eva anuyuñjmahe tat etarhi kathyatām dharma adhigama nipuna yogi pratyakṣa siddhau kim pramāṇam iti idam ucyate darśama atiśayaḥ eva pramāṇam

original: tathā hy asmadādir apekṣitāloko 'valokayati nikaṭasthitam arthabṛndam /
analyzed: tathā hi asmad ādiḥ apekṣita ālokaḥ valokayati nikaṭa sthitam artha bṛndam

original: unduruvairiṇas tu sāndratamatamaḥpaṅkapaṭalaviliptadeśapatitam api saṃpaśyanti /
analyzed: unduru vairiṇaḥ tu sāndra tama tamaḥ paṅka paṭala vilipta deśa patitam api saṃpaśyanti

original: saṃpātināmā ca gṛdhrājo yojanaśatavyavahitām api daśarathanandanasuncarīṃ dadatśeti śrūyate rāmāyaṇe /
analyzed: saṃpāti nāmā ca gṛdhrājaḥ yojana śata vyavahitām api daśaratha nandana suncarīm śrūyate rāmāyaṇe

original: so 'yaṃ darśanātiśayaḥ śuklādiguṇātiśaya iva tāratamyasamanvita iti gamayati param api niratiśayam atiśayam /
analyzed: saḥ yam darśana atiśayaḥ śukla ādi guṇa atiśayaḥ iva tāratamya samanvitaḥ iti gamayati param api niratiśayam atiśayam

original: ataś ca yatrāsya paraḥ prakarṣaḥ te yogino gīyante /
analyzed: atas ca yatra asya paraḥ prakarṣaḥ te yoginaḥ gīyante

original: darśanasya ca paro 'tiśayaḥ sūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭabhūtabhaviṣyadādiviṣayatvam //
analyzed: darśanasya ca paraḥ tiśayaḥ sūkṣma vyavahita viprakṛṣṭa bhūta bhaviṣyat ādi viṣaya tvam

original: nanu svaviṣayānatikrameṇa bhavatu tadatiśayaklpanā /
analyzed: nanu sva viṣaya anatikrameṇa bhavatu tad atiśaya klpanā

original: dharmas tu cakṣuṣo na viṣaya eva /
analyzed: dharmaḥ tu cakṣuṣaḥ na viṣayaḥ eva

original: tad uktam [yatrāpy atiśayo dṛṣṭaḥ sa svārthānatilaṅghanāt /
analyzed: tat uktam yatra api atiśayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sa sva artha an atilaṅghanāt

original: dūrasūkṣmādidṛṣṭau syāt na rūpe śrotravṛttitā //
analyzed: dūra sūkṣma ādi dṛṣṭau syāt na rūpe śrotra vṛtti tā

original: api ca [ye 'pi cātiśayā dṛṣṭā prajñāmedhābalair nṛṇām /
analyzed: api ca ye ca atiśayāḥ dṛṣṭā prajñā medhā balaiḥ nṛṇām

original: stokastokāntaratvena na tv atīndriyadarśanāt] //
analyzed: stoka stoka antara tvena na tu atīndriya darśanāt

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: etad ayuktam yataḥ yady api nāsmadādinayanaviṣayo dharmaḥ tathāpi yogīndriyagamyo bhaviṣyati /tathā hi yojanśatavyavahitaṃ andhakārāntaritaṃ vā nāsmadādilocanagocaratām upayāti sampāti pṛṣadaṃśadṛśos tu viṣayo bhavaty eva //
analyzed: etat ayuktam yatas yadi api na asmat ādi nayana viṣayaḥ dharmaḥ tathā api yogi indriya gamyaḥ bhaviṣyati tathā hi yojan śata vyavahitam andhakāra antaritam vā na asmat ādi locana gocara tām upayāti sampāti pṛṣat aṃśa dṛśoḥ tu viṣayaḥ bhavati eva

original: nanv evam aviṣaye pravṛttaṃ yogināṃ cakṣurgandharasādīn api gṛhṇīyāt /
analyzed: nanu evam aviṣaye pravṛttam yoginām cakṣuḥ gandha rasa ādīn api gṛhṇīyāt

original: yathoktam [ekena tu pramāṇena sarvajño yena kalpyate /
analyzed: yathā uktam ekena tu pramāṇena sarvajñaḥ yena kalpyate

original: nūnaṃ sa cakṣuṣā sarvān rasādīn pratipadyate] iti //
analyzed: nūnam sa cakṣuṣā sarvān rasa ādīn pratipadyate iti

original: na etad evam rasādigrāhīṇy api yoginām indriyāṇi cakṣurvad atiśayavanty eveti rasādiṣu cakṣurvyāpāraḥ parikalpyate /
analyzed: na etat evam rasa ādi grāhīṇi api yoginām indriyāṇi cakṣuḥ vat atiśayavanti eva iti rasa ādiṣu cakṣuḥ vyāpāraḥ parikalpyate

original: dharme 'pi na tarhi kalpanīya iti cet na tasya rasādivat tadaviṣayatvābhāvāt //
analyzed: dharme pi na tarhi kalpanīyaḥ iti ced na tasya rasa ādi vat tad aviṣaya tva abhāvāt

original: api ca yogīndriyāviśayatvaṃ dharmasya katham avagatavān bhavān aviṣayatvaṃ tadbhāve 'pi tadanavagamād avagamyate yathā nayanasadbhāve 'pi śabdāśravanāt tdaviṣayatā śabdasyāvasīyate na caivaṃ yogicakṣuṣi saty api dharmasyāgrahaṇaṃ avagantuṃ śaknoti bhavān ubhayasyāpi bhavataḥ parokṣatvāt ity aviṣayasya tasyeti na te vaktuṃ yuktam iti //
analyzed: api ca yogi indriya aviśaya tvam dharmasya katham avagatavān bhavān aviṣaya tvam tad bhāve pi tad anavagamāt avagamyate yathā nayana sadbhāve pi śabda a śravanāt śabdasya avasīyate na ca evam yogi cakṣuṣi sati api dharmasya agrahaṇam avagantum śaknoti bhavān ubhayasya api bhavataḥ parokṣa tvāt iti aviṣayasya tasya iti na te vaktum yuktam iti

original: nanu kartavyatārūpaḥ trikālasparśavarjitaḥ /
cakṣurviṣayatām eti dharma ity atisāhasam //127//
analyzed: cakṣuḥ viṣaya tām eti dharmaḥ iti ati sāhasam

original: satyaṃ sāhasam etat te mama vā carmacakṣuṣaḥ /
analyzed: satyam sāhasam etat te mama vā carma cakṣuṣaḥ

original: na tv eṣa durgamaḥ panthā yogināṃ sarvadarśinām //128//
analyzed: na tu eṣa durgamaḥ panthāḥ yoginām sarva darśinām

original: yad ca trikālānavacchinno yojetetyādiliṅādiyuktaśabdaikaśaraṇāvagamo dharmaḥ kathaṃ tato 'nyena pramāṇena paricchidyatām ity ucyate tad api prakriyāmātram /
analyzed: yat ca tri kāla anavacchinnaḥ yojeta ityādi liṅ ādi yukta śabda eka śaraṇa avagamaḥ dharmaḥ katham tatas pramāṇena paricchidyatām iti ucyate tat api prakriyā mātram

original: kim iva hi trikālasparśāsparśābhyāṃ kṛtyam yathā vayaṃ gamanādikriyāṇāṃ deśāntaraprāptyādiprayojanatāṃ jānīmaḥ tathā agnihotrādikriyāṇāṃ svargādiphalatāṃ jñāsyanti yogina iti kim atra sāhasam yadi hi bāhyendriyeṣv amarṣaḥ na teṣv atiśayo viṣahyate tad alam anubandhena //
analyzed: kim iva hi trikāla sparśa asparśābhyām kṛtyam yathā vayam gamana ādi kriyāṇām deśa antara prāpti ādi prayojana tām jānīmaḥ tathā agnihotra ādi kriyāṇām svarga ādi phala tām jñāsyanti yoginaḥ iti kim atra sāhasam yadi hi bāhya indriyeṣu amarṣaḥ na teṣu atiśayaḥ viṣahyate tat alam anubandhena

original: manaḥkaraṇakaṃ jñānaṃ bhavanābhyāsasaṃbhavam /
analyzed: manaḥ karaṇakam jñānam bhavana abhyāsa saṃbhavam

original: bhavati dhyāyatāṃ dharme kāntādāv iva kāminām //129//
analyzed: bhavati dhyāyatām dharme kāntā ādau iva kāminām

original: mano hi sarvaviṣayaṃ na tasyāviṣayaḥ kaścid asti /
analyzed: manaḥ hi sarva viṣayam na tasya aviṣayaḥ kaścid asti

original: abhyāsavaśāc cātīndriyeṣv apy artheṣu parisphuṭāḥ pratibhāsāḥ prādurbhavanto dṛśyante /
analyzed: abhyāsa vaśāt ca atīndriyeṣu api artheṣu parisphuṭāḥ pratibhāsāḥ prādurbhavantaḥ dṛśyante

original: yathā ''huḥ [kāmaśokāmayonmādacorasvapnādyupadrutāḥ /
analyzed: yathā huḥ kāma śoka āmaya unmāda cora svapna ādi upadrutāḥ

original: abhūtān api paśyanti purato 'vasthitān iva //] nanu eteṣāṃ mithyājñānatvāt na yogivijñāne dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ yuktam na sphuṭāvabhāsamātratayā dṛṣṭāntatvopapatteḥ /
analyzed: abhūtān api paśyanti puratas vasthitān iva  nanu eteṣām mithyā jñāna tvāt na yogi vijñāne dṛṣṭānta tvam yuktam na sphuṭa avabhāsa mātra tayā dṛṣṭānta tva upapatteḥ

original: na hi śabdaghaṭayor api sarvātmanā 'tulyatvam /
analyzed: na hi śabda ghaṭayoḥ api sarva ātmanā tulya tvam

original: tatra kāmaśokādibhāvanābhyāsabhuvāṃ pratibhāsānāṃ bādhakavaidhuryādaprāmāṇyaṃ bhaviṣyati netareṣām tadabhāvāt /
analyzed: tatra kāma śoka ādi bhāvanā abhyāsa bhuvām pratibhāsānām bādhaka vaidhuryāt aprāmāṇyam bhaviṣyati na itareṣām tad abhāvāt

original: sphuṭābhāsatvaṃ tūbhayatrāpi tulyam //
analyzed: sphuṭa ābhāsa tvam tu ubhayatra api tulyam

original: nanu abhyāso 'pi kriyamāṇo nātyantam apūrvam atiśayam āvahati laṅghanābhyāsavat /
analyzed: nanu abhyāsaḥ api kriyamāṇaḥ na atyantam apūrvam atiśayam āvahati laṅghana abhyāsa vat

original: yo 'pi hi pratidinaman anyakarmā laṅghanam abhyasyati so 'pi katipayapadaparimitam avanitalam abhilaṅghayati na tu parvatam ambudhiṃ veti ucyate laṅghanaṃ dehadharmatvāt kaphjāḍyādisaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: yaḥ pi hi anya karmā laṅghanam abhyasyati saḥ u pi katipaya pada parimitam avani talam abhilaṅghayati na tu parvatam ambudhim vā iti ucyate laṅghanam deha dharma tvāt kapha jāḍya ādi saṃbhavāt

original: mā gāt prakarṣaṃ jñāne tu tasya kaḥ pratibandhakaḥ //131//
analyzed: mā gāt prakarṣam jñāne tu tasya kaḥ pratibandhakaḥ

original: laṅghanādau tu pūrvedyuḥ prayatnasamupārjitaḥ /
analyzed: laṅghana ādau tu pūrvedyus prayatna samupārjitaḥ

original: na dehe 'tiśayaḥ kaścid anyedyur avatiṣṭhate //132//
analyzed: na dehe tiśayaḥ kaścid anyedyus avatiṣṭhate

original: tatra kevalam abhyāsāt praksaye kaphamedasoḥ /
analyzed: tatra kevalam abhyāsāt praksaye kapha medasoḥ

original: śarīlalāghavaṃ labdhvā laṅghayanti yathocitam //133//

original: iha vijñānajanyas tu saṃskāro vyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: iha vijñāna janyaḥ tu saṃskāraḥ vyavatiṣṭhate

original: kramopacīyamāno 'sau parātiśayakāraṇam //134//
analyzed: kramā upacīyamānaḥ sau para atiśaya kāraṇam

original: yathā 'nuvākagrahaṇe saṃsthā 'bhyāsanakalpitaḥ /
analyzed: yathā nuvāka grahaṇe saṃsthāḥ bhyāsana kalpitaḥ

original: sthiraḥ karoti saṃskāraḥ pāṭhasmṛtyādipāṭavam //135//
analyzed: sthiraḥ karoti saṃskāraḥ pāṭha smṛti ādi pāṭavam

original: yathā vā puṭapākena śodhyamānaṃ śanaiśśanaiḥ /
analyzed: yathā vā puṭapākena śodhyamānam śanais śanais

original: hemaniṣpratikāśaṃ tad yāti kalyāṇatāṃ parām //136//
analyzed: hema niṣpratikāśam tat yāti kalyāṇa tām parām

original: tathaiva bhāvanābhyāsāt yoginām api mānasam /
analyzed: tathā eva bhāvanā abhyāsāt yoginām api mānasam

original: jñānaṃ sakalavijñeyasākṣātkārakṣamaṃ bhavet //137//
analyzed: jñānam sakala vijñeya sākṣātkāra kṣamam bhavet

original: asmadādeś ca rāgādimalāvaraṇadhūsaram /
analyzed: asmat ādeḥ ca rāga ādi mala āvaraṇa dhūsaram

original: mano na labhate jñānaprakarṣapadavīṃ parām //138//
analyzed: manaḥ na labhate jñāna prakarṣa padavīm parām

original: pratyahaṃ bhāvanābhyāsakṣapitāśeṣakalmaṣan /
analyzed: pratyaham bhāvanā abhyāsa kṣapita aśeṣa kalmaṣan

original: yogināṃ tu manaḥ śuddhaṃ kāmivārthaṃ na pasyati //139//
analyzed: yoginām tu manaḥ śuddham kām iva artham na

original: yathā ca teṣāṃ rāgādiprahāṇam avakalpate /

original: tathā 'pavargacintāyāṃ vistarenābhidhāsyate //140//
analyzed: tathā pavarga cintāyām vistarena abhidhāsyate

original: tad evaṃ kṣīṇadoṣāṇāṃ dhyānāvahitacetasām /
analyzed: tat evam kṣīṇa doṣāṇām dhyāna avahita cetasām

original: nirmalaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati yoginām //141//
analyzed: nirmalam sarva viṣayam jñānam bhavati yoginām

original: api cānāgatajñānam asmadāder api kvacit /
analyzed: api ca anāgata jñānam asmat ādeḥ api kvacid

original: pramāṇāṃ prātibhaṃ śvo me bhrātā ''ganteti dṛśyate //142//
analyzed: pramāṇām prātibham śvas me bhrātā gantā iti dṛśyate

original: nānarthajaṃ na sandigdhaṃ na bādhavidhurīkṛtam /
analyzed: na anartha jam na sandigdham na bādha vidhurīkṛtam

original: na duṣṭakāraṇaṃ ceti pramāṇam idam iṣyatām //143//
analyzed: na duṣṭa kāraṇam ca iti pramāṇam idam iṣyatām

original: kvacid bādhakayogaś cet astu tasyāpramāṇatā /
analyzed: kvacid bādhaka yogaḥ ced astu tasya apramāṇa tā

original: yatrāparedyur abhyeri bhrāntā tatra kim ucyatām //144//
analyzed: yatra aparedyus abhyeri bhrāntā tatra kim ucyatām

original: kākatālīyam iti cet na pramāṇapradarśitam /
analyzed: kākatālīyam iti ced na pramāṇa pradarśitam

original: vastu tatkākatālīyam iti śaṅkitum arhati //145//
analyzed: vastu tat kākatālīyam iti śaṅkitum arhati

original: nanu anarthajam idaṃ jñānaṃ bhrāntus tajjanakasya tadānīm asattvāt /
analyzed: nanu anartha jam idam jñānam bhrāntuḥ tad janakasya tadānīm asattvāt

original: syād etad evaṃ yadi tadā 'stitvena bhrātaraṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
analyzed: syāt etat evam yadi tadā stitvena bhrātaram gṛhṇīyāt

original: kintu bhāvinam enaṃ gṛhṇāti /
analyzed: kintu bhāvinam enam gṛhṇāti

original: bhāvitvaṃ ca tadā 'syāsty eveti kathaṃ anarthajaṃ tajjñānam //
analyzed: bhāvi tvam ca tadā sya asti eva iti katham anartha jam tat jñānam

original: nanu bhāvitayā grahanam aghaṭamānam /
analyzed: nanu bhāvitayā grahanam a ghaṭamānam

original: bhāvitvaṃ hi nāma sāvadhiḥ prāgabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: bhāvi tvam hi nāma sa avadhiḥ prāgabhāvaḥ

original: abhāvasys ca bhāvena bhrātrā saha kaḥ sambandhaḥ vastvavastunor virodhāt tad etad asamyak taddeśasambandhasya tatra prāgabhāvaḥ na tu dharmiṇaḥ /
analyzed: abhāvasya ca bhāvena bhrātrā saha kaḥ sambandhaḥ vastu avastunoḥ virodhāt tat etat asamyak tad deśa sambandhasya tatra prāgabhāvaḥ na tu dharmiṇaḥ

original: sa hi vidyata eva prāgavagataḥ /
analyzed: sa hi vidyate eva prāk avagataḥ

original: sa ca kutaścit bhojanotkaṇṭhādeḥ kāraṇāt smaraṇapadavīm upārūḍhaḥ śvastanāgamanaviśiṣṭatvena pratibhātīti prātibhasya sa eva janaka iti /
analyzed: sa ca kutaścid bhojana utkaṇṭhā ādeḥ kāraṇāt smaraṇa padavīm upārūḍhaḥ śvastana āgamana viśiṣṭa tvena pratibhāti iti prātibhasya saḥ eva janakaḥ iti

original: tasmād anarthajatvābhāvāt pramāṇaṃ pratibham /
analyzed: tasmāt anartha ja tva abhāvāt pramāṇam pratibham

original: pramāṇaṃ ca sat pratyakṣam eva na pramāaṇāntaram śabdaliṅgasārūpyanimittānapekṣatvāt //
analyzed: pramāṇam ca sat pratyakṣam eva na pramāaṇa antaram śabda liṅga sārūpya nimitta anapekṣa tvāt

original: nanu pratyakṣam api mā bhūt indriyānapekṣatvāt maivam manasa eva tatrendriyatvāt /
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣam api mā bhūt indriya anapekṣa tvāt mā evam manasaḥ eva tatra indriya tvāt

original: pūrvotpannacākṣuṣavijñānaviśeṣaṇasya bāhyasya vastuno mano grāhakam iti nāndhādyabhāva ity uktam /
analyzed: pūrva utpanna cākṣuṣa vijñāna viśeṣaṇasya bāhyasya vastunaḥ manaḥ grāhakam iti na andha ādi abhāvaḥ iti uktam

original: śabdādyupāyāntaraviratau ca jāyamānam anavadyaṃ jñānaṃ mānasaṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: śabda ādi upāya antara viratau ca jāyamānam anavadyam jñānam mānasam pratyakṣam bhavati

original: surabhi ketakakusuman madhurā śarkareti jñānavad ity apy uktam /
analyzed: surabhi ketaka kusumat madhurā śarkarā iti jñāna vat iti api uktam

original: ata eva nāniyatanimittakaṃ jñānaṃ pratibheti vaktavyam /
analyzed: atas eva na aniyata nimittakam jñānam pratibhā iti vaktavyam

original: pratyakṣanimittatvāt //
analyzed: pratyakṣa nimitta tvāt

original: na cārṣaṃ nāma jñānaṃ pratibhā pratyakṣātiriktasyārṣanāmnaḥ pratyayasyābhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca ārṣam nāma jñānam pratibhā pratyakṣa atiriktasya ārṣa nāmnaḥ pratyayasya abhāvāt

original: [ṛṣīṇām api yaj jñānaṃ tad apy āgamapūrvakam] iti hi vadanti /
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām api yat jñānam tat api āgama pūrvakam iti hi vadanti

original: āgamagrahaṇaṃ ca nidarśanārtham /
analyzed: āgama grahaṇam ca nidarśana artham

original: anupāyasya jñānasya teṣām asattvāt //
analyzed: anupāyasya jñānasya teṣām asattvāt

original: na ca siddhadarśanaṃ pratibhā asmadāder api bhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca siddha darśanam pratibhā asmat ādeḥ api bhāvāt

original: tasmān na pramāṇāntaraṃ prātibham api tu pratyakṣam eva//
analyzed: tasmāt na pramāṇa antaram prātibham api tu pratyakṣam eva

original: nanu pratyakṣam api nedaṃ bhavati taddhi vartamānaikaviṣayam /
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣam api nā idam bhavati tat hi vartamāna eka viṣayam

original: yathoktam [saṃbaddhaṃ vartamānaṃ ca gṛhyate cakṣurādinā] iti /
analyzed: yathā uktam saṃbaddham vartamānam ca gṛhyate cakṣuḥ ādinā iti

original: tathā [eṣa pratyaksadharmaś ca vartamānārthataiva yat] iti ca /
analyzed: tathā eṣa pratyak sadharmaḥ ca vartamāna artha tā eva yat iti ca

original: maivamanāgatagrāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya pradeśāntare svayam evoktatvāt //
analyzed: mā evam anāgata grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya pradeśa antare svayam eva ukta tvāt

original: [rajataṃ gṛhyamāṇaṃ hi cirasthāyīti gṛhyate] iti ca bhavānevāvocat /
analyzed: rajatam gṛhyamāṇam hi cira sthāyi iti gṛhyate iti ca bhavān eva avocat

original: tasmāt pratyakṣam anāgatagrāhi [śvo me bhrātā ''gantā] iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt pratyakṣam anāgata grāhi śvas me bhrātā gantā iti siddham

original: evañ cāsmadādīnām ivānāgate bhrātari yogināṃ bhaviṣyati dharme pratyakṣaṃ pravartsyatīti /
analyzed: evam ca asmad ādīnām iva anāgate bhrātari yoginām bhaviṣyati dharme pratyakṣam pravartsyati iti

original: tasmāt yat sarvajñaniṣedhāya kathyate [yajjātīyakḥ pramāṇais tu yajjātīyārthadarśanam /
analyzed: tasmāt yat sarvajña niṣedhāya kathyate yad jātīyakaḥ pramāṇaiḥ tu yad jātīya artha darśanam

original: bhaved idānīṃ lokasya tathā kālāntare 'py abhūt //
analyzed: bhavet idānīm lokasya tathā kāla antare pi abhūt

original: iti tad apāstaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: iti tat apāstam bhavati

original: tatraitat syāt sarvajñatā yogināṃ kim ekena jñānena bahubhir vā na tāvad ekena na hy ekasmin jñāne parasparavirodhino 'rthāḥ śītoṣṇavad avabhāsante //
analyzed: tatra etat syāt sarvajña tā yoginām kim ekena jñānena bahubhiḥ vā na tāvat ekena na hi ekasmin jñāne paraspara virodhinaḥ rthāḥ śīta uṣṇa vat avabhāsante

original: nāpi bahubhiḥ tāni hi krameṇa vā bhaveyuḥ yugapad vā na yugapajjñānāni saṃbhavanti sūkṣmāntaḥkaraṇasāpekṣatvāt /
analyzed: na api bahubhiḥ tāni hi krameṇa vā bhaveyuḥ yugapad vā na yugapad jñānāni saṃbhavanti sūkṣma antaḥkaraṇa sāpekṣa tvāt

original: kramabhāvibhis tu jñānair aśeṣatribhir api durghaṭam iti kathaṃ sarvajñā yoginaḥ ucyate yugapad ekayaiva buddhyā sarvatra sarvān arthān drakṣyanti yoginaḥ /
analyzed: krama bhāvibhiḥ tu jñānaiḥ aśeṣa tribhiḥ api durghaṭam iti katham sarvajñāḥ yoginaḥ ucyate yugapad ekayā eva buddhyā sarvatra sarvān arthān drakṣyanti yoginaḥ

original: yat tu viruddhatvād iti tad aprayojakam viruddhānām api nīlapītādīnām ekatra citrapratyaye 'vabhāsanāt /
analyzed: yat tu viruddha tvāt iti tat aprayojakam viruddhānām api nīla pīta ādīnām ekatra citra pratyaye vabhāsanāt

original: ekatra ca mecakapratyaye sannihitapadārthavyatiriktasakalavastvabhāvagrahaṇasya pūrvaṃ darśitatvāt /
analyzed: ekatra ca mecaka pratyaye sannihita padārtha vyatirikta sakala vastu abhāva grahaṇasya pūrvam darśita tvāt

original: śītoṣṇayor api kvacid avasare bhavati yugapadupalaṃbhaḥ tad yathā pratapati hutavahavisphuliṅganikarānukārikiraṇe taruṇoṣmaṇi grīṣme himaśakalaśiśirapayasi sarasi nimagnatābhidaghnadegasya puṃsaḥ yugapad eva saraśalilasūryātapavartinau śīnoṣṇasparśāv anubhavapatham avatarati //
analyzed: śīta uṣṇayoḥ api kvacid avasare bhavati yugapad upalaṃbhaḥ tat yathā pratapati hutavaha visphuliṅga nikara anukāri kiraṇe taruṇa ūṣmaṇi grīṣme hima śakala śiśira payasi sarasi nimagna tā abhidaghna degasya puṃsaḥ yugapad eva sara śalila sūrya ātapa vartinau śīna uṣṇa sparśau anubhava patham avatarati

original: nanu ekena sarvān arthān bhūtabhāvinaḥ parokṣān api paśyanto yoginaḥ katham akhilatrailokyavṛttāntadarśinaḥ sakalajagadguror īśvarād viśiṣyeran /
analyzed: nanu ekena sarvān arthān bhūta bhāvinaḥ parokṣān api paśyantaḥ yoginaḥ katham akhila trailokya vṛttānta darśinaḥ sakala jagat guroḥ īśvarāt viśiṣyeran

original: asti viśeṣaḥ īśvarasya tathāvidhaṃ nityam eva jñānaṇ yogināṃ tu yogabhāvanābhyāsaprabhavam iti //
analyzed: asti viśeṣaḥ īśvarasya tathāvidham nityam eva yoginām tu yoga bhāvanā abhyāsa prabhavam iti

original: nanu nādṛṣṭapūrve arthe kvacid bhavati bhāvanā //
analyzed: nanu na a dṛṣṭa pūrve arthe kvacid bhavati bhāvanā

original: āgamāt tu paricchinne dharme bhāvanayā 'pi kim //146//
analyzed: āgamāt tu paricchinne dharme bhāvanayā pi kim

original: codanaiva dharme pramāṇam iti sāvadhāraṇapratijñārthaḥ prathamam āgamād avagatadharmasvarūpeṣu satsv api yogiṣu na viplavata eveti ucyate yogiṣv asty evāyaṃ prakāraḥ /
analyzed: codanā eva dharme pramāṇam iti sāvadhāraṇa pratijñā arthaḥ prathamam āgamāt avagata dharma svarūpeṣu satsu api yogiṣu na viplavataḥ eva iti ucyate yogiṣu asti eva ayam prakāraḥ

original: paścād api pravartamāne dharmagrāhiṇi pratyakṣe codanaivety avadhāraṇaṃ śithilībhavaty eva /
analyzed: paścāt api pravartamāne dharma grāhiṇi pratyakṣe codanā eva iti avadhāraṇam śithilībhavati eva

original: api ceśvarajñānaṃ sāṃsiddhikam eva dharmaviṣayaṃ vedasya kāraṇabhutaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: api ca īśvara jñānam sāṃsiddhikam eva dharma viṣayam vedasya kāraṇa bhutam vakṣyāmaḥ

original: tasminn sati na codanaivety avadhāraṇārthasiddhiḥ //
analyzed: tasmin sati na codanā eva iti avadhāraṇa artha siddhiḥ

original: tasmāt [na dharmagrāhakaṃ yogipratyakṣaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvāt satsaṃprayogajatvāt] ityādisādhanam aprayojakam //
analyzed: tasmāt na dharma grāhakam yogi pratyakṣam vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt sat saṃprayoga ja tvāt ityādi sādhanam aprayojakam

original: pramāṇāntaravijñātaprameyapratipādakaḥ /
dharmopadeśakaḥ śabdaḥ śabdatvāt ghaṭaśabdavat //149//
analyzed: dharma upadeśakaḥ śabdaḥ śabda tvāt ghaṭa śabda vat

original: pratyakṣaḥ kasyacid dharmaḥ prameyatvāt ghaṭādivat /
analyzed: pratyakṣaḥ kasyacid dharmaḥ prameya tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat

original: ityādayaś ca sulabhāḥ santy eva pratihetavaḥ //148//
analyzed: ityādayaḥ ca sulabhāḥ santi eva pratihetavaḥ

original: nena niṣpratighayuktisādhitāṃ yogabuddhim akhilārthadarśinīm /
analyzed: nena niṣpratigha yukti sādhitām yoga buddhim akhila artha darśinīm

original: kiṃ viḍambayitum ucyate mudhā duṣṭahetunikurumbaśambaram //
analyzed: kim viḍambayitum ucyate mudhā duṣṭa hetu nikurumba śambaram

original: tad ittham api jaiminīyaṃ sūtram asaṅgatārtham /
analyzed: tat ittham api jaiminīyam sūtram asaṅgatā artham

original: lakṣaṇaparatvaṃ tv asya nirastam eva //
analyzed: lakṣaṇa paratvam tu asya nirastam eva

original: yad api kaiścit pratyakṣalakṣaṇam uktaṃ [ātmendriyamano 'rthasannikarṣād yad utpadyate jñānaṃ tad anyad anumānāibhyaḥ pratyakṣaṃ] iti tad api trayadvayasannikarṣajanmanāṃ sukhātmādijñānānāṃ avyāpakaṃ ativyāpakaṃ ca vyabhicāryādibodhānām ity upekṣaṇīyam //
analyzed: yat api kaiścid pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam uktam ātma indriya manaḥ rtha sannikarṣāt yat utpadyate jñānam tat anyat pratyakṣam iti tat api traya dvaya sannikarṣa janmanām sukha ātma ādi jñānānām avyāpakam ati vyāpakam ca vyabhicāri ādi bodhānām iti upekṣaṇīyam

original: īśvarakṛṣṇasya [prativiṣayādhyavasāyo dṛṣṭam] iti pratyakṣalakṣaṇam avocat /
analyzed: īśvarakṛṣṇasya prati viṣaya adhyavasāyaḥ dṛṣṭam iti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam avocat

original: tad api manojñām anumānādijñānānām api viṣayādhyavasāyasvabhāvatvenātivyāpteḥ //
analyzed: tat api manojñām anumāna ādi jñānānām api viṣaya adhyavasāya svabhāva tvena ativyāpteḥ

original: yat tu rājā vyākhyātavān [pratir ābhimukhye vartate tenābhimukhyena viṣayādhyavasāyaḥ pratyakṣam] iti tad apy anumānādāv asty eva /
analyzed: yat tu rājā vyākhyātavān pratiḥ ābhimukhye vartate tena ābhimukhyena viṣaya adhyavasāyaḥ pratyakṣam iti tat api anumāna ādau asti eva

original: ghaṭo 'yam itivat agnimān parvata ity ābhimukhyenaiva pratīteḥ /
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ yam iti vat agnimān parvataḥ iti ābhimukhyena eva pratīteḥ

original: spaṣṭatā tu sarvasaṃvidāṃ svaviṣaye vidyata eva //
analyzed: spaṣṭa tā tu sarva saṃvidām sva viṣaye vidyate eva

original: atha manyase sāmānyavihitasya viśeṣeṇa bādhāt anumānādivyāvṛttiḥ setsyati /
analyzed: atha manyase sāmānya vihitasya viśeṣeṇa bādhāt anumāna ādi vyāvṛttiḥ setsyati

original: sāmānyenādhyavasāya utsṛṣṭaḥ sa liṅgaśabdābhyāṃ viśeṣitaḥ iti taditaro 'dhyavasāyaḥ pratyakṣam iti sthāsyati /
analyzed: sāmānyena adhyavasāyaḥ utsṛṣṭaḥ sa liṅga śabdābhyām viśeṣitaḥ iti tad itaraḥ dhyavasāyaḥ pratyakṣam iti sthāsyati

original: yady evaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇam idānīm avyākaraṇīyam eva /
analyzed: yadi evam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam idānīm avyākaraṇīyam eva

original: śabdaliṅgagrahaṇe varṇite sati tadvailakṣaṇyād eva pratyakṣaṃ jñāsyata iti /
analyzed: śabda liṅga grahaṇe varṇite sati tad vailakṣaṇyāt eva pratyakṣam jñāsyate iti

original: tasmād indriyārthasannikarṣapadopādānam antareṇa nānumānādivyavaccheda upapadyata iti kdam api na pratyakṣalakṣaṇam anavadyam //
analyzed: tasmāt indriya artha sannikarṣa pada upādānam antareṇa na anumāna ādi vyavacchedaḥ upapadyate iti kdam api na pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam anavadyam

original: alam ativistareṇa paradarśanagītamataḥ vigatakalaṅkam  asti na hi lakṣaṇam akṣadhiya1.282.02	ḥ /
analyzed: alam ati vistareṇa para darśana gīta mataḥ vigata kalaṅkam asti na hi lakṣaṇam

original: tad alam akṣapādamuninaiva nibaddham idaṃ harati manāṃsi  lakṣaṇam udāradhiyām //1501.282.04	//
analyzed: tat alam akṣapāda muninā eva nibaddham idam harati manāṃsi lakṣaṇam udāra dhiyām

original: tatpūrvakaṃ ca trividham anumānaṃ pūrvvac cheṣavat sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ ca //5//
analyzed: tad pūrvakam ca trividham anumānam pūrvvat śeṣavat sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam ca

original: tadapekṣasvarūpayoḥ sapakṣavipakṣayor apy abhāvaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tad apekṣa svarūpayoḥ sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ api abhāvaḥ syāt

original: tad asya pakṣasya sato vipakṣatvam āropya yat tena vyabhicāracodanaṃ tenāgnyanumānam api viplaveta //
analyzed: tat asya pakṣasya sataḥ vipakṣa tvam āropya yat tena vyabhicāra codanam tena agni anumānam api viplaveta

original: nanu parvatādir dharmī na jvalanākhyasādhyadharmaśūnyato tatra niścitaḥ tejo 'vayavī tu anuṣṇatvavaiparītyena pratyakṣato niścita iti tat kim idānīṃ parvatādiḥ agnimattayā niścitaḥ tathābhyupagame vā kim anumānena nanu na parvato 'gnimattayā niścitaḥ nāpi tadvaiparītyena /
analyzed: nanu parvata ādiḥ dharmī na tatra niścitaḥ tejaḥ vayavī tu an uṣṇa tva vaiparītyena pratyakṣataḥ niścitaḥ iti tat kim idānīm parvata ādiḥ agnimat tayā niścitaḥ tathā abhyupagame vā kim anumānena nanu na parvataḥ gnimat tayā niścitaḥ nā api tad vaiparītyena

original: kin tu sandigdha evāste /
analyzed: kin tu sandigdhaḥ eva āste

original: yady evaṃ sandigdhe 'pi vipakṣe vartamāno dhūmādir ahetur eva syāt /
analyzed: yadi evam sandigdhe vipakṣe vartamānaḥ dhūma ādiḥ ahetuḥ eva syāt

original: niścitavipakṣavṛttivat sandigdhavipakṣavṛtter api ahetutvāt sarvam anumānam utsīdet /
analyzed: niścita vipakṣa vṛtti vat sandigdha vipakṣa vṛtteḥ api ahetu tvāt sarvam anumānam utsīdet

original: tasmāt pakṣeṇa vyabhicātacodanam anucitam iti vyatirekavān evāyaṃ hetuḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt pakṣeṇa vyabhicāta codanam anucitam iti vyatirekavān eva ayam hetuḥ

original: yat punar abhihitaṃ anirākṛtapakṣavṛttitvam asya nāstīti tat satyam vayam apy amuṃ pakṣaṃ adhyakṣabādhitam icchāma eva /
analyzed: yat punar abhihitam anirākṛta pakṣa vṛtti tvam asya na asti iti tat satyam vayam api amum pakṣam adhyakṣa bādhitam icchāmaḥ eva

original: sa tu na pakṣamātraparyavasito bādhaḥ kin tu hetum api spṛśati //
analyzed: sa tu na pakṣa mātra paryavasitaḥ bādhaḥ kin tu hetum api spṛśati

original: nahetunirapekṣātmā pakṣo nāmāsti kiś cana /
analyzed: na hetu nirapekṣa ātmā pakṣaḥ nāma asti kim cana

original: prasādhayitum iṣṭo hi hetunā pakṣa ucyate //159//
analyzed: prasādhayitum iṣṭaḥ hi hetunā pakṣaḥ ucyate

original: sa na sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ pratyakṣe pratiyogini /
analyzed: sa na sādhayitum śakyaḥ pratyakṣe pratiyogini

original: sādhyāpahāradvāreṇa hetur bhavati bādhitaḥ //160//
analyzed: sādhya apahāra dvāreṇa hetuḥ bhavati bādhitaḥ

original: abādhitānumeyatvam ata evāsya lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: abādhita anumeya tvam atas eva asya lakṣaṇam

original: na tu hetur asiddho 'yaṃ jvalane vṛttisaṃbhavāt //161//
analyzed: na tu hetuḥ asiddhaḥ yam jvalane vṛtti saṃbhavāt

original: yat tv abādhitatā jñātuṃ śakyā neti vikalpitam /
analyzed: yat tu abādhita tā jñātum śakyā nā iti vikalpitam

original: pakṣasyāpi mahābhāga kathaṃ tāṃ pratipatsyase //162//
analyzed: pakṣasya api mahābhāga katham tām pratipatsyase

original: prayatne kriyamāṇe 'pi yadi bādhā na dṛśyate /
analyzed: prayatne kriyamāṇe yadi bādhā na dṛśyate

original: nāsty evety avagantavyaṃ vyavahāro hi nānyathā //163//
analyzed: na asti evā iti avagantavyam vyavahāraḥ hi na anyathā

original: atas trilakṣaṇe 'pi hetau bādhasaṃbhavād abādhitatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ vaktavyam //
analyzed: atas tri lakṣaṇe pi hetau bādha saṃbhavāt abādhita tvam rūpa antaram vaktavyam

original: evañ ca yad ucyate bādhāvinābhāvayor virodhād iti tat kathañcid yuktaṃ kathañcid ayuktam /
analyzed: evam ca yat ucyate bādhā vinābhāvayoḥ virodhāt iti tat kathañcid yuktam kathañcid ayuktam

original: pañcalakṣaṇake liṅge yaḥ parisamāpto 'vinābhāvaḥ tatra nāsty eva bādha ity evaṃ yuktam etat /
analyzed: pañca lakṣaṇake liṅge yaḥ parisamāptaḥ vinābhāvaḥ tatra na asti eva bādhaḥ iti evam yuktam etat

original: trilakṣaṇakaliṅgābhiprāyeṇa tv ayukataṃ iti //
analyzed: tri lakṣaṇaka liṅga abhiprāyeṇa tu iti

original: evam āgamabādhito 'pi hetur draṣṭavyaḥ /
analyzed: evam āgama bādhitaḥ pi hetuḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: yathā brāhmaṇena surā peyā aduṣṭatvāt kṣīravad iti //
analyzed: yathā brāhmaṇena surā peyā aduṣṭa tvāt kṣīra vat iti

original: nanu pratyakṣāgamaviruddhavad anumānaviruddham anumānaṃ kasmān nodāhriyate asambhavād iti brūmaḥ na hy anumānaviruddham anumānam avakalpate /
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣa āgama viruddha vat anumāna viruddham anumānam kasmāt nā udāhriyate asambhavāt iti brūmaḥ na hi anumāna viruddham anumānam avakalpate

original: anumānayor hi tulyabalayor bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ atulyabalayor vā tatra tulyabalayos tulyabalatvād eva na bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: anumānayoḥ hi tulya balayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ atulya balayoḥ vā tatra tulya balayoḥ tulya bala tvāt eva na bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ

original: samāne hi vīrye kiṃ kasya bādhakam bādhyaṃ vā atulyabalatvapakṣe 'pi yatkṛtam alpabalatvam anyatarasya tata eva tadaprāmāṇyasiddheḥ kim anumānabādhayā tasmān nānumānaviruddham anumānaṃ buddhyāmahe //
analyzed: samāne hi vīrye kim kasya bādhakam bādhyam vā atulya bala tva pakṣe yat kṛtam alpa bala tvam anyatarasya tatas eva tad aprāmāṇya siddheḥ kim anumāna bādhayā tasmāt na anumāna viruddham anumānam buddhyāmahe

original: ata evānumānaviruddham anumānam apaśyatā bhāṣyakāreṇoktam [yat punar anumānaṃ pratyakāgamaviruddhaṃ nyāyābhāsas saḥ] iti //
analyzed: atas eva anumāna viruddham anumānam a paśyatā bhāṣyakāreṇa uktam yat punar anumānam pratyakā āgama viruddham nyāya ābhāsaḥ saḥ iti

original: yatra tu tulyabale dve anumāne nipatataḥ sa satpratipakṣasya viṣayaḥ iti /
analyzed: yatra tu tulya bale dve anumāne nipatataḥ sa sat pratipakṣasya viṣayaḥ iti

original: asatpratipakṣatvaṃ pañcamaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇam upadeśyate //
analyzed: asat pratipakṣa tvam pañcamam liṅga lakṣaṇam upadeśyate

original: nanu vastūnām advirūpatvāt katham ekatra dharmiṇi parasparaviruddhadharmadvayākṣepiprayojakahetudvayasannipāto bhavet /
analyzed: nanu vastūnām a dvi rūpa tvāt katham ekatra dharmiṇi paraspara viruddha dharma dvaya ākṣepi prayojaka hetu dvaya sannipātaḥ bhavet

original: ata eva viruddhāvyabhicārī nāma na hetvābhāsa iheṣyate /
analyzed: atas eva viruddhāvyabhicārī nāma na hetvābhāsaḥ iha iṣyate

original: tad atidurlabhaḥ satpratipakṣo hetur iti kam apahartuṃ pañcamam idaṃ hetulakṣaṇam upadiśyata iti satyam evam kin tu saṃśayabījaṃ yat viśeṣāgrahaṇaṃ tadanyataranirṇayāya bhrāntyā prayujyamānaṃ satpratipadyate sthānur ayaṃ puruṣadharmānupalabdheḥ puruṣo 'yaṃ sthānudharmānupalabdher iti /
analyzed: tat ati durlabhaḥ sat pratipakṣaḥ hetuḥ iti kam apahartum pañcamam idam hetu lakṣaṇam upadiśyate iti satyam evam kin tu saṃśaya bījam yat viśeṣa agrahaṇam tad anyatara nirṇayāya bhrāntyā prayujyamānam sat pratipadyate sthānuḥ ayam puruṣa dharma anupalabdheḥ puruṣaḥ yam sthānu dharma anupalabdheḥ iti

original: anyataraviṣayānupalaṃbha evāyaṃ saṃśayādhāyī pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekopapattibhrameṇa hetur iti prayujyamānaḥ satpratyakṣo bhavatīti prakaraṇasamahetvābhāsacintāyāṃ vistareṇa nirūpayiṣyate /
analyzed: anyatara viṣaya anupalaṃbhaḥ eva ayam saṃśaya ādhāyī pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatireka upapatti bhrameṇa hetuḥ iti prayujyamānaḥ sat pratyakṣaḥ bhavati iti prakaraṇa sama hetvābhāsa cintāyām vistareṇa nirūpayiṣyate

original: puruṣaprajñāpraṃādamūlatvāc ca vastuno dvyātmakatvam iti tatraiva vakṣyate //
analyzed: puruṣa prajñā praṃāda mūla tvāt ca vastunaḥ dvi ātmaka tvam iti tatra eva vakṣyate

original: lakṣaṇāntaramataḥ kathanīyam pratyanekavikalatavam avaśyam /
analyzed: lakṣaṇa antaram atas kathanīyam prati aneka vikala tavam avaśyam

original: tena liṅgim anumānapathajñāḥ pañcalakṣaṇakam abhyupajagmuḥ //163//
analyzed: tena liṅgim anumāna patha jñāḥ pañca lakṣaṇakam abhyupajagmuḥ

original: pañcalakṣakāl liṅgād iti vyākhyātam /
analyzed: pañca lakṣakāt liṅgāt iti vyākhyātam

original: vyāptigrahaṇasamayasamadhigatasvarūpasyāpi liṅgasya punardharmiṇi kvacid anavadhṛtavapuṣo nāsyādhyavasāyasādhanatvam iti dvitīyaṃ liṅgadarśanam evāpekṣaṇīyam iti gṛhītād ity uktam /
analyzed: vyāpti grahaṇa samaya samadhigata svarūpasya api liṅgasya punar dharmiṇi kvacid anavadhṛta vapuṣaḥ na asya adhyavasāya sādhana tvam iti dvitīyam liṅga darśanam eva apekṣaṇīyam iti gṛhītāt iti uktam

original: liṅgaṃ hi jñāpakaṃ na cakṣurādivat kārakam /
analyzed: liṅgam hi jñāpakam na cakṣuḥ ādi vat kārakam

original: jñāpakasya cāyaṃ svabhāvaḥ yat jñātaṃ anu jñāpayatīti /
analyzed: jñāpakasya ca ayam svabhāvaḥ yat jñātam anu jñāpayati iti

original: vyāptigrahaṇakālagṛhītam eva vyāptivat smaryamāṇatayaiva liṅgaṃ liṅginiṃ gamayiṣyatīti cen na grahaṇam antareṇa vyāptismṛter apy abhāvāt ity alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: vyāpti grahaṇa kāla gṛhītam eva vyāpti vat smaryamāṇa tayā eva liṅgam liṅginim gamayiṣyati iti ced na grahaṇam antareṇa vyāpti smṛteḥ api abhāvāt iti alam prasaṅgena

original: niyamasmṛter iti vivriyatāṃ ko 'yaṃ niyamo nāma vyāptiḥ avinābhāvaḥ nityasāhacaryam ity arthaḥ //
analyzed: niyama smṛteḥ iti vivriyatām kaḥ yam niyamaḥ nāma vyāptiḥ avinābhāvaḥ nitya sāhacaryam iti arthaḥ

original: āha naitāvaty eva virantum ucitam /
analyzed: āha na etāvati eva virantum ucitam

original: tasya tadavinābhāvitvam ity atra hi nimittam anveṣaṇīyaṃ tārkikaiḥ //
analyzed: tasya tad avinābhāvi tvam iti atra hi nimittam anveṣaṇīyam tārkikaiḥ

original: tac ca tādātmyatadutpattirūpam īkṣitavanto bhikṣavaḥ /
analyzed: tat ca tādātmya tad utpatti rūpam īkṣitavantaḥ bhikṣavaḥ

original: yo hi yadātmā bhāvaḥ sa kathaṃ tam utsṛjati vṛkṣātmikaiva hi śiṃśapā tena vṛkṣatvam anumāpayati /
analyzed: yaḥ hi yad ātmā bhāvaḥ sa katham tam utsṛjati vṛkṣa ātmikā eva hi śiṃśapā tena vṛkṣa tvam anumāpayati

original: so 'yaṃ svabhāvahetur ucyate vṛkṣo 'yaṃ śiṃśapātvāt iti /
analyzed: saḥ yam svabhāva hetuḥ ucyate vṛkṣaḥ yam śiṃśapā tvāt iti

original: tatra tādātmyaṃ pratibandhaḥ //
analyzed: tatra tādātmyam pratibandhaḥ

original: kārthaṃ nāma kāraṇādhīnātmalābham eva bhavati na kāraṇānapekṣam iti /
analyzed: kārtham nāma kāraṇa adhīna ātmalābham eva bhavati na kāraṇa anapekṣam iti

original: tadupalabhyamānaṃ tadanumāpayati agnir atra dhūmāt iti kāryahetau tadutpattiḥ pratibandhaḥ /
analyzed: tat upalabhyamānam tat anumāpayati agniḥ atra dhūmāt iti kārya hetau tad utpattiḥ pratibandhaḥ

original: evaṃ hi dvividhaṃ pratibandham anumeyāvyabhichāranibandhanam anuktvā kevalasāhacaryaniyamamātravarṇanaṃ yat pādaprasārikā saiveti //
analyzed: evam hi dvividham pratibandham anumeya avyabhichāra nibandhanam an uktvā kevala sāhacarya niyama mātra varṇanam yat pādaprasārikā sā eva iti

original: ucyate pādaprasārikaiva sādhīyasī sthūladṛṣṭibhir avalambitā varaṃ na sūkṣmadṛṣṭibhiḥ utprekṣitāḥ tādātmyādipratibandhāḥ //
analyzed: ucyate pādaprasārikā eva sādhīyasī sthūla dṛṣṭibhiḥ avalambitā varam na sūkṣma dṛṣṭibhiḥ utprekṣitāḥ tādātmya ādi pratibandhāḥ

original: tādātmye tāvadgamakāṅgehetusādhyayor avyatireke gamyagamakabhāva eva durupapādaḥ /
analyzed: tādātmye tāvat gamaka aṅga hetu sādhyayoḥ avyatireke gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ eva durupapādaḥ

original: na khalv agṛhītaṃ liṅgaṃ liṅgipratītim ādhātum arhati /
analyzed: na khalu agṛhītam liṅgam liṅgi pratītim ādhātum arhati

original: tatra liṅgabuddhau liṅgī pratibhāsate na vā apratibhāse tadbaddhyā tadagrahaṇāt kathaṃ tasya tadātmakatvam pratibhāse tu liṅgavat pratyakṣa eva so 'rtha iti kim anumānena viparītasamāropavyavacchedārtham anumānam iti cet tatsvarūpagrahaṇe viparītāropaṇāvasarābhāvāt /
analyzed: tatra liṅga buddhau liṅgī pratibhāsate na vā apratibhāse tad baddhyā tad agrahaṇāt katham tasya tad ātmaka tvam pratibhāse tu liṅga vat pratyakṣaḥ eva saḥ rthaḥ iti kim anumānena viparīta samāropa vyavaccheda artham anumānam iti ced tad svarūpa grahaṇe viparīta āropaṇa avasara abhāvāt

original: na hi śiraḥpāṇyādiviśeṣadarśane sati sthāṇusamāropaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: na hi śiraḥ pāṇi ādi viśeṣa darśane sati sthāṇu samāropaḥ pravartate

original: tatra tadbhedād upapadyetāpi /
analyzed: tatra tad bhedāt upapadyeta api

original: na hi śiraḥpāṇyādaya eva puruṣa iti tadgrahaṇe 'py apuruṣāropaḥ kāmaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: na hi śiraḥ pāṇi ādayaḥ eva puruṣaḥ iti tad grahaṇe pi a puruṣa āropaḥ kāmam bhavet

original: iha vṛkṣatvaśiṃśapātrayor abhedāt śiṃśapātvagrahaṇe sati kā kathā vṛkṣetarasamāropasya api ca vṛkṣatvagrahaṇe sati sāmānyadharmagrahaṇāt viśiṣānadhyavasāyāt kadācid aśiṃśapāropaḥ syāt na tu śiṃśapātvagrahaṇe sati avṛksatvasamāropo yuktaḥ //
analyzed: iha vṛkṣa tva śiṃśapā atrayoḥ abhedāt śiṃśapā tva grahaṇe sati kā kathā vṛkṣa itara samāropasya api ca vṛkṣa tva grahaṇe sati sāmānya dharma grahaṇāt viśiṣā anadhyavasāyāt kadācid a śiṃśapā āropaḥ syāt na tu śiṃśapā tva grahaṇe sati a vṛk sattva samāropaḥ yuktaḥ

original: pramātuḥ śiṃśapātvaṃ hi yasya pratyakṣagocaraḥ /
analyzed: pramātuḥ śiṃśapā tvam hi yasya pratyakṣa gocaraḥ

original: parokṣaṃ tasys vṛkṣatvam iti nātīva laukikam //164//
analyzed: parokṣam tasya vṛkṣa tvam iti na atīva laukikam

original: kiñ ca sādhyasādhanayor avyatirekāt yathā śiṃśapātve ca vṛkṣatvam anumīyate tathā vṛksatvenāpi śiṃśapātvam anumīyate tādātmyāviśeṣāt /
analyzed: kim ca sādhya sādhanayoḥ avyatirekāt yathā śiṃśapā tve ca vṛkṣa tvam anumīyate tathā vṛk satvena api śiṃśapā tvam anumīyate tādātmya aviśeṣāt

original: tathā ca prayatnānantarīyakatvenānityatvaṃ sādyate tadvad anityatvenāpi tatsādhyeta /
analyzed: tathā ca prayatna ānantarīyaka tvena anitya tvam sādyate tadvat anitya tvena api tat sādhyeta

original: tataś ca sapakṣavyāptyavyāptibhyāṃ kṛtakatvaprayatnānantarīyakatvayor yo bhedaḥ uktaḥ sa hīyata //
analyzed: tatas ca sapakṣa vyāpti avyāptibhyām kṛtaka tva prayatna ānantarīyaka tvayoḥ yaḥ bhedaḥ uktaḥ sa hīyata

original: nanu ca anyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ anyaś ca pratibandhaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ca anyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ anyaḥ ca pratibandhaḥ

original: dviṣṭhaḥ sambandhaḥ pratibandhas tu parāyattatvalakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: dviṣṭhaḥ sambandhaḥ pratibandhaḥ tu parāyatta tva lakṣaṇaḥ

original: tatra śiṃśapātvaṃ vṛkṣatve pratibaddham na vṛkṣatvaṃ śiṃśapātve /
analyzed: tatra śiṃśapā tvam vṛkṣa tve pratibaddham na vṛkṣa tvam śiṃśapā tve

original: prayatnānantarīyakatvam api anityatve niyatam na tv anityatvaṃ tatreti /
analyzed: prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam api anitya tve niyatam na tu anitya tvam tatra iti

original: tathā dhūmasyāgnau pratibandhaḥ na tv agner dhūme /
analyzed: tathā dhūmasya agnau pratibandhaḥ na tu agneḥ dhūme

original: satyam evam kin tv evam ucyamāne niyama evāṅgīkṛto bhavet na tādātmyam /
analyzed: satyam evam kin tu evam ucyamāne niyamaḥ evā aṅgīkṛtaḥ bhavet na tādātmyam

original: tādātmye hi yathā śiṃśapā śimśapāṃ vinā na dṛśyate tathā vṛkṣatvam api śiṃśapārahitaṃ na dṛśyate ca khadirādau śiṃśapārahitaṃ vṛkṣatvaṃ vidyudādau ca prayatnānantarīyakatvarahitam anityatvam upalabhyata iti katham abhedaḥ vinā sādhanadharmeṇa sādhyadharmo 'yam asti hi /
analyzed: tādātmye hi yathā śiṃśapā śimśapām vinā na dṛśyate tathā vṛkṣa tvam api śiṃśapā rahitam na dṛśyate ca khadira ādau śiṃśapā rahitam vṛkṣa tvam vidyut ādau ca prayatna ānantarīyaka tva rahitam anitya tvam upalabhyate iti katham abhedaḥ vinā sādhana dharmeṇa sādhya dharmaḥ yam asti hi

original: dṛṣṭas tadvyatirekeṇa tadātmā ceti kaitavam //165//
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ tad vyatirekeṇa tad ātmā ca iti kaitavam

original: atha vidyudādyanityatvād anyad eva ghaṭādyanityatvaṃ yat prayatnānantarīyakatvābhinnam ucyate tarhi dharmibhedena dharmāṇāṃ bhede 'nvayagrahaṇānupapatteḥ sarvam anumānam utsīdet /
analyzed: atha vidyut ādi anitya tvāt anyat eva ghaṭa ādi anitya tvam yat prayatna ānantarīyaka tva abhinnam ucyate tarhi dharmi bhedena dharmāṇām bhede nvaya grahaṇa anupapatteḥ sarvam anumānam utsīdet

original: dhūmāgnyos tu kāryakāraṇayor bhedāt yuktaṃ vaktum dhūmasyāgnau pratibandhaḥ na tv agner dhūme /
analyzed: dhūma agnyoḥ tu kārya kāraṇayoḥ bhedāt yuktam vaktum dhūmasya agnau pratibandhaḥ na tu agneḥ dhūme

original: iha tu sādhyasādhanayor avyatirekāt na tathā śakyate vaktum /
analyzed: iha tu sādhya sādhanayoḥ avyatirekāt na tathā śakyate vaktum

original: tathā 'bhidhāne vā nāvyatirekaḥ /
analyzed: tathā abhidhāne vā na avyatirekaḥ

original: sarvathā tādātmyaṃ vā tyajyatām vṛkṣatvānityatvābhyāṃśiṃśapātvaprayatnānantarīyakatve vāanumīyatām nāntarā 'vasthātuṃ śakyate //
analyzed: sarvathā tādātmyam vā tyajyatām vṛkṣa tva anitya tva ābhyām śiṃśapā tva prayatna ānantarīyaka tve vā anumīyatām na antarā avasthātum śakyate

original: yaś cāyaṃ anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād iti svabhāvahetur udāhṛtaḥ sa kathaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ idaṃ hi cintyatām /
analyzed: yaḥ ca ayam anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti svabhāva hetuḥ udāhṛtaḥ sa katham svabhāva hetuḥ idam hi cintyatām

original: anityatvaṃ nāma kim ucyate kiṃ ca kṛtakatvam iti /
analyzed: anitya tvam nāma kim ucyate kim ca kṛtaka tvam iti

original: tatrānityatvaṃ vināśayogaḥ utpattiyogaś ca kṛtakatvam /
analyzed: tatra anitya tvam vināśa yogaḥ utpatti yogaḥ ca kṛtaka tvam

original: utpannasya ca bhāvasya vināśaḥ na tūtpāda eva vināśa iti kathaṃ sādhyasādhayor avyatirekaḥ atra codayanti vināśayoge hy anityatve vināśī śabda iti buddhiḥ syāt nānitya iti /
analyzed: utpannasya ca bhāvasya vināśaḥ na tu utpādaḥ eva vināśaḥ iti katham sādhya sādhayoḥ avyatirekaḥ atra codayanti vināśa yoge hi anitya tve vināśī śabdaḥ iti buddhiḥ syāt na anityaḥ iti

original: eṣya ca sā mithyā buddhiḥ śikhariṇa iva kṛśānuviśeṣitasya vināśavataḥ śabdasya gṛhītum aśakyatvāt //
analyzed: ca sā mithyā buddhiḥ śikhariṇaḥ iva kṛśānu viśeṣitasya vināśavataḥ śabdasya gṛhītum aśakya tvāt

original: abhāvena hi dharmeṇa tadvattā dharmiṇaḥ katham abhāvagrahavelāyāṃ dharmiṇo 'nupalambhanāt //166//
analyzed: abhāvena hi dharmeṇa tadvat tā dharmiṇaḥ katham abhāva graha velāyām dharmiṇaḥ n upalambhanāt

original: anityatvam iti ca bhāvapratyayaḥ katham abhāve bhavet viruddhatvāt /
analyzed: anitya tvam iti ca bhāva pratyayaḥ katham abhāve bhavet viruddha tvāt

original: tasmād ubhayāntaparicchinnā vastusattā 'nityatvam ucyatām /
analyzed: tasmāt ubhaya anta paricchinnā vastu sattā nitya tvam ucyatām

original: kṛtakatvam api sattaiva kāraṇotpāditā dhārā satī kathyate iti /
analyzed: kṛtaka tvam api sattā eva kāraṇa utpāditā dhārā satī kathyate iti

original: evañ ca sattaiva sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ceti siddhaṃ svabhāvahetutvam //
analyzed: evam ca sattā eva sādhyam sādhanam ca iti siddham svabhāva hetu tvam

original: tad idam anupapannam /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam

original: sādhyasādhanayos tathātvenānavabhāsanāt /
analyzed: sādhya sādhanayoḥ tathātvena anavabhāsanāt

original: evaṃ hy ucyamāne śabdaḥ sattāvān sattāvattvād iti pratītaḥ syāt /
analyzed: evam hi ucyamāne śabdaḥ sattāvān sattāvat tvāt iti pratītaḥ syāt

original: na caivaṃ dṛayate /
analyzed: na ca evam

original: api tu anityaḥ śabdah kṛtakatvād iti //
analyzed: api tu anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti

original: athobhayāntaparicchinnā sattā sādhyā kāraṇanirvartyā ''thayasamavāyinī ca sādhanam ucyate tad etadaghaṭamānam vināśarūpasyāntasya tadānīm avidyamānatvena sattāparicchedakatvābhāvāt //
analyzed: atha ubhaya anta paricchinnā sattā sādhyā kāraṇa nirvartyā ca sādhanam ucyate tat etat aghaṭamānam vināśa rūpasya antasya tadānīm avidyamāna tvena sattā paricchedaka tva abhāvāt

original: buddhisthenātha tenāsyāḥ paricchedo 'bhyupeyate /
analyzed: buddhi sthena atha tena asyāḥ paricchedaḥ bhyupeyate

original: śabdasyaiva paricchedo vināśenāstu tādṛśā //167//
analyzed: śabdasya eva paricchedaḥ vināśena astu tādṛśā

original: dharmaḥ samānakālo 'pi buddhyaiva viṣayīkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: dharmaḥ samāna kālaḥ pi buddhyā eva viṣayīkṛtaḥ

original: tadviśeṣaṇatāṃ yāti tathā bhāvy 'pi yāsyati //168//
analyzed: tad viśeṣaṇa tām yāti tathā bhāvi yāsyati

original: tad evaṃ vināśī śabda iti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasiddheḥ kiṃ sattāsādhyakalpanayā //
analyzed: tat evam vināśī śabdaḥ iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva siddheḥ kim sattā sādhya kalpanayā

original: yat punar abhihitam abhāve bhāvapratyayas tvatalādir na syād iti tad atyantānabhijñasya codyam /
analyzed: yat punar abhihitam abhāve bhāva pratyayaḥ tva tala ādiḥ na syāt iti tat atyanta anabhijñasya codyam

original: śabdapravṛttinimittasya tatra bhāvapratyayenābhidhānāt tasya guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye tacchabdaniveśa iti /
analyzed: śabda pravṛtti nimittasya tatra bhāva pratyayena abhidhānāt tasya guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye tad śabda niveśaḥ iti

original: abhāve 'pi abhāvatvam iti darśanāt /
analyzed: abhāve pi abhāva tvam iti darśanāt

original: tasmāt buddhisthavināśayoga evānityatvam //
analyzed: tasmāt buddhi stha vināśa yogaḥ eva anitya tvam

original: kṛtakatvam apy utpattiyoga eva na sattā /
analyzed: kṛtaka tvam api utpatti yogaḥ eva na sattā

original: kāraṇotpāditāśrayāvacchede tu tasyā iṣyamāṇe dharmina eva tadavacchedo bhavatv iti kiṃ sopānāntareṇa //
analyzed: kāraṇa utpādita āśraya avacchede tu tasyāḥ iṣyamāṇe dharminaḥ eva tad avacchedaḥ bhavatu iti kim sopāna antareṇa

original: nanūtpādavināśākhyaṃ na dharmadvayam anvayi /
analyzed: nanu utpāda vināśa ākhyam na dharma dvayam anvayi

original: yad ghaṭe nāsti tacchabde yac ca śabde na tadghaṭe //139//
