analyzed: yat ghaṭe na asti tat śabde yat ca śabde na tat ghaṭe

original: athaika eva dharmaḥ sarvabhāvasaṃbandhī iṣyeta tarhi ekabhāvasamutpāde sarvotpādaḥ prasajyate /
analyzed: atha ekaḥ eva dharmaḥ sarva bhāva saṃbandhī iṣyeta tarhi eka bhāva samutpāde sarva utpādaḥ prasajyate

original: ekapralayakāle ca sakalapralayo bhavet //170//
analyzed: eka pralaya kāle ca sakala pralayaḥ bhavet

original: tasmāt sattāpakṣa eva varam //
analyzed: tasmāt sattā pakṣaḥ eva varam

original: naitadevam dharmibhede 'pi dharmāṇāṃ tulyarūpāṇāṃ avabhāsāt //
analyzed: na etat evam dharmi bhede dharmāṇām tulya rūpāṇām avabhāsāt

original: na ghaṭādisvarūpaṃ hi nāśa ity avakalpate /
analyzed: na ghaṭa ādi svarūpam hi nāśaḥ iti avakalpate

original: yenānanvayadoṣaḥ syāt tadbhedopanibandhanaḥ //171//
analyzed: yena ananvaya doṣaḥ syāt tad bheda upanibandhanaḥ

original: ekatvam api dharmasya nāsti sarveṣu dharmiṣu /
analyzed: eka tvam api dharmasya na asti sarveṣu dharmiṣu

original: yenaikadhvaṃsasamaye sakaladhvaṃsasaṅkaraḥ //172//
analyzed: yena eka dhvaṃsa samaye sakala dhvaṃsa saṅkaraḥ

original: bhinnatve 'pi ca dharmāṇaṃ samānarūpatvenāvabhāsamānatvāt anvayagrahaṇādikāryāvirodhaḥ /
analyzed: bhinna tve ca dharmāṇam samāna rūpa tvena avabhāsamāna tvāt anvaya grahaṇa ādi kārya avirodhaḥ

original: ata eva sāmānyam antareṇāpi samānadharmamūlānvayādivyavahāropapatteḥ tatra na sūtrakāreṇa sāmānyagrahaṇaṃ kṛtakam /
analyzed: atas eva sāmānyam antareṇa api samāna dharma mūla anvaya ādi vyavahāra upapatteḥ tatra na sūtrakāreṇa sāmānya grahaṇam kṛtakam

original: api tu sādharmyagrahaṇam upāttam [udāharaṇasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ] [sādhyasādharmyāt datdharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam] iti /
analyzed: api tu sādharmya grahaṇam upāttam udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ sādhya sādharmyāt dat dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam iti

original: tena vināsotpādadharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvāt tayoś ca bhedāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād iti na svabhāvahetur iti siddham //
analyzed: tena vināsa utpāda dharmayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvāt tayoḥ ca bhedāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti na svabhāva hetuḥ iti siddham

original: kāryahetur api saṃbhavati /
analyzed: kārya hetuḥ api saṃbhavati

original: bhavatāṃ hi pakṣo kṣaṇayor vā kāryakāraṇabhāvo bhavet santānayor vā kṣaṇayor neti vakṣyāmaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅganirākṛtau /
analyzed: bhavatām hi kṣaṇayoḥ vā kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ bhavet santānayoḥ vā kṣaṇayoḥ na iti vakṣyāmaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga nirākṛtau

original: saṃbhavann Pi durlakṣaḥ sūkṣmatvāc ca tayor asau //173//
analyzed: saṃbhavan durlakṣaḥ sūkṣma tvāt ca tayoḥ asau

original: dhūmāgnisantānayos tu avāstavatvād eva nāsti kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: dhūma agni santānayoḥ tu avāstava tvāt eva na asti kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ

original: arthakriyākāritvam eva vastutvam /
analyzed: arthakriyā kāri tvam eva vastu tvam

original: yadi dhūmaḥ kāryatād analam anumāpayet kaṭumalinagaganagāmitvādidharmair api tasya gamako bhavet /
analyzed: yadi dhūmaḥ kāryatāt analam anumāpayet kaṭu malina gagana gāmi tva ādi dharmaiḥ api tasya gamakaḥ bhavet

original: na ca kathañcit tatkāryatvaṃ kathajcid atatkāryatvaṃ ca dhūmasyopapannam /
analyzed: na ca kathañcid tad kārya tvam kathajcid atatkārya tvam ca dhūmasya upapannam

original: sarvātmakasya tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyiprabhatvāt //
analyzed: sarva ātmakasya tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi prabha tvāt

original: atha sarvātmanā 'pi tatkāryatve dhūmatvamātram evāgnisahacārīti gamyase /
analyzed: atha sarvātmanā pi tad kāryatve dhūma tva mātram evā agni sahacāri iti gamyase

original: sahacāritvam evāstu tadutpattikathā vṛthā //174//
analyzed: sahacāri tvam evā astu tad utpatti kathā vṛthā

original: nanu bhavadbhir api kāryānumānam aṅgīkṛtam eva /
analyzed: nanu bhavadbhiḥ api kārya anumānam aṅgīkṛtam eva

original: yathā [kṣesṣavat] iti vyākhyāsyate /
analyzed: yathā kṣesṣavat iti vyākhyāsyate

original: yathā ''ha kaṇāvrataḥ [kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃyogi samavāyi virodhi ceti laiṅgikam] iti na sāhacaryopalakṣaṇārthatvāt /
analyzed: yathā ha kaṇāvrataḥ kāryam kāraṇam saṃyogi samavāyi virodhi ca iti laiṅgikam iti na sāhacarya upalakṣaṇa ārtha tvāt

original: dhūmāgnyor nadīpūrayor vā na kāryakāraṇabhāvāt gamakatvaṃ yathoktanyāyena api tu nityasāhacaryān niyamād eveti //
analyzed: dhūma agnyoḥ nadīpūrayoḥ vā na kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt gamaka tvam yathā ukta nyāyena api tu nitya sāhacaryāt niyamāt eva iti

original: virodhinoḥ kathaṃ sāhacaryam iti cet sadasator gamyagamakabhāvāt virodhinor ekataradarśanāt anyatarasyābhāvo 'numīyate /
analyzed: virodhinoḥ katham sāhacaryam iti ced sat asatoḥ gamya gamaka bhāvāt virodhinoḥ ekatara darśanāt anyatarasya abhāvaḥ numīyate

original: bhāvābhāvayoś ca sāhacaryaṃ tayor asty eva /
analyzed: bhāva abhāvayoḥ ca sāhacaryam tayoḥ asti eva

original: kaṇādasūtre kāryādigrahaṇaṃ copalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: kaṇāda sūtre kārya ādi grahaṇam ca upalakṣaṇam

original: anyeṣām api hetūnāṃ bhūmnāṃ jagati darśanāt /
analyzed: anyeṣām api hetūnām bhūmnām jagati darśanāt

original: sūryās tam ayam ālokya kalpyate tārakodayaḥ //175//
analyzed: sūryāḥ tam ayam ālokya kalpyate tāraka udayaḥ

original: pūrṇacandrodayād vṛddhir ambudher avagamyate /
analyzed: pūrṇa candra udayāt vṛddhiḥ ambudheḥ avagamyate

original: uditenānumīyante saritaḥ kumbhayoninā //176//
analyzed: uditena anumīyante saritaḥ kumbhayoninā

original: śuṣyatpulinaparyantaviśrāntakhagapaṅktayaḥ /
analyzed: śuṣyat pulina paryanta viśrānta khaga paṅktayaḥ

original: pipīlikāṇḍasajcāraceṣṭānumitavṛṣṭayaḥ //177//
analyzed: pipīlika aṇḍa sat cāra ceṣṭā anumita vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: bhavanti pathikāḥ parṇakuṭīrakaraṇodyatāḥ /
analyzed: bhavanti pathikāḥ parṇa kuṭīrakaraṇa udyatāḥ

original: anye 'pi saugatodgītapratibandhadvayojjhitāḥ //178//
analyzed: anye saugata udgīta pratibandha dvaya ujjhitāḥ

original: kiyanto bata gaṇyante hetavaḥ sādhyabodhakāḥ /
analyzed: kiyantaḥ bata gaṇyante hetavaḥ sādhya bodhakāḥ

original: lokaprasiddhāḥ tādātmyatadutpattyavadhīraṇāt //179//
ḍinbhahevākasadṛśaṃsvamatyā tatsamarthanam /
analyzed: ḍinbha hevāka sadṛśam sva matyā tad samarthanam

original: ataś ca tatsvabhāvas tatkāryam ityādi vyasanamātrakam //180//
analyzed: atas ca tad svabhāvaḥ tad kāryam ityādi vyasana mātrakam

original: api ca vyāvṛttyor liṅgaliṅgitvaṃ pratibandhaś ca vastunoḥ /
analyzed: api ca vyāvṛttyoḥ liṅga liṅgi tvam pratibandhaḥ ca vastunoḥ

original: vikalpair grahanaṃ tasya kathaṃ saṅgacchatām idam //181//
analyzed: vikalpaiḥ grahanam tasya katham saṅgacchatām idam

original: ukataṃ caitat prathama evāhnike ity alaṃ prasaṅgena /
analyzed: ukatam ca etat prathame eva āhnike iti alam prasaṅgena

original: tasmād anumitihetuḥ sambandhaḥ sāhacaryam iti siddham /
analyzed: tasmāt anumiti hetuḥ sambandhaḥ sāhacaryam iti siddham

original: na tu śauddhodaniśisyaparikalpitam ubhayam apy etat //
analyzed: na tu ubhayam api etat

original: yat tv abhyadhīyata paraiḥ kim adhītam asya tatsāhacaryam iti tatra vidhiḥ pramāṇam /
analyzed: yat tu abhyadhīyata paraiḥ kim adhītam asya tad sāhacaryam iti tatra vidhiḥ pramāṇam

original: tādātmyatajjananayor api caiṣa teṣāṃ tulyo 'nuyoga iti kiṃ viphalaiḥ pralāpaiḥ //182//
analyzed: tādātmya tad jananayoḥ api ca eṣa teṣām tulyaḥ nuyogaḥ iti kim viphalaiḥ pralāpaiḥ

original: niyamo vyākhyātaḥ /
analyzed: niyamaḥ vyākhyātaḥ

original: smṛter iti ko 'rthaḥ ucyate niyamo hi gṛhīto 'ṅgaṃ anumeyapramāṃ prati /
analyzed: smṛteḥ iti kaḥ rthaḥ ucyate niyamaḥ hi gṛhītaḥ ṅgam anumeya pramām prati

original: 1 na nārikeladvīpastho dhūmād agniṃ prapadyate //183//
analyzed: na nārikela dvīpa sthaḥ dhūmāt agnim prapadyate

original: sādhyānumitivelāyāṃ na cāsti niyamagrahaḥ /
analyzed: sādhya anumiti velāyām na ca asti niyama grahaḥ

original: niyamagrahakāle ca na sādhyam anumīyate //184//
analyzed: niyama graha kāle ca na sādhyam anumīyate

original: tena pūrvagṛhītas san idānīṃ smṛtigocaraḥ /
analyzed: tena pūrva gṛhītaḥ san idānīm smṛti gocaraḥ

original: niyamaḥ pratipattyaṅgaṃ tathā 'vagatidarśanat //185//
analyzed: niyamaḥ pratipatti aṅgam tathā vagati darśanat

original: dvitīyaliṅgadarśane saty api niyamasmaraṇam antareṇa sādhyapramiter anutpādāt //
analyzed: dvitīya liṅga darśane sati api niyama smaraṇam antareṇa sādhya pramiteḥ anutpādāt

original: yatrāpi viṣaye 'bhyaste naiva sañcetyate smṛtiḥ /
analyzed: yatra api viṣaye bhyaste nā eva sañcetyate smṛtiḥ

original: tatrāpy anena nyāyena balāt sā parikalpyate //183//
analyzed: tatra api anena nyāyena balāt sā parikalpyate

original: ata eva kecana pratyutpannakāraṇajanyāṃ smṛtim evānumānam uktavantaḥ //
analyzed: atas eva kecana pratyutpanna kāraṇa janyām smṛtim eva anumānam uktavantaḥ

original: pratyutpannaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ kutracid dharmiṇi dharmāntarasahacaritaliṅgadarśanam iti parokṣe liṅginīty uktam //
analyzed: pratyutpannam ca kāraṇam kutracid dharmiṇi dharma antara sahacarita liṅga darśanam iti parokṣe liṅgini iti uktam

original: tatra liṅgī tāvad ucyate dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmīṃ sādhyaḥ sa eva liṅgīti /
analyzed: tatra liṅgī tāvat ucyate dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmīm sādhyaḥ saḥ eva liṅgī iti

original: na dharmimātraṃ sādhyam parvatādidharmiṇaḥ siddhatvāt /
analyzed: na dharmi mātram sādhyam parvata ādi dharmiṇaḥ siddha tvāt

original: na dharmamāram /
analyzed: na dharma māram

original: agner api yatra tatra siddhatvāt /
analyzed: agneḥ api yatra tatra siddha tvāt

original: na ca dvayos sādhatvam svatantrayos tayor api siddhatvād eva /
analyzed: na ca dvayoḥ sādha tvam svatantrayoḥ tayoḥ api siddha tvāt eva

original: tasmād ekasya dvayor vā svātantryeṇanumeyatā nāvakalpate ity avaśyam anyataraviśiṣṭo 'nyataraḥ sādhyo vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt ekasya dvayoḥ vā svātantryeṇa anumeya tā na avakalpate iti avaśyam anyatara viśiṣṭaḥ nyataraḥ sādhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: tatrāpi tu dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī sādhyo yuktaḥ na dharmiviśiṣṭo dharmaḥ /
analyzed: tatra api tu dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ yuktaḥ na dharmi viśiṣṭaḥ dharmaḥ

original: tathā hi deśaviśiṣṭe vahnau sādhye ṣoḍaśavikalpāḥ saṃbhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi deśa viśiṣṭe vahnau sādhye ṣoḍaśa vikalpāḥ saṃbhaveyuḥ

original: sarva evāgniḥ sarvadeśaviṣiṣṭaḥ anirdhāritadeśaviśeṣaviśiṣṭaḥ pūrvānubhūtamahānasādideśaviśiṣṭaḥ saṃpratyupalabhyamānaparvatādideśaviśiṣṭo vā anumeyaḥ syāt anirdhāritaviśeṣo vā kaścid agniḥ srvdeśaviśiṣṭaḥ anirdhāritadeśaviśiṣṭaḥ pūrvānubhūtadeśaviśiṣṭaḥ paridṛśyamānadeśaviśiṣṭo vā 'numeyaḥ syāt pūrvānubhuto vāgniḥ sarvadeśaviśiṣṭaḥ anirdhāritadeśaviśiṣṭaḥ prākdṛṣṭadeśaviśiṣṭaḥ upalabhyamānadeśaviśiṣtaḥ anumeyaḥ syāt evaṃ siṣādhayiṣito vā 'gniḥ sarvadeśaviśiṣṭaḥ viśiṣṭo vā 'numeyaḥ iti //
analyzed: sarvaḥ eva agniḥ sarva deśa anirdhārita deśa viśeṣa viśiṣṭaḥ pūrva anubhūta mahānasa ādi deśa viśiṣṭaḥ saṃpratyupalabhyamāna parvata ādi deśa viśiṣṭaḥ vā anumeyaḥ syāt anirdhārita viśeṣaḥ vā kaścid agniḥ sru deśa viśiṣṭaḥ anirdhārita deśa viśiṣṭaḥ pūrva anubhūta deśa viśiṣṭaḥ paridṛśyamāna deśa viśiṣṭaḥ vā numeyaḥ syāt pūrva anubhutaḥ vā agniḥ sarva deśa viśiṣṭaḥ anirdhārita deśa viśiṣṭa

original: tatraite pañcadaśapakṣāḥ pratyakṣavirodhasiddhasādhanatvādidoṣopahatā ity anādaraṇīyā eva //
analyzed: tatra ete pañcadaśa pakṣāḥ pratyakṣa virodha siddha sādhana tva ādi doṣa upahatāḥ iti an ādaraṇīyāḥ eva

original: yaś ca ṣoḍaśaḥ pakṣaḥ etaddeśaviśiṣṭa eṣo 'gnir iti tatrāpi deśaviśeṣāvacchedam antareṇaiva vahnir iti grhītum eva na śakyata eveti prathamaṃ deśa eva gamyate /
analyzed: yaḥ ca ṣoḍaśaḥ pakṣaḥ etad deśa viśiṣṭaḥ eṣaḥ gniḥ iti tatra api deśa viśeṣa avacchedam antareṇa eva vahniḥ iti grhītum eva na śakyate eva iti prathamam deśaḥ eva gamyate

original: tasya ca pūrvapratipannatvāt idānīm anavagatadahanaviśiṣtasyānumātuṃ yogyatvāt sa eva sādhyo yuktaḥ //
analyzed: tasya ca pūrva pratipanna tvāt idānīm anavagata dahana viśiṣtasya anumātum yogya tvāt saḥ eva sādhyaḥ yuktaḥ

original: api cāgneḥ sadhyatāyāṃ anupalabdhataddharmaḥ katham anumapakaḥ syāt anupalabdhe tu jvalane na taddharmatayā dhūmo gṛhītuṃ pāryate /
analyzed: api ca agneḥ sadhya tāyām anupalabdha tad dharmaḥ katham syāt anupalabdhe tu jvalane na tad dharma tayā dhūmaḥ gṛhītum pāryate

original: upalabdhe tu hutabhuji bhavad api niṣphalam eva dhūmasya tadharmatāgrahaṇam /
analyzed: upalabdhe tu hutabhuji bhavat api niṣphalam eva dhūmasya tad dharma tā grahaṇam

original: anumeyasya tadānīm abhāvāt /
analyzed: anumeyasya tadānīm abhāvāt

original: tasmād agniviśiṣṭaḥ paridṛśyamāno deśa eva sādhyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt agni viśiṣṭaḥ paridṛśyamānaḥ deśaḥ eva sādhyaḥ

original: sa ca svarupataḥ pratyakṣo 'pi parokṣadhamaviśiṣṭatayā anumeya iti dhūmadharmayogāt agnidharmavān sa evānumīyate /
analyzed: sa ca svarupataḥ pratyakṣaḥ api parokṣa dhama viśiṣṭa tayā anumeyaḥ iti dhūma dharma yogāt agni dharmavān saḥ eva anumīyate

original: so 'numānasya viṣayo liṅgīty ucyate /
analyzed: saḥ numānasya viṣayaḥ liṅgī iti ucyate

original: parokṣagrahaṇaṃ caitad abhiprāyam eva //
analyzed: parokṣa grahaṇam ca etat abhiprāyam eva

original: kvacit tu vyāptismaraṇasamanantaram eva pratyāsīd ataḥ pramātuḥ jhaṭiti samunmiṣannakasmād eva pratyakṣībhavati vibhāvasur iti na tadviśiṣṭatayā 'pi dharmiṇaḥ parokṣatvam avakalpata iti tadvyāvṛttaye parokṣagrahaṇam /
analyzed: kvacid tu vyāpti smaraṇa samanantaram eva pratyāsīt atas pramātuḥ jhaṭiti samunmiṣan akasmāt eva pratyakṣībhavati vibhāvasuḥ iti na tad viśiṣṭa tayā pi dharmiṇaḥ parokṣa tvam avakalpate iti tad vyāvṛttaye parokṣa grahaṇam

original: nityaparokṣasyāpi ceśvarādṛṣṭendriyāder anumeyatāṃ vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: nitya parokṣasya api ca īśvara adṛṣṭa indriya ādeḥ anumeya tām vakṣyāmaḥ

original: tasmād yathocitāl liṅgāt yathoktaniyamasmṛteḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā ucitāt liṅgāt yathā ukta niyama smṛteḥ

original: yathoktaliṅgivijñānam anumānam iti sthitam //187//
analyzed: yathā ukta liṅgi vijñānam anumānam iti sthitam

original: nanu saty anumanasya prāmāṇye lakṣaṇāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: nanu sati anumanasya prāmāṇye lakṣaṇa āśrayaḥ

original: kāryo vicāraḥ na punaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ tasya yujyate //188//
analyzed: kāryaḥ vicāraḥ na punar prāmāṇyam tasya yujyate

original: tatha cāhuḥ prāmāṇyasyāgauṇatvāt anumānād arthaniścayo durlabhaḥ /
analyzed: ca āhuḥ prāmāṇyasya agauṇa tvāt anumānāt artha niścayaḥ durlabhaḥ

original: pakṣadharādirūpaṃ hi liṅgasya balād gauṇyā vṛttyā darśayitavyam /
analyzed: pakṣa dharā ādi rūpam hi liṅgasya balāt gauṇyā vṛttyā darśayitavyam

original: dharme hi sādhye na hetoḥ paksadharmatvam agnidharmatvāt dhūmasya /
analyzed: dharme hi sādhye na hetoḥ paksa dharma tvam agni dharma tvāt dhūmasya

original: dharmiṇi sādhye hetor ananvayitvam na hi yatra dhūmaḥ tatra parvata ity anvayaḥ /
analyzed: dharmiṇi sādhye hetoḥ ananvayi tvam na hi yatra dhūmaḥ tatra parvataḥ iti anvayaḥ

original: dvaye tu sādhye dvayam api nāsti /
analyzed: dvaye tu sādhye dvayam api na asti

original: na hi dahanamahīdhrayoḥ dhūmo dharmaḥ //
analyzed: na hi dahana mahīdhrayoḥ dhūmaḥ dharmaḥ

original: nāpy evam anvayaḥ yatra dhūmaḥ tatra parvatāgnī iti /
analyzed: na api evam anvayaḥ yatra dhūmaḥ tatra parvata agnī iti

original: dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi sadhye tadubhayam aghaṭamānam eva //
analyzed: dharma viśiṣṭe dharmiṇi sadhye tat ubhayam aghaṭamānam eva

original: napy agniviśiṣtadharādharadharmatayā dhūmaḥ prathamam upalabdhuṃ śakyate //
analyzed: na api agni viśiṣta dharādhara dharma tayā dhūmaḥ prathamam upalabdhum śakyate

original: na cāpy evam anvayaḥ yatra dhūmaḥ tatrāgnimān parvata iti /
analyzed: na ca api evam anvayaḥ yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agnimān parvataḥ iti

original: tasmād avaśyaṃ pakṣadharmatvānvayavyavahārasiddhaye dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi rūḍhaḥ paksaśabdaḥ tadekadeśe tathaiva yojane 'tigauṇalaksaṇatvād indriyārthasannikarṣajatvādivad agauṇalakṣaṇatvābhāvād anumānam apramāṇam //
analyzed: tasmāt avaśyam pakṣa dharma tva anvaya vyavahāra siddhaye dharma viśiṣṭe dharmiṇi rūḍhaḥ paksa śabdaḥ tad eka deśe tathā eva yojane ti gauṇa laksaṇa tvāt indriya artha sannikarṣa ja tva ādi vat agauṇa lakṣaṇa tva abhāvāt anumānam apramāṇam

original: api ca viśeṣe 'nugamābhāvāt sāmānye siddhasādhanāt /
analyzed: api ca viśeṣe nugama abhāvāt sāmānye siddha sādhanāt

original: tadvato 'nupapannatvāt anumānakathā kutaḥ //189//
analyzed: tadvataḥ nupapanna tvāt anumāna kathā kutas

original: sāhacarye ca sambandhe visrambha iti mugdhata /
analyzed: sāhacarye ca sambandhe visrambhaḥ iti

original: śatakṛtvo 'pi taddṛsṭau vyabhicārasya saṃbhavāt //190//
analyzed: śata kṛtvas pi tad dṛsṭau vyabhicārasya saṃbhavāt

original: daśakāladaśābhedavicitrātmasu vastuṣu /
analyzed: daśa kāla daśā bheda vicitra ātmasu vastuṣu

original: avinābhāvaniyamo na śakyo vaktuṃ āha ca //191//
analyzed: avinābhāva niyamaḥ na śakyaḥ vaktum āha ca

original: avasthādeśakālādibhedād bhinnāsu śaktiṣu /
analyzed: avasthā deśa kāla ādi bhedāt bhinnāsu śaktiṣu

original: bhāvānām anumānena prasiddhir atidurlabhā //192//
analyzed: bhāvānām anumānena prasiddhiḥ ati durlabhā

original: bhavann apy avinābhāvaḥ paricchettuṃ na śakyate /
analyzed: bhavan api avinābhāvaḥ paricchettum na śakyate

original: jagattrayagatāśeṣapadārthālocanād vinā //193//
analyzed: jagattraya gata aśeṣa padārtha ālocanāt vinā

original: na pratyakṣīkṛtā yāvaddhūmāgnivyaktayo 'khilāḥ /
analyzed: na pratyakṣīkṛtāḥ yāvat dhūma agni vyaktayaḥ khilāḥ

original: tāvat syād api dhūmo 'sau yo 'nagner iti śaṅkyate //194//
analyzed: tāvat syāt api yaḥ nagneḥ iti śaṅkyate

original: ye tu pratyakṣato viśvaṃ paśyanti hi bhavādṛśāḥ /
analyzed: ye tu pratyakṣatas viśvam paśyanti hi bhavādṛśāḥ

original: kiṃ divyacakṣuṣām eṣām anumānaprayojanam //195//
analyzed: kim divya cakṣuṣām eṣām anumāna prayojanam

original: sāmānyadvārako 'py asti nāvinābhāvaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: sāmānya dvārakaḥ pi asti na avinābhāva niścayaḥ

original: vāstavaṃ hi na sāmānyaṃ nāma kiñcana vidyate //196//
analyzed: vāstavam hi na sāmānyam nāma kiñcana vidyate

original: bhūyodarśanagamyā 'pi na vyāptir avakalpate /
analyzed: bhūyas darśana gamyā pi na vyāptiḥ avakalpate

original: sahasraśo 'pi taddṛṣṭau vyabhicarāvadhāraṇāt //197//
analyzed: sahasraśas tad dṛṣṭau vyabhicara avadhāraṇāt

original: bahukṛtvo 'pi vastvātmā tatheti pariniścitaḥ /
analyzed: vastu ātmā tathā iti pariniścitaḥ

original: deśaklādibhedena dṛśyate punar anyathā //198//
analyzed: deśa klā ādi bhedena dṛśyate punar anyathā

original: bhūyodṛṣṭyā ca dhūmo 'gnisahacārīti gamyatām /
analyzed: bhūyas dṛṣṭyā ca dhūmaḥ gni sahacārī iti gamyatām

original: agnau tu sa nāstīti na bhūyodarśanād gatiḥ //199//
analyzed: agnau tu sa na asti iti na bhūyas darśanāt gatiḥ

original: na cāpi dṛṣṭimātreṇa gamakāḥ sahacāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: na ca api dṛṣṭi mātreṇa gamakāḥ sahacāriṇaḥ

original: tatraiva niyatatvaṃ hi tadanyābhāvapurvakam //200//
analyzed: tatra eva niyata tvam hi tad anya abhāva purvakam

original: niyamaś cānumānāṅgaṃ gṛhītaḥ pratipadyate /
analyzed: niyamaḥ ca anumāna aṅgam gṛhītaḥ pratipadyate

original: grahaṇaṃ cāsya nānyatra nāstitāniścayaṃ vinā //201//
analyzed: grahaṇam ca asya na anyatra nāstitā niścayam vinā

original: darśanādarśanabhyāṃ hi niyamagrahaṇaṃ yadi /
analyzed: darśana a darśanabhyām hi niyama grahaṇam yadi

original: tad apy asat anagnau hi dhūmasyeṣṭam adarśanam //202//
analyzed: tat api asat anagnau hi dhūmasya iṣṭam adarśanam

original: agniś ca kiyān sarvaṃ jagaj jvalanavarjitam /
analyzed: agniḥ ca kiyān sarvam jagat jvalana varjitam

original: tatra dhūmasya nāstitvaṃ naiva paśyanty ayoginaḥ //203//
analyzed: tatra dhūmasya nāstitvam nā eva paśyanti ayoginaḥ

original: tad evaṃ niyamābhāvāt sati vā jñāptyasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: tat evam niyama abhāvāt sati vā jñāpti asaṃbhavāt

original: anumānapramāṇatvadurāśā parimucyatām //204//
analyzed: anumāna pramāṇa tva durāśā parimucyatām

original: anumānavirodho 'pi yadi ceṣṭavighātakṛt /
analyzed: anumāna virodhaḥ yadi ca iṣṭa vighāta kṛt

original: viruddhāvyabhicāro vā sarvatra sulabhodayaḥ //205//
analyzed: viruddha avyabhicāraḥ vā sarvatra sulabha udayaḥ

original: ata evānumānānām apaśyantaḥ pramāṇatām /
analyzed: atas eva anumānānām a paśyantaḥ pramāṇa tām

original: tadvisraṃbhaniṣedhārthaṃ idam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ //206//
analyzed: tad visraṃbha niṣedha artham idam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: hastasparśādināndhena viṣame pathi dhāvatā /
analyzed: hasta sparśa ādinā andhena viṣame pathi dhāvatā

original: anumānapradhānena vinipāto na durlabhaḥ //207//
analyzed: anumāna pradhānena vinipātaḥ na durlabhaḥ

original: api ca yatnenānumito 'py arthaḥ kuśalair anumātṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: api ca yatnena anumitaḥ u pi arthaḥ kuśalaiḥ anumātṛbhiḥ

original: abhiyuktarair anyair anyathaivopapādyate //208//
analyzed: abhiyuktaraiḥ anyaiḥ anyathā eva upapādyate

original: atrābhidīyate kim ayam anumānasvarūpākṣepa eva kriyate uta tattattārkikopalakṣitatallakṣanākṣepaḥ iti //
analyzed: atra abhidīyate kim ayam anumāna svarūpa ākṣepaḥ eva kriyate uta tad tad tārkika upalakṣita tad lakṣana ākṣepaḥ iti

original: tatrānumānasvarūpaṃ cāśakyanihnavam eva sarvalokaprasiddhatvāt //
analyzed: tatra anumāna svarūpam ca aśakya nihnavam eva sarva loka prasiddha tvāt

original: abalābalagopālahālikapramukhā api /
analyzed: abala abala gopāla hālika pramukhāḥ api

original: buddhyante niyatād arthāt arthāntaram asaṃśayam //209//
analyzed: buddhi ante niyatāt arthāt artha antaram asaṃśayam

original: anumānāpalāpe tupratyakṣād api durlabhā /
analyzed: anumāna apalāpe tu pratyakṣāt api durlabhā

original: lokayātreti lokāḥ syuḥ likhitā iva niścalāḥ //210//
analyzed: lokayātrā iti lokāḥ syuḥ likhitāḥ iva niścalāḥ

original: pratyakṣadṛṣṭam api padārthajātaṃ tajjātīyatvaliṅgavyāpareṇa sukhasādhanaṃ itarakāraṇam iti vā niścitya tadupādadate jahati vā laukikāḥ //
analyzed: pratyakṣa dṛṣṭam api padārtha jātam tad jātīya tva liṅga vyāpareṇa sukha sādhanam itara kāraṇam iti vā niścitya tat upādadate jahati vā laukikāḥ

original: athāvicāritaram aṇīyataiva tattvaṃ na tu lakṣaṇaniyamaḥ śakyakriyas tasyeti lakṣaṇākṣepo 'yam ucyate so 'py ayuktaḥ /
analyzed: atha avicāritaram aṇīya tā eva tattvam na tu lakṣaṇa niyamaḥ śakya kriyaḥ tasya iti lakṣaṇa ākṣepaḥ yam ucyate saḥ pi ayuktaḥ

original: yataḥ yaṃ kañcid artham ālokya yaḥ kaścin nāvagamyate /
analyzed: yatas yam kañcid artham ālokya yaḥ kaścid na avagamyate

original: kañcid evāksipaty artham arthaḥ kaścid iti sthitiḥ //211//
analyzed: kañcid eva āksipati artham arthaḥ kaścid iti sthitiḥ

original: tatra vastisvabhāvo 'yam iti pādaprasārikā /
analyzed: tatra vasti svabhāvaḥ yam iti pādaprasārikā

original: dṛśyate hy avinābhūtād arthād arthāntare matiḥ //212//
analyzed: dṛśyate hi a vinābhūtāt arthāt artha antare matiḥ

original: ato yaddarśanād yatra pratītir upajāyate /
analyzed: atas yad darśanāt yatra pratītiḥ upajāyate

original: tayor asty arthayoḥ kaścit sambandha iti manmahe //213//
analyzed: tayoḥ asti arthayoḥ kaścid sambandhaḥ iti manmahe

original: tadātmatātadutpattī na śraddadhati tadvidaḥ /
analyzed: tad ātma tā tad utpattī na śraddadhati tad vidaḥ

original: sāhacaryaṃ tu sambandha iti no hṛdayaṅgamam //214//
analyzed: sāhacaryam tu sambandhaḥ iti no hṛdayaṅgamam

original: tasmin saty eva bhavanaṃ na vinā bhavanaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: tasmin sati eva bhavanam na vinā bhavanam tatas

original: ayam evāvinābhāvo niyamaḥ sahacāritā //215//
analyzed: ayam eva avinābhāvaḥ niyamaḥ sahacāri tā

original: kiṃkṛto niyamo 'syāsminn iti ced evam uttaram //
analyzed: kiṃkṛtaḥ sya asmin iti ced evam uttaram

original: tadātmatādipakṣo 'pi naiṣa praśno nivartate //216//
analyzed: na eṣa praśnaḥ nivartate

original: jvalanāj jāyate dhūmaḥ na jalād iti kā gatiḥ /
analyzed: jvalanāt jāyate dhūmaḥ na jalāt iti kā gatiḥ

original: evam evaitad iti cet sāhacarye 'pi tatsamam //217//
analyzed: evam eva etat iti ced sāhacarye tat samam

original: tarkasya yāvān viṣayaḥ sa tāvati nirūpyate /
analyzed: tarkasya yāvān viṣayaḥ sa tāvati nirūpyate

original: vastusvabhāvabhede tu na tasya prabhaviṣṇutā //218//
analyzed: vastu svabhāva bhede tu na tasya prabhaviṣṇu tā

original: ayaṃ ca viṣayo yukteḥ yaduktaṃ niyamād vinā /
analyzed: ayam ca viṣayaḥ yukteḥ yat uktam niyamāt vinā

original: nārthād arthāntare jñānaṃ atas tasya prakalpanam //219//
analyzed: na arthāt artha antare jñānam atas tasya prakalpanam

original: tataḥ paraṃ tu niyamo 'py eṣa kiṃkṛtaḥ iti na yuktiḥ prabhavati /
analyzed: tatas param tu eṣa kiṃkṛtaḥ iti na yuktiḥ prabhavati

original: tādātmyatadutpattyor anupapannatvāt /
analyzed: tādātmya tad utpattyoḥ anupapanna tvāt

original: ato niyama eva viramyte //
analyzed: atas niyamaḥ eva viramyte

original: na ca pratibhāmātram ānumānikī pramitir iti vaktuṃ yuktam niyatāt kutaścid eva vastuni pratītidarśanād ity uktatvāt niyamaś ca yady agṛhīta eva pratītyaṅaṃ bhavet nārikeladvīpavāsibhir api dhūmadarśanāt kṛśānur anumīyate /
analyzed: na ca pratibhā mātram ānumānikī pramitiḥ iti vaktum yuktam niyatāt kutaścid eva vastuni pratīti darśanāt iti ukta tvāt niyamaḥ ca yadi agṛhītaḥ eva bhavet nārikela dvīpa vāsibhiḥ api dhūma darśanāt kṛśānuḥ anumīyate

original: na caivam astīti niyamagrahaṇam apekṣaṇīyam //
analyzed: na ca evam asti iti niyama grahaṇam apekṣaṇīyam

original: yac ca vikalpitaṃ aśakyaṃ tadgrahaṇam iti tatra kecid ācakṣate mānasaṃ pratyaksaṃ pratibandhagrāhīti /
analyzed: yat ca vikalpitam aśakyam tat grahaṇam iti tatra kecid ācakṣate mānasam pratyaksam pratibandha grāhi iti

original: pratyakṣānupalaṃbhābhyāṃ analasahacaritam agneś ca vyāvartamānaṃ dhūmam upalabhya vibhāv asau niyato dhūma iti manasā pratipadyate //
analyzed: pratyakṣa anupalaṃbhābhyām anala sahacaritam agneḥ ca vyāvartamānam dhūmam upalabhya vibhau asau niyataḥ dhūmaḥ iti manasā pratipadyate

original: manaś ca sarvaviṣayaṃ kena vā nābhyupeyate /
analyzed: manaḥ ca sarva viṣayam kena vā na abhyupeyate

original: asannihitam apy artham avdhārayituṃ kṣamam //220//
analyzed: asannihitam api artham ap dhārayitum kṣamam

original: na ca sakalatribhuvanavivaraniruddhadhūmāgnivyaktisārthasākṣātkaraṇam upayujyate jvalanatvādisāmānyapuraśaratayā vyāptigrahaṇāt //
analyzed: na ca sakala tribhuvana vivara niruddha dhūma agni vyakti sārtha sākṣātkaraṇam upayujyate jvalana tva ādi sāmānya pura śara tayā vyāpti grahaṇāt

original: yat tūktaṃ sāmānyaṃ vāstavaṃ nāstīti tat śabdārthacintāprasaṅge pratisamādhāsyate //
analyzed: yat tu uktam sāmānyam vāstavam na asti iti tat śabda artha cintā prasaṅge pratisamādhāsyate

original: apare punaḥ yogipratyakṣakalpaṃ yauktikaṃ sambandhagrāhi pratyakṣaṃ pratipedire kila /
analyzed: apare punar yogi pratyakṣa kalpam yauktikam sambandha grāhi pratyakṣam pratipedire kila

original: dhūmatvāgnitvasāmānyapuraskāreṇa vyāpyavyāpakayor anvayo nāma gṛhyatām vyatirekas tv anagnibhyaḥ dhūmasya grahītavyaḥ /
analyzed: dhūma tva agni tva sāmānya puraskāreṇa vyāpya vyāpakayoḥ anvayaḥ nāma gṛhyatām vyatirekaḥ tu anagnibhyaḥ dhūmasya grahītavyaḥ

original: anagnayaś cātivitatāḥ /
analyzed: an agnayaḥ ca ati vitatāḥ

original: na ca teṣv anagnitvaṃ nāma sāmānyam asti /
analyzed: na ca teṣu anagni tvam nāma sāmānyam asti

original: tena samas tatrailokyāntargatāgnyanagnigatānvayavyatirekagrāhipratyakṣavyatirekeṇa na pratibandho 'vadhṛto bhavet /
analyzed: tena samaḥ tad trailokya antargata agni anagni gata anvaya vyatireka grāhi pratyakṣa vyatirekeṇa na pratibandhaḥ bhavet

original: anavadhṛtaś ca na pramāṅgam /
analyzed: an avadhṛtaḥ ca na pramā aṅgam

original: asti ca prameti yuktibalāt pratibandhagrāhakam ekasmin kṣaṇe pratyakṣam idam aśeṣavyaktiviṣayam asaṃvedyamānam api kalpitam iti yauktikam ucyate //
analyzed: asti ca pramā iti yukti balāt pratibandha grāhakam ekasmin kṣaṇe pratyakṣam idam aśeṣa vyakti viṣayam asaṃvedyamānam api kalpitam iti yauktikam ucyate

original: anye punaḥ ata eva tatkalpanābhayāt bhūyodarśanaparicchinnasāmānyapuraśarānvayam anapekṣitavyatirekaniścayam eva liṅgaṃ gamakam abhyupāgaman /yathoktam [mama tvaddṛṣṭimātreṇa gamakāḥ sahacāriṇaḥ] iti //
analyzed: anye punar atas eva tad kalpanā bhayāt bhūyas darśana paricchinna sāmānya pura śara anvayam an apekṣita vyatireka niścayam eva liṅgam gamakam abhyupāgaman yathā uktam mama tvad dṛṣṭi mātreṇa gamakāḥ sahacāriṇaḥ iti

original: ayam āśayaḥ bhūyodarśanatas tāvat udeti matirīdṛśī /
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ bhūyas darśanataḥ tāvat udeti matiḥ īdṛśī

original: niyato 'yam aneneti sakalaprāṇisāksikā //221//
analyzed: niyataḥ yam anena iti sakala prāṇi sāksikā

original: tāvatā ca gamakatvam autsrgikaṃ siddhyati /
analyzed: tāvatā ca gamaka tvam autsrgikam siddhi ati

original: mīmāṃsakānāṃ tu vipakṣe darśanaṃ bādhakaḥ pratyayaḥ /
analyzed: mīmāṃsakānām tu vipakṣe darśanam bādhakaḥ pratyayaḥ

original: na ca so 'sti nādya yāvad anagnau dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: na ca saḥ sti na adya yāvat anagnau dhūmaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: anutpanne 'pi bādhake tadāśaṅkanam ayuktam ity uktaṃ taiḥ [doṣajñāne tv anutpanne na śaṅkyā niṣpramāṇatā] iti //
analyzed: anutpanne pi bādhake tad āśaṅkanam ayuktam iti uktam taiḥ doṣa jñāne tu anutpanne na śaṅkyā niṣpramāṇa tā iti

original: etat tu na cāru /
analyzed: etat tu na cāru

original: vyatirekaniścayam antarena pratibandhagrahaṇānupa patter ity uktatvāt /
analyzed: vyatireka niścayam antarena pratibandha grahaṇa anupa patteḥ iti ukta tvāt

original: jñāpakatvād dhi niyamaḥ svagrahaṇam apekṣate /
analyzed: jñāpaka tvāt hi niyamaḥ sva grahaṇam apekṣate

original: niyamaś cāyam ucyate /
analyzed: niyamaḥ ca ayam ucyate

original: yat tasmin sati bhavanaṃ tato vinā na bhavanam iti /
analyzed: yat tasmin sati bhavanam tatas vinā na bhavanam iti

original: bhūyodarśanataś ca tasmin sati bhavanam ity anvayamātraparicchedād ardhagṛhīto niyamaḥ syāt tato vinā na bhavanam ity asyārthasyāparicchedād iti //
analyzed: bhūyas darśanataḥ ca tasmin sati bhavanam iti anvaya mātra paricchedāt ardha gṛhītaḥ niyamaḥ syāt tatas vinā na bhavanam iti asya arthasya aparicchedāt iti

original: apare punaḥ anagnitvasāmānyam antareṇāpi yogipratyakṣakalpanām akurvanta eva mānasapratyakṣagamyam anvayavyatirekam āhuḥ /
analyzed: apare punar anagni tva sāmānyam antareṇa api yogi pratyakṣa kalpanām akurvantaḥ eva mānasa pratyakṣa gamyam anvaya vyatirekam āhuḥ

original: dhūmāgnisāmānye tāvat sahacarite upalabdhe tadvat tadabhāvāv api sahacaritāv upalabhyete eva /
analyzed: dhūma agni sāmānye tāvat sahacarite upalabdhe tadvat tad abhāvau api sahacaritau upalabhyete eva

original: dhūmatvasāmānyasyānagnau jalādav adarśanāt /
analyzed: dhūma tva sāmānyasya anagnau jala ādau adarśanāt

original: sarvagatatve 'pi sāmānyānāṃ vṛttibhedo niyāmaka iti vakṣyate //
analyzed: sarvagata tve pi sāmānyānām vṛtti bhedaḥ niyāmakaḥ iti vakṣyate

original: yady api cānagnitvaādyabhāvasāmānyaṃ nāsti tathā 'pi pratiṣedhyāgnitvasāmānyānugamasiddhyaiva tadabhāvānugamagrahaṇaṃ siddhyati //
analyzed: yadi api ca anagni tva ādi abhāva sāmānyam na asti tathā pratiṣedhya agni tva sāmānya anugama siddhyā eva tad abhāva anugama grahaṇam siddhi ati

original: sakalavyaktivijñānam anaṅgaṃ vyāptiniścaye /
analyzed: sakala vyakti vijñānam anaṅgam vyāpti niścaye

original: bhāvasāmānyayor yadvad tathaiva tadbhāvayoḥ //222//
analyzed: bhāva sāmānyayoḥ yadvat tathā eva tad bhāvayoḥ

original: bhāvayoḥ sāhacaryaṃ yat anvayaṃ tat pracakṣate /
analyzed: bhāvayoḥ sāhacaryam yat anvayam tat pracakṣate

original: vyatirekaṃ tu manyante sāhityaṃ tadabhāvayoḥ //223//
analyzed: vyatirekam tu manyante sāhityam tad abhāvayoḥ

original: sādhyasādhanabhāvas tu bhaved yatrāpy abhāvayoḥ /
analyzed: sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ tu bhavet yatra api abhāvayoḥ

original: tayor evānvayas tatra vyatirekas tu bhavayoḥ //224//
analyzed: tayoḥ evā anvayaḥ tatra vyatirekaḥ tu bhavayoḥ

original: tad evam abhāvānvayavad bhāvavyatireko 'pi pratyakṣagamyo bhavaty eva //
analyzed: tat evam abhāva anvaya vat bhāva vyatirekaḥ pi pratyakṣa gamyaḥ bhavati eva

original: iyān eva viśeṣas tu bhāvayor yādṛśī yayoḥ /
analyzed: iyān eva viśeṣaḥ tu bhāvayoḥ yādṛśī yayoḥ

original: vyāpyavyāpakatā saiva vyatyastā tadabhāvayoḥ //225//
analyzed: vyāpya vyāpaka tā sā eva vyatyastā tad abhāvayoḥ

original: abhāvayos tu gamyagamakabhāve bhāvayor vyāptivyatyayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
analyzed: abhāvayoḥ tu gamya gamaka bhāve bhāvayoḥ vyāpti vyatyayaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: evañ ca pratiṣedhyānugamapūrvakasāmānyābhāvadvayānugamapratyayopapatteḥ anvayavyatirekaniścaye 'pi na yogipratyaksam upayujyate bhavābhāvsāhacaryam avadhāryaṃ manasā niyamajñānasiddher ity alaṃ nirvandhena //
analyzed: evam ca pratiṣedhya anugama pūrvaka sāmānya abhāva dvaya anugama pratyaya upapatteḥ anvaya vyatireka niścaye na upayujyate bhava abhāv sāhacaryam avadhāryam manasā niyama jñāna siddheḥ iti alam nirvandhena

original: tasmāt niyamavat tadgrahaṇopāyo 'py astīti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt niyama vat tad grahaṇa upāyaḥ u pi asti iti siddham

original: gṛhīte niyame yāvat punaḥ kvacid dharmiṇi dhūmāder liṅgasya grahaṇāṃ na vṛttaṃ tāvan na bhavati liṅgino 'vagatir iti sambandhagrahaṇakālāpekṣayā dvitīyaṃ talliṅadarśanam apekṣītavyam /
analyzed: gṛhīte niyame yāvat punar kvacid dharmiṇi dhūma ādeḥ liṅgasya na vṛttam tāvat na bhavati liṅginaḥ vagatiḥ iti sambandha grahaṇa kāla apekṣayā dvitīyam apekṣītavyam

original: saiveyaṃ pakṣadharmatocyate /
analyzed: sā evā iyam pakṣa dharma tā ucyate

original: pakṣadharmānvyavyatirekaniścaye saty api pratyakṣāgamavirodhena pratipakṣopanipātena vā na gamakatvam iti tadaparṃ lakṣaṇadvayam upadiṣṭaṃ abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ asatpratipakṣatvaṃ ceti /
analyzed: pakṣa dharma anvya vyatireka niścaye sati api pratyakṣa āgama virodhena pratipakṣa upanipātena vā na gamaka tvam iti tad aparam lakṣaṇa dvayam upadiṣṭam abādhita viṣaya tvam asat pratipakṣa tvam ca iti

original: tadevam anubhavasiddhatvāt anumānasvarūpam iva tasya lakṣaṇām api tāntrikakathitam apratyākhyeyam //
analyzed: tat evam anubhava siddha tvāt anumāna svarūpam iva tasya lakṣaṇām api tāntrika kathitam apratyākhyeyam

original: api ca yadi tāntrikaviracitam avācakaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tat svayam anavadyam āvedyatām /
analyzed: api ca yadi tāntrika viracitam avācakam lakṣaṇam tat svayam anavadyam āvedyatām

original: na tu taddoṣeṇa lakṣyam apy anumānaṃ nihnotuṃ yuktam //
analyzed: na tu tad doṣeṇa lakṣyam api anumānam nihnotum yuktam

original: yat punar abhāṇi pramāṇāsyāgauṇatvād anumānād arthaniścayo durlabha iti tan na buddhyāmahe na hi pramāṇasya kiñcid gauṇātvam iha paśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: yat punar abhāṇi pramāṇa asya agauṇa tvāt anumānāt artha niścayaḥ durlabhaḥ iti tat na buddhyāmahe na hi pramāṇasya kiñcid gauṇā tvam iha paśyāmaḥ

original: pakṣadharmādipadāni yadi nāma vyākhyātṛbhiḥ gauṇāni prayuktāni kim etāvatā pramāṇaṃ gauṇībhavet /
analyzed: pakṣa dharma ādi padāni yadi nāma vyākhyātṛbhiḥ gauṇāni prayuktāni kim etāvatā pramāṇam gauṇībhavet

original: śabdāntareṇa hi tallakṣaṇābhidhāne na kaścidgauṇatādipramādaḥ //
analyzed: śabda antareṇa hi tad lakṣaṇa abhidhāne na kaścid gauṇa tā ādi pramādaḥ

original: yad apy avādi [viśeṣe 'nugamābhāvāt sāmānye siddhasādhanāt] iti tad apy asādhu sādhyasya mattvarthasya dārśitatvāt //
analyzed: yat api avādi viśeṣe nugama abhāvāt sāmānye siddhasādhanāt iti tat api asādhu sādhyasya mattu arthasya dārśita tvāt

original: yad api [avasthādeśakālabhedāt] ity abhyadhāyi tad api na bhayāvaham samyagavadhṛtāyāṃ vyāptau viplavābhāvāt /
analyzed: yat api avasthā deśa kāla bhedāt iti abhyadhāyi tat api na bhaya āvaham samyak avadhṛtāyām vyāptau viplava abhāvāt

original: pramātur eva tatrāparādhaḥ nānumānasyeti //
analyzed: pramātuḥ eva tatra aparādhaḥ na anumānasya iti

original: yad api vyāhāri viruddhānumānavirodhayoḥ sarvatra saṃbhavāt kutracic ca viruddhāvyabhicāriṇi iṣṭavighātakṛtaś ca sulabhatvād iti tad apy ālajālam prayojakahetau prayukte saty evaṃprāyāṇām anavakāśatvāt //
analyzed: yat api vyāhāri viruddha anumāna virodhayoḥ sarvatra saṃbhavāt kutracid ca viruddha avyabhicāriṇi iṣṭa vighāta kṛtaḥ ca sulabha tvāt iti tat api āla jālam prayojaka hetau prayukte sati evaṃprāyāṇām anavakāśa tvāt

original: sadvitīyaprayogās tu na bhavanti prayojakāḥ /
analyzed: sa dvitīya prayogāḥ tu na bhavanti prayojakāḥ

original: utprekṣāmātramūlatvād dhetvābhāsā bhavanti te iti vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: utprekṣā mātra mūla tvāt hetvābhāsāḥ bhavanti te iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: na viśeṣaviruddhaś ca na cāstīṣṭavighātakṛt /
analyzed: na viśeṣa viruddhaḥ ca na ca asti iṣṭa vighāta kṛt

original: hetau supratibaddhe hi naitāḥ santi viḍambanāḥ //227//
analyzed: hetau su pratibaddhe hi na etāḥ santi viḍambanāḥ

original: tādṛśā cānumāne puṃṣo 'rtham adhigacchataḥ /
analyzed: tādṛśā ca anumāne puṃsaḥ ṛtham adhigacchataḥ

original: nāndhena tulyatā hastasparśānumitavartmanā //228//
analyzed: na andhena tulya tā hasta sparśa anumita vartmanā

original: yatnenānumito yo 'rthaḥ kuśalais anumātṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: yatnena anumitaḥ yaḥ ṛthaḥ kuśalaiḥ anumātṛbhiḥ

original: abhiyogaśatenāpi so 'nyathā nopapādyate //
analyzed: abhiyoga śatena api saḥ nyathā nā upapādyate

original: suśikṣitatarāḥ prāhuḥ dvividham anumānam kiñcit utpannapratīti kiñcid utpādyapratīti /
analyzed: suśikṣitatarāḥ prāhuḥ dvividham anumānam kiñcid utpanna pratīti kiñcid utpādya pratīti

original: īśvarādyanumānaṃ tūtpādyapratīti //
analyzed: īśvara ādi anumānam tu utpādya prati iti

original: tatra dhūmānumānādeḥ prāmāṇyaṃ kena neṣyate ato hi sādhyaṃ buddhyante tārkikair akṣatā api //230//
analyzed: tatra dhūma anumāna ādeḥ prāmāṇyam kena nā iṣyate atas hi sādhyam buddhi ante tārkikaiḥ akṣatāḥ api

original: yat tv ātmeśvarasarvajñaparalokādigocaram /
analyzed: yat tu ātma īśvara sarvajña para loka ādi gocaram

original: anumānaṃ na tasyeṣṭaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tat tv adarśibhiḥ //231//
analyzed: anumānam na tasya iṣṭam prāmāṇyam tat tu adarśibhiḥ

original: ṛjūnāṃ jāyate tasmāt na tāvad anumeyadhīḥ /
analyzed: ṛjūnām jāyate tasmāt na tāvat anumeya dhīḥ

original: yāvat kuṭilitaṃ ceto na teṣāṃ viṭatārkikaiḥ //232//
analyzed: yāvat kuṭilitam cetaḥ na teṣām viṭa tārkikaiḥ

original: evaṃ tu kathayadbhis taiḥ paraṃ nāstikyam ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: evam tu kathayadbhiḥ taiḥ param nāstikyam ātmanaḥ

original: khyāpyate sma jaḍatvaṃ vā nānumānāpramāṇatā //233//
analyzed: khyāpyate sma jaḍa tvam vā na anumāna apramāṇa tā

original: na hia sambandhagrahaṇopāyavaicitryād apramāṇātā bhavitum arhati //
analyzed: na hi a sambandha grahaṇa upāya vaicitryāt apramāṇātā bhavitum arhati

original: āgamenānumānena tarkavyutpādanena vā /
analyzed: āgamena anumānena tarka vyutpādanena vā

original: pratyakṣeṇa gṛhīto vā sambandho na viśiṣyatee //234//
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītaḥ vā sambandhaḥ na viśiṣyate

original: īśvarādyanumānānāṃ tatprasaṅge savistam /
analyzed: īśvara ādi anumānānām tad prasaṅge sa vistam

original: draḍhimānaṃ ca vakṣyāmaḥ ity alaṃ bahubhāṣitaiḥ //235//
analyzed: draḍhimānam ca vakṣyāmaḥ iti alam bahu bhāṣitaiḥ

original: pramāṇam upagamyatāṃ tadanumānam evaṃvidhaiḥ aviplutaparākramaṃ bhavadudīritair dūṣaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: pramāṇam upagamyatām tat anumānam evaṃvidhaiḥ avipluta parākramam bhavat udīritaiḥ dūṣaṇaiḥ

original: anabhyupagame punarvigataceṣṭītāḥ prāṇīnaḥ bhaveyur upalopamā iti hi pūrvam āveditam //236//
analyzed: an abhyupagame punar vigata ceṣṭītāḥ prāṇīnaḥ bhaveyuḥ upala upamāḥ iti hi pūrvam āveditam

original: athedānīṃ sūtram anusarāmaḥ /
analyzed: atha idānīm sūtram anusarāmaḥ

original: tatpūrvkam ityādi /
analyzed: tad pūrvkam ityādi

original: anumānam iti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ /
analyzed: anumānam iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ

original: tatpūrvakam iti lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: tad pūrvakam iti lakṣaṇam

original: tad iti sarvanāmnā prakrāntaṃ pratyakṣam avamṛśyate /
analyzed: tat iti sarvanāmnā prakrāntam pratyakṣam avamṛśyate

original: tat pūrvaṃ kāraṇāṃ yasya tat tatpūrvakaṃ //
analyzed: tat pūrvam kāraṇām yasya tat tad pūrvakam

original: etāvaty ucyamāne nirṇāyopamānādau tatpūrvake prasaṅgo na vyāvartata iti tadvyāvṛttaye dvivacanāntena vigraḥ pradarśayitavyaḥ te dve pratyakṣe pūrvaṃ yasyeti /
analyzed: etāvati ucyamāne nirṇāya upamāna ādau tad pūrvake prasaṅgaḥ na vyāvartate iti tad vyāvṛttaye dvivacana antena vigraḥ pradarśayitavyaḥ te dve pratyakṣe pūrvam yasya iti

original: yad ekaṃ avinābhāvipratyakṣaṃ vyākhyātaṃ tac ca dvitīyaṃ liṅgadarśanaṃ te dve pratyakṣe anumānasyaiva kāraṇam nopamānādeḥ /
analyzed: yat ekam avinābhāvi pratyakṣam vyākhyātam tat ca dvitīyam liṅga darśanam te dve pratyakṣe anumānasya eva kāraṇam na upamāna ādeḥ

original: tatra pratibandhagrāhi pratyakṣaṃ smaraṇādvāreṇa tatkāraṇam liṅgadarśanaṃ tu svata eva //
analyzed: tatra pratibandha grāhi pratyakṣam smaraṇā dvāreṇa tad kāraṇam liṅga darśanam tu svatas eva

original: nanu pratyakṣamātrasya prakṛtatvāt prakṛtāvamarśitvāc ca sarvanāmnaḥ kuto 'yaṃ viśeṣapratilābhaḥ ucyate udāharaṇāsādharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetur iti vakṣyate /
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣa mātrasya prakṛta tvāt prakṛta avamarśi tvāt ca sarvanāmnaḥ kutas yam viśeṣa pratilābhaḥ ucyate udāharaṇa asādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti vakṣyate

original: hetur eva cānumānaṃ yad iha lakṣyaṃnirdiṣṭam /
analyzed: hetuḥ eva ca anumānam yat iha lakṣyam nirdiṣṭam

original: na cāgṛhītam udāharaṇāsādharmyaṃ tadvaidharmyaṃ vā sādhyasādhanaṃ bhavatīti tadgrahaṇopāyo 'pekṣitavyaḥ /
analyzed: na ca agṛhītam udāharaṇa asādharmyam tad vaidharmyam vā sādhya sādhanam bhavati iti tad grahaṇa upāyaḥ upekṣitavyaḥ

original: pratyakṣavyatiriktatadavagamopāyaparikalpane cānavasthādūṣaṇam asakṛdabhihitam iti pratyakṣasyaiva tadupāyatvam /
analyzed: pratyakṣa vyatirikta tad avagama upāya parikalpane ca anavasthā dūṣaṇam asakṛt abhihitam iti pratyakṣasya eva tad upāya tvam

original: ato 'numānakāraṇābhūtapratyakṣāpekṣayā pratyakṣamātraprakrame 'pi sarvanāmnā tadviśeṣa ākṣipyate yat pratibandhagrāhi pratyakṣaṃ yac ca dvitīyaṃ liṅgadarśanam iti //
analyzed: atas numāna kāraṇa a bhūta pratyakṣa apekṣayā pratyakṣa mātra prakrame sarvanāmnā tad viśeṣaḥ ākṣipyate yat pratibandha grāhi pratyakṣam yat ca dvitīyam liṅga darśanam iti

original: nanu pratyakṣaviśeṣadvayapūrvakatvam anumānābhāseṣv api savyabhicāraviruddhādiṣu saṃbhavatīty ativyāptiḥ maivam hetulakṣaṇe sādhyasādhanagrahaṇena tatpratikṣepāt /
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣa viśeṣa dvaya pūrvakatvam anumāna ābhāseṣu api savyabhicāra viruddha ādiṣu saṃbhavati iti ativyāptiḥ mā evam hetu lakṣaṇe sādhya sādhana grahaṇena tad pratikṣepāt

original: pratibandhasvarūpaṃ hi tatraiva nipuṇam abhidhāsyate iha tu tadgrahaṇopāyamātram ucyate /
analyzed: pratibandha svarūpam hi tatra eva nipuṇam abhidhāsyate iha tu tad grahaṇa upāya mātram ucyate

original: samyakpravṛtte ca pratibandhagrāhiṇi pratyakṣe vyāptiviplavābhāvān nānumānābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: samyak pravṛtte ca pratibandha grāhiṇi pratyakṣe vyāpti viplava abhāvāt na anumāna abhāva prasaṅgaḥ

original: sāmānyalakṣaṇānuvādenaca viśiṣalakṣaṇe varṇyamāne tata eva pramānābhāsavyudāsadiddheḥ kevalam idānīṃ samānajātīyopamānādivyavacchedo vacanīya iti sa eva tatpūrvakapadenopāttaḥ /
analyzed: sāmānya lakṣaṇa anuvādena ca viśiṣa lakṣaṇe varṇyamāne tatas eva pramāna ābhāsa vyudāsa diddheḥ kevalam idānīm samāna jātīya upamāna ādi vyavacchedaḥ vacanīyaḥ iti saḥ eva tad pūrvaka padena upāttaḥ

original: [arthotpannam avyabhicāri vyavasāyātmakam] iti phalaviśeṣaṇānāṃ sarvapramāṇeṣv anuvṛtteḥ //
analyzed: artha utpannam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam iti phala viśeṣaṇānām sarva pramāṇeṣu anuvṛtteḥ

original: yugapac ca kvacin nāsti vyāpāraḥ śabdaliṅgayoḥ /
analyzed: yugapad ca kvacid na asti vyāpāraḥ śabda liṅgayoḥ

original: ato nāvyapadeśyatvaviśeṣaṇaprihārthavat //237//
analyzed: atas na avyapadeśya tva viśeṣaṇa prihā arthavat

original: dvayor api ca śabdaliṅgayoḥ jñāpakatvena svarūpagrahaṇāpekṣatvāt jñānayaugapadyena ca yugapdgrahaṇāsaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: dvayoḥ api ca śabda liṅgayoḥ jñāpaka tvena sva rūpa grahaṇa apekṣa tvāt jñāna yaugapadyena ca yugapd grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt

original: nanu evaṃ nirasyatām ativyāptiḥ avyāptis tu kathaṃ nirasiṣyate āgamaādipūrvakāṇāṃ anumānānām asaṅgrahāt //
analyzed: nanu evam nirasyatām ativyāptiḥ avyāptiḥ tu katham nirasiṣyate āgama ādi pūrvakāṇām anumānānām asaṅgrahāt

original: teṣv api mūlabhūtaṃ pratyakṣa eva kāraṇam iti kecid āhuḥ /
analyzed: teṣu api mūla bhūtam pratyakṣaḥ eva kāraṇam iti kecid āhuḥ

original: yathoktam [yatrāpy anumitāl liṅgāl liṅgini grahaṇaṃ bhavet/
analyzed: yathā uktam yatra api anumitāt liṅgāt liṅgini grahaṇam bhavet

original: tatrāpi maulikaṃ liṅgaṃ pratyakṣād eva gamyate] iti //
analyzed: tatra api maulikam liṅgam pratyakṣāt eva gamyate iti

original: yadvā prādhānyābhiprāyeṇa pratyakṣapūrvakatvam ucyate na niyamārtham iti nāvyāptiḥ //
analyzed: yat vā prādhānya abhiprāyeṇa pratyakṣa pūrvakatvam ucyate na niyama artham iti na avyāptiḥ

original: tānīti vā punaḥ tāvad avabodhāya vigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ /
analyzed: tāni iti vā punar tāvat avabodhāya vigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ

original: tāni pratyakṣādīni pūrvaṃ yasyeti /
analyzed: tāni pratyakṣa ādīni pūrvam yasya iti

original: yady api pratyakṣam eva lakṣyatvena prastutam /
analyzed: yadi api pratyakṣam eva lakṣya tvena prastutam

original: tathāpi vyavacchedyatayā 'numānādīnām api prakṛtatvaṃ na vāryate //
analyzed: tathā api vyavacchedya tayā numāna ādīnām api prakṛta tvam na vāryate

original: atra codayanti /
analyzed: atra codayanti

original: tad iti karaṇāvamarśo vā syāt phalāvamarśo vā /
analyzed: tat iti karaṇa avamarśaḥ vā syāt phala avamarśaḥ vā

original: karaṇāvamarśe indriyādikaraṇapūrvakaṃ jñānaṃ tatphalaṃ tatpūrvakaṃ cānumānam iti pūrvaśabdasya dviḥ pāṭhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: karaṇa avamarśe indriya ādi karaṇa pūrvakam jñānam tad phalam tad pūrvakam ca anumānam iti pūrva śabdasya dvis pāṭhaḥ syāt

original: sa cāśrutaḥ kalpanīyaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca a śrutaḥ kalpanīyaḥ

original: phalāvamarśe tu pratyakṣaphalapūrvakam anumānaphalaṃ bhavet nānumānam iti tatpūrvakaśabdasya phalavacanasyānumānaśabdena karaṇāvācinā saha sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt tatpūrvakam anumānam iti /
analyzed: phala avamarśe tu pratyakṣa phala pūrvakam anumāna phalam bhavet na anumānam iti tad pūrvaka śabdasya phala vacanasya anumāna śabdena karaṇa avācinā saha sāmānādhikaraṇyam na syāt tad pūrvakam anumānam iti

original: pratyakṣaphalena hi liṅgadarśanena parokṣārthapratipattir upajanyate sā cānumānaphalaṃ nānumānam iti ucyate ubhayathā 'pi na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: pratyakṣa phalena hi liṅga darśanena parokṣa artha pratipattiḥ upajanyate sā ca anumāna phalam na anumānam iti ucyate ubhayathā pi na doṣaḥ

original: karaṇāvamarśe tāvat indriyādikaraṇapūrvakaṃ tatphalaṃ liṅgadarśanaṃ yat tad eva parokṣārthapratipattau karaṇam anumānam iti na dviḥ pūrvakaśabdasya pāṭha upayujyate /
analyzed: karaṇa avamarśe tāvat indriya ādi karaṇa pūrvakam tad phalam liṅga darśanam yat tat eva parokṣa artha pratipattau karaṇam anumānam iti na dvis pūrvaka śabdasya pāṭhaḥ upayujyate

original: phale 'py avamṛśyamāne pratyakṣaphalaliṅgadarśanapūrvakaṃ yat avinābhāvasmaraṇaṃ tadanumānaṃ karaṇām eva tataḥ parokṣārthapratipatteḥ //
analyzed: phale pi avamṛśyamāne pratyakṣa phala liṅga darśana pūrvakam yat avinābhāva smaraṇam tat anumānam karaṇām eva tatas parokṣa artha pratipatteḥ

original: yad uktaṃ pratyutpannakāraṇajanyā smṛtir anumānam iti tatra spaṣṭam eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam //
analyzed: yat uktam pratyutpanna kāraṇa janyā smṛtiḥ anumānam iti tatra spaṣṭam eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam

original: phale vā 'numānaśabdaṃ varṇayiṣyāmaḥ anumitiḥ anumānam iti //
analyzed: phale vā numāna śabdam varṇayiṣyāmaḥ anumitiḥ anumānam iti

original: yataśśabdaṃ vā 'dhyāhariṣāmaḥ pratyakṣaphalapūrvakaṃ parokṣārthapratipattirūpaṃ phalṃ yato bhavati tad anumānam iti //
analyzed: yatas śabdam vā dhyāhariṣāmaḥ pratyakṣa phala pūrvakam parokṣa artha pratipatti rūpam phalm yatas bhavati tat anumānam iti

original: atra hi prathamaṃ liṅgadarśanaṃ tataḥ pratibandhasmaramaṃ tataḥ keṣāñcin mate prāmarśajñānaṃ tataḥ sādhyārthapratītiḥ tataḥ pratyakṣalakṣaṇā\ vasaravarṇitena krameṇa heyādijñānam itīyati pratītikalāpe yathopapatti kāryakāraṇabhāve vaktavya ity evaṃ tatpūrvakapadam eva kevalaṃ anumānalakṣaṇakṣamam iti guravo varṇayañ cakruḥ //
analyzed: atra hi prathamam liṅga darśanam tatas pratibandha smaramam tatas keṣāñcid mate prāmarśa jñānam tatas sādhya artha pratītiḥ tatas pratyakṣa lakṣaṇā vasara varṇitena krameṇa heya ādi jñānam iti iyati pratīti kalāpe yathopapatti kārya kāraṇa bhāve vaktavyaḥ iti evam tad pūrvaka padam eva kevalam anumāna lakṣaṇa kṣamam iti guravaḥ cakruḥ

original: anye punaḥ upamānādyativyāptivyudāsāya trividhagrahaṇaṃ vyākhyātavantaḥ /
analyzed: anye punar upamāna ādi ativyāpti vyudāsāya trividha grahaṇam vyākhyātavantaḥ

original: [tatpūrvakam anumānam] ity ucyamāne sati upamānādau prasaṅga iti trividhagrahaṇām //
analyzed: tad pūrvakam anumānam iti ucyamāne sati upamāna ādau prasaṅgaḥ iti trividha grahaṇām

original: liṅgaṃ vakṣyamānakāryādibhedād vā trividhaṃ pakṣadharmādirūpatrayayogād vā trirūpaṃ trividham ucyate /
analyzed: liṅgam vakṣyamāna kārya ādi bhedāt vā trividham pakṣa dharma ādi rūpa traya yogāt vā trirūpam trividham ucyate

original: liṅge ca trividhe sati tadālambanaṃ jñanam upacārāt trividham abhidhdīyate /
analyzed: liṅge ca trividhe sati tad ālambanam jñanam upacārāt trividham abhidhdīyate

original: tena pratyakṣapūrvakaṃ trividhaliṅgālambanajñānam anumānam ity ukte sati nātivyāptiḥ //
analyzed: tena pratyakṣa pūrvakam trividha liṅga ālambana jñānam anumānam iti ukte sati na ativyāptiḥ

original: nanu pūrvavadādibhiḥ śabdaiḥ kāryādibhedavarṇanaṃ jñāsyāmaḥ /
analyzed: nanu pūrvavat ādibhiḥ śabdaiḥ kārya ādi bheda varṇanam jñāsyāmaḥ

original: pakṣadharmādirūpatrayaṃ tu katham ebhiḥ śabdaiḥ pratipādyata iti /
analyzed: pakṣa dharma ādi rūpa trayam tu katham ebhiḥ śabdaiḥ pratipādyate iti

original: atrāhuḥ vādādikathātraye 'pi pūrvam upPādīyamānatvāt pakṣaḥ pūrvaśabdenocyate so 'syāsty āśrayatveneti pūrvavat liṅgam ity evam anena padena pakṣadharmatvam uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: atra āhuḥ vāda ādi kathā traye pi pūrvam uppādīyamāna tvāt pakṣaḥ pūrva śabdena ucyate saḥ sya asti āśraya tvena iti pūrvavat liṅgam iti evam anena padena pakṣa dharma tvam uktam bhavati

original: pakṣe upayukte sati śeṣaḥ sapakṣo bhavati /
analyzed: pakṣe upayukte sati śeṣaḥ sapakṣaḥ bhavati

original: so 'syāsaty āśrayatveneti śeṣavat /
analyzed: sā u sya asatī āśraya tvena iti śeṣavat

original: evam anena sapakKṣe vṛttir uktā bhavati /
analyzed: evam anena sa pakkṣe vṛttiḥ uktā bhavati

original: sāmānyatodṛṣṭam ity anena vipakṣāt vyāvṛttaṃ liṅgaṃ ucyate /
analyzed: sāmānyatodṛṣṭam iti anena vipakṣāt vyāvṛttam liṅgam ucyate

original: katham akārapraśleṣāt sāmānyataḥ adṛṣṭam iti /
analyzed: katham akāra praśleṣāt sāmānyatas adṛṣṭam iti

original: tiṣṭhatu tāvad viśeṣaḥ sāmānyato 'pi na dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu tāvat viśeṣaḥ na dṛṣṭam

original: kveti pakṣasapakṣayor vṛtter uktatvāt pariśeṣāt vipakṣe sāmānyato 'pi na dṛṣṭm ity avatiṣṭḥate /
analyzed: kva iti pakṣa sapakṣayoḥ vṛtteḥ ukta tvāt pariśeṣāt vipakṣe na iti avatiṣṭhate

original: itthaṃ trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ ebhiḥ śabdair uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: ittham trirūpam liṅgam ebhiḥ śabdaiḥ uktam bhavati

original: tadālambanaṃ jñānam anumānam //
analyzed: tad ālambanam jñānam anumānam

original: tad evaṃ lakṣaṇe kaścit sarvaṃ sūtram ayojayat /
analyzed: tat evam lakṣaṇe kaścid sarvam sūtram ayojayat

original: evaṃ tu khyāpitaṃ na syāt sūtrakārasya kauśalam //238//
analyzed: evam tu khyāpitam na syāt sūtrakārasya kauśalam

original: kiñca pañcalakṣaṇam iha śāstre abhyupagmyate iti trirūpe tasmin varṇyamāne kālātyayāpadiṣṭaprakaraṇāsamayoḥ prasaṅge na vyāvartata iti/
analyzed: kiñca pañca lakṣaṇam iha śāstre abhyupagmyate iti trirūpe tasmin varṇyamāne kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa prakaraṇa asamayoḥ prasaṅge na vyāvartate iti

original: tasmāt tatpūrvakapadam eva lakṣaṇapratipādanārtham anavadyam //
analyzed: tasmāt tad pūrvaka padam eva lakṣaṇa pratipādana artham anavadyam

original: trividhagrahaṇaṃ tasya vibhāgapratipādakam /
analyzed: trividha grahaṇam tasya vibhāga pratipādakam

original: bhedāḥ pūrvavad ityādigranthena kathitās trayaḥ //239//
analyzed: bhedāḥ pūrvavat ityādi granthena kathitāḥ trayaḥ

original: tatpūrvakapadodgītanirmalanyāyalakṣaṇāḥ /
parimlanādaro 'nyatra sūtrakṛdvākyalāghave //240//
analyzed: parimlana ādaraḥ nyatra sūtra kṛt vākya lāghave

original: vibhāgavacanāt siddhaṃ traividhyaṃ svagirā bhavet /
analyzed: vibhāga vacanāt siddham traividhyam sva girā bhavet

original: tatha ca śabdasiddhāntacchalesv evamādīdṛśāt //241//
analyzed: ca śabda siddhānta chalesu evamādi īdṛśāt

original: pūrvavad iti /
analyzed: pūrvavat iti

original: yatra kāraṇena kāryam anumīyate yathā jaladharonnatyā bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭir iti //
analyzed: yatra kāraṇena kāryam anumīyate yathā jaladhara unnatyā bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭiḥ iti

original: atra codayati pūrvaṃ hi karaṇām ucyate /
analyzed: atra codayati pūrvam hi karaṇām ucyate

original: pūrvam asyāstīti pūrvavt kāryaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam /
analyzed: pūrvam asya asti iti pūrvavat kāryam vaktum yuktam

original: tena kāryāt kāraṇānumānam ihodāhartavyam na kāraṇāt kāryānumānam //
analyzed: tena kāryāt kāraṇa anumānam iha udāhartavyam na kāraṇāt kārya anumānam

original: na ca kāraṇena kāraṇām api pāryate /
analyzed: na ca kāraṇena kāraṇām api pāryate

original: kāryasya tāvat pakṣatvam ayuktam siddhyasiddhivikalpānuvṛtteḥ /
analyzed: kāryasya tāvat pakṣa tvam ayuktam siddhi asiddhi vikalpa anuvṛtteḥ

original: siddhe hi kārye kim anyad anumeyam asiddhe khapuṣpavan na pakṣatvam //
analyzed: siddhe hi kārye kim anyat anumeyam asiddhe khapuṣpa vat na pakṣa tvam

original: api ca asti kāryaṃ kāraṇasyāstitvāt iti vyadhikaraṇo hetuḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ kākasya kārṣṇyād itivat//
analyzed: api ca asti kāryam kāraṇasya astitvāt iti vyadhikaraṇaḥ hetuḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ kākasya kārṣṇyāt itivat

original: sattāyāṃ ca sādhyāyāṃ bhāvadharmasya hetor asiddhatvam abhāvadharmasya viruddhatvam ubhayadharmasyānaikāntikatvam iti kathaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyate tad uktam [nāsiddhe bhavadharmo 'sti vyabhicāryubhayāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: sattāyām ca sādhyāyām bhāva dharmasya hetoḥ asiddha tvam abhāva dharmasya viruddha tvam ubhaya dharmasya anaikāntika tvam iti katham sādhayitum śakyate tat uktam na asiddhe bhava dharmaḥ asti vyabhicāri ubhaya āśrayaḥ

original: dharmo viruddho 'bhāvasya sā sattā sādhyate katham ] iti //
analyzed: dharmaḥ viruddhaḥ bhāvasya sā sattā sādhyate katham iti

original: na ca kāraṇamātrasya hetutvaṃ yuktaṃ vinā ca pratibandhādinā vyabhicārasambhavāt /
analyzed: na ca kāraṇa mātrasya hetu tvam yuktam vinā ca pratibandha ādinā vyabhicāra sambhavāt

original: kāraṇaviśeṣaś ca na kaścid vipaścirā 'pi niścituṃ śakyaḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇa viśeṣaḥ ca na kaścid vipaścirā pi niścitum śakyaḥ

original: caladacalavipulavapuṣām utpaladalamalīmasatviṣām api payomucām amuktapayasām uparamadarśanāt //
analyzed: calat acala vipula vapuṣām utpala dala malīmasa tviṣām api payomucām amukta payasām uparama darśanāt

original: yadi tv antyadaśāvarti kāraṇāṃ liṅgam iṣyate /
analyzed: yadi tu antya daśā varti kāraṇām liṅgam iṣyate

original: vyāptismaraṇāvelāyāṃ kāryapratyakṣatā bhavet //242//
analyzed: vyāpti smaraṇā velāyām kārya pratyakṣa tā bhavet

original: nanu saugatair api kāranāt kāryānumānam aṅgīkṛtam eva [hetunā yaḥ samagreṇa kāryotpādo 'numīyate /
analyzed: nanu saugataiḥ api kāranāt kārya anumānam aṅgīkṛtam eva hetunā yaḥ samagreṇa kārya utpādaḥ numīyate

original: arthāntarānapekṣitvāt sa svabhāvo 'nuvarṇitaḥ //]iti //
analyzed: artha antara anapekṣi tvāt sa svabhāvaḥ nuvarṇitaḥ iti

original: agrandhajño devānāṃ priyaḥ utpādyate 'smād ity utpādo yogyatā kathyate /
analyzed: devānām priyaḥ utpādyate smāt iti utpādaḥ yogyatā kathyate

original: sā cātrānumeyā ata eva tasyāḥ vastuno 'nanyatvāt svabhāvānumānam idam iṣyate [sa svabhāvo 'nuvarṇitaḥ] iti //
analyzed: sā ca atra anumeyā atas eva tasyāḥ vastunaḥ svabhāva anumānam idam iṣyate sa svabhāvaḥ iti

original: atrāhuḥ sarvam idam aviditānumānaprayogakramasya durmateś codyam /
analyzed: atrā āhuḥ sarvam idam avidita anumāna prayoga kramasya durmateḥ codyam

original: na kāryamātra pakṣīkriyate /
analyzed: na pakṣīkriyate

original: na sattā sādhyate /
analyzed: na sattā sādhyate

original: na vyadhikaraṇo hetuḥ prayujyate /
analyzed: na vyadhikaraṇaḥ hetuḥ prayujyate

original: api tu payodharā eva dharmiṇi adūrakālabhāvinyā vṛṣṭyā tadvantaḥ sādhyante viśiṣṭonnatirūpadharmādiyogeneti na pūrvakathitadoṣāvasaraḥ //
analyzed: api tu payodharāḥ eva dharmiṇi adūra kāla bhāvinyā vṛṣṭyā tadvantaḥ sādhyante viśiṣṭa unnati rūpa dharma ādi yogena iti na pūrva kathita doṣa avasaraḥ

original: yathā agniṃ ānayaṃ dhūmaḥ bahulapāṇḍutādidharmayogitvāt mahānasāvadṛtadhūmavad iti dhūma evāgnimattayā 'numīyate /
analyzed: yathā agnim ānayam dhūmaḥ bahula pāṇḍu tā ādi dharma yogi tvāt mahānasa avadṛta dhūma vat iti dhūmaḥ eva agnimat tayā numīyate

original: evaṃ samanantarotpāditavṛṣṭayo 'mī jīmūtāḥ sātiśayonnatyādidharmayogitvāt pūrvopalabdhaparjanyavat iti jaladharā eva bhaviṣyad vṛṣṭimattayā 'numīyante /
analyzed: evam samanantara utpādita vṛṣṭayaḥ mī jīmūtāḥ sa atiśaya unnati ādi dharma yogi tvāt pūrva upalabdha parjanya vat iti jaladharāḥ eva bhaviṣyat vṛṣṭimat tayā numīyante

original: yathā 'ha bhaṭṭaḥ [tasmād dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ syāt prameyatā /
analyzed: yathā ha bhaṭṭaḥ tasmāt dharma viśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ syāt prameya tā

original: sā deśasyāgniyuktasya dhūmasyānyaiś ca kalpitā] iti //
analyzed: sā deśasya agni yuktasya dhūmasya anyaiḥ ca kalpitā iti

original: yat tu pūrvaṃ kāraṇām ucyate iti tat satyam /
analyzed: yat tu pūrvam kāraṇām ucyate iti tat satyam

original: pūrvam asyāstīti pūrvavat kāraṇagatam unnatatvādidharmajātam ucyate tad eva liṅgam iti granthadoṣo 'pi na kaścit /
analyzed: pūrvam asya asti iti pūrvavat kāraṇa gatam unnata tva ādi dharma jātam ucyate tat eva liṅgam iti grantha doṣaḥ na kaścid

original: na ca kāraṇāmātrasya hetutvaṃ brūmaḥ yenāsya vidhurapratyayopanipātādikṛtaḥ vyabhicāraḥ syāt /
analyzed: na ca kāraṇā mātrasya hetu tvam brūmaḥ yena asya vidhura pratyaya upanipāta ādi kṛtaḥ vyabhicāraḥ syāt

original: api ca viśiṣṭam eva kāraṇaṃ hetuḥ /
analyzed: api ca viśiṣṭam eva kāraṇam hetuḥ

original: na ca kāraṇaviśiṣo duravagamaḥ gambhīragarjitārambhanirbhinnagirigahvarāḥ /
analyzed: na ca kāraṇa viśiṣaḥ duravagamaḥ gambhīra garjita ārambha nirbhinna giri gahvarāḥ

original: rolambagavalavyālatamālamalinatviṣaḥ //
analyzed: rolamba gavala vyāla tamāla malina tviṣaḥ

original: tuṅgattaṭillatāsaṅgapiśaṅgottuṅgavigrahāḥ /
analyzed: tuṅgat taṭit latā āsaṅga piśaṅga uttuṅga vigrahāḥ

original: vṛṣṭiṃ vyabhicarantīha naivaṃprāyāḥ payomucaḥ //244//
analyzed: vṛṣṭim vyabhicaranti iha na evaṃprāyāḥ payaḥ mucaḥ

original: anabhyupagame caivam anumānasya jīvitam /
analyzed: an abhyupagame ca evam anumānasya jīvitam

original: na syāt dhūmaviśeṣāṇām api boddhum aśaktitaḥ //245//
analyzed: na syāt dhūma viśeṣāṇām api boddhum aśaktitaḥ

original: yad api kāryapratyakṣatvam āśaṅkitam tad api ayuktam na hi vṛṣṭyanumānasamaya eva śirasi salilakaṇāḥ patantaḥ payodamuktā dṛṣśyante //
analyzed: yat api kārya pratyakṣa tvam āśaṅkitam tat api ayuktam na hi vṛṣṭi anumāna samaye eva śirasi salila kaṇāḥ patantaḥ payoda muktāḥ dṛṣśyante

original: [parokṣe liṅgini jñānam anumānam] iti ca viśeṣaṇopādānāt yatra tatra na tadānīm eva vṛṣṭiḥ pratyakṣībhavati tadudāharaṇāṃ bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: parokṣe liṅgini jñānam anumānam iti ca viśeṣaṇa upādānāt yatra tatra na tadānīm eva vṛṣṭiḥ pratyakṣībhavati tad udāharaṇām bhaviṣyati

original: api ca anupajātāvayavakriyatayā 'nāśaṅkyamānavināśe 'ntyatantau jātayā kriyayā paṭaniṣpattyanumāne kriyamāṇe na paṭapratyakṣatā kālavyavadhānasambhavāt /
analyzed: api ca anupajāta avayava kriyatayā na āśaṅkyamāna vināśe ntya tantau jātayā kriyayā paṭa niṣpatti anumāne kriyamāṇe na paṭa pratyakṣa tā kāla vyavadhāna sambhavāt

original: tathā hi ekatas tāvad antyatantau kriyādarśanam avinābhāvasmaraṇām prāmarśajñānam anumeyapratītir iti tricatvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi ekatas tāvat antya tantau kriyā darśanam avinābhāva smaraṇām prāmarśa jñānam anumeya pratītiḥ iti tri catvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ

original: anyatas tu kriyāa kriyāto vibhāgaḥ vibhāgāt pūṛvasaṃyoganivṛttiḥ tata uttarasaṃyogotpādaḥ tataḥ paṭaniṣpattiḥ /
analyzed: anyatas tu kriyā kriyātaḥ vibhāgaḥ vibhāgāt tatas uttara saṃyoga utpādaḥ tatas paṭa niṣpattiḥ

original: niṣpanne paṭe kṣaṇāntara rūpādiguṇāraṃbhaḥ rūpādijanmani paṭasya samavāyikāraṇatvāt kāraṇāsya kāryād avaśyaṃ pūrvakālabhāvitvam ato niṣpanno 'pi nūnam ekasmin kṣaṇe nīrūpaḥ paṭo bhavatīti na tadaiva pratyakṣaḥ tataḥ kṣaṇāntare rūpotpādāt rūpavaddravyam indriyasannikarṣāt pratyakṣaṃ bhaviṣyatīti atibahava ete kṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: niṣpanne paṭe rūpa ādi guṇa āraṃbhaḥ rūpa ādi janmani paṭasya samavāyi kāraṇa tvāt kāraṇa asya kāryāt avaśyam pūrva kāla bhāvi tvam atas niṣpannaḥ nūnam ekasmin kṣaṇe nīrūpaḥ paṭaḥ bhavati iti na tadā eva pratyakṣaḥ tatas kṣaṇa antare rūpa utpādāt rūpavat dravyam indriya sannikarṣāt pratyakṣam bhaviṣyati iti atibahavaḥ ete kṣaṇāḥ

original: ato na kāryapratyakṣatvam //
analyzed: atas na kārya pratyakṣa tvam

original: nāpi vidhurapratyayādinā kāryānutpattiḥ /
analyzed: nā api vidhura pratyaya ādinā kārya anutpattiḥ

original: anutpannāvayavakriyatvaviśeṣaṇopādānena tadvināśāśaṅkanāt /
analyzed: anutpanna avayava kriyatva viśeṣaṇa upādānena tad vināśa āśaṅkanāt

original: kriyātaś cottarottarakāryāṇām avaśyaṃ bhāvitvāt //
analyzed: kriyātaḥ ca uttara uttara kāryāṇām avaśyam bhāvi tvāt

original: yad api [hetunā yaḥ samagreṇa] ityādinā yogyatānumānaṃ vyākhyātam tad apy asādhu svabhāvānumānasya nirastatvāt /
analyzed: yat api hetunā yaḥ samagreṇa ityādinā yogyatā anumānam vyākhyātam tat api asādhu svabhāva anumānasya nirasta tvāt

original: lokaś ca kāraṇād avikalāt kāryam eva kalpayati na yogyatām ity alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: lokaḥ ca kāraṇāt avikalāt kāryam eva kalpayati na yogyatām iti alam prasaṅgena

original: śeṣavad iti yatra kāryeṇa kāraṇām anumīyate yathā nadīpūreṇoparitena deśe vṛṣṭir iti /
analyzed: śeṣavat iti yatra kāryeṇa kāraṇām anumīyate yathā nadīpūreṇa uparitena deśe vṛṣṭiḥ iti

original: atrāpi vṛṣṭimaduparitanadeśasaṃsargalakṣaṇo nadīdharmaḥ taddharmeṇaiva viśiṣṭena pūrṇātādinā 'numīyate /
analyzed: atra api vṛṣṭimat uparitana deśa saṃsarga lakṣaṇaḥ nadī dharmaḥ tad dharmeṇa eva viśiṣṭena pūrṇā tā ādinā numīyate

original: vṛṣṭimatpṛṣṭhadeśasaṃsṛṣṭā iyaṃ nadī phenilakaluṣatvādiviśiṣṭapūropetatvāt pūrvopalabdhaivaṃvidhadhunīvat //
analyzed: vṛṣṭimat pṛṣṭha deśa saṃsṛṣṭā iyam nadī phenila kaluṣa tva ādi viśiṣṭa pūra upeta tvāt pūrva upalabdhā evaṃvidha dhunī vat

original: ayaṃ deśo vā vṛṣṭiviśiṣṭadeśāntarasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ viśiṣṭanadīpūravattvenānumīyata iti prāktanavaiyadhikaraṇyādicodyacakrasyehāpi nāsti prasaraḥ //
analyzed: ayam deśaḥ vā vṛṣṭi viśiṣṭa deśa antara saṃsṛṣṭaḥ viśiṣṭa nadīpūravattvena anumīyate iti prāktana vaiyadhikaraṇya ādi codya cakrasya iha api nā asti prasaraḥ

original: phalatas tv iyaṃ vāco yuktiḥ kāryeṇā kāraṇam anumīyate kāraṇena kāryam anumīyata iti pramārthatas tu dharmī dharmavattvena dharmavān anumīyata iti sthitiḥ /
analyzed: phalatas tu iyam vācaḥ yuktiḥ kāryeṇa kāraṇam anumīyate kāraṇena kāryam anumīyate iti pramā arthataḥ tu dharmī dharmavat tvena dharmavān anumīyate iti sthitiḥ

original: yadāha bhaṭṭaḥ [sa eva cobhayātmā 'yaṃ gamyo gamaka eva ca/
analyzed: yat āha bhaṭṭaḥ saḥ eva ca ubhaya ātmā yam gamyaḥ gamakaḥ eva ca

original: asiddhenaikadeśena gamyaḥ siddhena bodhakaḥ] iti//
analyzed: asiddhena eka deśena gamyaḥ siddhena bodhakaḥ iti

original: yat tu setubhaṅgahimavilayanādinā 'pi nadīpūropapattir dṛṣṭeti tatrāpy ucyate āvartavartanāśāliviśālakaluṣodakaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu setu bhaṅga hima vilayana ādinā pi nadīpūra upapattiḥ dṛṣṭā iti tatra api ucyate āvarta vartanā śāli viśāla kaluṣa udakaḥ

original: kallolavikaṭāsphālasphuratpheṭacchaṭāñcitaḥ //246//
analyzed: kallola vikaṭa āsphāla sphurat pheṭa chaṭā āñcitaḥ

original: vahadbahalaśaivālavanaśādvalasaṅkulaḥ /
analyzed: vahat bahala śaivāla vana śādvala saṅkulaḥ

original: nadīpūraviśeṣo 'pi śakyeta na na veditum //247//
analyzed: nadīpūra viśeṣaḥ pi śakyeta na na veditum

original: pramātur aparādho 'yam viśeṣaṃ yo na paśyati /
analyzed: pramātuḥ aparādhaḥ yam viśeṣam yaḥ na paśyati

original: nānumānasya doṣo 'sti prameyāvyabhicāriṇaḥ//248//
analyzed: na anumānasya doṣaḥ sti

original: rodhopaghātasādṛśyavyabhicāranibandhanam /
anumānāpramāṇatvam ato vaktum asāṃpratam //249//
analyzed: anumāna apramāṇa tvam atas vaktum asāṃpratam

original: pāraṃparyeṇa vṛṣṭiś ca nadīpūrasya kāraṇam /
analyzed: pāraṃparyeṇa vṛṣṭiḥ ca nadī pūrasya kāraṇam

original: pataddhanapayobindusandohasyandamakramāt //250//
sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ tu yat akaryakāraṇabhūtāl liṅgāt tādṛśasyaiva liṅgino 'numānam yathā kapitthādau rūpeṇā rasānumānam /
analyzed: sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tu yat akarya kāraṇa bhūtāt liṅgāt tādṛśasya eva liṅginaḥ numānam yathā kapittha ādau rūpeṇa ā rasa anumānam

original: rūparasayoḥ samavāyikāraṇām ekaṃ kapitthādidravyam na tutayor anyonyaṃ kāryakāraṇābhāvaḥ //
analyzed: rūpa rasayoḥ samavāyi kāraṇām ekam kapittha ādi dravyam na tu tayoḥ anyonyam kārya kāraṇa abhāvaḥ

original: śākyadṛṣṭyā 'pi varvamānayoḥ kṣaṇāyoḥ itaretarakāryakāraṇatā na sambhavaty eva//
analyzed: śākya dṛṣṭyā pi kṣaṇāyoḥ itaretara kārya kāraṇa tā na sambhavati eva

original: dharmiṇāś ca rūpavattvena rasavattā 'numānāt asiddhyādicodyānāṃ pūrvavad anavakāśo vaktavya yat punar bhāṣyakāreṇā bhāskarsya deśāntaraprāptyā gatyanumānam udāhṛtaṃ tad ayuktam deśāntaraprāpter gatikāryatvāt kāryeṇa kāraṇānumānaṃ śeṣavad evedaṃ syāt //
analyzed: dharmiṇāḥ ca rūpavat tvena rasavat tā anumānāt asiddhi ādi codyānām pūrva vat anavakāśaḥ yat punar bhāṣyakāreṇa ā bhāskarsya deśa antara prāptyāḥ gati anumānam udāhṛtam tat ayuktam deśa antara prāpteḥ gati kārya tvāt kāryeṇa kāraṇa anumānam śeṣavat eva idam syāt

original: api ca deśāntaraprāptir deśāntarasaṃyogaḥ /
analyzed: api ca deśa antara prāptiḥ deśa antara saṃyogaḥ

original: na ca daśaśatāmśor deśāntareṇa śailādinā saṃyogaḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na ca daśa śatāmśoḥ deśa antareṇa śaila ādinā saṃyogaḥ saṃbhavati

original: nabhasā tu bhavann api viśā vā durlakṣyaḥ pratyakṣetaravṛttitvāt pavanavanaspatisaṃyogavat mātṛgarbhasaṃyogavad vā //
analyzed: nabhasā tu bhavan api viśā vā durlakṣyaḥ pratyakṣa itara vṛtti tvāt pavana vanaspati saṃyoga vat mātṛ garbha saṃyoga vat vā

original: atha deśāntare taraṇidarśanaṃ hetur ucyate tasyāpi gatokāryatā pāramparyeṇa vidyate eva gatyā prāptiḥ prāptyā ca tatra darśanam iti//
analyzed: atha deśa antare taraṇi darśanam hetuḥ ucyate tasya api pāramparyeṇa vidyate eva gatyā prāptiḥ prāptyā ca tatra darśanam iti

original: atha deśāntare tapanadarśanaṃ pakṣīkṛtya darśanatvena ca darśanaśabdavācyatvena vā tasya gatipūrvakatvam anumīytate deśātare divākaradarśanaṃ gatipūrvakam deśāntaradarśanatvāt tacchabdavācyatvād vā devadattadeśāntaradarśanavad iti tathāpi pāramparyeṇa garikāryatā na nivartata eva /
analyzed: atha deśa antare tapana darśanam pakṣīkṛtya darśana tvena ca darśana śabda vācya tvena vā tasya gati pūrvaka tvam anumīytate deśa atare divākara darśanam gati pūrvakam deśa antara darśana tvāt tad śabda vācya tvāt vā devadatta deśa antara darśana vat iti tathā api pāramparyeṇa garikārya tā na nivartate eva

original: na hi darśanatvaṃ gotvādivat sāmānyam asti kintu bhāvapratyaytenātra darśanotpādikā śaktir ucyate /
analyzed: na hi darśana tvam go tva ādi vat sāmānyam asti kintu śaktiḥ ucyate

original: sā ca nātīndriyā nitiyā kācit api tu svarūpasahakārisvabhāvaiveti dṛśyamānaṃ svarūpam api śaktivarge patati /
analyzed: sā ca na atīndriyā kācid api tu svarūpa sahakāri svabhāvā eva iti dṛśyamānam sva rūpam api śakti varge patati

original: dṛśyamānaṃ ca deśāntaraprāptyātmakam iti gatikāryam //
analyzed: dṛśyamānam ca deśa antara prāpti ātmakam iti gati kāryam

original: evaṃ darśanaśabdavācyatve 'pi hetukṛte vaktavyam /
analyzed: evam darśana śabda vācya tve hetu kṛte vaktavyam

original: gatyā deśāntaraprāptir janyate tayā tatra darśanam tena śabdaprayogaḥ sa eva vācyatvam iti bhāvapratyayenoktaḥ /
analyzed: gatyā deśa antara prāptiḥ janyate tayā tatra darśanam tena śabda prayogaḥ saḥ eva vācya tvam iti bhāva pratyayena uktaḥ

original: tasmāt sarvathā gatikāryatvānapāyāt śeṣavad evedam anumānam //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvathā gati kārya tva anapāyāt śeṣavat eva idam anumānam

original: tad etad bhāṣyakārīyam udāharaṇām īdṛśam /
analyzed: tat etat bhāṣyakārīyam īdṛśam

original: rūpād rasānumānaṃ tu tasmād yuktam udāhṛtam //251//
analyzed: rūpāt rasa anumānam tu tasmāt yuktam udāhṛtam

original: akāryakāraṇaprāyahetūnāṃ ca pradarśitaḥ /
analyzed: akārya kāraṇa prāya hetūnām ca pradarśitaḥ

original: bhadantakalahe 'smābhir udāharaṇavistaraḥ //252//
analyzed: bhadanta kalahe smābhiḥ udāharaṇa vistaraḥ

original: evaṃ tāvan matubvyākhyayā traividhyam anummānasya varṇitam /
analyzed: evam tāvat matup vyākhyayā traividhyam an um mānasya varṇitam

original: etat tu phalguprāyam iva manyante /
analyzed: etat tu phalgu prāyam iva manyante

original: niyamātmakasambandhabalād eva liṅgasya gamaktvam uktam na kāryādisvarūupeṇa /
analyzed: niyama ātmaka sambandha balāt eva liṅgasya gamak tvam uktam na kārya ādi svarūpeṇa

original: tat kim īdṛśatraividhyena darśiteneti vatipratyayam āśrityānyathā vyācakṣate //
analyzed: tat kim īdṛśa traividhyena darśitena iti vati pratyayam āśritya anyathā vyācakṣate

original: pūrvavad iti /
analyzed: pūrvavat iti

original: atra sambandhagrahaṇakāle liṅgaliṅginoḥ pratyakṣataḥ svarūpam avadhārya punas tādṛśaiva liṅgena tādṛg eva liṅgī gamyate tata pūrveṇa tulyaṃ vartata iti pūrvavad anumānam /
analyzed: atra sambandha grahaṇa kāle liṅga liṅginoḥ pratyakṣataḥ svarūpam avadhārya punar tādṛśā eva liṅgena tādṛś eva liṅgī gamyate tata pūrveṇa tulyam vartate iti pūrvavat anumānam

original: yathā mahānase dhūmāgnī sahacaritau dṛṣṭvā punaḥ dhūmāgnyanumānam //
analyzed: yathā mahānase dhūma agnī sahacaritau dṛṣṭvā punar dhūma agni anumānam

original: nanu pratyakṣapratītyā viṣayagatasakalaviśeṣasākṣātkaraṇakṣamayā tulyā nānumanikī matir iti kathaṃ kriyātulyatvam tadabhāvāt kathaṃ vatiḥ satyam evam tathā 'pi vahner eva tādṛśasya vailakṣaṇyāpādakaviśeṣavacchinnasyaliṅgena garahaṇāt adūraviprakarṣeṇā kriyātulyatvam upapatsyate //
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣa pratītyā viṣaya gata sakala viśeṣa sākṣātkaraṇa kṣamayā tulyā na ānumanikī matiḥ iti katham kriyā tulya tvam tad abhāvāt katham vatiḥ satyam evam tathā vahneḥ eva tādṛśasya vailakṣaṇya āpādaka viśeṣa vacchinnasya liṅgena garahaṇāt adūra viprakarṣeṇa kriyā tulya tvam upapatsyate

original: śeṣavan nāma pariśeṣaḥ /sa ca prasaktapratiṣedhe anyatrāprasaṅgāt śiṣyamāṇe saṃpratyayaḥ /
analyzed: śeṣavat nāma pariśeṣaḥ sa ca prasakta pratiṣedhe anyatra aprasaṅgāt śiṣyamāṇe saṃpratyayaḥ

original: yathā kvacit pradeśe dhūmenāgnimātre 'numite kim indhano 'yam agniḥ iti vimarśe prasaktānāṃ tṛṇaparṇākāṣṭhādīnāṃ aprasaṅgāc ca gomayendhano 'gniḥ parikalpyate /
analyzed: yathā kvacid pradeśe dhūmena agni mātre numite kim indhanaḥ yam agniḥ iti vimarśe prasaktānām tṛṇa parṇa ākāṣṭha ādīnām aprasaṅgāt ca gomaya indhanaḥ gniḥ parikalpyate

original: yathā vā śabde drvyakarmatvapratiṣedhāt sāmānyādāv aprasaṅgāc ca guṇatvānumānaṃ vakṣyate //
analyzed: yathā vā śabde drvī akarma tva pratiṣedhāt sāmānya ādau aprasaṅgāt ca guṇa tva anumānam vakṣyate

original: sāmanyatodṛṣṭaṃ tu yatra sambandhakāle 'pi liṅgisvarūpam apratyakṣaṃ nityaparokṣam eva sāmānyato vyāptigrahaṇād anumīyate yathā śabdādyupalabdhyā śrotrādi karaṇām /
analyzed: sāmanyatodṛṣṭam tu yatra sambandha kāle liṅgi svarūpam apratyakṣam nitya parokṣam eva sāmānyataḥ vyāpti grahaṇāt anumīyate yathā śabda ādi upalabdhyā śrotra ādi karaṇām

original: indriyāṇām atīndriyatvāt na kadācit pratyakṣagamyatvam /
analyzed: indriyāṇām atīndriya tvāt na kadācid pratyakṣa gamya tvam

original: atha ca chedanādikriyāṇāṃ paraśvadhādikaraṇapūrvaka vyāptigrahaṇāt śabdādyupalabdhikriyāṇāṃ karaṇāpūṛvakatvam anumīyate //
analyzed: atha ca chedana ādi kriyāṇām vyāpti grahaṇāt śabda ādi upalabdhi kriyāṇām anumīyate

original: atra [vati]vyākhyāne codayanti /
analyzed: atra vati vyākhyāne codayanti

original: pūrvavad evam ekam anumānam uktaṃ syāt na trividham /
analyzed: pūrvavat evam ekam anumānam uktam syāt na trividham

original: yato na tāvad anavagatavyāptikaṃ liṅgaṃ gamakaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yatas na tāvat anavagata vyāptikam liṅgam gamakam bhavati

original: viśeṣāṇām anantatvena ca tadanvayavyatirekayor duravagamatvāt sarvatra sāmānyenaiva vyāptigrahaṇam /
analyzed: viśeṣāṇām ananta tvena ca tad anvaya vyatirekayoḥ duravagama tvāt sarvatra sāmānyena eva vyāpti grahaṇam

original: yac cetthaṃ vyāptijñānaṃ tat tulyaṃ tritaye 'pi /
analyzed: yat ca ittham vyāpti jñānam tat tulyam tritaye

original: ataḥ sarvaṃ pūrvavad eva syāt vateḥ sarvatra saṃbhavāt //
analyzed: atas sarvam pūrvavat eva syāt vateḥ sarvatra saṃbhavāt

original: tad etad ayuktam avāntaraviśeṣasya suspaṣṭasya bhāvāt /
analyzed: tat etat ayuktam avāntara viśeṣasya su spaṣṭasya bhāvāt

original: [vyāptipūrvakam anumānam] ity etāvatā yady ekavidham ucyate tat satyam evaṃ prakāram evedam /
analyzed: vyāpti pūrvakam anumānam iti etāvatā yadi ekavidham ucyate tat satyam evam prakāram evā idam

original: tasmin saty api tu sāmye bhedāntarasaṃbhavāt traividhyam asya pratipādyate //
analyzed: tasmin sati api tu sāmye bheda antara saṃbhavāt traividhyam asya pratipādyate

original: tathā hi dhūmajvalanayoḥ pūrvaṃ pratyakṣeṇā grahaṇāt idānīṃ tenaiva bhūmena sa evāgnir anumīyate iti pūrvavad idam anumānam ucyate yat pratyakṣapūrvakam iti prasiddham //
analyzed: tathā hi dhūma jvalanayoḥ pūrvam pratyakṣeṇa ā grahaṇāt idānīm tena eva bhūmena saḥ eva agniḥ anumīyate iti pūrvavat idam anumānam ucyate yat pratyakṣa pūrvakam iti prasiddham

original: nanu dhūmāntareṇa vahnyantarānumānaṃ kiṃ na pratyakṣapūrvakam ka ekam āha na pūrvavad iti kathaṃ tarhīdam ucyate tenaiva dhūmeneti jātyabhiprāyam etad ucyate na vyaktyabhiprāyam //
analyzed: nanu dhūma antareṇa vahni antara anumānam kim na pratyakṣa pūrvakam kaḥ ekam āha na pūrvavat iti katham tarhi idam ucyate tena eva dhūmena iti jāti abhiprāyam etat ucyate na vyakti abhiprāyam

original: nanu sāmānyatas tarhi tatparicchedāt sāmānyatodṛṣṭam evedaṃ syāt na sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya nityaparokṣānumeyaikaviṣayatvāt //
analyzed: nanu sāmānyatas tarhi tad paricchedāt sāmānyatodṛṣṭam evā idam syāt na sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya nitya parokṣa anumeya eka viṣaya tvāt

original: prasaktapratiṣedhādinā ca niyatasādhyaparicchedahetuḥ pariśeṣanumānam ucyate yathā gomayendhanadahanānumānam udāhṛtam śabde va guṇātvakalpanam //
analyzed: prasakta pratiṣedha ādinā ca niyata sādhya pariccheda hetuḥ pariśeṣa anumānam ucyate yathā gomaya indhana dahana anumānam udāhṛtam śabde

original: sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ tu nityaparokṣaviṣayam udāhṛtam eva śrotrādyanumānam /
analyzed: sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tu nitya parokṣa viṣayam udāhṛtam eva śrotra ādi anumānam

original: tad evaṃ bhedasaṃbhvāt trividham anumānam iti yuktam //
analyzed: tat evam bheda saṃbhvāt trividham anumānam iti yuktam

original: āstām vā udāharaṇābhedaḥ ekatrāpy udāharaṇe traividhyam abhidhātuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: āstām vā udāharaṇa abhedaḥ ekatra api udāharaṇe traividhyam abhidhātum śakyate

original: yathā icchādikāryaṃ āśritam kāryatvāt ghaṭavat ity āśrayamātre sādhye pūrvavad anumānam /
analyzed: yathā icchā ādi kāryam āśritam kārya tvāt ghaṭa vat iti āśraya mātre sādhye pūrvavat anumānam

original: prasaktaśarīrendriyādyāśrayapratiṣedhena viśiṣṭāśrayakalpane tad eva pariśeṣānumānam /
analyzed: prasakta śarīra indriya ādi āśraya pratiṣedhena viśiṣṭa āśraya kalpane tat eva pariśeṣa anumānam

original: anumeyasya nityaparokṣatvāt tad eva sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ ca //
analyzed: anumeyasya nitya parokṣa tvāt tat eva sāmānyatodṛṣṭam ca

original: tarhi pariśeṣānumānasya sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya ca ko veśeṣaḥ ucyate pariśeṣānumānapravṛttāv anyaḥ panthāḥ sāmānyatodṛṣṭasyānyaḥ /
analyzed: tarhi pariśeṣa anumānasya sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya ca kaḥ veśeṣaḥ ucyate pariśeṣa anumāna pravṛttau anyaḥ panthāḥ sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya anyaḥ

original: icchādikāryaṃ dehādivilakṣaṇāśrayam śarīrādiṣu bādhakapramāṇopapattau satyāṃ kāryatvād iti sāmānyatodṛṣṭāsya kramaḥ /
analyzed: icchā ādi kāryam deha ādi vilakṣaṇa āśrayam śarīra ādiṣu bādhaka pramāṇa upapattau satyām kārya tvāt iti sāmānyatodṛṣṭā asya kramaḥ

original: pariśeṣānumānasya tv itthaṃ pravṛttiḥ icchāder aśrayatvena prasaktāni śarīrendriyamanāṃsi niṣidhyante dikkālādau ca tatprasaṅgo nāsti tatpāriśeṣyād ātmaiva tadāśraya iti /
analyzed: pariśeṣa anumānasya tu ittham pravṛttiḥ icchā ādeḥ aśraya tvena prasaktāni śarīra indriya manāṃsi niṣidhyante diś kāla ādau ca tad prasaṅgaḥ nā asti tad pāriśeṣyāt ātmā eva tad āśrayaḥ iti

original: pariśeṣānumāne ca sarvatra naiṣa niyamaḥ sādhyasyātiparokṣatvam iti gomayāgnikalpanādidarśanāt /
analyzed: pariśeṣa anumāne ca sarvatra nā eṣa niyamaḥ sādhyasya ati parokṣa tvam iti gomaya agni kalpanā ādi darśanāt

original: sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ tu nityaparokṣaviṣayam eveti sūktaṃ traividhyam //
analyzed: sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tu nitya parokṣa viṣayam eva iti sūktam traividhyam

original: apare punaḥ adṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇāviṣayaṃ śaktikriyānumānaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭam udāharanti devadattādāv api kriyāyāḥ parokṣatvāt /
analyzed: apare punar adṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa aviṣayam śakti kriyā anumānam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam udāharanti devadatta ādau api kriyāyāḥ parokṣa tvāt

original: calatīti pratyaye hi na devadattasvarūpātiriktakriyātattvapratibhāsaḥ //
analyzed: calati iti pratyaye hi na devadatta sva rūpa atirikta kriyā tattva pratibhāsaḥ

original: ya eva devadattātma tiṣṭhat pratyayagodaraḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ eva devadatta ātma tiṣṭhat pratyayagodaraḥ

original: calatīty api saṃvittau sa eva pratibhāsate //253//
analyzed: calati iti api saṃvittau saḥ eva pratibhāsate

original: aviralasamullasatsaṃyogavibhāgaprabandhaviṣayatvāc calatītipratyayasya na sarvadā tadutpādaḥ //
analyzed: avirala samullasat saṃyoga vibhāga prabandha viṣaya tvāt calati iti pratyayasya na sarvadā tad utpādaḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhi nityaparokṣe kriyāsvalakṣaṇe 'numānaṃ kramata iti cet kāryasya kādācitkatvena kāraṇapūrvakatvāt paridṛśyamānasya dravyasvarūpasya kāraṇātve sarvadā kāryotpādanaprasaṅgāt sarvadā tatsvarūpasadbhāvāt na ca sarvadā kāryam utpadyata iti tadatiriktakriyānumānam //
analyzed: katham tarhi nitya parokṣe kriyāsu alakṣaṇe numānam kramate iti ced kāryasya kādācitkatvena kāraṇa pūrvakatvāt paridṛśyamānasya dravya svarūpasya kāraṇā tve sarvadā kārya utpādana prasaṅgāt sarvadā tad svarūpa sadbhāvāt na ca sarvadā kāryam utpadyate iti tad atirikta kriyā anumānam

original: evaṃ śaktāv api draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: evam śaktau api draṣṭavyam

original: kriyāśaktisvarūpasya ca nityaparokṣatvāt taddṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayam anumānam ucyate na tu viśeṣaviṣayam viśeṣavyāptigrahaṇāsyāsaṃbhavād iti //
analyzed: kriyāśakti svarūpasya ca nitya parokṣa tvāt tad dṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam anumānam ucyate na tu viśeṣa viṣayam viśeṣa vyāpti grahaṇa asya asaṃbhavāt iti

original: tad idam anupapannam parispandarūpasyotkṣepaṇādibhedavataḥ karmaṇaś calatyādipratītau prakāśamānatvena pratyakṣatvāt na tasya nityānu meyatvam /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam parispanda rūpasya utkṣepaṇa ādi bhedavataḥ karmaṇaḥ calati ādi pratītau prakāśamāna tvena pratyakṣa tvāt na tasya nitya anu meya tvam

original: saṃyogavibhāgālambanatve tu saṃyujtate vibhajyate iti pratītiḥ syāt na calatīti yathāviṣayaṃ pratyayotpādāt /
analyzed: saṃyoga vibhāga ālambana tve tu saṃyujtate vibhajyate iti pratītiḥ syāt na calati iti yathāviṣayam pratyaya utpādāt

original: saṃvedanānusāriṇī ca viṣayavyavasthā /
analyzed: saṃvedanā anusāriṇī ca viṣaya vyavasthā

original: anyathā ghaṭapratyaye 'pi paṭasyālambanatā syāt saṃyogavibhāgālambanatve sati tiṣṭhaty api calatpratyayaḥ prāpnoti tatrāpi saṃyogavibhāgasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: anyathā ghaṭa pratyaye pi paṭasya ālambana tā syāt saṃyoga vibhāga ālambana tve sati tiṣṭhati api calat pratyayaḥ prāpnoti tatra api saṃyoga vibhāga saṃbhavāt

original: sthāṇau ca śyenasaṃyogavibhāgavati calatītipratibhāso bhavet /
analyzed: sthāṇau ca śyena saṃyoga vibhāgavati calati iti pratibhāsaḥ bhavet

original: aviralatadupajananaprabandhe 'pi bhūtabhāvinoḥ saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ parokṣatvāt vartamānayor grahaṇam /
analyzed: avirala tad upajanana prabandhe bhūta bhāvinoḥ saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ parokṣa tvāt vartamānayoḥ grahaṇam

original: tau ca calitvā 'pi sthite devadatte sta iti tatrāpi kathaṃ na calatīti pratyayaḥ //
analyzed: tau ca calitvā sthite devadatte staḥ iti tatra api katham na calati iti pratyayaḥ

original: nirantaraṃ ca saṃyogavibhāgaśreṇidarśanāt /
analyzed: nirantaram ca saṃyoga vibhāga śreṇi darśanāt
