original: bhūmāv api bhaved buddhiḥ calatīti manuṣyavat //254//
analyzed: bhūmau api bhavet buddhiḥ calati iti manuṣya vat

original: atha manuṣe yatkriyājanyatvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ tatraiva calatītyādibuddhiḥ nānyatra /
analyzed: atha manuṣe yat kriyā janya tvam saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ tatra eva calati ityādi buddhiḥ na anyatra

original: devadattakriyayā ca tau janyete na niṣkriyayā bhūmyeti na tasyāṃ tathā pratyayaḥ /
analyzed: devadatta kriyayā ca tau janyete na niṣkriyayā bhūmyā iti na tasyām tathā pratyayaḥ

original: yady evaṃ kriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt kriyālambana evāyaṃ pratyayaḥ na saṃyogavibhāgālambanaḥ /
analyzed: yadi evam kriyā anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt kriyā ālambanaḥ eva ayam pratyayaḥ na saṃyoga vibhāga ālambanaḥ

original: tadālambanatve hi tayor dvayavṛttitvāviśeṣāt viśeṣe kāraṇāṃ vācyam /
analyzed: tad ālambana tve hi tayoḥ dvaya vṛtti tva aviśeṣāt viśeṣe kāraṇām vācyam

original: yena puruṣa evāyaṃ pratyayaḥ na bhūmāv iti devadattakriyājanyatvena tu na viśeṣaḥ yataḥ kriyāyāḥ parokṣatve sati tad eva na vidmaḥ kim asau devadattāśrayā kriyā kiṃ vā bhūmyāśriteti saṃyogavibhāgakāryānumānasyobhayatrāpi tulyatvāt /
analyzed: yena puruṣaḥ eva ayam pratyayaḥ na bhūmau iti devadatta kriyā janya tvena tu na viśeṣaḥ yatas kriyāyāḥ parokṣa tve sati tat eva na vidmaḥ kim asau devadatta āśrayā kriyā kim vā bhūmi āśritā iti saṃyoga vibhāga kārya anumānasya ubhayatra api tulya tvāt

original: na ca devadatte gacchati bhūmau anavaratavahadvahalasaṃyogavibhāgavaty api vā taraṅgiṇītīrapāṣāṇe calatīti pratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: na ca devadatte gacchati bhūmau anavarata vahat vahala saṃyoga vibhāgavati api vā taraṅgiṇī tīra pāṣāṇe calati iti pratyayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: tasmāt kriyāviṣaya eva calatītipratyayaḥ na saṃyogavibhāgālambanaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt kriyā viṣayaḥ eva calati iti pratyayaḥ na saṃyoga vibhāga ālambanaḥ

original: saṃyogavibhāgāgrahaṇe 'pi ca nirālambe vihāyasi viharati vihaṅgame calatīti saṃvedanaṃ dṛśyate /
analyzed: saṃyoga vibhāga agrahaṇe ca nirālambe vihāyasi viharati vihaṅgame calati iti saṃvedanam dṛśyate

original: na a gaganasaṃyogaḥ pratyakṣaḥ pratyakṣetaravṛttitvāt gandhavahamahīruhasaṃyogavat //
analyzed: na a gagana saṃyogaḥ pratyakṣaḥ pratyakṣa itara vṛtti tvāt gandhavaha mahīruha saṃyoga vat

original: vitatālokāvayavyākāśaḥ tatsaṃyogaś ca patriṇāḥ pratyakṣa iti cet naitad evam tamālanīlajīmūtasamūhapihitāmbare /
analyzed: vitata āloka avayavi ākāśaḥ tad saṃyogaḥ ca patriṇāḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti ced na etat evam tamāla nīla jīmūta samūha pihita ambare

original: niśīthe sandhakāre 'pi calatkhadyotadarśanāt //255//
analyzed: niśīthe sandhakāre pi calat khadyota darśanāt

original: na tatrālokāvayavī kiś cana timirāvayavī vā vidyate iti kena saṃyogo gṛhyate vibhāgo vā bhūkampotpāte ca jāte calati vasumatīti matir asti /
analyzed: na tatra āloka avayavī kim cana timira avayavī vā vidyate iti kena saṃyogaḥ gṛhyate vibhāgaḥ vā bhū kampa utpāte ca jāte calati vasumati iti matiḥ asti

original: na tatra saṃyogavibhāgau gṛhyete bahulaniśīthe ca na tarām /
analyzed: na tatra saṃyoga vibhāgau gṛhyete bahula niśīthe ca na tarām

original: tasmān na saṃyogādyālambanā calatīti matiḥ api tu kriyālambanaiveti //
analyzed: tasmāt na saṃyoga ādi ālambanā calati iti matiḥ api tu kriyā ālambanā eva iti

original: na ca nityaparokā kriyā 'numātum api śakyā kāryasya kāraṇapūrvakatvena bhavanmate sambandhagrahaṇānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca nitya parokā kriyā numātum api śakyā kāryasya kāraṇa pūrvaka tvena bhavat mate sambandha grahaṇa anupapatteḥ

original: na hi te dravyasvarūpaṃ kāraṇām api tu kriyāviśiṣṭam /
analyzed: na hi te dravya sva rūpam kāraṇām api tu kriyā viśiṣṭam

original: kriyāyāś ca parokṣatvān na tadāviṣṭadravyagrahaṇāṃ sughaṭam iti kāraṇātvāgrahaṇāt ghaṭādāv api durghaṭā vyāptipratītiḥ //
analyzed: kriyāyāḥ ca parokṣa tvāt na tad āviṣṭa dravya grahaṇām su ghaṭam iti kāraṇā tva agrahaṇāt ghaṭa ādau api durghaṭā vyāpti pratītiḥ

original: ātmā 'numāne tu nāyaṃ doṣaḥ ghaṭādeḥ kāryasyāśritasya pratyakṣam upalambhāt /
analyzed: ātmā anumāne tu na ayam doṣaḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ kāryasya āśritasya pratyakṣam upalambhāt

original: tasmān na kāryānumeyā kriyā //
analyzed: tasmāt na kārya anumeyā kriyā

original: na ca saṃyogānumeyā [saṃyogāntaṃ karma] itinyāyāt /
analyzed: na ca saṃyoga anumeyā saṃyoga antam karma iti nyāyāt

original: vartamānāyāḥ kriyāyās tenānumātum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: vartamānāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ tena anumātum aśakya tvāt

original: kriyā 'numānavādaś ca sāmānyalakṣaṇe vistareṇa nirastaḥ //
analyzed: kriyā numāna vādaḥ ca sāmānya lakṣaṇe vistareṇa nirastaḥ

original: etena śaktyanumānam api vyudastaṃ veditavyam /
analyzed: etena śakti anumānam api vyudastam veditavyam

original: purā ca savistaram atīndriyaśaktinirākaraṇaṃ kṛtam eva //
analyzed: purā ca sa vistaram atīndriya śakti nirākaraṇam kṛtam eva

original: tenādṛṣṭakriyāśaktisvalakṣaṇam iti kṣamam /
analyzed: tena adṛṣṭa kriyā śakti sva lakṣaṇam iti kṣamam

original: nedaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ iti pūrvoktaṃ eva sat //258//
analyzed: na idam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam iti pūrva uktam eva sat

original: iti matupi vatau vā pratyaye varṇyamāne trividham idam ihoktaṃ yuktam evānumānam //
analyzed: iti matupi vatau vā pratyaye varṇyamāne trividham idam iha uktam yuktam eva anumānam

original: parakaviracitānāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ tv amuṣmin sati na bhavati śobhā bhāsvatīvendubhāsām //
analyzed: paraka viracitānām lakṣaṇānām tu amuṣmin sati na bhavati śobhā bhāsvatī iva indu bhāsām

original: bauddhoktapratibandhadūṣaṇadiśā tallakṣaṇaṃ dūṣitam bhūyodṛṣṭamitānvayaikaśaraṇaṃ śocyaṃ punaḥ śāvaram /
analyzed: bauddha ukta pratibandha dūṣaṇa diśā tad lakṣaṇam dūṣitam bhūyas dṛṣṭa mita anvaya eka śaraṇam śocyam punar śāvaram

original: sāṅkhyānāṃ tu kuto 'numānaghaṭanopādānarūpā yataḥ teṣāṃ jātir asau ca tadvikṛtivadbhinneti duḥstho 'nvayaḥ //
analyzed: sāṅkhyānām tu kutas numāna ghaṭana upādāna rūpāḥ yatas teṣām jātiḥ asau ca tad vikṛti vat bhinnā iti duḥsthaḥ nvayaḥ

original: idam idānīṃ cintyate /
analyzed: idam idānīm cintyate

original: yad etad indriyādisannikarṣajatvādinā lakṣitam asmadādipratyakṣaṃ tatkila prāyaśo vartamānakālaviśiṣṭavastuviṣayam /
analyzed: yat etat indriya ādi sannikarṣa ja tva ādinā lakṣitam asmat ādi pratyakṣam tat kila prāyaśas vartamāna kāla viśiṣṭa vastu viṣayam

original: evam idam anumānam api kiṃ tadgocaraṃ eva kiṃ vā kālāntaraparicchede 'pi kṣamam iti /
analyzed: evam idam anumānam api kim tad gocaram eva kim vā kāla antara paricchede kṣamam iti

original: tad ucyate trikālaviṣayam anumānam iti /
analyzed: tat ucyate tri kāla viṣayam anumānam iti

original: kasmāt traikālyagrahaṇāt /
analyzed: kasmāt traikālya grahaṇāt

original: trikālayuktā arthā anumānena gṛhyante /
analyzed: tri kāla yuktāḥ arthāḥ anumānena gṛhyante

original: bhūtā nadīpūreṇa vṛṣṭir anumīyate saiva bhaviṣyantī meghonnatyā dhūmena vartamāno 'gnir iti //
analyzed: bhūtā nadī pūreṇa vṛṣṭiḥ anumīyate sā eva bhaviṣyantī megha unnatyā dhūmena vartamānaḥ gniḥ iti

original: ataś a yan mīmāṃsakair ucyate codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantaṃ bhaviṣyantaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vyavahitaṃ viprakṛṣṭam ity evaṃjātīyakam arthaṃ śaknoty avagamayituṃ nānyat kiñ ca iti tad ayuktam codanāvat pramāṇāntarasyāpy evaṃ jātīyakaviṣayatvopapatteḥ /
analyzed: atas yat mīmāṃsakaiḥ ucyate codanā hi bhūtam bhavantam bhaviṣyantam sūkṣmam vyavahitam viprakṛṣṭam iti evaṃjātīyakam artham śaknoti avagamayitum na anyat kim ca iti tat ayuktam codanā vat pramāṇa antarasya api evam jātīyaka viṣaya tva upapatteḥ

original: pratyakṣam api yogīnāṃ trikālaviṣayaṃ uktam /
analyzed: pratyakṣam api tri kāla viṣayam uktam

original: asmadādīnām api kvacit iti //
analyzed: asmat ādīnām api kvacid iti

original: atra codayanti /
analyzed: atra codayanti

original: kāle sati traikālyagrahaṇaṃ cintyam sa eva tu durpapādaḥ /
analyzed: kāle sati traikālya grahaṇam cintyam saḥ eva tu durpapādaḥ

original: tadabhāve kasya vartamānādivibhāgo nirūpyate na tāvad gṛhyate kālaḥ pratyakṣeṇa ghatādivat /
analyzed: tad abhāve kasya vartamāna ādi vibhāgaḥ nirūpyate na tāvat gṛhyate kālaḥ pratyakṣeṇa ghata ādi vat

original: cirakṣiprādibodho 'pi kāryamātrāvalambanaḥ //257//
analyzed: cira kṣipra ādi bodhaḥ pi kārya mātra avalambanaḥ

original: na cāmunaiva liṅgena kālasya parikalpanā /
analyzed: na ca amunā eva liṅgena kālasya parikalpanā

original: pratibandho hi dṛṣṭo 'tra na dhūmajvalanādivat //260//
analyzed: pratibandhaḥ hi dṛṣṭaḥ na dhūma jvalana ādi vat

original: pratibhāsātirekas tu kathañcid upapatsyate /
analyzed: pratibhāsa atirekaḥ tu kathañcid upapatsyate

original: pracitāṃ kājcid āśritya kriyākṣaṇaparamparām //261//
analyzed: pracitām kāccid āśritya kriyā kṣaṇa paramparām

original: na caiṣa grahanakṣatraparispandasvabhāvakaḥ /
analyzed: na ca eṣa graha nakṣatra parispanda svabhāvakaḥ

original: kālaḥ kalpayituṃ yuktaḥ kriyāto nāparo hy asau //262//
analyzed: kālaḥ kalpayitum yuktaḥ kriyātaḥ na aparaḥ hi asau

original: muhūrtayāmāhorātramāsartvayanavatsaraiḥ /
analyzed: muhūrta yāma ahorātra māsa ṛtu ayana vatsaraiḥ

original: loke kālpanikair eva vyavahāro bhaviṣyate //263//
analyzed: loke kālpanikaiḥ eva vyavahāraḥ bhaviṣyate

original: yadi tv eko vibhur nityaḥ kālo dravyātmako mataḥ /
analyzed: yadi tu ekaḥ vibhuḥ nityaḥ kālaḥ dravya ātmakaḥ mataḥ

original: atītavartamānādibhedavyavahṛtiḥ kutaḥ //264//
analyzed: atīta vartamāna ādi bheda vyavahṛtiḥ kutas

original: evam ākṣipte sati pratyakṣagamyatām eva kecit kālasya manvate /
analyzed: evam ākṣipte sati pratyakṣa gamya tām eva kecid kālasya manvate

original: viśeṣaṇatayā kāryapratyaye pratibhāsanāt //265//
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa tayā kārya pratyaye pratibhāsanāt

original: krameṇa yugapat kṣipraṃ cirāt kṛtam itīdṛśāḥ /
analyzed: krameṇa yugapad kṣipram cirāt kṛtam iti īdṛśāḥ

original: pratyayā nāvakalpante kāryamātrāvalambanāḥ //266//
analyzed: pratyayāḥ na avakalpante kārya mātra avalambanāḥ

original: na hi viṣayātisayam antareṇa pratibhāsātiśayo 'vakalpate //
analyzed: na hi viṣaya atisayam antareṇa pratibhāsa atiśayaḥ

original: arūpo nanv ayaṃ kālaḥ kathaṃ gṛhyeta cakṣuṣā rūpam eva tavā rūpaṃ kathaṃ gṛhyeta cakṣuṣā //267//
analyzed: arūpaḥ nanu ayam kālaḥ katham gṛhyeta cakṣuṣā rūpam eva tava ā rūpam katham gṛhyeta cakṣuṣā

original: kathaṃ vā rūpavanto 'pi parokṣāḥ paramāṇavaḥ tasmāt pratītir anveṣyā kiṃ nimittaparīkṣayā //268//
analyzed: katham vā rūpavantaḥ pi parokṣāḥ paramāṇavaḥ tasmāt pratītiḥ anveṣyā kim nimitta parīkṣayā

original: nanu dravye 'yam niyamaḥ na rūpādau /
analyzed: nanu dravye yam niyamaḥ na rūpa ādau

original: dravye 'pi nāyaṃ niyamaḥ yat rūpavat tat pratyakṣam iti yena paramāṇūnāṃ tathābhāvaḥ syāt /
analyzed: dravye pi na ayam niyamaḥ yat rūpavat tat pratyakṣam iti yena paramāṇūnām tathābhāvaḥ syāt

original: kin tu yat pratyakṣaṃ tat rūpavad iti /
analyzed: kin tu yat pratyakṣam tat rūpavat iti

original: tad uktam [trayāṇāṃ pratyakṣatvarūpavattvadravatvādīni] iti //
analyzed: tat uktam trayāṇām pratyakṣa tva rūpavat tva drava tva ādīni iti

original: nedaṃ daivikaṃ vacanaṃ yad anatikramaṇīyam /
analyzed: na idam daivikam vacanam yat an atikramaṇīyam

original: na ca vacanena pratyakṣatvam apratyakṣatvaṃ vā vyavasthāpyate /
analyzed: na ca vacanena pratyakṣa tvam apratyakṣa tvam vā vyavasthāpyate

original: pratyakṣatvaṃ hi endriyikapratītiviṣayatvam ucyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣa tvam hi endriyika pratīti viṣaya tvam ucyate

original: tac ced asti kālasya nīrūpasyāpi pratyakṣatā kena vāryate rūpavattvaṃ taddravyāṇām astu tathā darśanāt //
analyzed: tat ced asti kālasya nīrūpasya api pratyakṣa tā kena vāryate rūpavat tvam tad dravyāṇām astu tathā darśanāt

original: na cānuddhāṭitākṣasya kṣiprādipratyayodayaḥ /
analyzed: na ca an uddhāṭita akṣasya kṣipra ādi pratyaya udayaḥ

original: tadbhāvānuvidhānena tasmāt kālas tu cākṣuṣaḥ //269//
analyzed: tad bhāva anuvidhānena tasmāt kālaḥ tu cākṣuṣaḥ

original: svatantra eva tarhi ghaṭādivat kasmān na gṛhyate kāla iti cet vastusvabhāva eṣa na paryanuyogārhaḥ /
analyzed: svatantraḥ eva tarhi ghaṭa ādi vat kasmāt na gṛhyate kālaḥ iti ced vastu svabhāvaḥ eṣa na paryanuyoga arhaḥ

original: rūpidravyaviśeṣaṇatāṃ gatasya tasya grahaṇam na daṇḍādivat svatantrasyāpīti /
analyzed: rūpi dravya viśeṣaṇa tām gatasya tasya grahaṇam na daṇḍa ādi vat svatantrasya api iti

original: gaganādes tv anyaviśeṣaṇatayā 'pi na grahaṇām astīti tasyāpratyakṣatvam na tv arūpatvāt //
analyzed: gagana ādeḥ tu anya viśeṣaṇa tayā asti iti tasya apratyakṣa tvam na tu arūpa tvāt

original: atha vadet viśeṣaṇasyāpi rūpavat eva daṇḍāeḥ cakṣuṣā grahaṇām na kālāder iti tad ayuktam arūpasyāpi sāmānyādeḥ viśeṣaṇasya cakṣuṣā grahaṇāt /
analyzed: atha vadet viśeṣaṇasya api rūpavat eva na kāla ādeḥ iti tat ayuktam arūpasya api sāmānya ādeḥ viśeṣaṇasya cakṣuṣā grahaṇāt

original: dravye niyama iti cet uktam atra yad eva nayanakaraṇakāvagamagocare saṃcarati tad eva cākṣuṣaṃ rūpavad arupaṃ vā dravyam adravyaṃ veti //
analyzed: dravye niyamaḥ iti ced uktam atra yat eva nayana karaṇaka avagama gocare saṃcarati tat eva cākṣuṣam rūpavat arupam vā dravyam adravyam vā iti

original: evaṃ guru dravyam iti kārtasvarādau pratibhāsāt gurutvam api pratyakṣaṃ na patanānumeyam eva //
analyzed: evam guru dravyam iti kārtasvara ādau pratibhāsāt guru tvam api pratyakṣam na patana anumeyam eva

original: tasmāt svatantrabhāvena viśeṣaṇatayā 'pi /
analyzed: tasmāt svatantra bhāvena viśeṣaṇa tayā pi

original: cākṣuṣajñānagamyaṃ yat tat pratyakṣam upeyatām //270//
analyzed: cākṣuṣa jñāna gamyam yat tat pratyakṣam upeyatām

original: ata eva pratyakṣaḥ kālaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva pratyakṣaḥ kālaḥ

original: evaṃ samānanyāyatvāt pūrvāparādipratyayagamyā dig api pratyakṣā veditavyeti //
analyzed: evam samāna nyāya tvāt pūrva apara ādi pratyaya gamyā diś api pratyakṣā veditavyā iti

original: anye manyante daṇḍī devadattaḥ nīlam utpalaṃ itivad viṣayātirekasyāgrahaṇāt pratyayātiśayasya ca parokṣakālapakṣe 'pi tatkāraṇākasyopapatter anumeya eva kālaḥ //
analyzed: anye manyante daṇḍī devadattaḥ nīlam utpalam iti vat viṣaya atirekasya agrahaṇāt pratyaya atiśayasya ca parokṣa kāla pakṣe anumeyaḥ eva kālaḥ

original: apratyakṣatvamātreṇa na ca kālasyanāstitā /
analyzed: apratyakṣa tva mātreṇa na ca kālasya anāstitā

original: yuktā pṛthivyadhobhāgacandramaḥparabhāgavat //271//
analyzed: yuktā pṛthivī adhobhāga candramaḥ parabhāga vat

original: apratibhāsamāno 'pi kālaḥ saṃskāra ivendriyasahacaritaḥ pratyabhijñāṃ kṣiprādipratītiṃ janayiṣyati /
analyzed: apratibhāsamānaḥ pi kālaḥ saṃskāraḥ iva indriya sahacaritaḥ pratyabhijñām kṣipra ādi pratītim janayiṣyati

original: kṛtaś pratyakṣalakṣaṇe mahān kaliḥ kiṃ viṣayabhedād evapratibhāsabhedaḥ utopāyabhedād api iti /
analyzed: kṛtaḥ pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe mahān kaliḥ kim viṣaya bhedāt eva pratibhāsa bhedaḥ uta upāya bhedāt api iti

original: tad alaṃ punas tadvimardena //
analyzed: tat alam punar tad vimardena

original: pramāṇām iti nirṇītaṃ pratyakṣaṃ savikalpakam /
analyzed: iti nirṇītam pratyakṣam sa vikalpakam

original: tasmān na kalpanāmātraṃ cirakṣiprādisaṃvidaḥ //272//
analyzed: tasmāt na kalpanā mātram cira kṣipra ādi saṃvidaḥ

original: na cāsāṃ paridṛśyamānakāraṇavinirmitatvam upapadyate kriyamāṇasya paṭādeḥ kāryasya tadutpādakasya ca tantuturīvemaśalākākuvindādikāraṇābṛndasya sāmye 'pi kvacit tūrṇaṃ kṛtam kvacic cireṇa kṛtam iti pratibhāsabhedadarśanāt nimittāntaraṃ cintanīyam //
analyzed: na ca āsām paridṛśyamāna kāraṇa vinirmita tvam upapadyate kriyamāṇasya paṭa ādeḥ kāryasya tad utpādakasya ca tantu turī vema śalākā kuvinda ādi kāraṇā bṛndasya sāmye kvacid tūrṇam kṛtam kvacid cireṇa kṛtam iti pratibhāsa bheda darśanāt nimitta antaram cintanīyam

original: nanu parispandādikriyābheda evātra nimittam /
analyzed: nanu parispanda ādi kriyā bhedaḥ eva atra nimittam

original: kaścit parispandaś caturaḥ kaścin manthara iti kvacit kṣiprabuddhiḥ kvacic cirabuddhir iti naitaccāru parispandagatayor api cāturyamāntharyayor nimittāntarakāryatvāt /
analyzed: kaścid parispandaḥ caturaḥ kaścid mantharaḥ iti kvacid kṣipra buddhiḥ kvacid cira buddhiḥ iti na etat cāru parispanda gatayoḥ api cāturya māntharyayoḥ nimitta antara kārya tvāt

original: parispande 'pi cireṇa gacchati śīghraṃ dhāvatīti cirakṣiprādipratītir dṛśyate //
analyzed: parispande cireṇa gacchati śīghram dhāvati iti cira kṣipra ādi pratītiḥ dṛśyate

original: āha na devadattādiparispandanibandhanāḥ kramākramādipratyayāḥ kin tu grahamakṣatrādiparispandanibandhanāḥ /
analyzed: āha na devadatta ādi parispanda nibandhanāḥ kramākrama ādi pratyayāḥ kin tu graha makṣatra ādi parispanda nibandhanāḥ

original: sa eva ca grahatātādiparispandaḥ kāla ity ucyate /
analyzed: saḥ eva ca graha tā tā ādi parispandaḥ kālaḥ iti ucyate

original: tatkṛta evāyaṃ yāmāhorātramāsādivyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: tad kṛtaḥ eva ayam yāma ahar rātra māsa ādi vyavahāraḥ

original: tasya svata eva bhedādaupādhikabhedakalpanākleśo na bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tasya svatas eva bhedāt aupādhika bheda kalpanā kleśaḥ na bhaviṣyati

original: bhedaparicchede nālikāpraharādir upāyaḥ iyatī nālikāiyan muhūrtam iyān prahara iti /
analyzed: bheda paricchede nālikā prahara ādiḥ upāyaḥ iyatī nālikā iyat muhūrtam iyān praharaḥ iti

original: tatraikasmin muhūrte prahare vā nirvarttyamāneṣū bahuṣu kāryeṣu yugapad iti bhavati matiḥ muhūrtāntarāpekṣeṣu krameṇeti /
analyzed: tatra ekasmin muhūrte prahare vā nirvarttyamāneṣu bahuṣu kāryeṣu yugapad iti bhavati matiḥ muhūrta antara apekṣeṣu krameṇa iti

original: tasmāt grahādiparispanda eva tais tair nimittair upalakṣyamāṇapramāṇāḥ kāla iti /
analyzed: tasmāt graha ādi parispandaḥ eva taiḥ taiḥ nimittaiḥ upalakṣyamāṇa pramāṇāḥ kālaḥ iti

original: kālavidaś ca jyotirgaṇakāsta evainaṃ budhyante //
analyzed: kāla vidaḥ ca jyotiḥ gaṇakāḥ te eva enam budhyante

original: tad asāṃPratam candrādigrahaparicchede 'pi kramādipratītidarśanāt //
analyzed: tat asāṃpratam candra ādi graha paricchede pi krama ādi pratīti darśanāt

original: cireṇāstaṃ gato bhānuḥ śītāṃśuḥ śīghram udgataḥ /
analyzed: cireṇa astam gataḥ bhānuḥ śītāṃśuḥ śīghram udgataḥ

original: uditāv iva dṛśyete yugapad bhaumabhārgavau //273//
analyzed: uditau iva dṛśyete yugapad bhauma bhārgavau

original: iti dṛśyate pratibhāsaḥ /
analyzed: iti dṛśyate pratibhāsaḥ

original: na ca grahāntaraparispandakāraṇāka eṣa śakyate vaktuṃ anavasthāprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na ca graha antara parispanda kāraṇākaḥ eṣa śakyate vaktum anavasthā prasaṅgāt

original: tasmān na grahādiparispandaḥ kālaḥ kin tu vastvantaram yat kṛto 'yaṃ kramākramādivyavahāraḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na graha ādi parispandaḥ kālaḥ kin tu vastu antaram yat kṛtaḥ yam kramākrama ādi vyavahāraḥ

original: nanu bhavatkalpito 'pi kālaḥ kiṃ svata eva kramākramasvabhāvaḥ hetvantarād vā svatas tasya tatsvabhāvatve kāryasyaiva paṭādeḥ paridṛśyamānasya tatsvabhāvyaṃ bhavatu kiṃ kālena hetvantarapakṣe tv anavasthā tasyāpi hetvantarāpekṣatvād iti tad etad bāliśacodyam śuklaguṇādāv apy evaṃ vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
analyzed: nanu bhavat kalpitaḥ api kālaḥ kim svatas eva kramākrama svabhāvaḥ hetu antarāt vā svatas tasya tad svabhāva tve kāryasya eva paṭa ādeḥ paridṛśyamānasya tad svabhāvyam bhavatu kim kālena hetu antara pakṣe tu anavasthā tasya api hetu antara apekṣa tvāt iti tat etat bāliśa codyam śukla guṇa ādau api evam vaktum śakya tvāt

original: guṇasya svataḥ śuklasvabhāvatve dravyasyaiva tad bhavatu kiṃ guṇena guṇāntarakalpane tv anavastheti //
analyzed: guṇasya svatas śukla svabhāva tve dravyasya eva tat bhavatu kim guṇena guṇa antara kalpane tu anavasthā iti

original: atha tatra tathā darśanāt nedaṃ codyam tad ihāpi samānam /
analyzed: atha tatra tathā darśanāt na idam codyam tat iha api samānam

original: kāryeṣu paṭadiṣu nimittāntarakṛtaḥ kramādivyvahāraḥ nimittāntare nimittāntaraṃ na mṛgyam iti /
analyzed: kāryeṣu paṭa diṣu nimitta antara kṛtaḥ krama ādi vyvahāraḥ nimitta antare nimitta antaram na mṛgyam iti

original: tasmād asti yugapadādivyavahārahetuḥ kālaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt asti yugapad ādi vyavahāra hetuḥ kālaḥ

original: ataś caivam dṛṣṭaḥ parāparatvasya dikkṛtasya viparyayaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca evam dṛṣṭaḥ parāparatvasya diś kṛtasya viparyayaḥ

original: yuvasthavirayoḥ so 'pi vinā kālaṃ na siddhyati //274//
analyzed: yuva sthavirayoḥ vinā kālam na

original: dūrataradigavacchinno devadattādiḥ para iti pratibhāsate nikaṭadigavacchinnas tu apara iti /
analyzed: dūratara diś avacchinnaḥ devadatta ādiḥ paraḥ iti pratibhāsate nikaṭa diś avacchinnaḥ tu aparaḥ iti

original: te ete dikkṛte paratvāparatve viparivartamāne dṛśyete /
analyzed: te ete dikkṛte paratva aparatve viparivartamāne dṛśyete

original: dūrastho hi yuvā apara ity ucyate nikaṭastho 'pi sthaviraḥ para iti /
analyzed: dūra sthaḥ hi yuvā aparaḥ iti ucyate nikaṭa sthaḥ u pi sthaviraḥ paraḥ iti

original: tad atra na kālavyatiriktaṃ kāraṇām upapadyate ity ato 'numīyate kālaḥ //
analyzed: tat atra na kāla vyatiriktam kāra ṇām upapadyate iti atas numīyate kālaḥ

original: sa cāyam ākāśavat sarvatraikaḥ kālaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ayam ākāśa vat sarvatra ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: yathā ''kāśaliṅgasya śabdasya satvatrāviśeṣāt viśeṣaliṅābhāc caikaḥ tathā //
analyzed: yathā kāśa liṅgasya śabdasya viśeṣa liṅ ābhāt ca ekaḥ tathā

original: sarvatra tadvyavahārād vibhuḥ /
analyzed: sarvatra tad vyavahārāt vibhuḥ

original: avayavāśrayānupalaṃbhāt niravayavaḥ anāśritaś ca /
analyzed: avayava āśraya anupalaṃbhāt niravayavaḥ anāśritaḥ ca

original: anāśritatvād eva dravyam /
analyzed: anāśrita tvāt eva dravyam

original: ata evāvayavavibhāgādināśakāraṇānupapatter nitya iti //
analyzed: atas eva avayava vibhāga ādi nāśa kāraṇa anupapatteḥ nityaḥ iti

original: nanu evañcaikatvāt kālasya kuto vartamānādivibhāgaḥ tadabhāvāt kathaṃ trikālaviṣayam anumānam ucyate ucyate na tāttvikaḥ kālasya bhedo vartamānādiḥ /
analyzed: nanu evam ca eka tvāt kālasya kutas vartamāna ādi vibhāgaḥ tad abhāvāt katham tri kāla viṣayam anumānam ucyate ucyate na tāttvikaḥ kālasya bhedaḥ vartamāna ādiḥ

original: kin tv asann apy asau vyavahārasiddhaye kenacid upādhinā kalpyate //
analyzed: kin tu asan api asau vyavahāra siddhaye kenacid upādhinā kalpyate

original: kaḥ punar asāv upādhiḥ kriyeti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ punar asau upādhiḥ kriyā iti brūmaḥ

original: nanu tasyā api na svato vartamānādibhedaḥ tadbhāve vā saiva tathā bhavatu kiṃ kālena maivamutpattisthitinirodhayogiphalāvacchedena nānākṣaṇaparamparātmikā krithety ucyate sā vartamānādibhedavatī ca /
analyzed: nanu tasyāḥ api na svatas vartamāna ādi bhedaḥ tad bhāve vā sā eva tathā bhavatu kim kālena mā evam utpatti sthiti nirodha yogi phala avacchedena nānā kṣaṇa paramparā ātmikā krithā iti ucyate sā vartamāna ādi bhedavatī ca

original: tathā hi sthālyadhiśrayaṇāt prabhiṛti ā tadavataraṇād utpadyamānaudanākhyaphalāvacchedāt kriyā vartamānocyate [pacati] iti tadavacchedāt ghaṭākāśavat kalo 'pi tāvān vartamāna ity ucyate /
analyzed: tathā hi sthālī adhiśrayaṇāt prabhiṛti ā tad avataraṇāt utpadyamāna odana ākhya phala avacchedāt kriyā vartamānā ucyate pacati iti tad avacchedāt ghaṭa ākāśa vat tāvān vartamānaḥ iti ucyate

original: abhinirvṛttaphalāvacchedātmā parispandasantatir atītā bhavati [apākṣīt] iti tadavacchedāt kālo 'py atīta ucyate /
analyzed: abhinirvṛtta phala avaccheda ātmā parispanda santatiḥ atītā bhavati apākṣīt iti tad avacchedāt kālaḥ pi atītaḥ ucyate

original: anārabdhaphalāvacchedāt bhaviṣyantī kriyocyate [pakṣyati] iti tathā kālo 'pīty evam aupādhikaḥ kālo vartamānāditrayavyavahāraḥ //
analyzed: anārabdha phala avacchedāt bhaviṣyantī kriyā ucyate pakṣyati iti tathā evam aupādhikaḥ kālaḥ vartamāna ādi traya vyavahāraḥ

original: ataś ca yad ucyate vṛkṣāt patataḥ parṇāsya bhūtabhaviṣyantāvadhvānau dṛśyete na vartamānaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca yat ucyate vṛkṣāt patataḥ bhūta bhaviṣyantau adhvānau dṛśyete na vartamānaḥ

original: tasmād vartamānaḥ kālo nāstīti tad asambaddham adhvavyaṅgyatvābhāvāt kālasya /
analyzed: tasmāt vartamānaḥ kālaḥ na asti iti tat asambaddham adhva vyaṅgya tva abhāvāt kālasya

original: na hy adhvavyaṅgyaḥ kālabhedaḥ /
analyzed: na hi adhva vyaṅgyaḥ kāla bhedaḥ

original: kin tu yathoktakrameṇā kriyāvyṅgya eveti /
analyzed: kin tu yathā ukta krameṇa ā kriyā vyṅgyaḥ eva iti

original: kriyāparikalpitabhedanibandhanaś cāyaṃ kṣaṇalavakāṣṭhākalānālikāmuhūrtayāmāhorātramāsartvayanasaṃvatsarayugamanvantarakalpavyavahāra ity alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: kriyā parikalpita bheda nibandhanaḥ ca ayam kṣaṇa lava kāṣṭhā kalā nālikā muhūrta yāma ahorātra māsa ṛtu ayana saṃvatsara yuga manvantara kalpa vyavahāraḥ iti alam prasaṅgena

original: tithyādibhedāvadhāraṇāṃ ca vaidikakarmaprayogāṅgam [paurṇām āsyāṃ paurṇam āsyāṃ yajeta][amāvāsyāyām amāvāsyāyāṃ ca]iti /
analyzed: tithi ādi bheda avadhāraṇām ca vaidika karma prayoga aṅgam paurṇām āsyām paurṇam āsyām yajeta amāvāsyāyām amāvāsyāyām ca eti

original: evaṃ vasantādyratubhedo 'pi tadaṅgam [vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīn ādadhīta grīṣme rājanyaḥ śaradi vaiśyaḥ varsāsu rathakāraḥ iti //
analyzed: evam tad aṅgam vasante brāhmaṇaḥ gnīn ādadhīta grīṣme rājanyaḥ śaradi vaiśyaḥ varsāsu rathakāraḥ iti

original: sa cāyam ṛtutithyādivibhāgaḥ kriyayiva jyotiś śāstropadiṣṭaviśiṣṭarāśisaṃsṛṣṭacandrādigrhagatayā lakṣyate laukikena ca lakṣmaṇā tena teneti /
analyzed: sa ca ayam ṛtu tithi ādi vibhāgaḥ kriyayā iva jyotiḥ śāstra upadiṣṭa viśiṣṭa rāśi saṃsṛṣṭa candra ādi grha gatayā lakṣyate laukikena ca lakṣmaṇā tena tena iti

original: tad yathā cañcvagracumbitātāmracūtāṅkrakadambakaiḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā cañcu agra cumbita ātāmra cūta aṅkra kadambakaiḥ

original: kathyate kokilailr eva madhurmadhurakūjitaiḥ //275//
analyzed: kathyate kokilaiḥ eva madhuḥ madhura kūjitaiḥ

original: divākarakarālātapātanirdagdhavīrudhaḥ /
analyzed: divākara karāla ātapāta nirdagdha vīrudhaḥ

original: mārgāśamallikāmodā bhavanti grīṣmaśaṃsinaḥ //276//
analyzed: mārgāśa mallikā āmodāḥ bhavanti grīṣma śaṃsinaḥ

original: śikhaṇḍimaṇḍalārabdhacaṇḍatāṇḍavaḍambaraiḥ /
analyzed: śikhaṇḍi maṇḍala ārabdha caṇḍa tāṇḍava ḍambaraiḥ

original: prāvṛḍākhyāyate meghamedurair medinīdharaiḥ //277//
analyzed: prāvṛṣ ākhyāyate megha meduraiḥ medinīdharaiḥ

original: mauktikākāravistāritārānikaracitritam /
analyzed: mauktika ākāra vistāri tārā nikara citritam

original: śaratpiśunatāṃ yāti yamunāmbhonibhaṃ nabhaḥ //278//
analyzed: śarad piśuna tām yāti yamunā ambhaḥ nibham nabhaḥ

original: āyāmayāminībhogasaphalābhogavibhramāḥ /
analyzed: āyāma yāminī bhoga sa phala ābhoga vibhramāḥ

original: hemantam abhinandanti soṣmāṇas taruṇīs tanāḥ //279//
analyzed: hemantam abhinandanti sa ūṣmāṇaḥ taruṇīḥ tanāḥ

original: āskandanadalatkundakalikotkaradanturāḥ /
analyzed: āskandana dalat kunda kalikā utkara danturāḥ

original: vadanti śiśiraṃ vātāḥ tuṣārakaṇakarkśāḥ //280//
analyzed: vadanti śiśiram vātāḥ tuṣāra kaṇa karkśāḥ

original: tasmād eko 'py ayaṃ kālaḥ kriyābhedād vibhidyate /
analyzed: tasmāt ekaḥ pi ayam kālaḥ kriyā bhedāt vibhidyate

original: etena sadṛśanyāyāt mantavyā dik samarthitā //281//
analyzed: etena sadṛśa nyāyāt mantavyā diś samarthitā

original: pūrvapaścimādipratyayānāṃ kevalavṛKādipratyayavailakṣṇyena kāraṇāntarānumānāt /
analyzed: pūrva paścima ādi pratyayānām kevala vṛka ādi pratyaya vailakṣṇyena kāraṇa antara anumānāt

original: digliṅgāviśeṣād ekatve 'pi diśo daśavidhāḥ /
analyzed: diś liṅga aviśeṣāt eka tve diśaḥ daśavidhāḥ

original: pradakṣiṇāvartaparivartamānamārtaṇḍamaṇḍalamarīcinicayacumbyamānakāñcanācalakaṭakasaṃyogopādhikṛtaḥ pūṛvapaśimādibhedaḥ kalpyate pūrvā pūrvadakṣiṇā dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇapaścimā paścimā paścimottarā uttarā uttarapūrvā adhastanī ūrdhvā ceti /
analyzed: pradakṣiṇa āvarta parivartamāna mārtaṇḍa maṇḍala marīci nicaya cumbyamāna kāñcana acala kaṭaka saṃyoga upādhi kṛtaḥ kalpyate pūrvā pūrva dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇa paścimā paścimā paścima uttarā uttarā uttara pūrvā adhastanī ūrdhvā ca iti

original: devatāparigrahavaśāc ca punar eṣaiva dik daśathocyate aindrī āgneyī yāmyā nairṛtī vāruṇī vāyavyā kauberī aiśānī nāgīyā brāhnī ceti //
analyzed: devatā parigraha vaśāt ca punar eṣā eva diś daśathā ucyate aindrī āgneyī yāmyā nairṛtī vāruṇī vāyavyā kauberī aiśānī nāgīyā brāhnī ca iti

original: nanu ca yenaiva pratyayena pratyakṣeṇā liṅgena vā satā dikkālāvagamyete tenaiva tayor bhedagrahaṇāt katham ekatvam tadavagamasamaya eva tathā bhedapratibhāsāt uktam sarvatra tatpratyayāviśeṣād iti //
analyzed: nanu ca yena eva pratyayena pratyakṣeṇa liṅgena vā satā diś kālau avagamyete tena eva tayoḥ bheda grahaṇāt katham eka tvam tad avagama samaye eva tathā bheda pratibhāsāt uktam sarvatra tad pratyaya aviśeṣāt iti

original: vyatyayadarśanāc ca yaivaikatra pūrvā dik saivānyatra dakṣiṇeti gṛhyate [prāgbhāgo yaḥ surāṣṭrāṇāṃ mālavānāṃ sa dakṣiṇaḥ] iti//
analyzed: vyatyaya darśanāt ca yā eva ekatra pūrvā diś sā eva anyatra dakṣiṇā iti gṛhyate prāc bhāgaḥ yaḥ surāṣṭrāṇām mālavānām sa dakṣiṇaḥ iti

original: kāle 'pi cirakṣiprādivibhāgaś cāvyavasthita eva dṛśyate yo hi anāgata iti parisphurati kālaḥ sa eva vartamāno bhavati bhūto bhavati ca /
analyzed: kāle pi cira kṣipra ādi vibhāgaḥ ca avyavasthitaḥ eva dṛśyate yaḥ hi anāgataḥ iti parisphurati kālaḥ saḥ eva vartamānaḥ bhavati bhūtaḥ bhavati ca

original: tathā ca ciram api śīghrībhavati śīghram api cirībhavati /
analyzed: tathā ca ciram api śīghrībhavati śīghram api cirībhavati

original: tasmāt tadbhedo 'py aupādhika iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt tad bhedaḥ u pi aupādhikaḥ iti siddham

original: samānatantre dikkālau vaitatyena vicintitau /
analyzed: samāna tantre diś kālau vaitatyena vicintitau

original: tan neha likhyate loke dveṣyā hi bahubhāṣiṇaḥ //282//
analyzed: tat na iha likhyate loke dveṣyāḥ hi bahu bhāṣiṇaḥ

original: siddhaḥ kālaś cākṣuṣo laiṅgiko vā tannānātvaṃ siddham aupādikaṃ ca /
analyzed: siddhaḥ kālaḥ cākṣuṣaḥ laiṅgikaḥ vā tat nānātvam siddham aupādikam ca

original: tasmād yukataṃ niścikāya trikālagrāhīty evaṃ sūtrakāro 'numānam //283//
analyzed: tasmāt niścikāya trikāla grāhi iti evam sūtrakāraḥ numānam

original: anumānānantaram upamānaṃ vibhāgasūtre paṭhitam iti tatkramena tasya lakṣaṇam ucyate prasiddhasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanam upamānam //1-1-6//
analyzed: anumāna anantaram upamānam vibhāga sūtre paṭhitam iti tad kramena tasya lakṣaṇam ucyate prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam

original: atra vṛddhanaiyāyikās tāvad evam upamānasvarūpam ācakṣate saṃjñāsaṃjñisambamdhapratītiphalaṃ prasiddhetarayoḥ sārūpyapratipādakam atideśavākyam evopamānam /
analyzed: atra vṛddha naiyāyikāḥ tāvat evam upamāna svarūpam ācakṣate saṃjñā saṃjñi sambamdha pratīti phalam prasiddha itarayoḥ sārūpya pratipādakam atideśa vākyam eva upamānam

original: gavayārthī hi nāgariko 'navagatagavayasvarūpas tadabhijñām āraṇyakaṃ pṛcchati [kīdṛk gavayaḥ] iti /
analyzed: gavaya arthī hi nāgarikaḥ nava gata gavaya svarūpaḥ tad abhijñām āraṇyakam pṛcchati kīdṛś gavayaḥ iti

original: sa tam āha [yadṛśo gaus tādṛśo gavayaḥ] iti /
analyzed: sa tam āha yadṛśaḥ gauḥ tādṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti

original: tad etad vākyam aprasiddhasya prasiddhena gavā sādṛśyam abhidadhat taddvārakamaprasiddhasya gavayasaṃjñābhidheyatvaṃ jñāpayatīty upamānam ucyate //
analyzed: tat etat vākyam aprasiddhasya prasiddhena gavā sādṛśyam abhidadhat tad dvārakam aprasiddhasya gavaya saṃjñā abhidheya tvam jñāpayati iti upamānam ucyate

original: nanu śabdasvabhāvatvād asya [āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ] ity anena gatārthatvān nedaṃ pramāṇantraṃ bhavet /
analyzed: nanu śabda svabhāva tvāt asya āpta upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti anena gatārtha tvāt na idam bhavet

original: na ca saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaparicchedaphalatvena pramāṇāntaratayā vaktavyā phalavaicitryeṇa pramānānantyaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na ca saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pariccheda phala tvena pramāṇa antara tayā vaktavyā phala vaicitryeṇa pramāna ānantya prasaṅgāt

original: laukikakāni hi vacanāni vaidikāni ca vidhiniṣedhabodhakāni nānāphalāny api bhavanti na śabdatām atikrāmanti ucyate yatra śabdapratyayād eva tatpraṇetṛpuruṣapratyayād eva vā arthatathātvam upāyāntarānapekṣam avagamyate sa āgama eva tata eva tadarthapratīteḥ /
analyzed: laukikakāni hi vacanāni vaidikāni ca vidhi niṣedha bodhakāni nānā phalāni api bhavanti na śabda tām atikrāmanti ucyate yatra śabda pratyayāt eva tad praṇetṛ puruṣa pratyayāt eva vā artha tathātvam upāya antara anapekṣam avagamyate saḥ āgamaḥ eva tatas eva tad artha pratīteḥ

original: yatra tu puruṣaḥ pratītyupāyam aparam upadiśati tatra tata evopāyāt tadarthāvadhāraṇam /
analyzed: yatra tu puruṣaḥ prati iti upāyam aparam upadiśati tatra tatas eva upāyāt tad artha avadhāraṇam

original: upāyamātrāvagame tu śabdavyāpāraḥ //
analyzed: upāya mātra avagame tu śabda vyāpāraḥ

original: yathā parārthānumāne agnimān ayaṃ parvataḥ dhūmavattvāt mahānasavad iti /
analyzed: yathā para artha anumāne agnimān ayam parvataḥ dhūmavat tvāt mahānasa vat iti

original: atra hi na puruṣopadeśaviśvāsād eva śailasya kṛśānumattāṃ pratipattā nimittāntaranirapekṣaḥ pratipadyate api tu tadavabodhakadhūmākhyaliṅgasāmarthyād eva /
analyzed: atra hi na puruṣa upadeśa viśvāsāt eva śailasya kṛśānumat tām pratipattā nimitta antara nirapekṣaḥ pratipadyate api tu tad avabodhaka dhūma ākhya liṅga sāmarthyāt eva

original: tad iha yady āṭaviko nāgarikāya gavayārthine tadavagamopāyaṃ prasiddhasādharmyaṃ nābhyadhāsyat tarhi tadupadeśa āgama evāntarabhaviṣyat /
analyzed: tat iha yadi āṭavikaḥ nāgarikāya gavaya arthine tad avagama upāyam prasiddha sādharmyam na abhyadhāsyat tarhi tad upadeśaḥ āgamaḥ eva antarabhaviṣyat

original: tadupadeśāt tu tata eva tadarthāvagama iti saty api śabdasvabhāvatve pramāṇantaram evedam /
analyzed: tad upadeśāt tu tatas eva tad artha avagamaḥ iti sati api śabda svabhāva tve pramāṇa antaram evā idam

original: pratipattā 'pi nāgariko nāraṇyakavākyād eva taṃ prāṇinaṃ gavayaśabdavācyatayā buddhyate kin tu sārūpyaṃ prasiddhena gavā tasya paśyati //
analyzed: pratipattā pi nāgarikaḥ na āraṇyaka vākyāt eva tam prāṇinam gavaya śabda vācya tayā buddhyate kin tu sārūpyam prasiddhena gavā tasya paśyati

original: kim āraṇyakavākyena na saṃpratyayo nātarakasya na brūmo na saṃpratyaya iti kin tu sārūpyam upāyāntaraṃ tadavagatāv asāv upadiṣṭāvān iti tato 'vagatir bhavanti na nihnotuṃ śakyata iti na śābdī sā pratītiḥ api tv aupamānikīti vacanam api bhavad idam upamānaṃ pramāṇāntaram iti yuktam /
analyzed: kim āraṇyaka vākyena na saṃpratyayaḥ na atarakasya na brūmaḥ na saṃpratyayaḥ iti kin tu sārūpyam upāya antaram tad avagatau asau upadiṣṭāvān iti tatas vagatiḥ bhavanti na nihnotum śakyate iti na śābdī sā pratītiḥ api tu aupamānikī iti vacanam api bhavat idam upamānam pramāṇa antaram iti yuktam

original: bhāṣyākṣarāṇy api caitatpakṣasākṣyacchāyām iva vadanti lakṣyante /
analyzed: bhāṣya akṣarāṇi api ca etat pakṣa sākṣya chāyām iva vadanti lakṣyante

original: tāni tu granthagauravabhayān na yojyante ity alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: tāni tu grantha gaurava bhayāt na yojyante iti alam prasaṅgena

original: adyatanās tu vyācakṣate śrutātideśavākyasya pramātur aprasiddhe piṇḍe prasiddhapiṇḍasārūpyajñānam indriyajaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhapratipattiphalam upamānam /
analyzed: adyatanāḥ tu vyācakṣate śruta atideśa vākyasya pramātuḥ aprasiddhe piṇḍe prasiddha piṇḍa sārūpya jñānam indriya jam saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratipatti phalam upamānam

original: taddhīndriyajanitam api dhūmajñānam iva tadagocaraprameyapramitisādhanāt pramāṇāntaram /
analyzed: tat hi indriya janitam api dhūma jñānam iva tad agocara prameya pramiti sādhanāt pramāṇa antaram

original: śrutātideśavākyo hi nāgarakaḥ kānane paribhraman gosadṛśaṃ prāṇinam avagacchati /
analyzed: śruta atideśa vākyaḥ hi nāgarakaḥ kānane paribhraman go sadṛśam prāṇinam avagacchati

original: tato vanecarapuruṣakathitaṃ [yathā gaus tathā gavayaḥ] iti vacanam anusmarati smṛtvā ca pratipadyate [ayaṃ gavayaśabdavācyaḥ] iti /
analyzed: tatas vanecara puruṣa kathitam yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ iti vacanam anusmarati smṛtvā ca pratipadyate ayam gavaya śabda vācyaḥ iti

original: tad etat saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhajñānaṃ tajjanyam ity upamānaphalam ity ucyate //
analyzed: tat etat saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha jñānam tat janyam iti upamāna phalam iti ucyate

original: pratyakṣaṃ tāvad etasmin viṣaye na kṛtaśramam /
analyzed: pratyakṣam tāvat etasmin viṣaye na kṛta śramam

original: vanasthagavayākāraparicchedaphalaṃ hi tat //1//
analyzed: vana stha gavaya ākāra pariccheda phalam hi tat

original: anumānaṃ punar nātra śaṅkām apy adhirohati /
analyzed: anumānam punar na atra śaṅkām api adhirohati

original: kva liṅgaliṅgisambandhaḥ kva saṃjñāsaṃjñitā matiḥ //2//
analyzed: kva liṅga liṅgi sambandhaḥ kva saṃjñā asaṃjñitā matiḥ

original: āgamād api tatsiddhiḥ na vanecarabhāṣitāt /
analyzed: āgamāt api tad siddhiḥ na vanecara bhāṣitāt

original: tatkālaṃ saṃjñino nāsti gavayasya hi darśanam //3//
analyzed: tad kālam saṃjñinaḥ na asti gavayasya hi darśanam

original: saṃjñāsaṃjñinoś ca paricchede sati tatsambandhaḥ suśako bhavati nānyathā /
analyzed: saṃjñā saṃjñinoḥ ca paricchede sati tad sambandhaḥ su śakaḥ bhavati na anyathā

original: ata eva pratyakṣapūrvakaṃ saṃjñākarmety ācakṣate //
analyzed: atas eva pratyakṣa pūrvakam saṃjñā karma iti ācakṣate

original: etad ākṣipati nāgarakapraśnam anurudhya vanacaraḥ /
analyzed: etat ākṣipati nāgaraka praśnam anurudhya vana caraḥ

original: brūte 'tideśakaṃ vākyaṃ yathā gaur gavayas tathā //4//
analyzed: brūte tideśakam vākyam yathā gauḥ gavayaḥ tathā

original: asyāyam arthaḥ yasya tvaṃ gosādṛśyaṃ nirīkṣase /
analyzed: asya ayam arthaḥ yasya tvam go sādṛśyam nirīkṣase

original: tam eva gavayaṃ vidyāḥ sa cāyaṃ saṃjñino grahaḥ //5//
analyzed: tam eva gavayam vidyāḥ sa ca ayam saṃjñinaḥ grahaḥ

original: sambandhakaraṇaṃ ceha viśeṣeṣu na yujyate /
analyzed: sambandha karaṇam ca iha viśeṣeṣu na yujyate

original: ānantyāt kin tu sāmānye tac cattham avadhāritam //6//
analyzed: ānantyāt kin tu sāmānye tat ca ittham avadhāritam

original: pratyakṣapūrvakaṃ saṃjñākarmeti na hi vaidikī /
analyzed: pratyakṣa pūrvakam saṃjñā karma iti na hi vaidikī

original: codanā kiṃ tv avacchedaḥ saṃjñino 'tra vivakṣitaḥ //7//
analyzed: codanā kim tu avacchedaḥ vivakṣitaḥ

original: sa tu pratyakṣato vā 'stu pramāṇāntarato 'pi vā /
analyzed: sa tu pratyakṣataḥ vā stu pramāṇa antarataḥ vā

original: smaryamāṇo 'pi cārthe 'sti saṅketakaraṇaṃ kvacit //8//
analyzed: ca arthe sti saṅketa karaṇam kvacid

original: yo 'sau tatra tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ prāṇī sa rurur ucyate /
analyzed: yaḥ sau tatra tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ prāṇī sa ruruḥ ucyate

original: kvacit tu kaiścin nirdiśya parokṣam upalakṣaṇaiḥ //9//
analyzed: kvacid tu kaiścid nirdiśya parokṣam upalakṣaṇaiḥ

original: saṃjñinaṃ vyahartāraḥ tatra saṃjñāṃ niyuñjate /
analyzed: saṃjñinam vyahartāraḥ tatra saṃjñām niyuñjate

original: danturo romaśaḥ śyāmo vāmanaḥ pṛthulocanaḥ //10//
analyzed: danturaḥ romaśaḥ śyāmaḥ vāmanaḥ pṛthu locanaḥ

original: yas tatra cipiṭagrīvas taṃ caitram avadhārayoḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tatra cipiṭa grīvaḥ tam caitram avadhārayoḥ

original: evam atrāpi gopiṇḍasārūpyeṇopalakṣite //11//
analyzed: evam atra api go piṇḍa sārūpyeṇa upalakṣite

original: vacye vācakasambandhabodhanaṃ naiva durghaṭam /
analyzed: vacye vācaka sambandha bodhanam nā eva durghaṭam

original: atha sopaplavā vākyāt buddhir ity abhidhīyate //12//
analyzed: atha sa upaplavā vākyāt buddhiḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: upaplavo 'pi sambandhe na kaścid anubhūyate /
analyzed: upaplavaḥ pi sambandhe na kaścid anubhūyate

original: yas tv asti gavayākāraṃ prati kīdṛg asāv iti //13//
analyzed: yaḥ tu asti gavaya ākāram prati kīdṛś asau iti

original: so 'pi pratyakṣato dṛṣṭe gavaye vinivartate /
analyzed: saḥ pi pratyakṣatas dṛṣṭe gavaye vinivartate

original: pratyakṣāgamasiddhe 'rthe tasmān mānāntareṇa kim //14//
analyzed: pratyakṣa āgama siddhe rthe tasmāt māna antareṇa kim

original: atrāhuḥ nāṭavikaraṭitāt vākyāt vispaṣṭaḥsaṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhapratyayo bhavitum arhati saṃjñinas tadānīm apratyakṣatvāt /
analyzed: atra āhuḥ nāṭavika raṭitāt vākyāt vispaṣṭaḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratyayaḥ bhavitum arhati saṃjñinaḥ tadānīm apratyakṣa tvāt

original: yady api gosārūpyaviśiṣṭatayā tadavagama upapāditaḥ tathā 'pi sopaplavaiva bhavati tadānīṃ buddhiḥ //
analyzed: yadi api go sārūpya viśiṣṭa tayā tad avagamaḥ upapāditaḥ tathā sa upaplavā eva bhavati tadānīm buddhiḥ

original: na nirākāṅkṣtābuddhis tadānīm upjāyate /
analyzed: na nirākāṅkṣa abuddhiḥ tadānīm upjāyate

original: tadutpādanaparyantaḥ śabdavyāpāra iṣyate //15//
analyzed: tad utpādana paryantaḥ śabda vyāpāraḥ iṣyate

original: na cāsau nirvahaty atra vācyasaṃvittyapekṣaṇāt /
analyzed: na ca asau nirvahati atra vācya saṃvitti apekṣaṇāt

original: śabdena tad anirvāhāt na svakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet //16//
analyzed: śabdena tat anirvāhāt na sva kāryam kṛtam bhavet

original: sambandhapratipattiś ca sāmānye yady apīṣyate /
analyzed: sambandha pratipattiḥ ca sāmānye yadi api iṣyate

original: tad apy aviditavyakti na samyagavadharitam //17//
analyzed: tat api avidita vyakti na samyak avadharitam

original: gavayākāravṛttiś ca tadānīṃ buddhyupaplavaḥ /
analyzed: gavaya ākāra vṛttiḥ ca tadānīm buddhi upaplavaḥ

original: sambandhe 'pi dvyadhiṣṭhāne dadhāti śyāmalāṃ dhiyam //18//
analyzed: sambandhe pi dvi adhiṣṭhāne dadhāti śyāmalām dhiyam

original: pratyakṣapūrvakaṃ tasmāt saṃjñākarmeti gīyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣa pūrvakam tasmāt saṃjñā karma iti gīyate

original: kvacit tad eva pratyakṣaṃ smṛtidvāreṇa kāraṇam//19//
analyzed: kvacid tat eva pratyakṣam smṛti dvāreṇa

original: pūrvadṛṣṭe kuraṅgādau sambandho darśito yathā /
analyzed: pūrva dṛṣṭe kuraṅga ādau sambandhaḥ darśitaḥ yathā

original: caitre pratyakṣavat siddhiḥ danturādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ//20//
analyzed: caitre pratyakṣa vat siddhiḥ

original: iha punar atideśavacanasamaye gosādṛśyamātropadeśye saty api saṃjñini nanivartata evopaplavaḥ pramāṇāntaraparicchedasāpekṣakasaṃjñirūpopadeśāt //
analyzed: iha punar atideśa vacana samaye go sādṛśya mātra upadeśye sati api saṃjñini na nivartate eva upaplavaḥ pramāṇa antara pariccheda sāpekṣaka saṃjñi rūpa upadeśāt

original: yatra gosādṛśyaṃ paśyasīti pratyakṣād eva tarhi sa upaplavo viraṃsyatīti cet na pratyakṣasyendriyasannikarṣādisvabhāvasya saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhabodhakaraṇāsamarthatvāt //
analyzed: yatra go sādṛśyam paśyasi iti pratyakṣāt eva tarhi saḥ upaplavaḥ viraṃsyati iti ced na pratyakṣasya indriya sannikarṣa ādi svabhāvasya saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha bodha karaṇa asamartha tvāt

original: pratyakṣaphalam etat tu samartha satyam iṣyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣa phalam etat tu samartha satyam iṣyate

original: tasyaiva ca vayaṃ brūma upamānapramāṇatām //21//
analyzed: tasya eva ca vayam brūmaḥ upamāna pramāṇa tām

original: yathā pratyakṣaphalam api dharaṇidharakuharabhuvi dhūmadarśanam anindriyaviṣayavibhāvasubodhasādhanatvād anumānam evaṃ gosārūpyaviśeṣitavipinagatagavayapiṇḍadarśanam adhyakṣaphalam api tadanavagatasaṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhabodhavidhānād upamānam ucyate /
analyzed: yathā pratyakṣa phalam api dharaṇidhara kuhara bhuvi dhūma darśanam anindriya viṣaya vibhāva su bodha sādhana tvāt anumānam evam go sārūpya viśeṣita vipina gata gavaya piṇḍa darśanam adhyakṣa phalam api tad anavagata saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha bodha vidhānāt upamānam ucyate

original: yathā ca tatra pūrvāvagatadhūmāgnipratibandhasmaraṇaṃ sahakāritām upaiti tathehāpi pūrvaśrutāraṇyakavākyārthasmaraṇam /
analyzed: yathā ca tatra pūrva avagata dhūma agni pratibandha smaraṇam sahakāri tām upaiti tathā iha api pūrva śruta āraṇyaka vākya artha smaraṇam

original: yathā ca tatra vyāptivelāyām anālīḍaviśeṣā buddhir adhunā pakṣadharmatābalād viśeṣe vyavatiṣṭhate atrāgnir iti tathā 'trāpy anavagatavācyaviśeṣāt vākyāt buddhir idānīṃ vācyaviśeṣe dṛṣṭe nirupaplavā jāyate ayaṃ sa gavayaśabdābhidheya iti //
analyzed: yathā ca tatra vyāpti velāyām anālīḍa viśeṣā buddhiḥ adhunā pakṣa dharma tā balāt viśeṣe vyavatiṣṭhate atra agniḥ iti tathā anavagata vācya viśeṣāt vākyāt buddhiḥ idānīm vācya viśeṣe dṛṣṭe nirupaplavā jāyate ayam sa gavaya śabda abhidheyaḥ iti

original: naitāvatā 'numānam evedam ity āśaṅkanīyam anapekṣitapakṣadharmānvayavyatirekādisāmagrīkasya tatpratyayotpādāt //
analyzed: na etāvatā numānam evā idam iti āśaṅkanīyam an apekṣita pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatireka ādi sāmagrīkasya tad pratyaya utpādāt

original: tasmād ayaṃ sa gavayo nāmety evaṃvidhā matiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ayam sa gavayaḥ nāma iti evaṃvidhā matiḥ

original: upamānaikajanyaiva na pramāṇāntarodbhavā //22//
analyzed: upamāna eka janyā eva na pramāṇa antara udbhavā

original: na caiṣā nāsti sandigdhā bādhyate kalpanāmātraṃ veti /
analyzed: na ca eṣā nā asti sandigdhā bādhyate kalpanā mātram vā iti

original: sarvathaitasyāḥ pramiteḥ sādhanam upamānaṃ pramāṇam iti siddham //
analyzed: sarvathā etasyāḥ pramiteḥ sādhanam upamānam pramāṇam iti siddham

original: tad idam āha [prasiddhasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanam upamānam] //
analyzed: tat idam āha prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam

original: prasiddhasādharmyād iti karmadhārayaḥ tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ bahuvrīhir va /
analyzed: prasiddha sādharmyāt iti karmadhārayaḥ tṛtīyā samāsaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ va

original: pradiddhaṃ ca tat sādharmyaṃ prasiddhena gavā vā sādharmyaṃ gavayasya prasiddhaṃ vā sādharmyaṃ yasya saḥ prasiddhasādharmyā gavayaḥ tasmāt prasiddhasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanam upamānam /
analyzed: pradiddham ca tat sādharmyam prasiddhena gavā vā sādharmyam gavayasya prasiddham vā sādharmyam yasya saḥ prasiddha sādharmyā gavayaḥ tasmāt prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam

original: sādhyaḥ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaḥ tasya sādhanaṃ bodhanam saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhajñānaṃ vā sādhyaṃ tasya sādhanaṃ jananam ity arthaḥ evaṃ prasiddhasādharmyajñānam upamānaṃ phalaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhajñānam ity uktaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: sādhyaḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ tasya sādhanam bodhanam saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha jñānam vā sādhyam tasya sādhanam jananam iti arthaḥ evam prasiddha sādharmya jñānam upamānam phalam saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha jñānam iti uktam bhavati

original: sādhyasādhanaśabdena karaṇasya pramāṇatām /
analyzed: sādhya sādhana śabdena karaṇasya pramāṇa tām

original: bravīti etac ca mantavyaṃ sarvatra paribhāṣitam //23//
analyzed: bravīti etat ca mantavyam sarvatra paribhāṣitam

original: ata eva madhye likhitam idaṃ yad ubhayataḥ pramāṇalakṣaṇāni vyāpsyatīti //
analyzed: atas eva madhye likhitam idam yat ubhayatas pramāṇa lakṣaṇāni vyāpsyati iti

original: atyantaprāyasādharmyavikalpādinibandhanaḥ /
kṣiptaḥ sūtrakṛtā sākṣād upamānasya viplavaḥ //24//
analyzed: kṣiptaḥ sūtrakṛtā sākṣāt upamānasya viplavaḥ

original: yena sadṛśapratītir janyate tatādṛśyam iti kim atyantasādṛśyādivikalpaiḥ //
analyzed: yena sadṛśa pratītiḥ janyate tad tādṛśyam iti kim atyanta sādṛśya ādi vikalpaiḥ

original: abhinnapratyaye hetur yathā sāmānyam ucyate /
analyzed: abhinna pratyaye hetuḥ yathā sāmānyam ucyate

original: sadṛśapratyaye hetuḥ tathā sādṛśyam ucyate //25//
analyzed: sadṛśa pratyaye hetuḥ tathā sādṛśyam ucyate

original: nanu upamānalakṣaṇam asmin mokṣaśāstre kvopayujyate āgamāt tāvat ātmajñānaṃ mokṣasādhanaṃ setikartavyatākam avagamyate anumānād āgamaprāmāṇyaniścayaḥ pratyakṣād anmānasya vyāptipariccheda iti trayan evopadeṣṭavyam //
analyzed: nanu upamāna lakṣaṇam asmin mokṣa śāstre kva upayujyate āgamāt tāvat ātma jñānam mokṣa sādhanam sa itikartavyatākam avagamyate anumānāt āgama prāmāṇya niścayaḥ pratyakṣāt vyāpti paricchedaḥ iti eva upadeṣṭavyam

original: satyam evam /
analyzed: satyam evam

original: upamānam api kvacit gavayālambhādicodanārthānuṣṭhāne sopayogam /
analyzed: upamānam api kvacid gavaya ālambha ādi codana artha anuṣṭhāne sa upayogam

original: anavagatagavayasvarūpe tadālambhābhāvāt /
analyzed: an avagata gavaya svarūpe tad ālambha abhāvāt

original: yathā mudgastambhaḥ tathā mudgaparṇīti mudgaparṇyādyauṣadhiparijñāne 'pi tadupayogi bhavati //
analyzed: yathā mudga stambhaḥ tathā mudgaparṇī iti mudgaparṇī ādi auṣadhi parijñāne tat upayogi bhavati

original: sarvānugrahabuddhyā ca karuṇārdramatir muniḥ /
analyzed: sarva anugraha buddhyā ca karuṇā ārdra matiḥ muniḥ

original: mokṣopayogābhāve 'pi tasya lakṣaṇam uktavān //26//
analyzed: mokṣa upayoga abhāve pi tasya lakṣaṇam uktavān

original: nanu evaṃ sati yāgauṣadhādyupayogi anyad api bahūpadeṣṭavyaṃ syāt na pramāṇaśāstratvād asya pramāṇam evārthaparicchittisādhanam ihopadiśyate /
analyzed: nanu evam sati yāga auṣadha ādi upayogi anyat api bahu upadeṣṭavyam syāt na pramāṇa śāstra tvāt asya pramāṇam evā artha paricchitti sādhanam iha upadiśyate

original: tac caturvidham eva na nyūnam adhikaṃ veti nirṇītam /
analyzed: tat caturvidham eva na nyūnam adhikam vā iti nirṇītam

original: prameyaṃ tu mokṣāṅgam evopadiśyata ity alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: prameyam tu mokṣa aṅgam evā upadiśyate iti alam prasaṅgena

original: jaiminīyās tv anyathopamānasvarūpaṃ varṇayanti yad aśrutātideśavākyasya vane gavayapiṇḍadarśanānantaraṃ nagaraṃ gataṃ gopiṇḍam anusmarata etena sadṛśo gaur iti jñānaṃ tad upamānam /tasya viṣayaḥ saṃpratyavagamyamānagavayasādṛśyaviśiṣṭaḥ parokṣo gauḥ tadvati vā gavayasādṛśyam /
analyzed: jaiminīyāḥ tu anyathā upamāna svarūpam varṇayanti yat aśruta atideśa vākyasya vane gavaya piṇḍa darśana anantaram nagaram gatam go piṇḍam anusmarate etena sadṛśaḥ gauḥ iti jñānam tat upamānam tasya viṣayaḥ saṃprati avagamyamāna gavaya sādṛśya viśiṣṭaḥ parokṣaḥ gauḥ tadvati vā gavaya sādṛśyam

original: ata eva na tajjñānaṃ pratyakṣajanyam parokṣagopiṇḍaviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: atas eva na tat jñānam pratyakṣa janyam parokṣa go piṇḍa viṣaya tvāt

original: aśrutātideśavākyasya bhāvān na śābdam //
analyzed: aśruta atideśa vākyasya bhāvāt na śābdam

original: na ca smaraṇam evedaṃ prameyādhikyasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: na ca smaraṇam evā idam prameya ādhikya saṃbhavāt

original: gavayena hi sādṛśyaṃ na pūrvam avadhāritam //27//
analyzed: gavayena hi sādṛśyam na pūrvam avadhāritam

original: bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyayogo yady api manmate /
analyzed: bhūyas vayava sāmānya yogaḥ yadi api mad mate

original: sādṛśyaṃ tasya tu jñāptiḥ gṛhīte pratiyogine //28//
analyzed: sādṛśyam tasya tu jñāptiḥ gṛhīte pratiyogine

original: na cānumānikam idaṃ jñānam anapekṣitapakṣādidharmakasya bhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca ānumānikam idam jñānam an apekṣita pakṣa ādi dharmakasya bhāvāt

original: na ca gavayagataṃ sārūupyaṃ tatra liṅgam apakṣadharmatvāt /
analyzed: na ca gavaya gatam sārūupyam tatra liṅgam a pakṣa dharma tvāt

original: nāpi gogatam asiddhatvāt pratijñārthaikadeśatvāc ca /
analyzed: na api go gatam asiddha tvāt pratijñā artha eka deśa tvāt ca

original: viṣāṇādyavayavajātam api na gogataṃ liṅgam idānīṃ vanasthsya tadgrhaṇābhāvāt agṛhītasya ca liṅgatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: viṣāṇa ādi avayava jātam api na go gatam liṅgam idānīm tad grhaṇa abhāvāt agṛhītasya ca liṅga tva anupapatteḥ

original: gavayagatam api tadliṅgam eṣa pūrvavad apakṣadharmatvat /
analyzed: gavaya gatam api tad liṅgam eṣa pūrvavat a pakṣa dharma tvat

original: tasmād gavayasādṛśyaviśeṣitanagaragataparokṣagopiṇḍajñānaṃ kānanavartinaḥ pramātuḥ pramāṇāntaraṃ bhavatīti abhyupagantavyam //
analyzed: tasmāt gavaya sādṛśya viśeṣita nagara gata parokṣa go piṇḍa jñānam kānana vartinaḥ pramātuḥ pramāṇa antaram bhavati iti abhyupagantavyam

original: tad idam anupapannam evaṃvidhapratītyabhāvāt /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam evaṃvidha pratīti abhāvāt

original: prasiddhena hi sādṛśyaṃ aprasiddhasya gamyate /
analyzed: prasiddhena hi sādṛśyam aprasiddhasya gamyate

original: gavā gavayapiṇḍasya na tu yukto viparyayaḥ //29//
analyzed: gavā gavaya piṇḍasya na tu yuktaḥ viparyayaḥ

original: tathā hi aśrutātideśako nāgarakaḥ kānane paribhramenn adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ gosadṛśaṃ prāṇinam upalabhamāna evaṃ buddhyate bravīti ca [aho nu gavā sadṛśa eṣa kiś cana prāṇī] iti /
analyzed: tathā hi a śruta atideśakaḥ nāgarakaḥ kānane paribhramet a dṛṣṭa pūrvam go sadṛśam prāṇinam upalabhamānaḥ evam buddhyate bravīti ca aho nu gavā sadṛśaḥ eṣa kim cana prāṇī iti

original: na tv anena sadṛśo gaur iti jñānam abhidhānaṃ vā kasyacid astīti /
analyzed: na tu anena sadṛśaḥ gauḥ iti jñānam abhidhānam vā kasyacid asti iti

original: ataḥ pramiter evābhāvāt kiṃ pramāṇacintayā bhavatu vaiṣā buddhiḥ [anena sadṛśo gauḥ] iti tathā 'pi smṛtitvān na pramāṇaphalam //
analyzed: atas pramiteḥ eva abhāvāt kim pramāṇa cintayā bhavatu vā eṣā buddhiḥ anena sadṛśaḥ gauḥ iti tathā smṛti tvāt na pramāṇa phalam

original: nanu gopiṇḍamātre satyaṃ smṛtir evaiṣā /
analyzed: nanu go piṇḍa mātre satyam smṛtiḥ eva eṣā

original: saṃpratyavagatagavayasādṛśyaviśiṣṭatvaṃ tu tasya pūrvam anupalabdham adhunaiva gamyate iti na tasminn eṣā smṛtiḥ maivam gavayasādṛśyasyāpi tatra pūrvaṃ grahaṇāt //
analyzed: saṃprati avagata gavaya sādṛśya viśiṣṭa tvam tu tasya pūrvam anupalabdham adhunā eva gamyate iti na tasmin eṣā smṛtiḥ mā evam gavaya sādṛśyasya api tatra pūrvam grahaṇāt

original: nanu anavagatagavayena gavi gavayasādṛśyam avagatam iti citram na citram vyaktitiraskṛtasya grahaṇāt //
analyzed: nanu anavagata gavayena gavi gavaya sādṛśyam avagatam iti citram na citram vyakti tiraskṛtasya grahaṇāt

original: nanu idam api citrataram /
analyzed: nanu idam api citrataram

original: gṛhītaṃ ca vyaktitiraskṛtaṃ ceti /
analyzed: gṛhītam ca vyakti tiraskṛtam ca iti

original: vyaktir hi grahaṇam eva tattiraskāre ca nāsty eva grahaṇam ucyate naitadapi citrataram /
analyzed: vyaktiḥ hi grahaṇam eva tad tiraskāre ca na asti eva grahaṇam ucyate na etat api citrataram

original: tathā highane gavayamālokya nāgariko na kareṇumanusmarati na karabham na turaṅgam api tu viśeṣṭameva tasmāt yatraiva paridṛyamānapiṇḍasādṛśyaṃ pūrvamavagataṃ sa eva piṇḍo 'smin dṛśyamāne smaraṇapathamavatarati netara iti /
analyzed: tathā hi ghane gavayam ālokya nāgarikaḥ na kareṇum anusmarati na karabham na turaṅgam api tu viśeṣṭam eva tasmāt yatra eva paridṛyamāna piṇḍa sādṛśyam pūrvam avagatam saḥ eva piṇḍaḥ u smin dṛśyamāne smaraṇa patham avatarati na itaraḥ iti

original: sādṛśyagrahaṇamasaṃvedyamānamapyabhyastaviṣyāvinābhāvasmṛtivat balātparigrāmīṇasyānubhavo na bhavatīti vyaktitiraskṛtaṃ tatsādṛśyagrahaṇamucyata iti na kiñciccitram /
analyzed: sādṛśya grahaṇam asaṃvedyamānam api abhyasta viṣya avinābhāva smṛti vat balāt parigrāmīṇasya anubhavaḥ na bhavati iti vyakti tiraskṛtam tat sādṛśya grahaṇam ucyate iti na kiñcid citram

original: tasmāt smṛtireveyam tathā hi pratīti [anena sadṛśo gaurmayā nagare dṛṣṭaḥ] iti /
analyzed: tasmāt smṛtiḥ evā iyam tathā hi prati iti anena sadṛśaḥ gauḥ mayā nagare dṛṣṭaḥ iti

original: natu [adyaitatsadṛśo gaurdṛśyate] iti buddhiḥ //
analyzed: na tu adya etad sadṛśaḥ gauḥ dṛśyate iti buddhiḥ

original: nanu pratiyogigrahaṇādvinā kathaṃ grāmyasya sādṛśyagrahaṇam atra bhavataivātmanaḥ pratikūlamabhihitam sāmānyavacca sādṛśyaṃ ekaikatra samāpyate /
analyzed: nanu pratiyogi grahaṇāt vinā katham grāmyasya sādṛśya grahaṇam atra bhavatā eva ātmanaḥ pratikūlam abhihitam sāmānyavat ca sādṛśyam eka ekatra samāpyate

original: pratiyoginyadṛṣṭe 'pi tasmāttadupalabhyate //30//
analyzed: pratiyogini adṛṣṭe tasmāt tat upalabhyate

original: sa ca bhūyo 'vayavasāpnānyayogo 'gṛhītagavayavenāpi nāgarakeṇa grahītuṃ śakyate //
analyzed: sa ca bhūyas vayava sāpna anya yogaḥ gṛhīta gavayavena api nāgarakeṇa grahītum śakyate

original: atha tadā tadgrahaṇe 'pi sati na tasya sadṛśapratyayaḥna tarhi bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyayogaḥ sādṛśyam kintu sadṛśapratyayahetuḥ sādṛśyam /
analyzed: atha tadā tad grahaṇe sati na tasya sadṛśa pratyayaḥ na tarhi bhūyas vayava sāmānya yogaḥ sādṛśyam kintu sadṛśa pratyaya hetuḥ sādṛśyam

original: yathoktam [sādṛśyaṃ sadṛśapratyayahetutvam eva] /
analyzed: yathā uktam sādṛśyam sadṛśa pratyaya hetu tvam eva

original: bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyayoge ca tallakṣaṇe citrādāvavyāptiḥ /
analyzed: bhūyas vayava sāmānya yoge ca tad lakṣaṇe citra ādau avyāptiḥ

original: ativyāptiś ca prāṇyantareṣu visadṛśeṣvapi tadavayavasāmānyānāṃ khurādīnāṃ bhāvāt /
analyzed: ativyāptiḥ ca prāṇi antareṣu visadṛśeṣu api tad avayava sāmānyānām khura ādīnām bhāvāt

original: bhūyastvaṃ tu kiyatteṣāmiti na vidmaḥ /
analyzed: bhūyaḥ tvam tu kiyat teṣām iti na vidmaḥ

original: yāvatā sādṛśyapratyayotpattiriti cet tarhi sadṛśapratyayahetutvam eva sādṛśyamastviti yuktam /
analyzed: yāvatā sādṛśya pratyaya utpattiḥ iti ced tarhi sadṛśa pratyaya hetu tvam eva sādṛśyam astu iti yuktam

original: tasmāt gavayadarśanātpūrvamapi gavayanabhivyaktisādṛśyamagrahaṇopapatteḥ smṛtireveyam //
analyzed: tasmāt gavaya darśanāt pūrvam api gavaya anabhivyakti sādṛśyam agrahaṇa upapatteḥ smṛtiḥ evā iyam

original: atha mataṃ yathā naiyāyikānāṃ atideśavākyavelāyāṃ sopapluvā saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhabuddhiḥ upamānānnirupaplavībhavati evamiyamapi yo 'sau pūrvaṃ vyaktitiraskṛtā gavi gavayasādṛśyabuddhirabhūt sedānīṃ upamānādvyaktibhaviṣyatīti //
analyzed: atha matam yathā naiyāyikānām atideśa vākya velāyām sa upapluvā saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha buddhiḥ upamānāt nirupaplavībhavati evam iyam api sā au pūrvam vyakti tiraskṛtā gavi gavaya sādṛśya buddhiḥ abhūt sā idānīm upamānāt vyakti bhaviṣyati iti

original: naitadasthigavayagrahīṇā pratyakṣeṇaiva tatspaṣṭatāsiddheḥ /
analyzed: na etat asthi gavaya grahīṇā pratyakṣeṇa eva tad spaṣṭa tā siddheḥ

original: yathā bhavadbhirnaiyāyikā uktāḥ [atha tvadhikatā kācit pratyakṣādeva sā bhavet] iti tathā naiyāyikā api yuṣmān vakṣyanti //
analyzed: yathā bhavadbhiḥ naiyāyikāḥ uktāḥ atha tu adhikatā kācid pratyakṣāt eva sā bhavet iti tathā naiyāyikāḥ api yuṣmān vakṣyanti

original: nanu vanasthapramāturgavaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kathaṃ grāmavartini gavi sādṛśyabuddheḥ spaṣṭatāmādadhīta kiṃ kurmaḥ tadarśanānantaraṃ suspaṣṭatatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭagopiṇḍasmaraṇāt //
analyzed: nanu vanastha pramātuḥ gava viṣayam pratyakṣam katham grāma vartini gavi sādṛśya buddheḥ spaṣṭa tām ādadhīta kim kurmaḥ tad darśana anantaram su spaṣṭa tad sādṛśya viśiṣṭa go piṇḍa smaraṇāt

original: nanu ata evedamupamānaṃ pramāṇāntaramucyate pratyakṣasya sannihitagavayasvarūpamātraniṣṭhatvāt parokṣe ca gavi gavayasādṛśyapratyayasya vispaṣṭasyānyato 'siddheriti /
analyzed: nanu atas eva idam upamānam pramāṇa antaram ucyate pratyakṣasya sannihita gavaya sva rūpa mātra niṣṭha tvāt parokṣe ca gavi gavaya sādṛśya pratyayasya vispaṣṭasya anyatas siddheḥ iti

original: uktamatrasmṛtireveyam tathā 'vabhāsanāt /
analyzed: uktam atra smṛtiḥ evā iyam tathā vabhāsanāt

original: anadhigatārthagrāhi ca pramāṇamupagacchanti bhavantaḥ //
analyzed: anadhigata artha grāhi ca pramāṇam upagacchanti bhavantaḥ

original: bhavatu vā smṛtivilakṣaṇeyaṃ pratītiḥ /
analyzed: bhavatu vā smṛti vilakṣaṇā iyam pratītiḥ

original: tathā 'pyanumānajanyatvāt na pramāṇāntaramāviśati smaryamāṇe gauḥ dharmī etatsadṛśa iti sādhyo dharmaḥ etadavayavasāmānyayogitvāt sannihitadvitīyagavayapiṇḍavat /
analyzed: tathā pi anumāna janya tvāt na pramāṇa antaram āviśati smaryamāṇe gauḥ dharmī etad sadṛśaḥ iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ etad avayava sāmānya yogi tvāt sannihita dvitīya gavaya piṇḍa vat

original: tadasannidhāne sāmānyena vyāptir darśayitavyā yatra yadavayavasāmānyayogitvaṃ tatra tatsādṛśyam yathā yamayoriti /
analyzed: tad asannidhāne sāmānyena vyāptiḥ darśayitavyā yatra yad avayava sāmānya yogi tvam tatra tad sādṛśyam yathā yamayoḥ iti

original: viśeṣṭasya tadyogasya hetutvānnānaikāntikatvam /
analyzed: viśeṣṭasya tad yogasya hetu tvāt na anaikāntika tvam

original: sāmānyayogo 'nyaḥ anyacca sādṛśyamityuktvāt na pratijñārthaikadeśo hetuḥ /
analyzed: sāmānya yogaḥ nyaḥ anyat ca sādṛśyam iti uktvāt na pratijñā artha eka deśaḥ hetuḥ

original: avyutpannasya nārikeladvīpavāsinaḥ vālasya vā tatpratyayānutpādāt na vyāptir nairapekṣeṇa sā pratīririti vaktavyam /
analyzed: avyutpannasya nārikeladvīpa vāsinaḥ vālasya vā tad pratyaya anutpādāt na vyāptiḥ nairapekṣeṇa sā pratīriḥ iti vaktavyam

original: tasmāditthamanumānajanyatvāt smṛtitvād vā pūrvoktādasaṃbhavād eva vā naiyamavagatirupamānakāryeti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt ittham anumāna janya tvāt smṛti tvāt vā pūrva uktāt asaṃbhavāt eva vā naiyam avagatiḥ upamāna kāryā iti siddham

original: kaścāsya bhavadupamānasya svatantropayogaḥ evaṃ hy āhurbhavantaḥ [aparīkṣāmiṣeṇāpi lakṣaṇāni vadatrayam /
analyzed: kaḥ ca asya bhavat upamānasya svatantra upayogaḥ evam hi āhuḥ bhavantaḥ aparīkṣā miṣeṇa api lakṣaṇāni vada trayam

original: na svatantropayogitvanirapekṣāṇi jalpati //] nanu ukta evopayogaḥ saurye carau dravyadevatāsārūpyādāgneyavidhyantalābhaḥ /
analyzed: na svatantra upayogitva nirapekṣāṇi jalpati nanu uktaḥ eva upayogaḥ saurye carau dravya devatā sārūpyāt āgneya vidhi anta lābhaḥ

original: [āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ] ityupadiṣṭadṛṣṭādṛṣṭetikartavyatākalāpatayā nirākāṅkṣo vidhiḥ /
analyzed: āgneyaḥ ṣṭākapālaḥ iti upadiṣṭa dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa itikartavya tā kalāpatayā nirākāṅkṣaḥ vidhiḥ

original: [sauryaṃ caraṃ nirvapet grahmavarcasakāmaḥ] ityatra pradhānamāgropadeśādvidhyādirastina tu vidhyantaḥitikartavyatā 'bhidhānam /
analyzed: sauryam caram nirvapet grahmavarcasa kāmaḥ iti atra pradhānam āgra upadeśāt vidhi ādiḥ asti na tu vidhi antaḥ itikartavya tā abhidhānam

original: na cānitikartavyatākaṃ karma prayogayogyam /
analyzed: na ca an itikartavya tākam karma prayoga yogyam

original: ataḥ kimiyamitikartavyatājātamiha gṛhyatāmityapekṣāyāṃ carupuroḍāśayorvrāhyādyauṣadhasādhyatvena dravyasādṛśyātsūryāgnyośca tejasvitayā devatayoḥ sārūpyādāgneyetikartavyatā saurye kriyata ityupamānād gamyate //
analyzed: atas kim iyam itikartavya tā jātam iha gṛhyatām iti apekṣāyām caru puroḍāśayoḥ vrāhya ādi auṣadha sādhya tvena dravya sādṛśyāt sūrya agnyoḥ ca tejasvi tayā devatayoḥ sārūpyāt āgneyā itikartavya tā saurye kriyate iti upamānāt gamyate

original: api ca kvaciccoditadravyādāvalabhyamāne pratinidhyupādānena karmasamāpanāt pratinidhimāgropādāne prāpte vrīhisadṛśanīvāroopādānamupamānātpratīyata iti /
analyzed: api ca kvacid codita dravya ādau alabhyamāne pratinidhi upādānena karma samāpanāt pratinidhim ā agra upādāne prāpte vrīhi sadṛśa nīvāra upādānam upamānāt pratīyate iti

original: tadāha  [bhinnānumānādupameyamuktā sauryādivākyairna sahāyi dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: tat āha bhinna anumānāt upameyam uktā saurya ādi vākyaiḥ na sahāyi dṛṣṭam

original: sādṛśyato 'gnyādiyutaṃ kathaṃ nu pratyāyayedityupayujyate naḥ //
analyzed: sādṛśyataḥ gni ādi yutam katham nu pratyāyayet iti upayujyate naḥ

original: pratinidhirapi caivaṃ vrīhisādṛśyayogāt bhavati tadapacāre yatra nīvārajātau /
analyzed: pratinidhiḥ api ca evam vrīhi sādṛśya yogāt bhavati tad apacāre yatra nīvāra jātau

original: tadapi phalamabhīṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇasyopamāyāḥ prakṛtirapi ca gauṇairbādhyate yatra cānyaiḥ //] tadetadasamañjasam[prasiddhenāprasiddhasya sādṛyam avagamyate] ityeṣabhavad bhirutsṛṣṭaḥ panthaḥ /
analyzed: tat api phalam abhīṣṭam lakṣaṇasya upamāyāḥ prakṛtiḥ api ca gauṇaiḥ bādhyate yatra ca anyaiḥ tat etat asamañjasam prasiddhena aprasiddhasya sādṛyam avagamyate iti eṣa bhavat bhiḥ utsṛṣṭaḥ panthaḥ

original: viparyayastvāśritaḥ //
analyzed: viparyayaḥ tu āśritaḥ

original: yadapyadṛṣṭena nūtanenāprasiddhena gavayena vākyasiddhasya goḥ sādṛśyamupamānāt pratīyata ititadihāpi nijñatitikartavyatākena govatprasiddhenāgreyena sauryasya gavayavadaprasiddhasya sādṛśyamavagamyate na tu gavayena goḥsauryeṇāgreyasya /
analyzed: yat api adṛṣṭena nūtanena aprasiddhena gavayena vākya siddhasya goḥ sādṛśyam upamānāt pratīyate iti tat iha api nijña titikartavyatākena go vat prasiddhena āgreyena sauryasya gavaya vat aprasiddhasya sādṛśyam avagamyate na tu gavayena goḥ sauryeṇa āgreyasya

original: tadiha yasya vidhyantārthitā na tatropamānātsādṛśyāvagamaḥ yatra vā tadavagamaḥ na tatretikartavyatā 'rthitvam //
analyzed: tat iha yasya vidhi anta arthi tā na tatra upamānāt sādṛśya avagamaḥ yatra vā tad avagamaḥ na tatra itikartavya tā rthi tvam

original: nanu saurye vidhyantārthini pratīyamāne dravyadevatāsārūpyāderāgneyaḥ smaraṇapathamavataratīti tata evāsau vidhyantamadhigacchatīti evamapi smaraṇamātrāt siddhe 'rthe kimupamānena āgreyasmaraṇādeva taditikartavyatā saurye upādāsyate /
analyzed: nanu saurye vidhi anta arthini pratīyamāne dravya devatā sārūpya ādeḥ āgneyaḥ smaraṇa patham avatarati iti tatas eva asau vidhi antam adhigacchati iti evam api smaraṇa mātrāt siddhe rthe kim upamānena āgreya smaraṇāt eva tad itikartavya tā saurye upādāsyate

original: smṛtiviśeṣa eva viṣayādhikyādupamānamucyate iti cet prativihitametadityalaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: smṛti viśeṣaḥ eva viṣaya ādhikyāt upamānam ucyate iti ced prativihitam etat iti alam prasaṅgena

original: kiñcopamānapratipāditārthaḥ na codanālakṣaṇatāṃ vibharti /
analyzed: kiñca upamāna pratipādita arthaḥ na codanā lakṣaṇa tām vibharti

original: tasmānna yujyeta tato 'dhigantuṃ āgreyavidhyantaviśeṣalābhaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na yujyeta tatas dhik gantum āgreya vidhi anta viśeṣa lābhaḥ

original: pratinidhirapi caivaṃ nāsti nīvārajāteḥ na hi bhavadupamānāt brīhisādṛśyabuddhiḥ /
analyzed: pratinidhiḥ api ca evam na asti nīvāra jāteḥ na hi bhavat upamānāt brīhi sādṛśya buddhiḥ

original: !bhavati tu matireṣā brīhayastatsadṛkṣāḥ !iti na ca phalamasyāḥ kiñcidasti pratīteḥ //32//
analyzed: bhavati tu matiḥ eṣā brīhayaḥ tad sadṛkṣāḥ iti na ca phalam asyāḥ kiñcid asti pratīteḥ

original: !bhavatyaṅgaṃ yāge kvacana gavayālambhanamataḥ tadākārajñāne pratinidhiviveke ca kṛtinām /
analyzed: bhavati aṅgam yāge kvacana gavaya ālambhanam atas tad ākāra jñāne pratinidhi viveke ca kṛtinām

original: !upāyatvaṃ yuṣmatkathitamupamānaṃ na bhajate parigrāhyaṃ tasmāt pravaramunigītaṃ sumatibhiḥ //33//
analyzed: upāya tvam yuṣmad kathitam upamānam na bhajate parigrāhyam tasmāt pravara muni gītam sumatibhiḥ

original: ityupamānam //iti dvitīyamāhnikam //
analyzed: iti upamānam iti dvitīyam āhnikam

original: tṛtīyamāhnikam śabdaparīkṣā upamānānantaraṃ śabdasya vibhāgasūtre nirdeśāttasya laiṣaṇaṃ pratipādayitumāha āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ //1-1-7//
analyzed: tṛtīyam āhnikam śabda parīkṣā upamāna anantaram śabdasya vibhāga sūtre nirdeśāt tasya laiṣaṇam pratipādayitum āha āpta upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ

original: upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ ityucyamāne paryāyamātroccāraṇāt akārake śabdamātre pramāṇyaprasaktiriti tadvinivṛttaye pūrvasūtrāt sādhyasādhanapadamākṛṣyate /
analyzed: upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti ucyamāne paryāya mātra uccāraṇāt akārake śabda mātre pramāṇya prasaktiḥ iti tad vinivṛttaye pūrva sūtrāt sādhya sādhana padam ākṛṣyate

original: tathā 'pi śabdāntarajanake prasaktiriti pratyakṣasūtrāt jñānapadasya smṛtijanakasya vyavacchedārthaṃ cārthagrahaṇasya saṃśayaviparyayajanakanirākaraṇāya ca vyavasāyātmakāvyabhicāripadayoranuvṛttirityevamavyabhicārādiviśeṣaṇārthapratītijanaka upadeśaḥ śabda ityuktaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: tathā pi śabda antara janake prasaktiḥ iti pratyakṣa sūtrāt jñāna padasya smṛti janakasya vyavaccheda artham ca artha grahaṇasya saṃśaya viparyaya janaka nirākaraṇāya ca vyavasāya ātmaka avyabhicāri padayoḥ anuvṛttiḥ iti evam avyabhicāra ādi viśeṣaṇa artha pratīti janakaḥ upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti uktam bhavati

original: tadevaṃparyāyamevopadeśaśabdaṃ śabdalakṣaṇamapekṣitapūrvasūtropāttaviśeṣaṇapadaṃ kecidvyācakṣate /
analyzed: tat evaṃparyāyam eva upadeśa śabdam śabda lakṣaṇam apekṣita pūrva sūtra upātta viśeṣaṇa padam kecid vyācakṣate

original: āptagrahaṇaṃ ca lakṣaṇaniścayārthamāhuḥ /
analyzed: āpta grahaṇam ca lakṣaṇa niścaya artham āhuḥ

original: [ghrāṇarasanatvakcakṣuḥśrotrāṇīndriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ] ityatra bhūtagrahaṇaṃ vakṣyate /
analyzed: ghrāṇa rasana tvac cakṣuḥ śrotrāṇi indriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ iti atra bhūta grahaṇam vakṣyate

original: evaṃ hyaitihyasya na pramāṇāntaratā bhaviṣyati upadeśarūpatvāviśeṣāditi //
analyzed: evam hi aitihyasya na pramāṇa antara tā bhaviṣyati upadeśa rūpa tva aviśeṣāt iti

original: anye tu bruvate yuktamupadeśapadameva śabdalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: anye tu bruvate yuktam upadeśa padam eva śabda lakṣaṇam

original: yuktaṃ ca tanniścayārthamāptagrahaṇam /
analyzed: yuktam ca tad niścaya artham āpta grahaṇam

original: pūrvasūtropāttaviśeṣaṇapadānuvṛttistu nopayujyate sāmānyalakṣaṇānantaraṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaprakramāt /
analyzed: pūrva sūtra upātta viśeṣaṇa pada anuvṛttiḥ tu na upayujyate sāmānya lakṣaṇa anantaram viśeṣa lakṣaṇa prakramāt

original: sāmānyalakṣaṇena ca smṛtyādijanakasakalapramāṇābhāsavyudāse kṛte sajātīyapratyakṣādivyadaccheda eva kevalam idānīṃ vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: sāmānya lakṣaṇena ca smṛti ādi janaka sakala pramāṇa ābhāsa vyudāse kṛte sajātīya pratyakṣa ādi vyada chedaḥ eva kevalam idānīm vaktavyaḥ

original: tatra ca paryāyatayā paryāptamupadeśapadameva buddhyādipadavaditi kiṃ viśeṣaṇānuvṛttikleśana iti //
analyzed: tatra ca paryāya tayā paryāptam upadeśa padam eva buddhi ādi pada vat iti kim viśeṣaṇa anuvṛtti kleśane iti

original: apara āha anavalambitasāmānyalakṣaṇānusaraṇadainyamanadhyāhṛtaprāktanaviśeṣaṇapadamāptopadeśaśśabdalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: aparaḥ āha anavalambita sāmānya lakṣaṇa anusaraṇa dainyam anadhyāhṛta prāktana viśeṣaṇa padam āpta upadeśaḥ śabda lakṣaṇam

original: na cākārakeṇa śabdāntarakāriṇā vā smṛtijanakena vā saṃśayādhāyinā vā śabdena kiñcidupadiśyata iti nirvacanasavyapapekṣāt upadeśagrahaṇādeva tannivṛttiḥ siddhā /
analyzed: na ca ākārakeṇa śabda antara kāriṇā vā smṛti janakena vā saṃśaya ādhāyinā vā śabdena kiñcid upadiśyate iti nirvacana sa vyapapekṣāt upadeśa grahaṇāt eva tad nivṛttiḥ siddhā

original: mithyopadeśe tu rathyāpuruṣādivacasi viparītapratītikāriṇi prasaṅgo na nivartata iti tatpratikṣepārthamāptagrahaṇam /
analyzed: mithyā upadeśe tu rathyā puruṣa ādi vacasi viparīta pratīti kāriṇi prasaṅgaḥ na nivartate iti tad pratikṣepa artham āpta grahaṇam

original: aitihye yathārthapratītihetāvāptānumānānna pramāṇāntaratvamiti /
analyzed: aitihye yathārtha pratīti hetau āpta anumānāt na pramāṇa antara tvam iti

original: tasmādyathāśrutameva sūtraṃ śabdalakṣaṇārthaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: tasmāt yathāśrutam eva sūtram śabda lakṣaṇa artham yuktam

original: bhavatvevam upadiśyata iti ko 'rthaḥ abhidhānakriyā kiyate /
analyzed: bhavatu evam upadiśyate iti kaḥ rthaḥ abhidhāna kriyā kiyate

original: keyamabhidhānakriyā nāma pratītiriti cet cakṣurāderapi tatkaraṇatvādupadeśatvaprasaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: kā iyam abhidhāna kriyā nāma pratītiḥ iti ced cakṣuḥ ādeḥ api tad karaṇa tvāt upadeśa tva prasaṅgaḥ

original: svāvagatipūrvikā pratītiriti cet dhūmāderapyupadeśatāprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: sva avagati pūrvikā pratītiḥ iti ced dhūma ādeḥ api upadeśa tā prasaṅgaḥ

original: cakṣurāderapi tatkaraṇatvāt upadeśatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ādeḥ api tad karaṇa tvāt upadeśa tva prasaṅgaḥ

original: svasādṛśyena pratītiriti cet bimbasyāpi pādādyanumitāvupadeśatvaprasaṅgaḥ śabde ca tadabhāvādanupadeśatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: sva sādṛśyena pratītiḥ iti ced bimbasya api pāda ādi anumitau upadeśa tva prasaṅgaḥ śabde ca tad abhāvāt anupadeśa tvam syāt

original: śabdāvacchinnā pratītiriti cet śrotrasya tajjanakatvādupadeśatvaprasaṅgaḥ śabdasya ca svāvacchedena pratītijanakatvaniṣedhādanupadeśatvaṃbhavet /
analyzed: śabda avacchinnā pratītiḥ iti ced śrotrasya tad janaka tvāt upadeśa tva prasaṅgaḥ śabdasya ca sva avacchedena pratīti janaka tva niṣedhāt anupadeśa tvam bhavet

original: nāpi śabdakaraṇikā pratītiḥ abhidhānakriyāvivakṣāyāṃ ākāśānumāne vā tasyopadeśatvaprasaṅgā dityabhidhānakriyāsvarūpāniścayāt na tasyāḥ karaṇamupadeśaḥ //
analyzed: nā api śabda karaṇikā pratītiḥ abhidhāna kriyā vivakṣāyām ākāśa anumāne vā tasya upadeśa tva prasaṅgāt iti abhidhāna kriyā svarūpa aniścayāt na tasyāḥ karaṇam upadeśaḥ

original: ucyate śrotragrāhyavastukaraṇikā tadarthapratītirabhidhānakriyā itthaṃ loke vyavahārāt /
analyzed: ucyate śrotra grāhya vastu karaṇikā tad artha pratītiḥ abhidhāna kriyā ittham loke vyavahārāt

original: uktaḥ abhihitaśca sa evārtho loke vyapadiśyate yastu tathāvidhapratītiviṣayatāṃ pratipannaḥ /
analyzed: uktaḥ abhihitaḥ ca saḥ eva arthaḥ loke vyapadiśyate yaḥ tu tathāvidha pratīti viṣaya tām pratipannaḥ

original: śrotragrāhyasya varṇarāśerevārthapratītikaraṇatvāt na tu śrotrapratyayaviṣayaḥ sphoṭatmā śabdaḥ /
analyzed: śrotra grāhyasya varṇa rāśeḥ eva artha pratīti karaṇa tvāt na tu śrotra pratyaya viṣayaḥ śabdaḥ

original: śrotragrahaṇe hyarthe śabdaśabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: śrotra grahaṇe hi arthe śabda śabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ

original: varṇā eva ca śrotragrahaṇāḥ /
analyzed: varṇāḥ eva ca śrotra grahaṇāḥ

original: yato 'rthapratītiḥ sa śabda iti tūcyamāne dhūmādirapi śabdaḥ syāt /
analyzed: yatas ṛtha pratītiḥ sa śabdaḥ iti tu ucyamāne dhūma ādiḥ api śabdaḥ syāt

original: agṛhītasambandhaśca śabdaḥ śabdatvaṃ jahyāt arthapratipatterakaraṇāt //
analyzed: agṛhīta sambandhaḥ ca śabdaḥ śabda tvam jahyāt artha pratipatteḥ akaraṇāt

original: nanu pratīteḥ saṃvidātmakatvāt nābhidhānakriyā nāma kācidapūrvā saṃvidanyā vidyate /
analyzed: nanu pratīteḥ saṃvid ātmaka tvāt na abhidhāna kriyā nāma kācid apūrvā saṃvid anyā vidyate

original: tatkaraṇasya copadeśatāyāmatiprasaṅga ityuktamsatyamsaṃvidātmaiva sarvatra pratītiḥ /
analyzed: tad karaṇasya ca upadeśa tāyām atiprasaṅgaḥ iti uktam satyam saṃvid ātmā eva sarvatra pratītiḥ

original: sā cakṣurādikaraṇikā pratykṣaphalam liṅgakaraṇikā 'numānaphalam śrotragrāhyakaraṇikā śabdaphalam /
analyzed: sā cakṣuḥ ādi karaṇikā liṅga karaṇikā numāna phalam śrotra grāhya karaṇikā śabda phalam

original: na hidṛśyate anumīyate abhidhīyata iti paryāyaśabdāḥ /
analyzed: na hi dṛśyate anumīyate abhidhīyate iti paryāya śabdāḥ

original: tatpratītiviśeṣajanane ca śabdasyopadeśatvamucyate /
analyzed: tad pratīti viśeṣa janane ca śabdasya upadeśa tvam ucyate

original: ākāśānumānavivakṣādau tu tasya liṅgatvamevetyalaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: ākāśa anumāna vivakṣā ādau tu tasya liṅga tvam evā iti alam prasaṅgena

original: āpto bhaṣyakṛtā vyākhyātaḥ[āptaḥ khalu sākṣātkṛtadharmā yathādṛṣṭasyārthasya cikhyāpayiṣāprayukta upadeṣṭā ca] iti //
analyzed: āptaḥ bhaṣyakṛtā vyākhyātaḥ āptaḥ khalu sākṣātkṛta dharmā yathā dṛṣṭasya arthasya cikhyāpayiṣā prayuktaḥ upadeṣṭā ca iti

original: dharma ityupadeṣṭavyaḥ kaścidartho vivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: dharmaḥ iti upadeṣṭavyaḥ kaścid arthaḥ vivakṣitaḥ

original: sākṣātkaraṇametasya yathārthamupalambhanam //1//
analyzed: sākṣāt karaṇam etasya yathārtham upalambhanam

original: na tu pratyakṣeṇaiva grahaṇamiti niyamaḥ anumānādiniścitārthopadeśino 'pyāptatvānapāyāt //
analyzed: na tu pratyakṣeṇa eva grahaṇam iti niyamaḥ anumāna ādi niścita artha upadeśinā u pi āptatva anapāyāt

original: cikhyāpayiṣayā yukta ityuktā vītarāgatā /
analyzed: cikhyāpayiṣayā yuktaḥ iti uktā vīta rāga tā

original: upadeṣṭetyanenoktaṃ pratipādanakauśalam //2//
analyzed: upadeṣṭā iti anena uktam pratipādana kauśalam

original: vītarāgo 'pi mūkādirupadeṣṭumaśaktaḥ kiṃ kuryāt vaktuṃ śakto 'pi sākṣātkṛtadharmā 'pyavītarāgo na vakti tūṣṇīmāsta iti //
analyzed: vīta rāgaḥ pi mūka ādiḥ upadeṣṭum aśaktaḥ kim kuryāt vaktum śaktaḥ u pi sākṣātkṛta dharmā api avīta rāgaḥ na vakti tūṣṇīm āste iti

original: tasya ca pratipādye 'rthe vītarāgatvamiṣyate /
analyzed: tasya ca pratipādye rthe vīta rāga tvam iṣyate

original: sarvathā vītarāgas tu puruṣaḥ kutra labhyate //
analyzed: sarvathā vīta rāgaḥ tu puruṣaḥ kutra labhyate

original: ṛṣyārthalamecchasāmānyaṃ vaktavyaṃ cāptalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: ṛṣya artha lama icchā sāmānyam vaktavyam ca āpta lakṣaṇam

original: evaṃ hi loke 'pyāptoktathā vyavahāro na naṅkṣyati //4//
analyzed: evam hi loke vyavahāraḥ na naṅkṣyati

original: ye 'pyāptiṃ doṣakṣayamācakṣatetairapi doṣakṣayaḥ pratipādyartheṣveva varṇanīyaḥ anyathā līke dṛśyamānasyāptoktinibandhanasya vyavahārasya nihnavaḥ syāt //
analyzed: ye pi āptim doṣa kṣayam ācakṣata itaiḥ api doṣa kṣayaḥ pratipādi artheṣu eva varṇanīyaḥ anyathā līke dṛśyamānasya āpta ukti nibandhanasya vyavahārasya nihnavaḥ syāt

original: athavā vedaprāmāṇyasiddhyarthatvācchāstrasya tatpraṇeturāptasyeśvarasya yathāśrutamevedaṃ lakṣaṇam sa sākṣātkṛtadharmaiva dharmasyeśvarapratyakṣagocaratvāt //
analyzed: athavā veda prāmāṇya siddhi artha tvāt śāstrasya tad praṇetuḥ āptasya īśvarasya yathāśrutam eva idam lakṣaṇam sa sākṣātkṛta dharmā eva dharmasya īśvara pratyakṣa gocara tvāt

original: cikhyāpayiṣāprayukta iti /
analyzed: cikhyāpayiṣā prayuktaḥ iti

original: kāruṇika eva bhagavāniti vakṣyate /
analyzed: kāruṇikaḥ eva bhagavān iti vakṣyate

original: upadeṣṭā ca vedādyāgamānāṃ tatpraṇītatvasya samarthayiṣyamāṇatvāt //
analyzed: upadeṣṭā ca veda ādi āgamānām tad praṇīta tvasya samarthayiṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: āha āstāṃ tāvadetat idaṃ tu cintyatām kimarthamidaṃ punaśśabdasya pṛthaglakṣaṇamupadiśyate śabdasya khalu paśyāmo nānumānādvibhinnatām /
analyzed: āha āstām tāvat etat idam tu cintyatām kimartham idam punar śabdasya pṛthak lakṣaṇam upadiśyate śabdasya khalu paśyāmaḥ na anumānāt vibhinna tām

original: atastallakṣaṇākṣepāt na vācyaṃ lakṣaṇāntaram //5//
analyzed: atas tad lakṣaṇa ākṣepāt na vācyam lakṣaṇa antaram

original: parokṣaviṣayatvaṃ hi tulyaṃ tāvahayorapi /
analyzed: parokṣa viṣaya tvam hi tulyam tau ahayoḥ api

original: sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ ca sambandhāpekṣaṇāhayoḥ //6//
agṛhīte 'pi sambandhe naikasyāpi pravartanam /
analyzed: agṛhīte pi sambandhe na ekasya api pravartanam

original: sambandhaśca viśeṣāṇāmānantyādati durgamaḥ //7//
analyzed: sambandhaḥ ca viśeṣāṇām ānantyāt ati durgamaḥ

original: yathā pratyakṣato dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā 'gniranumīyate /
analyzed: yathā pratyakṣatas dhūmam dṛṣṭvā gniḥ anumīyate

original: tathaiva śabdamākarṇya tadartho 'pyavagamyate //8//
analyzed: tathā eva śabdam ākarṇya tad arthaḥ pi avagamyate

original: anvayavyatirekau ca bhavato 'trāpi liṅgavat /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekau ca bhavataḥ liṅga vat

original: yo yatra dṛśyate śabdaḥ sa tasyārthasya vācakaḥ //9//
analyzed: yaḥ yatra dṛśyate śabdaḥ sa tasya arthasya vācakaḥ

original: pakṣadharmatvamapyamiti śabda eva yato 'rthavān /
analyzed: pakṣa dharma tvam api amiti śabdaḥ eva yatas rthavān

original: prakalpayiṣyate pakṣo dhūmo dahanavāniva //10//
analyzed: prakalpayiṣyate pakṣaḥ dhūmaḥ dahanavān iva

original: tatra dhūmatvasāmānyaṃ yathā vahati hetutām /
analyzed: tatra dhūma tva sāmānyam yathā vahati hetu tām

original: bhotvādiśabdasāmānyaṃ tadvadatrāpivakṣyati //11//
analyzed: tadvat atra api vakṣyati

original: evaṃ viṣayasāmagrīsāmyādekatvaniścaye /
analyzed: evam viṣaya sāmagrī sāmyāt eka tva niścaye

original: na vilakṣaṇatāmātraṃ kiñcidanyatvakāraṇam //12//
analyzed: na vilakṣaṇa tā mātram kiñcid anyatva kāraṇam

original: pūrvavarṇakramodbhūtasaṃskārasahakāritā /
puruṣāpekṣavṛttitvaṃ vivakṣānusṛtikramaḥ //13//
ityādinā viśeṣeṇa na pramāṇāntaraṃ bhavet /
analyzed: ityādinā viśeṣeṇa na pramāṇa antaram bhavet

original: kāryakāraṇadharmādiviśeṣo 'trāpi nāsti kim //14//
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa dharma ādi viśeṣaḥ na asti kim

original: yatheṣṭaviniyojyatvamapi nānyatvakāraṇam /
analyzed: yathā iṣṭa viniyojya tvam api na anya tva kāraṇam

original: hastasaṃjñādiliṅge 'pi tathābhāvasya darśanāt //15//
analyzed: hasta saṃjñā ādi liṅge pi tathā bhāvasya darśanāt

original: dṛṣṭāntanirapekṣattvamabhyaste viṣaye samam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭānta nirapekṣa tvam abhyaste viṣaye samam

original: anabhyaste tu sambandhasmṛtisāpekṣatā dvayoḥ //16//
analyzed: anabhyaste tu sambandha smṛti sāpekṣa tā dvayoḥ

original: anekapratibhotpattihetutvamapi vadyate /
analyzed: aneka pratibhā utpatti hetu tvam api vadyate

original: aspaṣṭaliṅge kasmiṃmaścidaśca ityādiśabdavat //17//
analyzed: aspaṣṭa liṅge ityādi śabda vat

original: sphuṭārthānavasāyāśca pramāṇābhāsato yathā //
analyzed: sphuṭa artha anavasāyāḥ ca pramāṇa ābhāsataḥ yathā

original: liṅge tathaiva śabde 'pi nānārthabhramakāriṇi //18//
analyzed: liṅge tathā eva śabde nānā artha bhrama kāriṇi

original: api ca pratibhāmātre śabdājjāte 'pi kutracit /
analyzed: api ca pratibhā mātre śabdāt jāte kutracid

original: āptavādatvaliṅgena janyate niścitā matiḥ //19//
analyzed: āpta vāda tva liṅgena janyate niścitā matiḥ

original: ata eva hi manyante śabdasyāpi vipaścitaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva hi manyante śabdasya api vipaścitaḥ

original: āptavādāvisaṃvādasāmānyādanumānatāma //20//
analyzed: āpta vāda avisaṃvāda sāmānyāt anumāna tāma

original: kiñca śabdo vivakṣāyāmeva prāmāṇyamaśnute /
analyzed: kiñca śabdaḥ vivakṣāyām eva prāmāṇyam aśnute

original: na bāhye vyathicāritvāt tasyāṃ caitasya liṅgatā //21//
analyzed: na bāhye vyathi cāri tvāt tasyām ca etasya liṅga tā

original: tatrābhidhīyate /
analyzed: tatra abhidhīyate

original: dvividhaḥ śabdaḥpadātmā vākyātmā ceti /
analyzed: dvividhaḥ śabdaḥ pada ātmā vākya ātmā ca iti

original: tatra vākyamanavagatasambandhameva vākyārthamavagamayitumalam abhinavaviracitaślokaśravaṇe sati padasaṃskṛtamatīnāṃ tadarthāvagamadarśanāt /
analyzed: tatra vākyam anavagata sambandham eva vākya artham avagamayitum alam abhinava viracita śloka śravaṇe sati pada saṃskṛta matīnām tad artha avagama darśanāt

original: ataḥ sambandhādhigamamūlapravṛttinā 'numānena tasya kathaṃ sāmyasaṃbhāvanā //
