analyzed: atas sambandha adhigama mūla pravṛttinā numānena tasya katham sāmya saṃbhāvanā

original: padasya tu sambandhādhigamasāpekṣatve satyapi sāmagrībhedāt viṣayamedāccānumānādbhinnatvam /
analyzed: padasya tu sambandha adhigama sāpekṣa tve sati api sāmagrī bhedāt viṣaya medāt ca anumānāt bhinna tvam

original: viṣayastāvadvisadṛśa eva padaliṅgayoḥ /
analyzed: viṣayaḥ tāvat visadṛśaḥ eva pada liṅgayoḥ

original: tadvanmātraṃ padasyārtha iti ca sthāpayiṣyate /
analyzed: tadvat mātram padasya arthaḥ iti ca sthāpayiṣyate

original: anumānaṃ tu vākyārthaviṣayamatrāgniḥ agnimān parvata iti tataḥ pratipatteḥ /
analyzed: anumānam tu vākya artha viṣayam atra agniḥ agnimān parvataḥ iti tatas pratipatteḥ

original: uktaṃ ca tatra dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī sādhya iti //
analyzed: uktam ca tatra dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ iti

original: nanu padānyapi vākyārthavṛttīni santigomān aupagavaḥ kumbhakāra itisatyamkintu teṣvapi sākāṅkṣatā 'styeva padāntaramantareṇa nirākāṅkṣapratyayānutpādāt /
analyzed: nanu padāni api vākya artha vṛttīni santi gomān aupagavaḥ kumbhakāraḥ iti satyam kintu teṣu api sākāṅkṣa tā sti eva pada antaram antareṇa nirākāṅkṣa pratyaya anutpādāt

original: gomān kaḥ ityākāṅkṣāyā anivṛtteḥ //
analyzed: gomān kaḥ iti ākāṅkṣāyāḥ anivṛtteḥ

original: api ca parvatādiviśeṣyapratipattipūrvikā pāvakādiviśeṣaṇāśca tatirliṅgādudeti /
analyzed: api ca parvata ādi viśeṣya pratipatti pūrvikā pāvaka ādi viśeṣaṇāḥ ca tatiḥ liṅgāt udeti

original: padāttu viśeṣaṇāvagatipūrvikā viśeṣyāvagatiriti viṣayabhedaḥ //
analyzed: padāt tu viśeṣaṇa avagati pūrvikā viśeṣya avagatiḥ iti viṣaya bhedaḥ

original: nanu uktaṃ yathā 'numāne dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī sādhyaḥ evam ihārthaviśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥsādhyo bhavatu maivam śabdasya hetutvāt /
analyzed: nanu uktam yathā numāne dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ evam iha artha viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ sādhyaḥ bhavatu mā evam śabdasya hetu tvāt

original: na ca hetureva pakṣo bhavitumarhatīti //
analyzed: na ca hetuḥ eva pakṣaḥ bhavitum arhati iti

original: nanu yathā 'gnimānayaṃ dhūmaḥ dhūmatvāt mahānasaghūmavadityuktaṃ  [sā deśasyāgniyuktasya dhūmasyānyaiścakalpitā] iti evaṃ gośabda evārthavattvena sāhyatām gośabdatvādityādi sāmānyaṃ ca hetūkriyatām itietadapi dūrghaṭamśabdasya dharmiṇaḥ kiṃ arthaviśiṣṭatvaṃ vā sādhyate pratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭatvaṃ vā arthapratītiviśiṣṭatvaṃ vā na tāvadarthaviśiṣṭatvaṃ sāhyam śailajvalanayoriva śabdārthayoḥ dharmadharmibhāvābhāvāt //
analyzed: nanu yathā gnimān ayam dhūmaḥ dhūma tvāt mahānasa ghūma vat iti uktam sā deśasya agni yuktasya dhūmasya anyaiḥ ca kalpitā iti evam go śabdaḥ eva arthavattvena sāhyatām go śabda tvāt ityādi sāmānyam ca hetūkriyatām iti etat api dūrghaṭam śabdasya dharmiṇaḥ kim artha viśiṣṭa tvam vā sādhyate pratyāyana śakti viśiṣṭa tvam vā artha pratīti viśiṣṭa tvam vā na tāvat artha viśiṣṭa tvam sāhyam śaila jvalanayoḥ iva śabda arthayoḥ dharma dharmi bh

original: athārthaviṣayatvācchabdasyārthaviśiṣṭatetyucyate tadapyayuktam tatpratītijananamantareṇa tadviṣayatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: atha artha viṣaya tvāt śabdasya artha viśiṣṭa tā iti ucyate tat api ayuktam tad pratīti jananam antareṇa tad viṣaya tva anupapatteḥ

original: pratītau tu siddhāyāṃ kiṃ tadviṣayatvadvārakeṇa taddharmatvena yadi tu tadviṣayatvamūlā taddharmatvapūrvikā 'rthapratītiḥ arthapratītimūlaṃ taviṣayatvam taditaretarāśrayam /
analyzed: pratītau tu siddhāyām kim tad viṣaya tva dvārakeṇa tad dharma tvena yadi tu tad viṣaya tva mūlā tad dharma tva pūrvikā rtha pratītiḥ artha pratīti mūlam tad itaretara āśrayam

original: tasmānnārthaviśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ sādhyaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na artha viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ sādhyaḥ

original: nāpyarthapratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭaḥ tadarthitayā śabdaprayogābhāvāt //
analyzed: na api artha pratyāyana śakti viśiṣṭaḥ tad arthi tayā śabda prayoga abhāvāt

original: na śaktisiddhye śabdah kathyate śrūyate 'pi vā /
analyzed: na śakti siddhye śabdaḥ kathyate śrūyate vā

original: arthagatyarthamevāmuṃ śṛṇvanti ca vadanti ca //22//
analyzed: artha gati artham eva amum śṛṇvanti ca vadanti ca

original: nāpyarthapratītiviśiṣṭāḥ śabdaḥ pakṣatāmanubhavitumarhati siddhyasiddhivikalpānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: na api artha pratīti viśiṣṭāḥ śabdaḥ pakṣatām anubhavitum arhati siddhi asiddhi vikalpa anupapatteḥ

original: asiddhayā 'pi tadvattvaṃ śabdasyārthadhiyā katham siddhāyāṃ tatpratītau vā kimanyadanumīyate //23//
analyzed: asiddhayā pi tadvat tvam śabdasya artha dhiyā katham siddhāyām tad pratītau vā kim anyat anumīyate

original: jvalanādāvapi tulyo vikalpa iti cet na hi tatrāgnirdhūmena janyate api tu gamyate /
analyzed: jvalana ādau api tulyaḥ vikalpaḥ iti ced na hi tatra agniḥ dhūmena janyate api tu gamyate

original: iyaṃ tvarthapratītirjanyate śabdenityasyāmeva siddhāsiddhatvavikalpāvasaraḥ /
analyzed: iyam tu artha pratītiḥ janyate śabdenityasyām eva siddha asiddha tva vikalpa avasaraḥ

original: tasmāt tridhā 'pi na śabdasya pakṣatvam //
analyzed: tasmāt tridhā pi na śabdasya pakṣa tvam

original: api ca gośabde dharmiṇi gatvādisāmānyātmakasya hetorgrahaṇaṃ tato vyāptismaraṇam tataḥ parāmarśaḥ tato 'rthapratipattiriti kāladrādhīyastvāt dharmī tirohito bhavet /
analyzed: api ca go śabde dharmiṇi ga tva ādi sāmānya ātmakasya hetoḥ grahaṇam tatas vyāpti smaraṇam tatas parāmarśaḥ tatas rtha pratipattiḥ iti kāla drādhīyaḥ tvāt dharmī tirohitaḥ bhavet

original: na parvatavadavasthiti tasya /
analyzed: na parvata vat avasthiti tasya

original: api tūccaritapradhvaṃsitvaṃ śabdasya /
analyzed: api tu uccarita pradhvaṃsi tvam śabdasya

original: na ca śabdamarthavattvena lokaḥ pratipadyate kintu śabdāt pṛthagevārthamiti na sarvathā śabdaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: na ca śabdam arthavat tvena lokaḥ pratipadyate kintu śabdāt pṛthak eva artham iti na sarvathā śabdaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: ato dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ sādhyasyedvāsaṃbhavācchabdaliṅgayormahān viṣayabhedaḥ //
analyzed: atas dharma viśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ sādhyasya id vā asaṃbhavāt śabda liṅgayoḥ mahān viṣaya bhedaḥ

original: sāmagrībhedaḥ khalvapipakṣadharmānvayādirūpasāpekṣyanumānaṃ vyākhayātaṃ śabde tu na tāni santi rūpāṇi /
analyzed: sāmagrī bhedaḥ khalu api pakṣa dharma anvaya ādi rūpa sāpekṣi anumānam vyākhayātam śabde tu na tāni santi rūpāṇi

original: tathā ca śabdasya pakṣatvapratikṣepānna taddharmatayā gatvādisāmānyasya liṅgatā /
analyzed: tathā ca śabdasya pakṣa tva pratikṣepāt na tad dharma tayā ga tu ādi sāmānyasya liṅga tā

original: na cārthasya dharmitvam siddhyasiddhivikalpānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca arthasya dharmi tvam siddhi asiddhi vikalpa anupapatteḥ

original: na ca taddharmatvaṃ śabdasya śakyate vaktum tatra vṛttyabhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca tad dharma tvam śabdasya śakyate vaktum tatra vṛtti abhāvāt

original: pratītijanakatvena taddharmatāyāmucyamānāyāṃ pūrvavaditaretarāśrayaḥ pakṣadharmādibalena pratītiḥ pratītau ca satyāṃ pakṣadharmādirūpalābhaḥ //
analyzed: pratīti janaka tvena tad dharma tāyām ucyamānāyām pūrvavat itaretara āśrayaḥ pakṣa dharma ādi balena pratītiḥ pratītau ca satyām pakṣa dharma ādi rūpa lābhaḥ

original: api ca yadyarthadharmatayā śabdasya pakṣadharmatvaṃ bhavet tadā ' anavagatadhūmāgnisambandho 'pi yathā dhūmasya parvatadharmatāṃ gṛhṇātyeva tathā 'navagataśabdārthasambandho 'pi arthadharmatāṃ śabdasya gṛhṇīyāt na ca gṛhṇātītyato nāsti pakṣadharmatvaṃ śabdasyeti //
analyzed: api ca yadi artha dharmatayā śabdasya pakṣa dharma tvam bhavet tadā yathā dhūmasya parvata dharmatām gṛhṇāti eva tathā artha dharmatām śabdasya gṛhṇīyāt na ca gṛhṇāti iti atas na asti pakṣa dharmatvam śabdasya iti

original: anvayavyatirekāvapi tasya durupapādau deśe kāle ca śabdārthayoranugamābhāvāt /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekau api tasya durupapādau deśe kāle ca śabda arthayoḥ anugama abhāvāt

original: na hi yatra deśe śabdaḥ tatrārthaḥ /
analyzed: na hi yatra deśe śabdaḥ tatra arthaḥ

original: yathoktaṃ śrotriyaiḥ [mukhe hi śabdamupalabhāmahe bhūmāvartham] iti /
analyzed: yathā uktam śrotriyaiḥ mukhe hi śabdam upalabhāmahe bhūmau artham iti

original: vayaṃ tu karṇākāśe śrotramupalabhāmaheityāstāmetat //
analyzed: vayam tu karṇa ākāśe śrotram upalabhāmahe iti āstām etat

original: nāpi yatra kāle śabdaḥ tatrārthaḥ idanīṃ yudhiṣṭhirārthābhāve 'pi yudhiṣṭhiraśabdasadbhāvāt /
analyzed: nā api yatra kāle śabdaḥ tatra arthaḥ idanīm yudhiṣṭhira artha abhāve pi yudhiṣṭhira śabda sadbhāvāt

original: arthaśabdārthayoḥ anvayābhāve 'pi tadbuddhyoranvayo grahīṣyate ityucyate /
analyzed: artha śabda arthayoḥ anvaya abhāve pi tad buddhyoḥ anvayaḥ grahīṣyate iti ucyate

original: tarhi vaktavyaṃkiṃ arthabuddhāvutpannāyāmanvayo gṛhyate anutpannāyāṃ vā anutpannāyāṃ tāvat svarūpāsattvāt kuto 'nvayagrahaṇam utpannāyāṃ tvarthabuddhau kimanvayagrahaṇeneti naiṣphalyam /
analyzed: tarhi vaktavyam kim artha buddhau utpannāyām anvayaḥ gṛhyate anutpannāyām vā anutpannāyām tāvat svarūpa asattvāt kutas nvaya grahaṇam utpannāyām tu artha buddhau kim anvaya grahaṇena iti naiṣphalyam

original: tatpūrvakatve tu pūrvavaditaretarāśrayam /
analyzed: tad pūrvaka tve tu pūrvavat itaretarāśrayam

original: etena vyatirekagrahaṇamapi vyākhyātam //
analyzed: etena vyatireka grahaṇam api vyākhyātam

original: nanu āvāpodvāpadvāreṇa śabdarthasambandhe niścīyamāne upayujyete evānvayavyatirekau /
analyzed: nanu āvāpa udvāpa dvāreṇa śabda artha sambandhe niścīyamāne upayujyete eva anvaya vyatirekau

original: yathoktam [yatra yo 'nveti yaṃ śabdamarthastasya bhavedasau] iti satyametatkintu samayabalena siddhāyāmarthabuddhau samayaniyamārthāvanvayavyatirekau śabde nānvayavyatirekakṛtā ca dhūmāderivāgneḥ tato 'rthabuddhiḥ //
analyzed: yathā uktam yatra yaḥ nu eti yam śabdam arthaḥ tasya bhavet asau iti satyam etat kintu samaya balena siddhāyām artha buddhau samaya niyama arthau anvaya vyatirekau śabde na anvaya vyatireka kṛtā ca dhūma ādeḥ iva agneḥ tatas rtha buddhiḥ

original: api ca dhūmādibhyaḥ pratītiśca naivāvagatipūrvikā /
analyzed: api ca dhūma ādibhyaḥ pratītiḥ ca nā evā avagati pūrvikā

original: ihāvagatipūrvaiva śabdādutpadyate matiḥ //24//
analyzed: iha avagati pūrvā eva śabdāt utpadyate matiḥ

original: sthaviravyavahāre hi bālaḥ śabdāt kutaścana /
analyzed: sthavira vyavahāre hi bālaḥ śabdāt kutaścana

original: dṛṣṭvā 'rthamavagacchan taṃ svayamapyavagacchati //25//
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā rtham avagacchan tam svayam api avagacchati

original: yatrāpyevaṃ samayaḥ kriyate etasmācchabdādayamarthastvayā pratipattavya ititatrāpi pratītireva kāraṇatvena nirdiṣṭā draṣṭavyā /
analyzed: yatra api evam samayaḥ kriyate etasmāt śabdāt ayam arthaḥ tvayā pratipattavyaḥ iti tatra api pratītiḥ eva kāraṇa tvena nirdiṣṭā draṣṭavyā

original: tasmādanyo liṅgaliṅginoravinābhāvo nāma sambandhaḥ anyaś ca śabdārthayoḥ samayaparanāmā vācyavāc akabhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ pratītyaṅgam /
analyzed: tasmāt anyaḥ liṅga liṅginoḥ avinābhāvaḥ nāma sambandhaḥ anyaḥ ca śabda arthayoḥ samaya para nāmā sambandhaḥ pratīti aṅgam

original: evaṃvidhaviṣayabhedāt sāmagrībhedācca pratyakṣavadanumānādanyaḥ śabda iti siddham //
analyzed: evaṃvidha viṣaya bhedāt sāmagrī bhedāt ca pratyakṣa vat anumānāt anyaḥ śabdaḥ iti siddham

original: yat tu pūrvavarṇakramāpekṣaṇādivailakāṇyamāśaṅkya dūṣitam kastatra phalguprāye nirbandhaḥ //
analyzed: yat tu pūrva varṇa krama apekṣaṇa ādi vailakāṇyam āśaṅkya dūṣitam kaḥ tatra phalgu prāye nirbandhaḥ

original: yatpunarabhihitam [āptavādāvisaṃvādasāmānyādanumānatā] iti tadatīva subhāṣitam viṣayabhedāt /
analyzed: yat punar abhihitam āpta vāda avisaṃvāda sāmānyāt anumāna tā iti tat atīva su bhāṣitam viṣaya bhedāt

original: āptavādatvahetunā hi śabdārthabuddheḥ prāmāṇyaṃ sādhyate na tu saiva janyate /
analyzed: āpta vāda tva hetunā hi śabda artha buddheḥ prāmāṇyam sādhyate na tu sā eva janyate

original: yadāha [anyadeva hi satyatvamāptavādatvahetukam /
analyzed: yat āha anyat eva hi satya tvam āpta vāda tva hetukam

original: [vākyārthaścānya eveha jñātaḥ pūrvataraṃ ca saḥ //
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ ca anyaḥ evā iha jñātaḥ pūrvataram ca saḥ

original: tataścedāptavādena satyatvamanumīyate /
analyzed: tatas ced āpta vādena satya tvam anumīyate

original: vākyārthapratyayasyātra kathaṃ syādanumānatā //
analyzed: vākya artha pratyayasya atra katham syāt anumāna tā

original: janma tulyaṃ hi buddhīnāmāptānāptagirāṃ śrutau /
analyzed: janma tulyam hi buddhīnām āpta anāpta girām śrutau

original: janmādhikopayogī ca nānumāyāṃ trilakṣaṇaḥ] iti //
analyzed: janma adhika upayogī ca na anumāyām tri lakṣaṇaḥ iti

original: na ca prāmāṇyaniścayādvinā pratibhāmātraṃ taditi vaktavyam śabdārthasaṃpratyayasyānubhavasiddhatvāt //
analyzed: na ca prāmāṇya niścayāt vinā pratibhā mātram tat iti vaktavyam śabda artha saṃpratyayasya anubhava siddha tvāt

original: etena vivakṣāviṣayatvamapi pratyuktam /
analyzed: etena vivakṣā viṣaya tvam api pratyuktam

original: na hi vivakṣā nāma śabdasya vācyo viṣayaḥ kintvartha eva tathā //
analyzed: na hi vivakṣā nāma śabdasya vācyaḥ viṣayaḥ kintu arthaḥ eva tathā

original: vivakṣāyāṃ hi śabdasya liṅgatvamiha dṛśyate /
analyzed: vivakṣāyām hi śabdasya liṅga tvam iha dṛśyate

original: ākāśa iva kāryatvāt na vācakatayā punaḥ //26//
analyzed: ākāśe iva kārya tvāt na vācaka tayā punar

original: śabdāduccaritācca vācyaviṣayā tāvatsamutpadyate saṃvittistadanantaraṃ tu gamayetkāmaṃ vivakṣāmasau /
analyzed: śabdāt uccaritāt ca vācya viṣayā tāvat samutpadyate saṃvittiḥ tad anantaram tu gamayet kāmam vivakṣām asau

original: arthopagrahavarjitat tuniyamātsiddhaivamājīvatā tadvācyārthaviśeṣitā tvavidite naiṣā tadarthe bhavet //27//
analyzed: tu niyamāt siddhā evam ājīvatā tad vācya artha viśeṣitā tu avidite na eṣā tad arthe bhavet

original: nanu siddhe pramāṇattve bhedābhedaparīṣaṇam /
analyzed: nanu siddhe bheda abheda parīṣaṇam

original: kriyate na tu śabdasya prāmāṇyamavakalpate //28//
analyzed: kriyate na tu śabdasya prāmāṇyam avakalpate

original: arthapratītijanakaṃ pramāṇamiti varṇitam /
analyzed: artha pratīti janakam pramāṇam iti varṇitam

original: vikalpamātramūlatvāt nārthaṃ śabdāḥ spṛśantyamī //29//
analyzed: vikalpa mātra mūla tvāt na artham śabdāḥ spṛśanti amī

original: artho nirūpyamāṇaśca ko vā śabdasya śakyate vaktuṃ na jātirna vyaktiḥ na tadvānnāma kiś cana //30//
analyzed: arthaḥ nirūpyamāṇaḥ ca kaḥ vā śabdasya śakyate vaktum na jātiḥ na vyaktiḥ na tadvān nāma kim cana

original: sambandho 'pyasya nārthena nityo 'sti samayo 'tha vā śakyaḥ sannapi vā boddhumarthe kathamatīndriye //31//
analyzed: sambandhaḥ pi asya na arthena nityaḥ sti vā śakyaḥ san api vā boddhum arthe katham atīndriye

original: vākyārtho 'pi na nirṇetuṃ pāryate pāramārthikaḥ /
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ na nirṇetum pāryate pāramārthikaḥ

original: niyogabhāvanābhedasaṃsargādisvabhāvakaḥ //32//
tatpratītyabhyupāyaś ca kiṃ padārthaḥ padāni vā vākyaṃ vā vyatipaktārthaṃ sphoṭo veti na lakṣyate //33//
analyzed: tad pratīti abhyupāyaḥ ca kim padārthaḥ padāni vā vākyam vā vyatipakta artham sphoṭaḥ vā iti na lakṣyate

original: siddhāyāmapi tadbuddhau tasyā draḍhimakāraṇam /
analyzed: siddhāyām api tad buddhau tasyāḥ draḍhima kāraṇam

original: nityatvamāptoktatvaṃ vā na samyagavatiṣṭhate //34//
analyzed: nitya tvam āpta ukta tvam vā na samyak avatiṣṭhate

original: pade nitye 'pi vaidikyo racanāḥ kartṛpūrvikāḥ nityā vā kṛtakatve 'pi kṛtāḥ keneti durgamam //35//
analyzed: pade nitye vaidikyaḥ racanāḥ kartṛ pūrvikāḥ nityāḥ vā kṛtaka tve pi kṛtāḥ kena iti durgamam

original: kartā 'sti sa ca nirdvandvaḥ sa caikaḥ sa ca sarvavit /
analyzed: kartā sti sa ca nirdvandvaḥ sa ca ekaḥ sa ca sarva vid

original: sa ca kāruṇiko veti pratipattuṃ na śakyate //36//
analyzed: sa ca kāruṇikaḥ vā iti pratipattum na śakyate

original: parasparaviruddhāśca santi bhūyāṃsa āgamāḥ /
analyzed: paraspara viruddhāḥ ca santi bhūyāṃsaḥ āgamāḥ

original: teṣāṃ kasyeśvaraḥ kartā kasya neti na manmahe //37//
analyzed: teṣām kasya īśvaraḥ kartā kasya na iti na manmahe

original: vede doṣāśca vidyante vyāghātaḥ punaruktatā /
analyzed: vede doṣāḥ ca vidyante vyāghātaḥ punarukta tā

original: phalasyānupalaṃbhaśca tathā phalaviparyayaḥ //38//
analyzed: phalasya anupalaṃbhaḥ ca tathā phala viparyayaḥ

original: kīdṛśaścārthavādānāṃ viruddhārthābhidhāyinām /
analyzed: kīdṛśaḥ ca artha vādānām viruddha artha abhidhāyinām

original: mantrāṇāṃ nāmadheyādipadānāṃ vā samanvayaḥ //39//
analyzed: mantrāṇām nāmadheya ādi padānām vā samanvayaḥ

original: siddhakāryopadeśācca vede saṃśerate janāḥ /
analyzed: siddha kārya upadeśāt ca vede saṃśerate janāḥ

original: kimasya kārye prāmāṇyaṃ siddhe 'rthe vobhayatra vā //40//
analyzed: kim asya kārye prāmāṇyam siddhe rthe vā ubhayatra vā

original: tena vedapramāṇatvaṃ viṣame pathi vartate /
analyzed: tena veda pramāṇa tvam viṣame pathi vartate

original: jīvikopāyabuddhyā vā śraddhayā vā 'bhyupeyatām //41//
analyzed: jīvikā upāya buddhyā vā śraddhayā vā bhyupeyatām

original: atrāmidhīyatesarva evaite doṣā yathākramaṃ parihariṣyanta ityalamasamāśvāsena supratiṣṭhameva vedaprāmāṇyamavagacchatvāyuṣmān //
analyzed: atra amidhīyate sarve eva ete doṣāḥ yathākramam parihariṣyante iti alam asamāśvāsena su pratiṣṭham eva veda prāmāṇyam avagacchatu āyuṣmān

original: nanu arthāsaṃsparśitvameva tāvatkathaṃ parihriyate /
analyzed: nanu artha asaṃsparśi tvam eva tāvat katham parihriyate

original: na hi pāhye 'rthe śabdāḥ pratītimādaghati /
analyzed: na hi pāhye rthe śabdāḥ pratītim ādaghati

original: te hi durlabhavastusaṃparkavikalpamātrādhīnajanmānaḥ svamahimānamanuvartamānāritaraskṛtavāhyārthasamanvayān vikalpaprāyān pratyayānutpādayanto dṛśyante[aṅgulyagre hastiyūthaśatamāste] itītisvabhāva eva śabdānāmarthāsaṃsparśitvam //
analyzed: te hi durlabha vastu saṃparka vikalpa mātra adhīna janmānaḥ sva mahimānam anuvartamāna ari taraskṛta vāhya artha samanvayān vikalpa prāyān pratyayān utpādayantaḥ dṛśyante aṅguli agre hasti yūtha śatam āste iti iti svabhāvaḥ eva śabdānām artha asaṃsparśi tvam

original: cakṣurādīnāmapi alīkakacakūrcakādipratītikāraṇatvamasti na ca teṣāmarthāsaṃsparśitvamiti cet na teṣāṃ hi timirādidoṣakaluṣitavapuṣāṃ tathāvidhavibhramakāraṇatvam na tu svamahimnaiva /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ādīnām api alīka kaca kūrcaka ādi pratīti kāraṇa tvam asti na ca teṣām artha asaṃsparśi tvam iti ced na teṣām hi timira ādi doṣa kaluṣita vapuṣām tathāvidha vibhrama kāraṇa tvam na tu sva mahimnā eva

original: ihāpi puruṣadoṣāṇāmeṣa mahimā na śabdānāmiti cet maivam doṣavato 'pi puruṣasya mūkāderanuccāritaśabdasyedṛśaviplavotpādanapāṭavābhāvātt /
analyzed: iha api puruṣa doṣāṇām eṣa mahimā na śabdānām iti ced mā evam puruṣasya mūka ādeḥ anuccārita śabdasya īdṛśa viplava utpādana pāṭava abhāvāt

original: asatyapi ca puruṣahṛdayakāluṣye yathāprayujyamānānyaṅgulyagrādivākyāni viplavamāvahantyeveti śabdānāmevaiṣa svabhāvaḥ na vaktṛdoṣāṇām //
analyzed: asati api ca puruṣa hṛdaya kāluṣye yathā prayujyamānāni aṅguli agra ādi vākyāni viplavam āvahanti eva iti śabdānām eva eṣa svabhāvaḥ na vaktṛ doṣāṇām

original: api ca na vakṣurādi bādhakajñānodaye sati na viramati viparītavedanajanmanaḥ śuktikārajatādibuddhiṣu vibhramasyāpāyadarśanāt /
analyzed: api ca na vakṣuḥ ādi bādhaka jñāna udaye sati na viramati viparīta vedana janmanaḥ śuktikā rajata ādi buddhiṣu vibhramasya apāya darśanāt

original: śabdastu śatakṛtvo 'pi bādhyamāno yathaivoccaritaḥ [karaśākhāśikhare kareṇuśatamāste] iti tathaiva tathābhūtaṃ bhūyo 'pi vikalpamayathārthamutpādayatyeveti vikalpādhīnajanmatvācchabdānāmevedaṃ rūpaṃ yat arthāsaṃsparśitvaṃ nāmeti /
analyzed: śabdaḥ tu bādhyamānaḥ yathā eva uccaritaḥ karaśākhā śikhare kareṇu śatam āste iti tathā eva tathābhūtam bhūyas u pi vikalpam ayathārtham utpādayati eva iti vikalpa adhīna janma tvāt śabdānām eva idam rūpam yat artha asaṃsparśi tvam nāma iti

original: taduktam [vikalpayonayaḥ śabdāḥ vikalpāḥ śabdayonayaḥ /[cit. by Helārāja VākPad SamSAm 3.54] teṣām anyonyasambandhe nārthaṃ śabdāḥ spṛśantyamī]iti //
analyzed: tat uktam vikalpa yonayaḥ śabdāḥ vikalpāḥ śabda yonayaḥ teṣām anyonya sambandhe na artham śabdāḥ spṛśanti amī iti

original: atrābhidhīyatebhavedetadevaṃ yadi na kadācidapi yathārthaṃ śabdaḥ prayayamupajanyet arthāsaṃsparśitvagevāsya svabhāva iti gamyeta /
analyzed: atra abhidhīyate bhavet etat evam yadi na kadācid api yathārtham śabdaḥ prayayam upajanyet artha a saṃsparśi tvac eva asya svabhāvaḥ iti gamyeta

original: bhavati tu guṇavatpuruṣabhāṣitāt [nadyāstīre phalāni santi] iti vākyāt atiraskṛtabāhyārtho yathārthaḥ prayayaḥ tataḥ pravṛttasya tadarthaprāpteḥ /
analyzed: bhavati tu guṇavat puruṣa bhāṣitāt nadyāḥ tīre phalāni santi iti vākyāt a tiraskṛta bāhya arthaḥ yathārthaḥ prayayaḥ tatas pravṛttasya tad artha prāpteḥ

original: na ceyamarthaprāptirarthasparśaśūnyādapi śabdavikalpāt pāraṃparyeṇa maṇiprabhāmaṃṇibuddhivadavakalpataṃ ityupariṣṭāt vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: na ca iyam artha prāptiḥ artha sparśa śūnyāt api śabda vikalpāt pāraṃparyeṇa iti upariṣṭāt vakṣyāmaḥ

original: nanu guṇavadvaktrakādaṅghulyādivākyāt dṛṣṭa evāsamīcīhaḥ pratyayaḥmaivamguṇavatamevaṃvidhavākyoccāraṇacapalābhāvāt //
analyzed: nanu guṇavat vaktrakāt aṅghuli ādi vākyāt dṛṣṭaḥ eva asamīcīhaḥ pratyayaḥ mā evam guṇavatam evaṃvidha vākya uccāraṇa capala abhāvāt

original: yat tu āpto 'pi kaṃ cidanuśāsti [mā bhavānabhūtārthaṃ vākyaṃ vādīḥaṅgulikoṭau karighaṭāśatamāsteiti] iti tatretikaraṇāvacchinnasya dṛṣṭāntatayā śabdaparatvenopādānātpratiṣedhaikavākyatayā yathārthameva /
analyzed: yat tu kam cit anuśāsti mā bhavān abhūta artham vākyam vādīḥ aṅguli koṭau iti tatra iti karaṇa avacchinnasya dṛṣṭānta tayā śabda para tvena upādānāt pratiṣedha ekavākyatayā yathārtham eva

original: arthaparatve tu niṣedhakavākyataiva na syāditi /
analyzed: artha para tve tu niṣedhaka vākya tā eva na syāt iti

original: tasmādāpravakyānāmayathārthatvābhāvānna svato 'rthāsaṃsparśinaḥ śabdāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt āpravakyānām ayathārtha tva abhāvāt na svatas rtha asaṃsparśinaḥ śabdāḥ

original: puruṣa doṣānupaṅgakṛta evāyaṃ viplavaḥ //
analyzed: puruṣa doṣa anupaṅga kṛtaḥ eva ayam viplavaḥ

original: nanu āptairevaṃvidhavākyāprayoge 'pi sandigdho vyatirekaḥ kiṃ śabdānāṃ tadṛśasvabhāvābhāvādayathārthapratyayānutpādaḥ ata vaktṛdoṣābhāvāditi /
analyzed: nanu āptaiḥ evaṃvidha vākya aprayoge sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ kim śabdānām tadṛśa svabhāva abhāvāt ayathā artha pratyaya anutpādaḥ vaktṛ doṣa abhāvāt iti

original: naitadevam !anuccaritaśabdo 'pi puruṣo vipralaṃbhakaḥ /
analyzed: na etat evam puruṣaḥ vipralaṃbhakaḥ

original: !hastasaṃjñādyupāyena janayatyeva viplavam //42//
analyzed: hasta saṃjñā ādi upāyena janayati eva viplavam

original: na ca hastasaṃjñādinā śabdānumānam tatkṛtaśca viplava iti vaktavyam itthamapratīteḥ /
analyzed: na ca hasta saṃjñā ādinā śabda anumānam tad kṛtaḥ ca viplavaḥ iti vaktavyam ittham apratīteḥ

original: utpanne ca kvacinnadyādivākyādvijñāne raraṅgiṇītīramanusarannanāsāditaphalaḥ pravṛttabādhakapratyayaḥ puruṣamevādhikṣipati[dhik hā tena durātmanā vipralabdho 'smi] iti na śabdam /
analyzed: utpanne ca kvacid nadī ādi vākyāt vijñāne raraṅgiṇī tīram anusaran an āsādita phalaḥ pravṛtta bādhaka pratyayaḥ puruṣam eva adhikṣipati dhik hā tena durātmanā vipralabdhaḥ smi iti na śabdam

original: prāptaphalaśca pumāṃsameva ślāghate [sādhu sādhunā tenopadiṣṭam] iti /
analyzed: prāpta phalaḥ ca pumāṃsam eva ślāghate sādhu sādhunā tena upadiṣṭam iti

original: ataḥ puruṣadoṣānvayānuvidhānāt puruṣadoṣakṛta eva śabdādviplavaḥ na svarūpanibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: atas puruṣa doṣa anvaya anuvidhānāt puruṣa doṣa kṛtaḥ eva śabdāt viplavaḥ na sva rūpa nibandhanaḥ

original: tadabhāvakṛta eva āpteṣu tūṣṇīmāsīneṣu vibhramānutpāda iti na sandigdho vyatirekaḥ //
analyzed: tad abhāva kṛtaḥ eva āpteṣu tūṣṇīm āsīneṣu vibhrama anutpādaḥ iti na sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ

original: nanu puruṣadoṣāstatra kiṃ kuryuḥ puruṣasya hi guṇavato doṣavato vā śabdoccāraṇamātra eva vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: nanu puruṣa doṣāḥ tatra kim kuryuḥ puruṣasya hi guṇavataḥ doṣavataḥ vā śabda uccāraṇa mātraḥ eva vyāpāraḥ

original: tataḥ paraṃ tu kāryaṃ śabdāyattameveti tatsvarūpakṛta evāyaṃ vibhramaḥ //
analyzed: tatas param tu kāryam śabda āyattam eva iti tad svarūpa kṛtaḥ eva ayam vibhramaḥ

original: hanta tarhi vaktari guṇavati sati [saritastīre phalāni santi] iti samyakpratyaye 'pi śabdasyaiva vyāpārāt puruṣasyoccāraṇamāgre caritārthatvātraikāntataḥ śabdasyārthāsaṃsparśitvameva svabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: hanta tarhi vaktari guṇavati sati saritaḥ tīre phalāni santi iti samyak pratyaye śabdasya eva vyāpārāt puruṣasya uccāraṇam āgre caritārtha tvā atra ekāntataḥ śabdasya artha asaṃsparśi tvam eva svabhāvaḥ

original: yuktaṃcaitadeva yahīpavatprakāśatvamātrameva śabdasya svarūpam na yathārthatvamayathārthatvaṃ vā /
analyzed: yuktam ca etat eva yat hīpa vat prakāśa tva mātram eva śabdasya svarūpam na yathārtha tvam ayathārtha tvam vā

original: viparīte 'pyarthe dīpasya prakāśatvānativṛtteḥ /
analyzed: viparīte pi arthe dīpasya prakāśa tva anativṛtteḥ

original: ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥpradīpe vyupattitirapekṣameva prakāśatvam śabdasya tu vyupattyapekṣamiti /
analyzed: ayam tu viśeṣaḥ pradīpe vyupatti tirapekṣam eva prakāśa tvam śabdasya tu vyupatti apekṣam iti

original: prakāśātmanastu śabdasya vaktṛguṇadoṣadhīne yathārthetaratve /
analyzed: prakāśa ātmanaḥ tu śabdasya vaktṛ guṇa doṣa dhīne yathārtha itaratve

original: ata evāṅguliśikharādhikaraṇakareṇuśatavacasi bādhite 'pi punaḥ punaruccāryamāṇe bhavati vibhramaḥ prakāśatvarūpānapāyāt /
analyzed: atas eva aṅguli śikhara adhikaraṇaka reṇu śata vacasi bādhite punar punar uccāryamāṇe bhavati vibhramaḥ prakāśa tva rūpa anapāyāt

original: na tveṣa śabdasya doṣaḥ //
analyzed: na tu eṣa śabdasya doṣaḥ

original: padārthānāṃ tu saṃsargamasamīkṣya prajalpataḥ /
analyzed: padārthānām tu saṃsargam a samīkṣya prajalpataḥ

original: vaktureva pramādo 'yaṃ na śabdo 'trāparādhyati //43//
analyzed: vaktuḥ eva pramādaḥ yam na trā aparādhyati

original: taduktampramāṇāntaradarśanamatra bādhyate na punarhastiyūthaśatamiti śābdo 'nvayaḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam pramāṇa antara darśanam atra bādhyate na punar hasti yūtha śatam iti śābdaḥ nvayaḥ

original: puruṣo hi svadarśanaṃ śabdena pareṣāṃ prakāśayati /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ hi sva darśanam śabdena pareṣām prakāśayati

original: tatra taddarśanaṃ ced duṣṭaṃ duṣṭaḥ śābdapratyayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra tad darśanam ced duṣṭam duṣṭaḥ śābda pratyayaḥ

original: aduṣṭaṃ cet aduṣṭa iti guṇavataḥ puruṣasyāduṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ bhavati doṣavato duṣṭamiti /
analyzed: aduṣṭam ced aduṣṭaḥ iti guṇavataḥ puruṣasya aduṣṭam darśanam bhavati doṣavataḥ duṣṭam iti

original: adṛṣṭvā 'pi vastu yadupadiśyate so 'pi buddhidoṣa eva /
analyzed: a dṛṣṭvā pi vastu yat upadiśyate saḥ pi buddhi doṣaḥ eva

original: tasmāt puruṣagataguṇadoṣānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvāt tatkṛte eva śābdayathārthatvāyathārthatve /
analyzed: tasmāt puruṣa gata guṇa doṣa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt tad kṛte eva śābda yathārtha tva ayathārtha tve

original: taduktam[tattvamapi bhavati vitathamapi bhavati] iti //
analyzed: tat uktam tattvam api bhavati vitatham api bhavati iti

original: tenābhidhātṛdaurātmyakṛteyamayathārthatā /
analyzed: tena abhidhātṛ daurātmya kṛtā iyam ayathārtha tā

original: pratyayasyeti śabdānāṃ nārthāsaṃsparśitā svataḥ //44//
analyzed: pratyayasya iti śabdānām na artha asaṃsparśi tā svatas

original: yā tu jātyādiśabdārthaparākaraṇavartvanā /
analyzed: yā tu jāti ādi śabda artha parākaraṇa vartvanā

original: arthāsaṃsparśitā proktā sā purastānniṣetsyate //45//
analyzed: artha asaṃsparśi tā proktā sā purastāt niṣetsyate

original: pramāṇatvaṃ tu śabdasya kathamityatra vastuni /
analyzed: pramāṇa tvam tu śabdasya katham iti atra vastuni

original: jaiminīyairayaṃ tāvatpīṭthabandho vidhīyate //46//
analyzed: jaiminīyaiḥ ayam tāvat pīṭthabandhaḥ vidhīyate

original: prāmāṇyamaprāmāṇyaṃ vā sarvavijñānagocaraḥ /
analyzed: prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam vā sarva vijñāna gocaraḥ

original: svato vā parato veti prathamaṃ pravivicyatām //47//
analyzed: svatas vā paratas vā iti prathamam pravivicyatām

original: nanu śabdaprāmāṇyacintāvasare sakalapramāṇaprāmāṇyavicārasya kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ na svātantryeṇa parīṣaṇam apitu tadarthameva samānamārgatvāt /
analyzed: nanu śabda prāmāṇya cintā avasare sakala pramāṇa prāmāṇya vicārasya kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ na svātantryeṇa parīṣaṇam apitu tad artham eva samāna mārga tvāt

original: yathā 'nyeṣāṃ svataḥ parato vā prāmāṇyaṃ tathā śabdasyāpi bhaviṣyatīti /
analyzed: yathā nyeṣām svatas paratas vā prāmāṇyam tathā śabdasya api bhaviṣyati iti

original: na hi tasya svarūpamiva prāmāṇyamapi tadvisadṛśamiti //
analyzed: na hi tasya svarūpam iva prāmāṇyam api tat visadṛśam iti

original: taducyatekiṃ vijñānānāṃ prāmāṇyaprāmāṇyaṃ ceti dvayamapi svataḥ uta tadubhayamapi parataḥ āhosvadaprāmāṇyaṃ svataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ tu parataḥ uta svit prāmāṇyaṃ svataḥ aprāmāṇyaṃ tu parataḥ iti //
analyzed: tat ucyate kim vijñānānām prāmāṇya prāmāṇyam ca iti dvayam api svatas uta tat ubhayam api paratas āhosvat aprāmāṇyam svatas prāmāṇyam tu paratas uta svid prāmāṇyam svatas aprāmāṇyam tu paratas iti

original: tatra dvayamapi svata iti tāvadasāṃpratam pravṛttasya visaṃvādadarśanāt /
analyzed: tatra dvayam api svatas iti tāvat asāṃpratam pravṛttasya visaṃvāda darśanāt

original: yadi hi prāmāṇyagitaradvā svata eva jñānasya gamyeta tarhi śuktau rajatajñānaṃ pramāṇatayā vā pratipannam anyathā vā pramāṇatvaparicchattau visaṃvadati tatkatham aprāmāṇyagṛhītau vā tasmin kasmāt pravartate //48//
analyzed: yadi hi svatas eva jñānasya gamyeta tarhi śuktau rajata jñānam pramāṇa tayā vā pratipannam anyathā vā pramāṇa tva paricchattau visaṃvadati tat katham aprāmāṇya gṛhītau vā tasmin kasmāt pravartate

original: etena tṛtīyo 'pi pakṣaḥ pratyuktaḥyadapramāṇyaṃ svataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ tu parata iti /
analyzed: etena tṛtīyaḥ pi pakṣaḥ pratyuktaḥ yat apramāṇyam svatas prāmāṇyam tu paratas iti

original: svato hyaprāmāṇye niścite pravṛttir na prāptotīti /
analyzed: svatas hi aprāmāṇye niścite pravṛttiḥ na

original: kiñca aprāmāṇyamutpattau karaṇadoṣāpekṣam /
analyzed: kiñca aprāmāṇyam utpattau karaṇa doṣa apekṣam

original: niścaye bādhakajñānāpekṣam /
analyzed: niścaye bādhaka jñāna apekṣam

original: tat kathaṃ svatobhavitumarhati yac ca [aprāmāṇyamavastutvānna syāt kāraṇadoṣataḥ] iti kaiściducyate tadapi yatkiñcit /
analyzed: tat katham svatas bhavitum arhati yat ca aprāmāṇyam avastu tvāt na syāt kāraṇa doṣataḥ iti kaiścid ucyate tat api yat kiñcid

original: saṃśayaviparyayātmanaḥ apramāṇasya vastutvāttadnatamaprāmāṇyamapi vastveveti /
analyzed: saṃśaya viparyaya ātmanaḥ apramāṇasya vastu tvāt tad natam aprāmāṇyam api vastu eva iti

original: paratastu prāmāṇyaṃ yathā nāvakalpate tathā vistareṇocyate //
analyzed: paratas tu prāmāṇyam yathā na avakalpate tathā vistareṇa ucyate

original: evañcāyaṃ dvayamapi parata iti dvitīyapakṣapratikṣepo 'pi bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: evam ca ayam dvayam api paratas iti bhaviṣyati

original: arthatathātvaprakāśakaṃ hi pramāṇamityuktam /
analyzed: artha tathātva prakāśakam hi pramāṇam iti uktam

original: tasya svaprameyāvyabhicāritvaṃ nāma prāmāṇyam /
ataśca parāpekṣāyāṃ satyāṃ hi parata iti kathayitumucitam /
analyzed: atas ca para apekṣāyām satyām hi paratas iti kathayitum ucitam

original: na cāsya parāpekṣā kvacidvidyate //
analyzed: na ca asya para apekṣā kvacid vidyate

original: sā hi bhavantī utpattau vā syāt svakāryakaraṇe vā prāmāṇyaniścaye vā utpattaukārakasvaṃkhyamānnāpekṣā tadatiriktatadgataguṇāpekṣā vā kārakasvarūpamātrāpekṣāyāṃ siddhasādhyatvam /
analyzed: sā hi bhavantī utpattau vā syāt sva kārya karaṇe vā prāmāṇya niścaye vā tad atirikta tad gata guṇa apekṣā vā kāraka svarūpa mātra apekṣāyām siddha sādhya tvam

original: asatsu kārekeṣu kāryasya jñānasyātmalābhābhāvāt kasya prāmāṇyamaprāṃāṇyaṃ vā cintyate kārakātiriktatadadhikaraṇaguṇāpekṣaṇaṃ tu durghaṭam /
analyzed: asatsu kārekeṣu kāryasya jñānasya ātmalābha abhāvāt kasya prāmāṇyam aprāṃāṇyam vā cintyate kāraka atirikta tad adhikaraṇa guṇa apekṣaṇam tu durghaṭam

original: aprāmāṇikatvena kāraṇaguṇānāmākāśakuśeśayasadṛśavapuṣāṃ apekṣaṇīyatvābhavāt //
analyzed: a prāmāṇika tvena kāraṇa guṇānām ākāśa kuśeśaya sadṛśa vapuṣām apekṣaṇīya tva abhavāt

original: na kāraṇaguṇagrāhi pratyakṣamupapadyate /
analyzed: na kāraṇa guṇa grāhi pratyakṣam upapadyate

original: cakṣurādeḥ parokṣatvāt pratyakṣāstadguṇāḥ katham //49//
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ādeḥ parokṣa tvāt pratyakṣāḥ tad guṇāḥ katham

original: liṅgaṃ cādṛṣṭasambandhaṃ na tepāmanumāpakam /
analyzed: liṅgam ca adṛṣṭa sambandham na tepām anumāpakam

original: yathā 'rthabuddhisiddhistu nirdoṣadeva kārakāt //50//
analyzed: yathā kārakāt

original: yadi hi yathā 'rthatvāyathā 'rthatvarūpadvayarahitaṃ kiñcit upalabdhyākhyaṃ kāryaṃ bhavet tataḥ kāryatraividhyāt kāraṇatraividhyamavaśyamavasīyeta yathā 'rthopalabdheḥ gaṇavatkārakaṃ kārakaṃ ayathā 'rthopalabdheḥ doṣakaluṣaṃ kārakaṃ kārakam ubhayarahitāyāstu tasyāḥ svarūpāvasthitameva kārakaṃ kārkamiti /
analyzed: yadi hi yathā rtha tva ayathā rtha tva rūpa dvaya rahitam kiñcid upalabdhi ākhyam kāryam bhavet tatas kārya traividhyāt kāraṇa traividhyam avaśyam avasīyeta yathā rtha upalabdheḥ gaṇavat kārakam kārakam ayathā rtha upalabdheḥ doṣa kaluṣam kārakam kārakam ubhaya rahitāyāḥ tu tasyāḥ sva rūpa avasthitam eva kārakam kārkam iti

original: na tvevamasti /
analyzed: na tu evam asti

original: dvividheaiva svalviyamupalabdhiḥyathā 'rthatvayathā 'rthatvabhedena //
analyzed: dvividhā eva svalu iyam upalabdhiḥ yathā rtha tva yathā rtha tva bhedena

original: tatrāyathā 'rthopalabdhistāvadduṣṭakārakakāryaiva dṛṣṭā //
analyzed: tatra ayathā rtha upalabdhiḥ tāvat duṣṭa kāraka kāryā eva dṛṣṭā

original: !dṛṣṭaḥ kuṭilakumbhādisaṃbhavo duṣṭakāraṇāt /
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ kuṭila kumbha ādi saṃbhavaḥ duṣṭa kāraṇāt

original: !tathā mānāntarajñātāttimirāderdvicandradhīḥ //51//
analyzed: tathā māna antara jñātāt timira ādeḥ dvi candra dhīḥ

original: ayathā 'rthopalabdhau ca duṣṭakārakakāryatvena siddhāyāmidānīṃ tṛtīyakāryābhāvāt yathā 'rthopalabdhiḥ svarūpāvasthitebhya eva kārakebhyo 'vakalpata iti na guṇakalpanāyai prabhavati //
analyzed: ayathā rtha upalabdhau ca duṣṭa kāraka kārya tvena siddhāyām idānīm tṛtīya kārya abhāvāt yathā rtha upalabdhiḥ sva rūpa avasthitebhyaḥ eva kārakebhyaḥ iti na guṇa kalpanāyai prabhavati

original: anumāne ca yaiva pakṣadharmānvayādisāmagrī jñānasya janikā saiva prāmāṇyakāraṇatvena dṛṣṭā /
analyzed: anumāne ca yā eva pakṣa dharma anvaya ādi sāmagrī jñānasya janikā sā eva prāmāṇya kāraṇa tvena dṛṣṭā

original: na ca svarūpasthitāni kāraṇāni kāryajanmanyudāsata eva yena yathā 'rthopalabdhijanena teṣāṃ guṇakāritā kalpyetetyato na santi kāraṇaguṇāḥ //
analyzed: na ca sva rūpa sthitāni kāraṇāni kārya janmani udāsate eva yena yathā rtha upalabdhi janena teṣām guṇa kāri tā kalpyeta iti atas na santi kāraṇa guṇāḥ

original: nairmalyavyapadeśastu locanādeḥ kācakāmalādidoṣāpāyanibandhana eva na svarūpātiriktaguṇakutaḥ /
analyzed: nairmalya vyapadeśaḥ tu locana ādeḥ kāca kāmalā ādi doṣa apāya nibandhanaḥ eva na

original: añjanādyupayogo 'pi doṣanirharaṇāyaiva na guṇajanmane //
analyzed: añjana ādi upayogaḥ doṣa nirharaṇāya eva na guṇa janmane

original: tasmādavitathā saṃvit svarūpasthitahetujā /
analyzed: tasmāt avitathā saṃvid sva rūpa sthita hetu jā

original: doṣādhikaistu taireva janyate viparītadhīḥ //52//
analyzed: doṣa adhikaiḥ tu taiḥ eva janyate viparīta dhīḥ

original: ata evāpramāṇatvaṃ parato 'bhyupagamyate /
analyzed: atas eva apramāṇa tvam paratas bhyupagamyate

original: janmanyapekṣate doṣān bādhakaṃ ca svaniścaye //53//

original: tasmānnotpattau guṇāpekṣaṃ pramāṇam //

original: nāpi svakāryakaraṇe kiñcidapekṣate arthaprakāśanasvabhāvasyaiva tasya svahetorutpādāt /
analyzed: na api sva kārya karaṇe kiñcid apekṣate artha prakāśana svabhāvasya eva tasya sva hetoḥ utpādāt

original: arthaprakāśanameva ca pramāṇakāryam pravṛttyādeḥ puruṣecchānibandhanatvāt //
analyzed: artha prakāśanam eva ca pramāṇa kāryam pravṛtti ādeḥ puruṣa icchā nibandhana tvāt

original: naiva vā jāyate jñānaṃ jāyate vā prakāśakam /

original: arthaprakāśane kiñcit na tūtpannamapekṣate //54//
analyzed: artha prakāśane kiñcid na tu utpannam apekṣate

original: tathā coktam [mṛddaṇḍacakrasūtrādi ghaṭo janmanyapekṣate /
analyzed: tathā ca uktam mṛd daṇḍa cakra sūtra ādi ghaṭaḥ janmani apekṣate

original: udakāharaṇe tvasya tadapekṣā na vidyate] iti //
analyzed: udaka āharaṇe tu asya tad apekṣā na vidyate iti

original: athavā!sāpekṣatvaṃ ghaṭasyāpi salilāharaṇaṃ prati /
analyzed: athavā a sāpekṣa tvam ghaṭasya api salila āharaṇam prati

original: yatkiñcidasti na tvevaṃ pramāṇasyopapadyate //55//
analyzed: yat kiñcid asti na tu evam pramāṇasya upapadyate

original: tasminnanavabuddhe 'pi tatsiddheścakṣurādivat //56//
analyzed: tasmin an avabuddhe tad siddheḥ cakṣuḥ ādi vat

original: uktaṃ ca [na hyajñāte 'rthe kaścidbuddhimupalabhate /

original: jñāte tv anumānādavagacchati] iti /
analyzed: jñāte tu anumānāt avagacchati iti

original: tasmāt svakāryakaraṇe 'pi na svagrahaṇāpekṣaṃ pramāṇam /

original: [pramāṇyaniścayaḥ na svarūpasāmagryatiriktakāraṇādhīnaḥ] nāpi prāmāṇyaniścaye kiñcidapekṣate apekṣaṇīyābhāvāt /
analyzed: pramāṇya niścayaḥ na svarūpa sāmagrī atirikta kāraṇa adhīnaḥ na api prāmāṇya niścaye kiñcid apekṣate apekṣaṇīya abhāvāt

original: tathā hiasya kāraṇaguṇajñānādvā prāmāṇyatiścayo bhavet bādhakābhāvajñānādvā saṃvādādvā na tāvatkāraṇaguṇajñānāt kāraṇaguṇānāmidānīmeva nirastatvāt //
analyzed: tathā hi asya kāraṇa guṇa jñānāt vā prāmāṇya tiścayaḥ bhavet bādhaka abhāva jñānāt vā saṃvādāt vā na tāvat kāraṇa guṇa jñānāt kāraṇa guṇānām idānīm eva nirasta tvāt

original: api ca na kāraṇaguṇajñānamindriyakaraṇakam atīndriyakārakādhikaraṇatvena parokṣatvādguṇānām /
analyzed: api ca na kāraṇa guṇa jñānam indriya karaṇakam atīndriya kāraka adhikaraṇa tvena parokṣa tvāt guṇānām

original: apitūpalabdhyākhyakāryapariśuddhisamadhigamyaṃ guṇasvarūpam /
analyzed: apitu upalabdhi ākhya kārya pariśuddhi samadhigamyam guṇa svarūpam

original: apravṛttasya ca pramāturna kāryapariśuddhirbhavati /
analyzed: apravṛttasya ca pramātuḥ na kārya pariśuddhiḥ bhavati

original: tannedānīṃ prāmāṇyaniścayapadarvikā pravṛttirbhavet /
analyzed: tat nā idānīm prāmāṇya niścaya padarvikā pravṛttiḥ bhavet

original: anyathā vā 'niścitaprāmāṇyādeva jñānāt pravṛttisiddhau kiṃ paścāttanniścayena prayojanam niścitaprāmāṇyat tu pravṛttau duratikramaḥ cakrakakrakacapātaḥpravṛttau satyāṃ kāryapariśuddhigrahaṇam kāryapariśuddhigrahaṇāt kāraṇaguṇāvagatiḥ kāraṇaguṇāvagateḥ prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ prāmāṇyaniścayāt pravṛttiriti //
analyzed: anyathā vā niścita prāmāṇyāt eva jñānāt pravṛtti siddhau kim paścāt tad niścayena prayojanam tu pravṛttau duratikramaḥ cakraka krakaca pātaḥ pravṛttau satyām kārya pariśuddhi grahaṇam kārya pariśuddhi grahaṇāt kāraṇa guṇa avagatiḥ kāraṇa guṇa avagateḥ prāmāṇya niścayaḥ prāmāṇya niścayāt pravṛttiḥ iti

original: nāpi bādhakābhāvaparicchedāt prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: nā api bādhaka abhāva paricchedāt prāmāṇya niścayaḥ

original: sa hi tātkāliko vā syāt kālāntarabhāvī vā tātkāliko na paryāptaḥ prāmāṇyapariniścaye /
analyzed: sa hi tātkālikaḥ vā syāt kāla antara bhāvī vā tātkālikaḥ na paryāptaḥ prāmāṇya pariniścaye

original: kūṭakārṣāpaṇādau kiñcitkālam anutpannabādhake 'pi kālāntare tadutpādadarśanāt //
analyzed: kūṭa kārṣāpaṇa ādau kiñcitkālam anutpanna bādhake pi kāla antare tad utpāda darśanāt

original: !sarvadā tadabhāvastu nāsarvajñasya gocaraḥ //57//
analyzed: sarvadā tad abhāvaḥ tu na asarvajñasya gocaraḥ

original: [saṃvādādapi na prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ] atha saṃtādātprāmāṇyaniścaya ucyate tarhyucyatāmko 'yaṃ saṃvādo nāma kiṃ uttaraṃ tadviṣayaṃ jñānamātram utārthāntarajñānam śrāho svidarthakriyājñānamiti ādye pakṣe kaḥ pūrvottarajñānayorviśeṣaḥ yat uttarajñānasaṃdhādāt pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ jñānaṃ prāmāṇyamaśnuvīta [yatra kutra vā prāmāṇyaṃ svata ityāstheyameva] api cottarasaṃvādāt pūrvapūrvapramāṇatām /
analyzed: saṃvādāt api na prāmāṇya niścayaḥ atha saṃtādāt prāmāṇya niścayaḥ ucyate tarhi ucyatām kaḥ yam saṃvādaḥ nāma kim uttaram tad viṣayam jñāna mātram uta artha antara jñānam śrāho svid artha kriyā jñānam iti ādye pakṣe kaḥ pūrva uttara jñānayoḥ viśeṣaḥ yat uttara jñāna saṃdhādāt pūrvam pūrvam jñānam prāmāṇyam aśnuvīta yatra kutra vā prāmāṇyam svatas iti āstheyam eva api ca uttara saṃvādāt pūrva pūrva pramāṇa tām anupravi

original: vadanto nādhigaccheyurantaṃ yugaśatairapi //58//
analyzed: vadantaḥ na adhigaccheyuḥ antam yuga śataiḥ api

original: sudūramapi gatvā tu prāmāṇyaṃ yadi kasyacit /
analyzed: su dūram api gatvā tu prāmāṇyam yadi kasyacid

original: svata evābhidhīyeta ko dveṣaḥ prathamaṃ prati //59//
analyzed: svatas eva abhidhīyeta kaḥ dveṣaḥ prathamam prati

original: yadāha[kasyacittu yadīṣyeta svata eva pramāṇatā /
analyzed: yadā aha kasyacid tu yadi iṣyeta svatas eva pramāṇa tā

original: prathamasya tathābhāve vidveṣaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ] //
analyzed: prathamasya tathā abhāve vidveṣaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ

original: iti //
analyzed: iti

original: athānyaviṣayajñānamanyasya saṃvāda ucyatetadayuktam adaśanāt /
analyzed: atha anya viṣaya jñānam anyasya saṃvādaḥ ucyate itat ayuktam a daśanāt

original: na hi stambhajñānaṃ kumbhajñānasya saṃvādaḥ //
analyzed: na hi stambha jñānam kumbha jñānasya saṃvādaḥ

original: athārthakriyājñānasaṃvādātprathamasya pravartakasya jñānasya prāmāṇyamiṣyatetadapi hyanavasitaprāmāṇyaṃ kathamādimasya prāmāṇyamavagamayet kaścārthakriyājñātasya pūrvasmādviśeṣaḥyadetadāyattastasya prāmāṇyādhigamaḥ /
analyzed: atha artha kriyā jñāna saṃvādāt prathamasya pravartakasya jñānasya prāmāṇyam iṣyate etat api hi anavasita prāmāṇyam katham ādimasya prāmāṇyam avagamayet kaḥ ca artha kriyā jñātasya pūrvasmāt viśeṣaḥ yat etad āyattaḥ tasya prāmāṇya adhigamaḥ

original: arthakriyājñānatvameva viśeṣa iti cetkila salilajñānamādyamavidyamāne 'pi payasi pūṣadīdhitiṣu pravartakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti na bhavati vimnaṃbhabhūmiḥ //
analyzed: arthakriyā jñāna tvam eva viśeṣaḥ iti ced kila salila jñānam ādyam avidyamāne pi payasi pūṣa dīdhitiṣu pravartakam dṛṣṭam iti na bhavati vimnaṃbha bhūmiḥ

original: idaṃ punararthakriyāsaṃvedanaṃ ambumadhyavartinaḥ pānāvagāhanādiviṣayamudetītyanavadhāritatryabhicāritayā tatpramāṇyaniścayāya kalpata ititadasat svapne pānāvagāhanasyāpi vyabhicāropalabdheḥ //
analyzed: idam punar arthakriyā saṃvedanam ambu madhya vartinaḥ pāna avagāhana ādi viṣayam udeti iti anavadhārita tryabhicāri tayā tat pramāṇya niścayāya kalpate iti tat asat svapne pāna avagāhanasya api vyabhicāra upalabdheḥ

original: kiñca caramadhatuvisargo 'pi svapne sīmantinīmantareṇa bhavatīti mahāneṣa vyabhicāraḥ //
analyzed: kiñca svapne sīmantinīm antareṇa bhavati iti mahān eṣa vyabhicāraḥ

original: atha rāgodrekanimittatvena pittadidhātuvikṛtinibandhanatvena vā tadvisargasya na svasādhanavyabhicāra ityucyatetadasamañjasam asakṛdanubhūtayuvatipariraṃbhādyanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvena tatkāryatvāvadhāraṇāt //
analyzed: atha rāga udreka nimitta tvena pitta di dhātu vikṛti nibandhana tvena vā tad visargasya na sva sādhana vyabhicāraḥ iti ucyate etat asamañjasam asakṛt anubhūta yuvati pariraṃbha ādi anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvena tad kāryatva avadhāraṇāt

original: tasmādarthakriyājñānavyabhicārāvadhāraṇāt /
analyzed: tasmāt artha kriyā jñāna vyabhicāra avadhāraṇāt

original: tatprāmāṇyaparīkṣāyāmanavasthā na śāmyati //60//
analyzed: tad prāmāṇya parīkṣāyām anavasthā na śāmyati

original: athavā ''ptaphalatvena kiṃ tatprāmāṇyacintayā prathame 'pi pravṛttatvāt kiṃ tatprāmāṇyacintayā //61//
analyzed: athavā pta phala tvena kim tad prāmāṇya cintayā prathame pi pravṛtta tvāt kim tad prāmāṇya cintayā

original: na cedamarthakriyājñānamapravṛttasya puṃsaśamudbhavati //
analyzed: na ca idam arthakriyā jñānam apravṛttasya puṃsaśam udbhavati

original: tatra prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇapūrvikāyāṃ pravṛttau kāraṇaguṇaniśceyaprāmāṇyacarcābaddhacakrakakakacacodyaprasaṅgastadavastha eva //
analyzed: tatra prāmāṇya avadhāraṇa pūrvikāyām pravṛttau kāraṇa guṇa niśceya prāmāṇya carcā baddha cakrakaka kaca codya prasaṅgaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva

original: aniścitaprāmāṇyasya tu pravṛttau paścāttannirṇayo bhavannapi kṛtakṣaurasya nakṣatraparīkṣāvat aphala evetyuktam //
analyzed: aniścita prāmāṇyasya tu pravṛttau paścāt tad nirṇayaḥ bhavan api kṛta kṣaurasya nakṣatra parīkṣā vat aphalaḥ eva iti uktam

original: tataitatsyātdvividhā hi pravṛttiḥādyā ca ābhyāsikī ca /
analyzed: tata etat syāt dvividhā hi pravṛttiḥ ādyā ca ābhyāsikī ca

original: tatrādyā yathāvinihitasalilāvasiktamasṛṇamṛdi śarāve śālyādivijaśaktiparīkṣaṇāya katipayabījakaṇāvāparūpā /
analyzed: tatra ādyā yathā vinihita salila avasikta masṛṇa mṛdi śarāve śāli ādi vija śakti parīkṣaṇāya katipaya bīja kaṇā āvāpa rūpā

original: tatastatra teṣāmaṅkurakaraṇakauśalamavikalamavalokayantaḥ kīnāśā niśśaṅkaṃ kedāreṣu tāni bījānyāvapantīti seyamābhyāsikī pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: tatas tatra teṣām aṅkura karaṇa kauśalam avikalam avalokayantaḥ kīnāśāḥ niśśaṅkam kedāreṣu tāni bījāni āvapanti iti sā iyam ābhyāsikī pravṛttiḥ

original: evamihāpi prathamaparīkṣitapramāṇabhāvādeva jñānātkutaścitkaścidvipaścidapi vyavaharaṃstahyavahāra parastattatphalajñāne tasya prāmāṇyamavagacchan punastathāvidhe jāte sati sukhameva pravṛttyādikaṃ vyavahāramaśaṅkitakāluṣyaḥ kariṣyatīti na sarvātmanā vaiyarthyamiti //
analyzed: evam iha api prathama parīkṣita pramāṇa bhāvāt eva jñānāt kutaścid kaścid vipaścit api vyavaharan tahyavahāra paraḥ tad tad phala jñāne tasya prāmāṇyam avagacchan punar tathāvidhe jāte sati sukham eva pravṛtti ādikam vyavahāram aśaṅkita kāluṣyaḥ kariṣyati iti na sarva ātmanā vaiyarthyam iti

original: ucyateviṣamo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ tajjātīyatayā bījaṃ śakyate yadi veditum /
analyzed: ucyate viṣamaḥ yam dṛṣṭāntaḥ tad jātīya tayā bījam śakyate yadi veditum

original: tatra tanniścayādyuktaṃ nirviśagkaṃ pravartanam //62//
analyzed: tatra tad niścaya ādi uktam nirviśagkam pravartanam

original: jñāne tathāvidhatvaṃ tu bodharūpāviśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: jñāne tathāvidha tvam tu bodha rūpa aviśeṣataḥ

original: kāryādvā kāraṇādvā 'pi jñātavyaṃ na svarūpataḥ //63//iti //
analyzed: kāryāt vā kāraṇāt vā pi jñātavyam na svarūpataḥ

original: kāraṇānāṃ parokṣatvāt na tadvtārā tadāgatiḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇānām parokṣa tvāt na tad vtārā tad āgatiḥ

original: kāryaṃ tu nāpravṛttasya bhavatītyupavarṇitam //64//
analyzed: kāryam tu na apravṛttasya bhavati iti upavarṇitam

original: tasmādvaiyarthyavodyasya nāyaṃ parihṛtikramaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt vaiyarthya vodyasya na ayam parihṛti kramaḥ

original: evaṃ cārthakriyājñānāt kīdṛk prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ //65//
analyzed: evam ca artha kriyā jñānāt kīdṛś prāmāṇya niścayaḥ

original: samarthakāraṇajñānāt yo 'pi prāmāṇyaniścayam /
analyzed: samartha kāraṇa jñānāt prāmāṇya niścayam

original: brūte so 'pi kṛtodvāhastatra lagnaṃ parīkṣate //66//
analyzed: brūte saḥ pi kṛta udvāhaḥ tatra lagnam parīkṣate

original: kilātivikasitakusumamakarandapānamuditamadhukarakule kasmiṃścidudyāne bāhyamānāyāṃ vīṇāyāṃ nirantaralatāsantānāntaritavapuṣi vidūrādanavalokyamāne vādake vīṇādhvanisaṃvidi rolambanādasandehadūṣitāyāṃ tadabhimukhameva pratiṣṭhamānaḥ śrotā parivādake darśanapathamavatīrṇe svarānukūlakāraṇaniścayāt tatpratītau saṃśayanivṛtteh prāmāṇyaṃ niścinotītyeṣa samarthakāraṇajñānakṛtaḥ prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ //
analyzed: kila ati vikasita kusuma makaranda pāna mudita madhukara kule kasmiṃścid udyāne bāhyamānāyām vīṇāyām nirantara latā santāna antarita vapuṣi vidūrāt anavalokyamāne vādake vīṇā dhvani saṃvidi rolamba nāt asandeha dūṣitāyām tad abhimukham eva pratiṣṭhamānaḥ śrotā parivādake darśana patham avatīrṇe svara anukūla kāraṇa niścayāt tad pratītau saṃśaya nivṛttā ih prāmāṇyam niścinoti iti eṣa samartha kāraṇa jñāna kṛtaḥ prāmāṇya niścay

original: tatrāpi nāpravṛttasya hetusāmarthyadarśanam /
analyzed: tatra api na apravṛttasya hetu sāmarthya darśanam

original: evameva pravṛttau tu niścitenāpi tena kim //67//
analyzed: evam eva pravṛttau tu niścitena api tena kim

original: tanniścayāt pravṛttau vā punaranyonyasaṃśraṭam /
analyzed: tad niścayāt pravṛttau vā punar anyonya saṃśraṭam

original: tanniścayāt pravṛttiḥ syāt pravṛttestadviniścayaḥ //68//
analyzed: tad niścayāt pravṛttiḥ syāt pravṛtteḥ tad viniścayaḥ

original: tadevaṃ na kutaścidapi prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ cakraketaretarāśrayānavasthāvaiyarthyādidūṣaṇātītasthitirastītyataḥ prāmāṇyaniścaye 'pi na kiñcidapekṣate pramāṇam /
analyzed: tat evam na kutaścid api prāmāṇya niścayaḥ cakraka itaretara āśraya anavasthā vaiyarthya ādi dūṣaṇa atīta sthitiḥ asti iti atas prāmāṇya niścaye na kiñcid apekṣate pramāṇam

original: ataścotpattausvakāryakaraṇesvaprāmāṇyaniścaye ca nirapekṣatvād apekṣātrayarahitatvāt svataḥprāmāṇyam iti siddham /
analyzed: atas ca utpattau sva kārya karaṇe sva prāmāṇya niścaye ca nirapekṣa tvāt apekṣā traya rahita tvāt svatas prāmāṇyam iti siddham

original: tad uktam [svataḥ sarvapramāṇānāṃ prāmāṇyamiti gṛhyatām /
analyzed: tat uktam svatas sarva pramāṇānām prāmāṇyam iti gṛhyatām

original: na hi svato 'satī śaktiḥ kartumanyena pāryate] //
analyzed: na hi svatas satī śaktiḥ kartum anyena pāryate

original: aprāmāṇyaṃ tūtpattau doṣāpekṣatvātsvaniścaye bādhakapratyayādisāpekṣatvāt ubhayatrāpi parata ityuktameva /
analyzed: aprāmāṇyam tu utpattau doṣa apekṣa tvāt sva niścaye bādhaka pratyaya ādi sāpekṣa tvāt ubhayatra api paratas iti uktam eva

original: tasmāt pakṣavayasyāyanupapatteścaturtha evāyaṃ pakṣaḥ śreyānprāmāṇyaṃ svataḥaprāmāṇyaṃ parata iti //
analyzed: tasmāt pakṣa vayasyā yanupapatteḥ caturthaḥ eva ayam pakṣaḥ śreyān prāmāṇyam svatas a prāmāṇyam paratas iti

original: nanucotpattivelāyāṃ na viśeyo 'vadhāryate /
analyzed: nanu ca utpatti velāyām na viśeyaḥ vadhāryate

original: pramāṇetarayostena balādbhavati saṃśayaḥ //69//
analyzed: pramāṇa itarayoḥ tena balāt bhavati saṃśayaḥ

original: paricchittimātraṃ pramāṇakāryam /
analyzed: paricchitti mātram pramāṇa kāryam

original: tacca yathā 'rthetarapramitisādhāraṇaṃ rūpaṃ /
analyzed: tat ca yathā rtha itara pramiti sādhāraṇam rūpam

original: sādhāraṇadharmagrahaṇaṃ ca saṃśayakāraṇamiti prasiddhaḥ panthāḥ /
analyzed: sādhāraṇa dharma grahaṇam ca saṃśaya kāraṇam iti prasiddhaḥ panthāḥ

original: evaṃ sthite ca pramāṇāntarasaṃvādavisaṃvādau vinā katham pramāṇetaranirṇītiḥataśca parato dvayam //70//
analyzed: evam sthite ca pramāṇa antara saṃvāda visaṃvādau vinā katham pramāṇa itara nirṇītiḥ atas ca paratas dvayam

original: tadetadacaturasram /
analyzed: tat etat a catur asram

original: satyaṃparicchittireva pramāṇakāryam /
analyzed: satyam paricchittiḥ eva pramāṇa kāryam

original: sā punarupajāyamānaiva na sandehādidūṣitatanurupalabhyate ityautsargikaṃ prāmāṇyameva sā bhajate /
analyzed: sā punar upajāyamānā eva na sandeha ādi dūṣita tanuḥ upalabhyate iti autsargikam prāmāṇyam eva sā bhajate

original: arthaparicchedācca pravartamānaḥ pramātā pramāṇenaiva pravartito bhavati na saṃśayātpravṛttaḥ /
analyzed: artha paricchedāt ca pravartamānaḥ pramātā pramāṇena eva pravartitaḥ bhavati na saṃśayāt pravṛttaḥ

original: sthite caivamautsargike prāmāṇyeyatra tasyāpavādaḥ kvacidbhavati pttrāprāmāṇyam //
analyzed: sthite ca evam autsargike tasya apavādaḥ kvacid bhavati

original: apramāṇye cāvaśyaṃbhāvyapavādaḥ /
analyzed: apramāṇye ca avaśyaṃbhāvī apavādaḥ

original: dvividha evāpavādaḥvādhakapratyayaḥkāraṇadoṣajñānaṃ ca /
analyzed: dvividhaḥ eva apavādaḥ vādhaka pratyayaḥ kāraṇa doṣa jñānam ca

original: taduktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā [yatra dūṣṭaṃ karaṇamyatre ca mithyeti pratyayaḥ sa evāsamīcīnaḥ pratyayaḥ nāmyaḥ] iti /
analyzed: tat uktam bhāṣyakṛtā yatra dūṣṭam ca mithyā iti pratyayaḥ saḥ eva asamīcīnaḥ pratyayaḥ na āmyaḥ iti

original: vārtikakāro 'pyāha [tasmādbodhātmakatvena prāptā buddheh pramāṇatā /
analyzed: vārtikakāraḥ pi āha tasmāt bodha ātmaka tvena prāptā buddhā ih pramāṇa tā

original: arthānyathātvahetūtthadoṣajñānādapodyate] iti //
analyzed: artha anyathātva hetu uttha doṣa jñānāt apodyate iti

original: tatra yādyakajñānaṃ pūrvajñānopamardadvāreṇaiva tasmin viṣaye jāyata iti samānavidhayatvāt spaṣṭameva bādhakam //
analyzed: tatra yādyaka jñānam pūrva jñāna upamarda dvāreṇa eva tasmin viṣaye jāyate iti samāna vidhaya tvāt spaṣṭam eva bādhakam

original: karaṇadoṣajñānaṃ tu bhinnaviṣayamapi kāryaikyādbādhakatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: karaṇa doṣa jñānam tu bhinna viṣayam api kārya aikyāt bādhaka tām pratipadyate

original: yathā [camasenāpaḥ praṇayati] iti darśapūrṇamāsāṅgatvāt kratvarthaścamasaḥ /
analyzed: yathā camasena apaḥ praṇayati iti darśa pūrṇamāsa aṅga tvāt kratu arthaḥ camasaḥ

original: [yodohanena paśukāmasya praṇayet] iti kāmyamānapaśunirdośāt puruṣārtho godohanimityevaṃ kratvarthapuruṣārthatayā bhinnaviṣayatve 'pi camasagodohanayoḥ praṇayanākhyakāryamekamiti godohanena nirvṛtte tasmiṃścamaso nivartate /
analyzed: yaḥ dohanena paśu kāmasya praṇayet iti kāmyamāna paśu nirdośāt puruṣa arthaḥ godohanim iti evam kratu artha puruṣa artha tayā bhinna viṣaya tve pi camasa godohanayoḥ praṇayana ākhya kāryam ekam iti godohanena nirvṛtte tasmin camasaḥ nivartate

original: evamiha kāraṇadoṣajñānaṃ doṣaviṣayamapi doṣāṇāmayathā 'rthajñānajananasvabhāvattvāttasya jñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ bādhate /
analyzed: evam iha kāraṇa doṣa jñānam doṣa viṣayam api doṣāṇām ayathā rtha jñāna janana svabhāva tvāt tasya jñānasya prāmāṇyam bādhate

original: taduktam [duṣṭakāraṇabodhe tu jāte 'pi viṣayāntare /
analyzed: tat uktam duṣṭa kāraṇa bodhe tu jāte viṣaya antare

original: arthāttulyārthatāṃ prāpya bādho godohanādivat] iti //
analyzed: arthāt tulya artha tām prāpya bādhaḥ godohana ādi vat iti

original: yatre punaridamapavādadvayamapi na dṛśyate tatra tadautsargikaṃ prāmāṇyamanapiditamāsta iti na mithyātvāśaṅkāyāṃ nimittaṃ kiñcit /
analyzed: yatra e punar idam apavāda dvayam api na dṛśyate tatra tat autsargikam prāmāṇyam anapiditam āste iti na mithyātva āśaṅkāyām nimittam kiñcid

original: yadāha [doṣajñāne tvanutpanne nāśaṅkyā niṣpramāṇatā] iti //
analyzed: yat āha doṣa jñāne tu anutpanne na āśaṅkyā niṣpramāṇa tā iti

original: tathā hi kaścidutpanna eveha svasaṃvedyo 'sti saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi kaścid utpannaḥ evā iha sva saṃvedyaḥ sti saṃśayaḥ

original: sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti ko nāmāpahnuvīta tam //71//
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti kaḥ nāma apahnuvīta tam

original: haṭhādutpādyamānastu hinasti sakalāḥ kiyāḥ /
analyzed: haṭhāt utpādyamānaḥ tu hinasti sakalāḥ kiyāḥ

original: svabhāryāpariraṃbhe 'pi bhavenmātari saṃśayaḥ //72//
analyzed: sva bhāryā pariraṃbhe bhavet mātari saṃśayaḥ

original: vināśī saṃśayātmeti pārāśaryo 'pyabhāṣata /
analyzed: vināśī saṃśaya ātmā iti pārāśaryaḥ pi abhāṣata

original: [nāyaṃ loko 'sti kaunteya na paraḥ saṃśayātmanaḥ] //73//
analyzed: na ayam kaunteya na paraḥ saṃśaya ātmanaḥ

original: iti //
analyzed: iti

original: yatrāpi ca kvacidbādhakapratyaye saṃśayo jāyate tatrāpi tṛtīyajñānāpekṣaṇānnanavasthā /
analyzed: yatra api ca kvacid bādhaka pratyaye saṃśayaḥ jāyate tatra api tṛtīya jñāna apekṣaṇāt na anavasthā

original: na ca tāvatā svataḥprāmāṇyahāniḥ /
analyzed: na ca tāvatā svatas prāmāṇya hāniḥ

original: yatra prathamavijñānasaṃvādi tṛtīyajñānamutpadyate tatra prathamasya prāmāṇyamautsargikaṃ sthitameva /
analyzed: yatra prathama vijñāna saṃvādi tṛtīya jñānam utpadyate tatra prathamasya prāmāṇyam autsargikam sthitam eva

original: dvitīyavijñānāropitālikakāluṣyaśaṅkānirākaraṇaṃ tvasya tṛtīyena kriyate na tvasya saṃvādāt prāmāṇyam //
analyzed: dvitīya vijñāna āropita ālika kāluṣya śaṅkā nirākaraṇam tu asya tṛtīyena kriyate na tu asya saṃvādāt prāmāṇyam

original: yadi tu dvitīyajñānasaṃvādi tṛtīyaṃ jñānaṃ tadā prathamasyāpramāṇyam /
analyzed: yadi tu dvitīya jñāna saṃvādi tṛtīyam jñānam tadā prathamasya apramāṇyam

original: tacca parata iṣṭameva /
analyzed: tat ca paratas iṣṭam eva

original: dvitīyasya tu jñānasya na tṛtīyasaṃvādakṛtaṃ prāmāṇyam api tu saṃkalpyamanakuśaṅkā ''camanamātre tasya vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: dvitīyasya tu jñānasya na tṛtīya saṃvāda kṛtam prāmāṇyam api tu saṃkalpya mana kuśaṅkā camana mātre tasya vyāpāraḥ

original: uktaṃ ca [evaṃ tricaturajñānajanmano nādhikā matiḥ /
analyzed: uktam ca evam tri catur ajñāna janmanaḥ na adhikā matiḥ

original: prārthyate tāvataivaikaṃ svataḥprāmāṇyamaśnute] iti //
analyzed: prārthyate tāvatā eva ekam svatas prāmāṇyam aśnute iti

original: tadevaṃ sarvapramāṇānāṃ svataḥprāmāṇye siddhe samānanyāyatayā śabdasyāpi tathaiva prāmāṇyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tat evam sarva pramāṇānām svatas prāmāṇye siddhe samāna nyāya tayā śabdasya api tathā eva prāmāṇyam bhavati

original: na ca naisargikamarthāsaṃsparśitvameva śabdasya svarūpamiti parīkṣitaetat /
analyzed: na ca naisargikam artha asaṃsparśi tvam eva śabdasya svarūpam iti

original: kintvarthabodhajanakatvāttasya naisargike prāmāṇye sati puruṣadoṣānupraveśakāritaḥ kvaciddhi viplvaḥ /
analyzed: kintu artha bodha janaka tvāt tasya naisargike prāmāṇye sati puruṣa doṣa anupraveśa kāritaḥ kvacid hi viplvaḥ

original: taduktam [śabde doṣodbhavastāvadvaktradhīna iti sthitam] iti //
analyzed: tat uktam śabde doṣa udbhavaḥ tāvat vaktra dhīnaḥ iti sthitam iti

original: tatra paureṣeye vacasi guṇavati vaktari taguṇāpasāritadoṣatayā tatprāmāṇyamautsargikamanapoditaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tatra paureṣeye vacasi guṇavati vaktari tad guṇa apasārita doṣa tayā tat prāmāṇyam autsargikam anapoditam bhavati

original: na tu guṇakṛtaṃ tatprāmāṇyam anaṅgatvātprāmāṇye guṇānām /
analyzed: na tu guṇa kṛtam tat prāmāṇyam anaṅga tvāt prāmāṇye guṇānām

original: bodhakatvanibandhanameva tadityuktam /
analyzed: bodhaka tva nibandhanam eva tat iti uktam

original: vede tu praṇetuḥ puruṣasyābhāvāt doṣāśaṅkaiva na pravartate vaktradhīnatvāhoṣāṇām /
analyzed: vede tu praṇetuḥ puruṣasya abhāvāt doṣa āśaṅkā eva na pravartate vaktra adhīna tvāt hoṣāṇām

original: na ca bādhakapratyayo 'dya yāvadvedārthe kasyacidutpanna iti nirapavādaṃ vedaprāmāṇyam /
analyzed: na ca bādhaka pratyayaḥ yāvat veda arthe kasyacid utpannaḥ iti nirapavādam veda prāmāṇyam

original: āha ca [tatrāpavādanirmuktirvaktrabhāvālladhīyasī /
analyzed: āha ca tatra apavāda nirmuktiḥ vaktra bhāvāt ladhīyasī

original: vede tenāpramāṇatvaṃ na śaṅkāmadhigacchati] iti //
analyzed: vede tena apramāṇa tvam na śaṅkām adhigacchati iti

original: tadidamuktam [tatpramāṇaṃ bādarāyaṇasyānapekṣatvāt] iti //
analyzed: tat idam uktam tat pramāṇam bādarāyaṇasya anapekṣa tvāt iti

original: girāṃ mithyātvahetūnāṃ doṣāṇāṃ puruṣāśrayāt /
analyzed: girām mithyātva hetūnām doṣāṇām puruṣa āśrayāt

original: apauruṣeyaṃ satyārthamiti yuktaṃ pracakṣate //74//
analyzed: apauruṣeyam satya artham iti yuktam pracakṣate

original: girāṃ satyatvahetūnāṃ guṇānāṃ puruṣāśrayāt /
analyzed: girām satya tva hetūnām guṇānām puruṣa āśrayāt

original: pauruṣeyaṃ tu satyārthamityayuktaṃ tu manvate //75//
analyzed: pauruṣeyam tu satya artham iti ayuktam tu manvate

original: na hi puruṣaguṇānāṃ satyatāsādhanatvaṃ vacasi khalunisargādeva satyatvasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: na hi puruṣa guṇānām satya tā sādhana tvam vacasi khalu nisargāt eva satya tva siddhiḥ

original: guṇamapi naravācāṃ viplavādhāyidoṣapraśamanacaritārthaṃ saṅgirante guṇajñāḥ //76//
analyzed: guṇam api nara vācām viplava ādhāyi doṣa praśamana caritārtham saṅgirante guṇa jñāḥ

original: parataḥ prāmāṇyasādhanopakramaḥ atrābhidhīyatepratyakṣādiṣu dṛṣṭārtheṣu pramāṇeṣu prāmāṇyaniścayamantareṇaiva vyavahārasiddhestatra kiṃ svataḥ prāmāṇyam uta parataḥ iti vicāreṇa na naḥ prayojanam anirṇaya eva tatra śreyān /
analyzed: paratas prāmāṇya sādhana upakramaḥ atra abhidhīyate pratyakṣa ādiṣu dṛṣṭa artheṣu pramāṇeṣu prāmāṇya niścayam antareṇa eva vyavahāra siddheḥ tatra kim svatas prāmāṇyam uta paratas iti vicāreṇa na naḥ prayojanam anirṇayaḥ eva tatra śreyān

original: adṛṣṭe tu viṣaye vaidikeṣvagaṇitadraviṇavitaraṇādikleśasādhyeṣu karmasu tatprāmāṇyāvadhāraṇamantareṇa prekṣāvatāṃ pravartanamanucitamiti tasya prāmāṇyaniścayo 'vaśyakartavyaḥ /
analyzed: adṛṣṭe tu viṣaye vaidikeṣu agaṇita draviṇa vitaraṇa ādi kleśa sādhyeṣu karmasu tad prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam antareṇa prekṣāvatām pravartanam anucitam iti tasya prāmāṇya niścayaḥ vaśya kartavyaḥ

original: tatra parata eva vedasya prāmāṇyamiti vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: tatra paratas eva vedasya prāmāṇyam iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: yaccedamiyatā vistareṇa svataḥ prāmāṇyamupapāditaṃ tat vyākhyeyam /
analyzed: yat ca idam iyatā vistareṇa svatas prāmāṇyam upapāditam tat vyākhyeyam

original: svataḥ prāmāṇyamiti ko 'rtaḥ kiṃ svata eva pramāṇasya prāmāṇyaṃ bhavati uta svayameva tat pramāṇamātmanaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇāti iti //
analyzed: svatas prāmāṇyam iti kaḥ ṛtaḥ kim svatas eva pramāṇasya prāmāṇyam bhavati uta svayam eva tat pramāṇam ātmanaḥ prāmāṇyam gṛhṇāti iti

original: na tāvat svayameva prāmāṇyagrahaṇamupapannam aprāmāṇikatvāt /
analyzed: na tāvat svayam eva prāmāṇya grahaṇam upapannam aprāmāṇika tvāt

original: tathā hiyadetannīlaprakāśane pravṛttaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tannīlaṃ prati tāvat pratyak\sam pramāṇaṃ tāvadindriyārthasannikarṣotpannimiti jānīma evaitat kimatra vicāryate prāmāṇyaparicchede tu kiṃ tat pramāṇamiti cintyatām /
analyzed: tathā hi yat etat nīla prakāśane pravṛttam pratyakṣam tat nīlam prati tāvat pramāṇam tāvat indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannim iti jānīmaḥ eva etat kim atra vicāryate prāmāṇya paricchede tu kim tat pramāṇam iti cintyatām

original: pratyakṣam anumānaṃ vā pramāṇāntarāṇāmanāśaṅanīyatvāt //
analyzed: pratyakṣam anumānam vā pramāṇa antarāṇām an āśaṅanīya tvāt

original: na tāvat svaprāmāṇyaparicchede tatpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam taddhi jñānasya vā prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt tatphalasya vā /
analyzed: na tāvat sva prāmāṇya paricchede tat pratyakṣam pramāṇam tat hi jñānasya vā prāmāṇyam gṛhṇīyāt tad phalasya vā

original: tatra jñātṛvyāpārātmano jñānasya bhavanmate nityaparokṣatvāt pratyakṣasya svataḥ paricchedānupapattau tatprāmāṇyasyāpi kathaṃ pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam //
analyzed: tatra jñātṛ vyāpāra ātmanaḥ jñānasya bhavat mate nitya parokṣa tvāt pratyakṣasya svatas pariccheda anupapattau tad prāmāṇyasya api katham pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam

original: phalasyāpyarthaprakāśanākhyasya saṃvedanātmano nendrasaṃsargayogyatā vidyate yena tadgatamapi yathā 'rthatvalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyamindriyavyāpāralabdhajanmanā pratyakṣeṇa paricchidyeta //
analyzed: phalasya api artha prakāśana ākhyasya saṃvedana ātmanaḥ na indra saṃsarga yogyatā vidyate yena tad gatam api yathā rtha tva lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam indriya vyāpāra labdha janmanā pratyakṣeṇa paricchidyeta

original: na ca mānasamapi pratyakṣaṃ phalagatayathā 'rthatāvasāyasamarthamiti kathanīyam tadānīmananubhūyamānatvāt /
analyzed: na ca mānasam api pratyakṣam phala gata yathā rtha tā avasāya samartham iti kathanīyam tadānīm ananubhūyamāna tvāt

original: na hi nīlasaṃvitprasavasamanantaraṃ yathā 'rtheyaṃ nīlasaṃvittiriti saṃvedanāntaramutpadyamānamanubhūyate /
analyzed: na hi nīla saṃvid prasava samanantaram yathā rthā iyam nīla saṃvittiḥ iti saṃvedana antaram utpadyamānam anubhūyate

original: anubhave vā tato dvitīyātprathamotpannanīlajñānayāthārthyagrahaṇānna svataḥ prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ syāt /
analyzed: anubhave vā tatas dvitīyāt prathama utpanna nīla jñāna yāthārthya grahaṇāt na svatas prāmāṇya niścayaḥ syāt

original: tasmānna pratyakṣasyaiṣa viṣayaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na pratyakṣasya eṣa viṣayaḥ

original: anumānenāpi kasya prāmāṇyaṃ niścīyate jñānasya phalasya vā iti pūrvavadvācyam /
analyzed: anumānena api kasya prāmāṇyam niścīyate jñānasya phalasya vā iti pūrvavat vācyam

original: phalasya tāvattanniścayeliṅgatvameva tāvanna kasyacitpaśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: phalasya tāvat tad niścaye liṅga tvam eva tāvat na kasyacid paśyāmaḥ

original: jñātṛvyāparātmano jñānasya tu svakāryaṃ bhavedapi liṅgam phalasya kriyāmātravyāptigrahaṇātsvarūpasattāmātram anumāpayitum utsahate na yathā 'rthatvalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyam /
analyzed: jñātṛ vyāparātmanaḥ jñānasya tu sva kāryam bhavet api liṅgam phalasya kriyā mātra vyāpti grahaṇāt svarūpa sattā mātram anumāpayitum utsahate na yathā rtha tva lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam

original: tad dhi phalaṃ nirviśeṣaṇaṃ vā svakāraṇasya jñātṛvyāpārasya prāmāṇyānumāpayet yathārthatvaviśiṣṭaṃ vā ādye pakṣe yataḥ kutaścana phalāt tatprāmāṇyānumāne nedāniṃ kiñcid apramāṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tat hi phalam nirviśeṣaṇam vā sva kāraṇasya jñātṛ vyāpārasya prāmāṇyā anumāpayet yathārtha tva viśiṣṭam vā ādye pakṣe yatas kutaścana phalāt tad prāmāṇya anumāne na idānim kiñcid apramāṇam bhavet

original: uttaro 'pi nāsti pakṣaḥ phalagatayāthā 'rthyaparicchedopāyābhāvād ity uktam //
analyzed: uttaraḥ pi nā asti pakṣaḥ phala gata yāthā rthya pariccheda upāya abhāvāt iti uktam

original: nanu svānubhava evātropāyaḥ . tad dhi nīlasaṃvedanatayā phalaṃ svata eva prakāśate /
analyzed: nanu sva anubhavaḥ eva atra upāyaḥ tat hi nīla saṃvedana tayā phalam svatas eva prakāśate

original: nīlasaṃvedanatvam eva cāsya yathā 'rthatvaṃ nānyat yadyevaṃ śuktikāyāmapi rajatasaṃvedane samāno nyāyaḥ /
analyzed: nīla saṃvedana tvam eva ca asya yathā rtha tvam na anyat yadi evam śuktikāyām api rajata saṃvedane samānaḥ nyāyaḥ

original: na hi rajatasaṃvedanādanya yathā 'rthatvasaṃvittiriti //
analyzed: na hi rajata saṃvedanāt anya yathā rtha tva saṃvittiḥ iti

original: nanu tatra bādhakapratyayopanipātenāyathā 'rthatvamupanīyate /
analyzed: nanu tatra bādhaka pratyaya upanipātena ayathā rtha tvam upanīyate

original: nūnaṃ cāsya mithyādarśaneṣu deśāntare vā śuktikārajatādijñāne kālāntare kūṭakārṣāpāṇādipratītau puruṣāntare vā jātataimirike dvicandrapratītau avasthāntare pītaśaṅkhādipratibhāse bhavati bādhaka pratyayaḥ /
analyzed: nūnam ca asya mithyā darśaneṣu deśa antare vā śuktikā rajata ādi jñāne kāla antare kūṭa kārṣāpāṇa ādi pratītau puruṣa antare vā jāta taimirike dvi candra pratītau avasthā antare pīta śaṅkha ādi pratibhāse bhavati bādhaka pratyayaḥ

original: tadasattve na tacchaṅkā yuktimitītyuktameva //
analyzed: tad asattve na tad śaṅkā yuktim iti iti uktam eva

original: satyamuktamayuktaṃ tu /
analyzed: satyam uktam ayuktam tu

original: evaṃ hi vadatā bādhakābhāvajñānādhīnaṃ prāmāṇyamabhihitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: evam hi vadatā bādhaka abhāva jñāna adhīnam prāmāṇyam abhihitam bhavati

original: tacca tātkālikaṃ kālāntarabhāvī vā iti kalpyamānaṃ nopapadyata iti darśitam /
analyzed: tat ca tātkālikam kāla antara bhāvī vā iti kalpyamānam na upapadyate iti darśitam

original: tasmādutpadyamānameva pramāṇamātmanaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ niścinotīti na yuktametat //
analyzed: tasmāt utpadyamānam eva pramāṇam ātmanaḥ prāmāṇyam niścinoti iti na yuktam etat

original: yadi tu prasavasamaya eva jñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ niścinuyāmah tarhi tataḥ pravartamānā na kvacidapi vipralabhyemahi vipralabhyāmahe tu /
analyzed: yadi tu prasava samaye eva jñānasya prāmāṇyam niścinuyāmah tarhi tatas pravartamānāḥ na kvacid api vipralabhyemahi vipralabhyāmahe tu

original: tena manyāmahe na niścitaṃ tatpramāṇyaṃ saṃśayādeva vyavaharama iti //
analyzed: tena manyāmahe na niścitam tat pramāṇyam saṃśayāt eva vyavaharamaḥ iti

original: nanu saṃśayo 'pi tadā nānubhūyata eva [kimidaṃ rajatam uta na rajatam] iti api tu rajatamityeva pratītiḥ /
analyzed: nanu saṃśayaḥ tadā na anubhūyate eva kim idam rajatam uta na rajatam iti api tu rajatam iti eva pratītiḥ

original: na hi saṃśayānāḥ pravartante laukikāḥ kintu niścinvanta eva vi9paryāmati kimananubhūyamāna evāropyate saṃśayaḥ ekataragrāhyapyayaṃ pratyayah tanniścayopāyavirahāt saṃśayakoṭipatita eva balādbhavati yathā asti kūpe jalamiti bhiksyavo manyanteiti /
analyzed: na hi saṃśayānāḥ pravartante laukikāḥ kintu niścinvantaḥ eva kim ananubhūyamānaḥ eva āropyate saṃśayaḥ ekatara grāhi api ayam pratyayaḥ tad niścaya upāya virahāt saṃśaya koṭi patitaḥ eva balāt bhavati yathā asti kūpe jalam iti bhiksyavaḥ manyante iti

original: evaṃ rajatamidamityekapakṣagrāhyapi tadānīṃ pratibhāsaḥ vastuvṛttena saṃśaya eva /
analyzed: evam rajatam idam iti eka pakṣa grāhi api tadānīm pratibhāsaḥ vastu vṛttena saṃśayaḥ eva

original: yadi hi pramāṇatayā 'sau gṛhyeta kathaṃ kvacidvisaṃvadet apramāṇatayātu gṛhyamāṇaḥ kathaṃ pumāṃsaṃ pravartayet !ubhābhyāmapi rūpābhyāṃ atha tasyānupagrahaḥ /
analyzed: yadi hi pramāṇa tayā sau gṛhyeta katham kvacid visaṃvadet a pramāṇa tayā tu gṛhyamāṇaḥ katham pumāṃsam pravartayet ubhābhyām api rūpābhyām atha tasya an upagrahaḥ

original: !so 'yaṃ saṃśaya eva syāt iti kiṃ naḥ prakupyasi //77//
analyzed: saḥ yam saṃśayaḥ eva syāt iti kim naḥ prakupyasi

original: yat tu nānubhūyate saṃśaya itisatyam ananubhūyamāno 'pi nyāyādabhyaste viṣaye 'vinābhāvasmaraṇāt sa parikalpyate niścayanimittasya tadānīmavidyamānatvāt /
analyzed: yat tu na anubhūyate saṃśayaḥ iti satyam nyāyāt abhyaste viṣaye vinābhāva smaraṇāt sa parikalpyate niścaya nimittasya tadānīm avidyamāna tvāt

original: saṃśayajananahetośca sāmagryāḥ sannihitatvāt /
analyzed: saṃśaya janana hetoḥ ca sāmagryāḥ sannihita tvāt

original: tathā hiyathā 'rthetarārthesādharaṇo dharmo bodharūpatvamūrdhvatvādivat tadā prakāśata eva /
analyzed: tathā hi yathā rtha itara arthe sādharaṇaḥ dharmaḥ bodha rūpa tvam ūrdhva tva ādi vat tadā prakāśate eva

original: na ca prāmāṇyāvinābhavī viśeṣaḥ kiś cana tadānīmavabhāti /
analyzed: na ca prāmāṇya avinābhavī viśeṣaḥ kiś cana tadānīm avabhāti

original: tadagrahaṇe ca samānadharmadhigamaprabodhyamānavāsanādhīnā tatsahacaritaparyāyānubhūtaviśeṣasmṛtirapi saṃbhavatyevetīyatīyaṃ sā saṃśayajananī sāmagrī sannihitaiveti kathaṃ tajjānyaḥ saṃśayaḥ na syāt nanu pramāṇabhūte pratyaye jāyamāna eva tadgato viśeṣaḥ parisphuratīti kathaṃ viśeṣāgrahaṇamucyate bho mahātman kathyatāṃ saḥ viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: tad agrahaṇe ca samāna dharma dhigama prabodhyamāna vāsanā adhīnā tad sahacarita paryāya anubhūta viśeṣa smṛtiḥ api saṃbhavati eva iti iyatī iyam sā saṃśaya jananī sāmagrī sannihitā eva iti katham tad jānyaḥ saṃśayaḥ na syāt nanu pramāṇa bhūte pratyaye jāyamāne eva tad gataḥ viśeṣaḥ parisphurati iti katham viśeṣa agrahaṇam ucyate bho mahātman kathyatām saḥ viśeṣaḥ na ucyate bho mahātman kathyatām saḥ viśeṣaḥ na ucyate saḥ viśeṣa

original: na hi taṃ vayamanupadiṣṭaṃ kṛśamatayo jānīmaḥ /
analyzed: na hi tam vayam anupadiṣṭam kṛśa matayaḥ jānīmaḥ

original: yadi tāvat spaṣṭatā viśeṣaḥ śuktikāyāmapi rajatāvabhāsaḥ spaṣṭa eva na hi tatrānadhyavasāyakāluṣyaṃ kiñcidasti //
analyzed: yadi tāvat spaṣṭa tā viśeṣaḥ śuktikāyām api rajata avabhāsaḥ spaṣṭaḥ eva na hi tatra anadhyavasāya kāluṣyam kiñcid asti

original: atha niṣkampatā śuktikāyāmapi rajatāvabhāso niṣkampa eva /
analyzed: atha niṣkampa tā śuktikāyām api rajata avabhāsaḥ niṣkampaḥ eva

original: na hyasau jāyamāna evāṅguṃlyagrādivākyakaraṇabodhavatkampamano jāyate //
analyzed: na hi asau jāyamānaḥ eva aṅguṃlī agra ādi vākya karaṇa bodhavat kampa manaḥ jāyate

original: atha nirvicikitsatā śuktikāyāmapi rajatāvabhāso nirvicikitsa eva kiṃsviditi koṭidvayānavamarśāt //
analyzed: atha nirvicikitsatā śuktikāyām api rajata avabhāsaḥ nirvicikitsaḥ eva kim svid iti koṭi dvaya anavamarśāt

original: atha yasmin sati bādhā na dṛśyata iti sarvovasthasya bādhadarśanāt /
analyzed: atha yasmin sati bādhā na dṛśyate iti bādha darśanāt

original: na cāsau ciramapi cintayitvā viśeṣo darśayituṃ śakyaḥ //
analyzed: na ca asau ciram api cintayitvā viśeṣaḥ darśayitum śakyaḥ

original: atha svaviṣayāvyabhicāritvameva viśeṣaḥ sa tadānīṃ nāvabhāsata ityuktam /
analyzed: atha sva viṣaya avyabhicāri tvam eva viśeṣaḥ sa tadānīm na avabhāsate iti uktam

original: api ca yadi tathāvidho 'pi viśeṣaḥ samasti tarhi yatra jñāne 'sau na dṛśyate tataḥ kimiti pravartate tadviśeṣadarśī vā pravartamānaḥ kathaṃ vipralabhyetetyuktam //
analyzed: api ca yadi tathāvidhaḥ viśeṣaḥ samasti tarhi yatra jñāne na dṛśyate tatas kim iti pravartate tad viśeṣa darśī vā pravartamānaḥ katham vipralabhyeta iti uktam

original: yadayaṃ sthāṇupuruṣasaṃśayavadasaṃvedyamāno 'pi tadānīmastyeva bodhe yathā 'rthetaratvasaśayaḥ //
analyzed: yat ayam sthāṇu puruṣa saṃśaya vat asaṃvedyamānaḥ pi tadānīm asti eva bodhe yathā rtha itaratva saśayaḥ

original: na cosau kalpyamāno 'pi vyavahārasya lopakaḥ /
analyzed: na ca usau kalpyamānaḥ vyavahārasya lopakaḥ

original: tenaiva vyavahārasya siddhatvātsarvadehinām //78//
analyzed: tena eva vyavahārasya siddha tvāt sarva dehinām

original: ataśca saṃśayādeva vyavahāraṃ vitanvatām /
analyzed: atas ca saṃśayāt eva vyavahāram vitanvatām

original: laukikānāṃ prayoktavyāḥ nābhiśāpaparaṃparāḥ //79//
analyzed: laukikānām prayoktavyāḥ na abhiśāpa paraṃparāḥ

original: na ca sarvathā saṃśayasamarthane 'smākamabhiniveśaḥ /
analyzed: na ca sarvathā saṃśaya samarthane smākam abhiniveśaḥ

original: prāmāṇyaṃ tu jñānotpatti kāle gṛhītumaśakyamiti naḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: prāmāṇyam tu jñāna utpatti kāle gṛhītum aśakyam iti naḥ pakṣaḥ

original: prāmāṇyāgrahaṇamevānadhyavasāyasvabhāvaṃ saṃśayaśabdeneha vyapadekṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: prāmāṇya agrahaṇam eva anadhyavasāya svabhāvam saṃśaya śabdena iha vyapadekṣyāmaḥ

original: prāmāṇyāgrahaṇaṃ ca pradarśitam pratyakṣeṇānumānena vā satā pramāṇenātmanaḥ pramāṇatvaparicchedāyogāt /
analyzed: prāmāṇya agrahaṇam ca pradarśitam pratyakṣeṇa anumānena vā satā pramāṇena ātmanaḥ pramāṇa tva pariccheda ayogāt

original: tasmāt svayaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhyata ityeṣa durghaṭaḥ pakṣaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt svayam prāmāṇyam gṛhyate iti eṣa durghaṭaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: atha svataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ bhavatītyeṣa pakṣa āśrīyate so 'pyayuktaḥ /
analyzed: atha svatas prāmāṇyam bhavati iti eṣa pakṣaḥ āśrīyate saḥ u pi ayuktaḥ

original: kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇādhīnajanmatvāt prāmāṇyasya ca kāryatvāt /
analyzed: kāryāṇām kāraṇa adhīna janma tvāt prāmāṇyasya ca kārya tvāt

original: asti ca prāmāṇyaṃ vastu ca tat na ca nityam iti kāryameva tat /
analyzed: asti ca prāmāṇyam vastu ca tat na ca nityam iti kāryam eva tat

original: kāryaṃ ca kāryatvādeva na svato bhavitumarhati iti //
analyzed: kāryam ca kārya tvāt eva na svatas bhavitum arhati iti

original: athotpattau svakārakātiriktayuṇanapekṣitvameva prāmāṇyasya svatomavanamucyatena punarakāryatvamevetitadapyasamyaksamyagrūpasya kāryasya guṇavatkārakavyatirekeṇāniṣpatteḥ /
analyzed: atha utpattau sva kāraka atirikta yuṇa anapekṣi tvam eva prāmāṇyasya svatas mavanam ucyate na punar akārya tvam eva iti tat api asamyak samyak rūpasya kāryasya guṇavat kāraka vyatirekeṇa aniṣpatteḥ

original: dvividhaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati samyagasamyagvā /
analyzed: dvividham kāryam bhavati samyak asamyak vā

original: tatra guṇavatā kāraṇena samyakkāryamutpadyate doṣavatā tvasamyagiti //
analyzed: tatra guṇavatā kāraṇena samyak kāryam utpadyate doṣavatā tu asamyak iti

original: nirdoṣaṃ nirguṇaṃ vā 'pi na samastyeva kāraṇam /
analyzed: nirdoṣam nirguṇam vā na samasti eva kāraṇam

original: ata eva tṛtīyasya na kāryasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ //80//
analyzed: atas eva tṛtīyasya na kāryasya asti saṃbhavaḥ

original: samyajjñānotpādakaṃ kārakaṃ dharmisvarūpātiriktasvagatadharmasāpekṣaṃ kāryanirvartakamiti sādhyo dharmaḥ kārakatvāt mithyājñānotpādakakārakavat /
analyzed: samyajjñāna utpādakam kārakam dharmi svarūpa atirikta svagata dharma sāpekṣam kārya nirvartakam iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ kāraka tvāt mithyājñāna utpādaka kāraka vat

original: samyajjñānaṃ vādharmi svarūpātiriktadharmasambaddha kārakaniṣpādyamiti sādhyo dharmaḥ kāryatvāt mithyājñānavat //
analyzed: samyak jñānam vā adharmi svarūpa atirikta dharma sambaddha kāraka niṣpādyam iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ kārya tvāt mithyājñāna vat

original: āyurvedāgamāccendriyaguṇān pratipadyāmahe /
analyzed: āyurveda āgamāt ca indriya guṇān pratipadyāmahe

original: yadamī vaidyāḥ svasthavṛtterauṣadhopayogamupadiśinti tat guṇopayogāyaiva na doṣaśāntaye /
analyzed: yat amī vaidyāḥ svastha vṛtteḥ auṣadha upayogam upadiśinti tat guṇa upayogāya eva na doṣa śāntaye

original: dṛśyate ca tadupadiṣṭauṣadhopayogādindriyātiśayaḥ /
analyzed: dṛśyate ca tad upadiṣṭa auṣadha upayogāt indriya atiśayaḥ

original: tadviṣaya eva ca loke nairmalyavyapadeśaḥ na doṣābhāvamātrapratiṣṭha ityalaṃ vimardena /
analyzed: tad viṣayaḥ eva ca loke nairmalya vyapadeśaḥ na doṣa abhāva mātra pratiṣṭhaḥ iti alam vimardena

original: tasmādutpattau guṇānapekṣatvāt svataḥprāmāṇyamiti yaduktaṃ tadayuktam //
analyzed: tasmāt utpattau guṇa anapekṣa tvāt svatas prāmāṇyam iti yat uktam tat ayuktam

original: yadapi ca svakāryakaraṇe pramāṇasya parānapekṣatvamucyatetadapi vyākhyeyam /
analyzed: yat api ca sva kārya karaṇe pramāṇasya para anapekṣa tvam ucyate itat api vyākhyeyam

original: kiṃ pramāṇaṃ svakāryakaraṇe nirapekṣam sāmagrī vā tadejadeśi vā tajjanyaṃ vā jñānamiti //
analyzed: kim pramāṇam sva kārya karaṇe nirapekṣam sāmagrī vā tad eja deśi vā tad janyam vā jñānam iti

original: tatra sāmagryāḥ satyaṃ svakāryajanmani nairapekṣyamasti /
analyzed: tatra sāmagryāḥ satyam sva kārya janmani nairapekṣyam asti

original: na tu tāvatā svataḥ prāmāṇyam tatparicchedasya parāyatttatvāt //
analyzed: na tu tāvatā svatas prāmāṇyam tad paricchedasya parāyatta tvāt

original: sāmagryantargatakārakasya svakārye parāpekṣatvamaparihāryam ekasmāt kārakātkāryanirvṛttyabhāvāt //
analyzed: sāmagrī antargata kārakasya sva kārye para apekṣa tvam aparihāryam ekasmāt kārakāt kārya nirvṛtti abhāvāt

original: jñānaṃ phalameva na pramāṇamityuktam /
analyzed: jñānam phalam eva na pramāṇam iti uktam

original: na ca phalātmanastasya svakāryaṃ kiñcidasti yatra sāpekṣatvamanapekṣatvaṃ vā 'sya cintyeta /
analyzed: na ca phala ātmanaḥ tasya sva kāryam kiñcid asti yatra sāpekṣa tvam anapekṣa tvam vā cintyeta

original: puruṣapravṛttyādau tu tadicchādyapekṣatvaṃ vidyata eveti yatkiñcidetat //
analyzed: puruṣa pravṛtti ādau tu tad icchā ādi apekṣa tvam vidyate evā iti yat kiñcid etat

original: yadapi prāmāṇyaniśraye nairapekṣayamabhyadhāyi tadapi na sāṃpratam /
analyzed: yat api prāmāṇya niśraye nairapekṣayam abhyadhāyi tat api na sāṃpratam

original: prāmāṇyaniścayasya hi dvayī gatiḥ nāstitvam kāraṇāpekṣitā vā na punarasti ca prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ kāraṇānapekṣaśceti śakyate vaktum /
analyzed: prāmāṇya niścayasya hi dvayī gatiḥ nāstitvam kāraṇa apekṣi tā vā na punar asti ca prāmāṇya niścayaḥ kāraṇa anapekṣaḥ ca iti śakyate vaktum

original: tatra prathamapravartakapratibhāsaprasavasamaye tāvannāstyeva prāmāṇyaniścaya ityuktam /
analyzed: tatra prathama pravartaka pratibhāsa prasava samaye tāvat na asti eva prāmāṇya niścayaḥ iti uktam

original: na hi nīlagrāhiṇā pramāṇena nīlasvarūpamiva svaprāmāṇyamapi tadānīṃ niścetuṃ śakyata iti /
analyzed: na hi nīla grāhiṇā pramāṇena nīla sva rūpam iva sva prāmāṇyam api tadānīm niścetum śakyate iti

original: kālāntare tatprāptāṇyaniścayaḥ satyamasti na tu tatra nairapekṣyam pravṛttisāmarthyādhīnatvāttanniścayasya //
analyzed: kāla antare tad prāpta aṇi aniścayaḥ satyam asti na tu tatra nairapekṣyam pravṛtti sāmarthya adhīna tvāt tad niścayasya

original: nanu kṣaṇikatvātkālāntare jñānameva nāsti kasya prāṃāṇyaṃ niścinumaḥ śaśucodyametat aprāṃāṇyamapi bādhakapratyayādinā kālāntare kasya niścinumaḥ kṣaṇikatvena jñānasyātītatvāt /
analyzed: nanu kṣaṇika tvāt kāla antare jñānam eva nā asti kasya prāṃāṇyam niścinumaḥ śaśu codyam etat aprāṃāṇyam api bādhaka pratyaya ādinā kāla antare kasya niścinumaḥ kṣaṇika tvena jñānasya atīta tvāt

original: atikrāntasyāpi smaryamāṇyasya jñānasya tadutpādakasya vā vartamānasya kārakacakrasyeti cetprāmāṇyaniścaye 'pi samāno 'yaṃ panthāḥ //
analyzed: atikrāntasya api smaryamāṇyasya jñānasya tad utpādakasya vā vartamānasya kāraka cakrasya iti ced prāmāṇya niścaye samānaḥ yam panthāḥ

original: yatpunaḥ kālāntare tanniścayakaraṇe duṣṇamitaretarāśrayatvaṃ vā muṇḍitaśironakṣatrānveṣaṇavadvaiyarthyaṃ veti varṇitam tatrādṛṣṭe viṣaye prāmāṇyaniścayapūrvikāyāḥ pravṛtterabhyupagamānnetaretarāśrayaṃ cakrakaṃ vā /
analyzed: yat punar kāla antare tad niścaya karaṇe duṣṇam itaretara āśraya tvam vā muṇḍita śiraḥ nakṣatra anveṣaṇa vat vaiyarthyam vā iti varṇitam tatra adṛṣṭe viṣaye prāmāṇya niścaya pūrvikāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ abhyupagamāt na itaretara āśrayam cakrakam vā

original: dṛṣṭe viṣaye hyanirṇītaprāmāṇya evārthasaṃśayāt pravṛttirūpam anarthasaṃśayācca nivṛttyātmakaṃ vyavahāramārabhamāṇo dṛśyate lokaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭe viṣaye hi anirṇīta prāmāṇyaḥ eva artha saṃśayāt pravṛtti rūpam anartha saṃśayāt ca nivṛtti ātmakam vyavahāram ārabhamāṇaḥ dṛśyate lokaḥ

original: etadeva yuktaityuktaṃ na prāmāṇyaniścayapuraśaraṃ pravartanamiti kuta itaretāraśrayam //
analyzed: etat eva yuktā eti uktam na prāmāṇya niścaya pura śaram pravartanam iti kutas itaretāraśrayam

original: vaiyarthyaṃ tu dṛṣṭe viṣaye satyamiṣyate kintu tatra pravṛttisāmarthyena prāmāṇyaṃ niścinvan āptoktatvasya hetoḥ prāmāṇyena vyāptimavagacchatīti adṛṣṭaviṣayopayogivedādipramāṇaprāmāṇyaparicchede pāraṃparyeṇoityadoṣaḥ //
analyzed: vaiyarthyam tu dṛṣṭe viṣaye satyam iṣyate kintu tatra pravṛtti sāmarthyena prāmāṇyam niścinvan āpta ukta tvasya hetoḥ prāmāṇyena vyāptim avagacchati iti adṛṣṭa viṣaya upayogi veda ādi pramāṇa prāmāṇya paricchede

original: kiṃ punaridaṃ pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ nāma yataḥ prāmāṇyaniścayamācakṣate naiyyāyikāḥucyate pūrvapratyayāpekṣottarā saṃvit pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ viśeṣadarśanaṃ veti pūrvācāryaistatsvarūpamuktam /
