analyzed: kim punar idam pravṛtti sāmarthyam nāma yatas prāmāṇya niścayam ācakṣate naiyyāyikāḥ ucyate pūrva pratyaya apekṣā uttarā saṃvid pravṛtti sāmarthyam viśeṣa darśanam vā iti pūrva ācāryaiḥ tad svarūpam uktam

original: tatpunarnātīva dṛdayaṅgamamiti bhāṣyakṛtaiva[samīhā pravṛttirityucyate sāmarthyaṃ punarasyāḥ phalenābhisambandhaḥ] iti vadatā 'rthakriyākhyaphalajñānameva pravṛttisāmarthyamiti nirṇitam //
analyzed: tat punar na atīva dṛdayaṅgamam iti bhāṣyakṛtā eva samīhā pravṛttiḥ iti ucyate sāmarthyam punar asyāḥ phalena abhisambandhaḥ iti vadatā rthakriyā ākhya phala jñānam eva pravṛtti sāmarthyam iti nirṇitam

original: yatpunaḥ arthakriyājñānasyāpi pūrvasmāt ko viśeṣaḥ tasyāpi cānyataḥ prāmāṇyaniścayāpekṣāyāmanavasthetyuktam tadapi sakalaprāṇabhṛtpratītisākṣikavyavahāravirodhitvādasambaddhābhi dhānam aparīkṣaṇīyaprāmāṇyatvādarthakriyājñānasya /
analyzed: yat punar arthakriyā jñānasya api pūrvasmāt kaḥ viśeṣaḥ tasya api ca anyatas prāmāṇya niścaya apekṣāyām anavasthā iti uktam tat api sakala prāṇabhṛt pratīti sākṣika vyavahāra virodhi tvāt asambaddha abhi dhānam aparīkṣaṇīya prāmāṇya tvāt arthakriyā jñānasya

original: pravartakaṃ na sarvajñānaṃ pravṛttisiddhaye parīkṣaṇīyaprāmāṇyaṃ vartate /
analyzed: pravartakam na sarva jñānam pravṛtti siddhaye parīkṣaṇīya prāmāṇyam vartate

original: phalajñāne tu siddhaprayojanatvāt prāmāṇyaparīkṣāpekṣaiva nāstīti kuto 'navasthā saṃśayābhāvādvā tatprāmāṇyavicārābhāvaḥ /
analyzed: phala jñāne tu siddha prayojana tvāt prāmāṇya parīkṣā apekṣā eva nā asti iti kutas navasthā saṃśaya abhāvāt vā tad prāmāṇya vicāra abhāvaḥ

original: pravartakaṃ hi prathamamudakajñānamavidyamāne 'pi nīre mihiramarīciṣu dṛṣṭamiti tatra saṃśerate janāḥ /
analyzed: pravartakam hi prathamam udaka jñānam avidyamāne nīre mihira marīciṣu dṛṣṭam iti tatra saṃśerate janāḥ

original: artyhakriyājñānaṃ tu salilamadhyartināṃ bhavat tadavinābhūtam eva bhavatīti na tatra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tu salilam adhyartinām bhavat tat avinābhūtam eva bhavati iti na tatra saṃśayaḥ

original: tadabhāvān na tatra prāmāṇyavicāraḥ vicārasya saṃśayapūrvakatvā //
analyzed: tad abhāvāt na tatra prāmāṇya vicāraḥ vicārasya

original: viśeṣadarśanādvā phalajñāne prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣa darśanāt vā phala jñāne prāmāṇya niścayaḥ

original: kaḥ punarayaṃ viśeṣa iti cet yo 'yaṃ śaucācamanamajjanāmarapitṛtarpaṇapaṭakṣālanaśramatāpanodanavinodanādyanekaprakāranīraparyālocanaprabandhaḥ na hyamiyān kāryakalāpo mithyājñānātpravṛttasya kvacidapi dṛṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ punar ayam viśeṣaḥ iti ced yaḥ yam śauca ācamana majjana amara pitṛ tarpaṇa paṭa kṣālana śramatā apanodana vinodana ādi aneka prakāra nīra paryālocana prabandhaḥ na hi amiyān kārya kalāpaḥ mithyājñānāt pravṛttasya kvacid api dṛṣṭaḥ

original: svapno 'pyasya prabandhasya darśanamastīti cetnasvapnadaśāvisdṛśavispaṣṭajāgradavasthāpratyayasya saṃvedyatvā /
analyzed: svapnaḥ u pi asya prabandhasya darśanam asti iti cetna svapna daśā visdṛśa vispaṣṭa jāgrat avasthā pratyayasya saṃvedya tvā

original: eṣo 'smi jāgarmi na svapimi iti svapnavilakṣaṇamanidrāyamāṇamānasaḥ pratyakṣameva jāgratsamayaṃ sakalo janaścetayate /
analyzed: eṣaḥ u smi jāgarmi na svapimi iti svapna vilakṣaṇam anidrāyamāṇa mānasaḥ pratyakṣam eva jāgrat samayam sakalaḥ janaḥ cetayate

original: na ca tasminnavasare salilamantarenaitāḥ kriyāḥ pravartamānā dṛśyanta iti tadviśeṣadarśanāt sujñānamarthakriyājñānaprāmāṇyam //
analyzed: na ca tasmin avasare salilam antarena etāḥ kriyāḥ pravartamānāḥ dṛśyante iti tad viśeṣa darśanāt su jñānam artha kriyā jñāna prāmāṇyam

original: kāraṇaparīkṣāto vā tasmin prāmāṇyaṃ niśceṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇa parīkṣātaḥ vā tasmin prāmāṇyam niśceṣyāmaḥ

original: yathoktaṃ bhavadbhireva[prayatnenānvicchanto na ceddoṣamavagacchema tatpramāṇābhāvāt aduṣṭamiti manyemahi] iti /
analyzed: yathā uktam bhavadbhiḥ eva prayatnena anvicchantaḥ na ced doṣam avagacchema tat pramāṇa abhāvāt aduṣṭam iti manyemahi iti

original: tathā hi viṣayasya calatvasādṛśyādidoṣavirahaḥ ālokasya malīmasatvādikāraṇavaikalyaṃ antaḥkaraṇasya nidrādyadūṣitatvam ātmanaḥ kṣutprakopādyanākulatvam īkṣaṇayugalasya timirapaṭalādivikalatvamityādi svayaṃ ca kāryadvāreṇa paropadeśena ca sarvaṃ sujñānam /
analyzed: tathā hi viṣayasya calatva sādṛśya ādi doṣa virahaḥ ālokasya malīmasa tva ādi kāraṇa vaikalyam antaḥkaraṇasya nidrā ādi adūṣita tvam ātmanaḥ kṣudh prakopa ādi anākula tvam īkṣaṇa yugalasya timira paṭala ādi vikala tvam ityādi svayam ca kārya dvāreṇa para upadeśena ca sarvam su jñānam

original: ato niravadyakāraṇajanyatvāt pramāṇamarthakriyājñānamiti vidmaḥ //
analyzed: atas niravadya kāraṇa janya tvāt pramāṇam artha kriyā jñānam iti vidmaḥ

original: yady evaṃ prathame pravartaka eva pratyaye kasmāt kāraṇaparīkṣaiveyaṃ na kriyate kimarthaṃ kriyājñāne na āyuṣman ādye 'pi jñāne kāraṇaparīkṣāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ kaḥ pramādaḥ kimevaṃ sati svataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ siddhyati tava mama vā parataḥ prāmāṇyamapahīyate kintu lokaḥ pravartakajñānānantaraṃ phalaprāptaṃ prati yathā sodyamo dṛśyate na tathā tatkāraṇaparīkṣāṃ prati /
analyzed: yadi evam prathame pravartake eva pratyaye kasmāt kāraṇa parīkṣā eva iyam na kriyate kimartham kriyā jñāne na āyuṣman ādye jñāne kāraṇa parīkṣāyām kriyamāṇāyām kaḥ pramādaḥ kim evam sati svatas prāmāṇyam siddhyati tava mama vā paratas prāmāṇyam apahīyate kintu lokaḥ pravartaka jñāna anantaram phala prāptam prati yathā sa udyamaḥ dṛśyate na tathā tad kāraṇa parīkṣām prati

original: phalajñānamevetthaṃ parīkṣyate /
analyzed: phala jñānam evā ittham parīkṣyate

original: ādyasya hi jñānasya phalajñānādeva prāmāṇyasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: ādyasya hi jñānasya phala jñānāt eva prāmāṇya siddhiḥ

original: kaśca nāma nikaṭamupāyamupekṣya dūraṃ gacchediti /
analyzed: kaḥ ca nāma nikaṭam upāyam upekṣya dūram gacchet iti

original: atha vā saṃśayotpattisāmarthyādeva yathārthetaratvaniścayaḥ phalajñāneva lapsyate /
analyzed: atha vā saṃśaya utpatti sāmarthyāt eva yathārtha itaratva niścayaḥ phala jñānā iva lapsyate

original: saṃśayo hi nāma dvaividhyadarśanādvinā na bhavatyeva /
analyzed: saṃśayaḥ hi nāma dvaividhya darśanāt vinā na bhavati eva

original: na hi sthāṇupuruṣasāhacaryamūrdhvatākhyasya dharmasya yo na jānāti sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā [sthāṇurvā syāt puruṣo vā] iti saṃśete /
analyzed: na hi sthāṇu puruṣa sāhacaryam ūrdhva tā ākhyasya dharmasya yaḥ na jānāti sa tam dṛṣṭvā sthāṇuḥ vā syāt puruṣaḥ vā iti saṃśete

original: evamurdhvatvavadbodharūpatvasya vyabhicāritvāvyabhicāritvābhyāṃ sahadarśanamavaśyamāśrayaṇīyam anyathā tadviṣayasaṃśayānutpādāt /
analyzed: evam ūrdhva tva vat bodha rūpa tvasya vyabhicāri tva avyabhicāri tvābhyām saha darśanam avaśyam āśrayaṇīyam anyathā tad viṣaya saṃśaya anutpādāt

original: ataḥ pūrvamavyabhicāritvadarśane siddhe yastadā tatparicchedopāyaḥ sa paścādapi bhaviṣyatīti sarvathā siddhyatyavyabhicāritvaniścayaḥ //
analyzed: atas pūrvam avyabhicāri tva darśane siddhe yaḥ tadā tad pariccheda upāyaḥ sa paścāt api bhaviṣyati iti sarvathā siddhi atyavyabhicāri tva niścayaḥ

original: aniścitaprāmāṇyādapi vā phalajñānāt pravartakasya prāmāṇyaniścayo yuktaḥ na tu svataḥ utpattau pramāṇatadābhāsayorviśeṣāgrahaṇāt /
analyzed: aniścita prāmāṇyāt api vā phala jñānāt pravartakasya prāmāṇya niścayaḥ yuktaḥ na tu svatas utpattau pramāṇa tad ābhāsayoḥ viśeṣa agrahaṇāt

original: phalajñāne ca tadviśeṣapratibhāsāt //
analyzed: phala jñāne ca tad viśeṣa pratibhāsāt

original: yat tuviśeṣajñānaṃ niścitaprāmāṇyamaniścitaprāmāṇyaṃ veti vikalpyānavasthāpādanaṃ apratipattiprahatatākathanaṃ vā tat dṛṣṭaviruddhatvāt pralāpamātramityalamalīkoktavikalpakalāpanirmathanoditadurāmodāsvādanena //
analyzed: yat tu viśeṣa jñānam niścita prāmāṇyam aniścita prāmāṇyam vā iti vikalpya anavasthā āpādanam apratipatti prahata tā kathanam vā tat dṛṣṭa viruddha tvāt pralāpa mātram iti alam alīka ukta vikalpa kalāpa nirmathana udita durāmoda āsvādanena

original: sthitametatarthakriyājñānātprāmāṇyaniścaya iti /
analyzed: sthitam etat artha kriyā jñānāt prāmāṇya niścayaḥ iti

original: tadidamuktam [pramāṇato 'rthapratipattau pravṛttisāmarthyādarthavatpramāṇam] iti /
analyzed: tat idam uktam pramāṇataḥ ṛtha pratipattau pravṛtti sāmarthyāt arthavat pramāṇam iti

original: tasmādaprāmāṇyavatprāmāṇyamapi parāpekṣamityato dvayamapi parata ityeṣa eva pakṣaḥ kṣeyān //
analyzed: tasmāt aprāmāṇya vat prāmāṇyam api para apekṣam iti atas dvayam api paratas iti eṣaḥ eva pakṣaḥ kṣeyān

original: yat tu kaścitprājñāmāni vadatiabhyaste viṣaye svataḥprāmāṇyam anabhyaste tu parataḥiti so 'ytaṃ [abhyaste viṣaye] iti ca vravīti svataśca prāmāṇyaṃ manyata iti svayamevātmānaṃ vañcayamānaṃ na cetayate /
analyzed: yat tu kaścid prājña amāni vadati abhyaste viṣaye svatas prāmāṇyam an abhyaste tu paratas iti abhyaste viṣaye iti ca vravīti svatas ca prāmāṇyam manyate iti svayam eva ātmānam vañcayamānam na cetayate

original: abhyāso hi nāma punaḥpunaḥ prayogaḥ kriyāyā abhyāvṛttiḥ viṣayasya cābhyastatā bhūyobhūyaḥ pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: abhyāsaḥ hi nāma punar punar prayogaḥ kriyāyāḥ abhyāvṛttiḥ viṣayasya ca abhyasta tā bhūyas bhūyas pravṛttiḥ

original: ataśca svaśarīragrahe nijagṛhakuḍyastambhācipratibhāse vā sahasrakṛtvaḥ pravṛtasaṃvādajñānajanmanā prāmāṇyaniścaya ukto bhavati /
analyzed: atas ca sva śarīra grahe nija gṛha kuḍya stambha aci pratibhāse vā sahasra kṛtvas pravṛta saṃvāda jñāna janmanā prāmāṇya niścayaḥ uktaḥ bhavati

original: svataḥ abhyastatvaṃ cānyathā na bhavediti yatkiñcidetat /
analyzed: svatas abhyasta tvam ca anyathā na bhavet iti yat kiñcid etat

original: tasmāt parataḥ prāmāṇyamiti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt paratas prāmāṇyam iti siddham

original: yatpunaḥ kaiściccodyatepramāṇānāṃ na parīkṣaṇamupapadyate /
analyzed: yat punar kaiścid codyate pramāṇānām na parīkṣaṇam upapadyate

original: taddhi pramāṇaiḥ kriyeta apramāṇairvā pramāṇairapi parīkṣitaiḥ aparīkṣitairvā tatra na nāma apramāṇaiḥ pramāṇaparīkṣaṇaṃ śakyakriyam //
analyzed: tat hi pramāṇaiḥ kriyeta apramāṇaiḥ vā pramāṇaiḥ api parīkṣitaiḥ aparīkṣitaiḥ vā tatra na nāma apramāṇaiḥ pramāṇa parīkṣaṇam śakya kriyam

original: pramāṇairapyaparīkṣitaiḥ tatkaraṇe varaṃ vyavahāra eva tādṛśaiḥ kriyatām kiṃ parīṣaṇena parīkṣitaistu tatparīkṣākaraṇamaparyavasitam anaghasthāprasaṅgāt ityādi //
analyzed: pramāṇaiḥ api aparīkṣitaiḥ tad karaṇe varam vyavahāraḥ eva tādṛśaiḥ kriyatām kim parīṣaṇena parīkṣitaiḥ tu tad parīkṣā karaṇam aparyavasitam anagha sthā prasaṅgāt ityādi

original: tadapyuktena nyānena parihṛtaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tat api uktena nyānena parihṛtam bhavati

original: dṛṣṭe viṣaye pramāṇaparīkṣāṃ vinaiva vyavahārāt /
analyzed: dṛṣṭe viṣaye pramāṇa parīkṣām vinā eva vyavahārāt

original: adṛṣṭe tu parīkṣāyā avaśyakartavyatvādupapatteśceti //
analyzed: adṛṣṭe tu parīkṣāyāḥ avaśya kartavya tvāt upapatteḥ ca iti

original: tasmādadṛṣṭapuruṣārthapadopadeśi mānaṃ manīṣibhiravaśyaparīkṣaṇīyam /
analyzed: tasmāt adṛṣṭa puruṣa artha pada upadeśi mānam manīṣibhiḥ avaśya parīkṣaṇīyam

original: pramāṇyamasya parato niraṇāyi ceti cetaḥpramāthibhiralaṃ kuvikalpajālaiḥ //81//
analyzed: pramāṇyam asya paratas niraṇāyi ca iti cetaḥ pramāthibhiḥ alam ku vikalpa jālaiḥ

original: suśikṣitāstvācakṣateyuktaṃ yadamī mīmāṃsakapāśāḥ kāśakusumarāśaya iva śaradi mahadbhiratidūrātsamutsāryante duṣṭatārkikaiḥ /
analyzed: suśikṣitāḥ tu ācakṣate yuktam yat amī mīmāṃsaka pāśāḥ kāśa kusuma rāśayaḥ iva śaradi mahadbhiḥ atidūrāt samutsāryante duṣṭa tārkikaiḥ

original: ye hi kilābhyupayanti ca viparītakhyātivādaṃ akṛtāstrāḥ prāmāṇyaṃ ca svata iti ca vadanti teṣāṃ kutaḥ kauśalam viparītakhyātāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ bādhyabodhasandarbhasubhikṣe sati tatsādharmyādanutpannabādhake 'pi bodhe duṣpariharaḥ saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: ye hi kila abhyupayanti ca viparīta khyāti vādam akṛtāstrāḥ prāmāṇyam ca svatas iti ca vadanti teṣām kutas kauśalam viparīta khyātau abhyupagamyamānāyām bādhya bodha sandarbha subhikṣe sati tad sādharmyāt anutpanna bādhake bodhe duṣpariharaḥ saṃśayaḥ

original: saṃśaye ca saṃvādādyanveṣaṇamapi dhruvamavataratīti parataḥ prāmāṇyamanivāryam //
analyzed: saṃśaye ca saṃvāda ādi anveṣaṇam api dhruvam avatarati iti paratas prāmāṇyam anivāryam

original: yadā tu na bādhyo nāma jagati kaścidapi bodhaḥ tadā kimsādharmyāt saṃśeratāṃ pramātāraḥ asaṃśayānāśca kimiti paramapekṣantām anapekṣamāṇāḥ kathaṃ parataḥ pramāṇyaṃ pratipadyantāmiti niścalaṃ svata eva prāmāṇyamavatiṣṭhate //
analyzed: yadā tu na bādhyaḥ nāma jagati kaścid api bodhaḥ tadā kimsādharmyāt saṃśeratām pramātāraḥ a saṃśayānāḥ ca kim iti param apekṣantām an apekṣamāṇāḥ katham paratas pramāṇyam pratipadyantām iti niścalam svatas eva prāmāṇyam avatiṣṭhate

original: kathaṃ punarbādhyo nāma nāsti bodhaḥ śukikādau rajatādipratyayāḥ prācūryeṇa bādhyamānā dṛśyanteanabhijño bhavān bādhasya na hi te bādhyāḥ pratyayāḥ //
analyzed: katham punar bādhyaḥ nāma na asti bodhaḥ śukika ādau rajata ādi pratyayāḥ prācūryeṇa bādhyamānāḥ dṛśyante anabhijñaḥ bhavān bādhasya na hi te bādhyāḥ pratyayāḥ

original: idaṃ hi nirupapyatāmka ivottarajñānena pūrvajñānasya bādhaḥ bādharthameva na vidmaḥ /
analyzed: idam hi kaḥ iva uttara jñānena pūrva jñānasya bādhaḥ na vidmaḥ

original: yadi tāvannāśa eva bādhaḥ sa na teṣāmeva buddherbuddhyantarādvirodha iti sakalabodhasādhāraṇatvāt //
analyzed: yadi tāvat nāśaḥ eva bādhaḥ sa na teṣām eva buddheḥ buddhi antarāt virodhaḥ iti sakala bodha sādhāraṇa tvāt

original: atha sahānavasthānam tadapi samānamabādhitānāmapi jñānānāṃ sahāvasthānāsaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: atha saha anavasthānam tat api samānam abādhitānām api jñānānām saha avasthāna asaṃbhavāt

original: atha saṃskārocchedo bādhaḥ so 'pi tādṛgevasaṃmyakpratyayopajanitasaṃskārasyāpyucchedadarśanāt /
analyzed: atha saṃskāra ucchedaḥ bādhaḥ saḥ pi tādṛś eva saṃmyak pratyaya upajanita saṃskārasya api uccheda darśanāt

original: kaścidbhavadabhimatabādhyabodhā-' āhito 'pi saṃskāraḥ satyapi bādhakapratyaye nocchedamupagacchati kālāntare tatkāraṇakatadviṣayasmaraṇadarśanāt //
analyzed: kaścid bhavat abhimata bādhya bodhā saṃskāraḥ sati api bādhaka pratyaye na ucchedam upagacchati kāla antare tad kāraṇaka tad viṣaya smaraṇa darśanāt

original: atha viṣayāpahāro bādhaḥ so 'pi durghaṭaḥ /
analyzed: atha viṣaya apahāraḥ bādhaḥ saḥ pi durghaṭaḥ

original: pratibhātatvena viṣayasyāparhatumaśakyatvāt /
analyzed: pratibhāta tvena viṣayasya aparhatum aśakya tvāt

original: na hi bādhakaṃ jñānamitthamuttiṣṭhati yat pratibhātaṃ tanna pratibhātamiti //
analyzed: na hi bādhakam jñānam ittham uttiṣṭhati yat pratibhātam tat na pratibhātam iti

original: atha tadabhāvagraho bādhaḥ sa tātkālikaḥ kālāntarabhāvī vā kālāntarabhāvitadabhāvagrahaṇasya bādhakatve pragavagatamudgaradalitadhaṭābhāvagrāhiṇo 'pi vijñānasya tadbādhakatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: atha tad abhāva grahaḥ bādhaḥ sa tātkālikaḥ kāla antara bhāvī vā kāla antara bhāvi tad abhāva grahaṇasya bādhaka tve vijñānasya tad bādhaka tva prasaṅgaḥ

original: tadaiva tu tadabhāvagrahaṇe pratyayadvayasamarpitarūpadvitayayogādubhayātmakameva tadastu vastu kiṃ kasya bādhyaṃ bādhakaṃ vā atha phalāpahāro bādhaḥ so 'pi na saṃbhavati saṃvidaḥ pramāṇaphalasya utpannatvenānapaharaṇīyatvāt /
analyzed: tadā eva tu tad abhāva grahaṇe pratyaya dvaya samarpita rūpa dvitaya yogāt ubhaya ātmakam eva tat astu vastu kim kasya bādhyam bādhakam vā atha phala apahāraḥ bādhaḥ na saṃbhavati saṃvidaḥ pramāṇa phalasya utpanna tvena an apaharaṇīya tvāt

original: na hi yadutpannaṃ tadanutpannamiti vadati bādhakaḥ //
analyzed: na hi yat utpannam tat anutpannam iti vadati bādhakaḥ

original: atha hānādiphalāpahāro bādhaḥ na tasya pramāṇaphalatvābhāvāt //
analyzed: atha hāna ādi phala apahāraḥ bādhaḥ na tasya pramāṇa phala tva abhāvāt

original: hānādivyavahāro hi puruṣecchānibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: hāna ādi vyavahāraḥ hi puruṣa icchā nibandhanaḥ

original: na tenāpahṛte nāpi pramāṇaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavet //82//
analyzed: na tena apahṛte na api pramāṇam bādhitam bhavet

original: tasmānna bādhonāma kaścit //
analyzed: tasmāt na bādhaḥ nāma kaścid

original: itaśca nāsti /
analyzed: itas ca na asti

original: sa hi samānaviṣayayorvā jñānayoriṣyate bhinnaviṣayayor vā na samānaviṣayayoḥ dhārāvāhijñāneṣvadṛṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: sa hi samāna viṣayayoḥ vā jñānayoḥ iṣyate bhinna viṣayayoḥ vā na samāna viṣayayoḥ dhārā vāhi jñāneṣu adṛṣṭa tvāt

original: nāpi bhinnaviṣayayoḥ stambhakumbhopalambhayostadanupalambhāt /
analyzed: nā api bhinna viṣayayoḥ stambha kumbha upalambhayoḥ tad anupalambhāt

original: yadi cottareṇa jñānena pūrvajñānagṛhītādarthādartho 'nya idānīṃ gṛhītaḥ tatpūrvajñānaṃ kimiti bādhitamucyate api ca pūrvasmin pratyaye prāptapratiṣṭhe sati āganturuttaraḥ pratyayaḥ bādhituṃ yuktaḥ na pūrvaḥna caivaṃ dṛśyate /
analyzed: yadi ca uttareṇa jñānena pūrva jñāna gṛhītāt arthāt arthaḥ nyaḥ idānīm gṛhītaḥ tat pūrva jñānam kim iti bādhitam ucyate api ca pūrvasmin pratyaye prāpta pratiṣṭhe sati āgantuḥ uttaraḥ pratyayaḥ bādhitum yuktaḥ na pūrvaḥ na ca evam dṛśyate

original: tasmānna bādhyaṃ nāma vijñānamasti /
analyzed: tasmāt na bādhyam nāma vijñānam asti

original: tadabhāvānna tatsādharmyanibandhanaḥ saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tad abhāvāt na tad sādharmya nibandhanaḥ saṃśayaḥ

original: tadabhāvātsaṃvādādyananveṣaṇānna parataḥ prāmāṇyam //
analyzed: tad abhāvāt saṃvāda ādi ananveṣaṇāt na paratas prāmāṇyam

original: nanu evaṃ bādhe nirākriyamāṇe kimamī śuktikārajatādigrāhiṇo viparītapratyayā abādhitā evāsatāmāḥ kumate tāmī viparītaptatyayāḥ /
analyzed: nanu evam bādhe nirākriyamāṇe kim amī śuktikā rajata ādi grāhiṇaḥ viparīta pratyayāḥ abādhitāḥ kumate

original: nahīdṛśānāṃ viparyayāṇāmutpattau kimapi kāraṇamutpaśyāmaḥ //
analyzed: nahi īdṛśānām viparyayāṇām utpattau kim api kāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ

original: na tāvadindriyamevaṃvidhabodhavidhāyi bhavitumarhati sarvadā tadutpādaprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: na tāvat indriyam evaṃvidha bodha vidhāyi bhavitum arhati sarvadā tad utpāda prasaṅgāt

original: nāpi doṣakaluṣitaṃ duṣṭaṃ hi kāranaṃ svakāryakaraṇa eva kuṇṭhitaśakti jātamiti tadeva mā jījanatviparītakāryakaranasya kiṃ vartate na hi duṣṭāni śālibījāni yavāṅkurakaraṇakauśalamavalamberan /
analyzed: na api doṣa kaluṣitam duṣṭam hi kāranam sva kārya karaṇe eva kuṇṭhita śakti jātam iti tat eva mā jījanat viparīta kārya karanasya kim vartate na hi duṣṭāni śāli bījāni yava aṅkura karaṇa kauśalam avalamberan

original: tasmāt kāraṇābhāvādapi na viparītapratyayāste //
analyzed: tasmāt kāraṇa abhāvāt api na viparīta pratyayāḥ te

original: tatkiṃ samyakpratyaya eva śuktikāyāṃ rajatapratibhāsaḥayi mūḍhanāyamekaḥ pratyayaḥ idaṃ rajatamiti kintu dve ete grahaṇasmaraṇe /
analyzed: tat kim samyak pratyayaḥ eva śuktikāyām rajata pratibhāsaḥ ayi mūḍhana ayam ekaḥ pratyayaḥ idam rajatam iti kintu dve ete grahaṇa smaraṇe

original: idamiti puro 'vasthitabhāsvarākāradharmipratibhāsaḥrajatamiti tu bhāsvararūpadarśanaprabodhyamānasamskārakāraṇakaṃ tatsāhacaryādavagatarajatasmaraṇam //
analyzed: idam iti puras vasthita bhāsvara ākāra dharmi pratibhāsaḥ rajatam iti tu bhāsvara rūpa darśana prabodhyamāna samskāra kāraṇakam tad sāhacaryāt avagata rajata smaraṇam

original: ataścedaṃ smaraṇaṃyataḥ praganavagatarajatasya na jāyateviditarajatasyāpi rajanyāmanyadā vā sādrśyadarśanādvinā na bhavatīti //
analyzed: atas ca idam smaraṇam yatas na jāyate vidita rajatasya api rajanyām anyadā vā sādrśya darśanāt vinā na bhavati iti

original: smaraṇapai bhavadidamātmānaṃ tathā na prakaṭayatīti pramuṣitamucyate /
analyzed: smaraṇa pai bhavat idam ātmānam tathā na prakaṭayati iti pramuṣitam ucyate

original: svarūpeṇa cāpratibhāsamānāyāṃ svṛtāvanubhavasmaraṇayorviveko na gṛhīto bhavatītyagrahaṇamakhyātirucyate //
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa ca apratibhāsamānāyām svṛtau anubhava smaraṇayoḥ vivekaḥ na gṛhītaḥ bhavati iti agrahaṇam akhyātiḥ ucyate

original: tathā hi bhrāntabodheṣu prasphuradvastusaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: tathā hi bhrānta bodheṣu prasphurat vastu saṃbhavāt

original: catuṣprakārā vimatirudapadyata vādinām //83//
analyzed: catuṣprakārā vimatiḥ udapadyata vādinām

original: viparītakhyātiḥasatkhyātiḥātmakhyātiḥakhyātiriti //
analyzed: viparīta khyātiḥ asat khyātiḥ ātma khyātiḥ akhyātiḥ iti

original: tatra viparītakhyātistāvatkāraṇābhāvādeva nirastā /
analyzed: tatra viparīta khyātiḥ tāvat kāraṇa abhāvāt eva nirastā

original: api ca viparītakhyātau grayī gatiḥrajataṃ vā 'nyadeśakālamatrālambanam śuktikā vā nigūhitanijākārā satī parigṛhītarajatākārā ca athavā anyadālambanaṃ anyacca pratibhāti tatra yadi rajatamālambanaṃtadiyamasatkhyātireva na viparītakhyātiḥasatastatra rajatasya pratibhāsāt //
analyzed: api ca viparīta khyātau grayī gatiḥ rajatam vā nya deśa kālam atra ālambanam śuktikā vā nigūhita nija ākārā satī parigṛhīta rajata ākārā ca athavā anyat ālambanam anyat ca pratibhāti tatra yadi rajatam ālambanam tat iyam asat khyātiḥ eva na viparīta khyātiḥ asataḥ tatra rajatasya pratibhāsāt

original: athānyadeśakālaṃ tat astyevetyabhidhīyate /
analyzed: atha anya deśa kālam tat asti eva iti abhidhīyate

original: ihāsannihitasyāsya tena sattvena ko guṇaḥ //84//
analyzed: iha asannihitasya asya tena sattvena kaḥ guṇaḥ

original: api cadeśakālāvapi kiṃ santau pratibhāsete utāsantau iti /
analyzed: api ca deśa kālau api kim santau pratibhāsete uta asantau iti

original: yadi santautarhi taddeśakālamevedaṃ rajatamavabhātamiti na bhrāntireṣā syāt /
analyzed: yadi santau tarhi tad deśa kālam evā idam rajatam avabhātam iti na bhrāntiḥ eṣā syāt

original: asantau tūbhāvapi rajatavat nālambanaṃ bhavitumarhati //
analyzed: asantau tu ubhau api rajata vat na ālambanam bhavitum arhati

original: atha smṛtyārūḍhaṃ rajatamasyāṃ pratītau parisphuratītyucyatetarhi smṛtyupārūḍhamiti ko 'rthaḥ smaraṇamami jñānamevatadapi kathamasadarthaviṣayaṃ syāt /
analyzed: atha smṛti ārūḍham rajatam asyām pratītau parisphurati iti ucyate tarhi smṛti upārūḍham iti kaḥ rthaḥ smaraṇam ami jñānam eva tat api katham asat artha viṣayam syāt

original: smṛteranarthajatvameva svarūpamiti cet astu kāmamtatsāmānyādatrāpyevaṃ prayoga ityetadapi tāvanna brūmaḥ /
analyzed: smṛteḥ anartha ja tvam eva svarūpam iti ced astu kāmam tad sāmānyāt atra api evam prayogaḥ iti etat api tāvat na brūmaḥ

original: tathā tvanarthajanyayā smṛtyā so 'rthaḥ kathamiha sannidhāpayituṃ pāryate /
analyzed: tathā tu anartha janyayā smṛtyā saḥ ṛthaḥ katham iha sannidhāpayitum pāryate

original: sā hi na spṛśatyevā 'rtham /
analyzed: sā hi na spṛśati eva a rtham

original: tasmādasannihitarajatālambanā viparītakhyātirasatkhyāterna viśiṣyata eva //
analyzed: tasmāt asannihita rajata ālambanā viparīta khyātiḥ asat khyāteḥ na viśiṣyate eva

original: atha sthagitanijavapuruṣagṛhītarajatarūpā śuktikā 'tra prakāśata iti neyamasatkhyātirucyate tadidamapūrvaṃ kimapi nāṭakaṃiyamasmin kṛtyā sītā pravṛtteti /
analyzed: atha sthagita nija vapuḥ puruṣa gṛhīta rajata rūpā śuktikā tra prakāśate iti na iyam asat khyātiḥ ucyate tat idam apūrvam kim api nāṭakam iyam asmin kṛtyā sītā pravṛttā iti

original: tathā hikimatraśuktiriti pratītiḥ uta rajatamiti śuktikāpratītau tu śuktau śuktir eva pratīyate na rajataṃ iti bhramārthaḥ kaḥ rajatapratītau tu śuktirasāvityatra kiṃ pramāṇam bādhakapratyayādevamavagataṃ iti cetmaivamna hi jñānāntareṇāsyāḥ pratīterviṣayo vyavasthāpayituṃ yuktaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi kim atra śuktiḥ iti pratītiḥ uta rajatam iti śuktikā pratītau tu śuktau śuktiḥ eva pratīyate na rajatam iti bhrama arthaḥ kaḥ rajata pratītau tu śuktiḥ asau iti atra kim pramāṇam bādhaka pratyayāt evam avagatam iti ced maevam na hi jñāna antareṇa asyāḥ pratīteḥ viṣayaḥ vyavasthāpayitum yuktaḥ

original: bādhakena hi jñānena pūrvajñānagṛhītasya vastuno 'sattvaṃ nāma khyāpyatāmna tu tasya viṣayo nirūpyate /
analyzed: bādhakena hi jñānena pūrva jñāna gṛhītasya sattvam nāma tu tasya viṣayaḥ nirūpyate

original: anarthitvādvā kadācidapravṛttasya puṃso bādhakānutpattau vā ko 'syāḥ pratīter viṣayaṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyati /
analyzed: anarthi tvāt vā kadācid apravṛttasya puṃsaḥ bādhaka anutpattau vā syāḥ pratīteḥ viṣayam vyavasthāpayiṣyati

original: tasmādyadevāsyāṃ cakāstitadeva rajatamasyā viṣaya iti yuktaṃ vaktum /
analyzed: tasmāt yat eva asyām cakāsti tat eva rajatam asyāḥ viṣayaḥ iti yuktam vaktum

original: śuktistu nigūhitanijavapuriti durvidagdhavācoyuktiriyam //
analyzed: śuktiḥ tu nigūhita nija vapuḥ iti durvidagdha vācoyuktiḥ iyam

original: ye tvālambanatāṃ śukteḥ rajatasyāvabhāsanam /
analyzed: ye tu ālambana tām śukteḥ rajatasya avabhāsanam

original: vadantyasmin bhramajñāne teṣāmatitarāṃ bhramaḥ //85//
analyzed: vadanti asmin bhrama jñāne teṣām atitarām bhramaḥ

original: na hyālambanatā yuktā sannighānanibandhanā /
analyzed: na hi ālambana tā yuktā sannighāna nibandhanā

original: tatraiva bhūpradeśasya tathābhāvaprasaṅgataḥ //86//
analyzed: tatra eva bhū pradeśasya tathā bhāva prasaṅgataḥ

original: tadevālambanaṃ buddheryadasyāmavabhāsate /
analyzed: tat eva ālambanam buddheḥ yat asyām avabhāsate

original: anyadālambanaṃ cānyadbhātīti bhaṇitirna vā //87//
analyzed: anyat ālambanam ca anyat bhāti iti bhaṇitiḥ na vā

original: ato rajatamevaitadvaddhigrāhyamasacca tat /
analyzed: atas rajatam eva etadvat hi grāhyam asat ca tat

original: evaṃ viparyayakhyātirasatkhyāterna bhidyate //88//
analyzed: evam viparyaya khyātiḥ asat khyāteḥ na bhidyate

original: tatkimasatkhyānireva sādhīyasī tāmevābhyupagacchāmaḥ maivam sā 'pi nopapadyata eva /
analyzed: tat kim asat khyāniḥ eva sādhīyasī tām eva abhyupagacchāmaḥ mā evam sā pi nā upapadyate eva

original: asatkhyātiriti ko 'rthaḥ kimekāntāsata evārthasya prathanam atha deśāntarādau vidyamānasyeti uttarasmin pakṣe viparītakhyātirevaiṣāparairapi tatra rajatasya satvānabhyupagamāt /
analyzed: asat khyātiḥ iti kaḥ rthaḥ kim ekānta asataḥ eva arthasya prathanam atha deśa antara ādau vidyamānasya iti uttarasmin pakṣe viparīta khyātiḥ eva eṣā aparaiḥ api tatra rajatasya satva anabhyupagamāt

original: deśāntarādau tu tatsattāyāstvayā 'pi pratipannatvāt /
analyzed: deśa antara ādau tu tad sattāyāḥ tvayā pratipanna tvāt

original: ekāntāsatastvasya khyātiriti na peśalam ākāśanalinīpallavāderapratibhāsanāt /
analyzed: ekānta asataḥ tu asya khyātiḥ iti na peśalam ākāśa nalinī pallava ādeḥ apratibhāsanāt

original: vāsanābhyāsādasattāmapi pratibhāsā bhaviṣyantīti cet na arthamantareṇa vāsanāyā apyanupapatteḥ /
analyzed: vāsanā abhyāsāt asattām api pratibhāsāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti ced na artham antareṇa vāsanāyāḥ api anupapatteḥ

original: arthānubhavasamādito hi saṃskāro vāsanā kathyate /
analyzed: artha anubhava sama āditaḥ hi saṃskāraḥ vāsanā kathyate

original: sā kathamasadarthapratibhāsahetuḥ syāt //
analyzed: sā katham asat artha pratibhāsa hetuḥ syāt

original: bhavatvanyā vā bhavadabhimatā kācana vāsanāsā 'pi tvasattvāviśeṣe kimiti rajatamati mupajanayatina gagananalinapratītimiti kutastyo niyamaḥ tadalamanayā nātyantamasato 'rthasya sāmarthyamavakalpate /
analyzed: bhavatu anyā vā bhavat abhimatā kācana tu a sattva aviśeṣe kim iti rajata mati m upajanayati na gagana nalina pratītim iti kutastyaḥ niyamaḥ tat alam anayā na atyantam asataḥ rthasya sāmarthyam avakalpate

original: vyavahāradhuraṃ bodumiyatīmanupaplutām //89//
analyzed: vyavahāra dhuram bodum iyatīm anupaplutām

original: api ca sattvena pratibhātīti asatkhyātirapi na viparītakhyātimativartate //
analyzed: api ca sattvena pratibhāti iti asat khyātiḥ api na viparīta khyātim ativartate

original: tasmādvaramātmakhyātirastu vijñānameva khalvetat gṛhṇātyātmānamātmanā /
analyzed: tasmāt varam ātma khyātiḥ astu vijñānam eva khalu etat gṛhṇāti ātmānam ātmanā

original: bahirnirūpyamāṇasya grāhyasyānupapattitaḥ //90//
analyzed: bahis nirūpyamāṇasya grāhyasya anupapattitaḥ

original: buddhiḥ prakāśamānā ca tena tenātmanā bahiḥ /
analyzed: buddhiḥ prakāśamānā ca tena tena ātmanā bahis

original: udvahatyarthaśūnyāṃpi lokayātrāmihedṛśīm //91//
analyzed: udvahati artha śūnyāṃ api lokayātrām iha īdṛśīm

original: ucyatenātmakhyātirapi yuktimatī /
analyzed: ucyate na ātma khyātiḥ api yuktimatī

original: vijñānātmano hi pratibhāse [ahaṃ rajatam] iti pratītiḥ syātna [idaṃ rajatam] iti /
analyzed: vijñāna ātmanaḥ hi pratibhāse aham rajatam iti pratītiḥ syāt na idam rajatam iti

original: kiñca[yadantarjñeyarūpaṃ hi bahirvadavabhāsate] ityabhupagamādiyamapi viparītakhyātireva syāt /
analyzed: kiñca yat antar jñeya rūpam hi bahis vat avabhāsate iti abhupagamāt iyam api viparīta khyātiḥ eva syāt

original: asatkhyātirapi ceyaṃ bhavatyevabahirbuddherasattvāt /
analyzed: asat khyātiḥ api ca iyam bhavati eva bahis buddheḥ asattvāt

original: buddhirastyeveti cetbahiṣṭvaṃ tarhi cintyaṃsat asadvā iti /
analyzed: buddhiḥ asti evā iti ced bahiṣṭvam tarhi cintyam sat asat vā iti

original: na tāvat satbuddherbāhyatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: na tāvat sat buddheḥ bāhya tva abhāvāt

original: asattve tvasatkhyātirityuktam //
analyzed: asattve tu asat khyātiḥ iti uktam

original: tasmāt khyātitraye 'pyasmin anyo 'nyānupraveśini /
analyzed: tasmāt khyāti traye pi asmin anyaḥ nya anupraveśini

original: yuktathā virudhyamāne ca śreyasyakhyātireva sā //91//
analyzed: virudhyamāne ca śreyasi akhyātiḥ eva sā

original: khyātitrayavādibhirapi ceyamapratyākhyeyā nūnamakhyātiḥ /
analyzed: khyāti traya vādibhiḥ api ca iyam apratyākhyeyā nūnam akhyātiḥ

original: ātmakhyātau tāvat ātmatayā vijñānasya khyātirnāstivicchedapratibhāsādityuktatvāt //
analyzed: ātma khyātau tāvat ātma tayā vijñānasya khyātiḥ nāsti viccheda pratibhāsāt iti ukta tvāt

original: asatkhyātāvapi asattvarmathasya naiva pratibhāsatepravṛttyādivyavahārocchedaprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: asat khyātau api asat tvarmathasya nā eva pratibhāsate pravṛtti ādi vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt

original: viparītakhyātāvapi rajatasya sannihitasya jñānajanakatvam ajanakasya ca pratibhāso neṣyata eva /
analyzed: viparīta khyātau api rajatasya sannihitasya jñāna janaka tvam ajanakasya ca pratibhāsaḥ na iṣyate eva

original: ataḥ tatra rajarajatasmṛtyupasthāpitaṃ rajatamavagatijanakamupagatam /
analyzed: atas tatra raja rajata smṛti upasthāpitam rajatam avagati janakam upagatam

original: ataśca rajatasmṛtiraparihāryā /
analyzed: atas ca rajata smṛtiḥ aparihāryā

original: sā ca rajatasmṛtirna tadā svena rūpeṇa prakāśate[smarāmi] iti pratyayābhāvāt //
analyzed: sā ca rajata smṛtiḥ na tadā svena rūpeṇa prakāśate smarāmi iti pratyaya abhāvāt

original: tasmāt pramuṣitāmenāṃ smṛtimicchanti tārkiṃkāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt pramuṣitām enām smṛtim icchanti tārkiṃkāḥ

original: abhyaste viṣaye liṅgapratibandhasmṛtiṃ yathā //93//
analyzed: abhyaste viṣaye liṅga pratibandha smṛtim yathā

original: so 'yaṃ smṛtipramoṣaḥ tattvāgrahaṇaṃ akhyātirucyate //
analyzed: saḥ yam smṛti pramoṣaḥ tattva agrahaṇam akhyātiḥ ucyate

original: evaṃ satīyamakhyātiriṣyate sarvavādimiḥ /
analyzed: evam satī iyam akhyātiḥ iṣyate sarva vādimiḥ

original: tathā prakaṭayadbhistu pītaṃ prābhākarairyaśaḥ //94//
analyzed: tathā prakaṭayadbhiḥ tu pītam prābhākaraiḥ yaśaḥ

original: nanurajatamiti smṛteḥ svarūpollekho mā bhūtidamityatra puro 'vasthitadharmiprītabhāsāt kathamakhyātiḥ /
analyzed: nanu rajatam iti smṛteḥ svarūpa ullekhaḥ mā bhūti dam iti atra puras katham akhyātiḥ

original: ucyate puro 'vasthitadharmo śuktikeyamiti spaṣṭatayā gṛhyatetathācābhyupagame bhramābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: ucyate puras vasthita dharmaḥ śuktikeyam iti spaṣṭa tayā gṛhyate tathā ca abhyupagame bhrama abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: kintu tejasvitādiviparītaṃ dharmimātramavabhāsate /
analyzed: kintu tejasvi tā ādi viparītam dharmi mātram avabhāsate

original: dharmasārupyācca tadānīṃ rajataṃ smaryate /
analyzed: dharma sārupyāt ca tadānīm rajatam smaryate

original: te ete grahaṇasmaraṇe vivikte api viviktatayā na gṛhyete iti vivekāgrahaṇamakhyātiḥ na tu sarveṇa sarvātmanā 'pratipattireva /
analyzed: te ete grahaṇa smaraṇe vivikte api vivikta tayā na gṛhyete iti viveka agrahaṇam akhyātiḥ na tu sarveṇa sarva ātmanā pratipattiḥ eva

original: vyadhikaraṇayośca grahaṇasmaraṇayorvaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ cenna gṛhītaṃkimanyadastu sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
analyzed: vyadhikaraṇayoḥ ca grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ vaiyadhikaraṇyam ced na gṛhītam kim anyat astu sāmānādhikaraṇyam

original: na tu yadevedamtadeva rajataprati sāmānādhikaraṇyena grahaṇamasti /
analyzed: na tu yat eva idam tat eva rajata prati sāmānādhikaraṇyena grahaṇam asti

original: sā hi viparītakhyātireva syātvaiyyadhikaraṇyānupagrahyadeva pramātuḥ pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: sā hi viparīta khyātiḥ eva syāt vaiyyadhikaraṇya an upagrahyat eva pramātuḥ pravṛttiḥ

original: avivekātsādhāraṇyabhimānena pravṛttiriti phalata iyaṃ vicoyuktiḥ //
analyzed: avivekāt sādhāraṇī abhimānena pravṛttiḥ iti phalatas iyam vicoyuktiḥ

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyena kecittatpṛṣṭhabhāvinam /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyena kecid tad pṛṣṭha bhāvinam

original: parāmarśamapīcchanti tanna śradvadhmahe vayam //95//
analyzed: parāmarśam api icchanti tat na śradvadhmahe vayam

original: akhyātipakṣa evaṃ hi hīyetaikatvavedanāt /
analyzed: akhyāti pakṣaḥ evam hi hīyeta eka tva vedanāt

original: !vakraiśca vitathākhyātiḥ akṣaraiḥ kathitā bhavet //96//
analyzed: vakraiḥ ca vitatha ākhyātiḥ akṣaraiḥ kathitā bhavet

original: nanuevamakhyātipakṣe pratiṣṭhāpyamāne [nedaṃ rajatam] iti pūrvāvagatarajatapratiṣedhabodhī bādhakapratyayo dṛśyamānaḥ kathaṃ samarthayiṣyate apratītijño devānāṃ priyaḥ /
analyzed: nanu evam akhyāti pakṣe pratiṣṭhāpyamāne na idam rajatam iti pūrva avagata rajata pratiṣedha bodhī bādhaka pratyayaḥ dṛśyamānaḥ katham samarthayiṣyate apratīti jñaḥ devānām priyaḥ

original: na hyanena rajataniṣedho vidhīyate kintu prāgagṛhīto vivekaḥ prakhyāpyate /
analyzed: na hi anena rajata niṣedhaḥ vidhīyate kintu prāk agṛhītaḥ vivekaḥ prakhyāpyate

original: na idaṃ rajataṃ yadevedaṃtadeva rajatamityetanna idamidaṃ rajataṃ iti //
analyzed: na idam rajatam yat eva idam tat eva rajatam iti etat naḥ idam idam rajatam iti

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati idamanyatrajatamanyaditi so 'yaṃ vivekaḥ khyāpito bhavati //
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati idam anyatra jatam anyat iti saḥ yam vivekaḥ khyāpitaḥ bhavati

original: nanuevaṃ[idaṃ rajatam] ityādau smaraṇānubhavayor bhavatu vivekāgrahaṇam svapne tu kathametadbhaviṣyate /
analyzed: nanu evam idam rajatam ityādau smaraṇa anubhavayoḥ bhavatu viveka agrahaṇam svapne tu katham etat bhaviṣyate

original: bhīrokiṃ jātaṃ svapne vivekena na gṛhyete smaraṇānubhavau kvacit /
analyzed: jātam svapne vivekena na gṛhyete smaraṇa anubhavau kvacid

original: svapne tu smṛtirevaikā tathātmena na gṛhyate //97//
analyzed: svapne tu smṛtiḥ evā ekā tathā ātmena na gṛhyate

original: sadṛśadarśanādvinā smṛtireva kutastyeti cetnanānākāraṇakatvātsmaraṇasya nidrākaṣayitumapyantaḥkaraṇaṃ smaraṇakāraṇaṃ bhavatyeva //
analyzed: sadṛśa darśanāt vinā smṛtiḥ eva kutastyā iti cetna nānā kāraṇaka tvāt smaraṇasya nidrā kaṣayitum api antaḥkaraṇam smaraṇa kāraṇam bhavati eva

original: yadyevaṃ dvicandratiktaśarkarādipratyayeṣu kathaṃ svṛtipramoṣaḥ āḥ kuṇḍaśekharakathamasakṛdabhihitamapi na budhyase na sarvatra smṛtereva pramoṣo 'bhyupagamyate /
analyzed: yadi evam dvi candra tikta śarkarā ādi pratyayeṣu katham svṛti pramoṣaḥ āḥ kuṇḍaśekhara katham asakṛt abhihitam api na budhyase na sarvatra smṛteḥ eva pramoṣaḥ bhyupagamyate

original: kintvakhyātiḥataścāsau kathañcitkasyacitkvacit //98//
analyzed: kintu akhyātiḥ atas ca asau kathañcid kasyacid kvacid

original: bhavatianubhavasmṛtyorvivekāgrahaṇaṃ kvacit /
analyzed: bhavati anubhava smṛtyoḥ viveka agrahaṇam kvacid

original: kvacittu smaryamāṇasya tathātvenānupagrahaḥ //99//
analyzed: kvacid tu smaryamāṇasya tathātvena anupagrahaḥ

original: dvidhā kṛtā kvacidvattirnetrasya timirādinā /
analyzed: dvidhā kṛtā kvacid vattiḥ netrasya timira ādinā

original: na hi grahītumaikyena śaknoti śiśiratviṣam //100//
analyzed: na hi grahītum aikyena śaknoti śiśira tviṣam

original: kvacidrasanasaṃpṛkte pitte tiktatvavedanāt /
analyzed: kvacid rasana saṃpṛkte pitte tikta tva vedanāt

original: paricchettuṃ na śaknoti mādhuryaṃ śarkarāgatam //101//
analyzed: paricchettum na śaknoti mādhuryam śarkarā gatam

original: gṛhṇāti yat tu tiktatvaṃ vastutaḥ pittavarti tat /
analyzed: gṛhṇāti yat tu tikta tvam vastutas pitta varti tat

original: tathā tu na vijānāti nigiranneṣa śarkarām //102//
analyzed: tathā tu na vijānāti nigiran eṣa śarkarām

original: etena pītaśaṅkhādikhyātayo 'pi vyākhyātāḥ //
analyzed: etena pītaśaṅkha ādi khyātayaḥ pi vyākhyātāḥ

original: tadeṣaṃ sati sarvatra samyagagrahaṇaṃ bharamaḥ /
analyzed: tat eṣam sati sarvatra samyak agrahaṇam

original: !na mithyāpratyayaḥ kaścidasti śaṅkānibandhanam //103//
analyzed: na mithyā pratyayaḥ kaścid asti śaṅkā nibandhanam

original: ajātamithyāśaṅkaśca na saṃvādamapekṣate /
analyzed: ajāta mithyā āśaṅkaḥ ca na saṃvādam apekṣate

original: tasmānna kaścit parataḥ prāmāṇyamadhigacchati //104//
analyzed: tasmāt na kaścid paratas prāmāṇyam adhigacchati

original: evaṃ svataḥ pramāṇatve siddhe vede 'pi sā gatiḥ /
analyzed: evam svatas pramāṇa tve siddhe vede pi sā gatiḥ

original: apavādadvayabhāvaḥ vaktavyaścātra pūrvavat //105//
analyzed: apavāda dvaya bhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ ca atra pūrvavat

original: atra pratividhīyate /
analyzed: atra pratividhīyate

original: yaduktaṃidaṃ rajatamitismaraṇānubhavasvabhāve vivekenāgṛhyamāṇe dve ete jñāne ititadasāṃpratam pratyabhijñāvadekatvenaiva saṃvedyamānatvāt /
analyzed: yat uktam idam rajatam iti smaraṇa anubhava svabhāve vivekena agṛhyamāṇe dve ete jñāne iti tat asāṃpratam pratyabhijñā vat eka tvena eva saṃvedyamāna tvāt

original: yadevedaṃ puro 'vasthitaṃ bhāsvararūpādyadhikaraṇaṃ dharmisāmānyaṃtadeva rajatamiti viśeṣataḥ pratipādyate yadidamagrataḥ sthitaṃ k tadrajatamiti satyarajatapratītiva /
analyzed: yat eva idam puras bhāsvara rūpa ādi adhikaraṇam dharmi sāmānyam tat eva rajatam iti viśeṣataḥ pratipādyate yat idam agratas sthitam tat rajatam iti satya rajata pratīti va

original: anubhūtatayā hi na rajatamatra prakāśatekintvanubhūyamānatayā /
analyzed: anubhūta tayā hi na rajatam atra prakāśate kintu anubhūyamāna tayā

original: anubhūtatāgrahaṇaṃ ca smaraṇamucyatenānubhūyamānatāgrahaṇam //
analyzed: anubhūta tā grahaṇam ca smaraṇam ucyate na anubhūyamāna tā grahaṇam

original: svaprakāśā ca saṃvittiriti bhavatāṃ darśanam /
analyzed: sva prakāśā ca saṃvittiḥ iti bhavatām darśanam

original: tatraiṣāṃ rajataviṣayollekhāt /
analyzed: tatra eṣām rajata viṣaya ullekhāt

original: smaranānubhavaviśeṣarihitāyāśca viṣayasaṃvitteranupapatteḥ /
analyzed: smaranā anubhava viśeṣa rihitāyāḥ ca viṣaya saṃvitteḥ anupapatteḥ

original: na ceyamapratipattireveti vaktumucitam madamūrchādidaśāvisadṛśasvaprakāśasaṃvedanānubhavāt /
analyzed: na ca iyam apratipattiḥ evā iti vaktum ucitam mada mūrchā ādi daśā vi sadṛśa sva prakāśa saṃvedana anubhavāt

original: yathā idamityaṃśe svaprakāśaṃ saṃvedanaṃtathaiva rajatamityatrāpi //
analyzed: yathā idam iti aṃśe sva prakāśam saṃvedanam tathā eva rajatam iti atra api

original: api ca dvayoścāṃśayoḥ samāne saṃvedane tatraikaṃ pratyakṣalabdhaṃ aparaṃ smaraṇaphalamiti kutastyo vibhāgaḥ idamityatra ca kimavabhāsata iti nirūpyatām /
analyzed: api ca dvayoḥ ca aṃśayoḥ samāne saṃvedane tatra ekam pratyakṣa labdham aparam smaraṇa phalam iti kutastyaḥ vibhāgaḥ idam iti atra ca kim avabhāsate iti nirūpyatām

original: yadi śuktikāśakalaṃsakalasvagataviśeṣakhacitamavabhātitadā taddarśane sati rajatasmaraṇasya ko 'vasaraḥ bhavadapi vā sādṛśyakṛtaṃ smaraṇaṃ na tadavivekāya kalpate devadattadarśanānantarodgatatatsadṛśapuruṣāntarasmaraṇavat //
analyzed: yadi śuktikā śakalam sakala svagata viśeṣa khacitam avabhāti tadā tad darśane sati rajata smaraṇasya kaḥ vasaraḥ bhavat api vā sādṛśya kṛtam smaraṇam na tat avivekāya kalpate devadatta darśana anantara udgata tad sadṛśa puruṣa antara smaraṇa vat

original: atha dharmimātraṃ idamitipratyaye pratibhātina śuktiśakalaṃ tadvāḍhamiṣyate /
analyzed: atha dharmi mātram idam iti pratyaye śuktiśakalam tat vāḍham iṣyate

original: tadeva cedaṃ sāmānyadharmagrahaṇavaśaviruddhasaṃskāropanibandhanaviruddhaviśeṣasmaraṇakāraṇakaṃ idaṃ rajatamiti sāmānyopakrame viśeṣaparyavasānaṃ jñānam yadidaṃ tatgajatamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyāvamarśāt /
analyzed: tat eva ca idam sāmānya dharma grahaṇa vaśa viruddha saṃskāra upanibandhana viruddha viśeṣa smaraṇa kāraṇakam idam rajatam iti sāmānya upakrame viśeṣa paryavasānam jñānam yat idam tat gajatam iti sāmānādhikaraṇya avamarśāt

original: rajatānubhavābhimānenaiva ca rajatārthī tatra pravartate //
analyzed: rajata anubhava abhimānena eva ca rajata arthī tatra pravartate

original: nanusmaraṇānubhavayorvivekamapratipadyamānaḥ pravartata ityuktam śrutamidamyadatra bhavadbhiḥ dharmakīrtigṛhādādṛtam [dṛśyavikalpāvarthavekīkṛtya pravartate] iti //
analyzed: nanu smaraṇa anubhavayoḥ vivekam apratipadyamānaḥ pravartate iti uktam śrutam idam yat atra bhavadbhiḥ dharma kīrti gṛhāt ādṛtam dṛśya vikalpau artha vekīkṛtya pravartate iti

original: kiñ ca cauryamapīdaṃ na kathañcana svārthaṃ puṣṇāti /
analyzed: kim ca cauryam api idam na kathañcana sva artham puṣṇāti

original: yāvaddhi [dṛśyaṃ gṛhītam] iti na jātaḥ pratyayaḥtāvat kathaṃ dṛśyārthinastatra pravṛtiḥ /
analyzed: yāvat hi dṛśyam gṛhītam iti na jātaḥ pratyayaḥ tāvat katham dṛśya arthinaḥ tatra pravṛtiḥ

original: evamihāpi yāvat [rajataṃ gṛhītam] iti na jātaḥ pratyayaḥtāvat kutastadarthināṃ pravṛttiḥ tasmādasti rajatagrahaṇam na tu tatsvaraṇapramoṣamātram //
analyzed: evam iha api yāvat rajatam gṛhītam iti na jātaḥ pratyayaḥ tāvat kutas tad arthinām pravṛttiḥ tasmāt asti rajata grahaṇam na tu tad svaraṇa pramoṣa mātram

original: nanu rajatasmaraṇaṃ viparītakhyātivādibhirapyaṅgīkṛtamityuktam /
analyzed: nanu rajata smaraṇam viparīta khyāti vādibhiḥ api aṅgīkṛtam iti uktam

original: satyam rajatagataviśeṣasmaraṇamabhyupagatam /
analyzed: satyam rajata gata viśeṣa smaraṇam abhyupagatam

original: yathā hi puro 'vasthite dharmiṇyūrdhvatvādisādhāraṇadharmagrahaṇāt sthāṇupuruṣagataviśeṣāgrahaṇādubhayaviśeṣasmṛteḥ samśayo bhavatievamihāpi tejasvitādisāmānyadharmagrahaṇādviśeṣāgrahaṇāt rajatagataviśeṣasmṛteśca tasmin dharmiṇi rajatapratyayo bhavati viparyayātmakaḥ /
analyzed: yathā hi puras vasthite dharmiṇi ūrdhva tva ādi sādhāraṇa dharma grahaṇāt sthāṇu puruṣa gata viśeṣa agrahaṇāt ubhaya viśeṣa smṛteḥ samśayaḥ bhavati evam iha api tejasvi tā ādi sāmānya dharma grahaṇāt viśeṣa agrahaṇāt rajata gata viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca tasmin dharmiṇi rajata pratyayaḥ bhavati viparyaya ātmakaḥ

original: saṃśaye hyubhayaviśeṣasmaraṇaṃ kāraṇam iha tvanyataraviśeṣasmaraṇamiti viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: saṃśaye hi ubhaya viśeṣa smaraṇam kāraṇam iha tu anyatara viśeṣa smaraṇam iti viśeṣaḥ

original: ata eva cāgṛhītarajatasyedaṃ jñānaṃ notpadyatesadṛśāgrahaṇe vā niśīthādāviti //
analyzed: atas eva ca agṛhīta rajatasya idam jñānam na utpadyate sadṛśa agrahaṇe vā niśītha ādau iti

original: na tvetāvatā smaraṇamātramevedamitīyati sthātavyam smaraṇajanyasya viparyayapratyayasyāpi saṃvedanāt /
analyzed: na tu etāvatā smaraṇa mātram evā idam iti iyati sthātavyam smaraṇa janyasya viparyaya pratyayasya api saṃvedanāt

original: ata eva tatpṛṣṭabhāviparāmarśavādino varaṃ satyavācaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva tad pṛṣṭa bhāvi parāmarśa vādinaḥ varam satya vācaḥ

original: te hi pratibhāsaṃ na nihnuvate //
analyzed: te hi pratibhāsam na nihnuvate

original: yat tu viparyayāvagateḥ kāraṇaṃ vikalpitamtatroktameva prāmāṇikaiḥ [kāryaṃ cedavagamyeta kiṃ kāraṇaparīkṣayā kāryaṃ cennāvagamyeta kiṃ kāraṇaparīkṣayā] iti //
analyzed: yat tu viparyaya avagateḥ kāraṇam vikalpitam tatra uktam eva prāmāṇikaiḥ kāryam ced avagamyeta kim kāraṇa parīkṣayā kāryam ced na avagamyeta kim kāraṇa parīkṣayā iti

original: kāryākasmikatā 'nupapatteśca kalpyatāṃ kāraṇam /
analyzed: kārya ākasmika tā anupapatteḥ ca kalpyatām kāraṇam

original: tacca k¬ptameva doṣasahitamindriyamyathā saṃskārasahakāri pratyabhijñāyāmiti //
analyzed: tat ca kptam eva doṣa sahitam indriyam yathā saṃskāra sahakāri pratyabhijñāyām iti

original: suvate śālayo duṣṭā na yadyapi yavāṅkuram /
analyzed: suvate śālayaḥ duṣṭāḥ na yadi api yava aṅkuram

original: śālikāryaṃ tvapūpādi janayantyeva kalmaṣam //106//
analyzed: śāli kāryam tu apūpa ādi janayanti eva kalmaṣam

original: tasmāddoṣakalitādinriyāt puro 'vasthitadharmigatatrikoṇatvādiviśeṣāvamarśakauśalaśūnyāt sāmānyadharmasahacaritapadārthāntaragataviśeṣasmaraṇopakṛtādbhavati viparītapratyayaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt doṣa kalita ādi nriyāt puras vasthita dharmi gata trikoṇa tva ādi viśeṣa avamarśa kauśala śūnyāt sāmānya dharma sahacarita padārtha antara gata viśeṣa smaraṇa upakṛtāt bhavati viparīta pratyayaḥ

original: samyajjñānāpekṣayā ca tadduṣṭamucyate /
analyzed: samyak jñāna apekṣayā ca tat duṣṭam ucyate

original: svakārye tu viparyayajñāne tatkāraṇameva na duṣṭam /
analyzed: sva kārye tu viparyaya jñāne tad kāraṇam eva na duṣṭam

original: tasmāt rajatamityanubhava evana pramuṣitasmṛtiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt rajatam iti anubhavaḥ pramuṣita smṛtiḥ

original: api canedaṃ rajatamiti bādhakajñānaṃ pūrvānubhavaviṣayīkṛtarajataniṣedhamadhigamayadutpadyate /
analyzed: api cana idam rajatam iti bādhaka jñānam pūrva anubhava viṣayīkṛta rajata niṣedham adhigamayat utpadyate

original: nedaṃ rajatamiti [yadahamadrākṣaṃ tadrajataṃ na bhavati] iti /
analyzed: na idam rajatam iti yat aham adrākṣam tat rajatam na bhavati iti

original: prasaktasya cāyaṃ viṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: prasaktasya ca ayam viṣedhaḥ

original: ananubhūtaṃ tvaprasakṣamapi pratiṣidhyamānaṃrajatamiva kanakamapi kimiti na pratiṣidhyate yat tu vyākhyātamprāganavagatasmaraṇānubhavavivekapratipādakaṃ bādhakajñānamititat vyākhyānamātramevatathā 'nanubhavāt /
analyzed: ananubhūtam tu aprasakṣam api pratiṣidhyamānam rajatam iva kanakam api kim iti na pratiṣidhyate yat tu vyākhyātam prāk anavagata smaraṇa anubhava viveka pratipādakam bādhaka jñānam iti tat vyākhyāna mātram eva tathā nanubhavāt

original: na hyevaṃ bādhakamutpadyate [yadaviviktaṃ tadviviktaṃ] iti /
analyzed: na hi evam bādhakam utpadyate yat aviviktam tat viviktam iti

original: ato yatkiñcidetat /
analyzed: atas yat kiñcid etat

original: tasmānna rajatasmaraṇaṃrajate vā kadācidanubhavo 'bhūditi smaraṇamabhidhīyamānaṃ nātyantamalaukikam //
analyzed: tasmāt na rajata smaraṇam rajate vā kadācid anubhavaḥ bhūt iti smaraṇam abhidhīyamānam na atyantam alaukikam

original: svapne tu svaśiracchedādeḥ atyantānanubhūtasya smṛtiriti kathyamānameva trapākaram /
analyzed: svapne tu sva śira cheda ādeḥ atyanta ananubhūtasya smṛtiḥ iti kathyamānam eva trapā karam

original: janmāntare nijamastakalavanamanubhūtamaneneti cetidamapi subhāṣitataramyat janmāntarānubhūtaṃ smarayate /
analyzed: janmāntare nija mastaka lavanam anubhūtam anena iti ca iti idam api subhāṣitataram yat janma antara anubhūtam smarayate

original: tatra ca kutastya eṣa niyamaḥyata kadācideva smaryatena sarvadā sarvamiti //
analyzed: tatra ca kutastyaḥ eṣa niyamaḥ kadācid eva smaryate na sarvadā sarvam iti

original: nanubhavatā 'pi asatkhyātiṃ nirasyatā svapnajñāneṣu tādṛkṣu kiṃ vaktam yadvaktavyaṃtat tatraiva śroṣyasi/
analyzed: nanu bhavatā asat khyātim nirasyatā svapna jñāneṣu tādṛkṣu kim vaktam yat vaktavyam tat tatra eva śroṣyasi

original: asanna pratibhātītyucyatena tvananubhūtamiti //
analyzed: asat na pratibhāti iti ucyate na tu ananubhūtam iti

original: nanuananubhūtaṃ sat kathaṃ jānīṣe saditi cet jjānaṃ tadanubhūtamitimaivammayā tannānubhūtaṃanyenānubhaviṣyate /
analyzed: nanu ananubhūtam sat katham jānīṣe sat iti ced tat anubhūtam iti mā evam mayā tat na anubhūtam anyena anubhaviṣyate

original: parānubhūtaṃ ca saditi śakyate vaktum /
analyzed: para anubhūtam ca sat iti śakyate vaktum

original: parānubhūte tu smaranamaghaṭamānamiti nāvayoratra vastuni samānayogakṣematvam //
analyzed: para anubhūte tu smaranam aghaṭamānam iti na āvayoḥ atra vastuni samāna yogakṣema tvam

original: api ca bhavanmate svapnasmṛteḥ smṛtitvenāgrahaṇekena rūpeṇa grahaṇamiti cintyam /
analyzed: api ca bhavat mate svapna smṛteḥ smṛti tvena agrahaṇa ikena rūpeṇa grahaṇam iti cintyam

original: rūpāntareṇa grahaṇe viparītakhyātiḥ /
analyzed: rūpa antareṇa grahaṇe viparīta khyātiḥ

original: sarvātmanā tvagrahaṇe svapnasuṣuptyoraviśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: sarvātmanā tu agrahaṇe svapna suṣuptyoḥ aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ

original: anubhavapratyayaśca svapne saṃvedyatena smaraṇānullekhamātramiti durabhinitreśa eva smṛtipramoṣasamarthanaṃ nāmeti //
analyzed: anubhava pratyayaḥ ca svapne smaraṇa an ullekha mātram iti eva smṛti pramoṣa samarthanam nāma iti

original: dvicandrādipratyayeṣu kathamakhyātiḥ nanu uktaṃtimirasimantitā nayanavṛttiḥ ekatvena gṛhītuṃ na śaknoti śaśāṅkaṃiti /
analyzed: dvi candra ādi pratyayeṣu katham akhyātiḥ nanu nayana vṛttiḥ ekatvena gṛhītum na śaknoti śaśāṅkam iti

original: bhoḥ śrotriyatādṛśī dṛśo vṛttiḥ ekatvamindormā grahīt dvitvānubhavaṃ tu bhāntaṃ kva pracchādayāmaḥ //
analyzed: bhoḥ śrotriya tādṛśī dṛśaḥ vṛttiḥ eka tvam indoḥ mā grahīt dvi tva anubhavam tu bhāntam kva pracchādayāmaḥ

original: nanu cakṣurvṛttau taddvitvaṃtadgatatvena tu yattasyāgrahaṇaṃ sa eva bhramaḥnaitadevamnetravṛtteḥ sarvatra parokṣatvāt //
analyzed: nanu cakṣuḥ vṛttau tad dvi tvam tad gata tvena tu yat tasya agrahaṇam saḥ eva bhramaḥ na etat evam netra vṛtteḥ sarvatra parokṣa tvāt

original: kimekacandrabodhe 'pi vṛttyekatvaṃ pratīyate iyaṃ hyagṛhyamāṇaiva cakṣurvṛttiḥ prakāśikā //107//
analyzed: kim eka candra bodhe vṛtti eka tvam pratīyate iyam hi agṛhyamāṇā eva cakṣuḥ vṛttiḥ prakāśikā

original: evamucyamāne ca ekacandragrahaṇe 'pi vṛttyekatvāgrahaṇādakhyātireva bhavet //
analyzed: evam ucyamāne ca eka candra grahaṇe vṛtti eka tva agrahaṇāt akhyātiḥ eva bhavet

original: yadapitiktaśarkarādipratyayeṣvakhyātisamarthanakadāśayā pittavṛttestiktatvasya saṃvedyamānasya tatsthatvenāgrahaṇamupavarṇitamtadapi kuśakāśāvalambanaprāyam //
analyzed: yat api tikta śarkarā ādi pratyayeṣu akhyāti samarthanaka dāśayā pitta vṛtteḥ tikta tvasya saṃvedyamānasya tad stha tvena agrahaṇam upavarṇitam tat api kuśa kāśa avalambana prāyam

original: mohāt pittagatatvena tiktatā cenna gṛhyate /
analyzed: mohāt pitta gata tvena tikta tā ced na gṛhyate

original: mā grāhiśarkarāyāṃ tu kiṃkṛtā tiktatamatiḥ //108//
analyzed: mā grāhiśarkarāyām tu kiṃkṛtā

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyena hi [tiktā śarkarā] iti tadadhikaraṇā tiktatāpratītirupajāyate /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyena hi tiktā śarkarā iti tad adhikaraṇā tikta tā pratītiḥ upajāyate

original: pittaṃ tvindriyasthaṃ timiravadagrhyamāṇamapi bhramamupajanayatiśarīrasthamiva jvaraṃ śiro 'rtyāṃdirogamityalaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: pittam tu indriya stham timira vat agrhyamāṇam api bhramam upajanayati śarīra stham iva jvaram śiraḥ rtyāṃdi rogam iti alam prasaṅgena

original: evaṃ sarvatra nākhyātirnirvahantīva lakṣyate /
analyzed: evam sarvatra nā akhyātiḥ nirvahantī iva lakṣyate

original: na caitayā 'pi parataḥprāmāṇyamupahanyate //109//
analyzed: na ca etayā pi paratas prāmāṇyam upahanyate

original: rajate 'nubhavaḥ kiṃ syāt uta pramuṣitā matiḥ dvaividhyadarśanādevaṃ bhavettatrāpi saṃśayah //110//
analyzed: rajate nubhavaḥ kim syāt uta pramuṣitā matiḥ dvaividhya darśanāt evam bhavet tatra api saṃśayaḥ

original: saṃśayānaśca saṃvādaṃ nūnamanveṣate janaḥ /
analyzed: saṃśayānaḥ ca saṃvādam nūnam anveṣate janaḥ

original: tadapekṣākṛtaṃ tasmāt prāmāṇyaṃ parato dhruvam //111//
analyzed: tad apekṣā kṛtam tasmāt prāmāṇyam paratas dhruvam

original: na caiṣa śūnyavādasya pratīkārakriyākramaḥ /
analyzed: na ca eṣa śūnyavādasya pratīkāra kriyā kramaḥ

original: anarthajā hi nirdagdhapitrādau bhavati smṛtiḥ //112//
analyzed: anartha jā hi nirdagdha pitṛ ādau bhavati smṛtiḥ

original: dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya tāmeva śūnyavādī samutthitaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya tām eva śūnyavādī samutthitaḥ

original: bhramāpahnavamātreṇa pratihantuṃ na śakyate //113//
analyzed: bhrama apahnava mātreṇa pratihantum na śakyate

original: athāsti kācitparataḥ prāmāṇyasya niṣedhikā /
analyzed: atha asti kācid paratas prāmāṇyasya niṣedhikā

original: śūnyavādasya yā yuktiḥ saiva vācyā kimetayā //114//
analyzed: śūnyavādasya yā yuktiḥ sā eva vācyā kim etayā

original: tasmādyatharthamasyāḥ saṃśrayaṇaṃ tanna niṣiddhamakhyāteḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yathartham asyāḥ saṃśrayaṇam tat na niṣiddham akhyāteḥ

original: saṃvidvirodha eva prakaṭita iti dhik pramāditvam //115//
analyzed: saṃvid virodhaḥ eva prakaṭitaḥ iti dhik pramādi tvam

original: taduktam [kṛtaśca śīlavidhvaṃsaḥ na cānaṅgaśca saṅgataḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam kṛtaḥ ca śīla vidhvaṃsaḥ na ca anaṅgaḥ ca saṅgataḥ

original: ātmā ca lāghavaṃ nītaḥ tacca kāryaṃ na sādhitam] iti //
analyzed: ātmā ca lāghavam nītaḥ tat ca kāryam na sādhitam iti

original: yatpunarviparītakhyātau pakṣatrayamāśaṅkya dūṣitam tadapi na yuktamastu tāvadayameva ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ [rajatamālambanaṃ tadeva cāsyāṃ pratītau parisphurati] iti //
analyzed: yat punar viparīta khyātau pakṣa trayam āśaṅkya dūṣitam tat api na yuktam astu tāvat ayam eva ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ rajatam ālambanam tat eva ca asyām pratītau parisphurati iti

original: nanuatra coditaṃ [asatkhyātireva sā bhavet] iti naitat sādhu /
analyzed: nanu atra coditam asat khyātiḥ eva sā bhavet iti na etat sādhu

original: deśāntarādau rajatasya vidyamānatvā /
analyzed: deśa antara ādau rajatasya

original: asatkhyātipakṣe hi ekāntāsato 'rthasya pratibhānamaṅgīkiyate /
analyzed: asat khyāti pakṣe hi ekānta asataḥ rthasya pratibhānam aṅgīkiyate

original: iha tu deśāntarādau vidyamānasyeti mahān bhedaḥ //
analyzed: iha tu deśa antara ādau vidyamānasya iti mahān bhedaḥ

original: nanutatrāsato 'rthasya kiṃ deśāntaracintayā kiṃ kurmaḥ tādṛśasyaiva vastunaḥ khyātidarśanāt //116//
analyzed: nanu tatra asataḥ rthasya kim deśa antara cintayā kim kurmaḥ tādṛśasya eva vastunaḥ khyāti darśanāt

original: yastu deśāntare 'pyartho nāsti kālāntare 'pi vā /
analyzed: yaḥ tu deśa antare pi arthaḥ na asti kāla antare vā

original: na tasya grahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ gaganendīvarādivat //117//
analyzed: na tasya grahaṇam dṛṣṭam gagana indīvara ādi vat

original: ayameva ca dvayorasattvayorviśeṣaḥyat ekasya grahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ itarasya na dṛṣṭamiti //
analyzed: ayam eva ca dvayoḥ asattvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ yat ekasya grahaṇam dṛṣṭam itarasya na dṛṣṭam iti

original: nanu uktaṃ tatra asato 'rthasya kathaṃ jñānajanakatvam ajanakasya vā kathaṃ pratibhāsaḥ uktamatra sadṛśapadārthadarśanodbhūtasmṛtyupasthāpitasya rajatasyātra pratibhāsanamiti /
analyzed: nanu uktam tatra asataḥ rthasya katham jñāna janaka tvam ajanakasya vā katham pratibhāsaḥ uktam atra sadṛśa padārtha darśana udbhūta smṛti upasthāpitasya rajatasya atra pratibhāsanam iti

original: na cāsyopasthāpanaṃ paśoriva rajavā saṃyamya ḍhaukanamapi tu hṛdaye parisphurato 'rthasya bahiravabhāsanam /
analyzed: na ca asya upasthāpanam paśoḥ iva rajavā saṃyamya ḍhaukanam api tu hṛdaye parisphurataḥ rthasya bahis avabhāsanam

original: na caitavateyamātmakhyātiḥasatkhyātirveti vaktavyam vijñānāt vicchedapratīteḥatyantāsadarthapratibhāsābhāvācceti //
analyzed: na ca etavatā iyam ātma khyātiḥ asat khyātiḥ vā iti vaktavyam vijñānāt viccheda pratīteḥ atyanta asat artha pratibhāsa abhāvāt ca iti

original: athavā pihitasvakārā parigṛhītaparākārā śuktikaivātra pratibhātīti bhavatu dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ //
analyzed: athavā pihita svakārā parigṛhīta para ākārā śuktikā eva atra pratibhāti iti bhavatu dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: nanu uktaṃ kṛtyāsītāvat kimidaṃ veśabhāṣāparivartanam kathaṃ ca rajatajñāne śuktikāvabhāsitumarhatīti śrutamidaṃ nāṭakamna tu vayamatropahāsapātram /
analyzed: nanu uktam kṛtyā sītā vat kim idam veśa bhāṣā parivartanam katham ca rajata jñāne śuktikā avabhāsitum arhati iti śrutam idam nāṭakam na tu vayam atra upahāsa pātram

original: śuktiketi vastusthitireṣā kathyate /
analyzed: śuktikā iti vastu sthitiḥ eṣā kathyate

original: puro 'vasthitaṃ dharmimātraṃ bhāsvararūpādisādṛśyāpajanitarajataviśeṣasmaraṇamatra pratibhātīti brūmaḥ [yadetatpuraḥ kimapi vartate tadrajatam] ityanubhavāt /
analyzed: puras dharmi mātram bhāsvara rūpa ādi sādṛśya apajanita rajata viśeṣa smaraṇam atra pratibhāti iti brūmaḥ yat etat puras kim api vartate tat rajatam iti anubhavāt

original: vastusthityā tu śuktireva sā trikoṇatvādiviśeṣagrahaṇābhāvācca nigūhitanijākāretyucyate rajataviśeṣasmaraṇācca parigṛhītarajatākāreti //
analyzed: vastu sthityā tu śuktiḥ eva sā trikoṇa tva ādi viśeṣa grahaṇa abhāvāt ca nigūhita nija ākārā iti ucyate rajata viśeṣa smaraṇāt ca parigṛhīta rajata ākārā iti

original: etacca viṣayendriyādidoṣaprabhaveṣu śuktikārajatāvabhāsabhāskarakiraṇajalāvagamajaladagandharvanagaranirvarṇanarajjubhujagagrahaṇarohiṇīramaṇadvayadarśanaśaṅkhaśarkarāpītatiktatāvasāyakeśakūrcakālokanādivibhrameṣvabhyupagamyate /
analyzed: etat ca viṣaya indriya ādi doṣa prabhaveṣu śuktikā rajata avabhāsa bhāskara kiraṇa jala avagama jalada gandharvanagara nirvarṇana rajju bhujaga grahaṇa rohiṇī ramaṇa dvaya darśana śaṅkha śarkarā pīta tikta tā avasāya keśa kūrcaka ālokana ādi vibhrameṣu abhyupagamyate

original: manodoṣanibandhaneṣu tu mithyāpratyayeṣu nirālambaneṣu smṛtyullikhita eva ākāraḥ prakāśata iti //
analyzed: manaḥ doṣa nibandhaneṣu tu mithyā pratyayeṣu nirālambaneṣu smṛti ullikhitaḥ eva ākāraḥ prakāśate iti

original: yastu tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ [anyadālambanaṃanyaśca pratibhāti] iti kaiścidāśritaḥtatrāpi na sannihitasyālambanatvamucyateyena bhūpradeśasyāpi tathātvamāśaṅkyeta //
analyzed: yaḥ tu tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ anyat ālambanam anyaḥ ca pratibhāti iti kaiścid āśritaḥ tatra api na sannihitasya ālambana tvam ucyate yena bhū pradeśasya api tathātvam āśaṅkyeta

original: nāpi janakasyālambanatvamyaccakṣurādāvapi prasajyeta /
analyzed: nā api janakasya ālambana tvam yat cakṣuḥ ādau api prasajyeta

original: kintu idamityaṅgulyā nirdiśyamānaṃ karmatayā yajjñānasya janakaṃ tadālambanamityucyamāne na kaściddoṣaḥ //
analyzed: kintu idam iti aṅgulyā nirdiśyamānam karmatayā yat jñānasya janakam tat ālambanam iti ucyamāne na kaścid doṣaḥ

original: nanukeśoṇḍrakajñāne kimālambanakāraṇam kiñcittu timiraṃ romarājiriva nayanadhāmno madhya evāste /
analyzed: nanu keśoṇḍraka jñāne kim ālambana kāraṇam kiñcid tu timiram romarājiḥ iva nayana dhāmnaḥ madhye eva āste

original: tena dvidhākṛtā nayanavṛttiḥ dvitvena candramasaṃ gṛhṇāti /
analyzed: tena dvidhākṛtā nayana vṛttiḥ dvi tvena candramasam gṛhṇāti

original: kiñcittu timiraṃ tatravivaravadantarā 'ntarā tiṣṭhati cakṣuṣaḥ /
analyzed: kiñcid tu timiram tatra vivara vat antarā ntarā tiṣṭhati cakṣuṣaḥ

original: tena viralaprasṛtā nayanaraśmayaḥ sūkṣmāḥ sūryāṃśubhirupahanyamānāḥ keśakūrcakākārā bhavantīti tadevālambanam /
analyzed: tena virala prasṛtāḥ nayana raśmayaḥ sūkṣmāḥ sūrya aṃśubhiḥ upahanyamānāḥ keśa kūrcaka ākārāḥ bhavanti iti tat eva ālambanam

original: anudite 'stamite vā savitari keśoṇḍrakapratyayasyānutpadāt //
analyzed: an udite stamite vā savitari keśoṇḍraka pratyayasya an utpadāt

original: !gandharvanagarajñāne jaladāḥ pāṇḍuratviṣaḥ /
analyzed: gandharvanagara jñāne jaladāḥ pāṇḍura tviṣaḥ

original: !ālambanaṃ gṛhāṭṭalaprakārākāradhāriṇaḥ //118//
analyzed: ālambanam gṛha aṭṭala prakāra ākāra dhāriṇaḥ

original: tasmāt viparītakhyātau pakṣatrayamapi niravadyam //
analyzed: tasmāt viparīta khyātau pakṣa trayam api niravadyam

original: yaḥ punaḥ itaretarasagkaraḥ khyātīnāmudāhāri tatra ātmakhyātyakhyātī apavargahnike vayamapi vijñānādvaitamapākariṣyantaḥ parākariṣyāma iti kiṃ taccintayā viparītakhyātau tu tatsāṅkaryaṃ parihṛtam //
analyzed: yaḥ punar itaretara sagkaraḥ khyātīnām udāhāri tatra ātma khyāti akhyātī vayam api vijñāna advaitam apākariṣyantaḥ parākariṣyāmaḥ iti kim tad cintayā viparīta khyātau tu tad sāṅkaryam parihṛtam

original: yatpunaravādi [sarvavādibhiḥ smṛtipramoṣo 'bhyupagata eva /
analyzed: yat punar avādi sarva vādibhiḥ smṛti pramoṣaḥ abhyupagataḥ eva

original: prābhākaraistuyabhaḥ pītam] iti tatra vādyantarāṇi tāvat yathā bhavantitathā bhavantu /
analyzed: prābhākaraiḥ tuyabhaḥ pītam iti tatra vādi antarāṇi tāvat yathā bhavanti tathā bhavantu

original: vayaṃ tu smṛtyupārūḍharajatādyākārapratibbhāsamabhivadanto bāḍhaṃ smṛtipramopamabhupagatavantaḥ /
analyzed: vayam tu smṛti upārūḍha rajata ādi ākāra pratibbhāsam abhivadantaḥ bāḍham smṛti pramopam abhupagatavantaḥ

original: kintu na tāvatyeva viśrāmyati matiḥ /
analyzed: kintu na tāvatī eva viśrāmyati matiḥ

original: api tu rajatādyanubhavo 'pi saṃvedyata iti na smṛtipramoṣamātra eva virantavyam /
analyzed: api tu rajata ādi anubhavaḥ saṃvedyate iti na smṛti pramoṣa mātre eva virantavyam

original: ato viparītakhyātipakṣa eva niravadya iti sthitam //
analyzed: atas viparīta khyāti pakṣaḥ eva niravadyaḥ iti sthitam

original: yastu bādhaprakāraḥ prāgvikalpitaḥtatra sahānavasthānasaṃskārocchedādipakṣā anabhyupagamenaiva nirastā ityasthāne kaṇṭhaśoṣa āyuṣmatā 'nubhūtaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu bādha prakāraḥ prāk vikalpitaḥ tatra saha anavasthāna saṃskāra uccheda ādi pakṣāḥ anabhyupagamena eva nirastāḥ iti asthāne kaṇṭha śoṣaḥ āyuṣmatā nubhūtaḥ

original: viṣayāpahārastāvadastu bādhaḥ /
analyzed: viṣaya apahāraḥ tāvat astu bādhaḥ

original: viṣayasya ca na pratibhātatvamapahniyatekintu pratibhātasyāsattvaṃ khyāpyata ityapahārārthaḥ /
analyzed: viṣayasya ca na pratibhāta tvam apahniyate kintu pratibhātasya asattvam khyāpyate iti apahāra arthaḥ

original: asattvamapi nedānīmupanatasya khyāpyateyena pūrvadṛṣṭa drughaṇabhagnakumbhābhāvapratibhāsavadabādhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: asattvam api nā idānīm upanatasya khyāpyate yena syāt

original: na ca tadānīmapyabhāvagrahaṇe vastuno vyātmakatvamāśaṅkanīyam pūrvāvagatākāropamardadvāreṇa bādhakapratyayotpādāt yanmayā tadā rajatamiti gṛhītaṃ tadrajataṃ na bhavatianyadeva tadvastviti //
analyzed: na ca tadānīm api abhāva grahaṇe vastunaḥ vyātmaka tvam āśaṅkanīyam pūrva avagata ākāra upamarda dvāreṇa bādhaka pratyaya utpādāt yat mayā tadā rajatam iti gṛhītam tat rajatam na bhavati anyat eva tat vastu iti

original: nanusvakālaniyatatvāt jñānānāṃ kathamuttarasya jñānasya pūrvajñānotpādakālāvacchinnatadviṣayābhāvagrahaṇasāmarthyam kiṃ kurmaḥ tathā pratyayotpādāt /
analyzed: nanu sva kāla niyata tvāt jñānānām katham uttarasya jñānasya pūrva jñāna utpāda kāla avacchinna tad viṣaya abhāva grahaṇa sāmarthyam kim kurmaḥ tathā pratyaya utpādāt

original: na bhagnaghaṭavadidānīṃ tannāstitā gṛhyateapi tu tadaiva tadasaditi pratītiḥ /
analyzed: na bhagna ghaṭa vat idānīm tat nāstitā gṛhyate api tu tadā eva tat asat iti pratītiḥ

original: yathā ca na vartamānaikaviṣṭhā eva viṣayapratītayastathā kṣanabhaṅgambhṅge vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: yathā ca na vartamāna eka viṣṭhāḥ eva viṣaya pratītayaḥ tathā kṣana bhaṅgambhṅge vakṣyāmaḥ

original: athavā phalāpahāro bhavatu bādhaḥ /
analyzed: athavā phala apahāraḥ bhavatu bādhaḥ

original: pramāṇaphalatvaṃ ca hānādibuddhīnāṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇe varṇitamiti tadapaharaṇāt pramāṇaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavatyeva /
analyzed: pramāṇa phala tvam ca hāna ādi buddhīnām pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe varṇitam iti tad apaharaṇāt pramāṇam bādhitam bhavati eva

original: kiṃkurvatā bādhakena pramāṇaphalamapahṛtamiti cet gāyatā nṛtyatā vā 'pi japatā juhvatā 'pi vā /
analyzed: kiṃkurvatā bādhakena pramāṇa phalam apahṛtam iti ced gāyatā nṛtyatā vā pi japatā juhvatā pi vā

original: tac cet kāryaṃ kṛtaṃ tena kimavāntarakarmaṇā //119//
analyzed: tat ced kāryam kṛtam tena kim avāntarakarmaṇā

original: tadabhyupagame vā 'pi tatkiṃ vidaghatā kṛtam tac ca kiṃ kurvatetyevamavadhiḥ ko bhaviṣyate //120//
analyzed: tad abhyupagame vā tat kim vidaghatā kṛtam tat ca kim kurvatā iti evam avadhiḥ kaḥ bhaviṣyate

original: tadalamamunā 'vāntarapraśnena /
analyzed: tat alam amunā vā antara praśnena

original: sarvathā bādhakapratyayopajanane sati hānādirūpaṃ pūrvapramāṇaphalaṃ vivartata iti tena tadbādhitamucyate //
analyzed: sarvathā bādhaka pratyaya upajanane sati hāna ādi rūpam pūrva pramāṇa phalam vivartate iti tena tat bādhitam ucyate

original: samānāsamānaviṣayavikalpo 'pi na peśalaḥekasmin viṣaye viruddhākāragrāhiṇorjñānayorbādhyabādhakabhāvābhyupagamāt /
analyzed: samāna asamāna viṣaya vikalpaḥ pi na peśalaḥ ekasmin viṣaye viruddha ākāra grāhiṇoḥ jñānayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāva abhyupagamāt

original: citrādipratyaye kathaṃ na bādha iti cet pūrvajñānopamardenottaravedyamānānāmastyeva samāveśaḥ //
analyzed: citra ādi pratyaye katham na bādhaḥ iti ced pūrva jñāna upamardena uttara vedyamānānām asti eva samāveśaḥ

original: pūrvopamardenottaravijñāna janmataśca patadapi pratyuktaṃ bhavati yaduktaṃ [pūrvasmin pratyaye prāptapratiṣṭhe satyāgantu jñānamutaraṃ bādhyatā] itiyataḥ pūrvopamardenaiva taduttaram jñānamudeti viṣayasahāyatvātpramāṇāntarānugṛhyamāṇatvācca uttarameva jñānaṃ bādhakamiti yuktam /
analyzed: pūrva upamardena uttara vijñāna janmataḥ ca patat api pratyuktam bhavati yat uktam pūrvasmin pratyaye prāpta pratiṣṭhe sati āgantu jñānam utaram bādhyate iti yatas pūrva upamardena eva tat uttaram jñānam udeti viṣaya sahāya tvāt pramāṇa antara anugṛhyamāṇa tvāt ca uttaram eva jñānam bādhakam iti yuktam

original: tasmādasti jñānānāṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt asti jñānānām bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ

original: sa cāyaṃ bādhavyavahāro viparītakhyātipakṣa eva sāmarthyamaskhalitaṃ dadhātīti sa eva jyāyān //
analyzed: sa ca ayam bādha vyavahāraḥ viparīta khyāti pakṣe eva sāmarthyam askhalitam dadhāti iti saḥ eva jyāyān

original: ajñaḥ ko 'pi nāma mīmāṃsakastvāhayeyaṃ śuktikāyāṃ rajatapratītirviparītakhyātiriti tadvādināmabhimatāsā tathā na bhavatītisatyarajatapratītivadatrāpyavabhāsyarajatasadbhāvāt /
analyzed: ajñaḥ kaḥ pi nāma mīmāṃsakaḥ tvā aha yā iyam śuktikāyām rajata pratītiḥ viparīta khyātiḥ iti tad vādinām abhimatā asā tathā na bhavati iti satya rajata pratīti vat atra api avabhāsya rajata sadbhāvāt

original: laukikālaukikatve tu viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: laukika alaukika tve tu viśeṣaḥ

original: rajatajñānāvabhāsyaṃ hi rajatamucyatetacca kiñcit vyavahārapravartakaṃkiñcinneti /
analyzed: rajata jñāna avabhāsyam hi rajatam ucyate etat ca kiñcid vyavahāra pravartakam kiñcid na iti

original: tatra vyavahārapravartakaṃ laukikamucyatetato 'nyadalaukikamiti /
analyzed: tatra vyavahāra pravartakam laukikam ucyate tatas nyat alaukikam iti

original: yacca śuktikāśakalamiti bhavanto vadantitadalaukikaṃ rajatam /
analyzed: yat ca śuktikā śakalam iti bhavantaḥ vadanti tat alaukikam rajatam

original: rajatajñānāvabhāsyatvāt rajataṃ tatvyavahārāpravṛtteralaukikamiti //
analyzed: rajata jñāna avabhāsya tvāt rajatam tad vyavahāra apravṛtteḥ alaukikam iti

original: tadetadaparāmṛṣṭasaṃvedanetivṛttasyābhinavapadārthasargaprajāpaterabhidhānam /
analyzed: tat etat aparāmṛṣṭa saṃvedana iti vṛttasya abhinava padārtha sarga prajāpateḥ abhidhānam

original: bādhakapratyayena tatra rajatābhāvasya khyāpanāt /
analyzed: bādhaka pratyayena tatra rajata abhāvasya khyāpanāt

original: nedaṃ rajatamiti hi rajataṃ pratiṣedhatyeṣa pratyayaḥna vidyamānarajatasyālaukikatvamavadyotayati iti //
analyzed: na idam rajatam iti hi rajatam pratiṣedhati eṣa pratyayaḥ na vidyamāna rajatasya alaukika tvam avadyotayati iti

original: atha nedaṃ laukikamiti vyākhyāyate hantavākyaśeṣaḥ kriyatāṃ [saṃyajatrairaṅgāni] itivat /
analyzed: atha na idam laukikam iti vyākhyāyate hanta vākya śeṣaḥ kriyatām saṃyajatraiḥ aṅgāni itivat

original: so 'yaṃ śrotriyaḥ svaśastravartanīmihāpi na tāṃ tyajati na tu tasyā athamavasaraḥ /
analyzed: saḥ yam śrotriyaḥ sva śastra vartanīm iha api na tām tyajati na tu tasyāḥ atham avasaraḥ

original: agṛhyamāṇe tu rajatākhye 'nyadharmiṇi kathaṃ taddharmatvena laukikatvaṃ gṛhyate rajatābhāvagrahaṇetveṣa na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: agṛhyamāṇe tu rajata ākhye nyadharmiṇi katham tad dharma tvena laukika tvam gṛhyate na doṣaḥ

original: bhāvatadabhāvayoḥ dharmadharmibhāvābhāvāt /
analyzed: bhāva tad abhāvayoḥ dharma dharmi bhāva abhāvāt

original: smaryamāṇapratiyogyavacchinno hi abhāvo gṛhyata eva /
analyzed: smaryamāṇa pratiyogi avacchinnaḥ hi abhāvaḥ gṛhyate eva

original: tasmādatra nāstyeva rajataṃna punaralaukikaṃ tadasti //
analyzed: tasmāt atra na asti eva rajatam na punar alaukikam tat asti

original: na ca rajatajñānāvabhāsyatvamātraṃ rajatalakṣaṇam api tu abādhitarejatajñānagamyatvam //
analyzed: na ca rajata jñāna avabhāsya tva mātram rajata lakṣaṇam api tu abādhita rejata jñāna gamya tvam

original: api ca laukikālaukikapravibhāgaḥ pratibhāsanibandhano vā syāt vyavahārasahasadbhāvanibandhano vā na tāvat pratibhāsanibandhanaḥtathā pratītyabhāvāt /
analyzed: api ca laukika alaukika pravibhāgaḥ pratibhāsa nibandhanaḥ vā syāt vyavahāra saha sadbhāva nibandhanaḥ vā na tāvat pratibhāsa nibandhanaḥ tathā pratīti abhāvāt

original: kvaviddhi rajataṃkvacicca tadabhāvaḥ pratīyate na tu laukikatvamalaukikatvaṃ vā //
analyzed: kvavid hi rajatam kvacid ca tad abhāvaḥ pratīyate na tu laukika tvam alaukika tvam vā

original: atha vyavahārapravṛttyapravṛttibhyāṃ laukikālaukikatve vyavasthāpyetetadvaktayvaṃ ko 'yaṃ vyavahāro nāmeti /
analyzed: atha vyavahāra pravṛtti apravṛttibhyām laukika alaukika tve vyavasthāpya ita itad vaktayvam kaḥ yam vyavahāraḥ nāma iti

original: jñānābhidhānasvabhāno hi vyavahāraḥsa ca tadviṣayo nāstītiyuktam /
analyzed: jñāna abhidhāna svabhānaḥ hi vyavahāraḥ sa ca tad viṣayaḥ na asti iti yuktam

original: tadarthakriyānirvartanaṃ vyavahāra iti cettarhi svapne parirabhyamāṇāyā yoṣitaḥ kūṭakārṣāpaṇasya ca laukikatvaṃ prāpnoti /
analyzed: tad artha kriyā nirvartanam vyavahāraḥ iti ced tarhi svapne parirabhyamāṇāyāḥ yoṣitaḥ kūṭa kārṣāpaṇasya ca laukika tvam prāpnoti

original: utpadya naṣṭe ghaṭe arthakriyāyā nivṛtteralaukikatvaṃ syāt //
analyzed: utpadya naṣṭe ghaṭe arthakriyāyāḥ nivṛtteḥ alaukika tvam syāt

original: api ca yaḥ śuktikāyāṃ rajatavyavahāram na karotisa rajatābhāvameva buddhvā na rajatasya satastasyālaukikatām //
analyzed: api ca yaḥ śuktikāyām rajata vyavahāram na karoti sa rajata abhāvam eva buddhvā na rajatasya sataḥ tasya alaukika tām

original: yadi cedamalaukikaṃ rajataṃ tat kimarthamiha tadarthakriyārthaṃ pravartate alaukikaṃ laukikatvena gṛhītveti cetsaiveyaṃ tapasvinī viparītakhyātirāyātā /
analyzed: yadi ca idam alaukikam rajatam tat kimartham iha tad arthakriyā artham pravartate alaukikam laukika tvena gṛhītvā iti ced sā eva iyam tapasvinī viparīta khyātiḥ āyātā

original: tasmat viparītakhyātidveṣeṇa kṛtamīdṛśā /
analyzed: tasmat viparīta khyāti dveṣeṇa kṛtam īdṛśā

original: atrāpi lokasiddhaiva pratītiranugamyatām //
analyzed: atrā api loka siddhā eva pratītiḥ anugamyatām

original: na vā mīmāṃsakā ete svabhāryāmapi veśmataḥ /
analyzed: na vā mīmāṃsakāḥ ete sva bhāryām api veśmataḥ

original: niśārayitumicchanti svataḥprāmāṇyatṛṣṇayā //121//
analyzed: niśārayitum icchanti svatas prāmāṇya tṛṣṇayā

original: na caivamapi tatsiddhiḥ buddhidvaividhyadarśanāt /
analyzed: na ca evam api tad siddhiḥ buddhi dvaividhya darśanāt

original: saṃśaye sati saṃvādasāpekṣatvaṃ tathaiva tat //122//
analyzed: saṃśaye sati saṃvāda sāpekṣa tvam tathā eva tat

original: kleśena tadamunā 'pi svārthasteṣāṃ prasiddhyati na kaścit /
analyzed: kleśena tat amunā svārthaḥ teṣām prasiddhi ati na kaścid

original: yadbhavati daivagatyā rājapathenaiva tadbhavatu //123//
analyzed: yat bhavati daivagatyā rāja pathena eva tat bhavatu

original: nātmakhyātirbāhyatayā 'rthapratibhāsāt nāsatkhyātirna hyasatām dhīviṣayatvam /
analyzed: na ātma khyātiḥ bāhya tayā rtha pratibhāsāt na asat khyātiḥ na hi asatām dhī viṣaya tvam

original: ukto 'khyātau dūṣaṇamārgo viparītakhyātistasmādāśrayaṇīyā matimadbhiḥ //124//
analyzed: uktaḥ khyātau dūṣaṇa mārgaḥ viparīta khyātiḥ tasmāt āśrayaṇīyā matimadbhiḥ

original: sthite ca tasmin viparītavedane tadīyasādharmyakṛto 'sti saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: sthite ca tasmin viparīta vedane tadīya sādharmya kṛtaḥ sti saṃśayaḥ

original: tadā ca saṃvādamukhapratīkṣaṇāt bhajanti bodhāḥ paratah pramāṇatām //125//
analyzed: tadā ca saṃvāda mukha pratīkṣaṇāt bhajanti bodhāḥ paratas pramāṇa tām

original: pratyakṣādipramāṇānāṃ tadyathā 'stu tathā 'stu vā /
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇānām tat yathā stu tathā stu vā

original: śabdasya hi pramāṇatvaṃ parato muktasaṃśayam //126//
analyzed: śabdasya hi pramāṇa tvam paratas mukta saṃśayam

original: dṛṣṭe hi viṣaye prāmāṇyaniścayamantareṇaiva laghupariśrameṣu karmasu pravṛttiriti tadupayogipratyakṣādipramāṇaprāmāṇyaniścaye durupapāde ko 'bhiniveśaḥ śabde punaḥ adṛṣṭapuruṣārthapathopadeśini prāmāṇyamaniniścatya mahāprayatnanirvartyāni jyotiṣṭomādīni na prekṣāpūrvakāriṇo yajvānaḥ prayuñjīrannityavaśyaṃ niścetavyaṃ tatra prāmāṇyam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭe hi viṣaye prāmāṇya niścayam antareṇa eva laghu pariśrameṣu karmasu pravṛttiḥ iti tad upayogi pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa prāmāṇya niścaye durupapāde kaḥ bhiniveśaḥ śabde punar adṛṣṭa puruṣa artha patha upadeśini prāmāṇyam a niniścatya mahā prayatna nirvartyāni jyotiṣṭoma ādīni na prekṣā pūrva kāriṇaḥ yajvānaḥ prayuñjīran iti avaśyam niścetavyam tatra prāmāṇyam

original: tacca parata eveti brūmaḥ //
analyzed: tat ca paratas eva iti brūmaḥ

original: śabdasya vṛddhavyavahārādhigatasambandhopakṛtasya sataḥ pratītijanakatvaṃ nāma rūpamavadhūtam /
analyzed: śabdasya vṛddha vyavahāra adhigata sambandha upakṛtasya sataḥ pratīti janaka tvam nāma rūpam avadhūtam

original: tat tunaisargikaśaktyātmakasambandhamahimnā vāpuruṣaghaṭitasamayasambandhavalena veti vicārayiṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: tat tu naisargika śakti ātmaka sambandha mahimnā vā a puruṣa ghaṭita samaya sambandha valena vā iti vicārayiṣyāmaḥ

original: prakāśakatvamātraṃ tu dīpāderiva tasya rūpam /
analyzed: prakāśaka tva mātram tu dīpa ādeḥ iva tasya rūpam

original: yāthā hi dīpaḥ prakāśamānaḥ śucimaśuciṃ vā yathāsannitahitamarthamavadyotayatitathā śabdo 'pi puruṣeṇa prayojyamānaḥ śravaṇapathamupagataḥ satye 'vāsamanvite 'samanvite vāsaphale niṣphale vā siddhe kārye vā 'rthe pramitimupajanayatīti tāvadevāsya rūpam /
analyzed: yāthā hi dīpaḥ prakāśamānaḥ śucim aśucim vā artham avadyotayati tathā śabdaḥ api puruṣeṇa prayojyamānaḥ śravaṇa patham upagataḥ satye vā samanvite samanvite vā sa phale niṣphale vā siddhe kārye vā rthe pramitim upajanayati iti tāvat eva asya rūpam

original: ayaṃ tu dīpācchabdasya viśeṣaḥ yadeṣa sambandhavyutpattimapekṣamāṇaḥ pramāmutpādayatītidīpastu tannirapekṣa iti //
analyzed: ayam tu dīpāt śabdasya viśeṣaḥ yat eṣa sambandha vyutpattim apekṣamāṇaḥ pramām utpādayati iti dīpaḥ tu tad nirapekṣaḥ iti

original: tasyāḥ śabdajanitāyāḥ pramiteḥ yathārthetaratvaṃ puruṣadarśanādhīnamsamyagdarśini śucau puruṣe sati satyārthā sā bhavati pratītiḥitarathā tu tadviparīteti /
analyzed: tasyāḥ śabda janitāyāḥ pramiteḥ yathārtha itaratvam puruṣa darśana adhīnam samyak darśini śucau puruṣe sati satya arthā sā bhavati pratītiḥ itarathā tu tad viparītā iti

original: tatra yathā naisargikamarthasaṃsparśitvaṃ śabdasya rūpaṃ iti samarthitaṃevamasya svābhāvikaṃ satyārthatvamapi na rūpam /
analyzed: tatra yathā naisargikam artha saṃsparśi tvam śabdasya rūpam iti samarthitam evam asya svābhāvikam satya artha tvam api na rūpam

original: evamabhupagamyamāne vipralambhakavacāsi visaṃvādadarśanaṃ na bhavet /
analyzed: evam abhupagamyamāne vipralambha kavaca asi visaṃvāda darśanam na bhavet

original: tasmātpuruṣaguṇadoṣādhīnāveva śābde pratyaye saṃvādavisaṃvādau //
analyzed: tasmāt puruṣa guṇa doṣa adhīnau eva śābde pratyaye saṃvāda visaṃvādau

original: na cendriyādāviva tatra durbhaṇā guṇāḥrāgādayo doṣāḥ karuṇādayo guṇāḥ puruṣāṇāmatiprasiddhā eva /
analyzed: na ca indriya ādau iva tatra durbhaṇāḥ guṇāḥ rāga ādayaḥ doṣāḥ karuṇā ādayaḥ guṇāḥ puruṣāṇām ati prasiddhāḥ eva

original: puruṣaguṇā eva śabdasya guṇāḥ na svaśarīrasaṃsthāḥ cakṣurāderiveti /
analyzed: puruṣa guṇāḥ eva śabdasya guṇāḥ na sva śarīra saṃsthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādeḥ iva iti

original: tatra yadi puruṣaguṇānāṃ prāmāṇyakāraṇatā neṣyatedoṣāṇāmapi viplavahetutā mā bhūt //
analyzed: tatra yadi puruṣa guṇānām prāmāṇya kāraṇa tā na iṣyate doṣāṇām api viplava hetu tā mā

original: yat tu doṣapraśamanacaritārthā eva puruṣaguṇāḥ prāmāṇyahetavastu na bhavantīti atra śapathaśaraṇā eva śrotriyāḥ /
analyzed: yat tu doṣa praśamana caritārthāḥ eva puruṣa guṇāḥ prāmāṇya hetavaḥ tu na bhavanti iti atra śapatha śaraṇāḥ eva śrotriyāḥ

original: na ca bādhānutpattimātreṇa vaidikyāḥ pratīteḥ prāmāṇyaṃ bhavitumarhati [pakṣmalākṣilakṣamabhiramayet vidyādharapadakāmaḥ] ityādāvapi prāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na ca bādhā anutpatti mātreṇa vaidikyāḥ pratīteḥ prāmāṇyam bhavitum arhati pakṣmala akṣi lakṣam abhiramayet vidyādhara pada kāmaḥ ityādau api prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt

original: uktaṃ ca kena cit [yathā hi svapnadṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ kaścidvīpāntarādiṣu /
analyzed: uktam ca kena cit yathā hi svapna dṛṣṭaḥ rthaḥ kaścid vīpa antara ādiṣu

original: asaṃbhavadvisaṃvādaḥ śraddhātuṃ naiva śakyate //
analyzed: asaṃbhavat visaṃvādaḥ śraddhātum nā eva śakyate

original: tathā codanayā 'pyarthaṃ bodhyamānamatīndriyam /
analyzed: tathā codanayā pi artham bodhyamānam atīndriyam

original: asaṃbhavadvisaṃvādaṃ na śraddadhati ke cana] iti //
analyzed: asaṃbhavat visaṃvādam na śraddadhati ke cana iti

original: tatra svapnajñāne hetuḥ nidrādidoṣo 'stīti duṣṭakāraṇajñānādaprāmāṇyamiti cetlolākṣīlakṣavākye kiṃ vakṣyasi prabhavastasya na jñāyata iti cetna tarāmasau vede 'pi tvanmate jñāyata iti ko viśeṣaḥ mahājanādiparigraho 'sya nāstīti cetanveṣaṇīyaṃ tarhi prāmāṇyakāraṇamna buddhyutpādakatvādevautsargikaṃ prāmāṇyamiti yuktam //
analyzed: tatra svapna jñāne hetuḥ nidrā ādi doṣaḥ sti iti duṣṭa kāraṇa jñānāt aprāmāṇyam iti ced lolākṣī lakṣa vākye kim vakṣyasi prabhavaḥ tasya na jñāyate iti ced na tarām asau vede tvad mate jñāyate iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ mahājana ādi parigrahaḥ na asti iti ced anveṣaṇīyam tarhi prāmāṇya kāraṇam na buddhi utpādaka tvāt eva autsargikam prāmāṇyam iti yuktam

original: sākṣāddraṣṭṛnaroktatvaṃ śabde yāvanna niścitam /
analyzed: sākṣāt draṣṭṛ nara ukta tvam śabde yāvat na niścitam

original: bādhānutpattimātreṇa na tāvatatpramāṇatā //127//
analyzed: bādhā anutpatti mātreṇa na tāvat tad pramāṇa tā

original: yadapi vede kāraṇadoṣanirākaraṇāya kathyate [yad vā baktur abhāvena na syur doṣā nirāśrayāḥ] iti tadapyasāṃpratamasati vaktari prāmāṇyahetūnāṃ guṇānāmapyabhāvena tatprāmāṇyasyāpyabhāvāt /
analyzed: yat api vede kāraṇa doṣa nirākaraṇāya kathyate yat vā baktuḥ abhāvena na syuḥ doṣāḥ nirāśrayāḥ iti tat api asāṃpratam asati vaktari prāmāṇya hetūnām guṇānām api abhāvena tad prāmāṇyasya api abhāvāt

original: na ca vede vakturabhāvaḥ suvacahaḥtathā hyetadeva tāvadvicārayāmaḥkiṃ vede vaktā vidyate na veti //
analyzed: na ca vede vaktuḥ abhāvaḥ tathā hi etat eva tāvat vicārayāmaḥ kim vede vaktā vidyate na vā iti

original: nanu vede pramāṇāntarasaṃsparśarahitavicitrakarmaphalagatasādhyasādhanabhāvopadeśini kathaṃ tadarthasākṣāddarśī puruṣa upadeṣṭā bhavet ucyate vedasya puruṣaḥ kartā na hi yādṛśatādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: nanu vede pramāṇa antara saṃsparśa rahita vicitra karma phala gata sādhyasādhana bhāva upadeśini katham tad artha sākṣāt darśī puruṣaḥ upadeṣṭā bhavet ucyate vedasya puruṣaḥ kartā na hi yādṛśa tādṛśaḥ

original: kintu trailokyanirmāṇanipuṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ //128//
analyzed: kintu trailokya nirmāṇa nipuṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ

original: sa devaḥ paramo jñātā nityānandaḥ kṛpānvitaḥ /
analyzed: sa devaḥ paramaḥ jñātā nitya ānandaḥ kṛpā anvitaḥ

original: kleśakarmavipākādiparāmarśavivarjitaḥ //129//
analyzed: kleśa karma vipāka ādi parāmarśa vivarjitaḥ

original: atrāhakiṃ brūṣe traikokyanirmāṇanipuṇamatiritiaho tava saralamatitvamna hi tathāvidhapuruṣasadbhāve kiñcana pramāṇamasti //
analyzed: atra āha kim brūṣe traikokya nirmāṇa nipuṇa matiḥ iti aho tava sarala mati tvam na hi tathāvidha puruṣa sadbhāve kiñcana pramāṇam asti

original: tathā hīśvarasadbhāvo na pratyakṣapramāṇekaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi īśvara sadbhāvaḥ na pratyakṣa pramāṇa ikaḥ

original: na hyasāvakṣavijñāne rūpādiriva bhāsate //130//
analyzed: na hi asau akṣa vijñāne rūpa ādiḥ iva bhāsate

original: na ca mānasavijñānasaṃvedyo 'yaṃ sukhādivat /
analyzed: na ca mānasa vijñāna saṃvedyaḥ yam sukha ādi vat

original: yogināmaprasiddhatvāt na tatpratyakṣagocaraḥ //131//
analyzed: yoginām aprasiddha tvāt na tad pratyakṣa gocaraḥ

original: pratyakṣapratiṣedhena tatpūrvakamapākṛtam /
analyzed: pratyakṣa pratiṣedhena tad pūrvakam apākṛtam

original: anumānaṃanirjñāte tasmin vyāpyanupagrahāt //132//
analyzed: anumānam a nirjñāte tasmin vyāpi an upagrahāt

original: na ca sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgamasyāsti kiñcana kṣityādīnāṃ tu kāryatvamasiddhaṃ sudhiyaḥ prati //133//
analyzed: na ca sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam liṅgam asya asti kiñcana kṣiti ādīnām tu kāryatvam asiddham sudhiyaḥ prati

original: śailādisanniveśo 'pi naiṣa kartranumāpakaḥ /
analyzed: śaila ādi sanniveśaḥ pi nā eṣa kartṛ anumāpakaḥ

original: kartṛpūrvakakumbhādisanniveśavilakṣaṇaḥ //134//
analyzed: kartṛ pūrvaka kumbha ādi sanniveśa vilakṣaṇaḥ

original: dṛṣṭaḥ kartravinābhāvī sanniveśo hi yādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ kartṛ avinābhāvī sanniveśaḥ hi yādṛśaḥ

original: tādṛṅnagādau nāstīti kāryatvavadasiddhatā //135//
analyzed: tādṛś naga ādau na asti iti kāryatva vat asiddha tā
