original: siddhatve 'pi na hetutvaṃ anaikāntyāttṛṇādimiḥ /
analyzed: siddha tve pi na hetu tvam anaikāntyāt tṛṇa ādimiḥ

original: akṛṣṭajātaiḥkartāramantareṇāptajanmabhiḥ //136//
analyzed: a kṛṣṭa jātaiḥ kartāram antareṇa āpta janmabhiḥ

original: teṣāmutpattisamayapratyakṣatve na labhyate /
analyzed: teṣām utpatti samaya pratyakṣa tve na labhyate

original: karturdṛśyatvamapievaṃ abhāvo 'nupalabdhitaḥ //137//
analyzed: kartuḥ dṛśya tvam api evam abhāvaḥ nupalabdhitaḥ

original: na ca kṣitijalaprāyadṛṣṭahetvatirekiṇaḥ /
analyzed: na ca kṣiti jala prāya dṛṣṭa hetu atirekiṇaḥ

original: kasyāpi kalpanaṃ teṣu yujyate 'tiprasaggataḥ //138//
analyzed: kasya api kalpanam teṣu yujyate

original: tena karturabhāve 'pi sanniveśādidarśanāt /
analyzed: tena kartuḥ abhāve pi sanniveśa ādi darśanāt

original: anaikāntikatā hetoḥ vipratve puruṣatvavat //139//
analyzed: anaikāntika tā hetoḥ vipra tve puruṣa tva vat

original: kiñca vyāptyanusāreṇa kalpyamānaḥ prasiddhyati /
analyzed: kiñca vyāpti anusāreṇa kalpyamānaḥ prasiddhi ati

original: kulālatulyaḥ karteti syādviśeṣaviruddhatā //140//
analyzed: kulāla tulyaḥ kartā iti syāt viśeṣa viruddha tā

original: vyāpāravānasarvajñaḥ śarīrī kleśasaṃkulaḥ /
analyzed: vyāpāravān asarvajñaḥ śarīrī kleśa saṃkulaḥ

original: ghaṭasya yādṛśaḥ kartā tādṛgeva bhavedbhuvaḥ //141//
analyzed: ghaṭasya yādṛśaḥ kartā tādṛś eva bhavet bhuvaḥ

original: viśeṣasādhyatāyāṃ vā sādhyahīnaṃ vidarśanam /
analyzed: viśeṣa sādhya tāyām vā sādhya hīnam vidarśanam

original: kartṛsāmānyasiddhau tu viśeṣāvagatih kutaḥ //142//
analyzed: kartṛ sāmānya siddhau tu viśeṣa avagatiḥ kutas

original: api ca śaśarīro vā jaganti racayedīśvaraḥ śarīrarahito vā śarīramapi ca tadīyaṃ kāryaṃ nityaṃ vā bhavet sarvathā 'nupapattiḥ //
analyzed: api ca vā jaganti racayet īśvaraḥ śarīra rahitaḥ vā śarīram api ca tadīyam kāryam nityam vā bhavet sarvathā nupapattiḥ

original: aśarīrasya kartṛtvaṃ dṛśyate na hi kasyacit /
analyzed: aśarīrasya kartṛ tvam dṛśyate na hi kasyacid

original: deho 'pyutpattimānasya dehatvāccaitradehavat //143//
analyzed: dehaḥ u pi utpattimān asya deha tvāt caitra deha vat

original: kāryamapīśvaraśarīraṃ tatkartṛkaṃ vā syāt īśvarāntarakartṛkaṃ vā tatra !svayaṃ nijaśarīrasya nirmāṇamiti sāhasam /
analyzed: kāryam api īśvara śarīram tad kartṛkam vā syāt īśvara antara kartṛkam vā tatra svayam nija śarīrasya nirmāṇam iti sāhasam

original: kartrantarakṛte tasminnīśvarānantyamāpatet //144//
analyzed: kartṛ antara kṛte tasmin īśvara ānantyam āpatet

original: bhavatuko doṣaḥ iti cetpramāṇābhāva eva doṣaḥ /
analyzed: bhavatukaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced pramāṇa abhāvaḥ eva doṣaḥ

original: ekasyāpi tāvadīśvasya sādhane paryākulatāṃ gatāḥ kiṃ punaranantānām kiñca vyāpāreṇa vā kulālādiriva kāryāṇi sṛjedīśvaraḥ icchāmātreṇa vā dvayamapi durghaṭam vyāpāreṇa jagatsṛṣṭiḥ kuto yugaśatairapi /
analyzed: ekasya api tāvat īśvasya sādhane paryākula tām gatāḥ kim punar anantānām kiñca vyāpāreṇa vā kulāla ādiḥ iva kāryāṇi sṛjet īśvaraḥ icchā mātreṇa vā dvayam api durghaṭam vyāpāreṇa jagat sṛṣṭiḥ kutas yuga śataiḥ api

original: tadicchāṃ cānuvartante na jaḍāḥ paramāṇavaḥ //185//
analyzed: tad icchām ca anuvartante na jaḍāḥ paramāṇavaḥ

original: api ca kiṃ kimapi prayojanamanusandhāya jagatsarge pravartate prajāpatiḥ evameva vā niṣprayojanāyāṃ pravṛttāvaprekṣāpūrvakāritvādunmattatulyo 'sau bhavet /
analyzed: api ca kim kim api prayojanam anusandhāya jagat sarge pravartate prajāpatiḥ evam eva vā niṣprayojanāyām pravṛttau aprekṣā pūrva kāri tvāt unmatta tulyaḥ sau bhavet

original: pūrvo 'pi nāsti pakṣaḥ avāptasarbānandasya rāgādirahitātmanaḥ /
analyzed: na asti pakṣaḥ avāpta sarva ānandasya rāga ādi rahita ātmanaḥ

original: jagadārabhamāṇasya na vidmaḥ kiṃ prayojanam //146//
analyzed: jagat ārabhamāṇasya na vidmaḥ kim prayojanam

original: anukampayā pravartata iti cet maivam sargāt pūrvaṃ hi niśśeṣakleśasaṃsparśavarjitāḥ /
analyzed: anukampayā pravartate iti ced mā evam sargāt pūrvam hi niśśeṣa kleśa saṃsparśa varjitāḥ

original: nāsya muktā ivātmāno bhavanti karuṇāspadam //187//
analyzed: na asya muktāḥ iva ātmānaḥ bhavanti karuṇā āspadam

original: paramakāruṇikānāmapi duśahaduḥkhadahanadandahyamānamanaso jantūmavalokayatāmudeti dayāna punarapavargadaśāvat aśeṣaduḥkhaśūnyāniti //
analyzed: parama kāruṇikānām api punar apavarga daśā vat aśeṣa duḥkha śūnyān iti

original: karuṇāmṛtasaṃsiktahṛdayo vā jagatsṛjan /
analyzed: karuṇā amṛta saṃsikta hṛdayaḥ vā jagat sṛjan

original: kathaṃ sṛjati durvāraduḥkhaprāgbhāradāruṇam //148//
analyzed: katham sṛjati durvāra duḥkha prāgbhāra dāruṇam

original: atha kevalaṃ sukhopabhogaprāyaṃ jagat srasṭumeva na jānātisṛṣṭamapi vā na ciramavatiṣṭhateityucyatetadapyacāruniratiśayasvātantryasīmani vartamānasya svecchānuvartisakalapadārthasthiteḥ parameśvarasya kimasādhyaṃ nāma bhavet nānātmagataśubhāśubhakarmakalāpāpekṣaḥ sraṣṭā prajāpatiriti cet karmāṇyeva hi tarhi sṛjantu jagantikiṃ prajāpatinā athācetanānāṃ cetanānadhiṣṭhitānāṃ sraṣṭṛtvamaghaṭamānamiti teṣāmadhiṣṭhātā cetahaḥ kalpyata iti cetna tadāśrayāṇāmātmanāmeva cetanatvāt ta evādhiṣṭhātāro bhaviṣyantikimadhiṣṭhātrantareṇeśvareṇa tasyāpi tādṛśā parakīyakarmāntarāpekṣāsaṅkocitasvātantryaṇa kimaiśvaryeṇa kāryam rājyamiva mantriparavaśmaiśvaryaṃ kvopayujyate tādṛk yatrāparanirapekṣaṃ rucyaiva na racyate 'bhimatam /
analyzed: atha kevalam sukha upabhoga prāyam jagat srasṭum eva na jānāti sṛṣṭam api vā na ciram avatiṣṭhate iti ucyate etat api acāru niratiśaya svātantrya sīmani vartamānasya sva icchā anuvarti sakala padārtha sthiteḥ parameśvarasya kim asādhyam nāma bhavet nānā ātma gata śubha aśubha karma kalāpa apekṣaḥ sraṣṭā prajāpatiḥ iti ced karmāṇi eva hi tarhi sṛjantu jaganti kim prajāpatinā atha acetanānām cetanā anadhiṣṭhitānām sraṣṭṛ tvam aghaṭamānam

original: anyenāpyuktam[kimīśvaratayeśvaro yadi na vartate svecchayā na hi prabhavatāṃ kriyāvidhiṣu heturanviṣyate] iti //
analyzed: anyena api uktam kim īśvara tayā īśvaraḥ yadi na vartate sva icchayā na hi prabhavatām kriyā vidhiṣu hetuḥ anviṣyate iti

original: atha kriḍārthā jagatsarge bhagavataḥ pravṛttiḥīdṛśā ca śubhāśubharupeṇa jagatā sṛṣṭena kriḍati parameśvara ityucyatetarhi kriḍāsādhyasukharahitatvena sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ avāptasakalānandatvaṃ nāma tasya rūpamapa hīyeta //
analyzed: atha kriḍā arthā jagat sarge bhagavataḥ pravṛttiḥ īdṛśā ca śubha aśubha rupeṇa jagatā sṛṣṭena kriḍati parameśvaraḥ iti ucyate tarhi kriḍā sādhya sukha rahita tvena sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvam avāpta sakala ānanda tvam nāma tasya rūpam apa hīyeta

original: na ca krīḍā 'pi niśśeṣajanatā ''taṅkakāriṇi /
analyzed: na ca krīḍā niśśeṣa jana tā taṅka kāriṇi

original: āyāsabahulā ceyaṃ kartuṃ yuktā mahātmanaḥ //149//
analyzed: āyāsa bahulā ca iyam kartum yuktā mahātmanaḥ

original: tasmānna jagatāṃ nātha īśvaraḥ sraṣṭā saṃhartā 'pi bhavati //
analyzed: tasmāt na jagatām nāthaḥ īśvaraḥ sraṣṭā saṃhartā pi bhavati

original: na hyasya dhriyamāṇeṣu pūryate jantukarmasu /
analyzed: na hi asya dhriyamāṇeṣu pūryate jantu karmasu

original: sakṛt samastatrailokyanirmūlanamanorathaḥ //150//
analyzed: sakṛt samasta trailokya nirmūlana manorathaḥ

original: karmoparamapakṣe tu punaḥ sṛṣṭirna yajyate /
analyzed: karma uparama pakṣe tu punar sṛṣṭiḥ na yajyate

original: na karmanirapekṣo hi sargavaicitryasaṃbhavaḥ //151//
analyzed: na karma nirapekṣaḥ hi sarga vaicitrya saṃbhavaḥ

original: atha brahmeṇa mānena saṃvatsaraśataniṣṭāmadhitiṣṭhati parameṣṭhini maheśvarasya saṃjihīrṣā jāyate /
analyzed: atha brahmeṇa mānena saṃvatsara śata niṣṭām adhitiṣṭhati parameṣṭhini maheśvarasya saṃjihīrṣā jāyate

original: tayā tirohitasvaphalārambhaśaktīni karmāṇi saṃbhavantīti saṃpadyate sakalabhuvanapralayaḥ /
analyzed: tayā tirohita sva phala ārambha śaktīni karmāṇi saṃbhavanti iti saṃpadyate sakala bhuvana pralayaḥ

original: punaśca tāvatyeva rātriprāye kāle vyatīte sisṛkṣā bhavati bhagavataḥ /
analyzed: punar ca tāvati eva rātri prāye kāle vyatīte sisṛkṣā bhavati bhagavataḥ

original: tayā 'bhivyaktaśaktīni karmāṇi kāryamāranbhate ititadapyayuktam udbhavābhibhavau teṣāṃ syātāṃ cedīśvarecchayā /
analyzed: tayā bhivyakta śaktīni karmāṇi kāryam āranbhate iti tat api ayuktam udbhava abhibhavau teṣām syātām ced īśvara icchayā

original: tarhi saivāstu jagatāṃ sargasaṃhārakāraṇam //152//
analyzed: tarhi sā eva astu jagatām sarga saṃhāra kāraṇam

original: kiṃ karmabhiḥ evamastviti cetnaīśvarecchāvaśitvapakṣe hi trayo duratikrimā doṣāḥ /
analyzed: kim karmabhiḥ evam astu iti cetna īśvara icchā vaśitva pakṣe hi trayaḥ duratikrimāḥ doṣāḥ

original: tasyaiva tāvanmahātmano niṣkaruṇatvaṃ akāraṇameva dāruṇasargakāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: tasya eva tāvat mahātmanaḥ niṣkaruṇa tvam akāraṇam eva dāruṇa sarga kāriṇaḥ

original: tathā vaidikīnāṃ vidhiniṣedhacodanānāmānarthakyamīśvarecchāta eva śubhāśubhaphalopabhogasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: tathā vaidikīnām vidhi niṣedha codanānām ānarthakyam īśvara icchātaḥ eva śubha aśubha phala upabhoga saṃbhavāt

original: anirmokṣaprasaṅgaścamuktā api pralayasamaya iva jīvāḥ punarīśvarecchayā saṃsareyuḥ /
analyzed: anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ ca muktāḥ api pralaya samaye iva jīvāḥ punar īśvara icchayā saṃsareyuḥ

original: tasmātreśvarādhīno jagatāṃ sargaḥsaṃhāro vā //
analyzed: tasmāt atra īśvara adhīnaḥ jagatām sargaḥ saṃhāraḥ vā

original: ityanantaragītena nayeneśvarasādhane /
analyzed: iti anantara gītena nayena īśvara sādhane

original: nānumānasya sāmarthyamupamāne tu kā kathā //153//
analyzed: na anumānasya sāmarthyam upamāne tu kā kathā

original: agamasyāpi nityasya tatparatvamasāṃpratam /
analyzed: agamasya api nityasya tad para tvam asāṃpratam

original: tatpraṇite tu visvaṃbhaḥ kathaṃ bhavatu mādṛśām //154//
analyzed: tad praṇite tu visvaṃbhaḥ katham bhavatu mādṛśām

original: kiñcāgamasya prāmāṇyaṃ tatpraṇītatvahetukam /
analyzed: kiñca āgamasya prāmāṇyam tad praṇīta tva hetukam

original: tatprāmāṇyācca tatsiddhirityanyonyāśrayaṃ bhavet //155//
analyzed: tad prāmāṇyāt ca tad siddhiḥ iti anyonya āśrayam bhavet

original: anyathā 'nupapattyā tu na śakyo labdhumīśvaraḥ /
analyzed: anyathā nupapattyā tu na śakyaḥ labdhum īśvaraḥ

original: na hi taddṛśyate kāryaṃ tu vinā yanna siddhyati //156//
analyzed: na hi tat dṛśyate kāryam tu vinā yat na siddhi ati

original: tasmāt sarvasadviṣayapramāṇānavagamyamānasvarūpatvādabhāvaeveśvarasyeti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva sat viṣaya pramāṇa anavagamyamāna svarūpa tvāt abhāvaḥ eva īśvarasya iti siddham

original: na ca prasiddhimātreṇa yuktamtasya kalpanam /
analyzed: na ca prasiddhi mātreṇa yuktam tasya kalpanam

original: nirmūlatvāttathā coktaṃ prasiddhrvaṭayakṣavat //157//
analyzed: nirmūla tvāt tathā ca uktam

original: ata eva nirīkṣya dugthaṭaṃ jagato janmavināśaḍambaram /
analyzed: atas eva nirīkṣya dugthaṭam jagataḥ janma vināśa ḍambaram

original: na kadācidanīdṛśaṃ jagat kathitaṃ nītirahasyavedibhiḥ //158//
analyzed: na kadācid anīdṛśam jagat kathitam nīti rahasya vedibhiḥ

original: īśvare pramāṇopapādanam atra vadāmaḥyattāvadidamagādinagādinirmāṇanipuṇapuruṣaparicchedadakṣaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na bhavatīti tadevameva /
analyzed: īśvare pramāṇa upapādanam atra vadāmaḥ yat tāvat idam agādi nagādi nirmāṇa nipuṇa puruṣa pariccheda dakṣam pratyakṣam na bhavati iti tat evam eva

original: pratyakṣapūrvakamanumānam api tenaiva pathā pratiṣṭhitamititadapyāstām /
analyzed: pratyakṣa pūrvakam anumānam api tena eva pathā pratiṣṭhitam iti tat api āstām

original: sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ tu liṅgamīśvarasattāyāmidaṃ brūmahepṛthivyādikāryaṃ dharmitadutpattiprakāraprayojanādyabhijñākartṛpūrvakamiti sādhyo dharmaḥkāryatvāt ghaṭādiva //
analyzed: sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tu liṅgam īśvara sattāyām idam brūmahe pṛthivī ādi kāryam dharmi tad utpatti prakāra prayojana ādi abhijñā kartṛ pūrvakam iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ kārya tvāt ghaṭāt iva

original: nanukāryatvamasiddhamityutam /
analyzed: nanu kārya tvam asiddham iti utam

original: ka evamācaṣṭe cārvakaḥ śākyaḥ mīmāṃsako vā cārvākastāvat vedaracanāyā racanāntaravilakṣaṇāyā api kāryatvamabhyupagacchati yaḥsa kathaṃ pṛthvyādiracanāyāḥ kāryatvamapahnuvīta mīmāṃsako 'pi na kāryatvamapahnotumarhatiyata evahāha[yeṣāmapyanavagatotpattīnāṃ rūpamupalabhyatetantuvyatiṣaktajanito 'yaṃ paṭaḥtadvyatiṣaṅgavimocanāt tantuvināśādvā naṅkṣyatīti kalpyate] iti /
analyzed: kaḥ evam ācaṣṭe cārvakaḥ śākyaḥ mīmāṃsakaḥ vā cārvākaḥ tāvat veda racanāyāḥ racanā antara vilakṣaṇāyāḥ api kāryatvam abhyupagacchati yaḥ sa katham pṛthvī ādi racanāyāḥ kāryatvam apahnuvīta mīmāṃsakaḥ u pi na kāryatvam apahnotum arhati yatas eva ha ha yeṣām api anavagata utpattīnām rūpam upalabhyate tantu vyatiṣakta janitaḥ yam paṭaḥ tad vyatiṣaṅga vimocanāt tantu vināśāt vā naṅkṣyati iti kalpyate iti

original: evamavayavasaṃyoganirvartyamānavapuṣaḥ kṣitidharāderapi nāśasaṃpratyayaḥ saṃbhavatyeva /
analyzed: evam avayava saṃyoga nirvartyamāna vapuṣaḥ kṣitidhara ādeḥ api nāśa saṃpratyayaḥ saṃbhavati eva

original: dṛśyate ca kvacidvināśapratītiḥpravṛṣeṇyajaladharadhārāsāranirluṭhita eva parvataikadeśe [parvatasya khaṇḍaḥ patitaḥ] iti /
analyzed: dṛśyate ca kvacid vināśa pratītiḥ pravṛṣeṇya jaladhara dhārā sāra nirluṭhite eva parvata eka deśe parvatasya khaṇḍaḥ patitaḥ iti

original: vastugatayośca kāryatvavināśitvayoḥ samavyāptikatā vārtikakṛtā 'py uktaiva [tena yatrāpyubhau dharmau vyāpyavyāpakasammatau /
analyzed: vastugatayoḥ ca kāryatva vināśi tvayoḥ sama vyāptikatā vārtika kṛtā pi uktā eva tena yatra api ubhau dharmau vyāpya vyāpaka sammatau

original: tatrāpi vyāpyataiva syādaṅgaṃ na vyāpitāmatiḥ] iti vadatā /
analyzed: tatra api vyāpya tā eva syāt aṅgam na vyāpita amatiḥ iti vadatā

original: tasmādvināśitvenāpi kāryatvānumānāttanmate 'pi na kāryatvamasiddham //
analyzed: tasmāt vināśi tvena api kāryatva anumānāt tad mate na kāryatvam asiddham

original: śākyo 'pi kāryatvasya kathamasiddhatāmabhidadhīta yena nityo nāma padārthaḥ praṇayakeliṣvapi na viṣahyate /
analyzed: śākyaḥ pi kārya tvasya katham asiddha tām abhidadhīta yena nityaḥ nāma padārthaḥ praṇaya keliṣu api na viṣahyate

original: tasmāt sarvavādibhiḥ apraṇodyaṃ pṛthivyādeḥ kāryatvam //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva vādibhiḥ apraṇodyam pṛthivī ādeḥ kārya tvam

original: athavā sanniveśaviśiṣṭhatvameva hetumabhidadhmahe yasmin pratyakṣata upalabhyamāne sarvāpalampaṭā api na kecana vipratipattumutsahante /
analyzed: athavā sanniveśa viśiṣṭha tvam eva hetum abhidadhmahe yasmin pratyakṣatas upalabhyamāne sarva apalampaṭāḥ api na kecana vipratipattum utsahante

original: tasmānnāsiddho hetuḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na asiddhaḥ hetuḥ

original: nanukartravinābhāvitayā yathāvidhasya sanniveśasya śarāvādiṣu darśanaṃtādaśameva sanniveśaṃ upalabhya kvacidanupalabhyamānakartṛke kalaśādau kartranumānamiti yuktam /
analyzed: nanu kartṛ avinābhāvi tayā yathāvidhasya sanniveśasya śarāva ādiṣu upalabhya kvacid anupalabhyamāna kartṛke kalaśa ādau kartṛ anumānam iti yuktam

original: ayaṃ tvanya eva kalaśādisanniveśāt parvatādisanniveśaḥ /
analyzed: ayam tu anyaḥ eva kalaśa ādi sanniveśāt parvata ādi sanniveśaḥ

original: nātra sanniveśasāmānyaṃ kiñcidupalabhante laukikāḥ /
analyzed: na atra sanniveśa sāmānyam kiñcid upalabhante laukikāḥ

original: sanniveśaśabdameva sādhāraṇaṃ prayuñjate /
analyzed: sanniveśa śabdam eva sādhāraṇam prayuñjate

original: na ca vastunoratyantamede sati śabdasādhāraṇatāmātreṇa tadanumānamupapadyate /
analyzed: na ca vastunoḥ atyanta mede sati śabda sādhāraṇa tā mātreṇa tat anumānam upapadyate

original: na hi pāṇḍutāmātrasādhāraṇatvena dhūmādiva kakkolarajorāśerapi kṛśānuranumātuṃ śakyata iti /
analyzed: na hi pāṇḍu tā mātra sādhāraṇa tvena dhūmāt iva kakkola rajaḥ rāśeḥ api kṛśānuḥ anumātum śakyate iti

original: taduktam [siddhaṃ yādṛgadhiṣṭhātṛbhāvābhāvānuvṛttimat /
analyzed: tat uktam siddham yādṛś adhiṣṭhātṛ bhāva abhāva anuvṛttimat

original: sanniveśādi tattasamāt yuktaṃ yadanumīyate //
analyzed: sanniveśa ādi yuktam yat anumīyate

original: vastubhede prasiddhasya śabdasāmyādabhedinaḥ /
analyzed: vastu bhede prasiddhasya śabda sāmyāt abhedinaḥ

original: na yuktā 'numitiḥ pāṇḍudravyādiva hutāśane] iti //
analyzed: na yuktā nu mitiḥ pāṇḍu dravyāt iva hutāśane iti

original: ucyateyādṛgiti na buddhyāmahe /
analyzed: ucyate iyādṛś iti na buddhyāmahe

original: dhūmo hi mahānase kumbhadāsīphūtkāramārutasandhukṣyamāṇamandajvalanajanmā kṛśaprāyaprakṛtirupalabdhaḥ /
analyzed: dhūmaḥ hi mahānase kumbha dāsī phūtkāra māruta sandhukṣyamāṇa manda jvalana janmā kṛśa prāya prakṛtiḥ upalabdhaḥ

original: sa yadi parvate prabalasamīraṇollasitahutavahapluṣyamāṇamahāmahīruhaskandhendhanaprabhavobahulabahulaḥ khamaṇḍalamakhilamākāman upalabhyate tatkimidānīmanalapramitiṃ mā kārṣīt //
analyzed: sa yadi parvate prabala samīraṇa ullasita hutavaha pluṣyamāṇa mahā mahīruha skandha indhana prabhavaḥ bahula bahulaḥ kha maṇḍalam akhilam ākāman upalabhyate tat kim idānīm anala pramitim mā kārṣīt

original: atha viśeṣarahitaṃ dhūmamātramagnimātreṇa vyāptamavagatamiti tatastadanumānaṃ ihāpi sanniveśamātraṃ kartṛmātreṇa vyāptamiti tato 'pi tadanumīyatā //
analyzed: atha viśeṣa rahitam dhūma mātram agni mātreṇa vyāptam avagatam iti tatas tat anumānam iha api sanniveśa mātram kartṛ mātreṇa vyāptam iti tatas tat anumīyatā

original: nanusanniveśaśabdamātrasādhāraṇyamatrana vastusāmānyaṃ kiñcidastibhikṣo /
analyzed: nanu sanniveśa śabda mātra sādhāraṇyam atra na vastu sāmānyam kiñcid asti bhikṣo

original: dhūmo 'pi bhavaddarśane kiṃ vastusāmānyamasti //
analyzed: bhavat darśane kim vastu sāmānyam asti

original: mā bhūdvastusāmānyamākāśakālādivyāvṛttirūpaṃ tu saṃvyavahārakāraṇamastyevahantatarhi prakṛte 'pi asanniveśavyāvṛttirūpaṃ bhavatu sāmānyamākāśakālādivilakṣaṇarūpatvāt pṛthivyādeḥ //
analyzed: mā bhūt vastu sāmānyam ākāśa kāla ādi vyāvṛtti rūpam tu saṃvyavahāra kāraṇam asti eva hanta tarhi prakṛte asat niveśa vyāvṛtti rūpam bhavatu sāmānyam ākāśa kāla ādi vilakṣaṇa rūpa tvāt pṛthivī ādeḥ

original: nanutatra dhūmo dhūma ityanuvṛttavakalpabalena kalpitamapohasvabhāvaṃ sāmānyamabhyupagatamihāpi sanniveśavikalpānuvṛtteḥ tvatpakalpitamapoharūpameva sāmānyamiṣyatām apicasakartṛkatvābhimateṣvapi saṃsthāneṣu na sarvātmanā tulyatvaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: nanu tatra dhūmaḥ dhūmaḥ iti anuvṛtta vakalpa balena kalpitam apoha svabhāvam sāmānyam abhyupagatam iha api sanniveśa vikalpa anuvṛtteḥ apoha rūpam eva sāmānyam iṣyatām api ca sakartṛkatva abhimateṣu api saṃsthāneṣu na sarva ātmanā tulya tvam pratīyate

original: na hi ghaṭasaṃsthānaṃ catuśśālasaṃsthānaṃ ca susadṛśamiti /
analyzed: na hi ghaṭa saṃsthānam catur śāla saṃsthānam ca su sadṛśam iti

original: saṃsthānasāmānyaṃ tu parvatādāvapi vdyata eveti sarvathā yādṛgityavācako granthaḥ //
analyzed: saṃsthāna sāmānyam tu parvata ādau api eva iti sarvathā yādṛś iti avācakaḥ granthaḥ

original: yadapi vyabhicārodbhāvanaṃ akṛṣṭajātaiḥ sthāvarādibhirakāri tadapi na cāruteṣāṃ pakṣīkṛtatvāt /
analyzed: yat api vyabhicāra udbhāvanam a kṛṣṭa jātaiḥ sthāvara ādibhiḥ akāri tat api na cāru teṣām pakṣīkṛta tvāt

original: pakṣeṇa ca vyabhicāracodanāyāṃ sarvānupranocchedaprasaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: pakṣeṇa ca vyabhicāra codanāyām

original: nanu ca pṛthivyāderutpattikālasya parokṣatvāt kartā na dṛśyata iti tadanupalabdhyā tadasattvaniścayānupapatteḥ kāmaṃ saṃśayo 'stuvanaspatiprabhṛtīnāṃ tu prasavakālamadyatvena vayamevapaśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ca pṛthivī ādeḥ utpatti kālasya parokṣa tvāt kartā na dṛśyate iti tad anupalabdhyā tad asattva niścaya anupapatteḥ kāmam saṃśayaḥ tu prasava kālam adya tvena vayam eva paśyāmaḥ

original: na ca yatnato 'pyanveṣamāṇāḥ kartārameṣāmupalabhāmahe /
analyzed: na ca yatnataḥ pi anveṣamāṇāḥ kartāram eṣām upalabhāmahe

original: tasmādasau dṛśyānupalabdhernāstyevetyavagacchāmaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt asau dṛśya anupalabdheḥ na asti eva iti avagacchāmaḥ

original: api ca yena yena vayaṃ vyabhicāramudbhāvayiṣyāmaḥ taṃ taṃ cetpakṣīkariṣyati bhavān sutaramanumānocchedaḥsavyabhicārāṇāmapyevamanumānatvānapāyāt //
analyzed: api ca yena yena vayam vyabhicāram udbhāvayiṣyāmaḥ tam tam ced pakṣīkariṣyati bhavān sutaram anumāna ucchedaḥ sa vyabhicārāṇām api evam anumāna tva anapāyāt

original: ucyatesthāvarāṇāmutpattikālapratyakṣatve 'pi karturadṛśyatvam eva aśarīratvaniścayāt /
analyzed: ucyate sthāvarāṇām utpatti kāla pratyakṣa tve pi kartuḥ adṛśya tvam eva aśarīra tva niścayāt

original: aśarīrasya tarhi tadutpattāvavyāpriyamāṇatvāt kartṛtvamapi kathamiti cet etadagrato nirṇeṣyate /
analyzed: aśarīrasya tarhi tad utpattau avyāpriyamāṇa tvāt kartṛ tvam api katham iti ced etat agratas nirṇeṣyate

original: adṛśyasya ca karturanupalabdhito nāstitvaniścayānupapatteḥ nākṛṣṭajātavanaspatīnāmakartṛkatvamiti na vipakṣatā //
analyzed: adṛśyasya ca kartuḥ anupalabdhitaḥ nāstitva niścaya anupapatteḥ na ākṛṣṭa jāta vanaspatīnām akartṛka tvam iti na vipakṣa tā

original: [dṛṣṭakāraṇaireva tṛṇādyutpattyasaṃbhavaḥ] yattūktaṃ paridṛśyamānakṣitisalilādikāraṇakāryatvāt sthāvarāṇāṃ kimadṛśyamānakartṛkalpanayetitadapeśalamparalokavādibhiradṛśyamānānāṃ karmaṇāmapi kāraṇatvābhyūpagamāt /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa kāraṇaiḥ eva tṛṇa ādi utpatti asaṃbhavaḥ yat tu uktam paridṛśyamāna kṣiti salila ādi kāraṇa kārya tvāt sthāvarāṇām kim adṛśyamāna kartṛ kalpanayā iti tad apeśalam para lokavādibhiḥ adṛśyamānānām karmaṇām api kāraṇa tva abhyūpagamāt

original: bārhaspatyānāṃ tu tatsamarthanameva samādhiḥ //
analyzed: bārhaspatyānām tu tad samarthanam eva samādhiḥ

original: atha jagadvaicitryaṃ karmavyatirekeṇa na ghaṭata iti karmaṇāmadṛśyamānānāmapi kāraṇatvaṃ kalpyate tatra yadyevamacetanebhyaḥ kārakebhyaścetanānadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ kāryotpādānupapatteḥ kartā 'pi cetanasteṣāmadhiṣṭhātā kalpyatām /
analyzed: atha jagat vaicitryam karma vyatirekeṇa na ghaṭate iti karmaṇām adṛśyamānānām api kāraṇa tvam kalpyate tatra yadi evam acetanebhyaḥ kārakebhyaḥ cetanā anadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ kārya utpāda anupapatteḥ kartā pi cetanaḥ teṣām adhiṣṭhātā kalpyatām

original: tasmāt sthāvarāṇāmakartṛkatvābhāvāt na vipakṣateti na tairvyabhicāraḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt sthāvarāṇām akartṛka tva abhāvāt na vipakṣa tā iti na taiḥ vyabhicāraḥ

original: yadapyuktamyena yena vyabhicāra udbhāvyatesa cetpakṣe 'ntarbhāvayiṣyateka idānīmanumānasya niyama itietadapi na sādhu yadi hi bhavān viścite vipakṣe vṛttimupadarśayet kastaṃ pakṣe 'ntarbhāvayet /
analyzed: yat api uktam yena yena vyabhicāraḥ udbhāvyate sa ced pakṣe ntarbhāvayiṣyate kaḥ idānīm anumānasya niyamaḥ iti etat api na sādhu yadi hi bhavān viścite vipakṣe vṛttim upadarśayet kaḥ tam pakṣe ntarbhāvayet

original: na vipratve puṃstvasyanityatāyāṃ vā prameyatvasya vyabhicāre codyamāne vedhasā 'pi vipakṣaḥ pakṣīkartuṃ śakyaḥvādīcchayā vastuvyavasthāyā abhāvāt /
analyzed: na vipra tve puṃstvasya nitya tāyām vā prameya tvasya vyabhicāre codyamāne vedhasā pi vipakṣaḥ pakṣīkartum śakyaḥ vādi icchayā vastu vyavasthāyāḥ abhāvāt

original: iha tu sthāvarādau kartrabhāvaniścayo nāstītyuktam //
analyzed: iha tu sthāvara ādau kartṛ abhāva niścayaḥ na asti iti uktam

original: nanusthāvareṣu pakṣīkṛteṣvapi vyabhicāro na nivartata eva /
analyzed: nanu sthāvareṣu pakṣīkṛteṣu api vyabhicāraḥ na nivartate eva

original: na hi sapakṣavipakṣavyatirekeṇa tāttvikaḥ pakṣo nāma kaścidasti vastuno dvairūpyānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na hi sapakṣa vipakṣa vyatirekeṇa tāttvikaḥ pakṣaḥ nāma kaścid asti vastunaḥ dvairūpya anupapatteḥ

original: vastusthityā sakartṛkāścedvanaspatiprabhṛtayaḥ sapakṣā eva te /
analyzed: vastu sthityā sa kartṛkāḥ ced vanaspati prabhṛtayaḥ sapakṣāḥ eva te

original: no cettarhi vipakṣā eva /
analyzed: no ced tarhi vipakṣāḥ eva

original: na rāśyantaraṃ samastītiucyatepakṣābhāve sapakṣavipakṣavācoyuktireva tāvatkimapekṣā pakṣānukūlo hi sapakṣa ucyatetatpratikūlaśca vipakṣa iti //
analyzed: na rāśi antaram samasti iti ucyate pakṣa abhāve sapakṣa vipakṣa vācoyuktiḥ eva tāvat kim apekṣā pakṣa anukūlaḥ hi sapakṣaḥ ucyate tad pratikūlaḥ ca vipakṣaḥ iti

original: yadyevaṃvaktavyaṃ tarhi ko 'yaṃ pakṣo nāmeti sādhyadharmānvitatvena dvābhyāmapyavadhāritaḥ /
analyzed: yadi evam vaktavyam tarhi kaḥ yam pakṣaḥ nāma iti sādhya dharma anvita tvena dvābhyām api avadhāritaḥ

original: sapakṣaḥtadabhāvena viścatasya vipakṣatā //159//
analyzed: sapakṣaḥ tad abhāvena viścatasya vipakṣa tā

original: vimato yatra tu tayoḥ taṃ pakṣaṃ saṃpracakṣamahe /
analyzed: vimataḥ yatra tu tayoḥ tam pakṣam saṃpracakṣamahe

original: vastuno vyātmakatvaṃ tu nānumanyāmahe vayaṃ //160//
analyzed: vastunaḥ vyātmaka tvam tu na anumanyāmahe vayam

original: vādibuddhyanusāreṇa sthitiḥ pakṣasya yadyapi /
analyzed: vādi buddhi anusāreṇa sthitiḥ pakṣasya yadi api

original: tathā 'pi vyavahāro 'sti vastutastannibandhanaḥ //161//
analyzed: tathā sti vastutas tad nibandhanaḥ

original: sandigdhe hi nyāyaḥ pravartatenānupalabdhe na virṇīta ityuktametat /
analyzed: sandigdhe hi nyāyaḥ pravartate enā anupalabdhe na virṇīte iti uktam etat

original: sandihyamāna eva cārthaḥ pakṣa ucyate /
analyzed: sandihyamānaḥ eva ca arthaḥ pakṣaḥ ucyate

original: kiñcitkālaṃ tasya pakṣatvaṃ yāvannirṇayo notpannaḥ /
analyzed: kiñcitkālam tasya pakṣa tvam yāvat nirṇayaḥ na utpannaḥ

original: tadutpāde tu nūnaṃ sapakṣavipakṣayoranyataratrānupravekṣyatyasau /
analyzed: tad utpāde tu nūnam sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ anyataratra anupravekṣyati asau

original: ataśca pakṣāvasthāyāṃ tena vyabhicārodbhāvanamasamīcīnam //
analyzed: atas ca pakṣa avasthāyām tena vyabhicāra udbhāvanam asamīcīnam

original: nanuniścitavipakṣavṛttiriva sandigdhavipakṣavṛttirapi na hetureva /
analyzed: nanu niścita vipakṣa vṛttiḥ iva sandigdha vipakṣa vṛttiḥ api na hetuḥ eva

original: tadevaṃ vīrudhādiṣu sandigdhe 'pi kartari sanniveśasya darśanādahetutvamnaitatsāramsadasatpāvakatayā parvate sandigdhe vipakṣe vartamānasya dhūmasyāhetutvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: tat evam vīrudha ādiṣu sandigdhe pi kartari sanniveśasya darśanāt ahetu tvam na etat sāram sat asat pāvaka tayā parvate sandigdhe vipakṣe vartamānasya dhūmasya ahetu tva prasaṅgāt

original: sarva eva ca sādhyāṃśasaṃśayādvipakṣā eva jātā iti pakṣavṛttayo hetava idānīṃ vipakṣagāmino bhaveyurityanumānocchedaḥ //
analyzed: sarve eva ca sādhya aṃśa saṃśayāt vipakṣāḥ eva jātāḥ iti pakṣa vṛttayaḥ hetavaḥ idānīm vipakṣa gāminaḥ bhaveyuḥ iti anumāna ucchedaḥ

original: atha pakṣīkṛte 'pi dharmiṇi sadasatsādhyadhermatayā sandigdhe 'pi vartamāno dhūmādiḥ anyatra vyāptiniścayāt gamaka iṣyatetarhi sadasatkartṛkatayā sandigdhe 'pi vasndharāvanaspatyādau vartamānaṃ kāryatvamanyatra vyāptiniścayāt gamakamiṣyatā /
analyzed: atha pakṣīkṛte pi dharmiṇi sat asat sādhya dheḥ matayā sandigdhe pi vartamānaḥ dhūma ādiḥ anyatra vyāpti niścayāt gamakaḥ iṣyate tarhi sat asat kartṛkatayā sandigdhe pi vasndharā vanaspati ādau vartamānam kāryatvam anyatra vyāpti niścayāt gamakam iṣyatā

original: viśeṣo vā vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ

original: anye mayantekimakṛṣṭajātasthāvarādivyabhicārasthānānveṣaṇena pṛthivyādibhirevātra vyabhicāraḥasya vyāptigrahaṇasya pratighātāt /
analyzed: anye mayante kim akṛṣṭa jāta sthāvara ādi vyabhicāra sthāna anveṣaṇena pṛthivī ādibhiḥ eva atra vyabhicāraḥ asya vyāpti grahaṇasya pratighātāt

original: vyāptir hi gṛhyamāṇā sakalasapakṣavipakṣakroḍīkāreṇa gṛhyate /
analyzed: vyāptiḥ hi gṛhyamāṇā sakala sapakṣa vipakṣa kroḍīkāreṇa gṛhyate

original: itthaṃ ca tasyāṃ gṛhyāmāṇāyāmeva [yadyatsanniveśaviśiṣṭaṃtattadbuddhimatkartṛkaṃ] ityasminnevāvasare sanniveśavanto 'pi kartṛśūnyatayā śailādayaścetasi sphuranti /
analyzed: ittham ca tasyām gṛhyāmāṇāyām eva yat yat sanniveśa viśiṣṭam tat tat buddhimat kartṛkam iti asmin eva avasare sanniveśavantaḥ api kartṛ śūnyatayā śaila ādayaḥ cetasi sphuranti

original: yathā kṛtakatvena vahneranuṣṇatā 'numāne [yadyat kṛtakaṃ tattadanuṣṇam] iti vyāptiparicchedavelāyāmeva vahniruṣṇo 'pi kṛtaka iti hṛdayapathamavatarati /
analyzed: yathā kṛtaka tvena vahneḥ anuṣṇa tā anumāne yat yat kṛtakam tat tat anuṣṇam iti vyāpti pariccheda velāyām eva vahniḥ uṣṇaḥ pi kṛtakaḥ iti hṛdaya patham avatarati

original: tadvarjaṃ tu vyāptau gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ tato hetoḥ ṣaṇḍādiva putrajananamaghaṭamānameva sādhyānumānamiti //
analyzed: tad varjam tu vyāptau gṛhyamāṇāyām tatas hetoḥ ṣaṇḍāt iva putra jananam aghaṭamānam eva sādhya anumānam iti

original: tadetadanupapannamviśeṣollekharahitasāmānyamātrapratiṣṭhitasya vyāptiricchedasyānumānalakṣaṇe nirṇītatvāt /
analyzed: tat etat anupapannam viśeṣa ullekha rahita sāmānya mātra pratiṣṭhitasya vyāptiḥ icchedasya anumāna lakṣaṇe nirṇīta tvāt

original: agnyanuṣṇatā 'numāne hi na vyāptigrahaṇapratīghāṭādaprāmāṇyaṃapi tu pratyakṣavirodhādityuktametat //
analyzed: agni anuṣṇa tā numāne hi na vyāpti grahaṇa pratīghāṭāt aprāmāṇyam api tu pratyakṣa virodhāt iti uktam etat

original: api cāyaṃ vṛthivyādau kartranumānanirāsaprakāraḥ [śabdādyupalabdhayaḥkaraṇapūrvikāḥkriyātvātchidikriyāvat] ity atra śrotrādikaraṇānumāne 'pi samānaḥ /
analyzed: api ca ayam vṛthivī ādau kartṛ anumāna nirāsa prakāraḥ śabda ādi upalabdhayaḥ karaṇa pūrvikāḥ kriyā tvāt chidi kriyā vat iti atra śrotra ādi karaṇa anumāne samānaḥ

original: pratibandhāvadhāraṇavelāyāmeva karaṇaśūnyānāṃ śabdādyupalabdhikriyāṇāṃ avadhāraṇāt tābhireva vyabhicārāt /
analyzed: pratibandha avadhāraṇa velāyām eva karaṇa śūnyānām śabda ādi upalabdhi kriyāṇām avadhāraṇāt tābhiḥ eva vyabhicārāt

original: pakṣeṇa ca pṛthivyādināvyabhicāracodanamatyantamalaukikam //
analyzed: pakṣeṇa ca pṛthivī ādinā avyabhicāra codanam atyantam alaukikam

original: nanuvastusthityā parvatādayo 'pi vipakṣā eva tvayā tu teṣāṃ pakṣa iti nāma kṛtam /
analyzed: nanu vastu sthityā parvata ādayaḥ vipakṣāḥ eva tvayā tu teṣām pakṣaḥ iti nāma kṛtam

original: na ca tvadicchayā vastusthitirviparivartate //
analyzed: na ca tvad icchayā vastu sthitiḥ viparivartate

original: nanvevaṃ śabdādyupalabdhayo 'pi vastusthityā vipakṣā eva tāsāmapi pakṣa iti nāmakaraṇameva syātna tāsāṃ karaṇābhāvaniścayānutpādānna vipakṣatvam //
analyzed: nanu evam śabda ādi upalabdhayaḥ pi vastu sthityāḥ vipakṣāḥ eva tāsām api pakṣaḥ iti nāma karaṇam eva syāt na tāsām karaṇa abhāva niścaya anutpādāt na vipakṣa tvam

original: parvatādāvapi kartrabhāvaniścayānutpādānna vipakṣatvam //
analyzed: parvata ādau api kartṛ abhāva niścaya anutpādāt na vipakṣa tvam

original: teṣu kartā nopalabhyata iti cet śabdādyupalabdhika mapi nopalabhyata eva //
analyzed: teṣu kartā nā upalabhyate iti ced śabda ādi upalabdhikam api nā upalabhyate eva

original: karaṇamadṛśyamānatvādeva nopalabhyatena nāstitvāt iti cet kartā 'pyadṛśyatvādeva nopalabhyatena nāstitvāt //
analyzed: karaṇam adṛśyamāna tvāt eva nā upalabhyatena nāstitvāt iti ced kartā pi adṛśya tvāt eva nā upalabhyatena nāstitvāt

original: anumānāt karaṇamupalabhyatetadvyatirekeṇa kriyā 'nupapatteriti cet kartā 'pyanumānādupalapsyatekartāramantareṇa kāryānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: anumānāt karaṇam upalabhyate tad vyatirekeṇa kriyā anupapatteḥ iti ced kartā pi anumānāt upalapsyate kartāram antareṇa kārya anupapatteḥ

original: tenānumānagamyatvānna karturnāstitāgrahaḥ //
analyzed: tena anumāna gamya tvāt na kartuḥ nāstitā grahaḥ

original: tadabhāvādvipakṣatvaṃ kṣityāderapi durbhaṇam //162//
analyzed: tad abhāvāt vipakṣa tvam kṣiti ādeḥ api durbhaṇam

original: liṅgātpūrvaṃ tu sandeho dahane 'pi na vāryate /
analyzed: liṅgāt pūrvam tu sandehaḥ dahane na vāryate

original: tathā sati prapadyeta dhūmo 'pyananumānatām //163//
analyzed: tathā sati prapadyeta dhūmaḥ u pi ananumāna tām

original: athāsya liṅgābhāsatvaṃ likṣityādau kartradarśanāt /
analyzed: atha asya liṅga ābhāsa tvam likṣiti ādau kartṛ adarśanāt

original: dhūme 'pi liṅgābhāsatvaṃ tatra deśe 'gnyadarśanāt //164//
analyzed: dhūme pi liṅga ābhāsa tvam tatra deśe gni adarśanāt

original: nanu taṃ deśamāsādya gṛhyate dhūmalāñchanaḥ /
analyzed: nanu tam deśam āsādya gṛhyate dhūma lāñchanaḥ

original: anayaiva dhiyāsādhovardhasva śaradāṃ śatam //165//
analyzed: anayā eva dhiyā asādho vardhasva śaradām śatam

original: yatpaścāddarśanaṃ tena kiṃ liṅgasya pramāṇatā anarthitvādadṛṣṭe vā kṛśānau kiṃ kariṣyasi //166//
analyzed: yat paścāt darśanam tena kim liṅgasya pramāṇa tā anarthi tvāt adṛṣṭe vā kṛśānau kim kariṣyasi

original: tasmātsarvathā nāyamanaikāntiko hetuḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvathā na ayam anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ

original: yadapi viśeṣaviruddhatvamasya pratipā tadapyasamikṣitābhidhānamviśeṣaviruddhasya hetvābhāsasyābhāvāt /
analyzed: yat api viśeṣa viruddha tvam asya tat api a samikṣita abhidhānam viśeṣa viruddhasya hetvābhāsasya abhāvāt

original: abhyupagame vā sarvānumānocchedaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: abhyupagame vā sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt

original: śrotrādhyanumāne 'pi yathodāhṛte śakyamevamabhidhātum /
analyzed: śrotra adhi anumāne yathā udāhṛte śakyam evam abhidhātum

original: yādṛgeva lavanakriyāyāṃ dātrādikaraṇaṃ kāṭhinyādidharmakamavagataṃ tādṛgeva śrotrādi syāt /
analyzed: yādṛś eva lavana kriyāyām dātṛ ādi karaṇam kāṭhinya ādi dharmakam avagatam tādṛś eva śrotra ādi syāt

original: tadvilakṣaṇakaraṇasādhyatāyāṃ tu sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ chedanādikriyāṇāmatīndriyakaraṇakāryatvādarśanāditi //
analyzed: tad vilakṣaṇa karaṇa sādhyatāyām tu sādhya vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ chedana ādi kriyāṇām atīndriya karaṇa kāryatva adarśanāt iti

original: atha kriyāmātraṃ karaṇamātreṇa vyāptamavagatamiti tāvanmātramanumāpayatitadihāpi sanniveśamātramadhiṣṭhātṛmātreṇa vyāptamupalabdhamiti tāvanmātramevānumāpayatu /
analyzed: atha kriyā mātram karaṇa mātreṇa vyāptam avagatam iti tāvat mātram anumāpayati tat iha api sanniveśa mātram adhiṣṭhātṛ mātreṇa vyāptam upalabdham iti tāvat mātram eva anumāpayatu

original: viśeṣāṇāṃ tu na talliṅgaṃasti yatra bādhakam /
analyzed: viśeṣāṇām tu na tat liṅgam asti yatra bādhakam

original: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvādityayamapi śrāvaṇatvādi śabdasya viśeṣajātaṃ bādhata eva /
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti ayam api śrāvaṇa tva ādi śabdasya viśeṣa jātam bādhate eva

original: dhūmo 'pi parvatāgniviśeṣān kāṃścinmahānasāgnāvadṛṣṭānapahantyeva /
analyzed: dhūmaḥ pi parvata agni viśeṣān kāṃścid mahānasa agnau adṛṣṭān apahanti eva

original: tasmādyathānirdiṣṭasādhyaviparyayasādhanameva viruddho hetuḥna hi viśeṣaviparyayāvahaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā nirdiṣṭa sādhya viparyaya sādhanam eva viruddhaḥ hetuḥ na hi viśeṣa viparyaya āvahaḥ

original: prakṛtahetuśca sādhyaviparyayasyākartṛpūrvakatvasya na sādhakaḥaśvo 'yaṃ viṣāṇitvāditivat /
analyzed: prakṛta hetuḥ ca sādhya viparyayasya akartṛ pūrvakatvasya na sādhakaḥ aśvaḥ yam viṣāṇi tvāt itivat

original: tasmāt na viruddhaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na viruddhaḥ

original: nāpi kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥpratyakṣāgamayorbādhakayoradarśanāt /
analyzed: nā api kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ bādhakayoḥ adarśanāt

original: pratyutāgamamanugrāhakamihodāhariṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: pratyuta āgamam anugrāhakam iha udāhariṣyāmaḥ

original: nāpi satpratipakṣo 'yaṃ hetuḥsaṃśayabījasya viśeṣāgrahaṇāderiha hetutvenānupādānāt //
analyzed: nā api sat pratipakṣaḥ yam hetuḥ saṃśaya bījasya viśeṣa agrahaṇa ādeḥ iha hetu tvena anupādānāt

original: nāpyayamaprayojako hetuḥyathā paramāṇūnāmanityatve sati mūrtatvamabhidhāsyate /
analyzed: na api ayam aprayojakaḥ hetuḥ yathā paramāṇūnām anitya tve sati mūrta tvam abhidhāsyate

original: na hi mūrtatvaprayuktamanityatvam /
analyzed: na hi mūrta tva prayuktam anitya tvam

original: iha tu kāryatvaprayuktameva sakartṛkatvaṃ tatra tatropalabdhamiti /
analyzed: iha tu kāryatva prayuktam eva sa kartṛka tvam tatra tatra upalabdham iti

original: ata evānumānavirodhasyeṣṭavighātakṛtaśca na kaścidihāvasaraḥ /
analyzed: atas eva anumāna virodhasya iṣṭa vighāta kṛtaḥ ca na kaścid iha avasaraḥ

original: prayojake hetau prayukte tathāvidhapāṃsuprakṣepaprayogānavakāśāt /
analyzed: prayojake hetau prayukte tathāvidha pāṃsu prakṣepa prayoga anavakāśāt

original: tasmātparodīritāśaṣedoṣavikalakāryānumānamahimnā nūnamīśvaraḥ kalpanīyaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt para udīrita āśaṣe doṣa vikala kārya anumāna mahimnā nūnam īśvaraḥ kalpanīyaḥ

original: sakalalokasākṣikamapi cānumānaprāmāṇyamapīkṣaṇīyam /
analyzed: sakala loka sākṣikam api ca anumāna prāmāṇyam api īkṣaṇīyam

original: anumānapramāṇyarakṣaṇe ca kṛta eva parikarabandhaḥ prāgiti siddha eveśvaraḥ //
analyzed: anumāna pramāṇya rakṣaṇe ca kṛtaḥ eva parikara bandhaḥ prāk iti siddhaḥ evā īśvaraḥ

original: anyadapi tadanumānamanyairuktam /
analyzed: anyat api tad anumānam anyaiḥ uktam

original: mahābhūtādi vyaktaṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ sat sukhaduḥkhe janayatirūpādimattvāt tūryadivat /
analyzed: mahābhūta ādi vyaktam cetanā dhiṣṭhitam sat sukha duḥkhe janayati rūpa ādimat tvāt tūrya di vat

original: tathā pṛthivyādini bhūtāni cetanādhiṣṭhitāni santi dhāraṇādikriyāṃ kurvantiyugyādivaditi /
analyzed: tathā pṛthivī ādini bhūtāni cetanā dhiṣṭhitāni santi dhāraṇā ādi kriyām kurvanti yugya ādi vat iti

original: atrāpi doṣāḥ pūrvavadeva parihartavyāḥ //
analyzed: atra api doṣāḥ pūrvavat eva parihartavyāḥ

original: yatpunaravādi [kartṛsāmānyasiddhau vā viśeṣāvagatiḥ kutaḥ] iti tatra kecidāgamādviśeṣapratipattimāhuḥ [viśvataścakṣuruta viśvato mukho viśvato bāhuruta viśvataspāt /
analyzed: yat punar avādi kartṛ sāmānya siddhau vā viśeṣa avagatiḥ kutas iti tatra kecid āgamāt viśeṣa pratipattim āhuḥ viśvatas cakṣuḥ uta viśvatas mukhaḥ viśvatas bāhuḥ uta viśvataspād

original: saṃbāhubhyāṃ dhamati saṃpatataiḥ dyāvābhūmī janayan deva ekaḥ] iti /
analyzed: saṃ bāhubhyām dhamati saṃpatataiḥ dyāvābhūmī janayan devaḥ ekaḥ iti

original: tathā [apāṇipādo javano gṛhītā paśyatyacakṣuḥ sa śṛṇotyakarṇaḥ /
analyzed: tathā a pāṇi pādaḥ javanaḥ gṛhītā paśyati a cakṣuḥ sa śṛṇoti a karṇaḥ

original: sa vetti sarvaṃ na hi tasya vettā tamāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam] iti śrutau paṭhyate /
analyzed: sa vetti sarvam na hi tasya vettā tam āhuḥ agryam puruṣam mahāntam iti śrutau paṭhyate

original: tataḥ sarvasya kartā sarvajña īśvaro jñāpyate //
analyzed: tatas sarvasya kartā sarvajñaḥ īśvaraḥ jñāpyate

original: na ca kārya evārthe vedāḥ pramāṇamiti mantrārthavādānāmatatparatvamabhidhātumucitam kārya iva siddhe 'pyarthe vedaprāmāṇyasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: na ca kārye eva arthe vedāḥ pramāṇam iti mantra arthavādānām atatpara tvam abhidhātum ucitam kārye iva siddhe pi arthe veda prāmāṇyasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: na cetaretarāśrayam āgamaikaśaraṇatvābhāvādīśvarasiddheḥ //
analyzed: na ca itaretarāśrayam āgama eka śaraṇa tva abhāvāt īśvara siddheḥ

original: anye tuanvayavyatirekihetumūlakevalavyatirekibalena viśeṣasiddhimabhidadhati /
analyzed: anye tu anvaya vyatireki hetu mūla kevala vyatireki balena viśeṣa siddhim abhidadhati

original: dehādivyatiriktātmakalpanamiva sukhaduḥkhādigatena kāryatvena varṇayiṣyatepṛthivyādikāryaṃ asmadādivilakṣaṇasarvajñaikakartṛkamasmadādiṣu bādhakotpattau satyāṃ kāryatvāditi //
analyzed: deha ādi vyatirikta ātma kalpanam iva sukha duḥkha ādi gatena kāryatvena varṇayiṣyate pṛthivī ādi kāryam asmat ādi vilakṣaṇa sarvajña eka kartṛkam asmat ādiṣu bādhaka utpattau satyām kāryatvāt iti

original: aparepakṣadharmatāvalādeva viśeṣalābhamabhyupagacchanti /
analyzed: apare pakṣa dharmatā valāt eva viśeṣa lābham abhyupagacchanti

original: na hīdṛśaṃ paridṛśyamānamanekarūpamaparimitamanantapraṇigatavicitrasukhaduḥkhasādhanaṃ bhuvanādikāryaṃ anatiśayena puṃsā kartuṃ śakyamiti //
analyzed: na hi īdṛśam paridṛśyamānam aneka rūpam aparimitam ananta praṇigata vicitra sukha duḥkha sādhanam bhuvana ādi kāryam anatiśayena puṃsā kartum śakyam iti

original: yathā candanadhūmamitaradhūmavisadṛśamavalokya candana eva vahniranumīyatetathā vilakṣaṇāt kāryāt vikalṣaṇa eva kartā 'numāsyate //
analyzed: yathā candana dhūmam itara dhūma visadṛśam avalokya candanaḥ eva vahniḥ anumīyate tathā vilakṣaṇāt kāryāt vikalṣaṇaḥ eva kartā

original: yathā prāvarakebhya iva tatkuśalaḥ kuvindaḥyathā ca kulālaḥ sakalakalaśādikāryakalāpotpattisaṃvidhānaprayojanādyabhijño bhavamstasya kāryacakrasya kartātatheyatastrailokyasya niravadhiprāṇisukhaduḥkhasādhanasya sṛṣṭisaṃhārasaṃvidhānaṃ saprayojanaṃ bahuśākhaṃ jānanneva sraṣṭā bhavitumarhati maheśvaraḥ /
analyzed: yathā prāvarakebhyaḥ iva tat kuśalaḥ kuvindaḥ yathā ca kulālaḥ sakala kalaśa ādi kārya kalāpa utpatti saṃvidhāna prayojana ādi abhijñaḥ bhavan tasya kārya cakrasya kartā tathā iyatas trailokyasya niravadhi prāṇi sukha duḥkha sādhanasya sṛṣṭi saṃhāra saṃvidhānam sa prayojanam bahu śākham jānan eva sraṣṭā bhavitum arhati maheśvaraḥ

original: tasmātsarvajñaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvajñaḥ

original: api ca yathā niyataviṣayavṛttīnāṃ cakṣurādīndriyāṇamadhiṣṭhātā kṣetrajñaḥ tadapekṣayā sarvajñaḥevaṃ sakalakṣetrajñakarmaviniyogeṣu prabhavannīśvaraḥ tadapekṣayā sarvajñaḥ /
analyzed: api ca yathā niyata viṣaya vṛttīnām cakṣuḥ ādi indriyāṇam adhiṣṭhātā kṣetrajñaḥ tad apekṣayā sarvajñaḥ evam sakala kṣetrajña karma viniyogeṣu prabhavan īśvaraḥ tad apekṣayā sarvajñaḥ

original: tathā cāha vyāsaḥ [dvāvimau puruṣau loke kṣaraścākṣara eva ca /
analyzed: tathā ca āha vyāsaḥ dvau imau puruṣau loke kṣaraḥ ca akṣaraḥ eva ca

original: kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni kūṭastho 'kṣara ucyate //
analyzed: kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni kūṭasthaḥ kṣaraḥ ucyate

original: uttamaḥ puruṣastvanyaḥ paramātmetyudāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ tu anyaḥ paramātmā iti udāhṛtaḥ

original: yo lokatrayamāviśya vibhartyavyaya īśvaraḥ] //
analyzed: yaḥ lokatrayam āviśya vibharti avyayaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: mantraśca tadarthānuvādī paṭhyate dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pariṣasvajāte /
analyzed: mantraḥ ca tad artha anuvādī paṭhyate dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānam vṛkṣam pariṣasvajāte

original: tayoranyaḥ pipplaṃ svādvatti anaśnannanyo abhicākaśīti] iti //
analyzed: tayoḥ anyaḥ pipplam svādu atti an aśnan anyaḥ abhicākaśīti iti

original: ataś ca sarvajña īśvaraḥ //
analyzed: atas ca sarvajñaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: puṃsāmasarvavittvaṃ hi rāgādimalabandhanam /
analyzed: puṃsām asarva vid tvam hi rāga ādi mala bandhanam

original: na ca rāgādibhiḥ spṛṣṭo bhagavāniti sarvavit //167//
analyzed: na ca rāga ādibhiḥ spṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān iti sarva vid

original: iṣṭānaṣṭārthasaṃbhogaprabhavāḥ khalu dehinām /
analyzed: iṣṭa a naṣṭa artha saṃbhoga prabhavāḥ khalu dehinām

original: rāgādayaḥ kathaṃ te syurnityānandātmake śive //168//
analyzed: rāga ādayaḥ katham te syuḥ nitya ānanda ātmake śive

original: mithyājñānamūlāśca rāgādayo dosāḥte kathaṃ nityanirmalajñānavatīśvare bhaveyuḥ nityaṃ tajjñānaṃ kathamiti cettasmin kṣaṇamapyajñātari sati tadicchāpreryamāṇakarmādhīnanānāprakāravyavahāraviramaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: mithyājñāna mūlāḥ ca rāga ādayaḥ dosāḥ te katham nitya nirmala jñānavati īśvare bhaveyuḥ nityam tat jñānam katham iti ced tasmin kṣaṇam api ajñātari sati tad icchā preryamāṇa karma adhīna nānā prakāra vyavahāra virama prasaṅgāt

original: pralayavelāyāṃ tarhi kutastannityatvakalpaneti cetmaivamāpralayātsiddhe vityatve tadā vināśakāraṇābhāvāt asya ātmana iva tajjñānasya nityatvaṃ setsyati /
analyzed: pralaya velāyām tarhi kutas tad nitya tva kalpanā iti ced mā evam ā pralayāt siddhe vityatve tadā vināśa kāraṇa abhāvāt asya ātmanaḥ iva tad jñānasya nitya tvam setsyati

original: punaśca sargakāle tadutpattikāraṇābhāvādapi nityaṃ jñānam //
analyzed: punar ca sarga kāle tad utpatti kāraṇa abhāvāt api nityam jñānam

original: evañca tadatītānāgatasūkṣamavyavahitādisamastavastuviṣayaṃna bhinnam kramayougapadyavikalpānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: evam ca tat atīta anāgata sūkṣam avyavahita ādi samasta vastu viṣayam na bhinnam krama yougapadya vikalpa anupapatteḥ

original: kramāśrayaṇe kvacidajñātṛtvaṃ syāditi vyavahāralopaḥ /
analyzed: krama āśrayaṇe kvacid ajñātṛ tvam syāt iti vyavahāra lopaḥ

original: yaugapadyena sarvajñātṛtve kutastyo jñānabhedaḥ pratyakṣādharmyācca tajjñānaṃ pratyakṣamucyatena punarindriyārthasannikarṣotpannatvamasyāsti ajanakānamevārthānāṃ savitṛprakāśeneva tena grahaṇāt //
analyzed: yaugapadyena sarvajñātṛ tve kutastyaḥ jñāna bhedaḥ pratyakṣa ādharmyāt ca tat jñānam pratyakṣam ucyate na punar indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tvam asya asti a jana kānam eva arthānām savitṛ prakāśena iva tena grahaṇāt

original: jñānavadanye 'pyātmaguṇā ye 'sya santite nityā eva manaśaṃyogānapekṣajanmatvāt /
analyzed: jñāna vat anye pi ātma guṇāḥ ye santi te nityāḥ eva

original: duḥkhadveṣāstasya tāvanna santyeva /
analyzed: duḥkha dveṣāḥ tasya tāvat na santi eva

original: bhāvanākhyena saṃskāreṇāpi na prayojanam sarvadā sarvārthadarśitvena smṛtyabhāvāt /
analyzed: bhāvanā ākhyena saṃskāreṇa api na prayojanam sarvadā sarva artha darśi tvena smṛti abhāvāt

original: ata eva na tasyānumānikaṃ jñānamiṣyate /
analyzed: atas eva na tasya ānumānikam jñānam iṣyate

original: dharmastu bhūtānugrahavato vastusvābhāvyādbhavanna vāryate /
analyzed: dharmaḥ tu bhūta anugrahavataḥ vastu svābhāvyāt bhavan na vāryate

original: tasya ca phalaṃ parārthaniṣpattireva /
analyzed: tasya ca phalam parārtha niṣpattiḥ eva

original: sukhaṃ tvasya nityamevanityānandatvenāgamāt pratīteḥ /
analyzed: sukham tu asya nityam eva nitya ānanda tvena āgamāt pratīteḥ

original: asukhitasya caivamvidhakāryārambhayogyatā 'bhāvāt //
analyzed: asukhitasya ca evamvidha kārya ārambha yogya tā bhāvāt

original: nanu jñānānandavadicchā 'pi nityā cedīśvarasyatarhi sarvadā tadicchāsambhavāt sarvadā jagadutpattiriti jagadānantyaprasaggaḥ /
analyzed: nanu jñāna ānanda vat icchā pi nityā ced īśvarasya tarhi sarvadā tad icchā sambhavāt sarvadā jagat utpattiḥ iti jagat ānantya prasaggaḥ

original: sargecchānityatvācca saṃhāro na prāpnoti /
analyzed: sarga icchā nitya tvāt ca saṃhāraḥ na prāpnoti

original: saṃhārecchāyā api nityatvābhyupagamena naktaṃdinaṃ pralayaprabandho na viramedeva jagatāmiti naiṣa doṣaḥanātmamanaśaṃyogajatvādicchā svarūpamjātreṇa nityā 'pi kadācitsargeṇa kadācitsaṃhāreṇa vā viṣayeṇānurajyate /
analyzed: saṃhāra icchāyāḥ api nitya tva abhyupagamena naktaṃdinam pralaya prabandhaḥ na viramet eva jagatām iti nā eṣa doṣaḥ anātma manaśam yoga ja tvāt icchā sva rūpam jātreṇa nityā kadācid sargeṇa kadācid saṃhāreṇa vā viṣayeṇa anurajyate

original: sargasaṃhārayorantarāle tu jagataḥ sthityavasthāyāṃ asmātkarmaṇa idamasya saṃpadyatāmitīcchā bhavati prajāpateḥ //
analyzed: sarga saṃhārayoḥ antarāle tu jagataḥ sthiti avasthāyām asmāt karmaṇaḥ idam asya saṃpadyatām iti icchā bhavati prajāpateḥ

original: prayatnastasya sakalpaviśeṣātmaka eva /
analyzed: prayatnaḥ tasya sa kalpa viśeṣa ātmakaḥ eva

original: tathā cāgamaḥ [satyakāmaḥ satyasaṅkalpaḥ] iti /
analyzed: tathā ca āgamaḥ satya kāmaḥ satya saṅkalpaḥ iti

original: [kāmaḥ] itīcchā ucyate [saṃkalpaḥ] iti prayatnaḥ /
analyzed: kāmaḥ iti icchā ucyate saṃkalpaḥ iti prayatnaḥ

original: tadevaṃ navabhya ātmaguṇebhyaḥ pañca jñānasukhecchāprayatnadharmāḥ santīśvare /
analyzed: tat evam navabhyaḥ ātma guṇebhyaḥ pañca jñāna sukha icchā prayatna dharmāḥ santi īśvare

original: catvārastu duḥkhadveṣādharmasaṃskārā na santītyātmaviśeṣa aiveśvaro na dravyāntaram /
analyzed: catvāraḥ tu duḥkha dveṣa adharma saṃskārāḥ na santi iti ātma viśeṣaḥ ā eva īśvaraḥ na dravya antaram

original: āha ca patañjaliḥ[kleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ] iti /
analyzed: āha ca patañjaliḥ kleśa karma vipāka āśayaiḥ aparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣa viśeṣaḥ īśvaraḥ iti

original: so 'yam āgamāt anumānāt pakṣadharmato vā viśeṣalābha iti sthitam //
analyzed: saḥ yam āgamāt anumānāt pakṣa dharmataḥ vā viśeṣa lābhaḥ iti sthitam

original: yat punar vikalpitaṃ [saśarīra īśvaraḥ sṛjati jagat aśarīro vā] iti tatrāśarīrasyaiva sraṣṭṛtvamabhyupagacchāmaḥ //
analyzed: yat punar vikalpitam sa śarīraḥ īśvaraḥ sṛjati jagat aśarīraḥ vā iti tatra aśarīrasya eva sraṣṭṛ tvam abhyupagacchāmaḥ

original: nanu kriyā ''veśanibandhanaṃ kartṛtvaṃna pāribhāṣikam /
analyzed: nanu kriyā veśa nibandhanam kartṛ tvaṃna pāribhāṣikam

original: tat aśarīrasya kriyāvirahāt kathaṃ bhavet kasya ca kutrāśarīrasya kartṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭamitiucyatejñānacikīrṣāprayatnayogitvaṃ kartṛtvamā cakṣate /
analyzed: tat aśarīrasya kriyā virahāt katham bhavet kasya ca kutra aśarīrasya kartṛ tvam dṛṣṭam iti ucyate jñāna cikīrṣā prayatna yogi tvam kartṛ tvam ā cakṣate

original: tacceśvare vidyata evetyuktametat /
analyzed: tat ca īśvare vidyate eva iti uktam etat

original: svaśarīrapreraṇe ca dṛṣṭamaśarīrasyāpyātmanaḥ kartṛtvam //
analyzed: sva śarīra preraṇe ca dṛṣṭam aśarīrasya api ātmanaḥ kartṛ tvam

original: icchāmātreṇa ca tasya kartṛtvāt anekavyāpāranirvartanopāttadurvahakleśakāluṣyavikalpo 'pi prayuktaḥ //
analyzed: icchā mātreṇa ca tasya kartṛ tvāt aneka vyāpāra nirvartana upātta durvaha kleśa kāluṣya vikalpaḥ pi prayuktaḥ

original: nanuatroktam [kulālavacca naitasya vyāpāro yadi kalpyate /
analyzed: nanu atra uktam kulāla vat ca na etasya vyāpāraḥ yadi kalpyate

original: acetanaḥ kathaṃ bhāvaḥ tadicchāmanuvartate] iti //
analyzed: acetanaḥ katham bhāvaḥ tad icchām anuvartate iti

original: asmābhirapyuktam eva yathā hyacetanaḥ kāyaḥ ātmecchāmanuvartate /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ api uktam eva yathā hi acetanaḥ kāyaḥ ātma icchām anuvartate

original: tadicchāmanuvartsyante tathaiva paramāṇavaḥ //169//
analyzed: tad icchām anuvartsyante tathā eva paramāṇavaḥ

original: yas tu prayojanavikalpaḥkimarthaṃ sṛjati jaganti bhagavān itiso 'pi na peśalaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu prayojana vikalpaḥ kimartham sṛjati jaganti bhagavān iti saḥ na peśalaḥ

original: svabhāva evaiṣa bhagavataḥyat kadācit sṛjatikadācicca saṃharati viśvamiti //
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ eva eṣa bhagavataḥ yat kadācid sṛjati kadācid ca saṃharati viśvam iti

original: kathaṃ punarniyatakāla eṣo 'sya svabhāva iti cetādityaṃ paśyatu devānāṃpriyaḥyo niyatakālamudetyastameti ca /
analyzed: katham punar niyata kālaḥ eṣaḥ sya svabhāvaḥ iti ceta ādityam paśyatu devānāṃpriyaḥ yaḥ niyata kālam udeti astam eti ca

original: prāṇikarmasāpekṣametadvivasvato rūpamiti cet īśvare 'pi tulyaḥ samādhiḥ //
analyzed: prāṇi karma sāpekṣam etat vivasvataḥ rūpam iti ced īśvare pi tulyaḥ samādhiḥ

original: krīḍārthe 'pi jagatsarge na hīyate kṛtārthatā /
analyzed: krīḍā arthe jagat sarge na hīyate kṛtārtha tā

original: pravartamānā dṛśyante na hi krīḍāsu duḥkhitāḥ //170//
analyzed: pravartamānāḥ dṛśyante na hi krīḍāsu duḥkhitāḥ

original: athavā anukampayaiva sargasaṃhārāvārabhatāmīśvaraḥ //
analyzed: athavā anukampayā eva sarga saṃhārau ārabhatām īśvaraḥ

original: nanv atra coditam na tathāvidhāḥ prāṇino 'nukampyā bhavanti /
analyzed: nanu atra coditam na tathāvidhāḥ prāṇinaḥ nukampyāḥ bhavanti

original: kevalasukhasvabhāvā vā sṛṣṭiranukampāvatā kriyeteti satyaṃ coditamanupapannaṃ tu anāditvātsaṃsārasya //
analyzed: kevala sukha svabhāvā vā sṛṣṭiḥ anukampāvatā kriyeta iti satyam coditam anupapannam tu anādi tvāt saṃsārasya

original: śubhāśubhasaṃskārānuviddhā evātmānaḥ /
analyzed: śubha aśubha saṃskāra anuviddhāḥ eva ātmānaḥ

original: te ca dharmādharmanigaḍasaṃyatatvādapavargapuradvārapraveśamalabhavānāḥ kathaṃ nānukampyāḥ anupabhuktaphalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ na prakṣayaḥ /
analyzed: te ca dharma adharma nigaḍa saṃyata tvāt apavarga pura dvāra praveśa mala bhavānāḥ katham na anukampyāḥ an upabhukta phalānām karmaṇām na prakṣayaḥ

original: sargamantareṇa ca tatphalopabhogāsaṃbhava iti śubhaphalopabhogāya svargādisargaṃaśubhaphalopabhogāya narakādisṛṣṭimārabhate dayālureva bhagavān /
analyzed: sargam antareṇa ca tad phala upabhoga asaṃbhavaḥ iti śubha phala upabhogāya svarga ādi sargam aśubha phala upabhogāya naraka ādi sṛṣṭim ārabhate dayāluḥ eva bhagavān

original: upabhogaprabandhena pariśrāntānāmantarā 'ntarā viśrāntaye jantūnāṃ bhuvanopasaṃhāram api karotīti sarvametatkṛpānibandhanameva //
analyzed: upabhoga prabandhena pariśrāntānām antarā ntarā viśrāntaye jantūnām bhuvana upasaṃhāram api karoti iti sarvam etat kṛpā nibandhanam eva

original: nanu ca yugapadeva sakalajagatpralayakaraṇamanupapannamavināśināṃ karmaṇāṃ phalopabhogapratibandhāsaṃbhavāditi coditamna yuktametat īśvarecchāpratibaddhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ stimitaśaktīnāmavasthānāt /
analyzed: nanu ca yugapad eva sakala jagat pralaya karaṇam anupapannam avināśinām karmaṇām phala upabhoga pratibandha asaṃbhavāt iti coditam na yuktam etat īśvara icchā pratibaddhānām karmaṇām stimita śaktīnām avasthānāt

original: tadicchāpreritāni karmāṇiphalamādadhati /
analyzed: tad icchā preritāni karmāṇi phalam ādadhati

original: tadicchāpratibaddhāni ca tatrodāsate /
analyzed: tad icchā pratibaddhāni ca tatra udāsate

original: kasmādevamiti cetacetanānāṃ cetanānadhiṣṭhitānāṃ svakāryakaraṇānupalabdheḥ //
analyzed: kasmāt evam iti ceta cetanānām cetanā anadhiṣṭhitānām sva kārya karaṇa anupalabdheḥ

original: nanuteṣāmeva karmaṇāṃ kartāra ātmānaścetanā adhiṣṭhātāro bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: nanu teṣām eva karmaṇām kartāraḥ ātmānaḥ cetanāḥ adhiṣṭhātāraḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: yathāha bhaṭṭaḥ [karmabhiḥ sarvajīvānāṃ tatsiddheḥ siddhasādhanam] iti naitadevamnaite 'dhiṣṭhātāro bhavitumarhanti bahutvātviruddhābhiprāyatvācca /
analyzed: yathā āha bhaṭṭaḥ karmabhiḥ sarva jīvānām tad siddheḥ siddha sādhanam iti na etat evam na ete dhiṣṭhātāraḥ bhavitum arhanti bahu tvāt viruddha abhiprāya tvāt ca

original: tathā hyeka eva kaścit sthāvarādiviśeṣo rājādiviśeṣo vā prāṇikoṭīnāmanekavidhasukhaduḥkhopabhogasya hetuḥ sa tairbahubhiravyavasthitābhiprāyaiḥ kathamārabheta teṣāmekatra saṃmānābhāvāt /
analyzed: tathā hi ekaḥ eva kaścid sthāvara ādi viśeṣaḥ rāja ādi viśeṣaḥ vā prāṇi koṭīnām anekavidha sukha duḥkha upabhogasya hetuḥ sa taiḥ bahubhiḥ avyavasthita abhiprāyaiḥ katham ārabheta teṣām ekatra saṃmāna abhāvāt

original: maṭhapariṣado 'pi kvacideva sakalasādhāraṇopakāriṇi kārye bhavatyaikamatyamna sarvatra /
analyzed: kvacid eva sakala sādhāraṇa upakāriṇi kārye sarvatra

original: mahāprāsādāṃdyārambhe bahūnāṃ takṣādīnāmekasthapatyāśayānuvartitvaṃ dṛśyate /
analyzed: mahā prāsāda andya ārambhe bahūnām takṣa ādīnām eka sthapati āśaya anuvarti tvam dṛśyate

original: pipīlakānāmapi mṛtkūṭakaraṇe tulyaḥ kaścidupakāraḥ pravartakaḥsthapativat ekāśayānuvartitvaṃ vā kalpyam /
analyzed: pipīlakānām api mṛd kūṭa karaṇe tulyaḥ kaścid upakāraḥ ekāśaya anuvarti tvam vā kalpyam

original: iha tu tatsthāvaraṃ śarīraṃ keṣāccidupakārakāraṇaṃitāreṣām api bhūyasāmapakārakāraṇamiti kathaṃ taiḥ saṃbhūya sṛjyate /
analyzed: iha tu tat sthāvaram śarīram api bhūyasām apakāra kāraṇam iti katham taiḥ saṃbhūya sṛjyate

original: anadhiṣṭhitānāntvacetanānāmārambhakatvamayuktameva /
analyzed: anadhiṣṭhitānām tu acetanānām ārambhaka tvam ayuktam eva

original: tasmādavaśyamekasteṣāṃ karmaṇāmadhiṣṭhātā kalpanīyaḥyadicchāmantareṇa bhavantyapi karmāṇi na phalajanmane prabhavanti //
analyzed: tasmāt avaśyam ekaḥ teṣām karmaṇām adhiṣṭhātā kalpanīyaḥ yat icchām antareṇa bhavanti api karmāṇi na phala janmane prabhavanti

original: ata evaika īśvara iṣyatena dvaubahavo vā bhinnābhiprāyatayā lokānugrahopaghātavaiśasaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: atas eva ekaḥ īśvaraḥ dvau bahavaḥ vā bhinna abhiprāya tayā loka anugraha upaghāta vaiśasa prasaṅgāt

original: icchāvisaṃvādasaṃbhavena ca tataḥ kasyacit saṅkalpavighātadvārakānaiśvaryaprasaṅgāt ityeka eveśvaraḥ /
analyzed: icchā visaṃvāda saṃbhavena ca tatas kasyacid saṅkalpa vighāta dvāraka anaiśvarya prasaṅgāt iti ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ

original: tadicchayā karmāṇikāryeṣu pravartante ityupapannaḥ sargaḥ /
analyzed: tad icchayā karmāṇi kāryeṣu pravartante iti upapannaḥ sargaḥ

original: tadicchāpratibandhāt stimitaśaktīni karmāṇyudāsata ityupapannaḥ pralayaḥ //
analyzed: tad icchā pratibandhāt stimita śaktīni karmāṇi udāsate iti upapannaḥ pralayaḥ

original: evañca yaduktaṃ [tasmādadyavadevātra sargapralayakalpanā /
analyzed: evam ca yat uktam tasmāt adya vat eva atra sarga pralaya kalpanā

original: samasta kṣayajanmabhyāṃ na siddhyatyapramāṇikā] iti etadapi asāṃpratam //
analyzed: samasta kṣaya janmabhyām na iti etat api asāṃpratam

original: tiṣṭhitu vā sargapralayakālaḥadyatve 'pi yathoktanayena tadicchāmantareṇa prāṇināṃ karmavipākānupapatteravaśyamīśvaro 'hyupagantavyaḥ itarathā sarvavyavahāravipralopaḥ /
analyzed: vā sarga pralaya kālaḥ adyatve pi yathā ukta nayena tad icchām antareṇa prāṇinām karma vipāka anupapatteḥ avaśyam īśvaraḥ hi upagantavyaḥ itarathā sarva vyavahāra vipralopaḥ

original: taduktam [ajño janturanīśo 'yamātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam ajñaḥ jantuḥ anīśaḥ yam ātmanaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhrameva vā] iti //
analyzed: īśvara preritaḥ gacchet svargam vā śvabhram eva vā iti

original: nanuevaṃ tarhi īśvarecchaiva bhavatu kartrī saṃharkrī ca /
analyzed: nanu evam tarhi īśvara icchā eva bhavatu kartrī saṃharkrī ca

original: kiṃ karmabhiḥ maivamkarmabhirvinā jagadvaictryānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: kim karmabhiḥ mā evam karmabhiḥ vinā jagat vaictrya anupapatteḥ

original: karmanairapekṣyapakṣe 'pi trayo doṣā darśitā eva īśvarasya nirdayatvaṃ karmacodanānarthakyamanirmokṣaprasaṅgaśceti /
analyzed: karma nairapekṣya pakṣe trayaḥ doṣāḥ darśitāḥ eva īśvarasya nirdaya tvam karma codana ānarthakyam anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ ca iti

original: tasmāt karmaṇāmevaniyojane svātantryamīśvarasyana tannirapekṣam //
analyzed: tasmāt karmaṇām eva niyojane svātantryam īśvarasya na tad nirapekṣam

original: kiṃ tādṛśaiśvaryeṇ prayojanamiti cetnana prayojanānuvarti pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhati /
analyzed: kim prayojanam iti prayojana anuvarti pramāṇam bhavitum arhati

original: kiṃ vā bhagavataḥ karmāpekṣiṇo 'pi na prabhutva mityalaṃ kutarkalavaliptamukhanāstikālāpaparimardena tasmāt kutārki kodgītadūṣaṇābhāsavāraṇāt /
analyzed: kim vā bhagavataḥ karma apekṣiṇaḥ na prabhu tvam iti alam kutarka lava lipta mukha nāstika ālāpa parimardena tasmāt kutārki ka udgīta dūṣaṇa ābhāsa vāraṇāt

original: siddhastrailokyanirmāṇanipuṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ //171//
analyzed: siddhaḥ trailokya nirmāṇa nipuṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ

original: ye tvīśvaraṃ nirapavādadṛḍhapramāṇasiddhasvarūpamapi nābhypayanti mūḍhāḥ /
analyzed: ye tu īśvaram nirapavāda dṛḍha pramāṇa siddha svarūpam api na abhypayanti mūḍhāḥ

original: pāpāya taiśaha kathā 'pi vitanyamānā j āyeta nūnamiti yuktamato virantum //172//
analyzed: pāpāya kathā āyeta nūnam iti yuktam atas virantum

original: yasyecchayaiva bhuvanāni samudbhavanti tiṣṭhanti yānti ca punarvilayaṃ yugānte /
analyzed: yasya icchayā eva bhuvanāni samudbhavanti tiṣṭhanti yānti ca punar vilayam yuga ante

original: tasmai samastaphalabhoganibandhanāya nityaprabuddhamuditāya namaḥ śivāya //173//
analyzed: tasmai samasta phala bhoga nibandhanāya nitya prabuddha muditāya namaḥ śivāya

original: vedapauruṣeyatvasādhanaprakaraṇam nanutrailokyanirmāṇanipuṇe parameśvare /
analyzed: veda pauruṣeya tva sādhana prakaraṇam nanu trailokya nirmāṇa nipuṇe parameśvare

original: siddhe 'pi tatpraṇītatvaṃ navedasyāvakalpate //174//
analyzed: siddhe pi tad praṇīta tvam na vedasya avakalpate

original: pade śabdārthasambandhe vedasya racanāsu vā /
analyzed: pade śabda artha sambandhe vedasya racanāsu vā

original: kartṛtvamasyāśaṅkyeta tacca sarvatra durvacam //175//
analyzed: kartṛ tvam asya āśaṅkyeta tat ca sarvatra durvacam

original: varṇarāśiḥ kramavyaktaḥ padamityabhidhīyate /
analyzed: varṇa rāśiḥ krama vyaktaḥ padam iti abhidhīyate

original: varṇānāṃ cāvināśitvāt kathamīśvarakāryatā /176//
analyzed: varṇānām ca avināśi tvāt katham īśvara kārya tā

original: sambandho 'pi na tatkāryaḥ sa hi śaktisvabhāvakaḥ /
analyzed: sambandhaḥ pi na tad kāryaḥ sa hi śakti svabhāvakaḥ

original: śabde vācakaśakriśca nityaivāgnavivoṣṇatā /177//
analyzed: śabde vācaka śakriḥ ca nityā eva agnau iva uṣṇa tā

original: racanā api vaidikyo naitāḥ puruṣanirmitāḥ /
analyzed: racanāḥ api vaidikyaḥ na etāḥ puruṣa nirmitāḥ

original: kavipraṇītakāvyādiracanābhyo vilakṣaṇāḥ //178//
analyzed: kavi praṇīta kāvya ādi racanābhyaḥ vilakṣaṇāḥ

original: evaṃ ca vede svātantryamīśvarasya na kutracit /
analyzed: evam ca vede svātantryam īśvarasya na kutracid

original: kāmaṃ tu parvatāneṣa vidadhātu bhinattu vā //179//
analyzed: kāmam tu parvatān eṣa vidadhātu bhinattu vā

original: svataḥprāmāṇyasiddhau tu vede vaktranapekṣatām /
analyzed: svatas prāmāṇya siddhau tu vede vaktṛ anapekṣa tām

original: vadāmo na tu sarvatra puruṣadveṣiṇo vayam //180//
analyzed: vadāmaḥ na tu sarvatra puruṣa dveṣiṇaḥ vayam

original: anapekṣatvamevāto vedaprāmāṇyakāraṇam /
analyzed: anapekṣa tvam eva atas veda prāmāṇya kāraṇam

original: yuktaṃvaktā 'pi vedasya kurvannapi karotu kim //181//
analyzed: vedasya kurvan api karotu kim

original: kathaṃ punaramī varṇāḥ śrutamātratirohitāḥ /
analyzed: katham punar amī varṇāḥ śruta mātra tirohitāḥ

original: nityā bhavantuko 'yaṃ vā śabdasvātantryadohadaḥ //182//
analyzed: nityāḥ bhavantukaḥ yam vā śabda svātantrya dohadaḥ

original: ucyate śabdasya na hyanityatve yuktiḥ sphurati kāvana /
analyzed: ucyate śabdasya na hi anitya tve yuktiḥ sphurati

original: pratyakṣam arthāpattiś ca nityatāṃ tvadhigacchataḥ //183//
analyzed: pratyakṣam arthāpattiḥ ca nitya tām tu adhigacchataḥ

original: tathā hianityatvahetava ime kila kathyanteprayatnānantaramupalabdheḥ kāryaḥ śabda iti /
analyzed: tathā hi anitya tva hetavaḥ ime kila kathyante prayatna anantaram upalabdheḥ kāryaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: kāryatvānityatvayoḥ parasparāvinābhāvāt ekatarasiddhāvanyatarasiddhirbhavatyeveti kvacit kiñcit sādhanamucyate prayatnapreritakauṣṭhyamārutasaṃyogavibhāgānantaramupalabhyamānaḥ śabdastatkārya eveti gamyate /
analyzed: kārya tva anitya tvayoḥ paraspara avinābhāvāt ekatara siddhau anyatara siddhiḥ bhavati eva iti kvacid kiñcid sādhanam ucyate prayatna prerita kauṣṭhya māruta saṃyoga vibhāga anantaram upalabhyamānaḥ śabdaḥ tad kāryaḥ eva iti gamyate

original: uccāraṇādūrdhvamanupalabdheḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ /
analyzed: uccāraṇāt ūrdhvam anupalabdheḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ

original: na hyenamuccaritaṃ muhūrtamapyupalabhāmahe /
analyzed: na hi enam uccaritam muhūrtam api upalabhāmahe

original: tasmādvinaṣṭa ityavagacchāmaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt vinaṣṭaḥ iti avagacchāmaḥ

original: karotiśabdavyapadeśācca kāryaḥ bdaḥ /
analyzed: karoti śabda vyapadeśāt ca kāryaḥ bdaḥ

original: [śabdaṃ kuru][śabdaṃ mā kārṣīḥ] iti vyavahartāraḥ prayuñjate /
analyzed: śabdam kuru śabdam mā kārṣīḥ iti vyavahartāraḥ prayuñjate

original: te nūnamavagacchanti kāryaḥ śabda iti //
analyzed: te nūnam avagacchanti kāryaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: nānadeśeṣu ca yugapadupalambhāt teṣu teṣu deśeṣu śabdena vyavahārāt sarvatra yugapadupalabhyate śabdaḥ /
analyzed: nānā deśeṣu ca yugapad upalambhāt teṣu teṣu deśeṣu śabdena vyavahārāt sarvatra yugapad upalabhyate śabdaḥ

original: tadekasya nityasya sato 'nupapannam /
analyzed: tat ekasya nityasya sataḥ na upapannam

original: kāryatve tu bahūnāṃ nānādeśeṣu kriyamāṇānāmupapadyate 'nekadeśasambandha iti //
analyzed: kārya tve tu bahūnām nānā deśeṣu kriyamāṇānām upapadyate na eka deśa sambandhaḥ iti

original: śabdāntaravikāryatvāccānityaḥ śabdaḥ /
analyzed: śabda antara vikārya tvāt ca anityaḥ śabdaḥ

original: dadhyatreti ikāra eva yakārībhavatīti sādṛśyāt smṛteścāvagamyate /
analyzed: dadhi atra iti ikāraḥ eva yakārībhavati iti sādṛśyāt smṛteḥ ca avagamyate

original: vikāryatvācca drākṣekṣurasādivadanityatvamasyeti //
analyzed: vikārya tvāt ca drākṣā ikṣu rasa ādi vat anitya tvam asya iti

original: kāraṇavṛddhyā ca vardhamānatvāt /
analyzed: kāraṇa vṛddhyā ca vardhamāna tvāt

original: bahurbhimahāprayatnairuccāryamāṇo mahān gośabda upalabhyatealpairalpaprayatnairuccāryamāṇo 'lpa ityetacca tantuvṛddhyā vardhamāna paṭa iva śabdo 'pi hetuvṛddhyā vardhamānaḥ kāryo bhavitumarhatīti //
analyzed: bahurbhiḥ mahā prayatnaiḥ uccāryamāṇaḥ mahān go śabdaḥ upalabhyate alpaiḥ alpa prayatnaiḥ uccāryamāṇaḥ lpaḥ iti etat ca tantu vṛddhyā paṭaḥ iva hetu vṛddhyā vardhamānaḥ kāryaḥ bhavitum arhati iti

original: ta ete sarva evāprayojakā hetavaḥ /
analyzed: te ete sarve eva aprayojakāḥ hetavaḥ

original: tathāhipratyabhijñātaḥ siddhe nityatve prayatnānantaramupalaṃbhāt abhivyaktiḥ prayatnakāryā śabdasyanotpattiriti gamyate /
analyzed: tathā hi pratyabhijñātaḥ siddhe nitya tve prayatna anantaram upalaṃbhāt abhivyaktiḥ prayatna kāryā śabdasya nā utpattiḥ iti gamyate

original: tadevaṃ vyaṅgye 'pi prayatnānantaramupalambhasaṃbhavādanaikāntikatvam /
analyzed: tat evam vyaṅgye pi prayatna anantaram upalambha saṃbhavāt anaikāntika tvam

original: abhivyañjakānāṃ ca pavanasaṃyogavibhāgānāmacirasthāyitvānna ciramuccāraṇādūrdhvamupalabhyate śabdaḥ //
analyzed: abhivyañjakānām ca pavana saṃyoga vibhāgānām acira sthāyi tvāt na ciram uccāraṇāt ūrdhvam upalabhyate śabdaḥ

original: prayogābhiprāyaś ca karotiśabdavyapadeśo 'sya bhaviṣyatigomayāni kurukāṣṭhāni kurvitivat /
analyzed: prayoga abhiprāyaḥ ca karoti śabda vyapadeśaḥ sya bhaviṣyati gomayāni kurukāṣṭhāni kuru itivat

original: tasmātso 'pi naikāntikaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt saḥ pi na aikāntikaḥ

original: nānādeśeṣu yugapadupalambhanaṃ ekasya sthirasyāpi śabdasya vivasvata iva setsyati //
analyzed: nānā deśeṣu yugapad upalambhanam ekasya sthirasya api śabdasya vivasvataḥ iva setsyati

original: nikāryatvaṃ tvasiddhamevaśabdāntaratvāt /
analyzed: nikārya tvam tu asiddham eva śabda antara tvāt

original: dadhiśabdaikārāntaḥ saṃhitāvyatiriktaviṣayavṛttiḥ /
analyzed: dadhi śabda ekāra antaḥ saṃhitā vyatirikta viṣaya vṛttiḥ

original: yakārastvayamanya eva aci parataḥ saṃhitāviṣaye prayujyamānaḥ /
analyzed: yakāraḥ tu ayam anyaḥ eva a ci paratas saṃhitā viṣaye prayujyamānaḥ

original: na punarikāra evāyaṃ yakārībhūtaḥ kṣīramiva daghibhūtamupalabhyate /
analyzed: na punar ikāraḥ eva ayam yakārībhūtaḥ kṣīram iva daghi bhūtam upalabhyate

original: na hīcuyaśāstālavyā iti sthānasādṛśyamātreṇa tadvikāratvavarṇanamucitamaprakṛtivikārayorapi nayanotpalapallavayoḥ sādṛśyadarśanāt /
analyzed: na hi icuyaśāḥ tālavyāḥ iti sthāna sādṛśya mātreṇa tad vikāra tva varṇanam ucitam aprakṛti vikārayoḥ api nayana utpala pallavayoḥ sādṛśya darśanāt

original: [iko yaṇaci] iti pāṇinismṛterapi nāyamarthaḥ ikāro yakārībhavatikṣīramiva dadhībhavatīti /
analyzed: i kaḥ ya ṇ a ci iti pāṇini smṛteḥ api na ayam arthaḥ ikāraḥ yakārībhavati kṣīram iva dadhībhavati iti

original: kintvasmin viṣaye 'yaṃ varṇaḥ prayoktavyaḥasminnayamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
analyzed: kintu asmin viṣaye yam varṇaḥ prayoktavyaḥ asmin ayam iti sūtra arthaḥ

original: siddhe śabde 'rtha sambandhe ca tacchāstraṃ pravṛttam iti //
analyzed: siddhe śabde rtha sambandhe ca tat śāstram pravṛttam iti

original: āratāmupaite vidhyatīti saṃprasāraṇe sati /
analyzed: āra tām upaite vidhyati iti saṃprasāraṇe sati

original: tasmādaiddha eva varṇānāṃ prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt aiddhaḥ eva varṇānām prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ

original: nāpi kāraṇavṛddhyā vardhate śabdaḥ /
analyzed: na api kāraṇa vṛddhyā vardhate śabdaḥ

original: balavatā 'pyuccāryamāṇāni bahubhiścatāvantyevākṣarāṇi /
analyzed: balavatā pi uccāryamāṇāni bahubhiḥ ca tāvanti eva akṣarāṇi

original: dhvanaya eva tathā tatra pravṛddhā upalabhyante navarṇā iti //
analyzed: dhvanayaḥ eva tathā tatra pravṛddhāḥ upalabhyante na varṇāḥ iti

original: tasmād anityatā 'siddhiḥ naivaṃ prāyair asādhanaiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt anitya tā siddhiḥ na evam prāyaiḥ asādhanaiḥ

original: śabdasya nityatāyāṃ tu saiṣā 'rthāpattir iṣyate //
analyzed: śabdasya nitya tāyām tu sā eṣā rthāpattiḥ iṣyate

original: śabdasyoccāraṇaṃ tāvad arthagatyartham iṣyate /
analyzed: śabdasya uccāraṇam tāvat artha gati artham iṣyate

original: na coccāritanaṣṭo 'yam arthaṃ gamayituṃ kṣamaḥ //
analyzed: na ca uccārita naṣṭaḥ yam artham gamayitum kṣamaḥ

original: sarveṣām avivādo 'tra śabdārthavyavahāriṇām /
analyzed: sarveṣām avivādaḥ tra śabda artha vyavahāriṇām

original: yadavijñātasambandhaḥ śabdo nārthasya vācakaḥ //
analyzed: yat a vijñāta sambandhaḥ śabdaḥ na arthasya vācakaḥ

original: vedyamānaḥ sa sambandhaḥ sthavirasvyavahārataḥ /
analyzed: vedyamānaḥ sa sambandhaḥ sthavira svyavahārataḥ

original: drāghīyasā na kālena vinā śakyeta veditum //
analyzed: drāghīyasā na kālena vinā śakyeta veditum

original: tathā hi gāṃ śuklām ānaya ity ekavṛddhaprayuktaśabdaśravaṇe sati ceṣtmānam itaraṃ vṛddham avalokayan bālastaṭasthaḥ tathārthapratītiṃ tāvat kalpayati ātmani tatpūrvikāyāś ceṣṭāyā dṛṣṭatvāt pramāṇāntarāsannidhānadetaddhṛddhaprayuktaśabdasamanantaraṃ ca pravṛtteḥ tata eva śabdāt kim apy anena pratipannam iti manyate /
analyzed: tathā hi gām śuklām ānaya iti eka vṛddha prayukta śabda śravaṇe sati itaram vṛddham avalokayan bālaḥ taṭasthaḥ tathā artha pratītim tāvat kalpayati ātmani tad pūrvikāyāḥ ceṣṭāyāḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt ca pravṛtteḥ tatas eva śabdāt kim api anena pratipannam iti manyate

original: tataḥ kṣaṇāntare tam arthaṃ tena vṛddhenānīyamānam upalabhmāna evaṃ buddhyate ayam artho 'mutaś śabdād anenāvagata iti /
analyzed: tatas kṣaṇa antare tam artham tena vṛddhena ānīyamānam upalabhmānaḥ evam buddhyate ayam arthaḥ mutaḥ śabdāt anena avagataḥ iti

original: sa cārtho 'nekaguṇakriyājātivyaktyādirūpasaṃkula upalambhyate /
analyzed: sa ca arthaḥ neka guṇa kriyā jāti vyakti ādi rūpa saṃkulaḥ upalambhyate

original: śabdo 'py anekapadakadambakātmā śrutaḥ /
analyzed: śabdaḥ u pi aneka pada kadambaka ātmā śrutaḥ

original: tat katamasya vākyāṃśasya katamo 'rthāṃśo vācya ity āvāpoddhāpayogena bahukṛtvaḥ śṛṇvan guṇakriyādiparihāreṇa gotvasāmānyam asmanmate tvammate vā tadvanmātraṃ gośabdasyābhidheyaṃ nirdhārayatīti //
analyzed: tat katamasya vākya aṃśasya katamaḥ rtha aṃśaḥ vācyaḥ iti āvāpa uddhāpa yogena bahu kṛtvas śṛṇvan guṇa kriyā ādi parihāreṇa go tva sāmānyam asmad mate tvam mate vā tadvat mātram go śabdasya abhidheyam nirdhārayati iti

original: evaṃ dīrghādhvasāpekṣasambandhādhigamāvadhi /
analyzed: evam dīrgha adhvasa apekṣa sambandha adhigama avadhi

original: śabdasya jīvitaṃ siddham iti nāśuvināśitā //
analyzed: śabdasya jīvitam siddham iti na āśu vināśi tā

original: bhavatu vā vinaśvarasyāpi śabdasya sambandhagrahaṇam /
analyzed: bhavatu vā vinaśvarasya api śabdasya sambandha grahaṇam

original: tathāpi tasmin gṛhītasambandhe śabde vinaṣṭe sati katham anavagatasambandhādabhinavādidānīm anyasmāc chabdād arthapratipattiḥ //
analyzed: tathā api tasmin gṛhīta sambandhe śabde vinaṣṭe sati katham anavagata sambandhāt abhinavāt idānīm anyasmāt śabdāt artha pratipattiḥ

original: anyasimin jñātasambandhe yadanyo vācako bhavet /
analyzed: jñāta sambandhe yat anyaḥ vācakaḥ bhavet

original: vācakāḥ sarvaśabdāḥ syur ekasmin jñātasaṅgatau //
analyzed: vācakāḥ sarva śabdāḥ syuḥ ekasmin jñāta saṅgatau

original: na ca vaktā vyavahāramāṇaḥ tadaiva śabdaṃ coccārayati sambandhaṃ karoti ca etaṃ ca vyutpādayati paraṃ ca vyavahārayatīti /na hi yugapadimāḥ kriyā bhavitum arhanti evam adarśanāt //
analyzed: na ca vaktā vyavahāramāṇaḥ tadā eva śabdam ca uccārayati sambandham karoti ca etam ca vyutpādayati param ca vyavahārayati iti na hi yugapad imāḥ kriyāḥ bhavitum arhanti evam adarśanāt

original: atha ādau sambandhagrahaṇe vṛtte tasmin vinaṣṭe 'pi gośabde tatsadṛśam abhinavakṛtam api śabdam upaśrutyārthaṃ pratipatsyante vyavahartāra ity ucyate tad pai na caturaśram sādṛśyasyāgrahaṇāt /
analyzed: atha ādau sambandha grahaṇe vṛtte tasmin vinaṣṭe go śabde tad sadṛśam abhinava kṛtam api śabdam upaśrutya artham pratipatsyante vyavahartāraḥ iti ucyate tat pai na caturaśram sādṛśyasya agrahaṇāt

original: na hi gośabda ivāyam iti pratītir dṛṣṭā api tu gośabda eveti /
analyzed: na hi go śabdaḥ iva ayam iti pratītiḥ dṛṣṭā api tu go śabdaḥ eva iti

original: na ca bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyayogarūpaṃ sādṛśyaṃ varṇānām anavayavānām upapadyate /
analyzed: na ca bhūyas vayava sāmānya yoga rūpam sādṛśyam varṇānām an avayavānām upapadyate

original: abhinavasya śabdasya svayam arthavattvānavadhāraṇāt katham ayam amutaḥ śrotā pratipadyeta iti śaṅkamāno vaktā kathaṃ prayogaṃ kuryāt atha so 'py arthavatsadṛśam eva prayuṅkte nārthavanatṃ tarhi yatsadṛśam asau prayuṅkte tasyāpy anyasādṛśyādevārthavatteti jagatsargakālakṛtasya mūlabhūtasyārthavataḥ śabdasya smaraṇaṃ syāt tanmūlatvādvyavahārasya /
analyzed: abhinavasya śabdasya svayam arthavat tva an avadhāraṇāt katham ayam amutas śrotā pratipadyeta iti śaṅkamānaḥ vaktā katham prayogam kuryāt atha saḥ pi arthavat sadṛśam eva prayuṅkte na arthavanatṃ tarhi yat sadṛśam asau prayuṅkte tasya api anya sādṛśyāt eva arthavat tā iti jagat sarga kāla kṛtasya mūla bhūtasya arthavataḥ śabdasya smaraṇam syāt tad mūla tvāt vyavahārasya

original: na caivam asti /
analyzed: na ca evam asti

original: na ca ttaḥprabhṛtyadyayāvat sādṛśayam anuvartate tatsādṛśyakalpanāyāṃ mūlasādṛśyavināśāt /
analyzed: na ca ttaḥ prabhṛti adya yāvat sādṛśayam anuvartate tad sādṛśya kalpanāyām mūla sādṛśya vināśāt

original: viśeṣatas tu śabdānām //
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ tu śabdānām

original: bhinnair vaktṛmukhasthānaprayatnakaranādibhiḥ /
analyzed: bhinnaiḥ vaktṛ mukha sthāna prayatna kara nādibhiḥ

original: na nirvahati sādṛśayaṃ śabdānāṃ dūravartinām //
analyzed: na nirvahati śabdānām dūra vartinām

original: sādṛśyajanitatve ca mithyaivārthagatir bhavet /
analyzed: sādṛśya janita tve ca mithyā evā artha gatiḥ bhavet

original: dhūmānukārinīhārajanyajvalanabuddhivat //
analyzed: dhūma anukāri nīhāra janya jvalana buddhi vat

original: tasmāt sādṛśyanibandhanārthapratītyanupapatteḥ gośabda eva sthāyītyabhyupagamanīyam //
analyzed: tasmāt sādṛśya nibandhana artha pratīti anupapatteḥ go śabdaḥ eva sthāyi iti abhyupagamanīyam

original: nanu yathā dhūmavyaktibhede 'pi dhūmatvam atim avalambya sambandhagrahaṇādivyavahāranivahanirvahaṃaṃ evam iha gakārādivarṇavyaktibhede 'pi sāmānyanibandhanas tannirvāhaḥ kariṣyata iti maivaṃ tatra hi dhūmatvasāmānyaṃ vidyate dhruvam /
analyzed: nanu yathā dhūma vyakti bhede pi dhūma tvam atim avalambya evam iha gakāra ādi varṇa vyakti bhede pi sāmānya nibandhanaḥ tad nirvāhaḥ kariṣyate iti mā evam tatra hi dhūma tva sāmānyam vidyate dhruvam

original: śabdatvaṃ vyabhicāry atra gośabdatvaṃ tu dhurghaṭam //
analyzed: śabda tvam vyabhicāri atra go śabda tvam tu dhurghaṭam

original: bhinnair ayugapatkālair asaṃsṛṣṭair vinaśvaraiḥ /
analyzed: bhinnaiḥ ayugapad kālaiḥ asaṃsṛṣṭaiḥ vinaśvaraiḥ

original: varṇair ghaṭayituṃ śakyo gośabdāvayavī katham //
analyzed: varṇaiḥ ghaṭayitum śakyaḥ go śabda avayavī katham

original: anārabdhe ca gośabde gośabdatvaṃ kva vartatām paṭatvaṃ nāma sāmānyaṃ na hi tantuṣu vartate //
analyzed: anārabdhe ca go śabde go śabda tvam kva vartatām paṭa tvam nāma sāmānyam na hi tantuṣu vartate

original: nanu mā bhūt gośabdatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ bhinnākāragakārādivyaktivṛttibhir eva vā gatvādijātibhiḥ kāryaṃ pūrvoktam upapadyate etad api nāsti gatvādijātīnām anupapatteḥ /
analyzed: nanu mā bhūt go śabda tvam sāmānyam bhinna ākāra gakāra ādi vyakti vṛttibhiḥ eva vā gatu ādi jātibhiḥ kāryam pūrva uktam upapadyate etat api nā asti gatu ādi jātīnām anupapatteḥ

original: bhedābhedapratyayapratiṣṭho hi vyaktijāipravibhāgavyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: bheda abheda pratyaya pratiṣṭhaḥ hi

original: iha cāyam abhedapratyayo varṇaikyanibandhana eva na jātikṛtaḥ /
analyzed: iha ca ayam abheda pratyayaḥ varṇa aikya nibandhanaḥ eva na jāti kṛtaḥ

original: bhedapratibhāsas tu vyañjakabhedādhīna iti kuto jātivyaktivyavahāraḥ gotvādijātinirākaraṇe 'py eṣa prakāraḥ samāna iti cet na vyaktibhedasya suspaṣṭasiddhatvena vyañjakādyupādhinibandhanatvānupapateḥ /
analyzed: bheda pratibhāsaḥ tu vyañjaka bheda adhīnaḥ iti kutas jāti vyakti vyavahāraḥ go tva ādi jāti nirākaraṇe pi eṣa prakāraḥ samānaḥ iti ced na vyakti bhedasya su spaṣṭa siddha tvena vyañjaka ādi upādhi nibandhana tva anupapateḥ

original: parasparavibhaktasvarūpatayā hi śābaleyabāhuleyapiṇḍāḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyante /
analyzed: paraspara vibhakta sva rūpa tayā hi śābaleya bāhuleya piṇḍāḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyante

original: sthite ca vyaktibhede sarvatra gaur iti tadabhdapratyayasyānanyaviṣayatvād iṣyata eva gotvajātiḥ /
analyzed: sthite ca vyakti bhede sarvatra gauḥ iti iṣyate eva go tva jātiḥ

original: iha punaḥ gakāravyakto bhinnāḥ śābaleyādipiṇḍavat /
analyzed: iha punar gakāra vyaktaḥ bhinnāḥ śābaleya ādi piṇḍa vat

original: kva nāma bhavatā dṛṣṭāḥ yenāsāṃ jātim icchasi //
analyzed: kva nāma bhavatā dṛṣṭāḥ yena āsām jātim icchasi

original: śiśaou paṭhati vṛddhe vā strījane vā śuke 'pi vā /
analyzed: paṭhati vṛddhe vā strī jane vā śuke vā

original: vaktṛbhedaṃ prapadyante na varṇavyaktibhinnatām //
analyzed: vaktṛ bhedam prapadyante na varṇa vyakti bhinna tām

original: tathā ca gargaḥ paṭhati māṭharaḥ paṭhatīty uccārayitṛbheda eva pratīyate amuṃ gaviśeṣam eṣa paṭhatīti nocāryamāṇabhedaḥ //
analyzed: tathā ca gargaḥ paṭhati māṭharaḥ paṭhati iti uccārayitṛ bhedaḥ eva pratīyate amum ga viśeṣam eṣa paṭhati iti na ucāryamāṇa bhedaḥ

original: ekavaktṛprayoge 'pi tasyaivoccāraṇaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: eka vaktṛ prayoge tasya eva uccāraṇam punar

original: gaṅāgaganagargādau na rūpāntaradarśanam //
analyzed: gaṅā gagana garga ādau na rūpa antara darśanam

original: drutādibhedabodho 'pi nādabhedanibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: druta ādi bheda bodhaḥ pi nāda bheda nibandhanaḥ

original: na vyaktibhedajanitaḥ śābaleyādibodhatvat //
analyzed: na vyakti bheda janitaḥ śābaleya ādi bodha tvat

original: abhyupagate 'pi gatvasāmānye tasya drutādibhedapratibhāse saty api bhinnatvam eṣitavyam /
analyzed: abhyupagate pi ga tva sāmānye tasya druta ādi bheda pratibhāse sati api bhinna tvam eṣitavyam

original: aupādhika eva tasmin bhedapratibhāso varṇanīyaḥ /
analyzed: aupādhikaḥ eva tasmin bheda pratibhāsaḥ varṇanīyaḥ

original: so 'yaṃ gakāravyaktāv eva kathaṃ na varṇayate tasyā evaikatvād ekapratyayaḥ bhedabhramas tu vyañjakādhīna iti /
analyzed: saḥ yam gakāra vyaktau eva katham na varṇayate tasyāḥ eva eka tvāt eka pratyayaḥ bheda bhramaḥ tu vyañjaka adhīnaḥ iti

original: evaṃ hi kalpanā laghīyasī bhavati /
analyzed: evam hi kalpanā laghīyasī bhavati

original: tasmān na nānāgakāravṛttigatvasāmānyaṃ nāma kiñcid asti //
analyzed: tasmāt na nānā gakāra vṛtti ga tva sāmānyam nāma kiñcid asti

original: api ca gogurugohādau bhinnājupaśleṣakārita eva vyañjaneṣu buddhibhedaḥ paropādhir avadhāryate /
analyzed: api ca go guru goha ādau bhinna a c upaśleṣa kāritaḥ eva vyañjaneṣu buddhi bhedaḥ para upādhiḥ avadhāryate

original: so 'yam akṣv api paropādhir eva bhavitum arhati varṇāśritatvāt vyañjakabhedapratyayavad iti /
analyzed: saḥ yam akṣu api para upādhiḥ eva bhavitum arhati varṇa āśrita tvāt vyañjaka bheda pratyaya vat iti

original: tasmāt gatvavat atvasāmānyam pai nāsti //
analyzed: tasmāt ga tva vat a tva sāmānyam pai na asti

original: yat punaḥ aṣṭādādaśabhedaṃ avarṇakulam ucyate tadaupādhikam eva hrasvādīrghaplutaśvṛtavivṛtādibuddhīnāṃ dhyvanibhedānuvidhāyitvāt //
analyzed: yat punar aṣṭādādaśa bhedam avarṇa kulam ucyate tat aupādhikam eva hrasva a dīrgha pluta śvṛta vivṛta ādi buddhīnām dhī vani bheda anuvidhāyi tvāt

original: vivṛtaḥ saṃvṛtād anyo na gakārād vakāravat /
analyzed: vivṛtaḥ saṃvṛtāt anyaḥ na gakārāt vakāra vat

original: api tv akāra evāsau pratibhāti yathā tathā //
analyzed: api tu akāraḥ eva asau pratibhāti yathā tathā

original: kathaṃ tarhi śabdabhedābhāve bhinne arthapratipattī araṇyaṃ āraṇyam iti dhvanikṛte eva te bhaviṣyataḥ /
analyzed: katham tarhi śabda bheda abhāve bhinne artha pratipattī araṇyam āraṇyam iti dhvani kṛte eva te bhaviṣyataḥ

original: aśabdadharmasya dīrghatvāde katham arthapratītyaṅgatvam iti cet turagavegavad bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: a śabda dharmasya dīrgha tva āde katham artha pratīti aṅga tvam iti ced turaga vegavat bhaviṣyati

original: yathā turagadehastho vegaḥ puṃso 'rthasiddhaye /
analyzed: yathā turaga deha sthaḥ vegaḥ puṃsaḥ rtha siddhaye

original: paradharmo 'pi dīrghādir evaṃ tasyopakārakaḥ //
analyzed: para dharmaḥ pi dīrgha ādiḥ evam tasya upakārakaḥ

original: itaś caitad akārasāmānyam anupapannam /
analyzed: itas ca etat akāra sāmānyam anupapannam

original: atvaṃ hi na dīrghaplutayor anugataṃ bhavati ātvaṃ na hrasvaplutayoḥ ātvaṃ na hrasvadīrghayor iti /
analyzed: a tvam hi na dīrgha plutayoḥ anugatam bhavati ā tvam na hrasva plutayoḥ ā tvam na hrasva dīrghayoḥ iti

original: tasmād ekatvād varṇānāṃ nāvāntarajātayaḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: tasmāt eka tvāt varṇānām na avāntarajātayaḥ saṃbhavati

original: śabdatvaṃ tu niyatārthapratipattau vyabhicārīty ato nātra dhūmādinyāyaḥ //
analyzed: śabda tvam tu niyata artha pratipattau vyabhicāri iti atas na atra dhūma ādi nyāyaḥ

original: tenārthapratyayaḥ śabdād anyathā nopapadyate /
analyzed: tena artha pratyayaḥ śabdāt anyathā nā upapadyate

original: na cen nityatvam ity asmin arthāpatteḥ pramāṇatā //
analyzed: na ced nitya tvam iti asmin arthāpatteḥ pramāṇa tā

original: anumānād anyathātvam arthāpatter na dṛśyate /
analyzed: anumānāt anyathātvam arthāpatteḥ na dṛśyate

original: tenānumānam apy etat prayoktuṃ na na śakyate //
analyzed: tena anumānam api etat prayoktum na na śakyate

original: tad idam ucyate śabdo dharmo nitya iti sādhyo dharma sambandhagrahaṇasāpekṣārthapratipādakatvāt dhūmādijātivat /
analyzed: tat idam ucyate śabdaḥ dharmaḥ nityaḥ iti sādhyaḥ dharma sambandha grahaṇa sāpekṣa artha pratipādaka tvāt dhūma ādi jāti vat

original: tad idam uktaṃ nityatvaṃ tu syād darśanasya parārthatvāt iti /
