analyzed: tat idam uktam nitya tvam tu syāt darśanasya parārtha tvāt iti

original: evaṃ sambandhagrahaṇāt prabhṛti ārthapratipater avasthitasya vināśahetvabhāvād ātmādivan nityatvam //
analyzed: evam sambandha grahaṇāt prabhṛti ārtha pratipateḥ avasthitasya vināśa hetu abhāvāt ātma ādi vat nitya tvam

original: na hy ayam avayavavināśānnaśyati śabdaḥ niravayavatvāt /
analyzed: na hi ayam avayava vināśāt naśyati śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt

original: tad eva katham iti cet ucyate svalpenāpi prayatnena yadi varṇaḥ prayujyate /
analyzed: tat eva katham iti ced ucyate su alpena api prayatnena yadi varṇaḥ prayujyate

original: yadi vā nānubhūyeta śakalo nānubhūyate //
analyzed: yadi vā na anubhūyeta śakalaḥ na anubhūyate

original: sāvayave hi vastuni dvidhā avayavā dṛśyante ārabdhakāryāścānārabdhakāryāś ceti /
analyzed: sa avayave hi vastuni dvidhā avayavāḥ dṛśyante ārabdha kāryāḥ ca anārabdha kāryāḥ ca iti

original: iha punar ārabdhakāryā anārabdhakāryā vā paṭe tantvādaya iva varṇe na kvacd avayavā upalabhyante /
analyzed: iha punar ārabdha kāryāḥ anārabdha kāryāḥ vā paṭe tantu ādayaḥ iva varṇe na kvacid avayavāḥ upalabhyante

original: na cānumīyante liṅgābhāt //
analyzed: na ca anumīyante liṅga ābhāt

original: nāpy aśrayavināśād vināśaḥ śabdasya ātmādivadanāśritatvāt /
analyzed: na api aśraya vināśāt vināśaḥ śabdasya ātma ādi vat anāśrita tvāt

original: akāśāśritapakṣe vā tannityatvāt /
analyzed: akāśa āśrita pakṣe vā tad nitya tvāt

original: na cānyaḥ kiś cana śabdanāśasya hetur asti //
analyzed: na ca anyaḥ kim cana śabda nāśasya hetuḥ asti

original: kṣayo yathopabhgena śastrādicchedanena vā /
analyzed: kṣayaḥ yathā upabhgena śastra ādi chedanena vā

original: saṃbhāvyate paṭādīnāṃ naiva śabdasya karhicit //
analyzed: saṃbhāvyate paṭa ādīnām nā eva śabdasya karhicit

original: tasmāt tirohito 'py āste yadi śabdaḥ kṣaṇāntaram /
analyzed: tasmāt tirohitaḥ pi āste yadi śabdaḥ kṣaṇa antaram

original: mṛtyor mukhādapakrāntaḥ punaḥ kenaiṣa hanyate //
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ mukhāt apakrāntaḥ punar kena eṣa hanyate

original: itaś ca nityaḥ śabadaḥ saṅkhyābhāvāt /
analyzed: i taḥ ca nityaḥ śaba daḥ saṅkhyā bhāvāt

original: aṣṭakṛtvo gośabda uccārita iti vadanti na tv aṣṭau gośabdā iti  /tenaikatvam avagamyate /
analyzed: aṣṭa kṛtvas go śabdaḥ uccāritaḥ iti vadanti na tu aṣṭau go śabdāḥ iti tena ekatvam avagamyate

original: yo 'yaṃ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane vihitaḥ kṛtvasucpratyayaḥ sa kriyāvatām abhede bhavati /
analyzed: yaḥ yam kriyā abhyāvṛtti gaṇane vihitaḥ sa kriyāvatām abhede bhavati

original: tenoccāraṇāvṛttimātram /
analyzed: tena uccāraṇa āvṛtti mātram

original: tad uktam kriyāvatām abhede hi kriyā ''vṛttiṣu kṛtvasuc /
analyzed: tat uktam kriyāvatām abhede hi kriyā vṛttiṣu

original: tatprayogāt dhruvaṃ tasya śabdasyāvartate kriyā iti //
analyzed: tad prayogāt dhruvam tasya śabdasya āvartate kriyā iti

original: kriyābhyāvṛttisattāyām abhede ca kriyāvatām saṃkhyābhidhāyinaḥ śabdāt kṛtvasucpratyayaṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: kriyā abhyāvṛtti sattāyām abhede ca kriyāvatām saṃkhyā abhidhāyinaḥ śabdāt viduḥ

original: tad anena prakāreṇa pratyabhijñānam ucyate /
analyzed: tat anena prakāreṇa pratyabhijñānam ucyate

original: pramāṇaṃ śabdanityatve sakalaśrotṛsākṣikam //
analyzed: pramāṇam śabda nitya tve sakala śrotṛ sākṣikam

original: tathā hy asti sa evāyaṃ gośabda iti vedanam /
analyzed: tathā hi asti saḥ eva ayam go śabdaḥ iti vedanam

original: śrautraṃ karaṇakāluṣyabādhasandehavarjitam //
analyzed: śrautram karaṇa kāluṣya bādha sandeha varjitam

original: śrotrendiriyavyāpārānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt śrautram idaṃ vijñānam /
analyzed: śrotra indiriya vyāpāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt śrautram idam vijñānam

original: na caitaj janakasya karaṇasya kim api daurbalyam upalabhyate /
analyzed: na ca etat janakasya karaṇasya kim api daurbalyam upalabhyate

original: na ca kiṃsvid iti koṭidvayasaṃsparśitayā idaṃ vijñānam upajāyate /
analyzed: na ca kim svid iti koṭi dvaya saṃsparśi tayā idam vijñānam upajāyate

original: na ca naitad evam iti pratyayāntaram asimin bādhakam utpaśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: na ca nā etat evam iti pratyaya antaram asimin bādhakam utpaśyāmaḥ

original: idānītanāstitvaprameyādhikyagrahaṇāc cedam anadhigatārthagāhy api bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: idānītana astitva prameya ādhikya grahaṇāt ca idam anadhigata artha gāhi api bhavitum arhati

original: bhaganmate ca gṛhītagrāhitve 'pi pratyabhijñāyāḥ prāmāṇyam iṣyate /
analyzed: bhagat mate ca gṛhīta grāhi tve pi pratyabhijñāyāḥ prāmāṇyam iṣyate

original: na hi tad aprāmāṇyaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate śākyair iva bhavadbhiḥ kṣaṇikapadārthān abhiupagamāt //
analyzed: na hi tat aprāmāṇyam vaktum śakyate śākyaiḥ iva bhavadbhiḥ kṣaṇika padārthān abhiupagamāt

original: na sādṛśyanimittatvaṃ vaktuṃ tasyāś ca yujyate /
analyzed: na sādṛśya nimitta tvam vaktum tasyāḥ ca yujyate

original: sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ vā dvayasyāpi niṣedhanāt //
analyzed: sāmānya viṣaya tvam vā dvayasya api niṣedhanāt

original: kaiścittirohite bhāvādityaprāmāṇyam ucyate /
analyzed: kaiścid tirohite bhāvāt iti aprāmāṇyam ucyate

original: tad asat tatpratītyaiva tirodhānaniṣedhanāt //
analyzed: tat asat tad pratītyā eva tirodhāna niṣedhanāt

original: jīvati tvanmate 'py eṣa śabdastricaturān kṣaṇān /
analyzed: jīvati tvad mate pi eṣa śabdaḥ tricaturān kṣaṇān

original: pratyabhijñā ca kālena tāvatā na na siddhyati //
analyzed: pratyabhijñā ca kālena tāvatā na na siddhyati

original: ekakṣaṇāyuṣi tv asmin pratītir atidurlabhā //
analyzed: eka kṣaṇa āyuṣi tu asmin pratītiḥ ati durlabhā

original: na khalvajanakaṃ kiñcit vastu jñānena gṛhyate //
analyzed: na khalu ajanakam kiñcid vastu jñānena gṛhyate

original: iti kṣaṇabhaṅgabhṅge vakṣyate //
analyzed: iti kṣaṇabhaṅga bhṅge vakṣyate

original: api ca yathā niśīthe rolambaśyāmalāmbudaḍambare /
analyzed: api ca yathā niśīthe rolamba śyāmala ambuda ḍambare

original: pratyabhijñāyate kiñcit aciradyutidhāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: pratyabhijñāyate kiñcid aciradyuti dhāmabhiḥ

original: tathā 'viratasaṃyogavibhāgakramajanmabhiḥ /
analyzed: tathā virata saṃyoga vibhāga krama janmabhiḥ

original: pratyabhiñāyate śabdaḥ kṣaṇikair api mārutaiḥ //
analyzed: pratyabhiñāyate śabdaḥ kṣaṇikaiḥ api mārutaiḥ

original: atrāha mārutair ity upoddhātena sādhu smṛtam /
analyzed: atra āha mārutaiḥ iti upoddhātena sādhu smṛtam

original: tiṣṭhatu tāvat pratyabhijñānam pratham eva śabdasya yan niyatagrahaṇaṃ tad abhivyaktipakṣe durghaṭam //
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu tāvat pratyabhijñānam pratham eva śabdasya yat niyata grahaṇam tat abhivyakti pakṣe durghaṭam

original: nityatvāt vyāpakatvāc ca sarve sarvatra sarvadā/
analyzed: nitya tvāt vyāpaka tvāt ca sarve sarvatra sarvadā

original: śabdāḥ santīti bhedena grahaṇe kiṃ niyāmakam //
analyzed: śabdāḥ santi iti bhedena grahaṇe kim niyāmakam

original: dhvanayo hi nāma saṃyogavibhāgaviśeśitā vāyavaḥ vāyuvṛttayo vā saṃyogavibhāgāḥ /
analyzed: dhvanayaḥ hi nāma saṃyoga vibhāga viśeśitāḥ vāyavaḥ vāyu vṛttayaḥ vā saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ

original: te hi śabdasya vyañjakā iṣyante /
analyzed: te hi śabdasya vyañjakāḥ iṣyante

original: taiś ca karaṇaṃ vā saṃskriyate karma vā dvayaṃ vā sarvathā ca pramādaḥ //
analyzed: taiḥ ca karaṇam vā saṃskriyate karma vā dvayam vā sarvathā ca pramādaḥ

original: karaṇe saṃskṛte tāvat sarvaśabdaśrutir bhavet /
analyzed: karaṇe saṃskṛte tāvat sarva śabda śrutiḥ bhavet

original: gakārāyaiva saṃskāra ity eṣa niyamaḥ kutaḥ //
analyzed: gakārāya eva saṃskāraḥ iti eṣa niyamaḥ kutas

original: api ca stimitasamīraṇāpasaraṇam eva karaṇasya saṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: api ca stimita samīraṇa apasaraṇam eva karaṇasya saṃskāraḥ

original: sa cāyaṃ taddeśavyavasthitasakalatadviṣayasādhāraṇa eva //
analyzed: sa ca ayam tad deśa vyavasthita sakala tad viṣaya sādhāraṇaḥ eva

original: yathā javanikāprāyaprāptasaramīkṣaṇam /
analyzed: yathā javanikā prāya prāpta saram īkṣaṇam

original: raṅgabhūmiṣu taddeśam aśeṣaṃ vastu paśyati //
analyzed: raṅgabhūmiṣu tad deśam aśeṣam vastu paśyati

original: tathā prasarasaṃrodhisamīrotsāraṇe sati /
analyzed: tathā prasara saṃrodhi samīra utsāraṇe sati

original: śrotraṃ taddeśaniḥśeṣaśabdagrāhi bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: śrotram tad deśa niḥśeṣa śabda grāhi bhaviṣyati

original: ākāśaṃ ca śrotram ācakṣate bhavantaḥ /
analyzed: ākāśam ca śrotram ācakṣate bhavantaḥ

original: tac ca vibhu niravayavaṃ ceti kvacid eva tasmin saṃskṛte sati sarve ca tadaiva saṃskṛtakaraṇāḥ saṃpannā iti sarva eva śṛṇuyuḥ iti badhiretaravyavasthā dusthitā //
analyzed: tat ca vibhu niravayavam ca iti kvacid eva tasmin saṃskṛte sati sarve ca tadā eva saṃskṛta karaṇāḥ saṃpannāḥ iti sarve eva śṛṇuyuḥ iti badhira itara vyavasthā dusthitā

original: viśaye tu saṃskriyamāṇe tasyānavayavasya vyāpinaś ca saṃskṛtatvāt sarvatra śravaṇam iti madreṣvabhivyakto gośabdaḥ kaśmīreṣv ai śrūyeta /
analyzed: viśaye tu saṃskriyamāṇe tasya anavayavasya vyāpinaḥ ca saṃskṛta tvāt sarvatra śravaṇam iti madreṣu abhivyaktaḥ go śabdaḥ kaśmīreṣu śrūyeta

original: na hi tasyādhāradvārakaḥ saṃskāraḥ ākāśavadanāśritatvāt /
analyzed: na hi tasya ādhāra dvārakaḥ saṃskāraḥ ākāśa vat anāśrita tvāt

original: ākāśāśritatvapakṣe 'pi tad ekatvāt /
analyzed: ākāśa āśrita tva pakṣe pi tat ekatvāt

original: nāpi bhāgaśaḥ saṃskriyate gośabdaḥ tasya niravayatvāt /
analyzed: na api bhāgaśas saṃskriyate go śabdaḥ tasya niravaya tvāt

original: uktaṃ hi alpīyasā prayatnena śabdam uccaritaṃ matiḥ /
analyzed: uktam hi alpīyasā prayatnena śabdam uccaritam matiḥ

original: yadi vā naiva gṛhṇati varṇaṃ vā sakalaṃ sphuṭam iti //
analyzed: yadi vā nā eva gṛhṇati varṇam vā sakalam sphuṭam iti

original: ubhayasaṃskārapakṣe tu doṣadvayasyāpy anativṛtiḥ sarveṣāṃ grahṇaṃ sarvatra śravaṇam iti /
analyzed: ubhaya saṃskāra pakṣe tu doṣa dvayasya api anativṛtiḥ sarveṣām grahṇam sarvatra śravaṇam iti

original: na ca samānadeśānāṃ samānendriyagrāhyāṇāṃ ca bhāvanāṃ pratiniyatavyañjakavyaṅgyatvam upalabdham //
analyzed: na ca samāna deśānām samāna indriya grāhyāṇām ca bhāvanām pratiniyata vyañjaka vyaṅgya tvam upalabdham

original: gṛhe dadhighaṭīṃ draṣṭuṃ ānīto gṛhamedhinā /
analyzed: gṛhe dadhi ghaṭīm draṣṭum ānītaḥ gṛhamedhinā

original: apūpānapi taddeśān prakāśayati dīpakaḥ //
analyzed: apūpān api tad deśān prakāśayati dīpakaḥ

original: tasmāt kṛtakapakṣa eva niyatadeśaṃ śabdasya grahaṇaṃ parikalpate nābhivyaktipakṣa iti //
analyzed: tasmāt kṛtaka pakṣe eva niyata deśam śabdasya grahaṇam parikalpate na abhivyakti pakṣe iti

original: api ca abhivyaktipakṣe tīvramandavibhāgaḥ abhibhavaś ca śabdasya śabdāntareṇa na prāpnoti /
analyzed: api ca abhivyakti pakṣe tīvra manda vibhāgaḥ abhibhavaḥ ca śabdasya śabda antareṇa na prāpnoti

original: na hi śabdastīvro mando vā kaścit svatastasya bhedābhāvāt /
analyzed: na hi śabdaḥ tīvraḥ mandaḥ vā kaścid svatas tasya bheda abhāvāt

original: saṃskārasya ca tadabhivyaktihetoḥ na kācana tīvratā mandatā vā yadanusāreṇa viṣaye tathā buddhiḥ syāt //
analyzed: saṃskārasya ca tad abhivyakti hetoḥ na kācana tīvra tā manda tā vā yad anusāreṇa viṣaye tathā buddhiḥ syāt

original: pavanadharmo vā tīvrādir bhavan kathaṃ śrotreṇa gṛhyeta sāvayave hi vastuni sakalaviśeṣagrahaṇāgrahaṇasaṃbhavāt tad apekṣayā pratītibhedo bhavet /
analyzed: pavana dharmaḥ vā tīvra ādiḥ bhavan katham śrotreṇa gṛhyeta sa avayave hi vastuni sakala viśeṣa grahaṇa agrahaṇa saṃbhavāt tat apekṣayā pratīti bhedaḥ bhavet

original: iha tu niravayave śabde na tathopapadyate iti /
analyzed: iha tu niravayave śabde na tathā upapadyate iti

original: tasmāt kṛtakapakṣa eva śreyān iti //
analyzed: tasmāt kṛtaka pakṣaḥ eva śreyān iti

original: atrocyate karaṇasaṃskārapakṣe eva tāvad astu /
analyzed: atrā ucyate karaṇa saṃskāra pakṣe eva tāvat astu

original: tac ca karaṇaṃ kiñcid eva marudbhir uāhitasaṃskāraṃ kiñcid eva śabdaṃ gṛhṇāti //
analyzed: tat ca karaṇam kiñcid eva marudbhiḥ uāhita saṃskāram kiñcid eva śabdam gṛhṇāti

original: yathā tālvādisaṃyogavibhāgā bhavatāṃ mate /
analyzed: yathā tālu ādi saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ bhavatām mate

original: utpādakatayeṣyante kecid varṇasya kasyacit //
analyzed: utpādaka tayā iṣyante kecid varṇasya kasyacid

original: tathā tadvāyusaṃyogavibhāgāḥ kecid eva naḥ /
analyzed: tathā tad vāyu saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ kecid eva naḥ

original: kasyacid grahaṇe śaktāḥ śrotraṃ kurvanti saṃskṛtam //
analyzed: kasyacid grahaṇe śaktāḥ śrotram kurvanti saṃskṛtam

original: yathā ca teṣām utpattau samarthyaniyamas tava /
analyzed: yathā ca teṣām utpattau samarthya niyamaḥ tava

original: tathaivaiṣām abhivyaktau sāmarthyaniyamo mama //
analyzed: tathā eva eṣām abhivyaktau sāmarthya niyamaḥ mama

original: vyañjakānāṃ niyamo na dṛṣṭa iti cet ka evam āha sahasrākṣaḥ tathā hi pṛthivyām eva vartamāno gandhaḥ samānadeśo bhavati samānendriyagrāhyaś ca ghrāṇaikaviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: vyañjakānām niyamaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ iti ced kaḥ evam āha sahasrākṣaḥ tathā hi pṛthivyām eva vartamānaḥ gandhaḥ samāna deśaḥ bhavati samāna indriya grāhyaḥ ca ghrāṇa eka viṣaya tvāt

original: tasya ca niyatavyañjakavyaṅgyatā dṛśyata eva //
analyzed: tasya ca niyata vyañjaka vyaṅgya tā dṛśyate eva

original: kvacit pācakasaṃparkādarkāṃśusparśataḥ kvacit /
analyzed: kvacid pācaka saṃparkāt arka aṃśu sparśataḥ kvacid

original: kvacit salilasaṃsekāt gandho 'bhivyajyate bhuvaḥ //
analyzed: kvacid salila saṃsekāt gandhaḥ bhivyajyate bhuvaḥ

original: na ca stimitapavanāpanodanamātraṃ karaṇasya saṃskāra iṣyate yaḥ sarvasādhāraṇaḥ syāt kintu anya eva niyataḥ prativiṣayaṃ yogayālakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: na ca stimita pavana apanodana mātram karaṇasya saṃskāraḥ iṣyate yaḥ sarva sādhāraṇaḥ syāt kintu anyaḥ eva niyataḥ prati viṣayam yogayā lakṣaṇaḥ

original: yat punar abhyadhāyi nabhasi śrotre 'bhyupagamyamāne sarvaprāṇināmekam eva śrotraṃ bhaved iti tad apy asādhu dharmādharmayor niyāmakatvāt /
analyzed: yat punar abhyadhāyi nabhasi śrotre bhyupagamyamāne sarva prāṇinām ekam eva śrotram bhavet iti tat api asādhu dharma adharmayoḥ niyāmaka tvāt

original: ākāśasyāpi ghaṭākāśavad anyāvacchedopapatteḥ dharmādharmanibandhana eva badhiretaravibhāgaḥ //
analyzed: ākāśasya api ghaṭa ākāśa vat anya avaccheda upapatteḥ dharma adharma nibandhanaḥ eva badhira itara vibhāgaḥ

original: api ca bhavatām eṣaiva doṣaḥ yeṣām ākāśam eva śrotram ity abhyupagamaniyamaḥ /
analyzed: api ca bhavatām eṣā eva doṣaḥ yeṣām ākāśam eva śrotram iti abhyupagama niyamaḥ

original: mīmāṃsakānāṃ tu nāvaśyam ākāśam eva śrotram kāryārthāpattikalpitaṃ tu kim api karaṇamātraṃ pratipuruṣaniyataṃ śrotram iti nātiprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: mīmāṃsakānām tu na avaśyam ākāśam eva śrotram kārya arthāpatti kalpitam tu kim api karaṇa mātram prati puruṣa niyatam śrotram iti na atiprasaṅgaḥ

original: tathā ca bhatṛmitraḥ pavanajanisaśskāram eva śrotraṃ manyate //
analyzed: tathā ca bhatṛmitraḥ pavana jani saśskāram eva śrotram manyate

original: atha vā viṣayasaṃskārapakṣo bhvatu tathā 'pi nātiprasaṅgaḥ niyatadeśasyaiva tatra saṃskārāt /
analyzed: atha vā viṣaya saṃskāra pakṣaḥ na ati prasaṅgaḥ niyata deśasya eva tatra saṃskārāt

original: na cāsya bhāgaśaḥ saṃskāraḥ niravayavatvāt /
analyzed: na ca asya bhāgaśas saṃskāraḥ niravayava tvāt

original: tathā 'pi jātivad asya grahaṇaniyamo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tathā pi jāti vat asya grahaṇa niyamaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tathāca bhāvatām eva pakṣe yathā sarvagatā jātiḥ piṇḍadeśaiva gṛhyate /
analyzed: tathā ca bhāvatām eva pakṣe yathā sarva gatā jātiḥ piṇḍa deśā eva gṛhyate

original: na ca kārtsnyagṛhītā 'pi niṇḍe 'nyatra na dṛśyate //
analyzed: na ca kārtsnya gṛhītā niṇḍe nyatra na dṛśyate

original: tathā sarvagataḥ śabdaḥ nādadeśeṣu gṛhyate /
analyzed: tathā sarvagataḥ śabdaḥ nāda deśeṣu gṛhyate

original: kārtsnyena ca gṛhīto 'pi punar anyatra gṛhyate //
analyzed: kārtsnyena ca gṛhītaḥ u pi punar anyatra gṛhyate

original: piṇḍo 'bhivyañjako jāteḥ śabdasya vyañjako dhvaniḥ /
āśritānāśritatvādi viśeṣaḥ kvopayujyate //
analyzed: āśrita anāśrita tva ādi viśeṣaḥ kva upayujyate

original: sarvagatatvaniravayatvāviśeṣāt tīvramandatvādayaś ca dhvanidharmā api bhavantaḥ śabdavṛttitayā 'vabhānti /
analyzed: sarvagata tva niravaya tva aviśeṣāt tīvra manda tva ādayaḥ ca dhvani dharmāḥ api bhavantaḥ śabda vṛtti tayā vabhānti

original: yathā sthūlatvakṛśatvādaya piṇḍadharmā api jātivṛttitvena kvacit gṛhyanto dṛśyante agṛhītaśābaleyādiviśeṣasya kṛśā gāvaḥ ityādi pratibhāsadarśanāt //
analyzed: yathā sthūla tva kṛśa tva ādayaḥ piṇḍa dharmāḥ api jāti vṛtti tvena kvacid gṛhyantaḥ dṛśyante agṛhīta śābaleya ādi viśeṣasya kṛśāḥ gāvaḥ ityādi pratibhāsa darśanāt

original: yad vā na tīvramandādeḥ varṇadharmatayā grahaḥ /
analyzed: yat vā na tīvra manda ādeḥ varṇa dharma tayā grahaḥ

original: buddhir eva tathodeti vyañakānuvidhāyinī //
analyzed: buddhiḥ eva tathā udeti vyañaka anuvidhāyinī

original: tāvanta eva te varṇāḥ pracayāpacayaspṛśaḥ /
analyzed: tāvantaḥ eva te varṇāḥ pracaya apacaya spṛśaḥ

original: evaṃ cābhibhavo 'py eṣāṃ svato nāsti parasparam //
analyzed: evam ca abhibhavaḥ pi eṣām svatas nā asti parasparam

original: marudbhir abhibhūyanto mārutā iva durbalāḥ /
analyzed: marudbhiḥ abhibhūyantaḥ mārutāḥ iva durbalāḥ

original: tejobhir iva dīptāṃśoḥ divā dīpaprabhādayaḥ //
analyzed: tejobhiḥ iva dīpta aṃśoḥ divā dīpa prabhā ādayaḥ

original: dvayasaṃskārapakṣo 'py evaṃ samāhito bhavati ubhayeṣām api doṣāṇām utsāraṇāt /
analyzed: dvaya saṃskāra pakṣaḥ pi evam samāhitaḥ bhavati ubhayeṣām api doṣāṇām utsāraṇāt

original: tasmāt pratyabhijñāpratyayaprabhāvasiddhanityatvasya śabdasya abhivyakir eva sādhīyasī //
analyzed: tasmāt pratyabhijñā pratyaya prabhāva siddha nitya tvasya śabdasya abhivyakiḥ eva sādhīyasī

original: idaṃ cālocyatāmāryāh kāryābhivyaṅgyapakṣayoḥ /
analyzed: idam ca ālocyatām āryā āh kārya abhivyaṅgya pakṣayoḥ

original: śabdasya grahaṇe guvīṃ laghvī vā kutra kalpanā //
analyzed: śabdasya grahaṇe guvīm laghvī vā kutra kalpanā

original: tathā hi bhavantaḥ vaiśeṣikāḥ saṃkhyāḥ jaināḥ saugatāś ca kāryaśabdavādinaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi bhavantaḥ vaiśeṣikāḥ saṃkhyāḥ jaināḥ saugatāḥ ca kārya śabda vādinaḥ

original: cārvākās tu vārākāḥ kasyaivaṃvidhās goṣṭhīṣu smṛtipatham upayānti tathā bhavatāṃ vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ ca śabdasya śravaṇe tāvad eṣā tulyaiva kalpanā /
analyzed: cārvākāḥ tu vārākāḥ kasya evaṃvidhāḥ goṣṭhīṣu smṛti patham upayānti tathā bhavatām vaiśeṣikāṇām ca śabdasya śravaṇe tāvat eṣā tulyā eva kalpanā

original: saṃyogād vā vibhāgād vā śabda upajāyate /
analyzed: saṃyogāt vā vibhāgāt vā śabdaḥ upajāyate

original: jātaś cāsau tiryagūrdhvam adhaś ca sarvatodikkāni kadambagolakākāreṇa sajātīyanikaṭadeśāni śabdāntarāṇyārabhate tāny api tathety evaṃ vīcīsantānavṛttyārambhaprabandhaprāpto 'ntyaḥ śrotrākāśajanmā śabdaḥ tatsamavetastenaiva gṛhyate iti //
analyzed: jātaḥ ca asau tiryak ūrdhvam adhas ca sarvatodikkāni kadamba golaka ākāreṇa sajātīya nikaṭa deśāni śabda antarāṇi ārabhate tāni api tathā iti evam vīcī santāna vṛtti ārambha prabandha prāptaḥ ntyaḥ śrotra ākāśa janmā śabdaḥ tad samavetaḥ tena eva gṛhyate iti

original: tad iyaṃ tāvad atighargharā kalpanā //
analyzed: tat iyam tāvat ati ghargharā kalpanā

original: śabdaḥ śabdāntaraṃ sūta iti tāvad alaukikam /
analyzed: śabdaḥ śabda antaram sūtaḥ iti tāvat alaukikam

original: kāryakāraṇabhāvo hi na dṛṣṭas teṣu buddhivat //
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ hi na dṛṣṭaḥ teṣu buddhi vat

original: janyante 'nantare deśe śabdāḥ svasadṛśāś ca te /
analyzed: janyante nantare deśe śabdāḥ sva sadṛśāḥ ca te

original: niryagūrdhvam adhaś ceti keyaṃ vaḥ śraddadhānatā //
analyzed: niryak ūrdhvam adhas ca iti kā iyam vaḥ śraddadhāna tā

original: śabdāntarāṇi kurvantaḥ kathaṃ ca viramanti te na hi vegakṣayas teṣāṃ marutāmiva kalpyate //
analyzed: śabda antarāṇi kurvantaḥ katham ca viramanti te na hi vega kṣayaḥ teṣām marutām iva kalpyate

original: kuḍyādivyavadhāne ca śabdasyākaraṇaṃ katham vyomnaḥ sarvagatatvād dhi kuḍyamadhye vyavasthitiḥ //
analyzed: kuḍya ādi vyavadhāne ca śabdasya akaraṇam katham vyomnaḥ sarva gata tvāt hi kuḍya madhye vyavasthitiḥ

original: athāvaraṇātmakakuḍyādidravyasaṃyogarahitam ākāśaṃ śabdajnmani samavāyikāraṇam iṣyate tad atra pramānaṃ viśeṣe vaktavyam //
analyzed: atha āvaraṇa ātmaka kuḍya ādi dravya saṃyoga rahitam ākāśam śabda jnmani samavāyi kāraṇam iṣyate tat atra pramānam viśeṣe vaktavyam

original: tulyārambhe ca tīvreṇa mandasya jananaṃ katham śrūyate cāntikāttīvraḥ śabdo mandas tu dūrataḥ //
analyzed: tulya ārambhe ca tīvreṇa mandasya jananam katham śrūyate ca antikāt tīvraḥ śabdaḥ mandaḥ tu dūratas

original: vīcīsantānatulyatvam api śabdeṣu durvacam /
analyzed: vīcī santāna tulya tvam api śabdeṣu durvacam

original: mūrtimattvakriyāyogavegādirahitātmasu //
analyzed: mūrtimat tva kriyā yoga vega ādi rahita ātmasu

original: yad apy ucyate sajātīyajanakaḥ śabdaḥ guṇātgāt rūpādivad iti tad idam asiddham asiddhena sādhyam guṇatvasyāsiddhatvāt //
analyzed: yat api ucyate sajātīya janakaḥ śabdaḥ guṇāt gāt rūpa ādi vat iti tat idam asiddham asiddhena sādhyam guṇa tvasya asiddha tvāt

original: na śabdaḥ pāratantryeṇa kadācid upalabhyate /
analyzed: na śabdaḥ pāratantryeṇa kadācid upalabhyate

original: dravyastha iva rūpādirato 'sya guṇatā kutaḥ //
analyzed: dravya sthaḥ iva rūpa ādiḥ atas sya guṇa tā kutas

original: api ca na śabdāntarārambhakaḥ śabdo guṇatvāt rūpavat /
analyzed: api ca na śabda antara ārambhakaḥ śabdaḥ guṇa tvāt rūpavat

original: śabdaṃ nārabhate śabdaḥ śabdatvāc chrotraśabdavat //
analyzed: śabdam na ārabhate śabdaḥ śabda tvāt śrotra śabda vat

original: na saṃyogavibhāvau śabdasya janakau saṃyogavibhāgatvāt anyasaṃyogavibhāgavad ityādayaḥ pratihetavo 'py atra sulabhā iti yat kiñcid etat //
analyzed: na saṃyoga vibhāvau śabdasya janakau saṃyoga vibhāga tvāt anya saṃyoga vibhāga vat ityādayaḥ pratihetavaḥ pi atra sulabhāḥ iti yat kiñcid etat

original: kāpilās tu bruvate śrotravṛttiḥ śabdadeśaṃ gacchati sā śabdena vikriyata iti tatra śrotrasya vyāmiśratvānnikaṭedeśenaiva śabedena tadvṛttir vikriyate na dūradeśenety atra ko niyamaḥ niyamābhāvāc ca kānyakubjaprayukto gośabdaḥ gauramūlake 'pi śrūyeta /
analyzed: kāpilāḥ tu bruvate śrotra vṛttiḥ śabda deśam gacchati sā śabdena vikriyate iti tatra śrotrasya vyāmiśra tvāt nikaṭedeśena eva śabedena tad vṛttiḥ vikriyate na dūra deśena iti atra kaḥ niyamaḥ niyama abhāvāt ca kānyakubja prayuktaḥ go śabdaḥ gauramūlake śrūyeta

original: amūrtā ca śrotravṛttiḥ prasarantī na mūrtaiḥ kuḍyādibhir abhihantuṃ śakyata iti vyavahitasyāpi śabdasya śravaṇaṃ syāt //
analyzed: amūrtā ca śrotra vṛttiḥ prasarantī na mūrtaiḥ kuḍya ādibhiḥ abhihantum śakyate iti vyavahitasya api śabdasya śravaṇam syāt

original: vāyau śabdānukūle ca na tasya śravanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: vāyau śabda anukūle ca na tasya śravanam bhavet

original: gacchantyāḥ pratikūlo hi śrotravṛtteḥ sa mārutaḥ //
analyzed: gacchantyāḥ pratikūlaḥ hi śrotra vṛtteḥ sa mārutaḥ

original: dūre 'pi anuvātaṃ śabdasya śravaṇaṃ yaddṛṣṭaṃ prativātaṃ ca nikaṭe 'pi yad aśravaṇaṃ tas asmin pakṣe viparītaṃ syāt //
analyzed: dūre anuvātam śabdasya śravaṇam yat dṛṣṭam prativātam ca nikaṭe asmin pakṣe viparītam syāt

original: vṛttivṛttimator bhedo nāstītīndriyavad bhavet /
analyzed: vṛtti vṛttimatoḥ bhedaḥ na asti iti indriya vat bhavet

original: vyāpikā vṛttir ity evaṃ kathaṃ sarvatra na śryutiḥ //
analyzed: vyāpikā vṛttiḥ iti evam katham sarvatra na śryutiḥ

original: ārhatāstvāduḥ sūkṣmaiḥ śabdapudgalair ārabdhaśarīraḥ śabdaḥ svaprabhavabhūmeḥ niṣkramya pratipuruṣaṃ karṇamūlam upasargatīti tad etad atisubhāṣitam varṇasyāvayavāḥ sūkṣmāḥ sānti kecana pudgalāḥ /
analyzed: ārhatāḥ tu āduḥ sūkṣmaiḥ śabda pudgalaiḥ ārabdha śarīraḥ śabdaḥ sva prabhava bhūmeḥ niṣkramya pratipuruṣam karṇa mūlam upasargati iti tat etat ati su bhāṣitam varṇasya avayavāḥ sūkṣmāḥ sānti kecana pudgalāḥ

original: tair gharṇo 'vayavī nāma janyate paśya kautukam //
analyzed: taiḥ gha ṛṇaḥ vayavī nāma janyate paśya kautukam

original: teṣām adṛśyamānānāṃ kīdṛśo racanākramaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām adṛśyamānānām kīdṛśaḥ racanā kramaḥ

original: kena tatsanniveśena kaḥ śabda upajāyatām //
analyzed: kena tad sanniveśena kaḥ śabdaḥ upajāyatām

original: laghavo 'vayavāścaite nibaddhā na ca kenacit /
analyzed: laghavaḥ vayavāḥ ca ete nibaddhāḥ na ca kenacid

original: na cainaṃ kaṭhinaṃ kartuṃ varṇāvayavinaṃ kṣamāḥ //
analyzed: na ca enam kaṭhinam kartum varṇa avayavinam kṣamāḥ

original: kṛśaś ca gacchan sa kathaṃ na vikṣipyeta mārutaiḥ /
analyzed: kṛśaḥ ca gacchan sa katham na vikṣipyeta mārutaiḥ

original: dalaśo vā na bhjyeta vṛkṣādyabhihataḥ katham //
analyzed: dalaśas vā na vṛkṣa ādi abhihataḥ katham

original: prayāṇakāvadhiḥ kaś ca gacchato 'sya tapasvinaḥ /
analyzed: prayāṇaka avadhiḥ kaḥ ca gacchataḥ tapasvinaḥ

original: ekaśrotrapraviṣṭo vā sa śrūyetāparaiḥ katham //
analyzed: eka śrotra praviṣṭaḥ vā sa śrūyeta aparaiḥ katham

original: niṣkramya karṇādekasmāt praveśaḥ śravaṇāntare /
analyzed: niṣkramya karṇāt ekasmāt praveśaḥ śravaṇa antare

original: yad īṣyeta kathaṃ tasy ayugapadvahubhiḥ śrutiḥ //
analyzed: yat īṣyeta katham tasya ayugapad vahubhiḥ śrutiḥ

original: śrotṛsaṃkhyānusāreṇa na nānāvaraṇasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: śrotṛ saṃkhyā anusāreṇa na nānā āvaraṇa saṃbhavaḥ

original: vaktustulyaprayatnatvāt śrotṛbhedatadaikyayoḥ //
analyzed: vaktuḥ tulya prayatna tvāt śrotṛ bheda tad aikyayoḥ

original: tadalaṃ parihāsasya mahato hetubhūtayā /
analyzed: tat alam parihāsasya mahataḥ hetu bhūtayā

original: nagnakṣapaṇakācāryaprajñācāturyacarcayā //
śākyaprāyās tv ācakṣyate aprāpta eva śabdaḥ śrotraśaktyā gṛhyata iti tad etad ativyāmūḍhabhāṣitam aprāptitulyatāyāṃ dūravyavahitādīnāmaśravaṇakāraṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: śākyaprāyāḥ tu ācakṣyate aprāptaḥ eva śabdaḥ śrotra śaktyā gṛhyate iti tat etat ati vyāmūḍha bhāṣitam aprāpti tulya tāyām dūra vyavahita ādīnām aśravaṇa kāraṇa abhāvāt

original: prāpyakāritākhyakarmadharmāprasaṅgāc ca /
analyzed: prāpya kāri tā ākhya karma dharma aprasaṅgāt ca

original: na ca cārvākavadaparīkṣita evāyam artha upekṣituṃ yuktaḥ //
analyzed: na ca cārvāka vat aparīkṣitaḥ eva ayam arthaḥ upekṣitum yuktaḥ

original: iti kāryatvapakṣe 'mūḥ śrutās tārkikakalpanāḥ /
analyzed: iti kārya tva pakṣe mūḥ śrutāḥ tārkika kalpanāḥ

original: athābhivyaktipakṣe 'sya śṛṇu śrotriyakalpanām //
analyzed: atha abhivyakti pakṣe sya śṛṇu śrotriya kalpanām

original: vivakṣāpūrvakaprayatnapreryamāṇas tāvad vegavattayā kriyāvattayā ca kauṣṭhyo bahir niśarati samīraṇa iti suspaṣṭam etat /
analyzed: vivakṣā pūrvaka prayatna preryamāṇaḥ tāvat vegavat tayā kriyāvat tayā ca kauṣṭhyaḥ bahis samīraṇaḥ iti su spaṣṭam etat

original: pratyakṣanikaṭapavanavādināṃ pakṣe pavanasamaye vaktṛvadananikaṭanihitahastasparśenaiva sa upalakṣyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣa nikaṭa pavana vādinām pakṣe pavana samaye vaktṛ vadana nikaṭa nihita hasta sparśena eva saḥ upalakṣyate

original: anumeyāmārutapakṣe 'pi tadānīmāsyasamīpasannidhāpitatūlakrakarmaṇā so 'numīyate //
analyzed: anumeyā māruta pakṣe tadānīm āsya samīpa sannidhāpita tūlakra karmaṇā saḥ numīyate

original: sa gacchan sarvatodikkaḥ stimitānilanodanam /
analyzed: sa gacchan sarvatodikkaḥ stimita anila nodanam

original: karoti karṇākāśe ca prayāti śrutiyogyatām //
analyzed: karoti karṇa ākāśe ca prayāti śruti yogya tām

original: sa ca prayatnatīvratvam andatvena tadātmakaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca prayatna tīvra tvam anda tvena tad ātmakaḥ

original: śabde tathāvidhajñaptihetutāmavalambate //
analyzed: śabde tathāvidha jñapti hetutām avalambate

original: sa caiṣa gacchann uddāmavegayogāhitakriyaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca eṣa gacchan uddāma vega yoga āhita kriyaḥ

original: śaravadvegaśāntyaiva na dūraṃ gantum arhati //
analyzed: śara vat vega śāntyā eva na dūram gantum arhati

original: sa mūrtaḥ prasaranmūrtaiḥ aparaiḥ pratibadhyate /
analyzed: sa mūrtaḥ prasarat mūrtaiḥ aparaiḥ pratibadhyate

original: kuḍyādibhirato nāsya śrutir vyavahitātmanaḥ //
analyzed: kuḍya ādibhiḥ atas na asya śrutiḥ vyavahita ātmanaḥ

original: sa vegagatiyogitvāt āgacchati yato yataḥ /
analyzed: sa vega gati yogi tvāt āgacchati yatas yatas

original: śrotā tatas tataḥ śabdaḥ āyāntam abhimanyate //
analyzed: śrotā tatas tatas śabdaḥ āyāntam abhimanyate

original: sa tu śaṅkhādisaṃyogapreryamāṇaḥ samīraṇaḥ /
analyzed: sa tu śaṅkha ādi saṃyoga preryamāṇaḥ samīraṇaḥ

original: śabdasyāvarṇarūpasya bhavati vyaktikāraṇam //
analyzed: śabdasya avarṇa rūpasya bhavati vyakti kāraṇam

original: śabdo yad api varṇātmā śrotragrāhyo na vidyate /
analyzed: śabdaḥ yat api varṇa ātmā śrotra grāhyaḥ na vidyate

original: tathā 'pi tatra śabdatvaṃ śravaṇena grahīṣyate //
analyzed: tathā pi tatra śabda tvam śravaṇena grahīṣyate

original: tad iha na kadācid asmābhir adhikā kalpana kṛtā mārutagater asyāḥ sarvalokaprasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: tat iha na kadācid asmābhiḥ adhikā kalpana kṛtā māruta gateḥ asyāḥ sarva loka prasiddha tvāt

original: karṇākāśasaṃskrāmātram adṛṣṭaṃ kalpitam /
analyzed: karṇa ākāśa saṃskrā mātram adṛṣṭam kalpitam

original: tad api kāryārthāpattigamyatvān nāpūrvam iti //
analyzed: tat api kārya arthāpatti gamya tvāt na apūrvam iti

original: apakṣapātinaḥ sabhyāḥ satyam utpattyapekṣayā /
analyzed: apakṣapātinaḥ sabhyāḥ satyam utpatti apekṣayā

original: śabdasya kalpanām āhuḥ abhivyaktau laghīyasīm //
analyzed: śabdasya kalpanām āhuḥ abhivyaktau laghīyasīm

original: tad evam abhivyaktipakṣe niyatagranaṇopapateḥ pratyabhijñāpratyayaprāmāṇyāt nityatvam evopagantavyam //
analyzed: tat evam abhivyakti pakṣe niyata granaṇa upapateḥ pratyabhijñā pratyaya prāmāṇyāt nitya tvam eva upagantavyam

original: yā tv anaikantikatvoktiḥ dhīkarmapratyabhijñayā /
analyzed: yā tu anaikantika tva uktiḥ dhī karma pratyabhijñayā

original: pratyakṣe codyamānā 'sau darśayatyatimūḍhatām //
analyzed: pratyakṣe codyamānā sau darśayati ati mūḍha tām

original: tenānumānadoṣeṇa pratyakṣaṃ na hi dūṣyate /
analyzed: tena anumāna doṣeṇa pratyakṣam na hi dūṣyate

original: siddhāntāntaracintā tu bhavet bhṛśamasaṅgatā //
analyzed: siddhānta antara cintā tu bhavet bhṛśam asaṅga tā

original: nirbādhaṃ pratyabhijñānam asti cet buddhikarmaṇo /
analyzed: nirbādham pratyabhijñānam asti ced buddhi karmaṇaḥ

original: tayor apy astu nityatvaṃ no cet kā śabdatulyatā //
analyzed: tayoḥ api astu nitya tvam no ced kā śabda tulya tā

original: tasmān nityaḥ pratyabhijñāprabhāvāt sddhaḥ śabdaḥ paśyatāṃ tārkikāṇām /
analyzed: tasmāt nityaḥ pratyabhijñā prabhāvāt sddhaḥ śabdaḥ paśyatām tārkikāṇām

original: arthāpattiḥ pūrvam uktā ca tasmin asthāyitve yuktayaś ca vyudastāḥ //
analyzed: arthāpattiḥ pūrvam uktā ca tasmin asthāyi tve yuktayaḥ ca vyudastāḥ

original: asti ca vede vacanaṃ siddhām anuvadai yaddhruvāṃ vācyam /
analyzed: asti ca vede vacanam siddhām anuvadai yat dhruvām vācyam

original: talliṅgadarśanād api nityaḥ śabdo 'bhimantavyaḥ //
analyzed: tad liṅga darśanāt api nityaḥ śabdaḥ bhimantavyaḥ

original: śikṣāvidas tu pavanātmakam eva śabdaṃ ācakṣaṃte tadasamañjasamapratīteḥ /
analyzed: śikṣā vidaḥ tu pavana ātmakam eva śabdam ācakṣaṃte tat asamañjasam apratīteḥ

original: arhanmataprathitapudgalaparyudāsanītyā ca vāyvavayavā api vāraṇīyāḥ //
analyzed: arhat mata prathita pudgala paryudāsa nītyā ca vāyu avayavāḥ api vāraṇīyāḥ

original: ye 'pi sthūlavināśadarśanavaśādbrūyuḥ kṣaṇadhvaṃsinaḥ bhāvāṃs te 'pi na śakruvanti gadituṃ śabdasya vidhvaṃsitām /
analyzed: ye pi sthūla vināśa darśana vaśāt brūyuḥ kṣaṇa dhvaṃsinaḥ bhāvān te pi na śakruvanti gaditum śabdasya vidhvaṃsi tām

original: ante hi kṣayadarśanāt kila tathā teṣāṃ bhramo 'smin punaḥ śabde nāntaparikṣayāviti kathaṃ kumbhādivad bhiṅgitā //
analyzed: ante hi kṣaya darśanāt kila tathā teṣām bhramaḥ u smin punar śabde na anta parikṣayau iti katham kumbha ādi vat bhiṅgi tā

original: śabdānityatvasiddhāntaḥ atra brūmahe na khalu bhavad abhihitamet pramānadvayam api śabdanityatāṃ prasādhayitum arhati //
analyzed: śabda anitya tva siddhāntaḥ atra brūmahe na khalu bhavat abhihitam et pramāna dvayam api śabda nitya tām prasādhayitum arhati

original: yāvatā yadarthāpattiravādi darśanasya parārthatvād iti sā kṣīṇaiva arthapratīter anyathā 'py upapannatvāt //
analyzed: yāvatā yat arthāpattiḥ avādi darśanasya parārtha tvāt iti sā kṣīṇā eva artha pratīteḥ anyathā pi upapanna tvāt

original: tatra sādṛśyam apy anabhyupagatam eva dūṣitamityasthāne kliṣṭā bhavantaḥ //
analyzed: tatra sādṛśyam api anabhyupagatam eva dūṣitam iti asthāne kliṣṭāḥ bhavantaḥ

original: gatvādijātīrāśritya sambandhagrahaṇādikaḥ /
analyzed: gatvā ādi jātīḥ āśritya sambandha grahaṇa ādikaḥ

original: arthāvagatiparyantaḥ vyavahāraḥ prasetyasi //
analyzed: artha avagati paryantaḥ vyavahāraḥ

original: nanu gatvaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ etad eva parīkṣyatām /
analyzed: nanu ga tvam pratikṣiptam etat eva parīkṣyatām

original: asmin samāpyate vādaḥ marmasthānam idaṃ ca naḥ //
analyzed: asmin samāpyate vādaḥ marma sthānam idam ca naḥ

original: pratikṣipte ca gatvādau nārthasaṃpratyayo 'nyathā /
analyzed: pratikṣipte ca gatvā ādau na artha saṃpratyayaḥ nyathā

original: pratyabhijñānabhūmiś ca nānyā 'stīti vayaṃ jitāḥ //
analyzed: pratyabhijñāna bhūmiḥ ca na anyā sti iti vayam jitāḥ

original: siddhe tu gatvasāmāṇye tat evārthavedanam /
analyzed: siddhe tu ga tva sāmāṇye tat eva artha vedanam

original: tad eva pratyabhijñeyam iti yūyaṃ parājitāḥ //
analyzed: tat eva pratyabhijñeyam iti yūyam parājitāḥ

original: tenānyat sarvam utsṛjya vādasthānakaḍambaram /
analyzed: tena anyat sarvam utsṛjya vāda sthānaka ḍambaram

original: gatvādijātisiddhyarthamathātaḥ prayatamahe //
analyzed: gatvā ādi jāti siddhi artham atha atas prayatamahe

original: tatredaṃ vicāryatām ya eṣa gakārabhedapratibhāsaḥ sa kiṃ vyañjakabhedakṛtaḥ uta varṇabhedaviṣayaḥ iti //
analyzed: tatra idam vicāryatām yaḥ eṣa gakāra bheda pratibhāsaḥ sa kim vyañjaka bheda kṛtaḥ uta varṇa bheda viṣayaḥ iti

original: vyañjakabhedakṛte tasmin ekatvād gakārasya kiṃvṛtti gatvasāmāṇyaṃ syāt varṇabhedaviṣayatve tu tadbhedasiddher abhedapratyayasya viṣaya mṛgya iti tadgrāhyam aparihāryaṃ gatvasāmānyam //
analyzed: vyañjaka bheda kṛte tasmin eka tvāt gakārasya kiṃvṛtti ga tva sāmāṇyam syāt varṇa bheda viṣaya tve tu tad bheda siddheḥ abheda pratyayasya viṣaya mṛgyaḥ iti tat grāhyam aparihāryam ga tva sāmānyam

original: tad ucyate nāyaṃ vyañjakabhedakṛtaḥ gakārabhedapratyayaḥ /
analyzed: tat ucyate na ayam vyañjaka bheda kṛtaḥ gakāra bheda pratyayaḥ

original: yadi hi vyañjakabhedādhīna eṣa bhedapratibhāsaḥ tarhi yaralavādivarṇabhedapratyayo 'pi tatkṛta eva kim iti na bhavati tataś ca sakalavarṇavikalpātītam ekanamavayavaṃ śabdabrahma vaiyākaraṇavad abhyupagantavyam //
analyzed: yadi hi vyañjaka bheda adhīnaḥ eṣa bheda pratibhāsaḥ tarhi tad kṛtaḥ eva kim iti na bhavati tatas ca sakala varṇa vikalpa atītam śabdabrahma vaiyākaraṇa vat abhyupagantavyam

original: atha manuṣe yaralavādīnām itaretarabibhaktasvarūpaparicchedād viṣayabhedakṛta eva bhedapratyayaḥ nopādhinibandhana iti tarhi gaṅgāgaganagargādau gakārabhedapratibhāso 'py eṣa na vyañjakabhedādhīno bhavitum arhati tatrāpi parasparavibhinnagakārasvarūpapartibhāsāt /
analyzed: atha itara itara bibhakta sva rūpa paricchedāt viṣaya bheda kṛtaḥ eva bheda pratyayaḥ na upādhi nibandhanaḥ iti tarhi gaṅgā gagana garga ādau gakāra bheda pratibhāsaḥ u pi eṣa na vyañjaka bheda adhīnaḥ bhavitum arhati tatra api paraspara vibhinna gakāra sva rūpa partibhāsāt

original: śukasārikāmanuṣyeṣu hi vaktṛbhede sati jyañjakanānātvasaṃbhāvanayā varṇabhedapratyayasya attkṛtatvaṃ kāmamāśaṅkyetāpi /
analyzed: śuka sārikā manuṣyeṣu hi vaktṛ bhede sati jyañjaka nānātva saṃbhāvanayā varṇa bheda pratyayasya kāmam āśaṅkyeta api

original: vaktrekatve tu gaganādau kutaḥ tatkṛto bhedaḥ nanu tatrāpi maruto bhinnā eva vyañjakāḥ mukhaṃ tv ekaṃ bhavatu kiṃ tena tad api vā bhinnam ity eke /
analyzed: vaktṛ ekatve tu gagana ādau kutas tad kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ nanu tatra api marutaḥ bhinnāḥ eva vyañjakāḥ mukham tu ekam bhavatu kim tena tat api vā bhinnam iti eke

original: ucyate sa tarhi marutāṃ bhedaḥ yaralavādiṣv api tulya iti mā bhūt eṣām api bhedaḥ //
analyzed: ucyate sa tarhi marutām bhedaḥ yaralava ādiṣu api tulyaḥ iti mā bhūt eṣām api bhedaḥ

original: nanu yaralavānāṃ viśeṣapratītir asti gakāre tu sā nāstīty uktaṃ uccāraṇasyaiva tatra bhedaḥ noccāryasyeti /
analyzed: nanu viśeṣa pratītiḥ asti gakāre tu sā na asti iti uktam uccāraṇasya eva tatra bhedaḥ na uccāryasya iti

original: naitat sāram mā bhūdeṣa viśeṣa iti pratītiḥ bhedabuddhis tu vidyata eva /
analyzed: na etat sāram mā bhūt eṣa viśeṣaḥ iti pratītiḥ bheda buddhiḥ tu vidyate eva

original: anyā ca viśeṣabuddhir ucyate anyā ca bhedabudhir iti /
analyzed: anyā ca viśeṣa buddhiḥ ucyate anyā ca bheda budhiḥ iti

original: viśeṣāpratibhāse 'pi kvacid vicchedapratītiviśeṣāt //
analyzed: viśeṣa apratibhāse pi kvacid viccheda pratīti viśeṣāt

original: nanu atrocyate dṛśyate śābaleyādivyaktyāntaravilakṣaṇā /
analyzed: nanu atra ucyate dṛśyate śābaleya ādi vyaktyā antara vilakṣaṇā

original: bāhuleyādigovyaktiḥ tena bhedo 'sti vāstavaḥ //
analyzed: bāhuleya ādi go vyaktiḥ tena bhedaḥ sti vāstavaḥ

original: na tu drūtādibhedena niṣpannā saṃpratīyate /
analyzed: na tu drūta ādi bhedena niṣpannā saṃpratīyate

original: gavyaktyantaravicchinnā gavyaktiraparā sphuṭā //
analyzed: ga vyakti antara vicchinnā ga vyaktiḥ aparā sphuṭā

original: iti naitad uktam śābalaiyādau prativyakti sāsnākhurakakudādyavayavavartino viśeṣāḥ pratibhāsante /
analyzed: iti na etat uktam śābalaiya ādau prativyakti sāsnā khura kakud ādi avayava vartinaḥ viśeṣāḥ pratibhāsante

original: te ca sthūlatvāt sugamā bhavanti /
analyzed: te ca sthūla tvāt sugamāḥ bhavanti

original: yatra tu nilataṇḍulakulatthādau pratisikthaṃ viśeṣā na pratibhāsante tatra viśeṣapratītyabhāve 'pi vicchedapratibhāso vidyata eva sikthāt sikthāntaratvena pratibhāsāt /
analyzed: yatra tu nila taṇḍula kulattha ādau pratisiktham viśeṣāḥ na pratibhāsante tatra viśeṣa pratīti abhāve pi viccheda pratibhāsaḥ vidyate eva sikthāt siktha antara tvena pratibhāsāt

original: evam ihāpy eṣa gakāraviśeṣa iti pratibhāsābhāve 'pi vicchedagrahaṇāt gakāranānātvam //
analyzed: evam iha api eṣa gakāra viśeṣaḥ iti pratibhāsa abhāve viccheda grahaṇāt gakāra nānātvam

original: nanu taṇḍulādāv api sikthāt sikthāntare viśeṣāḥ pratibhāsanta eva /
analyzed: nanu taṇḍula ādau api sikthāt siktha antare viśeṣāḥ pratibhāsante eva

original: tadapratibhāse bhedasyāpi grahītum aśakyatvāt maivaṃ vādīḥ yatne sati caturaśratrikoṇavartulatvādiviśeṣā apyamutra pratibhāsiṣyante /
analyzed: tad apratibhāse bhedasya api grahītum aśakya tvāt mā evam vādīḥ yatne sati caturaśra trikoṇa vartula tva ādi viśeṣāḥ api amutra pratibhāsiṣyante

original: evaṃ gakāreṣv api /
analyzed: evam gakāreṣu api

original: prayatnaṃ vinā 'pi tu prathmākṣanipāta eva vicchedabuddhir utpadyata iti tayaiva nānātvasiddhiḥ //
analyzed: prayatnam vinā tu prathmā akṣa nipāte eva viccheda buddhiḥ utpadyate iti tayā eva nānātva siddhiḥ

original: nanu naivānadhigataviśeṣasya vicchedabuddhir utpattum arhatīti viśeṣabuddhir eva vicchedabuddhiḥ naitad evam bhramaṇādikarmakṣaṇānāṃ sūkṣmaviśeṣāpratibhāse 'pi vicchedapratibhāsāt //
analyzed: nanu na eva anadhigata viśeṣasya viccheda buddhiḥ utpattum arhati iti viśeṣa buddhiḥ eva viccheda buddhiḥ na etat evam bhramaṇa ādi karma kṣaṇānām sūkṣma viśeṣa apratibhāse viccheda pratibhāsāt

original: nanu tatrāpi viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ kalpyate anyathā vicchedapratītyanupapatteḥ /
analyzed: nanu tatra api viśeṣa grahaṇam kalpyate anyathā viccheda pratīti anupapatteḥ

original: yad evaṃ varṇeṣv api gaganādau vicchedapratītidarśanāt kalpyatāṃ viśeṣagrahaṇam //
analyzed: yat evam varṇeṣu api gagana ādau viccheda pratīti darśanāt kalpyatām viśeṣa grahaṇam

original: nanu asty eva tat kin tv aupādhikaṃ sphuṭike raktatāpratyayavat viṣamo dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: nanu asti eva tat kin tu aupādhikam sphuṭike rakta tā pratyaya vat viṣamaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: sphuṭikasya śuddhasya dṛṣṭatvāl lakṣādyupādhinimittako bhavatu raktatāpratyayaḥ /
analyzed: sphuṭikasya śuddhasya dṛṣṭa tvāt lakṣa ādi upādhi nimittakaḥ bhavatu rakta tā pratyayaḥ

original: varṇānāṃ tu nityam evodāttādiviśeṣavatāṃ pratibhāsāt tadrahitānām anupalabdheś ca naisargika evāyaṃ bhedaḥ /
analyzed: varṇānām tu nityam eva udātta ādi viśeṣavatām pratibhāsāt tad rahitānām anupalabdheḥ ca naisargikaḥ eva ayam bhedaḥ

original: tadyathā buddhīnāṃ ghaṭapaṭādiviṣayaviśeṣaśūnyatānām asaṃvedanāt prativiṣayaṃ nānātvaṃ tathā varṇānām api pratyudāttādiviśeṣaṃ nānātvm /
analyzed: tat yathā buddhīnām ghaṭa paṭa ādi viṣaya viśeṣa śūnyatānām asaṃvedanāt prati viṣayam nānātvam tathā varṇānām api pratyudātta ādi viśeṣam nānātvam

original: na ca buddhir evaiva nityā ca viṣayabhedopādhinibandhanas tadbheda iti sāmpratam svayam eva buddhijanma pratyakṣam ity abhidhānāt /
analyzed: na ca buddhiḥ evā eva nityā ca viṣaya bheda upādhi nibandhanaḥ tad bhedaḥ iti sāmpratam svayam eva buddhi janma pratyakṣam iti abhidhānāt

original: asmābhiś ca buddhinityatāyā upariṣṭānnirākariṣyamāṇatvāt //
analyzed: asmābhiḥ ca buddhi nitya tāyāḥ upariṣṭāt nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: viṣayabhedāc ca tadbhedābhidhāne viṣayasyāpi kuta idānīṃ bhedaḥ buddhibhedād iti cet itaretarāśrayaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: viṣaya bhedāt ca tad bheda abhidhāne viṣayasya api kutas idānīm bhedaḥ buddhi bhedāt iti ced itaretara āśraya prasaṅgaḥ

original: tad imāḥ svata eva bhedavatyo buddhayaḥ viṣayāṇām api svata eva bhedo bhavati sa tu buddhiḥ jñāyata ity alamarthāntaragamanena //
analyzed: tat imāḥ svatas eva bhedavatyaḥ buddhayaḥ viṣayāṇām api svatas eva bhedaḥ bhavati sa tu buddhiḥ jñāyate iti alam artha antara gamanena

original: yathā ca śuklaguṇasya bhāsvaradhūmarādibhedavato nānātvaṃ tathā varṇasyāpy udāttādibhedavataḥ /
analyzed: yathā ca śukla guṇasya bhāsvara dhūmara ādi bhedavataḥ nānātvam tathā varṇasya api udātta ādi bhedavataḥ

original: śuklaguṇo 'py eka eva āśrayabhedāt tu tadbheda iti cet aho rasasamārūḍho bhaṭṭaḥ karmaikaṃ buddhir apy ekā jagatyekaḥ sito guṇaḥ /
analyzed: śukla guṇaḥ pi ekaḥ eva āśraya bhedāt tu tad bhedaḥ iti ced aho rasa samārūḍhaḥ bhaṭṭaḥ karma ekam buddhiḥ api ekā jagatī ekaḥ sitaḥ guṇaḥ

original: taccaitannityam ity etāḥ strīgṛhe kāmukoktayaḥ //
analyzed: tat ca etat nityam iti etāḥ strī gṛhe kāmuka uktayaḥ

original: api ca ekātmavādo &py evam evāvataret sukhiduḥkhyādibhedasya śarīrabhedenāpy upapatteḥ /
analyzed: api ca eka ātma vādaḥ pi evam eva avataret sukhi duḥkhi ādi bhedasya śarīra bhedena api upapatteḥ

original: advaitasya ca nātidavīyaneṣa panthā ity alamalīkavikatthanena //
analyzed: advaitasya ca na ati davīyanā iṣa panthāḥ iti alam alīka vikatthanena

original: tasmāt gaganāvakāropaśreṣakṛta eva bhedapratyayaḥ na svarūpabheda iti taduktam akārasyāpi bhavanmate bhedābhāvāt /
analyzed: tasmāt gagana avakāra upaśreṣa kṛtaḥ eva bheda pratyayaḥ na svarūpa bhedaḥ iti tat uktam akārasya api bhavat mate bheda abhāvāt

original: avidyamāne ca tadupaśleṣe digajaḥ diggaja iti bhedena pratibhāso bhavaty eva /
analyzed: a vidyamāne ca tad upaśleṣe digajaḥ diggajaḥ iti bhedena pratibhāsaḥ bhavati eva

original: tathā ca samadaḥ sammadaḥ paṭaḥ paṭṭaḥ āsanaṃ āsannaṃ malaḥ mallaḥ avikaḥ avikkaḥ patiḥ pattiḥ patanaṃ pattanaṃ ityādāv api varṇabhedapratītiḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca samadaḥ sammadaḥ paṭaḥ paṭṭaḥ āsanam āsannam malaḥ mallaḥ avikaḥ avikkaḥ patiḥ pattiḥ patanam pattanam ityādau api varṇa bheda pratītiḥ

original: arthapratītibhedo 'pi digajadiggajādau śabdāntaranimittako bhavitum arhati na dviru ccāraṇakṛtaḥ /
analyzed: artha pratīti bhedaḥ pi digaja diggaja ādau śabda antara nimittakaḥ bhavitum arhati na

original: granthādhikyād arthādhikyam noccāraṇabhedāt śatakṛtvo 'pi prayukte gośabde sāsnādimadarthavyatiriktavācyasaṃpratyayābhāvāt /
analyzed: grantha ādhikyāt artha ādhikyam na uccāraṇa bhedāt śata kṛtvas prayukte go śabde sāsnādimat artha vyatirikta vācya saṃpratyaya abhāvāt

original: tathā ca diggaja iti dvigakārako nirdeśa ity ācakṣate śabdavidaḥ na dvir gakāra uccārita iti //
analyzed: tathā ca diggajaḥ iti dvi gakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ iti ācakṣate śabda vidaḥ na dvis gakāraḥ uccāritaḥ iti

original: nanu gogurugirigehādāv ajbhede 'pi gakārapratyayānuvṛtter eka evāyaṃ gakāraḥ maivaṃ vocaḥ eṣa eva hi bhedapratyayaḥ asmābhir upadarśitaḥ /
analyzed: nanu go guru giri geha ādau a c bhede pi gakāra pratyaya anuvṛtteḥ ekaḥ eva ayam gakāraḥ mā evam vocaḥ eṣaḥ eva hi bheda pratyayaḥ asmābhiḥ upadarśitaḥ

original: vinā 'pi ca ajupaśleṣaṃ diggajādau bhedapratyayao varṇitaḥ /
analyzed: vinā ca a c upaśleṣam diś gaja ādau bheda pratyayaḥ varṇitaḥ

original: na ca vayamabhedapratyayam apahnumahe kintu bhedapratyayasyāpy abādhitasya bhāvāt ananyathāsiddhitvāc ca gavādivat sāmānyaviśeṣarūpatāṃ brūmaḥ /
analyzed: na ca vayam abheda pratyayam apahnumahe kintu bheda pratyayasya api a bādhitasya bhāvāt ananyathā siddhi tvāt ca gavādi vat sāmānya viśeṣa rūpatām brūmaḥ

original: vyañjakabhedanibandhanatvaṃ tu yaralavādāv api vaktuṃ śakyam ity uktam eva //
analyzed: vyañjaka bheda nibandhana tvam tu yaralava ādau api vaktum śakyam iti uktam eva

original: api ca śābaleyādibhedapratyayasyāpi vyañjakabhedanibandhanatvāṭt eka evāsau syāt //
analyzed: api ca śābaleya ādi bheda pratyayasya api vyañjaka bheda nibandhana tvāt ekaḥ eva asau syāt

original: nanu tatra ko vyañjakaḥ yadbhedakṛtaḥ piṇḍabhedapratyaya iṣyate āha ca na piṇḍavyatirekeṇa vyañjako 'tra dhvanir yathā /
analyzed: nanu tatra kaḥ vyañjakaḥ yad bheda kṛtaḥ piṇḍa bheda pratyayaḥ iṣyate āha ca na piṇḍa vyatirekeṇa vyañjakaḥ dhvaniḥ yathā

original: piṇḍavyaṅgyaiva gotvādijātir nityaṃ pratīyate iti //
analyzed: piṇḍa vyaṅgyā eva go tva ādi jātiḥ nityam pratīyate iti

original: tad anyuktam hotvajāteḥ gatvavad idānīṃ avivādāspadībhūtatvāt /
analyzed: tat anyuktam hotva jāteḥ gatva vat idānīm avivāda āspadībhūta tvāt

original: piṇḍabhedapratyayasya cakṣurvyāpārabhedād apy upapatteḥ //
analyzed: piṇḍa bheda pratyayasya cakṣuḥ vyāpāra bhedāt api upapatteḥ

original: nanu sakṛd api vyāpṛtalocanasya parasparavibhaktapiṇḍapratibhāso bhavati maivam tadānīṃ gomārapratītiḥ /
analyzed: nanu sakṛt api vyāpṛta locanasya paraspara vibhakta piṇḍa pratibhāsaḥ bhavati mā evam tadānīm gomāra pratītiḥ

original: eṣa śābaleya eṣa bāhuleyaḥ iti tu viśeṣagrahaṇe cakṣur vyāpārabhedo 'parihāryaḥ //
analyzed: eṣa śābaleyaḥ eṣa bāhuleyaḥ iti tu viśeṣa grahaṇe cakṣuḥ parihāryaḥ

original: yadi ca ādyagopiṇḍbhede prathamākṣasannipātajā buddhiḥ subhagatāṃ gatā gakārabhede tarhi kiṃ kṛtam asyā daurbhāgyam tatrāpi prathamaśrotravyāpāravelāyāmanavagatavyañjakavibhāgasyāpi gaganagaṅgādau gakārabhedaḥ pratibhāsata evety alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: yadi ca ādya go piṇḍ bhede prathama akṣa sannipāta jā buddhiḥ subhaga tām gatā gakāra bhede tarhi kim kṛtam asyāḥ daurbhāgyam tatra api prathama śrotra vyāpāra velāyām anavagata vyañjaka vibhāgasya api gagana gaṅgā ādau gakāra bhedaḥ pratibhāsate eva iti alam prasaṅgena

original: tad ayaṃ vastusaṃkṣepaḥ upekṣyatāṃ vā sarvatra sāmānyaviśeṣavyavahāraḥ iṣyatāṃ vā gotvādivat gakārabhedavṛtti gatvasāmānyam //
analyzed: tat ayam vastu saṃkṣepaḥ upekṣyatām vā sarvatra sāmānya viśeṣa vyavahāraḥ iṣyatām vā go tva ādi vat gakāra bheda vṛtti ga tva sāmānyam

original: atvam api gatvavad apratyākhyeyam itaretaravilakṣaṇānām akārāṇāṃ hrasvadīrghaplutādibhedena pratibhāsāt /
analyzed: a tvam api ga tva vat a pratyākhyeyam itaretara vilakṣaṇānām akārāṇām hrasva dīrgha pluta ādi bhedena pratibhāsāt

original: yaḥ punaḥ ākāre 'py akārapratyabhijñānaṃ brūyāt tasya īkārokārapratītiṣv api akārasyaiva grahaṇaprasaktiḥ actvāviśeṣāt //
analyzed: yaḥ punar ākāre pi akāra pratyabhijñānam brūyāt tasya īkāra ukāra pratītiṣu api akārasya eva grahaṇa prasaktiḥ a c tva aviśeṣāt

original: atha tadaviśeṣe 'pi avarṇāt ivarṇasya bhedaḥ iṣyate sa tarhy ākārasya na nihnotavyaḥ /
analyzed: atha tad aviśeṣe pi avarṇāt i varṇasya bhedaḥ iṣyate sa tarhi ākārasya na nihnotavyaḥ

original: evañ ca sati araṇyāraṇyaśabdābhyāṃ bhinnārthapratītir upapatsyate //
analyzed: evam ca sati araṇya araṇya śabdābhyām bhinna artha pratītiḥ upapatsyate

original: udāttānudāttasvaritasaṃvṛtavikṛtādibhedo 'pi śabdavidāṃ pratyakṣa eva gītajñānām ieva svaragrāmabhāṣāvibhāgaḥ /
analyzed: udātta anudātta svarita saṃvṛta vikṛta ādi bhedaḥ śabda vidām pratyakṣaḥ eva gīta jñānām svara grāma bhāṣā vibhāgaḥ

original: tasmāt aṣṭādaśabhedaṃ akāram ācakṣate /
analyzed: tasmāt aṣṭādaśa bhedam akāram ācakṣate

original: atvaṃ ca tatsāmānyaṃ avarṇakulaśabdena vyavaharantīti //
analyzed: a tvam ca tad sāmānyam avarṇa kula śabdena vyavaharanti iti

original: yat tu dhvanidharmasyāpi dīrghādeḥ arthapratipattyaṅgatvaṃ turagavegavad uktam tad apy ahṛdayaṅgamam /
analyzed: yat tu dhvani dharmasya api dīrgha ādeḥ artha pratipatti aṅgatvam turaga vega vat uktam tat api ahṛdayaṅgamam

original: śabdād arthaṃ pratipadyante lokāḥ na marudbhyaḥ //
analyzed: śabdāt artham pratipadyante lokāḥ na marudbhyaḥ

original: atha marutām api tathā vyutpatteḥ arthapratītihetutvaṃ tarhi vyutpattir eva pramāṇaṃ syāt na śabdaḥ vyutpatter avyabhicārāt śabdasya ca vyabhicārāt ity āstām etat //
analyzed: atha marutām api tathā vyutpatteḥ artha pratīti hetu tvam tarhi vyutpattiḥ eva pramāṇam syāt na śabdaḥ vyutpatteḥ avyabhicārāt śabdasya ca vyabhicārāt iti āstām etat

original: tasmāt gatvādisāmānyaiḥ arthasaṃpratyayātmanaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt gatvā ādi sāmānyaiḥ artha saṃpratyaya ātmanaḥ

original: kāryasya pariniṣpatteḥ na varṇavyaktinityatā //
analyzed: kāryasya pariniṣpatteḥ na varṇa vyakti nitya tā

original: apara āha tiṣṭhatu tāvat dūrata eva gatvādyaparasāmānyam mahāsāmānyam api śabdatvaṃ varṇeṣu nopapadyate //
analyzed: aparaḥ āha tiṣṭhatu tāvat dūratas eva gatvā ādi apara sāmānyam mahā sāmānyam api śabda tvam varṇeṣu na upapadyate

original: vyaktyantarānusandhānaṃ yatraikavyaktidarśane /
analyzed: vyakti antara anusandhānam yatra eka vyakti darśane

original: tatraikarūpasāmānyaṃ iṣyate tatkṛtaṃ ca tat //
analyzed: tatra eka rūpa sāmānyam iṣyate tad kṛtam ca tat

original: gakāraśrutivelāyāṃ na vakārāvamarśanam /
analyzed: gakāra śruti velāyām na vakāra avamarśanam

original: bāhuleyaparāmarśaḥ śābaleyagrahe yathā //
analyzed: bāhuleya parāmarśaḥ śābaleya grahe yathā

original: śabdaḥ śabdo 'yam ity evaṃ pratītis tv aprayojikā /
analyzed: śabdaḥ śabdaḥ yam iti evam pratītiḥ tu aprayojikā

original: eṣā hi śrotragamyatvaṃ upādhim anurudyate //
analyzed: eṣā hi śrotra gamya tvam upādhim anurudyate

original: tad etanniranusandhānasyābhidhānam /
analyzed: tat etat niranusandhānasya abhidhānam

original: anusandhānapratyayasya sāmānyasiddhāv aprayojakatvāt /
analyzed: anusandhāna pratyayasya sāmānya siddhau aprayojaka tvāt

original: anusandhānaṃ hi sārūpyāt vijātīyeṣv api bhavati gavayagrahaṇasamaye gopiṇḍānusandhānavat /
analyzed: anusandhānam hi sārūpyāt vijātīyeṣu api bhavati gavaya grahaṇa samaye go piṇḍa anusandhāna vat

original: tasmāt abādhitaikarūpapratyayapratiṣṭha eva sāmānyavyavahāraḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt abādhita eka rūpa pratyaya pratiṣṭhaḥ eva sāmānya vyavahāraḥ

original: samānabuddhigrāhye 'pi sāmānye 'vasthite kvacit /
analyzed: samāna buddhi grāhye sāmānye kvacid

original: bhavaty anyānusandhānaṃ kvacid vā na bhavaty api //
analyzed: bhavati anya anusandhānam kvacid vā na bhavati api

original: tad asti khaṇḍamuṇḍādau piṇḍasārūpyakāritam /
analyzed: tat asti khaṇḍa muṇḍa ādau piṇḍa sārūpya kāritam

original: gakārādiṣu varṇeṣu tadabhāvāt tu nāsti tat //
analyzed: gakāra ādiṣu varṇeṣu tad abhāvāt tu nā asti tat

original: na tu sāmānyābhāvāt //
analyzed: na tu sāmānya abhāvāt

original: na ca sārūpyam eva sāmānyaṃ sāṅkhyavad abhidhātuṃ yuktam vijātīyeṣv api gogavayādiṣu tasya dṛṣṭatvāt //
analyzed: na ca sārūpyam eva sāmānyam sāṅkhya vat abhidhātum yuktam vijātīyeṣu api go gavaya ādiṣu tasya dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: yadi ca śabdaḥ śabdaḥ ity anuvṛttabuddheḥ śrotragamyatvopādhikṛtatvam ucyate tarhi gavādāv apy ekabuddheḥ bāhadohādyekārthakriyākāritvanibandhanatvāt gotvādijātinihnavaḥ bauddhavan mantavyaḥ /
analyzed: yadi ca śabdaḥ śabdaḥ iti anuvṛtta buddheḥ śrotra gamya tva upādhi kṛta tvam ucyate tarhi gavā ādau api eka buddheḥ bāha doha ādi eka artha kriyā kāri tva nibandhana tvāt go tva ādi jāti nihnavaḥ bauddha vat mantavyaḥ

original: na caitad evam tat gotvavat śabdatvam api na pratyākhyeyam //
analyzed: na ca etat evam tat go tva vat śabda tvam api na pratyākhyeyam

original: etena brāhmaṇatvādisāmānyam api samarthitaṃ veditavyam upadeśasahāyaprtyakṣagamyatvāt /
analyzed: etena brāhmaṇa tva ādi sāmānyam api samarthitam veditavyam upadeśa sahāya prtyakṣa gamya tvāt

original: na copadeśāpekṣaṇāt apratyakṣatvaṃ tasya bhaviturmahati gotvādipratyayasyāpi sambandhagrahaṇakāle tadapekṣatvadarśanāt /
analyzed: na ca upadeśa apekṣaṇāt apratyakṣa tvam tasya bhavituḥ mahati go tva ādi pratyayasya api sambandha grahaṇa kāle tad apekṣa tva darśanāt

original: uktaṃ ca na hi yat giriśṛṅgamāruhya gṛhyate tat apratyakṣam iti //
analyzed: uktam ca na hi yat giri śṛṅgam āruhya gṛhyate tat apratyakṣam iti

original: na caupādhikaḥ paiṭhīnasipaippalādiprabhṛtiṣu brāhmanapratyayaḥ upādher agrahaṇāt /
analyzed: na ca aupādhikaḥ paiṭhīnasi paippala ādi prabhṛtiṣu brāhmana pratyayaḥ upādheḥ agrahaṇāt

original: aupādhikatvasya gotvādāv api vaktuṃ śakyatvāt //
analyzed: aupādhika tvasya go tva ādau api vaktum śakya tvāt

original: api ca upadeśanirapekṣam api cakṣuḥ kṣatriyādivilakṣaṇāṃ saumyākṛtiṃ brāhmaṇajātim avagacchati ity eke /
analyzed: api ca upadeśa nirapekṣam api cakṣuḥ kṣatriya ādi vilakṣaṇām saumya ākṛtim brāhmaṇa jātim avagacchati iti eke

original: tadalamanayā kathayā //
analyzed: tat alam anayā kathayā

original: prakṛtam ucyate gatvādibhir jātibhir eva arthasaṃpratyayopapatteḥ yad uktaṃ darśanasya parārthatvāt iti etad ayukutam //
analyzed: prakṛtam ucyate ga tu ādibhiḥ jātibhiḥ eva artha saṃpratyaya upapatteḥ yat uktam darśanasya parārtha tvāt iti etat

original: etena sarvatra yagapadyādityetad api prtyuktam sambandhaniyamasya gatvādibhya eva siddheḥ //
analyzed: etena sarvatra yagapadyāt iti etat api sambandha niyamasya ga tva ādibhyaḥ eva siddheḥ

original: yad api saṅkhyābhāvāt kṛtvasucprayogadarśanamudagrāhi tad api vyabhicāri kṛtaṃ kānyasya tanvaṅgyā trirapāṅgavilokanam /
analyzed: yat api saṅkhyā bhāvāt kṛtvasuc prayoga darśanam uda grāhi tat api vyabhicāri kṛtam kāni asya tanu aṅgyā tris apāṅga vilokanam

original: caturāliṅganaṃ gāḍhaṃ aṣṭakṛtvaś ca cambanam iti tadbhede 'pi darśanāt //
analyzed: catur āliṅganam gāḍham aṣṭa kṛtvas ca cambanam iti tad bhede darśanāt

original: atha tatra strīpuṃsayor abhede cumbanādikriyāmātrabheda evety ucyate tathā 'py apūrveṣu brāhmaṇeṣu bhuktavatsu pañcakṛtvo brāhmaṇā bhuktavantaḥ iti vyavahāro dṛśyate //
analyzed: atha tatra strīpuṃsayoḥ abhede cumbana ādi kriyā mātra bhedaḥ eva iti ucyate tathā pi apūrveṣu brāhmaṇeṣu bhuktavatsu pañca kṛtvas brāhmaṇāḥ bhuktavantaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate

original: evaṃ śabde 'pi tatsaṅkhyāvyavahāro hi dṛśyate /
analyzed: evam śabde pi tad saṅkhyā vyavahāraḥ hi dṛśyate

original: kavinā sad anuprāse nibaddhe 'kṣaraḍambare //
analyzed: kavinā sat anuprāse nibaddhe kṣara ḍambare

original: gakāro bahavo dṛṣṭāḥ iti vyavaharanti hi /
analyzed: gakāraḥ bahavaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ iti vyavaharanti hi

original: yad api pratyabhijñānaṃ taddvārakam udāhṛtam //
analyzed: yat api pratyabhijñānam tad dvārakam udāhṛtam

original: tasyāpi siddhe prāmāṇye jātyālambanatā bhavet /
analyzed: tasya api siddhe prāmāṇye jāti ālambana tā bhavet

original: nṛttābhinayaceṣṭādipratyabhijñānato vayam //
analyzed: nṛtta abhinaya ceṣṭā ādi pratyabhijñānataḥ vayam

original: na śabdapratyabhijñānam uttārayitum īśmahe /
analyzed: na śabda pratyabhijñānam uttārayitum īśmahe

original: viśeṣaṃ pratybhijñāne na paśyāmo manāgapi //
analyzed: viśeṣam pratyabhijñāne na paśyāmaḥ manāk api

original: stambhādipratyabhjñāsu na tadaivāvināśadhīḥ /
analyzed: stambha ādi pratyabhjñāsu na tadā eva avināśa dhīḥ

original: kṣaṇabhaṅgapratīkāraṃ tena tāḥ kartum īśate //
analyzed: kṣaṇa bhaṅga pratīkāram tena tāḥ kartum īśate

original: śabdasya pratyabhijñānavelāyām eva dṛśayate /
analyzed: śabdasya pratyabhijñāna velāyām eva dṛśayate

original: śabdarūpasya vidhvaṃsaḥ iti tannityatā kutaḥ //
analyzed: śabda rūpasya vidhvaṃsaḥ iti tad nitya tā kutas

original: yady api kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge pratyabhijñāprāmāṇyam asmābhir api samarthayiṣyate tathāpi stambhādipratyabhiñāyāḥ śabdapratyabhiñāyā eṣa eva viśeṣaḥ yad atra dhvastaḥ śabdaḥ iti tadivapratyayo jāyate /
analyzed: yadi api kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge pratyabhijñā prāmāṇyam asmābhiḥ api samarthayiṣyate tathā api stambha ādi pratyabhiñāyāḥ śabda pratyabhiñāyāḥ eṣaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat atra dhvastaḥ śabdaḥ iti tad iva pratyayaḥ jāyate

original: ata eva tirohite 'pi bhāvādiyaṃ apramāṇaṃ pratyabhijñety āhuḥ //
analyzed: atas eva tirohite bhāvāt iyam apramāṇam pratyabhijñā iti āhuḥ

original: yady api dhriyate 'smākaṃ śabdo dvitrān api kṣaṇān /
analyzed: yadi api dhriyate smākam śabdaḥ dvitrān api kṣaṇān

original: ptatyabhijñā tu kālena tāvatā nāvakalpate //
analyzed: ptati abhijñā tu kālena tāvatā na avakalpate

original: tathā hi śabda utpadyate tāvat /
analyzed: tathā hi śabdaḥ utpadyate tāvat

original: tataḥ svaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ janayati ajanakasya pratibhāsāyogāt /
analyzed: tatas sva viṣayam jñānam janayati ajanakasya pratibhāsa ayogāt

original: tataḥ tena jñāena śabdo gṛhyate /
analyzed: tatas tena jñāena śabdaḥ gṛhyate

original: tataḥ saṃskārabodhaḥ /
analyzed: tatas saṃskāra bodhaḥ

original: tataḥ svaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ janayati ajanakasya pratibhāsāyogāt /
analyzed: tatas sva viṣayam jñānam janayati ajanakasya pratibhāsa ayogāt

original: tataḥ tena jñānena śabdo gṛhyate /
analyzed: tatas tena jñānena śabdaḥ gṛhyate

original: tataḥ saṃskārabodhaḥ /
analyzed: tatas saṃskāra bodhaḥ

original: tataḥ pūrvajñātaśabdasmaraṇam /
analyzed: tatas pūrva jñāta śabda smaraṇam

original: tatas tatsacivaṃ śrotraṃ mano vā śabdapratyabhiñānaṃ janayiṣyati /
analyzed: tatas tad sacivam śrotram manaḥ vā śabda pratyabhiñānam janayiṣyati

original: tadā śabdo grahīṣyata itīyat kuto 'sya dīrghamāyuḥ pratyabhiñāprāmāṇyād eva tāvad āyus tasya kalpyata iti cet satyaṃ kalpyate yadi vināśapratyayaḥ tadaiva na syāt //
analyzed: tadā śabdaḥ grahīṣyate iti iyat kutas sya dīrgham āyuḥ pratyabhiñā prāmāṇyāt eva tāvat āyuḥ tasya kalpyate iti ced satyam kalpyate yadi vināśa pratyayaḥ tadā eva na syāt

original: api ca gośabdo 'yam aśvaśabdo 'yam iti tadabhidhānaviśeṣollekhāt nānānusmaraṇaṃ tasya tadaivāvaśyam āpatet /
analyzed: api ca go śabdaḥ yam aśva śabdaḥ yam iti tad abhidhāna viśeṣa ullekhāt nānā anusmaraṇam tasya tadā eva avaśyam āpatet

original: vijñānāyoagapadyāc ca kālo dīrghataro bhavet //
analyzed: vijñānāt oagapadyāt ca kālaḥ dīrghataraḥ bhavet

original: yad apy uditamuddāmameghaśyāmāsu rātriṣu /
analyzed: yat api udita muddāma megha śyāmāsu rātriṣu

original: sāmyaṃ saudāminīdhāmajanyayā pratyabhijñayā //
analyzed: sāmyam saudāminī dhāma janyayā pratyabhijñayā

original: tad asat kāladairghyeṇa tadavasthityasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: tat asat kāla dairghyeṇa tad avasthiti asaṃbhavāt

original: vidyuddṛṣṭe ca vṛkṣādau nāśasaṃcittyasaṃbhāvāt //
analyzed: vidyut dṛṣṭe ca vṛkṣa ādau nāśa saṃcitti asaṃbhāvāt

original: pratyabhiñā nāma smaryamāṇānubhūyamānasāmānādhikaraṇyagrāhiṇī saṃskārasacivendiryajanyā pratītir iti kecit //
analyzed: pratyabhiñā nāma smaryamāṇa anubhūyamāna sāmānādhikaraṇya grāhiṇī saṃskāra saciva indirya janyā pratītiḥ iti kecid

original: anye manyante smaryamāṇapūrvajñānaviśeśitārthagrāhitvāt pratyabhijñāyāḥ tadviśeṣaṇasya ca arthasya bāhyendriyagrāhyatvānupapatteḥ stambhādāv api mānasī pratyabhiñeti //
analyzed: anye manyante smaryamāṇa pūrva jñāna viśeśita artha grāhi tvāt pratyabhijñāyāḥ tad viśeṣaṇasya ca arthasya bāhya indriya grāhya tva anupapatteḥ stambha ādau api mānasī pratyabhiñā iti

original: nirbandhastv iha nāsitikaṃ sā yathā 'stu tathā 'stu vā /
analyzed: nirbandhaḥ tu iha nāsitikam sā yathā stu tathā stu vā

original: śabde vināśajñānāt tu na sā nityatvasādhikā //
analyzed: śabde vināśa jñānāt tu na sā nitya tva sādhikā

original: bādhyabādhakabhāve tu niyamo nanu kiṃkṛtaḥ śabdasya pratyabhijñānavināśapratibhāsayoḥ //
analyzed: bādhya bādhaka bhāve tu niyamaḥ nanu kiṃkṛtaḥ śabdasya pratyabhijñāna vināśa pratibhāsayoḥ

original: ucyate pratyabhiñānam anyathā 'py upapadyate /
analyzed: ucyate pratyabhiñānam anyathā pi upapadyate

original: gatvādijātiviṣayaṃ tad vā sādṛśyahetukam //
analyzed: gatvā ādi jāti viṣayam tat vā sādṛśya hetukam

original: nanv abhivyañjakadhvaṃsāt nāśadhīr api setsyati /
analyzed: nanu abhivyañjaka dhvaṃsāt nāśa dhīḥ api setsyati

original: tad asāv api bādhyā 'stu yad vā bhavatu saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: tat asau api bādhyā stu yat vā bhavatu saṃśayaḥ

original: maivaṃ vināśitābuddhiḥ bhedabudhyupavṛṃhitā /
analyzed: mā evam vināśita abuddhiḥ bheda budhi upavṛṃhitā

original: sā ceyaṃ cānyathāsiddhe iti vaktum asāṃpratam //
analyzed: sā ca iyam ca anyathā asiddhe iti vaktum asāṃpratam

original: pratyabhiñā ca sāpekṣā nirapekṣā tv abhāvadhiḥ /
analyzed: pratyabhiñā ca sa apekṣā nirapekṣā tu abhā avadhiḥ

original: tenaivamādau viśaye pratyabhijñaiva bādhyate //
analyzed: tena evamādau viśaye pratyabhijñā eva bādhyate

original: śabdābhāvasya jhagiti grahaṇāt /
analyzed: śabda abhāvasya grahaṇāt

original: tatpratyabhiñāyāś ca pūrvānusandhānādisavyapekṣatvāt //
analyzed: tad pratyabhiñāyāḥ ca pūrva anusandhāna ādi sa vyapekṣa tvāt

original: api ca pratyabhiñā vyabhicārantī karmādiṣu gṛhyate /
analyzed: api ca pratyabhiñā vyabhicārantī karma ādiṣu gṛhyate

original: tenāsyāṃ śabdo 'py abhāvapratyayopahatavapuṣi kaḥ samāśvāsaḥ na cedaṃ pratyakṣe 'pi anekāntikatvodbhāvanam api tu vināśakapratyayapratihataprabhāvā pratyabhijñā nityatvaṃ karmādiṣv iva śabde 'pi na sādhayituṃ prabhavatīti dṛṣṭāta eṣa pradarśyate //
analyzed: tena asyām abhāva pratyaya upahata vapuṣi kaḥ samāśvāsaḥ na ca idam pratyakṣe anekāntika tva udbhāvanam api tu vināśaka pratyaya pratihata prabhāvā pratyabhijñā nitya tvam karma ādiṣu iva śabde pi na sādhayitum prabhavati iti dṛṣṭātaḥ eṣa pradarśyate

original: nanu pratyakṣeo 'pi dṛṣṭāntasya ko 'vasaraḥ satyam grāhakāstu bhavādṛśāḥ svayam anavabudhyamānā evaṃ budhyante //
analyzed: nanu dṛṣṭāntasya kaḥ vasaraḥ satyam grāhakāḥ tu bhavādṛśāḥ svayam anavabudhyamānāḥ evam budhyante

original: yat tu pravṛddharabhasatayā buddhikarmādāv api nityatvasamarthanam tat atyantamalaukikam ity uktam //
analyzed: yat tu pravṛddha rabhasa tayā buddhi karma ādau api nitya tva samarthanam tat atyantam alaukikam iti uktam

original: kiṃ nāma śabdanityatvasamarthanatṛṣā ''turaḥ /
analyzed: kim nāma śabda nitya tva samarthana tṛṣā turaḥ

original: jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ caiva sakalaṃ pātum icchasi //
analyzed: jaṅgamam sthāvaram ca eva sakalam pātum icchasi

original: tasmād alamatirabhasapravṛttābhiḥ buddhikarmādinityatvasamarthanakathābhiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt alam ati rabhasa pravṛttābhiḥ buddhi karma ādi nitya tva samarthana kathābhiḥ

original: yat punaḥ abhivyaktipakṣe śabdasya grahaṇe niyamābhāvam āśaṅkya śrotrasaṃskāreṇa viṣayasaṃskāreṇa ybhayasaṃskāreṇa vā nityaṃ grahaṇm uvavarṇitam tadvañcanāmātram samānadeśānāṃ samānendriyagrāhyāṇaṃ pratiniyatavyañjakavyaṅgyatvādarśanāt //
analyzed: yat punar abhivyakti pakṣe śabdasya grahaṇe niyama abhāvam āśaṅkya śrotra saṃskāreṇa viṣaya saṃskāreṇa vā nityam grahaṇm tad vañcanā mātram samāna deśānām pratiniyata vyañjaka vyaṅgya tva adarśanāt

original: ye punar atra gandhā udāhṛtāḥ te samānendiriyagāhyā bhavanti na samānadeśāḥ //
analyzed: ye punar atra gandhāḥ udāhṛtāḥ te samāna indiriya gāhyāḥ bhavanti na samāna deśāḥ

original: ekabhūmyāśritatvena tulyadeśatvakalpane /
analyzed: eka bhūmi āśrita tvena tulya deśa tva kalpane

original: bhavet samānadeśatvaṃ himavadvindhyayor api //
analyzed: bhavet samāna deśa tvam himavat vindhyayoḥ api

original: ekatve 'pi bhuvo bhānti padārthāḥ pārthivāḥ pṛthak /
analyzed: eka tve pi bhuvaḥ bhānti padārthāḥ pārthivāḥ pṛthak

original: vyajyante tadadhiṣṭhānāḥ gandhāstais tair nibandhanaiḥ //
analyzed: vyajyante tad adhiṣṭhānāḥ gandhāḥ taiḥ taiḥ nibandhanaiḥ

original: bhavatv anāśritāḥ śabdāḥ yadi vā ''kāśasaṃśritāḥ /
analyzed: bhavatu anāśritāḥ śabdāḥ yadi vā kāśa saṃśritāḥ

original: sarvathā bhinnadeśatvaṃ eṣāṃ vakutuṃ na śakyate //
analyzed: sarvathā bhinna deśa tvam eṣām vakutum na śakyate

original: nanu yatahivatve 'pi nabhasaḥ tadbhāgakalpanayā pratipuruṣaṃ śrotrendriyabhedaḥ evaṃ tadbhāgakalpanayaiva śabdānām api asamānadeśatvāt niyatavyañjakavyaṅgyatā bhaviṣyati naivam upapadyate yatraiva vaktṛmukhākāśadeśe śrotṛśrotrākāśadeśe vā gośabda upalabdhaḥ tatraivāśvaśabda idānīm upalabhyate na punar atimuktakusume ya upalabdho gandhaḥ sa bandūke madhūke vā kadācid upalabhyata iti //
analyzed: nanu yata hiva tve pi nabhasaḥ tad bhāga kalpanayā prati puruṣam śrotra indriya bhedaḥ evam tad bhāga kalpanayā eva śabdānām api asamāna deśa tvāt niyata vyañjaka vyaṅgya tā bhaviṣyati na evam upapadyate yatra eva vaktṛ mukha ākāśa deśe śrotṛ śrotra ākāśa deśe vā go śabdaḥ upalabdhaḥ tatra eva aśva śabdaḥ idānīm upalabhyate na punar atimukta kusume yaḥ upalabdhaḥ gandhaḥ sa bandūke madhūke vā kadācid upalabhyate iti

original: tasmāt samānadeśatvāt na vyaktau niyamo bhavet /
analyzed: tasmāt samāna deśa tvāt na vyaktau niyamaḥ bhavet

original: utpattau tu vyavasthāyāṃ tadbhāve upapadyate //
analyzed: utpattau tu vyavasthāyām tad bhāve upapadyate

original: nādaiḥ saṃskiryatāṃ śabdaḥ śrotraṃ vā dvayam eva /
analyzed: nādaiḥ saṃskiryatām śabdaḥ śrotram vā dvayam eva

original: sarvathā niyamo nāsti vyañjakeṣv iti niścayaḥ //
analyzed: sarvathā niyamaḥ nā asti vyañjakeṣu iti niścayaḥ

original: vyavasthā vyañjakānāṃ cet ucyate 'dṛṣṭakāritā /
analyzed: vyavasthā vyañjakānām ced ucyate dṛṣṭa kāri tā

original: utpattau dṛśyamānāyāṃ dṛṣṭam apy avirodhakam //
analyzed: utpattau dṛśyamānāyām dṛṣṭam api avirodhakam

original: na ca stimitamārutāpanayanavyatiriktaḥ kiś cana śrotrasaṃskāro vidyate /
analyzed: na ca stimita māruta apanayana vyatiriktaḥ kim cana śrotra saṃskāraḥ vidyate

original: tatra cātiprasaṅga uktaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca atiprasaṅgaḥ uktaḥ

original: etad atiriktasaṃskārakalpanāyāṃ tu adṛṣṭakalpanā /
sthire ca śabdasaṃskāragrāhiṇi sati punar abhivyaktasyāpi gośabdasya śravaṇaṃ syāt tadgrahaṇahetoḥ saṃskārasya sthiratvāt /
analyzed: sthire ca śabda saṃskāra grāhiṇi sati punar abhivyaktasya api go śabdasya śravaṇam syāt tad grahaṇa hetoḥ saṃskārasya sthira tvāt

original: tatkṣaṇikatve tu śabdakṣaṇikataiva sādhvī pratīyamānatvāt //
analyzed: tad kṣaṇika tve tu śabda kṣaṇika tā eva sādhvī pratīyamāna tvāt

original: yat tu bhrgṛmitraḥ tam eva saṃskāraṃ śrotrendriyam abhupaiti tad idam apūvikaṃ kim api pāṇḍityam /
analyzed: yat tu bhrgṛmitraḥ tam eva saṃskāram śrotra indriyam abhupaiti tat idam apūvikam kim api pāṇḍityam

original: indriyasya hi saṃskāryasya saṃkāraḥ na saṃskāra evendriyam lokāgamaviruddhatvāt /
analyzed: indriyasya hi saṃskāryasya saṃkāraḥ na saṃskāraḥ eva indriyam loka āgama viruddha tvāt

original: pratipuruṣaṃ yāvacchabdaṃ bhinnasya kṣaṇikasya cendriyasya kalpanam anupapannam /
analyzed: prati puruṣam yāvacchabdam bhinnasya kṣaṇikasya ca indriyasya kalpanam anupapannam

original: anaśvaratve tu śaśvad eva śabdakolāhalaprasaṅga iti yat kiñcid etat /
analyzed: anaśvara tve tu śaśvat eva śabda kolāhala prasaṅgaḥ iti yat kiñcid etat

original: bhaṭṭenaiva sopahāsam eṣa dūṣitaḥ pakṣa iti kim atra vimardena yad api bhaṭṭa āha yadi tv avaśyaṃ vaktavyaḥ tārkikoktiviparyayaḥ /
analyzed: bhaṭṭena eva sa upahāsam eṣa dūṣitaḥ pakṣaḥ iti kim atra vimardena yat api bhaṭṭaḥ āha yadi tu avaśyam vaktavyaḥ tārkika ukti viparyayaḥ

original: tato vedānusāreṇa kāryā dikśrotratām ati //
analyzed: tatas veda anusāreṇa kāryā diś śrotra tām ati

original: iti tad apy asāṃpratam diśāṃ kāryāntarākṣepāt āgamānyapratvataḥ /
analyzed: iti tat api asāṃpratam diśām kārya antara ākṣepāt

original: āhopuruṣikāmātraṃ digdravyaśrotrakalpanam //
analyzed: āhopuruṣikā mātram diś dravya śrotra kalpanam

original: indriyāṇāṃ bhautikatvasya sādhayiṣyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: indriyāṇām bhautika tvasya sādhayiṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: diśaś ca amūrtatvāt nendriyaprakṛtitvam /
analyzed: diśaḥ ca amūrta tvāt na indriya prakṛti tvam

original: vyāpakatvāviśeṣe vā kālātmano r api tathābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: vyāpaka tva aviśeṣe vā kāla ātmanoḥ api tathā bhāva prasaṅgaḥ

original: tasyor anyatra vyāpārakatvāt nendriyaprakṛti tvam iti cet digdravye 'pi tulyam etat /
analyzed: tasyoḥ anyatra vyāpāraka tvāt na indriya prakṛti tvam iti ced diś dravye tulyam etat

original: āgamas tvanyapara eva /
analyzed: āgamaḥ tu anya paraḥ eva

original: yathā hi sūryaṃ cakṣurgamayatāt /
analyzed: yathā hi sūryam cakṣuḥ gamayatāt

original: diśaḥśrotram iti paṭhyate evaṃ antarikṣamasum iti ca paṭhyata eva /
analyzed: diśaḥ śrotram iti paṭhyate evam antarikṣa masum iti ca paṭhyate eva

original: na cāsavo 'ntariksaprakṛtikāḥ pavanātmakatvāt /
analyzed: na ca asavaḥ ntariksa prakṛtikāḥ pavana ātmaka tvāt

original: tasmāt kṛtaṃ diśā /
analyzed: tasmāt kṛtam diśā

original: ākāśadeśa eva karṇaśaṣkulyavacchinnaḥ śabdanimittopabhogaprāpakadharmādharmopanibaddhaḥ śrotram ity uktam //
analyzed: ākāśa deśaḥ eva karṇa śaṣkulī avacchinnaḥ śabda nimitta upabhoga prāpaka dharma adharma upanibaddhaḥ śrotram iti uktam

original: nanu dharmādharmakṛtaśrotraniyamavat abhivyaktiniyamo 'pi śabdasya tatkṛta eva bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: nanu dharma adharma kṛta śrotra niyama vat abhivyakti niyamaḥ u pi śabdasya tad kṛtaḥ eva bhaviṣyati

original: kim iti tadaniyamo nityatvapakṣe codyata iti naitad yuktam cakṣurādīndriyāṇāṃ vaikalyaṃ adṛṣṭanibandhanaṃ andhakāraprabhṛtiṣu dṛśyate na punaḥ padārthasthitir aṣṭavaśāt viparivartate /
analyzed: kim iti tad aniyamaḥ nitya tva pakṣe codyate iti na etat yuktam cakṣuḥ ādi indriyāṇām vaikalyam adṛṣṭa nibandhanam andhakāra prabhṛtiṣu dṛśyate na punar padārtha sthitiḥ aṣṭa vaśāt viparivartate

original: vyañjakadharmātikrame hi himam api śaityaṃ svadharmam atikrāmet /
analyzed: vyañjaka dharma atikrame hi himam api śaityam svadharmam atikrāmet

original: vyañjakeṣu niyamo na dṛṣṭa ity uktam /
analyzed: vyañjakeṣu niyamaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ iti uktam

original: dṛṣṭe ca varṇabhede niyatopalabdhihetau saṃbhavati sati kim ayam adṛṣṭam astake bhāra āropyate kathaṃ cābhivyaktipakṣe tīvramandavibhāgaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭe ca varṇa bhede niyata upalabdhi hetau saṃbhavati sati kim ayam adṛṣṭam astake bhāraḥ āropyate katham ca abhivyakti pakṣe tīvra manda vibhāgaḥ

original: tīvratādayo hi varṇadharmā vā syuḥ dhvanidharmā vā varṇadharmatve tīvrāt gakārāt anyatvaṃmandasyetyasmanmatānupraveśaḥ //
analyzed: tīvra tā ādayaḥ hi varṇa dharmāḥ vā syuḥ dhvani dharmāḥ vā varṇa dharma tve tīvrāt gakārāt anya tvam mandasya iti asmad mata anupraveśaḥ

original: dhvanidharmatvapakṣe tu śrotreṇa grahaṇaṃ katham na hi vāyugato vegaḥ śravaṇenopalabhyate //
analyzed: dhvani dharma tva pakṣe tu śrotreṇa grahaṇam katham na hi vāyu gataḥ vegaḥ śravaṇena upalabhyate

original: yat tu vyaktidharmāḥ kṛśatvasthūlatvādayaḥ jātāv upalabhyante iti darśitam tat kāmam upapadyetāpi /
analyzed: yat tu vyakti dharmāḥ kṛśa tva sthūla tva ādayaḥ jātau upalabhyante iti darśitam tat kāmam upapadyeta api

original: jāteḥ vyakteḥ taddhiarmāṇāṃ ca samānendriyagrāhyatvāt //
analyzed: jāteḥ vyakteḥ tad dhiarmāṇām ca samāna indriya grāhya tvāt

original: iha tu sparśanagrāhyaḥ pavano 'tīndriyo 'tha vā /
analyzed: iha tu sparśana grāhyaḥ vā

original: taddharmāḥ śravaṇe śabde gṛhyanta iti vismayaḥ //
analyzed: tad dharmāḥ śravaṇe śabde gṛhyante iti vismayaḥ

original: yat tu buddhir eva tīvramandavatīti tadatīva subhāṣitam asati viṣayabhede buddhibhedānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: yat tu buddhiḥ eva tīvra mandavatī iti tat atīva subhāṣitam asati viṣaya bhede buddhi bheda anupapatteḥ

original: kiñ ca nityaparokṣā te buddhir evaṃ ca nādavat /
analyzed: kim ca nitya parokṣā te buddhiḥ evam ca nāda vat

original: tadagrahe na tīvrāditaddharmagrahasaṃbhavaḥ //
analyzed: tad agrahe na tīvra ādi tad dharma graha saṃbhavaḥ

original: aho tīvrādayas tīvre prāpāte patitā amī /
analyzed: aho tīvra ādayaḥ tīvre prāpāte patitāḥ amī

original: yo gṛhyate na taddharmā yaddharmā sa na gṛhyate //
analyzed: yaḥ gṛhyate na tad dharmā yad dharmā sa na gṛhyate

original: yaścābhibhavavṛttāntaḥ tvanmate marutām asau /
analyzed: yaḥ ca abhibhava vṛttāntaḥ tvad mate marutām asau

original: anile cābhibhūte 'pi śabdo na śrūyate katham //
analyzed: anile ca abhibhūte śabdaḥ na śrūyate katham

original: dīpe 'bhibhūte raviṇā na hi rūpaṃ na gṛhyate /
analyzed: dīpe bhibhūte raviṇā na hi rūpam na gṛhyate

original: niyatavyañjakatvaṃ tu pratikṣiptam adarśanāt //
analyzed: niyata vyañjaka tvam tu pratikṣiptam adarśanāt

original: yat tu śāṅkhādiśabdānāṃ śrotragrāhyatvasiddhaye /
analyzed: yat tu śāṅkha ādi śabdānām śrotra grāhya tva siddhaye

original: śabdatvaṃ tatra tadgrāhyaṃ ity avādi tad apy asat //
analyzed: śabda tvam tatra tad grāhyam iti avādi tat api asat

original: satyaṃ vadata dṛṣṭaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā kvacid īdṛśam /
analyzed: satyam vadata dṛṣṭam vā śrutam vā kvacid īdṛśam

original: āśrayasya prokṣatve tatsāmānyopalambhanam //
analyzed: āśrayasya prokṣa tve tad sāmānya upalambhanam

original: śabdo na te 'sty avarṇātmā na śaṅkho varṇasambhavaḥ /
analyzed: śabdaḥ na te sti avarṇa ātmā na śaṅkhaḥ varṇa sambhavaḥ

original: 1 na nādavṛtti śabdatvaṃ iti tadgrahaṇaṃ katham //
analyzed: na nāda vṛtti śabda tvam iti tad grahaṇam katham

original: yat puanaḥ saṃpradhāritaṃ vyaṅgyakāryapakṣayoḥ kva śabdagrahaṇe gurvī kalpanā bhavati kva vā ladhvī iti tad api maulapramānavicārasāpekṣatvāt aprayojakam //
analyzed: yat puanas saṃpradhāritam vyaṅgya kārya pakṣayoḥ kva śabda grahaṇe gurvī kalpanā bhavati kva vā ladhvī iti tat api maula pramāna vicāra sāpekṣa tvāt aprayojakam

original: yadi maulapramāṇena sādhitā nityaśabdatā /
analyzed: yadi maula pramāṇena sādhitā nitya śabda tā

original: tvaduktā kalpanā sādhvī maduktā tu viapryaye //
analyzed: tvad uktā kalpanā sādhvī mad uktā tu

original: kauṣṭhyena bahiḥ prasaratā samīraṇena sarvataḥ stimitamārutāpasaraṇaṃ kriyate ity etad eva tāvad alaukikaṃ kalpitam /
analyzed: kauṣṭhyena bahis prasaratā samīraṇena sarvatas stimita māruta apasaraṇam kriyate iti etat eva tāvat alaukikam kalpitam

original: agrerūrdhvajvalanaṃ vāyostiryaggamanaṃ aṇumanasoścādyaṃ karmetyadṛṣṭakāritāni iti marutāṃ tiryaggamanasvabhāvatvāt ūrdhvam adhaś ca śabdaśravaṇaṃ na bhavet //
analyzed: agreḥ ūrdhva jvalanam vāyoḥ tiryaggamanam aṇu manasoḥ ca ādyam karma iti adṛṣṭa kāritāni iti marutām tiryaggamana svabhāva tvāt ūrdhvam adhas ca śabda śravaṇam na bhavet

original: yāvan na veginā 'nyena prerito mātariśvanā /
analyzed: yāvat na veginā preritaḥ mātariśvanā

original: tāvannaisargiko vāyuḥ na tiryaggatim ujjhati //
analyzed: tāvat naisargikaḥ vāyuḥ na tiryaggatim ujjhati

original: adhomukhapraykto 'pi śabda ūrdhvaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: adhas mukha prayktaḥ pi śabdaḥ ūrdhvam pratīyate

original: uttānavadanokto 'pi nādho na śrūyate ca saḥ //
analyzed: na adhas na śrūyate ca saḥ

original: kadambagolakākāraśabdārambho hi saṃbhavet /
analyzed: kadamba golaka ākāra śabda ārambhaḥ hi saṃbhavet

original: na punar dṛśyate loke tādṛśī marutāṃ gatiḥ //
analyzed: na punar dṛśyate loke tādṛśī marutām gatiḥ

original: ākaṇṭhānaddhanīrandhracarmāvṛtamukhoditam /
analyzed: ā kaṇṭha ānaddha nīrandhra carma āvṛta mukha uditam

original: śabdo yaḥ śrūyate tatra na kauṣṭhyānilasarpaṇam //
analyzed: śabdaḥ yaḥ śrūyate tatra na kauṣṭhya anila sarpaṇam

original: kuḍyādipratibandhena vāyor aprasaranaṃ bhavadbhir api kathitam eva /
analyzed: kuḍya ādi pratibandhena vāyoḥ aprasaranam bhavadbhiḥ api kathitam eva

original: nirvivaracarmapuṭoparuddho 'py asau na prasaret //
analyzed: niḥ vivara carma puṭa uparuddhaḥ pi asau na prasaret

original: api ca sarvatoniruddhasarvadvārasyāpi jaṭhare guragurāśabdo mandāgneḥ śrūyate /
analyzed: api ca sarvatas niruddha sarva dvārasya api jaṭhare guragurā śabdaḥ manda agneḥ śrūyate

original: atra kuto vyañjakānāṃ kauṣṭhyapavanānāṃ nismṛtiḥ romakṛpanismṛtānām api sūkṣmatayā stimitabāhyavāyvapasaranasāmarthyābhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atra kutas vyañjakānām kauṣṭhya pavanānām nismṛtiḥ romakṛpa nismṛtānām api sūkṣma tayā stimita bāhya vāyu apasarana sāmarthya abhāvaḥ

original: kiñ ca manāgapi bahir vāyau vāti na śabdaśravaṇaṃ syād iti /
analyzed: kim ca manāk api bahis vāyau vāti na śabda śravaṇam syāt iti

original: durvalo 'pi bāhyaḥ pavanaḥ pravalād api kauṣṭhyavāyoḥ balīyān bhavatīti kathaṃ tenāpasāryeta anya eva sūkṣmā vāyavaḥ śabdāvarnakāriṇaḥ na punar ete paridṛśyamānāḥ śyāmākalatālāsyopadeśinaḥ mātariśvāna iti cet na viśeṣe pramāṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: durvalaḥ api bāhyaḥ pavanaḥ pravalāt api kauṣṭhyavāyoḥ balīyān bhavati iti katham tena apasāryeta anye eva sūkṣmāḥ vāyavaḥ na punar ete paridṛśyamānāḥ śyāmāka latā lāsya upadeśinaḥ mātariśvānaḥ iti ced na viśeṣe pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: yaṃ ca sūkṣmā api vāyavaḥ tirodadhati taṃ sutarāṃ balīyāṃso 'pi vivṛṇuyuriti yat kiñcid etat //
analyzed: yam ca sūkṣmāḥ api vāyavaḥ tirodadhati tam sutarām balīyāṃsaḥ api vivṛṇuyuḥ iti yat kiñcid etat

original: tasmāt sajātīyaśabdasantānārambhapakṣa eva yuktyanuguṇaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt sajātīya śabda santāna ārambha pakṣaḥ eva yukti anuguṇaḥ

original: tathāhi sajātīyaguṇārambhiṇaḥ guṇāsatāvad dṛśayanta eva rūpādayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi sajātīya guṇa ārambhiṇaḥ guṇa asatā vat dṛśayantaḥ eva rūpa ādayaḥ

original: amūrtā 'pi ca buddhiḥ buddhyantaram ārabhamāṇā dṛśyate /
analyzed: amūrtā pi ca buddhiḥ buddhi antaram ārabhamāṇā dṛśyate

original: deśāntare 'pi saiva kāryam ārabhate pathi gacchato devavattādeḥ ekasmādātmapradeśāt pradeśāntare buddhyutpādadarśanāt /
analyzed: deśa antare pi sā eva kāryam ārabhate pathi gacchataḥ devavat tā ādeḥ ekasmāt ātma pradeśāt pradeśa antare buddhi utpāda darśanāt

original: kāryārambhaviratir api bhavati adṛṣṭādhīnasaṃsaragāṇāṃ sahakārinām anavasthānāt //
analyzed: kārya ārambha viratiḥ api bhavati adṛṣṭa adhīna saṃsaragāṇām sahakārinām anavasthānāt

original: vīvreṇāpi śanair evaṃ atīvrārambhasambhavaḥ /
analyzed: śanais evam a tīvra ārambha sambhavaḥ

original: sīdatsacivasāmarthyasāpekṣakṣīṇavṛttinā //
analyzed: sīdat saciva sāmarthya sāpekṣa kṣīṇa vṛttinā

original: vīcīsantānadṛṣṭāntaḥ kiñcit sāmyād udāhṛtaḥ /
na tu vegādisāmarthyaṃ śabdānām asty apām iva //
analyzed: na tu vega ādi sāmarthyam śabdānām asti apām iva

original: ya tu kuḍyādivyavadhāne kim iti viramati śabdasantānārambha iti naiṣa doṣaḥ nirāvaraṇasya hi vyomnaḥ śabdāgmbhe samavāyikāraṇatvaṃ tathādarśanāt kalpyate nākāśamātrasyeti //
analyzed: ya tu kuḍya ādi vyavadhāne kim iti viramati śabda santāna ārambhaḥ iti na eṣa doṣaḥ nirāvaraṇasya hi vyomnaḥ samavāyi kāraṇa tvam tathā darśanāt kalpyate na ākāśa mātrasya iti

original: yad api guṇatvam asiddhaṃ śabdasyeti tatra kecit aśritatvāt guṇatvam ācakṣate tad ayuktam āśritatvaṃ guṇatve hi na prayojakam iṣyate /
analyzed: yat api guṇa tvam asiddham śabdasya iti tatra kecid aśrita tvāt guṇa tvam ācakṣate tat ayuktam āśrita tvam guṇa tve hi na prayojakam iṣyate

original: ṣaṇṇām api padārthānāṃ āśritatvasya saṃbhavāt //
analyzed: ṣaṇṇām api padārthānām āśrita tvasya saṃbhavāt

original: dikkālaparamāṇvādinityadravyātirekiṇaḥ /
analyzed: diś kāla paramāṇu ādi nitya dravya atirekiṇaḥ

original: āśritāḥ ṣaḍapīṣyante padārthāḥ kaṇabhojinā //
analyzed: āśritāḥ ṣaṭ api iṣyante padārthāḥ kaṇabhojinā

original: na ca vyomāśritatvam api śabdasya pratyakṣam apratyakṣe nabhasi tadāśritatvasyāpy apratyakṣatvāt //
analyzed: na ca vyoma āśrita tvam api śabdasya pratyakṣam apratyakṣe nabhasi tad āśrita tvasya api apratyakṣa tvāt

original: katham ādhārapārokṣye śabdapratyakṣateti cet /
analyzed: katham ādhāra pārokṣye śabda pratyakṣa tā iti ced

original: yathaivā ''tmaparokṣatve buddhyāder upalambhanam //
analyzed: yathā evā ātma parokṣa tve buddhi ādeḥ upalambhanam

original: etad evāsiddham iti cet alaṃ vādāntaragamaṇena /
analyzed: etat eva asiddham iti ced alam vāda antara gamaṇena

original: upariṣṭānnirṇeṣyamāṇatvāt //
analyzed: upariṣṭāt nirṇeṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: kim etarhi śabdasya guṇatve pramāṇam pariśeṣānumānam iti vrūmaḥ /
analyzed: kim etarhi śabdasya guṇa tve pramāṇam pariśeṣa anumānam iti vrūmaḥ

original: prasaktayoḥ dravyakarmaṇoḥ pratiṣedhe sāmānyādāv aprasaṅgāc ca guṇa evāvaśiṣyate śabdaḥ //
analyzed: prasaktayoḥ dravya karmaṇoḥ pratiṣedhe sāmānya ādau aprasaṅgāt ca guṇaḥ eva avaśiṣyate śabdaḥ

original: kathaṃ punaḥ na dravyaṃ śabdaḥ ekadravyatvāt /
analyzed: katham punar na dravyam śabdaḥ eka dravya tvāt
