original: adravyaṃ vā bhavati dravyaṃ ākāśaparamāṇvādi anekadravyaṃ vā hyaṇukādi kāryadravyam /
analyzed: adravyam vā bhavati dravyam ākāśa paramāṇu ādi aneka dravyam vā hi aṇuka ādi kārya dravyam

original: ekadravyaṃ tu śabdaḥ ekākāśāśritatvāt /
analyzed: eka dravyam tu śabdaḥ eka ākāśa āśrita tvāt

original: tasmān na dravyam //
analyzed: tasmāt na dravyam

original: nāpi śabdaḥ karma śabdāntarajanakatvāt /
analyzed: na api śabdaḥ karma śabda antara janaka tvāt

original: karmaṇo hi samānajātyārambhakatvaṃ nāsti //
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ hi samāna jāti ārambhaka tvam na asti

original: sattāśabdatvādisāmānyasambandhāc ca sāmānyāditrayaprasaṅgo 'sya nāsitīti pāriśeṣyāt guṇa eva śabdaḥ //
analyzed: sattā śabda tva ādi sāmānya sambandhāt ca sāmānya ādi traya prasaṅgaḥ pāriśeṣyāt guṇaḥ eva śabdaḥ

original: nanu guṇatvasiddhau satyāṃ ākāśāśritatvaṃ śabdasya bhaviṣyati guṇasya dravyānāśritasyādarśanāt pṛthivyādīnāṃ ca śabdāśrayatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: nanu guṇa tva siddhau satyām ākāśa āśrita tvam śabdasya bhaviṣyati guṇasya dravya anāśritasya adarśanāt pṛthivī ādīnām ca śabda āśraya tva anupapatteḥ

original: tataś ca guṇatve sati ekadravyatvaṃ ekadravyatve sati guṇatvam itītaretarāśrayatvam //
analyzed: tatas ca guṇa tve sati eka dravya tvam eka dravya tve sati guṇa tvam iti itaretarāśraya tvam

original: tathā ca samānajātīyārambhakatvam api guṇatvasiddhimūlam eva /
analyzed: tathā ca samāna jātīya ārambhaka tvam api guṇa tva siddhi mūlam eva

original: guṇatve sati śabdsasyākāśāśritatvāt tadātmakena śrotreṇa grahaṇam /
analyzed: guṇa tve sati śabda sasya ākāśa āśrita tvāt tad ātmakena śrotreṇa grahaṇam

original: tac ca deśāntaragatasaṃyogavibhāgaprabhvasya śabdasya santānam anatareṇa śrotradeśaprāptyabhāvāt na siddhyatīti guṇatvasiddhimūlā santānakalpanā santānakalpanāyāṃ ca samāmajātyārambhakatvāt karmavyavacchede sati guṇatvasiddhir itītaretarāśrayatvam eva //
analyzed: tat ca deśa antara gata saṃyoga vibhāga prabhvasya śabdasya santānam anatareṇa śrotra deśa prāpti abhāvāt na siddhyati iti guṇa tva siddhi mūlā santāna kalpanā santāna kalpanāyām ca samāma jāti ārambhaka tvāt karma vyavacchede sati guṇa tva siddhiḥ iti itaretara āśraya tvam eva

original: ucyate nobhayatrāpy eṣa doṣaḥ /
analyzed: ucyate na ubhayatra api eṣa doṣaḥ

original: śrotragrāhyatvād eva śabdasyākāśāśritatvaṃ kalpyate samānajātīyārambhakatvaṃ ca guṇatvāt /
analyzed: śrotra grāhya tvāt eva śabdasya ākāśa āśrita tvam kalpyate samāna jātīya ārambhaka tvam ca guṇa tvāt

original: ākāśaikadeśo hi śrotram iti prasādhitam etat /
analyzed: ākāśa eka deśaḥ hi śrotram iti prasādhitam etat

original: prāpyakāritvaṃ cendriyāṇāṃ vakṣyate /
analyzed: prāpya kāri tvam ca indriyāṇām vakṣyate

original: na cākāśānāśritatve śabdasya śrotreṇa prāptir bhavati na cāprāptasya grahaṇam iti tadāśritatvaṃ kalpyate //
analyzed: na ca ākāśa anāśrita tve śabdasya śrotreṇa prāptiḥ bhavati na ca aprāptasya grahaṇam iti tad āśrita tvam kalpyate

original: evaṃ samānajātīyārambhakatvam api tat eva śrāvaṇatvāt dūravartinaḥ śabdasya śravaṇe sai kalpyate na tu guṇatvād iti netaretarāśrayam //
analyzed: evam samāna jātīya ārambhaka tvam api tat eva śrāvaṇa tvāt dūra vartinaḥ śabdasya śravaṇe kalpyate na tu guṇa tvāt iti na itaretarāśrayam

original: kāryātvād ākāśāśritatvaṃ kalpyata ity eke //
analyzed: kāryā tvāt ākāśa āśrita tvam kalpyate iti eke

original: nanu kāryatvād ākāśāśritatvam ākāśāśritatve sati niyatagrahaṇapūrvaṃ pūrvarītyā kāryatvam iti naitad evam bhedavināśapratibhāsābhyām eva kāryatvasiddheḥ //
analyzed: nanu kārya tvāt ākāśa āśrita tvam ākāśa āśrita tve sati niyata grahaṇa pūrvam pūrva rītyā kārya tvam iti na etat evam bheda vināśa pratibhāsābhyām eva kārya tva siddheḥ

original: kim arthas tarhi niyatagrahaṇasamarthanāya ayam iyān prayāsaḥ kriyate niyatagrahaṇam pai kāryapakṣānuguṇam iti darśayitum na punar eṣaiva kāryatve yuktir ity alaṃ sūkṣmekṣikayā //
analyzed: kim arthaḥ tarhi niyata grahaṇa samarthanāya ayam iyān prayāsaḥ kriyate niyata grahaṇam pai kārya pakṣa anuguṇam iti darśayitum na punar eṣā eva kārya tve yuktiḥ iti alam sūkṣma īkṣikayā

original: apara āha parispandavilakṣaṇatvasya pratyakṣatvāt akarmatvaṃ śabdasya sādhayte na samānajātyārambhakatvāt itītaretarāśrayasparśo 'pi nāstīti /
analyzed: aparaḥ āha parispanda vilakṣaṇa tvasya pratyakṣa tvāt akarma tvam śabdasya sādhayte na samāna jāti ārambhaka tvāt iti itaretara āśraya sparśaḥ na asti iti

original: tasmāt sarvathā pariśeṣānumānāt śabdasya guṇatvasiddhiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvathā pariśeṣa anumānāt śabdasya guṇa tva siddhiḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhy asya mahattvādiyogaḥ nirguṇā guṇāḥ iti hi kāṇādāḥ /
analyzed: katham tarhi asya mahat tva ādi yogaḥ nirguṇāḥ guṇāḥ iti hi kāṇādāḥ

original: asti hi pratītiḥ mahān śabdaḥ iti samānajātīyaguṇābhiprāyaṃ tat kaṇādavacanam iti na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: asti hi pratītiḥ mahān śabdaḥ iti samāna jātīya guṇa abhiprāyam tat kaṇāda vacanam iti na doṣaḥ

original: tasmād ākāśaguṇaḥ śabdaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt ākāśa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ

original: api ca yathā ''tmaguṇatā hīcchādveṣāder upapatsyate /
analyzed: api ca yathā tma guṇa tā hi icchā dveṣa ādeḥ upapatsyate

original: śabdo nayena tenaiva bhaviṣyati nabhoguṇaḥ //
analyzed: śabdaḥ nayena tena eva bhaviṣyati nabhaḥ guṇaḥ

original: ye tu samānajātīyaśabdārambhakatvaniṣedhahetavaḥ śabdatvāt ityādayaḥ parair upanyastāḥ teṣām aprayojakatvāt na sādhanatvam //
analyzed: ye tu samāna jātīya śabda ārambhaka tva niṣedha hetavaḥ śabda tvāt ityādayaḥ paraiḥ upanyastāḥ teṣām aprayojaka tvāt na sādhana tvam

original: itthaṃ santānavṛttyā ca śabdagrahaṇasambhave /
analyzed: ittham santāna vṛttyā ca śabda grahaṇa sambhave

original: kalpanā 'lpatarā 'smākaṃ na śabdavyaktivādinām //
analyzed: kalpanā lpatarā smākam na śabda vyakti vādinām

original: śākyakāpilanirgranthagrathitaprakriyāṃ prati /
analyzed: śākya kāpila nirgrantha grathita prakriyām prati

original: yat tu dūṣaṇam ākhyātaṃ ātmākaṃ priyam eva tat //
analyzed: yat tu dūṣaṇam ākhyātam ātmākam priyam eva tat

original: tasmāt kāryapakṣe niyatagrahaṇopapatteḥ abhivyaktipakṣe ca tadabhāvāt kārya eva śabda iti sthitam //
analyzed: tasmāt kārya pakṣe niyata grahaṇa upapatteḥ abhivyakti pakṣe ca tad abhāvāt kāryaḥ eva śabdaḥ iti sthitam

original: tad idam uktaṃ sūgrakṛtā ādimattvādaindriyakatvāt kṛtakavad upacārāc cānityaḥ śabdaḥ 2.2.13 iti //
analyzed: tat idam uktam sūgrakṛtā ādimat tvāt aindriyaka tvāt kṛtaka vat upacārāt ca anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: ādimatvāditi saṃyogavibhāgādīnāṃ śabde kārakatvaṃ na vyañjakatvam iti darśitam /
analyzed: ādima tvāt iti saṃyoga vibhāga ādīnām śabde kāraka tvam na vyañjaka tvam iti darśitam

original: ataś ca na prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ anaikāntikam //
analyzed: atas ca na prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam anaikāntikam

original: aindriyakatvād iti kāryapakṣa eva śabdasya niyataṃ grahaṇam ity uktam /
analyzed: aindriyaka tvāt iti kārya pakṣe eva śabdasya niyatam grahaṇam iti uktam

original: pratipuruṣaṃ pratyuccāranaṃ ca śabdabhedasyaindriyakatvād iti vā hetvarthaḥ /
analyzed: pratipuruṣam pratyuccāranam ca śabda bhedasya aindriyaka tvāt iti vā hetvarthaḥ

original: tena prtyabhijñādurāśā śrotriyāṇām apākṛtā bhavati //
analyzed: tena prtyabhijñā durāśā śrotriyāṇām apākṛtā bhavati

original: kṛtakavad upacārād iti tīvramandavibhāgābhibhavādivyavahārādarśanāt sukhaduḥkhādivad anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti darśitam //
analyzed: kṛtaka vat upacārāt iti tīvra manda vibhāga abhibhava ādi vyavahāra adarśanāt sukha duḥkha ādi vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti darśitam

original: tathā prāgūrdhvam uccāraṇād anupalabdheḥ āvaraṇānupalabdheś ca 2.2.18 ity anena sūtreṇa śabdābhāvakṛtam eva tadagrahaṇam ity uktam /
analyzed: tathā prāk ūrdhvam uccāraṇāt anupalabdheḥ āvaraṇa anupalabdheḥ ca iti anena sūtreṇa śabda abhāva kṛtam eva tat agrahaṇam iti uktam

original: na hi stimitā vāyavaḥ śabdamāvarītum arhanti /
analyzed: na hi stimitāḥ vāyavaḥ śabdam āvarītum arhanti

original: mūrtaṃ hi mūrtena vyavadhīyate nāmūrtaṃ ākāśādivat /
analyzed: mūrtam hi mūrtena vyavadhīyate na amūrtam ākāśa ādi vat

original: na ca prakṛtyaivākāśādivad atīndriyaḥ śabdaḥ /
analyzed: na ca prakṛtyā eva ākāśa ādi vat atīndriyaḥ śabdaḥ

original: tasmāt kṣaṇikapratītes tatkālam eva śabdasyāvasthānam iti asthānahetor api nānyathāsiddhatvam //
analyzed: tasmāt kṣaṇika pratīteḥ tad kālam eva śabdasya avasthānam iti asthāna hetoḥ api nā anyathā asiddha tvam

original: vārtikakṛtā śabdānityatve sādhanam abhihitaṃ anityaḥ śabdaḥ jātimattve satyasmadādibāhyakaraṇapratyakṣatvāt ghaṭavat iti //
analyzed: vārtika kṛtā śabda anitya tve sādhanam abhihitam anityaḥ śabdaḥ jātimat tve sati asmat ādi bāhya karaṇa pratyakṣa tvāt ghaṭa vat iti

original: yat tu atra jātīnām api jātimattvad anaikāntikatvam udbhāvitam ekārthasamavāyena jātirjātimatī yataḥ iti tat atyantam anupapannam nismāmānyāni sāmānyādīnīti suprasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: yat tu atra jātīnām api jātimat tvat anaikāntika tvam udbhāvitam ekārtha samavāyena jātiḥ jātimatī yatas iti tat atyantam anupapannam sāmānya ādīni iti su prasiddha tvāt

original: na hi ghaṭe ghaṭatvapārthivatve staḥ iti ghaṭatvasāmānye 'pi pārthivatvasāmānyam astīti śakyate vaktum ato niravadya evāyaṃ hetuḥ //
analyzed: na hi ghaṭe ghaṭa tva pārthiva tve staḥ iti ghaṭa tva sāmānye pi pārthiva tva sāmānyam asti iti śakyate vaktum atas niravadyaḥ eva ayam hetuḥ

original: tena yad ucyate jātimattvaindriyatvādi vastusanmātrabandhanam /
analyzed: tena yat ucyate jātimat tva aindriya tva ādi vastu sanmātra bandhanam

original: śabdānityatvasidhyarthaṃ ko vadet yo na tārkikaḥ //
analyzed: śabda anitya tva sidhi artham kaḥ vadet yaḥ na tārkikaḥ

original: iti tad aviditātārikikaparispandasya vyāhṛtam //
analyzed: iti tat avidita a tārikika parispandasya vyāhṛtam

original: iha tv aprayojaka hetavo bhavanti hyastanoccāritas tasmāt gośabdo 'dyāpi vartate /
analyzed: iha tu hetavaḥ bhavanti hyastana uccāritaḥ tasmāt go śabdaḥ vartate

original: gośabdajñānagamyatvāt yathokto 'dyaṣa gaur iti //
analyzed: go śabda jñāna gamya tvāt yathā uktaḥ gauḥ iti

original: vijñānagrāhyatā nāma vastusvābhāvyabandhanā /
analyzed: vijñāna grāhya tā nāma vastu svābhāvya bandhanā

original: nityatve kṛtakatve vā na khalveṣā prayojikā //
analyzed: nitya tve kṛtaka tve vā na khalu eṣā prayojikā

original: aprayojakatā caivaprāyāṇāṃ caivam ucyate /
analyzed: aprayojaka tā ca evaprāyāṇām ca evam ucyate

original: svayaṃ caite prayujyante hetutveneti kiṃ tv idam //
analyzed: svayam ca ete prayujyante hetu tvena iti kim tu idam

original: evaṃ nityatve durlo yuktimārgaḥ tasmān mantavyaḥ kārya eveti śabdaḥ /
analyzed: evam nitya tve durlaḥ yukti mārgaḥ tasmāt mantavyaḥ kāryaḥ eva iti śabdaḥ

original: vācoyuktitve vaidiko yo 'nuvādaḥ nyāye pratyukte kiṃphalastatprayogaḥ //
analyzed: vācoyukti tve vaidikaḥ yaḥ nuvādaḥ nyāye pratyukte kiṃphalaḥ tad prayogaḥ

original: kṣaṇabhaṅgibhāvasyābhāvād api śabdasya kṣaṇikatāṃ na vaktum alam /
analyzed: kṣaṇabhaṅgi bhāvasya abhāvāt api śabdasya kṣaṇikatām na vaktum alam

original: sthūlavināśabhāvād iti yad uktaṃ tad apy anṛtam sūkṣmavināśāpekṣī nāśaḥ sthūlasthirasya kumbhādeḥ /
analyzed: sthūla vināśa bhāvāt iti yat uktam tat api anṛtam sūkṣma vināśa apekṣī nāśaḥ sthūla sthirasya kumbha ādeḥ

original: prakṛtitaralasya nāśaḥ śabdasya sa eva hi sthūlaḥ //
analyzed: prakṛti taralasya nāśaḥ śabdasya saḥ eva hi sthūlaḥ

original: sattvadyadi kṣaṇikatāṃ kathayet purā va śabdas tadaiṣa katham akṣaniko 'bhidheyaḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇika tām kathayet purā vaḥ śabdaḥ tadā eṣa katham a kṣanikaḥ bhidheyaḥ

original: yuktyantarādyadi tad eva hi tarhi cintyam kiṃ prauḍhivādabahumānapraigraheṇa //
analyzed: yukti antarāt yadi tat eva hi tarhi cintyam kim prauḍhi vāda bahu māna praigraheṇa

original: alam ativitatoktyā tyajyatāṃ nityavādaḥ kṛtaka iti nyajñiaḥ gṛhyatām eṣa śabdaḥ /
analyzed: alam ati vitata uktyā tyajyatām nitya vādaḥ kṛtakaḥ iti nyajñiḥ gṛhyatām eṣa śabdaḥ

original: sati ca kṛtakabhāve tasya kartā purāṇaḥ kaviraviralaśaktiḥ yukta evendumauliḥ //
analyzed: sati ca kṛtaka bhāve tasya kartā purāṇaḥ kaviḥ avirala śaktiḥ yuktaḥ evā indumauliḥ

original: iti śrījayantabhaṭṭakṛtau nyāyamañjaryāṃ tṛtīyam āhnikam caturtham āhnikam śabdaparīkṣā evaṃ kṛtakatve varṇānāṃ sādhite sati varṇātmanaḥ varṇātmanaḥ padāt prabhṛti sarvatra puruṣasya svātantryaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: iti śrī jayantabhaṭṭa kṛtau nyāyamañjaryām tṛtīyam āhnikam caturtham āhnikam śabda parīkṣā evam kṛtaka tve varṇānām sādhite sati varṇa ātmanaḥ varṇa ātmanaḥ padāt prabhṛti sarvatra puruṣasya svātantryam siddham bhavati

original: padanityatvapakṣe 'pi vākye tadracanātmake /
analyzed: pada nitya tva pakṣe vākye tad racanā ātmake

original: kartṛtvasaṃbhavāt puṃsaḥ vedaḥ katham akṛtrimaḥ //
analyzed: kartṛ tva saṃbhavāt puṃsaḥ vedaḥ katham akṛtrimaḥ

original: tathā ca vaidikyo racanāḥ kartṛpūrvikāḥ racanātvāt laukikaracanāvat /
analyzed: tathā ca vaidikyaḥ racanāḥ kartṛ pūrvikāḥ racanā tvāt laukika racanā vat

original: eṣa ca pañcalakṣaṇo hetuḥ prayojakaś ceti gamaka eva na hetvābhāsaḥ //
analyzed: eṣa ca pañca lakṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ prayojakaḥ ca iti gamakaḥ eva na hetvābhāsaḥ

original: na tāvad ayam asiddho hetuḥ śanno devīr abhiṣṭaye ityādiṣu vedavākyasandabheṣu padaracanāyā svarakramādiviśeṣavatyāḥ pratyakṣatvena pakṣe hetoḥ vartamānatvāt //
analyzed: na tāvat ayam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ śat naḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye ityādiṣu veda vākya sandabheṣu pada racanāyā svara krama ādi viśeṣavatyāḥ pratyakṣa tvena pakṣe hetoḥ vartamāna tvāt

original: nāpi viruddhaḥ kartṛpūrvakatvavati sapakṣe kumārasambhavādau racanātvasya vidyamānatvāt //
analyzed: nā api viruddhaḥ kartṛ pūrvakatvavati sapakṣe kumārasambhava ādau racanā tvasya vidyamāna tvāt

original: nāpy anaikāntikaḥ kartṛhiteṣu gaganādiṣu gaganakusumādiṣu vā racanāyā adṛṣṭatvāt //
analyzed: na api anaikāntikaḥ kartṛ hiteṣu gagana ādiṣu gagana kusuma ādiṣu vā racanāyāḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt

original: nāpi kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣeṇa āgamena vā vede vaktrabhāvaniścayānutpādāt //
analyzed: na api kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣeṇa āgamena vā vede vaktra bhāva niścaya anutpādāt

original: nāpi satpratipakṣaḥ prakaraṇacintāhetoḥ sthāṇupuruṣaviśeṣānupalabdher iva hetutvenānabhidhānāt //
analyzed: nā api sat pratipakṣaḥ prakaraṇa cintā hetoḥ sthāṇu puruṣa viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ iva hetu tvena anabhidhānāt

original: nāpi paramāṇvanityatāyām iva mūrtatvaṃ aprayojakam idaṃ sādhanam racanāvyāpārāṇāṃ kartṛvyāpārasādhyatvāvadhāraṇāt /
analyzed: nā api paramāṇu anitya tāyām iva mūrta tvam aprayojakam idam sādhanam racanā vyāpārāṇām kartṛ vyāpāra sādhya tva avadhāraṇāt

original: yathādhūmasya jvalanādhīna ātmalābhaḥ jñaptis tudhūmād agneḥ tatha kartradhīnā racanānām abhinirvṛttiḥ pratītis tu tābhyaḥ kartur iti /
analyzed: yathā dhūmasya jvalana adhīnaḥ ātma lābhaḥ jñaptiḥ tu dhūmāt agneḥ kartṛ adhīnā racanānām abhinirvṛttiḥ pratītiḥ tu tābhyaḥ kartuḥ iti

original: tasmāt prayojaka evāyaṃ hetuḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt prayojakaḥ eva ayam hetuḥ

original: nanu satpratipakṣatve vivadante /
analyzed: nanu sat pratipakṣa tve vivadante

original: tathā ca mīmāṃsakaiḥ pratihetur iha gīyate vedasyādhyayanaṃ sarvaṃ gurvadhyayanapūrvakam /
analyzed: tathā ca mīmāṃsakaiḥ pratihetuḥ iha gīyate vedasya adhyayanam sarvam guru adhyayana pūrvakam

original: vedādhyayanavācyatvāt adhunā 'dhyayanaṃ yathā iti naitad yuktam evaṃ prāyāṇām prayogāṇām aprayogāṇām aprayojakatvāt /
analyzed: veda adhyayana vācya tvāt adhunā dhyayanam yathā iti na etat yuktam evam prāyāṇām prayogāṇām aprayogāṇām aprayojaka tvāt

original: na hi tacchabdavācyatvakṛtaṃ anāditvam upapadyate //
analyzed: na hi tad śabda vācya tva kṛtam anādi tvam upapadyate

original: āha kim iti sadasadvivekavikalaśākaṭikādipravādavipralabdhaḥ evaṃ bhrāmyasi kila svalpam api karma mātrā vopadiśyamānaṃ tadvacanapratyayād anuṣṭhīyate /
analyzed: āha kim iti sat asat viveka vikala śākaṭika ādi pravāda vipralabdhaḥ evam bhrāmyasi kila su alpam api karma mātrā vā upadiśyamānam tad vacana pratyayāt anuṣṭhīyate

original: tad ayam iyān anekakleśavittavyayādi nirvartyo vaidkaḥ karmakalāpaḥ evam eva tadupadeśinam āptaṃ saṃsmṛtvaiva kriyate iti mahān pramādaḥ //
analyzed: tat ayam iyān aneka kleśa vitta vyaya ādi nirvartyaḥ vaidkaḥ karma kalāpaḥ evam eva tad upadeśinam āptam saṃsmṛtvā eva kriyate iti mahān pramādaḥ

original: evañ ca sati uccāvacakaviracitajaratpustakalikhitakāvyavat asmaryamāṇakartṛkeṇa vedena vyavahārānupapatteḥ avaśyasmaraṇīyaḥ tatra kartā syāt /
analyzed: evam ca sati uccāvacaka viracita jarat pustaka likhita kāvya vat asmaryamāṇa kartṛkeṇa vedena vyavahāra anupapatteḥ avaśya smaraṇīyaḥ tatra kartā syāt

original: na ca kadācana deveṣu vyavahāravicchedaḥ saṃbhāvyate yena tatkṛtaṃ jaratkūpārāmādiṣv iva teṣu kartrasmaraṇaṃ syāt /
analyzed: na ca kadācana deveṣu vyavahāra vicchedaḥ saṃbhāvyate yena tat kṛtam jarat kūpa ārāma ādiṣu iva teṣu kartṛ asmaraṇam syāt

original: tasmād avaśyaṃ smaryeta kartā /
analyzed: tasmāt avaśyam smaryeta kartā

original: na ca saṃsmaryate samartuṃ śakyate vā smṛtir hi bhavantī tad anubhavamūlā bhavati /
analyzed: na ca saṃsmaryate samartum śakyate vā smṛtiḥ hi bhavantī tat anubhava mūlā bhavati

original: na ca mūle 'pi kartranubhavaḥ kasyacij jātaḥ sargāder abhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca mūle pi kartṛ anubhavaḥ kasyacid jātaḥ sarga ādeḥ abhāvāt

original: bhāve vā kartur aśaīratvena darśanayogyatvābhāvāt //
analyzed: bhāve vā kartuḥ a śaīra tvena darśana yogya tva abhāvāt

original: saśarīratvapakṣe vā puruṣaḥ ko 'pi tādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: sa śarīra tva pakṣe vā puruṣaḥ kaḥ pi tādṛśaḥ

original: tadānīṃ dṛśyamāno 'pi vedaṃ kurvan na dṛśyate //
analyzed: tadānīm dṛśyamānaḥ u pi vedam kurvan na dṛśyate

original: adhīyamāne dṛṣṭe 'smin tadā saṃśerate janāḥ /
analyzed: adhīyamāne dṛṣṭe smin tadā saṃśerate janāḥ

original: kim eṣa racayed vedaṃ uta vā 'nyakṛtaṃ paṭhet //
analyzed: kim eṣa racayet vedam uta vā nya kṛtam paṭhet

original: yatkṛtaṃ vā paṭhed eṣaḥ tasminn api hi saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: yad kṛtam vā paṭhet eṣaḥ tasmin api hi saṃśayaḥ

original: bhaṅgyā cedamānāditvaṃ unmīlad iva dṛśyate //
analyzed: bhaṅgyā ca idam ānādi tvam unmīlat iva dṛśyate

original: asatyādipramāṇe ca kartṛtā 'nubhavaṃ prati /
analyzed: asatya ādi pramāṇe ca kartṛ tā anubhavam prati

original: smṛtiḥ prabandhasiddhā 'pi spṛśatyandhapramparām //
analyzed: smṛtiḥ prabandha siddhā pi spṛśati andha pramparām

original: yogibhir grahaṇaṃ kartuḥ ity etad api durvacam /
analyzed: yogibhiḥ grahaṇam kartuḥ iti etat api durvacam

original: kartṛtā hṛdi durbādhā kathaṃ gṛhyeta tair api //
analyzed: kartṛ tā hṛdi durbādhā katham gṛhyeta taiḥ api

original: yogibhis sā gṛhīteti vayam etan na manmahe /
analyzed: yogibhiḥ sā gṛhītā iti vayam etat na manmahe

original: amanvānāś ca gacchema visrabdhāstatpathaṃ katham //
analyzed: a manvānāḥ ca gacchema visrabdhāḥ tad patham katham

original: vedāt kartravabodhe tu spaṣṭam anyonyasaṃśrayam /
analyzed: vedāt kartṛ avabodhe tu spaṣṭam anyonya saṃśrayam

original: tato vedapramāṇatvaṃ vedāt kartuś ca niścayaḥ //
analyzed: tatas veda pramāṇa tvam vedāt kartuḥ ca niścayaḥ

original: tasmāt paurvāparyaparyālocanārahitayathāśrutamantrārthavādamūlā bhrāntir eṣā //
analyzed: tasmāt paurvāparya paryālocanā rahita yathāśruta mantra arthavāda mūlā bhrāntiḥ eṣā

original: na punaḥ paramārthataḥ kaścit kiñcit vedasya kartāraṃ smarati /
analyzed: na punar paramārthataḥ kaścid kiñcid vedasya kartāram smarati

original: tasmāt akṛtakā vedāḥ avaśyasmaraṇīyasyāpi kartuḥ asmaraṇāt /
analyzed: tasmāt akṛtakāḥ vedāḥ avaśya smaraṇīyasya api kartuḥ asmaraṇāt

original: na ca vyadhikaraṇo hetuḥ asmaryamāṇakartṛkatvād ity evaṃ sādhanaprayogāt //
analyzed: na ca vyadhikaraṇaḥ hetuḥ asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvāt iti evam sādhana prayogāt

original: atrocyate api tat gurvadhyayanapūrvakatvaṃ sādhanam upekṣitaṃ yājñikaiḥ ayam abhinavo hetuḥ asmaryamāṇakartṛkatvāt iti prayuktaḥ atsmād astu nāma nainān hetvantaropanyāsinaḥ nigṛhnīmaḥ /
analyzed: atrā ucyate api tat guru adhyayana pūrvakatvam sādhanam upekṣitam yājñikaiḥ ayam abhinavaḥ hetuḥ asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvāt iti prayuktaḥ atsmāt astu nāma na enān hetu antara upanyāsinaḥ nigṛhnīmaḥ

original: akṣudakatheyaṃ prastutā //
analyzed: akṣudh kathā iyam prastutā

original: ayam api asmaryamāṇakartṛkatvād iti hetuḥ kiṃ svatantra evākartṛkatvasiddhaye prayujyate uta asmaduparacitaracanātvapratighātāya iti //
analyzed: ayam api asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvāt iti hetuḥ kim svatantraḥ eva akartṛka tva siddhaye prayujyate uta asmat uparacita racanā tva pratighātāya iti

original: tatra na tāvad anumānaṃ anumānāntaraparipanthi kathayitum ucitam pratyakṣāgamavat anumānasyāpy anumānabādhakatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: tatra na tāvat anumānam anumāna antara paripanthi kathayitum ucitam pratyakṣa āgama vat anumānasya api anumāna bādhaka tva anupapatteḥ

original: na hi tulyabalayoḥ anumānayoḥ bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ tulyavalatvād eva /
analyzed: na hi tulya balayoḥ anumānayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ tulya vala tvāt eva

original: atulyabalatve tu yatkṛtaṃ anyatarasya daubalyaṃ tata eva tadaprāmāṇyasiddheḥ kim anumānabādhayā tadviḍambanārthaṃ tadabhidhānam iti cet tad apy ayuktam /
analyzed: atulya bala tve tu yat kṛtam anyatarasya daubalyam tatas eva tad aprāmāṇya siddheḥ kim anumāna bādhayā tad viḍambana artham tad abhidhānam iti ced tat api ayuktam

original: ekatra dharmiṇi yugapaditaretaravirodhidharmadvayaprayojakahetudvayopanipātāyogāt /
analyzed: ekatra dharmiṇi yugapad itaretara virodhi dharma dvaya prayojaka hetu dvaya upanipāta ayogāt

original: na hi dvyātmakāni vastūni bhavtum arhanti ity avaśyam anyataraḥ tatrāprayojakahetuḥ /
analyzed: na hi dvi ātmakāni vastūni bhavtum arhanti iti avaśyam anyataraḥ tatra aprayojaka hetuḥ

original: aprayojakatvād eva tasyāgamakatve kiṃ viḍambanārthena hetvantareṇa prayuktena /
analyzed: aprayojaka tvāt eva tasya āgamaka tve kim viḍambana arthena hetu antareṇa prayuktena

original: viruddhāvyabhicāry api nāma na kaścid dhetvābhāsa iti vaksyāmaḥ //
analyzed: viruddha avyabhicāri api nāma na kaścid hetvābhāsaḥ iti vaksyāmaḥ

original: prakaraṇasapto 'pi na yaḥ kaścit satpratipakṣo hetur iṣyate api tu saṃśayabījabhūtaḥ anyataraviśeṣānupalambhaḥ bhrāntyā hetutvena prayujyamānaḥ tathocyata iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: na yaḥ kaścid sat pratipakṣaḥ hetuḥ iṣyate api tu saṃśaya bīja bhūtaḥ anyatara viśeṣa anupalambhaḥ bhrāntyā hetu tvena prayujyamānaḥ tathā ucyate iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ

original: tasmāt parodīr itaṃ hetuṃ nirācikīrṣatā vādinā tadgatapakṣavṛtitādidharmaparīkṣaṇe manaḥ khedanīyam /
analyzed: tasmāt parodīḥ itam hetum nirācikīrṣatā vādinā tadgata pakṣa vṛti tā ādi dharma parīkṣaṇe manaḥ khedanīyam

original: na hi pratihetvanveṣiṇā vṛthā 'ṭāṭyā kartavyā //
analyzed: na hi pratihetu anveṣiṇā vṛthā ṭāṭyā kartavyā

original: nanu kataradanayoḥ sādhanayor aprayojakaṃ racanātvāt asmaryamāṇakartṛkatvād iti ca ucyate racanātvam eva prayojakam /
analyzed: nanu katarat anayoḥ sādhanayoḥ aprayojakam racanā tvāt asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvāt iti ca ucyate racanā tvam eva prayojakam

original: na hi puruṣam antareṇa kvacid akṣaravināsa iṣṭavya //
analyzed: na hi puruṣam antareṇa kvacid akṣara vināsaḥ

original: bho bhagavantaḥ sambhyāḥ kvedaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kva vā śrutaṃ loke /
analyzed: bho bhagavantaḥ sambhyāḥ kva idam dṛṣṭam kva vā śrutam loke

original: yadvākyeṣu padānāṃ racanā naisargikī bhavati //
analyzed: yat vākyeṣu padānām racanā naisargikī bhavati

original: yadi svabhāvikī vede padānāṃ racanā bhavet /
analyzed: yadi svabhāvikī vede padānām racanā bhavet

original: paṭe hi hanta tantūnāṃ kathaṃ naisargikī na sā //
analyzed: paṭe hi hanta tantūnām katham naisargikī na sā

original: śanno devīr abhiṣṭaye nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya asty uttarasyāṃ diśi devatātmā iti tulye racanātve kvacit kartṛpūrvakatvaṃ aparatra tadviparyaya iti mahān vyāmohaḥ /
analyzed: śat naḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya asti uttarasyām diśi devatā ātmā iti tulye racanā tve kvacid kartṛ pūrvakatvam aparatra tad viparyayaḥ iti mahān vyāmohaḥ

original: evaṃ hi dhūmo 'pi kaścit anagnika ity api syāt //
analyzed: evam hi kaścid anagnikaḥ iti api syāt

original: kim idānīṃ kumārasaṃbhvatulyo 'sau vedaḥ saṃpannaḥ aho sarvāstikadhuryeṇa vedapramāṇyaṃ sādhitaṃ naiyāyikena alam upahāsena racanāmātram eva tulyaṃ vedasya kumārasaṃbhavena nānyāt /
analyzed: kim idānīm kumārasaṃbhu atulyaḥ sau vedaḥ saṃpannaḥ aho sarva āstika dhuryeṇa veda pramāṇyam sādhitam naiyāyikena alam upahāsena racanā mātram eva tulyam vedasya kumārasaṃbhavena

original: na ceyatopahasituṃ yuktam /
analyzed: na ca iyatā upahasitum yuktam

original: kim asya śabdatvasāmānyaṃ śaṅkhaśabdasādhāraṇaṃ nāsti sattāsāmānyaṃ vā sarvasādhāraṇam iti //
analyzed: kim asya śabda tva sāmānyam śaṅkha śabda sādhāraṇam na asti sattā sāmānyam vā sarva sādhāraṇam iti

original: nanu yāḥ kālidāsādiracanāḥ kartṛpūrvikāḥ /
analyzed: nanu yāḥ kālidāsa ādi racanāḥ kartṛ pūrvikāḥ

original: tebhyo vilakṣaṇaiveyaṃ racanā bhāti vaidkī //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ vilakṣaṇā evā iyam racanā bhāti vaidkī

original: ihādhyayanavelāyāṃ rūpād eva pratīyate /
analyzed: iha adhyayana velāyām rūpāt eva pratīyate

original: akṛtrimatvaṃ vedasya bhedais tais tair ananyagaiḥ //
analyzed: akṛtrima tvam vedasya bhedaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ ananyagaiḥ

original: nāmākhyātoopasargādiprayogagatayo navāḥ /
analyzed: nāma ākhyāta oḥ upasarga ādi prayoga gatayaḥ navāḥ

original: stutinindāpurākalpaparakṛtyādigītayaḥ //
analyzed: stuti nindā purākalpa para kṛtyā ādi gītayaḥ

original: śākhāntaroktasāpekṣavikṣiptārthopavarṇanā /
analyzed: śākhā antara ukta sāpekṣa vikṣipta artha upavarṇanā

original: ityādayo na dṛśyante laukike sannibandhane //
analyzed: ityādayaḥ na dṛśyante laukike sannibandhane

original: tenādhyetṛgaṇāḥ sarve rūpāt vedam akṛtṛmam /
analyzed: tena adhyetṛ gaṇāḥ sarve rūpāt vedam akṛtṛmam

original: manyanta eva loke tu pītaṃ mīmāṃsakair yaśaḥ //
analyzed: manyante eva loke tu pītam mīmāṃsakaiḥ yaśaḥ

original: vedā na paṭhitā yais tu tv ādṛśaiḥ kuṇṭhabuddhiḥ /
analyzed: vedāḥ na paṭhitāḥ yaiḥ tu tu ādṛśaiḥ kuṇṭha buddhiḥ

original: kāryatvaṃ bruvate te 'sya racanāsāmyamohitāḥ //
analyzed: kārya tvam bruvate te racanā sāmya mohitāḥ

original: ucyate mīmāṃsakāḥ yaśaḥ pibantu payo va pibantu buddhijāḍyāpanayanāya brāhmīghṛtaṃ vā pibantu vedas tu puruṣapraṇīta eva nātra bhrāntiḥ //
analyzed: ucyate mīmāṃsakāḥ yaśaḥ pibantu payaḥ pibantu buddhi jāḍya apanayanāya brāhmī ghṛtam vā pibantu vedaḥ tu puruṣa praṇītaḥ eva na atra bhrāntiḥ

original: yathā ghaṭādisaṃsthānāt bhinnam apy acalādiṣu /
analyzed: yathā ghaṭa ādi saṃsthānāt bhinnam api acala ādiṣu

original: saṃsthānaṃ kartṛmat siddhaṃ vede 'pi racanā tathā //
analyzed: saṃsthānam kartṛmat siddham vede racanā tathā

original: yac cātra kiñcid vaktavyaṃ tat pūrvam eva savistaramuktam //
analyzed: yat ca atra kiñcid vaktavyam tat pūrvam eva sa vistaram uktam

original: api ca yadvilakṣaṇeyaṃ racanā tadvilakṣaṇa eva kartā 'numīyatām na punas tadapalāpo yuktam //
analyzed: api ca yad vilakṣaṇā iyam racanā tad vilakṣaṇaḥ eva kartā numīyatām na punar tad apalāpaḥ yuktam

original: yāścaitāḥ nirvivādasiddhakartṛkāḥ kālidāsādiracanāḥ camatkāriṇyaḥ tāsāmanyonyavisadṛśaṃ rūpam upalabhyata eva //
analyzed: yāḥ ca etāḥ nirvivāda siddha kartṛkāḥ kālidāsa ādi racanāḥ camatkāriṇyaḥ tāsām anyonya visadṛśam rūpam upalabhyate eva

original: amṛteneva saṃsiktāḥ candaneneva carcitāḥ /
analyzed: amṛtena iva saṃsiktāḥ candanena iva carcitāḥ

original: candrāṃśubhir avonmṛṣṭāḥ kālidāsasya sūktayaḥ //
analyzed: candra aṃśubhiḥ ava unmṛṣṭāḥ kālidāsasya su uktayaḥ

original: prakaṭarasānuguṇavikaṭākṣararacanācamatkāritasakalakavikulāḥ vāṇasya vācaḥ /
analyzed: prakaṭa rasa anuguṇa vikaṭa akṣara racanā camatkārita sakala kavi kulāḥ vāṇasya vācaḥ

original: pratikāvyaṃ ca tāni tāni vaicitryāṇi dṛśyanta eva /
analyzed: pratikāvyam ca tāni tāni vaicitryāṇi dṛśyante eva

original: nāmākhyātādivaicitryamātreṇa kartrabhāvo vede rūpād eva pratīyata iti nūtaneyaṃ vācoyuktiḥ //
analyzed: nāma ākhyāta ādi vaicitrya mātreṇa kartṛ abhāvaḥ vede rūpāt eva pratīyate iti nūtanā iyam vācoyuktiḥ

original: api ca yadi rūpe samāśvasiti bhavato manaḥ tadā ādimadarthābhidhānam api vedasya rūpaṃ kathaṃ na parīkṣase babaraḥ prāvāhaṇirakāmayata kusurabinda auddālakirakāmayata purūravo mā prapataḥ iti //
analyzed: api ca yadi rūpe samāśvasiti bhavataḥ manaḥ tadā ādimat artha abhidhānam api vedasya rūpam katham na parīkṣase babaraḥ prāvāhaṇiḥ akāmayata kusurabinda auddālakiḥ akāmayata purūravaḥ mā prapataḥ iti

original: pratisargaṃ punas teṣāṃ bhāvān anāditvam iti cet pratisargaṃ tarhi vedānyatvam api bhviṣyati /
analyzed: pratisargam punar teṣām bhāvān anādi tvam iti ced pratisargam tarhi veda anya tvam api bhviṣyati

original: yathoktam pratimanvantaraṃ caiṣā śrutir anyā 'bhidhīyate iti /
analyzed: yathā uktam pratimanvantaram ca eṣā śrutiḥ anyā abhidhīyate iti

original: rūpād akṛtrimattve ca kalpanā kalpitaiva sā /
analyzed: rūpāt akṛtrima tve ca kalpanā kalpitā eva sā

original: ādimadvastubuddhis tu vācakair akṣaraiḥ sphuṭaiḥ //
analyzed: ādimat vastu buddhiḥ tu vācakaiḥ akṣaraiḥ sphuṭaiḥ

original: teṣāṃ anyathāvyākhyānaṃ tu vyākhyānam eva /
analyzed: teṣām anyathā vyākhyānam tu vyākhyānam eva

original: paṭhanta eva tv adhyetāraḥ tata ādimato 'rthān bahūn avagacchantīti nānādirvedaḥ /
analyzed: paṭhantaḥ eva tu adhyetāraḥ tatas ādimataḥ rthān bahūn avagacchanti iti nānā ādiḥ vedaḥ

original: tasmān na racanātavm aprayojakam //
analyzed: tasmāt na racanātavm aprayojakam

original: kartrasmaraṇam eva tvaprayojakam asiddhatvāt /
analyzed: kartṛ asmaraṇam eva tu aprayojakam asiddha tvāt

original: siddham api vā vede kartrasmaraṇam anyathāsiddham /
analyzed: siddham api vā vede kartṛ asmaraṇam anyathā a siddham

original: vedakaraṇakālasya atidavīyastvāt tatpraṇetuś ca puṃsaḥ sakalapuruṣavilakṣaṇatvāt niyataśarīraparigrahābhāvāt idantayā 'sya pāṇinipiṅgalādivat smaraṇaṃ nāsti na tu sa nāsty eva /
analyzed: veda karaṇa kālasya ati davīyaḥ tvāt tad praṇetuḥ ca puṃsaḥ sakala puruṣa vilakṣaṇa tvāt niyata śarīra parigraha abhāvāt idantayā sya pāṇini piṅgala ādi vat smaraṇam nā asti na tu sa nā asti eva

original: anumānāgamābhyāṃ tadavagamāt kathaṃ pakṣadharmatayā grahītuṃ śakyate kartrasmaraṇam taddhyekapuruṣasambandhi vyabhicarati /
analyzed: anumāna āgamābhyām tad avagamāt katham pakṣa dharma tayā grahītum śakyate kartṛ asmaraṇam tat hi eka puruṣa sambandhi vyabhicarati

original: sarvapuruṣasambandhi tu duravagamam /
analyzed: sarva puruṣa sambandhi tu duravagamam

original: sarve pumāṃsaḥ kartāraṃ vedasya na smarantīti kathaṃ jānāti bhavan na hi tava sakalalokahṛdayāni pratyakṣāṇi sarvajñatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: sarve pumāṃsaḥ kartāram vedasya na smaranti iti katham jānāti bhavat na hi tava sakala loka hṛdayāni pratyakṣāṇi sarvajña tva prasaṅgāt

original: na ca yat tvaṃ na jānāsi tat anyo 'pi na jānātīti yuktam atiprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na ca yat tvam na jānāsi tat na jānāti iti yuktam atiprasaṅgāt

original: tasmād asmaryamānakartṛkatvaṃ durbādham eva //
analyzed: tasmāt asmaryamāna kartṛkatvam durbādham eva

original: api ca kartur smaraṇe sati sutarāṃ vedārthānuṣṭhānaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ śithilībhavet /
analyzed: api ca kartuḥ smaraṇe sati sutarām veda artha anuṣṭhānam prekṣāvatām śithilībhavet

original: na hy akartṛka evopadeśaḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na hi a kartṛkaḥ eva upadeśaḥ saṃbhavati

original: saṃbhann api vā prāmāṇyaniścayanimittābhāvāt kathaṃ visraṃbhabhūmir asau bhavet /
analyzed: api vā prāmāṇya niścaya nimitta abhāvāt katham visraṃbha bhūmiḥ asau bhavet

original: bādhakābhāvamatrāc ca prāmāṇyaniścayo vacasām ity uktaṃ prak /
analyzed: bādhaka abhāva matrāt ca prāmāṇya niścayaḥ vacasām iti uktam

original: tasmāt āptapratyayād eva nirvicikitsaṃ vedārthānuṣṭhānaṃ sapratiṣṭhānaṃ saṃbhavati nānyatheti /
analyzed: tasmāt āpta pratyayāt eva nirvicikitsam veda artha anuṣṭhānam sa pratiṣṭhānam saṃbhavati na anyathā iti

original: tasmān na kartrasmaraṇasya racanātvapratipakṣatayopanyāsaḥ upapannaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na kartṛ asmaraṇasya racanā tva pratipakṣa tayā upanyāsaḥ upapannaḥ

original: nāpi svatantram evedaṃ kartrabhāvasādhanaṃ bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: nā api svatantram evā idam kartṛ abhāva sādhanam bhavitum arhati

original: anupalabdhir iyam anena prakāreṇa kilocyate /
analyzed: anupalabdhiḥ iyam anena prakāreṇa kila ucyate

original: sā 'nupapanā anumānena kartur upalambhāt /
analyzed: sā nupapanā anumānena kartuḥ upalambhāt

original: anumānenāpi yadupabdhaṃ tadupalabdham eva bhavati //
analyzed: anumānena api yat upabdham tat upalabdham eva bhavati

original: nanu kartrabhāvasmaranab adhitvāt anumānam idaṃ ayuktam itaretarāśrayaprasaṅgāt anulabdhau siddhāyāṃ anumānanirāsaḥ anumānanirāse ca sati anupalabdhisiddhiḥ //
analyzed: nanu adhi tvāt anumānam idam ayuktam itara itara āśraya prasaṅgāt anulabdhau siddhāyām anumāna nirāsaḥ anumāna nirāse ca sati anupalabdhi siddhiḥ

original: anumānaprāmāṇye 'pi samāno doṣa iti cet na tasya pratibandham ahimnā prāmāṇyasiddheḥ /
analyzed: anumāna prāmāṇye pi samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na tasya pratibandham ahimnā prāmāṇya siddheḥ

original: na hi tasyānupalabdhinirāsāpekṣaṃ prāmāṇyam //
analyzed: na hi tasya anupalabdhi nirāsa apekṣam prāmāṇyam

original: attretat syāt na vayaṃ kartrabhāve prāmāṇyaṃ brūmaḥ /
analyzed: attra etat syāt na vayam kartṛ abhāve prāmāṇyam brūmaḥ

original: sakalalokapadārthavyavahāriṇo hi mīmāṃsakāḥ /
analyzed: sakala loka padārtha vyavahāriṇaḥ hi mīmāṃsakāḥ

original: paraṃ tu vedasya pauruṣeyatāṃ bruvāṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ pṛcchāmaḥ /
analyzed: param tu vedasya pauruṣeya tām bruvāṇam pramāṇam pṛcchāmaḥ

original: tccāsya nāstīti balād anupalabdhyā tadabhāvaniścayo vyavatiṣṭhata iti syād etad evam yady anumānaṃ na syāt /
analyzed: tt ca asya na asti iti balāt anupalabdhyā tad abhāva niścayaḥ vyavatiṣṭhate iti syāt etat evam yadi anumānam na syāt

original: uktaṃ ca racanātvāt ity anumānam //
analyzed: uktam ca racanā tvāt iti anumānam

original: yat punar avādi vedeṣu puruṣasya kartṛtvam aśakyaṃ grahītum iti tad apy asādhu parokṣasya kuvindāder abhinavaprāvarakapaṭādau kārye kathaṃ kartṛtā 'vagamyate paṭādiracanāṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya cet sā 'numīyate /
analyzed: yat punar avādi vedeṣu puruṣasya kartṛ tvam aśakyam grahītum iti tat api asādhu parokṣasya kuvinda ādeḥ abhinava prāvaraka paṭa ādau kārye katham kartṛ tā avagamyate paṭa ādi racanām dṛṣṭvā tasya ced sā numīyate

original: vede 'pi racanāṃ dṛṣṭvā kartṛtvaṃ tasya gamyatām //
analyzed: vede pi racanām dṛṣṭvā kartṛ tvam tasya gamyatām

original: śarīraparigraham antareṇa prāṇinām upadeśasya kartum aśakyatvāt kadācidīśvaraḥ śarīram api gṛhṇīyād iti kalpyate /
analyzed: śarīra parigraham antareṇa prāṇinām upadeśasya kartum aśakya tvāt kadācid īśvaraḥ śarīram api gṛhṇīyāt iti kalpyate

original: niyataśarīraparigrahābhāvāc ca vyāsādivadasau na smaryate /
analyzed: niyata śarīra parigraha abhāvāt ca vyāsa ādi vat asau na smaryate

original: tataś ca adya sadyaḥ kaviḥ kāvye yathā karteti mīyate /
analyzed: tatas ca adya sadyas kaviḥ kāvye yathā kartā iti mīyate

original: tathā tatkālajaiḥ puṃbhiḥ so 'pi karteti māsyate //
analyzed: tathā tad kāla jaiḥ puṃbhiḥ saḥ pi kartā iti

original: yathā parakṛtā śaṅkā tasmin kāvye vyapaiti te /
analyzed: yathā para kṛtā śaṅkā tasmin kāvye vyapaiti te

original: vede 'py anyakṛtā śaṅkā tathā teṣāṃ vyapaiṣayti //
analyzed: vede pi anya kṛtā śaṅkā tathā teṣām vyapaiṣayti

original: parokṣam anumānena yac ca budhyāmahe vayam /
analyzed: parokṣam anumānena yat ca budhyāmahe vayam

original: pratyakṣaṃ yogināṃ tac cety uktaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇe //
analyzed: pratyakṣam yoginām tat ca iti uktam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe

original: pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca tad evaṃ kartṛtāmitau /
analyzed: pratyakṣam anumānam ca tat evam kartṛ tā mitau

original: mūlapramānam astīti smṛtau nāndhapraṃparā //
analyzed: mūlapramānam asti iti smṛtau na andha praṃparā

original: mantrārthavādamūlatvaṃ tata eva na tatsmṛteḥ /
analyzed: mantra arthavāda mūla tvam tatas eva na tad smṛteḥ

original: yathoditānumānādipramāṇāntarasaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: yathā udita anumāna ādi pramāṇa antara saṃbhavāt

original: yad api itaretarāśrayamabhāpi puruṣokte vedepramāṇyaṃ vedaprāmāṇyāt puruṣasiddhir iti tad api na samyak pūrvaṃ parihṛtatvāt /
analyzed: yat api puruṣa ukte veda ipramāṇyam veda prāmāṇyāt puruṣa siddhiḥ iti tat api na samyak pūrvam parihṛta tvāt

original: anumānāt prasiddhe kartri vedavākyaiḥ tatpratīter upodvalanamipyate na tv āgamaikaśaraṇa eva kartravagamaḥ /
analyzed: anumānāt prasiddhe kartri veda vākyaiḥ tad pratīteḥ upodvalanam ipyate na tu āgama eka śaraṇe eva kartṛ avagamaḥ

original: uktaṃ ca pūrvam api pṛthivyādinā kāryena kartur anumānam //
analyzed: uktam ca pūrvam api pṛthivī ādinā kāryena kartuḥ anumānam

original: kiṃ yenaiva kartrā pṛthivyādikāryaṃ nirmitaṃ tenaiva vaidikyo racanā nirmitāḥ iti cet om ity cyate /
analyzed: kim yena eva kartrā pṛthivī ādi kāryam nirmitam tena eva vaidikyaḥ racanāḥ nirmitāḥ iti ced om iti cyate

original: kim antra pramāṇam iti cet ucyate tarhi sarvajñaḥ sraṣṭuṃ prabhavatīdṛśam /
analyzed: kim antra pramāṇam iti ced ucyate tarhi sarvajñaḥ sraṣṭum prabhavati īdṛśam

original: vicitraṃ prāṇibhṛtkarmaphalabhogāśrayaṃ jagat //
analyzed: vicitram prāṇi bhṛt karma phala bhoga āśrayam jagat

original: tatkarmaphalasambandhavidā tadupadeśinaḥ /
analyzed: tad karma phala sambandha vidā tad upadeśinaḥ

original: tenaiva vedā gcitāḥ iti nānyasya kalpanā //
analyzed: tena eva vedāḥ iti na anyasya kalpanā

original: ekenaiva ca siddhe 'rthe dvitīyaṃ kalpyema kim anekakalpanābījaṃ na hi kiñcana vidyate //
analyzed: ekena eva ca siddhe rthe dvitīyam kalpyema kim aneka kalpanā bījam na hi kiñcana vidyate

original: jagatsarge tāvat eka eveśvara iṣyate na dvau vahavo vā /
analyzed: jagat sarge tāvat ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ iṣyate na dvau vahavaḥ vā

original: bhinnābhinnāśayakalpane ekatravaiyarthāt /
analyzed: bhinna abhinna āśaya kalpane ekatra vaiyarthāt

original: itaratra vyavahāravaiśasaprasaṅgena tata ekasyeśvaratvavighātāt /
analyzed: itaratra vyavahāra vaiśasa prasaṅgena tatas ekasya īśvara tva vighātāt

original: tathā hi anekeśvaravādo hi nātīva hṛdayaṅgamaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi aneka īśvara vādaḥ hi na atīva hṛdayaṅgamaḥ

original: te cet sadṛśasaṅkalpāḥ ko 'rthao bahubhirīśvaraiḥ //
analyzed: te ced sadṛśa saṅkalpāḥ kaḥ bahubhiḥ īśvaraiḥ

original: saṃkalpayati yadekaḥ śubham aśubhaṃ vā 'pi satyasaṅkalpaḥ /
analyzed: saṃkalpayati yat ekaḥ śubham aśubham vā satya saṅkalpaḥ

original: tatsidhyati tadvibhavāt ity aparas tatra kiṃ kuryāt //
analyzed: tat sidhyati tad vibhavāt iti aparaḥ tatra kim kuryāt

original: bhinnābhiprāyatāyāṃ tu kāryavipratiṣedhataḥ /
analyzed: bhinna abhiprāya tāyām tu kārya vipratiṣedhataḥ

original: nūnam ekaḥ svasaṅkalpavihatyā 'nīśvaro bhavet //
analyzed: nūnam ekaḥ sva saṅkalpa vihatyā nīśvaraḥ bhavet

original: ekasya kila saṅkalpaḥ rājāyaṃ kriyatām iti /
analyzed: ekasya kila saṅkalpaḥ rājā ayam kriyatām iti

original: hanyatām iti cānyasya tau samāviśataḥ katham //
analyzed: hanyatām iti ca anyasya tau samāviśataḥ katham

original: rājyasaṅkalpasāphalye vihatā vadhakāmanā /
analyzed: rājya saṅkalpa sāphalye vihatā vadha kāmanā

original: tasyāḥ saphalatāyāṃ vā rājyasaṅkalpaviplavaḥ //
analyzed: tasyāḥ saphala tāyām vā rājya saṅkalpa viplavaḥ

original: tena citrajagatkāryasaṃvāhānuguṇāśayaḥ /
analyzed: tena citra jagat kārya saṃvāha anuguṇa āśayaḥ

original: eka eveśvaraḥ sraṣṭā jagatām iti sādhitam //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ sraṣṭā jagatām iti sādhitam

original: evaṃ jagatsargavat sa eva vedānām apy ekaḥ praṇetā bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: evam jagat sarga vat saḥ eva vedānām api ekaḥ praṇetā bhavitum arhati

original: nānātvakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāc ca //
analyzed: nānātva kalpanāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt kalpanā gaurava prasaṅgāt ca

original: tena yad ucyate nanv ekaḥ sarvaśākhānāṃ kartetyavagataṃ kutaḥ bahuvo bahubhir granthāḥ kathaṃ na racitā ime //
analyzed: tena yat ucyate nanu ekaḥ sarva śākhānām kartā iti avagatam kutas bahuvaḥ bahubhiḥ granthāḥ katham na racitāḥ ime

original: iti tatparihṛtaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: iti tat parihṛtam bhavati

original: ataś ca ekakartṛkā vedāḥ yataḥ parasparavyaktiṣaktārthāpadeśino dṛśyante /
analyzed: atas ca eka kartṛkāḥ vedāḥ yatas paraspara vyakti ṣakta artha apadeśinaḥ dṛśyante

original: ekam eva hi karma vedacatuṣṭayopadiṣṭaiḥ pṛthagbhūtair apy ekārthasamavāyibhir aṅgaiḥ anvitaṃ prayujate /
analyzed: ekam eva hi karma veda catuṣṭaya upadiṣṭaiḥ pṛthak bhūtaiḥ api eka artha samavāyibhiḥ aṅgaiḥ anvitam prayujate

original: tatra hi hautraṃ ṛgvedena yajurvedenādhyvaryavaṃ audgātraṃ sāmavedena brahmatvam atharvavedena ca kriyate /
analyzed: tatra hi hautram ṛgvedena yajurvedena ādhyvaryavam audgātram sāmavedena brahmatvam atharvavedena ca kriyate

original: pauṣpalādiśakhābhedopadiṣṭāṃ ca tattadaṅgajātaṃ tatra tatrāpekṣyate /
analyzed: pauṣpala ādi śakhā bheda upadiṣṭām ca tat tat aṅga jātam tatra tatra apekṣyate

original: tatra sarvaśākhāpratyayaṃ ekaṃ karmety āhuḥ /
analyzed: tatra sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam karma iti āhuḥ

original: etac ca adūra eva agre nirṇeṣayte //
analyzed: etat ca adūre eva agre nirṇeṣayte

original: ekābhiprāyabaddhatvaṃ tena sarvatra gamyate /
analyzed: eka abhiprāya baddha tvam tena sarvatra gamyate

original: bhaved bhinnāśayānāṃ hi katham ekārthamīlanam //
analyzed: bhavet bhinna āśayānām hi katham eka artha mīlanam

original: kāvyasamasyāpūraṇe kā vartā iti cet tatrāpi prathamasyaiva kaves tadvastudarśanāt /
analyzed: kāvya samasyā pūraṇe kā vartā iti ced tatra api prathamasya eva kaveḥ tad vastu darśanāt

original: tadabhiprāyavedī tu so 'nyastam anuvartate //
analyzed: tad abhiprāya vedī tu saḥ nyastam anuvartate

original: anyathā 'nanvitaṃ kāvyaṃ syād viśvavasukāvyāvat /
analyzed: anyathā nanvitam kāvyam syāt

original: anvitatve tu sā nūnaṃ ādyasyaiva kaver matiḥ //
analyzed: anvita tve tu sā nūnam ādyasya eva kaveḥ matiḥ

original: ihāpy ekāśayābhijñadvitīyeśvarakalpane /
analyzed: iha api ekāśaya abhijña dvitīya īśvara kalpane

original: ekābhiprāyataiva syāt kiṃ ca tatkalpane phalam //
analyzed: eka abhiprāya tā eva syāt kim ca tad kalpane phalam

original: tasmād eka eva kartā sarvaśākhānām /
analyzed: tasmāt ekaḥ eva kartā sarva śākhānām

original: kāṭhakādivyapadeśas tu prakṛṣṭādhyayananibandhano bhaviṣyatīti bhavadbhir apy uktam //
analyzed: kāṭhaka ādi vyapadeśaḥ tu prakṛṣṭa adhyayana nibandhanaḥ bhaviṣyati iti bhavadbhiḥ api uktam

original: api ca yathā taror vikṣiptāḥ śākhā bhavanti na ca kṛtsnaṃ puṣpaphalapatram ekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ sannihitaṃ bhavati kin tu kasyāñcit kasyāñcit evaṃ vedasyāpi śākhāḥ pṛthagaṅgakarmopadeśinyo vikṣiptāś ca //
analyzed: api ca yathā taroḥ vikṣiptāḥ śākhāḥ bhavanti na ca kṛtsnam puṣpa phala patram ekasyām śākhāyām sannihitam bhavati kin tu kasyāñcid kasyāñcid evam vedasya api śākhāḥ pṛthak aṅga karma upadeśinyaḥ vikṣiptāḥ ca

original: tāsāṃ ca vṛkṣaśākhānāṃ ekasmāj janmabījataḥ /
analyzed: tāsām ca vṛkṣa śākhānām ekasmāt janma bījataḥ

original: tathaiva sarvaśākhānāṃ ekasmāt puruṣottamāt //
analyzed: tathā eva sarva śākhānām ekasmāt puruṣottamāt

original: kartā ya eva jagatām akhilātmavṛttikarmaprapañcaparipākavicitratājñaḥ /
analyzed: kartā yaḥ eva jagatām akhila ātma vṛtti karma prapañca paripāka vicitra tā jñaḥ

original: viśvātmanā tadupadeśaparāḥ praṇītāḥ tenaiva vedaracanā iti yuktam etat //
analyzed: viśvātmanā tad upadeśa parāḥ praṇītāḥ tena eva veda racanā iti yuktam etat

original: āptaṃ tam eva bhagavantam anādimīśaṃ āśritya viśvasiti vedavacaśu lokaḥ /
analyzed: āptam tam eva bhagavantam anādim īśam āśritya viśvasiti lokaḥ

original: teṣām akrtṛkatayā na hi kaścid evaṃ visrambhameti matimāniti varṇitaṃ prāk //
analyzed: teṣām a krtṛka tayā na hi kaścid evam visrambham eti matimān iti varṇitam prāk

original: evañ ca padavākyaracanādau tāvat vedeṣu puruṣāpekṣitvam upapāditam //
analyzed: evam ca pada vākya racanā ādau tāvat vedeṣu puruṣa apekṣi tvam upapāditam

original: yad api sambandhakaraṇe puruṣānapekṣatvam ucyate citrabhānor iva dahanaśaktiḥ śabdasya naisargikī vācakaśaktiḥ /
analyzed: yat api sambandha karaṇe puruṣa anapekṣa tvam ucyate citrabhānoḥ iva dahana śaktiḥ śabdasya naisargikī vācaka śaktiḥ

original: vyutpattis tu vṛddhebhya eva vyavaharamāṇebhya upalabhyata iti kim atra puruṣaḥ kariṣyati iti tad apy aghaṭamānam puruṣaparipāṭitasamayasambandhavyatirekeṇa śabdād arthaprtyayānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: vyutpattiḥ tu vṛddhebhyaḥ eva vyavaharamāṇebhyaḥ upalabhyate iti kim atra puruṣaḥ kariṣyati iti tat api aghaṭamānam puruṣa paripāṭita samaya sambandha vyatirekeṇa śabdāt artha prtyaya anupapatteḥ

original: nanu vaiva śabdasyārthena sambandhaḥ kaścid asti /
analyzed: nanu vā eva śabdasya arthena sambandhaḥ kaścid asti

original: kasyedaṃ puruṣasāpekṣatvaṃ vā nirapekṣatvaṃ vā cintyate na hi śabdārthayoḥ kuḍyavadarayor iva saṃyogasvabhāvaḥ tantupaṭayor iva samavāyatmā vā sambandhaḥ pratyakṣa upalabhyate /
analyzed: kasya idam puruṣa sāpekṣa tvam vā nirapekṣa tvam vā cintyate na hi śabda arthayoḥ kuḍya vadarayoḥ iva saṃyoga svabhāvaḥ tantu paṭayoḥ iva samavāya tmā vā sambandhaḥ pratyakṣaḥ upalabhyate

original: tanmūlatvā ca sambandhāntarāṇy api na santi /
analyzed: tad mūla tvā ca sambandha antarāṇi api na santi

original: tad uktaṃ mukhe śabdam upalabhāmahe bhūmavartham iti //
analyzed: tat uktam mukhe śabdam upalabhāmahe bhūmau artham iti

original: nāpy anumīyate śabdasyārthena sambandhaḥ kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭanapūraṇānupalambhāt /
analyzed: na api anumīyate śabdasya arthena sambandhaḥ kṣura modaka śabda uccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭana pūraṇa anupalambhāt

original: na ca śabdadeśe arthaḥ saṃbhavati na cārthadeśe śabdaḥ sthanakaranaprayatnanāṃ taddhetūnāṃ ghaṭādyarthapradeśe 'nuplambhāt /
analyzed: na ca śabda deśe arthaḥ saṃbhavati na ca artha deśe śabdaḥ sthana karana prayatnanām tad hetūnām ghaṭa ādi artha pradeśe

original: vyāpakatvaṃ tu śabdasya pratiṣiddham eva //
analyzed: vyāpaka tvam tu śabdasya pratiṣiddham eva

original: ucyate na saṃśleṣalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthasambandhaḥ asmābhir abhyupagamyate /
analyzed: ucyate na saṃśleṣa lakṣaṇaḥ śabda artha sambandhaḥ asmābhiḥ abhyupagamyate

original: tat kiṃ kāryakārananimittanaimittikāśrayāśrayibhāvādayaḥ śabdasyārthena sambandhāḥ ete 'pi na tarām //
analyzed: tat kim kārya kārana nimitta naimittika āśraya āśrayi bhāva ādayaḥ śabdasya arthena sambandhāḥ ete pi na tarām

original: na tarhi tasya kaścid arthena sambandhaḥ na nāsti śabdasyārthena sambandhaḥ pratyayanimittahetutvāt dhūmādivat //
analyzed: na tarhi tasya kaścid arthena sambandhaḥ na na asti śabdasya arthena sambandhaḥ pratyaya nimitta hetu tvāt dhūma ādi vat

original: tat kiṃ śabdo 'numānam eva syāt //
analyzed: tat kim śabdaḥ numānam eva syāt

original: kas tarhi samaya iti brūmaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ tarhi samayaḥ iti brūmaḥ

original: ko 'yaṃ samayo nāma abhidhānabhidheyaniyamaniyogaḥ samaya ucyate //
analyzed: kaḥ yam samayaḥ nāma abhidhāna abhidheya niyama niyogaḥ samayaḥ ucyate

original: yad evaṃ kimanāśaṅkanīyasaṃśleṣaparicodanena taddūṣaṇena ca ucyate śabdārthābhedavādināṃ hi vaiyākaraṇānāṃ eṣa saṃśleṣarūpaḥ sambandho balādāpatatīti ta eva pratikṣepyante //
analyzed: yat evam kim an āśaṅkanīya saṃśleṣa paricodanena tad dūṣaṇena ca ucyate śabda artha abheda vādinām hi vaiyākaraṇānām eṣa saṃśleṣa rūpaḥ sambandhaḥ balāt āpatati iti te eva pratikṣepyante

original: āha yadi vaiyākaraṇavarṇito na saṃśleṣa upapattimān samayo 'yam anupapanna eva /
analyzed: āha yadi vaiyākaraṇa varṇitaḥ na saṃśleṣaḥ upapattimān samayaḥ yam anupapannaḥ eva

original: sa hi puruṣakṛtaḥ saṅketaḥ /
analyzed: sa hi puruṣa kṛtaḥ saṅketaḥ

original: na ca puruṣecchayā vastuniyamo 'vakalpate tadicchāyā avyāhataprasaratvāt //
analyzed: na ca puruṣa icchayā vastu niyamaḥ tad icchāyāḥ avyāhata prasara tvāt

original: artho 'pi kim iti vācako na bhavati śabdaś ca vācyaḥ /
analyzed: kim iti vācakaḥ na bhavati śabdaḥ ca vācyaḥ

original: na caivam asti dahanam anicchann api puruṣaḥ dhūmāt na taṃ pratyeti jalaṃ vā tata icchann api pratipadyate /
analyzed: na ca evam asti dahanam an icchan api puruṣaḥ dhūmāt na tam pratyeti jalam vā tatas icchan api pratipadyate

original: tatra yathā dhūmāgnyoḥ naisargika evāvinābhāvo nāma sambandhaḥ jñaptaye tu bhūyodarśanādi nimittam āśrīyate evaṃ śabdārthayoḥ sāṃsiddhika eva śaktyātmā sambandhaḥ tadvyutpattaye tu vṛddhavyavahāraprasiddhisamāśrayaṇam //
analyzed: tatra yathā dhūma agnyoḥ naisargikaḥ evā avinābhāvaḥ nāma sambandhaḥ jñaptaye tu bhūyas darśana ādi nimittam āśrīyate evam śabda arthayoḥ sāṃsiddhikaḥ eva śakti ātmā sambandhaḥ tad vyutpattaye tu vṛddha vyavahāra prasiddhi samāśrayaṇam

original: svābhāvike sambandhe sati dīpādivat kiṃ tadvyutpattyapekṣaṇeneti cet na śabdasya jñāpakatvāt /
analyzed: svābhāvike sambandhe sati dīpa ādi vat kim tad vyutpatti apekṣaṇena iti ced na śabdasya jñāpaka tvāt

original: jñāpakasya dhūmādeḥ etat rūpaṃ yat sambandhagrahaṇāpekṣaṃ svajñāpyajñāpakatvam /
analyzed: jñāpakasya dhūma ādeḥ etat rūpam yat sambandha grahaṇa apekṣam sva jñāpya jñāpaka tvam

original: udyotādayas tu pratyakṣasāmagryantargatatvāt na vyutpattyapkṣyā bhavanti /
analyzed: udyota ādayaḥ tu pratyakṣa sāmagrī antargata tvāt na vyutpatti apkṣyāḥ bhavanti

original: śaktis tu naisargikī yathā rūpaprakāśinī dīpādeḥ tathā śabdasyārthapratiādane /
analyzed: śaktiḥ tu naisargikī yathā rūpa prakāśinī dīpa ādeḥ tathā śabdasya artha pratiādane

original: tasmāt na samayamātrāt arthapratipattiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na samaya mātrāt artha pratipattiḥ

original: api ca abhidhānābhidheyaniyamaniyogarūpaḥ samayaḥ jñānam eva na tato 'rthāntaram /
analyzed: api ca abhidhāna abhidheya niyama niyoga rūpaḥ samayaḥ jñānam eva na tatas ṛtha antaram

original: jñānaṃ cātmani vartate na ca śabdārthayor iti na tayoḥ sambandhaḥ syāt //
analyzed: jñānam ca ātmani vartate na ca śabda arthayoḥ iti na tayoḥ sambandhaḥ syāt

original: kiñ ca samayaḥ kriyamāṇāḥ pratyuccāraṇaṃ vā kriyate pratipuruṣaṃ vā sargādau vā sakṛdīśvareṇa iti //
analyzed: kim ca samayaḥ kriyamāṇāḥ pratyuccāraṇam vā kriyate prati puruṣam vā sarga ādau vā sakṛt īśvareṇa iti

original: pratyuccāraṇaṃ prāktana eva kriyate nūtano vā navasya tāvat kriyamāṇasya katham arthapratyāyanasāmarthyam avagamyate tad avagatau vā kiṃ tatkaraṇena pūrvakṛtasya tu kṛtatvād eva punaḥ karanam anupapannam /
analyzed: pratyuccāraṇam prāktanaḥ eva kriyate nūtanaḥ vā navasya tāvat kriyamāṇasya katham artha pratyāyana sāmarthyam avagamyate tat avagatau vā kim tad karaṇena pūrva kṛtasya tu kṛta tvāt eva punar karanam anupapannam

original: ekasya vastunaḥ jñaptir asakṛd āvartate notpattiḥ //
analyzed: ekasya vastunaḥ jñaptiḥ asakṛt āvartate na utpattiḥ

original: pratipuruṣam api sambandhaḥ bhinnaḥ abhinno vā kriyate bhedapakṣe katham ekārthasaṃjānam gośabdasya sāmnādimānarthaḥ kesarādimānaśvaśabdasya iti //
analyzed: prati puruṣam api sambandhaḥ bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ vā kriyate bheda pakṣe katham eka artha saṃjānam go śabdasya sāmnā ādimān arthaḥ kesara ādimān aśva śabdasya iti

original: abhede 'pi tathaiva kṛtasya karanayogat jñānam eva sambandhasya karaṇam //
analyzed: abhede pi tathā eva kṛtasya jñānam eva sambandhasya karaṇam

original: sargādāv api sakṛtsambandhakaranam ayuktam tathāvidhakālāsambhavād eva /
analyzed: sarga ādau api sakṛt sambandha karanam ayuktam tathāvidha kāla asambhavāt eva

original: na hi śabdārthavyavahārarahitaḥ kaścit kāla upapadyate /
analyzed: na hi śabda artha vyavahāra rahitaḥ kaścid kālaḥ upapadyate

original: tasmān nityasyaiva sambandhasya lokato vyutpattiḥ na punaḥ karaṇam //
analyzed: tasmāt nityasya eva sambandhasya lokataḥ vyutpattiḥ na punar karaṇam

original: vyutpattipakṣaṃ ca na karaṇapakṣābhihitā doṣāḥ spṛśanti pratyakṣasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: vyutpatti pakṣam ca na karaṇa pakṣa abhihitāḥ doṣāḥ spṛśanti pratyakṣa siddha tvāt

original: pratyakṣaṃ hīdam upalabhyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣam hi idam upalabhyate

original: vṛddhānāṃ hi svārthe vyavaharamāṇānāṃ upaśṛṇvanto bālāḥ tatas tataḥ śabdāt taṃ tam arthaṃ pratiyanti /
analyzed: vṛddhānām hi sva arthe vyavaharamāṇānām upaśṛṇvantaḥ bālāḥ tatas tatas śabdāt tam tam artham pratiyanti

original: te 'pi vṛddhā yadā bālā āsan tadā anyebhyaḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ tathaiva pratipannavantaḥ /
analyzed: te pi vṛddhāḥ yadā bālāḥ āsan tadā anyebhyaḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ tathā eva pratipannavantaḥ

original: te 'py anyebhya iti nāstyādiśaṃsārayati //
analyzed: te pi anyebhyaḥ iti

original: api ca samayamātraśaraṇaḥ śaktiśūnyaḥ śabdaḥ katham akṣinikocahastasaṃjñādibhyaḥ bhidyeta sa hi tadānīṃ kaśāṅkuśapratodābhi ghātasthānīya eva bhavati /
analyzed: api ca samaya mātra śaraṇaḥ śakti śūnyaḥ śabdaḥ katham akṣi nikoca hasta saṃjñā ādibhyaḥ bhidyeta sa hi tadānīm kaśā aṅkuśa pratoda abhi ghāta sthānīyaḥ eva bhavati

original: tathā ca śabdād arthaṃ pratiadyāmaha iti laukiko vyapadeśo vadhyeta asmayād arthaṃ pratipadyāmaha iti syāt /
analyzed: tathā ca śabdāt artham pratiadyāmahe iti laukikaḥ vyapadeśaḥ vadhyeta asmayāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti syāt

original: samayapakṣe ca yadṛcchāśabdatulyatvaṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ prāpnoti /
analyzed: samaya pakṣe ca yadṛcchā śabda tulya tvam sarva śabdānām prāpnoti

original: tena gavāśvādiśabdānāṃ niyataviṣayatvaṃ na syāt //
analyzed: tena gavāśva ādi śabdānām niyata viṣaya tvam na syāt

original: yat punar ucyate jātiviśeṣe cāniyamāt samayarūpaḥ sambandha iti jātiśabdenātra deśo vivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: yat punar ucyate jāti viśeṣe ca aniyamāt samaya rūpaḥ sambandhaḥ iti jāti śabdena atra deśaḥ vivakṣitaḥ

original: kila kvacid deśe kaścic chabdaḥ deśantaraprasiddham artham utsṛjya tato 'rthāntare vartate /
analyzed: kila kvacid deśe kaścid śabdaḥ deśa antara prasiddham artham utsṛjya tatas rtha antare vartate

original: yathā coraśabdastaskaravacanaḥ odane dākṣiṇānyaiḥ prayujyate /
analyzed: yathā cora śabdaḥ taskara vacanaḥ odane dākṣiṇā anyaiḥ prayujyate

original: etañ ca samayapakṣe yujyate nitye tu sambandhe kathaṃ tadarthavyabhicāra iti tad apy ayuktam sarvaśabdānāṃ sarvārthapratyayānaśaktiyuktatvāt kvacid deśe kenacid arthena vyavahāraḥ //
analyzed: etam ca samaya pakṣe yujyate nitye tu sambandhe katham tad artha vyabhicāraḥ iti tat api ayuktam sarva śabdānām sarva artha pratyayāna śakti yukta tvāt kvacid deśe kenacid arthena vyavahāraḥ

original: ata eva cānavagatasambandhe śrute sati sandeho bhavati kam arthaṃ pratyāyayitum anenāyaṃ śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ syāt iti /
analyzed: atas eva ca anavagata sambandhe śrute sati sandehaḥ bhavati kam artham pratyāyayitum anena ayam śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ syāt iti

original: asatyāṃ hi śaktau akṛtasamaye nirālambanā pratyāyakatvā ''śaṅketi //
analyzed: asatyām hi śaktau akṛta samaye nirālambanā śaṅkā iti

original: athavā āryadeśaprasiddha eva śabdānām arthaḥ itaras tu mlecchajanasammato 'nādaraṇīya eva /
analyzed: athavā ārya deśa prasiddhaḥ eva śabdānām arthaḥ itaraḥ tu mleccha jana sammataḥ na ādaraṇīyaḥ eva

original: tasmāt samayapakṣasyātidaurvalyāt akṛtrima eva śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti na tatra puruṣasya prabhaviṣṇutā /
analyzed: tasmāt samaya pakṣasya ati daurvalyāt akṛtrimaḥ eva śabda arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti na tatra puruṣasya prabhaviṣṇu tā

original: atrocyate na nityaḥ sambandha ypapadyate śabdavat arthavac ca tṛtīyasya tasya pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena apratīyamānatvāt //
analyzed: atra ucyate na nityaḥ sambandha ypapadyate śabdavat arthavat ca tṛtīyasya tasya pratyakṣa ādinā pramāṇena a pratīyamāna tvāt

original: nanu śaktirūpaḥ sambandha ity uktam /
analyzed: nanu śakti rūpaḥ sambandhaḥ iti uktam

original: śaktiś ca tadāśriteti kathaṃ dharmyantaravat pṛthaktayā pratīyeta naiatt sāṃpratam svarūpasahakārivyatiriktāyāḥ śakteḥ sūkṣmāyāḥ grāg eva vistarataḥ pratikṣiptatvāt /
analyzed: śaktiḥ ca tad āśritā iti katham dharmi antara vat pṛthaktayā pratīyeta sāṃpratam svarūpa sahakāri vyatiriktāyāḥ śakteḥ sūkṣmāyāḥ grāk eva vistarataḥ pratikṣipta tvāt

original: na ca śaktiḥ pratyakṣagamyāḥ dravyasvarūpavad anupalambhāt /
analyzed: na ca śaktiḥ pratyakṣa gamyāḥ dravya sva rūpa vat anupalambhāt

original: nānumeyā kāryāṇām anyathā 'pi ghaṭamānatvāt /
analyzed: na anumeyā kāryāṇām anyathā ghaṭamāna tvāt

original: kalpayitvā ca śaktiṃ aparihāryaḥ asmayaḥ samayam antareṇārthapratipatter asiddheḥ /
analyzed: kalpayitvā ca śaktim aparihāryaḥ asmayaḥ samayam antareṇa artha pratipatteḥ asiddheḥ

original: siddhe ca samaye tata evārthasiddheḥ kiṃ nityasambandhāśrayaṇena yat tūktam samayasya puruṣecchādhīnatvāt asyāś ca avyāhataprasaratvāt vācyavācakavyatyayaḥ syāt iti tad anuktam śaktyabhāve śabdasyaiva vācakatve yogyatvāt /
analyzed: siddhe ca samaye tatas eva artha siddheḥ kim nitya sambandha āśrayaṇena yat tu uktam samayasya puruṣa icchā adhīna tvāt asyāḥ ca avyāhata prasara tvāt vācya vācaka vyatyayaḥ syāt iti tat anuktam śakti abhāve śabdasya eva vācaka tve yogya tvāt

original: kā punaḥ śaktyabhāve yogyatā 'sveti cet yo 'yaṃ gatvādijātiyogaḥ kramaviśeṣopakṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kā punar śakti abhāve yogyatā svā iti ced yaḥ yam ga tva ādi jāti yogaḥ krama viśeṣa upakṛtaḥ

original: gatvautvādisamānyasambandho hi yasya bhavati sa vācakatve yogya iti itaras tu vācyatve /
analyzed: ga tva o tva ādi samānya sambandhaḥ hi yasya bhavati sa vācaka tve yogyaḥ iti itaraḥ tu vācya tve

original: yathā dravyatvādyaviśeṣe 'pi vīranatvādisāmānyavatāṃ kaṭaniṣpattau tantutvādisāmānyavatāṃ ca paṭanippattau /
analyzed: yathā dravya tva ādi aviśeṣe vīrana tva ādi sāmānyavatām kaṭa niṣpattau tantu tva ādi sāmānyavatām ca paṭa nippattau

original: na ca tatra śaktir astīty uktam /
analyzed: na ca tatra śaktiḥ asti iti uktam

original: na ca kāraṇe kāryaṃ sad iti sāṅkhyair itva bhavadbhir iṣayate /
analyzed: na ca kāraṇe kāryam sat iti sāṅkhyaiḥ bhavadbhiḥ

original: tasyām asatyām api śaktau sāmānyaviśeṣasambandhasya niyāmakatvāt na vācyavācakayor vyatyaya iti na śaktirūpaḥ śabdāṛthayoḥ sambandhaḥ //
analyzed: tasyām asatyām api śaktau sāmānya viśeṣa sambandhasya niyāmaka tvāt na vācya vācakayoḥ vyatyayaḥ iti na śakti rūpaḥ śabda aṛthayoḥ sambandhaḥ

original: na ca tayor avinābhāvo dhūmāgnyor iva sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: na ca tayoḥ avinābhāvaḥ dhūma agnyoḥ iva sambandhaḥ

original: tatra hi sambandhaḥ pratīyamānaḥ evaṃ pratīyate dhūmo 'gniṃ vinā na bhavati iti /
analyzed: tatra hi sambandhaḥ pratīyamānaḥ evam pratīyate dhūmaḥ gnim vinā na bhavati iti

original: iha punaḥ ayam asmāt pratīyate iti /
analyzed: iha punar ayam asmāt pratīyate iti

original: etāvateva vyutpativarvasānam /
analyzed: etāvatā iva

original: ata eva avagatipūrvikaivāvagatir ihetyanumānāt śabdasya meda uktaḥ //
analyzed: atas eva avagati pūrvikā eva avagatiḥ iha iti anumānāt śabdasya medaḥ uktaḥ

original: prakāśakatvam api śabdasya samayaprasādopanatamegha na svābhāvikam /
analyzed: prakāśaka tvam api śabdasya samaya prasāda upanata megha na svābhāvikam

original: sāṃsiddhike hi tathātve bhramitvādiprayuktāt anyato vā yataḥ kutaś cit abhinavād api dīpād iva śabdād arthapratītiḥ syāt //
analyzed: sāṃsiddhike hi tathātve bhrami tva ādi prayuktāt anyatas vā yatas kutas cit abhinavāt api dīpāt iva śabdāt artha pratītiḥ syāt

original: yat tu naisargikie 'pi prakāśakatve śabdasya dhūmāder iva jñāpakatvāt sambandhagrahaṇasāpekṣatvam uktam sa eṣa viṣama upanyāsaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu prakāśaka tve śabdasya dhūma ādeḥ iva jñāpaka tvāt sambandha grahaṇa sāpekṣa tvam uktam saḥ eṣa viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ

original: na hi dhūmādeḥ pratyāyakatvaṃ svābhāvikam analāvinābhāvitvaṃ tu tasya nijjaṃ balam /
analyzed: na hi dhūma ādeḥ pratyāyaka tvam svābhāvikam anala avinābhāvi tvam tu tasya nijjam balam

original: tatra cāgṛhyate tasmin pratītir eva na jāyate iti yuktaṃ tadgrahaṇaṃ pratītyartham /
analyzed: tatra ca a gṛhyate tasmin pratītiḥ eva na jāyate iti yuktam tad grahaṇam pratīti artham

original: iha tu pratītiśaktir eva svabhāvikī bhavatā 'bhyupagamyate /
analyzed: iha tu pratīti śaktiḥ eva svabhāvikī bhavatā bhyupagamyate

original: sā cet svābhāvikī kiṃ vyutpattyaekṣaṇena iti //
analyzed: sā ced svābhāvikī kim vyutpattyā ekṣaṇena iti

original: yadi cocyate pratyāyaka iti pratyayaṃ dṛṣṭvā 'vagacchāmaḥ na prathamaśravaṇa iti /
analyzed: yadi ca ucyate pratyāyakaḥ iti pratyayam dṛṣṭvā vagacchāmaḥ na prathama śravaṇe iti

original: yāvat kṛtvaḥ śrutena iyaṃ saṃjñā ayaṃ saṃjñī ity avagamyate tāvat kṛtvaḥśrutād arthāvagama iti so 'yaṃ samayopayoga eva kathito bhavati /
analyzed: yāvat kṛtvas śrutena iyam saṃjñā ayam saṃjñī iti avagamyate tāvat kṛtvas śrutāt artha avagamaḥ iti saḥ yam samaya upayogaḥ eva kathitaḥ bhavati

original: saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandho hi samaya evocyate /
analyzed: saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ hi samayaḥ eva ucyate

original: tad upayogam antareṇa pratyāyakatvānavagamāt na svābhāvikī śaktiḥ //
analyzed: tad upayogam antareṇa pratyāyaka tva anavagamāt na svābhāvikī śaktiḥ

original: yat tv abhyadhāyi samayasya jñānātmakatvāt ātmani vṛttiḥ na śabdārthayor iti etad apy acatruaśram tadāśrayatvābhāve 'pi jñānasya tadviṣayatvopapatteḥ //
analyzed: yat tu abhyadhāyi samayasya jñāna ātmaka tvāt ātmani vṛttiḥ na śabda arthayoḥ iti etat api acatruaśram tad āśraya tva abhāve pi jñānasya tad viṣaya tva upapatteḥ

original: yad apy abhāṇi samayamātraśaraṇe sṛṇipratodanodananirviśeṣe śabde śabdārthaṃ pratipadyāmaha iti vyapadeśaḥ na syād iti tad api yat kiñcit /
analyzed: yat api samaya mātra śaraṇe sṛṇi pratoda nodana nirviśeṣe śabde śabda artham pratipadyāmahe iti vyapadeśaḥ na syāt iti tat api yat kiñcid

original: naisargikaśaktipakṣe 'pi śakter arthaṃ paratipadyāmahe na śabdāt iti vyapadeśaḥ syāt /
analyzed: naisargika śakti pakṣe śakteḥ artham paratipadyāmahe na śabdāt iti vyapadeśaḥ syāt

original: avinābhāvād aginiṃ pratipadyāmahe na dhūmāt iti syāt /
analyzed: avinābhāvāt aginim pratipadyāmahe na dhūmāt iti syāt

original: tadaṅgatvād avinābhāvādeḥ na tathā vyapadeśa iti cet tad itaratrapi samānam //
analyzed: tad aṅga tvāt avinābhāva ādeḥ na tathā vyapadeśaḥ iti ced tat itaratra api samānam

original: dhūme hi vyāptipūrvatvaṃ śabde samayapūrvatā /
analyzed: dhūme hi vyāpti pūrva tvam śabde samaya pūrva tā

original: nānayos tad apekṣāyāṃ karaṇatvaṃ vihanyate //
analyzed: na anayoḥ tat apekṣāyām karaṇa tvam vihanyate

original: api ca laukiko vyapadeśaḥ samayapakṣasākṣitām eva bhajate /
analyzed: api ca laukikaḥ vyapadeśaḥ samaya pakṣa sākṣi tām eva bhajate

original: devadattenoktaṃ amutaḥ śabdād anu arthaṃ pratipadyasveti ity evaṃ hi vyapadeśati lokaḥ /
analyzed: devadattena uktam amutas śabdāt anu artham pratipadyasva iti iti evam hi lokaḥ

original: tasyāt samaya eva //
analyzed: tasyāt samayaḥ eva

original: ataś caivaṃ deśāntare saṅketavaśena tata eva śabdād arthāntarapratipattiḥ //
analyzed: atas ca evam deśa antare saṅketa vaśena tatas eva śabdāt artha antara pratipattiḥ

original: nanu atroktaṃ sarve śabdāḥ sarvārthapratyāyanaśaktiyuktā iti kenacid arthena kvacidvyavahāra iti tad etad ayuktam śaktīnāṃ bhedābhedavikalpānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: nanu atra uktam sarve śabdāḥ sarva artha pratyāyana śakti yuktāḥ iti kenacid arthena kvacid vyavahāraḥ iti tat etat ayuktam śaktīnām bheda abheda vikalpa anupapatteḥ

original: na śabdasvarūpāt bhinnāḥ śaktayaḥ tathā 'navabhāsāt /
analyzed: na śabda svarūpāt bhinnāḥ śaktayaḥ tathā navabhāsāt

original: avyatireke ca ekasmācchabdādananyatvāt parasparam avyatirekastāsāṃ syāt /
analyzed: a vyatireke ca ekasmāt śabdāt ananya tvāt parasparam a vyatirekaḥ tāsām syāt

original: na ca bhinnakāryānumeyā bhinnāḥ śaktayaḥ kāryabhedasyānyathā 'py upapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca bhinna kārya anumeyāḥ bhinnāḥ śaktayaḥ kārya bhedasya anyathā pi upapatteḥ

original: sarvaśaktiyoge ca sarvārthapratyayaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: sarva śakti yoge ca sarva artha pratyaya prasaṅgaḥ

original: samayopayogo niyāmaka iti cet sa evāstu kiṃ śaktibhiḥ yad apy agādi śabdaśaravaṇe sati sarvārthaviṣayasandehadarśanāt sarvatra tasya śaktiḥ kalpyata iti tad apy asāram na hi śaktikṛtaḥ sandehaḥ kin tu gatvādivarṇasamānyanibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: samaya upayogaḥ niyāmakaḥ iti ced saḥ evā astu kim śaktibhiḥ yat api agādi śabda śaravaṇe sati sarva artha viṣaya sandeha darśanāt sarvatra tasya śaktiḥ kalpyate iti tat api asāram na hi śakti kṛtaḥ sandehaḥ kin tu gatvā ādi varṇa samānya nibandhanaḥ

original: tathā ca gatvādijātimatāṃ varṇānāṃ arthe vācakatvam avagatam /
analyzed: tathā ca ga tu ādi jātimatām varṇānām arthe vācaka tvam avagatam

original: amī tajjātiyogino varṇāḥ kasyārthasya vācakāḥ syuḥ iti bhavati sandehaḥ //
analyzed: amī tad jāti yoginaḥ varṇāḥ kasya arthasya vācakāḥ syuḥ iti bhavati sandehaḥ

original: yat punar avādi sa eva śabdasyārthaḥ yatrainam āryāḥ prayuñjata na mlecchajanaprasiddha iti tad etat katham iva śapatham anatreṇa pratipadyemahi /
analyzed: yat punar avādi saḥ eva śabdasya arthaḥ yatra enam āryāḥ prayuñjata na mleccha jana prasiddhaḥ iti tat etat katham iva śapatham anatreṇa pratipadyemahi

original: na hi mlecchadeśe 'pi tadarthapratyayo na jāyate bādhyate vā sandigdho veti kathaṃ na śabdārthaḥ āryaprasiddhir bādhiketi cet āryaprasiddher api mlecchaprasiddhiḥ kathaṃ na bādhikā akṣādivac ca vikalpamānārthopapatteḥ vyavasthitaviṣaya eva vikalpobhaviṣyati //
analyzed: na hi mleccha deśe tad artha pratyayaḥ na jāyate bādhyate vā sandigdhaḥ vā iti katham na śabda arthaḥ ārya prasiddhiḥ bādhikā iti ced ārya prasiddheḥ api mleccha prasiddhiḥ katham na bādhikā akṣa ādi vat ca vikalpamāna artha upapatteḥ vyavasthita viṣayaḥ eva vikalpaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: pikanematāmarasādiśabdānāṃ ca bhavadbhiḥ mlecchaprayogāt arthaniścaya āśrita eva /
analyzed: pika nema tāmarasa ādi śabdānām ca bhavadbhiḥ mleccha prayogāt artha niścayaḥ āśritaḥ eva

original: aveṣṭyadhikaraṇe rājaśabdaṃ āndhraprasiddhe 'rthe varṇitavanto bhavanta iti alam avāntaracintatena /
analyzed: aveṣṭi adhikaraṇe rāja śabdam āndhra prasiddhe rthe varṇitavantaḥ bhavantaḥ iti alam

original: tasmāt samaya eva sambandha iti yuktam /
analyzed: tasmāt samayaḥ eva sambandhaḥ iti yuktam

original: tad uktaṃ jātiviśeṣe cāniyamāt iti //
analyzed: tat uktam jāti viśeṣe ca aniyamāt iti

original: atha yad uktaṃ sayamaḥ pratyuccāraṇaṃ pratipuruṣaṃ sargādau sakṛt kriyate iti pratyuccāraṇaṃ pratipuruṣaṃ ca tatkaraṇaṃ anabhyupagatam eva dhūṣitam /
analyzed: atha yat uktam sa yamaḥ pratyuccāraṇam prati puruṣam sarga ādau sakṛt kriyate iti pratyuccāraṇam prati puruṣam ca tat karaṇam an abhyupagatam eva dhūṣitam

original: sargādau sakṛd eva samayakaranam iti na pakṣaḥ //
analyzed: sarga ādau sakṛt eva samaya karanam iti na pakṣaḥ

original: ata eva na sarvaśabdānāṃ yadṛcchātulyatvam /
analyzed: atas eva na sarva śabdānām yadṛcchā tulya tvam

original: keṣāñcid eva śabdānāṃ asmādibhir adyatve saṅketakaraṇāt tata eva yadṛcchāśabdā ucyante /
analyzed: keṣāṃcid eva śabdānām as mā ādibhiḥ adya tve saṅketa karaṇāt tatas eva yadṛcchā śabdāḥ ucyante

original: sargādiśca samarthita eva /
analyzed: sarga ādiḥ ca samarthitaḥ eva

original: īśvarasiddhāvapyavikalam anumānam upanyastam //
analyzed: īśvara siddhau api avikalam anumānam upanyastam

original: eṣa eva cāvayor viśeṣaḥ yad eṣa śabdārthasambandhavyavahāraḥ tavānādiḥ mama tu jagatsargāt prabhṛti pravṛtta iti /
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva ca āvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ yat eṣa śabda artha sambandha vyavahāraḥ tava anādiḥ mama tu jagat sargāt prabhṛti pravṛttaḥ iti

original: adyatve tu śabdārthasambandhavyutpattau tulya evāvayoḥ panthāḥ /
analyzed: adya tve tu śabda artha sambandha vyutpattau tulyaḥ evā āvayoḥ panthāḥ

original: tatrāpi tvayaṃ veśeṣaḥ yat tava śaktiparyantā vyutpattiḥ mama tu tadvarjam iti //
analyzed: tatra api tu ayam yat tava śakti paryantā vyutpattiḥ mama tu tad varjam iti

original: tathā ceyam iyatī vyutpattiḥ loke dṛśyate yat ayam asya vācyaḥ ayam asya vācaka iti na punaḥ śaktiparyantā vyutpattir asti /
analyzed: tathā ca iyam iyatī vyutpattiḥ loke dṛśyate yat ayam asya vācyaḥ ayam asya vācakaḥ iti na punar śakti paryantā vyutpattiḥ asti

original: tathā hi yatra śṛṅgagrāhikaya śabdam arthaṃ ca nirdiśya sambandhaḥ kriyate tatreyantam evainaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ ayam asya vācyaḥ ayam asya vācaka iti //
analyzed: tathā hi yatra śabdam artham ca nirdiśya sambandhaḥ kriyate tatra iyantam eva enam kriyamāṇam paśyāmaḥ ayam asya vācyaḥ ayam asya vācakaḥ iti

original: yatrāpi ca vṛddhebhyaḥ vyavaharamāṇebhyaḥ vyutpadyate tatrāpīyadevāsau jānāti ayam arthaḥ amutaḥ śabdāt anena pratiapnna iti na tv anyā asya kācicchaktir astīti /
analyzed: yatra api ca vṛddhebhyaḥ vyavaharamāṇebhyaḥ vyutpadyate tatra api iyat eva asau jānāti ayam arthaḥ amutas śabdāt anena pratiapnnaḥ iti na tu anyā asya kācid śaktiḥ asti iti

original: iyatyaiva ca vyutpattyā śabdād arthapratyayopapatteḥ asyāścāparihāryatvāt adhikakalpanābījābhāvāc ca na nityaḥ śabdārthaśambandhaḥ //
analyzed: iyatyā eva ca vyutpattyā śabdāt artha pratyaya upapatteḥ asyāḥ ca aparihārya tvāt adhika kalpanā bīja abhāvāt ca na nityaḥ śabda artha śambandhaḥ

original: ata eva ca sambandhaḥ tripramāṇakaḥ iti yat tvayocyate tad asmābhir na mṛṣyate /
analyzed: atas eva ca sambandhaḥ tri pramāṇakaḥ iti yat tvayā ucyate tat asmābhiḥ na mṛṣyate

original: śabdavṛddhābhidheyāṃś ca pratyakṣeṇātra paśyati iti satyam /
analyzed: śabda vṛddha abhidheyān ca pratyakṣeṇa atra paśyati iti satyam

original: anyathā 'nupapattyā tu vetti śaktiṃ dvayātmikām ity etat tu na satyam anyatha 'py yupapatter ity uktatvāt tasmāt dvipramāṇakaḥ sambandhaniścayaḥ na tripramāṇakaḥ //
analyzed: anyathā nupapattyā tu vetti śaktim dvaya ātmikām iti etat tu na satyam iti ukta tvāt tasmāt dvi pramāṇakaḥ sambandha niścayaḥ na tri pramāṇakaḥ

original: tad evaṃ śabdasya naisargikaśaktyātmakasambandhābhāvāt īśvaraviracitasamayanibandhanaḥ śabdārthavyavahārah nānādiḥ //
analyzed: tat evam śabdasya naisargika śakti ātmaka sambandha abhāvāt īśvara viracita samaya nibandhanaḥ śabda artha vyavahāraḥ nānā ādiḥ

original: nanu īśvara 'pi sambandhaṃ kurvan avaśyaṃ kenacit śabdena karoti tasya kena kṛtaḥ sambandhaḥ śabdāntareṇ cet tasyāpi kena kṛtaḥ tasyāpi kena iti na kaścid avadhiḥ /
analyzed: sambandham kurvan avaśyam kenacid śabdena karoti tasya kena kṛtaḥ sambandhaḥ śabda antareṇ ced tasya api kena kṛtaḥ tasya api kena iti na kaścid avadhiḥ

original: tasmād avaśyam anena sambandhaṃ krvatā vṛddhavyavahārasiddhāḥ kecit akṛtasambandhā eva śabdā abnhypagantavyāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt avaśyam anena sambandham krvatā vṛddha vyavahāra siddhāḥ kecid akṛta sambandhāḥ eva śabdāḥ

original: asti cet vyavahārasiddhiḥ kim īśvareṇa kiṃ vātatkṛtena samayena ity ānādipakṣa eva śreyāt ucyate astramāyuṣmatā jñātaṃ viṣayas tu na lakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: asti ced vyavahāra siddhiḥ kim īśvareṇa kim vā atatkṛtena samayena iti ānādi pakṣaḥ eva śreyāt ucyate astram āyuṣmatā jñātam viṣayaḥ tu na lakṣitaḥ

original: asmadādiṣu doṣo 'yaṃ īśvare tu na yujyate //
analyzed: asmat ādiṣu doṣaḥ yam īśvare tu na yujyate

original: nānākarmaphalasthānaṃ icchayaivedṛśaṃ jagat /
analyzed: nānā karma phala sthānam icchayā eva īdṛśam jagat

original: sraṣṭuṃ prabhavatas tasya kauśalaṃ ko vikalpayet //
analyzed: sraṣṭum prabhavataḥ tasya kauśalam kaḥ vikalpayet

original: icchāmātreṇa pṛthivyāder iyataḥ kāryasya karaṇasmadādīnāṃ yanmanorathapadavīm api nādhirohati tad api yataḥ saṃpadyate tasya kiyānayaṃ prayāsaḥ /
analyzed: icchā mātreṇa pṛthivī ādeḥ iyataḥ kāryasya karaṇa smad ādīnām yat manoratha padavīm api na adhirohati tat api yatas saṃpadyate tasya kiyān ayam prayāsaḥ

original: tad atreśvarasadbhāve paraṃ vipratipattayaḥ /
analyzed: tat atra īśvara sadbhāve param vipratipattayaḥ

original: tasmiṃs tu siddhe ka evaṃ vikalpānām avasaraḥ uktaṃ ca tatiddhau nirapavādam anumānam /
analyzed: tasmin tu siddhe kaḥ evam vikalpānām avasaraḥ uktam ca nirapavādam anumānam

original: vayaṃ tu na kartāra eva sambandhasya yata evam anuyujyemahi //
analyzed: vayam tu na kartāraḥ eva sambandhasya yatas evam anuyujyemahi

original: aṅgusyagreṇa nirdiśya kañcidarthaṃ puraḥsthitam /
analyzed: aṅgusi agreṇa nirdiśya kañcid artham puras sthitam

original: vyutpādayanto dṛśyate bālānasmadvidhā api //
analyzed: vyutpādayantaḥ dṛśyate bālān asmadvidhāḥ api

original: tasmāt īśvaraviracitasambandhādhigamopāyabhūtavṛddhavyavahāralabdhatadvyutpattisāpekṣaḥ śabdaḥ artham avagamayatīti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt īśvara viracita sambandha adhigama upāya bhūta vṛddha vyavahāra labdha tad vyutpatti sāpekṣaḥ śabdaḥ artham avagamayati iti siddham

original: na ca nityasambandhābhāve 'pi śabdasyārthāsaṃsparśitvaṃ samayabalenārthapratyayasyābādhitasya siddher ity uktatvādityalaṃ vistareṇa //
analyzed: na ca nitya sambandha abhāve pi śabdasya artha asaṃsparśi tvam samaya balena artha pratyayasya abādhitasya siddheḥ iti ukta tvāt iti alam vistareṇa

original: tasmāt pade ca vākye ca sambandhe ca svatantratā /
analyzed: tasmāt pade ca vākye ca sambandhe ca svatantra tā

original: puruṣasyopapanneti vedānāṃ tatpraṇītatā //
analyzed: puruṣasya upapannā iti vedānām tad praṇīta tā

original: tasmād āptoktatvād eva vedāḥ pramāṇam na nityatvāt //
analyzed: tasmāt āpta ukta tvāt eva vedāḥ pramāṇam na nitya tvāt

original: nanu āptoktatvasya hetoḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ katham avagamyate na pratyakṣeṇa kṣoṇīdharadharmatvam iva dhūmasya vedānām āptapraṇītatvam avagamyate śravaṇayugalabalalabdhajanmani pratyaye vedākhyaśabdarāśer eva pratibhāsāt /
analyzed: nanu āpta uktatvasya hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam katham avagamyate na pratyakṣeṇa kṣoṇīdhara dharma tvam iva dhūmasya vedānām āpta praṇīta tvam avagamyate śravaṇa yugala bala labdha janmani pratyaye veda ākhya śabdarāśeḥ eva pratibhāsāt

original: na codāttādivat varṇadharmatvena āptoktatvaṃ gṛhyate //
analyzed: na ca udātta ādi vat varṇa dharma tvena āpta ukta tvam gṛhyate

original: nāpy anumānam asiminn arthe liṅgābhāvāt /
analyzed: nā api anumānam asimin arthe liṅga abhāvāt

original: prāmāṇye hi vedasya āptoktatvaṃ liṅgam /
analyzed: prāmāṇye hi vedasya āpta ukta tvam liṅgam

original: āptoktatvānumitau tu na liṅgāntaram upalabhāmaha iti kutasyaḥ pakṣadharmatvaniścayaḥ ucyate alaṃ sarasvatīkṣodena ukta eva pakṣadharmatvaniścayopāyaḥ /
analyzed: āpta ukta tva anumitau tu na liṅga antaram upalabhāmahe iti pakṣa dharma tva niścayaḥ ucyate alam sarasvatī kṣodena uktaḥ eva pakṣa dharma tva niścaya upāyaḥ

original: tathā hi śabdasya sādhitaṃ tāvad anityatvaṃ svistaram /
analyzed: tathā hi śabdasya sādhitam tāvat anitya tvam svistaram

original: racanāḥ kartṛm atyaś ca racanātvād iti sthitam //
analyzed: racanāḥ kartṛm atyaḥ ca racanā tvāt iti sthitam

original: kartā sarvasya sarvajñaḥ puruṣo 'stīti sādhitam /
analyzed: kartā sarvasya sarvajñaḥ puruṣaḥ sti iti sādhitam

original: kāryeṇānuguṇaṃ kalpyaṃ nimittam iti ca sthitam //
analyzed: kāryeṇa anuguṇam kalpyam nimittam iti ca sthitam

original: pratyakṣādiviśvādaḥ vede parihariṣyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādi viśva ādaḥ vede parihariṣyate

original: vyāghātapaunaruktyādidoṣāś ca vacanāntare //
analyzed: vyāghāta paunaruktya ādi doṣāḥ ca vacana antare

original: vidhyarthavādamantrāṇāṃ upayogaś ca vakṣyate /
analyzed: vidhi arthavāda mantrāṇām upayogaḥ ca vakṣyate

original: na mātrāmātram apy asti vede kiñcid apārthakam //
analyzed: na mātrā mātram api asti vede kiñcid apārthakam

original: śabdabrahmavivartādikalpanāś ca purodetāḥ /
analyzed: śabda brahma vivarta ādi kalpanāḥ ca purā udetāḥ

original: sarvāḥ parihariṣyante kāryatvasya virodhikāḥ //
analyzed: sarvāḥ parihariṣyante kārya tvasya virodhikāḥ

original: itthaṃ ca sthite kim anyad avaśiṣṭaṃ vedeṣv āptoktatāniścayasya so 'yaṃ sakalaśāstrārthasthitau satyāṃ pakṣadharmatvaniścayaḥ hetoḥ āptoktatvasya gīyate //
analyzed: ittham ca sthite kim anyat avaśiṣṭam vedeṣu āpta ukta tā niścayasya saḥ yam sakala śāstra artha sthitau satyām pakṣa dharma tva niścayaḥ hetoḥ āpta ukta tvasya gīyate

original: yat tu pratyakṣam anumānaṃ vā tanniścyānimittam iti vikalpitam tatra pratyakṣamāstām anumānādīni ca yāni racanātvādīnyuktāni yāni ca paradarśanadviṣi vakṣyante tāni sarvāny āptoktatāyāḥ pakṣadharmatāsiddhyaupayikānītyalaṃ vistareṇa //
analyzed: yat tu pratyakṣam anumānam vā tat niścya animittam iti vikalpitam tatra pratyakṣam āstām anumāna ādīni ca yāni racanā tva ādīni uktāni yāni ca para darśana dviṣi vakṣyante tāni sarvāni āpta uktatāyāḥ pakṣa dharma tā siddhi aupayikāni iti alam vistareṇa

original: vyāptiḥ punar asya hetoḥ āyurvedādivākyeṣu niścīyate /pippalīpaṭolamūlader apy auṣadhasya ittham upayogāt idam abhimatamāsādyate /
analyzed: vyāptiḥ punar asya hetoḥ āyurveda ādi vākyeṣu niścīyate pippalī paṭola mūladeḥ api auṣadhasya ittham upayogāt idam abhimatam āsādyate

original: asya ca kṣīracukrādivirodhyaśanasya parihārādidamaniṣṭam upaśāmyatītyādiṣv āyurvedśāstreṣu pratyakṣeṇa tasyārthasya tathā niścayāt arthāvisaṃvāditaṃ nāma prāmāṇyaṃ pratipannaṃ taccedamāptavādaprayuktam /
analyzed: asya ca kṣīra cukra ādi virodhi aśanasya parihārāt idam aniṣṭam upaśāmyati ityādiṣu āyurveda śāstreṣu pratyakṣeṇa tasya arthasya tathā niścayāt arthāvisaṃvāditam nāma prāmāṇyam pratipannam tat ca idam āpta vāda prayuktam

original: ataḥ yatrāptavādatvaṃ tatra prāmāṇyam iti vyāptir gṛhyate //
analyzed: atas yatra āpta vāda tvam tatra prāmāṇyam iti vyāptiḥ gṛhyate

original: tathā mantrāṇāṃ prayoge vṛścikabhujagadaṣṭasya bhakṣitaviṣasya vā nirviṣatvaṃ apasmārapiśācarūpikāgṛhītasya tadunmocanaṃ atirabhasojjihāneṣu duṣṭameghaṣu sasyarakṣaṇam ity evam upalabdham /
analyzed: tathā mantrāṇām prayoge vṛścika bhujaga daṣṭasya bhakṣita viṣasya vā nirviṣa tvam apasmāra piśāca rūpikā gṛhītasya tad unmocanam ati rabhasa ujjihāneṣu duṣṭa meghaṣu sasya rakṣaṇam iti evam upalabdham

original: atas teṣāṃ viṣabhūtāśaniśamanakuśalānāṃ āptā upadeṣṭāra iti tatrāpi tathaiva vyāpitniścayaḥ //
analyzed: atas teṣām viṣa bhūta aśani śamana kuśalānām āptāḥ upadeṣṭāraḥ iti tatra api tathā eva vyāpit niścayaḥ

original: nanu āyurvedādau prāmāṇyaṃ pratyakṣādisaṃvādāt pratipannam nāptaprāmāṇyāt /
analyzed: nanu āyurveda ādau prāmāṇyam pratyakṣa ādi saṃvādāt pratipannam na āpta prāmāṇyāt

original: ataḥ kathamāptoktatvasya tatra vyāptigrahaṇam naitad evam pratyakṣādisaṃvādāt tanniścīyatāṃ nāma prāmāṇyam utthitaṃ tu tat āptoktatvāt /
analyzed: atas katham āpta ukta tvasya tatra vyāpti grahaṇam na etat evam pratyakṣa ādi saṃvādāt tat niścīyatām nāma prāmāṇyam utthitam tu tat āpta ukta tvāt

original: pratyakṣādāv apy arthakriyājñānasaṃvādāt prāmāṇyasya jñaptiḥ /
utpattis tu guṇavatkārakakṛtyet uktam //
analyzed: utpattiḥ tu uktam

original: nadyādivākyāni ca vipralambhakapuruṣabhāṣitāni visaṃvadanti loke dṛśyante /
analyzed: nadī ādi vākyāni ca vipralambhaka puruṣa bhāṣitāni visaṃvadanti loke dṛśyante

original: tenāptapraṇītatvam eva teṣāṃ prāmāṇyakāranam kāraṇaśuddhim antareṇa samyakpratyayānutpādāt /
analyzed: tena āpta praṇīta tvam eva teṣām prāmāṇya kāranam kāraṇa śuddhim antareṇa samyak pratyaya anutpādāt

original: niścayopāyas tu pratyakṣaṃ bhavatu na tu tatkṛtam eva pramāṇyam /
analyzed: niścaya upāyaḥ tu pratyakṣam bhavatu na tu tat kṛtam eva pramāṇyam

original: ataḥ yuktam āptoktatāyāḥ āyurvedādau vyāptigrahaṇam //
analyzed: atas yuktam āpta ukta tāyāḥ āyurveda ādau vyāpti grahaṇam

original: nanu evam api na yuktam āptokttatvasya tatra paricchettum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: nanu evam api na yuktam āpta uktta tvasya tatra paricchettum aśakya tvāt

original: anvayavyatirekamūlam eva āyurvedavākyānāṃ prāmāṇyam nāptakṛtam /
analyzed: anvaya vyatireka mūlam eva āyurveda vākyānām prāmāṇyam na āpta kṛtam

original: anvayavyatirekau ca yāvaty eva dṛśyete tāvaty evārthe prāmāṇyam yathā harītakyādivākyārthe /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekau ca yāvati eva dṛśyete tāvati eva arthe prāmāṇyam yathā harītakyādi vākya arthe

original: yatra tu tayor adarśanaṃ tatrāpramāṇyam yathā somarājyupayoge samāḥ sahasraṃ jīvyate iti /
analyzed: yatra tu tayoḥ adarśanam tatra apramāṇyam yathā somarājī upayoge samāḥ sahasram jīvyate iti

original: āpte tu kalpyamāne 'rdhajaratīyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: āpte tu kalpyamāne ṛdhajaratīyam syāt

original: arthe tasyāptatvam ardhe ca katham anāptatvam iti //
analyzed: arthe tasya āpta tvam ardhe ca katham anāpta tvam iti

original: tad idam anupapannam anvayavyatirekayoḥ grahītum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ grahītum aśakya tvāt

original: tau hi svātmani vā grahītuṃ śakyete vyaktyantare vā vyaktyantare 'pi sarvatra kvacid eva vā vyaktiviśeṣe sarvathā saṃkaṭo 'yaṃ panthāḥ /
analyzed: tau hi sva ātmani vā grahītum śakyete vyakti antare vā vyakti antare sarvatra kvacid eva vā vyakti viśeṣe sarvathā saṃkaṭaḥ yam panthāḥ
