original: vyādhīnāṃ tannidānānāṃ tadupacayāpacayānāṃ tadupaśamopāyānāṃ auṣadhānāṃ tatsaṃyogaviyogaviśeṣāṇāṃ tatparimāṇānāṃ tadasavīryavipākānāṃ deśakālāpuruṣadaśābhedena śaktibhedasya ekena janmanā grahītum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: vyādhīnām tad nidānānām tad upacaya apacayānām tad upaśama upāyānām auṣadhānām tad saṃyoga viyoga viśeṣāṇām tad parimāṇānām tad asavīrya vipākānām deśa kāla apuruṣa daśā bhedena śakti bhedasya ekena janmanā grahītum aśakya tvāt

original: janmāntarānubhūtāmāṃ ca bhāvānāṃ asmaraṇāt //
analyzed: janma antara anubhūta āmām ca bhāvānām asmaraṇāt

original: jano 'nantastāvannivavir iha vyādhinivahaḥ na saṃkhyātuṃ śakyā bahuguṇarasadravyagatayaḥ /
analyzed: janaḥ iha vyādhi nivahaḥ na saṃkhyātum śakyāḥ bahu guṇa rasa dravya gatayaḥ

original: vicitrāḥ saṃyogāḥ pariṇatipūrveti ca kutaḥ cikitsāyāḥ pāraṃ tarati yugalakṣair api naraḥ //
analyzed: vicitrāḥ saṃyogāḥ pariṇati pūrvā iti ca kutas cikitsāyāḥ pāram tarati yuga lakṣaiḥ api naraḥ

original: yad eva dravyam ekasya dhātor bhavati śāntaye /
analyzed: yat eva dravyam ekasya dhātoḥ bhavati śāntaye

original: yogāntarāttadevāsya punaḥ kopāya kalpate //
analyzed: yoga antarāt tat eva asya punar kopāya kalpate

original: yā dravyaśaktir ekatra puṃsi nāsau narāntare /
analyzed: yā dravya śaktiḥ ekatra puṃsi na asau nara antare

original: harītakyāpi nodbhūtavātakuṣṭe virecyate //
analyzed: harītakyā api na udbhūta vāta kuṣṭe virecyate

original: śaradyudriktapittasya jvarāya dadhi kalpate /
analyzed: śaradi udrikta pittasya jvarāya dadhi kalpate

original: tad eva bhuktaṃ varṣāsu jvaraṃ hanti daśāntare //
analyzed: tat eva bhuktam varṣāsu jvaram hanti daśa antare

original: na copalakṣaṇaṃ kiñcit asti tacchaktivedane /
analyzed: na ca upalakṣaṇam kiñcid asti tad śakti vedane

original: yenaikatra gṛhītā 'sau sarvatrāvagatā bhavet //
analyzed: yena ekatra gṛhītā sau sarvatra avagatā bhavet

original: yo vā jñātuṃ prabhavati puruṣaḥ tatsāmarthyaṃ niravadhiviṣayam /
analyzed: yaḥ vā jñātum prabhavati puruṣaḥ tat sāmarthyam niravadhi viṣayam

original: syāt sarvajñaḥ sa iti na vimatiḥ tasmin kāryā svavacanakathite //
analyzed: syāt sarvajñaḥ saḥ iti na vimatiḥ tasmin kāryā sva vacana kathite

original: athocyate anādir evaiṣā cikitsakasmṛtiḥ vyākaraṇādismṛtivat /
analyzed: atha ucyate anādiḥ eva eṣā cikitsaka smṛtiḥ vyākaraṇa ādi smṛti vat

original: saṃkṣepavistaravivakṣayaiva carakādayaḥ kartāraḥ na tu te sarvadarśinaḥ /
analyzed: saṃkṣepa vistara vivakṣayā eva caraka ādayaḥ kartāraḥ na tu te sarva darśinaḥ

original: na ca smṛtāvandhaparaṃparādoṣaḥ samūlatvāt /
analyzed: na ca smṛtau andha paraṃparā doṣaḥ sa mūla tvāt

original: yathā vyākaraṇasmṛteḥ śiṣṭaprayogo mūlaṃ evam ihānvayavyatirekau /
analyzed: yathā vyākaraṇa smṛteḥ śiṣṭa prayogaḥ mūlam evam iha anvaya vyatirekau

original: śiṣṭavirodhe sati yathā mūlavirodhinī pāṇinyādismṛtir apramāṇam tathā cāhuḥ iha na bhvaty anabhidhānāt iti /
analyzed: śiṣṭa virodhe sati yathā mūla virodhinī pāṇini ādi smṛtiḥ apramāṇam tathā ca āhuḥ iha na anabhidhānāt iti

original: evaṃ vaidyasmṛtir api anvayavyatirekaviruddhā na pramāṇam iti tad etad anyuktam anvayavyatirekayor yathoktanayena paricchedāsambhavena tanmūlatvānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: evam vaidya smṛtiḥ api anvaya vyatireka viruddhā na pramāṇam iti tat etat anyuktam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ yathā ukta nayena pariccheda asambhavena tad mūla tva anupapatteḥ

original: yadi hy anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ aśeṣadravyaśaktīr niścitya carakādibhir viracitaṃ śāstram itīdṛśam anvayavyatirekitvam ucyate tad ay ayākṛtam adyatve yātantāvanvayavyatirekau vayam upalabdhuṃ śaknumaḥ tāvadbhyāṃ tābhyāṃ ekadeśasaṃvādāt pramāṇyakalpanāt tatra pravartatām na tu tau tāvantau śāstrasya mūlaṃ bhavitum arhataḥ sarvair asmadādibhis tādṛśaśāstrapraṇayanaprasaggāt //
analyzed: yadi hi anvaya vyatirekābhyām aśeṣa dravya śaktīḥ niścitya caraka ādibhiḥ viracitam śāstram iti īdṛśam anvaya vyatireki tvam ucyate tat adyatve anvaya vyatirekau vayam upalabdhum śaknumaḥ tāvadbhyām tābhyām eka deśa saṃvādāt pramāṇya kalpanāt tatra pravartatām na tu tau tāvantau śāstrasya mūlam bhavitum arhataḥ sarvaiḥ asmat ādibhiḥ tādṛśa śāstra praṇayana prasaggāt

original: anāditvam api śāstrāṇāṃ vedavad anupapannam carakādikrtṛsmṛteḥ kālidāsāsismṛtivad avigītatvāt /
analyzed: anādi tvam api śāstrāṇām veda vat anupapannam caraka ādi krtṛ smṛteḥ kālidāsa asi smṛti vat avigīta tvāt

original: na ca cikitsāsmaranaprabandhaevāyam anādiḥ tathātve andhaparaṃparā kāraṇānavadhāraṇāt /
analyzed: na ca cikitsā smarana prabandhaḥ eva ayam anādiḥ tathātve andha paraṃparā kāraṇa anavadhāraṇāt

original: na ca tad uktaṃ tanmūlaṃ bhavitum arhati vyudstatvāt /
analyzed: na ca tat uktam tad mūlam bhavitum arhati vyudsta tvāt

original: tasmāt sarvajñapraṇīta evāyurvedaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvajña praṇītaḥ eva āyurvedaḥ

original: nanu aviduṣām upadeśo nāvakalpata iti vidvāṃsaḥ carakādayaḥ kalpyantām /
analyzed: nanu aviduṣām upadeśaḥ na avakalpate iti vidvāṃsaḥ caraka ādayaḥ kalpyantām

original: te tu pratyakṣeṇaiva sarvaṃ viditavant ity atra kiṃ mānam ucyate anvayavyatirekayor nirāsāt nānumānasyaiva viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: te tu pratyakṣeṇa eva sarvam viditavan iti atra kim mānam ucyate anvaya vyatirekayoḥ nirāsāt na anumānasya eva viṣayaḥ

original: vedamūlatvam api manvādismṛtivat ayuktaṃ kalpayitum kartṛsāmānyāsaṃbhavād iti varṇayiṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: veda mūla tvam api manu ādi smṛti vat ayuktam kalpayitum kartṛ sāmānya asaṃbhavāt iti varṇayiṣyāmaḥ

original: puruṣāntaropadeśapūrvakatve carakeṇava kim aparāddham upamanamānāśaṅkanīyam evāsminn arthe /
analyzed: puruṣa antara upadeśa pūrvaka tve kim aparāddham upamana māna āśaṅkanīyam eva asmin arthe

original: arthāpattis tu na pramāṇāntaram /
analyzed: arthāpattiḥ tu na pramāṇa antaram

original: apramāṇyaṃ tu nāsti bahukṛtvaḥ saṃvādadarśanāt /
analyzed: apramāṇyam tu na asti bahu kṛtvas saṃvāda darśanāt

original: ataḥ pariśeṣāt pratyakṣīkṛtadeśakālapuruṣadaśābhedānu sārisamastavyastapadārthasārthaśaktiniścayāḥ carakādayaḥ iti yuktaṃ kalpayitum //
analyzed: atas pariśeṣāt pratyakṣīkṛta deśa kāla puruṣa daśā bheda anu sāri samasta vyasta padārtha sārtha śakti niścayāḥ caraka ādayaḥ iti yuktam kalpayitum

original: yad evaṃ kathaṃ tarhi somarājyādivakyeṣu vyabhicāraḥ vyabhicāre cārdhajaratīyam ity uktam naiṣa doṣaḥ karmakartṛsādhanavaiguṇyāt eṣu vyabhicāro bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: yat evam katham tarhi somarājya ādi vakyeṣu vyabhicāraḥ vyabhicāre ca ardhajaratīyam iti uktam na eṣa doṣaḥ karma kartṛ sādhana vaiguṇyāt eṣu vyabhicāraḥ bhaviṣyati

original: vaidkeṣu ca karmasu mīmāṃsakasya samāno guṇaḥ //
analyzed: vaidkeṣu ca karmasu mīmāṃsakasya samānaḥ guṇaḥ

original: kārīryādau kā te vartā yasyāṃ na syād iṣṭau vṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: kārīrī ādau kā te vartā yasyām na syāt iṣṭau vṛṣṭiḥ

original: vaiguṇyaṃ cet kartrādīnāṃ atrāpy evaṃ śakyaṃ vaktum //
analyzed: vaiguṇyam ced kartṛ ādīnām atra api evam śakyam vaktum

original: yadi vidhuram abhuktaṃ karma śastrīyam anyat phalavighaṭanahetuḥ kalpyate so 'pi tulyaḥ /
analyzed: yadi vidhuram abhuktam karma śastrīyam anyat phala vighaṭana hetuḥ kalpyate saḥ u pi tulyaḥ

original: kvacid atha phalasaṃpat dṛśyate tatprayoge tad iha dṛḍhaśarīrāh santi dīrthāyuṣaś ca //
analyzed: kvacid atha phala saṃpad dṛśyate tad prayoge tat iha santi dīrtha āyuṣaḥ ca

original: āyurvedas tasmāt āptakṛto nānyamūla iti siddham /
analyzed: āyurvedaḥ tasmāt āpta kṛtaḥ na anya mūlaḥ iti siddham

original: evaṃphalavedādau prakāśam āptapraṇītatvam //
analyzed: evaṃphala veda ādau prakāśam āpta praṇīta tvam

original: tasmāt āptoktatvasya siddham āyurvedādau vyāptigrahaṇam /
analyzed: tasmāt āpta ukta tvasya siddham āyurveda ādau vyāpti grahaṇam

original: vyāptipradarśanāyaiva sūtrakṛtā sa dvividho dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthatvāt 1.1.8 ity uktam /
analyzed: vyāpti pradarśanāya eva sūtrakṛtā sa dvividhaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa artha tvāt iti uktam

original: dṛṣṭārthaśabde gṛhītāvinābhāvaṃ āptoktatvaṃ adṛṣṭārthe 'pi prāmāṇyaṃ sādhayatīti /
analyzed: dṛṣṭārtha śabde gṛhīta avinābhāvam āpta ukta tvam adṛṣṭa arthe pi prāmāṇyam sādhayati iti

original: ata evoktaṃ mantrāyurvedaprāmāṇyavac ca tatprāmāṇyam āptaprāmāṇyāt 2.1.69 iti //
analyzed: atas eva uktam mantra āyurveda prāmāṇya vat ca tad prāmāṇyam āpta prāmāṇyāt iti

original: nanv atrāpi na vaidyakaṃ viracayan dṛṣṭo muniḥ sarvavit tadvyāptigrahaṇaṃ jane yadi vṛthā ''yurvedasaṃkīrtanam /
analyzed: nanu atrā api na vaidyakam viracayan dṛṣṭaḥ muniḥ sarva vid tad vyāpti grahaṇam jane yadi vṛthā yurveda saṃkīrtanam

original: satyaṃ kin tu dṛḍhā tathāpi carakādyāptasmṛtir vaidyake nāsau cānyanibandhaneti kathitā tasyeha dṛṣṭāntatā //
analyzed: satyam kin tu dṛḍhā tathā api caraka ādi āpta smṛtiḥ vaidyake na asau ca anya nibandhanā iti kathitā tasya iha dṛṣṭānta tā

original: ity āyurvedavākyaprabhṛtiṣu bhavati vyāptir āptoktāyāḥ pūrvoktena krameṇa sphuṭamakathi tathā pakṣadharmatvam asyāḥ /
analyzed: iti āyurveda vākya prabhṛtiṣu bhavati vyāptiḥ āpta uktāyāḥ pūrvoktena krameṇa sphuṭam akathi tathā pakṣa dharma tvam asyāḥ

original: na pratyakṣāgamābhyām apahṛtaviṣayā nānumānāntareṇa vyādhūtā veti saiṣā bhajati gamakatāṃ pañcarūpopapatteḥ //
analyzed: na pratyakṣa āgamābhyām apahṛta viṣayā na anumāna antareṇa vyādhūtā vā iti sā eṣā bhajati gamaka tām pañca rūpa upapatteḥ

original: anapekṣatayā na vedavācāṃ ghaṭate niṣpratimaḥ pramāṇabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: anapekṣa tayā na veda vācām ghaṭate niṣpratimaḥ pramāṇa bhāvaḥ

original: kva girām ayathārthatānivṛttiḥ puruṣapratyayam antareṇa dṛṣṭā //
analyzed: kva girām ayathārtha tā nivṛttiḥ puruṣa pratyayam antareṇa dṛṣṭā

original: tatpratyayāt bahutaradraviṇavyayādisādhyeṣu karmasu tapaśu ca vaidikeṣu /
analyzed: tad pratyayāt bahutara draviṇa vyaya ādi sādhyeṣu karmasu ca vaidikeṣu

original: yuktaṃ pravartanamabādhanakena naiva tatsiddhir ity alam asammata eṣa mārgaḥ //
analyzed: yuktam pravartanam abādhanakena nā eva tad siddhiḥ iti alam a sammataḥ eṣa mārgaḥ

original: tasmād āptoktatvād eva devāḥ pramāṇam iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt āpta ukta tvāt eva devāḥ pramāṇam iti siddham

original: anye tu anyathā vedaprāmāṇyaṃ varṇayanti /
analyzed: anye tu anyathā veda prāmāṇyam varṇayanti

original: tasya hi prāmāṇye abhyupagataparalokaḥ anabhyupagataparaloko vā paro vipratipadyate tatrānabhupagataparalokaṃ prati tāvat ātmanityatādinyāyapūrvakaṃ paralokasamarthanam eva nidheyam //
analyzed: tasya hi prāmāṇye abhyupagata para lokaḥ anabhyupagata para lokaḥ vā paraḥ vipratipadyate tatra anabhupagata para lokam prati tāvat ātma nitya tā ādi nyāya pūrvakam para loka samarthanam eva nidheyam

original: paralokavādināṃ tu mate yad etat sukhiduḥkhyādibhedena jagato vaicitryaṃ dṛśyate tad avaśyaṃ karmavaicitryanibandhanam eva /
analyzed: para loka vādinām tu mate yat etat sukhi duḥkhi ādi bhedena jagataḥ vaicitryam dṛśyate tat avaśyam karma vaicitrya nibandhanam eva

original: karmāṇi cānanuṣṭhitāni nātmānaṃ labhante /
analyzed: karmāṇi ca ananuṣṭhitāni na ātmānam labhante

original: alabdhātmanāṃ ca nabhaḥkusumanibhānāṃ kuto vicitrasukhaduḥkhādiphalasādhanatvam tasmāt anuṣṭhānam eṣām eṣitavyam /
analyzed: alabdha ātmanām ca nabhaḥ kusuma nibhānām kutas vicitra sukha duḥkha ādi phala sādhana tvam tasmāt anuṣṭhānam eṣām eṣitavyam

original: anuṣṭhānaṃ ca nāviditasavrūpāṇāṃ karmaṇām upapannam /
analyzed: anuṣṭhānam ca na a vidita savrūpāṇām karmaṇām upapannam

original: ajānan puruṣaḥ tapasvī kim anutiṣṭhat tad avaśyaṃ jñātvā 'nuṣṭheyāni karmāṇi //
analyzed: a jānan puruṣaḥ tapasvī kim anutiṣṭhat tat avaśyam jñātvā nuṣṭheyāni karmāṇi

original: tad idānīṃ teṣāṃ parijñāne ko 'bhypāyaḥ na pratyakṣaṃ asmadānīnāṃ svargādyadṛṣṭapuruṣārthasādhanāni karmāṇi darśayituṃ prabhavati //
analyzed: tat idānīm teṣām parijñāne kaḥ bhypāyaḥ na pratyakṣam asmadānīnām svarga ādi adṛṣṭa puruṣa artha sādhanāni karmāṇi darśayitum prabhavati

original: nāpy anumānam anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tṛptibhojanayor iva svargayāgayoḥ sādhyasādhanasambandhānavadhāraṇāt //
analyzed: nā api anumānam anvaya vyatirekābhyām tṛpti bhojanayoḥ iva svarga yāgayoḥ sādhya sādhana sambandha anavadhāraṇāt

original: nāpy arthāpattiḥ jagadvaicitryānyathā 'nupapattyā tu vicitraṃ kāraṇamātram anumīyate /
analyzed: nā api arthāpattiḥ jagat vaicitrya anyathā nupapattyā tu vicitram kāraṇa mātram anumīyate

original: na ca tāvatā 'nuṣṭhānasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: na ca tāvatā anuṣṭhāna siddhiḥ

original: uktaṃ ca adharme dharmarūpe vā 'py avibhakte phalaṃ prati /
analyzed: uktam ca adharme dharma rūpe vā pi avibhakte phalam prati

original: kim apy astīti vijñānaṃ narāṇāṃ kvopayujyate iti //
analyzed: kim api asti iti vijñānam narāṇām kva upayujyate iti

original: upamānaṃ tv atra śaṅkyamānam api na śobhate //
analyzed: upamānam tu atra śaṅkyamānam api na śobhate

original: nāpi parasparam upadiśanto laukikāḥ karāṇi paralokaphalāni jātīyur iti vaktuṃ yuktaṃ ajñātvā upapādayatāṃ āptatvāyogāt /
analyzed: na api parasparam upadiśantaḥ laukikāḥ karāṇi para loka phalāni jātīyuḥ iti vaktum yuktam a jñātvā upapādayatām āpta tva ayogāt

original: jñātuṃ tu laukikānāṃ durghaṭam pramāṇābhāvād ity uktatvāt /
analyzed: jñātum tu laukikānām durghaṭam pramāṇa abhāvāt iti ukta tvāt

original: eva eva hi puruṣopadeśaparaṃparākalpanāyāṃ andhaparaṃparānyāyaḥ syāt /
analyzed: eva eva hi puruṣa upadeśa paraṃparā kalpanāyām andha paraṃparā nyāyaḥ syāt

original: tasmād avaśyaṃ abhyupagataparalokaiḥ paralokaphalāni karmāṇi kurvadbhiḥ śāstrāt karmāvabodho 'bhyupagantavyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt avaśyam abhyupagata para lokaiḥ para loka phalāni karmāṇi kurvadbhiḥ śāstrāt karma avabodhaḥ bhyupagantavyaḥ

original: śāstraṃ ca vedā eveti siddhaṃ tatprāmāṇyam //
analyzed: śāstram ca vedāḥ eva iti siddham tat prāmāṇyam

original: nanu lokapratisiddhita eva dharmādharmasādhanāni karmāṇi jñāsyante kiṃ śāstreṇa upakārāpakārau hi dharmādharmayor lakṣaṇam iti prasiddham evaitat /
analyzed: nanu loka pratisiddhitaḥ eva dharma adharma sādhanāni karmāṇi jñāsyante kim śāstreṇa upakāra apakārau hi dharma adharmayoḥ lakṣaṇam iti prasiddham eva etat

original: tathā ''ha vyāsahaḥ idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ pāpaṃ ity etasmin padadvaye /
analyzed: tathā ha vyāsahaḥ idam puṇyam idam pāpam iti etasmin pada dvaye

original: ācaṇḍālaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ alpaṃ śāstraprayojanam //
analyzed: ācaṇḍālam manuṣyāṇām alpam śāstra prayojanam

original: iti naitad yuktam lokaprasiddher nirmūlāyāḥ pramāṇatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: iti nā etat yuktam loka prasiddheḥ nirmūlāyāḥ pramāṇa tva anupapatteḥ

original: lokaprasiddhir nāma laukikānām avicchinnā smṛtiś ca prabhavantī pramāṇāntaramūlā bhavati na svatantretyavaśyam asyā mūlam anveṣaṇīyam /
analyzed: loka prasiddhiḥ nāma laukikānām avicchinnā smṛtiḥ ca prabhavantī pramāṇa antara mūlā bhavati na svatantrā iti avaśyam asyāḥ mūlam anveṣaṇīyam

original: tac ca pratyakṣādi nopapadyate iti nūnaṃ śāstramūlaiva lokaprasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: tat ca pratyakṣa ādi nā upapadyate iti nūnam śāstra mūlā eva loka prasiddhiḥ

original: viruddhān ekaprakārātvāc ca lokaprasiddheḥ na tasyāṃ svatantrāyāṃ samāśvasiti lokaḥ //
analyzed: viruddhān eka prakārā tvāt ca loka prasiddheḥ na tasyām svatantrāyām samāśvasiti lokaḥ

original: na copakārāpakārakamātralakṣaṇāveva dharmādharmau vaktuṃ yujyete japaśīdhupānādau tadabhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca upakāra apakāraka mātra lakṣaṇau eva dharma adharmau vaktum yujyete japa śīdhu pāna ādau tad abhāvāt

original: gurudāragamanādau ca viparyayādityavaśyaṃ śāstraśaraṇāv eva tatreṣitavyau //
analyzed: guru dāra gamana ādau ca viparyayāt iti avaśyam śāstra śaraṇau eva tatra iṣitavyau

original: api ca idam iṣṭamantrādikaṃ evaṃphalam ayam asmin adhikṛta iti iyam iti kartavyatā eṣa deśaḥ eṣakālaḥ ime ṛtvijaḥ ity ādi kiṃ lokaprasiddher adhigatuṃ śakyate tasmād avaśyaṃ śāstrādhīna eva viśiṣṭakarmāvabodha eṣitavyaḥ/
analyzed: api ca idam iṣṭa mantra ādikam evaṃphalam ayam asmin adhikṛte iti iyam iti kartavya tā eṣa deśaḥ eṣa kālaḥ ime ṛtvijaḥ iti ādi kim loka prasiddheḥ adhigatum śakyate tasmāt avaśyam śāstra adhīnaḥ eva viśiṣṭa karma avabodhaḥ eṣitavyaḥ

original: śāstraṃ ca veda evety uktam /
analyzed: śāstram ca vedaḥ eva iti uktam

original: atas tasya nirvivādasiddham eva prāmāṇyam iti //
analyzed: atas tasya nirvivāda siddham eva prāmāṇyam iti

original: evaṃ tu varṇyamāne saṃsārānāditvaṃ tāvad uktaṃ syāt /
analyzed: evam tu varṇyamāne saṃsāra anādi tvam tāvat uktam syāt

original: vedasyānāditvaṃ karmajñānānāditvāt /
analyzed: vedasya anādi tvam karma jñāna anādi tvāt

original: tataś ca mīmāṃsakavartmanaiva pramṇatā sidhyati nāptavādāt /
analyzed: tatas ca mīmāṃsaka vartmanā eva sidhyati na āpta vādāt

original: tasmādyathodāhṛta eva mārgaḥ pramānatāyām anuvartanīyaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt yathā udāhṛtaḥ eva mārgaḥ pramāna tāyām anuvartanīyaḥ

original: atha vā vayam api na na śiṣmo 'nādisaṃsārapakṣaṃ yugapadakhilasargadhvaṃsavāde tu medaḥ /
analyzed: atha vā vayam api na na śiṣmaḥ na ādi saṃsāra pakṣam yugapad akhila sarga dhvaṃsa vāde tu medaḥ

original: akathi ca racanānāṃ kāryata tena sargātprabhṛti bhagavatedaṃ vedaśāstraṃ praṇītam //
analyzed: akathi ca racanānām kāryata tena sargāt prabhṛti bhagavatā idam veda śāstram praṇītam

original: anādir eveśvarakartṛko 'pi sadaiva sargapralayaprabandhaḥ /
analyzed: anādiḥ eva īśvara kartṛkaḥ sadā eva sarga pralaya prabandhaḥ

original: sargāntareṣv eva ca karmabodhaḥ vedāntarebhyo 'pi janasya sidhyet //
analyzed: sarga antareṣu eva ca karma bodhaḥ veda antarebhyaḥ pi janasya sidhyet

original: anyatve kiṃ pramāṇaṃ nanu tava sumate kiṃ tadaikye pramāṇaṃ dhvastaṃ tāvat samastaṃ bhuvanam iti tadā vedanāśo 'py avaśyam /
analyzed: anyatve kim pramāṇam nanu tava sumate kim tad aikye pramāṇam dhvastam tāvat samastam bhuvanam iti tadā avaśyam

original: ekastvīśo 'viśiṣṭaḥ sa ca racayati vā prāktanaṃ saṃsmared vā vede svātantryam asmin niyata m ubhayathā 'py asti candrārdhamauleḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ tu īśaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ sa ca racayati vā prāktanam saṃsmaret vā vede svātantryam asmin ubhayathā pi asti candra ardha mauleḥ

original: ekasya tasya manasi pratibhāsamānaḥ vedas tadā hi kṛtakān na viśiṣyate 'sau /
analyzed: ekasya tasya manasi pratibhāsamānaḥ vedaḥ tadā hi kṛtakāt na viśiṣyate sau

original: pratyakṣasarvaviṣayasya tu neśvarasya yuktā smṛtiḥ karaṇam eva tato 'navadyam //
analyzed: pratyakṣa sarva viṣayasya tu nā īśvarasya yuktā smṛtiḥ karaṇam eva tatas navadyam

original: tenāptanirmitatayaiva niratyayārthasaṃpratyayopajananāya janasya vede /
analyzed: tena āpta nirmita tayā eva niratyaya artha saṃpratyaya upajananāya janasya vede

original: śāstraṃ suvistaraprapāstakutarkamūlamohaprapañcamakarot munirakṣapādaḥ //
analyzed: śāstram su vistara prapāsta kutarka mūla moha prapañcam akarot muniḥ akṣapādaḥ

original: atra kaścid āha yuktam itaretaravyatiṣakārthopadeśitvenaikakartṛkatvānumānadvārakaṃ trivedyāḥ prāmāṇyam /
analyzed: atra kaścid āha yuktam trivedyāḥ prāmāṇyam

original: atharvavedasya tu trayyāmnātadharmopayogānupalabdheḥ triyībāhyatvena na tatsamānayogakṣematvam //
analyzed: atharvavedasya tu trayī āmnāta dharma upayoga anupalabdheḥ triyī bāhya tvena na tad samāna yogakṣema tvam

original: anapekṣatvalakṣaṇaprāmāṇyapakṣe 'pi vikṣiptaśāstrāntaropadiṣṭaviśiṣṭajyotiṣṭomādyanekakarmānupraviṣṭahautrādhvaryāvādivyāpāravyatiṣaṅgadarśanāt tadarthā trayyeva yathā prāṇabhāvabhāginī bhavitum arhati na tathā pṛthagvyavahārā ātharvaṇaśrutiḥ //
analyzed: anapekṣa tva lakṣaṇa prāmāṇya pakṣe pi vikṣipta śāstra antara upadiṣṭa viśiṣṭa jyotiṣṭoma ādi aneka karma anupraviṣṭa hautra adhvaryāva ādi vyāpāra vyatiṣaṅga darśanāt tad arthā trayī eva yathā prāṇa bhāva bhāginī bhavitum arhati na tathā pṛthak vyavahārā ātharvaṇa śrutiḥ

original: tathā ca loke catasra imā vidyāḥ prāṇināmanugrahāya pravṛttāḥ ānvīkṣakī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītir iti prasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca loke catasraḥ imāḥ vidyāḥ prāṇinām anugrahāya pravṛttāḥ ānvīkṣakī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītiḥ iti prasiddhiḥ

original: śrutismṛtī api tadanuguṇārthe eva dṛśyete /
analyzed: śruti smṛtī api tad anuguṇa arthe eva dṛśyete

original: śrutis tāvat ṛgbhiḥ prātardiṣi deva īyate /
analyzed: śrutiḥ tāvat ṛgbhiḥ prātardiṣi devaḥ īyate

original: yajurvedena tiṣṭhati madhye 'hnaḥ /
analyzed: yajurvedena tiṣṭhati madhye hnaḥ

original: sāmāvedenāstam eti /
analyzed: sa amāvedena astam eti

original: vedair aśūnyastribhir eti sūryaḥ iti /
analyzed: vedaiḥ a śūnyaḥ tribhiḥ eti sūryaḥ iti

original: tathā prajāpatirakāmayata bahusyāṃ prajāyeyeti /
analyzed: tathā prajāpatiḥ akāmayata bahusyām prajāyeya iti

original: sa tapo 'taṇyata /
analyzed: sa tapo taṇyata

original: sa tapas taptvā/
analyzed: sa tapaḥ taptvā

original: imān lokānasmṛjata pṛthivīmantarikṣaṃ divam iti /
analyzed: imān lokān asmṛjata pṛthivīm antarikṣam divam iti

original: tān lokānabhyatapat tebhyas trīṇi jyortīṣyajāyanta /
analyzed: tān lokān abhyatapat tebhyaḥ trīṇi jyortīṣi ajāyanta

original: agnir eva pṛthivyā ajāyata vāyur antarikṣāt diva āditya iti /
analyzed: agniḥ eva pṛthivyāḥ ajāyata vāyuḥ antarikṣāt divaḥ ādityaḥ iti

original: tāni jyortīṣyabhyatapat /
analyzed: tāni jyortīṣi abhyatapat

original: tebhyas trayo vedā ajāyanta /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ trayaḥ vedāḥ ajāyanta

original: agner ṛgvedaḥ /
analyzed: agneḥ ṛgvedaḥ

original: vādayor yajurvedaḥ /
analyzed: vādayoḥ yajurvedaḥ

original: ādityātsāmavedaḥ /
analyzed: ādityāt sāmavedaḥ

original: tathā saiṣā vidyā trayī tapati iti //
analyzed: tathā sā eṣā vidyā trayī tapati iti

original: smṛtir api mānavī prativedaṃ dvādaśavārṣikabrahmacaryopadeśinī dṛśyate ṣaṭtriṃśadvārṣikaṃ caryaṃ gurau traivedikaṃ vratam iti //
analyzed: smṛtiḥ api mānavī prativedam dvādaśa vārṣika brahmacarya upadeśinī dṛśyate ṣaṭtriṃśat vārṣikam caryam gurau traivedikam vratam iti

original: śrāddhaprakaraṇe 'pi yatnena bhojayecchrāddhe bahvṛcaṃ vedapāragam /
analyzed: śrāddha prakaraṇe yatnena bhojayet śrāddhe bahu ṛcam vedapāragam

original: śākhāntagamathādhyaryuṃ chandogaṃ vā samāptigam //
analyzed: śākhā antagam atha adhyaryum chandogam vā samāpti gam

original: iti trivedapāragāneva śrāddhabhujaḥ brāhmaṇān darśayati nātharṣavedādhyāyinaḥ /
analyzed: iti tri veda pāragān eva śrāddha bhujaḥ brāhmaṇān darśayati na atha ṛṣa veda adhyāyinaḥ

original: pratyuta niṣedhaḥ kvacid upadiśayate tasmād ātharvaṇaṃ na pravṛñjayātiti //
analyzed: pratyuta niṣedhaḥ kvacid tasmāt ātharvaṇam na

original: evam ākṣepe sati kecid ācakṣate yadi yajñopayogitvaṃ nehāstyātharvaṇaśruteḥ /
analyzed: evam ākṣepe sati kecid ācakṣate yadi yajña upayogi tvam na iha asti ātharvaṇa śruteḥ

original: arthāntare pramāṇatvaṃ kenāsyāḥ pratihanyate śāntipuṣṭyabhicārārthāḥ ekabrahmartvigāśritāḥ /
analyzed: artha antare pramāṇa tvam kena asyāḥ pratihanyate śānti puṣṭi abhicāra arthāḥ eka brahma ṛtvij āśritāḥ

original: kriyās tayā pramīyante trayī vātmīyagocaraḥ iti //
analyzed: kriyāḥ tayā pramīyante trayī vā ātmīya gocaraḥ iti

original: etat tu sarvaṃ na sādhv abhidhīyate /
analyzed: etat tu sarvam na sādhu abhidhīyate

original: tathā hi tatpramāṇaṃ bādarāyaṇasyānapekṣatvāt iti ya eṣa vedaprāmāṇyādhigatau jaimininā niradeśi panthāḥ yo vā akṣapādena kaṇādena ca prakaṭitaḥ tadvacanādāmnāyaprāmāṇyam iti mantrāyurvedapramāṇyavañ ca tatprāmāṇyam āptaprāmāṇyāt iti sa caturṣv api vedeṣu tulyaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi tat pramāṇam bādarāyaṇasya anapekṣa tvāt iti yaḥ eṣa veda prāmāṇya adhigatau jaimininā niradeśi panthāḥ yaḥ vā akṣapādena kaṇādena ca prakaṭitaḥ tad vacanāt āmnāya prāmāṇyam iti mantra āyurveda pramāṇyavam ca tat prāmāṇyam āpta prāmāṇyāt iti sa caturṣu api vedeṣu tulyaḥ

original: tatra viśeṣatuṣo 'pi na kaścid atiprayatnenānviṣiṣyamāṇaḥ prāpyate /
analyzed: tatra viśeṣa tuṣaḥ pi na kaścid ati prayatnena anviṣiṣyamāṇaḥ prāpyate

original: ha hi mīmāṃsakapakṣe evaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate traṣyevānādimatī nārthavaśrutiḥ tasyāṃ kartṛsmaraṇasaṃbhavād iti //
analyzed: ha hi mīmāṃsaka pakṣe evam vaktum śakyate tasyām kartṛ smaraṇa saṃbhavāt iti

original: nāpi naiyāyikapakṣe evaṃ vaktuṃ śakyam āptapraṇītāḥ trayo vedāḥ caturthas tu nāptapraṇīta iti /
analyzed: na api naiyāyika pakṣe evam vaktum śakyam āpta praṇītāḥ trayaḥ vedāḥ caturthaḥ tu na āpta praṇītaḥ iti

original: tena prāmāṇyāṣigamopāyāṣiśeṣāt samānayogakṣematayā catvāro 'pi vedāḥ pramāṇam //
analyzed: tena prāmāṇya aṣigama upāya aṣiśeṣāt samāna yogakṣema tayā catvāraḥ pi vedāḥ pramāṇam

original: vyavahāro hi sarveṣāṃ sāretaravicāracaturacetasāṃ caturbhir api vedaiḥ caturṇāṃ varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ catasṛṣu dikṣu catugbdhimekhalayāmavanau prasiddha iti ko 'yam atrānyathātvabhramaḥ śrutismṛtimūlaścāryavartanivāsināṃ bhavati vyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ hi sarveṣām sāra itara vicāra catura cetasām caturbhiḥ api vedaiḥ caturṇām varṇānām āśramāṇām catasṛṣu dikṣu catur abdhi mekhalayām avanau prasiddhaḥ iti kaḥ yam atra anyathātva bhramaḥ śruti smṛti mūlaḥ ca ārya varta nivāsinām bhavati vyavahāraḥ

original: te ca śrutismṛtī caturo 'pi vedān samānakaṣyānabhivadataḥ /
analyzed: te ca śruti smṛtī caturaḥ pi vedān samāna kaṣya an abhivadataḥ

original: ṛgyajuśāmavedeṣv api atharvavedāṃśasīni bhūyāṃsi vacāṃsi bhavanti /
analyzed: ṛk yajuḥ śāmavedeṣu api bhūyāṃsi vacāṃsi bhavanti

original: tadyathā śatapathe atha tṛtīye 'han ity upakramya aśvamedhe pāriplavākhyāne so 'yam ātharvaṇo vedaḥ iti śrūyate /
analyzed: tat yathā śatapathe atha tṛtīye han iti upakramya aśvamedhe pāriplava ākhyāne saḥ yam ātharvaṇaḥ vedaḥ iti śrūyate

original: chāndogyopaniṣadi ca ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmaveda ātharvaṇaś caturthaḥ iti paṭhyate //
analyzed: chāndogya upaniṣadi ca ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ ātharvaṇaḥ caturthaḥ iti paṭhyate

original: nanu itihāsapurāṇaḥ pañcamaḥ iti tatra paṭhyata eva //
analyzed: nanu itihāsapurāṇaḥ pañcamaḥ iti tatra paṭhyate eva

original: kiñ cātaḥ kim iyatā 'tharvaś caturtho na bhavati vedaḥ caturthaśabdopādānāt itihāsāditulyo 'sau na vedasamānakakṣya iti cet keyaṃ kalpanā caturthaśabdopādānādapradhānye trayo vedā asṛjyanta ityādau tritvasaṃkhyopādānāt te 'pi na pradhānatām adhigaccheyuḥ /
analyzed: kim ca atas kim iyatā tharvaḥ caturthaḥ na bhavati vedaḥ caturtha śabda upādānāt itihāsa ādi tulyaḥ sau na veda samāna kakṣyaḥ iti ced kā iyam kalpanā caturtha śabda upādānāt apradhānye trayaḥ vedāḥ asṛjyanta ityādau tritva saṃkhyā upādānāt te na pradhāna tām adhigaccheyuḥ

original: itihāsādibhir vā saha parigaṇanaṃ aprādhānyakāranaṃ yad ucyate tad api sarvavedasādhāraṇam iti yat kiñcid etat //
analyzed: itihāsa ādibhiḥ vā saha parigaṇanam a prādhānya kāranam yat ucyate tat api sarva veda sādhāraṇam iti yat kiñcid etat

original: tathā śatādhyayane 'pi ṛco vai brahmaṇaḥ prāṇāḥ ity abhyupakamya ātharvaṇo vai brahmaṇaḥ samānaḥ iti paṭhyate //
analyzed: tathā śata adhyayane pi ṛcaḥ vai brahmaṇaḥ prāṇāḥ iti abhyupakamya ātharvaṇaḥ vai brahmaṇaḥ samānaḥ iti paṭhyate

original: tathā ye 'sya prāñco raśmayaḥ tā evāsya prācyo madhunāḍyaḥ ṛca eva puṣpam ity upakramya paṭhita atha ye 'syodañco raśmayaḥ tā evāsyodīcyaḥ madhunāḍyaḥ atharvāṅirasa eva madhukṛtaḥ iti //
analyzed: tathā ye sya prāñcaḥ raśmayaḥ tāḥ eva asya prācyaḥ madhunāḍyaḥ ṛcaḥ eva puṣpam iti upakramya atha ye sya udañcaḥ raśmayaḥ tāḥ eva asya udīcyaḥ madhunāḍyaḥ atharvāṅirasaḥ eva madhukṛtaḥ iti

original: tathā taittarīye tasmād vā etasmāt prāṇamayāt /
analyzed: tathā taittarīye tasmāt vai etasmāt prāṇa mayāt

original: anyo 'ntara ātmā manomayaḥ iti prastutya tasya yajur eva śiraḥ /
analyzed: anyaḥ ntare ātmā manaḥ mayaḥ iti prastutya tasya yajuḥ eva śiraḥ

original: ṛgdakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: ṛc dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: sāmottaraḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: sāma uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ

original: ādeśa ātmā /
analyzed: ādeśaḥ ātmā

original: atharvāṅgirasaḥ pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti paṭhyate //
analyzed: atharva aṅgirasaḥ puccham pratiṣṭhāḥ iti paṭhyate

original: tathā 'nyatra ṛcāṃ prācī mahatī dig ucyate /
analyzed: tathā nyatra ṛcām prācī mahatī diś ucyate

original: dakṣiṇāmāhur yajuṣām /
analyzed: dakṣiṇām āhuḥ yajuṣām

original: sāmnāmuttarām /
analyzed: sāmnām uttarām

original: atharvaṇām aṅgirasāṃ pratīcī mahatī dig ucyate iti //
analyzed: atharvaṇām aṅgirasām pratīcī mahatī diś ucyate iti

original: śatapathe brahmayajñavidhiprakrame madhyame paya āhutayo ha vā etā vedānāṃ yadṛcaḥ ity upakramya meda āhutayo ha vā etā devānāṃ yadatharvāṅgirasaḥ sa ya evaṃ vidvānatharvāṅgiraso 'harahaḥ svādhyāyamadhīte meda āhutibhir eva taddevān sa tarpayati ta enaṃ tṛptāstarpayanti iti //
analyzed: śatapathe brahmayajña vidhi prakrame madhyame payaḥ āhutayaḥ ha vai etāḥ vedānām yat ṛcaḥ iti upakramya medaḥ āhutayaḥ ha vai etāḥ devānām yat atharva aṅgirasaḥ sa yaḥ evam vidvān atharva aṅgirasaḥ harahar svādhyāyam adhīte medaḥ āhutibhiḥ eva tat devān sa tarpayati te enam tṛptāḥ tarpayanti iti

original: mantrā api tadarthaprakāśanaparā anuśrūyante tvam agne puṣkarādadhyatharvā niramanthata ity ādayaḥ /
analyzed: mantrāḥ api tad artha prakāśana parāḥ anuśrūyante tvam agne puṣkarāt adhi atharvā niramanthata iti ādayaḥ

original: na caiṣāṃ atharvā nāma kiñcidṛṣirityevaṃ prakāraṃ vyākhyānaṃ yuktam anyatrāpyasamāśvāsaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na ca eṣām atharvā nāma kiñcid ṛṣiḥ iti evam prakāram vyākhyānam yuktam anyatra api asamāśvāsa prasaṅgāt

original: ity evañjātīyakāstāvadudāhṛtāḥ śrutivācaḥ //
analyzed: iti evañjātīyakāḥ tāvat udāhṛtāḥ śruti vācaḥ

original: sṛtivākyāni khalv api /
analyzed: sṛti vākyāni khalu api

original: manustāvat śrutīratharvāṅgirasīḥ kuryād ity avicārayan iti śrutiśabdena trayīvadiha vyavaharati //
analyzed: manuḥ tāvat śrutīḥ atharva āṅgirasīḥ kuryāt iti a vicārayan iti śruti śabdena trayī vat iha vyavaharati

original: yājñavalkyaḥ caturdaśavidyāsthānani gaṇayan purāṇatarkamīmāṃsādharmaśāstrāgamiśritāḥ /
analyzed: yājñavalkyaḥ caturdaśa vidyā sthānani gaṇayan purāṇa tarka mīmāṃsā dharma śāstra āga miśritāḥ

original: vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānāṃ dharmasya ca caturdaśa iti catura eva vedānāvedayate nānyathā hi caturdeśasaṃkhyā paryate //
analyzed: vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānām dharmasya ca caturdaśa iti caturaḥ eva vedān āvedayate na anyathā hi catur deśa saṃkhyā paryate

original: smṛtyantare ca spaṣṭam evoktam aṅgāni vedāścatvāraḥ mīmāṃsānyāyavistaraḥ /
analyzed: smṛti antare ca spaṣṭam eva uktam aṅgāni vedāḥ catvāraḥ mīmāṃsā nyāya vistaraḥ

original: purāṇāṃ dharmaśāstrṃ ca vidyā hy etāś caturdaśa iti//
analyzed: purāṇām dharma śāstram ca vidyāḥ hi etāḥ caturdaśa iti

original: anyatrāpy uktam prāṇaṃ dharmaśāstraṃ mīmāṃsā nyāyaḥ catvāro vedāḥ ṣaḍaṅgānīti caturdaśa vidyāsthānāni iti //
analyzed: anyatra api uktam prāṇam dharma śāstram mīmāṃsā nyāyaḥ catvāraḥ vedāḥ ṣaḍ aṅgāni iti caturdaśa vidyā sthānāni iti

original: śātatapo 'py āha ṛksāmayajuraṅgānāṃ atharvāṅgirasām api /
analyzed: śātatapo pi āha ṛk sāma yajuḥ aṅgānām atharva aṅgirasām api

original: aṇor apy asya vijñānāt yo 'nūcānaḥ sa no mahān iti //
analyzed: aṇoḥ api asya vijñānāt yaḥ nūcānaḥ sa naḥ mahān iti

original: tathā 'nyatra catvāraścaturṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāragāḥ dharmajñāḥ pariṣat ity uktam //
analyzed: tathā nyatra catvāraḥ caturṇām vedānām pāragāḥ dharma jñāḥ pariṣad iti uktam

original: śaṅkhalikhitau ca ṛgyajuśāmārtharvavidaḥ ṣaḍaṅgavit dharmavit vākyavit naiyāyiko naiṣṭhiko brahmacārī pañcāgnir iti daśāvarā pariṣat ity ūcatuḥ //
analyzed: śaṅkha likhitau ca ṛk yaju śāmā rtharva vidaḥ ṣaḍaṅga vid dharma vid vākya vid naiyāyikaḥ naiṣṭhikaḥ brahmacārī pañca agniḥ iti daśa avarā pariṣad iti ūcatuḥ

original: prācetase catvāro vedavidaḥ dharmaśāstravid iti pañcāvarā pariṣat ity uktam //
analyzed: prācetase catvāraḥ veda vidaḥ dharmaśāstra vid iti pañca avarā pariṣad iti uktam

original: tathā ca paṅktipāvanaprastāve caturvedaṣaḍaṅgavit jyeṣṭhasāmago 'tharvāṅgiraso 'py ete paṅkitpāvanā gaṇyante /
analyzed: tathā ca paṅkti pāvana prastāve catur veda ṣaḍaṅga vid jyeṣṭhasāma gaḥ tharva aṅgirasaḥ pi ete paṅkit pāvanāḥ gaṇyante

original: tad ayam evamādivedacatuṣṭayapratiṣṭhāpraguṇa eva prācuryeṇa dharmaśāstrakārāṇāṃ vyavahāraḥ //
analyzed: tat ayam evam ādi veda catuṣṭaya pratiṣṭhā praguṇaḥ eva prācuryeṇa dharmaśāstra kārāṇām vyavahāraḥ

original: anye 'pi śāstrakārāḥ tathaiva vyavaharanto dṛśyante /
analyzed: anye pi śāstra kārāḥ tathā eva vyavaharantaḥ dṛśyante

original: tathā ca mahābhāṣyakāro bhagavān patañjaliḥ atharvavedam eva prathamam udāhṛtavān śanno devīr abhiṣṭaye iti //
analyzed: tathā ca mahābhāṣya kāraḥ bhagavān patañjaliḥ atharvavedam eva prathamam udāhṛtavān śat naḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye iti

original: mīmāṃsābhāṣyakāreṇāpi vedādhikaraṇe kāṭhakaṃ kālāpaṃ maudgalaṃ paiṣpalādakam iti yajurvedādivat atharvaveda 'pi pauṣpalādakamudājahe /
analyzed: mīmāṃsā bhāṣya kāreṇa api veda adhikaraṇe kāṭhakam kālāpam maudgalam paiṣpalādakam iti yajurveda ādi vat pauṣpalādakam udājahe

original: sarvaśāstrādhikaraṇe 'pi vedāntaraśāsvāntaravat maudgalapauṣpalādakākhye atharvaśākhe apy udāhṛtya vicāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: sarva śāstra adhikaraṇe pi maudgala pauṣpalādaka ākhye atharva śākhe api udāhṛtya vicāraḥ kṛtaḥ

original: tathā ca prathamayajño nāma caturṣu na kaścid asti ity adhikaraṇānta eva likhitam /
analyzed: tathā ca prathama yajñaḥ nāma caturṣu na kaścid asti iti adhikaraṇa ante eva likhitam

original: evaṃ śrutismṛtiviśiṣṭacāravyavahāravidāṃ atra vipratipattisaṃbhāvanaiva nāsti //
analyzed: evam śruti smṛti viśiṣṭa cāra vyavahāra vidām atra vipratipatti saṃbhāvanā eva nā asti

original: āha na brūmaḥ atharvavedo na pramāṇam iti kintu trayībāhya iti ucyate trayapīyaṃ atharvavedabāhyaiva /
analyzed: āha na brūmaḥ atharvavedaḥ na pramāṇam iti kintu trayī bāhyaḥ iti ucyate atharvaveda bāhyā eva

original: na kevalam evaṃ trayyām api parasparabāhyatvam asty eva ṛksāmabāhyāni yajūṃṣi yajusmāmabāhyā ṛcaḥ ṛgyajurbāhyāni sāmānīti kiyānayaṃ dosaḥ sarvabhāvānām itaretarasāṅkarye saditatvāt /
analyzed: na kevalam evam trayyām api paraspara bāhya tvam asti eva ṛk sāma bāhyāni yajūṃṣi yajuḥ māma bāhyāḥ ṛcaḥ ṛk yajuḥ bāhyāni sāmāni iti kiyān ayam dosaḥ sarva bhāvānām itaretara sāṅkarye sadita tvāt

original: ye hi śabdātmānaḥ granthasandarbhasvabhāvāḥ ye ca tad abhidheyā arthasvabhāvāḥ te sarve 'nyonyasaṃmiśritātmāna eva /
analyzed: ye hi śabda ātmānaḥ grantha sandarbha svabhāvāḥ ye ca tat abhidheyāḥ artha svabhāvāḥ te sarve nyonya saṃmiśrita ātmānaḥ eva

original: na ca pareṇātmānaṃ saṃmiśriyanto 'pi te svarūpam apahārayantīti //
analyzed: na ca pareṇa ātmānam saṃmiśriyantaḥ pi te sva rūpam apahārayanti iti

original: athocyeta nedṛśaṃ trayībāhyatvam atharvavede vivakṣitam api tu yad eṣa na trayīpratyayaṃ karmopadiśati na tatsambaddhaṃ kiñcid iti tad asya trayībāhyatvam iti etad api na sādhūpariṣṭam iṣṭipaśvekāhāhīnasatrādikarmaṇāṃ tatropadeśadarśanāt /
analyzed: athā ucyeta na īdṛśam trayī bāhya tvam atharvavede vivakṣitam api tu yat eṣa na trayī pratyayam karma upadiśati na tad sambaddham kiñcid iti tat asya trayī bāhya tvam iti etat api na sādhu upariṣṭam iṣṭi paśu ekāha ahīna satra ādi karmaṇām tatra upadeśa darśanāt

original: sarvaśākhāpratyayam ekaṃ karma iti nyānāt /
analyzed: sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam karma iti nyānāt

original: trayyupadiṣṭe 'pi karmaṇi sambaddham atharvavedāt kim api lamyata eva //
analyzed: trayī upadiṣṭe pi karmaṇi sambaddham atharvavedāt kim api lamyate eva

original: nanu bhavati sarvaśākhāpratyayam ekaṃ karma /
analyzed: nanu bhavati sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam karma

original: tatpunaḥ trivedīsambaddhasarvaśāstrāpratyayam eva nātharvaśāskhāpratyayaṃ yataḥ somayāgādikarmaṇāṃ ṛgvedena hrautraṃ yajurvedanādhvaryavaṃ samāvedenaudgātraṃ kiyate nātharvavedena kiñcid iti tad ayuktam atharvavedena brahmatvasya karaṇāt /
analyzed: tat punar trivedī sambaddha sarva śāstrā pratyayam eva na atharva śāskhā pratyayam yatas soma yāga ādi karmaṇām ṛgvedena hrautram yajurvedanā ādhvaryavam samāvedena audgātram kiyate na atharvavedena kiñcid iti tat ayuktam atharvavedena brahmatvasya karaṇāt

original: tathā ca gopathabrāhmaṇam prajāpatis somena yakṣyamāṇo vedānuvāca /
analyzed: tathā ca gopathabrāhmaṇam prajāpatiḥ somena yakṣyamāṇaḥ vedān uvāca

original: kaṃ vo hotāraṃ vṛṇīyam iti iti prakamya tasmād ṛgvidam eva hotāraṃ vṛṇīṣva sa hi hautraṃ veda yajurvidam evādhvaryuṃ vṛṇīṣva sa hi ādhvaryavaṃ veda sāmavidam evodgātāraṃ vṛṇīṣva sa hi audgātraṃ veda atharvāṅgirovidam eva brahmāṇaṃ vṛṇīṣva sa hi brahmatvaṃ veda ity abhidhāya punar āha atha cetraivaṃvidhaṃ hotrāraṃ adhvaryumudgātāraṃ brahmāḥaṃ vā vṛṇute purastād eva vaiṣāṃ yajño ricyata iti tasmād ṛgvidam eva hotāraṃ kuryāt yajurvidam evādhvaryuṃ sāmavidam evodgātāraṃ atharvāṅgirovidam eva brahmāṇam iti /
analyzed: kam vaḥ hotāram vṛṇīyam iti iti prakamya tasmāt ṛk vidam eva hotāram vṛṇīṣva sa hi hautram veda yajuḥ vidam eva adhvaryum vṛṇīṣva sa hi ādhvaryavam veda sāma vidam eva udgātāram vṛṇīṣva sa hi audgātram veda atharva aṅgiraḥ vidam eva brahmāṇam vṛṇīṣva sa hi brahmatvam veda iti abhidhāya punar āha atha cetra evaṃvidham hotrāram adhvaryum udgātāram vā vṛṇute purastāt eva vā eṣām yajñaḥ ricyate iti tasmāt ṛk vidam eva hotrāram adhvar

original: tathā yadūnaṃ ca viriṣṭaṃ ca yātayāmaṃ ca karoti tadatharvaṇāṃ tejasā pratyāpyāyayet iti narte bhṛgvaṅgirobhyaḥ somaḥ pātavayaḥ iti //
analyzed: tathā yat ūnam ca viriṣṭam ca yātayāmam ca karoti tat atharvaṇām tejasā pratyāpyāyayet iti narte bhṛgu aṅgirobhyaḥ somaḥ pātavayaḥ iti

original: nanv etāḥ śrutīḥ atharvāṇa evādhīyate nānye trayīvidaḥ /
analyzed: nanu etāḥ śrutīḥ atharvāṇaḥ eva adhīyate na anye trayī vidaḥ

original: te tv evaṃ paṭhanti yadṛcā hautraṃ kriyate yajuṣā ''dhvaryavaṃ sāmnā audgātraṃ atha kena brahmatvaṃ kriyate iti trayyā vidyate brūyāt iti /
analyzed: te tu evam paṭhanti yat ṛcā hautram kriyate yajuṣā dhvaryavam sāmnā audgātram atha kena brahmatvam kriyate iti trayyā vidyate brūyāt iti

original: tathā ca tadṛccaiva hautramakurvata yajuṣā ''dhvaryavaṃ sāmnaudgātraṃ yad eva trayyai vidyāyai śukraṃ tena brahmatvam iti ucyate vayam apy evam ādīni vākyāni na nādhīmahi /
analyzed: tathā ca tat ṛc ca eva hautram akurvata yajuṣā dhvaryavam sāmnā audgātram yat eva trayyai vidyāyai śukram tena brahmatvam iti ucyate vayam api evam ādīni vākyāni na na adhīmahi

original: kiṃ tv eṣām ayam evārthaḥ atharvāṅgirovid eva brahmeti /
analyzed: kim tu eṣām ayam eva arthaḥ atharva aṅgiraḥ vid eva brahma iti

original: katham yato na trayī nāma kim api vastvantaram api tu trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ samāhāra iti /
analyzed: katham yatas na trayī nāma kim api vastu antaram api tu trayāṇām vedānām samāhāraḥ iti

original: samāhāraś ca samāhriyamāṇaniṣṭo bhavati /
analyzed: samāhāraḥ ca samāhriyamāṇa niṣṭaḥ bhavati

original: samāhriyamāṇāś ca ṛgvedādayaḥ trayaḥ hautrādiparatvena caritārthāḥ na punas tatra bhedam arhanti /
analyzed: samāhriyamāṇāḥ ca ṛgveda ādayaḥ trayaḥ hautra ādi para tvena caritārthāḥ na punar tatra bhedam arhanti

original: ekaikaśaḥ caritārthānāṃ samudāyo 'pi caritārtha eva /
analyzed: ekaikaśas caritārthānām samudāyaḥ pi caritārthaḥ eva

original: samudāyabuddhau hi vibhajyamānāyāṃ samudāyina eva sphuranti nāvayavivadarthāntaram te cānyatra vyāpṛtāḥ //
analyzed: samudāya buddhau hi vibhajyamānāyām samudāyinaḥ eva sphuranti na avayavi vat artha antaram te ca anyatra vyāpṛtāḥ

original: kiṃ tu khalu ṛgvedādīnāṃ brahmatvaṃ kurvatāmatibhāro bhavati na brūmaḥ atibhāra iti /
analyzed: kim tu khalu ṛgveda ādīnām brahmatvam kurvatām atibhāraḥ bhavati na brūmaḥ atibhāraḥ iti

original: kintu tryātmakatvena brahmatvakartavyatopadiśyate /
analyzed: kintu tri ātmaka tvena brahmatva kartavyatā upadiśyate

original: tryātmakaścānyatamo 'pi tebhyo na bhavati vedaḥ /
analyzed: tri ātmakaḥ ca anyatamaḥ u pi tebhyaḥ na bhavati vedaḥ

original: atharvavedas tu tryātmaka eva /
analyzed: atharvavedaḥ tu tri ātmakaḥ eva

original: tatra hi ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmānīti trīṇy api santi /
analyzed: tatra hi ṛcaḥ yajūṃṣi sāmāni iti trīṇi api santi

original: tena brahmatvaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ trayyā kṛtaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: tena brahmatvam kriyamāṇam trayyā kṛtam bhavati

original: nanu yastrīn vedānadhīte tena cet brahmatvaṃ kriyeta tatkiṃ trayyā na kṛtaṃ bhavati bāḍham ity ucyate so 'pi ekasmai vā kāmāyā 'nye jajñakratavaḥ samādhīyante sarvebhyo jyotiṣṭomaḥ sarvebhyo darśapūrṇamāsau iti śrutāv api yogasiddhyadhikaraṇanyāyena asyatamam eva buddhāvādhāya vidadhyāt na samudāyaṃ buddhāvāropayituṃ śaknuyāt ity ekenaiva tatkṛtaṃ bhavati na trayyeti //
analyzed: nanu yaḥ trīn vedān adhīte tena ced brahmatvam kriyeta tat kim trayyā na kṛtam bhavati bāḍham iti ucyate ekasmai vā kāmāyai nye jajña kratavaḥ samādhīyante sarvebhyaḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ sarvebhyaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau iti śrutau api yoga siddhi adhikaraṇa nyāyena asyatamam eva buddhau ādhāya vidadhyāt na samudāyam buddhau āropayitum śaknuyāt iti ekena eva tat kṛtam bhavati na trayyā iti

original: nanu anye 'pi trayātmakā vedāḥ yad evaṃ sutarāmatharvavedo na pṛthak karaṇīyaḥ sarveṣāṃ rūpāviśeṣāt /
analyzed: nanu anye traya ātmakāḥ vedāḥ yat evam sutarām atharvavedaḥ na pṛthak karaṇīyaḥ sarveṣām rūpa aviśeṣāt

original: teṣāṃ pṛthak pratiṣṭhaīḥ savaiḥ svaiḥ ṛgādibhir eva vyapadeśa iti na te samudāyaśabdavyapadeśyāḥ //
analyzed: teṣām pṛthak savaiḥ svaiḥ ṛk ādibhiḥ eva vyapadeśaḥ iti na te samudāya śabda vyapadeśyāḥ

original: yat tu vākyāntare trayyai vidyāyai śukraṃ tena brahmatvam iti tatreyaṃ caturthī ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāne prayuktā /
analyzed: yat tu vākya antare trayyai vidyāyai śukram tena brahmatvam iti tatra iyam caturthī ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāne prayuktā

original: śukram iti sāramācakṣate /
analyzed: śukram iti sāram ācakṣate

original: tena trayīvidyāyāḥ sāreṇa brahmatvaṃ kriyata ity uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tena trayī vidyāyāḥ sāreṇa brahmatvam kriyate iti uktam bhavati

original: na ca trayyeva trayyāḥ śukraṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na ca trayī eva trayyāḥ śukram bhavati

original: na cātyantaṃ tato 'tharvāntaram eva /
analyzed: na ca atyantam tharva antaram eva

original: tenedam atharvavedātmakam eva trayyāḥ śukram iti manyāmahe /
analyzed: tena idam atharvaveda ātmakam eva trayyāḥ śukram iti manyāmahe

original: tryātmakatvād iti manyāmahe /
analyzed: tri ātmaka tvāt iti manyāmahe

original: tryātmakatvād iti śukram iti ca guhyam āhuḥ /
analyzed: tri ātmaka tvāt iti śukram iti ca guhyam āhuḥ

original: atharvaśabdo 'pi rahasyavacanaḥ /
analyzed: atharva śabdaḥ pi rahasya vacanaḥ

original: yajñātharvāṇaṃ vaidikasyā iṣṭayaḥ iti /
analyzed: yajñātharvāṇam vaidikasya iṣṭayaḥ iti

original: tena ayī śukrarūpeṇātharvavedena brahmatvam itīttham atharvavedasya na trayībāhyatvam /
analyzed: tena śukra rūpeṇa atharvavedena brahmatvam iti ittham atharvavedasya na trayī bāhya tvam

original: itthaṃ sarvaśākhapratyayam ekaṃ karma ity atra na sarvasabdaḥ saṅkocito bhavati //
analyzed: ittham sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam karma iti atra na sarva sabdaḥ saṅkocitaḥ bhavati

original: ata eva brahmavedaḥ atharvaveda iti pūrvottarabrāhmaḥe paṭhyate ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmavedo brahmavedaḥ iti /
analyzed: atas eva brahmavedaḥ atharvavedaḥ iti paṭhyate ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ brahmavedaḥ iti

original: tathā ca kāṭhakaśatādhyayane brāhmaṇe brahmaudane śrūyate brahmavādino vadanti purodhā audvālakirāruṇim uvāca brahmaṇe tvā prāṇāya juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi brahmaṇe tvā vyānāya juṣṭaṃ nirvaṇāmi ity upakramya ātharvaṇau vai prabmaṇaḥ samāno 'tharvaṇam evaitajuṣṭaṃ nirvapati catuśśarāvo bhavati catvāro hīme vedāḥ tāneva bhāginaḥ karoti mūlaṃ vai brahmaṇo vedāḥ vedānām etanmūlaṃ yadṛtvijaḥ prāśnanti tadbrahmaudanasya brahmaudanatvam iti //
analyzed: tathā ca kāṭhaka śata adhyayane brāhmaṇe brahmaudane śrūyate brahma vādinaḥ vadanti purodhāḥ audvālakiḥ āruṇim uvāca brahmaṇe tvā prāṇāya juṣṭam nirvapāmi brahmaṇe tvā vyānāya juṣṭam nirvaṇāmi iti upakramya ātharvaṇau vai prabmaṇaḥ eva etad juṣṭam nirvapati catur śarāvaḥ bhavati catvāraḥ hi ime vedāḥ tān eva bhāginaḥ karoti mūlam vai brahmaṇaḥ vedāḥ vedānām etat mūlam yat ṛtvijaḥ prāśnanti tat brahmaudanasya brahmaudan

original: tathā sāmavede pṛṣṭasya caturve 'hanyārbhave pavamāne atharvaṇe sāmno gānaṃ yat tadvidhāne śrūyate caturvidham ātharvaṇaṃ bhavati catūrātrasya vṛttyai catuṣpadāmānuṣṭubhā 'nuṣṭubhamevaitadaddaryaścaturthaṃ meṣajaṃ vā 'tharvaṇaṃ taddhi bhaiṣajyam eva tatkaroty ātharvaṇāni yāgabheṣajāni ity etad ālambaneyaṃ stutiḥ /
analyzed: tathā sāmavede pṛṣṭasya meṣajam vā ātharvaṇam tat hi bhaiṣajyam eva tat karoti ātharvaṇāni yāga bheṣajāni iti etat ālambanā iyam stutiḥ

original: ata eva prāguktaṃ yajñe yadūnaṃ ca viriṣṭaṃ ca yātayāmaṃ ca karoti tadatharvaṇāṃ tejasā '' pyāyayati iti /
analyzed: atas eva prāc uktam yajñe yat ūnam ca viriṣṭam ca yātayāmam ca karoti tat atharvaṇām tejasā pyāyayati iti

original: tasmād ātharvaṇa eva brahmeti /
analyzed: tasmāt ātharvaṇaḥ eva brahma iti

original: etac ca śāstrāntare vistareṇābhiyuktaiḥ yuktibhir upapāditam iti nehātyantāya pratāyate //
analyzed: etat ca śāstra antare vistareṇa abhiyuktaiḥ yuktibhiḥ upapāditam iti na iha atyantāya pratāyate

original: yat tu nātharvaṇena pravṛñjyāt iti tat kalpasūtravākyatvāt vedaviruddham ity anādṛtam /
analyzed: yat tu na ātharvaṇena pravṛñjyāt iti tat kalpasūtra vākya tvāt veda viruddham iti an ādṛtam

original: athāpi śrautam idaṃ vākyaṃ tadā 'pi prakaraṇādhītaṃ cet tatraiva kvacit karmaṇi niveksyate /
analyzed: athā api śrautam idam vākyam tadā pi prakaraṇa adhītam ced tatra eva kvacid karmaṇi niveksyate

original: anārabhyavādapakṣe 'pi pūrvoktavākyavisadṛśārthatvāt atharvavedasya ca trayyabāhyatvena śparkaparihārānarhatvāt niyataviṣayam eva vyākyāsyate //
analyzed: anārabhya vāda pakṣe pi pūrva ukta vākya visadṛśa artha tvāt atharvavedasya ca trayī abāhya tvena śparka parihāra anarha tvāt niyata viṣayam eva vyākyāsyate

original: yad apy ucyate uccair ṛcā kriyate uccas sāmnāmnopāṃśu yajuṣā itivat atharvadharmo 'pi na kaścid āmnāta iti tad apy asāram maṃtradharmo hy ayam upadiśyate na vedadharmaḥ /
analyzed: yat api ucyate uccais ṛcā kriyate uccaḥ sāmnā āmnā upāṃśu yajuṣā itivat atharva dharmaḥ u pi na kaścid āmnātaḥ iti tat api asāram maṃtra dharmaḥ hi ayam upadiśyate na veda dharmaḥ

original: mantrabrāhmaṇasamudāyasvabhāvā hi catvāra ime vedapranthāḥ /
analyzed: mantra brāhmaṇa samudāya svabhāvāḥ hi catvāraḥ ime veda pranthāḥ

original: mantrās tu vastuto gadyapadyabhedāt dvividhā eva /
analyzed: mantrāḥ tu vastutas gadya padya bhedāt dvividhāḥ eva

original: gadyabandho yajur ucyate padmavandhaḥ ṛg iti /
analyzed: gadya bandhaḥ yajuḥ ucyate padma vandhaḥ ṛc iti

original: gītinibandhanaṃ tu bhedāntaraṃ sāmeti /
analyzed: gīti nibandhanam tu bheda antaram sāma iti

original: ata eva jaimininā mantranibhāgaṃ prastutya teṣām ṛgyatrārthavaśena pādavyavasthā gītiṣu sāmākhyā śeṣe yajuśābdaḥ ittham eva teṣāṃ taividhyam upapāditam /
analyzed: atas eva jaimininā mantra nibhāgam prastutya teṣām ṛk yatra artha vaśena pāda vyavasthā gītiṣu sāma ākhyā śeṣe yaju śābdaḥ ittham eva teṣām taividhyam upapāditam

original: teṣām eva cāyam uccastvādidharmaḥ na vedaśabdavacyānāṃ mantrabrāhmaṇasamudāyātmanāṃ granthanām /
analyzed: teṣām eva ca ayam uccaḥ tva ādi dharmaḥ na veda śabda vacyānām mantra brāhmaṇa samudāya ātmanām

original: atharvavede 'pīyaṃ trividhaiva mantrajātir iti tatrāpīdaṃ dharmajātam upadiṣṭaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: atharvavede pi iyam trividhā eva mantra jātiḥ iti tatra api idam dharma jātam upadiṣṭam bhavati

original: mantravibhāgakṛta eva 'yaṃ trayīvyapadeśa iti /
analyzed: mantra vibhāga kṛtaḥ eva yam trayī vyapadeśaḥ iti

original: ataś ca saiṣā trayī vidyā tapati ity ādyapi na virotsyate /
analyzed: atas ca sā eṣā trayī vidyā tapati iti ādi api na virotsyate

original: evaṃ ṛgyajuśāmasamudāyātmakamantropavandhāt trayyantargataścātharvavedaḥ /
analyzed: evam ṛk yajuḥ śāma samudāya ātmaka mantra upavandhāt trayī antargataḥ ca atharvavedaḥ

original: pṛthagvyavasthitagranthasandarbhasvabhāvatvāc ca bhinnaḥ sa iti siddham //
analyzed: pṛthak vyavasthita grantha sandarbha svabhāva tvāt ca bhinnaḥ saḥ iti siddham

original: anye punaḥ ṛkpracuratvāt praviralayajurvākyatvāt agīyamānasāmamantratāvaśāc ca ṛgvedam evātharvavedam ācakṣate /
analyzed: anye punar ṛk pracura tvāt pravirala yajuḥ vākya tvāt a gīyamāna sāma mantra tā vaśāt ca ṛgvedam eva atharvavedam ācakṣate

original: ayam pai pakṣo 'stu na kaścid virodhaḥ //
analyzed: ayam pai pakṣaḥ stu na kaścid virodhaḥ

original: yat punar abhidhīyate vedaśabdaḥ trayāṇām eva vācakaḥ na caturthasyeti so 'yam atyutkaṣto dveṣaḥ /
analyzed: yat punar abhidhīyate veda śabdaḥ trayāṇām eva vācakaḥ na caturthasya iti saḥ yam ati utkaṣtaḥ dveṣaḥ

original: vṛddhavyavahāro hy atra pramāṇam /
analyzed: vṛddha vyavahāraḥ hi atra pramāṇam

original: vedo 'yam brāhmaṇo 'yam iti tatra tatra vedaśabde uccārite catvāro 'pi pratīyante /
analyzed: vedaḥ yam brāhmaṇaḥ yam iti tatra tatra veda śabde uccārite catvāraḥ pi pratīyante

original: vedo mayā 'dhītaḥ iti vadantaṃ pṛcchanti vyavahartāraḥ katam astvayā 'dhīto vedaḥ iti /
analyzed: vedaḥ mayā dhītaḥ iti vadantam pṛcchanti vyavahartāraḥ as tvayā dhītaḥ vedaḥ iti

original: sa āha atharvavedaḥ iti /
analyzed: sa āha atharvavedaḥ iti

original: na tam evam ākṣipanti nāsau vedaḥ yastvayā paṭhitaḥ iti /
analyzed: na tam evam ākṣipanti na asau vedaḥ yaḥ tvayā paṭhitaḥ iti

original: sopapado 'tharvaveda vedaśabda iti cet vedāntareṣv api tulyam etat ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ iti /
analyzed: veda śabdaḥ iti ced veda antareṣu api tulyam etat ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ iti

original: nirupapado 'pi teṣu vedaśabdaḥ prayujyata iti cet tad itaratrāpi samānam ity uktam /
analyzed: nirupapadaḥ api teṣu veda śabdaḥ prayujyate iti ced tat itaratra api samānam iti uktam

original: caturvedādhyāyī bharadvāja iti ca prasiddham eva /
analyzed: catur veda adhyāyī bharadvājaḥ iti ca prasiddham eva

original: sarvathā tu sopapada evāyurvedādiṣu vedaśabda iti na tattulyakakṣyatā 'dhikṣepakṣetratām atharvavedo netavyaḥ //
analyzed: sarvathā tu sa upapadaḥ evā āyurveda ādiṣu veda śabdaḥ iti na tad tulya kakṣya tā dhikṣepa kṣetra tām atharvavedaḥ netavyaḥ

original: brahmayajñavidhiś ca śrautaḥ caturṣv apy aviśiṣṭa ity uktam /
analyzed: brahmayajña vidhiḥ ca śrautaḥ caturṣu api a viśiṣṭaḥ iti uktam

original: smārto 'pi tathāvidha evāsti /
analyzed: smārtaḥ pi tathāvidhaḥ eva asti

original: yathā ''ha yājñavalkyaḥ medasā tarpayeddevān atharvāṅgirasaḥ paṭhan /
analyzed: yathā ha yājñavalkyaḥ medasā tarpayet devān atharva aṅgirasaḥ paṭhan

original: pit•ṃś ca madhusarpirbhyāṃ anvahaṃ śaktito dvijaḥ iti sāṃpradāyikamadhyāpanādhyayanādi sarvam abhinnam evetyalaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: pitṛ ca madhu sarpirbhyām anvaham śaktitaḥ dvijaḥ iti sāṃpradāyikam adhyāpana adhyayana ādi sarvam abhinnam eva iti alam prasaṅgena

original: tena pramāṇatāyāṃ vedasvādhyāyaśabdavācyatve puruṣārthasādhanavidhāv api catvāraḥ samā vedaḥ //
analyzed: tena pramāṇa tāyām veda svādhyāya śabda vācya tve puruṣa artha sādhana vidhau api catvāraḥ samāḥ vedaḥ

original: yadi punaḥ auttarādharyeṇa vinā na parituṣyate tat atharvaveda eva prathamaḥ tataḥ paramasya maṃtrasya brahmaṇaḥ praṇavasyābhivyakteḥ /
analyzed: yadi punar auttarādharyeṇa vinā na parituṣyate tat atharvavedaḥ eva prathamaḥ tatas paramasya maṃtrasya brahmaṇaḥ praṇavasya abhivyakteḥ

original: tathā ca śruti brahma ha vā imam agra āsīt ity upakramya ātharvaṇaṃ vedam abhyaśrāmyadabhyatapat samatapattasmācchāntāt taptāt santaptāt om iti mana evordhvam akṣaramudakrāmat ityādi /
analyzed: tathā ca śruti brahma ha vai imam agre āsīt iti upakramya ātharvaṇam vedam abhyaśrāmyat abhyatapat samatapat tasmāt śāntāt taptāt santaptāt om iti manaḥ eva ūrdhvam akṣaram udakrāmat ityādi

original: tathā mahāvyāhṛtīnāṃ śākhāntaraprasiddhānāṃ aprasiddhānāṃ ca bṛhad ityādīnāṃ tata evotthānam //
analyzed: tathā mahāvyāhṛtīnām śākhā antara prasiddhānām aprasiddhānām ca bṛhat ityādīnām tatas eva utthānam

original: atharvavedakṛtopanayanasaṃskārasya vedāntarādhyayanam aviruddham /
analyzed: atharvaveda kṛta upanayana saṃskārasya veda antara adhyayanam aviruddham

original: anyavedopanīyamanasya tu nātharvaṇopanayanasaṃskāram aprpitasyātharvavedādhyayane 'dhikāraḥ /
analyzed: anya veda upanīya manasya tu na ātharvaṇa upanayana saṃskāram a prpitasya atharvaveda adhyayane dhikāraḥ

original: tad uktam bhṛgvaṅgirovidā saṃskṛto 'nyān vedānadhīyīta nānyatra saṃskṛto bhṛgaṅgiraso 'dhīyīta iti /
analyzed: tat uktam bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ vidā saṃskṛtaḥ nyān vedān adhīyīta na anyatra saṃskṛtaḥ bhṛgu aṅgirasaḥ dhīyīta iti

original: trayyekaśaraṇair api caitadavaśyāśrayaṇīyaṃ atharvavedavihitaṃ svakarmabhraṃśe prāyaścittamācaradbhir ity athrvaveda eva jyāyān //
analyzed: trayī eka śaraṇaiḥ api ca etat avaśya āśrayaṇīyam atharvaveda vihitam sva karma bhraṃśe prāyaścittam ācaradbhiḥ iti athrvavedaḥ eva jyāyān

original: yat tu mānavaṃ vākyam udāhrtaṃ paṭtriṃśadāvdikaṃ tat trivedādhyayanaviṣayaṃ vaikalpikam /
analyzed: yat tu mānavam vākyam udāhrtam paṭtriṃśat āvdikam tat tri veda adhyayana viṣayam vaikalpikam

original: vedānadhītya vedau vā vedaṃ vā 'pi yathākramam iti ekasmin vede dvādaśavarṣāṇi vratam dvayoḥ caturviṃśatiḥ trayāṇāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśad iti /
analyzed: vedān adhītya vedau vā vedam vā yathākramam iti ekasmin vede dvādaśa varṣāṇi vratam dvayoḥ caturviṃśatiḥ trayāṇām ṣaṭtriṃśat iti

original: yas tu caturo vedanadhīte tasya aṣṭacatvāriṃśadvarṣam vedabrahmacaryam upāsīta iti smṛtyantaram asti na ca tadāryairnādṛtam /
analyzed: yaḥ tu caturaḥ vedan adhīte tasya aṣṭacatvāriṃśat varṣam veda brahmacaryam upāsīta iti smṛti antaram asti na ca tad āryaiḥ na ādṛtam

original: tatra trivedādhyāyinām eva prativarṣaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāṇi vrataṃ cared iti vyākhyānam asaṅgatam upakramavirodhāt anupayogāc ca /
analyzed: tatra tri veda adhyāyinām eva prativarṣam ṣoḍaśa varṣāṇi vratam caret iti vyākhyānam asaṅgatam upakrama virodhāt anupayogāt ca

original: tena vedāntarādhyayanakṛta evāyaṃ vikalpavidhiḥ na dvādaśaṣodaśavarṣāpekṣa ity anādaro 'py asyāṃ smṛtau kṛṣṇakeśo 'gnīnādadhīta iti śrutivirodhakṛtaḥ nātharvavedādhyayanaparyudāsam eva viṣayīkaroti na ca vedāntarādhyayanaviṣedham iti atrāpi na viśeṣahetur asti /
analyzed: tena veda antara adhyayana kṛtaḥ eva ayam vikalpa vidhiḥ na dvādaśa ṣodaśa varṣa apekṣaḥ iti anādaraḥ pi asyām smṛtau kṛṣṇa keśaḥ gnīn ādadhīta iti śruti virodha kṛtaḥ na atharvaveda adhyayana paryudāsam eva viṣayīkaroti na ca veda antara adhyayana viṣedham iti atra api na viśeṣa hetuḥ asti

original: triṣu vedeṣv idaṃ vratam na punar eṣv eva triṣv iti niyāmakaṃ vacanam asti //
analyzed: triṣu vedeṣu idam vratam na punar eṣu eva triṣu iti niyāmakam vacanam asti

original: yad api śrāddhaprakaraṇe yatnena bhojayet iti trivedipāragaparikīrtanaṃ tat vedapāragam iti śākhāntagam iti samāptigam iti viśeṣaṇapadaparyālocanayā ṛgvedādyekadeśādhyāyināmanadhikāram eva śrāddhe sūcayet /
analyzed: yat api śrāddha prakaraṇe yatnena bhojayet iti tri vedi pāraga parikīrtanam tat vedapāragam iti śākhā anta gam iti samāpti gam iti viśeṣaṇa pada paryālocanayā ṛgveda ādi eka deśa adhyāyinām anadhikāram eva śrāddhe sūcayet

original: atharvaṇas tu atharvaśiro 'dhyayanamātralabdhapaṅktipāvanabhāvasyaikadeśapāṭhino 'pi tatrādhikāra upapadyate /
analyzed: atharvaṇaḥ tu atharvaśiraḥ dhyayana mātra labdha paṅkti pāvana bhāvasya eka deśa pāṭhinaḥ tatra adhikāraḥ upapadyate

original: darśitaṃ cātharvaśirodhyayanamātrād api piṅktipāvanaś ca śrāddhabhojane 7nadhikṛta iti vipratiṣiddham //
analyzed: darśitam ca atharvaśiraḥ adhyayana mātrāt api piṅkti pāvanaḥ ca śrāddha bhojane na adhikṛtaḥ iti vipratiṣiddham

original: yas tu jyeṣṭhasāmagastrimadhustrisuparṇikaḥ iti vedāntaraikadeśādhyāyinām api śrāddhabhojanābhyanujñānaṃ tata anukalparūpam iva bhāti prathamakalpena samagravedādhyayanopadeśād iti /
analyzed: yaḥ tu jyeṣṭhasāma gaḥ trimadhuḥ trisuparṇikaḥ iti veda antara eka deśa adhyāyinām api śrāddha bhojana abhyanujñānam tata anukalpa rūpam iva bhāti prathama kalpena samagra veda adhyayana upadeśāt iti

original: tasmāt nātharvaviṣedhārtham etadvākyam iti //
analyzed: tasmāt na atharva viṣedha artham etat vākyam iti

original: tad evam avasthite yat vārtikakāreṇa bhayād iva dveṣād iva mohād iva sānukampam iva idam ucyate yadi yajñopayogitvam ityādi tadahṛdayaṅgamam atharvavede ppūrvottarabrāhmaṇe vispaṣṭaṃ iṣṭipaśvāhāhīnasatrāṇām upadeśāt /
analyzed: tat evam avasthite yat vārtikakāreṇa bhayāt iva dveṣāt iva mohāt iva sa anukampam iva idam ucyate yadi yajña upayogi tvam ityādi tat ahṛdayaṅgamam atharvavede vispaṣṭam iṣṭi paśu āha ahīna satrāṇām upadeśāt

original: vedāntareṣu taccodanābhāvāt kim atharvavede tadupadeśeteti cet subhāpitam idam evam api hi vaktuṃ śakyaṃ atharvavede taccodanāyā darśanāt kiṃ vedāntareṣu tadupadeśana iti //
analyzed: veda antareṣu tad codanā bhāvāt kim atharvavede tat upadeśeta iti ced su bhāpitam idam evam api hi vaktum śakyam atharvavede tad codanāyāḥ darśanāt kim veda antareṣu tad upadeśane iti

original: na ca jāne kasyaiṣa parṣanuyogaḥ kiṃ nityasya vedasya kiṃ vā tatpraṇeturīśvarasya iti /
analyzed: na ca jāne kasya eṣa kim nityasya vedasya kim vā tad praṇetuḥ īśvarasya iti

original: dvāv api tāv aparyanuyojyāvityuktam /
analyzed: dvau api tau a paryanuyojyau iti uktam

original: arthāntaraśantipuṣṭyabhicārādivedāntareṣv api na na dṛśyate /
analyzed: artha antara śanti puṣṭi abhicāra ādi veda antareṣu api na na dṛśyate

original: śyano hi sāmaveda utpannaḥ adbhutaśāntyādayaś ca yajurveda iti tad api samānam //
analyzed: śyanaḥ hi sāmavede utpannaḥ adbhutaśānti ādayaḥ ca yajurvede iti tat api samānam

original: ekavrahamartvigāśritā ity etad api na satyam /
analyzed: eka vraham a ṛtvij āśritāḥ iti etat api na satyam

original: yata evaṃ tatra paṭhyate dve yajñavṛtī bhavataḥ vaihārikī ca pākayajñavṛttiśceti /
analyzed: yatas evam tatra paṭhyate dve yajña vṛtī bhavataḥ vaihārikī ca pākayajña vṛttiḥ ca iti

original: tatra vaihārikī nāma anekartvigāśritanāṃ ekakriyāṇām upadeśaḥśrutau /
analyzed: tatra vaihārikī nāma aneka ṛtvij āśrita nām eka kriyāṇām upadeśaḥ śrutau

original: ekavrahmartvigāśritāstu śāntyādikriyāḥ smṛtāvityabhūmijñoktir eṣā //
analyzed: eka vrahma ṛtvij āśritāḥ tu śānti ādi kriyāḥ smṛtau iti abhūmi jña uktiḥ eṣā

original: trayyeva ātmīyagocaretyetad api paramamādhyamsthyam /
analyzed: trayī eva ātmīya gocarā iti etat api parama mādhyamsthyam

original: na hy ātmīyaḥ erakīyo vākaścid asti vedārthah sarvaśākhāpratyayatvād ekasya karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: na hi ātmīyaḥ erakīyaḥ vā a kaścid asti veda arthaḥ sarva śākhā pratyaya tvāt ekasya karmaṇaḥ

original: tasmāt samānayogakṣematvāt sarvavedanāṃ ekasya tataḥ pṛthakkaranaṃ vedanindāprāyaścittanirmayadhiyām eva cetasi parisphurati na sādhūnāmityuparamyate //
analyzed: tasmāt samāna yogakṣema tvāt sarva vedanām ekasya tatas pṛthakkaranam veda nindā prāyaścitta nirmaya dhiyām eva cetasi parisphurati na sādhūnām iti uparamyate

original: iti tulyaprabhāvarddhivardhamānocitastavāḥ /
analyzed: iti tulya prabhāva ṛddhi vardhamāna ucita stavāḥ

original: vividhābhimatasphītaphalasaṃpādanodyatāḥ //
analyzed: vividha abhimata sphīta phala saṃpādana udyatāḥ

original: catvāro 'pi parākṣepaparihārasthirasthitim /
analyzed: catvāraḥ pi parākṣepa parihāra sthira sthitim

original: bhajanti vedāḥ prāmāṇyalakṣmīṃ haribhujā iva //
analyzed: bhajanti vedāḥ prāmāṇya lakṣmīm hari bhujāḥ iva

original: catuśkandhopetaḥ prathitapṛthagarvairavayavaiḥ kṛtānyonyaśleṣaiḥ upacitavapuḥ vedaviṭapī /
analyzed: catur kandha upetaḥ prathita pṛthak arvaiḥ avayavaiḥ kṛta anyonya śleṣaiḥ upacita vapuḥ veda viṭapī

original: pratiskandhaṃ śāstrāphalakusumasandarbhasubhagāḥ prakāśante tasya dvijamukhanipītottamarasā /
analyzed: pratiskandham śāstrā phala kusuma sandarbha subhagāḥ prakāśante tasya dvija mukha nipīta uttama rasā

original: āha kim etad itthaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ vedānām eva sādhyate /
analyzed: āha kim etat ittham prāmāṇyam vedānām eva sādhyate

original: utāgamāntarāṇāṃ vā sarvepābhiyameva dik //
analyzed: uta āgama antarāṇām vā diś

original: kiñcātaḥ ādye pakṣe pareṣv evaṃ bruvāṇeṣu kim uttaram uttaratra tu mithyā spuḥ sarve 'nyonyavirodhinaḥ //
analyzed: kiñca atas ādye pakṣe pareṣu evam bruvāṇeṣu kim uttaram uttaratra tu mithyā spuḥ sarve nyonya virodhinaḥ

original: kāni punar āgamāntarāṇi cetasi vidhāyaivaṃ vatsaḥ pṛcchati purāṇetihāsadhrmaśāstrāṇi vā śaivapāśupatapañcarātrabāddhārhataprabhṛtīni vā tatra śaivādīni tāvannirūpayiṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: kāni punar āgama antarāṇi cetasi vidhāya evam vatsaḥ pṛcchati purāṇa itihāsa dhrma śāstrāṇi vā śaiva pāśupata pañcarātra bāddhārhata prabhṛtīni vā tatra śaiva ādīni tāvat nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ

original: manvādipraṇītāni dharmaśāstrāṇī vedavat tadarthānupraviṣṭaviśṭakarmopadeśīni pramāṇam eva /
analyzed: manu ādi praṇītāni dharma śāstrāṇī veda vat tad artha anupraviṣṭa viśṭa karma upadeśīni pramāṇam eva

original: kasteṣu vicāraḥ teṣāṃ tu pramāṇatvaṃ vedamūlatvenaiva kecid ācakṣate //
analyzed: kaḥ teṣu vicāraḥ teṣām tu pramāṇa tvam veda mūla tvena eva kecid ācakṣate

original: tathā hi na tāvan manvādideśanāḥ bhrāntimūlāḥ saṃbhāvyante bādhakābhāvāt /
analyzed: tathā hi na tāvat manu ādi deśanāḥ bhrānti mūlāḥ saṃbhāvyante bādhaka abhāvāt

original: adyayāvadaparimlānādaraiḥ vedavidbhiḥ tadarthānuṣṭhānāt //
analyzed: adya yāvat a parimlāna ādaraiḥ veda vidbhiḥ tad artha anuṣṭhānāt

original: nāpyanubhavamūlāḥ pratyakṣasya trikālānavacchinnakāryarūpadharmaparicchedadaśāsāmarthyāsaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: na api anubhava mūlāḥ pratyakṣasya tri kāla anavacchinna kārya rūpa dharma pariccheda daśā sāmarthya asaṃbhavāt

original: na ca puruṣāntaropadeśamūlāḥ puruṣāntarasyāpi atd avagame pramānābhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca puruṣa antara upadeśa mūlāḥ puruṣa antarasya api avagame pramāna abhāvāt

original: bhāve vā manunā kimaparāddham asati hi mūlapramāṇe puruṣavacanaparaṃparāyām eva kalpyamānāyāṃ andhapraṃparāsmaraṇatulyatvaṃ durnivāram /
analyzed: bhāve vā manunā kim aparāddham asati hi mūlapramāṇe puruṣa vacana paraṃparāyām eva kalpyamānāyām andha praṃparā smaraṇa tulya tvam durnivāram

original: na ca vipralambhakā eva bhavanto manvādayaḥ evam upadiśeyur iti yuktā kalpanā bādhakābhāvāt sādhujanaparigrahāccetyuktam //
analyzed: na ca vipralambhakāḥ eva bhavantaḥ manu ādayaḥ evam upadiśeyuḥ iti yuktā kalpanā bādhaka abhāvāt sādhu jana parigrahāt ca iti uktam

original: tasmāt pāriśeṣyāt vedākhyakāranamūlā eva bhavitum arhanti manvādideśanāḥ taddhyanuguṇaṃ samarthaṃ ca kāraṇam iti /
analyzed: tasmāt pāriśeṣyāt veda ākhya kārana mūlāḥ eva bhavitum arhanti manu ādi deśanāḥ tat hi anuguṇam samartham ca kāraṇam iti

original: tad āha bhaṭṭaḥ abhrānteranubhavādvā 'pi puṃvākyādvipralaṃbhakāt /
analyzed: tat āha bhaṭṭaḥ abhrānteḥ anubhavāt vā pi puṃvākyāt vipralaṃbhakāt

original: dṛṣṭānuguṇyasāmarthyāt codanaiva laghīyasī iti //
analyzed: dṛṣṭa ānuguṇya sāmarthyāt codanā eva laghīyasī iti

original: tatra kecit paridṛśyamānamantrārthavādabalonnītavidhimūlatvaṃ manyate /
analyzed: tatra kecid paridṛśyamāna mantra arthavāda bala unnīta vidhi mūla tvam manyate

original: anye viprakīrṇaśākhāmūlatvam /
analyzed: anye viprakīrṇa śākhā mūla tvam

original: apare punaḥ utsannaśākhāmūlatvam iti //
analyzed: apare punar utsanna śākhā mūla tvam iti

original: anena ca viśeṣavivaraṇena na naḥ prayojanam /
analyzed: anena ca viśeṣa vivaraṇena na naḥ prayojanam

original: sarvathā yathopapatti veda eva tatra mūlaṃ prakalpyatām na mūlāntaram apramāṇakatvāt /
analyzed: sarvathā yathopapatti vedaḥ eva tatra mūlam prakalpyatām na mūla antaram apramāṇaka tvāt

original: vedamūlatvapakṣe 'pi ceyamakhilajagadviditā smṛtisamākhyā 'nugṛhītā bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: veda mūla tva pakṣe ca iyam akhila jagat viditā smṛti samākhyā nugṛhītā bhaviṣyati

original: pratyakṣamūlatve hi vedavadatrāpi kaḥ smṛtiśabdārthaḥ kiñ ca vedamūlatve sati smṛteḥ śrutivirodhe sati tadatulyakakṣyatvāt bādhyatvaṃ suvacaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: pratyakṣa mūla tve hi veda vat atra api kaḥ smṛti śabda arthaḥ kim ca veda mūla tve sati smṛteḥ śruti virodhe sati tad atulya kakṣya tvāt bādhya tvam suvacam bhavati

original: k¬ptam ekatra mūlaṃ itaratra kalpyam /
analyzed: kptam ekatra mūlam itaratra kalpyam

original: yāvad eva bhavān smṛteḥ śrutiṃ kalpayituṃ vyavasyati tāvad etadvirodhinī pratyakṣaśrutā śrutiravatarati hṛdayapatham iti kathaṃ tadā mūlakalpanāyai smṛtiḥ prabhavet /
analyzed: yāvat eva bhavān smṛteḥ śrutim kalpayitum vyavasyati tāvat etad virodhinī pratyakṣa śrutā śrutiḥ avatarati hṛdaya patham iti katham tadā mūla kalpanāyai smṛtiḥ prabhavet

original: tad āha so 'yamābhāṇako loke yadaśvena hṛtaṃ purā \ tataścāt gardabhaḥ prāptuṃ kenopāyena śaknuyāt iti //
analyzed: tat āha saḥ yamābhāṇakaḥ loke yat aśvena hṛtam purā gardabhaḥ prāptum kena upāyena śaknuyāt iti

original: apara āha vikalpa evātra yuktaḥ /
analyzed: aparaḥ āha vikalpaḥ eva atra yuktaḥ

original: kila dvividho vedaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ anumīyamānaś ca /
analyzed: kila dvividhaḥ vedaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ anumīyamānaḥ ca

original: śrūyamāṇaś ca śrutir ity ucyate /
analyzed: śrūyamāṇaḥ ca śrutiḥ iti ucyate

original: anumīyamānaś ca smṛtir iti /
analyzed: anumīyamānaḥ ca smṛtiḥ iti

original: dvāv api caitāvanādī iti kiṃ kena vādhyate vyaktāvyakto hi veda evāsau /
analyzed: dvau api ca etau anādī iti kim kena vā ādhyate vyakta avyaktaḥ hi vedaḥ eva asau

original: ata eva na mantrārthavādādimūlakatvakalpanaṃ yuktam smaryamāṇasya vedasyānāditvāt //
analyzed: atas eva na mantra arthavāda ādi mūlaka tva kalpanam yuktam smaryamāṇasya vedasya anādi tvāt

original: nanu evaṃ vedamūlatvena prāmāṇye varṇyamāne bāhyasmṛtīnām api prāmāṇyaṃ vadantaḥ pravādukāḥ kathaṃ prativaktavyāḥ ucyate pratyuktā eva te tapasvinaḥ /
analyzed: nanu evam veda mūla tvena prāmāṇye varṇyamāne bāhya smṛtīnām api prāmāṇyam vadantaḥ pravādukāḥ katham prativaktavyāḥ ucyate pratyuktāḥ eva te tapasvinaḥ

original: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā jaimininā api vā kartṛsāmānyāt pramāṇam anumānaṃ syāt iti //
analyzed: uktam hi bhagavatā jaimininā api vā kartṛ sāmānyāt pramāṇam anumānam syāt iti

original: kartṛsāmānyād iti ko 'rthaḥ ekādhikārāvagamād iti /
analyzed: kartṛ sāmānyāt iti kaḥ rthaḥ eka adhikāra avagamāt iti

original: ya eva vedārthānuṣṭhāne 'dhikṛtāḥ kartāraḥta eva smṛtyarthānuṣṭhāne /
analyzed: ye eva veda artha anuṣṭhāne dhikṛtāḥ kartāraḥ te eva smṛti artha anuṣṭhāne

original: ācamānādismārtapadārthasaṃvalitatayaiva vedistaraṇādivaidikapadārthaprayogadarśanāt /
analyzed: ācamāna ādi smārta padārtha saṃvalita tayā eva vedi staraṇa ādi vaidika padārtha prayoga darśanāt

original: na tvevam ekādhikārāvagamo bāhyasmṛtiṣu vidyate /
analyzed: na tu evam eka adhikāra avagamaḥ bāhya smṛtiṣu vidyate

original: tasmāt manvādismṛtaya eva pramāṇaṃ na bāhyasmṛtayaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt manu ādi smṛtayaḥ eva pramāṇam na bāhya smṛtayaḥ

original: nanu mānvādismṛtayo 'pi vedamūlatvāt pramāṇaṃ nānyata iti atrocyate tadetadvadamūlatayā prāmāṇyaṃ yogipratyakṣaṃ dharmagrāhakamamṛṣyamāṇāḥ kilācakṣate bhavantaḥ /
analyzed: nanu mānva ādi smṛtayaḥ veda mūla tvāt pramāṇam na anyatas iti atrā ucyate tat etat vat amūla tayā prāmāṇyam yogi pratyakṣam dharma grāhakam amṛṣyamāṇāḥ kila ācakṣate bhavantaḥ

original: etac ca na yuktam yathā hi bhagavān īśvaraḥ sarvasya kartā sarvasyeśitā sarvadarśī sarvānukampī ca vedānāṃ praṇetā samarthitaḥ tathā yogipratyakṣam api dharmagrahaṇe nipuṇamasmadādipratyakṣavilakṣaṇaṃ prayakṣalakṣaṇe samarthitam eva /
analyzed: etat ca na yuktam yathā hi bhagavān īśvaraḥ sarvasya kartā sarvasya īśitā sarva darśī sarva anukampī ca vedānām praṇetā samarthitaḥ tathā yogi pratyakṣam api dharma grahaṇe nipuṇam asmat ādi pratyakṣa vilakṣaṇam prayakṣa lakṣaṇe samarthitam eva

original: tasmāt tanmūlā eva manvādideśanāḥ bhavantu //
analyzed: tasmāt tad mūlāḥ eva manu ādi deśanāḥ bhavantu

original: yat tu trikālānavacchinnaḥ kathaṃ partyakṣagamyo dharmaḥ syād iti codanaiva tatra pramāṇam ucyate prativihitaṃ tat īśvarapratyakṣasamarthanena /
analyzed: yat tu tri kāla anavacchinnaḥ katham partyakṣa gamyaḥ dharmaḥ syāt iti codanā eva tatra pramāṇam ucyate prativihitam tat īśvara pratyakṣa samarthanena

original: sādhyasādhanasambandhasya svargāgnihotrādigatasya yathā grāhakam īśvarapratyakṣaṃ evaṃ aṣṭakādigatasya tasya grāhakaṃ mantrādipratyakṣaṃ bhaviṣyatīti kim atra trikālānavacchedena avaccheda\ena vā kaṛtyam yad evaṃ aṣṭakādikarmaṇāṃ dharmatvāgrahaṇāt asarvajña īśvaraḥ syāt /
analyzed: sādhya sādhana sambandhasya svarga agnihotra ādi gatasya yathā grāhakam īśvara pratyakṣam evam aṣṭakā ādi gatasya tasya grāhakam mantra ādi pratyakṣam bhaviṣyati iti kim atra tri kāla anavacchedena avacchedaena vā yat evam aṣṭakā ādi karmaṇām dharma tva agrahaṇāt asarvajñaḥ īśvaraḥ syāt

original: jñātvā vā 'nupādaśat akāruṇiko bhavet naiṣa doṣaḥ sarvaṃ jānātyeva bhagavān /
analyzed: jñātvā vā akāruṇikaḥ bhavet na eṣa doṣaḥ sarvam jānāti eva bhagavān

original: kiñcit svayam upadiśati kiñcit parānupadeśayati /
analyzed: kiñcid svayam upadiśati kiñcid paraḥ upadeśayati

original: te hi syānugrāhyā bhagavataḥ /
analyzed: te hi sya anugrāhyāḥ bhagavataḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca tadanugrahakṛtaiva tathāvidhajñānaprāptiḥ /
analyzed: teṣām ca tad anugraha kṛtā eva tathāvidha jñāna prāptiḥ

original: mantrādīnāṃ pratyakṣo dharma iti vede 'pi paṭhyate //
analyzed: mantra ādīnām pratyakṣaḥ dharmaḥ iti vede pi paṭhyate

original: nanu evaṃ pratyakṣamūlatvāviśeṣāt śrutismṛtyor virodhe vikalpaḥ prāpnoti bṛhadrathantaravidhyor iva na vādhyavādhakabhāvaḥ na hīśvarapratyakṣasya yogipratyakṣasya ca prāmāṇye kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: nanu evam pratyakṣa mūla tva aviśeṣāt śruti smṛtyoḥ virodhe vikalpaḥ prāpnoti bṛhat rathantara vidhyoḥ iva na vādhya vādhaka bhāvaḥ na hi īśvara pratyakṣasya yogi pratyakṣasya ca prāmāṇye kaścid viśeṣaḥ

original: naisargikāhāryakṛtas tu bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: naisargika āhārya kṛtaḥ tu bhaviṣyati

original: kiṃ tena ucyate bhavatu vikalpaḥ /
analyzed: kim tena ucyate bhavatu vikalpaḥ

original: ko doṣaḥ vedamūlatvavādibhir api kaścid vikalpo vyākhyāt eva /
analyzed: kaḥ doṣaḥ veda mūla tva vādibhiḥ api kaścid vikalpaḥ vyākhyāt eva

original: viṣayavibhāgena vā vikalpo vyākhyāsyate /
analyzed: viṣaya vibhāgena vā vikalpaḥ vyākhyāsyate

original: na ca śrutismrtivirodhodāharaṇaṃ kiñcid astīti svādhyāyabhiyuktāḥ /
analyzed: na ca śruti smrti virodha udāharaṇam kiñcid asti iti svādhyāya abhiyuktāḥ

original: tasmād āptapratyakṣamūlatvena vedānām iva dharmaśāstrāṇām api pramāṇyam //
analyzed: tasmāt āpta pratyakṣa mūla tvena vedānām iva dharma śāstrāṇām api pramāṇyam

original: etena itihāsapurāṇaprāmāṇyam api nirṇītaṃ veditavyam /
analyzed: etena itihāsa purāṇa prāmāṇyam api nirṇītam veditavyam

original: itihāsapurāṇaṃ hi pañcamaṃ vedam āhuḥ /
analyzed: itihāsa purāṇam hi pañcamam vedam āhuḥ

original: uktaṃ ca itihāsapurāṇābhyāṃ vedaṃ samupabṛhayet /
analyzed: uktam ca itihāsa purāṇābhyām vedam samupabṛhayet

original: bibhetyalapaśrutādvedaḥ māmayaṃ pratariṣyati iti //
analyzed: bibheti alapa śrutāt vedaḥ mām ayam pratariṣyati iti

original: atha vā kim asmākaṃ durabhiniveśena vedamūlatvāt smṛtīnāṃ smṛtivat purāṇānām api bhavatu prāmāṇyam /
analyzed: atha vā kim asmākam durabhiniveśena veda mūla tvāt smṛtīnām smṛti vat purāṇānām api bhavatu prāmāṇyam

original: prāmāṇye tāvad avivādaḥ /
analyzed: prāmāṇye tāvat avivādaḥ

original: sadācārasyāpyanupanibaddhasya vedamūlatvād eva bhavatu prāmāṇyam //
analyzed: sat ācārasya api anupanibaddhasya veda mūla tvāt eva bhavatu prāmāṇyam

original: sarvathā tāvat vedāścatvāraḥ purāṇaṃ smṛtir iti ṣaḍimāni vidyāsthānāni sākṣātpuruṣārthasādhanopadeśīni pūrvoktarītyā pramāṇam /
analyzed: sarvathā tāvat vedāḥ catvāraḥ purāṇam smṛtiḥ iti ṣaḍ imāni vidyā sthānāni sākṣāt puruṣa artha sādhana upadeśīni pūrva ukta rītyā pramāṇam

original: vyākaraṇādīni tu ṣaḍaṅgāni aṅgatvenaiva tadupayogīni na sākṣāddharmopadeśīni /
analyzed: vyākaraṇa ādīni tu ṣaṣ aṅgāni aṅga tvena eva tad upayogīni na sākṣāt dharma upadeśīni

original: kalpasūtreṣv api vikṣiptakarmatramaniyamasaṃgrahamātram nāpūrvopadeśaḥ /
analyzed: kalpasūtreṣu api vikṣipta karma trama niyama saṃgraha mātram na apūrva upadeśaḥ

original: mīmāṃsā vedavākyavicārātmikā /
vedapramāṇyaniścayahetuś ca nyāyavistara ity āmukha evoktam /
analyzed: veda pramāṇya niścaya hetuḥ ca nyāya vistaraḥ iti āmukhe eva uktam

original: tad imāni caturdaśavidyāsthānāni pramāṇam /
analyzed: tat imāni caturdaśa vidyā sthānāni pramāṇam

original: kānicit sakṣād upadeśīni kānicit tadupayogīnīti siddham //
analyzed: kānicid sakṣāt upadeśīni kānicid tad upayogīni iti siddham

original: yāni punar āgamāntarāṇi paridṛśyante tāny api dvividhāni kānicit sarvātmanā vedavirodhenaiva pravartante bauddhadivat /
analyzed: yāni punar āgama antarāṇi paridṛśyante tāni api dvividhāni kānicid sarva ātmanā veda virodhena eva pravartante bauddhadi vat

original: kanicit tadavirodhenaiva kalpitavratāntaropadeśīni śaivadivat //
analyzed: tad avirodhena eva kalpita vrata antara upadeśīni śaiva di vat

original: tatra śaivāgamānāṃ tāvat prāmāṇyaṃ brūmahe tadupajanitayāḥ pratīte sandeha-bādhakāraṇa-kāluṣyakalāpasyānupalambhāt /
analyzed: tatra śaiva āgamānām tāvat prāmāṇyam brūmahe tad upajanitayāḥ pratīte sandeha bādha kāraṇa kāluṣya kalāpasya anupalambhāt

original: īśvarakartṛtvasya tatrāpi smṛtyanumānābhyāṃ siddhatvāt /
analyzed: īśvara kartṛ tvasya tatra api smṛti anumānābhyām siddha tvāt

original: mūlāntarasya lobhamohādeḥ kalpayitum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: mūla antarasya lobha moha ādeḥ kalpayitum aśakya tvāt

original: na hi tatra idaṃ prathamatā smaryate /
analyzed: na hi tatra idam prathamatā smaryate

original: vedavad ekadeśasaṃvādāś ca bhūmnā dṛśyanta iti kuto mūlāntarakalpanāvakāśaḥ //
analyzed: veda vat eka deśa saṃvādāḥ ca bhūmnā dṛśyante iti kutas mūla antara kalpanā avakāśaḥ

original: na ca vedapratipakṣatayā teṣām avasthānam vedaprasiddhacāturvarṇyādivyavahārāparityagāt //
analyzed: na ca veda pratipakṣa tayā teṣām avasthānam veda prasiddha cāturvarṇya ādi vyavahāra a parityagāt

original: manvādicodanānyāyaḥ sa yady api na vidyate /
analyzed: manu ādi codanā nyāyaḥ sa yadi api na vidyate

original: śaivāgame tathā 'py asya na na yuktā 'pramāṇatā //
analyzed: śaiva āgame tathā pi asya na na yuktā pramāṇa tā

original: sarvopanipadām arthāḥ niḥśreyasapadaspṛśaḥ /
analyzed: sarva upanipadām arthāḥ niḥśreyasa pada spṛśaḥ

original: vivicyamānā dṛśyante te hi tatra pade pade //
analyzed: vivicyamānāḥ dṛśyante te hi tatra pade pade

original: ye ca vedavidām agryāḥ kṛṣṇadvaupāyanādayaḥ /
analyzed: ye ca veda vidām agryāḥ kṛṣṇa dvaupāyana ādayaḥ

original: pramāṇam anumanyante te 'pi śaivādidarśanam //
analyzed: pramāṇam anumanyante te pi śaiva ādi darśanam

original: pañcarātre 'pi tenaiva prāmāṇyam upavarṇitam /
analyzed: pañcarātre pi tena eva prāmāṇyam upavarṇitam

original: aprāmāṇyanirmittaṃ hi nāsti tatrāpi kiñcana //
analyzed: a prāmāṇya nirmittam hi nā asti tatra api kiñcana

original: tatra ca bhagavān viṣṇuḥ praṇetā kathyate /
analyzed: tatra ca bhagavān viṣṇuḥ praṇetā kathyate

original: sa ceśvara eva //
analyzed: sa ca īśvaraḥ eva

original: ekasya kasyacid aśeṣajagatprasūtihetognādipuruṣasya mahāvibhūteḥ /
analyzed: ekasya kasyacid aśeṣa jagat prasūti hetoḥ ugna ādi puruṣasya mahā vibhūteḥ

original: sṛṣṭisthitipralayakāryavibhāgayogāt brahmeti viṣṇur iti rudra iti pratītiḥ //
analyzed: sṛṣṭi sthiti pralaya kārya vibhāga yogāt brahma iti viṣṇuḥ iti rudraḥ iti pratītiḥ

original: vede ca pade pade eka eva rudro 'vasthe na dvitīyaḥ idaṃ viṣṇur vicakrame iti rudro viṣṇuś ca paṭhyate /
analyzed: vede ca pade pade ekaḥ eva rudraḥ na dvitīyaḥ idam viṣṇuḥ vicakrame iti rudraḥ viṣṇuḥ ca paṭhyate

original: tadyogāś ca tadārādhanopāyā vede 'pi coditā eva /
analyzed: tad yogāḥ ca tad ārādhana upāyāḥ vede ca uditāḥ eva

original: śaivapañcarātrayos tu tadyogā evānyathopadeśyante /
analyzed: śaiva pañcarātrayoḥ tu tad yogāḥ eva anyathā upadeśyante

original: na caiṣa eva vedavirodhaḥ /
analyzed: na ca eṣaḥ eva veda virodhaḥ

original: vaikalpikatvād upāyānām /
analyzed: vaikalpika tvāt upāyānām

original: ataḥ āptapraṇītatvāt vedāviruddhatvāc ca tayor apramāṇyam //
analyzed: atas āpta praṇīta tvāt veda aviruddha tvāt ca tayoḥ apramāṇyam

original: ye tu saugatasaṃsāramocakāgamāḥ pāpakācāropadeśinaḥ kas teṣu prāmāṇyam āryo 'numodate buddhaśāstre hi vispaṣṭā dṛśayte vedavāhyatā /
analyzed: ye tu saugata saṃsāra mocaka āgamāḥ pāpaka ācāra upadeśinaḥ kaḥ teṣu prāmāṇyam āryaḥ numodate buddha śāstre hi vispaṣṭā veda vāhya tā

original: jātidharmocitācāraparihārāvadhāraṇāt //
analyzed: jāti dharma ucita ācāra parihāra avadhāraṇāt

original: saṃsāramocakāḥ pāpāḥ prāṇīhiṃsāparāyaṇāḥ /
analyzed: saṃsāra mocakāḥ pāpāḥ prāṇī hiṃsā parāyaṇāḥ

original: mohapravṛttā eveti na pramāṇaṃ tadāgamaḥ //
analyzed: moha pravṛttāḥ eva iti na pramāṇam tad āgamaḥ

original: niṣiddhasevanaprāyaṃ yatra karmopadiśyate /
analyzed: niṣiddha sevana prāyam yatra karma upadiśyate

original: prāmāṇyakathane tasya kasya jihvā pravartate //
analyzed: prāmāṇya kathane tasya kasya jihvā pravartate

original: tato yady api siddhiḥ syāt kadācit kasyacit kvacit /
analyzed: tatas yadi api siddhiḥ syāt kadācid kasyacid kvacid

original: brahmahatyārjitagrāmyabhogavannarakāya sā //
analyzed: brahmahatyā arjita grāmya bhoga vat narakāya sā

original: niṣiddhācaraṇopāttaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kena śāmyati ataḥ kālāntareṇāpi narake patanaṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: niṣiddha ācaraṇa upāttam duṣkṛtam kena śāmyati atas kāla antareṇa api narake patanam punar

original: yat tv atra coditam pareṣu pūrvoktakrameṇa buddhādyāptakalpanāṃ kurvatsu kiṃ pratividheyam iti tatrocyate mahājanaprasiddhyanugrahe hi sati suvacam āptoktatvaṃ bhavati nānyathā //
analyzed: yat tu atra coditam pareṣu pūrva ukta krameṇa buddha ādi āpta kalpanām kurvatsu kim pratividheyam iti tatra ucyate mahājana prasiddhi anugrahe hi sati suvacam āpta ukta tvam bhavati nā anyathā

original: mahājanaś ca vedānāṃ vedārthānugāmināṃ ca purāṇadharmaśāstrāṇāṃ vedāvirodhināṃ ca keṣāṃcid āgamānāṃ prāmāṇyam anumanyate na vedaviruddhānāṃ bauddhādyāgamānām iti kutas teṣām āptapraṇītatvam mūlāntaraṃ hi tatra suvacaṃ ajñānalobhādi ity evam abhidhāya vedaspardhino bauddhādayaḥ niṣeddhavyāḥ //
analyzed: mahājanaḥ ca vedānām veda artha anugāminām ca purāṇa dharma śāstrāṇām veda avirodhinām ca keṣāṃcid āgamānām prāmāṇyam anumanyate na veda viruddhānām bauddha ādi āgamānām iti kutas teṣām āpta praṇīta tvam mūla antaram hi tatra suvacam ajñāna lobha ādi iti evam abhidhāya veda spardhinaḥ bauddha ādayaḥ niṣeddhavyāḥ

original: āha ko 'yaṃ mahājano nāma kim ākāraḥ kim āspadaḥ kiṃsaṃkyaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ iti vyākyātum arhasi //
analyzed: āha kaḥ yam mahājanaḥ nāma kim ākāraḥ kim āspadaḥ kiṃsaṃkyaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ iti vyākyātum arhasi

original: api ca bauddhādayo buddhādīnāptān svāgamaprāmāṇyasiddhaye vadanti mahājanam api nijam /
analyzed: api ca bauddha ādayaḥ buddha ādīn āptān sva āgama prāmāṇya siddhaye vadanti mahājanam api nijam

original: tatsiddhaye vandakādikaṃ vadetadāryadeśaprasiddhaṃ sa mahājana ucyate /
analyzed: tad siddhaye vandaka ādikam vat etat ārya deśa prasiddham sa mahājanaḥ ucyate

original: ākāras tu tasya kīdṛśaṃ pāṇipādam kīdṛśaṃ śirogrīvaṃ vā kiyatī tasya saṃkhyā iti puruṣalakṣaṇādīni gaṇayituṃ na jānīmaḥ //
analyzed: ākāraḥ tu tasya kīdṛśam pāṇi pādam kīdṛśam śiraḥ grīvam vā kiyatī tasya saṃkhyā iti puruṣa lakṣaṇa ādīni gaṇayitum na jānīmaḥ

original: cāturvarṇyacāturāśramyarūpaścaiṣa mahājanaḥ vedapathapravṛttaḥ āgamāntaravādibhir apratyākhyeya eva /
analyzed: cāturvarṇya cāturāśramya rūpaḥ ca eṣa mahā janaḥ veda patha pravṛttaḥ āgama antara vādibhiḥ a pratyākhyeyaḥ eva

original: tathā caite bauddhādayo 'pi durātmanaḥ vedaprāmāṇyaniyamitā eva caṇḍālādisparśaṃ pariharanti /
analyzed: tathā ca ete bauddha ādayaḥ pi durātmanaḥ veda prāmāṇya niyamitāḥ eva caṇḍāla ādi sparśam pariharanti

original: niraste hi jātivādāvalepe kaḥ caṇḍālādisparśe doṣaḥ ye 'pi anye kecit aśucibhakṣaṇāgamyāgamanādinirvikalpadīkṣāprakāramakāryam anutiṣṭhanti te 'pi cāturvarṇyamahājanabhītāḥ tatkarma rahasi kurvanti na prakāśam /
analyzed: niraste hi jāti vāda avalepe kaḥ caṇḍāla ādi sparśe doṣaḥ ye pi anye kecid aśuci bhakṣaṇa agamyā gamana ādi nirvikalpa dīkṣā prakāram akāryam anutiṣṭhanti te pi cāturvarṇya mahājana bhītāḥ tat karma rahasi kurvanti na prakāśam

original: nirvaśaṅke hi tacchāstrapratyaye kim iti cauryavat tadarthānuṣṭhānam ata eva na nijo mahājanaḥ utthāpayituṃ śakyate vadankādiḥ kiṃ tvayam eva cāturvarṇyādir mahājanaḥ /
analyzed: hi tad śāstra pratyaye kim iti caurya vat tad artha anuṣṭhānam atas eva na nijaḥ mahājanaḥ utthāpayitum śakyate vadan ka ādiḥ kim tu ayam eva cāturvarṇya ādiḥ mahājanaḥ

original: sa caiṣa mahājanaḥ vedaviruddham āgamaṃ pariharaty eva nānumodate //
analyzed: sa ca eṣa mahā janaḥ veda viruddham āgamam pariharati eva na anumodate

original: saṃsāramocakaṃ spṛṣṭvā śiṣṭāḥ snānti savāsasaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsāra mocakam spṛṣṭvā śiṣṭāḥ snānti sa vāsasaḥ

original: bauddhair api sahaiteṣāṃ vyavahāro na kiś cana//
