analyzed: bauddhaiḥ api saha eteṣām vyavahāraḥ na kim cana

original: vedadharmānuvartī ca prāyeṇa sakalo janaḥ /
analyzed: veda dharma anuvartī ca prāyeṇa sakalaḥ janaḥ

original: vedabāhyas tu yaḥ kaścit āgamo vañcanaiva sā //
analyzed: veda bāhyaḥ tu yaḥ kaścid āgamaḥ vañcanā eva sā

original: īdṛśaścāyaṃ ananyasāmānyavibhavo mahābhāgo vedanāmā grantharaśiḥ yad anye bāhyāgamavādina evam eva spardhante /
analyzed: īdṛśaḥ ca ayam an anya sāmānya vibhavaḥ mahābhāgaḥ veda nāmā grantha raśiḥ yat anye bāhya āgama vādinaḥ evam eva spardhante

original: te hi svāgamaprāmāṇyam abhivadantaḥ vedarītyā 'bhidadhati /
analyzed: te hi sva āgama prāmāṇyam abhivadantaḥ veda rītyā abhidadhati

original: vede yathātathā praveṣṭumīhante //
analyzed: vede yathā tathā praveṣṭum īhante

original: vaidikānathān antarā 'ntarā svāgameṣu nibadhnanti /
analyzed: vaidika anathān antarā ntarā su āgameṣu nibadhnanti

original: vedasparśapūtamivātmānaṃ manyante /
analyzed: veda sparśa pūtam iva ātmānam manyante

original: teṣām apy antarhṛdaye jvalaty eva vedaprāmāṇyam /
analyzed: teṣām api antar hṛdaye jvalati eva veda prāmāṇyam

original: ata evaṃvidhāyā mahājanaprasiddheḥ āgamāntareṣv adarśanāt na teṣām āptapraṇītatvam //
analyzed: atas evaṃvidhāyāḥ mahā jana prasiddheḥ āgama antareṣu adarśanāt na teṣām āpta praṇīta tvam

original: āha mahājanaprasiddhyaiva vedaprāmāṇyaniścayāt /
analyzed: āha mahā jana prasiddhyā eva veda prāmāṇya niścayāt

original: kim arthaḥ kaṇṭhaśoṣo 'yoaṃ iyānāryeṇa saṃśiritaḥ //
analyzed: kim arthaḥ kaṇṭha śoṣaḥ iyān āryeṇa saṃśiritaḥ

original: vedaprāmāṇyasiddhyārthaṃ hi idaṃ śāstramārabdham iti gīyate /
analyzed: veda prāmāṇya siddhyā artham hi idam śāstram ārabdham iti gīyate

original: vedaprāmāṇyasya ca mahajanaprasiddhyaiva siddhatvāt kiṃ śāstreṇa alaṃ kṣudracodyair īdṛśaiḥ mahājanaprasiddhiṃ hi kecidviplāvyanty api /
analyzed: veda prāmāṇyasya ca mahā jana prasiddhyā eva siddha tvāt kim śāstreṇa alam kṣudra codyaiḥ īdṛśaiḥ mahā jana prasiddhim hi kecid viplāvyanti api

original: atas tadupaghātāya śāstramantraṃ prayujyate //
analyzed: atas tad upaghātāya śāstra mantram prayujyate

original: tasmāt pūrvoktānām eva prāmāṇyamāgamānāṃ na vedavāhyānām iti sthitam //
analyzed: tasmāt pūrvoktānām eva prāmāṇyam āgamānām na veda vāhyānām iti sthitam

original: anye sarvāgamānāṃ tu prāmāṇyaṃ pratiṣedire /
analyzed: anye sarva āgamānām tu prāmāṇyam pratiṣedire

original: sarvatra vādhasandeharahitapratyayodayāt //
analyzed: sarvatra vādha sandeha rahita pratyaya udayāt

original: sarvatra vedavat kartuḥ āptasya parikalpanā //
analyzed: sarvatra vedavat kartuḥ āptasya parikalpanā

original: dṛṣṭārtheṣv ekadeśeṣu prāyaḥ saṃvādadarśanāt //
analyzed: dṛṣṭa artheṣu eka deśeṣu prāyas saṃvāda darśanāt

original: yat punar atroktam sarva evāgamāḥ parasparaviruddhārthopadeśitvād apramānaṃ syur iti tatrocyate āptapraṇītatvena tulyakakṣyatvāt anthatamadaurvalyanimittānupalambhāc ca na kaścid āgamaḥ kiñcit vādhata /
analyzed: yat punar atra uktam sarve eva āgamāḥ paraspara viruddha artha upadeśi tvāt apramānam syuḥ iti tatra ucyate āpta praṇīta tvena tulya kakṣya tvāt anthatama daurvalya nimitta anupalambhāt ca na kaścid āgamaḥ kiñcid vādhata

original: virodhamātraṃ tvakiñcitkara /
analyzed: virodha mātram tu akiñcitkara

original: pramānatvābhimateṣu vedavākyeṣv api parasparavirodhadarśanāt /
analyzed: pramāna tva abhimateṣu veda vākyeṣu api paraspara virodha darśanāt

original: puruṣaśīrṣasparśanasugagrahagavālambhādicodanāsu vacanāntaraviduddham arthajātam upadiṣṭam eva //
analyzed: puruṣa śīrṣa sparśana suga graha gavālambha ādi codanāsu vacana antara viduddham artha jātam upadiṣṭam eva

original: kiñcapamānāṃ virodho 'pi nātīva vidyate pramāṇe puruṣārthe vā sarveṣām avivādāt //
analyzed: virodhaḥ na atīva vidyate pramāṇe puruṣa arthe vā sarveṣām avivādāt

original: nānāvidhāragamamārgabhedaiḥ ādiśyāmāna vahavo 'bhypāyāḥ /
analyzed: nānā vidha āra gama mārga bhedaiḥ vahavaḥ

original: ekatra te śreyasi saṃpatanti sindhau pravāhā iva jāhnavīyāḥ //
analyzed: ekatra te śreyasi saṃpatanti sindhau pravāhāḥ iva jāhnavīyāḥ

original: tathā hy apavarga upeyaḥ sarvaśāstreṣu nirdiśyate /
analyzed: tathā hi apavargaḥ upeyaḥ sarva śāstreṣu nirdiśyate

original: tadupāyaḥ sarvatra jñānam upadiśyate /
analyzed: tad upāyaḥ sarvatra jñānam upadiśyate

original: jñānaviśaye tu vivadante /
analyzed: jñāna viśaye tu vivadante

original: tatrāpi prāyaśaḥ ātmavipayatāyāṃ vahūnām avipratipattiḥ //
analyzed: tatra api prāyaśas ātma vipaya tāyām vahūnām avipratipattiḥ

original: prakṛtipuruṣavivekajñānapakṣe tu prakṛter viviktayā puruṣa eva jñeyaḥ //
analyzed: prakṛti puruṣa viveka jñāna pakṣe tu prakṛteḥ viviktayā puruṣaḥ eva jñeyaḥ

original: naitrātmyavādinas tu ātmaśaithilyajananāya tathopadiśanti /
analyzed: naitrātmya vādinaḥ tu ātma śaithilya jananāya tathā upadiśanti

original: svacchaṃ tu jñānatattvaṃ yatair iṣyate tat svātantryāt anāśritatvāt ātmakalpam eva /
analyzed: svaccham tu jñāna tattvam yataiḥ iṣyate tat svātantryāt anāśrita tvāt ātma kalpam eva

original: kūṭasyanityatve pravāhanityatve ca viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: kūṭasya nitya tve pravāha nitya tve ca viśeṣaḥ

original: evaṃ pradhānayos tāvat upāyopeyayor vivādaḥ /
analyzed: evam pradhānayoḥ tāvat upāya upeyayoḥ vivādaḥ

original: kriyā tu vicitrā pratyāgamaṃ bhavatu nāma /
analyzed: kriyā tu vicitrā pratyāgamam bhavatu nāma

original: bhasmajaṭāparigraho vā daṇḍakramaṇḍalugrahaṇaṃ vā raktapaṭadhāraṇaṃ vā digamvaratā vā 'valambyatām ko 'tra virodhaḥ vede 'pi kim alpīyāṃsaḥ pṛthagitikartavyatākalaḥpakhacitāḥ svargopāyāś coditāḥ tasmāt parasparavirodhe 'pi na prāmāṇyavirodhaḥ //
analyzed: bhasma jaṭā parigrahaḥ vā daṇḍa kramaṇḍalu grahaṇam vā rakta paṭa dhāraṇam vā digamvara tā vā virodhaḥ vede pi kim alpīyāṃsaḥ svarga upāyāḥ coditāḥ tasmāt paraspara virodhe na prāmāṇya virodhaḥ

original: ataś ca yad ucyate kapilo yadi sarvajñaḥ sugato neti kā pramā athobhāvapi sarvajñau matabhedastayoḥ katham iti tadapāstaṃ bhavati pradhāne sati bhedābhāvāt /
analyzed: atas ca yat ucyate kapilaḥ yadi sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ na iti kā pramā atha ubhau api sarvajñau mata bhedaḥ tayoḥ katham iti tat apāstam bhavati pradhāne sati bheda abhāvāt

original: kvacic ca tadbhāve prāmāṇyavirodhāt /
analyzed: kvacid ca tad bhāve prāmāṇya virodhāt

original: na ca hṛdayakrośanahetukarmopadeśāt āgamāntarāṇām aprāmāṇyam tasyāprāmāṇyatāyāṃ aprayojakatvāt //
analyzed: na ca hṛdaya krośana hetu karma upadeśāt āgama antarāṇām aprāmāṇyam tasya aprāmāṇya tāyām aprayojaka tvāt

original: vicikitsā hi nrśiraḥkapālādyaśaneṣu yā /
analyzed: vicikitsā hi nṛ śiraḥ kapāla ādi aśaneṣu yā

original: sā 'py anyadarśanābhyāsabhāvanopanibandhanā //
analyzed: sā pi anya darśana abhyāsa bhāvanā upanibandhanā

original: tathā ca śāntcittānāṃ sarvabhūtadayāvatām /
analyzed: tathā ca śānt cittānām sarva bhūta dayāvatām

original: vaidikīṣv apihiṃsāsu vicikitsā pravartate //
analyzed: vaidikīṣu apihiṃsāsu vicikitsā pravartate

original: abhicārādihiṃsāyāṃ vaidikyam api bhavatu hṛdayotkampaḥ /
analyzed: abhicāra ādi hiṃsāyām vaidikyam api bhavatu hṛdaya utkampaḥ

original: karaṇāṃśopanipātinī hiṃseti lipsātas tasyāṃ pravṛttiḥ //
analyzed: karaṇa aṃśa upanipātinī hiṃsā iti lipsātaḥ tasyām pravṛttiḥ

original: yā tu agnīṣomīyādipaśuhiṃsā itikartavyatāṃśasthā yasāṃ kratvartho śāstrādavagamyate iti vaidhī pravṛttiḥ tasyām api kāruṇīko lokaḥ savicikitso bhavati /
analyzed: yā tu agnīṣomīya ādi paśu hiṃsā itikartavya tā aṃśa sthā yasām śāstrāt avagamyate iti pravṛttiḥ tasyām api kāruṇīkaḥ lokaḥ sa vicikitsaḥ bhavati

original: vadati ca yatra prāṇivadho dharmastvadharmaḥ tatra kīdṛśaḥ iti /
analyzed: vadati ca yatra prāṇi vadhaḥ dharmaḥ tu adharmaḥ tatra kīdṛśaḥ iti

original: na caitāvatā vedasyāprāmāṇyam /
analyzed: na ca etāvatā vedasya aprāmāṇyam

original: evam āgamāntareṣv api bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: evam āgama antareṣu api bhaviṣyati

original: yat tu āgamāntarebhyaḥ kaulādibhyaḥ khecaratādyarthasiddhāv api niṣiddhāracaṇakṛtaḥ kālāntare pratyavāyo 'vaṃśyabhāvīty uktam tad api na yuktam tasyārthasya tadāgamaniṣiddhatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: yat tu āgama antarebhyaḥ kaula ādibhyaḥ khecara tā ādi artha siddhau api niṣiddha a racaṇa kṛtaḥ kāla antare pratyavāyaḥ vaṃśya bhāvi iti uktam tat api na yuktam tasya arthasya tad āgama niṣiddha tva abhāvāt

original: āgamāntaraniṣiddhatve 'pi vaikalpikatvakalpanopapatteḥ /
analyzed: āgama antara niṣiddha tve pi vaikalpika tva kalpanā upapatteḥ

original: puruṣārthaprāptyupāyatvāc ca tasya tasmin siddhe kutaḥ pratyavāyaḥ bhavatu vā kālāntare pratyavāyaḥ tathāpyadhikāribhedena tatphale karmaṇi codyamāṇe śyenādav iva nāgamaprāmāṇyam atra hīyate /
analyzed: puruṣa artha prāpti upāya tvāt ca tasya tasmin siddhe kutas pratyavāyaḥ bhavatu vā kāla antare pratyavāyaḥ tathā api adhikāri bhedena tad phale karmaṇi codyamāṇe śyena ādau iva na āgama prāmāṇyam atra hīyate

original: śyenenābhicaran yajeta ity atra abhicaran iti śatālāṅghetaniṣedham adhikāriṇamācaṣṭE /
analyzed: śyenena abhicaran yajeta iti atra abhicaran iti adhikāriṇam ācaṣṭe

original: tasya ca śyenayāgaḥ coditaḥ /
analyzed: tasya ca śyenayāgaḥ coditaḥ

original: sa ca tatprayogāt kṛtavadhaḥ pratyavaityeva na ca vedasyāprāmāṇyam /
analyzed: sa ca tad prayogāt kṛta vadhaḥ pratyavaiti eva na ca vedasya aprāmāṇyam

original: uktaṃ ca ubhayam iha codanayā laṣyate artho 'narthaś ca iti /
analyzed: uktam ca ubhayam iha codanayā laṣyate arthaḥ narthaḥ ca iti

original: adhikārabhedāc ca vicitrakarmacodanā nānupapannā /
analyzed: adhikāra bhedāt ca vicitra karma codanā na anupapannā

original: [maraṇa>]māṇakāmasya sarvasvāraḥ coditaḥ āyuṣkāmasya kṛṣṇalacaruḥ /
analyzed: maraṇamāṇakāmasya sarvasvāraḥ coditaḥ āyuṣkāmasya kṛṣṇalacaruḥ

original: tasmād etad api nāprāmāṇyanimittam //
analyzed: tasmāt etat api na a prāmāṇya nimittam

original: yad api bauddhāgame jātivādanirākaraṇaṃ tad api sarvānugrahapravaṇakaruṇātiśayapraśaṃsāparaṃ na ca yathāśrutam avagantavyam /
analyzed: yat api bauddha āgame jāti vāda nirākaraṇam tat api sarva anugraha pravaṇa karuṇā atiśaya praśaṃsā param na ca yathāśrutam avagantavyam

original: tathā ca tatraitatpaṭhyate na jātikāryaduṣṭān pravrājayet iti /
analyzed: tathā ca tatra etat paṭhyate na jāti kārya duṣṭān pravrājayet iti

original: tasmāt sarveṣām āgamānāṃ āptaiḥ kapilasugatārhatprabhṛtibhiḥ praṇītānāṃ prāmāṇyam iti yuktam //
analyzed: tasmāt sarveṣām āgamānām āptaiḥ kapila sugata arhat prabhṛtibhiḥ praṇītānām prāmāṇyam iti yuktam

original: anye manyate sarvāgamānām īśvara eva bhagavān praṇeteti /
analyzed: anye manyate sarva āgamānām īśvaraḥ eva bhagavān praṇetā iti

original: sa hi sakalaprāṇināṃ karmavipākaṃ anekaprakāram avalokayan karuṇayā tān anugrahītuṃ apārgaprāptimārgaṃ bahuvidham utpaśyan āśayānusārena keṣāṃcit kvacit karmaṇi yogyatām avagamya taṃ tam upāyam upadiśyati /
analyzed: sa hi sakala prāṇinām karma vipākam aneka prakāram avalokayan karuṇayā tān anugrahītum apārga prāpti mārgam bahuvidham utpaśyan āśaya anusārena keṣāṃcid kvacid karmaṇi yogyatām avagamya tam tam upāyam upadiśyati

original: svavibhūtimahimnā ca nānāśarīraparigrahāt sa eva saṃjñābhedānupagacchati /
analyzed: sva vibhūti mahimnā ca nānā śarīra parigrahāt saḥ eva saṃjñā bhedān upagacchati

original: arhann iti kapila iti sugata iti sa evocyate bhagavān /
analyzed: arhan iti kapilaḥ iti sugataḥ iti saḥ eva ucyate bhagavān

original: nānāsarvajñakalpanāyāṃ yatnagauravaprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: nānā sarvajña kalpanāyām yatna gaurava prasaṅgāt

original: nanu buddhaḥ śuddhodanasya rājño 'patyam sa katham īśvaro bhavet parihṛtam etat bhagavatā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanena yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata abhytthānam adharmasya tadā ''tmānaṃ sṛjāmyaham iti //
analyzed: nanu buddhaḥ śuddhodanasya rājñaḥ sa katham īśvaraḥ bhavet parihṛtam etat bhagavatā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanena yadā yadā hi dharmasya glāniḥ bhavati bhārata abhytthānam adharmasya tadā tmānam sṛjāmi aham iti

original: śarīram eva śuddhodanasyāpatyaṃ nātmā /
analyzed: śarīram eva śuddhodanasya apatyam na ātmā

original: ataḥ pratiyugaṃ viṣṇur eva bhagavān dharmarūpeṇāvataratītyāgamavidaḥ pratipannāḥ //
analyzed: atas pratiyugam viṣṇuḥ eva bhagavān dharma rūpeṇa avatarati iti āgama vidaḥ pratipannāḥ

original: nanu vedasamānakartṛkeṣu āgamāntareṣu kathaṃ tādṛśo mahājanasaṃpratyayo nāsti evaṃ nāsti tena vartmānā bhagavatā katipaye prāṇinaḥ anugṛhītāḥ yeṣāṃ tādṛśa āśayo lakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: nanu veda samāna kartṛkeṣu āgama antareṣu katham tādṛśaḥ mahā jana saṃpratyayaḥ na asti evam na asti tena vartmānā bhagavatā katipaye prāṇinaḥ anugṛhītāḥ yeṣām tādṛśaḥ āśayaḥ lakṣitaḥ

original: vaidikena tu vartmānā niśaṃkhyākāḥ prāṇito 'nugṛhītāḥ iti tatra mahānādaraḥ āgamānatreṣu kṛśa iti //
analyzed: vaidikena tu vartmānā niśaṃkhyākāḥ prāṇitaḥ nugṛhītāḥ iti tatra mahān ādaraḥ āgama anatreṣu kṛśaḥ iti

original: ekakartṛke parasparavirodhaḥ katham iti cet vedair evātra vargitaḥ samādhiḥ /
analyzed: eka kartṛke paraspara virodhaḥ katham iti ced vedaiḥ evā atra vargitaḥ samādhiḥ

original: teṣv api bhūmnaḥ parasparavirodhasya darśanādityuktam /
analyzed: teṣu api bhūmnaḥ paraspara virodhasya darśanāt iti uktam

original: tasmād īśvarapraṇītatvād va sarvāgamanāṃ prāmāṇyam //
analyzed: tasmāt īśvara praṇīta tvāt sarva āgamanām prāmāṇyam

original: apare punaḥ vedamūlatvena sarvāgamaprāmāṇyam abhypāgaman /
analyzed: apare punar veda mūla tvena sarva āgama prāmāṇyam abhypāgaman

original: yo hi manvādideśanānāṃ vedamūlatāyāṃ nyeya uktaḥ bhrānteranubhavādvā 'pi puṃvākyādvipralambhakāt /
analyzed: yaḥ hi manu ādi deśanānām veda mūla tāyām nyeyaḥ uktaḥ bhrānteḥ anubhavāt vā pi puṃvākyāt vipralambhakāt

original: dṛṣṭānuguṇyasāmarthyāt codanaiva laghīyasī //
analyzed: dṛṣṭa ānuguṇya sāmarthyāt codanā eva laghīyasī

original: iti sa sarvāgameṣu samānaḥ /
analyzed: iti sa sarva āgameṣu samānaḥ

original: na ca manvādismṛtīnāṃ mūlabhūtā śrutiḥ upalabhyate /
analyzed: na ca manu ādi smṛtīnām mūla bhūtā śrutiḥ upalabhyate

original: anumānena tu tatkalpanām āgamāntareṣv api tulyam //
analyzed: anumānena tu tad kalpanām āgama antareṣu api tulyam

original: nanu ca uktaṃ api vā kartṛsāmānyāt pramāṇam anumānaṃ syāt iti tacceha nāsti iti kathaṃ śrutyanumānam naiṣa doṣaḥ ekādhikārāvagamaḥ na prāmāṇye prayojakaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ca uktam api vā kartṛ sāmānyāt pramāṇam anumānam syāt iti tat ca iha na asti iti katham śruti anumānam na eṣa doṣaḥ eka adhikāra avagamaḥ na prāmāṇye prayojakaḥ

original: miśrānuṣṭhānasiddhau tu kāmaṃ bhavatu kāranam //
analyzed: miśra anuṣṭhāna siddhau tu kāmam bhavatu kāranam

original: na ca pṛthaganuṣṭhīyamānam api karma na pramāṇamūlaṃ bhavati varṇāśramabhedānuṣṭheyakarmavat //
analyzed: na ca pṛthak anuṣṭhīyamānam api karma na pramāṇa mūlam bhavati varṇa āśrama bheda anuṣṭheya karma vat

original: kartṛsāmānyaśūnyatvātatha mūlāntarodayaḥ /
analyzed: mūla antara udayaḥ

original: tad asat bādhakābhāvāt bhrāntyādipratiṣedhanāt //
analyzed: tat asat bādhaka abhāvāt bhrānti ādi pratiṣedhanāt

original: pratyakṣamūlatāyāṃ tu guruvī bhavati kalpanā /
analyzed: pratyakṣa mūla tāyām tu guruvī bhavati kalpanā

original: vedas tv anantaśākhatvāt mūlaṃ tatra susaṃgatam //
analyzed: vedaḥ tu ananta śākhā tvāt mūlam tatra su saṃgatam

original: nanv atrā vedamūlatve dveṣo vedavidāṃ katham /
analyzed: nanu atrā veda mūla tve dveṣaḥ veda vidām katham

original: gatvā ta eva pṛcchyantāṃ sākṣaryaṃ yadi vidyate //
analyzed: gatvā te eva pṛcchyantām sākṣaryam yadi vidyate

original: govadhe yā kathaṃ teṣāṃ dveṣaḥ suspaṣṭavaidike /
analyzed: go vadhe yā katham teṣām dveṣaḥ su spaṣṭa vaidike

original: pratyuktaṃ ca viruddhatvaṃ śākhānantyāc ca durgamam //
analyzed: pratyuktam ca viruddha tvam śākhā ānantyāt ca durgamam

original: kim iyad vedasarvasvaṃ yāvad asman mukhe sthitam /
analyzed: kim iyat veda sarvasvam yāvat asmat mukhe sthitam

original: śāstrāntarād vā saṃvādaḥ na labhyeteti kā pramā //
analyzed: śāstra antarāt vā saṃvādaḥ na labhyeta iti kā pramā

original: tathā ca sāṃkhyaśāstraprasiddhatriguṇātmakaprakṛtisūcanaparaṃ [ajām ekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ] iti vaidikaṃ liṅgam ullabhyate //
analyzed: tathā ca sāṃkhya śāstra prasiddha triguṇa ātmaka prakṛti sūcana param ajām ekām lohita śukla kṛṣṇām iti vaidikam liṅgam ullabhyate

original: nirgranthakathitatapaśacivatattvajñānaśaṃsī cāyam anuvādo dṛśyate [munayo vātaraśānāḥ] iti /
analyzed: nirgrantha kathita tapa śaciva tattva jñāna śaṃsī ca ayam anuvādaḥ dṛśyate munayaḥ vāta raśānāḥ iti

original: evaṃ raktapaṭaparigrahabhasmakapāladhāraṇādimūlam apy abhiyuktā labhanta eva //
analyzed: evam rakta paṭa parigraha bhasma kapāla dhāraṇa ādi mūlam api abhiyuktāḥ labhante eva

original: manvādismṛtivat kartṛsāmyasyāsaṃbhave 'py ataḥ /
analyzed: manu ādi smṛti vat kartṛ sāmyasya asaṃbhave pi atas

original: pramāṇaṃ vedāmūlatvāt vācyā sarvāgamasmṛtiḥ //
analyzed: pramāṇam veda amūla tvāt vācyā sarva āgama smṛtiḥ

original: tataś ca [ yaḥ kaścit kasyacid dharmo manunā parikīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca yaḥ kaścid kasyacid dharmaḥ manunā parikīrtitaḥ

original: sa sarvo 'bhihito vede sarvajñānamayo hi saḥ //
analyzed: sa sarvaḥ bhihitaḥ vede sarva jñāna mayaḥ hi saḥ

original: ] ity atra yathā manugrahaṇaṃ gautamayamāstambasaṃvartakādismṛtikāropalakṣaṇam evaṃ arhatkapilasugatādyupalakṣaṇaparam api vyākhyeyam //
analyzed: iti atra yathā manu grahaṇam gautama yama āstamba saṃvartaka ādi smṛti kāra upalakṣaṇam evam arhat kapila sugata ādi upalakṣaṇa param api vyākhyeyam

original: nanu ca lokāyatādyāgame 'py evaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prāpnoti /
analyzed: nanu ca lokāyata ādi āgame pi evam prāmāṇyam prāpnoti

original: [vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny evānuvinaśayati na pretya saṃjñā 'sti] iti vedamūladarśanāt /
analyzed: vijñāna ghanaḥ eva etebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāni eva anuvinaśayati na pretya saṃjñā sti iti veda mūla darśanāt

original: tataś ca lokāyatadarśane pramāṇībhūte sati svasti sarvāgamebhyaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca lokāyata darśane pramāṇībhūte sati svasti sarva āgamebhyaḥ

original: ucyate na hi lokāyate kiñcit kartavyam upadiśyate /
analyzed: ucyate na hi lokāyate kiñcid kartavyam upadiśyate

original: vaitaṇḍikakathaivāsau na punaḥ kaścid āgamaḥ //
analyzed: vaitaṇḍika kathā eva asau na punar kaścid āgamaḥ

original: nanu ca [yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ jīveta] iti tatropadiśyate /
analyzed: nanu ca yāvat jīvam sukham jīveta iti tatra upadiśyate

original: evaṃ [na svabhāvasiddhatvena atropadeśavaiphalyāt] [dharmo na kāryaḥ] [tadupadeśeṣu na pratyetavyam] ity evaṃ vā yad upadiśyate tat prativihitam eva pūrvapakṣavacanamūlatvāt lokāyatadarśanasya /
analyzed: evam na svabhāva siddha tvena atra upadeśa vaiphalyāt dharmaḥ na kāryaḥ tad upadeśeṣu na pratyetavyam iti evam vā yat upadiśyate tat prativihitam eva pūrvapakṣa vacana mūla tvāt lokāyata darśanasya

original: tathā ca tatra uttarabrāhmaṇaṃ bhavati [na vā are ahaṃ mohaṃ bravīmi avināśī vā are 'ṣmātmā mātrāsaṃsargas tv asya bhavati] iti /
analyzed: tathā ca tatra uttara brāhmaṇam bhavati na vai are aham moham bravīmi avināśī vai are sma ātmā mātrā saṃsargaḥ tu asya bhavati iti

original: tad evaṃ pūrvapakṣavacanamūlatvāt lokāyataśāstram api na svatantram /
analyzed: tat evam pūrvapakṣa vacana mūla tvāt lokāyata śāstram api na svatantram

original: uttaravākyapratihatatvāt tu tadanāharaṇīyam /
analyzed: uttara vākya pratihata tvāt tu tat anāharaṇīyam

original: śāstrāntarāṇāṃ tu pūrvapakṣavākyamūlatvakalpanaṃ ayuktam /
analyzed: śāstra antarāṇām tu pūrvapakṣa vākya mūla tva kalpanam ayuktam

original: samanantaram eva tatpratipakṣavacanānupalabdheḥ ity ataḥ vedamūlatvāt sarvāgamāḥ pramāṇam //
analyzed: samanantaram eva tad pratipakṣa vacana anupalabdheḥ iti atas veda mūla tvāt sarva āgamāḥ pramāṇam

original: sarvāgamapramāṇatve nanv evam upapādite /
analyzed: sarva āgama pramāṇa tve nanu evam upapādite

original: aham apy adya yat kiñcit āgamaṃ racayāmi cet //
analyzed: aham api adya yat kiñcid āgamam racayāmi ced

original: tasyāpi hi pramāṇatvaṃ dinaiḥ katipayair bhavet /
analyzed: tasya api hi pramāṇa tvam dinaiḥ katipayaiḥ bhavet

original: tasmān nāpi na pūrvokatanyāyo bhavati durvacaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na api na pūrva ukata nyāyaḥ bhavati durvacaḥ

original: jagatpustakalikhitaṃ yad api tad api kiñcid idānīṃ kenāpi dhūrtena prakhyāpyate maha nayam āgama iti /
analyzed: jagat pustaka likhitam yat api tat api kiñcid idānīm kena api dhūrtena prakhyāpyate nayam āgamaḥ iti

original: tatrāpyāpta eva praṇetā kalpyatām yādṛśaṃ tādṛśaṃ vaidikaṃ vacanam ucyatāṃ mūlabhūtam iti naitad asty avigītāṃ ye prasiddhiṃ prāpurāgamāḥ /
analyzed: tatra api āptaḥ eva praṇetā kalpyatām yādṛśam tādṛśam vaidikam vacanam ucyatām mūla bhūtam iti na etat asti avigītām ye prasiddhim prāpuḥ āgamāḥ

original: kṛtaś ca bahubhir yeśāṃ śiṣṭair iha parigrahaḥ //
analyzed: kṛtaḥ ca bahubhiḥ yā īśām śiṣṭaiḥ iha parigrahaḥ

original: adya pravartamānāś ca nāpūrvā iva bhavanti ye /
analyzed: adya pravartamānāḥ ca na apūrvāḥ iva bhavanti ye

original: yeṣāṃ na mūlaṃ lobhati yebhyo nodvijate jataḥ //
analyzed: yeṣām na mūlam lobhati yebhyaḥ na udvijate jataḥ

original: teṣām eva pramāṇatvaṃ āgamānām iheṣyate /
analyzed: teṣām eva pramāṇa tvam āgamānām iha iṣyate

original: na mṛṣyate tu yat kiñcit pramāṇaṃ kuṭṭanīmatam //
analyzed: na mṛṣyate tu yat kiñcid pramāṇam kuṭṭanī matam

original: tathā hi amitaikapaṭanivītāniyatastrīpuṃsavihitabahuceṣṭam /
analyzed: tathā hi amita eka paṭa nivīta aniyata strīpuṃsa vihita bahu ceṣṭam

original: nīlāmbaravratam idaṃ kil kalpitam āsīt viṭaiḥ kaiścit //
analyzed: nīlāmbara vratam idam kil kalpitam āsīt viṭaiḥ kaiścid

original: tad apūrvam iti viditvā nivārayāmāsa dharmatattvajñaḥ /
analyzed: tat apūrvam iti viditvā nivārayāmāsa dharma tattva jñaḥ

original: rājā śaṅkaravarmā na punar jainādimatam evam //
analyzed: rājā śaṅkaravarmā na punar jaina ādi matam evam

original: ityāptoktatvahetoḥ parimuṣitaparodīritāśeṣadoṣāt eṣāṃ vedāgamānāṃ sudṛṭham upagate mānabhāve praroham /
analyzed: iti āpta ukta tva hetoḥ parimuṣita para udīrita aśeṣa doṣāt eṣām veda āgamānām su dṛṭham upagate māna bhāve praroham

original: unmūlatvāt tathātvaṃ puruṣavacanato vaḥ 'stu śāstrāntarāṇāṃ taddvāreṇāpi vaktuṃ na khalu kalupatā śakyate vedavācām //
analyzed: unmūla tvāt tathātvam puruṣa vacanataḥ vaḥ stu śāstra antarāṇām tad dvāreṇa api vaktum na khalu kalupa tā śakyate veda vācām

original: nanu nādyāpi vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ suvyavasthitam /
analyzed: nanu na adya api vedasya prāmāṇyam su vyavasthitam

original: svadehasaṃbhavair eva doṣairanṛtatādibhiḥ //
analyzed: sva deha saṃbhavaiḥ eva doṣaiḥ anṛta tā ādibhiḥ

original: [citrayā yajeta paśukāmā] [putrakāmaḥ putreṣṭyā yajeta] iti śrūyate /
analyzed: citrayā yajeta paśu kāmā putra kāmaḥ putreṣṭyā yajeta iti śrūyate

original: na ceṣṭyanantaraṃ putrapaśvādiphalam upalabhyate /
analyzed: na ca iṣṭi anantaram putra paśu ādi phalam upalabhyate

original: tasmāt asatyāḥ citrādicodanāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt asatyāḥ citra ādi codanāḥ

original: nanu ca yaḥ paśukāmaḥ sa iṣṭiṃ kuryāt itīyān eva vākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ca yaḥ paśu kāmaḥ sa iṣṭim kuryāt itīyān eva vākya arthaḥ

original: tatra yāgāt paśavo bhavantīty etad eva durupapādam /
analyzed: tatra yāgāt paśavaḥ bhavanti iti etat eva durupapādam

original: te ca bhavanto 'py anantaram eva bhavantīty etat durupapādataram /
analyzed: te ca bhavantaḥ api anantaram eva bhavanti iti etat durupapādataram

original: ataḥ kathaṃ na satyārthatvaṃ citrādicodanānām ucyate [yāvaj jīvaṃ yajeta] [yāvaj jīvaṃ juhuyāt] iti jīvanavat asādhyamānapaśukāmanaiva nāvikāriviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: atas katham na satya artha tvam citra ādi codanānām ucyate yāvat jīvam yajeta yāvat jīvam juhuyāt iti jīvana vat asādhyamāna paśu kāmanā eva na avikāri viśeṣaṇam bhavitum arhati

original: paśūnāṃ tataḥ karmaṇaḥ siddhim anavabudhyamānasya tatrādhikāra eva na saṃpravartate iti nirṇepyate etat //
analyzed: paśūnām tatas karmaṇaḥ siddhim an avabudhyamānasya tatra adhikāraḥ eva na saṃpravartate iti nirṇepyate etat

original: ānantaryam api karmasvabhāvaparyālocanenaiva gamyate samanantaraphalatvana karmaṇāṃ dṛṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: ānantaryam api karma svabhāva paryālocanena eva gamyate karmaṇām dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: āha ca [yadā tāvad iyaṃ vidyamānā ''sīt tadā phalaṃ na dattavatī yadā phalam utpadyate tadā 'sau nāsti asatī kathaṃ phalaṃ dāsyati] iti //
analyzed: āha ca yadā tāvat iyam vidyamānā sīt tadā phalam na dattavatī yadā phalam utpadyate tadā sau na asti asatī katham phalam dāsyati iti

original: api ca kālāntare phalasyānyat pratyakṣaṃ kāraṇam upalabhyate sevādi /
analyzed: api ca kāla antare phalasya anyat pratyakṣam kāraṇam upalabhyate sevā ādi

original: tasmiṃś ca kāraṇe dṛṣṭe sati ko nāma sūkṣmadṛṣṭiḥ adṛṣṭaṃ citrādi kāraṇaṃ kalpayet tasmād asatyāḥ citrādicodanāḥ pratyakṣādipramāṇaparicchedayogyārthopadeśitve saty api tatsaṃvādaśūnyatvāt evaṃvidhavipralabhakavākyavat //
analyzed: tasmin ca kāraṇe dṛṣṭe sati kaḥ nāma sūkṣma dṛṣṭiḥ adṛṣṭam citra ādi kāraṇam kalpayet tasmāt asatyāḥ citra ādi codanāḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa pariccheda yogya artha upadeśi tve sati api tad saṃvāda śūnya tvāt evaṃvidha vipralabhaka vākya vat

original: citrādivacasām evaṃ apacārasya darśanāt /
analyzed: citra ādi vacasām evam apacārasya darśanāt

original: anāśvāso 'gnihotrādicodanāsv api jāyate //
analyzed: anāśvāsaḥ gnihotra ādi codanāsu api jāyate

original: agnihotracodanā mithyā vedaikadeśatvāt citrādicodanāvat /
analyzed: agnihotra codanā mithyā veda eka deśa tvāt citra ādi codanā vat

original: tad atra tāvad asaṃvādāt aprāmāṇyam //
analyzed: tat atra tāvat asaṃvādāt a prāmāṇyam

original: evaṃ [putrakāmaḥ putreṣṭyā yajeta] ity evamādāv api asaṃvādo draṣṭavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam putra kāmaḥ putra iṣṭyā yajeta iti evamādau api asaṃvādaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: visaṃvādo 'pi kvacit dṛśyate /
analyzed: visaṃvādaḥ pi kvacid dṛśyate

original: pramīte yajamāne pātracayanākhyaṃ karmopadiśya evamādideśe vedaḥ [sa eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamāno 'ñjasā svarge lokam eti] iti /
analyzed: pramīte yajamāne pātra cayana ākhyam karma upadiśya evam ādideśa vedaḥ saḥ eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamānaḥ ñjasā svarge lokam eti iti

original: tatra [eṣaḥ] iti tāvat ātmano nirdeśaḥ kliṣṭa eva parokṣatvāt sphyakapālādiyajñāyudhasaṃbandhābhāvāc ca kāyas tv eṣa nirdiśyate sa na svargaṃ lokaṃ yāti iti tadviparītabhasmībhāvopalaṃbhād iti visaṃvādaḥ /
analyzed: tatra eṣaḥ iti tāvat ātmanaḥ nirdeśaḥ kliṣṭaḥ eva parokṣa tvāt sphya kapāla ādi yajñāyudha saṃbandha abhāvāt ca kāyaḥ tu eṣa nirdiśyate sa na svargam lokam yāti iti tad viparīta bhasmībhāva upalaṃbhāt iti visaṃvādaḥ

original: evañ ca asaṃvādavisaṃvādābhyāṃ apramānaṃ vedaḥ //
analyzed: evam ca asaṃvāda visaṃvādābhyām apramānam vedaḥ

original: vyāghātāc ca [udite hotavyam] [anudite hotavyam] [samayādhyuṣite hotavyam] iti homakālatrayam api vidhāya nindārthavādaiḥ tad eva niṣedhati [śyāmo vā asyāhutim abhyavaharati ya udite juhoti /
analyzed: vyāghātāt ca udite hotavyam anudite hotavyam samayā adhyuṣite hotavyam iti homa kāla trayam api vidhāya nindā artha vādaiḥ tat eva niṣedhati śyāmaḥ vai asya āhutim abhyavaharati yaḥ udite juhoti

original: śavalo vā asyāhutim abhyavaharati yo 'nudite juhoti /
analyzed: śavalaḥ vai asya āhutim abhyavaharati yaḥ nudite juhoti

original: śyāmaśavalāv asyāhutim abhyavaharataḥ yaḥ samayādhyuṣite juhoti] //
analyzed: śyāma śavalau asya āhutim abhyavaharataḥ yaḥ samayā adhyuṣite juhoti

original: na cārthavādamātram etad iti vaktavyam yataḥ vidhānaṃ kalpyate stutyā nindayā ca niṣedhanam /
analyzed: na ca arthavāda mātram etat iti vaktavyam yatas vidhānam kalpyate stutyā nindayā ca niṣedhanam

original: vidhis tutyoḥ samā vṛttiḥ tathā nindāniṣedhayoḥ //
analyzed: vidhiḥ tutyoḥ samā vṛttiḥ tathā nindā niṣedhayoḥ

original: na hi nindā ninditum upādīyate kin tu ninditāditarat praśaṃsitum ity ayam api prakāro 'tra na saṃbhavati kālatrayasyāpy atra niṣedhāt kasyānyasya tannindayā praśaṃsā vidhīyate tasmāt parasparaviruddhārthopadeśalakṣaṇāt vyāghātāt apramāṇṃ vedaḥ //
analyzed: na hi nindā ninditum upādīyate kin tu ninditāt itarat praśaṃsitum iti ayam api na saṃbhavati kāla trayasya api atra niṣedhāt kasya anyasya tad nindayā praśaṃsā vidhīyate tasmāt paraspara viruddha artha upadeśa lakṣaṇāt vyāghātāt vedaḥ

original: paunaruktyāc ca [triḥ prathamām anvāha trir uttamām] ity abhāsacodatāyāṃ prathamottamayoḥ sāmidhenyoḥ trir vacanāt paunaruktyam /
analyzed: paunaruktyāt ca tris prathamām anvāha tris uttamām iti a bhāsa codatāyām prathama uttamayoḥ sāmidhenyoḥ tris vacanāt paunaruktyam

original: sakṛdanuvacanena taprayojanasaṃpatteḥ anarthakaṃ trir vacanam /
analyzed: sakṛt anuvacanena ta prayojana saṃpatteḥ anarthakam tris vacanam

original: tasmāt ittham anṛtavyāghātapunaruktadoṣakaluṣitatvāt apramāṇaṃ vedaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ittham anṛta vyāghāta punarukta doṣa kaluṣita tvāt apramāṇam vedaḥ

original: tad āha sūtrakāraḥ /
analyzed: tat āha sūtrakāraḥ

original: [tadaprāmāṇyam anṛtavyāghātapunaruktadoṣebhyaḥ putrakāmeṣṭihavanābhyāseṣu ] iti //
analyzed: tad aprāmāṇyam anṛta vyāghāta punarukta doṣebhyaḥ putra kāma iṣṭi havana abhyāseṣu iti

original: atra samādhim āha [na karmakartṛsādhanavaiguṇyāt ] iti //
analyzed: atra samādhim āha na karma kartṛ sādhana vaiguṇyāt iti

original: ayam āśayaḥ /
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ

original: aprāmāṇyasādhanaṃ anṛtatvaṃ parair uktam /
analyzed: a prāmāṇya sādhanam anṛta tvam paraiḥ uktam

original: anṛtatve ca sādhanaṃ phalādarśanam /
analyzed: anṛta tve ca sādhanam phala adarśanam

original: etac cānaikāntikam anyathā 'pi phalādarśanopapatteḥ /
analyzed: etat ca anaikāntikam anyathā pi phala adarśana upapatteḥ

original: kiṃ vedasyāsatyārthatvād atra phalādarśanam uta kartrādivaiguṇyāt iti na viśeṣahetur asti //
analyzed: kim vedasya asatya artha tvāt atra phala adarśanam uta kartṛ ādi vaiguṇyāt iti na viśeṣa hetuḥ asti

original: nanu na kadācid api karmasamanantaram eva phalam upalabdham iti tadadarśanam eva tadanṛtatvakāraṇam na kāraṇavaiguṇyam iti tadayuktam aviguṇāyāṃ kārīryāṃ prayuktāyāṃ sadya eva vṛṣṭer darśanāt /
analyzed: nanu na kadācid api karma samanantaram eva phalam upalabdham iti tad adarśanam eva tad anṛta tva kāraṇam na kāraṇa vaiguṇyam iti tat ayuktam aviguṇāyām kārīryām prayuktāyām sadyas eva vṛṣṭeḥ darśanāt

original: na ca tat kākatālīyam āgamena anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ ca tatkāraṇatvadarśanāt //
analyzed: na ca tat kākatālīyam āgamena anvaya vyatirekābhyām ca tad kāraṇatva darśanāt

original: putrādis tv aihikam api phalaṃ vastusvabhāvaparyālocanayaiva na sadyo bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: putra ādiḥ tu aihikam api phalam vastu svabhāva paryālocanayā eva na sadyas bhavitum arhati

original: na hi nabhasas tadānīm eva vṛṣṭir iva nipatati putraḥ strīpuṃsasaṃyogakaraṇāntarasavyapekṣatvāt tadutpatteḥ /
analyzed: na hi nabhasaḥ tadānīm eva vṛṣṭiḥ iva nipatati putraḥ strīpuṃsa saṃyoga karaṇa antara sa vyapekṣa tvāt tad utpatteḥ

original: paśuādiprāptis tu kasyacit adūrakāle 'pi dṛśyate pratigrahādinā /
analyzed: paśu ādi prāptiḥ tu kasyacid adūra kāle dṛśyate pratigraha ādinā

original: tathā hy āsmatpitāmaha eva grāmakāmaḥ sāṃgrahaṇīṃ kṛtavān /
analyzed: tathā hi ā asmad pitāmahaḥ eva grāma kāmaḥ sāṃgrahaṇīm kṛtavān

original: sa iṣṭisamāptisamanantaram eva gauramūlakaṃ grāmam avāpa //
analyzed: saḥ iṣṭi samāpti samanantaram eva gauramūlakam grāmam avāpa

original: nanu evaṃ tarhi pratigrahādy eva dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇam astu paśvādeḥ /
analyzed: nanu evam tarhi pratigraha ādi eva dṛṣṭam kāraṇam astu paśu ādeḥ

original: putrasya ca strīpuṃsayogaḥ /
analyzed: putrasya ca strīpuṃsa yogaḥ

original: kim iṣṭeḥ kāraṇatvakalpanayā iti maivaṃ vocaḥ satsv api ca dṛṣṭeṣu kāraṇeṣu tadadarśanāt iṣṭiprayogānantaraṃ caitaddarśanāt //
analyzed: kim iṣṭeḥ kāraṇa tva kalpanayā iti mā evam vocaḥ satsu api ca dṛṣṭeṣu kāraṇeṣu tad adarśanāt iṣṭi prayoga anantaram ca etad darśanāt

original: iṣṭikṛtaṃ strīpuṃsayogādikāraṇatvam iti niścīyate /

original: kiñ ca sevādhyayanakṛṣyādisāmye 'pi phalabhedataḥ /
analyzed: kim ca sevā adhyayana kṛṣi ādi sāmye pi phala bhedataḥ

original: vaktuṃ na yuktā tatprāptiḥ dṛṣṭakāraṇamātrajā //
analyzed: vaktum na yuktā tad prāptiḥ dṛṣṭa kāraṇa mātra jā

original: bhūtasvabhāvavādādi purastāt pratiṣidhyate /
analyzed: bhūta svabhāva vāda ādi purastāt pratiṣidhyate

original: tasmān nūnam upetavyaṃ atrānyad api kāraṇam //
analyzed: tasmāt nūnam upetavyam atra anyat api kāraṇam

original: tad uktaṃ [tac caiva hi tatra kāraṇam śabdaś ca] iti //
analyzed: tat uktam tat ca eva hi tatra kāraṇam śabdaḥ ca iti

original: yatra punaḥ aviguṇe 'pi karmaṇi prayujyamāne kālāntare 'pi putrapaśvādiphalaṃ na dṛśyate tatra tīvraṃ kim api prāktanaṃ karma pratibandhakaṃ kalpanīyam /
analyzed: yatra punar aviguṇe pi karmaṇi prayujyamāne kāla antare pi putra paśu ādi phalam na dṛśyate tatra tīvram kim api prāktanam karma pratibandhakam kalpanīyam

original: yathoktam [ phalati yadi na sarvaṃ tatkadacit tad eva /
analyzed: yathā uktam phalati yadi na sarvam tat kadacid tat eva

original: dhruvam aparam abhuktaṃ karma śāstrīyam āste ] iti //
analyzed: dhruvam aparam abhuktam karma śāstrīyam āste iti

original: karmādivaiguṇyagrahaṇam upalakṣaṇārthaṃ ṛṣiṇā prayuktam /
analyzed: karma ādi vaiguṇya grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham ṛṣiṇā prayuktam

original: na tu vedasyāprāmāṇyakalpanā sādhvī sādguṇye karmaṇaḥ prācuryeṇa phaladarśanāt //
analyzed: na tu vedasya aprāmāṇya kalpanā sādhvī sādguṇye karmaṇaḥ prācuryeṇa phala darśanāt

original: api ca vitrātaḥ praśavo bhavanti ity etāvān eva śāstrārthaḥ /
analyzed: api ca vitrātaḥ praśavaḥ bhavanti iti etāvān eva śāstra arthaḥ

original: ānantarye tu na kiñcit pramāṇam asti /
analyzed: ānantarye tu na kiñcid pramāṇam asti

original: tad ayaṃ prtyakṣādivisaṃvādaḥ ānantaryaviṣayaḥ /
analyzed: tat ayam prtyakṣa ādi visaṃvādaḥ ānantarya viṣayaḥ

original: citrādicodanā tu anirdiṣṭakālaviśeṣaviṣayeti viṣayabhedān na sātena bādhyate /
analyzed: citra ādi codanā tu anirdiṣṭa kāla viśeṣa viṣayā iti viṣaya bhedāt na sātena bādhyate

original: tadāha bhaṭṭaḥ  [ ānantaryavisaṃvādaḥ nāviśeṣapravartinīm /
analyzed: tat āha bhaṭṭaḥ

original: codanāṃ bāvituṃ śaktaḥ sphuṭd viṣayabhedataḥ //] iti //
analyzed: codanām śaktaḥ viṣaya bhedataḥ iti

original: yat tu karmasvabhāvaparyālocanayā citrāder anantaraphalatvam uktaṃ yatkālaṃ hi mardanaṃ tatkālaṃ mardanasukham iti tad etad atyantam anabhijñasyābhighānam vidhiphalānāṃ kriyāphalatulyatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: yat tu karma svabhāva paryālocanayā citra ādeḥ anantara phala tvam uktam yad kālam hi mardanam tad kālam mardana sukham iti tat etat atyantam anabhijñasya abhighānam vidhi phalānām kriyā phala tulya tva anupapatteḥ

original: iha kiñcit vidhiphalaṃ bhavati kiñcit kriyāphalam /
analyzed: iha kiñcid vidhi phalam bhavati kiñcid kriyā phalam

original: kṛpyāddau tu bhūmipāṭanādi kriyāphalam sasyasampattis tu vidhiphalam //
analyzed: tu bhūmi pāṭana ādi kriyā phalam sasya sampattiḥ tu vidhi phalam

original: kaḥ punaḥ kṛpyādau vidhiḥ asti vārtāvidyāyāṃ vṛddhopadeśo vā kaścid vidhiḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ punar kṛpī ādau vidhiḥ asti vārttā vidyāyām vṛddha upadeśaḥ vā kaścid vidhiḥ

original: anvayavyatirekau vā tatra vidhisthānīyau bhaviṣyataḥ //
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekau vā tatra vidhi sthānīyau bhaviṣyataḥ

original: loke 'pi [vetanakāmaḥ pacati] ityādau pākakriyāphalaṃ odanaḥ vidhiphalaṃ tu vetanam /
analyzed: loke vetana kāmaḥ pacati ityādau pāka kriyā phalam odanaḥ vidhi phalam tu vetanam

original: tatra kriyāphalānām evaiṣa niyamaḥ yat kriyām antarabhavitvam /
analyzed: tatra kriyā phalānām eva eṣa niyamaḥ yat kriyām antarabhavitvam

original: vidhiphalānāṃ tu vetanādīnāṃ nāsti kālaniyamaḥ /
analyzed: vidhi phalānām tu vetana ādīnām na asti kāla niyamaḥ

original: iṣṭāv api havirvikārādi kriyāphalaṃ sadyo bhavaty eva /
analyzed: iṣṭau api haviḥ vikāra ādi kriyā phalam sadyas bhavati eva

original: paśuputrādi tu vidhiphalaṃ anavacchinnakālam /
ata ev mardanasukhaṃ kriyāphalam iti sadyo bhavati /
analyzed: atas eva mardana sukham kriyā phalam iti sadyas bhavati

original: mṛdgatas tu puṃsaḥ sevāphalam aniyatakālam //
analyzed: mṛd gataḥ tu puṃsaḥ sevā phalam aniyata kālam

original: grāmakāmo mahīpālaṃ sevetety evamādiṣu /
analyzed: grāma kāmaḥ mahīpālam seveta iti evamādiṣu

original: laukikeṣu vidhiṣv asti na kālaniyamaḥ phale //
analyzed: laukikeṣu vidhiṣu asti na kāla niyamaḥ phale

original: āyurvedopadiṣṭānām apy aupadhavidhīnāṃ na kriyāvat sadya eva phaladarśanam /
analyzed: āyurveda upadiṣṭānām api aupadha vidhīnām na kriyā vat sadyas eva phala darśanam

original: api tu kālāpekṣam eveti na phalānantarye kiñcit pramāṇam //
analyzed: api tu kāla apekṣam eva iti na phala ānantarye kiñcid pramāṇam

original: yat tu paśuvirahakṛtakadarśanādidoṣadūyamānādhikārisvarūpaparyālocanayā sadyaḥphalatvam ucyate tad api na sāṃpratam puruṣecchāmātram etat na pramāṇavṛttam //
analyzed: yat tu paśu viraha kṛtaka darśana ādi doṣa dūyamāna adhikāri svarūpa paryālocanayā sadyaḥphalatvam ucyate tat api na sāṃpratam puruṣa icchā mātram etat na pramāṇa vṛttam

original: api ca aihikatvaṃ Phalasya tāvatā setsyati na punaḥ kriyāphalavat sadyastvam /
analyzed: api ca aihika tvam phalasya tāvatā setsyati na punar kriyā phala vat sadyastvam

original: santi caihikaphalāny api kālāntarasavyapekṣāṇi karmāṇi /
analyzed: santi ca aihika phalāni api kāla antara sa vyapekṣāṇi karmāṇi

original: yathā [brahmavarcasakāmasya kāryaṃ viprasya pañcame ] iti /
analyzed: yathā brahmavarcasa kāmasya kāryam viprasya pañcame iti

original: na tatra pañcamavarṣe upanītamātra eva māṇvakaḥ brahmavarcasasaṃpanno bhavati kālāntare tu bhavatīti /
analyzed: na tatra pañcama varṣe upanīta mātraḥ eva māṇvakaḥ brahmavarcasa saṃpannaḥ bhavati kāla antare tu bhavati iti

original: evaṃ vīryakāmādiṣv api dṛṣṭavyam /
analyzed: evam vīrya kāma ādiṣu api dṛṣṭavyam

original: tasmāt vidhiphalānāṃ ānantaryaniyamābhāvāt na tadvisaṃvādo doṣāya /
analyzed: tasmāt vidhi phalānām ānantarya niyama abhāvāt na tad visaṃvādaḥ doṣāya

original: kālāntare 'pi yatra phalādarśanaṃ tatra kriyāvaiguṇyakarmāntarapratibandhādi kāraṇam ity uktam //
analyzed: kāla antare pi yatra phala adarśanam tatra kriyā vaiguṇya karma antara pratibandha ādi kāraṇam iti uktam

original: anye krtrādivaiguṇyakalpanānanumodinaḥ /
analyzed: anye krtṛ ādi vaiguṇya kalpanā an anumodinaḥ

original: ihāphalasya citrādeḥ phalam āmutrikaṃ jaguḥ //
analyzed: iha aphalasya citra ādeḥ phalam āmutrikam jaguḥ

original: sarvāṅgopasaṃhāreṇa kāmyakarmaprayogāt ko 'vasaraḥ karmavaiguṇyakalpanāyām janmāntare tu tatphalam iti yuktā kalpanā //
analyzed: sarva aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa kāmya karma prayogāt kaḥ vasaraḥ karma vaiguṇya kalpanāyām janmāntare tu tad phalam iti yuktā kalpanā

original: tathā ca trividhaṃ karma kiñcid aihikaPhalam eva kiñcid āmuṣmikaphalam eva kiñcid aniyataphalam eva ihāmutra vā tatphalapradam iti kalpanā //
analyzed: tathā ca trividham karma kiñcid aihika phalam eva kiñcid āmuṣmika phalam eva kiñcid aniyata phalam eva iha amutra vā tad phala pradam iti kalpanā

original: tatra kārīryādi tāvat aihikaphalam eva /
analyzed: tatra kārīrī ādi tāvat aihika phalam eva

original: tad dhi sakalajanapadasantāpakāriṇi mahaty avagrahe prastūyate /
analyzed: tat hi sakala janapada santāpa kāriṇi mahati avagrahe prastūyate

original: vṛṣṭilakṣaṇaṃ ca tatphalaṃ svabhāvata eva sakalalokasādhāraṇam /
analyzed: vṛṣṭi lakṣaṇam ca tad phalam svabhāvataḥ eva sakala loka sādhāraṇam

original: āsanntayaiva tadabhilaṣaṇīyam iti sadya eva bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: āsanntayā eva tat abhilaṣaṇīyam iti sadyas eva bhavitum arhati

original: vacanāni ca tatra tādṛśyeva dṛśyante [yadi varṣate tāvaty eveṣṭiṃ samāpayate /
analyzed: vacanāni ca tatra tādṛśī eva dṛśyante yadi varṣate tāvati eva iṣṭim samāpayate

original: yadi na varṣat śvobhūte juhuyāt ] iti //
analyzed: yadi na varṣat śvobhūte juhuyāt iti

original: āmuṣmikaphalaṃ tu karma jyotiṣṭomādi phalasvabhāvam ahimnaiva pāralaukikaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: āmuṣmika phalam tu karma jyotiṣṭoma ādi phala svabhāvam ahimnā eva pāralaukikam bhavati

original: svargo nirupamā prītiḥ deśo vā tadviśeṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: svargaḥ nirupamā prītiḥ deśaḥ vā tad viśeṣaṇaḥ

original: bhoktuṃ nobhayathā 'py eṣaḥ dehenānena śakyate //
analyzed: bhoktum nā ubhayathā pi eṣaḥ dehena anena śakyate

original: citrādi tu aniyataphalaṃ karma tatphalasya paśvādeḥ iha vā paratra vā loke sambhavāt //
analyzed: citra ādi tu aniyata phalam karma tad phalasya paśu ādeḥ iha vā paratra vā loke sambhavāt

original: avaśyaṃcaitad evaṃ vijñeyam /
analyzed: avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam

original: tathāhi akṛtacitrāyāgānām api iha janmani paśavo dṛśyante /
analyzed: tathā hi a kṛta citra a yāgānām api iha janmani paśavaḥ dṛśyante

original: te paridṛśyamānasevāpratigrahādikāraṇakā eveti kathyamāe karmanimittatvahāneḥ bṛhaspatimatānupraveśaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: te paridṛśyamāna sevā pratigraha ādi kāraṇakāḥ eva iti kathyamāe karma nimitta tva hāneḥ bṛhaspati mata anupraveśa prasaṅgaḥ

original: karmanimittakatve tu teṣāṃ paśūnām upapādakaṃ kiṃ karma iti nirūpaṇīyam na hi brahmavarcasādiphalāt karmaṇaḥ paśavo niṣpadyante /
analyzed: karma nimittaka tve tu teṣām paśūnām upapādakam kim karma iti nirūpaṇīyam na hi brahmavarcasa ādi phalāt karmaṇaḥ paśavaḥ niṣpadyante

original: citrā ca paśuphalā iha janmani tair na kṛtaiva /
analyzed: citrā ca paśu phalā iha janmani taiḥ na kṛtā eva

original: pūrvajanmakṛtā tu tasminn eva janmani phalaṃ dattavatīti niyataihikaphalābyupagamād iti kṛtaḥ paśusaṃpat nanu gautamavacanaprāmāṇyāt pūrvakṛtabhuktaśiṣṭajyotiṣṭomādikarmanimittakaḥ sa paśulābho bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: pūrva janma kṛtā tu tasmin eva janmani phalam dattavatī iti niyata aihika phala abyupagamāt iti kṛtaḥ paśu saṃpad nanu gautama vacana prāmāṇyāt pūrva kṛta bhukta śiṣṭa jyotiṣṭoma ādi karma nimittakaḥ sa paśu lābhaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: yathoktam [varṇā āśramāś ca svakarmaniṣṭhāḥ pretya karmaphalam anubhūya patantaḥ tataśśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭadeśaśrutavṛttavittādiyuktaṃ janma pratipadyante] /
analyzed: yathā uktam varṇāḥ āśramāḥ ca sva karma niṣṭhāḥ pretya karma phalam anubhūya patantaḥ tatas śeṣeṇa viśiṣṭa deśa śruta vṛtta vitta ādi yuktam janma pratipadyante

original: naitat yathāśrutaṃ boddhuṃ yuktam  na hy anyaphalakaṃ karma dātum īṣṭe phalāntaram /
analyzed: na etat yathāśrutam boddhum yuktam na hi anya phalakam karma dātum īṣṭe phala antaram

original: sādhyasādhanabhāvo hi niyataḥ phalakarmaṇām //
analyzed: sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ hi niyataḥ phala karmaṇām

original: tasmāt samūhāpekṣā śeṣavācoyuktir vyākhyeyā bahūni hi karmāṇi varṇā āśramāś ca kṛtavantaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt samūha apekṣā śeṣa vācoyuktiḥ vyākhyeyā bahūni hi karmāṇi varṇāḥ āśramāḥ ca kṛtavantaḥ

original: tataḥ karmasamūhāt jyotiṣṭomādiphalaṃ pretyānubhūyate /
analyzed: tatas karma samūhāt jyotiṣṭoma ādi phalam pretya anubhūyate

original: tataḥ śeṣeṇa citādinā karmaṇā viśiṣṭaṃ janma pratipadyanta ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tatas śeṣeṇa citā ādinā karmaṇā viśiṣṭam janma pratipadyante iti arthaḥ

original: tasmāt pūrvajanmakṛtacitrādinibandhanaḥ iha janmani paśulābhaḥ nākarmanimittakaḥ nānyakarmanimittaka ity evam aniyataphalatvāt citrāder iha janmani phalādarśane 'pi nānṛtatvaṃ tavvodanānām janmāntare hi tā iṣṭayaḥ phalaṃ dāsyantīti //
analyzed: tasmāt pūrva janma kṛta citra ādi nibandhanaḥ iha janmani paśu lābhaḥ na akarma nimittakaḥ na anya karma nimittakaḥ iti evam aniyata phala tvāt citra ādeḥ iha janmani phala adarśane na na anṛta tvam janmāntare hi tāḥ iṣṭayaḥ phalam dāsyanti iti

original: atrocyate kiṃ vācanikam etat karmaṇāṃ traividhyam uta puruṣe cchādhīnam iti //
analyzed: atra ucyate kim vācanikam etat karmaṇām traividhyam uta puruṣe cchā adhīnam iti

original: tatra vacanaṃ tāvat trividhavibhāgapratipādakaṃ nāsti [kārīrīṃ nirvapet vṛṣṭikāmaḥ] [jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta] [citrayā paśukāmaḥ] ity etāvanmātraśravaṇam /
analyzed: tatra vacanam tāvat trividha vibhāga pratipādakam na asti kārīrīm nirvapet vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta citrayā paśu kāmaḥ iti etāvat mātra śravaṇam

original: na hy atra aihikatvaṃ pāralaukikatvaṃ aniyatatvaṃ vā kvacit phalasya paṭhitam //
analyzed: na hi atra aihika tvam pāralaukika tvam aniyata tvam vā kvacid phalasya paṭhitam

original: vidhivṛttam api iyad eva yat sapratyayapravartanaṃ nām /
analyzed: vidhi vṛttam api iyat eva yat sa pratyaya pravartanam nām

original: tatra idam evaṃkāmena kartavyam ity etāvān liṅarthaḥ /
analyzed: tatra idam evaṃkāmena kartavyam iti etāvān liṅ arthaḥ

original: apuruṣārtharūpe tu vyāpāre pravartakatvalakṣaṇasvavyāpāranirvahaṇam anadhigacchan vidhiḥ adhikāriviśeṣaṇasya kāmasya kāmyamānasya svargādeḥ bhāvārthasya ca yāgādeḥ sādhyasādhanasambandham eva avabodhayati na kāmyamānasya sadyaḥ kālāntare vā niṣpattim ākṣipartīti //
analyzed: apuruṣa artha rūpe tu vyāpāre pravartaka tva lakṣaṇa sva vyāpāra nirvahaṇam anadhigacchan vidhiḥ adhikāri viśeṣaṇasya kāmasya kāmyamānasya svarga ādeḥ bhāva arthasya ca yāga ādeḥ sādhya sādhana sambandham eva avabodhayati na kāmyamānasya sadyas kāla antare vā niṣpattim ākṣiparti iti

original: phalasvarūpaparyālocanayā tu satyaṃ svargasya pāralaukikatvam avagamyate na tu paśvāder aniyamaḥ //
analyzed: phala svarūpa paryālocanayā tu satyam svargasya pāralaukika tvam avagamyate na tu paśu ādeḥ aniyamaḥ

original: puruṣecchā tu puruṣecchaiva na tayā śāstrārtho vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyaḥ tasmāt niṣpramāṇakaṃ traividhyam //
analyzed: puruṣa icchā tu puruṣa icchā eva na tayā śāstra arthaḥ vyavasthāpayitum śakyaḥ tasmāt niṣpramāṇakam traividhyam

original: yas tu citrādīnām aniyataphalatve nyāya uktaḥ [citrādīnāṃ phalaṃ tāvat kīṇaṃ tatraiva janmani] ityādi sa kārīryām api niścitaihikaphalāyāṃ yojayituṃ śakyaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ tu citra ādīnām aniyata phala tve nyāyaḥ uktaḥ citra ādīnām phalam tāvat kīṇam tatra eva janmani ityādi sa kārīryām api niścita aihika phalāyām yojayitum śakyaḥ

original: adyākṛtāyāṃ kārīryāṃ na hi devo na varṣati /
analyzed: adya akṛtāyām kārīryām na hi devaḥ na varṣati

original: janmāntarakṛtā tatra kārīrī kiṃ na kāraṇam //
analyzed: janma antara kṛtā tatra kārīrī kim na kāraṇam

original: tasmāt sā 'py aniyataphalā bhavatu //
analyzed: tasmāt sā pi aniyata phalā bhavatu

original: atha sasyasaṃpatsaṃpādyasukhasaṃbhogasādhanabhūtādṛṣṭanimittā vṛṣṭiḥ ayākṛtāyām api kārīryām iti manyase tarhi dadhikṣīrādibhakṣaṇasukhākṣepikarmanimittakaḥ paśulābho bhaviṣyati akṛṭacitrāyāgānām /
analyzed: atha sasya saṃpad saṃpādya sukha saṃbhoga sādhana bhūta adṛṣṭa nimittā vṛṣṭiḥ ayākṛtāyām api kārīryām iti manyase tarhi dadhi kṣīra ādi bhakṣaṇa sukha ākṣepi karma nimittakaḥ paśu lābhaḥ bhaviṣyati akṛṭa citra a yāgānām

original: kārīryadhīna odanaḥ citrādhinaṃ dadhīti dadhyodanabhojanasukhasādhanādṛṣṭakāritā paśuvṛṣṭisṛṣṭir bhavatu //
analyzed: kārīrī adhīnaḥ odanaḥ citra adhinam dadhi iti dadhi odana bhojana sukha sādhana adṛṣṭa kāri tā paśu vṛṣṭi sṛṣṭiḥ bhavatu

original: atha śṛṅgagrāhikayā paśuphalā citreṣṭir upadiśyate tena na sukhasāmānyākṣepakakarmanibandhanaḥ paśulābhaḥ evaṃ tarhi vṛṣṭāv api śṛṅgagrāhikayā kārīrī paṭhyata eveti vṛṣṭir api sāmānyādṛṣṭanibandhanā mā bhūt //
analyzed: atha śṛṅga grāhikayā paśu phalā citreṣṭiḥ upadiśyate tena na sukha sāmānya ākṣepaka karma nibandhanaḥ paśu lābhaḥ evam tarhi vṛṣṭau api śṛṅga grāhikayā kārīrī paṭhyate eva iti vṛṣṭiḥ api sāmānya adṛṣṭa nibandhanā mā bhūt

original: atha [na yadi varṣet śvobhūta juhuyāt] ityādivacanaparyālocanayā tasyām aihikaphalatvam ucyate yady evaṃ yatra tādṛṣaṃ vacanaṃ nāsti [yo vṛṣṭikāmaḥ sa saubhareṇa stuvīta] [yadi kāmayeta varṣakaḥ parjanya syād iti] [nīcaiḥ sado minuyāt] ityādau tatra pāralaukikaphalatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: atha na yadi varṣet śvobhūta juhuyāt ityādi vacana paryālocanayā tasyām aihika phala tvam ucyate yadi evam yatra tādṛṣam vacanam na asti yaḥ vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ sa saubhareṇa stuvīta yadi kāmayeta varṣakaḥ parjanya syāt iti nīcais sadaḥ minuyāt ityādau tatra pāralaukika phala tvam syāt

original: [yadi ca cvobhūte juhuyāt] iti vacanamahimnaiva phale sadyastvamātram adhikaṃ bhavatu na tu tādṛśavacanarahitānāṃ karmāṇāṃ vispaṣṭasiddham apy aihikaphalatvaṃ nivartate //
analyzed: yadi ca cvas bhūte juhuyāt iti vacana mahimnā eva phale sadyastva mātram adhikam bhavatu na tu tādṛśa vacana rahitānām karmāṇām vispaṣṭa siddham api aihika phala tvam nivartate

original: yat punaḥ bahusādhāraṇatve vṛṣṭer aihikatvam ucyate tad api paśvādau samānam na hy ātmambharir eva yajamāno bhavati tasyāpi svavāsinī kumārātithibhṛtyādibhojanapūrvakasvabhojananiyamopadeśāt /
analyzed: yat punar bahu sādhāraṇa tve vṛṣṭeḥ aihika tvam ucyate tat api paśu ādau samānam na hi ātmambhariḥ eva yajamānaḥ bhavati tasya api svavāsinī kumāra atithi bhṛtya ādi bhojana pūrvaka sva bhojana niyama upadeśāt

original: bahutaropakārakatvaṃ tu vṛṣṭer ity alaṃ tulayā //
analyzed: bahutara upakāraka tvam tu vṛṣṭeḥ iti alam tulayā

original: yad api pratyāsannatvena kāmyamānatvāt vṛṣṭer aihikatvaṃ kathyate tad api tādṛg eva paśvāder api tathaiva kāmyamānatvāt /
analyzed: yat api pratyāsanna tvena kāmyamāna tvāt vṛṣṭeḥ aihika tvam kathyate tat api tādṛś eva paśu ādeḥ api tathā eva kāmyamāna tvāt

original: tatrāvagrahavihitasantāpatayā pratyāsannatvena vṛṣṭir abhilaṣyate ihāpi daurgatyodvegāt āsannatayaiva paśavaḥ kāmyante /
analyzed: tatra avagraha vihita santāpa tayā pratyāsanna tvena vṛṣṭiḥ abhilaṣyate iha api daurgatyā udvegāt āsanna tayā eva paśavaḥ kāmyante

original: tasmāt [vāridaḥ tṛptam āpnoti sukham akṣayamannadaḥ] ityādivacanopadiṣṭasāmānyasukhasādhanādṛṣṭanibandhanaiveyaṃ ihākṛṭakarmaṇāṃ vṛṣṭipaśvādisaṃpattir iti na bṛhaspatimatavat akarmanimittaṃ phalam /
analyzed: tasmāt vāri daḥ tṛptam āpnoti sukham akṣayam anna daḥ ityādi vacana upadiṣṭa sāmānya sukha sādhana adṛṣṭa nibandhanā eva iyam iha ākṛṭa karmaṇām vṛṣṭi paśu ādi saṃpattiḥ iti na bṛhaspati mata vat akarma nimittam phalam

original: nāpi karmaphalasādhyasādhanabāvaniyamavyavahārollaṅghanam iti //
analyzed: nā api karma phala sādhya sādhana bāva niyama vyavahāra ullaṅghanam iti

original: yac ca kārīryāḥ kvacitphalāvisaṃvāde samādhānam uktaṃ phalati yadi n sarvaṃ tat kadācit tad eva dhruvan aparam abhuktaṃ karma śāstrīyam āste ] iti tena sā 'py aniyataphalaiva syāt /
analyzed: yat ca kārīryāḥ kvacid phala avisaṃvāde samādhānam uktam phalati yadi n sarvam tat kadācid tat eva aparam abhuktam karma śāstrīyam āste iti tena sā pi aniyata phalā eva syāt

original: na hi tatkarmāntaraṃ āsaṃsāraṃ pratibandhakaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na hi tat karma antaram āsaṃsāram pratibandhakam bhavati

original: phalopabhogād dhi tasyāvaśyaṃ kṣayeṇa bhavitavyam /
analyzed: phala upabhogāt hi tasya avaśyam kṣayeṇa bhavitavyam

original: pratibandhake ca kṣīṇī kārīryā svaphalaṃ tadā dātavyam eva /
analyzed: pratibandhake ca kṣīṇī kārīryā sva phalam tadā dātavyam eva

original: sā 'py adattaphalā na kṣīyata evetyevaṃ janmāntare tatphalasaṃbhavāt tasyā api aniyataphalatvam //
analyzed: sā pi adatta phalā na kṣīyate eva iti evam janmāntare tad phala saṃbhavāt tasyāḥ api aniyata phala tvam

original: anena ca prakāreṇa citrāder apy aniyataphalatvaṃ asmābhir iṣyata eva yatra samyakprayuktāyām apīṣṭau karmāntarapratibandhād eva paśūnām anupalambhaḥ kalpyate /
analyzed: anena ca prakāreṇa citra ādeḥ api aniyata phala tvam asmābhiḥ iṣyate eva yatra samyak prayuktāyām api iṣṭau karma antara pratibandhāt eva paśūnām anupalambhaḥ kalpyate

original: sarvatha sadyaḥphalatvamātravarjaṃ samānayogakṣemā kārīryā citreṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: sarvathā sadyas phala tva mātra varjam samāna yogakṣemā kārīryā citreṣṭiḥ

original: etena brahmavarcasavīryān nādyagrāmādikāmeṣṭayo 'pi vyākhyātāḥ /
analyzed: etena brahmavarcasa vīryāt nādya grāma ādi kāma iṣṭayaḥ vyākhyātāḥ

original: tasmāt yathāśrutaṃ gautamaṃ boddhavyam //
analyzed: tasmāt yathāśrutam gautamam boddhavyam

original: yad apy abhyadhāyi samagrāṅgopasaṃhāreṇa kāmyakarmaprayogāt kutaḥ karmaṇo vaiguṇyāvasara iti tad apy asāram sarvāṅgopasaṃhāreṇa pravṛttāv api pramādāt asaṃvedyamānavaiguṇyasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: yat api abhyadhāyi samagra aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa kāmya karma prayogāt kutas karmaṇaḥ vaiguṇya avasaraḥ iti tat api asāram sarva aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa pravṛttau api pramādāt a saṃvedyamāna vaiguṇya saṃbhavāt

original: sa ca vicitraḥ bhāṣyakāreṇa pradarśitaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca vicitraḥ bhāṣyakāreṇa pradarśitaḥ

original: tasmāt pūrvokta eva pratisamādhānamārgaḥ śreyān //
analyzed: tasmāt pūrva uktaḥ eva pratisamādhāna mārgaḥ śreyān

original: yat punaḥ pūrvapākṣikeṇa kathitam kālāntare karmābhāvāt kutaḥ phalam iti tad api na samyak yady apy āphalaniṣpatteḥ karmaṇo nāsty avasthitiḥ /
analyzed: yat punar pūrva pākṣikeṇa kathitam kāla antare karma abhāvāt kutas phalam iti tat api na samyak yadi api ā phala niṣpatteḥ karmaṇaḥ na asti avasthitiḥ

original: tathāpy asty eva saṃskāraḥ puruṣasya tadāhitaḥ //
analyzed: tathā api asti eva saṃskāraḥ puruṣasya tad āhitaḥ

original: karmajanyo hi saṃskāraḥ puṃso buddhyādivad guṇaḥ /
analyzed: karma janyaḥ hi saṃskāraḥ puṃsaḥ buddhi ādi vat guṇaḥ

original: tasya cāphalasaṃyogāt avasthitir upeyate //
analyzed: tasya ca a phala saṃyogāt avasthitiḥ upeyate

original: yathendriyādisaṃyogāt ātmano buddhisaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: yathā indriya ādi saṃyogāt ātmanaḥ buddhi saṃbhavaḥ

original: tathā yāgādikarmabhyaḥ tasya saṃskārasaṃbhavaḥ //
analyzed: tathā yāga ādi karmabhyaḥ tasya saṃskāra saṃbhavaḥ

original: buddhis tu bhaṅgurā tasya saṃskāras tu phalāvadhiḥ /
analyzed: buddhiḥ tu bhaṅgurā tasya saṃskāraḥ tu phala avadhiḥ

original: sādhyasādhanabhāvo hi nānyathā phalakarmaṇoḥ //
analyzed: sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ hi na anyathā phala karmaṇoḥ

original: smṛtibījaṃ tu saṃskāraḥ tasyānyair api mṛṣyate /
analyzed: smṛti bījam tu saṃskāraḥ tasya anyaiḥ api mṛṣyate

original: tathaiva phalasaṃyogabījaṃ so 'sya bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: tathā eva phala saṃyoga bījam saḥ sya bhaviṣyati

original: sa yāgadānahomādijanyo dharmagirocyate /
analyzed: sa yāga dāna homa ādi janyaḥ dharma girā ucyate

original: brahmahtyādijanyas tu so 'dharma iti kathyate //
analyzed: brahma hti ādi janyaḥ tu saḥ dharmaḥ iti kathyate

original: kapilās tu antaḥkaraṇasya buddheḥ vṛttiviśeṣam dharmam āhuḥ /
analyzed: kapilāḥ tu antaḥkaraṇasya buddheḥ vṛtti viśeṣam dharmam āhuḥ

original: ārhatāḥ puṇyapudgalān dharmatvena vyapadiśanti /
analyzed: ārhatāḥ puṇya pudgalān dharma tvena vyapadiśanti

original: śākyabhikṣavaḥ cittavāsanāṃ dharmam ācakṣate /
analyzed: śākya bhikṣavaḥ citta vāsanām dharmam ācakṣate

original: vṛddamīmāṃsakāḥ yāgādikarmanirvartyaṃ apūrvaṃ nāma dharmam abhivadanti /
analyzed: vṛdda mīmāṃsakāḥ yāga ādi karma nirvartyam apūrvam nāma dharmam abhivadanti

original: yāgādikarmaiva śābarā bruvate /
analyzed: yāga ādi karma eva śābarāḥ bruvate

original: vākyārtha eva niyogātmā apūrvaśabdavācyaḥ dharmaśabdena ca sa evocyata iti prābhākarāḥ kathayanti //
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ eva niyoga ātmā apūrva śabda vācyaḥ dharma śabdena ca saḥ eva ucyate iti prābhākarāḥ kathayanti

original: tatra puṇyapudgalavṛttipakṣayoḥ kapilārhadgranthakathitayoḥ tanmatanirāsād eva nirāsaḥ //
analyzed: tatra puṇya pudgala vṛtti pakṣayoḥ kapila arhat grantha kathitayoḥ tad mata nirāsāt eva nirāsaḥ

original: ātmanaś ca samarthayiṣyamāṇatvāt tasyaiva vāsanā na cetasa iti saugatapakṣo 'py ayuktaḥ //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca samarthayiṣyamāṇa tvāt tasya eva vāsanā na cetasaḥ iti saugata pakṣaḥ pi ayuktaḥ

original: sarvagayāgāntarālavartinaś ca sthirasya //
analyzed: sarva ga yāga antarāla vartinaḥ ca sthirasya

original: nirādhārasyāpūrvasya niṣpramāṇakatvāt jarajjaiminīyapravado 'py apeśalaḥ /
analyzed: nirādhārasya apūrvasya niṣpramāṇaka tvāt pi apeśalaḥ

original: api ca phalasya vā kācid utpatsyamānadaśā yāgasya vā śaktiḥ apūrvaśabdenocyate //
analyzed: api ca phalasya vā kācid utpatsyamāna daśā yāgasya vā śaktiḥ apūrva śabdena ucyate

original: na ca niyogaḥ vākyārtha eva apūrvaśabdavācyaḥ tasyopariṣṭād apākariṣyamāṇatvāt //
analyzed: na ca niyogaḥ vākya arthaḥ eva apūrva śabda vācyaḥ tasya upariṣṭāt apākariṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: nāpi yo yāgam anutiṣṭḥati taṃ dharmika ity ācakṣata iti yāgādisāmānādhikaraṇyena prayogāt sa eva dharmaśabdavācya iti yuktaṃ vaktuṃ tasya kṣaṇikatvena kālāntare phaladātṛtvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: nā api yaḥ yāgam anutiṣṭḥati tam dharmikaḥ iti ācakṣate iti yāga ādi sāmānādhikaraṇyena prayogāt saḥ eva dharma śabda vācyaḥ iti yuktam vaktum tasya kṣaṇika tvena kāla antare phala dātṛ tva anupapatteḥ

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogo 'pi caikātato nāsty eva //
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇya prayogaḥ ca ekātataḥ na asti eva

original: yāgadānādinā dharmo bhavatīty api laukikaḥ /
analyzed: yāga dāna ādinā dharmaḥ bhavati iti api laukikaḥ

original: prayogāḥ santi te cāmī saṃskriyāpakṣasākṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: prayogāḥ santi te ca amī saṃskriyā pakṣa sākṣiṇaḥ

original: evaṃ [yajñena yajñamayajanta devās tāni dharmāṇi prathamānyāsan] iti vaidiko 'pi prayogaḥ tadviṣaya eva vyākhyeyaḥ tasya sthāyitvena kālāntare phaladānayogyatopapatteḥ //
analyzed: evam yajñena yajñam ayajanta devāḥ tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan iti vaidikaḥ pi prayogaḥ tad viṣayaḥ eva vyākhyeyaḥ tasya sthāyi tvena kāla antare phala dāna yogya tā upapatteḥ

original: saṃskāro nṛguṇaḥ sthāyī tasmād dharma iti sthitam /
analyzed: saṃskāraḥ nṛ guṇaḥ sthāyī tasmāt dharmaḥ iti sthitam

original: tasmāc ca phalaniṣpatteḥ na citrādau mṛṣārthatā //
analyzed: tasmāt ca phala niṣpatteḥ na citra ādau mṛṣārtha tā

original: yad api yajñāyudhivākye pratyakṣaviruddham upapādyāte sma bhasmībhāvopalambhāt kāyasyeti tad apy asamīcīnam eṣa iti śarīrābhedopacāreṇa ātmana eva nirdeśāt /
analyzed: yat api yajñāyudhi vākye pratyakṣa viruddham upapādyāte sma bhasmībhāva upalambhāt kāyasya iti tat api asamīcīnam eṣaḥ iti śarīra abheda upacāreṇa ātmanaḥ eva nirdeśāt

original: tasya ca svargagamanaṃ bhavaty eva /
analyzed: tasya ca svarga gamanam bhavati eva

original: gamanaṃ ca tadupabhoga eva tasyocyate yathā śarīrādiyogaviyogau janmamareṇe iti /
analyzed: gamanam ca tad upabhogaḥ eva tasya ucyate yathā śarīra ādi yoga viyogau janma mareṇe iti

original: na tu vyāpinaḥ parispandātmakakriyāyoga upapadyate /
analyzed: na tu vyāpinaḥ parispanda ātmaka kriyā yogaḥ upapadyate

original: jñānacikīrṣāprayatnasamavāyaś ca tasya kartṛtvam iti varṇayiṣyate /
analyzed: jñāna cikīrṣā prayatna samavāyaḥ ca tasya kartṛ tvam iti varṇayiṣyate

original: yajñāyudhasambandho 'pi svasvāmibhāvādiḥ tasyaiva vyāpakatvāviśeṣe 'pi vyavasthayopapadyata iti na kaścid atra virodhaḥ /
analyzed: sva svāmi bhāva ādiḥ tasya eva vyāpaka tva aviśeṣe vyavasthayā upapadyate iti na kaścid atra virodhaḥ

original: tasmāt sarvatra niravakāśam anṛtatvādidūṣaṇam //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvatra niravakāśam anṛta tva ādi dūṣaṇam

original: yo 'pi havanakālavidhau vyāghātadoṣo darśitaḥ so 'pi na doṣa eva //
analyzed: yaḥ pi havana kāla vidhau vyāghāta doṣaḥ darśitaḥ saḥ u pi na doṣaḥ eva

original: tatrānuṣṭānabhedena kālatritayacodanā /
analyzed: tatra anuṣṭāna bhedena kāla tritaya codanā

original: yo yasya coditaḥ kālaḥ laṅghanīyo na tena saḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ yasya coditaḥ kālaḥ laṅghanīyaḥ na tena saḥ

original: tataś cānyatamaṃ kālaṃ abhyupetyainam ujjhataḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca anyatamam kālam abhyupetya enam ujjhataḥ

original: nindeti na virodho 'tra kaścid vidhiniṣedhayoḥ//
analyzed: nindā iti na kaścid vidhi niṣedhayoḥ

original: abhyāse paunaruktyaṃ ca kāryārthatvād adūṣanam /
analyzed: abhyāse paunaruktyam ca kārya artha tvāt a dūṣanam

original: saṃpādyaṃ pāñcadaśyaṃ hi sāmidhenīṣu coditam //
analyzed: saṃpādyam pāñcadaśyam hi sāmidhenīṣu coditam

original: [imam ahaṃ pañcadaśāreṇa vajreṇāpavādhe yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ ] iti śrūyate /
analyzed: imam aham pañcadaśa areṇa vajreṇa apavādhe yaḥ smān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ iti śrūyate

original: ekādaśasāmidhenya ṛcas tu paṭhyante /
analyzed: ekādaśa sāmidhenyaḥ ṛcaḥ tu paṭhyante

original: tatrābhyāsam antareṇa pāñcadaśyaṃ nāvakalpyata ity evam avaśyakartavyo 'bhyāsaḥ /
analyzed: tatra abhyāsam antareṇa pāñcadaśyam na avakalpyate iti evam avaśya kartavyaḥ bhyāsaḥ

original: sa cāyam aniyamena prāptaḥ vacanena niyamyate prathamottame ṛcau triruccāraṇīye iti /
analyzed: sa ca ayam aniyamena prāptaḥ vacanena niyamyate prathama uttame ṛcau tris uccāraṇīye iti

original: tasmāt tatprayojanārthatvāt na punaruktādoṣaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt tad prayojana artha tvāt na punarukta adoṣaḥ

original: abhyāse phalarahite hi paunaruktyaṃ doṣaḥ syād iha tu na tasya niṣphalatvam /
analyzed: abhyāse phala rahite hi paunaruktyam doṣaḥ syāt iha tu na tasya niṣphala tvam

original: vyāghātānṛtapunaruktatādi tasmāt vedasya ślathayati na pramāṇabhāvam //
analyzed: vyāghāta anṛta punarukta tā ādi tasmāt vedasya ślathayati na pramāṇa bhāvam

original: iyaṃ ca vākyārthavicāraṇā 'pi prāmāṇyasidhyaupayikīti matvā /
analyzed: iyam ca vākya artha vicāraṇā pi prāmāṇya sidhi aupayikī iti matvā

original: cakre svaśāstre munineha vedaprāmāṇyanirvāhaṇadīkṣitena//
analyzed: cakre sva śāstre muninā iha veda prāmāṇya nirvāhaṇa dīkṣitena

original: nanu nādyāpi vedasya bhavadbhir nipuṇair api /
analyzed: nanu nā adya api vedasya bhavadbhiḥ nipuṇaiḥ api

original: svadehasaṃbhavā doṣāḥ nikhilāḥ paripiñjitāḥ //
analyzed: sva deha saṃbhavāḥ doṣāḥ nikhilāḥ paripiñjitāḥ

original: tathāhi [so 'rodīt yad arodīt tad rudrasya rudratvam ] [prajāpatir ātmano vapām udakkhidat tām agnau prāgṛhṇāt /
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ rodīt yat arodīt tat rudrasya rudra tvam prajāpatiḥ ātmanaḥ vapām udakkhidat tām agnau prāgṛhṇāt

original: tato 'jas tūpara //
analyzed: tatas jaḥ tūpara

original: udgāt ] [devā vai devayajanam adhyavasāya diśo na prājānan ] ityevamādīnām arthavādānāṃ kiṃ yathāśrutavastuparatvam uta tebhyaḥ kāryarūpārthopadeśaparikalpanam uta liṅādiyuktavākyāntarapratipādyamānakāryarūpārthaupayikatvam iti cintyam //
analyzed: udgāt devāḥ vai devayajanam adhyavasāya diśaḥ na prājānan iti evamādīnām arthavādānām kim yathāśruta vastu paratvam uta tebhyaḥ kārya rūpa artha upadeśa parikalpanam uta liṅ ādi yukta vākya antara pratipādyamāna kārya rūpa artha aupayika tvam iti cintyam

original: sarvathā ca pramādaḥ /
analyzed: sarvathā ca pramādaḥ

original: svarūpaparatve tāvat pramāṇāntaraviruddhārthopadeśāt aprāmāṇyam evāvatarati rodanavapotkhedanadiṅmohāder arthasya tathātve niścayābhāvāt //
analyzed: svarūpa paratve tāvat pramāṇa antara viruddha artha upadeśāt aprāmāṇyam eva avatarati rodana vapā utkhedana diś moha ādeḥ arthasya tathātve niścaya abhāvāt

original: kiñca [stenaṃ mano 'nṛtavādinī vāk ] ity evañjātīyakānām arthavādavākyānāṃ vispaṣṭam eva pramāṇāntaraviruddhārthapratipādakatvam /
analyzed: kiñca stenam manaḥ nṛta vādinī vāc iti evañjātīyakānām arthavāda vākyānām vispaṣṭam eva pramāṇa antara viruddha artha pratipādaka tvam

original: na hi nisargata eva sarvaprāṇinām anṛtavādinī vāk bhavati stenaṃ vā manaḥ //
analyzed: na hi nisargataḥ eva sarva prāṇinām anṛta vādinī vāc bhavati stenam vā manaḥ

original: api ca [dhūma evāgner dadṛśe nārciḥ /
analyzed: api ca dhūmaḥ eva agneḥ dadṛśe na arciḥ

original: tasmād arcir evāgner naktaṃ dṛśyate na dhūmaḥ ] iti pratyakṣaviruddham abhidhīyate naktaṃ dinaṃ dvayor api indriyārthasannikarṣe sati grahaṇāt //
analyzed: tasmāt arciḥ eva agneḥ naktam dṛśyate na dhūmaḥ iti pratyakṣa viruddham abhidhīyate naktam dinam dvayoḥ api indriya artha sannikarṣe sati grahaṇāt

original: kiñca [etan na vidmaḥ yadi brāhmaṇāḥ smo 'brāhmaṇā vā ] iti brāhmaṇajāter upadeśasahāya pratyakṣagamyatvāt tadviruddha eṣo 'rthavādaḥ //
analyzed: kiñca etat na vidmaḥ yadi brāhmaṇāḥ smaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ vā iti brāhmaṇa jāteḥ upadeśa sahāya pratyakṣa gamya tvāt tad viruddhaḥ eṣaḥ ṛthavādaḥ

original: śāstravirodho 'py asti [ko hi tadvada yady amuṃṣmil loke 'sti vā na vā ] iti/
analyzed: śāstra virodhaḥ api asti kaḥ hi tat vada yadi amuṃṣmin loke sti vā na vā iti

original: śāstre svargādiphalānāṃ jyotiṣṭomādikarmāṇāṃ upadeśāt keyam anavak¬ptiḥ //
analyzed: śāstre svarga ādi phalānām jyotiṣṭoma ādi karmāṇām upadeśāt kā iyam anavakptiḥ

original: api ca gargatrirātrabrāhmaṇam adhikṛtya śrūyate { śobhate 'sya mukhaṃ ya evaṃ veda ] iti /
analyzed: api ca garga trirātra brāhmaṇam adhikṛtya śrūyate śobhate sya mukham yaḥ evam veda iti

original: na hi kasyacit evaṃviditaḥ mukhaṃ śobhata iti pratyakṣavirodhaḥ //
analyzed: na hi kasyacid evaṃviditaḥ mukham śobhate iti pratyakṣa virodhaḥ

original: anyakarmānarthakyaśāṃsī ca kaścid arthavādo bhavati [pūrṇāhutyā sarvān kāmān avāpnoti ] [paśubandhayājī sarvān lokān abhijayati ] [tarati mṛtyuṃ tarati pāpmānaṃ tarati brahmahatyāṃ yo 'śvmeghena yajate yaś caivaṃ veda] iti /
analyzed: anya karma ānarthakya śāṃsī ca kaścid arthavādaḥ bhavati pūrṇāhutyā sarvān kāmān avāpnoti paśubandha yājī sarvān lokān abhijayati tarati mṛtyum tarati pāpmānam tarati brahmahatyām yaḥ śva meghena yajate yaḥ ca evam veda iti

original: yadi pūrṇāhutyaiva sarvakāmāvāptiḥ paśubandhayogenaiva sarvalokajayaḥ aśvam eghavedenaiva tatphalāvāptiḥ tat kim artham anyakarmopadeśḥ upadiṣṭāny api tāni bahukleśasādhyāni karmāṇi vyarthāni bhaveyuḥ anenaiva laghunopāyena tatphalaprāpter darśanāt //
analyzed: yadi pūrṇāhutyā eva sarva kāma avāptiḥ paśubandha yogena eva sarva loka jayaḥ aśvam eghavedena eva tad phala avāptiḥ tat kim artham anya karma upadeśaḥ upadiṣṭāni api tāni bahu kleśa sādhyāni karmāṇi vyarthāni bhaveyuḥ anena eva laghunā upāyena tad phala prāpteḥ darśanāt

original: api ca [na pṛthivyām agniś cetavyaḥ nāntarikṣe na divi ] iti vede cayananiṣedhe evātra bhaṅgthā bhavet /
analyzed: api ca na pṛthivyām agniḥ cetavyaḥ na antarikṣe na divi  iti vede cayana niṣedhe eva atra bhaṅgthā bhavet

original: divi cāntarikṣe ca tāvat cayanaprayoga eva nāsti kiṃ tanniṣedhena pṛthivīcayananiṣedhārthaṃ ca yad vākyaṃ tat cayanapratiṣedhārtham eva bhavet apṛthivvydhikaraṇakasya cayanasyānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: divi ca antarikṣe ca tāvat cayana prayogaḥ eva nā asti kim tad niṣedhena pṛthivī cayana niṣedha artham ca yat vākyam tat cayana pratiṣedha artham eva bhavet a pṛthivvī dhi karaṇakasya cayanasya anupapatteḥ

original: nāpi tebhya eva kāryarūpārthaparokalpanaṃ upapannam aśakyatvāt/
analyzed: nā api tebhyaḥ eva kārya rūpa artha paraḥ kalpanam upapannam aśakya tvāt

original: [so 'rodīt yad arodīt tad rudrasya rudratvaṃ ] ity atra kāryaṃ kalpyamānam evaṃ kalpyate rudraḥ kira rurodaḥ ato 'nyenāpi roditavyam iti tac cāśakyam priyaviprayogajanitasantāpavaśena hi bāṣpamocanaṃ rodanam ucyate /
analyzed: saḥ rodīt yat arodīt tat rudrasya rudra tvam iti atra kāryam kalpyamānam evam kalpyate rudraḥ kira rurodaḥ atas nyena api roditavyam iti tat ca aśakyam priya viprayoga janita santāpa vaśena hi bāṣpa mocanam rodanam ucyate

original: na tat codanopadeśāt kartuṃ śakyate //
analyzed: na tat codanā upadeśāt kartum śakyate

original: prajāpatir ātmano vapām uccikhedaḥ tasmād anyo 'py evam utkhidet ātmano vapām iti duranuṣṭhāno 'yam arthaḥ /
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ ātmanaḥ vapām uccikhedaḥ tasmāt anyaḥ u pi evam utkhidet ātmanaḥ vapām iti duranuṣṭhānaḥ yam arthaḥ

original: ko hi nāma ātmano vapām utkhidet kasya vā vapāhome sati samanantaram eva hutabhujaḥ paśus tūpara udgacchet iti //
analyzed: kaḥ hi nāma ātmanaḥ vapām utkhidet kasya vā vapā home sati samanantaram eva hutabhujaḥ paśuḥ tūparaḥ udgacchet iti

original: devā diśo nājñāsiṣuḥ ataḥ anyo 'pi na jānīyāt iti aśakyopadeśaḥ na hi diṅmoho upadeśāt karyuṃ śakyaḥ //
analyzed: devāḥ diśaḥ atas anyaḥ pi na jānīyāt iti aśakya upadeśaḥ na hi diś mohaḥ upadeśāt karyum śakyaḥ

original: na ca sarvasmād arthavādāt vidhiḥ kalpayituṃ śakya iti madhyamo 'pi satpakṣaḥ //
analyzed: na ca sarvasmāt arthavādāt vidhiḥ kalpayitum śakyaḥ iti sat pakṣaḥ

original: nāpi tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ saṃbhavati śakyāntaravihitakāryarūpārthaupayikatvaṃ hi tadupayogidravyadevatādividhānadvārakaṃ bhavati yathā [agnihotraṃ juhoti ] ity atra [dagdho juhoti ] [payasā juhoti ] iti dravyaviniyogavidheḥ [yad agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti ] iti devatāvidher vā /
analyzed: na api tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ saṃbhavati śakya antara vihita kārya rūpa artha aupayika tvam hi tad upayogi dravya devatā ādi vidhāna dvārakam bhavati yathā agnihotram juhoti iti atra dagdhaḥ juhoti payasā juhoti iti dravya viniyoga vidheḥ yat agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyam juhoti iti devatā vidheḥ vā

original: na cāyam arthavādeṣu prakāraḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na ca ayam arthavādeṣu prakāraḥ saṃbhavati

original: na caibhiḥ [brīhīn avahanti ] [brīhīn prokṣati ] itivat dṛṣṭā 'dṛṣṭā vā kācid itikartavyatopadiśyate /
analyzed: na ca ebhiḥ brīhīn avahanti brīhīn prokṣati itivat dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭā vā kācid itikartavyatā upadiśyate

original: tasmat na teṣāṃ tadaupayikatvam //
analyzed: tasmat na teṣām tad aupayika tvam

original: nanu prekṣāvatāṃ prarocanātiśayakaraṇena pravṛttyutsāham āvahantaḥ arthavādāḥ tadupayogino bhaviṣyati naitad api samyak pravṛttyutsāho hi keṣāṃcin mate nirapekṣaśabdapratyayād eva sidhyati /
analyzed: nanu prekṣāvatām prarocana atiśaya karaṇena pravṛtti utsāham āvahantaḥ arthavādāḥ tad upayoginaḥ bhaviṣyati nā etat api samyak pravṛtti utsāhaḥ hi keṣāṃcid mate nirapekṣa śabda pratyayāt eva sidhyati

original: asmanmate tu tatpraṇetṛpuruṣapratyayād iti kiṃ prarocanayā [evaṃkāma idaṃ kuryāt ] yat kiñcid etat //
analyzed: asmad mate tu tad praṇetṛ puruṣa pratyayāt iti kim prarocanayā evaṃkāmaḥ idam kuryāt yat kiñcid etat

original: tad evaṃ prakāratrayeṇāpi arthavādapadānām ananvayāt ekadeśākṣepeṇa sarvākṣepa eva kriyata iti apramāṇaṃ vedaḥ //
analyzed: tat evam prakāra trayeṇa api arthavāda padānām ananvayāt eka deśa ākṣepeṇa sarva ākṣepaḥ eva kriyate iti apramāṇam vedaḥ

original: nanu yāvaty eva pramāṇāntaraviuddhatvam upalabhyate tāvaty evāprāmāṇyam astu /
analyzed: nanu yāvati eva pramāṇa antara viuddha tvam upalabhyate tāvati eva aprāmāṇyam astu

original: sarvatra tu kutastyā tadāśaṅkā iti maivam tat tatsāmānyāt anyatrāpy anāśvāsaḥ /
analyzed: sarvatra tu kutastyā tad āśaṅkā iti mā evam tat tad sāmānyāt anyatra api anāśvāsaḥ

original: mīmāṃsakapakṣe hi arthavādarahitakevalavedagranthānupalambhāt tadanuṣaṅkeṇa sarvatra sāpekṣatvam avatarari /
analyzed: mīmāṃsaka pakṣe hi arthavāda rahita kevala veda grantha anupalambhāt tad anuṣaṅkeṇa sarvatra sāpekṣa tvam avatarari

original: naiyāyikamate tu vedapraṇetur īśvarasya kvacit vitathavāditve dṛśyamāne katham anyatra satyavāditāyāṃ dṛḍhaḥ pratyayo bhavet ity aprāmāṇyaṃ sarvaveti //
analyzed: naiyāyika mate tu veda praṇetuḥ īśvarasya kvacid vitatha vādi tve dṛśyamāne katham anyatra satya vādi tāyām dṛḍhaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavet iti aprāmāṇyam

original: atrābhidhīyate vidhyekavākyatayaiva bhūmnā tāvad arthavādapadāni paṭhyante [vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta bhūtikāmo vāyur vai kṣepṣṭhā devatā vāyum eva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati ] iti /
analyzed: atra abhidhīyate vidhi ekavākyatayā eva bhūmnā tāvat arthavāda padāni paṭhyante vāyavyam śvetam ālabheta bhūti kāmaḥ vāyuḥ vai kṣepṣṭhā devatā vāyum eva svena bhāgadheyena upadhāvati saḥ eva enam bhūtim gamayati iti

original: teṣāṃ tadekavākyatvād eva prāmāṇyam /
analyzed: teṣām tad eka vākya tvāt eva prāmāṇyam

original: [vāyur vai kṣepṣṭhā devatā ] ity ataḥ yady api kriyā nāvagamyate nāpi tatsaṃbaddhaḥ kaścid arthaḥ tathā 'pi vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatvaṃ tasya pratīyate [bhūtikāmaḥ ] ity evam anto vidhyuddeśaḥ //
analyzed: vāyuḥ vai kṣepṣṭhā devatā iti atas yadi api kriyā na avagamyate na api tad saṃbaddhaḥ kaścid arthaḥ tathā vidhi uddeśena ekavākyatvam tasya pratīyate bhūti kāmaḥ iti evam antaḥ vidhi uddeśaḥ

original: katham ekavākyabhāvaḥ padānāṃ sākāṅkṣatvāt //
analyzed: katham eka vākya bhāvaḥ padānām sākāṅkṣa tvāt

original: nanu [bhūtikāmaḥ ] ity evam antena vākyena vidheyaṃ vihitam utpāditaṃ pratipattur anākāṅkṣatvaṃ kṛtaś ca śabdakartavyam iti kim anyena [kṣepṣṭhā ] ityādinā prayojanam tadarthasyaiva stutir iti brūmaḥ //
analyzed: nanu bhūti kāmaḥ iti evam antena vākyena vidheyam vihitam utpāditam pratipattuḥ anākāṅkṣa tvam kṛtaḥ ca śabda kartavyam iti kim anyena ityādinā prayojanam tad arthasya eva stutiḥ iti brūmaḥ

original: nanu stutyā 'pi kiṃ prayojanam stuto 'stutaś ca tāvān eva so 'rthaḥ maivam sastutipade hi vākye stutipadasahitaṃ vidhāyakaṃ vidhāyakaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: nanu stutyā kim prayojanam stutaḥ stutaḥ ca tāvān eva saḥ rthaḥ mā evam sa stuti pade hi vākye stuti pada sahitam vidhāyakam vidhāyakam bhavati

original: kim idānīṃ kevalaṃ liṅādiyuktaṃ vākyaṃ na vidhāyakam ucyate yadi stutipadāni na śrūyate tat bāḍhaṃ bhavati vidhāyakam /
analyzed: kim idānīm kevalam liṅ ādi yuktam vākyam na vidhāyakam ucyate yadi stuti padāni na śrūyate tat bāḍham bhavati vidhāyakam

original: eteṣu ca satsu tatsahitaṃ tadvidhāyakaṃ bhavati na kevalaṃ tathā pratīteḥ /
analyzed: eteṣu ca satsu tat sahitam tad vidhāyakam bhavati na kevalam tathā pratīteḥ

original: stutipadasambandhe sati bhinnavākyatā mā bhūd iti vidhipadena stutipadena ca saṃbhūyārtho vidhīyate tathā 'vagamāt /
analyzed: stuti pada sambandhe sati bhinna vākya tā mā bhūt iti vidhi padena stuti padena ca saṃbhūya arthaḥ vidhīyate tathā vagamāt

original: anyathā hi pratīyamānaḥ padārthānvayaḥ tyajyeta vākyabhedo vā kalpyate /
analyzed: anyathā hi pratīyamānaḥ padārtha anvayaḥ tyajyeta vākya bhedaḥ vā kalpyate

original: tasmān na stutipadānām ānarthakyam //
analyzed: tasmāt na stuti padānām ānarthakyam

original: nanu kevalasyāpi vidhivākyasya sāmarthyāt kim arthaṃ stutipadāni prayuñjate iti ucyate aparyanuyojyo jaiminīyānāṃ mate śabdaḥ asmākaṃ ca bhagavān īśvaraḥ /
analyzed: nanu kevalasya api vidhi vākyasya sāmarthyāt kim artham stuti padāni prayuñjate iti ucyate aparyanuyojyaḥ jaiminīyānām mate śabdaḥ asmākam ca bhagavān īśvaraḥ

original: ukte sati pratipattāro vayaṃ vedasya na kartāraḥ /
analyzed: ukte sati pratipattāraḥ vayam vedasya na kartāraḥ

original: pratipattau ca kramo darśitaḥ //
analyzed: pratipattau ca kramaḥ darśitaḥ

original: evañ ca yady api dravyadevatetikartavyatāvidhānadvārakaṃ aṅgavidhivad arthavādavakyānāṃ kāryaupayikatvaṃ nāsti tathāpi pratītyaṅgatvaṃ na nivāryate //
analyzed: evam ca yadi api dravya devatā itikartavya tā vidhāna dvārakam aṅga vidhi vat arthavāda vakyānām kārī aupayika tvam na asti tathā api prati iti aṅga tvam na nivāryate

original: ata eva pramāṇo prayogitvam eṣām ācakṣate na prameyopayogitvam /
analyzed: atas eva eṣām ācakṣate na prameya upayogi tvam

original: kevalavidhipadaśravaṇe hi na tadādriyante yajvānaḥ /
analyzed: kevala vidhi pada śravaṇe hi na tadā ādriyante yajvānaḥ

original: tatra vidhivibhaktir avasīdati /
analyzed: tatra vidhi vibhaktiḥ avasīdati

original: tāṃ nimajjantīm iva arthavādajanitakarmaprāśastyapratyayaḥ uttabhnāti /
analyzed: tām nimajjantīm iva arthavāda janita karma prāśastya pratyayaḥ uttabhnāti

original: [sarvajitā yajeta ] ity ataḥ na tathāvidhaḥ śraddhātiśayo bhavati yathāvidhaḥ [sarvajitā vai devāḥ sarvam ajayan sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam evaitena sarvaṃ jayati ] ity arthavādapadebhyaḥ /loke 'pi [iyaṃ gauḥ kretavyā ] ity ataḥ na tathā kretāraḥ pravartante yathā [eṣā bahusnigdhakṣīrāsuślīlā sāpatyā anaghaprajā ca ] ity evamādibhyaḥ stutibhyaḥ /
analyzed: sarvajitā yajeta iti atas na tathāvidhaḥ śraddhā atiśayaḥ bhavati yathāvidhaḥ sarvajitā vai devāḥ sarvam ajayan sarvasya āptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam eva etena sarvam jayati iti arthavāda padebhyaḥ loke pi iyam gauḥ kretavyā iti atas na tathā kretāraḥ pravartante yathā eṣā bahu snigdha kṣīrā asu ślīlā sa apatyā anagha prajā ca  / iti evamādibhyaḥ stutibhyaḥ

original: svānubhavasākṣiko 'yam arthaḥ //
analyzed: sva anubhava sākṣikaḥ yam arthaḥ

original: ata eva kecit aśrutārthavādake 'pi vidhivākye tatkalpanām icchanti yathā kvacit arthavādāt vidhikalpanam iti /
analyzed: atas eva kecid aśruta arthavādake vidhi vākye tad kalpanām icchanti yathā kvacid arthavādāt vidhi kalpanam iti

original: yathoktam [vidhis tulyoḥ sadā vṛttiḥ sāmānaviṣayeṣyate ] iti /
analyzed: yathā uktam vidhiḥ tulyoḥ sadā vṛttiḥ sāmāna viṣayā iṣyate iti

original: anadhigamyamanavidhisambandhāc ca arthavādāt vidhir unnīyate na gmyamānasambandhāt //
analyzed: anadhigamya mana vidhi sambandhāt ca arthavādāt vidhiḥ unnīyate na gmyamāna sambandhāt

original: ata eva ca [so 'rodīt ] ityevamādibhyaḥ [na roditavyam ] ityādividhikalpanam iṣyate /
analyzed: atas eva ca saḥ rodīt iti evamādibhyaḥ na roditavyam iti ādi vidhi kalpanam iṣyate

original: mudhaiva pūrvapakṣiṇā tad āśaṅkitam /
analyzed: mudhā eva pūrvapakṣiṇā tat āśaṅkitam

original: vidhyantareṇaikavākyatvaṃ hi pratyakṣam ihopadiśyate /
analyzed: vidhi antareṇa eka vākya tvam hi pratyakṣam iha upadiśyate

original: [barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam ] ity asya vidheḥ śeṣo 'yaṃ [so 'rodīt ] ityādiḥ [rudro ruroda /
analyzed: barhiṣi rajatam na deyam iti asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ yam saḥ rodīt ityādiḥ rudraḥ ruroda

original: tasya yadaśru aśīryata tadrajatam abhavat /
analyzed: tasya yat aśru aśīryata tat rajatam abhavat

original: yo hi barhiṣi rajataṃ dadāti purā 'sya saṃvatsarāt gṛhe rodanam bhavati ] iti /
analyzed: yaḥ hi barhiṣi rajatam dadāti purā sya saṃvatsarāt gṛhe rodanam bhavati iti

original: tasmāt [barhiṣi rajatam na deyam ] iti //
analyzed: tasmāt barhiṣi rajatam na deyam iti

original: [prājāpatyam ajaṃ tūparam ālabhate] ity asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ [prajāpatir ātmano vapām udkkhidat ] iti /
analyzed: prājāpatyam ajam tūparam ālabhate iti asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ prajāpatiḥ ātmanaḥ vapām udkkhidat iti

original: vapāhomamāhātmyapradarśanārtham ucyate agnau vai pragṛhītamātrāyāṃ vapāyāṃ ajas tūpara udagād iti //
analyzed: vapā homa māhātmya pradarśana artham ucyate agnau vai pragṛhīta mātrāyām vapāyām ajaḥ tūparaḥ udagāt iti

original: [ādityaḥ prāyaṇīyaś caruḥ ] ity asya vidheḥ śeṣe 'yaṃ [devā vai devayajanamadhyavasāya diśo na prājānan ] iti vyāmohānām ādityaś carur nāśayitā yathā diṅmohasyeti evaṃ tatra tatra vidhiśeṣatvaṃ arthavādānāṃ veditavyam //
analyzed: ādityaḥ prāyaṇīyaḥ caruḥ iti asya vidheḥ śeṣe yam devāḥ vai devayajanam adhyavasāya diśaḥ na prājānan iti vyāmohānām ādityaḥ caruḥ nāśayitā yathā diś mohasya iti evam tatra tatra vidhi śeṣa tvam arthavādānām veditavyam

original: katham punar idam asatyam evocyate [rudraruditāt rajatam ajāyata] [prajāpatihomasamiddhād agneḥ ajas tūpara udagāt ] iti ucyate nedam asatyam yad asya vākyasya pratipādyaṃ tatra satyartham evedam /
analyzed: katham punar idam asatyam eva ucyate rudra ruditāt rajatam ajāyata prajāpati homa samiddhāt agneḥ ajaḥ tūparaḥ udagāt iti ucyate na idam asatyam yat asya vākyasya pratipādyam tatra sati artham eva idam

original: na cāsya yathāśruto 'rthaḥ pratipādyaḥ kintu vidheyo niṣedhyo vā kaścid arthaḥ /
analyzed: na ca asya yathāśrutaḥ rthaḥ pratipādyaḥ kintu vidheyaḥ niṣedhyaḥ vā kaścid arthaḥ

original: ihānvākhyāne dvayam āpatati yac ca vṛttāntajñānam yac ca kasmiṃścid arthe prarocanā dveṣo vā /
analyzed: iha anvākhyāne dvayam āpatati yat ca vṛttānta jñānam yat ca kasmiṃścid arthe prarocanā dveṣaḥ vā

original: tatra vṛttāntajñānaṃ na pravartakam na nivartakam iti prayojanābhāvāt anarthakam anādaraṇīyam /
analyzed: tatra vṛttānta jñānam na pravartakam na nivartakam iti prayojana abhāvāt anarthakam anādaraṇīyam

original: prarocanādveṣau pravṛttinivṛttyaṅgatvāt tadarthau gṛhītvā prarocanāyāḥ pravarteta dvEsān nivarteteti /
analyzed: prarocanā dveṣau pravṛtti nivṛtti aṅga tvāt tad arthau gṛhītvā prarocanāyāḥ pravarteta dvesāt nivarteta iti

original: tatra tatpratipādyasatyārtha evārthavādaḥ //
analyzed: tatra tad pratipādya satya arthaḥ eva arthavādaḥ

original: yat tu arudati rudre kathaṃ tadrodanavacanam arodanaprabhave vā rajate kathaṃ tadudbhavatā 'bhidhānam iti guṇavādamātram gauṇa eṣa vādaḥ śvetavarṇasārūpyādinā rodanaprabhavaṃ rajataṃ ninditum ucyate //
analyzed: yat tu a rudati rudre katham tat rodana vacanam a rodana prabhave vā rajate katham tat udbhavatā abhidhānam iti guṇa vāda mātram gauṇaḥ eṣa vādaḥ śveta varṇa sārūpya ādinā rodana prabhavam rajatam ninditum ucyate

original: evaṃ paśuyāge vapāhomapraśaṃsāyai [prajāpatir ātmano vapām udakkhidat ] iti vṛttāntākhyānaṃ yojanīyam //
analyzed: evam paśu yāge vapā homa praśaṃsāyai prajāpatiḥ ātmanaḥ vapām udakkhidat iti vṛttānta ākhyānam yojanīyam

original: ādityacarupraśaṃsāyai [devā vai devayajanamadhyavasāya diśo na prājānan ] iti //
analyzed: āditya caru praśaṃsāyai devāḥ vai devayajanam adhyavasāya diśaḥ na prājānan iti

original: atha vā naiyāyikānām anekaprakārapuruṣātiśayavādināṃ yathāśrute 'py arthe nātyantam asaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: atha vā naiyāyikānām aneka prakāra puruṣa atiśaya vādinām yathāśrute pi arthe na atyantam asaṃbhavaḥ
