original: rudrasya ruditāt rajatajanma prajāpater vapotkhedaḥ taddhomāt tūparapaśūdgamaḥ devānāṃ devayajanādhyavasāne diṅmoha ity evaṃjātīyakam api satyam astu ko doṣaḥ tatsarvathā nārthavādā na pramāṇam //
analyzed: rudrasya ruditāt rajata janma prajāpateḥ vapā utkhedaḥ tad homāt tūpara paśu udgamaḥ devānām deva yajana adhyavasāne diś mohaḥ iti evaṃjātīyakam api satyam astu kaḥ doṣaḥ tat sarvathā na arthavādāḥ na pramāṇam

original: evaṃ [stenaṃ mano 'nṛtavādinī vāk ] iti gauṇa eṣa vādaḥ /
analyzed: evam stenam manaḥ nṛta vādinī vāc iti gauṇaḥ eṣa vādaḥ

original: pracchannatayā stenaṃ mana ucyate /
analyzed: pracchanna tayā stenam manaḥ ucyate

original: vāhulyābhiprāyeṇa cānṛtavādinī vāk iti //
analyzed: vāhulya abhiprāyeṇa ca anṛta vādinī vāc iti

original: [dhūma evāgner divā dadṛśe nārcir arcir evāgner naktaṃ dadṛśe na dhūmaḥ ] iti dūrabhūyastvābhiprāyeṇa kasmaicit prayojanāya sāyaṃprātarhomadevatāstutaye kathyate //
analyzed: dhūmaḥ eva agneḥ divā dadṛśe na arciḥ arciḥ eva agneḥ naktam dadṛśe na dhūmaḥ iti dūra bhūyaḥ tva abhiprāyeṇa kasmaicid prayojanāya sāyam prātar homa devatā stutaye kathyate

original: [na caitadvidmo yadi brāhmaṇāḥ smaḥ abrāhmaṇā vā ] iti pravarānumantraṇapraśaṃsāyai saṃśaya iva darśitaḥ /
analyzed: na ca etat vidmaḥ yadi brāhmaṇāḥ smaḥ a brāhmaṇāḥ vā iti pravara anumantraṇa praśaṃsāyai saṃśayaḥ iva darśitaḥ

original: abrāhmaṇo 'pi yajamānaḥ pravarānumantraṇena brāhmaṇaḥ syād iti //
analyzed: a brāhmaṇaḥ pi yajamānaḥ pravara anumantraṇena brāhmaṇaḥ syāt iti

original: [śobhate 'sya mukhaṃ ya evaṃ veda ] iti vidyāpraśaṃsaiṣā śobhata iti śiṣyair udvīkṣyamāṇasya mukham iti //
analyzed: śobhate sya mukham yaḥ evam veda iti vidyā praśaṃsā eṣā śobhate iti śiṣyaiḥ udvīkṣyamāṇasya mukham iti

original: [sarvān kāmān āpnoti ] iti sarvatvaṃ prakṛtā 'pekṣam /
analyzed: sarvān kāmān āpnoti iti sarva tvam prakṛta a pekṣam

original: stutyarthaṃ cāśvamedhādhyāyane tatphalavacanam //
analyzed: stuti artham ca aśvamedha adhyāyane tad phala vacanam

original: [hiraṇyaṃ nidhāya cetavyam ] iti stutyārthatayā divyantarikṣe pṛthivyāṃ ca cayanaṃ pratiṣidhyate /
analyzed: hiraṇyam nidhāya cetavyam iti stutya artha tayā divi antarikṣe pṛthivyām ca cayanam pratiṣidhyate

original: anupahitahiraṇyāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ agnir na cetavyaḥ na punar na cetavya eva tasyām iti //
analyzed: an upahita hiraṇyāyām pṛthivyām agniḥ na cetavyaḥ na punar na cetavyaḥ eva tasyām iti

original: [ādityo yūpaḥ ] iti añjane sati tejasvitayā yūpasya ādityarūpatā stutaye kathyate //
analyzed: ādityaḥ yūpaḥ iti añjane sati tejasvi tayā yūpasya āditya rūpa tā stutaye kathyate

original: tatkāryakāritvāc ca yajamānaḥ prastara ucyate /
analyzed: tad kārya kāri tvāt ca yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ ucyate

original: na hi mukhyaiva vṛttyā loke śabdāḥ pravartante gauṇyā 'pi vṛttyā tadvyavahāradarśanat /
analyzed: na hi mukhyā eva vṛttyā loke śabdāḥ pravartante gauṇyā pi vṛttyā tad vyavahāra darśanat

original: evaṃ vede 'pi teṣāṃ tathā prayogo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: evam vede pi teṣām tathā prayogaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: itthaṃ ca mantreṣv api aindryā gārhupatyopasthānam aviruddham //
analyzed: ittham ca mantreṣu api aindryā gārhupatya upasthānam a viruddham

original: evaṃ stutinindāsvarūpās tāvad arthavādāḥ vidhyekavakyatvena pramāṇam /
analyzed: evam stuti nindā svarūpāḥ tāvat arthavādāḥ vidhi eka vakya tvena pramāṇam

original: parakṛtipurākalpasvarūpā api tathaiva yojyāḥ //
analyzed: parakṛti purākalpa svarūpāḥ api tathā eva yojyāḥ

original: kvacit punaḥ arthavādenaiva kaścid aṃśaḥ pūryata iti na tu pratītyaṅgatvam eva tasya kāryāṅgatvam api bhavati /
analyzed: kvacid punar arthavādena eva kaścid aṃśaḥ pūryate iti na tu pratīti aṅga tvam eva tasya kārya aṅga tvam api bhavati

original: yathā [pratitiṣṭhanti ha vā ya etā rātrīr upāsate ] iti aśrūyamāṇādhikārasya rātrisatravidheḥ adhikārāṃśo 'rthavādād eva labhyate /
analyzed: yathā pratitiṣṭhanti ha vā ye etāḥ rātrīḥ upāsate iti a śrūyamāṇa adhikārasya rātri satra vidheḥ adhikāra aṃśaḥ rthavādāt eva labhyate

original: yathoktaṃ [phalamātreyo nirdeśāt ] iti tatra hi [pratiṣṭhākāmāḥ satram āsīran ] ity arthavādavaśāt gamyate vākyārthaḥ //
analyzed: yathā uktam phalam ātreyaḥ nirdeśāt iti tatra hi pratiṣṭhā kāmāḥ satram āsīran iti arthavāda vaśāt gamyate vākya arthaḥ

original: kvacit vidhivākyasyārthasandehe arthavādātmakāt vākyaśeṣāt tanniścayo bhavati /
analyzed: kvacid vidhi vākyasya artha sandehe arthavāda ātmakāt vākyaśeṣāt tad niścayaḥ bhavati

original: yathā [aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhāti ] ity añjanadravye ghṛtatailavasādibhedena saṃdihyamāne [tejo vai ghṛtam ] ity arthavādāt ghṛtenāktāḥ śarkarā upadheyā iti gamyate //
analyzed: yathā aktāḥ śarkarāḥ upadadhāti iti añjana dravye ghṛta taila vasā ādi bhedena saṃdihyamāne tejaḥ vai ghṛtam iti arthavādāt ghṛtena aktāḥ śarkarāḥ upadheyāḥ iti gamyate

original: ityarthavādā vidhinaikyabhāvāt tadvatpramāṇatvam amī bhajante /
analyzed: iti arthavādāḥ vidhinā aikya bhāvāt tadvat pramāṇa tvam amī bhajante

original: asti pratītyanvayita hi teṣāṃ kvacic ca kāryānvayitā tu dṛṣṭā //
analyzed: asti hi teṣām kvacid ca kārya anvayi tā tu dṛṣṭā

original: yad vā svarūpaparatām api saṃspṛśanta prāmāṇyavartmata ime na parityajanti /
analyzed: yat vā sva rūpa para tām api saṃspṛśanta prāmāṇya vartmataḥ ime na parityajanti

original: naiyāyikā hi puruṣātiśayaṃ vadantaḥ vṛttāntavarṇam apīha yathārtham āhuḥ //
analyzed: naiyāyikāḥ hi puruṣa atiśayam vadantaḥ vṛttānta varṇam api iha yathārtham āhuḥ

original: ādityayūpavacanādiṣu tu svarūpayāthārthyam ittham upapādayituṃ na śakyam /
analyzed: āditya yūpa vacana ādiṣu tu svarūpa yāthārthyam ittham upapādayitum na śakyam

original: gauṇīṃ tu vṛttim avalambya kṛtā tadarthavyākhyeti teṣv api na viplavanāvakāśaḥ //
analyzed: gauṇīm tu vṛttim avalambya kṛtā tad artha vyākhyā iti teṣu api na viplavana avakāśaḥ

original: athedānīṃ mantrā vicāryante kiṃ arthaprakāśanadvāreṇa vidhyarthaopayogitā teṣām utoccāraṇamātreṇa iti //
analyzed: atha idānīm mantrāḥ vicāryante kim artha prakāśana dvāreṇa vidhi artha opayogi tā teṣām uta uccāraṇa mātreṇa iti

original: nanu ubhayathā 'pi prāmāṇyaviśeṣāt kiṃ tadvicāreṇa na hīdaṃ śāstraṃ vedasyārthavicārāya mīmāṃsāvat pravṛttam api tu prāmāṇyanirṇayāyaiveti satyam prāmāṇyanirṇayāyaivedaṃ śāstraṃ pravṛttam avivakṣitārthatve tu mantrāṇāṃ apratipādakatvalakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam eva bhavet /
analyzed: nanu ubhayathā pi prāmāṇya viśeṣāt kim tad vicāreṇa na hi idam śāstram vedasya artha vicārāya mīmāṃsā vat pravṛttam api tu prāmāṇya nirṇayāya eva iti satyam prāmāṇya nirṇayāya eva idam śāstram pravṛttam avivakṣita artha tve tu mantrāṇām apratipādaka tva lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam eva bhavet

original: sāmānyāt vedabrāhmaṇavākyānām api tathābhāvaprasaṅga iti vedasya karmāvabodhārthatvaṃ hīyate /
analyzed: sāmānyāt veda brāhmaṇa vākyānām api tathā bhāva prasaṅgaḥ iti vedasya karma avabodha artha tvam hīyate

original: na ca saṃśayaviparyayajananam evāprāmāṇyam ajñānajanakatvam apy aprāmāṇyam eva //
analyzed: na ca saṃśaya viparyaya jananam eva aprāmāṇyam ajñāna janaka tvam api aprāmāṇyam eva

original: tad ucyate uccāraṇamātropakāriṇo mantrāḥ kutaḥ tathā viniyogopadeśāt [uta prathā uru prathasva iti puroḍāśaṃ prathayati ] iti /
analyzed: tat ucyate uccāraṇa mātra upakāriṇaḥ mantrāḥ kutas tathā viniyoga upadeśāt uta prathā uru prathasva iti puroḍāśam prathayati iti

original: yady arthaprakāśanopakāriṇo mantrāḥ sāmarthyād eva prathanopayogī maṃtro 'yam iti kim arthaṃ prathane viniyujyante vacanena yathā sākṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pareṇa cen nīyate nūnam akṣībhyāṃ na paśyatīti gamyate //
analyzed: yadi artha prakāśana upakāriṇaḥ mantrāḥ sāmarthyāt eva prathana upayogī maṃtraḥ yam iti kim artham prathane viniyujyante vacanena yathā sa akṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pareṇa ced nīyate nūnam akṣībhyām na paśyati iti gamyate

original: [agnīd agnīn vihara ] iti ca karoty evāsau ṛtvik agniviharaṇam kiṃ vacanena uccāraṇamātropakāriṇi mantre taduccāraṇād evādṛṣṭaṃ kiñcit upakārajātaṃ kalpyate //
analyzed: agnīdh agnīn vihara iti ca karoti eva asau ṛtvij agni viharaṇam kim vacanena uccāraṇa mātra upakāriṇi mantre tad uccāraṇāt eva adṛṣṭam kiñcid upakāra jātam kalpyate

original: vākyakramaniyamāc cāvivaksitārthān mantrān avagacchāmaḥ /
analyzed: vākya krama niyamāt ca a vivaksita arthān mantrān avagacchāmaḥ

original: niyatapadakramā hi mantrāḥ paṭhyante /
analyzed: niyata pada kramāḥ hi mantrāḥ paṭhyante

original: yady arthapratipādanenopakururyuḥ niyatakramāśrayaṇam anarthakaṃ syāt kramāntareṇāpi tadarthāvagamasaṃpatteḥ //
analyzed: yadi artha pratipādanena upakururyuḥ niyata krama āśrayaṇam anarthakam syāt krama antareṇa api tad artha avagama saṃpatteḥ

original: itaś cavivakṣitārthā mantrāḥ /
analyzed: itas ca vivakṣita arthāḥ mantrāḥ

original: avidyamānārthaprakāśino hi kecid dṛśyante /
analyzed: a vidyamāna artha prakāśinaḥ hi kecid dṛśyante

original: yathā [catvāri śṛṅgāḥ trayo asya pādāḥ dve śīrṣe sapta hastāso asya /
analyzed: yathā catvāri śṛṅgāḥ trayaḥ asya pādāḥ dve śīrṣe sapta hastāsaḥ asya

original: tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyānāviveśa ] iti /
analyzed: tridhā baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti mahaḥ devaḥ martyān āviveśa iti

original: na hi catuḥśṛṅgaṃ tripādaṃ dviśiraskaṃ saptahastaṃ kiñcid yajñasādhanam asti yad anena prakāśyate //
analyzed: na hi catur śṛṅgam tri pādam dvi śiraskam sapta hastam kiñcid yajña sādhanam asti yat anena prakāśyate

original: itaś caivam /
analyzed: itas ca evam

original: acetanapraiṣapradarśanāt [oṣadhe trāyasvainam] iti /
analyzed: acetana praiṣa pradarśanāt oṣadhe trāyasva enam iti

original: na hy oṣadhir budhyate trāṇāya niyuktā 'smīti /
analyzed: na hi oṣadhiḥ budhyate trāṇāya niyuktā smi iti

original: [śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ ] iti codāharaṇam /
analyzed: śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ iti ca udāharaṇam

original: na hy acetanāḥ grāvāṇaḥ śrotuṃ niyujyante //
analyzed: na hi acetanāḥ grāvāṇaḥ śrotum niyujyante

original: api ca[aditir dyaur aditir antarikṣam ] iti vipratiṣiddham abhivadanti mantrāḥ /
analyzed: api ca aditiḥ dyauḥ aditiḥ antarikṣam iti vipratiṣiddham abhivadanti mantrāḥ

original: kathaṃ saiva dyauḥ tad evāntarikṣaṃ bhavitum arhati //
analyzed: katham sā eva dyauḥ tat eva antarikṣam bhavitum arhati

original: keṣāñcic ca mantrāṇāṃ artho jñātum eva na śakyate /
analyzed: keṣāṃcid ca mantrāṇām arthaḥ jñātum eva na śakyate

original: te katham arthaprakāśanenopakuryuḥ [abhyaksāt indra ṛṣṭiḥ ] iti /
analyzed: te katham artha prakāśanena upakuryuḥ abhyaksāt indra ṛṣṭiḥ iti

original: [sṛṇy eva jarbharītur pharītu ] iti /
analyzed: sṛṇī eva jarbharītuḥ pharītu iti

original: [indraḥ somasya kāṇukāḥ ] iti ca tasmād avivakṣitārthā mantrāḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ somasya kāṇukāḥ iti ca tasmāt avivakṣita arthāḥ mantrāḥ

original: api ca uccāraṇam ubhayathā 'pi kartavyaṃ mantrāṇāṃ adṛṣṭāya vā arthapratyāyanāya vā yato 'rtham api nānuccaritāḥ śabdāḥ pratyāyayitum utsahante /
analyzed: api ca uccāraṇam ubhayathā kartavyam mantrāṇām adṛṣṭāya vā artha pratyāyanāya vā yatas rtham api na anuccaritāḥ śabdāḥ pratyāyayitum utsahante

original: tadavaśyakartavye 'sminn uccāraṇe tata eva yajñopakāre siddhe kiṃ arthapratipādanadvāraparigraheṇa prayojanam iti tatrocyate kiṃ mantrebhyo 'rthapratītir eva nāsti kiṃ vā bhavaty api nirnimittā 'sau uta sannimittā 'pi grahaikatvapratītivat avivakṣitā iti //
analyzed: tad avaśya kartavye smin uccāraṇe tatas eva yajña upakāre siddhe kim artha pratipādana dvāra parigraheṇa prayojanam iti tatra ucyate kim mantrebhyaḥ rtha pratītiḥ eva nā asti kim vā bhavati api nirnimittā sau uta sat nimittā pi graha eka tva pratīti vat avivakṣitā iti

original: na tāvat pratītir eva nāsti śabdārthasambandhavyutpattisaṃskṛtam atītaṃ [barhir devasadanaṃ dāmi ] ity evamādimantraśravaṇe sati tadarthapratīteḥ svasaṃvedyatvāt //
analyzed: na tāvat pratītiḥ eva na asti śabda artha sambandha vyutpatti saṃskṛtam atītam barhiḥ deva sadanam dāmi iti evamādi mantra śravaṇe sati tad artha pratīteḥ sva saṃvedya tvāt

original: nāpy asau nirnimittā lokavat padānām evātra nimittatvat /
analyzed: nā api asau nirnimittā loka vat padānām eva atra

original: vyutpattir api na nāsti ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ ta eva vaidikā ta eva teṣām arthā iti lokavyavahāratas tadvyutpattisaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: vyutpattiḥ api na nā asti ye eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ te eva vaidikā te eva teṣām arthāḥ iti loka vyavahārataḥ tad vyutpatti saṃbhavāt

original: nāpi bhavaty api mantrebhyo 'rthapratītiḥ //
analyzed: na api bhavati api mantrebhyaḥ rtha pratītiḥ

original: grahaikatvapratītivad avivakṣitā bhavitum arhati avivakṣānibandhanasya kvacid apy abhāvāt /
analyzed: graha eka tva pratīti vat avivakṣitā bhavitum arhati avivakṣā nibandhanasya kvacid api abhāvāt

original: grahādivacanāntaranirjñātasaṃkhyatvat somāvasekanirharaṇasya ca sammārgakāryasya sarvagrahasādhāraṇatvāt [grahaṃ ] itivibhakteś ca karmakārakasamarpaṇamātreṇāpi sārthakyopapatteḥ yuktām ekatvam avivakṣitam iti kathayitum /
analyzed: graha ādi vacana antara nirjñāta saṃkhya tvat soma avaseka nirharaṇasya ca sammārga kāryasya sarva graha sādhāraṇa tvāt graham iti vibhakteḥ ca karma kāraka samarpaṇa mātreṇa api sārthakya upapatteḥ yuktām ekatvam avivakṣitam iti kathayitum

original: iha tu [barhir devasadanaṃ dāmi ] ityevamādivākyakriyamāṇakratūpayogidravyādiprakāśanasya vidhyapekṣitatvāt mantreṇa smṛtaṃ karma karoti /
analyzed: iha tu barhiḥ deva sadanam dāmi iti evamādi vākya kriyamāṇa kratu upayogi dravya ādi prakāśanasya vidhi apekṣita tvāt mantreṇa smṛtam karma karoti

original: tathā kriyamāṇaṃ abhyudayakāri bhavatīti na yajñāṅgaprakāśanam avivakṣitam /
analyzed: tathā kriyamāṇam abhyudaya kāri bhavati iti na yajña aṅga prakāśanam avivakṣitam

original: ato noccāraṇamātropakāriṇo mantrāḥ //
analyzed: atas na uccāraṇa mātra upakāriṇaḥ mantrāḥ

original: upamantrāṇṃ tu [pāvamānīṃ japeta ] [vaiṣṇavīṃ japeta ] iti vidhinaiva tāvanmātrākṣepaṇāt nārthena prakāśitena prayojanam iti kiṃ tatra kriyate yatra tu [japeta ] iti vidhir na śrūyate na tatra tadarthaḥ pratīyamānaḥ apekṣyamāṇaś copekṣituṃ yuktaḥ //
analyzed: tu pāvamānīm japeta vaiṣṇavīm japeta iti vidhinā eva tāvat mātra ākṣepaṇāt na arthena prakāśitena prayojanam iti kim tatra kriyate yatra tu japeta iti vidhiḥ na śrūyate na tatra tad arthaḥ pratīyamānaḥ apekṣyamāṇaḥ ca upekṣitum yuktaḥ

original: nanu yadi [japeta ] iti vidheḥ vaiṣṇavyādiṣu nārthaḥ vivakṣyate tarhi [svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ ] iti akṣaragrahaṇamātravidhānāt sarvasyaiva vedasyāvivakṣitārthatvaṃ syāt maivam svādhyāyādhyayanavidheḥ dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanam iti dṛṣṭārthatvena vivakṣitārthatvāt /
analyzed: nanu yadi japeta iti vidheḥ vaiṣṇavī ādiṣu na arthaḥ vivakṣyate tarhi svādhyāyaḥ dhyetavyaḥ iti akṣara grahaṇa mātra vidhānāt sarvasya eva vedasya avivakṣita artha tvam syāt mā evam svādhyāya adhyayana vidheḥ dṛṣṭaḥ hi tasya arthaḥ karma avabodhanam iti dṛṣṭa artha tvena vivakṣita artha tvāt

original: etac ca śāstrāntare vistarato nirṇītam /
analyzed: etat ca śāstra antare vistarataḥ nirṇītam

original: iha tu vitanyamānaṃ asmākam avāntaravicārācālatām āviṣkarotītina pratamyate //
analyzed: iha tu vitanyamānam asmākam avāntara vicāra ācāla tām āviṣkaroti iti na pratamyate

original: yat tu tadarthaviniyogopadeśād iti avivakṣitārthatvam uktam tatra [uru prathā uru prathasva ] iti liṅgād eva prathanaviniyoge mantrasya siddhe kāmaṃ tadvidhāyakaṃ vacanaṃ anarthakaṃ bhavatu prāptānuvādakatvāt na tu pratīyamānaḥ mantrād arthaḥ tyaktuṃ yuktaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu tad artha viniyoga upadeśāt iti avivakṣita artha tvam uktam tatra uru prathāḥ uru prathasva iti liṅgāt eva prathana viniyoge mantrasya siddhe kāmam tad vidhāyakam vacanam anarthakam bhavatu prāpta anuvādaka tvāt na tu pratīyamānaḥ mantrāt arthaḥ tyaktum yuktaḥ

original: tat kiṃ vacanaṃ anarthakam eva nānarthakam pratipannārthaviṣayaṃ tu tat //
analyzed: tat kim vacanam anarthakam eva na anarthakam pratipanna artha viṣayam tu tat

original: arthavādārthaṃ vā tadvacanam [yajñapatim eva tat prathayati ] iti /
analyzed: arthavāda artham vā tad vacanam yajñapatim eva tat prathayati iti

original: yad anena mantreṇa puroḍāśaṃ prathayati tadyajñapatiṃ yajamānam eva prajayā paśubhiḥ prathayatīti //
analyzed: yat anena mantreṇa puroḍāśam prathayati tat yajñapatim yajamānam eva prajayā paśubhiḥ prathayati iti

original: kvacit tu guṇārthavidhānam /
analyzed: kvacid tu guṇa artha vidhānam

original: yathā [tāṃ caturbhir ādatte ] iti /
analyzed: yathā tām caturbhiḥ ādatte iti

original: evaṃ [agnīd agnīn vihara ] ityādāv api draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: evam agnīdh agnīn vihara ityādau api draṣṭavyam

original: yat tu niyatapadakramatvāt uccāraṇamātropayogino mantrā iti tad apy asādhu mīmāṃsakānām anāditvād vedasya tatkramalaṅghanānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: yat tu niyata pada krama tvāt uccāraṇa mātra upayoginaḥ mantrāḥ iti tat api asādhu mīmāṃsakānām anādi tvāt vedasya tad krama laṅghana anupapatteḥ

original: yathoktaṃ [ anyathākaraṇe cāsya bahubhyaḥ syān nivāraṇam ] iti //
analyzed: yathā uktam anyathā karaṇe ca asya bahubhyaḥ syāt nivāraṇam iti

original: asmākam api yādṛk īśvarapraṇītaḥ tadanyathākaraṇe kim adhyet•ṇāṃ svātantryam asti tasmān nārthavivakṣāyai mantrakramaḥ prabhavati brāhmaṇavākyakramavat //
analyzed: asmākam api yādṛś īśvara praṇītaḥ tad anyathā karaṇe kim adhyetṇām svātantryam asti tasmāt na artha vivakṣāyai mantra kramaḥ prabhavati brāhmaṇa vākya krama vat

original: yad api [catvāri śṛṅgāḥ ] ity avidyamānārthavacanam aśaṅkitam tad api anabhijñatayā yajñasya vaiṣa guṇavādena sāṃstavaḥ /
analyzed: yat api catvāri śṛṅgāḥ iti a vidyamāna artha vacanam a śaṅkitam tat api anabhijña tayā yajñasya vā eṣa guṇavādena sāṃstavaḥ

original: catvāri śṛṅgā iti vedā uktāḥ trayo 'sya pādā iti savanāni dve śīrṣe iti dampatīyajamānau saptahastāsa iti chandāṃsi tridhā baddha iti mantrabrāhmaṇakalpaiḥ nibaddhaḥ vṛṣabha iti kāmān varṣati roravītīti stotraśastraprayogabāhulyāt śabdāyamānaḥ maho devo martyānāviveśeti manuṣyakartṛka ity evam eṣa yajñaḥ stuto bhavati /
analyzed: catvāri śṛṅgā iti vedāḥ uktāḥ trayaḥ sya pādāḥ iti savanāni dve śīrṣe iti dampatī yajamānau sapta hastāsaḥ iti chandāṃsi tridhā baddhaḥ iti mantra brāhmaṇa kalpaiḥ nibaddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ iti kāmān varṣati roravīti iti stotra śastra prayoga bāhulyāt śabdāyamānaḥ mahaḥ devaḥ martyān āviveśa iti manuṣya kartṛkaḥ iti evam eṣa yajñaḥ stutaḥ bhavati

original: tad yathā cakravākamithunastanī haṃsadantakeśī kāśavasaneti nadī stūyate //
analyzed: tat yathā cakravāka mithuna stanī haṃsa danta keśī kāśa vasanā iti nadī stūyate

original: [oṣadhe trāyasvainam ] iti cetanavan niyoga tasyāḥ stutyarthaḥ //
analyzed: oṣadhe trāyasva enam iti cetanavat niyoga tasyāḥ stuti arthaḥ

original: [śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ ] iti prātaranuvākastutiḥ /
analyzed: śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ iti prātaranuvāka stutiḥ

original: itthaṃ nāmaiṣaḥ prātaranuvākaḥ praśasyaḥ yad acetanā grāvāṇo 'pi śṛṇuyuḥ iti //
analyzed: ittham nāma eṣaḥ prātaranuvākaḥ praśasyaḥ yat acetanāḥ grāvāṇaḥ pi śṛṇuyuḥ iti

original: [aditirdyauraditir antarikṣam ] iti guṇavādād apratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: aditiḥ dyauḥ aditiḥ antarikṣam iti guṇavādāt apratiṣedhaḥ

original: tad yathā loke tvam eva me mātā tvam eva me pitā tvam eva me bhaginī tvam eva bhrāteti //
analyzed: tat yathā loke tvam eva me mātā tvam eva me pitā tvam eva me bhaginī tvam eva bhrātā iti

original: yat tu keṣāñcin mantrāṇām artho na jñāyata iti sa puruṣāparādhaḥ saṃbhavati na mantrāparādhaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu keṣāṃcid mantrāṇām arthaḥ na jñāyate iti sa puruṣa aparādhaḥ saṃbhavati na mantra aparādhaḥ

original: arthāvagamopāyeṣu bahuṣu satsv api tadanveṣaṇālasaḥ puruṣaḥ nārtham avagacchati na punar mantro 'trāparādhyati brāhmaṇavākyavat upāyatas tadarthāvagamadarśanāt /
analyzed: artha avagama upāyeṣu bahuṣu satsu api tad anveṣaṇa alasaḥ puruṣaḥ na artham avagacchati na punar brāhmaṇa vākya vat upāyataḥ tad artha avagama darśanāt

original: upāyaś ca prathamastāvat vṛddhavyavahāra eva tulyatvāl lokavedaśabdārthānām /
analyzed: upāyaḥ ca prathamaḥ tāvat vṛddha vyavahāraḥ eva tulya tvāt loka veda śabda arthānām

original: ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ ta eva vaidikāḥ ta eva caiṣām arthā iti //
analyzed: ye eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ te eva vaidikāḥ te eva ca eṣām arthāḥ iti

original: yady api ca [agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅkṣanat ] iti vede kṛtaṇatvaṃ agniśabdaṃ paṭhanti /
analyzed: yadi api ca agniḥ vṛtrāṇi jaṅkṣanat iti vede agni śabdam paṭhanti

original: [uttānā vai devagavā vahanti ] [vanaspate hiraṇyaparṇa pradivaste artham ] iti laukikavaidikayoḥ śabdayoḥ arthayoś ca nānātvam ivāśaṅkyate tathā 'pi tathātvapratyabhijñānenāvadhārya īṣadvikṛtās ta eva vede iti laukiky eva vyutpattiḥ //
analyzed: uttānāḥ vai devagavāḥ vahanti vanaspate hiraṇya parṇa pradivaḥ te artham iti laukika vaidikayoḥ śabdayoḥ arthayoḥ ca nānātvam iva āśaṅkyate tathā tathātva pratyabhijñānena avadhārya īṣat vikṛtāḥ te eva vede iti laukikī eva vyutpattiḥ

original: lokaprasiddhivipratiṣedhe tu śāstravitprasiddhiḥ pramāṇīkriyate /
analyzed: loka prasiddhi vipratiṣedhe tu śāstra vid prasiddhiḥ pramāṇīkriyate

original: yathā [yavamayaś caruḥ ] [vārāhī upānahau ] [vaitase kaṭe prājāpatyān sañcinoti ] iti yavavarāhavetasaśabdāḥ dīrghaśūkasūkaravañ julakeṣu śiṣṭaprasiddhyā niyamyante na priyaṅgukṛṣṇaśakunijambūṣv iti //
analyzed: yathā yava mayaḥ caruḥ vārāhī upānahau vaitase kaṭe prājāpatyān sañcinoti iti yava varāha vetasa śabdāḥ dīrgha śūka sūkara vam julakeṣu śiṣṭa prasiddhyā niyamyante na priyaṅgu kṛṣṇaśakuni jambūṣu iti

original: yatra tu śiṣṭaprasiddhir nāsti tatra mlecchhemvo 'pi tadarthavyutpattir āśriyate /
analyzed: yatra tu śiṣṭa prasiddhiḥ nā asti tatra mleccha hemvaḥ pi tad artha vyutpattiḥ āśriyate

original: yathā pikanematāmarasaśabdeṣu //
analyzed: yathā pika nema tāmarasa śabdeṣu

original: mlecchaprasiddher apy abhāve nigamaniruktavyākaraṇavaśena dhātutaḥ arthaḥ parikalpanīyaḥ /
analyzed: mleccha prasiddheḥ api abhāve nigama nirukta vyākaraṇa vaśena dhātutaḥ arthaḥ parikalpanīyaḥ

original: tena āśvinasūktaprakramāt jaraṇabharaṇanimittau [jarbharītur pharītū ] iti dvivacanāntasarūpāvetau śabdau aśvinor vācakāv iti gamyate /
analyzed: tena āśvina sūkta prakramāt jaraṇa bharaṇa nimittau jarbharītuḥ pharītū iti dvivacana anta sarūpau etau śabdau aśvinoḥ vācakau iti gamyate

original: evm anyatrāpy utprekṣaṇīyam //
analyzed: evam anyatra api utprekṣaṇīyam

original: tad anenāpi nimittena na mantrāṇām avivakṣitārthatvaṃ vaktavyam //
analyzed: tat anena api nimittena na mantrāṇām avivakṣita artha tvam vaktavyam

original: amī tasmād arthaprakaṭanamukhenaiva dadhati kriyārthatvaṃ mantrā na tu paṭhanamātreṇa japavat /
analyzed: amī tasmāt artha prakaṭana mukhena eva dadhati kriyā artha tvam mantrāḥ na tu paṭhana mātreṇa japa vat

original: na taddvāreṇāpi ślathayitum ataḥ śakyata idaṃ pramāṇatvaṃ vede sakalapuruṣārthāmṛtanidhau //
analyzed: na tad dvāreṇa api ślathayitum atas śakyate idam pramāṇa tvam vede sakala puruṣa artha amṛta nidhau

original: idam idānīṃ parīkṣyate /
analyzed: idam idānīm parīkṣyate

original: [udbhidā yajeta ] [citrayā yajeta paśukāmaḥ ] [agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ ] [śyenenābhicaran yajeta ] [vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajeta ] iti śrūyate /
analyzed: udbhidā yajeta citrayā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ śyenena abhicaran yajeta vājapeyena svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta iti śrūyate

original: tatra kiṃ udbhideti citrayeti agnihotram iti śyeneneti vājapeyeneti guṇavidhaya ete tattatkarmanāmadheyāni iti //
analyzed: tatra kim udbhidā iti citrayā iti agnihotram iti śyenena iti vājapeyena iti guṇa vidhayaḥ ete tad tad karma nāmadheyāni iti

original: kim anena parīkṣitena prayojanam ubhayatrāpi prāmāṇyaṃ nopapadyata iti tadartham evedaṃ parīkṣyate //
analyzed: kim anena parīkṣitena prayojanam ubhayatra api prāmāṇyam na upapadyate iti tad artham eva idam parīkṣyate

original: yadi tāvat [vrīhibhir yajeta ] [dagdhā juhoti ] itivat guṇaḥ kiñcid udbhidādipadair vidhīyate anena dravyaviśeṣeṇa yāgaḥ kartavya iti tadābhāvārthasya yajyādeḥ anyato 'vagatir mṛgyā anavagatārthe bhāvārthe guṇavidhānasyānupapannatvāt /
analyzed: yadi tāvat vrīhibhiḥ yajeta dagdhā juhoti iti vat guṇaḥ kiñcid udbhid ādi padaiḥ vidhīyate anena dravya viśeṣeṇa yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ iti tadā abhāva arthasya yaji ādeḥ anyatas vagatiḥ mṛgyā anavagata arthe bhāva arthe guṇa vidhānasya anupapanna tvāt

original: [āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo bhavati ] [agnihotraṃ juhoti ] iti vidhyantareṇa bhāvārthe codite tatra [vrīhibhir yajeta ] [dagdhā juhoti ] iti //
analyzed: āgneyaḥ u ṣṭākapālaḥ bhavati agnihotram juhoti iti vidhi antareṇa bhāva arthe ca udite tatra vrīhibhiḥ yajeta dagdhā juhoti iti

original: nanu [vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajeta ] ity anenaiva vākyena yāgākhyo bhāvārthaḥ codayiṣyate guṇaś ca tasmin vājapeyākhyo vidhāsyate iti ko doṣaḥ kathaṃ na doṣaḥ arthadvayavidhānena vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt [vājapeyena svārājyaṃ kuryāt ] ity eko arthaḥ [vājapeyena giṇena yāgaṃ kuryāt ] iti dvitīyo 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: nanu vājapeyena svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta iti anena eva vākyena yāga ākhyaḥ bhāva arthaḥ codayiṣyate guṇaḥ ca tasmin vājapeya ākhyaḥ vidhāsyate iti kaḥ doṣaḥ katham na doṣaḥ artha dvaya vidhānena vākya bheda prasaṅgāt vājapeyena svārājyam kuryāt iti ekaḥ arthaḥ vājapeyena yāgam kuryāt iti dvitīyaḥ rthaḥ

original: na ca sakṛd uccaritaṃ vākyaṃ arthadvayavidhānāya prabhavati //
analyzed: na ca sakṛt uccaritam vākyam artha dvaya vidhānāya prabhavati

original: nanu [yajeta ] iti rūpasāmyāt ubhayatrāpi sambadhyate [yajeta svārājyakāmaḥ vājapeyena ca ] iti tulyam asyobhayatrāpi rūpam na rūpasāmyasyāsiddhatvāt /
analyzed: nanu yajeta iti rūpa sāmyāt ubhayatra api sambadhyate yajeta svārājya kāmaḥ vājapeyena ca iti tulyam asya ubhayatra api rūpam na rūpa sāmyasya asiddha tvāt

original: svārājyaṃ prāti yajiraprāptatvāt vidhīyate guṇaṃ ca prati prāptatvāt anūdyate /
analyzed: svārājyam yajira prāpta tvāt vidhīyate guṇam ca prati prāpta tvāt anūdyate

original: anavagate ca karmaṇi guṇavidhānam aghaṭamānam iti avaśyaṃ guṇavidhipakṣe guṇaṃ prati yajiḥ prāptatvād uddeśyo bhavati pradhānaṃ ca /
analyzed: an avagate ca karmaṇi guṇa vidhānam a ghaṭamānam iti avaśyam guṇa vidhi pakṣe guṇam prati yajiḥ prāpta tvāt uddeśyaḥ bhavati pradhānam ca

original: sa eva svārājyaṃ prati vidheyatvāt upādeyo guṇaś ceti viruddharūpāpatteḥ na yajir ubhābhyāṃ yugapat sambaddhum arhati /
analyzed: saḥ eva svārājyam prati vidheya tvāt upādeyaḥ guṇaḥ ca iti viruddha rūpa āpatteḥ na yajiḥ ubhābhyām yugapad sambaddhum arhati

original: yaḥ svārājyaṃ sādhayitum iccheta sa yajetety anyad rūpam yad yajeta tat vājapeyenety anyad rūpam /
analyzed: yaḥ svārājyam sādhayitum iccheta sa yajeta iti anyat rūpam yat yajeta tat vājapeyena iti anyat rūpam

original: tasmāt bhāvārthaprāptau pramāṇāntarāpekṣaṇāt guṇavidhipakṣe tat apramāṇaṃ vacanam //
analyzed: tasmāt bhāva artha prāptau pramāṇa antara apekṣaṇāt guṇa vidhi pakṣe tat apramāṇam vacanam

original: athaiṣa doṣo mā bhūd iti nāmadheyapakṣa āśrīyate tadaiṣām udbhidādipadānāṃ vispaṣṭam evānarthakyam /
analyzed: atha eṣa doṣaḥ mā bhūt iti nāmadheya pakṣaḥ āśrīyate tadā eṣām udbhid ādi padānām vispaṣṭam eva ānarthakyam

original: yāvad evoktaṃ bhavati [yajeta ] iti tāvad eva [vājapeyena yajeta ] iti /
analyzed: yāvat eva uktam bhavati yajeta iti tāvat eva vājapeyena yajeta iti

original: evam ānarthakyāt anyatrāpy asamāśvāsaḥ //
analyzed: evam ānarthakyāt anyatra api asamāśvāsaḥ

original: atrocyate guṇavidhipakṣe yathā bhavān āha tathāiva /
analyzed: atrā ucyate guṇa vidhi pakṣe yathā bhavān āha tathā iva

original: nāmadheyapakṣa eva tu śreyān ity abhyupagamyate /
analyzed: nāmadheya pakṣaḥ eva tu śreyān iti abhyupagamyate

original: tathā hi bhāvārthasya phalaṃ prati karaṇatvāt tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena tṛtīyā prayujyate /
analyzed: tathā hi bhāva arthasya phalam prati karaṇa tvāt tad sāmānādhikaraṇyena tṛtīyā prayujyate

original: tatra [vājapeyena ] iti sādhyaś ca bhavan bhāvārthaḥ karaṇabhāvam anubhavatīti /
analyzed: tatra vājapeyena iti sādhyaḥ ca bhavan bhāva arthaḥ karaṇa bhāvam anubhavati iti

original: sādhyatvāpekṣayā tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena kvacit dvitīyā 'pi prayujyate [agnihotraṃ juhoti ] iti //
analyzed: sādhya tva apekṣayā tad sāmānādhikaraṇyena kvacid dvitīyā pi prayujyate agnihotram juhoti iti

original: nanu guṇavan nāmāpi vidhātavyam eva anabhihitsyānavagamāt /
analyzed: nanu guṇavat nāma api vidhātavyam eva anabhihitsya anavagamāt

original: tataś ca guṇavidhipakṣaspṛśaḥ vākyabhedādidoṣāḥ tadavasthā eva naitad evam na hy asya karmaṇaḥ idaṃ nāma veditavyam iti saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaṃ vedo vidadhāti /
analyzed: tatas ca guṇa vidhi pakṣa spṛśaḥ vākya bheda ādi doṣāḥ tad avasthāḥ eva na etat evam na hi asya karmaṇaḥ idam nāma veditavyam iti saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandham vedaḥ vidadhāti

original: yogena tu kenacit pravartamānaṃ nāmadheyam avagamyata eva /
analyzed: yogena tu kenacid pravartamānam nāmadheyam avagamyate eva

original: udbhedanam anena paśūnāṃ kriyata iti udbhididam //
analyzed: udbhedanam anena paśūnām kriyate iti udbhid idam

original: [dadhimadhupayoghṛtaṃ dhātāstaṇṭulā udakaṃ tatsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ prājāpatyam ] iti nānāvidhavicitradravyasādhyatvāt citrā //
analyzed: dadhi madhu payaḥ ghṛtam dhātāḥ taṇṭulāḥ udakam tad saṃsṛṣṭam prājāpatyam iti nānāvidha vicitra dravya sādhya tvāt citrā

original: agnaye hotram asminn ity agnihotram //
analyzed: agnaye hotram asmin iti agnihotram

original: [yathā vai śyeno nipatyādatte evam anena dviṣantaṃ bhrātṛvyam ādatte ] ity arthavādāt śyena iva śyeno yāgaḥ /
analyzed: yathā vai śyenaḥ nipatya ādatte evam anena dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam ādatte iti arthavādāt śyenaḥ iva śyenaḥ yāgaḥ

original: tasmāt karmanāmāny etāni //
analyzed: tasmāt karma nāmāni etāni

original: yat tu nāmadheyapakṣe nairarthakyam āśaṅkitaṃ tad api na cāru nāmāpi guṇaphalopalabdheḥ arthavad ity abhiyuktaiḥ parihṛtatvāt /
analyzed: yat tu nāmadheya pakṣe nairarthakyam āśaṅkitam tat api na cāru nāma api guṇa phala upalabdheḥ arthavat iti abhiyuktaiḥ parihṛta tvāt

original: evaṃnāmedaṃ karmety avagamyate /
analyzed: evaṃnāmā idam karma iti avagamyate

original: tatra guṇaḥ dravyadevatādiḥ /
analyzed: tatra guṇaḥ dravya devatā ādiḥ

original: phalaṃ ca tasya svargaḥ paścād avagamyata iti /
analyzed: phalam ca tasya svargaḥ paścāt avagamyate iti

original: tasmān nāmadheyapadānām aviruddho 'nvayḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt nāmadheya padānām a viruddhaḥ nvayaḥ

original: kvacit punar aprāpte bhāvārthe saguṇam eva tatkarma codyate /
analyzed: kvacid punar aprāpte bhāva arthe sa guṇam eva tat karma codyate

original: yathā [āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvasyāyāṃ ca paurṇamāsyāṃ cā 'cyuto bhavati ] iti /
analyzed: yathā āgneyaḥ ṣṭākapālaḥ māvasyāyām ca paurṇamāsyām ca ā cyutaḥ bhavati iti

original: yathā vā [etasyaiva recatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā paśukāmo hy etena yajeta ] itīty alaṃ śastrāntarodgāragahanakathāvistareṇeti nāsti nāmadheyadvāreṇāpi pramāṇatā ''kṣepaḥ /
analyzed: yathā vai etasya eva recatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā paśu kāmaḥ hi etena yajeta iti iti alam śastra antara udgāra gahana kathā vistareṇa iti na asti nāmadheya dvāreṇa api pramāṇa tā kṣepaḥ

original: sarvaprakāreṇāpi siddhaṃ devapramāṇatvam iti //
analyzed: sarva prakāreṇa api siddham deva pramāṇa tvam iti

original: vedaprāmāṇyasidhyartham ittham etāḥ kathāḥ kṛtāḥ /
analyzed: veda prāmāṇya sidhi artham ittham etāḥ kathāḥ kṛtāḥ

original: na tu mīmāṃsakacchātapāramithyābhidhānataḥ //
analyzed: na tu mīmāṃsaka chāta pāra mithyā abhidhānataḥ

original: nanu evaṃ vidhyarthavādamantrānāmadheyānāṃ kāryaupayiktvadarśanāt kārya evārthe vedaḥ pramāṇam ity uktaṃ syāt /
analyzed: nanu evam vidhi arthavāda mantra nāmadheyānām kārī aupayik tva darśanāt kārye eva arthe vedaḥ pramāṇam iti uktam syāt

original: tataḥ kim siddhe 'rthe tasya prāmāṇyaṃ hīyate tato 'pi kim bhūyān bhūtārthābhidhāyigrantharāśir upekṣito bhavet /
analyzed: tatas kim siddhe rthe tasya prāmāṇyam hīyate kim bhūyān bhūta artha abhidhāyi grantha rāśiḥ upekṣitaḥ bhavet

original: sakalasya ca vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitum etat pravṛttaṃ śāstram //
analyzed: sakalasya ca vedasya prāmāṇyam pratiṣṭhāpayitum etat pravṛttam śāstram

original: atra kecid āhuḥ sarvasyaiva vedasya kārye 'rthe prāmāṇyam tathā hi gṛhītasambandhaḥ śabdaḥ artham avagamayati /
analyzed: atra kecid āhuḥ sarvasya eva vedasya kārye rthe prāmāṇyam tathā hi gṛhīta sambandhaḥ śabdaḥ artham avagamayati

original: sambandhagrahaṇaṃ cāsya vṛddhavyavahārāt /
analyzed: sambandha grahaṇam ca asya vṛddha vyavahārāt

original: vṛddhānāṃ ca vyavahāraḥ [pānīyam ānaya ] [gāṃ badhāna ] [grāmaṃ gaccha ] iti kāryapratipādakair eva śabdaih pravartata iti tatraiva vyutpadyante bālāḥ /
analyzed: vṛddhānām ca vyavahāraḥ pānīyam ānaya gām badhāna grāmam gaccha iti kārya pratipādakaiḥ eva śabdaiḥ pravartate iti tatra eva vyutpadyante bālāḥ

original: prayojanoddeśena hi vṛddhā vākyāni prayuñjate /
analyzed: prayojana uddeśena hi vṛddhāḥ vākyāni prayuñjate

original: na ca siddhārthābhinirvartata iti tasya na prayogayogyatvam /
analyzed: na ca siddhārthā abhinirvartate iti tasya na prayoga yogya tvam

original: aprayuñjyamānasya ca na sambandhagrahaṇam /
analyzed: a prayuñjyamānasya ca na sambandha grahaṇam

original: agṛhītasambandhasya ca na pratipādakatvam /
analyzed: agṛhīta sambandhasya ca na pratipādaka tvam

original: apratipādakasya ca //
analyzed: a pratipādakasya ca

original: na prāmāṇyam //
analyzed: na prāmāṇyam

original: api ca ākhyātapadoccāraṇam antareṇa nirākāṅkṣapratyayānutpādāt avaśyam ākhyātayuktaṃ vākyaṃ prayoktavyam /
analyzed: api ca ākhyāta pada uccāraṇam antareṇa nirākāṅkṣa pratyaya anutpādāt avaśyam ākhyāta yuktam vākyam prayoktavyam

original: ākhyātapadena ca sādhyarūpo 'rtha ucyate /
analyzed: ākhyāta padena ca sādhya rūpaḥ rthaḥ ucyate

original: nāmapadena ca siddhaḥ /
analyzed: nāma padena ca siddhaḥ

original: bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇe bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata iti vākyasya sādhyārthaniṣṭhatete na bhūtārthaviṣaye tasya prāmāṇyam /
analyzed: bhūta bhavya samuccāraṇe bhūtam bhavyāya upadiśyate iti vākyasya sādhya artha niṣṭha tā īte na bhūta artha viṣaye tasya prāmāṇyam

original: ataś ca kārye arthe śabdasya prāmāṇyam yataś ca kāryarūpo 'rthaḥ śabdasyaiva viṣaya iti tatra śabdaḥ pramāṇatāṃ labhate /
analyzed: atas ca kārye arthe śabdasya prāmāṇyam yatas ca kārya rūpaḥ rthaḥ śabdasya eva viṣayaḥ iti tatra śabdaḥ pramāṇa tām labhate

original: siddho arthaḥ prasiddhatvād eva /
analyzed: siddhaḥ arthaḥ prasiddha tvāt eva

original: pramāṇāntaraparicchdayogya iti tatpratipādane tatpramāṇāntarasavyapakṣe śabdo bhavati tataś ca tadgrāhiṇaḥ pramāṇāntarasyaiva tatra prāmāṇyaṃ syāt na śabdasya /
analyzed: pramāṇa antara paricchda yogyaḥ iti tad pratipādane tad pramāṇa antara savya pakṣe śabdaḥ bhavati tatas ca tad grāhiṇaḥ pramāṇa antarasya eva tatra prāmāṇyam syāt na śabdasya

original: śabdaś ca tadupasthāpanamātra eva niṣṭhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: śabdaḥ ca tad upasthāpana mātraḥ eva niṣṭhaḥ syāt

original: tasmāt śabdaprāmāṇyam icchatā kārya evārthe tatprāmāṇyam aṅgīkartavyam iti //
analyzed: tasmāt śabda prāmāṇyam icchatā kārye eva arthe tad prāmāṇyam aṅgīkartavyam iti

original: atrocyate yat brūṣe kārya evārthe vākyasya vyutpattir iti tad ayuktam /
analyzed: atrā ucyate yat brūṣe kārye eva arthe vākyasya vyutpattiḥ iti tat ayuktam

original: evaṃ hi [siddharūpo 'yaṃ tasyārthaḥ ] iti kathaṃ tvayocyate /
analyzed: evam hi siddha rūpaḥ yam tasya arthaḥ iti katham tvayā ucyate

original: na hy alabdhavyutpatteḥ śabdāt arthapratyayo yujyate /
analyzed: na hi alabdha vyutpatteḥ śabdāt artha pratyayaḥ yujyate

original: artapratītiś ca tato dṛśyate vyutpattiś ca tatra nāstīti citram /
analyzed: arta pratītiḥ ca tatas dṛśyate vyutpattiḥ ca tatra na asti iti citram

original: na ca kāryaparair eva śabdaiḥ loke vyavahāraḥ vartamānopadeśakebhyo 'pi nadyādivākyebhyaḥ vyavahārapravṛtteḥ tatrāpi vyutpattir bhavaty eva //
analyzed: na ca kārya paraiḥ eva śabdaiḥ loke vyavahāraḥ vartamāna upadeśakebhyaḥ nadī ādi vākyebhyaḥ vyavahāra pravṛtteḥ tatra api vyutpattiḥ bhavati eva

original: api ca aṅgulyādinā puro 'vasthitam arthaṃ nirdiśya yadā kaścit kathayati [asyedaṃ nāma ] iti tadā kāryopadeśam antareṇāpi bhavaty eva vyutpattiḥ /
analyzed: api ca aṅguli ādinā puras artham nirdiśya yadā kaścid kathayati asya idam nāma iti tadā kārya upadeśam antareṇa api bhavati eva vyutpattiḥ

original: [asmāc chabdād ayam arthaḥ pratipattavyaḥ ] iti kāryopadeśa evāsāv iticet na tādṛśānām akṣarāṇām aśravaṇāt /
analyzed: asmāt śabdāt ayam arthaḥ pratipattavyaḥ iti kārya upadeśaḥ eva asau iti ced na tādṛśānām akṣarāṇām aśravaṇāt

original: [asyedaṃ nāma ] iti hi śrūyate na [asmād ayaṃ pratipattavyaḥ ] iti /
analyzed: asya idam nāma  iti hi śrūyate na asmāt ayam pratipattavyaḥ iti

original: [asyedaṃ nāma ] ity eṣām evākṣarāṇām eṣo rtha iti cet na apadārthasya kyārthatvāyogāt /
analyzed: asya idam nāma iti eṣām eva akṣarāṇām eṣaḥ rthaḥ iti ced na apadārthasya kyārtha tva ayogāt

original: na caivaṃ kalpayitum api śakyate [asyedaṃ nāma ] ity etāvataiva tatpratipattisiddheḥ pratipattikartavyatā 'bhidhānasya niṣprayojanatvāt //
analyzed: na ca evam kalpayitum api śakyate asya idam nāma iti etāvatā eva tad pratipatti siddheḥ pratipatti kartavya tā abhidhānasya niṣprayojana tvāt

original: kāryaparād api śabdāt vyutpattir bhavantī na vākyārthamātraparyavasāyinī bhavati kin tv ekaikapadāvāpāpodvāpadvārakapadārthaparyantā sā bhavati /
analyzed: kārya parāt api śabdāt vyutpattiḥ bhavantī na vākya artha mātra paryavasāyinī bhavati kin tu ekaika pada āvāpa apodvāpa dvāraka padārtha paryantā sā bhavati

original: padārthavyutpattisaṃskṛtamateś ca abhinavakaviviracitavartamānopadeśaślokaśravaṇe 'pi vākyārthapratītir dṛśyata eveti nāvyutpattikṛtam aprāmāṇyam //
analyzed: padārtha vyutpatti saṃskṛta mateḥ ca abhinava kavi viracita vartamāna upadeśa śloka śravaṇe vākya artha pratītiḥ dṛśyate eva iti na avyutpatti kṛtam aprāmāṇyam

original: na cāsau bhūtārthapratipādakaśabdajātinā pratītiḥ bādhyate sandigdhā vā yena pratyakṣādipramāṇāntarakaraṇakapratītivat pramāṇaphalam eva sā bhavitum arhati //
analyzed: na ca asau bhūta artha pratipādaka śabda jātinā pratītiḥ bādhyate sandigdhā vā yena pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa antara karaṇaka pratīti vat pramāṇa phalam eva sā bhavitum arhati

original: yat punar abhidhāyi kārye arthe pramāṇāntaranirapekṣatayā pramāṇaṃ bhavati śabdaḥ bhūtārthe tu neti tadasat śabdasya pramāṃāntarasāpekṣatvānapāyāt /
analyzed: yat punar abhidhāyi kārye arthe pramāṇa antara nirapekṣa tayā pramāṇam bhavati śabdaḥ bhūta arthe tu na iti tat asat śabdasya pramāṇa antara sāpekṣa tva anapāyāt

original: pramāṇāntareṇānavagate hy arthe śabdaḥ pravartayitum eva na śaknoti ity evocāma /
analyzed: pramāṇa antareṇa anavagate hi arthe śabdaḥ pravartayitum eva na śaknoti iti eva ūcāma

original: vakṣyāmaś ca vākyārthacintāyām api /
analyzed: vakṣyāmaḥ ca vākya artha cintāyām api

original: pramāṇāntarasāpekṣatvaṃ tasya pratyuta prāmāṇyam āvahati na pratihanti //
analyzed: pramāṇa antara sāpekṣa tvam tasya pratyuta prāmāṇyam āvahati na pratihanti

original: kiñ cedaṃ sāpekṣatvam iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: kim ca idam sāpekṣatvam iti vaktavyam

original: kiṃ siddhārthābhidhāyinaḥ śabdasya utpattāv eva pramāṇāntarasāpekṣatvam uta tadviṣayasya pramāṇāntaraparicchedayogyatvam ity ubhayathā 'tiprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: kim siddhārtha abhidhāyinaḥ śabdasya utpattau eva pramāṇa antara sāpekṣa tvam uta tad viṣayasya pramāṇa antara pariccheda yogya tvam iti ubhayathā tiprasaṅgaḥ

original: utpattau pramāṇāntarasavyapekṣatayā yady aprāmāṇyaṃ varṇyate hanta hatam anumānam tasyotpattau pratyakṣādisāpekṣatvāt /
analyzed: utpattau pramāṇa antara savyapekṣa tayā yadi aprāmāṇyam varṇyate hanta hatam anumānam tasya utpattau pratyakṣa ādi sāpekṣa tvāt

original: varṇitaṃ ca [tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānam ] iti /
analyzed: varṇitam ca tad pūrvakam trividham anumānam iti

original: tadviṣayasya pramāṇāntaragrahaṇāyogyatāyāṃ tu tadaprāmāṇye pratyakṣādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ aprāmāṇyaṃ prāpnoti pramāṇasaṃplavasya prāk pratipāditatvāt //
analyzed: tad viṣayasya pramāṇa antara grahaṇa ayogya tāyām tu tad aprāmāṇye pratyakṣa ādīnām sarveṣām aprāmāṇyam prāpnoti pramāṇa saṃplavasya prāk pratipādita tvāt

original: api ca vidhiyukteṣv api vaidikeṣu laukikeṣu vākyeṣu [adhīṣva ] {gāṃ badhāna ] [grāmaṃ gaccha] ity evamādiṣu anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ hitāhitaprāptiparihārasādhanasāmarthyāvagamena pravṛttisiddheḥ viniyogamātraniṣṭha eva vidhir bhavati /
analyzed: api ca vidhi yukteṣu api vaidikeṣu laukikeṣu vākyeṣu adhīṣva gām badhāna grāmam gaccha iti evamādiṣu anvaya vyatirekābhyām hita ahita prāpti parihāra sādhana sāmarthya avagamena pravṛtti siddheḥ viniyoga mātra niṣṭhaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhavati

original: apravṛttapravartanātmakanirapekṣanijavyāpāravaidhuryāt kāryparatvānupapatteḥ anuvādamātraṃ vidhivacanam iti kāryārthaprāmāṇyavādināṃ sarvam eva laukikaṃ vākyaṃ apramāṇaṃ syāt //
analyzed: apravṛtta pravartana ātmaka nirapekṣa nija vyāpāra vaidhuryāt kāri paratva anupapatteḥ anuvāda mātram vidhi vacanam iti kārya artha prāmāṇya vādinām sarvam eva laukikam vākyam apramāṇam syāt

original: ye tu bhūtārthavādiṣu laukikavākyeṣu pravṛttinivṛttikāriṣu vidhiniṣedhau kalpayanti te nitarāmṛjavaḥ śrūyamāṇo 'pi vidhiḥ anuvādībhavati yatra tatrāśrutaḥ kalpyata iti kim anyad ataḥ paramārjavam pravṛttau tu tatra vidhir aprayojakaeva anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ puruṣārthasādhanasāmarthyāvagamāt puruṣapratyayād vā lokeṣu pravṛttisiddheḥ //
analyzed: ye tu bhūta artha vādiṣu laukika vākyeṣu pravṛtti nivṛtti kāriṣu vidhi niṣedhau kalpayanti te nitarām ṛjavaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ vidhiḥ anuvādībhavati yatra tatra aśrutaḥ kalpyate iti kim anyat atas parama ārjavam pravṛttau tu tatra vidhiḥ aprayojakaḥ eva anvaya vyatirekābhyām puruṣa artha sādhana sāmarthya avagamāt puruṣa pratyayāt vā lokeṣu pravṛtti siddheḥ

original: tatraitat syāt laukikavākyānāṃ vivakṣāparatvāt na kāryārthatvam /
analyzed: tatra etat syāt laukika vākyānām vivakṣā paratvāt na kārya artha tvam

original: yathoktaṃ [api ca pauruṣeyād vacanāt evam ayaṃ puruṣo vedeti bhavati pratyayaḥ naivam arthateti /
analyzed: yathā uktam api ca pauruṣeyāt vacanāt evam ayam puruṣaḥ veda iti bhavati pratyayaḥ na evam artha tā iti

original: vaidikāni punaḥ apauruṣeyatayā kāryaparāṇy eva vākyāni ] iti etad api na peśalam apauruṣeyasya vacasaḥ pratikṣiptatvāt /
analyzed: vaidikāni punar apauruṣeya tayā kārya parāṇi eva vākyāni iti etat api na peśalam apauruṣeyasya vacasaḥ pratikṣipta tvāt

original: vede 'pi kartur īśvarasya sādhittvāt //
analyzed: vede pi kartuḥ īśvarasya

original: na ca puruṣavacanam api vivakṣāparam iti darśitam /
analyzed: na ca puruṣa vacanam api vivakṣā param iti darśitam

original: tathā hi na vivakṣā vākyārthaḥ [devadatta gām abhyāja kṛṣṇāṃ daṇḍena ] iti padagrāme vivakṣāvādinaḥ padāsyāśravaṇāt apadārthasya vākyārthatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi na vivakṣā vākya arthaḥ devadatta gām abhyāja kṛṣṇām daṇḍena iti pada grāme vivakṣā vādinaḥ pada āsya aśravaṇāt apadārthasya vākya artha tva anupapatteḥ

original: na ca viṣabhakṣaṇavākyasyeva paragṛhe bhojananivṛttā pauruṣeyavacasaḥ vivakṣāyāṃ tātparyaśaktir api prabhavati /
analyzed: na ca viṣa bhakṣaṇa vākyasya iva para gṛhe bhojana nivṛttā pauruṣeya vacasaḥ vivakṣāyām tātparya śaktiḥ api prabhavati

original: na hi sarvātmanā 'bhidhātrīṃ śaktim avadhīryaiva tātparyaśaktiḥ prasarati iti na vivakṣāparatvam //
analyzed: na hi sarva ātmanā bhidhātrīm śaktim avadhīrya eva tātparya śaktiḥ prasarati iti na vivakṣā paratvam

original: kathaṃ tarhi puruṣavacanād uccāritāt vivakṣāvagama iti cet anumānād iti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: katham tarhi puruṣa vacanāt uccāritāt vivakṣā avagamaḥ iti ced anumānāt iti brūmaḥ

original: kāryatvāt padaracanāyāḥ puruṣecchāpūrvakatvam anumīyate /
analyzed: kārya tvāt pada racanāyāḥ puruṣa icchā pūrvaka tvam anumīyate

original: arthāvagamapuraśaraṃ ca puruṣavacanāt vivakṣānumānaṃ [evam ayaṃ veda ] [evam ayaṃ vivakṣati ] iti /
analyzed: artha avagama pura śaram ca puruṣa vacanāt vivakṣā anumānam evam ayam veda evam ayam vivakṣati iti

original: arthoparāgarahitasya vivakṣāmātrasya jīvatāṃ nisargata eva siddheḥ /
analyzed: artha uparāga rahitasya vivakṣā mātrasya jīvatām nisargataḥ eva siddheḥ

original: [ayam artho 'sya vivakṣitaḥ ] ity arthoparajyamānā tu vivakṣā na śakyā arthe 'navagate 'vagantum /
analyzed: ayam vivakṣitaḥ iti artha uparajyamānā tu vivakṣā na śakyā arthe na avagate vagantum

original: arthaś cet prathamam avagato vākyāt na tarhi tat vivakṣāparam arthaparam eva bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: arthaḥ ced prathamam avagataḥ vākyāt na tarhi tat vivakṣā param artha param eva bhavitum arhati

original: lokavākyānāṃ vivakṣāparatve bāhye 'rthe sambandhagrahaṇāsaṃbhavāt vedād api vākyārthāvagamo na syād ity alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: loka vākyānām vivakṣā para tve bāhye rthe sambandha grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt vedāt api vākya artha avagamaḥ na syāt iti alam prasaṅgena

original: tasmān na kāryaparatvenaiva śabdasya prāmāṇyam //
analyzed: tasmāt na kārya para tvena eva śabdasya prāmāṇyam

original: yat punar abhāṇi nākhyātaśūnyaṃ vākyaṃ prayogārham /
analyzed: yat punar abhāṇi na ākhyāta śūnyam vākyam prayoga arham

original: tena vinā nairākāṅkṣyānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: tena vinā nairākāṅkṣya anupapatteḥ

original: ākhyātasya ca bhavyarūpaḥ arthaḥ na nāmna iva bhūtaḥ /
analyzed: ākhyātasya ca bhavyarūpaḥ arthaḥ na nāmna iva bhūtaḥ

original: bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇe ca bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata iti sarvatra kāryaparatvam iti tad api na saṃpratam [putras te jātaḥ ] [kanyā te garbhiṇī ] iti sukhaduḥkhakāriṇāṃ anupadiṣṭapravṛttinivṛttikānāṃ anākhyātānām api vākyānāṃ loke prācuryeṇa prayujyamānatvāt //
analyzed: bhūta bhavya samuccāraṇe ca bhūtam bhavyāya upadiśyate iti sarvatra kārya paratvam iti tat api na saṃpratam putraḥ te jātaḥ kanyā te garbhiṇī iti sukha duḥkha kāriṇām an upadiṣṭa pravṛtti nivṛttikānām an ākhyātānām api vākyānām loke prācuryeṇa prayujyamāna tvāt

original: atha [sukhī bhava ] [duḥkhī bhava ] iti tatra kāryaparatvaṃ vyākhyāyate tad api na yuktam īdṛśānām akṣarāṇām aśravaṇāt kalpanāyāś ca niṣphalatvāt /
analyzed: atha sukhī bhava duḥkhī bhava iti tatra kārya para tvam vyākhyāyate tat api na yuktam īdṛśānām akṣarāṇām aśravaṇāt kalpanāyāḥ ca niṣphala tvāt

original: na hi [sukhī bhava ] ity upadeśāt asau sukhī bhavati sukhībhavituṃ vā kvacit pravartate /
analyzed: na hi sukhī bhava iti upadeśāt asau sukhī bhavati sukhībhavitum vā kvacid pravartate

original: upāye pūrvam eva pravṛttatvāt /
analyzed: upāye pūrvam eva pravṛtta tvāt

original: upeye ca pravṛttyanupapatteḥ /
analyzed: upeye ca pravṛtti anupapatteḥ

original: kin tu putrajanmaśravaṇata evāsau sukhībhavati //
analyzed: kin tu putra janma śravaṇataḥ eva asau sukhībhavati

original: tathā kasyacit uttarīyāvaguṇṭhitatanoḥ nidrāyamāṇasya kvacit kenacit kelinā rajjuveṣṭitavapuṣaḥ paścāt prabodhasamaye sahasā sarīsṛpavalitam ātmānaṃ manyamānasya bhayādanu nmīlitacakṣuṣaḥ kenacit prayujyamānaṃ [rajvā veṣṭito 'si ]iti vacaḥ śravaṇapatham avatarati tat siddhārthabodhakam api pramāṇam /
analyzed: tathā kasyacid uttarīya avaguṇṭhita tanoḥ nidrāyamāṇasya kvacid kenacid kelinā rajju veṣṭita vapuṣaḥ paścāt prabodha samaye sahasā sarīsṛpa valitam ātmānam manyamānasya bhayāt anu nmīlita cakṣuṣaḥ kenacid prayujyamānam rajvā veṣṭitaḥ si iti vacaḥ śravaṇa patham avatarati tat siddhārtha bodhakam api pramāṇam

original: na ca tatra [mā bhauṣī ] iti prayogakalpanāyāḥ prayojanam rajjuveṣṭanapratyayād eva bhayanivṛtteḥ siddhtvāt //
analyzed: na ca tatra mā bhauṣī iti prayoga kalpanāyāḥ prayojanam rajju veṣṭana pratyayāt eva bhaya nivṛtteḥ siddh tvāt

original: tathā ca [viṣamaviṣadharādhiṣṭhito 'yam adhvā ] [nidhiyukto 'yaṃ bhūbhāgaḥ ] iti bhūtārthakhyāpakaṃ vaco dṛśyate na ca tadapramāṇam /
analyzed: tathā ca viṣama viṣadhara dhiṣṭhitaḥ yam adhvā nidhi yuktaḥ yam bhū bhāgaḥ iti bhūta artha khyāpakam vacaḥ dṛśyate na ca tat apramāṇam

original: na ca tatra [mā gāḥ tvam anenādhvanā ] [nidhiṃ gṛhāṇa ] iti vidhiniṣedhaparatvaṃ yuktam eṣāṃ padānām aśravaṇāt //
analyzed: na ca tatra mā gāḥ tvam anena adhvanā nidhim gṛhāṇa iti vidhi niṣedha para tvam yuktam eṣām padānām aśravaṇāt

original: nanu vaktuḥ prekṣāpurvakāritayā niṣprayojanavacanānuccārāt avaśyaṃ [mā gāḥ ] [gṛhāṇa ] iti kāryākṣarāṇi hṛdaye parisphuranti /
analyzed: nanu vaktuḥ prekṣā purva kāri tayā niṣprayojana vacana anuccārāt avaśyam mā gāḥ gṛhāṇa iti kārya akṣarāṇi hṛdaye parisphuranti

original: kathañcid ālasyādinā noccaritānīti naitad yuktam prekṣāpūrvakāritvād eva vaktuḥ yathā 'vasthitavastusvarūpamātrakhyāpakavacanoccāraṇam eva yuktam arthāt pravṛttinivṛttyoḥ siddhatvāt parābhiprāyasya cānavasthitatvena niyatopadeśānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: kathañcid ālasya ādinā nā uccaritāni iti nā etat yuktam prekṣā pūrva kāri tvāt eva vaktuḥ yathā vasthita vastu svarūpa mātra khyāpaka vacana uccāraṇam eva yuktam arthāt pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ siddha tvāt para abhiprāyasya ca anavasthita tvena niyata upadeśa anupapatteḥ

original: sarvabandhajīvino hi sapannaga eva panthā upādeyatayā 'vabhāti /
analyzed: sarva bandha jīvinaḥ hi sa pannagaḥ eva panthāḥ upādeya tayā vabhāti

original: vītarāgasya ca brahmavidaḥ vitteṣaṇāvyutthitasya govindasvāmina iva nidhir api heyatay parisphuratīti kasmai kim upadiśyatām vastusvarūpe tu kathite yathāhṛdayavartirāgadveṣānuvartanena kaścit tatra pravartatām kaścit tato nivartatām iti bhūtārthakathanam eva like prekṣāvān karoti na vidhiniṣedhau prayoktum arhatīti //
analyzed: vīta rāgasya ca brahma vidaḥ vitta iṣaṇā vyutthitasya govindasvāminaḥ iva nidhiḥ api heya tay parisphurati iti kasmai kim upadiśyatām vastu svarūpe tu kathite yathā hṛdaya varti rāga dveṣa anuvartanena kaścid tatra pravartatām kaścid tatas nivartatām iti bhūta artha kathanam eva like prekṣāvān karoti na vidhi niṣedhau prayoktum arhati iti

original: ye 'pi bruvate sarvatra pratipattikartavyatāvidhānam evādau veditavyam avidhikasya vākyasya prayogānarhatvād iti te 'pi na sādhu budhyante viditaśabdārthasambandhasya puṃsaḥ śabdaśravaṇe sati pratipatteḥ svataḥ siddhatvena anupadeśyatvat /asiddhāyāṃ vā pratipattau pratipattikartavyatā 'pi kutaḥ pratīyeta //
analyzed: ye pi bruvate sarvatra pratipatti kartavya tā vidhānam eva ādau veditavyam avidhikasya vākyasya prayoga anarha tvāt iti te pi na sādhu budhyante vidita śabda artha sambandhasya puṃsaḥ śabda śravaṇe sati pratipatteḥ svatas siddha tvena anupadeśya tvat asiddhāyām vā pratipattau pratipatti kartavya tā pi kutas pratīyeta

original: nanu kāryārthapratipādakaṃ padam antareṇa padāntarāṇi saṃsargam eva na bhajante kāryākāṅkṣānibandhanatvāt sambandhasya /
analyzed: nanu kārya artha pratipādakam padam antareṇa pada antarāṇi saṃsargam eva na bhajante kārya ākāṅkṣā nibandhana tvāt sambandhasya

original: tena sarvatra kāryaparatvam ucyate naiṣa niyamaḥ kāryākāṅkṣāgarbha eva sarvatra sambandha iti vartamānāpadeśakānām api prekṣāpūrvakārivākyānāṃ itaretarasaṃsṛṣṭārthapratītijanakatvadarśanāt /
analyzed: tena sarvatra kārya para tvam ucyate na eṣa niyamaḥ kārya ākāṅkṣā garbhaḥ eva sarvatra sambandhaḥ iti vartamāna apadeśakānām api prekṣā pūrva kāri vākyānām itaretara saṃsṛṣṭa artha pratīti janaka tva darśanāt

original: na hi daśadāḍimādivākyasaṃd•śi vartamānāpadeśīni vacāṃsi bhavanti /
analyzed: na hi daśa dāḍima ādi vākya saṃdśi vartamāna apadeśīni vacāṃsi bhavanti

original: kāryanibandhane hi sambandhe tadrahitānām anvaya eva syāt /
analyzed: kārya nibandhane hi sambandhe tad rahitānām anvayaḥ eva syāt

original: darśitaś cānvayaḥ pūrvodāhṛtavākyānām //
analyzed: darśitaḥ ca anvayaḥ pūrva udāhṛta vākyānām

original: api ca liṅntapadayukte 'pi vākye padāntarārthānāṃ parasparam anvayo dṛśyata eva /
analyzed: api ca vākye pada antara arthānām parasparam anvayaḥ dṛśyate eva

original: sa kathaṃ samarthayiṣyate /
analyzed: sa katham samarthayiṣyate

original: kāryākāṅkṣānibandhane hi kārye sarveṣām anvayaḥ na parasparam iti bruvan brūyāt sarvathā kāryasaṃbandhe prathamam avagate sati paścād aruṇaikahāyanīnyāyena vākyīyaḥ parasparānvayo 'pi setsyatīti hanta tarhi parasparānvaye kāryākāṅkṣākāraṇam tarhi [aruṇāyā piṅgākṣyā ekahāyanyā somaṃ krīṇāti ] iti dravyaguṇayoḥ vibhaktyāṃ somakrayaṃ prati yuktatvāt prathamaṃ krayasambandha eva tayor gamyate /
analyzed: kārya ākāṅkṣā nibandhane hi kārye sarveṣām anvayaḥ na parasparam iti bruvan brūyāt sarvathā kārya saṃbandhe prathamam avagate sati paścāt aruṇaikahāyanīnyāyena vākyīyaḥ setsyati iti hanta tarhi paraspara anvaye kārya ākāṅkṣā kāraṇam tarhi aruṇāyā piṅga akṣyā ekahāyanyā somam krīṇāti iti dravya guṇayoḥ vibhaktyām soma krayam prati yukta tvāt prathamam kraya sambandhaḥ eva tayoḥ gamyate

original: yaś ca pāścātyaḥ parasparānvayaḥ tatra kāryapāratantryāpādikā vibhaktiḥ akāraṇam asatyām api tasyāṃ [śuklaḥ paṭaḥ ] iti sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogeṇānvayasiddheḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca pāścātyaḥ paraspara anvayaḥ tatra kārya pāratantrya āpādikā vibhaktiḥ akāraṇam asatyām api tasyām śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇya prayogeṇa anvaya siddheḥ

original: tasmāt kāryaikyanibandhano 'nvaya iti niyamo ya ucyate sa kalpanāmātraprabhavaḥ na pramāṇavṛttagamya iti //
analyzed: tasmāt kārya aikya nibandhanaḥ nvayaḥ iti niyamaḥ yaḥ ucyate sa kalpanā mātra prabhavaḥ na pramāṇa vṛtta gamyaḥ iti

original: yat tu bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇe bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata iti ayam api na sārvatriko niyamaḥ viparyayasyāpi [vrīhīn prokṣat ] ityādau darśanāt //
analyzed: yat tu bhūta bhavya samuccāraṇe bhūtam bhavyāya upadiśyate iti ayam api na sārvatrikaḥ niyamaḥ viparyayasya api vrīhīn prokṣat ityādau darśanāt

original: alaṃ vā darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇaniveśanānujjñitakāryamukhaprekṣaṇadainyena vrīhiprokṣaṇodāharaṇena [ātmā jñātavyaḥ ] iti tu siddhapara eva sādhyopadeśaḥ /
analyzed: alam vā darśa pūrṇamāsa prakaraṇa niveśana anujjñita kārya mukha prekṣaṇa dainyena vrīhi prokṣaṇa udāharaṇena ātmā jñātavyaḥ iti tu siddha paraḥ eva sādhya upadeśaḥ

original: na hy atra karma kiñcit sādhyam pradhānam upadiśyate adhikārāśravaṇāt /
analyzed: na hi atra karma kiñcid sādhyam pradhānam upadiśyate adhikāra aśravaṇāt

original: na ca viśvajidādivat adhikārakalpanā kācid upapadyate /
analyzed: na ca viśvajit ādi vat adhikāra kalpanā kācid upapadyate

original: na ca karmapravṛttihetutvaṃ ātmajñānasyeti vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: na ca karma pravṛtti hetu tvam ātma jñānasya iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: arthavādas tv arthavāda eva nādhikārikalpanāya prabhavati /
analyzed: arthavādaḥ tu arthavādaḥ eva na adhikāri kalpanāya prabhavati

original: tasmāt apahatapāpmadiguṇayuktātmasvarūpaniṣṭhatvam eva tatrāvatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: tasmāt apahata pāpma diguṇa yukta ātma svarūpa niṣṭha tvam eva tatra avatiṣṭhate

original: tasminn avagate puruṣāntaraprārthanādainyānupapatteḥ sa eva hy uttamaḥ puruṣārthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmin avagate puruṣa antara prārthanā dainya anupapatteḥ saḥ eva hi uttamaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ

original: sa ca siddha eva na sādhyaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca siddhaḥ eva na sādhyaḥ

original: yatnas tu kṛtabuddhīnāṃ avidyoparamāyaiveti vyācakṣate //
analyzed: yatnaḥ tu kṛtabuddhīnām avidyā uparamāya eva iti vyācakṣate

original: [jñātavyaḥ ] iti pratipattikartavyatāparo 'yaṃ vidhir iti cet na pratipatteḥ pramititvāt /
analyzed: jñātavyaḥ iti pratipatti kartavya tā paraḥ yam vidhiḥ iti ced na pratipatteḥ pramiti tvāt

original: pramiteś ca prameyaniṣṭhatvāt /
analyzed: pramiteḥ ca prameya niṣṭha tvāt

original: [jñātavyaḥ ] iti ca karmaṇi krtyapratyayanirdeśāt /
analyzed: jñātavyaḥ iti ca karmaṇi krtya pratyaya nirdeśāt

original: karmaṇaś ca īpṣitatamatvāt tatparatvam evāgamyate /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ ca īpṣitatama tvāt tad para tvam eva āgamyate

original: vidhis tatra prasarann api kva prasaret phalaṃ tāvat vidheḥ na viṣaya eva /
analyzed: vidhiḥ tatra prasaran api kva prasaret phalam tāvat vidheḥ na viṣayaḥ eva

original: yathā ''ha bhaṭṭaḥ [phalāṃśe bhāvanāyāś ca pratyayo na vidhāyakah ] iti /
analyzed: yathā ha bhaṭṭaḥ phala aṃśe bhāvanāyāḥ ca pratyayaḥ na vidhāyakaḥ iti

original: upāyas tu jñānam evā /
analyzed: upāyaḥ tu jñānam evā

original: jñānaṃ ca jñeyaniṣṭham ity uktam //
analyzed: jñānam ca jñeya niṣṭham iti uktam

original: yas tu yam aniyamādipratipattītikartavYatāprakāropadeśaḥ so 'pi tathāvidhātmarūpādhigataye satyāsatyasvabhāvanāmarūpaprapañcavilāpanadvāreṇa tatropayujyata iti siddhsādhyam //
analyzed: yaḥ tu yam aniyama ādi pratipatti iti kartavya tā prakāra upadeśaḥ saḥ u pi tathāvidha ātma rūpa adhigataye satya asatya svabhāva nāma rūpa prapañca vilāpana dvāreṇa tatra upayujyate iti siddh sādhyam

original: tiṣṭhatu vā yam aniyamaprāṇāyām apratyāhāradhāraṇādyātmajñānopayogītikartavyatāvidhiḥ anye 'pi jyotiṣṭomādividhayaḥ tanniṣṭhā eveti vedāntavādinaḥ /
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu vā yam aniyama prāṇāyām a pratyāhāra dhāraṇa ādi ātma jñāna upayogi iti kartavya tā vidhiḥ anye pi jyotiṣṭoma ādi vidhayaḥ tad niṣṭhāḥ eva iti vedāntavādinaḥ

original: sādhyasya sarvasya kṣayitvenānupādeyatvāt siddhasya brahmaṇa eva anādyavidyātītasyānapāyinaḥ puruṣārthatvāt stokastokaprapañcavilāpanadvāreṇa uttamādhikārayogyatvāpādanāt brahmaprāptyaupayikā eva sarvavidhataḥ /
analyzed: sādhyasya sarvasya kṣayi tvena anupādeya tvāt siddhasya brahmaṇaḥ eva anādya vidyā atītasya anapāyinaḥ puruṣa artha tvāt stoka stoka prapañca vilāpana dvāreṇa uttama adhikāra yogya tva āpādanāt brahma prāpti aupayikāḥ eva sarvavidhataḥ

original: tathā ca manuḥ [ svādhyāyena vratairhopraiḥ traividyenejyayā sutaiḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca manuḥ svādhyāyena vrataiḥ hopraiḥ traividyena ijyayā sutaiḥ

original: mahāyajñaiś ca yajñaiś ca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ //
analyzed: mahāyajñaiḥ ca yajñaiḥ ca brāhmī iyam kriyate tanuḥ

original: ] iti //
analyzed: iti

original: tad evaṃ siddha evārthe vedasyāhuḥ pramāṇatām /
analyzed: tat evam siddhe eva arthe vedasya āhuḥ pramāṇa tām

original: sarvā hi vidhayo brahmaprāptiparyavasāyinaḥ //
analyzed: sarvāḥ hi vidhayaḥ brahma prāpti paryavasāyinaḥ

original: āstāṃ vā 'yaṃ viṣayaḥ bahu vaktavyaḥ pramāṇatā tu girāt /
analyzed: āstām vā yam viṣayaḥ bahu vaktavyaḥ pramāṇa tā tu girāt

original: siddhe kārye cārthe tulyaiva pramititulyatvāt //
analyzed: siddhe kārye ca arthe tulyā eva pramiti tulya tvāt

original: kiṃ tantratā bhavati kasya tayor itīyaṃ carcā cirāya na mahaty upayujyate naḥ /
analyzed: kim tantra tā bhavati kasya tayoḥ iti iyam carcā cirāya na mahatī upayujyate naḥ

original: saṃtoṣavṛttim avalambya vayaṃ hi vedaprāmāṇyamātrakathatāya gṛhītayatnāḥ //
analyzed: saṃtoṣa vṛttim avalambya vayam hi veda prāmāṇya mātra kathatāya gṛhīta yatnāḥ

original: prāmāṇyasādhanavidhāv upayogi yac ca vaktavyam atra tadavādi yathopayogam /
analyzed: prāmāṇya sādhana vidhau upayogi yat ca vaktavyam atra tat avādi yathopayogam

original: vaktavyam iṣṭam api kiñcid ihābhidadhmaḥ tacchayatāṃ yadi na dhīḥ parikhidyate vaḥ //
analyzed: vaktavyam iṣṭam api kiñcid iha abhidadhmaḥ tat śayatām yadi na dhīḥ parikhidyate vaḥ

original: %-----------------------------------------------------------------------   # ṇyāyamañjarī vol.2 # last modified 2000.9.27 # ṭext # ūniversity of ṃysore, Oriental ṛesearch īnstitute ṣeries, ṇo. 116,139, vol.1,2. # ed. K.ṣ.Varadacharya, ṃysore 1969, 1983 (īV-4493, 4494) # ṃembers # vol.1 ṭ.Kato 001-129 ḥ.ṭoda 130-258 K.ḥosono 259-387 ṣ.Bong-seop  388-516 ṛ.ṭanemura 517-645 ṃ.Kawajiri 646-703 # vol.2 ṭ.Ono 003-101 ṭ.Fujī 102-202 ṃ.ṭaniguchi 203-331 ṭ.āono  332-476 ṣ.ṃoriyama 477-588 ḥ.ṃarui 2.589-718 prapannāya viprapannānāṃ duḥkhitānāṃ sukhātmane /
saṃpūrṇāya dṛḍhāśānāṃ namaḥ kāraṇabandhave //
analyzed: saṃpūrṇāya dṛḍha āśānām namaḥ kāraṇa bandhave

original: atha yad ukutaṃ vāstavasya śabdārthasyāvidyamānatvād arthāsaṃsparśinaḥ śabdā iti tat pratividhīyate //
analyzed: atha yat ukutam vāstavasya śabda arthasya a vidyamāna tvāt artha a saṃsparśinaḥ śabdāḥ iti tat pratividhīyate

original: dvividhaḥ śabdaḥ padaṃ vākyaṃ ca /
analyzed: dvividhaḥ śabdaḥ padam vākyam ca

original: tatra padārthapūrvaktvāt vākyārthasya prathamaṃ padārtho nirdiśya nirūpyate //
analyzed: tatra padārtha pūrvak tvāt vākya arthasya prathamam padārthaḥ nirdiśya nirūpyate

original: padaṃ ca dvividhaṃ nāma ākhyātaṃ ca /
analyzed: padam ca dvividham nāma ākhyātam ca

original: upasarganipātakarmapravacanīyānām api nāmasvevāv antarbhāvam ācakṣate /
analyzed: upasarga nipāta karmapravacanīyānām api nāmasu evau antarbhāvam ācakṣate

original: tad uktaṃ [suptiṅantaṃ padam] iti /
analyzed: tat uktam sup tiṅ antam padam iti

original: ihāpi sūtrakṛd āha [te vibhaktyantāḥ padaṃ] iti /
analyzed: iha api sūtra kṛt āha te vibhakti antāḥ padam iti

original: tatra tiṅantapadārthacintā vākyārthavicārāvasara evakariṣyate tadaupayikatvāt /
analyzed: tatra tiṅ anta padārtha cintā vākya artha vicāra avasare tad aupayika tvāt

original: subantānāṃ tv artho 'yam ucyate //
analyzed: sup antānām tu arthaḥ yam ucyate

original: te ca caturvidhāḥ subantāḥ padātmanaḥ śabdā bhavanti jātiśabdāḥ kriyāśabdāḥ guṇaśabdāḥ dravyaśabdāḥ iti //
analyzed: te ca caturvidhāḥ sup antāḥ pada ātmanaḥ śabdāḥ bhavanti jāti śabdāḥ kriyā śabdāḥ guṇa śabdāḥ dravya śabdāḥ iti

original: tatra gavādijātiśabdānāṃ gotvādijātyavacchinnaṃ vyaktimātram arthaḥ yas tadvān iti naiyyāyikagṛhe gīyate //
analyzed: tatra gavā ādi jāti śabdānām go tva ādi jāti avacchinnam vyakti mātram arthaḥ yaḥ tadvān iti naiyyāyika gṛhe gīyate

original: nanu śuklādiguṇādhikaraṇaṃ kriyāśrayaś ca dravyaṃ vyaktiḥ sāsnādyavayavasanniveśātmikā ākṛtiḥ śābaleyādisakalagopiṇḍasādhāraṇaṃ rūpaṃ jātir iti vyaktyākṛtijātisannidhāne samuccārita eṣa gośabdaḥ katham itaratiraskāreṇa tadvanmātravacanatām avalambeta āha vitatā khalv iyaṃ kathā carcayiṣyate tāvat /
analyzed: nanu śukla ādi guṇa adhikaraṇam kriyā āśrayaḥ ca dravyam vyaktiḥ sāsnā ādi avayava sanniveśa ātmikā ākṛtiḥ śābaleya ādi sakala go piṇḍa sādhāraṇam rūpam jātiḥ iti vyakti ākṛti jāti sannidhāne samuccāritaḥ eṣa go śabdaḥ katham itara tiraskāreṇa tadvat mātra vacanatām avalambeta āha vitatā khalu iyam kathā carcayiṣyate tāvat

original: idaṃ tu cintyatām jāter eva pramāṇātītatvana śaśaśṛṅgavad avidyamānatvāt kathaṃ tadvān padārtho bhaviṣyati tathāha na tāvat sāmānyagrahaṇanipuṇam akṣajaṃ jñānaṃ bhavitum arhati tasya pūrvaparānanusyūtasvalkṣaṇamātraparicchedaparisamāptavyāpāratvāt //
analyzed: idam tu cintyatām jāteḥ eva śaśa śṛṅga vat avidyamāna tvāt katham tadvān padārthaḥ bhaviṣyati tathā āha na tāvat sāmānya grahaṇa nipuṇam akṣa jam jñānam bhavitum arhati tasya pūrva para an anusyūta svar kṣaṇa mātra pariccheda parisamāpta vyāpāra tvāt

original: samānavṛttitā nāma sāmānyasya nijaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: samāna vṛtti tā nāma sāmānyasya nijam vapuḥ

original: kathaṃ spṛśati sāpekṣaṃ anapekṣā 'kṣajā matiḥ //
analyzed: katham spṛśati sa apekṣam anapekṣā kṣajā matiḥ

original: samāneṣv ākaliteṣu tadvṛttisādhāraṇarūpam avadhāya sāmānyaṃ gṛhyata iti sāpekṣaṃ tatsvarūpagrahaṇam /
analyzed: samāneṣu ākaliteṣu tad vṛtti sādhāraṇa rūpam avadhāya sāmānyam gṛhyate iti sa apekṣam tad svarūpa grahaṇam

original: iyaṃ ca prathamanayanasannipādasamudbhūtā matiḥ pūrvaparānusandhānavandhyā nirapekṣā kathaṃ tadgrahaṇasya prabhavet tatpṛṣṭḥabhāvinas tu vikalpā svabhāvata eva vastusaṃsparśakauśalaśūnyātmāna iti tadviṣayīkṛtasyāpi samānyasya na paramārthasattvaṃ bhavitum arhati //
analyzed: iyam ca prathama nayana sannipāda samudbhūtā matiḥ pūrva para anusandhāna vandhyā nirapekṣā katham tad grahaṇasya prabhavet tad pṛṣṭḥ abhāvinaḥ tu vikalpā svabhāvataḥ eva vastu saṃsparśa kauśala śūnya ātmānaḥ iti tad viṣayīkṛtasya api samānyasya na paramārtha sattvam bhavitum arhati

original: na cānumānaṃ śabdo vā sāmānyasvarūpavāstavatvavyavasthāpanasāmarthyam aśnute śabdaliṅgayor vikalpaviṣayatvena vastugrāhitvāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: na ca anumānam śabdaḥ vā sāmānya svarūpa vāstava tva vyavasthāpana sāmarthyam aśnute śabda liṅgayoḥ vikalpa viṣaya tvena vastu grāhi tva asaṃbhavāt

original: tatprāptyādivyavahāras tu prakārāntareṇa darśayiṣyate //
analyzed: tad prāpti ādi vyavahāraḥ tu prakāra antareṇa darśayiṣyate

original: ataś ca vyaktivyatiriktaṃ sāmānyaṃ bhadenānupalaṃ bhāt /
analyzed: atas ca vyakti vyatiriktam sāmānyam bhadena anupalam bhāt

original: tathā hi kuvalayāmalakabilvādīni karatalavartīni pṛthagavalokyate na jātivyaktī iti na tayor bhedaḥ //
analyzed: tathā hi kuvalaya āmalaka bilva ādīni kara tala vartīni pṛthak avalokyate na jāti vyaktī iti na tayoḥ bhedaḥ

original: deśavbhedasya cāgrahaṇāt /
analyzed: deśa vbhedasya ca agrahaṇāt

original: yataḥ khalu yato 'tiriktaṃ tat tadadhiṣṭhi tadeśavyatiriktadeśādhiṣṭhānam avadhāryate ghatād iva paṭaḥ na caivaṃ jātivyaktī iti na tayor bhedaḥ //
analyzed: yatas khalu yatas utiriktam tat tad adhiṣṭhita deśa vyatirikta deśa adhiṣṭhānam avadhāryate iva paṭaḥ na ca evam jāti vyaktī iti na tayoḥ bhedaḥ

original: ataś caivaṃ tadagrahe tadbudhyabhāvāt /
analyzed: atas ca evam tad agrahe tad budhi abhāvāt

original: yaddhi yato vyatiriktaṃ tata tasminn agṛhyamāṇe 'pi gṛhyate ghatād iva paṭaḥ /
analyzed: yat hi yatas vyatiriktam tasmin a gṛhyamāṇe gṛhyate iva paṭaḥ

original: na ca vyaktāvanupalabhyamānāyāṃ jātirūpalabhyate /
analyzed: na ca vyaktau anupalabhyamānāyām jātiḥ ūpalabhyate

original: tasmān na tato 'sau bhidyate //
analyzed: tasmāt na tatas au sau bhidyate

original: tadvṛttitvātsāmānyasya tadagrahe tadanupalabdhir iti cet na vṛttyanupapatteḥ /
analyzed: tad vṛtti tvāt sāmānyasya tad agrahe tad anupalabdhiḥ iti ced na vṛtti anupapatteḥ

original: kiṃ pratipiṇḍaṃ kārtsyena vartate jātiḥ utaikadeśena iti /
analyzed: kim pratipiṇḍam kārtsyena vartate jātiḥ uta eka deśena iti

original: dvayam api cānupapannam /
analyzed: dvayam api ca anupapannam

original: piṇḍe sāmānyam ekatra yadikātsnyena vartate /
analyzed: piṇḍe sāmānyam ekatra yadikātsnyena vartate

original: tatraivāsya samāptatvāt na syāt piṇḍāntare grahaḥ //
analyzed: tatra eva asya samāpta tvāt na syāt piṇḍa antare grahaḥ

original: ekadeśena vṛttau tu gotvajātir na kutracit /
analyzed: eka deśena vṛttau tu go tva jātiḥ na kutracid

original: samagrā 'stīti gobuddhiḥ pratipiṇḍaṃ kathaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: samagrā sti iti go buddhiḥ pratipiṇḍam katham bhavet

original: jāteś ca niravayavatvāt na kecid ekaśāḥ santi yair eṣā pratipiṇḍaṃ varteta /
analyzed: jāteḥ ca niravayava tvāt na kecid ekaśāḥ santi yaiḥ eṣā pratipiṇḍam varteta

original: na caikatra piṇḍe samāpya vartamānā piṇḍāntare samāpyaiva vartitum arhati samāptasya punarutpattiṃ vinā samāptyantarānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca ekatra piṇḍe samāpya vartamānā piṇḍa antare samāpya eva vartitum arhati samāptasya punarutpattim vinā samāpti antara anupapatteḥ

original: tathābhūtasya ca vṛttiprakārasya kvacid apy adarśanāt //
analyzed: tathābhūtasya ca vṛtti prakārasya kvacid api adarśanāt

original: yā ca samavāyātmikā piṇḍeṣu vṛttiḥ sāmānyasya aulūkyair ucyate tām api na buddhyāmahe vayam /
analyzed: yā ca samavāya ātmikā piṇḍeṣu vṛttiḥ sāmānyasya aulūkyaiḥ ucyate tām api na buddhyāmahe vayam

original: [ayutasiddhānām ādhāryādhārabhūtānāṃ yaḥ sambandha ihapratyayahetuḥ sa samavāyaḥ] iti yad ucyate tad vipratiṣiddham /
analyzed: ayuta siddhānām ādhārya ādhāra bhūtānām yaḥ sambandhaḥ iha pratyaya hetuḥ sa samavāyaḥ iti yat ucyate tat vipratiṣiddham

original: ayutasiddhatā ca sambandhaś ceti kathaṃ saṅgaccheta pṛthaksiddhe hi vastunī kuṇḍabadaravat anyonyaṃ sambandhyete strīpuṃsavad vā /
analyzed: ayuta siddha tā ca sambandhaḥ ca iti katham saṅgaccheta pṛthak siddhe hi vastunī kuṇḍa badara vat anyonyam sambandhyete strīpuṃsa vat vā

original: ayutasiddhatve tu tadekatvāt kiṃ sambadhyeta ṇa hy ahaṃ mayaiva sambadhye //
analyzed: ayuta siddha tve tu tad ekatvāt kim sambadhyeta ṇa hi aham mayā eva sambadhye

original: dravyaguṇayor apṛthaksiddhayor api sambandho vidyata eveti cat tad idam unmattasyonmattasaṃvarṇanam guṇino 'pi guṇavyatiriktasyānupalambhāt /
analyzed: dravya guṇayoḥ apṛthak siddhayoḥ api sambandhaḥ vidyate eva iti cat tat idam unmattasya unmatta saṃvarṇanam guṇinaḥ u guṇa vyatiriktasya anupalambhāt

original: ayaṃ guṇī rūpādibhyo arthāntaratvena nātmānam upadarśayati vyatirekaṃ ca tebhyo vāñchatīti citram //
analyzed: ayam guṇī rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antara tvena na ātmānam upadarśayati vyatirekam ca tebhyaḥ vāñchati iti citram

original: 2.08a.01	yad api nityānityavibhāgena yutasiddheḥ svaśāstre paribhāṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ 2.08a.02	nityānāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ pṛthaggatimattvaṃ yutasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: yat api nitya anitya vibhāgena yuta siddheḥ sva śāstre paribhāṣaṇam kṛtam nityānām paramāṇūnām pṛthak gatimat tvam yuta siddhiḥ

original: anityānāṃ tu yutā2.08a.03	śrayasamavāyitvam /vibhūnāṃ parasparam ākāśādīnāṃ sambandha eva nāsti 2.08a.04	iti tad api prakriyāmātram nānātvena siddhiḥ niṣpattiḥ 2.08a.05	jñptir vā yutasiddhir ity ucyate /
analyzed: anityānām tu śraya samavāyi tvam vibhūnām parasparam ākāśa ādīnām sambandhaḥ eva na asti iti tat api prakriyā mātram nānātvena siddhiḥ niṣpattiḥ jñptiḥ vā yuta siddhiḥ iti ucyate

original: tadviparyayād ayutasiddhiḥ ekyena siddhir ava2.08a.06	tiṣṭhate /
analyzed: tad viparyayāt ayuta siddhiḥ ekyena siddhiḥ tiṣṭhate

original: tathā ca sati sambandho durvacaḥ //
analyzed: tathā ca sati sambandhaḥ durvacaḥ

original: 2.08a.07	avayavāvayavinor api samavāyātmā sambandha evam eva parihartavyaḥ /
analyzed: avayava avayavinoḥ api samavāya ātmā sambandhaḥ evam eva parihartavyaḥ

original: 2.08a.08	yathā ''ha bhaṭṭaḥ 2.08a.09	[nāniṣpannasya sambandhaḥ niṣpattau yutasiddhatā] iti //
analyzed: yathā ha bhaṭṭaḥ na aniṣpannasya sambandhaḥ niṣpattau yuta siddha tā iti

original: 2.08a.10	paramāṇvākāśayoḥ paramāṇukālayoś ca sambandha iṣyate nākāśa2.08a.11	kālayor anyonyaṃ iti prakriyaiveyam iti alam avāntaracintanena /
analyzed: paramāṇu ākāśayoḥ paramāṇu kālayoḥ ca sambandhaḥ iṣyate kālayoḥ anyonyam iti prakriyā evā iyam iti alam avāntara cintanena

original: 2.08a.12	tasmān na jātivyaktyoḥ kācit vṛttir upapadyate //
analyzed: tasmāt na jāti vyaktyoḥ kācid vṛttiḥ upapadyate

original: 2.08a.13	suśikṣitās tu rūparūpilakṣaṇam ācakṣate jātivyaktiyoḥ sambandham 2.08a.14	so 'pi nopapadyate /
analyzed: suśikṣitāḥ tu rūpa rūpi lakṣaṇam ācakṣate jāti vyaktiyoḥ sambandham saḥ u pi na upapadyate

original: rūpaśabdaḥ kiṃ śuklādivacanaḥ ākāravacanaḥ 2.08a.15	svabhāvavacano vā 2.08b.01	śuklādiśabdavacanatve nīrūpāṇāṃ pavanamanaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ dravyaṇāṃ guṇakarmāṇāṃ 2.08b.02	ca sāmānyaśūnyatā syāt //
analyzed: rūpa śabdaḥ kim śukla ādi vacanaḥ ākāra vacanaḥ svabhāva vacanaḥ vā śukla ādi śabda vacana tve nīrūpāṇām pavana manaḥ prabhṛtīnām dravyaṇām guṇa karmāṇām ca sāmānya śūnyatā syāt

original: 2.08b.03	ākāravacanatve 'pi avayavasannniveśarahitānāṃ teṣām eva guṇādīnāṃ 2.08b.04	sāmānyavattā na prāpnoti //
analyzed: ākāra vacana tve pi avayava sannniveśa rahitānām teṣām eva guṇa ādīnām sāmānyavat tā na prāpnoti

original: 2.08b.05	svabhāvavacanatve tu jātijātimator avyatireka eva bhavet //
analyzed: svabhāva vacana tve tu jāti jātimatoḥ avyatirekaḥ eva bhavet

original: 2.08b.06	avabhāti hi bhedena svabhāvo na svabhāvinaḥ /
analyzed: avabhāti hi bhedena svabhāvaḥ na svabhāvinaḥ

original: 2.08b.07	śabdātiriktataiveyaṃ na tu vastvatiriktatā //
analyzed: śabda atirikta tā evā iyam na tu vastu atirikta tā

original: 2.08b.08	kiṃ cedaṃ rūpaṃ nāma kiṃ vastutvena vastudharmaḥ vastvantaraṃ vā 2.08b.09	vastvantaraṃ tāvan na pratibhātīty uktam //
analyzed: kim ca idam rūpam nāma kim vastu tvena vastu dharmaḥ vastu antaram vā vastu antaram tāvat na pratibhāti iti uktam

original: 2.08b.10	vastudharmo 'pi tadvyatiriktayā sthitaḥ na cakāsty eva /
analyzed: vastu dharmaḥ pi tad vyatiriktayā sthitaḥ na cakāsti eva

original: avya2.08b.11	tireke ca sambandhavācoyuktir anupapannety uktaṃ //
analyzed: tireke ca sambandha vācoyuktiḥ anupapannā iti uktam

original: 2.08b.12	na ca rūparūpitvalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ saṃyogasamavāyavyatiriktaḥ ko 'pi 2.08b.13	śrotriyaiḥ vivicya vyākhyātuṃ śakyate yathā īdṛg iti /
analyzed: na ca rūpa rūpi tva lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ saṃyoga samavāya vyatiriktaḥ śrotriyaiḥ vivicya vyākhyātum śakyate yathā īdṛś iti

original: tasmāt vācyoyukti2.08b.14	nūtanatāmātram iha kṛtam na tv arthaḥ kaścid utprekṣyata ity alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: tasmāt nūtana tā mātram iha kṛtam na tu arthaḥ kaścid utprekṣyate iti alam prasaṅgena

original: 2.08b.15	api ceyaṃ jātiḥ 2.08b.16	sarvasarvagatā vā syāt piṇḍasarvagatā 'pi vā /
analyzed: api ca iyam jātiḥ sarva sarva gatā vā syāt piṇḍa sarva gatā vā

original: 2.08b.17	sarvasarvagatatve syāt karkādāv api gomitiḥ //
analyzed: sarva sarva gata tve syāt karka ādau api gomitiḥ

original: 2.08c.01	aśvadhīḥ śābaleyādau uṣṭrabuddhir jagādiṣu /
analyzed: aśva dhīḥ śābaleya ādau uṣṭra buddhiḥ jaga ādiṣu

original: 2.08c.02	padārthasaṅkaraś caivaṃ atyantāya prasajyate //
analyzed: padārtha saṅkaraḥ ca evam atyantāya prasajyate

original: 2.08c.03	athāpi vyaktisāmarthyaniyamān naiṣa saṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: atha api vyakti sāmarthya niyamāt na eṣa saṅkāraḥ

original: 2.08c.04	na hi karkādipiṇḍānāṃ gotvādivyaktikauśalam //
analyzed: na hi karka ādi piṇḍānām go tva ādi vyakti kauśalam

original: 2.08c.05	maivaṃ khaṇḍādyabhivyaktam api gotvam anaṃśakam /
analyzed: mā evam khaṇḍa ādi abhivyaktam api go tvam an aṃśakam

original: 2.08c.06	satvatraiva pratīyeta na vā sarvagataṃ bhavet //
analyzed: sat tu atra eva pratīyeta na vā sarva gatam bhavet

original: 2.08c.07	taddeśagarahaṇe tasya na hi kiñcin niyāmakam /
analyzed: tad deśa garahaṇe tasya na hi kiñcid niyāmakam

original: 2.08c.08	dīpavad vyaṃjakaḥ piṇḍaḥ na tu tatpiṇḍavṛttitat //
analyzed: dīpa vat vyaṃjakaḥ piṇḍaḥ na tu tad piṇḍa vṛtti tat

original: 2.08c.09	sarvatrāgṛhyamāṇaṃ ca sarvatrāstīti ko nayaḥ 2.08c.10	sarvasarvagataṃ tasmāt na gotvam upapadyate //
analyzed: sarvatra agṛhyamāṇam ca sarvatra asti iti kaḥ nayaḥ sarva sarva gatam tasmāt na go tvam upapadyate

original: 2.08c.11	piṇḍasarvagatatve tu kāmam etad adūṣaṇam /
analyzed: piṇḍa sarva gata tve tu kāmam etat adūṣaṇam

original: 2.08c.12	kin tu naivādya jātāyāṃ gavi gopratyayo bhavet//
analyzed: kin tu nā eva adya jātāyām gavi go pratyayaḥ bhavet

original: 2.08c.13	piṇḍe nāsīd asaṃjāte jātiḥ jāte va vidyate /
analyzed: piṇḍe na āsīt a saṃjāte jātiḥ jāte vidyate

original: 2.08c.14	saṃkrāmati na cānyasmāt piṇḍād anyatra niṣkriyā //
analyzed: saṃkrāmati na ca anyasmāt piṇḍāt anyatra niṣkriyā

original: 2.08c.15	āyāty api na taṃ piṇḍaṃ apojjhati purātanam /
analyzed: āyāti api na tam piṇḍam apojjhati purātanam

original: 2.08c.16	na cāṃśair vartate tatra kaṣṭā vyasanasantatiḥ //
analyzed: na ca aṃśaiḥ vartate tatra kaṣṭā vyasana santatiḥ

original: 2.08d.01	bhāṭṭās tu bruvate bhinnābhinnam ekaṃ vastu anuyāyi ca vyāvṛttaṃ ca /
analyzed: bhāṭṭāḥ tu bruvate bhinna abhinnam ekam vastu anuyāyi ca vyāvṛttam ca

original: 2.08d.02	yat tasyānugāmi rūpaṃ tat sāmānyaṃ yat vyāvṛttaṃ sa viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: yat tasya anugāmi rūpam tat sāmānyam yat vyāvṛttam sa viśeṣaḥ

original: tathā 2.08d.03	hi 2.08d.04	[sarvavastuṣu buddhiś ca vyāvṛttyanugamātmikā /
analyzed: tathā hi sarva vastuṣu buddhiḥ ca vyāvṛtti anugama ātmikā

original: 2.08d.05	jāyate dvyātmakatvena vinā sā ca na sidhyati] //
analyzed: jāyate dvi ātmaka tvena vinā sā ca na sidhyati

original: 2.08d.06	kevakaviśeṣātmakapadārthapakṣe sāmānyapratīter anālambanatvaṃ sāmānya2.08d.07	mātravāde ca viśeṣabuddher anupapattiḥ //
analyzed: kevaka viśeṣa ātmaka padārtha pakṣe sāmānya pratīteḥ anālambana tvam mātra vāde ca viśeṣa buddheḥ anupapattiḥ

original: 2.08d.08	[na cāpy anyatarā bhrāntiḥ upacāreṇa veṣyate /
analyzed: na ca api anyatarā bhrāntiḥ upacāreṇa vā iṣyate

original: 2.08d.09	dṛḍhatvāt sarvadā buddheḥ bhrāntiḥ syād bhrāntivādinām] //
analyzed: dṛḍha tvāt sarvadā buddheḥ bhrāntiḥ syāt bhrānti vādinām

original: 2.08d.10	na hi mihiramarūcinicayanīrapratītivat sāmānyapratyayopamardena 2.08d.11	viśeṣapratītiḥ viśeṣapratyayopamardena vā sāmānyapratītir udeti kin tu 2.08d.12	avirodhenaiva yugapad ubhayāvabhāsaḥ /
analyzed: na hi mihira marūci nicaya nīra pratīti vat sāmānya pratyaya upamardena viśeṣa pratītiḥ viśeṣa pratyaya upamardena vā sāmānya pratītiḥ udeti kin tu avirodhena eva yugapad ubhaya avabhāsaḥ

original: ata eva nirvikalpabodhena dvyātma2.08d.13	kasyāpi vastuno grahaṇam upeyate //
analyzed: atas eva nirvikalpa bodhena kasya api vastunaḥ grahaṇam upeyate

original: 2.08d.14	tad etad abhidhīyamānam eva na manojñam ivābhāti /
analyzed: tat etat abhidhīyamānam eva na manojñam iva ābhāti

original: 2.08d.15	nānārūpatvam ekasyāviruddhaṃ vadatā svayam /
analyzed: nānā rūpa tvam ekasya aviruddham vadatā svayam

original: 2.08d.16	dūṣākhyānam aukharyam asmākam apavāritim//
analyzed: dūṣa ākhyānam aukharyam asmākam apavāritim

original: tad eva sāmānyaṃ sa eva viśeṣaḥ tad evaikaṃ tad eva nānā tad eva nityaṃ tad evānityaṃ tad evāsti tad eva nāsti iti jainocchiṣṭam idam ucyate /
analyzed: tat eva sāmānyam saḥ eva viśeṣaḥ tat eva ekam tat eva nānā tat eva nityam tat eva anityam tat eva asti tat eva na asti iti jaina ucchiṣṭam idam ucyate

original: ucyamānam api na śobhate dṛṣṭatvān na virodhaś cet na tathā tad evedanāt /
analyzed: ucyamānam api na śobhate dṛṣṭa tvāt na virodhaḥ ced na tathā tat eva idanāt

original: uktaṃ hi nānuvṛttārthagrahiṇī netradhīr iti //
analyzed: uktam hi na anuvṛtta artha grahiṇī netra dhīḥ iti

original: vicitravikalpaprabandhavipralubdhabuddhayaḥ khakv evaṃ manyante /
analyzed: vicitra vikalpa prabandha vipralubdha buddhayaḥ khaku evam manyante

original: bhavatu te /
analyzed: bhavatu te

original: na tv ekaṃ vastu bahurūpaṃ bhavitum arhati //
analyzed: na tu ekam vastu bahu rūpam bhavitum arhati

original: ekaṃ hi vastuno rūpaṃ itarat kalpanām ayam /
analyzed: ekam hi vastunaḥ rūpam itarat kalpanām ayam

original: nānuvṛttavikalpeṣu visraṃbha ucitaḥ satām //
analyzed: na anuvṛtta vikalpeṣu visraṃbhaḥ ucitaḥ satām

original: drāgito hy anyasaṃsparśanair apekṣyeṇa dṛśyate /
analyzed: drāk itas hi anya saṃsparśanaiḥ apekṣyeṇa dṛśyate

original: svalakṣaṇaṃ ato bhadaḥ tāttviko 'nugamo mṛṣā //
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇam tāttvikaḥ nugamaḥ mṛṣā

original: dṛḍhādṛḍhatvam akṣuṇṇam aparīkṣyaiva saṃvidām /
analyzed: dṛḍha adṛḍha tvam a kṣuṇṇam a parīkṣya eva saṃvidām

original: dvayapratītimātreṇa dvayā 'bhyupagamo bhramaḥ //
analyzed: dvaya pratīti mātreṇa dvaya abhyupagamaḥ bhramaḥ

original: na neti pratyayād eva mithyātvaṃ kevalaṃ dhiyām /
analyzed: na nā iti pratyayāt eva mithyātvam kevalam dhiyām

original: kin tu yuktiparīkṣāpi kartavyā sūkṣmadarśibhiḥ //
analyzed: kin tu yukti parīkṣā api kartavyā sūkṣma darśibhiḥ

original: na caikaṃ śabalaṃ vastu nirvikalpakagocaraḥ /
analyzed: na ca ekam śabalam vastu nirvikalpaka gocaraḥ

original: vyktyantarānusandhānād vinā 'nugamadhīḥ kutaḥ //
yeṣv anugataṃ teṣu buddhyā 'nanusandhīyamāneṣu tadvattisāmānyagrahaṇāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: yeṣu anugatam teṣu buddhyā na anusandhīyamāneṣu tad vatti sāmānya grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt

original: na cānusandhānasāmarthyaṃ buddher asti //
analyzed: na ca anusandhāna sāmarthyam buddheḥ asti

original: ata eva na te samyagadhyakṣajajñānavedinaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva na te samyak adhyakṣa ja jñāna vedinaḥ

original: abhedavṛtti pratyakṣaṃ āhut advaitavāñchayā //
analyzed: abheda vṛtti pratyakṣam advaita vāñchayā

original: tasmāt bhedāviṣayatvāt pratyakṣasya na tadgamyaṃ sāmānyam //
analyzed: tasmāt bheda aviṣaya tvāt pratyakṣasya na tat gamyam sāmānyam

original: nanu evam apahnūyamāne sāmānye gaugaur iti śābaleyādiṣu yo 'yam anuvṛttaḥ pratyayaḥ sa kathaṃ samarthayiṣyate uktam atra vikalpamātram eṣa pratyayaḥ /
analyzed: nanu evam apahnūyamāne sāmānye gau gauḥ iti śābaleya ādiṣu yaḥ yam anuvṛttaḥ pratyayaḥ sa katham samarthayiṣyate uktam atra vikalpa mātram eṣa pratyayaḥ

original: vikalpāś ca nārthādhīnajanmāna iti /
analyzed: vikalpāḥ ca na artha adhīna janmānaḥ iti

original: tathā ca paraparikalpiteṣu sattādisāmānyeṣv api sāmānyam ity anuvṛttavikalpāḥ pravartanta eva /
analyzed: tathā ca para parikalpiteṣu sattā ādi sāmānyeṣu api sāmānyam iti anuvṛtta vikalpāḥ pravartante eva

original: na ca sāmānyeṣu sāmānyāntarāṇi saṃbhavanti [niśāmānyāni samānyāni] ity abhyupagamāt //
analyzed: na ca sāmānyeṣu sāmānya antarāṇi saṃbhavanti niśā mānyāni samānyāni iti abhyupagamāt

original: aupādhika eṣa sāmānyeṣv anugatavikalpa iti cet āyupman gavādiṣv api kaṃcid upādhiviśeṣam avalambya gaugaur ity anusyūtavikalpo bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: aupādhikaḥ eṣa sāmānyeṣu anugata vikalpaḥ iti ced āyupman gavā ādiṣu api kaṃcid upādhi viśeṣam avalambya gau gauḥ iti anusyūta vikalpaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: kaḥ punar asāv upādhir iti cet ekārthakriyākāritvam iti brūmaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ punar asau upādhiḥ iti ced ekārtha kriyā kāri tvam iti brūmaḥ

original: yad eva vāhadohādi kāryam ekena janyate /
analyzed: yat eva vāha doha ādi kāryam ekena janyate

original: gopiṇḍena tad evānyaiḥ iti teṣv anuvṛttadhīḥ //
