analyzed: go piṇḍena tat eva anyaiḥ iti teṣu anuvṛtta dhīḥ

original: nanu prativyakti kāryaṃ bhinnam eva satyam bhedabubhyabhāvāc ca tad ekam ity upacaryate //
analyzed: nanu prativyakti kāryam bhinnam eva satyam ca tat ekam iti upacaryate

original: karkādikāryād anyatvaṃ yathā hy etasya dṛśyate /
analyzed: karka ādi kāryāt anya tvam yathā hi etasya dṛśyate

original: na tathā khaṇḍakāryasya muṇḍakāryād vibhinnatā //
analyzed: na tathā khaṇḍa kāryasya muṇḍa kāryāt vibhinna tā

original: nanu tathā mā bhūt /
analyzed: nanu tathā mā bhūt

original: na tv abhinnam eva khaṇḍamṇḍayoḥ kāryaṃ /
analyzed: na tu abhinnam eva khaṇḍa mṇḍayoḥ kāryam

original: bāḍham /
analyzed: bāḍham

original: darśanam eva tarhi tayor ekaṃ bhaviṣyati tac cābhinnam //
analyzed: darśanam eva tarhi tayoḥ ekam bhaviṣyati tat ca abhinnam

original: nanu darśanam api prativyakti bhinnam eva /
analyzed: nanu darśanam api prativyakti bhinnam eva

original: satyam svapṛṣṭhabhāvi pratyavamarśākhyakāryād ekam ity ucyate /
analyzed: iti ucyate

original: yathaiva śābaleyādipiṇḍadarśane sati gaur ity anantaram avamarśaḥ tathaiva bāhuleyapiṇḍadarśane 'pi gaur ity evāvamarśa iti tadekatvam ucyate /
analyzed: yathā eva śābaleya ādi piṇḍa darśane sati gauḥ iti anantaram avamarśaḥ tathā eva bāhuleya piṇḍa darśane gauḥ iti eva avamarśaḥ iti tat ekatvam ucyate

original: tad uktam [ekapratyavamarśasya hetutvād dhīr abhedinī /
analyzed: tat uktam eka pratyavamarśasya hetu tvāt dhīḥ abhedinī

original: ekadhīhetubhāvena vyaktīnām apy abhinnatā] iti //
analyzed: eka dhī hetu bhāvena vyaktīnām api abhinna tā iti

original: tasmād aupādhikatvād anuvṛttabuddheḥ na sāmānyaṃ kiñcid vāstavamastīti tatrāha aniṣyamāṇe sāmānye nanu śabdānumānayoḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt aupādhika tvāt anuvṛtta buddheḥ na sāmānyam kiñcid vāstavam asti iti tatra āha aniṣyamāṇe sāmānye nanu śabda anumānayoḥ

original: kathaṃ pravṛttiḥ sambandhagrahaṇādhīnajanmanoḥ //
analyzed: katham pravṛttiḥ sambandha grahaṇa adhīna janmanoḥ

original: na hi vyaktiṣu sambandhaḥ gṛhītum iha śakyate /
analyzed: na hi vyaktiṣu sambandhaḥ gṛhītum iha śakyate

original: sa hi vyaktiṣu gṛhyeta sarvāsv ekatra kvacit //
analyzed: sa hi vyaktiṣu gṛhyeta sarvāsu ekatra kvacid

original: na sarvāsu deśakālādibhedena tadānantyād aśakyayvāt /
analyzed: na sarvāsu deśa kāla ādi bhedena tad ānantyāt a śakya yvāt

original: naikasyāṃ vyabhicārāt /
analyzed: na ekasyām vyabhicārāt

original: tato 'nyatrāpi sa śabdaḥ pravartamāno dṛśyate /
analyzed: tatas nyatra api sa śabdaḥ pravartamānaḥ dṛśyate

original: agṛhītasambandhe ca na śabdaliṅge pratītim utpādayitum utsahete /
analyzed: agṛhīta sambandhe ca na śabda liṅge pratītim utpādayitum utsahete

original: ucyate syād etad evaṃ yadi pratyakṣaviṣaye savasakṣaṇe śabdaliṅgayoḥ pravṛttiḥ syāt //
analyzed: ucyate syāt etat evam yadi pratyakṣa viṣaye śabda liṅgayoḥ pravṛttiḥ syāt

original: nanu pratyakṣaviṣaye tayor vṛttāv aniṣyamāṇāyāṃ anavasthādidoṣopaghātād apravṛttir eva syāt maivaṃ vocaḥ katham asakṛd abhihitam api na buddhyase vikalpaviṣaye vṛttir iṣṭā śabdānumānayoḥ /
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣa viṣaye tayoḥ vṛttau aniṣyamāṇāyām anavasthā ādi doṣa upaghātāt apravṛttiḥ eva syāt mā evam vocaḥ katham asakṛt abhihitam api na buddhyase vikalpa viṣaye vṛttiḥ iṣṭā śabda anumānayoḥ

original: avastuviṣayāś caite vikalpā iti varṇitam //
analyzed: avastu viṣayāḥ ca ete vikalpāḥ iti varṇitam

original: nanu vikalpānām api viṣayaḥ yady anugāmī kaścin neṣyate tadutsīdetām eva śabdānumāne bāḍham asti vikalpānām anusyūto viṣayaḥ sa tu na vāstavaḥ /
analyzed: nanu vikalpānām api viṣayaḥ yadi anugāmī kaścid na iṣyate tat utsīdetām eva śabda anumāne bāḍham asti vikalpānām anusyūtaḥ viṣayaḥ sa tu na vāstavaḥ

original: kaḥ punat asāv iti cet ucyate atadrūpaparāvṛttisvabhāvam avahirgatam /
analyzed: kaḥ punar asau iti ced ucyate a tad rūpa parāvṛtti svabhāvam a vahis gatam

original: bahiśtham iva sāmānyaṃ ālambante hi niścayāḥ //
analyzed: bahiśtham iva sāmānyam ālambante hi niścayāḥ

original: yā ca bhūmir vikalpānāṃ sa eva viṣaye girām /
analyzed: yā ca bhūmiḥ vikalpānām saḥ eva viṣaye girām

original: ata eva hi śabdārthaṃ anyāpohaṃ pracakṣate //
analyzed: atas eva hi śabda artham anya apoham pracakṣate

original: tathā hi na vikalpā vastu spṛśanti /
analyzed: tathā hi na vikalpāḥ vastu spṛśanti

original: kutaḥ [ekasyārthasvabhāvasya pratyakṣasya sataḥ svayam /
analyzed: kutas ekasya artha svabhāvasya pratyakṣasya sataḥ svayam

original: ko 'nyo na dṛṣṭo bhāgaḥ syāt yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate //] tasmāt bhramanimittasamāropitākārāntaraniṣedhāya teṣāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ nyaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ bhāgaḥ syāt yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate tasmāt bhrama nimitta samāropita ākāra antara niṣedhāya teṣām pravṛttiḥ

original: yathā rūpasādharmyasamāropitarajatākāranibāraṇāya śuktau pramāṇāntaraṃ pravartate [neha rajatam] iti tathehāpi śābaleyādisvalakṣaṇe nirvikalpena sarvātmanā paricchinne kutaścin nimittād āropitam agorūpam iva vyavacchiṃt idaṃ vikalpāḥ [agaur na bhavati] iti na tu goḥ svalakṣaṇe teṣāṃ vyāpāraḥ prāg eva gṛhītatvāt //
analyzed: yathā rūpa sādharmya samāropita rajata ākāra nibāraṇāya śuktau pramāṇa antaram pravartate na iha rajatam iti tathā iha api śābaleya ādi sva lakṣaṇe nirvikalpena sarva ātmanā paricchinne kutaścid nimittāt āropitam a go rūpam iva idam vikalpāḥ a gauḥ na bhavati iti na tu goḥ sva lakṣaṇe teṣām vyāpāraḥ prāk eva gṛhīta tvāt

original: atha brūyāt nānāviśeṣanikarakalmāṣitavapuṣas tasyārthasya kiñcid viśeṣaṇaṃ prāg agṛhītaṃ vikalpair gṛhyata iti tad apy ayukutam nānāviśeṣaṇanikararūṣitasyāpi vastunaḥ tadviśeṣaṇopakāraśaktivyatiriktātmanī'nupalambhāt /
analyzed: atha brūyāt nānā viśeṣa nikara kalmāṣita vapuṣaḥ tasya arthasya kiñcid viśeṣaṇam prāk agṛhītam vikalpaiḥ gṛhyate iti tat api nānā viśeṣaṇa nikara rūṣitasya api vastunaḥ tad viśeṣaṇa upakāra śakti vyatirikta ātmani anupalambhāt

original: tadabhede sati tadviśeṣaṇopakāryavastusvarūpagrahaṇavelāyām eva tatkhacitagrahaṇasiddheḥ vikalpāntarāṇām ānarthakyam eva /
analyzed: tad abhede sati tad viśeṣaṇa upakārya vastu svarūpa grahaṇa velāyām eva tad khacita grahaṇa siddheḥ vikalpa antarāṇām ānarthakyam eva

original: tad uktam [yasyāpi nānopādher dhīr grāhikārthasya bhedinaḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam yasya api nānā upādheḥ dhīḥ grāhikā arthasya bhedinaḥ

original: tasyāpi nānopādhyāttaśaktir na hy atiricyate //
analyzed: tasya api nānā upādhyā ātta śaktiḥ na hi atiricyate

original: nānopādhyupakārāṅgaśaktyabhinnātmano grahe /
analyzed: nānā upādhi upakāra aṅga śakti abhinna ātmanaḥ grahe

original: sarvātmanopakāryasya ko bhedaḥ syād aniścitaḥ] iti //
analyzed: sarva ātmanā upakāryasya kaḥ bhedaḥ syāt aniścitaḥ iti

original: tasmād apohaviṣayāḥ śabdāḥ vikalpāś ceti //
analyzed: tasmāt apoha viṣayāḥ śabdāḥ vikalpāḥ ca iti

original: nanu apohavādaviṣaye mahatīṃ dūṣaṇavṛṣṭim utsasarja bhaṭṭaḥ /
analyzed: nanu apoha vāda viṣaye mahatīm dūṣaṇa vṛṣṭim utsasarja bhaṭṭaḥ

original: tathā hi apoho nāma vyāvṛttiḥ abhāva iṣyate /
analyzed: tathā hi apohaḥ nāma vyāvṛttiḥ abhāvaḥ iṣyate

original: na cābhāvaḥ svatantratayā ghaṭavad avagamyate /
analyzed: na ca abhāvaḥ svatantra tayā ghaṭa vat avagamyate

original: tad ayam anyāśrito vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: tat ayam anya āśritaḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: kaś ca tasyāsraya iti cintyam //
analyzed: kaḥ ca tasya asrayaḥ iti cintyam

original: na tāvat gosvalakṣaṇam āśrayaḥ tasya vikalpabhūmitvābhāvāt /
analyzed: na tāvat go sva lakṣaṇam āśrayaḥ tasya vikalpa bhūmi tva abhāvāt

original: nāpy avāntarasāmānyaṃ śābaleyatvād tadāśrayaḥ tasyāpi hi sāmānyātmatvena apohasvabhāvatvāt /
analyzed: nā api avāntarasāmānyam śābaleya tvāt tad āśrayaḥ tasya api hi sāmānya ātma tvena apoha svabhāva tvāt

original: abhāvasya cābhāvāśrayatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: abhāvasya ca abhāva āśraya tva anupapatteḥ

original: na ca śābaleyasāmānyam agonivṛtter āśrayaḥ tad dhi aśābaleyanivṛtter āśrayatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: na ca śābaleya sāmānyam ago nivṛtteḥ āśrayaḥ tat hi a śābaleya nivṛtteḥ āśraya tām pratipadyate

original: na hy evam upapadyate aśābaleyo na bhavatīti gauḥ kin tu śābaleyo 'śābaleya iti /
analyzed: na hi evam upapadyate a śābaleyaḥ na bhavati iti gauḥ kin tu śābaleyaḥ śābaleyaḥ iti

original: aśābaleyavyāvṛttir hi gośv api bāhuleyādiṣv asti //
analyzed: a śābaleya vyāvṛttiḥ hi api bāhuleya ādiṣu asti

original: atha śābaleyādisvalakṣaṇasmudāyaṃ agovyāvṛtter āśrayaṃ brūyuḥ so 'py aghaṭamāna eva samudayivyatirekeṇa tasyānupalaṃbhāt /
analyzed: atha śābaleya ādi sva lakṣaṇa smudāyam a go vyāvṛtteḥ āśrayam brūyuḥ saḥ pi aghaṭamānaḥ eva samudayi vyatirekeṇa tasya anupalaṃbhāt

original: samudāyināṃ ca svalakṣaṇānāṃ deśakālādibhedenānantyāt vargīkaraṇaṃ puruṣāyuṣaśatenāpi na śakyakriyam iti samudāyo 'pi na tadāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: samudāyinām ca sva lakṣaṇānām deśa kāla ādi bhedena ānantyāt vargīkaraṇam puruṣa āyuṣa śatena api na śakya kriyam iti samudāyaḥ api na tad āśrayaḥ

original: tasmāt sarvasādhāraṇaṃ pratipiṇḍaṃ parisamāptaṃ kim api nūtanaṃ agovyāvṛtter adhikaraṇaṃ abhidhātavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt sarva sādhāraṇam pratipiṇḍam parisamāptam kim api nūtanam a go vyāvṛtteḥ adhikaraṇam abhidhātavyam

original: tac ca gotvam eva tasminn aṅgīkṛte vā kim agovyāvṛttikalpanāyāsena api ca na kevalam āśrayābhāvāt tadagrahaṇam kin tu ya eva te kecid apohyā agorūpās turagādayaḥ tadagrahaṇe 'pi tadapoho durgraha eva /
analyzed: tat ca go tvam eva tasmin aṅgīkṛte vā kim a go vyāvṛtti kalpanā āyāsena api ca na kevalam āśraya abhāvāt tad agrahaṇam kim tu ye eva te kecid apohyāḥ a go rūpāḥ turaga ādayaḥ tad agrahaṇe tad apohaḥ durgrahaḥ eva

original: na ca teṣām ānantyāt grahaṇaṃ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na ca teṣām ānantyāt grahaṇam saṃbhavati

original: nāpi vargīkaraṇanimittam eṣāṃ kiñcid asti /
analyzed: na api vargīkaraṇa nimittam eṣām kiñcid asti

original: aśvādayaś ca vidhirūpatayā bhavanmate na gṛhyante kin tv anyavyavacchedenaiveti teṣām api vyavacchedagrahaṇe saiva vārteti nedānīṃ vikalpaiḥ kvacid apoho viṣayīkartuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: aśva ādayaḥ ca vidhi rūpa tayā bhavat mate na gṛhyante kin tu anya vyavacchedena eva iti teṣām api vyavaccheda grahaṇe sā eva vārttā iti nā idānīm vikalpaiḥ kvacid apohaḥ viṣayīkartum śakyate

original: nirvikalpena ca na kaścid vyavahāra iti sakalayotrotsādaprasaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: nirvikalpena ca na kaścid vyavahāraḥ iti sakala yotra utsāda prasaṅgaḥ

original: kiṃ ca ya ete śābaleyādiśabdāḥ te sarva evāpohavācitvāviśeṣāt paryāyāḥ syuḥ /
analyzed: kim ca ye ete śābaleya ādi śabdāḥ te sarve eva apoha vāci tva aviśeṣāt paryāyāḥ syuḥ

original: apohyabhedād adoṣa iti cet na apohānāṃ bhedābhāvāt /
analyzed: apohya bhedāt adoṣaḥ iti ced na apohānām bheda abhāvāt

original: bhidyamānatve vā svalakṣaṇavad eṣāṃ vastutvaprasaktiḥ //
analyzed: bhidyamāna tve vā sva lakṣaṇa vat eṣām vastu tva prasaktiḥ

original: bhavatpakṣe 'pi sāmānyamātravācitvāviśeṣāt paryāyatvaṃ samāno doṣa iti cet na sāmānyānāṃ vidhirūpatvāt parasparavirahitasvabhāvatayā nānātvāvagamāt /
analyzed: bhavat pakṣe pi sāmānya mātra vāci tva aviśeṣāt paryāya tvam samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na sāmānyānām vidhi rūpa tvāt paraspara virahita svabhāva tayā nānātva avagamāt

original: apohas tu abhāvamātrarūpāviśeṣāt na parasparaṃ bhidyate //
analyzed: apohaḥ tu abhāva mātra rūpa aviśeṣāt na parasparam bhidyate

original: karkādiśābaleyādyādhārabhedād apohabheda iti cet na teṣām ādhāratvasya nirastatvāt /
analyzed: karka ādi śābaleya ādi ādhāra bhedāt apoha bhedaḥ iti ced na teṣām ādhāra tvasya nirasta tvāt

original: ādhārabhedena vā tadbhedābhyupagame pratisvalakṣaṇaṃ apohabhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: ādhāra bhedena vā tad bheda abhyupagame pratisva lakṣaṇam apoha bheda prasaṅgaḥ

original: tataś ca sāmānyātmatā 'sya hīyate //
analyzed: tatas ca sāmānya ātma tā sya hīyate

original: atha apohyabhedam avadhārya paryāyatā parāṇudyate tad apy asāram tadāpy apohyabhedād bhedo na paryāyatvam apahanti /
analyzed: atha apohya bhedam avadhārya paryāya tā parāṇudyate tat api asāram tadā api apohya bhedāt bhedaḥ na paryāya tvam apahanti

original: bhākto hy asau na mukhyaḥ //
analyzed: bhāktaḥ hi asau na mukhyaḥ

original: na cāpohyabhedād bhedo 'pi apohasyāvakalpate /
analyzed: na ca apohya bhedāt apohasya avakalpate

original: yo hi saṃbhāvyamānasaṃsargair ādhārair api na bhettuṃ pāryate sa dūravartibhir  alabdhasambandhair atibāhyair a pohyaiḥ kathaṃ bhidyate abhyupagamyāpi brūmaḥ yady apohyabhedāt apohabhinnatvaṃ apohyaikyāt tarhi tadaikyenāpi bhavitavyam /
analyzed: yaḥ hi saṃbhāvyamāna saṃsargaiḥ ādhāraiḥ api na bhettum pāryate sa dūra vartibhiḥ alabdha sambandhaiḥ ati bāhyaiḥ a pohyaiḥ katham bhidyate abhyupagamya api brūmaḥ yadi apohya bhedāt apoha bhinna tvam apohya aikyāt tarhi tad aikyena api bhavitavyam

original: ataś ca gavāśvayor anyāpohena vyavasthāpyamānayoḥ agavo 'naśvāś ca hastyādayaḥ apohyās tulyā bhūyāṃso bhavanti /
analyzed: atas ca gava aśvayoḥ anya apohena vyavasthāpyamānayoḥ agavaḥ naśvāḥ ca hasti ādayaḥ apohyāḥ tulyāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ bhavanti

original: asādhāraṇas tu ekaḥ gaur aśvegavi cāśvo 'tiricyate /
analyzed: asādhāraṇaḥ tu ekaḥ gauḥ aśvegavi ca aśvaḥ tiricyate

original: tatraikāpohyabhedāt gavāśvayor bhedo bhavatu bhūyasām apohyānām abhedād abhedo vā bhavatu iti vicāraṇāyāṃ [vipratiṣiddhadharmasamavāye bhūyasāṃ syāt sadharmatvaṃ] ity a bheda eva nyāyyo bhavet //
analyzed: tatra eka apohya bhedāt gava aśvayoḥ bhedaḥ bhavatu bhūyasām apohyānām abhedāt abhedaḥ vā bhavatu iti vicāraṇāyām vipratiṣiddha dharma samavāye bhūyasām syāt sadharma tvam iti a bhedaḥ eva nyāyyaḥ bhavet

original: athāsādhāraṇyāt aśvāpoha eva go 'poha iṣyate sa tarhi siṃhādāv apy astīti so 'pīdānīṃ gaur bhavet //
analyzed: atha asādhāraṇyāt aśva apohaḥ eva go pohaḥ iṣyate sa tarhi siṃha ādau api asti iti sā u pi idānīm gauḥ bhavet

original: athāśvādiviśeṣoddhoṣarahitam agorūpaṃ vyavacchedyam ucyate tat pratyekaṃ grahītum aśakyaṃ ānantyāt /
analyzed: atha aśva ādi viśeṣa uddhoṣa rahitam a go rūpam vyavacchedyam ucyate tat pratyekam grahītum aśakyam ānantyāt

original: vargīkaraṇakāraṇaṃ ca kiñcin nāstyeva /
analyzed: vargīkaraṇa kāraṇam ca kiñcid na asti eva

original: na hi sarveṣām agavām aśvādīnām ekadeśatvaṃ ekakālatvaṃ vā samasti //
analyzed: na hi sarveṣām agavām aśva ādīnām eka deśa tvam eka kāla tvam vā samasti

original: atha gopratiṣedha eva vargīkaraṇaherur iṣyate hanta tarhi gauḥ pūrvasiddha eṣitavyaḥ yatpratiṣedhenāgāvaḥ pratīyeran /
analyzed: atha go pratiṣedhaḥ eva vargīkaraṇa heruḥ iṣyate hanta tarhi gauḥ pūrva siddhaḥ eṣitavyaḥ yat pratiṣedhena agāvaḥ pratīyeran

original: pūrvasiddhe va gavi labdhe kim agobhiḥ kiṃ vā tadapohena prayojanam pūrvasiddhaṃ gosvalakṣaṇam astyeveti cet na tena vyavahārābhāvāt /
analyzed: pūrva siddhe gavi labdhe kim agobhiḥ kim vā tad apohena prayojanam pūrva siddham go sva lakṣaṇam asti eva iti ced na tena vyavahāra abhāvāt

original: gosāmānye tu pūrvasiddhe mudhā 'pohaprayatna ity uktam //
analyzed: go sāmānye tu pūrva siddhe mudhā poha prayatnaḥ iti uktam

original: atha gosāmānyam agopratiṣedhena siddhyati tadā dustaram itaretarāśrayam ahoniṣedhena gosiddhiḥ gosiddhyā cāgoniṣedhasiddhir iti /
analyzed: atha go sāmānyam a go pratiṣedhena siddhi ati tadā dustaram itaretara āśrayam ahar niṣedhena go siddhiḥ go siddhyā ca a go niṣedha siddhiḥ iti

original: tasmād apohyasyaiva nirūpayitum aśakyatvāt na tadbhedād apohabhedaḥ siddhyati //
analyzed: tasmāt apohyasya eva nirūpayitum aśakya tvāt na tad bhedāt apoha bhedaḥ siddhi ati

original: api cāśvādayaḥ sāmānyarūpeṇa vā 'pohyeran tadviśeṣātmanā vā na viśeṣātmanā tadanantatvāt aśabdavācyatvāc ca //
analyzed: api ca aśva ādayaḥ sāmānya rūpeṇa vā pohyeran tad viśeṣa ātmanā vā na viśeṣa ātmanā tad ananta tvāt a śabda vācya tvāt ca

original: sāmānyātmanā tu teṣām apy apoharūpatvād abhāvarūpatvam /
analyzed: sāmānya ātmanā tu teṣām api apoha rūpa tvāt abhāva rūpa tvam

original: kathaṃ cābhāvasyaivābhāvaḥ kriyate /
analyzed: katham ca abhāvasya eva abhāvaḥ kriyate

original: karaṇe vā pratiṣedhadvayayogāt vidhir avatiṣṭhata iti vidhirūpaḥ śabdārthaḥ syāt //
analyzed: karaṇe vā pratiṣedha dvaya yogāt vidhiḥ avatiṣṭhate iti vidhi rūpaḥ śabda arthaḥ syāt

original: apohātmanaś ca turagādeḥ yo 'pohaḥ sa tasmād vilakṣaṇaḥ anyathā vā vailakṣaṇye tasya bhāvātmatā bhakte /
analyzed: apoha ātmanaḥ ca turaga ādeḥ yaḥ pohaḥ sa tasmāt vilakṣaṇaḥ anyathā vā vailakṣaṇye tasya bhāva ātma tā bhakte

original: availakṣaṇye tu yādṛśa evāpohyaḥ tādṛśa eva tadapoha iti gaur apy agauḥ syāt //
analyzed: availakṣaṇye tu yādṛśaḥ eva apohyaḥ tādṛśaḥ eva tad apohaḥ iti gauḥ api a gauḥ syāt

original: kiṃ ca apohaśabdārthapakṣe nīlam utpalam ityādau viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasāmānādhikaraṇyādivyavahārā vilupyeran /
analyzed: kim ca apoha śabda artha pakṣe nīlam utpalam ityādau viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi vyavahārāḥ vilupyeran

original: na hi ekasminn arthe dvayor apohayor vṛttir upapadyate /
analyzed: na hi ekasmin arthe dvayoḥ apohayoḥ vṛttiḥ upapadyate

original: na caikaḥ kaścid artho 'sti yatra tayor vṛttiḥ svalakṣaṇasyāśabdārthatvāt anyasya cāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: na ca ekaḥ kaścid arthaḥ u sti yatra tayoḥ vṛttiḥ sva lakṣaṇasya a śabda artha tvāt anyasya ca asaṃbhavāt

original: na ca vṛttir api kā cid asti //
analyzed: na ca vṛttiḥ api kā cit asti

original: sadjñeyādiśabdānāṃ apohyanirūpaṇāsaṃbhavāt nāpohavācitvam /
analyzed: sat jñeya ādi śabdānām apohya nirūpaṇa asaṃbhavāt na apoha vāci tvam

original: na hy asad ajñeyaṃ vā kiñcid avagatam yat vyavacchidyeta /
analyzed: na hi asat ajñeyam vā kiñcid avagatam yat vyavacchidyeta

original: jñātaṃ cet sad eṣa tat jñeyaṃ ceti /
analyzed: jñātam ced sat eṣa tat jñeyam ca iti

original: ataḥ kathaṃ sacchebdena sad eva jñeyaśabdena ca jñeyam evāpohyate /
analyzed: atas katham sat śebdena sat eva jñeya śabdena ca jñeyam eva apohyate

original: ajñātaṃ tu na nitarām apohyam /
analyzed: ajñātam tu na nitarām apohyam

original: kalpitaṃ tu tat vaktum aśakyam kalpanayaiva sattvāt jñeyatvāc ca //
analyzed: kalpitam tu tat vaktum aśakyam kalpanayā eva sattvāt jñeya tvāt ca

original: apohaśabdasya kiṃ vācyam iti cintyam /
analyzed: apoha śabdasya kim vācyam iti cintyam

original: anapoho na bhavatīty apohaḥ /
analyzed: anapohaḥ na bhavati iti apohaḥ

original: kaś cāyām anapohaḥ kathaṃ vā 'sau na bhevati abhavan vā kim avaśiṣyate iti sarvam avācakam //
analyzed: kaḥ ca ayām anapohaḥ katham vā sau na abhavan vā kim avaśiṣyate iti sarvam avācakam

original: pratiṣedhavācināṃ ca nañādipadānāṃ kā vārtā atra na bhavatīti neti ko 'rthaḥ upasarganipātānāṃ ca katham apohaviṣayam ākhyātaśabdānāṃ ca pacatītyādīnām apoho durupapādaḥ //
analyzed: pratiṣedha vācinām ca nañ ādi padānām kā vārtā atra na bhavati iti na iti kaḥ rthaḥ upasarga nipātānām ca katham apoha viṣayam ākhyāta śabdānām ca pacati ityādīnām apohaḥ durupapādaḥ

original: nāmnām eva jātiśabdānāṃ apohaviṣayatvam iṣyate yeṣāṃ bhavanto jātivācitvaṃ tadvadvācitvaṃ vā pratipadyanta iti cet tato 'nyeṣāṃ tarhi kā vārtā bāhyārthavācitve jātiśabdeṣu ko dveṣaḥ nirālambanatve jñānāṃśāvalambanatve vā jātiśabdānām api tad evāstu kim apohavādapramādena yathaiva pratibhāmātraṃ vākyārthaṃ iti kalpitaḥ /
analyzed: nāmnām eva jāti śabdānām apoha viṣaya tvam iṣyate yeṣām bhavantaḥ jāti vāci tvam tadvat vāci tvam vā pratipadyante iti ced tatas nyeṣām tarhi kā vārtā bāhya artha vāci tve jāti śabdeṣu kaḥ dveṣaḥ nirālambana tve jñāna aṃśa avalambana tve vā jāti śabdānām api tat eva astu kim apoha vāda pramādena yathā eva pratibhā mātram vākya artham iti kalpitaḥ

original: padārthe 'pi tathaivāstu kim apohāgraheṇa vaḥ //
analyzed: padārthe tathā evā astu kim apoha āgraheṇa vaḥ

original: ityādidūṣaṇaudāryaṃ apohe bahudarśitam /
analyzed: ityādi dūṣaṇa audāryam apohe bahu darśitam

original: ataḥ śabdārthatām asya vadeyuḥ saugatāḥ katham //
analyzed: atas śabda artha tām asya vadeyuḥ saugatāḥ katham

original: ucyate tad etad aviditabauddhasiddhāntānām abhidhānam //
analyzed: ucyate tat etat avidita bauddha siddhāntānām abhidhānam

original: apoho yadi bhāvātmā bahir abhyupagamyate /
analyzed: apohaḥ yadi bhāva ātmā bahis abhyupagamyate

original: tato bhavati bhāvatkaṃ vāgjālaṃ na tv asau tathā //
analyzed: tatas bhavati bhāvatkam vāc jālam na tu asau tathā

original: kin tu khalv ayam āntaro jñānātmā saugatānām apohaḥ sammataḥ //
analyzed: kin tu khalu ayam āntaraḥ jñāna ātmā saugatānām apohaḥ sammataḥ

original: tathā 'bhyupagame ceyam apohavācoyuktiḥ svāṃśaviśayaṃ padārthajñānānām ity etāvad eva vaktum ucitam //
analyzed: tathā abhyupagame ca iyam apoha vācoyuktiḥ sva aṃśa viśayam padārtha jñānānām iti etāvat eva vaktum ucitam

original: etad api nāsti nāyam āntaraḥ na bāhyo 'pohaḥ /
analyzed: etat api na asti na ayam āntaraḥ na bāhya upohaḥ

original: kin tu jñānārthābhyāmanya eva //
analyzed: kin tu jñāna arthābhyām anyaḥ eva

original: nanu yad vidyate nāntaḥ na bahiḥ paramārthataḥ /
analyzed: nanu yat vidyate na antar na bahis paramārthataḥ

original: tan na vidyate eveti kathaṃ śabdārtha ucyate //
analyzed: tat na vidyate eva iti katham śabda arthaḥ ucyate

original: pāramārthikaśabdārthasamarthanapipāsitāḥ /
analyzed: pāramārthika śabda artha samarthana pipāsi tāḥ

original: nehāgatāḥ smo yenaiva anuyujyemahi tvayā //
analyzed: na iha āgatāḥ smaḥ yena eva anuyujyemahi tvayā

original: yata eva tan nāntar bahir asti tata eva mithyeti kālpanikam iti ca gīyate /
analyzed: yatas eva tat na antar bahis asti tatas eva mithyā iti kālpanikam iti ca gīyate

original: kiṃ punas tat āropitaṃ kiñcid ākāramātraṃ vikalpoparaṃjakam //
analyzed: kim punar tat āropitam kiñcid ākāra mātram vikalpa uparaṃjakam

original: nanu bāhyārthavyatirekeṇa kim īya ākāraḥ āntarasya jñānasyoparaṃjaka ucyate dṛśyacchāyaivānuraṃjikā vikalpānāṃ na dṛśyo 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: nanu bāhya artha vyatirekeṇa kim īyaḥ ākāraḥ āntarasya jñānasya uparaṃjakaḥ ucyate dṛśya chāyā eva anuraṃjikā vikalpānām na dṛśyaḥ rthaḥ

original: vyāvṛttaṃ hi vastu darśanānāṃ viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: vyāvṛttam hi vastu darśanānām viṣayaḥ

original: tac ca spraṣṭum akṣamā vikalpā ity uktam //
analyzed: tat ca spraṣṭum akṣamāḥ vikalpāḥ iti uktam

original: atha tacchāyām avalambamānā vikalpā vyāvṛttasyāgrahaṇāt vyavṛttiviṣayā ucyante //
analyzed: atha tad chāyām avalambamānāḥ vikalpāḥ vyāvṛttasya agrahaṇāt ucyante

original: nanu vyāvṛttitadvator abhedāt yā vyāvṛttiḥ yac ca vyāvṛttiṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tad ekam eveti vyāvṛttigrāhibhir vikalpair vyāvṛttam api gṛhītaṃ syād iti darśanatulyā eva te bhaveyuḥ vaitad evam na vikalpair vyāvṛttaṃ vastu gṛhyate /
analyzed: nanu vyāvṛtti tadvatoḥ abhedāt yā vyāvṛttiḥ yat ca vyāvṛttim sva lakṣaṇam tat ekam eva iti vyāvṛtti grāhibhiḥ vikalpaiḥ vyāvṛttam api gṛhītam syāt iti darśana tulyāḥ eva te bhaveyuḥ vā etat evam na vikalpaiḥ vyāvṛttam vastu gṛhyate

original: na ca pāramārthikī vyāvṛttiḥ api tu kaścid āropita ākāraḥ /
analyzed: na ca pāramārthikī vyāvṛttiḥ api tu kaścid āropita ākāraḥ

original: vāstavatve hi vyāvṛtteḥ vastusaṃsparśina ete doṣāḥ prāduṣyuḥ /
analyzed: vāstava tve hi vyāvṛtteḥ vastu saṃsparśinaḥ ete doṣāḥ prāduṣyuḥ

original: na tv asau tayety uktam //
analyzed: na tu asau tayā iti uktam

original: ata eva yat kecana paryacūcudan kila vyāvṛttagrahaṇapakṣe tritayagrahaṇaṃ prāpnoti yat vyāvṛttaṃ yena ca nimittena vyāvṛttaṃ yataś ca vyāvṛttim iti /
analyzed: atas eva yat kecana paryacūcudan kila vyāvṛtta grahaṇa pakṣe tritaya grahaṇam prāpnoti yat vyāvṛttam yena ca nimittena vyāvṛttam yatas ca vyāvṛttim iti

original: na ca tritayagrahaṇam astīty ataḥ kathaṃ vyāvṛttagrahaṇam iti tad apy apāstaṃ bhavati yadi hi vyāvṛttaṃ gṛhṇīma ity evam ullekho bhavet vyavahartṛjanasya tadaivam asau paryanuyujyeta na tv evam astīty acodyam etat //
analyzed: na ca tritaya grahaṇam asti iti atas katham vyāvṛtta grahaṇam iti tat api apāstam bhavati yadi hi vyāvṛttam gṛhṇīmaḥ iti evam ullekhaḥ bhavet vyavahartṛ janasya tadā evam asau paryanuyujyeta na tu evam asti iti acodyam etat

original: nanv evam āropitākāraviṣayā eva vikalpā uktā bhavanti /
analyzed: nanu evam āropita ākāra viṣayāḥ eva vikalpāḥ uktāḥ bhavanti

original: vyāvṛttiviṣayatvavācoyuktir ananvitety uktam smāhitam etat darśanapṛṣṭhabhāvibhiḥ gaur ityādivikalpaiḥ atatkāryaparāvṛttā ākārā ullikhyante /
analyzed: vyāvṛtti viṣaya tva vācoyuktiḥ ananvitā iti uktam sma ahitam etat darśana pṛṣṭha bhāvibhiḥ gauḥ ityādi vikalpaiḥ atatkārya parāvṛttāḥ ākārāḥ ullikhyante

original: na hi govikalpair atatkāryāṇām aśvādīnām ullekhaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ ca spṛṣyate /
analyzed: na hi go vikalpaiḥ a tad kāryāṇām aśva ādīnām ullekhaḥ sva lakṣaṇam ca spṛṣyate

original: sāmānyaṃ ca vāstavaṃ nāsti /
analyzed: sāmānyam ca vāstavam na asti

original: tasmād atatkāryaparāvṛttiviṣayatvam eva vikalpānām avatiṣṭhate ity evaṃ yuktyā teṣām apohaviṣayatvam ucyate na pratipattiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt atatkārya parāvṛtti viṣaya tvam eva vikalpānām avatiṣṭhate iti evam yuktyā teṣām apoha viṣaya tvam ucyate na pratipattiḥ

original: nanu atatkāryaparāvṛttam iva sajātīyavyāvṛttam api dṛśyasvarūpam /
analyzed: nanu atatkārya parāvṛttam iva sajātīya vyāvṛttam api dṛśya svarūpam

original: tatra sajātīya vijātīyavyāvṛttam apy ākāram ullikheyuḥ /
analyzed: tatra sajātīya vijātīya vyāvṛttam api ākāram ullikheyuḥ

original: na hi sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛttī svalakṣaṇaṃ cānyat /
analyzed: na hi sajātīya vijātīya vyāvṛttī sva lakṣaṇam ca anyat

original: na caikatarākārollekhananiyamanahetum utpaśyāmaḥ //
analyzed: na ca ekatara ākāra ullekhana niyamana hetum utpaśyāmaḥ

original: dhīman maivaṃ maṃsthāḥ /
analyzed: dhīman mā evam maṃsthāḥ

original: niścayātmāno nirvikalpāḥ /
analyzed: niścaya ātmānaḥ nirvikalpāḥ

original: sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛttākārollekhe ca sarvātmanā tanniścayāt vikalpāntarāṇāṃ śabdānatarāṇāṃ cāpravṛṭtiḥ syāt /
analyzed: sajātīya vijātīya vyāvṛtta ākāra ullekhe ca sarva ātmanā tad niścayāt vikalpa antarāṇām śabda anatarāṇām ca apravṛṭtiḥ syāt

original: tathā ca gaur iti śabdād utpadyamāno vijātīyavyāvṛttākārollekhyeva vikalpaḥ saṃvedyate ba sajātīyavyāvṛttollekhī /
analyzed: tathā ca gauḥ iti śabdāt utpadyamānaḥ vijātīya vyāvṛtta ākāra ullekhya iva vikalpaḥ saṃvedyate sajātīya vyāvṛtta ullekhī

original: tulyaviṣayāś ca vikalpaiḥ śabdā ity anyāpohaviṣayās ta ucyante //
analyzed: tulya viṣayāḥ ca vikalpaiḥ śabdāḥ iti anya apoha viṣayāḥ te ucyante

original: so 'yam āropitākāro na bahiḥ āropitatvād eva /
analyzed: saḥ yam āropita ākāraḥ na bahis āropita tvāt eva

original: nāntaḥ abodharūpatvāt /
analyzed: na antar a bodha rūpa tvāt

original: ataś cāsau na kiñcid eva /
analyzed: atas ca asau na kiñcid eva

original: na kiñcid api bhavan apoha iti phalata upacaryate /
analyzed: na kiñcid api bhavan apohaḥ iti phalataḥ upacaryate

original: ataś ca bāhyam apoham āśritya dūṣaṇopanyāse kaṇṭhaśoṣam anubhavan asthāne kliṣṭo devānāṃ priyaḥ //
analyzed: atas ca bāhyam apoham āśritya dūṣaṇa upanyāse kaṇṭha śoṣam anubhavan asthāne kliṣṭaḥ devānām priyaḥ

original: api ca vikalpabhūmiḥ arthaḥ vikalpāntarasannidhāpitabhāvābhāvākṣepī niyatarūpo bāhyasadṛśaś ca pratīyate /
analyzed: api ca vikalpa bhūmiḥ arthaḥ vikalpa antara sannidhāpita bhāva abhāva ākṣepī niyata rūpaḥ bāhya sadṛśaḥ ca pratīyate

original: na cedaṃ rūpatrayam api bāhye vastuni yujyate /
analyzed: na ca idam rūpa trayam api bāhye vastuni yujyate

original: bāhyasya hi vastunaḥ svarūpeṇāvagatasya na vikalpāntaropanītabhāvasambandha upapadyate vaiyartyāt /
analyzed: bāhyasya hi vastunaḥ sva rūpeṇa avagatasya na vikalpa antara upanīta bhāva sambandhaḥ upapadyate vaiyartyāt

original: nāpy abhāvasambahdhaḥ vipratiṣedhāt /
analyzed: na api abhāva sambahdhaḥ vipratiṣedhāt

original: niyatarūpatā ca vikalpaviṣayasya [gaur eva nāśvaḥ] ity evam avagamyamānā vastvantaravyavacchedam antareṇa nāvakalpata iti balāt vyavacchedaviṣayatvam /
analyzed: niyata rūpa tā ca vikalpa viṣayasya gauḥ eva na aśvaḥ iti evam avagamyamānā vastu antara vyavacchedam antareṇa na avakalpate iti balāt vyavaccheda viṣaya tvam

original: anyathā niyamaparicchedāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: anyathā niyama pariccheda asaṃbhavāt

original: sandigdhaṃ ca vastu na gṛhyate //
analyzed: sandigdham ca vastu na gṛhyate

original: evaṃ bāhyavastuviṣayatve ca niraste vikalpānāṃ [ekasyārthasvabhāvasya] iti nyāyena paunarukyād abāhyaviṣayatvaṃ khyāyyam /
analyzed: evam bāhya vastu viṣaya tve ca niraste vikalpānām ekasya artha svabhāvasya iti nyāyena paunarukyāt abāhya viṣaya tvam khyāyyam

original: abāhyaṃ cāropitaṃ rūpam tac ca bāhyavad avabhāsate /
analyzed: abāhyam ca āropitam rūpam tat ca bāhya vat avabhāsate

original: na ca vyāvṛtticchāyam apahāya bāhyāropitayoḥ sādṛśyamanyad astīti vyāvṛttiviṣayā eva vikalpāḥ phalato bhavanti //
analyzed: na ca vyāvṛtti chāyam apahāya bāhya āropitayoḥ sādṛśyam anyat asti iti vyāvṛtti viṣayāḥ eva vikalpāḥ phalataḥ bhavanti

original: yady api vidhirūpeṇa gaur aśva iti teṣāṃ pravṛttiḥ tathāpi nītivido 'nyāpohaviṣayān eva tān vyavasthāpayanti /
analyzed: yadi api vidhi rūpeṇa gauḥ aśvaḥ iti teṣām pravṛttiḥ tathā api nīti vidaḥ nyā apoha viṣayān eva tān vyavasthāpayanti

original: yathoktaṃ [vyākhyātāraḥ khalv evaṃ vivecayanti na vyavahartāraḥ] iti /
analyzed: yathoktam vyākhyātāraḥ khalu evam vivecayanti na vyavahartāraḥ iti

original: so 'yaṃ nāntaraḥ na bāhyaḥ anya eva kaścid āropita ākāro vyāvṛtticchāyāyogād apohaśabdārtha ucyate itīyam asatkhyātivādagarbhā saraṇiḥ //
analyzed: saḥ yam na āntaraḥ na bāhyaḥ anyaḥ eva kaścid āropitaḥ ākāraḥ vyāvṛtti chāyā yogāt apoha śabda arthaḥ ucyate iti iyam asat khyāti vāda garbhā saraṇiḥ

original: atha vā vikalpapratibimbakaṃ jñānākāramātrakam eva tadabāhyam api vicitravāsanābhedopāhitarūpabhedaṃ bāhyavad avabhāsamānaṃ lokayātrāṃ birbhati /
analyzed: atha vā vikalpa pratibimbakam jñāna ākāra mātrakam eva tat abāhyam api vicitra vāsanā bheda upāhita rūpa bhedam bāhya vat avabhāsamānam lokayātrām

original: vyāvṛtticchāyāyogāc ca tadapoha iti vyavahiyate /
analyzed: vyāvṛtti chāyā yogāt ca tad apohaḥ iti vyavahiyate

original: seyam ātmakhyātigarbhā saraṇiḥ //
analyzed: sā iyam ātma khyāti garbhā saraṇiḥ

original: nanu ubhayathāpi vastuviṣayatvābhāve vikalpānāṃ kathaṃ vastuni vyavahāraḥ pravartante dṛṣṭe 'pi kvacid vastuni tṛṇādau pravṛttyabhāvāt /
analyzed: nanu ubhayathā api vastu viṣaya tva abhāve vikalpānām katham vastuni vyavahāraḥ pravartante dṛṣṭe kvacid vastuni tṛṇa ādau pravṛtti abhāvāt

original: arthitvaṃ tu pravṛtteḥ kāraṇam //
analyzed: arthi tvam tu pravṛtteḥ kāraṇam

original: nanu arthitāvat darśanam api kāraṇam eva /
analyzed: nanu arthitāvat darśanam api kāraṇam eva

original: arthino 'py apaśyatas tatra pravṛttyabhāvāt /
analyzed: arthinaḥ pi a paśyataḥ tatra pravṛtti abhāvāt

original: apohapakṣe ca pravṛttasya vastuprāptaḥ katham iti vaktavyam ucyate pravṛttis tāvat dṛśyavikalpyayoḥ ekīkaraṇanibandhanā /
analyzed: apoha pakṣe ca pravṛttasya vastu prāptaḥ katham iti vaktavyam ucyate pravṛttiḥ tāvat dṛśya vikalpyayoḥ ekīkaraṇa nibandhanā

original: dṛśyadarśanānantaram utpanne vikalpe vikalpatayā na pratipadyate pramātā /
analyzed: dṛśya darśana anantaram utpanne vikalpe vikalpa tayā na pratipadyate pramātā

original: darśanānantaryavipralabdhas tu dṛśyam eva gṛhītaṃ manyate /
analyzed: darśana ānantarya vipralabdhaḥ tu dṛśyam eva gṛhītam manyate

original: tad abhimānena ca pravartate /
analyzed: tat abhimānena ca pravartate

original: idaṃ tad ekīkaraṇam āhuḥ dṛśyavikalpayor bhedena vastuno dṛśyāt vikalpo yan na gṛhyate na punaḥ bhinnayor abhedādhyavasāya ekīkaraṇam iṣyate /
analyzed: idam tat ekīkaraṇam āhuḥ dṛśya vikalpayoḥ bhedena vastunaḥ dṛśyāt vikalpaḥ yat na gṛhyate na punar bhinnayoḥ abheda adhyavasāyaḥ ekīkaraṇam iṣyate

original: dṛśyād vibhinnasya śukter eva rajatasya nirdeṣṭum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: dṛśyāt vibhinnasya śukteḥ eva rajatasya nirdeṣṭum aśakya tvāt

original: abhedādhyavasāye copāyābhāvāt /
analyzed: abheda adhyavasāye ca upāya abhāvāt

original: nābhedādhyavasāye darśanam upāyaḥ vikalpāviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: na abheda adhyavasāye darśanam upāyaḥ vikalpa aviṣaya tvāt

original: na vikalpaḥ dṛśyaviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: na vikalpaḥ dṛśya viṣaya tvāt

original: tasmāt bhedānadhyavasātād eva pravṛttiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt bheda anadhyavasātāt eva pravṛttiḥ

original: prāptir api dṛśyasyaivārthakriyākāriṇo vastunaḥ pāraṃparyeṇa tanmūlatvāt kāryaprabandhasya /
analyzed: prāptiḥ api dṛśyasya eva arthakriyā kāriṇaḥ vastunaḥ pāraṃparyeṇa tad mūla tvāt kārya prabandhasya

original: dṛśyād darśanaṃ tato vikalpaḥ tataḥ pravṛttir iti /
analyzed: dṛśyāt darśanam tatas vikalpaḥ tatas pravṛttiḥ iti

original: arthaṃ hi mūlavartinam upalabhya pravartamānas tam āpnoti /
analyzed: artham hi mūla vartinam upalabhya pravartamānaḥ tam āpnoti

original: apavarakanihitamaṇiprasṛtāyāṃ kuñcikāvivaranirgatāyām iva prabhāyāṃ maṇibuddhyā pravartamānaḥ /
analyzed: apavaraka nihita maṇi prasṛtāyām kuñcikā vivara nirgatāyām iva prabhāyām maṇi buddhyā pravartamānaḥ

original: yatra tu mūle 'py artho nāsti tatra vyāmohāt pravartamānaḥ viprakabhyata eva dīpaprabhāyām iva tathaiva maṇibuddhyā pravartamānaḥ //
analyzed: yatra tu mūle pi arthaḥ na asti tatra vyāmohāt pravartamānaḥ viprakabhyate eva dīpa prabhāyām iva tathā eva maṇi buddhyā pravartamānaḥ

original: evaṃ ca bāhyavastusaṃsparśaśūnyeṣv api vikalpeṣu samullikhiteṣu [bāhyo 'rtho mayā pratipannaḥ] [tatra cāhaṃ pravṛttaḥ] [sa ca mayā prāptaṃ] ity abhimāno bhavati laukikānām /
analyzed: evam ca bāhya vastu saṃsparśa śūnyeṣu api vikalpeṣu samullikhiteṣu bāhyaḥ rthaḥ mayā pratipannaḥ tatra ca aham pravṛttaḥ sa ca mayā prāptam iti abhimānaḥ bhavati laukikānām

original: na tv ayam arthādhyavasāyamūlaḥ /tad uktaṃ [yathā 'dhyavasāyam atattvāt yathā tattvaṃ cānadhyavasāyāt] iti /
analyzed: na tu ayam artha adhyavasāya mūlaḥ tat uktam yathā dhyavasāyam atattvāt yathā tattvam ca anadhyavasāyāt iti

original: [svapratibhāse 'narthe 'rthādhyavasāyāt pravṛttiḥ] ity atrāpi ganthe arthādhyavasāyaḥ bhedānadhyavasāya eva vyākhyeyaḥ /
analyzed: sva pratibhāse na arthe rtha adhyavasāyāt pravṛttiḥ iti atra api ganthe artha adhyavasāyaḥ bheda anadhyavasāyaḥ eva vyākhyeyaḥ

original: evaṃ dṛśyavikalpyāvathau ekīkṛtya pravartate prāpnoti cārtham iti //
analyzed: evam ekīkṛtya pravartate prāpnoti ca artham iti

original: tad evam eva lokasya vyavahāro 'vakalpate /
analyzed: tat evam eva lokasya vyavahāraḥ vakalpate

original: vivekināpi voḍhavyā lokayātrā ca lokavat //
analyzed: vivekinā api voḍhavyā lokayātrā ca loka vat

original: tasmād vikalpapratibimbakasya śabdārthatām āhur apohanāmnaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt vikalpa pratibimbakasya śabda artha tām āhuḥ apoha nāmnaḥ

original: pratītimārgas tv avivicyamānaḥ janasya jātibhramam ātanoti //
analyzed: pratīti mārgaḥ tu a vivicyamānaḥ janasya jāti bhramam ātanoti

original: yāvāṃś ca kaścin niyamaprakāraḥ pravartate jātiṣu vṛttyavṛttyoḥ /
analyzed: yāvān ca kaścid niyama prakāraḥ pravartate jātiṣu vṛtti avṛttyoḥ

original: tāvān apoheṣv api tulya eva bhavaty avastutvakṛtastu bhedaḥ //
analyzed: tāvān apoheṣu api tulyaḥ eva bhavati avastu tva kṛtaḥ tu bhedaḥ

original: tulye 'pibhede śamane jvarādeḥ kaścid yathaivauṣadhayaḥ samarthāḥ /
analyzed: tulye pi bhede śamane jvara ādeḥ kaścid yathā eva oṣadhayaḥ samarthāḥ

original: sāmānyaśūnyā api tadvad eva syur vyaktayaḥ kāryaviśeṣaśaktāḥ //
analyzed: sāmānya śūnyāḥ api tadvat eva syuḥ vyaktayaḥ kārya viśeṣa śaktāḥ

original: viśeṣaṇādivyavahārak¬ptiḥ tucche 'py apohe na na yujyate naḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa ādi vyavahāra kptiḥ tucche pi apohe na na yujyate naḥ

original: ataśaca mā kāri bhavadbhir eṣā jātyākṛtivyaktipadārthacintā //
analyzed: mā kāri bhavadbhiḥ eṣā jāti ākṛti vyakti padārtha cintā

original: atrābhidhīyate kiṃ jātyāder bāhyasya śabdārthasyāsattvāt apohapakṣapātaḥ ata pratītivalād eva iti //
analyzed: atra abhidhīyate kim jāti ādeḥ bāhyasya śabda arthasya asattvāt apoha pakṣapātaḥ pratīti valāt eva iti

original: pratītis tāvat apohaviṣayā bhavadbhir eva nāṅgīkṛteti kim atra kalahena //
analyzed: pratītiḥ tāvat apoha viṣayā bhavadbhiḥ eva nā aṅgīkṛtā iti kim atra kalahena

original: nāpi jātyāder asattvam indriyārthasannikarṣotpannabādhasandeharahitapratyayagamyatvāt svalakṣaṇavat //
analyzed: nā api jāti ādeḥ asattvam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna bādha sandeha rahita pratyaya gamya tvāt sva lakṣaṇa vat

original: ādyam eva hi vijñānaṃ arthasaṃsparśi cākṣuṣam /
analyzed: ādyam eva hi vijñānam artha saṃsparśi cākṣuṣam

original: na taduttarabhāvīti kim idaṃ rājaśāsanam //
analyzed: na tad uttara bhāvi iti kim idam rāja śāsanam

original: tad evāstu pramāṇaṃ vā tenāpi tv avagamyate /
analyzed: tat eva astu pramāṇam vā tena api tu avagamyate

original: vyāvṛttaṃ vastuno rūpaṃ nānugāmīti kā pramā tathāhi nirvikalpakakālasyātisūkṣmatvāt kiṃ pratibhāsate kiṃ na pratibhāsate iti katham eṣa kalirāvayor upaśāmyatu bhavān brūte vyāvṛttam eva bhātīti /
analyzed: vyāvṛttam vastunaḥ rūpam na anugāmi iti kā pramā tathā hi nirvikalpaka kālasya ati sūkṣma tvāt kim pratibhāsate kim na pratibhāsate iti katham eṣa kaliḥ āvayoḥ upaśāmyatu bhavān brūte vyāvṛttam eva bhāti iti

original: ahaṃ bruve anuvṛttam api pratibhātīti /
analyzed: aham bruve anuvṛttam api pratibhāti iti

original: evaṃ kalahāyamānayor ābhayoḥ kaḥ paricchedaḥ na khalu śapathasya krośapātasya vaiṣaviṣayaḥ /
analyzed: evam kalahāyamānayoḥ ābhayoḥ kaḥ paricchedaḥ na khalu śapathasya krośa pātasya vaiṣa viṣayaḥ

original: tasmāt nirvikalpakānantarotpannasthūlakālakāryaparyālocanayā tadvyavasthā kartavyā //
analyzed: tasmāt nirvikalpaka anantara utpanna sthūla kāla kārya paryālocanayā tad vyavasthā kartavyā

original: tatra ca bhaved yadi viśeṣaikaviṣayaṃ nirvikalpakam /
analyzed: tatra ca bhavet yadi viśeṣa eka viṣayam nirvikalpakam

original: sāmānyādhyavasāyo 'yaṃ akasmāt katham udbhavet //
analyzed: sāmānya adhyavasāyaḥ yam akasmāt katham udbhavet

original: śābda eṣa vikalpa iti cet maivam paśyaty anugataṃ rūpaṃ avijñāte 'pi vāceke /
analyzed: śābdaḥ eṣa vikalpaḥ iti ced mā evam paśyati anugatam rūpam a vijñāte pi vāceke

original: dākṣiṇātya ivākasmāt paśyann uṣṭraparaṃparām //
analyzed: dākṣiṇātyaḥ iva akasmāt paśyan uṣṭra paraṃparām

original: anavagataśabdārthasambandho 'py abhidhānavān ekapadārthasannidhāne teṣām anugataṃ ca vyāvṛttaṃ ca paśyaty eva rūpam //
analyzed: an avagata śabda artha sambandhaḥ pi abhidhānavān eka padārtha sannidhāne teṣām anugatam ca vyāvṛttam ca paśyati eva rūpam

original: api ca prathamākṣisannipāta evāṅgulicatuṣṭayam avalokyamānaṃ anyo nyagāminā ca rūpeṇāvagamyate /
analyzed: api ca prathama akṣi sannipāte eva aṅguli catuṣṭayam avalokyamānam anyaḥ nyagāminā ca rūpeṇa avagamyate

original: tat kathaṃ kevalaviśeṣāvalambī cākṣuṣaḥ pratyayaḥ api ca purāṇaśābaleyapiṇḍam avalokyataḥ kālāntare bāhuleyaṃ piṇḍaṃ paśyataḥ pūrvadṛṣṭaśābaleyapiṇḍaviṣayaṃ smaraṇam utpadyamānaṃ saṃvedyate /
analyzed: tat katham kevala viśeṣa avalambī cākṣuṣaḥ pratyayaḥ api ca purāṇa śābaleya piṇḍam avalokyataḥ kāla antare bāhuleyam piṇḍam paśyataḥ pūrva dṛṣṭa śābaleya piṇḍa viṣayam smaraṇam utpadyamānam saṃvedyate

original: tasmāt sāmānyānavagamo nopapadyate /
analyzed: tasmāt sāmānya anavagamaḥ na upapadyate

original: anyasminn asādhāraṇe svalakṣaṇe dṛṣṭe 'nya smaraṇasya kiṃ vartate asti ca tat /
analyzed: anyasmin asādhāraṇe sva lakṣaṇe dṛṣṭe smaraṇasya kim vartate asti ca tat

original: tena manyamahe dṛṣṭam ubhayānugataṃ rūpam iti //
analyzed: tena manyamahe dṛṣṭam ubhaya anugatam rūpam iti

original: kiṃ ca vyaktyantaradarśane 'pi sa evāyaṃ gaur iti pratyabhijñāyate /
analyzed: kim ca vyakti antara darśane saḥ eva ayam gauḥ iti pratyabhijñāyate

original: tasyāś ca prāmāṇyaṃ darśitam darśayiṣyate ca vistarataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge /
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca prāmāṇyam darśitam darśayiṣyate ca vistarataḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge

original: tasmāt anugatarūpaviṣayaiva sā pratyabhijñā vyaktibhedasya vispaṣṭasiddhatvāt //
analyzed: tasmāt anugata rūpa viṣayā eva sā pratyabhijñā vyakti bhedasya vispaṣṭa siddha tvāt

original: yatra ca laghutaraparimāṇatilam udgādipracayasannidhāne vicchin na sikthasvalakṣaṇaṃ nāsti tatrānuvṛttam eva rūpam indriyeṇa gṛhyate /
analyzed: yatra ca laghutara parimāṇa tilam udga ādi pracaya sannidhāne vicchid na siktha sva lakṣaṇam na asti tatra anuvṛttam eva rūpam indriyeṇa gṛhyate

original: ata nirvikalpakakevalāyām eva vyāvṛttavat anugatarūpāvabhāsān na sāmāṇyāpahnavo bhedau dvāv api vāstavau //
analyzed: nirvikalpaka kevalāyām eva vyāvṛtta vat anugata rūpa avabhāsāt na sāmāṇya apahnavaḥ bhedau dvau api vāstavau

original: sāmānyam idam ity evaṃ kutas tatrānupagraḥaḥ /
analyzed: sāmānyam idam iti evam kutas

original: vyāvṛttam idam ity evaṃ kiṃ vā buddhiḥ svalakṣaṇe /
analyzed: vyāvṛttam idam iti evam kim vā buddhiḥ sva lakṣaṇe

original: samānavṛttisāpekṣaṃ na ca sāmānyavedanam /
analyzed: samāna vṛtti sāpekṣam na ca sāmānya vedanam

original: tatra sannihitatvāt tu vyaktivan nānupagrahaḥ //
analyzed: tatra sannihita tvāt tu vyakti vat na anupagrahaḥ

original: samānavṛttyapekṣatvāt sāmānyasyānupagrahe /
analyzed: samāna vṛtti apekṣa tvāt sāmānyasya an upagrahe

original: viśeṣo 'pi hi mā grāhi vyāvṛttiṃ sa hy apekṣate //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ u pi hi mā vyāvṛttim sa hi apekṣate

original: anuvṛttir hi yeṣv asya kā teṣāṃ grahaṇe gatiḥ vyāvttir api yebhyo 'sya yā teṣāṃ grahaṇe gatiḥ //
analyzed: anuvṛttiḥ hi yeṣu asya kā teṣām grahaṇe gatiḥ vyāvttiḥ api yebhyaḥ yā teṣām grahaṇe gatiḥ

original: athānuvṛttivyāvṛttinairapekṣyeṇa kevalam /
analyzed: atha anuvṛtti vyāvṛtti nairapekṣyeṇa kevalam

original: vastv eva gṛhyate kāmaṃ kīdṛk tad iti kathyatām //
analyzed: vastu eva gṛhyate kāmam kīdṛś tat iti kathyatām

original: nirvikalpakavelāyāṃ nirdeṣṭuṃ tan na śakyate /
analyzed: nirvikalpaka velāyām nirdeṣṭum tat na śakyate

original: tad utthās tūbhayatrāpi sākṣyaṃ dadati niścayāḥ //
analyzed: tad utthāḥ tu ubhayatra api sākṣyam dadati niścayāḥ

original: vastuno 'ṅgīkṛtā prājñaiḥ ata evobhayātmatā /
analyzed: vastunaḥ ṅgīkṛtā prājñaiḥ atas eva ubhaya ātma tā

original: yau brūtas tv ekarūpatvaṃ tāv ubhāv api bāliśau //
analyzed: yau brūtaḥ tu eka rūpa tvam tau ubhau api bāliśau

original: yad apy abhihitam itaretaraviruddharūpasamāveśa ekatra vastuni nopapadyata iti tad api na samyak //
analyzed: yat api abhihitam itaretara viruddha rūpa samāveśaḥ ekatra vastuni na upapadyate iti tat api na samyak

original: parasparavirodho 'pi nāstīha tad avedanāt /
analyzed: paraspara virodhaḥ na asti iha tat avedanāt

original: ekabādhena nānyatra dhīḥ śuktrajatādivat //
analyzed: eka bādhena na anyatra dhīḥ śuktra jata ādi vat

original: yatra hi virodho bhavati tatraikatararūpopamardena rūpāntaram upalabyate /
analyzed: yatra hi virodhaḥ bhavati tatra ekatara rūpa upamardena rūpa antaram upalabyate

original: prakṛte tu naivam iti ko virodhārthaḥ chāyātāpāv api yady ekatra dṛśyete kiṃ kena viruddham abhidhīyeta adarśanāt tu tadviruddham uktam /
analyzed: prakṛte tu na evam iti kaḥ virodha arthaḥ chāyā tāpau api yadi ekatra dṛśyete kim kena viruddham abhidhīyeta adarśanāt tu tat viruddham uktam

original: na caivam ihādarśanam ity avirodhaḥ //
analyzed: na ca evam iha adarśanam iti avirodhaḥ

original: ata eveha mithyātvaṃ eti nānyatarā matiḥ /
analyzed: atas eva iha mithyātvam eti na anyatarā matiḥ

original: na hy anyonyopamardena buddhidvitayasaṃbhavaḥ //
analyzed: na hi anyonya upamardena buddhi dvitaya saṃbhavaḥ

original: tathā cāha [yathā kalmāṣavarṇasya yatheṣṭaṃ varṇaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca āha yathā kalmāṣa varṇasya yathā iṣṭam varṇa niścayaḥ

original: citratvāt vastuno 'py evaṃ bhedābhedāvadhāraṇā] iti //
analyzed: citra tvāt vastunaḥ pi evam bheda abheda avadhāraṇāḥ iti

original: ity evam avirodhena bhedābhedāvadhāraṇāt /
analyzed: iti evam avirodhena bheda abheda avadhāraṇāt

original: ubhayātmakataivāstu vastūnāṃ bhaṭṭapakṣavat //
analyzed: ubhaya ātmaka tā evā astu vastūnām bhaṭṭa pakṣa vat

original: etat tu vṛttivikalpādibhyaḥ bibhyatevābhyuparataṃ tatra bhavateti tiṣṭhatu tāvat kim atra vimardena vyaktivyatiriktaiva jāiḥ vyaktiṣu vartata iti brūmaḥ //
analyzed: etat tu vṛtti vikalpa ādibhyaḥ bibhyatā iva abhyuparatam tatra bhavatā iti tiṣṭhatu tāvat kim atra vimardena vyakti vyatiriktā eva jāiḥ vyaktiṣu vartate iti brūmaḥ

original: yac ca vṛttivikalpādidūṣaṇaṃ tatra varṇitam /
analyzed: yat ca vṛtti vikalpa ādi dūṣaṇam tatra varṇitam

original: tat pratyakṣamahimnaiva sarvaṃ pratihataṃ bhavet //
analyzed: tat pratyakṣa mahimnā eva sarvam pratihatam bhavet

original: yat tāvad avādi bhedena kuvalayāmalakādivat anavabhāsanād iti tatra pratītibhedo darśita eva //
analyzed: yat tāvat avādi bhedena kuvalaya āmalaka ādi vat anavabhāsanāt iti tatra pratīti bhedaḥ darśitaḥ eva

original: yat tu deśabhedenāgrahaṇāt tadagrahe tadbadhyabhāvād iti tatra tadā śritatvaṃ kāraṇaṃ jāteḥ na tv asattvam /
analyzed: yat tu deśa bhedena agrahaṇāt tad agrahe tad badhya bhāvāt iti tatra tadā āśrita tvam kāraṇam jāteḥ na tu asattvam

original: vyaktivṛttitvāj jāteḥ pṛthagdeśatayā 'nupalambhaḥ tadagrahe tadagraho vā na punas tad atiriktāyā abhāvād eveti //
analyzed: vyakti vṛtti tvāt jāteḥ pṛthak deśa tayā nupalambhaḥ tad agrahe tad agrahaḥ vā na punar tat atiriktāyāḥ abhāvāt eva iti

original: yad apy uktaṃ vṛttyanupapatter iti tatrāpy ucyate pratipiṇḍaṃ kārtsnyena jātir vartata iti /
analyzed: yat api uktam vṛtti anupapatteḥ iti tatra api ucyate pratipiṇḍam kārtsnyena jātiḥ vartate iti

original: piṇḍāntare tadupalambho na syād iti cet kiṃ kurmaḥ kam upalabhāmahe piṇḍāntare 'pi tadupalambho 'sty eva /
analyzed: piṇḍa antare tad upalambhaḥ na syāt iti ced kim kurmaḥ kam upalabhāmahe piṇḍa antare asti eva

original: kathaṃ ca bhavantam enaṃ nihnumahe ekadeśāstu jāter na santy eva yair asyāvartanaṃ brūmaḥ //
analyzed: katham ca bhavantam enam nihnumahe eka deśāḥ tu jāteḥ na santi eva yaiḥ asya āvartanam brūmaḥ

original: kvedam anyatra dṛṣṭaṃ cet aho nipuṇatā tava dṛṣṭāntaṃ yācase yas tvaṃ pratyakṣe 'py anumānavat //
analyzed: kva idam anyatra dṛṣṭam ced aho nipuṇa tā tava dṛṣṭāntam yācase yaḥ tvam pratyakṣe pi anumāna vat

original: kiṃ nāmadheyaiṣā vṛttir iti cet na nāmadheyaṃ asyā jānīmaḥ piṇḍasamavetā jātir ity etāvad eva pracakṣmahe //
analyzed: kim nāmadheyā eṣā vṛttiḥ iti ced na nāmadheyam asyāḥ jānīmaḥ piṇḍa samavetā jātiḥ iti etāvat eva pracakṣmahe

original: nanu ayutasiddhayoḥ sambandhaḥ samavāyaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ayuta siddhayoḥ sambandhaḥ samavāyaḥ

original: sa ca vipratiṣedhād eva nirastaḥ na śakyate nirasitum pratītibhedād bhedo 'sti deśabhedas tu neṣyate /
analyzed: sa ca vipratiṣedhāt eva nirastaḥ na śakyate nirasitum pratīti bhedāt bhedaḥ sti deśa bhedaḥ tu na iṣyate

original: tenātra kalpyate vṛttiḥ samavāyaḥ sa ucyate //
analyzed: tena atra kalpyate vṛttiḥ samavāyaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: avayavāvayavinoḥ guṇaguṇinoś ceyam eva vṛttiḥ /
analyzed: avayava avayavinoḥ guṇa guṇinoḥ ca iyam eva vṛttiḥ

original: tayor arthāntaratvam upariṣṭād darśayiṣyate /
analyzed: tayoḥ artha antara tvam upariṣṭāt darśayiṣyate

original: darśitaṃ ca amunaiva mārgeṇa deśabhedaś ca tayor nāstīti vispaṣṭam ayutasiddhatvam //
analyzed: darśitam ca amunā eva mārgeṇa deśa bhedaḥ ca tayoḥ na asti iti vispaṣṭam ayuta siddha tvam

original: yad apy ucyate [nāniṣpannasya sambandhaḥ niṣpattau yutasiddhatā] iti tad api parihṛtaṃ ācāryaiḥ [jātiṃ ca sambaddhaṃ cety ekaḥ kālaḥ] iti vadadbhiḥ /
analyzed: yat api ucyate na aniṣpannasya sambandhaḥ niṣpattau yuta siddha tā iti tat api parihṛtam ācāryaiḥ jātim ca sambaddham ca iti ekaḥ kālaḥ iti vadadbhiḥ

original: sarvaṃ caitad abādhitapratītibalāt kalpyate na svaśāstraparibhāṣayā //
analyzed: sarvam ca etat abādhita pratīti balāt kalpyate na sva śāstra paribhāṣayā

original: vibhūnām api sambandhaḥ parasparam asaṃbhavād eva neṣyate na svaśāstraparibhāṣaṇāt /
analyzed: vibhūnām api sambandhaḥ parasparam asaṃbhavāt eva na iṣyate na sva śāstra paribhāṣaṇāt

original: na saṃyogaḥ teṣām aprāpter abhāvāt /
analyzed: na saṃyogaḥ teṣām aprāpteḥ abhāvāt

original: aprāptipūrvikā hi prāptiḥ saṃyogaḥ /
analyzed: aprāpti pūrvikā hi prāptiḥ saṃyogaḥ

original: na samavāyaḥ tadāśritasya tasyānupalaṃbhād ity alaṃ prasaṅgena ye ceha vṛttī sraksūtrabhūtakaṇṭhaguṇādiṣu /
analyzed: na samavāyaḥ tad āśritasya tasya anupalaṃbhāt iti alam prasaṅgena ye ca iha vṛttī srak sūtra bhūta kaṇṭha guṇa ādiṣu

original: jātyādīnām anaṃśatvāt tābhyāṃ vṛttr vilakṣaṇā //
analyzed: jāti ādīnām an aṃśa tvāt tābhyām vṛttr vilakṣaṇā

original: tasmāt vṛttyanupapatter ity adūṣaṇam //
analyzed: tasmāt vṛtti anupapatteḥ iti adūṣaṇam

original: yad api sarvagatatvaṃ piṇḍagatatvaṃ ca vikalpya dūṣitam tad api yat kiñcit /
analyzed: yat api sarvagata tvam piṇḍa gata tvam ca vikalpya dūṣitam tat api yat kiñcid

original: yathā pratītir ādiśati bhagavatī tathā vayam abhyupagacchāmaḥ //
analyzed: yathā pratītiḥ ādiśati bhagavatī tathā vayam abhyupagacchāmaḥ

original: sarvasarvagatā jātir iti tāvad upeyate /
analyzed: sarva sarva gatā jātiḥ iti tāvat upeyate

original: sarvatrāgrahaṇaṃ tasyāḥ vyaṃjakavyaktyasannidheḥ //
analyzed: sarvatra agrahaṇam tasyāḥ vyaṃjaka vyakti asannidheḥ

original: vyaktir vyaṃjakatām eti jāter dṛṣṭyaiva nānyathā /
analyzed: vyaktiḥ vyaṃjaka tām eti jāteḥ dṛṣṭyā eva na anyathā

original: dṛṣṭir yatra yadā vyakteḥ tadā tatraiva tanmatiḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭiḥ yatra yadā vyakteḥ tadā tatra eva tad matiḥ

original: sarvata vidyate jātiḥ na tu sarvatra dṛśyate /
analyzed: sarvata vidyate jātiḥ na tu sarvatra dṛśyate

original: tad abhivyaṃjikā yatra vyaktitas tatraiva dṛśyate //
analyzed: tat abhivyaṃjikā yatra vyaktitaḥ tatra eva dṛśyate

original: vyakter anyatra sattve 'sya kiṃ pramāṇaṃ tad ucyate /
analyzed: vyakteḥ anyatra sattve kim pramāṇam tat ucyate

original: ihāpy ānīyam ānāyāṃ gavi gotvopalambhanam //
analyzed: iha api ānīyam ānāyām gavi go tva upalambhanam

original: gopiṇḍena sahaitasyāḥ na cāgamanasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: go piṇḍena saha etasyāḥ na ca āgamana saṃbhavaḥ

original: dehenevātmanas tasmāt ihāpy astitvam iṣyatām //
analyzed: dehena iva ātmanaḥ tasmāt iha api astitvam iṣyatām

original: abhivyaktis tu tatkālā yatkālaṃ vyaktidarśanam /
analyzed: abhivyaktiḥ tu tad kālā yad kālam vyakti darśanam

original: tasmāt sakṛd abhivyaktā nānyadā 'pi pratīyate //
analyzed: tasmāt sakṛt abhivyaktā na anyadā pi pratīyate

original: abhivyaktitaś ca taddeśā yaddeśā vyaktir īkṣyate /
analyzed: abhivyaktitaḥ ca tad deśā yad deśā vyaktiḥ īkṣyate

original: tasmāt tasmād abhivyaktā na deśe 'nyatra dṛśyate //
analyzed: tasmāt tasmāt abhivyaktā na deśe nyatra dṛśyate

original: vyaktisarvagatatve 'pi svayūthyaiḥ kaiścid āśrite /
analyzed: vyakti sarva gata tve pi sva yūthyaiḥ kaiścid āśrite

original: bhaviṣyaty adya jātāyāṃ gavi godhīs tathā grahāt //
analyzed: bhaviṣyati adya jātāyām gavi godhīḥ tathā grahāt

original: jāyamānaiva hi vaktiḥ jāyate pratiyoginī /
analyzed: jāyamānā eva hi vaktiḥ jāyate pratiyoginī

original: eka eva hi kālo 'syāḥ jāteḥ sambandhajanmanoḥ //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva hi syāḥ jāteḥ sambandha janmanoḥ

original: neha jāteḥ puro 'stitvaṃ na ca saṃkrāntir anyataḥ /
analyzed: na iha jāteḥ puras stitvam na ca saṃkrāntiḥ anyatas

original: kin tu svahetoḥ sā vyaktiḥ tādṛśy evopajāyate //
analyzed: kin tu sva hetoḥ sā vyaktiḥ tādṛśī eva upajāyate

original: katham etad itīdaṃ ca ye vā paryanuyuṃjate /
analyzed: katham etat iti idam ca ye vā paryanuyuṃjate

original: idam apy aparaṃ hanta tena paryanuyujyatām //
analyzed: idam api aparam hanta tena paryanuyujyatām

original: vṛṣaḥ viśaṅgo gauḥ kṛṣṇā sā ca nīlatṛṇāśinī /
analyzed: vṛṣaḥ viśaṅgaḥ gauḥ kṛṣṇā sā ca nīla tṛṇa āśinī

original: tābhyām utpādito vatsaḥ kathaṃ bhavati pāṇḍaraḥ yathā rūpādisambaddhā sā vyaktir upalabhyate /
analyzed: tābhyām utpāditaḥ vatsaḥ katham bhavati pāṇḍaraḥ yathā rūpa ādi sambaddhā sā vyaktiḥ upalabhyate

original: tathaiva jātiyukteti kā te vyasanasantatiḥ agovyāvṛttatāyāṃ vā naiṣa praśno nivartate /
analyzed: tathā eva jāti yuktā iti kā te vyasana santatiḥ a go vyāvṛtta tāyām vā na eṣa praśnaḥ nivartate

original: kasmād agonivṛttaṃ tat adya jātaṃ svalakṣaṇam //
analyzed: kasmāt ago nivṛttam tat adya jātam sva lakṣaṇam

original: tasmād vastusvabhāvasya vidhitvā 'nanuyojyatām /
analyzed: tasmāt vastu svabhāvasya

original: cyodyacuncutvam utsṛjya pratipattir nirūpyatām //
analyzed: utsṛjya pratipattiḥ nirūpyatām

original: pratipattiś ca viśeṣeṣv iva sāmānyeṣu ca nirapavādā darśitaiva /
analyzed: pratipattiḥ ca viśeṣeṣu iva sāmānyeṣu ca nirapavādā darśitā eva

original: tasmāt viśeṣavat apratyākhyeyaṃ sāmāṇyam //
analyzed: tasmāt viśeṣavat a pratyākhyeyam sāmāṇyam

original: tatraitat syāt viśeṣātmana eva vastunaḥ sāmānyajñānajananaśaktiyuktatvāt kiṃ sāmānyakalpanayeti tad ayuktam viśeṣavat pratyakṣatvāt sāmānyasya kaḥ kalpanārthaḥ yadi hi kāryānumeyaṃ sāmānyaṃ kalpayema tata evam anuyujyemahi kāryasyāpy anyathāsiddheḥ kiṃ tatkalpanayeti /
analyzed: tatra etat syāt viśeṣa ātmanaḥ eva vastunaḥ sāmānya jñāna janana śakti yukta tvāt kim sāmānya kalpanayā iti tat ayuktam viśeṣa vat pratyakṣa tvāt sāmānyasya kaḥ kalpanā arthaḥ yadi hi kārya anumeyam sāmānyam kalpayema tatas evam anuyujyemahi kāryasya api anyathā siddheḥ kim tad kalpanayā iti

original: pratyakṣe tu sāmānye ko 'yam anuyogaḥ kā ceyam anuvṛttijñānotpādikā śaktiḥ viśeṣebhyo 'vyatiriktāḥ vyatiriktā vā nityā anityā vā iti vikalpyamānā vācoyuktyantareṇa jātir eva kathitā bhavati na vā kiñcid iti yat kiñcid etat //
analyzed: pratyakṣe tu sāmānye kaḥ yam anuyogaḥ kā ca iyam anuvṛtti jñāna utpādikā śaktiḥ viśeṣebhyaḥ vyatiriktāḥ vyatiriktāḥ vā nityāḥ anityāḥ vā iti vikalpyamānā vācoyukti antareṇa jātiḥ eva kathitā bhavati na vā kiñcid iti yat kiñcid etat

original: nanu yathā gotvādijātiḥ niyatāsv eva vyaktiṣu vartate nāsāmaṃjasyena tathā kābhiścid eva vyaktibhiḥ kācid gavādibuddhir janyate iti naitad evam viṣayātiśayavyatirekeṇa pratyayātiśayānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: nanu yathā go tva ādi jātiḥ niyatāsu eva vyaktiṣu vartate na āsāmaṃjasyena tathā kābhiścid eva vyaktibhiḥ kācid gavādi buddhiḥ janyate iti na etat evam viṣaya atiśaya vyatirekeṇa pratyaya atiśaya anupapatteḥ

original: upāyātiśaye tu pratyayātiśayakāriṇīṣyamāṇe viṣayātiśayaṃ prati ko dveṣaḥ siddhe ca viṣayātiśaye durapahnavaṃ sāmānyam //
analyzed: upāya atiśaye tu pratyaya atiśaya kāriṇī iṣyamāṇe viṣaya atiśayam prati kaḥ dveṣaḥ siddhe ca viṣaya atiśaye durapahnavam sāmānyam

original: nanu ca anuvṛttibuddhiḥ vinā 'pi sāmānyāntareṇa sāmānyāntareṣu dṛśyata eveti ko 'tra visraṃbhaḥ ucyate na cāśeṣeṇa paṃcāśad bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: nanu ca anuvṛtti buddhiḥ vinā sāmānya antareṇa sāmānya antareṣu dṛśyate eva iti kaḥ tra visraṃbhaḥ ucyate na ca aśeṣeṇa paṃcāśat bhavitum arhati

original: yadi hi senāvanādipratyayāḥ karituragadhavakhadirādivyatiriktam artham anapekṣya jāyamānā mithyā bhavanti kim etāvatā ghaṭādi pratyayair api mithyā bhavitavyam /
analyzed: yadi hi senā vana ādi pratyayāḥ kari turaga dhava khadira ādi vyatiriktam artham an apekṣya jāyamānāḥ mithyā bhavanti kim etāvatā ghaṭa ādi pratyayaiḥ api mithyā bhavitavyam

original: bādhakasadasadbhāvanibandhanā hi vaitathyā vaitathasthitiḥ pratyayānām /
analyzed: bādhaka sat asat bhāva nibandhanā hi vaitathyāḥ vaitatha sthitiḥ pratyayānām

original: tatra sattādau sāmānyāntaravirahān mithyā pratyayāḥ upādhinā kenacit pravartate na tv evaṃ gavādāv iti yat kiñcid etat /
analyzed: tatra sattā ādau sāmānya antara virahāt mithyā pratyayāḥ upādhinā kenacid pravartate na tu evam gavādau iti yat kiñcid etat

original: tad uktam [tasmād ekasya bhinneṣu yā vṛttis tannibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam tasmāt ekasya bhinneṣu yā vṛttiḥ tad nibandhanaḥ

original: sāmānyaśabdas sattādau ekadhīkaraṇena vā] iti //
analyzed: sāmānya śabdaḥ sattā ādau eka dhīkaraṇena vā iti

original: nanu ihāpy ekārthakriyākāritvopādhinibandhana ekākārapratyayaḥ setsyatīty uktam satyam uktam ayuktaṃ tu ekārthakriyākāritvasyaivāsiddheḥ //
analyzed: nanu iha api eka artha kriyā kāri tva upādhi nibandhanaḥ eka ākāra pratyayaḥ setsyati iti uktam satyam uktam ayuktam tu eka artha kriyā kāri tvasya eva asiddheḥ

original: yat tūktaṃ [ekapratyavamarśasya hetutvād dhīr abhedinī] iti tad apy asāṃpratam pratyavamarśasyāpy ekatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: yat tu uktam eka pratyavamarśasya hetu tvāt dhīḥ abhedinī iti tat api asāṃpratam pratyavamarśasya api eka tva anupapatteḥ

original: na hi bahubhir darśanair eko vikalpaḥ saṃbhūya sādhyate api tu nānādarśanānantaraṃ tatsāmarthyalabdhajanmāno vikalpā api bhedenaivollasanti /
analyzed: na hi bahubhiḥ darśanaiḥ ekaḥ vikalpaḥ saṃbhūya sādhyate api tu nānā darśana anantaram tad sāmarthya labdha janmānaḥ vikalpāḥ api bhedena evā ullasanti

original: na ca teṣāṃ kim api kāryāntaram asti yena te ekatām adhigaccheyuḥ //
analyzed: na ca teṣām kim api kārya antaram asti yena te ekatām adhigaccheyuḥ

original: kena ca vikalpānām ekatvaṃ gṛhyate na darśanena tasya dṛśyaviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: kena ca vikalpānām eka tvam gṛhyate na darśanena tasya dṛśya viṣaya tvāt

original: na vikalpāntareṇa sarvavikalpānām āropitārthaparyavasitatvena svākāraviṣayatvena vā parasparabhedābhedaparicchedasāmarthyāsaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: na vikalpa antareṇa sarva vikalpānām āropita artha paryavasita tvena sva ākāra viṣaya tvena vā paraspara bheda abheda pariccheda sāmarthya asaṃbhavāt

original: brūyāt vikalpollikhyamānākārabhedānavagamād vikalpānām aikyam /
analyzed: brūyāt vikalpa ullikhyamāna ākāra bheda anavagamāt vikalpānām aikyam

original: yādṛśa eva ekaśābaleyādisvalakṣaṇadarśanāntarabhuvā 'pi vikalpenollikhita ākāraḥ gaur iti tādṛśa eva gopiṇḍāntaradarśanāntarajanmanāpīti viṣayābhedāt tad aikyam ucyate /
analyzed: yādṛśaḥ eva eka śābaleya ādi sva lakṣaṇa darśana antara bhuvā vikalpena ullikhitaḥ ākāraḥ gauḥ iti tādṛśaḥ eva go piṇḍa antara darśana antara janmanā api iti viṣaya abhedāt tat aikyam ucyate

original: tadullikhyamāne hi viṣaye bhedo na pratibhāsate ity ata eṣa vikalpo bhinnāny api darśanāni miśrīkaroti darśanopārūḍhasya bhedasyāgrahaṇād iti tad etad api na hṛdayaṃgamam abhidhīyate /
analyzed: tat ullikhyamāne hi viṣaye bhedaḥ na pratibhāsate iti atas eṣa vikalpaḥ bhinnāni api darśanāni miśrīkaroti darśana upārūḍhasya bhedasya agrahaṇāt iti tat etat api na hṛdayaṃgamam abhidhīyate

original: vikalpās tāvad vijñānakṣaṇasvabhāvatvād anyonyaṃ bhinnā eva bhavanti //
analyzed: vikalpāḥ tāvat vijñāna kṣaṇa svabhāva tvāt anyonyam bhinnāḥ eva bhavanti

original: yas tu vikalpollikhita ākāro 'nupalabhyamānabhedaḥ sa tebhyo vyatiriktaḥ avyatirikto vā vyatiriktaś cet sāmānyam evedaṃ nāmāntareṇoktam bhavati /
analyzed: yaḥ tu vikalpa ullikhitaḥ ākāraḥ n upalabhyamāna bhedaḥ sa tebhyaḥ vyatiriktaḥ a vyatiriktaḥ vā vyatiriktaḥ ced sāmānyam eva idam nāma antareṇa uktam bhavati

original: avāsavatvakṛto viśeṣa iti cet na avāstavatve yuktyabhāvāt //
analyzed: avāsava tva kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti ced na avāstava tve yukti abhāvāt

original: avyairiktaś cet sa ākāraḥ tarhi vikalpasvarūpavad bhidyata eveti kathaṃ tadaikhyam kathaṃ vā tadaikyana bhinnānām api darśanānāṃ miśrīkaraṇam avakalpate api ca re mūḍha sāmānyānabhyupagame kutastya ekākāravikalpotpādaḥ iti paryanuyuktena tvayā yadi vikalpaikyād ity ucyate tadetaretarāśrayaṃ bhavati kāryaikyāc ca vikalpaikyaṃ vikalpaikyāc ca kāryaikyam iti //
analyzed: a vyairiktaḥ ced saḥ ākāraḥ tarhi vikalpa svarūpa vat bhidyate eva iti katham tad aikhyam katham vā tad aikyana bhinnānām api darśanānām miśrīkaraṇam avakalpate api ca re mūḍha sāmānya anabhyupagame kutastyaḥ eka ākāra vikalpa utpādaḥ iti paryanuyuktena tvayā yadi vikalpa aikyāt iti ucyate tadā itaretara āśrayam bhavati kārya aikyāt ca vikalpa aikyam vikalpa aikyāt ca kārya aikyam iti

original: vikalpaikyaṃ kāryaikyam iti tu sutarāṃ anantaraṃ vikalpaikyaṃ vikalpaikyād evety uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: vikalpa aikyam kārya aikyam iti tu sutarām anantaram vikalpa aikyam vikalpa aikyāt eva iti uktam bhavati

original: kathaṃ caivam anunmatto brūyāt tasmāt [ekapratyavamarśasya hetutvād dhir abhedinī-] ti vyāmūḍhabhāṣitam //
analyzed: katham ca evam an unmattaḥ brūyāt tasmāt eka pratyavamarśasya hetu tvāt dhiḥ abhedinī ti vyāmūḍha bhāṣitam

original: yad api vikalpānāṃ śabdānāṃ cānyāpohaviṣayatvasiddhaye pralapitam [ekasyārthasvabhāvasya] ity ādi tad api yat kiñcid etat sarvātmanā hi dṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ punar na hi na dṛśyate pradarśitaṃ hi prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhītagrāhiṇām api //
analyzed: yat api vikalpānām śabdānām ca anya apoha viṣaya tva siddhaye pralapitam ekasya artha svabhāvasya iti ādi tat api yat kiñcid etat sarva ātmanā hi dṛṣṭaḥ rthaḥ punar na hi na dṛśyate pradarśitam hi prāmāṇyam gṛhīta grāhiṇām api

original: kṣaṇabhaṅge niraste ca deśakālādibhedataḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇa bhaṅge niraste ca deśa kāla ādi bhedataḥ

original: gṛhitasyāpi bhāvasya grahaṇaṃ na na yujyate //
analyzed: gṛhitasya api bhāvasya grahaṇam na na yujyate

original: api cāsmanmate bhinnaiḥ dharmair yuktasya dharmiṇaḥ /
analyzed: api ca asmad mate bhinnaiḥ dharmaiḥ yuktasya dharmiṇaḥ

original: dharmo 'sya kenacit kaścit pratyayena grahīṣyate //
analyzed: dharmaḥ sya kenacid kaścid pratyayena grahīṣyate

original: vicitrasahakāryādiśaktibhedaś ca dharmiṇaḥ /
analyzed: vicitra sahakāri ādi śakti bhedaḥ ca dharmiṇaḥ

original: nānopādhyupakārāṅgaśakyabhinnātmatā kutaḥ yadi ca nāma nirvikalpakena sarvātmanā paricchinnaṃ vastu punaḥ paricchindanti vikalpāntarāṇi vaiphalyam aśnuvīran kim etāvatā teṣām apratīyamānārthagrāhitā kalpayituṃ śakyate na hi viratapipāsasya himakarapaṭalam aphalam iti tad eva rajatam iti kalpayituṃ pāryatām /
analyzed: nānā upādhi upakāra aṅga śakya bhinna ātmatā kutas yadi ca nāma nirvikalpakena sarva ātmanā paricchinnam vastu punar paricchindanti vikalpa antarāṇi vaiphalyam aśnuvīran kim etāvatā teṣām apratīyamāna artha grāhi tā kalpayitum śakyate na hi virata pipāsasya himakara paṭalam aphalam iti tat eva rajatam iti kalpayitum pāryatām

original: tasmāt durāśāmātram etat //
analyzed: tasmāt durāśā mātram etat

original: itthaṃ cānyāpohaniṣedhātmani bāhye vikalpānāṃ śabdānāṃ ca viṣaya iṣyamāṇe bhaṭṭakumārilopanyastadustaradūṣaṇāsāravāraṇakāraṇaṃ na hi kiñcid utpaśyāmaḥ //
analyzed: ittham ca anya apoha niṣedha ātmani bāhye vikalpānām śabdānām ca viṣaye iṣyamāṇe bhaṭṭa kumārila upanyasta dustara dūṣaṇa āsāra vāraṇa kāraṇam na hi kiñcid utpaśyāmaḥ

original: yad api taddūṣaṇāpaninīṣayā vikalpapratibimbakam āropitākāramātravyāvṛtticchāyoparaktaṃ kim api parikalpitaṃ tad api na vyavahārapadavīm avataritum utasahate //
analyzed: yat api tad dūṣaṇa apaninīṣayā vikalpa pratibimbakam āropita ākāra mātra vyāvṛtti chāyā uparaktam kim api parikalpitam tat api na vyavahāra padavīm avataritum

original: vikalpo nāma bodhātmā sa ca svacchaḥ svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: vikalpaḥ nāma bodha ātmā sa ca svacchaḥ svabhāvataḥ

original: nāsāv itarasaṃparkād ṛte kaluṣatāmiyāt //
analyzed: na asau itara saṃparkāt ṛte kaluṣa tām iyāt

original: nūnam abhyupagantavyaṃ kiñcid asyoparaṃjakam /
analyzed: nūnam abhyupagantavyam kiñcid asya uparaṃjakam

original: āntaraṃ vāsanārūpaṃ bāhyaṃ vā viṣayātmakam //
analyzed: āntaram vāsanā rūpam bāhyam vā viṣaya ātmakam

original: yat punar vidyate nāntaḥ na bahiḥ tena rajyate /
analyzed: yat punar vidyate na antar na bahis tena rajyate

original: vijñānam iti māyaiṣā mahatī dhūrtanirmitā //
analyzed: vijñānam iti māyā eṣā mahatī dhūrta nirmitā

original: viṣayā eva buddhīnāṃ āṃjasyenoparaṃjakāḥ /
analyzed: viṣayāḥ eva buddhīnām āṃjasyena uparaṃjakāḥ

original: vāsanāviṣayajñānajanyatvān na tathoditāḥ //
analyzed: vāsanā viṣaya jñāna janya tvāt na tathā uditāḥ

original: tasmāt tatra deśāntarādau vasatā kenacid arthena buddhayo rajyantām ekāntāsatā tu kenacid āropitena taduparaṃjanam aghaṭamānaṃ monorarhaprāyam /
analyzed: tasmāt tatra deśa antara ādau vasatā kenacid arthena buddhayaḥ rajyantām ekānta asatā tu kenacid āropitena tad uparaṃjanam a ghaṭamānam

original: na caikāntāsan nākāra āropayitum api śakyate //
analyzed: na ca ekānta asat na ākāraḥ āropayitum api śakyate

original: api ca darśanapṛṣṭhabhāvino vikalpāḥ tadvyāpārakāriṇaḥ vyāvṛttaṃ spraṣṭum asamarthā vyāvṛttimātram avalambanta iti yad ucyate tatra dṛśyasya sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛttatvāt ubhayavyāvṛttir astīti tāṃ spṛśanto vikalpāḥ kathaṃ vijātīyavyāvṛttim eva spṛśeyuḥ ubhayāvamarśe saty eṣāṃ paunaruktyād ānarthakyam iti cet nānarthakyam pramāṇavarge nipatantaḥ kāmam anarthakā bhavantu arthāntaraṃ vā ''lambantām vyāvṛttiṃ tv avalambamānā aṃśato neti na śraddhmahe //
analyzed: api ca darśana pṛṣṭha bhāvinaḥ vikalpāḥ tad vyāpāra kāriṇaḥ vyāvṛttam spraṣṭum asamarthāḥ vyāvṛtti mātram avalambantaḥ iti yat ucyate tatra dṛśyasya sajātīya vijātīya vyāvṛtta tvāt ubhaya vyāvṛttiḥ asti iti tām spṛśantaḥ vikalpāḥ katham vijātīya vyāvṛttim eva spṛśeyuḥ ubhaya avamarśe sati eṣām paunaruktyāt ānarthakyam iti ced na ānarthakyam pramāṇa varge nipatantaḥ kāmam anarthakāḥ bhavantu artha antaram vā lambantām v

original: sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛttyor na ca bhinnatā /
analyzed: sajātīya vijātīya vyāvṛttyoḥ na ca bhinna tā

original: yato 'nyatarasaṃsparśo vikalpe na prakalpate //
analyzed: yatas nyatara saṃsparśaḥ vikalpe na prakalpate

original: sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛttyavamarśe tu darśanavad asādhāraṇagrāhiṇa eva vikalpāḥ syur iti sāmānyanibandhanasaṃbandhagrahaṇādivyavadārābhāvāt śabdānumāne pralayaṃ pratipadyeyātām //
analyzed: sajātīya vijātīya vyāvṛtti avamarśe tu darśana vat asādhāraṇa grāhiṇaḥ eva vikalpāḥ syuḥ iti sāmānya nibandhana saṃbandha grahaṇa ādi vyavadāra abhāvāt śabda anumāne pralayam pratipadyeyātām

original: vyāvṛttir api bāhyā cet tadavasthā kaumāriladūṣaṇāśaniḥ /
analyzed: vyāvṛttiḥ api bāhyā ced tad avasthā kaumārila dūṣaṇa aśaniḥ

original: āntaratve tu na tayā vikalpoparāgaḥ kartuṃ śakyaḥ /
analyzed: āntara tve tu na tayā vikalpa uparāgaḥ kartum śakyaḥ

original: nāntaḥ na bahir iti tu bhaṇitibhaṅgīmātram //
analyzed: na antar na bahis iti tu bhaṇiti bhaṅgī mātram

original: tat tādṛśaṃ kiñcit na kiñcid vā na kiṃcic cet na tena vikalpā nāmanuraṃjanasyopapādayitum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: tat tādṛśam kiñcid na kiñcid vā na kiṃcid ced na tena vikalpāḥ nāma anuraṃjanasya upapādayitum aśakya tvāt

original: atyantam asataś ca kharaviṣāṇādeḥ vyavahāraviṣayatvābhāvāt asatkhyātinirasananītim evātrottaraṃ kariṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: atyantam asataḥ ca khara viṣāṇa ādeḥ vyavahāra viṣaya tva abhāvāt asat khyāti nirasana nītim eva atra uttaram kariṣyāmaḥ

original: kiṃcic cet nūnamantaḥ bahir vā tena bhavitavyam eva /
analyzed: kiṃcid ced nūnam antar bahis vā tena bhavitavyam eva

original: ataḥ kumārilādiṣṭadūṣaṇāpaninīṣayā yo 'yam utprekṣitaḥ panthā nūtanaḥ so 'pi saṅkaṭaḥ /
analyzed: atas kumārila ādiṣṭa dūṣaṇa apaninīṣayā yaḥ yam utprekṣitaḥ panthāḥ nūtanaḥ saḥ pi saṅkaṭaḥ

original: tasmāt yathā 'dhyavasāyam eva tattvam iti yuktam //
analyzed: tasmāt yathā dhyavasāyam eva tattvam iti yuktam

original: bāhye ca vastuni śabdāntaropanīyamānabhāvābhāvasambandhādy api na na yujyate /
analyzed: bāhye ca vastuni śabda antara upanīyamāna bhāva abhāva sambandha ādi api na na yujyate

original: sarvasya gaur ityādiśabdajanitasya jñānasyāstitvādyanapekṣya sāmānyamātraviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: sarvasya gauḥ ityādi śabda janitasya jñānasya astitva ādi an apekṣya sāmānya mātra viṣaya tvāt

original: ākāṅkṣānirākaraṇāya astināstipadā ntaraṃ prayujyamānaṃ sambandhyate /
analyzed: ākāṅkṣā nirākaraṇāya astināsti padā ntaram prayujyamānam sambandhyate

original: niyatarūpatā niścitanijarūpe vastuni vastvantarasya vyavacchedanibandhanā siddhyaty eva ghaṭo ghaṭa eva na paṭa iti /
analyzed: niyata rūpa tā niścita nija rūpe vastuni vastu antarasya vyavaccheda nibandhanā eva ghaṭaḥ ghaṭaḥ eva na paṭaḥ iti

original: naitāvatā tadapoha eva pratyāyyo bhavatīty alam atikṣodena bāhyārthaviṣaya evaṃ vyavahāro ghaṭata ity ayaṃ kasmāt dṛśyavikalpyāv arthāv ekīkṛtya pravartate puruṣaḥ //
analyzed: na etāvatā tad apohaḥ eva pratyāyyaḥ bhavati iti alam ati kṣodena bāhya artha viṣaye evam vyavahāraḥ ghaṭate iti ayam kasmāt dṛśya vikalpyau arthau ekīkṛtya pravartate puruṣaḥ

original: ekīkāraś ca kīdṛk yadi pṛthaga+atiḥ tarhi mūrcchādyavasthāsāmyaṃ tatra pravṛttiḥ katham atha kim api prasphuraty artharūpam /
analyzed: ekīkāraḥ ca kīdṛṅ yadi pṛthak aatiḥ tarhi mūrcchā ādi avasthā sāmyam tatra pravṛttiḥ katham atha kim api prasphurati artha rūpam

original: tat dṛśyam cet apohavyavahṛtir aphalā 'tha dvitīyaṃ cakāsti svenākāreṇa tasmin sati sunipatite ceṣṭate kaḥ sucetāḥ sphurati yadi vikalpyaṃ dṛśyarūpeṇa kāmaṃ sa bhavati viparītapratyayo nāvivekaḥ /
analyzed: tat dṛśyam ced apoha vyavahṛtiḥ aphalā dvitīyam cakāsti svena ākāreṇa tasmin sati su nipatite ceṣṭate kaḥ su cetāḥ sphurati yadi vikalpyam dṛśya rūpeṇa kāmam sa bhavati viparīta pratyayaḥ na avivekaḥ

original: na vitatham atibījaṃ vidyate ceha kiñcit na ca ravikaranīrajñaptivad bādhakā dhīḥ //
analyzed: na vitatham ati bījam vidyate ca iha kiñcid na ca ravi kara nīra jñapti vat bādhakā dhīḥ

original: arthaprāptir ataḥ sadarthaviṣayajñānaprabandhodgatā sākṣād eva maṇiprabhāmaṇim atinyāyena kiṃ kathyate /
analyzed: artha prāptiḥ atas sat artha viṣaya jñāna prabandha udgatā sākṣāt eva maṇi prabhā maṇim ati nyāyena kim kathyate

original: prāmāṇye savikalpakasya kathite bāhyārthasiddhiḥ sathitā tadvyaktyākṛtijātivācyakalane tāvat pravartāmahe //
analyzed: prāmāṇye sa vikalpakasya kathite bāhya artha siddhiḥ tad vyakti ākṛti jāti vācya kalane tāvat pravartāmahe

original: evaṃ siddhe bāhye 'rthe nirasteṣu tadapahāriṣu tathāgatatas kareṣu adhunā vicāryate gośabdaḥ kim ākṛter vācakaḥ uta vyakteḥ atha jāteḥ iti //
analyzed: evam siddhe bāhye rthe nirasteṣu tad apahāriṣu tathāgatataḥ kareṣu adhunā vicāryate go śabdaḥ kim ākṛteḥ vācakaḥ uta vyakteḥ atha jāteḥ iti

original: tatrākṛtipadeneha saṃsthānam abhidhīyate /
analyzed: tatra ākṛti padena iha saṃsthānam abhidhīyate

original: sūtre pṛthag upādānāt na jātir jaiminīyavat //
analyzed: sūtre pṛthak upādānāt na jātiḥ jaiminīya vat

original: jaiminir hi [ākṛtis tu kriyārthatvāt] ity ākṛtiṃ jātim upadiśati /
analyzed: jaiminiḥ hi ākṛtiḥ tu kriyā artha tvāt iti ākṛtim jātim upadiśati

original: bhāṣyakāro 'pi [sāsnādiviśiṣṭā ''kṛtir iti brūmaḥ] iti bravāṇaḥ tathaiva vyavaharati /
analyzed: bhāṣyakāraḥ u pi sāsnā ādi viśiṣṭā kṛtiḥ iti brūmaḥ iti bravāṇaḥ tathā eva vyavaharati

original: vārtikakṛtā 'pi vyākhyātam [jātim evākṛtiṃ prāhuḥ vyaktir ākriyate yayā /
analyzed: vārtika kṛtā vyākhyātam jātim eva ākṛtim prāhuḥ vyaktiḥ ākriyate yayā

original: sāmānyaṃ tac ca piṇḍānāṃ ekabuddhinibandhanam] iti //
analyzed: sāmānyam tat ca piṇḍānām eka buddhi nibandhanam iti

original: iha tu [vyaktyākṛtijātayas tu padārthāḥ] iti sūtrakāraḥ pṛthag ākṛtiṃ jāter avocad iti saṃsthānam evākṛtiṃ manyate /
analyzed: iha tu vyakti ākṛti jātayaḥ tu padārthāḥ iti sūtrakāraḥ pṛthak ākṛtim jāteḥ avocat iti saṃsthānam eva ākṛtim manyate

original: loko 'pi avayavasanniveśātmikām ākṛtiṃ vyapadiśanti [yatrākṛtis tatra guṇā vasanti] iti /
analyzed: avayava sanniveśa ātmikām ākṛtim vyapadiśanti yatra ākṛtiḥ tatra guṇāḥ vasanti iti

original: tasmād avayavasanniveśa eva ākṛtir ucyate //
analyzed: tasmāt avayava sanniveśaḥ eva ākṛtiḥ ucyate

original: tasyāś ca śabdārthatopapadyate na vā iti parīkṣārhatvam asty eva na jaiminīyavad upekṣitaṃ sā yukteti /
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca śabda artha tā upapadyate na vā iti parīkṣā arha tvam asti eva na jaiminīya vat upekṣitam sā yuktā iti

original: tadvyaktyākṛtijātisannidhau prayogāt gośabdasya ko 'rtha iti vicāryate //
analyzed: tad vyakti ākṛti jāti sannidhau prayogāt go śabdasya kaḥ rthaḥ iti vicāryate

original: tatrākṛtivādinas tāvad āhuḥ prayogapratipattibhyāṃ kila śabdārthaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ākṛti vādinaḥ tāvat āhuḥ prayoga pratipattibhyām kila śabda artha niścayaḥ

original: buddhāḥ svārthe tadvyavaharantaḥ yasminn arthe gośabdaṃ prayuṃjate śrotāraś ca yam arthaṃ tataḥ pratipadyante sa tasyārthaḥ //
analyzed: buddhāḥ sva arthe tat vyavaharantaḥ yasmin arthe go śabdam prayuṃjate śrotāraḥ ca yam artham tatas pratipadyante sa tasya arthaḥ

original: tatra yadi gośabdaḥ kesarādimati na prayujyate sāsnādimati ca prayujyate tadasādhāraṇasanniveśaviṣaya evāvagamyate /
analyzed: tatra yadi go śabdaḥ kesara ādimati na prayujyate sāsnādimati ca prayujyate tat asādhāraṇa sanniveśa viṣayaḥ eva avagamyate

original: pratyakṣaviṣaye gaur ityādipadaṃ prayujyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣa viṣaye gauḥ ityādi padam prayujyate

original: pratyakṣaṃ cākṛtiviṣayam /
analyzed: pratyakṣam ca ākṛti viṣayam

original: aśvapiṇḍasanniveśād vilakṣaṇo hi gopiṇḍasanniveśa indriyeṇa pratīyate /
analyzed: aśva piṇḍa sanniveśāt vilakṣaṇaḥ hi go piṇḍa sanniveśaḥ indriyeṇa pratīyate

original: tatkṛtam eva vastūnām itaretaravailakṣaṇyam /
analyzed: tad kṛtam eva vastūnām itaretara vailakṣaṇyam

original: ataḥ pratyakṣaviṣaye padaṃ pravartamānaṃ ākṛtāv eva vartitum arhati /
analyzed: atas pratyakṣa viṣaye padam pravartamānam ākṛtau eva vartitum arhati

original: preṣaṇādikriyāyogaś ca vyaktidvāraka ākṛter bhaviṣyatīti yad uktaṃ tad ayuktaṃ prativyakti bhinnasaṃsthānadarśanāt /
analyzed: preṣaṇa ādi kriyā yogaḥ ca vyakti dvārakaḥ ākṛteḥ bhaviṣyati iti yat uktam tat ayuktam prativyakti bhinna saṃsthāna darśanāt

original: ānantyavyabhicārābhyāṃ sambandhajñaptyasaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: ānantya vyabhicārābhyām sambandha jñapti asaṃbhavāt

original: na niyatasya śābaleyasanniveśasya gośabdo vācakaḥ tadabhāve 'pi bāhuleyasanniveśadarśanāt /
analyzed: na niyatasya śābaleya sanniveśasya go śabdaḥ vācakaḥ tad abhāve pi bāhuleya sanniveśa darśanāt

original: na ca trailokyāntargatasakalagopiṇḍagatasanniveśavacanatvam avagantuṃ śakyam ānantyāt /
analyzed: na ca trailokya antargata sakala go piṇḍa gata sanniveśa vacanatvam avagantum śakyam ānantyāt

original: tataś ca nākṛtiḥ śabdārthaḥ tasyāṃ kriyā 'nupapatteḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca na ākṛtiḥ śabda arthaḥ tasyām kriyā anupapatteḥ

original: na hi preṣaṇādikriyāsādhanaṃ sanniveśaḥ api tu vyaktiḥ //
analyzed: na hi preṣaṇa ādi kriyā sādhanam sanniveśaḥ api tu vyaktiḥ

original: na ca gām ānayety uktaḥ satyām api tadākṛtau /
analyzed: na ca gām ānaya iti uktaḥ satyām api tad ākṛtau

original: citraprastham ayaṃ kiñcit gām ānayati buddhimān //
analyzed: citraprastham ayam kiñcid gām ānayati buddhimān

original: nanu jātivācyatvapakṣe 'pi gotvajāteḥ sarvagatatvāt kim iti mṛdgavānayanaṃ nānuṣṭhīyate ucyate hastī tarhi kathaṃ nānīyate sarvagatatvāj jāteḥ /
analyzed: nanu jāti vācya tva pakṣe go tva jāteḥ sarvagata tvāt kim iti mṛd gavānayanam na anuṣṭhīyate ucyate hastī tarhi katham na ānīyate sarvagata tvāt jāteḥ

original: atha sarvatrāstitve 'pi vyaṃjakavyaktiniyamenāpahnūyate hanta tarhi sāsnādimatprāṇī gotvajāter abhivyaṃjakaḥ na mṛdgava iti nātiprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: atha sarvatra astitve pi vyaṃjaka vyakti niyamena apahnūyate hanta tarhi sāsnādimat prāṇī go tva jāteḥ abhivyaṃjakaḥ na mṛdgavaḥ iti na atiprasaṅgaḥ

original: sanniveśasya ca tatra bhāvāt tadvācyatvavādinaḥ nainam atiprasaṅgam atikrāmanti //
analyzed: sanniveśasya ca tatra bhāvāt tad vācya tva vādinaḥ na enam atiprasaṅgam atikrāmanti

original: kiṃcākṛtivacanatve gośabdasya śuklādiguṇavācibhiḥ padāntaraiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na prāpnoti /
analyzed: kiṃca ākṛti vacana tve go śabdasya śukla ādi guṇa vācibhiḥ pada antaraiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam na prāpnoti

original: na hi śuklādiguṇā ākṛtivṛttayaḥ api tu vyaktivṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: na hi śukla ādi guṇāḥ ākṛti vṛttayaḥ api tu vyakti vṛttayaḥ

original: tatsāmānādhikaraṇyādibalavattayā varaṃ vyaktiḥ śabdārtha iṣyatām //
analyzed: tad sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi balavat tayā varam vyaktiḥ śabda arthaḥ iṣyatām

original: vyaktau tāvat kriyāyogaḥ jātau sambandhasauṣṭhavam /
analyzed: vyaktau tāvat kriyā yogaḥ jātau sambandha sauṣṭhavam

original: nākṛtau dvayam apy etat iti tadvācyatā kutaḥ jātivyaktyor ataḥ kāryā vācyatve saṃpradhāraṇā /
analyzed: na akṛtau dvayam api etat iti tad vācya tā kutas jāti vyaktyoḥ atas kāryā vācya tve saṃpradhāraṇā

original: tatra vyaktyabhidheyatvavādibhis tāvad ucyate //
analyzed: tatra vyakti abhidheya tva vādibhiḥ tāvat ucyate

original: prayogacodanāsāmaṃjasyāt vyaktiḥ śabdārthaḥ /
analyzed: prayoga codanā sāmaṃjasyāt vyaktiḥ śabda arthaḥ

original: ālaṃbhanaviśanaprokṣaṇādicodanāḥ jātau na saṃgatā bhavanti /
analyzed: ālaṃbhana viśana prokṣaṇa ādi codanāḥ jātau na saṃgatāḥ bhavanti

original: na hi jātir ālabhyate viśasyate prokṣyate vā //
analyzed: na hi jātiḥ ālabhyate viśasyate prokṣyate vā

original: api ca ṣaṭ deyāḥ dvādaśa deyāḥ caturvinśatir deyā iti na jātiḥ ṣaḍādisaṃkhyābhir yujyate api tu vyaktiḥ /
analyzed: api ca ṣaṭ deyāḥ dvādaśa deyāḥ caturvinśatiḥ deyāḥ iti na jātiḥ ṣaṣ ādi saṃkhyābhiḥ yujyate api tu vyaktiḥ

original: tasmāt saiva śabdārthaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt sā eva śabda arthaḥ

original: api ca [yadi paśur upākṛtaḥ palāyeta anyaṃ tadvaṇa tadvayasamālabheta] iti yadi jātiḥ śabdārthaḥ syāt anyasyālaṃbho nāvakalpeta anyasyānīyamānasya paśudravyasya saiva jātiḥ /
analyzed: api ca yadi paśuḥ upākṛtaḥ palāyeta anyam tad vayasam ālabheta iti yadi jātiḥ śabda arthaḥ syāt anyasya ālaṃbhaḥ na avakalpeta anyasya ānīyamānasya paśu dravyasya sā eva jātiḥ

original: tatrānyatvasambandho vyakter avakalpate na jāter ity ato 'pi vyaktiḥ śabdārthaḥ //
analyzed: tatra anya tva sambandhaḥ vyakteḥ avakalpate na jāteḥ iti atas vyaktiḥ śabda arthaḥ

original: cayāpacayasaṅghātasvasvāmitvādikalpanāḥ /
analyzed: caya apacaya saṅghāta sva svāmi tva ādi kalpanāḥ

original: yānti vyaktyabhidheyatvapakṣe jhaḍ iti saṅgatim //
analyzed: yānti vyakti abhidheya tva pakṣe jhaṭ iti saṅgatim

original: na vyaktir lakṣaṇādvāraṃ iyat kāryaṃ ca yujyate /
analyzed: na vyaktiḥ lakṣaṇā dvāram iyat kāryam ca yujyate

original: vakraḥ panthā na gantavyaḥ praṣṭhe vahati vartmani //
analyzed: vakraḥ panthā na gantavyaḥ praṣṭhe vahati vartmani

original: upalakṣaṇam āśritya jātisambandhavedanam /
analyzed: upalakṣaṇam āśritya jāti sambandha vedanam

original: prasetsyatīti nānantyavyabhicārakṛto jvaraḥ //
analyzed: prasetsyati iti na ānantya vyabhicāra kṛtaḥ jvaraḥ

original: kiṃ ca pratyakṣaviṣaye vṛttiḥ padasyeṣṭā parair api /
analyzed: kim ca pratyakṣa viṣaye vṛttiḥ padasya iṣṭā paraiḥ api

original: niṣkṛṣṭaṃ na ca sāmānyamātraṃ pratyakṣagocaraḥ //
analyzed: niṣkṛṣṭam na ca sāmānya mātram pratyakṣa gocaraḥ

original: vyakter eva padārthatvaṃ tasmād abhyupagamyatām /
analyzed: vyakteḥ eva padārtha tvam tasmāt abhyupagamyatām

original: tathā ca buddhis tatraiva śrutaśabdasya jāyate //
analyzed: tathā ca buddhiḥ tatra eva śruta śabdasya jāyate

original: tad etaj jaimnīyair na kṣamyate /
analyzed: tat etat jaimnīyaiḥ na kṣamyate

original: tathā hi vyaktimātraṃ vā śabdārtha iṣyate viśiṣṭā vā vyaktiḥ na tāvat vyaktimātram na hi yasyāṃ kasyāṃcid vyaktau gośabdaṃ vaktāraḥ prayuṃjate /
analyzed: tathā hi vyakti mātram vā śabda arthaḥ iṣyate viśiṣṭā vā vyaktiḥ na tāvat vyakti mātram na hi yasyām kasyāṃcid vyaktau go śabdam vaktāraḥ prayuṃjate

original: na ca yāṃ kāṃcid vyaktiṃ gośabdāt śrotāraḥ pratipadyante //
analyzed: na ca yām kāṃcid vyaktim go śabdāt śrotāraḥ pratipadyante

original: atha gotvaviśiṣṭavyaktiḥ śabdārtha ity ucyata gotvam eva hi tarhi gośabdārthaḥ na vyaktiḥ /
analyzed: atha go tva viśiṣṭa vyaktiḥ śabda arthaḥ iti ucyata go tvam eva hi tarhi go śabda arthaḥ na vyaktiḥ

original: katham śrūyatām yadi hi vyaktiḥ śabdārtho bhavet vyaktyantareṣu na prayujyeta /
analyzed: katham śrūyatām yadi hi vyaktiḥ śabda arthaḥ bhavet vyakti antareṣu na prayujyeta

original: atha vyaktyantare 'pi prayujyate sarvavyaktisādhāraṇas tarhi tasyārthaḥ na vyaktiḥ //
analyzed: atha vyakti antare pi prayujyate sarva vyakti sādhāraṇaḥ tarhi tasya arthaḥ na vyaktiḥ

original: nanu vyaktyntaram api vyaktir eva /
analyzed: nanu vyakti ntaram api vyaktiḥ eva

original: so 'yaṃ vyaktau gośabdaḥ prayuktaḥ na sāmānye maivam vyaktau cet gośabdaḥ prayujyate karkādivyaktāv api prayujyate /
analyzed: saḥ yam vyaktau go śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ na sāmānye mā evam vyaktau ced go śabdaḥ prayujyate karka ādi vyaktau api prayujyate

original: yatra prayogo 'sya dṛṣṭaḥ tatra prayujyata iti cet adya jātāyāṃ gavi mā prayoji na hi tatra prayogo 'sya dṛṣṭa iti /
analyzed: yatra prayogaḥ sya dṛṣṭaḥ tatra prayujyate iti ced adya jātāyām gavi mā na hi tatra prayogaḥ sya dṛṣṭaḥ iti

original: tasmād darśanam akāraṇam prativyakti tasyāsaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: tasmāt darśanam akāraṇam prativyakti tasya asaṃbhavāt

original: vyaktau śabdārthe [iyaṃ vā gauḥ iyaṃ vā gauḥ] iti pratipattiḥ syāt na tu [iyam api gauḥ] iti /
analyzed: vyaktau śabda arthe iyam vā gauḥ iyam vā gauḥ iti pratipattiḥ syāt na tu iyam api gauḥ iti

original: bhavati caivaṃ pratītiḥ /
analyzed: bhavati ca evam pratītiḥ

original: na cāyam avidyamānaniyantṛka eva yadṛcchāśabdaprayogaḥ pravartata iti niyāmakam asya cintyam //
