analyzed: na ca ayam avidyamāna niyantṛkaḥ eva yadṛcchā śabda prayogaḥ pravartate iti niyāmakam asya cintyam

original: gotvam eva niyāmakam iti cet āyuṣman sādhu budhyase /
analyzed: gotvam eva niyāmakam iti ced āyuṣman sādhu budhyase

original: kin tu tad gotvam avagatam anavagataṃ veti vaktum arhasi /
analyzed: kin tu tat go tvam avagatam an avagatam vā iti vaktum arhasi

original: nānavagatam atiprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na anavagatam atiprasaṅgāt

original: avagataṃ cet kutas tad avagacchāmaḥ śabdāt anyato vā nānyataḥ pramāṇāntarāsannidhānāt /
analyzed: avagatam ced kutas tat avagacchāmaḥ śabdāt anyatas vā na anyatas pramāṇa antara asannidhānāt

original: śabdāc cet tarhi śabdaḥ prathamataraṃ gotve vartitum arhati [nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśiṣṭe buddhiḥ] iti nyāyāt //
analyzed: śabdāt ced tarhi śabdaḥ prathamataram go tve vartitum arhati na agṛhīta viśeṣaṇā viśiṣṭe buddhiḥ iti nyāyāt

original: nanu jātiṃ viśeṣaṇatvena vyaktiṃ ca viśeṣyatvena vakṣyati gośabdaḥ na śaknoti vaktuṃ atibhāraprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: nanu jātim viśeṣaṇa tvena vyaktim ca viśeṣya tvena vakṣyati go śabdaḥ na śaknoti vaktum atibhāra prasaṅgāt

original: na ca vyaktyavagatau gatir anyā nāsti yata iyantaṃ śabde bhāram āropayema /
analyzed: na ca vyakti avagatau gatiḥ anyā nā asti yatas iyantam śabde bhāram āropayema

original: na hi vayaṃ vyaktipratipattiṃ bhavantam apahnumahe /
analyzed: na hi vayam vyakti pratipattim bhavantam apahnumahe

original: nāpi bhavantīṃ jātipratipattim apahnumahe ubhayapratīteḥ pratyātmavedanīyatvāt /
analyzed: na api bhavantīm jāti pratipattim apahnumahe ubhaya pratīteḥ pratyātma vedanīya tvāt

original: ubhayatra cābhidhātrī śaktir atibhārā śabdasya anyatarapratītyā cānyatarapratītisiddheḥ /
analyzed: ubhayatra ca abhidhātrī śaktiḥ atibhārā śabdasya anyatara pratītyā ca anyatara pratīti siddheḥ

original: tatra kiṃ jātau vartamānaḥ śabdaḥ vyaktiṃ āhosvid vyaktau vartamānaḥ jātim ākṣipatv iti vicāraṇāyāṃ jāter viśeṣaṇatvāt pūrvataraṃ pratipattir iti saiva śabdasyārtho bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: tatra kim jātau vartamānaḥ śabdaḥ vyaktim āhosvit vyaktau vartamānaḥ jātim ākṣipatu iti vicāraṇāyām jāteḥ viśeṣaṇa tvāt pūrvataram pratipattiḥ iti sā eva śabdasya arthaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: tasyāṃ ca śabdād avagatāyāṃ tata eva vyaktyavagamaḥ setsyatīti nobhayatra śabdo vyāpāraḥ //
analyzed: tasyām ca śabdāt avagatāyām tatas eva vyakti avagamaḥ setsyati iti na ubhayatra śabdaḥ vyāpāraḥ

original: nanu daṇḍiśabdād iva viśeṣaṇaṃ ca jātiṃ viśeṣyāṃ ca vyaktiṃ gośabdād eva pratipatsyāmahe /
analyzed: nanu daṇḍi śabdāt iva viśeṣaṇam ca jātim viśeṣyām ca vyaktim go śabdāt eva pratipatsyāmahe

original: ko 'syātibhāraḥ viṣamo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ sya atibhāraḥ viṣamaḥ yam dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: tatra hi prakṛtipratyayavibhāgena dvayapratītir avakalpate /
analyzed: tatra hi prakṛti pratyaya vibhāgena dvaya pratītiḥ avakalpate

original: daṇḍaśabdaḥ prakṛtir viśeṣaṇam abhivadati /
analyzed: daṇḍa śabdaḥ prakṛtiḥ viśeṣaṇam abhivadati

original: matvarthīyapratyayaś ca viśeṣyam iti /
analyzed: matvarthīya pratyayaḥ ca viśeṣyam iti

original: gośabde tu naiṣa nyāyaḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: go śabde tu na eṣa nyāyaḥ saṃbhavati

original: tatra na viśeṣaṇe daṇḍiśabdo vartate na ca viśeṣye daṇḍaśabdaḥ /
analyzed: tatra na viśeṣaṇe daṇḍi śabdaḥ vartate na ca viśeṣye daṇḍa śabdaḥ

original: iha tu gośabda eka eva viśeṣaṇe viśeṣye vā vartate /
analyzed: iha tu go śabdaḥ ekaḥ eva viśeṣaṇe viśeṣye vā vartate

original: viśeṣye vartamāno viśeṣaṇe pramāṇāntaram apekṣate /
analyzed: viśeṣye vartamānaḥ viśeṣaṇe pramāṇa antaram apekṣate

original: viśeṣaṇe tu vartamāṇaḥ tadavagamayya viśeṣyam apy ākṣipatīti na kaścid doṣaḥ //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇe tu vartamāṇaḥ tat avagamayya viśeṣyam api ākṣipati iti na kaścid doṣaḥ

original: tad idam ātmapratyakṣaṃ yat śabde uccārite vyaktir avagamyata iti /
analyzed: tat idam ātma pratyakṣam yat śabde uccārite vyaktiḥ avagamyate iti

original: sā kiṃ śabdāt uta jāteḥ iti viveko na pratyakṣaḥ /
analyzed: sā kim śabdāt uta jāteḥ iti vivekaḥ na pratyakṣaḥ

original: sa yuktyā 'vagamyate /
analyzed: sa yuktyā vagamyate

original: śabdasya dvayābhidhāne yatnagauravāt viramyavyāpārasya cāsaṃvedanāt antareṇāpi ca śabdaṃ jātyavagame vyaktipratītidarśanāt jātita evaiṣā vyaktipratītiḥ jātipratītiś ca śabdād iti niścīyate /
analyzed: śabdasya dvaya abhidhāne yatna gauravāt viramya vyāpārasya ca asaṃvedanāt antareṇa api ca śabdam jāti avagame vyakti pratīti darśanāt jātitaḥ eva eṣā vyakti pratītiḥ jāti pratītiḥ ca śabdāt iti niścīyate

original: bhavadbhir api ca viśeṣaṇajñānapūrvikā viśeṣyāvagatir aṅgīkṛtaiva /
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ api ca viśeṣaṇa jñāna pūrvikā viśeṣya avagatiḥ aṅgīkṛtā eva

original: yathā ''ha kaṇavrataḥ [samavāyinaḥ śvaityāc chvaityabuddheś ca śvete buddhis te kāryakāraṇabhūte] iti //
analyzed: yathā ha kaṇavrataḥ samavāyinaḥ śvaityāt śvaitya buddheḥ ca śvete buddhiḥ te kārya kāraṇa bhūte iti

original: yat punar abhihitam ālaṃbhanaviśasanaprokṣaṇādikriyāyogāt vyaktiḥ śabdārtha iti tad apy anaikāntikam jātāv api kvacit kriyāyogadarśanāt [śyenacitaṃ cinvīta] iti //
analyzed: yat punar abhihitam ālaṃbhana viśasana prokṣaṇa ādi kriyā yogāt vyaktiḥ śabda arthaḥ iti tat api anaikāntikam jātau api kvacid kriyā yoga darśanāt śyena citam cinvīta iti

original: nanu atrāpi vyaktir eva kāryāṅgatā nāmūrtāyā jāteḥ maivam na hy atra śyenaḥ sādhanatvena nirdiśyate [paśunā yajeta] itivat /
analyzed: nanu atra api vyaktiḥ eva kārya aṅgatā na amūrtāyāḥ jāteḥ mā evam na hi atra śyenaḥ sādhana tvena nirdiśyate paśunā yajeta iti vat

original: [karmaṇy agnyākhyāyām] iti tv abhiyuktasmaraṇāt cayananirvartya śyena iti śabdārtho 'vagamyate /
analyzed: karmaṇi agni ākhyāyām iti tu abhiyukta smaraṇāt cayana nirvartya śyenaḥ iti śabda arthaḥ vagamyate

original: na ca śyenavyaktiḥ cayanena nirvartayituṃ pāryate /
analyzed: na ca śyena vyaktiḥ cayanena nirvartayitum pāryate

original: [agnyākhyāyāṃ] iti hi smaryate /
analyzed: agni ākhyāyām iti hi smaryate

original: na hīṣṭakānicayena patatrī abhinirvartate /
analyzed: na hi iṣṭakā nicayena patatrī abhinirvartate

original: tadākāras tv agnir abhinirvartyata iti atra jāteḥ kriyāṅgatvaṃ na vyakteḥ //
analyzed: tad ākāraḥ tu agniḥ abhinirvartyate iti atra jāteḥ kriyā aṅga tvam na vyakteḥ

original: nanu vyaktyā sādṛśyaṃ saṃpādayiṣyate na śakyate saṃpādayitum vyaktyantaravaisādṛśyasyāpi saṃbhavāt /
analyzed: nanu vyaktyā sādṛśyam saṃpādayiṣyate na śakyate saṃpādayitum vyakti antara vaisādṛśyasya api saṃbhavāt

original: yo hy ekayā vyaktyā sadṛśyaḥ so 'nyair visadṛśo 'pi bhavati //
analyzed: yaḥ hi ekayā vyaktyā sadṛśyaḥ saḥ nyaiḥ bhavati

original: yat tu amūrtāyā jāter na kriyāṅgatvam iti naiṣa doṣaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu amūrtāyāḥ jāteḥ na kriyā aṅga tvam iti na eṣa doṣaḥ

original: amūrtānām api guṇakarmaṇāṃ sādhanabhāvopapatteḥ [aruṇayā krīṇāti] [abhikrāmaṃ juhoti] iti /
analyzed: amūrtānām api guṇa karmaṇām sādhana bhāva upapatteḥ aruṇayā krīṇāti abhikrāmam juhoti iti

original: vyaktyākṣepadvāreṇa cālaṃbhanaviśasanaprokṣaṇādiprayogacodanāsu sādhanatvaṃ jāter upapatsyate //
analyzed: vyakti ākṣepa dvāreṇa ca ālaṃbhana viśasana prokṣaṇa ādi prayoga codanāsu sādhana tvam jāteḥ upapatsyate

original: lakṣitavyaktisādhyaṃ tu tatsādhyaṃ kāryam iṣyate /
analyzed: lakṣita vyakti sādhyam tu tat sādhyam kāryam iṣyate

original: yathā bhūtendriyotpādyaṃ ātmakartṛkam ucyate //
analyzed: yathā bhūta indriya utpādyam ātma kartṛkam ucyate

original: ātmā tāvat sarvakarmasv adhikṛtaḥ kartā ca /
analyzed: ātmā tāvat sarva karmasu adhikṛtaḥ kartā ca

original: sa cāmūrtatvāt dehendriyadvāreṇa audumbarīsaṃmārjanājyāvekṣaṇādīni kāryāṇi nirvartayan kartā teṣu bhavati/
analyzed: sa ca amūrta tvāt deha indriya dvāreṇa audumbarī saṃmārjana ājya avekṣaṇa ādīni kāryāṇi nirvartayan kartā teṣu bhavati

original: evaṃ jātir api vyaktivartmanā tannirvartayantī sādhanatāṃ lapsyate //
analyzed: evam jātiḥ api vyakti vartmanā tat nirvartayantī sādhanatām lapsyate

original: ataś ca jātir evāṅgaṃ iti mīmāṃsakā jaguḥ /
analyzed: atas ca jātiḥ eva aṅgam iti mīmāṃsakāḥ jaguḥ

original: tasyāś cedaṃ kriyāṅgatvaṃ anyadvārakam ātmavat //
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca idam kriyā aṅga tvam anya dvārakam ātma vat

original: evaṃ [ṣaḍ deyāḥ] iti [anyaṃ tadvarṇam ālabheta] iti ca taddvārakam eva yojyam /
analyzed: evam ṣaṭ deyāḥ iti anyam tad varṇam ālabheta iti ca tad dvārakam eva yojyam

original: etenopacayāpacayasaṃghātādy api vyākhyātam //
analyzed: etena upacaya apacaya saṃghāta ādi api vyākhyātam

original: sambandhagrahaṇādikāryaṃ ca jātipakṣa eva sūpapādam ānantyavyabhicārādicodyānavakāśāt //
analyzed: sambandha grahaṇa ādi kāryam ca jāti pakṣe eva sūpapādam ānantya vyabhicāra ādi codya anavakāśāt

original: yat punar abhyadhāyi pratyakṣaviṣaye padaṃ vartate /
analyzed: yat punar abhyadhāyi pratyakṣa viṣaye padam vartate

original: na ca pratyakṣasya sāmānyamātraṃ viṣaya iti parihṛtaṃ tat vārtikakṛtā /
analyzed: na ca pratyakṣasya sāmānya mātram viṣayaḥ iti parihṛtam tat vārtikakṛtā

original: pratyakṣasya hi citrātmakaṃ vastu viṣayaḥ //
analyzed: pratyakṣasya hi citra ātmakam vastu viṣayaḥ

original: [na ca tat tādṛśaṃ kiñcit śabdaḥ śaknoti bhāṣitum /
analyzed: na ca tat tādṛśam kiñcid śabdaḥ śaknoti bhāṣitum

original: sāmānyāṃśān apoddhṛtya padaṃ sarvaṃ pravartate] iti //
analyzed: sāmānya aṃśān apoddhṛtya padam sarvam pravartate iti

original: na hi nānādharmanicayakhacitacitrākāravastusamarpaṇanipuṇam ekaṃ kim api padam upapadyate /
analyzed: na hi nānā dharma nicaya khacita citra ākāra vastu samarpaṇa nipuṇam ekam kim api padam upapadyate

original: na ca tatra sambandhagrahaṇaṃ sukaram iti sāmānyāṃśaniṣṭḥam eva padaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: na ca tatra sambandha grahaṇam sukaram iti eva padam yuktam

original: tasmāj jātir eva śabdārtha iti //
analyzed: tasmāt jātiḥ eva śabda arthaḥ iti

original: atrābhidhīyate na jātiḥ padasyārtho bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: atra abhidhīyate na jātiḥ padasya arthaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: padaṃ hi vibhaktyanto varṇasamudāyaḥ na prātipadikmātrām /
analyzed: padam hi vibhakti antaḥ varṇa samudāyaḥ na prātipadika mātrām

original: tatra ca prakṛtipratyayāv itaretarānvitam artham abhidadhāte iti sthitam /
analyzed: tatra ca prakṛti pratyayau itaretara anvitam artham abhidadhāte iti sthitam

original: dvitīyādiś ca vibhaktiḥ prātipadikād uccārantī prātipadikārthagatatvena svārtham ācaṣṭe /
analyzed: dvitīyā ādiḥ ca vibhaktiḥ prātipadikāt uccārantī prātipadika artha gata tvena sva artham ācaṣṭe

original: yugapac ca tritayaṃ vibhaktyarthaḥ kārakaṃ liṅgaṃ saṅkhyā ca /
analyzed: yugapad ca tritayam vibhakti arthaḥ kārakam liṅgam saṅkhyā ca

original: na caitat tritayaṃ prātipadikārthe jātāv anveti /
analyzed: na ca etat tritayam prātipadika arthe jātau anveti

original: na jātiḥ kārakaṃ /
analyzed: na jātiḥ kārakam

original: na ca jāteḥ strīpuṃnapuṃsakavibhāgaḥ /
analyzed: na ca jāteḥ strī pum napuṃsaka vibhāgaḥ

original: na cāsyā dvitvādiyoga iti //
analyzed: na ca asyāḥ dvi tva ādi yogaḥ iti

original: nanu vyaktilakṣaṇayā sarvam upapatsyate ity uktam na ca yuktam uktam sakṛtprayuktaṃ padam aṃśena kaṃcid artham abhivadati /
analyzed: nanu vyakti lakṣaṇayā sarvam upapatsyate iti uktam na ca yuktam uktam sakṛt prayuktam padam aṃśena kaṃcid artham abhivadati

original: tato 'rthāntaraṃ lakṣyati /
analyzed: tatas ṛtha antaram lakṣyati

original: tadgatatvena punaḥ liṅgasaṅkhyādy abhidhatte iti na prātītiko 'yaṃ kramaḥ //
analyzed: tad gata tvena punar liṅga saṅkhyā ādi abhidhatte iti na prātītikaḥ yam kramaḥ

original: sākṣāt tadanvitatvena kathyamānaṃ tv asaṅgatam /
analyzed: sākṣāt tad anvita tvena kathyamānam tu asaṅgatam

original: tad bhaved agninā siṇcet ityādividhisannibham //
analyzed: tat bhavet agninā siṇcet ityādi vidhi sannibham

original: nanu puṃsīva sāmānye kārakatvaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: nanu puṃsi iva sāmānye kāraka tvam bhaviṣyati

original: kakṣyāntaritam ity eṣaḥ yukto vaibhaktiko 'nvayaḥ //
analyzed: kakṣyā antaritam iti eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vaibhaktikaḥ nvayaḥ

original: prātipadikārthasāmānyagatatvenaiva vibhaktyā svārtho 'bhidhīyate na lakṣitavyaktivṛttitvena yato 'bhidhānavaiṣamyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: prātipadika artha sāmānya gata tvena eva vibhaktyā svārthaḥ bhidhīyate na lakṣita vyakti vṛtti tvena yatas bhidhāna vaiṣamyam syāt

original: sa tu vibhaktyartho jātau sākṣād asaṃbhavan kakṣyāntarito bhaviṣyati naitat ātmano jñānaprayatnādiyogitvena kārakatvopapatteḥ /
analyzed: sa tu vibhakti arthaḥ jātau sākṣāt asaṃbhavan kakṣyā antaritaḥ bhaviṣyati na etat ātmanaḥ jñāna prayatna ādi yogi tvena kāraka tva upapatteḥ

original: jātes tu sākṣān na manāg api vyāpāraleśasaṃsparśa iti svato durlabhaṃ tasyāḥ kārakatvam /
analyzed: jāteḥ tu sākṣāt na manāk api vyāpāra leśa saṃsparśaḥ iti svatas durlabham tasyāḥ kāraka tvam

original: ataḥ kathaṃ tatra vibhaktyarthānvayaḥ yad anvitaṃ ca saṅkhyādi tatsthatvena na kathyate /
analyzed: atas katham tatra vibhakti artha anvayaḥ yat anvitam ca saṅkhyā ādi tad stha tvena na kathyate

original: kathyate yadgatatvena na tat tena samanvitam //
analyzed: kathyate yad gata tvena na tat tena samanvitam

original: na ca vyavahitavyaktipratītiṃ manyate janaḥ /
analyzed: na ca vyavahita vyakti pratītim manyate janaḥ

original: nānyathā 'nupapattyā 'pi kramasamvedanaṃ kvacit //
analyzed: na anyathā krama samvedanam kvacid

original: janayantīṃ ca paśyāmaḥ vyaktiṃ jātyanuraṃjitām /
analyzed: janayantīm ca paśyāmaḥ vyaktim jāti anuraṃjitām

original: saṅkhyādiyoginīṃ ceti sā vai dhatte padārthatām //
analyzed: saṅkhyā ādi yoginīm ca iti sā vai dhatte padārtha tām

original: jāteḥ kāryānvayaḥ śyenācitam ity abhyadhāyi yat /
analyzed: jāteḥ kārya anvayaḥ śyena ācitam iti abhyadhāyi yat

original: tatra saṃsthānanirdeśāt na jāteḥ kācid aṅgatā //
analyzed: tatra saṃsthāna nirdeśāt na jāteḥ kācid aṅga tā

original: śyenavyaktyā cet sādṛśyam iṣṭakākūṭasya nāsti vyaktyantareṇa vyabhicārāt na tarām amūrtayā jātyā sādṛśyam ākāśeneva tasyāvakalpata iti spardhodāharaṇamātram etat //
analyzed: śyena vyaktyā ced sādṛśyam iṣṭakā kūṭasya na asti vyakti antareṇa vyabhicārāt na tarām amūrtayā jātyā sādṛśyam ākāśena iva tasya avakalpate iti spardhā udāharaṇa mātram etat

original: anyeṣu tu prayogeṣu gāṃ dehīty evamādiṣu tadvato 'rthakriyāyogāt tasyaivāhuḥ padārthatām //
analyzed: anyeṣu tu prayogeṣu gām dehi iti evamādiṣu tadvataḥ rtha kriyā yogāt tasya eva āhuḥ padārtha tām

original: padaṃ tadvantam evārthaṃ āṃjasyenābhijalpati /
analyzed: padam tadvantam eva artham āṃjasyena abhijalpati

original: na ca vyavahitā buddhiḥ na ca bhārasya gauravam //
analyzed: na ca vyavahitā buddhiḥ na ca bhārasya gauravam

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyādivyavahāro 'pi mukhyayā /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi vyavahāraḥ pi mukhyayā

original: vṛttyopapādyamānaḥ san nānyathā yojayiṣyate //
analyzed: vṛttyā upapādyamānaḥ san na anyathā yojayiṣyate

original: tasmāt tadvān eva padārthaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt tadvān eva padārthaḥ

original: nanu ko 'yaṃ tadvān nāma tat asyāstīti tadvān iti viśeṣa eva sāmānyavān ucyate //
analyzed: nanu kaḥ yam tadvān nāma tat asya asti iti tadvān iti viśeṣaḥ eva sāmānyavān ucyate

original: viśeṣavācyatve cānantyavyabhicārau tadavasthau /
analyzed: viśeṣa vācya tve ca ānantya vyabhicārau tad avasthau

original: sāmāṇyaṃ tu śebde nānucyamānaṃ nopalakṣyamāṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: sāmāṇyam tu śebde na an ucyamānam na upalakṣyamāṇam bhavati

original: ubhayābhidhāne ca śabdasyātibhāra ity uktam ucyatenedantānirdiśyamānaḥ śābaleyādiviśeṣaḥ tadvān /
analyzed: ubhaya abhidhāne ca śabdasya atibhāraḥ iti uktam ucyate na idantā anirdiśyamānaḥ śābaleya ādi viśeṣaḥ tadvān

original: na ca sarvas trailokyavartī vyaktivrātas tadvān /
analyzed: na ca sarvaḥ trailokya vartī vyakti vrātaḥ tadvān

original: kin tu sāmānyāśrayaḥ kaścid anullikhitaśābaleyādiviśeṣaḥ tadvān ity ucyate /
analyzed: kin tu sāmānya āśrayaḥ kaścid an ullikhita śābaleya ādi viśeṣaḥ tadvān iti ucyate

original: sāṃāṇyāśrayatvāc ca nānantyavyabhicārayos tatrāvasaraḥ //
analyzed: sāṃāṇya āśraya tvāt ca na ānantya vyabhicārayoḥ tatra avasaraḥ

original: na ca viśeṣaṇam anabhidhāya viśeṣyam abhidadhāti śabda ity abhyupagacchāmaḥ yenainam atibhāreṇa pīḍayemahi /
analyzed: na ca viśeṣaṇam an abhidhāya viśeṣyam abhidadhāti śabdaḥ iti abhyupagacchāmaḥ yena enam atibhāreṇa pīḍayemahi

original: sāmānyāśrayamātre saṅketagrahaṇāt tāvanmātraṃ vadataḥ śabdasya ko 'tibhāraḥ evaṃ [tadvato nāsvatantratvāt] ityādidūṣaṇaṃ parihṛtaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: sāmānya āśraya mātre saṅketa grahaṇāt tāvat mātram vadataḥ śabdasya kaḥ tibhāraḥ evam tadvataḥ na asvatantra tvāt ityādi dūṣaṇam parihṛtam bhavati

original: kiṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ na hi niṣkṛṣṭajātyaṃśapariveṣṭitam /
analyzed: kim ca pratyakṣam na hi niṣkṛṣṭa jāti aṃśa pariveṣṭitam

original: tadgocarapravṛttaś ca śabdas taṃ kathyet katham tasmāt pratyakṣaviṣaye pravartamānaṃ tatsamānaviṣayam eva bhavitum arhati padam na sāmānyamātraniṣṭham //
analyzed: tad gocara pravṛttaḥ ca śabdaḥ tam kathyet katham tasmāt pratyakṣa viṣaye pravartamānam tad samāna viṣayam eva bhavitum arhati padam na sāmānya mātra niṣṭham

original: yugapan nanu saṃvittiḥ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ /
analyzed: yugapad nanu saṃvittiḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ

original: pratyakṣe 'pi na dṛṣṭaiva na ca yuṣmābhir iṣyate //
analyzed: pratyakṣe na dṛṣṭā eva na ca yuṣmābhiḥ iṣyate

original: kāryakāraṇabhāvo hi taddhiyor bhavatāṃ mate /
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ hi tad dhiyoḥ bhavatām mate

original: tasmād viśeṣaṇe jātau pūrvam indriyajā matiḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt viśeṣaṇe jātau pūrvam indriya jā matiḥ

original: padād api tadāyattasambandhajñaptyapekṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: padāt api tad āyatta sambandha jñapti apekṣiṇaḥ

original: tatraiva buddhir ity eva na vyakter api vācyatā //
analyzed: tatra eva buddhiḥ iti eva na vyakteḥ api vācya tā

original: ucyate pratyakṣe tāvat dvayor api viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ indriyaviṣayatvam /
analyzed: ucyate pratyakṣe tāvat dvayoḥ api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ indriya viṣaya tvam

original: sāmānye 'pi saṃyuktasamavāyād indriyaṃ pravartamānaṃ viśeṣaṇavat viśeṣyam api viṣayīkaroti /
analyzed: sāmānye pi saṃyukta samavāyāt indriyam pravartamānam viśeṣaṇa vat viśeṣyam api viṣayīkaroti

original: na hi sāmāṇyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ viśeṣo 'numeya iti vyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: na hi sāmāṇyam pratyakṣam viśeṣaḥ numeyaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ

original: evaṃ guṇamātragrāhiṇīndriye guṇino 'numeyatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: evam guṇa mātra grāhiṇi indriye guṇinaḥ nu meya tvam syāt

original: na caivam asti /
analyzed: na ca evam asti

original: tasmād viśeṣyaparyantaṃ pratyakṣam /
analyzed: tasmāt viśeṣya paryantam pratyakṣam

original: tathā padam api tattulyaviṣayaṃ na tu sāmānyamātraniṣṭham iti yuktam //
analyzed: tathā padam api tad tulya viṣayam na tu sāmānya mātra niṣṭham iti yuktam

original: yat tu [sāmāṇyāmśān apoddhṛtya padaṃ sarvaṃ pravartate] iti tat kevalavyaktyabhidhāne sati ānāṇtyavyabhicārabhayād ucyate /
analyzed: yat tu apoddhṛtya padam sarvam pravartate iti tat kevala vyakti abhidhāne sati ānāṇtya vyabhicāra bhayāt ucyate

original: tadvadabhidhāne tu tadbhayaṃ nāstīti na śuddhajātyabhidhāyitayā śabdasaṃkocanīyaḥ //
analyzed: tadvat abhidhāne tu tat bhayam na asti iti na śuddha jāti abhidhāyi tayā śabda saṃkocanīyaḥ

original: nanu na sarvātmanā pratyakṣatulyaviṣayaḥ śabdaḥ pratipattisāmyaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: nanu na sarva ātmanā pratyakṣa tulya viṣayaḥ śabdaḥ pratipatti sāmya prasaṅgāt

original: na ca śabdāt indriyāc ca tulye pratipattī bhavataḥ /
analyzed: na ca śabdāt indriyāt ca tulye pratipattī bhavataḥ

original: tad uktaṃ [anyathaivāgnisambandhāt dāhaṃ dagdho 'bhimanyate] ityādi ucyate pūrvam evaitat parihṛtam /
analyzed: tat uktam anyathā eva agni sambandhāt dāham dagdhaḥ bhimanyate ityādi ucyate pūrvam eva etat parihṛtam

original: sakalaviśeṣagrahaṇāgrahaṇābhyāṃ pratipattiviśeṣasiddheḥ /
analyzed: sakala viśeṣa grahaṇa agrahaṇābhyām pratipatti viśeṣa siddheḥ

original: dharmyabhiprāyeṇa ca saṃplavasyoktatvāt /
analyzed: dharmi abhiprāyeṇa ca saṃplavasya ukta tvāt

original: naitāvatā sāmānyamātre niṣṭhaḥ śabdo bhavati //
analyzed: na etāvatā sāmānya mātre niṣṭhaḥ śabdaḥ bhavati

original: api ca niṣkṛṣṭasāmānyāṃśavacanatve padasyeṣyamāṇe gośabdāt gotvaśabdāc ca tulye pratipattī syātām /
analyzed: api ca niṣkṛṣṭa sāmānya aṃśa vacana tve padasya iṣyamāṇe go śabdāt go tva śabdāt ca tulye pratipattī syātām

original: [gauḥ śuklaḥ] itivac ca [gotvaṃ śuklaṃ] iti buddhiḥ syāt /
analyzed: gauḥ śuklaḥ iti vat ca go tvam śuklam iti buddhiḥ syāt

original: cāturvaṇyādivac ca svārtha eva gośabdāt bhāvapratyayaḥ tvatalādiḥ syāt //
analyzed: cāturvaṇya ādi vat ca svārthe eva go śabdāt bhāva pratyayaḥ tva tala ādiḥ syāt

original: atha manyethāḥ ākṣiptavyaktikāṃ jātiṃ gośabdo vakti /
analyzed: atha manyethāḥ ākṣipta vyaktikām jātim go śabdaḥ vakti

original: bhāvapratyayāntas tu niṣkṛṣṭasvarūpamātraniṣṭhām iti tad anupapannam anākṣiptavyaktikāyā jāteḥ kadācid apy adarśanāt //
analyzed: bhāva pratyaya antaḥ tu niṣkṛṣṭa svarūpa mātra niṣṭhām iti tat anupapannam an ākṣipta vyaktikāyāḥ jāteḥ kadācid api adarśanāt

original: atha gośabdaśravaṇavelāyāṃ vyaktisaṃsparśavatī jātir avagamyate /
analyzed: atha go śabda śravaṇa velāyām vyakti saṃsparśavatī jātiḥ avagamyate

original: bhāvapratyayānte tu gośabde śrute tacchūnyā 'saū pratīyata iti yady evaṃ āgato 'si madīyaṃ panthānam āśrayavatī cej jātir ucyate śabdena jātyāśraya ukta eva bhavati /
analyzed: bhāva pratyaya ante tu go śabde śrute tad śūnyā pratīyate iti yadi evam āgatā u si madīyam panthānam āśrayavatī ced jātiḥ ucyate śabdena jāti āśrayaḥ uktaḥ eva bhavati

original: nānyathā hi sāśrayavaty uktā syāt /
analyzed: na anyathā hi sā āśrayavatī uktā syāt

original: tadāśraya parihāreṇāśrayisāmānyamātravivakṣāyāṃ tvatalādayaḥ prayujyante /
analyzed: tad āśraya parihāreṇa āśrayi sāmānya mātra vivakṣāyām tva tala ādayaḥ prayujyante

original: tathā cāhuḥ [yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tvatalādayaḥ] iti /
analyzed: tathā ca āhuḥ yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye śabda niveśaḥ tad abhidhāne tva tala ādayaḥ iti

original: [guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ] iti tadvad vācyatvapakṣasākṣīṇy akṣarāṇi /
analyzed: guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye śabda niveśaḥ iti tadvat vācya tva pakṣa sākṣīṇi akṣarāṇi

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca tatraivopapadyata ity uktam etat /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca tatra eva upapadyate iti uktam etat

original: tasmāt yathā vidhyantaparyanto vākyavyāpāra iṣyate /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā vidhi anta paryantaḥ vākya vyāpāraḥ iṣyate

original: tathaiva vyaktiparyantaḥ śabdavyāpāra iṣyatām //
analyzed: tathā eva vyakti paryantaḥ śabda vyāpāraḥ iṣyatām

original: anuparatavyāpāre śabde tadavagamāt //
analyzed: an uparata vyāpāre śabde tad avagamāt

original: yenānvitābhidhānaṃ ca padānām abhyupeyate /
analyzed: yena anvita abhidhānam ca padānām abhyupeyate

original: sutarāṃ tena vaktavyā vyaktyantā padato matiḥ //
analyzed: sutarām tena vaktavyā vyakti antā padataḥ matiḥ

original: na hi vyaktyanapekṣāṇāṃ jātīnām itaretaram /
analyzed: na hi vyakti anapekṣāṇām jātīnām itaretaram

original: anvayo 'nanvitānāṃ ca nābhidhānam iti sthitiḥ //
analyzed: anvayaḥ nanvitānām ca na abhidhānam iti sthitiḥ

original: gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau yathā sāmīpyalakṣaṇā /
analyzed: gaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ ityādau yathā sāmīpya lakṣaṇā

original: naivaṃ gauḥ śukla ityādau gamyate vyaktilakṣaṇā //
analyzed: na evam gauḥ śuklaḥ ityādau gamyate vyakti lakṣaṇā

original: prayogapratipattibhyāṃ vṛddhebhyo 'dhyavasīyate /
analyzed: prayoga pratipattibhyām vṛddhebhyaḥ dhī avasīyate

original: tasmāt gavādiśabdānāṃ tadvān artha iti sthitam //
analyzed: tasmāt go ādi śabdānām tadvān arthaḥ iti sthitam

original: tad idam uktaṃ sūtrakṛtā [vyaktyākṛtijātayas tu padārthaḥ] iti [tu]śabdo viśeṣaṇārthaḥ /
analyzed: tat idam uktam sūtrakṛtā vyakti ākṛti jātayaḥ tu padārthaḥ iti tuśabdaḥ viśeṣaṇa arthaḥ

original: kiṃ viśeṣyate guṇapradhānabhāvasyāniyamena śabdārthatvam /
analyzed: kim viśeṣyate guṇa pradhāna bhāvasya aniyamena śabda artha tvam

original: śite 'pi tadvato vācyatve kvacit prayoge jāteḥ prādhānyaṃ vyakter aṅgabhāvaḥ yathā [gaur na padā spraṣṭavyā] iti sarvagavīṣu pratiṣedho 'vagamyate /
analyzed: tadvataḥ vācya tve kvacid prayoge jāteḥ prādhānyam vyakteḥ aṅga bhāvaḥ yathā gauḥ na padā spraṣṭavyā iti sarva gavīṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vagamyate

original: kvacid vyakteḥ prādhānyaṃ jāter aṅgabhāvaḥ yathā [gāṃ muṃca] [gāṃ badhāna] iti niyatāṃ kāṃcid vyaktim uddiśya prayujyate /
analyzed: kvacid vyakteḥ prādhānyam jāteḥ aṅga bhāvaḥ yathā gām muṃca gām badhāna iti niyatām kāṃcid vyaktim uddiśya prayujyate

original: kvacid ākṛteḥ prādhānyaṃ vyakter aṅgabhāvaḥ jātir nāsty eva yathā [piṣṭamayyo gāvaḥ kriyantām] iti sanniveśacikīrṣayā prayoga iti /
analyzed: kvacid ākṛteḥ prādhānyam vyakteḥ aṅga bhāvaḥ jātiḥ na asti eva yathā piṣṭa mayyaḥ gāvaḥ kriyantām iti sanniveśa cikīrṣayā prayogaḥ iti

original: sarvasarvagatatve 'pi jāter na mṛdagavādau viśiṣṭā vṛttir ity uktam /
analyzed: sarva sarva gata tve pi jāteḥ na mṛda gavādau viśiṣṭā vṛttiḥ iti uktam

original: tad evaṃ gavāśvādiśabdānāṃ tāvat tadvān artha iti siddham //
analyzed: tat evam gavāśva ādi śabdānām tāvat tadvān arthaḥ iti siddham

original: yeṣām artheṣu sāmānyaṃ na saṃbhavati taiḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām artheṣu sāmānyam na saṃbhavati taiḥ punar

original: ucyate kevalā vyaktir ākāśādipadair iva //
analyzed: ucyate kevalā vyaktiḥ ākāśa ādi padaiḥ iva

original: evaṃ ḍitthādiśabdānāṃ saṃjñātvavāditātmanām /
analyzed: evam ḍittha ādi śabdānām saṃjñā tva vādita ātmanām

original: abhidheyasya sāmānyaśūnyatvād vyaktivācitā //
analyzed: abhidheyasya sāmānya śūnya tvāt vyakti vāci tā

original: ata eva hi dravyaśabdā ity ucyante //
analyzed: atas eva hi dravya śabdāḥ iti ucyante

original: ye punaḥ kalpitānekabhedavṛttiṃ pracakṣate /
analyzed: ye punar kalpita aneka bheda vṛttim pracakṣate

original: vācyaṃ tatrāpi sāmānyaṃ atīva grāhikās tu te //
analyzed: vācyam tatra api sāmānyam atīva grāhikāḥ tu te

original: na hi ḍitthatvasāmānyaṃ dṛśyate gaganatvavat /
analyzed: na hi ḍittha tva sāmānyam dṛśyate gagana tva vat

original: kalpanāyās tu no bhūmiḥ kācid asti vipaścitām //
analyzed: kalpanāyāḥ tu naḥ bhūmiḥ kācid asti vipaścitām

original: guṇaśabdās tu kecit svajātyavacchinnaṃ guṇam abhidhāya tāvaty eva viramanti /
analyzed: guṇa śabdāḥ tu kecid sva jāti avacchinnam guṇam abhidhāya tāvati eva viramanti

original: kecit tu guṇam abhidhāya dravyam apy ākṣipanti tatsāmānāḍhikaraṇyaprayogadarśanāt //
analyzed: kecid tu guṇam abhidhāya dravyam api ākṣipanti tad sāmānāḍhikaraṇya prayoga darśanāt

original: guṇaikaniyatās tāvat gandhārūparasādayaḥ /
analyzed: guṇa eka niyatāḥ tāvat gandha a rūpa rasa ādayaḥ

original: gandhatvādivyavacchinnagandhādiguṇavācinaḥ //
teṣāṃ na dravyaparyantā vṛttiḥ kvacana dṛśyate /
analyzed: teṣām na dravya paryantā vṛttiḥ kvacana dṛśyate

original: na gandhaḥ padmaṃ ity asti sāmānādhikaraṇyadhīḥ //
analyzed: na gandhaḥ padmam iti asti sāmānādhikaraṇya dhīḥ

original: na hy evaṃ vaktāro bhavanti [candanaṃ gandhaṃ] [āmraṃ rasaḥ] iti //
analyzed: na hi evam vaktāraḥ bhavanti candanam gandham āmram rasaḥ iti

original: guṇaṃ śuklādiśabdās tu kathayantas tadāśrayam /
analyzed: guṇam śukla ādi śabdāḥ tu kathayantaḥ tad āśrayam

original: dravyam apy ākṣipanty eva śuklo 'śur iti darśanāt //
analyzed: dravyam api ākṣipanti eva śuklaḥ śuḥ iti darśanāt

original: śuklādayo 'pi śabdāḥ guṇapadopabandhasaṃkecitaśaktayaḥ bhāvaprayayāntapadavat guṇamātrābhidhāna eva paryavasyanti [śuklo guṇo 'śvaḥ] [śauklyam aśvaḥ] iti sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogādarśanāt //
analyzed: śukla ādayaḥ pi śabdāḥ guṇa pada upabandha saṃkecita śaktayaḥ guṇa mātra abhidhāne eva paryavasyanti śuklaḥ guṇaḥ śvas śauklyam aśvaḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇya prayoga adarśanāt

original: kriyāśabdaś ca dvividhā bhavanti kecit kartari karmaṇi karaṇe vā prayujyante kecid bhāvamātravacanā eva /
analyzed: kriyā śabdaḥ ca dvividhāḥ bhavanti kecid kartari karmaṇi karaṇe vā prayujyante kecid bhāva mātra vacanāḥ eva

original: kartrādivācinas tāvan nimittīkṛtya kāṃcana kriyāṃ tadyogidravye vartate pācakādayaḥ //
analyzed: kartṛ ādi vācinaḥ tāvat nimittīkṛtya kāṃcana kriyām tad yogi dravye vartate pācaka ādayaḥ

original: yatrāpi tatkriyāyogaḥ tadānīṃ nopalabhyate /
analyzed: yatra api tad kriyā yogaḥ tadānīm na upalabhyate

original: tatrāpi yogyatāṃ dṛṭvā śabdaṃ tajjñāḥ prayuṃjate //
analyzed: tatra api yogyatām dṛṭvā śabdam tad jñāḥ prayuṃjate

original: na hi [pācakaḥ] [lāvakaḥ] iti pravṛttakriya evocyate anyadā 'pi tathā tathā vyavahārāt //
analyzed: na hi pācakaḥ lāvakaḥ iti pravṛtta kriyaḥ eva ucyate anyadā pi tathā tathā vyavahārāt

original: anye pūrvāparībhūtasvabhāvaparihārataḥ /
analyzed: anye pūrva aparībhūta svabhāva parihārataḥ

original: siddharūpatayā prāhuḥ śabdāḥ pākādayaḥ kriyām //
analyzed: siddha rūpa tayā prāhuḥ śabdāḥ pāka ādayaḥ kriyām

original: tad uktam [kṛdabhihito bhāvaḥ dravyavad bhavati kriyāvac ca] iti /
analyzed: tat uktam kṛt abhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati kriyāvat ca iti

original: na caikāntena parihṛtasādhyamānāvasthaiva taiḥ kriyocyate yata āha [kriyāvac ca] iti //
analyzed: na ca ekāntena parihṛta sādhyamāna avasthā eva taiḥ kriyā ucyate yatas āha kriyā vat ca iti

original: anyatpravṛttau śabdasya nimittam avagamyate /
analyzed: anya pravṛttau śabdasya nimittam avagamyate

original: abhidheyaṃ tu tasyānyat ity ayaṃ prathamaḥ kramaḥ //
analyzed: abhidheyam tu tasya anyat iti ayam prathamaḥ kramaḥ

original: pācakādiśabdānāṃ hi pravṛttau nimittaṃ kriyā /
analyzed: pācaka ādi śabdānām hi pravṛttau nimittam kriyā

original: abhidheyās tu kartrādayaḥ //
analyzed: abhidheyāḥ tu kartṛ ādayaḥ

original: kvacit punar yad evāsya syāt pravṛttinibandhanam /
analyzed: kvacid punar yat eva asya syāt pravṛtti nibandhanam

original: tasyaiva vācyatā bhāvapratyayāntapadeṣv iva //
analyzed: tasya eva vācya tā bhāva pratyaya anta padeṣu iva

original: ity evaṃ leśatas tāvat nāmnāṃ vṛttir udāhṛtā /
analyzed: iti evam leśataḥ tāvat nāmnām vṛttiḥ udāhṛtā

original: ākhyātānāṃ tu vācyo 'rthaḥ purastāc carcayiṣyate //
analyzed: ākhyātānām tu vācyaḥ ṛthaḥ purastāt carcayiṣyate

original: upasargānipātānāṃ nāmnām iva vibhāgataḥ /
analyzed: upasarga a nipātānām nāmnām iva vibhāgataḥ

original: prayogapratipattibhyāṃ anekārtho 'vagamyate //
analyzed: prayoga pratipattibhyām aneka arthaḥ vagamyate

original: upasargāḥ prācuryeṇa kriyāyoge vartante [upasargāḥ kriyāyoge] iti smāraṇāt //
analyzed: upasargāḥ prācuryeṇa kriyā yoge vartante upasargāḥ kriyā yoge iti smāraṇāt

original: kecit tu nāmabhir abhisambadhyate yathā īṣadarthavācinaḥ [āpiṅgaḥ] ityādayaḥ /
analyzed: kecid tu nāmabhiḥ abhisambadhyate yathā īṣat artha vācinaḥ āpiṅgaḥ ityādayaḥ

original: anye kriyāgarbhatayā nāmnā sambadhyante /
analyzed: anye kriyā garbha tayā nāmnā sambadhyante

original: yathā pragataṃ vayaḥ yasya saḥ pravayā iti //
analyzed: yathā pragatam vayaḥ yasya saḥ pravayāḥ iti

original: anye dhātor vicitrārthatām āpādayantaḥ tadviśeṣaṇatvena sambadhyante /
analyzed: anye dhātoḥ vicitra artha tām āpādayantaḥ tad viśeṣaṇa tvena sambadhyante

original: yathoktam [upasargavaśād dhātur arthāntaravilāsakṛt /
analyzed: yathā uktam upasarga vaśāt dhātuḥ artha antara vilāsa kṛt

original: prahārāhārasaṃhāravihāraparihāravat] //
analyzed: prahāra āhāra saṃhāra vihāra parihāra vat

original: nanu ca kvacid upasargo dhātvartham eva bādhamāno dṛśyate /
analyzed: nanu ca kvacid upasargaḥ dhātu artham eva bādhamānaḥ dṛśyate

original: yathā [prasthitaḥ] iti gatinivṛttivācī dhātuḥ pravṛttagativacanatāṃ nītaḥ praśabdena /
analyzed: yathā prasthitaḥ iti gati nivṛtti vācī dhātuḥ pravṛtta gati vacana tām nītaḥ pra śabdena

original: na cedṛśaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati //
analyzed: na ca īdṛśam viśeṣaṇam bhavitum arhati

original: yena svārthavirodhena viśeṣa upajanyate /
analyzed: yena sva artha virodhena viśeṣaḥ upajanyate

original: viśeṣaṇaṃ tad eveṣṭaṃ na tu yat svārthanāśanam //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇam tat evā iṣṭam na tu yat sva artha nāśanam

original: iti //
analyzed: iti

original: naiṣa doṣaḥ arthāntarābhidhānasāmarthyāpādanam eva dhātor vidadhad upasargo viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: na eṣa doṣaḥ artha antara abhidhāna sāmarthya āpādanam eva dhātoḥ vidadhat upasargaḥ viśeṣaṇam bhavitum arhati

original: anekārthāmidhānaśaktiś ca dhātur upasargeṇa niyate 'rthe 'vasthāpyata iti tasya tadviśeṣaṇatā //
analyzed: aneka artha amidhāna śaktiḥ ca dhātuḥ upasargeṇa niyate rthe vasthāpyate iti tasya tad viśeṣaṇa tā

original: upasargāḥ kim arthasya vācakā dyotakā iti /
analyzed: upasargāḥ kim arthasya vācakāḥ dyotakāḥ iti

original: prakṛtānupayogitvāt ihaitan na vicāryate //
analyzed: prakṛta anupayogi tvāt iha etat na vicāryate

original: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tadartho hy avadhāryate /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām tad arthaḥ hi avadhāryate

original: tadāgame tatpratīteḥ tadabhāve tadagrahāt //
analyzed: tad āgame tad pratīteḥ tad abhāve tad agrahāt

original: te tu kiṃ vācakās santaḥ tadavagatim upadadhati kiṃ vā dyotakāḥ iti kim anena //
analyzed: te tu kim vācakāḥ santaḥ tad avagatim upadadhati kim vā dyotakāḥ iti kim anena

original: evaṃ samuccayādivācināṃ cādinipātānāṃ [vṛkṣaṃ prati dyotate] iti karmapravacanīyānāṃ ca arthaḥ prayogapratipattibhyām avadhāraṇīya ity alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: evam samuccaya ādi vācinām ca ādi nipātānām vṛkṣam prati dyotate iti karmapravacanīyānām ca arthaḥ prayoga pratipattibhyām avadhāraṇīyaḥ iti alam prasaṅgena

original: ayam asya padasyārtha iti kiṃ cintiteta vā /
analyzed: ayam asya padasya arthaḥ iti kim vā

original: yo 'rthaḥ pratīyate yasmāt sa tasyārtha iti sthitiḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ rthaḥ pratīyate yasmāt sa tasya arthaḥ iti sthitiḥ

original: spaṣṭām api tu ye buddhiṃ nirūpayitum akṣamāḥ /
analyzed: spaṣṭām api tu ye buddhim nirūpayitum akṣamāḥ

original: tān bodhayitum asmābhiḥ diṅmātram upadarśitam //
analyzed: tān bodhayitum asmābhiḥ diś mātram upadarśitam

original: iti pramāṇatvasamarthanāya śabdasya kiñcid dvayam uktavantaḥ !padābhideyārthanirūpaṇaṃ tu śāstrāntare vistaratataḥ praṇītam //
analyzed: iti pramāṇa tva samarthanāya śabdasya kiñcid dvayam uktavantaḥ pada abhideya artha nirūpaṇam tu śāstra antare vistaratataḥ praṇītam

original: tatkṣodanena na naḥ prayojanam atidrāghīyasī sā hi bhūḥ anyām eva diśaṃ parīkṣitum ato 'smābhir gṛhītaḥ kṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tad kṣodanena na naḥ prayojanam atidrāghīyasī sā hi bhūḥ anyām eva diśam parīkṣitum atas smābhiḥ gṛhītaḥ kṣaṇaḥ

original: jātyādyarthasamarthanena kathitā bāhyārthasaṃsparśitā śabdānām iyataiva nauv avasare 'muṣmin kṛtārthā vayam //
analyzed: jāti ādi artha samarthanena kathitā bāhya artha saṃsparśi tā śabdānām iyatā eva avasare muṣmin kṛtārthāḥ vayam

original: evaṃ padārthe nirṇīte vākyārthaniścintyate 'dunā /
analyzed: evam padārthe nirṇīte

original: tatra vipratipattiś ca bahurūpā vipaścitām //
analyzed: tatra vipratipattiḥ ca bahu rūpā vipaścitām

original: kecid ācakṣate bāhyasya vākyārthasyāsaṃbhavāt padārthasaṃsarganirbhāsaṃ jñānam eva vākyārtha iti //
analyzed: kecid ācakṣate bāhyasya vākya arthasya asaṃbhavāt padārtha saṃsarga nirbhāsam jñānam eva vākya arthaḥ iti

original: anye tu vāstavaḥ padārthānāṃ parasparasaṃsargo bāhya eva vākyārtha ity āhuḥ //
analyzed: anye tu vāstavaḥ padārthānām paraspara saṃsargaḥ bāhyaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ iti āhuḥ

original: anyavyavacchedo vākyārtha ity apare śuklādipadāntaroccāraṇe kṛṣṇādinivṛtter avagamāt //
analyzed: anya vyavacchedaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti apare śukla ādi pada antara uccāraṇe kṛṣṇa ādi nivṛtteḥ avagamāt

original: apare saṃgirante saṃsargasya durapahnavatvāt tasya ca guṇaparadhānabhāvagarbhatvāt guṇībhūtakārakanikaranirvartyā pradhānabhūtā kriyā vākyārtha iti //
analyzed: apare saṃgirante saṃsargasya durapahnava tvāt tasya ca guṇa para dhāna bhāva garbha tvāt guṇībhūta kāraka nikara nirvartyā pradhāna bhūtā kriyā vākya arthaḥ iti

original: anye manyante bhāvyaniṣṭhaḥ puruṣavyāpāraḥ karotyarthā bhāvanāśabdavācyo vākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: anye manyante bhāvya niṣṭhaḥ puruṣa vyāpāraḥ karoti arthāḥ bhāvanā śabda vācyaḥ vākya arthaḥ

original: liṇādiśabdavyāpāravācyas tu śabdabhāvanākhyaḥ puruṣasyārthabhāvanānuṣṭhāne pravartakaḥ sa vidhir ucyata iti //
analyzed: liṇa ādi śabda vyāpāra vācyaḥ tu śabda bhāvanā ākhyaḥ puruṣasya artha bhāvanā anuṣṭhāne pravartakaḥ sa vidhiḥ ucyate iti

original: anye bruvate dvayābhidhāne liṇādeḥ pratyayasya bhāragauravat vidhir eva vākyārthaḥ sa evānuṣṭheyaḥ pravartakaś ceti //
analyzed: anye bruvate dvaya abhidhāne liṇa ādeḥ pratyayasya bhāra gaura vat vidhiḥ eva vākya arthaḥ saḥ eva anuṣṭheyaḥ pravartakaḥ ca iti

original: tatrāpi dvayī vimatiḥ kaiścit preṣaṇātmakatvaṃ śabdasyābhyupagatam liṇādiśabdebhyas tathā tadavagamāt kāryāntarānavagamāt bhāvārthamātrakāryatvapakṣasya cātidaurbalyād vidhir evānuṣṭheya ity arthāt tasya kāryatvam //
analyzed: tatra api dvayī vimatiḥ kaiścid preṣaṇa ātmaka tvam śabdasya abhyupagatam liṇa ādi śabdebhyaḥ tathā tad avagamāt kārya antara anavagamāt bhāva artha mātra kārya tva pakṣasya ca ati daurbalyāt vidhiḥ eva anuṣṭheyaḥ iti arthāt tasya kārya tvam

original: anyais tu kāryatvena niyogapratīteḥarthāt tasya prerakatvam iti saṃśritam /
analyzed: anyaiḥ tu kārya tvena niyoga pratīteḥ arthāt tasya preraka tvam iti saṃśritam

original: kāryam avagataṃ svasiddhaye puruṣaṃ niyuṅkte [mamedaṃ kāryaṃ] ity avagate hi tatsiddhaye puruṣaḥ pravartata iti //
analyzed: kāryam avagatam sva siddhaye puruṣam niyuṅkte mama idam kāryam iti avagate hi tad siddhaye puruṣaḥ pravartate iti

original: apare punaḥ abhinavaṃ vākyārthaṃ udyogaṃ nāma varṇayāṃ babhūvuḥ ity anekaśākhā vipratipattiḥ /
analyzed: apare punar abhinavam vākya artham udyogam nāma varṇayām babhūvuḥ iti aneka śākhā vipratipattiḥ

original: tad atra kiṃ tattvam iti //
analyzed: tat atra kim tattvam iti

original: atraike tāvad āhuḥ vākyārtho nāma pāramārthiko bahir nāsty eva /
analyzed: atra eke tāvat āhuḥ vākya arthaḥ nāma pāramārthikaḥ bahis na asti eva

original: sa hi padārthebhyo vyatirikto vā syāt avyatirikto vā na vyatiriktaḥ bhedānupalambhāt /
analyzed: sa hi padārthebhyaḥ vyatiriktaḥ vā syāt a vyatiriktaḥ vā na vyatiriktaḥ bheda anupalambhāt

original: [gauḥ śuklā ānīyatāṃ] ity atra padagrāme jātiguṇakriyādipadārthavyatirekeṇa ko 'sau vākyārthaḥ sa na darśayituṃ śakyate /
analyzed: gauḥ śuklā ānīyatām iti atra pada grāme jāti guṇa kriyā ādi padārtha vyatirekeṇa kaḥ sau vākya arthaḥ sa na darśayitum śakyate

original: avyatireke tu padārthā eva vākyārthaḥ pratyekaṃ vā syāt sāmastyena vā na pratyekaṃ tathā 'navagamāt na hi gaur iti padārtha eva vākyārtho bhavati //
analyzed: avyatireke tu padārthāḥ eva vākya arthaḥ pratyekam vā syāt sāmastyena vā na pratyekam tathā na avagamāt na hi gauḥ iti padārthaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ bhavati

original: sāmastyaṃ tu na teṣām asti tad dhi sattayā bhavet pratītyā vā sattayā na sāmastyam aśeṣapadārtharāśer astīti niyataḥ kiś cana vākyārtho 'vadhāryate /
analyzed: sāmastyam tu na teṣām asti tat hi sattayā bhavet pratītyā vā sattayā na sāmastyam aśeṣa padārtha rāśeḥ asti iti niyataḥ kim cana vākya arthaḥ vadhāryate

original: pratītyā tu sāmastyam adhaṭamānam yugapadbhāvitvena jñānānāṃ ekapadārthapratītisamaye padārthāntarapratītyasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: pratītyā tu sāmastyam adhaṭamānam yugapad bhāvi tvena jñānānām eka padārtha pratīti samaye padārtha antara pratīti asaṃbhavāt

original: padārthapratityupāyāś ca varṇāḥ /
analyzed: padārtha pratiti upāyāḥ ca varṇāḥ

original: te 'pi na yugapadbhāvinaḥ /
analyzed: te pi na yugapad bhāvinaḥ

original: kutaḥ pratītikṛtaṃ sāmastyam api ca padārthasamudāyaḥ kim itaretarasaṃsṣto vākyārthaḥ anyathā vā na tāvad anyathā [gaur aśvaḥ puruṣo hastī] ity evamādāv adarśanāt /
analyzed: kutas pratīti kṛtam sāmastyam api ca padārtha samudāyaḥ kim itaretara saṃsṣtaḥ vākya arthaḥ anyathā vā na tāvat anyathā gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ hastī iti evamādau adarśanāt

original: saṃsargas tu durupapādaḥ/
analyzed: saṃsargaḥ tu durupapādaḥ

original: sa hy apekṣā gato bhavati /
analyzed: sa hi apekṣāḥ gataḥ bhavati

original: na cārtho 'rthāntaram ākāṅkṣati acetanatvāt /
analyzed: na ca arthaḥ ṛtha antaram ākāṅkṣati acetana tvāt

original: buddhīnām api kṣaṇikatvāt anyonyaṃ nākāṅkṣā /
analyzed: buddhīnām api kṣaṇika tvāt anyonyam na ākāṅkṣā

original: na ca tatkṛitaḥ sambandhaḥ //
analyzed: na ca tad kṛitaḥ sambandhaḥ

original: ata eva na saṃsargo vākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva na saṃsargaḥ vākya arthaḥ

original: na hyasau arthānāṃ jñānānāṃ vā yothoktanītyā 'vakalpate //
analyzed: na hi asau arthānām jñānānām vā yothā ukta nītyā

original: vyavacchedo 'py evam eva nirākāryaḥ /
analyzed: vyavacchedaḥ pi evam eva nirākāryaḥ

original: so 'pi hi na jñānānām upapadyate /
analyzed: saḥ pi hi na jñānānām upapadyate

original: tad uktam [yadi dhriyate gobuddhiḥ śuklabuddhijanikṣaṇe/
analyzed: tat uktam yadi dhriyate go buddhiḥ śukla buddhi jani kṣaṇe

original: tato 'nyābhyo nivarteta saṃsṛjyetātha vā tayā] iti //
analyzed: tatas nyābhyaḥ nivarteta saṃsṛjyeta atha vā tayā iti

original: na cāpekṣāyāṃ satyām api sambandhaḥ kaścid upalabhyate /
analyzed: na ca apekṣāyām satyām api sambandhaḥ kaścid upalabhyate

original: yathoktam [apekṣaṇe 'pi sambandho naiva kaścit pratīyate/
analyzed: yathā uktam apekṣaṇe sambandhaḥ nā eva kaścid pratīyate

original: kāryakāraṇasaṃyogasamavāyādilakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa saṃyoga samavāya ādi lakṣaṇaḥ

original: ekārthavṛttiparāyas tu sambandho 'tiprasajyate] iti //
analyzed: eka artha vṛtti parāyaḥ tu iti

original: arthānāṃ tu kaścid api bhavan sambandhaḥ śabdair anabhidhīyamānatvāt asatkalpa eva na ca bhedasaṃsargayor vācakaṃ kiñcit padam asti aśravaṇāt /
analyzed: arthānām tu kaścid api bhavan sambandhaḥ śabdaiḥ anabhidhīyamāna tvāt asat kalpaḥ eva na ca bheda saṃsargayoḥ vācakam kiñcid padam asti aśravaṇāt

original: asati ca tadvācani pade na tayoḥ padārthatvam /
analyzed: asati ca tad vācani pade na tayoḥ padārtha tvam

original: apadārthasya ca na vācyārthatvam //
analyzed: apadārthasya ca na vācyārtha tvam

original: śrute 'pi tadvācini pade sutarām asaṅgatiḥ [gauḥ śukla ānīyatāṃ saṃsargaḥ] iti ko 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: śrute tad vācini pade sutarām asaṅgatiḥ gauḥ śuklaḥ ānīyatām saṃsargaḥ iti kaḥ rthaḥ

original: tasmāt bāhyasya vākyārthasya sarvaprakāram asaṃbhavāt padārthasarganirbhāsaṃ jñānagātraṃ vākyārthaḥ tenaiva lokavyavahāra iti //
analyzed: tasmāt bāhyasya vākya arthasya sarva prakāram asaṃbhavāt padārtha sarga nirbhāsam jñāna gātram vākya arthaḥ tena eva lokavyavahāraḥ iti

original: tad idam anupapannam bāhyārthasyānantaram eva vistareṇa parasādhitatvāt /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam bāhya arthasya anantaram eva vistareṇa para sādhita tvāt

original: ca saṃsarganirbhāsaṃ jñānaṃ vākyārtho bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: ca saṃsarga nirbhāsam jñānam vākya arthaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: sthāpayitvā hi bāhyārthaṃ vākyārthacintām upakrantovanto vayam /
analyzed: sthāpayitvā hi bāhya artham vākya artha cintām vayam

original: ataḥ ko 'vasaro vijñānamāṃtravākyārthatvavarṇanasya //
analyzed: atas kaḥ vasaraḥ vijñāna māṃtra vākya artha tva varṇanasya

original: na ca padārthavyatirikto nāsti vākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: na ca padārtha vyatiriktaḥ na asti vākya arthaḥ

original: idaṃ tāvad bhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām /
analyzed: idam tāvat bhavān pṛṣṭaḥ vyācaṣṭām

original: kiṃ [gauḥ] iti padād yādṛśī pratipattiḥ tādṛśyeva [gauḥ śukla ānīyatām] iti vākyāt uta bhinne ete pratipattī iti //
analyzed: kim gauḥ iti padāt yādṛśī pratipattiḥ tādṛśī eva gauḥ śuklaḥ ānīyatām iti vākyāt uta bhinne ete pratipattī iti

original: tatra tulyatvaṃ tāvat pratipattyor anubhavaviruddham /
analyzed: tatra tulya tvam tāvat pratipattyoḥ anubhava viruddham

original: vailakṣaṇye tu pratītyoḥ viṣayavailakṣaṇyam api balād upanatam asati viṣayabhede pratītibhedānupapatteḥ/
analyzed: vailakṣaṇye tu pratītyoḥ viṣaya vailakṣaṇyam api balāt upanatam asati viṣaya bhede pratīti bheda anupapatteḥ

original: yaś ca tadatirikto viṣayaḥ sa vākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca tad atiriktaḥ viṣayaḥ sa vākya arthaḥ

original: evaṃ kevalaguṇakriyāpadoccāraṇe 'pi yojanīyam /
analyzed: evam kevala guṇa kriyā pada uccāraṇe yojanīyam

original: tad uktaṃ yad ādhikyaṃ sa vākyārthaḥ iti //
analyzed: tat uktam yat ādhikyam sa vākya arthaḥ iti

original: saṃsargo 'pi padānāṃ na na pratīyate /
analyzed: saṃsargaḥ pi padānām na na pratīyate

original: na hi [gaur aśvaḥ puruṣo hastī] ity asaṃsṛṣṭapadārthapratītivat [gauḥ śukla ānīyatām] iti pratītiḥ /
analyzed: na hi gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ hastī iti asaṃsṛṣṭa padārtha pratīti vat gauḥ śuklaḥ ānīyatām iti pratītiḥ

original: yathā ca saṃsargaḥ pratīyate yaś ca pratītyupāyaḥ tat sarvaṃ vistarato nirṇeṣyate /
analyzed: yathā ca saṃsargaḥ pratīyate yaḥ ca pratīti upāyaḥ tat sarvam vistarataḥ nirṇeṣyate

original: tasmāt bāhya eva vākyārthaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt bāhyaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ

original: bāhya eva bhavan na vyavacchedo vākyārthaḥ vidhirūpatvenāvagamāt /
analyzed: bāhyaḥ eva bhavan na vyavacchedaḥ vākya arthaḥ vidhi rūpa tvena avagamāt

original: saṃsargam antareṇa cānyavyavacchedasyāpi durupapādatvāt /
analyzed: saṃsargam antareṇa ca anya vyavacchedasya api durupapāda tvāt

original: na hi śuklapadenāsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ gopadārtha kṛṣṇādibhyo vyāvṛtta ity avagamyate //
analyzed: na hi śukla padena asaṃsṛṣṭaḥ go padārtha kṛṣṇa ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttaḥ iti avagamyate

original: gośabdāt sarvagavīṣu buddhir upasarpantī padajanitā śuklapadasannidhānāt anyataḥ kṛṣṇāder apasarpatīti vyavacchedo vākyārtha iti cet maivam tatsambandhāvagamapūrvakatvāt taditaravyāvṛtteḥ /
analyzed: go śabdāt sarva gavīṣu buddhiḥ upasarpantī pada janitā śukla pada sannidhānāt anyatas kṛṣṇa ādeḥ apasarpati iti vyavacchedaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti ced mā evam tad sambandha avagama pūrvaka tvāt tad itara vyāvṛtteḥ

original: tatsambandhāvabodhenaiva siddhe vākyasya arthavattve pāścātyaḥ kṛṣṇādivyavacchedāvagamo yadi bhavati bhavatu kāmaṃ na tv asau vākyārtha iti //
analyzed: tad sambandha avabodhena eva siddhe vākyasya arthavat tve pāścātyaḥ kṛṣṇa ādi vyavaccheda avagamaḥ yadi bhavati bhavatu kāmam na tu asau vākya arthaḥ iti

original: tad evaṃ vidhirūpe bāhye ca śabdārthe 'vasthite sati kriyām eva kecid vākyārthaṃ varṇayanti /
analyzed: tat evam vidhi rūpe bāhye ca śabda arthe sati kriyām eva kecid vākya artham varṇayanti

original: ayam eṣām āśayaḥ padārthāḥ kila vākyārthabhāvam āyanti saṃhatāḥ/
analyzed: ayam eṣām āśayaḥ padārthāḥ kila vākya artha bhāvam āyanti saṃhatāḥ

original: apekṣānuguṇānyonyavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣataḥ //
analyzed: apekṣā anuguṇa anyonya vyatiṣaṅga viśeṣataḥ

original: na ca guṇapradhānabhāvam antareṇa saṃsargaḥ padārthānām avakalpate /
analyzed: na ca guṇa pradhāna bhāvam antareṇa saṃsargaḥ padārthānām avakalpate

original: na cākhyātarahitaṃ vākyaṃ kiñcit prayogayogyam /
analyzed: na ca ākhyāta rahitam vākyam kiñcid prayoga yogyam

original: anuccārite tasmin ākāṅkṣāyā anivṛtteḥ /
analyzed: an uccārite tasmin ākāṅkṣāyāḥ anivṛtteḥ

original: śrotrākāṅkṣānivṛttaye ca vākyānāṃ loke prayogaḥ /
analyzed: śrotra ākāṅkṣā nivṛttaye ca vākyānām loke prayogaḥ

original: lokavac ca vedād apy artho 'vasīyate /
analyzed: loka vat ca vedāt api arthaḥ vasīyate

original: ākhyātāc ca pūrvāparībhūrtaḥ sādhyarūpo 'rtho 'vagamyate na siddharūpaḥ /
analyzed: ākhyātāt ca sādhya rūpaḥ rthaḥ avagamyate na siddha rūpaḥ

original: siddhasādhyasamuccāraṇe kasya kiṃtantrateti cintāyāṃ sādhyasiddhaye siddham upāttam iti pratīyate //
analyzed: siddha sādhya samuccāraṇe kasya kiṃtantra tā iti cintāyām sādhya siddhaye siddham upāttam iti pratīyate

original: sādhyaṃ ca sādhyamānatvāt pradhānam avagamyate/
analyzed: sādhyam ca sādhyamāna tvāt pradhānam avagamyate

original: tasmāt tad eva vākyārthaḥ kriyāto nāparaṃ ca yat //
analyzed: tasmāt tat eva vākya arthaḥ kriyātaḥ na aparam ca yat

original: kriyā hi pratīyamānā svaniṣpataye sādhanāny ākṣipati taiś ca yogyaiḥ saṃbandhyate /
analyzed: kriyā hi pratīyamānā sva niṣpataye sādhanāni ākṣipati taiḥ ca yogyaiḥ saṃbandhyate

original: tāni ca kaiścit padāntaropāttāni bhavanti /
analyzed: tāni ca kaiścid pada antara upāttāni bhavanti

original: kānicit vākyāntaropanītāni /
analyzed: kānicid vākya antara upanītāni

original: kānicit prakaraṇāntarapāṭhalabhyāni /
analyzed: kānicid prakaraṇa antara pāṭha labhyāni

original: kānicid ārād upakārakāṇi /
analyzed: kānicid ārāt upakārakāṇi

original: kānicit sannipatyopakārakāṇi kānicid antikopanipatitāny api yogyatāvirahāt pariharanti /
analyzed: kānicid sannipatya upakārakāṇi kānicid antika upanipatitāni api yogya tā virahāt pariharanti

original: kānicid atidūravartāny api yogyāni svasaṃpattyartham āharanti /
analyzed: kānicid ati dūra vartāni api yogyāni sva saṃpatti artham āharanti

original: ityevaṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭopakārakānekakārakakalāpasaṃpādyamānasvarūpā kriyaiva vākyārthaḥ //
analyzed: iti evam dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa upakāraka aneka kāraka kalāpa saṃpādyamāna svarūpā kriyā eva vākya arthaḥ

original: yajeta dadyāj juhuyāt adhīyīteti coditaḥ/
analyzed: yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt adhīyīta iti coditaḥ

original: kriyāṃ sādhyatayā vetti tāṃ ca loko 'nutiṣṭḥati //
analyzed: kriyām sādhya tayā vetti tām ca lokaḥ

original: adhikāripadam api kriyāpekṣitakartṛsamarpaṇena tadupayogitām evāvalambate asyāṃ kriyāyām ayaṃ kartā aneneyaṃ kriyā saṃpadyate iti /
analyzed: adhikāri padam api kriyā apekṣita kartṛ samarpaṇena tad upayogi tām eva avalambate asyām kriyāyām ayam kartā anena iyam kriyā saṃpadyate iti

original: tatra ca na kriyā svaprādhānyam ujjhati /
analyzed: tatra ca na kriyā sva prādhānyam ujjhati

original: na hi kriyā kartrarthā kartā tu kriyārthaḥ /
analyzed: na hi kriyā kartṛ arthā kartā tu kriyā arthaḥ

original: sa hi tāṃ nirvartayann upalabhyate /
analyzed: sa hi tām nirvartayan upalabhyate

original: śabdo 'pi tathaivopadiśati [eṣa idaṃ kuryāt] iti //
analyzed: śabdaḥ api tathā eva upadiśati eṣaḥ idam kuryāt iti

original: kim atha punar asau kriyām anutiṣṭhatīti cet śabdaprāmāṇyād eveiti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: kim atha punar asau kriyām anutiṣṭhati iti ced śabda prāmāṇyāt eva iti brūmaḥ

original: śabdena hi coditaḥ [tvayedaṃ kartavyam] iti /
analyzed: śabdena hi coditaḥ tvayā idam kartavyam iti

original: sa cen niyukto nānutiṣṭhan codanām atikrāmet /
analyzed: sa ced niyuktaḥ na anutiṣṭhan codanām atikrāmet

original: śastrapratyayāc ca kriyām anutiṣṭhati /
analyzed: śastra pratyayāt ca kriyām anutiṣṭhati

original: virataphalābhilāṣaḥ karmasaṃskārād eva paripakvakaṣāyaḥ stokastokaprapaṃcapravilāpanadvāreṇottamādhikāram ārūḍhaḥ tata eva jñātāsvādaḥ tam eva paramapuruṣārtham āsādayatīti dīrghā sā kathā tiṣṭhatu kim anayā ṣarvathā kriyāprādhānyāt saiva vākyārtha iti /
analyzed: virata phala abhilāṣaḥ karma saṃskārāt eva paripakva kaṣāyaḥ stoka stoka prapaṃca pravilāpana dvāreṇa uttama adhikāram ārūḍhaḥ tatas eva jñāta āsvādaḥ tam eva parama puruṣa artham āsādayati iti dīrghā sā kathā tiṣṭhatu kim anayā ṣarvathā kriyā prādhānyāt sā eva vākya arthaḥ iti

original: tad uktam [dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣu bādariḥ] iti //
analyzed: tat uktam dravya guṇa saṃskāreṣu bādariḥ iti

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati dravyādīnām eva kriyāṃ prati śeṣatvam anugamyate na kriyāyā anyaśeṣatvam iti //
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati dravya ādīnām eva kriyām prati śeṣa tvam anugamyate na kriyāyāḥ anya śeṣa tvam iti

original: atrocyate kuta idaṃ kriyāyāḥ prādhānyam upeyate vastuvṛttena va śabdapratyayamahimnā vā phalasya vastutas tāvat prādhānyam avagamyate/
analyzed: atrā ucyate kutas idam kriyāyāḥ prādhānyam upeyate vastu vṛttena śabda pratyaya mahimnā vā phalasya vastutas tāvat prādhānyam avagamyate

original: na sacetāḥ kriyāṃ kāṃcit anutiṣṭhati niṣphalām //
analyzed: na sa cetāḥ kriyām kāṃcid anutiṣṭhati niṣphalām

original: vedād guruniyogād vā śāsanād vā mahībhujaḥ/
analyzed: vedāt guru niyogāt vā śāsanāt vā mahībhujaḥ

original: na vai phalam apaśyantaḥ kriyāṃ vidadhate janāḥ //
analyzed: na vai phalam a paśyantaḥ kriyām vidadhate janāḥ

original: bālo māṇavako 'py eṣaḥ capeṭāmātrahānaye/
analyzed: bālaḥ pi eṣaḥ capeṭā mātra hānaye

original: modakādyāptaye vā 'pi karoti guruśāsanam //
analyzed: modaka ādi āptaye vā karoti guru śāsanam

original: athocyate na vastutaḥ prādhānyam ihāśrīyate api tu śabdataḥ /
analyzed: atha ucyate na vastutas prādhānyam iha āśrīyate api tu śabdataḥ

original: śabdapramāṇakā vayam /
analyzed: śabda pramāṇakāḥ vayam

original: yat śabda āha tad evāsmākaṃ pramāṇam /
analyzed: yat śabdaḥ āha tat eva asmākam pramāṇam

original: tad yathā [rājapuruṣaḥ] iti /
analyzed: tat yathā rāja puruṣaḥ iti

original: vastuvṛtte rājā jagatāmīśitā pradhānam puruṣas tapasvī tad icchānuvartanena jīvati /
analyzed: vastu vṛtte rājā jagatām īśitā pradhānam puruṣaḥ tapasvī tat icchā anuvartanena jīvati

original: śabdas tu puruṣaprādhānyam ācaṣṭe uttarapadārthapradhānatvāt tatpuruṣasyeti /
analyzed: śabdaḥ tu puruṣa prādhānyam ācaṣṭe uttara padārtha pradhāna tvāt tatpuruṣasya iti

original: evam ihāpi [yajeta] [dadyāt] [juhuyāt] iti kriyāṃ prādhānyenopadiśati śabdaḥ /
analyzed: evam iha api yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt iti kriyām prādhānyena upadiśati śabdaḥ

original: [svargakāmaḥ] ity api kriyāṃ prati kartur upadeśaḥ /
analyzed: svarga kāmaḥ iti api kriyām prati kartuḥ upadeśaḥ

original: vastuvṛttena tu karmaṇi kriyāmāṇe karmasvābhāvyāt phalaṃ ced bhavati bhavatu tat puruṣo 'pi prīyatāṃ nāma phalena na tu śabdaḥ phalopadeśaniṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: vastu vṛttena tu karmaṇi kriyāmāṇe karma svābhāvyāt phalam ced bhavati bhavatu tat puruṣaḥ pi prīyatām nāma phalena na tu śabdaḥ phala upadeśa niṣṭhaḥ

original: āha ca [tasmiṃs tu kṛte svayam eva tad bhavati] iti /
analyzed: āha ca tasmin tu kṛte svayam eva tat bhavati iti

original: svayam eveti korthaḥ na śabdaḥ phalapāratantryaṃ kriyāyāḥ pratipādayatīti //
analyzed: svayam eva iti kaḥ ṛthaḥ na śabdaḥ phala pāratantryam kriyāyāḥ pratipādayati iti

original: tad etad ukutaṃ evaṃ varṇyamāne [svargakāmo yajeta] iti svargakāmapadasyānvayo durupapādaḥ //
analyzed: tat etat evam varṇyamāne svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti svarga kāma padasya anvayaḥ durupapādaḥ

original: nanu kartṛpadam etat /
analyzed: nanu kartṛ padam etat

original: kartā ca kriyārthaḥ kartrarthā kriyety uktam na kartṛpadaṃ svargakāma iti kin tv adhikāripadam etat /
analyzed: kartā ca kriyā arthaḥ kartṛ arthā kriyā iti uktam na kartṛ padam svarga kāmaḥ iti kin tu adhikāri padam etat

original: na hi jātyaiva kaścit svargakāmo nāma kutracit puruṣo 'vagamyate yo 'tra kartṛtvena niyujyeta /
analyzed: na hi jātyā eva kaścid svarga kāmaḥ nāma kutracid puruṣaḥ avagamyate yaḥ tra kartṛ tvena niyujyeta

original: svarge kāmo yasyāsau svargakāmaḥ svarga vā kāmayati svargakāmaḥ /
analyzed: svarge kāmaḥ yasya asau svarga kāmaḥ svarga vā kāmayati svarga kāmaḥ

original: ubhayathāpi svargakāmanāviśiṣṭaḥ puruṣas tasmāt padād avagamyate /
analyzed: ubhayathā api svarga kāmanā viśiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ tasmāt padāt avagamyate

original: tad atra kāmyamānaḥ svargaḥ kathaṃ yāgakriyayā saṃbadhyate dṛṣṭena adṛṣṭena vopakareṇa yadi hi candanaṃ svargaḥ ṣoḍaśavarṣadeśīyā aṅganāḥ svargaḥ iti candanāṅganādidravyasāmānādikaraṇyaprayogāt dravyavacanaḥ svargaśabdaḥ tadā [dravyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ] iti dadhyādivat sādhanatvena svarga upakaroti kriyāyāḥ /
analyzed: tat atra kāmyamānaḥ svargaḥ katham yāga kriyayā saṃbadhyate dṛṣṭena a dṛṣṭena vā upakareṇa yadi hi candanam svargaḥ ṣoḍaśa varṣa deśīyāḥ aṅganāḥ svargaḥ iti candana aṅganā ādi dravya sāmānādikaraṇya prayogāt dravya vacanaḥ svarga śabdaḥ tadā dravyāṇām karma saṃyoge guṇa tvena abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti dadhi ādi vat sādhana tvena svargaḥ upakaroti kriyāyāḥ

original: kāmanā 'pi haraṇāṅgatvādupakāriṇī yat tayā dravyamānetuṃ yatata iti dṛṣṭopakāritvam //
analyzed: kāmanā pi haraṇa aṅga tvāt upakāriṇī yat tayā dravyam ānetum yatate iti dṛṣṭa upakāri tvam

original: tac caitad asāram svargaśabdasya dravyavācitvābhāvāt /
analyzed: tat ca etat asāram svarga śabdasya dravya vāci tva abhāvāt

original: prītivacanohy eṣa svargaśabdaḥ na dravyavacanaḥ /
analyzed: prīti vacanaḥ hi eṣa svarga śabdaḥ na dravya vacanaḥ

original: tad eva candanaṃ śītātureṇa agrīṣmopahatena vā na svarga iti vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: tat eva candanam śīta ātureṇa agrīṣma upahatena vā na svargaḥ iti vyapadiśyate

original: saivāṅganā viratāyāṃ suratatṛṣi na svarga ityucyate /
analyzed: sā eva aṅganā viratāyām surata tṛṣi na svargaḥ iti ucyate

original: tad evam eṣa svargaśabdaḥ pratītiṃ na vyabhicarati dravyaṃ tu vyabhicarati /
analyzed: tat evam eṣa svarga śabdaḥ pratītim na vyabhicarati dravyam tu vyabhicarati

original: evam adravyatvāt svargasya na kriyāṅgatvam //
analyzed: evam adravya tvāt svargasya na kriyā aṅga tvam

original: athāpi niratiśayasukhapratītyanyathā 'nupapattitaḥ parikalpitaḥ kanakagiriśikharādir deśaḥ svargaḥ sutarāṃ tasya na kriyāsādhanatvam avakalpate dadhyādivad upādātum aśakyatvāt //
analyzed: athā api niratiśaya sukha pratīti anyathā nupapattitaḥ parikalpitaḥ kanaka giri śikhara ādiḥ deśaḥ svargaḥ sutarām tasya na kriyā sādhanatvam avakalpate dadhi ādi vat upādātum aśakya tvāt

original: athāpi adṛṣṭenaiva dvāreṇa [samudraṃ manasā dhyāyeta] itivat svargakāmanā tatropakāriṇī tad api kliṣṭakalpanāmātram pratītir hi niratiśayā svargaḥ /
analyzed: atha api adṛṣṭena eva dvāreṇa samudram manasā dhyāyeta iti vat svarga kāmanā tatra upakāriṇī tat api kliṣṭa kalpanā mātram pratītiḥ hi niratiśayā svargaḥ

original: pratīteś cānanyārthatvaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: pratīteḥ ca ananya artha tvam yuktam

original: prītyartham anyat nānyarthā prītiḥ /
analyzed: prīti artham anyat na anyarthā prītiḥ

original: tasmān na yāgāya svargaḥ api tu svargāya yāgaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt na yāgāya svargaḥ api tu svargāya yāgaḥ

original: itthaṃ ca kriyāsādhanānupadeśāt na kartṛsamarpakatvena svargakāmapadaṃ samanveti //
analyzed: ittham ca kriyā sādhana anupadeśāt na kartṛ samarpaka tvena svarga kāma padam samanveti

original: kathaṃ tarhy asyānvayaḥ ādhikārivācitvena brūmaḥ /
analyzed: katham tarhi asya anvayaḥ ādhikāri vāci tvena brūmaḥ

original: ko 'yam adhikārī nāma karmaṇaḥ svāmī /
analyzed: kaḥ yam adhikārī nāma karmaṇaḥ svāmī

original: īsvaravacano hy adhikṛtaśabdaḥ //
analyzed: īsvara vacanaḥ hi adhikṛta śabdaḥ

original: nanu kartaiva karmaṇaḥ svāmī nānyaḥ maivam svāmī san kartā na kartā san svāmīti //
analyzed: nanu kartā eva karmaṇaḥ svāmī na anyaḥ mā evam svāmī san kartā na kartā san svāmī iti

original: nanu kriyākārakasambandhavyatiriktaḥ ko 'nyaḥ karmaṇaḥ puruṣasya ca sambandhaḥ ūcyate [mamedaṃ kartavyam] [aham atra svāmī] iti svasvāmibhāvam avagatya pāścātyaḥ kriyākārakasambandho 'vagamyate //
analyzed: nanu kriyā kāraka sambandha vyatiriktaḥ kaḥ nyaḥ karmaṇaḥ puruṣasya ca sambandhaḥ ūcyate mama idam kartavyam aham atra svāmī iti sva svāmi bhāvam avagatya pāścātyaḥ kriyā kāraka sambandhaḥ vagamyate

original: nana tvayāpi kriyākārakasambandhau nāpahnūyata eva jātivādineva vyaktipratītiḥ /
analyzed: nana tvayā api kriyā kāraka sambandhau nā apahnūyate eva jāti vādinā iva vyakti pratītiḥ

original: sa tu pāścātya iny atra kiṃ pramāṇam uktam atra anupādeyaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasya puṃsaḥ nirdeśād iti /
analyzed: sa tu pāścātyaḥ atra kim pramāṇam uktam atra anupādeya viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭasya puṃsaḥ nirdeśāt iti

original: kārakatvānuguṇaviśeṣaṇayogino hy asau kartṛtayā yogyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: kāraka tva anuguṇa viśeṣaṇa yoginaḥ hi asau kartṛ tayā yogyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ

original: tadviparyaye tv adhikāritveneti/
analyzed: tad viparyaye tu adhikāri tvena iti

original: tasmād adhikṛtasya kartṛtvam na karturadhikāraḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt adhikṛtasya kartṛ tvam na kartuḥ adhikāraḥ

original: itthaṃ ca svargakāmasyādhikṛtatvaṃ nirvahati /
analyzed: ittham ca svarga kāmasya adhikṛta tvam nirvahati

original: yadi hi tatkarma svargāya syāt svargo me bhogyo bhavet /
analyzed: yadi hi tat karma svargāya syāt svargaḥ me bhogyaḥ bhavet

original: katham ahaṃ svargaṃ prāpnuyām ity evaṃ sādhyatvena svargam icchan svargakāma ity ucyate /
analyzed: katham aham svargam prāpnuyām iti evam sādhya tvena svargam icchan svarga kāmaḥ iti ucyate

original: yadi ca na svargasādhanaṃ tatkarma tadviruddham evedam āpatati svargaṃ kāmayate yāgaṃ karotīti anyad icchati anyat katotīti hi syāt /
analyzed: yadi ca na svarga sādhanam tat karma tad viruddham eva idam āpatati svargam kāmayate yāgam karoti iti anyat icchati anyat hi syāt

original: ataḥ karmaṇaḥ kāmyamānasādhanatām apratipadyamānaḥ svargakāmaḥ tatra naivādhikriyate na cānadhikriyamāṇas tatra saṃbandhyate //
analyzed: atas karmaṇaḥ kāmyamāna sādhana tām apratipadyamānaḥ svarga kāmaḥ tatra na eva adhikriyate na ca anadhikriyamāṇaḥ tatra saṃbandhyate

original: tad evam adhikṛtatvena svargakāmasya karmaṇi saṃbandhāt svargayāgayośca sādhyasādhanabhāvāvagamam antareṇa tasyāśikārabnirvāhāsaṃbhavāt avaśyaṃkriyāyāḥ sādhanatvaṃ svargasya ca sādhyatvam abhyupagantavyam /
analyzed: tat evam adhikṛta tvena svarga kāmasya karmaṇi saṃbandhāt svarga yāgayoḥ ca sādhya sādhana bhāva avagamam antareṇa avaśyam kriyāyāḥ sādhana tvam svargasya ca sādhya tvam abhyupagantavyam

original: ataś ca kriyāyāḥ phalaṃ prati guṇabhāvān na prādhānyam /
analyzed: atas ca kriyāyāḥ phalam prati guṇa bhāvāt na prādhānyam

original: aprādhānyāc ca na vākyārthatvam /
analyzed: a prādhānyāt ca na vākya artha tvam

original: tad uktam karmaṇy api jaiminiḥ phalārthatvāt iti //
analyzed: tat uktam karmaṇi api jaiminiḥ phala artha tvāt iti

original: kā ceyaṃ kriyā vākyārtha ity ucyate ya eṣa yāgādiḥ bhāvārthe dhātuvācyaḥ uta pratyayārthaḥ kaścit tadatiriktaḥ iti //
analyzed: kā ca iyam kriyā vākya arthaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ eṣa yāga ādiḥ bhāva arthe dhātu vācyaḥ uta pratyaya arthaḥ kaścid tad atiriktaḥ iti

original: tatra bhāvārthasya kāmyamānasādhanatvāt aprādhānyam uktam eva /
analyzed: tatra bhāva arthasya kāmyamāna sādhana tvāt aprādhānyam uktam eva

original: pratyayārthe 'pi kāmyamānabhāvārthagatasādhanabhāvāparityāgainaiva pratīyamāno vākyārthatām eti nānyatheti /
analyzed: pratyaya arthe pi kāmyamāna bhāva artha gata sādhana bhāva a parityāgainā eva pratīyamānaḥ vākya artha tām eti na anyathā iti

original: sa cāyaṃ pareṣām api pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ayam pareṣām api pakṣaḥ

original: tasmān na kriyāmātraparyavasāyī vākyārtha iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt na kriyā mātra paryavasāyī vākya arthaḥ iti siddham

original: kim idānīṃ phalasyaiva vākyārthatvaṃ pracakṣmahe tad dhi pradhānaṃ sādhyam /
analyzed: kim idānīm phalasya eva vākya artha tvam pracakṣmahe tat hi pradhānam sādhyam

original: etad artho hy akhilaḥ śramaḥ etad api nāsti kriyārtha eva tāvad vākyārthatvaṃ katham utsṛṣṭam aprādhānyād iti cet phale 'pi samānam /
analyzed: etat arthaḥ hi akhilaḥ śramaḥ etat api nā asti kriyā arthaḥ eva tāvat vākya artha tvam katham utsṛṣṭam aprādhānyāt iti ced phale samānam

original: phalam api puruṣārthatvad apradhānam /
analyzed: phalam api puruṣa artha tvat a pradhānam

original: na hi [svargaḥ svatantra eva sattāṃ labhatāṃ[iti yatate puruṣaḥ kin tu svopabhogyatayaiva sarvam abhilaṣatīty atas tasyāpi tadarthatvān na prādhānyam /
analyzed: na hi svargaḥ svatantraḥ eva sattām labhatām iti yatate puruṣaḥ kin tu sva upabhogya tayā eva sarvam abhilaṣati iti atas tasya api tad artha tvāt na prādhānyam

original: āha ca [phalaṃ ca puruṣārthatvāt [iti //
analyzed: āha ca phalam ca puruṣa artha tvāt iti

original: hantatarhi puruṣa eva vākyārtho bhavatu /
analyzed: hanta tarhi puruṣaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ bhavatu

original: sa hy ananyaniṣṭḥaḥ svatantratvāt ucyate puruṣo 'py audumbarīsaṃbhārādiṣu vuniyujyata eva /
analyzed: sa hi an anya niṣṭḥaḥ svatantra tvāt ucyate puruṣaḥ u pi audumbarī saṃbhāra ādiṣu eva

original: [yajamānasaṃmitā audumbarī bhavati] iti tasyāpi tadarthatvam /
analyzed: yajamāna saṃmitā audumbarī bhavati iti tasya api tad artha tvam

original: uktaṃ ca [puruṣaś ca karmārthatvāt] iti //
analyzed: uktam ca puruṣaḥ ca karma artha tvāt iti

original: yady evaṃ saṃkaṭe patitāḥ smaḥ /
analyzed: yadi evam saṃkaṭe patitāḥ smaḥ

original: na vidmaḥ kiṃ vidadhmahe /
analyzed: na vidmaḥ kim vidadhmahe

original: kriyā hi phalārthā phalaṃ ca puruṣaś ca kriyārtha iti parivartamāne cakre kasya prādhānyaṃ śiṣmaḥ kasya vākyārthatvam ucyate puruṣas tāvan na vākyārthaḥ ākhyātavācyatva eva tasya vivadante kā kathā vākyārhatvasya nanu [kartari lakāraḥ] iti smaraṇāt kathaṃ nākhyātavācyaḥ kartā ko 'yaṃ lakāro nāma sa hi [vartamāne laṭ] iti vidhāya [kartari śap] [yuṣmādi madhyamaḥ] [asmady uttamaḥ] [śeṣe prathamaḥ] [tiptasjhi] iti [bahuṣu bahuvacanam] [dvyekayor dvivacanaikavacane] iti vākyāntarair vibhajya vivṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kriyā hi phala arthā phalam ca puruṣaḥ ca kriyā arthaḥ iti parivartamāne cakre kasya prādhānyam śiṣmaḥ kasya vākya artha tvam ucyate puruṣaḥ tāvat na vākya arthaḥ ākhyāta vācya tve eva tasya vivadante kā kathā vākya arha tvasya nanu kartari lakāraḥ iti smaraṇāt katham na ākhyāta vācyaḥ kartā kaḥ yam lakāraḥ nāma sa hi vartamāne laṭ iti vidhāya kartari śap yuṣmādi madhyamaḥ asmadi uttamaḥ śeṣe prathamaḥ iti bahuṣu bahuvacanam dvi ekayoḥ

original: tad etāni kārakasaṃkhyāvibhaktividhāyīni sūtrāṇi ekavākyatayā vyākhyeyāni ekārthaviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: tat etāni kāraka saṃkhyā vibhakti vidhāyīni sūtrāṇi eka vākya tayā vyākhyeyāni eka artha viṣaya tvāt

original: eko hi [pacati] ityādiḥ śabdaḥ tair vyakriyate /
analyzed: ekaḥ hi pacati ityādiḥ śabdaḥ taiḥ vyakriyate

original: tad evam eṣa vākyārtho bhavati kartubahutve bahuvacanaṃ jhi iti /
analyzed: tat evam eṣa vākya arthaḥ bhavati kartu bahutve bahuvacanam iti

original: seyaṃ kartṛsaṃkhyā ''khyātavācyā bhavati na kartā iti kutas tasya vākyārthatvam alaṃ cānayā śastrāntaragarbhayā drāghīyasyā kathayā /
analyzed: sā iyam kartṛ saṃkhyā khyāta vācyā bhavati na kartā iti kutas tasya vākya artha tvam alam ca anayā śastra antara garbhayā drāghīyasyā kathayā

original: puruṣas tāvan na vākyārhtaḥ //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ tāvat na vākya arhtaḥ

original: phalam api na vākyārthaḥ siddhāsiddhavikalpānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: phalam api na vākya arthaḥ siddha asiddha vikalpa anupapatteḥ

original: siddhasya tāvat phalasyābhidhānam eva nāsti sāvyamānatvena nirdeśāt //
analyzed: siddhasya tāvat phalasya abhidhānam eva na asti sāvyamāna tvena nirdeśāt

original: sādhyamānatvapakṣe tu sākṣāt tatsiddhivedanāt /
analyzed: sādhyamāna tva pakṣe tu sākṣāt tad siddhi vedanāt

original: vyāpāra eva tanniṣṭhaḥ tad dhi vākyārtha ucyatām //
analyzed: vyāpāraḥ eva tad niṣṭhaḥ tat hi vākya arthaḥ ucyatām

original: ata eva hi vākyārthaṃ bhāvanāṃ pratijānate /
analyzed: atas eva hi vākya artham bhāvanām pratijānate

original: yathocitaphalāḍhyāṃ ca trayasambandhabandhurām //
analyzed: yathā ucita phala āḍhyām ca traya sambandha bandhurām

original: kevaṃ bhāvanā nāma bhāvyaniṣṭho bhāvakavyāpāro bhāvanā /
analyzed: kā ivam bhāvanā nāma bhāvya niṣṭhaḥ bhāvaka vyāpāraḥ bhāvanā

original: bhāvyaṃ hi svargādi phalaṃ sādhyamānatvāt /
analyzed: bhāvyam hi svarga ādi phalam sādhyamāna tvāt

original: sādhyatvaṃ cāsya bhavanakriyākartṛtvāt /
analyzed: sādhya tvam ca asya bhavana kriyā kartṛ tvāt

original: bhavanakriyāyāṃ ca kartṛtvaṃ utpattidharmakasya vastuno dṛṣṭam na nityaṃ bhūtasya nāpi nityam abhūtasya /
analyzed: bhavana kriyāyām ca kartṛ tvam utpatti dharmakasya vastunaḥ dṛṣṭam na nityam bhūtasya na api nityam abhūtasya

original: yathā ''āha nityaṃ na bhavanaṃ yasya yasya vā nityam abhūtatā /
analyzed: yathā āha nityam na bhavanam yasya yasya vā nityam a bhūta tā

original: na tasya kriyamāṇatvaṃ khapuṣpākāśayor iva iti //
analyzed: na tasya kriyamāṇa tvam khapuṣpa ākāśayoḥ iva iti

original: svargādiś ca kamyarūpo 'rthaḥ khatatpuṣpābhyāṃ vilakṣaṇa iti bhāvyo bhavati /
analyzed: svarga ādiḥ ca rthaḥ kha tad puṣpābhyām vilakṣaṇaḥ iti bhāvyaḥ bhavati

original: tanniṣṭhas tadutpādakaś ca puruṣavyāpāro yaḥ sā bhāvanā /
analyzed: tad niṣṭhaḥ tad utpādakaḥ ca puruṣa vyāpāraḥ yaḥ sā bhāvanā

original: sā ṇyantena bhavatinocyate /
analyzed: sā ṇi antena bhavatinā ucyate

original: prakṛtyarthasya bhavateḥ kartā yaḥ svargādiḥ sa eva ṇyantasya tasya karmatāṃ pratioadyate /
analyzed: prakṛti arthasya bhavateḥ kartā yaḥ svarga ādiḥ saḥ eva ṇi antasya tasya karmatām

original: kartā tv asya prayojakaṃ puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: kartā tu asya prayojakam puruṣaḥ

original: ṇeś cārthaḥ prayojakavyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: ṇeḥ ca arthaḥ prayojaka vyāpāraḥ

original: puruṣo hi bavantaṃ svargādim arthaṃ svavyāpāreṇa bhāvayati saṃpādayati /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ hi bavantam svarga ādim artham sva vyāpāreṇa bhāvayati saṃpādayati

original: sa tatsaṃpādako vyāpāro bhāvaneti ucyate //
analyzed: sa tad saṃpādakaḥ vyāpāraḥ bhāvanā iti ucyate

original: nanu vyāpāraḥ kriyaiva tadatiriktasya vyāpārasyāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: nanu vyāpāraḥ kriyā eva tad atiriktasya vyāpārasya asaṃbhavāt

original: kriyāvākyārthapakṣaś ca pratikṣiptaḥ ucyate na kriyāmātraṃ bhāvanā /
analyzed: kriyā vākya artha pakṣaḥ ca pratikṣiptaḥ ucyate na kriyā mātram bhāvanā

original: api ca paridṛśyamānapūrvāparībhūtayajyādibhāvasvarūpātiriktaḥ puruṣavyāpāraḥ pratyayāt pratīyamāno bhāvanā /
analyzed: api ca paridṛśyamāna pūrvāparībhūta yajya ādi bhāva svarūpa atiriktaḥ puruṣa vyāpāraḥ pratyayāt pratīyamānaḥ bhāvanā

original: yathā ''ha na sā kenacid utpādyā janikā sā na kasyacit /
analyzed: yathā ha na sā kenacid utpādyā janikā sā na kasyacid

original: kevalaṃ jananī hy eṣā janyasya janakasya ca iti //
analyzed: kevalam jananī hi eṣā janyasya janakasya ca iti

original: kriyākārakādivilakṣaṇaiva hi sā śabdāt pratīyata ity arthaḥ //
analyzed: kriyā kāraka ādi vilakṣaṇā eva hi sā śabdāt pratīyate iti arthaḥ

original: nanu ca yajata ity atra prakṛtyartho yāgādiḥ kriyā /
analyzed: nanu ca yajate iti atra prakṛti arthaḥ yāga ādiḥ kriyā

original: pratyayārthas tu preranārūpo vidhiḥ kartṛsaṃkhyādiś ca na tu dhātvabhidhīyamānavyāpāravyatirikto bhāvanākhyaḥ puruṣavyāpāraḥ pratyayāt pratīyate /
analyzed: pratyaya arthaḥ tu preranā rūpaḥ vidhiḥ kartṛ saṃkhyā ādiḥ ca na tu dhātu abhidhīyamāna vyāpāra vyatiriktaḥ bhāvanā ākhyaḥ puruṣa vyāpāraḥ pratyayāt pratīyate

original: na hi bhāvanāvācinīṃ kāṃcid vibhaktiṃ smarati pāṇiniḥ liṅādim iva vidhyādau /
analyzed: na hi bhāvanā vācinīm kāṃcid vibhaktim smarati pāṇiniḥ liṅ ādim iva vidhi ādau

original: tasmān na bhāvanā vākyārthaḥ ucyate bhāvanā 'pi pratīyata evākhyātāt yadi naipuṇyena śābdī pramitir avamṛśyate //
analyzed: tasmāt na bhāvanā vākya arthaḥ ucyate bhāvanā pi pratīyate eva ākhyātāt yadi naipuṇyena śābdī pramitiḥ avamṛśyate

original: āstāṃ vidhipadaṃ tāvad vartamānāpadeśinaḥ /
analyzed: āstām vidhi padam tāvat vartamāna apadeśinaḥ

original: śabdāt yajata ityādeḥ bhāvanā na na gamyate //
analyzed: śabdāt yajate ityādeḥ bhāvanā na na gamyate

original: pacati gacchanti ity ato yathā pākādir dhātvarthaḥ pratīyate tathā sarvānugataḥ kartṛvyāpāro 'pi pākādyapajananāpāye 'pi vyāpārapratīter anapāyāt /
analyzed: pacati gacchanti iti atas yathā pāka ādiḥ dhātvarthaḥ pratīyate tathā sarva anugataḥ kartṛ vyāpāraḥ pi pāka ādi apajanana apāye pi vyāpāra pratīteḥ anapāyāt

original: yathā hi aupagavaḥ kāpaṭavaḥ aupamanyavaḥ ity upaguprabhṛtīnām uddhāre ca nikṣepe ca pratyayārtho 'nuvartate taddhitānteṣu tathā ''khyāteṣv api so 'nuvartamāno dṛśyate //
analyzed: yathā hi aupagavaḥ kāpaṭavaḥ aupamanyavaḥ iti upagu prabhṛtīnām uddhāre ca nikṣepe ca pratyaya arthaḥ nuvartate taddhita anteṣu tathā khyāteṣu api saḥ nuvartamānaḥ dṛśyate

original: api ca pacati ity ākhyātapadasya padārtho vyācikhyāsito bhavati tadā pākaṃ karoti iti vākyaṃ vyākhyātāraḥ prayuṃjate pacati iti ko 'thaḥ pākaṃ karoti iti pākaśabdeta dvitīyāntena sādhyaṃ dhātvarthaṃ vyācakṣate /
analyzed: api ca pacati iti ākhyāta padasya padārthaḥ vyācikhyāsitaḥ bhavati tadā pākam karoti iti vākyam vyākhyātāraḥ prayuṃjate pacati iti kaḥ thaḥ pākam karoti iti dvitīyā antena sādhyam dhātvartham vyācakṣate

original: kartṛvyāpārātmakaṃ pratyayārthaṃ karoti iti padena //
analyzed: kartṛ vyāpāra ātmakam pratyaya artham karoti iti padena

original: kiṃ ca kiṃ karoti devadattaḥ iti pṛṣṭās santaḥ dvaye vaktāro bhavanti karoti pākaṃ iti pacatītivat /
analyzed: kim ca kim karoti devadattaḥ iti pṛṣṭāḥ santaḥ dvaye vaktāraḥ bhavanti karoti pākam iti pacati itivat

original: tad idam ubhayarūpam apy uttaram ekārtham anyathā na tena praṣṭā pratyāyyeta /
analyzed: tat idam ubhaya rūpam api uttaram eka artham anyathā na tena praṣṭā pratyāyyeta

original: tasmāt pākaṃ karotīti padadvayasya yo 'rthaḥ sa evārthaḥ ekasya pacatīti padasya /
analyzed: tasmāt pākam karoti iti pada dvayasya yaḥ rthaḥ saḥ eva arthaḥ ekasya pacati iti padasya

original: atrāpi pacatyarthād anyaḥ karotyarthaḥ pratīyata eva /
analyzed: atra api pacati arthāt anyaḥ karoti arthaḥ pratīyate eva

original: yo 'sāv anyaḥ karotyarthaḥ sā bhāvanā //
analyzed: anyaḥ karoti arthaḥ sā bhāvanā

original: āha na kartṛsaṃkhyādivyatirekeṇa pratyayāt dhātvarthātiriktaṃ vyāpāraṃ pratipadyante /
analyzed: āha na kartṛ saṃkhyā ādi vyatirekeṇa pratyayāt dhātvartha atiriktam vyāpāram pratipadyante

original: pratipadyeraṃś cet karotīty ato 'pi śabdāt pratipadyeran /
analyzed: pratipadyeran ced karoti iti atas pi śabdāt pratipadyeran

original: na ca karotīty atra prakṛtipratyayavāvye kriye vimajya darśayituṃ śakyete ucyate nedaṃ sādhu budhyate //
analyzed: na ca karoti iti atra prakṛti pratyaya vāvye kriye vimajya darśayitum śakyete ucyate na idam sādhu budhyate

original: yaś ca pākaṃ karotīti vyavahāro vibhāgataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca pākam karoti iti vyavahāraḥ vibhāgataḥ

original: sa eva samudāyena proktaḥ pacatinā yathā //
analyzed: saḥ eva samudāyena proktaḥ pacatinā yathā

original: tathā kāryaṃ karotīti pratītir nāsti laukikī /
analyzed: tathā kāryam karoti iti pratītiḥ na asti laukikī

original: pratyayārthaḥ korotyarthe pacatyādau tu vartate //
analyzed: pratyaya arthaḥ koroti arthe pacati ādau tu vartate

original: kartṛsaṃkhyāpratītau ca na vivādo 'sti kasyacit /
analyzed: kartṛ saṃkhyā pratītau ca na vivādaḥ sti kasyacid

original: tāvatā nihnavaḥ kāryo na tu vyāpārasaṃvidaḥ //
analyzed: tāvatā nihnavaḥ kāryaḥ na tu vyāpāra saṃvidaḥ

original: karotītyādiśabdebhyaś ca yathā na bhavitavyaviśiṣṭebhyaḥ tatpratītir iṣyate na tathā sarvebhyaḥ //
analyzed: karoti ityādi śabdebhyaḥ ca yathā na bhavitavya viśiṣṭebhyaḥ tad pratītiḥ iṣyate na tathā sarvebhyaḥ

original: ke punas te viśiṣṭāḥ śabdāḥ ye bhāvānām abhidadhati ucyate bhāvārthaḥ karmaśabdā ye tebhyo gamyeta bhāvanā /
analyzed: ke punar te viśiṣṭāḥ śabdāḥ ye bhāvānām abhidadhati ucyate bhāva arthaḥ karma śabdāḥ ye tebhyaḥ gamyeta bhāvanā

original: yajetety evamādibhyaḥ sa evārtho vidhīyate //
analyzed: yajeta iti evamādibhyaḥ saḥ eva arthaḥ vidhīyate

original: [bhavanti kecit bhāvārthāḥ na karmaśabdāḥ] yathā [bhāvaḥ] [bhavanaṃ] [bhūti] iti /
analyzed: bhavanti kecid bhāva arthāḥ na karma śabdāḥ yathā bhāvaḥ bhavanam bhūti iti

original: bhavanti kecit karmaśabdāḥ na bhāvārthāḥ yathā śyenaikatrikādayaḥ karmanāmadheyatayā prāk samarthitāḥ /
analyzed: bhavanti kecid karma śabdāḥ na bhāva arthāḥ yathā śyena ekatrika ādayaḥ karma nāmadheya tayā prāk samarthitāḥ

original: ye tu bhavārthāḥ santaḥ karmaśabdāḥ [yajate] [dadāti] [juhoti] ity evamādayaḥ tebhyaḥ bhāvanākhyā kriyā gamyate /
analyzed: ye tu bhava arthāḥ santaḥ karma śabdāḥ yajate dadāti juhoti iti evamādayaḥ tebhyaḥ bhāvanā ākhyā kriyā gamyate

original: tair eva liṅādivibhaktyantaiḥ so 'rtho 'bhidhīyate [yajeta] [dadyāt] [juhuyāt] iti /
analyzed: taiḥ eva liṅ ādi vibhakti antaiḥ saḥ rthaḥ abhidhīyate yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt iti

original: tad uktaṃ [yajyādyarthaś cāto 'vagamyate bhāvayed iti ca] iti //
analyzed: tat uktam yaji ādi arthaḥ ca atas vagamyate bhāvayet iti ca iti

original: karotiśabdād api kevalāt kartṛvyāpāro na nāsāv avagamyate yatra yāgādikarmaṇā 'nanuraktena prayogayogyatāṃ pratipadyata iti viśiṣṭebhya eva yajatyādiśabdebhyo bhāvanākhyo 'nuṣṭheyaḥ puruṣavyāpāraḥ pratīyata iti siddham //
analyzed: karoti śabdāt api kevalāt kartṛ vyāpāraḥ na na asau avagamyate yatra yāga ādi karmaṇā na anuraktena prayoga yogya tām pratipadyate iti viśiṣṭebhyaḥ eva yajati ādi śabdebhyaḥ bhāvanā ākhyaḥ nuṣṭheyaḥ puruṣa vyāpāraḥ pratīyate iti siddham

original: kriyāviśeṣa evāyaṃ vyāpāro jñātur āntaraḥ /
analyzed: kriyā viśeṣaḥ eva ayam vyāpāraḥ jñātuḥ āntaraḥ

original: spandātmakabahirbhūtakriyākṣaṇavicakṣaṇaḥ //
ity evaṃ kecit //
analyzed: iti evam kecid

original: puruṣasya prayatno vā bhāvanety abhidhīyate /
analyzed: puruṣasya prayatnaḥ vā bhāvanā iti abhidhīyate

original: audāsīnyadaśāpāyaṃ pumān yena prapadyate //
analyzed: audāsīnya daśa apāyam pumān yena prapadyate

original: sa yatno yāgahomādikriyānirvṛttikāraṇam /
analyzed: sa yatnaḥ yāga homa ādi kriyā nirvṛtti kāraṇam

original: tasya tadvyatiriktatvaṃ prāyaḥ sarve 'numanyate //
analyzed: tasya tad vyatirikta tvam prāyas sarve numanyate

original: sa cāyam ātmadharmo 'pi na vibhutvādisannibhaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ayam ātma dharmaḥ na vibhu tva ādi sannibhaḥ

original: sādhyarūpābhisambandhāt dhatte viṣayatāṃ vidheḥ //
analyzed: sādhya rūpa abhisambandhāt dhatte viṣaya tām vidheḥ

original: ity apare //
analyzed: iti apare

original: anye dhātvarthasāmānyaṃ bhāvanām abhyupāgaman /
analyzed: anye dhātvartha sāmānyam bhāvanām abhyupāgaman

original: yāgādānādyanusyūtaṃ rūpaṃ gotvādijātivat //
analyzed: yāga ādāna ādi anusyūtam rūpam go tva ādi jāti vat

original: yathā hi śābalayādiṣv anugataṃ ca gorūpam avabhāsate vyāvṛttaṃ ca śābaleyādirūpaṃ evam ihāpi yāgādikarmaṇām anugataṃ ca vyāpararūpaṃ pratibhāsate parasparavibhaktaṃ ca yāgādirūpam /
analyzed: yathā hi śābalaya ādiṣu anugatam ca go rūpam avabhāsate vyāvṛttam ca śābaleya ādi rūpam evam iha api yāga ādi karmaṇām anugatam ca vyāpara rūpam pratibhāsate paraspara vibhaktam ca yāga ādi rūpam

original: yat tadanugataṃ vyāpararūpaṃ sā bhāvanā /
analyzed: yat tad anugatam vyāpara rūpam sā bhāvanā

original: yatha ca śābaleyādyananuraktaṃ pṛthaktvena gotvaṃ darśayitum aśakyam /
analyzed: ca śābaleya ādi an anuraktam pṛthaktvena go tvam darśayitum aśakyam

original: taduparaktatvena tasya sarvadā 'vagamāt /
analyzed: tad uparakta tvena tasya sarvadā avagamāt

original: na caitāvatā tasya nāṣstitvam sukhaduḥkhādyavasthānugatasyevātmanaḥ //
analyzed: na ca etāvatā tasya sukha duḥkha ādi avasthā anugatasya iva ātmanaḥ

original: tathā ca kiṃ karoti ity anavagataviśeṣavyāpārasāmānyapraśne sati [pacati] [paṭhati] iti tadviśeṣottaravacanaṃ anuguṇaṃ bhavatīti /
analyzed: tathā ca kim karoti iti anavagata viśeṣa vyāpāra sāmānya praśne sati pacati paṭhati iti tad viśeṣa uttara vacanam anuguṇam bhavati iti

original: tac ca sāmānyarūpam api na gotvādivat kriyātvavad vā siddhatayā 'vabhāsate yena vidher aviṣayaḥ syāt //
analyzed: tat ca sāmānya rūpam api na go tva ādi vat kriyā tva vat vā siddha tayā vabhāsate yena vidheḥ aviṣayaḥ syāt

original: api ca [yajate] [dadyāt] [juhuyāt] iti sarvatrāparityaktapūrvāparī bhūtasvabhāvaṃ tadvyāpārasāmānyam avagamyate /
analyzed: api ca yajate dadyāt juhuyāt iti sarvatra aparityakta pūrva aparī bhūta svabhāvam tad vyāpāra sāmānyam avagamyate

original: tena vidheś ca viṣayatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: tena vidheḥ ca viṣaya tām pratipadyate

original: tad idaṃ sakaladhātvarthasādhāraṇa m sādhyamānāvasthaṃ vyāpārasāmānyaṃ bhāvanety ucyate /
analyzed: tat idam sakala dhātvartha sādhāraṇam sādhyamāna avastham vyāpāra sāmānyam bhāvanā iti ucyate

original: tasmiṃś ca pakṣe dhātuvācyatvam api bhāvanāyā vaktuṃ śakyate //
analyzed: tasmin ca pakṣe dhātu vācya tvam api bhāvanāyāḥ vaktum śakyate

original: pākādiśabdebhyo dhātau saty api tadapratīteḥ na dhātuvācyatvaṃ bhāvanāyā iti cet bhavatyādau tarhi satyati pratyaye tadapratīteḥ pratyayavācyatvam api na syāt /
analyzed: pāka ādi śabdebhyaḥ dhātau sati api tad apratīteḥ na dhātu vācya tvam bhāvanāyāḥ iti ced bhavati ādau tarhi sati ati pratyaye tad apratīteḥ pratyaya vācya tvam api na syāt

original: tad alam anena nirdhāraṇaprayatneta /
analyzed: tat alam anena nirdhāraṇa prayatnā ita

original: sarvathā dhātor vā pratyayād vā bhāvanā 'vagamyata iti siddham //
analyzed: sarvathā dhātoḥ vā pratyayāt vā bhāvanā vagamyate iti siddham

original: sā dhātoḥ pratyayād vā 'pi bhāvanā 'vagatā satī /
analyzed: sā dhātoḥ pratyayāt vā pi bhāvanā vagatā satī

original: apekṣate 'śatritayaṃ kiṃ kena katham ity adaḥ //
analyzed: apekṣate kim kena katham iti adaḥ

original: [bhāvayet] ity avagate nūnam apekṣātrayaṃ bhavati kiṃ bhāvayet kena bhāvayet katham bhāvayet iti //
analyzed: bhāvayet iti avagate nūnam apekṣā trayam bhavati kim bhāvayet kena bhāvayet katham bhāvayet iti

original: tatra kim ity apekṣā svargakāmapadena pūryate kiṃ bhāvayet [svargaṃ] iti //
