analyzed: tatra kim iti apekṣā svarga kāma padena pūryate kim bhāvayet svargam iti

original: nanu [svargakāmaḥ] iti puruṣanirdeśo 'yaṃ na phalanirdeśaḥ satyam svargaparas tv ayaṃ nirdeśaḥ /
analyzed: nanu svarga kāmaḥ iti puruṣa nirdeśaḥ yam na phala nirdeśaḥ satyam svarga paraḥ tu ayam nirdeśaḥ

original: uktaṃ hi niratiśayaprītivacanaḥ svargaśabdaḥ /
analyzed: uktam hi niratiśaya prīti vacanaḥ svarga śabdaḥ

original: prītiś ca yān nārthety apy uktam /
analyzed: prītiḥ ca yāt na arthā iti api uktam

original: sādhyatvena ca svargaḥ kāmyata iti sa eva hi kim ity aṃśe nipatati [svargaṃ bhāvayet] iti /
analyzed: sādhya tvena ca svargaḥ kāmyate iti saḥ eva hi kim iti aṃśe nipatati svargam bhāvayet iti

original: [svargaṃ kāmyate] iti ca vyutpattau nispaṣṭam eva tasya sādhyatvam /
analyzed: svargam kāmyate iti ca vyutpattau nispaṣṭam eva tasya sādhya tvam

original: bahubrīhāv api tasyaiva sādhyatvaṃ vidhivṛttaparyālocanayā 'vadhāryate //
analyzed: bahubrīhau api tasya eva sādhya tvam vidhi vṛtta paryālocanayā vadhāryate

original: evaṃ [svargaṃ bhāvayet] ity avagamyate [kena bhāvayet] ity apekṣāyāṃ yāgeneti sambadhyate //
analyzed: evam svargam bhāvayet iti avagamyate kena bhāvayet iti apekṣāyām yāgena iti sambadhyate

original: nanu [yāgena] iti na śrūyate kin tu [yajeta] iti /
analyzed: nanu yāgena iti na śrūyate kin tu yajeta iti

original: tac cākhyātapadaṃ prakṛtipratyayātmakasamudāyarūpam /
analyzed: tat ca ākhyāta padam prakṛti pratyaya ātmaka samudāya rūpam

original: tatra ḍipratyayasya bhāvanā vācyety uktam /
analyzed: tatra ḍipratyayasya bhāvanā vācyā iti uktam

original: [yaj] iti dhātumātram avaśiṣṭaṃ /
analyzed: yat iti dhātu mātram avaśiṣṭam

original: tasya kṛdantasya tṛtīyāntasya yāgeneti yo 'rthaḥ sa katham ekākinā tena pratyāyyeta ucyate bhāvanā cet pratyarārtha iti soḍhamāyuṣmatā yāgenety abhisambandhaḥ soḍhavya eva /
analyzed: tasya kṛt antasya tṛtīyā antasya yāgena iti yaḥ rthaḥ sa katham ekākinā tena ucyate bhāvanā ced pratyara arthaḥ iti soḍham āyuṣmatā yāgena iti abhisambandhaḥ soḍhavyaḥ eva

original: yo hi tasyāṃ yathā sambaddhuṃ yogyaḥ tamasau tathā pratyeṣyati nānyatheti karaṇākāṅkṣāparipūraṇena sambandhayogyo yajir iti tathaivaiṣa bhāvanayā 'bhisambadhyate //
analyzed: yaḥ hi tasyām yathā sambaddhum yogyaḥ tam asau tathā pratyeṣyati na anyathā iti karaṇa ākāṅkṣā paripūraṇena sambandha yogyaḥ yajiḥ iti tathā eva eṣa bhāvanayā abhisambadhyate

original: aprātipadikatvād dhi tṛtīyā tatra mā sma bhūt /
analyzed: a prātipadika tvāt hi tṛtīyā tatra mā sma bhūt

original: śabdasāmarthyalabhyā tu nūnaṃ kāraṇatā yajeḥ //
analyzed: śabda sāmarthya labhyā tu nūnam kāraṇa tā yajeḥ

original: kasya punaś śabdasya sāmarthyam etat bhāvanāvācina iti brūmaḥ tṛtīyayaiva kāraṇatvam abhidhānīyam iti neyaṃ rājājñā /
analyzed: kasya punar śabdasya sāmarthyam etat bhāvanā vācinaḥ iti brūmaḥ tṛtīyayā eva kāraṇa tvam abhidhānīyam iti na iyam rāja ājñā

original: tatas tadavagates tu tathā 'bhyupagamyate /
analyzed: tatas tad avagateḥ tu tathā bhyupagamyate

original: evam ihāpi [svargakāmo yajeta] iti tathā 'vagatir bhavantī kim iti na mṛṣyate ākhyātāt sādhyatā yā ca dhātvarthasyāvagamyate /
analyzed: evam iha api svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti tathā vagatiḥ bhavantī kim iti na mṛṣyate ākhyātāt sādhya tā yā ca dhātvarthasya avagamyate

original: dviṭīyā śrūyate tatra kiṃ vā tadabhidhāyinī nanu evaṃ tarhi dhārvarthasya sādhyatā 'vagateḥ kim ity aṃśe yajinā patitavyam [kiṃ bhāvayet] [yāgam] /
analyzed: śrūyate tatra kim vā tad abhidhāyinī nanu evam tarhi dhārvarthasya sādhya tā vagateḥ kim iti aṃśe yajinā patitavyam kim bhāvayet yāgam

original: kenety apekṣite vākyāntarasamarpitaṃ [brīhibhiḥ] ityādi sambadhyatam na punar yajeḥ sādhyarūpavyāpārābhidhayipratyayopasarjanībhūtakarmatāṃ atipratyāsannām anāruhya dūravartinīṃ karaṇatām adhiroḍhum arhati ucyate syād etad evaṃ yadi hi [svargakāmaḥ] iti na śrūyate /
analyzed: kena iti apekṣite vākya antara samarpitam brīhibhiḥ ityādi na punar yajeḥ sādhya rūpa vyāpāra abhidhayi pratyaya upasarjanī bhūta karmatām ati pratyāsannām an āruhya dūra vartinīm karaṇa tām adhiroḍhum arhati ucyate syāt etat evam yadi hi svarga kāmaḥ iti na śrūyate

original: tasmiṃs tu śrute naivaṃ bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: tasmin tu śrute na evam bhavitum arhati

original: kutaḥ svargādisādhyasaṃbandhād alabdhvā sādhyatā 'nvayam /
analyzed: kutas svarga ādi sādhya saṃbandhāt a labdhvā sādhya tā nu ayam

original: yajis tadānuguṇyena karaṇāṃśe 'vatiṣṭhate //
analyzed: yajiḥ tad ānuguṇyena karaṇa aṃśe vatiṣṭhate

original: svargasya hi kāmyamānatvena prītyātmakatvena cānanyārthatvāt sādhyatāyāṃ yogyatvāt kim ity aṃśopanipāte siddhe tatrālabdhaniveśo yajiḥ tadapekṣitāṃ karaṇatām eva yogyatvād avalambate //
analyzed: svargasya hi kāmyamāna tvena prīti ātmaka tvena ca ananya artha tvāt sādhya tāyām yogya tvāt kim iti aṃśa upanipāte siddhe tatra alabdha niveśaḥ yajiḥ tad apekṣitām karaṇa tām eva yogya tvāt avalambate

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca jyotiṣṭomādibhiḥ padaiḥ /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca jyotiṣṭoma ādibhiḥ padaiḥ

original: evaṃ saty upapadyeta karaṇatvānuvādibhiḥ //
analyzed: evam satī upapadyeta karaṇa tva anuvādibhiḥ

original: karmanāmadheyatvaṃ ca jyotiṣṭomādīnāṃ śabdānām uktam //
analyzed: karma nāmadheya tvam ca jyotiṣṭoma ādīnām śabdānām uktam

original: nanu sādhyatvapakṣasākṣitām api karmanāmadheyāni bhajante [agnihotraṃ juhoti] iti naiṣa doṣaḥ sādhya eva bhavan bhāvārthaḥ sādhanatām avalambate /
analyzed: nanu sādhya tva pakṣa sākṣi tām api karma nāmadheyāni bhajante agnihotram juhoti iti nā eṣa doṣaḥ sādhyaḥ eva bhavan bhāva arthaḥ sādhana tām avalambate

original: tatrāpi hi svargabhāvanāyām agnihotrākhyo homaḥ karaṇam eva anyathā svargakāmapadānanvayaprasaṅgāt ity uktam /
analyzed: tatra api hi svarga bhāvanāyām agnihotra ākhyaḥ homaḥ karaṇam eva anyathā svarga kāma pada ananvaya prasaṅgāt iti uktam

original: nāmadheyapadaṃ tu karmatām anuvadati kiñcit karaṇatām [agnihotraṃ] ityādi [jyotiṣṭomena] iti /
analyzed: nāmadheya padam tu karmatām anuvadati kiñcid karaṇatām agnihotram ityādi jyotiṣṭomena iti

original: tasmāt yajeḥ karaṇatvenaivānvaya iti siddham /
analyzed: tasmāt yajeḥ karaṇatvena eva anvayaḥ iti siddham

original: yat tu pratyāsannatvāt sādhyāṃśopanipātitety ucyate tad ayuktam yogyatvavirodhinī pratyāsattiḥ saṃbandhakāraṇam na tadviparitā /
analyzed: yat tu pratyāsanna tvāt sādhya aṃśa upanipāti tā iti ucyate tat ayuktam yogya tva virodhinī pratyāsattiḥ saṃbandha kāraṇam na tad viparitā

original: yogyatvaṃ ca svargasyaiva sādhyatāyāṃ yajeś ca karaṇatāyām ity uktam //
analyzed: yogya tvam ca svargasya eva sādhya tāyām yajeḥ ca karaṇa tāyām iti uktam

original: evaṃ [yāgena bhāvayet] ity avagate [katham] ity apekṣāyāṃ itikartavyatā tadvākyapāṭhitā vākyāntaraniveditā vā sambadhyate //
analyzed: evam yāgena bhāvayet iti avagate katham iti apekṣāyām itikartavya tā tad vākya pāṭhitā vākya antara niveditā vā sambadhyate

original: tadvakyopāttā tāvat yathā [etasyaiva revatīṣu varavantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā paśukāmo hy etena yajeta] iti //
analyzed: tad vakyā upāttā tāvat yathā etasya eva revatīṣu varavantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā paśu kāmaḥ hi etena yajeta iti

original: vākyāntarooāttā [brīhīn avahanti] [taṇḍulān pinaṣṭi] [smidho yajati] [bahir yajati] [tanūnapātaṃ yajati] iti //
analyzed: vākya antarā uoāttā brīhīn avahanti taṇḍulān pinaṣṭi smidhaḥ yajati bahis yajati tanūnapātam yajati iti

original: itikartavyatā hīṣṭā dṛṣṭāḍṛṣṭaprayojanā /
analyzed: itikartavya tā hi iṣṭā dṛṣṭā ḍṛṣṭa prayojanā

original: prāyaḥ sarvatra bhāvārthe katham aṃśopapādinī //
analyzed: prāyas sarvatra bhāva arthe katham aṃśa upapādinī

original: dṛṣṭopakāradvāreṇa sambaddhā peṣaṇādikā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa upakāra dvāreṇa sambaddhā peṣaṇa ādikā

original: itikartavyatā jñeyā sannipatyopakāriṇī //
analyzed: itikartavya tā jñeyā sannipatya upakāriṇī

original: bhāvārtham anugṛhṇāti yā tv adṛṣṭena vartmanā /
analyzed: bhāva artham anugṛhṇāti yā tu adṛṣṭena vartmanā

original: samidādyātmakām āhuḥ tām ārād upakāriṇīm //
analyzed: samidh ādi ātmakām āhuḥ tām ārāt upakāriṇīm

original: evam aṃśatrayāśleṣalabdhānuṣṭhānayogyatām /
analyzed: evam aṃśa traya āśleṣa labdha anuṣṭhāna yogya tām

original: bhāvanā īdṛśīṃ prāpya vṛttir vidhiniṣedhayoḥ //
analyzed: bhāvanāḥ īdṛśīm prāpya vṛttiḥ vidhi niṣedhayoḥ

original: [darśapūrṇamāsābhyaṃ yajeta svargakāmaḥ] [jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta] ity atra anantaroktarītyā eṣa vākyārtho jātaḥ darśapūrṇamāsena yāgena svargaṃ bhāvayet anayā 'gnyādhānādikayetikartavyatayeti //
analyzed: yajeta svarga kāmaḥ jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti atra anantara ukta rītyā eṣa vākya arthaḥ jātaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsena yāgena svargam bhāvayet anayā gnyādhāna ādikayā itikartavyatayā iti

original: kim arthaṃ punar vidhir āśrīyate vartamānāpadeśiṣv apy ākhyāteṣu bhāvanā tīyata iti darśitavān bhavān /
analyzed: kim artham punar vidhiḥ āśrīyate vartamāna apadeśiṣu api ākhyāteṣu bhāvanā tīyate iti darśitavān bhavān

original: ataḥ kiṃ vidhinā tasya hy īścayaṇaṃ svargayāgayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvabodhanāya pravṛttinivṛttiliddhaye vā sādhyasādhanasambandhas tāvat ākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogyatāparyālocanayā vartamānāpadeśino 'py ākhyātāt bhāvanāvagame sati bhavaty evāntareṇāpi vidhim //
analyzed: atas kim vidhinā tasya hi svarga yāgayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāva bodhanāya vā sādhya sādhana sambandhaḥ tāvat ākāṅkṣā sannidhi yogyatā paryālocanayā ākhyātāt bhāvanā avagame sati bhavati eva antareṇa api vidhim

original: pravṛttir api puruṣecchānibandhanā svargasya sādhyatve yāgasya sādhanatve 'vadhārite yaḥ svargam icchet sa tatsiddhaye pravartetaiva /
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ api puruṣa icchā nibandhanā svargasya sādhya tve yāgasya sādhana tve vadhārite yaḥ svargam icchet sa tad siddhaye pravarteta eva

original: yas tu necchet tasya vidhir api kiṃ kuryāt na hy apravartamānasya puṃsaḥ vidhir gale pāśaṃ nidadhātiḥ rajvā vā bāhū vadhnāti /
analyzed: yaḥ tu na icchet tasya vidhiḥ api kim kuryāt na hi apravartamānasya puṃsaḥ vidhiḥ gale pāśam rajvā vā bāhū vadhnāti

original: niṣedhādhikāre 'pi surāpānabrāhmaṇahananādeḥ pratyavāyasādhanatvāvadhāraṇāt tatparijihīrṣayā nivṛttir bhavati na vidhitaḥ /
analyzed: niṣedha adhikāre pi surā pāna brāhmaṇa hanana ādeḥ pratyavāya sādhanatva avadhāraṇāt tad parijihīrṣayā nivṛttiḥ bhavati na vidhitaḥ

original: yas tu pratyavāyān na bibheti sa vidhāv api śrute na nivartata eveti /
analyzed: yaḥ tu pratyavāyāt na bibheti sa vidhau api śrute na nivartate eva iti

original: tasmāt pravṛttinivṛttyor na kāraṇaṃ vidhir iti tadartham api tadāśrayaṇam asāṃpratam //
analyzed: tasmāt pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ na kāraṇam vidhiḥ iti tad artham api tad āśrayaṇam asāṃpratam

original: kaś cāyaṃ vidhir nāmety etad api na vidmaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ ca ayam vidhiḥ nāma iti etat api na vidmaḥ

original: nanu cāhuḥ vidher lakṣaṇam etāvad apravṛttapravartanam /
analyzed: nanu ca āhuḥ vidheḥ lakṣaṇam etāvat apravṛtta pravartanam

original: atiprasaṅgadoṣeṇa nājñātajñāpanaṃ vidhiḥ //
analyzed: atiprasaṅga doṣeṇa na ajñāta jñāpanam vidhiḥ

original: bāḍhaṃ śruto 'yaṃ ślokaḥ /
analyzed: bāḍham śrutaḥ yam ślokaḥ

original: kin tu ko 'sāv apravṛttapravartaka iti na jānīmaḥ pravartakasvarūpe hi saṃśerate pravādukā iti //
analyzed: kin tu kaḥ sau apravṛtta pravartakaḥ iti na jānīmaḥ pravartaka svarūpe hi saṃśerate pravādukāḥ iti

original: kiṃ liṅādiḥ śabda eva pravartakaḥ tadvyāpāro vā tadartho niyogaḥ phalaṃ vā svargādiḥ śreyaśādhanatvaṃ vā rāgādir vā pravartakasvarūpānavadhāraṇād vidher apy anadhāraṇam iti //
analyzed: kim liṅ ādiḥ śabdaḥ eva pravartakaḥ tad vyāpāraḥ vā tad arthaḥ niyogaḥ phalam vā svarga ādiḥ śreyaḥ śādhana tvam vā rāga ādiḥ vā pravartaka svarūpa anavadhāraṇāt vidheḥ api iti

original: yat tāvad uktaṃ kiṃ vidhyāśrayaṇeti tatrocyate yad ayaṃ sādhanatvena yajer abhihito 'nvayaḥ /
analyzed: yat tāvat uktam kim vidhi āśrayaṇā iti tatra ucyate yat ayam sādhana tvena yajeḥ abhihitaḥ nvayaḥ

original: svargasya ca phalatvena sa eva mahimā vidheḥ //
analyzed: svargasya ca phala tvena saḥ eva mahimā vidheḥ

original: vidhivacanam antareṇa hi [svargakāmo yajeta] iti puruṣalakṣaṇārthasvargakāmaśabdaḥ śuklo hotetivat syāt /
analyzed: vidhi vacanam antareṇa hi svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti puruṣa lakṣaṇa artha svarga kāma śabdaḥ śuklaḥ hotā itivat syāt

original: tadā caikapadopādānalakṣaṇapratyāsattisambandhanisargaghaṭitapūrvāparībhūtasvabhāvadhātvarthasādhyatātikrameṇa dūrāt svargasya sadhyatvaṃ anyatropasarjanībhūtasya kathaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyate tasmād eṣa viśiṣṭaḥ sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ vidhiprasādalabhya eva bhavati nānyatheti vidhir āśrayaṇīyaḥ //
analyzed: tadā ca eka pada upādāna lakṣaṇa pratyāsatti sambandha nisarga ghaṭita pūrvāparībhūta svabhāva dhātvartha sādhya tā atikrameṇa dūrāt svargasya sadhya tvam anyatra upasarjanī bhūtasya katham kalpayitum śakyate tasmāt eṣa viśiṣṭaḥ sādhya sādhana sambandhaḥ vidhi prasāda labhyaḥ eva bhavati na anyathā iti vidhiḥ āśrayaṇīyaḥ

original: kathaṃ punar vidhir apy amuṃ sādhyasādhanabhāvaṃ bodhayati itthaṃ bodhayati sa hi sapratyayapravartakasvabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: katham punar vidhiḥ api amum sādhya sādhana bhāvam bodhayati ittham bodhayati sa hi sa pratyaya pravartaka svabhāvaḥ

original: na cāpuruṣārtharūpe vyāpāre puruṣaḥ prayatnaśatapreryamāṇo 'pi sapratyayaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: na ca apuruṣa artha rūpe vyāpāre puruṣaḥ prayatna śata preryamāṇaḥ pi sa pratyayaḥ pravartate

original: pravartamāne 'pi puṃsi pravartakatvākhyanijasvarūpasaṃkocam āśaṅkamānaḥ vidhiḥ puruṣārthasvabhāvaṃ svargaṃ sādhyatayā vyavasyāpayati yāgaṃ cāsya sādhanatayeti /
analyzed: pravartamāne pi puṃsi pravartaka tva ākhya nija svarūpa saṃkocam āśaṅkamānaḥ vidhiḥ puruṣa artha svabhāvam svargam sādhya tayā vyavasyāpayati yāgam ca asya sādhana tayā iti

original: evaṃ hy avabodhayato 'sya pravartakatvaṃ nirvahati //
analyzed: evam hi avabodhayataḥ sya pravartaka tvam nirvahati

original: yat tu darśate 'pi svargādau phale na pravartate cet puruṣaḥ kiṃ vidhiḥ kuryād iti tad apy uktam na hi vāyvādivat puruṣasya pravartako vidhiḥ /
analyzed: yat tu svarga ādau phale na pravartate ced puruṣaḥ kim vidhiḥ kuryāt iti tat api uktam na hi vāyu ādi vat puruṣasya pravartakaḥ vidhiḥ

original: vāyvādiḥ khalu sapratyayam api taditaram api pravartayati /
analyzed: vāyu ādiḥ khalu sa pratyayam api tad itaram api pravartayati

original: vidhis tu sapratyayasyaiva pravartakaḥ /
analyzed: vidhiḥ tu sa pratyayasya eva pravartakaḥ

original: sapratyayasya caitavat pravartanaṃ yat pravartito 'ham iti jñānajananam /
analyzed: sa pratyayasya ca eta vat pravartanam yat pravartitaḥ ham iti jñāna jananam

original: na ca phala adarśayatā vidhinā sapratyayasyedṛśaṃ jñānaṃ janayituṃ śakyam /
analyzed: na ca vidhinā sa pratyayasya īdṛśam jñānam janayitum śakyam

original: phale tu darśite sati tad asya jñānaṃ janitam eva /
analyzed: phale tu darśite sati tat asya jñānam janitam eva

original: anena janitaṃ cet jñānaṃ pramāṇavṛttena pravartita evāsau vidhinā puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: anena janitam ced jñānam pramāṇa vṛttena pravartitaḥ eva asau vidhinā puruṣaḥ

original: ālasyādinā 'narthitvena vā bahiḥpravṛttiparyantatayā cen na pravartate mā pravartiṣṭa vidhinā tu svakartavyaṃ kṛtam pravartito 'ham iti jñānajananāt /
analyzed: ālasya ādinā narthi tvena vā bahis pravṛtti paryanta tayā ced na pravartate mā pravartiṣṭa vidhinā tu sva kartavyam kṛtam pravartitaḥ ham iti jñāna jananāt

original: anyo hi pravartanāvagamaḥ anyaś ca bāhyo vyāpāraḥ //
analyzed: anyaḥ hi pravartana avagamaḥ anyaḥ ca bāhyaḥ vyāpāraḥ

original: evaṃ vidhivaśād eva sādhyasādhanabhāvadhīḥ /
analyzed: evam vidhi vaśāt eva sādhya sādhana bhāva dhīḥ

original: sā hi prathamanirvṛttapreraṇājñānapūrvikā //
analyzed: sā hi prathama nirvṛtta preraṇā jñāna pūrvikā

original: [yajeta] iti preraṇā pratīyamānā sādhyasādhanasambandham anavabodhayati vidhau na nirvahatīti tatkṛtas tadavabodha ucyate /
analyzed: yajeta iti preraṇā pratīyamānā sādhya sādhana sambandham an avabodhayati vidhau na nirvahati iti tad kṛtaḥ tad avabodhaḥ ucyate

original: niṣedhe ca [na hanyāt] iti niṣedhyamānasya bhāvārthasyānarthatām anavabodhayan vidhiḥ na rāgataḥ pravartamānaṃ pumāṃsaṃ niroddhum utsahata iti vidheyaniṣedhye 'pi tasyaiva vyāpāra ity avaśyāśrayaṇīyo vidhiḥ //
analyzed: niṣedhe ca na hanyāt iti niṣedhyamānasya bhāva arthasya anartha tām anavabodhayan vidhiḥ na rāgataḥ pravartamānam pumāṃsam niroddhum utsahate iti vidheya niṣedhye tasya eva vyāpāraḥ iti avaśya āśrayaṇīyaḥ vidhiḥ

original: yaś caiṣa paryanuyogaḥ kim arthaṃ vidhir āśrita iti sa khalu saralamatikṛta iva lakṣyate /
analyzed: yaḥ ca eṣa paryanuyogaḥ kim artham vidhiḥ āśritaḥ iti sa khalu sarala mati kṛtaḥ iva lakṣyate

original: na hi vayam adyakṛtavidhim āśrayema jahīmo vā /
analyzed: na hi vayam adya kṛta vidhim āśrayema jahīmaḥ vā

original: pratipattāro hi vayaṃ vedasya na kartāraḥ /
analyzed: pratipattāraḥ hi vayam vedasya na kartāraḥ

original: tatra ca savidhikāni [yajeta svargakāmaḥ] iti prabhṛtīni śrūyate /
analyzed: tatra ca savidhikāni yajeta svarga kāmaḥ iti prabhṛtīni śrūyate

original: teṣāṃ mīmāṃsyamāno 'rtha īdrg avatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: teṣām mīmāṃsyamānaḥ rthaḥ ī t ṛ c avatiṣṭhate

original: svargaḥ sādhyaḥ yāgaḥ sādhanam iti /
analyzed: svargaḥ sādhyaḥ yāgaḥ sādhanam iti

original: sa cāyaṃ vidhisāmarthyalabhya iti yuktaṃ vidher āśrayaṇam //
analyzed: sa ca ayam vidhi sāmarthya labhyaḥ iti yuktam vidheḥ āśrayaṇam

original: yat tu pravartakasvarūpāniścayād vidher aniścaya iti tatrāpy ucyate phalaṃ tāvan na pravartakaṃ siddhyasiddhivikalpānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: yat tu pravartaka svarūpa aniścayāt vidheḥ aniścayaḥ iti tatra api ucyate phalam tāvat na pravartakam siddhi asiddhi vikalpa anupapatteḥ

original: siddhasya phalasyāpravartakatvaṃ siddhatvād eva /
analyzed: siddhasya phalasya a pravartaka tvam siddha tvāt eva

original: na hi yat yasyāsti sa tadarthaṃ yatate /
analyzed: na hi yat yasya asti sa tad artham yatate

original: nāpy asiddhasya kharaviṣāṇaprakhyasya phalasya pravartakatvaṃ yuktam adṛṣṭatvāt //
analyzed: nā api asiddhasya khara viṣāṇa prakhyasya phalasya pravartaka tvam yuktam adṛṣṭa tvāt

original: atha kāmanāviṣayīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ pravartakm iṣyate seyaṃ kāmanaiva pravartakā bhavati na phalam /
analyzed: atha kāmanā viṣayīkṛtam phalam pravartakm iṣyate sā iyam kāmanā eva pravartakā bhavati na phalam

original: tasmād rāgādiḥ pravartaka ity āhuḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt rāga ādiḥ pravartakaḥ iti āhuḥ

original: etad api na peśalam /
analyzed: etat api na peśalam

original: upajātapravṛddhatararāgasyāpi kāmyamanopāyaparicchedam antereṇa pravṛttyanupapatteḥ na hi svargakāmaḥ sāṃgrahiṇīm anutiṣṭhati /
analyzed: upajāta pravṛddhatara rāgasya api kāmya manaḥ upāya paricchedam pravṛtti anupapatteḥ na hi svarga kāmaḥ sāṃgrahiṇīm anutiṣṭhati

original: tadvaraṃ śreyaśādhanatvaṃ pravartakam /
loke 'pi caivam eva vyavahāyo dṛśyate /
analyzed: loke ca evam eva vyavahāyaḥ dṛśyate

original: harītakyādīnām ārogyasādhanatāṃ vaidyācāryacodanāto 'vagatya tadupayogādā vāturajanaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: harītakī ādīnām ārogya sādhanatām vaidya ācārya codanātaḥ tad upayoga ādā vātura janaḥ pravartate

original: tṛptisādhanatāmodanasya manyamānaḥ tadbhakṣaṇāya bubhukṣitaḥ pravartate iti śreyaśādhanatvam eva pravartakam //
analyzed: tṛpti sādhana tām odanasya manyamānaḥ tad bhakṣaṇāya bubhukṣitaḥ pravartate iti śreyaḥ śādhana tvam eva pravartakam

original: etad api na caturasram śreyaśādhanatvaṃ hy anavagatam avagataṃ vā pravartakaṃ bhavet nānavagatam abyutpannasya pravṛtter adarśanāt /
analyzed: etat api na caturasram śreyaḥ śādhana tvam hi anavagatam avagatam vā pravartakam bhavet na anavagatam abyutpannasya pravṛtteḥ adarśanāt

original: yo hi harītakīnāmārogyahetutāṃ na kutaścid adhigatavān nāsau tadarthy api tām upayuṅkte /
analyzed: yaḥ hi harītakīnām ārogya hetutām na kutaścid adhigatavān na asau tad arthī api tām upayuṅkte

original: tasmāt tadbidhahetuḥ pravartakaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt tadbidha hetuḥ pravartakaḥ

original: sa ca dṛṣṭe viṣaye 'nvayavyatirekāder api saṃbhavati kiṃ tena adṛṣṭe tu viṣaye śreyaśādhanādhigamaḥ śabdaikanibandhana iti tadadhigamopāyaḥ śabda eva pravartakaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca dṛṣṭe viṣaye nvaya vyatireka ādeḥ api saṃbhavati kim tena adṛṣṭe tu viṣaye śreyaḥ śādhana adhigamaḥ śabda eka nibandhanaḥ iti tad adhigama upāyaḥ śabdaḥ eva pravartakaḥ

original: ata eva śabdo 'pi na svarūpamātreṇa pravartakaḥ vāyvāditulyatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: atas eva śabdaḥ api na svarūpa mātreṇa pravartakaḥ vāyu ādi tulya tva prasaṅgāt

original: yadi hi pavana iva piśāca iva kunṛpa iva śabdaḥ pravartako bhavet anavagataśabdārhasambandho 'pi śravaṇaparavaśaḥ pravarteta na caivam asti /
analyzed: yadi hi pavanaḥ iva piśācaḥ iva ku nṛpaḥ iva śabdaḥ pravartakaḥ bhavet an avagata śabda arha sambandhaḥ śravaṇa paravaśaḥ pravarteta na ca evam asti

original: tasmād aryapratītim upajanayataḥ śabdasya pravartakam //
analyzed: tasmāt arya pratītim upajanayataḥ śabdasya pravartakam

original: na ca nāma padapratītau vartamānāpadeśakākhyātāt padārthapratītau ca satyāṃ sapratyayo 'pravartamānaḥ kaścit dṛśyata iti liṅādir eva śabdaḥ pravartakābhidhānadvāreṇa pravartako bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: na ca nāma pada pratītau vartamāna apadeśaka ākhyātāt padārtha pratītau ca satyām pravartamānaḥ kaścid dṛśyate iti liṅ ādiḥ eva śabdaḥ pravartaka abhidhāna dvāreṇa pravartakaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: śabdasya ca jñāpakatvāt cakṣurādi kārakavailakṣaṇye saty api pratītijanmani karaṇatvam aparihāryam /
analyzed: śabdasya ca jñāpaka tvāt cakṣuḥ ādi kāraka vailakṣaṇye sati api pratīti janmani karaṇa tvam aparihāryam

original: karaṇaṃ ca kārakaṃ ca na nirvyāpāraṃ svakāryanirvṛttikṣamam iti vyāpāras tasyāvaśyaṃbhāvī /
analyzed: karaṇam ca kārakam ca na nirvyāpāram sva kārya nirvṛtti kṣamam iti vyāpāraḥ tasya avaśyaṃbhāvī

original: liṅādeś ca śabdasya na pratītijanmamātre vyāpāraḥ kin tu puruṣapravṛttāv api tathā 'vagamāt /
analyzed: liṅ ādeḥ ca śabdasya na pratīti janma mātre vyāpāraḥ kin tu puruṣa pravṛttau api tathā avagamāt

original: liṅā arthāvagame sati pravṛttir dṛśyata iti tatrāpi liṅvyāpāraḥ prabhavati /
analyzed: liṅā artha avagame sati pravṛttiḥ dṛśyate iti tatra api liṅ vyāpāraḥ prabhavati

original: sa cāyaṃ liṅādivyāpāraḥ śabdabhāvanānāmadheyo vidhir ity ucyate /
analyzed: sa ca ayam liṅ ādi vyāpāraḥ śabda bhāvanā nāmadheyaḥ vidhiḥ iti ucyate

original: sa eva pravartakaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ eva pravartakaḥ

original: iha hi liṅādiyukteṣu vākyeṣu dve bhāvane pratīyate śabdabhāvanā arthabhāvanā ceti //
analyzed: iha hi liṅ ādi yukteṣu vākyeṣu dve bhāvane pratīyate śabda bhāvanā artha bhāvanā ca iti

original: tatra arthabhāvanā tāvat dhātvarthātiriktaprayojakavyāpārātmakā darśataiva /
analyzed: tatra artha bhāvanā tāvat dhātvartha atirikta prayojaka vyāpāra ātmakā darśa tā eva

original: up bhavanakriyākartṛviṣayaḥ prayojakavyāpāraḥ puruṣasthaḥ yatra bhavanakriyāyāḥ kartā svargādiḥ karmatām āpadyate so 'rhtabhāvanāśabdenocyate /
analyzed: bhavana kriyā kartṛ viṣayaḥ prayojaka vyāpāraḥ puruṣa sthaḥ yatra bhavana kriyāyāḥ kartā svarga ādiḥ karma tām āpadyate saḥ ṛhta bhāvanā śabdena ucyate

original: vyākhyātaś cāsau //
analyzed: vyākhyātaḥ ca asau

original: yas tu śabdagataḥ prayojakavyāpāraḥ yatra puruṣapravṛttiḥ sādhyatāṃ pratipadyate sā śabdabhāvanā /
analyzed: yaḥ tu śabda gataḥ prayojaka vyāpāraḥ yatra puruṣa pravṛttiḥ sādhya tām pratipadyate sā śabda bhāvanā

original: tathā hy uktam [abhidhāṃ bhāvanām āhur anyām eva liṅādayaḥ] iti //
analyzed: tathā hi uktam abhidhām bhāvanām āhuḥ anyām eva liṅ ādayaḥ iti

original: liṅantaśabdaśravaṇe hi yathā yajyādyavacchinnaṃ svavyāpāraṃ puruṣo 'dhigacchati tathā [tadanuṣṭhāne prerito 'ham] ity api pratipadyate /
analyzed: liṅ anta śabda śravaṇe hi yathā yajya ādi avacchinnam sva vyāpāram puruṣaḥ dhigacchati tathā tad anuṣṭhāne preritaḥ ham iti api pratipadyate

original: tenānuṣṭheyārthapratipādana iva preraṇāyām api śabdasya sāmarthyāt bhāvanādvayapratipādakaṃ liṅādiyuktaṃ vākyam iṣyate /
analyzed: tena anuṣṭheya artha pratipādane iva preraṇāyām api śabdasya sāmarthyāt bhāvanā dvaya pratipādakam liṅ ādi yuktam vākyam iṣyate

original: tataḥ puruṣavyāpāraś cārthabhāvanā śabdabhāvanāśabdenābhidhīyate /
analyzed: tatas puruṣa vyāpāraḥ ca artha bhāvanā śabda bhāvanā śabdena abhidhīyate

original: anavagatā ca satī kāryāṅgam iti śabdena sā 'bhidhīyate 'pi /
analyzed: an avagatā ca satī kārya aṅgam iti śabdena sā abhidhīyate

original: taduktaṃ [abhidhatte karoti ca] iti //
analyzed: tat uktam abhidhatte karoti ca iti

original: nanu śabdabhāvanā 'pi bhāvanātmatvād arthabhāvanāvad aṃśatrayam apakṣata eveti tad asyā darśayitavyam ucyate bhāvyāṃśe tāvad asyāḥ puruṣapravṛttirūpanipatīti uktam eva /
analyzed: nanu śabda bhāvanā pi bhāvanā ātma tvāt artha bhāvanā vat aṃśa trayam eva iti tat asyāḥ darśayitavyam ucyate bhāvya aṃśe tāvat asyāḥ uktam eva

original: puruṣapreraṇātmako hi vidhiḥ śabdabhāvaneti tatsādhyā puruṣapravṛttir eva tatra bhāvyatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: puruṣa preraṇa ātmakaḥ hi vidhiḥ śabda bhāvanā iti tad sādhyā puruṣa pravṛttiḥ eva tatra bhāvya tām pratipadyate

original: karaṇāṃśe tu tasyāḥ niyojyaviṣayasamarpakapadavyāpāro niviśate /
analyzed: karaṇa aṃśe tu tasyāḥ niyojya viṣaya samarpaka pada vyāpāraḥ niviśate

original: yathā hi yajyādinā svargādir bhāvyaḥ saṃpadyata ity arthabhāvanāyām asau tatkaraṇatām avalambate /
analyzed: yathā hi yaji ādinā svarga ādiḥ bhāvyaḥ saṃpadyate iti artha bhāvanāyām asau tad karaṇa tām avalambate

original: evam i hāpi niyojyapuruṣapravṛttiviṣayādyavagamāt saṃpadyata iti tadabhidhāyakaśabdavyāpāras tatra karaṇatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: evam i ha api niyojya puruṣa pravṛtti viṣaya ādi avagamāt saṃpadyate iti tad abhidhāyaka śabda vyāpāraḥ tatra karaṇa tām pratipadyate

original: itikartavyāṃśe tu arthavādapadavyāpāro 'syā avatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: itikartavya aṃśe tu syāḥ avatiṣṭhate

original: kevalaṃ vidhipadaśravaṇe hi sati na tathā pravartayitum utsahante śrotāraḥ yathā arthavādajanitavahuprakārakarmaprāśastyajñānaparipoṣitahṛdayāḥ santaḥ iti arthavādāḥ pravṛttyatiśayahetavaḥ /
analyzed: kevalam vidhi pada śravaṇe hi sati na tathā pravartayitum utsahante śrotāraḥ yathā arthavāda janita vahu prakāra karma prāśastya jñāna paripoṣita hṛdayāḥ santaḥ iti arthavādāḥ pravṛtti atiśaya hetavaḥ

original: tena tadvyāpāra itikartavyatāṃśam astyāḥ pūrayatīti //
analyzed: tena tad vyāpāraḥ itikartavya tā aṃśam astyāḥ pūrayati iti

original: evaṃ niyojyavyāpāro bhāvyaḥ viṣayādisamarpakapadavyāpāraḥ karaṇaṃ arthavādapadavyāpāraḥ itikartavyateti seyaṃ tryaṃśā śabdabhāvanā /
analyzed: evam niyojya vyāpāraḥ bhāvyaḥ viṣaya ādi samarpaka pada vyāpāraḥ karaṇam arthavāda pada vyāpāraḥ itikartavya tā iti sā iyam tri aṃśā śabda bhāvanā

original: saiva ca vidhiḥ //
analyzed: sā eva ca vidhiḥ

original: na ca vidher vākyārthān anvayalakṣaṇo doṣa āśaṅkanīyaḥ ekaprayayo pādānalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā tadanvitatvāvagamāt /
analyzed: na ca vidheḥ vākya arthān anvaya lakṣaṇaḥ doṣaḥ āśaṅkanīyaḥ eka prayayā upādāna lakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā tad anvita tva avagamāt

original: āhuś ca [vidhibhāvanāyos tv ekapratyayagrāhyatākṛtaḥ /
analyzed: āhuḥ ca vidhi bhāvanāyoḥ tu eka pratyaya grāhya tā kṛtaḥ

original: dhātvarthāt prathamaṃ tāvat saṃbandho vyavasīyate] iti //
analyzed: dhātvarthāt prathamam tāvat saṃbandhaḥ vyavasīyate iti

original: vidhir bhāvanāyāṃ purūṣaṃ niyuṅkte /
analyzed: vidhiḥ bhāvanāyām purūṣam niyuṅkte

original: yathā ''ha [svavyāpāre hi puruṣaḥ kartṛtvena niyujyate] iti //
analyzed: yathā ha sva vyāpāre hi puruṣaḥ kartṛ tvena niyujyate iti

original: tayoḥ katham anvayaḥ syāt nanu ca tvayaivoktaṃ dhātvarthāt pūrvataraṃ tadbhāvanāyā vidheś ca saṃbaṃdho 'vagamyate /
analyzed: tayoḥ katham anvayaḥ syāt nanu ca tvayā eva uktam dhātvarthāt pūrvataram tad bhāvanāyāḥ vidheḥ ca saṃbaṃdhaḥ avagamyate

original: ekapadopādāne 'pi dhātvarthas tāvat prakṛtyaṃśābhidheyaḥ /
analyzed: eka pada upādāne pi dhātvarthaḥ tāvat prakṛti aṃśa abhidheyaḥ

original: vidhibhāvane tu dve api pratyayāṃśenābhidhīyete iti /
analyzed: vidhi bhāvane tu dve api pratyaya aṃśena abhidhīyete iti

original: ataś ca svacchaiva bhāvanā vidhinā spṛśyate na viṣayādyanuraktā /
analyzed: atas ca svacchā eva bhāvanā vidhinā spṛśyate na viṣaya ādi anuraktā

original: svacchā ca na prayogayogyā bhavati /
analyzed: su acchā ca na prayoga yogyā bhavati

original: yathā ca phalakaraṇetikartavyatāṃśaparipūrtiprasthitā prayogayogyā na tāṃ vidhiḥ spṛṣṭavān /
analyzed: yathā ca phala karaṇa itikartavya tā aṃśa paripūrti prasthitā prayoga yogyā na tām vidhiḥ spṛṣṭavān

original: avidhispṛṣṭeṣu ca dhātvarthakārakādiṣu kim iti sacetāḥ puruṣaḥ pravarteteti ucyate yady api vidhiḥ anadhigatadhātvarthānurāgatayā svacchām eva bhāvanāṃ ekābhidhānatvāt prathamam ākramati tathāpi tādṛśi tasyāṃ sapratyayapravartanātmakanijasvarūpanirvahaṇam alabhamāno na tāvaty eva viramati kin tu pariṇītabālakanyako vara iva tāvad vilambamānaḥ prasāritahasta āste yāvat sarvāṅgasundarī prayogayogyā bhāvanā bhavati /
analyzed: avidhi spṛṣṭeṣu ca dhātvartha kāraka ādiṣu kim iti sa cetāḥ puruṣaḥ pravarteta iti ucyate yadi api vidhiḥ anadhigata dhātvartha anurāga tayā svacchām eva bhāvanām eka abhidhāna tvāt prathamam ākramati tathā api tādṛśi tasyām sa pratyaya pravartana ātmaka nija svarūpa nirvahaṇam alabhamānaḥ na tāvati eva viramati kin tu pariṇīta bāla kanyakaḥ varaḥ iva tāvat vilambamānaḥ prasārita hastaḥ āste yāvat sarva aṅga sundarī prayoga yogyā bhāvanā b

original: āha ca [yady apy aṃśair asaṃspṛṣṭāṃ vidhiḥ spṛśati bhāvanām /
analyzed: āha ca yadi api aṃśaiḥ a saṃspṛṣṭām vidhiḥ spṛśati bhāvanām

original: tathāpy aśaktito nāsau tanmātre paryavasyati //
analyzed: tathā api aśaktitaḥ nā asau tanmātre paryavasyati

original: anuṣṭheye hi viṣaye vidhiḥ puṃsāṃ pravartakaḥ /
analyzed: anuṣṭheye hi viṣaye vidhiḥ puṃsām pravartakaḥ

original: aṃśatrayeṇa cāpūrṇāṃ nānutiṣṭhati bhāvanām //
analyzed: aṃśa trayeṇa ca a pūrṇām na anutiṣṭhati bhāvanām

original: tasmāt prakrāntarūpo 'pi vidhis tāvat pratīkṣate /
analyzed: tasmāt prakrānta rūpaḥ pi vidhiḥ tāvat pratīkṣate

original: yāvad yogyatvam āpannā bhāvanā 'nyān apekṣiṇī] //
analyzed: yāvat yogya tvam āpannā bhāvanā nyān apekṣiṇī

original: iti sā hi vākyāntaropāttam apy apekṣate prakaraṇāntarādhītam api vāṃchati /
analyzed: iti sā hi vākya antara upāttam api apekṣate prakaraṇa antara adhītam api vāṃchati

original: kṛtivad bhāvalabhyam api yācate /
analyzed: kṛti vat bhāva labhyam api yācate

original: arthasāmarthyagamyaṃ pramāṇam api spṛhayati ity evaṃvidha eṣa śabdapramāṇamahimeti //
analyzed: artha sāmarthya gamyam pramāṇam api spṛhayati iti evaṃvidhaḥ eṣa śabda pramāṇa mahimā iti

original: sa cāyaṃ vyutpādanakrama īdṛśo vyākhyātṛbhir upadiśyate ittham asyānvayaḥ ittham asyeti /
analyzed: sa ca ayam vyutpādana kramaḥ īdṛśaḥ vyākhyātṛbhiḥ upadiśyate ittham asya anvayaḥ ittham asya iti

original: vākyārthaḥ punar bhāvanātmā 'vagamyamānaḥ ekayaiva buddhyā 'nekajātiguṇadravyakriyādyaṅgakalāpakalmāṣitatanur avagamyate tādṛśyekaiveyaṃ vākyād vākyārthabuddhiḥ /
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ punar bhāvanā ātmā avagamyamānaḥ ekayā eva buddhyā neka jāti guṇa dravya kriyā ādi aṅga kalāpa kalmāṣita tanuḥ avagamyate tādṛśī ekā eva iyam vākyāt vākya artha buddhiḥ

original: yathāha [bhāvanaiva hi vākyārthaḥ sarvatrākhyātavat tayā /
analyzed: yathā āha bhāvanā eva hi vākya arthaḥ sarvatra ākhyāta vat tayā

original: anekaguṇajātyādikārakārthānuraṃjitā //
analyzed: aneka guṇa jāti ādi kāraka artha anuraṃjitā

original: ekayaiva ca buddhyā 'sau gṛhyate citrarūpayā /
analyzed: ekayā eva ca buddhyā sau gṛhyate citra rūpayā

original: padārthāhitasaṃskāracitrapiṇḍaprastayā] iti //
analyzed: padārtha āhita saṃskāra citra piṇḍa prastayā iti

original: eka evāyam atidīrghaḥ kramavikasvaraḥ sakalāṅgaparipūritabhāvanātattvaviṣayaḥ pratibhāsaḥ yathā hi sthālyadhiśrayaṇāt prabhṛti ā nirākāṅkṣaudananiṣpatter ekaiveyaṃ pākakriyā salilāvasekataṇḍulāvapanadarvīvidhiṭṭanās rāvaṇādyanekakṣaṇasamudāyasvabhāvā tathā prathamapadajñānāt prabhṛti ānirākāṅkṣavākyārthaparicchedād ekaiveyaṃ śābdī pramitiḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva ayam ati dīrghaḥ krama vikasvaraḥ sakala aṅga paripūrita bhāvanā tattva viṣayaḥ pratibhāsaḥ yathā hi sthālī adhiśrayaṇāt prabhṛti ā nirākāṅkṣa odana niṣpatteḥ ekā eva iyam pāka kriyā salila avaseka taṇḍula āvapana darvī vidhi ṭṭanāḥ rāvaṇa ādi aneka kṣaṇa samudāya svabhāvā tathā prathama pada jñānāt prabhṛti ā nirākāṅkṣa vākya artha paricchedāt ekā eva iyam śābdī pramitiḥ

original: āha ca [padāt prabhṛti yā caiṣā prajñā jñātur vijṛmbhate /
analyzed: āha ca padāt prabhṛti yā ca eṣā prajñā jñātuḥ vijṛmbhate

original: puṣpitā sā padārtheṣu vākyārtheṣu phaliṣyati] iti kṛtam ativistareṇa //
analyzed: puṣpitā sā padārtheṣu vākyārtheṣu phaliṣyati iti kṛtam ati vistareṇa

original: so 'yaṃ vākyārthaḥ bhāvanānāmadheya kartṛvyāpāraḥ svargayāgādir arthaḥ yas tu vyāpāraḥ praiṣarūpo liṅāder vācyaḥ kārye vā taṃ vidhiṃ saṅgirante //
analyzed: saḥ yam vākya arthaḥ bhāvanā nāmadheya kartṛ vyāpāraḥ svarga yāga ādiḥ arthaḥ yaḥ tu vyāpāraḥ praiṣa rūpaḥ liṅ ādeḥ vācyaḥ kārye vā tam vidhim saṅgirante

original: tad etad ananumanyamānā anye pracakṣate /
analyzed: tat etat an anumanyamānāḥ anye pracakṣate

original: yo 'sau śabdabhāvanākhyaḥ śabdavyāpāraḥ śabdasya kāryo 'bhidheyaś ca tam abhidadhataḥ kurvato vā śabdasya vyāpārāntaram asti na vā //
analyzed: yaḥ sau śabda bhāvanā ākhyaḥ śabda vyāpāraḥ śabdasya kāryaḥ abhidheyaḥ ca tam abhidadhataḥ kurvataḥ vā śabdasya vyāpāra antaram asti na vā

original: yadi tāvan nāsti tad eṣa vyāpārāntaranirapekṣasvavyāpāram ivārtham api vadatu viśrāmyatu vyāpārakalpanā /
analyzed: yadi tāvat nā asti tat eṣa vyāpāra antara nirapekṣa sva vyāpāram iva artham api vadatu viśrāmyatu vyāpāra kalpanā

original: asti vedasya tadabhidhāne vyāpārāntaraṃ tadānavasthāpratīkāraḥ kaścid anveṣaṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: asti vedasya tad abhidhāne vyāpāra antaram tadā anavasthā pratīkāraḥ kaścid anveṣaṇīyaḥ

original: na cāsau dūrād api labhyate/
analyzed: na ca asau dūrāt api labhyate

original: bhūtaparispandavyatiriktavyāpāranirāsaś ca pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇe vistareṇa kṛtaḥ ity asau mārgaḥ ihāpy anusaraṇīyaḥ //
analyzed: bhūta parispanda vyatirikta vyāpāra nirāsaḥ ca pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇe vistareṇa kṛtaḥ iti asau mārgaḥ iha api anusaraṇīyaḥ

original: yaś cāsau vyāpāraḥ kriyate cābhidhīyate ca sa kiṃ pūrvam abhidhīyate tataḥ kriyate /
analyzed: yaḥ ca asau vyāpāraḥ kriyate ca abhidhīyate ca sa kim pūrvam abhidhīyate tatas kriyate

original: pūrvaṃ vā kriyate paścād abhidhīyate /
analyzed: pūrvam vā kriyate paścāt abhidhīyate

original: yugapad eva vā karaṇābhidhāne iti //
analyzed: yugapad eva vā karaṇa abhidhāne iti

original: na tāvad pūrvam abhidhīyate tataḥ kriyate anutpannasyābhidhānānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na tāvat pūrvam abhidhīyate tatas kriyate anutpannasya abhidhāna anupapatteḥ

original: na hy ajāte putre nāmadheyakaraṇam /
analyzed: na hi a jāte putre nāmadheya karaṇam

original: arthāsaṃsparśī ca tathā sati śabdaḥ syāt //
analyzed: artha a saṃsparśī ca tathā sati śabdaḥ syāt

original: ata eva na yugapad ubhayam anutpannatvānapāyāt prayatnagaurava prasaṅgāc ca /
analyzed: atas eva na yugapad ubhayam anutpanna tva anapāyāt prayatna gaurava prasaṅgāt ca

original: nāpi kṛtvā 'bhidhānam viramyavyāpārāsaṃvedanāt //
analyzed: na api kṛtvā abhidhānam viramya vyāpāra asaṃvedanāt

original: api cāyaṃ tapasvī liṅādiḥ pratyayaḥ saty api gobṛndārakatve katham amum atibṛhantaṃ bhāraṃ vakṣyati kartāraṃ ca tatsaṃkhyāṃ cākhyāsyati /
analyzed: api ca ayam tapasvī liṅ ādiḥ pratyayaḥ sati api go bṛndāraka tve katham amum ati bṛhantam bhāram vakṣyati kartāram ca tad saṃkhyām ca ākhyāsyati

original: bhāvanām abhidhāsyate śabdabhāvanāṃ ca kariṣyati tāṃ ca vadiṣyati iti durvaho 'yaṃ bhāraḥ //
analyzed: bhāvanām abhidhāsyate śabda bhāvanām ca kariṣyati tām ca vadiṣyati iti durvahaḥ yam bhāraḥ

original: kaś cāyam śabdhabhāvanānāmadheyasya vidher vākyārthe bhāvanāyām anvaya iti vaktavyam //
analyzed: kaḥ ca ayam śabdha bhāvanā nāmadheyasya vidheḥ vākya arthe bhāvanāyām anvayaḥ iti vaktavyam

original: nanu ukta eva ekapratyayābhidheyatvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandha iti na brūma ābhidhānikaḥ saṃbandho nokta iti /
analyzed: nanu uktaḥ eva eka pratyaya abhidheya tva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti na brūmaḥ ābhidhānikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ na uktaḥ iti

original: kin tu puruṣavyāpārātmikāyā arthabhāvanāyāḥ pradhānatvena vākyārthatvāt tadapekṣyamāṇaphalakaraṇetikartavyatāṃśapūraṇena svargakāmādipadāntarābhidheyo 'rthaḥ samanveti guṇatvena /
analyzed: kin tu puruṣa vyāpāra ātmikāyāḥ artha bhāvanāyāḥ pradhāna tvena vākya artha tvāt tad apekṣyamāṇa phala karaṇa itikartavya tā aṃśa pūraṇena svarga kāma ādi pada antara abhidheyaḥ rthaḥ samanveti guṇa tvena

original: śabdavyāpāras tu tadapekṣitam anyatamam api nāṃśaṃ pūrayitum alam iti tatra na guṇatām avalambate /
analyzed: śabda vyāpāraḥ tu tad apekṣitam anyatamam api na aṃśam pūrayitum alam iti tatra na guṇa tām avalambate

original: na ca dvayoḥ pradhānayoḥ ghaṭaḥ paṭa itivad vā pacati paṭhatītivad vā saṃbandha upalabhyate//
analyzed: na ca dvayoḥ pradhānayoḥ ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ iti vat vā pacati paṭhati iti vat vā saṃbandhaḥ upalabhyate

original: athārthabhāvanā śabdabhāvanākhyavidher viṣayasamarpaṇena guṇatām avalambate /
analyzed: atha artha bhāvanā śabda bhāvanā ākhya vidheḥ viṣaya samarpaṇena guṇa tām avalambate

original: vidhis tarhi vākyārthaḥ na bhāvanā tasyā aprādhānyāt /
analyzed: vidhiḥ tarhi vākya arthaḥ na bhāvanā tasyāḥ aprādhānyāt

original: ato bhāvanādvayaṃ pratyayārtha iti na hṛdayaṃgamam etat //
analyzed: atas bhāvanā dvayam pratyaya arthaḥ iti na hṛdayaṃgamam etat

original: ekābhidhānābhidheyatvaṃ ca na bhāvanayor anyonyasamanvaye kāraṇam akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣā ityādāv adarśanāt //
analyzed: eka abhidhāna abhidheya tvam ca na bhāvanayoḥ anyonya samanvaye kāraṇam akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ ityādau adarśanāt

original: kiṃ ca kasyānurodhena dve bhāvane pratyayavācye iṣyete /
analyzed: kim ca kasya anurodhena dve bhāvane pratyaya vācye iṣyete

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: liṅādiśabdaśravaṇe sati kārye ca preraṇāyāṃ ca buddhir utpadyata iti //
analyzed: liṅ ādi śabda śravaṇe sati kārye ca preraṇāyām ca buddhiḥ utpadyate iti

original: yady evaṃ eka eva tādṛśo 'sau liṅartho bhavatu /
analyzed: yadi evam ekaḥ eva sau liṅ arthaḥ bhavatu

original: tad ekatvāc ca na parasparasamanvayaḥ cintayiṣyate /
analyzed: tat eka tvāt ca na paraspara samanvayaḥ cintayiṣyate

original: na ca pratyaye'py atibhāra āropayiṣyate/
analyzed: na ca pratyaye pi atibhāraḥ āropayiṣyate

original: nanu ekasyāpi liṅarthasya yadi śabdaḥ kāryatvaṃ preraṇāṃ ca bravīti tatas tadavastha evātibhāraḥ /
analyzed: nanu ekasya api liṅ arthasya yadi śabdaḥ kārya tvam preraṇām ca bravīti tatas tad avasthaḥ evā atibhāraḥ

original: kaś cāsāv ekaḥ kāryātmā preraṇātmā ca tasyārthaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ ca asau ekaḥ kārya ātmā preraṇa ātmā ca tasya arthaḥ

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: yo liṅādipratyayād avagamyate yam abhivadato na tasyātibhāraḥ yatra na tadvyatirekeṇa pramāṇāntaraṃ kramate sa niyogo nāmāvākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ liṅ ādi pratyayāt avagamyate yam abhivadataḥ na tasya atibhāraḥ yatra na tad vyatirekeṇa pramāṇa antaram kramate sa niyogaḥ nāma a vākya arthaḥ

original: tathā hi vṛddhavyavahārataḥ śabdānām arthe vyutpattir ity atra tāvad avivāda eva /
analyzed: tathā hi vṛddha vyavahārataḥ śabdānām arthe vyutpattiḥ iti atra tāvat avivādaḥ eva

original: vyavahāre ca vākyārthe vākyasya vyutpattiḥ vākyena sarvatra vyavahārāt /
analyzed: vyavahāre ca vākya arthe vākyasya vyutpattiḥ vākyena sarvatra vyavahārāt

original: tatra [yajeta] ityāditiṅantapadayukteṣu padāntarāṇām arthas tāvad āstām/
analyzed: tatra yajeta ityādi tiṅ anta pada yukteṣu pada antarāṇām arthaḥ tāvat āstām

original: ākhyātārthe hy avagate tadānuguṇyenāsau sthāsyati /
analyzed: ākhyāta arthe hi avagate tad ānuguṇyena asau sthāsyati

original: ākhyātasya ca [yajeta] ity evamāder arthaḥ parīkṣyamāṇaḥ preraṇātmaka evāvatiṣṭhate yataḥ padāntarasannidhāne saty api na preraṇābuddhir upajāyate/
analyzed: ākhyātasya ca yajeta iti evamādeḥ arthaḥ parīkṣyamāṇaḥ preraṇa ātmakaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate yatas pada antara sannidhāne sati api na preraṇā buddhiḥ upajāyate

original: ākhyātapadaśravaṇe ca sati sā jāyate/
analyzed: ākhyāta pada śravaṇe ca sati sā jāyate

original: tasmāt tasyaiva preraṇātmako 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt tasya eva preraṇa ātmakaḥ rthaḥ

original: tatrāpi tu juhotyādidhātvantaropajananāpāyaparyālocanayā dhātos tatpratītau vyabhicārāt pratyayasya cāvyabhicārāt tasyaiva so 'rtha iti gamyate /
analyzed: tatra api tu juhoti ādi dhātu antara upajanana apāya paryālocanayā dhātoḥ tad pratītau vyabhicārāt pratyayasya ca avyabhicārāt tasya eva saḥ rthaḥ iti gamyate

original: kaḥ punar asāv arthaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ punar asau arthaḥ

original: yasmin sati [niyukto 'ham atra] iti pratipadyate puruṣaḥ so 'sāv arthaḥ /
analyzed: yasmin sati niyuktaḥ ham atra iti pratipadyate puruṣaḥ saḥ sau arthaḥ

original: sa eva vidhir ity ucyate/
analyzed: saḥ eva vidhiḥ iti ucyate

original: vidhau hi liṅādipratyayaṃ smarati pāṇiniḥ na dhātvarthe yāgādau na kartṛvyāpāre bhāvanāyām /
analyzed: vidhau hi liṅ ādi pratyayam smarati pāṇiniḥ na dhātvarthe yāga ādau na kartṛ vyāpāre bhāvanāyām

original: vidhiś ca nāma preraṇātmaka eva/
analyzed: vidhiḥ ca nāma preraṇa ātmakaḥ eva

original: ata eva vartamānāpadeśikākhyātajanitapratītivilakṣaṇeyaṃ pratītiḥ [yajeta] iti /
analyzed: atas eva vartamāna apadeśika ākhyāta janita pratīti vilakṣaṇā iyam pratītiḥ yajeta iti

original: atra hi praiṣapraiṣyayoḥ saṃbandho 'vagamyate/
analyzed: atra hi praiṣa praiṣyayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ avagamyate

original: anya evāyaṃ kriyākartṛsaṃbandhāt praiṣapraiṣyasaṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: anyaḥ eva ayam kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhāt praiṣa praiṣya saṃbandhaḥ

original: nanu [yajeta] iti kriyākartṛsaṃbandho 'vagamyate /
analyzed: nanu yajeta iti kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhaḥ avagamyate

original: na brūmaḥ nāvagamyata iti kin tu praiṣapraiṣyalakṣāṇo 'pi saṃbandhaḥ prathamam avagamyate /
analyzed: na brūmaḥ na avagamyate iti kin tu saṃbandhaḥ prathamam avagamyate

original: preṣito hi kriyāṃ kartum udyacchatīti /
analyzed: preṣitaḥ hi kriyām kartum udyacchati iti

original: nanu kriyāsaṃbandhitayaivāsau preṣyate [yajatāṃ bhavān] iti /
analyzed: nanu kriyā saṃbandhi tayā eva asau preṣyate yajatām bhavān iti

original: satyam kriyāsaṃbandhitayaiva preṣyate/
analyzed: satyam kriyā saṃbandhi tayā eva preṣyate

original: preṣyate tu saḥ /
analyzed: preṣyate tu saḥ

original: preṣyate ced ayaṃ tarhi saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: preṣyate ced ayam tarhi saṃbandhaḥ

original: kriyāsaṃbandhāt tu ubhayasaṃbandhitām  asya rājagavīkṣīravat avagamiṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: kriyā saṃbandhāt tu ubhaya saṃbandhi tām asya rāja gavī kṣīra vat avagamiṣyāmaḥ

original: yathā gauḥ rājā ca saṃbandhyate kṣīreṇa ca yā rājasaṃbandhinī sā kṣīrasaṃbandhinī yā kṣīrasambandhinī sā rājasaṃbandhinīti /
analyzed: yathā gauḥ rājā ca saṃbandhyate kṣīreṇa ca yā rāja saṃbandhinī sā kṣīra saṃbandhinī yā kṣīra sambandhinī sā rāja saṃbandhinī iti

original: evam ihāpi puruṣaḥ preṣitena ca saṃbhantsyate kriyayā ca /
analyzed: evam iha api puruṣaḥ preṣitena ca saṃbhantsyate kriyayā ca

original: yaḥ preṣyate sa karoti atha yaḥ karoti preṣyate sa iti //
analyzed: yaḥ preṣyate sa karoti atha yaḥ karoti preṣyate sa iti

original: nanu nedam ubhayaṃ bhavati praiṣo 'pi kriyaiva /
analyzed: nanu na idam ubhayam bhavati kriyā eva

original: pravartanaṃ hi kurvan pravartayati ity ucyate/
analyzed: pravartanam hi kurvan pravartayati iti ucyate

original: so 'yaṃ kriyāsambandha eva bhavati /
analyzed: saḥ yam kriyā sambandhaḥ eva bhavati

original: na tato 'nyaḥ praiṣapraiṣyasaṃbandha iti syād etad evam yadi vāyvādivat pravartane kartā liṅādiḥ syāt /
analyzed: na tatas nyaḥ praiṣa praiṣya saṃbandhaḥ iti syāt etat evam yadi vāyu ādi vat pravartane kartā liṅ ādiḥ syāt

original: [prerito 'ham atra] iti tu jñānajanakatvaṃ vidheḥ pravartakatvam /
analyzed: preritaḥ ham atra iti tu jñāna janaka tvam vidheḥ pravartaka tvam

original: sa eṣa pravartanaṃ jñāpayati na karotīti anya evāyaṃ kriyākartṛsaṃbandhāt praiṣapraiṣyasaṃbandhaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ eṣa pravartanam jñāpayati na karoti iti anyaḥ eva ayam kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhāt praiṣa praiṣya saṃbandhaḥ

original: nanu jñānam api kriyaiva /
analyzed: nanu jñānam api kriyā eva

original: tatkaraṇe ca punar api sa evāyaṃ kriyākartṛsaṃbandhaḥ/
analyzed: tad karaṇe ca punar api saḥ eva ayam kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhaḥ

original: maivam /
analyzed: mā evam

original: kārakajñāpakayor bhedasya suprasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: kāraka jñāpakayoḥ bhedasya su prasiddha tvāt

original: iha ca yo 'yaṃ yāgapuruṣayoḥ kriyākartṛsaṃbandhaḥ tato 'nyaṃ praiṣapraiṣyasaṃbandham upadarśayituṃ pravṛttāḥ smaḥ /
analyzed: iha ca yaḥ yam yāga puruṣayoḥ kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhaḥ tatas praiṣa praiṣya saṃbandham upadarśayitum pravṛttāḥ smaḥ

original: sa tato vilakṣaṇaḥ pradarśita eva /
analyzed: sa tatas vilakṣaṇaḥ pradarśitaḥ eva

original: vailakṣaṇye 'pi tasya yathākathaṃcit nāma kriyamāṇaṃ na vārayāmaḥ //
analyzed: vailakṣaṇye pi tasya yathā kathaṃcid nāma kriyamāṇam na vārayāmaḥ

original: bhavatv ayam anyaḥ praiṣapraiṣyasaṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: bhavatu ayam anyaḥ praiṣa praiṣya saṃbandhaḥ

original: sa tu prathamam avagamyate ity eṣa kuto niścayaḥ/
analyzed: sa tu prathamam avagamyate iti eṣa kutas niścayaḥ

original: uktam atra [preṣito 'ham] iti hi viditvā kriyāyāṃ pravartate /
analyzed: uktam atra preṣitaḥ ham iti hi viditvā kriyāyām pravartate

original: [ācāryacoditaḥ karomi] iti hi dṛśyate /
analyzed: ācārya coditaḥ karomi iti hi dṛśyate

original: [yajeta] iti śrute [niykto 'ham] iti prathamam avagacchati /
analyzed: yajeta iti śrute niyktaḥ ham iti prathamam avagacchati

original: tato yujyate /
analyzed: tatas yujyate

original: tenāyam ādyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: tena ayam ādyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ

original: paścātyas tu kriyākartṛsaṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: paścātyaḥ tu kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhaḥ

original: tat yo 'yaṃ liṅarthaḥ prathamam avagamyate praiṣo nāma sā preraṇā sa niyogaḥ sa vākyārthaḥ //
analyzed: tat yaḥ yam liṅ arthaḥ prathamam avagamyate praiṣaḥ nāma sā preraṇā sa niyogaḥ sa vākya arthaḥ

original: nanu vidhāv iva nimantraṇādiṣu liṅloṭāv api smaryate eva /
analyzed: nanu vidhau iva nimantraṇa ādiṣu liṅ loṭau api smaryate eva

original: satyam te tu preraṇāyā evāupādikā avāntarabhedāḥ /
analyzed: satyam te tu preraṇāyāḥ avāntarabhedāḥ

original: samahīnajyāyoviṣaya eva prayogopādhinibandhana eṣa preṣaṇādhyeṣaṇādibhedavyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: sama hīna jyāyaḥ viṣayaḥ eva prayoga upādhi nibandhanaḥ eṣa preṣaṇa adhyeṣaṇa ādi bheda vyavahāraḥ

original: preṣaṇā tu sarvatrānusyūtā 'vagamyate/
analyzed: preṣaṇā tu sarvatra anusyūtā avagamyate

original: tad uktam [pravartakatvaṃ  tu śabdārthaḥ sarvatrāparityāgāt] iti /
analyzed: tat uktam pravartaka tvam tu śabda arthaḥ sarvatra aparityāgāt iti

original: sa cāyaṃ liṅādīnām arthaḥ praiṣo ṇijarthavilakṣaṇaḥ pratīyate //
analyzed: sa ca ayam liṅ ādīnām arthaḥ praiṣaḥ ṇij artha vilakṣaṇaḥ pratīyate

original: nanu prayojakavyāpare ṇic vidhīyate/
analyzed: nanu prayojaka vyāpare ṇic vidhīyate

original: prayojakavyāpāraś ca praiṣaḥ /
praiṣe ca loḍādayo vidhīyante iti ṇijartha eva loḍarthaḥ/
analyzed: praiṣe ca loṭ ādayaḥ vidhīyante iti ṇic arthaḥ eva loṭ arthaḥ

original: tathā ca [kuru kuru] iti yo brūte sa kārayatīty ucyate na pratītibhedāt /
analyzed: tathā ca kuru kuru iti yaḥ brūte sa kārayati iti ucyate na pratīti bhedāt

original: anyā hi [karotu] [kuryāt] iti pratītiḥ anyā ca [karoti] [kārayati] iti pratītiḥ /
analyzed: anyā hi karotu kuryāt iti pratītiḥ anyā ca karoti kārayati iti pratītiḥ

original: prayojakavyāpāro hi ṇijarthaḥ jñāpakavyāpāras tu liṅarthaḥ /
analyzed: prayojaka vyāpāraḥ hi ṇij arthaḥ jñāpaka vyāpāraḥ tu liṅ arthaḥ

original: pravṛttakriyāviṣayaś ca prayojakavyāpāro ṇijarthaḥ iha tu tadviparītaḥ /
analyzed: pravṛtta kriyā viṣayaḥ ca prayojaka vyāpāraḥ ṇij arthaḥ iha tu tad viparītaḥ

original: tatra hi kāryaṃ paśyataḥ pravartanam iha tu pravatitasya[pravartitasya?]  kāryadarśanaṃ iti mahān bhedaḥ //
analyzed: tatra hi kāryam paśyataḥ pravartanam iha tu pravatitasya a pravartitasya kārya darśanam iti mahān bhedaḥ

original: tatra yathā kurvantaṃ kārayati tathaivehāpi praiṣaḥ pravartamānaṃ prerayati nāpravartamānaṃ sthāvaram iti /
analyzed: tatra yathā kurvantam kārayati tathā eva iha api praiṣaḥ pravartamānam prerayati na a pravartamānam sthāvaram iti

original: na hi vanaspatir ucyate [yajasva] iti /
analyzed: na hi vanaspatiḥ ucyate yajasva iti

original: na /
analyzed: na

original: sthāvarāder ayogyatvāt /
analyzed: sthāvara ādeḥ ayogya tvāt

original: brāhmaṇādis tu yaḥ preryate asāv apravṛttakriya eva /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa ādiḥ tu yaḥ preryate asau apravṛtta kriyaḥ eva

original: na hi yajamāna eva yajeta iti codyate kin tu apravṛttakriya eveti sarvathā ṇijarthād vilakṣaṇo liṅarthaḥ //
analyzed: na hi yajamānaḥ eva yajeta iti codyate kin tu apravṛtta kriyaḥ eva iti sarvathā ṇij arthāt vilakṣaṇaḥ liṅ arthaḥ

original: āha bhavatv ayaṃ vilakṣaṇo 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: āha bhavatu ayam vilakṣaṇaḥ rthaḥ

original: sa tu pramāṇāntarāvagamyaś cet tad upadṛśyatām ayam asāv evaṃrūpa iti/
analyzed: sa tu pramāṇa antara avagamyaḥ ced tat upadṛśyatām ayam asau evaṃrūpaḥ iti

original: pramāṇāntarānavagamaś cet kathaṃ śabdaikagocare tatra saṃbandhavyutpattiḥ /
analyzed: pramāṇa antara anavagamaḥ ced katham śabda eka gocare tatra saṃbandha vyutpattiḥ

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: śabdaikagocaras tu niyogaḥ vyutpattiś ca tatra sūpapādaiva/
analyzed: śabda eka gocaraḥ tu niyogaḥ vyutpattiḥ ca tatra su upapādā eva

original: yo hi [yajeta] [dadyāt] [juhuyāt] iti liṅādibhyo vidhiḥ pratīyate katham asau liṅādīnām gamya iṣyeta /
analyzed: yaḥ hi yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt iti liṅ ādibhyaḥ vidhiḥ pratīyate katham asau liṅ ādīnām gamyaḥ iṣyeta

original: vyutpattiś cāsya vyavahārād avakalpate/
analyzed: vyutpattiḥ ca asya vyavahārāt avakalpate

original: [gaccha] [adhīṣva] iti śṛṇvan vṛddhaḥ ceṣṭamāno dṛśyate /
analyzed: gaccha adhīṣva iti śṛṇvan vṛddhaḥ ceṣṭamānaḥ dṛśyate

original: ceṣṭā ca svātmani pravartikāvagamapūrvikā dṛṣṭā /
analyzed: ceṣṭā ca sva ātmani pravartikā avagama pūrvikā dṛṣṭā

original: pratyakṣadṛṣṭe cāmrādau sukhasādhanatayānvayavyatirekābhyām avagate tadanusmaraṇāt pravartamānaḥ kasmiṃścid ātmakṛte samupajāte sati bhautikaṃ vyāpāram ārabhate /
analyzed: pratyakṣa dṛṣṭe ca āmra ādau sukha sādhanatayā anvaya vyatirekābhyām avagate tad anusmaraṇāt pravartamānaḥ kasmiṃścid ātma kṛte samupajāte sati bhautikam vyāpāram ārabhate

original: sa cātmadharmaḥ ātmeva svasaṃvedyaḥ//
analyzed: sa ca ātma dharmaḥ ātmā iva sva saṃvedyaḥ

original: ahaṃpratyayagamyo hy ātmā nāsau parasmai darśayituṃ śakyate /
analyzed: ahaṃpratyaya gamyaḥ hi ātmā na asau parasmai darśayitum śakyate

original: na ca na carcayituṃ śakyate /
analyzed: na ca na carcayitum śakyate

original: etāvatā nānubhūyata iti na śakyate vaktum /
analyzed: etāvatā na anubhūyate iti na śakyate vaktum

original: paro 'pi hy enam ahaṃpratyayenānubhavaty eva /
analyzed: paraḥ pi hi enam ahaṃpratyayena anubhavati eva

original: tathāyam api bhautikavyāpārahetur ātmākūtaviṣeśo na pramāṇāntaravedyo bhavati /
analyzed: tathā ayam api bhautika vyāpāra hetuḥ ātma ākūta viṣa īśaḥ na pramāṇa antara vedyaḥ bhavati

original: na ca na vedyate tatsaṃvedane sati ceṣṭāyā dṛṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: na ca na vedyate tad saṃvedane sati ceṣṭāyāḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: tasmāt param api [gaccha] [adhīṣva] iti śabdaśravaṇe sati ceṣṭāpanna dṛṣṭvā tasyāpi tādṛkpreraṇāvagamo 'numīyate /
analyzed: tasmāt param api gaccha adhīṣva iti śabda śravaṇe sati ceṣṭāpanna dṛṣṭvā tasya api tādṛś preraṇa avagamaḥ numīyate

original: sa ca śabdāntaraśravaṇe saty apy adṛśyamānaḥ liṅādiśravaṇe ca sati dṛśyamānaḥ tadartha evety anvayavyatirekābhyām avagamyate itīyatīyaṃ vyutpattiḥ /
analyzed: sa ca śabda antara śravaṇe sati api adṛśyamānaḥ liṅ ādi śravaṇe ca sati dṛśyamānaḥ tad arthaḥ eva iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām avagamyate iti iyatī iyam vyutpattiḥ

original: tad etad ātmapratyakṣam /
analyzed: tat etat ātma pratyakṣam

original: liṅādiśravaṇe sati preraṇāvagatiḥ bhavati prathamaśrutāc ca liṅāder asau na bhavati /
analyzed: liṅ ādi śravaṇe sati preraṇā avagatiḥ bhavati prathama śrutāt ca liṅ ādeḥ asau na bhavati

original: na ca pramāṇāntareṇa so 'rtho darśayituṃ śakyate [kuryāt] ity asyārthaḥ kuryād ity anenaiva pratipādyate na prakārāntareṇety evaṃ vyutpattau saṃbhavantyām api yair agṛhītasaṃbandha  eva liṅādiḥ svarūpasāmarthyenaiva preraka iṣyate te 'tyantabhīrava ity upekṣaṇīyāḥ //
analyzed: na ca pramāṇa antareṇa saḥ rthaḥ darśayitum śakyate kuryāt iti asya arthaḥ kuryāt iti anena eva pratipādyate na prakāra antareṇa iti evam vyutpattau saṃbhavantyām api yaiḥ agṛhīta saṃbandhaḥ eva liṅ ādiḥ sva rūpa sāmarthyena eva prerakaḥ iṣyate te tyanta bhīravaḥ iti upekṣaṇīyāḥ

original: nanu yadi liṅādivyatirekeṇa nānyato niyogo 'vagamyate katham asau niyogaśabdāt pratīyate/
analyzed: nanu yadi liṅ ādi vyatirekeṇa na anyatas niyogaḥ vagamyate katham asau niyoga śabdāt pratīyate

original: katham vā niyogaśabdasya nāmno 'py arthaḥ pramāṇāntaragocaraḥ syāt /
analyzed: katham vā niyoga śabdasya nāmnaḥ api arthaḥ pramāṇa antara gocaraḥ syāt

original: ayi sādho /
analyzed: ayi sādho

original: na niyogaḥ nipūrveṇa yujinā ghañatena bodhayituṃ śakyate /
analyzed: na niyogaḥ ni pūrveṇa yujinā ghañ atena bodhayitum śakyate

original: vyavahāramātram etatsvarūpam ākhyātum āśrīyate yathā tu yajeta ity evamādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ so 'vagamyate tathā nānyata ity ata eva na pramāṇāntaragocaro dharma ity āhuḥ //
analyzed: vyavahāra mātram etat svarūpam ākhyātum āśrīyate yathā tu yajeta iti evamādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ saḥ avagamyate tathā na anyatas iti atas eva na pramāṇa antara gocaraḥ dharmaḥ iti āhuḥ

original: liṅartho hi niyogo vākyārthaḥ/
analyzed: liṅ arthaḥ hi niyogaḥ vākya arthaḥ

original: sa eva dharmaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva dharmaḥ

original: sa ca na pramāṇāntaragamya iti //
analyzed: sa ca na pramāṇa antara gamyaḥ iti

original: nanu liṅarthaḥ preraṇātmako 'yaṃ vyākhyātaḥ kāryātmā cāyam anuṣṭheyo dharmaḥ /
analyzed: nanu liṅ arthaḥ preraṇa ātmakaḥ yam vyākhyātaḥ kārya ātmā ca ayam anuṣṭheyaḥ dharmaḥ

original: sa eva ca vākyārtho yuktaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva ca vākya arthaḥ yuktaḥ

original: kārye 'rthe vedasya prāmāṇyam iti mīmāṃsakāḥ /
analyzed: kārye rthe vedasya prāmāṇyam iti mīmāṃsakāḥ

original: tasmāt punar api bhāṭṭapakṣavat dvayam āpatati prerakaś ca vidhiḥ kāryarūpaś cānuṣṭheyo 'rtha iti sukhaidhito niranusandhāna ivāyuṣmān evaṃ vyavaharati /
analyzed: tasmāt punar api bhāṭṭa pakṣa vat dvayam āpatati prerakaḥ ca vidhiḥ kārya rūpaḥ ca anuṣṭheyaḥ rthaḥ iti sukha edhitaḥ niranusandhānaḥ iva āyuṣmān evam vyavaharati

original: na hy anyaḥ prerakaḥ anyaś cānuṣṭheya ity uktam /
analyzed: na hi anyaḥ prerakaḥ anyaḥ ca anuṣṭheyaḥ iti uktam

original: niyoga eva prerakaḥ niyogo eva cānuṣṭheyaḥ //
analyzed: niyogaḥ eva prerakaḥ niyogaḥ eva ca anuṣṭheyaḥ

original: kathaṃ dvairūpyam asya śabdo vadatīti cet maivam /
analyzed: katham dvairūpyam asya śabdaḥ vadati iti ced mā evam

original: prerakatvam evaśabdārthaḥ ārthaṃ tu kāryatvam /
yato vidhir evānuṣṭheyatayā 'vagamyate [ācāryājñāṃ karomi] [rājñājñāṃ karomi] iti //
analyzed: yatas vidhiḥ eva anuṣṭheya tayā avagamyate ācārya ājñām karomi rājñā ājñām karomi iti

original: kimarthaṃ tarhi viṣayānuṣṭhānam iti cet na hy ājñā ghaṭādivat svarūpeṇa kartuṃ śakyā api tu viṣayadvārakaṃ tatsaṃpādanam /
analyzed: kimartham tarhi viṣaya anuṣṭhānam iti ced na hi ājñā ghaṭa ādi vat svarūpeṇa kartum śakyā api tu viṣaya dvārakam tad saṃpādanam

original: [kamaṇḍulaṃ bibhṛhi] ity ācāryeṇājñāptaḥ kamaṇḍulaṃ bhṛtvācāryājñāṃ kṛtāṃ manyate/
analyzed: kamaṇḍulam bibhṛhi iti ācāryeṇa ājñāptaḥ kamaṇḍulam bhṛtvā ācārya ājñām kṛtām manyate

original: [kaṭakaṃ gaccha] iti rājñāptaḥ kaṭakaṃ gatvā rājājñāṃ kṛtāṃ manyate /
analyzed: kaṭakam gaccha iti rājñā āptaḥ kaṭakam gatvā rāja ājñām kṛtām manyate

original: so 'yaṃ niyoga evānuṣṭheyaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ yam niyogaḥ eva anuṣṭheyaḥ

original: nanu [rājājñayā karomi] ity api vyapadeśo dṛśyate /
analyzed: nanu rāja ājñayā karomi iti api vyapadeśaḥ dṛśyate

original: sa cānanuṣṭheyām evājñāṃ darśayati/
analyzed: sa ca ananuṣṭheyām eva ājñām darśayati

original: maivam/
analyzed: mā evam

original: tatrāpy ājñaivanuṣṭheyā /
analyzed: tatra api ājñā eva anuṣṭheyā

original: preṣāṇābhiprāyeṇa tṛtīyānirdeśa ity evaṃ kecit //
analyzed: preṣāṇa abhiprāyeṇa tṛtīyā nirdeśaḥ iti evam kecid

original: anye tu śābdaṃ kāryatvaṃ niyogasya prerakatvaṃ tv arthād ity ācakṣate //
analyzed: anye tu śābdam kāryatvam niyogasya preraka tvam tu arthāt iti ācakṣate

original: anuṣṭheyatā hi tasya nijaṃ rūpam /
analyzed: anuṣṭheya tā hi tasya nijam rūpam

original: svasiddhaye sa tu niyojyaṃ niyuṃjānaḥ preraka ity ucyate /
analyzed: sva siddhaye sa tu niyojyam niyuṃjānaḥ prerakaḥ iti ucyate

original: tad idaṃ kāryatvaṃ aparityaktaprerakabhāvam asyāvagamyate /
analyzed: tat idam kārya tvam a parityakta preraka bhāvam asya avagamyate

original: prerakatvaṃ cāparityaktakāryabhāvam ity anyatarad atra śābdaṃ rūpaṃ anyatarac cārthaṃ rūpam iti na bhāṭṭair ivāsmābhiḥ pratyaye gurur bhāra āropitaḥ //
analyzed: preraka tvam ca aparityakta kārya bhāvam iti anyatarat atra śābdam rūpam anyatarat ca artham rūpam iti na bhāṭṭaiḥ iva asmābhiḥ pratyaye guruḥ bhāraḥ āropitaḥ

original: sa cāyaṃ niyogaḥ pratīyamānaḥ [yajeta svargakāmaḥ] ity anubandhadvayāvacchinnaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: sa ca ayam niyogaḥ pratīyamānaḥ yajeta svarga kāmaḥ iti anubandha dvaya avacchinnaḥ pratīyate

original: yajyādināsya viṣayānubandho dhātunocyate /
analyzed: yaji ādinā asya viṣaya anubandhaḥ dhātunā ucyate

original: [svargakāmaḥ] ity adhikārānubandhaḥ padāntareṇārpyate /
analyzed: svarga kāmaḥ iti adhikāra anubandhaḥ pada antareṇa arpyate

original: tatra ca svargakāmasyaivādhikāro nirvahati /
analyzed: tatra ca svarga kāmasya eva adhikāraḥ nirvahati

original: yadi bhāvārthasya svargaṃ prati sādhanatvam avagamyate evaṃ tarhi svargakāmenaivāsau kṛto bhavatīti svargakāmapadānvaye prāktana vā mārgo 'numantavyaḥ na punaḥ svargādiphalapradarśanapūrvakaṃ vidheḥ pravartakatvam asvātantryaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: yadi bhāva arthasya svargam prati sādhanatvam avagamyate evam tarhi svarga kāmena eva asau kṛtaḥ bhavati iti svarga kāma pada anvaye vā mārgaḥ nu mantavyaḥ na punar svarga ādi phala pradarśana pūrvakam vidheḥ pravartaka tvam asvātantrya prasaṅgāt

original: na hīdṛśaṃ śāstrasya daityam yat phalaṃ vinā puṃsaḥ pravartayituṃ na śaknotīti /
analyzed: na hi īdṛśam śāstrasya daityam yat phalam vinā puṃsaḥ pravartayitum na śaknoti iti

original: anyathā [yāvaj jīvaṃ yajeta] ityādāv apravartakaṃ śāstraṃ syāt /
analyzed: anyathā yāvat jīvam yajeta ityādau a pravartakam śāstram syāt

original: kiṃ [yāvaj jīvaṃ] ityādicodanāḥ phalaśūnyā eva /
analyzed: kim yāvat jīvam ityādi codanāḥ phala śūnyāḥ eva

original: om ity ucyate /
analyzed: om iti ucyate

original: na hi vidhiḥ phalam ākāṅkṣati api tu niyojyaṃ viṣayaṃ ca kasya niyogaḥ kutra niyogaḥ iti /
analyzed: na hi vidhiḥ phalam ākāṅkṣati api tu niyojyam viṣayam ca kasya niyogaḥ kutra niyogaḥ iti

original: te ete ubhe apy ākāṅkṣe paripūrṇe /
analyzed: te ete ubhe api ākāṅkṣe paripūrṇe

original: tatra jīvato niyogaḥ yāge ca niyoga iti/
analyzed: tatra jīvataḥ niyogaḥ yāge ca niyogaḥ iti

original: ataḥ paraṃ phalakalpanaṃ puruṣabuddhiprabhavaṃ bhavati na śāstrīyam /
analyzed: atas param phala kalpanam puruṣa buddhi prabhavam bhavati na śāstrīyam

original: kāmādhikāre tu niyojyataiva anyathā svargakāmasya nopapadyata iti svargasya sādhyatvam abhyupagatam na punar vidheḥ phalārthatvāt /
analyzed: kāma adhikāre tu niyojya tā eva anyathā svarga kāmasya na upapadyate iti svargasya sādhya tvam abhyupagatam na punar vidheḥ phala artha tvāt

original: ata eva na tatra vaidhī pravṛttiḥ lipsayaiva pravṛttatvāt/
analyzed: atas eva na tatra vaidhī pravṛttiḥ lipsayā eva pravṛtta tvāt

original: āha ca tasya lipsā 'rthaṃ lakṣaṇā iti/
analyzed: āha ca tasya lipsā rtham lakṣaṇāḥ iti

original: sādhyasādhanabhāvapratipādanaparyavasito hi tatra vidhivyāpāraḥ na prayogaparyavasita iti //
analyzed: sādhya sādhana bhāva pratipādana paryavasitaḥ hi tatra vidhi vyāpāraḥ na prayoga paryavasitaḥ iti

original: ata eva śyenāder adharmatvam /
analyzed: atas eva śyena ādeḥ adharma tvam

original: tatra hi [abhicaran] iti śatrā śatruṃ vaidikenopāyena jighāṃsur adhikārī darśitaḥ tasya /
analyzed: tatra hi abhicaran iti śatrā śatrum vaidikena upāyena jighāṃsuḥ adhikārī darśitaḥ tasya

original: na tatra śāstraṃ pravartakam /
analyzed: na tatra śāstram pravartakam

original: jānāty evāsau [mayaitat kartavyam upāyaṃ tu na veda] ity evam /
analyzed: jānāti eva asau mayā etat kartavyam upāyam tu na veda iti evam

original: upāyamātram asyopadiśyate śyenaḥ /
analyzed: upāya mātram asya upadiśyate śyenaḥ

original: [śyenaṃ kuru] iti tu na vidhiḥ prabhavati jighāṃsāyā eva tatra pravartakatvāt /
analyzed: śyenam kuru iti tu na vidhiḥ prabhavati jighāṃsāyāḥ eva tatra pravartaka tvāt

original: ataḥ śyenāder adharmatvāt tadvyudāsārthapadopādānaṃ [codanālakṣano 'rtho dharmaḥ] iti //
analyzed: atas śyena ādeḥ adharma tvāt tad vyudāsa artha pada upādānam codanā lakṣanaḥ rthaḥ dharmaḥ iti

original: kāmādhikāreṣu hītikartavyatāṃśe śāstrīyā pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: kāma adhikāreṣu hi itikartavya tā aṃśe śāstrīyā pravṛttiḥ

original: yathoktaṃ [kratvartho hi śāstrād avagamyate] iti /
analyzed: yathā uktam kratu arthaḥ hi śāstrāt avagamyate iti

original: bhāvārthamātrasya hi karaṇatvam avagatam /
analyzed: bhāva artha mātrasya hi karaṇa tvam avagatam

original: itikartavyatāṃśas tu na karaṇatvāvagativelāyām upanipatita iti tatra lipsāyā abhāvāt śāstram eva pravartakam //
analyzed: itikartavyatā aṃśaḥ tu na karaṇa tva avagati velāyām upanipatitaḥ iti tatra lipsāyāḥ abhāvāt śāstram eva pravartakam

original: ata eva agnīṣomīyahiṃsāyā nādharmatvam /
analyzed: atas eva agnīṣomīya hiṃsāyāḥ na adharma tvam

original: [na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni] iti niṣedhaḥ sāmānyaśāstram /
analyzed: na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni iti niṣedhaḥ sāmānyaśāstram

original: sāmānyaśāstraṃ ca viśeṣaśāstrakroḍīkṛtaviṣayaparihāreṇa pravartata iti agnīṣomīyahiṃsāyāḥ śāstrīyatvāt na niṣedhavidhiḥ anarthatāṃ bodhayed iti //
analyzed: sāmānya śāstram ca viśeṣa śāstra kroḍīkṛta viṣaya parihāreṇa pravartate iti agnīṣomīya hiṃsāyāḥ śāstrīya tvāt na niṣedha vidhiḥ anartha tām bodhayet iti

original: nanu śyene 'pi śāstrīyā pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: nanu śyene pi śāstrīyā pravṛttiḥ

original: pravartakatvaṃ hi vidheḥ svarūpaṃ pramāṇāntaravilakṣaṇam /
analyzed: pravartaka tvam hi vidheḥ svarūpam pramāṇa antara vilakṣaṇam

original: nānvayavyatirekavatsādhyasādhanapratītimātraparyanto hi vidhivyāpāro bhavitum arhatīti sarvatra vidheḥ prayoktṛtvānapāyāt /
analyzed: na anvaya vyatireka vat sādhya sādhana pratīti mātra paryantaḥ hi vidhi vyāpāraḥ bhavitum arhati iti sarvatra vidheḥ prayoktṛ tva anapāyāt

original: evam eva ceyaṃ pravṛttiḥ śyenena yajeteti //
analyzed: evam eva ca iyam pravṛttiḥ śyenena yajeta iti

original: ucyate [pravartito 'haṃ] iti jñānajananaṃ vidheḥ prerakatvam /
analyzed: ucyate pravartitaḥ haṃ iti jñāna jananam vidheḥ preraka tvam

original: tata satyaṃ sarvatra tulyaṃ karaṇe ca śyene itikartavyatāyāṃ agnīṣomīye /
analyzed: tata satyam sarvatra tulyam karaṇe ca śyene itikartavya tāyām agnīṣomīye

original: bāhye tu pravṛttilakṣaṇe bhautike vyāpāre yatra lipsādi prakārāntaram asti tatra bhavanty api vidheḥ prayauktṛśaktir udāste paśupuroḍāśaprayājavat /
analyzed: bāhye tu pravṛtti lakṣaṇe bhautike vyāpāre yatra lipsā ādi prakāra antaram asti tatra bhavanti api vidheḥ prayauktṛ śaktiḥ udāste paśupuroḍāśa prayāja vat

original: tatrodāsīne vidhau niṣedhaśāstram avatarati [na hiṃsyāt] iti //
analyzed: tatra udāsīne vidhau niṣedha śāstram avatarati na hiṃsyāt iti

original: yadi tu sarvatraiva prayoktṛśaktir udāsīnā bhavet tadā jyotiṣṭomān na viśiṣyata śyenaḥ śāstrīyāyāṃ pravṛttau agnīṣomīya iva niṣedhaśāstrasyānavakāśāt //
analyzed: yadi tu sarvatra eva prayoktṛ śaktiḥ udāsīnā bhavet tadā jyotiṣṭomāt na viśiṣyata śyenaḥ śāstrīyāyām pravṛttau agnīṣomīyaḥ iva niṣedha śāstrasya anavakāśāt

original: jyotiṣṭome 'nullaṃghitaniṣedho 'dhikārī svargasyāniṣiddhatvāt /
analyzed: jyotiṣṭome dhikārī svargasya a niṣiddha tvāt

original: śyene tu hiṃsāyāḥ pratiṣiddhatvāt utkrāntaniṣedho 'dhikārīti cet maivam /
analyzed: śyene tu hiṃsāyāḥ pratiṣiddha tvāt utkrānta niṣedhaḥ dhi kārī iti ced mā evam

original: adhikāridaśāyām api bhavanmate vidheḥ prayoktṛtvānapāyāt na niṣedhaśāstram avakāśaṃ labhata iti śyene 'pi nāvadhīritaniṣedho 'dhikārī syāt //
analyzed: adhikāri daśāyām api bhavat mate vidheḥ prayoktṛ tva anapāyāt na niṣedha śāstram avakāśam labhate iti śyene pi na avadhīrita niṣedhaḥ dhi kārī syāt

original: nanu na vidhiḥ phale prayojyaṃ prerayati [phalaṃ kuru] iti /
analyzed: nanu na vidhiḥ phale prayojyam prerayati phalam kuru iti

original: karmaṇi tv enaṃ pravartayati [yajasva] iti /
analyzed: karmaṇi tu enam pravartayati yajasva iti

original: tenādhikāridaśāyām apratihato niṣedhaśāstrāvakāśaḥ āyuṣman asmatpakṣam evāśrito 'si /
analyzed: tena adhikāri daśāyām apratihataḥ niṣedha śāstra avakāśaḥ āyuṣman asmad pakṣam eva āśritaḥ si

original: phale cen na pravartayati vidhiḥ puruṣaṃ phalārthitvād evainam upaye pravartamānaṃ tatrāpi na prerayet /
analyzed: phale ced na pravartayati vidhiḥ puruṣam phala arthi tvāt eva enam upaye pravartamānam tatra api na prerayet

original: upāyānabhijñasya tu upāyam eva darśayet /
analyzed: upāya anabhijñasya tu upāyam eva darśayet

original: yāvad aprāptaṃ hi vidher viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: yāvat aprāptam hi vidheḥ viṣayaḥ

original: tad uktaṃ [jānāty evāsau mayaitat kartavyaṃ upāyaṃ tu na veda] iti /
analyzed: tat uktam jānāti eva asau mayā etat kartavyam upāyam tu na veda iti

original: pratītir apīyam īdṛśī [abhicaran yajet] iti /
analyzed: pratītiḥ api iyam īdṛśī abhicaran yajet iti

original: [yadi tvaṃ śāstrīyenopāyena vairiṇaṃ hantum udyataḥ śyenena jahi śyenas tavopāyaḥ] ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: yadi tvam śāstrīyena upāyena vairiṇam hantum udyataḥ śyenena jahi śyenaḥ tava upāyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tad alam atiprasaṅgena //
analyzed: tat alam atiprasaṅgena

original: kāmādhikāreṣu tāvat na phalākāṅkṣī vidhiḥ/
analyzed: kāma adhikāreṣu tāvat na phala ākāṅkṣī vidhiḥ

original: phalaṃ tv adhikāre hetur iti sthitam //
analyzed: phalam tu adhikāre hetuḥ iti sthitam

original: pratiṣedhādhikāre 'pi pratyavāyo na kalpate /
analyzed: pratiṣedha adhikāre pi pratyavāyaḥ na kalpate

original: niṣedhyādiviṣayād eva labdhatvād adhikāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: niṣedhya ādi viṣayāt eva labdha tvāt adhikāriṇaḥ

original: tatrāsau kalpyamāno 'pi narakādiphalodayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra asau kalpyamānaḥ naraka ādi phala udayaḥ

original: avaidhatvaṃ prapadyeta na hy ākāṅkṣedṛśī vidheḥ //
analyzed: a vaidha tvam prapadyeta na hi ākāṅkṣā īdṛśī vidheḥ

original: vidher apekṣe dve eva niyojyaviṣayau prati /
analyzed: vidheḥ apekṣe dve eva niyojya viṣayau prati

original: tatpūraṇena tṛptas tu na vāṃchati tato 'dhikam //
analyzed: tad pūraṇena tṛptaḥ tu na vāṃchati tatas dhikam

original: niyojyas tāvad etāvān kruddho 'rihananodyataḥ /
analyzed: niyojyaḥ tāvat etāvān kruddhaḥ ri hanana udyataḥ

original: viṣayas tannivṛttiś ca niyogo yatra gamyate //
analyzed: viṣayaḥ tad nivṛttiḥ ca niyogaḥ yatra gamyate

original: nanu etāvan na vibudhyāmahe niṣedhavidheḥ ko viṣaya iti /
analyzed: nanu etāvat na vibudhyāmahe niṣedha vidheḥ kaḥ viṣayaḥ iti

original: [bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdās tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta] iti sthite nañarthas tāvat pūrvāparībhūtatvāt na vidher viṣayaḥ ananvitābhidhānāc ca /
analyzed: bhāva arthāḥ karma śabdāḥ tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta iti sthite nañ arthaḥ tāvat pūrvāparībhūta tvāt na vidheḥ viṣayaḥ ananvita abhidhānāt ca

original: na hi naño 'nantaraṃ liṅvibhaktiḥ śrūyate api tu hanteḥ /
analyzed: na hi nañaḥ nantaram liṅ vibhaktiḥ śrūyate api tu hanteḥ

original: hananam api na vidhe viṣayaḥ tasya dharmatvaprasaṅgāt nañprayogasya vaiyarthyaprasakteḥ /
analyzed: hananam api na vidhe viṣayaḥ tasya dharma tva prasaṅgāt nañ prayogasya vaiyarthya prasakteḥ

original: hanane ca puruṣasya svataḥ pravṛtteś ca /
analyzed: hanane ca puruṣasya svatas pravṛtteḥ ca

original: nañviśiṣṭo 'pi na hantyartho 'sya viṣayaḥ tayor viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvābhāvāt //
analyzed: nañ viśiṣṭaḥ pi na viṣayaḥ tayoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva abhāvāt

original: yuktaṃ dadhnā juhotīti home dadhyanuraktatā /
analyzed: yuktam dadhnā juhoti iti home dadhi anurakta tā

original: hanteḥ svarūpanāśāt tu na nañarthānuraktatā //
analyzed: hanteḥ sva rūpa nāśāt tu na nañ artha anurakta tā

original: puruṣaprayatno 'pi na kevalo vidher viṣayaḥ svataśiddhatvāt /
analyzed: puruṣa prayatnaḥ pi na kevalaḥ vidheḥ viṣayaḥ

original: nāpi nañarthānuraktaḥ kutrāpi nañarthasya viśeṣaṇatvānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: nā api nañ artha anuraktaḥ kutra api nañ arthasya viśeṣaṇa tva anupapatteḥ

original: athāyam abrāhmaṇādinyāyena hantau paryudaste bhāvārthāntare niyogaḥ kalpyate [na hanyāt] iti ko 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: atha ayam a brāhmaṇa ādi nyāyena hantau paryudaste bhāva artha antare niyogaḥ kalpyate na hanyāt iti kaḥ rthaḥ

original: anyat kim api kuryād iti tarhi kiṃ tadbhāvāntaram iti na vicārayituṃ śakyam /
analyzed: anyat kim api kuryāt iti tarhi kim tad bhāva antaram iti na vicārayitum śakyam

original: yat kiṃcid iti cet na tasya svataśiddhatvena vidhyanarhatvāt /
analyzed: yat kiṃcid iti ced na tasya svatas śiddha tvena vidhi anarha tvāt

original: avaśyaṃ jīvan pumān kiṃcit karoti paṭhati gacchati bhaṅkte ca //
analyzed: avaśyam jīvan pumān kiṃcid karoti paṭhati gacchati bhaṅkte ca

original: atha viṣayāṃśaṃ parihṛtya pramāṇāṃśe nañ niviśate sā hi pravartamānapumāṃsaṃ ruṇaddhi yaddhanyāt anneti tad apy anupapannam /
analyzed: atha viṣaya aṃśam parihṛtya pramāṇa aṃśe na niviśate sā hi pravartamāna pumāṃsam ruṇaddhi yat hanyāt annā iti tat api anupapannam

original: anvitābhidhānena vidhivibhakter hantinā 'varuddhatvāt /
analyzed: anvita abhidhānena vidhi vibhakteḥ hantinā varuddha tvāt

original: preraṇaśaktisvabhāvo vidhiḥ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: preraṇa śakti svabhāvaḥ vidhiḥ sthitaḥ

original: yas tu niṣedhātmā nañ pārśve sthitaḥ tatra na vidhiḥ saṃkrāmati /
analyzed: yaḥ tu niṣedha ātmā pārśve sthitaḥ tatra na vidhiḥ saṃkrāmati

original: saṃkrāntāv api nañaś ca saṃbandhe sati vidheḥ svarūpanāśo 'vagamyate /
analyzed: saṃkrāntau api nañaḥ ca saṃbandhe sati vidheḥ svarūpa nāśaḥ avagamyate

original: svabhāvo hy eṣa nañaḥ yad ayaṃ yena yena saṃbadhyate tasya tasyābhāvaṃ bodhayatīti /
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ hi eṣa nañaḥ yat ayam yena yena saṃbadhyate tasya tasya abhāvam bodhayati iti

original: ato vidhisaṃbandhe naña iṣyamāṇe etāvān vākyārtho 'vatiṣṭhate hananavidhir nāstīti /
analyzed: atas vidhi saṃbandhe nañaḥ iṣyamāṇe etāvān vākya arthaḥ vatiṣṭhate hanana vidhiḥ na asti iti

original: tataś ca hananasya vidhitvaṃ ca syāt //
analyzed: tatas ca hananasya vidhi tvam ca syāt

original: atrocyate [dadhnā juhoti] iti homasya vacanāntaracoditatvāt vidhivibhaktiśaktir upapadaṃ saṃkāmatīti yathā varṇitaṃ evam ihāpi hanane svataḥ pravṛttatvena vidhivaiphalyāt nañaś ca śrūyamāṇasyānarthakyaprasaṅgāt vidhāyikā śaktiḥ nañartham eva spṛśatīti kiṃ neṣyate /
analyzed: atra ucyate dadhnā juhoti iti homasya vacana antara codita tvāt vidhi vibhakti śaktiḥ upapadam saṃkāmati iti yathā varṇitam evam iha api hanane svatas pravṛtta tvena vidhi vaiphalyāt nañaḥ ca śrūyamāṇasya ānarthakya prasaṅgāt vidhāyikā śaktiḥ nañ artham eva spṛśati iti kim nā iṣyate

original: nanu uktam atra [bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdāḥ] iti /
analyzed: nanu uktam atra bhāva arthāḥ karma śabdāḥ iti

original: tatra dadhyanurakto homa eva vidhīyata iti phalato dadhi vihitaṃ bhavati na pramāṇataḥ /
analyzed: tatra dadhi anuraktaḥ homaḥ eva vidhīyate iti phalataḥ dadhi vihitam bhavati na pramāṇataḥ

original: iha tu nañas tadupamardasvabhāvatvāt saṃsargo dadhyāder iva kalpate //
analyzed: iha tu nañaḥ tad upamarda svabhāva tvāt saṃsargaḥ dadhi ādeḥ iva kalpate

original: maivam nivṛttim eva kurvan viśeṣaṇībhavati /
analyzed: mā evam nivṛttim eva kurvan viśeṣaṇībhavati

original: seyaṃ nañupahite hantau śrute hanananivṛttir gamyate /
analyzed: sā iyam nañ upahite hantau śrute hanana nivṛttiḥ gamyate

original: yathā siddharūpadadhyanupraveśe 'pi na homasya sādhyamānāvasthā nivartate tathā nañanuviddhahantyarthāvagatau na pūrvāparībhāvabuddhir nivartate /
analyzed: yathā siddha rūpa dadhi anupraveśe na homasya sādhyamāna avasthā nivartate tathā nañ anuviddha hanti artha avagatau na pūrvāparībhāva buddhiḥ nivartate

original: na hy abrāhmaṇavat [na hanyāt] iti siddharūpabuddhiḥ /
analyzed: na hi a brāhmaṇa vat na hanyāt iti siddha rūpa buddhiḥ

original: so 'yaṃ hanananivṛttirūpaḥ pūrvāparībhūto 'rtho vidhiviṣayo bhavati //
analyzed: saḥ yam hanana nivṛtti rūpaḥ pūrvāparībhūtaḥ rthaḥ vidhi viṣayaḥ bhavati

original: atha vā vibhaktyarthena nañ saṃbhantsyati /
analyzed: atha vā vibhakti arthena nam saṃbhantsyati

original: śuddhasya liṅāder arthaḥ pravartakaḥ nañupahitasya tasyārtho nivartaka iti śabdaśaktir evaiṣā vā 'paryanuyojyeti //
analyzed: śuddhasya liṅ ādeḥ arthaḥ pravartakaḥ nañ upahitasya tasya arthaḥ nivartakaḥ iti śabda śaktiḥ eva eṣā vā paryanuyojyā iti

original: yat tu sākṣāt naño 'nantaraṃ vidhivibhaktir notpadyate tat tasyādhātu tvāt dhātoḥ pare tiṅādayaḥ pratyayā bhavanti nānyasmād iti /
analyzed: yat tu sākṣāt nañaḥ nantaram vidhi vibhaktiḥ na utpadyate tat tasya adhātu tvāt dhātoḥ pare tiṅ ādayaḥ pratyayāḥ bhavanti na anyasmāt iti

original: yogyatayā tu nañarthena tasya saṃbandhaḥ/
analyzed: yogyatayā tu nañ arthena tasya saṃbandhaḥ

original: na ca tatrāyam artho 'vatiṣṭhate hananavidhir nāstīti /
analyzed: na ca tatra ayam arthaḥ vatiṣṭhate hanana vidhiḥ na asti iti

original: kin tu nañupahito vidhir audāsīnye puruṣaṃ niyunkte /
analyzed: kim tu nañ upahitaḥ vidhiḥ audāsīnye puruṣam niyunkte

original: tadavacchedakaś ca hantiḥ anyathā sarvakriyaudāsīnyaṃ pratīyetety alam ativimardena /
analyzed: tad avacchedakaḥ ca hantiḥ anyathā sarva kriyā audāsīnyam pratīyeta iti alam ativimardena

original: niṣedhavidher api siddho 'nubandhadvayayogaḥ //
analyzed: niṣedha vidheḥ api siddhaḥ nubandha dvaya yogaḥ

original: evaṃ niyogavyāpare samāpte phalakalpanā /
analyzed: evam samāpte phala kalpanā

original: nṛbuddhiprabhavaiva syāt ataḥ sāpekṣatā bhavet //
analyzed: nṛ buddhi prabhavā eva syāt atas sāpekṣa tā bhavet

original: kathaṃ naro nivarteta pratyavāyabhayād vinā /
analyzed: katham naraḥ nivarteta pratyavāya bhayāt vinā

original: mā nivartiṣṭa vidhinā tāvad uktaṃ nivartanam //
analyzed: mā nivartiṣṭa vidhinā tāvat uktam nivartanam

original: pravṛddhatararāgāndhaḥ pratyavāye 'pi kalpite /
analyzed: pravṛddhatara rāga andhaḥ pratyavāye pi kalpite

original: na nivarteta ity evaṃ kiṃ vidher apramāṇatā //
analyzed: na nivarteta iti evam kim vidheḥ apramāṇa tā

original: phalaṃ bhavatu mā vā bhūt puruṣo 'pi pravartatām /
analyzed: phalam bhavatu mā vā bhūt puruṣaḥ u pi pravartatām

original: mā praviṣṭa vā sve tu nāsty arthe khaṇḍanā vidheḥ //
analyzed: mā praviṣṭa vā sve tu nā asti arthe khaṇḍanā vidheḥ

original: pravartanāvagamajanane hi vidhivyāpāra ity asakṛd uktam /
analyzed: pravartana avagama janane hi vidhi vyāpāraḥ iti asakṛt uktam

original: tatra cāsya na kiṃcid vaikalyam //
analyzed: tatra ca asya na kiṃcid vaikalyam

original: nanu vidheḥ phalāpekṣā nāsti cet kiṃ tarhi aśruyamāṇaphaleṣu viśvajidādiṣu svargādiphalaṃ kalpyate/
analyzed: nanu vidheḥ phala apekṣā na asti ced kim tarhi a śruyamāṇa phaleṣu viśvajit ādiṣu svarga ādi phalam kalpyate

original: anabhijño devānāṃpriyaḥ /
analyzed: an abhijñaḥ devānām priyaḥ

original: na tatra vidheḥ phalāpekṣā /
analyzed: na tatra vidheḥ phala apekṣā

original: na ca phalam tatra kalpyate /
analyzed: na ca phalam tatra kalpyate

original: kin tu aśruyamāṇatvād adhikārānubandhasya niradhikārasya ca vidher vidhitvānirvāhāt adhikārānubandhaḥ kalpyate/
analyzed: kim tu a śruyamāṇa tvāt adhikāra anubandhasya niradhikārasya ca vidheḥ vidhi tva anirvāhāt adhikāra anubandhaḥ kalpyate

original: tatra sarvān praty aviśiṣṭatvāt svargakāmaḥ codanāśeṣabhāvena niyojyaḥ kalpyate /
analyzed: tatra sarvān prati a viśiṣṭa tvāt svarga kāmaḥ codanā śeṣa bhāvena niyojyaḥ kalpyate

original: na ceyaṃ pauruṣī kalpanā śrutyekadeśaḥ sa iti hi tadvidaḥ /
analyzed: na ca iyam pauruṣī kalpanā śruti eka deśaḥ saḥ iti hi tad vidaḥ

original: tad iyam adhikārānubandhakalpanā na phalakalpanā iti so 'yam anubandhadvayāvacchinno niyogo vākyārthaḥ //
analyzed: tat iyam adhikāra anubandha kalpanā na phala kalpanā iti saḥ yam anubandha dvaya avacchinnaḥ niyogaḥ vākya arthaḥ

original: vākyārthatvaṃ cāsya pradhānatvāt /
analyzed: vākya artha tvam ca asya pradhāna tvāt

original: anyo hi yajyādir artho 'vagamyamānaḥ tadanupraveśena pratīyata iti guṇo bhavati /
analyzed: anyaḥ hi yaji ādiḥ arthaḥ vagamyamānaḥ tad anupraveśena pratīyate iti guṇaḥ bhavati

original: niyogas tu svamahimākṣiptadṛṣṭopakārānekakriyākārakakalāpopabṛṃhitasvarūpaḥ pratīyata iti prādhānyam avalambate/
analyzed: niyogaḥ tu sva mahima ākṣipta dṛṣṭa upakāra aneka kriyā kāraka kalāpa upabṛṃhita svarūpaḥ pratīyate iti prādhānyam avalambate

original: kāryaṃ cet pradhānam ucyate niyoga eva kāryam /
analyzed: kāryam ced pradhānam ucyate niyogaḥ eva kāryam

original: phalaṃ cet pradhānam uyate[ucyate?] tad api na siddham api tu sādhyam /
analyzed: phalam ced pradhānam tat api na siddham api tu sādhyam

original: sādhyatvaṃ cāsya niyogādhīnam iti niyoga eva pradhānam /
analyzed: sādhya tvam ca asya niyoga adhīnam iti niyogaḥ eva pradhānam

original: puruṣas tu niyojyamānavād apradhānam iti //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ tu niyojyamānavāt a pradhānam iti

original: evaṃ niyoga eva pradhānatvāt vākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: evam niyogaḥ eva pradhāna tvāt vākya arthaḥ

original: sa ca pratītibhedaparyālocanayā caturavastha ucyate/
analyzed: sa ca pratīti bheda paryālocanayā catur avasthaḥ ucyate

original: utpattividhiḥ viniyogavidhiḥ prayogavidhiḥ adhikārividhir iti //
analyzed: utpatti vidhiḥ viniyoga vidhiḥ prayoga vidhiḥ adhikāri vidhiḥ iti

original: utpattividhiḥ [agnihotraṃ juhoti] iti agnihotrākhyakarmasvarūpotpādavyatirekeṇārthāntarānavagamāt //
analyzed: utpatti vidhiḥ agnihotram juhoti iti agnihotra ākhya karma svarūpa utpāda vyatirekeṇa artha antara anavagamāt

original: viniyogavidhiḥ [dadhnā juhoti] iti utpattividhitaḥ pratipanne bhāvārthe tatra dadhyādiguṇaviniyogāvagamāt //
analyzed: viniyoga vidhiḥ dadhnā juhoti iti utpatti vidhitaḥ pratipanne bhāva arthe tatra dadhi ādi guṇa viniyoga avagamāt

original: adhikārividhiḥ [agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ] iti nirjñāte karmaṇi tatrādhikṛtasya puṃsas tato 'vagamāt //
analyzed: adhikāri vidhiḥ agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti nirjñāte karmaṇi tatra adhikṛtasya puṃsaḥ tatas

original: prayogavidhis tu yaḥ kramaparyantaṃ prayoge padārthān avagamayati /
analyzed: prayoga vidhiḥ tu yaḥ krama paryantam prayoge padārthān avagamayati

original: ayaṃ cādhikāravidher eva vyāpāraviśeṣa iti tad evāsyodāharaṇam [agnihotraṃ juhyāt svargakāmaḥ] iti //
analyzed: ayam ca adhikāra vidheḥ eva vyāpāra viśeṣaḥ iti tat eva asya udāharaṇam agnihotram juhyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti

original: kvacid ekasminn eva vākye rūpacatuṣṭayaṃ vidher avagamyate na tatra pṛthag udāharaṇam apekṣyate /
analyzed: kvacid ekasmin eva vākye rūpa catuṣṭayam vidheḥ avagamyate na tatra pṛthak udāharaṇam apekṣyate

original: yathā [etasyaiva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā paśukāmo hy etena yajeta] iti //
analyzed: yathā etasya eva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā paśu kāmaḥ hi etena yajeta iti

original: anyāny api niyogasya rūpāṇi vyāpārabhedād avagamyate /
analyzed: anyāni api niyogasya rūpāṇi vyāpāra bhedāt avagamyate

original: sa hi bhāvārthasiddhyarthaṃ tatsamartham artham ākṣipatīti tatprayojaka  ucyate/
analyzed: sa hi bhāva artha siddhi artham tad samartham artham ākṣipati iti tad prayojakaḥ ucyate

original: yathā māṇavakasthasyādhyayanasyācāryakaraṇavidhiḥ //
analyzed: yathā māṇavaka sthasya adhyayanasya ācārya karaṇa vidhiḥ

original: kvacid anyākṣipte vastuni labdhe sati tatrāprayojako vidhir bhavati yathā krayaniyuktaikahāyinyā lābhe sati na pādapāṃsugrahaṇārthaṃ anyām ekahāyanīm ākṣipati vidhir iti prakaraṇapaṭhitapadārthapaṭalaparigrahāc ca grāhaka iti vidhir ucyate //
