analyzed: kvacid anya ākṣipte vastuni labdhe sati tatra aprayojakaḥ vidhiḥ bhavati yathā kraya niyukta eka hāyinyāḥ lābhe sati na pāda pāṃsu grahaṇa artham anyām ekahāyanīm ākṣipati vidhiḥ iti prakaraṇa paṭhita padārtha paṭala parigrahāt ca grāhakaḥ iti vidhiḥ ucyate

original: kvacit prakaraṇapaṭhitasyāpi tenāgṛhītasya dvādaśopasadādeḥ prakaraṇād utkarṣadarśanāt ata eva niyogagarbho viniyoga ity ācakṣate //
analyzed: kvacid prakaraṇa paṭhitasya api tena agṛhītasya dvādaśa upasad ādeḥ prakaraṇāt utkarṣa darśanāt atas eva niyoga garbhaḥ viniyogaḥ iti ācakṣate

original: kvacid viniyojakaśrutyādipramāṇavirahe 'pi paśvekatvādyupādānaṃ śeṣīkuruvann upādāyaka ity ucyate /
analyzed: kvacid viniyojaka śruti ādi pramāṇa virahe pi paśu ekatva ādi upādānam śeṣīkuruvan upādāyakaḥ iti ucyate

original: [paśunā yajeta] iti vibhaktyā hi prātipadikārtho viniyuktaḥ/
analyzed: paśunā yajeta iti vibhaktyā hi prātipadika arthaḥ viniyuktaḥ

original: tatsthaṃ tv ekatvam eva na viniyuktaṃ [ekena] ity aśravaṇāt paśur upādīyamāno na saṃkhyārahita upādātuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: tad stham tu eka tvam eva na viniyuktam ekena iti aśravaṇāt paśuḥ upādīyamānaḥ na saṃkhyā rahitaḥ upādātum śakyate

original: śrutasaṃkhyāparityāgakāraṇābhāvāc ca ekatvaviśiṣṭaḥ paśur upādīyata ity upādānata śeṣīkṛtam ekatvam //
analyzed: śruta saṃkhyā parityāga kāraṇa abhāvāt ca eka tva viśiṣṭaḥ paśuḥ upādīyate iti śeṣīkṛtam eka tvam

original: vaikṛtas tu sauryādividhiḥ prākṛtam itikartavyatājātam ākarṣaś codaka ity ucyate /
analyzed: vaikṛtaḥ tu saurya ādi vidhiḥ prākṛtam itikartavya tā jātam ākarṣaḥ ca udakaḥ iti ucyate

original: tad idam ekasyaiva bhagavato liṅarthasya prayoktṛśaktikhacitātmanaḥ pracuravyāpāravaicitryam upadarśitam iti alam anayā mahāmatimānasavatyā mīmāṃsārthakathayā/
analyzed: tat idam ekasya eva bhagavataḥ liṅ arthasya prayoktṛ śakti khacita ātmanaḥ pracura vyāpāra vaicitryam upadarśitam iti alam anayā mahā mati mānasavatyā mīmāṃsā artha kathayā

original: so 'yam īdṛśo niyogo vākyārthaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ yam īdṛśaḥ niyogaḥ vākya arthaḥ

original: tasya dvādaśalakṣaṇyāṃ tat tad rūpaṃ prakāśitam /
analyzed: tasya dvādaśalakṣaṇyām tat tat rūpam prakāśitam

original: tan neha likhyate 'smābhiḥ granthagauravabhīrubhiḥ //
analyzed: tat na iha likhyate smābhiḥ grantha gaurava bhīrubhiḥ

original: diṅmātraṃ tv etad ākhyāyi niyogasya yathāgamam /
analyzed: diś mātram tu etat ākhyāyi niyogasya yathāgamam

original: amuṣmann api vākyārthe vivadante manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: amuṣman api vākya arthe vivadante manīṣiṇaḥ

original: liṅāder avagamyamānaḥ kāryarūpaḥ preraṇātmā ca vākyārtho niyoga ity uktam /
analyzed: liṅ ādeḥ avagamyamānaḥ kārya rūpaḥ preraṇa ātmā ca vākya arthaḥ niyogaḥ iti uktam

original: na cāsav evaṃrūpo 'pi paridṛśyamānabhāvārthādivyatirikto 'vagamyate //
analyzed: na ca asau evaṃrūpaḥ pi paridṛśyamāna bhāva artha ādi vyatiriktaḥ avagamyate

original: kriyaiva tāvad kāryātmā preraṇātmā phalārthitā /
analyzed: kriyā eva tāvat kārya ātmā preraṇa ātmā phala arthi tā

original: pratīyate tato 'nyas tu niyogo nobhayātmakaḥ //
analyzed: pratīyate tatas nyaḥ tu niyogaḥ na ubhaya ātmakaḥ

original: nanu anya eva kriyākartṛsaṃbandhāt praiṣapraiṣyasambandho hi darśitaḥ /
analyzed: nanu anyaḥ eva kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhāt praiṣa praiṣya sambandhaḥ hi darśitaḥ

original: na yukto 'sau //
analyzed: na yuktaḥ sau

original: kuryād ityādiśabdebhyaḥ kriyādivyatirekiṇaḥ /
analyzed: kuryāt ityādi śabdebhyaḥ kriyā ādi vyatirekiṇaḥ

original: nārthāntarasya saṃvittiḥ kasyacit preraṇātmaṇaḥ //
analyzed: na artha antarasya saṃvittiḥ kasyacid preraṇa ātmaṇaḥ

original: kim idānīṃ [karoti] [kuryāt] ityādi ca tulye ete pratipattī /
analyzed: kim idānīm karoti kuryāt ityādi ca tulye ete pratipattī

original: abhinavam idaṃ śabdajñatvam āyuṣmataḥ/
analyzed: abhinavam idam śabda jña tvam āyuṣmataḥ

original: na brūmo na bhinne ete pratipattī iti /
analyzed: na brūmaḥ na bhinne ete pratipattī iti

original: [karoti] iti pravṛttakriya ucyate vartamānakālāvacchinnaś ca /
analyzed: karoti iti pravṛtta kriyaḥ ucyate vartamāna kāla avacchinnaḥ ca

original: kiṃ tv asau praiṣaḥ tato 'vagamyamāno 'pi prerako na bhavati na ca kārya iti brūmaḥ //
analyzed: kim tu asau praiṣaḥ prerakaḥ na bhavati na ca kāryaḥ iti brūmaḥ

original: nanu prerakatvenaivāvagamyamānaḥ kathaṃ prerako na bhavet/
analyzed: nanu preraka tvena eva avagamyamānaḥ katham prerakaḥ na bhavet

original: etad evāsya praiṣatvam yat prerakatvam/
analyzed: etat eva asya praiṣa tvam yat preraka tvam

original: satyam/
analyzed: satyam

original: prerakatvenaivāsau gamyate /
analyzed: preraka tvena eva asau gamyate

original: na tv asau tahtā bhavati/
analyzed: na tu asau tahtā bhavati

original: vyavahāramātram etat [rājājñayā karomi] iti /
analyzed: vyavahāra mātram etat rāja ājñayā karomi iti

original: kāryatvam apy asya prakriyāmātraṃ [rājājñāṃ karomi] iti //
analyzed: kārya tvam api asya prakriyā mātram rāja ājñām karomi iti

original: ājñā hi nāma naivānyā saṃpādyatvena gamyate /
analyzed: ājñā hi nāma na eva anyā saṃpādya tvena gamyate

original: nānuṣṭhātur iyaṃ buddhiḥ ājñā saṃpādyatām iti //
analyzed: na anuṣṭhātuḥ iyam buddhiḥ ājñā saṃpādyatām iti

original: evaṃ hi yasya kasyāpi pravarteta sa ājñayā /
analyzed: evam hi yasya kasya api pravarteta saḥ ājñayā

original: na ceha vālonmattādivacanāt phalavarjitāt //
analyzed: na ca iha vāla unmatta ādi vacanāt phala varjitāt

original: saty api preraṇājñāne pravartante sacetasaḥ /
analyzed: sati api preraṇā jñāne pravartante sa cetasaḥ

original: bhayaṃ nāśaṅkyate yasmāt phalaṃ vāpi samīhitam //
analyzed: bhayam nā āśaṅkyate yasmāt phalam vā api samīhitam

original: tathāvidhasya rājño 'pi nājñā 'nuṣṭhīyate janaiḥ /
analyzed: tathāvidhasya rājñaḥ pi nā ājñā nuṣṭhīyate janaiḥ

original: vartamānāpadeśe 'pi phalaṃ yatrāvagamyate //
analyzed: vartamāna apadeśe pi phalam yatra avagamyate

original: tatra pravartate lokaḥ liṅādiṣv aśruteṣv api /
analyzed: tatra pravartate lokaḥ liṅ ādiṣu a śruteṣu api

original: bhavaty ārogyasaṃpattiḥ bhuṃjānasya harītakīm //
analyzed: bhavati ārogya saṃpattiḥ bhuṃjānasya harītakīm

original: tatkāmo bhakṣayec ceti ko viśeṣaḥ pravartane /
analyzed: tad kāmaḥ bhakṣayet ca iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ pravartane

original: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tad evam anumanyate /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām tat evam anumanyate

original: prerakatvaṃ phalasyaiva na niyogātmanaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: preraka tvam phalasya eva na niyoga ātmanaḥ punar

original: tatraitat syāt loke bhavatu phalārthitvāt pravartanaṃ ārir ādhayiṣate prerakātiśayānuvartane vā tasya pāraṃparyeṇa phalahetutvāt /
analyzed: tatra etat syāt loke bhavatu phala arthi tvāt pravartanam āriḥ preraka atiśaya anuvartane vā tasya pāraṃparyeṇa phala hetu tvāt

original: vede tv vaktur abhāvāt preraṇāvagamād eva pravṛttiḥ //
analyzed: vede tu vaktuḥ abhāvāt preraṇa avagamāt eva pravṛttiḥ

original: unmattavākyād api liṅādiyuktāt na preraṇāvagamo nāsti /
analyzed: unmatta vākyāt api liṅ ādi yuktāt na preraṇa avagamaḥ na asti

original: bhavann api doṣadarśanāt upekṣyate unmatta evaṃ pralapatīti /
analyzed: bhavan api doṣa darśanāt upekṣyate unmattaḥ evam pralapati iti

original: vede punaḥ [yajeta] ity atra preraṇāvagamāt parityāgakāraṇābhāvāt tata eva pravartanam/
analyzed: vede punar yajeta iti atra preraṇā avagamāt parityāga kāraṇa abhāvāt tatas eva pravartanam

original: pravartanābhāve 'pi na vedasyāprāmāṇyam pramāṇavyāpārasya tena nirvartitatvād ity uktam //
analyzed: pravartana abhāve na vedasya aprāmāṇyam pramāṇa vyāpārasya tena nirvartita tvāt iti uktam

original: ucyate vede 'pi vaktā 'sti /
analyzed: ucyate vede pi vaktā sti

original: tadāśayavaśena tatrāpi phalārthināṃ pravartanam iti saṃbhavad apīdam uttaraṃ nācakṣmahe kathāntaraprasaṅgāt/
analyzed: tad āśaya vaśena tatra api phala arthinām pravartanam iti saṃbhavat api idam uttaram nā ācakṣmahe kathā antara prasaṅgāt

original: kin tv idaṃ brūmaḥ preṣaṇāvagamād eva pravṛttisiddhau svargakāmapadaṃ  bādarivad anyathāvyākhyāyatām /
analyzed: kin tu idam brūmaḥ preṣaṇa avagamāt eva pravṛtti siddhau svarga kāma padam bādari vat anyathā vyākhyāyatām

original: adhikārānubandhābhidhāne puruṣaviśeṣaṇamātram etat bhavatu kiṃ svargasādhyakatvakalpanayā /
analyzed: adhikāra anubandha abhidhāne puruṣa viśeṣaṇa mātram etat bhavatu kim svarga sādhyaka tva kalpanayā

original: viśeṣaṇatvam evānyathā na nirvahatīti cet āyātaṃ tarhi phalasya sādhyatvam /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa tvam eva anyathā na nirvahati iti ced āyātam tarhi phalasya sādhya tvam

original: tac cet sādhyatvenāvagamyate tasyaiva sāmarthyasiddokānuguṇam avyabhicāri ca pravartakatvam utsṛjya na preraṇāvagamasya tad vaktum arhasīti //
analyzed: tat ced sādhya tvena avagamyate tasya eva avyabhicāri ca pravartaka tvam utsṛjya na preraṇa avagamasya tat vaktum arhasi iti

original: niyogād atha niṣpattiḥ phalasyety abhidhīyate /
analyzed: niyogāt atha niṣpattiḥ phalasya iti abhidhīyate

original: phalaṃ praty aṅgabhūtatvāt avākyārthatvam āpateta /
analyzed: phalam prati aṅga bhūta tvāt a vākya artha tvam āpateta

original: nanu vidhyartho na bhāvārthavat phale karaṇaṃ yenāsya tadaṅgatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: nanu vidhi arthaḥ na bhāva arthavat phale karaṇam yena asya tad aṅga tvam syāt

original: ākṣepikatvāt tu tasya phalārthatvam ucyate /
analyzed: ākṣepika tvāt tu tasya phala artha tvam ucyate

original: prayoktṛtvaṃ hi tasya nijaṃ rūpam yady evaṃ bhāvārtha eva sādhyo bhavatu /
analyzed: prayoktṛ tvam hi tasya nijam rūpam yadi evam bhāva arthaḥ eva sādhyaḥ bhavatu

original: vidhyarthasya tu kim anuṣṭheyatvam ucyate /
analyzed: vidhi arthasya tu kim anuṣṭheya tvam ucyate

original: so 'pi bhāvārthasiddhyā saṃpadyate [kṛto mayā svāminiyogaḥ] iti vyavahārād iti vyavahārād iti cet bhāvārthāt tarhi niṣpattiḥ niyogasya phalasya ca /
analyzed: saḥ u pi bhāva artha siddhyā saṃpadyate kṛtaḥ mayā svāmi niyogaḥ iti vyavahārāt iti vyavahārāt iti ced bhāva arthāt tarhi niṣpattiḥ niyogasya phalasya ca

original: ity ekatra padagrāme vākyārthadvayam āpatet //
analyzed: iti ekatra pada grāme vākya artha dvayam āpatet

original: kiṃ cānvitābhidhānena viṣayatvāvadhāraṇāt /
analyzed: kim ca anvita abhidhānena viṣaya tva avadhāraṇāt

original: niyogasyaiva bhāvārthaniṣpādyatvaṃ pratīyate //
analyzed: niyogasya eva bhāva artha niṣpādya tvam pratīyate

original: sa tu bhāvārthataḥ siddhaḥ phalāya yadi kalpyate /
analyzed: sa tu bhāva arthataḥ siddhaḥ phalāya yadi kalpyate

original: parārthatvād avākyārtho bhaved ity upavarṇitam //
analyzed: parārtha tvāt a vākya arthaḥ bhavet iti upavarṇitam

original: bhāvārthas tu dvayaṃ kuryāt yugapad vā krameṇa vā /
analyzed: bhāva arthaḥ tu dvayam kuryāt yugapad vā krameṇa vā

original: yugapan nāsya sāmartyaṃ samatvaṃ ca dvayor bhavet //
analyzed: yugapad na asya sāmartyam sama tvam ca dvayoḥ bhavet

original: niyogaś ca śabdaikagocaratvāt mā darśi phalaṃ tu svargapaśvādi tena saha niśpadyamānaṃ kim iti na gṛhyate /
analyzed: niyogaḥ ca śabda eka gocara tvāt mā darśi phalam tu svarga paśu ādi tena saha niśpadyamānam kim iti na gṛhyate

original: kramapakṣe pūrvaṃ vā niyogaḥ paścāt phalam pūrvaṃ vā phalaṃ paścād vā viniyogaḥ siddhyed iti /
analyzed: krama pakṣe pūrvam vā niyogaḥ paścāt phalam pūrvam vā phalam paścāt vā viniyogaḥ siddhyet iti

original: yadi pūrvaṃ niyogaḥ tadā niyogasyāsaṃpādyatvāt tadviṣayalipsāyā anupapatteḥ karaṇāṃśe 'pi vaidhī pravṛttis syāt //
analyzed: yadi pūrvam niyogaḥ tadā niyogasya asaṃpādya tvāt tad viṣaya lipsāyāḥ anupapatteḥ karaṇa aṃśe pi pravṛttiḥ syāt

original: yathā niyoganiṣpattiḥ prayājādikṛtena tu /
analyzed: yathā niyoga niṣpattiḥ prayāja ādi kṛtena tu

original: tataḥ pravṛttiḥ śāstrīyā bhāvārthe 'pi tathā bhavet //
analyzed: tatas pravṛttiḥ śāstrīyā bhāva arthe tathā bhavet

original: iṣyate eveti cet nanv evaṃ tasya lipsārthalakṣaṇety abhyadhāyi yat /
analyzed: iṣyate eva iti ced nanu evam tasya lipsā artha lakṣaṇā iti abhyadhāyi yat

original: śyenādīnām adharmatvaṃ varṇitaṃ tad viruddhyate //
analyzed: śyena ādīnām adharma tvam varṇitam tat viruddhyate

original: atha pūrvaṃ phalasiddhiḥ tato niyogasiddhiḥ tarhi phalasya tadānīṃ darśanaṃ bhavet siddhatvāt //
analyzed: atha pūrvam phala siddhiḥ tatas niyoga siddhiḥ tarhi phalasya tadānīm darśanam bhavet siddha tvāt

original: na ca bhāvārthavelāyāṃ putrapaśvādi dṛśyate /
analyzed: na ca bhāva artha velāyām putra paśu ādi dṛśyate

original: adṛśyamānam apy etat siddhavimativismayaḥ //
analyzed: adṛśyamānam api etat siddha vimati vismayaḥ

original: ataś ca kaiścid uccate svargasiddhim avāntaravyāpārīkṛtya niyogam eva bhāvārthaḥ saṃpādayatīti tad apy apāstam /
analyzed: atas ca kaiścid uccate svarga siddhim avāntara vyāpārīkṛtya niyogam eva bhāva arthaḥ saṃpādayati iti tat api apāstam

original: avāntaravyāpārasya jvalanāder iva pradhānavyāpārāt pūrvaṃ darśanaprasaṅgād iti //
analyzed: avāntara vyāpārasya jvalana ādeḥ iva pradhāna vyāpārāt pūrvam darśana prasaṅgāt iti

original: athocyate svargakāmasya svargaṃ sādhayitum udyacchato yāge niyogaḥ yaḥ saṃpādya śrūyate sa cet saṃpannaḥ śabdavṛttena phalam api saṃpannam eva /
analyzed: atha ucyate svarga kāmasya svargam sādhayitum udyacchataḥ yāge niyogaḥ yaḥ saṃpādya śrūyate sa ced saṃpannaḥ śabda vṛttena phalam api saṃpannam eva

original: ānubhāvikī tu svargādisiddhiḥ kālāntare bhaviṣyatīti etad ayuktam siddhidvayānupalaṃbhāt /
analyzed: ānubhāvikī tu svarga ādi siddhiḥ kāla antare bhaviṣyati iti etat ayuktam siddhi dvaya anupalaṃbhāt

original: na hy ekā śābdī siddhiḥ anyā cānubhāvikī phalasiddhiḥ kutastyeti cintyam //
analyzed: na hi ekā śābdī siddhiḥ anyā ca ānubhāvikī phala siddhiḥ kutastyā iti cintyam

original: kālāntare ca bhāvārthaḥ kṣaṇikatvān na vidyate /
analyzed: kāla antare ca bhāva arthaḥ kṣaṇika tvāt na vidyate

original: śaktyādirūpaṃ cāpūrvaṃ na bhavadbhir upeyate //
analyzed: śakti ādi rūpam ca apūrvam na bhavadbhiḥ upeyate

original: bhavanto hy apūrvaśabdena dharmaśabdena ca niyogam evopacaranti /
analyzed: bhavantaḥ hi apūrva śabdena dharma śabdena ca niyogam eva upacaranti

original: na ca niyogaḥ śaktivat ātmasaṃskāravad vā kālāntarasthāyī bhavatī /
analyzed: na ca niyogaḥ śakti vat ātma saṃskāra vat vā kāla antara sthāyī bhavatī

original: sa hi preraṇātmakaḥ kāryarūpo vā nobhayathāpi sthairyam avalambhate //
analyzed: sa hi preraṇa ātmakaḥ kārya rūpaḥ vā na ubhayathā api sthairyam avalambhate

original: tatraitat syāt niyogasiddhiḥ ākṣiptaphalasiddhir bhavati /
analyzed: tatra etat syāt niyoga siddhiḥ ākṣipta phala siddhiḥ bhavati

original: viṣayādyanubandhāvacchinno hy asāv evānuṣṭheyaḥ /
analyzed: viṣaya ādi anubandha avacchinnaḥ hi asau eva anuṣṭheyaḥ

original: tatra yathā tena tena kārakacakreṇa kriyākalāpena vinā saṃpattim alabhamānaḥ tat tad ākṣipati tathādhikārānubandhavandhyo 'pi nāsau saṃpattim adhigacchatīti tam apy ākṣipati /
analyzed: tatra yathā tena tena kāraka cakreṇa kriyā kalāpena vinā saṃpattim alabhamānaḥ tat tat ākṣipati tathā adhikāra anubandha vandhyaḥ na asau saṃpattim adhigacchati iti tam api ākṣipati

original: yaś cāyam adhikārānubandhākṣepaḥ sa evāyaṃ phalākṣepeṇa tu vidheḥ phalākṣepitety uktam /
analyzed: yaḥ ca ayam adhikāra anubandha ākṣepaḥ saḥ eva ayam phala ākṣepeṇa tu vidheḥ phala ākṣepitā iti uktam

original: etad ayuktam yo hi yena dinā[vinā?] kāmaṃ na siddhyet sa tam ākṣipet /
analyzed: etat ayuktam yaḥ hi yena dināvinā kāmam na siddhyet sa tam ākṣipet

original: niyojyamātreākṣepe tu niyogo na phalātmakaḥ //
analyzed: niyojya mātra ākṣepe tu niyogaḥ na phala ātmakaḥ

original: niyojyaḥ caṇḍālasparśaneneva svargakāmanotpādamātreṇa niyojyatāṃ pratipanna iti kathaṃ niyojyākṣepa eva phalākṣepaḥ /
analyzed: niyojyaḥ caṇḍāla sparśanena iva svarga kāmanā utpāda mātreṇa niyojya tām pratipannaḥ iti katham niyojya ākṣepaḥ eva phala ākṣepaḥ

original: nanu ca svargakāmo 'tra niyojyo nānyathā bhavet /
analyzed: nanu ca svarga kāmaḥ tra niyojyaḥ na anyathā bhavet

original: yadi svargasya saṃpattiṃ nādhigacchet svakarmaṇaḥ //
analyzed: yadi svargasya saṃpattim na adhigacchet sva karmaṇaḥ

original: naitad evam narecchāmātram evedaṃ na śabdas tv iyati kṣamaḥ /
analyzed: na etat evam nara icchā mātram evā idam na śabdaḥ tu iyati kṣamaḥ

original: niyojyaḥ svargakāmo hi bhavej jīvanavān iva //
analyzed: niyojyaḥ svarga kāmaḥ hi bhavet jīvanavān iva

original: nanu loke kāmyamānasya sādhyatvaṃ dṛṣṭam [harītakīṃ bhakṣayed ārogyakāmaḥ] iti /
analyzed: nanu loke kāmyamānasya sādhya tvam dṛṣṭam harītakīm bhakṣayet ārogya kāmaḥ iti

original: tena vede 'pi [yajeta svargakāmaḥ] iti svargasya sādhyatvam avabhotsyāmahe /
analyzed: tena vede pi yajeta svarga kāmaḥ iti svargasya sādhya tvam avabhotsyāmahe

original: sādho loke 'pi katham etad avagatam āyuṣmatā niyojyasamarpakapadavācyaparyālocanena vidhivṛttaparīkṣayā vā /
analyzed: sādho loke katham etat avagatam āyuṣmatā niyojya samarpaka pada vācya paryālocanena vidhi vṛtta parīkṣayā vā

original: padārthas tāvad etāvān evaṃ cāto hy asāv iti /
analyzed: padārthaḥ tāvat etāvān evam ca atas hi asau iti

original: idaṃ tu siddhyaty etasmād iti tasya na gocaraḥ //
analyzed: idam tu siddhi ati etasmāt iti tasya na gocaraḥ

original: vidher eṣa svabhāvaś cet āyuṣman sādhu budhyase /
analyzed: vidheḥ eṣa svabhāvaḥ ced āyuṣman sādhu budhyase

original: bhāṭṭaiḥ kim aparāddhaṃ te nitye 'pi phalavādibhiḥ //
analyzed: bhāṭṭaiḥ kim aparāddham te nitye pi phala vādibhiḥ

original: adhikāryanupādeyaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣitaḥ /
analyzed: adhikārī anupādeya viśeṣaṇa viśeṣitaḥ

original: jīvan vā svargakāmo 'pitsamānaḥ kāmyanityayoḥ //
analyzed: jīvan vā svarga kāmaḥ u pitsamānaḥ kāmya nityayoḥ

original: vidhivīryaprabhavas tu dvayor api tathāvidhaḥ /
analyzed: vidhi vīrya prabhavaḥ tu dvayoḥ api tathāvidhaḥ

original: sapratyayaprerakatāṃ vidhir nopaiti niṣphalaḥ //
analyzed: sa pratyaya preraka tām vidhiḥ nā upaiti niṣphalaḥ

original: nanu kāmanādhikāre svargaḥ śrūyate nityādhikāre tv asau na śrūyate /
analyzed: nanu kāmanā adhikāre svargaḥ śrūyate nitya adhikāre tu asau na śrūyate

original: āśryamāṇaḥ kasyānurodhena kalpyate vidher eveti brūhaḥ /
analyzed: āśryamāṇaḥ kasya anurodhena kalpyate vidheḥ eva iti

original: svargeṇa śrutenāpi kiṃ kariṣyati yady asau vidhinā nāpekṣyata [ghṛtakulyā asya bhavanti] ityādivat aśruto 'pi cāsau vidhinā [kṛṣyata eva tasmāt vidhir evātra pramāṇaṃ na śravaṇāśravaṇe iti kāmyavan nitye 'pi phalam abhyupagantavyam na vā kvacid apīti //
analyzed: svargeṇa śrutena api kim kariṣyati yadi asau vidhinā ghṛta kulyāḥ asya bhavanti ityādi vat ca asau vidhinā kṛṣyate eva tasmāt vidhiḥ eva atra pramāṇam na śravaṇa aśravaṇe iti kāmya vat nitye pi phalam abhyupagantavyam na vā kvacid api iti

original: pratiṣedhādhikāre 'pi vidhivṛttaparīkṣayā /
analyzed: pratiṣedha adhikāre vidhi vṛtta parīkṣayā

original: evaṃ narakapātādiphalayogo na durbhaṇaḥ //
analyzed: evam naraka pāta ādi phala yogaḥ na durbhaṇaḥ

original: yena hi durviṣahakleṣakaluṣitamanasā brāhmaṇahananaṃ sukhasādhanam iti kartavyam iti gṛhītam nirargalarāgarasikena surāpānaṃ sukhasādhanam iti gṛhītam sa tato vidhinā vāryate yadi tad sukhasādhanam iti jñāpyate /
analyzed: yena hi durviṣaha kleṣa kaluṣita manasā brāhmaṇa hananam sukha sādhanam iti kartavyam iti gṛhītam nirargala rāga rasikena surā pānam sukha sādhanam iti gṛhītam sa tatas vidhinā vāryate yadi tat sukha sādhanam iti jñāpyate

original: tasmān nityeṣu pratyavāyaparihāra iva upāttaduritakṣava iva vā pratiṣidhyamāneṣu karmasu narakapātaḥ phalam ity abhyupagamanīyam /
analyzed: tasmāt nityeṣu pratyavāya parihāraḥ iva upātta durita kṣavaḥ iva vā pratiṣidhyamāneṣu karmasu naraka pātaḥ phalam iti abhyupagamanīyam

original: itarathā hy arthānarthaviveko na siddhyati /
analyzed: itarathā hi artha anartha vivekaḥ na siddhi ati

original: evaṃ ca brahmahatyāder api naivāsty adharmatā /
analyzed: evam ca brahmahatyā ādeḥ api nā evā asti adharma tā

original: kiṃ punaḥ śyenavajrāder ity arthagrahaṇaṃ vṛthā //
analyzed: kim punar śyena vajra ādeḥ iti artha grahaṇam vṛthā

original: karaṇāṃśe 'pi lipsātaḥ pravṛttir yady upeyate /
analyzed: karaṇa aṃśe pi lipsātaḥ pravṛttiḥ yadi upeyate

original: itikartavyatāṃśe tu śāstrād yadi tad apy asat //
analyzed: itikartavya tā aṃśe tu śāstrāt yadi tat api asat

original: na hi tatkaraṇaṃ śuddhaṃ svaphalāyopakalpate /
analyzed: na hi tat karaṇam śuddham sva phalāya upakalpate

original: setikartavyatākaṃ hi karaṇaṃ karaṇaṃ viduḥ //
analyzed: sa itikartavya tākam hi karaṇam karaṇam viduḥ

original: avāntaravibhāga evaiṣaḥ karaṇetikartavyatālakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: avāntaravibhāgaḥ eva eṣaḥ karaṇa itikartavya tā lakṣaṇaḥ

original: sakalāṅgo bṛṃhitasvarūpas tu bhāvārthaḥ kāmyamānopāyatāṃ pratipadyate naikenāpy aṃśena nyūnaḥ /
analyzed: sakala aṅgaḥ bṛṃhita svarūpaḥ tu bhāvārthaḥ kāmyamāna upāya tām pratipadyate na ekena api aṃśena nyūnaḥ

original: ata eva kāmyānāṃ karmānāṃ sarvāṅgopasaṃhāreṇa prayogam icchanti /
analyzed: atas eva kāmyānām karmānām sarva aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa prayogam icchanti

original: tasmāt karaṇavad itikartavyatāyām api lipsāta eva pravṛttiḥ syāt //
analyzed: tasmāt karaṇa vat itikartavya tāyām api lipsātaḥ eva pravṛttiḥ syāt

original: ubhayatrāpi lipsātaḥ sati caivaṃ pravartane /
analyzed: ubhayatra api lipsātaḥ sati ca evam pravartane

original: agnīṣomīyahiṃsādeḥ śyenādivad adharmatā //
analyzed: agnīṣomīya hiṃsā ādeḥ śyena ādi vat adharma tā

original: yad apy uktaṃ kāmādhikāreṣu kāmyamānabhāvārthayor upāyopeyabhāvamātrapratipādanaparyavasito vidhivyāpāra iti tad api na samyak /
analyzed: yat api uktam kāma adhikāreṣu kāmyamāna bhāva arthayoḥ upāya upeya bhāva mātra pratipādana paryavasitaḥ vidhi vyāpāraḥ iti tat api na samyak

original: vidhipuruṣayor hi preryaprerakabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: vidhi puruṣayoḥ hi prerya preraka bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ

original: tatra yāgādayo viṣayatvena pratīyante neṣyamāṇopāyatvena /
analyzed: tatra yāga ādayaḥ viṣaya tvena pratīyante na iṣyamāṇa upāya tvena

original: sādhyasādhanamātrapratipādanaparyavasitavyāpāras tu vidhiḥ viniyogapara eva syāt /
analyzed: sādhya sādhana mātra pratipādana paryavasita vyāpāraḥ tu vidhiḥ viniyoga paraḥ eva syāt

original: tataś cāpravṛttapravartakaṃ nāma nijaṃ rūpaṃ jahyāt //
analyzed: tatas ca apravṛttapravartakam nāma nijam rūpam jahyāt

original: vidheś caturavasthatvaṃ phalataḥ kila kathyate /
analyzed: vidheḥ catur avastha tvam phalataḥ kila kathyate

original: prerakatvaṃ ca tadrūpaṃ sarvāvasthānugāmi yat //
analyzed: preraka tvam ca tad rūpam sarva avasthā anugāmi yat

original: kāryātmatā 'pi vidhyarthe preraṇājñaptipūrvikā /
analyzed: kārya ātma tā pi vidhi arthe preraṇa ājñapti pūrvikā

original: preryeṇaiva satā puṃsā tatkāryam avadhāryate //
analyzed: preryeṇa eva satā puṃsā tat kāryam avadhāryate

original: liṅgādiśrutitaś cādau preraṇaiva pratīyate /
analyzed: liṅga ādi śrutitaḥ ca ādau preraṇā eva pratīyate

original: sādhyasādhanasaṃbandhabuddhis tadbuddhipūrvikā //
analyzed: sādhya sādhana saṃbandha buddhiḥ tad buddhi pūrvikā

original: nanv evaṃ kāmyaṣu vidhitaḥ pravṛttāv iṣyamāṇāyāṃ apravartamānaḥ pratyaveyāt vidhyatikramāt /
analyzed: nanu evam kāmyaṣu vidhitaḥ pravṛttau iṣyamāṇāyām apravartamānaḥ pratyaveyāt vidhi atikramāt

original: maivam svargaṃ siṣādhayiṣoḥ tatrādhikārāt /
analyzed: mā evam svargam siṣādhayiṣoḥ tatra adhikārāt

original: anyas tv anadhikṛta eva kṣatriyādir iva vaiśyastome /
analyzed: anyaḥ tu an adhikṛtaḥ eva kṣatriya ādiḥ iva vaiśyastome

original: nāsāv akurvan pratyavāyam arhati /
analyzed: na asau a kurvan pratyavāyam arhati

original: svargārthī tu vidhitaḥ pravartata eva /
analyzed: svarga arthī tu vidhitaḥ pravartate eva

original: lipsayā tu karaṇāṃśe pravṛttir iṣyamāṇā kratvartham itikartavyatāṃśam api maivaṃ spṛśet /
analyzed: lipsayā tu karaṇa aṃśe pravṛttiḥ iṣyamāṇā kratu artham itikartavya tā aṃśam api mā evam spṛśet

original: kratūpakārakāmo hi tatra pravartate ity evaṃ sarvatra vidhir utsīded evety alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: kratu upakāra kāmaḥ hi tatra pravartate iti evam sarvatra vidhiḥ utsīdet eva iti alam prasaṅgena

original: api ca pramāṇantarasaṃparkavikale bhavataḥ katham /
analyzed: api ca pramāṇa antara saṃparka vikale bhavataḥ katham

original: niyogātmani vākyārthe vyutpattir vyavahārataḥ /
analyzed: niyoga ātmani vākya arthe vyutpattiḥ vyavahārataḥ

original: nanu uktam ākūtaviśeṣapūrvikāṃ ceṣṭām ātmaniṣṭāṃ dṛṣṭvā paratrāpi tathā 'numānam iti /
analyzed: nanu uktam ākūta viśeṣa pūrvikām ceṣṭām ātma niṣṭām dṛṣṭvā paratra api tathā numānam iti

original: ayuktam idam svātmany api preraṇāvagamanimittābhāvāt /
analyzed: ayuktam idam sva ātmani api preraṇa avagama nimitta abhāvāt

original: na hy atmeva saṃvid iva preraṇāvagamanimittābhāvāt preraṇāsvaprakāśā /
analyzed: na hi atmā iva saṃvid iva preraṇa avagama nimitta abhāvāt preraṇā su aprakāśā

original: preraṇāsaṃvit svaprakāśeti cet tadutpāde tarhi nimittaṃ tāvad mṛgyam /
analyzed: preraṇā saṃvid sva prakāśā iti ced tad utpāde tarhi nimittam tāvat mṛgyam

original: na tāvac chabdaḥ tadānīṃ vyupattyabhāvāt /
analyzed: na tāvat śabdaḥ tadānīm vyupatti abhāvāt

original: svātmani preraṇāvagamapūrvikāṃ hi ceṣṭām upalabdhavataḥ te paratra ceṣṭādarśanāt tadanumānaṃ setsyati /
analyzed: sva ātmani preraṇa avagama pūrvikām hi ceṣṭām upalabdhavataḥ te paratra ceṣṭā darśanāt tad anumānam setsyati

original: tannimittaṃ liṅgādiś śabda iti bhotsyate sa punar vyutpattikāle svātmany eva preraṇāvagamaś cintyo vartate /
analyzed: tad nimittam liṅga ādiḥ śabdaḥ iti bhotsyate sa punar vyutpatti kāle sva ātmani eva preraṇa avagamaḥ cintyaḥ vartate

original: pramāṇāntarāt tu tadavagama iti cet uttiṣṭha asiddhaṃ śabdaikagocaratvam //
analyzed: pramāṇa antarāt tu tad avagamaḥ iti ced uttiṣṭha asiddham śabda eka gocara tvam

original: yā ceyaṃ pūrvāvadhāritasukhasādhanabhāve kapitthādau svātmani pravṛttir upalabdhā tatra prerakatvena phalārthitā nirjñātā nānyā kācit preraṇā /
analyzed: yā ca iyam pūrva avadhārita sukha sādhana bhāve kapittha ādau svātmani pravṛttiḥ upalabdhā tatra preraka tvena phala arthi tā nirjñātā na anyā kācid preraṇā

original: tad uktam [smaraṇād abhilāṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ pravartate] /
analyzed: tat uktam smaraṇāt abhilāṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ pravartate

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: phalaviśayā hīcchā tatra svasaṃvedyā //
analyzed: phala viśayā hi icchā tatra sva saṃvedyā

original: ataś ca prerakajñānaṃ śabdād api parasya yat /
analyzed: atas ca preraka jñānam śabdāt api parasya yat

original: kalpyate kalpyatāṃ tatra prerikā saiva sundarī //
analyzed: kalpyate kalpyatām tatra prerikā sā eva sundarī

original: capetāparihārāya modakaprāptaye 'pi vā /
analyzed: capeta a parihārāya modaka prāptaye vā

original: pravartate vaṭur nāsau juhudhīti niyogataḥ //
analyzed: pravartate vaṭuḥ na asau juhudhi iti niyogataḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhy evam ācaṣṭe [ācāryacodito 'haṃ juhomi] iti /
analyzed: katham tarhi evam ācaṣṭe ācārya coditaḥ haṃ juhomi iti

original: astv ayaṃ vyapadeśa /
analyzed: astu ayam vyapadeśa

original: ācāryacodanā tu na tatra kāraṇam api tu hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthitvam evety ataḥ phalaṃ pravartakaṃ yuktam anubhavasākṣikatvāt //
analyzed: ācārya codanā tu na tatra kāraṇam api tu hita ahita prāpti parihāra arthi tvam eva iti atas phalam pravartakam yuktam anubhava sākṣika tvāt

original: ye 'pi āhuḥ prayoktrāśayasya pravartakatvam yato 'nanuvidheyasya vacanāt na pravartamānaḥ kaścid dṛśyate /
analyzed: ye pi āhuḥ prayoktṛ āśayasya pravartaka tvam yatas nanu vidheyasya vacanāt na pravartamānaḥ kaścid dṛśyate

original: anuvidheyasya puṃsaḥ kiṃcid abruvato 'pi bhrūbhaṅgādinā [śayam avagamya pravartata iti etad apy  ayuktam yataḥ prayoktrāśayānumānena svārthasaṃbhāvanayā lokaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: anuvidheyasya puṃsaḥ kiṃcid abruvataḥ pi bhrū bhaṅga ādinā śayam avagamya pravartate iti etat api ayuktam yatas prayoktṛ āśaya anumānena sva artha saṃbhāvanayā lokaḥ pravartate

original: na punaḥ prayoktaiva prīyatām iti /
analyzed: na punar prayoktā eva prīyatām iti

original: tatprītir api svaprītihetutvenārthyate na tatprītitvena /
analyzed: tad prītiḥ api sva prīti hetu tvena arthyate na tad prīti tvena

original: buddho 'pi hi nāma sakalasattvahitaṃ pratipannaḥ parārthaṃ svaprayojanatayaiva saṃpādayati /
analyzed: buddhaḥ pi hi nāma sakala sattva hitam pratipannaḥ para artham sva prayojana tayā eva saṃpādayati

original: parārthasaṃpādanadvārakaṃ tu tat /
analyzed: para artha saṃpādana dvārakam tu tat

original: tasmāt svaprītir eva pravartikā /
analyzed: tasmāt sva prītiḥ eva pravartikā

original: prayoktrāśayasya ca pravartakatve vedārthaprayoktrāśayānavadhāraṇāt apravṛttir eva prāpnoti /
analyzed: prayoktṛ āśayasya ca pravartaka tve veda artha prayoktṛ āśaya anavadhāraṇāt apravṛttiḥ eva prāpnoti

original: tasmāt phalam eva pravartakam //
analyzed: tasmāt phalam eva pravartakam

original: yat punaḥ phalasya prerakatve dūṣaṇam abhyadhāyi siddhyasiddhavikalpānupapatter iti tad apy ayuktam icchāviṣayīkṛtasya pravartakatvābhyupagamāt /
analyzed: yat punar phalasya preraka tve dūṣaṇam abhyadhāyi siddhi asiddha vikalpa anupapatteḥ iti tat api ayuktam icchā viṣayīkṛtasya pravartaka tva abhyupagamāt

original: asiddhe kathaṃ kāmaneti cet asiddhatvād eva /
analyzed: asiddhe katham kāmanā iti ced asiddha tvāt eva

original: idānīṃ ca tad asiddhaṃ naikāntāsiddhasvarūpam eva khapuṣpavat //
analyzed: idānīm ca tat asiddham na ekānta asiddha svarūpam eva khapuṣpa vat

original: sukhe duḥkhanivṛttau vā puṃsāṃ bhavati kāmanā /
analyzed: sukhe duḥkha nivṛttau vā puṃsām bhavati kāmanā

original: na punar vyomapuṣpādi kaścid kāmayate naraḥ //
analyzed: na punar vyoma puṣpa ādi kaścid kāmayate naraḥ

original: ye 'pi rāgādeḥ pravartakatvam abhyupagatavantaḥ tair api kāmanāviṣayīkṛtaṃ phalam eva pravartakam abhyupagatam /
analyzed: ye pi rāga ādeḥ pravartaka tvam abhyupagatavantaḥ taiḥ api kāmanā viṣayīkṛtam phalam eva pravartakam abhyupagatam

original: icchāviśeṣā eva hi rāgādayaḥ //
analyzed: icchā viśeṣāḥ eva hi rāga ādayaḥ

original: yad api śreyaśādhakatvaṃ pravartakam ucyate tad api na cāru satyām api śreyaśādhanatāyāṃ anarthitvena pravṛttyabhāvāt //
analyzed: yat api śreyaḥ śādhaka tvam pravartakam ucyate tat api na cāru satyām api śreyaḥ śādhana tāyām anarthi tvena pravṛtti abhāvāt

original: nanu arthino 'pi nāniyataviṣayā pravṛttiḥ api tu nirjñātaśreyaśādhanabhāve bhāvārthe /
analyzed: nanu arthinaḥ na aniyata viṣayā pravṛttiḥ api tu nirjñāta śreyaḥ śādhana bhāve bhāva arthe

original: tasmāt tatsādhanatāvagamaḥ pravartakaḥ /
satyam /
analyzed: satyam

original: dvaye saty apīcchaiva pravartikā vaktuṃ yuktā tasyāṃ satyām eva pravṛttidarśanāt /
analyzed: dvaye sati api icchā eva pravartikā vaktum yuktā tasyām satyām eva pravṛtti darśanāt

original: pravṛttir hi nāma prayatnaḥ /
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ hi nāma prayatnaḥ

original: prayatnaś cecchākārya iti kāṇādāḥ /
analyzed: prayatnaḥ ca icchā kāryaḥ iti kāṇādāḥ

original: viṣayaniyame tu śreyaśādhanatvaṃ kāraṇaṃ na pravṛttyutpāde //
analyzed: viṣaya niyame tu śreyaḥ śādhana tvam kāraṇam na pravṛtti utpāde

original: kiṃ ca bhāvanāvagataṃ śreyaśādhanatvaṃ pravartakam iṣyate taiḥ /
analyzed: kim ca bhāvanā avagatam śreyaḥ śādhana tvam pravartakam iṣyate taiḥ

original: tac ca na pṛthag abhidhātuṃ yuktam /
analyzed: tat ca na pṛthak abhidhātum yuktam

original: bhāvanāyāḥ tryaṃśatvena tatsvarūpānugamasamaye etadaṃśayoḥ svargayāgayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvāvagatisiddheḥ /
analyzed: bhāvanāyāḥ tri aṃśa tvena tad svarūpa anugama samaye etad aṃśayoḥ svarga yāgayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāva avagati siddheḥ

original: na cāṃśadvayāvacchinnasya vyāpārasya śreyaśādhanatvaṃ rūpaṃ vaktum ucitam aniṣpannasya tasya tādrūpyābhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca aṃśa dvaya avacchinnasya vyāpārasya śreyaḥ śādhana tvam rūpam vaktum ucitam aniṣpannasya tasya tādrūpya abhāvāt

original: na hy aniṣpanne gavi tadekadeśasāsnādau gotvarūpaṃ sāmānyaṃ niviśate /
analyzed: na hi aniṣpanne gavi tad eka deśa sāsnādau go tva rūpam sāmānyam niviśate

original: na cāṃśatrayapūraṇam antareṇa bhāvanākhyavyāpāraniṣpattir iti //
analyzed: na ca aṃśa traya pūraṇam antareṇa bhāvanā ākhya vyāpāra niṣpattiḥ iti

original: yat tu liṅādeś śabdsya tadvyāpārasya vā prerakatvam ucyate tat prāg eva pratikṣiptam /
analyzed: yat tu liṅ ādeḥ śabdsya tad vyāpārasya vā preraka tvam ucyate tat prāk eva pratikṣiptam

original: vidhir api svamahimnā vā prerakaḥ syāt sādhyasādhanabhāvasaṃbandhāvabodhanena vā /
analyzed: vidhiḥ api sva mahimnā vā prerakaḥ syāt sādhya sādhana bhāva saṃbandha avabodhanena vā

original: svamahimnā prerakatvam asya pūrvam eva nirastam /
analyzed: sva mahimnā preraka tvam asya pūrvam eva nirastam

original: sādhyasādhanabhāvasaṃbandhāvabodhanapuraśare tu tasya prerakatve phalasyaiva pravartakatvam idam anakṣaram abhihitaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: sādhya sādhana bhāva saṃbandha avabodhana puraśare tu tasya preraka tve phalasya eva pravartaka tvam idam anakṣaram abhihitam bhavati

original: yas tv āha prerakatvaṃ cet phalaṃ darśayato vidheḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu āha preraka tvam ced phalam darśayataḥ vidheḥ

original: pratyakṣādisamānatvāt svātantryaṃ tasya hīyate //
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādi samāna tvāt svātantryam tasya hīyate

original: sa vācyaḥ phalaśūnyatve sutarām asvātantratā /
analyzed: sa vācyaḥ phala śūnya tve sutarām asvātantra tā

original: yadriktam arthaṃ mūḍho 'pi na kaścid anutiṣṭhati //
analyzed: yad riktam artham na kaścid anutiṣṭhati

original: ko hi nāma niṣphalam arthaṃ prekṣāvān anutiṣṭet /
analyzed: kaḥ hi nāma niṣphalam artham prekṣāvān anutiṣṭet

original: nanu phale 'pi darśite kecit tatra pravartanta eva /
analyzed: nanu phale pi darśite kecid tatra pravartante eva

original: kiṃ cātaḥ /
analyzed: kim ca atas

original: kāmaṃ mā pravartiṣata /
analyzed: kāmam mā pravartiṣata

original: na hi kārako vidhiḥ api tu jñāpaka ity uktam //
analyzed: na hi kārakaḥ vidhiḥ api tu jñāpakaḥ iti uktam

original: nanu phalam apradarśayann api jñāpayet /
analyzed: nanu phalam a pradarśayan api jñāpayet

original: na jñāpayitum utsahate prekṣāvān hi jñāpyate na ca phalaṃ vinā 'sau tathā jñāpito bhavati ity alaṃ bahubhāṣikayā  phalasyaiveṣyamāṇasya paśyan prerakatām ataḥ /
analyzed: na jñāpayitum utsahate prekṣāvān hi jñāpyate na ca phalam vinā sau tathā jñāpitaḥ bhavati iti alam bahu bhāṣikayā phalasya evā iṣyamāṇasya paśyan preraka tām atas

original: yam artham abhikṛtyeti sūtraṃ vyadhita sūtrakṛt //
analyzed: yam artham abhikṛtya iti sūtram vyadhita sūtrakṛt

original: tasmāt puṃsaḥ pravṛttau prabhavati na vidhiḥ nāpi śabdo liṅgādiḥ vyāpāro 'py etadīyo na hi paṭur abhidhā bhāvanānāmadheyā /
analyzed: tasmāt puṃsaḥ pravṛttau prabhavati na vidhiḥ nā api śabdaḥ liṅga ādiḥ vyāpāraḥ u pi etadīyaḥ na hi paṭuḥ abhidhā bhāvanā nāmadheyā

original: na śreyaśādhanatvaṃ vidhiviṣayagataṃ nāpi rāgādir evaṃ tenākhyat kāmyamānaṃ phalam amalamatiḥ prerakaṃ sūtrakāraḥ //
analyzed: na śreyaḥ śādhana tvam vidhi viṣaya gatam nā api rāga ādiḥ evam tena ākhyat kāmyamānam phalam amala matiḥ prerakam sūtrakāraḥ

original: āha parapakṣān pratikṣipya prerakaṃ kathitaṃ phalam /
analyzed: āha para pakṣān pratikṣipya prerakam kathitam phalam

original: evaṃ paramatadviṣṭaiḥ vākyārthaḥ svayam ucyatām /
analyzed: evam para mata dviṣṭaiḥ vākya arthaḥ svayam ucyatām

original: ucyate [yam artham adhikṛtya puruṣaḥ pravartate tat prayojanam] iti vadatā sūtrakṛtā phalaṃ pravartakam iti pradarśitam /
analyzed: ucyate yam artham adhikṛtya puruṣaḥ pravartate tat prayojanam iti vadatā sūtrakṛtā phalam pravartakam iti pradarśitam

original: [pramāṇena khalv ayaṃ jñātā 'rtham upalabhya tam īpsati jihāsati vā /
analyzed: pramāṇena khalu ayam jñātā rtham upalabhya tam īpsati jihāsati vā

original: tasyepsājihāsāprayuktasya samīhā pravṛttir ucyate sāmarthyaṃ punar asyāḥ phalenābhisaṃbandhaḥ] iti ca bruvāṇo bhāṣyakāro 'pi phalepsāṃ pravartikāṃ prādīdṛśad iti tadīyaṃ saraṇim anusaradbhir asmābhir api tathaiva tat kathitam //
analyzed: tasya īpsā jihāsā prayuktasya samīhā pravṛttiḥ ucyate sāmarthyam punar asyāḥ phalena abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti ca bruvāṇaḥ bhāṣyakāraḥ u pi phala īpsām pravartikām prādīdṛśat iti tadīyam saraṇim anusaradbhiḥ asmābhiḥ api tathā eva tat kathitam

original: vākyārthas tu na kvacid api sūtrakārabhāṣyakārābhyāṃ sūcita iti saḥ śikṣitvā vākyārthasvarūpaṃ vayam ācakṣmahe /
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ tu na kvacid api sūtrakāra bhāṣyakārābhyām sūcitaḥ iti saḥ śikṣitvā vākya artha svarūpam vayam ācakṣmahe

original: kim iti tābhyām asau na sūcitaḥ iti cet pṛtahkprasthānā hīmā vidyāḥ /
analyzed: kim iti tābhyām asau na sūcitaḥ iti ced pṛtahkprasthānāḥ hi imāḥ vidyāḥ

original: pramāṇavidyā ceyam ānvīkṣakī na vākyārthavidyeti //
analyzed: pramāṇa vidyā ca iyam ānvīkṣakī na vākya artha vidyā iti

original: yady evaṃ padārho 'pi kasmād iha darśitaḥ [vyaktyākṛtijātayas tu padārthaḥ] iti sthāne praśnaḥ /
analyzed: yadi evam kasmāt iha darśitaḥ vyakti ākṛti jātayaḥ tu padārthaḥ iti sthāne praśnaḥ

original: sa tu śabdānām arthāsaṃsparśitāṃ vadantaṃ rudantaṃ ca śamayituṃ śabdaprāmāṇyasiddhaye sūtrakṛtā yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ //
analyzed: sa tu śabdānām artha a saṃsparśi tām vadantam rudantam ca śamayitum śabda prāmāṇya siddhaye sūtrakṛtā yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: yady evaṃ vākyārtham api bāhyaṃ vāstavam antareṇa śāstrasya pramāṇatā na pratiṣṭhāṃ labhata iti tatrāpi prayatmaḥ kartavya eva satyam /
analyzed: yadi evam vākya artham api bāhyam vāstavam antareṇa śāstrasya pramāṇa tā na pratiṣṭhām labhate iti tatra api prayatmaḥ kartavyaḥ eva satyam

original: padārthapratipādanayatnenaiva tu kṛtena tatra yatnaṃ kṛtaṃ manyate sūtrakāraḥ yad ayaṃ pṛthak padārthebhyo na vākyārtham upadiśati sma /
analyzed: padārtha pratipādana yatnena eva tu kṛtena tatra yatnam kṛtam manyate sūtrakāraḥ yat ayam pṛthak padārthebhyaḥ na vākya artham upadiśati sma

original: tasmād ayam asyāśayaḥ padārtha eva vākyārthaḥ iti //
analyzed: tasmāt ayam asya āśayaḥ padārthaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ iti

original: tat kim amum eva pakṣaṃ anumodāmahe padārtha eva vākyārtha iti /
analyzed: tat kim amum eva pakṣam anumodāmahe padārthaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ iti

original: bāḍhaṃ brūmaḥ /
analyzed: bāḍham brūmaḥ

original: kiṃ tu naikaḥ padārtho vākyārthaḥ anekas tu padārtho vākyārthaḥ //
analyzed: kim tu na ekaḥ padārthaḥ vākya arthaḥ anekaḥ tu padārthaḥ vākya arthaḥ

original: nanu aneko 'pi bhavan padārtha evāsau /
analyzed: nanu anekaḥ pi bhavan padārthaḥ eva asau

original: na ca padārtho vākyārtho bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: na ca padārthaḥ vākya arthaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: sāmānye hi padaṃ vartate viśeṣe vākyam /
analyzed: sāmānye hi padam vartate viśeṣe vākyam

original: anyac ca sāmānyam anyo viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: anyat ca sāmānyam anyaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: anyatrāpy uktam [yad atrādhikyaṃ sa vākyārthaḥ] iti /
analyzed: anyatra api uktam yat atra ādhikyam sa vākya arthaḥ iti

original: tasmād anyaḥ padārthaḥ anyaś ca vākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt anyaḥ padārthaḥ anyaḥ ca vākya arthaḥ

original: ucyate yad etad uktam asmābhiḥ [anekaḥ padārtho vākyārthaḥ na punar ekaḥ] iti tan na gṛhītam āyuṣmatā //
analyzed: ucyate yat etat uktam asmābhiḥ anekaḥ padārthaḥ vākya arthaḥ na punar ekaḥ iti tat na gṛhītam āyuṣmatā

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati parasparasaṃspṛṣṭapadārthasamudāyo vākyārtha iti saṃsarga evādhika iti [yad atrādhikyaṃ] iti ucyate /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati paraspara saṃspṛṣṭa padārtha samudāyaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti saṃsargaḥ eva adhikaḥ iti yat atra ādhikyam iti ucyate

original: na cānākṣiptaviśeṣatvena saṃsarga upapadyate iti viśeṣo vākyārtha ity ucyate /
analyzed: na ca an ākṣipta viśeṣa tvena saṃsargaḥ upapadyate iti viśeṣaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti ucyate

original: saṃsargas tu svarūpato na vākyārthaḥ apadārthatvāt /
analyzed: saṃsargaḥ tu svarūpataḥ na vākya arthaḥ apadārtha tvāt

original: [gauḥ śukla ānīyatām] iti padagrāme saṃsargavādinaḥ padasyāśravaṇāt /
analyzed: gauḥ śuklaḥ ānīyatām iti pada grāme saṃsarga vādinaḥ padasya aśravaṇāt

original: śravaṇe 'pi sutarām ananvayāt /
analyzed: śravaṇe pi sutarām an anvayāt

original: [gauḥ śukla ānīyatāṃ saṃsargaḥ] iti ko 'syārthaḥ /
analyzed: gauḥ śuklaḥ ānīyatām saṃsargaḥ iti

original: tasmāt saṃsṛṣṭo vākyārthaḥ na saṃsargaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt saṃsṛṣṭaḥ vākya arthaḥ na saṃsargaḥ

original: tad uktaṃ [vyatiṣaktato 'vagater vyatiṣaṅgasya] iti /
analyzed: tat uktam vyatiṣaktataḥ vagateḥ vyatiṣaṅgasya iti

original: na ca tantubhir iva paṭaḥ vīraṇair iva kaṭaḥ tadatirikto ' vayavisthānīyaḥ padārtho nirvartyamāno vākyārtha upalabhyate /
analyzed: na ca tantubhiḥ iva paṭaḥ vīraṇaiḥ iva kaṭaḥ tad atiriktaḥ vayavi sthānīyaḥ padārthaḥ nirvartyamānaḥ vākya arthaḥ upalabhyate

original: jātiguṇakriyāvagame 'pi avayavibuddher abhāvāt /
analyzed: jāti guṇa kriyā avagame pi avayavi buddheḥ abhāvāt

original: na ca padārthāvayavī vākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: na ca padārtha avayavī vākya arthaḥ

original: tena pṛthag vākyārthaṃ nopadiṣṭavān ācāryaḥ //
analyzed: tena pṛthak vākya artham na upadiṣṭavān ācāryaḥ

original: nanu guṇapradhānabhāvam antareṇa na saṃsargo 'vakalpate /
analyzed: nanu guṇa pradhāna bhāvam antareṇa na saṃsargaḥ

original: na caikasmin vākye bahūni pradhānāni bhavanti prādhānyam eva hi tathā sati na syāt /
analyzed: na ca ekasmin vākye bahūni pradhānāni bhavanti prādhānyam eva hi tathā sati na syāt

original: guṇās tu bahavo bhavanti /
analyzed: guṇāḥ tu bahavaḥ bhavanti

original: yad idam anekaguṇoparaktaṃ ekaṃ kiṃcit pradhānaṃ sa vākyārtha iti tadviṣayeyam ekasvabhāvā buddhiḥ /
analyzed: yat idam aneka guṇa uparaktam ekam kiṃcid pradhānam sa vākya arthaḥ iti tad viṣayā iyam eka svabhāvā buddhiḥ

original: satyam /
analyzed: satyam

original: tathāpi ta eva saṃsṛṣṭāḥ padārthā avabhāsante na tadārabdhaḥ kaścid ekaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api te eva saṃsṛṣṭāḥ padārthāḥ avabhāsante na tad ārabdhaḥ kaścid ekaḥ

original: saṃsargasiddhikṛtas tu guṇapradhānabhāvo 'bhyupeyate //
analyzed: saṃsarga siddhi kṛtaḥ tu guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ bhyupeyate

original: sa ca guṇapradhānabhāvo na niyataḥ yena ekam evedaṃ pradhānam iti vyavasthāpyeta /
analyzed: sa ca guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ na niyataḥ yena ekam eva idam pradhānam iti vyavasthāpyeta

original: kvacit kārakaṃ pradhānam kriyā guṇaḥ dravyasya cikīrṣitatvenāvagamāt [vrīhīn prokṣati] iti //
analyzed: kvacid kārakam pradhānam kriyā guṇaḥ dravyasya cikīrṣita tvena avagamāt vrīhīn prokṣati iti

original: siddhatantraṃ kvacit sādhyaṃ tat tantram itarat kvacit /
analyzed: siddha tantram kvacid sādhyam tat tantram itarat kvacid

original: śabdaprayogatātparyaparyālocanayā bhavet //
analyzed: śabda prayoga tātparya paryālocanayā bhavet

original: tasmāt guṇapradhānabhāvāniyamāt anyonyasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ padārthasamudāyo vākyārtha iti etāvad eva śreyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt guṇa pradhāna bhāva aniyamāt anyonya saṃsṛṣṭaḥ padārtha samudāyaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti etāvat eva śreyaḥ

original: saṃsargāvagame ca sarvavādinām avivādaḥ //
analyzed: saṃsarga avagame ca sarva vādinām avivādaḥ

original: vākyārthaṃ manvate ye 'pi niyogaṃ bhāvanāṃ kriyām /
analyzed: vākya artham manvate ye pi niyogam bhāvanām kriyām

original: tair apy anyonyasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ padārthagrāma iṣyate //
analyzed: taiḥ api anyonya saṃsṛṣṭaḥ padārtha grāmaḥ iṣyate

original: nanu saṃsargavad anyavyavacchedo 'pi gamyate /
analyzed: nanu saṃsarga vat anya vyavacchedaḥ pi gamyate

original: [gauḥ śukla ānīyatām] iti śrute kṛṣṇāśvādivyavacchedapratītidarśanāt /
analyzed: gauḥ śuklaḥ ānīyatām iti śrute kṛṣṇa aśva ādi vyavaccheda pratīti darśanāt

original: satyam /
analyzed: satyam

original: saṃsargapūrvakas tu vyavacchedaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsarga pūrvakaḥ tu vyavacchedaḥ

original: śuklaguṇasaṃsṛṣṭo hi gauḥ kṛṣṇādibhyo vyavacchidyate /
analyzed: śukla guṇa saṃsṛṣṭaḥ hi gauḥ kṛṣṇa ādibhyaḥ vyavacchidyate

original: anyāpohas tu na padārtha ity uktam /
analyzed: anya apohaḥ tu na padārthaḥ iti uktam

original: tasmān na bhedo vākyārthaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na bhedaḥ vākya arthaḥ

original: nanu saṃsargo 'pi na śabdārthaḥ /
analyzed: nanu saṃsargaḥ api na śabda arthaḥ

original: satyam /
analyzed: satyam

original: sa hi śabdasyādhidheyo na bhavati na tu tato na pratīyate /
analyzed: sa hi śabdasya adhidheyaḥ na bhavati na tu tatas na pratīyate

original: abhidheyaḥ kathaṃ pratīyate iti cet etad agre nirṇīṣyate /
analyzed: abhidheyaḥ katham pratīyate iti ced etat agre

original: vyavacchede tu na sā gatiḥ /
analyzed: vyavacchede tu na sā gatiḥ

original: tasmāt saṃsṛṣṭāḥ padārthāḥ vākyārtha iti sthitam //
analyzed: tasmāt saṃsṛṣṭāḥ padārthāḥ vākya arthaḥ iti sthitam

original: atha vā guṇībhūtetarapadārthānugṛhītaḥ eka eva pradhānabhūtaḥ padārtho vākyārtha ity ekākārapratītibalād upeyatām /
analyzed: atha vā guṇībhūta itara padārtha anugṛhītaḥ ekaḥ eva pradhāna bhūtaḥ padārthaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti eka ākāra pratīti balāt upeyatām

original: ekas tv ayam asāv artha iti na nirṇetuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: ekaḥ tu ayam asau arthaḥ iti na nirṇetum śakyate

original: yadi tv avaśyam ekasya kasyacid adhiṣekakalaśo dātavyaḥ tat phalasyaiva dīyatām /
analyzed: yadi tu avaśyam ekasya kasyacid adhiṣeka kalaśaḥ dātavyaḥ tat phalasya eva dīyatām

original: na hi niṣprayojanaṃ kiṃcid vākyam uccaryate //
analyzed: na hi niṣprayojanam kiṃcid vākyam uccaryate

original: kvacit sākṣātpadopāttaṃ kvacit prakaraṇāgatam /
analyzed: kvacid sākṣāt pada upāttam kvacid prakaraṇa āgatam

original: kvacid ālocanālabhyaṃ phalaṃ sarvatra gamyate //
analyzed: kvacid ālocanā labhyam phalam sarvatra gamyate

original: sakalena ca kārakakalāpena kriyā nirvartyate /
analyzed: sakalena ca kāraka kalāpena kriyā nirvartyate

original: kriyayā ca phalam /
analyzed: kriyayā ca phalam

original: na tu phalenānyat kim api nirvartyata iti pradhānatvāt phalam eva vākyārthaḥ //
analyzed: na tu phalena anyat kim api nirvartyate iti pradhāna tvāt phalam eva vākya arthaḥ

original: nanu phalam api puruṣārtham iti puruṣaḥ pradhānaṃ syāt /
analyzed: nanu phalam api puruṣa artham iti puruṣaḥ pradhānam syāt

original: naitad evam /
analyzed: na etat evam

original: phalaṃ sukhātmakatvāt puruṣāśritaṃ bhavati sukhādīnām ātmaguṇatvāt /
analyzed: phalam sukha ātmaka tvāt puruṣa āśritam bhavati sukha ādīnām ātma guṇa tvāt

original: na caitāvatā puruṣaḥ pradhānam /
analyzed: na ca etāvatā puruṣaḥ pradhānam

original: so 'pi hi phalārtham eva yatate /
analyzed: saḥ u pi hi phala artham eva yatate

original: bhāvanā tāvat phalaniṣṭha eva vyāpāraḥ niyogasyāpi phalaṃ vinā na pravartakatvam ity uktam /
analyzed: bhāvanā tāvat phala niṣṭhaḥ eva vyāpāraḥ niyogasya api phalam vinā na pravartaka tvam iti uktam

original: kriyāyā api kevalāyā vākyārthatvam apāstam //
analyzed: kriyāyāḥ api kevalāyāḥ vākya artha tvam apāstam

original: tasmāt phalasya sādhyatvāt sarvatra tadavarjanāt /
analyzed: tasmāt phalasya sādhya tvāt sarvatra tad avarjanāt

original: kriyādīnāṃ ca tādarthyāt tasya vākyārthateṣyate //
analyzed: kriyā ādīnām ca tādarthyāt tasya vākya artha tā iṣyate

original: nanu phalasya svargādeḥ nisargataḥ siddharūpatvāt kārakais saha saṃbandho na prāpnoti /
analyzed: nanu phalasya svarga ādeḥ nisargataḥ siddha rūpa tvāt kārakaiḥ saha saṃbandhaḥ na prāpnoti

original: siddhasya ca kaḥ saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: siddhasya ca kaḥ saṃbandhaḥ

original: kriyāgarbha iti cet tarhi phalam api kārakāṇy api kriyayā saṃbadhyate ko viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: kriyā garbhaḥ iti ced tarhi phalam api kārakāṇi api kriyayā saṃbadhyate kaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: satyam /
analyzed: satyam

original: paraṃ tu kārakāṇi sādhanatvena phalaṃ tu sādhyatvena /
analyzed: param tu kārakāṇi sādhana tvena phalam tu sādhya tvena

original: kriyayā hi phalaṃ sādhyate na phalena kriyety ataḥ phalasyaiva prādhānyam iti siddham //
analyzed: kriyayā hi phalam sādhyate na phalena kriyā iti atas phalasya eva prādhānyam iti siddham

original: anyonyasaṃgativiśeṣita eva yasmāt vākyārthabhāvam upayāti padārthapuṃjaḥ /
analyzed: anyonya saṃgati viśeṣitaḥ eva yasmāt vākya artha bhāvam upayāti padārtha puṃjaḥ

original: etac ca cetasi nidhāya tato na bhinnaṃ vākyārtham abhyakadhita ca kaścana sūtrakāraḥ //
analyzed: etat ca cetasi nidhāya tatas na bhinnam vākya artham abhyakadhita ca kaścana sūtra kāraḥ

original: prādhānyayogād atha vā phalasya vākyārthatā tatra satāṃ hi yatnaḥ /
analyzed: prādhānya yogāt atha vā phalasya vākya artha tā tatra satām hi yatnaḥ

original: prayojanaṃ sūtrakṛtā tad eva pravartakatvena kilopadiṣṭam //
analyzed: prayojanam sūtrakṛtā tat eva pravartaka tvena kila upadiṣṭam

original: apare punaḥ liṅādiśabdaśravaṇe sati samupajāyamānām ātmaspandaviśeṣaṃ udyogaṃ nāma vākyārtham ācakṣate /
analyzed: apare punar liṅ ādi śabda śravaṇe sati samupajāyamānām ātma spanda viśeṣam udyogam nāma vākya artham ācakṣate

original: tatsvarūpaṃ tu vayaṃ na jānīmaḥ ko 'yam ātmaspando nāmeti /
analyzed: tad svarūpam tu vayam na jānīmaḥ kaḥ yam ātma spandaḥ nāma iti

original: buddhisukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnadharmādharmasaṃskārā hi nava ātmano guṇā viśeṣaguṇā bhavanti nānye /
analyzed: buddhi sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatna dharma adharma saṃskārāḥ hi nava ātmanaḥ guṇāḥ viśeṣa guṇāḥ bhavanti na anye

original: tatrāyam ātmaspandaḥ buddhir vā syāt prayatno vā icchādveṣayor anyataro vā /
analyzed: tatra ayam ātma spandaḥ buddhiḥ vā syāt prayatnaḥ vā icchā dveṣayoḥ anyataraḥ vā

original: anye tu vikalpayitum api na yuktāḥ /
analyzed: anye tu vikalpayitum api na yuktāḥ

original: tatra yadi buddhir ātmaspanda ucyate tarhi pratibhā vākyārtha ity uktaṃ bhavati na nūtanaṃ kiṃcid utprekṣitam etat //
analyzed: tatra yadi buddhiḥ ātma spandaḥ ucyate tarhi pratibhā vākya arthaḥ iti uktam bhavati na nūtanam kiṃcid utprekṣitam etat

original: atha prayatna ātmaspandaḥ tarhi bhāvanāyā nāmāntarakaraṇam udyoga iti //
analyzed: atha prayatnaḥ ātma spandaḥ tarhi bhāvanāyāḥ nāma antara karaṇam udyogaḥ iti

original: atha icchādveṣayor anyataro 'sau tarhi sukhecchā duḥkhajihāsā vā vākyārtha iti akṣapādapakṣa evāyaṃ nāpūrvaṃ kiṃcid //
analyzed: atha icchā dveṣayoḥ anyataraḥ sau tarhi sukha icchā duḥkha jihāsā vā vākya arthaḥ iti akṣapāda pakṣaḥ eva ayam na apūrvam kiṃcid

original: athāpi bhāṭṭaparikalpito vyāpāra ātmaspandaḥ so 'pi bhāvanaiva nārthāntaram //
analyzed: athā api bhāṭṭa parikalpitaḥ vyāpāraḥ ātma spandaḥ bhāvanā eva na artha antaram

original: arthānuṣṭheyaḥ prerakaḥ kaścid artha udyogaḥ sa tarhi niyoga eva upasargānyatvam idaṃ na vastv anyat //
analyzed: artha anuṣṭheyaḥ prerakaḥ kaścid arthaḥ udyogaḥ sa tarhi niyogaḥ eva upasarga anya tvam idam na vastu anyat

original: tasmād aśrutapūrveṇa kṛtam udyogaparvaṇā /
analyzed: tasmāt a śruta pūrveṇa kṛtam udyogaparvaṇā

original: sa bhāratamanuṣyāṇāṃ gocaro na tu mādṛśām //
analyzed: sa bhārata manuṣyāṇām gocaraḥ na tu mādṛśām

original: anyais tu pratibhā vākyārtha iṣyate /
analyzed: anyaiḥ tu pratibhā vākya arthaḥ iṣyate

original: tatpakṣas tu saṃsarganirbhāsajñānanirākaraṇena prāg eva pratikṣiptaḥ //
analyzed: tad pakṣaḥ tu saṃsarga nirbhāsa jñāna nirākaraṇena prāk eva pratikṣiptaḥ

original: pratibhā khalu vijñānaṃ tac ca śabdena jāyate /
analyzed: pratibhā khalu vijñānam tat ca śabdena jāyate

original: na tu śabdasya viṣayaḥ rūpadhīr iva cakṣuṣaḥ //
analyzed: na tu śabdasya viṣayaḥ rūpa dhīḥ iva cakṣuṣaḥ

original: bāhyasya viṣayasyābhāvāt saiva viṣaya iti cet na tasya samarthitatvāt //
analyzed: bāhyasya viṣayasya abhāvāt sā eva viṣayaḥ iti ced na tasya samarthita tvāt

original: yo 'pi [vyāghra āyātaḥ] ity ukte śūrakātaranarādhikaraṇanānākārakāryotpādaḥ sa bāhye 'rthe vyāghrāgamānādau pratipanne vāsanānusāreṇa bhavan na pratibhāmātrahetuko bhavati /
analyzed: yaḥ pi vyāghraḥ āyātaḥ iti ukte śūra kātara nara adhikaraṇa nānā ākāra kārya utpādaḥ sa bāhye rthe vyāghra āgama anādau pratipanne vāsanā anusāreṇa bhavan na pratibhā mātra hetukaḥ bhavati

original: tasya hi jñāyamāno 'rthaḥ karaṇam na tadjñānamātram /
analyzed: tasya hi jñāyamānaḥ rthaḥ karaṇam na tat jñāna mātram

original: arthas tadānīṃ nāstīti cet vipralambhavākyam idaṃ asatyārthaṃ bhaviṣyati na tv abāhyaviṣayaṃ tat /
analyzed: arthaḥ tadānīm nā asti iti ced vipralambha vākyam idam asatya artham bhaviṣyati na tu abāhya viṣayam tat

original: yathā 'vasthite vanitātmani bāhye 'rthe vāsanānusāreṇa kuṇapa iti kāminīti bhakṣyam iti pratibhā bhavanti tathā śabdārtho 'pi vyāghrāgamane 'vagate śūrāṇām utsāhaḥ kātarāṇabhayam ityādi kāryaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yathā vanitā ātmani bāhye rthe vāsanā anusāreṇa kuṇapaḥ iti kāminī iti bhakṣyam iti pratibhāḥ bhavanti tathā vyāghra āgamane śūrāṇām utsāhaḥ ityādi kāryam bhavati

original: na tv etāvatā pratibhā śabdārtho bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: na tu etāvatā pratibhā śabda arthaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: tasmāt vākyaprayojanatvena vā yadi pratibhā vākyārthaḥ kathyate kathyatāṃ nāma na tv asau śabdasyābhidheyā /
analyzed: tasmāt vākya prayojana tvena vā yadi pratibhā vākya arthaḥ kathyate kathyatām nāma na tu asau śabdasya abhidheyā

original: anabhidheyā 'pi saṃsargavat vākyārtha iti cet tatrāpy ayuktam /
analyzed: saṃsarga vat vākya arthaḥ iti ced tatra api ayuktam

original: saṃsṛṣṭā vākyārthaḥ na saṃsargaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭāḥ vākya arthaḥ na saṃsargaḥ

original: evam ihāpi pratibhāvanto 'rthā vākyārthaḥ na pratibheti //
analyzed: evam iha api pratibhāvantaḥ rthāḥ vākya arthaḥ na pratibhā iti

original: śabdasya ca pratyakṣavat vartamānārthaniṣṭatvābhāvāt anāgatādyarthābhidhāyino 'rthasannidhānena pratibhāparatvaṃ yad ucyate tad apy ayuktam anāgatādiviṣayatve 'pi tasyārthaviṣayatvaṃ prasādhitam iti kṛtaṃ vistareṇa //
analyzed: śabdasya ca pratyakṣa vat vartamāna artha niṣṭa tva abhāvāt anāgata ādi artha abhidhāyinaḥ rtha sannidhānena pratibhā paratvam yat ucyate tat api ayuktam anāgata ādi viṣaya tve tasya artha viṣaya tvam prasādhitam iti kṛtam vistareṇa

original: vākyārthaḥ paramārtha eva tad ayaṃ no kalpanānirmitaḥ tadvān apy uditaḥ padasya viṣayas tenārthasaṃsparśinā /
analyzed: vākya arthaḥ parama arthaḥ eva tat ayam no kalpanā nirmitaḥ tadvān api uditaḥ padasya viṣayaḥ tena artha saṃsparśinā

original: aprāmāṇyam ataś ca bāhyaviṣayābhāvena yad varṇyate tat śabdasya nirastam ity akaluṣaṃ prāmāṇyam asya sthitam //
analyzed: aprāmāṇyam atas ca bāhya viṣaya abhāvena yat varṇyate tat śabdasya nirastam iti akaluṣam prāmāṇyam asya sthitam

original: nanu nādyāpi śabdasya niraṇāyi pramāṇatā /
analyzed: nanu nā adya api śabdasya pramāṇa tā

original: bījaṃ padārthavākyārthabuddher na hi nirūpitam //
analyzed: bījam padārtha vākya artha buddheḥ na hi nirūpitam

original: ucyate kim atra nirūpaṇīyam /
analyzed: ucyate kim atra nirūpaṇīyam

original: yadanantaraṃ hi yad bhavati tat tasya nimittam /
analyzed: yad anantaram hi yat bhavati tat tasya nimittam

original: padavākyaśravaṇe sati padārthavākyārthasaṃpratyayo bhavatīti te eva tatra nimittam //
analyzed: pada vākya śravaṇe sati padārtha vākya artha saṃpratyayaḥ bhavati iti te eva tatra nimittam

original: kiṃ punar idaṃ padaṃ nāma /
analyzed: kim punar idam padam nāma

original: kiṃ ca vākyam iti /
analyzed: kim ca vākyam iti

original: uktam atra varṇasamūhaḥ padam padasamūho vākyam iti //
analyzed: uktam atra varṇa samūhaḥ padam pada samūhaḥ vākyam iti

original: nanu etad eva na kṣamante /
analyzed: nanu etat eva na kṣamante

original: na hi varṇānāṃ samūhaḥ kaścid asti vāstavaḥ /
analyzed: na hi varṇānām samūhaḥ kaścid asti vāstavaḥ

original: tena kutas tatsamūhaḥ padaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tena kutas tad samūhaḥ padam bhaviṣyati

original: tadabhāvāc ca na tarāṃ padasamūho vākyam avakalpate /
analyzed: tad abhāvāt ca na tarām pada samūhaḥ vākyam avakalpate

original: na ca varṇānāṃ vyastasamastavikalpopahatatvena vācakatvam upapadyate /
analyzed: na ca varṇānām vyasta samasta vikalpa upahata tvena vācaka tvam upapadyate

original: tasmād anya eva sphoṭātmā śabdo 'rthapratipādaka iti pratijānate /
analyzed: tasmāt anyaḥ eva sphoṭa ātmā śabdaḥ rtha pratipādakaḥ iti pratijānate

original: nanu evam astu /
analyzed: nanu evam astu

original: sphoṭo 'nya evārthapratipādako bhavatu /
analyzed: sphoṭaḥ nyaḥ eva artha pratipādakaḥ bhavatu

original: kā kṣatinaiyāyikānām kathaṃ na kṣatiḥ āptapraṇītatvena hi śabdasya prāmāṇyaṃ tair uktam /
analyzed: kā kṣati naiyāyikānām katham na kṣatiḥ āpta praṇīta tvena hi śabdasya prāmāṇyam taiḥ uktam

original: sphoṭasya ca nityatvena nāptapraṇītatvam /
analyzed: sphoṭasya ca nitya tvena na āpta praṇīta tvam

original: ataś ca yasyānityatvaṃ varṇātmanaḥ śabdasya sādhitam nāsāv arthapratītihetuḥ, ato na pramāṇam /
analyzed: atas ca yasya anitya tvam varṇa ātmanaḥ śabdasya sādhitam na asau artha pratīti hetuḥ atas na pramāṇam

original: yaś cārthapratītihetuḥ sphoṭātmā śabdaḥ tasya nānityatvam, na cāptapraṇītatvam iti asthāne naiyāyikāḥ kliṣṭā bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca artha pratīti hetuḥ sphoṭa ātmā śabdaḥ tasya na anitya tvam na ca āpta praṇīta tvam iti asthāne naiyāyikāḥ kliṣṭāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: tasmād anityānāṃ varṇānām eva vācakatvaṃ pratiṣṭhāpanīyam /
analyzed: tasmāt anityānām varṇānām eva vācaka tvam pratiṣṭhāpanīyam

original: parākaraṇīyaś ca sphoṭa iti //
analyzed: parākaraṇīyaḥ ca sphoṭaḥ iti

original: tad ucyate gakārādivarṇāvagame saty arthapratīter abhāvāt tadabhāve cābhāvāt teṣām evārthapratyāyanasāmarthyam /
analyzed: tat ucyate gakāra ādi varṇa avagame sati artha pratīteḥ abhāvāt tad abhāve ca abhāvāt teṣām eva artha pratyāyana sāmarthyam

original: ta eva ca śravaṇakaraṇakāvagamagocaratayā śabdavyapadeśabhāja iti pratītyanupārūḍhaḥ sphoṭo nāma śabdaḥ kaścit pratyakṣānumānātītaḥ parikalpanīyaḥ /
analyzed: te eva ca śravaṇa karaṇaka avagama gocara tayā śabda vyapadeśa bhājaḥ iti pratīti an upārūḍhaḥ sphoṭaḥ nāma śabdaḥ kaścid pratyakṣa anumāna atītaḥ parikalpanīyaḥ

original: āha katham evaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: āha katham evam bhaviṣyati

original: dūrāpetā ime manorathāḥ /
analyzed: dūra apetāḥ ime manorathāḥ

original: kuto varṇānām arthapratyāyakatvam te hi varṇā gakārādayaḥ arthaṃ pratipādayantaḥ samastāḥ pratipādayeyuḥ vyastā vā /
analyzed: kutas varṇānām artha pratyāyaka tvam te hi varṇāḥ gakāra ādayaḥ artham pratipādayantaḥ samastāḥ pratipādayeyuḥ vyastāḥ vā

original: na tāvad vyastāḥ ekaikavarṇākarṇane saty apy arthapratīter anutpādāt /
analyzed: na tāvat vyastāḥ ekaika varṇa ākarṇane sati api artha pratīteḥ anutpādāt

original: sāmastyaṃ varṇānāṃ nāsty eva /
analyzed: sāmastyam varṇānām na asti eva

original: tad dhi sattāmātreṇa vā syāt pratīyamānatvena vā /
analyzed: tat hi sattā mātreṇa vā syāt pratīyamāna tvena vā

original: naiyāyikapakṣe tāvat sattayā yaugapadyam avidyamānam āśuvināśinaḥ śabdasya darśitatvāt //
analyzed: naiyāyika pakṣe tāvat sattayā yaugapadyam a vidyamānam āśu vināśinaḥ śabdasya darśita tvāt

original: athāpi mīmāṃsakamatena nityaḥ śabda iṣyate tatrāpi sattayā yaugapadyasya sakalavarṇasādhāraṇatvāt kena varṇasamudāyena ko 'rthaḥ pratyāyyeteti nāvadhāryate //
analyzed: atha api mīmāṃsaka matena nityaḥ śabdaḥ iṣyate tatra api sattayā yaugapadyasya sakala varṇa sādhāraṇa tvāt kena varṇa samudāyena kaḥ arthaḥ pratyāyyeta iti nā avadhāryate

original: athocyate na cakśurādīnām iva varṇānāṃ kārakatvam yenāgṛhītānām eva satāṃ yaugapadyamātram arthapratyāyanāṅgaṃ syāt /
analyzed: atha ucyate na cakśuḥ ādīnām iva varṇānām kāraka tvam yena agṛhītānām eva satām yaugapadya mātram artha pratyāyana aṅgam syāt

original: jñāpakatvāt teṣāṃ gṛhītānāṃ satāṃ dhūmādivat pratyāyakatvam iti pratītāv eva sāmastyam upayujyate iti //
analyzed: jñāpaka tvāt teṣām gṛhītānām satām dhūma ādi vat pratyāyaka tvam iti pratītau eva sāmastyam upayujyate iti

original: etad apy aghaṭamānam /
analyzed: etat api aghaṭamānam

original: pratītisāmastyaṃ hi kim ekavaktṛprayuktānāṃ varṇānām uta nānāpuruṣabhāṣitānām /
analyzed: pratīti sāmastyam hi kim eka vaktṛ prayuktānām varṇānām uta nānā puruṣa bhāṣitānām

original: tatra ekadā anekapuruṣabhāṣitānāṃ kolāhalasvabhāvatvena svarūpabheda eva duravagama iti kasya sāmastyam asāmastyaṃ vā cintyeta /
analyzed: tatra ekadā aneka puruṣa bhāṣitānām kolāhala svabhāva tvena sva rūpa bhedaḥ eva duravagamaḥ iti kasya sāmastyam asāmastyam vā cintyeta

original: saty api vā tathāvidhe sāmastye nāsty evārthapratītiḥ //
analyzed: sati api vā tathāvidhe sāmastye na asti eva artha pratītiḥ

original: ekavaktṛprayuktānāṃ tu prayatnasthānakaraṇakramāparityāgāt avaśyaṃbhāvī kramaḥ /
analyzed: eka vaktṛ prayuktānām tu prayatna sthāna karaṇa krama aparityāgāt avaśyaṃbhāvī kramaḥ

original: krame ca saty ekaikavarṇakaraṇikārthapratītiḥ prāpnoti /
analyzed: krame ca sati ekaika varṇa karaṇika artha pratītiḥ prāpnoti

original: na cāsau dṛśyata iti vyastasamastavikalpānupapatteḥ na varṇā vācakāḥ //
analyzed: na ca asau dṛśyate iti vyasta samasta vikalpa anupapatteḥ na varṇāḥ vācakāḥ

original: varṇaviṣayā api buddhis tathaiva vikalpanīyāḥ /
analyzed: varṇa viṣayāḥ api buddhiḥ tathā eva vikalpanīyāḥ

original: tā api na yugapat saṃbhavanti /
analyzed: tāḥ api na yugapad saṃbhavanti

original: krame ca sati ekaikavarṇabuddher arthasaṃpratyayaḥ prasajyeteti //
analyzed: krame ca sati ekaika varṇa buddheḥ artha saṃpratyayaḥ prasajyeta iti

original: yad api ucyate pūrvavarṇajanitasaṃskārasahitaḥ antyavarṇaḥ pratyāyaka iti tad apy ayuktam /
analyzed: yat api ucyate pūrva varṇa janita saṃskāra sahitaḥ antya varṇaḥ pratyāyakaḥ iti tat api ayuktam

original: saṃskāro hi nāma yad anubhavajanitaḥ, tadviśayam eva smaraṇam upajanayati na punar arthāntaraviṣayaṃ jñānam iti /
analyzed: saṃskāraḥ hi nāma yat anubhava janitaḥ tad viśayam eva smaraṇam upajanayati na punar artha antara viṣayam jñānam iti

original: smṛtidvāreṇāsau tarhy arthapratyāyako 'sau bhaviṣyatīti cet etad api nāsti jñānayaugapadyaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: smṛti dvāreṇa asau tarhi artha pratyāyakaḥ sau bhaviṣyati iti ced etat api nā asti jñāna yaugapadya prasaṅgāt

original: antyavarṇajñānānantaraṃ hi pūrvavarṇasmaraṇam iva samayasmaraṇam api tadaivāpatati /
analyzed: antya varṇa jñāna anantaram hi pūrva varṇa smaraṇam iva samaya smaraṇam api tadā eva āpatati

original: tataś ca jñānayaugapadyam //
analyzed: tatas ca jñāna yaugapadyam

original: na ca kramotpade kiṃcit kāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: na ca krama utpade kiṃcid kāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ

original: athāpi tena kramena bhavetām tathāpi tadānīm antyavarṇajñānam uparatam iti kasya sāhāyyakaṃ pūrvavarṇasmṛtiṃ vidadhātīti //
analyzed: atha api tena kramena bhavetām tathā api tadānīm antya varṇa jñānam uparatam iti kasya sāhāyyakam pūrva varṇa smṛtim vidadhāti iti

original: etac cānekapūrvavarṇaviṣayām ekāṃ smṛtimam[smṛtim?] abhyupagamyoktam /
analyzed: etat ca aneka pūrva varṇa viṣayām ekām smṛtim smṛtim abhyupagamya uktam

original: na punar ekā sarvavarṇagocarā smṛtiḥ /
analyzed: na punar ekā sarva varṇa gocarā smṛtiḥ

original: kutaḥ bhinnopalaṃbhasaṃbhūtavāsanābhedanimittāḥ /
analyzed: kutas bhinna upalaṃbha saṃbhūta vāsanā bheda nimittāḥ

original: bhaveyuḥ smṛtayo bhinnāḥ na tv ekā 'nekagocaraḥ //
analyzed: bhaveyuḥ smṛtayaḥ bhinnāḥ na tu ekā aneka gocaraḥ

original: atha bhavet saṃkalanājñānam ekaṃ sadasadvarṇagocaraṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: atha bhavet saṃkalanā jñānam ekam sat asat varṇa gocaram bhaviṣyati

original: tadrūpārūḍhāś ca varṇāḥ arthaṃ pratyāyayiṣyantīti tad api durāśāmātram /
analyzed: tad rūpa ārūḍhāḥ ca varṇāḥ artham pratyāyayiṣyanti iti tat api durāśā mātram

original: tathāvidhajñānotpattau kāraṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: tathāvidha jñāna utpattau kāraṇa abhāvāt

original: na cendriyam atītavarṇagrahaṇasamartham /
analyzed: na ca indriyam atīta varṇa grahaṇa samartham

original: na saṃskāro vartamānagrāhī bhavati /
analyzed: na saṃskāraḥ vartamāna grāhī bhavati

original: na ca yugapad indriyaṃ saṃskāraś cemaṃ buddhiṃ janayataḥ; saṃskārasya sahacāradarśanādyāhitaprabodhasya sataḥ smaraṇamātrajanmani nirjñātasāmarthyasyendriyeṇa saha vyāpārābhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca yugapad indriyam saṃskāraḥ ca imam buddhim janayataḥ saṃskārasya sahacāra darśana ādi āhita prabodhasya sataḥ smaraṇa mātra janmani nirjñāta sāmarthyasya indriyeṇa saha vyāpāra abhāvāt

original: tasmāt na varṇā vācakāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na varṇāḥ vācakāḥ

original: ataś caivam yadi te vācakā bhaveyuḥ viparītakramaprayuktā apy arthaṃ gamayeyuḥ /
analyzed: atas ca evam yadi te vācakāḥ bhaveyuḥ viparīta krama prayuktāḥ api artham gamayeyuḥ

original: kramaś ced apekṣyate sa vyatiriktāvyatiriktatayā cintanīyaḥ /
analyzed: kramaḥ ced apekṣyate sa vyatirikta avyatirikta tayā cintanīyaḥ

original: avyatireke ta eva te varṇa iti kathaṃ na bodhakāḥ? vyatireke tu kim apy adhikaṃ vācakaṃ abhyupagataṃ bhavatīti matpakṣam ājigamiṣati bhavān //
analyzed: avyatireke te eva te varṇaḥ iti katham na bodhakāḥ vyatireke tu kim api adhikam vācakam abhyupagatam bhavati iti mad pakṣam ājigamiṣati bhavān

original: nanu vyutpattivaśena śabdaḥ arthapratyāyakatām upayāti /
analyzed: nanu vyutpatti vaśena śabdaḥ artha pratyāyaka tām upayāti

original: vyutpattau ca yāvanto yatkramā varṇā yad artham abhivadanto dṛṣṭāḥ te tāvantaḥ tatkramakās tam artham abhivadiṣyantīti kiṃ vikalpamālayā /
analyzed: vyutpattau ca yāvantaḥ yad kramāḥ varṇāḥ yat artham abhivadantaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ te tāvantaḥ tad kramakāḥ tam artham abhivadiṣyanti iti kim vikalpa mālayā

original: tad uktam  [yāvanto yādṛśā ye ca yadarthapratipādane /
analyzed: tat uktam yāvantaḥ yādṛśāḥ ye ca yad artha pratipādane

original: varṇāḥ prajñāprajñātasāmarthyaḥ te tathaivāvabodhakāḥ] iti //
analyzed: varṇāḥ prajñā prajñāta sāmarthyaḥ te tathā eva avabodhakāḥ iti

original: tad ucyate vyutpattir eveyaṃ vicāraṇīyā vartate /
analyzed: tat ucyate vyutpattiḥ evā iyam vicāraṇīyā vartate

original: parāvagatipūrvikā hi śabdāt svayam avagatiḥ /
analyzed: para avagati pūrvikā hi śabdāt svayam avagatiḥ

original: parāvagatau ca ke kiyantaḥ kathaṃ kam arthaṃ pratipādayanto 'nena dṛṣṭāḥ yebhyas tathaiva tam arthaṃ pratīyād iti duradhigamā hi varṇavartanī //
analyzed: para avagatau ca ke kiyantaḥ katham kam artham pratipādayantaḥ nena dṛṣṭāḥ yebhyaḥ tathā eva tam artham pratīyāt iti duradhigamā hi varṇa vartanī

original: yāvanto yādṛśā ye cety evaṃ tāvat prabhāṣase /
analyzed: yāvantaḥ yādṛśāḥ ye ca iti evam tāvat prabhāṣase

original: kiyantaḥ kīdṛśāḥ ke cety evaṃ yāvan na pṛcchyase //
analyzed: kiyantaḥ kīdṛśāḥ ke ca iti evam yāvat na pṛcchyase

original: tasmāt sarvaprakāram avācakā varṇāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt sarva prakāram a vācakāḥ varṇāḥ

original: asti ceyaṃ śabdād uccaritāt tadarthāvagatiḥ /
analyzed: asti ca iyam śabdāt uccaritāt tad artha avagatiḥ

original: na ceyam akaraṇikaiva bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: na ca iyam a karaṇikā eva bhavitum arhati

original: tad asyāḥ karaṇaṃ sphoṭa iti kāryānumānam idam astu pariśeṣānumānaṃ vā arthāpattir vā /
analyzed: tat asyāḥ karaṇam sphoṭaḥ iti kārya anumānam idam astu pariśeṣa anumānam vā arthāpattiḥ vā

original: sarvathā 'rthapratītilakṣaṇakāryavaśāt kalpyamānaṃ tat karaṇaṃ sphoṭa ity ucyate /
analyzed: sarvathā rtha pratīti lakṣaṇa kārya vaśāt kalpyamānam tat karaṇam sphoṭaḥ iti ucyate

original: sa ca niravayavaḥ nityaḥ ekaḥ niṣkāraṇaka iti na varṇapakṣakṣepaṇadakṣadūṣaṇapātratāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: sa ca niravayavaḥ nityaḥ ekaḥ niṣkāraṇakaḥ iti na varṇa pakṣa kṣepaṇa dakṣa dūṣaṇa pātra tām pratipadyate

original: ataś ca sphoṭo 'rthapratipādakaḥ śabdād arthaṃ pratipadyāmaha iti vyavahārāt /
analyzed: atas ca sphoṭaḥ rtha pratipādakaḥ śabdāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti vyavahārāt

original: bhavato hi varṇajanitas saṃskāro 'rthapratipādakaḥ /
analyzed: bhavataḥ hi varṇa janitaḥ saṃskāraḥ rtha pratipādakaḥ

original: tatra [śabdād] iti prātipadikārtho 'nupapannaḥ //
analyzed: tatra śabdāt iti prātipadika arthaḥ

original: atha varṇāḥ śabdaśabdenocyante /
analyzed: atha varṇāḥ śabda śabdena ucyante

original: te cārthapratipādakāḥ iti idam anyathāsiddham tathāpi [śabdāt] ity ekatvaṃ vibhaktyartho na saṃgacchate /
analyzed: te ca artha pratipādakāḥ iti idam anyathā asiddham tathā api śabdāt iti ekatvam vibhakti arthaḥ na saṃgacchate

original: śabdebhyaḥ pratipadyāmaha iti vyavahāraḥ syāt /
analyzed: śabdebhyaḥ pratipadyāmahe iti vyavahāraḥ syāt

original: sphoṭātmani tu śabde 'rthapratipādake iṣyamāṇe śabdāt iti prātipadikārthaḥ vibhaktyarthaś ca dvayam apy upapannam //
analyzed: sphoṭa ātmani tu śabde rtha pratipādake iṣyamāṇe śabdāt iti prātipadika arthaḥ vibhakti arthaḥ ca dvayam api upapannam

original: nanu na sphoṭaḥ śabdaśabdenocyate kin tu varṇā eva /
analyzed: nanu na sphoṭaḥ śabda śabdena ucyate kin tu varṇāḥ eva

original: śrotragrahaṇe hy arthe śabdāśabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: śrotra grahaṇe hi arthe śabda aśabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ

original: ta eva ca śrotragrahaṇā iti naitad evam śabdatvasyāpi śrotragrahaṇātmano bhāvāt /
analyzed: te eva ca śrotra grahaṇāḥ iti na etat evam śabda tvasya api śrotra grahaṇa ātmanaḥ bhāvāt

original: nirjhara jhāṅkāraravaprabhṛtīnāṃ ca saty api śrotragrahaṇatve śabdakāryanirvartakatvānupapateḥ /
analyzed: nirjhara jhāṅkāra rava prabhṛtīnām ca sati api śrotra grahaṇa tve śabda kārya nirvartaka tva anupapateḥ

original: tasmāt yato 'rthapratipattiḥ sa śabdaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yatas ṛtha pratipattiḥ sa śabdaḥ

original: arthapratipattiś ca sphoṭād eva na varṇebhya iti sphoṭa eva śabdaḥ //
analyzed: artha pratipattiḥ ca sphoṭāt eva na varṇebhyaḥ iti sphoṭaḥ eva śabdaḥ

original: nanu evaṃ sati dhūmādīnām apy arthapratītihetutvāt śabdatvaṃ prāpnoti maivaṃ vādīḥ /
analyzed: nanu evam sati dhūma ādīnām api artha pratīti hetu tvāt śabda tvam prāpnoti mā evam vādīḥ

original: [atha gaur] ity atra śrotrajapratibhāse bahavo 'rthāḥ pratibhāsante tatra kas teṣāṃ śabdaḥ ity upakramya yato 'rthapratipattiḥ sa śabda ity upasaṃhṛte kuto dhūmādīnāṃ śabdatvaśaṅkāvakāśaḥ //
analyzed: atha gauḥ iti atra śrotra ja pratibhāse bahavaḥ rthāḥ pratibhāsante tatra kaḥ teṣām śabdaḥ iti upakramya yatas rtha pratipattiḥ sa śabdaḥ iti upasaṃhṛte kutas dhūma ādīnām śabda tva śaṅkā avakāśaḥ

original: nanu ceyam arthapratītiḥ varṇeṣu bhavatsu bhavantī teṣv abhavatsu cābhavantī tān utsṛjya kathaṃ sphoṭakāryatām upayāyāt /
analyzed: nanu ca iyam artha pratītiḥ varṇeṣu bhavatsu bhavantī teṣu abhavatsu ca abhavantī tān utsṛjya katham sphoṭa kārya tām upayāyāt

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: ananyathāsiddhaṃ tadbhāvabhāvitvaṃ tatkāryatām avagamayati nānyathāsiddham /
analyzed: ananyathāsiddham tad bhāva bhāvi tvam tad kāryatām avagamayati na anyathāsiddham

original: kā punar anyathāsiddhiḥ /
analyzed: kā punar anyathā siddhiḥ

original: sphoṭavyaṃjakatvāt varṇānāṃ tadānantaryam arthapratīter upaplavate /
analyzed: sphoṭa vyaṃjaka tvāt varṇānām tad ānantaryam artha pratīteḥ upaplavate

original: varṇābhivyaktaḥ sphoṭo 'rthapratītim ādadhāti /
analyzed: varṇa abhivyaktaḥ sphoṭaḥ rtha pratītim ādadhāti

original: bhrāmyati janaḥ varṇair iyam arthapratītir utpāditeti //
analyzed: bhrāmyati janaḥ varṇaiḥ iyam artha pratītiḥ utpāditā iti

original: nanu sphoṭavyaktāv aprīdānīṃ varṇānāṃ kva gatās te vyastasamastavikalpāḥ /
analyzed: nanu sphoṭa vyaktau varṇānām kva gatāḥ te vyasta samasta vikalpāḥ

original: āha ca bhaṭṭaḥ /
analyzed: āha ca bhaṭṭaḥ

original: [yasyānavayavaḥ sphoṭaḥ vyajyate varṇabiddhibhiḥ /
analyzed: yasya anavayavaḥ sphoṭaḥ vyajyate varṇa biddhibhiḥ

original: so 'pi paryanuyogena naivānena vimucyate] iti //
analyzed: saḥ pi paryanuyogena na eva anena vimucyate iti

original: bhāṣyakṛtāpi [nanu saṃskārakalpanāyām adṛṣṭakalpanā] ity āśaṃkya prativihitaṃ [śabdakalpanāyāṃ sā ca śabdakalpanā ca] iti /
analyzed: bhāṣyakṛtā api nanu saṃskāra kalpanāyām adṛṣṭa kalpanā iti āśaṃkya prativihitam śabda kalpanāyām sā ca śabda kalpanā ca iti

original: naiṣa doṣaḥ /
analyzed: na eṣa doṣaḥ

original: na sphoṭavyaktau vikalpāḥ prabhavanti /
analyzed: na sphoṭa vyaktau vikalpāḥ prabhavanti

original: kutaḥ eke tāvad ācakṣate prathamavarṇaśravaṇavelāyām eva sphoṭo 'bhivyakto bhavati /
analyzed: kutas eke tāvat ācakṣate prathama varṇa śravaṇa velāyām eva sphoṭaḥ bhivyaktaḥ bhavati

original: na ca dvitīyādivarṇavaiphalyam tadavagater evātiśayakaraṇāt /
analyzed: na ca dvitīya ādi varṇa vaiphalyam tad avagateḥ eva atiśaya karaṇāt

original: yathā ratnaparīkṣakāṇāṃ prathamadarśane ratnarūpam amalam aprakāśamānam api punaḥ punaḥ parīkṣamāṇānāṃ carane cetasi cakāsti niravadyaṃ ratnatattvam evam ihāpi prathamavarṇaśrutyā vyakte 'pi sphoṭe sphuṭatarapratītyai varṇāntarāṇi prayokṣyanta iti //
analyzed: yathā ratna parīkṣakāṇām prathama darśane ratna rūpam amalam a prakāśamānam api punar punar parīkṣamāṇānām carane cetasi cakāsti niravadyam ratna tattvam evam iha api prathama varṇa śrutyā vyakte sphoṭe sphuṭatara pratītyai varṇa antarāṇi prayokṣyante iti

original: apare tu vadanti dhvanaya eva sphoṭasya ca vyaṃjakāḥ /
analyzed: apare tu vadanti dhvanayaḥ eva sphoṭasya ca vyaṃjakāḥ

original: taiś ca marudbhiḥ anavayava eva eṣa sphoṭo 'bhivyajyamānaḥ tālvādisthānakaraṇasaṃyogopādhivaśopaplavamānanānākāragakārādibhāgayogīva pratibhāsate /
analyzed: taiḥ ca marudbhiḥ an avayavaḥ eva eṣa sphoṭaḥ bhivyajyamānaḥ tālu ādi sthāna karaṇa saṃyoga upādhi vaśa upaplavamāna nānā ākāra gakāra ādi bhāga yogī iva pratibhāsate

original: marutāṃ caṃcalatvād uccāritapradhvaṃsinas te taṃ kālpanikākāram avabhāsayante /
analyzed: marutām caṃcala tvāt uccārita pradhvaṃsinaḥ te tam kālpanika ākāram avabhāsayante

original: dṛṣṭaṃ copādhivaśād asatyam api rūpam avabhāsamānam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam ca upādhi vaśāt asatyam api rūpam avabhāsamānam

original: yathā kṛpāṇamaṇidarpaṇādivyaṃjakabhedena śyāmadīrghādirūpaṃ vadanasya /
analyzed: yathā kṛpāṇa maṇi darpaṇa ādi vyaṃjaka bhedena śyāma dīrgha ādi rūpam vadanasya

original: nādātmako hi śabdaḥ vīṇāveṇumṛdaṅgapaṭahādivyaṃjakabhedena nānātvam upagacchan dṛśyate /
analyzed: nāda ātmakaḥ hi śabdaḥ vīṇā veṇu mṛdaṅga paṭaha ādi vyaṃjaka bhedena nānātvam upagacchan dṛśyate

original: tasmān na pāramārthikā eva te varṇāḥ, na ca sphoṭasya vyaṃjakā iti kva samastavyastavikalpāḥ prabhaveyuḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na pāramārthikāḥ eva te varṇāḥ na ca sphoṭasya vyaṃjakāḥ iti kva samasta vyasta vikalpāḥ prabhaveyuḥ

original: upādhibhedena pratibhāsamānā asatyākārāś ca te 'rthapratyayānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyino dṛśyante //
analyzed: upādhi bhedena pratibhāsamānāḥ asatya ākārāḥ ca te rtha pratyaya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinaḥ dṛśyante

original: tena yad ucyate śabdakalpanāyāṃ kalpanādvaiguṇyam iti tatraikaguṇā 'pi kalpanā nāsti /
analyzed: tena yat ucyate śabda kalpanāyām kalpanā dvaiguṇyam iti tatra ekaguṇā kalpanā na asti

original: kā kathā dvaiguṇyasyeti /
analyzed: kā kathā dvaiguṇyasya iti

original: tasmāt sphoṭātmakād eva śabdād arthapratyayaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt sphoṭa ātmakāt eva śabdāt artha pratyayaḥ

original: varṇānuvidhāyitvaṃ tu tasyānyathāsiddham iti siddham //
analyzed: varṇa anuvidhāyi tvam tu tasya anyathā asiddham iti siddham

original: api ca tārkikāṇām anumānapriyatvāt tatparitoṣāyedam anumānam abhyadhāyi na paramārthataḥ /
analyzed: api ca tārkikāṇām anumāna priya tvāt tad paritoṣāya idam anumānam abhyadhāyi na paramārthataḥ

original: paramārthatas tu śrautre pratyaye pratibhāsamānaḥ pratyakṣa eva sphoṭaḥ //
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu śrautre pratyaye pratibhāsamānaḥ pratyakṣaḥ eva sphoṭaḥ

original: āha kim idam apūrvaṃ taskarācaritaṃ vartate /
analyzed: āha kim idam apūrvam taskara ācaritam vartate

original: varnāḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyamānā api durbhāgaḥ na pratyakṣāḥ sphoṭaḥ punar anavabhāsamāno 'pi subhagaḥ pratyakṣa iti /
analyzed: varnāḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyamānāḥ api durbhāgaḥ na pratyakṣāḥ sphoṭaḥ punar an avabhāsamānaḥ u pi subhagaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: na brūmaḥ varṇā na pratyakṣā iti /
analyzed: na brūmaḥ varṇāḥ na pratyakṣāḥ iti

original: te punar asanto 'pi upādhivaśād vadanadaidhyādivad avabhāsante /
analyzed: te punar asantaḥ upādhi vaśāt vadana daidhya ādi vat avabhāsante

original: śabdas tv eko niravayavaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: śabdaḥ tu ekaḥ niravayavaḥ pratīyate

original: tathā ca padam iti vākyam iti ekākārā pratītir asti /
analyzed: tathā ca padam iti vākyam iti eka ākārā pratītiḥ asti

original: na ca bhinnā varṇās tasyām ālambanībhavanti /
analyzed: na ca bhinnāḥ varṇāḥ tasyām ālambanībhavanti

original: na hi sāmānyapratyayaḥ vyaktyālambanaḥ avayavipratyayo vāvayavālambanaḥ /
analyzed: na hi sāmānya pratyayaḥ vyakti ālambanaḥ avayavi pratyayaḥ vā avayava ālambanaḥ

original: na ca senāvanādibuddhivad ayathārthā padavākyabuddhiḥ bādhakābhāvāt //
analyzed: na ca senā vana ādi buddhi vat ayathārthā pada vākya buddhiḥ bādhaka abhāvāt

original: ekārthapratyayavattvopādhikṛteyam ekākārā buddhir iti cet ekārthapratītir idānīṃ kutastyā /
analyzed: eka artha pratyayavat tva upādhi kṛtā iyam eka ākārā buddhiḥ iti ced eka artha pratītiḥ idānīm kutastyā

original: padavākyapratītipūrvikā hi padārthavākyārthapratītiḥ padārthavākyārthapratītyākhyakāryaikyāc ca padavākyabuddhir ekākāreti duruttaram itaretarāśrayatvam //
analyzed: pada vākya pratīti pūrvikā hi padārtha vākya artha pratītiḥ padārtha vākya artha pratīti ākhya kārya aikyāt ca pada vākya buddhiḥ eka ākārā iti duruttaram itaretara āśraya tvam

original: aupādhikatvaṃ ca sāmānyāvayavibuddher api suvacanam /
analyzed: aupādhika tvam ca sāmānya avayavi buddheḥ api su vacanam

original: bādhasaṃdeharahitapratītidāḍhyāt tatra parihāra iti cet tad itaratrāpi samānam /
analyzed: bādha saṃdeha rahita pratīti dāḍhyāt tatra parihāraḥ iti ced tat itaratra api samānam

original: tasmāt padabuddheḥ padasphoṭaḥ vakyabuddheś ca vākyasphoṭo viśaya iti pratyakṣa eva sphoṭaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt pada buddheḥ pada sphoṭaḥ vakya buddheḥ ca vākya sphoṭaḥ viśayaḥ iti pratyakṣaḥ eva sphoṭaḥ

original: tatra padasphoṭāt padārthapratipattiḥ vākyasphoṭāc ca vākyārthapratipattiḥ //
analyzed: tatra pada sphoṭāt padārtha pratipattiḥ vākya sphoṭāt ca vākya artha pratipattiḥ

original: āha yadi niravayavaḥ sphoṭātmā śabdo bhavati vākyam api śabda eva /
analyzed: āha yadi niravayavaḥ sphoṭa ātmā śabdaḥ bhavati vākyam api śabdaḥ eva

original: tasya padātmakās tv ayavā[avayavā?] mā bhūvan /
analyzed: tasya pada ātmakāḥ tu ayava aavayavāḥ mā bhūvan

original: tasya cet padātmāno 'vayavā bhavanti padasyāpi tarhi varṇātmāno 'vayavā bhavantu /
analyzed: tasya ced pada ātmānaḥ vayavāḥ bhavanti padasya api tarhi varṇa ātmānaḥ vayavāḥ bhavantu

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: kiṃcid ucchvasitam iva me hṛdayam /
analyzed: kiṃcid ucchvasitam iva me hṛdayam

original: manye bhaviṣyaty āyuṣmato vivekālokaḥ /
analyzed: manye bhaviṣyati āyuṣmataḥ viveka ālokaḥ

original: bodhyamāno bhotsyase kiṃcit /
analyzed: bodhyamānaḥ bhotsyase kiṃcid

original: dhvanyupādhibhedapravṛttavarṇabhedāvabhāsavipralabdhabuddhiṃ bhavadvidhaṃ bodhayituṃ padasphoṭa eṣa niravayavo 'smābhir darśitaḥ /
analyzed: dhvani upādhi bheda pravṛtta varṇa bheda avabhāsa vipralabdha buddhim bhavadvidham bodhayitum pada sphoṭaḥ eṣa niravayavaḥ smābhiḥ darśitaḥ

original: paramārthatas tu padasphoṭo vākyāvayavabhūto nāsty eva /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu pada sphoṭaḥ vākya avayava bhūtaḥ na asti eva

original: niravayavam eva vākyaṃ niravayavasyaiva vākyārthasya bodhakam /
analyzed: niravayavam eva vākyam niravayavasya eva vākya arthasya bodhakam

original: yathā cāhuḥ vākye padānām asattvāt tadarthe padārthānāṃ niravayavau vākyavākyārthāv iti //
analyzed: yathā ca āhuḥ vākye padānām asattvāt tad arthe padārthānām niravayavau vākya vākyārthau iti

original: avayavakalpanāyāṃ hi yathā vākyasyāvayavāḥ padāni padānām avayavā varṇāḥ evaṃ varṇānām apy avayavair bhavitavyam /
analyzed: avayava kalpanāyām hi yathā vākyasya avayavāḥ padāni padānām avayavāḥ varṇāḥ evam varṇānām api avayavaiḥ bhavitavyam

original: tadavayavānām apy avayavāntarair ity ānantyāt kā vyavasthā syāt /
analyzed: tad avayavānām api avayava antaraiḥ iti ānantyāt kā vyavasthā syāt

original: varṇān prāpya tu yady avayavakalpanāto virantavyaṃ tad vākya eva viramyatām //
analyzed: varṇān prāpya tu yadi avayava kalpanātaḥ virantavyam tat vākye eva viramyatām

original: ekaghaṭanākārā hi vākyārthabuddhiḥ tathāvidhād eva vākyād utpattim arhati vṛddhavyavahārād dhi śabdārthe vyutpadyante vyavahartāraḥ /
analyzed: eka ghaṭana ākārā hi vākya artha buddhiḥ tathāvidhāt eva vākyāt utpattim arhati vṛddha vyavahārāt hi śabda arthe vyutpadyante vyavahartāraḥ

original: tatrāsya padasya prayoga eva na kevalasya dṛśyate, vyavahārānaṅgatvāt /
analyzed: tatra asya padasya prayogaḥ eva na kevalasya dṛśyate vyavahāra anaṅga tvāt

original: vākyaṃ tu prayogārham iti tatraiva vyutpattiḥ /
analyzed: vākyam tu prayoga arham iti tatra eva vyutpattiḥ

original: tata evārthasaṃpratyayaḥ /
analyzed: tatas eva artha saṃpratyayaḥ

original: avayavapratibhāsas tu bhramamātram /
analyzed: avayava pratibhāsaḥ tu bhrama mātram

original: artho 'pi vākyasya eka eva narasiṃhākāraḥ /
