analyzed: arthaḥ u pi vākyasya ekaḥ eva narasiṃhākāraḥ

original: jātyantaraṃ hi narasiṃho nāma /
analyzed: jāti antaram hi narasiṃhaḥ nāma

original: tatra na narārthaḥ, nāpi siṃhārthaḥ //
analyzed: tatra na nara arthaḥ na api siṃha arthaḥ

original: evaṃ padārthebhyo 'nya eva vākyārthaḥ, pānakādivat /
analyzed: evam padārthebhyaḥ nyaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ pānaka ādi vat

original: yathā pānakaḥ śarkarānāgakesaramarīcyādibhyo 'rthānatram eva, yathā ca sindhūraharitālalākṣādibhyo 'rthāntaram eva citram yathā vā ṣaḍjarṣabhagāndhāradhaivatādibhyo 'rthāntaram eva grāmarāgaḥ tathā padebhyo vākyam, padārthebhyo vākyārthaḥ //
analyzed: yathā pānakaḥ śarkarā nāgakesara marīci ādibhyaḥ rtha anatram eva yathā ca sindhūra haritāla lākṣā ādibhyaḥ rtha antaram eva citram yathā vā ṣaḍja ṛṣabha gāndhāra dhaivata ādibhyaḥ rtha antaram eva grāma rāgaḥ tathā padebhyaḥ vākyam padārthebhyaḥ vākya arthaḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhi tadaṃśāvagama iti cet kalpanāmātraṃ tat nāsau paramārthaḥ /
analyzed: katham tarhi tad aṃśa avagamaḥ iti ced kalpanā mātram tat na asau paramārthaḥ

original: tacchabdānugame tadarthānugamadarśanāt pāramārthikatvaṃ bhāgānām iti cet na /
analyzed: tad śabda anugame tad artha anugama darśanāt pāramārthika tvam bhāgānām iti ced na

original: kūpasūpayūpānām ekākṣarānugame 'py arthānugamābhāvāt //
analyzed: kūpa sūpa yūpānām eka akṣara anugame pi artha anugama abhāvāt

original: na ca kevalānugamamātreṇa tatkāranabhāvo vaktuṃ śakyaḥ reṇupaṭalānugāmitayā karituragādivat pipīlikāpaṅkter api dṛśyamānāyās tatkāraṇatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na ca kevala anugama mātreṇa tad kārana bhāvaḥ vaktum śakyaḥ reṇu paṭala anugāmi tayā kari turaga ādi vat pipīlikā paṅkteḥ api dṛśyamānāyāḥ tad kāraṇa tva prasaṅgāt

original: tasmāt prakṛtipratyayāṃśavat asatpadārthaparikalpanaṃ vākyārthāvagamopāyatayā ''śrīyate na tv arthas tadīyaḥ tatrāśvakarṇādivad upalabhyate //
analyzed: tasmāt prakṛti pratyaya aṃśa vat asat padārtha parikalpanam vākya artha avagama upāya tayā śrīyate na tu arthaḥ tadīyaḥ tatra aśvakarṇa ādi vat upalabhyate

original: asatyām api satyopāyatāṃ pratipadyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
analyzed: asatyām api satya upāya tām pratipadyamānam dṛśyate

original: alīkāhidaṃśādayaḥ satyamaraṇakāraṇaṃ bhavanti /
analyzed: alīka ahi daṃśa ādayaḥ satya maraṇa kāraṇam bhavanti

original: lipyakṣarāṇi cāsatyāny eva satyārthapratipattim ādadhati //
analyzed: lipi akṣarāṇi ca asatyāni eva satya artha pratipattim ādadhati

original: svarūpasatyāni tānīti cet na /
analyzed: svarūpa satyāni tāni iti ced na

original: rekhārūpatayā teṣām arthāpratipādakatvāt /
analyzed: rekhā rūpa tayā teṣām artha a pratipādaka tvāt

original: gakāro 'yam ity evaṃ gṛhyamāṇā rekhā arthapratyayahetavaḥ /
analyzed: gakāraḥ yam iti evam gṛhyamāṇāḥ rekhāḥ artha pratyaya hetavaḥ

original: tā yena rupeṇa satyāḥ tena nārthapratipādakāḥ yena cārthapratipādakāḥ tena na satyā iti //
analyzed: tāḥ yena rupeṇa satyāḥ tena na artha pratipādakāḥ yena ca artha pratipādakāḥ tena na satyāḥ iti

original: nanu prakṛtipratyayādyaṃśā api paramārthasanta eva tatā pratibhāsāt arthapratyayahetutvāc ca /
analyzed: nanu prakṛti pratyaya ādi aṃśāḥ api paramārtha santaḥ eva pratibhāsāt artha pratyaya hetu tvāt ca

original: naitad evam /
analyzed: na etat evam

original: anvākhyānabhedena teṣāṃ svarūpeṇeyattāniścayānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: anvākhyāna bhedena teṣām sva rūpeṇa iyat tā niścaya anupapatteḥ

original: bhavatīty atra bhūśabdaḥ prakṛtiḥ kvacid anvākhyāyate kvacid bhavaśabdaḥ /
analyzed: bhavati iti atra bhū śabdaḥ prakṛtiḥ kvacid anvākhyāyate kvacid bhava śabdaḥ

original: pratyayādeśāgamaguṇavṛddhivarṇalopādyanvākhyānavisaṃvādāt kaḥ pāramārthikaḥ prakṛtipratyayavibhāgaḥ /
analyzed: pratyaya ādeśa āgama guṇa vṛddhi varṇa lopa ādi anvākhyāna visaṃvādāt kaḥ pāramārthikaḥ prakṛti pratyaya vibhāgaḥ

original: kalpanāmātraṃ tv etat iyaṃ prakṛtiḥ eṣa pratyaya iti /
analyzed: kalpanā mātram tu etat iyam prakṛtiḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ iti

original: evaṃ padārthānām api vākyārthaparikalpanayaivāpoddhāraḥ /
analyzed: evam padārthānām api vākya artha parikalpanayā eva apoddhāraḥ

original: tad uktam [padaṃ kaiścid dvidhā bhinnaṃ caturdhā paṃcadhā 'pi vā /
analyzed: tat uktam padam kaiścid dvidhā bhinnam caturdhā paṃcadhā vā

original: apoddhṛtyaiva vākyebhyaḥ prakṛtipratyayādivat] //
analyzed: apoddhṛtya eva vākyebhyaḥ prakṛti pratyaya ādi vat

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: api ca pāramārthikatve padānāṃ niyatam avisaṃvādirūpaṃ pratīyeta visaṃvādi tu tat /
analyzed: api ca pāramārthika tve padānām niyatam avisaṃvādi rūpam pratīyeta visaṃvādi tu tat

original: nāmākhyātasadhāraṇavarṇasanniveśadarśanāt na niyataṃ teṣaṃ rūpam /
analyzed: nāma ākhyāta sadhāraṇa varṇa sanniveśa darśanāt na niyatam teṣam rūpam

original: ataḥ kālpanikam eva tata[tat?] na vāstavam /
analyzed: atas kālpanikam eva tatatat na vāstavam

original: na ca niścetum api tat pāryate /
analyzed: na ca niścetum api tat pāryate

original: [kālenadantināgāḥ] ity atra kīdṛśaḥ padavibhāgaḥ atha dvayopapatteḥ /
analyzed: iti atra kīdṛśaḥ pada vibhāgaḥ atha dvaya upapatteḥ

original: ubhayatra ca varṇatulyatvāt /
analyzed: ubhayatra ca varṇa tulya tvāt

original: kiṃ kālena kṛṣṇena dantinā hastinā agāḥ tvaṃ gataḥ ity evam etāni padāni vyavasthāpyantām atha kāle samaye nadanti śabdāyante nāgā kariṇaḥ phaṇino veti /
analyzed: kim kālena kṛṣṇena dantinā hastinā agāḥ tvam gataḥ iti evam etāni padāni vyavasthāpyantām atha kāle samaye nadanti śabdāyante nāgā kariṇaḥ phaṇinaḥ vā iti

original: tasmād aniyamāt na padatadarthavibhāgaḥ pāramārthikaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt aniyamāt na pada tad artha vibhāgaḥ pāramārthikaḥ

original: atha prathamapratipannavākyārthānusāreṇa padatadarthavibhāgo vyavasthāpyate tarhi kiṃ tena tadānīṃ vyavasthāpitena vākyārthasya prathamam eva pratipannatvāt //
analyzed: atha prathama pratipanna vākya artha anusāreṇa pada tad artha vibhāgaḥ vyavasthāpyate tarhi kim tena tadānīm vyavasthāpitena vākya arthasya prathamam eva pratipanna tvāt

original: kiṃ ca dadhy atra madhv atreti dadhimadhupadayor ikārokārayor adarśane 'pi tadarthasaṃpratyayo dṛśyate /
analyzed: kim ca dadhi atra madhu atra iti dadhi madhu padayoḥ ikāra ukārayoḥ adarśane tad artha saṃpratyayaḥ dṛśyate

original: tasmād api na pāramārthikaḥ padavarṇavibhāgaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt api na pāramārthikaḥ pada varṇa vibhāgaḥ

original: nirastāvayavaṃ vākyaṃ tathāvidhasyaiva vākyārthasya vācakam iti siddham //
analyzed: nirasta avayavam vākyam tathāvidhasya eva vākya arthasya vācakam iti siddham

original: nanu yathā padeṣu varṇā na santi vakyeṣu padāni na santi tathā mahāvākyeṣv avāntaravākyāny api na syuḥ /
analyzed: nanu yathā padeṣu varṇāḥ na santi vakyeṣu padāni na santi tathā mahāvākyeṣu avāntaravākyāni api na syuḥ

original: tataḥ kim mahāvākyāny api prakaraṇāpekṣayā na tāttvikāni syuḥ /
analyzed: tatas kim mahāvākyāni api prakaraṇa apekṣayā na tāttvikāni syuḥ

original: tataḥ kim prakaraṇāny api śāstrāpekṣayā na syuḥ /
analyzed: tatas kim prakaraṇāni api śāstra apekṣayā na syuḥ

original: tato 'pi kim ekam evedaṃ śāstratattvam avibhāgam advayam āpatati //
analyzed: kim ekam evā idam śāstra tattvam avibhāgam advayam āpatati

original: ucyate yadi tattvaṃ pṛcchasi buddhyase vā tadā evam evaitat sādho śabdabrahmaivedam advayam anādyavidyāvāsanopaplavamānabhadam arthabhāvena  vivartate /
analyzed: ucyate yadi tattvam pṛcchasi buddhyase vā tadā evam eva etat sādho śabdabrahma eva idam advayam anādya vidyā vāsanā upaplavamāna bhadam artha bhāvena vivartate

original: na tu vācakād vibhaktaṃ vācyam api nāma kiṃcid asti /
analyzed: na tu vācakāt vibhaktam vācyam api nāma kiṃcid asti

original: tasmāt kālpanika eva vācyavācakavibhāgo 'yam avidyaiva vidyopāya ity āśrīyate /
analyzed: tasmāt kālpanikaḥ eva vācya vācaka vibhāgaḥ yam avidyā eva vidyā upāyaḥ iti āśrīyate

original: vāgrūpatā tattvam sarvatra pratyaye tadanapāyāt /
analyzed: vāc rūpa tā tattvam sarvatra pratyaye tad anapāyāt

original: yathoktam  [vāgrūpatā ced utkrāmed avabodhasya śāśvatī /
analyzed: yathā uktam vāc rūpa tā ced utkrāmet avabodhasya śāśvatī

original: na prakāśaḥ prakāśeta sā hi pratyavamarśinī] iti //
analyzed: na prakāśaḥ prakāśeta sā hi pratyavamarśinī iti

original: sā ceyaṃ vāk traividhyena vyavasthitaivāvabhāsate vaikharī madhyamā paśyantīti /
analyzed: sā ca iyam vāc traividhyena vyavasthitā eva avabhāsate vaikharī madhyamā paśyantī iti

original: tatreyaṃ sthānakaraṇaprayatnakramavyajyamānagakārādivarṇasamudāyātmikā yā vāk sā vaikharīty ucyate /
analyzed: tatra iyam sthāna karaṇa prayatna krama vyajyamāna gakāra ādi varṇa samudāya ātmikā yā vāc sā vaikharī iti ucyate

original: vikhara iti dehendriyasaṅghāta ucyate /
analyzed: vikharaḥ iti deha indriya saṅghātaḥ ucyate

original: tatra bhavā vaikharī /
analyzed: tatra bhavā vaikharī

original: tad uktam [sthāneṣu vivṛte vāyau kṛtavarṇaparigrahā /
analyzed: tat uktam sthāneṣu vivṛte vāyau kṛta varṇa parigrahā

original: vaikharī vāk prayokt•ṇāṃ prāṇavṛttinibandhanā] iti //
analyzed: vaikharī vāc prayoktṇām prāṇa vṛtti nibandhanā iti

original: yā punar antaśaṃkalpyamānakramavatī śrotragrāhyavarṇarūpābhivyaktirahitā vāk sā madhyamocyate /
analyzed: yā punar anta śaṃkalpyamāna kramavatī śrotra grāhya varṇa rūpa abhivyakti rahitā vāc sā madhyamā ucyate

original: tad uktam [kevalaṃ buddhyupādānā kramarūpānupātinī /
analyzed: tat uktam kevalam buddhi upādānā krama rūpa anupātinī

original: prāṇavṛttim atikramya madhyamā vāk pravartate] iti //
analyzed: prāṇa vṛttim atikramya madhyamā vāc pravartate iti

original: yā tu grāhyabhedakramādirahitā svaprakāśasaṃvidrūpā vāk sā paśyantīty ucyate /
analyzed: yā tu grāhya bheda krama ādi rahitā sva prakāśa saṃvid rūpā vāc sā paśyantī iti ucyate

original: tad uktam [avibhāgāt tu paśyantī sarvataḥ saṃhṛtakramā /
analyzed: tat uktam avibhāgāt tu paśyantī sarvatas saṃhṛta kramā

original: svarūpajyotir evāntaḥ sūkṣmā vāg anapāyinī] iti //
analyzed: sva rūpa jyotiḥ eva antar sūkṣmā vāc anapāyinī iti

original: tad alam atiprasaktānuprasaktyā /
analyzed: tat alam ati prasakta anuprasaktyā

original: drāghīyasī carceyaṃ prakṛtāntarāyakāriṇīti na pratanyate //
analyzed: drāghīyasī carcā iyam prakṛta antarāya kāriṇī iti na pratanyate

original: iha tv etāvataiva punaḥ prayojanaṃ varṇapadapūrvako vyavahāraḥ na bhavatīti /
analyzed: iha tu etāvatā eva punar prayojanam varṇa pada pūrvakaḥ vyavahāraḥ na bhavati iti

original: vakyena loke vyavahārāt tasya cāvayavāvayavivyavasthānupapatteḥ nirbhāgam eva tat vācakaṃ nirbhāgaś ca tasya vācyo 'rtha iti /
analyzed: vakyena loke vyavahārāt tasya ca avayava avayavi vyavasthā anupapatteḥ nirbhāgam eva tat vācakam nirbhāgaḥ ca tasya vācyaḥ rthaḥ iti

original: avāntaravākyam api prayogayogyaṃ vyavahārakāraṇam iti tan na nihnūyate /
analyzed: avāntaravākyam api prayoga yogyam vyavahāra kāraṇam iti tat na nihnūyate

original: avidyāvastheyaṃ vartate /
analyzed: avidyā avastheyam vartate

original: tatreyaṃ vyavahāravartanī yathādṛśyamānaivāstu /
analyzed: tatra iyam vyavahāra vartanī yathā dṛśyamānā eva astu

original: vidyāyāṃ sarvam evedam asāram iti //
analyzed: vidyāyām sarvam eva idam asāram iti

original: padena tu varṇena vā vyavahārābhāvāt tasya kevalasyāprayogāt tat svarūpam asyām api daśāyāṃ na vāstavam iṣyata iti //
analyzed: padena tu varṇena vā vyavahāra abhāvāt tasya kevalasya a prayogāt tat svarūpam asyām api daśāyām na vāstavam iṣyate iti

original: tasmād ekakramavirahitaḥ kalpitāsadvibhāgaḥ vākyasphoṭo janayati matiṃ tādṛśīṃ svābhidheye /
analyzed: tasmāt eka krama virahitaḥ kalpita asat vibhāgaḥ vākya sphoṭaḥ janayati matim tādṛśīm sva abhidheye

original: varṇās tv ete prakṛtilaghavaḥ kalpanaikapratiṣṭhāḥ tasminn arthe vidadhati dhiyaṃ nety alaṃ tatkathābhiḥ //
analyzed: varṇāḥ tu ete prakṛti laghavaḥ kalpanā eka pratiṣṭhāḥ tasmin arthe vidadhati dhiyam na iti alam tad kathābhiḥ

original: atrābhidhīyate kim ayam anumānamahimnā sphoṭābhyupagamaḥ pratyakṣapratītibalavattayā vā /
analyzed: atra abhidhīyate kim ayam anumāna mahimnā sphoṭa abhyupagamaḥ pratyakṣa pratīti balavat tayā vā

original: na tāvad anumānataḥ sphoṭasvarūpam upapādayituṃ pāryate /
analyzed: na tāvat anumānataḥ sphoṭa svarūpam upapādayitum pāryate

original: paridṛśyamānaviśiṣṭānupūrvīkavarṇakalāpakaraṇena arthapratīter ghaṭamānatvāt //
analyzed: paridṛśyamāna viśiṣṭa ānupūrvīka varṇa kalā apakaraṇena artha pratīteḥ ghaṭamāna tvāt

original: nanu vyastasamastādivikalpair utsāditaṃ varṇānāṃ vācakatvam /
analyzed: nanu vyasta samasta ādi vikalpaiḥ utsāditam varṇānām vācaka tvam

original: naitat durvikalpās te vyastānāṃ tāvad vācakatvaṃ neṣyata eva varṇānām /
analyzed: nā etat durvikalpāḥ te vyastānām tāvat vācaka tvam na iṣyate eva varṇānām

original: samastā eva te vācakāḥ //
analyzed: samastāḥ eva te vācakāḥ

original: yat tu tat sāmastyaṃ nāsti kramabhāvitvād iti /
analyzed: yat tu tat sāmastyam na asti krama bhāvi tvāt iti

original: tad asat kramabhāvinām api samastānāṃ kāryakāriṇāṃ anekaśo darśanāt /
analyzed: tat asat krama bhāvinām api samastānām kārya kāriṇām anekaśas darśanāt

original: yathā yugapadbhāvinaḥ samastās trayo grāvāṇaḥ kāṃ nāsāṃ dhārayanto dṛśyante //
analyzed: yathā yugapad bhāvinaḥ samastāḥ trayaḥ grāvāṇaḥ kām nāsām dhārayantaḥ dṛśyante

original: tathā kramabhāvino 'pi samastā grāsā ekāṃ tṛptim utpādayanto dṛśyante /
analyzed: tathā krama bhāvinaḥ pi samastāḥ grāsāḥ ekām tṛptim utpādayantaḥ dṛśyante

original: ekasminn api hi grāse hīyamāne na bhavati tādṛśī tṛptiḥ /
analyzed: ekasmin api hi grāse hīyamāne na bhavati tādṛśī tṛptiḥ

original: ataḥ samastā eva te grāsāḥ tṛpteḥ kāraṇam /
analyzed: atas samastāḥ eva te grāsāḥ tṛpteḥ kāraṇam

original: na ca samastā api te grāsā yugapat prayoktum śakyāḥ //
analyzed: na ca samastāḥ api te grāsāḥ yugapad prayoktum śakyāḥ

original: tathā ekānuvākagrahaṇe saṃsthānāṃ kramabhāvinīnām api sāmastye sati sāmartyam /
analyzed: tathā eka anuvāka grahaṇe saṃsthānām krama bhāvinīnām api sāmastye sati sāmartyam

original: ekayā saṃsthayā tadāmukhīkaraṇāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: ekayā saṃsthayā tadā mukhīkaraṇa asaṃbhavāt

original: evaṃ tāval loke sāmastyaṃ kramabhāvināṃ dṛṣṭam //
analyzed: evam tāvat loke sāmastyam kramabhāvinām dṛṣṭam

original: vede 'pi [darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ] itītaretarayogaśaṃśinā dvandvena samarpitasāhityānāṃ āgneyādiyogānāṃ pakṣadvaye prayojyatvena cāparihāryakramāṇām ekādhikārasaṃpādakatvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: vede pi darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti itaretara yoga śaṃśinā dvandvena samarpita sāhityānām āgneya ādi yogānām pakṣa dvaye prayojya tvena ca aparihārya kramāṇām eka adhikāra saṃpādaka tvam dṛṣṭam

original: tathā [aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇāti] [āśvinaṃ gṛhṇāti] iti somagrahaṇābhyāsānāṃ samastānāṃ kramabhāvināṃ ca ekapradhānanirvartakatvaṃ dṛṣṭam iti /
analyzed: tathā aindra vāyavam gṛhṇāti āśvinam gṛhṇāti iti soma grahaṇa abhyāsānām samastānām krama bhāvinām ca eka pradhāna nirvartaka tvam dṛṣṭam iti

original: ataś cāyaṃ virodhaḥ sāmastyaṃ kramabhāvitvaṃ ceti //
analyzed: atas ca ayam virodhaḥ sāmastyam krama bhāvi tvam ca iti

original: evaṃ kramavartino 'pi varṇā evārthābhidhāyino bhaviṣyanti //
analyzed: evam varṇāḥ eva artha abhidhāyinaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: nanu grāsasaṃsthādīnāṃ yuktaṃ samastānāṃ kramabhāvitvam /
analyzed: nanu grāsa saṃsthā ādīnām yuktam samastānām krama bhāvi tvam

original: yataḥ kāryam api tadīyaṃ tṛptyādi krameṇa nirvartyamānaṃ dṛśate /
analyzed: yatas kāryam api tadīyam tṛpti ādi krameṇa nirvartyamānam dṛśate

original: varṇebhyas tu krameṇa śrūyamāṇebhyaḥ na yāvatī tāvatī arthāvagatimātrā nirvartyamānā dṛśyate //
analyzed: varṇebhyaḥ tu krameṇa śrūyamāṇebhyaḥ na yāvatī tāvatī artha avagati mātrā nirvartyamānā dṛśyate

original: yady evam āgneyādibhyas tarhi krameṇa nirvartyamānaṃ kiṃ kāryam upalabhyate avāntarāpūrvam iti brūmaḥ śabdaprāmāṇyāt /
analyzed: yadi evam āgneya ādibhyaḥ tarhi krameṇa nirvartyamānam kim kāryam upalabhyate avāntara apūrvam iti brūmaḥ śabda prāmāṇyāt

original: paramāpūrvanirvṛttis tu teṣāṃ sāmastye sati sestatīti ucyate /
analyzed: parama apūrva nirvṛttiḥ tu teṣām sāmastye sati ucyate

original: avāntarāpūrvanirvṛttāv idānīṃ kramabhāvinām āgneyāvayavabhūtakriyākṣaṇānāṃ kim avāntaraṃ kāryaṃ kā vā tasya nirvṛttir upalabhyate /
analyzed: avāntara apūrva nirvṛttau idānīm krama bhāvinām āgneya avayava bhūta kriyā kṣaṇānām kim avāntaram kāryam kā vā tasya nirvṛttiḥ upalabhyate

original: api ca yathābhimataṃ yat kāryaṃ tadabhisandhānena pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: api ca yathā abhimatam yat kāryam tad abhisandhānena pravṛttiḥ

original: tat sāmastyāt pūrvaṃ na kvacid upalabhyate /
analyzed: tat sāmastyāt pūrvam na kvacid upalabhyate

original: na hy avāntarāpūrveṇa svargamātrā kācid abhinirvartyate śāstrārthasya tadānīm aniṣpannatvāt /
analyzed: na hi avāntarāpūrveṇa svarga mātrā kācid abhinirvartyate śāstra arthasya tadānīm a niṣpanna tvāt

original: ataḥ kim avāntarāpūrveṇa kṛtenāpi /
analyzed: atas kim avāntarāpūrveṇa kṛtena api

original: yat kiṃcit tv avāntarāpūrvaprāyaṃ kāryaṃ varṇeṣv api na na darśayituṃ śakyate /
analyzed: yat kiṃcid tu avāntara apūrva prāyam kāryam varṇeṣu api na na darśayitum śakyate

original: kiṃ tad iti cet svarūpagrahaṇaṃ saṃskāro vā bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: kim tat iti ced sva rūpa grahaṇam saṃskāraḥ vā bhaviṣyati

original: tayoḥ pradhānakāryāvayavatvaṃ nāstīti cet mā bhūd avayavatvam tadupayogitā tu vidyata eva /
analyzed: tayoḥ pradhāna kārya avayava tvam na asti iti ced mā bhūt avayava tvam tad upayogi tā tu vidyate eva

original: avayavāvayavivyavahāras tu avāntaraparamāpūrvayor api durupapādaḥ /
analyzed: avayava avayavi vyavahāraḥ tu avāntara parama apūrvayoḥ api durupapādaḥ

original: padānāṃ tu vākyārthapratipattilakṣaṇapradhānakāryāvayavabhūtapadārthajñānākhyakāryanirvartakatvam atispaṣṭam asty eveti na teṣv eṣa doṣaḥ prāduṣyāt //
analyzed: padānām tu vākya artha pratipatti lakṣaṇa pradhāna kārya avayava bhūta padārtha jñāna ākhya kārya nirvartaka tvam ati spaṣṭam asti eva iti na teṣu eṣa doṣaḥ prāduṣyāt

original: varṇānām api gamanakriyākṣaṇānām iva grāmaprāptau grāsānām iva tṛptau saṃsthānām ivāmukhīkaraṇe yady api kramopacīyamānatatkāryamātrasamutmeṣo nāsti tathāpi tadaupayikasyopalabdhisaṃskārādikāryasya karaṇāt tatkāryāvayavas tāvat kṛto bhavatīti na samastānāṃ kramakāritvam apahīyate /
analyzed: varṇānām api gamana kriyā kṣaṇānām iva grāma prāptau grāsānām iva tṛptau saṃsthānām iva a mukhīkaraṇe yadi api krama upacīyamāna tad kārya mātra samutmeṣaḥ na asti tathā api tad aupayikasya upalabdhi saṃskāra ādi kāryasya karaṇāt tad kārya avayavaḥ tāvat kṛtaḥ bhavati iti na samastānām krama kāri tvam apahīyate

original: tatra pūrve varṇā atītā apy upakariṣyanti caramavarṇas tu vartamāna itīdṛśa evāyaṃ kālpanikaḥ kriyākṣaṇasamūha iva varṇasamūho 'rthapratyāyakaḥ //
analyzed: tatra pūrve varṇāḥ atītāḥ api upakariṣyanti carama varṇaḥ tu vartamānaḥ iti īdṛśaḥ eva ayam kālpanikaḥ kriyā kṣaṇa samūhaḥ iva varṇa samūhaḥ rtha pratyāyakaḥ

original: atha vā kramopalabdheṣv api varṇeṣu mānasam anuvyavasāyarūpam akhilavarṇaviṣayaṃ saṃkalanājñānaṃ yad upajāyate tat arthapratyāyanāṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: atha vā krama upalabdheṣu api varṇeṣu mānasam anuvyavasāya rūpam akhila varṇa viṣayam saṃkalanā jñānam yat upajāyate tat artha pratyāyana aṅgam bhaviṣyati

original: dṛśyate ca vinaśvareṣv api padārthāntareṣu kramānubhūteṣu yugapad anuvyavasāyo mānasaḥ [śatam āmrāṇi bhakṣitavān devadattaḥ] iti /
analyzed: dṛśyate ca vinaśvareṣu api padārtha antareṣu krama anubhūteṣu yugapad anuvyavasāyaḥ mānasaḥ śatam āmrāṇi bhakṣitavān devadattaḥ iti

original: na cāyaṃ pratyayo nāsti sandigdhaḥ bodhyate vā /
analyzed: na ca ayam pratyayaḥ na asti sandigdhaḥ bodhyate vā

original: anabhyupagamyamāne cedṛśī samuccayajñāne tannibandhanā bhūyāṃso vyavahārā utsīdeyuḥ //
analyzed: an abhyupagamyamāne ca īdṛśī samuccaya jñāne tad nibandhanāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ vyavahārāḥ utsīdeyuḥ

original: sa cāyaṃ saṃkalanāpratyayaḥ smaryamāṇānubhūyamānaprāktanāntyavarṇaviṣayatayā sadasadvarṇagocaraś citrarūpa upeyate /
analyzed: sa ca ayam saṃkalanā pratyayaḥ smaryamāṇa anubhūyamāna prāktana antya varṇa viṣaya tayā sat asat varṇa gocaraḥ citra rūpaḥ upeyate

original: yadi vāntyavarṇe tirohite bhavan asadvarṇagocara eva citrākāraḥ so 'rthapratītihetur eka eveti niravakāśā vyastasamastavikalpāḥ //
analyzed: yadi vā antya varṇe tirohite bhavan asat varṇa gocaraḥ eva citra ākāraḥ saḥ ṛtha pratīti hetuḥ ekaḥ eva iti niravakāśāḥ vyasta samasta vikalpāḥ

original: nanu saṃkalanāpratyaye 'pi yadi te varṇāḥ krameṇāvabhāsante tad asāv api pūrvotpannnaikaikavarṇabuddhinirviśeṣa eva syād iti tadupārūḍhā api varṇā nārthapratītihetavo bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: nanu saṃkalanā pratyaye yadi te varṇāḥ krameṇa avabhāsante tat asau api pūrva utpanna ekaika varṇa buddhi nirviśeṣaḥ eva syāt iti tad upārūḍhāḥ api varṇāḥ na artha pratīti hetavaḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: yadi tv ekasumanastabakākāravatī sa pratyayaḥ tadā tasminn kramānavagamāt viparītakramā api te varṇā arthapratītikāriṇaḥ syuḥ /
analyzed: yadi tu eka sumana stabaka ākāravatī sa pratyayaḥ tadā tasmin krama anavagamāt viparīta kramāḥ api te varṇāḥ artha pratīti kāriṇaḥ syuḥ

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: viśiṣṭānupūrvīkavarṇamālā 'nubhavasamanantarabhāvī hi saṃkalanāpratyayo 'rthapratīter hetuḥ na stabakākāraparicchedamātram /
analyzed: viśiṣṭa ānupūrvīka varṇa mālā anubhava samanantara bhāvī hi saṃkalanā pratyayaḥ rtha pratīteḥ hetuḥ na stabaka ākāra pariccheda mātram

original: viparītakramāśaṅkanaṃ ca tadānīṃ kutastyam /
analyzed: viparīta krama āśaṅkanam ca tadānīm kutastyam

original: stabakāvabhāse tāvat krama eva nāsti /
analyzed: stabaka avabhāse tāvat kramaḥ eva na asti

original: kasya vaiparītyam avaiparītyaṃ vā yadanantarajanmā 'yaṃ samuccayapratyayaḥ /
analyzed: kasya vaiparītyam avaiparītyam vā yad anantara janmā yam samuccaya pratyayaḥ

original: tāś ca viśiṣṭakramāvabhāsinya eva pūrvabhāvinyo varṇabuddhaya iti kuto vaiparītyavikalpaḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ ca viśiṣṭa krama avabhāsinyaḥ eva pūrva bhāvinyaḥ varṇa buddhayaḥ iti kutas vaiparītya vikalpaḥ

original: tasmāt prathamaparipaṭhananiyatānupūrvīkās te tadanantarabhāvisamastāvabhāsisaṃkalanāpratyayopārūḍhā varṇā arthapratītikāriṇaḥ syur iti na doṣaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt prathama paripaṭhana niyata ānupūrvīkāḥ te tad anantara bhāvi samasta avabhāsi saṃkalanā pratyaya upārūḍhāḥ varṇāḥ artha pratīti kāriṇaḥ syuḥ iti na doṣaḥ

original: yahtā vā pūrvārṇajanitasaṃskārasahito 'ntyavarṇa iti tatrabhavatā mīmāṃsābhāṣyakṛtāvarṇitaṃ tathā varṇānām arthapratyāyakatvam astu //
analyzed: vā pūrva arṇa janita saṃskāra sahitaḥ ntya varṇaḥ iti tatrabhavatā mīmāṃsā bhāṣya kṛtā varṇitam tathā varṇānām artha pratyāyaka tvam astu

original: nanu atroktaṃ saṃskārasyārthapratītijanakatvaṃ na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ smṛtāv eva tasya vyāpāra iti /
analyzed: nanu atra uktam saṃskārasya artha pratīti janaka tvam na dṛṣṭa pūrvam smṛtau eva tasya vyāpāraḥ iti

original: kim iyaṃ rājājñā /
analyzed: kim iyam rāja ājñā

original: smṛtir eva saṃskāreṇa kartavyeti //
analyzed: smṛtiḥ eva saṃskāreṇa kartavyā iti

original: neyaṃ rājājñā nayājñā tv eṣā /
analyzed: na iyam rāja ājñā na ya ājñā tu eṣā

original: na hi saṃskāro nāma svatantraḥ ko 'pi dharmī /
analyzed: na hi saṃskāraḥ nāma svatantraḥ kaḥ pi dharmī

original: kin tu paṭvabhyāsādarapratyayagṛhīteṣv artheṣu yat ātmanaḥ smaraṇakāraṇaṃ sa saṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: kin tu paṭu abhyāsa ādara pratyaya gṛhīteṣu artheṣu yat ātmanaḥ smaraṇa kāraṇam sa saṃskāraḥ

original: sā ca smṛtyaiva kāryeṇa kalpyamānā śaktiḥ /
analyzed: sā ca smṛtyā eva kāryeṇa kalpyamānā śaktiḥ

original: na ca śaktirūpasya saṃskārasya śaktyantaram arthapratītijanmani saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na ca śakti rūpasya saṃskārasya śakti antaram artha pratīti janmani saṃbhavati

original: yenaiva kāryeṇa sā śaktiḥ kalpitā tad upahāya kiṃ kāryāntaraṃ kuryāt smaraṇahetoś ca saṃskārasya prasavakāraṇatanubhavaḥ /
analyzed: yena eva kāryeṇa sā śaktiḥ kalpitā tat upahāya kim kārya antaram kuryāt smaraṇa hetoḥ ca saṃskārasya prasava kāraṇa tanu bhavaḥ

original: anubhavahetos tv asya nūtanacaritasya saṃskārasya janmanimittam eva notpaśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: anubhava hetoḥ tu asya nūtana caritasya saṃskārasya janma nimittam eva nā utpaśyāmaḥ

original: tasmān nāsāv arthapratītihetur bhavati //
analyzed: tasmāt na asau artha pratīti hetuḥ bhavati

original: naitat sāram varṇānubhavasaṃskṛtamateḥ puṃsaḥ arthapratītidarśanāt /
analyzed: na etat sāram varṇa anubhava saṃskṛta mateḥ puṃsaḥ artha pratīti darśanāt

original: na hi smaraṇaśaktiḥ saṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: na hi smaraṇa śaktiḥ saṃskāraḥ

original: kin tv ātmaguṇo vāsanākhyaḥ /
analyzed: kin tu ātma guṇaḥ vāsanā ākhyaḥ

original: sa ca smṛtim ivārthapratītim api janayitum utsahe /
analyzed: sa ca smṛtim iva artha pratītim api janayitum utsahe

original: sarvatra no darśanaṃ pramāṇam /
analyzed: sarvatra naḥ darśanam pramāṇam

original: smaraṇajananakauśalam api tasya tathā darśanād avagamyate /
analyzed: smaraṇa janana kauśalam api tasya tathā darśanāt avagamyate

original: tad idam anubhavajananam api tato dṛśyata eva /
analyzed: tat idam anubhava jananam api tatas dṛśyate eva

original: varṇāś ca tadanubhavāś ca vyatītāḥ anyac ca śabdatattvaṃ nānubhūyata iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: varṇāḥ ca tad anubhavāḥ ca vyatītāḥ anyat ca śabda tattvam na anubhūyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: asti cārthapratītiḥ /
analyzed: asti ca artha pratītiḥ

original: nāsau niṣkaraṇikā syāt /
analyzed: na asau niṣkaraṇikā syāt

original: karaṇavyatirekeṇa hi sānudbhavantī karaṇam ākṣipati /
analyzed: karaṇa vyatirekeṇa hi sā an udbhavantī karaṇam ākṣipati

original: yad asyāḥ karaṇaṃ sa saṃskāra iti smṛtir ivārthapratītir api tatkāryatvāt tad anumāpikā bhavaty eva //
analyzed: yat asyāḥ karaṇam sa saṃskāraḥ iti smṛtiḥ iva artha pratītiḥ api tad kārya tvāt tat anumāpikā bhavati eva

original: yat tu kutas tādṛśaḥ saṃskāra udetīti jaḍapraśno 'yam anubhavahetukasya suprasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: yat tu kutas tādṛśaḥ saṃskāraḥ udeti iti jaḍa praśnaḥ yam anubhava hetukasya su prasiddha tvāt

original: tathā cāhuḥ [vastudharmo hy eṣaḥ yad anubhavaḥ paṭīyān smṛtibījam ādhatte] iti //
analyzed: tathā ca āhuḥ vastu dharmaḥ hi eṣaḥ yat anubhavaḥ paṭīyān smṛti bījam ādhatte iti

original: nanu smṛtibījam iti yad ucyate tat katham anubhavabījaṃ syāt /
analyzed: nanu smṛti bījam iti yat ucyate tat katham anubhava bījam syāt

original: naiṣa niyamaḥ smṛter eva bījam iti /
analyzed: na eṣa niyamaḥ smṛteḥ eva bījam iti

original: anubhavas tāvat tathāvidham ātmadharmam ādhatte /
analyzed: anubhavaḥ tāvat tathāvidham ātma dharmam ādhatte

original: sa kāryabhedo 'pi notpattau kāraṇāntaraṃ mṛgayate /
analyzed: sa kārya bhedaḥ u pi na utpattau kāraṇa antaram mṛgayate

original: kāryabhedaś cāsya tathā daśainād avagamyata ity uktam //
analyzed: kārya bhedaḥ ca asya tathā daśa enāt avagamyate iti uktam

original: atha vā kim anena nirbandhena /
analyzed: atha vā kim anena nirbandhena

original: na sākṣād arthapratītikārī saṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: na sākṣāt artha pratīti kārī saṃskāraḥ

original: smṛtidvāreṇa tāṃ kariṣyati /
analyzed: smṛti dvāreṇa tām kariṣyati

original: pūrvavarṇeṣv saṃskārāt smaraṇam antyavarṇe śrotrendriyād anubhava ity evaṃ smaryamāṇānubhūyamānavarṇakaraṇako 'rthapratyayaḥ syāt /
analyzed: pūrva varṇeṣu saṃskārāt smaraṇam antya varṇe śrotra indriyāt anubhavaḥ iti evam smaryamāṇa anubhūyamāna varṇa karaṇakaḥ rtha pratyayaḥ syāt

original: ko doṣaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ doṣaḥ

original: nanu anubhavakramāhitasaṃskārasāmarthyam anurudhyamānāḥ smṛtayo 'pi krameṇotpattum arhanti na yugapad iti /
analyzed: nanu anubhava krama āhita saṃskāra sāmarthyam anurudhyamānāḥ smṛtayaḥ pi krameṇa utpattum arhanti na yugapad iti

original: tataś ca prāktana eva doṣaḥ sāmastyābhāvād iti /
analyzed: tatas ca prāktanaḥ eva doṣaḥ sāmastya abhāvāt iti

original: naiṣa doṣaḥ /
analyzed: na eṣa doṣaḥ

original: nānāvarṇaviṣayaiḥ kramabhāvibhir anubhavaiḥ kramopaceyātmā puṭapākair iva kārtasvarasya eka evātmanaḥ saṃskāra tādṛg upādhīyate yena sarvān eva pūrvadṛṣṭān varṇān asau sakṛt smaratīti //
analyzed: nānā varṇa viṣayaiḥ krama bhāvibhiḥ anubhavaiḥ krama upaceya ātmā puṭapākaiḥ iva kārtasvarasya ekaḥ eva ātmanaḥ tādṛś upādhīyate yena sarvān eva pūrva dṛṣṭān varṇān asau sakṛt smarati iti

original: saṃskārāt saṃskārotpattir alaukikīti cet nālaukikī svādhyāyādhyayane siddhatvāt /
analyzed: saṃskārāt saṃskāra utpattiḥ alaukikī iti ced na alaukikī svādhyāya adhyayane siddha tvāt

original: uccāraṇakriyāyāḥ kṣaṇikatvāt tadāhite saṃskārāntarakāriṇi saṃskāre'niṣyamāṇe 'ntyam uccāraṇaṃ prathamoccāraṇān na viśiṣyeteti /
analyzed: uccāraṇa kriyāyāḥ kṣaṇika tvāt tad āhite saṃskāra antara kāriṇi ntyam uccāraṇam prathama uccāraṇāt na viśiṣyeta iti

original: tataḥ kim /
analyzed: tatas kim

original: puruṣāyuṣeṇāpi nānuvāka evāmukhīkriyeta //
analyzed: puruṣa āyuṣeṇa api na anuvākaḥ eva ā mukhīkriyeta

original: nanu ayam īdṛśaḥ prakāraḥ ekasmaraṇasiddhaye kalpanīyaḥ arthapratītihetutā vā saṃskārasya kalpanīyeti sarvathā ceyam adṛṣṭakalpanā /
analyzed: nanu ayam īdṛśaḥ prakāraḥ eka smaraṇa siddhaye kalpanīyaḥ artha pratīti hetu tā vā saṃskārasya kalpanīyā iti sarvathā ca iyam adṛṣṭa kalpanā

original: ato na paśyāmahe tatra kaḥ saṃskāraṃ prati pakṣapātaḥ /
analyzed: atas na paśyāmahe tatra kaḥ saṃskāram prati pakṣapātaḥ

original: kaś ca sphoṭaṃ prati vidveṣaḥ yad eṣa kalpyate naiṣa iti /
analyzed: kaḥ ca sphoṭam prati vidveṣaḥ yat eṣa kalpyate na eṣaḥ iti

original: uktam atra tenaiva sugṛhītanāmnā bhāṣyakāreṇa śabdakalpanāyāṃ sā ca śabdakalpanā ca iti //
analyzed: uktam atra tena eva su gṛhīta nāmnā bhāṣyakāreṇa śabda kalpanāyām sā ca śabda kalpanā ca iti

original: nanu nāsti kalpanādvaigṇyam /
analyzed: nanu nā asti kalpanāt vaigṇyam

original: saṃskāro hi yathāprasiddhi sthita eva /
analyzed: saṃskāraḥ hi yathāprasiddhi sthitaḥ eva

original: kā tatra kalpanā /
analyzed: kā tatra kalpanā

original: na hi vayaṃ smaraṇaikakāraṇatvaṃ saṃskāradharmam atilaṅghitavantaḥ bhavanta iva //
analyzed: na hi vayam smaraṇa eka kāraṇa tvam saṃskāra dharmam atilaṅghitavantaḥ bhavantaḥ iva

original: kathaṃ na laṅghitavanto bhavantaḥ /
analyzed: katham na laṅghitavantaḥ bhavantaḥ

original: sarvavarṇaviṣayaikasmaraṇakāritā bhavadbhir api kalpitaiva /
analyzed: sarva varṇa viṣaya eka smaraṇa kāri tā bhavadbhiḥ api kalpitā eva

original: yaiva hi vartanī varṇānām arthapratītau saiva sphoṭavyaktāv api /
analyzed: yā eva hi vartanī varṇānām artha pratītau sā eva sphoṭa vyaktau api

original: tāṃ ca kalpayitvā śabdo 'nyaḥ kalpita evam /
analyzed: tām ca kalpayitvā śabdaḥ nyaḥ kalpitaḥ evam

original: ataś ca saṃskārasyobhayavādividitasya smaraṇakāritvam ullaṅghya arthapratiyayakāritvaṃ kevalam asmābhir abhihitam /
analyzed: atas ca saṃskārasya ubhaya vādi viditasya smaraṇa kāri tvam ullaṅghya artha pratiyaya kāri tvam kevalam asmābhiḥ abhihitam

original: bhavadbhis tu mūlata evārabhyābhinavaṃ viśvam utthāpitam /
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ tu mūlataḥ evā ārabhya abhinavam viśvam utthāpitam

original: apūrvasya śabdasya tāvad astitvaṃ punar varṇavyatiriktatvaṃ punar avayavaśahityaṃ kalpitam iti kathaṃ na kalpanāgurutvam /
analyzed: apūrvasya śabdasya tāvat astitvam punar varṇa vyatirikta tvam punar avayava śahityam kalpitam iti katham na kalpanā guru tvam

original: tad uktam  [sadbhāvavyatirekau ca tathāvayavavarjanam /
analyzed: tat uktam sadbhāva vyatirekau ca tathā avayava varjanam

original: tavādhikaṃ bhavet tasmāt yatno 'sāv arthabuddhiṣu] iti //
analyzed: tava adhikam bhavet tasmāt artha buddhiṣu iti

original: yat punar avādi prathamavarṇabuddhivelāyām eva vyaktaṃ sphoṭatattvaṃ uttarottarabuddhibhir atiśayitatarapratyayaviṣayatāṃ nīyate ratnatattvavad iti sa eṣa viṣama upanyāsaḥ /
analyzed: yat punar avādi prathama varṇa buddhi velāyām eva vyaktam sphoṭa tattvam uttara uttara buddhibhiḥ atiśayitatara pratyaya viṣaya tām nīyate ratna tattva vat iti saḥ eṣa viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ

original: ratnasya hi sāvayavatvāt prathamapratyayāviṣayīkṛtasūkṣmatarāvayavaviśeṣagrāhiṇāṃ uttarottarapratyayānām asti tatrāvakāśaḥ /
analyzed: ratnasya hi sāvayava tvāt prathama pratyaya a viṣayīkṛta sūkṣmatara avayava viśeṣa grāhiṇām uttara uttara pratyayānām asti tatra avakāśaḥ

original: sphoṭas tu varṇasvarūpavad anaṃśa iti tatsvarūpasarvasvam ādyenaiva varṇena vyaktam /
analyzed: sphoṭaḥ tu varṇa sva rūpa vat an aṃśaḥ iti tad sva rūpa sarva svam ādyena eva varṇena vyaktam

original: kim idānīm anye varṇāḥ kariṣyanti /
analyzed: kim idānīm anye varṇāḥ kariṣyanti

original: ekadeśavyaktis tu niravayavasya varṇasyeva na saṃbhavati /
analyzed: eka deśa vyaktiḥ tu niravayavasya varṇasya iva na saṃbhavati

original: yathoktam [alpīyasā 'pi yatnena śabdam uccāritaṃ matiḥ /
analyzed: yathā uktam alpīyasā pi yatnena śabdam uccāritam matiḥ

original: yadi vā naiva gṛhṇāti varṇaṃ vā sakalaṃ sphuṭam] iti //
analyzed: yadi vā nā eva gṛhṇāti varṇam vā sakalam sphuṭam iti

original: yo 'pi dvitīyo dṛṣṭānta udāhāri yathā anuvākaḥ śloko vā thamasaṃsthayā[?] gṛhīto 'pi saṃsthāntarābhyāsaiḥ sphuṭataraṃ paricchinno bhavati tathā sphoṭo 'pi prathamavarṇāntarair atiśayitābhivyaktiḥ bhaviṣyatīti so 'pi na sadṛśo dṛṣṭāntaḥ ślokānuvākayor anaṃśatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāhāri yathā anuvākaḥ ślokaḥ vā saṃsthā antara abhyāsaiḥ sphuṭataram paricchinnaḥ bhavati tathā sphoṭaḥ pi prathama varṇa antaraiḥ atiśayita abhivyaktiḥ bhaviṣyati iti saḥ u pi na sadṛśaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ śloka anuvākayoḥ an aṃśa tva anupapatteḥ

original: kecid avayavā varṇātmanaḥ padātmano vā prathamāyāṃ buddhāv aparisphurantaḥ saṃsthābhyāsalabdhātiśayāyāṃ tasyāṃ prakaṭībhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: kecid avayavāḥ varṇa ātmanaḥ pada ātmanaḥ vā prathamāyām buddhau a parisphurantaḥ saṃsthā abhyāsa labdha atiśayāyām tasyām prakaṭībhaviṣyanti

original: sphoṭas tu ekavarṇa iva niraṃśa iti tatra ko buddher atiśayayogaḥ tasmād ayam api na saṃgato dṛṣṭāntaḥ //
analyzed: sphoṭaḥ tu eka varṇaḥ iva niraṃśaḥ iti tatra kaḥ buddheḥ atiśaya yogaḥ tasmāt ayam api na saṃgataḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: ye 'pi ca manvate dhvanivyaṅgyatvāt sphoṭasya na tatra varṇavikalpāvasara iti /
analyzed: ye pi ca manvate dhvani vyaṅgya tvāt sphoṭasya na tatra varṇa vikalpa avasaraḥ iti

original: te 'pi na samyag darśinaḥ /
analyzed: te pi na samyak darśinaḥ

original: parāṇūdya varṇapratītiṃ dhvanibhyaḥ śabdapratīter anutpādāt /
analyzed: parāṇūdya varṇa pratītim dhvanibhyaḥ śabda pratīteḥ anutpādāt

original: atidrutocci cārayiṣayā 'nupalabhyamānavarṇavibhāgāc ca śabdād arthapratyayābhāvāt //
analyzed: cārayiṣayā n upalabhyamāna varṇa vibhāgāt ca śabdāt artha pratyaya abhāvāt

original: atha dhvanayaḥ śabdavyaktim ādadhānāḥ sthānakaraṇānurodhenāsatyam eva varṇabhedam upadarśayanti śyāmādirūpam iva mukhasya khaṅgādṛya ity ucyate tad apy asat /
analyzed: atha dhvanayaḥ śabda vyaktim ādadhānāḥ sthāna karaṇa anurodhena asatyam eva varṇa bhedam upadarśayanti śyāma ādi rūpam iva mukhasya iti ucyate tat api asat

original: asatyatve nimittābhāvāt /
analyzed: asatya tve nimitta abhāvāt

original: pratīyante hi nirbādhayā buddhyā varṇāḥ /
analyzed: pratīyante hi nirbādhayā buddhyā varṇāḥ

original: tad atiriktas tu śabdo na pratīyate /
analyzed: tad atiriktaḥ tu śabdaḥ na pratīyate

original: yaś ca na pratīyate so 'sti ye ca pratīyante te na santīty ucyamāne śaśo nāsti visāṇam astīti syāt /
analyzed: yaḥ ca na pratīyate saḥ sti ye ca pratīyante te na santi iti ucyamāne śaśaḥ na asti visāṇam asti iti syāt

original: tasmād ayam api na kalpanāgauravaparihārakṣamaḥ panthāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ayam api na kalpanā gaurava parihāra kṣamaḥ panthāḥ

original: ataḥ suṣṭūktaṃ [śabdakalpanāyāṃ sā ca śabdakalpanā ca] iti //
analyzed: atas suṣṭu uktam śabda kalpanāyām sā ca śabda kalpanā ca iti

original: tasmāt sphoṭapratipattau yaḥ krama āstheyaḥ saḥ arthapratītāv evāsthīyatām iti kiṃ tena sphoṭena //
analyzed: tasmāt sphoṭa pratipattau yaḥ kramaḥ āstheyaḥ saḥ artha pratītau eva āsthīyatām iti kim tena sphoṭena

original: anye tu upalabdhyanantarasattākānāṃ varṇānām arthapratyāyakatvam ācakṣate tad iha neṣyate kṣaṇikatvād varṇānāṃ upalabdher ūrdhvaṃ sattānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: anye tu upalabdhi anantara sattākānām varṇānām artha pratyāyaka tvam ācakṣate tat iha na iṣyate kṣaṇika tvāt varṇānām upalabdheḥ ūrdhvam sattā anupapatteḥ

original: sarvathā vyutpattyanusāreṇa varṇānām arthapratyāyakatvaṃ tad yathā purā dṛṣṭaṃ tathā ' bhyupagamyata iti /
analyzed: sarvathā vyutpatti anusāreṇa varṇānām artha pratyāyaka tvam tat yathā purā dṛṣṭam tathā bhyupagamyate iti

original: tad uktaṃ [yāvanto yādṛśāḥ] iti //
analyzed: tat uktam yāvantaḥ yādṛśāḥ iti

original: yat tv atra pratīpam uktaṃ [kiyantaḥ kīdṛśāḥ] iti tatra pratītayaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ na tapasvino vayam iti yat kiṃcid etat //
analyzed: yat tu atra pratīpam uktam kiyantaḥ kīdṛśāḥ iti tatra pratītayaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ na tapasvinaḥ vayam iti yat kiṃcid etat

original: yat punar abhyadhāyi kramavyatyāsaprayuktā api varṇā pratyāyakā bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: yat punar abhyadhāyi krama vyatyāsa prayuktāḥ api varṇāḥ pratyāyakāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: krama eva vā sphoṭaḥ syāt iti tad api na peśalam /
analyzed: kramaḥ eva vā sphoṭaḥ syāt iti tat api na peśalam

original: kramo hi nāma kālabhedaḥ /
analyzed: kramaḥ hi nāma kāla bhedaḥ

original: na ca kāla eva sphoṭo bhavitum arhati //
analyzed: na ca kāle eva sphoṭaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: kramo 'pi ca na svatantraḥ pratipādakaḥ padārthāntaravṛttir vā kin tu varṇāśrita eva /
analyzed: kramaḥ pi ca na svatantraḥ pratipādakaḥ padārtha antara vṛttiḥ vā kin tu varṇa āśritaḥ eva

original: tatra coktam dvaye saty api tenātra vijñeyo 'rthasya vācakaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca uktam dvaye sati api tena atra vijñeyaḥ rthasya vācakaḥ

original: varṇāḥ kin nu kramopetāḥ kin na varṇāśrayaḥ kramaḥ //
analyzed: varṇāḥ kim nu krama upetāḥ kim na varṇa āśrayaḥ kramaḥ

original: kramaḥ kramavatām aṅgam iti kiṃ yuktisādhyatā /
analyzed: kramaḥ kramavatām aṅgam iti kim yukti sādhya tā

original: dharmamātram asau teṣāṃ na vastvantaram iṣyate //
analyzed: dharma mātram asau teṣām na vastu antaram iṣyate

original: tasmāt ye yāvat kramakā yam arthaṃ pratyāyanto dṛṣṭā varṇāḥ te tatkramakā varṇās tam arthaṃ pratyāyayiṣyantīti na sphoṭād arthāvagatiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ye yāvat kramakāḥ yam artham pratyāyantaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ varṇāḥ te tad kramakāḥ varṇāḥ tam artham pratyāyayiṣyanti iti na sphoṭāt artha avagatiḥ

original: tad evaṃ kāryānumānaṃ arthāpattir vā na sphoṭasiddhaye prabhavatīti siddham //
analyzed: tat evam kārya anumānam arthāpattiḥ vā na sphoṭa siddhaye prabhavati iti siddham

original: yad apy abhāṇi [śabdād arthaṃ pratipadyāmahe] iti vyavahāraḥ sphoṭapakṣasākṣitām ālambata iti tad api asāram /
analyzed: yat api śabdāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti vyavahāraḥ sphoṭa pakṣa sākṣi tām ālambate iti tat api asāram

original: varṇānāṃ vācakatve yathoktanītyā sādhite tatpakṣe 'pi tathā vyavahāropapatteḥ //
analyzed: varṇānām vācaka tve yathā ukta nītyā sādhite tad pakṣe tathā vyavahāra upapatteḥ

original: nanu katham upapattiḥ /
analyzed: nanu katham upapattiḥ

original: saṃskāras tāvat na śabdaśabdenocyate /
analyzed: saṃskāraḥ tāvat na śabda śabdena ucyate

original: na hi tathā loke prasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: na hi tathā loke prasiddhiḥ

original: saṃskāre ca vācake vyutpattir api durupapādā /
analyzed: saṃskāre ca vācake vyutpattiḥ api durupapādā

original: parāvagatipūrvikā hi śabdāt svāvagatiḥ /
analyzed: para avagati pūrvikā hi śabdāt sva avagatiḥ

original: na ca parasthaḥ saṃskāraḥ parasya pratītim upajanayan grahītuṃ śakyaḥ parokṣatvāt //
analyzed: na ca para sthaḥ saṃskāraḥ parasya pratītim upajanayan grahītum śakyaḥ parokṣa tvāt

original: varṇeṣv api śabdaśabdo vartamānaḥ prativarṇaṃ vā varteta varṇasamudāye vā prativarṇaṃ vartamāne ca śabdaśabde na śabdād arthapratipattiḥ syāt ekasya varṇasya vācakatvāyogāt /
analyzed: varṇeṣu api śabda śabdaḥ vartamānaḥ prativarṇam vā varteta varṇa samudāye vā prativarṇam vartamāne ca śabda śabde na śabdāt artha pratipattiḥ syāt ekasya varṇasya vācaka tva ayogāt

original: samudāye tu na vartitum arhati śabdaśabdaḥ jātiśabdatvāt /
analyzed: samudāye tu na vartitum arhati śabda śabdaḥ jāti śabda tvāt

original: dvivacanabahuvacanāntavyaktiśabdaprayoge hi tasmāt sāmānādhikaraṇyena na jātiśabda ekavacanāntaḥ prayujyate /
analyzed: dvivacana bahuvacana anta vyakti śabda prayoge hi tasmāt sāmānādhikaraṇyena na jāti śabdaḥ ekavacana antaḥ prayujyate

original: na hi bhavati [devadattayajñadattau puruṣaḥ] iti [dhavakhadirapalāśā vṛkṣaḥ] iti tathā [gakāraukāravisarjanīyāḥ śabdaḥ] ity api na /
analyzed: na hi bhavati devadatta yajñadattau puruṣaḥ iti dhava khadira palāśāḥ vṛkṣaḥ iti tathā gakāra aukāra visarjanīyāḥ śabdaḥ iti api na

original: [vanaṃ vṛkṣāḥ] iti vanaśabdavat tarhi samudāyavācī bhaviṣyati śabdaśabdaḥ na jātiśabdavat iti cet na /
analyzed: vanam vṛkṣāḥ iti vana śabda vat tarhi samudāya vācī bhaviṣyati śabda śabdaḥ na jāti śabda vat iti ced na

original: tatra samudāyavyatirekanirdeśadarśanāt [āmrāṇāṃ vanam] [kapitthānāṃ vanam] iti. na caivam iha vyatirekanirdeśo 'sti [gakārādīnāṃ śabdaḥ] ity adarśanāt //
analyzed: tatra samudāya vyatireka nirdeśa darśanāt āmrāṇām vanam kapitthānām vanam iti na ca evam iha vyatireka nirdeśaḥ u sti gakāra ādīnām śabdaḥ iti adarśanāt

original: atha brūyāt [āmrādayo vanam] ity abhedenāpi vanaśabdaḥ prayujyate /
analyzed: atha brūyāt āmra ādayaḥ vanam iti abhedena api vana śabdaḥ prayujyate

original: tatheha [gakārādayaḥ śabdaḥ] iti prayokṣyate /
analyzed: tathā iha gakāra ādayaḥ śabdaḥ iti prayokṣyate

original: etad api nāsti /
analyzed: etat api na asti

original: vanādau  bhedavyapadeśavaśena prativyakti cāprayoge siddhe samudāyaśabdatve samudāyasamudāyinor abhedopacārāt [āmrādayo vanam] iti yujyate prayoktum /
analyzed: vana ādau bheda vyapadeśa vaśena prativyakti ca aprayoge siddhe samudāya śabda tve samudāya samudāyinoḥ abheda upacārāt āmra ādayaḥ vanam iti yujyate prayoktum

original: iha tu [gakārādīnāṃ śabdaḥ] iti na kadācid api vyatirekanirdeśo dṛśyata iti samudāyaśabdatvam aghaṭamānam /
analyzed: iha tu gakāra ādīnām śabdaḥ iti na kadācid api vyatireka nirdeśaḥ dṛśyate iti samudāya śabda tvam a ghaṭamānam

original: tat sarvathā varṇaśabdavādinām anupapanno 'yaṃ vyapadeśaḥ [śabdād arthaṃ pratipadyāmahe] iti //
analyzed: tat sarvathā varṇa śabda vādinām anupapannaḥ yam vyapadeśaḥ śabdāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: kim anenopapannenānupapannena vā kṛtyam /
analyzed: kim anena upapannena anupapannena vā kṛtyam

original: yady ayam upapadyate tataḥ kim /
analyzed: yadi ayam upapadyate tatas kim

original: athāpi nopapadyate tato 'pi kim /
analyzed: atha api na upapadyate kim

original: na hi lokavyapadeśanibandhanā vastusthitir bhavati //
analyzed: na hi loka vyapadeśa nibandhanā vastu sthitiḥ bhavati

original: nanu śāstrakārā apy evam eva vyavaharanti [bhāvam ākhyātenācaṣṭe] iti /
analyzed: nanu śāstra kārāḥ api evam eva vyavaharanti bhāvam ākhyātena ācaṣṭe iti

original: na /
analyzed: na

original: śāstrakāravyavahārād apy aprāmāṇiko 'rthaḥ śakyate 'bhyupagantum /
analyzed: śāstra kāra vyavahārāt api a prāmāṇikaḥ rthaḥ śakyate bhyupagantum

original: katarac cedaṃ pramāṇaṃ lokavyapadeśo nāma /
analyzed: katarat ca idam pramāṇam loka vyapadeśaḥ nāma

original: anumānaṃ tāvat pratikṣiptam /
analyzed: anumānam tāvat pratikṣiptam

original: pratyakṣam api pratikṣepsyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣam api pratikṣepsyate

original: na cānyat sphoṭasiddhau pramāṇaṃ kramate tad asthāne 'yaṃ lokavyapadeśanirūpaṇena sphoṭāṭopaḥ //
analyzed: na ca anyat sphoṭa siddhau pramāṇam kramate tat asthāne yam loka vyapadeśa nirūpaṇena sphoṭa āṭopaḥ

original: na cātyantam asaṅgato 'yaṃ varṇapakṣe laukiko vyapadeśaḥ /
analyzed: na ca atyantam asaṅgataḥ yam varṇa pakṣe laukikaḥ vyapadeśaḥ

original: pūrvavarṇajanitasaṃskārasahite tāvad antyavarṇe vācake susaṅgata evāyaṃ vyapadeśaḥ tasya śabdatvāt ekatvāc ca //
analyzed: pūrva varṇa janita saṃskāra sahite tāvat antya varṇe vācake su saṅgataḥ eva ayam vyapadeśaḥ tasya śabda tvāt eka tvāt ca

original: saṃkalanāpratyayopārūḍhavarṇavācakatvapakṣe 'pi na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: saṃkalanā pratyaya upārūḍha varṇa vācaka tva pakṣe na doṣaḥ

original: na hi bhedaśabdasahita eṣa śabdaśabdaḥ prayujyate [gakārādibhyaś śabdād arthaṃ pratipadyāmahe] iti /
analyzed: na hi bheda śabda sahitaḥ eṣa śabda śabdaḥ prayujyate gakāra ādibhyaḥ śabdāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti

original: kevalas tu jātiśabda ekavacanānto bahuṣv api varṇeṣu na viruddhaḥ //
analyzed: kevalaḥ tu jāti śabdaḥ ekavacana antaḥ bahuṣu api varṇeṣu na viruddhaḥ

original: kiṃ ca sphoṭapakṣe sutarām anupapanno 'yaṃ vyapadeśaḥ [śabdāt] iti prātipadikārthasyābhāvāt /
analyzed: kim ca sphoṭa pakṣe sutarām anupapannaḥ yam vyapadeśaḥ śabdāt iti prātipadika arthasya abhāvāt

original: na hi varṇavat sphoṭe śabdaśabdaṃ prayuṃjāno dṛśyate vyavahartṛjanaḥ //
analyzed: na hi varṇa vat sphoṭe śabda śabdam prayuṃjānaḥ dṛśyate vyavahartṛ janaḥ

original: arthapratipattihetutvaṃ śabdalakṣaṇam asādhu dhūmādibhir vyabhicārāt /
analyzed: artha pratipatti hetu tvam śabda lakṣaṇam asādhu dhūma ādibhiḥ vyabhicārāt

original: athāpi prakramaparyālocanayā śrautragrāhyatvaviśiṣṭam arthapratipattihetutvaṃ śabdalakṣaṇam abhidhīyate /
analyzed: atha api prakrama paryālocanayā śrautra grāhya tva viśiṣṭam artha pratipatti hetu tvam śabda lakṣaṇam abhidhīyate

original: tad idaṃ sphoṭaṃ prati na siddham  tasya śrautrapratyayaviṣayatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: tat idam sphoṭam prati na siddham tasya śrautra pratyaya viṣaya tva abhāvāt

original: śrotragrāhyatvam eva ca taditaravyavacchedakṣamam iti tad eva yuktaṃ kim ubhayopādānena /
analyzed: śrotra grāhya tvam eva ca tad itara vyavaccheda kṣamam iti tat eva yuktam kim ubhaya upādānena

original: śrotragrāhyatvaṃ ca varṇeṣv eva nārthāntarasyeti varṇā eva śabdāḥ /
analyzed: śrotra grāhya tvam ca varṇeṣu eva na artha antarasya iti varṇāḥ eva śabdāḥ

original: tad uktam [parasparānapekṣāś ca śrautrabuddhyā svarūpataḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam paraspara anapekṣāḥ ca śrautra buddhyā svarūpataḥ

original: varṇā evāvasīyante na pūrvāparavastunī] iti //
analyzed: varṇāḥ eva avasīyante na pūrva apara vastunī iti

original: śrotragrāhyatvaṃ śabdalakṣaṇaṃ sattādāv api astīti cet na śrotreṇaivety avadhāraṇasya vivakṣitatvāt //
analyzed: śrotra grāhya tvam śabda lakṣaṇam sattā ādau api asti iti ced na śrotreṇa eva iti avadhāraṇasya vivakṣita tvāt

original: śrotramanobhyāṃ grahaṇād asiddham avadhāraṇam iti cet na /
analyzed: śrotra manobhyām grahaṇāt asiddham avadhāraṇam iti ced na

original: samānajātīyavyavacchedārthatvād avadhāraṇasya cakṣurādīny eva tena vyavacchedyante na manaḥ //
analyzed: samāna jātīya vyavaccheda ārtha tvāt avadhāraṇasya cakṣuḥ ādīni eva tena vyavacchedyante na manaḥ

original: tathāpi śabdatve vyabhicarati iti cet na /
analyzed: tathā api śabda tve vyabhicarati iti ced na

original: jātimattve satīti prakramalabhyaviśeṣāpekṣaṇāt /
analyzed: jātimat tve sati iti prakrama labhya viśeṣa apekṣaṇāt

original: stanayitnunādaprabhṛtibhir api na vyabhicāraḥ teṣāṃ śabdatvābhyupagamāt /
analyzed: stanayitnu nāda prabhṛtibhiḥ api na vyabhicāraḥ teṣām śabda tva abhyupagamāt

original: tad uktam bhāṣyakṛtā [dvividhaś cāyaṃ śabdaḥ varṇātmā dhvanimātraś ca] iti //
analyzed: tat uktam bhāṣyakṛtā dvividhaḥ ca ayam śabdaḥ varṇa ātmā dhvani mātraḥ ca iti

original: arthapratyāyakatvaṃ tu na lakṣaṇam ity uktam agṛhītasaṃbandha varṇātmāny api śabde tadabhāvenāśabdatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: artha pratyāyaka tvam tu na lakṣaṇam iti uktam agṛhīta saṃbandha varṇa ātmāni api śabde tad abhāvena aśabdatva prasaṅgāt

original: kālāntareṇa saṃbandhabuddhau satyāṃ ca tasyaiva śabdatvam iti avyavasthitam idaṃ lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: kāla antareṇa saṃbandha buddhau satyām ca tasya eva śabda tvam iti avyavasthitam idam lakṣaṇam

original: yad api śabdasvarūpanirūpaṇaprasaṅgena tadabhidheyānāṃ jātiguṇakriyādīnāṃ śabdatā [śaṅkanaṃ tatpariharaṇaṃ ca tad api kim āśayam iti na vidmaḥ teṣām ativibhaktarūpagrahaṇāt //
analyzed: yat api śabda svarūpa nirūpaṇa prasaṅgena tad abhidheyānām jāti guṇa kriyā ādīnām śabda tā śaṅkanam tad pariharaṇam ca tat api kim āśayam iti na vidmaḥ teṣām ativibhakta rūpa grahaṇāt

original: ataḥ śrotragrāhyasya śabdatvāt sphoṭasya ca śrotragrāhyatvābhāvāt varṇavādinām eva [śabdād arthaṃ pratipadyāmahe] ity anukūlo lokavyapadeśaḥ na sphoṭavādinām iti sthitam //
analyzed: atas śrotra grāhyasya śabda tvāt sphoṭasya ca śrotra grāhya tva abhāvāt varṇa vādinām eva śabdāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti anukūlaḥ loka vyapadeśaḥ na sphoṭa vādinām iti sthitam

original: kathaṃ punaḥ śrotragrahaṇatvaṃ sphoṭasya na mṛṣyate yāvatā padaṃ vākyam iti śrotrakaraṇakam ekākāraṃ jñānaṃ pratyātmavedanīyam asti /
analyzed: katham punar śrotra grahaṇa tvam sphoṭasya na mṛṣyate yāvatā padam vākyam iti śrotra karaṇakam eka ākāram jñānam pratyātma vedanīyam asti

original: na cāsya varṇā ālaṃbanībhaveyur ity uktam /
analyzed: na ca asya varṇāḥ ālaṃbanībhaveyuḥ iti uktam

original: na yuktam uktam /
analyzed: na yuktam uktam

original: iha hi śābaleyādau pratipiṇḍaṃ gaur iti buddhir upajāyamānā sakalapiṇḍasādhāraṇaṃ rūpaṃ viṣayīkarotīti gotvasāmānyaṃ tad iṣyate /
analyzed: iha hi śābaleya ādau prati piṇḍam gauḥ iti buddhiḥ upajāyamānā sakala piṇḍa sādhāraṇam rūpam viṣayīkaroti iti go tva sāmānyam tat iṣyate

original: evaṃ yadi prativarṇaṃ padaṃ padam iti vākyaṃ vākyaṃ iti matir upajāyeta jātivat tarhi padaṃ vākyaṃ ca sarvavarṇavṛtti kim api rūpam avagacchema na tv evam asti pratītiḥ /
analyzed: evam yadi prativarṇam padam padam iti vākyam vākyam iti matiḥ upajāyeta jāti vat tarhi padam vākyam ca sarva varṇa vṛtti kim api rūpam avagacchema na tu evam asti pratītiḥ

original: yathā ca tantvādyavayavaparighaṭṭitapaṭādikāryaviṣayam ādyanayanasamaya eva bhedagraharahitam avayavijñānam udeti tathā kramasamuccaradekaikavarṇasvarūpopagrahanirapekṣaṃ yadi padam iti vākyam iti jñānaṃ bhavet tat padādikam avayavinam iva padaṃ vākyam ekaikarūpam anumanyemahi na tv evam asti /
analyzed: yathā ca tantu ādi avayava parighaṭṭita paṭa ādi kārya viṣayam ādi a nayana samaye eva bheda graha rahitam avayavi jñānam udeti tathā krama samuccarat eka eka varṇa sva rūpa upagraha nirapekṣam yadi padam iti vākyam iti jñānam bhavet tat pada ādikam avayavinam iva padam vākyam eka eka rūpam anumanyemahi na tu evam asti

original: na hi tantubhir iva paṭaḥ vīraṇair iva kaṭaḥ varṇaiḥ padam ārabhyate //
analyzed: na hi tantubhiḥ iva paṭaḥ vīraṇaiḥ iva kaṭaḥ varṇaiḥ padam ārabhyate

original: yat tu gaur gaur ity evaṃjñānam abhedagrāhi dṛśyate tad ekājupādheḥ /
analyzed: yat tu gauḥ gauḥ iti evam jñānam abheda grāhi dṛśyate tat eka a c upādheḥ

original: bhinnājupaśleṣe tu devadatta ityādau nānākṣaragrahaṇam eva vilambitam anubhūyate /
analyzed: bhinna a c upaśleṣe tu devadattaḥ ityādau nānā akṣara grahaṇam eva vilambitam anubhūyate

original: na caivaṃ paṭādibuddhiṣu tadavayavāḥ kadācit vicchedenāvabhāsante /
analyzed: na ca evam paṭa ādi buddhiṣu tad avayavāḥ kadācid vicchedena avabhāsante

original: tasmān nāvayavīva jātir iva vā padaṃ vākyam abhinnam avabhāsate //
analyzed: tasmāt na avayavi iva jātiḥ iva vā padam vākyam abhinnam avabhāsate

original: nanu ca yāsau śabdaśabdāt buddhiḥ saiveyaṃ sphoṭabuddhiḥ //
analyzed: nanu ca yā asau śabda śabdāt buddhiḥ sā eva iyam sphoṭa buddhiḥ

original: kim idānīm /
analyzed: kim idānīm

original: yad eva śabdatvasāmānyaṃ sa eva sphoṭaḥ maivam /
analyzed: yat eva śabda tva sāmānyam saḥ eva sphoṭaḥ mā evam

original: sphoṭa evāsau na śabdatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ tat /
analyzed: sphoṭaḥ eva asau na śabda tvam sāmānyam tat

original: sāmānyaṃ hi tad ucyate yatraikavyaktidarśane vyaktyantarānusandhānam  śābaleyagrahaṇe bāhuleyasyeva /
analyzed: sāmānyam hi tat ucyate yatra eka vyakti darśane vyakti antara anusandhānam śābaleya grahaṇe bāhuleyasya iva

original: iha tu na gakāragrahaṇe na vakārānusandhānam iti nedaṃ sāmānyam /
analyzed: iha tu na gakāra grahaṇe na vakāra anusandhānam iti na idam sāmānyam

original: ekarūpas tv ayaṃ pratibhāsaḥ śandatattvaviṣaya eva /
analyzed: eka rūpaḥ tu ayam pratibhāsaḥ śanda tattva viṣayaḥ eva

original: śabdatattvaṃ ca sphoṭa ity ucyate //
analyzed: śabda tattvam ca sphoṭaḥ iti ucyate

original: ā jñātam /
analyzed: ā jñātam

original: amunaiva hi bhayena kaiścit sphoṭaśaṅkibhiḥ śabdatvasāmānyam apahnutam /
analyzed: amunā eva hi bhayena kaiścid sphoṭa śaṅkibhiḥ śabda tva sāmānyam apahnutam

original: asthāna eva tv ayaṃ saṃtrāsaḥ /
analyzed: asthāne eva tu ayam saṃtrāsaḥ

original: na hi śabdatvaṃ sphoṭaḥ /
analyzed: na hi śabda tvam sphoṭaḥ

original: prativarṇaṃ hi śabdaḥ śabda iti buddhir asti na ca varṇasphoṭaḥ /
analyzed: prativarṇam hi śabdaḥ śabdaḥ iti buddhiḥ asti na ca varṇa sphoṭaḥ

original: tad idaṃ śabdatvasāmānyam eva śabdabuddher ālambinam na sphoṭaḥ //
analyzed: tat idam śabda tva sāmānyam eva śabda buddheḥ ālambinam na sphoṭaḥ

original: sāmānyasiddhau tu vyaktyantarānusandhānam akāraṇam iti prāg eva nirṇītam /
analyzed: sāmānya siddhau tu vyakti antara anusandhānam akāraṇam iti prāk eva nirṇītam

original: tasmānn aśabdabuddhāv api sphoṭo 'vabhāsate padavākyabuddhyā viveti //
analyzed: tasmāt a śabda buddhau api sphoṭaḥ vabhāsate pada vākya buddhyā

original: ekaś ca satyam āha yad iyam ekakāryakāritvanibandhanā vanapṛtanādibuddhisamānayogakṣemaiva padavākyabuddhir iti /
analyzed: ekaḥ ca satyam āha yat iyam eka kārya kāri tva nibandhanā vana pṛtanā ādi buddhi samāna yogakṣemā eva pada vākya buddhiḥ iti

original: na ca jātyādibuddhiṣv asamāśvāsaḥ vailakṣaṇyasya darśitatvāt //
analyzed: na ca jāti ādi buddhiṣu asamāśvāsaḥ vailakṣaṇyasya darśita tvāt

original: yad api ekakāryakāritvanibandhanāyām abhedabuddhau itaretarāśrayaparicodanaṃ ekārthapratītipūrvikā padavākyabuddhiḥ padavākyabuddhipūrvikā caikārthapratītir iti tad api na samyak /
analyzed: yat api eka kārya kāri tva nibandhanāyām abheda buddhau itaretara āśraya paricodanam eka artha pratīti pūrvikā pada vākya buddhiḥ pada vākya buddhi pūrvikā ca eka artha pratītiḥ iti tat api na samyak

original: smaryamāṇānubhūyamānavarṇajanitaiveyam arthapratītir ity avocāma nābhinnapadaparicchedapūrviketi kuta itaretarāśrayatvam  brūyāt padavākyayor ekatvam antareṇa katham padavākyārthapratītir ekarūpā bhavet iti so 'yam atīva mugdhālopaḥ /
analyzed: smaryamāṇa anubhūyamāna varṇa janitā evā iyam artha pratītiḥ iti avocāma na abhinna pada pariccheda pūrvikā iti kutas itaretara āśraya tvam brūyāt pada vākyayoḥ ekatvam antareṇa katham pada vākya artha pratītiḥ eka rūpā bhavet iti saḥ yam atīva mugdha ālopaḥ

original: pratītibhedābhedau hi viṣayabhedābhedāv anurudhyete nopāyabhedābhedau /
analyzed: pratīti bheda abhedau hi viṣaya bheda abhedau anurudhyete na upāya bheda abhedau

original: bhinnair api locanālokāntaḥkaraṇaprabhṛtibhir upāyair abhinnārthagrāhiṇī buddhir upajanyata eva /
analyzed: bhinnaiḥ api locana āloka antaḥkaraṇa prabhṛtibhiḥ upāyaiḥ abhinna artha grāhiṇī buddhiḥ upajanyate eva

original: tad iha padārthabuddher ekatvāt  padārtha eko bhavatu yo 'syā viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: tat iha padārtha buddheḥ eka tvāt padārthaḥ ekaḥ bhavatu viṣayaḥ

original: na tv ekaṃ padaṃ yat kāraṇam iti /
analyzed: na tu ekam padam yat kāraṇam iti

original: vākyārthabuddher apy ekatvāt eko vākyārtho bhavatu na tv ekam vākyam /
analyzed: vākya artha buddheḥ api eka tvāt ekaḥ vākya arthaḥ bhavatu na tu ekam vākyam

original: vargīkaraṇakāraṇaṃ kramabhāvināṃ bahūnāṃ varṇānām etat bhavati yat ekārthapratipādakatvaṃ na tv abhedam eva padavākyayor gamayatīti //
analyzed: vargīkaraṇa kāraṇam krama bhāvinām bahūnām varṇānām etat bhavati yat eka artha pratipādaka tvam na tu abhedam eva pada vākyayoḥ gamayati iti

original: vipralabdhā eva ca vaiyākaraṇāḥ padavākyayor apy abhedaṃ manyante kila śabdād ananyabhūta eva śabdārtha iti sa punar eṣāṃ vyāmoha eva tadbhedasya dṛḍhapramāṇasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: vipralabdhāḥ eva ca vaiyākaraṇāḥ pada vākyayoḥ api abhedam manyante kila śabdāt ananya bhūtaḥ eva śabda arthaḥ iti sa punar eṣām vyāmohaḥ eva tad bhedasya dṛḍha pramāṇa siddha tvāt

original: śabdādhyāsas tu pratītiviruddhatvena neṣyate ity alaṃ tatkathayā /
analyzed: śabda adhyāsaḥ tu pratīti viruddha tvena na iṣyate iti alam tad kathayā

original: tasmāt pratyakṣagamyo 'pi na sphoṭa iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt pratyakṣa gamyaḥ api na sphoṭaḥ iti siddham

original: nanu abhinnatvād vākyārthabuddheḥ viṣayabhedābhedānuvṛttitvāc ca buddhibhedābhedayoḥ abhinno vākyārthaḥ syāt /
analyzed: nanu abhinna tvāt vākya artha buddheḥ viṣaya bheda abheda anuvṛtti tvāt ca buddhi bheda abhedayoḥ abhinnaḥ vākya arthaḥ syāt

original: bāḍham abhinnaḥ na tv anavayavaḥ ghaṭāder abhinnasyāpi sāvayavatvāt //
analyzed: bāḍham abhinnaḥ na tu anavayavaḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ abhinnasya api sāvayavatvāt

original: yat tu niravayavatvam ucyate tad atīva saṃvitparāmarśakaiśalaśūnyaṃ vyāhṛtam aṃśās santi na santīti cintā 'tyantam asaṅgatā /
analyzed: yat tu niravayava tvam ucyate tat atīva saṃvid parāmarśa kaiśala śūnyam vyāhṛtam aṃśāḥ santi na santi iti cintā tyantam asaṅga tā

original: niraṃśas tv asti nāstīti yuktam cintayituṃ satām //
analyzed: niraṃśaḥ tu asti na asti iti yuktam cintayitum satām

original: padatadarthabhedasya prativākyaṃ vispaṣṭam ābhāsamānatvat anupagṛhyamāṇāvayavavibhāgayoś ca vākyavākyārthayor anavabhāsamānatvāt //
analyzed: pada tad artha bhedasya prativākyam vispaṣṭam ābhāsamāna tvat an upagṛhyamāṇa avayava vibhāgayoḥ ca vākya vākya arthayoḥ an avabhāsamāna tvāt

original: astv avayavapratītiḥ sā tu bhrānteti cet na /
analyzed: astu avayava pratītiḥ sā tu bhrāntā iti ced na

original: bādhakābhāvāt /
analyzed: bādhaka abhāvāt

original: bhrānteś ca bījaṃ kim api vaktavyam /
analyzed: bhrānteḥ ca bījam kim api vaktavyam

original: sādṛśyam iti cet kasya keneti na vidmaḥ /
analyzed: sādṛśyam iti ced kasya kena iti na vidmaḥ

original: yadi hi kvacin mukhyā avayavāḥ prasiddhā bhaveyuḥ tatsādṛśyāt itaratra tadabhāve 'pi bhrama iti gamyeta na tv evam asti sarvavākyānām apy abhāgatvāt /
analyzed: yadi hi kvacid mukhyāḥ avayavāḥ prasiddhāḥ bhaveyuḥ tad sādṛśyāt itaratra tad abhāve bhramaḥ iti gamyeta na tu evam asti sarva vākyānām api a bhāga tvāt

original: narasiṃhe 'pi narāvayavāḥ siṃhāvayavāś ca pṛthak pṛthak pratyabhijñāyante /
analyzed: nara siṃhe nara avayavāḥ siṃha avayavāḥ ca pṛthak pṛthak pratyabhijñāyante

original: tadvad ihāpi abhyupagamyamāne nūnaṃ kvacid vākye satyatvam avayavānām eṣitavyam //
analyzed: tadvat iha api abhyupagamyamāne nūnam kvacid vākye satya tvam avayavānām eṣitavyam

original: citre 'pi haritālasindhūrādirūpaṃ pānake tvagelādirasaḥ grāmarāge 'pi ṣaḍjarṣabhagāndhārādisvarajātaṃ pṛthag avagatam iti na te nirbhāgadṛṣṭāntāḥ /
analyzed: citre pi haritāla sindhūra ādi rūpam pānake tvac elā ādi rasaḥ grāmarāge pi ṣaḍja ṛṣabha gāndhāra ādi svara jātam pṛthak avagatam iti na te nirbhāga dṛṣṭāntāḥ

original: citrādibuddhayas tarhi dṛṣṭāntā iti cet bāḍham vākyārthabuddhir api nirbhageṣyata evāsmābhiḥ buddhīnāṃ niraṃśatvena sarvāsām anavayavatvāt /
analyzed: citra ādi buddhayaḥ tarhi dṛṣṭāntāḥ iti ced bāḍham vākya artha buddhiḥ api nirbhagā iṣyate eva asmābhiḥ buddhīnām niraṃśa tvena sarvāsām anavayava tvāt

original: buddhiviṣayīkṛtas tv artho dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭāntikayoḥ sāvayava eva /
analyzed: buddhi viṣayīkṛtaḥ tu arthaḥ dṛṣṭānta dṛṣṭāntikayoḥ sa avayavaḥ eva

original: tasmān na nirbhāgau vākyavākyārthāv iti yuktam /
analyzed: tasmāt na nirbhāgau vākya vākya arthau iti yuktam

original: yad apy abhyadhāyi vṛddhavyavahārataḥ saṃbandhabuddhiḥ vākyavākyārthayor eva na padatadarthayoḥ padena vyavahārābhāvād iti tad apy asādhu /
analyzed: yat api abhyadhāyi vṛddha vyavahārataḥ saṃbandha buddhiḥ vākya vākya arthayoḥ eva na pada tad arthayoḥ padena vyavahāra abhāvāt iti tat api asādhu

original: vākyād api vyutpattir bhavantī padaparyantā bhavati /
analyzed: vākyāt api vyutpattiḥ bhavantī pada paryantā bhavati

original: evaṃ hi padatadarthasaṃskṛtamater abhinavaviracitād api vākyāt vākyārthapratītir upapatsyate /
analyzed: evam hi pada tad artha saṃskṛta mateḥ abhinava viracitāt api vākyāt vākya artha pratītiḥ upapatsyate

original: tadāvāpodvāpacakravaicitryeṇa vākyānām ānantyāt aśakyā prativākyaṃ vyutpattiḥ /
analyzed: tad āvāpa udvāpa cakra vaicitryeṇa vākyānām ānantyāt aśakyā prativākyam vyutpattiḥ

original: sāpi nāpekṣiṣyate /
analyzed: sā api na apekṣiṣyate

original: itarathā hi sā 'vaśyam apekṣyeta //
analyzed: itarathā hi sā vaśyam apekṣyeta

original: yat tu kevalaṃ padaṃ na prayujyata iti tat asatyam iti tad apy asat /
analyzed: yat tu kevalam padam na prayujyate iti tat asatyam iti tat api asat

original: mahāvākyasthāne avāntaravākyaṃ na prayujyata iti tad apy asatyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: mahāvākya sthāne avāntaravākyam na prayujyate iti tat api asatyam syāt

original: svārthe tat prayujyata iti cet padam api svārthe kvacit prayujyata eva /
analyzed: svārthe tat prayujyate iti ced padam api svārthe kvacid prayujyate eva

original: yatra padāntarāṇām artho 'rthaprakaraṇādinā labhyate tatra yāvad aprāptaṃ tāvat padam eva kevalaṃ uccārayanti /
analyzed: yatra pada antarāṇām arthaḥ rtha prakaraṇa ādinā labhyate tatra yāvat aprāptam tāvat padam eva kevalam uccārayanti

original: granthagrahaṇāvasareṣu ca svarūpāvadhāraṇam api phalavad varṇānām /
analyzed: grantha grahaṇa avasareṣu ca svarūpa avadhāraṇam api phalavat varṇānām

original: mā vā phalavattvaṃ padavarṇānāṃ bhūt tathāpi rathāvayavānām iva rathakāryeṣv aparyāptaśaktīnām api svarūpasattvam anirvāryam /
analyzed: mā vā phalavat tvam pada varṇānām bhūt tathā api ratha avayavānām iva ratha kāryeṣu a paryāpta śaktīnām api sva rūpa sattvam anirvāryam

original: kāryāntarāya rathāt rathāvayavāḥ prabhavantīti cet padavarṇā api kāryāntare prabhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: kārya antarāya rathāt ratha avayavāḥ prabhavanti iti ced pada varṇāḥ api kārya antare prabhaviṣyanti

original: rathakāryaikadeśamātrāṃ kām api rathāvayavāḥ kuruvantīti yady ucyate padāny api vākyakāryaikadeśaṃ kam api kurvanty eva /
analyzed: ratha kārya eka deśa mātrām kām api ratha avayavāḥ kuruvanti iti yadi ucyate padāni api vākya kārya eka deśam kam api kurvanti eva

original: varṇā api kecid arthavanto bhavanty eva /
analyzed: varṇāḥ api kecid arthavantaḥ bhavanti eva

original: tasmān nāsantaḥ padavarṇāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na asantaḥ pada varṇāḥ

original: yat punar avādi vākyasyeva padāni padānām iva varṇāḥ varṇānām apy avayavāntarāṇi syur iti tad idam apūrvaṃ pāṇḍityam /
analyzed: yat punar avādi vākyasya iva padāni padānām iva varṇāḥ varṇānām api avayava antarāṇi syuḥ iti tat idam apūrvam pāṇḍityam

original: na hi ghatāḥ sāvayavā iti paramāṇubhir api sāvayavair bhavitavyam /
analyzed: na hi ghatāḥ sa avayavāḥ iti paramāṇubhiḥ api sa avayavaiḥ bhavitavyam

original: paramāṇavo vā niravayavā iti ghaṭair api niravayavair bhavitavyam /
analyzed: paramāṇavaḥ vā niravayavāḥ iti ghaṭaiḥ api niravayavaiḥ bhavitavyam

original: upalabdhyanupalabdhī hi vastūnāṃ vyavasthāpike /
analyzed: upalabdhi anupalabdhī hi vastūnām vyavasthāpike

original: yad yathopalabhyate tat tathā bhavati /
analyzed: yat yathā upalabhyate tat tathā bhavati

original: yad yathā nopalabhyate tat tathā na bhavati /
analyzed: yat yathā na upalabhyate tat tathā na bhavati

original: vākyapadayoś ca bhāgā upalabhyante na varṇānām /
analyzed: vākya padayoḥ ca bhāgāḥ upalabhyante na varṇānām

original: tathā hy uktam etat /
analyzed: tathā hi uktam etat

original: [alpanīyasā 'pi yatnena śabdam uccāritaṃ matiḥ /
analyzed: alpanīyasā pi yatnena śabdam uccāritam matiḥ

original: yadi vā naiva gṛhṇāti varṇaṃ vā sakalaṃ sphuṭam] iti //
analyzed: yadi vā nā eva gṛhṇāti varṇam vā sakalam sphuṭam iti

original: tasmāt bāliśacoditam idaṃ varṇasyāpy avayavā bhavantu padavākyayor api vā mā bhūvann iti //
analyzed: tasmāt bāliśa coditam idam varṇasya api avayavāḥ bhavantu pada vākyayoḥ api vā mā bhūvan iti

original: itaś ca sāvayavau vākyavākyārthau padopajananāpāyābhyāṃ tadarthopajananāpāyadarśanāt /
analyzed: itas ca sa avayavau vākya vākya arthau pada upajanana apāyābhyām tad artha upajanana apāya darśanāt

original: anayaiva yuktyā padabhāgā api prakṛtipratyayādayaḥ tāttvikā ity avagantavyāḥ na kalpanāmātrapratiṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: anayā eva yuktyā pada bhāgāḥ api prakṛti pratyaya ādayaḥ tāttvikāḥ iti avagantavyāḥ na kalpanā mātra pratiṣṭhāḥ

original: vṛkṣaṃ vṛkṣeṇety atra prakṛtyarthānugame pratyayārtho bhidyate /
analyzed: vṛkṣam vṛkṣeṇa iti atra prakṛti artha anugame pratyaya arthaḥ bhidyate

original: vṛkṣaṃ ghaṭam iti pratyayārthānugama prakṛtyartho bhidyate /
analyzed: vṛkṣam ghaṭam iti pratyaya artha anugama prakṛti arthaḥ bhidyate

original: tatra yo 'rtho yaṃ śabdam anugacchati sa tasyārtha ity avasīyate /
analyzed: tatra yaḥ rthaḥ yam śabdam anugacchati sa tasya arthaḥ iti avasīyate

original: tat katham asatyā bhāgāḥ yat punaḥ kūpasūpayūpādau saty api varṇānugame 'rthānugame na dṛśyate /
analyzed: tat katham asatyāḥ bhāgāḥ yat punar kūpa sūpa yūpa ādau sati api varṇa anugame rtha anugame na dṛśyate

original: tena cākāraṇam arthapratīter varṇānugama ity uktam tad ayuktam /
analyzed: tena ca akāraṇam artha pratīteḥ varṇa anugamaḥ iti uktam tat ayuktam

original: yato nānvayavyatirekābhyām anutpannā pratītir utpādyate yena kūpādau tadutpādanam āśaṅkyeta /
analyzed: yatas nā anvaya vyatirekābhyām anutpannā pratītiḥ utpādyate yena kūpa ādau tad utpādanam āśaṅkyeta

original: prasiddhāyāṃ tu pratipattau vācakabhāgeyattāniyamaparicchede 'nayor vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: prasiddhāyām tu pratipattau vācaka bhāga iyat tā niyama paricchede nayoḥ vyāpāraḥ

original: na caikatra varṇānugamād arthānugamo dṛṣṭa ity anyatrādṛśyamāno 'pi haṭhād āpādayituṃ yuktaḥ //
analyzed: na ca ekatra varṇa anugamāt artha anugamaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti anyatra adṛśyamānaḥ pi haṭhāt āpādayitum yuktaḥ

original: reṇupaṭānugatapipīlikāpaṅktidvārakavyabhicārodbhāvanam api na peśalam /
analyzed: reṇu paṭa anugata pipīlikā paṅkti dvārakā vyabhicāra udbhāvanam api na peśalam

original: pāṃsupaṭalavikalapipīlikāpaṅktidarśanena tasyāḥ tatpratītikāritvābhāvaniścayāt /
analyzed: pāṃsu paṭala vikala pipīlikā paṅkti darśanena tasyāḥ tad pratīti kāri tva abhāva niścayāt

original: karikarabhaturagaprabhṛtīnāṃ tu pratyekaṃ vyabhicāre 'pi bahuprāṇirūpasāmānyānapāyāt tatkāraṇam eva dhūlīpaṭalam avagamyate //
analyzed: kari karabha turaga prabhṛtīnām tu pratyekam vyabhicāre bahu prāṇi rūpa sāmānya anapāyāt tad kāraṇam eva dhūlī paṭalam avagamyate

original: yad api aśvakarṇādau avayavārthalopāt anyatrāpy evam iti kathitam tad api na caturaśram aśvakarṇaśabdo hi kvacid arthaprakaraṇavaśāt nyagbhavad avayavaśaktitayā tiraskṛtāvayavārthavastvantaravyaktau na sarvātmanā 'vayavārthābhāvaḥ vyastatvena sāmastyena vā punaḥ prayogāntare tadarthasaṃpratyayadarśanāt /
analyzed: yat api aśvakarṇa ādau avayava artha lopāt anyatra api evam iti kathitam tat api na caturaśram aśvakarṇa śabdaḥ hi kvacid artha prakaraṇa vaśāt nyagbhavat avayava śakti tayā tiraskṛta avayava artha vastu antara vyaktau na sarva ātmanā vayava artha abhāvaḥ vyasta tvena sāmastyena vā punar prayoga antare tad artha saṃpratyaya darśanāt

original: [aśvam āroha] [karṇe kuṇḍalaṃ] iti vyastayoḥ prayogaḥ /
analyzed: aśvam āroha karṇe kuṇḍalam iti vyastayoḥ prayogaḥ

original: turagaśrotre tu pratipipādayiṣite [aśvakarṇaḥ] iti samastaprayogo 'pi tadarthāparityāgī dṛśyate iti na sarvātmanā nirarthakā bhāgāḥ //
analyzed: turaga śrotre tu pratipipādayiṣite aśvakarṇaḥ iti tad artha aparityāgī dṛśyate iti na sarva ātmanā nirarthakāḥ bhāgāḥ

original: yat punar anvākhyānavisaṃvādāt prakṛtipratyayavibhāganiyamo nāvakalpate iti etad api na yuktam āptataroktīnāṃ prāmāṇyāt /
analyzed: yat punar anvākhyāna visaṃvādāt prakṛti pratyaya vibhāga niyamaḥ na avakalpate iti etat api na yuktam āptatara uktīnām prāmāṇyāt

original: trimunivyākaraṇam iti pāṇinimatam eva hi prakṛtipratyayavibhāgaṃ avitathaṃ pratyeṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: tri muni vyākaraṇam iti pāṇini matam eva hi prakṛti pratyaya vibhāgam avitatham pratyeṣyāmaḥ

original: kiyaty api cāṃśe prāyeṇa sarveṣām anvākhyāt•ṇām avivādaḥ /
analyzed: kiyati api ca aṃśe prāyeṇa sarveṣām anvākhyātṇām avivādaḥ

original: vikaraṇādivisaṃvādamātraṃ tv akiṃcitkaram /
analyzed: vikaraṇa ādi visaṃvāda mātram tu akiṃcitkaram

original: ataḥ pāramārthikatvāt prakṛtipratyayāṃśayoḥ na kalpanāmātreṇa pṛthakkaraṇam //
analyzed: atas pāramārthika tvāt prakṛti pratyaya aṃśayoḥ na kalpanā mātreṇa pṛthakkaraṇam

original: yad api avarṇi varṇasāmānyāt padavibhāgajñānaṃ durghaṭaṃ [kālenadantināgāḥ] iti tad apy asāram svarasmaraṇādīnāṃ padabhedāvagamopāyānāṃ saṃbhavāt /
analyzed: yat api avarṇi varṇa sāmānyāt pada vibhāga jñānam durghaṭam kālena danti nāgāḥ iti tat api asāram svara smaraṇa ādīnām pada bheda avagama upāyānām saṃbhavāt

original: [sarāmaḥ] ity ākhyātasya anyat svarādirūpam nāmno 'nyat /
analyzed: sarāmaḥ iti ākhyātasya anyat svara ādi rūpam nāmnaḥ

original: nāmatve 'pi [sa] iti [rāma] iti ca dve pade /
analyzed: nāma tve pi saḥ iti rāmaḥ iti ca dve pade

original: tayor anyad rūpam /
analyzed: tayoḥ anyat rūpam

original: saha rāmeṇa vartata ity ekapade 'pi anyad rūpam ity abhiyogaviśeṣavatāṃ sarvaṃ subhagam iti nāśakyaḥ padavibhāgaparicchedaḥ //
analyzed: saha rāmeṇa vartate iti eka pade anyat rūpam iti abhiyoga viśeṣavatām sarvam subhagam iti na aśakyaḥ pada vibhāga paricchedaḥ

original: yad api [dadhy atra] [madhv atra] iti tathāvidhapadarūdādarśane 'pi tadarthasaṃpratyaya ity uktam so 'pi na doṣaḥ yataḥ te evaite pade īṣadvikṛte tatpratyabhijñānāc ceti kecit /
analyzed: yat api dadhi atra madhu atra iti tathāvidha pada rūda adarśane tad artha saṃpratyayaḥ iti uktam saḥ u pi na doṣaḥ yatas te eva ete pade īṣat vikṛte tad pratyabhijñānāt ca iti kecid

original: atha vā igantadadhimadhupadavat yaṇantayor api viṣayāntare sādhutvāt tathaiva tadvidhāt vyutpatteḥ yaṇante api pade arthapratipādake bhaviṣyata ity alam evaṃ prāyaiḥ kadāśāvyāhṛtaiḥ //
analyzed: atha vā i k anta dadhi madhu pada vat ya ṇ antayoḥ api viṣaya antare sādhu tvāt tathā eva tadvidhāt vyutpatteḥ ya ṇ ante api pade artha pratipādake bhaviṣyataḥ iti alam evam prāyaiḥ kadāśā vyāhṛtaiḥ

original: api ca padānām asatyatva kim arthaṃ eṣa tadvyutpattau iyān prayatno vṛddhair ādhīyate asatyam api satyopāyatāṃ pratipadyata iti cet na adṛṣṭatvāt alikāhidaṃśādayaḥ satyamūrchāhetavo ye 'trodāhṛtāḥ te tathā na bhavanti viṣāśaṅkāyā api tatkāryahetutvāt /
analyzed: api ca padānām asatya tva kim artham eṣa tad vyutpattau iyān prayatnaḥ vṛddhaiḥ ādhīyate asatyam api satya upāya tām pratipadyate iti ced na adṛṣṭa tvāt alika ahi daṃśa ādayaḥ satya mūrchā hetavaḥ ye trā udāhṛtāḥ te tathā na bhavanti viṣa āśaṅkāyāḥ api tad kārya hetu tvāt

original: śaṅkā hi nāma buddhiḥ /
analyzed: śaṅkā hi nāma buddhiḥ

original: buddhiś ca na na kāraṇam /
analyzed: buddhiḥ ca na na kāraṇam

original: na cāsatī buddhiḥ /
analyzed: na ca asatī buddhiḥ

original: yad api lipyakṣarāṇām asatyānāṃ satyārthapratipādakatvam ucyate tad apy anabhijñabhāṣitam /
analyzed: yat api lipi akṣarāṇām asatyānām satya artha pratipādaka tvam ucyate tat api anabhijña bhāṣitam

original: rekhās tāvat svarūpataḥ satyāḥ /
analyzed: rekhāḥ tāvat svarūpataḥ satyāḥ

original: tāś ca khaṇḍikoṣādhyāyopadeśasaṃskṛtamateḥ varṇānumāpikā bhavanti /
analyzed: tāḥ ca khaṇḍi koṣa adhyāya upadeśa saṃskṛta mateḥ varṇa anumāpikāḥ bhavanti

original: tathā saṃbandhagrahaṇāt rekhānumitebhyaś ca varṇebhyaḥ arthapratipattir iti nāsatyās satyopāyāḥ //
analyzed: tathā saṃbandha grahaṇāt rekhā anumitebhyaḥ ca varṇebhyaḥ artha pratipattiḥ iti na asatyāḥ satya upāyāḥ

original: [ayaṃ gakāraḥ] iti tu sāmānādhikaraṇyabhramaḥ liṅgaliṅginor abhedopacārāt /
analyzed: ayam gakāraḥ iti tu sāmānādhikaraṇya bhramaḥ liṅga liṅginoḥ abheda upacārāt

original: yathā prasthamitāḥ saktavaḥ prasthaśabdenocyante tathā rekhāto 'pi gakārānumānāt rekhaiva gakāra ity ucyate /
analyzed: yathā prastha mitāḥ saktavaḥ prastha śabdena ucyante tathā gakāra anumānāt rekhā eva gakāraḥ iti ucyate

original: evam aniṣyamāṇe lipyan abhijñasyāpi tato 'rthapratipattiḥ syāt rekhānām asatyavarṇānāṃ vidyāmānatvāt /
analyzed: evam an iṣyamāṇe lipyan abhijñasya api tatas ṛtha pratipattiḥ syāt rekhānām asatya varṇānām vidyā māna tvāt

original: na caivam asti /
analyzed: na ca evam asti

original: tasmāt varṇānumānapuraśaraiva rekhābhyo 'rthāvagatiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt varṇa anumāna pura śarā eva rekhābhyaḥ rtha avagatiḥ

original: abhyastatvād viṣayasya sūkṣmatvāc ca kālasya kramo na lakṣyate na tv anyathā tato 'vagatiḥ /
analyzed: abhyasta tvāt viṣayasya sūkṣma tvāt ca kālasya kramaḥ na lakṣyate na tu anyathā tatas vagatiḥ

original: tasmāt pāramārthikatvāt padatadarthānāṃ na niravayavau vākyavākyārthāv iti sthitam //
analyzed: tasmāt pāramārthika tvāt pada tad arthānām na niravayavau vākya vākya arthau iti sthitam

original: yat punaḥ vākyabhāgapadavarṇāpahnavavartmanā śabdabrahmaivādvayam upadarśayitum upakramyate tatra purastāt savistaraṃ samādhim abhidhāsyāmaḥ //
analyzed: yat punar vākya bhāga pada varṇa apahnava vartmanā śabdabrahma eva advayam upadarśayitum upakramyate tatra purastāt sa vistaram samādhim abhidhāsyāmaḥ

original: yat punar avādi vācas traividhyaṃ tad api nānumanyante /
analyzed: yat punar avādi vācaḥ traividhyam tat api na anumanyante

original: ekaiva vaikharī vāg vāg iti prasiddhā hi //
analyzed: ekā eva vaikharī vāc vāc iti prasiddhā hi

original: antaśaṃjalpo varṇyate madhyamā vāk seyaṃ buddhyātmā naiṣa vācaḥ prabhedaḥ /
analyzed: anta śaṃjalpaḥ varṇyate madhyamā vāc sā iyam buddhi ātmā na eṣa vācaḥ prabhedaḥ

original: buddhir vācyaṃ vācakaṃ collikhantī rūpaṃ nātmīyaṃ bodhabhāvaṃ jahāti //
analyzed: buddhiḥ vācyam vācakam ca ullikhantī rūpam na ātmīyam bodha bhāvam jahāti

original: paśyantīti tv nirvikalpakamater nāmāntaraṃ kalpitaṃ /
analyzed: paśyanti iti tu nirvikalpaka mateḥ nāma antaram kalpitam

original: vijñānasya hi na prakāśavapuṣaḥ vāgrūpatā śāśvatī /
analyzed: vijñānasya hi na prakāśa vapuṣaḥ vāc rūpa tā śāśvatī

original: jāte 'smin viṣayāvabhāsini tataḥ syād vā 'vamarśo giraḥ na syād vāpi na jātu vāgvirahito bodho jaḍatvaṃ smṛśet //
analyzed: jāte smin viṣaya avabhāsini tatas syāt vā vamarśaḥ giraḥ na syāt vā api na jātu vāc virahitaḥ bodhaḥ jaḍa tvam smṛśet

original: tad āstām iyaṃ śabdabrahmacarcā /
analyzed: tat āstām iyam śabdabrahmacarcā

original: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ //
analyzed: prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ

original: iti vitatayā varṇā ete dhiyā viṣayīkṛtāḥ dadhati padatāṃ vākyatvaṃ vā ta eva ca vācakāḥ /
analyzed: iti vitatayā varṇāḥ ete dhiyā viṣayīkṛtāḥ dadhati pada tām vākya tvam vā te eva ca vācakāḥ

original: na ca tadaparaḥ sphoṭaḥ śrotre vibhāty avabodhane na ca vidhihato vācye buddhiṃ vidhātum asau kṣamaḥ //
analyzed: na ca tad aparaḥ sphoṭaḥ śrotre vibhāti avabodhane na ca vidhi hataḥ vācye buddhim vidhātum asau kṣamaḥ

original: evaṃ sphoṭe pratihite varṇeṣu vācakeṣu sthiteṣu kaścid āha bāḍhaṃ varṇebhyaḥ padārthapratītir astu /
analyzed: evam sphoṭe pratihite varṇeṣu vācakeṣu sthiteṣu kaścid āha bāḍham varṇebhyaḥ padārtha pratītiḥ astu

original: vākyārthapratītau na teṣāṃ sāmarthyam //
analyzed: vākya artha pratītau na teṣām sāmarthyam

original: kutas tarhi vākyārthāvagatiḥ /
analyzed: kutas tarhi vākya artha avagatiḥ

original: padārthebhya ity āha //
analyzed: padārthebhyaḥ iti āha

original: tathā ca varṇānāṃ padārthapratipattau caritārthatvāt na vākyārthe sāmarthyam /
analyzed: tathā ca varṇānām padārtha pratipattau caritārtha tvāt na vākya arthe sāmarthyam

original: aparimlānasāmarthyās tu padārthā āsate /
analyzed: a parimlāna sāmarthyāḥ tu padārthāḥ āsate

original: te vākyārthabuddher vidhātāraḥ //
analyzed: te vākya artha buddheḥ vidhātāraḥ

original: arthāpattyā hi varṇānāṃ kāryeṣu śaktayaḥ kalpyante /
analyzed: artha āpattyā hi varṇānām kāryeṣu śaktayaḥ kalpyante

original: tatra padārthabuddher anyathānupapannatvāt yathoktanītyā varṇānāṃ tatpratipādane śaktir avagamyate /
analyzed: tatra padārtha buddheḥ anyathā anupapanna tvāt yathā ukta nītyā varṇānām tad pratipādane śaktiḥ avagamyate

original: vākyārthapratītiḥ punar anyathā 'py upapadyamānā na tatra teṣāṃ śaktim upakalpayitum arhati //
analyzed: vākya artha pratītiḥ punar anyathā pi upapadyamānā na tatra teṣām śaktim upakalpayitum arhati

original: kiṃ ca kim ekam eva saṃskāram ādadhānā varṇāḥ padārthaṃ vākyārthaṃ ca bodhayanti bhinnaṃ vā /
analyzed: kim ca kim ekam eva saṃskāram ādadhānāḥ varṇāḥ padārtham vākya artham ca bodhayanti bhinnam vā

original: tatra ca ekayaiva hi saṃskṛtyā kathaṃ kāryadvayaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tatra ca ekayā eva hi saṃskṛtyā katham kārya dvayam bhavet

original: na caiṣāṃ pūrvasaṃskārāt anyo 'stīti pratīyate //
analyzed: na ca eṣām pūrva saṃskārāt anyaḥ sti iti pratīyate

original: vākyārthapratīter anyathāpi bhāvāt na nānāsaṃskārakalpanābījam asti //
analyzed: vākya artha pratīteḥ anyathā api bhāvāt na nānā saṃskāra kalpanā bījam asti

original: api ca padeṣu pūrvavarṇeṣu nātidūram atikrānteṣu buddhyopasaṃhartuṃ śakyate ghaṭamānaṃ antyavarṇavelāyām anusaṃdhānaṃ vakyeṣu punar aticirataratirohitākṣaraparaparānusandhānam atikliṣṭam adṛṣṭapūrvam iti durghaṭam etat /
analyzed: api ca padeṣu pūrva varṇeṣu na ati dūram atikrānteṣu buddhyā upasaṃhartum śakyate ghaṭamānam antya varṇa velāyām anusaṃdhānam vakyeṣu punar aticiratara tirohita akṣara para para anusandhānam ati kliṣṭam a dṛṣṭa pūrvam iti durghaṭam etat

original: vyavahitapadoccāraṇe tu dṛśyate vā vākyārthapratītiḥ yatra pūrvavarṇānusandhānagandho 'pi nāsti /
analyzed: vyavahita pada uccāraṇe tu dṛśyate vā vākya artha pratītiḥ yatra pūrva varṇa anusandhāna gandhaḥ na asti

original: tasmān na varṇā vākyārthabuddhihetavaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na varṇāḥ vākya artha buddhi hetavaḥ

original: api ca padārthaṃ vākyārthaṃ ca pratipādayanto varṇāḥ yugapat pratipādayeyuḥ krameṇa vā /
analyzed: api ca padārtham vākya artham ca pratipādayantaḥ varṇāḥ yugapad pratipādayeyuḥ krameṇa vā

original: tatra sakṛduccaritānāṃ yugapad ubhayakaraṇam anupapannam aśakyatvāt //
analyzed: tatra sakṛt uccaritānām yugapad ubhaya karaṇam anupapannam aśakya tvāt

original: kramapakṣe 'pi pūrvaṃ cet vākyārthapratipādanaṃ tad ayuktam anavagatapadārthasya vākyārthapratyayādarśanāt /
analyzed: krama pakṣe pi pūrvam ced vākya artha pratipādanam tat ayuktam anavagata padārthasya vākya artha pratyaya adarśanāt

original: atha pūrvaṃ padārthapratipādanaṃ tato vākyārthapratyāyanaṃ hanta tarhi padārthapratyayād vākyārthabuddheḥ siddhatvāt kim iti punaḥ vyāpārāntare śrama āśrīyate /
analyzed: atha pūrvam padārtha pratipādanam tatas vākya artha pratyāyanam hanta tarhi padārtha pratyayāt vākya artha buddheḥ siddha tvāt kim iti punar vyāpāra antare śramaḥ āśrīyate

original: tasmāt padārthapratipādanaparyavasitasāmarthyāni padāni /
analyzed: tasmāt padārtha pratipādana paryavasita sāmarthyāni padāni

original: padārthebhyas tu vākyārthapratyaya iti siddham //
analyzed: padārthebhyaḥ tu vākya artha pratyayaḥ iti siddham

original: api ca anvayavyatirekābhyām evaṃ avagamyate yat padārthapūrvako vākyārtha iti /
analyzed: api ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām evam avagamyate yat padārtha pūrvakaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti

original: yo hi mānasād apacārāt śruteṣv api padeṣu padārthān nāvagacchati nāvagacchaty eva vākyārtham /
analyzed: yaḥ hi mānasāt apacārāt śruteṣu api padeṣu padārthān na avagacchati na avagacchati eva vākya artham

original: yas tu aśruteṣv api padeṣu pramāṇāntarataḥ padārthān jānīyāt jānāty evāsau vākyārtham //
analyzed: yaḥ tu aśruteṣu api padeṣu pramāṇa antarataḥ padārthān jānīyāt jānāti eva asau vākya artham

original: [paśyataḥ śvetam ārūpaṃ heṣāśabdaṃ ca śṛṇvataḥ /
analyzed: paśyataḥ śvetam ārūpam heṣā śabdam ca śṛṇvataḥ

original: khuravikṣepaśabdaṃ ca śveto 'śvo dhāvatīti dhīḥ] //
analyzed: khura vikṣepa śabdam ca śvetaḥ śvas dhāvati iti dhīḥ

original: [dṛṣṭā vākyavinirmuktā na padārthair vinā kvacid] iti //
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ vākya vinirmuktāḥ na padārthaiḥ vinā kvacid iti

original: tad eṣā vākyārthabuddhiḥ padārthapratītiṃ na vyabhicarati /
analyzed: tat eṣā vākya artha buddhiḥ padārtha pratītim na vyabhicarati

original: vyabhicarati tu padapratītim iti na tatkāryā bhavitum arhatīti //
analyzed: vyabhicarati tu pada pratītim iti na tad kāryā bhavitum arhati iti

original: yad apy ucyate pratyekaṃ vyabhicārāt samuditānām asādhāraṇyāt na padārthānāṃ vākyārthāvagatihetutvam iti tad apy ayuktam /
analyzed: yat api ucyate pratyekam vyabhicārāt samuditānām asādhāraṇyāt na padārthānām vākya artha avagati hetu tvam iti tat api ayuktam

original: pratyekaṃ tāvat gamakatvaṃ neṣyata eva /
analyzed: pratyekam tāvat gamaka tvam na iṣyate eva
