original: samuditānāṃ tv asādhāraṇyaṃ bhavad api na naḥ kṣatikaram /
analyzed: samuditānām tu asādhāraṇyam bhavat api na naḥ kṣati karam

original: na hy ete liṅgavat saṃbandhagrahaṇam apekṣamāṇā avabodhakāḥ yad asādhāraṇyān nāvakalpate /
analyzed: na hi ete liṅga vat saṃbandha grahaṇam apekṣamāṇāḥ avabodhakāḥ yat asādhāraṇyāt na avakalpate

original: kin tu agṛhītasaṃbandhā api ākāṅkṣāyogyatāsannidhitātparyaparyālocanayā parasparaṃ saṃsṛjyante /
analyzed: kin tu agṛhīta saṃbandhāḥ api ākāṅkṣā yogya tā sannidhi tātparya paryālocanayā parasparam saṃsṛjyante

original: sa eva vākyārthaḥ yaḥ saṃsṛṣṭaḥ padārthasamudāyaḥ itaraviśiṣṭo vetara iti //
analyzed: saḥ eva vākya arthaḥ yaḥ saṃsṛṣṭaḥ padārtha samudāyaḥ itara viśiṣṭaḥ vā itaraḥ iti

original: nāpy aśābdatvam ittham vākyārthapratīter āśaṅkanīyam śabdāvagatimūlatvena tasyāḥ śābdatvāt /
analyzed: nā api aśābdatvam ittham vākya artha pratīteḥ āśaṅkanīyam śabda avagati mūla tvena tasyāḥ śābda tvāt

original: śabdāt padārthapratipattau vākyārthapratipattir iti sarvam anavadyam /
analyzed: śabdāt padārtha pratipattau vākya artha pratipattiḥ iti sarvam anavadyam

original: tad uktam [padāni hi svaṃ svam artham abhidhāya nivṛttavyāpārāṇi /
analyzed: tat uktam padāni hi svam svam artham abhidhāya nivṛtta vyāpārāṇi

original: athedānīm avagatāḥ padārthā eva vākyārtham avagamayanti] iti //
analyzed: atha idānīm avagatāḥ padārthāḥ eva vākya artham avagamayanti iti

original: atrāpy abhidhīyate na padārthebhyo vākyārthāvagatiḥ api tu vākyād eva /
analyzed: atra api abhidhīyate na padārthebhyaḥ vākya artha avagatiḥ api tu vākyāt eva

original: tathā cāyaṃ vākyārtha iti prasiddhiḥ na padārthārtha iti /
analyzed: tathā ca ayam vākya arthaḥ iti prasiddhiḥ na padārtha arthaḥ iti

original: yathā hi kālpanikavarṇasamūhātmakaṃ padaṃ padārthapratipattim ādadhāti tathā kālpanikapadasamūhātmakaṃ vākyaṃ vākyārthapratipattim ādhāsyati //
analyzed: yathā hi kālpanika varṇa samūha ātmakam padam padārtha pratipattim ādadhāti tathā kālpanika pada samūha ātmakam vākyam vākya artha pratipattim ādhāsyati

original: nanu padasamūhātmakaṃ vākyam anyan nāsti kin tu padāny eva vākyam /
analyzed: nanu pada samūha ātmakam vākyam anyat nā asti kin tu padāni eva vākyam

original: padānāṃ ca svārthe caritārthatvāt na vākyārthasāmartyam ity uktam naitad yuktam padārthānām api caritārthatvāt /
analyzed: padānām ca svārthe caritārtha tvāt na vākya artha sāmartyam iti uktam na etat yuktam padārthānām api caritārtha tvāt

original: kva teṣāṃ caritārthatvam /
analyzed: kva teṣām caritārtha tvam

original: svapratipattau //
analyzed: sva pratipattau

original: nanu padāni svapratipattau caritārthībhūya padārthapratipattim ādadhati /
analyzed: nanu padāni sva pratipattau caritārthībhūya padārtha pratipattim ādadhati

original: punas tāny eva kathaṃ vākyārthapratipattim ādhāsyanti /
analyzed: punar tāni eva katham vākya artha pratipattim ādhāsyanti

original: padārthas tu svāvagater ūrdhvaṃ na kvacit paratra caritārthā iti vākyārthabuddher vidhātāro bhavantu /
analyzed: padārthaḥ tu sva avagateḥ ūrdhvam na kvacid paratra caritārthāḥ iti vākya artha buddheḥ vidhātāraḥ bhavantu

original: naitad evam antyapadasyānyatra caritārthatvābhāvāt //
analyzed: na etat evam antya padasya anyatra caritārtha tva abhāvāt

original: antyapadam eva pūrvapadasmaraṇopakṛtaṃ vākyam ucyate /
analyzed: antya padam eva pūrva pada smaraṇa upakṛtam vākyam ucyate

original: tadarthaś ca pūrvapadārthaviśiṣṭo vākyārtha ity eke /
analyzed: tad arthaḥ ca pūrva padārtha viśiṣṭaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti eke

original: tasmāt vākyād eva vākyārthapratyayaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt vākyāt eva vākya artha pratyayaḥ

original: kin tu kim ekasaṃskārasmaraṇena kāryadvayaṃ padāni vidadhāti vibhinnasaṃskāreṇa vā iti tatra kāryabhedāt kāraṇabhedānumānam iti prasiddha eṣa panthā /
analyzed: kim tu kim eka saṃskāra smaraṇena kārya dvayam padāni vidadhāti vibhinna saṃskāreṇa vā iti tatra kārya bhedāt kāraṇa bheda anumānam iti prasiddhaḥ eṣa panthāḥ

original: eko 'py atīndriyaḥ saṃskāraḥ kāryāt kalpyate bahavo 'pi tata eva kalpayiṣyante kāryasya bhinnatvāt //
analyzed: ekaḥ pi atīndriyaḥ saṃskāraḥ kāryāt kalpyate bahavaḥ pi tatas eva kalpayiṣyante kāryasya bhinna tvāt

original: yad api ciratirohitavarṇaprabandhānusandhānaṃ durghaṭam iti kathitaṃ tad api na cāru /
analyzed: yat api cira tirohita varṇa prabandha anusandhānam durghaṭam iti kathitam tat api na cāru

original: kayācit kalpanayā varṇānām iva padabuddhau padānām api vākyabuddhāv uparohasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: kayācid kalpanayā varṇānām iva pada buddhau padānām api vākya buddhau uparoha saṃbhavāt

original: etac cānantaraṃ darśayiṣyate //
analyzed: etat ca anantaram darśayiṣyate

original: yad api vikalpitaṃ yugapad vā krameṇa vā varṇāḥ padavākyārthapratyaye vyāpriyeran iti tatra apy ucyate /
analyzed: yat api vikalpitam yugapad vā krameṇa vā varṇāḥ pada vākya artha pratyaye vyāpriyeran iti tatra api ucyate

original: yaugapadyaṃ tāvad anabhyupagamād eva pratyuktam /
analyzed: yaugapadyam tāvat anabhyupagamāt eva pratyuktam

original: kramo 'py eṣām īdṛśaḥ yat prathamaṃ padārtham avagamayanti tato vākyārtham /
analyzed: kramaḥ pi eṣām īdṛśaḥ yat prathamam padārtham avagamayanti tatas vākya artham

original: so 'yaṃ tarhi padārthapūrvaka eva vākyārtha ukto bhavatīti cet maivam /
analyzed: saḥ yam tarhi padārtha pūrvakaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ uktaḥ bhavati iti ced mā evam

original: padārtho hi nāma prameyam eva /
analyzed: padārthaḥ hi nāma prameyam eva

original: na te pramāṇavarge nipatanti /
analyzed: na te pramāṇa varge nipatanti

original: na ca padārthavākyārthayor atyantaṃ bhedaḥ yena tayoḥ dhūmāgnyor iva saṃbandhagrahaṇasāpekṣayoḥ tadanapekṣayor vā rūpadīpayor iva pratyāyyapratyāyakabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na ca padārtha vākya arthayoḥ atyantam bhedaḥ yena tayoḥ dhūma agnyoḥ iva saṃbandha grahaṇa sāpekṣayoḥ tad anapekṣayoḥ vā rūpa dīpayoḥ iva pratyāyya pratyāyaka bhāvaḥ

original: na hi svaśarīra eva gamyagamakavācoyuktiḥ pravartate /
analyzed: na hi sva śarīre eva gamya gamaka vācoyuktiḥ pravartate

original: kathaṃ bhavān svabhāvahetuvādino bauddhasya śiṣya iva nirvṛttaḥ //
analyzed: katham bhavān svabhāva hetu vādinaḥ bauddhasya śiṣyaḥ iva nirvṛttaḥ

original: nanu sāmānye hi padaṃ vartate viśeṣe ca vākyam /
analyzed: nanu sāmānye hi padam vartate viśeṣe ca vākyam

original: anyac ca sāmānyam anye ca viśeṣāḥ /
analyzed: anyat ca sāmānyam anye ca viśeṣāḥ

original: tad uktam [sāmānyāny anyathāsiddheḥ viśeṣaṃ gamayanti hi] iti vyatireka eva pratyāyyapratyāyakayoḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam sāmānyāni anyathā asiddheḥ viśeṣam gamayanti hi iti vyatirekaḥ eva pratyāyya pratyāyakayoḥ

original: ucyate /
analyzed: ucyate

original: bāḍham asty ayam iyān vyatirekaḥ /
analyzed: bāḍham asti ayam iyān vyatirekaḥ

original: kin tu viratavyāpāre cakṣuṣīva śabde dhūmādivat prameyāt padārthāt agner iva vākyārthasyāvagamo nāsti /
analyzed: kin tu virata vyāpāre cakṣuṣi iva śabde dhūma ādi vat prameyāt padārthāt agneḥ iva vākya arthasya avagamaḥ na asti

original: na hi padārthāḥ prameyībhūya dhūmavat punaḥ pramāṇībhavitum arhanti /
analyzed: na hi padārthāḥ prameyībhūya dhūma vat punar pramāṇībhavitum arhanti

original: kin tu padāny eva tatpratipādanadvāreṇa vākyārthapratipattau paryavasyanti /
analyzed: kin tu padāni eva tad pratipādana dvāreṇa vākya artha pratipattau paryavasyanti

original: katham ātmīyam eva granthaṃ nāvabudhyante bhavantaḥ /
analyzed: katham ātmīyam eva grantham na avabudhyante bhavantaḥ

original: [vākyārthapratyaye teṣāṃ pravṛttau nāntarīyakam /
analyzed: vākya artha pratyaye teṣām pravṛttau nāntarīyakam

original: pāke jvaleva kāṣṭānāṃ padārthapratipādanam] //
analyzed: pāke jvalā iva kāṣṭānām padārtha pratipādanam

original: avāntaravyāpāro hi na kārakasya pradhāne vyāpāre kārakatāṃ vyāhanti /
analyzed: avāntara vyāpāraḥ hi na kārakasya pradhāne vyāpāre kāraka tām vyāhanti

original: padānāṃ hi dvayī śaktiḥ abhidhātrī tātparyaśaktiś ca /
analyzed: padānām hi dvayī śaktiḥ abhidhātrī tātparya śaktiḥ ca

original: tatra abhidhātrī śaktir eṣāṃ padārtheṣūpayuktā /
analyzed: tatra abhidhātrī śaktiḥ eṣām padārtheṣu upayuktā

original: tātparyaśaktiś ca vākyārthe paryavasyatīti //
analyzed: tātparya śaktiḥ ca vākya arthe paryavasyati iti

original: bhāṣyakāro 'pi [padāni hi svaṃ svam artham abhidhāya nivṛttavyāpārāṇi] iti vadan abhidhāvyāpāra eva śakteḥ viratim āha na tātparyaśakteḥ /
analyzed: bhāṣyakāraḥ pi padāni hi svam svam artham abhidhāya nivṛtta vyāpārāṇi iti vadan abhidhā vyāpāre eva śakteḥ viratim āha na tātparya śakteḥ

original: abhidhāya nivṛttavyāpārāṇi padāni yadarthaparāṇi tatrānivṛttavyāpārāṇy eva evaṃ hi śābdatā vākyārthapratyayasya na hāsyate /
analyzed: abhidhāya nivṛtta vyāpārāṇi padāni yad artha parāṇi tatra anivṛtta vyāpārāṇi eva evam hi śābda tā vākya artha pratyayasya na hāsyate

original: sarvātmanā tu viratavyāpāre śabde sāvaśyaṃ hīyate /
analyzed: sarva ātmanā tu virata vyāpāre śabde sā avaśyam hīyate

original: śabdāvagatimūlatvāt tu śābdatve śrautratvam api syāt śrotrasya pāraṃparyeṇa tanmūlatvāt /
analyzed: śabda avagati mūla tvāt tu śābda tve śrautra tvam api syāt śrotrasya pāraṃparyeṇa tad mūla tvāt

original: śabde ca viratavyāpāre katamat tatpramāṇam yasya vākyārthapratītiḥ phalam iti vidmaḥ //
analyzed: śabde ca virata vyāpāre katamat tat pramāṇam yasya vākya artha pratītiḥ phalam iti vidmaḥ

original: na pratyakṣam atīndriyatvād vākyārthasya /
analyzed: na pratyakṣam atīndriya tvāt vākya arthasya

original: nānumānam [na cānumānam eṣā dhīḥ] ityādinā granthavistareṇa svayam eva nirastatvāt /
analyzed: na anumānam na ca anumānam eṣā dhīḥ ityādinā grantha vistareṇa svayam eva nirasta tvāt

original: na śabda nivṛttavyāpāratvāt //
analyzed: na śabda nivṛtta vyāpāra tvāt

original: [sāmānyāny anyathāsiddheḥ viśeṣaṃ gamayanti hi] iti nyāyāt /
analyzed: sāmānyāni anyathā asiddheḥ viśeṣam gamayanti hi iti nyāyāt

original: arthāpattir iti cet kim idānīṃ arthāpattigamyo dharmaḥ /
analyzed: arthāpattiḥ iti ced kim idānīm arthāpatti gamyaḥ dharmaḥ

original: na caitad yuktaṃ iṣṭaṃ vā /
analyzed: na ca etat yuktam iṣṭam vā

original: tad idaṃ saptamaṃ pramāṇam avatarati pārārthyaṃ nāma /
analyzed: tat idam saptamam pramāṇam avatarati pārārthyam nāma

original: etac cāpi neṣṭam /
analyzed: etat ca api na iṣṭam

original: ato na padārthanimittakaḥ vākyārthapratyayaḥ //
analyzed: atas na padārtha nimittakaḥ vākya artha pratyayaḥ

original: yad apy uktaṃ anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ padārthanimittakatvaṃ vākyārthasyāvagamyata iti tatra padārthasaṃsargasvabhāvatvād vākyārthasya satyaṃ tatpūrvakatvam iṣyata eva vākyārthapratipatteḥ na tu tajjanyatvaṃ śabdavyāpārānuparamāt /
analyzed: yat api uktam anvaya vyatirekābhyām padārtha nimittaka tvam vākya arthasya avagamyate iti tatra padārtha saṃsarga svabhāva tvāt vākya arthasya satyam tad pūrvaka tvam iṣyate eva vākya artha pratipatteḥ na tu tad janya tvam śabda vyāpāra anuparamāt

original: mānase cāpacāre sati padānāṃ api grahaṇaṃ nāsty eva yataḥ kṣaṇāntare samāhitacetāḥ sa vakti [nāham etad aśrauṣam anyatra me mano 'bhūt punar brūhi] iti /
analyzed: mānase ca apacāre sati padānām api grahaṇam na asti eva yatas kṣaṇa antare samāhita cetāḥ sa vakti na aham etat aśrauṣam anyatra me manaḥ bhūt punar brūhi iti

original: itarathā hi padāni smṛtvā tadartham evāvagacchet na punaḥ pṛcchet /
analyzed: itarathā hi padāni smṛtvā tad artham eva avagacchet na punar pṛcchet

original: tasmāt padānāṃ grahaṇam eva tatra vākyārthāvagame nimittam //
analyzed: tasmāt padānām grahaṇam eva tatra vākya artha avagame nimittam

original: yad api [paśyataḥ śvetam ārūpaṃ] iti tad api na kiṃcit /
analyzed: yat api paśyataḥ śvetam iti tat api na kiṃcid

original: kiṃ pratyakṣeṇa śuklo gauḥ gacchat dṛśyate /
analyzed: kim pratyakṣeṇa śuklaḥ gauḥ gacchat dṛśyate

original: na śuklo gauḥ gacchatīti vākyasyārtho na bhavati /
analyzed: na śuklaḥ gauḥ gacchati iti vākyasya arthaḥ na bhavati

original: pratyakṣapratibhāsāt tu pratyakṣārtha evāsau na vākyārtha ity ucyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣa pratibhāsāt tu pratyakṣa arthaḥ eva asau na vākya arthaḥ iti ucyate

original: evaṃ [śveto 'śvo dhāvati] ity ānumāniko 'yaṃ pratyayaḥ parvate 'gnir itivat /
analyzed: evam śvetaḥ śvas dhāvati iti ānumānikaḥ yam pratyayaḥ parvate gniḥ iti vat

original: vākyaśravaṇāt tu vinā na vākyārtho bhavitum arhatīty alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: vākya śravaṇāt tu vinā na vākya arthaḥ bhavitum arhati iti alam prasaṅgena

original: tasmāt varṇebhya eva kayācit kalpanayā padavākyabhāvam upagatebhyaḥ padārthavākyārthapratyaya iti yuktam /
analyzed: tasmāt varṇebhyaḥ eva kayācid kalpanayā pada vākya bhāvam upagatebhyaḥ padārtha vākya artha pratyayaḥ iti yuktam

original: tasmāt padārthajanyā na bhavati vākyārthabuddhir iti siddham /
analyzed: tasmāt padārtha janyā na bhavati vākya artha buddhiḥ iti siddham

original: anuparatavyāpārāt vākyād eveyam udbhavati //
analyzed: an uparata vyāpārāt vākyāt eva iyam udbhavati

original: āha kayā punaḥ kalpanāyā padavākyabhāvam upagatā varṇāḥ padārthavākyārthapratītim ādadhyur iti //
analyzed: āha kayā punar kalpanāyā pada vākya bhāvam upagatāḥ varṇāḥ padārtha vākya artha pratītim ādadhyuḥ iti

original: tatra ācāryās tāvad imāṃ kalpanām adīdṛśan /
analyzed: tatra ācāryāḥ tāvat imām kalpanām adīdṛśan

original: prathamaṃ varṇajñānaṃ tataḥ saṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: prathamam varṇa jñānam tatas saṃskāraḥ

original: tato dvitīyavarṇajñānaṃ tena prathamavarṇajñānajanitena ca saṃskārena paṭutarasaṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: tatas dvitīya varṇa jñānam tena prathama varṇa jñāna janitena ca saṃskārena paṭutara saṃskāraḥ

original: tataḥ tṛtīyavarṇajñānaṃ tena prāktanena saṃskāreṇa paṭutaraḥ saṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: tatas tṛtīya varṇa jñānam tena prāktanena saṃskāreṇa paṭutaraḥ saṃskāraḥ

original: evaṃ yāvad antyavarṇajñānam /
analyzed: evam yāvat antya varṇa jñānam

original: antyavarṇānantaraṃ tu tataḥ saṃskārāt sakalapūrvavarṇaviṣayam ekasmaraṇam /
analyzed: antya varṇa anantaram tu tatas saṃskārāt sakala pūrva varṇa viṣayam eka smaraṇam

original: tenāntyavarṇajñānasya vinaśyattā /
analyzed: tena antya varṇa jñānasya vinaśyat tā

original: vinaśyadavasthagrahaṇasmaraṇaviṣayīkṛto varṇasamūhaḥ padam iti jñāyate //
analyzed: vinaśyat avastha grahaṇa smaraṇa viṣayīkṛtaḥ varṇa samūhaḥ padam iti jñāyate

original: tataḥ padajñānāt saṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: tatas pada jñānāt saṃskāraḥ

original: tataḥ tathaiva varṇakrameṇa dvitīyapadajñānam /
analyzed: tatas tathā eva varṇa krameṇa dvitīya pada jñānam

original: tena prathapadajñānajanmanā ca saṃskāreṇa paṭutarasaṃskāro janyate /
analyzed: tena ca saṃskāreṇa paṭutara saṃskāraḥ janyate

original: punas tenaiva krameṇa tṛtīyapadajñānam /
analyzed: punar tena eva krameṇa tṛtīya pada jñānam

original: tena prāktanena ca saṃskāreṇa pīvarataraḥ saṃskāraḥ janyate /
analyzed: tena prāktanena ca saṃskāreṇa pīvarataraḥ saṃskāraḥ janyate

original: evaṃ yāvad antyapadajñānaṃ antareṇa sthavīyasā saṃskāreṇa sarvapadaviṣayam ekasmaraṇam upajanyate /
analyzed: evam yāvat antya pada jñānam antareṇa sthavīyasā saṃskāreṇa sarva pada viṣayam eka smaraṇam upajanyate

original: saṃskārasyaivaikatvāt so 'yaṃ smaraṇānubhavaviṣayīkṛtavarṇasamūha eva padam /
analyzed: saṃskārasya eva eka tvāt saḥ yam smaraṇa anubhava viṣayīkṛta varṇa samūhaḥ eva padam

original: padasamūho vākyam ity ucyate /
analyzed: pada samūhaḥ vākyam iti ucyate

original: tato vākyārthapratipattiḥ /
analyzed: tatas vākya artha pratipattiḥ

original: saṃskārasya ca saṃskārāntarakaraṇakauśalam avaśyam eṣitavyam /
analyzed: saṃskārasya ca saṃskāra antara karaṇa kauśalam avaśyam eṣitavyam

original: anyathā sarvatra kriyābhyāso 'narthakaḥ syād iti //
analyzed: anyathā sarvatra kriyā abhyāsaḥ narthakaḥ syāt iti

original: atra vadanti neyaṃ prakriyā sādhvī jñānayaugapadyaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: atra vadanti nā iyam prakriyā sādhvī jñāna yaugapadya prasaṅgāt

original: tathā hi caramapadapratibhāsānantaraṃ yathā pūrvapadasmaraṇaṃ  tathā tadaiva saṃketasmaraṇenāpi bhavitavyam /
analyzed: tathā hi carama pada pratibhāsa anantaram yathā pūrva pada smaraṇam tathā tadā eva saṃketa smaraṇena api bhavitavyam

original: anavagatapadārthasaṃbandhasya hi na vākyārthapratītiḥ /
analyzed: anavagata padārtha saṃbandhasya hi na vākya artha pratītiḥ

original: asmṛtasaṃketasya ca na padārthapratītiḥ yatrāpy abhyaste viṣaye saṃketasmṛtir na saṃvedyate tatrāpy avinābhāvasmṛtir eva balād asau kalpyate anavagatapadapadārthasaṃbandhasya nārikeladvīpavāsina ivārthapratyayābhāvāt /
analyzed: asmṛta saṃketasya ca na padārtha pratītiḥ yatra api abhyaste viṣaye saṃketa smṛtiḥ na saṃvedyate tatra api avinābhāva smṛtiḥ eva balāt asau kalpyate anavagata pada padārtha saṃbandhasya nārikela dvīpa vāsinaḥ iva artha pratyaya abhāvāt

original: saṃbandhānubhavasya ca pūrvavṛttatvenedanīṃ smaraṇamukhenaupakāritvāt /
analyzed: saṃbandha anubhavasya ca pūrva vṛtta tvena idanīm smaraṇa mukhena aupakāri tvāt

original: tasmād antyapadajñānānantaraṃ pūrvapadasamayasmaraṇayoḥ yugapadutpādāt jñānayaugapadyam //
analyzed: tasmāt antya pada jñāna anantaram pūrva pada samaya smaraṇayoḥ yugapad utpādāt jñāna yaugapadyam

original: atha samayasmaraṇānantaraṃ pūrvapadasmaraṇam upeyate tathāpi tatsmṛtikāle padārthajñānopajananāt punar api jñānayaugapadyam /
analyzed: atha samaya smaraṇa anantaram pūrva pada smaraṇam upeyate tathā api tad smṛti kāle padārtha jñāna upajananāt punar api jñāna yaugapadyam

original: na  ca tadā padārthajñānaṃ nodetīti śakyate vaktum avikalatadupajananakāraṇasāmagrīsannidhānāt pratināyakasya ca tadānīm abhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca tadā padārtha jñānam na udeti iti śakyate vaktum avikala tad upajanana kāraṇa sāmagrī sannidhānāt pratināyakasya ca tadānīm abhāvāt

original: padārthajñānottarakālaṃ tarhi pūrvapadasmaraṇam astv iti cet evaṃ tarhi caramapadajñānapratyastamayāt antyapadarahitaṃ vākyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: padārtha jñāna uttara kālam tarhi pūrva pada smaraṇam astu iti ced evam tarhi carama pada jñāna prati asta mayāt antya pada rahitam vākyam syāt

original: antyapadajñānasya hi saṅketasmṛtivelāyāṃ vinaśyattā padārthajñānavelāyāṃ vināśa eva yataḥ //
analyzed: antya pada jñānasya hi saṅketa smṛti velāyām vinaśyat tā padārtha jñāna velāyām vināśaḥ eva yatas

original: brūyāt asaṃvedyamānam api tadānīm antyapadam asty eveti svasti tarhi nyāyavistarāya //
analyzed: brūyāt a saṃvedyamānam api tadānīm antya padam asti eva iti svasti tarhi nyāya vistarāya

original: api ca tadānīm anupalabhyamānenāpi satā kim antyapadena kriyate punar avagamo 'sya bhaviṣyatīti cet sa kutastyaḥ /
analyzed: api ca tadānīm anupalabhyamānena api satā kim antya padena kriyate punar avagamaḥ sya bhaviṣyati iti ced sa kutastyaḥ

original: śrotrasya viramyavyāpārāsaṃvedanāt /
analyzed: śrotrasya viramya vyāpāra a saṃvedanāt

original: manasaś ca svātantryeṇa bāhye viṣaye sāmarthyāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: manasaḥ ca svātantryeṇa bāhye viṣaye sāmarthya asaṃbhavāt

original: saty api punas tadavagame jñānayaugapadyānapāyāt //
analyzed: sati api punar tad avagame jñāna yaugapadya anapāyāt

original: api ca pūrvapadaiḥ arthaśūnyatayā śuṣkanīrasatanubhiḥ antyapadānubhava samanantaraṃ smṛtair api ko guṇaḥ /
analyzed: api ca pūrva padaiḥ artha śūnya tayā śuṣka nīrasa tanubhiḥ antya pada anubhava samanantaram smṛtaiḥ api kaḥ guṇaḥ

original: na hi tathāvidhapadasmaraṇam arthapratyāyanāṅgam //
analyzed: na hi tathāvidha pada smaraṇam artha pratyāyana aṅgam

original: atha sārthakāni prāṃci padāni smaryante tarhi samayasmaraṇapadārthajñānādikāryasāṅkaryakṛtaṃ anekaśākhāṃ pratipadaṃ jñānayaugapadyam āpadyata ity asatīyaṃ kalpanā //
analyzed: atha sārthakāni prāṃci padāni smaryante tarhi samaya smaraṇa padārtha jñāna ādi kārya sāṅkarya kṛtam aneka śākhām pratipadam jñāna yaugapadyam āpadyate iti asatī iyam kalpanā

original: vyākhyātāras tu prakriyāntaram ācacakṣuḥ varṇānugamarūpeṇa tāvat prathamapadajñānam utpadyate /
analyzed: vyākhyātāraḥ tu prakriyā antaram ācacakṣuḥ varṇa anugama rūpeṇa tāvat prathama pada jñānam utpadyate

original: tataḥ saṅketasmaraṇam /
analyzed: tatas saṅketa smaraṇam

original: tena vinaśya  eva labdham iti kiṃ tatsmaraṇena /
analyzed: tena vinaśya eva labdham iti kim tad smaraṇena

original: tadabhāvāc ca nātra jñānayaugapadyādicodyāvasaraḥ samasti /
analyzed: tad abhāvāt ca na atra jñāna yaugapadya ādi codya avasaraḥ samasti

original: yathopadarśitāntyapadajñānam eva ca vākyārthajñānam iti na tasya caritārthatvam anyatra ity evaṃ vākyād eva vākyārthapratyayaḥ setsyati na padarthebhya iti //
analyzed: yathā upadarśita antya pada jñānam eva ca vākya artha jñānam iti na tasya caritārtha tvam anyatra iti evam vākyāt eva vākya artha pratyayaḥ setsyati na pada arthebhyaḥ iti

original: iyam api na niravadyā kalpanety apare prathamapadoparāgapūrvakadvitīyapadajñānopajananānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: iyam api na niravadyā kalpanā iti apare prathama pada uparāga pūrvaka dvitīya pada jñāna upajanana anupapatteḥ

original: prathamapadajñānānantaraṃ hi saṃbandhasmaraṇam /
analyzed: prathama pada jñāna anantaram hi saṃbandha smaraṇam

original: tenaiva tasya vinaśyattā /
analyzed: tena eva tasya vinaśyat tā

original: padārthapratipattikāle ca padajñānaṃ vinaṣṭam eva /
analyzed: padārtha pratipatti kāle ca pada jñānam vinaṣṭam eva

original: vinaśyadavasthā buddhiḥ buddhyantaravirodhinīti sāmānyena śravaṇāt //
analyzed: vinaśyat avasthā buddhiḥ buddhi antara virodhinī iti sāmānyena śravaṇāt

original: brūyāt kāryabhūtayā buddhyā kāraṇabhūtabhuddhiḥ viruddhyate na buddhimātreṇa buddhimātram iti /
analyzed: brūyāt kārya bhūtayā buddhyā kāraṇa bhūta bhuddhiḥ viruddhyate na buddhi mātreṇa buddhi mātram iti

original: etad ayuktam viśeṣe pramāṇābhāvāt //
analyzed: etat ayuktam viśeṣe pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: abhyupagamyāpi brūmaḥ viśeṣe pramāṇabhūtayor eva buddhyor bhavatu vadhyavighātabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: abhyupagamya api brūmaḥ viśeṣe pramāṇa bhūtayoḥ eva buddhyoḥ bhavatu vadhya vighāta bhāvaḥ

original: tathāpi padajñānaṃ saṃkāra iva samayasmṛteḥ kāraṇam eva saṃskāreṇeva tenāpi vinā tadanutpādāt /
analyzed: tathā api pada jñānam saṃkāraḥ iva samaya smṛteḥ kāraṇam eva saṃskāreṇa iva tena api vinā tad anutpādāt

original: saṃskāraprabodhe tasya vyāpāra iti cet tenāpi dvareṇa yat kāraṇaṃ tat kāraṇam eva /
analyzed: saṃskāra prabodhe tasya vyāpāraḥ iti ced tena api dvareṇa yat kāraṇam tat kāraṇam eva

original: tad iha padajñānaṃ samayasmaraṇaṃ padārthajñānam iti trīṇi jñānāni yugapad avatiṣṭhanta iti paraḥ prāmādaḥ /
analyzed: tat iha pada jñānam samaya smaraṇam padārtha jñānam iti trīṇi jñānāni yugapad avatiṣṭhante iti paraḥ prāmādaḥ

original: api ca padajñānam upajāyamānaṃ varṇakrameṇa jāyate na sahasaiva niraṃśapadavādasya vyudastatvāt /
analyzed: api ca pada jñānam upajāyamānam varṇa krameṇa jāyate na sahasā eva niraṃśa pada vādasya vyudasta tvāt

original: tatra ca dvitrāṇi tricaturāṇi paṃcaṣāṇi vā 'kṣarāṇi kramena grahīṣyante /
analyzed: tatra ca dvitrāṇi tricaturāṇi paṃcaṣāṇi vā kṣarāṇi kramena grahīṣyante

original: tadviṣayā hi kramabhāvinyaḥ upajananāpāyadharmikā buddhyaḥ /
analyzed: tad viṣayāḥ hi krama bhāvinyaḥ upajanana apāya dharmikāḥ buddhyaḥ

original: atrāntare vinaśyadavastham ādyapadajñānam āsiṣyate taduparāgeṇa dvitīyapadajñānam utpatsyata iti durāśaiveyam /
analyzed: atrā antare vinaśyat avastham ādya pada jñānam āsiṣyate tad uparāgeṇa dvitīya pada jñānam utpatsyate iti durāśā evā iyam

original: api ca vyavahitoccaritebhyo 'pi padebhya vākyārthapratyayaḥ dṛśyate /
analyzed: api ca vyavahita uccaritebhyaḥ pi padebhyaḥ vākya artha pratyayaḥ dṛśyate

original: yatrānekakāryaparyālocanāvyagrahṛdayaḥ svāmī [re kandalaka] ity uktvā kāryāntaraṃ saṃvidhāya [turagaṃ] iti vadati /
analyzed: yatra aneka kārya paryālocanā vyagra hṛdayaḥ svāmī re kandalakaḥ iti uktvā kārya antaram saṃvidhāya iti vadati

original: punaḥ prayojanāntarāya vyavahatya [kalpitaparyāṇaṃ] ityādi vakti /
analyzed: punar prayojana antarāya vyavahatya kalpita paryāṇam ityādi vakti

original: punar anyat kim api kṛtvā bravīti [ānaya] iti /
analyzed: punar anyat kim api kṛtvā bravīti ānaya iti

original: tatra [re kandalaka kalpitaparyāṇaṃ turagam ānaya] iti vākyārthāvagamo bhavati /
analyzed: tatra re kandalaka kalpita paryāṇam turagam ānaya iti vākya artha avagamaḥ bhavati

original: bhavanmate cāsau durupapādaḥ /
analyzed: bhavat mate ca asau durupapādaḥ

original: padānurāgasya tatrāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: pada anurāgasya tatra asaṃbhavāt

original: pūrvapadasmaraṇasya cānabhyupagamāt //
analyzed: pūrva pada smaraṇasya ca anabhyupagamāt

original: kiṃ ca na pravaramatānusāriṇām iva bhavatāṃ viśeṣyabuddhiṣu viśeṣaṇaviśeṣye dve vastunī ālambanam api tu viśeṣyamātram upāyabhedād eva pratītyatiśaya iti /
analyzed: kim ca na pravara mata anusāriṇām iva bhavatām viśeṣya buddhiṣu viśeṣaṇa viśeṣye dve vastunī ālambanam api tu viśeṣya mātram upāya bhedāt eva pratīti atiśayaḥ iti

original: tataś ca saty api pūrvapadānurāge tatpratibhāsābhāvāt śuddham eva dvitīyapadajñānaṃ saṃpannnam iti kiṃ tadanurāgeṇa /
analyzed: tatas ca sati api pūrva pada anurāge tad pratibhāsa abhāvāt śuddham eva dvitīya pada jñānam saṃpannam iti kim tad anurāgeṇa

original: ataś ceyam anupapannā kalpanā yato dvitīyapadasya svārthe śuddhasyaiva saṅketagrahaṇaṃ vṛttam /
analyzed: atas ca iyam anupapannā kalpanā yatas dvitīya padasya svārthe śuddhasya eva saṅketa grahaṇam vṛttam

original: yadā kvacit prathamaṃ prayuktam āsīt adhunā tu tat padaṃ padāntaroparaktaṃ saṃjātam iti tādṛśasyāgṛhītasaṃbandhatvād arthapratipattihetutvaṃ na syād ity āstām apūrvam idaṃ śaṅkarasvāminaḥ pāṇḍityam //
analyzed: yadā kvacid prathamam prayuktam āsīt adhunā tu tat padam pada antara uparaktam saṃjātam iti tādṛśasya agṛhīta saṃbandha tvāt artha pratipatti hetu tvam na syāt iti āstām apūrvam idam śaṅkarasvāminaḥ pāṇḍityam

original: āha yadīmāḥ sarvā eva sadoṣāḥ tāntrikaracitāḥ kalpanāḥ na sādhīyasyaś cet tadā [tmīyā kācana nirdoṣāsādhvī kalpanā nivedyatām /
analyzed: āha yadi imāḥ sarvāḥ eva sa doṣāḥ tāntrika racitāḥ kalpanāḥ na sādhīyasyaḥ ced tadā tmīyā kācana nirdoṣā asādhvī kalpanā nivedyatām

original: ucyate na vayam ātmīyam abhinavāṃ kām api kalpanām utpādayituṃ kṣamāḥ //
analyzed: ucyate na vayam ātmīyam abhinavām kām api kalpanām utpādayitum kṣamāḥ

original: na hīyaṃ kavibhiḥ pūrvaiḥ adṛṣṭā sūkṣmadarśibhiḥ /
analyzed: na hi iyam kavibhiḥ pūrvaiḥ adṛṣṭā sūkṣma darśibhiḥ

original: śaktā tṛṇam api dṛaṣṭuṃ matir mama tapasvinī //
analyzed: śaktā tṛṇam api dṛaṣṭum matiḥ mama tapasvinī

original: kas tarhi vidvanmatitarkaṇīyagranthopabandhe tava dohado 'yam /
analyzed: kaḥ tarhi vidvat mati tarkaṇīya grantha upabandhe tava dohadaḥ yam

original: na dohadaḥ paryanuyogabhūmiḥ paropadeśāc ca na tasya śāntiḥ //
analyzed: na dohadaḥ paryanuyoga bhūmiḥ para upadeśāt ca na tasya śāntiḥ

original: rājā tu gahvare 'smin aśabdake bandhane vinihito 'ham /
analyzed: rājā tu gahvare smin aśabdake bandhane vinihitaḥ ham

original: grantharacanāvinodāt iha hi mayā vāsarā gamitāḥ //
analyzed: grantha racanā vinodāt iha hi mayā vāsarāḥ gamitāḥ

original: tathāpi vaktavyaṃ kathaṃ varṇebhyo vākyārthapratītir iti /
analyzed: tathā api vaktavyam katham varṇebhyaḥ vākya artha pratītiḥ iti

original: ucyate cirātikrāntatvaṃ acirātikrāntatvaṃ vā na smṛtikāraṇam /
analyzed: ucyate cira atikrānta tvam acira atikrānta tvam vā na smṛti kāraṇam

original: saṃskārakaraṇakaṃ hi smaraṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: saṃskāra karaṇakam hi smaraṇam bhavati

original: tac ca sadyaḥ pralīne cirapralīne vā na viśiṣyate ity evaṃ sarveṣaṃ padānāṃ ciratirohitānām api vyavahitoccāritānām api saṃskārāt smaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tat ca sadyas pralīne cira pralīne vā na viśiṣyate iti evam sarveṣam padānām cira tirohitānām api vyavahita uccāritānām api saṃskārāt smaraṇam bhaviṣyati

original: antyapadasya cānubhūyamānatvopagame jñānayaugapadyādipramādaprasaṅga iti varam antyapadam api smaryamāṇam astu /
analyzed: antya padasya ca anubhūyamāna tva upagame jñāna yaugapadya ādi pramāda prasaṅgaḥ iti varam antya padam api smaryamāṇam astu

original: smṛtiārūḍhāny eva sarvapadāni vākyārtham avagamayiṣyanti //
analyzed: smṛti ārūḍhāni eva sarva padāni vākya artham avagamayiṣyanti

original: tatra ceyaṃ kalpanā /
analyzed: tatra ca iyam kalpanā

original: varṇakrameṇa tāvat prathamapadajñānam /
analyzed: varṇa krameṇa tāvat prathama pada jñānam

original: tataḥ saṅketasmaraṇaṃ saṃskāraś ca yugapad bhavataḥ /
analyzed: tatas saṅketa smaraṇam saṃskāraḥ ca yugapad bhavataḥ

original: jñānayor hi yaugapadyaṃ śāstre pratisiddhaṃ na saṃskārayoḥ /
analyzed: jñānayoḥ hi yaugapadyam śāstre pratisiddham na saṃskārayoḥ

original: tataḥ padārthajñānam /
analyzed: tatas padārtha jñānam

original: tenāpi saṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: tena api saṃskāraḥ

original: punar varṇakrameṇa dvitīyapadajñānam /
analyzed: punar varṇa krameṇa dvitīya pada jñānam

original: tataḥ saṅketasmaraṇam /
analyzed: tatas saṅketa smaraṇam

original: pūrvasaṃskārasahitena ca tena paṭutaraḥ saṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: pūrva saṃskāra sahitena ca tena paṭutaraḥ saṃskāraḥ

original: punaḥ pūrvavarṇakrameṇa tṛtīyapadajñānaṃ saṃskārasmaraṇaṃ pūrvasaṃskārāpekṣaḥ padutaraḥ saṃskāra ity evaṃ padajñānajanite pīvare saṃskāre padārthajñānajanite ca tādṛśi saṃskāre sthite antyapadārthajñānānantaraṃ padasaṃskārāt sarvapadaviṣayasmṛtiḥ padārthasaṃskārāc ca padārthaviṣayā smṛtir iti saṃskāratrayāt krameṇa dve smṛtī bhavataḥ /
analyzed: punar pūrva varṇa krameṇa tṛtīya pada jñānam saṃskāra smaraṇam pūrva saṃskāra apekṣaḥ saṃskāraḥ iti evam pada jñāna janite pīvare saṃskāre padārtha jñāna janite ca tādṛśi saṃskāre sthite antya padārtha jñāna anantaram pada saṃskārāt sarva pada viṣaya smṛtiḥ padārtha saṃskārāt ca padārtha viṣayā smṛtiḥ iti saṃskāra trayāt krameṇa dve smṛtī bhavataḥ

original: tatraikasyāṃ smṛtāv upārūḍhaḥ padasamūho vākyaṃ itarasyām upārūḍhaḥ padārthasamūho vākyārthaḥ //
analyzed: tatra ekasyām smṛtau upārūḍhaḥ pada samūhaḥ vākyam itarasyām upārūḍhaḥ padārtha samūhaḥ vākya arthaḥ

original: nanu smṛter apramāṇatvāt apramāṇatvam idānīṃ vākyārthapratīteḥ maivam tathāsaṃbandhagrahāt /
analyzed: nanu smṛteḥ apramāṇa tvāt apramāṇa tvam idānīm vākya artha pratīteḥ mā evam tathā saṃbandha grahāt

original: yatra hy anyathāsaṃbandhagrahaṇaṃ anyathā ca pratipattiḥ tatrāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
analyzed: yatra hi anyathā saṃbandha grahaṇam anyathā ca pratipattiḥ tatra ayam doṣaḥ

original: yathā dhūme gṛhītasaṃbandhe nīhārād dahanānumitau /
analyzed: yathā dhūme gṛhīta saṃbandhe nīhārāt dahana anumitau

original: iha tu kramavartināṃ varṇānāṃ anyathā pratipattyasaṃbhavāt yathaiva vyutpattiḥ tathaiva pratītir iti na kiṃcid avadyam /
analyzed: iha tu krama vartinām varṇānām anyathā pratipatti asaṃbhavāt yathā eva vyutpattiḥ tathā eva pratītiḥ iti na kiṃcid avadyam

original: aciranirvṛttānubhavasamanantarabhāvinī ca smṛtir anubhavāyate //
analyzed: acira nirvṛtta anubhava samanantara bhāvinī ca smṛtiḥ anubhavāyate

original: atha vā kṛtaṃ smaraṇakalpanayā /
analyzed: atha vā kṛtam smaraṇa kalpanayā

original: antyapadārthajñānānantaraṃ sakalapadapadārthaviṣayo mānaso 'nuvyavasāyaḥ śatādipratyayasthānīyā bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: antya padārtha jñāna anantaram sakala pada padārtha viṣayaḥ mānasaḥ śata ādi pratyaya sthānīyā bhaviṣyati

original: tadupārūḍhāni padāni vākyaṃ tadupārūḍhaś ca padārtho vākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: tad upārūḍhāni padāni vākyam tad upārūḍhaḥ ca padārthaḥ vākya arthaḥ

original: tathāvidhaś ca mānaso 'nuvyavasāyaḥ sakalalokasākṣikatvād apratyākhyeyaḥ /
analyzed: tathāvidhaḥ ca mānasaḥ nuvyavasāyaḥ sakala loka sākṣika tvāt a pratyākhyeyaḥ

original: nanu antyapadārthajñānānantaraṃ kiṃ pūrvapadatadarthaviṣayena smaraṇena anuvyavasāyena vā /
analyzed: nanu antya padārtha jñāna anantaram kim pūrva pada tad artha viṣayena smaraṇena anuvyavasāyena vā

original: antyapadārthaś cet jñānaḥ samāptaṃ kartavyaṃ kim anyad avaśiṣṭaṃ yat vyavasāyena smaraṇena anuvyavasāyena vā kariṣyate /
analyzed: antya padārthaḥ ced jñānaḥ samāptam kartavyam kim anyat avaśiṣṭam yat vyavasāyena smaraṇena anuvyavasāyena vā kariṣyate

original: kathaṃ na kariṣyate ekākāro hi vākyavākyārthapratyayaḥ pratyātmavedanīyo na śakyate 'pahnotum /
analyzed: katham na kariṣyate eka ākāraḥ hi vākya vākya artha pratyayaḥ pratyātma vedanīyaḥ na śakyate pahnotum

original: na cāsau smaraṇād anuvyavasāyād vā vinā saṃpadyate ity asti tadupayogaḥ /
analyzed: na ca asau smaraṇāt anuvyavasāyāt vā vinā saṃpadyate iti asti tad upayogaḥ

original: itthaṃ smaraṇārūḍhaṃ saṃkalanājñānaviṣayīkṛtaṃ cedaṃ padanikurumbaṃ vākyaṃ tathāvidhaś caiṣa vākyārthaḥ //
analyzed: ittham smaraṇa ārūḍham saṃkalanā jñāna viṣayīkṛtam ca idam pada nikurumbam vākyam tathāvidhaḥ ca eṣa vākya arthaḥ

original: nanu mā bhūt padasphoṭaḥ vākyasphoṭaś ca vācakaḥ /
analyzed: nanu mā bhūt pada sphoṭaḥ vākya sphoṭaḥ ca vācakaḥ

original: mā ca bhhhtām imau vākyavākyārthau bhāgavarjitau //
analyzed: mā ca bhhhtām imau vākya vākya arthau bhāga varjitau

original: varṇā eva bhavantv ete vācakāḥ kenacid vṛthā /
analyzed: varṇāḥ eva bhavantu ete vācakāḥ kenacid vṛthā

original: padaṃ varṇasamūho 'stu vākyaṃ ca padasaṃhatiḥ //
analyzed: padam varṇa samūhaḥ astu vākyam ca pada saṃhatiḥ

original: bhavantu bhavadākhyātāḥ padavākyādikalpanāḥ /
analyzed: bhavantu bhavat ākhyātāḥ pada vākya ādi kalpanāḥ

original: padārthānāṃ tu saṃsarge mārgaḥ ka iti kathyatām //
analyzed: padārthānām tu saṃsarge mārgaḥ kaḥ iti kathyatām

original: asaṃsṛṣṭā hi [gaur aśvaḥ puruṣo hastī] iti padārthāḥ na vākyārthabhāvam adhirohanti /
analyzed: asaṃsṛṣṭāḥ hi gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ hastī iti padārthāḥ na vākya artha bhāvam adhirohanti

original: antyapadārthajñānānantarabhāvināṃ hi smaraṇena anuvyavasāyena vā viṣayīkriyamāṇās tu yathāvagatā eva viṣayīkriyante /
analyzed: antya padārtha jñāna anantara bhāvinām hi smaraṇena anuvyavasāyena vā viṣayīkriyamāṇāḥ tu yathā avagatāḥ eva viṣayīkriyante

original: saṃsargāvagamas tu kutastya iti cintyam /
analyzed: saṃsarga avagamaḥ tu kutastyaḥ iti cintyam

original: ucyate asty atra vivādaḥ /
analyzed: ucyate asti atra vivādaḥ

original: kecid ācakṣate anvitā eva padārthāḥ padair abhidhīyante anyathā padānāṃ vākyatvāyogad iti //
analyzed: kecid ācakṣate anvitāḥ eva padārthāḥ padaiḥ abhidhīyante anyathā padānām vākya tva ayogāt iti

original: anye tu manyante śuddhānām eva padārthānāṃ padair abhidhānam /
analyzed: anye tu manyante śuddhānām eva padārthānām padaiḥ abhidhānam

original: te tu tathā 'bhihitāḥ santaḥ parasparam ākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogyatvaparyālocanayā saṃsargam adhigamayantīti //
analyzed: te tu tathā bhihitāḥ santaḥ parasparam ākāṅkṣā sannidhi yogya tva paryālocanayā saṃsargam adhigamayanti iti

original: tatredaṃ vicāryam vyutpattir balīyasī na hi śabdo vyutpattinirapekṣo 'rtham avagamayanti /
analyzed: tatra idam vicāryam vyutpattiḥ balīyasī na hi śabdaḥ vyutpatti nirapekṣaḥ rtham avagamayanti

original: vyutpattiś ca kiṃ vākyasya vākyārthe padasya vā padārthe iti //
analyzed: vyutpattiḥ ca kim vākyasya vākya arthe padasya vā pada arthe iti

original: yadi vākyasya vākyārthe vyutpattiḥ tadā 'nvitābhidhānam padasya padārthe vyutpattau abhihitānvaya iti //
analyzed: yadi vākyasya vākya arthe vyutpattiḥ tadā nvita abhidhānam padasya padārthe vyutpattau abhihita anvayaḥ iti

original: kiṃ tāvat prāptam /
analyzed: kim tāvat prāptam

original: abhihitānvaya iti /
analyzed: abhihita anvayaḥ iti

original: padārthapratipattipūrvakatvād vākyārthapratipatteḥ /
analyzed: padārtha pratipatti pūrvaka tvāt vākya artha pratipatteḥ

original: na hy anavagatapadārthasya vākyārthasaṃpratyayo dṛśyate padārthavibhāgaś ca gamyate asya padasya jātir arthaḥ asya dravyaṃ asya guṇaḥ asya kriyeti /
analyzed: na hi anavagata padārthasya vākya artha saṃpratyayaḥ dṛśyate padārtha vibhāgaḥ ca gamyate asya padasya jātiḥ arthaḥ asya dravyam asya guṇaḥ asya kriyā iti

original: sa caivam avakalpate yadi tāvat so 'rthaḥ padair abhidhīyate /
analyzed: sa ca evam avakalpate yadi tāvat saḥ rthaḥ padaiḥ abhidhīyate

original: padāntarārthoparakte tu tasminn abhidhīyamāne tadartheyattaiva nāvadhāryate kadambākārārthapratīteḥ //
analyzed: pada antara artha uparakte tu tasmin abhidhīyamāne tad artha iyattā eva na avadhāryate kadamba ākāra artha pratīteḥ

original: āvāpodvāpābhyāṃ tad avadhāraṇam iti cet maivam āvāpodvāpaparīkṣāvasare 'pi kadambapratītyanapāyāt /
analyzed: āvāpa udvāpābhyām tat avadhāraṇam iti ced mā evam āvāpa udvāpa parīkṣā avasare pi kadamba pratīti anapāyāt

original: na hy ekam eva kiṃ cid vākyam anvitā bhidhāyipadagrathitam anyatra tu śuddha eva padānām arthaḥ kin tu sarvatra kadambakarūpād upāyāt kadambakarūpaṃ ūpeyām pratīyata iti duravagamaḥ padārthavibhāgaḥ //
analyzed: na hi ekam eva kim cit vākyam anvitā abhidhāyi pada grathitam anyatra tu śuddhaḥ eva padānām arthaḥ kin tu sarvatra kadambaka rūpāt upāyāt kadambaka rūpam pratīyate iti duravagamaḥ padārtha vibhāgaḥ

original: tataś ca padārthānām anapekṣaṇe gāmānayeti vākyāt aśvānayananiyogaḥ pratīyet gāṃ badhāneti vākyād aśvabandhnaniyogaḥ pratiyeta /
analyzed: tatas ca padārthānām an apekṣaṇe gām ānaya iti vākyāt aśva ānayana niyogaḥ pratīyet gām badhāna iti vākyāt aśva bandhna niyogaḥ pratiyeta

original: apekṣyate tu padānām arthaḥ /
analyzed: apekṣyate tu padānām arthaḥ

original: so 'pekṣyamāṇaḥ iyān iti niyato 'vadhāritavyaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ u pekṣyamāṇaḥ iyān iti niyataḥ vadhāritavyaḥ

original: tadavadhāraṇaṃ śuddhābhidhāyuṣu padeṣv avakalpate /
analyzed: tad avadhāraṇam śuddha abhidhāyuṣu padeṣu avakalpate

original: tasmāt padapadārthayor autpattikaḥ saṃbandha iṣyate //
analyzed: tasmāt pada padārthayoḥ autpattikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iṣyate

original: vṛddhavyavahāreṣu ca vākyād api bhavantī vyutpattiḥ padaparyantā bhavati /
analyzed: vṛddha vyavahāreṣu ca vākyāt api bhavantī vyutpattiḥ pada paryantā bhavati

original: itarathā hi prativākyaṃ vyutpattir apekṣyeta /
analyzed: itarathā hi prativākyam vyutpattiḥ apekṣyeta

original: sā cānattyāt durupapādeti śabdavyavahārocchedaḥ syāt /
analyzed: sā ca anattyāt durupapādā iti śabda vyavahāra ucchedaḥ syāt

original: dṛśyate ca padārthavidām abhinavakaviślokād api vākyārthapratītiḥ /
analyzed: dṛśyate ca padārtha vidām abhinava kavi ślokāt api vākya artha pratītiḥ

original: sā padatadarthavyutpattyā 'vakalpate /
analyzed: sā pada tad artha vyutpattyā vakalpate

original: vākyavākyārtha yos tu vyutpattāv apekṣamāṇāyāṃ sā na syād eva /
analyzed: vākya vākyārtha yoḥ tu vyutpattau apekṣamāṇāyām sā na syāt eva

original: tasmān nānvitābhidhānam //
analyzed: tasmāt na anvita abhidhānam

original: ataś caivam padāntaroccāraṇvaiphalyaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: atas ca evam pada antara uccāraṇa vaiphalya prasaṅgāt

original: ekasmād eva padāt taduparaṃjakadvitīyapadārthāvagatiḥ siddhaiva /
analyzed: ekasmāt eva padāt tad uparaṃjaka dvitīya padārtha avagatiḥ siddhā eva

original: tad api padam anyānuraktasvārthavācītyanenaiva nyāyena ekam eva padam akhilapadābhidheyārthavāci saṃpannam iti tenaiva vyavahāro 'stu //
analyzed: tat api padam anya anurakta sva artha vāci iti anena eva nyāyena ekam eva padam akhila pada abhidheya artha vāci saṃpannam iti tena eva vyavahāraḥ astu

original: na cāsau saṃpadyate /
analyzed: na ca asau saṃpadyate

original: gaur ity ukte sarvaguṇakriyā 'vagamāt na jñāyate kim upādīyatām iti /
analyzed: gauḥ iti ukte sarva guṇa kriyā avagamāt na jñāyate kim upādīyatām iti

original: sarvāvagamo hy anavagamanirviśeṣa eva vyavahārānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: sarva avagamaḥ hi anavagama nirviśeṣaḥ eva vyavahāra anupapatteḥ

original: na hi rasavidāṃ pūrṇo 'py abdhiḥ meror atiricyate salilakāryānirvṛtteḥ /
analyzed: na hi rasa vidām pūrṇaḥ pi abdhiḥ meroḥ atiricyate salila kārya anirvṛtteḥ

original: niyataguṇakriyānuraktasvārthapratipādane tu gośabdasya na hetum utpaśyāmaḥ //
analyzed: niyata guṇa kriyā anurakta sva artha pratipādane tu go śabdasya na hetum utpaśyāmaḥ

original: padāntarasannidhānaṃ niyamahetur iti cet kiṃ svarūpamātreṇa artha pratipādanena vā svarūpamātreṇa japamantrapadānām iva sannidhānaṃ bhavad api asannidhānān na viśiṣyate anuhīnasaṃbandhasya tat kṛtopakārādarśanāt //
analyzed: pada antara sannidhānam niyama hetuḥ iti ced kim sva rūpa mātreṇa pratipādanena vā sva rūpa mātreṇa japa mantra padānām iva sannidhānam bhavat api asannidhānāt na viśiṣyate anuhīna saṃbandhasya tat kṛta upakāra adarśanāt

original: arthapratipādanena tu padāntaraṃ yadi niyamahetuḥ so 'yam abhihitānām arthānām anvaya ukto bhavati /
analyzed: artha pratipādanena tu pada antaram yadi niyama hetuḥ saḥ yam abhihitānām arthānām anvayaḥ uktaḥ bhavati

original: tasmāt sa eva śroyān padebhyaḥ pratipannā niṣkṛṣṭās tāvad arthā ākāṃkṣāsannidhiyogyatvavaśena parasparam abhisaṃbadhyante /
analyzed: tasmāt saḥ eva padebhyaḥ pratipannāḥ niṣkṛṣṭāḥ tāvat arthāḥ ākāṃkṣā sannidhi yogya tva vaśena parasparam abhisaṃbadhyante

original: yo yenākāṅkṣitaḥ yaś ca sannihitaḥ yaś ca saṃbaddhuṃ yogyaḥ sa tena saṃbadhyate nāto 'paraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ yena ākāṅkṣitaḥ yaḥ ca sannihitaḥ yaḥ ca saṃbaddhum yogyaḥ sa tena saṃbadhyate na atas paraḥ

original: ata eva [aṅgulyagre hastiyūthaśatam āste] iti nāsti saṃbandhaḥ yogyatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: atas eva aṅguli agre hasti yūtha śatam āste iti na asti saṃbandhaḥ yogya tva abhāvāt

original: anvitābhidhāvādināṃ tu ananvitasyānabhidhānāt tatrāpy anvayaḥ prāpnoti /
analyzed: anvita abhidhā vādinām tu ananvitasya anabhidhānāt tatra api anvayaḥ prāpnoti

original: sa ca nāsti /
analyzed: sa ca na asti

original: tasmāt abhihitānām eva padārthānām anvaya iti yuktam /
analyzed: tasmāt abhihitānām eva padārthānām anvayaḥ iti yuktam

original: tad uktaṃ [padāni hi svaṃ svam artham abhidhāya nivṛttavyāpārāṇi /
analyzed: tat uktam padāni hi svam svam artham abhidhāya nivṛtta vyāpārāṇi

original: athedānīm arthāḥ avagatā vākyārthaṃ saṃpādayanti] iti //
analyzed: atha idānīm arthāḥ avagatāḥ vākya artham saṃpādayanti iti

original: evaṃ prāpte abhidhīyate na vyutpattinirapekṣo dīpa iva śabdo 'rtham avagamayati /
analyzed: evam prāpte abhidhīyate na vyutpatti nirapekṣaḥ dīpe iva śabdaḥ rtham avagamayati

original: vyutpattiś ca vṛddhavyavahārāt /
analyzed: vyutpattiḥ ca vṛddha vyavahārāt

original: vṛddhānāṃ ca vyavahāro vākyena na padena kevalapadasyāprayogāt //
analyzed: vṛddhānām ca vyavahāraḥ vākyena na padena kevala padasya aprayogāt

original: arthaprakaraṇaprāpyapadārthāntaravedane /
analyzed: artha prakaraṇa prāpya padārtha antara vedane

original: padaṃ prayujyate yat tat vākyam evoditaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: padam prayujyate yat tat vākyam eva uditam bhavet

original: vaktā vākyaṃ prayuṅkte ca saṃsṛṣṭārthavivakṣayā /
analyzed: vaktā vākyam prayuṅkte ca saṃsṛṣṭa artha vivakṣayā

original: tathaiva buddhyate śrotā tathaiva ca taṭasthitaḥ //
analyzed: tathā eva buddhyate śrotā tathā eva ca taṭa sthitaḥ

original: seyaṃ vākyasya vākyārthe vyutpattiḥ //
analyzed: sā iyam vākyasya vākya arthe vyutpattiḥ

original: vākyaṃ ca kim ucyate saṃhatyārtham abhidadhanti padāni vākyam iti vākyavidaḥ /
analyzed: vākyam ca kim ucyate saṃhatya artham abhidadhanti padāni vākyam iti vākya vidaḥ

original: tatrāyam padasamūha evārtho bhavati /
analyzed: tatra ayam pada samūhaḥ eva arthaḥ bhavati

original: evaṃ na saṃhatyārtham abhidadhyuḥ padāni yady ekaikasya padasya sarvatra vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: evam na saṃhatya artham abhidadhyuḥ padāni yadi ekaikasya padasya sarvatra vyāpāraḥ

original: yathā di bāhyāni kārakāṇi kāṣṭhādīni sarvāṇy eva pāke vyāpriyante yathāca śibikāyā udyantāraḥ sarve śubikām udyacchanti yathā trayo 'pi grāvāṇa ukhāṃ bibhrati tathā sarvāṇy eva padāni vākyārtham avabodhayanti /
analyzed: yathā bāhyāni kārakāṇi kāṣṭha ādīni sarvāṇi eva pāke vyāpriyante yathā ca śibikāyāḥ udyantāraḥ sarve śubikām udyacchanti yathā trayaḥ pi grāvāṇaḥ ukhām bibhrati tathā sarvāṇi eva padāni vākya artham avabodhayanti

original: tad idam anvitābhidhānam /
analyzed: tat idam anvita abhidhānam

original: anyānanvitaniṣkṛṣṭasvārthaparyavasāyitve hi sati na sarveṣāṃ vākyarthe vyāpāras syāt //
analyzed: anya ananvita niṣkṛṣṭa sva artha paryavasāyi tve hi sati na sarveṣām vākya arthe vyāpāraḥ syāt

original: nanu evam ekaikasya kṛtsnakāritve saty ekasmād eva kṛtsnasiddheḥ padāntaroccāraṇaṃ vyartham ity uktam naitat padāntareṇa vinaiva ekasmāt kṛtsnakāryasaṃpattyabhāvat /
analyzed: nanu evam ekaikasya kṛtsna kāri tve sati ekasmāt eva kṛtsna siddheḥ pada antara uccāraṇam vyartham iti uktam na etat pada antareṇa vinā eva ekasmāt kṛtsna kārya saṃpatti abhāvat

original: na tarhy ekaṃ kṛtsnakārīti cet maivam ekaikasya kṛtsnaphalaparyantavyāpārapatitatvāt ekaikasmin sati kṛtsnaphalaparyanto vyāpāro nirvartate ekaikena vinā na nirvartata ity evam ekaikaṃ kṛtsnakāri bhavati //
analyzed: na tarhi ekam kṛtsna kāri iti ced mā evam ekaikasya kṛtsna phala paryanta vyāpāra patita tvāt ekaikasmin sati kṛtsna phala paryantaḥ vyāpāraḥ nirvartate ekaikena vinā na nirvartate iti evam ekaikam kṛtsna kāri bhavati

original: nanu evaṃ tarhi samudāya eva kartā bhavatu kiṃ samudāyibhiḥ tataś ca tad evāyātaṃ niravayavau vākyavākyārthāv iti naitad yuktam saṅghātakāryavat svakāryasyāpi darśanāt //
analyzed: nanu evam tarhi samudāyaḥ eva kartā bhavatu kim samudāyibhiḥ tatas ca tat eva āyātam niravayavau vākya vākya arthau iti na etat yuktam saṅghāta kārya vat sva kāryasya api darśanāt

original: artha kiṃ saṅghātakāryam kiṃ ca tat svakāryam vākyārthapratipattiḥ saṅghātakāryam /
analyzed: artha kim saṅghāta kāryam kim ca tat sva kāryam vākya artha pratipattiḥ saṅghāta kāryam

original: svakāryaṃ tu padārthapratipattiḥ /
analyzed: sva kāryam tu padārtha pratipattiḥ

original: yathā pākaḥ saṅghātakāryam /
analyzed: yathā pākaḥ saṅghāta kāryam

original: svakāryaṃ jvalanabharaṇādi kāṣṭhasthālyā dīnām //
analyzed: sva kāryam jvalana bharaṇa ādi kāṣṭha sthālyāḥ dīnām

original: nanu yadi padānāṃ padārthapratipādanam svakāryam śuddhās tarhi padasyārthaḥ na śuddhaḥ padārthaḥ /
analyzed: nanu yadi padānām padārtha pratipādanam sva kāryam śuddhāḥ tarhi padasya arthaḥ na śuddhaḥ padārthaḥ

original: saṅghātakāryam akurvatāṃ śuddhānāṃ padānām adṛṣṭaṣvāt /
analyzed: saṅghāta kāryam a kurvatām śuddhānām padānām a dṛṣṭa svāt

original: na hy eṣāṃ svakārye saṅghātakārye ca pṛthak prayogo 'sti sarvathā saṅghātakārya eva prayogāt /
analyzed: na hi eṣām sva kārye saṅghāta kārye ca pṛthak prayogaḥ sti sarvathā saṅghāta kārye eva prayogāt

original: tatra prayuktānām apy eṣāṃ svakāryaṃ na nāvagamyate /
analyzed: tatra prayuktānām api eṣām sva kāryam na na avagamyate

original: ata eva na niravayavaṃ vākyam iṣyate svakāryapratyabhijñānāt //
analyzed: atas eva na niravayavam vākyam iṣyate sva kārya pratyabhijñānāt

original: saṃhatās te saṃghātakāryaṃ kurvanto dṛśyante na saṃghāta eva saṃhateṣv api kurvatsu svakāryaṃ pṛthak pṛthag upalabhyate /
analyzed: saṃhatāḥ te saṃghāta kāryam kurvantaḥ dṛśyante na saṃghātaḥ eva saṃhateṣu api kurvatsu sva kāryam pṛthak pṛthak upalabhyate

original: yathā śakaṭāṃgāṇāṃ ayaṃ maśo 'nena kṛtaḥ ayam aneneti na pṛthak pṛthak prayujyamānāni śakaṭāṃgāni manāg api śakaṭakāryaṃ kuvantīty evaṃ na kevalaṃ padaṃ prayujyate prayuktam api vā na tatkāryāṅgam /
analyzed: yathā śakaṭa aṃgāṇām ayam maśaḥ nena kṛtaḥ ayam anena iti na pṛthak pṛthak prayujyamānāni śakaṭa aṃgāni manāk api śakaṭa kāryam kuvanti iti evam na kevalam padam prayujyate prayuktam api vā na tat kārya aṅgam

original: padāntareṇa tu saha vyāpārāt tadanvitārthaṃ kāryaṃ eva padam iti yuktam /
analyzed: pada antareṇa tu saha vyāpārāt tad anvita artham kāryam eva padam iti yuktam

original: tad idam uktaṃ [saṃhatyārtham abhidadhanti padāni vakyam ekārthaḥ padasamūho vākyam] iti //
analyzed: tat idam uktam saṃhatya artham abhidadhanti padāni vakyam ekārthaḥ pada samūhaḥ vākyam iti

original: tad evam avayavakāryopalambhāt na vaiyākaraṇavan nimittāny api nihnumahe kṛtsnaphalasiddhyavadhi vyāpāraparinścayāc ca nānyamīmāṃsakavat śuddha padārthābhidhānam upagacchāmaha iti //
analyzed: tat evam avayava kārya upalambhāt na vaiyākaraṇa vat nimittāni api nihnumahe kṛtsna phala siddhi avadhi vyāpāra parinścayāt ca na anya mīmāṃsaka vat padārtha abhidhānam upagacchāmahe iti

original: yat punar abhyadhayi prativakyaṃ vyutpattir apekṣaṇīyā anyathā navakaviślokād arthaḥ padārhtavido na pratīyeteti tad idaṃ vyutpattyanabhijñasya codyam na hy evaṃ vyutpattiḥ [gośabdasya śuklānvito 'rthaḥ] iti /
analyzed: yat punar abhyadhayi prativakyam vyutpattiḥ apekṣaṇīyā anyathā navaka viślokāt arthaḥ padārhta vidaḥ na pratīyeta iti tat idam vyutpatti anabhijñasya codyam na hi evam vyutpattiḥ go śabdasya śukla anvitaḥ rthaḥ iti

original: sa hi vyabhicarati kṛṣṇānvitasya darśanāt /
analyzed: sa hi vyabhicarati kṛṣṇa anvitasya darśanāt

original: nāpi sarvānvitas tadarthaḥ ānantyena duravagamāt /
analyzed: nā api sarva anvitaḥ tad arthaḥ ānantyena duravagamāt

original: kin tv ākāṅkṣitayogyasannihitārthānurakto 'syārtha iti //
analyzed: kin tu ākāṅkṣita yogya sannihita artha anuraktaḥ sya arthaḥ iti

original: etāṃ ca vyutpattiṃ vākyānyāvāpodvāpābhyāṃ racanāvaicitryabhāṃji saṃjanayanti /
analyzed: etām ca vyutpattim vākyāni āvāpa udvāpābhyām racanā vaicitrya bhāṃji saṃjanayanti

original: padārthaparyantāpi bhavantī vyutpattiḥ īdṛśī dṛśyate na śuddhapadārthaviṣayā padena vyavahārābhāvād ity uktam /
analyzed: padārtha paryantā api bhavantī vyutpattiḥ īdṛśī dṛśyate na śuddha padārtha viṣayā padena vyavahāra abhāvāt iti uktam

original: tathāpi na na jñāyate iyān padasyārtha iti śakaṭāṅgavad āvāpodvāpābhyāṃ tatkāryabhedasya darśitatvāt //
analyzed: tathā api na na jñāyate iyān padasya arthaḥ iti śakaṭa aṅga vat āvāpa udvāpābhyām tad kārya bhedasya darśita tvāt

original: tad itthaṃ na prativākyaṃ vyutpattir apekṣyate /
analyzed: tat ittham na prativākyam vyutpattiḥ apekṣyate

original: sannihitayogyākāṅkṣitārthoparaktasvārthābhidhāyitvena hi kva cid gṛhītasaṃbandhaḥ sarvatra gṛhīto bhavati /
analyzed: sannihita yogya ākāṅkṣita artha uparakta sva artha abhidhāyi tvena hi kva cit gṛhīta saṃbandhaḥ sarvatra gṛhītaḥ bhavati

original: tataś ca navakaviślokād apy arthapratipattir upapatsyate /
analyzed: tatas ca navaka viślokāt api artha pratipattiḥ upapatsyate

original: padapadārthayos tu na vyutpattiḥ upāyābhāvād ity uktam //
analyzed: pada padārthayoḥ tu na vyutpattiḥ upāya abhāvāt iti uktam

original: yad api padānaroccāraṇam aphalam iti tad api parihṛtam padāntarasannidhāne hi sarvāṇi padani kṛtsnakārīṇi bhavanīty uktatvāt /
analyzed: yat api padānara uccāraṇam aphalam iti tat api parihṛtam pada antara sannidhāne hi sarvāṇi kṛtsna kārīṇi bhavani iti ukta tvāt

original: padāntarasannidhānena kriyata iti cet sarvakārakeṣv api tulyo 'yam anuyogaḥ /
analyzed: pada antara sannidhānena kriyate iti ced sarva kārakeṣu api tulyaḥ yam anuyogaḥ

original: saṃhatya tu sarvāṇi kārakāṇi kurvantīty ucyante /
analyzed: saṃhatya tu sarvāṇi kārakāṇi kurvanti iti ucyante

original: tathā padāny api arthābhidhānenāpi copakurvatsu padeṣu nābhihitānvayaḥ ananvite 'rthe vyutpattyabhāvāt /
analyzed: tathā padāni api artha abhidhānena api ca upakurvatsu padeṣu na abhihita anvayaḥ ananvite rthe vyutpatti abhāvāt

original: anupagame vā durupapādaḥ padārthānām anvayaḥ upāyābhāvāt //
analyzed: anupagame vā durupapādaḥ padārthānām anvayaḥ upāya abhāvāt

original: nanu ākāṃkṣāsannidhiyogyatvāny abhyupāya ity uktam na yuktam uktam /
analyzed: nanu ākāṃkṣā sannidhi yogya tvāni abhyupāyaḥ iti uktam na yuktam uktam

original: kasyeyam ākāṅkṣā śabdasya arthasya pramātur vā śabdārthayos tāvadacetanatvāt nākāṅkṣāyogaḥ /
analyzed: kasya iyam ākāṅkṣā śabdasya arthasya pramātuḥ vā śabda arthayoḥ tāvat acetana tvāt na ākāṅkṣā yogaḥ

original: phalata iyaṃ tu tatra tatra vācoyuktiḥ [śabdaḥ śabdāntaram ākāṃksati artho 'rthāntaram] iti /
analyzed: phalatas iyam tu tatra tatra vācoyuktiḥ śabdaḥ śabda antaram ākāṃksati arthaḥ rtha antaram iti

original: pramātuḥ punaḥ svatantrasyā kāṃkṣā na pramāṇam puruṣecchayā vastusthiter aghaṭamānatvāt /
analyzed: pramātuḥ punar svatantrasya ā kāṃkṣā na pramāṇam puruṣa icchayā vastu sthiteḥ a ghaṭamāna tvāt

original: śabdākhyapramāṇapṛṣṭhabhāvena tu puruṣasyākāṅkṣā bhavantī bhavaty  arthānāṃ saṃsargahetur ity evaṃ śabdasyāyam iyāniṣor iva dīrghadīrgho vyapāraḥ /
analyzed: śabda ākhya pramāṇa pṛṣṭha bhāvena tu puruṣasya ākāṅkṣā bhavantī bhavati arthānām saṃsarga hetuḥ iti evam śabdasya ayam iva dīrgha dīrghaḥ vyapāraḥ

original: uparatavyāpāre tu śabde puruṣākāṅkṣāmātraṃ na saṃbandhakāraṇam //
analyzed: uparata vyāpāre tu śabde puruṣa ākāṅkṣā mātram na saṃbandha kāraṇam

original: aśābdatvaṃ ca vākyārthapratīter ittham āpatet /
analyzed: aśābda tvam ca vākya artha pratīteḥ ittham āpatet

original: vyādhānam ayuktaṃ ca sākṣac chābdatvasaṃbhave //
analyzed: vyādhānam ayuktam ca sākṣat śābda tva saṃbhave

original: tasvād anvitābhidhāyīni padānīti sthitam //
eṣa eva hi saṃsargapraīteḥ panthāḥ vyatiṣaktārthabuddhyā hi vyatiṣaṅgo 'vagamyate /
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva hi saṃsarga praīteḥ panthāḥ vyatiṣakta artha buddhyā hi vyatiṣaṅgaḥ vagamyate

original: aparaṃ tu na saṃsargapratīter asti kāraṇam //
analyzed: aparam tu na saṃsarga pratīteḥ asti kāraṇam

original: na khalv ānaya gāṃ śuklāṃ saṃsarga iti kathyate /
analyzed: na khalu ānaya gām śuklām saṃsargaḥ iti kathyate

original: vyavahāre kva cid vṛdhaiḥ padaṃ saṃsargavācakam //
analyzed: vyavahāre kva cit vṛdhaiḥ padam saṃsarga vācakam

original: prayujyamānam apy etat bāliśena hi kena cit /
analyzed: prayujyamānam api etat bāliśena hi kena cid

original: ananvitārtham eva syāt daśadāḍim avākyavat //
analyzed: ananvita artham eva syāt daśa dāḍim a vākyavat

original: tasmād anvitānām evābhidhānaṃ yuktam //
analyzed: tasmāt anvitānām eva abhidhānam yuktam

original: āha āṅgulyagrādivākyeṣu kathaṃ tava samanvayaḥ ucyate uktānām api saṃsarge kathaṃ tava samanvayaḥ //
analyzed: āha āṅguli agra ādi vākyeṣu katham tava samanvayaḥ ucyate uktānām api saṃsarge katham tava samanvayaḥ

original: āha nanv atra yogyatābhāvād asaṃsarga upeyate /
analyzed: āha nanu atra yogyatā bhāvāt a saṃsargaḥ upeyate

original: ākāṅkṣāditrayādhīnaḥ saṃsargo hi mayeṣyate //
analyzed: ākāṅkṣā ādi traya adhīnaḥ saṃsargaḥ hi mayā iṣyate

original: ucyate mayā 'pi yogyāsannādisaṃsṛṣṭasvārthavācyatā /
analyzed: ucyate mayā yogya āsanna ādi saṃsṛṣṭa svārtha vācya tā

original: padānāṃ darśitā sā ca teṣu nāstīty ananvayaḥ //
analyzed: padānām darśi tā sā ca teṣu na asti iti ananvayaḥ

original: āha anvitābhidhānavādī hi bhavān /
analyzed: āha anvita abhidhāna vādī hi bhavān

original: tataś ca bhavato 'nabhidhānaṃ syad anvayāsaṃbhavād iha //
analyzed: tatas ca bhavataḥ syat anvaya asaṃbhavāt iha

original: ahaṃ tv abhihitānvayavādī /
analyzed: aham tu abhihita anvaya vādī

original: tena mama tv anabhihitatve 'pi nābhidhānaṃ virudhyate //
analyzed: tena mama tu anabhihita tve na abhidhānam virudhyate

original: ucyate kaṣṭaṃ mīmāṃsakenāpi bhavatā sūkṣmadarśinā /
analyzed: ucyate kaṣṭam mīmāṃsakena api bhavatā sūkṣma darśinā

original: nādyāpi śabdavyāpāraparamārtho 'vadhāritaḥ //
analyzed: na adya api śabda vyāpāra parama arthaḥ vadhāritaḥ

original: prakāśakatvaṃ śabdasya vyāpāro hi nisargataḥ /
analyzed: prakāśaka tvam śabdasya vyāpāraḥ hi nisargataḥ

original: puṃsas tu guṇadoṣābhyāṃ tasmin sadasadarthatā //
analyzed: puṃsaḥ tu guṇa doṣābhyām tasmin sat asat artha tā

original: kriyākārakasaṃsargabuddhir atrāpi śabdajā /
analyzed: kriyā kāraka saṃsarga buddhiḥ atra api śabda jā

original: tādṛśyevāyathārthā tu narabuddhipramādataḥ //
analyzed: tādṛśī evā ayathārthā tu nara buddhi pramādataḥ

original: tad uktaṃ pramāṇāntaradarśanam atra bādhyate iti //
analyzed: tat uktam pramāṇa antara darśanam atra bādhyate iti

original: ata eva pramāṇatvaṃ śabde niṣpratimaṃ svataḥ /
analyzed: atas eva pramāṇa tvam śabde niṣpratimam svatas

original: śabde karmaṇi tatrāpi bādhakānupasarpaṇāt //
analyzed: śabde karmaṇi tatra api bādhaka anupasarpaṇāt

original: tenāṅgulyagravākye 'pi śābdo 'styeva samanvayaḥ /
analyzed: tena aṅguli agra vākye śābdaḥ sti eva samanvayaḥ

original: ādhārādheyakriyādinirdebhānasyātra pratīyamānatvāt //
analyzed: ādhāra ādheya kriyā ādi nirdebhānasya atra pratīyamāna tvāt

original: vastuto 'saṃbhavo yas tu tulya eva sa āvayoḥ /
analyzed: vastutas saṃbhavaḥ yaḥ tu tulyaḥ eva saḥ āvayoḥ

original: ayogyatvena saṃsargapratītyarthanibarhiṇāt //
yadi tu śādo 'nvayo na bhavet kacataṭapādivarṇanirdeśamātram idaṃ syāt daśadāḍimādipralāpatulyaṃ vā syāt /
analyzed: yadi tu śādaḥ na ayaḥ na bhavet kaca taṭa pa ādi varṇa nirdeśa mātram idam syāt daśa dāḍima ādi pralāpa tulyam vā syāt

original: ananvitābhidhānāt vākyatvam eva na bhavet /
analyzed: ananvita abhidhānāt vākya tvam eva na bhavet

original: asti tu vākyatvam /
analyzed: asti tu vākya tvam

original: tena manyāmahe asti śābdo 'nvaya iti atrāpi anvitābhidhānaṃ na viruddham /
analyzed: tena manyāmahe asti śābdaḥ nvayaḥ iti atra api anvita abhidhānam na viruddham

original: bādhakas tv anyaviṣaya eva na śabdasaṃsargaviṣaya ity uktam /
analyzed: bādhakaḥ tu anya viṣayaḥ eva na śabda saṃsarga viṣayaḥ iti uktam

original: ata eva svasāmarthyasiddhanirnibandhabodhakatvavyāpāre śabde svato vedaprāmāṇyam anākulaṃ nirvakṣyati apauruṣeyatayā viplavāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: atas eva sva sāmarthya siddha nirnibandha bodhaka tva vyāpāre śabde svatas veda prāmāṇyam an ākulam nirvakṣyati apauruṣeya tayā viplava asaṃbhavāt

original: svavyāpārasya ca svata eva śuddhatvam ity alam atiprasaṅgena //
analyzed: sva vyāpārasya ca svatas eva śuddha tvam iti alam atiprasaṅgena

original: ity anvitābhidhānena vākyārthajñānasaṃbhāvāt /
analyzed: iti anvita abhidhānena vākya artha jñāna saṃbhāvāt

original: vyutpattirahitaḥ prājñaiḥ praheyo 'bhihitānvayaḥ //
analyzed: vyutpatti rahitaḥ prājñaiḥ praheyaḥ bhihita anvayaḥ

original: tad etad api nānumanyate yad uktaṃ vṛddhavyavahārāt vyutpattir iti tat satyam /
analyzed: tat etat api nā anumanyate yat uktam vṛddha vyavahārāt vyutpattiḥ iti tat satyam

original: vākyena vyavahāra ity etad api satyam /
analyzed: vākyena vyavahāraḥ iti etat api satyam

original: śibikodyaṃcannṛva sarvāṇi padāni kārye saṃhatya vyāpriyanta ity etad api satyam eva //
analyzed: sarvāṇi padāni kārye saṃhatya vyāpriyante iti etat api satyam eva

original: vyutpattiś cintyatām kim ekaghaṭanākārasaṅghātakāryaniṣṭhaiva sā kiṃ vā padārthaparyantā iti /
analyzed: vyutpattiḥ cintyatām kim eka ghaṭana ākāra saṅghāta kārya niṣṭhā eva sā kim vā padārtha paryantā iti

original: pūrvasmin pakṣe prativākyaṃ vyutpattir aparihāryā /
analyzed: pūrvasmin pakṣe prativākyam vyutpattiḥ aparihāryā

original: sā ca bahupramādety uktam /
analyzed: sā ca bahu pramādā iti uktam

original: padārthaparyantāyāṃ tu vyutpattau nūnaṃ nirdhāraṇīyaṃ [iyān padasyārthaḥ] iti /
analyzed: padārtha paryantāyām tu vyutpattau nūnam nirdhāraṇīyam iyān padasya arthaḥ iti

original: bhavadbhir api śakaṭāvayavadṛṣṭāntavarṇanena padavyāpāranirdhāraṇam aṅgīkṛtam eva /
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ api śakaṭa avayava dṛṣṭānta varṇanena pada vyāpāra nirdhāraṇam aṅgīkṛtam eva

original: itarathā hi padārthaniyamānapekṣṇe gām ānayeti vivakṣāvān aśvapadam api nittitayopādadīta /
analyzed: itarathā hi padārtha niyama anapekṣṇe gām ānaya iti vivakṣāvān aśva padam api nitti tayā upādadīta

original: na hi bhavatām anapekṣitapadārtha eva vaiyākaraṇānām iva vākyārthapratyayaḥ /
analyzed: na hi bhavatām an apekṣita padārthaḥ eva vaiyākaraṇānām iva vākya artha pratyayaḥ

original: tad asau yāvān āvāpodvāpaparyālocanayā gopadasyārtho nirdhāryate tāvān eva saṅghātakārye 'pi vyāpriyamāṇasya tasyārthaḥ //
analyzed: tat asau yāvān āvāpa udvāpa paryālocanayā go padasya arthaḥ nirdhāryate tāvān eva saṅghāta kārye vyāpriyamāṇasya tasya arthaḥ

original: nanu ākāṅkṣitayogyasannihitārthoparaktas tasyārha ity uktam naitad yuktam sarvadā saṃhatyavyāpriyamāṇam etat padaṃ paśyatas tavāyaṃ bhramaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ākāṅkṣita yogya sannihita artha uparaktaḥ tasya arhaḥ iti uktam na etat yuktam sarvadā etat padam paśyataḥ tava ayam bhramaḥ

original: arthaḥ tāvān asya yāvaty abhidhātrī tasya śaktiḥ //
analyzed: arthaḥ tāvān asya yāvatī abhidhātrī tasya śaktiḥ

original: kiyati tasyābhidhātrī śaktiḥ kiyati tasyānabhidhātrī śaktiḥ yāvat tam arthaṃ anyonyam ākāṅkṣitaiś ca sannihitaiś ca saṃyujyamānaṃ na muṃcati //
analyzed: kiyati tasya abhidhātrī śaktiḥ kiyati tasya an abhidhātrī śaktiḥ yāvat tam artham anyonyam ākāṅkṣitaiḥ ca sannihitaiḥ ca saṃyujyamānam na muṃcati

original: kiyantaṃ ca na muṃcati gotvamātraṃ tadvanmātraṃ vā ity atas tāvaty evābhidhātrī śaktir anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ asya nirdhāryate //
analyzed: kiyantam ca na muṃcati go tva mātram tadvat mātram vā iti atas tāvatī evā abhidhātrī śaktiḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām asya nirdhāryate

original: ataḥ param ekasya padasyāprayogāt sarvadā saṅghātakāryarahitakevalasvakāracāturyānavadhāraṇāt pradhānakārye tātparyaśaktir asya vyāpriyate nābhidhātrī /
analyzed: atas param ekasya padasya a prayogāt sarvadā saṅghāta kārya rahita kevala svakāra cāturya an avadhāraṇāt pradhāna kārye tātparya śaktiḥ asya vyāpriyate na abhidhātrī

original: tāṃ ca pṛthag avivecayatā bhavatā anvitābhidhānam abhyupagatam /
analyzed: tām ca pṛthak a vivecayatā bhavatā anvita abhidhānam abhyupagatam

original: tac ca nayuktam sarvatra abhidhātryāḥ śakter aviśeṣāt /
analyzed: tat ca na yuktam sarvatra abhidhātryāḥ śakteḥ aviśeṣāt

original: padārthaniyamānavadhāraṇaṃ padāntaroccāraṇavaiphalyam ityādidoṣāṇām anapāyāt //
analyzed: padārtha niyama anavadhāraṇam pada antara uccāraṇa vaiphalyam ityādi doṣāṇām anapāyāt

original: yenānvitam artham abhidadhāti gośabdaḥ tadanabhidhāne tadanvitānavagamāt yena saha saṃsargaḥ sa na gṛhyate tatsaṃsṛṣtaś ca gṛhyate iti vipratiṣiddhaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yena anvitam artham abhidadhāti go śabdaḥ tad anabhidhāne tad anvita anavagamāt yena saha saṃsargaḥ sa na gṛhyate tad saṃsṛṣtaḥ ca gṛhyate iti vipratiṣiddham syāt

original: tadabhidhāne vā tadvat sarvābhidhānam iti ekam eva gopadaṃ sarvārthaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tad abhidhāne vā tadvat sarva abhidhānam iti ekam eva go padam sarva artham bhavet

original: tasmān na sarvatrābhidhātrī śaktiḥ padasyopapadyate iti nānvitābhidhānam //
analyzed: tasmāt na sarvatra abhidhātrī śaktiḥ padasya upapadyate iti na anvita abhidhānam

original: anvitābhidhānapakṣe ca katham aṅgulyagravākye 'pi nānvayaḥ syāt śābdo 'sty eva samanvaya iti cet arthāsaṃsparśī śabdaḥ prāpnoti bahiranvayābhāvāt /
analyzed: anvita abhidhāna pakṣe ca katham aṅguli agra vākye na anvayaḥ syāt eva samanvayaḥ iti ced artha asaṃsparśī śabdaḥ prāpnoti bahis anvaya abhāvāt

original: prakaśakatvamātraṃ vyāpāra iti cet bāḍham tat tv anvitānanvitaviṣayaṃ vedituṃ yuktam na punar anvitaviṣayam eveti śakyate niyantum /
analyzed: prakaśaka tva mātram vyāpāraḥ iti ced bāḍham tat tu anvita ananvita viṣayam veditum yuktam na punar anvita viṣayam eva iti śakyate niyantum

original: daśadāḍimādivākyam anvitārthapratipādakam api dṛśyate yataḥ /
analyzed: daśa dāḍima ādi vākyam anvita artha pratipādakam api dṛśyate yatas

original: na tat vākyam iti cet aṅgulyagravākyam api na vākyam eva /
analyzed: na tat vākyam iti ced aṅguli agra vākyam api na vākyam eva

original: ādhārādheyakriyāsaṃsargapratītis tu bhramamātram /
analyzed: ādhāra ādheya kriyā saṃsarga pratītiḥ tu bhrama mātram

original: tasmāt anvitam artham abhidadhati padānīty asamīcīnam //
analyzed: tasmāt anvitam artham abhidadhati padāni iti asamīcīnam

original: tat kim ayaś śalākākalpāḥ parasparam asaṃsṛṣṭā eva padārthāḥ padair ucyantām etad api nāsti /
analyzed: tat kim ayaḥ śalākā kalpāḥ parasparam asaṃsṛṣṭāḥ eva padārthāḥ padaiḥ ucyantām etat api na asti

original: tathāvidhavyavahārābhāvāt /
analyzed: tathāvidha vyavahāra abhāvāt

original: paścād anvayasya ca duravagamatvāt viramyavyāpārasya cāsaṃvedanāt /
analyzed: paścāt anvayasya ca duravagama tvāt viramya vyāpārasya ca a saṃvedanāt

original: tasmāt pakṣdvayam api na kṣemāya /
analyzed: tasmāt pakṣ dvayam api na kṣemāya

original: tad uktam matadvayam apīdaṃ tu nāsmabhyaṃ rocatetarām /
analyzed: tat uktam mata dvayam api idam tu na asmabhyam rocatetarām

original: kuto ' nvitābhidhānaṃ vā kuto vā 'bhihitānvayaḥ //
analyzed: kutas nvita abhidhānam vā kutas vā abhihita anvayaḥ

original: anyā tu vāco yuktiḥ kaiś cit kṛtā anvīyamānābhidhānaṃ abhidhīyamānānvayaś ceti /
analyzed: anyā tu vācaḥ yuktiḥ kaiḥ cit kṛtā anvīyamāna abhidhānam abhidhīyamāna anvayaḥ ca iti

original: sā 'pi na hṛdayaṅgamā //
analyzed: sā pi na hṛdayaṅgamā

original: na hi dve anubhūyete kriye ete pṛthak asthite /
analyzed: na hi dve anubhūyete kriye ete pṛthak asthite

original: abhidhānakriyā cānyā vācyasthā cānvayakriyā //
analyzed: abhidhāna kriyā ca anyā vācya sthā ca anvaya kriyā

original: te hi krameṇa vā syātām yugapad vā kramapakṣe pūrvam anvayakriyā cet tad idam anvitābhidhānam eva nānvīyamānābhidhānam /
analyzed: te hi krameṇa vā syātām yugapad vā krama pakṣe pūrvam anvaya kriyā ced tat idam anvita abhidhānam eva na anvīyamāna abhidhānam

original: pūrvaṃ ced abhidhānakriyā so 'yam abhihitānvaya eva nābhidhīyamānānvayaḥ /
analyzed: pūrvam ced abhidhāna kriyā saḥ yam abhihita anvayaḥ eva na abhidhīyamāna anvayaḥ

original: yugapat tu kriyādvayasaṃvedana nāsti /
analyzed: yugapad tu kriyā dvaya saṃvedana na asti

original: arthagatāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ śabdaprayogakāle 'nupalambhāt //
analyzed: artha gatāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ śabda prayoga kāle n upalambhāt

original: abhidhānakriyaivaikā tadabhijñaiḥ parīkṣyate /
analyzed: abhidhāna kriyā eva ekā tad abhijñaiḥ parīkṣyate

original: anvīyamānatā 'thānāṃ abhidhānād vinā kutaḥ //
analyzed: anvīyamāna tā thānām abhidhānāt vinā kutas

original: gauḥ śukla iti jātiguṇayor ekadravyasamavetayor api śabdam antareṇa kuto 'nvayam avagaccāmḥ //
analyzed: gauḥ śuklaḥ iti jāti guṇayoḥ eka dravya samavetayoḥ api śabdam antareṇa kutas nu ayam avagaccāmḥ

original: ukter nūtananataivevyaṃ na punar vastu nūtanam /
analyzed: ukteḥ nūtana nata eva ivyam na punar vastu nūtanam

original: na cātrāpi nivartante doṣāḥ pakṣadvayaspṛśaḥ //
analyzed: na ca atra api nivartante doṣāḥ pakṣa dvaya spṛśaḥ

original: anye manyante samānyenānvitābhidhanam viśeṣataś cābhihitānvaya iti /
analyzed: anye manyante samānyena anvita abhidhanam viśeṣataḥ ca abhihita anvayaḥ iti

original: gośabdo hi svārtham anavagataviśeṣaguṇakriyāsāmānyānvitam abhidhatte tāvaty anvitābhidhānam /
analyzed: go śabdaḥ hi sva artham anavagata viśeṣa guṇa kriyā sāmānya anvitam abhidhatte tāvati anvita abhidhānam

original: śuklādiguṇaviśeṣabandhas tu padāntarād avagamyate /
analyzed: śukla ādi guṇa viśeṣa bandhaḥ tu pada antarāt avagamyate

original: so 'yaṃ viśeṣo 'bhihitānvaya iti etad api tādṛg eva //
analyzed: saḥ yam viśeṣaḥ bhihita anvayaḥ iti etat api tādṛś eva

original: doṣo ' nvitābhidhāne yaḥ sāmānye 'pi sa tādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: doṣaḥ nvita abhidhāne yaḥ sāmānye sa tādṛśaḥ

original: doṣas tulyo viśeṣe 'pi yaś cokto 'bhihitānvaye //
analyzed: doṣaḥ tulyaḥ viśeṣe yaḥ ca uktaḥ bhihita anvaye

original: na cedam apūrvavastu vaṇitam /
analyzed: na ca idam apūrva vastu vaṇitam

original: abhihitānvayavādinaḥ viśeṣa evābhihitānvayam icchanti /
analyzed: abhihita anvaya vādinaḥ viśeṣe eva abhihita anvayam icchanti

original: sāmānye 'pi hi padaṃ vartate viśeṣe vākyam /
analyzed: sāmānye hi padam vartate viśeṣe vākyam

original: vākyārthapratītaye ca abhihitānvaya āśrīyate iti prāktana eveṣṭaḥ panthā veditavyaḥ //
analyzed: vākya artha pratītaye ca abhihita anvayaḥ āśrīyate iti prāktanaḥ evā iṣṭaḥ panthāḥ veditavyaḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhy ābhidhānikī vyavahāraḥ saṅkulam ivainaṃ paśyāmaḥ sarvatra doṣasaṃbhavāt ucyate na kadā cid atra saṅkulatā /
analyzed: katham tarhi ābhidhānikī vyavahāraḥ saṅkulam iva enam paśyāmaḥ sarvatra doṣa saṃbhavāt ucyate na kadā cid atra saṅkula tā

original: saṃhatyakārīṇi hi padānīty uktam /
analyzed: saṃhatya kārīṇi hi padāni iti uktam

original: samuditaiḥ padair eko vākyārthaḥ pratyāyyate /
analyzed: samuditaiḥ padaiḥ ekaḥ vākya arthaḥ pratyāyyate

original: sa ca guṇaguṇibhūtetarapadārthasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ kaścit padārtha eveti kim atra saṅkulam //
analyzed: sa ca guṇa guṇi bhūta itara padārtha saṃsṛṣṭaḥ kaścid padārthaḥ eva iti kim atra saṅkulam

original: nanu kim ayam anvitābhidhānapakṣaḥ punar utthāpayitum iṣṭaḥ maivam nedam anvitābhidhānam /
analyzed: nanu kim ayam anvita abhidhāna pakṣaḥ punar utthāpayitum iṣṭaḥ mā evam na idam anvita abhidhānam

original: kathaṃ tarhi saṃhatyakāritā padānām ucyate saṃhatyakāritā 'py asti na cānvitābhidhānam /
analyzed: katham tarhi saṃhatya kāri tā padānām ucyate saṃhatya kāri tā pi asti na ca anvita abhidhānam

original: anvitam arthaṃ padāni saṃhatya saṃpādayanti na tv anvitam abhidadhati /
analyzed: anvitam artham padāni saṃhatya saṃpādayanti na tu anvitam abhidadhati

original: kim idānīṃ kurvanti vākyārthaṃ padāni ghaṭam iva mṛdādīni etad api nāsti jñāpakatvāt teṣām /
analyzed: kim idānīm kurvanti vākya artham padāni ghaṭam iva mṛd ādīni etat api nā asti jñāpaka tvāt teṣām

original: kā tarhīyaṃ vācoyuktiḥ saṃhatyakārīṇi padāni na cānvitam abhidadhatīti iyaṃ vācoyuktiḥ /
analyzed: kā tarhi iyam vācoyuktiḥ saṃhatya kārīṇi padāni na ca anvitam abhidadhati iti iyam vācoyuktiḥ

original: padāny anvitaṃ pratyāyanti nānvitam abhidadhati //
analyzed: padāni anvitam pratyāyanti na anvitam abhidadhati

original: nābhidhātrī śaktir anvitaviṣayā kin tv anvayavyatirekānugataniṣkṛṣṭasvārthaviṣyaiva /
analyzed: na abhidhātrī śaktiḥ anvita viṣayā kin tu anvaya vyatireka anugata niṣkṛṣṭa sva artha viṣyā eva

original: tātparyaśaktis tu teṣām anvitāvagamaparyantā saha vyāpārāt vyāpārasyaitadīyasya nirākāṅkṣapratyayotpādanaparyantatvat /
analyzed: tātparya śaktiḥ tu teṣām anvita avagama paryantā saha vyāpārāt vyāpārasya etadīyasya nirākāṅkṣa pratyaya utpādana paryanta tvat

original: tathā hi anathaiva pravartante pratyakṣādyudbhavā dhiyaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi anathā eva pravartante pratyakṣa ādi udbhavāḥ dhiyaḥ

original: arthaṃ pūrṇam apūrṇaṃ vā darśayantyaḥ puraḥ sthitam //
analyzed: artham pūrṇam a pūrṇam vā darśayantyaḥ puras sthitam

original: anyathaiva matiś śābdī viṣyeṣu vijṛmbhate /
analyzed: anyathā eva matiḥ śābdī viṣyeṣu vijṛmbhate

original: pratipattur anākāṅkṣapratyayotpādanāvidhiḥ //
analyzed: pratipattuḥ an ākāṅkṣa pratyaya utpādanā vidhiḥ

original: ata eva padaṃ loke kevalaṃ na prayujyate /
analyzed: atas eva padam loke kevalam na prayujyate

original: na hi tena nirākāṅkṣā śrotur ādhīyate matiḥ //
analyzed: na hi tena nirākāṅkṣā śrotuḥ ādhīyate matiḥ

original: nanu abhidhānavyatiriktaḥ ko 'nyaḥ śabdasya kṛtsnaphalaparyantaḥ pratyāyanātmā vyāpāraḥ asti kaścit yaḥ sarvair eva saṃsargavādibhir apratyākhyeyaḥ /
analyzed: nanu abhidhāna vyatiriktaḥ kaḥ nyaḥ śabdasya kṛtsna phala paryantaḥ pratyāyana ātmā vyāpāraḥ asti kaścid yaḥ sarvaiḥ eva saṃsarga vādibhiḥ a pratyākhyeyaḥ

original: na hi saṃsargo 'bhidhīyate pratīyate ca vākyāt //
analyzed: na hi saṃsargaḥ abhidhīyate pratīyate ca vākyāt

original: nanu saṃsṛṣṭābhidhāne sati saṃsargaḥ pratīyeta nānyathā naitad evam saṃhatyakāritvād eva saṃsargāvagatisiddheḥ /
analyzed: nanu saṃsṛṣṭa abhidhāne sati saṃsargaḥ pratīyeta na anyathā na etat evam saṃhatya kāri tvāt eva saṃsarga avagati siddheḥ

original: na hi saṃhatyakaraṇam asaṃsṛṣṭaṃ ca kāryaṃ kva cit dṛśyate //
analyzed: na hi saṃhatya karaṇam a saṃsṛṣṭam ca kāryam kva cit dṛśyate

original: api ca prakṛtipratyayau parasparāpekṣam artham abhidadhāte /
analyzed: api ca prakṛti pratyayau paraspara apekṣam artham abhidadhāte

original: na ca prakṛtyā pratyayārthī 'bhidhīyate niyogasyādhātuvācyatvāt /
analyzed: na ca prakṛtyā pratyaya arthī abhidhīyate niyogasya a dhātu vācya tvāt

original: na ca pratyayena prakṛtyartho 'bhidhīyate niyogādeḥ liṅvācyatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca pratyayena prakṛti arthaḥ abhidhīyate niyoga ādeḥ liṅ vācya tva anupapatteḥ

original: na ca tau pṛthak pṛthak svakāryaṃ kurutaḥ /
analyzed: na ca tau pṛthak pṛthak sva kāryam kurutaḥ

original: evaṃ padāny api parasparāpekṣīṇi saṃhatya kāryaṃ kariṣyanti /
analyzed: evam padāni api paraspara apekṣīṇi saṃhatya kāryam kariṣyanti

original: na ca parasparam artham abhidhāsyanti vakyāny api prakaraṇapatitāny evam eva /
analyzed: na ca parasparam artham abhidhāsyanti vakyāni api prakaraṇa patitāni evam eva

original: tad uktam [prakṛtipratyayau yadvat apekṣete parasparam /
analyzed: tat uktam prakṛti pratyayau yadvat apekṣete parasparam

original: padaṃ padāntaraṃ tadvat vākyāntaraṃ tathā] iti //
analyzed: padam pada antaram tadvat vākya antaram tathā iti

original: ayam eva pakṣaḥ śreyān yat saṃhatyakāritvaṃ padānāṃ asaṃkīrṇārthatvaṃ ca //
analyzed: ayam eva pakṣaḥ śreyān yat saṃhatya kāri tvam padānām asaṃkīrṇa artha tvam ca

original: nirapekṣe prayoge 'yaśśalākākalpanā bhavet /
analyzed: nirapekṣe prayoge yaḥ śalākā kalpanā bhavet

original: tadanvitābhidhāne tu padāntaram anarthakam //
analyzed: tad anvita abhidhāne tu pada antaram anarthakam

original: saṃhatyakāripakṣe tu doṣo naiko 'pi vidyate /
analyzed: saṃhatya kāri pakṣe tu doṣaḥ vidyate

original: tenāyam upagantavyaḥ mārgo vigatakaṇṭakaḥ //
analyzed: tena ayam upagantavyaḥ mārgaḥ vigata kaṇṭakaḥ

original: abhidhātrī matā śaktiḥ padānāṃ svārthaniṣṭhatā /
analyzed: abhidhātrī matā śaktiḥ padānām sva artha niṣṭha tā

original: teṣāṃ tātparyaśaktis tu saṃsargāvagamāvidhiḥ //
analyzed: teṣām tātparya śaktiḥ tu saṃsarga avagama avidhiḥ

original: tenānvitābhidhānaṃ hi nāsmābhir iha mṛṣyate /
analyzed: tena anvita abhidhānam hi na asmābhiḥ iha mṛṣyate

original: anvitapratipattis tu bāḍham abhyupagamyante //
analyzed: anvita pratipattiḥ tu bāḍham abhyupagamyante

original: saṃhatyakārakatvāc ca padānāṃ na svārthābhidhitsayaiva samuccāraṇam api tu pradhānaṃ kāryam eva kartum /
analyzed: saṃhatya kāraka tvāt ca padānām na sva artha abhidhitsayā eva samuccāraṇam api tu pradhānam kāryam eva kartum

original: tad uktam [vākyārthamitaye teṣāṃ pravṛttau nāntarīyakam /
analyzed: tat uktam vākya artha mitaye teṣām pravṛttau nāntarīyakam

original: pāke jvāleva kāṣṭhānāṃ padārthapratipādanam] iti //
analyzed: pāke jvālā iva kāṣṭhānām padārtha pratipādanam iti

original: seyaṃ vyutpattimūlā padavisarasamudbhidyamānāṅkuraśrīḥ saṃskārodārapatrā kusumacayavatī prollasadbhiḥ padārthaiḥ /
analyzed: sā iyam vyutpatti mūlā pada visara samudbhidyamāna aṅkura śrīḥ saṃskāra udāra patrā kusuma cayavatī prollasadbhiḥ padārthaiḥ

original: prajñāvallī viśālā phalati phalam idaṃ svādu vakyārthatattvaṃ nairākāṃkṣyaṃ tu sāndre hṛdaya upagate yānti yasmin pumaṃsaḥ //
analyzed: prajñā vallī viśālā phalati phalam idam svādu vakyārtha tattvam nairākāṃkṣyam tu sāndre hṛdaye upagate yānti yasmin pumaṃsaḥ

original: āha ca padāt prabhṛti ya caiṣā prajñā jñātur vujṛmbhate /
analyzed: āha ca padāt prabhṛti ca eṣā prajñā jñātuḥ vujṛmbhate

original: puṣpitā sā padārtheṣu vākyārtheṣu phaliṣyati //
analyzed: puṣpitā sā padārtheṣu vākya artheṣu phaliṣyati

original: tasmād anyā nītyā saṃsargapratyayo bhavati sādhuḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt anyā nītyā saṃsarga pratyayaḥ bhavati sādhuḥ

original: saṃsṛṣṭāś ca padārthāḥ vākyārtha iti nyavedi prāk //
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭāḥ ca padārthāḥ vākya arthaḥ iti nyavedi prāk

original: yaś caiṣa lokavyavahārasiddhiḥ prādarśi vakyārthamitāv upāyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca eṣa loka vyavahāra siddhiḥ prādarśi vakya artha mitau upāyaḥ

original: sa eva vede 'py avadhāraṇīyaḥ tatrāpi tāny eva padāni te 'rthāḥ //
analyzed: saḥ eva vede pi avadhāraṇīyaḥ tatra api tāni eva padāni te rthāḥ

original: āha loke pramāṇāntaraparicchedyatvāt vākyārthasya tadavagamopāyatvaṃ śabdānāṃ yojayituṃ śakyate /
analyzed: āha loke pramāṇa antara paricchedya tvāt vākya arthasya tad avagama upāya tvam śabdānām yojayitum śakyate

original: vedārthas tu atīndriyaḥ /
analyzed: veda arthaḥ tu atīndriyaḥ

original: na ca rāgādidoṣakaluṣamanasām asmadādīnāṃ atīndriyapaddārthadarśanakauśalam asti /
analyzed: na ca rāga ādi doṣa kaluṣa manasām asmat ādīnām atīndriya paddārtha darśana kauśalam asti

original: tadadarśane ca tatra vṛddhavyavahārāt vyutpattir eva na saṃbhavati  /
analyzed: tad adarśane ca tatra vṛddha vyavahārāt vyutpattiḥ eva na saṃbhavati

original: so 'ham adya vedārthaṃ bubhutsamāno vedavidaṃ kaṃ cid ācāryam abhigaccheyam /
analyzed: saḥ ham adya veda artham bubhutsamānaḥ veda vidam kam cit ācāryam abhigaccheyam

original: so 'py atīndriyārthadarśī na bhavatīti tasyāpi tathiva vyutpattyabhāva iti tenāpy anyaḥ kaścid abhigantavyaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ pi atīndriya artha darśī na bhavati iti tasya api vyutpatti abhāvaḥ iti tena api anyaḥ kaścid abhigantavyaḥ

original: so 'py anyam ity andhaparamparā prāpnoti /
analyzed: sā u pi anyam iti andha paramparā prāpnoti

original: na ca veda eva [vṛddhirādaic] iti pāṇinir iva [mastriguruḥ] iti bruvan piṅgala iva [hasta karaḥ pāṇiḥ] iti kathayann abhidhānamālākāra iva svayam upadiśati [eṣo 'sya māmakasya śabdasyārtha] iti /
analyzed: na ca vedaḥ eva vṛddhiḥ āt ai c iti pāṇiniḥ iva mastri guruḥ iti bruvan piṅgalaḥ iva hasta karaḥ pāṇiḥ iti kathayan abhidhāna mālākāraḥ iva svayam upadiśati eṣa u sya māmakasya śabdasya arthaḥ iti

original: tasmat sarvathā duravagamo vedārthaḥ tad āha svayaṃ rāgādimān nārthaṃ vetti cet tasya nānyataḥ /
analyzed: tasmat sarvathā duravagamaḥ veda arthaḥ tat āha svayam rāga ādimān na artham vetti ced tasya na anyatas

original: na vedayati vedo 'pi vedārthasya kuto gatiḥ] iti //
analyzed: na vedayati veda arthasya kutas gatiḥ iti

original: atha nigamaniruktavyākaraṇaveśena padārthakalpanā kriyate tarhi nānāmatitvāt upadeṣṭ•ṇāṃ anekārthatvāc ca dhātūnāṃ nāmnāṃ upasarganipātānāṃ ca na niyataḥ kaṃ cid artho vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyate /
analyzed: atha nigama nirukta vyākaraṇa veśena padārtha kalpanā kriyate tarhi nānā mati tvāt upadeṣṭṇām aneka artha tvāt ca dhātūnām nāmnām upasarga nipātānām ca na niyataḥ kam cit arthaḥ vyavasthāpayitum śakyate

original: anyathā tatkalpanāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: anyathā tad kalpanā asaṃbhavāt

original: āha ca [tenāgnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma iti śrutau /
analyzed: āha ca tena agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti śrutau

original: khādec chvamāṃsam ity eṣaḥ nārtha ity atra kā pramā] iti //
analyzed: khādet śva māṃsam iti eṣaḥ na arthaḥ iti atra kā pramā iti

original: tad etat badhirasya rāmāyaṇaṃ varṇitam asmābhiḥ yū evam api śrutvā vedārthaparigamābhiupāyaṃ mṛgayate /
analyzed: tat etat badhirasya rāmāyaṇam varṇitam asmābhiḥ evam api śrutvā veda artha parigama abhi upāyam mṛgayate

original: anena hi pavaktina vākyārthaparigamopāya prakaṭanena sarvam apākṛtaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: anena hi vākya artha parigama upāya prakaṭanena sarvam apākṛtam bhavati

original: uktaṃ hi nābhinavāḥ kecana vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ /
analyzed: uktam hi na abhinavāḥ kecana vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ

original: racanāmātraṃ vede bhidyate na tu padāni /
analyzed: racanā mātram vede bhidyate na tu padāni

original: sargāt prabhṛti ca pravṛtto 'yaṃ vedavidāṃ vyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: sargāt prabhṛti ca pravṛttaḥ yam veda vidām vyavahāraḥ

original: tat eva dīrghaprabandhapravṛttāt adyatve vayasi vyutpadyāmahe /
analyzed: tat eva dīrgha prabandha pravṛttāt adyatve vayasi vyutpadyāmahe

original: vyutpadyamānāś ca taṃ tam arthaṃ pratipādyāmahe //
analyzed: vyutpadyamānāḥ ca tam tam artham pratipādyāmahe

original: kiṃ ca vedārthasya parijñānaupayikāni vyākaraṇamīmāṃsādiśāstrāṇi kva gatāṇi yad eṣu jīvanmu na vedārtho 'vadhāryate //
analyzed: kim ca veda arthasya parijñāna aupayikāni vyākaraṇa mīmāṃsā ādi śāstrāṇi kva gatāṇi yat eṣu na veda arthaḥ vadhāryate

original: api ca re mūḍha svayaṃ rāgādimān nārthaṃ vetti vedasya ko 'rtho rāgādimataḥ pratyakṣam atīndriye 'rthe mā pravartiṣṭa na tu rāgādimān [agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ] iti vākyād api agnihotrākhyaṃ karma svargasādhanam iti nāvagacchet //
analyzed: api ca re mūḍha svayam rāga ādimān na artham vetti vedasya kaḥ rthaḥ rāga ādimataḥ pratyakṣam atīndriye rthe mā pravartiṣṭa na tu rāga ādimān agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti vākyāt api agnihotra ākhyam karma svarga sādhanam iti na avagacchet

original: atīndriye 'rthe niyatā kuto vyutpattir iti cet uktam atra vedavat tadvyavahārasya tadarthaparigamopāyasya suciraprarūḍhatvāt /
analyzed: atīndriye rthe niyatā kutas vyutpattiḥ iti ced uktam atra veda vat tad vyavahārasya tad artha parigama upāyasya su cira prarūḍha tvāt

original: vedārthaś ca tadavagamaś ca tadupāyaś ca tadanuṣṭhānaṃ ca nādyatve pravṛttāni /
analyzed: veda arthaḥ ca tad avagamaḥ ca tad upāyaḥ ca tad anuṣṭhānam ca na ādya tve pravṛttāni

original: tāni keṣāṃ cinmate'nādīny eva /
analyzed: tāni keṣām cit matena ādīni eva

original: asmanmate tu jagatsargāt prabhṛti pravṛttāni /
analyzed: asmad mate tu jagat sargāt prabhṛti pravṛttāni
