original: kas teṣv adya paryanuyogāvasaraḥ seyam anena pāpakāriṇā [khādec chvamāṃsaṃ] ityādyapabhāṣaṇena kevalam avīcikedārakuṭumbinamānaṃ kartuṃ vedanindaiva mandamatinā kṛtā na dūṣṇam abhinavaṃ kiṃ cid utprekṣitam iti //
analyzed: kaḥ teṣu adya paryanuyoga avasaraḥ sā iyam anena pāpa kāriṇā khādet śva māṃsam ityādi apabhāṣaṇena kevalam avīci kedāra kuṭumbina mānam kartum veda nindā eva manda matinā kṛtā na dūṣṇam abhinavam kim cit utprekṣitam iti

original: athāpara āha kim eṣa tapasvī parāṇudyate kiyanenāparāddham kim anena viruddham abhihitam na hi lokato vedārthe vyutpattir avakalpate //
analyzed: atha aparaḥ āha kim eṣa tapasvī parāṇudyate kiyanena aparāddham kim anena viruddham abhihitam na hi lokataḥ veda arthe vyutpattiḥ avakalpate

original: ko 'yaṃ loko nāma kiṃ yaḥ kaścit prākṛtaḥ uta vaiyākaraṇaḥ saṃskṛtamitaḥ iti //
analyzed: kaḥ yam lokaḥ nāma kim yaḥ kaścid prākṛtaḥ uta vaiyākaraṇaḥ saṃskṛta mitaḥ iti

original: tatra śākaṭikāḥ sādhuśabdaprayogānabhijñamanaso nisargata evākṣatakaṇṭhāḥ varākāḥ saṃskārabāhyaiḥ gāvyādibhir eva śabdair vyavaharanti /
analyzed: tatra śākaṭikāḥ sādhu śabda prayoga anabhijña manasaḥ nisargataḥ eva akṣata kaṇṭhāḥ varākāḥ saṃskāra bāhyaiḥ gāvya ādibhiḥ eva śabdaiḥ vyavaharanti

original: taiś ca vyavaharantaḥ katham iva vaidikeṣu śabdeṣu vyutpattim avāpnuyuḥ yady api cāsti [eṣi] [emi] iti kaśmīreṣu [gaccha] iti darvābhisāreṣu [karomi] iti madreṣu katipaye sādhuśabdā pāmarair api prayujyante tathāpy atīva praviralasaṃcāro 'sau vyavahāra ity anupādeya eva vaidikaśabdavyutpatteḥ //
analyzed: taiḥ ca vyavaharantaḥ katham iva vaidikeṣu śabdeṣu vyutpattim avāpnuyuḥ yadi api ca asti eṣi emi iti kaśmīreṣu gaccha iti darvābhisāreṣu karomi iti madreṣu katipaye sādhu śabdā pāmaraiḥ api prayujyante tathā api atīva pravirala saṃcāraḥ sau vyavahāraḥ iti anupādeyaḥ eva vaidika śabda vyutpatteḥ

original: atha vyākaraṇasya vedāṅgatvāt tataḥ sādhvasādhuśabdapravibhāgam avagacchantaḥ [sādhubhir bhāṣitavyaṃ asādhubhir na] iti vidhiniṣedhaniyamitamatayḥ sādhubhir eva śabdair vyavaharanto vidvāṃsaḥ tanīyasaiva kleśena vaidikeṣv api śabdeṣu vyutpattim āsādayeyur iti kathyate tad api na caturaśram itaretarāśrayaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: atha vyākaraṇasya vedāṅga tvāt tatas sādhu asādhu śabda pravibhāgam avagacchantaḥ sādhubhiḥ bhāṣitavyam asādhubhiḥ naḥ iti vidhi niṣedha niyamita matayaḥ sādhubhiḥ eva śabdaiḥ vyavaharantaḥ vidvāṃsaḥ tanīyasā eva kleśena vaidikeṣu api śabdeṣu vyutpattim āsādayeyuḥ iti kathyate tat api na caturaśram itaretara āśraya prasaṅgāt

original: vede hi siddhaprāmāṇye tadaṅgabhūtavyākaraṇābhyāsasamāsāditasādhvasādhuśabdapraviveka vṛddhavyavahāraparicayapuraśarā vaidikaśabdeṣu vyutpattiḥ tadvyutpattau ca satyāṃ bodhakatvād apratipādakatvalakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam apojjhato vedasya prāmāṇyam iti //
analyzed: vede hi siddha prāmāṇye tad aṅga bhūta vyākaraṇa abhyāsa samāsādita sādhu asādhu śabda praviveka vṛddha vyavahāra paricaya puraśarā vaidika śabdeṣu vyutpattiḥ tad vyutpattau ca satyām bodhaka tvāt apratipādaka tva lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam apojjhataḥ vedasya prāmāṇyam iti

original: atha vedāṅgam idam iti śraddhāṃ avadhūya yadṛcchādhītenaiva vyākaraṇena pūrvoktakāryasiddher netaretarāśrayam iti varṇyate kim idānīṃ nāṭakaprakaraṇādi kāvyopayogisaṃskṛtabhāṣāviśeṣaparijñānāyaiva prākṛtalakṣaṇavad vyākaraṇamadhyetavyam tathā 'bhyupagamevā 'naṅgatvāviśeṣāt prākṛtalakṣaṇaprasiddhaśabdavyavahārānusāreṇa vaidkaśabdavyutpattir āpādyata iti sutarāṃ duśthatvaṃ //
analyzed: atha vedāṅgam idam iti śraddhām avadhūya yadṛcchā adhītena eva vyākaraṇena pūrva ukta kārya siddheḥ na itaretara āśrayam iti varṇyate kim idānīm nāṭaka prakaraṇa ādi kāvya upayogi saṃskṛta bhāṣā viśeṣa parijñānāya eva prākṛta lakṣaṇa vat vyākaraṇam adhyetavyam tathā aṅga tva aviśeṣāt prākṛta lakṣaṇa prasiddha śabda vyavahāra anusāreṇa vaidka śabda vyutpattiḥ āpādyate iti sutarām duśtha tvam asti iti

original: api ca saty api vyākaraṇādhigame śrute 'pi [sādhubhir bhāṣitavyam] ity upadeśe satyaṃ vadata vedārthānuṣṭhānaparāyaṇo 'pi kṛtabuddhir api niṣiddhācaraṇaparāṅmukho 'pi śrotrayo 'pi yadi kaścit kevalaiḥ sādhubhir eva śabdair vyavaharan dṛṣṭa ekākī taiś ca nānārthakriyāsādhanabhūtabhūrivyavahāraṃ nirvahan tadanucaraḥ parijñāto na bhūyaḥ kevalasādhuśabdaprayogakuśalaḥ kalpanīyaḥ /
analyzed: api ca sati api vyākaraṇa adhigame śrute sādhubhiḥ bhāṣitavyam iti upadeśe satyam vadata veda artha anuṣṭhāna parāyaṇaḥ kṛtabuddhiḥ api niṣiddha ācaraṇa parāṅmukhaḥ upi yadi kaścid kevalaiḥ sādhubhiḥ eva śabdaiḥ vyavaharan dṛṣṭaḥ ekākī taiḥ ca nānā artha kriyā sādhana bhūta bhūri vyavahāram nirvahan tad anucaraḥ parijñātaḥ na bhūyas kevala sādhu śabda prayoga kuśalaḥ kalpanīyaḥ

original: kutaś cāsau labhyate tasmān na vṛddhavyavahārād vedārthavyutpattir upapadyate //
analyzed: kutas ca asau labhyate tasmāt na vṛddha vyavahārāt veda artha vyutpattiḥ upapadyate

original: atha vyākaraṇam eva vedārthavyutpattau upāyatāṃ pratipatsyate iti manyase tad api katham iti cintyam /
analyzed: atha vyākaraṇam eva veda artha vyutpattau upāya tām pratipatsyate iti manyase tat api katham iti cintyam

original: na hi vivaraṇakāra iva pāṇinir vedaṃ vyācaṣṭe /
analyzed: na hi vivaraṇa kāraḥ iva pāṇiniḥ vedam vyācaṣṭe

original: vyācakṣāṇo vā parimitadarśini asmādṛśe dveṣādidoṣakaluṣitamanasi tasmin asmadādīnāṃ vedārthaṃ bubhutsamānānāṃ kidṛśī visrambhaḥ kiṃ yathaiṣa vyācaṣṭe tathaiva vedārthaḥ anyathā veti //
analyzed: vyācakṣāṇaḥ vā parimita darśini asmādṛśe dveṣa ādi doṣa kaluṣita manasi tasmin asmad ādīnām veda artham bubhutsamānānām kidṛśī visrambhaḥ kim yathā eṣa vyācaṣṭe tathā eva veda arthaḥ anyathā vā iti

original: yadi tu sādhvasādhuśabdavivekakaraṇadvāreṇa vyākaraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ vedārthavyutpatter ity ucyate tatrāpi svātantryeṇa vedasyeva vyākaraṇasya śāstratvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: yadi tu sādhu asādhu śabda viveka karaṇa dvāreṇa vyākaraṇam kāraṇam veda artha vyutpatteḥ iti ucyate tatra api svātantryeṇa vedasya iva vyākaraṇasya śāstra tva anupapatteḥ

original: aṅgatvaprasiddheś ca vaidikavidhyapekṣitārthasaṃparkitvam asya nūnam eṣitavyam /
analyzed: aṅga tva prasiddheḥ ca vaidika vidhi apekṣita artha saṃparki tvam asya nūnam eṣitavyam

original: tat kasya vidheḥ śeṣatayā vyākaraṇam avatiṣṭheteti vācyam /
analyzed: tat kasya vidheḥ śeṣa tayā vyākaraṇam avatiṣṭheta iti vācyam

original: sādhubhir bhāṣitavyaṃ asādhubhir nety anayor eva vidhiniṣedhayor iti cet nanv etāv eva vidhiniṣedhau tāvad vicārayāmaḥ /
analyzed: sādhubhiḥ bhāṣitavyam asādhubhiḥ na iti anayoḥ eva vidhi niṣedhayoḥ iti ced nanu etau eva vidhi niṣedhau tāvat vicārayāmaḥ

original: kiṃ kva cit prakaraṇe paṭhitau kim anārabhyādhītau k¬ptādhikārī kalpyādhikārī vā iti //
analyzed: kim kva cit prakaraṇe paṭhitau kim an ārabhya adhītau kpta adhikārī kalpya adhikārī vā iti

original: āstāṃ cedam vitatā khalv iyaṃ cintā /
analyzed: āstām ca idam vitatā khalu iyam cintā

original: sādhvasādhuśabdasyāprasiddhatvāt kiṃ viṣayāv imau vidhiniṣedhau syātām itīdam eva cintyatām /
analyzed: sādhu asādhu śabdasya aprasiddha tvāt kim viṣayau imau vidhi niṣedhau syātām iti idam eva cintyatām

original: [vrīhibhir yajeta] [na kalaṃjaṃ bhakṣayet] iti vrīhikalaṃjasvarūpasya lokato'vagatau tadviṣayavidhiniṣedhāvabodho na durghaṭaḥ /
analyzed: vrīhibhiḥ yajeta na kalaṃjam bhakṣayet iti vrīhi kalaṃja sva rūpasya lokataḥ avagatau tad viṣaya vidhi niṣedha avabodhaḥ na durghaṭaḥ

original: iha tu vrīhaya iva kalaṃjam iva na sādhvasādhuśabdasvarūpaṃ loke prasiddham pratyakṣādipramāṇātītavāt /
analyzed: iha tu vrīhayaḥ iva kalaṃjam iva na sādhu asādhu śabda svarūpam loke prasiddham pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa atīta vāt

original: pratyakṣaṃ tāvat sādhvasādhuśabdapravivekena lokato 'vagamyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣam tāvat sādhu asādhu śabda pravivekena lokataḥ vagamyate

original: kṛtaśramaśravaṇayugalakaraṇikāsu pramitiṣu śabdasvarūpam eva kevalaṃ viṣayatām upayāti /
analyzed: kṛta śrama śravaṇa yugala karaṇikāsu pramitiṣu śabda svarūpam eva kevalam viṣaya tām upayāti

original: na jātu tadgataṃ sādhutvam asādhutvaṃ vā /
analyzed: na jātu tad gatam sādhu tvam asādhu tvam vā

original: na hi śabdatvādijātivat udāttādidharmavac ca sādhvasādhutāyāṃ kasyacid api śraitraḥ pratyayaḥ prasarati /
analyzed: na hi śabda tva ādi jāti vat udātta ādi dharma vat ca sādhu asādhu tāyām kasyacid api śraitraḥ pratyayaḥ prasarati

original: pratyakṣapratiṣedhe ca sati tatpūrvakasaṃbandhagrahaṇāsaṃbhavāt anumānam api niravakāśam eva /
analyzed: pratyakṣa pratiṣedhe ca sati tad pūrvaka saṃbandha grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt anumānam api niravakāśam eva

original: śabdas tu dvividhaḥ puruṣapraṇītaḥ vaidiko vā /
analyzed: śabdaḥ tu dvividhaḥ puruṣa praṇītaḥ vaidikaḥ vā

original: tatra puruṣapraṇītaḥ pratyakṣānumānaviṣayīkṛtārthapratipādanapravaṇa eva bhavati iti tadapākaraṇād eva parākṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tatra puruṣa praṇītaḥ pratyakṣa anumāna viṣayīkṛta artha pratipādana pravaṇaḥ eva bhavati iti tad apākaraṇāt eva parākṛtaḥ

original: vaidikas tu saṃprati cintyo vartate /
analyzed: vaidikaḥ tu saṃprati cintyaḥ vartate

original: sa hi siddhe sādhvasādhutve tadvidhiniṣedhe vyāpriyate /
analyzed: sa hi siddhe sādhu asādhu tve tad vidhi niṣedhe vyāpriyate

original: na punaḥ tata eva tatsidhir yujyate /
analyzed: na punar tatas eva tad sidhiḥ yujyate

original: tathā 'bhyupagame vāduruttaram itaretarāśrayatvam avatarati vidhiniṣedhasiddhau sādhvasādhuśabdasiddhiḥ sādhvasādhuśabdasiddhau ca vidhiniṣedhasiddhir iti //
analyzed: tathā abhyupagame vāduruttaram itaretara āśraya tvam avatarati vidhi niṣedha siddhau sādhu asādhu śabda siddhiḥ sādhu asādhu śabda siddhau ca vidhi niṣedha siddhiḥ iti

original: kiṃ cedaṃ sādhutvaṃ nāma yadi vācakatvam gāvyādayo 'pi sutarāṃ vācakā iti te 'pi kathaṃ na sādhavaḥ arthāvagatisādhanād dhi sādhutvam /
analyzed: kim ca idam sādhu tvam nāma yadi vācaka tvam gāvī ādayaḥ sutarām vācakāḥ iti te pi katham na sādhavaḥ artha avagati sādhanāt hi sādhu tvam

original: tac ca yathā gāvyādiṣu jhaṭity eva bhavati na tathā gavādiṣv iti prathamaṃ ta eva sādhavaḥ //
analyzed: tat ca yathā gāvī ādiṣu jhaṭiti eva bhavati na tathā gavādiṣu iti prathamam te eva sādhavaḥ

original: evaṃ ca yad āhuḥ [asādhur anumānena vācakaḥ kaiś cid iṣyate] iti tadatyantam asāṃpratamaḥ sopānāntarapratītiprasakteḥ viparyayasya ca loke prasiddhatvāt //
analyzed: evam ca yat āhuḥ asādhuḥ anumānena vācakaḥ kaiḥ cid iṣyate iti tat atyantam sopāna antara pratīti prasakteḥ viparyayasya ca loke prasiddha tvāt

original: yas tāvad anadhigatavyākaraṇasaraṇiḥ pāmarādiḥ saḥ gāvyādiśabdaśravaṇe sati tāvaty eva jātasantoṣaḥ tata evārtham avagacchan gavādiśabdānumanavyavadhānam anāruhyaiva vyavaharati /
analyzed: yaḥ tāvat anadhigata vyākaraṇa saraṇiḥ pāmara ādiḥ saḥ gāvī ādi śabda śravaṇe sati tāvati eva jāta santoṣaḥ tatas eva artham avagacchan gavā ādi śabda anumana vyavadhānam an āruhya eva vyavaharati

original: hemagirim uttareṇa yādṛṃśi mādṛśair anubhūtāni tarukusumaphalāni tathāvidhās tasya sādhuśabdā iti sarvātmanā 'nvadhāritasaṃbandhaḥ sa kathaṃ tāvad anumātuṃ prabhavet ye 'pi vyākaraṇārṇavakarṇadhārāḥ cirābhyastasūktayaḥ sūrayaḥ te 'pi gāvyādibhir vyavaharanto 'numānakramam ananusaranta eva tebhyo 'rthaṃ pratipadyanta iti pratyātmavedanīyam etat /
analyzed: hemagirim uttareṇa yādṛṃśi mādṛśaiḥ anubhūtāni taru kusuma phalāni tathāvidhāḥ tasya sādhu śabdāḥ iti sarva ātmanā nu a dhārita saṃbandhaḥ sa katham tāvat anumātum prabhavet ye pi vyākaraṇa arṇava karṇadhārāḥ cira abhyasta sūktayaḥ sūrayaḥ te pi gāvya ādibhiḥ vyavaharantaḥ numāna kramam an anusarantaḥ eva tebhyaḥ rtham pratipadyante iti pratyātma vedanīyam etat

original: tasmāt vācakatvam eva sādhutvam /
analyzed: tasmāt vācaka tvam eva sādhu tvam

original: etac ca gavādiṣv iva gāvyādiṣu dṛśyata iti te 'pi sādhavaḥ syuḥ //
analyzed: etat ca go ādiṣu iva gāvī ādiṣu dṛśyate iti te pi sādhavaḥ syuḥ

original: asādhutvam apy avācakatvam ucyate /
analyzed: asādhu tvam api avācaka tvam ucyate

original: tac ca vāyasavāśitādiṣu vyavasthitaṃ na varṇātmakeṣu vyaktavāguccāryamāṇeṣu śabdeṣv iti na te 'sādhavaḥ //
analyzed: tat ca vāyasa vāśitā ādiṣu vyavasthitam na varṇa ātmakeṣu vyakta vāc uccāryamāṇeṣu śabdeṣu iti na te sādhavaḥ

original: brūyāt nārthapratītisādhanatvamātraṃ sādhutvam dhūmādibhir ativyāpteḥ /
analyzed: brūyāt na artha pratīti sādhanatva mātram sādhutvam dhūma ādibhiḥ ativyāpteḥ

original: api tu viśiṣṭakriyākaraṇatvam /
analyzed: api tu viśiṣṭa kriyā karaṇa tvam

original: tac ca gavādiṣv evāsti na gāvyādiṣv iti na te sādhava iti etad api asmīkṣitābhidhānam abhidhānakriyākāraṇatvaṃ hi vācakatvam iti pūrvam eva sunipuṇam upapāditam /
analyzed: tat ca gavā ādiṣu eva asti na gāvī ādiṣu iti na te sādhavaḥ iti etat api asmīkṣita abhidhānam abhidhāna kriyā kāraṇa tvam hi vācaka tvam iti pūrvam eva su nipuṇam upapāditam

original: tac ca gavādiṣu gāvyādiṣu ca samānam iti sarva eva sādhavaḥ //
analyzed: tat ca gavā ādiṣu gāvī ādiṣu ca samānam iti sarve eva sādhavaḥ

original: atha lakṣaṇānugatatvaṃ tadbāhyatvaṃ ca sādhutvam asādhutvaṃ ca varṇyate tad ayuktam pāribhāṣikatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: atha lakṣaṇa anugata tvam tad bāhya tvam ca sādhu tvam asādhu tvam ca varṇyate tat ayuktam pāribhāṣika tva prasaṅgāt

original: na cānyat kim api sādhvasādhulakṣaṇam atisūkṣmayā 'pi dṛṣṭyā śakyam utprekṣitum /
analyzed: na ca anyat kim api sādhu asādhu lakṣaṇam ati sūkṣmayā pi dṛṣṭyā śakyam utprekṣitum

original: ato vācakāvācakāv eva sādhvasādhū iti sthitam //
analyzed: atas vācaka avācakau eva sādhu asādhū iti sthitam

original: tena tayoḥ pravartamānau vidhiniṣedhāv imau vyathau bhavetām /
analyzed: tena tayoḥ pravartamānau vidhi niṣedhau imau vyathau bhavetām

original: katham sādhubhir bhāṣiṇo tāvat prāptatvān na vidhīyate /
analyzed: katham sādhubhiḥ tāvat prāpta tvāt na vidhīyate

original: avācakaniṣedhaś ca nāprāpter avakalpate //
analyzed: avācaka niṣedhaḥ ca na aprāpteḥ avakalpate

original: na hi [salilaṃ pibet] [analaṃ na pibet] iti vidhiniṣedhau saṃbhavataḥ /
analyzed: na hi salilam pibet analam na pibet iti vidhi niṣedhau saṃbhavataḥ

original: salilapānasya svataḥ prāptatvāt aprāpte ca śāstrasyārthavattvāt /
analyzed: salila pānasya svatas prāpta tvāt aprāpte ca śāstrasya arthavat tvāt

original: jvalanapānasya ca kasyāṃ cid apy avasthāyāṃ aprāpteḥ pratiṣedhānarthakyāt /
analyzed: jvalana pānasya ca kasyām cit api avasthāyām aprāpteḥ pratiṣedha ānarthakyāt

original: prāptipūrvikā hi pratiṣedhā bhavanti /
analyzed: prāpti pūrvikāḥ hi pratiṣedhāḥ bhavanti

original: na hi grīṣme jvālāyamānamāravamārgabhramaṇojjhṛmbhitatṛṣātiśayatanūkṛtatanur api tanūnapātaṃ pātuṃ lavaṇopayogopanītatṛṅvikāraḥ karabho 'pi yateteti //
analyzed: na hi grīṣme jvālāyamāna mārava mārga bhramaṇa ujjhṛmbhita tṛṣā atiśaya tanūkṛta tanuḥ api tanūnapātam pātum lavaṇa upayoga upanīta tṛṅ vikāraḥ yateta iti

original: tatraitat syāt gavāder gāvyādeś ca vācakatvāviśeṣe 'pi sādhvasādhuśabdoccāraṇakaraṇakapuṇyapāpaprāptiparihāraprayojananiyamavidhānāya śāstrasāphalyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tatra etat syāt gav ādeḥ gāvī ādeḥ ca vācaka tva aviśeṣe sādhu asādhu śabda uccāraṇa karaṇaka puṇya pāpa prāpti parihāra prayojana niyama vidhānāya śāstra sāphalyam bhaviṣyati

original: tad uktam [vācakatvāviśeṣe 'pi niyamaḥ puṇyapāpayoḥ] iti etad api durghaṭam pratipadam aśakyatvāt vargīkaraṇanimittasya cāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: tat uktam vācaka tva aviśeṣe niyamaḥ puṇya pāpayoḥ iti etat api durghaṭam pratipadam aśakya tvāt vargīkaraṇa nimittasya ca asaṃbhavāt

original: avaśyaṃ hi vidhiṃ vā niṣedhaṃ vā vidhitsatāṃ praviṣedhyāṃś ca niṣedhyāṃś ca śabdānupadarśya niyamo vidhātavyaḥ [ebhir bhāṣitavyaṃ ebhir na] iti /
analyzed: avaśyam hi vidhim vā niṣedham vā vidhitsatām praviṣedhyān ca niṣedhyān ca śabdān upadarśya niyamaḥ vidhātavyaḥ ebhiḥ bhāṣitavyam ebhiḥ naḥ iti

original: tatra yady ubhaye te śabdāḥ prativyakti nāmagrahaṇaparigaṇanapuraśaram upadarśyeran tad ayam arthaḥ kalpaśatajīvinaḥ bhagavataḥ parameṣṭhino 'pi na viṣayaḥ pravitatavadanasahasrasaṃkulamūrter anantasyāpi na gocaraḥ vācaspater na bhūmiḥ sarasvatyā atibhāraḥ teṣām ānantyena darśayutum aśakyatvāt //
analyzed: tatra yadi ubhaye te śabdāḥ prativyakti nāma grahaṇa parigaṇana puraśaram upadarśyeran tat ayam arthaḥ kalpa śata jīvinaḥ bhagavataḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ na viṣayaḥ pravitata vadana sahasra saṃkula mūrteḥ anantasya api na gocaraḥ vācaspateḥ na bhūmiḥ sarasvatyāḥ atibhāraḥ teṣām ānantyena darśa yutum aśakya tvāt

original: atha kiṃ cid upalakṣaṇam avalamya teṣāṃ vargīkaraṇam upeyate hanta tarhi dṛśyatām na ca tat saṃbhavati //
analyzed: atha kim cit upalakṣaṇam avalamya teṣām vargīkaraṇam upeyate hanta tarhi dṛśyatām na ca tat saṃbhavati

original: avibhaktā hi śabdatvajātiḥ śabdāpaśabdayoḥ /
analyzed: avibhaktā hi śabda tva jātiḥ śabda apaśabdayoḥ

original: na cāvāntarasāmānye ke cid vargadvaye sthite //
analyzed: na ca avāntara sāmānye ke cid varga dvaye sthite

original: na hi sādhutvasāmānyaṃ itareṣu vyavasthitam /
analyzed: na hi sādhu tva sāmānyam itareṣu vyavasthitam

original: iatreṣv apy asāhutvasāmānyam upalabhyate //
analyzed: iatreṣu api asāhu tva sāmānyam upalabhyate

original: tadanupalambhād asaṃbhavati vargīkaraṇakāraṇe katham eṣa niyamo vidhīyeteti nāvadhārayāmaḥ //
analyzed: tad anupalambhāt asaṃbhavati vargīkaraṇa kāraṇe katham eṣa niyamaḥ vidhīyeta iti na avadhārayāmaḥ

original: kiṃ ca niyamārthe 'pi śāstre vaktavyaṃ kīdṛśo niyamārtha iti kiṃ sādhubhir eva bhāṣitavyam bhāṣitavyam eva nādhubhir iti /
analyzed: kim ca niyama arthe śāstre vaktavyam kīdṛśaḥ niyama arthaḥ iti kim sādhubhiḥ eva bhāṣitavyam bhāṣitavyam eva na adhubhiḥ iti

original: ubhayathā ca pramādaḥ /
analyzed: ubhayathā ca pramādaḥ

original: āha hi [yadi sādhubhir eveti nāsādhor aprasaṅgataḥ /
analyzed: āha hi yadi sādhubhiḥ evā iti na asādhoḥ aprasaṅgataḥ

original: niyataṃ bhāṣitavyaṃ cet maune doṣaḥ prasajyate] iti //
analyzed: niyatam bhāṣitavyam ced maune doṣaḥ prasajyate iti

original: na ca vācakatvād anyat sādhutvam ity uktam avācakasya prayogaprasaṅga eva nāstīti //
analyzed: na ca vācaka tvāt anyat sādhu tvam iti uktam avācakasya prayoga prasaṅgaḥ eva nā asti iti

original: atha pramādā 'śaktikṛtāpaśabdaprayogapratiṣedhāya niyama āśrīyate tatrāpi pramādā 'śaktijāḥ śabdāḥ yadi tāvad avācakāḥ /
analyzed: atha śakti kṛta apaśabda prayoga pratiṣedhāya niyamaḥ āśrīyate tatra api śakti jāḥ śabdāḥ yadi tāvat avācakāḥ

original: teṣu prasaṅgo nāstīti tannivṛttiśrameṇa kim //
analyzed: teṣu prasaṅgaḥ nā asti iti tad nivṛtti śrameṇa kim

original: atha vācakatā teṣāṃ apramādotthaśaktivat /
analyzed: atha vācaka tā teṣām apramāda uttha śakti vat

original: na tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ syāt apramādotthaśaktivat //
analyzed: na tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ syāt apramāda uttha śakti vat

original: nanu asti tāvad apaśabdānām aśakyanihnavaḥ paridṛśyamāno loke prayoga iti tannivṛttiphala eṣa prayoganiyamaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet yady evaṃ akṣinikocahastasaṃjñāder api pracuraḥ prayogo dṛśyata iti tadvtyudāsaphalo 'py eṣa niyamaḥ syāt //
analyzed: nanu asti tāvat apaśabdānām aśakya nihnavaḥ paridṛśyamānaḥ loke prayogaḥ iti tad nivṛtti phalaḥ eṣa prayoga niyamaḥ katham na bhavet yadi evam akṣi nikoca hasta saṃjñā ādeḥ api pracuraḥ prayogaḥ dṛśyate iti tad vti udāsa phalaḥ pi eṣa niyamaḥ syāt

original: api ca vidhiphalaḥ sarvatra niyamo bhavati [ṛtāv upeyāt] ityādi /
analyzed: api ca vidhi phalaḥ sarvatra niyamaḥ bhavati ṛtau upeyāt ityādi

original: niṣedhaphalā tu parisaṃkhyā [paṃca paṃcanakhā bhakṣyāḥ] iti /
analyzed: niṣedha phalā tu parisaṃkhyā paṃca paṃcanakhāḥ bhakṣyāḥ iti

original: tad ayam apaśabde prayogapratiṣedhaphalaś ca niyamaś ceti vyāhatam abhidhīyate //
analyzed: tat ayam apaśabde prayoga pratiṣedha phalaḥ ca niyamaḥ ca iti vyāhatam abhidhīyate

original: parisaṃkhyā tarhi bhaviṣyatīti cet na śabdāpaśabdayor yugapat prāptyabhāvāt /
analyzed: parisaṃkhyā tarhi bhaviṣyati iti ced na śabda apaśabdayoḥ yugapad prāpti abhāvāt

original: [tatra cānyatra ca prāptau parisaṃkhyā 'bhidhīyate] iti nyāyāt //
analyzed: tatra ca anyatra ca prāptau parisaṃkhyā abhidhīyate iti nyāyāt

original: yad api puṇyapāpaphalatvaṃ suśabdāpaśabdayor iti gīyate tad api na peśalam paridṛśyamānaṃ avivādasiddhaṃ arthapratyayopajananam apahāya prokṣasyādṛṣṭasya puṇyapāpātmanaḥ kalpanānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: yat api puṇya pāpa phala tvam suśabda apaśabdayoḥ iti gīyate tat api na peśalam paridṛśyamānam avivāda siddham artha pratyaya upajananam apahāya prokṣasya adṛṣṭasya puṇya pāpa ātmanaḥ kalpanā anupapatteḥ

original: yaś cāyaṃ [svarge loke kāmadhug bhavati] iti sādhuśabdastutyarthavādaḥ yaś ca [sa vāgvajro yajamānaṃ hinasti] ity apaśabde nindārthavādaḥ tatra padārthasya vispaṣṭadṛṣṭatvāt arthavādamātraparyavasitau ca [dravyasaṃskārakarmam uparārthavāt phalaśrutir arthavādaḥ syāt] iti nyāyāt na phalārthateti //
analyzed: yaḥ ca ayam svarge loke kāmadhuk bhavati iti sādhu śabda stuti arthavādaḥ yaḥ ca sa vāc vajraḥ yajamānam hinasti iti apaśabde nindā arthavādaḥ tatra padārthasya vispaṣṭa dṛṣṭa tvāt arthavāda mātra paryavasitau ca dravya saṃskāra karmam uparā arthavād phala śrutiḥ arthavādaḥ syāt iti nyāyāt na phala artha tā iti

original: tad evaṃ [sādhubhir bhāṣitavyaṃ asādhubhir na] iti vidhiniṣedhayor anārabhyādhītayoḥ śrūyamāṇayor api dausthityāt tanmūlatayā labdhapramāṇabhāvā vyākaraṇasmṛtiḥ aṃgatām eṣyati vedasyeti durāśaiva /
analyzed: tat evam sādhubhiḥ bhāṣitavyam asādhubhiḥ naḥ iti vidhi niṣedhayoḥ an ārabhya adhītayoḥ śrūyamāṇayoḥ api dausthityāt tad mūla tayā labdha pramāṇa bhāvā vyākaraṇa smṛtiḥ aṃga tām eṣyati vedasya iti durāśā eva

original: prakaraṇaviśeṣapāṭhe tu tayos tadupayogād eva na sārvatriko niyamārthateti sarvathā na tanmūlatvaṃ vyākaraṇasya //
analyzed: prakaraṇa viśeṣa pāṭhe tu tayoḥ tad upayogāt eva na sārvatrikaḥ niyama artha tā iti sarvathā na tad mūla tvam vyākaraṇasya

original: āha tarhi [niṣkāraṇaḥ ṣaḍaṅgo vedo 'dhyeyo jñeyaś ca] iti vidheḥ śikṣākalpasūtraniruktacchandojyotiśśāstravat vyākaraṇam api vedāṅgatvād adhyeyam ity avagamyate naitad apy asti śikṣādīnāṃ itaretarasādhyasaṃkīrṇavividhavidhyapekṣitavedopakāranirvartakatvena tadaṅgatā susaṃgatā /
analyzed: āha tarhi niṣkāraṇaḥ ṣaṣ aṅgaḥ vedaḥ dhyeyaḥ jñeyaḥ ca iti vidheḥ śikṣā kalpasūtra nirukta chandaḥ jyotiḥ śāstra vat vyākaraṇam api vedāṅga tvāt adhyeyam iti avagamyate na etat api asti śikṣā ādīnām itaretara sādhya saṃkīrṇa vividha vidhi apekṣita veda upakāra nirvartaka tvena tad aṅga tā su saṃgatā

original: vyākaraṇasya tu sudūram api dhāvanaplavane vidadhataḥ sādhuśabdaprayoganiyamadvārakam eva tadaṅgatvaṃ saṃbhāvyate na mārgāntareṇa /
analyzed: vyākaraṇasya tu su dūram api dhāvana plavane vidadhataḥ sādhu śabda prayoga niyama dvārakam eva tad aṅga tvam saṃbhāvyate na mārga antareṇa

original: sa ca niyamo durupapāda iti darśitam /
analyzed: sa ca niyamaḥ durupapādaḥ iti darśitam

original: ato nāṃgāntarāṇi spadhitum arhati vyākaraṇam //
analyzed: atas na aṃga antarāṇi spadhitum arhati vyākaraṇam

original: niṣkāraṇaṣaḍaṅgavedādhyayanavidhau ca niṣkāraṇagrahaṇaṃ yathā prayojanaśaithilyaṃ sūcayati na tathā prayojanavattām /
analyzed: niṣkāraṇa ṣaṣ aṅga veda adhyayana vidhau ca niṣkāraṇa grahaṇam yathā prayojana śaithilyam sūcayati na tathā prayojanavat tām

original: śrutiliṅgādyaṅgatvapramāṇāpekṣayā ṣaḍaṅgatā varṇayiṣyate //
analyzed: śruti liṅga ādi aṅga tva pramāṇa apekṣayā ṣaḍaṅga tā varṇayiṣyate

original: etena [tasmād brāhmaṇena na mlechita ve nāpabhāṣita vai mleccho ha vā eṣa yad apaśabdaḥ] iti [ekaḥ śabdaḥ samyak jñātaḥ suprayuktaḥ svarge loke kāmadhuk bhavati] iti [āhitāgnir apaśabdaṃ prayujya prāyaścittīyāṃ sārasvatīm iṣṭi nirvapet] iti [tasmād aśeṣā vyākṛtā vāg ucyate] ityādivacanāntaramūlatā 'pi vyākaraṇasmṛteḥ pratyuktā //
analyzed: etena tasmāt brāhmaṇena na mlecchaḥ ha vai eṣa yat apaśabdaḥ iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ samyak jñātaḥ su prayuktaḥ svarge loke kāmadhuk bhavati iti āhitāgniḥ apaśabdam prayujya prāyaścittīyām sārasvatīm iṣṭi nirvapet iti tasmāt aśeṣā vyākṛtā vāc ucyate iti ādi vacana antara mūla tā vyākaraṇa smṛteḥ pratyuktā

original: śiṣṭaprayogamūlā tarhi vyākaraṇasmṛtir astu vaidyakasmṛtir ivānvayavyatirekamūleti cet ke śiṣṭā iti pṛṣṭo vaktum arhasi /
analyzed: śiṣṭa prayoga mūlā tarhi vyākaraṇa smṛtiḥ astu vaidyaka smṛtiḥ iva anvaya vyatireka mūlā iti ced ke śiṣṭāḥ iti pṛṣṭaḥ vaktum arhasi

original: kiṃ tadabhimatagavādisādhuśabdavyavahāriṇaḥ gāvyādyaśikṣikāpaśabdavādināḥ dvaye vā ādye pakṣe duruttaram itaretarāśrayatvam śiṣṭaprayogamūlaṃ vyākaraṇam vyākaraṇavidaś ca śiṣṭā iti /
analyzed: kim tad abhimata gavādi sādhu śabda vyavahāriṇaḥ gāvī ādya śikṣika apaśabdavādināḥ dvaye vā ādye pakṣe duruttaram itaretara āśraya tvam śiṣṭa prayoga mūlam vyākaraṇam vyākaraṇa vidaḥ ca śiṣṭāḥ iti

original: na hy aśikṣitavyākaraṇāḥ tatsaṃskṛtagavādiśabdaprayogakuśalā bhavanti //
analyzed: na hi a śikṣita vyākaraṇāḥ tad saṃskṛta go ādi śabda prayoga kuśalāḥ bhavanti

original: madhyamapakṣe gāvyādivyavahāriṇaḥ śākaṭikāḥ śiṣṭāḥ tatprayogamūlaṃ gavādiśabdasaṃkārakāri vyākaraṇam iti vyāhatam iva lakṣyate //
analyzed: madhyama pakṣe gāvī ādi vyavahāriṇaḥ śākaṭikāḥ śiṣṭāḥ tad prayoga mūlam gavādi śabda saṃkāra kāri vyākaraṇam iti vyāhatam iva lakṣyate

original: tṛtīye tu pakṣe gogāvyādiśabdaprayogasāṃkāryāt kiṃ phalaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tṛtīye tu pakṣe go gāvī ādi śabda prayoga sāṃkāryāt kim phalam vyākaraṇam bhavet

original: vaidyasmṛtes tu yuktam anvayavyatirekamūlatvaṃ tathā darśanād iti /
analyzed: vaidya smṛteḥ tu yuktam anvaya vyatireka mūla tvam tathā darśanāt iti

original: tad anayāpi diśā na prayojanavattām upayāti vyākaraṇam //
analyzed: tat anayā api diśā na prayojanavat tām upayāti vyākaraṇam

original: ataś ca niṣprayojanaṃ vyākaraṇam tatsūtrakṛtā svayaṃ prayojanasyānuktatvāt /
analyzed: atas ca niṣprayojanam vyākaraṇam tad sūtrakṛtā svayam prayojanasya anukta tvāt

original: na hi [athāto dharmajijñāsā] [pramāṇādijñānāt sādharmyādijñānād vā niḥśreyasādhigamaḥ itivat tatra sūtrakāraḥ prayojanaṃ pratyapīpadat //
analyzed: na hi atha atas dharma jijñāsā pramāṇa ādi jñānāt sādharmya ādi jñānāt vā niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ iti vat tatra sūtrakāraḥ prayojanam pratyapīpadat

original: sujñānatvān na pratyapādayad iti cet kim ucyate sujñānatvam yad adyāpi nipuṇam anveṣamāṇā api na vidmaḥ yatra cādyāpi sarve vivadante //
analyzed: su jñāna tvāt na pratyapādayat iti ced kim ucyate su jñāna tvam yat adya api nipuṇam anveṣamāṇāḥ api na vidmaḥ yatra ca adya api sarve vivadante

original: kiṃ ca dharmārthakāmamokṣāś catvāraḥ puruṣārthāḥ /
analyzed: kim ca dharma artha kāma mokṣāḥ catvāraḥ puruṣa arthāḥ

original: teṣam anyataṃaḥ kila vyākaraṇasya prayojanam āśaṅkyeta //
analyzed: teṣam anyataṃaḥ kila vyākaraṇasya prayojanam āśaṅkyeta

original: tatra na tāvad dharmas tasya prayojanam /
analyzed: tatra na tāvat dharmaḥ tasya prayojanam

original: sa hi yāgadānahomādisvabhāvaḥ tajjanitasaṃskārāpūrvarūpo vā vedād evāvagamyate /
analyzed: sa hi yāga dāna homa ādi svabhāvaḥ tad janita saṃskāra apūrva rūpaḥ vā vedāt eva avagamyate

original: codanaiva dharme pramāṇam iti hi tad vidaḥ /
analyzed: codanā eva dharme pramāṇam iti hi tat vidaḥ

original: conanāmūlamanvādismṛtisadācārapurāṇetihāsagamyo vā sa kāmaṃ bhavatu /
analyzed: vā sa kāmam bhavatu

original: vyākaraṇasya tu svatas tadupadeśasāmarthyasaṃbhavāt aṅgasamākhyātatvāc ca na tatprayojanatā yuktā //
analyzed: vyākaraṇasya tu svatas tad upadeśa sāmarthya saṃbhavāt aṅga samākhyāta tvāt ca na tad prayojana tā yuktā

original: prayoganiyamadvārakas tu dharmaḥ tasyāprayojanatayā nirasta eva //
analyzed: prayoga niyama dvārakaḥ tu dharmaḥ tasya aprayojana tayā nirastaḥ eva

original: arthaprayojanatā tu vartādaṇḍanītyoḥ prasiddhā na vyākaraṇasya /
analyzed: artha prayojana tā tu vartā daṇḍanītyoḥ prasiddhā na vyākaraṇasya

original: adhītavyākaraṇāḥ api daidrāḥ prāyaśau dṛśyante iti na tasya arthaḥ prayojanam //
analyzed: adhītavyākaraṇāḥ api daidrāḥ prāyaśau dṛśyante iti na tasya arthaḥ prayojanam

original: kāmas tu vātsyāyanapraṇītakāmaśāstraprayojanatām upagataḥ na vyākaraṇasādhyatāṃ spṛśati //
analyzed: kāmaḥ tu vātsyāyana praṇīta kāmaśāstra prayojana tām upagataḥ na vyākaraṇa sādhya tām spṛśati

original: mokṣe tu dvāram ātmādiparijñānam ācakṣate kleśaprahāṇaṃ cādhyātmavidaḥ /
analyzed: mokṣe tu dvāram ātma ādi parijñānam ācakṣate kleśa prahāṇam ca adhyātma vidaḥ

original: ṣatvaṇatvaparijñānaṃ punar apavargasādhanam iti na sādhīyān vādaḥ /
analyzed: ṣatva ṇatva parijñānam punar apavarga sādhanam iti na sādhīyān vādaḥ

original: tad evaṃ dharmādicaturvargād eko 'pi na vyākaraṇasādhya iti sthitam //
analyzed: tat evam dharma ādi catur vargāt ekaḥ na vyākaraṇa sādhyaḥ iti sthitam

original: athocyate sakalapuruṣārthasārthasādhanopadeśavidheḥ vedasya vyākaraṇam avalagnakam aṅgam /
analyzed: atha ucyate sakala puruṣa artha sārtha sādhana upadeśa vidheḥ vedasya vyākaraṇam avalagnakam aṅgam

original: atas tatprayojanenaiva prayojanavad idam iti na pṛthak prayojanāntaram ākāṃkṣatīti tadd api parihṛtam yayā hi sādhuśabdetaropadeśadiśā tasya tadaṅgatā sā vyudasyaiva /
analyzed: atas tad prayojanena eva prayojana vat idam iti na pṛthak prayojana antaram ākāṃkṣati iti tat api parihṛtam yayā hi sādhu śabda itara upadeśa diśā tasya tad aṅga tā sā vyudasya eva

original: na cāṅgasyāpi satas tasya tatsevādvāram aparam astīti naṣprayojanyam eva /
analyzed: na ca aṅgasya api sataḥ tasya tad sevā dvāram aparam asti iti naṣprayojanyam eva

original: na cedṛśam anupakārakam apy aṅgaṃ bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: na ca īdṛśam anupakārakam api aṅgam bhavitum arhati

original: na hi tata pradhānenāṅgīkriyate /
analyzed: na hi pradhānena aṅgīkriyate

original: niyogagarbho hi viniyoga iti nyāyavidaḥ //
analyzed: niyoga garbhaḥ hi viniyogaḥ iti nyāya vidaḥ

original: yāny api rakṣādīni prayojanāni vyākaraṇasya vyākhyātṛbhir abhihitāni teṣām anyato 'pi siddheḥ na vyākaraṇaśaraṇatā muktā //
analyzed: yāni api rakṣā ādīni prayojanāni vyākaraṇasya vyākhyātṛbhiḥ abhihitāni teṣām anyatas siddheḥ na vyākaraṇa śaraṇa tā muktā

original: rakṣā tāvad adhyetṛparamparāta eva siddhā /
analyzed: rakṣā tāvat adhyetṛ paramparātaḥ eva siddhā

original: manāg api svarato varṇato vā pramādyantaṃ kacid adhīyānaṃ anye 'dhyetāraḥ [mā vinīnaśaḥ śrutim ittham uccāraya] ity ācakṣāṇāḥ śikṣayantīti rakṣito bhavati vedaḥ //
analyzed: manāk api svarataḥ varṇataḥ vā pramādyantam kacid adhīyānam anye dhyetāraḥ mā vinīnaśaḥ śrutim ittham uccāraya iti ācakṣāṇāḥ śikṣayanti iti rakṣitaḥ bhavati vedaḥ

original: ūhas tu trividhaḥ mantrasāmasaṃskāraviṣāyaḥ /
analyzed: ūhaḥ tu trividhaḥ mantra sāma saṃskāra viṣāyaḥ

original: tatra sāmaviṣayaḥ ūhaḥkaśāstrād avagamyate yājñikaprayogapravāhād vā /
analyzed: tatra sāma viṣayaḥ ūhaḥka śāstrāt avagamyate yājñika prayoga pravāhāt vā

original: mantraviṣayo 'py evam /
analyzed: mantra viṣayaḥ pi evam

original: prokṣaṇādisaṃskāraviṣaye tu tasmin vyākaraṇam api kiṃ kuryāt āgamas tv anantaram eva parīkṣitaḥ /
analyzed: prokṣaṇa ādi saṃskāra viṣaye tu tasmin vyākaraṇam api kim kuryāt āgamaḥ tu anantaram eva parīkṣitaḥ

original: āgamagamyaṃ ca prayojanaṃ bhavati na cāgama eva prayojanam //
analyzed: āgama gamyam ca prayojanam bhavati na ca āgamaḥ eva prayojanam

original: lāghavaṃ tu kim ucyate vālyāt prabhṛti bahuṣu vahatsv api vatsareṣu yan nādhigantuṃ śakyate vyākaraṇam sa cel laghur upāyaḥ ko 'nyas tato gurur bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: lāghavam tu kim ucyate vālyāt prabhṛti bahuṣu vahatsu api vatsareṣu yat na adhigantum śakyate vyākaraṇam sa ced laghuḥ upāyaḥ kaḥ nyaḥ tatas guruḥ bhaviṣyati

original: sandeho 'pi na kaścid vedārthe vyākaraṇena parāṇudyate /
analyzed: sandehaḥ pi na kaścid veda arthe vyākaraṇena parāṇudyate

original: prativākyam upaplavamānanānāvidhasandehasahasravisraṃsanaphalā mīmāṃsā hi dṛśyate na vyākaraṇam /
analyzed: prativākyam upaplavamāna nānāvidha sandeha sahasra visraṃsana phalā mīmāṃsā hi dṛśyate na vyākaraṇam

original: tena [rakṣohāgamaladhvasandehāḥ prayojanam] iti yad ucyate tan na sādhu vyāhṛtam //
analyzed: tena rakṣaḥ hā gamala dhva sandehāḥ prayojanam iti yat ucyate tat na sādhu vyāhṛtam

original: yāny api prayojanāntarāṇi bhūyāṃsi [te 'surā helayo helayaḥ] ity udāharaṇadiśā darśitāni tāny api tucchatvāt ānuṣaṅgikatvāc copekṣaṇīyāni /
analyzed: yāni api prayojana antarāṇi bhūyāṃsi te surāḥ helayaḥ helayaḥ iti udāharaṇa diśā darśitāni tāni api tuccha tvāt ānuṣaṅgika tvāt ca upekṣaṇīyāni

original: tad uktam [arthavat tvaṃ na cej jātaṃ mukhyair yasya prayojanaiḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam arthavat tvam na ced jātam mukhyaiḥ yasya prayojanaiḥ

original: tasyānuṣaṅgikeṣv āśā kuśakāśāvalambinī] iti //
analyzed: tasya ānuṣaṅgikeṣu āśā kuśa kāśa avalambinī iti

original: atha kathyate kiṃ prayojanāntaraparyeṣaṇayā śasdasaṃskāra eva vyākaraṇasya prayojanam iti tad api vyākhyeyam kaḥ śabdasya saṃskāraḥ tena vā ko 'rtha iti /
analyzed: atha kathyate kim prayojana antara paryeṣaṇayā śasda saṃskāraḥ eva vyākaraṇasya prayojanam iti tat api vyākhyeyam kaḥ śabdasya saṃskāraḥ tena vā kaḥ rthaḥ iti

original: na hi vrīhīṇām iva prokṣaṇam ājyasyevāvekṣaṇam agnīnām ivādhānaṃ śabdasya kaś cana vyākaraṇakāritaḥ saṃskāraḥ saṃbhavati //
analyzed: na hi vrīhīṇām iva prokṣaṇam ājyasya iva avekṣaṇam agnīnām iva ādhānam śabdasya kaḥ cana vyākaraṇa kāritaḥ saṃskāraḥ saṃbhavati

original: naiyāyikādipakṣe ca kṣaṇikāḥ varṇāḥ /
analyzed: naiyāyika ādi pakṣe ca kṣaṇikāḥ varṇāḥ

original: teṣām uccāritanaṣṭānāṃ kaḥ saṃskāraḥ śarāder iva na vegaḥ nātmana iva bhāvanā na śākhāder iva sthitasthāpaka iti //
analyzed: teṣām uccārita naṣṭānām kaḥ saṃskāraḥ śara ādeḥ iva na vegaḥ na ātmanaḥ iva bhāvanā na śākhā ādeḥ iva sthita sthāpakaḥ iti

original: varṇānāṃ nityatvapakṣe 'pi kṣaṇikābhivyaktikatvam aparihāryam /
analyzed: varṇānām nitya tva pakṣe kṣaṇika abhivyaktika tvam aparihāryam

original: atas teṣv api kaḥ saṃskāraḥ saṃskāraś ca varṇasya vā padasya vā vākyasya veti vikalpyamānaḥ na kasyacid vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyaḥ /
analyzed: atas teṣu api kaḥ saṃskāraḥ saṃskāraḥ ca varṇasya vā padasya vā vākyasya vā iti vikalpyamānaḥ na kasyacid vyavasthāpayitum śakyaḥ

original: vaiyākaraṇānānāṃ tu niravayavavākyavādināṃ padavarṇayoḥ saṃskāraḥ sutarām anālambanaḥ //
analyzed: vaiyākaraṇa ānānām tu niravayava vākya vādinām pada varṇayoḥ saṃskāraḥ sutarām anālambanaḥ

original: apoddhṛtyaiva vākyebhyaḥ prakṛtipratyayādikaṃ anyāny eva padāni saṃskariṣyanta iti cet na asatāṃ saṃskāryatvānupapatte /
analyzed: apoddhṛtya eva vākyebhyaḥ prakṛti pratyaya ādikam anyāni eva padāni saṃskariṣyante iti ced na asatām saṃskārya tva anupapatte

original: āha ca [vākyebhya eva parikalpanayā vibhajya saṃskartum icchati padāni mahāmatir yaḥ /
analyzed: āha ca vākyebhyaḥ eva parikalpanayā vibhajya saṃskartum icchati padāni mahāmatiḥ yaḥ

original: uddhṛtya saurabhavibhūṣitadṛśi kasmāt ākāśaśākhikusumāni na saṃskaroti] iti //
analyzed: uddhṛtya saurabha vibhūṣita dṛśi kasmāt ākāśa śākhi kusumāni na saṃskaroti iti

original: na ca śabdasaṃskārakartavyatopadeśī kaścid anāramyādhīto vā prakaraṇapaṭhito vā vidhir upalabhyate yam anurudhyamānāḥ śabdasyopayuktasya [cātvāle kṛṣṇaviśāṇaṃ prāsyati] itivat upyokṣyamāṇasya vā [vrīhīn prokṣati] itivat kaṃ cana saṃskāram anutiṣṭhema /
analyzed: na ca śabda saṃskāra kartavya tā upadeśī kaścid an āramya adhītaḥ vā prakaraṇa paṭhitaḥ vā vidhiḥ upalabhyate yam anurudhyamānāḥ śabdasya upayuktasya cātvāle kṛṣṇa viśāṇam prāsyati iti vat upya ukṣyamāṇasya vā vrīhīn prokṣati iti vat kam cana saṃskāram anutiṣṭhema

original: [svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ] iti tu vidhiḥ abhimukhīkaraṇena māṇavakasya vā granthasya vā saṃskāram upadiśatīti mahatī carcaiṣā tiṣṭhatu /
analyzed: svādhyāyaḥ dhyetavyaḥ iti tu vidhiḥ abhimukhīkaraṇena māṇavakasya vā granthasya vā saṃskāram upadiśati iti mahatī carcā eṣā tiṣṭhatu

original: sarvathā nāyaṃ vyākaraṇanivartyapratyayāgamavarṇalopādeśādidvārakaśabdasaṃskāropadeśaśaṅkām api janayatīty āstām etat //
analyzed: sarvathā na ayam vyākaraṇa nivartya pratyaya āgama varṇa lopa ādeśa ādi dvāraka śabda saṃskāra upadeśa śaṅkām api janayati iti āstām etat

original: na ca śabdaprayogopāyasya sthānakaraṇādeḥ koṣṭhasya mātariśvano vā śrotrendriyasya vā tadupalabdhikāraṇasya prayoktur ātmano vā buddher vā kaścit vyākaraṇena saṃkāraleśaḥ śakyakriya iti tadvārake 'pi saṃskāre 'nupāya eva vyākaraṇam //
analyzed: na ca śabda prayoga upāyasya sthāna karaṇa ādeḥ koṣṭhasya mātariśvanaḥ vā śrotra indriyasya vā tad upalabdhi kāraṇasya prayoktuḥ ātmanaḥ vā buddheḥ vā kaścid vyākaraṇena saṃkāra leśaḥ śakya kriyaḥ iti tad vārake saṃskāre eva vyākaraṇam

original: na ca sthūlapṛṣatītyādikatipayaśabdavyutpādanam eva vyākaraṇaprayojanatayā vaktavyam tasyāpi kalpasūtrādyupāyāntaralabhyatvāt //
analyzed: na ca sthūla pṛṣatī ityādi katipaya śabda vyutpādanam eva vyākaraṇa prayojana tayā vaktavyam tasya api kalpasūtra ādi upāya antara labhya tvāt

original: yaś cāha [tattvāvabodhaḥ śabdānāṃ nāsti vyākaraṇād ṛte] iti tasya sopahāsam uttaraṃ vārtikakāra eva darśitavān //
analyzed: yaḥ ca āha tattva avabodhaḥ śabdānām na asti vyākaraṇāt ṛte iti tasya sa upahāsam uttaram vārtikakāraḥ eva darśitavān

original: [tattvāvabodhaḥ śabdānāṃ nāsti śrotrendriyād ṛte] iti //
analyzed: tattva avabodhaḥ śabdānām na asti śrotra indriyāt ṛte iti

original: api ca vyākaraṇena kṛte 'pi śabdasaṃskāre tadupadiṣṭa saṃskārabahiṣkṛtaśabdaprayogān vidadhataḥ tatra tatra pūrve 'pi dṛśyante /
analyzed: api ca vyākaraṇena kṛte pi śabda saṃskāre tad upadiṣṭa saṃskāra bahiṣkṛta śabda prayogān vidadhataḥ tatra tatra pūrve dṛśyante

original: sūtrakāras tāvat [janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ] [tatprayojako hetuś ca] iti [tṛjakābhyāṃ kartari] iti pratiṣiddhaṃ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaṃ tathā [janikartuḥ] iti dhātunirdeśaikaviṣayaṃ janiśabdaṃ arthanirdeśe 'pi prayuktavān //
analyzed: sūtrakāraḥ tāvat jani kartuḥ prakṛtiḥ tad prayojakaḥ hetuḥ ca iti tṛc akābhyām kartari iti pratiṣiddham ṣaṣṭhī samāsam tathā jani kartuḥ iti dhātu nirdeśa eka viṣayam jani śabdam artha nirdeśe pi prayuktavān

original: vārtikakāro 'pi [dambher halgṛhaṇasya jātivācakatvat siddham] iti tathaiva prayuktavān /
analyzed: vārtikakāraḥ u pi dambheḥ ha l gṛhaṇasya jāti vācaka tvat siddham iti tathā eva prayuktavān

original: [anyabhāvyaṃ tu kālaśabdavyavāyāt] iti ca kleśena samāsasaṃjñayā guṇavacanasaṃjñābādhitatvāt aguṇavacanatvāt brāhmaṇādigaṇapaṭhitatvāt [guṇavacanabrāhmaṇādibhyaḥ] ity aprāptam eva ṣyañaṃ kṛtavān //
analyzed: anya bhāvyam tu kāla śabda vyavāyāt iti ca kleśena samāsa saṃjñayā guṇavacana saṃjñā bādhita tvāt aguṇa vacana tvāt brāhmaṇa ādi gaṇa paṭhita tvāt guṇavacana brāhmaṇa ādibhyaḥ iti aprāptam eva kṛtavān

original: bhāṣyakāro 'pi [aviravikanyāyena] iti dvandvagarbhe tatpuruṣe prayuyukṣite [supo dhātuprātipadikayoḥ] iti prāptam api lopaṃ na kṛtavān /
analyzed: bhāṣyakāraḥ pi aviravika nyāyena iti dvandva garbhe tatpuruṣe prayuyukṣite supaḥ dhātu prātipadikayoḥ iti prāptam api lopam na kṛtavān

original: anyathā kṛtvā codyaṃ antyathā kṛtvā parihāra iti cātra cānyathaivaṃ kathaṃ prāptam api ṇamulam upekṣya ttkāpratyayaṃ prāyuṅkta //
analyzed: anyathā kṛtvā codyam antyathā kṛtvā parihāraḥ iti ca atra ca anyathā evam katham prāptam api ṇamulam upekṣya prāyuṅkta

original: tad idaṃ trimunivyākaraṇasya trayo 'pi ca munayaḥ skhalantīti kam upalabhemahi manvādigrantheṣv api kiyanto 'paśabdā gaṇyante [jñātāras santi me] iti manunā [akṣiṇī ājya] ity āśvalāyanena [mūrdhanyābhijighraṇaṃ] iti gṛhyakāreṇa tadanantaraṃ [tubhyaṃ ca rāghavasya] iti vālmīkinā [janme janme yad abhyastam] iti dvaipāyanena prayuktam /
analyzed: tat idam tri muni vyākaraṇasya ca munayaḥ skhalanti iti kam upalabhemahi manu ādi grantheṣu api kiyantaḥ upa śabdāḥ gaṇyante jñātāraḥ santi me iti manunā akṣiṇī ājyaḥ iti āśvalāyanena mūrdhanya abhijighraṇam iti gṛhyakāreṇa tad anantaram tubhyam ca rāghavasya iti vālmīkinā janme janme yat abhyastam iti dvaipāyanena prayuktam

original: āha ca [anto nāsty apaśabdānām itihāsapurāṇayoḥ] iti //
analyzed: āha ca antaḥ na asti apaśabdānām itihāsa purāṇayoḥ iti

original: atha vā kim anena purāṇapuruṣaparivādena /
analyzed: atha vā kim anena purāṇapuruṣa parivādena

original: sarvathā 'yaṃ vastusaṃkṣepaḥ kṣāmo 'pi kaścid upayogo na loke vede vā vyākaraṇasya vidyata iti //
analyzed: sarvathā yam vastu saṃkṣepaḥ kaścid upayogaḥ na loke vede vā vyākaraṇasya vidyate iti

original: kiṃ cānyat [atha śabdānuśāsanam] ity upakramya [keṣāṃ śabdanām] iti pṛṣṭvā [laukikānāṃ vedikānāṃ ca] iti pratijñāya na laukikās sarve vyākartuṃ pāritāḥ śabdāḥ /
analyzed: kim ca anyat atha śabda anuśāsanam iti upakramya keṣām śabdanām iti pṛṣṭvā laukikānām vedikānām ca iti pratijñāya na laukikāḥ sarve vyākartum pāritāḥ śabdāḥ

original: nāpi vaidikāḥ /
analyzed: na api vaidikāḥ

original: tathā hi teṣāṃ vyākriyā pratipadaṃ vā vidhīyate lakṣaṇato vā pratipadaṃ tāvad anuśāsanam aghaṭamānaṃ ānantyāc chabdānām /
analyzed: tathā hi teṣām vyākriyā pratipadam vā vidhīyate lakṣaṇataḥ vā pratipadam tāvat anuśāsanam a ghaṭamānam ānantyāt śabdānām

original: tathā cāhuḥ [bṛhaspatir indrāya divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ pratipadaṃ vihitān śabdān provāca na cāntaṃ jagāma] iti //
analyzed: tathā ca āhuḥ bṛhaspatiḥ indrāya divyam varṣa sahasram pratipadam vihitān śabdān provāca na ca antam jagāma iti

original: nāpi lakṣaṇataḥ tadasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: nā api lakṣaṇataḥ tad asaṃbhavāt

original: na hi sakalasādhuśabdavargānugataṃ apaśabdebhyaś ca vyāvṛttaṃ gotvādivad iha kiṃ cil lakṣaṇam astīty uktam //
analyzed: na hi sakala sādhu śabda varga anugatam apaśabdebhyaḥ ca vyāvṛttam go tva ādi vat iha kim cit lakṣaṇam asti iti uktam

original: tatraitat syāta na jātyādirūpam iha lakṣaṇam abhidhitsitam /
analyzed: tatra etat syāta na jāti ādi rūpam iha lakṣaṇam abhidhitsitam

original: api tu katham anuśāsanam iti praśnapūrvakam uktaṃ prakṛtyādivibhāgakalpanayā sāmānyaviśeṣatatā lakṣeṇeti ca /
analyzed: api tu katham anuśāsanam iti praśna pūrvakam uktam prakṛti ādi vibhāga kalpanayā sāmānya viśeṣa tatā lakṣeṇa iti ca

original: tathā hi [karmaṇy aṇ] iti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ karmaṇy upapade dhātumātrād aṇpratyayo bhavatīti /
analyzed: tathā hi karmaṇi aṇ iti sāmānya lakṣaṇam karmaṇi upapade dhātu mātrāt aṇ pratyayaḥ bhavati iti

original: [āto 'nupasarge kaḥ] iti viśeṣalakṣaṇam ākārāntād dhātoḥ upasargarahitāt karmaṇy upapade kapratyayo bhavatīti /
analyzed: ā taḥ n upasarge kaḥ iti viśeṣa lakṣaṇam ākāra antāt dhātoḥ upasarga rahitāt karmaṇi upapade kapratyayaḥ bhavati iti

original: tenānena samānyaviśeṣavatā lakṣaṇena kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ ityādayaḥ godaḥ kambalada ityādayo bhūyāṃsaḥ śabdāḥ akleśenaiva vyākariṣyanta ity ucyate prakṛtyādivibhāgakalpanayety atra yad vaktavyaṃ tat prāg eva savistaram abhihitam /
analyzed: tena anena samānya viśeṣavatā lakṣaṇena kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ ityādayaḥ godaḥ kambaladaḥ ityādayaḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ śabdāḥ akleśena eva vyākariṣyantaḥ iti ucyate prakṛti ādi vibhāga kalpanayā iti atra yat vaktavyam tat prāk eva sa vistaram abhihitam

original: sāmānyaviśeṣavatā lakṣaṇeteti tu saṃpratinirūpyate /
analyzed: sāmānya viśeṣavatā tu saṃpratinirūpyate

original: tad api vyavasthitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na dṛśyate tathā hi dhātoḥ pare pratyayā bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ kurvatā vaktavayam kaḥ punar ayaṃ dhātur nāmeti //
analyzed: tat api vyavasthitam lakṣaṇam na dṛśyate tathā hi dhātoḥ pare pratyayāḥ bhavanti iti lakṣaṇam kurvatā vaktavayam kaḥ punar ayam dhātuḥ nāma iti

original: nanu [bhuvādayo dhātavaḥ] ity uktam eva tatsvarūpaṃ kecana śabdāḥ kayācit paripāṭyā paṭhitāḥ te dhātusaṃjñayā lakṣyante /
analyzed: nanu bhuva ādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti uktam eva tad svarūpam kecana śabdāḥ kayācid paripāṭyā paṭhitāḥ te dhātu saṃjñayā lakṣyante

original: tebhyaḥ pare tiṅaḥ kṛtaś ca pratyayā bhavantīti satyam uktam etat kin tu evaṃ pāṭhe kṛte 'pi na dhātusvarūpanirṇaya upavarṇito bhavati /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ pare tiṅaḥ kṛtaḥ ca pratyayāḥ bhavanti iti satyam uktam etat kim tu evam pāṭhe kṛte na dhātu svarūpa nirṇayaḥ upavarṇitaḥ bhavati

original: tathā ca gaṇḍatīty api prāpnoti dhātos tiṅpratyayavidhānāt /
analyzed: tathā ca gaṇḍati iti api prāpnoti dhātoḥ tiṅ pratyaya vidhānāt

original: [ghaṭa ceṣṭāyāṃ] iti dhātuḥ asti ca ghaṭa iti prātipadikam /
analyzed: ghaṭa ceṣṭāyām iti dhātuḥ asti ca ghaṭa iti prātipadikam

original: [amo roge] iti dhātuḥ anubandhatyāgāt [am] iti bhavati asti ca dvitīyāvibhakter ekavacanam iti /
analyzed: amaḥ roge iti dhātuḥ anubandha tyāgāt am iti bhavati asti ca dvitīyā vibhakteḥ ekavacanam iti

original: bhū śabdo dhātuḥ asti ca bhūprātipadikam /
analyzed: bhū śabdaḥ dhātuḥ asti ca bhū prātipadikam

original: [yatī prayatne] iti luptānubandhaḥ [yata] iti dhātuḥ asti ca [yat] iti sarvanāma /
analyzed: prayatne iti lupta anubandhaḥ yata iti dhātuḥ asti ca yat iti sarvanāma

original: tatra ca pāṭhaprasiddharūpamātrāviśeṣāt adhātor api gaṭhabhūyacchabdarūpāt pare tiṅpratyayā bhaveyuḥ //
analyzed: tatra ca pāṭha prasiddha rūpa mātrā viśeṣāt a dhātoḥ api gaṭha bhūyat śabda rūpāt pare tiṅ pratyayāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: kriyāvacano dhātur iti cet [bhavati] [tiṣṭhati] ityevamādīnām adhātutvaṃ prāpnoti gaṇḍeś cānarthakaḥ pāṭhaḥ //
analyzed: kriyā vacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti ced bhavati tiṣṭhati iti evamādīnām a dhātu tvam prāpnoti gaṇḍeḥ ca anarthakaḥ pāṭhaḥ

original: ubhayaṃ tarhi dhātulakṣaṇaṃ pāṭhaḥ kriyāvacanatā ceti na bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: ubhayam tarhi dhātu lakṣaṇam pāṭhaḥ kriyā vacana tā ca iti na bhavitum arhati

original: tad api hi vyastaṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ samastaṃ vā vyavastapakṣe pratyekam abhihite doṣas tadavastha eva /
analyzed: tat api hi vyastam vā lakṣaṇam samastam vā vyavasta pakṣe pratyekam abhihite doṣaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva

original: samastapakṣe 'pi bhavaty ādau kriyāvacanatvasya dvitīyatvāt kutaḥ pare tiṅaś ca kṛtaś ca pratyayā utpadyeran //
analyzed: samasta pakṣe bhavati ādau kriyā vacana tvasya dvitīya tvāt kutas pare tiṅaḥ ca kṛtaḥ ca pratyayāḥ utpadyeran

original: kiṃ ca kecana tiṅpratyayāḥ kālādyupādhayaḥ na tadvacanāḥ /
analyzed: kim ca kecana tiṅ pratyayāḥ kāla ādi upādhayaḥ na tad vacanāḥ

original: anukteṣu ca kālādiṣu tatpūrvakaṃ vartamāne laṭ bhaviṣyati ¬ṭ bhūte luṅ iti niyamanirūpaṇam aśakyam //
analyzed: anukteṣu ca kāla ādiṣu tad pūrvakam vartamāne laṭ bhaviṣyati bhūte luṅ iti niyama nirūpaṇam aśakyam

original: ucyatāṃ tarhi tiṅbhiḥ kālādaya iti cet na bhāṣyavirodhāt /
analyzed: ucyatām tarhi tiṅbhiḥ kāla ādayaḥ iti ced na bhāṣya virodhāt

original: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa [bhūte dhātvartha] iti /
analyzed: uktam hi bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa bhūte dhātvarthaḥ iti

original: na ca dhātvarthenaiva dhātvartho vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyate /
analyzed: na ca dhātvarthena eva dhātvarthaḥ vyavasthāpayitum śakyate

original: liṅādayaś ca sutarām anadhigamyamānaviṣayāḥ /
analyzed: liṅ ādayaḥ ca sutarām anadhigamyamāna viṣayāḥ

original: te hi vidhyādāv arthe vidhīyante /
analyzed: te hi vidhi ādau arthe vidhīyante

original: sa ca vidhirūpo 'rthaḥ svarūpataś ca upādhitaś ca na śakyo nirṇetum iti //
analyzed: sa ca vidhi rūpaḥ rthaḥ svarūpataḥ ca upādhitaḥ ca na śakyaḥ nirṇetum iti

original: tathā kārakānuśāsanam api duśtham /
analyzed: tathā kāraka anuśāsanam api

original: [dhruvam apāye apādānam] ity ucyate /
analyzed: dhruvam apāye apādānam iti ucyate

original: tatra dhruvasya vṛkṣādeḥ vṛkṣāt patito devadattaḥ iti patanakriyāyāṃ acalataḥ kṛśam api na kārakatvam utpaśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: tatra dhruvasya vṛkṣa ādeḥ vṛkṣāt patitaḥ devadattaḥ iti patana kriyāyām acalataḥ kṛśam api na kāraka tvam utpaśyāmaḥ

original: kriyāyogi hi kārakam /
analyzed: kriyā yogi hi kārakam

original: sā ca vṛkṣe nopalabhyata iti //
analyzed: sā ca vṛkṣe na upalabhyate iti

original: [sārthād dhīnaḥ] [rathāt patitaḥ] iti sārtharathayoḥ kriyopalabhyate na vṛkṣavan niścalatvam iti cet satyam svarasapravṛttā tayor asti kriyā /
analyzed: sārthāt dhīnaḥ rathāt patitaḥ iti sārtha rathayoḥ kriyā upalabhyate na vṛkṣa vat niścala tvam iti ced satyam sva rasa pravṛttā tayoḥ asti kriyā

original: hāne yāne ca pādapanirviśeṣāv eva sārtharathau /na ca yad ekasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ kārakaṃ tat sarvāsu kriyāsu kārakaṃ bhavati atiprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: hāne yāne ca pādapa nirviśeṣau eva sārtha rathau na ca yat ekasyām kriyāyām kārakam tat sarvāsu kriyāsu kārakam bhavati atiprasaṅgāt

original: [karmaṇā yam abhipraiti sa saṃpradānam] ity atra karmaśabdaḥ kriyāvacano vā syāt īpsitatamakārakavācī vā ādye pakṣe kriyayā sarvakārakāṇy abhipreyanta iti kriyāsu kārakāṇi saṃpradānatāṃ pratipadyeran /
analyzed: karmaṇā yam abhipraiti sa saṃpradānam iti atra karma śabdaḥ kriyā vacanaḥ vā syāt īpsitatama kāraka vācī vā ādye pakṣe kriyayā sarva kārakāṇi abhipreyante iti kriyāsu kārakāṇi saṃpradāna tām pratipadyeran

original: na copāsyāt /
analyzed: na ca upāsyāt

original: pratigrahas tu kriyāntaram eva /
analyzed: pratigrahaḥ tu kriyā antaram eva

original: tatra coktaṃ kriyayā cābhipreyamāṇaṃ phalaṃ bhavati na kārakam iti vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: tatra ca uktam kriyayā ca abhipreyamāṇam phalam bhavati na kārakam iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: dvitīyas tu pakṣaḥ karmaṇā kārakeṇa gavādinā yam abhipraitīti sutarāṃ saṃkaṭaḥ /
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ tu pakṣaḥ karmaṇā kārakeṇa gavādinā yam abhipraiti iti sutarām saṃkaṭaḥ

original: kriyāsaṃbandhitayā hi kārakaṃ kārakaṃ bhavati na kārakasaṃbandhitayā karotīti kārakam iti vyutpatteḥ //
analyzed: kriyā saṃbandhi tayā hi kārakam kārakam bhavati na kāraka saṃbandhi tayā karoti iti kārakam iti vyutpatteḥ

original: [sādhakatamaṃ karaṇam] iti tamabarthānavadhāraṇāt anupapannam /
analyzed: sādhakatamam karaṇam iti tamap artha anavadhāraṇāt anupapannam

original: anekakārakasaṃdarbhasannidhāne kāryam ātmānaṃ labhate /
analyzed: aneka kāraka saṃdarbha sannidhāne kāryam ātmānam labhate

original: teṣām anyatamavyapagame 'pi na labhyata iti tataḥ kim iva kārakam atiśayakhacitavapur iti yaṃ tam arthaṃ maṅgalakalaśenābhiṣiṃcāmaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām anyatama vyapagame na labhyate iti tatas kim iva kārakam atiśaya khacita vapuḥ iti yam tam artham maṅgala kalaśena abhiṣiṃcāmaḥ

original: prācuryeṇa hi pradhānasaṃpattiparyantavyāpārayogitvam ityādi sarvasādhāraṇaṃ na kāṣṭhaikaniṣṭham iti [kāṣṭhaiḥ pacati] iti kathaṃ teṣām eva karaṇatvam [ādhāro 'dhikaraṇam] iti yad ucyate tatra vaktavyam /
analyzed: prācuryeṇa hi pradhāna saṃpatti paryanta vyāpāra yogi tvam ityādi sarva sādhāraṇam na kāṣṭha eka niṣṭham iti kāṣṭhaiḥ pacati iti katham teṣām eva karaṇa tvam ādhāraḥ dhikaraṇam iti yat ucyate tatra vaktavyam

original: kasyādhāra iti kriyāyāḥ kāraksya vā yadi kriyādhāratvaṃ adhikaraṇalakṣaṇam aśeṣakārakāṇām adhikaraṇasaṃñā prasajyeta kriyāyogāviśeṣāt //
analyzed: kasya ādhāraḥ iti kriyāyāḥ kāraksya vā yadi kriyā ādhāra tvam adhikaraṇa lakṣaṇam aśeṣa kārakāṇām adhikaraṇa saṃñā prasajyeta kriyā yoga aviśeṣāt

original: atha yatra sthālyādau karmāśritaṃ taṇḍulādi tadadhikaraṇam [same deśe pacati] iti na syāt [apsu pacati] iti syat /
analyzed: atha yatra sthālī ādau karma āśritam taṇḍula ādi tat adhikaraṇam same deśe pacati iti na syāt apsu pacati iti syat

original: [kaṭe sthito bhuṅkte] iti cāpabhraṃśo bhavet /
analyzed: kaṭe sthitaḥ bhuṅkte iti ca apabhraṃśaḥ bhavet

original: kartur hi tat adhikaraṇaṃ na karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: kartuḥ hi tat adhikaraṇam na karmaṇaḥ

original: kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kriyāśrayayoḥ dhāraṇam adhikaraṇatvena kārakam iti cet ubhayadhāratvaṃ na kaṭasya na sthālyā iti dvayor apy adhikaraṇatā hīyeta /
analyzed: kartṛ karmaṇoḥ kriyā āśrayayoḥ dhāraṇam adhikaraṇa tvena kārakam iti ced ubhaya dhāra tvam na kaṭasya na sthālyāḥ iti dvayoḥ api adhikaraṇa tā hīyeta

original: ekaikādhāratve tu tallaksaṇe parasparāpekṣayā punas tatsvarūpasāṃkaryaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: ekaika ādhāra tve tu paraspara apekṣayā punar tad svarūpa sāṃkaryam bhavet

original: yadi tu sakalakārakādhāratvaṃ adhikaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ [sthālyāṃ odanaṃ pacati] iti na syāt sakalakārakānadhikaraṇatvāt /
analyzed: yadi tu sakala kāraka ādhāra tvam adhikaraṇa lakṣaṇam sthālyām odanam pacati iti na syāt sakala kāraka anadhikaraṇa tvāt

original: sthālyā adhikaraṇasya cākārakatvaprasaktiḥ /
analyzed: sthālyāḥ adhikaraṇasya ca ākāraka tva prasaktiḥ

original: na hy adhikaraṇam adhikaraṇāśritaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na hi adhikaraṇam adhikaraṇa āśritam bhavati

original: [madhyāhne snāti] [rātrāv aśnāti] [pūrvasyāṃ diśi viharati] iti kālādīnām avyāpāratvāt akārakatvam eva bhavet /
analyzed: madhyāhne snāti rātrau aśnāti pūrvasyām diśi viharati iti kāla ādīnām avyāpāra tvāt akāraka tvam eva bhavet

original: tathā ca sati ete prayogā asādhavaḥ syuḥ //
analyzed: tathā ca sati ete prayogāḥ asādhavaḥ syuḥ

original: [kartur īpsitatamaṃ karma] iti sādhakatamavad ihāpi na vācako 'yam atiśāyanaḥ sarvakārakāṇāṃ kriyārthitayā kartur īpsitatamatvāt //
analyzed: kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti sādhakatama vat iha api na vācakaḥ yam atiśāyanaḥ sarva kārakāṇām kriyā arthi tayā kartuḥ īpsitatama tvāt

original: atha yadarthā kriyā tadarthaṃ kartur īpsitatamaṃ tadarthaṃ tv anyat iti tatra tamappratyaya ity ucyate tarhi tasya kārakatvam eva na yuktam /
analyzed: atha yad arthā kriyā tad artham kartuḥ īpsitatamam tad artham tu anyat iti tatra tamap pratyayaḥ iti ucyate tarhi tasya kāraka tvam eva na yuktam

original: kriyāsaṃpādakaṃ hi kārakam ucyate na kriyāsaṃpādyam /
analyzed: kriyā saṃpādakam hi kārakam ucyate na kriyā saṃpādyam

original: kriyāsaṃpādyaṃ tu phalaṃ bhavati na kārakam /
analyzed: kriyā saṃpādyam tu phalam bhavati na kārakam

original: kārakaṃ ca kriyayā cāptum iṣṭatamaṃ iti ca vipratiṣiddham //
analyzed: kārakam ca kriyayā ca āptum iṣṭatamam iti ca vipratiṣiddham

original: athābhidhīyate kriyopayogayogyatānibandhano 'yaṃ kārakavyapadeśaḥ /
analyzed: atha abhidhīyate kriyā upayoga yogya tā nibandhanaḥ yam kāraka vyapadeśaḥ

original: sa ca vicitraḥ kriyopayogaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca vicitraḥ kriyā upayogaḥ

original: anyathā karaṇasya anyathā 'dhikaraṇasya anyathā saṃpradānādeḥ /
analyzed: anyathā karaṇasya anyathā dhikaraṇasya anyathā saṃpradāna ādeḥ

original: iha ca kriyāsādhyatve 'pi odanasya tatkriyopayogitvam anivāryam tam anuddiśya kriyāyāḥ pravṛttyabhāvāt itīttham anena rūpeṇa tasya kriyāsādhanatvāt kārakatvam iti naitad evam kārakatvavyapadeśo hi na pāribhāṣikaḥ kin tu kriyāsaṃbandhanibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: iha ca kriyā sādhya tve pi odanasya tad kriyā upayogi tvam anivāryam tam an uddiśya kriyāyāḥ pravṛtti abhāvāt iti ittham anena rūpeṇa tasya kriyā sādhana tvāt kāraka tvam iti na etat evam kāraka tva vyapadeśaḥ hi na pāribhāṣikaḥ kin tu kriyā saṃbandha nibandhanaḥ

original: kriyāsaṃbandhaś ca īdṛśaḥ yadupeyā kriyā tadupāyaḥ kārakam iti /
analyzed: kriyā saṃbandhaḥ ca īdṛśaḥ yad upeyā kriyā tad upāyaḥ kārakam iti

original: viparyaye tu kīdṛśaḥ kārakabhāvaḥ astu tarhi [taṇḍulān pacati] iti mā ca bhūt [odanaṃ pacati] iti odanasya phaladaśānupraveśād iti uktam atra taṇḍuleṣv api tamabartho na vācakaḥ teṣām api phalasādhanopayogāviśṣād iti //
analyzed: viparyaye tu kīdṛśaḥ kāraka bhāvaḥ astu tarhi taṇḍulān pacati iti mā ca bhūt odanam pacati iti odanasya phala daśā anupraveśāt iti uktam atra taṇḍuleṣu api tamap arthaḥ na vācakaḥ teṣām api iti

original: [svatantraḥ kartā] iti kim idaṃ svātantryaṃ kriyāsaṃpādyaṃ yadicchātaḥ pravartanam iti cet [kūlaṃ patati] iti caitanyaśūnyatayā kūlasyecchānupalambhāt akartṛtvaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: svatantraḥ kartā iti kim idam svātantryam kriyā saṃpādyam yat icchātaḥ pravartanam iti ced kūlam patati iti caitanya śūnyatayā kūlasya icchā anupalambhāt akartṛ tvam bhavet

original: atha yadvyāpārādhīnaḥ kārakāntaravyāpāraḥ sa kartety ucyate sarvakārakanirvartyatvāt kriyāyāḥ na vidmaḥ kiṃvyāpārādhīnaḥ kasya vyāpāra iti samagrakarakagrāmasya parasparopekṣatvāt //
analyzed: atha yad vyāpāra adhīnaḥ kāraka antara vyāpāraḥ sa kartā iti ucyate sarva kāraka nirvartya tvāt kriyāyāḥ na vidmaḥ kiṃvyāpāra adhīnaḥ kasya vyāpāraḥ iti samagra karaka grāmasya paraspara upekṣa tvāt

original: atha yaḥ kārakāntarāṇi prayuṅkte taiś ca na prayujyate sa karteti tarhi punar acetanānām akartṛtvaprasaṅgadoṣas tadavastha eva //
analyzed: atha yaḥ kāraka antarāṇi prayuṅkte taiḥ ca na prayujyate sa kartā iti tarhi punar acetanānām akartṛ tva prasaṅga doṣaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva

original: atha dhātunā 'bhidhīyamānavyāpāraḥ karteti tatrāpi na vidmaḥ kasya dhātumā 'bhihito vyāpāraḥ sakalakārakavācitvāt paceḥ /
analyzed: atha dhātunā bhidhīyamāna vyāpāraḥ kartā iti tatra api na vidmaḥ kasya vyāpāraḥ sakala kāraka vāci tvāt paceḥ

original: anyathā hi sakalavyāpārānabhidhāyini dhātau tadarthasādhane sarveṣāṃ saṅgatir eva na syāt /
analyzed: anyathā hi sakala vyāpāra an abhidhāyini dhātau tad artha sādhane sarveṣām saṅgatiḥ eva na syāt

original: tathā ca sati sarvakārakāṇi kartṛtvam eva spṛśeyuḥ //
analyzed: tathā ca sati sarva kārakāṇi kartṛ tvam eva spṛśeyuḥ

original: atha mataṃ aguṇato dhātunā 'bhidhīyamānavyāpāraḥ karteti tad api asatsakṛduccarito dhātuḥ anekasmin kārakacakre kasyacid guṇatvena kasyacit prādhāyena vyāpāraṃ katham iva kathayituṃ śakṣyatīti /
analyzed: atha matam aguṇataḥ dhātunā abhidhīyamāna vyāpāraḥ kartā iti tat api asat sakṛt uccaritaḥ dhātuḥ anekasmin kāraka cakre kasyacid guṇa tvena kasyacid prādhāyena vyāpāram katham iva kathayitum śakṣyati iti

original: [tatprayojako hetuś ca] iti prayojyenaiva vyākhyātam /
analyzed: tad prayojakaḥ hetuḥ ca iti prayojyena eva vyākhyātam

original: evaṃ kārakānuśāsanasyāvyavasthānāt tadadhīnaprasaktavibhaktividhānam api prayuktam [apādāne paṃcamī] [saptamyadhikaraṇe ca] ityādiviṣayanirūpaṇapūrvakatvāt tadvidhānsyeti //
analyzed: evam kāraka anuśāsanasya avyavasthānāt tad adhīna prasakta vibhakti vidhānam api prayuktam apādāne paṃcamī saptamī adhikaraṇe ca ityādi viṣaya nirūpaṇa pūrvaka tvāt

original: kiṃca yad api kṛttaddhitasamāsānuśāsanaṃ tat sāmarthyaniyamapūrvakam [samarthānāṃ prathamād vā] [samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ] iti paribhāṣaṇāt /
analyzed: kiṃca yat api kṛt taddhita samāsa anuśāsanam tat sāmarthya niyama pūrvakam samarthānām prathamāt vā samarthaḥ pada vidhiḥ iti paribhāṣaṇāt

original: tad atrāpi vaktavyam sāmarthyaṃ nāma kim ucyata iti /
analyzed: tat atra api vaktavyam sāmarthyam nāma kim ucyate iti

original: ekārthānviyitvam iti cet tat kuto 'vagamyate /
analyzed: iti ced tat kutas vagamyate

original: taddhitasamāsaprayogapratipattibhyām eveti cet tarhi tābhyāṃ sāmarthyāvagamaḥ sāmarthye sati tayoḥ pravṛtir itītaretarāśrayam //
analyzed: taddhita samāsa prayoga pratipattibhyām eva iti ced tarhi tābhyām sāmarthya avagamaḥ sāmarthye sati tayoḥ pravṛtiḥ iti itaretarāśrayam

original: api ca sāmarthyam antareṇāpi kvacit prayujate samāsam aśrāddhabhojī dadhighaṭaḥ gorathaḥ iti /
analyzed: api ca sāmarthyam antareṇa api kvacid prayujate samāsam aśrāddha bhojī dadhi ghaṭaḥ go rathaḥ iti

original: tathā saty api sāmarthye taddhitaprayogaṃ pariharanti aṅgulyā khanati vṛkṣamūlād āgata iti āṅgulikaḥ vārkṣamūla iti na vaktāro bhavantīti etad apy asamaṃjasam anuśāsanam //
analyzed: tathā sati api sāmarthye taddhita prayogam pariharanti aṅgulyā khanati vṛkṣa mūlāt āgataḥ iti āṅgulikaḥ vārkṣa mūlaḥ iti na vaktāraḥ bhavanti iti etat api asamaṃjasam anuśāsanam

original: tathā [arthavadadhātur apratyayaḥ prātipadikam] iti saṃjñālakṣaṇam ativyāpakam vākyasyāpi prātipadikasaṃjñāprasaṃgāt //
analyzed: tathā arthavat a dhātuḥ a pratyayaḥ prātipadikam iti saṃjñā lakṣaṇam ati vyāpakam vākyasya api prātipadika saṃjñā prasaṃgāt

original: atha [kṛttaddhitasamāsāś ca] iti sūtrāntare samāsagrahaṇam vidhiśeṣatvena varṇyamānaṃ taditarapratiṣedhaphalaṃ bhavatīti tato vākyanivṛttiḥ setsyati yady evaṃ [adhātur apratyayaḥ] iti na vaktavyam dhātupratyayayor api tata eva pratiṣedhasiddheḥ //
analyzed: atha kṛt taddhita samāsāḥ ca iti sūtra antare samāsa grahaṇam vidhi śeṣa tvena varṇyamānam tad itara pratiṣedha phalam bhavati iti tatas vākya nivṛttiḥ setsyati yadi evam a dhātuḥ a pratyayaḥ iti na vaktavyam dhātu pratyayayoḥ api tatas eva pratiṣedha siddheḥ

original: atha ekārthatayā samānaśīlasya vākyasyaiva pratiṣedhe prabhavati samāsagrahaṇaṃ na dhātupratyayayor iti tad api durāśāmātram vākyasamāsayor api vāvacanānarthakyakathanena pārthagarthyavyavasthāpanād iti //
analyzed: atha eka artha tayā samāna śīlasya vākyasya eva pratiṣedhe prabhavati samāsa grahaṇam na dhātu pratyayayoḥ iti tat api durāśā mātram vākya samāsayoḥ api vā avacana ānarthakya kathanena pārthagarthya vyavasthāpanāt iti

original: tad evaṃ prātipādikasaṃjñāviṣayasyāniścayāt tatprakṛtikānāṃ [ṅyāpprātipadikāt] ity adhikṛtya svādipratyayānāṃ vidhānam anupapannam ity alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: tat evam prātipādika saṃjñā viṣayasya aniścayāt tad prakṛtikānām ṅī āp prātipadikāt iti adhikṛtya su ādi pratyayānām vidhānam anupapannam iti alam prasaṅgena

original: yaś ca vyākhyāt•ṇāṃ uktānuktaduruktanirīkṣaṇaprayatnaḥ yaś ca vācakamātrā vārṇādhikyamiṣapuraśaralakṣaṇaparicodanaprakāraḥ yac cedaṃ vyākhyātṛvacanaṃ [iha na bhavaty anabhidhānāt] iti yac ca pade pade bahulavacanaṃ tat sarvaṃ sutarām apariśuddhim anuśāsanasya darśayatīti //
analyzed: yaḥ ca vyākhyātṇām ukta anukta durukta nirīkṣaṇa prayatnaḥ yaḥ ca vācaka mātrā vā arṇa ādhikya miṣa pura śara lakṣaṇa paricodana prakāraḥ yat ca idam vyākhyātṛ vacanam iha na bhavati anabhidhānāt iti yat ca pade pade bahula vacanam tat sarvam sutarām a pariśuddhim anuśāsanasya darśayati iti

original: anye tu śobheti cīrṇam iti na yāti pratibhettum iti mātur anuharatīti phalinabarhiṇaṃ [balavāno hy adyāseti kāṃ diśīka iti bhrājiṣṇur iti gaṇeya iti vareṇya iti lakṣyasaṃgrahabahiṣkṛtasmṛtisaṃdehaviparyayapratipādakatvalakṣaṇaskhalitaṃ viplutaṃ ca pāṇinitantraṃ iti manyamānāḥ tatra mahāntam ākṣepamatāniṣuḥ sa tu sthūlodaraprāya iti iha granthagauravabhayān na likhyate //
analyzed: anye tu śobhā iti cīrṇam iti na yāti pratibhettum iti mātuḥ anuharati iti phalina barhiṇam hi adya āsa iti kām diśīkaḥ iti bhrājiṣṇuḥ iti gaṇeyaḥ iti vareṇyaḥ iti lakṣya saṃgraha bahiṣkṛta smṛti saṃdeha viparyaya pratipādaka tva lakṣaṇa skhalitam viplutam ca pāṇinitantram iti manyamānāḥ tatra mahāntam ākṣepam atāniṣuḥ sa tu sthūla udara prāyaḥ iti iha grantha gaurava bhayāt na likhyate

original: nanu yadi lakṣaṇasya praṇetā pāṇiniḥ asamyagdarśī tatra vivaraṇakārāś ca nātipuṇadṛśaḥ kāmamanyaḥ sūtrakṛt kṛtabuddhitaro bhaviṣyati vṛttikārāś ca prauḍhataradṛṣṭayo bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: nanu yadi lakṣaṇasya praṇetā pāṇiniḥ asamyak darśī tatra vivaraṇa kārāḥ ca na ati puṇa dṛśaḥ kāmam anyaḥ sūtra kṛt kṛtabuddhitaraḥ bhaviṣyati vṛtti kārāḥ ca prauḍhatara dṛṣṭayaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: tebhyaś ca śabdalakṣaṇam aviplutam avabhotsyāmaha iti naitad asti teṣām api abhiyuktarāḥ kecid utprekṣanta eva doṣaṃ teṣām apare teṣām api apare /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ ca śabda lakṣaṇam aviplutam avabhotsyāmahe iti na etat asti teṣām api abhiyuktarāḥ kecid utprekṣante eva doṣam teṣām apare teṣām api apare

original: tad evam anavastha prasaṅgān nāsti nirmalam anuśāsanam iti kleśāyaiva vyākaraṇādhyayanamahāvratagrahaṇam /
analyzed: tat evam prasaṅgāt na asti nirmalam anuśāsanam iti kleśāya eva vyākaraṇa adhyayana mahāvrata grahaṇam

original: tathā cāha bṛhaspatiḥ pratipadam aśakyatvāt lakṣaṇasyāpy avyavasthānāt tatrāpi skhalitadarśanāt anavasthāprasaṅgāc ca maraṇānto vyādhir vyākaraṇam ity auśanasā iti /
analyzed: tathā ca āha bṛhaspatiḥ pratipadam aśakya tvāt lakṣaṇasya api avyavasthānāt tatra api skhalita darśanāt anavasthā prasaṅgāt ca maraṇa antaḥ vyādhiḥ vyākaraṇam iti auśanasāḥ iti

original: ihāpy uktam [duṣṭagrahagṛhīto vā bhīto vā rājadaṇḍataḥ /
analyzed: iha api uktam duṣṭa graha gṛhītaḥ vā bhītaḥ vā rāja daṇḍataḥ

original: pitṛbhyābhiśapto vā kuryāt vyākaraṇe śramam //] anyair apy uktam [vṛttiḥ sūtraṃ tilā māṣāḥ kaṭandī kodravodanaḥ /
analyzed: pitṛbhyā abhiśaptaḥ vā kuryāt vyākaraṇe śramam anyaiḥ api uktam vṛttiḥ sūtram tilāḥ māṣāḥ kaṭandī kodrava odanaḥ

original: ajaḍāya pradātavyaṃ jaḍīkaraṇam uttamam] iti //
analyzed: a jaḍāya pradātavyam jaḍīkaraṇam uttamam iti

original: evaṃ vyākaraṇāvagāhanakṛtodyogo 'pi vidvajjanaḥ vyutpattiṃ labhate na vaidikapadagrāme manuṣyoktivat /
analyzed: evam vidvas janaḥ vyutpattim labhate na vaidika pada grāme manuṣya ukti vat

original: anyat kiñcana tatpratītiśaraṇaṃ nāstīti ca vyākṛtaṃ tasmād apratipattimantharamukhe vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ katham //
analyzed: anyat kiñcana tad pratīti śaraṇam na asti iti ca vyākṛtam tasmāt apratipatti manthara mukhe vedāḥ pramāṇam katham

original: atrābhidhiyate yat tāvad idam avādi gavādiśabdavat anādiprabandhasiddam eva gāvyāder api vācakatvam iti tatrāmuṃ pakṣaṃ saṃśayadaśām eva tāvad āropayāpaḥ pūrvapākṣikoktayuktisamutthāpitasthirataraviparyayajñānasamanantaraṃ sahasaiva samyagjñānotpādanātibhārāt bhāraikadeśāvataraṇanyāyena saṃśayas tāvad upapadyate /
analyzed: atra abhidhiyate yat tāvat idam avādi gavādi śabda vat anādi prabandha siddam eva gāvī ādeḥ api vācaka tvam iti tatra amum pakṣam saṃśaya daśām eva tāvat āropaya āpaḥ pūrva pākṣika ukta yukti samutthāpita sthiratara viparyaya jñāna samanantaram sahasā eva samyak jñāna utpādana ati bhārāt bhāra eka deśa avataraṇa nyāyena saṃśayaḥ tāvat upapadyate

original: tataḥ tarkāt pariśodhite 'dhvani sugame sukhaṃ vihariṣyati samyaṅnirṇayopāyo nyāya iti tad ucyate /
analyzed: tatas tarkāt pariśodhite dhvani sugame sukham vihariṣyati samyak nirṇaya upāyaḥ nyāyaḥ iti tat ucyate

original: yadi gavyādīnāṃ gavādīnām iva śabdānāṃ prayoge gatir anyā na kācit saṃbhāvanābhūmimadhyeti tat satyam ādisattāyāḥ kalpane ko 'vasaraḥ //
analyzed: yadi gavya ādīnām go ādīnām iva śabdānām prayoge gatiḥ anyā na kācid saṃbhāvanā bhūmim adhyeti tat satyam ādi sattāyāḥ kalpane kaḥ vasaraḥ

original: yathā hi svādhyāyādhyayanasamaye yādṛśam eva śabdaṃ yathoditamātrānusvārasvarādisvarūpasamutthaṃ tam uccārayaty ācāryaḥ tādṛśam eva taṃ śiṣyaḥ pratyuccārayati /
analyzed: yathā hi svādhyāya adhyayana samaye yādṛśam eva śabdam yathā udita mātra anusvāra svara ādi sva rūpa samuttham tam uccārayati ācāryaḥ tādṛśam eva tam śiṣyaḥ pratyuccārayati

original: pramādyantaṃ vā gurur evainam anuśāsti /
analyzed: pramādyantam vā guruḥ eva enam anuśāsti

original: ā taduccāraṇasāmarthyopajananaṃ tāvat na muṃcati śikṣayati /
analyzed: ā tad uccāraṇa sāmarthya upajananam tāvat na muṃcati śikṣayati

original: so 'pi śiṣṭaḥ yadā gurur bhavati tadā svaśiṣyaṃ tathaiva śikṣayiṣyati /
analyzed: saḥ pi śiṣṭaḥ yadā guruḥ bhavati tadā sva śiṣyam tathā eva śikṣayiṣyati

original: ācāryo 'pi yadā śaiśave śiṣya āsīt taddā 'nyena guruṇā śikṣito 'bhūt /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ pi yadā śaiśave śiṣyaḥ āsīt taddā nyena guruṇā śikṣitaḥ bhūt

original: so 'pi tad anyena /
analyzed: sā u pi tat anyena

original: so 'pi tadanyeneti evam anāditvaṃ jaiminīyapakṣe ā jagatsargāt prabhṛti pravṛttatvaṃ vā naiyāyikapakṣe vedasya vyavasthitam //
analyzed: saḥ u pi tad anyena iti evam anādi tvam jaiminīya pakṣe ā jagat sargāt prabhṛti pravṛtta tvam vā naiyāyika pakṣe vedasya vyavasthitam

original: ittham eva yadi gāvyādīnāṃ gavādivad apramādakṛtaḥ suparirakṣitaḥ prayogaḥ tathaiva caitebhyo 'rthapratipattipūrvako vyavahāraḥ tadā 'nādigavādiśabdasamānaviṣayā eva gāvyādaya iti tadā kasya kiṃ brūmaḥ /
analyzed: ittham eva yadi gāvī ādīnām gavā ādi vat apramāda kṛtaḥ su parirakṣitaḥ prayogaḥ tathā eva ca etebhyaḥ rtha pratipatti pūrvakaḥ vyavahāraḥ tadā na ādi gavā ādi śabda samāna viṣayāḥ eva gāvī ādayaḥ iti tadā kasya kim brūmaḥ

original: asti tv atrāparaḥ prakāraḥ /
analyzed: asti tu atra aparaḥ prakāraḥ

original: na hy ekāntena yādṛg eva vaktrā śabdaḥ prayujyate tādṛg eva śrotrā pratyuccāryate /
analyzed: na hi ekāntena yādṛś eva vaktrā śabdaḥ prayujyate tādṛś eva śrotrā pratyuccāryate

original: kin tu pramādālasyādivividhāparādhavidhurakaraṇoccāryamāṇo 'pabhraṃśatāṃ spṛśan dṛśyata ity asti saṃśayāvasaraḥ //
analyzed: kin tu pramāda ālasya ādi vividha aparādha vidhura karaṇa uccāryamāṇa upabhraṃśa tām spṛśan dṛśyate iti asti saṃśaya avasaraḥ

original: apabhraṃśatayā 'pi ye sthitāḥ sthāsyanti vā śākaṭikabhāṣāśabdāḥ tān api gopālabālābalādiṣu prayuṃjānā jaraṭhapāmarāḥ prayatnenāpi na yathoccāritān eva tān pāṭhayiktuṃ śaknuvantīti aśaktijaśabdaprayogabāhulyadarśanāt saṃśayānā kuśāgrabuddher api buddhiḥ bhavitum arhati [kim ete gavādiśabdā evānādisiddhavācakaśaktibhājaḥ tebhyo 'nye viguṇakaraṇaprayojyāpramādaprabhavāḥ apabhraṃśāḥ kiṃ vā sarva eva tulyakakṣyā iti /
analyzed: apabhraṃśa tayā pi ye sthitāḥ sthāsyanti vā śākaṭika bhāṣā śabdāḥ tān api gopāla bāla abala ādiṣu prayuṃjānāḥ jaraṭha pāmarāḥ prayatnena api na yathā uccāritān eva tān pāṭhayiktum śaknuvanti iti aśakti ja śabda prayoga bāhulya darśanāt saṃśayānā kuśa agra buddheḥ api buddhiḥ bhavitum arhati kim ete gavādi śabdāḥ eva anādisiddha vācaka śakti bhājaḥ tebhyaḥ nye viguṇa karaṇa prayojya apramāda prabhavāḥ apabhraṃśāḥ kim v

original: veṣāṃsa tulyakakṣyatve ya ete 'dyatve 'pi pramādataḥ pramadādāsadārakādivadaneṣv apabhraṣṭā abhyadhikatarām apabhraṃśadaśāṃ spṛśantaḥ te 'pi tām eva gavādiśabdadhurām adhiroheyuḥ //
analyzed: tulya kakṣya tve ye ete pramādataḥ pramadā dāsa dāraka ādi vadaneṣu apabhraṣṭāḥ abhyadhikatarām apabhraṃśa daśām spṛśantaḥ te tām eva go ādi śabda dhurām adhiroheyuḥ

original: na caivam astv iti śakyam abhyanujñātum idānīm eva bhraśyatāṃ teṣāṃ pratyakṣata upalabdher iti /
analyzed: na ca evam astu iti śakyam abhyanujñātum idānīm eva bhraśyatām teṣām pratyakṣataḥ upalabdheḥ iti

original: tasmād avaśyaṃ tāvat adyatve paridṛśyamānā 'pabhraṃśadṛśā durbalabālābalādiśabdāḥ na gavādiśabdān spardhitur mahanti /
analyzed: tasmāt avaśyam tāvat adya tve paridṛśyamānā ā pabhraṃśa dṛśā durbala bāla abala ādi śabdāḥ na gavādi śabdān spardhituḥ mahanti

original: te cen na spardhante tad adhunā gāvya dayo 'pi prakārāntaropapattisaṃbhāvanābhaṅguraprabhāvāḥ santaḥ na gavādiśabdasamānavidhitvam adhyavasātuṃ śaknuyuv iti tarkayāmaḥ //
analyzed: te ced na spardhante tat adhunā prakāra antara upapatti saṃbhāvanā bhaṅgura prabhāvāḥ santaḥ na gavādi śabda samāna vidhi tvam adhyavasātum śaknuyuḥ iti tarkayāmaḥ

original: tad uktaṃ bhagavatā jaimininā [śabde prayatnaniṣpatter aparadhasya bhāgitvam] iti /
analyzed: tat uktam bhagavatā jaimininā śabde prayatna niṣpatteḥ aparadhasya bhāgi tvam iti

original: bhāṣyakāreṇāpi tad vyākhyātam [mahatā prayatnena śabda uccārito vāyuḥ nābher utthitaḥ urasi vistīrṇaḥ kaṇṭhe vivartitaḥ mūrdhānam āhatya parāvṛttaḥ vaktre caran vividhān śabdānabhivyanakti /
analyzed: bhāṣyakāreṇa api tat vyākhyātam mahatā prayatnena śabdaḥ uccāritaḥ vāyuḥ nābheḥ utthitaḥ urasi vistīrṇaḥ kaṇṭhe vivartitaḥ mūrdhānam āhatya parāvṛttaḥ vaktre caran vividhān śabdān abhivyanakti

original: tatrāparādhyetā 'py uccārayitā yathā śuṣke patiṣyāmīti kardame patati sakṛd upaspṛkṣyāmīti dvir upaspṛśati] ityādinā //
analyzed: tatra aparādhyetā pi uccārayitā yathā śuṣke patiṣyāmi iti kardame patati sakṛt upaspṛkṣyāmi iti dvis upaspṛśati ityādinā

original: āha viśeṣe tarhi pramāṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ yad ete gāvyādayaḥ pramādādyaparādhanibandhanā eva na gavādiśabdasamānavidhaya iti ucyate /
analyzed: āha viśeṣe tarhi pramāṇam vaktavyam yat ete gāvī ādayaḥ pramāda ādi aparādha nibandhanāḥ eva na gavādi śabda samāna vidhayaḥ iti ucyate

original: bavatu siddhaṃ nas samīhitaṃ saṃśayadaśāṃ tāvad ānīto 'yaṃ anādigāvyādiśabdavācī mahāpuruṣaḥ saṃbodhyate [bho mahātman itthaṃ pūrvoktanītyā saṃśaye sati cintyatām kim ete gāvyādayo gavādisamānayogakṣemā eva hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇīr itivat bhavantu /
analyzed: bavatu siddham naḥ samīhitam saṃśaya daśām tāvat ānītaḥ yam anādi gāvī ādi śabda vācī mahāpuruṣaḥ saṃbodhyate bho mahātman ittham pūrva ukta nītyā saṃśaye sati cintyatām kim ete gāvī ādayaḥ gavādi samāna yogakṣemāḥ eva hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇīḥ itivat bhavantu

original: kiṃ vā 'parādhasaṃbhāvanayā margāntaram ālāmbantām iti //
analyzed: kim vā parādha saṃbhāvanayā marga antaram ālāmbantām iti

original: tatraikasmin vācye bahavas tulyakakṣyā vācakā iti naiṣa nyāyaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ekasmin vācye bahavaḥ tulya kakṣyāḥ vācakāḥ iti na eṣa nyāyaḥ

original: katham pratyarthaṃ śabdaniveśāt /
analyzed: katham pratyartham śabda niveśāt

original: tenaiva sambandhakaraṇasaukaryāt /
analyzed: tena eva sambandha karaṇa saukaryāt

original: anyathā ca saṃbandhe yatnagauravaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: anyathā ca saṃbandhe yatna gaurava prasaṅgāt

original: pratyarthaṃ śabdaniveśe hi sati parasparam avyabhicāriṇau śabdārtho bhavataḥ sa śabdaḥ tasya vācakaḥ so 'rthaḥ tasya vācya iti /
analyzed: pratyartham śabda niveśe hi sati parasparam avyabhicāriṇau śabda arthaḥ bhavataḥ sa śabdaḥ tasya vācakaḥ saḥ rthaḥ tasya vācyaḥ iti

original: anekaśabdavācyas tv eko 'rthaḥ taṃ vācakaṃ śabdaṃ vijahyād api tam antareṇa śabdābhidheyatām api pratipadyate iti avyabhicāraḥ //
analyzed: aneka śabda vācyaḥ tu ekaḥ rthaḥ tam vācakam śabdam vijahyāt api tam antareṇa śabda abhidheya tām api pratipadyate iti avyabhicāraḥ

original: anekārthavācini caikasmin vācake iṣyamāṇe śabdo 'rtha vyabhicaret tasyevārthāntarasyāpi tataḥ pratipatter iti ittham aniyamo 'yam upaplaveta /
analyzed: aneka artha vācini ca ekasmin vācake iṣyamāṇe śabdaḥ vyabhicaret tasya iva artha antarasya api tatas pratipatteḥ iti ittham aniyamaḥ yam upaplaveta

original: hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇir ityādau /
analyzed: hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇiḥ ityādau

original: akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣā ityādau tu kiṃ kriyate gatir anyā nopalabhyate /
analyzed: akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ ityādau tu kim kriyate gatiḥ anyā nā upalabhyate

original: tenānekaśabdatvaṃ anekārthatvaṃ daivabalavattayā 'ṅgīkṛtam //
analyzed: tena aneka śabda tvam aneka artha tvam daiva balavat tayā ṅgīkṛtam

original: prathamaḥ pnar eṣa ṛjuḥ panthāḥ yad ekasya vācakasyaiko vācyo 'tha iti /
analyzed: prathamaḥ pnar eṣaḥ ṛjuḥ panthāḥ yat ekasya vācakasya ekaḥ vācyaḥ thaḥ iti

original: iha ca gatyantaramatispaṣṭam asti pramādaprabhavatvaṃ nāma /
analyzed: iha ca gati antara mati spaṣṭam asti pramāda prabhava tvam nāma

original: tasmin sati kim iti prathamaprāpto 'yaṃ prativācyaṃ vācakaniyamakramo laṅghyate /
analyzed: tasmin sati kim iti prathama prāptaḥ yam prati vācyam vācaka niyama kramaḥ laṅghyate

original: tena pramādāparādhanibandhanā gāvyādayaḥ na gavādisamānamahimāna iti yuktam //
analyzed: tena pramāda aparādha nibandhanāḥ gāvī ādayaḥ na gavādi samāna mahimānaḥ iti yuktam

original: kiṃ ca vācakaśaktir nāma sūkṣmā paramaparokṣā arthāpattimātraśaraṇāvagamā na tanmandatāyāṃ /
analyzed: kim ca vācaka śaktiḥ nāma sūkṣmā parama parokṣā arthāpatti mātra śaraṇa avagamā na tat manda tāyām

original: anyataḥ kutaścid avagantuṃ pāryate /
analyzed: anyatas kutaścid avagantum pāryate

original: sā ceyam anyathā  'py upapadyamānā gavādibhyo ' rthapratyayādivyavahāre mandībhavati /
analyzed: sā ca iyam anyathā pi upapadyamānā go ādibhyaḥ rtha pratyaya ādi vyavahāre mandībhavati

original: teṣu śakti kalpanāyām arthāpatiḥ /
analyzed: teṣu śakti kalpanāyām arthāpatiḥ

original: evaṃ ca gavādaya eva vacakaśakter āśrayaḥ na gāvyādayaḥ //
analyzed: evam ca gavā ādayaḥ eva vacaka śakteḥ āśrayaḥ na gāvī ādayaḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhi bahūnām anadhigatavyākaraṇatantrāṇām ebhir avicchinno vyavahāraḥ yathaiva mlecchabhāṣābhiḥ akṣinikocahastasaṃjñādivyavahāriṇāṃ vā svaiḥ svair upāyaiḥ //
analyzed: katham tarhi bahūnām anadhigata vyākaraṇa tantrāṇām ebhiḥ avicchinnaḥ vyavahāraḥ yathā eva mleccha bhāṣābhiḥ akṣi nikoca hasta saṃjñā ādi vyavahāriṇām vā svaiḥ svaiḥ upāyaiḥ

original: kim akṣinikocādīnāṃ antyajanapadavācāṃ nāsti śaktiḥ om ity ucyate /
analyzed: kim akṣi nikoca ādīnām antya janapada vācām na asti śaktiḥ om iti ucyate

original: kathaṃ tarhi tebhyo 'rthapratipattir naisargikī teṣāṃ śaktir nāstīti vrūmaḥ /
analyzed: katham tarhi tebhyaḥ rtha pratipattiḥ naisargikī teṣām śaktiḥ na asti iti vrūmaḥ

original: tatsvarūpasyāvyavasthitatvena sāṃsiddhikaśaktipātratānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: tad svarūpasya avyavasthita tvena sāṃsiddhika śaktipātra tā anupapatteḥ

original: pratipattis tu svakṛtasamayamātranibandhanā tebhyaḥ //
analyzed: pratipattiḥ tu sva kṛta samaya mātra nibandhanā tebhyaḥ

original: nanu naiyāyikānāṃ vā na samayaḥ pratipattyupāyaḥ satyam sa tv īśvarapraṇītaḥ prathamasargāt prabhṛti pravṛttaḥ mīmāṃsakābhyupagata naisargikaśaktisodarya eva na mādṛśaracitaparimitaviṣayasamayasamānaḥ /
analyzed: nanu naiyāyikānām vā na samayaḥ pratipatti upāyaḥ satyam sa tu īśvara praṇītaḥ prathama sargāt prabhṛti pravṛttaḥ mīmāṃsaka abhyupagata naisargika śakti sodaryaḥ eva na mādṛśa racita parimita viṣaya samaya samānaḥ

original: sa ca gavādiśabdeṣv eva prāptapratiṣṭhaḥ na gāvyādiṣu /
analyzed: sa ca gavā ādi śabdeṣu eva prāpta pratiṣṭhaḥ na gāvī ādiṣu

original: te tu varṇasārūpyacchāyayā gavādiśabdasmṛtim ādadhānāḥ tadarthapratipattihetutām upagacchanti //
analyzed: te tu varṇa sārūpya chāyayā gavā ādi śabda smṛtim ādadhānāḥ tad artha pratipatti hetu tām upagacchanti

original: nanu anavadhṛtasvarūpāṇāṃ kathaṃ gavādiśabdānāṃ svaraṇam tadavadhāraṇe vā ko 'bhyupāyaḥ abhiyogaviśeṣa iti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: nanu anavadhṛta svarūpāṇām katham go ādi śabdānām svaraṇam tad avadhāraṇe vā kaḥ bhyupāyaḥ abhiyoga viśeṣaḥ iti brūmaḥ

original: kaḥ punar abhiyogaḥ ko vā tasya viśeṣaḥ vyākaraṇādhyayanaṃ abhiyogaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ punar abhiyogaḥ kaḥ vā tasya viśeṣaḥ vyākaraṇa adhyayanam abhiyogaḥ

original: tadabhyāsānusāreṇa lakṣyanirīkṣaṇaṃ tasya viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: tad abhyāsa anusāreṇa lakṣya nirīkṣaṇam tasya viśeṣaḥ

original: vyākaraṇena ca pratipadam aparyavasitam āryajanaprayojyasādhuśabdasārthasaṅgrahataḥ tad visadṛśabarbarapurandhriprāyaprākṛtagocarāpaśabdaparihāraprakāravyutpādanam upakramyate yad ānantyāt kila kalpaśatair api nāvakalpate //
analyzed: vyākaraṇena ca pratipadam a paryavasitam ārya jana prayojya sādhu śabda sārtha saṅgrahataḥ tat visadṛśa barbara purandhri prāya prākṛta gocara apaśabda parihāra prakāra vyutpādanam upakramyate yat ānantyāt kila kalpa śataiḥ api na avakalpate

original: kin tu vyapanītātivyāptyādidoṣopanipātatrāsatrimuniparīkṣitalakṣaṇadvārakas tadupadeśaḥ śrūyate /
analyzed: kin tu vyapanīta ativyāpti ādi doṣa upanipāta trāsa tri muni parīkṣita lakṣaṇa dvārakaḥ tad upadeśaḥ śrūyate

original: tena ca vedeneva dharmādharmayoḥ brahmāvatāreṇeva satyānṛtayoḥ nītiśāstreṇeva hitāhitayoḥ manvādivacaneneva bhakṣyābhakṣyayoḥ divyeneva śuddhyaśuddhyoḥ sidhyaty eva sādhvasādhuśabdayor adhigama iti sarvalokasākṣikam etat katham apanīyate dṛśyate hy adyatve 'pi vyākaraṇakovidānām itareṣāṃ ca kṛṣīvalādīnāṃ atimahān vacasi viśeṣa ity evaṃ pramādādimūlagāvyādyapaśabdaprayogasaṃbhavāt anekaśabdagatavācakaśaktikalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāt abhiyogaviśeṣasādhyamāna sādhvasādhuśabdādhigamasaukaryāc ca gavādīnām eva vācakatvaṃ na gāvyādīnām iti sthite pūrvpakṣopanyastaḥ samasta eva parīvādaḥ parihṛto veditavyaḥ //
analyzed: tena ca vedena iva dharma adharmayoḥ brahmāvatāreṇa iva satya anṛtayoḥ nīti śāstreṇa iva hita ahitayoḥ manu ādi vacanena iva bhakṣya abhakṣyayoḥ divyena iva śuddhi aśuddhyoḥ sidhyati eva sādhu asādhu śabdayoḥ adhigamaḥ iti sarva loka sākṣikam etat katham apanīyate dṛśyate hi adyatve vyākaraṇa kovidānām itareṣām ca kṛṣīvala ādīnām ati mahān vacasi viśeṣaḥ iti evam pramāda ādi mūla gāvī ādi apaśabda prayoga saṃbhavāt aneka śabda gata

original: tathāhi /
analyzed: tathā hi

original: yat tāvad abhyadhāyi sādhutvaniścaye pramāṇaṃ nāstīti sādhutvaṃ nendriyagrāhyaṃ liṅgam asya na vidyate /
analyzed: yat tāvat abhyadhāyi sādhu tva niścaye pramāṇam na asti iti sādhu tvam na indriya grāhyam liṅgam asya na vidyate

original: śāstrasya viṣayo naiṣa prayogo nāsty asaṃkaraḥ //
analyzed: śāstrasya viṣayaḥ na eṣa prayogaḥ na asti asaṃkaraḥ

original: iti tatrāyaṃ pratiślokaḥ sādhutvam indriyagrāhyaṃ liṅgam apy asya vidyate /
analyzed: iti tatra ayam pratiślokaḥ sādhu tvam indriya grāhyam liṅgam api asya vidyate

original: śāstrasya viṣayo 'py evaṃ prayogo 'py asty asaṃkaraḥ //
analyzed: śāstrasya viṣayaḥ pi evam asti asaṃkaraḥ

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: śrautre hi pratyaye grastanirastaromaśāmbūkṛtādidoṣarahitodāttādidharmasaṃbandhaprasiddhānupūrvīkavarṇagaṇātmakapadapratibhāsas tāvad asti /
analyzed: śrautre hi pratyaye grasta nirasta romaśa ambūkṛta ādi doṣa rahita udātta ādi dharma saṃbandha prasiddha ānupūrvīka varṇa gaṇa ātmaka pada pratibhāsaḥ tāvat asti

original: sa ca na saṃdigdhaḥ na bādhakavidhūtadhairyaḥ nāśuddhakaraṇajnmā na kalpanāmātrasvarūpa iti tatra parisphuratsphuṭakramavarṇātmakapadagrahaṇam eva sādhutvagrahaṇam tadviparītayathānirdiṣṭadoṣakaluṣitaśabdagrahaṇam eva ca asādhutvagrahaṇam iti pratyakṣam ye eva sādhutvāsādhutve iti //
analyzed: sa ca na saṃdigdhaḥ na bādhaka vidhūta dhairyaḥ na aśuddha karaṇa jnmā na kalpanā mātra svarūpaḥ iti tatra parisphurat sphuṭa krama varṇa ātmaka pada grahaṇam eva sādhu tva grahaṇam tad viparīta yathā nirdiṣṭa doṣa kaluṣita śabda grahaṇam eva ca asādhu tva grahaṇam iti pratyakṣam ye eva sādhu tva asādhu tve iti

original: nanu yadi śrotrakaraṇakenaiva pratyayena sādhutvāsādhutve pratipattāraḥ pratipadyante vyākaraṇādhyayanavandhyabuddhayo 'pi pratipadyeran /
