analyzed: nanu yadi śrotra karaṇakena eva pratyayena sādhu tva asādhu tve pratipattāraḥ pratipadyante vyākaraṇa adhyayana vandhya buddhayaḥ pi pratipadyeran

original: na ca pratipadyante /
analyzed: na ca pratipadyante

original: tasmān na te indriyaviṣaye iti naiṣa doṣaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt na te indriya viṣaye iti na eṣa doṣaḥ

original: vaiyākaraṇopadeśasahāyakopakṛtaśrotrendriyagāhyatvābhyupagamāt /
analyzed: vaiyākaraṇa upadeśa sahāyaka upakṛta śrotra indriya gāhya tva abhyupagamāt

original: yathā hi brāhmaṇatvādijātiḥ upadeśasavyapekṣacakṣurindriyagrāhyāpi na pratyakṣagamyatām apojjhati /
analyzed: yathā hi brāhmaṇa tva ādi jātiḥ upadeśa savyapekṣa cakṣuḥ indriya grāhyā api na pratyakṣa gamya tām apojjhati

original: yathā ''ha [na hi yat giriśṛṅgam āruhya gṛhyate tad apratyakṣam] iti /
analyzed: yathā ha na hi yat giri śṛṅgam āruhya gṛhyate tat apratyakṣam iti

original: yathā vā savikalpakapratyakṣaprāmāṇyasiddhau śabdānuviddhabodhe 'pi pramāṇyam upapāditam ādau //
analyzed: yathā vā sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa prāmāṇya siddhau śabda anuviddha bodhe pi pramāṇyam upapāditam ādau

original: kila saṃjñopadeśinā panaso 'yam iti vṛddhavacasā cakṣurindriyeṇa panasajñānam utpadyate saṅketakaraṇakāle tadubhayajam iti avyapadeśyapadena vyapanītam /
analyzed: kila saṃjñā upadeśinā panasaḥ yam iti vṛddha vacasā cakṣuḥ indriyeṇa panasa jñānam utpadyate saṅketa karaṇa kāle tad ubhaya jam iti avyapadeśya padena vyapanītam

original: vyavahārakāle tu punaḥ panasādijñānam upadeśasmaraṇāpekṣacakṣurjanitam api cakṣuṣam eveti varṇitam /
analyzed: vyavahāra kāle tu punar panasa ādi jñānam upadeśa smaraṇa apekṣa cakṣuḥ janitam api cakṣuṣam eva iti varṇitam

original: evam ihāpi vyākaraṇakovidopadeśasaciva śravaṇendriyagrāhye api sādhutvāsādhutve na pratyakṣatam ativartete //
analyzed: evam iha api vyākaraṇa kovida upadeśa saciva śravaṇa indriya grāhye api sādhu tva asādhu tve na pratyakṣatam ativartete

original: yathā ca brāhmaṇatvādijātipratītau kāraṇāntaram uktaṃ kvacid ācārataś cāpi samyagrājānupālitād iti manvādidarśitānavadyavartmānusaraṇanipuṇatarabhūpatiparipālyamānavarṇāśramāṇāṃ śaṅkitakṛtakakapaṭāryaveṣaduṣṭaśūdratāvyabhicāre deśe viśiṣṭācāragamyāpi brāhmaṇatvādijātir bhavati evam ihāpi viśiṣṭaśabdaśravaṇānantarakālapravṛttavyavyavahārāvagamārthapratipattisahitaṃ śabdānuśāsanaśāstropadiṣṭaprakṛtipratyayavikaraṇavarṇalopāgamādeśādiliṅgam avyabhicāri tatsvarūpāvadhāraṇe kāraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: yathā ca brāhmaṇa tva ādi jāti pratītau kāraṇa antaram uktam kvacid ācārataḥ ca api samyak rāja anupālitāt iti manu ādi darśita anavadya vartma anusaraṇa nipuṇatara bhūpati paripālyamāna varṇa āśramāṇām śaṅkita kṛtaka kapaṭa ārya veṣa duṣṭa śūdra tā avyabhicāre deśe viśiṣṭa ācāra gamyā api brāhmaṇa tva ādi jātiḥ bhavati evam iha api viśiṣṭa śabda śravaṇa anantara kāla pravṛtta vya vyavahāra avagama artha pratipatti sahitam śa

original: yad evaṃ lakṣaṇakam arthapratyāyakaṃ ca śabdasvarūpaṃ tata sādhutayā 'vadhṛtam iti vyāptigrahaṇopapatteḥ //
analyzed: yat evam lakṣaṇakam artha pratyāyakam ca śabda svarūpam tata sādhu tayā iti vyāpti grahaṇa upapatteḥ

original: śāstram api śrutismṛtirūpaṃ aduṣṭaśabdaprayogopanatakratūpakārakaraṇakasvargādiphalasaṃyogam upadiśat apaśabdabhāṣaṇaprabhavapratyavāyapratipādakaṃ ca [vāgyogavid duṣyati cāpaśabdaiḥ] ityādi sādhutvetaraparicchede pramāṇatāṃ pratipadyata eva //
analyzed: śāstram api śruti smṛti rūpam aduṣṭa śabda prayoga upanata kratu upakāra karaṇaka svarga ādi phala saṃyogam upadiśat apaśabda bhāṣaṇa prabhava pratyavāya pratipādakam ca vāc yoga vid duṣyati ca apaśabdaiḥ ityādi sādhu tva itara paricchede pramāṇa tām pratipadyate eva

original: nanu vrīhikalaṃjavat tatsvarūpasiddhau satyāṃ tadvidhipratiṣedhayoḥ śāstraṃ kramate na tu tatsvarūpam eva vidhatte svarūpasyābhāvārthatvena vidhiviṣayatvāyogāt ity uktam satyam kin tu śrutismṛtiśāstrayoḥ dharmopadeśinoḥ yathopavarṇitenaiva prakāreṇa sādhvasādhuviṣayavidhiniṣedhaparatvam /
analyzed: nanu vrīhi kalaṃja vat tad svarūpa siddhau satyām tad vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ śāstram kramate na tu tad sva rūpam eva vidhatte sva rūpasya abhāva artha tvena vidhi viṣaya tva ayogāt iti uktam satyam kin tu śruti smṛti śāstrayoḥ dharma upadeśinoḥ yathā upavarṇitena eva prakāreṇa sādhu asādhu viṣaya vidhi niṣedha paratvam

original: tatsvarūpapratipattikartavyatāparaṃ tu vidhyapekṣitavyākaraṇasmṛtirūpam eva śāstraṃ veditavyam /
analyzed: tad svarūpa pratipatti kartavyatā param tu vidhi apekṣita vyākaraṇa smṛti rūpam eva śāstram veditavyam

original: mūlavidhyapekṣitasādhutvānvākhyānaparatvāc ca vyākaraṇasya mūlaśāstram api tatra sopānavyavahitaṃ pramāṇībhavaty eva //
analyzed: mūla vidhi apekṣita sādhu tva anvākhyāna paratvāt ca vyākaraṇasya mūlaśāstram api tatra sopāna vyavahitam pramāṇībhavati eva

original: yadi vā pāṇinyādiṣṭasmṛtidraḍhimnā mūlabhūtam ācamanādividhivadvaidikam api tathāvidhaṃ vidhivākyaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyam iti śāstrasyāpi nāviṣayaḥ sādhutvam //
analyzed: yadi vā pāṇini ādiṣṭa smṛti draḍhimnā mūla bhūtam ācamana ādi vidhi vat vaidikam api tathāvidham vidhi vākyam kalpayitum śakyam iti śāstrasya api nā aviṣayaḥ sādhu tvam

original: śabdavitprayogaś ca saṅkararahita eva /
analyzed: śabda vid prayogaḥ ca saṅkara rahitaḥ eva

original: tathā hi anyā eva niravadyavarṇakramodīraṇodāragambhīragatayaḥ sūktayaḥ sūrijanasya /
analyzed: tathā hi anyāḥ eva niravadya varṇa krama udīraṇa udāra gambhīra gatayaḥ su uktayaḥ sūri janasya

original: anyā eva duḥśravāḥ kuśitasaṅkīrṇavarṇavibhāgavinihitahṛdayodvevāḥ grāmyā giraḥ iti pratyakṣam upalabhyate //
analyzed: anyāḥ eva duḥśravāḥ kuśita saṅkīrṇa varṇa vibhāga vinihita hṛdaya udvevāḥ grāmyāḥ giraḥ iti pratyakṣam upalabhyate

original: sa cāyam asaṅkaraḥ prayogaḥ vyākaraṇasahāyakaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ sādhutvāvagamopāyatāṃ bhajata eveti sarvathā nāprāmāṇakaḥ sādhvasādhuśabdavibhāga iti //
analyzed: sa ca ayam asaṅkaraḥ prayogaḥ vyākaraṇa sahāyakam pratipadyamānaḥ sādhu tva avagama upāya tām bhajate eva iti sarvathā na aprāmāṇakaḥ sādhu asādhu śabda vibhāgaḥ iti

original: evaṃ ca [brāhmaṇena na mlecchita vai nāpabhāṣita vai] [mleccho havā eṣa yad apaśabdaḥ] ityādyāgamaśabdāny api tadupayogīni vyākhyātānīva bhavantīti //
analyzed: evam ca brāhmaṇena na vai vai mlecchaḥ eṣa yat apaśabdaḥ ityādi āgama śabdāni api tad upayogīni vyākhyātāni iva bhavanti iti

original: yat punar niyamaśāstre [sādhubhir bhāṣitavyam asādhubhir na] ity asminn apabhāṣitaṃ tad api na peśalam na hi nīrapānopadeśavat kṛśānupānaniṣedhavad vā  'navakāśam idaṃ śāstraṃ apaśabdānām anāryajanapratiṣṭhānāṃ yathātathā 'rthapratītyupāyatvadarśanapūrvakaprayogaprasaṅgānapāyena prāptau satyāṃ prtiṣedhasyāvakāśasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: yat punar niyama śāstre sādhubhiḥ bhāṣitavyam asādhubhiḥ naḥ iti asmin apabhāṣitam tat api na peśalam na hi nīra pāna upadeśa vat kṛśa anupāna niṣedha vat vā na avakāśam idam śāstram apaśabdānām anārya jana pratiṣṭhānām yathā tathā rtha pratīti upāya tva darśana pūrvaka prayoga prasaṅga anapāyena prāptau satyām prtiṣedhasya avakāśa saṃbhavāt

original: sādhubhir eva bhāṣaṇasya bhojanaprāṅmukhatādivat niyamādṛṣṭasāphalyāt //
analyzed: sādhubhiḥ eva bhāṣaṇasya bhojana prāc mukha tā ādi vat niyama adṛṣṭa sāphalyāt

original: yad api sādhvasādhusvarūpānavadhāraṇāt pratipadopadeśādyaśakyatvaṃ āśaṅkitaṃ tad api prativihitam yādṛg idaṃ pratyakṣānumānagamyaṃ sādhvasādhuśabdasvarūpaṃ vyākhyātaṃ tadavalambanapuraśaraniyamakaraṇasya suśakatvāt //
analyzed: yat api sādhu asādhu svarūpa anavadhāraṇāt pratipada upadeśa ādi aśakya tvam āśaṅkitam tat api prativihitam yādṛś idam pratyakṣa anumāna gamyam sādhu asādhu śabda svarūpam vyākhyātam tad avalambana pura śara niyama karaṇasya su śaka tvāt

original: ata eva sādhutvaṃ nāma kim ucyate iti yad vikalpitaṃ tat prativihitam eva bhavati /
analyzed: atas eva sādhu tvam nāma kim ucyate iti yat vikalpitam tat prativihitam eva bhavati

original: yataḥ vyākaraṇalakṣaṇānugamaviśeṣitaṃ vācakatvaṃ sādhutvam ity uktam /
analyzed: yatas vyākaraṇa lakṣaṇa anugama viśeṣitam vācaka tvam sādhu tvam iti uktam

original: tac ca sarvānugāmigotvādivat sāmānyaṃ vā bhavatu /
analyzed: tat ca sarva anugāmi go tva ādi vat sāmānyam vā bhavatu

original: pācakatvādivat asaty api sāmānye 'vacchedakaṃ bhavatu /
analyzed: pācaka tva ādi vat asati api sāmānye vacchedakam bhavatu

original: sarvathā tatkṛto nirvahati sarvo vyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: sarvathā tad kṛtaḥ nirvahati sarvaḥ vyavahāraḥ

original: vargīkaraṇe hi tad eva kāraṇam iti //
analyzed: vargīkaraṇe hi tat eva kāraṇam iti

original: atha vā punar astu vacakatvam eva sādhutvam tathāpi tatra niyamaśāstraṃ sādhubhir eva bhāṣitavyam iti pravartitum arhaty eva //
analyzed: atha vā punar astu vacaka tvam eva sādhu tvam tathā api tatra niyama śāstram sādhubhiḥ eva bhāṣitavyam iti pravartitum arhati eva

original: yady api asādhor avācakatvāt prayogaprasaṅgo nāsti tathāpi sādhusmaraṇasaraṇisamupārūḍhavācakatvaśaṅkopaplavamānaprasaṅganivṛttaye niyamasāphalyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: yadi api asādhoḥ avācaka tvāt prayoga prasaṅgaḥ nā asti tathā api sādhu smaraṇa saraṇi samupārūḍha vācaka tva śaṅkā upaplava māna prasaṅga nivṛttaye niyama sāphalyam bhaviṣyati

original: vidhiphalatvena niyamasya phalataḥ parisaṃkhyākāryaṃ asādhuśabdanivṛttiḥ sthāsyatīti so 'pi na doṣaḥ //
analyzed: vidhi phala tvena niyamasya phalatas parisaṃkhyā kāryam asādhu śabda nivṛttiḥ sthāsyati iti saḥ u pi na doṣaḥ

original: yad api parārthatvat phalaśrutim arthavādīkurvatā puṇyapāpaphalatvaṃ dūṣitam tad api na sāṃpratam arthapratītipārārthye saty api prayoganiyamāpūrvadvārakapuṇyapāpaphalatvasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: yat api phala śrutim arthavādīkurvatā puṇya pāpa phalatvam dūṣitam tat api na sāṃpratam artha pratīti pārārthye sati api prayoga niyama apūrva dvāraka puṇya pāpa phalatva saṃbhavāt

original: parṇamayyādiṣv api tathā prasaṃga iti cet bhavatu ko doṣaḥ naiyāyikaiḥ ekākāraniravalambanārthavādapadopadeśānabhyupagamāt śabdaśaktitātparyaparyālocanam api tair anyathā kriyata iti prāgvicāritam iti tiṣṭhatv eṣā kathā /
analyzed: parṇamayī ādiṣu api tathā prasaṃgaḥ iti ced bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ naiyāyikaiḥ eka ākāra niravalambana artha vāda pada upadeśa anabhyupagamāt śabda śakti tātparya paryālocanam api taiḥ anyathā kriyate iti prāk vicāritam iti tiṣṭhatu eṣā kathā

original: tena [kāmadhug bhavati] ityādivacanāny api vyākaraṇādhyayanaphalaprakaṭanapaṭūni tathaiva netavyāni //
analyzed: tena kāmadhuk bhavati ityādi vacanāni api vyākaraṇa adhyayana phala prakaṭana paṭūni tathā eva netavyāni

original: yad api sūtrakṛtā svayaṃ prayojanaṃ kim iti na vyāhṛtam iti vyāhṛtaṃ tad apy adūṣaṇam eva vyākaraṇaṃ hi vedāṃgam iti prasiddham etat ā himavataḥ ā ca kumārībhyaḥ /
analyzed: yat api sūtrakṛtā svayam prayojanam kim iti na vyāhṛtam iti vyāhṛtam tat api adūṣaṇam eva vyākaraṇam hi vedāṃgam iti prasiddham etat ā himavataḥ ā ca kumārībhyaḥ

original: vedaś ca yadi niṣprayojanaḥ svasti prajābhyaḥ samāptāni dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphalāni sarvakarmāṇi jitaṃ cāturvarṇyabāhyaiḥ antyajanapadavāsibhiḥ mlecchaiḥ //
analyzed: vedaḥ ca yadi niṣprayojanaḥ svasti prajābhyaḥ samāptāni dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa phalāni sarva karmāṇi jitam cāturvarṇya bāhyaiḥ antya janapada vāsibhiḥ mlecchaiḥ

original: atha saprayojano vedaḥ so 'ṃgavattvāt aṃgaiḥ sahaiva saprayojanatāṃ bhajata iti ko 'rthaḥ prayojanāntaracintayā /
analyzed: atha sa prayojanaḥ vedaḥ sa u ṃgavat tvāt aṃgaiḥ saha eva sa prayojana tām bhajate iti kaḥ rthaḥ prayojana antara cintayā

original: na hi darśapūrṇamāsaprayojanād anyat prayājādiprayojanam anviṣyata iti manvānaḥ svayaṃ sūtrakṛt prayojanaṃ nākhyat //
analyzed: na hi darśa pūrṇamāsa prayojanāt anyat prayāja ādi prayojanam anviṣyate iti manvānaḥ svayam sūtrakṛt prayojanam na ākhyat

original: vyākhyātāras tu mukhyānuṣaṃgikabhedabhinnaprayojanaprapaṃcaprarocanātiśayavyutpādanadvārakaśrotṛjanotsāhaparipoṣasiddhaye darśitavanta iti na kaścid upālabhyaḥ //
analyzed: vyākhyātāraḥ tu mukhya ānuṣaṃgika bheda bhinna prayojana prapaṃca prarocana atiśaya vyutpādana dvāraka śrotṛ jana utsāha paripoṣa siddhaye darśitavantaḥ iti na kaścid upālabhyaḥ

original: kathaṃ punar aṃgatāvyākaraṇasya kam upakāram āvahata iti /
analyzed: katham punar aṃga tā vyākaraṇasya kam upakāram āvahate iti

original: kasyaiṣa paryanuyogaḥ vedavat aṃgānām anāditvāt īśvarapraṇītatvād vā paryanuyojanānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: kasya eṣa paryanuyogaḥ veda vat aṃgānām anādi tvāt īśvara praṇīta tvāt vā paryanuyojana anupapatteḥ

original: saṃkṣepavistaravivakṣayā hi pāṇinipiṃgalaparāśaraprabhṛtayaḥ tatra tatra kartāraḥ prasiddhiṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: saṃkṣepa vistara vivakṣayā hi pāṇini piṃgala parāśara prabhṛtayaḥ tatra tatra kartāraḥ prasiddhim gatāḥ

original: paramārthatas tu veda iva tadartho 'pi tadarthāvagamopāyo 'pi hi sarva evānādayaḥ prajāpatinirmitā vety evam aparyanuyojyā eva /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu vedaḥ iva tad arthaḥ tad artha avagama upāyaḥ hi sarve eva anādayaḥ prajāpati nirmitāḥ vā iti evam a paryanuyojyāḥ eva

original: ata eva vedais tadaṅgaiś ca saha caturdaśa vidyāsthānāni gaṇyante [aṅgāni vedāś catvāro mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥ /
analyzed: atas eva vedaiḥ tad aṅgaiḥ ca saha caturdaśa vidyā sthānāni gaṇyante aṅgāni vedāḥ catvāraḥ mīmāṃsā nyāya vistaraḥ

original: purāṇaṃ dharmaśāstraṃ ca vidyā hy etāś caturdaśa] iti //
analyzed: purāṇam dharma śāstram ca vidyāḥ hi etāḥ caturdaśa iti

original: ye 'pi śabdasaṃskārādivikalpāḥ kṛtāḥ te 'pi bahubhāṣitvāpasmāranirmitā eva na vastuspṛśaḥ /
analyzed: ye pi śabda saṃskāra ādi vikalpāḥ kṛtāḥ te pi bahu bhāṣi tva apasmāra nirmitāḥ eva na vastu spṛśaḥ

original: śiṣṭā evātra praṣṭavyāḥ /
analyzed: śiṣṭāḥ eva atra praṣṭavyāḥ

original: ta eva ca jānanti ke saṃskṛtāḥ śabdāḥ ke vā tadviparītāḥ /
analyzed: te eva ca jānanti ke saṃskṛtāḥ śabdāḥ ke vā tad viparītāḥ

original: kaś ca teṣāṃ saṃskāra iti /
analyzed: kaḥ ca teṣām saṃskāraḥ iti

original: na ca tāvatā śiṣṭaprayogamūlam eva vyākaraṇaṃ brūmaḥ vedavadanāditvasya darśitatvāt /
analyzed: na ca tāvatā śiṣṭa prayoga mūlam eva vyākaraṇam brūmaḥ veda vat anādi tvasya darśita tvāt

original: andhaparamparāprasaṅgadoṣaparijihīrṣayā tu śiṣṭaprayogamūlatvam abhidhīyate /
analyzed: andha paramparā prasaṅga doṣa parijihīrṣayā tu śiṣṭa prayoga mūla tvam abhidhīyate

original: vaidyakasmṛter iva anvayavyatirekamūlatvāt /
analyzed: vaidyaka smṛteḥ iva anvaya vyatireka mūla tvāt

original: ye hi vyākaraṇasmṛtau sādhava ity anuśāsyante śabdāḥ te śiṣṭais tathaiva prayujyamānā dṛśyante harītakībhakṣaṇādivārogyam /
analyzed: ye hi vyākaraṇa smṛtau sādhavaḥ iti anuśāsyante śabdāḥ te śiṣṭaiḥ tathā eva prayujyamānāḥ dṛśyante harītakī bhakṣaṇāt iva ārogyam

original: na tu siṣṭebhyaḥ śabdasamāmnāyam adhigamya pāṇiniḥ granthaṃ praṇītavāt /
analyzed: na tu siṣṭebhyaḥ śabda samāmnāyam adhigamya pāṇiniḥ grantham

original: na cānvayavyatirekābhya dravyaśaktīr avagamya carakaṃ praṇītavān iti vidyānām anāditvābhidhānāt //
analyzed: na ca anvaya vyatirekābhyaḥ dravya śaktīḥ avagamya carakam praṇītavān iti vidyānām anādi tva abhidhānāt

original: etenetaretarāśrayam api pratyuktam na hi śiṣṭebhyo vyākaraṇasya prabhava iti //
analyzed: etena itaretara āśrayam api pratyuktam na hi śiṣṭebhyaḥ vyākaraṇasya prabhavaḥ iti

original: yat tu śiṣṭānām api pramāditvam upavarṇitam kila purāṇair munibhir api bahubhir apaśabdāḥ prayuktā iti tatrābhiyuktaiḥ tadapanayanamārgaḥ pradarśita eva /
analyzed: yat tu śiṣṭānām api pramādi tvam upavarṇitam kila purāṇaiḥ munibhiḥ api bahubhiḥ apaśabdāḥ prayuktāḥ iti tatra abhiyuktaiḥ tad apanayana mārgaḥ pradarśitaḥ eva

original: sa tu granthavistaratrāsād iha na pratanyate //
analyzed: sa tu grantha vistara trāsāt iha na pratanyate

original: yad api pāṇinitantre dhātuprātipadikakārakādyanuśāsanavisaṃṣṭhulatvam anekaśākham ākhyāpitaṃ tad api nipuṇamatibhiḥ pratisamāhitam eva /
analyzed: yat api pāṇini tantre dhātu prātipadika kāraka ādi anuśāsana visaṃṣṭhula tvam aneka śākham ākhyāpitam tat api nipuṇa matibhiḥ pratisamāhitam eva

original: na ca teṣām api doṣotprekṣaṇasaṃbhavād anavasthā nipuṇadarśitamārge viplavakāravaitaṇḍikapaṇḍitatas karāvakāśānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: na ca teṣām api doṣa utprekṣaṇa saṃbhavāt anavasthā nipuṇa darśita mārge viplava kāra vaitaṇḍika paṇḍitatas kara avakāśa anupapatteḥ

original: etena śobhācīrṇavarṇavareṇyagaṇeyabhrājiṣṇukāndiśīkādiśabdāsaṃgrahasmṛtisaṃdehaviparyayādidūṣaṇāny api kaiścid utprekṣitāni pratikṣiptāni mantavyāni tāni ca tair eva samāhitānīti //
analyzed: etena śobhā cīrṇa varṇa vareṇya gaṇeya bhrājiṣṇu kāndi śīka ādi śabda asaṃgraha smṛti saṃdeha viparyaya ādi dūṣaṇāni api kaiścid utprekṣitāni pratikṣiptāni mantavyāni tāni ca taiḥ eva samāhitāni iti

original: bārhaspatyam api sūtram evety alaṃ svamanīṣikākalpitānalpadurvikalpaḍaṃbarottaṃbhitālīkapāṇḍityagarvagalagrahaṇagadgadagirām udvegakāriṇānena vastuvicāreṇa /
analyzed: bārhaspatyam api sūtram eva iti alam sva manīṣikā kalpita analpa durvikalpa ḍaṃbara uttaṃbhita alīka pāṇḍitya garva gala grahaṇa gadgada girām udvega kāriṇā anena vastu vicāreṇa

original: sarvathā prakṛtinirmalam atyudāraṃ vyākaraṇāmbaram evaṃ prāyaiḥ parivādapāṃsupātaiḥ na manāg api dhūsarīkartuṃ pāryata iti siddham //
analyzed: sarvathā prakṛti nirmalam ati udāram vyākaraṇa ambaram evam prāyaiḥ parivāda pāṃsu pātaiḥ na manāk api dhūsarīkartum pāryate iti siddham

original: tasmāt pavitrāt sarvasmāt pavitraṃ āryajanabahumataṃ adhigatacaturvargaṃ agrāmyam ātmānaṃ kartuṃ adhyetavyaṃ vyākaraṇam //
analyzed: tasmāt pavitrāt sarvasmāt pavitram ārya jana bahu matam adhigata caturvargam a grāmyam ātmānam kartum adhyetavyam vyākaraṇam

original: āha ca āpaḥ pavitraṃ prathamaṃ pṛthivyāṃ āpāṃ pavitraṃ paramā hi mantrāḥ /
analyzed: āha ca āpaḥ pavitram prathamam pṛthivyām āpām pavitram paramāḥ hi mantrāḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca sāmargyajuṣāṃ pavitraṃ maharṣayo vyākaraṇaṃ nirāhuḥ //
analyzed: teṣām ca sāma ṛc yajuṣām pavitram mahā ṛṣayaḥ vyākaraṇam nirāhuḥ

original: ihāpy uktam rūpāntareṇa devās te vihāranti mahītale /
analyzed: iha api uktam rūpa antareṇa devāḥ te mahī tale

original: ye vyākaraṇasaṃskārapavitritamukhā narāḥ //
analyzed: ye vyākaraṇa saṃskāra pavitrita mukhāḥ narāḥ

original: kiṃ ca varaṃ hi jātāsti mayo gabhīre jalāśaye paṅkini nityamūkāḥ /
analyzed: kim ca varam hi jātā asti mayaḥ gabhīre jalāśaye paṅkini nitya mūkāḥ

original: na mānavā vyākaraṇābhiyogaprabuddhasaṃskāravihīnavācaḥ //
analyzed: na mānavāḥ vyākaraṇa abhiyoga prabuddha saṃskāra vihīna vācaḥ

original: manunā ca paṅktapāvanatvenādhigatavyākaraṇaḥ mīmāṃsakaś ca svasmṛtau paṭhitau [yaś ca vyākurute vācaṃ yaś ca mīmāṃsate 'dhvaram] iti /
analyzed: manunā ca paṅkta pāvana tvena adhigata vyākaraṇaḥ mīmāṃsakaḥ ca sva smṛtau paṭhitau yaḥ ca vyākurute vācam yaḥ ca mīmāṃsate dhvaram iti

original: puṣpadanto 'py āha bhraṣṭaḥ śapena devyāḥ śivapuravasater yady ahaṃ mandabhāgyaḥ bhāvyaṃ vā janmanā me yadi malakalile martyaloke saśoke /
analyzed: puṣpadantaḥ pi āha bhraṣṭaḥ śapena devyāḥ śiva pura vasateḥ yadi aham mandabhāgyaḥ bhāvyam vā janmanā me yadi mala kalile martya loke sa śoke

original: snigdhābhir dugdhadhārāmalamadhurasudhābinduniṣyandinībhiḥ kāmaṃ jayeya vaiyākaraṇabhaṇitibhiḥ tūrṇam āpūrṇakarṇaḥ //
analyzed: snigdhābhiḥ dugdha dhārā amala madhura sudhā bindu nisyandinībhiḥ kāmam jayeya vaiyākaraṇa bhaṇitibhiḥ tūrṇam āpūrṇa karṇaḥ

original: evaṃ vyākaraṇābhiyogasulabhaprauḍhoktibhiḥ paṇḍitaiḥ akleśena vicitravaidikapadavyutpattir āsādyate /
analyzed: evam vyākaraṇa abhiyoga sulabha prauḍha uktibhiḥ paṇḍitaiḥ akleśena vicitra vaidika pada vyutpattiḥ āsādyate

original: anyair apy upabṛṃhite dṛḍhatarair aṅgaiḥ niruktādibhiḥ vede svārthadhiyaṃ vitanvati kutaḥ prāmāṇyabhaṅgo bhavet //
analyzed: anyaiḥ api upabṛṃhite dṛḍhataraiḥ aṅgaiḥ nirukta ādibhiḥ vede sva artha dhiyam vitanvati kutas prāmāṇya bhaṅgaḥ bhavet

original: aṅgabhāvanirapekṣayaiva naḥ pratyayo yad iha śabdavidyayā /
analyzed: aṅga bhāva nirapekṣayā eva naḥ pratyayaḥ yat iha śabda vidyayā

original: vaidikāṛthaviṣayo vidhīyate tat kutastyam itaretarāśrayam //
analyzed: vaidika aṛtha viṣayaḥ vidhīyate tat kutastyam itaretara āśrayam

original: ādṛtam askhalitavyavahāraiḥ bhogimataṃ śrutasaṅgibhir āryaiḥ /
analyzed: ādṛtam a skhalita vyavahāraiḥ bhogi matam śruta saṅgibhiḥ āryaiḥ

original: vyākaraṇaṃ katham etad anādi prākṛtalakṣaṇasāmyam upeyāt //
analyzed: vyākaraṇam katham etat anādi prākṛta lakṣaṇa sāmyam upeyāt

original: evaṃ mṛṣātvam udagīyata yena yena cchidreṇa kalpitapiśācaravair anāryaiḥ /
analyzed: evam mṛṣātvam udagīyata yena yena chidreṇa kalpita piśāca ravaiḥ anāryaiḥ

original: tat tat samagram apasāritam ity ataś ca prāmāṇyam apratihataṃ sthitam āgamānām //
analyzed: tat tat samagram apasāritam iti atas ca prāmāṇyam a pratihatam sthitam āgamānām

original: iti pramāṇāni yathopadeśaṃ etāni catvāri parīkṣitāni /
analyzed: iti pramāṇāni yathopadeśam etāni catvāri parīkṣitāni

original: pravanvatāṃ saṃvyavahāram ebhiḥ sidhyanti sarve puruṣārthasārthāḥ //
analyzed: pravanvatām saṃvyavahāram ebhiḥ sidhyanti sarve puruṣa artha sārthāḥ

original: evaṃ pramāṇapadārthe parīkṣite sati yadarthaṃ tatparīkṣaṇaṃ tat prameyam idānīṃ darśayitum āha ātmaśarīrendriyārthabuddhimanaḥpravṛttidoṣapretyabhāvaphaladuḥkhāpavargās tu prameyam //1.1.9//
analyzed: evam pramāṇa padārthe parīkṣite sati yad artham tat parīkṣaṇam tat prameyam idānīm darśayitum āha ātma śarīra indriya artha buddhi manaḥ pravṛtti doṣa pretyabhāva phala duḥkha apavargāḥ tu prameyam

original: pramāṇavad ihāpy etat sūtraṃ vyākhyāyi sūribhiḥ /
analyzed: pramāṇa vat iha api etat sūtram vyākhyāyi sūribhiḥ

original: evaṃ vibhāgasāmānyalakṣaṇapratipādakam //
analyzed: evam vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇa pratipādakam

original: prameyaśrutir ātmādipadaparyantavartinī /
teṣām eva prameyatvaṃ nānyasyeti niyacchati //
analyzed: teṣām eva prameya tvam na anyasya iti niyacchati

original: yathā [devadattayajñadattaviṇthumitrā bhojyantām] iti eva kārādiśrutim antareṇāpi śabdasāmarthyāt ta eva bhojanakriyāyogino 'vagamyante nānye tathehāpy ātmādayaḥ prameyam ity ukte tathaiva taditaraprameyaniṣedho  'vadhāryate //
analyzed: yathā devadatta yajñadatta viṇthu mitrāḥ bhojyantām iti eva kārā ādi śrutim antareṇa api śabda sāmarthyāt te eva bhojana kriyā yoginaḥ vagamyante na anye tathā iha api ātma ādayaḥ prameyam iti ukte tathā eva tad itara prameya niṣedhaḥ vadhāryate

original: nanu kathaṃ dvādaśavidham eva prameyam avadhāryate yāvatā samānatantre pṛthivyādīni navadravyāṇi rūpādayaś ca caturviṃśatiguṇāḥ utkṣepaṇādipaṃcakarmāṇi parāparabhedena dvividhaṃ sāmānyaṃ nityadravyavṛttayo 'ntyā viśeṣāḥ ekaḥ samavāya iti ṣaṭpadārthān anukramya tadavāntaraviśeṣair ānantyaṃ prameyasyopavarṇitam asti //
analyzed: nanu katham dvādaśavidham eva prameyam avadhāryate yāvatā samāna tantre pṛthivī ādīni nava dravyāṇi rūpa ādayaḥ ca caturviṃśati guṇāḥ utkṣepaṇa ādi paṃca karmāṇi para apara bhedena dvividham sāmānyam nitya dravya vṛttayaḥ ntyāḥ viśeṣāḥ ekaḥ samavāyaḥ iti ṣaṣ padārthān anukramya tad avāntara viśeṣaiḥ ānantyam prameyasya upavarṇitam asti

original: ucyate kiṃ punar iha prameyaṃ vivakṣitam iti tatsāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tāvat parīkṣyatām //
analyzed: ucyate kim punar iha prameyam vivakṣitam iti tat sāmānya lakṣaṇam tāvat parīkṣyatām

original: āha sūktam idaṃ kasyāpi karṇe pṛṣṭaḥ kaṭiṃ cālayatīti /dvādaśavidhatvam ākṣiptaṃ na pratisamādhatte bhavān /
analyzed: āha sūktam idam kasya api karṇe pṛṣṭaḥ kaṭim cālayati iti dvādaśavidha tvam ākṣiptam na pratisamādhatte bhavān

original: prameyasya sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tu parīkṣate iti //
analyzed: prameyasya sāmānya lakṣaṇam tu parīkṣate iti

original: ucyate alaṃ kelinā etad evātra pratisamādhānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: ucyate alam kelinā etat eva atra pratisamādhānam bhavati

original: na hi pramāṇaviṣayamātram iha prameyam abhimatam evaṃvidhasya prasiddhatvena lakṣaṇānarhatvāt /
analyzed: na hi pramāṇa viṣaya mātram iha prameyam abhimatam evaṃvidhasya prasiddha tvena lakṣaṇa anarha tvāt

original: pramāṇa evaṃ jñāte sati tadviṣayo 'rthaḥ prameyam iti prajñāyata eva /
analyzed: pramāṇe evam jñāte sati tad viṣayaḥ rthaḥ prameyam iti prajñāyate eva

original: kiṃ tena lakṣitena tasmāt viśiṣṭam iha prameyaṃ lakṣyate //
analyzed: kim tena lakṣitena tasmāt viśiṣṭam iha prameyam lakṣyate

original: jñātaṃ samyag asamyag vā yan mokṣāya bhavāya vā /
analyzed: jñātam samyak asamyak vā yat mokṣāya bhavāya vā

original: tat prameyam ihābhīṣṭaṃ na pramāṇārthamātrakam //
analyzed: tat prameyam iha abhīṣṭam na pramāṇa artha mātrakam

original: tac ca dvādaśavidham eva bhavati na nyūnam adhikaṃ veti samāhitam itthaṃ bhavati vibhāgākṣepaḥ //
analyzed: tat ca dvādaśavidham eva bhavati na nyūnam adhikam vā iti samāhitam ittham bhavati vibhāga ākṣepaḥ

original: kutaḥ punar eṣaḥ prameyaviśeṣo labhyate niḥśreyasārthatvāc chāstrasya /
analyzed: kutas punar eṣaḥ prameya viśeṣaḥ labhyate niḥśreyasa artha tvāt śāstrasya

original: prameyajñānasya pramāṇajñānavad anyajñānopayogitām antareṇa svata eva mithyājñānanivṛttyādikrameṇa apavargāhetutvapratijñānāt /
analyzed: prameya jñānasya pramāṇa jñāna vat anya jñāna upayogi tām antareṇa svatas eva mithyājñāna nivṛtti ādi krameṇa apavarga ahetu tva pratijñānāt

original: tathāvidhasya cāpavargopāyatvasyātmādiṣv eva bhāvāt //
analyzed: tathāvidhasya ca apavarga upāya tvasya ātma ādiṣu eva bhāvāt

original: bhavatv evam sūtrasya tu katham īdṛśaprameyaviśeṣasamarthane sāmarthyam viśeṣanirdeśāt tu śabdaprayogasāmarthyāc ca //
analyzed: bhavatu evam sūtrasya tu katham īdṛśa prameya viśeṣa samarthane sāmarthyam viśeṣa nirdeśāt tu śabda prayoga sāmarthyāt ca

original: satyam ākāśakāladigādi pramāṇaviṣayatvāt prameyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: satyam ākāśa kāla diś ādi pramāṇa viṣaya tvāt prameyam bhavati

original: tat tu na saprayojanaṃ ātmaśarīrendriyārthamanaḥpravṛttidoṣapretyabhāvaphaladuḥkhāpavargās tu prameyam asyaiva niḥśreyasahetutvād ity āśayaḥ //
analyzed: tat tu na sa prayojanam ātma śarīra indriya artha manaḥ pravṛtti doṣa pretyabhāva phala duḥkha apavargāḥ tu prameyam asya eva niḥśreyasa hetu tvāt iti āśayaḥ

original: tad ittham eṣa tu śabdaḥ niḥśreyasānaṅgabhūtaprameyāntaraparihāradvāreṇa viśiṣṭam ātmādiprameyam iha sūcayati //
analyzed: tat ittham eṣa tu śabdaḥ niḥśreyasa anaṅga bhūta prameya antara parihāra dvāreṇa viśiṣṭam ātma ādi prameyam iha sūcayati

original: taddvādaśavidhatve 'pi heyopādeyabhedataḥ /
analyzed: tad dvādaśavidha tve pi heya upādeya bhedataḥ

original: dvidhocyate mumukṣūṇāṃ tathaiva dhyānasiddhaye //
analyzed: dvidhā ucyate mumukṣūṇām tathā eva dhyāna siddhaye

original: tatra dehādi duḥkhāntaṃ heyam eva vyavasthitam /
analyzed: tatra deha ādi duḥkha antam heyam eva vyavasthitam

original: upādeyo 'pavargas tu dvidhā 'vasthitir ātmanaḥ //
analyzed: upādeyā u pavargaḥ tu dvidhā vasthitiḥ ātmanaḥ

original: sukhadḥkhādibhoktṛtvasvabhāvo heya eva saḥ /
analyzed: sukha dḥkha ādi bhoktṛ tva svabhāvaḥ heyaḥ eva saḥ

original: upādeyas tu bhogādivyavahāraparāṅmukhaḥ //
analyzed: upādeyaḥ tu bhoga ādi vyavahāra parāṅmukhaḥ

original: ātmano hi bhogādhiṣṭhānaṃ śarīram /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ hi bhoga adhiṣṭhānam śarīram

original: bhogasādhanānīndriyāṇi /
analyzed: bhoga sādhanāni indriyāṇi

original: bhoktavyā indriyārthāḥ /
analyzed: bhoktavyāḥ indriya arthāḥ

original: bhogakāraṇaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: bhoga kāraṇam manaḥ

original: pravṛttiḥ puṇyapāpātmikā /
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ puṇya pāpa ātmikā

original: rāgādayaś ca doṣāḥ śarīrādijanmahetavaḥ /
analyzed: rāga ādayaḥ ca doṣāḥ śarīra ādi janma hetavaḥ

original: etatkṛtaś ca śarīrādiyogaviyogābhyāsaḥ pretyabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: etad kṛtaḥ ca śarīra ādi yoga viyoga abhyāsaḥ pretyabhāvaḥ

original: etatkṛtam eva ca saṃsāre sukhaduḥkharūpaṃ phalaṃ /
analyzed: etat kṛtam eva ca saṃsāre sukha duḥkha rūpam phalam

original: tacya vividham eva /
analyzed: tacya vividham eva

original: vivekavataḥ sarvaṃ duḥkham eveti /
analyzed: vivekavataḥ sarvam duḥkham eva iti

original: evaṃ śarīrādi duḥkhāntaṃ heyatayaiva bhāvanīyam /
analyzed: evam śarīra ādi duḥkha antam heya tayā eva bhāvanīyam

original: etadanupayuktaś cātmā 'pi tathaiva /
analyzed: etad anupayuktaḥ ca ātmā tathā eva

original: etadviyuktas tv ātmaivāpavarga ucyate /
analyzed: etad viyuktaḥ tu ātmā eva apavargaḥ ucyate

original: sa copādeyatayā bhāvanoya ity ata evātmapadasaṃgṛhītasyāpy asya punar nirdeśaḥ sa di paramaḥ puruṣārtha iti //
analyzed: sa ca upādeya tayā bhāvanoyaḥ iti atas eva ātma pada saṃgṛhītasya api asya punar nirdeśaḥ sa paramaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ iti

original: evam idaṃ dvādaśavidhaṃ prameyaṃ heyopādeyatayā tattvajñānena bhāvayana abhyāsāt tadviṣayaviparītagrahātmakaṃ mithyājñānaṃ kṣiṇoti //
analyzed: evam idam dvādaśavidham prameyam heya upādeya tayā tattva jñānena bhāvayana abhyāsāt tad viṣaya viparīta graha ātmakam mithyājñānam kṣiṇoti

original: tattvajñānodayenāsya mithyājñāne 'pabādhite /
analyzed: tattva jñāna udayena asya mithyājñāne

original: rāgadveṣādayo doṣāḥ tanmūlāt kṣayam āpnuyuḥ //
analyzed: rāga dveṣa ādayaḥ doṣāḥ tad mūlāt kṣayam āpnuyuḥ

original: kṣīṇadoṣasya nodeti pravṛttiḥ puṇyapāpikā /
analyzed: kṣīṇa doṣasya nā udeti pravṛttiḥ puṇya pāpikā

original: tadabhāvān na tatkāryaṃ śarīrādy upajāyate //
analyzed: tad abhāvāt na tat kāryam śarīra ādi upajāyate

original: aśarīraś ca naivātmā spṛśyate duḥkhaḍambaraiḥ /
analyzed: aśarīraḥ ca nā eva ātmā spṛśyate duḥkha ḍambaraiḥ

original: aśeṣaduḥkhoparamaḥ so 'pavargo 'bhidhīyate //
analyzed: aśeṣa duḥkha uparamaḥ saḥ upavargaḥ abhidhīyate

original: tad ittham eva dvādaśavidhaṃ prameyaṃ atigahanasaṃsāramāravasthalaprabhavabhīmasantāpanirvāpaṇamahāhradatām upayātīti tad evopadeśārham iti siddham //
analyzed: tat ittham eva dvādaśavidham prameyam ati gahana saṃsāra mārava sthala prabhava bhīma santāpa nirvāpaṇa mahā hrada tām upayāti iti tat eva upadeśa arham iti siddham

original: viraktasaṃkathās tāvad asatāṃ tāpasoditāḥ /
analyzed: virakta saṃkathāḥ tāvat asatām tāpasa uditāḥ

original: ātmaiva tv asti nāstīti kathaṃ na paricintyate //
analyzed: ātmā eva tu asti na asti iti katham na paricintyate

original: tathā ca lokāyatikāḥ paralokāpavādinaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca lokāyatikāḥ para loka apavādinaḥ

original: caitanyakhacitāt kāyāt nātmā 'nyo 'stīti manvate //
analyzed: caitanya khacitāt kāyāt na ātmā asti iti manvate

original: na ca tāvad ātmā pratyakṣato gṛhyate ghaṭādivat bāhyendriyeṇa sukhādivan manasā vā paricchettum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: na ca tāvat ātmā pratyakṣataḥ gṛhyate ghaṭa ādi vat bāhya indriyeṇa sukha ādi vat manasā vā paricchettum aśakya tvāt

original: anumānaṃ tu na pramāṇam eva cārvākāṇām /
analyzed: anumānam tu na pramāṇam eva cārvākāṇām

original: na cātmasiddhau kiñcana liṅgam asti /
analyzed: na ca ātma siddhau kiñcana liṅgam asti

original: jñānādiyogas tu bhūtānām eva pariṇāmaviśeṣopapāditaśaktyatiśayajuṣāṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: jñāna ādi yogaḥ tu bhūtānām eva pariṇāma viśeṣa upapādita śakti atiśaya juṣām bhaviṣyati

original: yathā guḍapiṣṭādayaḥ prāgasatīm api madaśaktiṃ āsāditasurākārapariṇāmāḥ prapadyante tathā mṛdādyavasthāyāṃ acetanāny api bhūtāni śarīrākārapariṇatāni caitanyaṃ sprakṣyanti /
analyzed: yathā guḍa piṣṭa ādayaḥ prāk asatīm api mada śaktim āsādita surā ākāra pariṇāmāḥ prapadyante tathā mṛd ādi avasthāyām acetanāni api bhūtāni śarīra ākāra pariṇatāni caitanyam sprakṣyanti

original: kālāntare ca vyādhyādinā /
analyzed: kāla antare ca vyādhi ādinā

original: pariṇāmaviśeṣam avajahanti tāny eva caitanyaśūnyatām upayāsyanti /
analyzed: pariṇāma viśeṣam avajahanti tāni eva caitanya śūnyatām upayāsyanti

original: caitanyavattvānapāyāc ca tāvantaṃ kālaṃ tāny eva smṛtyanusandhānādivyavahāranirvahaṇanipuṇatām anubhaviṣyanti iti kim anumānaka ātmā syāt āgamās tu manorathādhirūḍhaprāmāṇyāḥ katham ātmānam avabodhayituṃ śakṣyanti /
analyzed: caitanyavat tva anapāyāt ca tāvantam kālam tāni eva smṛti anusandhāna ādi vyavahāra nirvahaṇa nipuṇa tām anubhaviṣyanti iti kim anumānakaḥ ātmā syāt āgamāḥ tu manoratha adhirūḍha prāmāṇyāḥ katham ātmānam avabodhayitum śakṣyanti

original: ayam api cāgamo ' sty eva [vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny evānuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñā 'sti] iti /
analyzed: ayam api ca āgamaḥ u sti eva vijñāna ghanaḥ eva etebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāni eva anuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñā sti iti

original: tat ātmano nityasya paralokino 'bhāvāt kṛtam etābhiḥ apārthakapariśramakāriṇībhiḥ paralokakathābhiḥ //
analyzed: tat ātmanaḥ nityasya para lokinaḥ bhāvāt kṛtam etābhiḥ apārthaka pariśrama kāriṇībhiḥ para loka kathābhiḥ

original: tatra pratyakṣam ātmānam aupavarṣāḥ prapedire /
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣam ātmānam aupavarṣāḥ prapedire

original: ahaṃ pratyayagamyatvāt sayūthyā api kecana //
analyzed: aham pratyaya gamya tvāt sa yūthyāḥ api kecana

original: asty ayam ahaṃ pratyayaḥ kaścit śarīrasamānādhikaraṇaḥ [sthūlo 'ham] [kṣāmo 'haṃ] iti /
analyzed: asti ayam aham pratyayaḥ kaścid śarīra samāna adhikaraṇaḥ sthūlaḥ ham kṣāmaḥ haṃ iti

original: kaścit jñātṛsamānādhikaraṇaḥ [jānāmy aham] [smarāmy aham] iti /
analyzed: kaścid jñātṛ samāna adhikaraṇaḥ jānāmi aham smarāmi aham iti

original: tatra sthūlādisamānādhikaraṇas tāvad āstām ahaṃ pratyayaḥ //
analyzed: tatra sthūla ādi samāna adhikaraṇaḥ tāvat āstām aham pratyayaḥ

original: jñānecchāsukhaduḥkhādisāmānādhikaraṇyabhāk /
yas tv ahaṃ pratyayas tatra nātmano 'nyaḥ prakāśate //
analyzed: yaḥ tu aham pratyayaḥ tatra na ātmanaḥ prakāśate

original: na hi jñānasukhecchādiyogaḥ kāyenidriyādiṣu /
analyzed: na hi jñāna sukha icchā ādi yogaḥ kāyena idriya ādiṣu

original: na ca jñānādiśūnye 'rthe jānāmītyādisaṃvidaḥ //
analyzed: na ca jñāna ādi śūnye rthe jānāmi ityādi saṃvidaḥ

original: jñānamātrāvabhāso 'pi vāritaḥ pratyabhijñayā /
analyzed: jñāna mātra avabhāsaḥ pi vāritaḥ pratyabhijñayā

original: jñātavān aham evādau aham evādya vedmi ca //
analyzed: jñātavān aham eva ādau aham eva adya vedmi ca

original: nottarasya ca pūrvasya na jñānakṣaṇayor dvayoḥ /
analyzed: na uttarasya ca pūrvasya na jñāna kṣaṇayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: na santānasya caitasmin pratyaye 'sty avabhāsanam //
analyzed: na santānasya ca etasmin pratyaye sti avabhāsanam

original: nottarojñānavān pūrvaṃ pūrvo jānāti nādhunā /
analyzed: na uttaraḥ jñānavān pūrvam pūrvaḥ jānāti na adhunā

original: na dvayor dvayam apy asti santānas tu na vāstavaḥ //
analyzed: na dvayoḥ dvayam api asti santānaḥ tu na vāstavaḥ

original: avastutvāc ca nāsau pūrvaṃ kiṃcij jñātavān na cādya kiṃcij jānātīti /
analyzed: avastu tvāt ca na asau pūrvam kiṃcid jñātavān na ca adya kiṃcid jānāti iti

original: tasmād aham eva hyo jñātavān aham evādya jānāmīty asmin pratyaye hyaś cādya cānuvartamāno jñātā pratibhātīti gamyate //
analyzed: tasmāt aham eva hyas jñātavān aham eva adya jānāmi iti asmin pratyaye hyas ca adya ca anuvartamānaḥ jñātā pratibhāti iti gamyate

original: na cāsau kāyaḥ bālādyavasthābhedena nānātvāt acetanatvāc ca /
analyzed: na ca asau kāyaḥ bāla ādi avasthā bhedena nānātvāt acetana tvāt ca

original: evaṃ ca pratyabhijñā 'haṃpratyayagrāhye jñātari siddhe so 'yaṃ sthūlādisamānādhikaraṇaḥ ahaṃpratyayaḥ tadabhedopacāreṇa śarīre vartamāno mithyeti kalpayiṣyate /
analyzed: evam ca pratyabhijñā haṃ pratyaya grāhye jñātari siddhe saḥ yam sthūla ādi samāna adhikaraṇaḥ ahaṃpratyayaḥ tad abheda upacāreṇa śarīre vartamānaḥ mithyā iti kalpayiṣyate

original: na punar etad anurodhena jñānādisamānādhikaraṇāhaṃpratyayamithyātvakalpanaṃ yuktaṃ abādhitatvāt /
analyzed: na punar etat anurodhena jñāna ādi samāna adhikaraṇa ahaṃpratyaya mithyātva kalpanam yuktam abādhita tvāt

original: na khalv ahaṃ jānāmīti pratyayaḥ kenacid alpīyasā doṣakāraṇena kaluṣīkartuṃ pāryate /
analyzed: na khalu aham jānāmi iti pratyayaḥ kenacid alpīyasā doṣa kāraṇena kaluṣīkartum pāryate

original: tat asyātmaiva mukhyo viṣayaḥ tadatiriktaṃ vastu bhākta iti /
analyzed: tat asya ātmā eva mukhyaḥ viṣayaḥ tad atiriktam vastu bhāktaḥ iti

original: tasmād ahaṃpratyayagamyatvād ātmā pratyakṣa iti //
analyzed: tasmāt ahaṃpratyaya gamya tvāt ātmā pratyakṣaḥ iti

original: atra vadanti śabdamātroccāraṇam etat [ahaṃ jānāmi] [aham icchāmi] [ahaṃ sukhī] [ahaṃ duḥkhī] iti /
analyzed: atra vadanti śabda mātra uccāraṇam etat aham jānāmi aham icchāmi aham sukhī aham duḥkhī iti

original: na tu jñānādisvarūpātiriktaḥ tadāśrayaḥ kaścid etāsu buddhiṣu parisphuratīti /
analyzed: na tu jñāna ādi svarūpa atiriktaḥ tad āśrayaḥ kaścid etāsu buddhiṣu parisphurati iti

original: katham ekasyām eva saṃvidi kartā ca karma cātmā bhavet //
analyzed: katham ekasyām eva saṃvidi kartā ca karma ca ātmā bhavet

original: grāhyagrāhakataikasya jñānasyāpākariṣyate /
analyzed: grāhya grāhaka tā ekasya jñānasya apākariṣyate

original: tvayā 'pi neṣyate ceti tathā nāsty ātmano 'pi sā //
analyzed: tvayā pi nā iṣyate ca iti tathā nā asti sā

original: yac ca avasthākṛtaṃ bhedam avalambya grāhyagrāhakabhāvasamarthanam ekasyaivātmanaḥ kṛtaṃ [kila dravyādirūpam ātmano grāhyaṃ jñātṛrūpaṃ ca grāhakam iti] tad anupapannam dravyādirūpe grāhye na jñātari grāhyatā sādhitā syāt /
analyzed: yat ca avasthā kṛtam bhedam avalambya grāhya grāhaka bhāva samarthanam ekasya eva ātmanaḥ kṛtam kila dravya ādi rūpam ātmanaḥ grāhyam jñātṛ rūpam ca grāhakam iti tat anupapannam dravya ādi rūpe grāhye na jñātari grāhya tā sādhitā syāt

original: ātmavartino 'pi dravyādirūpasya ghaṭāditulyatvāt //
analyzed: ātma vartinaḥ pi dravya ādi rūpasya ghaṭa ādi tulya tvāt

original: yad api nipuṇaṃ manyair ucyate bhavatu jñātṛteva grāhikā /
analyzed: yat api nipuṇam manyaiḥ ucyate bhavatu jñātṛ tā iva grāhikā

original: tathāpi viṣayopādhikṛto 'sty eva bhedaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api viṣaya upādhi kṛtaḥ sti eva bhedaḥ

original: ghaṭāvacchinnā hi hi jñātṛtā grāhyā śuddhaiva tu jñātṛtā grāhiketi /
analyzed: ghaṭa avacchinnā hi hi jñātṛ tā grāhyā śuddhā eva tu jñātṛ tā grāhikā iti

original: [ghaṭam ahaṃ jānāmi] iti ko 'rthaḥ katham jānantam ātmānaṃ [jānāmi] ity asmatprayogasaṃbhedāc caivam avakalpate /
analyzed: ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti kaḥ rthaḥ katham jānantam ātmānam jānāmi iti asmad prayoga saṃbhedāt ca evam avakalpate

original: anyatra tu śuddhaviṣayagrahaṇam eva bhavati [ghaṭo 'yaṃ] iti tad etad api saralam atipratāraṇamātram yathā hi [ghaṭo 'yaṃ] iti ghaṭamātrapravaṇaiva saṃvit evaṃ asmatprayogasaṃbhede 'pi [ghaṭam ahaṃ jānāmi] ity atra ghaṭapravaṇaiva buddhiḥ //
analyzed: anyatra tu śuddha viṣaya grahaṇam eva bhavati ghaṭaḥ yaṃ iti tat etat api saralam ati pratāraṇa mātram yathā hi ghaṭaḥ yaṃ iti ghaṭa mātra pravaṇā eva saṃvid evam asmad prayoga saṃbhede ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti atra ghaṭa pravaṇā eva buddhiḥ

original: iyāṃs tu viśeṣaḥ pūrvaṃ kevalaṃ ghaṭagrahaṇaṃ adhunā tu jñānaviśiṣṭaghaṭāvamarśa iti //
analyzed: iyān tu viśeṣaḥ pūrvam kevalam ghaṭa grahaṇam adhunā tu jñāna viśiṣṭa ghaṭa avamarśaḥ iti

original: nanu vibhajyamānāyāṃ pratītau [ghaṭo 'yaṃ] iti tāvat viṣayagrahaṇam /
analyzed: nanu vibhajyamānāyām pratītau ghaṭaḥ iti tāvat viṣaya grahaṇam

original: [jānāmi] iti tu jñānagrahaṇam api bhavatu nāma /
analyzed: jānāmi iti tu jñāna grahaṇam api bhavatu nāma

original: aham iti tu kasya grahaṇam na caikasyām eva pratītau aṃśavibhāgeva prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyaṃ ca vaktuṃ yuktam ghaṭam iti jānāmīti ca pramāṇaṃ aham iti tu na pramāṇam iti /
analyzed: aham iti tu kasya grahaṇam na ca ekasyām eva pratītau aṃśa vibhāgā iva prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam ca vaktum yuktam ghaṭam iti jānāmi iti ca pramāṇam aham iti tu na pramāṇam iti

original: tasmād atra jñātur avabhāso 'bhyupeyaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt atra jñātuḥ avabhāsaḥ bhyupeyaḥ

original: uktam atra naikasyāṃ pratītāv ātmanaḥ kartṛtā karmatā ca syātām iti //
analyzed: uktam atra na ekasyām pratītau ātmanaḥ kartṛ tā karma tā ca syātām iti

original: yas tūpādhis tvayonnetum upakrāntaḥ so 'yaṃ na ghaṭate ghaṭapravaṇatvāt /
analyzed: yaḥ tu upādhiḥ tvayā unnetum upakrāntaḥ saḥ yam na ghaṭate ghaṭa pravaṇa tvāt

original: [ghaṭaṃ ahaṃ jānāmi] iti pratīter vibhajyamānatve 'pi ghaṭam iti jānāmīti ca aṃśadvayaṃ viṣayaniṣṭham eva jātam /
analyzed: ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti pratīteḥ vibhajyamāna tve pi ghaṭam iti jānāmi iti ca aṃśa dvayam viṣaya niṣṭham eva jātam

original: aham iti tu ayam aṃśaḥ yady ātmaviṣaya iṣyate tarhi sa eva tu śuddho 'vaśiṣyate grāhyo grāhakaś ceti /
analyzed: aham iti tu ayam aṃśaḥ yadi ātma viṣayaḥ iṣyate tarhi saḥ eva tu śuddhaḥ grāhyaḥ grāhakaḥ ca iti

original: nāvasthākṛtas tadbhedaḥ samarthitaḥ syāt /
analyzed: na avasthā kṛtaḥ tad bhedaḥ samarthitaḥ syāt

original: bhedābhāvena caikasyaiva grāhyagrāhakabhāvam anupādhikam abhidadhatā vijñānavādavartma saṃśritaṃ syāt /
analyzed: bheda abhāvena ca ekasya eva grāhya grāhaka bhāvam an upādhikam abhidadhatā vijñāna vāda vartma saṃśritam syāt

original: tasmād ahaṃ pratyayasya grāhakādibhinnaṃ gāhyaṃ abhidhitsatā śarīram eva grāhyam abhyupagantavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt aham pratyayasya grāhaka ādi bhinnam gāhyam abhidhitsatā śarīram eva grāhyam abhyupagantavyam

original: jñānasāmānādhikaraṇyānupapatteś ca varam asya mithyātvam astu nāmātmāvalambanatā //
analyzed: jñāna sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapatteḥ ca varam asya mithyātvam astu nāma ātma avalambana tā

original: ata eva kṛśaśyāmasāmānādhikaraṇyadhīḥ /
analyzed: atas eva kṛśa śyāma sāmānādhikaraṇya dhīḥ

original: śarīralālambanatvasya sākṣiṇī na virotsyate //
analyzed: sākṣiṇī na virotsyate

original: nanu [mamedaṃ śarīraṃ] iti bhedapratibhāsāt katham ahaṃ pratyayaḥ śarīrālambanaḥ syāt bhoḥ sādho naivaṃ vidheṣu viśvasitum arhati /
analyzed: nanu mama idam śarīram iti bheda pratibhāsāt katham aham pratyayaḥ śarīra ālambanaḥ syāt bhoḥ sādho na evam vidheṣu viśvasitum arhati

original: [mamātmā] ity api bhedapratyayadarśanāt //
analyzed: mama ātmā iti api bheda pratyaya darśanāt

original: athāvasthābhedādinā yathā tathā taśamarthanam āsthīyate tad iha śarīrālambanatve 'pi saiva saraṇir anusariṣyate /
analyzed: atha avasthā bheda ādinā yathā tathā āsthīyate tat iha śarīra ālambana tve sā eva saraṇiḥ anusariṣyate

original: tasmāt ahaṃpratyayaḥ śarīrālambana eveti sa ca jñānādisamānādhikaraṇo mithyā sthūlādisamānādhikaraṇas tu samyag iti //
analyzed: tasmāt ahaṃpratyayaḥ śarīra ālambanaḥ eva iti sa ca jñāna ādi samāna adhikaraṇaḥ mithyā sthūla ādi samāna adhikaraṇaḥ tu samyak iti

original: ye tu [mama śarīraṃ] [mamātmā] iti buddhī te dve api mithyā mamapratyayasyāhaṃpratyayavat ātmānālambanatvāt śarīre ca bhedānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: ye tu mama śarīram mama ātmā iti buddhī te dve api mithyā mamapratyayasya ahaṃpratyaya vat ātma anālambana tvāt śarīre ca bheda anupapatteḥ

original: mama pāṇir bhujo veti bhinnatvād upapadyate /
analyzed: mama pāṇiḥ bhujaḥ vā iti bhinna tvāt upapadyate

original: śarīraṃ tu mamety eṣā kalpanā rāhumūrdhavat //
analyzed: śarīram tu mama iti eṣā kalpanā rāhu mūrdha vat

original: tasmād ahaṃkāramamakārayoḥ dvayor apy aviṣayatvāt ātmā parokṣa iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt ahaṃkāra mamakārayoḥ dvayoḥ api aviṣaya tvāt ātmā parokṣaḥ iti siddham

original: apare puna āhuḥ na grāhyagrāhakarūpobhayasaṃpatter ekasya karmatvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ca yugapad ātmano manyāmahe kintu citiśaktisvabhāvam aparasādhanam aparokṣam ātmatattvaṃ pacakṣamahe /
analyzed: apare punar āhuḥ na grāhya grāhaka rūpa ubhaya saṃpatteḥ ekasya karma tvam kartṛ tvam ca yugapad ātmanaḥ manyāmahe kintu citi śakti svabhāvam apara sādhanam aparokṣam ātma tattvam

original: na hy ātmā 'nyajanyena jñānena ghaṭādir iva prakāśyate api tu svata eva prakāśyate /
analyzed: na hi ātmā nya janyena jñānena ghaṭa ādiḥ iva prakāśyate api tu svatas eva prakāśyate

original: cetanatvam api tasya naisargikam eva na karaṇopanītacitiyoganibandhanam /
analyzed: cetana tvam api tasya naisargikam eva na karaṇa upanīta citi yoga nibandhanam

original: cidyogad dhi cetanatve ghaṭādāv api tatprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: cit yogat hi cetana tve ghaṭa ādau api tad prasaṅgaḥ

original: na cāsti niyamahetuḥ anekakārakanikaraparighaṭitatanur api citir ātmānam eva jñātāraṃ karoti na kārakāntaram iti /
analyzed: na ca asti niyama hetuḥ aneka kāraka nikara parighaṭita tanuḥ api citiḥ ātmānam eva jñātāram karoti na kāraka antaram iti

original: tasmāt svata eva citsvabhavatā tasya bhadrikā /
analyzed: tasmāt svatas eva cit svabhavatā tasya bhadrikā

original: tad idam ātmaprakāśanaṃ saṃvidvad avagantavyam /
analyzed: tat idam ātma prakāśanam saṃvid vat avagantavyam

original: yad āhuḥ saṃvit saṃvittayaiva saṃvedyate na saṃvedyatayeti /
analyzed: yat āhuḥ saṃvid saṃvid tayā eva saṃvedyate na saṃvedya tayā iti

original: nāsyāḥ karmabhāvo vidyata ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: na asyāḥ karma bhāvaḥ vidyate iti arthaḥ

original: evam ātmā grāhakatayaiva prakāśyate na grāhyatayeti tadvairupyasya codanam anupapannam iti //
analyzed: evam ātmā grāhaka tayā eva prakāśyate na grāhya tayā iti tad vairupyasya codanam anupapannam iti

original: etad api na caturaśram aparasādhanam iti ko 'rthaḥ upāyāntaranirapekṣam eva prakāśamānam ātmatattvam āsta iti tad ayuktam akaraṇikāyāḥ pratīter adṛṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: etat api na caturaśram apara sādhanam iti kaḥ rthaḥ upāya antara nirapekṣam eva prakāśamānam ātma tattvam āste iti tat ayuktam a karaṇikāyāḥ pratīteḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt

original: apūrvaṃ ca tat kim api yathābhyupagatapramāṇātiriktam eva pramāṇaṃ syāt /
analyzed: apūrvam ca tat kim api yathā abhyupagata pramāṇa atiriktam eva pramāṇam syāt

original: na ca niyamakāraṇam atra paśyāmaḥ tathā prakāśamānaḥ sva evātmā prakāśate na parātmeti /
analyzed: na ca niyama kāraṇam atra paśyāmaḥ tathā prakāśamānaḥ svaḥ eva ātmā prakāśate na parātmā iti

original: prakāśamānatvena cātmano nūnam anubhūyamānatā vācyā /
analyzed: prakāśamāna tvena ca ātmanaḥ nūnam anubhūyamāna tā vācyā

original: anubhūyamānatā ca anubhavakarmatvam itarathā 'syāḥ pratyakṣataiva na syāt //
analyzed: anubhūyamāna tā ca anubhava karma tvam itarathā syāḥ pratyakṣa tā eva na syāt

original: athocyate na pratyakṣa ātmā kin tv aparokṣa iti nedam arthāntaravacanam /
analyzed: atha ucyate na pratyakṣaḥ ātmā kin tu aparokṣaḥ iti na idam artha antara vacanam

original: śiśava evaṃ pratāryante na prāmāṇikāḥ /
analyzed: śiśavaḥ evam pratāryante na prāmāṇikāḥ

original: pratyakṣaś ca na bhavati aparokṣaś ca bhavatīti citram //
analyzed: pratyakṣaḥ ca na bhavati aparokṣaḥ ca bhavati iti citram

original: pratyakṣajñānakarmatvam asya nāstīti cet tarhy aparokṣatvam api mā bhūt /
analyzed: pratyakṣa jñāna karma tvam asya na asti iti ced tarhi aparokṣa tvam api mā bhūt

original: prakāśatvād aparokṣatvam iti cet na dīpādeḥ prakāśasyāpy andhādibhir agṛhyamāṇasya prakāśamānatvāyogāt /
analyzed: prakāśa tvāt aparokṣa tvam iti ced na dīpa ādeḥ prakāśasya api andha ādibhiḥ agṛhyamāṇasya prakāśamāna tva ayogāt

original: tasmāt prakāśate ced ātmā nūnam anubhūyetāpīti balāt karmatvam aparihāryam /
analyzed: tasmāt prakāśate ced ātmā nūnam anubhūyeta api iti balāt karma tvam aparihāryam

original: ataś ca tadavasthaiva dvairūpyacodanā //
analyzed: atas ca tad avasthā eva dvairūpya codanā

original: prakāśajñānapakṣaṃ ca pratikṣepsyāmaḥ /
analyzed: prakāśa jñāna pakṣam ca pratikṣepsyāmaḥ

original: sa cātmany api tulyo nyayaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ātmani api tulyaḥ nyayaḥ

original: kalpanād vairūpyaṃ ca bhavatāṃ ātmā ca svaprakāśaḥ saṃvic ca svaprakāśeti /
analyzed: kalpanāt vairūpyam ca bhavatām ātmā ca sva prakāśaḥ saṃvid ca sva prakāśā iti

original: na ca nipuṇamatir api vivekam īdṛśam upadarśayituṃ śaknoti bhavān iyaṃ svaprakāśā phalarūpā saṃvit ayaṃ svaprakāśo jñātṛrūpa ātmeti /
analyzed: na ca nipuṇa matiḥ api vivekam īdṛśam upadarśayitum śaknoti bhavān iyam sva prakāśā phala rūpā saṃvid ayam sva prakāśaḥ jñātṛ rūpaḥ ātmā iti

original: citraṃ cedaṃ yat tayoḥ dvayoḥ prakāśayor antarāle tadvyāpāraḥ parokṣaḥ jñānākhyaḥ saṃpannaḥ iti //
analyzed: citram ca idam yat tayoḥ dvayoḥ prakāśayoḥ antarāle tad vyāpāraḥ parokṣaḥ jñāna ākhyaḥ saṃpannaḥ iti

original: nanu [ghaṭam ahaṃ jānāmi] ity atra trayapratibhāsaḥ [ghaṭaṃ] iti viṣayaḥ prakāśate [ahaṃ] ity ātmā [jānāmi] iti saṃvid iti //
analyzed: nanu ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti atra traya pratibhāsaḥ ghaṭam iti viṣayaḥ prakāśate aham iti ātmā jānāmi iti saṃvid iti

original: uktam atra [ghaṭaṃ jānāmi] iti jñānaviśeṣaṇaviṣayapratibhāsaḥ /
analyzed: uktam atra ghaṭam jānāmi iti jñāna viśeṣaṇa viṣaya pratibhāsaḥ

original: [aham] iti tu śarīre jñātṛtvabhramaḥ ekasyātmanaḥ grāhyagrāhakabhāvānupapatter iti //
analyzed: aham iti tu śarīre jñātṛ tva bhramaḥ ekasya ātmanaḥ grāhya grāhaka bhāva anupapatteḥ iti

original: yad api svataś cetanasvabhāvatvam ātmanaḥ kalpyate tad api na sopapattikam //
analyzed: yat api svatas cetana svabhāva tvam ātmanaḥ kalpyate tat api na sa upapattikam

original: sacetanaś citā yogāt tadyogena vinā jaḍaḥ /
analyzed: sa cetanaḥ citā yogāt tad yogena vinā jaḍaḥ

original: nārthāvabhāsād anyad dhi caitanyaṃ nāma manmahe //
analyzed: na artha avabhāsāt anyat hi caitanyam nāma manmahe

original: yadi ca svata evārthāvabhāsasāmarthyam ātmanaḥ tat kimindriyaiḥ prayojanam manaṣṣaṣṭair indriyanirapekṣapadārthaparicchedasāmarthyapakṣe ca sarvasarvajñatāpattiḥ /
analyzed: yadi ca svatas eva artha avabhāsa sāmarthyam ātmanaḥ tat kim indriyaiḥ prayojanam manaḥ ṣaṣṭaiḥ indriya nirapekṣa padārtha pariccheda sāmarthya pakṣe ca sarva sarvajña tā āpattiḥ

original: ato 'vaśyaṃ jñānasamavāyinibandhanam evātmanaś cetayitṛtvam //
analyzed: atas vaśyam jñāna samavāyi nibandhanam eva ātmanaḥ cetayitṛ tvam

original: na ca ghaṭādibhir atiprasaṅgaḥ āśaṅkanīyaḥ /
analyzed: na ca ghaṭa ādibhiḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ āśaṅkanīyaḥ

original: padārthasvabhāvopanatasyaiva kriyāvaicitryasya sarvalokaprasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: padārtha svabhāva upanatasya eva kriyā vaicitryasya sarva loka prasiddha tvāt

original: cetanādikriyāḥ karmasamavāyinyo na bhavanti /
analyzed: cetanā ādi kriyāḥ karma samavāyinyaḥ na bhavanti

original: gamanādikriyās tu kartṛsamavāyinyaḥ /
analyzed: gamana ādi kriyāḥ tu kartṛ samavāyinyaḥ

original: tad iyaṃ jñānakriyā 'pi kartṛsamavāyiny eva /
analyzed: tat iyam jñāna kriyā pi kartṛ samavāyinī eva

original: na ca vastuśaktir anuyojyā bhavati //
analyzed: na ca vastu śaktiḥ anuyojyā bhavati

original: na jaḍatvāviśeṣe 'pi karmādau samavaiti cit /
analyzed: na jaḍa tva aviśeṣe pi karma ādau samavaiti cit

original: na dravyatvāviśeṣe 'pi gandhaḥ spṛśati pāvakam //
analyzed: na dravya tva aviśeṣe gandhaḥ spṛśati pāvakam

original: tasmān na pratyakṣa ātmā nāpi svataś cetayiteti sthitam //
analyzed: tasmāt na pratyakṣaḥ ātmā na api svatas cetayitā iti sthitam

original: svayūthyās tu kecid ācakṣate yady ekasya kartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ cānupapannam ity apratyakṣa ātmā iṣyate tad ayam anumānenāpi kathaṃ grahīṣyate ātmānam ātmanā ''tmaiva liṅgād anuminoti hi /
analyzed: sva yūthyāḥ tu kecid ācakṣate yadi ekasya kartṛ tvam karma tvam ca anupapannam iti apratyakṣaḥ ātmā iṣyate tat ayam anumānena api katham grahīṣyate ātmānam ātmanā tmā eva liṅgāt anuminoti hi

original: tatra nūnam upetavyā kartṛtā karmatā 'sya ca //
analyzed: tatra nūnam upetavyā kartṛ tā karma tā sya ca

original: tatrānumānajñānasya yathā ''tmā yāti karmatāṃ /
analyzed: tatra anumāna jñānasya yathā tmā yāti karma tām

original: tathā 'haṃpratyayasyaiṣaḥ pratyakṣasyāpi gcchatu //
analyzed: tathā haṃpratyayasya eṣaḥ pratyakṣasya api gcchatu

original: dehādivyatiriktaś ca yathā liṅgena gamyate /
analyzed: deha ādi vyatiriktaḥ ca yathā liṅgena gamyate

original: tathā 'haṃpratyayenāpi gamyatāṃ tadvilakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: tathā haṃpratyayena api gamyatām tad vilakṣaṇaḥ

original: nanu ātmanaḥ kiṃ rūpaṃ yat pratyakṣeṇa sākṣātkriyate yady evaṃ sukhāder api kiṃ rūpaṃ yan mānasapratykṣasamadhigamyam iṣyate //
analyzed: nanu ātmanaḥ kim rūpam yat pratyakṣeṇa sākṣātkriyate yadi evam sukha ādeḥ api kim rūpam yat mānasa pratikṣa samadhigamyam iṣyate

original: nanu ānandādisvabhāvaṃ prasiddham eva sukhādeḥ tarhi tadādharatvam ātmano 'pi rūpam avagacchatu bhavān //
analyzed: nanu ānanda ādi svabhāvam prasiddham eva sukha ādeḥ tarhi rūpam avagacchatu bhavān

original: sukhādi cetyamānaṃ hi svatantraṃ nanu bhūyate /
analyzed: sukha ādi cetyamānam hi svatantram nanu bhūyate

original: matubarthānuvedhāt tu siddhaṃ grahaṇam ātmanaḥ //
analyzed: matup artha anuvedhāt tu siddham grahaṇam ātmanaḥ

original: idaṃ sukham iti jñānaṃ dṛśyate na ghaṭādivat /
analyzed: idam sukham iti jñānam dṛśyate na ghaṭa ādi vat

original: ahaṃ sukhīti tu jñaptiḥ ātmano 'pi prakāśikā //
analyzed: aham sukhī iti tu jñaptiḥ

original: api ca jñātṛjñānaviśiṣṭārthagrahaṇaṃ kila bhāṣyakṛt /
analyzed: api ca jñātṛ jñāna viśiṣṭa artha grahaṇam kila bhāṣyakṛt

original: svayaṃ prādīdṛśat tac ca kiṃ vā yuktam upekṣitum //
analyzed: svayam prādīdṛśat tat ca kim vā yuktam upekṣitum

original: viśeṣyabuddhim icchanti nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇām /
analyzed: viśeṣya buddhim icchanti na agṛhīta viśeṣaṇām

original: pūrvaṃ cānanubhūtasya smaraṇaṃ nāvakalpate //
analyzed: pūrvam ca ananubhūtasya smaraṇam na avakalpate

original: na cānumānataḥ pūrvaṃ jñātvā ''tmānaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: na ca anumānataḥ pūrvam jñātvā tmānam viśeṣaṇam

original: tadviśiṣṭārthabuddhiḥ syāt kramasyānavadhāraṇāt //
analyzed: tad viśiṣṭa artha buddhiḥ syāt kramasya anavadhāraṇāt

original: tasmāt pratyakṣa ātmā //
analyzed: tasmāt pratyakṣaḥ ātmā

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca smaraṇānubhavādiṣu /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca smaraṇa anubhava ādiṣu

original: anusandhīyamānaṃ yad dṛśyate tat kathaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: anusandhīyamānam yat dṛśyate tat katham bhavet

original: [pūrvaṃ aham amum artham anubhūtavān aham evādya punar anubhavāmi] iti tulyaviṣayaṃ tāvat /
analyzed: pūrvam aham amum artham anubhūtavān aham eva adya punar anubhavāmi iti tulya viṣayam tāvat

original: tulyakartṛkatā 'pi tatra prakāśate itarathā tv anumātum apy ātmā na śakyeta //
analyzed: tulya kartṛka tā tatra prakāśate itarathā tu anumātum api ātmā na śakyeta

original: jñānecchāsukhaduḥkhādi kiledaṃ liṅgam ātmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: jñāna icchā sukha duḥkha ādi kila idam liṅgam ātmaṇaḥ

original: ekāśrayatayā jñātaṃ anusandhātṛbodhakam //
analyzed: eka āśraya tayā jñātam anusandhātṛ bodhakam

original: tathātvena ca tadjñānaṃ āśrayajñānapūrvakam /
analyzed: tathātvena ca tat jñānam āśraya jñāna pūrvakam

original: jñāte tatrāphalaṃ liṅgaṃ ajñāte tu na liṅgatā //
analyzed: jñāte tatra aphalam liṅgam ajñāte tu na liṅga tā

original: tasmāt pratyakṣa evātmā varam abhyupagamyatām /
analyzed: tasmāt pratyakṣaḥ eva ātmā varam abhyupagamyatām

original: vṛddhāgamānusāreṇa saṃvidālokanena ca //
analyzed: vṛddha āgama anusāreṇa saṃvid ālokanena ca

original: atha vā 'bhiniveśena kim anena prayojanam /
analyzed: atha vā bhiniveśena kim anena prayojanam

original: anumeyatvam evāstu liṅgenecchādinā ''tmanaḥ //
analyzed: anumeya tvam eva astu liṅgena icchā ādinā tmanaḥ

original: tad āha sūtrakāraḥ īcchādveṣaprayatnasukhaduḥkhajñānāny ātmano liṅgam //1.1.10//
analyzed: tat āha sūtrakāraḥ īcchā dveṣa prayatna sukha duḥkha jñānāni ātmanaḥ liṅgam

original: icchā nāma tāvad ittham upajayate yaj jātīyam artham upayujānaḥ puruṣaḥ purā sukham anubhūtavān punaḥ kālāntare taj jātīyam artham upalabhya sukhasādhanatām anusmṛtya tad ādātum icchati /
analyzed: icchā nāma tāvat ittham upajayate yad jātīyam artham upayujānaḥ puruṣaḥ purā sukham anubhūtavān punar kāla antare tat jātīyam artham upalabhya sukha sādhanatām anusmṛtya tat ādātum icchati

original: seyam anena krameṇa samupajāyamānecchā pūrvāparānusandhānasamartham āśrayam anumāpayati kāryasya nirādhārasyānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: sā iyam anena krameṇa samupajāyamānā icchā pūrva apara anusandhāna samartham āśrayam anumāpayati kāryasya nirādhārasya anupapatteḥ

original: āśrayamātrapratītau cāym anvayavyatirekavāneva hetur bhavati /
analyzed: āśraya mātra pratītau ca āym anvaya vyatirekavān eva hetuḥ bhavati

original: icchā dharmiṇī āśriteti sādhyo dharmaḥ kāryatvāt ghaṭādivat guṇatvāt rūpādivat iti vā hetur vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: icchā dharmiṇī āśritā iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ kārya tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat guṇa tvāt rūpa ādi vat iti vā hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: guṇatvaṃ cecchādīnāṃ acākṣuṣapratyakṣatvādinā rasādivad darśitam ācāryaiḥ //
analyzed: guṇa tvam ca icchā ādīnām acākṣuṣa pratyakṣa tva ādinā rasa ādi vat darśitam ācāryaiḥ

original: evam anvayavyatirekavatā 'munā hetunā adhiṣṭhānamātre 'numite tadadhiṣṭhānatve ca dehendriyādau prasakte pūrvānubhūtasukhasādhanatvānusandhānasavyapekṣatadutpādanaparyālocanayā tatkāryasamānakartṛkatvāvagamāt śarīrādipratiṣedhe sati sa eva kevalavyatirekibhavane tu viśiṣṭam āśrayam anumāpayati /
analyzed: evam anvaya vyatirekavatā munā hetunā adhiṣṭhāna mātre numite tad adhiṣṭhāna tve ca deha indriya ādau prasakte pūrva anubhūta sukha sādhanatva anusandhāna savyapekṣa tad utpādana paryālocanayā tad kārya samāna kartṛka tva avagamāt śarīra ādi pratiṣedhe sati saḥ eva kevala vyatireki bhavane tu viśiṣṭam āśrayam anumāpayati

original: icchāśarīrādivilakṣaṇāśrayā śarīrādiṣu bādhakopapattau satyāṃ kāryatvāt /
analyzed: icchā śarīra ādi vilakṣaṇa āśrayā śarīra ādiṣu bādhaka upapattau satyām kārya tvāt

original: atra ca sādharmyadṛṣṭānto na saṃbhavatīti vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ pradarśyate /
analyzed: atra ca sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ na saṃbhavati iti vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ pradarśyate

original: sa ca ghaṭa eva /
analyzed: sa ca ghaṭaḥ eva

original: yo 'bhūt sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ kāryatve nirviśeṣaṇe 'pi ghaṭaḥ sa eva vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ saviśeṣaṇe /
analyzed: yaḥ bhūt sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ kārya tve nirviśeṣaṇe ghaṭaḥ saḥ eva vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa viśeṣaṇe

original: yatra vilakṣaṇāśritatvaṃ nāsti tatra saviśeṣaṇaṃ kāryatvam api nāsti yathā ghaṭādāv iti na na śakyate vaktum /
analyzed: yatra vilakṣaṇa āśrita tvam nā asti tatra sa viśeṣaṇam kāryatvam api nā asti yathā ghaṭa ādau iti na na śakyate vaktum

original: tatra kāryatvamātrayoge 'pi saviśeṣaṇānāṃ kāryatvābhāvāt vilakṣaṇāśritatvam api tatra nāsti bhūtāśritatvena pratyakṣam upalabhyamānatvāt //
analyzed: tatra kārya tva mātra yoge sa viśeṣaṇānām kārya tva abhāvāt vilakṣaṇa āśrita tvam api tatra na asti bhūta āśrita tvena pratyakṣam upalabhyamāna tvāt

original: nanu cānvayadarśanam antareṇa kevalo vyatirekaḥ pratīyamānaḥ saṃdigdho bhavati kiṃ tatsādhyābhāvakṛtaiva tasya tasmād vyāvṛttiḥ uta nimittāntarakṛtā iti /
analyzed: nanu ca anvaya darśanam antareṇa kevalaḥ vyatirekaḥ pratīyamānaḥ saṃdigdhaḥ bhavati kim tad sādhya abhāva kṛtā eva tasya tasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ uta nimitta antara kṛtā iti

original: sandigdhavyatirekasya hetor agamakatvaṃ niścitavyabhicārahetuvad iti tārkikāḥ ucyate syād etad evam yadi prathamam anavagatānvaya eva kevalavyatirekaśaraṇo hetuḥ prayujyeta /
analyzed: sandigdha vyatirekasya hetoḥ agamaka tvam niścita vyabhicāra hetu vat iti tārkikāḥ ucyate syāt etat evam yadi prathamam anavagata anvayaḥ eva kevala vyatireka śaraṇaḥ hetuḥ prayujyeta

original: yatra tv anvayavyatirekavāneva hetuḥ kaṃcana viśeṣam āśritya kevalavyatirekitām avalambate tatra na sandigdhavyatirekatā 'vakāśaṃ labhate /
analyzed: yatra tu anvaya vyatirekavān eva hetuḥ kaṃcana viśeṣam āśritya kevala vyatireki tām avalambate tatra na sandigdha vyatireka tā vakāśam labhate

original: ghaṭo hi bhūtalāśritatvena pratyakṣam upalabhyate /
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ hi bhū tala āśrita tvena pratyakṣam upalabhyate

original: tad asya vilakṣaṇāśrayavirahād eva saviśeṣaṇahetuśūnyatā jātā nirviśeṣaṇāvasthāyāṃ tadyogadarśanād iti na sandigdho vyatirekaḥ //
analyzed: tat asya vilakṣaṇa āśraya virahāt eva sa viśeṣaṇa hetu śūnyatā jātā nirviśeṣaṇa avasthāyām tad yoga darśanāt iti na sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ

original: atha vā śarīratvaṃ sāmānyam iha vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntīkartavyam /
analyzed: atha vā śarīra tvam sāmānyam iha vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntīkartavyam

original: tatra hi sarvātmanā kāryatvasya śaṅkā 'pi nāsti /
analyzed: tatra hi sarvātmanā kārya tvasya śaṅkā pi nā asti

original: na ca tadvilakṣaṇāśritam śarīrāśritatvasya pratyakṣam upalambhād iti //
analyzed: na ca tad vilakṣaṇa āśritam śarīra āśrita tvasya pratyakṣam upalambhāt iti

original: tad iyam icchā prathamapadārthadarśanādikāryasamānakartṛkatayā 'vagamyamānā śarīrādivilakṣaṇām āśrayam avagamayati saviśeṣaṇāt kāryatvād iti sthitam /
analyzed: tat iyam icchā prathama padārtha darśana ādi kārya samāna kartṛkatayā avagamyamānā śarīra ādi vilakṣaṇām āśrayam avagamayati sa viśeṣaṇāt kārya tvāt iti sthitam

original: yaś ca sa vilakṣaṇa āśrayaḥ tatrā ''tmasaṃjñā 'gamikī //
analyzed: yaḥ ca sa vilakṣaṇaḥ āśrayaḥ tatra ātma saṃjñā gamikī

original: evam eva dveṣāder ātmaliṅgatā vaktavyā //
analyzed: evam eva dveṣa ādeḥ ātma liṅga tā vaktavyā

original: yajjātīyasyārthasya sannidhānād duḥkham anubhūtavān puruṣaḥ tajjātīyam arthaṃ punar upalabhamāno duḥkhasādhanatām anusandhāya tat dveṣṭīti /
analyzed: yad jātīyasya arthasya sannidhānāt duḥkham anubhūtavān puruṣaḥ tad jātīyam artham punar upalabhamānaḥ duḥkha sādhanatām anusandhāya tat dveṣṭi iti

original: so 'pi pratisandhātāram ekam antareṇa nopapadyate //
analyzed: saḥ pi pratisandhātāram ekam antareṇa na upapadyate

original: ābhyām icchādveṣābhyām anantaraṃ prayatnaḥ samutpadyate /
analyzed: ābhyām icchā dveṣābhyām anantaram prayatnaḥ samutpadyate

original: so 'pi yathoktena krameṇānusandhānapūrvaka eva /
analyzed: saḥ pi yathā uktena krameṇa anusandhāna pūrvakaḥ eva

original: prayatamānasya sukhaduḥkhe bhavataḥ /
analyzed: prayatamānasya sukha duḥkhe bhavataḥ

original: te api tathaiva draṣṭavye //
analyzed: te api tathā eva draṣṭavye

original: jñānaṃ tu yady api prathamam anusandhānanirapekṣam api bhavati /
analyzed: jñānam tu yadi api prathamam anusandhāna nirapekṣam api bhavati

original: tad api ca śakyata evātmaliṅgam abhidhātum tathāpy anusandhānapūrvecchādikāryaprakaraṇāt nirṇayātmakam eva jñānam udāhartavyam /
analyzed: tat api ca śakyate eva ātma liṅgam abhidhātum tathā api anusandhāna pūrva icchā ādi kārya prakaraṇāt nirṇaya ātmakam eva jñānam udāhartavyam

original: tatra hi bubhutsāvimarśādipūrvakatvam upalabdham iti tad ekakartṛkatvam upakalpyate /
analyzed: tatra hi bubhutsā vimarśa ādi pūrvakatvam upalabdham iti tat eka kartṛkatvam upakalpyate

original: tad evam icchādīny ātmaliṅgānīti sthitam //
analyzed: tat evam icchā ādīni ātma liṅgāni iti sthitam

original: śāstre cānekahetūktiḥ na doṣāya kathāsv iva /
analyzed: śāstre ca aneka hetu uktiḥ na doṣāya kathāsu iva

original: śiṣyaḥ kaścit kvacit kiñcit anusmṛtyābhidhāsyati //
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ kaścid kvacid kiñcid anusmṛtya abhidhāsyati

original: iti kāruṇīko hi munir anekam iha hetumārgam upadiṣṭavān //
analyzed: iti kāruṇīkaḥ hi muniḥ anekam iha hetu mārgam upadiṣṭavān

original: nanu atra coditaṃ anusandhātāram antareṇa tad etad icchādi kārya nāvakalpata iti kathaṃ jñayate /
analyzed: nanu atra coditam anusandhātāram antareṇa tat etat icchā ādi kārya na avakalpate iti katham jñayate

original: ekatra pramātari taddarśanād iti yad ucyate tad idam ekapramātṛgrahaṇād ātmapratyakṣatvam aṅgīkṛtaṃ syāt iti vyartham anumānam /
analyzed: ekatra pramātari tad darśanāt iti yat ucyate tat idam eka pramātṛ grahaṇāt ātma pratyakṣa tvam aṅgīkṛtam syāt iti vyartham anumānam

original: agrahaṇe tu pramātur ekasya tatpūrvakatvenecchādeḥ pratibandhāgrahaṇād aśakyam anumānam iti parihṛtam etat kāryatvenaiva liṅgatvam icchāder upavarṇitam asmābhiḥ na smaraṇādisamānādhāratayeti //
analyzed: agrahaṇe tu pramātuḥ ekasya tad pūrvaka tvena icchā ādeḥ pratibandha agrahaṇāt aśakyam anumānam iti parihṛtam etat kārya tvena eva liṅga tvam icchā ādeḥ upavarṇitam asmābhiḥ na smaraṇa ādi samāna ādhāra tayā iti

original: kim arthas tarhi pratisandhānopanyāsaḥ śarīrādiṣu tadāśrayatvapratiṣedhārthaḥ /
analyzed: kim arthaḥ tarhi pratisandhāna upanyāsaḥ śarīra ādiṣu tad āśraya tva pratiṣedha arthaḥ

original: na tv evaṃ vyākhyātavanto vayam ekasya pramātuḥ icchādikāryāśrayatvadarśanāt ekāśrayatvānumānam iti /
analyzed: na tu evam vyākhyātavantaḥ vayam ekasya pramātuḥ icchā ādi kārya āśraya tva darśanāt eka āśraya tva anumānam iti

original: tasmān na doṣaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na doṣaḥ

original: nanu kathaṃ na doṣaḥ śarīrādyāśrayatvapratiṣedhasādhane 'pi hetor vyāpti grahaṇāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: nanu katham na doṣaḥ śarīra ādi āśraya tva pratiṣedha sādhane hetoḥ vyāpti grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt

original: yāvad dhi darśanasmaśṇecchādi kāryajātam ekapramātṛniyatatayā 'navadhāritaṃ tāvat katham asmad avasthābhiḥ na śarīrādyāśrayatvaniṣedhasya tatpūrvakasya caikātmāśritatvasya siddhiḥ //
analyzed: yāvat hi darśana smaśṇa icchā ādi kārya jātam eka pramātṛ niyata tayā navadhāritam tāvat katham asmat avasthābhiḥ na śarīra ādi āśraya tva niṣedhasya tad pūrvakasya ca eka ātma āśrita tvasya siddhiḥ

original: ka evam āha na gṛhītam ekakartṛkatayā kāryam icchādīti yadi gṛhītaṃ tarhi vaktavyam kva gṛhītam kena vā pramāṇena gṛhītam iti /
analyzed: kaḥ evam āha na gṛhītam eka kartṛkatayā kāryam icchā ādi iti yadi gṛhītam tarhi vaktavyam kva gṛhītam kena vā pramāṇena gṛhītam iti

original: svātmany eveti cet so 'yaṃ pratyakṣa ātmā bhavet /
analyzed: sva ātmani eva iti ced saḥ yam pratyakṣaḥ ātmā bhavet

original: evam anabhyupagame vā na vyāpti grahaṇam iti //
analyzed: evam anabhyupagame vā na vyāpti grahaṇam iti

original: ucyate na ca pratyakṣa ātmā na ca vyāpter agrahaṇam /
analyzed: ucyate na ca pratyakṣaḥ ātmā na ca vyāpteḥ agrahaṇam

original: na caiva dharmyantre vyāptir gṛhyate /
analyzed: na ca eva dharmi antre vyāptiḥ gṛhyate

original: kin tu svasantāna eva /
analyzed: kim tu sva santāne eva

original: tathāpi na sidhyati pramātṛniyatatānumānam katham iva sidhyati santānāntareṣu ekapramātṛpūrvakatvena pratisandhānasya dṛṣṭatvāt //
analyzed: tathā api na sidhyati pramātṛ niyata tā anumānam katham iva sidhyati santāna antareṣu eka pramātṛ pūrvaka tvena pratisandhānasya dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: nanu ko 'tra vyāptigrahaṇakālaḥ pramāṇānumānavad dhi tadbhedena bhavitavyam /
analyzed: nanu kaḥ tra vyāpti grahaṇa kālaḥ pramāṇa anumāna vat hi tad bhedena bhavitavyam

original: tataḥ kim idaṃ tato bhavati /
analyzed: tatas kim idam tatas bhavati

original: kathaṃ svasantāna eva vyāptir gṛhyatām kathaṃ vā tatraiva pramātṛniyamo 'numīyatām iti /
analyzed: katham sva santāne eva vyāptiḥ gṛhyatām katham vā tatra eva pramātṛ niyamaḥ numīyatām iti

original: seyas ubhayataḥ pāśā rajjuḥ /
analyzed: sā iyas ubhayataḥ pāśā rajjuḥ

original: ātmā vā pratyakṣaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā vā pratyakṣaḥ

original: vyāptir vā duravagameti //
analyzed: vyāptiḥ vā duravagamā iti

original: naitad evam yathā śākyapakṣe sattvāt kṣaṇikatvānumāne vyāptigrahaṇam tathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: na etat evam yathā śākya pakṣe sattvāt kṣaṇika tva anumāne vyāpti grahaṇam tathā iha api bhaviṣyati

original: tatra hi yaiva kramayaugapadyavyāvṛttyā sattvasya nityebhyo vyāvṛttiḥ sa eva kṣaṇikaiḥ anvaya iti dharmyantaranirapekṣatayaiva sadhye 'pi dharmiṇi pratibandhagrahaṇaṃ ca anumānaṃ ca darśitam /
analyzed: tatra hi yā eva krama yaugapadya vyāvṛttyā sattvasya nityebhyaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ saḥ eva kṣaṇikaiḥ anvayaḥ iti dharmi antara nirapekṣa tayā eva dharmiṇi pratibandha grahaṇam ca anumānam ca darśitam

original: tadvad ihāpy ekapramātṛpūrvakatvena pratisandhānasya dharmyantare yady api grahaṇaṃ nāsti /
analyzed: tadvat iha api eka pramātṛ pūrvaka tvena pratisandhānasya dharmi antare yadi api grahaṇam na asti

original: tathāpi santānāntarabhede yad asyādarśanaṃ tad evaikakartṛkatvadarśanam iti ko 'nayor hetutve viśeṣaḥ nanu tatra nityebhyaḥ kramayaugapadyavyāvṛttyā vyāvṛttatvaṃ śakyagrahaṇam /
analyzed: tathā api santāna antara bhede yat asya adarśanam tat eva eka kartṛkatva darśanam iti kaḥ nayoḥ hetu tve viśeṣaḥ nanu tatra nityebhyaḥ krama yaugapadya vyāvṛttyā vyāvṛtta tvam śakya grahaṇam

original: iha tu pramātṛbhedena pratisandhānavyāvṛttir duravagamā /
analyzed: iha tu pramātṛ bhedena pratisandhāna vyāvṛttiḥ duravagamā

original: svasantāne 'pi jñānakṣaṇābhinnā eva pramātāraḥ /
analyzed: sva santāne pi jñāna kṣaṇa abhinnāḥ eva pramātāraḥ

original: na ca tebhyo vyāvṛttaṃ pratisandhānam iti //
analyzed: na ca tebhyaḥ vyāvṛttam pratisandhānam iti

original: tiṣṭhatv anvayaḥ vyatirekamukhenāpi kaṣṭam idam anumānaṃ vartate /
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu anvayaḥ vyatireka mukhena api kaṣṭam idam anumānam vartate

original: svasantāne santānāntaravat pramātṛbhedāgrahaṇāt /
analyzed: sva santāne santāna antara vat pramātṛ bheda agrahaṇāt

original: tadbhedagrahe hi svaparasantānaviveko na syāt /
analyzed: tad bheda grahe hi sva para santāna vivekaḥ na syāt

original: yady evam pramātṛbhedagrahaṇābhāvāt punar apy ātmā pratyakṣa āyātaḥ //
analyzed: yadi evam pramātṛ bheda grahaṇa abhāvāt punar api ātmā pratyakṣaḥ āyātaḥ

original: maivam nātmā pratyakṣaḥ /
analyzed: mā evam na ātmā pratyakṣaḥ

original: pramātṛbhedo hi svasantāne na gṛhyata ity uktam /
analyzed: pramātṛ bhedaḥ hi sva santāne na gṛhyate iti uktam

original: na punas tadaikyaṃ gṛhyate /
analyzed: na punar tad aikyam gṛhyate

original: anyac ca bhedāgrahaṇam anyac ca tadaikyagrahaṇam /
analyzed: anyat ca bheda agrahaṇam anyat ca tad aikya grahaṇam

original: bhedāgrahaṇād eva ca vyāptisiddheḥ na kaṣṭam anumānam //
analyzed: bheda agrahaṇāt eva ca vyāpti siddheḥ na kaṣṭam anumānam

original: nanu ca svasantāne 'pi pramātṛbhedāgrahaṇaṃ kiṃ pramātur ekatvāt uta jñānānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāt iti na niścīyate /
analyzed: nanu ca sva santāne pi pramātṛ bheda agrahaṇam kim pramātuḥ eka tvāt uta jñānānām kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt iti na niścīyate

original: tataś ca saṃdigdho vyatirekaḥ yathā jñānānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo nāsti yathā ca na tatkṛto 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ tathā 'nantaram eva savistaraṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca saṃdigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ yathā jñānānām kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na asti yathā ca na tad kṛtaḥ yam vyavahāraḥ tathā nantaram eva sa vistaram vakṣyāmaḥ

original: tasmād icchādikāryeṇa yuktam ekapramātranumānam //
analyzed: tasmāt icchā ādi kāryeṇa yuktam eka pramātṛ anumānam

original: nanu cāśritam icchādi deha eva bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: nanu ca āśritam icchā ādi dehe eva bhaviṣyati

original: bhūtānām eva caitanyam iti prāha bṛhaspatiḥ //
analyzed: bhūtānām eva caitanyam iti prāha bṛhaspatiḥ

original: uktaṃ ca madaśaktivadnijñānam iti ucyate śarīraṃ tāvan necchāder āśrayaḥ śaiśavayauvanavārdhakādidaśābhedena bhinnatvāt //
analyzed: uktam ca iti ucyate śarīram tāvat na icchā ādeḥ āśrayaḥ śaiśava yauvana vārdhaka ādi daśā bhedena bhinna tvāt

original: tathā hi nānyadṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ smartum anyena śakyate /
analyzed: tathā hi na anya dṛṣṭaḥ rthaḥ smartum anyena śakyate

original: na cānyena smṛte tasmin anyasyecchopajāyate //
analyzed: na ca anyena smṛte tasmin anyasya icchā upajāyate

original: tenādyād arthavijñānāt prakṛtyecchāsamudbhavāt /
analyzed: tena ādyāt artha vijñānāt prakṛtyā icchā samudbhavāt

original: ekasya kāryacakrasya vaktavyaḥ kaścid āśrayaḥ //
analyzed: ekasya kārya cakrasya vaktavyaḥ kaścid āśrayaḥ

original: śarīraṃ ca bālyādyavasthābhedena bhinnam /
analyzed: śarīram ca bālya ādi avasthā bhedena bhinnam

original: atas tasya nāśrayo bhavitum arhati santānāntaravat /
analyzed: atas tasya na āśrayaḥ bhavitum arhati santāna antara vat

original: yathā hi devadattadṛṣṭe 'rthe na yajñādattasya smaraṇaṃ evaṃ bālaśarīrānubhūte yuvaśarīrasya tan na syāt //
analyzed: yathā hi devadatta dṛṣṭe rthe na yajñādattasya smaraṇam evam bāla śarīra anubhūte yuva śarīrasya tat na syāt

original: nanu avasthāmātram eva bhinnam avasthātṛśarīrasvarūpam abhinnam eva pratyabhijñāpratyayaprāmāṇyād avagamyate /
analyzed: nanu avasthā mātram eva bhinnam avasthātṛ śarīra svarūpam abhinnam eva pratyabhijñā pratyaya prāmāṇyāt avagamyate

original: na ceyaṃ pratyabhijñā lūnapunarjātakeśanakhādipratyabhijñāvad anyathāsiddhā vināśisyānupalambhāt /
analyzed: na ca iyam pratyabhijñā lūna punar jāta keśa nakha ādi pratyabhijñā vat anyathā asiddhā vināśi sya anupalambhāt

original: stambhādau hi kṣaṇabhaṅgitvapratiṣedhaḥ pratyabhijñayaiva kariṣyate /
analyzed: stambha ādau hi kṣaṇabhaṅgi tva pratiṣedhaḥ pratyabhijñayā eva kariṣyate

original: sā cehāpi tādṛśyeva tad ayuktam stambhādau nanātvakāraṇāgrahaṇāt /
analyzed: sā ca iha api tādṛśī eva tat ayuktam stambha ādau nanātva kāraṇa agrahaṇāt

original: iha tu rūpapariṇāma sanniveśādyanyatvadarśanāt sādṛśyanibandhaneyaṃ bhrāntir eva pratyabhijñā /
analyzed: iha tu rūpa pariṇāma sanniveśa ādi anyatva darśanāt sādṛśya nibandhanā iyam bhrāntiḥ eva pratyabhijñā

original: na khalu śiśuśarīre taruṇaśarīre jaraccharīre ca tulyam eva parimāṇādy upalabhyate //
analyzed: na khalu śiśu śarīre taruṇa śarīre jarat śarīre ca tulyam eva parimāṇa ādi upalabhyate

original: āhārapariṇāmāc ca dehabhedo 'vagamyate /
analyzed: āhāra pariṇāmāt ca deha bhedaḥ vagamyate

original: pākajotpattimārgeṇa na jīryetānnam anyathā //
analyzed: pāka ja utpatti mārgeṇa na jīryeta annam anyathā

original: na bhavet paripoṣo hi dadhikṣīrādibhakṣaṇe /
analyzed: na bhavet paripoṣaḥ hi dadhi kṣīra ādi bhakṣaṇe

original: kāṃcikādyupayoge ca na dṛśyetāsya raktatā //
analyzed: kāṃcika ādi upayoge ca na dṛśyeta asya rakta tā

original: kṣīṇair avayavaiḥ kaiścit kaiścic cābhinavodgataiḥ /
analyzed: kṣīṇaiḥ avayavaiḥ kaiścid kaiścid ca abhinava udgataiḥ

original: abhinna evāvayavī kathaṃ bhavitum arhati //
analyzed: abhinnaḥ eva avayavī katham bhavitum arhati

original: tathā ca kecit pacyamānasya ghaṭāder api prāgavasthāvisadṛśarūpādiyoginaḥ pākakāraṇabhūtavegavad agnidravyasaṃyogaparyālocanayaiva pralayodayai kalpitavantaḥ //
analyzed: tathā ca kecid pacyamānasya ghaṭa ādeḥ api prāc avasthā visadṛśa rūpa ādi yoginaḥ pāka kāraṇa bhūta vegavat agni dravya saṃyoga paryālocanayā eva pralaya udayaiḥ kalpitavantaḥ

original: yady api kandukanikṣiptā ghaṭādayaḥ tṛṇaparṇādipihitavapuṣo 'pi tadvivaraprasṛtena nayanaraśminā na vinaṣṭā jiy upalabhyantye /
analyzed: yadi api kanduka nikṣiptāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ tṛṇa parṇa ādi pihita vapuṣaḥ tad vivara prasṛtena nayana raśminā na vinaṣṭāḥ upalabhyanti ye

original: yady api tatsaṃkhyā tatparimāṇaḥ tatsanniveśaḥ taddeśāś ca pakvā api dṛśyante yady api patanto na vibhāvyante yady api ca tadā teṣāṃ kartrādikārakakalāpāsaṃbhavāt punar ghaṭanam aghaṭamānam iva lakṣyate tathāpi teṣām anumānena vināśaḥ parikalpyate /
analyzed: yadi api tad saṃkhyā tad parimāṇaḥ tad sanniveśaḥ tad deśāḥ ca pakvāḥ api dṛśyante yadi api patantaḥ na vibhāvyante yadi api ca tadā teṣām kartṛ ādi kāraka kalāpa asaṃbhavāt punar ghaṭanam aghaṭamānam iva lakṣyate tathā api teṣām anumānena vināśaḥ parikalpyate

original: sarvāvayaveṣv antar bahiś ca pākāt pūrvarūpādivilakṣaṇaguṇopalabdheḥ antaḥpraveśaḥ kṛśānor anumīyate /
analyzed: sarva avayaveṣu antar bahis ca pākāt pūrva rūpa ādi vilakṣaṇa guṇa upalabdheḥ antar praveśaḥ kṛśānoḥ anumīyate

original: tena vegavatā vahnidravyeṇa nodanāt abhighātad vā nanu ghaṭādyārambhakeṣv avayaveṣu kriyā jāyate kriyātaḥ vibhāgaḥ vibhāgāt dravyārambhakasaṃyogavināśaḥ tadvināśāt dravyavināśa iti //
analyzed: tena vegavatā vahni dravyeṇa nodanāt vā nanu ghaṭa ādi ārambhakeṣu avayaveṣu kriyā jāyate kriyātaḥ vibhāgaḥ vibhāgāt dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga vināśaḥ tad vināśāt dravya vināśaḥ iti

original: anupraveśapakṣe 'pi sūkṣmavivaraparikalpanāt avaśyam avayavasaṃyogavighaṭanaṃ ghaṭāder iti vināśa eva //
analyzed: anupraveśa pakṣe sūkṣma vivara parikalpanāt avaśyam avayava saṃyoga vighaṭanam ghaṭa ādeḥ iti vināśaḥ eva

original: api ca pākānantaraṃ kandukād apakṛṣyamāṇāḥ piṭhārādayaḥ kecit sphṭitāḥ kecid vakratāṃ gatāḥ kecit sanniveśāntaram eva pratipannā dṛśyante /
analyzed: api ca pāka anantaram kandukāt apakṛṣyamāṇāḥ piṭhāra ādayaḥ kecid sphṭitāḥ kecid vakra tām gatāḥ kecid sanniveśa antaram eva pratipannāḥ dṛśyante

original: tasmād api paśyāmo naśyantīti //
analyzed: tasmāt api paśyāmaḥ naśyanti iti

original: tatsaṃkhyatvād iti sarvam anaikantikaṃ sūcyagraviddhakaṇṭhakoṇaiḥ kumbhādibhiḥ /
analyzed: tad saṃkhya tvāt iti sarvam anaikantikam sūci agra viddha kaṇṭha koṇaiḥ kumbha ādibhiḥ

original: ataḥ pūrvoktanītyā naṣṭeṣu ghaṭādikaryadravyeṣu paramāṇava eva pacyante /
analyzed: atas pūrva ukta nītyā naṣṭeṣu ghaṭa ādi karya dravyeṣu paramāṇavaḥ eva pacyante

original: pakvāś ca śyāmādiguṇānavajahataḥ raktādiguṇāntarayogam anubhavantaḥ prāṇigatasukhaduḥkhopabhogasādhanabhūtādṛṣṭapreryamāṇāḥ parasparaṃ saṃyujya dyaṇukādiprakrameṇa tādṛśam eva ghaṭādikāryam ārabhante /
analyzed: pakvāḥ ca śyāma ādi guṇān avajahataḥ rakta ādi guṇa antara yogam anubhavantaḥ prāṇi gata sukha duḥkha upabhoga sādhana bhūta adṛṣṭa preryamāṇāḥ parasparam saṃyujya dyaṇuka ādi prakrameṇa tādṛśam eva ghaṭa ādi kāryam ārabhante

original: tatrāmuṣmin ksaṇe  'muṣya kāryasya prasavaḥ amuṣya pralaya iti prakriyā na likhyate granthavistarabhayāt aprayojanatvāc ceti //
analyzed: tatra amuṣmin ksaṇe muṣya kāryasya prasavaḥ amuṣya pralayaḥ iti prakriyā na likhyate grantha vistara bhayāt aprayojana tvāt ca iti

original: evaṃ tapanātapapacyamāneṣv āmnādiphaleṣv eṣa eva nyayaḥ /
analyzed: evam tapana ātapa pacyamāneṣu āmnādi phaleṣu eṣaḥ eva nyayaḥ

original: śarīre  'py audaryeṇa tejasā pacyamāṇeṣv annapānādiṣu rasamaladhātubhāvena pariṇāmam upagaccchatsu prāyeṇa pratikṣaṇam utpādavināśau saṃbhavata iti sthairyābhāvāt katham anusandhānādikāryayogas tasyeti //
analyzed: śarīre  pi audaryeṇa tejasā pacyamāṇeṣu anna pāna ādiṣu rasa mala dhātu bhāvena pariṇāmam upagacchatsu prāyeṇa pratikṣaṇam utpāda vināśau saṃbhavataḥ iti sthairya abhāvāt katham anusandhāna ādi kārya yogaḥ tasya iti

original: apare punaḥ pratyakṣabalavattayā ghaṭāder vināśam eva pacyamānasya manyante /
analyzed: apare punar pratyakṣa balavat tayā ghaṭa ādeḥ vināśam eva pacyamānasya manyante

original: suṣiradravyārambhāc ca antar bahiś ca pāko 'py upapatsyate /
analyzed: suṣira dravya ārambhāt ca antar bahis ca pākaḥ pi upapatsyate

original: dṛśyate ca pakve 'pi kalaśe niṣiktānāmapāṃ bahiḥ śītasparśagrahaṇam /
analyzed: dṛśyate ca pakve kalaśe niṣiktānām apām bahis śīta sparśa grahaṇam

original: ataś ca pākakāle jvaladanalaśikhākalāpānupraveśakṛtavināśavat tadāpi śiśirataranīrakaṇanikarānupraveśakṛtavināśaprasaṅgah /
analyzed: atas ca pāka kāle jvalat anala śikhā kalāpa anupraveśa kṛta vināśa vat tadā api śiśiratara nīra kaṇa nikara anupraveśa kṛta vināśa prasaṅgaḥ

original: na cedṛśī pramāṇadṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: na ca īdṛśī pramāṇa dṛṣṭiḥ

original: ataḥ prakṛtisuṣiratayaiva kāryadravyasya ghaṭāder ārambhāt antarāntarā tejaḥkaṇānupraveśakṛtapākopapatter alaṃ vināśakalpanayā /
analyzed: atas prakṛti suṣira tayā eva kārya dravyasya ghaṭa ādeḥ ārambhāt antarā antarā tejaḥ kaṇā anupraveśa kṛta pāka upapatteḥ alam vināśa kalpanayā

original: piṭharapākapakṣa eva peśalaḥ //
analyzed: piṭhara pāka pakṣaḥ eva peśalaḥ

original: yādṛg eva hi nikṣiptaḥ ghaṭaḥ pākāya kanduke /
analyzed: yādṛś eva hi nikṣiptaḥ ghaṭaḥ pākāya kanduke

original: pāke 'pi tādṛg evāsau uddhṛto dṛśyate tataḥ //
analyzed: pāke pi tādṛś eva asau uddhṛtaḥ dṛśyate tatas

original: kvacit tu sanniveśāntaradarśanaṃ kāṣṭhādyabhighātakṛtam upapatsyate /
analyzed: kvacid tu sanniveśa antara darśanam kāṣṭha ādi abhighāta kṛtam upapatsyate

original: pāvakasaṃparkakāritve tu sarvatra tathābhāvaḥ syāt /
analyzed: pāvaka saṃparka kāri tve tu sarvatra tathābhāvaḥ syāt

original: tasmādd avinaṣṭā eva ghaṭādayaḥ pacyante /
analyzed: tasmāt a vinaṣṭāḥ eva ghaṭa ādayaḥ pacyante

original: so 'yaṃ tu ghaṭādinyāyaḥ śarīre nepyate //
analyzed: saḥ yam tu ghaṭa ādi nyāyaḥ śarīre na īpyate

original: na hy annapākaḥ sthairye 'pi tatra kumbhādipākavat /
analyzed: na hi anna pākaḥ sthairye tatra kumbha ādi pāka vat

original: cayāpacayayuktaṃ hi śarīram upalabhyate //
analyzed: caya apacaya yuktam hi śarīram upalabhyate

original: tasmāt parimāṇādibhedadarśanāt naikaṃ śarīraṃ iti jvālādipratyabhijñāvat tatpratyabhijñeti sthitam //
analyzed: tasmāt parimāṇa ādi bheda darśanāt na ekam śarīram iti jvālā ādi pratyabhijñā vat tad pratyabhijñā iti sthitam

original: yad apy ucyate avasthānām eva nānātvam avasthātā punar eka eva dehākhya iti tad apy ayuktam bhedābhedavikalpānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: yat api ucyate avasthānām eva nānātvam avasthātā punar ekaḥ eva deha ākhyaḥ iti tat api ayuktam bheda abheda vikalpa anupapatteḥ

original: yadi śarīrād vyatiriktā eva tasavasthāḥ tarhi tannānātvāt śarīranānātvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: yadi śarīrāt vyatiriktāḥ eva tasa avasthāḥ tarhi tad nānātvāt śarīra nānātva prasaṅgaḥ

original: ekasmāc charīrād apy ananyatvāt avasthānām apy anyonyaṃ bhedo nasyāt //
analyzed: ekasmāt śarīrāt api ananya tvāt avasthānām api anyonyam bhedaḥ nasyāt

original: atha vyatiriktāḥ śarīrād avasthāḥ tarhi bhedena tadupagraho darśayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: atha vyatiriktāḥ śarīrāt avasthāḥ tarhi bhedena tad upagrahaḥ darśayitavyaḥ

original: na cāsāv asti /
analyzed: na ca asau asti

original: gotvādāv anuvṛttā buddhir anyathā 'siddhā satī jātitadvator bhedam āpādayantī na kenacit pratihanyate /
analyzed: go tva ādau anuvṛttā buddhiḥ anyathā siddhā satī jāti tadvatoḥ bhedam āpādayantī na kenacid pratihanyate
