original: iha punar avasthātur ekatvatgrāhiṇī buddhiḥ pūrvanītyā pramāṇabādhitatvāt bhrānteti /
analyzed: iha punar avasthātuḥ eka tva t grāhiṇī buddhiḥ pūrvanītyā pramāṇa bādhita tvāt bhrāntā iti

original: tasmāt śarīrasya bhinnatvāt santānāntaravat smṛtyanusandhānādikāryayogo durghaṭa iti na tasyecchādikāryāśrayatvam //
analyzed: tasmāt śarīrasya bhinna tvāt santāna antara vat smṛti anusandhāna ādi kārya yogaḥ durghaṭaḥ iti na tasya icchā ādi kārya āśraya tvam

original: itaś ca na śarīrasya jñānādiyogaḥ pariṇāmitvāt kṣīravat rūpādimattvāt tadvad eva anekasamūhasvabhāvatvāt tridaṇḍādivat sānniveśaviśiṣṭāc ca bhūtatvāt bāhyabhūtavat //
analyzed: itas ca na śarīrasya jñāna ādi yogaḥ pariṇāmi tvāt kṣīra vat rūpa ādimattvāt tadvat eva aneka samūha svabhāva tvāt tridaṇḍa ādi vat sānniveśa viśiṣṭāt ca bhūta tvāt bāhya bhūta vat

original: caitanyaśūnyaṃ śarīraṃ śarīratvāt bhūtaśarīravat /
analyzed: caitanya śūnyam śarīram śarīra tvāt bhūta śarīra vat

original: na śarīradharmaś caitanyam ayāvad adravyabhāvitvāt /
analyzed: na śarīra dharmaḥ caitanyam ayāvat adravya bhāvi tvāt

original: na ca saṃyogādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ tadupajananāpāyayor nimittāntarajanyatvadarśanāt iha ca tadabhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca saṃyoga ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ tad upajanana apāyayoḥ nimitta antara janya tva darśanāt iha ca tad abhāvāt

original: viśeṣaguṇatve satīti vā viśeṣaṇopādānān na vyabhicāraḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣa guṇa tve sati iti vā viśeṣaṇa upādānāt na vyabhicāraḥ

original: tadviśeṣaguṇatve hi caitanyasya rūpādivat tadavasthānād avināśaprasaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: tad viśeṣa guṇa tve hi caitanyasya rūpa ādi vat tad avasthānāt avināśa prasaṅgaḥ

original: yat tu madaśaktivad ity uktam tatra madaśakter dṛṣṭatvāt abhyupagamaḥ na tu jñānasya tatra darśanam /
analyzed: yat tu mada śakti vat iti uktam tatra mada śakteḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt abhyupagamaḥ na tu jñānasya tatra darśanam

original: nanu jñānam api tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyi prāyeṇa dṛśyate /
analyzed: nanu jñānam api tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi prāyeṇa dṛśyate

original: bhūteṣv annapānādyupayogapuṣṭeṣu paṭvī cetanā bhavati tadviparyaye viparyayaḥ /
analyzed: bhūteṣu anna pāna ādi upayoga puṣṭeṣu paṭvī cetanā bhavati tad viparyaye viparyayaḥ

original: brāhmīghṛtādyupayogasaṃskṛte ca kumāraśarīre paṭuprajñatā jāyate //
analyzed: brāhmī ghṛta ādi upayoga saṃskṛte ca kumāra śarīre paṭu prajña tā jāyate

original: varṣāsu cca svedādinā 'natidavīyasaiva kālena dadhyādyavayavā eva calantaḥ pūtanādikrimirūpā upalabhyante /
analyzed: varṣāsu ca sveda ādinā nati davīyasā eva kālena dadhi ādi avayavāḥ eva calantaḥ pūtanā ādi krimi rūpāḥ upalabhyante

original: caitanye ca gurulāghavavyavahāro 'pi bhūtātiśayasadasattvakṛto bhaviṣyatīti bhūtacaitanyapakṣa eva yuktiyukto lakṣyate //
analyzed: caitanye ca gurulāghava vyavahāraḥ pi bhūta atiśaya sat asat tva kṛtaḥ bhaviṣyati iti bhūta caitanya pakṣaḥ eva yukti yuktaḥ lakṣyate

original: naitac cāru ceṣṭendriyārthāśrayaḥ śarīraṃ lakṣyate /
analyzed: na etat cāru ceṣṭā indriya artha āśrayaḥ śarīram lakṣyate

original: tatra tadanugrahāt indriyānugrahe sati paṭukaraṇatvāt viṣayagrahaṇam api paṭutaram iva bhavati /
analyzed: tatra tad anugrahāt indriya anugrahe sati paṭu karaṇa tvāt viṣaya grahaṇam api paṭutaram iva bhavati

original: na ca viṣayagrahaṇād anyac caitanyaṃ nāma //
analyzed: na ca viṣaya grahaṇāt anyat caitanyam nāma

original: etena brāhmīghṛtopayogo 'pi vyākhyātaḥ /
analyzed: etena brāhmī ghṛta upayogaḥ pi vyākhyātaḥ

original: vyāpakatvād ātmanaḥ sarvatra bhāve sati bhogāyatanatvena kadācit bhūtāvayavānāṃ upādānam /
analyzed: vyāpaka tvāt ātmanaḥ sarvatra bhāve sati bhoga āyatana tvena kadācid bhūta avayavānām upādānam

original: ataḥ śukraśoṇitādivat dadhyavayavān vikṛtān upādāsyate /
analyzed: atas śukra śoṇita ādi vat dadhi avayavān vikṛtān upādāsyate

original: tathā ca svedajādibhedena bahubhedo bhūtasargaḥ pravartate vicitrakarmaparipākāpekṣayeti yat kiñcid etat /
analyzed: tathā ca sveda ja ādi bhedena bahu bhedaḥ bhūta sargaḥ pravartate vicitra karma paripāka apekṣayā iti yat kiñcid etat

original: tasmān na sarvathā bhūtānāṃ caitanyam iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt na sarvathā bhūtānām caitanyam iti siddham

original: nāpīndriyāṇi yathoktasya jñānādeḥ kāryasyāśrayatāṃ pratipadyante darśanasparśanābhyām ekārthagrahaṇāt //3.1.1//
analyzed: na api indriyāṇi yathā uktasya jñāna ādeḥ kāryasya āśraya tām pratipadyante darśana sparśanābhyām eka artha grahaṇāt

original: [yam artham aham adrākṣaṃ cakṣuṣā tam evaitarhi sparśanena spṛśāmi] [yam asprākṣaṃ sparśanena tam adhunā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi] iti katarad indriyam evam anusandadhīta na cakṣuḥ sparśāviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: yam artham aham adrākṣam cakṣuṣā tam eva etarhi sparśanena spṛśāmi yam asprākṣam sparśanena tam adhunā cakṣuṣā paśyāmi iti katarat indriyam evam anusandadhīta na cakṣuḥ sparśa aviṣaya tvāt

original: na tvagindriyaṃ rūpāviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: na tvac indriyam rūpa aviṣaya tvāt

original: tasmād ubhayaviṣayagrahaṇasamarthaḥ kaścid anusandhātā 'stīti sa indriyavyatirikto gamyate //
analyzed: tasmāt ubhaya viṣaya grahaṇa samarthaḥ kaścid anusandhātā sti iti saḥ indriya vyatiriktaḥ gamyate

original: amunaiva prasaṅgena rūpādivyatirekiṇaḥ /
analyzed: amunā eva prasaṅgena rūpa ādi vyatirekiṇaḥ

original: vaktavyā guṇinaḥ siddhir etad buddhinibandhanā //
analyzed: vaktavyā guṇinaḥ siddhiḥ etat buddhi nibandhanā

original: rūpādiṣu svatantreṣu na hy eṣa pratyayo bhavet /
analyzed: rūpa ādiṣu svatantreṣu na hi eṣa pratyayaḥ bhavet

original: na rūpam asya viṣayaḥ na sparśo na ca taddvayam //
analyzed: na rūpam asya viṣayaḥ na sparśaḥ na ca tat dvayam

original: ataś ca na guṇavyatirikto guṇī bhedenāgrahaṇāt ity asiddhaḥ parokto hetuḥ bhedagrahaṇasya darśitatvāt /
analyzed: atas ca na guṇa vyatiriktaḥ guṇī bhedena agrahaṇāt iti asiddhaḥ para uktaḥ hetuḥ bheda grahaṇasya darśita tvāt

original: vṛttivikalpādīnāṃ tu pratisamādhānaṃ sāmānyasamarthanāvasare kathitam avayavasiddhau vakṣyate cety alam avāntaracintayā //
analyzed: vṛtti vikalpa ādīnām tu pratisamādhānam sāmānya samarthana avasare kathitam avayava siddhau vakṣyate ca iti alam avāntara cintayā

original: itaś ca nendriyāṇāṃ caitanyam karaṇatvāt vāsyādivat /
analyzed: itas ca na indriyāṇām caitanyam karaṇa tvāt vāsi ādi vat

original: bhautikāni cendriyāṇi varṇayiṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: bhautikāni ca indriyāṇi varṇayiṣyāmaḥ

original: tena ya eṣa bhūtacaitanyanirākaraṇe nyāyo varṇitaḥ sa teṣv api yojanīyaḥ //
analyzed: tena yaḥ eṣa bhūta caitanya nirākaraṇe nyāyaḥ varṇitaḥ sa teṣu api yojanīyaḥ

original: ataś caivaṃ indriyāntaravikārāt //3.1.12//
analyzed: atas ca evam indriya antara vikārāt

original: āmne hi cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭe rasaniṣyandasundare /
analyzed: hi cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭe rasa nisyanda sundare

original: rasanasya vikāraḥ syāt na dantodakasaṃplavaḥ //
analyzed: rasanasya vikāraḥ syāt na danta udaka saṃplavaḥ

original: bahūnām indriyāṇāṃ ca bhinnābhiprāyatā bhavet /
analyzed: bahūnām indriyāṇām ca bhinna abhiprāya tā bhavet

original: tenaikatraiva santāne nānācetantā bhavet //
analyzed: tena ekatra eva santāne bhavet

original: atitucchaś cāyam indriyacaitanyapakṣa iti kim atra bahu likhyate //
analyzed: ati tucchaḥ ca ayam indriya caitanya pakṣaḥ iti kim atra bahu likhyate

original: nanu manas tarhi icchāder adhiṣṭhānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: nanu manaḥ tarhi icchā ādeḥ adhiṣṭhānam bhaviṣyati

original: tad dhi nityam ekaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ abhautikam iti na prāktanadauṣaiḥ spṛśyate ucyate manaso 'pi tadāśrayatvam anupannam /
analyzed: tat hi nityam ekam sarva viṣayam abhautikam iti na prāktana dauṣaiḥ spṛśyate ucyate manasaḥ u pi tad āśraya tvam anupannam

original: kutaḥ jñātur jñānasādhanopapatteḥ saṃjñābhedamātram //3.1.17//
analyzed: kutas jñātuḥ jñāna sādhana upapatteḥ saṃjñā bheda mātram

original: manaso hīchādyāśrayatve jñānādau kartṛtvāt tasyāpi bāhyagandhādiviṣayajñānayaugapadyānupapatteḥ tadgrahaṇakaraṇaghrāṇādyadhiṣṭhānapaṭunā kenacid āntarasukhaduḥkhādiviṣayagrāhiṇā smṛtyādikriyākāriṇā ca karaṇena bhavitavyam iti tatrātmasaṃjñā bhavet ātmani ca kartari manaśaṃjñeti //
analyzed: manasaḥ hi ichā ādi āśraya tve jñāna ādau kartṛ tvāt tasya api bāhya gandha ādi viṣaya jñāna yaugapadya anupapatteḥ tad grahaṇa karaṇa ghrāṇa ādi adhiṣṭhāna paṭunā kenacid āntara sukha duḥkha ādi viṣaya grāhiṇā smṛti ādi kriyā kāriṇā ca karaṇena bhavitavyam iti tatra ātma saṃjñā bhavet ātmani ca kartari mana śaṃjñā iti

original: na cāsya bāhyakaraṇaiḥ sidhyanti sakalāḥ kriyāḥ /
analyzed: na ca asya bāhya karaṇaiḥ sidhyanti sakalāḥ kriyāḥ

original: na ca smṛtisukhecchādau cakṣurādīni sādhanam //
analyzed: na ca smṛti sukha icchā ādau cakṣuḥ ādīni sādhanam

original: tenecchākṛtisukhaduḥkhavedanānāṃ ādhāro na khalu mano na cendriyāṇi /
analyzed: tena icchā ākṛti sukha duḥkha vedanānām ādhāraḥ na khalu manaḥ na ca indriyāṇi

original: deho 'pi vrajati na tatsamāśrayatvaṃ tenānyaṃ puruṣam ataḥ prakalpayāmaḥ //
analyzed: vrajati na tad samāśraya tvam tena anyam puruṣam atas prakalpayāmaḥ

original: dikpradarśanam idaṃ kṛtim icchādveṣayatnasukhaduḥkhamatīnām /
analyzed: diś pradarśanam idam kṛtim icchā dveṣa yatna sukha duḥkha matīnām

original: liṅgatākathanam ātmani tatra tv asti hetunivaho bahur anyaḥ //
analyzed: liṅga tā kathanam ātmani tatra tu asti hetu nivahaḥ bahuḥ anyaḥ

original: kartṛprayojyatā khalu dṛṣṭā dātrādikaraṇajātasya /
analyzed: kartṛ prayojya tā khalu dṛṣṭā dātṛ ādi karaṇa jātasya

original: tvakśrotrādy api karaṇaṃ tathaiva kartrā prayujyeta //
analyzed: tvak śrotra ādi api karaṇam tathā eva kartrā prayujyeta

original: hitāhitaprāptivisargayogyā ceṣṭā ca dṛṣṭā niyatā śarīre /
analyzed: hita ahita prāpti visarga yogyā ceṣṭā ca dṛṣṭā niyatā śarīre

original: taccetanādhiṣṭhitatām amuṣya gantrīrathāder iva kalpayāmaḥ //
analyzed: tad cetanā dhiṣṭhita tām amuṣya gantrī ratha ādeḥ iva kalpayāmaḥ

original: prāṇādimārutānām antaścalatāṃ calācalagatīnām /
analyzed: prāṇa ādi mārutānām antar calatām cala acala gatīnām

original: sahajanijakarmavikṛtau kāraṇam anumīyate kiñcit //
analyzed: sahaja nija karma vikṛtau kāraṇam anumīyate kiñcid

original: idaṃ ca dehāditaratra durlabhaṃ nirīkṣya vṛddhikṣatabhagnarohaṇam /
analyzed: idam ca dehāt itaratra durlabham nirīkṣya vṛddhi kṣata bhagna rohaṇam

original: dhruvaṃ grahasyeva gatiḥ prakalpate nijāśrayakṣemaparāyaṇo naraḥ //
analyzed: dhruvam grahasya iva gatiḥ prakalpate nija āśraya kṣema parāyaṇaḥ naraḥ

original: yuktaṃ ca naiva manasā hy anadhiṣṭhitānāṃ svārthapramākaraṇakauśalam indriyāṇām /
analyzed: yuktam ca nā eva manasā hi anadhiṣṭhitānām sva artha pramā karaṇa kauśalam indriyāṇām

original: syāt kaścid iṣṭaviṣayānuguṇāḥ prayatnaḥ yat preritaṃ samadhitiṣṭhati tāni cetaḥ //
analyzed: syāt kaścid iṣṭa viṣaya anuguṇāḥ prayatnaḥ yat preritam samadhitiṣṭhati tāni cetaḥ

original: jñānaprayatnādimato 'tha kasya dṛṣṭāntatā syāt karaṇādiliṅge /
analyzed: kasya dṛṣṭānta tā syāt karaṇa ādi liṅge

original: kārye na naḥ paryanuyoga eṣaḥ sāmānyamātrasya tavāpi siddheḥ //
analyzed: kārye na naḥ paryanuyogaḥ eṣaḥ sāmānya mātrasya tava api siddheḥ

original: pratyakṣādipramāṇair yaḥ vyavahāraḥ sa cātnanā /
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇaiḥ yaḥ vyavahāraḥ sa ca atnanā

original: vinā nityena nety evaṃ tato 'py etasya kalpanā //
analyzed: vinā nityena nā iti evam pi etasya kalpanā

original: yat pratyakṣaṃ pratyabhijñāsvabhāvaṃ jñātranyatve tasya na hy ātmalābhaḥ /
analyzed: yat pratyakṣam pratyabhijñā svabhāvam jñātṛ anya tve tasya na hi ātma lābhaḥ

original: grāhyasyaikyaṃ yadvad arthasya tasmāt sidhyaty evaṃ grāhakasyāpi puṃsaḥ //
analyzed: grāhyasya aikyam yadvat arthasya tasmāt sidhyati evam grāhakasya api puṃsaḥ

original: avinābhāvagrahaṇaṃ liṅgajñānaṃ tadanvayasmaraṇam /
analyzed: avinābhāva grahaṇam liṅga jñānam tad anvaya smaraṇam

original: liṅgipramitir itīdaṃ na boddhṛbhede pramāṇaṃ syāt //
analyzed: liṅgi pramitiḥ iti idam na boddhṛ bhede pramāṇam syāt

original: jñāte vanecaramukhād atideśavākye dṛṣṭe mṛge vipinavartini gosadṛkṣe /
analyzed: jñāte vanecara mukhāt atideśa vākye dṛṣṭe mṛge vipina vartini go sadṛkṣe

original: tatsaṃjñitām iti phalaṃ labhate pramātṛbhede na cedam upamānam iti pratiṣṭham //
analyzed: tad saṃjñitām iti phalam labhate pramātṛ bhede na ca idam upamānam iti pratiṣṭham

original: varṇānāṃ śravaṇaṃ krameṇa samayasmṛtyā padārthagrahaḥ tatsaṃskārajam antyavarṇakalanākāle tadālocanam /
analyzed: varṇānām śravaṇam krameṇa samaya smṛtyā padārtha grahaḥ tad saṃskāra jam antya varṇa kalanā kāle tad ālocanam

original: ākāṃkṣādinibandhanānvayakṛtaṃ vākyārthasaṃpaṇḍanaṃ jñātraikena vinā 'tidurghaṭam ato nityātmasiddhir dhruvā //
analyzed: ākāṃkṣā ādi nibandhana anvaya kṛtam vākya artha saṃpaṇḍanam jñātrā ekena vinā ti durghaṭam atas nitya ātma siddhiḥ dhruvā

original: mayedaṃ pūrvedyur vihitam idam anyedyur aparaṃ vidhātavyaṃ ceti śrutikṛṣivaṇijyādiṣu janāḥ /
analyzed: mayā idam pūrvedyus vihitam idam anyedyus aparam vidhātavyam ca iti śruti kṛṣi vaṇijya ādiṣu janāḥ

original: yad evaṃ ceṣṭante nipuṇam anusandhāya tad amī dhruvaṃ sarvāvasthānugatam avagacchanti puruṣam //
analyzed: yat evam ceṣṭante nipuṇam anusandhāya tat amī dhruvam sarva avasthā anugatam avagacchanti puruṣam

original: itya ātmalakṣaṇam avādhi yad etad icchādveṣaprayatnasukhaduḥkhasamāśrayatvam /
analyzed: ityaḥ ātma lakṣaṇam yat etat icchā dveṣa prayatna sukha duḥkha samāśraya tvam

original: tatsaṅginaṃ tad iha heyatayā vyavasyet taddviprayuktam adhigamyatayā mumukṣuḥ //
analyzed: tad saṅginam tat iha heya tayā vyavasyet tad dvi prayuktam adhigamya tayā mumukṣuḥ

original: atho tathāgatāḥ prāhuḥ kiṃ puṃsā kalpitena vaḥ /
analyzed: atho tathāgatāḥ prāhuḥ kim puṃsā kalpitena vaḥ

original: jñānamātreṇa pūrvoktaḥ vyavahāraḥ prasiddhyati //
analyzed: jñāna mātreṇa pūrvoktaḥ vyavahāraḥ prasiddhi ati

original: jñānaṃ kim ātmavan nityaṃ saugatair upagamyate /
analyzed: jñānam kim ātma vat nityam saugataiḥ upagamyate

original: prāgdarśitānusandhānakāmanādikriyākṣamam //
jñānaṃ bauddhagṛhe tāvat kuto nityaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: jñānam bauddha gṛhe tāvat kutas nityam bhaviṣyati

original: anye 'pi sarve samskārāḥ kṣaṇikā iti gṛhyatām //
analyzed: anye pi sarve samskārāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ iti gṛhyatām

original: kṣaṇikaṃ ceṣyate kāryaṃ na kvacit kiñcid āśritam /
analyzed: kṣaṇikam ca iṣyate kāryam na kvacid kiñcid āśritam

original: svatantraṃ jñānam evātaḥ nānyastenānumīyate //
analyzed: svatantram jñānam eva atas na anyaḥ tena anumīyate

original: jñānasya ca prabhedo 'yaṃ icchādveṣasukhādikaḥ /
analyzed: jñānasya ca prabhedaḥ icchā dveṣa sukha ādikaḥ

original: na vastvantaram ity evaṃ na tato 'py anyakalpanam //
analyzed: na vastu antaram iti evam na anya kalpanam

original: guṇatvam api nāsty asya yato 'dhiṣṭhānakalpanā /
analyzed: guṇa tvam api nā asti asya yatas dhiṣṭhāna kalpanā

original: na guṇavyatiriktaś ca guṇī nāmāsti kiś cana //
analyzed: na guṇa vyatiriktaḥ ca guṇī nāma asti kim cana

original: nirāśrayeṣu vijñānaskandheṣu kṣaṇabhaṅgiṣu /
analyzed: nirāśrayeṣu vijñāna skandheṣu kṣaṇabhaṅgiṣu

original: kathaṃ smṛtyādikāryaṃ vā paraloko 'pi vā katham //
analyzed: katham smṛti ādi kāryam vā katham

original: saty api paraloke katham akṛtābhyāgamakṛtavipraṇāśau parākriyete yena hi jñānena caityavandanādi karma kṛtaṃ tasya vināśāt na tatphalopabhogaḥ /
analyzed: sati api para loke katham akṛta abhyāgama kṛta vipraṇāśau parākriyete yena hi jñānena caitya vandana ādi karma kṛtam tasya vināśāt na tad phala upabhogaḥ

original: yasya ca phalopabhogaḥ tena na tatkarma kṛtam iti naiṣa doṣaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt /
analyzed: yasya ca phala upabhogaḥ tena na tat karma kṛtam iti na eṣa doṣaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya niyāmaka tvāt

original: anādiprabandhapravṛtto hi jñānānāṃ hetuphalabhāvapravāhaḥ /
analyzed: anādi prabandha pravṛttaḥ hi jñānānām hetu phala bhāva pravāhaḥ

original: eṣa eva ca santāna ity ucyate /
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva ca santānaḥ iti ucyate

original: tatkṛtaś cāyaṃ anusandhānādikāryaniyamaḥ /
analyzed: tad kṛtaḥ ca ayam anusandhāna ādi kārya niyamaḥ

original: santānānāditvāt tadavicchedāc ca paraloko 'pi na kliṣṭakalpanaḥ //
analyzed: santāna anādi tvāt tad avicchedāt ca para lokaḥ api na kliṣṭa kalpanaḥ

original: yady api santatyantarapatitajñānajanyam api santatyantare jñānaṃ dṛśyate tathāpi na tādṛśakāryakāraṇabhāvena santānavyavahāraḥ pratisandhānādikāryanirvāho vā kin tu upādānarūpatadviśeṣanibandhana evaiṣa nirvahati niyamaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api santati antara patita jñāna janyam api santati antare jñānam dṛśyate tathā api na tādṛśa kārya kāraṇa bhāvena santāna vyavahāraḥ pratisandhāna ādi kārya nirvāhaḥ vā kin tu upādāna rūpa tad viśeṣa nibandhanaḥ eva eṣa nirvahati niyamaḥ

original: tasminn eva sati svarūpasantānavibhāgo 'vakalpate //
analyzed: tasmin eva sati sva rūpa santāna vibhāgaḥ

original: smṛtivat parihartavyau kṛtanāśākṛtāgamau /
analyzed: smṛti vat parihartavyau kṛta nāśa akṛta āgamau

original: tatsantānopasaṃkrāntyā kusume bījarāgavat //
analyzed: tad santāna upasaṃkrāntyā kusume bīja rāga vat

original: āha ca [yasminn eva hi santāne āhitā karmavāsanā /
analyzed: āha ca yasmin eva hi santāne āhitā karma vāsanā

original: phalaṃ tatraiva badhnāti kārpāse raktatā yathā] //
analyzed: phalam tatra eva badhnāti kārpāse rakta tā yathā

original: yathā yasminn eva hi kārpasabīje varṇaḥ raktatākhyaḥ kṛtaḥ tasyaiva kusumam api raktam nānyasyeti tathā yasminn eva jñānasantāne yādṛśī karmavāsanā tādṛśaṃ phalaṃ tasminn eva santāne bhavati nānyasmin jñān ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: yathā yasmin eva hi kārpasa bīje varṇaḥ raktatā ākhyaḥ kṛtaḥ tasya eva kusumam api raktam na anyasya iti tathā yasmin eva jñāna santāne yādṛśī karma vāsanā tādṛśam phalam tasmin eva santāne bhavati na anyasmin iti arthaḥ

original: tathā ca kṛtahānākṛtābhyāgamadoṣanirāsaḥ //
analyzed: tathā ca kṛta hāna akṛta abhyāgama doṣa nirāsaḥ

original: nityas tv ātmā 'bhyupagamyamānaḥ yadi sukhādijanmanā vikṛtim anubhavati tad ayaṃ anitya eva carmādivad uktaḥ syāt /
analyzed: nityaḥ tu ātmā abhyupagamyamānaḥ yadi sukha ādi janmanā vikṛtim anubhavati tat ayam anityaḥ eva carma ādi vat uktaḥ syāt

original: nirvikāratve tu satā 'satā vā sukhaduḥkhādinā karmaphalena kas tasya viśeṣa iti karmavaiphalyam eva /
analyzed: nirvikāra tve tu satā satā vā sukha duḥkha ādinā karma phalena kaḥ tasya viśeṣaḥ iti karma vaiphalyam eva

original: tad uktam [varṣātapābhyāṃ kiṃ vyomnaḥ carmaṇy asti tayoḥ phalam /
analyzed: tat uktam varṣa ātapābhyām kim vyomnaḥ carmaṇi asti tayoḥ phalam

original: carmopamaś cet so 'nityaḥ khatulyaś ced asatphalaḥ] iti //
analyzed: carma upamaḥ ced saḥ nityaḥ kha tulyaḥ ced asat phalaḥ iti

original: tasmād utsṛjyatām eṣaḥ mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ prathamo mohaḥ ātmagraho nāma /
analyzed: tasmāt utsṛjyatām eṣaḥ mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ prathamaḥ mohaḥ ātmagrahaḥ nāma

original: tannivṛttyā cātmīyagraho 'pi viraṃsyati [aham eva na kiṃ mama iti /
analyzed: tad nivṛttyā viraṃsyati aham eva na kim mama iti

original: tad idam ahaṃkāramamakāragranthiprahāṇena nairātmyadarśanam eva nirvāṇadvāram avalambyatām //
analyzed: tat idam ahaṃkāra mamakāra granthi prahāṇena nairātmya darśanam eva nirvāṇa dvāram avalambyatām

original: tasya ca mārgaḥ kṣaṇikapadārthaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: tasya ca mārgaḥ kṣaṇika padārtha niścayaḥ

original: kṣaṇikeṣu hi sarvabhāveṣu nirṣśrayeṣu jñānasyāpy āśrayavirahāt kutastyamātmakalpanam iti //
analyzed: kṣaṇikeṣu hi sarva bhāveṣu nirṣūrayeṣu jñānasya api āśraya virahāt kutastyam ātma kalpanam iti

original: kathaṃ punar eṣaḥ sakalapramāṇātītaḥ kṣaṇikapadārthavādaḥ śakyate śākyair abhyupagantum //
analyzed: katham punar eṣaḥ sakala pramāṇa atītaḥ kṣaṇika padārtha vādaḥ śakyate śākyaiḥ abhyupagantum

original: nakhalu kṣaṇabhāṅgitve bhāvānām akṣajā matiḥ /
analyzed: na khalu kṣaṇabhāṅgi tve bhāvānām akṣa jā matiḥ

original: pramāṇaṃ kṣaṇikākārakalpanotpatyasambhavāt //
analyzed: pramāṇam kṣaṇika ākāra kalpanā utpati asambhavāt

original: atha vāpy avinābhūtahetujñānopapattitaḥ /
analyzed: atha vā api avinābhūta hetu jñāna upapattitaḥ

original: na bhūmir anumānasya vikalpaniyatasthiteḥ //
analyzed: na bhūmiḥ anumānasya vikalpa niyata sthiteḥ

original: smaraṇapratyabhijñāne pratyutasthairyasādhake /
analyzed: smaraṇa pratyabhijñāne pratyuta sthairya sādhake

original: evaṃ ca vaṃcanāmātraṃ āśunāśitvadeśanāḥ //
analyzed: evam ca vaṃcanā mātram āśu nāśi tva deśanāḥ

original: ucyate pratyakṣagamyaṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ bhavati na bhavatīty eṣa kariṣyate vicāraḥ /
analyzed: ucyate pratyakṣa gamyam kṣaṇikatvam bhavati na bhavati iti eṣa kariṣyate vicāraḥ

original: anumānaṃ tu saṃpratyevābhidhīyate sattvāt kṣanikāḥ padārthā iti /
analyzed: anumānam tu saṃprati eva abhidhīyate sattvāt kṣanikāḥ padārthāḥ iti

original: sattvaṃ tāvad arthakriyākāritvam ucyate /
analyzed: sattvam tāvat arthakriyā kāri tvam ucyate

original: yathoktam [arthakriyāsamarthaṃ yat tad eva paramārthasat] iti //
analyzed: yathā uktam artha kriyā samartham yat tat eva paramārtha sat iti

original: satpratyayagamyatve hi sattve keśoṇḍrakāder api sattvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: sat pratyaya gamya tve hi sattve keśoṇḍraka ādeḥ api sattva prasaṅgaḥ

original: sattā sambandhitve tu sattve sāmānyādīnāṃ tadasambandhād asattvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: sattā sambandhi tve tu sattve sāmānya ādīnām tad asambandhāt asattvam syāt

original: arthakriyāsāmarthyasattvānuvartī ca laukiko vyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: arthakriyā sāmarthya sattva anuvartī ca laukikaḥ vyavahāraḥ

original: saty api putre tatkāryādarśanāt [aputrā vayam] iti vyapadiśanti laukikā /
analyzed: sati api putre tad kārya adarśanāt aputrāḥ vayam iti vyapadiśanti laukikā

original: putrād anyasminn api tatkāryakariṇi sati [saputrā vayam] iti ca bruvate /
analyzed: putrāt anyasmin api tad kārya kariṇi sati sa putrāḥ vayam iti ca bruvate

original: tasmād arthakriyākāritvam eva sattvam //
analyzed: tasmāt arthakriyā kāri tvam eva sattvam

original: bhavatv evaṃ tasya tu kutra kathaṃ va kṣaṇikatvena vyāptigrahaṇam kutreti yat pṛcchasi yatra rocate mahābhagāya ghaṭe paṭe vā gṛhyatāṃ vyāptiḥ //
analyzed: bhavatu evam tasya tu kutra katham kṣaṇika tvena vyāpti grahaṇam kutra iti yat pṛcchasi yatra rocate mahābhagāya ghaṭe paṭe vā gṛhyatām vyāptiḥ

original: kiṃ sādhyadharmiṇy eva vyāptigrahaṇam upapadyate dhīman ko 'tra pramādaḥ na hi daivanirmitaḥ kaścit sādhyadharmī nāma /
analyzed: kim sādhya dharmiṇi eva vyāpti grahaṇam upapadyate dhīman kaḥ tra pramādaḥ na hi daiva nirmitaḥ kaścid sādhya dharmī nāma

original: grahītuṃ śakyate ced vyāptiḥ yatra tatra sā gṛhyatām iti //
analyzed: grahītum śakyate ced vyāptiḥ yatra tatra sā gṛhyatām iti

original: yat tu katham asyā grahaṇam iti tad ucyate bhāvānāṃ hi sattvaṃ kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ vyāptam //
analyzed: yat tu katham asyāḥ grahaṇam iti tat ucyate bhāvānām hi sattvam krama yaugapadyābhyām vyāptam

original: nityeṣu ca padārtheṣu vyāpakānupalambhanāt /
analyzed: nityeṣu ca padārtheṣu vyāpaka anupalambhanāt

original: tadvyāptam api sattvaṃ hi balāt tebhyo nivartate //
analyzed: tad vyāptam api sattvam hi balāt tebhyaḥ nivartate

original: na ca rāśis tṛtīyo 'sti tena gatyantarakṣayāt /
analyzed: na ca rāśiḥ tṛtīyaḥ sti tena gati antara kṣayāt

original: kṣaṇikāneva tān bhāvān sattvaṃ samavalambate //
analyzed: kṣaṇikān eva tān bhāvān sattvam samavalambate

original: tac ca svagrāhakād bodhāt asandigdhaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: tat ca sva grāhakāt bodhāt asandigdham pratīyate

original: jñānotpattyaiva taddhetoḥ asāmarthe parākṛte //
analyzed: jñāna utpattyā eva tad hetoḥ asāmarthe parākṛte

original: asamarthāt samutpādo dṛśyate na hi kasyacit /
analyzed: asamarthāt samutpādaḥ dṛśyate na hi kasyacid

original: śaktāśaktaprasūtatve na tadbodho 'sti saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: śakta aśakta prasūta tve na tad bodhaḥ sti saṃśayaḥ

original: ata eva ca tajjñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ jagadus sadā /
analyzed: atas eva ca tat jñānam pramāṇam jagaduḥ sadā

original: svarūpe śaktijatve tu saṃśayāder asaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: svarūpe śakti ja tve tu saṃśaya ādeḥ asaṃbhavāt

original: kimj idaṃ rajataṃ uta śuktiketi viśeṣāṃśe saṃśeratāṃ nāma pramātāraḥ na tu sāmarthyaṃ prati dolā kācit saṃbhavati [kim idaṃ jñānaṃ samarthena janitam uta taditareṇa] iti /
analyzed: idam rajatam uta śuktikā iti viśeṣa aṃśe saṃśeratām nāma pramātāraḥ na tu sāmarthyam prati dolā kācid saṃbhavati kim idam jñānam samarthena janitam uta tad itareṇa iti

original: asamarthasya janakatvānupapatteḥ vyāpakānupalambhasyāpi vyāptigrāhiṇaḥ svata eva prāmāṇyam /
analyzed: asamarthasya janaka tva anupapatteḥ vyāpaka anupalambhasya api vyāpti grāhiṇaḥ svatas eva prāmāṇyam

original: saṃśayaviparyayos tatrāpy abhāvāt //
analyzed: saṃśaya viparyayoḥ tatra api abhāvāt

original: kathaṃ punar nityeṣu padārtheṣu sattvavyāpakayoḥ kramayaugapadyayor anupalambhaḥ ucyate nityo hi bhāvaḥ krameṇa vā kāryaṃ kuryāt yaugapadyena va parasparaparihāravyavasthitātmanāṃ tṛtīyaprakārānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: katham punar nityeṣu padārtheṣu sattva vyāpakayoḥ krama yaugapadyayoḥ anupalambhaḥ ucyate nityaḥ hi bhāvaḥ krameṇa vā kāryam kuryāt yaugapadyena paraspara parihāra vyavasthita ātmanām tṛtīya prakāra anupapatteḥ

original: na tāvat krameṇa sa hi samartho vā syāt asamartho vasyāt /
analyzed: na tāvat krameṇa sa hi samarthaḥ vā syāt asamarthaḥ

original: samarthaś cet kiṃ krameṇa samarthasya kālakṣepāyogāt /
analyzed: samarthaḥ ced kim krameṇa samarthasya kāla kṣepa ayogāt

original: asamarthas tu asamarthatvād eva na karoti kiñcid iti tasyāpi kiṃ krameṇa sahakāryapekṣayā karotīti cet na asamarthasya sahakāriṇā 'pi sāmarthyādhānānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: asamarthaḥ tu asamartha tvāt eva na karoti kiñcid iti tasya api kim krameṇa sahakāri apekṣayā karoti iti ced na asamarthasya sahakāriṇā pi sāmarthya ādhāna anupapatteḥ

original: samarthasya svata eva sāmarthye sati sahakāri vaiyarthyāt //
analyzed: samarthasya svatas eva sāmarthye sati sahakāri vaiyarthyāt

original: sahakārisannidhāne 'pi cāsya svarūpeṇa vā kartṛtvaṃ syāt pararūpeṇa vā svarūpasya ca prāg api bhādāt tasya ca kārakatvāt kiṃ sahakāriṇā /
analyzed: sahakāri sannidhāne ca asya sva rūpeṇa vā kartṛ tvam syāt para rūpeṇa vā sva rūpasya ca prāk api bhādāt tasya ca kāraka tvāt kim sahakāriṇā

original: pararūpeṇa kartṛtve pūrvarūpaparityāgāt tadrūpāntarāpatteś ca kṣaṇikatvam āpadyate //
analyzed: para rūpeṇa kartṛ tve pūrva rūpa parityāgāt tad rūpa antara āpatteḥ ca kṣaṇika tvam āpadyate

original: evaṃsahakāry api samarthāsamarthatayā vikalpanīyaḥ /
analyzed: evaṃsahakārī api samartha asamartha tayā vikalpanīyaḥ

original: svato 'sya sāmarthye kiṃ paropakārānusaraṇadainyena asamarthas tu sacivaḥ kim āgatyāpi tapasvī kariṣyati //
analyzed: svatas sya sāmarthye kim para upakāra anusaraṇa dainyena asamarthaḥ tu sacivaḥ kim āgatya api tapasvī kariṣyati

original: kiṃ ca kiñcitkaro vā sahakārī syāt akiñcitkaro vā akiṃcitkarapakṣe sarvaḥ sarvasya sarvatra kārye sācivyam upagacchet /
analyzed: kim ca kiñcitkaraḥ vā sahakārī syāt akiñcitkaraḥ vā akiṃcitkara pakṣe sarvaḥ sarvasya sarvatra kārye sācivyam upagacchet

original: kiñcitkaraś cet vaktavyaṃ kiṃ karotīti //
analyzed: kiñcitkaraḥ ced vaktavyam kim karoti iti

original: upakāram iti cet sa upakriyamāṇāt bhinnaḥ abhinno vā abhinnaś cet sa eva kṛtaḥ syāt /
analyzed: upakāram iti ced saḥ upakriyamāṇāt bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ vā abhinnaḥ ced saḥ eva kṛtaḥ syāt

original: bhede tasya kim āyātam yad asau na pūrvavad āste //
analyzed: bhede tasya kim āyātam yat asau na pūrva vat āste

original: kāryād api bhedābhedābhyāṃ cintya upakāraḥ /
analyzed: kāryāt api bheda abhedābhyām cintyaḥ upakāraḥ

original: na kāryād bhinnaḥ anupalambhāt /
analyzed: na kāryāt bhinnaḥ anupalambhāt

original: dvayakaraṇābhāvāc ca /
analyzed: dvaya karaṇa abhāvāt ca

original: kāryād avyatireke tūpakāre sahakāriṇā kriyamāṇe kāryam eva tena kṛtaṃ syād iti mūlakāraṇānarthakyam //
analyzed: kāryāt a vyatireke tu upakāre sahakāriṇā kriyamāṇe kāryam eva tena kṛtam syāt iti mūla kāraṇa ānarthakyam

original: nanu ca eka eva bhāvaḥ kārakaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ca ekaḥ eva bhāvaḥ kārakaḥ

original: sa eva hi samarthaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva hi samarthaḥ

original: taditarapadārthasannidhānaṃ tu svahetuvaśād upanītam iti nopālabbham arhati naitad yuktam ekasya kadācid api karakatvānupalabdheḥ tatsāmarthyasya duradhigamatvāt /
analyzed: tad itara padārtha sannidhānam tu sva hetu vaśāt upanītam iti na upālabbham arhati na etat yuktam ekasya kadācid api karaka tva anupalabdheḥ tad sāmarthyasya duradhigama tvāt

original: evaṃ hy asau samarthaṃ ucyate yady ekaḥ kadācit kāryam utpādayan dṛśyeta na tu vismṛtyāpi dṛśyate //
analyzed: evam hi asau samartham ucyate yadi ekaḥ kadācid kāryam utpādayan dṛśyeta na tu vismṛtya api dṛśyate

original: atha kāryasyāyaṃ svabhāvaḥ yad ekasmān notpadyate kāraṇaṃ tu śaktam eveti tad apy ayuktam kāryasvabhāvaparādhīnatvena kāraṇasya sāmarthya virahaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: atha kāryasya ayam svabhāvaḥ yat ekasmāt nā utpadyate kāraṇam tu śaktam eva iti tat api ayuktam kārya svabhāva para adhīna tvena kāraṇasya sāmarthya viraha prasaṅgāt

original: evaṃ hy asau samarthaḥ kathyeta yadi kāryaṃ svabhāvam anādṛtya svatantra eka eva prasahya kāryaṃ janayet /
analyzed: evam hi asau samarthaḥ kathyeta yadi kāryam svabhāvam an ādṛtya svatantraḥ ekaḥ eva prasahya kāryam janayet

original: na caivaṃ dṛśyate iti yat kiṃcid etat //
analyzed: na ca evam dṛśyate iti yat kiṃcid etat

original: atha samartham eva kāraṇam /
analyzed: atha samartham eva kāraṇam

original: tasya tv ayaṃ svabhāvaḥ yat sahasaiva kāryaṃ na karoti katipayakṣaṇavyavadhāne tu kāryaṃ karotīti /
analyzed: tasya tu ayam svabhāvaḥ yat sahasā eva kāryam na karoti katipaya kṣaṇa vyavadhāne tu kāryam karoti iti

original: yady evaṃ na kadācit kāryotpādaḥ syāt /
analyzed: yadi evam na kadācid kārya utpādaḥ syāt

original: kāryotpādasamaye 'pi katipayakṣaṇavyavahitakāryajananasvabhāvānapayāt punaḥ katipayakṣaṇāvekṣaṇaṃ syāt /
analyzed: kārya utpāda samaye pi katipaya kṣaṇa vyavahita kārya janana svabhāva anapayāt punar katipaya kṣaṇa avekṣaṇam syāt

original: teṣv api katipayeṣu kṣaṇeṣv atikrānteṣu sa evāsya svabhāvas tadavastha iti punar apy evaṃ bhaved iti kadā nāma kāryaṃ janayet /
analyzed: teṣu api katipayeṣu kṣaṇeṣu atikrānteṣu saḥ eva asya svabhāvaḥ tad avasthaḥ iti punar api evam bhavet iti kadā nāma kāryam janayet

original: tadevamādidoṣopahatatvāt na krameṇa bhāvānām arthakriyāsāmarthyam //
analyzed: tat evamādi doṣa upahata tvāt na krameṇa bhāvānām artha kriyā sāmarthyam

original: nāpi yugapat loke tathā vyavahāradarśanāt /
analyzed: nā api yugapad loke tathā vyavahāra darśanāt

original: yugapat kṛtakāryasyāpi sthirasya punar akaraṇe hetvabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yugapad kṛta kāryasya api sthirasya punar akaraṇe hetu abhāvaḥ

original: punaś ca kurvann api bhāvaḥ karyaṃ na tad eva kuryāt kṛtasya karaṇāyogāt /
analyzed: punar ca kurvan api bhāvaḥ karyam na tat eva kuryāt kṛtasya karaṇa ayogāt

original: kāryāntarakaraṇe tu sa evāyaṃ punaḥ kramapakṣa āpated ity evaṃ kramayaugapadye nityebhyaḥ padārthebhyaḥ nivartete /
analyzed: kārya antara karaṇe tu saḥ eva ayam punar krama pakṣaḥ āpatet iti evam krama yaugapadye nityebhyaḥ padārthebhyaḥ nivartete

original: te ca nivartamāne sattvasya vyāpake iti sattvaṃ tebhya ādāv eva nivartate /
analyzed: te ca nivartamāne sattvasya vyāpake iti sattvam tebhyaḥ ādau eva nivartate

original: tebhyaḥ pracyutaṃ sattvaṃ gatyantaravirahāt kṣaṇikeṣv eva niviśate //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ pracyutam sattvam gati antara virahāt kṣaṇikeṣu eva niviśate

original: ato yady api kāryahetau dhūmāgnyor iva svabhāvahetāv api vā kvacit vṛkṣatvaśiśapātvayor iva pūrvam iha sādhyasādhanadharmayor āgrahaṇaṃ dharmāntare na vṛttam tathāpi sādhyadharmiṇy eva vyāptigrahaṇam upapatsyate vipakṣavyāvṛtteḥ supariniścitatvāt /
analyzed: atas yadi api kārya hetau dhūma agnyoḥ iva svabhāva hetau api vā kvacid vṛkṣa tva śiśapā tvayoḥ iva pūrvam iha sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ āgrahaṇam dharma antare na vṛttam tathā api sādhya dharmiṇi eva vyāpti grahaṇam upapatsyate vipakṣa vyāvṛtteḥ su pariniścita tvāt

original: saiva ca vipakṣād avyāvṛttiḥ /
analyzed: sā eva ca vipakṣāt a vyāvṛttiḥ

original: sa eva cāsya hetoḥ svasādhyenānvayaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva ca asya hetoḥ sva sādhyena anvayaḥ

original: na hy evaṃ sambhavati nityebhyaś ca vyāvṛttaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikeṣu ca na viviṣṭam iti tṛtīyarāśyabhāvāt /
analyzed: na hi evam sambhavati nityebhyaḥ ca vyāvṛttam sattvam kṣaṇikeṣu ca na viviṣṭam iti tṛtīya rāśi abhāvāt

original: nirāśrayatvānupapatteś ca //
analyzed: nirāśraya tva anupapatteḥ ca

original: tad evaṃ kvacid dharmiṇi vyāptau gṛhītāya yadi sa eva kadācit paraṃ prati dṛṣṭāntīkriyate tadaivaṃ nāma bhavatu ko doṣa iti //
analyzed: tat evam kvacid dharmiṇi vyāptau gṛhītāya yadi saḥ eva kadācid param prati dṛṣṭāntīkriyate tadā evam nāma bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ iti

original: nanu vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ anumnam /
analyzed: nanu vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ

original: anumānena cānumānasya vyāptigrahaṇe 'navasthā //
analyzed: anumānena ca anumānasya vyāpti grahaṇe navasthā

original: nānavasthā tāvaty eva paryavasānāt /
analyzed: na anavasthā tāvatī eva paryavasānāt

original: na hi vyāpakānupalabdheḥ anumānāntarāt vyāptiniścayaḥ kin tu pratyakṣavikalpād eva /
analyzed: na hi vyāpaka anupalabdheḥ anumāna antarāt vyāpti niścayaḥ kin tu pratyakṣa vikalpāt eva

original: tad anayā vyāptiniścayāt siddham etat yat sat tat kṣaṇikam iti //
analyzed: tat anayā vyāpti niścayāt siddham etat yat sat tat kṣaṇikam iti

original: anye tu rītyantareṇa vyāptiniścayam ācakṣate /
analyzed: anye tu rīti antareṇa vyāpti niścayam ācakṣate

original: viruddhayor ekaparicchede 'nyataranivṛttir avaśyaṃ bhāvinī viruddhatvād eva /
analyzed: viruddhayoḥ eka paricchede nyatara nivṛttiḥ avaśyam bhāvinī viruddha tvāt eva

original: virddhe ca sattvanityatve pūrvoktayaiva nītyā /
analyzed: ca sattva nitya tve pūrva uktayā eva nītyā

original: sattvaṃ ca vispaṣṭam upalabhyate bhāvānām iti tadupalambhān nityatvanivṛttiḥ /
analyzed: sattvam ca vispaṣṭam upalabhyate bhāvānām iti tad upalambhāt nitya tva nivṛttiḥ

original: nityatvaniṛttir eva kṣaṇikatvaniścayaḥ prakārāntarābhāvāt //
nanu śītoṣṇayoḥ pṛthag upalambhāt virodhaniścaye yukta ekagrahaṇe dvitīyavyudāsaḥ /
analyzed: nanu śīta uṣṇayoḥ pṛthak upalambhāt virodha niścaye yuktaḥ eka grahaṇe dvitīya vyudāsaḥ

original: iha tu sattvam evopalabhyate na nityatvam kathaṃ tadvirodhād itaravyāvṛttiḥ naiṣa doṣaḥ pṛthag ubhayānupalambhe 'pi sattvasiddhyaiva nityatvanirāsasiddheḥ //
analyzed: iha tu sattvam eva upalabhyate na nitya tvam katham tad virodhāt itara vyāvṛttiḥ na eṣa doṣaḥ pṛthak ubhaya anupalambhe sattva siddhyā eva nitya tva nirāsa siddheḥ

original: katham anyaṣiyā buddhiḥ anyam udasyati ucyate dvicandradarśanasyaikaśaśabhṛdbimbavedinī /
analyzed: katham anya ṣiyā buddhiḥ anyam udasyati ucyate dvi candra darśanasya eka śaśabhṛt bimba vedinī

original: dhīratadviṣayatve 'pi yathā mithyātvakāraṇam //
analyzed: dhīra tad viṣaya tve pi yathā mithyātva kāraṇam

original: tathā sthairyasamāviṣṭā sāmarthyagrāhiṇī matiḥ /
analyzed: tathā sthairya samāviṣṭā sāmarthya grāhiṇī matiḥ

original: sthiratvāviṣayatve 'pi tadvyavacchedakāriṇī //
sattvaṃ nānāsvabhāvatvaṃ sthairyam ekasvabhāvatā /
analyzed: sattvam nānā svabhāva tvam sthairyam eka svabhāva tā

original: tayor virodho yuktyā 'pi vaktuṃ na hi na śakyate //
analyzed: tayoḥ virodhaḥ yuktyā pi vaktum na hi na śakyate

original: tasmāt sattvapratītir eva nityatvanivṛttiḥ saiva ca kṣaṇikatvavyāptir iti siddhaṃ sattvāt kṣaṇikatvam //
analyzed: tasmāt sattva pratītiḥ eva nitya tva nivṛttiḥ sā eva ca kṣaṇika tva vyāptiḥ iti siddham sattvāt kṣaṇika tvam

original: api ca sarvadā kāryānutpādāt kārakāvasthā nūnam ekakṣaṇasthāyinī bhāvānām upagantavyā /
analyzed: api ca sarvadā kārya anutpādāt kāraka avasthā nūnam eka kṣaṇa sthāyinī bhāvānām upagantavyā

original: vyāpārāveśavaśena vā śrotriyādipakṣe sahakāryādisannidhanāsādanena vā naiyāyikapakṣe /
analyzed: vyāpāra āveśa vaśena vā śrotriya ādi pakṣe sahakāri ādi sannidhana āsādanena vā naiyāyika pakṣe

original: kārakatvaṃ nāma vastunaḥ rūpaṃ ekakṣaṇavṛtty eva kāryotpatty eva tatkalpanāt /
analyzed: kāraka tvam nāma vastunaḥ rūpam eka kṣaṇa vṛtti eva kārya utpatti eva tad kalpanāt

original: tataḥ pūrvam uttarakālaṃ vā kārakatvayogāt /
analyzed: tatas pūrvam uttara kālam vā kāraka tva yogāt

original: kārakatvam eva paramārthasat akārakasya jñānajanakatvābhāvāt astitvam api durvacam /
analyzed: kāraka tvam eva paramārtha sat akārakasya jñāna janaka tva abhāvāt astitvam api durvacam

original: ataś ca sarvavādibhir eva prāyeṇa kṣaṇikatvam idam abhyupagatam iti yaśa eva kevalaṃ saugatāḥ pītavantaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca sarva vādibhiḥ eva prāyeṇa kṣaṇika tvam idam abhyupagatam iti yaśaḥ eva kevalam saugatāḥ pītavantaḥ

original: tasmāt siddhaṃ yat kārakaṃ yac ca sat tat kṣaṇikam iti //
analyzed: tasmāt siddham yat kārakam yat ca sat tat kṣaṇikam iti

original: ataś ca kṣaṇibhaṅgino bhāvāḥ pralayaṃ prati hetvanapekṣatvāt /
analyzed: atas ca kṣaṇi bhaṅginaḥ bhāvāḥ pralayam prati hetu anapekṣa tvāt

original: bhāvo hi svato naśvarātmā bhavet tadviparīto vā vinaśvarasvabhāve 'smin kṛtaṃ pralayahetubhiḥ /
analyzed: bhāvaḥ hi svatas naśvara ātmā bhavet tad viparītaḥ vā vinaśvara svabhāve smin kṛtam pralaya hetubhiḥ

original: anaśvarasvabhāve hi kṛtaṃ pralayahetubhiḥ //
analyzed: anaśvara svabhāve hi kṛtam pralaya hetubhiḥ

original: kva tarhi mudgarādīnāṃ vyāpāraḥ vijātīyasantatijanmanīti brūmaḥ //
analyzed: kva tarhi mudgara ādīnām vyāpāraḥ vijātīya santati janmani iti brūmaḥ

original: abhāvas tu tajjanyo na saṃbhavaty eva pramāṇaviruddhatvāt /
analyzed: abhāvaḥ tu tad janyaḥ na saṃbhavati eva pramāṇa viruddha tvāt

original: bhāvo hi svarūpeṇa na bhavati na tv abhāvo 'py asya bhavatīti /
analyzed: bhāvaḥ hi svarūpeṇa na bhavati na tu abhāvaḥ pi asya bhavati iti

original: svarūpaṃ tu tasya bhavanātmakaṃ cet sarvadaiva bhaved eva na na bhavet /
analyzed: sva rūpam tu tasya bhavana ātmakam ced sarvadā eva bhavet eva na na bhavet

original: abhavanātmakaṃ tu tad eva na bhavet parāpekṣāyā abhāvāt /
analyzed: abhavana ātmakam tu tat eva na bhavet para apekṣāyāḥ abhāvāt

original: na hi mudgarādikāraṇāntarasāpekṣaḥ kumbhāder vināśo bhavitum arhati utpattāv iva nāśe 'pi samarthāsamarthabhinnābhinnopakārakārisahakāryādivikalpakalāpānapāyāt //
analyzed: na hi mudgara ādi kāraṇa antara sāpekṣaḥ kumbha ādeḥ vināśaḥ bhavitum arhati utpattau iva nāśe pi samartha asamartha bhinna abhinna upakāra kāri sahakāri ādi vikalpa kalāpa anapāyāt

original: atha katipayakṣaṇavyavahitavināśasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ iṣyate tarhi prāktananayena kadācid api na vinaśyet /
analyzed: atha katipaya kṣaṇa vyavahita vināśa svabhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ iṣyate tarhi prāktana nayena kadācid api na vinaśyet

original: nināśasamaye 'pi tatsvabhāvānapāyena punaḥ katipayakṣaṇāpekṣaṇaprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: nināśa samaye pi tad svabhāva anapāyena punar katipaya kṣaṇa apekṣaṇa prasaṅgāt

original: api ca yadā 'pi tena naṣṭavyaṃ tadā 'py asya na svarūpād atiriktaḥ kiś cana vināśahetur avatarati /
analyzed: api ca yadā pi tena naṣṭavyam tadā pi asya na svarūpāt atiriktaḥ kim cana vināśa hetuḥ avatarati

original: tac ca svarūpaṃ ādye 'pi kṣaṇe tasya tādṛśam eveti tadaiva vā naśyet na kadācid vā //
analyzed: tat ca svarūpam ādye kṣaṇe tasya tādṛśam evā iti tadā eva vā naśyet na kadācid vā

original: apamṛtyor apakrantaḥ tasya cet prathamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: apamṛtyoḥ apakrantaḥ tasya ced prathamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ

original: avināśisvabhāvatvāt āstāṃ yugaśatāny api //
analyzed: avināśi svabhāva tvāt āstām yuga śatāni api

original: na caivam abhyupatamyate /
analyzed: na ca evam abhyupatamyate

original: tasmāt ātmalābhāvinābhāvī bhāvanāṃ vināśa iti siddhaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt ātma lābha avinābhāvī bhāvanām vināśaḥ iti siddhaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ

original: yad api kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhakasya padārthasthairyāvasāyi pratyabhijñānavijñānaṃ anumānasya bādhakam abhidhīyate tad api na peśalam aśithilapratibandhahetau bādhakasya niravakāśatvāt /
analyzed: yat api kṣaṇa bhaṅga sādhakasya padārtha sthairya avasāyi pratyabhijñāna vijñānam anumānasya bādhakam abhidhīyate tat api na peśalam aśithila pratibandha hetau bādhakasya niravakāśa tvāt

original: uktaṃ hi [bādhāvinābhāvayor virodhān naikatra samāveśaḥ] iti //
analyzed: uktam hi bādhā avinābhāvayoḥ virodhāt na ekatra samāveśaḥ iti

original: [anuṣṇas tejasvī kṛtakatvāt] ity atrāpi pratibandhavaidhuryam eva sādhyasiddhiṃ niruṇaddhi nādhyakṣabādhyatvam //
analyzed: anuṣṇaḥ tejasvī kṛtaka tvāt iti atra api pratibandha vaidhuryam eva sādhya siddhim niruṇaddhi na adhyakṣa bādhya tvam

original: atha vā kim anena nirbandhena agninaiśatyānumānādau yuktaṃ pratyakṣabādhanam /
analyzed: atha vā kim anena nirbandhena agni naiśatya anumāna ādau yuktam pratyakṣa bādhanam

original: tasya hy ananyathāsiddhiḥ iha tv etan na yujyate //
analyzed: tasya hi ananyathā siddhiḥ iha tu etat na yujyate

original: pratyabhijñāyāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgapakṣe 'pi sadṛśaparāparakṣaṇagaṇaprasavapratāritamatīnāṃ upapadyamānatvāt /
analyzed: pratyabhijñāyāḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga pakṣe sadṛśa para apara kṣaṇa gaṇa prasava pratārita matīnām upapadyamāna tvāt

original: evaṃ ca sati yadi hi vyāptiśaithilyaṃ siddhaṃ kiṃ pratyabhijñayā /
analyzed: evam ca sati yadi hi vyāpti śaithilyam siddham kim pratyabhijñayā

original: atha na vyāptiśaithilyaṃ siddhaṃ kiṃ pratyabhijñyā //
analyzed: atha na vyāpti śaithilyam siddham kim pratyabhijñyā

original: na cetthaṃ pratyabhijñaiva vyāptiviplavakāraṇam itaretarāśrayaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na ca ittham pratyabhijñā eva vyāpti viplava kāraṇam itaretara āśraya prasaṅgāt

original: vyāptiviplavenānumāne nyagbhūte pratyabhijñā pramāṇaṃ bhavati tasyāṃ ca pramāṇībhūtāyāṃ vyāptivaidhuryād anumānāprāmāṇyam //
analyzed: vyāpti viplavena anumāne nyagbhūte pratyabhijñā pramāṇam bhavati tasyām ca pramāṇībhūtāyām vyāpti vaidhuryāt anumāna aprāmāṇyam

original: anumānaprāmāṇye 'pi samāno doṣa iti cet na tasya prtibandhamahimnaiva prāmāṇyasiddheḥ /
analyzed: anumāna prāmāṇye pi samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na tasya prtibandha mahimnā eva prāmāṇya siddheḥ

original: na hi tasya pratyabhijñādaurbalyanibandhana prāmāṇyam //
analyzed: na hi tasya pratyabhijñā daurbalya nibandhana prāmāṇyam

original: api ca keyaṃ pratyabhijñā nāmeti naipuṇyena nirūpayitum arhanti atrabhavantaḥ /
analyzed: api ca kā iyam pratyabhijñā nāma iti naipuṇyena nirūpayitum arhanti atrabhavantaḥ

original: kiṃ [sa evāyaṃ stambhaḥ] ity ekaṃ jñānam uta dve ete smṛtyanubhavajñāne yady ekaṃ tad asya kāraṇaṃ vācyam yat utpadyate /
analyzed: kim saḥ eva ayam stambhaḥ iti ekam jñānam uta dve ete smṛti anubhava jñāne yadi ekam tat asya kāraṇam vācyam yat utpadyate

original: nendriyam [saḥ] ity asminn aṃśe tasyāsāmarthyāt /
analyzed: na indriyam saḥ iti asmin aṃśe tasya asāmarthyāt

original: na ca saṃskāraḥ tasyāpi [ayaṃ] ity aṃśe kauśalābhāvāt //
analyzed: na ca saṃskāraḥ tasya api ayam iti aṃśe kauśala abhāvāt

original: ubhābhyāṃ na ca sambhūya tadjñānam upajanyate /
analyzed: ubhābhyām na ca sambhūya tat jñānam upajanyate

original: pṛthak ṛthak sakārye hi nirjñātaṃ kauśalaṃ tayoḥ //
analyzed: pṛthak ṛthak sa kārye hi nirjñātam kauśalam tayoḥ

original: saṃskārasya smṛtir eva kāryam indriyasyānubhava eva /
analyzed: saṃskārasya smṛtiḥ eva kāryam indriyasya anubhavaḥ eva

original: sambhūya tu na tābhyām ekaṃ kāryam ārabhyate /
analyzed: sambhūya tu na tābhyām ekam kāryam ārabhyate

original: na hi mṛtpiṇḍatantunirvatyem ekaṃ ghaṭapaṭarūpakāryam upalabdham /
analyzed: na hi ekam ghaṭa paṭa rūpa kāryam upalabdham

original: na cendriyaṃ kevalam īdṛśi kārye samartham /
analyzed: na ca indriyam kevalam īdṛśi kārye samartham

original: yathā sannihitākāramātragrāhyaviṣayakam indriyaṃ pratyabhijñānam ātanotīti vismayaḥ /
analyzed: yathā sannihita ākāra mātra grāhya viṣayakam indriyam pratyabhijñānam ātanoti iti vismayaḥ

original: tasmāt dve ete jñāne sa iti smaraṇam ayam ity anubhavaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt dve ete jñāne saḥ iti smaraṇam ayam iti anubhavaḥ

original: smṛtiḥ smartavyaviṣayā grahaṇaṃ grāhyagocaram /
analyzed: smṛtiḥ smartavya viṣayā grahaṇam grāhya gocaram

original: na tad aikyaparāmarśi dṛśyate pratyayāntaram //
analyzed: na tat aikya parāmarśi dṛśyate pratyaya antaram

original: yathā nirantarotpanne ghaṭajñānapaṭasmṛtī /
analyzed: yathā nirantara utpanne ghaṭa jñāna paṭa smṛtī

original: na tulyaviṣaye tadvat ete api bhaviṣyataḥ //
analyzed: na tulya viṣaye tadvat ete api bhaviṣyataḥ

original: yad vā bhavatu nāmedaṃ ekam eva hi vedanam /
analyzed: yat vā bhavatu nāma idam ekam eva hi vedanam

original: tathāpi kīdṛśaṃ vastu spṛśatīti parīkṣyatām //
analyzed: tathā api kīdṛśam vastu spṛśati iti parīkṣyatām

original: atītakālayuktaṃ cet smaraṇān na viśiṣyate /
analyzed: atīta kāla yuktam ced smaraṇāt na viśiṣyate

original: anāgataviśiṣṭaṃ cet saṅkalpaprāyam eva tat //
analyzed: anāgata viśiṣṭam ced saṅkalpa prāyam eva tat

original: vartamānaikaniṣṭhaṃ cet sthiratvaṃ tarhi susthitam /
analyzed: vartamāna eka niṣṭham ced sthira tvam tarhi susthitam

original: kālatrayaparītaṃ cet virodhāt tat tu durlabham //
analyzed: kāla traya parītam ced virodhāt tat tu durlabham

original: parasparaparityāgavyavasthitanijātmanām /
analyzed: paraspara parityāga vyavasthita nija ātmanām

original: ekatra na samāveśaḥ kathaṃ cid upapadyate //
analyzed: ekatra na samāveśaḥ katham cit upapadyate

original: yathā hi nīlābhāvāvinābhūtalohitādyapasāraṇam /
analyzed: yathā hi nīla abhāva avinābhūta lohita ādi apasāraṇam

original: kurvatā nīlabodhena nīlaṃ bhavati niścitam //
analyzed: kurvatā nīla bodhena nīlam bhavati niścitam

original: tadvad ihāpi tadabhāvāvinābhūtabhūtakālādyapohanam /
analyzed: tadvat iha api tad abhāva avinābhūta bhūta kāla ādi apohanam

original: vidadhad vartamānārthajñānaṃ tadgrāhitāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: vidadhat vartamāna artha jñānam tad grāhi tām vrajet

original: etena pūrvajñānaviśiṣṭārthagrāhitvaṃ pratyabhijñāyāḥ pratyuktam /
analyzed: etena pūrva jñāna viśiṣṭa artha grāhi tvam pratyabhijñāyāḥ pratyuktam

original: pūrvajñānasyedānīm asattvena viśeṣaṇatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: pūrva jñānasya idānīm asattvena viśeṣaṇa tva anupapatteḥ

original: agṛhītaviśeṣaṇāyāś ca viśiṣṭabuddher abhāvāt //
analyzed: agṛhīta viśeṣaṇāyāḥ ca viśiṣṭa buddheḥ abhāvāt

original: atha upajananāpāyarahitavastusvarūpagrāhiṇī pratyabhijñety ucyate tad apy ayuktam vartamānaikaniṣṭhatāyāḥ pradarśitatvāt /
analyzed: atha upajanana apāya rahita vastu svarūpa grāhiṇī pratyabhijñā iti ucyate tat api ayuktam vartamāna eka niṣṭha tāyāḥ pradarśita tvāt

original: bhāvānāṃ ca vināśajanmanoḥ vartamāno vā kālaḥ syāt anyo vā tadanyas tāvat grahītum aśakya ity uktam /
analyzed: bhāvānām ca vināśa janmanoḥ vartamānaḥ vā kālaḥ syāt anyaḥ vā tad anyaḥ tāvat grahītum aśakyaḥ iti uktam

original: vartamāne tu tadutpādavināśakāle kathyamāne tadgrahaṇāt tadavinābhūtau bhāvānām utpādavināśāv api gṛhītau syātām //
analyzed: vartamāne tu tad utpāda vināśa kāle kathyamāne tad grahaṇāt tad avinābhūtau bhāvānām utpāda vināśau api gṛhītau syātām

original: seyaṃ tapasvinī sthairyaṃ prasādhayitum āgatā /
analyzed: sā iyam tapasvinī sthairyam prasādhayitum āgatā

original: pratyabhijñā vināśitvaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya gamiṣyati //
analyzed: pratyabhijñā vināśi tvam pratiṣṭhāpya gamiṣyati

original: api ca lūnapunarjātakeśanakhādiṣu sādṛśyāt dṛśyamānā pratyabhijñā stambhādiṣv api tadvad eva na sthiratām upapādayet /
analyzed: api ca lūna punar jāta keśa nakha ādiṣu sādṛśyāt dṛśyamānā pratyabhijñā stambha ādiṣu api tadvat eva na sthira tām upapādayet

original: tatra bādhakayogād iti cet ihāpy ukta eva bādhakaḥ parasparavirodhibhūtādikālasamāveśasyaikatra durghaṭatvād iti /
analyzed: tatra bādhaka yogāt iti ced iha api uktaḥ eva bādhakaḥ paraspara virodhi bhūta ādi kāla samāveśasya ekatra durghaṭa tvāt iti

original: tasmāt pratyabhijñāpratyayasya bādhakasyābhāvat siddham ānumānikaṃ bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikatvam //
analyzed: tasmāt pratyabhijñā pratyayasya siddham ānumānikam bhāvānām kṣaṇika tvam

original: apare punaḥ pratyakṣagamyam eva kṣaṇikatvam ācakṣte //
analyzed: apare punar pratyakṣa gamyam eva kṣaṇika tvam ācakṣte

original: nātītānāgatau kālau vicārayati cākṣuṣam /
analyzed: na atīta anāgatau kālau vicārayati cākṣuṣam

original: vartamānaḥ kṣaṇaś caikaḥ iti tanniṣṭham eva tat //
analyzed: vartamānaḥ kṣaṇaḥ ca ekaḥ iti tad niṣṭham eva tat

original: yadi ca vartamānatāvyatiriktagrāhi pratyakṣam iṣyate tad vaktavyam kiṃ pūrvaṃ vijñānam anāgatakālāvacchinnapadārthagrahaṇanipuṇam uta uttaravijñānam atītakālāliṅgitabhāvākalanakuśalam iti //
analyzed: yadi ca vartamāna tā vyatirikta grāhi pratyakṣam iṣyate tat vaktavyam kim pūrvam vijñānam anāgata kāla avacchinna padārtha grahaṇa nipuṇam uta uttara vijñānam atīta kāla āliṅgita bhāva a kalana kuśalam iti

original: tatra ādyavijñānasamupajananasamaye tatkṣaṇātiriktabhāvikālāsannidhānāt na tena tadgrahaṇam anāgatagrahaṇe vā katham āgāmijanmagrahaṇaṃ syāt uttaravijñānaprasavasamaye 'pi bhūtakālasya bhūtatvād eva na sannidhānam asannihitabhūtakālagrahaṇe vā pūrvajanmagrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: tatra ādya vijñāna samupajanana samaye tad kṣaṇa atirikta bhāvi kāla asannidhānāt na tena tad grahaṇam anāgata grahaṇe vā katham āgāmi janma grahaṇam syāt uttara vijñāna prasava samaye bhūta kālasya bhūta tvāt eva na sannidhānam asannihita bhūta kāla grahaṇe vā pūrva janma grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ

original: atha vartamānānupraveśena bhūtabhāvinoḥ kālayoḥ grahaṇaṃ manyase tarhi vartamānānupraveśāt vartamāna eva sa kālaḥ gṛhītaḥ syāt na bhūtaḥ bhāvī vā //
analyzed: atha vartamāna anupraveśena bhūta bhāvinoḥ kālayoḥ grahaṇam manyase tarhi vartamāna anupraveśāt vartamānaḥ eva sa kālaḥ gṛhītaḥ syāt na bhūtaḥ bhāvī vā

original: atha na kaścid eva kālaḥ kvacid gṛhyate artha eva kevalaḥ prakāśata iti tad ayuktam tadanavacchinnabhāvagrahaṇasya bhavadgṛhe cānabhyupagamāt //
analyzed: atha na kaścid eva kālaḥ kvacid gṛhyate arthaḥ eva kevalaḥ prakāśate iti tat ayuktam tad anavacchinna bhāva grahaṇasya bhavat gṛhe ca anabhyupagamāt

original: nanu ko 'yaṃ kālo nāma śākyānāṃ na kaścit vāstavaḥ kin tu kālpanika eva tadvyavahāraḥ //
analyzed: nanu kaḥ yam kālaḥ nāma śākyānām na kaścid vāstavaḥ kin tu kālpanikaḥ eva tad vyavahāraḥ

original: sarvathendriyajaṃ jñānaṃ vartamānaikagocaram /
analyzed: sarvathā indriya jam jñānam vartamāna eka gocaram

original: purvāparadaśāsparśakauśalaṃ nāvalambate //
analyzed: purva apara daśā sparśa kauśalam na avalambate

original: vartamānaś ca kiyān kālaḥ eka eva kṣaṇas tataḥ /
analyzed: vartamānaḥ ca kiyān kālaḥ ekaḥ eva kṣaṇaḥ tatas

original: pūrvaḥ kṣaṇo 'tītatāṃ spṛśati uttaras tv anāgatatām //
analyzed: pūrvaḥ tīta tām spṛśati uttaraḥ tu anāgata tām

original: nanu ca pacati paṭhatīti vartamāno 'pi hi vitata eva kālaḥ pratīyate naitat sāram na hy asti kālāvayavī nānākṣaṇagaṇātmakaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ca pacati paṭhati iti vartamānaḥ hi vitataḥ eva kālaḥ pratīyate na etat sāram na hi asti kāla avayavī nānā kṣaṇa gaṇa ātmakaḥ

original: vartamānakṣaṇo dīrghaḥ iti bāliśabhāṣitam //
analyzed: vartamāna kṣaṇaḥ dīrghaḥ iti bāliśa bhāṣitam

original: kṣaṇasamudāyātmakatve tu nānārūpatvam eva tasya bhavet /
analyzed: kṣaṇa samudāya ātmaka tve tu nānā rūpa tvam eva tasya bhavet

original: atītānāgatakṣaṇānupraveśāt /
analyzed: atīta anāgata kṣaṇa anupraveśāt

original: tasmād ekakṣaṇo vartamānaḥ sa cātyantam alpīyānityevam ekakṣaṇaparītārthadarśi cākṣuṣaṃ tataḥ pūrvam ūrdhvaṃ vā na padārthasattāṃ gṛhṇātīti kṣaṇikā eva bhāvāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt eka kṣaṇaḥ vartamānaḥ sa ca atyantam alpīyān iti evam eka kṣaṇa parīta artha darśi cākṣuṣam tatas pūrvam ūrdhvam vā na padārtha sattām gṛhṇāti iti kṣaṇikāḥ eva bhāvāḥ

original: nanu ca vartamānakṣaṇāt pūrvam ūrdhvaṃ vā tadastitvavat nāstitvam api gṛhītam eveti kathaṃ kṣaṇikatvam //
analyzed: nanu ca vartamāna kṣaṇāt pūrvam ūrdhvam vā tad astitva vat nāstitvam api gṛhītam eva iti katham kṣaṇikatvam

original: ka evam āha na gṛhītaṃ nāstitvam anupalabdher eva nāstitvavyavahārāt /
analyzed: kaḥ evam āha na gṛhītam nāstitvam anupalabdheḥ eva nāstitva vyavahārāt

original: upalambho hi bhāvānāṃ sattā anupalambhaś ca nāstitvam darśanādarśane eva sadasattvayor lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: upalambhaḥ hi bhāvānām sattā anupalambhaḥ ca nāstitvam darśana adarśane eva sat asat tvayoḥ lakṣaṇam

original: tasmāt kṣaṇāntare tadanupalabbhāt nāstitvam evety evaṃ kṣaṇikatvagrāhi pratyakṣam iti sthitam //
analyzed: tasmāt kṣaṇa antare tad anupalabbhāt nāstitvam eva iti evam kṣaṇika tva grāhi pratyakṣam iti sthitam

original: nanu ca pratyabhijñāto dīrghakālatvaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ca pratyabhijñātaḥ dīrgha kāla tva niścayaḥ

original: kim adyāpi na mukto 'si tatpramāṇyakutṛṣṇayā //
analyzed: kim adyā api na muktaḥ si tad pramāṇya kutṛṣṇayā

original: parīkṣitaṃ hi tasyāḥ svarūpaṃ kāryaṃ ca kāraṇam /
analyzed: parīkṣitam hi tasyāḥ svarūpam kāryam ca kāraṇam

original: na śaknoty eva sā sthairyaṃ upapādayituṃ dhruvam //
analyzed: na śaknoti eva sā sthairyam upapādayitum dhruvam

original: na pūrvaṃ nottaraṃ jñānaṃ grāhi kālāntarasthiteḥ /
analyzed: na pūrvam na uttaram jñānam grāhi kāla antara sthiteḥ

original: tad idaṃ bodhyamano 'pi ragāndho nāvabudhyase //
analyzed: tat idam bodhya manaḥ pi raga andhaḥ na avabudhyase

original: pūrvaṃ hi jñānaṃ tatkālam eva uttaram api svakālam eva vastu gṛhṇāti madhye tu nāsty eva grahaṇam /
analyzed: pūrvam hi jñānam tad kālam eva uttaram api sva kālam eva vastu gṛhṇāti madhye tu na asti eva grahaṇam

original: agrahaṇam eva hi madhyam āhuḥ //
analyzed: a grahaṇam eva hi madhyam āhuḥ

original: nanv avicchinnadṛṣṭīnāṃ na hi truṭyad avasthitiḥ /
analyzed: nanu avicchinna dṛṣṭīnām na hi truṭyat avasthitiḥ

original: stambhādir avabhātīti katham etasya bhaṅgitā //
analyzed: stambha ādiḥ avabhāti iti katham etasya bhaṅgi tā

original: naitad evam tatrāpy ekakṣaṇavṛttitvāt jñānasya /
analyzed: na etat evam tatra api eka kṣaṇa vṛtti tvāt jñānasya

original: kṣaṇāntare tu jñānam eva nāsti tat /tat kasyāvicinnasattā kasya truṭitasattā kasya vā bādhakam nanu asty eva kṣaṇāntare vijñānam avicchinnatvād dṛṣṭer iti cet maivam buddher adīrghakālatvāt jñānāntarotpāda evāsāv ity avadhārayatvāyuṣmān //
analyzed: kṣaṇa antare tu jñānam eva nā asti tat tat kasya avicinna sattā kasya truṭita sattā kasya vā bādhakam nanu asti eva kṣaṇa antare vijñānam avicchinna tvāt dṛṣṭeḥ iti ced mā evam buddheḥ adīrgha kāla tvāt jñāna antara utpādaḥ eva asau iti avadhārayatu āyuṣmān

original: tasmād yathaiva santānavṛttyā jñānakṣaṇodayaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā eva santāna vṛttyā jñāna kṣaṇa udayaḥ

original: tathaivotpādyatām eṣā stambhakṣaṇaparamparā //
analyzed: tathā evā utpādyatām eṣā stambha kṣaṇa paramparā

original: so 'yaṃ avicchinnadṛṣṭīnāṃ atruṭitapadārthasattāgrahaṇābhimāna ittham utthitaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ yam avicchinna dṛṣṭīnām a truṭita padārtha sattā grahaṇa abhimānaḥ ittham utthitaḥ

original: sthireṇāpi na bodhena dīrghakālasthitigrahaḥ /
analyzed: sthireṇa api na bodhena dīrgha kāla sthiti grahaḥ

original: na hy asannihitagrāhi pratyakṣam iti varṇitam //
analyzed: na hi asannihita grāhi pratyakṣam iti varṇitam

original: tatkāle sannidhir nāsti kṣaṇayor bhūtabhāvinoḥ /
analyzed: tad kāle sannidhiḥ nā asti kṣaṇayoḥ bhūta bhāvinoḥ

original: vartamānakṣaṇaś caiko na dīrghatvaṃ prapadyate //
analyzed: vartamāna kṣaṇaḥ ca ekaḥ na dīrgha tvam prapadyate

original: tena buddhes sthiratve 'pi sthaiyem arthasya durvacam /
analyzed: tena buddheḥ sthira tve pi sthaiyā īm arthasya durvacam

original: na tv anantarayā nītyā tasyā api ciraṃ sthitiḥ //
analyzed: na tu anantarayā nītyā tasyāḥ api ciram sthitiḥ

original: sā 'pi hi svasaṃvedyatvāt ekakṣaṇaparītaiva prakāśata iti /
analyzed: sā pi hi sva saṃvedya tvāt eka kṣaṇa parītā eva prakāśate iti

original: tasmāt kṣaṇikagrāhi pratyakṣam iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt kṣaṇika grāhi pratyakṣam iti siddham

original: nanu sthairyaṃ padārthānām anumānāt pratīyate /
analyzed: nanu sthairyam padārthānām anumānāt pratīyate

original: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ mudgarādivināśakaḥ //
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām mudgara ādi vināśakaḥ

original: niścīyate ghaṭādīnāṃ tena pūrvaṃ tadāgamāt /
analyzed: niścīyate ghaṭa ādīnām tena pūrvam tad āgamāt

original: vināśarahitatvena siddhaty eṣām avasthitiḥ //
analyzed: vināśa rahita tvena eṣām avasthitiḥ

original: na anupalambhavyatiriktasya hetumataḥ vināśasyānupalabdheḥ /
analyzed: na anupalambha vyatiriktasya hetumataḥ vināśasya anupalabdheḥ

original: upalambha evāstitvaṃ bhāvānām anupalambhaś ca nāstitvam /
analyzed: upalambhaḥ eva astitvam bhāvānām anupalambhaḥ ca nāstitvam

original: na ca ghaṭānupalabdhiḥ mudgarādikāryā tataḥ prāg api bhāvāt //
analyzed: na ca ghaṭa anupalabdhiḥ mudgara ādi kāryā tatas prāk api bhāvāt

original: nanu dṛśyānupalabdheḥ asattvaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: nanu dṛśya anupalabdheḥ asattva niścayaḥ

original: sa ca kapālakāla eva ghaṭasyāvakalpate /
analyzed: sa ca kapāla kāle eva ghaṭasya avakalpate

original: madhye tv adarśanaṃ anyathā 'pi syād iti nādarśanamātram eva nāstitvam maivam tvadabhimate madhye 'pi dṛśyasyaiva ghaṭasyānupalambha iti tadā 'py asya nāstitvam eva //
analyzed: madhye tu adarśanam anyathā syāt iti na adarśana mātram eva nāstitvam mā evam tvad abhimate madhye dṛśyasya eva ghaṭasya anupalambhaḥ iti tadā pi asya nāstitvam eva

original: athāpi madhye sarveṣāṃ na ghaṭānupalambhanam /
analyzed: atha api madhye sarveṣām na ghaṭa anupalambhanam

original: tadvat kapālakāle 'pi sarveṣām iti kā pramā //
analyzed: tadvat kapāla kāle sarveṣām iti kā pramā

original: yad ahaṃ na vedmi tat paro 'pi na vedeti cet tarhi madhye 'pi ghaṭaṃ sarva eva na paśyeyur iti nāsty evāsau kapālībhūtaghaṭavat /
analyzed: yat aham na vedmi tat na veda iti ced tarhi madhye ghaṭam sarve eva na paśyeyuḥ iti na asti eva asau kapālībhūta ghaṭa vat

original: api ca yadi yat tvaṃ na jānāsi tad anyo 'pi na manyate /
analyzed: api ca yadi yat tvam na jānāsi tat na manyate

original: svajāyājaghanasparśasukham apy eṣa mā grahīt //
analyzed: sva jāyā jaghana sparśa sukham api eṣa mā grahīt

original: yadi vā budhyase yat tvaṃ tad anyo 'py adhigacchati /
analyzed: yadi vā budhyase yat tvam tat anyaḥ api adhigacchati

original: tvajjāyājaghanasparśasukham apy adhigacchatu //
analyzed: tvad jāyā jaghana sparśa sukham api adhigacchatu

original: tad alaṃ te paragṛhavṛttāntacintayā /
analyzed: tat alam te para gṛha vṛttānta cintayā

original: yat paśyasi tad astīti jānīhi yan na paśyasi tan nāstīti viddhi /
analyzed: yat paśyasi tat asti iti jānīhi yat na paśyasi tat na asti iti viddhi

original: evam anupalambha eva bhavānāṃ vināśa iti na tasya mudgarādikāryatvam ato 'numānam api na sthairyasādhakam /
analyzed: evam anupalambhaḥ eva bhavānām vināśaḥ iti na tasya mudgara ādi kārya tvam atas numānam api na sthairya sādhakam

original: tasmād yathoktakrameṇa pratyakṣam eva kṣaṇikapadārthaparicchedīti sthitam //
analyzed: tasmāt yathā ukta krameṇa pratyakṣam eva kṣaṇika padārtha paricchedi iti sthitam

original: smaraṇapratyabhijñānasvakarmaphalabhoktṛtāḥ /
analyzed: smaraṇa pratyabhijñāna sva karma phala bhoktṛ tāḥ

original: kṣaṇikatve 'pi kathitāḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvataḥ //
analyzed: kṣaṇika tve pi kathitāḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvataḥ

original: tad evam upapanneyaṃ gṛhyatāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgitā /
analyzed: tat evam upapannā iyam gṛhyatām kṣaṇabhaṅgi tā

original: tyajyatāṃ dīrghasaṃs{k}ārakāraṇaṃ sthiratāgrahaḥ //
analyzed: tyajyatām dīrgha saṃskāra kāraṇam sthira tā grahaḥ

original: atrābhidhīyate naiva pramāṇadvayam apy adaḥ /
analyzed: atrā abhidhīyate nā eva pramāṇa dvayam api adaḥ

original: bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgitvaṃ upapādayituṃ kṣaṃam //
analyzed: bhāvānām kṣaṇabhaṅgi tvam upapādayitum

original: arthakriyāsamarthatvaṃ sattvaṃ yat tāvad ucyate /
analyzed: artha kriyā samartha tvam sattvam yat tāvat ucyate

original: tad asatkūṭahemāditryabhicārāvadhāraṇāt //
analyzed: tat asat kūṭa hema ādi tryabhicāra avadhāraṇāt

original: kin tv abādhitasadbuddhigamyatāsattvabhiṣyate /
analyzed: kin tu

original: sadasadvyapadeśas tu putrādāv aupacārikaḥ //
analyzed: sat asat vyapadeśaḥ tu putra ādau aupacārikaḥ

original: evaṃ ca bādhakābhāvaparyeṣaṇaparāyaṇam /
analyzed: evam ca bādhaka abhāva paryeṣaṇa parāyaṇam

original: na sattvagrāhakaṃ jñānaṃ svataḥ prāmāṇyam arhati //
analyzed: na sattva grāhakam jñānam svatas prāmāṇyam arhati

original: sattve ca saṃśayo 'py asti sakalaprāṇisākṣikaḥ /
analyzed: sattve ca saṃśayaḥ asti sakala prāṇi sākṣikaḥ

original: upalabdhyavyavasthātaity evaṃ varṇayiṣyate //
analyzed: upalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ eti evam varṇayiṣyate

original: arthakriyāsamarthatvaṃ tvaduktaṃ sattvam astu vā /
analyzed: artha kriyā samartha tvam tvad uktam sattvam astu vā

original: tad api vyāptiśūnyatvān na hetur gandhavattvavat //
analyzed: tat api vyāpti śūnya tvāt na hetuḥ gandhavat tva vat

original: kṣaṇikasyāpi bhāvasya sattvaṃ nāsty eva so 'pi hi /
analyzed: kṣaṇikasya api bhāvasya sattvam na asti eva hi

original: krameṇa yugapad vā 'pi na kāryakaraṇakṣamaḥ //
analyzed: krameṇa yugapad vā na kārya karaṇa kṣamaḥ

original: kṣaṇikasya kramaḥ kīdṛg yupatkaraṇe punaḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇikasya kramaḥ kīdṛś yupat karaṇe punar

original: ekavastukṣaṇasyāpi rūpabhedaḥ prasajyate //
analyzed: eka vastu kṣaṇasya api rūpa bhedaḥ prasajyate

original: kāryāṇy ekena rūpeṇa bhinnāni janayet katham /
analyzed: kāryāṇi ekena rūpeṇa bhinnāni janayet katham

original: rūpabhedavirodhāt tu vastuno nāstitā bhavet //
analyzed: rūpa bheda virodhāt tu vastunaḥ nāstitā bhavet

original: sthite ca vastusadbhāve kṣaṇikatvaṃ parīkṣyate /
analyzed: sthite ca vastu sadbhāve kṣaṇika tvam parīkṣyate

original: tadasattve tu taccintā vyomni romanthakelivat //
analyzed: tad asattve tu tad cintā vyomni romantha keli vat

original: jñāne kṣaṇikacintā cet kiṃ tasyāpi parākṛtau /
analyzed: jñāne kṣaṇika cintā ced kim tasya api parākṛtau

original: vahaty etāni śāstrāṇi jñeyābhāve ca tat kutaḥ //
analyzed: vahati etāni śāstrāṇi jñeya abhāve ca tat kutas

original: api ca kṣaṇikatvapakṣe kim ekasmād ekotpādaḥ uta bahubhya ekotpattiḥ athaikasmād anekaniṣpattiḥ āhosvit bahubhyo bahusambhavaḥ iti parīkṣaṇīyam //
analyzed: api ca kṣaṇika tva pakṣe kim ekasmāt eka utpādaḥ uta bahubhyaḥ eka utpattiḥ atha ekasmāt aneka niṣpattiḥ āhosvit bahubhyaḥ bahu sambhavaḥ iti parīkṣaṇīyam

original: na tāvad ekasmād ekotpattiḥ alaukikatvāt /
analyzed: na tāvat ekasmāt eka utpattiḥ alaukika tvāt

original: ekasmād apy agneḥ bhasmadhūmendhanavikārādyanekaprakārakāryakalāpotpādadarśanāt /
analyzed: ekasmāt api agneḥ bhasma dhūma indhana vikāra ādi aneka prakāra kārya kalāpa utpāda darśanāt

original: kāryasiddhaye ca sarvatra sahakārisannidhāpanaprayatnadarśanāt [na vai kiñcid ekaṃ janakam] iti granthavirodhāc ca //
analyzed: kārya siddhaye ca sarvatra sahakāri sannidhāpana prayatna darśanāt na vai kiñcid ekam janakam iti grantha virodhāt ca

original: etena tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ nirastaḥ ekasmād anekotpattir iti /
analyzed: etena tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ nirastaḥ ekasmāt aneka utpattiḥ iti

original: ekaś ca naikaṃ janayat krameṇa janayet yugapad vā na krameṇa stheryaprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: ekaḥ ca na ekam janayat krameṇa janayet yugapad vā na krameṇa stherya prasaṅgāt

original: na yugapat adṛṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: na yugapad adṛṣṭa tvāt

original: ekasya cānekakāryakaraṇaśaktiyogena tadbhedān nānātvaprasaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: ekasya ca aneka kārya karaṇa śakti yogena tad bhedāt nānātva prasaṅgaḥ

original: viruddhadharmayoge 'pi yadi caikatvam iṣyate /
analyzed: viruddha dharma yoge yadi ca eka tvam iṣyate

original: anekakṣaṇayoge 'pi bhāva eka upeyatām //
analyzed: aneka kṣaṇa yoge pi bhāvaḥ ekaḥ upeyatām

original: atha bahubhya ekotpādanam iti pakṣa āśrīyate tad vaktavyam kiṃ tad ekaṃ kāryam kair vā bahubhir utpādyate iti /
analyzed: atha bahubhyaḥ eka utpādanam iti pakṣaḥ āśrīyate tat vaktavyam kim tat ekam kāryam kaiḥ vā bahubhiḥ utpādyate iti

original: na hy asmākam iva bhavatāṃ anekopāyanivahanirmitaṃ avayavisvarūpaṃ kāryam asti saṃcitaiḥ saṃcitā eva janyanta ity abhyupagamāt //
analyzed: na hi asmākam iva bhavatām aneka upāya nivaha nirmitam avayavi svarūpam kāryam asti saṃcitaiḥ saṃcitāḥ eva janyante iti abhyupagamāt

original: yadi cānekakāraṇakāryam ekam ucyate tad asya kāraṇabhedopanatasvabhāvanānātvayogāt ekatvam eva tāvad virudhyate /
analyzed: yadi ca aneka kāraṇa kāryam ekam ucyate tat asya kāraṇa bheda upanata svabhāva nānātva yogāt ekatvam eva tāvat virudhyate

original: anyathātve hi na kāraṇādhīnaṃ bhāvānāṃ rūpamityākasmikatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: anyathātve hi na kāraṇa adhīnam bhāvānām rūpam iti ākasmika tva prasaṅgaḥ

original: kāraṇabhedāpāditanānātvasyāpi yadi caikatvaṃ tadaikasya nānākālayogino 'py ekatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: kāraṇa bheda āpādita nānātvasya api yadi ca ekatvam tadā ekasya nānā kāla yoginaḥ api ekatvam syāt

original: asattvaṃ vā bhinnasvabhāvasya vastuna iti pūrvavat vaktavyam //
analyzed: asattvam vā bhinna svabhāvasya vastunaḥ iti pūrvavat vaktavyam

original: locanālokamamaskarādikāraṇabhede kāram apy ekarūpaṃ jñānaṃ iti cen na tasya bhavanmate viṣayākāragrāhakatvasvasaṃvedanarūpabhedat /
analyzed: api eka rūpam jñānam iti ced na tasya bhavat mate viṣaya ākāra grāhaka tva sva saṃvedana rūpa bhedat

original: nirākārajñānavādino hi bauddhasya pratikarmavyavasthā na sidhyati janakasya karmaṇaḥ pratibhāse sthairyaprasaṅgāt ekasāmagryadhīnatvapakṣasya cāsambhavāt /
analyzed: nirākāra jñāna vādinaḥ hi bauddhasya prati karma vyavasthā na sidhyati janakasya karmaṇaḥ pratibhāse sthairya prasaṅgāt eka sāmagrī adhīna tva pakṣasya ca asambhavāt

original: sambhave 'vivāgrāhyaniyamanimittābhāvād iti //
analyzed: sambhave iti

original: athocyate kim anabhyupagatapakṣopamardanena /
analyzed: atha ucyate kim an abhyupagata pakṣa upamardanena

original: bahubhyo bahusaṃbhava ity eṣa eva naḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: bahubhyaḥ bahu saṃbhavaḥ iti eṣaḥ eva naḥ pakṣaḥ

original: santānavṛttyā vartamānā pūrvasāmagrī sarūpām uttarasāmagrīm ārabhate /
analyzed: santāna vṛttyā vartamānā pūrva sāmagrī sarūpām uttara sāmagrīm ārabhate

original: vijātīyakāraṇānupraveśe tu virūpām iti //
analyzed: vijātīya kāraṇa anupraveśe tu virūpām iti

original: atha keyaṃ sāmagrī nāma na samagrebhyo bhinnā pṛthag anupalambhāt /
analyzed: atha kā iyam sāmagrī nāma na samagrebhyaḥ bhinnā pṛthak anupalambhāt

original: avyatireke tu samagra eva sāmagrī /
analyzed: avyatireke tu samagrā eva sāmagrī

original: tatra pūrvasamudāyena uttarasamudāyārmbhe tadantargataṃ samudāyinam ekam eka evotpādayet ekaṃ vā sarve saṃbhūyeti //
analyzed: tatra pūrva samudāyena uttara samudāya ārmbhe tad antargatam samudāyinam ekam ekaḥ eva utpādayet ekam vā sarve saṃbhūya iti

original: tatra ādye pakṣe saiveyam ekasmād ekotpatttir ukta syāt /
analyzed: tatra ādye pakṣe sā eva iyam ekasmāt eka utpattiḥ syāt

original: sā ca pratiṣiddhā //
analyzed: sā ca pratiṣiddhā

original: athaikaikasamudāyiniṣpattau sarvasamudāyināṃ vyāpāraḥ sa tu krameṇa vā yaugapadyena vā tatra kramapakṣe kṣaṇikatvahāniḥ /
analyzed: atha ekaika samudāyi niṣpattau sarva samudāyinām vyāpāraḥ sa tu krameṇa vā yaugapadyena vā tatra krama pakṣe kṣaṇika tva hāniḥ

original: ye hi tatra paṃcaṣaśamudayinaḥ kṣaṇāḥ vartante te ekaṃ tam utpādya punar aparam ārabheran puanr anyam iti tāvat kālapratīkṣaṇād akṣaṇikatvam //
analyzed: ye hi tatra kṣaṇāḥ vartante te ekam tam utpādya punar aparam ārabheran anyam iti tāvat kāla pratīkṣaṇāt akṣaṇika tvam

original: atha yugapad eva sarvaniṣpattau sarve vyāpriyante tarhi nikurumbarūpam eva kāryaṃ niurumbarūpād eva kāraṇād utpanam iti kāraṇavivekaniyamābhāvāt rūparasādipravibhāgo na syāt /
analyzed: atha yugapad eva sarva niṣpattau sarve vyāpriyante tarhi nikurumba rūpam eva kāryam niurumba rūpāt eva kāraṇāt utpanam iti kāraṇa viveka niyama abhāvāt rūpa rasa ādi pravibhāgaḥ na syāt

original: idaṃ rūpaṃ eṣa rasaḥ iti kathaṃ niścīyate citreṇa citram utpāditam iti sarvaṃ rūpaṃ syāt /
analyzed: idam rūpam eṣa rasaḥ iti katham niścīyate citreṇa citram utpāditam iti sarvam rūpam syāt

original: sarvo vā rasaḥ /
analyzed: sarvaḥ vā rasaḥ

original: yad vā na rūpaṃ na rasaḥ anyad eva kiñcid vastvantaraṃ tat syāt //
analyzed: yat vā na rūpam na rasaḥ anyat eva kiñcid vastu antaram tat syāt

original: athocyate yady api rūparasādisāmagrī tatsāmagryā eva janikā tathāpi kvacit kiñcid upādānakāraṇaṃ itarat sahakāri kāraṇaṃ /
analyzed: atha ucyate yadi api rūpa rasa ādi sāmagrī tad sāmagryāḥ eva janikā tathā api kvacid kiñcid upādāna kāraṇam itarat sahakāri kāraṇam

original: tatra rūpakṣaṇaniṣpattau rūpasyopādānakāraṇatvāt itareṣāṃ ca sahakārikāraṇatvāt na padārthasaṅkara iti tad ayuktam sarvathā kāraṇatvānapāyāt //
analyzed: tatra rūpa kṣaṇa niṣpattau rūpasya upādāna kāraṇa tvāt itareṣām ca sahakāri kāraṇa tvāt na padārtha saṅkaraḥ iti tat ayuktam sarvathā kāraṇa tva anapāyāt

original: api ca yena svarūpeṇa rūpasya rūpaṃ pratyupādānakāraṇatā tenaiva yadi rasaṃ prati sahakārikāraṇatā tadā punar api rūparasayor aviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: api ca yena sva rūpeṇa rūpasya rūpam prati upādāna kāraṇatā tena eva yadi rasam prati sahakāri kāraṇatā tadā punar api rūpa rasayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ

original: athānyena rūpeṇa rūpasya rūpopādānatā anyena ca rasasahakāriteti tarhi svabhāva bhedān nānātvam nānātve ca sthairyam asattvaṃ vety uktam atha nāsty anayoḥ kiñcid viruddhatvaṃ svabhāvayoḥ /
analyzed: atha anyena rūpeṇa rūpasya rūpa upādāna tā anyena ca rasa sahakāri tā iti tarhi svabhāva bhedāt nānātvam nānātve ca sthairyam asattvam vā iti uktam atha na asti anayoḥ kiñcid viruddha tvam svabhāvayoḥ

original: kathaṃ bauddhagṛhe jātas tvam evam abhibhāṣase //
analyzed: katham bauddha gṛhe jātaḥ tvam evam abhibhāṣase

original: bhāvānāṃ parasparaparihāravyavasthhitarūpatvād asty evaiṣāṃ lākṣaṇiko virodhaḥ //
analyzed: bhāvānām paraspara parihāra vyavasthhita rūpa tvāt asti eva eṣām lākṣaṇikaḥ virodhaḥ

original: api ca kṣaṇikatve padārthānāṃ idam atropadānakāraṇaṃ idam sahakārikāraṇam iti viśeṣo 'pi duravagamaḥ /
analyzed: api ca kṣaṇika tve padārthānām idam atra upadāna kāraṇam idam sahakāri kāraṇam iti viśeṣaḥ duravagamaḥ

original: tathā hi kim idam upādānaṃ nāma kiṃ svasantānavināśena bījādivat kāryajanakam upādānam uta svaviśeṣasamarpaṇenotpādakam iti /
analyzed: tathā hi kim idam upādānam nāma kim sva santāna vināśena bīja ādi vat kārya janakam upādānam uta sva viśeṣa samarpaṇena utpādakam iti

original: yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ paralokacarcā cārvākavad upekṣitā syāt /
analyzed: yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ para loka carcā cārvāka vat upekṣitā syāt

original: jñānasantānavināśena jñānāntarārambhaprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: jñāna santāna vināśena jñāna antara ārambha prasaṅgāt

original: svaviśeṣārpaṇapakṣe 'pi sarvaviśeṣārpaṇaṃ vā syāt katipayaviśeṣārpaṇaṃ vā sarvaviśeṣārpaṇe nirvikalpajñānaṃ savikalpakasya nopādānakāraṇaṃ syāt //
analyzed: sva viśeṣa arpaṇa pakṣe sarva viśeṣa arpaṇam vā syāt katipaya viśeṣa arpaṇam vā sarva viśeṣa arpaṇe nirvikalpa jñānam savikalpakasya na upādāna kāraṇam syāt

original: liṅgdarśanajanyā ca pratibandhasmṛtiḥ katham /
analyzed: liṅg darśana janyā ca pratibandha smṛtiḥ katham

original: kathaṃ vā rasavijñānaṃ rūpajñānād anantaram //
analyzed: katham vā rasa vijñānam rūpa jñānāt anantaram

original: santānabhūyastvād bhaviṣyatīti cet na ekapramātradhīnapratisandhāno panibandhanavyavahārapratibandhaviplavaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: santāna bhūyaḥ tvāt bhaviṣyati iti ced na eka pramātṛ adhīna pratisandhāna u panibandhana vyavahāra pratibandha viplava prasaṅgāt

original: nityam ekam ātmānam antareṇa santānaikatāyām api tāvad asau vyavahāro nāvakalpate /
analyzed: nityam ekam ātmānam antareṇa santāna ekatāyām api tāvat asau vyavahāraḥ na avakalpate

original: kim utaikatraiva devadattasantānabhūyastve satīti //
analyzed: kim uta ekatra eva devadatta santāna bhūyaḥ tve sati iti

original: katipayaviśeṣārpaṇena tu yady upādānatā tadānīṃ rūpam api jñānopādāna kāraṇatāṃ pratipadyeta /
analyzed: katipaya viśeṣa arpaṇena tu yadi upādāna tā tadānīm rūpam api jñāna upādāna kāraṇa tām pratipadyeta

original: tasmān nopādānakāraṇaṃ nāma kiñcit /
analyzed: tasmāt na upādānakāraṇam nāma kiñcid

original: tannirāsena ca tadvailakṣaṇyalakṣyamāṇasvarūpasya sahakāriṇo 'pi vyudāso veditavyaḥ //
analyzed: tad nirāsena ca tad vailakṣaṇya lakṣyamāṇa svarūpasya vyudāsaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: api ca pratikṣipasi matpakṣe sarvathā sahakāriṇam /
analyzed: api ca pratikṣipasi mad pakṣe sarvathā sahakāriṇam

original: svayaṃ cāṅgīkaroṣīti bhikṣo rāgīva lakṣyase //
analyzed: svayam ca aṅgīkaroṣi iti bhikṣo rāgī iva lakṣyase

original: bhinnābhinnopakārādivikalpās tvatprakalpitāḥ /
analyzed: bhinna abhinna upakāra ādi vikalpāḥ tvad prakalpitāḥ

original: sahakāripratikṣepakāriṇaḥ kvādhunā gatāḥ //
analyzed: sahakāri pratikṣepa kāriṇaḥ kva adhunā gatāḥ

original: ā jñātaṃ yuktiśaktyaiṣaḥ yuṣmābhir upakalpitaḥ /
analyzed: ā jñātam yukti śaktyā eṣaḥ yuṣmābhiḥ upakalpitaḥ

original: doṣo na bādhate yuṣmān mantrotthāpitasarpavat //
analyzed: doṣaḥ na bādhate yuṣmān mantra utthāpita sarpa vat

original: atha vā tiṣṭhatu tāvad upādānasahakārikāraṇavivekaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva eṣaḥ bhadantasiddhānte durupapādaḥ /
analyzed: atha vā tiṣṭhatu tāvat upādāna sahakāri kāraṇa vivekaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eṣaḥ bhadanta siddhānte durupapādaḥ

original: parotpttāv avyāpriyamāṇam eva yadi kāraṇam ucyate sarvaṃ sarvasya kāraṇaṃ syāt //
analyzed: para utpttau a vyāpriyamāṇam eva yadi kāraṇam ucyate sarvam sarvasya kāraṇam syāt

original: na cālabdhātmanas tasya vyāpāraḥ parajanmani /
analyzed: na ca alabdha ātmanaḥ tasya vyāpāraḥ para janmani

original: labdhātmanas tu vyāpāre sthitis siddhā kṣaṇāntare //
analyzed: labdha ātmanaḥ tu vyāpāre sthitiḥ siddhā kṣaṇa antare

original: atha brūyāt idaṃ pratītya idaṃ pratīyate iti idaṃpratyayatāmātram eva kāryakāraṇabhāva iti tathāpi labdhātmanaḥ kṣaṇasya pratītir iti dvitīyakṣaṇāvasthānam aparihāryam eva //
analyzed: atha brūyāt idam pratītya idam pratīyate iti idaṃpratyaya tā mātram eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti tathā api labdha ātmanaḥ kṣaṇasya pratītiḥ iti dvitīya kṣaṇa avasthānam aparihāryam eva

original: na cānantaryamātreṇa kāryakāraṇagrahaḥ /
analyzed: na ca ānantarya mātreṇa kārya kāraṇa grahaḥ

original: ahetuphalabhāve 'pi tathā 'nantaryadarśanāt //
analyzed: a hetu phala bhāve pi tathā ānantarya darśanāt

original: vyāpāras tu parotpattau nāsty eva kṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ /
analyzed: vyāpāraḥ tu para utpattau na asti eva kṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ

original: na vartamānakālasya na bhūtasya na bhāvinaḥ //
analyzed: na vartamāna kālasya na bhūtasya na bhāvinaḥ

original: atha manyethā yathā tulantayor nāmonnāmau bhavataḥ evaṃ pūrvottarayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ nāśotpādāv ity evaṃ pūrvakṣaṇavināśenottarakṣaṇanivṛtteḥ iyataiva tau kāryakāraṇabhāvam aśnuyvīyātām iti etad apy amanoramam na hy ayam āyuṣmatā samyag avadhṛtas tulādṛṣṭāntaḥ //
analyzed: atha manyethāḥ yathā tulantayoḥ nāma unnāmau bhavataḥ evam pūrva uttarayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ nāśa utpādau iti evam pūrva kṣaṇa vināśena uttara kṣaṇa nivṛtteḥ iyatā eva tau kārya kāraṇa bhāvam aśnuyvīyātām iti etat api amanoramam na hi ayam āyuṣmatā samyak avadhṛtaḥ tulā dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: tatrānyad eva hemādi nāmonnāmanibandhanam /
analyzed: tatra anyat eva hema ādi nāma unnāma nibandhanam

original: unnāmo na tu nāmena tena vā sa vidhīyate //
analyzed: unnāmaḥ na tu nāmena tena vā sa vidhīyate

original: iha hi na pūrveṇa kṣaṇena nāpi tadvināśenottaraḥ kṣaṇa utpadyate /
analyzed: iha hi na pūrveṇa kṣaṇena na api tad vināśena uttaraḥ kṣaṇaḥ utpadyate

original: na ca hemasthānīyam ihānyad astīty anutpāda evāvaśiṣyate //
analyzed: na ca hema sthānīyam iha anyat asti iti anutpādaḥ eva avaśiṣyate

original: sarvathā paraniṣpattau nirvyāpāraṃ na kāraṇam /
analyzed: sarvathā para niṣpattau nirvyāpāram na kāraṇam

original: savyāpārasya kartṛtve kṣaṇikatvaṃ tu durghaṭam //
analyzed: sa vyāpārasya kartṛ tve kṣaṇika tvam tu durghaṭam

original: itthaṃ ca sattvaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ kṣaṇikebhyo viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: ittham ca sattvam vyāvṛttam kṣaṇikebhyaḥ viśeṣataḥ

original: tenāsādhāraṇatvena yāyāt saṃśayahetutām //
analyzed: tena asādhāraṇa tvena yāyāt saṃśaya hetu tām

original: atha vā labdhātmanaḥ padārthasya parotpattau vyāpriyamāṇatvena kārakatvāvadhāraṇāt dvitrakṣaṇasthāyitvam avaśyam anantaranītyā bhaved iti pratyuta sattvād akṣaṇikatvasiddheḥ viruddho 'yaṃ hetuḥ //
analyzed: atha vā labdha ātmanaḥ padārthasya para utpattau vyāpriyamāṇa tvena kāraka tva avadhāraṇāt dvitra kṣaṇa sthāyi tvam avaśyam anantaranītyā bhavet iti pratyuta sattvāt akṣaṇika tva siddheḥ viruddhaḥ yam hetuḥ

original: ataś caivaṃ nityānām evārthakriyākāritvopapatteḥ samavāyyasamavāyinimittabhedena trividhā kāryakāraṇasāmagrī parasparasaṃsargm āgatya yathāsannidhānaṃ kāryaṃ prasūta iti kṛtaṃ kramayaugapadyavikalpais tāvakaiḥ /
analyzed: atas ca evam nityānām eva artha kriyā kāri tva upapatteḥ samavāyi asamavāyi nimitta bhedena trividhā kārya kāraṇa sāmagrī paraspara saṃsargm āgatya yathā sannidhānam kāryam prasūte iti kṛtam krama yaugapadya vikalpaiḥ tāvakaiḥ

original: yadaivāvikalasaṃsargā sāmagrī tadaiva kāryotpattiḥ //
analyzed: yadā eva avikala saṃsargā sāmagrī tadā eva kārya utpattiḥ

original: ata eva ca kāryāṇāṃ yugapan na samudbhavaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva ca kāryāṇām yugapad na samudbhavaḥ

original: na cāpi kāraṇaṃ nityaṃ samagrī na hi sarvadā //
analyzed: na ca api kāraṇam nityam samagrī na hi sarvadā

original: prāṇikarmavipāko 'pi sāmagyantargato 'sti naḥ /
analyzed: prāṇi karma vipākaḥ sti naḥ

original: sarvasya sukhaduḥkhādihetos tadupapādanāt //
analyzed: sarvasya sukha duḥkha ādi hetoḥ tad upapādanāt

original: na ca samagravyatirekāvyatirekavikalpaḥ asmatpakṣe sāmagrīṃ apabādhate samagradharmatvāt sāmagryāḥ /
analyzed: na ca samagra vyatireka avyatireka vikalpaḥ asmad pakṣe sāmagrīm apabādhate samagra dharma tvāt sāmagryāḥ

original: samagrāpekṣayā ca sāmagryā eva ca tamabarthātiśayayogāt karaṇam iti pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇe varṇitam etat //
analyzed: samagra apekṣayā ca sāmagryāḥ eva ca tamap artha atiśaya yogāt karaṇam iti pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇe varṇitam etat

original: samarthatvāsamarthatvavikalpo 'pi na saṅgataḥ /
analyzed: samartha tva asamartha tva vikalpaḥ pi na saṅgataḥ

original: sāmagryā eva sāmarthyaṃ tataḥ kāryasya darśanāt //
analyzed: sāmagryāḥ eva sāmarthyam tatas kāryasya darśanāt

original: tadantargatasya tu kārakajātasya śakatādyaṅgasyeva sāmarthyaṃ yāvat tāvad abhyupagatam eva tadapekṣasya sāmagryāḥ sādhakatamatvasya nirvahaṇāt /
analyzed: tad antargatasya tu kāraka jātasya śakata ādi aṅgasya iva sāmarthyam yāvat tāvat abhyupagatam eva tad apekṣasya sāmagryāḥ sādhakatama tvasya nirvahaṇāt

original: na hi bhavati kṛṣṇāc chuklatara iti //
analyzed: na hi bhavati kṛṣṇāt śuklataraḥ iti

original: avikalaṃ tu sāmagryā eva sāmarthyaṃ yadanantaraṃ kāryaniṣpattir iti kāryaniṣpattidarśanād evāvagamyate //
analyzed: avikalam tu sāmagryāḥ eva sāmarthyam yat anantaram kārya niṣpattiḥ iti kārya niṣpatti darśanāt evā avagamyate

original: yad api ekakṣaṇasthāyi kārakaṃ syād ity uddhoṣitaṃ paraiḥ tad apy asat kāryaniṣpattiparyantatvād avasthānasya /
analyzed: yat api eka kṣaṇa sthāyi kārakam syāt iti uddhā uṣitam paraiḥ tat api asat kārya niṣpatti paryanta tvāt avasthānasya

original: ekena ca kṣaṇena kāryaniṣpatter aghaṭamānatvāt /
analyzed: ekena ca kṣaṇena kārya niṣpatteḥ a ghaṭamāna tvāt

original: kāryaniṣpatter ūrdhvaṃ tu sāmagrī viplavate na samagrāṇi teṣām ekaikaśaḥ kvacit kvadid upalambhāt cakrasūtradaṇḍādīnām /
analyzed: kārya niṣpatteḥ ūrdhvam tu sāmagrī viplavate na samagrāṇi teṣām ekaikaśas kvacid kvadid upalambhāt cakra sūtra daṇḍa ādīnām

original: itthaṃ sthirāṇām eva padārthānāṃ arthakriyāsāmarthyaḥ samarthisam iti na tataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiḥ //
analyzed: ittham sthirāṇām eva padārthānām artha kriyā sāmarthyaḥ iti na tatas kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhiḥ

original: evaṃ ca sattvanityatvayoḥ virodhāt sattvapratītyaiva ekacandrabuddhivat taditaranirākaraṇam ityādi yat pralapitaṃ tat pratikṣiptaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: evam ca sattva nitya tvayoḥ virodhāt sattva pratītyā eva eka candra buddhi vat tad itara nirākaraṇam ityādi yat pralapitam tat pratikṣiptam bhavati

original: yad apy abhāṇi nāśaṃ pratyanapekṣatvāt ksaṇikāḥ padārthā iti tad api yat kiñcit daṇḍādivyavahārānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyinas tatkāryasya ghaṭādyabhāvasya vistarataḥ pramāṇacintā 'vasare prasādhitatvāt /
analyzed: yat api nāśam prati anapekṣa tvāt padārthāḥ iti tat api yat kiñcid daṇḍa ādi vyavahāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinaḥ tad kāryasya ghaṭa ādi abhāvasya vistarataḥ pramāṇa cintā vasare prasādhita tvāt

original: pradhvaṃsābhāvaś ca vināśa ity ucyate //
analyzed: pradhvaṃsa abhāvaḥ ca vināśaḥ iti ucyate

original: naśvrānaśvaratvādivikalpās tu na sādhavaḥ /
