analyzed: naśvra anaśvara tva ādi vikalpāḥ tu na sādhavaḥ

original: sāmagryadhīnaḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ bhāvānām ātmalābhavat //
analyzed: sāmagrī adhīnaḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ bhāvānām ātmalābha vat

original: mudgarādisāmagryā ghaṭasya kiṃ kriyate mṛtpaṇḍādisāmagryā kim asya kriyate ātmalābha iti cet anayā 'py ātmahānaṃ kariṣyate //
analyzed: mudgara ādi sāmagryā ghaṭasya kim kriyate mṛd paṇḍa ādi sāmagryā kim asya kriyate ātmalābhaḥ iti ced anayā pi ātma hānam kariṣyate

original: nanu naśvaraś cet tatkāraṇam aphalam anaśvaratve tv aśaktam iti utpattāv api tulyo 'yaṃ pralāpaḥ /
analyzed: nanu naśvaraḥ ced tad kāraṇam aphalam anaśvara tve tu aśaktam iti utpattau api tulyaḥ yam pralāpaḥ

original: bhavanasvabhāvaś cet ghaṭaḥ svata eva bhavati kiṃ daṇḍādikārakasāmagryā abhavanasvabhāvas tu kartum aśakyaḥ kharaviṣāṇavad iti //
analyzed: bhavana svabhāvaḥ ced ghaṭaḥ svatas eva bhavati kim daṇḍa ādi kāraka sāmagryā abhavana svabhāvaḥ tu kartum aśakyaḥ khara viṣāṇa vat iti

original: kārakavyāpārakāryatvadarśanāt aparyanuyoga eṣa iti cet nivāśe ca samaḥ samādhiḥ utpattivat vināśasyāpi kārakānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvāt //
analyzed: kāraka vyāpāra kārya tva darśanāt aparyanuyogaḥ eṣa iti ced nivāśe ca samaḥ samādhiḥ utpatti vat vināśasya api kāraka anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt

original: tasmād utpannamātrasya vināśo nāsti vastunaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt utpanna mātrasya vināśaḥ na asti vastunaḥ

original: āvināśakasadbhāvād avasthānam iti sthitiḥ //

nanu sāpekṣāṇāṃ bhāvānāṃ nāvaśyaṃ bhāvitā bhaved iti ghaṭasya vināśahetunopanipated api kadācit ity evam asau kiṃ nitya eva bhavatv iti aho mahān pramādaḥ utsannāḥ prajāḥ patito mahān vajrāśaniḥ duṣpariharo 'yaṃ doṣa uttitaḥ /
analyzed: nanu sāpekṣāṇām bhāvānām na avaśyam bhāvitā bhavet iti ghaṭasya vināśa hetunā upanipatet api kadācid iti evam asau kim nityaḥ eva bhavatu iti aho mahān pramādaḥ utsannāḥ prajāḥ patitaḥ mahān vajra aśaniḥ duṣpariharaḥ yam doṣaḥ uttitaḥ

original: yadi ghaṭo nityo bhavet eṣa kālāgnirudra iva tribhudanam api bhasmīkuryāt //
analyzed: yadi ghaṭaḥ nityaḥ bhavet eṣa kālāgni rudraḥ iva api bhasmīkuryāt

original: api ca re mūḍha sāvayavasya āśritasya kāryasya ca nūnam avayavavibhāgāt āśrayavināśād vā yadā kadācid bhavitavyam eva vināśeneti kas tannityatvaśaṅkāvasaraḥ tathā hi na rāmābhiṣekakalaśamadya yāvad anuvartamānam īśvaraveśmany api paśyati loka ity avaśyaṃ bhāvī tasya vināśahetuḥ /
analyzed: api ca re mūḍha sa avayavasya āśritasya kāryasya ca nūnam avayava vibhāgāt āśraya vināśāt vā yadā kadācid bhavitavyam eva vināśena iti kaḥ tad nitya tva śaṅkā avasaraḥ tathā hi na rāma abhiṣeka kalaśam adya yāvat anuvartamānam īśvara veśmani api paśyati lokaḥ iti avaśyam bhāvī tasya vināśa hetuḥ

original: tasmāt sahetuko vināśa iti na svata eva vinaśvarā bhāvāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt sa hetukaḥ vināśaḥ iti na svatas eva vinaśvarāḥ bhāvāḥ

original: api ca pratyabhijñā svatejovibhavavidhūtabauddhasiddhāntadhvāntasiddhāntasaṃtatir abhaṅguram eva bhāvanivahamaniśam upadarśayantī dineśadīdhitidaśaśatavibhāgavatī sarvato jājvalītī kas tasya satyaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgino bhāvān abhidadhyāt /
analyzed: api ca pratyabhijñā sva tejaḥ vibhava vidhūta bauddha siddhānta dhvānta siddhānta saṃtatiḥ abhaṅguram eva bhāva nivaham aniśam upadarśayantī dineśa dīdhiti daśa śata vibhāgavatī sarvatas jājvalītī kaḥ tasya satyam kṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ bhāvān abhidadhyāt

original: yac ca kiñcana tasyām apabhāṣitaṃ tatsarvam asamaṃjasaṃ //
analyzed: yat ca kiñcana tasyām apabhāṣitam tat sarvam asamaṃjasam

original: yat tāvad idaṃ vikalpitaṃ sa evāyam iti kim ekaṃ vijñānam uta dve iti tatrocyate sāmānādhikaraṇyenaikaviṣayāvadyotanāpravaṇaikapratītisaṃvedanāt keyaṃ dvitvāśaṅkā yo 'yam ayaṃ saḥ yaḥ saḥ so 'yam ity ekatvāvamarśinī khalv ayam ekā /
analyzed: yat tāvat idam vikalpitam saḥ eva ayam iti kim ekam vijñānam uta dve iti tatra ucyate sāmānādhikaraṇyena eka viṣaya avadyotana pravaṇa eka pratīti saṃvedanāt kā iyam dvi tva āśaṅkā yaḥ yam ayam saḥ yaḥ saḥ saḥ yam iti eka tva avamarśinī khalu ayam ekā

original: svatas tu yā 'nekapratītir anubhūyate ghaṭo 'yam iti tan na nirantarotpannaghaṭajñānapaṭsmaraṇavat bhinnaviṣayaṃ buddhidvayam iti //
analyzed: svatas tu yā neka pratītiḥ anubhūyate ghaṭaḥ yam iti tat na nirantara utpanna ghaṭa jñāna paṭ smaraṇa vat bhinna viṣayam buddhi dvayam iti

original: yat tu kim ekapratītijanmani karaṇam iti kāryaṃ ced avagamyeta kiṃ kāraṇaparīkṣayā /
analyzed: yat tu kim eka pratīti janmani karaṇam iti kāryam ced avagamyeta kim kāraṇa parīkṣayā

original: karyaṃ cen nāvagamyeta kiṃ kāraṇaparīkṣayā //
analyzed: karyam ced na avagamyeta kim kāraṇa parīkṣayā

original: na ca kāryam akārakaṃ bhavitum arhati kāryatvasyaivānupapatteḥ iti bhavitavyam eva tatra kāraṇena /
analyzed: na ca kāryam akārakam bhavitum arhati kārya tvasya eva anupapatteḥ iti bhavitavyam eva tatra kāraṇena

original: asti ca saṃskārasahitam indriyam asyāḥ pratīteḥ kāraṇaṃ pṛthak /
analyzed: asti ca saṃskāra sahitam indriyam asyāḥ pratīteḥ kāraṇam pṛthak

original: kāryatā 'pi tayor darśanād eva gamyate /
analyzed: kārya tā pi tayoḥ darśanāt eva gamyate

original: tad iha sannihitayor ekakāryajanmani vyāpārāt tad api kim iti neṣyate /
analyzed: tat iha sannihitayoḥ eka kārya janmani vyāpārāt tat api kim iti na iṣyate

original: mṛttantukāryam ekam adarśanād evānabhyupagatam /
analyzed: mṛd tantu kāryam ekam adarśanāt eva anabhyupagatam

original: idaṃ tu dṛṣṭatvād durapahnavam //
analyzed: idam tu dṛṣṭa tvāt durapahnavam

original: kvacit tu kevalendriyavyāpārād api kāryādarśanān na sarvatra tathāvidhasyaiva tasya kāryakāritvaṃ sahakāryapekṣeṇa kāryāntarajananāt //
analyzed: kvacid tu kevala indriya vyāpārāt api kārya adarśanāt na sarvatra tathāvidhasya eva tasya kārya kāri tvam sahakāri apekṣeṇa kārya antara jananāt

original: yat tu uktaṃ kīdṛśo 'rthaḥ pratyabhijñāyām avabhātīti tatraite vādinaḥ śatakṛtvo dattottarā api yat punar asmān anuyuṃjate tena balavad udvignāḥ smaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu uktam kīdṛśaḥ rthaḥ pratyabhijñāyām avabhāti iti tatra ete vādinaḥ śata kṛtvas datta uttarāḥ api yat punar asmān anuyuṃjate tena balavat udvignāḥ smaḥ

original: uktam atra pramitayaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ na tu vānina iti /
analyzed: uktam atra pramitayaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ na tu vāninaḥ iti

original: atītakālaviśiṣṭo vartamānakālāvacchinnaś cārtha etasyām avabhāsate //
analyzed: atīta kāla viśiṣṭaḥ vartamāna kāla avacchinnaḥ ca arthaḥ etasyām avabhāsate

original: nanu pūrvāparau kālau parasparavirodhinau /
analyzed: nanu pūrva aparau kālau paraspara virodhinau

original: naikatra viś atas tena tadbhedād vastu bhidyate //
analyzed: na ekatra viś atas tena tad bhedāt vastu bhidyate

original: naitad evam keyūrakirīṭakaṭakakuṇḍalādibhede 'pi devadattasyābhadāt /
analyzed: na etat evam keyūra kirīṭa kaṭaka kuṇḍala ādi bhede pi devadattasya a bhadāt

original: avayavy asti nāstīti parīkṣaṇaṃ vādāntaragamanam /
analyzed: avayavī asti na asti iti parīkṣaṇam vāda antara gamanam

original: apavargāhnike ca vistareṇāvayavī sādhayiṣyata ity āstām etat //
analyzed: apavarga āhnike ca vistareṇa avayavī sādhayiṣyate iti āstām etat

original: kuṇḍalādīnām avirodhād iti cet na lākṣaṇikavirodhābhyupagamāt /
analyzed: kuṇḍala ādīnām avirodhāt iti ced na lākṣaṇika virodha abhyupagamāt

original: parasparaparihāravyavasthitātmano hi sarve bhāvā iti bhaṇadbhir bhavadbhir abhyupeyata eṣāṃ virodhaḥ //
analyzed: paraspara parihāra vyavasthita ātmanaḥ hi sarve bhāvāḥ iti bhaṇadbhiḥ bhavadbhiḥ abhyupeyate eṣām virodhaḥ

original: nanu keyūrādīnāṃ virodhe 'pi tadā 'vasthānād ekadevadattasaṃbandhitvam abhyupapadyetāpi /
analyzed: nanu keyūra ādīnām virodhe tadā avasthānāt eka devadatta saṃbandhi tvam abhyupapadyeta api

original: bhūtavartamānayos tu yugapad asannidhānāt kathaṃ tadviśiṣṭatā stambhāder ucyate pratīyate ca dvau kālau na ca sannihitāv iti citram //
analyzed: bhūta vartamānayoḥ tu yugapad asannidhānāt katham tad viśiṣṭa tā stambha ādeḥ ucyate pratīyate ca dvau kālau na ca sannihitau iti citram

original: kiṃ bhūto 'pi kāla idānīm asti maivam nāsāv astīty ucyate api tv āsīd iti /
analyzed: kim kālaḥ idānīm asti mā evam na asau asti iti ucyate api tu āsīt iti

original: astīty ucyamānaḥ vartamāna eva syāt na bhūtaḥ //
analyzed: asti iti ucyamānaḥ vartamānaḥ eva syāt na bhūtaḥ

original: hanta tarhi bhūtaḥ bhūtvād eva nedānīm astīti kathaṃ pratibhāsate bhūtatvenaiveti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: hanta tarhi bhūtaḥ bhū tvāt eva na idānīm asti iti katham pratibhāsate bhūta tvena eva iti brūmaḥ

original: bhūtaḥ kālo bhūtatayaiva gṛhyate vartamāno 'pi vartamānatayaiva arthas tūbhayānugata eka eva tathā grahaṇāt //
analyzed: bhūtaḥ kālaḥ bhūta tayā eva gṛhyate vartamānaḥ vartamāna tayā eva arthaḥ tu ubhaya anugataḥ ekaḥ eva tathā grahaṇāt

original: nanu bhūtakālasyedānīm abhāvāt tadviṣayaṃ jñānam anarthajaṃ syāt na dharmiṇas tadavacchinnasya jñānajanakasya bhāvāt /
analyzed: nanu bhūta kālasya idānīm abhāvāt tad viṣayam jñānam anartha jam syāt na dharmiṇaḥ tad avacchinnasya jñāna janakasya bhāvāt

original: bhūtaḥ katham avacchedaka iti cet tathā pratibhāsāt /
analyzed: bhūtaḥ katham avacchedakaḥ iti ced tathā pratibhāsāt

original: pratītim avamṛśatu bhavān [sa evāyam] iti /
analyzed: pratītim avamṛśatu bhavān saḥ eva ayam iti

original: yaḥ pūrvam āsīt sa idānīm apy astīti /
analyzed: yaḥ pūrvam āsīt saḥ idānīm api asti iti

original: so 'yam atītakālaviśiṣṭo 'rtha etasyāṃ buddhāv avabhāsate //
analyzed: saḥ yam atīta kāla viśiṣṭaḥ rthaḥ etasyām buddhau avabhāsate

original: nanu asatā bhūtakālena viśeṣitam arthaṃ katham indriyajā pratītir ālambanīkuryāt ucyate antyasaṃkhyeyasaṃvittikāle prāg avalokitāḥ /
analyzed: nanu asatā bhūta kālena viśeṣitam artham katham indriya jā pratītiḥ ālambanīkuryāt ucyate antya saṃkhyeya saṃvitti kāle prāk avalokitāḥ

original: yathā śatādijñānāni janayanti padātayaḥ //
analyzed: yathā śata ādi jñānāni janayanti padātayaḥ

original: atītakālaśsargo bhavann evaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: atīta kālaḥ sargaḥ bhavan evam viśeṣaṇam

original: stambhādipratyabhijñāyāḥ kāraṇatthaṃ prapadyate //
analyzed: stambha ādi pratyabhijñāyāḥ prapadyate

original: saṃkhyeyāḥ padātayaḥ santi atītakālas tu nāstīti cetkapitheṣu bhakṣyamāṇeṣu kiṃ vakṣyati devānāṃ priyaḥśataṃ kapitthānāṃ bhakṣitavān vāhīka iti pratītidarśanāt /
analyzed: saṃkhyeyāḥ padātayaḥ santi atīta kālaḥ tu na asti iti ced kapitheṣu bhakṣyamāṇeṣu kim vakṣyati devānām priyaḥśatam kapitthānām bhakṣitavān vāhīkaḥ iti pratīti darśanāt

original: na ca navanavatāvanupayukteṣu kapittheṣu ekatraiva [śataṃ mayā bhakṣitam] iti matiḥ /
analyzed: na ca nava navatau anupayukteṣu kapittheṣu ekatra eva śatam mayā bhakṣitam iti matiḥ

original: ataḥ yathā tatrātikrāntāny api navanavatikapitthāni śatapratītihetutām upayānti pratibhāsopārūḍhatvāt evam atītakālayogo 'pi pratibhāsamānaḥ pratyabhijñām ādhāsyatīti //
analyzed: atas yathā tatra atikrāntāni api nava navati kapitthāni śata pratīti hetu tām upayānti pratibhāsa upārūḍha tvāt evam atīta kāla yogaḥ pi pratibhāsamānaḥ pratyabhijñām ādhāsyati iti

original: vikalpamātraṃ śatapratyaya iti cet bho mahātman kiṃ vā tava na vikalpamātram /
analyzed: vikalpa mātram śata pratyayaḥ iti ced bho mahātman kim vā tava na vikalpa mātram

original: kin tu jīvanty amī savikalpakaprāmāṇyavāditnaḥ //
analyzed: kin tu jīvanti amī sa vikalpaka prāmāṇya vāditnaḥ

original: yaś ca sāmānyasaṃsiddhau prakāraḥ prāk pradarśitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca sāmānya saṃsiddhau prakāraḥ prāk pradarśitaḥ

original: yojyaḥ sa eva dvitvādisaṃkhyāsadbhāvasiddhaye //
analyzed: yojyaḥ saḥ eva dvi tva ādi saṃkhyā sadbhāva siddhaye

original: ity alaṃ kathāntarākṣepeṇa nanu atikrāntagrāhi pratyabhijñānaṃ indriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ ceti naḥ kautukam idam /
analyzed: iti alam kathā antara ākṣepeṇa nanu atikrānta grāhi pratyabhijñānam indriya artha sannikarṣa jam ca iti naḥ kautukam idam

original: kiṃ tatkautukamarthas tāvad asya puro 'vasthito 'sty eva janakaḥ stambhādiḥ //
analyzed: kim tat kautukam arthaḥ tāvat asya puras vasthitaḥ sti eva janakaḥ stambha ādiḥ

original: nanu asti sa tu vartamānakāla evana keva¬aṃ vartamānakālayoginā 'rthena tatpratyayajananāt tasya vartamāna ivātīto 'pi kālaḥ avacchedakatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: nanu asti sa tu vartamāna kālaḥ vartamāna kāla yoginā rthena tad pratyaya jananāt tasya kālaḥ avacchedaka tām pratipadyate

original: sa ca tad avaddhinno 'rthaḥ idaṃ ca jñānam ādadhātīty arthajam etat indriyajam api bhavati tadbhāvābhāvānuvidhānāt //
analyzed: sa ca tat avat hinnaḥ rthaḥ idam ca jñānam ādadhāti iti artha jam etat indriya jam api bhavati tad bhāva abhāva anuvidhānāt

original: nanu atīte 'rthe katham indriyaṃ pravartate kasyaiṣa paryanuyogaḥnendriyasya acetanatvāt /
analyzed: nanu atīte rthe katham indriyam pravartate kasya eṣa paryanuyogaḥ na indriyasya acetana tvāt

original: puruṣas tu aviṣphāritākṣas tu labhata iti so 'py ananuyojyaḥ //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ tu a viṣphārita akṣaḥ tu labhate iti saḥ u pi ananuyojyaḥ

original: nanu atītagrāhitvāt aprāmāṇyaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktam asyā buddheḥ nendriyasyātīte 'pi sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvam itimaivamarāmāṇyaṃ nāma bādhakapratyayāt kalpyate na cāsāv asti pratyabhijñāyām /
analyzed: nanu atīta grāhi tvāt aprāmāṇyam kalpayitum yuktam asyāḥ buddheḥ na indriyasya atīte sāmarthyam dṛṣṭa pūrvam nāma bādhaka pratyayāt kalpyate na ca asau asti pratyabhijñāyām

original: anumānaṃ tu bādhakaṃ pratikṣiptam //
analyzed: anumānam tu bādhakam pratikṣiptam

original: nanu kāraṇadoṣād api kalpyata evāprāmāṇyam //
analyzed: nanu kāraṇa doṣāt api kalpyate eva aprāmāṇyam

original: āyuṣman so 'py ucyatām //
analyzed: āyuṣman saḥ u pi ucyatām

original: uktaukta evendriyasyātītagrahaṇaviṣaye sāmārthyavirahaḥ /
analyzed: ukta auktaḥ eva indriyasya atīta grahaṇa viṣaye sāmārthya virahaḥ

original: vatsa na samyaguktavānasi /
analyzed: vatsa na samyak uktavān asi

original: nāyam indriyasya timirādir iva doṣaḥ /
analyzed: na ayam indriyasya timira ādiḥ iva doṣaḥ

original: atīte kāle svayantre tasyāsāmārthyam na tadgrāhyavartamānavastuviśeṣaṇībhūte /
analyzed: atīte kāle sva yantre tasya asāmārthyam na tad grāhya vartamāna vastu viśeṣaṇībhūte

original: saṃskārasaivasya cāsya sāmarthyam na kevalasyety uktam /
analyzed: saṃskāra saivasya ca asya sāmarthyam na kevalasya iti uktam

original: tasmād atītakālaviśeṣatapurovartivartamānastambhādipadārthaviṣayam indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam evedaṃ pratyabhijñājñānam iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam eva idam pratyabhijñā jñānam iti siddham

original: atha vā pūrvavijñānaviśiṣṭagrāhi mānasam /
analyzed: atha vā pūrva vijñāna viśiṣṭa grāhi mānasam

original: iṣyatāṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ gandhavatkundabuddhivat //
analyzed: iṣyatām pratyabhijñānam gandha vat kunda buddhi vat

original: yathā hi locanagocare 'pi kundakusume tadaviṣayagandhaviśeṣite bāhyendriyadvārakaṃ grahaṇam aghaṭamānam iti mānasam eva surabhi kusumam iti jñānaṃ evaṃ pūrvavijñānaviśeṣitasya stambhāder viśeṣaṇam atītakṣaṇaviṣaya iti mānasī pratyabhijñā /
analyzed: yathā hi locana gocare kunda kusume tad aviṣaya gandha viśeṣite bāhya indriya dvārakam grahaṇam aghaṭamānam iti mānasam eva surabhi kusumam iti jñānam evam pūrva vijñāna viśeṣitasya stambha ādeḥ viśeṣaṇam atīta kṣaṇa viṣayaḥ iti mānasī pratyabhijñā

original: pūrvapravṛtabāhyendriyopajanitajñānaviśeṣṭabāhyaviṣayagrāhiṇi cāntaḥkaraṇe 'bhyupagamyamāne sati nāndhādyabhāvaprasaṅga iti bahuśaḥ kathitam //
analyzed: pūrva pravṛta bāhya indriya upajanita jñāna viśeṣṭa bāhya viṣaya grāhiṇi ca antaḥkaraṇe bhyupagamyamāne sati na andha ādi abhāva prasaṅgaḥ iti bahuśas kathitam

original: nanukundāder viśeṣaṇaṃ vartamānam asti saurabham /
analyzed: nanu kunda ādeḥ viśeṣaṇam vartamānam asti saurabham

original: iha tv atītaṃ pūrvavijñānam iti kathaṃ viśeṣaṇam uktam atra /
analyzed: iha tu atītam pūrva vijñānam iti katham viśeṣaṇam uktam atra

original: kiṃ tena satā kariṣyasi śatādibuddhiṣv atikrāntasyāpi kapitthādeḥ kāraṇatvadarśanād iti //
analyzed: kim tena satā kariṣyasi śata ādi buddhiṣu atikrāntasya api kapittha ādeḥ kāraṇa tva darśanāt iti

original: tad evam antaḥkaraṇajanmanā 'pi pratyabijñānena sthairyam avasthāpyata eva bhāvānām //
analyzed: tat evam antaḥkaraṇa janmanā pi pratyabijñānena sthairyam avasthāpyate eva bhāvānām

original: yā tu muṇḍatakeśādipratyabhijñānatulyatā /
analyzed: yā tu muṇḍatakeśa ādi pratyabhijñāna tulya tā

original: syambhādipratyabhijñāyā kathyate sā 'py asaṅgatā //
analyzed: syambha ādi pratyabhijñāyā kathyate sā pi asaṅga tā

original: tatrāntarāle muṇḍataśirodarśanam eva bādhakam /
analyzed: tatra antarāle muṇḍata śiraḥ darśanam eva bādhakam

original: iha tu na kiñcid asti //
analyzed: iha tu na kiñcid asti

original: ata eva śabde tadaiva sphurantyā vināśabuddhyā vaidhuryam upanītā pratyabhijñā sthāsnutām upasthāpayitum asamarthety uktam //
analyzed: atas eva śabde tadā eva sphurantyā vināśa buddhyā vaidhuryam upanītā pratyabhijñā sthāsnu tām upasthāpayitum asamarthā iti uktam

original: jvālādāv api tailavartikṣayādyanumānabādhitatvāt bhrāntā pratyabhijñā na tu tathā stambhādāv anumānam api bādhakm asti /
analyzed: jvālā ādau api taila varti kṣaya ādi anumāna bādhita tvāt bhrāntā pratyabhijñā na tu tathā stambha ādau anumānam api asti

original: sattvānumānaṃ tu nirastam eva //
analyzed: sattva anumānam tu nirastam eva

original: yady api naiṣa niyamaḥpratyakṣānumānayor virodhe pratyakṣaṃ balīya iti tvaritataraparibhramitacakrībhavadalātagrāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya anumānabādhyatvadarśanād ititathāpi prakṛtaṃ kṣaṇikatvānumānaṃ anyathāsiddhaṃ ananyathāsiddhaṃ tu pratyakṣam iti pratyakṣam eva kṣaṇikatvānumānasya bādhakam //
analyzed: yadi api na eṣa niyamaḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ virodhe pratyakṣam balīyaḥ iti tvaritatara paribhramita cakrībhavat alāta grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya anumāna bādhya tva darśanāt iti tathā api prakṛtam kṣaṇika tva anumānam anyathāsiddham ananyathāsiddham tu pratyakṣam iti pratyakṣam eva kṣaṇika tva anumānasya bādhakam

original: na cetaretarāśrayatvam anumānamithyātvanibandhanapratyabhijñāpratyakṣaprāmāṇyānabhyupagamāt /
analyzed: na ca itaretarāśraya tvam anumāna mithyātva nibandhana pratyabhijñā pratyakṣa prāmāṇya anabhyupagamāt

original: svahetubalavattayaiva pratyabhijñāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
analyzed: sva hetu balavat tayā eva pratyabhijñā pratyakṣam pramāṇam

original: na tasyedaṃ dainyam yadanumānamithyātve sati tatpramāṇībhaviṣyatīti //
analyzed: na tasya idam dainyam yat anumāna mithyātve sati tat pramāṇībhaviṣyati iti

original: āsyāṃ vā pratyabhijñānaṃ ya eṣa prathamākṣajaḥ /
analyzed: āsyām vā pratyabhijñānam yaḥ eṣa prathama akṣa jaḥ

original: stambhādibodhastenāpi bādhyate kṣaṇabhaṅgitā //
analyzed: stambha ādi bodhaḥ tena api bādhyate kṣaṇabhaṅgi tā

original: tulyasāmagryadhīnatvasya nirākṛtatvāt nirākāratvasya nirākariṣyamāṇatvāt anvayavyatirekopakṛtamānasapratyakṣaniścitajanakatvasya cārthasyāvabhāsyatvaniścayāt utpanno 'rtho jñānaṃ janayati jātena ca tena jñānenagṛhyata iti balāt dvitrakṣaṇāvasthāyitvam asyāpadyata iti kutaḥ kṣaṇikatvam yadi labdhasvarūpo 'pi na naṣṭaḥ prathame kṣaṇe /
analyzed: tulya sāmagrī adhīna tvasya nirākṛta tvāt nirākāra tvasya nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt anvaya vyatireka upakṛta mānasa pratyakṣa niścita janaka tvasya ca arthasya avabhāsya tva niścayāt utpannaḥ rthaḥ jñānam janayati jātena ca tena jñānena gṛhyate iti balāt dvitra kṣaṇa avasthāyi tvam asya āpadyate iti kutas kṣaṇika tvam yadi labdha svarūpaḥ na naṣṭaḥ prathame kṣaṇe na naṣṭaḥ prathame kṣaṇe na ca naṣṭaḥ prathame kṣaṇe na ca asya antar

original: hetvantarādvināśo 'sya na svarūpanibandhanaḥ //
analyzed: hetu antarāt vināśaḥ sya na svarūpa nibandhanaḥ

original: vicitrā ca padārthānāṃ pratītir iha dṛśyate /
analyzed: vicitrā ca padārthānām pratītiḥ iha dṛśyate

original: cirantamnamatiḥ kācit kācit tatkālajā mahiḥ //
analyzed: cirantamna matiḥ kācid kācid tad kāla jā mahiḥ

original: sallāharaṇavyagrakumbhāvagatir anyathā /
tathaiva kandakākṛṣṭakumbhāvagatir anyathā //
analyzed: tathā eva kandaka ākṛṣṭa kumbha avagatiḥ anyathā

original: etena ravigupto 'pi parimlānamukhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: etena ravi guptaḥ pi parimlāna mukhaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: kṣaṇikatvakṣamādhyakṣasamutprekṣaṇapaṇḍitaḥ //
tathā hivartamānavastu vigrahagrāhivijñānaṃ anantaroktanayena svajana kārthapratibhāsanāt dvikṣaṇasthāyitām arthasya gamayatīty uktam /
analyzed: tathā hi vartamāna vastu vigraha grāhi vijñānam anantara ukta nayena sva jana ka artha pratibhāsanāt dvi kṣaṇa sthāyi tām arthasya gamayati iti uktam

original: ādyaṃ ca kiñcidvijñānaṃ anāgatakālasparśi bhavati /
analyzed: ādyam ca kiñcid vijñānam anāgata kāla sparśi bhavati

original: yathā ''ha bhaṭṭaḥ [rajataṃ gṛhyamāṇaṃ hi cirasthāyīti gṛhyate] iti /
analyzed: yathā ha bhaṭṭaḥ rajatam gṛhyamāṇam hi cira sthāyi iti gṛhyate iti

original: uttaram api pratyabhijñānaṃ atītakālāvacchinnam artham avadyotayatīti darśitam //
analyzed: uttaram api pratyabhijñānam atīta kāla avacchinnam artham avadyotayati iti darśitam

original: na cātītānāgatajanmagrahaṇam āśaṅkanīyam iyati kāraṇasāmarthyaniyamāt /
analyzed: na ca atīta anāgata janma grahaṇam āśaṅkanīyam iyati kāraṇa sāmarthya niyamāt

original: na hy atītānāgatajanmagrahaṇam aśakyakriyam iti yardāpi dṛśyamānaṃ grahaṇam tad apy apahnotuṃ yuktam //
analyzed: na hi atīta anāgata janma grahaṇam aśakya kriyam iti yardā api dṛśyamānam grahaṇam tat api apahnotum yuktam

original: na caitāvatā 'tītānagātakālāvacchinnavartamānavastugrahaṇamātreṇa sāmānyatodṛṣṭena adṛṣṭam apy atītānāgatajñānaṃ kalpyam /
analyzed: na ca etāvatā tīta anagāta kāla avacchinna vartamāna vastu grahaṇa mātreṇa sāmānyatodṛṣṭena adṛṣṭam api atīta anāgata jñānam kalpyam

original: yathādarśanaṃ hi vastūni vyavasthāpyante na tu kiñcit dṛṣṭvā 'nyad api kalpyate dṛṣṭam api vā nihnuyante iti //
analyzed: yathādarśanam hi vastūni vyavasthāpyante na tu kiñcid dṛṣṭvā nyat api kalpyate dṛṣṭam api vā nihnuyante iti

original: api ca animeṣadṛṣṭeratruṭitasatākastambhādipadārthagrāhi pratyakṣam upapadyate /
analyzed: api ca a nimeṣa dṛṣṭeḥ a truṭita sa tāka stambha ādi padārtha grāhi pratyakṣam upapadyate

original: tat kathaṃ kṣaṇikagrāhi kathyate //
analyzed: tat katham kṣaṇika grāhi kathyate

original: yac ca tatra vikalpitaṃatītānāgatakṣaṇayoḥ asannihitatvena pratyakṣa grāhyatā 'nupapatteḥ vartamānakṣaṇasya cātisūkṣmatvāt tatkālagrāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa kṣaṇikatvam eva gṛhītaṃ bhavatītitad upapannammā nāmābhūd atītānāgatakālagrahaṇaṃ vartavāna eva tu tatrānimeṣadarśane kiyān kāla iti cintyatām /
analyzed: yat ca tatra asannihita tvena pratyakṣa grāhyatā anupapatteḥ vartamāna kṣaṇasya ca ati sūkṣma tvāt tad kāla grāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa kṣaṇikatvam eva gṛhītam bhavati iti tat atīta anāgata kāla grahaṇam vartavānaḥ eva tu tatra animeṣa darśane kiyān kālaḥ iti cintyatām

original: nimeṣakṛtasyāpi darśanavicchedasyānavakāśāt /
analyzed: nimeṣa kṛtasya api darśana vicchedasya anavakāśāt

original: yāvad dhi darśanaṃ na vicchinnaṃ tāvān vartamānaḥ kāla iti tadgrahaṇena sthairyaṃ gṛhītaṃ bhavati na kṣaṇikatvam //
analyzed: yāvat hi darśanam na vicchinnam tāvān vartamānaḥ kālaḥ iti tad grahaṇena sthairyam gṛhītam bhavati na kṣaṇika tvam

original: nanu tāvān asau kālaḥ kṣaṇasamudāyo bhavati na kṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: nanu tāvān asau kālaḥ kṣaṇa samudāyaḥ bhavati na kṣaṇaḥ

original: kṣaṇaś caika eva vartamāno bhavati /
analyzed: kṣaṇaḥ ca ekaḥ eva vartamānaḥ bhavati

original: ataḥ pūrvāparau kṣaṇāv atītānāgatau bhavataḥ /
analyzed: atas pūrva aparau kṣaṇau atīta anāgatau bhavataḥ

original: tayoś ca na grahaṇam ity uktam //
analyzed: tayoḥ ca na grahaṇam iti uktam

original: bho mahātman siddhe kṣaṇakatva eva evaṃ śakyate vakyum na tatsādhanāvasare /
analyzed: bho mahātman siddhe kṣaṇaka tve eva evam śakyate vakyum na tad sādhana avasare

original: kālo hy eko nityo vibhur iti sādhito 'numanaparīkṣāyām /
analyzed: kālaḥ hi ekaḥ nityaḥ vibhuḥ iti sādhitaḥ numana parīkṣāyām

original: na tu kṣaṇasamudāyātmā kālaḥ /
analyzed: na tu kṣaṇa samudāya ātmā kālaḥ

original: kālasya tu bhedāḥ kriyopajananavināśādyupādhinivandhanaḥ kalpyanta ity api tatraiva parīkṣitam /
analyzed: kālasya tu bhedāḥ kriyā upajanana vināśa ādi upādhi nibandhanaḥ kalpyante iti api tatra eva parīkṣitam

original: tad ayam nimeṣadṛṣṭeḥ darśanavicchedānupagrahāt tāvān ekaḥ kālaḥ sa iti vartavāna eva bhavati nānākṣaṇasamudāyaḥ /
analyzed: tat ayam nimeṣa dṛṣṭeḥ darśana viccheda an upagrahāt tāvān ekaḥ kālaḥ saḥ iti vartavānaḥ eva bhavati nānā kṣaṇa samudāyaḥ

original: kṣaṇasamudāyātmake 'pi vā kāle darśanavicchedān avadhāraṇāt kṣaṇasamudāya eva artamānībhavatu //
analyzed: kṣaṇa samudāya ātmake vā kāle darśana vicchedān avadhāraṇāt kṣaṇa samudāyaḥ eva artamānībhavatu

original: nanu kālo nāma na kaścit pāramārthikaḥ padārtha eva paridṛśyamānaḥ vartamānādivyavahārahetuḥ /
analyzed: nanu kālaḥ nāma na kaścid pāramārthikaḥ padārthaḥ eva paridṛśyamānaḥ vartamāna ādi vyavahāra hetuḥ

original: sa ca na ciram anubhūyata iti kṣaṇika ucyate bhikṣo alam avāntaragamanena /
analyzed: sa ca na ciram anubhūyate iti kṣaṇikaḥ ucyate bhikṣo alam avāntaragamanena

original: mā bhūt kālaḥ /
analyzed: mā bhūt kālaḥ

original: padārthasatvinimeṣadṛṣṭyavicchedān na naśyan dṛśyata iti na kṣaṇikagrāhi pratyakṣam //
analyzed: padārtha satvi nimeṣa dṛṣṭi avicchedāt na naśyan dṛśyate iti na kṣaṇika grāhi pratyakṣam

original: nanu bhavadbhir api na sthiraṃ jñānam iṣyate /
analyzed: nanu bhavadbhiḥ api na sthiram jñānam iṣyate

original: kṣīṇe ca jñāne so 'rtho dvitīyakṣaṇe kena gṛhyetajñānāntareṇa tu gṛhyamāṇaḥ sa evety atra ko niścayaḥ animeṣadṛṣṭer jñānaṃ na kṣīyata evety eke //
analyzed: kṣīṇe ca jñāne saḥ rthaḥ dvitīya kṣaṇe kena gṛhyeta jñāna antareṇa tu gṛhyamāṇaḥ saḥ eva iti atra kaḥ niścayaḥ animeṣa dṛṣṭeḥ jñānam na kṣīyate eva iti eke

original: atha vā kiṃ na etena /
analyzed: atha vā kim na etena

original: na hi viṣayapratibhāsakāle jñānam avabhāsata iti asakṛd uktaṃ vakṣyate ca /
analyzed: na hi viṣaya pratibhāsa kāle jñānam avabhāsate iti asakṛt uktam vakṣyate ca

original: tena tat kīdṛśam iti kuto vayaṃ vidyaḥ /
analyzed: tena tat kīdṛśam iti kutas vayam

original: arthas tv avicchinnasattāka eva gṛhyate /
analyzed: arthaḥ tu avicchinna sattākaḥ eva gṛhyate

original: jñānaṃ tu vartamānakālam apy atītānāgatakālagrāhi bhavatismaraṇam iva bhūtabhaviṣyadvṛṣṭyanumānam iva //
analyzed: jñānam tu vartamāna kālam api atīta anāgata kāla grāhi bhavati smaraṇam iva bhūta bhaviṣyat vṛṣṭi anumānam iva

original: nanu indriyavyāpāro na kṣaṇāntarasthāyīti tasmann asati kuto 'rthasya vitatakālatāgrahaṇam bhadanta bhavatu śrānto 'si /
analyzed: nanu indriya vyāpāraḥ na kṣaṇa antara sthāyī iti tasman asati kutas rthasya vitata kāla tā grahaṇam bhadanta bhavatu śrāntaḥ si

original: lajjasvaivaṃ bruvāṇaḥ /
analyzed: lajjasva evam bruvāṇaḥ

original: nimeṣakṛto 'pi vicchedo 'sya nāsti /
analyzed: nimeṣa kṛtaḥ pi vicchedaḥ sya na asti

original: atha ca na sthiraḥ indriavyāpāra iti grāhikatāmātram /
analyzed: atha ca na sthiraḥ indria vyāpāraḥ iti grāhika tā mātram

original: sannikarṣaś cāsya viṣayagrahaṇe vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: sannikarṣaḥ ca asya viṣaya grahaṇe vyāpāraḥ

original: sa ca sthira eva /
analyzed: sa ca sthiraḥ eva

original: tasmād vitatakālasya vastunaḥ pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam iti sthitam //
analyzed: tasmāt vitata kālasya vastunaḥ pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam iti sthitam

original: evaṃ ca sthite na svarūpamātranibandhana eva bhāvānāṃ vināśaḥ kiṃ tu hetvantaranibandhano bhavati /
analyzed: evam ca sthite na svarūpa mātra nibandhanaḥ eva bhāvānām vināśaḥ kim tu hetu antara nibandhanaḥ bhavati

original: tataś ca āvināśahetūpanipātāt avasthānam eva bhāvānām /
analyzed: tatas ca ā vināśa hetu upanipātāt avasthānam eva bhāvānām

original: avidyamānavināśakāraṇānāṃ ca nityatvam eva vyomādīnām iti siddham //
analyzed: avidyamāna vināśa kāraṇānām ca nitya tvam eva vyoma ādīnām iti siddham

original: yat punar abhāṇidarśanādarśane eva sattvāsattve bhāvānām ititad api vyāmūḍhabhāṣitam /
analyzed: yat punar a bhāṇi darśana adarśane eva sattva asattve bhāvānām iti tat api vyāmūḍha bhāṣitam

original: darśanādarśanābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvayoḥ paricchedaḥ na punaḥ darśanādarśane eva bhāvābhāvau //
analyzed: darśana adarśanābhyām bhāva abhāvayoḥ paricchedaḥ na punar darśana adarśane eva bhāva abhāvau

original: abhāvaś ca vistarataḥ prāk prasādhitaḥ /
analyzed: abhāvaḥ ca vistarataḥ prāk prasādhitaḥ

original: sa ca sahetuka iti na svata eva viśarāravo bhāvāḥ //
analyzed: sa ca sa hetukaḥ iti na svatas eva viśarāravaḥ bhāvāḥ

original: evaṃ tv aniṣyamāṇe padārthasthairyapakṣejñānajanakasya niyatasya vastuno darśanam darśanaviṣayīkṛte 'sya pravṛttiḥ pravṛttiviṣayīkṛtasya prāptir iti vyavahāro na syāt arthakṣaṇanānātvāt //
analyzed: evam tu aniṣyamāṇe padārtha sthairya pakṣe jñāna janakasya niyatasya vastunaḥ darśanam darśana viṣayīkṛte pravṛttiḥ pravṛtti viṣayīkṛtasya prāptiḥ iti vyavahāraḥ na syāt artha kṣaṇa nānātvāt

original: bādhyabādhakabhāvaś ca kvacit jñānānāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ ca kvacid jñānānām dṛṣṭaḥ

original: sa ca na syāt pūrvāvagatarajatādiviṣayābhāvagrāhiṇo jñānasya gṛhītam udgaradalitaśvaghāṭā bhāvajñānavat bādhakatvān upapatteḥ //
analyzed: sa ca na syāt pūrva avagata rajata ādi viṣaya abhāva grāhiṇaḥ jñānasya gṛhītam udgara dalita śvaghāṭā bhāva jñāna vat bādhaka tvāt upapatteḥ

original: pūrvadṛṣṭasya smaraṇaṃ smṛṭasya kasyacit pratyabhijñānaṃ pratyabhijñātasya ca gṛhāder evārdhakṛtasya smāpanaṃ ityādayaś ca vyavahārā vilupyeran //
analyzed: pūrva dṛṣṭasya smaraṇam smṛṭasya kasyacid pratyabhijñānam pratyabhijñātasya ca gṛha ādeḥ eva ardha kṛtasya smāpanam ityādayaḥ ca vyavahārāḥ vilupyeran

original: atha santānam āśritya kriyate tatsamarthanam /
analyzed: atha santānam āśritya kriyate tat samarthanam

original: na tasya bhinnābhinnatvavikalpānupapattitaḥ //
analyzed: na tasya bhinna abhinna tva vikalpa anupapattitaḥ

original: abhedapakṣe kṣaṇavat vyavahāro na sidhyati /
analyzed: abheda pakṣe kṣaṇa vat vyavahāraḥ na sidhyati

original: vyatireke tu cintyo 'sau vāstavo 'vāstavo 'pi vā //
analyzed: vyatireke tu cintyaḥ sau vāstavaḥ vāstavaḥ vā

original: avāstavatve pūrvoktaṃ kāryaṃ vighaṭate punaḥ /
analyzed: avāstava tve pūrva uktam kāryam vighaṭate punar

original: vāstavatve sthiro vā syāt kṣaṇiko veti cintyatām //
analyzed: vāstava tve sthiraḥ vā syāt kṣaṇikaḥ vā iti cintyatām

original: santāninirvaśeṣaḥ syāt santānaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅguraḥ /
analyzed: syāt santānaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅguraḥ

original: na sidhyet punar apy evaṃ vyavahāraḥ puroditaḥ //
analyzed: na sidhyet punar api evam vyavahāraḥ purā uditaḥ

original: athāpi nityaṃ paramārthasantaṃ !santānanāmānam upaiṣi bhāvam /
analyzed: athā api nityam parama artha santam santāna nāmānam upaiṣi bhāvam

original: attiṣṭha bhikṣo phalitas tavāśāḥ so 'yaṃ samāptaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgavādaḥ //
analyzed: attiṣṭha bhikṣo phalitaḥ tava āśāḥ saḥ yam samāptaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅga vādaḥ

original: tad evaṃ sati santānacchadmano vinivāraṇāt /
analyzed: tat evam sati santāna chadmanaḥ vinivāraṇāt

original: lokayātrā sthirair eva padārthair upapādyatām //
analyzed: lokayātrā sthiraiḥ eva padārthaiḥ upapādyatām

original: evam anantaranigaditadūṣaṇanikurambavinihataprasaram /
analyzed: evam anantara nigadita dūṣaṇa nikuramba vinihata prasaram

original: nādhyakṣaṃ kṣaṇikatve na cānumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt //
analyzed: na adhyakṣam kṣaṇika tve na ca anumānam pramāṇam syāt

original: kṣaṇabhaṅge niraste ca kāryam ādhāravad dhruvam /
analyzed: kṣaṇa bhaṅge niraste ca kāryam ādhāra vat dhruvam

original: ato jñānādikāryeṇa yuktam āśrayakalpanam //
analyzed: atas jñāna ādi kāryeṇa yuktam āśraya kalpanam

original: sukhāder api kāryasya ijñānād vyatiriktatā /
analyzed: sukha ādeḥ api kāryasya vyatirikta tā

original: prāg ukteti tad apy anyadbhavaty asyānumāpakam /
analyzed: prāk uktā iti tat api anyat bhavati asya anumāpakam

original: kiṃ ca nāṃgīkaroṣi tvam ātmānaṃ pāralokinam /
analyzed: kim ca nā aṃgīkaroṣi tvam ātmānam pāralokinam

original: upaiṣi paralokaṃ ca viditaṃ te bakavrayam //
analyzed: upaiṣi para lokam ca viditam te baka vrayam

original: karmasantāninā 'nyena yatkṛtaṃ caityavandanam /
analyzed: karma santāninā nyena yat kṛtam caitya vandanam

original: tato 'dya phalam anyena bhujyate 'kṛtakarmaṇā //
analyzed: tatas phalam anyena bhujyate kṛta karmaṇā

original: na ca nirvṛttir apy asya caityavandanakarmaṇā /
analyzed: na ca nirvṛttiḥ api asya caitya vandana karmaṇā

original: jñānakṣaṇena naikena kiñcit karma samāpyate //
analyzed: jñāna kṣaṇena na ekena kiñcid karma samāpyate

original: kāryakāraṇabhāvāś ca yas tu ayoktaḥ sa dūṣitaḥ /
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhāvāḥ ca yaḥ tu sa dūṣitaḥ

original: kāryakāraṇabhāve 'pi na hy anyatvaṃ nivartate //
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhāve pi na hi anya tvam nivartate

original: anaikāntikatā cāsya santānāntarabuddhibhiḥ /
analyzed: anaikāntika tā ca asya santāna antara buddhibhiḥ

original: upādānatvarūpo 'pi viśeṣaḥ prāṅnirākṛtaḥ //
analyzed: upādāna tva rūpaḥ pi viśeṣaḥ prāk nirākṛtaḥ

original: kārpāsarāgasaṃkrāṃntidṛṣṭānto yaś ca varṇitaḥ /
analyzed: kārpāsa rāga saṃkrāṃnti dṛṣṭāntaḥ yaḥ ca varṇitaḥ

original: so 'py ayuktaḥ svarūpeṇa tatra tasyaiva darśanāt //
analyzed: saḥ u pi ayuktaḥ sva rūpeṇa tatra tasya eva darśanāt

original: ya eva rāgaḥ kārpāsabīje samupakalpitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ eva rāgaḥ kārpāsa bīje samupakalpitaḥ

original: sa eva dṛśyate puṣpe na tu tasmāt phalāntaram //
analyzed: saḥ eva dṛśyate puṣpe na tu tasmāt phala antaram

original: evaṃ karmānuvṛttiḥ syāt phalabhogas tu durghaṭaḥ //
analyzed: evam karma anuvṛttiḥ syāt phala bhogaḥ tu durghaṭaḥ

original: karmānuvṛttir apy eṣā na caikasyāsti kasyacit /
analyzed: karma anuvṛttiḥ api eṣā na ca ekasya asti kasyacid

original: kāryakāraṇayor bhedāt kārpāsakusumādivat //
analyzed: kārya kāraṇayoḥ bhedāt kārpāsa kusuma ādi vat

original: anyatraiva hi karma syāt anyatraiva ca tatphalam /
analyzed: anyatra eva hi karma syāt anyatra eva ca tad phalam

original: na ca santānabhogāya kaścit karmānutiṣṭhati //
analyzed: na ca santāna bhogāya kaścid karma anutiṣṭhati

original: phalamasmān mamaiva syāt iti sarvaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: phalam asmāt mama eva syāt iti sarvaḥ pravartate

original: sarvathā śākyabhikṣūṇāṃ paraloko visaṃṣṭhulaḥ //
analyzed: sarvathā śākya bhikṣūṇām para lokaḥ visaṃṣṭhulaḥ

original: na tatprasādhane teṣāṃ kācid gamanikā 'sti vā //
analyzed: na tad prasādhane teṣām kācid gamanikā sti vā

original: garbhādau prathamaṃ jñānaṃ vijñānāntarapūrvakam /
analyzed: garbha ādau prathamam jñānam vijñāna antara pūrvakam

original: jñānatvād ity ayaṃ hetuḥ aprayojaka iṣyate //
analyzed: jñāna tvāt iti ayam hetuḥ aprayojakaḥ iṣyate

original: mūrchādyanantarodbhūtajñānaiś ca vyabhicāryatām /
analyzed: mūrchā ādi anantara udbhūta jñānaiḥ ca vyabhicārya tām

original: mūrchitasyāpi vijñānam astīty etat tat tu kaitavam //
analyzed: mūrchitasya api vijñānam asti iti etat tat tu kaitavam

original: na hy arthavagater anyadrūpaṃ jñānasya kiṃ cana /
analyzed: na hi artha vagateḥ anyat rūpam jñānasya kim cana

original: mūrchadiṣu kutas tat syāt kuto vā kalalādiṣu //
analyzed: mūrchadiṣu kutas tat syāt kutas vā kalala ādiṣu

original: kalalādidaśāyāṃ vā yadi vijñānam iṣyate /
analyzed: kalala ādi daśāyām vā yadi vijñānam iṣyate

original: mātāpitṛsthayor astu śukraśoṇitayor api //
analyzed: mātā pitṛ sthayoḥ astu śukra śoṇitayoḥ api

original: tataś caikatra saṃtāne cetanadvayam āpatet /
analyzed: tatas ca ekatra saṃtāne cetana dvayam āpatet

original: cetanānāṃ bahutvaṃ vā dampatyor bahuputrayoḥ //
analyzed: cetanānām bahu tvam vā dampatyoḥ bahu putrayoḥ

original: na caiṣa niyamo loko sadṛśāt sadṛśodbhavaḥ /
analyzed: na ca eṣa niyamaḥ sadṛśāt sadṛśa udbhavaḥ

original: vṛścikādes samutpādaḥ gomayād api dṛśyate //
analyzed: vṛścika ādeḥ samutpādaḥ gomayāt api dṛśyate

original: śarīrāntarasaṃcāracāturyaṃ ca dhiyāṃ katham /
analyzed: śarīra antara saṃcāra cāturyam ca dhiyām katham

original: jvālādivan na mūrtatvaṃ na ca vyāpakatā 'tmavat //
analyzed: jvālā ādi vat na mūrta tvam na ca vyāpaka tā tma vat

original: ātivādikadehena nīyante cedbhavāntaram /
analyzed: ātivādika dehena nīyante ced bhava antaram

original: nanv ātivāhike 'py āsāṃ kathaṃ saṃcārasaṃbhavaḥ //
analyzed: nanu ātivāhike pi āsām katham saṃcāra saṃbhavaḥ

original: āstām evaiṣa vā jīved dehe 'py pathi gacchatām /
analyzed: āstām eva eṣa vā jīvet dehe pi pathi gacchatām

original: pradeśāntarasaṃcāro jñānānāṃ bhavatāṃ katham //
analyzed: pradeśa antara saṃcāraḥ jñānānām bhavatām katham

original: na hy eṣāṃ bhūtadharmatvaṃ na svato gatiśaktitā /
analyzed: na hi eṣām bhūta dharma tvam na svatas gati śakti tā

original: na ca jātyādivad vṛttiḥ na ca vyāpakatā ''tmavat /
analyzed: na ca jāti ādi vat vṛttiḥ na ca vyāpaka tā tma vat

original: evaṃ yadaiva niṣkrāntaḥ vihārakuharādbhavān /
analyzed: evam yadā eva niṣkrāntaḥ vihāra kuharāt bhavān

original: tadā kāṣṭhībhaved dehaḥ jñānasaṃkrāntyasaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: tadā kāṣṭhībhavet dehaḥ jñāna saṃkrānti asaṃbhavāt

original: tad ayaṃ saṃkṣepārthaḥ tyaktavyo vā nirasya kaurukucīm /
analyzed: tat ayam saṃkṣepa arthaḥ tyaktavyaḥ vā nirasya kaurukucīm

original: suraguruvatparalokaḥ nityo vā ''tmā 'bhyupetavyaḥ //
analyzed: sura guru vat para lokaḥ nityaḥ vā ātmā abhyupetavyaḥ

original: 2.345.17	yat tv asya carmagaganopamatāṃ vikalpya nāśitvam uktam atha vā viphalatvam eva /
analyzed: yat tu asya carma gagana upama tām vikalpya nāśi tvam uktam atha vā viphala tvam eva

original: tan naiva sādhu sukhaduḥkhadaśopabhogayoge 'pi nāśam adhigacchati nāyam ātmā //
analyzed: tat na eva sādhu sukha duḥkha daśā upabhoga yoge nāśam adhigacchati na ayam ātmā

original: vikṛtaś ca tasya sukhaduḥkhajanmanā na hi tādṛśī bhavati lupyate yayā /
analyzed: vikṛtaḥ ca tasya sukha duḥkha janmanā na hi tādṛśī bhavati lupyate yayā

original: sahakārikāraṇavaśāt tu jāyate tad avaśyam eva samupaiti bhoktṛtām //
analyzed: sahakāri kāraṇa vaśāt tu jāyate tat avaśyam eva samupaiti bhoktṛ tām

original: atha vopajanavyayasvabhāvaḥ svadaśābhedasamanvaye hi puṃsaḥ /
analyzed: atha vā upajana vyaya svabhāvaḥ sva daśā bheda samanvaye hi puṃsaḥ

original: phaṇinaḥ kila kuṇḍalādyavasthānugatasyeva na bhinnateti kecit //
analyzed: phaṇinaḥ kila kuṇḍala ādi avasthā anugatasya iva na bhinna tā iti kecid

original: avasthā evaitāḥ prasabhavilayātaṅkavidhurāḥ avasthātā tv ekaḥ sphurati nirapāyasthiravapuḥ /
analyzed: avasthāḥ eva etāḥ prasabha vilaya ātaṅka vidhurāḥ avasthātā tu ekaḥ sphurati nirapāya sthira vapuḥ

original: asaty asmin pūrvāvagataviṣayā 'nusmṛtibhuvāṃ na siddhiḥ kāryaṇām iti nipuṇamāveditam idam //
analyzed: asati asmin pūrva avagata viṣayā nusmṛti bhuvām na siddhiḥ kāryaṇām iti nipuṇam āveditam idam

original: nanu vimṛśati bhoge karma nityo 'pi nātmā na hi narakanimagno manyate kaścid evam /
analyzed: nanu vimṛśati bhoge karma nityaḥ na ātmā na hi naraka nimagnaḥ manyate kaścid evam

original: kila yad aham akārṣaṃ prāgbhave karma pāpaṃ phalam upanatam asmād bhujyate tanmayeti //
analyzed: kila yat aham akārṣam prāc bhave karma pāpam phalam upanatam asmāt bhujyate tat mayā iti

original: kāryopabhogasamaye kim anena kṛtyaṃ nāsya pravṛttir adhunā na nivṛttir asmāt /
analyzed: kārya upabhoga samaye kim anena kṛtyam na asya pravṛttiḥ adhunā na nivṛttiḥ asmāt

original: yas svapravṛttijananaupatiko 'vamarśaḥ śāstrād asau bhavati śāstravidām avaśyam //
analyzed: yaḥ sva pravṛtti janana aupatikaḥ vamarśaḥ śāstrāt asau bhavati śāstra vidām avaśyam

original: vimarśo 'yaṃ paścād api bhavatu dṛṣṭe tu viṣaye mayā yūnā yat tat kim api sadasad vā kṛtam abhūt /
analyzed: vimarśaḥ yam paścāt api bhavatu dṛṣṭe tu viṣaye mayā yūnā yat tat kim api sat asat vā kṛtam abhūt

original: tato vṛddho 'dyāhaṃ phalam anubhavām iti tad ayaṃ pumān asti sthāyi sukṛtaphalabhogādinipuṇaḥ //
analyzed: tatas vṛddhaḥ dyā aham phalam anubhavām iti tat ayam pumān asti sthāyi sukṛta phala bhoga ādi nipuṇaḥ

original: nāsty ātmā phalabhogamātram atha ca svargāya caityārcanaṃ saṃskārāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ yugasthitibhṛtaś caite vihārāḥ kṛtāḥ /
analyzed: na asti ātmā phala bhoga mātram atha ca svargāya caitya arcanam saṃskārāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ yuga sthiti bhṛtaḥ ca ete vihārāḥ kṛtāḥ

original: sarvaṃ śūnyam idaṃ vasūni gurave dehīti cādiśyate bauddhānāṃ caritaṃ kim anyad iyatī dambhasya bhūmiḥ parā //
analyzed: sarvam śūnyam idam vasūni gurave dehi iti ca ādiśyate bauddhānām caritam kim anyat iyatī dambhasya bhūmiḥ parā

original: atra suchikṣitacārvāka āhayāvac chārīram avasthitam ekaṃ pramātṛtattvaṃ anusandhānādivyavahārasamartham astu nāma kas tatra kalahāyate /
analyzed: atra su śikṣita cārvākaḥ āha yāvat śārīram avasthitam ekam pramātṛ tattvam anusandhāna ādi vyavahāra samartham astu nāma kaḥ tatra kalahāyate

original: śarīrād ūrdhvaṃ tu tad astīti kim atra pramāṇamna ca pūrvaśarīram apahāya śarīrāntaraṃ saṃkramati pramātā //
analyzed: śarīrāt ūrdhvam tu tat asti iti kim atra pramāṇam na ca pūrva śarīram apahāya śarīra antaram saṃkramati pramātā

original: yadi hy evaṃ bhavet tad iha śarīre śaiśavadaśānubhūtapadārthasmaraṇavata atītajanmānubhūtapadārthasmaraṇam api tasya bhavet /
analyzed: yadi hi evam bhavet tat iha śarīre śaiśava daśa anubhūta padārtha smaraṇavataḥ atīta janma anubhūta padārtha smaraṇam api tasya bhavet

original: na hi tasya nityatvāviśeṣe ca śarīrabhedāviḍeṣe ca smaraṇaviśeṣe kāraṇaviśeṣam utpaśyāmaḥ yad iha janmany evānubhūtaṃ smarati tāny ajanmānubhūtam iti /
analyzed: na hi tasya nitya tva aviśeṣe ca śarīra bheda aviḍeṣe ca smaraṇa viśeṣe kāraṇa viśeṣam utpaśyāmaḥ yat iha janmani eva anubhūtam smarati tāni a janma anubhūtam iti

original: tasmād ūrdhvaṃ dehāt nāsty eva pramāteti nityātmavādamūlaparalokakathākaurucīmapāsya yathāsukham asyatām /
analyzed: tasmāt ūrdhvam dehāt na asti eva pramātā iti nitya ātma vāda mūla para loka kathā kaurucīm apāsya yathāsukham asyatām

original: yathā ''ha yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ jīven nāsti mṛtyoragocaraḥ /
analyzed: yathā ha yāvat jīvam sukham jīvet na asti mṛtyoḥ agocaraḥ

original: bhasmībhūtasya dehasya punar āgamanaṃ kutaḥ //
analyzed: bhasmībhūtasya dehasya punar āgamanam kutas

original: iti //
analyzed: iti

original: atrocyatena khalu nipuṇam iva suśikṣitam āyuṣmatā cārvākācāryacāturyam /
analyzed: atra ucyate ena khalu nipuṇam iva su śikṣitam āyuṣmatā cārvāka ācārya cāturyam

original: yāvac charīram ekam anuyāyi pramātṛtattvam astīti yad uktavānasi tan na vismartum arhasi /
analyzed: yāvat śarīram ekam anuyāyi pramātṛ tattvam asti iti yat uktavān asi tat na vismartum arhasi

original: na cāstitvāvinābhāvī bhāvānāṃ vināśaḥ svābhāvikaḥ kin tu hetvantaranimittaka iti saugatais saha kalaham atimātram adhunaiva kṛtvā samarthito 'yam arthaḥ /
analyzed: na ca astitva avinābhāvī bhāvānām vināśaḥ svābhāvikaḥ kin tu hetu antara nimittakaḥ iti saugataiḥ saha kalaham atimātram adhunā eva kṛtvā samarthitaḥ yam arthaḥ

original: na ca vināśahetuḥ pramātur aticiram api vicāryamāṇaḥ kaścit kutaścit avāpyate /
analyzed: na ca vināśa hetuḥ pramātuḥ ati ciram api vicāryamāṇaḥ kaścid kutaścid avāpyate

original: na cānupalabhyamāno 'py asau kalpayituṃ pāryate //
analyzed: na ca anupalabhyamānaḥ pi asau kalpayitum pāryate

original: na hy ātmā paṭadir iva sāvayava upalabhyate yad avayavavibhāgādinā naṅkṣyatīsi gamyate /
analyzed: na hi ātmā paṭadiḥ iva sa avayavaḥ upalabhyate yat avayava vibhāga ādinā naṅkṣyati isi gamyate

original: utpattir api nātmano dṛṣṭā yatas tadavinābhāvinaḥ niravayavasyāpi karmāder iva vināśaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: utpattiḥ api nā ātmanaḥ dṛṣṭā yatas tad avinābhāvinaḥ niravayavasya api karma ādeḥ iva vināśaḥ pratīyate

original: na caiṣa kasyayidātmāguṇaḥ yaināśrayavināśād vā virodhiguṇāntaraprādurbhāvād vā pradhvaṃsamāsādayet //
analyzed: na ca eṣa kasyayid ātmā aguṇaḥ vā virodhi guṇa antara prādurbhāvāt vā pradhvaṃsam āsādayet

original: na caivaṃ śakyate vaktumkiṃ vināśahetvanumānenapratyakṣa evāsya vināśo dṛśyata iti /
analyzed: na ca evam śakyate vaktum kim vināśa hetu anumānena pratyakṣaḥ eva asya vināśaḥ dṛśyate iti

original: yato na śarīravad asau dahyamānaḥ śakunibhir avalupyamāno vā kadācidulabdha iti /
analyzed: yatas na śarīra vat asau dahyamānaḥ śakunibhiḥ avalupyamānaḥ vā kadācid ulabdhaḥ iti

original: tasmād vināśādarśaṇāt vināśahetvanumānāsaṃbhavāc ca asti ced ātmānitya evety avadhāryatām //
analyzed: tasmāt vināśa adarśaṇāt vināśa hetu anumāna asaṃbhavāt ca asti ced ātmā anityaḥ evā iti avadhāryatām

original: tasmāt bhūtacaitanyam eva cirantanacārvakācāryavat paralokāpalāpaparitoṣālambanayat kiñcit kāritvasulabhasukhāsikāsakyahṛdayair varamāśriyum /
analyzed: tasmāt bhūta caitanyam eva cirantana cārvaka ācārya vat para loka apalāpa paritoṣa ālambanayat kiñcid kāri tva sulabha sukhāsika asakya hṛdayaiḥ varam āśriyum

original: āśarīram avasthite tu pramātṛtattve sati na phalanty ete paralokāpalāpamanorathāḥ /
analyzed: āśarīram avasthite tu pramātṛ tattve sati na phalanti ete para loka apalāpa manorathāḥ

original: bhūtacaitanyapakṣo 'pi ca purā parākṛta eva /
analyzed: bhūta caitanya pakṣaḥ ca purā parākṛtaḥ eva

original: tasmād asti nityaḥ paralokī pramāteti //
analyzed: tasmāt asti nityaḥ para lokī pramātā iti

original: nityatve sati pūrvadehasaṃbandhaḥ bhaviṣyad dehāntarasaṃbandhaś cāsya na durupapādaḥ //
analyzed: nitya tve sati pūrva deha saṃbandhaḥ bhaviṣyat deha antara saṃbandhaḥ ca asya na durupapādaḥ

original: śarīrāntarasaṃcāras tv asya nāstīti yad uktaṃtadyuktam eva /
analyzed: śarīra antara saṃcāraḥ tu asya na asti iti yat uktam tat yuktam eva

original: vyāpinaḥ sarvatra vidyamānasyātmanaḥ kaḥ saṃcārārthaḥ vyāpitva eva kiṃ pramāṇam iti cetsarvatraiva kāryopalambhaḥ pramāṇam /
analyzed: vyāpinaḥ sarvatra vidyamānasya ātmanaḥ kaḥ saṃcāra arthaḥ vyāpi tve eva kim pramāṇam iti ced sarvatra eva kārya upalambhaḥ pramāṇam

original: ito vārāṇasīm api gatasya me bhavaty eva smaraṇec chādikāryayogaḥ /
analyzed: itas vārāṇasīm api gatasya me bhavati eva smaraṇa id chā ādi kārya yogaḥ

original: sa cātmaikaprabhavaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ātmā eka prabhavaḥ

original: ātmanaś ca śarīrasyeva na tatra gamanam amūrtatvāt /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca śarīrasya iva na tatra gamanam a mūrta tvāt

original: na śarīraguṇavat tadanāśritatvāt /
analyzed: na śarīra guṇavat tad anāśrita tvāt

original: na prāṇādivat antaśśarīravṛttitvābhāvāt //
analyzed: na prāṇa ādi vat antar śarīra vṛtti tva abhāvāt

original: antaśśarīravṛttitvābhāva eva kiṃ pramāṇam iticetucyateantaśśarīravṛttitve hi dvayī gatīḥ ekadeśavṛttitvaṃ sarvaśarīrāpūrakatvaṃ vā //
analyzed: antar śarīra vṛtti tva abhāvaḥ eva kim pramāṇam iti ced ucyate antar śarīra vṛtti tve hi eka deśa vṛtti tvam sarva śarīra āpūraka tvam vā

original: tatra sarvaśarīrāpūrakatve śarīraparimāṇānuvidhāyitvāt bālayuvasthāviraśarīravat pūrvanītyā parimāṇānyatvena tadanyatvāt punar api pratisandhānādikāryavaidhuryaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: tatra sarva śarīra āpūraka tve śarīra parimāṇa anuvidhāyi tvāt bāla yuva sthāvira śarīra vat pūrvanītyā parimāṇa anya tvena tad anya tvāt punar api pratisandhāna ādi kārya vaidhurya prasaṅgaḥ

original: karimaśakaśarīrayoge ca karmapariṇāmo panate tasya saṃkocavikāsau prāpyutaḥ /
analyzed: karima śaka śarīra yoge ca tasya saṃkoca vikāsau

original: tau ca nityasya virudhyete //
analyzed: tau ca nityasya virudhyete

original: ekadeśavṛttitve tu tadanadhiṣṭhitānām avayavānām anātmakatvāt mṛtaśarīrāvayavat ayatheṣṭaviniyojyatākāṣṭhī bhāvaḥ syāt //
analyzed: eka deśa vṛtti tve tu tad anadhiṣṭhitānām avayavānām anātmaka tvāt bhāvaḥ syāt

original: pradopavad ekadeśavṛtter apy ātmanaḥ sakalaśarīrādhiṣṭhātṛtvam iti cet vartipradeśopacitatejaḥpiṇḍavad ekatra śarīrāvayave saviśeṣacaitanyasaṃvittiḥ syāt //
analyzed: pradopa vat eka deśa vṛtteḥ api ātmanaḥ sakala śarīra adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam iti ced varti pradeśa upacita tejaḥ piṇḍa vat ekatra śarīra avayave sa viśeṣa caitanya saṃvittiḥ syāt

original: asty eva hṛdayadeśe tadatiśaya iti cet na anupalambhāt /
analyzed: asti eva hṛdaya deśe tad atiśayaḥ iti ced na anupalambhāt

original: dahanahimakṛpāṇādisparśeṣu na hṛdayasya pradeśāntarasya vā śarīre vedanāviśeṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: dahana hima kṛpāṇa ādi sparśeṣu na hṛdayasya pradeśa antarasya vā śarīre vedanā viśeṣam paśyāmaḥ

original: tasmān na hṛtpuṇḍarīke dīpavad avasthānam ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt na hṛd puṇḍarīke dīpa vat avasthānam ātmanaḥ

original: ata eva [aṅguṣṭhamātraṃ puruṣaṃ niścakarṣa yamo balāt] iti vyāsavacanamanevaṃ paramavagatavyam //
analyzed: atas eva aṅguṣṭha mātram puruṣam niścakarṣa yamaḥ balāt iti vyāsa vacanam anevam param avagatavyam

original: yadi tu manovedekadeśavṛtter aṇuparimāṇasyāśu saṃcarataḥ śarīrādhiṣṭhātṛtvam ātmanaḥ kathyatetathāpi sahasaiva ciraproṣitāgatadayitajanadarśanodbhatasakalaśarīravyāpisvedaromāṃcādidarśanaṃ virudhyate /
analyzed: yadi tu manaḥ veda eka deśa vṛtteḥ aṇu parimāṇasya āśu saṃcarataḥ śarīra adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam ātmanaḥ kathyate tathā api sahasā eva cira proṣita āgata dayita jana darśana udbhata sakala śarīra vyāpi sveda romāṃca ādi darśanam virudhyate

original: na ca dvayor aṇvorātmamanasoḥ kartṛkaraṇavyavasthā 'pi nirvahatīti /
analyzed: na ca dvayoḥ aṇvoḥ ātma manasoḥ kartṛ karaṇa vyavasthā nirvahati iti

original: tasmān nāṇurātmā na ca śarīramātraparimāṇa iti vyāpaka evāvaśiṣyate /
analyzed: tasmāt na aṇuḥ ātmā na ca śarīra mātra parimāṇaḥ iti vyāpakaḥ eva avaśiṣyate

original: tad evaṃ vārāṇasyām api ayam ātmā vidyata eveti tatra tatkāryadarśanam avakalpate nānyena gamanādiprakāreṇeti //
analyzed: tat evam vārāṇasyām api ayam ātmā vidyate eva iti tatra tad kārya darśanam avakalpate na anyena gamana ādi prakāreṇa iti

original: nanu sarvatra sukhaduḥkhajñānādikāryadarśanāt sarvaprāṇinām eka evātmabhavetnasukhaduḥkhavyavasthādarśanāt bandham uktavyavasthopapadeś cātmabhedasya darśayiṣyamāṇatvāt //
analyzed: nanu sarvatra sukha duḥkha jñāna ādi kārya darśanāt sarva prāṇinām ekaḥ eva ātmā bhavet na sukha duḥkha vyavasthā darśanāt bandham ukta vyavasthā upapadeḥ ca ātma bhedasya darśayiṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: vyāpinaḥ tathaṃ kartṛtvam iti cet jñānacikīrṣāprayatnasamavāya evāsya kartṛtvam na vyāpārayoga iti nirṇītam etat //
analyzed: vyāpinaḥ tatham kartṛ tvam iti ced jñāna cikīrṣā prayatna samavāyaḥ eva asya kartṛ tvam na vyāpāra yogaḥ iti nirṇītam etat

original: nanu vyāpiny ātmani kathaṃ śarīrād bahiraṇv api tatkāryaṃ na dṛśyate katmākṣiptaśarīrendriyādisahakārisannidhānanibandhano hi tatkāryotpādaḥ /
analyzed: nanu vyāpini ātmani katham śarīrāt bahis aṇu api tad kāryam na dṛśyate hi tad kārya utpādaḥ

original: sa kathaṃ tato bahirbhavet iti //
analyzed: sa katham tatas bahis bhavet iti

original: tasmād anantaroktena prakāreṇopapāditam /
analyzed: tasmāt anantara uktena prakāreṇa upapāditam

original: nityatvād vyāpakatvāc ca paralokitvam ātmanaḥ //
analyzed: nitya tvāt vyāpaka tvāt ca para loki tvam ātmanaḥ

original: sūtrakāras tu pāralaukikatvasiddhaye hetvantarāṇi pratyapādayat /
analyzed: sūtrakāraḥ tu pāralaukika tva siddhaye hetu antarāṇi pratyapādayat

original: sadyojātasya bālasya vadanavikāsarodanādyanumito harṣaśokādiyogastovad asti /
analyzed: sadyas jātasya bālasya vadana vikāsa rodana ādi anumitaḥ harṣa śoka ādi yogaḥ tovat asti

original: yuvaśarīrādau rodanādi śokādikāraṇakam avagatam /
analyzed: yuva śarīra ādau rodana ādi śoka ādi kāraṇakam avagatam

original: ānanavikāsādi harṣahetukam /
analyzed: ānana vikāsa ādi harṣa hetukam

original: evaṃ śiśor api tannibandhanaḥ tadutpādaḥ /
analyzed: evam śiśoḥ api tad nibandhanaḥ tad utpādaḥ

original: tau ca harṣaṣokau sukhaduḥkhasādhanādhigamatadansmaraṇānyatarakāraṇakau bhavitum arhataḥ tathā dṛṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: tau ca harṣa ṣokau sukha duḥkha sādhana adhigama tad an smaraṇa anyatara kāraṇakau bhavitum arhataḥ tathā dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: iha cāsya na sukhaduḥkhasādhanapadārthānubhavastādanīm asti iti tadanusmaraṇam eva harṣaśokahetur bhavet //
analyzed: iha ca asya na sukha duḥkha sādhana padārtha anubhavaḥ tādanīm asti iti tad anusmaraṇam eva harṣa śoka hetuḥ bhavet

original: tadanusmaraṇapi tadanubhavaprabhavam /
analyzed: tad anusmaraṇa api tad anubhava prabhavam

original: anubhavaś ceha janmani sadyojātasya na samastīti janmāntarānubhūtasukhaduḥkhasādhanānusmaraṇanimittaka evāsya harṣaśokasamutpāda iti janmāntarānugamān nitya ātmā //
analyzed: anubhavaḥ ca iha janmani sadyojātasya na samasti iti janma antara anubhūta sukha duḥkha sādhana anusmaraṇa nimittakaḥ eva asya harṣa śoka samutpādaḥ iti janma antara anugamāt nityaḥ ātmā

original: nanu abhinavajīvalokāvalokanāhlādanibandhana evāsya mukhavikāsaḥ tathā yonidvāranirgamanodgataniragalakleśapīḍitasya tasya rodanam iti na janmāntarānubhūtasmaraṇaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktam atiprasaṅgātmaivam sukhaduḥkhahetum īdṛśam ananubhavato 'py akasmād eva harṣaśokadarśanāt //
analyzed: nanu abhinava jīvaloka avalokana āhlāda nibandhanaḥ eva asya mukha vikāsaḥ tathā yonidvāra nirgamana udgata niragala kleśa pīḍitasya tasya rodanam iti na janma antara anubhūta smaraṇam kalpayitum yuktam ati prasaṅga ātmā evam sukha duḥkha hetum īdṛśam an anubhavataḥ pi akasmāt eva harṣa śoka darśanāt

original: nanu kamalamukulavikāsādivat svābhāvikam eva śiśormukhavikāsādikāryaṃ syātsvābhāvikaṃ nāma kim ucyate kim ahetukam avijñātagetukam aniyatahetukaṃ vā na tāvad ahetukaṃ kāryaṃ saṃbhavati kāryatvahāniprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: nanu kamala mukula vikāsa ādi vat svābhāvikam eva śiśoḥ mukha vikāsa ādi kāryam syāt svābhāvikam nāma kim ucyate kim ahetukam avijñāta getukam aniyata hetukam vā na tāvat ahetukam kāryam saṃbhavati kārya tva hāni prasaṅgāt

original: nāpy avijñātahetukaṃ tadbhavituṃ yuktamkāryam upalabhyate /
analyzed: na api avijñāta hetukam tat bhavitum yuktam kāryam upalabhyate

original: tad dhetuparijñāne yatatāṃ bhavānkim udāstena cāsau jñātum aśakyaḥ kāryasyaiva tatra jñāpakatvāt //
analyzed: tat hetu parijñāne yatatām bhavān kim udāstena ca asau jñātum aśakyaḥ kāryasya eva tatra jñāpaka tvāt

original: nāpy aniyatahetukaṃ kāryaṃ kiñcid asti /
analyzed: na api aniyata hetukam kāryam kiñcid asti

original: kāryotpādananiyamenaiva hetuniyamasiddheḥ /
analyzed: kārya utpādana niyamena eva hetu niyama siddheḥ

original: ata eva tatkāryam upapādayitukāmāḥ tanniyatam eva kāraṇam upādadate laukikāḥ //
analyzed: atas eva tad kāryam upapādayitu kāmāḥ tat niyatam eva kāraṇam upādadate laukikāḥ

original: yatrāpy aniyato hetuḥ vṛścike gomayādikaḥ /
analyzed: yatra api aniyataḥ hetuḥ vṛścike gomaya ādikaḥ

original: abhiyuktas tu tatrāpi viśeṣaṃ na na manvate //
analyzed: abhiyuktaḥ tu tatra api viśeṣam na na manvate

original: tad eva kāraṇaniyamo 'py kāryaviśeṣadarśanād duraphnava iti mukhavikāsasya harṣa eva kāraṇam avagamyate sahasrakṛtvas tathā darśanāt //
analyzed: tat eva kāraṇa niyamaḥ u pi kārya viśeṣa darśanāt duraphnavaḥ iti mukha vikāsasya harṣaḥ eva kāraṇam avagamyate sahasra kṛtvas tathā darśanāt

original: acetanānāṃ tu nāmarasādīnāṃ vikāsakāraṇaṃ taraṇikiraṇanikarapariṣvaṅgādyupalabdham iti tad api na svābhāvikam //
analyzed: acetanānām tu nāma rasa ādīnām vikāsa kāraṇam taraṇi kiraṇa nikara pariṣvaṅga ādi upalabdham iti tat api na svābhāvikam

original: tasmān mukhavikāsasya harṣaḥ harṣasya ca smṛtiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt mukha vikāsasya harṣaḥ harṣasya ca smṛtiḥ

original: smṛter anubhavo hetuḥ sa ca janmāntare śiśoḥ //
analyzed: smṛteḥ anubhavaḥ hetuḥ sa ca janmāntare śiśoḥ

original: nanu śiśorjanmāntarānubhūtasmaraṇe sarvadā sarvasmaraṇaprasaṅgaḥna yāvat kāryaṃ kāraṇakalpanāt /
analyzed: nanu śiśoḥ janma antara anubhūta smaraṇe sarvadā sarva smaraṇa prasaṅgaḥ na yāvat kāryam kāraṇa kalpanāt

original: na hi sarvadā sarvānusmaraṇaṃ saṃvedyate /
analyzed: na hi sarvadā sarva anusmaraṇam saṃvedyate

original: na ca tatkalpanāyāṃ kāraṇam upalabhyate /
analyzed: na ca tad kalpanāyām kāraṇam upalabhyate

original: na caikadarśanāt sarvaṃ kalpyaṃ dṛṣṭam api vā nihnotavyam iti parīkṣakāṇām ucita eṣa panthā ity asakṛduktam //
analyzed: na ca eka darśanāt sarvam kalpyam dṛṣṭam api vā nihnotavyam iti parīkṣakāṇām ucitaḥ eṣa panthāḥ iti asakṛt uktam

original: api ca payasastṛptihetutām anusmaran bālakaḥ stanyābhilāṣeṇa mātustanataṭe dṛṣṭiṃ nidadhāti /
analyzed: api ca payasaḥ tṛpti hetu tām anusmaran bālakaḥ stanya abhilāṣeṇa mātuḥ tana taṭe dṛṣṭim nidadhāti

original: na cācya tena tasya tatsādhanatvam avagatam iti janmāntare sambandhagrahaṇam asya vṛttam iti manyāmahe //
analyzed: na tena tasya tad sādhana tvam avagatam iti janmāntare sambandha grahaṇam asya vṛttam iti manyāmahe

original: na cāyaskāntadṛṣṭāntasamāśrayeṇa svābhāvikam eva tat bālakasya kucakalaśanikaṭopasarpaṇam iti vaktum ucitam anantaram eva nirastatvāt //
analyzed: na ca ayaskānta dṛṣṭānta samāśrayeṇa svābhāvikam eva tat bālakasya kuca kalaśa nikaṭa upasarpaṇam iti vaktum ucitam anantaram eva nirasta tvāt

original: nanu ca garbhaśayyāśāyino 'pi paripoṣadarśanāt tatsādhanopādāne tad anusmaraṇam eva prāpyotiyadi kāryam avagamyate tatrāpi tatkāraṇam avagamya tām ko doṣaḥtatra tu janayitrījaṭharapatitānnapānaparipākasaṃkrāntyā tatparipoṣam āyurvedavido vadantīti kathaṃ tatra smataṇādikalpanā //
analyzed: nanu ca paripoṣa darśanāt tad sādhana upādāne tat anusmaraṇam eva kāryam avagamyate tatra api tat kāraṇam avagamya tām kaḥ doṣaḥ tatra tu janayitrī jaṭhara patita anna pāna paripāka saṃkrāntyā tad paripoṣam āyurveda vidaḥ vadanti iti katham tatra sma taṇa ādi kalpanā

original: kalpanāyāṃ vā prathamaṃ niṣekānantaram eva kalalādiśukraṣoṇitavikārasaṃbhavāt taddaśāsv api smaraṇakalpanāprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: kalpanāyām vā prathamam niṣeka anantaram eva kalala ādi śukra ṣoṇita vikāra saṃbhavāt tad daśāsu api smaraṇa kalpanā prasaṅgaḥ

original: na ca tatkalpanāyām api kācid asmākaṃ kṣatiḥ /
analyzed: na ca tad kalpanāyām api kācid asmākam kṣatiḥ

original: ayaṃ tu stanyābhilāṣeṇa kucakṣīrakalaśāvalokanopasarpaṇādaro dārakasya tadanusmaraṇakṛta eveti sarvathā janmāntarasaṃbandhānumānān nityo 'yam ātmeti //
analyzed: ayam tu stanya abhilāṣeṇa kuca kṣīra kalaśa avalokana upasarpaṇa ādaraḥ dārakasya tad anusmaraṇa kṛtaḥ eva iti sarvathā janma antara saṃbandha anumānāt nityaḥ yam ātmā iti

original: ataś caivaṃ vītarāgajanmādarśanāt //3.1.25//
analyzed: atas ca evam vīta rāga janma adarśanāt

original: rāgādivāsanābhyāsena sudṛḍhaprarūḍhenānādiprabandhapravṛtena aparityajyamānāḥ sarāgā eva jantavo jāyante /
analyzed: rāga ādi vāsanā abhyāsena su dṛḍha prarūḍhena anādi prabandha pravṛtena a parityajyamānāḥ sa rāgāḥ eva jantavaḥ jāyante

original: na khalu. loke kiś cana tādṛśo dṛśyate prāṇī yo jāto vītarāgaś ceti /
analyzed: na khalu loke kim cana tādṛśaḥ dṛśyate prāṇī yaḥ jātaḥ vīta rāgaḥ ca iti

original: sa eṣa sarāgo jāyamānaḥ pūrvopacitāṃ rāgādivāsanām anusaratīti siddho janmāntarasaṃbandhaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ eṣa sa rāgaḥ jāyamānaḥ pūrva upacitām rāga ādi vāsanām anusarati iti siddhaḥ janma antara saṃbandhaḥ

original: tathā ca kecij jajāyante lobhamātraparāyaṇāḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca kecid jajāyante lobha mātra parāyaṇāḥ

original: dravyasaṅgrahaṇaikāgramanaso mūṣakādayaḥ //
analyzed: dravya saṅgrahaṇa ekāgra manasaḥ mūṣaka ādayaḥ

original: manobhavamayāḥ kecit santi pārāvatādayaḥ /
analyzed: manobhava mayāḥ kecid santi pārāvata ādayaḥ

original: kujatpriyatamācaṃcucumbanāsaktacetasaḥ //
analyzed: kujat priyatamā caṃcu cumbana āsakta cetasaḥ

original: kecit krodhapradhānāś ca bhavanti bhujagādayaḥ //
analyzed: kecid krodha pradhānāḥ ca bhavanti bhujaga ādayaḥ

original: jvaladviṣānalajvālājālapallavitānanāḥ /
analyzed: jvalat viṣa anala jvālā jāla pallavita ānanāḥ

original: jagato yac ca vaicitryaṃ sukhaduḥkhādibhedataḥ //
analyzed: jagataḥ yat ca vaicitryam sukha duḥkha ādi bhedataḥ

original: kṛṣisevādisāmye 'pi vilakṣaṇaphalodayaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣi sevā ādi sāmye vilakṣaṇa phala udayaḥ

original: akasmān nidhilābhaś ca vidyutpātaś ca kasyacit //
analyzed: akasmāt nidhi lābhaḥ ca vidyutpātaḥ ca kasyacid

original: kvacit phalamayatne 'pi yatne 'py aphalatā kvacit /
analyzed: kvacid phalam ayatne yatne pi aphala tā kvacid

original: tad etad durghaṭaṃ dṛṣṭāt kāraṇād vyabhicāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: tat etat durghaṭam dṛṣṭāt kāraṇāt vyabhicāriṇaḥ

original: tenādṛṣṭam upetavyamasya kiñcana kāraṇam /
analyzed: tena adṛṣṭam upetavyam asya kiñcana kāraṇam

original: adṛśyo bhūtadharmas tu jagadvaicitryakāraṇam //
analyzed: adṛśyaḥ bhūta dharmaḥ tu jagat vaicitrya kāraṇam

original: yadi kaścid upeyeta ko doṣaḥ karmakalpane //
analyzed: yadi kaścid upeyeta kaḥ doṣaḥ karma kalpane

original: saṃjñāmātre vivādaś ca tathā satyāvayor bhavet //
analyzed: saṃjñā mātre vivādaḥ ca tathā satyā āvayoḥ bhavet

original: bhūtavad bhūtadharmasya na cādṛśyatvasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: bhūta vat bhūta dharmasya na ca adṛśya tva saṃbhavaḥ

original: dṛṣṭaś ca sādhvīsutayoḥ yamayos tulyajamanoḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ ca sādhvī sutayoḥ yamayoḥ tulya ja manoḥ

original: viśeṣo vīryavijñānasaubhāgyārogyasaṃpadām /
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ vīrya vijñāna saubhāgya ārogya saṃpadām

original: svābhāvikatvaṃ kāryāṇāṃ adhunaiva nirākṛtam //
analyzed: svābhāvika tvam kāryāṇām adhunā eva nirākṛtam

original: tasmāt karmabhya evaiṣa vicitrajagadudbhavaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt karmabhyaḥ eva eṣa vicitra jagat udbhavaḥ

original: karmaṇāṃ nanu vaicitryaṃ karmāntarakṛtaṃ yadi /
analyzed: karmaṇām nanu vaicitryam karma antara kṛtam yadi

original: aniṣṭaṃ tat svatas siddhaṃ jagaty eva tad iṣyatām //
analyzed: aniṣṭam tat svatas siddham jagati eva tat iṣyatām

original: karmaṇāṃ śāstrato jñātā viśitraphalaśaktatā /
analyzed: karmaṇām śāstrataḥ jñātā viśitra phala śakta tā

original: dṛṣṭārtheṣu ca vākyeṣu dṛṣṭā pratyakṣato 'pi sā //
analyzed: dṛṣṭa artheṣu ca vākyeṣu dṛṣṭā sā

original: tasmād dṛṣṭasya kāryasya yuktā kāraṇakalpanā /
analyzed: tasmāt dṛṣṭasya kāryasya yuktā kāraṇa kalpanā

original: kāraṇasya tv adṛṣṭatvāt kiṃ hetvantaracintayā //
analyzed: kāraṇasya tu adṛṣṭa tvāt kim hetu antara cintayā

original: hetvantaraṃ tu tad dhetoḥ nāstīty etāvataiva kim /
analyzed: hetvantaram tu tat hetoḥ na asti iti etāvatā eva kim

original: dṛṣṭasyāpy asya kāryasya yujyate hetvapahnavaḥ//
analyzed: dṛṣṭasya api asya kāryasya yujyate hetu apahnavaḥ

original: hetvantaranimitte 'pi karmavaicitryakalpane /
analyzed: hetu antara nimitte pi karma vaicitrya kalpane

original: saṃsārasya tv anāditvāt nānavasthā bhayāvahā //
analyzed: saṃsārasya tu anādi tvāt na anavasthā bhaya āvahā

original: tathā ca puṇyaḥ puṇyena pāpaḥ pāpena karmaṇā /
analyzed: tathā ca puṇyaḥ puṇyena pāpaḥ pāpena karmaṇā

original: jāyate jantur ity evaṃ dharmaśāstreṣu paṭhyate //
analyzed: jāyate jantuḥ iti evam dharma śāstreṣu paṭhyate

original: tasmāt kutarkamūlena dṛṣṭakāryopapātinā /
analyzed: tasmāt kutarka mūlena dṛṣṭa kārya upapātinā

original: sarvalaokaviruddhena codyena kṛtam īdṛśā //
analyzed: sarva loka viruddhena codyena kṛtam īdṛśā

original: tasmāt kalpyāni karmāṇi dṛṣṭakāryopapattaye //
analyzed: tasmāt kalpyāni karmāṇi dṛṣṭa kārya upapattaye

original: eṣāṃ ca kṣaṇabhaṅgitvāt saṃskāradvārikā sthitiḥ /
analyzed: eṣām ca kṣaṇabhaṅgi tvāt saṃskāradvārikā sthitiḥ

original: sa karmajanyasaṃskāraḥ dharmādharmagirocyate //
analyzed: sa karma janya saṃskāraḥ dharma adharma girā ucyate

original: vinā ca nityam ātmānaṃ na dharmādharmayoḥ sthitiḥ //
analyzed: vinā ca nityam ātmānam na dharma adharmayoḥ sthitiḥ

original: nityas tasmād bhavati puruṣaḥ svapraṇītānugacchaddharmādharmakramapariṇatānandatāpopabhogaḥ /
analyzed: nityaḥ tasmāt bhavati puruṣaḥ sva praṇīta anugacchat dharma adharma krama pariṇata ānanda tāpa upabhogaḥ

original: prāmāṇyaṃ ca sphuṭam abhihitaṃ pūrvam evāgamānāṃ tebhyo 'py ātmā janananidhanātītatattvaḥ prasiddhaḥ //
analyzed: prāmāṇyam ca sphuṭam abhihitam pūrvam eva āgamānām tebhyaḥ pi ātmā janana nidhana atīta tattvaḥ prasiddhaḥ

original: yadvijñānaghanādivedavacanaṃ tatpūrvapakṣe sthitaṃ paurvāparyavimarśaśūnyahṛdayaiḥ so 'rtho gṛhītas tathā /
analyzed: yat vijñāna ghana ādi veda vacanam tat pūrva pakṣe sthitam paurvāparya vimarśa śūnya hṛdayaiḥ saḥ rthaḥ gṛhītaḥ tathā

original: maitreyyā paricoditas tu bhagavān yady ājñavalkyo 'bravīt ātmā naiva vinaśyatīti tad idaṃ siddhāntasāraṃ vacaḥ //
analyzed: maitreyyā paricoditaḥ tu bhagavān yadi ājñavalkyaḥ bravīt ātmā na eva vinaśyati iti tat idam siddhānta sāram vacaḥ

original: tenātmanityatvasamarthanena susupaṣṭasiddhaḥ paralokamārgaḥ /
analyzed: tena ātma nitya tva samarthanena su su paṣṭa siddhaḥ para loka mārgaḥ

original: ya eva dehāntarasaṃgamo 'sya tam eva tadjñāḥ paralokam āhuḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ eva deha antara saṃgamaḥ tam eva tad jñāḥ para lokam āhuḥ

original: iti kabalane māṃspākānāṃ parasvaparigrahe kitavajanatāgoṣṭhyāṃ veśyāmukhāmbujacumbane /
analyzed: iti kabalane māṃspākānām para sva parigrahe kitava janatā goṣṭhyām veśyā mukha ambuja cumbane

original: ratam atirabhūd dhūrto matvā bhavantaranāstitāṃ tad ayam adhunā tatsaṃsiddher aho bana dūyate //
analyzed: ratam dhūrtaḥ matvā bhavantara nāstitām tat ayam adhunā tad saṃsiddheḥ aho dūyate

original: tasmān nityo 'yam ātmā na ca kaluṣaphalas tasya naisargiko 'yaṃ rāgadveṣādiyogo 'pi tu sakalaguṇāpoḍham evāsya rūpam /
analyzed: tasmāt nityaḥ yam ātmā na ca kaluṣa phalaḥ tasya naisargikaḥ yam rāga dveṣa ādi yogaḥ tu sakala guṇa apoḍham eva asya rūpam

original: tenānādiprabandhopacitapariṇamatkarmapākopanītaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃtyajya niḥśreyasamakhilabhayātītam āptuṃ yateta //
analyzed: tena anādi prabandha upacita pariṇamat karma pāka upanītam duḥkham saṃtyajya niḥśreyasam akhila bhaya atītam āptum yateta

original: aṣṭamam āhnikampameyaparīkṣā ātmānantaraṃ vibhāgasūtre śarīranirdeśāt tadanuktameṇa tatsvarūpanirūpaṇārtham āha śeṣṭendriyārthāśrayaḥ śarīram //2.2.32//
analyzed: aṣṭamam āhnika mpa meya parīkṣā ātmā anantaram vibhāga sūtre śarīra nirdeśāt tad svarūpa nirūpaṇa artham āha śeṣṭa indriya artha āśrayaḥ śarīram

original: śarīrasya yal lakṣaṇaṃ yena rūpeṇa vibhāvyamānasyāpavargopayogitā tadubhayam api pratipādyate //
analyzed: śarīrasya yat lakṣaṇam yena rūpeṇa vibhāvyamānasya apavarga upayogi tā tat ubhayam api pratipādyate

original: tatra śarīratvam eva tāvat prathamaṃ śarīrasya lakṣaṇam/
analyzed: tatra śarīra tvam eva tāvat prathamam śarīrasya lakṣaṇam

original: tena hi samānāsamānajātīyakebhyaḥ tadvyavacchidyate /
analyzed: tena hi samāna asamāna jātīyakebhyaḥ tat vyavacchidyate

original: tasmin saty api ceṣṭendriyārthāśrayatvaṃ tad asya lakṣaṇam ucyate tat tena rūpeṇātmano bhogāyatanaṃ śarīram iti jñāpayitum /
analyzed: tasmin sati api ceṣṭā indriya artha āśraya tvam tat asya lakṣaṇam ucyate tat tena rūpeṇa ātmanaḥ bhoga āyatanam śarīram iti jñāpayitum

original: ceṣṭendriyārthāśrayatayā hi śarīram ātmano bhogasādhanaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: ceṣṭā indriya artha āśraya tayā hi śarīram ātmanaḥ bhoga sādhanam bhavati

original: mumukṣuṇā ca sukhaduḥkhopabhogarahitātmatattvasvabhāvinaiḥśreyasādhigamavinihitamanasā tathā bhogādhiṣṭhānatvena śarīraṃ bhāvayatā tatparihareṇe yatnaḥ kārya iti ācāryaḥ ceṣṭendriyārthāśrayatvam asya lakṣaṇam uktavān //
analyzed: mumukṣuṇā ca sukha duḥkha upabhoga rahita ātma tattva svabhāvi naiḥśreyasa adhigama vinihita manasā tathā bhoga adhiṣṭhāna tvena śarīram bhāvayatā yatnaḥ kāryaḥ iti ācāryaḥ ceṣṭā indriya artha āśraya tvam asya lakṣaṇam uktavān

original: nanu ceṣṭā kriyā /
analyzed: nanu ceṣṭā kriyā

original: kriyāśrayatve saty api na vṛkṣādīnāṃ śarīratvam iti ativyāpakaṃ laksaṇamnaviśiṣṭaceṣṭāśrayatvasya viśiṣṭaprameyalakṣaṇaprakramato 'vasīyamānatvāt /
analyzed: kriyā āśraya tve sati api na vṛkṣa ādīnām śarīra tvam iti ativyāpakam

original: hitāhitaprāptiparihārayogyavyāpārādhikaraṇaṃ hi śarīram ucyate na ceṣṭāmātrasyādhiṣṭhānam /
analyzed: hita ahita prāpti parihāra yogya vyāpāra adhikaraṇam hi śarīram ucyate na ceṣṭā mātrasya adhiṣṭhānam

original: rathādinā'pi nātivyāptiḥ yothoktaprakramavaśād eva [anyena preraṇāyām asatyām] iti viśeṣalābhāt /
analyzed: ratha ādinā api nā ativyāptiḥ yotha ukta prakrama vaśāt eva anyena preraṇāyām asatyām iti viśeṣa lābhāt

original: ātmaprayatnātiriktaprerakanirapekṣahitāhitopādānaparityāgopādhikaceṣṭāviśeṣāśrayaḥ śarīram ity arthaḥ //
nanu pāṣāṇāntargatamaṇḍūkaśarīreṣu tadāśrayatvādarśanād avyāptiḥ nayogyatātāstatrāpi bhāvāt /
analyzed: nanu pāṣāṇa antargata maṇḍūka śarīreṣu tad āśraya tva adarśanāt avyāptiḥ na yogya tā tāḥ tatra api bhāvāt

original: satyām api kriyāyogyatāyāṃ sarvato nirvivaranibiḍadṛṣatkarparoparuddhāvakāśatayā calitum asau na prabhavati bhoko varākaḥ /
analyzed: satyām api kriyā yogya tāyām sarvatas niḥ vivara nibiḍa dṛṣad karpara uparuddha avakāśa tayā calitum asau na prabhavati bhokaḥ varākaḥ

original: tathā ca sphuṭite tasminnaśmani tatkṣaṇam evāsau calat dṛśyate iti nibiḍapoāśasaṃyataśarīravat tadānīṃ ceṣṭāyā adarśane 'pi nāvyāptiḥ //
analyzed: tathā ca sphuṭite tasmin aśmani tad kṣaṇam eva asau calat dṛśyate iti nibiḍa poāśa saṃyata śarīra vat tadānīm ceṣṭāyāḥ adarśane na avyāptiḥ

original: mumukṣuśarīram eva lakṣayam iti eke /
analyzed: mumukṣu śarīram eva lakṣayam iti eke

original: tena na maṇḍūkaśarīrādibhiravyāptiḥ alakṣaṇīyatvāt teṣām ititad ayuktamniyatasya mumuks.uśarīrasyābhāvāt tādṛśiṃ ca bhekādiśarīrāṇi nitarāṃ nirvedakārīṇi bhavanti /
analyzed: tena na maṇḍūka śarīra ādibhiḥ avyāptiḥ alakṣaṇīya tvāt teṣām iti tat ayuktam niyatasya mumuksu śarīrasya abhāvāt ca bheka ādi śarīrāṇi nitarām nirveda kārīṇi bhavanti

original: mumukṣur api karmavipākam anekaprakāramakalayan maṇḍūkībhāvam ātmano 'pi na na śaṅkte //
analyzed: mumukṣuḥ api karma vipākam aneka prakāram akalayan maṇḍūkī bhāvam ātmanaḥ u pi na na śaṅkte

original: pratyāsannāpavargapurapraveśavipaścittamamapaścittamamapaścimajanmānaṃ mumukṣuṃ prati lakṣaṇādyupadeśaḥ kvopayujyateity ataḥ pūrvokta evāvyāptiparihāraḥ śreyān //
analyzed: mumukṣum prati lakṣaṇa ādi upadeśaḥ kva upayujyate iti atas pūrva uktaḥ eva avyāpti parihāraḥ śreyān

original: bhavatv evaṃ ceṣṭāśrayatvaṃ śarīralakṣaṇam /
analyzed: bhavatu evam ceṣṭā āśraya tvam śarīra lakṣaṇam

original: indriyāśrayatvaṃ tu katham bhautikāni hīndriyāṇi svāvayavasamāśritāni ghrāṇarasananayanasparśanāni /
analyzed: indriya āśraya tvam tu katham bhautikāni hi indriyāṇi sva avayava samāśritāni ghrāṇa rasana nayana sparśanāni

original: śrotramanasī tu nityadravyatvād anāśrite eveti katham indriyāśrayatā śarīrasyeti ucyatenātra ādhārādheyabhāva āśrayārthaḥkin tu tadanugrāhyatvāt tadāśritāni indriyāṇy ucyante /
analyzed: śrotra manasī tu nitya dravya tvāt anāśrite eva iti katham indriya āśraya tā śarīrasya iti ucyate na atra ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ āśraya arthaḥ kin tu tad anugrāhya tvāt tad āśritāni indriyāṇi ucyante

original: deśakāladaśānukūlapathyabhojanābhyāṅgavyāyāmamardanādyupacāropacitaśarīrasya hi puṃsaḥ padutarāṇi svaviṣayagrahaṇe bhavantīndriyāṇi /
analyzed: deśa kāla daśa anukūla pathya bhojana abhyāṅga vyāyāma mardana ādi upacāra upacita śarīrasya hi puṃsaḥ padutarāṇi sva viṣaya grahaṇe bhavanti indriyāṇi

original: dīrghādhvalaṅghanakadaśanaśuṣkajaratpuranghrī sevanādikilaṣṭaśarīrasya tu puṃsaḥ mandaśaktīni bhavanti tadanugrāhakatvād indriyāṇām āśrayaḥ śarīram //
analyzed: sevana ādi kilaṣṭa śarīrasya tu puṃsaḥ manda śaktīni bhavanti tad anugrāhaka tvāt indriyāṇām āśrayaḥ śarīram

original: arthānāṃ tu rūparasagandhādīnāṃ keṣāṃ cidāśrayaḥ śarīraṃ bhavaty eva tatsamavātinām /
analyzed: arthānām tu rūpa rasa gandha ādīnām keṣām cit āśrayaḥ śarīram bhavati eva tad samavātinām

original: na tu tāvatā kiñcidbhogāyatanatvopayogi rūpm abhihitaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: na tu tāvatā kiñcid bhogāyatana tva upayogi rūpm abhihitam bhavati

original: lakṣaṇam api tadativyāpakaṃ rūparasādisamavāyasya vṛkṣādāv api bhāvāt /
analyzed: lakṣaṇam api tad ativyāpakam rūpa rasa ādi samavāyasya vṛkṣa ādau api bhāvāt

original: tasmāttadarthāśrayatvam īdṛśam atra vivakṣitam /
analyzed: tasmāt tad artha āśraya tvam īdṛśam atra vivakṣitam

original: ya ete paravanitādiśarīravartinaḥ pravikacamucukundakundakandalakumudakuḍmalādibāhyaviṣayasamavāyinaś ca rūparasādayo 'rthā ramaṇīyatām ādadhānā rāgavṛddhihetavo bhavanti bhoktur ātmanaḥ śarīre sati na śarīrarahitasyeti arthānāṃ bhogasādhanabhāvādāśrayaḥ śarīram /
analyzed: ye ete para vanitā ādi śarīra vartinaḥ pravikaca mucukunda kunda kandala kumuda kuḍmala ādi bāhya viṣaya samavāyinaḥ ca rūpa rasa ādayaḥ rthāḥ ramaṇīya tām ādadhānāḥ rāga vṛddhi hetavaḥ bhavanti bhoktuḥ ātmanaḥ śarīre sati na śarīra rahitasya iti arthānām bhoga sādhana bhāvāt āśrayaḥ śarīram

original: ataḥ suṣṭhūktaṃ ceṣṭendriyārthāśrayaḥ śarīram iti //
analyzed: atas suṣṭhu uktam ceṣṭā indriya artha āśrayaḥ śarīram iti

original: tad itthaṃ bhogāyatanatvena bandhahetutvād dheyam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tat ittham bhogāyatana tvena bandha hetu tvāt dheyam iti arthaḥ

original: tad idānīm asmadādiśarīraṃ kiṃ parthivam kiṃ vā nānābhūtanirmitam iti parīkṣayate //
analyzed: tat idānīm asmat ādi śarīram kim parthivam kim vā nānā bhūta nirmitam iti parīkṣayate

original: nanu kim anayā parīkṣayā prayojanam kiḥśreyasopayogo hi yaḥ śarīrasya darśitaḥ /
analyzed: nanu kim anayā parīkṣayā prayojanam kiḥśreyasa upayogaḥ hi yaḥ śarīrasya darśitaḥ

original: so 'nekaprakṛtitve 'pi na sa tasya viśiṣyate //
analyzed: saḥ aneka prakṛti tve pi na sa tasya viśiṣyate

original: maivaṃ vocaḥ pratipannasvarūpasya cintyā kāryopayogitā /
analyzed: mā evam vocaḥ pratipanna sva rūpasya cintyā kārya upayogi tā

original: kāryā kāryārthino 'py ādau yatnastadrūpanirṇaye //
analyzed: ādau yatnaḥ tad rūpa nirṇaye

original: tathā cendriyāṇi bhautikatvāhaṅkārikatvādivekena parīkṣiṣyante //
analyzed: tathā ca indriyāṇi bhautika tva āhaṅkārika tva ādi vekena parīkṣiṣyante

original: arthā api kati kiṃguṇā iti //
analyzed: arthāḥ api kati kiṃguṇāḥ iti

original: buddhir api kiṃ pradhānasya prathamo vikāraḥ mahacchabdavācyaḥ uta ātmana eva dharmo jñānākhyaḥ kṣaṇikaḥity evaṃ sarvatra draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: buddhiḥ api kim pradhānasya prathamaḥ vikāraḥ mahat śabda vācyaḥ uta ātmanaḥ eva dharmaḥ jñāna ākhyaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ iti evam sarvatra draṣṭavyam

original: tatra pāthivam evāsmadādiśarīram iti kecit /
analyzed: tatra pāthivam eva asmat ādi śarīram iti kecid

original: asādhāraṇo hi dharaṇidharmaḥ gandhas tasminn upalabhyata iti //
analyzed: asādhāraṇaḥ hi dharaṇi dharmaḥ gandhaḥ tasmin upalabhyate iti

original: pṛthivyudakakāraṇam ity anye /
analyzed: pṛthivī udaka kāraṇam iti anye

original: kledasyāpi tasmin darśanāt /
analyzed: kledasya api tasmin darśanāt

original: asati hi salilasaṃsarge na pārthivāvayavāḥ kledam anubhavantīti //
analyzed: asati hi salila saṃsarge na pārthiva avayavāḥ kledam anubhavanti iti

original: kṣitijalajvalanajanitam ity apare gandhakledavad ūṣmaṇo 'pi tatropalaṃbhād iti //
analyzed: kṣiti jala jvalana janitam iti apare gandha kleda vat ūṣmaṇaḥ tatra upalaṃbhāt iti

original: vasumatīsalilam itaretarasaraṇisamīraṇaracitam iti cānye racanā viśeṣasya pavanakāryasya tatrāvadhāraṇād iti //
analyzed: vasumatī salilam itaretara saraṇi samīraṇa racitam iti ca anye racanā viśeṣasya pavana kāryasya tatra avadhāraṇāt iti

original: avanivanadahanapavanagaganavinirmatam iti cāpare gandhādivad avakāśasyāpy ākāśakāryasya tatra darśanāt /
analyzed: avani vana dahana pavana gagana vinirmatam iti ca apare gandha ādi vat avakāśasya api ākāśa kāryasya tatra darśanāt

original: suṣiraṃ hi śarīram upalabhyate /
analyzed: suṣiram hi śarīram upalabhyate

original: avakāśe cākāśaikadeśe 'py avacchedābhiprāyeṇa śrotravat bhaktyā tatkāryatvavyapadeśa iti //
analyzed: avakāśe ca ākāśa eka deśe pi avaccheda abhiprāyeṇa śrotra vat bhaktyā tad kāryatva vyapadeśaḥ iti

original: tad atra kiṃ tattvampārthivam evāsmadādiśarīram iti vijātīyakāryasyāvayavino 'nupapatteḥ /
analyzed: tat atra kim tattvampārthivam eva asmat ādi śarīram iti vijātīya kāryasya avayavinaḥ nupapatteḥ

original: pārthivāvayavasamavetaśarīrāvayavigrāhiṇas tv abhedapratyayasya tṛṇaparṇapāṣāṇamūlakādyabhidapratyayavat apavādāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: pārthiva avayava samaveta śarīra avayavi grāhiṇaḥ tu abheda pratyayasya tṛṇa parṇa pāṣāṇa mūlaka ādi abhida pratyaya vat apavāda asaṃbhavāt

original: na vayam iha bhūtāntarāṇāṃ kāraṇabhāvaniṣedhaṃ śikṣmaḥ /
analyzed: na vayam iha bhūta antarāṇām kāraṇa bhāva niṣedham śikṣmaḥ

original: kevalapārthivatayā nirvivāde 'pi kumbhādāv ambhaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ kāraṇatvānapāyāt /
analyzed: kevala pārthiva tayā nirvivāde pi kumbha ādau ambhaḥ prabhṛtīnām kāraṇa tva anapāyāt

original: tadvyatirekeṇa ghaṭāder ghaṭayitum aśakyatvāt //
analyzed: tad vyatirekeṇa ghaṭa ādeḥ ghaṭayitum aśakya tvāt

original: kin tu ghaṭādāv iva śarīre 'pi samavāyikāraṇaṃ pṛthivyavayavavānevācakṣmahe tadāścitatvasyāsya pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇāt /
analyzed: kim tu ghaṭa ādau iva śarīre pi samavāyi kāraṇam pṛthivī avayavavān eva ācakṣmahe tad āścita tvasya asya pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇāt

original: sahakārikāraṇānupraviṣṭabhūtāntarasaṃbandhanabandhanas tu tisman kledoṣmavyūhāvakāśasaṃpratyayaḥ /
analyzed: sahakāri kāraṇa anupraviṣṭa bhūta antara saṃbandhana bandhanaḥ tu tisman kleda ūṣma vyūha avakāśa saṃpratyayaḥ

original: tad yathā ''''gamapaṭhiteṣu varuṇalokādau kevalajalādijanyeṣu śarīreṣu sahakāritvānupraviṣṭapārthivāvayavopaṣṭambhavaśena sthairyādyupalaṃbhaiti /
analyzed: tat yathā gama paṭhiteṣu varuṇa loka ādau kevala jala ādi janyeṣu śarīreṣu sahakāri tva anupraviṣṭa pārthiva avayava upaṣṭambha vaśena sthairya ādi upalaṃbhaḥ eti

original: tasmād asmadādiśarīraṃ pārthivam //
analyzed: tasmāt asmat ādi śarīram pārthivam

original: vede ca tathaiva vyavahāro dṛśyate /
analyzed: vede ca tathā eva vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate

original: agnīṣomīyādipaśoḥ pralayakāle yajamānasya vā pretasya pātracayanakarmaṇi [sūryaṃ cakṣūr gamayatāt] ity upakramya [pṛthivīṃ te śarīram] iti pathyate /
analyzed: agnīṣomīya ādi paśoḥ pralaya kāle yajamānasya vā pretasya pātra cayana karmaṇi sūryam cakṣūḥ gamayatāt iti upakramya pṛthivīm te śarīram iti pathyate

original: tac ca prakṛtigāmitvavacanam /
analyzed: tat ca prakṛti gāmi tva vacanam

original: yady ataḥ prakṛter utthitaṃ tat tasyām eva līyatām ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: yadi atas prakṛteḥ utthitam tat tasyām eva līyatām iti arthaḥ

original: tatra yathā taijasaṃ caks.ur iti sūryākhye tejasi tadgamanam upadiṣṭam evaṃ pṛthivyāṃ śarīrasyeti //
analyzed: tatra yathā taijasam caksuḥ iti sūrya ākhye tejasi tad gamanam upadiṣṭam evam pṛthivyām śarīrasya iti

original: tasmāt pṛthivyavayavair ayam asmadādideho nibaddha iti nātra satāṃ vivādaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt pṛthivī avayavaiḥ ayam asmat ādi dehaḥ nibaddhaḥ iti na atra satām vivādaḥ

original: so 'yaṃ ca duḥkhavasater bhavam indriyasya stambhaḥ kathora iti yatnata eva heyaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ yam ca duḥkha vasateḥ bhavam indriyasya stambhaḥ kathā uraḥ iti yatnataḥ eva heyaḥ

original: ghrāṇarasanacakṣustvakśrotrāṇīndriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ //1.1.12//
analyzed: ghrāṇa rasana cakṣuḥ tvac śrotrāṇi indriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ

original: atra indriyāṇāṃ viṣayopalabdhikāraṇatvaṃ sāmānyasakṣaṇaṃ prasiddham eva /
analyzed: atra indriyāṇām viṣaya upalabdhi kāraṇa tvam sāmānya sakṣaṇam prasiddham eva

original: vibhāgo 'pi paṃcabāhyendriyāṇīty eṣa sūtrita eva /
analyzed: vibhāgaḥ pi paṃca bāhya indriyāṇi iti eṣa sūtritaḥ eva

original: sa cānantaram eva tīrthāntarakathitakarmendriyāniṣedhāt sādhayiṣyate //
analyzed: sa ca anantaram eva tīrtha antara kathita karmendriya aniṣedhāt sādhayiṣyate

original: viśeṣalakṣaṇāni tu paṃcānāṃ paṃca samākhyānirvacanasāmārthyāt pramāṇavad avagantavyāni //
analyzed: viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni tu paṃcānām paṃca samākhyā nirvacana sāmārthyāt pramāṇa vat avagantavyāni

original: jighratyateneti ghrāṇaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇātīti gandhopalabdhāvasādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ ghrāṇam //
analyzed: jighrati atena iti ghrāṇam gandham gṛhṇāti iti gandha upalabdhau asādhāraṇa kāraṇam ghrāṇam

original: rasayaty aneneti rasanaṃ rasaṃ gṛhṇātīti rasopalabdhāvasādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ rasanam //
analyzed: rasayati anena iti rasanam rasam gṛhṇāti iti rasa upalabdhau asādhāraṇam kāraṇam rasanam

original: caṣṭe 'neneti caks.uḥ rūpa. paśyatīti rūpopalabdhāvasādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ cakṣuḥ īkṣaṇaṃ locanaṃ tad ucyate //
analyzed: caṣṭe nena iti caksuḥ paśyati iti rūpa upalabdhau asādhāraṇam kāraṇam cakṣuḥ īkṣaṇam locanam tat ucyate

original: spṛśyaty aneneti sparśanam sparśaṃ gṛhṇātīti sparśopalabdhāvasādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ sparśanam //
analyzed: spṛśyati anena iti sparśanam sparśam gṛhṇāti iti sparśa upalabdhau asādhāraṇam kāraṇam sparśanam

original: sparśanam iti vaktavye tvaggrahaṇaṃ upacārāt [maṃcāḥ krośanti] itivat tadadhiṣṭhānatvaṃ darśayitum /
analyzed: sparśanam iti vaktavye tvac grahaṇam upacārāt maṃcāḥ krośanti iti vat tad adhiṣṭhāna tvam darśayitum

original: yathā tripuṭikādhiṣṭhānaṃ ghrāṇaṃ jigvādhiṣṭhānaṃ rasanam holakādhiṣṭhānaṃ cakṣuḥ yathā tvagadhiṣṭhānaṃ sparśanam śiraḥpraghṛtyāpādāṅguṣṭhaṃ sparśopalambhāt /
