analyzed: yathā tri puṭikā adhiṣṭhānam ghrāṇam jigvā adhiṣṭhānam rasanam holaka adhiṣṭhānam cakṣuḥ yathā tvac adhiṣṭhānam sparśanam śiraḥpraghṛtyā pādāṅguṣṭham sparśa upalambhāt

original: tvag iti ca na bāhyam eva carma kevalam ucyate api tu sakalaśarīravyāpi tuhinakaṇaśiśirasalilapāna samaye antarhṛdaye 'pi śītasparśopalambhād iti //
analyzed: tvac iti ca na bāhyam eva carma kevalam ucyate api tu sakala śarīra vyāpi samaye antar hṛdaye śīta sparśa upalambhāt iti

original: svāvayavasamavāyitve 'pi cendriyāṇāṃ tripuṭikādyāṛayatvaṃ āśrayatvamātrāpekṣayocyate na samavāyitvād iti //
analyzed: sva avayava samavāyi tve pi ca indriyāṇām tri puṭikā ādi āṛaya tvam āśraya tva mātra apekṣayā ucyate na samavāyi tvāt iti

original: śṛṇoty aneneti śrotraṃ śabdaṃ gṛhṇātīti śabdopalabdhāvasādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ śrotram /
analyzed: śṛṇoti anena iti śrotram śabdam gṛhṇāti iti śabda upalabdhau asādhāraṇam kāraṇam śrotram

original: tac cākāśaikadeśatvād anāśritam api karṇaśaṣkulyadhiṣṭhānam ucyate /
analyzed: tat ca ākāśa eka deśa tvāt anāśritam api karṇaśaṣkulī adhiṣṭhānam ucyate

original: tad evaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇāni paṃca paṃcanām uktāni bhavanti //
analyzed: tat evam viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni paṃca paṃcanām uktāni bhavanti

original: tānīmānīndriyāṇi svaviṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇāni ātmano bhogasādhanatvāt saṃsārakāraṇānīti heyatayā bhāvayitavyāni /
analyzed: tāni imāni indriyāṇi sva viṣaya grahaṇa lakṣaṇāni ātmanaḥ bhoga sādhana tvāt saṃsāra kāraṇāni iti heya tayā bhāvayitavyāni

original: tathā bhāvyamānāni nirvedopādanādidvāreṇa apavargāya kalpayiṣayanta iti //
analyzed: tathā bhāvyamānāni nirveda upādana ādi dvāreṇa apavargāya iti

original: [bhūtebhyaḥ] iti kim arthamuktaṃ hi indriyāṇāṃ svaviṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇatvam /
analyzed: bhūtebhyaḥ iti kim artham uktam hi indriyāṇām sva viṣaya grahaṇa lakṣaṇa tvam

original: tatra na ghūtagrahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇārtham api tu tadviniścayārtham /
analyzed: tatra na ghūta grahaṇam lakṣaṇa artham api tu tad viniścaya artham

original: yathā [āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ] ity atrāptagrahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇaviniścayārtham /
analyzed: yathā āpta upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti atra āpta grahaṇam lakṣaṇa viniścaya artham

original: svasvaviṣayopalabdhilakṣaṇatvaṃ hīndriyāṇāṃ bhūtaprakṛtitve sati nirvahati nānyatheti //
analyzed: sva sva viṣaya upalabdhi lakṣaṇa tvam hi indriyāṇām bhūta prakṛti tve sati nirvahati na anyathā iti

original: tāni punar indriyāṇāṃ kāraṇāni pṛthivyaptejovāyurākāśam iti bhūtāni /
analyzed: tāni punar indriyāṇām kāraṇāni pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam iti bhūtāni

original: ebhyaḥ paṃcabhyaḥyathāsaṅkhyaṃ ghrāṇarasanacakṣustvakśrotrāṇi paṃccendriyāṇi bhavanti /
analyzed: ebhyaḥ paṃcabhyaḥ yathāsaṅkhyam ghrāṇa rasana cakṣuḥ tvac śrotrāṇi paṃca indriyāṇi bhavanti

original: bhūtaprakṛtitvam iti bhūtasvabhāvatvaṃ vyākhyāyamānaṃ paṃcasv api saṃbhavati /
analyzed: bhūta prakṛti tvam iti bhūta svabhāva tvam vyākhyāyamānam paṃcasu api saṃbhavati

original: bhūtakāraṇakatvaṃ tu anyeṣu catuṣv api tathaiva /
analyzed: bhūta kāraṇaka tvam tu anyeṣu catuṣu api tathā eva

original: śrotre tu kathaj cit karṇaśaṣkulyavācchinnabhobhāgābhiprayeṇa vyavahārataḥ samarthanīyam /
analyzed: śrotre tu katham cit vyavahārataḥ samarthanīyam

original: evaṃ sati bhautikānīndriyāṇi svaṃ svaṃ viṣayam adhigantum utsahanti iti tallakṣaṇatvam eṣāṃsiddhyatīti /
analyzed: evam sati bhautikāni indriyāṇi svam svam viṣayam adhigantum utsahanti iti tad lakṣaṇa tvam

original: ato [bhūtebhyaḥ] ity uktam //
analyzed: atas bhūtebhyaḥ iti uktam

original: nanuetatparīkṣaṇīyaṃ vartate /
analyzed: nanu etat parīkṣaṇīyam vartate

original: kiṃ bhautikānām indriyāṇāṃ svaviṣayagrahaṇakaraṇatvaṃ utānyatheti //
analyzed: kim bhautikānām indriyāṇām sva viṣaya grahaṇa karaṇa tvam uta anyathā iti

original: evaṃ hi sāṅkhyāḥ saṃpravadanteāhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇi arthaṃ sādhayitum arhanti nānyathā /
analyzed: evam hi sāṅkhyāḥ saṃpravadante āhaṅkārikāṇi indriyāṇi artham sādhayitum arhanti na anyathā

original: tathā hikārakaṃ kārakatvād eva prāpyakāri bhavati /
analyzed: tathā hi kārakam kāraka tvāt eva prāpya kāri bhavati

original: bhautikāni cendriyāṇi kathaṃ prāpyakārīṇi dūravartini viṣaye bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: bhautikāni ca indriyāṇi katham prāpya kārīṇi dūra vartini viṣaye bhaveyuḥ

original: āhuṅkārikāṇāṃ tu teṣāṃ vyāpakatvāt viṣayākārapariṇāmātmikā vṛttir vṛttimato 'nanyā satī saṃbhavaty eveti suvacaṃ prāpyakāritvam //
analyzed: āhuṅkārikāṇām tu teṣām vyāpaka tvāt viṣaya ākāra pariṇāma ātmikā vṛttiḥ vṛttimataḥ na anyā satī saṃbhavati eva iti suvacam prāpya kāri tvam

original: api ca mahadaṇugrahaṇam āhaṅkārikatve teṣāṃ kalpate na bhautikatve /
analyzed: api ca mahat aṇu grahaṇam āhaṅkārika tve teṣām kalpate na bhautika tve

original: bhautikatve hi yatparimāṇaṃ grahaṇaṃ tatparimāṇaṃ grāhyaṃ gṛhṇīyātasti ca golakādadhikaparimāṇasya paṭapiṭharāder grahaṇaṃ hīnaparimāṇasya ca vaṭadhānādeḥ /
analyzed: bhautika tve hi yat parimāṇam grahaṇam tat parimāṇam grāhyam gṛhṇīyāt asti ca golakāt adhika parimāṇasya paṭa piṭhara ādeḥ grahaṇam hīna parimāṇasya ca vaṭa dhānā ādeḥ

original: ato 'pi na bhautikānīndriyāṇi //
analyzed: atas pi na bhautikāni indriyāṇi

original: bhautikānām api dīpādīnāṃ paraṃ prakāśayatāṃ svātmaprakāśakatvam api dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: bhautikānām api dīpa ādīnām param prakāśayatām svātma prakāśaka tvam api dṛṣṭam

original: evam indriyāṇy api paṭādisvarūpaṃ prakāśayanti svarūpam api prakāśayeyuḥ /
analyzed: evam indriyāṇi api paṭa ādi sva rūpam prakāśayanti sva rūpam api prakāśayeyuḥ

original: na ca prakāśayantīty ato 'pi na bhautikāni //
analyzed: na ca prakāśayanti iti atas na bhautikāni

original: atrābhidhītateyat tāvat prāpyakāritvaṃ bhautikatvapakṣe nāvakalpata iti jalpitavānasi tanmanyenūnaṃ tvayā golakam eva cakṣur iti cetasi gṛhītamanyathā katham ittyamakathayiṣyaḥ /
analyzed: tāvat prāpyakāritvam bhautika tva pakṣe na avakalpate iti jalpitavān asi tat manye nūnam tvayā golakam eva cakṣuḥ iti cetasi gṛhītam anyathā katham ittyam akathayiṣyaḥ

original: sa cāyam āyuṣmato mahān bhramaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ayam āyuṣmataḥ mahān bhramaḥ

original: na khalu kṛṣṇasāraṃ cakṣuḥtadadhikaraṇaṃ tu tejaḥ cakṣuḥ /
analyzed: na khalu kṛṣṇa sāram cakṣuḥ tad adhikaraṇam tu tejaḥ cakṣuḥ

original: tac ca vegavad dravyatvāt dūram api prasaratīti ko 'sya prāpyakāritāyāṃ mādaḥ //
analyzed: tat ca vegavat dravya tvāt dūram api prasarati iti kaḥ sya prāpya kāri tāyām mādaḥ

original: nanu golake 'pi cikipsādiprayogāt golakaguṇadoṣānuvartitvāc ca viṣayopalabdheḥ golakam eva cakṣuḥ syāt /
analyzed: nanu golake pi cikipsā ādi prayogāt golaka guṇa doṣa anuvarti tvāt ca viṣaya upalabdheḥ golakam eva cakṣuḥ syāt

original: anupalabhyamānaṃ ca tejaḥ katham indriyam ucyate /
analyzed: anupalabhyamānam ca tejaḥ katham indriyam ucyate

original: kathaṃ ca tejasā vegavatāpi visphalite cakṣuṣi sahasaiva yojanaśatasahasravyavahitasitakarataraṇitārakādi grahītuṃ śakyeta kathaṃ vā tad alpakaṃ varākaṃ nāyanaṃ tejaḥ samantataḥ  prasaratā sakalabhuvanaprathitaprabhāvena mahīyasā 'pi mihiramahasā pratihatagati bhaved iti bhāskaradarśanaṃ itthaṃ na sampadyeta /
analyzed: katham ca tejasā vegavatā api visphalite cakṣuṣi sahasā eva yojana śata sahasra vyavahita sitakara taraṇi tārakā ādi grahītum śakyeta katham vā tat alpakam varākam nāyanam tejaḥ samantataḥ prasaratā sakala bhuvana prathita prabhāvena mahīyasā pi mihira mahasā pratihata gati bhavet iti bhāskara darśanam ittham na sampadyeta

original: tejaḥpakṣe ca kācābhrakapaṭalaspaṭikāntaritapadārthopalabdhiḥ kathaṃ samarthyeta /
analyzed: tejaḥ pakṣe ca kāca abhraka paṭala spaṭikā antarita padārtha upalabdhiḥ katham samarthyeta

original: tasmād varaṃ śaktiviśeṣayuktaṃ golakam eva sādho cakṣur abhupagaccheti //
analyzed: tasmāt varam śakti viśeṣa yuktam golakam eva sādho cakṣuḥ abhupagaccha iti

original: ucyatena khalu bhavad anuśāsanena yuktiviruddham artham abhupagacchāmaḥ /
analyzed: ucyatena khalu bhavat anuśāsanena yukti viruddham artham abhupagacchāmaḥ

original: prāpyakāri hi kārakaṃ dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: prāpya kāri hi kārakam dṛṣṭam

original: kṛṣṇasārapakṣe ca kutaḥ prāpyakāritvam śaktirapi kalpyamānā nirāśrayā na parikalpanīyaiveti tadāśrayacintāya na golakamātram āśrayo bhavitum arhati aprāpyakāritvaprasaṃgād iti tadadhikaraṇaṃ teja eva śakter āśrayo bhavet //
analyzed: kṛṣṇasāra pakṣe ca kutas prāpyakāritvam śaktiḥ api kalpyamānā nirāśrayā na parikalpanīyā eva iti tad āśraya cintāya na golaka mātram āśrayaḥ bhavitum arhati a prāpya kāri tva prasaṃgāt iti tad adhikaraṇam tejaḥ eva śakteḥ āśrayaḥ bhavet

original: nanu ca prāpyakāritvam eva cintyaṃ vartate /
analyzed: nanu ca prāpyakāri tvam eva cintyam vartate

original: tad dhi rasanasparśanayoḥ kevalam avalokyate loke /
analyzed: tat hi rasana sparśanayoḥ kevalam avalokyate loke

original: cakṣuḥśrotre tu dūradeśavyavasthitaviṣayagrāhiṇī kathaṃ prāpyakāriṇī syātām //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ śrotre tu dūra deśa vyavasthita viṣaya grāhiṇī katham prāpya kāriṇī syātām

original: ghrāṇaṃ tu tripuṭikānikaṭanihitapadārthagandham api gṛhṇāti dūrato 'pi ca pracaladanilabalavellitaphullamallikādisaurabham upalabhate /
analyzed: ghrāṇam tu tri puṭikā nikaṭa nihita padārtha gandham api gṛhṇāti ca pracalat anila bala vellita phulla mallikā ādi saurabham upalabhate

original: tripuṭitakopakaṇṭhaḍhaukitenāpi dravyeṇa na tasya sannikarṣa iti tad apy aprāpyakāry eva tasmāc chaktiviśeṣaṇam adhiṣṭhānam eva tat tad indriyam iti gṛhyatām /
analyzed: tri puṭita ka upakaṇṭha ḍhaukitena api dravyeṇa na tasya sannikarṣaḥ iti tat api aprāpyakāri eva tasmāt śakti viśeṣaṇam adhiṣṭhānam eva tat tat indriyam iti gṛhyatām

original: utsṛjyatāṃ prāpyakāritvapakṣaḥ //
analyzed: utsṛjyatām prāpyakāri tva pakṣaḥ

original: cakṣuṣi candrārkagrahādigrāhiṇi nitarāṃ prāpyakāritvam ity uktam eva //
analyzed: cakṣuṣi candra arka graha ādi grāhiṇi nitarām prāpyakāri tvam iti uktam eva

original: atrocyatena prāpyakāritvam utsraṣṭuṃ śaknumaḥ /
analyzed: atrā ucyate na prāpyakāri tvam utsraṣṭum śaknumaḥ

original: kārakatvam eva tathā saty eṣām utsṛjema /
analyzed: kāraka tvam eva tathā sati eṣām utsṛjema

original: kārakaṃ ca aprāpyakāri ceti citram //
analyzed: kārakam ca a prāpya kāri ca iti citram

original: adṛṣṭam api kāraṇam ātmano vyāpakatvāt tadvatttidharmādhikaṃ nāprāpyakāri bhavetkim uta dṛṣṭaṃ cakṣurādi kārakam iti //
analyzed: adṛṣṭam api kāraṇam ātmanaḥ vyāpaka tvāt na a prāpya kāri bhavet kim uta dṛṣṭam cakṣuḥ ādi kārakam iti

original: aprāpyakāritve ca śakter aviśeṣaṇāt kuḍyādivyavahitam api vastu cakṣuṣā dṛśyeta /
analyzed: aprāpyakāri tve ca śakteḥ aviśeṣaṇāt kuḍya ādi vyavahitam api vastu cakṣuṣā dṛśyeta

original: tatra kāryānupalambhān na śakitaḥ kalpyata iti cetkiṃ śaktaḥ kalpyatām kiṃ teja iti saṃpradhāraṇāyāṃ tejaso dravyatvāt vyavadhānādi anuguṇam amūrtayās tu śakteḥ vyavadhānam abādhakaṃ bhaved iti teja evendriyaṃ kalpanīyaṃ na śaktiḥ śaktimadadhiṣṭhānaṃ vā //
analyzed: tatra kārya anupalambhāt na śakitaḥ kalpyate iti ced kim śaktaḥ kalpyatām kim tejaḥ iti saṃpradhāraṇāyām tejasaḥ dravya tvāt vyavadhāna ādi anuguṇam amūrtayāḥ tu śakteḥ vyavadhānam abādhakam bhavet iti tejaḥ eva indriyam kalpanīyam na śaktiḥ śaktimat adhiṣṭhānam vā

original: prāpyakāritā ca śrotrasya tāvat vīcīsantānasadṛśaśabdaparamparārambhaṇadrvāreṇa darśitā śabdādhikaraṇe //
analyzed: prāpya kāri tā ca śrotrasya tāvat vīcī santāna sadṛśa śabda paramparā ārambhaṇa drvāreṇa darśitā śabda adhikaraṇe

original: ghṛāṇasyāpi samīraṇāndolitakundalatādiprasṛtatatparimāṇanikarādhikaraṇagandhagrahaṇāt prāpyakāritā /
analyzed: ghṛāṇasya api samīraṇa āndolita kunda latā ādi prasṛta tad parimāṇa nikara adhikaraṇa gandha grahaṇāt prāpyakāri tā

original: na ca paramāṇūnām apasarpaṇe dravyaparikṣayādyāśaṃkanīyambhūyastvāt parimāṇūnām /
analyzed: na ca paramāṇūnām apasarpaṇe dravya parikṣaya ādi āśaṃkanīyam bhūyaḥ tvāt parimāṇūnām

original: ata eva gandhadvārakataddravyasamparkadoṣanirharaṇāya prāyaścittamaśucidravyaghrāṇe samāmananti //
analyzed: atas eva gandha dvāraka tad dravya samparka doṣa nirharaṇāya prāyaścittam aśuci dravya ghrāṇe samāmananti

original: cakṣuṣas tejaḥ prasaraṇāt prāpyakāritā /
analyzed: cakṣuṣaḥ tejaḥ prasaraṇāt prāpya kāri tā

original: anupalabhyamānaṃ teja iti cet kiṃ candramasaḥ parabhāga upalabhyate pṛthivyāścādhobhāgaḥna khala pratyakṣaikaśaraṇāḥ padārthāḥ /
analyzed: anupalabhyamānam tejaḥ iti ced kim candramasaḥ parabhāgaḥ upalabhyate pṛthivyāḥ ca adhobhāgaḥ na khala pratyakṣa eka śaraṇāḥ padārthāḥ

original: anumānādibhir apy eṣām upalambhaḥ sambhavaty eva /
analyzed: anumāna ādibhiḥ api eṣām upalambhaḥ sambhavati eva

original: uktaṃ cānumānam /
analyzed: uktam ca anumānam

original: rūpopalabdhikāryeṇa taijasam eva cakṣur anumīyate /
analyzed: rūpa upalabdhi kāryeṇa taijasam eva cakṣuḥ anumīyate

original: tejodravyaṃ hi dīpādirūpasya prakāśakaṃ dṛṣṭam iti //
analyzed: tejaḥ dravyam hi dīpa ādi rūpasya prakāśakam dṛṣṭam iti

original: pratyakṣeṇa tu nāyanaṃ tejaḥ kim iti nopalabhyata iti cetucyate  vicitrā hi dravyaguṇānām udbhavābhibhavādivaśena gatayo bhavanti /
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa tu nāyanam tejaḥ kim iti na upalabhyate iti ced ucyate vicitrāḥ hi dravya guṇānām udbhava abhibhava ādi vaśena gatayaḥ bhavanti

original: tad yathā  sarvataḥ prasaratā bahalabahalena śītasparśāśrayeṇa dravyeṇa vyāptau hemantaśiśirau ṛtū bhavataḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā sarvatas prasaratā bahala bahalena śīta sparśa āśrayeṇa dravyeṇa vyāptau hemanta śiśirau ṛtū bhavataḥ

original: nirādhārasya śītasparśaguṇasyānupalabdheḥ /
analyzed: nirādhārasya śīta sparśa guṇasya anupalabdheḥ

original: athaḥ saty api tatra saliladravye tadguṇasya śītasparśasyaivopalabdhiḥna śuklarūpasyeti //
analyzed: atha sati api tatra salila dravye tad guṇasya śīta sparśasya eva upalabdhiḥ na śukla rūpasya iti

original: tejodravyeṇa ca nirargalaṃ vijṛmbhamāṇena bhūyasā grīṣmo bhavati /
analyzed: tejaḥ dravyeṇa ca nirargalam vijṛmbhamāṇena bhūyasā grīṣmaḥ bhavati

original: tatra saty api tejodravye tadguṇasyoṣṇasparśasyaiva grahaṇam na bhāsvararūpasyeti //
analyzed: tatra sati api tejaḥ dravye tad guṇasya uṣṇa sparśasya eva grahaṇam na bhāsvara rūpasya iti

original: bhāsvaraṃ ca kārtasvarādau taijasadravye rūpam upalabhyate toṣṇasparśaḥ //
analyzed: bhāsvaram ca kārtasvara ādau taijasa dravye rūpam upalabhyate

original: udakāntargate ca tejasi jvalanatapte jale jvalanaguṇaḥ uṣṇasparśo 'nubhūtate na bhāsvaraṃ rūpam iti //
analyzed: udaka antargate ca tejasi jvalana tapte jale jvalana guṇaḥ uṣṇa sparśaḥ na bhāsvaram rūpam iti

original: evam iha nayanaraśmau tejasi dravye dvāv api rūpasparśau nopalabhyete iti kamupālabhemahi //
analyzed: evam iha nayana raśmau tejasi dravye dvau api rūpa sparśau na upalabhyete iti kam upālabhemahi

original: uktaṃ ca [dṛṣṭānumitānāṃ ca niyogapratiṣedhānupapattiḥ pramāṇasya tattvaviṣayatvāt]iti na ca sarvatra nayanaraśmer anupalambhaḥ /
analyzed: uktam ca dṛṣṭa anumitānām ca niyoga pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ pramāṇasya tattva viṣaya tvāt iti na ca sarvatra nayana raśmeḥ anupalambhaḥ

original: kvacid dhi pṛṣadaṃśaprabhṛtīnāṃ naktaṃcaraṇāṃ niśi nibiḍtamatamaḥpaṃkapaṭalāvalipte veśmani saṃcaratāṃ cākṣuṣaṃ tejaḥ bhāsvaraṃ rūpaṃ dūram api prasarad upalabhyata eva /
analyzed: kvacid hi pṛṣadaṃśa prabhṛtīnām naktaṃcaraṇām niśi nibiḍtam atamaḥ paṃka paṭala avalipte veśmani saṃcaratām cākṣuṣam tejaḥ bhāsvaram rūpam dūram api prasarat upalabhyate eva

original: anyatra madhyandinolkāprakāśavad agrahaṇam asmadādinayanaraśmeḥ //
analyzed: anyatra madhyandina ulkā prakāśa vat a grahaṇam asmad ādi nayana raśmeḥ

original: ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥulkārūpasya divākarakaravibhavābhibhūtatvād agrahaṇam nayanaraśmirūpasya tv anudbhatatvād eveti //
analyzed: ayam tu viśeṣaḥ ulkā rūpasya divākara kara vibhava abhibhūta tvāt agrahaṇam nayana raśmi rūpasya tu eva iti

original: yat tu kācāśrapaṭalasphaṭikāntaritapadārthopalambanaṃtatra kācādīnāṃ keṣāṃcit atisvacchatvāt keṣāṃ cicca suṣiratvāt cāks.uṣatejaḥprasara nirodhakauśalaṃnāstīti nāprāpyakāritvaṃ cakṣuṣasvāvatā bhavati //
analyzed: yat tu kāca aśra paṭala sphaṭika antarita padārtha upalambanam tatra kāca ādīnām keṣāṃcid ati svaccha tvāt keṣām cit ca suṣira tvāt cāk suṣa tejaḥ prasara nirodha kauśalam na asti iti na aprāpya kāri tvam cakṣuṣā svāvatā bhavati

original: yat tukuto nayanaraśmer īdṛśī gatiḥ gaganam ākramya yadgabhastimālinaṃ spṛśati na pratihanyate ca sāvitreṇa vegavatā tejasetiuktam atra dṛṣṭānumitānāṃ niyogapratiṣedhānupapattir iti /
analyzed: yat tu kutas nayana raśmeḥ īdṛśī gatiḥ gaganam ākramya yat gabhastimālinam spṛśati na pratihanyate ca sāvitreṇa vegavatā tejasā iti uktam atra dṛṣṭa anumitānām niyoga pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ iti

original: kārya sattayā hi tathāvidhaṃ kāraṇaṃ kalpyate yad dūram api prasarati prasarad api pareṇa na nirudhyate /
analyzed: kārya sattayā hi tathāvidham kāraṇam kalpyate yat dūram api prasarati prasarat api pareṇa na nirudhyate

original: dṛṣṭaścānirodho bharjanakapālādau tejasaḥ pacyamānadravyapākasiddheḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ ca anirodhaḥ bharjana kapāla ādau tejasaḥ pacyamāna dravya pāka siddheḥ

original: kalaśe ca niśiktānāṃ apāṃ bāhiḥśītasparśagrahaṇāt anirodhaḥ /
analyzed: kalaśe ca niśiktānām apām bāhis śīta sparśa grahaṇāt anirodhaḥ

original: evaṃ nayanaraśmer api bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: evam nayana raśmeḥ api bhaviṣyati

original: na tu holakasyaiva śaitikalpanā laghvīti vaktavyam prāpyakārikārakasvarūpaparityāgaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na tu holakasya eva śaiti kalpanā laghvī iti vaktavyam prāpya kāri kāraka svarūpa parityāga prasaṅgāt

original: prāpyakārīṇi cakṣuḥśrotre tvagādivat iti //
analyzed: prāpya kārīṇi cakṣuḥ śrotre tvac ādi vat iti

original: ata eva sarvendriyāṇāṃ prāpyakāritvam paśyadbhiḥ śāstrajṇaiḥ indriyārthasannikarṣaḥ ṣaṭprakāro vyākhyātaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva sarva indriyāṇām prāpyakāri tvam paśyadbhiḥ śāstra jṇaiḥ indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ ṣaṣ prakāraḥ vyākhyātaḥ

original: prāpyakāritā ca na golakasyopapadyate tadaprāptasya parvatādegrahaṇāt prāptasya ca pratyutāṃjanalcalākāder agrahaṇāt /
analyzed: prāpya kāri tā ca na golakasya upapadyate tad aprāptasya parvata ādeḥ grahaṇāt prāptasya ca pratyuta aṃjana lcalākā ādeḥ agrahaṇāt

original: ato na golakaṃ cakṣuḥ //
analyzed: atas na golakam cakṣuḥ

original: cikitsādiprayogas tu golake yaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: cikitsā ādi prayogaḥ tu golake yaḥ pravartate

original: so 'yam ādhārasaṃskāraḥ ādheyasyopakārakaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ yam ādhāra saṃskāraḥ ādheyasya upakārakaḥ

original: ata eva golakaguṇadoṣānuvartitvam api viṣayopalabdher ghaṭamānam ādhāra dvārakai hi tadādheyasyaiva tau guṇadoṣāv iti /
analyzed: atas eva golaka guṇa doṣa anuvarti tvam api viṣaya upalabdheḥ ghaṭamānam hi tad ādheyasya eva tau guṇa doṣau iti

original: tasmāt aprāptaviṣayagrahaṇānupapatteḥ golakacakṣuḥpakṣaḥ bhikṣūtprekṣitaḥ prekṣāvatāṃ hṛdayeṣu na viśrāmyatīti prāpyakāri teja eva cakṣur iti sthitam //
analyzed: tasmāt aprāpta viṣaya grahaṇa anupapatteḥ golaka cakṣuḥ pakṣaḥ bhikṣu utprekṣitaḥ prekṣāvatām hṛdayeṣu na viśrāmyati iti prāpya kāri tejaḥ eva cakṣuḥ iti sthitam

original: itthaṃ bhautikendriyavāde 'pi prāpyakāritvasiddheḥ na kāpilakathitamāhaṅkārikatvam indriyāṇām upapadyate //
analyzed: ittham bhautika indriya vāde pi prāpyakāri tva siddheḥ na kāpila kathitam āhaṅkārika tvam indriyāṇām upapadyate

original: nanu pakṣadvaye 'pi prāpyakāritvopapatteḥ ko 'yaṃ bhotikatvaṃ pratyabhiniveśātiśayo bhavatām itiucyateekaprakṛtikatve hīndriyāṇāṃ ekam eva sarvaviṣayaprakāśanakuśalam indriyaṃ bhavet sarvāṇi vā sarvaviṣayagrāhīṇi bhaveyuḥ kāraṇasyāviśeṣāt /
analyzed: nanu pakṣa dvaye pi prāpya kāri tva upapatteḥ kaḥ yam bhotika tvam pratyabhiniveśa atiśayaḥ bhavatām iti ucyate eka prakṛtika tve hi indriyāṇām ekam eva sarva viṣaya prakāśana kuśalam indriyam bhavet sarvāṇi vā sarva viṣaya grāhīṇi bhaveyuḥ kāraṇasya aviśeṣāt

original: kāraṇaniyamādhīno hi kāryaniyamaḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇa niyama adhīnaḥ hi kārya niyamaḥ

original: ahaṅkārākhyaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ sakalaviṣayaprakāśanaśaktiyuktam /
analyzed: ahaṅkāra ākhyam ca kāraṇam sakala viṣaya prakāśana śakti yuktam

original: indriyāṇy api tathā bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: indriyāṇi api tathā bhaveyuḥ

original: ekaviṣayaprakāśanaśaktiyukte tasmin katham indriyāntarāṇi viṣayāntaragarāhīṇi bhaveyuḥbhotikatve tu bhūtānāṃ bhedāt niyataguṇotkarṣayogitvāt niyataviṣayagrāhīndriyaprakṛtitvam //
analyzed: eka viṣaya prakāśana śakti yukte tasmin katham indriya antarāṇi viṣaya antara garāhīṇi bhaveyuḥ bhotika tve tu bhūtānām bhedāt niyata guṇa utkarṣa yogi tvāt niyata viṣaya grāhi indriya prakṛti tvam

original: tathā ca pradīpāditeja rūparasādyanekaviṣayasannidhāne 'pi rūpasyaiva prakāśakam upalabdham /
analyzed: tathā ca pradīpa ādi teja rūpa rasa ādi aneka viṣaya sannidhāne rūpasya eva prakāśakam upalabdham

original: atas tejaḥprakṛti cakṣurindriyam api rūpasyaiva prakāśakaṃ bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: atas tejaḥ prakṛti cakṣuḥ indriyam api rūpasya eva prakāśakam bhavitum arhati

original: evam indriyāntareṣv api vaktavyam /
analyzed: evam indriya antareṣu api vaktavyam

original: tad eṣa viṣayaniyamaḥ prakṛtiniyamakārita indriyāṇām iti bhautikānīndriyāṇi //
analyzed: tat eṣa viṣaya niyamaḥ prakṛti niyama kāritaḥ indriyāṇām iti bhautikāni indriyāṇi

original: yady evaṃ taijasena cakṣuṣā kathaṃ pārthivasya rūpasya grahaṇampṛthivyā eva vāpyena ca rasanena pārthivasya rasasyavāyavīyena sparśanendriyeṇa ca pṛthivyādisparśasyatad idaṃ prakṛtiniyame 'pi kathaṃ viṣayasāṃkaryam iti  naiṣadoṣaḥrūpādiviṣayaviṣayo 'pi hy eṣāṃ niyamaḥ na tadāśrayaviṣayaḥ /
analyzed: yadi evam taijasena cakṣuṣā katham pārthivasya rūpasya grahaṇam pṛthivyāḥ eva vāpyena ca rasanena pārthivasya rasasya vāyavīyena sparśana indriyeṇa ca pṛthivī ādi sparśasya tat idam prakṛti niyame pi katham viṣaya sāṃkaryam iti na eṣa doṣaḥ rūpa ādi viṣaya viṣayaḥ api hi eṣām niyamaḥ na tad āśraya viṣayaḥ

original: taijasaṃ hi pradīpādi dravyaṃ rūpam eva prakāśayaddṛśyate na tejovṛtty eva rūpam /
analyzed: taijasam hi pradīpa ādi dravyam rūpam eva prakāśayat dṛśyate na tejaḥ vṛtti eva rūpam

original: āpyam api dravyaṃ rasam eva vyanakti na tu salilastham eveti /
analyzed: āpyam api dravyam rasam eva vyanakti na tu salila stham eva iti

original: ghrāṇe tu na kaścid doṣaḥ tadgrāhyasya gandhasya pṛthivyekavṛttitvād iti //
analyzed: ghrāṇe tu na kaścid doṣaḥ tad grāhyasya gandhasya pṛthivī eka vṛtti tvāt iti

original: dravyasyāpi darśanasparśanagrāhyatvam aviruddham itthaṃ bhautikatve 'pīti //
analyzed: dravyasya api darśana sparśana grāhya tvam aviruddham ittham bhautika tve pi iti

original: yat tūktaṃ mahadaṇugrahaṇān na bhautikānīndriyāṇītiparihṛtaṃ tatā golakādyadhiṣṭhānātiriktasyendriyasya darśitatvāt /
analyzed: yat tu uktam mahat aṇu grahaṇāt na bhautikāni indriyāṇi iti parihṛtam golaka ādi adhiṣṭhāna atiriktasya indriyasya darśita tvāt

original: tac ca vitatatvadvitatagrāhi bhavaty eva /
analyzed: tat ca vitata tvat vitata grāhi bhavati eva

original: vitatenāpi ca tejasā 'ṇudravyaṃ prakāśyamānaṃ dṛśyate dīpādinā taṇḍulādīti /
analyzed: vitatena api ca tejasā ṇu dravyam prakāśyamānam dṛśyate dīpa ādinā taṇḍula ādi iti

original: ato 'pi nāhaṅkāraikatvam //
analyzed: atas pi na ahaṅkāra eka tvam

original: yat punar abhyadhāyibhautikatve paraguṇavat svaguṇasyāpi prakāśakam indriyaṃ syād ititad ayuktamsaguṇasyendriyasyendriyabhāvāt /
analyzed: yat punar abhyadhāyi bhautika tve para guṇa vat sva guṇasya api prakāśakam indriyam syāt iti tat ayuktam sa guṇasya indriyasya indriya bhāvāt

original: indriyeṇa hi satā tena viṣayaḥ paricchidyate /
analyzed: indriyeṇa hi satā tena viṣayaḥ paricchidyate

original: saguṇasya cāsyendriyatvaṃ svaguṇarahitaṃ tat indriyam eva na syāt /
analyzed: sa guṇasya ca asya indriya tvam sva guṇa rahitam tat indriyam eva na syāt

original: aninriyaṃ ca kathaṃ grāhakamataḥ indriyaguṇānāṃ pramāṇakoṭyantaḥpātitvāt na tatprametatvam /
analyzed: aninriyam ca katham grāhakam atas indriya guṇānām pramāṇa koṭi antaḥpāti tvāt na tat prameta tvam

original: tasmād bhautikānīndriyāṇi svaṃ svaṃ viṣayam upalabhanta iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt bhautikāni indriyāṇi svam svam viṣayam upalabhante iti siddham

original: prayogas tupārthivaṃ ghrāṇaṃ dravyatve sati rūpādimadhye gandhasyaiva vyaṃcakatvāt gandhayuktidravyavat /
analyzed: prayogaḥ tu pārthivam ghrāṇam dravya tve sati rūpa ādi madhye gandhasya eva vyaṃcaka tvāt gandha yukti dravya vat

original: tatra vyaṃjakatvamātram anaikāntikam iti gandhasyaiva viśeṣyate /
analyzed: tatra vyaṃjaka tva mātram anaikāntikam iti gandhasya eva viśeṣyate

original: so 'yam asiddho hetur bhavet gandhatvasyāpi ghrāṇavyaṅgyatvād iti rūpādimadhya ity uktam /
analyzed: saḥ yam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ bhavet gandha tvasya api ghrāṇa vyaṅgya tvāt iti rūpa ādi madhye iti uktam

original: tathāpi sannikarśeṇa vyabhicāra iti tadvyudāsāya dṛśyatve satīti viśeṣaṇam //
analyzed: tathā api sannikarśeṇa vyabhicāraḥ iti tad vyudāsāya dṛśya tve sati iti viśeṣaṇam

original: evaṃ rasanādiṣv api prayogā racanīyāḥ /
analyzed: evam rasanā ādiṣu api prayogāḥ racanīyāḥ

original: śrotraṃ tv ākāśaikadeśa iti śabdādhikaraṇe nirṇītam /
analyzed: śrotram tu ākāśa eka deśaḥ iti śabda adhikaraṇe nirṇītam

original: gandhādiviśayopalabdhinibandhanasukhaduḥkhopabhogahetubhūtadharmādharmopanibaddhānāṃ cendriyāṇam indriyatvam iti tadvaśāt yathā yathā niyataviṣayagrahaṇakaraṇatā ghaṭate tathā tathā kalpyata iti sarvam anavadyam //
analyzed: gandha ādi viśaya upalabdhi nibandhana sukha duḥkha upabhoga hetu bhūta dharma adharma upanibaddhānām ca indriyāṇam indriya tvam iti tad vaśāt yathā yathā niyata viṣaya grahaṇa karaṇa tā ghaṭate tathā tathā kalpyate iti sarvam anavadyam

original: āhabhavantu bhautikānīndriyāṇipaṃceti tu na yuktam uktam /
analyzed: āha bhavantu bhautikāni indriyāṇi paṃca iti tu na yuktam uktam

original: tvag eva hy ekam indriyaṃ bhavitum arhati sarvatrānapātāt //
analyzed: tvac eva hi ekam indriyam bhavitum arhati sarvatra anapātāt

original: karatalakapolakaṇṭhādivartinā 'pi tvagindriyeṇa rūpopalambhaprasaṅga iti cet na avayavaviśeṣe śaktiviśeṣaniyamāt /
analyzed: kara tala kapola kaṇṭha ādi vartinā tvac indriyeṇa rūpa upalambha prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na avayava viśeṣe śakti viśeṣa niyamāt

original: na hi prāṇinā pādena vā upasthakāryaṃ kartuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: na hi prāṇinā pādena vā upastha kāryam kartum śakyate

original: asti ca avayavaviśeṣe svabhāvaviśeṣavaicitryam //
analyzed: asti ca avayava viśeṣe svabhāva viśeṣa vaicitryam

original: tuṣārakarpūrāpūrṇavāriṇy uttaramānase /
analyzed: tuṣāra karpūra āpūrṇa vāriṇi uttaramānase

original: yathā ca vṛṣaṇau snātuḥ sphuṭato na tathā sphicau //
analyzed: yathā ca vṛṣaṇau snātuḥ sphuṭataḥ na tathā sphicau

original: klinnārdratṛṇakāṣṭhādibhūmena kaṭunā yathā /
analyzed: klinna ārdra tṛṇa kāṣṭha ādi bhūmena kaṭunā yathā

original: mūrdhākṣivedanodeti na tathā 'vayavāntare //
analyzed: mūrdha akṣi vedanā udeti na tathā vayava antare

original: tasmāt avayavaviśeṣavyavasthitanānāśaktikhacitaṃ tvag evaikamindriyam iti //
analyzed: tasmāt avayava viśeṣa vyavasthita nānā śakti khacitam tvac eva ekam indriyam iti

original: ucyatekuto 'yam apūrva eṣa mahāprājño vādī saralamatīnasmāna vaṃcayitum āgataḥ yo 'vayavaviśeṣe śaktiviśeṣam āśrayann api ekam indriya manyate /
analyzed: ucyate kutas yam apūrvaḥ eṣa mahā prājñaḥ vādī vaṃcayitum āgataḥ yaḥ vayava viśeṣe śakti viśeṣam āśrayan api ekam manyate

original: śaktibhedādāśrayabhedāc ca nānātvasevaitadindriyāṇāṃ yuktam ity alamahātmabhis saha kalahena //
analyzed: śakti bhedāt āśraya bhedāt ca nānā tva sevā etat indriyāṇām yuktam iti alam ahātmabhiḥ saha kalahena

original: manuṣyais saha saṃvādo mākṛśānāṃ hi śobhate /
analyzed: manuṣyaiḥ saha saṃvādaḥ mā akṛśānām hi śobhate

original: devās tu nararūpeṇa ta ime bhānti vādinaḥ //
analyzed: devāḥ tu nara rūpeṇa te ime bhānti vādinaḥ

original: nanu nānātvapakṣe 'pi paṃcatvaniyamaḥ katham /
analyzed: nanu nānātva pakṣe pi paṃcatva niyamaḥ katham

original: dve śrotre cakṣūṣī dve ca kathaṃ te ekam indriyam //
analyzed: dve śrotre cakṣūṣī dve ca katham te ekam indriyam

original: āha casavyaṣṭasyetareṇa pratyabhijñānāt iti /
analyzed: āha iti

original: cakṣuṣṭvajāter ekatvād iti cettarhīndriyatvajāter ekatvāt ekam evendriyaṃ syātucyatecakṣus tāvat teja iti nirṇītam /
analyzed: cakṣuṣṭva jāteḥ eka tvāt iti ced tarhi indriya tva jāteḥ eka tvāt ekam eva indriyam syāt ucyate cakṣuḥ tāvat tejaḥ iti nirṇītam

original: tac caikam eva tadadhiṣthānam apy ekam eva ghoṇāvaṃśavyavahitam anekam ivopalabhyate //
analyzed: tat ca ekam eva tad adhiṣthānam api ekam eva ghoṇā vaṃśa vyavahitam anekam iva upalabhyate

original: bhinnnaṃ vā tadbhavatu /
analyzed: bhinnam vā tat bhavatu

original: tejas tatkakāryaikyāt āśrayabhede 'py ekam eva śrotram api karṇacchidradvayānusyūtam ekam eva nabhodeśaprāyaṃ veditavyam kāryaikyasya tatrāpi bhāvāt //
analyzed: tejaḥ tad ka kārya aikyāt āśraya bhede pi ekam eva śrotram api karṇa chidra dvaya anusyūtam ekam eva nabhaḥ deśa prāyam veditavyam kārya aikyasya tatra api bhāvāt

original: tenādhiṣṭhānabhede 'pi kāryaikatvasya darśanāt /
analyzed: tena adhiṣṭhāna bhede pi kārya eka tvasya darśanāt

original: tatsāmānyasya caikatvāt ekatvaṃ śrotracakṣuṣoḥ //
analyzed: tad sāmānyasya ca eka tvāt eka tvam śrotra cakṣuṣoḥ

original: na cendriyajāter aikyāt ekam indriyamkāryasyopalabdhilakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya gandhādeḥ adhiṣṭhānasya tripuṭikādeḥ gateś ca bahiḥprasaraṇātmikāyāḥ ākṛteś ca parimāṇasvabhāvāyā jāteś ca ghrāṇatvādeḥ jātiśabdavācyasya yoner vā pṛthivyādeḥ paṃcavidhatvāt paṃcaivendriyāṇi kalpyante /
analyzed: na ca indriya jāteḥ aikyāt ekam indriyam kāryasya upalabdhi lakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya gandha ādeḥ adhiṣṭhānasya tripuṭikā ādeḥ gateḥ ca bahis prasaraṇa ātmikāyāḥ ākṛteḥ ca parimāṇa svabhāvāyāḥ jāteḥ ca ghrāṇa tva ādeḥ jāti śabda vācyasya yoneḥ vā pṛthivī ādeḥ paṃcavidha tvāt paṃca eva indriyāṇi kalpyante

original: yathā paramāṇutvasāmānyāviśeṣo 'pi pṛthivyādicaturvidhakāryadarśanāt caturvidhāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kalpyanta iti //
analyzed: yathā pṛthivī ādi caturvidha kārya darśanāt caturvidhāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kalpyante iti

original: nanu tathāpi na paṃcendriyāṇi /
analyzed: nanu tathā api na paṃca indriyāṇi

original: kathambuddhīndriyavat karmendriyāṇām api paṃcānām upasaṃkhyeyatvāt /
analyzed: katham buddhīndriya vat karmendriyāṇām api paṃcānām upasaṃkhyeya tvāt

original: tad uktam [vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthāḥ karmendriyāṇy āhuḥ] //
analyzed: tat uktam vāc pāṇi pāda pāyu upasthāḥ karmendriyāṇi āhuḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandātmakapaṃcavidhakāryasādhanādindriyatvaṃ tatkāryasyānitaretarasādhyatvād iti //
analyzed: teṣām ca vacana ādāna viharaṇa utsarga ānanda ātmaka paṃcavidha kārya sādhanāt indriya tvam tad kāryasya anitara itara sādhya tvāt iti

original: atrāha atyalpam idam ucyatepaṃca karmendriyāṇīti /
analyzed: atra āha ati alpam idam ucyate paṃca karmendriyāṇi iti

original: anyāny api khalu na santi karmendriyāṇitathā hikaṇṭho 'nnanigaraṇena stanakalaśāliṅganādinā vakṣaḥ bhāravahanena cāṃsadvayaṃ indriyam ucyate na katham tatkāryasya śarīrāvayavāntare 'pi darśanād iti cetkin nu bhavānannapānaṃ pāṇipādena nigiratipāyunā vādānam api kim āsyādinā vā na kurvate tiryaṃcaḥ manuṣyā api hi kvacit /
analyzed: anyāni api khalu na santi karmendriyāṇi tathā hi kaṇṭhaḥ nna nigaraṇena stana kalaśa āliṅgana ādinā vakṣaḥ bhāra vahanena ca aṃsa dvayam indriyam ucyate na katham tad kāryasya śarīra avayava antare darśanāt iti ced kim nu bhavān anna pānam pāṇi pādena nigirati pāyunā vā ādānam api kim āsya ādinā vā na kurvate tiryaṃcaḥ manuṣyāḥ api hi kvacid anna pānam pāṇi pādena nigirati pāyunā vā ādānam api kim āsya ādinā vā na kurvate tiryaṃcaḥ ma

original: asatsv api ca bhavatkalpiteṣukarmendriyeṣu tatkāryaṃ yāvat tāvad anyathāpi dṛśyate /
analyzed: asatsu api ca bhavat kalpita iṣu karma indriyeṣu tat kāryam yāvat tāvat anyathā api dṛśyate

original: na tv evaṃ buddhīni yeṣu //
analyzed: na tu evam buddhīni yeṣu

original: bhavaty utpāṭikṣasya na manāgapi rūpadhīḥ /
analyzed: bhavati utpāṭikṣasya na manāk api rūpa dhīḥ

original: īṣadvihārādānādi dṛṣṭaṃ lūnāṅghripāṇiṣu //
analyzed: īṣat vihāra ādāna ādi dṛṣṭam lūna aṅghri pāṇiṣu

original: api ca viharaṇam api na kevalaṃ caraṇayugalakāryam api tu jānūrujaṅghādisahitapādasampādyamānam api /
analyzed: api ca viharaṇam api na kevalam caraṇa yugala kāryam api tu jānu ūru jaṅghā ādi sahita pāda sampādyamānam api

original: ādānam api bāhusahitābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām abhinirvartyate na kevalābhyām //
analyzed: ādānam api bāhu sahitābhyām pāṇibhyām abhinirvartyate na kevalābhyām

original: vāgindriyaṃ tu nābherūdhvaṃ sarvam eva syāt /
analyzed: vāc indriyam tu nābheḥ ūdhvam sarvam eva syāt

original: evaṃ hy āhuḥ[vāyur nābher utthitaḥ urasi vistīrṇaḥ kaṇṭhe vivartitaḥ mūrdhānam abhihatya parāvṛttaḥ vaktre caran vividhān śabdānabhivyanakti iti /
analyzed: evam hi āhuḥ vāyuḥ nābheḥ utthitaḥ urasi vistīrṇaḥ kaṇṭhe vivartitaḥ mūrdhānam abhihatya parāvṛttaḥ vaktre caran vividhān śabdān abhivyanakti iti

original: asti cedṛṅ anubhavaḥ jalpatāṃ viśeṣatas tv akhaṇḍageyaṃ gāyatām iti /
analyzed: asti ca īdṛś anubhavaḥ jalpatām viśeṣataḥ tu akhaṇḍa geyam gāyatām iti

original: evaṃ ca karmendriyamayam eva viśvam iti na śarīram indriyavyatiriktaṃ kiṃced bhavet /
analyzed: evam ca karmendriya mayam eva viśvam iti na śarīram indriya vyatiriktam kiṃced bhavet

original: atha śarīrāvayaveṣv eva bhinnakāryakāriṣu karmendriyavahāraḥ tarhi kaṇṭhādibhir atiprasaṅga ity uktam //
analyzed: atha śarīra avayaveṣu eva bhinna kārya kāriṣu karmendriya vahāraḥ tarhi kaṇṭha ādibhiḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ iti uktam

original: upasthendriyaṃ ca katham ekaṃ gaṇyate tenānandavat mūtrotsargasyāpi sādhanāt //
analyzed: upastha indriyam ca katham ekam gaṇyate tena ānanda vat mūtra utsargasya api sādhanāt

original: vāg indriyaṃ tu sutarāmahṛdayaṅgamam /
analyzed: vāc indriyam tu sutarām ahṛdayaṅgamam

original: saṃyogavibhāganirvartyo bāhyaḥ śabda upalabhyate /
analyzed: saṃyoga vibhāga nirvartyaḥ bāhyaḥ śabdaḥ upalabhyate

original: tadbhedāc ca bhidyate /
analyzed: tad bhedāt ca bhidyate

original: yādṛśo hi bherīdaṇḍasaṃyogajaḥ śabdaḥ na tādṛśaḥ kūrmīkoṇasaṃyogajaḥ /
analyzed: yādṛśaḥ hi bherī daṇḍa saṃyoga jaḥ śabdaḥ na tādṛśaḥ kūrmī koṇa saṃyoga jaḥ

original: evaṃ vicitrasthānakaraṇasaṃyogāt vicitro varṇātmakaḥ śabda udetīti na vāgindriyaṃ nāma kiñcit //
analyzed: evam vicitra sthāna karaṇa saṃyogāt vicitraḥ varṇa ātmakaḥ śabdaḥ udeti iti na vāc indriyam nāma kiñcid

original: lokaś ca vākcchabdena varṇātmakam eva śabdaṃ vyapadiśati /
analyzed: lokaḥ ca vāc śabdena varṇa ātmakam eva śabdam vyapadiśati

original: śabdaś cendriyaviṣayaḥ nendriyam /
analyzed: śabdaḥ ca indriya viṣayaḥ na indriyam

original: tasmād ekavidhaduḥkhopabhogakṣepakṣamakarmapariṇāmanirmatametaccharīraṃ tais tair avayavaiḥ taṃ taṃ karbhaphalopabhogamātmanaḥ saṃpadayatīty alaṃ evaṃvidhendriyakalpanārjavena //
analyzed: tasmāt ekavidha duḥkha upabhoga kṣepa kṣama karma pariṇāma nirmatam etat śarīram taiḥ taiḥ avayavaiḥ tam tam karbha phala upabhogam ātmanaḥ saṃpadayati iti alam evaṃvidha indriya kalpanā ārjavena

original: antaḥkaraṇamyāpi traividhyam anupapannam ekena manasaiva paryāpteḥ/
analyzed: traividhyam anupapannam ekena manasā eva paryāpteḥ

original: buddhis tu upalabdhisvabhāvatvāt karaṇakāryaṃ na tu karaṇam /
analyzed: buddhiḥ tu upalabdhi svabhāva tvāt karaṇa kāryam na tu karaṇam

original: ahaṅkāro 'pi jñānaviṣaya eva na karaṇam /
analyzed: ahaṅkāraḥ pi jñāna viṣayaḥ eva na karaṇam

original: etac ca savistaraṃ buddhilakṣaṇe vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: etat ca sa vistaram buddhi lakṣaṇe vakṣyāmaḥ

original: tasmāt na trayodaśavidhaṃ karaṇam iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt na trayodaśavidham karaṇam iti siddham

original: nyūnādhikatvaśamanādata indriyāṇi paṃcaiva bāhyaviṣayādhigamakṣamāṇi /
analyzed: nyūna adhika tva śamanāt atas indriyāṇi paṃca eva bāhya viṣaya adhigama kṣamāṇi

original: antaśukhādiviṣayagrahaṇopayogi ṣaṣṭhaṃ manas tu kathayiṣyati sūtrakāraḥ //
analyzed: anta śukha ādi viṣaya grahaṇa upayogi ṣaṣṭham manaḥ tu kathayiṣyati sūtrakāraḥ

original: tasmād imāni viṣayaprasabhopabhogalubdhāni coracaṭulāni yathendriyāṇi /
analyzed: tasmāt imāni viṣaya prasabha upabhoga lubdhāni cora caṭulāni yathā indriyāṇi

original: puṃso bhavābdhipatitasya vivekaratnaṃ ānandadāyi na haranti tathā vidheyam //
analyzed: puṃsaḥ bhava abdhi patitasya viveka ratnam ānanda dāyi na haranti tathā vidheyam

original: gandharasarūpasparśaśabdāḥ pṛthivyādiguṇās tadarthāḥ //
analyzed: gandha rasa rūpa sparśa śabdāḥ pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ tad arthāḥ

original: [tadarthāḥ] ity ata evāpakṛṣya vā prakramād vā [arthāḥ]iti lakṣyapadaṃ darśayitavyam /
analyzed: tad arthāḥ iti atas eva apakṛṣya vā prakramāt vā arthāḥ iti lakṣya padam darśayitavyam

original: [tadarthāḥ] iti lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: tad arthāḥ iti lakṣaṇam

original: tad iti prakrāntendriyaparāmarśaḥ /
analyzed: tat iti prakrānta indriya parāmarśaḥ

original: teṣāṃ arthāḥ viṣayāḥ indriyaviṣayā arthā ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām arthāḥ viṣayāḥ indriya viṣayāḥ arthāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: etac ca teṣāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: etat ca teṣām sāmānya lakṣaṇam

original: gandharasarūpasparśaśabdā iti vibhāgaḥ //
analyzed: gandha rasa rūpa sparśa śabdāḥ iti vibhāgaḥ

original: viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ tu punaḥ [tadarthāḥ] ity evaṃ yojanīyam /
analyzed: viśeṣa lakṣaṇam tu punar tad arthāḥ iti evam yojanīyam

original: tad iti ghrāṇādīnāṃ viśeṣasaṃjñānirdiṣṭānām avamarśaḥ /
analyzed: tat iti ghrāṇa ādīnām viśeṣa saṃjñā nirdiṣṭānām avamarśaḥ

original: evaṃ ca ghrāṇasya viṣayo gandhaḥ rasanasya viṣayo rasaḥityādiviśeṣalakṣaṇam uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: evam ca ghrāṇasya viṣayaḥ gandhaḥ rasanasya viṣayaḥ rasaḥ ityādi viśeṣa lakṣaṇam uktam bhavati

original: gandhatvādīnāṃ tu ghrāṇādigrāhyatvād ativyāptir iti pṛthivyādiguṇā iti viśeṣaṇopādānam /
analyzed: gandha tva ādīnām tu ghrāṇa ādi grāhya tvāt ativyāptiḥ iti pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ iti viśeṣaṇa upādānam

original: te cāmī gandhādayaḥ indriyārthā bhogyās santaḥ saktihetavaḥ saṃsāra māṇamāvahantīti heyatayā bhāvayitavyāḥ //
analyzed: te ca amī gandha ādayaḥ indriyārthāḥ bhogyāḥ santaḥ sakti hetavaḥ saṃsāra māṇam āvahanti iti heya tayā bhāvayitavyāḥ

original: nanu evaṃ gandhādiguṇādhikaraṇasyāvayavinaḥ prathamasya rāgahetor asaṃgrahaḥ syāt /
analyzed: nanu evam gandha ādi guṇa adhikaraṇasya avayavinaḥ prathamasya rāga hetoḥ asaṃgrahaḥ syāt

original: vakṣyati ca [tannimitaṃ tv avayavyabhimānaḥ] iti /
analyzed: vakṣyati ca tad nimitam tu avayavi abhimānaḥ iti

original: saṃkhyā parimāṇādiguṇāntarāṇām api rāgahetutvam asty eva /
analyzed: saṃkhyā parimāṇa ādi guṇa antarāṇām api rāga hetu tvam asti eva

original: yathā hi barhikalāpānukārikarimṛditakusumadalapaṭalaśabalavilāsinīkeśapāśavṛtti rūpaṃ harati hṛdayaṃ yūnāṃ tathā tadagatā bahutvasaṃkhyā 'pi /
analyzed: yathā hi barhi kalāpa anukāri kari mṛdita kusuma dala paṭala śabala vilāsinī keśapāśa vṛtti rūpam harati hṛdayam yūnām tathā tad agatā bahutva saṃkhyā

original: uttaptakanakaśilānibhanitambabimbarūpavat tatparimāṇam api /
analyzed: uttapta kanaka śilā nibha nitamba bimba rūpa vat tad parimāṇam api

original: harati ca sarabhasamavayavasaṃyogavibhāgādy api//
analyzed: harati ca sarabhasam avayava saṃyoga vibhāga ādi api

original: tathā kandukādikrīḍāsu kisalayitavilāsarasamadhuraparibhramaṇādi karmajātam //
analyzed: tathā kanduka ādi krīḍāsu kisalayita vilāsa rasa madhura paribhramaṇa ādi karma jātam

original: tathā antyajātyādiparihāreṇa svānurūpajātiyogitvam apītyādi sarva dravyaguṇakarmādi saktikāraṇam anuktaṃ syāt //
analyzed: tathā antya jāti ādi parihāreṇa sva anurūpa jāti yogitvam api ityādi sarva dravya guṇa karma ādi sakti kāraṇam anuktam syāt

original: tatra kecitpṛthivyādiguṇā iti dvandvasamāsaṃ vyācakṣatepṛthivyādīni ca guṇāśceti /
analyzed: tatra kecid pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ iti dvandva samāsam vyācakṣate pṛthivī ādīni ca guṇāḥ ca iti

original: pṛthivyādipadena guṇādhikaraṇam avayavi dvavyam uktam /
analyzed: pṛthivī ādi padena guṇa adhikaraṇam avayavi dvavyam uktam

original: āśritatvaviśeṣaṇābhyāṃ sarve guṇā iti /
analyzed: āśrita tva viśeṣaṇābhyām sarve guṇāḥ iti

original: guṇagrahaṇena saṃkhyāparimāṇādivat karmasāmānyādy api sarvam uktam /
analyzed: guṇa grahaṇena saṃkhyā parimāṇa ādi vat karma sāmānya ādi api sarvam uktam

original: ato nāsaṃgraha iti //
analyzed: atas na asaṃgrahe iti

original: tad idam anupapannamgandhādigrahaṇasya hi tadānīm ānarthakyam [guṇāś ca] ity anenaiva gatārthatvāt /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam gandha ādi grahaṇasya hi tadānīm ānarthakyam guṇāḥ ca iti anena eva gatārtha tvāt

original: viśeṣakhyāpanārthaṃ tadupādānam iti cettarhi kiṃ dvandvasamāsavarṇanena ayam evāstu samādhiḥ //
analyzed: viśeṣa khyāpana artham tat upādānam iti ced tarhi kim dvandva samāsa varṇanena ayam eva astu samādhiḥ

original: yady api dravyakarmasāmānyānāṃ anyeṣāṃ ca saṃkhyāparimāṇādiguṇānāṃ asty eva saktihetutātathāpi prādhānyena gandhādīnām eva sā dṛśyate /
analyzed: yadi api dravya karma sāmānyānām anyeṣām ca saṃkhyā parimāṇa ādi guṇānām asti eva sakti hetu tā tathā api prādhānyena gandha ādīnām eva sā dṛśyate

original: na hi rūpādinirapekṣasya dravyasya saṃkhyādeḥ sāmānyasya vā saktihetutvaṃ samastīti rūpādaya eva mukhyaṃ rāgakāraṇam /
analyzed: na hi rūpa ādi nirapekṣasya dravyasya saṃkhyā ādeḥ sāmānyasya vā sakti hetu tvam samasti iti rūpa ādayaḥ eva mukhyam rāga kāraṇam

original: tatra jhaṭiti buddheḥ prasaraṇāt /
analyzed: tatra jhaṭiti buddheḥ prasaraṇāt

original: uktaṃ ca tathāpi nitarāṃ rāgavṛddhyai rūpādayo nṛṇām /
analyzed: uktam ca tathā api nitarām rāga vṛddhyai rūpa ādayaḥ nṛṇām

original: ta eva kavibhir gītāḥ paṃceṣoḥ paṃca sāyakāḥ //
analyzed: te eva kavibhiḥ gītāḥ paṃca iṣoḥ paṃca sāyakāḥ

original: tasmāt pṛthivyādīnāṃ guṇā iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsa eva śreyān /
analyzed: tasmāt pṛthivī ādīnām guṇāḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ eva śreyān

original: guṇavyatiriktaś ca guṇī pūrvam eva sādhitaḥ [yam aha adrākṣaṃ taṃ spṛśāmi] iti prayayaprāmāṇyāt //
analyzed: guṇa vyatiriktaḥ ca guṇī pūrvam eva sādhitaḥ yam aha adrākṣam tam spṛśāmi iti prayaya prāmāṇyāt

original: pṛthivyādīnāṃ guṇā iti yad uktaṃ didānīṃ vibhajya varṇyate kasya kati guṇā iti /
analyzed: pṛthivī ādīnām guṇāḥ iti yat uktam vibhajya varṇyate kasya kati guṇāḥ iti

original: tatra gandhādayo niyoktavyāḥ catvāraḥ pṛthivyīguṇāḥ /
analyzed: tatra gandha ādayaḥ niyoktavyāḥ catvāraḥ pṛthivyī guṇāḥ

original: aptejomarutām ekaṃ pūrvapūrvam apohya tu //
analyzed: ap tejaḥ marutām ekam pūrva pūrvam apohya tu

original: gandhavarjaṃ rasarūpasparśāḥ apām rasavarjaṃ rūpasparśau tejasaḥ rūpavarja sparśa eva vāyoḥ iti /
analyzed: gandha varjam rasa rūpa sparśāḥ apām rasa varjam rūpa sparśau tejasaḥ rūpa varja sparśaḥ eva vāyoḥ iti

original: ākāśasya tu guṇaḥ śabdaḥ //
analyzed: ākāśasya tu guṇaḥ śabdaḥ

original: nanu nāyaṃ guṇaviniyogaḥ sādhīyān /
analyzed: nanu na ayam guṇa viniyogaḥ sādhīyān

original: pṛthivyāścaturguṇatve pārthive /
analyzed: pṛthivyāḥ caturguṇa tve pārthive

original: ghrāṇendriyeṇa caturṇām api tadguṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ syāt /
analyzed: ghrāṇa indriyeṇa caturṇām api tad guṇānām grahaṇam syāt

original: evam uttareṣv api vaktavyam /
analyzed: evam uttareṣu api vaktavyam

original: tasmād ekaikaguṇatvam eva ghūtānām ucyatāmnaitad evamna hi guṇāḥ svecchayā labhyante /
analyzed: tasmāt ekaika guṇa tvam eva ghūtānām ucyatām na etat evam na hi guṇāḥ sva icchayā labhyante

original: kin tu yathopalabhyante tathā vyavaśāpyante /
analyzed: kin tu yathā upalabhyante tathā vyavaśāpyante

original: pratītipramāṇakā hi vayam /
analyzed: pratīti pramāṇakāḥ hi vayam

original: tatrapārthive dravye caturṇām api guṇānāṃ upalaṃbhāt katham ekaguṇāṃ pṛthivīṃ brūmaḥ /
analyzed: tatra pārthive dravye caturṇām api guṇānām upalaṃbhāt katham ekaguṇām pṛthivīm brūmaḥ

original: rūpaikafuṇe ca tejasi pṛthivyudakayoḥ vāyuvadarūpatvādapratyakṣatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: rūpa eka fuṇe ca tejasi pṛthivī udakayoḥ vāyu vat arūpa tvāt apratyakṣa tvam syāt

original: tasmāt trīṇi rūpavanti vyāṇi //
analyzed: tasmāt trīṇi rūpavanti vyāṇi

original: yady evaṃ sarmeṣāṃ sarvatropalaṃbhāt sarvāṇi sarvaguṇāni bhavantu bhūtāni /
analyzed: yadi evam sarvatra upalaṃbhāt sarvāṇi sarva guṇāni bhavantu bhūtāni

original: paṭapaṭāyate pṛthivī calacalāyante āpaḥ dhagadhagāyate tejaḥ /
analyzed: paṭapaṭāyate pṛthivī calacalāyante āpaḥ dhagadhagāyate tejaḥ

original: kathakahtāyate vāyuḥ iti sarveṣāṃ guṇaḥ śabdaḥ syāt /
analyzed: kathakahtāyate vāyuḥ iti sarveṣām guṇaḥ śabdaḥ syāt

original: ucyatena sarve guṇāḥ sarvatropalabhyante /
analyzed: ucyate na sarve guṇāḥ sarvatra upalabhyante

original: nirgandhānām apāṃ sarvatra darśanāt /
analyzed: nirgandhānām apām sarvatra darśanāt

original: klinnarūpādau tu pārithivāvayavasaṃkrāntyā gandhaḥ payasy upalabhyate //
analyzed: klinna rūpa ādau tu pārithiva avayava saṃkrāntyā gandhaḥ payasi upalabhyate

original: evaṃ suvarṇe taijase dravye saṃyuktasamavāyāt rasādyupalabhiḥ /
analyzed: evam suvarṇe taijase dravye saṃyukta samavāyāt rasa ādi upalabhiḥ

original: śabdas tu sarvakālam ākāśavṛttir eva pratīyate /
analyzed: śabdaḥ tu sarvakālam ākāśa vṛttiḥ eva pratīyate

original: pṛthivyādyavayavasaṃyogavibhāgaprabhavas tv asav iti tadāśritatvabhramamāvahati na tvakāśād vinā tasya grahaṇam iti /
analyzed: pṛthivī ādi avayava saṃyoga vibhāga prabhavaḥ tu asau iti tad āśrita tva bhramam āvahati na tu ākāśāt vinā tasya grahaṇam iti

original: ākāśaguṇa eva śabda ity etac ca prāṅnirṇītam /
analyzed: ākāśa guṇaḥ eva śabdaḥ iti etat ca prāk nirṇītam

original: tasmāt na sarveṣāṃ sarvaguṇatvam //
analyzed: tasmāt na sarveṣām sarva guṇa tvam

original: yac ca pṛtivyāś caturguṇatve tadguṇānāṃ caturṇām api pārthivaghrāṇendriya grāhyatvaṃ syād ititan naguṇotkarṣasya niyāmakatvāt /
analyzed: yat ca pṛtivyāḥ caturguṇa tve tad guṇānām caturṇām api pārthiva ghrāṇa indriya grāhya tvam syāt iti tat na guṇa utkarṣasya niyāmaka tvāt

original: sātiśayagandha guṇādhikaraṇair vijātīyadravyāvayavasaṃsparśaleśarahitaiḥ kevalapṛthivyavayavair adṛṣṭa sahakāribhiḥ ghaṭitaṃ ghrāṇendriyam iti gandhasyaiva grāhakam //
analyzed: sa atiśaya gandha guṇa adhikaraṇaiḥ vijātīya dravya avayava saṃsparśa leśa rahitaiḥ kevala pṛthivī avayavaiḥ adṛṣṭa sahakāribhiḥ ghaṭitam ghrāṇa indriyam iti gandhasya eva grāhakam

original: etad eva ca ghūyas tvam ācakṣate /
analyzed: etat eva ca ghūyaḥ tvam ācakṣate

original: yathā ''ha kaṇavrataḥ[bhūyastvād gandhavattvāc ca pṛthivī gandhajñāne prakṛtiḥ] /
analyzed: yathā ha kaṇavrataḥ bhūyaḥ tvāt gandhavat tvāt ca pṛthivī gandha jñāne prakṛtiḥ

original: ihāpy uktaṃ[tadvyavaśtānaṃ tu bhūyastvāt] iti /
analyzed: iha api uktam tad vyavaśtānam tu bhūyaḥ tvāt iti

original: dṛśyante ca kevalapṛthivyavayavopādāneṣv api padārtheṣu vyavasthitakāryaniyamāḥ śaktayaḥ /
analyzed: dṛśyante ca kevala pṛthivī avayava upādāneṣu api padārtheṣu vyavasthita kārya niyamāḥ śaktayaḥ

original: yathā pārthivatvāviśeṣe 'pi viṣaṃ maraṇakāraṇam /
analyzed: yathā pārthiva tva aviśeṣe viṣam maraṇa kāraṇam

original: agaddravyamanyat tu jīvitāya prakalpate //
analyzed: agat dravyam anyat tu jīvitāya prakalpate

original: tasmād aparyanuyojyo 'yaṃ pārthivena ghrāṇena gandhavat tadrasādayo 'pi kathaṃ na gṛhyante iti //
analyzed: tasmāt a paryanuyojyaḥ yam pārthivena ghrāṇena gandha vat tad rasa ādayaḥ api katham na gṛhyante iti

original: sātiśayaprakṛtiguṇayoge 'pi na ca svaguṇagrahaṇanaipuṇyam indriyāṇām itīndriyacintāyāṃ nirṇītam /
analyzed: sa atiśaya prakṛti guṇa yoge na ca sva guṇa grahaṇa naipuṇyam indriyāṇām iti indriya cintāyām nirṇītam

original: śrotreṇa tu svaguṇasya śabdasya grahṇam iti pariśeṣānumānapramāṇako 'yam arthaḥ śabdaparīkṣāyām eva parīkṛita ity alam atiprasaṅgena //
analyzed: śrotreṇa tu sva guṇasya śabdasya grahṇam iti pariśeṣa anumāna pramāṇakaḥ yam arthaḥ śabda parīkṣāyām eva parīkṛitaḥ iti alam atiprasaṅgena

original: iti nipuṇadhiyāmasammataiṣā sakalaguṇaikaguṇatvakalpanā /
analyzed: iti nipuṇa dhiyām a sammatā eṣā sakala guṇa eka guṇa tva kalpanā

original: tad ayam akaluṣo 'bhupeyatāṃ guṇaviniyogavidhir yathoditaḥ //
analyzed: tat ayam akaluṣaḥ guṇa viniyoga vidhiḥ yathā uditaḥ

original: te 'mī jñeyāḥ kṛtakamadhuraṃ rūpamādarśayantaḥ tiktodgārāḥ pariṇativipatkāriṇo hīndriyārthāḥ /
analyzed: te jñeyāḥ kṛtaka madhuram rūpam ādarśayantaḥ tikta udgārāḥ pariṇati vipad kāriṇaḥ hi indriya arthāḥ

original: tyaktāś caite vyapagatamahāmohapaṅkena puṃsā tīrṇaścāyaṃ bhavajalanidhiḥ kleśakallolaraudraḥ //
analyzed: tyaktāḥ ca ete vyapagata mahā moha paṅkena puṃsā tīrṇaḥ ca ayam bhava jalanidhiḥ kleśa kallola raudraḥ

original: buddhir upalabdhir jñānam ity anarthāntaram //1.1.15//
analyzed: buddhiḥ upalabdhiḥ jñānam iti anartha antaram

original: nanu paryāyoccāraṇam etat na guddher lakṣaṇābhidhānamnaparyāyaprayogasyaiva lakṣaṇakṣamatvāt /
analyzed: nanu paryāya uccāraṇam etat na guddheḥ lakṣaṇa abhidhānam na paryāya prayogasya eva lakṣaṇa kṣama tvāt

original: lakṣaṇaṃ hi tad ucyateyena samānetarajātīyebhyaḥ lakṣyaṃ vyavacchidyate /
analyzed: lakṣaṇam hi tat ucyate yena samāna itara jātīyebhyaḥ lakṣyam vyavacchidyate

original: vyavacchidyate ca buddhiḥ buddhyādiparyāyavācyatayaiva tebhya iti nābhidhānamālāmātram idam //
analyzed: vyavacchidyate ca buddhiḥ buddhi ādi paryāya vācya tayā eva tebhyaḥ iti na abhidhāna mālā mātram idam

original: nanu sāmayikatvāc chabdārthapratyayasya samayasya ca puruśecchānuvartitvāt katham idaṃ vyavasthitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ syāt maivamsārvaṃjanīyasya samayasya viplāvayitum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: nanu sāmayika tvāt śabda artha pratyayasya samayasya ca puruśa icchā anuvarti tvāt katham idam vyavasthitam lakṣaṇam syāt mā evam sārvaṃjanīyasya samayasya viplāvayitum aśakya tvāt

original: tadviśiṣṭasya tadvācyasya lakṣaṇatvāt //
analyzed: tad viśiṣṭasya tad vācyasya lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: prakārānatreṇa lakṣaṇam asyāḥ kim iti noktam iti cet śiṃśapācodyam idam /
analyzed: lakṣaṇam asyāḥ kim iti na uktam iti ced śiṃśapā codyam idam

original: tasminn apy ukte 'nuyuṃjīta bhavāt [itthaṃ kim iti nīktam] iti //
analyzed: tasmin api ukte bhavāt ittham kim iti ni iktam iti

original: asti ca prayojanaṃ paryāyadvārakalakṣaṇopavarṇanasya yat sāṃkhyānāṃ vyāmohanirasanam /
analyzed: asti ca prayojanam paryāya dvāraka lakṣaṇa upavarṇanasya yat sāṃkhyānām vyāmoha nirasanam

original: evaṃ hi sāṅkhyāḥ saṃgirantebuddhir anyā jñānam anyat upalabdhir anyeti /
analyzed: evam hi sāṅkhyāḥ saṃgirante buddhiḥ anyā jñānam anyat upalabdhiḥ anyā iti

original: tadbhrayāpanayanāyedam ucyatebuddhir upalabdhir jñānam ity anarthāntarameka evārtha ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tad bhraya apanayanāya idam ucyate buddhiḥ upalabdhiḥ jñānam iti anarthāntaram ekaḥ eva arthaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: itthaṃ ca svarūpato nirjñātā buddhiḥ bhogasvabhāvatvāt tatsādhanatvāc ca saṃsārahetur iti heyatvena bhāvyate sukhādibuddhiḥ bhogaḥ tatsādhanabuddhis tu bhogasādhanam iti /
analyzed: ittham ca svarūpataḥ nirjñātā buddhiḥ bhoga svabhāva tvāt tad sādhana tvāt ca saṃsāra hetuḥ iti heya tvena bhāvyate sukha ādi buddhiḥ bhogaḥ tad sādhana buddhiḥ tu bhoga sādhanam iti

original: kathaṃ punaḥ pāramarṣāḥ pravadanti buddhir anyā jñānam anyat upalabdhir anyetinityāṃ hi buddhiṃ te manyante //
analyzed: katham punar pāramarṣāḥ pravadanti buddhiḥ anyā jñānam anyat upalabdhiḥ anyā iti nityām hi buddhim te manyante

original: eva /
analyzed: eva

original: tāv imau prakṛtipuruṣau vivekenāpaśyatāṃ saṃsāraḥ /
analyzed: tau imau prakṛti puruṣau vivekena apaśyatām saṃsāraḥ

original: prakṛtipuruṣavivekajñānānmokṣaḥ iti //
analyzed: prakṛti puruṣa viveka jñānāt mokṣaḥ iti

original: kā punaḥ prakṛtir nāmasattvarajastamasāṃ trayāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ sāmyāvasthā prakṛtiḥ /
analyzed: kā punar prakṛtiḥ nāma sattva rajaḥ tamasām trayāṇām guṇānām sāmya avasthā prakṛtiḥ

original: pradhānam avyaktaṃ ca tad ucyate yatsāmyāvasthāgataṃ guṇatrayam iti //
analyzed: pradhānam avyaktam ca tat ucyate yat sāmya avasthā gatam guṇatrayam iti

original: nanu tat sattve kiṃ pramāṇamanumānam ity āha /
analyzed: nanu tat sattve kim pramāṇam anumānam iti āha

original: tathā hi carācaram idaṃ viśvaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohāvinābhūtam upalabhyate /
analyzed: tathā hi carācaram idam viśvam sukha duḥkha moha avinābhūtam upalabhyate

original: na hi brahmādau stambaparyante jagati tathābhūtaṃ kim api bhūtam upalabhyate yat sukhaduḥkhamohair vinākṛtam //
analyzed: na hi brahma ādau stamba paryante jagati tathābhūtam kim api bhūtam upalabhyate yat sukha duḥkha mohaiḥ vinākṛtam

original: tatra sukhasvabhāvaṃ sattvam duḥkhasvabhāvaṃ rajaḥ mohasvabhāvaṃ tamaḥ /
analyzed: tatra sukha svabhāvam sattvam duḥkha svabhāvam rajaḥ moha svabhāvam tamaḥ

original: sarvatra ca prītyaprātiviṣādadarśanāt prakāśapravṛttiniyamāvagamāc ca sarvaṃ triguṇātmakaṃ jagat /
analyzed: sarvatra ca prīti aprātiviṣāda darśanāt prakāśa pravṛtti niyama avagamāt ca sarvam triguṇa ātmakam jagat

original: kāryaṃ ca yat parasparānvitarūpaṃ tadekarūpāt kāraṇād utpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
analyzed: kāryam ca yat paraspara anvita rūpam tad eka rūpāt kāraṇāt utpadyamānam dṛśyate

original: mṛdanvitāni hi ghaṭaśarāvodaṃcanaprabhṛtīni kāryasyaikasmān mṛdātmanaḥ kāraṇād udbhavanti /
analyzed: mṛd anvitāni hi ghaṭa śarāva udaṃcana prabhṛtīni kāryasya ekasmāt mṛdā ātmanaḥ kāraṇāt udbhavanti

original: tad idaṃ viśvaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānvitam iti tadātmakakāraṇakāryaṃ bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: tat idam viśvam sukha duḥkha moha anvitam iti tad ātmaka kāraṇa kāryam bhavitum arhati

original: yat sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ kāraṇaṃ sā sattvarajastamorūpā prakṛtiḥ //
analyzed: yat sukha duḥkha moha ātmakam kāraṇam sā sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ rūpā prakṛtiḥ

original: evam anvayapuraśarāḥ parimāṇādihetavo 'pi vakyavyāḥ /
analyzed: evam anvaya pura śarāḥ parimāṇa ādi hetavaḥ pi vakyavyāḥ

original: iyattayā vā caturaśratādinā vā parimāṇena tadvatāṃ kāryāṇām ekaprakṛtitvadarśanāt /
analyzed: iyat tayā vā caturaśra tā ādinā vā parimāṇena tadvatām kāryāṇām eka prakṛti tva darśanāt

original: viṣamavṛttyaś caite guṇāḥ kāryeṣu dṛśyante /
analyzed: viṣama vṛttyaḥ ca ete guṇāḥ kāryeṣu dṛśyante

original: kvacit sattvamādhikam ūne rajastamasī /
analyzed: kvacid ūne rajaḥ tamasī

original: kvacid rajaḥ prakṛṣṭam alpe sattvatamasī /
analyzed: kvacid rajaḥ prakṛṣṭam alpe sattva tamasī

original: kvacit tamaḥ pravṛddhaṃ tucche sattvarajasī iti /
analyzed: kvacid tamaḥ pravṛddham tucche sattva rajasī iti

original: tad eṣāṃ vaiṣamyabhedopadarśitaviśvarūpakāryāṇāṃ kvacit sāmyāvasthayā bhāvyam /
analyzed: tat eṣām vaiṣamya bheda upadarśita viśva rūpa kāryāṇām kvacid sāmya avasthayā bhāvyam

original: sā prakṛtir ucyate /
analyzed: sā prakṛtiḥ ucyate

original: seyam acetanā bhogyā prakṛtiḥ /
analyzed: sā iyam acetanā bhogyā prakṛtiḥ

original: asyāstu bhoktā cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ //
analyzed: asya astu bhoktā cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ

original: puruṣa idānīṃ kim anumānakaḥuktam eva bhogyena bhoktur anumānam /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ idānīm kim anumānakaḥ uktam eva bhogyena bhoktuḥ anumānam

original: na hy acetanasyabhogyasya bhoktāramantareṇa bhogyataivopapadyate /
analyzed: na hi acetanasya abhogyasya bhoktāram antareṇa bhogyatā eva upapadyate

original: dṛṣṭā ca seti bhoktā kalpyate //
analyzed: dṛṣṭā ca sā iti bhoktā kalpyate

original: sa ca citiśaktisvabhāvaka eva sarvaprakārakartṛtvādivyahāra nivahabahiṣkṛtasvarūpaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca citi śakti svabhāvakaḥ eva sarva prakāra kartṛ tva ādi vyahāra nivaha bahiṣkṛta svarūpaḥ

original: draṣṭṛtvam eva puruṣasya svarūpm āhuḥ /
analyzed: draṣṭṛ tvam eva puruṣasya svarūpm āhuḥ

original: yathā bhavanta enam ātmānam adhyavasāyādidharmayoginaṃ manyante na tathā 'sau bhavitum arhatiadhyavasāyāder buddhidharmatvāt //
analyzed: yathā bhavantaḥ enam ātmānam adhyavasāya ādi dharma yoginam manyante na tathā sau bhavitum arhati adhyavasāya ādeḥ buddhi dharma tvāt

original: kartuṃ śaknoti puruṣaḥ tṛṇasyāpi na kubjatām /
analyzed: kartum śaknoti puruṣaḥ tṛṇasya api na kubja tām

original: anyopanītam arthaṃ tu sa paśyaty eva kevalam //
analyzed: anya upanītam artham tu sa paśyati eva kevalam

original: prakṛtir evainaṃ bhogāpavargābhyāṃ saṃyunakti /
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ eva enam bhoga apavargābhyām saṃyunakti

original: na ca nirvikārā satī bhogasaṃpādanasamarthā 'sau bhavatīti mahadāivikṛtīḥ pratipadyate /
analyzed: na ca nirvikārā satī bhoga saṃpādana samarthā sau bhavati iti mahat āi vikṛtīḥ pratipadyate

original: paṅgvandhanyāyena prakṛtipuruṣau saṃyujyete /
analyzed: paṅgu andha nyāyena prakṛti puruṣau saṃyujyete

original: prakṛtir acetanā dṛśyā bhogyā draṣṭāraṃ bhoktāraṃ puruṣam apekṣate /
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ acetanā dṛśyā bhogyā draṣṭāram bhoktāram puruṣam apekṣate

original: puruṣo 'pi draṣṭā bhoktā dṛśyaṃ bhogyam apekṣate /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ pi draṣṭā bhoktā dṛśyam bhogyam apekṣate

original: ity evaṃ tayoḥ paṅgvandhavat saṃyogo bhavati /
analyzed: iti evam tayoḥ paṅgu andha vat saṃyogaḥ bhavati

original: darśanaśaktyā paṅgoḥ gamanaśaktyā cāndhasya ekatra melanāt kāryasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: darśana śaktyā paṅgoḥ gamana śaktyā ca andhasya ekatra melanāt kārya siddhiḥ

original: evaṃ prakṛtipuruṣasaṃyogāt sargaḥ pravartate tad uktam puruṣasya darśanārthaḥ kaivalyārthaḥ tathā pradhānasya /
analyzed: evam prakṛti puruṣa saṃyogāt sargaḥ pravartate tat uktam puruṣasya darśana arthaḥ kaivalya arthaḥ tathā pradhānasya

original: paṅgvandhavad ubhayor api saṃyogaḥ tatkṛtaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: paṅgu andha vat ubhayoḥ api saṃyogaḥ tad kṛtaḥ sargaḥ

original: yac cetthaṃ pradhānānmahattattvam utpadyate sā buddhir adhyavasāyātmakā dharmajñānavairāgyaiśyaryatadviparyayarūpavṛttiyoginī mahattattvam ucyate //
analyzed: yat ca ittham pradhānāt mahat tattvam utpadyate sā buddhiḥ adhyavasāya ātmakā dharma jñāna vairāgya aiśyarya tad viparyaya rūpa vṛtti yoginī mahat tattvam ucyate

original: buddher ahaṅkāra udeti /
analyzed: buddheḥ ahaṅkāraḥ udeti

original: sa cābhimānasvabhāvaḥ //
analyzed: sa ca abhimāna svabhāvaḥ

original: ahaṃkārāt tu ghrāṇādīni paṃca buddhīndriyāṇi vāgādīni paṃca karmendriyāṇi saṅkalpakam ekādaśaṃ manaḥ gandhāditanmātrāṇi ca paṃceti ṣoḍaśako gaṇaḥ prabhavati //
analyzed: ahaṃkārāt tu ghrāṇa ādīni paṃca buddhīndriyāṇi vāc ādīni paṃca karmendriyāṇi saṅkalpakam ekādaśam manaḥ gandha ādi tanmātrāṇi ca paṃca iti ṣoḍaśakaḥ gaṇaḥ prabhavati

original: tato gandhāditanmātrapaṃcakāt paṃca pṛthivyādīni mahābhūtāni jāyanta iti /
analyzed: tatas gandha ādi tanmātra paṃcakāt paṃca pṛthivī ādīni mahābhūtāni jāyante iti

original: āha ca [prakṛter mahāṃs tato 'haṅkāraḥ tasmād gaṇaś ca ṣoḍaśakaḥ /
analyzed: āha ca prakṛteḥ mahān tatas haṅkāraḥ tasmāt gaṇaḥ ca ṣoḍaśakaḥ

original: tasmād api ṣoḍaśakāt paṃcabhyaḥ paṃca bhūtāti //
analyzed: tasmāt api ṣoḍaśakāt paṃcabhyaḥ paṃca bhūtāti

original: tānīmāni paṃcaviṃśatitattvāni saṃcakṣate /
analyzed: tāni imāni paṃcaviṃśati tattvāni saṃcakṣate

original: pradhānaṃ prakṛtir eva na vikṛtiḥ /
analyzed: pradhānam prakṛtiḥ eva na vikṛtiḥ

original: mahadahaṅkāratanmātrāṇi sapta pūrvapūrvāpekṣayā vikṛtayaḥ uttarovottarakāryāpekṣayā prakṛtayaḥ /
analyzed: mahat ahaṅkāra tanmātrāṇi sapta pūrva pūrva apekṣayā vikṛtayaḥ uttara uva uttara kārya apekṣayā prakṛtayaḥ

original: ekādaśendriyāṇi paṃcabhūtāni vikṛtaya eva /
analyzed: ekādaśa indriyāṇi paṃcabhūtāni vikṛtayaḥ eva

original: aprakṛtivikṛtirūpas tu śuddhaḥ puruṣa iti /
analyzed: aprakṛti vikṛti rūpaḥ tu śuddhaḥ puruṣaḥ iti

original: tad āha [mūlaprakṛtviravikṛtir mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ sapta /
analyzed: tat āha mūlaprakṛt viravikṛtiḥ mahat ādyāḥ prakṛti vikṛtayaḥ sapta

original: ṣoḍaśakas tu vikāraḥ na prakṛtir na vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśakaḥ tu vikāraḥ na prakṛtiḥ na vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ

original: evaṃ mahādivikāravatī prakṛtir ātmano bhogaṃ sādhayati /
analyzed: evam mahā ādi vikāravatī prakṛtiḥ ātmanaḥ bhogam sādhayati

original: kaścāsya bhogaḥbuddhivṛttyanupātitvam /
analyzed: kaḥ ca asya bhogaḥ buddhi vṛtti anupāti tvam

original: viṣayākārapariṇatendriyavṛttyanuraktāṃ buddhibṛtiṃ jñānātmikāṃ puruṣaḥ paśyati /
analyzed: viṣaya ākāra pariṇata indriya vṛtti anuraktām buddhi bṛtim jñāna ātmikām puruṣaḥ paśyati

original: darśane 'pi na tasya kiñcid anyatvam /
analyzed: darśane pi na tasya kiñcid anya tvam

original: tad eva darśanaṃyat tatra pratibimbanam iti /
analyzed: tat eva darśanam yat tatra pratibimbanam iti

original: itthaṃ tayoḥ buddhipuṃsoḥ saṃyoge sati puruṣadharmaścetayitṛtvalakṣaṇaḥ buddhāvasann api sann iva lakṣyate /
analyzed: ittham tayoḥ buddhi puṃsoḥ saṃyoge sati puruṣa dharmaḥ cetayitṛ tva lakṣaṇaḥ buddhau asan api san iva lakṣyate

original: buddhidharmaś ca kartṛtvādiḥ ātmani sākṣisthānīye 'sann api sann eva vibhāvyate /
analyzed: buddhi dharmaḥ ca kartṛ tva ādiḥ ātmani sākṣi sthānīye san api san eva vibhāvyate

original: tad āha [tatsmāt tatsaṃyogād acetanaṃ cetanāvad iva liṅgam /
analyzed: tat āha tat smāt tad saṃyogāt acetanam cetanāvat iva liṅgam

original: guṇakartṛtve 'pi tathā karteva bhavaty udāsīnaḥ //
analyzed: guṇa kartṛ tve pi tathā kartā iva bhavati udāsīnaḥ

original: atha apavargāya katham ātmanaḥ prakṛtir avakalpatesvarūpaṃ krakāśayatīty ācakṣate /
analyzed: atha apavargāya katham ātmanaḥ prakṛtiḥ avakalpate svarūpam krakāśayati iti ācakṣate

original: anavadhṛtaprakṛtisvarūpaḥ pumān svarūpaniṣṭha eva prakṛtikṛtam akhilaṃ ātmakṛtam iti manyamānaḥ tadupājitaṃ bhuṅkte /
analyzed: an avadhṛta prakṛti sva rūpaḥ pumān sva rūpa niṣṭhaḥ eva prakṛti kṛtam akhilam ātma kṛtam iti manyamānaḥ tad upājitam bhuṅkte

original: yadā tu pṛthagthūtāmenāṃ manyate tadā bhavatv iyam āyāsahetur eva mama iti buddhyamānaḥ tatkṛtam anupabhrṃjānaḥ svarūpaniṣṭha evāvatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: yadā tu pṛthak thūtām enām manyate tadā bhavatu iyam āyāsa hetuḥ eva mama iti buddhyamānaḥ tad kṛtam an upabhrṃjānaḥ sva rūpa niṣṭhaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate

original: prakṛtir api [bhavatu dṛṣṭā'ham anena pṛthaṅmām eṣa manyate] iti na tadabhimukhībhavitum utsahate /
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ api bhavatu dṛṣṭā aham anena pṛthak mām eṣa manyate iti na tad abhimukhībhavitum utsahate

original: tad āha prakṛtes sukumārataraṃ na kiñcid astīti me matir bhavati /
analyzed: tat āha prakṛteḥ sukumārataram na kiñcid asti iti me matiḥ bhavati

original: yā dṛṣṭā 'smīti punar nadarśanam upaiti puruṣasya //
analyzed: yā dṛṣṭā smi iti punar na darśanam upaiti puruṣasya

original: parasparaṃ ca bhagnarasayoḥ prakṛtipuruṣayoḥ vyāpakatvāt saty api saṃyoge sargo na pravartata evaty āha dṛṣṭā mayety upekṣaka ekaḥ dṛṣṭā 'ham asmīty uparamaty anyā /
analyzed: parasparam ca bhagna rasayoḥ prakṛti puruṣayoḥ vyāpaka tvāt sati api saṃyoge sargaḥ na pravartate eva iti āha dṛṣṭā mayā iti upekṣakaḥ ekaḥ dṛṣṭā ham asmi iti uparamati anyā

original: sati saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasya //
analyzed: sati saṃyoge tayoḥ prayojanam na asti sargasya

original: aparimlānakutūhalo hi pumān vaṃcayituṃ śakyate na dṛṣṭatttva iti matvā satyām api yogyatāyāṃ nivartate prakṛtiḥ naṭīva raṅgabhūmau pradarśitanikhi.anijanṛttavṛttān tanaipuṇā tata ity āha raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛtyāt /
analyzed: a parimlāna kutūhalaḥ hi pumān vaṃcayitum śakyate na dṛṣṭa tttvaḥ iti matvā satyām api yogyatāyām nivartate prakṛtiḥ naṭī iva raṅga bhūmau tatas iti āha raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛtyāt

original: puruṣasya tathā ''tmānaṃ prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ //
analyzed: puruṣasya tathā tmānam prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ

original: tad evaṃ prakṛtir eva saṃsāre pravartate prakṛtir eva mokṣam anubhavatīty āha tasmān na badhyate 'ddhā nāpi mucyate nāpi saṃsarati kaścit /
analyzed: tat evam prakṛtiḥ eva saṃsāre pravartate prakṛtiḥ eva mokṣam anubhavati iti āha tasmāt na badhyate ddhā na api mucyate na api saṃsarati kaścid

original: saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ //
analyzed: saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānā āśrayā prakṛtiḥ

original: kim arthaṃ punar asāv evaṃ ceṣṭate prakṛtir iti cetkiṃ kriyate svabhāva evaiṣa daivahatikāyās tasyāḥ nānāvidhair upāyair upakāriṇy anupakāriṇaḥ puṃsaḥ /
analyzed: kim artham punar asau evam ceṣṭate prakṛtiḥ iti ced kim kriyate svabhāvaḥ eva eṣa daivahatikāyāḥ tasyāḥ nānāvidhaiḥ upāyaiḥ upakāriṇī anupakāriṇaḥ puṃsaḥ

original: guṇavatyaguṇasya sataḥ tasyārthamapārthakaṃ carati //
analyzed: guṇavatī aguṇasya sataḥ tasya artham apārthakam carati

original: acetanatvād asyāḥ katham evaṃ kāritvam iti cetuktam atra vatsavivṛddhinimittaṃ kṣīrasya yathā pravṛttir ajñasya /
analyzed: acetana tvāt asyāḥ katham evam kāri tvam iti ced uktam atra vatsa vivṛddhi nimittam kṣīrasya yathā pravṛttiḥ ajñasya

original: puruṣavimokṣanimittaṃ tathā pravṛttiḥ pradhānasya //
analyzed: puruṣa vimokṣa nimittam tathā pravṛttiḥ pradhānasya

original: nanu utpannatattvajñāne puṃsi prakṛter bhogānukūlamahadādikāryārambhaparāṅmukhatvāt ekasmiṃs tattvavidi mukte sati sarve muktāḥ syuḥnaiṣaṃ doṣaḥtattvavidam eva pumāṃsaṃ prati tasyā audāsīnyāt /
analyzed: nanu utpanna tattva jñāne puṃsi prakṛteḥ bhoga anukūla mahat ādi kārya ārambha parāṅmukha tvāt ekasmin tattva vidi mukte sati sarve muktāḥ syuḥ na eṣam doṣaḥ tattva vidam eva pumāṃsam prati tasyāḥ audāsīnyāt

original: anyasādhāraṇatvena tatkāryānapāyāt /
analyzed: anya sādhāraṇa tvena tad kārya anapāyāt

original: tathā ca pātajaliḥ[kṛtārthaṃ prati naṣṭam apy anaṣṭa tadatyasādhāraṇatvāt]  nanu evaṃ yadaiva tattvajñānam utpannam tadaiva prakṛtyupājitakarmaphalopabhogaparihāriṇaḥ puṃsaḥ śarīrapātaḥ syātnety āha tiṣṭhati saṃskāravśāc cakrabhramivad dhṛtaśarīraḥ //
analyzed: tathā ca pāta jaliḥ kṛtārtham prati naṣṭam api tad atya sādhāraṇa tvāt  nanu evam yadā eva tattva jñānam utpannam tadā eva prakṛti upājita karma phala upabhoga parihāriṇaḥ puṃsaḥ śarīrapātaḥ syāt na iti āha tiṣṭhati saṃskāra vśāt cakra bhrami vat dhṛta śarīraḥ

original: tataḥ saṃskāraviratau satyāṃ prāpte śarīrabhede caritārthatvāt pradhānavinivṛttau /
analyzed: tatas saṃskāra viratau satyām prāpte śarīrabhede caritārtha tvāt pradhāna vinivṛttau

original: ekāntikamātyantikam ubhayaṃ kaivalyam āpnoti iti //
analyzed: ekāntikam ātyantikam ubhayam kaivalyam āpnoti iti

original: aho nu khalu kāpilakavikathārasākṣiptahṛdayaiḥ atibahu prasaktānuprasaktyā likhitam asmābhiḥ /
analyzed: aho nu khalu kāpila kavi kathā rasa ākṣipta hṛdayaiḥ ati bahu prasakta anuprasaktyā likhitam asmābhiḥ

original: tad iyaṃ pradhānavikṛtiḥ prathamā mahacchabdavācyā sā buddhiḥ tattvavidaṃ prati naṣṭā 'pi anyasādhāraṇatvād anaṣṭaiveti nityā /
analyzed: tat iyam pradhāna vikṛtiḥ prathamā mahat śabda vācyā sā buddhiḥ tattva vidam prati naṣṭā anya sādhāraṇa tvāt a naṣṭā eva iti nityā

original: nityatvāc ca pratyabhijñāsanutandhānādivyavahāraprabandhanirvahaṇakṣamā buddhiḥ /
analyzed: nitya tvāt ca buddhiḥ

original: jñānaṃ tu tasyāḥ vṛttiḥ /
analyzed: jñānam tu tasyāḥ vṛttiḥ

original: upalabdhis tu puṃso vṛttimadbuddhidarśanam iti naiṣāṃ paryāyaśabdatvam iti //
analyzed: upalabdhiḥ tu puṃsaḥ vṛttimat buddhi darśanam iti na eṣām paryāya śabda tvam iti

original: atra pratividhīyateātmany eva nitye vyāpini boddhari jñātaryadhyavasātari dharmādharmādiyogini pratyabhijñānādikāryāṇāṃ kartari seyaṃ buddhiḥ asaṃjñā sāṃkhyaiḥ kalpitā /
analyzed: atra pratividhīyate ātmani eva nitye vyāpini boddhari jñātari adhyavasātari dharma adharma ādi yogini pratyabhijñāna ādi kāryāṇām kartari sā iyam buddhiḥ asaṃjñā sāṃkhyaiḥ kalpitā

original: cetanatvaṃ tu jñānādiyoginyā api yat tv asyā nābhyupagataṃ so 'yamatīva tamasvināṃ bhramaḥ /
analyzed: cetana tvam tu jñāna ādi yoginyāḥ api yat tu asyāḥ na abhyupagatam saḥ tamasvinām bhramaḥ

original: ya eva budhyate jānāti adhyavasyatisa eva paśyati cetayate ca /
analyzed: yaḥ eva budhyate jānāti adhyavasyati saḥ eva paśyati cetayate ca

original: na khalv atra vastusvarūpabhedaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: na khalu atra vastu svarūpa bhedam paśyāmaḥ

original: tatra buddhir budhyate jānāti adhyavasyatipuruṣas tu paśyati cetayate ceti vaṃcanāyaivam ucyate mugdhatayā vā //
analyzed: tatra buddhiḥ budhyate jānāti adhyavasyati puruṣaḥ tu paśyati cetayate ca iti vaṃcanāya evam ucyate mugdha tayā vā

original: yac cedam ucyatebudhyādhyavasitam arthaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyatītitadvyākhyeyamkim idaṃ tasya draṣṭṭatvam iti /
analyzed: yat ca idam ucyate budhyā adhyavasitam artham puruṣaḥ paśyati iti tat vyākhyeyam kim idam tasya draṣṭṛ tvam iti

original: pratibimbanam iti cetkiṃ svacche puṃsi vṛttimatī buddhiḥ saṃkrāmati uta vṛttimatyāṃ buddhau pumān iti /
analyzed: pratibimbanam iti ced kim svacche puṃsi vṛttimatī buddhiḥ saṃkrāmati uta vṛttimatyām buddhau pumān iti

original: tatra catiśaktir apariṇāminī apratisaṃkrameti na buddhau puruṣasya saṃkramaṇam /
analyzed: tatra cati śaktiḥ apariṇāminī apratisaṃkramā iti na buddhau puruṣasya saṃkramaṇam

original: buddhau tu puṃsi saṃkrāntāyām api puṃsaḥ kiṃ vṛttam yena draṣṭā saṃpannaḥ //
analyzed: buddhau tu puṃsi saṃkrāntāyām api puṃsaḥ kim vṛttam yena draṣṭā saṃpannaḥ

original: draṣṭṛtvaṃ svabhāva evāsyeti cetkiṃ buddhau pratibimbanena /
analyzed: draṣṭṛ tvam svabhāvaḥ evā asya iti ced kim buddhau pratibimbanena

original: viśeṣṭaviṣayāvaccheda iti cettataḥ pūrvamanālambanaṃ draṣṭṭatvam aghaṭamānam iti na naisargikaṃ draṣṭaṭarūpatvaṃ puṃsaḥ syāt //
analyzed: viśeṣṭa viṣaya avacchedaḥ iti ced tatas pūrvam anālambanam draṣṭṛ tvam aghaṭamānam iti na naisargikam draṣṭaṭa rūpa tvam puṃsaḥ syāt

original: darśanaśaktiḥ svābhāvikīti cetnatasyā bhedābhedābhyaṃ nirūpayitum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: darśana śaktiḥ svābhāvikī iti nirūpayitum aśakya tvāt

original: pratibimbapakṣe ca parasparānurāgasya tulyatvāt aviyogāc ca katham idaṃ nirdhāryatāmamī buddhidharmāḥ amī puṃdharmā iti /
analyzed: pratibimba pakṣe ca paraspara anurāgasya tulya tvāt aviyogāt ca katham idam nirdhāryatām amī buddhi dharmāḥ amī pum dharmāḥ iti

original: na hi tayo pārthagarthyena kadācit svarūpāvadhāraṇaṃ vṛttam //
analyzed: na hi tayoḥ pārthagarthyena kadācid svarūpa avadhāraṇam vṛttam

original: anavadhāritakāryabhedatvāc ca nānātvam api tayor durvacam /
analyzed: anavadhārita kārya bheda tvāt ca nānātvam api tayoḥ durvacam

original: cetanācetanatvāt bhoktṛbhogyatvāc ca vispaṣṭaṃ tayor nānātvam iti cetnajñānādiyogitvaṃ buddheḥacetanatvaṃ ceti citram //
analyzed: cetana acetana tvāt bhoktṛ bhogya tvāt ca vispaṣṭam tayoḥ nānātvam iti cetna jñāna ādi yogi tvam buddheḥ acetana tvam ca iti citram

original: api ca kalpayitvā 'pi buddhipuṃsor nānātvaṃ buddhidharmāḥ puṃsi puṃdharmāś ca buddhāvāropaṇīyāḥ iti kiṃ bhedena bhede ca buddher jñānādiyogitvena cetana tvāpatteḥ ekatra kāryakāraṇasaṃghāte cetanadvayam aniṣṭaṃ prasajyeta //
analyzed: api ca kalpayitvā buddhi puṃsoḥ nānātvam buddhi dharmāḥ puṃsi pum dharmāḥ ca buddhau āropaṇīyāḥ iti kim bhedena bhede ca buddheḥ jñāna ādi yogi tvena cetana tva āpatteḥ ekatra kārya kāraṇa saṃghāte cetana dvayam aniṣṭam prasajyeta

original: nityam antaḥkaraṇam antareṇa puṃsaḥ upalabdhir na bhaved iti buddheḥ kalpanā cetasty eva nityam antaḥkaraṇaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: nityam antaḥkaraṇam antareṇa puṃsaḥ upalabdhiḥ na bhavet iti buddheḥ kalpanā cetasti eva nityam antaḥkaraṇam manaḥ

original: tena karaṇena kartur ātmanaḥ viṣayo palabdhikriyā nirvartyate /
analyzed: tena karaṇena kartuḥ ātmanaḥ viṣaya u palabdhi kriyā nirvartyate

original: saiva ca buddhir ity ākhyāyate na tv anyā nityā buddhir astīti //
analyzed: sā eva ca buddhiḥ iti ākhyāyate na tu anyā nityā buddhiḥ asti iti

original: kiṃ ca kasya kṛte paridṛśyamānam ātmano jñānādikartṛtvaṃ utsṛjya buddher adṛśyamānaṃ tad upeyate /
analyzed: kim ca kasya kṛte paridṛśyamānam ātmanaḥ jñāna ādi kartṛ tvam utsṛjya buddheḥ adṛśyamānam tat upeyate

original: ko 'trātiśayaḥ nanu puruṣasya svātantryātmaka kartṛtve sati svakṛtakarmaphalopabhogānantyād anirmokṣaḥ syāt /
analyzed: nanu puruṣasya svātantrya ātmaka kartṛ tve sati sva kṛta karma phala upabhoga ānantyāt anirmokṣaḥ syāt

original: na hi karmaṇāṃ parikṣayaḥ janmakoṭiśatair api śakyakriyaḥ /
analyzed: na hi karmaṇām parikṣayaḥ janma koṭi śataiḥ api śakya kriyaḥ

original: yadā tv akartāraṃ udāsīnam evaṃ prakṛtir badhnāti tadā saiva jñātā satī mokṣayatīti na dūraṃ mokṣavartma bhaviṣyatīti //
analyzed: yadā tu akartāram udāsīnam evam prakṛtiḥ badhnāti tadā sā eva jñātā satī mokṣayati iti na dūram mokṣa vartma bhaviṣyati iti

original: aho bata nikhilam eva maurkhyaṃ sāṃkhyahṛdayeṣv eva pratiṣṭhitam iti kathaṃ manyo jana idānīṃ mūrkho bhaviṣyati acetane hi niraṅkuśe pradhāne bandhayitari sutarāmanirmokṣaḥ syāt /
analyzed: aho bata nikhilam eva maurkhyam sāṃkhya hṛdayeṣu eva pratiṣṭhitam iti katham manyaḥ janaḥ idānīm mūrkhaḥ bhaviṣyati acetane hi niraṅkuśe pradhāne bandhayitari sutarām anirmokṣaḥ syāt

original: tattvavidam api pumāṃsaṃ na badhnāti prakṛtir iti ko 'syā niyantāpaṅgvandhanyāyena saṃyogasya tadā 'pi tulyatvāt /
analyzed: tattva vidam api pumāṃsam na badhnāti prakṛtiḥ iti niyantā apaṅgu andha nyāyena saṃyogasya tadā pi tulya tvāt

original: nivṛttakutūhalaḥ pumān iti cetprakṛtir anirmuktakautukā 'bhinavavadhūrivasthitaiva //
analyzed: nivṛtta kutūhalaḥ pumān iti ced prakṛtiḥ a nirmukta kautukā bhinava vadhūḥ iva sthitā eva

original: api ca re mūḍha pūrvam api tapasvinā puṃsā kiṃ kṛtam yadā 'sau baddho 'būtdraṣṭṛtvaṃ tu tasya rūpaṃ tadavinābhūtam iti kaivalyadaśāyām api tan na naśyaty eveti tadā 'pi tasya bandhanāya kathaṃ na pravarteta nirmaryādā prakṛtiḥ dṛṣṭā 'smīti viramatīti cetmaivamna hy asau ekapatnīvratadurgrahagṛhitā /
analyzed: api ca re mūḍha pūrvam api tapasvinā puṃsā kim kṛtam yadā sau baddhaḥ tu tasya rūpam tad avinābhūtam iti kaivalya daśāyām api tat na naśyati eva iti tadā tasya bandhanāya katham na pravarteta nirmaryādā prakṛtiḥ dṛṣṭā smi iti viramati iti ced ma evam na hi asau eka patnī vrata durgraha gṛhitā

original: niśaṅkhyapuruṣopabhogasaubhāgyā paṇyavaniteva na vā 'asau niyamena vyavahartum arhatīty āstām etat //
analyzed: niśaṅkhya puruṣa upabhoga saubhāgyā paṇya vanitā iva na vai asau niyamena vyavahartum arhati iti āstām etat

original: yac ca sattvarajastamobhiḥ tribhir guṇaiḥ samāvasthāyāḥ pradhānaśabdavyapadeśabhājaḥ prakṛteḥ mahān nāma buddhir utpadyate ityādi prakriyājālammālapitamtatsarvaṃ mahāndhaparamparānyāyapravṛttagurupāṭhakramopanatam eva na pramāṇamūlam /
analyzed: yat ca sattva rajaḥ tamobhiḥ tribhiḥ guṇaiḥ sama avasthāyāḥ pradhāna śabda vyapadeśa bhājaḥ prakṛteḥ mahān nāma buddhiḥ utpadyate ityādi prakriyā jālam mālapitam tat sarvam mahā andha paramparā nyāya pravṛtta guru pāṭha krama upanatam eva na pramāṇa mūlam

original: kāryād dhi kāraṇam alpaparimāṇam upalabhyatena tu viparyayaḥ /
analyzed: kāryāt hi kāraṇam alpa parimāṇam upalabhyate tena tu viparyayaḥ

original: svāvayavāśritasya ghaṭapaṭāder darśanāt /
analyzed: sva avayava āśritasya ghaṭa paṭa ādeḥ darśanāt

original: tadavayavānāṃ tadapekṣayā 'lpatvāt /
analyzed: tad avayavānām tad apekṣayā lpa tvāt

original: anyasyā mṛdaḥ mahāparimāṇatvam aprayojakam //
analyzed: anyasyāḥ mṛdaḥ mahā parimāṇa tvam aprayojakam

original: api cabuddhir nāma viṣayopalaṃbhaḥ /
analyzed: api ca buddhiḥ nāma viṣaya upalaṃbhaḥ

original: ahaṅkāro 'py ahaṃpratyayarūpo ' bhimānaḥ buddhiviśeṣa eva /
analyzed: ahaṅkāraḥ api ahaṃpratyaya rūpaḥ bhimānaḥ buddhi viśeṣaḥ eva

original: tena bāhyānīndriyāṇi janyante gandhādayaś ca guṇāḥ guṇaiś ca pṛthivyādīni bhūtānīti mahāvyāmohaḥ /
analyzed: tena bāhyāni indriyāṇi janyante gandha ādayaḥ ca guṇāḥ guṇaiḥ ca pṛthivī ādīni bhūtāni iti mahā vyāmohaḥ

original: idaṃ ca citram viṣayajanyā hi sukhādayaḥ prasiddhāḥ /
analyzed: idam ca citram viṣaya janyāḥ hi sukha ādayaḥ prasiddhāḥ

original: te 'dya sukhādijanyā viṣayāḥ saṃvṛttā iti naveyaṃ viśvāmitrasyeva sāṃkhyamuneḥ sṛṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: te sukha ādi janyāḥ viṣayāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ iti navā iyam viśvāmitrasya iva sāṃkhya muneḥ sṛṣṭiḥ

original: na ca pradhānāstitvam api pramāṇavat anvayādihetūnām asādhānatvāt /
analyzed: na ca pradhāna astitvam api pramāṇa vat anvaya ādi hetūnām asādhāna tvāt

original: cetanānām api hi kāmaṃ bhaved api sukhaduḥkhamohānvitatvam /
analyzed: cetanānām api hi kāmam bhavet api sukha duḥkha moha anvita tvam

original: acetanāni bhūtāni sukhaduḥkhamohavantīti subhāṣitam /
analyzed: acetanāni bhūtāni sukha duḥkha mohavanti iti subhāṣitam

original: ghaṭe paṭe śakaṭe ca sukhaduḥkhamohāḥ santīti kaḥ pratipadyetaprakāśapravṛttiniyamā api cetaneṣv eva dṛśyante nācetaneṣv ity asiddhatvād dhetor na pradhānasiddhiḥ //
analyzed: ghaṭe paṭe śakaṭe ca sukha duḥkha mohāḥ santi iti kaḥ pratipadyeta prakāśa pravṛtti niyamāḥ api cetaneṣu eva dṛśyante na acetaneṣu iti asiddha tvāt hetoḥ na pradhāna siddhiḥ

original: api ca satkāryavādamūla eṣa tapasvināṃ vibhramaḥ sarvaṃ sarvatrāstīti /
analyzed: api ca satkārya vāda mūlaḥ eṣa tapasvinām vibhramaḥ sarvam sarvatra asti iti

original: tato 'bvayasiddhaṃ budhyamānās te pradhānasiddhāv adhyavasitāḥ /
analyzed: tatas bvaya siddham budhyamānāḥ te pradhāna siddhau adhyavasitāḥ

original: satkāryavādaś ca vicāryamāṇaḥ na samastyeveti kutastyā hetusiddhiḥ nanu satkāryavāde kāryakāraṇabhāvo bhavati bhāvānāṃ nānyathā /
analyzed: satkārya vādaḥ ca vicāryamāṇaḥ na samasti evā iti kutastyā hetu siddhiḥ nanu satkārya vāde kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ bhavati bhāvānām na anyathā

original: tathā hicatuśṭayī gatir iha syāt /
analyzed: tathā hi catur ṭayī gatiḥ iha syāt

original: ghaṭādikāryaṃ mṛtpiṇḍādinā kārayena kriyamāṇaṃ asad vā kriyatesad vāsad asad vānubhayasvabhāvaṃ vā iti //
analyzed: ghaṭa ādi kāryam mṛd piṇḍa ādinā kārayena kriyamāṇam asat vā kriyate isat vā asat asat vā anubhaya svabhāvam vā iti

original: tatrāsataḥ kāraṇe kharaviṣāṇādepi karaṇaṃ syāt /
analyzed: tatra asataḥ kāraṇe khara viṣāṇa āda api karaṇam syāt

original: asattve hi ghaṭasya kharaviṣāṇasya ko viśeṣaḥ ghaṭasyāpi prāgabhāvapradhvaṃsābhāvadaśayoḥ asattvāviśeṣāt prāgabhāvadaśāyām iva pradhvaṃsadaśāyām api karaṇaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: asattve hi ghaṭasya khara viṣāṇasya kaḥ viśeṣaḥ ghaṭasya api prāgabhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāva daśayoḥ asattva aviśeṣāt prāgabhāva daśāyām iva pradhvaṃsa daśāyām api karaṇam bhavet

original: asatkaraṇe ca niyatopādānagrahaṇaṃ na prāpnoti /
analyzed: asatkaraṇe ca niyata upādāna grahaṇam na prāpnoti

original: tailārthī tilasarṣapānupādatte na sikatāḥ /
analyzed: taila arthī tila sarṣapān upādatte na sikatāḥ

original: asattve ca tailasya ko viśeṣaḥ sarṣapāṇāṃ sikatābhyaḥ //
analyzed: asattve ca tailasya kaḥ viśeṣaḥ sarṣapāṇām sikatābhyaḥ

original: asati ca kārye nirālambanaḥ kārakavyāpāro bhavet na hy asau mṛtpiṇḍādiviṣayo bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: asati ca kārye nirālambanaḥ kāraka vyāpāraḥ bhavet na hi asau mṛd piṇḍa ādi viṣayaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: kāryaṃ cāsat //
analyzed: kāryam ca asat

original: api cāvidyamāne kāraṇavyatirikte ca kārye janye tatkāraṇasya mṛtpiṇḍādeḥ ghaṭādikāryaṃ janitavataḥ kim iti na svarūpam upalbhyate /
analyzed: api ca avidyamāne kāraṇa vyatirikte ca kārye janye tad kāraṇasya mṛd piṇḍa ādeḥ ghaṭa ādi kāryam janitavataḥ kim iti na svarūpam

original: atha svavināśena kāraṇaṃ kāryasya janakam iṣyate tad iyam abhāvād bhāvotpattir bhavet /
analyzed: atha sva vināśena kāraṇam kāryasya janakam iṣyate tat iyam abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ bhavet

original: tasyāṃ ca kuto 'yaṃ niyamaḥ yad anantaravṛtta eva mṛtpiṇḍābhāvaḥ kumbham abhinirvartayati na cirātikrānta iti /
analyzed: tasyām ca kutas yam niyamaḥ yat anantara vṛttaḥ eva mṛd piṇḍa abhāvaḥ kumbham abhinirvartayati na cira atikrāntaḥ iti

original: ataś ca parutmṛtpiṇḍe naṣṭe eṣamaḥ kumbhotpādaḥ syāt //
analyzed: atas ca parut mṛd piṇḍe naṣṭe eṣamaḥ kumbha utpādaḥ syāt

original: atha svāvyatiriktam eva kāraṇena kāryaṃ janyate tarhi kāraṇasya sattvāt tadvatiriktaṃ kāryaṃ sad eveti nāsataḥ karaṇam //
analyzed: atha sva avyatiriktam eva kāraṇena kāryam janyate tarhi kāraṇasya sattvāt tad vatiriktam kāryam sat eva iti na asataḥ karaṇam

original: sad asad api na kārya vaktuṃ yuktamsadasator vipratiṣedhena ekatra samāveśāyogāt /
analyzed: sat asat api na vaktum yuktam sat asatoḥ vipratiṣedhena ekatra samāveśa ayogāt

original: rūpabhedād avidrodha iti cetnakāryasya vicāryamāṇasyaikatvāt /
analyzed: rūpa bhedāt a vidrodhaḥ iti cetna kāryasya vicāryamāṇasya ekatvāt

original: tac ca tenaiva svena kāryeṇa rūpeṇa sac cet nāsadbhavet /
analyzed: tat ca tena eva svena kāryeṇa rūpeṇa sat ced na asat bhavet

original: asac cet na sat iti pararūpeṇa tv asattvaṃ sarvabhāvānām asty eva //
analyzed: asat ced na sat iti para rūpeṇa tu asattvam sarva bhāvānām asti eva

original: anubhayātmakaṃ tu vastu nāsty eveti tatpāriśeṣyāt sad eva kāryam //
analyzed: anubhaya ātmakam tu vastu na asti eva iti tad pāriśeṣyāt sat eva kāryam

original: kim iti ca tadā nopalabhyata iti cetanumānenāpi yad upalabhaṃ tat kim anupalabdhaṃ bhavatipratyakṣeṇa tu tadanīm anupalambho 'nabhivyaktatvāt /
analyzed: kim iti ca tadā nā upalabhyate iti ced tanumānena api yat tat kim anupalabdham bhavati pratyakṣeṇa tu tadanīm anupalambhaḥ
