original: abhivyatisampādana eva ca kārakaprayatnasāphalyam /
analyzed: abhivyatisampādane eva ca kāraka prayatna sāphalyam

original: kāryaṃ tu sad eveti //
analyzed: kāryam tu sat eva iti

original: atrābhidhīyatekena tu rūpeṇa tadānīṃ kāryaṃ sad iti manyaseyadi kārakavyāpārābhinirvartyena salilāharaṇādyarthakriyāsamarthena pṛthubudhnodarākāravatā rūpeṇa cakramūrdhani ghaṭo 'stītitadā 'bhivyaktenāpi rūpenṇasattvāt atyantāya kārakavyāpāravaiphalyam /
analyzed: atra abhidhīyate kena tu rūpeṇa tadānīm kāryam sat iti manyase yadi kāraka vyāpāra abhinirvartyena salila āharaṇa ādi arthakriyā samarthena pṛthu budhna udara ākāravatā rūpeṇa cakra mūrdhani ghaṭaḥ sti iti tadā abhivyaktena api atyantāya kāraka vyāpāra vaiphalyam

original: ittham api ca kārakapravṛttau tadvyāpārānuparamaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: ittham api ca kāraka pravṛttau tad vyāpāra anuparama prasaṅgaḥ

original: kiṃ hi tadopalabhya kārakāṇi nivarteran kāryasya prāgupalabdhatvāt /
analyzed: kim hi tadā upalabhya kārakāṇi nivarteran kāryasya prāk upalabdha tvāt

original: atha mṛtpiṇḍarūpeṇa tadānīṃ ghaṭo 'stīti kathyate na tarhy asau tadānīṃ ghaṭo 'sti mṛtpiṇḍa evāsāv asti /
analyzed: atha mṛd piṇḍa rūpeṇa tadānīm ghaṭaḥ sti iti kathyate na tarhi asau tadānīm ghaṭaḥ sti mṛd piṇḍaḥ eva asau asti

original: na hy anyarūpeṇānyo 'stīti śakyate baktum /
analyzed: na hi anya rūpeṇa anyaḥ sti iti śakyate baktum

original: uṣṭo 'py asan mṛtpiṇśarūpeṇāstīti syāt //
analyzed: uṣṭā u pi asat mṛd piṇśa rūpeṇa asti iti syāt

original: athoṣṭrarūpam uttarakālam api na nirvartyate ghaṭas tu tato nirvartyate yady evaṃ yadaivāsau nirvartyate tadaivāsti na tataḥ pūrvam iti //
analyzed: atha uṣṭra rūpam uttara kālam api na nirvartyate ghaṭaḥ tu tatas nirvartyate yadi evam yadā eva asau nirvartyate tadā eva asti na tatas pūrvam iti

original: atha pūrvaṃ śaktayātmanā tasyāstitvaṃ idānīṃ abhivyaktyātmanā kriyate ititad apy anupapannamabhivyaktir api tatsvarūpād bhinnā abhinnā vāsatī asatī vāiti vikalpyamānā na pūrvoktaṃ doṣam ativartate //
analyzed: atha pūrvam śaktayā ātmanā tasya astitvam idānīm abhivyaktyā ātmanā kriyate iti tat api anupapannam abhivyaktiḥ api tad svarūpāt bhinnā abhinnā vā asatī asatī vā iti vikalpyamānā na pūrva uktam doṣam ativartate

original: kā ceyam abhivyaktiḥkiṃ kāryātmanā 'vasthānam atha saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ uta pratītiḥiti //
analyzed: kā ca iyam abhivyaktiḥ kim kārya ātmanā atha saṃsthāna viśeṣaḥ uta pratītiḥ iti

original: yadi kāryātmanā 'vasthānaṃ tatpūrvaṃ nābhūt tadadhunā bhūtam ity asatkāryam /
analyzed: yadi kārya ātmanā vasthānam tat pūrvam tat adhunā bhūtam iti asatkāryam

original: pūrvam api vā yadi tadāsīt tadā punaḥ kārakavaiphalyam //
analyzed: pūrvam api vā yadi tadā āsīt tadā punar kāraka vaiphalyam

original: saṃsthānam api avayavasanniveśaviśeṣaḥ /
sa cāsann eva kriyate /
analyzed: sa ca āsan eva kriyate

original: avayavās tu santīti kasyātra vivādaḥna hi paramāṇavo 'smābhir nāṅgīkṛtāḥ //
analyzed: avayavāḥ tu santi iti kasya atra vivādaḥ na hi paramāṇavaḥ smābhiḥ na aṅgīkṛtāḥ

original: pratītis tu ghaṭasya cakṣurādikārakasāmāgriyadhīnā na mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍacakrādikārakacakrasādhyeti sā cakramūrdhani ghaṭasya nāstyeveti asan gaṭaḥ //
analyzed: pratītiḥ tu ghaṭasya cakṣuḥ ādi kāraka sāmāgriya dhīnā na mṛd piṇḍa daṇḍa cakra ādi kāraka cakra sādhyā iti sā cakra mūrdhani ghaṭasya na asti eva iti asan gaṭaḥ

original: darśanādarśanādhīne sadasattve hi vastunaḥ /
analyzed: darśana adarśana adhīne sat asat tve hi vastunaḥ

original: dṛśyasyādarśanāt tena cakre kumbhasya nāstitā //
analyzed: dṛśyasya adarśanāt tena cakre kumbhasya na astitā

original: cakramūrdhavat pradhvaṃsadaśāyam apy anupalambhāt ghaṭasya nāstitvam eveti /
analyzed: cakra mūrdha vat pradhvaṃsa daśā ayam api anupalambhāt ghaṭasya nāstitvam eva iti

original: ataś ca [nāsato vicyate bhāvaḥ nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ]  ity apramāṇakam pūrvāparāntayor bhāvasvarūpādarśanāt //
analyzed: atas ca na asataḥ vicyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ iti apramāṇakam pūrva apara antayoḥ bhāva svarūpa adarśanāt

original: śaktyātmanā 'pi yadastitvam asyocyateatrāpi cintyamkeyaṃ śaktir nāmeti /
analyzed: śakti ātmanā pi yat astitvam asya ucyate atra api cintyam kā iyam śaktiḥ nāma iti

original: yadi ghaṭasvarūpād bhinnā 'sau tarhi pararūpeṇa ghaṭo 'sti svarūpeṇa ca nāstīty asat kāryam uktaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yadi ghaṭa svarūpāt bhinnā sau tarhi para rūpeṇa ghaṭaḥ sti sva rūpeṇa ca na asti iti asat kāryam uktam syāt

original: ghaṭād abhinnatve tu śakteḥ śaktirūpeṇa ghaṭo 'stīti svarūpeṇaiva ghaṭāstitvam uktaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: ghaṭāt abhinna tve tu śakteḥ śakti rūpeṇa ghaṭaḥ sti iti sva rūpeṇa eva ghaṭa astitvam uktam bhavet

original: tac ca pratyakṣavirodhān nirastam //
analyzed: tat ca pratyakṣa virodhāt nirastam

original: asatkaraṇapakṣe ca yac coditaṃśaśaviṣāṇādy api kriyetetitat tu vacanavyakatyaparijñānāt /
analyzed: asatkaraṇa pakṣe ca yat ca uditam śaśaviṣāṇa ādi api kriyeta iti tat tu vacana vyakati aparijñānāt

original: [yad asat tat kriyate] iti neyaṃ vacanavyaktiḥ api tu [yat kriyate tat asat] iti //
analyzed: yat asat tat kriyate iti na iyam vacana vyaktiḥ api tu yat kriyate tat asat iti

original: svarūpasahakāryādihetavo yadvidhāyinaḥ /
analyzed: svarūpa sahakāri ādi hetavaḥ yad vidhāyinaḥ

original: dṛśyante janyate tad dhi na vyomakusumādikam //
analyzed: dṛśyante janyate tat hi na vyoma kusuma ādikam

original: prāgabhāvadaśāyāṃ ca hetuvyāpāradarśanam /
analyzed: prāgabhāva daśāyām ca hetu vyāpāra darśanam

original: na tu pradhvaṃsavelāyāṃ ataḥ kam anuyuṃjmahe //
analyzed: na tu pradhvaṃsa velāyām atas kam anuyuṃjmahe

original: upādānāṃ tu sarvasya yann na sarvatra dṛśyate /
analyzed: upādānām tu sarvasya yat na sarvatra dṛśyate

original: tan na dāryasya sadbhāvāt api tv evaṃ nirīkṣaṇāt //
analyzed: tat na dāryasya sadbhāvāt api tu evam nirīkṣaṇāt

original: adyatve vyavahāro 'pi neivāpūrvaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: adyatve vyavahāraḥ pi na iva apūrvaḥ pravartate

original: yathopalabdho vṛddhebhyaḥ sa tathaivānugamyate //
analyzed: yathā upalabdhaḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ sa tathā eva anugamyate

original: tailārthī sikatāḥ kaścid ādadāno na dṛśyate /
analyzed: taila arthī sikatāḥ kaścid ādadānaḥ na dṛśyate

original: adṛṣṭvā cādya nānyo 'pi tadarthī tāsu dhāvati //
analyzed: a dṛṣṭvā ca adya na anyaḥ tad arthī tāsu dhāvati

original: anvayavyatirekau ca gṛhyete vyavahārataḥ /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekau ca gṛhyete vyavahārataḥ

original: anādiścaiṣa saṃsāraḥ iti kasyānuyojyatā //
analyzed: anādiḥ ca eṣa saṃsāraḥ iti kasya anuyojya tā

original: atha vā śaktiniyomādevopādānaniyama upapatsyate //
analyzed: atha vā śakti niyomāt evā upādāna niyamaḥ upapatsyate

original: śaktis tu nityā sūkṣmā ca neha kācid upeyate /
analyzed: śaktiḥ tu nityā sūkṣmā ca na iha kācid upeyate

original: tadabhyupagame nityaṃ kāryotpattiprasaktitaḥ //
analyzed: tad abhyupagame nityam kārya utpatti prasaktitaḥ

original: kin tu yogyatāvacchinnasvarūpasahakārisannidhānam eva śaktiḥ /
saiveyaṃ dvividhā śaktir ucyateavasthitā āgantukī ca /
analyzed: sā evā iyam dvividhā śaktiḥ ucyate avasthitā āgantukī ca

original: mṛttvādyavaccinnnaṃ svarūpaṃ avasthitā śaktiḥ /
āgantukī ca daṇḍacakrādisaṃgarūpā /
analyzed: āgantukī ca daṇḍa cakra ādi saṃga rūpā

original: śaktidvayakṛtā ca kāryaniṣpattir asakṛd dṛṣṭeti tadarthibhis tadupadanam //
analyzed: śakti dvaya kṛtā ca kārya niṣpattiḥ asakṛt dṛṣṭā iti tad arthibhiḥ tad upadanam

original: yogyatā 'pi nārthāntaraṃ kiñcit kin tu vastuviśeṣa evety evaṃ vastuviśeṣaniyamāt upādānaniyamasiddheḥ na sat kāryam //
analyzed: yogyatā pi na artha antaram kiñcid kin tu vastu viśeṣaḥ eva iti evam vastu viśeṣa niyamāt upādāna niyama siddheḥ na sat kāryam

original: na ca śaktir eva kāryam iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: na ca śaktiḥ eva kāryam iti vaktavyam

original: kāryasvarūpasya tataḥ pṛthag bhūtasya pratītyā vyavasthāpanāt /
analyzed: kārya svarūpasya tatas pṛthak bhūtasya pratītyāḥ vyavasthāpanāt

original: śakteś ca kāryatve kāryād eva kāryotpādo ' ṅgīkṛtaḥ syāt /
analyzed: śakteḥ ca kārya tve kāryāt eva kārya utpādaḥ ṅgīkṛtaḥ syāt

original: na ca ghaṭāt ghaṭa utpattum arhati /
analyzed: na ca ghaṭāt ghaṭa utpattum arhati

original: śakteś ca kāryam utpadyata ity abhyupagatam /
analyzed: śakteḥ ca kāryam utpadyate iti abhyupagatam

original: ato 'nyat kāryam anyā ca śaktiḥ //
analyzed: atas nyat kāryam anyā ca śaktiḥ

original: nanu vācyavācakayoś cabdārthayoḥ vyaṅgyavyajakayoś ca dīpaghaṭayoḥ ubhayāśritā śaktir dṛṣṭeti kāryakāraṇayor adhyasāv ubhayādhiṣṭhānā bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: nanu vācya vācakayoḥ cabda arthayoḥ vyaṅgya vyajakayoḥ ca dīpa ghaṭayoḥ ubhaya āśritā śaktiḥ dṛṣṭā iti kārya kāraṇayoḥ adhi asau ubhaya adhiṣṭhānā bhavitum arhati

original: asati dvitīye kāryākhye tadāśraye katham iyam ubhayāśritā syād iti //
analyzed: asati dvitīye kārya ākhye tad āśraye katham iyam ubhaya āśritā syāt iti

original: taitad evamyathādarśanaṃ śakter abhyupagamāt /
analyzed: tā etat evam yathā darśanam śakteḥ abhyupagamāt

original: na caikatra dṛṣṭaṃ rūpamanyatrāpi mṛgyate /
analyzed: na ca ekatra dṛṣṭam rūpam anyatra api mṛgyate

original: vācyavācakayoḥ vyaṅgyavyajakayoś ca dvayoḥ pṛthaktvena darśanād ubhayāśritā śaktir aṅgīkṛteti hetudvayasyānupalambhāt kevalakāraṇavattir eva śaktiḥ /
analyzed: vācya vācakayoḥ vyaṅgya vyajakayoḥ ca dvayoḥ pṛthaktvena darśanāt ubhaya āśritā śaktiḥ aṅgīkṛtā iti hetu dvayasya anupalambhāt kevala kāraṇa vattiḥ eva śaktiḥ

original: tatkṛtaś copādānaniyama iti siddham //
analyzed: tad kṛtaḥ ca upādāna niyamaḥ iti siddham

original: asatkāryapakṣa evopādānaniyamavicāro yuktaḥ //
analyzed: asatkārya pakṣe eva upādāna niyama vicāraḥ yuktaḥ

original: utpātau khalu siddhāyāṃ upādānaṃ vicāryate /
analyzed: utpātau khalu siddhāyām upādānam vicāryate

original: satas tu naiva nāstīti kim upādānacintayā //
analyzed: sataḥ tu nā eva na asti iti kim upādāna cintayā

original: satkāryavāde ca sutarām upādānaniyamo durghaṭaḥsarvasya sarvatra bhāvāt /
analyzed: satkārya vāde ca sutarām upādāna niyamaḥ durghaṭaḥ sarvasya sarvatra bhāvāt

original: sikatātilasarittīrakedāravyaptabījaniyatāṅkurādikramotpadyamānatilasvarūpaparyālocanayā tileṣv iva sikatāsv api tailasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: sikatā tila sarit tīra kedāra vyapta bīja niyata aṅkura ādi krama utpadyamāna tila svarūpa paryālocanayā tileṣu iva sikatāsu api taila saṃbhavāt

original: sarvasya sarvatra cāstitve niyatapadārthapratiṣṭhitahānopādānādivyavahārasakala eva viplaveta //
analyzed: sarvasya sarvatra ca astitve niyata padārtha pratiṣṭhita hāna upādāna ādi vyavahāra sakalaḥ eva viplaveta

original: api ca prāyaś cettam eṣa tapasvī taptakṛcchramatikaṣṭaṃ kathaṃ cariṣyatīti mahanmama manasi kāruṇyam /
analyzed: api ca prāyas ced tam eṣa tapasvī tapta kṛcchram ati kaṣṭam katham cariṣyati iti mahat mama manasi kāruṇyam

original: annaṃ ca tāvad adamaśnāti anne ca varco 'stīti viḍbhakṣaṇāt prāyaś cittīyata evāyam iti alaṃ satkāryavādapramādena //
analyzed: annam ca tāvat adam aśnāti anne ca varcaḥ sti iti viṣ bhakṣaṇāt prāyas cittīyate eva ayam iti alam satkārya vāda pramādena

original: yat punar abhāṇikāraṇānupamardena kāryānutpādāt abhāvād bhāvotpattir bhavet /
analyzed: yat punar a bhāṇi kāraṇa an upamardena kārya anutpādāt abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ bhavet

original: tatra cānantaravṛttyutpattiniyamo na syāt ititad apy ayuktam mūrtānāṃ samānadeśatvavirodhāt kāryakāraṇayor ekadeśatvaṃ neṣ.yate /
analyzed: tatra ca anantara vṛtti utpatti niyamaḥ na syāt iti tat api ayuktam mūrtānām samāna deśa tva virodhāt kārya kāraṇayoḥ eka deśa tvam na iṣyate

original: naitāvatā bhāvotpattir abhāvād bhavitum arhati kāraṇādhīnatadutpādadarśanāt /
analyzed: na etāvatā bhāva utpattiḥ abhāvāt bhavitum arhati kāraṇa adhīna tad utpāda darśanāt

original: ata evānantaryaniyamo 'pi upapannaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva ānantarya niyamaḥ upapannaḥ

original: na ca kāryakāraṇayor abhedāt sat kāryam iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: na ca kārya kāraṇayoḥ abhedāt sat kāryam iti vaktavyam

original: tayoḥ pratyakṣasiddhabhinnasvarūpatvāt //
analyzed: tayoḥ pratyakṣa siddha bhinna sva rūpa tvāt

original: yat tu niralambanā kārakapravṛttir iti coditamparihṛtaṃ tat bhāṣyakāreṇa [buddhisiddhaṃ tu tad asat] iti /
analyzed: yat tu niralambanā kāraka pravṛttiḥ iti coditam parihṛtam tat bhāṣyakāreṇa buddhi siddham tu tat asat iti

original: vṛddhavyavahārataḥ kāryakārṇabhāvā m avagamya anuṣmāt kāraṇāt idam īdṛśaṃ kāryam utpadyata iti buddhau nirdhārya kārakāṇi kartā niyuṅkta iti na nirviṣayaḥ kārakavyāpāraḥ //
analyzed: vṛddha vyavahārataḥ avagamya anuṣmāt kāraṇāt idam īdṛśam kāryam utpadyate iti buddhau nirdhārya kārakāṇi kartā niyuṅkte iti na nirviṣayaḥ kāraka vyāpāraḥ

original: tad evaṃ tatkāryavādasya niṣpramāṇakatvāt tanmūlānvayādihetusidhyabhāvāt na pradhānāstitvasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: tat evam tad kārya vādasya niṣpramāṇaka tvāt tad mūla anvaya ādi hetu sidhi abhāvāt na pradhāna astitva siddhiḥ

original: tadabhāvāc ca na tadvikṛtiḥ nityābuddhiḥ /
analyzed: tad abhāvāt ca na tad vikṛtiḥ nitya a buddhiḥ

original: api tu jñānopalabdhirūpaiveti samyak sūtritaṃ [buddhir palabdhir jñānam ity anarthāntaram] iti //
analyzed: api tu jñāna upalabdhi rūpā eva iti samyak sūtritam buddhiḥ jñānam iti anartha antaram iti

original: itaś cānityā buddhiḥjānāmi jñāsyāsi ajñāsiṣam iti upajananāpāyadharmatayā pākādivat kālatraye 'pi prakāśamānatvāt /
analyzed: itas ca anityā buddhiḥ jānāmi jñāsyāsi ajñāsiṣam iti upajanana apāya dharma tayā pāka ādi vat kāla traye pi prakāśamāna tvāt

original: jñānavyatiriktāyāś ca buddher apratibhāsāt //
analyzed: jñāna vyatiriktāyāḥ ca buddheḥ apratibhāsāt

original: ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: ayam tu viśeṣaḥ

original: pākādikriyāṇāṃ adonādiphalāvacchedadvārakaṃ kālavaitatyam api bhavati /
analyzed: pāka ādi kriyāṇām adona ādi phala avaccheda dvārakam kāla vaitatyam api bhavati

original: upalabdhes tu vastusvarūpaprakāśanamātraparisamāptaprayojanāyāḥ kālavaitatyaṃ nāsty eva /
analyzed: upalabdheḥ tu vastu svarūpa prakāśana mātra parisamāpta prayojanāyāḥ kāla vaitatyam na asti eva

original: ata evānityatve 'pi utpannāpavargiṇīm eva buddhim ācakṣate śabdavatna ghaṭādivat kālāntarasthāyinīm iti //
analyzed: atas eva anitya tve pi utpannāpavargiṇīm eva buddhim ācakṣate śabda vat na ghaṭa ādi vat kāla antara sthāyinīm iti

original: sā ceyaṃ buddhiḥ ātmāntaḥkaraṇaśabdadīpendriyārthādyanekakārakakalāpakāryā 'pi satī na bāhyena bāhyakarmaṇi samavaiti /
analyzed: sā ca iyam buddhiḥ ātma antaḥkaraṇa śabda dīpa indriya artha ādi aneka kāraka kalāpa kāryā satī na bāhyena bāhya karmaṇi samavaiti

original: na bāhyakraṇe cakṣurādau /
analyzed: na bāhya kraṇe cakṣuḥ ādau

original: nāntaḥkaraṇe manasi /
analyzed: na antaḥkaraṇe manasi

original: kin tu kartary eva /
analyzed: kim tu kartari eva

original: kartā 'pi ca nityaḥ vibhur ātmā na bhūtasaṅghātasvabhāvaḥ kāryas tasyā āśraya ityātmaparīkṣāyāṃ nirṇītam /
analyzed: kartā ca nityaḥ vibhuḥ ātmā na bhūta saṅghāta svabhāvaḥ kāryaḥ tasyāḥ āśrayaḥ iti ātma parīkṣāyām nirṇītam

original: guṇatvam api cāsyās tatraiva darśitam //
analyzed: guṇa tvam api ca asyāḥ tatra eva darśitam

original: nanu evaṃ tarhi na buddher anityatvam vināśakāraṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: nanu evam tarhi na buddheḥ anitya tvam vināśa kāraṇa abhāvāt

original: dvividho hi guṇānāṃ vināśahetuḥāśrayavināśaḥ virodhiguṇaprādurbhāvo vā /
analyzed: dvividhaḥ hi guṇānām vināśa hetuḥ āśraya vināśaḥ virodhi guṇa prādurbhāvaḥ vā

original: nehāśrayavināśa nityatvād ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: na iha āśraya vināśa nitya tvāt ātmanaḥ

original: na ca virodhinas asyāḥ kaṃ cidruṇam upalabhāmahenaśabdavadāśuvināśitvāt /
analyzed: na ca virodhinaḥ asyāḥ kam cit ruṇam

original: nityākāśaguṇo 'pi śabdaḥ śabdāntaram ārabhya yathā vināśyati tathā buddhiḥ buddhyantaram ārabhya vinaśyatīti tathā darśanāt kalpyate /
analyzed: nitya ākāśa guṇaḥ pi śabdaḥ śabda antaram ārabhya yathā vināśyati tathā buddhiḥ buddhi antaram ārabhya vinaśyati iti tathā darśanāt kalpyate

original: yāvāṃś ca kiś cana vināśadarśanabhedopalambhādiḥ śabdasyānityatāyāṃ nyāya uktaḥ sa sarvo 'pi guddhāv api yojanīyaḥ //
analyzed: yāvān ca kim cana vināśa darśana bheda upalambha ādiḥ śabdasya anitya tāyām nyāyaḥ uktaḥ sa sarvaḥ guddhau api yojanīyaḥ

original: ata eva na buddhīnām ekapramātṛvṛttīnāṃ yaugapadya vidyate varṇānam ivaikavaktṛprayuktānām /
analyzed: atas eva na buddhīnām eka pramātṛ vṛttīnām yaugapadya vidyate iva eka vaktṛ prayuktānām

original: vināśyadavinaśyaddaśoayos tu buddhyor āśu vināśitve'pi yaugapadyam anubhavād abhyupeyata ity alam ativistareṇa //
analyzed: tu buddhyoḥ āśu vināśi tve pi yaugapadyam anubhavāt abhyupeyate iti alam ati vistareṇa

original: buddher anityatāyāṃ ca prāyeṇa sarvavādinām avivādaḥ /
analyzed: buddheḥ anitya tāyām ca prāyeṇa sarva vādinām avivādaḥ

original: tathā cāha jaiminiḥ [satsaṃprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam] iti //
analyzed: tathā ca āha jaiminiḥ sat saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma tat pratyakṣam iti

original: acirarucivat tasmāt buddhir nisargavinaśvarī bhavati janakaḥ svātmā tasyāḥ sa eva samāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: aciraruci vat tasmāt buddhiḥ nisarga vinaśvarī bhavati janakaḥ sva ātmā tasyāḥ saḥ eva samāśrayaḥ

original: bhavamarubhavaistāpaiḥ yā jātam eva yunakti sā vyasanajananīṃ jahyādenāṃ paramārthavit //
analyzed: bhava maru bhavaiḥ tāpaiḥ yā jātam eva yunakti sā vyasana jananīm jahyāt enām parama artha vid

original: iti buddhiparīkṣā yugapajjñānānutpattir manaso liṅgam //1.1.12//
analyzed: iti buddhi parīkṣā yugapad jñāna anutpattiḥ manasaḥ liṅgam

original: manaso yad eva sattve pramāṇaṃ tad agamyatvam evāsya lakṣaṇam samānetarajātīyavyavacchedakāritvāt //
analyzed: manasaḥ yat eva sattve pramāṇam tat agamya tvam eva asya lakṣaṇam samāna itara jātīya vyavaccheda kāri tvāt

original: nanu manasa indriyatvāt tadvarga eva paṭhanaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: nanu manasaḥ indriya tvāt tad varge eva paṭhanam yuktam

original: kim artho 'yaṃ pṛthaṅnirdeśaḥ nadharmabhedāt /
analyzed: kim arthaḥ yam pṛthak nirdeśaḥ na dharma bhedāt

original: bhautikānīndriyāṇi niyataviṣayāṇi /
analyzed: bhautikāni indriyāṇi niyata viṣayāṇi

original: saguṇānāṃ caiṣām indriyabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: sa guṇānām ca eṣām indriya bhāvaḥ

original: manas tu na bhautikam na niyataviṣayam /
analyzed: manaḥ tu na bhautikam na niyata viṣayam

original: na cāsya saguṇasyendriyabhāvaḥ iti /
analyzed: na ca asya sa guṇasya indriya bhāvaḥ iti

original: tac ca na bhautikam akāryatvāt /
analyzed: tat ca na bhautikam akārya tvāt

original: ata eva na tadguṇayogi /
analyzed: atas eva na tat guṇa yogi

original: na ca niyataviṣayam /
analyzed: na ca niyata viṣayam

original: sarvaviṣayatvaṃ tv asya sakalabāhyendriyāṇām adhiṣṭhātṛtvat /
analyzed: sarva viṣaya tvam tu asya sakala bāhya indriyāṇām adhiṣṭhātṛ tvat

original: tadanadhigamyasukhādiviṣayagrāhitvāc ca /
analyzed: tad anadhigamya sukha ādi viṣaya grāhi tvāt ca

original: bāhyendriyāṇi hi mano 'dhiṣṭhāni svaviṣayeṣu pravartitum utsahante cakṣurādīni nānyathā //
analyzed: bāhya indriyāṇi hi manaḥ dhiṣṭhāni sva viṣayeṣu pravartitum utsahante cakṣuḥ ādīni na anyathā

original: kasmād evam iti cetyugapat jñānānutpatteḥ /
analyzed: kasmāt evam iti ca iti yugapad jñāna anutpatteḥ

original: uttarakālaṃ ca bāhyendriyavyāpāravirahe 'pi tadarthavimarśāt asty ekendriyagamyeṣu kvacij jātiguṇādiṣu /
analyzed: uttara kālam ca bāhya indriya vyāpāra virahe tad artha vimarśāt asti eka indriya gamyeṣu kvacid jāti guṇa ādiṣu

original: vijñānāyaugapadyaṃ yat manasas tan na sādhanam //
analyzed: vijñāna ayaugapadyam yat manasaḥ tat na sādhanam

original: tatra viṣayādidoṣeṇa dūratvādinā jātyādeḥ yugapat gṛhītum aśakyatvāt //
analyzed: tatra viṣaya ādi doṣeṇa dūra tva ādinā jāti ādeḥ yugapad gṛhītum aśakya tvāt

original: yat tunānendriyagrāhyeṣu yugapatsannihiteṣv api gandharasarūpādiṣu viṣayeṣu tadgrahaṇeṣu ca svakāryānumitasannidhāneṣu satsv apy avikaleṣu kāraṇeṣu yugapad upalabdhayo na bhavanti tato 'vasīyatenūnaṃ kāraṇāndaram ebhir apekṣyate /
analyzed: yat tu nānā indriya grāhyeṣu yugapad sannihiteṣu api gandha rasa rūpa ādiṣu viṣayeṣu tad grahaṇeṣu ca sva kārya anumita sannidhāneṣu satsu api avikaleṣu kāraṇeṣu yugapad upalabdhayaḥ na bhavanti tatas vasīyate nūnam kāraṇa āndaram ebhiḥ apekṣyate

original: tac ca mana ity ākhyāyate //
analyzed: tat ca manaḥ iti ākhyāyate

original: nanu ca sugandhi śītalāṃ dīrghāṃ aśnantaḥ śuṣkaśaṣkulīm /
analyzed: nanu ca sugandhi śītalām dīrghām aśnantaḥ śuṣka śaṣkulīm

original: kapilabrāhmaṇās santi yugapat paṃcaguddhayaḥ //
analyzed: kapila brāhmaṇāḥ santi yugapad paṃca guddhayaḥ

original: api ca ayaṃ khalv adhyāpakaḥ adhīte vrajati kamaṇḍaluṃ dhārayati panthānaṃ paśyati śṛṇoty araṇyajān śabdān bibhyat vyālaliṅgāni bubhutsata iti kramāgrahaṇāt yugapad etā buddhayo 'sya bhavantīti na āśūtpatteḥ sūcyagrabhidyamānakokanadadalakadambakālavad atisūkṣmatvāt kālasya kramas tatra na vibhāvyate /
analyzed: api ca ayam khalu adhyāpakaḥ adhīte vrajati kamaṇḍalum dhārayati panthānam paśyati śṛṇoti araṇya jān śabdān bibhyat vyāla liṅgāni bubhutsate iti krama agrahaṇāt yugapad etāḥ buddhayaḥ sya bhavanti iti na āśu utpatteḥ sūci agra bhidyamāna kokanada dala kadamba kāla vat ati sūkṣma tvāt kālasya kramaḥ tatra na vibhāvyate

original: bhavitavyaṃ tu teneti //
analyzed: bhavitavyam tu tena iti

original: yadi kāraṇāntaranirapekṣacakṣurādikaraṇasādhyā eva rūpādiviṣayopalabdhayaḥ taduttarakālam upahatakaraṇānām api kathaṃ smaraṇādirūpas tadavamarśaḥ ato nūnaṃ nayanādivat karaṇāntaram avikalaṃ tadgrāhi vidyate //
analyzed: yadi kāraṇa antara nirapekṣa cakṣuḥ ādi karaṇa sādhyāḥ eva rūpa ādi viṣaya upalabdhayaḥ tad uttarakālam upahata karaṇānām api katham smaraṇa ādi rūpaḥ tad avamarśaḥ atas nūnam nayana ādi vat karaṇa antaram avikalam tad grāhi vidyate

original: avyāpakaṃ ca tat /
analyzed: a vyāpakam ca tat

original: vyāpitve na hi buddhīnāṃ yaugapadyaṃ nivartate /
analyzed: vyāpi tve na hi buddhīnām yaugapadyam nivartate

original: asti cāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ ukte 'pikyacidvacasi kvaced āha [nāham etad aśrauṣam anyatra me mano 'bhūt] iti /
analyzed: asti ca ayam vyavahāraḥ ukte pikyacit vacasi kva ced āha na aham etat aśrauṣam anyatra me manaḥ bhūt iti

original: tasmān na vyāpakaṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na vyāpakam manaḥ

original: pratiśarīram ekaṃ ca tadanekatve punar api jñānayaugapadyānapāyāt //
analyzed: pratiśarīram ekam ca tad aneka tve punar api jñāna yaugapadya anapāyāt

original: kriyāvac ca tat niṣkriyeṇendriyāṇām adhiṣṭhātum aśakyatvāt //
analyzed: kriyāvat ca tat niṣkriyeṇa indriyāṇām adhiṣṭhātum aśakya tvāt

original: mūrtaṃ ca tat amūrtasya kriyānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: mūrtam ca tat amūrtasya kriyā anupapatteḥ

original: mūrtatve sati nityaṃ ca tat niravayavattvāt anāśritatvāc ca murtatvaṃ tv anityatāyām aprayojakam iti vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: mūrta tve sati nityam ca tat niravayava tvāt anāśrita tvāt ca murta tvam tu anitya tāyām aprayojakam iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: niravayavaṃ ca tadavayavakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt //
analyzed: niravayavam ca tad avayava kalpanāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: vegavac ca tadāśusaṃcārāt /
analyzed: vegavat ca tad āśu saṃcārāt

original: āśusaṃcāramantareṇopalabdhiśaighryasya dṛṣṭasyānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: āśu saṃcāram antareṇa upalabdhi śaighryasya dṛṣṭasya anupapatteḥ

original: indriyasaṃyogi ca tat dravayatvāt //
analyzed: indriya saṃyogi ca tat dravaya tvāt

original: dravyaṃ ca tat vegādiguṇayogātkriyāvattvād anāśritatvāc ca //
analyzed: dravyam ca tat vega ādi guṇa yogāt kriyāvat tvāt anāśrita tvāt ca

original: acetanaṃ tat kāraṇatvāt itarathā hy ekatra śarīre cetanadvaya samāveśāt avyavahāraḥ syād iti /
analyzed: acetanam tat kāraṇa tvāt itarathā hi ekatra śarīre cetana dvaya samāveśāt avyavahāraḥ syāt iti

original: tasmād evaṃrūpaṃ manaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt evaṃrūpam manaḥ

original: sāṅkhyoktaṃ su tasya rūpam ayuktam iti tatprakriyāniṣedhād eva vyakhyātam //
analyzed: sāṅkhya uktam su tasya rūpam ayuktam iti tad prakriyā niṣedhāt eva vyakhyātam

original: anyāny api smṛtyanumānāgamasaṃśayapratibhāsvapnohajñānāni āntarasukhaduḥkhecchādveṣādiviṣayagrāhīṇi ca jñanāni manaso liṅgāni santy eva /
analyzed: anyāni api smṛti anumāna āgama saṃśaya pratibhā svapna ūha jñānāni āntara sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa ādi viṣaya grāhīṇi ca jñanāni manasaḥ liṅgāni santi eva

original: teṣāṃ bāhyendriyavyāpārasādhyatvāsaṃbhavāt karaṇarahitāyāś ca kriyābhinivṛtter adarśanād iti //
analyzed: teṣām bāhya indriya vyāpāra sādhya tva asaṃbhavāt karaṇa rahitāyāḥ ca kriyā abhinivṛtteḥ adarśanāt iti

original: smṛtis tāvan manojanyaiva /
analyzed: smṛtiḥ tāvat manaḥ janyā eva

original: anumānāgamajñāna. tu parokṣārthaviṣayatvāt mānasam /
analyzed: tu parokṣa artha viṣaya tvāt mānasam

original: saṃśayas tu mānaso 'pi kaścidvakṣyate /
analyzed: saṃśayaḥ tu kaścid vakṣyate

original: pratibhā manāsī darśitaiva[śvo me bhrātā ''gantā] iti /
analyzed: pratibhā manāsī darśitā eva aśvaḥ me bhrātā gantā iti

original: svapnajñānam uparatendriyagrāmasya bhavat kathaṃ nāma na mānasam //
analyzed: svapna jñānam uparata indriya grāmasya bhavat katham nāma na mānasam

original: tarko 'pi saṃśayavat kvaced viṣayaṃ mānaso bhavaty eva /
analyzed: saṃśaya vat kva ced viṣayam mānasaḥ bhavati eva

original: sukhādīnāṃ tu jñaptivat utpattir api manonibandhanaiva /
analyzed: sukha ādīnām tu jñapti vat utpattiḥ api manaḥ nibandhanā eva

original: kāryaṇāmātmaguṇānāu utpattau pratyāsannakāraṇāntarasaṃbhave 'pi ātmamanaśaṃyogasyāvadhṛtasāmarthyasyāsamavāyikāraṇatvāt /
analyzed: utpattau pratyāsanna kāraṇa antara saṃbhave pi ātma mana śaṃyogasya avadhṛta sāmarthyasya asamavāyi kāraṇa tvāt

original: ataś ca viṣayānubhavajanye 'pi sukhādau manaśaṃyogaḥ kāraṇam //
analyzed: atas ca viṣaya anubhava janye sukha ādau kāraṇam

original: sukhādīnāṃ ca bodhasvarūpatvaṃ svasaṃvedyatvaṃ ca nirastam /
analyzed: sukha ādīnām ca bodha svarūpa tvam sva saṃvedya tvam ca nirastam

original: atas tadupalabdhau manasa eva kāraṇatā //
analyzed: atas tad upalabdhau manasaḥ eva kāraṇa tā

original: tad idaṃ manaḥ pūrvakṛtaśubhāśubhakarmasaṃkāravatā ''tmā tadvaśād eva śarīradeśe saṃyogaṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: tat idam manaḥ pūrva kṛta śubha aśubha karma saṃkāravatā tmā tad vaśāt eva śarīra deśe saṃyogam pratipadyate

original: tatraiva ca jīvanavyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: tatra eva ca jīvana vyavahāraḥ

original: vipacyamānakarmāśayasahitaḥ ātmamanaśaṃyogo jīvanam iti hi vadanti /
analyzed: vipacyamāna karma āśaya sahitaḥ jīvanam iti hi vadanti

original: saṃyuktaṃcātmanā manaḥ teṣu teṣūpapattisthāneṣu nānāvidhabhogasādhanatayā saṃsārakāraṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: saṃyuktam ca ātmanā manaḥ teṣu teṣu upapatti sthāneṣu nānāvidha bhoga sādhanatayā saṃsāra kāraṇam bhavati

original: nityatvād ātmamanasoḥ anāditvāc ca saṃsārasya nedaṃ codanīyaṃprathamam eva kathaṃ ātmamanasos saṃyoga iti /
analyzed: nitya tvāt ātma manasoḥ anādi tvāt ca saṃsārasya na idam codanīyam prathamam eva katham ātma manasoḥ saṃyogaḥ iti

original: na hi prathamo nāma kaścit kālaḥ samastiādisargasyāpi pūrvasargasāpekṣatvāt /
analyzed: na hi prathamaḥ nāma kaścid kālaḥ samasti ādi sargasya api pūrva sarga sāpekṣa tvāt

original: īśvaro 'pi hi karmāpekṣa eva vicitrasya jagataḥ sraṣṭeti nirṇītam etad iti kṛtaṃ vistareṇa //
analyzed: īśvaraḥ u pi hi karma apekṣaḥ eva vicitrasya jagataḥ sraṣṭā iti nirṇītam etat iti kṛtam vistareṇa

original: vidadhatsukhādibhogaṃ vahac ca taralendriyāśvasārathitām /
analyzed: vidadhat sukha ādi bhogam vahat ca tarala indriya aśva sārathi tām

original: bandhanimittaṃ mana iti manasvinā yatnato heyam //
analyzed: bandha nimittam manaḥ iti manasvinā yatnataḥ heyam

original: iti buddhiparīkṣā pravṛttir vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhaḥ //1.2.27//
analyzed: iti buddhi parīkṣā pravṛttiḥ vāc buddhi śarīra ārambhaḥ

original: vāg iti varṇātmakaśabdakāraṇasaṃyogādyucyate nendriyam iti vyākhyātam /
analyzed: vāc iti varṇa ātmaka śabda kāraṇa saṃyoga ādi ucyate na indriyam iti vyākhyātam

original: buddhir iti mana ihocyate nopalabdhiḥ /
analyzed: buddhiḥ iti manaḥ iha ucyate na upalabdhiḥ

original: śarīraṃ prasiddham /
analyzed: śarīram prasiddham

original: teṣāṃ ārambhaḥ vyāpāraḥ tair vā ārambha iti sarvathā tadīyakriyā pravṛttir ity ucyate //
analyzed: teṣām ārambhaḥ vyāpāraḥ taiḥ vā ārambhaḥ iti sarvathā tadīya kriyā pravṛttiḥ iti ucyate

original: sā ca dvividhā puṇyā pāpikā ca /
analyzed: sā ca dvividhā puṇyā pāpikā ca

original: tatra pāpikā vācā caturvidhā manasā trividhā śarīreṇa trividhaiveti daśavidhā //
analyzed: tatra pāpikā vācā caturvidhā manasā trividhā śarīreṇa trividhā eva iti daśavidhā

original: vācā pravṛttis tatra anṛtaparuṣasūcanāsambaddhavacanarūpā caturvidhā //
analyzed: vācā pravṛttiḥ tatra anṛta paruṣa sūcana asambaddha vacana rūpā caturvidhā

original: paradohaparadravyābhilāṣanāstikyānudhyānarūpā trividhā manasā pravṛttiḥ //
analyzed: para doha para dravya abhilāṣa nāstikya anudhyāna rūpā trividhā manasā pravṛttiḥ

original: hiṃsāsteyapratiṣiddhamaithunācaraṇarūpā trividhā śarīreṇa pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: hiṃsā steya pratiṣiddha maithuna ācaraṇa rūpā trividhā śarīreṇa pravṛttiḥ

original: maithunagrahaṇaṃ evaṃprakārasurāpānādyupalakṣaṇārtham /
analyzed: maithuna grahaṇam evaṃprakāra surā pāna ādi upalakṣaṇa artham

original: seyaṃ daśavidhā pravṛtthiḥ anavaratamabhijvalato niratiśayaduḥkhavedanādāyino narakānalasyendhanam //
analyzed: sā iyam daśavidhā pravṛtthiḥ anavaratam abhijvalataḥ niratiśaya duḥkha vedanā dāyinaḥ naraka analasya indhanam

original: puṇyā 'pi satyapriyahitavacanasvādhyāyādhyayanarūpā caturvidhā vācā pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: puṇyā satya priya hita vacana svādhyāya adhyayana rūpā caturvidhā vācā pravṛttiḥ

original: japayajñe hi svādhyāyapāṭha evopāṃśunā antaśaṃjalpena vā //
analyzed: japa yajñe hi svādhyāya pāṭhe eva upāṃśunā antaśaṃjalpena vā

original: aspṛhā 'nukampāparalokaśraddhātmikā trividhā manasā pravṛttiḥ //
analyzed: aspṛhā nukampā apara loka śraddhā ātmikā trividhā manasā pravṛttiḥ

original: dānaparitrāṇaparicaraṇarūpā trividhā śarīreṇa pravṛttir atīyam api daśavidhaiva //
analyzed: dāna paritrāṇa paricaraṇa rūpā trividhā śarīreṇa pravṛttiḥ atīyam api daśavidhā eva

original: eṣā ca svargasadanadvārasopānakalpā //
analyzed: eṣā ca svarga sadana dvāra sopāna kalpā

original: seyam ubhayato viṃśatibhedā pravṛtthiḥ saṃkṣepato dvividhaiva vidhiniṣedhātmakatadavagamopāyabhedāt /
analyzed: sā iyam ubhayatas viṃśati bhedā pravṛtthiḥ saṃkṣepataḥ dvividhā eva vidhi niṣedha ātmaka tad avagama upāya bhedāt

original: vidhiniṣedhāvagamaśaraṇa eva hi sadasatkarmāvagamaḥ /
analyzed: vidhi niṣedha avagama śaraṇaḥ eva hi sat asat karma avagamaḥ

original: tatra vihitānuṣṭhānaṃ svargāya niṣiddhācaraṇaṃ narakāyety evaṃ sukhaduḥkhopabhogasthānaśarīrendriyādyabhisambadhanibandhanam eṣā pravṛttir bhavantī saṃsārasya paramaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: tatra vihita anuṣṭhānam svargāya niṣiddha ācaraṇam narakāya iti evam sukha duḥkha upabhoga sthāna śarīra indriya ādi abhisambadha nibandhanam eṣā pravṛttiḥ bhavantī saṃsārasya paramam kāraṇam bhavati

original: yo hy ayaṃ devam anuṣyatiryagyoniṣu śarīrasaṃsargaḥ yaś ca prativiṣayaṃ buddhisaṃsargaḥ yaś cātmanā saha manasas saṃsargaḥ sa sarvaḥ  pravṛtter eva pariṇāmavibhavaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ hi ayam devam anuṣya tiryagyoniṣu śarīra saṃsargaḥ yaḥ ca prati viṣayam buddhi saṃsargaḥ yaḥ ca ātmanā saha manasaḥ saṃsargaḥ sa sarvaḥ pravṛtteḥ eva pariṇāma vibhavaḥ

original: vṛtteś ca sarvasyāḥ kriyātvāt kṣaṇikatve 'pi tadupagato dharmādharmaśabdavācyaḥ ātmasaṃskāraḥ karmaphalopabhogaparyantasthitir asty eva /
analyzed: vṛtteḥ ca sarvasyāḥ kriyā tvāt kṣaṇika tve tad upagataḥ dharma adharma śabda vācyaḥ ātma saṃskāraḥ karma phala upabhoga paryanta sthitiḥ asti eva

original: na ca phalamadattvā dharmādharmau kṣīyete /
analyzed: na ca phalam a dattvā dharma adharmau kṣīyete

original: antyasukhaduḥkhasaṃvidvirodhinau hi dharmādharmāv udāharanti /
analyzed: antya sukha duḥkha saṃvid virodhinau hi dharma adharmau udāharanti

original: na ca jagati tathāvidhaṃ kim api kāryam asti vastu yan na dharmādharmābhyām anākṣiptasaṃbhavam iti taducchede mumukṣuṇā yatna āstheyaḥ //
analyzed: na ca jagati tathāvidham kim api kāryam asti vastu yat na dharma adharmābhyām an ākṣipta saṃbhavam iti tad ucchede mumukṣuṇā yatnaḥ āstheyaḥ

original: iti vitanutaḥ puṇyāpuṇyapravṛttisamudbhavau nigalavad imau dharmādharmau rujaṃ bhavabandhane /
analyzed: iti vitanutaḥ puṇya apuṇya pravṛtti samudbhavau nigala vat imau dharma adharmau rujam bhava bandhane

original: yadi niravadher duḥkhasyāntaṃ cikīrṣasi sarvathā parihara manovākkāyānāṃ pravṛttimanargalām //
analyzed: yadi niravadheḥ duḥkhasya antam cikīrṣasi sarvathā parihara manaḥ vāc kāyānām pravṛttim anargalām

original: sarvatanālakṣaṇā doṣāḥ //2.2.27//
analyzed: sarvatanā lakṣaṇāḥ doṣāḥ

original: pravartanā pravṛttiṃ prati prayojakatā /
sā lakṣaṇaṃ yeṣām aiti pravartanālakṣaṇā doṣāḥ /
analyzed: sā lakṣaṇam yeṣām aiti pravartanā lakṣaṇāḥ doṣāḥ

original: doṣaprayukto hi puruṣaḥ puṇye karmaṇi pāpe vā pravartate //
analyzed: doṣa prayuktaḥ hi puruṣaḥ puṇye karmaṇi pāpe vā pravartate

original: nanu pratyātmavedanīyatayā doṣāṇāṃ svarūpam aparokṣam eva /
analyzed: nanu pratyātma vedanīya tayā doṣāṇām svarūpam aparokṣam eva

original: tat kim artham eṣāṃ lakṣaṇato rūpaṃ nirūpyatesatyampratyātmavehanīyatve 'pi yad eṣaṃ pravartanālakṣaṇatvam upadiśyate tad anena rūpeṇa saṃsārakāraṇatvajñāpanārtham /
analyzed: tat kim artham eṣām lakṣaṇataḥ rūpam nirūpyate satyam pratyātma vehanīya tve yat pravartanā lakṣaṇa tvam upadiśyate tat anena rūpeṇa saṃsāra kāraṇa tva jñāpana artham

original: dharmādharmanirmito hi śarīrādiduḥkhādhiṣṭhānasaṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: dharma adharma nirmitaḥ hi śarīra ādi duḥkha adhiṣṭhāna saṃbandhaḥ

original: tadbījasya ca karmaṇaḥkāraṇadoṣāḥ karmaṇi pumāṃsaṃ pravartayanto bhavantīti pravartanālakṣaṇā ity uktāḥ //
analyzed: tad bījasya ca karmaṇaḥ kāraṇa doṣāḥ karmaṇi pumāṃsam pravartayantaḥ bhavanti iti pravartanā lakṣaṇāḥ iti uktāḥ

original: parasantānavartināṃ doṣāṇāṃ apratyakṣatvāt tatpratītaye pravartanālakṣaṇatvakathanam iti tvpavyākhyānamalpaprayojanakatvād iti //
analyzed: para santāna vartinām doṣāṇām apratyakṣa tvāt tad pratītaye pravartanā lakṣaṇa tva kathanam iti tu pa vyākhyānam alpa prayojanaka tvāt iti

original: teṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ trayo rāśayo bhavanti rāgaḥ dveṣaḥ mohaḥ iti /
analyzed: teṣām doṣāṇām trayaḥ rāśayaḥ bhavanti rāgaḥ dveṣaḥ mohaḥ iti

original: tatrānukūleṣv artheṣu abhilāṣalakṣaṇo rāgaḥpratikūleṣv asahanalakṣaṇaḥ dveṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatra anukūleṣu artheṣu abhilāṣa lakṣaṇaḥ rāgaḥ pratikūleṣu a sahana lakṣaṇaḥ dveṣaḥ

original: vastupāramārthyāparicchedalakṣaṇo mithyādhyavasāyo mohaḥ //
nanu ca īrṣyāsūyālobhamānamadamatsarādidoṣāntarasaṃbhavāt kathaṃ tatra eva doṣāḥ naīrṣyādīnāṃ yathānirdiṣṭeṣv evāntarbhāvāt //
analyzed: nanu ca īrṣyā asūyā lobha māna mada matsara ādi doṣa antara saṃbhavāt katham tatra eva doṣāḥ na īrṣyā ādīnām yathā nirdiṣṭeṣu eva antarbhāvāt

original: kāmaḥ matsaraḥ spṛhā tṛṣṇā lobha iti paṃcaprakāro rāgapakṣaḥ /
analyzed: kāmaḥ matsaraḥ spṛhā tṛṣṇā lobhaḥ iti paṃca prakāraḥ rāga pakṣaḥ

original: strīsaṃyogecchā kāmaḥ /
analyzed: strī saṃyoga icchā kāmaḥ

original: yad anyasmai nivedyamānam api vastu dhanavan na kṣīyate tadaparityāgecchā matsaraḥ /
analyzed: yat anyasmai nivedyamānam api vastu dhanavat na kṣīyate tad a parityāga icchā matsaraḥ

original: anātmīyavastvāditsā spṛhā /
punarbhavaprati sandhānahetubhūtecchā tṛṣṇā /
analyzed: punarbhava prati sandhāna hetu bhūtā icchā tṛṣṇā

original: niṣiddhadravyagrahaṇecchā lobha ity abhilāṣaprakārabhedāt rāgapakṣa evāyam //
analyzed: niṣiddha dravya grahaṇa icchā lobhaḥ iti abhilāṣa prakāra bhedāt rāga pakṣaḥ eva ayam

original: dveṣapakṣo 'pi paṃcavidhaḥ krodherṣyāsūyā droho 'rmaṣa iti /
analyzed: dveṣa pakṣaḥ pi paṃcavidhaḥ krodha īrṣyā asūyā drohaḥ rmaṣaḥ iti

original: akṣibhvrādivikārahetuḥ prajvalanātmakaḥ drodhaḥ /
analyzed: akṣi bhvra ādi vikāra hetuḥ prajvalana ātmakaḥ drodhaḥ

original: sādhāraṇe 'pi vastuni parasya darśanādyasahanaṃ īrṣyā /
analyzed: sādhāraṇe pi vastuni parasya darśana ādya sahanam īrṣyā

original: paraguṇeṣv akṣamā asūyā /
analyzed: para guṇeṣu akṣamā asūyā

original: parāpakāraḥ drohaḥ /
analyzed: parāpakāraḥ drohaḥ

original: adarśitamukhādivikāraḥ paraṃ prati manyuḥ amarṣaḥ iti asahanaprakārabhedādeṣadveṣapakṣaḥ //
analyzed: adarśita mukha ādi vikāraḥ param prati manyuḥ amarṣaḥ iti asahana prakāra bhedāt eṣa dveṣa pakṣaḥ

original: mohapakṣas tu caturvidhaḥmithyājñānaṃ vicikitsā mānaḥ pramāda iti /
analyzed: moha pakṣaḥ tu caturvidhaḥ mithyājñānam vicikitsā mānaḥ pramādaḥ iti

original: ataṃsmistad iti jñānaṃ mithyājñānam /
analyzed: iti jñānam mithyājñānam

original: kiṃ sviditi vimarśo vicikitsā /
analyzed: kim svid iti vimarśaḥ vicikitsā

original: asadguṇādhyāropeṇa svotkarṣabuddhirmānaḥ /
analyzed: asat guṇa adhyāropeṇa sva utkarṣa buddhiḥ mānaḥ

original: kriyadetadityavajñayā katavyākaraṇaṃ pramādaḥ /
analyzed: kriyat etat iti avajñayā kata vyākaraṇam pramādaḥ

original: sa eva mada ityākhyāyate /
analyzed: saḥ eva madaḥ iti ākhyāyate

original: so 'yaṃ tattvāparijñānaprakārabhedān mohapakṣaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ yam tattva aparijñāna prakāra bhedāt moha pakṣaḥ

original: evaṃ traya. evaite doṣāḥ /
analyzed: evam trayaḥ eva ete doṣāḥ

original: śokaharṣau tu mukhaduḥkhe ucyate na doṣāntaram /
analyzed: śoka harṣau tu mukha duḥkhe ucyate na doṣa antaram

original: teṣāṃ tu mohaḥ pāpatamaḥ itarayos tu tadadhīnātmalābhatvāt /
analyzed: teṣām tu mohaḥ pāpatamaḥ itarayoḥ tu tad adhīna ātmalābha tvāt

original: mūḍhasya hi rāgadveṣau bhavataḥ mithyāsaṃkalpād utpadyamānayor anubhavāt /
analyzed: mūḍhasya hi rāga dveṣau bhavataḥ mithyā saṃkalpāt utpadyamānayoḥ anubhavāt

original: kusaṃkalpaś ca mithyājñānaprakṛtiḥ /
analyzed: kusaṃkalpaḥ ca mithyā jñāna prakṛtiḥ

original: evaṃ mithyājñānasyaiva bhagavataḥ sarvam idaṃ vilasitaṃ yo 'yam anekaprakāraḥ saṃsāraduḥkhabhāraḥ //
analyzed: evam mithyājñānasya eva bhagavataḥ sarvam idam vilasitam yaḥ yam aneka prakāraḥ saṃsāra duḥkha bhāraḥ

original: yady evaṃ na tarhi mohasya doṣatvam doṣakāraṇatvād itinatallakṣaṇā napayāt /
analyzed: yadi evam na tarhi mohasya doṣa tvam doṣa kāraṇa tvāt iti na tad lakṣaṇā

original: saty api doṣāntarahetutve svayam api puruṣapravṛttiprayojakatvalakṣaṇayogāt rāgavat doṣatvaṃ na moho 'pi jahāti /
analyzed: sati api doṣa antara hetu tve svayam api puruṣa pravṛtti prayojaka tva lakṣaṇa yogāt rāga vat doṣa tvam na jahāti

original: ta ime doṣāḥ saṃsārahetava iti yatnataḥ śamanīyāḥ //
analyzed: te ime doṣāḥ saṃsāra hetavaḥ iti yatnataḥ śamanīyāḥ

original: kathaṃ punar amī śamayituṃ śakyāḥuktam atranākasmikāḥ na nityāḥ nājñātaśamanopāyaḥ na cāśakyapratikriyā iti /
analyzed: katham punar amī śamayitum śakyāḥ uktam atra na ākasmikāḥ na nityāḥ na ajñāta śamana upāyaḥ na ca aśakya pratikriyāḥ iti

original: vistarataś caitadapavaigāhinake parīkṣyate /
analyzed: vistarataḥ ca etat apavaigāhinake parīkṣyate

original: mithyājñānanimittāḥ khalv ete doṣāḥ /
analyzed: mithyājñāna nimittāḥ khalu ete doṣāḥ

original: tasmin samyagjñānaprabhāvanihate hetor abhāvān na bhavanty eveti //
analyzed: tasmin samyak jñāna prabhāva nihate hetoḥ abhāvāt na bhavanti eva iti

original: nanu evaṃ prasavavināśakāraṇayor ekatvāt eka eva doṣo bhaved iti tritvaṃ hīyate na anubhavasiddhabhedatvāt /
analyzed: nanu evam prasava vināśa kāraṇayoḥ eka tvāt ekaḥ eva doṣaḥ bhavet iti tri tvam hīyate na anubhava siddha bheda tvāt

original: anubhūyate hi rāgadveṣamohānām itaretaravibhaktaṃ svarūpam /
analyzed: anubhūyate hi rāga dveṣa mohānām itaretara vibhaktam svarūpam

original: kāraṇaikatvaṃ tu na prayojakam ekasmād eva jvalanasaṃyogāt utpadyamānānāṃ vinaśyatāṃ ca pārthivapadārthavṛttīnāṃ gandharasarūpasparśānāṃ nānātvadarśanāt /
analyzed: kāraṇa eka tvam tu na prayojakam ekasmāt eva jvalana saṃyogāt utpadyamānānām vinaśyatām ca pārthiva padārtha vṛttīnām gandha rasa rūpa sparśānām nānātva darśanāt

original: ataḥ sūktaṃ doṣaṇāṃ trairāśyam iti //
analyzed: atas sūktam doṣaṇām trairāśyam iti

original: saṃsārakārābhavanapraveśamārgās ta ete traya eva doṣāḥ /
analyzed: saṃsāra kārā bhavana praveśa mārgāḥ te ete trayaḥ eva doṣāḥ

original: eṣāṃ prahāṇodyamamādadhānaḥ na janmamṛtyū punar abhyupaiti //
analyzed: eṣām prahāṇa udyamam ādadhānaḥ na janma mṛtyū punar abhyupaiti

original: punar utpattiḥ pretyabhāvaḥ //1.1.17//
analyzed: punar utpattiḥ pretyabhāvaḥ

original: kasyeyaṃ punarutpattir ucyate ātmanaḥ śarīrasya vātatrātmano nityatvād yupattir eva nāsti kā kathā punaśśabdārthasyaśarīrasya tu utupattir asti na tu paunaḥpunyena /
analyzed: kasya iyam punarutpattiḥ ucyate ātmanaḥ śarīrasya vā eva na asti kā kathā punar śabda arthasya śarīrasya tu asti na tu paunaḥpunyena

original: na hi mṛtaṃ śarīraṃ tad eva punarutpadyate /
analyzed: na hi mṛtam śarīram tat eva punar utpadyate

original: tasmāt punarutpattiḥ pretyabhāva ityavācakaṃ sūtramucyatepunaśśabdārthasya yatnata upadiṣṭasya parihartuṃ aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: tasmāt punarutpattiḥ pretyabhāvaḥ iti avācakam sūtram ucyate punar śabda arthasya yatnataḥ upadiṣṭasya parihartum aśakya tvāt

original: tasyaiva nirvedotpādadvārakāpavargopayogayogyopadeśatvāt /
analyzed: tasya eva nirveda utpāda dvārakā apavarga upayoga yogya upadeśa tvāt

original: ātmanaś ca sthāyitvena kriyābhyāvṛttisaṃbhavāt tasyaiva punaḥ punarutpatti brumaḥ /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca sthāyi tvena kriyā abhyāvṛtti saṃbhavāt tasya eva punar punarutpatti brumaḥ

original: utpattivanmaraṇam api /
analyzed: utpatti vat maraṇam api

original: so 'yam ātmana eva mṛtvā punarjanma pretyabhāva iti //
analyzed: saḥ yam ātmanaḥ eva mṛtvā punarjanma pretyabhāvaḥ iti

original: nanu janmamaraṇe ubhe api nityatvād ātmanaḥ na saṃstaḥ ity uktam satyamśarīrādisaṃyogaviyogayos tu tathābhidhānān na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: nanu janma maraṇe ubhe api nitya tvāt ātmanaḥ na saṃstaḥ iti uktam satyam śarīra ādi saṃyoga viyogayoḥ tu tathā abhidhānāt na doṣaḥ

original: maraṇaṃ ātmanaḥ bhogāyatanadehendriyādiviyoga ucyate /
analyzed: maraṇam ātmanaḥ bhoga āyatana deha indriya ādi viyogaḥ ucyate

original: janma tu tatsaṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: janma tu tad saṃbandhaḥ

original: te ete vipacyamānakarmāśayānurūpeṇa dehendriyādityāgopādāne eva maraṇajanmanī kriyābhyāvṛttyā bhavantī pretyabhāva ity ucyate /
analyzed: te ete vipacyamāna karma āśaya anurūpeṇa deha indriya ādi tyāga upādāne eva maraṇa janmanī kriyā abhyāvṛttyā bhavantī pretyabhāvaḥ iti ucyate

original: sa eva ca saṃsāraḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva ca saṃsāraḥ

original: tad ittham anudhyāyataḥ kasya sacetaso nirvedo nodiyāt /
analyzed: tat ittham anudhyāyataḥ kasya sa cetasaḥ nirvedaḥ na udiyāt

original: tad uktam jarāviyogamaraṇavyādhās tāvad āsatām /
analyzed: tat uktam jarā viyoga maraṇa vyādhāḥ tāvat āsatām

original: janmaiva kiṃ na dhīrasya bhūyo bhūyastrapākram //
analyzed: janma eva kim na dhīrasya bhūyas bhūyas trapā kram

original: atha yair utpadyamānair dehendriyādibhirātmanaḥ saṃbandhaḥ teṣāṃ katham utpattir ity uktaṃ sūtrakṛtā[vyaktān vyaktānām utpattiḥ pratyakṣaprāmāṇyāt]  iti /
analyzed: atha yaiḥ utpadyamānaiḥ deha indriya ādibhiḥ ātmanaḥ saṃbandhaḥ teṣām katham utpattiḥ iti uktam sūtrakṛtā avyaktān vyaktānām utpattiḥ pratyakṣa prāmāṇyāt iti

original: vyaktād iti kāpilābhyupagatatriguṇātmakāvyaktarūpakāraṇaniṣedhena paramāṇūnāṃ śarīrādau kārye kāraṇatvam āha //
analyzed: vyaktāt iti kāpila abhyupagata triguṇa ātmaka avyakta rūpa kāraṇa niṣedhena paramāṇūnām śarīra ādau kārye kāraṇa tvam āha

original: tathā hipārthivaṃ āpyaṃ taijasaṃ vāyavīyam iti caturvidham idaṃ kāryaṃ svāvayavāśritam upalabhyate /
analyzed: tathā hi pārthivam āpyam taijasam vāyavīyam iti caturvidham idam kāryam sva avayava āśritam upalabhyate

original: tatra yathā ghaṭaḥ sāvayavaḥ kapāleṣv āśritaḥ evaṃ kapālāny api sāvayavatvāt tadavayaveṣu tadavayavā api tadavayavāntareṣu ity evaṃ tāvat yāvat paramāṇavo niravayavā iti/
analyzed: tatra yathā ghaṭaḥ sa avayavaḥ kapāleṣu āśritaḥ evam kapālāni api sa avayava tvāt tad avayaveṣu tad avayavāḥ api tad avayava antareṣu iti evam tāvat yāvat paramāṇavaḥ niravayavāḥ iti

original: yatra yāvataḥ kāryajātasya svāvayavāśritasya pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇaṃ tatra tad eva pramāṇam /
analyzed: yatra yāvataḥ kārya jātasya sva avayava āśritasya pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam tatra tat eva pramāṇam

original: tata ūrdhvam anumānam //
analyzed: tatas ūrdhvam anumānam

original: tad api hi kāryaṃ svāvayavāśritam sāvayavatvāt paridṛśyamānakāryavat /
analyzed: tat api hi kāryam sva avayava āśritam sa avayava tvāt paridṛśyamāna kārya vat

original: niravayatve tu tasya paramāṇutvam eva /
analyzed: niravaya tve tu tasya paramāṇu tvam eva

original: paramāṇuṣu ca sāvayavatvasya ca hetor asiddhatvān nāvayavāntarakalpanā /
analyzed: paramāṇuṣu ca sāvayava tvasya ca hetoḥ asiddha tvāt na avayava antara kalpanā

original: teṣāṃ hi sāvayavatve tadavayavāḥ paramāṇavo bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: teṣām hi sa avayava tve tad avayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: na te utpattikramavat vināśakrameṇāpi paramāṇavo 'numīyate /
analyzed: na te utpatti krama vat vināśa krameṇa api paramāṇavaḥ numīyate

original: loṣṭasya pravibhajyamānasya bhāgāḥ tadbhāgānāṃ ca bhāgāntarāṇīty evaṃ tāvat yāvad aśakyabhaṅgatvam adarśanaviṣayatvaṃ ca bhavati /
analyzed: loṣṭasya pravibhajyamānasya bhāgāḥ tad bhāgānām ca bhāga antarāṇi iti evam tāvat yāvat aśakya bhaṅga tvam adarśana viṣaya tvam ca bhavati

original: tad yataḥ paramavayavabhāgo na saṃbhavati te paramāṇava ucyante /
analyzed: tat yatas param avayava bhāgaḥ na saṃbhavati te paramāṇavaḥ ucyante

original: teṣv api hi vibhajyamāneṣu tadavayavāḥ paramāṇavo bhaveyur na tena tad etad evaṃ utpattikramavat vināśakramasyedṛśo darśanāt santi paramāṇavaḥ //
analyzed: teṣu api hi vibhajyamāneṣu tad avayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ bhaveyuḥ na tena tat etat evam utpatti krama vat vināśa kramasya īdṛśaḥ darśanāt santi paramāṇavaḥ

original: atra hi trayī gatiḥ /
analyzed: atra hi trayī gatiḥ

original: asya ghaṭādeḥ kāryasya niravayavatvam eva vā avayavānantyaṃ vā paramāṇvantatā vātatra niravayavatvam anupapannam avayavānāṃ paṭe tantūnāṃ ghaṭe ca kapālānāṃ pratyakṣam upalambhāt /
analyzed: asya ghaṭa ādeḥ kāryasya niravayava tvam eva vā avayava ānantyam vā paramāṇu anta tā vā tatra niravayava tvam anupapannam avayavānām paṭe tantūnām ghaṭe ca kapālānām pratyakṣam upalambhāt

original: anantāvayavayogitvam api na yuktam merusarṣapayor anantāvayavayogitvāviśeṣeṇa tulyaparimāṇatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: ananta avayava yogi tvam api na yuktam meru sarṣapayoḥ ananta avayava yogi tva aviśeṣeṇa tulya parimāṇa tva prasaṅgāt

original: tasmāt paramāṇvantataiva yuktimatī //
analyzed: tasmāt paramāṇu anta tā eva yuktimatī

original: sa ime paramāṇavaḥ cetanecchāpreraṇam antareṇa viśiṣṭakramakam itaretarasaṅghaṭanamalabhamānāḥ kāryasiddhaye na paryāpnuyuḥ acetanatvād iti cetana eṣām adhiṣṭhānā sakalabhuvananirmāṇa nipuṇama tirīśvaro 'bhyupagataḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ime paramāṇavaḥ cetana icchā preraṇam antareṇa viśiṣṭa kramakam itaretara saṅghaṭanam alabhamānāḥ kārya siddhaye na paryāpnuyuḥ acetana tvāt iti cetanaḥ eṣām adhiṣṭhānā sakala bhuvana nirmāṇa abhyupagataḥ

original: tatsiddhaye ca sakalakutarkatimiratiraskārapūrvakaṃ pūrvaṃ eva niravadyam anumānam upapāditam //
analyzed: tad siddhaye ca sakala kutarka timira tiraskāra pūrvakam pūrvam eva niravadyam anumānam upapāditam

original: īśvaro 'pi nānekātmavṛttivipākonmukhadharmādharmasaṃskāravaicitryam ananurudhyamanaḥ vicitrasya jatago janma nirmātum arhatīty etad api darśitam //
analyzed: īśvaraḥ pi na aneka ātma vṛtti vipāka unmukha dharma adharma saṃskāra vaicitryam vicitrasya jatagaḥ janma nirmātum arhati iti etat api darśitam

original: na ca sakṛd eva sarve nirvartyamānakāryaparimāṇānuguṇasaṅkhyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ ekatra saṃyojya kāryam ārabhante kin tu dvyaṇukādiprakrameṇa /
analyzed: na ca sakṛt eva sarve nirvartyamāna kārya parimāṇa anuguṇa saṅkhyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ ekatra saṃyojya kāryam ārabhante kin tu dvyaṇuka ādi prakrameṇa

original: sakṛdārambhe hi kumbhe bhajyamāne kapālaśarkarākaṇacūrṇādikramam apahāya prathamam eva parāmāṇvantatā bhavetsarvasaṃyogasya sarvavibhāgena sahasaeva vināśāt /
analyzed: sakṛt ārambhe hi kumbhe bhajyamāne kapāla śarkarā kaṇa cūrṇa ādi kramam apahāya prathamam eva parām aṇu anta tā bhavet sarva saṃyogasya sarva vibhāgena sahasā eva vināśāt

original: ataś ca karparādikramadarśanaṃ virudhyeta /
analyzed: atas ca karpara ādi krama darśanam virudhyeta

original: avinaṣṭe 'pi paṭādau tantvādyavayavāśritatvam upalabhyamānaṃ kathaṃ vā samarthyetaparamāṇūnām apratyakṣatvena tadāśritatvasya grahītum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: a vinaṣṭe pi paṭa ādau tantu ādi avayava āśrita tvam upalabhyamānam katham vā samarthyeta paramāṇūnām apratyakṣa tvena tad āśrita tvasya grahītum aśakya tvāt

original: paramāṇūnāṃ ghaṭasya ca madhye kāryāntarānārambhād iti /
analyzed: paramāṇūnām ghaṭasya ca madhye kārya antara anārambhāt iti

original: tasmāt dvyaṇukādiprakrameṇa paramāṇavaḥ kāryamārabhante //
analyzed: tasmāt dvi aṇuka ādi prakrameṇa paramāṇavaḥ kāryam ārabhante

original: nanu dvādveva paramāṇū prathamaṃ saṃghaṭete ity atra kā yuktirucyate bahutvasaṃkhyāyāḥ mahatparimāṇakāraṇatvadarśanāt kriṣu paramāṇuṣu prathamaṃ milatsu tatkārye bahutvasaṃkhyāyāḥ mahattvārambhakatvāt tatpratyakṣatvaṃ prasajyeta /
analyzed: nanu dvādveva paramāṇū prathamam saṃghaṭete iti atra kā yuktiḥ ucyate bahu tva saṃkhyāyāḥ mahat parimāṇa kāraṇa tva darśanāt kriṣu paramāṇuṣu prathamam milatsu tad kārye bahu tva saṃkhyāyāḥ mahat tva ārambhaka tvāt tad pratyakṣa tvam prasajyeta

original: na ca tatpratyakṣatvam atisūkṣmatvāt /
analyzed: na ca tad pratyakṣa tvam ati sūkṣma tvāt

original: ato dvābhyāṃ paramāṇubhyāṃ dvyaṇukam ādāv utpadyate //
analyzed: atas dvābhyām paramāṇubhyām dvyaṇukam ādau utpadyate

original: tac ca paramāṇuvadapratyakṣam eva mahattvānutpādāt /
analyzed: tat ca paramāṇu vat apratyakṣam eva mahat tva anutpādāt

original: dvyaṇukadvayena tu kāryārambha iṣyamāṇe tadaviśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ dvyaṇuka iva tatrāpi mahattvotpattau kāraṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: dvyaṇuka dvayena tu kārya ārambhe iṣyamāṇe tad aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ dvyaṇuke iva tatra api mahat tva utpattau kāraṇa abhāvāt

original: ataḥ kribhir dvyaṇukaiḥ tryaṇukam ārabhyate /
analyzed: atas kribhiḥ dvi aṇukaiḥ tri aṇukam ārabhyate

original: tatra ca bahutvasaṃkhyayā mahattvam apy ārapsyate pratyakṣatvaṃ ca bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tatra ca bahu tva saṃkhyayā mahat tvam api ārapsyate pratyakṣa tvam ca bhaviṣyati

original: tataḥ paraṃ tu kramasāmānye pramāṇam asti loṣṭādibhaṅge svāvayavakhaṇḍāvayavadarśanam /
analyzed: tatas param tu krama sāmānye pramāṇam asti loṣṭa ādi bhaṅge sva avayava khaṇḍa avayava darśanam

original: kramaviśeṣe tu pramāṇaṃ nāsti ittham ārambha iti /
analyzed: krama viśeṣe tu pramāṇam na asti ittham ārambhaḥ iti

original: yatra vā darśanam asti tatra tad astu kramaviṃśeṣe pramāṇam iti //
analyzed: yatra vā darśanam asti tatra tat astu krama viṃśeṣe pramāṇam iti

original: ārabhyārambhakatvaṃ teṣyate mūrtānāṃ samānadeśatvavirodhāt /
analyzed: ārabhya ārambhaka tvam teṣām iṣyate mūrtānām samāna deśa tva virodhāt

original: na hi paramāṇavaḥ prathamaṃ kāryam ārabhya tad anu ta evottarottarakālaṃ kāryāṇy ārabhante /
analyzed: na hi paramāṇavaḥ prathamam kāryam ārabhya tat anu te eva uttara uttara kālam kāryāṇi ārabhante

original: kin tu yatparamāṇunirvṛttaṃ kāryaṃ dvyaṇukaṃ tat kāryāntarasyārambhakam tad apy antasya kāryaṇyety evaṃ tāvat yāvat paripūrṇāvayaviniṣpattiḥ //
analyzed: kin tu yat paramāṇu nirvṛttam kāryam dvyaṇukam tat kārya antarasya ārambhakam tat api antasya evam tāvat yāvat paripūrṇa avayavi niṣpattiḥ

original: itthaṃ ca tantubhiḥ paṭaḥ kriyate na tantvavayavair aṃśubhiḥitarathā hy anuttarottarakāryārambhe 'pi pūrvapūrvakāraṇānapāyāt mūrtānām ekadeśatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: ittham ca tantubhiḥ paṭaḥ kriyate na tantu avayavaiḥ aṃśubhiḥ itarathā hi anuttara uttara kārya ārambhe pi pūrva pūrva kāraṇa anapāyāt mūrtānām eka deśa tvam syāt

original: na ca taddṛśyata iti yathokta eva kramaḥ śreyān //
analyzed: na ca tat dṛśyate iti yathā uktaḥ eva kramaḥ śreyān

original: tad evam anekātmasamavetadharmādharmasaṃskāraparipākānurūpaprasaradīśvarecchāpreryamāṇaparamāṇukriyānupūrvīnirvartyamānadvyaṇukādikāryaprakrameṇa śarīrādyavayavinirvṛttir iti sthitam //
analyzed: tat evam aneka ātma samaveta dharma adharma saṃskāra paripāka anurūpa prasarat īśvara icchā preryamāṇa paramāṇu kriyā ānupūrvī nirvartyamāna dvyaṇuka ādi kārya prakrameṇa śarīra ādi avayavi nirvṛttiḥ iti sthitam

original: etadviparītāni tu matāntarāṇi pramāṇaviruddhāni /
analyzed: etad viparītāni tu mata antarāṇi pramāṇa viruddhāni

original: tathāhinityam eva śarīrādi anutpattidharmakam iti pratyakṣaviruddham /
analyzed: tathā hi nityam eva śarīra ādi anutpatti dharmakam iti pratyakṣa viruddham

original: pṛthivyāder apy avayavasanniveśaviśiṣṭatvāt kāryatvam īśvarasiddhau nirṇītam //
ākāsmikatvam api śarīrādeḥ kāryasya na yuktamkāraṇaniyamopalambhāt animittāyāś ca bhāvotpatter anupapatteḥ //
analyzed: ākāsmika tvam api śarīra ādeḥ kāryasya na yuktam kāraṇa niyama upalambhāt animittāyāḥ ca bhāva utpatteḥ anupapatteḥ

original: abhāvāt bhāvotpattir api tādṛg eva //
analyzed: abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ api tādṛś eva

original: triguṇātmakapradhānavikāramahadahaṅkādikāraṇakatvam api kāryasya pṛthivyādeḥ prāg eva pratiṣiddham //
analyzed: triguṇa ātmaka pradhāna vikāra mahat ahaṅkā ādi kāraṇaka tvam api kāryasya pṛthivī ādeḥ prāk eva pratiṣiddham

original: anārabdhāvayavirūpakāryāḥ paramāṇava evaite saṃcayaviśiṣṭās santaḥ lokayātrāṃ vahantīty etad api na samīcīnamsaṃcayasya bhedābhedavikalpābhyāṃ anupapadyamānatvāt paramāṇūnāṃ cātisaukṣmyādapratyakṣatvāt //
analyzed: anārabdha avayavi rūpa kāryāḥ paramāṇavaḥ eva ete saṃcaya viśiṣṭāḥ santaḥ lokayātrām vahanti iti etat api na samīcīnam saṃcayasya bheda abheda vikalpābhyām anupapadyamāna tvāt paramāṇūnām ca ati saukṣmyāt apratyakṣa tvāt

original: paudgalikakāryapakṣe 'pi paryāyāntareṇa paramāṇūnāṃ kathanam apramāṇakatvaṃ vā //
analyzed: paudgalika kārya pakṣe pi paryāya antareṇa paramāṇūnām kathanam apramāṇaka tvam vā

original: śabdavivartatvaṃ tadanugamāgrahaṇādanupapannam //
analyzed: śabda vivarta tvam tad anugama agrahaṇāt anupapannam

original: paramātmopādānatvam api na saṃbhavati tasyaiva niṣpramāṇakatvāt //
analyzed: paramātma upādāna tvam api na saṃbhavati tasya eva niṣpramāṇaka tvāt

original: na ca [na kadācidanīdṛśaṃ jagat]iti pādaprasārikāmānnaṃ kartum ucitamsargapralayaprabandhasya samarthitatvād iti //
analyzed: na ca na kadācid anīdṛśam kartum ucitam sarga pralaya prabandhasya samarthita tvāt iti

original: ataś ca pakṣāntaradurbalatvāt yathoditaḥ siddhyati bhūtasargaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca pakṣa antara durbala tvāt yathā uditaḥ siddhi ati bhūta sargaḥ

original: taṃ yas tu paśyann api nihnuvīta tasmai namaḥ paṇḍitaśekharāya //
analyzed: tam yaḥ tu paśyan api nihnuvīta tasmai namaḥ paṇḍitaśekharāya

original: anādau saṃsāre sthitam idam aho mūḍhamanasāṃ janitvā jantūnāṃ maraṇam atha mṛtvāpi jananam /
analyzed: anādau saṃsāre sthitam idam aho mūḍha manasām janitvā jantūnām maraṇam atha mṛtvā api jananam

original: iyaṃ sā duḥkhānāṃ saraṇir iti saṃcintya kṛtinā nidhatavyaṃ ceto jananamaraṇocchedini pade //
analyzed: iyam sā duḥkhānām saraṇiḥ iti saṃcintya kṛtinā nidhatavyam cetaḥ janana maraṇa ucchedini pade

original: !pravṛttidoṣajanito 'rthaḥ phalam //1.1.20//
analyzed: pravṛtti doṣa janitaḥ rthaḥ phalam

original: pravṛttidoṣās tu vyākhyātāḥ /
analyzed: pravṛtti doṣāḥ tu vyākhyātāḥ

original: tajjanito 'rthaḥ phalam ity ucyate /
analyzed: tad janitaḥ rthaḥ phalam iti ucyate

original: arthapadagrahaṇaṃ gauṇamukhyabhedapradarśanārtham /
analyzed: artha pada grahaṇam gauṇa mukhya bheda pradarśana artham

original: sukhaduḥkhe mukhyaṃ phalaṃ /
analyzed: sukha duḥkhe mukhyam phalam

original: tatsādhanaṃ tu śarīrendriyaviṣayādi gauṇam /
analyzed: tad sādhanam tu śarīra indriya viṣaya ādi gauṇam

original: sarvaṃ hīdaṃ pravṛttidoṣākṣiptaṃ phalam ity uktam /
analyzed: sarvam hi idam pravṛtti doṣa ākṣiptam phalam iti uktam

original: tad idam anādinā prabandhena pravartamānaṃ phalaṃ punaḥ punar upabhujyata iti mahataḥ khedasya hetur iti bhāvyamānaṃ nirvedavairāgyādimārgaṇāpavargopayogitāṃ pratipadyate //
analyzed: tat idam anādinā prabandhena pravartamānam phalam punar punar upabhujyate iti mahataḥ khedasya hetuḥ iti bhāvyamānam nirveda vairāgya ādi mārgaṇa apavarga upayogi tām pratipadyate

original: āttam āttaṃ vijahataḥ tyaktaṃ tyaktaṃ ca gṛhṇataḥ /
analyzed: āttam āttam vijahataḥ tyaktam tyaktam ca gṛhṇataḥ

original: puṃsaḥ phalaghaṭīyantraṃ aho kaṣṭaḥ pariśramaḥ //
analyzed: puṃsaḥ phala ghaṭīyantram aho kaṣṭaḥ pariśramaḥ

original: tat punaḥ phalaṃ karmaṇā kiṃ sadya eva saṃpadyate kālāntareṇa vā ucyatedvividhaṃ karmavihitaṃ niṣiddhaṃ ca /
analyzed: tat punar phalam karmaṇā kim sadyas eva saṃpadyate kāla antareṇa vā ucyate dvividham karma vihitam niṣiddham ca

original: tatra vidhiphalānāṃ kālaniyamo nāsti /
analyzed: tatra vidhi phalānām kāla niyamaḥ na asti

original: kriyāphalaṃ hi [dogdhi] [pacati] iti samanantaram utpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
analyzed: kriyā phalam hi dogdhi pacati iti samanantaram utpadyamānam dṛśyate

original: vidhiphalānāṃ tu naiva niyama iti śabdaparīkṣāyāṃ citrākṣepaparihārāvasarenirūpitam etat //
analyzed: vidhi phalānām tu nā eva niyamaḥ iti śabda parīkṣāyām etat

original: vidhiphalam api ca kiñcana codanāvacanaparyalocanayā sadya iti niścīyate vṛṣṭir iva kārīryāḥ /
analyzed: vidhi phalam api ca kiñcana codanā vacana parya locanayā sadyas iti niścīyate vṛṣṭiḥ iva kārīryāḥ

original: kiñcit aihikaphalam api karma vastubalāt kālāntarāpekṣaṃ bhavati putreṣṭyādi /
analyzed: kiñcid aihika phalam api karma vastu balāt kāla antara apekṣam bhavati putra iṣṭi ādi

original: na hi sahasaiva nidhilābhavat putralābhaḥ saṃbhavati sargasaṃbhavahetubhūtabhāryāparirambhaṇādikramāpekṣatvāt //
analyzed: na hi sahasā eva nidhi lābha vat putra lābhaḥ saṃbhavati sarga saṃbhava hetu bhūta bhāryā parirambhaṇa ādi krama apekṣa tvāt

original: jyotiṣṭomādi tu svargaphalaṃ karmaphalasvarūpamahimnaiva pāralaukikaphalam avartiṣṭhate /
analyzed: jyotiṣṭoma ādi tu svarga phalam karma phala svarūpa mahimnā eva pāralaukika phalam

original: svargo hi niratiśayā prītiḥ tadanyathānupapattiparikalpitaḥ kanakagiriśikharādir vā bhogadeśaḥ /
analyzed: svargaḥ hi niratiśayā prītiḥ tad anyathā anupapatti parikalpitaḥ kanaka giri śikhara ādiḥ vā bhoga deśaḥ

original: ubhayathā 'pi naitaddehopabhogayogyatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: ubhayathā pi nā etat deha upabhoga yogya tām pratipadyate

original: aniyataphalaṃ tu citrādi kaiścid uktam /
analyzed: aniyata phalam tu citra ādi kaiścid uktam

original: tac ca yuktam ayuktam iti vā tatraiva parīkṣitam //
analyzed: tat ca yuktam ayuktam iti vā tatra eva parīkṣitam

original: niṣiddhasya tu karmaṇaḥ sarvasyaiva prāyeṇa paraloka eva phalam /
analyzed: niṣiddhasya tu karmaṇaḥ sarvasya eva prāyeṇa para lokaḥ eva phalam

original: paradārābhimarṣaṇādau hi kriyāphalaṃ suratasukhādi sadyaḥ phalam /
analyzed: paradāra abhimarṣaṇa ādau hi kriyā phalam surata sukha ādi sadyas phalam

original: niṣedhavidhiphalaṃ tu narakapatanaṃ pāralaukikam /
analyzed: niṣedha vidhi phalam tu naraka patanam pāralaukikam

original: svargavannarakasyāpi niratiśayaduḥkhātmanaḥ tadanyathā 'nupapattiparikalpitadeśasvabhāvasya vā etac charīrānupabhogayogyatvāt //
analyzed: svarga vat narakasya api niratiśaya duḥkha ātmanaḥ tad anyathā nupapatti parikalpita deśa svabhāvasya vā etat śarīra an upabhoga yogya tvāt

original: tīvrasaṃbeganirvṛttaṃ tu karma vihitaṃ itarad vā pratyāsannavipākaṃ ihaiva bhavati nandīśvaranahuṣayor ivety āgamavidaḥ //
analyzed: tīvra saṃbega nirvṛttam tu karma vihitam itarat vā pratyāsanna vipākam iha eva bhavati nandīśvara nahuṣayoḥ iva iti āgama vidaḥ

original: corabrahmaghnādayaś ca kecit pratyāsannapratyavāyāḥ prāyeṇa dṛśyanta evety evam eṣāṃ vicitraḥ karmaṇāṃ vipākaḥ //
analyzed: cora brahma ghna ādayaḥ ca kecid pratyāsanna pratyavāyāḥ prāyeṇa dṛśyante eva iti evam eṣām vicitraḥ karmaṇām vipākaḥ

original: yad api cocyatekarmakāle phalaṃ nāsti phalakāle karma nāsti /
analyzed: yat api ca ucyate karma kāle phalam na asti phala kāle karma na asti

original: kālāntare ca phalasyānyat pratyakṣaṃ kāraṇam upalabhyate sevādikam ititad api pūrvaṃ parihṛtam /
analyzed: kāla antare ca phalasya anyat pratyakṣam kāraṇam upalabhyate sevā ādikam iti tat api pūrvam parihṛtam

original: karmaṇāṃ vināśe 'pi tajjanitasya ātmasaṃskarasya dharmādharmaśabdavācyasya bhāvāt /
analyzed: karmaṇām vināśe tad janitasya ātma saṃskarasya dharma adharma śabda vācyasya bhāvāt

original: dṛṣṭasya ca sevādeḥ kāraṇasya vyabhicārāt adṛṣṭakalpanāyā avaśyaṃbhāvitvāt //
analyzed: dṛṣṭasya ca sevā ādeḥ kāraṇasya vyabhicārāt adṛṣṭa kalpanāyāḥ avaśyaṃbhāvi tvāt

original: dharmāder ātmani samavāyāt phalasya ca putrapaśvādeḥ anyatra samavetatvāt bhinnādhikaraṇatvaṃ karmaphalayor ity api na codyamsukhyasya sukhaduḥkhātmanaḥ phalasya bhinnāśrayatvānuppatteḥ /
analyzed: dharma ādeḥ ātmani samavāyāt phalasya ca putra paśu ādeḥ anyatra samaveta tvāt bhinna adhikaraṇa tvam karma phalayoḥ iti api na codyam sukhyasya sukha duḥkha ātmanaḥ phalasya bhinna āśraya tva anuppatteḥ

original: sukhaduḥkhe hy ātmani vartate dharmādharmau ca tatsthāv eveti //
analyzed: sukha duḥkhe hi ātmani vartate dharma adharmau ca tad sthau eva iti

original: dṛṣṭaṃ naiva sukhasya kāraṇamatastaddheturāgeṇa kiṃ duḥkhasyāpi na tannibandhanam iti dveṣas tadartheṣu kaḥ tasmāt karmanimittakaṃ phalam iti dhyāyanna kuryāt kṛtī saṅgaṃ karmaṇi yena dustarasamau saṃsāram āpadyate //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam nā eva sukhasya kāraṇam atas tad hetu rāgeṇa kim duḥkhasya api na tat nibandhanam iti dveṣaḥ tad artheṣu kaḥ tasmāt karma nimittakam phalam iti dhyāyan na kuryāt kṛtī saṅgam karmaṇi yena dustara samau saṃsāram āpadyate

original: bādhanālakṣaṇaṃ duḥkham //1.1.21//
analyzed: bādhanā lakṣaṇam duḥkham

original: bādhanā pīḍanaṃsantāpanam /
analyzed: bādhanā pīḍanam santāpanam

original: sā lakṣaṇamasyeti bādhanālakṣaṇaṃ duḥkham /
analyzed: sā lakṣaṇam asya iti bādhanā lakṣaṇam duḥkham

original: tatra mukhye duḥkhe lakṣye lakṣaṇaśabdo yathāśruta eva /
analyzed: tatra mukhye duḥkhe lakṣye lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ yathāśrutaḥ eva

original: bādhanayaiva hi duḥkhasvarūpaṃ lakṣyatebādhayati duḥkhayatīti /
analyzed: bādhanayā eva hi duḥkha svarūpam lakṣyate bādhayati duḥkhayati iti

original: gauṇe tu duḥkhe śarīrādau lakṣye bādhanālakṣaṇaṃbādhanānuṣaktam iti vyākhyeyam //
analyzed: gauṇe tu duḥkhe śarīra ādau lakṣye bādhanā lakṣaṇam bādhana anuṣaktam iti vyākhyeyam

original: nanu pūrvasūtravyākhyātena phalagrahaṇenaiva duḥkhasyopadiṣṭatvāt kim arthaṃ punar apadeśaḥsukhapratyākhyanārtha iti cetnapūrvāparavirodhāt /
analyzed: nanu pūrva sūtra vyākhyātena phala grahaṇena eva duḥkhasya upadiṣṭa tvāt kim artham punar apadeśaḥ sukha pratyākhyana arthaḥ iti cetna pūrva apara virodhāt

original: sakalaprāṇabhṛdanubhavasākṣikatvena ca sukhasya pratyākhyātum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: sakala prāṇabhṛt anubhava sākṣika tvena ca sukhasya pratyākhyātum aśakya tvāt

original: tatpratyākhyāne ca vivakṣite kim arthaṃ prameyasūtre phalapadopādānamphale khalu sukha duḥkhe iti vyākhyātam /
analyzed: tad pratyākhyāne ca vivakṣite kim artham prameya sūtre phala pada upādānam phale khalu sukha duḥkhe iti vyākhyātam

original: tataś ca sukhe pratyākhyāte duḥkham evāvaśiṣyate /
analyzed: tatas ca sukhe pratyākhyāte duḥkham eva avaśiṣyate

original: tac cānena duḥkhaśabdenaiva nirdiṣṭam iti kiṃ phalagrahaṇena ucyatena sukhaleśasya saṃsāre jantubhir antarā 'ntarā 'nubhūyamānasya pratyākhyānāya duḥkhagrahaṇam /
analyzed: tat ca anena duḥkha śabdena eva nirdiṣṭam iti kim phala grahaṇena ucyatena sukha leśasya saṃsāre jantubhiḥ antarā ntarā anubhūyamānasya pratyākhyānāya duḥkha grahaṇam

original: kin tu sarvatra tathātvabhāvanopadeśārtham /
analyzed: kin tu sarvatra tathātva bhāvanā upadeśa artham

original: so 'pi hi sukhalavaḥ duḥkham eveti bhāvayitavyaḥ tatsādhana duḥkham eveti mantavyam //
analyzed: saḥ pi hi sukha lavaḥ duḥkham eva iti bhāvayitavyaḥ tatsādhana duḥkham eva iti mantavyam

original: na tadvyavasitaṃ puṃsāṃ na tatkarma na tadvacaḥ /
analyzed: na tat vyavasitam puṃsām na tat karma na tat vacaḥ

original: na tadbhogyaṃ samastīha yan na kuḥkhāya jāyate //
analyzed: na tat bhogyam samasti iha yat na kuḥkhāya jāyate

original: tad itthaṃ duḥkhaṃ utkṛṣṭaṃ tiraścām madhyamaṃ manuṣyāṇām /
analyzed: tat ittham duḥkham utkṛṣṭam tiraścām madhyamam manuṣyāṇām

original: hīnaṃ devānām /
analyzed: hīnam devānām

original: hīnataraṃ vītarāgāṇām ity āgamavidaḥ /
analyzed: hīnataram vīta rāgāṇām iti āgama vidaḥ

original: vītarāgāṇāṃ duḥkhatānavaṃ yuktito 'py avagamyate duḥkhasya rāganibandhanatvāt //
analyzed: vīta rāgāṇām duḥkha tānavam yuktitaḥ pi avagamyate duḥkhasya rāga nibandhana tvāt

original: tattvataś cintyamānaṃ hisarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ vivekinaḥ /
analyzed: tattvataḥ cintyamānam hi sarvam duḥkham vivekinaḥ

original: viṣasaṃpuṛktamadhuvat sukhaṃ duḥkhībhavatyadaḥ /
analyzed: viṣa saṃpuṛkta madhu vat sukham duḥkhībhavati adaḥ

original: sukhādhigamalobhena yatamāno hi puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: sukha adhigama lobhena yatamānaḥ hi puruṣaḥ

original: sahasraśākham āpnoti duḥkham eva tadarjane //
analyzed: sahasra śākham āpnoti duḥkham eva tad arjane

original: evaṃ sarvam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ iti bhāvayato 'niśam /
analyzed: evam sarvam idam duḥkham iti bhāvayataḥ niśam

original: sarvopapattisthāneṣu nirvedo 'sya pravartate //
analyzed: sarva upapatti sthāneṣu nirvedaḥ sya pravartate

original: nirviṇṇasya ca vairāgyaṃ viraktasya ca dehinaḥ /
analyzed: nirviṇṇasya ca vairāgyam viraktasya ca dehinaḥ

original: kleśakarmaprahāṇādidvāro niḥśreyasodayaḥ //
nanu evaṃ tarhi phalagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyam duḥkhapadenaiva gatārthatvād ity uktammaivamtasyānyaprayojanatvāt /
analyzed: nanu evam tarhi phala grahaṇam na kartavyam duḥkha padena eva gatārtha tvāt iti uktam mā evam tasya anya prayojana tvāt

original: pravṛttidoṣajanitatvena sukhaduḥkhe bhāvayitavye abhyāsena ca vartamāne iti /
analyzed: pravṛtti doṣa janita tvena sukha duḥkhe bhāvayitavye abhyāsena ca vartamāne iti

original: karmadoṣajanitatvena hi phalam anucintayataḥ tatkāraṇayor anukūlapratikūlayor asya rāgadveṣau mā bhūtām /
analyzed: karma doṣa janita tvena hi phalam anucintayataḥ tad kāraṇayoḥ anukūla pratikūlayoḥ asya rāga dveṣau mā bhūtām

original: abhyāvṛttyā ca sasādhanasya phalasya hānopādānasrotasohyamānaḥ tatrātyantāya nirvidyatām iti phalagrahaṇam /
analyzed: abhyāvṛttyā ca sa sādhanasya phalasya hāna upādāna srotasā uhyamānaḥ tatra atyantāya iti phala grahaṇam

original: tad evaṃ anyathā phalasya hiḥśreyasopayogitvam anyathā tu phalatve saty api duḥkhasyeti //
analyzed: tat evam anyathā phalasya hiḥśreyasa upayogi tvam anyathā tu phala tve sati api duḥkhasya iti

original: dīrghasya duḥkhasya nimittabhūtaṃ sukhaṃ ca duḥkhātmakam eva srvam /
analyzed: dīrghasya duḥkhasya nimitta bhūtam sukham ca duḥkha ātmakam eva srvam

original: mumukṣuṇā heyatayā vicintyaṃ dehādi duḥkhāntam idaṃ prameyam //
analyzed: mumukṣuṇā heya tayā vicintyam deha ādi duḥkha antam idam prameyam

original: iti nipuṇamatiryo dukham eveti sarvaṃ pariharati śarīre kleśakarmādijālam /
analyzed: iti nipuṇa matiḥ yaḥ dukham evā iti sarvam pariharati śarīre kleśa karma ādi jālam

original: ajamajaramanantaṃ cintayannātmatattvaṃ gatabhayamapavartaṃ śāśvataṃ so 'bhyupaiti //
analyzed: ajam ajaram anantam cintayan ātma tattvam gata bhayam apavartam śāśvatam saḥ bhyupaiti

original: evaṃ śarīrādau duḥkhaparyante heye prameye nirṇīte yadartha etad upadeśaḥ yatparamupādeyaṃ prameyaṃ yadarthaḥ śāstrārambhaḥ tam apavartaṃ lakṣayitum āha tadatyantavimokṣo 'pavargaḥ //1.1.22//
analyzed: evam śarīra ādau duḥkha paryante heye prameye nirṇīte yad arthaḥ etat upadeśaḥ yad param upādeyam prameyam yad arthaḥ śāstra ārambhaḥ tam apavartam lakṣayitum āha tad atyanta vimokṣaḥ upavargaḥ

original: tad iti prakrāntasya duḥkhasyāvamarśaḥ /
analyzed: tat iti prakrāntasya duḥkhasya avamarśaḥ

original: na ca mukhyam eva duḥkhaṃ bādhanāsvabhāvam avamṛśyate kin tu tatsādhanaṃ tadanuṣaktaṃ ca sarvam eva /
analyzed: na ca mukhyam eva duḥkham bādhanā svabhāvam avamṛśyate kin tu tad sādhanam tad anuṣaktam ca sarvam eva

original: tena duḥkhena viyogo 'pavargaḥ //
analyzed: tena duḥkhena viyogaḥ pavargaḥ

original: asti pralayavelāyām apy ātmano duḥkhaviyogaḥ /
analyzed: asti pralaya velāyām api ātmanaḥ duḥkha viyogaḥ

original: sa tv apavargo na bhavati sargasamaye punar akṣīṇakarmāśayānurūpaśarīrādisaṃbandhe sati dukhasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: sa tu apavargaḥ na bhavati sarga samaye punar akṣīṇa karma āśaya anurūpa śarīra ādi saṃbandhe sati dukha saṃbhavāt

original: ataḥ tadavyāvṛttyartham atyantagrahaṇam //
ātyantikī duḥkhanivṛttir apavargaḥ na sāvadhikā /
analyzed: ātyantikī duḥkha nivṛttiḥ apavargaḥ na sā avadhikā

original: dvividhaduḥkhāvamarśinā sarvanāmnā sarveṣām ātmaguṇānāṃ duḥkhavadavamarśāt atyantagrahaṇena ca sarvātmanā tadviyogābhidhānāt navānām ātmaguṇānāṃ buddhisukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnadharmādharmasaṃskārāṇāṃ nirmūlocchedaḥ apavarga iyuktaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: dvividha duḥkha avamarśinā sarva nāmnā sarveṣām ātma guṇānām duḥkha vat avamarśāt atyanta grahaṇena ca sarvātmanā tad viyoga abhidhānāt navānām ātma guṇānām buddhi sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatna dharma adharma saṃskārāṇām nirmūla ucchedaḥ apavargaḥ bhavati

original: yāvad ātmaguṇās sarve nocchiddhannā vāsanādayaḥ /
analyzed: yāvat ātma guṇāḥ sarve na ucchid hannāḥ vāsanā ādayaḥ

original: tāvad ātyantikī duḥkhavyāv.ettir nāvakalpate //
analyzed: tāvat ātyantikī duḥkha vyāvettiḥ na avakalpate

original: dharmādharmanimitto hi saṃbhavaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
analyzed: dharma adharma nimittaḥ hi saṃbhavaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: mūlabhūtau ca tāv eva stambhau saṃsārasadnaḥ //
analyzed: mūla bhūtau ca tau eva stambhau saṃsāra sadnaḥ

original: tad ucchede tu tatkāryaśarīrādyanupaplavāt /
analyzed: tat ucchede tu tad kārya śarīra ādi anupaplavāt

original: nātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhe staḥ ity asau mukta ucyate //
analyzed: na ātmanaḥ sukha duḥkhe staḥ iti asau muktaḥ ucyate

original: icchādveṣaprayatnādi bhogāyatanabandhanam /
analyzed: icchā dveṣa prayatna ādi bhoga āyatana bandhanam

original: ucchinnabhogāyatanaḥ nātmā tair api yujyate //
analyzed: ucchinna bhoga āyatanaḥ na ātmā taiḥ api yujyate

original: prāṇasya kṣuppipāse dve lobhamohau ca cetasaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇasya kṣudh pipāse dve lobha mohau ca cetasaḥ

original: śītātapau śarīrasya ṣaḍūrmirahitaḥ śivaḥ //
analyzed: śīta ātapau śarīrasya ṣaṣ ūrmi rahitaḥ śivaḥ

original: tad evaṃ navānām ātmaviśeṣaguṇānāṃ nirmūlocchedo 'pavarga iti yad udyate tad evedam uktaṃ bhavati [tadatyantavimokṣo 'pavarga iti //
analyzed: tat evam navānām ātma viśeṣa guṇānām nirmūla ucchedaḥ pavargaḥ iti yat udyate tat eva idam uktam bhavati tad atyanta vimokṣaḥ pavargaḥ iti

original: nanu tasyām avasthāyāṃ kīdṛgātmā 'vaśiṣyate svarūpaikapratiṣṭhānaḥ parityakto 'khilair guṇaiḥ //
analyzed: nanu tasyām avasthāyām kīdṛś ātmā svarūpa eka pratiṣṭhānaḥ parityaktaḥ khilaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: urmiṣaṭkātigaṃ rūpaṃ tad asyāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: urmi ṣaṭka atigam rūpam tat asya āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: saṃsārabandhanādhīnaduḥkhakleśādyadūṣitam //
atra tāvat vedāntina āhuḥnāyam idṛśo mokṣaḥ prekṣāvatāṃ prayatnabhūmir bhavatum arhati /
analyzed: atra tāvat vedāntinaḥ āhuḥ na ayam idṛśaḥ mokṣaḥ prekṣāvatām prayatna bhūmiḥ bhavatum arhati

original: ko hi nāma śilāśakalakalpaṃ apagatasakalasukhasaṃvedanasaṃsparśaṃ ātmānam upapādayituṃ yatenasopādhisāvadhikaparimitānandaniṣyandāt svargād apy adhikaṃ anavadhikaniratiśayanaisargakānandasundaraṃ aparimlānatatsaṃvedasāmarthyaṃ caturthaṃ puruṣārtham ācakṣante vicakṣaṇāḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ hi nāma śilā śakala kalpam apagata sakala sukha saṃvedana saṃsparśam ātmānam upapādayitum svargāt api adhikam anavadhika niratiśaya naisargaka ānanda sundaram a parimlāna tad saṃveda sāmarthyam caturtham puruṣa artham ācakṣante vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: yadi tu jaḍaḥ pāṣāṇanirviśeṣa eva tasyām avasthāyām ātmā bhavet /
analyzed: yadi tu jaḍaḥ pāṣāṇa nirviśeṣaḥ eva tasyām avasthāyām ātmā bhavet

original: tatkṛtaṃ apavargeṇa saṃsāra eva varam astu yatra tāvad antarā 'ntarā 'pi duḥkhakaluṣitam api svalpam api sukham upabhujyate /
analyzed: tat kṛtam apavargeṇa saṃsāraḥ eva varam astu yatra tāvat antarā ntarā pi duḥkha kaluṣitam api su alpam api sukham upabhujyate

original: cintyatāṃ tāvad idaṃ kim alpasukhānubhavo bhadrakaḥ uta sarvasukhoccheda eva /
analyzed: cintyatām tāvat idam kim alpa sukha anubhavaḥ bhadrakaḥ uta sarva sukha ucchedaḥ eva

original: tasmān nityasukham ātmano mahattvavadastīti āgamaprāmāṇyād abhyupagamyatām /
analyzed: tasmāt nitya sukham ātmanaḥ mahat tva vat asti iti āgama prāmāṇyāt abhyupagamyatām

original: tac ca saṃsāradaśāyāṃ avidyāvaraṇaveśena nānubhūyate /
analyzed: tat ca saṃsāra daśāyām avidyā āvaraṇa veśena nā anubhūyate

original: tattvajñānābhyāsabhāvanābhibhūtanirantarāvidyāvaraṇas tv ātmā tasyām avasthāyāṃ tadanubhavatīti //
analyzed: tattva jñāna abhyāsa bhāvanā abhibhūta nirantara avidyā āvaraṇaḥ tu ātmā tasyām avasthāyām tat anubhavati iti

original: tad idam anupapannamātmano nityasukhasattāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam ātmanaḥ nitya sukha sattāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: pratyakṣaṃ tāvan nasmadādīnām aneṣāṃ vākeṣāṃcid asminnarthe prabhaviṣyatīti keyaṃ kathā anumānam api na saṃbhavati liṅgaleśānavalokanād iti //
analyzed: pratyakṣam tāvat aneṣām asmin arthe prabhaviṣyati iti kā iyam kathā anumānam api na saṃbhavati liṅga leśa anavalokanāt iti

original: nanu uktam evānumānam apavargāya yatra prekṣāvatāṃ prayatnaḥ /
analyzed: nanu uktam eva anumānam apavargāya yatra prekṣāvatām prayatnaḥ

original: sukhasiddhaye hi buddhimanto yatane nāśmakalpamātmānaṃ karyum iti /
analyzed: sukha siddhaye hi buddhimantaḥ yatane na aśma kalpam ātmānam karyum iti

original: tad ayaṃ iṣṭādhigamārthaḥ mumukṣoḥ prayatnaḥ prekṣāpūrvakāriprayatnatvāt kṛṣyādiprayatnavad iti//
analyzed: tat ayam iṣṭa adhigama arthaḥ mumukṣoḥ prayatnaḥ prekṣā pūrva kāri prayatna tvāt kṛṣi ādi prayatna vat iti

original: nāniṣṭoparamārthatvātaniṣṭasyāpi śāntaye /
analyzed: na aniṣṭa uparama artha tvāt aniṣṭasya api śāntaye

original: santaḥ prayatamānā hi dṛśyante vyādhikheditāḥ //
analyzed: santaḥ prayatamānāḥ hi dṛśyante vyādhi kheditāḥ

original: atidurvahaścāyaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhabhāra iti tadupaśamāya vyavasyantaḥ santaḥ na niṣprayojanaprayatnā bhavantīti anaikāntiko hetuḥ //
analyzed: ati durvahaḥ ca ayam saṃsāra duḥkha bhāraḥ iti tad upaśamāya vyavasyantaḥ santaḥ na niṣprayojana prayatnāḥ bhavanti iti anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ

original: atha āgamādavagamyatebibhutveneva nityena sukhenāvinākṛtaḥ svātmeti /
analyzed: atha āgamāt avagamyate bibhutvena iva nityena sukhena avinākṛtaḥ svātmā iti

original: tathā ca paṭhyate[vijñānamānandaṃ brahma] iti syād etad evamyady etad eva kevalaṃ āgamavacanamaśroṣyata /
analyzed: tathā ca paṭhyate vijñānam ānandam brahma iti syāt etat evam yadi etat eva kevalam āgama vacanam aśroṣyata

original: vacanāntaram api tu śrūyate[na ha vai saśarīrasya sataḥ prayāpriyayor upahatir asti /
analyzed: vacana antaram api tu śrūyate na ha vai sa śarīrasya sataḥ prayā priyayoḥ upahatiḥ asti

original: aśarīraṃ vā va santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ] iti //
analyzed: aśarīram vā vaḥ santam na priya apriye spṛśataḥ iti

original: nanu bhavatpaṭhitamāgamavacanaṃ anyathāpi vyākhyātuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: nanu bhavat paṭhitam āgama vacanam anyathā api vyākhyātum śakyate

original: [saśarīrasya] iti prakramāt sāṃsārike sukhaduḥkhe anukūletaraviṣayopalaṃbhasaṃbhave tadānīm aśarīram ātmānaṃ na spṛśata ity arthaḥ //
analyzed: sa śarīrasya iti prakramāt sāṃsārike sukha duḥkhe anukūla itara viṣaya upalaṃbha saṃbhave tadānīm aśarīram ātmānam na spṛśataḥ iti arthaḥ

original: hanta tarhi tvadadhītam api vedavacanaṃ [ānandaṃ brahma] iti saṃsāraduḥkhaparihāraprakaraṇād eva tadduḥkhāpāyaviṣayaṃ vyākhyāsyate /
analyzed: hanta tarhi tvad adhītam api veda vacanam ānandam brahma iti saṃsāra duḥkha parihāra prakaraṇāt eva tad duḥkha apāya viṣayam vyākhyāsyate

original: na khalu vyākhyānasya bhagavataḥ kācidabhūmir asti /
analyzed: na khalu vyākhyānasya bhagavataḥ kācid abhūmiḥ asti

original: dṛṣṭāś ca duḥkhoparame sukhaśabdaprayogāḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ ca duḥkha uparame sukha śabda prayogāḥ

original: cirajvaraśirortyādivyādhiduḥkhena kheditāḥ /
analyzed: cira jvara śiraḥ ūrti ādi vyādhi duḥkhena kheditāḥ

original: sukhino vayamadyeti tadapāye prayuṃjate //
analyzed: sukhinaḥ vayam adya iti tad apāye prayuṃjate

original: yadi ca [ānandam] iti vacanāt nityaṃ sukham ātmana iṣyate tarhi brahmā] iti vacanāt vyāpakatvam iva [vijñānam] iti vacanāt jñānam api nityam asyābhyupagamntavyam /
analyzed: yadi ca ānandam iti vacanāt nityam sukham ātmanaḥ iṣyate tarhi brahmā iti vacanāt vyāpaka tvam iva vijñānam iti vacanāt jñānam api nityam asya abhyupagamntavyam

original: ataś ca sukhavat jñānasyāpi nityatvāt saṃsāre 'pi nityasukhopalabdhiḥ syāt /
analyzed: atas ca sukha vat jñānasya api nitya tvāt saṃsāre pi nitya sukha upalabdhiḥ syāt

original: tataś ca dharmādharmaphalābhyāṃ sukhaduḥkhābhyām asya nityasya sukhasya sāhacaryam anubhūyet /
analyzed: tatas ca dharma adharma phalābhyām sukha duḥkhābhyām asya nityasya sukhasya sāhacaryam anubhūyet

original: api ca sukhavat jñānavac cāsya kamaṃ dehendriyādy api /
analyzed: api ca sukhavat jñānavat ca asya kamam deha indriya ādi api

original: nityaṃ prakalpyatām itthaṃ mokṣo ramyataro bhavet //
analyzed: nityam prakalpyatām ittham mokṣaḥ ramyataraḥ bhavet

original: atha kāryaṃ sukhajñānam hetus tasya vicintanīyaḥyata utpadyata iti /
analyzed: atha kāryam sukha jñānam hetuḥ tasya vicintanīyaḥ yatas utpadyate iti

original: dharmāc cet so 'pi kiṃprabhava iti vācyam /
analyzed: dharmāt ced saḥ u pi kiṃprabhavaḥ iti vācyam

original: yogasamādhija iti cet tasya svakāryatvāt svakāryasukhasaṃvedanāvasānatvān na śāśvatikatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yoga samādhi jaḥ iti ced tasya sva kārya tvāt sva kārya sukha saṃvedana avasāna tvāt na śāśvatika tvam syāt

original: aprakṣayaś ca dharmasya niranumānakaḥ /
analyzed: a prakṣayaḥ ca dharmasya niranumānakaḥ

original: na hi yogasamādhijo dharmaḥ na kṣīyata ity atra ca kiñcid anumānam asti /
analyzed: na hi yoga samādhi jaḥ dharmaḥ na kṣīyate iti atra ca kiñcid anumānam asti

original: viparyaye tu prasiddham anumānam sarvasya kṛtakasyānityatvadarśanād iti /
analyzed: viparyaye tu prasiddham anumānam sarvasya kṛtakasya anitya tva darśanāt iti

original: kṣīṇe ca dharme tatkāryajñānābhāvāt sad api sukham anupalabhyamānaṃ asato na viśiṣyate //
analyzed: kṣīṇe ca dharme tad kārya jñāna abhāvāt sat api sukham anupalabhyamānam asataḥ na viśiṣyate

original: svaprakāśaṃ tat sukham iti cetnasaṃsāre 'pi tad upalabdhiprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: sva prakāśam tat sukham iti cetna saṃsāre pi tat upalabdhi prasaṅgāt

original: śarīrādisaṃbandhaḥ pratibandhahetur iti cetnaśarīrādīnām upabhogārthatvāt /
analyzed: śarīra ādi saṃbandhaḥ pratibandha hetuḥ iti cetna śarīra ādīnām upabhoga artha tvāt

original: bhogārthāḥ śarīrādayas te bhogapratibandhaṃ vidadhatīti na sādhvī kalpanā //
analyzed: bhoga arthāḥ śarīra ādayaḥ te bhoga pratibandham vidadhati iti na sādhvī kalpanā

original: avidyāvaraṇāt saṃsāre svaprakāśasukhānupalambha iti cetnaprakāśasya tucchenāvaritum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: avidyā āvaraṇāt saṃsāre sva prakāśa sukha anupalambhaḥ iti cetna prakāśasya tucchena āvaritum aśakya tvāt

original: na ca prakāśarūpaṃ pāramārthikam ātmanaḥ sukhaṃ tadviparītatucchasvabhāveyam avidyā na parītum arhati meghādinā vinakarakiraṇāvaraṇāvadhāraṇāt //
analyzed: na ca prakāśa rūpam pāramārthikam ātmanaḥ sukham tad viparīta tuccha svabhāvā iyam avidyā na parītum arhati megha ādinā

original: aviralagavalamalīmasaṃ balāhakavyūhapihitaravibimbam /
analyzed: avirala gavala malīmasam balāhaka vyūha pihita ravi bimbam

original: tad api na rajanīsadṛśaṃ dinam iti sahasā mohamahimā //
analyzed: tat api na rajanī sadṛśam dinam iti sahasā moha mahimā

original: meghā api raver anye svarūpeṇa ca vāstavāḥ /
analyzed: meghāḥ api raveḥ anye sva rūpeṇa ca vāstavāḥ

original: tatvānyatvād acintyā tu nāvidyā 'varaṇakṣamā /
analyzed: tatva anyatvāt acintyā tu na avidyā varaṇa kṣamā

original: tasmān na nityānandatvam ātmanaḥsuvacam //
analyzed: tasmāt na nitya ānanda tvam ātmanaḥ suvacam

original: api ca mokṣe nityānandasvabhāve tadrāgeṇa prayatamāno mumukṣuḥ na mokṣam adhigacchet /
analyzed: api ca mokṣe nitya ānanda svabhāve tad rāgeṇa prayatamānaḥ mumukṣuḥ na mokṣam adhigacchet
