original: na hirāgiṇāṃ mokṣo 'stīti mokṣavidaḥ //
analyzed: na hi rāgiṇām mokṣaḥ sti iti mokṣa vidaḥ

original: duḥkhanivṛttyātmake 'pi mokṣe duḥkhadveṣāt prayatamānasya samāno doṣa iti cetnamumukṣor dveṣābhāvāt /
analyzed: duḥkha nivṛtti ātmake mokṣe duḥkha dveṣāt prayatamānasya samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti cet na mumukṣoḥ dveṣa abhāvāt

original: rāgadveṣau hi saṃsārakāraṇam iti ca jānāti mumukṣuḥdveṣṭi ca duḥkham iti kathaṃ saṃgacchate //
analyzed: rāga dveṣau hi saṃsāra kāraṇam iti ca jānāti mumukṣuḥ dveṣṭi ca duḥkham iti katham saṃgacchate

original: sukhe 'py asya rāgo nāsty eveti cetnasvarganirviśeṣe 'pavarge svargavadrāgasya saṃbāvyamānatvāt /
analyzed: sukhe pi asya rāgaḥ na asti evā iti cetna svarga nirviśeṣe pavarge svarga vat rāgasya saṃbāvyamāna tvāt

original: duḥkhena tu nirviṇṇasya mumukṣor vairāgyaṃ jāyete na duḥkhaviṣayo dveṣaḥ /
analyzed: duḥkhena tu nirviṇṇasya mumukṣoḥ vairāgyam jāyete na duḥkha viṣayaḥ dveṣaḥ

original: viraktasya cāsya mokṣaṃ praty yatno bhavati na duḥkhaṃ dviṣata iti na samāno nyāyaḥ //
analyzed: viraktasya ca asya mokṣam prati yatnaḥ bhavati na duḥkham dviṣate iti na samānaḥ nyāyaḥ

original: yad uktaṃ tādṛśo mokṣaḥ prekṣāvatāṃ prayatnaviṣayo na bhavatīti tad api na sāṃpratamprayojanānusāreṇa pramāṇavayasthānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: yat uktam tādṛśaḥ mokṣaḥ prekṣāvatām prayatna viṣayaḥ na bhavati iti tat api na sāṃpratam prayojana anusāreṇa

original: na hi prayojanānuvarti pramāṇaṃ bhavitum arhati //
analyzed: na hi prayojana anuvarti pramāṇam bhavitum arhati

original: yadi nirānando mokṣaḥ prekṣāvatāṃ na ruciraḥkāmaṃ mā bhūtna tvapramāṇakam ānandaṃ tv atra kalpayituṃ śaknumaḥ //
analyzed: yadi nirānandaḥ mokṣaḥ prekṣāvatām na ruciraḥ kāmam mā tu apramāṇakam ānandam tu atra kalpayitum śaknumaḥ

original: na ca sarvātmanā sādhūnām anabhimata eva tathāvidho mokṣaḥ /
analyzed: na ca sarvātmanā sādhūnām anabhimataḥ eva tathāvidhaḥ mokṣaḥ

original: na ca tadavāptaye na prayatante /
analyzed: na ca tad avāptaye na prayatante

original: te hy evaṃ vivecayanti /
analyzed: te hi evam vivecayanti

original: duḥkhasaṃsparśaśūnyaśāśvatika sukhasaṃbhogāsaṃbhavāt duḥkhasya cāvaśyaṃ hātavyatvāt vivekahānasya cāśakyatvāt viśamadhunī ivaikapātre patite ubhe api sukhaduḥkhe tyajyetām iti //
analyzed: duḥkha saṃsparśa śūnya śāśvatika sukha saṃbhoga asaṃbhavāt duḥkhasya ca avaśyam hātavya tvāt viveka hānasya ca aśakya tvāt viśa madhunī iva eka pātre patite ubhe api sukha duḥkhe tyajyetām iti

original: ataś ca saṃsārānmokṣaḥ śreyāt yatrāyamiyānatiduśaho duḥkhaprabandho 'valupyate varam iyantī kādācitkī sukhakaṇikā tyaktā na tasyāḥ kṛte duḥkhabhāra iyānūḍha iti /
analyzed: atas ca saṃsārāt mokṣaḥ śreyāt yatra ayam iyān ati duḥkha prabandhaḥ valupyate varam iyantī kādācitkī sukha kaṇikā tyaktā na tasyāḥ kṛte duḥkha bhāraḥ iyān ūḍhaḥ iti

original: tasmān na sukhopabhogātmako mokṣa iti //
analyzed: tasmāt na sukha upabhoga ātmakaḥ mokṣaḥ iti

original: anyas tv āhatiṣṭhatu tāvan mokṣaḥ saṃsāre 'pi na sukhaṃ nāma kiṃcid astīti sarva evāyaṃ dukhābhāvamātre suḥkhavyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: anyaḥ tu āha tiṣṭhatu tāvat mokṣaḥ saṃsāre pi na sukham nāma kiṃcid asti iti sarvaḥ eva ayam dukha abhāva mātre suḥkha vyavahāraḥ

original: tathā hi tṛṣā śṣyatyāsye pibati salilaṃ svādu surabhi kṣudhārtaśan śālīn kabalayati māṃspākavalitān /
analyzed: tathā hi tṛṣā śṣyati āsye pibati salilam svādu surabhi kṣudhā ārtaśan śālīn kabalayati māṃspā kavalitān

original: pradīpte rāgāgnau ghananibaḍamāśliṣyati vadhūṃ pratīkāre vyādheḥ sukham iti viparyasyati janaḥ //
analyzed: pradīpte rāga agnau ghana nibaḍam āśliṣyati vadhūm pratīkāre vyādheḥ sukham iti viparyasyati janaḥ

original: ucyatetad idam atikṛtakavairāgyaprakaṭanakaurukucīkauśalam ānandātmanaḥ pratiprāṇisaṃvedyasya sukhasya nihnotum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: ucyate itat idam ati kṛtaka vairāgya prakaṭana kaurukucī kauśalam ānanda ātmanaḥ prati prāṇi saṃvedyasya sukhasya nihnotum aśakya tvāt

original: anivṛtte 'pi duḥkhe kvacit sukhasaṃvedanāt na duḥkhābhāvaḥ sukham /
analyzed: anivṛtte pi duḥkhe kvacid sukha saṃvedanāt na duḥkha abhāvaḥ sukham

original: nirabhilāṣasyāpy atarkitopanatusukhasādhanaviṣayasaṃparke sati sukhasaṃvedadarśanāt //
analyzed: nirabhilāṣasya api a tarkita upanatu sukha sādhana viṣaya saṃparke sati sukha saṃveda darśanāt

original: abhilāṣātmakaduḥkhābhāvaḥ sukham ity api na manojñam /
analyzed: abhilāṣa ātmaka duḥkha abhāvaḥ sukham iti api na manojñam

original: yas tu duḥkhābhāve kvacit sukham ity api vyapadeśaḥ praśāntarogāṇām iva pūrvaṃ darśitaḥ sa bhakti iti na tvatā svasaṃvedanasākṣikasukhāpahnavaḥ kartuṃ ucitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu duḥkha abhāve kvacid sukham iti api vyapadeśaḥ praśānta rogāṇām iva pūrvam darśitaḥ sa iti na tvatā sva saṃvedana sākṣika sukha apahnavaḥ kartum ucitaḥ

original: mokṣa tu nityasukham asaṃbhavatpramāṇatvāt nābhupagamyate //
analyzed: tu nitya sukham asaṃbhavat pramāṇa tvāt

original: api ca mokṣe sukham asti na veti vicāra eṣa na prāmāṇikajanocitaḥ /
analyzed: api ca mokṣe sukham asti na vā iti vicāraḥ eṣa na prāmāṇika jana ucitaḥ

original: svarūpeṇa vyavasthānam ātmano mokṣa iti mokṣavidaḥ /
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa vyavasthānam ātmanaḥ mokṣaḥ iti mokṣa vidaḥ

original: tatra ātmasvarūpam eva kīdṛśam iti cintyay na pṛthaḍmokṣasvarūpam /
analyzed: tatra ātma svarūpam eva kīdṛśam iti na pṛthak mokṣa svarūpam

original: ātmanaś ca sukhaduḥkhabudhyādayaḥ āgantukā guṇāḥ na mahattvavat sāṃsiddhikā iti nirṇītam etad ātmalakṣaṇe sukhādikāryeṇa cātmano 'numānād iti //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca sukha duḥkha budhi ādayaḥ āgantukāḥ guṇāḥ na mahat tva vat sāṃsiddhikāḥ iti nirṇītam etat ātma lakṣaṇe sukha ādi kāryeṇa ca ātmanaḥ numānāt iti

original: ata eva kāpilakathitacitiśaktisvabhāvatvam api na yuktam ātmanaḥ //
analyzed: atas eva kāpila kathita citi śakti svabhāva tvam api na yuktam ātmanaḥ

original: sa cetanaś citā yogāt tadyogena vinā jaḍaḥ /
analyzed: sa cetanaḥ citā yogāt tad yogena vinā jaḍaḥ

original: cintirnāmārthavijñānaṃ kādācitkaṃ tu tasya tat //
analyzed: cintiḥ nāma artha vijñānam kādācitkam tu tasya tat

original: nārthasaṃvenādanyat caitanyaṃ nāma vidyate /
analyzed: na artha saṃvenāt anyat caitanyam nāma vidyate

original: tac ca sāmagryadhīnatvāt kathaṃ mokṣe bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: tat ca sāmagrī adhīna tvāt katham mokṣe bhaviṣyati

original: jāgrataḥ svapnavṛtter vā suṣuptasyāpi vā ''tmanaḥ /
analyzed: jāgrataḥ svapna vṛtteḥ vā suṣuptasya api vā tmanaḥ

original: jñānam utpadyate 'nyā tu caturthī nāsti tādṛśī //
analyzed: jñānam utpadyate tu caturthī na asti tādṛśī

original: jāgrad daśāyāṃ svapne ca buddheḥ ratyātmavedyatā /
analyzed: jāgrat daśāyām svapne ca buddheḥ rati ātma vedya tā

original: sukhaṃ supto 'ham adyeti paścāt pratyavamarśanāt //
analyzed: sukham suptaḥ ham adya iti paścāt pratyavamarśanāt

original: tadā tv avedyamānā 'pi suṣupte dhīḥ prakalpyate /
analyzed: tadā tu avedyamānā suṣupte dhīḥ prakalpyate

original: turyāvasthā tu saṃvittiśūnyasya sthitir ātmanaḥ //
analyzed: turya avasthā tu saṃvitti śūnyasya sthitiḥ ātmanaḥ

original: turyāvasthātigaṃ rūpaṃ yadāhuḥ kecid ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: turya avasthā atigam rūpam yat āhuḥ kecid ātmanaḥ

original: pramāṇāgocaratvena kalpanāmātram eva tat //
analyzed: pramāṇa agocara tvena kalpanā mātram eva tat

original: saṃvitprasavasāmarthyaṃ sāmagrīsannidhānataḥ /
analyzed: saṃvid prasava sāmarthyam sāmagrī sannidhānataḥ

original: yadi nāmātmano 'sty asya tāvatā na cidātmatā //
analyzed: yadi nāma ātmanaḥ sti asya tāvatā na cit ātma tā

original: yadi tu darśanaśaktiyogyatāmātram eva puṃsaścaitanyam ucyatetarhi tathāvidhasya tasya kaivalyasyāsmākīnamokṣasadṛśatvam eva /
analyzed: yadi tu darśana śakti yogya tā mātram eva puṃsaḥ caitanyam ucyate tarhi tathāvidhasya tasya kaivalyasya asmākīna mokṣa sadṛśa tvam eva

original: satsaṃvitprasavayogyatāmātrasaṃbhave 'pi dṛśyendriyasaṃprayogādisāmagrīvaikalyāt kaivalyāvasthāyām ātmano draṣṭṛtvāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: sat saṃvid prasava yogya tā mātra saṃbhave pi dṛśya indriya saṃprayoga ādi sāmagrī vaikalyāt kaivalya avasthāyām ātmanaḥ draṣṭṛ tva asaṃbhavāt

original: darśanaśūnyasya cānyasya caitanyasya nirastatvād iti //
analyzed: darśana śūnyasya ca anyasya caitanyasya nirasta tvāt iti

original: nirvāṇādipadākhyeyam apavargaṃ tu saugatāḥ /
analyzed: nirvāṇa ādi pada ākhyeyam apavargam tu saugatāḥ

original: santatyucchedam icchanti svacchāṃ vā jñānasantatim //
analyzed: santati ucchedam icchanti su acchām vā jñāna santatim

original: matadvitayam apy etat pratyuktaṃ pūrvam eva yat /
analyzed: mata dvitayam api etat pratyuktam pūrvam eva yat

original: dhvastaś ca jñānasantānaḥ nityaś cātmā samarthitaḥ //
analyzed: dhvastaḥ ca jñāna santānaḥ nityaḥ ca ātmā samarthitaḥ

original: santatyucchedapakṣas tu naiyāyikamatād api /
analyzed: santati uccheda pakṣaḥ tu naiyāyika matāt api

original: śocyo yatrāśmakalpo 'pi na kaścid avaśiṣyate //
analyzed: śocyaḥ na kaścid avaśiṣyate

original: arhatpakṣe 'pi yadrūpaṃ anyasāpekṣam ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: arhat pakṣe yat rūpam anya sāpekṣam ātmanaḥ

original: na kevalasya tādrapyam ity asmanmantatulyatā //
analyzed: na kevalasya tādrapyam iti asmad manta tulya tā

original: vikāritvaṃ tu jīvānāṃ atyantamasamaṃjasam /
analyzed: vikāri tvam tu jīvānām atyantam asamaṃjasam

original: śabdapudgalavaccaitatpratyākhyeyam asaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: śabda pudgala vat ca etat pratyākhyeyam asaṃbhavāt

original: tasmān na vedāntavido vadanti mokṣaṃ na sāṅkhyā na ca saugatādyāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt na vedānta vidaḥ vadanti mokṣam na sāṅkhyāḥ na ca saugata ādyāḥ

original: ity akṣapādābhihito 'pavargaḥ śroyāṃstadatyantavimokṣa eva //
analyzed: iti upavargaḥ eva

original: āhabhavatvayamīdṛgapavargaḥ /
analyzed: āha bhavatu ayam īdṛś apavargaḥ

original: sa tu katham adhigamyata ity ucyatām /
analyzed: sa tu katham adhigamyate iti ucyatām

original: uktam eva bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānām uttarottarāpāye tadanantarāpāyād apavargaḥ //1.1.2//
analyzed: uktam eva bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣa mithyājñānām uttara uttara apāye tad anantara apāyāt apavargaḥ

original: duḥkhocchedastāvad apavargaḥ iti kathitam /
analyzed: duḥkha ucchedaḥ tāvat apavargaḥ iti kathitam

original: kāryatvāc ca duḥkhasya kāraṇocchedāt taducchedaḥ /
analyzed: kārya tvāt ca duḥkhasya kāraṇa ucchedāt tad ucchedaḥ

original: kāraṇaṃ cāsya janma /
analyzed: kāraṇam ca asya janma

original: janmani sati hi duḥkhaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: janmani sati hi duḥkham bhavati

original: jāyate iti hi janma dehendriyādisaṃbandhaḥ ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: jāyate iti hi janma deha indriya ādi saṃbandhaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: tad api janmakāraṇocchedād evocchedyam /
analyzed: tat api janma kāraṇa ucchedāt eva ucchedyam

original: atas tatkāraṇaṃ pravṛttir ucchedyā /
analyzed: atas tad kāraṇam pravṛttiḥ ucchedyā

original: tasyā api hetūcchedāt uccheda iti taddhetavo doṣāḥ ucchedyāḥ /
analyzed: tasyāḥ api hetu ucchedāt ucchedaḥ iti tad hetavaḥ doṣāḥ ucchedyāḥ

original: teṣāṃ tu nimittaṃ mithyājñānam /
analyzed: teṣām tu nimittam mithyājñānam

original: tasmann ucchinne doṣā ucchinnā bhavantīti mithyā jñānam ucchedyam /
analyzed: tasman ucchinne doṣāḥ ucchinnāḥ bhavanti iti mithyā jñānam ucchedyam

original: tad ucchede ca tattvajñānam upāyaḥ /
analyzed: tad ucchede ca tattva jñānam upāyaḥ

original: prasiddho hy ayam arthaḥ samarthitaś ca pūrvaṃ vistarataḥ tattvajñānaṃ mithyājñānasya bādhakam iti /
analyzed: prasiddhaḥ hi ayam arthaḥ samarthitaḥ ca pūrvam vistarataḥ tattva jñānam mithyājñānasya bādhakam iti

original: tasmāt atattvajñānān mithyājñānadoṣapravṛttijanmaduḥkhanivṛttikrameṇāpavarga iti //
analyzed: tasmāt atattva jñānāt mithyājñāna doṣa pravṛtti janma duḥkha nivṛtti krameṇa apavargaḥ iti

original: yady api mithyājñānam api janmakāryam aśarīrasyātmano mithyājñānānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: yadi api mithyājñānam api janma kāryam aśarīrasya ātmanaḥ mithyājñāna anupapatteḥ

original: itaretarakāryakāraṇabhāvena bījāṅkuravad anādiprabandhapravṛttena vartamānā mithyājñānādayo bhāvāḥ saṃsāra ity ākhyāyatetathāpitatkāraṇocchedacintāyāṃ kutaḥ prabhṛtyuccheda upakramyatām iti vicāryamāṇe viśeṣaniyamābhāvāt yataḥ kutaścid iti prāpte mithyājñānasya pratikūlam ucchedakāraṇaṃ tattvajñānam upalabdham iti viśeṣe pramāṇābhavāt taduccheda eopakramyate //
analyzed: itaretara kārya kāraṇa bhāvena bīja aṅkura vat anādi prabandha pravṛttena vartamānāḥ mithyājñāna ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ saṃsāraḥ iti ākhyāyate tathā api tad kāraṇa uccheda cintāyām kutas prabhṛti ucchedaḥ upakramyatām iti vicāryamāṇe viśeṣa niyama abhāvāt yatas kutaścid iti prāpte mithyājñānasya pratikūlam uccheda kāraṇam tattva jñānam upalabdham iti viśeṣe pramāṇa abhavāt tad ucchedaḥ eva upakramyate

original: ata eva mithyājñānamūlaḥ saṃsāra ucyate /
analyzed: atas eva mithyājñāna mūlaḥ saṃsāraḥ ucyate

original: tasmin ucchinne taducchedasaṃbhavāt na tataḥ prabhṛti saṃsāraḥ pravartata iti nipuṇamatibhir api nirdhārayituṃ śakyam anāditvāt tasyeti //
analyzed: tasmin ucchinne tad uccheda saṃbhavāt na tatas prabhṛti saṃsāraḥ pravartate iti nipuṇa matibhiḥ api nirdhārayitum śakyam anādi tvāt tasya iti

original: tad evaṃ tattvajñānān mithyājñānāpāye tatkāryadoṣāpāyaḥ doṣāpāte pravṛttyapāyaḥ pravṛttyapāye janmāpāyaḥ janmāpāye duḥkhāpāyaḥsa evāpavarga iti /
analyzed: tat evam tattva jñānāt mithyājñāna apāye tad kārya doṣa apāyaḥ doṣa āpāte pravṛtti apāyaḥ pravṛtti apāye janma apāyaḥ janma apāye duḥkha apāyaḥ saḥ eva apavargaḥ iti

original: tad idam uktaṃ [uttarottarāpāye tadanantarāpāyāt] iti //
analyzed: tat idam uktam uttara uttara apāye tad anantara apāyāt iti

original: āhavidito 'yaṃ sūtrārthaḥkin tv aghaṭamānamanorathaviḍambanāmātram idam alīkaśraddadhānatāprakaṭanaṃ vā /
analyzed: āha viditaḥ yam sūtra arthaḥ kin tu a ghaṭamāna manoratha viḍambana mātram idam alīka śraddadhāna tā prakaṭanam vā

original: duradhigamas tu saṃkaṭo mokṣamārgaḥ //
analyzed: duradhigamaḥ tu saṃkaṭaḥ mokṣa mārgaḥ

original: sādhyas trivarga evaiṣaḥ dharmakarmārthalakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: sādhyaḥ trivargaḥ eva eṣaḥ dharma karma artha lakṣaṇaḥ

original: caturthaḥ puruṣārthas tu kathāsv eva virājate //
analyzed: caturthaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ tu kathāsu eva virājate

original: yadā priyaviyogādi bhavaty udvegakāraṇam /
analyzed: yadā priya viyoga ādi bhavati udvega kāraṇam

original: tadā mokṣakathāḥ kāmaṃ kriyantāṃ śokaśāntaye //
analyzed: tadā mokṣa kathāḥ kāmam kriyantām śoka śāntaye

original: na tūdyamasamaye tadadhigamasamarthām upalabhāmahe saraṇim ṛṇakleśapravṛttyanubandhasya dustaratvāt //
analyzed: na tu udyama samaye tad adhigama samarthām upalabhāmahe saraṇim ṛṇa kleśa pravṛtti anubandhasya dustara tvāt

original: ṛṇānubandhas tāvat[jāyamāno ha vai brāhmaṇaḥ tribhir ṛṇair ṛṇavā /
analyzed: ṛṇa anubandhaḥ tāvat jāyamānaḥ ha vai brāhmaṇaḥ tribhiḥ ṛṇaiḥ ṛṇavā

original: brahmacaryeṇa ṛṣibhyaḥ yajñena devebhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhyaḥ] itīdaṃ hi vede paṭhyate /
analyzed: brahmacaryeṇa ṛṣibhyaḥ yajñena devebhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhyaḥ iti idam hi vede paṭhyate

original: tatra prathamaṃ [ṛṣīṇām anṛṇaḥ syām] iti brahmacaryam ācarati /
analyzed: tatra prathamam ṛṣīṇām anṛṇaḥ syām iti brahmacaryam ācarati

original: tataḥ [pitṛṇām anṛṇaḥ syām] iti kṛtadārasaṅgrahaḥ prajotpādanāya vyavaharati /
analyzed: tatas pitṛṇām anṛṇaḥ syām iti kṛta dāra saṅgrahaḥ prajā utpādanāya vyavaharati

original: tadanugṛhastha eva darśapūrṇamāsādiṣu sahasrasaṃvatsaraparyanteṣu karmasvadhikṛtaḥ kratūnanutiṣṭhatīti [devānām anṛṇaḥ syām] iti /
analyzed: tad anu gṛhasthaḥ eva darśa pūrṇamāsa ādiṣu sahasra saṃvatsara paryanteṣu karmasu adhikṛtaḥ kratūn anutiṣṭhati iti devānām anṛṇaḥ syām iti

original: ko 'sya mokṣavyavasāyāvasaraḥ nanu ca [ṛṇāṇi trīṇy apākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet] iti manvādismaraṇāt asty eva tadavasaraḥnaśrutivākyavirodhāt /
analyzed: kaḥ sya mokṣa vyavasāya avasaraḥ nanu ca ṛṇāṇi trīṇi apākṛtya manaḥ mokṣe niveśayet iti manu ādi smaraṇāt asti eva tad avasaraḥ na śruti vākya virodhāt

original: evaṃ hi śrūyate [jarāmaryaṃ vā etatsatramyadagnihotraṃ darśapūrṇam asau ca rjarayā ha vā eṣa etasmān mucyate mṛtyunā vā] iti /
analyzed: evam hi śrūyate jarā maryam vai etat satramyat agnihotram darśapūrṇam asau ca rjarayā ha vai eṣaḥ etasmāt mucyate mṛtyunā vai iti

original: na ca karmaprayogāśaktyā karmabhyo virantuṃ śakyatesvayam aśaktasya bāhyaśaktyupadeśāt /
analyzed: na ca karma prayoga aśaktyā karmabhyaḥ virantum śakyate svayam aśaktasya bāhya śakti upadeśāt

original: antevāsī vā j.uhuyāta brahmaṇā hi sa parikrītaḥ /
analyzed: antevāsī vā juhuyāta brahmaṇā hi sa parikrītaḥ

original: krīto vā juhuyāt anena hi sa parikrītaḥ /
analyzed: krītaḥ vā juhuyāt anena hi sa parikrītaḥ

original: aśaktasya ca mokṣopāyānuṣṭhāne 'py asya kathaṃ śaktiḥ kleśānubandhād apy apavargābhāvaḥ ye hi rāgādayo doṣāḥ ātmaniścirasaṃbhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: aśaktasya ca mokṣa upāya anuṣṭhāne pi asya katham śaktiḥ kleśa anubandhāt api apavarga abhāvaḥ ye hi rāga ādayaḥ doṣāḥ

original: kasmāt śamayituṃ śaktaḥ punar āvṛttidharmakān //
analyzed: kasmāt śamayitum śaktaḥ punar āvṛtti dharmakān

original: kāmaṃ ciraṃ vijityāpi krodhaṃ vā lobham eva vā /
analyzed: kāmam ciram vijitya api krodham vā lobham eva vā

original: punargacchan vaśe teṣāṃ lokaḥ prāyeṇa dṛśyate //
analyzed: punar gacchan vaśe teṣām lokaḥ prāyeṇa dṛśyate

original: tathāhiciram api tapasi niyamitamatir api avijitaviṣamaśaravikṛtiḥ tanupavanāpanītavasanakāminīstanajaghanadarśanād eva vaśaṃ viśvāmitraḥ kumumadhanvano gata iti śrūyate //
analyzed: tathā hi ciram api tapasi niyamita matiḥ api avijita viṣama śara vikṛtiḥ tanu pavana apanīta vasana kāminī stana jaghana darśanāt eva vaśam viśvāmitraḥ kumumadhanvanaḥ gataḥ iti śrūyate

original: alam ākhyāyikayā /
analyzed: alam ākhyāyikayā

original: adyatve 'py evaṃ śataśo dṛśyata iti durcchedā doṣāḥ /
analyzed: adyatve pi evam śataśas dṛśyate iti durcchedāḥ doṣāḥ

original: [vītarāgajanmādarśanāt] iti ca vicāritamātmaparīkṣāyām /
analyzed: vīta rāga janma adarśanāt iti ca vicāritam ātma parīkṣāyām

original: aviyukta eva doṣair jantur jāyata iti doṣavivṛddhihetavaś ca rūpādayo viṣayāḥ /
analyzed: a viyuktaḥ eva doṣaiḥ jantuḥ jāyate iti doṣa vivṛddhi hetavaḥ ca rūpa ādayaḥ viṣayāḥ

original: te katham iva svakarmaṇy udāsate //
analyzed: te katham iva sva karmaṇi udāsate

original: tāmbūlaṃ kusumasugandhayaśamīrāḥ saudheṣu pratiphalitāḥ śaśāṅkabhāsaḥ /
analyzed: tāmbūlam kusuma sugandha yaśamīrāḥ saudheṣu pratiphalitāḥ śaśāṅka bhāsaḥ

original: vācaś ca praṇayanavāmṛtadravārdrāḥ dūtīnāṃ dadhati na kasya rāgavṛddhim //
analyzed: vācaḥ ca praṇaya nava amṛta drava ārdrāḥ dūtīnām dadhati na kasya rāga vṛddhim

original: api ca mugdhasmitasughādhautamadhurālāpaśālinā /
analyzed: api ca mugdha smita sughā dhauta madhura ālāpa śālinā

analyzed: mukhena pakṣmala akṣīnām kasya nā ākṣipyate manaḥ

original: ity evaṃ nidānānupaśamād api sthita eva kleśānubandhaḥ //

analyzed: pravṛtti anubandhaḥ khalu api rāga ādi preryamāṇaḥ hi karmāṇi ārabhate naraḥ

original: dīrghadīrghāḥ pratāyante yair dharmādharmavāsanāḥ //
analyzed: dīrgha dīrghāḥ pratāyante yaiḥ dharma adharma vāsanāḥ

punar āvartamānaiṣā kenopāyena bhajyatām vinā phalopabhogena na vināśo 'sti karmaṇām /

original: karmaṇāṃ ca phalānāṃ ca sa kathaṃ vā nivartatām //
analyzed: karmaṇām ca phalānām ca sa katham vā nivartatām

original: na tadavyatirikta puruṣārthaviṣayaprayatnapratiṣedho vidhīyate //

original: tathā hiṛṇaśabdo 'yaṃ viṣayāntare mukhyārthaḥ prasiddhaḥ yatrottamarṇaḥ salābhamamutaḥ pratigrahīṣyāmi] iti dhanamadhamarṇāya prayacchati /
analyzed: tathā hi ṛṇa śabdaḥ yam viṣaya antare mukhya arthaḥ prasiddhaḥ yatra uttamarṇaḥ sa lābham amutas pratigrahīṣyāmi iti dhanam adhamarṇāya prayacchati

original: adhamarṇo 'pi [salābhamasmai pradāsyāmi] iti matvā gṛhṇāti /

original: jāyamāno 'pi mukhyaḥ utpadyamāno hi mātuḥ kukṣikuhārānniśarannabhidhīyate /

original: na cāsau tapasvī bālaḥ karmabhir abhisaṃbadhyate /

original: tasmāt hy acaryam apatyotpādanam adhvaraprayoga iti tritayam idam ṛṇavadavaśyakartavyam iti karmastutiriyamaupacārikapadarayogādgamyate /
analyzed: tasmāt hi acaryam apatya utpādanam adhvara prayogaḥ iti tritayam idam ṛṇa vat avaśya kartavyam iti karma stutiḥ iyam aupacārika pada rayogāt gamyate

original: [ye catvāraḥ pathayo devayānāḥ] ityādayo hi caturthāśramaśaṃsinaḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ santi mantrārthavādāḥ /
analyzed: ye catvāraḥ pathayaḥ deva yānāḥ ityādayaḥ hi caturtha āśrama śaṃsinaḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ santi mantra arthavādāḥ

original: manvādisvṛtivacanāni caturthāśramopadeśīni caturthāśramocitaśaucācārādītikartavyatāvitānāvidhānaparāṇi ca prabandhenaiva dṛśyante [evaṃ gṛhāśrame sthitvā vidhivat snātako dvijaḥ /
analyzed: manu ādi svṛti vacanāni caturtha āśrama upadeśīni caturtha āśrama ucita śauca ācāra ādi itikartavya tā vitāna avidhāna parāṇi ca prabandhena eva dṛśyante evam gṛha āśrame sthitvā vidhivat snātakaḥ dvijaḥ

original: vane vasetsuniyataḥ bhaikṣabhugvijitendriyaḥ //] ity upakramya caturthāśramocitamokṣopāyānuṣṭhānopadeśāya ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ samasta eva manunā 'nukrāntaḥ //
analyzed: vane vaset su niyataḥ bhaikṣa bhuj vijita indriyaḥ iti upakramya caturtha āśrama ucita mokṣa upāya anuṣṭhāna upadeśāya ṣaṣṭhaḥ dhyāyaḥ samastaḥ eva manunā nukrāntaḥ

original: jābālaśrutau ca vidhāyakenaiva brāhmaṇavākyena pratipadamāśramacatuṣṭayam upadiṣṭam [brahmacārī bhūtvā gṛhī bhavet gṛhī bhūtvā vanī bhavet vanī bhūtvā pravrajet] iti //
analyzed: jābāla śrutau ca vidhāyakena eva brāhmaṇa vākyena pratipadam āśrama catuṣṭayam upadiṣṭam brahmacārī bhūtvā gṛhī bhavet gṛhī bhūtvā vanī bhavet vanī bhūtvā pravrajet iti

original: [ātmany agnīn samāropya brāhmaṇaḥ pravrajed gṛhāt] iti //
analyzed: ātmani agnīn samāropya brāhmaṇaḥ pravrajet gṛhāt iti

original: [jrayā ha vā eṣa etasmān mucyate mṛtyunā vā] iti ca vacanāt jarasā karmatyāgānujñānāt sa eva caturthāśramāvasara iti gamyate /
analyzed: jrayā ha vai eṣaḥ etasmāt mucyate mṛtyunā vā iti ca vacanāt jarasā karma tyāga anujñānāt saḥ eva caturtha āśrama avasaraḥ iti gamyate

analyzed: iti

original: yastu paripakvakaṣāyaḥ sa naiṣṭhika eva brahmacārī bhavati na gṛhasthāmaṃ pratipadyate /

analyzed: yathā uktam gṛhāt vā vanāt vā pravrajet iti

analyzed: kecid tu karma phala abhisandhi rahitasya kartavyam iti karma kurvataḥ kṣīṇa rāgasya ātma vidaḥ gṛhasthasya api mokṣam ācakṣate

original: yathā ''ya yājñavalkyaḥ [nyāyārjitadhanastattvajñānaniṣṭho 'tiśipriyaḥ /

original: śrāddhakṛdvedavidyāvit gṛhastho 'pi vimucyate] iti /

original: tasmād ṛṇānubandhād apavargābhāva ity ayuktam //
analyzed: tasmāt ṛṇa anubandhāt apavarga abhāvaḥ iti ayuktam

original: yat tu kleśānubandhād ititad apy anadhyavasāyamātram/

original: kāryo 'pi vātady asau na jñāyet jñātasya vā 'sya śamanopāyo na jñāyet jñāto 'pi vā 'nuṣthātum asau na śakyeta tadā ka evainamucchindyāt /
analyzed: kāryaḥ u pi vā atadī asau na jñāyet jñātasya vā sya śamana upāyaḥ na jñāyet jñātaḥ u pi vā asau na śakyeta tadā kaḥ eva enam ucchindyāt

original: kin tu nākasmikā na nityās te na nityājñātahetukāḥ /
analyzed: kin tu na ākasmikāḥ na nityāḥ te na nitya ajñāta hetukāḥ

original: nājñātaśamanopāyāḥ na cāśakyapratikriyāḥ //

original: na hi doṣāṇāṃ ātmasvarūpavan nityatvaṃ upajananāpāyadharmakatvena grahaṇāt mithyājñānaṃ ca prasavakāraṇam eṣām avadhṛtam iti nākasmikatvam avināśihetukatvam ajñātahetukatvaṃ vā //
analyzed: na hi doṣāṇām ātma sva rūpa vat nitya tvam upajanana apāya dharmaka tvena grahaṇāt mithyājñānam ca prasava kāraṇam eṣām avadhṛtam iti na ākasmika tvam avināśi hetuka tvam ajñāta hetuka tvam vā

original: mityājñānasya ca samyagjñānam pratipakṣabhāvanābhyāsena ca samūlamunnīlayituṃ śakyante doṣāḥ iti nājñātapratīkāratvaṃ teṣām /

original: uktaṃ ca kena cit sarveṣāṃ savipakṣatvāt nirhrāsātiśayāśritāt /

analyzed: sātmībhāvāt tad abhyāsāt hīyeran āsravāḥ kvacid

original: iti /

original: viṣayadoṣadarśanena hi teṣu saktilakṣaṇo rāgaḥ śāmyati /

analyzed: prasārita mukhaḥ smākam śoṇitam pātum āgataḥ

original: kim anenāparāddhaṃ naḥ svabhāvo vastunaḥ svayam /
analyzed: kim anena aparāddham naḥ svabhāvaḥ vastunaḥ svayam

original: spṛśyamāno dahaty agniḥ iti kasmai prakupyati //
analyzed: spṛśyamānaḥ dahati agniḥ iti kasmai prakupyati

original: nānukūlaḥ priye hetuḥ pratikūlo na vipriye /
analyzed: na anukūlaḥ priye hetuḥ pratikūlaḥ na vipriye

original: svakarmaphalamaśnāmi kaḥ suhṛtkaś ca me ripuḥ //
analyzed: sva karma phalam aśnāmi kaḥ suhṛd kaḥ ca me ripuḥ

original: evamaharniśaṃ cintayato nitāntaṃ śāntasya manasaḥ samacittatā sarvatra samudbhavatīti vilīyante doṣagranthayaḥ //
analyzed: evam aharniśam cintayataḥ nitāntam śāntasya manasaḥ samacitta tā sarvatra samudbhavati iti vilīyante doṣa granthayaḥ

original: ata evopadiśyante mokṣaśāstreṣv anekaśaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva upadiśyante mokṣa śāstreṣu anekaśas

original: tasya tasyopaghātāya tāstāḥ pratyūhabhāvanāḥ //
analyzed: tasya tasya upaghātāya tāḥ tāḥ pratyūha bhāvanāḥ

original: nanu ca pratipakṣabhāvane 'pi na sarvātmanā doṣapakṣaḥ kṣayam upayāti /
analyzed: nanu ca pratipakṣa bhāvane pi na sarva ātmanā doṣa pakṣaḥ kṣayam upayāti

original: nimbābhyupayoga iva kriyamāṇe kaphadhātur itinaitad evamtatra nimbopayogavat tad anukūlasyānnapānāderupayogadarśanāt /
analyzed: nimba abhyupayoge iva kriyamāṇe kapha dhātuḥ iti nā etat evam tatra nimba upayoga vat tat anukūlasya anna pāna ādeḥ upayoga darśanāt

original: api ca dharmilopabhayāt tatra neṣṭaḥ sarvātmanā kṣayaḥ /
analyzed: api ca dharmi lopa bhayāt tatra nā iṣṭaḥ sarva ātmanā kṣayaḥ

original: kaphādhikyaṃ tu hantavyaṃ dhātusāmyasya siddhaye //
analyzed: kapha ādhikyam tu hantavyam dhātu sāmyasya siddhaye

original: iha sarvātmanocchedyāḥ kleśāḥ saṃsārakāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: iha sarva ātmanā ucchedyāḥ kleśāḥ saṃsāra kāriṇaḥ

original: chedaś caikānatatas teṣāṃ pratipakṣopasevayā //
analyzed: chedaḥ ca ekānatataḥ teṣām pratipakṣa upasevayā

original: na ca pratipakṣabhāvanābhyāsam ekaṃ astramapāsya tadupaśame nimittāntaraṃ kim api kramate //
analyzed: na ca pratipakṣa bhāvanā abhyāsam ekam astram apāsya tad upaśame nimitta antaram kim api kramate

original: na hi viṣayābhilāṣas tadupabhogena viraṃsyati /
analyzed: na hi viṣaya abhilāṣaḥ tad upabhogena viraṃsyati

original: yathā ''ha [na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati /
analyzed: yathā ha na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati

original: haviṣā kṛṣṇavatmeva bhūya evābhivardhate //] anyatrāpy uktam[bhogābhyāsamanu vivardhante rāgāḥ kauśalāni cendriyāṇām] iti //
analyzed: haviṣā kṛṣṇa vatmā iva bhūyas evā abhivardhate anyatra api uktam bhoga abhyāsam anu vivardhante rāgāḥ kauśalāni ca indriyāṇām iti

original: pārāśaryo 'py āha [tṣṛṇākhaniragādheyaṃ duṣpūrā kena pūryate /
analyzed: pārāśaryaḥ pi āha duṣpūrā kena pūryate

original: yā mahadbhir api kṛipteiḥ pūraṇenaiva khanyate] iti //
analyzed: yā mahadbhiḥ api kṛiptā iiḥ pūraṇena eva khanyate iti

original: tasmā pratipakṣabhāvanaiva bhagavatī bhīmakāntiḥ antaḥkaraṇakāntāre nirantaramabhijvalantī dāvadahanadīdhitir iva dahati doṣaviṭapakān iti /
analyzed: pratipakṣa bhāvanā eva bhagavatī bhīma kāntiḥ antaḥkaraṇa kāntāre nirantaram abhijvalantī dāva dahana dīdhitiḥ iva dahati doṣa viṭapakān iti

original: tad evaṃ doṣānubandhavidhvaṃsopāyasaṃbhavān na tatkṛto mokṣamārganirodho 'bhidhātavyaḥ //
analyzed: tat evam doṣa anubandha vidhvaṃsa upāya saṃbhavāt na tad kṛtaḥ mokṣa mārga nirodhaḥ bhidhātavyaḥ

original: ata eva kecana cetanasya prakṛtyā nirmalatvāt malānām āgantukatvāt malanibarhaṇahetoś ca yathoktasya saṃbhavāt tadācaraṇāttadapāye sati svataśakalapadārthadarśanasāmarthyasvabhāvacittattvāvasthānāt sarvajñasiddhim adūravartinīm eva manyante //
analyzed: atas eva kecana cetanasya prakṛtyāḥ nirmala tvāt malānām āgantuka tvāt mala nibarhaṇa hetoḥ ca yathā uktasya saṃbhavāt tad ācaraṇāt tad apāye sati svatas śakala padārtha darśana sāmarthya svabhāva cit tattva avasthānāt sarvajña siddhim adūra vartinīm eva manyante

original: yad apy uktaṃ kleśaśūnyatvamātmano na kadācid api dṛṣṭam anubandhavṛttitvāt kveśānām ititad apy asatyamsuṣuptāvasthāyām aspṛṣṭasya doṣair ātmanaḥ pratyaham upalambhāt /
analyzed: yat api uktam kleśa śūnyatvam ātmanaḥ na kadācid api dṛṣṭam anubandha vṛtti tvāt kva īśānām iti tat api asatyam suṣupta avasthāyām a spṛṣṭasya doṣaiḥ ātmanaḥ pratyaham upalambhāt

original: jāgrato 'pi kā cana tādṛśī caśā dṛśyata eva yasyāma sāv ātmasvarūpa evātmā nirmalo 'vatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: jāgrataḥ pi kā cana tādṛśī caśā dṛśyate eva yasyāma sau ātma svarūpaḥ eva ātmā nirmalaḥ vatiṣṭhate

original: yathoktaṃ [aharaharbrahmalokaṃ yānti] iti /
analyzed: yathā uktam ahar ahar brahma lokam yānti iti

original: tad alam anena doṣānubandhakathānubandhena //
analyzed: tat alam anena doṣa anubandha kathā anubandhena

original: yad api pravṛttyanubandhād iti pratyapādi tad api sūtrakṛtā samāhintam [na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīnakleśasya iti /
analyzed: yat api pravṛtti anubandhāt iti pratyapādi tat api sūtrakṛtā na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīna kleśasya iti

original: doṣeṣu bandhahetuṣu vigaliteṣu pravṛttir api na dehendriyādijanmane prabhavatīti //
analyzed: doṣeṣu bandha hetuṣu vigaliteṣu pravṛttiḥ api na deha indriya ādi janmane prabhavati iti

original: nanu doṣakṣayān mā bhūt uttaraḥ karmasaṅgrahaḥ /
analyzed: nanu doṣa kṣayāt mā bhūt uttaraḥ karma saṅgrahaḥ

original: kathaṃ phalamadattvā tu prāktanaṃ karma śāmyati //
analyzed: katham phalam a dattvā tu prāktanam karma śāmyati

original: atra kecid āhuḥdadaty eva karmāṇi nādattvā śāmyantitathāpi bandhatetavo na bhavanti /
analyzed: atra kecid āhuḥ dadati eva karmāṇi na a dattvā śāmyanti tathā api bandha tetavaḥ na bhavanti

original: yataḥ śamasantoṣādijanitaṃ yoginaḥ sukham utpādyadharmo vinaṅkṣyati adharmaś ca śītātapakleśādidvārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ dattveti //
analyzed: yatas śama santoṣa ādi janitam yoginaḥ sukham utpādya dharmaḥ vinaṅkṣyati adharmaḥ ca śīta ātapa kleśa ādi dvārakam duḥkham dattvā iti

original: nanu amuṣmātmakarmaṇaḥ idaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti karmaphalānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhavaniyamāt katham iytā karmaphalopabhogo bhaved ity anyathā tadupabhogam apare varṇayanti /
analyzed: nanu idam phalam bhavati iti karma phalānām kārya kāraṇa bhava niyamāt katham iytā karma phala upabhogaḥ bhavet iti anyathā tad upabhogam apare varṇayanti

original: yogī hi yogardhisiddhyā vihitanikhilanijadharmādharmakarmānirmāya tadupabhogayogyāni teṣu teṣūpapattisthāneṣu tāni tāni sendriyāṇi śarīrāṇi raṇḍāntaḥkaraṇāni ca muktair ātmabhir upekṣitāni gṛhītvā sakṛd eva sakalakarmaphalam anubhavati prāptaiśvarya itīttham upabhogena karmaṇāṃ kṣayaḥ //
analyzed: yogī hi yoga ṛdhi siddhyā vihita nikhila nija dharma adharma karmā nirmāya tad upabhoga yogyāni teṣu teṣu upapatti sthāneṣu tāni tāni sa indriyāṇi śarīrāṇi raṇḍa antaḥkaraṇāni ca muktaiḥ ātmabhiḥ upekṣitāni gṛhītvā sakṛt eva sakala karma phalam anubhavati prāpta aiśvaryaḥ iti ittham upabhogena karmaṇām kṣayaḥ

original: anye tv ācakṣatekim anena bhogāyāsena adattaphalāny eva karmāṇi yogino naṅkṣyanti /
analyzed: anye tu ācakṣate kim anena bhoga āyāsena adatta phalāni eva karmāṇi yoginaḥ naṅkṣyanti

original: tattvajñānasyaiva bhagavata iyān prabhāvaḥ yad asminn utpanne cirasaṃcitāny api karmāṇi sahasaiva pralayam upayānti /
analyzed: tattva jñānasya eva bhagavataḥ iyān prabhāvaḥ yat asmin utpanne cira saṃcitāni api karmāṇi sahasā eva pralayam upayānti

original: bhogād api teṣāṃ prakṣayaḥ śāstraprāmāṇyādevāvagataḥ /
analyzed: bhogāt api teṣām prakṣayaḥ śāstra prāmāṇyāt eva avagataḥ

original: tathā tatprāmāṇyād eva tattvajñānād api tatprakṣayaṃ pratipatsyāmahe /
analyzed: tathā tad prāmāṇyāt eva tattva jñānāt api tad prakṣayam pratipatsyāmahe

original: tathā cāha [yathaidhāṃsi samiddho 'gniḥ bhasmasātkurute 'rjuna /
analyzed: tathā ca āha yathā edhāṃsi samiddhaḥ gniḥ bhasmasātkurute rjuna

original: jñānāgniḥ sarvakarmāṇi bhasmasātkurute tathā] iti //
analyzed: jñāna agniḥ sarva karmāṇi bhasmasātkurute tathā iti

original: na cedaṃ śraddhāmātram vedavidāmagraṇyā vyāsamuninaiva samābhidhānāt avedārthaṃ hi nāsāv abhidadhīteti //
analyzed: na ca idam śraddhā mātram veda vidām agraṇyā vyāsa muninā eva sama abhidhānāt a veda artham hi na asau abhidadhīta iti

original: tam anye na manyante /
analyzed: tam anye na manyante

original: na sarvāmanā karmaṇāṃ dāhaḥ /
analyzed: na sarva amanā karmaṇām dāhaḥ

original: kin tu svarūpeṇa satām api sahakārivaikalyāt svakāryakaraṇodāsīnata teṣāṃ bhavati bhraṣṭānām iva bījānām aṅkurakaraṇakauśalahāniḥ /
analyzed: kin tu sva rūpeṇa satām api sahakāri vaikalyāt teṣām bhavati bhraṣṭānām iva bījānām aṅkura karaṇa kauśala hāniḥ

original: yataḥ sāmagrī kāryasya janikā na kevalaṃ kārakam /
analyzed: yatas sāmagrī kāryasya janikā na kevalam kārakam

original: ato na karmāṇyevakevalāni phalopabhogayogyaśarīrendriyādijanmanimittatām upayānti /
analyzed: atas na karmāṇi eva kevalāni phala upabhoga yogya śarīra indriya ādi janma nimitta tām upayānti

original: kin tu mithyājñanena doṣaiś ca sahitāni /
analyzed: kin tu mithyā jñanena doṣaiḥ ca sahitāni

original: tad uktaṃ [avidyātṛṣṇe dharmādharmau ca janmakāraṇam] iti //
analyzed: tat uktam avidyā tṛṣṇe dharma adharmau ca janma kāraṇam iti

original: tattvavidaś ca tattvavittvād eva nāvidyā mithyājñanātmikā bhavati /
analyzed: tattva vidaḥ ca tattva vid tvāt eva na avidyā mithyājñana ātmikā bhavati

original: doṣāṇāṃ tu prathame darśita eva kramaḥ /
analyzed: doṣāṇām tu prathame darśitaḥ eva kramaḥ

original: tadabhāve bhavantāv api dharmādharmau na bandhāya kalpete /
analyzed: tad abhāve bhavantau api dharma adharmau na bandhāya kalpete

original: na hi svakāryam aṅkurādikusūlavartīni bījani jananiyum utsahante //
analyzed: na hi sva kāryam aṅkura ādi kusūla vartīni bījani jana niyum utsahante

original: bhraṣṭabījānām api svarūpaśaktir api tānavaṃ gatā /
analyzed: bhraṣṭa bījānām api sva rūpa śaktiḥ api tānavam gatā

original: tadvat karmaṇāṃ svarūpaśaktiśaithilyaṃ mā nāma bhūt /
analyzed: tadvat karmaṇām svarūpa śakti śaithilyam mā nāma bhūt

original: tathāpi kusūlavarti bījavat sahakārivaidhuryāt kāryānārambha iti /
analyzed: tathā api kusūla varti bīja vat sahakāri vaidhuryāt kārya anārambhaḥ iti

original: tad idam uktaṃ [na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīnakleśasya]iti //
analyzed: tat idam uktam na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīna kleśasya eti

original: nanu svarūpasattāyāṃ dharmādharmayoḥ katham idam uktaṃ navānām ātmaguṇānāṃ nirmūlocchedo 'pavarga itinaiṣa doṣaḥmanaśaṃyogavadakiñcitkarayor avasthānam api ucchedān na viśiṣyate /
analyzed: nanu svarūpa sattāyām dharma adharmayoḥ katham idam uktam navānām ātma guṇānām upavargaḥ avasthānam api ucchedāt na viśiṣyate

original: muktasyātmanaḥ vibhutvādaparihāryo manaśaṃyogaḥ /
analyzed: muktasya ātmanaḥ vibhu tvāt aparihāryaḥ

original: na ca tadānīm asau sann api sukhaduḥkhajñanādijanmani vyāpriyate /
analyzed: na ca tadānīm asau san api sukha duḥkha jñana ādi janmani vyāpriyate

original: evaṃ dharmādharmau santāv apiphalamanākṣipantau kiṃ kariṣyata iti phalata ucchinnāv eva bhavataḥ /
analyzed: evam dharma adharmau santau apiphalam an ākṣipantau kim kariṣyataḥ iti phalataḥ ucchinnau eva bhavataḥ

original: tasmān navānām ātmaguṇānām ucchedo 'pavarga ity aviruddham //
analyzed: tasmāt navānām ātma guṇānām ucchedaḥ pavargaḥ iti a viruddham

original: evaṃ pravṛttyanubandhasyāpi bandhahetor abhāvān na dugamo 'pavargaḥ /
analyzed: evam pravṛtti anubandhasya api bandha hetoḥ abhāvāt na pavargaḥ

original: apare punar āhuḥkarmaphalānāṃ śāstrataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamāvagateḥ śamasantoṣaśītātapādidvārakasukhaduḥkhamātropapādanena karmaparikṣayānupapatteḥ yogarddhyā ca dīrghakālāvadhisukhaduḥkhopabhogasya sakṛd eva saṃpādayitum aśakyatvāt jñānāgninā ca dāhe tatkarmopadeśivaidikavacanasārthānarthakyaprasaṅgāt adattaphalasya karmaṇo 'nuparamāt avasthānapakṣe ciram apy uṣitvā kusūlāvasthitabījavat kālāntareṇāpi tatphalākṣepaprasaṅgāt avaśyaṃ svaphalopabhogadvāraka eva karmakṣayo vācyaḥ //
analyzed: apare punar āhuḥ karma phalānām śāstrataḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva niyama avagateḥ śama santoṣa śīta ātapa ādi dvāraka sukha duḥkha mātra upapādanena karma parikṣaya anupapatteḥ yoga ṛddhyā ca dīrgha kāla avadhi sukha duḥkha upabhogasya sakṛt eva saṃpādayitum aśakya tvāt jñāna agninā ca dāhe tad karma upadeśi vaidika vacana sārtha ānarthakya prasaṅgāt adatta phalasya karmaṇaḥ nu paramāt avasthāna pakṣe ciram api uṣitvā kusūla avasthita bīja vat

original: na cānirmokṣa āśaṅkanīyaḥ tataś cirād api tatsiddhisaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: na ca anirmokṣaḥ āśaṅkanīyaḥ tatas cirāt api tad siddhi saṃbhavāt

original: tathā ca mumukṣur nityanaimittikaṃ karmāvaśyam anutiṣṭhet ananutiṣṭhan pratyaveyād iti tat kuto 'sya bandhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tathā ca mumukṣuḥ nitya naimittikam karma avaśyam anutiṣṭhet an anutiṣṭhan pratyaveyāt iti tat kutas sya bandhaḥ syāt

original: kāmyaṃ niṣiddhaṃ ca karma svarganarakakāri vispaṣṭam eva bandhasādhanam iti tatparihared evety evaṃ tāvad uttaro 'yaṃ na karmasaṃcayaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: kāmyam niṣiddham ca karma svarga naraka kāri vispaṣṭam eva bandha sādhanam iti tat pariharet eva iti evam tāvat uttaraḥ yam na karma saṃcayaḥ pravartate

original: tad āha [nityanaimittike kuryāt pratyavāyajihāsayā /
analyzed: tat āha nitya naimittike kuryāt pratyavāya jihāsayā

original: mokṣārthī na pravarteta tatra kāmyaniṣiddhayoḥ] iti //
analyzed: mokṣa arthī na pravarteta tatra kāmya niṣiddhayoḥ iti

original: prāktanasya tu karmasaṃcayasya bhogād eva kṣayaḥ/
analyzed: prāktanasya tu karma saṃcayasya bhogāt eva kṣayaḥ

original: ātmavidaś ca mumukṣor ayam anuṣṭhānakramo bhavati nenarasyeti sa evettyam apavṛjyata iti /
analyzed: ātma vidaḥ ca mumukṣoḥ ayam anuṣṭhāna kramaḥ bhavati na inarasya iti saḥ eva ittyam apavṛjyate iti

original: āha ca [ātmajñe caitad astīti tadjñānam upayujyate /
analyzed: āha ca ātma jñe ca etat asti iti tad jñānam upayujyate

original: tatra jñātātmatattvānāṃ bhogātpūrvakriyākṣaye //
analyzed: tatra jñāta ātma tattvānām bhogāt pūrva kriyā kṣaye

original: uttarapracayāsattvāt deho notpadyate punaḥ //] nanu nityakarmanuṣṭhānapakṣe nāsty eva mokṣaḥ /
analyzed: uttara pracaya asattvāt dehaḥ na utpadyate punar nanu nitya karma anuṣṭhāna pakṣe na asti eva mokṣaḥ

original: yāny eva hi nityani darśapaurṇamāsādikarmāṇi [yāvaj jīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta] ityādicodanopadiṣṭāni tāny eva phalavanti śrūyanta iti kāmyāny api bhavitum arhanti [darśapaurṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta] [agnihotraṃ juhuyānsvargakāmaḥ] itinaphalābhisandhānapūrvakatvenāprayogāt /
analyzed: yāni eva hi nityani darśa paurṇamāsa ādi karmāṇi yāvat jīvam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta ityādi codana upadiṣṭāni tāni eva phalavanti śrūyante iti kāmyāni api bhavitum arhanti darśa paurṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta agnihotram juhuyān svarga kāmaḥ

original: tathā ''ha [prārthyamānaṃ phalaṃ jñātaṃ nānicchos tadbhaviṣyati] iti /
analyzed: tathā ha prārthyamānam phalam jñātam na an icchoḥ tat bhaviṣyati iti

original: so 'yaṃ pravṛttau viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ yam pravṛttau viśeṣaḥ

original: prayoge 'pi viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: prayoge pi viśeṣaḥ

original: kāmyaṃ karma sarvāṅgopasaṃhāreṇa prayujyamānaṃ phalasādhanam iti na yathāśakti tathā tathā prayoktavyam iti /
analyzed: kāmyam karma sarva aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa prayujyamānam phala sādhanam iti na yathāśakti tathā tathā prayoktavyam iti

original: nityakarmaṇaḥ akaraṇāt pratyavāya iti yathaśakty api tat prayoktavyam /
analyzed: nitya karmaṇaḥ akaraṇāt pratyavāyaḥ iti yathaśakti api tat prayoktavyam

original: ananuṣṭhitāt yādṛk tādṛk anuṣṭhitaśreyaḥpratyavāyaparihāropapatteḥ //
analyzed: ananuṣṭhitāt yādṛś tādṛś anuṣṭhita śreyaḥ pratyavāya parihāra upapatteḥ

original: kāmye tu sarvāṇy aṅgāni yady asāv upasaṃhartuṃ na na śaknuyāt mā pravartiṣṭa na hy apravartamānaḥ pratyaveyād iti //
analyzed: kāmye tu sarvāṇi aṅgāni yadi asau upasaṃhartum na na śaknuyāt mā pravartiṣṭa na hi a pravartamānaḥ pratyaveyāt iti

original: evaṃ ca tad eva darśapaurṇamāsādikarma [yāvaj jīvaṃ] iti codanayopadiṣṭaṃ nityaṃ sat tatphalānabhisandhānāt prayuktaṃ na bandhāya kalpate /
analyzed: evam ca tat eva darśa paurṇamāsa ādi karma yāvat jīvam iti codanayā upadiṣṭam nityam sat tad phala anabhisandhānāt prayuktam na bandhāya kalpate

original: kva sā svargasādhanatvaśaktiḥ asya gateti cetnana vayaṃ karmaṇāṃ śaktimaśakti vā pratyakṣataḥ prapaśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: kva sā svarga sādhana tva śaktiḥ asya gatā iti vayam karmaṇām śaktim aśakti vā pratyakṣataḥ prapaśyāmaḥ

original: śāstraikaśaraṇās tu śrotriyā vayam /
analyzed: śāstra eka śaraṇāḥ tu śrotriyāḥ vayam

original: codanaiva dharme pramāṇam iti naḥ kulavratam etat /
analyzed: codanā eva dharme pramāṇam iti naḥ kula vratam etat

original: sā ca codanā ekatra kāminam achikāriṇam āśritya pravṛttā /
analyzed: sā ca codanā ekatra kāminam achikāriṇam āśritya pravṛttā

original: tadadhikāraś ca phalanirvṛtter vinā na syād iti phalaparyantatāṃ pratipadyate //
analyzed: tad adhikāraḥ ca phala nirvṛtteḥ vinā na syāt iti phala paryanta tām pratipadyate

original: anyatra tu yāvatpadopabaddhajīvanapadārthāvacchinnādhikārilābhena pravartamānā na phalāya prabhavati /
analyzed: anyatra tu yāvat pada upabaddha jīvana padārtha avacchinna adhikāri lābhena pravartamānā na phalāya prabhavati

original: akriyamāṇe tu śāstrārthe pratyavāyāya bhavati adhikṛtena satā śāstrārthastyakta iti /
analyzed: a kriyamāṇe tu śāstra arthe pratyavāyāya bhavati adhikṛtena satā śāstra arthaḥ tyaktaḥ iti

original: kāmye tv anutpannakāmo 'dhikṛta eva na bhavatīti nādhikṛtena satā vidhis tyakta iti na pratyavaitīti /
analyzed: kāmye tu anutpannakāmaḥ dhikṛtaḥ eva na bhavati iti na adhikṛtena satā vidhiḥ tyaktaḥ iti na pratyavaiti iti

original: upakramya tv antarāle tyaktuṃ na labhata eva /
analyzed: upakramya tu antarāle tyaktum na labhate eva

original: vītāyāṃ phalecchāyāṃ āvāpte vā phale tatkarmasamāpanavad avaśyakartavyam eva tad iti alaṃ śāstrāntaragarbheṇa bhūyasā kathāvistareṇa //
analyzed: vītāyām phala icchāyām āvāpte vā phale tad karma samāpana vat avaśya kartavyam eva tat iti alam śāstra antara garbheṇa bhūyasā kathā vistareṇa

original: sarvathā suṣṭūktaṃ [nityanaimittike kuryāt] iti //
analyzed: sarvathā suṣṭu uktam nitya naimittike kuryāt iti

original: nanu bhogāt prāktanakarmakṣayapakṣe dīrghakālāpekṣaṇāt apratyāsanna iva mokṣo lakṣyatekiṃ tvayā jñātam adhunaiva /
analyzed: nanu bhogāt prāktana karma kṣaya pakṣe dīrgha kāla apekṣaṇāt apratyāsannaḥ iva mokṣaḥ lakṣyate kim tvayā jñātam adhunā eva

original: huṃkṛtvā nirvilambam eva mokṣam āpnuyād iti /
analyzed: huṃkṛtvā nirvilambam eva mokṣam āpnuyāt iti

original: na khalu sulabho 'yaṃ puruṣārthaḥ /
analyzed: na khalu sulabhaḥ yam puruṣa arthaḥ

original: kiṃ na śrutam idam āyuṣmatā vyāsavacanam [anekajanmasaṃsiddhas tato yāti parāṃ gaim] iti //
analyzed: kim na śrutam idam āyuṣmatā vyāsa vacanam aneka janma saṃsiddhaḥ tatas yāti parām gaim iti

original: jñānāgnidāhavacanaṃ tu jñānapraśaṃsārtham eva /
analyzed: jñāna agni dāha vacanam tu jñāna praśaṃsā artham eva

original: so 'yaṃ jñānakarmasamuccayān mokṣa ucyata iti //
analyzed: saḥ yam jñāna karma samuccayāt mokṣaḥ ucyate iti

original: atrābhidhīyatena khalu phalopabhogadvārakaḥ karmaṇāṃ parikṣayaḥ janmakoṭiśatair api śakyakriyaḥ /
analyzed: atra abhidhīyate ena khalu phala upabhoga dvārakaḥ karmaṇām parikṣayaḥ janma koṭi śataiḥ api śakya kriyaḥ

original: uktaṃ hi [ekam evedṛśaṃ karma kartum āpatati kvacit /
analyzed: uktam hi ekam evā īdṛśam karma kartum āpatati kvacid

original: janmāyutaśatenāpi yatphalaṃ bhujyate na vā //
analyzed: janma ayuta śatena api yat phalam bhujyate na vā

original: dehaistatkarmabhogārthaiḥ karmānyanna kariṣyate /
analyzed: dehaiḥ tad karma bhoga arthaiḥ karma anyat na kariṣyate

original: dehabandhanam ity eṣā durāśaiva tapasvinām //] tadīṛśam enaṃ mokṣapatham upadiśadbhir yājñikaiḥ mokṣopekṣaṇamanakṣaram upadiṣṭaṃ bhavatīti /
analyzed: deha bandhanam iti eṣā durāśā eva tapasvinām tat īṛśam enam mokṣa patham upadiśadbhiḥ yājñikaiḥ mokṣa upekṣaṇam anakṣaram upadiṣṭam bhavati iti

original: tasmāt pūrvoktanītyaiva karmaṇāṃ bandhahetutvamapākaraṇīyaṃ //
analyzed: tasmāt pūrva ukta nītyā eva karmaṇām bandha hetu tvam apākaraṇīyam

original: nanu pakṣacatuṣṭaye 'pi doṣa uktaḥnacaturthapakṣasya niravadyatvāt /
analyzed: nanu pakṣa catuṣṭaye doṣaḥ uktaḥ na caturtha pakṣasya niravadya tvāt

original: sahakārivaikalyāt kusūlāvasthitabījavat karmaṇām anārambhakatve sati na kaściddoṣaḥ /
analyzed: sahakāri vaikalyāt kusūla avasthita bīja vat karmaṇām anārambhaka tve sati na kaścid doṣaḥ

original: eṣa eva ca teṣāṃ dāhaḥ yat kāryānārambhakatvam //
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva ca teṣām dāhaḥ yat kārya anārambhaka tvam

original: nanu avinaṣṭasvarūpāṇi kusūlabījavad eva kadā cirād ārapsyante kāryam /
analyzed: nanu avinaṣṭa svarūpāṇi kusūla bīja vat eva kadā cirāt ārapsyante kāryam

original: tasmādvaram ucchidyantām eva /
analyzed: tasmāt varam ucchidyantām eva

original: kim idānīṃ nityamātmānam apy ucchettuṃ yatāmahe /
analyzed: kim idānīm nityam ātmānam api ucchettum yatāmahe

original: sa hi purā bhoktā 'bhūd iti mukto 'pi punarbhoktṛtāṃ pratipadyeteti varam ucchidyantām eva //
analyzed: sa hi purā bhoktā bhūt iti muktaḥ u pi punar bhoktṛ tām pratipadyeta iti varam ucchidyantām eva

original: sāmagryabhāvāt katham asau punaḥ bhoktṛtāṃ gacchetiti cet karmāṇy api sahakāryabhāvāt kathaṃ kāryam ārabheranna ca karmaṇāṃ bandhakaraṇe rāgādayo na sahakāriṇa iti vaktuṃ śakyate[vītarāgasya jatmādarśanāt] ity asakṛduktatvāt /
analyzed: sāmagrī abhāvāt katham asau punar bhoktṛ tām gaccha iti iti ced karmāṇi api sahakāri abhāvāt katham kāryam ārabheran na ca karmaṇām bandha karaṇe rāga ādayaḥ na sahakāriṇaḥ iti vaktum śakyate vīta rāgasya iti asakṛt ukta tvāt

original: tasmād ayam eva sūtrakāropadiṣṭaḥ panthāḥ peśalaḥ [na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīnakleśasya] iti //
analyzed: tasmāt ayam eva sūtrakāra upadiṣṭaḥ panthāḥ peśalaḥ na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīna kleśasya iti

original: yac cedam ucyate jñānakarmasamuccayān mokṣa ititatredaṃ vaktavyam /
analyzed: yat ca idam ucyate jñāna karma samuccayāt mokṣaḥ iti tatra idam vaktavyam

original: karmaṇāṃ kīdṛśo mokṣaṃ pratyaṅgabhāvaḥna hi tatsādhyo mokṣaḥsvargādivad anityatvaprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: karmaṇām kīdṛśaḥ mokṣam prati aṅga bhāvaḥ na hi tad sādhyaḥ mokṣaḥ svarga ādi vat anitya tva prasaṅgāt

original: api ca ātmaiva svarūpāvasthito mokṣa ity ucyatena cātmasvarūpaṃ karmasādhyam anādinidhanatvena siddhatvāt //
analyzed: api ca ātmā eva sva rūpa avasthitaḥ mokṣaḥ iti ucyate na ca ātma sva rūpam karma sādhyam anādinidhana tvena siddha tvāt

original: nanu nityakarmān anuṣṭhāne pratyaveyād iti taddvārakabandhaparihāropāyatvāt karmāpi mokṣāṅgaṃ syātnasanyāsavidhānasya pratyakṣopadeśād ity uktatvāt /
analyzed: nanu nityakarmān anuṣṭhāne pratyaveyāt iti tad dvāraka bandha parihāra upāya tvāt karma api mokṣa aṅgam iti ukta tvāt

original: aparipakvakaṣāyāṇāṃ śanaiś śanais tatparipākaupayikatvena karmānuṣṭhānaṃ pāramparyeṇāpavargopāya iti tu bāḍham abhyupagamyate /
analyzed: aparipakva kaṣāyāṇām śanais śanais tad paripāka aupayika tvena karma anuṣṭhānam pāramparyeṇa apavarga upāyaḥ iti tu bāḍham abhyupagamyate

original: yathā ''ha manuḥ [mahāyajñaiś ca yajñaiś ca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ] iti //
analyzed: yathā ha manuḥ mahāyajñaiḥ ca yajñaiḥ ca brāhmī iyam kriyate tanuḥ iti

original: adhyātmavidaś ca jñānakāṇḍaupayikam eva kriyākāṇḍaṃ manyante /
analyzed: adhyātma vidaḥ ca jñāna kāṇḍa aupayikam eva kriyā kāṇḍam manyante

original: sākṣāt tu karmasādhye 'pavarge svargavad apāyitvaprasaṅgāt kṛtakasya sarvasyānityatvāt tattvajñānam eva mokṣopāya ity uktam //
analyzed: sākṣāt tu karma sādhye pavarge svarga vat apāyi tva prasaṅgāt kṛtakasya sarvasya anitya tvāt tattva jñānam eva mokṣa upāyaḥ iti uktam

original: yad api yamaniyamādisādhyam aṅgabhūtaṃ karmajātam tad api tadaṅgatāṃ gacchan na vāryate /
analyzed: yat api yama niyama ādi sādhyam aṅga bhūtam karma jātam tat api tad aṅga tām gacchan na vāryate

original: tatkāryatve 'piyāvadguṇapradhvaṃsābhāvasvabhāvatvāt mokṣasya na kṣayitvaṃ svargavat /
analyzed: tad kārya tve piyāvat guṇa pradhvaṃsa abhāva svabhāva tvāt mokṣasya na kṣayi tvam svarga vat

original: anyas tu na mokṣa ity uktam //
analyzed: anyaḥ tu na mokṣaḥ iti uktam

original: tatpūrvoktaprakrameṇāpavargaprāpyes tattvajñānam evābhyupayaḥ /
analyzed: tad pūrva ukta prakrameṇa apavarga prāpyeḥ tattva jñānam

original: karma tv aṅgaṃ tatra śaucādi kiñcit kiñcit tat syād ātmasaṃskārapūrvam //
analyzed: karma tu aṅgam tatra śauca ādi kiñcid kiñcid tat syāt ātma saṃskāra pūrvam

original: āhatattvajñānam idānīṃ vicintyatāmkiṃviṣayaṃ tadapavargāya kalpatekuto vā tasya niḥśreyasasādhanatvam avagatam iti //
analyzed: āha tattva jñānam idānīm vicintyatām kiṃviṣayam tat apavargāya kalpate kutas vā tasya niḥśreyasa sādhana tvam avagatam iti

original: nanu ātmajñānam apavargahetur iti bahuśaḥ kathitam evaitad iti ko 'yaṃ praśnaḥ navipratipatteḥ /
analyzed: nanu ātma jñānam apavarga hetuḥ iti bahuśas kathitam eva etat iti kaḥ yam praśnaḥ na vipratipatteḥ

original: vipravadante hy atra vādinaḥ //
analyzed: vipravadante hi atra vādinaḥ

original: eka evāyam /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva ayam

original: avidyāparikalpitaḥ jīvātmaparamātmavibhāgaḥ /
analyzed: avidyā parikalpitaḥ jīvātma paramātma vibhāgaḥ

original: paramātmatattvajñānād avidyāpāye mokṣ iti brahmavādinaḥ /
śabdādvaitaniścayād iti vaiyākaraṇāḥ //
analyzed: śabda advaita niścayāt iti vaiyākaraṇāḥ

original: vijñānādvaitadarśanād iti śākyabhikṣavaḥ //
analyzed: vijñāna advaita darśanāt iti śākya bhikṣavaḥ

original: prakṛtipuruṣavivekavijñānād iti pāramarṣāḥ //
analyzed: prakṛti puruṣa viveka vijñānāt iti pāramarṣāḥ

original: īśvarapraṇidhānād iti cānye //
analyzed: īśvara praṇidhānāt iti ca anye

original: tad evaṃ kasmai tattvajñānāya spṛhayantu mumukṣavaḥ iti vācyam //
analyzed: tat evam kasmai tattva jñānāya spṛhayantu mumukṣavaḥ iti vācyam

original: ucyate bhinnās tāvad ātmān iti gṛhyatām ātmajñnam eva niḥśreyasāṅgam iti //
analyzed: ucyate bhinnāḥ tāvat ātmān iti gṛhyatām ātma jñnam eva niḥśreyasa aṅgam iti

original: yat tu kutas tasya niḥśreyasasādhanatvam avagatam iti akṣapādavacanād iti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu kutas tasya niḥśreyasa sādhana tvam avagatam iti akṣapāda vacanāt iti brūmaḥ

original: akṣapādas tāvad evam upadiṣṭavān [ātmajñānān niḥśreyasādhigamaḥ iti] na ca niṣpramāṇakam artham eṣa ṛṣirūpādiśad iti bhavitavyam atra pramāṇena /
analyzed: akṣapādaḥ tāvat evam upadiṣṭavān ātma jñānāt niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ iti na ca niṣpramāṇakam artham eṣaḥ ṛṣiḥ ūpādiśat iti bhavitavyam atra pramāṇena

original: tat tu vaidikaṃ vidhivākyaṃ [ātmā jñātavyaḥ] iti //
analyzed: tat tu vaidikam vidhi vākyam ātmā jñātavyaḥ iti

original: sa eṣa tāvan na niradhikāraḥ vidhiḥ adhikārarahitasya ca vidheḥ prayogayogyatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: saḥ eṣa tāvat na niradhikāraḥ vidhiḥ adhikāra rahitasya ca vidheḥ prayoga yogya tva abhāvāt

original: adhikārānveṣaṇam upakramaṇīyam /
analyzed: adhikāra anveṣaṇam upakramaṇīyam

original: paraprakaraṇaparipaṭhanavirahāc ca nāsya samidādhividhivat pradhānādhikāraniveśitvam /
analyzed: para prakaraṇa paripaṭhana virahāt ca na asya samidh ādhi vidhi vat pradhāna adhikāra niveśi tvam

original: ataḥ viśvajidadhikaraṇanyāyena svargakāmam adhikāriṇam iha yāvad upādātur eva hṛdayapatham avatarati rātrisatra iva pratiṣṭheti tām evāsya phalatvena tipadyāmahe //
analyzed: atas viśvajit adhikaraṇa nyāyena svarga kāmam adhikāriṇam iha yāvat upādātuḥ eva hṛdaya patham avatarati rātri satre iva pratiṣṭhā iti tām eva asya phala tvena tipadyāmahe

original: sā ceyaṃ sādhyamānāpi rūpād eva hi śāśvatī /
analyzed: sā ca iyam sādhyamānā api rūpāt eva hi śāśvatī

original: cakāstyapunarāvṛttiḥ na svargavad apāyinī //
analyzed: cakāsti apunarāvṛttiḥ na svarga vat apāyinī

original: nanu dṛṣṭaprayojanālābhe sati adṛṣṭaprayojanaparikalpanāvasaraḥ /
analyzed: nanu dṛṣṭa prayojana alābhe sati adṛṣṭa prayojana parikalpanā avasaraḥ

original: iha ca dṛṣṭam eva prayojanam ātmajñānasya karmapravṛttihetutvam upalabhyate /
analyzed: iha ca dṛṣṭam eva prayojanam ātma jñānasya karma pravṛtti hetu tvam upalabhyate

original: nityenātmanā vinā bhūteṣv evācetaneṣu śmaśānāvadhiṣu bahuvittavyayāyāsasādhyāni ko nāma jyotiṣṭomādikarmāṇy anutiṣṭhed iti nitya evātmā paralokī jñātavyaḥ /
analyzed: nityena ātmanā vinā bhūteṣu eva acetaneṣu śmaśāna avadhiṣu bahu vitta vyaya āyāsa sādhyāni kaḥ nāma jyotiṣṭoma ādi karmāṇi anutiṣṭhet iti nityaḥ eva ātmā para lokī jñātavyaḥ

original: evaṃ hi nirviśaṅkaḥ karmasu pravarteteti //
analyzed: evam hi nirviśaṅkaḥ karmasu pravarteta iti

original: tad idam anupapannam anyata eva siddhatvāt /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam anyatas eva siddha tvāt

original: pratyabhijñāpratyakṣapratyayena jaiminīyaiḥ anumānamahimnā ca naiyāyikādibhiḥ ātmā nitya iti niścita eva /
analyzed: pratyabhijñā pratyakṣa pratyayena jaiminīyaiḥ anumāna mahimnā ca naiyāyika ādibhiḥ ātmā nityaḥ iti niścitaḥ eva

original: kim atra vidhiḥ kariṣyati /itikartavyatākalāpopadeśaś ca tadānīm atyantaniṣprayojanaḥ syāt /
analyzed: kim atra vidhiḥ kariṣyati itikartavya tā kalāpa upadeśaḥ ca tadānīm atyanta niṣprayojanaḥ syāt

original: amī ca tathā nāmātimahānto vedagranthā iyaty eva paryavasannā iti tad idam upanatam seyaṃ mahato vaṃśastambāt laṭvā ''kṛṣyata iti /
analyzed: amī ca tathā nāma ati mahāntaḥ veda granthāḥ iyatī eva paryavasannāḥ iti tat idam upanatam sā iyam mahataḥ vaṃśa stambāt laṭvā kṛṣyate iti

original: tasmād arthavādasamarpitam apunarāvṛttirūpam eva phalam ātmajñānavidhir avalambata ity evaṃ kecit //
analyzed: tasmāt arthavāda samarpitam apunarāvṛtti rūpam eva phalam ātma jñāna vidhiḥ avalambate iti evam kecid

original: sūkṣmadarśinas tv āhuḥ iyam api mahatī durgatiḥ yatt arthavādasukhaprekṣitvam asyoktam adhikāravidheḥ /
analyzed: sūkṣma darśinaḥ tu āhuḥ iyam api mahatī durgatiḥ arthavāda sukha prekṣi tvam asya uktam adhikāra vidheḥ

original: viśvājiti rātrisatre vā kim anyat kriyatām /
analyzed: viśvājiti rātri satre vā kim anyat kriyatām

original: na hi viśvajidrūpaparyālocanataḥ kaścid adhikārī labhyata iti balāt svargakāmādiḥ kalpyate vā arthavādasamarpito vā 'valambyate /
analyzed: na hi viśvajit rūpa paryālocanataḥ kaścid adhikārī labhyate iti balāt svarga kāma ādiḥ kalpyate vā arthavāda samarpitaḥ vā valambyate

original: yatra tu vidhisvarūpamahimnaiva tad upalambhaḥ tatra kiṃ kalpanayā kim arthavādavad anāvalokanadainyena vā /
analyzed: yatra tu vidhi svarūpa mahimnā eva tat upalambhaḥ tatra kim kalpanayā kim arthavāda vat anāvalokana dainyena vā

original: iha ca [svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ] itivad [agnīn ādadhīta] itivad vā kṛtyena dvitīyayā vā īpsitatamatvanirdeśāt tanniṣṭhatvam evāvatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: iha ca svādhyāyaḥ dhyetavyaḥ iti vat agnīn ādadhīta iti vat vā kṛtyena dvitīyayā vā īpsitatama tva nirdeśāt tad niṣṭha tvam eva avatiṣṭhate

original: tatra yathā 'gnyarthatayā ''dhānavidhir avagamyamānaḥ agnīnām anekavidhipuruṣārthaupayikakarmakalāpopayogāt tadārjanenaiva kṛtārthatvam upagata iti na phalāntaram apekṣate yathā vā [svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ] ity akṣaragrahaṇārthatvāt asya vidheḥ akṣaragrahaṇasya ca phalavat karmāvabodhadvāreṇa paramapuruṣārthopāyatvāvadhāraṇān na tadatiriktadhṛtamadhukulyādiphalāntarāpekṣitvam /
analyzed: tatra yathā gni artha tayā dhāna vidhiḥ avagamyamānaḥ agnīnām aneka vidhi puruṣa artha aupayika karma kalāpa upayogāt tad ārjanena eva kṛtārtha tvam upagataḥ iti na phala antaram apekṣate yathā vā svādhyāyaḥ dhyetavyaḥ iti akṣara grahaṇa artha tvāt asya vidheḥ akṣara grahaṇasya ca phala vat karma avabodha dvāreṇa parama puruṣa artha upāya tva avadhāraṇāt na tad atirikta dhṛta madhukulyā ādi phala antara apekṣi tvam

original: na cādhyāpanavidhyaṅgatvaṃ svamahimnaivepsitatamasaṃskāradvārakādhikāralābhāt evam ihāpy apahatapāpmādyātmasvarūpaparijñānam eva tasya paramapuruṣārthatām avabodhayann asya vidher anyaprayojanatām āpādayati //
analyzed: na ca adhyāpana vidhi aṅga tvam sva mahimnā evā īpsitatama saṃskāra dvārakā adhikāra lābhāt evam iha api apahata pāpma ādi ātma sva rūpa parijñānam eva tasya parama puruṣa artha tām avabodhayan asya vidheḥ anya prayojana tām āpādayati

original: kaścit kila saṃskāravidhiḥ saṃskriyamāṇaniṣṭho 'pi saṃskriyamāṇaprayojanāpekṣayā paramukhaprekṣī bhavati [vrīhīn prokṣati] itivat /
analyzed: kaścid kila saṃskāra vidhiḥ saṃskriyamāṇa niṣṭhaḥ saṃskriyamāṇa prayojana apekṣayā para mukha prekṣī bhavati vrīhīn prokṣati itivat

original: kaścit tu saṃskriyamāṇaprayojanam alabhamānaḥ tadīpsitatamatvānirvahaṇāt saṃskāravidhitvam eva jahāti [saktūn juhoti] itivat /
analyzed: kaścid tu saṃskriyamāṇa prayojanam alabhamānaḥ tad īpsitatama tva anirvahaṇāt saṃskāra vidhi tvam eva jahāti saktūn juhoti itivat

original: yathoktam [bhūtabhāvyupayogaṃ hi dravyaṃ saṃskāryam iṣyate /
analyzed: yathā uktam bhūta bhāvi upayogam hi dravyam saṃskāryam iṣyate

original: saktavo nopayokṣyante nopayuktāś ca te kvacit] iti //
analyzed: saktavaḥ na upayokṣyante na upayuktāḥ ca te kvacid iti

original: yasya tu saṃskāryam anardham iva ratnam aparyuṣitam ivāmṛtam anastamitav iva candrabimbam aparimlānam iva śatapatram asti kas tarhi prakaraṇapāṭhāpekṣāyāṃ arthavādamukhaprekṣaṇena phalakalpanāyāṃ vā 'bhilāṣaḥ ata eva na kāmaśrutiprayuktatvam ādhānasya na cācāryakaraṇavidhiprayuktatvam adhyayanasyeti //
analyzed: yasya tu saṃskāryam an ardham iva ratnam a paryuṣitam iva amṛtam an astamitau iva candra bimbam a parimlānam iva śatapatram asti kaḥ tarhi prakaraṇa pāṭha apekṣāyām arthavāda mukha prekṣaṇena phala kalpanāyām vā bhilāṣaḥ atas eva na kāma śruti prayukta tvam ādhānasya na ca ācārya karaṇa vidhi prayukta tvam adhyayanasya iti

original: tasmāt svādhyāyādhyayanāgnyādhānavidhisamānayogakṣematvāt ātmajñānavidheḥ tatkṛtam ātmajñānam apavargārtham avagamyate /
analyzed: tasmāt svādhyāya adhyayana agnyādhāna vidhi samāna yogakṣema tvāt ātma jñāna vidheḥ tat kṛtam ātma jñānam apavarga artham avagamyate

original: tathāvidhasvarūpa ātmaiva paropādhijanitadharmarahitaḥ apavarga ity ucyate /
analyzed: tathāvidha svarūpaḥ ātmā eva para upādhi janita dharma rahitaḥ apavargaḥ iti ucyate

original: yataḥ tad idam ittham ātmajñānam eva niḥśreyasasādhanaṃ ananyalabhyam iti tad evopadiṣṭavān ācāryo 'kṣapādaḥ //
analyzed: yatas tat idam ittham ātma jñānam eva niḥśreyasa sādhanam ananya labhyam iti tat eva upadiṣṭavān ācāryaḥ kṣapādaḥ

original: yat tu vijñānasattātmaśabdādyadvaitadarśanaṃ tat mithyājñānam eveti na niḥśreyasasādhanam iti //
analyzed: yat tu vijñāna sattā ātma śabda ādi advaita darśanam tat mithyājñānam eva iti na niḥśreyasa sādhanam iti

original: nanu katham advaitadarśanaṃ mithyā kathyate tat /
analyzed: nanu katham advaita darśanam mithyā kathyate tat

original: prayuta dvaitadarśanam avidyā māyā 'pi mithyājñānam iti yuktam /
analyzed: prayuta dvaita darśanam avidyā māyā pi mithyājñānam iti yuktam

original: tathā hi pratyakṣam eva tāvat nipuṇaṃ nirūpayatu bhavān /
analyzed: tathā hi pratyakṣam eva tāvat nipuṇam nirūpayatu bhavān

original: tatra hi yad anyānapekṣatayā jhagiti padārthasvarūpam ava0 bhāsate tat pāramārthikam itarat kālpanikam iti gamyate /
analyzed: tatra hi yat anya anapekṣa tayā jha c iti padārtha svarūpam ava bhāsate tat pāramārthikam itarat kālpanikam iti gamyate

original: sadrūpam eva ca ca tatrābhinnam anyanirapekṣam avabhāti /
analyzed: sat rūpam eva ca ca tatra abhinnam anya nirapekṣam avabhāti

original: bhedas tv anyāpekṣa iti nākṣajavijñānaviṣayatām upayāti //
analyzed: bhedaḥ tu anya apekṣaḥ iti na akṣa ja vijñāna viṣaya tām upayāti

original: tatra yathā mṛdrūpatātaḥ prabhṛti yāvat kumbhāvasthety asminn antarāle āvirbhavatāṃ tirobhavatāṃ ca ghaṭakapālaśakalaśarkarākaṇādīnāṃ kāryāṇāṃ rūpam aparamārthasad eva vyavahārapadavīm avatarati /
analyzed: tatra yathā mṛd rūpatā atas prabhṛti yāvat kumbha avasthā iti asmin antarāle āvirbhavatām tirobhavatām ca ghaṭa kapāla śakala śarkarā kaṇā ādīnām kāryāṇām rūpam a paramārtha sat eva vyavahāra padavīm avatarati

original: paramārthatas tu mṛttikaiva /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu mṛttikā eva

original: yathā ''huḥ [mṛttikety eva satyam] iti /
analyzed: yathā huḥ mṛttikā iti eva satyam iti

original: evaṃ tad api mṛttikārūpaṃ sattāpekṣayā na paramārthasad iti sattaiva sarvatra paramārthā /
analyzed: evam tat api mṛttikā rūpam sattā apekṣayā na paramārtha sat iti sattā eva sarvatra paramārthā

original: tad eva sallakṣaṇaṃ brahmety āhuḥ //
analyzed: tat eva sat lakṣaṇam brahma iti āhuḥ

original: āgamaś ca [ekam evādviṭīyaṃ] ityādiḥ abhedam eva darśayati [neha nānāsti kiñcana] /
analyzed: āgamaḥ ca ekam ityādiḥ abhedam eva darśayati na iha nānā asti kiñcana

original: mṛtyos sa mṛtyum āpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati] iti ca /
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti yaḥ iha nānā iva paśyati iti ca

original: na ca pratyakṣaviruddhatvam abhedaśaṃsino vaktuṃ śakyam āgamasya /
analyzed: na ca pratyakṣa viruddha tvam abheda śaṃsinaḥ vaktum śakyam āgamasya

original: na hy anyaniṣedhe pratyakṣaṃ prabhavati svaūpamātragrahaṇe parisamāptavyāpāratvāt /
analyzed: na hi anya niṣedhe pratyakṣam prabhavati sva ūpa mātra grahaṇe parisamāpta vyāpāra tvāt

original: pararūpaniṣedham antareṇa ca bhedasya durpapādatvāt bhede kuṇṭham eva pratyakṣam iti katham abhedagrāhiṇaṃ āgamaṃ virundhyāt /
analyzed: para rūpa niṣedham antareṇa ca bhedasya durpapāda tvāt bhede kuṇṭham eva pratyakṣam iti katham abheda grāhiṇam āgamam virundhyāt

original: tad uktaṃ [āhur vighātṛ pratyakṣaṃ na niṣeddhṛ vipaścitaḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam āhuḥ vighātṛ pratyakṣam na niṣeddhṛ vipaścitaḥ

original: naikatva āgamas tena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate //] nanu yady ekam eva brahma na dvitīyaṃ kiñcid asti tarhi tadbrahma nityaśuddhabuddhasvabhāvatvāt muktam evāste /
analyzed: na eka tve āgamaḥ tena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate nanu yadi ekam eva brahma na dvitīyam kiñcid asti tarhi tat brahma nitya śuddha buddha svabhāva tvāt muktam eva āste

original: kena tadbaddham iti kim artho 'yaṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ prayatnaḥ /
analyzed: kena tat baddham iti kim arthaḥ yam mumukṣūṇām prayatnaḥ

original: kutastyo vāyaṃ vicitrajagadavabhāsaḥ avidyocchedārtho mumukṣuprayatna iti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: kutastyaḥ vā ayam vicitra jagat avabhāsaḥ avidyā uccheda arthaḥ mumukṣu prayatnaḥ iti brūmaḥ

original: tatastya evāyaṃ vicitrajāgadavabhāsaḥ //
analyzed: tatas tyaḥ eva ayam vicitra jāgat avabhāsaḥ

original: keyam avidyā brahmaṇo vyatiriktā cet nādvaitam /
analyzed: kā iyam avidyā brahmaṇaḥ vyatiriktā ced na advaitam

original: avyatireke tu brahmaiva sā tato nānyāsty eṣeti katham ucchedyeta maivam vastunīdṛśi kutārkikacodyāni kramante /
analyzed: avyatireke tu brahma eva sā tatas na anyā asti eṣā iti katham ucchedyeta mā evam vastuni īdṛśi ku tārkika codyāni kramante

original: avidyā tv ayam avasturūpā māyā mithyāvabhāsasvabhāvā 'bhidhīyate /
analyzed: avidyā tu ayam avastu rūpā māyā mithyā avabhāsa svabhāvā bhidhīyate

original: tattvāgrahaṇam avidyā /
analyzed: tattva agrahaṇam avidyā

original: agrahaṇaṃ ca nāma kathaṃ vastudharmaiḥ vikalpyate nanu tattvāgrahaṇarūpā 'pi kasyeyam avidyā /
analyzed: agrahaṇam ca nāma katham vastu dharmaiḥ vikalpyate nanu tattva agrahaṇa rūpā kasya iyam avidyā

original: na hi brahmaṇo nityabuddhasvabhāvatvād avidyā bhavati /
analyzed: na hi brahmaṇaḥ nitya buddha svabhāva tvāt avidyā bhavati

original: anyas tu nāsty eva tadāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: anyaḥ tu na asti eva tad āśrayaḥ

original: na ca niradhikaraṇam eva mithyājñānaṃ bhavirum arhati ucyate jīvātmanām avidyā na brahmaṇaḥ //
analyzed: na ca niradhikaraṇam eva mithyājñānam bhavirum arhati ucyate jīva ātmanām avidyā na brahmaṇaḥ

original: nanu ke te jīvātmanaḥ te 'pi brahmaṇo 'nyānanyatayā cintyā eva āḥ kṣudratārkka sarvatrānabhijño 'si /
analyzed: nanu ke te jīvātmanaḥ te brahmaṇaḥ

original: brahmaiva jīvātmānaḥ na tato 'nye /
analyzed: brahma eva jīvātmānaḥ na tatas nye

original: na hi dahanapiṇḍād bhedenāpi bhāntaḥ sphuliṅgāḥ agnisvarūpā na bhavanti //
analyzed: na hi dahana piṇḍāt bhedena api bhāntaḥ sphuliṅgāḥ agni svarūpāḥ na bhavanti

original: tat kiṃ brahmaṇa evāvidyā na ca brahmaṇo 'vidyā /
analyzed: tat kim brahmaṇaḥ eva avidyā na ca brahmaṇaḥ vidyā

original: yathā hy ekam eva ghaṭādyāvaraṇopahitabhedatayā bhinnam iva vibhāti nabhaḥ paṭākāśaṃ ghaṭākāśam iti tadāvaraṇavaśād eva ca rajodhūmādikaluṣitam api bhavati tadāvaraṇaviratau tu galitakāluṣyam ale tatraiva parame vyomni kīyate tathaiva jīvātmāno 'pi avidyākalpitabhedāḥ tatkṛtam anekaprakārakāluṣyam anubhavanti /
analyzed: yathā hi ekam eva ghaṭa ādi āvaraṇa upahita bheda tayā bhinnam iva vibhāti nabhaḥ paṭa ākāśam ghaṭa ākāśam iti tad āvaraṇa vaśāt eva ca rajaḥ dhūma ādi kaluṣitam api bhavati tad āvaraṇa viratau tu galita kāluṣyam tatra eva parame vyomni kīyate tathā eva jīvātmānaḥ avidyā kalpita bhedāḥ tad kṛtam aneka prakāra kāluṣyam anubhavanti

original: taduparame ca pare brahmaṇi līyante iti //
analyzed: tad uparame ca pare brahmaṇi līyante iti

original: nanu evaṃ saty apy avidyāparikalpita eṣa brahmajīvātmavibhāgaḥ /
analyzed: nanu evam sati api avidyā parikalpitaḥ eṣa brahma jīva ātma vibhāgaḥ

original: sā ca jīvātmanām avidyety ucyate /
analyzed: sā ca jīvātmanām avidyā iti ucyate

original: tad etad itaretarāśrayam āpadyate avidyākalpanāyāṃ satyāṃ jīvātmānaḥ jīvātmasu ca satsu avidyeti bhavatv itaretarāśrayam /
analyzed: tat etat itaretara āśrayam āpadyate avidyā kalpanāyām satyām jīvātmānaḥ jīvātmasu ca satsu avidyā iti bhavatu itaretara āśrayam

original: avidyāprapañca evāyam aśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: avidyā prapañcaḥ eva ayam aśeṣaḥ

original: kasyaiṣa doṣaḥ yadi vā 'nāditvam asya parihāro bījāṅkuravad bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: kasya eṣa doṣaḥ yadi vā nādi tvam asya parihāraḥ bīja aṅkura vat bhaviṣyati

original: bhavadbhir api cāyam anādir eva saṃsāro 'bhyupagataḥ /
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ api ca ayam anādiḥ eva saṃsāraḥ bhyupagataḥ

original: avidyayaiva ca saṃsāra ity ucyate //
analyzed: avidyayā eva ca saṃsāraḥ iti ucyate

original: nanu anāder avidyāyāḥ katham ucchedaḥ kim anāder ucchedo na bhavati bhūme rūpasya /
analyzed: nanu anādeḥ avidyāyāḥ katham ucchedaḥ kim anādeḥ ucchedaḥ na bhavati bhūmeḥ rūpasya

original: bhavadbhir vā katham anādis saṃsāra ucchedyate nanu upāye saty anādir apy ucchidyate /
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ vā katham anādiḥ saṃsāraḥ ucchedyate nanu upāye sati anādiḥ api ucchidyate

original: advaitināṃ kas taducchedopāyaḥ avidyaiveti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: advaitinām kaḥ tad uccheda upāyaḥ avidyā eva iti brūmaḥ

original: śravaṇamanananidhyānādir apy avidyaiva /
analyzed: śravaṇa manana nidhyāna ādiḥ api avidyā eva

original: sā tv abhyasyamānā satī avidyāntaram utsādayati svayam apy utsīdati /
analyzed: sā tu abhyasyamānā satī avidyā antaram utsādayati svayam api utsīdati

original: yathā payaḥpayo jarayati svayaṃ ca jīryati /
analyzed: yathā payaḥ payaḥ jarayati svayam ca jīryati

original: viṣaṃ viṣāntaraṃ śamayati svayaṃ ca śāmyati /
analyzed: viṣam viṣa antaram śamayati svayam ca śāmyati

original: yathā vā dravyāntararajañ kṣiptaṃ rajaḥkaluṣite 'mbhasi tac cātmānaṃ saṃhṛtya svaccham ambu karoti /
analyzed: yathā vā dravya antara rajam kṣiptam rajaḥ kaluṣite mbhasi tat ca ātmānam saṃhṛtya svaccham ambu karoti

original: evam iyam avidyaivāvidyāntaram ucchindantī vidyopāyatāṃ ptaripadyate //
analyzed: evam iyam avidyā eva avidyā antaram ucchindantī vidyā upāya tām

original: nanu svarūpeṇāsatyaiveyam avidyā kathaṃ satyakāryaṃ kuryāt ucyate asatyād api satyārthasampattir upapatsyate /
analyzed: nanu sva rūpeṇa asatyā evā iyam avidyā katham satya kāryam kuryāt ucyate asatyāt api satya artha sampattiḥ upapatsyate

original: māyāsarpādayo dṛṣṭāḥ satyapralayahetavaḥ //
analyzed: māyā sarpa ādayaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ satya pralaya hetavaḥ

original: rekhāgakārādayaś cāsatyāḥ satyārthapratītyupāyā dṛśyante /
analyzed: rekhā gakāra ādayaḥ ca asatyāḥ satya artha pratīti upāyāḥ dṛśyante

original: svarūpeṇa satyāsta iti cet kiṃ tena kriyate /
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa satyāḥ te iti ced kim tena kriyate

original: gakārāditvena hi te pratipādakāḥ /
analyzed: gakāra ādi tvena hi te pratipādakāḥ

original: tac caiṣām asatyam iti //
analyzed: tat ca eṣām asatyam iti

original: nanu brahmaṇo nityaśuddhatvāt jīvānāṃ ca tato 'nanyatvāt kathaṃ teṣv avidyā 'vakāśaṃ labhate parihṛtam etat ghaṭākāśadṛṣṭāntopavarṇanena //
analyzed: nanu brahmaṇaḥ nitya śuddha tvāt jīvānām ca tatas katham teṣu avidyā vakāśam labhate parihṛtam etat ghaṭa ākāśa dṛṣṭānta upavarṇanena

original: api ca yathā viśuddham api vadanabimbaṃ ambumaṇikṛpāṇadarpaṇādyupādhivaśena śyāmadīṛghasthūlādirūpam apāramārthikam eva darśayati tathā brahmaṇas tad abhāve 'pi jīveṣu tadavakāśa iti //
analyzed: api ca yathā viśuddham api vadana bimbam ambu maṇi kṛpāṇa darpaṇa ādi upādhi vaśena apāramārthikam eva darśayati tathā brahmaṇaḥ tat abhāve jīveṣu tad avakāśaḥ iti

original: nanu paramātmano nityatvāt jīvānām apy anyonyam ananyatvam ity ekasmin buddhe mukte vā sarve baddhāḥ muktā vā syuḥ api kutarkaluṣitamate kathaṃ bidhyamāno 'pi na budhyase /
analyzed: nanu paramātmanaḥ nitya tvāt jīvānām api anyonyam ananya tvam iti ekasmin buddhe mukte vā sarve baddhāḥ muktāḥ vā syuḥ api kutarka luṣita mate katham na budhyase

original: ghaṭākāśe hi ghaṭabhaṅgāt paramākāśapratiṣṭhe jāte na paṭākāśo 'pi tathā bhavati /
analyzed: ghaṭa ākāśe hi ghaṭa bhaṅgāt parama ākāśa pratiṣṭhe jāte na paṭa ākāśaḥ u pi tathā bhavati

original: ekasyāpi jīvātmanaḥ upādhibhedāt sukhaduḥkhānubhavabhedo dṛśyate [pāde me vedanā] [śirasi me vedanā] iti tīvratarataraṇitāpopanatātanutaraklamasya ca yatraiva ca śarirāvayave śiśiraharicandanasthāsakam uparacayati parijanaḥ tatraiva tadduḥkhoparamānubhavaḥ nānyatreti evam ekasminn api paramātmani kalpanāmātra pratiṣṭheṣv api jīvātmasu baddhamuktavyavasthā siddhyaty eveti ekātmavāda evāyam āgamānuguṇaḥ upagantuṃ yuktaḥ nānantyam ātmanām /
analyzed: ekasya api jīva ātmanaḥ upādhi bhedāt sukha duḥkha anubhava bhedaḥ dṛśyate pāde me vedanā śirasi me vedanā iti tīvratara taraṇi tāpa upanata a tanutara klamasya ca yatra eva ca śiśira haricandana sthāsakam uparacayati parijanaḥ tatra eva tad duḥkha uparama anubhavaḥ na anyatra iti evam ekasmin api paramātmani kalpanā mātra pratiṣṭheṣu api jīva ātmasu baddha mukta vyavasthā siddhyati eva iti eka ātma vādaḥ eva ayam āgama anuguṇaḥ upagantum yuktaḥ na ānan

original: atrābhidhīyate kapaṭanāṭakarahasyaprakriyākūrcoparacane tadanuguṇadṛṣṭāntaparamparopapādane ca kim ucyate paraṃ kauśalaṃ bhavatām pramāṇavṛttanirūpaṇe tu tapasvina eva bhavantaḥ /
analyzed: atrā abhidhīyate kapaṭa nāṭaka rahasya prakriyā kūrca uparacane tad anuguṇa dṛṣṭānta paramparā upapādane ca kim ucyate param kauśalam bhavatām pramāṇa vṛtta nirūpaṇe tu tapasvinaḥ eva bhavantaḥ

original: tathā hi bhedasya pramāṇabādhitatvāt kim ayam abhedābhyupagamaḥ bhavatām uta svit abhedasyaiva pramāṇasiddhatvād iti /
analyzed: tathā hi bhedasya pramāṇa bādhita tvāt kim ayam abheda abhyupagamaḥ bhavatām uta svid abhedasya eva pramāṇa siddha tvāt iti

original: dvayam api nāsti /
analyzed: dvayam api na asti

original: pratyakṣādīni hi sarvaṇy eva bhedapratiṣṭhāni pramāṇāni //
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādīni hi sarvaṇi eva bheda pratiṣṭhāni pramāṇāni

original: yat tāvat bhedasya parāpekṣatvāt akṣajajñānagamyatā nāstīti tad ayuktam abhedasya sutarāṃ parāpekṣatvāt /
analyzed: yat tāvat bhedasya para apekṣa tvāt akṣa ja jñāna gamya tā na asti iti tat ayuktam abhedasya sutarām para apekṣa tvāt

original: mṛtpiṇḍāt prabhṛti ghaṭakarparacūrṇaparyantakāryaparamparāparicchede tadanugatamṛdrūpatāgrahaṇe ca sati mṛdas tadabhinnarūpatvam avadhāryeta nānyathā //
analyzed: mṛd piṇḍāt prabhṛti ghaṭa karpara cūrṇa paryanta kārya paramparā paricchede tad anugata mṛd rūpa tā grahaṇe ca sati mṛdaḥ tad abhinna rūpatvam avadhāryeta na anyathā

original: bhikṣavastv ācakṣate cākṣuṣaṃ vyāvṛttasvalakṣaṇagrāhi nābhedaviṣaya abhedasya parāpekṣatvād iti //
analyzed: bhikṣavaḥ tu ācakṣate cākṣuṣam vyāvṛtta sva lakṣaṇa grāhi na abheda viṣayaḥ abhedasya para apekṣa tvāt iti

original: ayam asmād anya itīyaṃ parāpekṣā pratītir iti cet ayam asminn anusyūta itīyam api parāpekṣaiva //
analyzed: ayam asmāt anyaḥ iti iyam para apekṣā pratītiḥ iti ced ayam asmin anusyūtaḥ iti iyam api para apekṣā eva

original: tad atra bhavān bhikṣavaś ca dvāv api durgrahopahatau /
analyzed: tat atra bhavān bhikṣavaḥ ca dvau api durgraha upahatau

original: bhedābhedagrahaṇanipuṇam akṣajam iti parikṣitam etadvastarataḥ sāmānyacintāyām /
analyzed: bheda abheda grahaṇa nipuṇam akṣa jam iti parikṣitam etat vastarataḥ sāmānya cintāyām

original: aṅgulicatuṣṭayaṃ hi pratibhāsamānam itaretaraviviktarūpam apy anugatarūpam api prakāśata ity uktam //
analyzed: aṅguli catuṣṭayam hi pratibhāsamānam itaretara vivikta rūpam api anugata rūpam api prakāśate iti uktam

original: vyāvṛttir anuvṛttir vā parāpekṣā 'stu vastuṣu /
analyzed: vyāvṛttiḥ anuvṛttiḥ vā para apekṣā stu vastuṣu

original: asaṅkīrṇasvabhāvas tu bhāvā bhānty akṣabuddhiṣu //
analyzed: asaṅkīrṇa svabhāvaḥ tu bhāvāḥ bhānti akṣa buddhiṣu

original: yad uktaṃ [āhur vidhātṛ pratyakṣaṃ na niṣeddhṛ] iti tad apy asādhu [vidhātṛ] iti ko 'rthaḥ idam api vastusvarūpaṃ gṛhṇāti nānyarūpaṃ niṣedhati /
analyzed: yat uktam āhuḥ vidhātṛ pratyakṣam na niṣeddhṛ iti tat api asādhu vidhātṛ iti kaḥ rthaḥ idam api vastu svarūpam gṛhṇāti na anya rūpam niṣedhati

original: pratyakṣam iti cet maivam jñānaṃ tarhi na tadbhavet //
analyzed: pratyakṣam iti ced mā evam jñānam tarhi na tat bhavet

original: anyarūpaniṣedham antareṇa tatsvarūpaparicchedasyāpy asampatteḥ /
analyzed: anya rūpa niṣedham antareṇa tad sva rūpa paricchedasya api asampatteḥ

original: pītādivyavacchinnaṃ hi nīlaṃ nīlam iti gṛhītaṃ bhavati netarathā /
analyzed: pīta ādi vyavacchinnam hi nīlam nīlam iti gṛhītam bhavati na itarathā

original: tathā cāha [tat paricchinatti anyadvyavacchinatti] iti //
analyzed: tathā ca āha tat paricchinatti anyat vyavacchinatti iti

original: bhāvavad abhāvam api gṛhītuṃ prabhavati pratyakṣam iti ca sādhitam asmābhir evaitat /
analyzed: bhāva vat abhāvam api gṛhītum prabhavati pratyakṣam iti ca sādhitam asmābhiḥ eva etat

original: tasmād itaretaraviviktapadārthasvarūpagrāhitvān nābhedaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣam //
analyzed: tasmāt itaretara vivikta padārtha svarūpa grāhi tvāt na abheda viṣayam pratyakṣam

original: śabdānumānayos tu sambandhagrahaṇādhīnasvaviṣayavyāpārayoḥ bhedam antareṇa svarūpam eva nāvakalpata iti tāv ubhāv api bhedaviṣayāv eva /
analyzed: śabda anumānayoḥ tu sambandha grahaṇa adhīna sva viṣaya vyāpārayoḥ bhedam antareṇa svarūpam eva na avakalpate iti tau ubhau api bheda viṣayau eva

original: viśeṣaviṣayatvābhāve 'pi liṅgasāmānyasya taditaravilakṣaṇasya paricchedāt bhedaviṣayam anumānam //
analyzed: viśeṣa viṣaya tva abhāve pi liṅga sāmānyasya tad itara vilakṣaṇasya paricchedāt bheda viṣayam anumānam

original: śabdasya tu padātmanaḥ tadvadādivācyabhedarūpasya tu parasparoparaktapadārthapuñjasvabhāvaḥ itarapadārthaviśeṣitānyatam apadārtharūpo vā vākyārtho viṣaya iti pūrvam eva nirūpitam /
analyzed: śabdasya tu pada ātmanaḥ tadvat ādi vācya bheda rūpasya tu paraspara uparakta padārtha puñja svabhāvaḥ itara padārtha viśeṣita anyatam apadārtha rūpaḥ vā vākya arthaḥ viṣayaḥ iti pūrvam eva nirūpitam

original: ataḥ sarvathā na bhedasya pramāṇabādhitatvam //
analyzed: atas sarvathā na bhedasya pramāṇa bādhita tvam

original: nāpy abhedagrāhi kiñcana pramāṇam asti yathoktenaiva nyāyena //
analyzed: nā api abheda grāhi kiñcana pramāṇam asti yathā uktena eva nyāyena

original: santu āgamaḥ paṭhitaḥ [ekam evādvitīyam] [neha nānāsti kiṃ cana] ityādiḥ tasyārthavādatvān na yathāśruta evārtho grahītavyaḥ //
analyzed: santu āgamaḥ paṭhitaḥ ekam eva advitīyam na iha nānā asti kim cana ityādiḥ tasya arthavāda tvāt na yathāśrutaḥ eva arthaḥ grahītavyaḥ

original: nanu siddhe 'py arthe vedasya prāmāṇyam abhyupagatam eva bhavadbhiḥ bāḍham abhyupagatam /
analyzed: nanu siddhe pi arthe vedasya prāmāṇyam abhyupagatam eva bhavadbhiḥ bāḍham abhyupagatam

original: kin tu [dhūma evāgner divā dadṛśe nāciḥ] ity evamādīnāṃ pratyakṣādiviruddhārthābhidhāyināmarthavādināṃ mukhyāṃ vṛttim apahāya gauṇyāpi vṛttyā vyākhyānam āśritam /
analyzed: kin tu dhūmaḥ eva agneḥ divā dadṛśe na aciḥ iti evamādīnām pratyakṣa ādi viruddha artha abhidhāyinām artha vādinām mukhyām vṛttim apahāya gauṇyā api vṛttyā vyākhyānam āśritam

original: evam idam api vacanaṃ itarapramāṇaviruddham artham abhidadhat anyathā vyākhyāyate //
analyzed: evam idam api vacanam itara pramāṇa viruddham artham abhidadhat anyathā vyākhyāyate

original: ye tu pramāṇāntaraviruddhārthānuvādino na bhavanti arthavādāḥ teṣām astu svarūpe prāmāṇyaṃ [vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā] ity evamādīnām //
analyzed: ye tu pramāṇa antara viruddha artha anuvādinaḥ na bhavanti artha vādāḥ teṣām astu svarūpe prāmāṇyam vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhāḥ devatāḥ iti evamādīnām

original: tasmāt sukhaduḥkhāvasthābhede 'pi nāvasthātur ātmano bhedaḥ dehendriyādinānātve 'pi vā na tasya nānātvam ity evaṃ yathākathaṃ cid ayam arthavādo yojanīyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt sukha duḥkha avasthā bhede pi na avasthātuḥ ātmanaḥ bhedaḥ deha indriya ādi nānātve pi vā na tasya nānātvam iti evam yathā katham cit ayam artha vādaḥ yojanīyaḥ

original: abhedopadeśī tu tatparaḥ śabdaḥ vidhirūpa iha nāsty eva /
analyzed: abheda upadeśī tu tad paraḥ śabdaḥ vidhi rūpaḥ iha na asti eva

original: evam āgamabalād api nādvaitasiddhiḥ //
analyzed: evam āgama balāt api nā advaita siddhiḥ

original: yat punaḥ avidyādibhedacodyam āśaṅkyāśaṅkyaparihṛtam tatrāśaṅkā sādhīyasī /
analyzed: yat punar avidyā ādi bheda codyam āśaṅkya āśaṅkya parihṛtam tatra āśaṅkā sādhīyasī

original: samādhānaṃ tu na peśalam /
analyzed: samādhānam tu na peśalam

original: tattvānyatvābhyām anirvacanīyeyam avidyeti ko 'rthaḥ anādinā prabandhena pravṛttā ''varaṇakṣamā /
analyzed: tattva anyatvābhyām anirvacanīyā iyam avidyā iti kaḥ rthaḥ anādinā prabandhena pravṛttā varaṇa kṣamā

original: yatnocchedyāpy avidyeyaṃ asatī kathyate katham //
analyzed: yatna ucchedyā api avidyā iyam asatī kathyate katham

original: astitve ka enām ucchindyād iti cet kātarasantrāso 'yam /
analyzed: astitve kaḥ enām ucchindyāt iti ced kātara santrāsaḥ yam

original: satām eva hi vṛkṣādīnāṃ ucchedo dṛśyate nāsatāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādīnām /
analyzed: satām eva hi vṛkṣa ādīnām ucchedaḥ dṛśyate na asatām śaśaviṣāṇa ādīnām

original: tad iyam ucchedyatvād avidyā nityā mā bhūt satī tu bhavaty eva //
analyzed: tat iyam ucchedya tvāt avidyā nityā mā bhūt satī tu bhavatī eva

original: nityaṃ na śakyam ucchettuṃ sad anityaṃ tu śakyate /
analyzed: nityam na śakyam ucchettum sat anityam tu śakyate

original: asattvam anyat anyā ca padārthānām anityatā //
analyzed: asattvam anyat anyā ca padārthānām anitya tā

original: na ca tattvāgrahaṇamātram avidyā saṃśayaviparyayāv apy avidyaiva /
analyzed: na ca tattva agrahaṇa mātram avidyā saṃśaya viparyayau api avidyā eva

original: tau ca bhāvasvabhāvatvāt katham asantau bhavetām grahaṇaprāgabhāvo 'pi nāsann iti śakyate vaktum abhāvasyāpy astitvasamarthanād iti sarvathā nāsatī avidya //
analyzed: tau ca bhāva svabhāva tvāt katham asantau bhavetām na āsan iti śakyate vaktum abhāvasya api astitva samarthanāt iti sarvathā

original: asattve ca niṣiddhe 'syāḥ sattvam eva balād bhavet /
analyzed: asattve ca niṣiddhe syāḥ sattvam eva balāt bhavet

original: sadasadvyatirikto hi rāśir atyantadurlabhaḥ //
analyzed: sat asat vyatiriktaḥ hi rāśiḥ atyanta durlabhaḥ

original: sattve ca dvitīyāyā avidyāyā bhāvān nadvaitam //
analyzed: sattve ca dvitīyāyāḥ avidyāyāḥ bhāvāt na dvaitam

original: yat tu brahmaṇaḥ satataprabuddhatvāt avidyākṣevatā neti jīvānām avidyāspadatvam abhihitam avidyoparame brahmaṇi parame ta eva ghaṭākāśaval līyanta iti ca tad api na caturaśram ākāśāvacchedahetoḥ ghaṭāder ghaṭamānatvāt /
analyzed: yat tu brahmaṇaḥ satata prabuddha tvāt avidyā kṣeva tā na iti jīvānām avidyā āspada tvam abhihitam avidyā uparame brahmaṇi parame te eva ghaṭa ākāśa vat līyante iti ca tat api na caturaśram ākāśa avaccheda hetoḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ ghaṭamāna tvāt

original: avidyāyās tv asattvāt tatkṛtaḥ paramātmano 'vaccheda iti viṣamo dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: avidyāyāḥ tu asattvāt tad kṛtaḥ paramātmanaḥ vacchedaḥ iti viṣamaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: avacchedakābhāvāc ca jīvavibhāgakalpanā 'pi niravakāśaiva //
analyzed: avacchedaka abhāvāt ca jīva vibhāga kalpanā pi niravakāśā eva

original: yac ca itaretarāśrayatvaṃ parihartum anāditvam āveditaṃ avidyāyāḥ tatra bījāṅkuravat vādyantaropagatasaṃsāravac ca tasyāḥ satyatvam eva syāt /
analyzed: yat ca itaretara āśraya tvam parihartum anādi tvam āveditam avidyāyāḥ tatra bīja aṅkura vat vādi antara upagata saṃsāra vat ca tasyāḥ satya tvam eva syāt

original: anādiprabandhaprapravṛttatve sattve cāsyāḥ pratikūlahetvantaropanipātakṛtam apākaraṇam ucitam /
