analyzed: anādi prabandha prapravṛtta tve sattve ca asyāḥ pratikūla hetu antara upanipāta kṛtam apākaraṇam ucitam

original: ekātmavādināṃ tu tadatidurghaṭam ity anirmokṣa eva syāt /
analyzed: ekātma vādinām tu tat ati durghaṭam iti anirmokṣaḥ eva syāt

original: yathā ''ha bhaṭṭaḥ [svabhāvikīm avidyāṃ ca nocchettuṃ kaścid arhati /
analyzed: yathā ha bhaṭṭaḥ svabhāvikīm avidyām ca nā ucchettum kaścid arhati

original: vilakṣaṇopapāte hi naśyet svābhāvikaṃ kva cit //
analyzed: vilakṣaṇa upapāte hi naśyet svābhāvikam kva cit

original: na tv ekātmā 'bhyupāyānāṃ hetur asti vilakṣaṇaḥ] iti //
analyzed: na tu eka ātmā abhyupāyānām hetuḥ asti vilakṣaṇaḥ iti

original: yat punaḥ avidyaiva vidyopāya ity atra dṛṣṭāntaparamparodghāṭanaṃ kṛtaṃ tad api kleśāya nārthasiddhaye /
analyzed: yat punar avidyā eva vidyā upāyaḥ iti atra dṛṣṭānta paramparā udghāṭanam kṛtam tat api kleśāya na artha siddhaye

original: sarvatropāyasya svarūpena sattvāt /
analyzed: sarvatra upāyasya sva rūpena sattvāt

original: asataḥ khapuṣpāder upāyatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: asataḥ kha puṣpa ādeḥ upāya tva abhāvāt

original: rekhāgakarādīnāṃ tu varṇarūpatayā sattvaṃ yady api nāsti tathāpi svarūpataḥ sattvaṃ vidyata eva //
analyzed: rekhā ga kara ādīnām tu varṇa rūpatayā sattvam yadi api na asti tathā api svarūpataḥ sattvam vidyate eva

original: nanu gakāro 'yam iti gṛhyamāṇaḥ sa rekhāsanniveśaḥ arthapratyāyako bhavati na cāsau tena rūpenāsti maivam svarūpena sato 'rthasya rūpāntareṇāpi gṛhyamāṇasya kūṭakārṣāpaṇāder iva vyavahārahetutā dṛśyate ca yuktā ca /
analyzed: nanu gakāraḥ yam iti gṛhyamāṇaḥ sa rekhā sanniveśaḥ artha pratyāyakaḥ bhavati na ca asau tena rūpena asti mā evam sva rūpena sataḥ rthasya rūpa antareṇa api gṛhyamāṇasya kūṭa kārṣāpaṇa ādeḥ iva vyavahāra hetu tā dṛśyate ca yuktā ca

original: yas tu svarūpata eva nāsti na tasya svātmanā paratmanā vā vyavahārāṅ gatā samasti /
analyzed: yaḥ tu svarūpataḥ eva nā asti na tasya sva ātmanā para tmanā vā vyavahāra aṅ gatā samasti

original: rekhāsanniveśaś ca svarūpeṇa sann iti varṇātmatvenāsann api tatkāryāya paryāpnuyāt /
analyzed: rekhā sanniveśaḥ ca sva rūpeṇa san iti varṇa ātma tvena āsan api tad kāryāya paryāpnuyāt

original: na tv ayam avidyayāṃ nyāyaḥ svarūpāsattvat tasyāḥ //
analyzed: na tu ayam avidyayām nyāyaḥ sva rūpa asattvat tasyāḥ

original: sarpādau tu sarpādisvarūpavat tadjñānasyāpi tatkāryatvam avagatam //
analyzed: sarpa ādau tu sarpa ādi svarūpa vat tad jñānasya api tad kārya tvam avagatam

original: ata eva śaṅkāviṣasyāpi svaśāstreṣu cikitsām upadiśanti //
analyzed: atas eva śaṅkāviṣasya api sva śāstreṣu cikitsām upadiśanti

original: evaṃ [vanaguhākuharadeśād eṣa niśṛtaḥ kesarī saroṣamita evābhivartate] ity asatye 'py ukte yad bhīrūṇāṃ palāyanādi śūrāṇāṃ ca sotsāhamāyudhodyamanādi satyaṃ kāryam upalabhyate tatra siṃhajñānasya tatkāryatvāt nāsata evopāyatvam //
analyzed: evam vana guhā kuhara deśāt eṣa niśṛtaḥ kesarī sa roṣa mitaḥ evā abhivartate iti asatye pi ukte yat bhīrūṇām palāyana ādi śūrāṇām ca sa utsāham āyudha udyamana ādi satyam kāryam upalabhyate tatra siṃha jñānasya tad kārya tvāt na asataḥ eva upāya tvam

original: etena pratibimbadṛṣṭānto 'pi pratyākhyātaḥ khaṅgādeḥ mukhādikāluṣya kalpanākāraṇasya tatra sadbhāvāt /
analyzed: etena pratibimba dṛṣṭāntaḥ api pratyākhyātaḥ khaṅga ādeḥ mukha ādi kāluṣya kalpanā kāraṇasya tatra sadbhāvāt

original: iha tu tadabhāvād iti //
analyzed: iha tu tad abhāvāt iti

original: yad api baddham uktavyavasthāsiddhaye pādavedanādyudāhṛtam tad apy evam apākṛtam avacchedakasya pādādeḥ tatra tāttvikatvāt /
analyzed: yat api baddham ukta vyavasthā siddhaye pāda vedanā ādi udāhṛtam tat api evam apākṛtam avacchedakasya pāda ādeḥ tatra tāttvika tvāt

original: iha tu bhedakalpanābījam advaitavādināṃ durghaṭam iti bahuśaḥ pradarśitam //
analyzed: iha tu bheda kalpanā bījam advaita vādinām durghaṭam iti bahuśas pradarśitam

original: tatrāyaṃ vastusaṅkṣepaḥ avidyāyām asatyāṃ sarva evāyaṃ yathodāhṛto vyavahāraprakāraḥ tatkṛta iti nāvatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: tatra ayam vastu saṅkṣepaḥ avidyāyām asatyām sarvaḥ eva ayam yathā udāhṛtaḥ vyavahāra prakāraḥ tad kṛtaḥ iti na avatiṣṭhate

original: satyāṃ tu tasyāṃ nadvaitam iti /
analyzed: satyām tu tasyām na dvaitam iti

original: ata evāha sūtrakāraḥ [saṅkhyaikāntāsiddhiḥ pramāṇopapattyanupapattibhyām] iti //
analyzed: atas eva āha sūtra kāraḥ saṅkhyā ekānta asiddhiḥ pramāṇa upapatti anupapattibhyām iti

original: yadi tāvad advaitasiddhau pramāṇam asti tarhi tad eva dvitīyam iti nādvaitam /
analyzed: yadi tāvat advaita siddhau pramāṇam asti tarhi tat eva dvitīyam iti na advaitam

original: atha nāsti pramāṇam na tarām advaitam apramāṇīkāyāḥ siddher abhāvād iti //
analyzed: atha na asti pramāṇam na tarām advaitam apramāṇīkāyāḥ siddheḥ abhāvāt iti

original: mantrārthavādotthavikalpamūlam advaitavādaṃ parihṛtya tasmāt /
analyzed: mantra arthavāda uttha vikalpa mūlam advaita vādam parihṛtya tasmāt

original: upeyatām eṣa padārthabhedaḥ pratyakṣaliṅgāgamagamyamānaḥ //
analyzed: upeyatām eṣa padārtha bhedaḥ pratyakṣa liṅga āgama gamyamānaḥ

original: etena śabdādvaitavādo 'pi prayuktaḥ [anādinidhanaṃ brahma śabdatattvaṃ yad akṣaram /
analyzed: etena śabda advaita vādaḥ pi prayuktaḥ an ādi nidhanam brahma śabda tattvam yat akṣaram

original: vivartate 'rthabhāvena prakriyā jagato yataḥ] iti //
analyzed: vivartate rtha bhāvena prakriyā jagataḥ yatas iti

original: ucyate tatra anādinidhanapadaniveditāpūrvāparāntarahitā vastusattā nityatvam brahmapadapratipāditaṃ ca vyāpitvam ity ubhayam api śabdasya prāg eva nirastam /
analyzed: ucyate tatra anādinidhana pada nivedita apūrva apara anta rahitā vastu sattā nitya tvam brahma pada pratipāditam ca vyāpi tvam iti ubhayam api śabdasya prāk eva nirastam

original: niravayavaś ca sphoṭātmā śabdaḥ pratikṣipta eva //
analyzed: niravayavaḥ ca sphoṭa ātmā śabdaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ eva

original: yat tu nityaṃ vyāpi ca kiṃcid ucyate tat śabdatattvam ity atra kā yuktiḥ /
analyzed: yat tu nityam vyāpi ca kiṃcid ucyate tat śabda tattvam iti atra kā yuktiḥ

original: āha śabdopagrāhyatayā ca śabdatattvam //
analyzed: āha śabda upagrāhya tayā ca śabda tattvam

original: tathā hi sarvapratyaya upajāyamānaḥ nānullikhitaśabdaḥ upajāyate /
analyzed: tathā hi sarva pratyayaḥ upajāyamānaḥ na an ullikhita śabdaḥ upajāyate

original: tadullekhavirahiṇaḥ anāsāditaprakāśasvabhāvasya pratyayasyānutpannanirviśeṣātvāt /
analyzed: tad ullekha virahiṇaḥ an āsādita prakāśa svabhāvasya pratyayasya anutpanna nirviśeṣa atvāt

original: evam īdṛśam ityādiparamārśapramuṣitavapuṣi vedane vedanātmakataiva na bhavet //
analyzed: evam īdṛśam ityādi parama arśa pramuṣita vapuṣi vedane vedanā ātmaka tā eva na bhavet

original: ye 'pi vṛddhavyavahāropayogavaidharyād anavāptaśabdārthasaṃbandhaviśeṣavyutpattayaḥ bāladārakaprāyāḥ pramātāraḥ te 'pi nūnaṃ yat tat tat kim ityādiśabdajātam anullikhanto na pratyanti kim api prameyam /
analyzed: ye pi vṛddha vyavahāra upayoga vaidharyāt an avāpta śabda artha saṃbandha viśeṣa vyutpattayaḥ bāla dāraka prāyāḥ pramātāraḥ te pi nūnam yat tat tat kim ityādi śabda jātam an ullikhantaḥ na pratyanti kim api prameyam

original: ataḥ śabdonmoṣaprabhāvaprāptaprakāśasvabhāvatvāt sarvapratyayānāṃ śabdānuviddhaṃ  bodhakatvam iti sarvaśabdatattvam ity avadhāryatām /
analyzed: atas śabda unmoṣa prabhāva prāpta prakāśa svabhāva tvāt sarva pratyayānām śabda anuviddham bodhaka tvam iti sarva śabda tattvam iti avadhāryatām

original: tad āha na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaś śabdānugamād ṛte /
analyzed: tat āha na saḥ sti pratyayaḥ loke yaḥ śabda anugamāt ṛte

original: anuviddham iva jñānaṃ sarvaṃ śabdena gamyate iti //
analyzed: anuviddham iva jñānam sarvam śabdena gamyate iti

original: evam anabhyupagame tu saṃvidaḥ prakāśaśūnyatayā anadhigataviṣayaḥ sarva evāndhamūkaprāyo lokaḥ syāt /
analyzed: evam an abhyupagame tu saṃvidaḥ prakāśa śūnya tayā anadhigata viṣayaḥ sarvaḥ eva andha mūka prāyaḥ lokaḥ syāt

original: āha ca vāgrūpatā ced utkāmedavabodhasya śāśvatī /
analyzed: āha ca vāc rūpa tā ced utkāmet avabodhasya śāśvatī

original: na prakāśaḥ prakāśena sā hi pratyavamarśinī iti //
analyzed: na prakāśaḥ prakāśena sā hi pratyavamarśinī iti

original: ataḥ krameṇa tāvad evaṃ bodhyase śabdākhyaviśeṣaṇānuvedhaviśeṣā bhāvāt sarvaṃ nirvikalpakam indriyajaṃ savikalpakaṃ vā jñānaṃ śabdaviśiṣṭam artham avadyotayati gauḥ śuklo gacchatīti jātiguṇakriyāvacchinnaviṣayāvabhāsini pratyaye śabdaviśiṣṭa evārthaḥ sphuratīti budhyasva //
analyzed: atas krameṇa tāvat evam bodhyase śabda ākhya viśeṣaṇa anuvedha viśeṣāḥ bhāvāt sarvam nirvikalpakam indriya jam sa vikalpakam vā jñānam śabda viśiṣṭam artham avadyotayati gauḥ śuklaḥ gacchati iti jāti guṇa kriyā avacchinna viṣaya avabhāsini pratyaye śabda viśiṣṭaḥ eva arthaḥ sphurati iti budhyasva

original: evaṃ ced boddhum avatīrṇo 'si śabdākhyaviśeṣaṇānuraktasya tasya viśeṣasya svarūpaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ śabdenaiva darśayasi śabdāparityāgalabdhaprakāśasvarūpasyaiva vānubhūtyānubhavasīti so 'pi viśeṣyaḥ śabdarūpa eveti jānīhi /
analyzed: evam ced boddhum avatīrṇaḥ si śabda ākhya viśeṣaṇa anuraktasya tasya viśeṣasya svarūpam pṛṣṭaḥ śabdena eva darśayasi śabda aparityāga labdha prakāśa svarūpasya eva vā anubhūtyā anubhavasi iti saḥ u pi viśeṣyaḥ śabda rūpaḥ eva iti jānīhi

original: tad evaṃ śabda evārthopārūḍhaḥ pratibhātīti vyavatiṣṭate /
analyzed: tat evam śabdaḥ eva artha upārūḍhaḥ pratibhāti iti vyavatiṣṭate

original: ittham iyantam adhvānaṃ cet prāpto 'pi tad adhunā yad upārūḍhaḥ śabdaḥ prakāśate tasya pṛthak pradarśayitum anubhavituṃ cāśakyatvāt śabda eva tathā tathā pratibhātīti śabdavivarta evāyam arthaḥ nānyaḥ kaścid iti pratipattum arhasi //
analyzed: ittham iyantam adhvānam ced tat adhunā yat upārūḍhaḥ śabdaḥ prakāśate tasya pṛthak pradarśayitum anubhavitum ca aśakya tvāt śabdaḥ eva tathā tathā pratibhāti iti śabda vivartaḥ eva ayam arthaḥ na anyaḥ kaścid iti pratipattum arhasi

original: yathā cāyam indriyajeṣu pratibhāseṣu prakramaḥ tathā śabdeṣv api pratyayeṣu śabdaviśiṣṭo vārthaḥ pravabhāti śabdo vārthārūḍhaḥ śabda evārtharūpeṇa vivartata iti gṛhyatām //
analyzed: yathā ca ayam indriya jeṣu pratibhāseṣu prakramaḥ tathā śabdeṣu api pratyayeṣu śabda viśiṣṭaḥ vā arthaḥ pravabhāti śabdaḥ vā artha ārūḍhaḥ śabdaḥ eva artha rūpeṇa vivartate iti gṛhyatām

original: ataś ca śabdabrahmedam ekam avidyopādhidarśitavicitrabhedam avidyoparame yathāvasthitasvarūpaṃ prakāśata iti yuktam //
analyzed: atas ca śabdabrahma idam ekam avidyā upādhi darśita vicitra bhedam avidyā uparame yathā avasthita svarūpam prakāśate iti yuktam

original: atrābhidhīyate na khalu prakāratrayam apīdam upapadyate padapadārthasaṃbandhavyutpattivirahiṇām asav āptaśabdayojanāvairūpyasvarūpamātrapratiṣṭhaviśuddhavastugrahaṇapravaṇendriyajapratyayadarśanāt /
analyzed: atrā abhidhīyate na khalu prakāra trayam api idam upapadyate pada padārtha saṃbandha vyutpatti virahiṇām āpta śabda yojana a vairūpya sva rūpa mātra pratiṣṭha viśuddha vastu grahaṇa pravaṇa indriya ja pratyaya darśanāt

original: vṛddhavyavahāraparicayādhigataśabdārthasaṃbandhasaṃskṛtadhiyām api śabdasmaraṇasaṃskāraprabodhahetubhūtaprathamodabhūtaviśuddhavastvavabhāsasyāparihāryatvāt /
analyzed: vṛddha vyavahāra paricaya adhigata śabda artha saṃbandha saṃskṛta dhiyām api śabda smaraṇa saṃskāra prabodha hetu bhūta prathama uda bhūta viśuddha vastu avabhāsasya aparihārya tvāt

original: yatra hi vastuni niviśamānaḥ śabdaḥ śabdavid vyavahāreṣu yo 'vadhṛtas taddarśane tatsaṃskāraprabodhāt sa hi smṛtipatham eti nānyatheti //
analyzed: yatra hi vastuni niviśamānaḥ śabdaḥ śabda vid vyavahāreṣu yaḥ tad darśane tad saṃskāra prabodhāt sa hi smṛti patham eti na anyathā iti

original: sāmānyaśabdeṣv api yat tat kiṃ ityādiṣu viśeṣaśabdeṣv iva saiva vārtā /
analyzed: sāmānya śabdeṣu api yat tat kim ityādiṣu viśeṣa śabdeṣu iva sā eva vārtā

original: teṣām api vyutpattyupayogavirahe vividhavanavihāri vihaṅgakūjitādivad arthapratītihetutvānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: teṣām api vyutpatti upayoga virahe vividha vana vihāri vihaṅga kūjita ādi vat artha pratīti hetu tva anupapatteḥ

original: savikalpakadaśāyām api na vācakaviśiṣṭavācyaṃ mecakaguṇakhacitam eva kuvalayam avalokayati loka iti vistaraśaḥ pratyakṣalakṣaṇe parīkṣitam etat /
analyzed: savikalpaka daśāyām api na vācaka viśiṣṭa vācyam mecaka guṇa khacitam eva kuvalayam avalokayati lokaḥ iti vistaraśaḥ pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe parīkṣitam etat

original: āha ca na śabdābhedarūpeṇa buddhir artheṣu jāyate /
analyzed: āha ca na śabda abheda rūpeṇa buddhiḥ artheṣu jāyate

original: prākśabdādyādṛśī buddhiḥ śabdād api hi tādṛśīti //
analyzed: prāk śabdāt yādṛśī buddhiḥ śabdāt api hi tādṛśī iti

original: saṃjñitvamātram adhikam adhunā dhvanisannidhāne buddhim adhirohati na tadviśiṣṭo 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: saṃjñi tva mātram adhikam adhunā dhvani sannidhāne buddhim adhirohati na tad viśiṣṭaḥ rthaḥ

original: tasya hi na netreṇa na śrotreṇa nobhābhyāṃ na kevalaṃ manasā vā grahaṇam upapadyate atiprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: tasya hi na netreṇa na śrotreṇa na ubhābhyām na kevalam manasā vā grahaṇam upapadyate atiprasaṅgāt

original: śabdo hi anekadharmake dharmiṇi eka taradharmāvadhāraṇābhyupāyo bhavati /
analyzed: śabdaḥ hi aneka dharmake dharmiṇi eka tara dharma avadhāraṇa abhyupāyaḥ bhavati

original: na tatrātmānam āropayati /
analyzed: na tatra ātmānam āropayati

original: na hi dīpendriyaprabhṛtayaḥ pratītyupāyāḥ tadupeye rūpādāv ātmānam āropayanti /
analyzed: na hi dīpa indriya prabhṛtayaḥ pratīti upāyāḥ tad upeye rūpa ādau ātmānam āropayanti

original: ata eva tadupāyatvabhramakṛtas tadabhedavādo 'pi na yuktaḥ //
analyzed: atas eva tad upāya tva bhrama kṛtaḥ tad abheda vādaḥ pi na yuktaḥ

original: na hy upāyād abhinnatvaṃ tadupeyasya yujyate /
analyzed: na hi upāyāt abhinna tvam tad upeyasya yujyate

original: rūpasya na hy abhinnatvaṃ dīpād vā cakṣuṣo 'pi vā //
analyzed: rūpasya na hi abhinna tvam dīpāt vā cakṣuṣaḥ api vā

original: api ca yadi śabdād abhinno 'rthaḥ pratibhāty eva ko 'dhyāsārthaḥ /
analyzed: api ca yadi śabdāt abhinnaḥ rthaḥ pratibhāti eva kaḥ dhyāsa arthaḥ

original: abhede 'pi śabdam ayam eva viśvam iti tatrāpi ko 'dhyāsārthaḥ adhyāsa bhramas tu vaiyākaraṇānāṃ ekākāranirdeśadoṣanirmitaḥ /
analyzed: abhede śabdam ayam eva viśvam iti tatra api kaḥ dhyāsa arthaḥ adhyāsa bhramaḥ tu vaiyākaraṇānām eka ākāra nirdeśa doṣa nirmitaḥ

original: yathāha gaur ity eva hi nirdeśaḥ vācyas tadbuddhivācinām iti /
analyzed: yathā āha gauḥ iti eva hi nirdeśaḥ vācyaḥ tad buddhi vācinām iti

original: kas tvayā dṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ iti pṛṣṭo vakti gauḥ iti kīdṛśaṃ te jñānam utpannam gauḥ iti /
analyzed: kaḥ tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ rthaḥ iti pṛṣṭaḥ vakti gauḥ iti kīdṛśam te jñānam utpannam gauḥ iti

original: kīdṛśaṃ śabdaṃ prayuktavānasi gauḥ iti /
analyzed: kīdṛśam śabdam prayuktavān asi gauḥ iti

original: tata eṣā bhrāntiḥ /
analyzed: tatas eṣā bhrāntiḥ

original: vastutas tu viviktā evaite śabdajñānārtāḥ /
analyzed: vastutas tu viviktāḥ eva ete śabda jñāna ārtāḥ

original: taduktam gavi sāsnādisadrūpā gādirūpābhidhāyake /
analyzed: tat uktam gavi sāsnā ādi sat rūpāḥ ga ādi rūpa abhidhāyake

original: nirākārobhayajñāne saṃvittiḥ paramārthataḥ iti //
analyzed: nirākāra ubhaya jñāne saṃvittiḥ paramārthataḥ iti

original: evaṃ indriyajeṣv iva śābdeṣv api pratyayeṣu na śabdasvarūpam adhyasyatīti yuktam /
analyzed: evam indriya jeṣu iva śābdeṣu api pratyayeṣu na śabda svarūpam adhyasyati iti yuktam

original: yadi ca śabdaḥ svarūpeṇārthaṃ pratipādayati tadā akṣaśabdasyaikyāt devanavibhītakarathākṣeṣu tulyā pratītiḥ syāt /
analyzed: yadi ca śabdaḥ sva rūpeṇa artham pratipādayati tadā akṣa śabdasya aikyāt devana vibhītaka ratha akṣeṣu tulyā pratītiḥ syāt

original: na cākṣaśabdāḥ bhinnā iti vaktavyam svarūpapratyabhijñānānapāyāt /
analyzed: na ca akṣa śabdāḥ bhinnāḥ iti vaktavyam svarūpa pratyabhijñāna anapāyāt

original: taduccāreṇe cārthatrayyāṃ saṃśayadarśanāt //
analyzed: ca artha trayyām saṃśaya darśanāt

original: bhavatiśabdayoś ca suptiṅantayoḥ tulyarūpatvāt /
analyzed: bhavati śabdayoḥ ca sup tiṅ antayoḥ tulya rūpa tvāt

original: adhyāsapakṣe tulyārthapratītihetutvaṃ prāpnoti /
analyzed: adhyāsa pakṣe tulya artha pratīti hetu tvam prāpnoti

original: tathā ca siddhasādhyabuddhiḥ saṃvedayamānāpi nihnūyeta /
analyzed: tathā ca siddha sādhya buddhiḥ saṃvedayamānā api nihnūyeta

original: evam agādity aśva iti ajāvaya ityādāv api draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: evam agāt iti aśvaḥ iti aja avayaḥ ityādau api draṣṭavyam

original: śabdasya siddharūpatvāt tadadhyāsenārthabuddhāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt ityādau na kvacit sādhyabuddhir bhavet /
analyzed: śabdasya siddha rūpa tvāt tad adhyāsena artha buddhau iṣyamāṇāyām yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt ityādau na kvacid sādhya buddhiḥ bhavet

original: siddhādhyāsena sādhyabuddher ananurūpatvāt //
analyzed: siddha adhyāsena sādhya buddheḥ ananurūpa tvāt

original: jātiguṇakriyāśabdāś ca gauḥ śuklo gacchatītyādayaḥ kena kāraṇena niyatam adhyāsam anurundhata iti nāvagacchāmaḥ /
analyzed: jāti guṇa kriyā śabdāḥ ca gauḥ śuklaḥ gacchati ityādayaḥ kena kāraṇena niyatam adhyāsam anurundhate iti na avagacchāmaḥ

original: śabdasyārthānapkekṣanisargasiddhavaiśvarūpyakalpanābījābhāvāt /
analyzed: śabdasya artha anapka īkṣa nisarga siddha vaiśvarūpya kalpanā bīja abhāvāt

original: pratiniyataśabdavṛtteś ca kasyacil lakṣaṇasyānualakṣaṇāt /
analyzed: pratiniyata śabda vṛtteḥ ca kasyacid lakṣaṇasya anu a lakṣaṇāt

original: vṛkṣaplakṣaśabdayoś ca ghaṭapaṭaśabdayor iva svarūpabhedā viśeṣāt arthānapekṣitvāc ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasāmānādhikaraṇye śabdādhyāsavādino na bhavetām /
analyzed: vṛkṣa plakṣa śabdayoḥ ca ghaṭa paṭa śabdayoḥ iva sva rūpa bhedāḥ viśeṣāt artha anapekṣi tvāt ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva sāmānādhikaraṇye śabda adhyāsa vādinaḥ na bhavetām

original: na hy ekatra vastuni vācye kvacid anayoḥ śabdayor vṛttiḥ //
analyzed: na hi ekatra vastuni vācye kvacid anayoḥ śabdayoḥ vṛttiḥ

original: etena nīlotpalam api pratyākhyātam //
analyzed: etena nīlotpalam api pratyākhyātam

original: tatraitat syāt na nīlaguṇaviśeṣatam idaṃ utpalaṃ nāma kiṃcid asti viśeṣyam api tu tat nirastāvayavārthaṃ aśvakarṇādivat arthāntaram evedaṃ vyutpattiprakāramātraṃ tu viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhvavavarṇanam iti tad etad asamīcīnam anubhūyamānāvayavārthapratītinihnavanimittānupalambhāt /
analyzed: tatra etat syāt na idam utpalam nāma kiṃcid asti viśeṣyam api tu tat nirasta avayava artham aśvakarṇa ādi vat artha antaram eva idam vyutpatti prakāra mātram tu iti tat etat asamīcīnam anubhūyamāna avayava artha pratīti nihnava nimitta anupalambhāt

original: aśvakarṇādau hi yuktam arthāntaratvaṃ tatra hi nāśvārthaḥ na karṇārthaḥ /
analyzed: aśvakarṇa ādau hi yuktam artha antara tvam tatra hi na aśva arthaḥ na karṇa arthaḥ

original: niravayavākyārthavādaś ca prāg eva vistareṇa nirasta ity alaṃ punaruktālāpena //
analyzed: niravaya vākya artha vādaḥ ca prāk eva vistareṇa nirastaḥ iti alam punarukta ālāpena

original: atha śabdadvayādhyāsamātranibandhanam eva sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ ity ucyate tad api na cāra vṛkṣas taruritiparyāyayor api tatsaṃbhave sati sāmānādhikaraṇyaprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: atha śabda dvaya adhyāsa mātra nibandhanam eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti ucyate tat api na vṛkṣaḥ taruḥ iti paryāyayoḥ api tad saṃbhave sati sāmānādhikaraṇya prasaṅgāt

original: api ca paryāyeṣu hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇiḥ ityādiṣu śabdarūpabhedādhyāsapakṣe arthabuddhibhedaḥ prāpnoti /
analyzed: api ca paryāyeṣu hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇiḥ ityādiṣu śabda rūpa bheda adhyāsa pakṣe artha buddhi bhedaḥ prāpnoti

original: na cāsāv astīti nādhyāsaḥ /
analyzed: na ca asau asti iti na adhyāsaḥ

original: kiṃca saṃbandhagrahaṇanirapekṣo 'pi śabdaḥ svasāmarthyam anurudhyamānaḥ svādhyāsena buddhiṃ vidadhyāt /
analyzed: kiṃca saṃbandha grahaṇa nirapekṣaḥ u pi śabdaḥ sva sāmarthyam anurudhyamānaḥ svādhyāsena buddhim vidadhyāt

original: tadapekṣāyāṃ vā kasya kena saṃbandha iti na budhyāmahe śabdārthasya pṛthagvyavasthitātmanaḥ tvanmate durlabhatvāt /
analyzed: tad apekṣāyām vā kasya kena saṃbandhaḥ iti na budhyāmahe śabda arthasya pṛthak vyavasthita ātmanaḥ tvad mate durlabha tvāt

original: śabdavyatiriktārthopagame vā kim anena śabdādhyāsasamarthanāṅambareṇa viramyatām ato mṛgatṛṣṇānusaraṇaraṇikāt //
analyzed: śabda vyatirikta artha upagame vā kim anena śabda adhyāsa samarthana āṅambareṇa viramyatām atas mṛgatṛṣṇā anusaraṇa raṇikāt

original: api cādhyāsaḥ kvacit sādṛśyād bhavati śuktāv iva rajatasya /
analyzed: api ca adhyāsaḥ kvacid sādṛśyāt bhavati śuktau iva rajatasya

original: kvacid anurāgād bhavati lākṣāyā iva sphaṭike /
analyzed: kvacid anurāgāt bhavati lākṣāyāḥ iva sphaṭike

original: śabdārthayor mūrtāmūrtatayā 'tidūrabhinnasvarūpayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ tāvad anupapannam /
analyzed: śabda arthayoḥ mūrta amūrta tayā ti dūra bhinna svarūpayoḥ sādṛśyam tāvat anupapannam

original: anurāgo 'pi tata eva durghaṭaḥ /
analyzed: anurāgaḥ pi tatas eva durghaṭaḥ

original: pṛthagdeśatvāt bhinnendriyagrāhyatvāc ca /
analyzed: pṛthak deśa tvāt bhinna indriya grāhya tvāt ca

original: pratibimbavarṇanam api sundaram dūradeśatvena śabdārthayoḥ prāptyabhāvāt /
analyzed: pratibimba varṇanam api sundaram dūra deśa tvena śabda arthayoḥ prāpti abhāvāt

original: aprāptayoś ca pratibimbe dvārakodyānanivāsi vāsudevasundarīvad anatāmarasāni sāgarataraṅgapavanaparicayacaladalakalatakālāṃcchitāni svaccheṣu jyotsnāvadātadyutiṣu tuṣāragirigahvaragatatuhinaśilākarpūradarpaṇeṣu pratibimbitāni dṛśyeran //
analyzed: aprāptayoḥ ca pratibimbe dvārakā udyāna nivāsi vāsudeva sundarī vat anata amarasāni sāgara taraṅga pavana paricaya calat alaka lataka ālāṃcchitāni svaccheṣu jyotsnā avadāta dyutiṣu tuṣāragiri gahvara gata tuhina śilā karpūra darpaṇeṣu pratibimbitāni dṛśyeran

original: atha sarvagatatvena śabdānām arthadeśe prāptir abhidhīyate tarhi sakalaśabdasārthasādhānaṇyāt atyantam adhyāsasaṅkaryam asavadhāryamāṇaviśeṣaniyamakāraṇam āpadyata ity alam atiprasaṅgena /
analyzed: atha sarvagata tvena śabdānām artha deśe prāptiḥ abhidhīyate tarhi sakala śabda sārtha sādhānaṇyāt atyantam adhyāsa saṅkaryam a savadhāryamāṇa viśeṣa niyama kāraṇam āpadyate iti alam atiprasaṅgena

original: sarvathā na saṃbaddhaḥ śabdādhyāsavādaḥ //
analyzed: sarvathā na saṃbaddhaḥ śabda adhyāsa vādaḥ

original: vivartavādo 'pi na samaṃjasaḥ /
analyzed: vivarta vādaḥ pi na samaṃjasaḥ

original: tathā hi vivartate 'rthabhāvena iti ko arthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi vivartate rtha bhāvena iti kaḥ arthaḥ

original: na tāvad arthātmanā śabdaḥ pariṇāmam upayāti kṣīram iva dadhirūpeṇa pariṇāmitvena vikāritayā vā kṣīrāder ivānityatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na tāvat artha ātmanā śabdaḥ pariṇāmam upayāti kṣīram iva dadhi rūpeṇa pariṇāmi tvena vikāri tayā vā kṣīra ādeḥ iva anitya tva prasaṅgāt

original: tathābhāve 'pi ca nādvaitasiddhiḥ dadhna iva kṣīravikārasya śabdavikārasyārthasya tato 'nyatvāt /
analyzed: tathā abhāve ca na advaita siddhiḥ dadhnaḥ iva kṣīra vikārasya śabda vikārasya arthasya tatas

original: anyatvāc ca bādhakāraṇakāluṣyādyupaplavavirahapratītisamarpitabhedatvāt //
analyzed: anya tvāt ca bādha kāraṇa kāluṣya ādi upaplava viraha pratīti samarpita bheda tvāt

original: athārthapratibhāsam asatyam apīndriyajālavad upadarśayati śabda ity ayaṃ vivarto 'rthaḥ so 'pi na yuktaḥ /
analyzed: atha artha pratibhāsam asatyam api indriya jāla vat upadarśayati śabdaḥ iti ayam vivartaḥ rthaḥ saḥ na yuktaḥ

original: bāhyasya vastunaḥ padābhidheyasya jātivyaktyādeḥ vākhyavācyasyāpi bhāvanādeḥ pūrvaprasādhitatvāt /
analyzed: bāhyasya vastunaḥ pada abhidheyasya jāti vyakti ādeḥ vā ākhya vācyasya api bhāvanā ādeḥ pūrva prasādhita tvāt

original: avayavavyādeś cādūra evāgre samarthayiṣyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: avayava vyādeḥ ca adūre eva agre samarthayiṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: na cendriyajālam āyādivad ayathārthatayām iha kim api kāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ //
analyzed: na ca indriya jālam āya ādi vat iha kim api kāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ

original: athārtharūpeṇa śabdaḥ śuktir iva rajatākāratayāvabhāsata itīyaṃ vivartavāco yuktiḥ iyam api na sādḥīyasī śuktikā hi rajatavatprakāśata iti śakyaṃ vaktum śukter ākārasārūpyeṇa tathāvabhāsasambhavāt /
analyzed: atha artha rūpeṇa śabdaḥ śuktiḥ iva rajata ākāra tayā avabhāsate iti iyam vivarta vācaḥ yuktiḥ iyam api na sādḍīyasī śuktikā hi rajata vat prakāśate iti śakyam vaktum śukteḥ ākāra sārūpyeṇa tathā avabhāsa sambhavāt

original: iha tu śabdārthayor atyantavisadṛśavapuṣor ākārasamāropakāraṇānavadhāraṇāt katham itararūpeṇetarasyāvabhāsaḥ /
analyzed: iha tu śabda arthayoḥ atyanta visadṛśa vapuṣoḥ ākāra samāropa kāraṇa an avadhāraṇāt katham itara rūpeṇa itarasya avabhāsaḥ

original: śuktikārajatādīṣu ca bādhakavaśāt tathātvam avagatam /
analyzed: śuktikā rajata ādīṣu ca bādhaka vaśāt tathātvam avagatam

original: iha tu na bādhakaṃ kiṃcid bhavati bhāviṣyati veti varṇitam //
analyzed: iha tu na bādhakam kiṃcid bhavati bhāviṣyati vā iti varṇitam

original: atha svānuvedhamajahat satyām asatyāṃ vārthabuddhim ādadhāti śabdatyayaṃ vivartārthaḥ eṣo 'pi saṃpraty eva pratikṣiptaḥ /
analyzed: atha sva anuvedham ajahat satyām asatyām vā artha buddhim ādadhāti śabda tyayam vivarta arthaḥ saṃprati eva pratikṣiptaḥ

original: śabdānuvedhavirahiṇīnāṃ prācuryeṇa pratipattīnāṃ pradarśitatvāt /
analyzed: śabda anuvedha virahiṇīnām prācuryeṇa pratipattīnām pradarśita tvāt

original: na cānyaḥ kaścid vipaścic cetati vivartate vivartaprakāraḥ ity avācakam ucyate vivartate 'rthabhāvena iti //
analyzed: na ca anyaḥ kaścid vipaścit cetati vivartate vivarta prakāraḥ iti avācakam ucyate vivartate rtha bhāvena iti

original: atha śabdabrahmaiva sṛjati jagad ity ayaṃ vivartaprakāra ucyate so 'pi na samyak acetanatvena śabdasya īśvarasyeva sraṣṭṛtvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: atha śabdabrahma eva sṛjati jagat iti ayam vivarta prakāraḥ ucyate na samyak acetana tvena śabdasya īśvarasya iva sraṣṭṛ tva anupapatteḥ

original: na ca paramāṇuvad asya kāraṇatvam avayavasamavāyitvena pṛthivyādeḥ kāryasya grahaṇāt //
analyzed: na ca paramāṇu vat asya kāraṇa tvam avayava samavāyi tvena pṛthivī ādeḥ kāryasya grahaṇāt

original: atha vijñānam ānandaṃ brahma ity āgamavacanam anusaratā vibhūtvam iva cetanatvam api śabdabrahmaṇo varṇyate tarhi īśvarasyaiva śabdabrahmeti nāma kṛtaṃ syāt //
analyzed: atha vijñānam ānandam brahma iti āgama vacanam anusaratā vibhu tvam iva cetana tvam api śabdabrahmaṇaḥ varṇyate tarhi īśvarasya eva śabdabrahma iti nāma kṛtam syāt

original: yad apy ucyate /
analyzed: yat api ucyate

original: dve brahaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati iti tadāpi brahma subhikṣam atyantam alaukikam /
analyzed: dve brahaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma param ca yat śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ param brahma adhigacchati iti tadā api brahma subhikṣam atyantam alaukikam

original: ekatarasya brahmaṇaḥ kālpanikatvāt /
analyzed: ekatarasya brahmaṇaḥ kālpanika tvāt

original: akākpanikatve vā katham advaitavādaḥ /
analyzed: akākpanika tve vā katham advaita vādaḥ

original: tasmāt kṛtam anena śabdabrahmaṇā /
analyzed: tasmāt kṛtam anena śabdabrahmaṇā

original: svasti parasmai brahmaṇe bhūyāt //
analyzed: svasti parasmai brahmaṇe bhūyāt

original: avidyāmāyāvinirmitavividhabhedaprathanakalpaś ca sattādvaitadūṣaṇāvasara eva nivārita iti śabdādvaitam api tadvad asamaṃjasam iti siddham //
analyzed: avidyā māyā vinirmita vividha bheda prathana kalpaḥ ca sattā advaita dūṣaṇa avasare eva nivāritaḥ iti śabda advaitam api tadvat asamaṃjasam iti siddham

original: etena paramātmopādānatvam api prayuktam /
analyzed: etena paramātma upādāna tvam api prayuktam

original: paramātmano nisarganirmalasya evaṃprāyakaluṣavikārakāraṇatvānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: paramātmanaḥ nisarga nirmalasya evaṃprāya kaluṣa vikāra kāraṇatva anupapatteḥ

original: asatyam eva vikārajātaṃ avidyātaḥ paramātmani vibhātīty etad api dūṣitam /
analyzed: asatyam eva vikāra jātam avidyātaḥ paramātmani vibhāti iti etat api dūṣitam

original: ataḥ sarvathā nādvaitapakṣaḥ kaścid anavadyaḥ //
analyzed: atas sarvathā na advaita pakṣaḥ kaścid anavadyaḥ

original: atha sarvaprāṇinām eka evātmā na nānātmānaḥ itīdṛśam ucyate tad apy apramāṇakam ekasmin sukhini na sarve sukhinaḥ ekasmin duḥkhite na sarve duḥkhitāḥ iti vyavasthādarśanāt /
analyzed: atha sarva prāṇinām ekaḥ eva ātmā na na anātmānaḥ iti īdṛśam ucyate tat api apramāṇakam ekasmin sukhini na sarve sukhinaḥ ekasmin duḥkhite na sarve duḥkhitāḥ iti vyavasthā darśanāt

original: ātmaparavyavahārasya ca sarvajanapratītisiddhasya durapahanavatvāt /
analyzed: ātma para vyavahārasya ca sarva jana pratīti siddhasya durapahanava tvāt

original: anyadṛṣṭte ca sukhaduḥkhasādhane vastuni smaraṇānusandhānapūrvakecchādveṣādikāryajātasyānyatrānupalambhāt /
analyzed: anya dṛṣṭte ca sukha duḥkha sādhane vastuni smaraṇa anusandhāna pūrvaka icchā dveṣa ādi kārya jātasya anyatra anupalambhāt

original: ekasmiś ca vītarāge mokṣam āsāditavati saṃsāraṇām anyeṣām ānantyadarśanāt //
analyzed: ekasmin ca vīta rāge mokṣam āsāditavati saṃsāraṇām anyeṣām ānantya darśanāt

original: ahaṃpratyayasya pratyag ātmavṛtteḥ paratrāsambhavāt /
analyzed: ahaṃpratyayasya pratyak ātma vṛtteḥ paratra asambhavāt

original: jagadvaicitryasya ca puruṣabhedaniyatadharmanibandhanasyānyathānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: jagat vaicitryasya ca puruṣa bheda niyata dharma nibandhanasya anyathā anupapatteḥ

original: ātmabhedasya vispaṣṭasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: ātma bhedasya vispaṣṭa siddha tvāt

original: taptalohasphuliṅkaghaṭākāśa pādavedanādidṛṣṭāntakadambakasya ca niṣedhaḥ kṛta eveti ekātmavādo 'pi na yuktimān ity alaṃ vistareṇa //
analyzed: ca niṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ eva iti eka ātma vādaḥ pi na yuktimān iti alam vistareṇa

original: śabdasyāyaṃ vivartaḥ katham akhilam iti prasphurat tadvivikta svākāro 'rthaprapaṃcaḥ katham iva vikṛtiḥ brahmaṇo vedṛśī syāt /
analyzed: śabdasya ayam vivartaḥ katham akhilam iti prasphurat sva ākāraḥ rtha prapaṃcaḥ katham iva vikṛtiḥ brahmaṇaḥ vā īdṛśī syāt

original: tasmān nānātmatattvo paricitasadasatkarmapākānusāraprādurbhūteśvarecchāvaśavicaladaṇuprodbhavo bhūtasargaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt bhūta sargaḥ

original: evaṃ sthiteṣu sarveṣu tūṣṇīm advaitavādiṣu /
analyzed: evam sthiteṣu sarveṣu tūṣṇīm advaita vādiṣu

original: vidvānādvaitavādī tu punaḥ pratyavatiṣṭate //
analyzed: vidvān advaita vādī tu punar pratyavatiṣṭate

original: satyam anupajananam anapāyam aparimitam advayaṃ brahama na yuktimad iti yukta eva tad anabhyupagamaḥ /
analyzed: satyam an upajananam an apāyam aparimitam advayam brahama na yuktimat iti yuktaḥ eva tat anabhyupagamaḥ

original: vijñānam eva tu kṣanikaṃ upajananāpāyadharmakaṃ anādisantānaprabandhapravṛtam idaṃ tathā tathāvabhātīti na tato 'dvitīyam artharūpaṃ nāma kiṃcid astīti paśyāmaḥ //
analyzed: vijñānam eva tu kṣanikam upajanana apāya dharmakam anādi santāna prabandha pravṛtam idam tathā tathā avabhāti iti na tatas dvitīyam artha rūpam nāma kiṃcid asti iti paśyāmaḥ

original: nanu pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena prasparavisadṛśapadārthasvarūpasaṃvedanasya darśitatvāt kathaṃ vijñānasyāyam avabhāsaḥ arthābhāve tatsvarūpānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣa ādinā pramāṇena praspara visadṛśa padārtha sva rūpa saṃvedanasya darśita tvāt katham vijñānasya ayam avabhāsaḥ artha abhāve tad svarūpa anupapatteḥ

original: grāhyagrahaṇaṃ hi nāma vijñānaṃ bhavati na grahaṇagrahaṇam iti //
analyzed: grāhya grahaṇam hi nāma vijñānam bhavati na grahaṇa grahaṇam iti

original: ucyate idaṃ tāvat parīkṣyatām /
analyzed: ucyate idam tāvat parīkṣyatām

original: yad etat pratyakṣavijñānaṃ nīlam idam pītam idam ity utpadyate tatra kim eka ākāraḥ prakāśate uta dvitayam iti //
analyzed: yat etat pratyakṣa vijñānam nīlam idam pītam idam iti utpadyate tatra kim ekaḥ ākāraḥ prakāśate uta dvitayam iti

original: yadi dvitayam avabhāti ayam artho nīlam idaṃ tajjñānam iti tat kim atra vicāryte jitaṃ bhavadbhiḥ /
analyzed: yadi dvitayam avabhāti ayam arthaḥ nīlam idam tat jñānam iti tat kim atra vicāryate jitam bhavadbhiḥ

original: jitasya yad āpadyate tad asmāsu vidhīyatām //
analyzed: jitasya yat āpadyate tat asmāsu vidhīyatām

original: atha eka evāyam ākāraḥ prathate tarhy asti vicārāvasaraḥ /
analyzed: atha ekaḥ eva ayam ākāraḥ prathate tarhi asti vicāra avasaraḥ

original: kasyāyam ākāraḥ kim arthasya kiṃ jñānasyeti /
analyzed: kasya ayam ākāraḥ kim arthasya kim jñānasya iti

original: sa caivaṃ vicāryamāṇa ākāraḥ yady arthasyeti tadbhavanto jeṣyanti /
analyzed: sa ca evam vicāryamāṇaḥ ākāraḥ yadi arthasya iti tad bhavantaḥ jeṣyanti

original: jñānākrapakṣe tu vayaṃ yeṣyāma iti //
analyzed: tu vayam yeṣyāmaḥ iti

original: kiṃ tāvad atra yuktam /
analyzed: kim tāvat atra yuktam

original: jñānasyāyam ākāra iti /
analyzed: jñānasya ayam ākāraḥ iti

original: kutaḥ kalpanā tāvad ihālpīyasīti /
analyzed: kutas kalpanā tāvat iha alpīyasī iti

original: arthākrapakṣe hi arthasya jaḍātmanaḥ prakāśāyogāt grāhyatvem anyathā na syād iti grāhakāntarakalpanāvaśyaṃ bhāvinīti kalpanādvaiguṇyam //
analyzed: hi arthasya jaḍa ātmanaḥ prakāśa ayogāt grāhya tvā īm anyathā na syāt iti grāhaka antara kalpanā avaśyam bhāvinī iti kalpanā dvaiguṇyam

original: athārtha eva grāhyātmā yaḥ sa eva grāhaka iti kathyate sa tarhi prakāśa eveti saṃjñāyām eva vivādaḥ syāt /
analyzed: atha arthaḥ eva grāhya ātmā yaḥ saḥ eva grāhakaḥ iti kathyate sa tarhi prakāśaḥ eva iti saṃjñāyām eva vivādaḥ syāt

original: bāhyābhyantarakṛtī viśeṣa iti cet aho viśeṣajño devānāṃ priyaḥ /
analyzed: bāhya abhyantara kṛtī viśeṣaḥ iti ced aho viśeṣa jñaḥ devānām priyaḥ

original: grāhakād vicchinnatā hi grāhyasya bāhyatā /
analyzed: grāhakāt vicchinna tā hi grāhyasya bāhya tā

original: na śarīrāpekṣiṇo bāhyatā bhavati /
analyzed: na śarīra apekṣiṇaḥ bāhya tā bhavati

original: yadā ca grāhyād arthāt avyatirikta eva grāhaka iṣyate tadāsya na tato vicchinnateti abāhyatvāt jñānam eva tad iti kathaṃ na nāmni vivādaḥ //
analyzed: yadā ca grāhyāt arthāt avyatiriktaḥ eva grāhakaḥ iṣyate tadā asya na tatas vicchinna tā iti abāhya tvāt jñānam eva tat iti katham na nāmni vivādaḥ

original: ubhayasiddhatvāt jñānasya tasyāyam ākāro bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: ubhaya siddha tvāt jñānasya tasya ayam ākāraḥ bhavitum arhati

original: jñāne hi na kecana vivadante /
analyzed: jñāne hi na kecana vivadante

original: atas tasyaivāyam ākāra iti yuktam anekakalpanāto hy ekārthakalpanā jyāyasīti //
analyzed: atas tasya eva ayam ākāraḥ iti yuktam aneka kalpanā atas hi eka artha kalpanā jyāyasī iti

original: ataś ca jñānasyāyam ākāraḥ /
analyzed: atas ca jñānasya ayam ākāraḥ

original: jñānaṃ hi prakāśakam aprakāśasyārthasya bhavadbhir abhyupagamyate /
analyzed: jñānam hi prakāśakam aprakāśasya arthasya bhavadbhiḥ abhyupagamyate

original: tata.c ca arthāt prathamataram asya grahaṇena bhavitavyam /
analyzed: ca arthāt prathamataram asya grahaṇena bhavitavyam

original: agṛhītasya dīpādeḥ prakāśasya prakāśakatvādarśanāt /
analyzed: agṛhītasya dīpa ādeḥ prakāśasya prakāśaka tva adarśanāt

original: utpanneṣv api ca ghaṭādiṣv artheṣu prakāśavaikalyād vā pratibandhavaidhuryād vā bhavaty agrahaṇam /
analyzed: utpanneṣu api ca ghaṭa ādiṣu artheṣu prakāśa vaikalyāt vā pratibandha vaidhuryāt vā bhavati agrahaṇam

original: jñānasya tūtpannasya sataḥ na kiṃcid grahaṇe pratibandhakaḥ /
analyzed: jñānasya tu utpannasya sataḥ na kiṃcid grahaṇe pratibandhakaḥ

original: na ca prakāśakāntarāpekṣaṇam svata eva dīpavat prakāśasvabhāvatvāt /
analyzed: na ca prakāśaka antara apekṣaṇam svatas eva dīpa vat prakāśa svabhāva tvāt

original: ataḥ yadaiva tasyotpādaḥ tadaiva grahaṇam avaśyaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: atas yadā eva tasya utpādaḥ tadā eva grahaṇam avaśyam bhavet

original: na cet kālāntare 'pi na syāt //
analyzed: na ced kāla antare pi na syāt

original: kiṃ hi tasya kālāntare bhaviṣyati kiṃ vā tadā nābūt yena tat kālāntare grahīṣyate tadā ca na gṛhyata iti /
analyzed: kim hi tasya kāla antare bhaviṣyati kim vā tadā na abūt yena tat kāla antare grahīṣyate tadā ca na gṛhyate iti

original: jñānāntareṇa kālāntare tad grahīṣyata iti cet /
analyzed: jñāna antareṇa kāla antare tat grahīṣyate iti ced

original: tad api kena grāhīṣyate anyeneti cet tad apy anye neti ko 'vadhiḥ /
analyzed: tat api kena grāhīṣyate anyena iti ced tat api anye na iti kaḥ vadhiḥ

original: śrama iti cet kāmaṃ śrānto viraṃsyati bhāvan artha tu na gṛhītavān eva prakāśāgrahaṇe tatprakāśyaparicchedāyogād ity evaṃ na kadācid arthagrahaṇaṃ syāt /
analyzed: śramaḥ iti ced kāmam śrāntaḥ viraṃsyati bhāvan artha tu na gṛhītavān eva prakāśa agrahaṇe tad prakāśya pariccheda ayogāt iti evam na kadācid artha grahaṇam syāt

original: tasmād arthagrahaṇavādināpi pūrvaṃ jñānagrahaṇam avaśyā -śrayaṇīyam /
analyzed: tasmāt artha grahaṇa vādinā api pūrvam jñāna grahaṇam avaśyā śrayaṇīyam

original: yathoktaṃ apratyakṣopalambhasya nārthadṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati iti //
analyzed: yathā uktam apratyakṣa upalambhasya na artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati iti

original: ataś caitad evam jñānapṛṣṭena cottarakālabhāvipratyavamarśadarśanāt /
analyzed: atas ca etat evam jñāna pṛṣṭena ca uttara kāla bhāvi pratyavamarśa darśanāt

original: jñāto mayā 'yam arthaḥ iti hi pratyavamarśanataḥ pramātāraḥ prathamaṃ jñānagrahaṇam anumodante /
analyzed: jñātaḥ mayā yam arthaḥ iti hi pratyavamarśanataḥ pramātāraḥ prathamam jñāna grahaṇam anumodante

original: na hy agṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśEṣyabuddhir bhavati /
analyzed: na hi agṛhīta viśeṣaṇā viśeṣya buddhiḥ bhavati

original: tasmāt api pūrvaṃ jñānagrahaṇam iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt api pūrvam jñāna grahaṇam iti siddham

original: jñānaṃ ca gṛhyamāṇaṃ ākārarahitaṃ grahītum aśakyam iti balāt sākāram eva tat grahītavyam /
analyzed: jñānam ca gṛhyamāṇam ākāra rahitam grahītum aśakyam iti balāt sa ākāram eva tat grahītavyam

original: sākāre ca jñāne gṛhīte sati dvitīyakāraṇābhāvāt kuto jñānātirikto bāhyo 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: sa ākāre ca jñāne gṛhīte sati dvitīya kāraṇa abhāvāt kutas jñāna atiriktaḥ bāhyaḥ rthaḥ

original: itaś ca sākāraṃ jñānam ākāravattām antareṇāsya pratikarmavyavasthānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: itas ca sa ākāram jñānam ākāravat tām antareṇa asya prati karma vyavasthā anupapatteḥ

original: kalpayitvā 'pi bāhyam artham avaśyam ākāravattā vijñānasya  viṣayaniyamasiddhaye vaktavyā /
analyzed: kalpayitvā pi bāhyam artham avaśyam ākāravat tā vijñānasya viṣaya niyama siddhaye vaktavyā

original: nīlajñānaṃ hīdaṃ anekasannidhāne samupjāyamānaṃ katham akhilataditarapadārthaparihāreṇa kevalanīlālambanatām avalambate /
analyzed: nīla jñānam hi idam aneka sannidhāne samupjāyamānam katham akhila tad itara padārtha parihāreṇa kevala nīla ālambana tām avalambate

original: bodhasvabhāvatayāḥ sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: bodha svabhāva tayāḥ sarvān prati a viśiṣṭa tvāt

original: pravṛttir api prekṣāpūrvakāriṇāṃ kathaṃ tad ekaviṣayaiva syāt /
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ api prekṣā pūrva kāriṇām katham tat eka viṣayā eva syāt

original: na ca nīlajanitatvakṛtaeṣa tadadhigamaniyama iti kathayitum ucitam ālokakocanādikārakāntarajanitatvasyāpi bhāvena tadviṣayatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na ca nīla janita tva kṛta eṣa tad adhigama niyamaḥ iti kathayitum ucitam āloka kocana ādi kāraka antara janita tvasya api bhāvena tad viṣaya tva prasaṅgāt

original: ato nīlākārataiva nīlaviṣayatvavyavasthāhetuḥ na nimittāntaram /
analyzed: atas nīla ākāra tā eva nīla viṣaya tva vyavasthā hetuḥ na nimitta antaram

original: āha ca tatrānubhavamātreṇa jñānasya sadṛśyātmanaḥ /
analyzed: āha ca tatra anubhava mātreṇa jñānasya sadṛśya ātmanaḥ

original: bhāvyate 'nātmana yena pratikarma vibhajyate iti ata eva ākāragrahaṇam evātiśayam āśritya tamabarthasamarthane sati sādhakatamaṃ jñānam eva pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: bhāvyate yena pratikarma vibhajyate iti atas eva ākāra grahaṇam eva atiśayam āśritya tamap artha samarthane sati sādhakatamam jñānam eva pramāṇam bhaviṣyati

original: aparathā kārakātiśayadarśanābhāve tat tatsādhakatamatvasya durupapādatvāt /
analyzed: aparathā kāraka atiśaya darśana abhāve tat tad sādhakatama tvasya durupapāda tvāt

original: sākārajñānasākṣī ca laukiko 'pi dṛśyate vyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: sa ākāra jñāna sākṣī ca dṛśyate vyavahāraḥ

original: evaṃ ca vaktāro bhavanti laukikāḥ nīlo 'rtho 'yaṃ yato 'tra tadākāraṃ jñānam utpannam iti /
analyzed: evam ca vaktāraḥ bhavanti laukikāḥ nīlaḥ rthaḥ yam yatas tad ākāram jñānam utpannam iti

original: tena pratikarmaniyamānyathānupapatteḥ avaśyaṃ sākāram eva jñānam //
analyzed: tena prati karma niyama anyathā anupapatteḥ avaśyam sa ākāram eva jñānam

original: itthaṃ saty api bāhye arthe jñānasyākārakalpanā /
analyzed: ittham sati api bāhye arthe jñānasya ākāra kalpanā

original: bhaved eveti tatraiva santuṣya sthīyatāṃ varam //
analyzed: bhavet evā iti tatra eva santuṣya sthīyatām varam

original: ye tu bruvante jñānasya svataḥ svacchasvabhāvatvena nīlapītādyavabhāsaḥ paropādhir eva bhavitum arhati sphaṭikasyeva lākṣādināruṇim ādyanuvedhaḥ /
analyzed: ye tu bruvante jñānasya svatas svaccha svabhāva tvena nīla pīta ādi avabhāsaḥ para upādhiḥ eva bhavitum arhati sphaṭikasya iva lākṣā ādinā aruṇim ādi anuvedhaḥ

original: ataḥ pṛthag ananubhūyamāno 'pi bāhyo 'rthaḥ sākārajñānāvabhāsānyathā 'nupapattyā 'numīyate /
analyzed: atas pṛthak an anubhūyamānaḥ pi bāhyaḥ rthaḥ sa ākāra jñāna avabhāsa anyathā nupapattyā numīyate

original: yathoktaṃ bāhyasiddhiḥ syād vyatrekataḥ iti //
analyzed: yathā uktam bāhya siddhiḥ syāt vyatrekataḥ iti

original: tad idam anupapannam anvayānupalabdheḥ /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam anvaya anupalabdheḥ

original: arthe hi sati sākāraṃ nirākāraṃ tadatayaye /
analyzed: arthe hi sati sa ākāram nirākāram

original: nityānumeyabāhyārthavādī jñānaṃ kva dṛṣṭavān //
analyzed: nitya anumeya bāhya artha vādī jñānam kva dṛṣṭavān

original: lākṣāsphaṭikādau tu tathā yuktam tadanuraktasphaṭikaśakalāvalokanāt /
analyzed: lākṣā sphaṭika ādau tu tathā yuktam tad anurakta sphaṭika śakala avalokanāt

original: iha punaḥ arthena rajyamānaṃ hhi nirākāraṃ nisargataḥ /
analyzed: iha punar arthena rajyamānam hi nirākāram nisargataḥ

original: jñānaṃ na khalu paśyāmaḥ lākṣayā sphaṭikaṃ yathā //
analyzed: jñānam na khalu paśyāmaḥ lākṣayā sphaṭikam yathā

original: ākāradvayapratibhāso hi nāstīty uktam /
analyzed: ākāra dvaya pratibhāsaḥ hi na asti iti uktam

original: abhyupagame vā sudusta ravanavasthādūṣaṇam /
analyzed: abhyupagame vā

original: arthākāraś ca pratyakṣaḥ tatkṛtaś ca jñānākāraḥ pratyakṣaḥ ity ucyamāne arthākāras tāvat sākāreṇa jñānena gṛhītaḥ /
analyzed: artha ākāraḥ ca pratyakṣaḥ tad kṛtaḥ ca jñāna ākāraḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti ucyamāne artha ākāraḥ tāvat sa ākāreṇa jñānena gṛhītaḥ

original: sa idānīṃ jñānākāro 'pi grāhyatvāt sākārajñānāntara bhavet /
analyzed: saḥ idānīm grāhya tvāt sa ākāra jñāna antara bhavet

original: tad api sākāraṃ jñānāntaraṃ tathābhūtajñānāntaragrāhyam eva syād ity aniṣṭam //
analyzed: tat api sa ākāram jñāna antaram tathābhūta jñāna antara grāhyam eva syāt iti aniṣṭam

original: atha svaprakāśaṃ tat sākāraṃ jñānam iṣyate tena jñānāntarānapekṣaṇāt nānavastheti na hi svaprakāśasākārajñānavyatiriktārthākārānavabhāsāt tad evāstu /
analyzed: atha sva prakāśam tat sa ākāram jñānam iṣyate tena jñāna antara anapekṣaṇāt na anavasthā iti na hi sva prakāśa sa ākāra jñāna vyatirikta artha ākāra anavabhāsāt tat eva astu

original: kuto dvitīya idānīm arthākāraḥ /
analyzed: kutas dvitīyaḥ idānīm artha ākāraḥ

original: na cānyathānupapattyā 'pi tatkalpanā yuktimatī /
analyzed: na ca anyathā anupapattyā pi tad kalpanā yuktimatī

original: na hi rājaśāsanam idaṃ arthenākāravatā bhavaitavyam iti /
analyzed: na hi rāja śāsanam idam arthena akāravatā iti

original: jñānam eva nīlādyākāraṃ yadi bhavet ko doṣaḥ syād iti /
analyzed: jñānam eva nīla ādi ākāram yadi bhavet kaḥ doṣaḥ syāt iti

original: nīlādyākārayogāt arthasya bhaved iti cet /
analyzed: nīla ādi ākāra yogāt arthasya bhavet iti ced

original: saṃjāñyāṃ vivāda ity uktam /
analyzed: saṃjāñyām vivādaḥ iti uktam

original: dvitīyasyābhāvāt svacchatvāt jñānasya kāluṣyam anyakṛtaṃ yuktam iti cet avidyāvāsanākṛtaṃ tad bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: dvitīyasya abhāvāt svaccha tvāt jñānasya kāluṣyam anya kṛtam yuktam iti ced avidyā vāsanā kṛtam tat bhaviṣyati

original: svataḥ svaccham api jñānam anādyavidyāvāsanāvibhabopanatam anekākārakāluṣyarūṣitavapur iva prakāśate //
analyzed: svatas su accham api jñānam anādya vidyā vāsanā vibhava upanatam aneka ākāra kāluṣya rūṣita vapuḥ iva prakāśate

original: jñānavāsanābhedasantānayoś ca bījāgkuravad anāditvān nātra paryanuyogasyāvasaraḥ kuto vāsanā pravṛttā iti /
analyzed: jñāna vāsanā bheda santānayoḥ ca anādi tvāt na atra paryanuyogasya avasaraḥ kutas vāsanā pravṛttā iti

original: tasmād anādivāsanāvaicitryaracitajñānavaicitryopapatteḥ kṛtam anumeyenāpi bāhyenārtheneti jñānasyaivāyam ākāra iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt anādi vāsanā vaicitrya racita jñāna vaicitrya upapatteḥ kṛtam anumeyena api bāhyena arthena iti jñānasya eva ayam ākāraḥ iti siddham

original: ataś ca jñānasyaivāyam ākāraḥ jñānena vinā hi na kvacid aratharūpam upalabhyate /
analyzed: atas ca jñānasya eva ayam ākāraḥ jñānena vinā hi na kvacid a ratha rūpam upalabhyate

original: jñānaṃ tv artharahitam api gandharvanagaramāyādiṣu vispaṣṭam upalabyate ity anvayavyatirekābhyām api jñānākāratvam avagacchāmaḥ /
analyzed: jñānam tu artha rahitam api gandharvanagara māyā ādiṣu vispaṣṭam upalabyate iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām api jñāna ākāra tvam avagacchāmaḥ

original: yadi ca jñānād arthaḥ pṛthag avasthitātmā bhavet jñānam antareṇāpy asāv upalabhyate na caivam asti /
analyzed: yadi ca jñānāt arthaḥ pṛthak avasthita ātmā bhavet jñānam antareṇa api asau upalabhyate na ca evam asti

original: tasmād abheda eva jñānārthayorḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt abhedaḥ eva jñāna arthayoḥ

original: yad āha sahopalambhāniyamād abhedo nīlataddhiyoḥ iti //
analyzed: yat āha saha upalambha aniyamāt abhedaḥ nīla tad dhiyoḥ iti

original: na ca jñānārthasaṃsargadharma ākāro bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: na ca jñāna artha saṃsarga dharmaḥ ākāraḥ bhavitum arhati

original: yadi hi pṛthag artham anākāraṃ pṛthak ca jñānamānākāraṃ upalabhya saṃsṛṣṭayor jñānayor ākāravattām upalabhemahi tata idam ākāraṃ saṃsargadharmaṃ pratipadyemahi /
analyzed: yadi hi pṛthak artham anākāram pṛthak ca jñānam āna ākāram upalabhya saṃsṛṣṭayoḥ jñānayoḥ ākāravat tām upalabhemahi tatas idam ākāram saṃsarga dharmam pratipadyemahi

original: na tv ayam asti kramaḥ /
analyzed: na tu ayam asti kramaḥ

original: artharahitatve 'pi ca smaraṇasvapnādijñānānām ākāravattvam astīty uktam /
analyzed: artha rahita tve ca smaraṇa svapna ādi jñānānām ākāravat tvam asti iti uktam

original: ataḥ kathaṃ saṃsargadharma ākāraḥ. api ca nakṣatraṃ tārakā tiṣya iti katham ekasminn arthe parasparaviruddhaliṅgasamāveśaḥ //
analyzed: atas katham saṃsarga dharmaḥ ākāraḥ api ca nakṣatram tārakā tiṣyaḥ iti katham ekasmin arthe paraspara viruddha liṅga samāveśaḥ

original: parivrājakakāmukakauleyakānāṃ ca katham eka eva vanitārūpo 'rthaḥ kuṇapa iti kāminīti bhakṣyam iti ca pratibhāsatritayaviṣayatām anubhavet //
analyzed: parivrājaka kāmuka kauleyakānām ca katham ekaḥ eva vanitā rūpaḥ rthaḥ kuṇapaḥ iti kāminī iti bhakṣyam iti ca pratibhāsa tritaya viṣaya tām anubhavet

original: dārā iti katham ekaiva strīvyaktiḥ puṃvacanabahuvacanaviṣayatāṃ yāyāt //
analyzed: dārāḥ iti katham ekā eva strī vyaktiḥ puṃvacana bahuvacana viṣaya tām yāyāt

original: ṣaṇṇagarīti ca kathaṃ bahanāmanyaliṅgānām ekatā strīliṅgatā ca bhavet //
analyzed: ṣaṇṇagarī iti ca katham bahanām anya liṅgānām eka tā strī liṅga tā ca bhavet

original: hrasvadīrghayoś ca kathaṃ parasparāpekṣagrahaṇayor arthanaikatara ākāraḥ pāramārthikaḥ syāt //
analyzed: hrasva dīrghayoḥ ca katham paraspara apekṣa grahaṇayoḥ arthanā ekataraḥ ākāraḥ pāramārthikaḥ syāt

original: jñānānāṃ tu bhinnatvāt vicitravāsanābhedasahakārirūpānuvidhānena jāyamānānāṃ na kiṃcid api virodhaḥ //
analyzed: jñānānām tu bhinna tvāt vicitra vāsanā bheda sahakāri rūpa anuvidhānena jāyamānānām na kiṃcid api virodhaḥ

original: tasmāt jñānam evedaṃ sarvatra tathā tathā pratibhāti na tadvyatirikto 'rtho nāma kiṃcid iti jñāna eva caikatrāyaṃ pramāṇaprameyapramitivyavahāraḥ parisamāpyate /
analyzed: tasmāt jñānam eva idam sarvatra tathā tathā pratibhāti na tad vyatiriktaḥ rthaḥ nāma kiṃcid iti jñāne eva ca ekatra ayam pramāṇa prameya pramiti vyavahāraḥ parisamāpyate

original: tasya hi viṣayākāratā prameyam grāhakākāratā prāmāṇam svasaṃvittiś ca phalam iti /
analyzed: tasya hi viṣaya ākāra tā prameyam grāhaka ākāra tā prāmāṇam sva saṃvittiḥ ca phalam iti

original: yathoktam yadabhāsaṃ prameyaṃ tat pramāṇaphalate punaḥ /
analyzed: yathā uktam yat abhāsam prameyam tat pramāṇa phalate punar

original: grāhakākārasaṃvittyoḥ trayaṃ nātaḥ pṛthakkṛtam iti //
analyzed: grāhaka ākāra saṃvittyoḥ trayam na atas pṛthakkṛtam iti

original: tad idaṃ anādyavidyāvāsanāvilāsaviparyāsitatattvadarśanatayā jñānam eva grāhyagrāhakaśvittibhedavad iva lakṣyate /
analyzed: tat idam anādya vidyā vāsanā vilāsa viparyāsita tattva darśana tayā jñānam eva grāhya grāhaka śvitti bheda vat iva lakṣyate

original: avidyāviratau tu svaccham eva tatsaṃpadyate na kiṃcid veti //
analyzed: avidyā viratau tu su accham eva tat saṃpadyate na kiṃcid vā iti

original: tad uktam nānyo 'nubhāvyo buddhyā 'sti tasyā nānubhavo 'paraḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam na anyaḥ nubhāvyaḥ buddhyā sti tasyāḥ paraḥ

original: %PViniś1.38 Manor: svarūpād anyaḥ grāhyagrāhakavaidhuryāt svayaṃ saiva prakāśate //
analyzed: manoḥ svarūpāt anyaḥ grāhya grāhaka vaidhuryāt svayam sā eva prakāśate

original: %Tib reads saivaṃ: bettertathā avibhāgo 'pi buddhyātmā viparyāsitadarśanaiḥ /%PraVā 3.354 grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittibhedavān iva lakṣyate //
analyzed: reads tad evam buddhi ātmā viparyāsita darśanaiḥ grāhya grāhaka saṃvitti bhedavān iva lakṣyate

original: ity artharūparahitaṃ saṃvinmātraṃ kiledam iti paśyan /
analyzed: iti artha rūpa rahitam saṃvid mātram kila idam iti paśyan

original: parihṛtya duḥkhasantati abhayaṃ nirvāṇam āpnoti //
analyzed: parihṛtya duḥkha santati abhayam nirvāṇam āpnoti

original: atrābhidhīyate na khalv eka bodhātmā grāhyagrāhakatayo bhayasvabhāvo bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: atrā abhidhīyate na khalu bodha ātmā grāhya grāhaka tayaḥ bhaya svabhāvaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: grāhyagrāhakarūpayor itaretaravisadṛśatvena ekatra samāveśānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: grāhya grāhaka rūpayoḥ itaretara visadṛśa tvena ekatra samāveśa anupapatteḥ

original: tathā hi nīlajñānam pītajñānam śuklajñānam iti nīlapītādyupajananāpāye 'py anuvartamānabodharūpatayā nīlādivilakṣaṇam anvayavyatirekābhyām avadhāryate //
analyzed: tathā hi nīla jñānam pīta jñānam śukla jñānam iti nīla pīta ādi upajanana apāye pi anuvartamāna bodha rūpatayā nīla ādi vilakṣaṇam anvaya vyatirekābhyām avadhāryate

original: api ca jñānam ahaṃkārāspadam ānandādisvabhāvaṃ svakarmaṇi ca savyāpāram iva bhavadbhir abhyupagatam /
analyzed: api ca jñānam ahaṃkāra āspadam ānanda ādi svabhāvam sva karmaṇi ca sa vyāpāram iva bhavadbhiḥ abhyupagatam

original: arthas tu naivamātmaka iti katham anayor abhedaḥ //
analyzed: arthaḥ tu na evamātmakaḥ iti katham anayoḥ abhedaḥ

original: yady api jñānam idam ayam artha ity evamākāradvayapratibhāso nāsti tathāpy ayam eko 'py ākāraḥ pratibhāsamānaḥ prakāśya eva pratibhāti na prakāśakaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api jñānam idam ayam arthaḥ iti evam ākāra dvaya pratibhāsaḥ na asti tathā api ayam ekaḥ pi ākāraḥ pratibhāsamānaḥ prakāśyaḥ eva pratibhāti na prakāśakaḥ

original: idaṃ nīlam iti grāhakād vicchinna eva grāhyākāro 'vabhāsate na tv ahaṃ nīlam iti tadaikyenāvabhāso 'sti iti //
analyzed: idam nīlam iti grāhakāt vicchinnaḥ eva grāhya ākāraḥ vabhāsate na tu aham nīlam iti tad aikyena avabhāsaḥ sti iti

original: api ca prakāśyasya nīlādeḥ prakāśakabodhādhīnaṃ yuktaṃ nāma grahaṇam /
analyzed: api ca prakāśyasya nīla ādeḥ prakāśaka bodha adhīnam yuktam nāma grahaṇam

original: bodhasya tu tadgrāhakasya tadā kiṃkṛtaṃ grahaṇam iti cintyam /
analyzed: bodhasya tu tad grāhakasya tadā kiṃkṛtam grahaṇam iti cintyam

original: na bodhāntaranibandhanam anavasthāprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na bodha antara nibandhanam anavasthā prasaṅgāt

original: nāpi svaprakāśaṃ jñānam ahaṃ nīlam ity apratibhāsāt //
analyzed: nā api sva prakāśam jñānam aham nīlam iti apratibhāsāt

original: nanu naiva grāhyagrāhakayor anyatvam iti /
analyzed: nanu nā eva grāhya grāhakayoḥ anya tvam iti

original: yo 'yaṃ grāhyāvabhāsa iti bhavatā 'bhyupagataḥ sa eva grāhakāvabhāsaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ yam grāhya avabhāsaḥ iti bhavatā abhyupagataḥ saḥ eva grāhaka avabhāsaḥ

original: grāhakād anyo hi grāhyaḥ jaḍātmā bhavet /
analyzed: grāhakāt anyaḥ hi grāhyaḥ jaḍa ātmā bhavet

original: grāhakas tu prakāśasvabhāvaḥ grāhakatvād eva /
analyzed: grāhakaḥ tu prakāśa svabhāvaḥ grāhaka tvāt eva

original: dvayapratibhāsaś ca nāstīty uktam /
analyzed: dvaya pratibhāsaḥ ca na asti iti uktam

original: tatrānyatarasya pratibhāsane jaḍaprakāśayoḥ katarasyāvabhāsituṃ yuktam iti cintāyāṃ balāt prakāśa eva prakāśate na jaḍaḥ /
analyzed: tatra anyatarasya pratibhāsane jaḍa prakāśayoḥ katarasya avabhāsitum yuktam iti cintāyām balāt prakāśaḥ eva prakāśate na jaḍaḥ

original: nirākāraś ca na prakāśaḥ prakāśata iti tasmin sākāre prakāśyamāne kuto jaḍātmā tadatirikto 'rthaḥ syāt //
analyzed: nirākāraḥ ca na prakāśaḥ prakāśate iti tasmin sa ākāre prakāśyamāne kutas jaḍa ātmā tad atiriktaḥ rthaḥ syāt

original: tad idam apeśalam upāyenopeyanihnavasyāśakyakaraṇīyatvāt /
analyzed: tat idam apeśalam upāyena upeya nihnavasya a śakya karaṇīya tvāt

original: rūpasya hi prakāśakaṃ cakṣuḥ /
analyzed: rūpasya hi prakāśakam cakṣuḥ

original: na cakṣur eva prakāśatām ity uktvā rūpam apahnotuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ eva prakāśatām iti uktvā rūpam apahnotum śakyate

original: tad idam arthasya mūrtidravatvakāṭinyādidharmaviśeṣitātmanaḥ tadviparītaśvacchasvabhāvaṃ jñānaṃ prakāśakam na tad eva cakṣurvat tadā 'vabhāsitum arhati ca //
analyzed: tat idam arthasya mūrti drava tva kāṭinī ādi dharma viśeṣita ātmanaḥ tad viparīta śvaccha svabhāvam jñānam prakāśakam na tat eva cakṣuḥ vat tadā vabhāsitum arhati ca

original: nanu cakṣurvat upāyatvaṃ jñānasya prakāśasvabhāvatvāt /
analyzed: nanu cakṣuḥ vat upāya tvam jñānasya prakāśa svabhāva tvāt

original: cakṣurjanyo hi prakāśo nāma jñānam ucyate na cāgṛhītaḥ prakāśaḥ prakāśyaṃ prakāśayatīti satyam vakṣurjanyaḥ prakāśaḥ jñānam iṣyate /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ janyaḥ hi prakāśaḥ nāma jñānam ucyate na ca agṛhītaḥ prakāśaḥ prakāśyam prakāśayati iti satyam vakṣuḥ janyaḥ prakāśaḥ jñānam iṣyate

original: sa tu prakāśaḥ rūpādiviṣayaprakāśaḥ na prakāśaprakāśaḥ /
analyzed: sa tu prakāśaḥ rūpa ādi viṣaya prakāśaḥ na prakāśa prakāśaḥ

original: na hi cakṣuṣā prakāśaḥ prakāśyate api tu rūpaṃ prakāśyate /
analyzed: na hi cakṣuṣā prakāśaḥ prakāśyate api tu rūpam prakāśyate

original: tatra yadrūpam ucyate sa viṣayo grāhyaḥ yat tat prakśate ity ucyate sa prakāśaḥ jñānaṃ grāhakam /
analyzed: tatra yat rūpam ucyate sa viṣayaḥ grāhyaḥ yat tat iti ucyate sa prakāśaḥ jñānam grāhakam

original: tatutpattimātreṇa ca rūpaṃ prakāśitaṃ bhavatīti na prakāśo grahaṇam apekṣate //
analyzed: tad utpatti mātreṇa ca rūpam prakāśitam bhavati iti na prakāśaḥ grahaṇam apekṣate

original: nanu uktam atra nānupalabdhāyāṃ buddhāv arthaḥ prakāśate apratyakṣoplalabhasya nārthadṛṣṭiḥ prasiddhyati iti tad ayuktam apratyakṣopalambhasya ca praty uta arthadṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati /
analyzed: nanu uktam atra na anupalabdhāyām buddhau arthaḥ prakāśate na artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasiddhyati iti tat ayuktam apratyakṣa upalambhasya ca prati uta artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati

original: upalambhotpāda eva arthadṛṣṭiḥ na punar upalambhadṛṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: upalambha utpādaḥ eva artha dṛṣṭiḥ na punar upalambha dṛṣṭiḥ

original: nanu upalabdher agrahaṇe tadutpādanutpādayoḥ aviśeṣāt anutpannopalambhasyāpy arthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ syād iti sarvasarvajñatvaprasaṅgaḥ tad idam atisubhāṣitam arthaprakāśātmaiva khalupalambhaḥ /
analyzed: nanu upalabdheḥ agrahaṇe tad utpāda anutpādayoḥ aviśeṣāt anutpanna upalambhasya api arthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ syāt iti sarva sarvajña tva prasaṅgaḥ tat idam ati su bhāṣitam artha prakāśa ātmā eva khalu upalambhaḥ

original: sa katham utpannād anutpanno na viśiṣyate /
analyzed: sa katham utpannāt anutpannaḥ na viśiṣyate

original: tasmāt arthapratyakṣīkaraṇātmakatvāt jñānasya tadutpāda evārthapratyakṣatā na tadgrahaṇam iti agṛhītam eva jñānam arthaprakāśakam iti yuktamaṃ //
analyzed: tasmāt artha pratyakṣīkaraṇa ātmaka tvāt jñānasya tad utpādaḥ eva artha pratyakṣa tā na tad grahaṇam iti agṛhītam eva jñānam artha prakāśakam iti yuktamam

original: yat tu upāyatvāt jñānasya pūrvaṃ grahaṇam ucyate tat cakṣurādibhir anaikāntikam ity uktam //
analyzed: yat tu upāya tvāt jñānasya pūrvam grahaṇam ucyate tat cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ anaikāntikam iti uktam

original: gṛhītaṃ yadi ca jñānaṃ bhaved arthaprakāśakam /
analyzed: gṛhītam yadi ca jñānam bhavet artha prakāśakam

original: dhūmavad dīpavad veti vaktavyaṃ yadi dhūmavat //
analyzed: dhūmavat dīpavat vā iti vaktavyam yadi dhūmavat

original: bhaved arthānumeyatvaṃ tat tvayaiva ca dūṣitam /
analyzed: bhavet artha anumeya tvam tat tvayā eva ca dūṣitam

original: ākāradvayasaṃvittivirahān na ca dīpavat //
analyzed: ākāra dvaya saṃvitti virahāt na ca dīpa vat

original: ghaṭaṃ dīpena paśyāmīty asti dvitayavedanam /
analyzed: ghaṭam dīpena paśyāmi iti asti dvitaya vedanam

original: na tu jñānena vijñeyaṃ jñānāmīti dvayagrahaḥ //
analyzed: na tu jñānena vijñeyam jñānāmi iti dvaya grahaḥ

original: yad api prakāśatvāt jñānasya pradīpavat pūrvaṃ grahaṇam uktam tad api vyākhyeyam prakāśatvād iti ko 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: yat api prakāśa tvāt jñānasya pradīpa vat pūrvam grahaṇam uktam tat api vyākhyeyam prakāśa tvāt iti kaḥ rthaḥ

original: prakāśayatīti prakāśaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ prakāśatvam iti tat cakṣurādibhir anikāntikam uktam eva //
analyzed: prakāśayati iti prakāśaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ prakāśa tvam iti tat cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ anikāntikam uktam eva

original: atha prakāśanaṃ prakāśaḥ tarhi prakāśatvāt iti asiddho hetuḥ /
analyzed: atha prakāśanam prakāśaḥ tarhi prakāśa tvāt iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ

original: na hy artha grahaṇakāle buddheḥ prakāśanam asti //
analyzed: na hi artha grahaṇa kāle buddheḥ prakāśanam asti

original: atha prakāśaśabdo bodhaparyāya eva /
analyzed: atha prakāśa śabdaḥ bodha paryāyaḥ eva

original: prakāśatvāt bodharūpatvād ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: prakāśa tvāt bodha rūpa tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: tadā sādhanavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ pradīpasya bodharūparvābhāvāt /
analyzed: tadā sādhana vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ pradīpasya bodha rūpa rva abhāvāt

original: ataś ca svasaṃvedanapakṣo na yuktiyuktaḥ svataḥ prakāśasya kasyacid apy adṛṣṭatvāt //
analyzed: atas ca sva saṃvedana pakṣaḥ na yukti yuktaḥ svatas prakāśasya kasyacid api adṛṣṭa tvāt

original: nanu jñānaśabdadīpāḥ yatraḥ svaparaprakāśā ity āhuḥ tad ayuktam śabdadīpayoḥ svagrahaṇe 'rthaprakāśane ca sāmagryantarasavyapekṣatvāt /
analyzed: nanu jñāna śabda dīpāḥ sva para prakāśāḥ iti āhuḥ tat ayuktam śabda dīpayoḥ sva grahaṇe rtha prakāśane ca sāmagrī antara savyapekṣa tvāt

original: śabdaḥ arthaprakāśane samayagrahaṇam apekṣate svaprakāśane tu śrotram /
analyzed: śabdaḥ artha prakāśane samaya grahaṇam apekṣate sva prakāśane tu śrotram

original: dīpo 'pi cakṣurādyapekṣa eva gṛhyate grāhayati cārtham //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ādi apekṣaḥ eva gṛhyate grāhayati ca artham

original: iyāṃs tu viśeṣaḥ ghaṭādigrahaṇe ālokasāpekṣaṃ cakṣuḥ pravartate /
analyzed: iyān tu viśeṣaḥ ghaṭa ādi grahaṇe āloka sāpekṣam cakṣuḥ pravartate

original: ālokagrahaṇe tu nirapekṣam iti /
analyzed: āloka grahaṇe tu nirapekṣam iti

original: naitāvatā dīpasya svaprakāśatā syāt /
analyzed: na etāvatā dīpasya sva prakāśa tā syāt

original: itthaṃ ca mārjārādiniktaṃcaracakṣurapekṣayā sarva eva ghaṭādayaḥ svaprakāśāḥ syuḥ //
analyzed: ittham ca mārjāra ādi niktaṃcara cakṣuḥ apekṣayā sarve eva ghaṭa ādayaḥ sva prakāśāḥ syuḥ

original: jñānasya paraprakāśakatvam eva dṛśyate na svaprakāśatvam arthaprakāśakāle tadaprakāśasya darśitatvāt //
analyzed: jñānasya para prakāśaka tvam eva dṛśyate na sva prakāśa tvam artha prakāśa kāle tad aprakāśasya darśita tvāt

original: mudhaiva nasmādbhaṇitasta ete trayaḥ prakāśāḥ svaparaprakāśāḥ /
analyzed: mudhā eva nasmāt bhaṇitaḥ te ete trayaḥ prakāśāḥ sva para prakāśāḥ

original: pradīpabodhadhvaninām adheyāḥ vibhinnasāmagryabhivedyavedakāḥ //
analyzed: pradīpa bodha dhvaninām adheyāḥ vibhinna sāmagrī abhivedya vedakāḥ

original: ātmapratyakṣavādināṃ tu avasthābhedena grāhyagrāhakāṃśayor bhedo vidyata eveti sarvathā na svaprakāśaṃ jñānam //
analyzed: ātma pratyakṣa vādinām tu avasthā bhedena grāhya grāhaka aṃśayoḥ bhedaḥ vidyate eva iti sarvathā na sva prakāśam jñānam

original: yad apy abhihitaṃ utpadyamānam eva jñānaṃ anapekṣatvāt apraribandhatvāc ca tadaiva gṛhyate na vā kadācid iti tad apy asāṃpratam tadānīṃ tadgrahaṇasāmagryabhāvāt //
analyzed: yat api abhihitam utpadyamānam eva jñānam anapekṣa tvāt a praribandha tvāt ca tadā eva gṛhyate na vā kadācid iti tat api asāṃpratam tadānīm tad grahaṇa sāmagrī abhāvāt

original: na cāvibandhamātreṇa pratītir avakalpate /
analyzed: na ca a vibandha mātreṇa pratītiḥ avakalpate

original: upāyaviraheṇāpi tadā jñānasya na grahaḥ //
analyzed: upāya viraheṇa api tadā jñānasya na grahaḥ

original: na ca jaiminiyā iva vayaṃ jñānaṃ nityaparokṣam ācakṣmahe /
analyzed: na ca iva vayam jñānam nitya parokṣam ācakṣmahe

original: jñāto mayā 'yam arthaḥ iti kālāntare tadviśiṣṭārthagrahaṇadarśanāt //
analyzed: jñātaḥ mayā yam arthaḥ iti kāla antare tad viśiṣṭa artha grahaṇa darśanāt

original: śuklaḥ paṭa iti jñāne yathā 'sau bhāti tadguṇaḥ /
analyzed: śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti jñāne yathā sau bhāti tad guṇaḥ

original: tathā jñāto 'rtha ity atra bhāty artho dhīviśeṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: tathā jñātaḥ rthaḥ iti atra bhāti arthaḥ dhī viśeṣaṇaḥ

original: na viśeṣye ca saṃvittiḥ agṛhītaviśeṣaṇā /
analyzed: na viśeṣye ca saṃvittiḥ agṛhīta viśeṣaṇā

original: nānusāyadhiyaṃ vetthaṃ pratīyata kramāgrahāt //
analyzed: na anusāya dhiyam vā ittham pratīyata krama agrahāt

original: na ca  nityaparokṣā buddhiḥ anumātum api na śakyata iti ca vicāritam eva //
analyzed: na ca nitya parokṣā buddhiḥ anumātum api na śakyate iti ca vicāritam eva

original: tad alam anayā kathayā /
analyzed: tat alam anayā kathayā

original: kim iti śakyasutsṛjya śrītriyam idānīm anuyujmahe //
analyzed: kim iti śrītriyam idānīm anuyujmahe

original: ataś ca yad uktaṃ jñānapṛṣṭāvamarśadarśanāt jñānagrahaṇapūrvakam arthagrahaṇam iti tan na sārvatrikam api tu kvacid eva jñānaviśiṣṭārthasaṃvedanāt tathā 'bhyupagamyate /
analyzed: atas ca yat uktam jñāna pṛṣṭa avamarśa darśanāt jñāna grahaṇa pūrvakam artha grahaṇam iti tat na sārvatrikam api tu kvacid eva jñāna viśiṣṭa artha saṃvedanāt tathā bhyupagamyate

original: tasmāt arthagrahaṇāt pūrvaṃ jñānasyānavabhāsāt nirākāravasāyavirahāc ca jñānasyaivāyam ākāra iti kadāśāpralapitam etad aruṇāmbarāṇām //
analyzed: tasmāt artha grahaṇāt pūrvam jñānasya anavabhāsāt nirākāra vasāya virahāt ca jñānasya eva ayam ākāraḥ iti ka āśā pralapitam etat aruṇa ambarāṇām

original: yat punar abhyadhāyi jñānākārapakṣe kalpanā 'lpīyasīti tatra yathoktanītyā pratyakṣagamye bāhye grāhye 'rthākare kalpanoktiḥ kīdṛśī /
analyzed: yat punar abhyadhāyi jñāna ākāra pakṣe kalpanā lpīyasī iti tatra yathā ukta nītyā pratyakṣa gamye bāhye grāhye rtha ākare kalpanā uktiḥ kīdṛśī

original: kīdṛśaṃ vā tadalpatvam mahattvaṃ veti //
analyzed: kīdṛśam vā tat alpatvam mahattvam vā iti

original: ubhayasiddhatvam pai yad avādi jñānasya tatra yadi pramāṇāyattā vastusthitiḥ artho 'py ubhayasiddha eva /
analyzed: ubhaya siddha tvam pai yat avādi jñānasya tatra yadi pramāṇa āyattā vastu sthitiḥ

original: icchādveṣanibandhanāyāṃ tu vastusthitau jñānam api katham ubhayasiddhaṃ syād iti yat kiṃcid etat //
analyzed: icchā dveṣa nibandhanāyām tu vastu sthitau jñānam api katham ubhaya siddham syāt iti yat kiṃcid etat

original: yat punar idam abhihitaṃ abhyupagamyāpi bāhyam arthaṃ apratyākhyeyaḥ pratikarmavyavasthāsiddhaye jñānasyākārayoga iti tad api na sāṃpratam pratikarmavyavasthāyāḥ prakārāntareṇāpy upapatteḥ /
analyzed: yat punar idam abhihitam abhyupagamya api bāhyam artham a pratyākhyeyaḥ prati karma vyavasthā siddhaye jñānasya ākāra yogaḥ iti tat api na sāṃpratam prati karma vyavasthāyāḥ prakāra antareṇa api upapatteḥ

original: yady api anekasannidhāne nīlajñānam upajāyate /
analyzed: yadi api aneka sannidhāne nīla jñānam upajāyate

original: yady api ca bodhasvarūpatvam aśeṣasādhāraṇam tathāpi nīlenaiva karmakārakeṇa tad upajanitam iti nīlaniṣṭam evāvatiṣṭate /
analyzed: yadi api ca bodha sva rūpa tvam aśeṣa sādhāraṇam tathā api nīlena eva karma kārakeṇa tat upajanitam iti nīla niṣṭam eva avatiṣṭate

original: cakṣurādinā 'pi tajjanitam iti cet satyaṃ janitam na tu karmaṇā satā /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ādinā tat janitam iti ced satyam janitam na tu karmaṇā satā

original: nīlena tu karmabhūtena tad utpadyata iti tad ekaviṣayam eva bhavati /
analyzed: nīlena tu karma bhūtena tat utpadyate iti tat eka viṣayam eva bhavati

original: kuta eṣa niyama iti cet vastusvabhāvakṛta eva /
analyzed: kutas eṣa niyamaḥ iti ced vastu svabhāva kṛtaḥ eva

original: ākārapakṣe 'pi samāno 'yaṃ paryanuyogaḥ //
analyzed: ākāra pakṣe samānaḥ yam paryanuyogaḥ

original: yad ucyate kim iti nīlam eva karmakārakam kim iti vā karmaviṣayam eva jñānam iti tatra vastusvabhāvair uttaraṃ vācyam //
analyzed: yat ucyate kim iti nīlam eva karma kārakam kim iti vā karma viṣayam eva jñānam iti tatra vastu svabhāvaiḥ uttaram vācyam

original: ākāram api ca jñānam upādānaṃ karmakārakasyaiva katham upādadīta na kārakāntarasya ity atrāpi vastusvabhāva eva śaraṇam iti //
analyzed: ākāram api ca jñānam upādānam karma kārakasya eva katham upādadīta na kāraka antarasya iti atra api vastu svabhāvaḥ eva śaraṇam iti

original: arthasya ca jñānajanakatvaṃ anvayavyatirekābhyām avagamyate //
analyzed: arthasya ca jñāna janaka tvam anvaya vyatirekābhyām avagamyate

original: yadā hi devadattārthī kaścid vrajati tadgṛham /
analyzed: yadā hi devadatta arthī kaścid vrajati tad gṛham

original: tatrāsannihitaṃ cainaṃ gatvā 'pi na sa paśyati //
analyzed: tatra asannihitam ca enam gatvā na sa paśyati

original: kṣaṇāntare sa āyāntaṃ devadattaṃ nirīkṣate /
analyzed: kṣaṇa antare saḥ āyāntam devadattam nirīkṣate

original: tatra tatsadasattvena tathātvaṃ veti taddhiyaḥ //
analyzed: tatra tad sat asat tvena tathātvam vā iti tad dhiyaḥ

original: anāgate devadatte na devatattajñānam udapādi tasminn āgate ca tad utpannam iti tadbhāvabhāvitvāt tajjanyaṃ tad avasiyate /
analyzed: anāgate devadatte na deva tatta jñānam udapādi tasmin āgate ca tat utpannam iti tad bhāva bhāvi tvāt tat janyam tat avasiyate

original: itthaṃ ca tajjanyatvenaiva tatra niyamasiddheḥ alam ākārakalpanayā //
analyzed: ittham ca tad janya tvena eva tatra niyama siddheḥ alam ākāra kalpanayā

original: etena puruṣapravṛttir api niyataviṣayā vyākhyātā /
analyzed: etena puruṣa pravṛttiḥ api niyata viṣayā vyākhyātā

original: sādhakatamatvaṃ tu sāmagryāḥ pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇe nirṇītam eva //
analyzed: sādhakatama tvam tu sāmagryāḥ pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇe nirṇītam eva

original: yas tu lokiko vyapadeśa udāhṛtaḥ so 'pi vyabhicarati /
analyzed: yaḥ tu lokikaḥ vyapadeśaḥ udāhṛtaḥ saḥ u vyabhicarati

original: nīlo 'rtho 'yam yatas tadviṣayaṃ jñānam utpannam ity api na vyapadiśanti laukikāḥ tasād arhte saty api sākāraṃ jñānam eṣitavyam iti yad uktaṃ tad anupapannam //
analyzed: nīlaḥ rthaḥ yam yatas tad viṣayam jñānam utpannam iti api na vyapadiśanti laukikāḥ arhte sati api sa ākāram jñānam eṣitavyam iti yat uktam tat anupapannam

original: yad apy avarṇi sahopalambhaniyamād abhedo nīlataddhiyoḥ iti tad api bālabhāṣitam iva naḥ pratibhāti abhede sahārthānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: yat api saha upalambha niyamāt abhedaḥ nīla tad dhiyoḥ iti tat api bāla bhāṣitam iva naḥ pratibhāti abhede saha artha anupapatteḥ

original: atha ekopalaṃbhaniyamāt iti hetvartho vivakṣitaḥ tad ayam asiddho hetuḥ nīlādigrāhyagrahaṇasamaye tadgrāhakānupalambhāt /
analyzed: atha eka upalaṃbha niyamāt iti hetvarthaḥ vivakṣitaḥ tat ayam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ nīla ādi grāhya grahaṇa samaye tad grāhaka anupalambhāt

original: grāhakākārānuvedharahitatadvicchinnabāhyagrāhyamātrapratibhāsa evāyaṃ nīlam idam ityādiḥ darśitaḥ //
analyzed: grāhaka ākāra anuvedha rahita tad vicchinna bāhya grāhya mātra pratibhāsaḥ eva ayam nīlam idam ityādiḥ darśitaḥ

original: kvacic ca grāhyākārānupaśliṣṭakevalagrāhakāvamarśanam api dṛśyate na smarāmi mayā ko 'pi gṛhīto 'rthas tadā iti /
analyzed: kvacid ca grāhya ākāra an upaśliṣṭa kevala grāhaka avamarśanam api dṛśyate na smarāmi mayā kaḥ pi gṛhītaḥ rthaḥ tadā iti

original: tad evam itaretaravibhaktajñānārthākārasaṃvedanāt katham //
analyzed: tat evam itaretara vibhakta jñāna artha ākāra saṃvedanāt katham

original: ekopalambhaniyamād abhedo nilātaddhiyoḥ ity ucyate /
analyzed: eka upalambha niyamāt abhedaḥ iti ucyate

original: nīlataddhiyoḥ iti vadatā bhavatā 'ṣyeṣa bheda eva nirdiśyate //
analyzed: nīla tad dhiyoḥ iti vadatā bhavatā ṣi eṣa bhedaḥ eva nirdiśyate

original: paramatānuvādamātram etad iti cet na abhede pṛthaṅnirdeśasyāpy aghaṭamānatvāt /
tsmād api na jñānasyāyam ākāraḥ //
analyzed: tsmāt api na jñānasya ayam ākāraḥ

original: yad apy uktaṃ asaty api bāhye 'rthe svapnagandharvanagaramāyādiṣu jñānasyākāravattā dṛśyata iti tasyaivāyam ākāro yukta iti tad api durāśāmātram sarvatra jñānād vicchinnasvagrāhyākārasya pratibhāsanāt //
analyzed: yat api uktam asati api bāhye rthe svapna gandharvanagara māyā ādiṣu jñānasya ākāravat tā dṛśyate iti tasya eva ayam ākāraḥ yuktaḥ iti tat api durāśā mātram sarvatra jñānāt vicchinna sva grāhya ākārasya pratibhāsanāt

original: tathā hi bhramajñāneṣu catuṣṭayo gatiḥ ātmakhyātiḥ asatkhyātiḥ akhyātiḥ viparītakhyātir vā //
analyzed: tathā hi bhrama jñāneṣu catuṣṭayaḥ gatiḥ ātma khyātiḥ asat khyātiḥ akhyātiḥ viparīta khyātiḥ vā

original: tatra rajatam idam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyenaikārthapratibhāsāt tanmate ca saṃcitter aparokṣatvāt rajatādhigamābhimānena tadarthinas tatra pravṛtteḥ bādhakapratyayasya tathāvidhabodhaniṣedhaparatvena prādurbhāvāt na tāvad akhyātir iti prāg eva prādādhitam etat //
analyzed: tatra rajatam idam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena eka artha pratibhāsāt tad mate ca saṃcitteḥ aparokṣa tvāt rajata adhigama abhimānena tad arthinaḥ tatra pravṛtteḥ bādhaka pratyayasya tathāvidha bodha niṣedha paratvena prādurbhāvāt na tāvat akhyātiḥ iti prāk eva etat

original: asatkhyātir api nāsti ekāntāsataḥ svapuṣpādeḥ pratibhāsāyogāt /
analyzed: asat khyātiḥ api na asti ekānta asataḥ sva puṣpa ādeḥ pratibhāsa ayogāt

original: deśakālavyavahitānubhūtapūrvapadārthaviṣaya eva bhrānto 'pi pratyayaḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ bhavati na tv atyantāsadarthaviṣayaḥ //
analyzed: deśa kāla vyavahita anubhūta pūrva padārtha viṣayaḥ eva pratyayaḥ prāṇabhṛtām bhavati na tu atyanta asat artha viṣayaḥ

original: tathā hi dvividhā bhrāntiḥ bāhyendriyajā mānasī ca /
analyzed: tathā hi dvividhā bhrāntiḥ bāhya indriya jā mānasī ca

original: tatra bāhyendiryaje bhramajñāne viṣayadoṣāt indriyadoṣād vā samutpadyamāne na kvacit nirālambanatā dṛśyate /
analyzed: tatra bāhya indirya je bhrama jñāne viṣaya doṣāt indriya doṣāt vā samutpadyamāne na kvacid nirālambana tā dṛśyate

original: bhāsvararūpasādṛśyena hi viṣayadoṣeṇa śuktikā rajatam iti parisphurati /
analyzed: bhāsvara rūpa sādṛśyena hi viṣaya doṣeṇa śuktikā rajatam iti parisphurati

original: marusthalīpatitotphalitaṃ ca sāvitraṃ tejaḥ taralataraṅgasārūpyeṇa paya iti cakāsti /
analyzed: maru sthalī patita utphalitam ca sāvitram tejaḥ tarala taraṅga sārūpyeṇa payaḥ iti cakāsti

original: indriyadoṣād api pittopahatarasanasya tiktatayā śarkarā 'vabhāsate /
analyzed: indriya doṣāt api pitta upahata rasanasya tikta tayā śarkarā vabhāsate

original: timirasīmantitanayanavṛtteḥ candramaṇḍalam ekam api dvidhā pratibhāti /
analyzed: timira sīmantita nayana vṛtteḥ candra maṇḍalam ekam api dvidhā pratibhāti

original: timirakaṇanikaravivaraviracita prasṛtāś ca nayanaraśmaya eva sūryāśusaṃvilitāḥ santaḥ sūkṣmatayā keśakūrcakākārāḥ pratibhāntīti //
analyzed: timira kaṇa nikara vivara viracita prasṛtāḥ ca nayana raśmayaḥ eva sūrya āśu saṃvilitāḥ santaḥ sūkṣma tayā keśa kūrcaka ākārāḥ pratibhānti iti

original: antaḥkaraṇadoseṇa vibhramo yas tu jāyate /
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇa doseṇa vibhramaḥ yaḥ tu jāyate

original: asaty api mahelādau puṣpeṣamuṣitātmanām //
analyzed: asati api mahā ilā ādau puṣpa iṣa muṣita ātmanām

original: so 'pi kaścit viṣayadoṣasahāyo bhavati /
analyzed: saḥ pi kaścid viṣaya doṣa sahāyaḥ bhavati

original: sa cālambana eva //
analyzed: sa ca ālambanaḥ eva

original: tasyāḥ pāṇir iti jñānaṃ yathā bhavati kutracit /
analyzed: tasyāḥ pāṇiḥ iti jñānam yathā bhavati kutracid

original: ko 'malānilakallolavellite bālapallve //
analyzed: kaḥ mala anila kallola vellite bāla pallve

original: anapekṣitatatulyapadārthasyaiva yā punaḥ /
analyzed: an apekṣita ta tulya padārthasya eva yā punar

original: manasī manmathonmādamahimnā māninīmatiḥ //
tasyām api rāgādivāsanābalopaplavamānasmṛtyupasthāpitadeśakālavyavahitopalabdhapurandhrīrūpādisamullekhaḥ na tv ekāntāsataḥ kharaviṣāṇāder iva //
analyzed: tasyām api rāga ādi vāsanā bala upaplavamāna smṛti upasthāpita deśa kāla vyavahita upalabdha purandhrī rūpa ādi samullekhaḥ na tu ekānta asataḥ khara viṣāṇa ādeḥ iva

original: pratibhānidrādimanodosajanmani svapne 'pi dṛṣṭapūrvasyaiva tasyākārasyollekhaḥ //
analyzed: pratibhā nidrā ādi manaḥ dosa janmani svapne dṛṣṭa pūrvasya eva tasya ākārasya ullekhaḥ

original: jālajvalāga?dvahnidravadravyādidarśane /
analyzed: jāla jvala agat vahni drava dravya ādi darśane

original: rūpam anyastham anyatra veti na tv asad eva tat //
analyzed: rūpam anya stham anyatra vā iti na tu asat eva tat

original: tad evaṃ bhrāntibodheṣu nāstyatyantāsatāṃ prathā /
analyzed: tat evam bhrānti bodheṣu nā asti atyanta asatām prathā

original: deśakālānyathātvaṃ tu kevalaṃ bhāti vastunaḥ //
analyzed: deśa kāla anyathātvam tu kevalam bhāti vastunaḥ

original: nanu tatrāsato 'rthasya pratibhāse deśāntarādiṣu sattvaṃ kvopayujyate /
analyzed: nanu tatra asataḥ rthasya pratibhāse deśa antara ādiṣu sattvam kva upayujyate

original: deśāntare hi san asan vā tatra tāvan nāsty eva so 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: deśa antare hi san asan vā tatra tāvat na asti eva saḥ ṛthaḥ

original: na ca dvayor asattvayoḥ kiṃcid viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: na ca dvayoḥ asattvayoḥ kiṃcid viśeṣaḥ

original: deśakālāv api kiṃ santāvasantau vā pratibhāsete iti vikalpanāyāṃ tathā tayor api tulyo doṣaḥ maivam bhavato 'py asatkhyātivādinaḥ kiṃ sarvatraiva tad arthāsattvaṃ saṃmatam uta taddeśa eva /
analyzed: deśa kālau api kim santau asantau vā pratibhāsete iti vikalpanāyām tathā tayoḥ api tulyaḥ doṣaḥ mā evam asat khyāti vādinaḥ kim sarvatra eva tat artha asattvam saṃmatam uta tad deśe eva

original: tatrāsannidhānamātreṇa tāvat ka iva tava svārthaḥ sarvatrāsatas tu praribhāse kutastya eṣa niyamaḥ yat asattvāviśeṣe 'pi rajatādy evāsat pratibhāti na kharaviṣāṇādīti //
analyzed: tatra asannidhāna mātreṇa tāvat kaḥ iva tava svārthaḥ sarvatra asataḥ tu praribhāse kutastyaḥ eṣa niyamaḥ yat asattva aviśeṣe rajata ādi eva asat pratibhāti na khara viṣāṇa ādi iti

original: ayaṃ tu dvayor asattvayor viśeṣaḥ deśāntarādiṣu sao 'rthasya smaraṇādyupāroheṇa pratibhāsamānatā yujyate na tv ekāntāsata iti /
analyzed: ayam tu dvayoḥ asattvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ deśa antara ādiṣu saḥ ṛthasya smaraṇa ādi upāroheṇa pratibhāsamāna tā yujyate na tu ekānta asataḥ iti

original: evaṃ deśakālayor api sadasattvavikalpacodyaṃ parihartavyam //
analyzed: evam deśa kālayoḥ api sat asat tva vikalpa codyam parihartavyam

original: ataś ca kiṃcid api nātyantāsadarthagrāhi jñānam astīti kiṃ dṛṣṭāntabalena sarvatrārthaśūnyatā kalpyeta tasmān nāsatkhyātiḥ //
analyzed: atas ca kiṃcid api na atyanta asat artha grāhi jñānam asti iti kim dṛṣṭānta balena sarvatra artha śūnyatā kalpyeta tasmāt na asat khyātiḥ

original: ātmakhyātes tu nirākāraṇya so 'yam iyān kaliḥ vartate /
analyzed: ātma khyāteḥ tu saḥ yam iyān kaliḥ vartate

original: tatra ca bahuśaḥ kathitaṃ grāhakād vicchinnam eva grāhyam avabhāsate nīlam idam iti na tu tad bhedena nīlam idam iti /
analyzed: tatra ca bahuśas kathitam grāhakāt vicchinnam eva grāhyam avabhāsate nīlam idam iti na tu tat bhedena nīlam idam iti

original: bhrāntijñāneṣu tadarthāsannidhānāt bhāntatvam astu nātmatattvagrahaṇam iti //
analyzed: bhrānti jñāneṣu tad artha asannidhānāt bhānta tvam astu na ātma tattva grahaṇam iti

original: yad cocyate yad antarjñeyarūpaṃ tad bahirvad avabhāsate iti seyaṃ viparītakhyātir evāṅgīkṛtā syāt /
analyzed: yat ca ucyate yat antar jñeya rūpam tat bahis vat avabhāsate iti sā iyam viparīta khyātiḥ evā aṅgīkṛtā syāt

original: tadvaraṃ saiva tapasvinī sādhīyasī //
analyzed: tat varam sā eva tapasvinī sādhīyasī

original: atha kathyate grahakāt satyaṃ vicchinnaṃ grāhyaṃ tat tu jñānarūpam eveti tatra vicchinam iti priyam āveditam /
analyzed: atha kathyate grahakāt satyam vicchinnam grāhyam tat tu jñāna rūpam eva iti tatra iti priyam āveditam

original: jñānatve tu tasya kā yuktiḥ na ca jñānayoḥ yugapad utpannayoḥ kramabhāvinor vā grāhyagrāhakabhāva upapadyate /
analyzed: jñāna tve tu tasya kā yuktiḥ na ca jñānayoḥ yugapad utpannayoḥ krama bhāvinoḥ vā grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ upapadyate

original: yaugapadye savyetaragoviṣāṇavat grāhyagrāhakaniyamābhāvāt /
analyzed: yaugapadye savyetara go viṣāṇa vat grāhya grāhaka niyama abhāvāt

original: kramapakṣe 'pi pūrvam uttarasya grāhakaṃ cet tadutpattitadgrahaṇakālapraīkṣaṇāt kṣaṇikatāṃ jahāt /
analyzed: krama pakṣe pi pūrvam uttarasya grāhakam ced tad utpatti tad grahaṇa kāla praīkṣaṇāt kṣaṇika tām jahāt

original: uttaram api yadi pūrvasya grāhakaṃ tadāpi saiva vārtā /
analyzed: uttaram api yadi pūrvasya grāhakam tadā api sā eva vārtā

original: tāvatkālam avasthitim antareṇa tadgrāhyatānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: tāvatkālam avasthitim antareṇa tad grāhya tā anupapatteḥ

original: na ca jñānatvaṃ nāma sāmānyaṃ grāhyagrāhakayor anugatam gotvam iva śāvaleyādau vibhāt /
analyzed: na ca jñāna tvam nāma sāmānyam grāhya grāhakayoḥ anugatam go tvam iva śāvaleya ādau vibhāt

original: ato vicchinnaś cet grāhakāt grāhyāṃśaḥ so 'rtha eva bhaved iti na jñānasyāyam ākāraḥ //
analyzed: atas vicchinnaḥ ced grāhakāt grāhya aṃśaḥ saḥ rthaḥ eva bhavet iti na jñānasya ayam ākāraḥ

original: yat tu saṃsargadharmaḥ ākāro na bhavatīti bhāṣitaṃ tad yuktam eva na kuṇḍadadhivat kaścit saṃsargo 'sty arthabodhayoḥ /
analyzed: yat tu saṃsarga dharmaḥ ākāraḥ na bhavati iti bhāṣitam tat yuktam eva na kuṇḍa dadhi vat kaścid saṃsargaḥ asti artha bodhayoḥ

original: tatkṛtākāravattā vā prāg anākārayos tayoḥ //
analyzed: tad kṛta ākāravat tā vā prāk an ākārayoḥ tayoḥ

original: tad evaṃ śakyoktayuktiśakaladaurbalyāt sarvatra vicchedapratibhāsāt jñānasya sdato vaicitryānupapatteḥ arthasyaivāyam ākāra iti siddham //
analyzed: tat evam śakya ukta yukti śakala daurbalyāt sarvatra viccheda pratibhāsāt jñānasya sdataḥ vaicitrya anupapatteḥ arthasya eva ayam ākāraḥ iti siddham

original: yat tu arthākārapakṣe coditaṃ ekatrārthe nakṣatraṃ tārakā tiṣya iti parasparaviruddhākārasamāveśo na yukta iti tatrocyate anupapannam iti naḥ kva saṃpratyayaḥ yat na pramāṇenāvagataṃ viruddham api tadavabuddhyāmahe yad ekatra niviśamānaṃ na paśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu arthākāra pakṣe coditam ekatra arthe nakṣatram tārakā tiṣyaḥ iti paraspara viruddha ākāra samāveśaḥ na yuktaḥ iti tatra ucyate anupapannam iti naḥ kva saṃpratyayaḥ yat na pramāṇena avagatam viruddham api tat avabuddhyāmahe yat ekatra niviśamānam na paśyāmaḥ

original: tad iha yady abādhitena jñānena vispaṣṭam ākāratrayam ekatra gṛhyate tat katham naupapannaṃ syāt kathaṃ vā viruddham iti //
analyzed: tat iha yadi abādhitena jñānena vispaṣṭam ākāra trayam ekatra gṛhyate tat katham na aupapannam syāt katham vā viruddham iti

original: arthakaṃ samyakpramāṇapariniścitarūpaṃ itarat kālpanikam iti pratīyate tad evam astu ko doṣaḥ dṛṣṭaś ca citrādāv anekavarṇasamāveśaḥ /
analyzed: arthakam samyak pramāṇa pariniścita rūpam itarat kālpanikam iti pratīyate tat evam astu kaḥ doṣaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ca citra ādau aneka varṇa samāveśaḥ

original: na caikatra virodhaṃ avirodhaṃ vā dṛṣṭavā sarvatra tatkalpanam ucitam /
analyzed: na ca ekatra virodham avirodham vā dṛṣṭavā sarvatra tad kalpanam ucitam

original: abādhitāvagatinibandhanā hi vastusthitayo bhavanti na kalpanānirmitāḥ //
analyzed: abādhita avagati nibandhanāḥ hi vastu sthitayaḥ bhavanti na kalpanā nirmitāḥ

original: api vā vastutādrūpyasadasattānapekṣayā śabdaprayogasādhutvaṃ anvākhyāyeta kevalam //
analyzed: api vā vastu tādrūpya sat asat tā anapekṣayā śabda prayoga sādhu tvam anvākhyāyeta kevalam

original: dārā iti naikasyāḥ strīvyakteḥ puṃstvaṃhuvaṃt tba vā vidyate /
