analyzed: dārāḥ iti na ekasyāḥ strī vyakteḥ vā vidyate

original: śabdas tv eṣa tatra prayujyamānaḥ sādhur bhavati //
analyzed: śabdaḥ tu eṣa tatra prayujyamānaḥ sādhuḥ bhavati

original: nārthāsaṃsparśitā cāsya tāvatā vyavatiṣṭate /
analyzed: na artha a saṃsparśi tā ca asya tāvatā vyavatiṣṭate

original: yathaitadātmakaṃ vastu tathā śaknoti bhāṣitum //
analyzed: yathā etad ātmakam vastu tathā śaknoti bhāṣitum

original: parivrāṭaprabhṛtīnāṃ ca kuṇapādipratītayaḥ /
analyzed: parivrāṭa prabhṛtīnām ca kuṇapa ādi pratītayaḥ

original: arthasyānekaśaktitvāt nāvahanty arthaśūnyatām //
analyzed: arthasya aneka śakti tvāt na āvahanti artha śūnyatām

original: kiṃ na bhakṣayituṃ śakyā nārī kauleyakena sā /
analyzed: kim na bhakṣayitum śakyā nārī kauleyakena sā

original: kiṃ vā na śamayaty eṣā kāmino madanajvaram //
analyzed: kim vā na śamayati eṣā kāminaḥ madana jvaram

original: śavād vā kena rūpeṇa sā viśiṣyeta yoginaḥ /
analyzed: śavāt vā kena rūpeṇa sā viśiṣyeta yoginaḥ

original: dhītrayaṃ tu na sarveṣāṃ abhāvāt sahakāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: dhī trayam tu na sarveṣām abhāvāt sahakāriṇaḥ

original: pratiprāṇiniyatānekavidhavāsanābhedasahakārisāpekṣo hi tasya tasya jñānasyātmalābha iti na sarveṣāṃ sarvasārūphyeṇa jñānam //
analyzed: prati prāṇi niyata anekavidha vāsanā bheda sahakāri sāpekṣaḥ hi tasya tasya jñānasya ātmalābhaḥ iti na sarveṣām sarva sārūphyeṇa jñānam

original: yady evaṃ vāsanābheda eva vividhapratibhodbhavahetur bhavati kiṃ arthakalpanayā api sādho /
analyzed: yadi evam vāsanā bhedaḥ eva vividha pratibhā udbhava hetuḥ bhavati kim artha kalpanayā api sādho

original: kim adyāpi na pariharasau suciraṃ guṇitāṃ kalpanāvācoyuktim /
analyzed: kim adyā api na parihara asau su ciram guṇitām kalpanā vācoyuktim

original: na hy arthaḥ kalpyate api tu pratibhāsata eva /
analyzed: na hi arthaḥ kalpyate api tu pratibhāsate eva

original: bahurūpasya tu tasya ekatamarūpaparicchedaniyame kim api vāsanādi kāraṇaṃ kvacit kalpyate /
analyzed: bahu rūpasya tu tasya ekatama rūpa pariccheda niyame kim api vāsanā ādi kāraṇam kvacid kalpyate

original: astāvatā 'rthanihnavasyāvasaraḥ //
analyzed: astāvatā rtha nihnavasya avasaraḥ

original: yac coktaṃ vāsanābheda eva jñānavaicitryakāraṇam itaretarakāryakāraṇabhāvaprabandhaś ca bījāṅguravad anādiḥ jñānavāsanayor iti tad apy aghaṭamānam keyaṃ vāsanā nāma jñānād avyatiktā cet sā 'pi svaccharūpatvāt na jñānakākuṣyakāraṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: yat ca uktam vāsanā bhedaḥ eva jñāna vaicitrya kāraṇam itaretara kārya kāraṇa bhāva prabandhaḥ ca bīja aṅgura vat anādiḥ jñāna vāsanayoḥ iti tat api aghaṭamānam kā iyam vāsanā nāma jñānāt a vyatiktā ced sā pi svaccha rūpa tvāt na jñāna kākuṣya kāraṇam bhavet

original: jñānavyatiriktā ced vāsanā tadvaicitryahetuś ca so 'rtha eva pathīyāntareṇoktaḥ syāt //
analyzed: jñāna vyatiriktā ced vāsanā tad vaicitrya hetuḥ ca saḥ ṛthaḥ eva pathīya antareṇa uktaḥ syāt

original: api ca vāsanā nāma viṣayānubhavasamāhitaḥ saṃskāra iti loke prasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: api ca vāsanā nāma viṣaya anubhava samāhitaḥ saṃskāraḥ iti loke prasiddhaḥ

original: saṃskāraś ca yad anubhavaghaṭitaḥ tatraiva kvacid avasare smaraṇau upajanayati /
analyzed: saṃskāraḥ ca yat anubhava ghaṭitaḥ tatra eva kvacid avasare smaraṇau upajanayati

original: na punar asae eva vaicitryam idam īdṛśam āvahati //
analyzed: na punar asae eva vaicitryam idam īdṛśam āvahati

original: kiṃca bhikṣupakṣe kṣanikatvena jñānānāṃ grāhyagrāhakabhāva iva vāsya vāsanābhāvo 'pi nirākartavyaḥ /
analyzed: kiṃca bhikṣu pakṣe kṣanika tvena jñānānām grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ iva vā asya vāsanā bhāvaḥ nirākartavyaḥ

original: sthāyino hi bhāvāstilādayaḥ sthāyibhir eva campakādibhiḥ vāsyante /
analyzed: sthāyinaḥ hi bhāvāḥ tila ādayaḥ sthāyibhiḥ eva campaka ādibhiḥ vāsyante

original: na tūtpadya sapadyeva vinaśyadbhiḥ jñānaiḥ tādṛśy eva jñānānīti //
analyzed: na tu utpadya sapadi iva vinaśyadbhiḥ jñānaiḥ tādṛśī eva jñānāni iti

original: niranvayavināśāc ca na tadaṃśo 'nuvartate /
analyzed: niranvaya vināśāt ca na tad aṃśaḥ nuvartate

original: yataḥ kathaścid vāsyeta pūrveṇa jñānam uttaram //
analyzed: yatas kathaścid vā āsyeta pūrveṇa jñānam uttaram

original: api ca ekatra devadattasantāne vāsanātaḥ sahasrāṇi jñānavaicitryakārīṇi bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: api ca ekatra devadatta santāne vāsanātaḥ sahasrāṇi jñāna vaicitrya kārīṇi bhaveyuḥ

original: na hi govāsanāto hastijñānam udeti //
analyzed: na hi go vāsanātaḥ hasti jñānam udeti

original: anantatve 'pi khalv āsāṃ ārambhe niyamaḥ kutaḥ /
analyzed: ananta tve pi khalu āsām ārambhe niyamaḥ kutas

original: asamaṃjasakāritve vyavahārasya viplavaḥ //
analyzed: asamaṃjasa kāri tve vyavahārasya viplavaḥ

original: dhūmajñānasamutpāde dhūmavāsanayā kṛte /
analyzed: dhūma jñāna samutpāde dhūma vāsanayā kṛte

original: kiṃ tadā na jalajñānaṃ janayej jalavāsanā //
analyzed: kim tadā na jala jñānam janayet jala vāsanā

original: vāsanāś ca vāsanāsantānārambhahetava eva bhaveyuḥ na purar anubhavajñānam ādhātum udyaccheyuḥ /
analyzed: vāsanāḥ ca vāsanā santāna ārambha hetavaḥ eva bhaveyuḥ na puras anubhava jñānam ādhātum udyaccheyuḥ

original: sadṛśāt sadṛśotpattir iti hi bhavatāṃ darśanam //
analyzed: sadṛśāt sadṛśa utpattiḥ iti hi bhavatām darśanam

original: api ca na nirādhārā vāsanā āsate /
analyzed: api ca na nirādhārāḥ vāsanāḥ āsate

original: na ca bhavatpakṣe tadādhāra kaścana saṃbhavati bhaṅguratvena jñānasya tadāśrayatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca bhavat pakṣe tad ādhāra kaścana saṃbhavati bhaṅgura tvena jñānasya tad āśraya tva anupapatteḥ

original: ekajñānāśritatve sarvāsāṃ vāsanānāṃ tadvināśe nāśaḥ syāt /
analyzed: eka jñāna āśrita tve sarvāsām vāsanānām tad vināśe nāśaḥ syāt

original: prativāsanam āśrayābhede tadānantyenāniyamaś ca śataśākhaḥ //
analyzed: prativāsanam āśraya abhede tad ānantyena aniyamaḥ ca śata śākhaḥ

original: na cālayavijñānaṃ nāma kiṃcid asti /
analyzed: na ca alayavijñānam nāma kiṃcid asti

original: saty api tasminn aśeṣavāsanāsahasrasamāśraye tatkṣaṇikatvāt sakṛd eva tathāvidhavāsanākusūlajñānavināśaḥ syāt /
analyzed: sati api tasmin aśeṣa vāsanā sahasra samāśraye tad kṣaṇika tvāt sakṛt eva tathāvidha vāsanā kusūla jñāna vināśaḥ syāt

original: punar utpāde 'pi kathaṃ tathāvidhaṃ jñānam eva samutpādyeta /
analyzed: punar utpāde pi katham tathāvidham jñānam eva samutpādyeta

original: na tu gavāśvādijñānakramaniyamo bhavet iti sarvathā saṅkeṭo 'yaṃ panthāḥ /
analyzed: na tu gavāśva ādi jñāna krama niyamaḥ bhavet iti sarvathā saṅkeṭaḥ yam panthāḥ

original: tasmāt mṛgatṛṣṇikaiṣā tapasvināṃ vāsanāt eva lokayātrāliddheḥ kiṃ bāhyenārtheneti //
analyzed: tasmāt mṛgatṛṣṇikā eṣā tapasvinām vāsanāt eva lokayātrā liddheḥ kim bāhyena arthena iti

original: kṛtam ativācālatayā ciram pai nipuṇair nirūpyamāṇo 'taḥ /
analyzed: kṛtam ati vācāla tayā ciram pai nipuṇaiḥ nirūpyamāṇaḥ taḥ

original: arthasyaiva na buddheḥ sidhyati nīlādir ākāraḥ //
analyzed: arthasya eva na buddheḥ sidhyati nīla ādiḥ ākāraḥ

original: ekaś ca bodhaḥ pramitipramāṇaprameyarūpāṇi kathaṃ bibhati /
analyzed: ekaḥ ca bodhaḥ pramiti pramāṇa prameya rūpāṇi katham bibhati

original: bhinnaṃ pramāṇāt phalam abhyadhāyi pratyakṣacintāvasare purastāt //
analyzed: bhinnam pramāṇāt phalam abhyadhāyi pratyakṣa cintā avasare purastāt

original: ye tu bruvate tiṣṭatu tāvat pramāṇamārga iti prameyam eva vikalpayanto na bāhyam arthaṃ kaṃcana nirapavādaṃ pratipadyāmahe /
analyzed: ye tu bruvate tiṣṭatu tāvat pramāṇa mārgaḥ iti prameyam eva vikalpayantaḥ na bāhyam artham kaṃcana nirapavādam pratipadyāmahe

original: tathā hi na tāvad ayaṃ avayavī ghaṭādir avakalpate avayavavyatirekeṇāvayavino 'nupalambhāt /
analyzed: tathā hi na tāvat ayam avayavī ghaṭa ādiḥ avakalpate avayava vyatirekeṇa avayavinaḥ n upalambhāt

original: yo hi yasmād vyatiriktaḥ saḥ tadadhiṣṭitadeśavyatiriktadeśādhiṣṭāna upalabhyate ghaṭavida paṭaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ hi yasmāt vyatiriktaḥ saḥ tad adhiṣṭita deśa vyatirikta deśa adhiṣṭānaḥ upalabhyate ghaṭa vida paṭaḥ

original: na caivam avayavebhyaḥ pṛthagdeśo dṛśyate avayavī /
analyzed: na ca evam avayavebhyaḥ pṛthak deśaḥ dṛśyate avayavī

original: tadagrahaṇe ca tadbuddhyabhāvāt /
analyzed: tad agrahaṇe ca tad buddhi abhāvāt

original: ghaṭāgrahaṇe 'pi paṭo gṛhyate na tv avayavānupalabdhāv avayavīti kathaṃ sa tephyo bhidyata //
analyzed: ghaṭa agrahaṇe pi paṭaḥ gṛhyate na tu avayava anupalabdhau avayavī iti katham sa tephyaḥ bhidyata

original: avayavagrahaṇānupapatteś ca /
analyzed: avayava grahaṇa anupapatteḥ ca

original: na hi sarve tadavayavāḥ śakyante grahītum arvāgbhāgavartina eva gṛhyeran na madhyaparabhāgagatā iti //
analyzed: na hi sarve tad avayavāḥ śakyante grahītum arvāc bhāga vartinaḥ eva gṛhyeran na madhya para bhāga gatāḥ iti

original: budhyā vibhajyamāne cānupalambhāt /
analyzed: budhyā vibhajyamāne ca anupalambhāt

original: yadā hi paṭaṃ pāṇau nidhāya budhyā vivinākti eṣa tantuḥ eṣa tantur iti tadā prācyād acalāt prabhṛtipraticīnam acalaṃ yāvad vivicayann asau tantusantatim eva kevalāmūpalabhate na tato 'tiriktaṃ paṭāvayavinam //
analyzed: yadā hi paṭam pāṇau nidhāya budhyā vivinākti eṣa tantuḥ eṣa tantuḥ iti tadā prācyāt acalāt prabhṛti praticīnam acalam yāvat vivicayan asau tantu santatim eva kevalām upalabhate na tatas tiriktam paṭa avayavinam

original: vṛttyanupapatteś ca /
analyzed: vṛtti anupapatteḥ ca

original: naikatrāvayave kārtsnyenāvayavī vartate tadanyeṣv avṛttiprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na ekatra avayave kārtsnyena avayavī vartate tad anyeṣu avṛtti prasaṅgāt

original: naikadeśenavartate svārambhāvayavavyatiriktadeśābhāvāt /
analyzed: na eka deśena vartate sva ārambha avayava vyatirikta deśa abhāvāt

original: abhyupagame vā 'navasthāprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: abhyupagame vā navasthā prasaṅgāt

original: yair apy ekadeśair  avayaveṣv asau vartate teṣv api kathaṃ vartate anyair ekadeśaiḥ teṣv api anyair iti nāstyantaḥ /
analyzed: yaiḥ api eka deśaiḥ avayaveṣu asau vartate teṣu api katham vartate anyaiḥ eka deśaiḥ teṣu api anyaiḥ iti na asti antaḥ

original: asaṃbaddhas tv ekadeśair avayavīti kathaṃ tadvāreṇa svārambhakair api saṃbadhyeta /
analyzed: asaṃbaddhaḥ tu eka deśaiḥ avayavi iti katham tad dvāreṇa sva ārambhakaiḥ api saṃbadhyeta

original: tasmād abhayy api nāsya vṛttir avayaveṣv iti //
analyzed: tasmāt abhayī api na asya vṛttiḥ avayaveṣu iti

original: dhāraṇākarṣaṇādi tu anārabdhakārye kāṣṭamūlakakārpāsādāv api dṛśyata iti anaikāntikam /
analyzed: dhāraṇa ākarṣaṇa ādi tu anārabdha kārye kāṣṭa mūlaka kārpāsa ādau api dṛśyate iti anaikāntikam

original: ekākārā tu pratītivikalpamātram /
analyzed: eka ākārā tu pratīti vikalpa mātram

original: ekadeśāvasthānādinimittam āśritya karituragapadātiprabhṛtiṣv iva seneti dhavakhatirpalāśādiṣv iva vanam iti saṃciteṣv abhavayaveṣv eva ghaṭa ityādibuddhir bhaviṣyatī ty evāvayavāvayavaparyālocanayā 'ṇusaṃcayamātram evāvaśiṣyate nānyat //
analyzed: eka deśa avasthāna ādi nimittam āśritya kari turaga padāti prabhṛtiṣu iva senā iti dhava khatiḥ palāśa ādiṣu iva vanam iti saṃciteṣu a bhava yaveṣu eva ghaṭaḥ ityādi buddhiḥ bhaviṣyati iti eva avayava avayava paryālocanayā ṇu saṃcaya mātram eva avaśiṣyate na anyat

original: saṃcayo 'pi ca vyatiriktāvyatiriktatayā cintyamāno nāsty evety aṇava evāvaśiṣyante /
analyzed: saṃcayaḥ ca vyatirikta avyatirikta tayā cintyamānaḥ na asti eva iti aṇavaḥ eva avaśiṣyante

original: paramāṇavo 'pi ṣaṭkena yugapadyogāt paramāṇoṣṣaṅaṃśatā ity evaṃ vikalpamānā viplavanta eva /
analyzed: paramāṇavaḥ pi ṣaṭkena yugapad yogāt paramāṇoḥ ṣaṅaṃśa tāḥ iti evam vikalpamānāḥ viplavante eva

original: na ca tair atisūkṣmair eṣa vyavahāro 'bhinirvartyata iti /
analyzed: na ca taiḥ ati sūkṣmaiḥ eṣa vyavahāraḥ bhinirvartyate iti

original: tasmād bāhyasya prameyasyaiva nirūpyamāṇasyānupapatteḥ vijñānamātram evedam ity abhyupagamanīyam //
analyzed: tasmāt bāhyasya prameyasya eva nirūpyamāṇasya anupapatteḥ vijñāna mātram eva idam iti abhyupagamanīyam

original: te 'py evaṃ vadantaḥ prāktanebhyo 'pi bhikṣubhyaḥ kṛpaṇatarā iva lakṣyante /
analyzed: te pi evam vadantaḥ prāktanebhyaḥ pi bhikṣubhyaḥ kṛpaṇatarāḥ iva lakṣyante

original: apūrvaṃ eṣa tarkamārgaḥ yatra pratītim utsṛjya tarjanīvisphoṭanena vastuvyavasthāḥ kriyante //
analyzed: apūrvam eṣa tarka mārgaḥ yatra pratītim utsṛjya tarjanī visphoṭanena vastu vyavasthāḥ kriyante

original: dṛḍhena cet pramāṇena bādhādirahitātmanā /
analyzed: dṛḍhena ced pramāṇena bādhā ādi rahita ātmanā

original: gṛhīta evāvayavī kim ebhir bālavalgitaiḥ //
analyzed: gṛhītaḥ evā avayavī kim ebhiḥ bāla valgitaiḥ

original: atha nāsti pramāṇena kenacid tad upagrahaḥ /
analyzed: atha na asti pramāṇena kenacid tat upagrahaḥ

original: etad evocyatāṃ vṛttivikalpaiḥ kiṃ prayojanam //
analyzed: etat evā ucyatām vṛtti vikalpaiḥ kim prayojanam

original: na ca śaknuyaḥ pade pade vayam ebhir abhinavam alpam api kiṃcid apaśyadbhiḥ tad eva punaḥ punaḥ pṛcchadbhiḥ śākyahatakais saha kalahamatimātraṃ kartum //
analyzed: na ca śaknuyaḥ pade pade vayam ebhiḥ abhinavam alpam api kiṃcid a paśyadbhiḥ tat eva punar punar pṛcchadbhiḥ śākyahatakaiḥ saha kalaha mati mātram kartum

original: savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam iti sādhitam /
analyzed: sa vikalpakam pratyakṣam pramāṇam iti sādhitam

original: nirvikalpakenāpi śabdollekhamātrarahitaṃ savikalpakagrāhyam eva vastu gṛhyata iti ca darśitam /
analyzed: nirvikalpakena api śabda ullekha mātra rahitam savikalpaka grāhyam eva vastu gṛhyate iti ca darśitam

original: ekākāraviṣayavyatirekeṇa ca tadbuddher ekakāryatvaikadeśādyanyathāsiddhinibandhanatvam api na kiṃcid vaktuṃ śakyata ity api varṇitam /
analyzed: eka ākāra viṣaya vyatirekeṇa ca tad buddheḥ eka kāryatva eka deśa ādi anyathāsiddhi nibandhana tvam api na kiṃcid vaktum śakyate iti api varṇitam

original: kvacid vā pṛtanāvanādau bādhakopanipātāt ekāvagatimithyātvāt na sarvatra mithyātvakalpanā yuktety apy yuktam /
analyzed: kvacid vā pṛtanā vana ādau bādhaka upanipātāt eka avagati mithyātvāt na sarvatra mithyātva kalpanā yuktā iti api yuktam

original: kiṃ vā tad asti yat sāmānyasamarthanāvasare nākathitam /
analyzed: kim vā tat asti yat sāmānya samarthana avasare na a kathitam

original: tasmāt tayaiva nītyā 'vayavy api siddha eva tadgrāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya nirapavādatvāt /
analyzed: tasmāt tayā eva nītyā vayavī api siddhaḥ eva tad grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya nirapavāda tvāt

original: yat tu deśabhedenāgrahaṇāt tadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvād iti tatrāvayavāśritatvam eva nimittaṃ nāsattvam //
analyzed: yat tu deśa bhedena agrahaṇāt tad agrahe tad buddhi abhāvāt iti tatra avayava āśrita tvam eva nimittam na asattvam

original: deśabhedena hi jñānaṃ taddeśasya kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: deśa bhedena hi jñānam tad deśasya katham bhavet

original: na hi kaścit svatantro 'sau api tv avayavāśritaḥ //
analyzed: na hi kaścid svatantraḥ sau api tu avayava āśritaḥ

original: yāvatāṃ grahaṇo 'py asmin buddhir bhavati tāvatām apekṣate 'sau  grahaṇaṃ na sarveṣām iti sthitiḥ //
analyzed: yāvatām asmin buddhiḥ bhavati tāvatām apekṣate grahaṇam na sarveṣām iti sthitiḥ

original: vivicyamāneṣv aṃśeṣu yuktas tadanupagrahaḥ /
analyzed: vivicyamāneṣu aṃśeṣu yuktaḥ tad anupagrahaḥ

original: tadāvayavināśo hi buddhau viparivartate //
analyzed: tadā avayavi nāśaḥ hi buddhau viparivartate

original: avayavavabibhāgo hy avayavino nināśahetuḥ /
analyzed: avayava avabibhāgaḥ hi avayavinaḥ nināśa hetuḥ

original: tasmin buddhyā samullikhyamāne 'vayavivināśo 'pi nānullikhito bhaved iti katham avayavī tadānīṃ gamyata /
analyzed: tasmin buddhyā samullikhyamāne vayavi vināśaḥ pi na an ullikhitaḥ bhavet iti katham avayavī tadānīm gamyata

original: bṛttiś cāvayaveṣv asya vyāsajyaiveti gamyate /
analyzed: bṛttiḥ ca avayaveṣu asya vyāsajyā eva iti gamyate

original: na praty avayavaṃ tasya samāptir vyaktijātivat //
analyzed: na prati avayavam tasya samāptiḥ vyakti jāti vat

original: vyāsajyavartamāno hi na khalv avayavāntaraiḥ /
analyzed: vyāsajya vartamānaḥ hi na khalu avayava antaraiḥ

original: vartate tadasaṃvitteḥ kintu vartata eva saḥ //
analyzed: vartate tad asaṃvitteḥ kintu vartate eva saḥ

original: tathā cāhuḥ vartata iti brūmaḥ anāśritasyānupalaṃbhāt //
analyzed: tathā ca āhuḥ vartate iti brūmaḥ anāśritasya anupalaṃbhāt

original: vṛttir evaṃvidhā 'nyatra kvadṛṣṭeti yad ucyate /
analyzed: vṛttiḥ evaṃvidhā nyatra kva dṛṣṭā iti yat ucyate

original: pratyakṣadṛṣṭa evārthe dṛṣṭāntānveṣaṇena kim //
analyzed: pratyakṣa dṛṣṭe eva arthe dṛṣṭānta anveṣaṇena kim

original: tasmāt pratyakṣata evāvayavavṛtter avayavinaḥ upalabdheḥ na tadvṛttau vikal;ānām avasaraḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt pratyakṣataḥ eva avayava vṛtteḥ avayavinaḥ upalabdheḥ na tad vṛttau vikalānām avasaraḥ

original: sraksūtrādivṛttir api tathā darśanād abhyupagatā /
analyzed: srak sūtra ādi vṛttiḥ api tathā darśanāt abhyupagatā

original: tad iyam avayavivṛttir apīdṛśī dṛśyaprānā kim iti nihnūyate /
analyzed: tat iyam avayavi vṛttiḥ api īdṛśī dṛśya prānā kim iti nihnūyate

original: na cāvayavigrāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya kaścid api vādaḥ samasti //
analyzed: na ca avayavi grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya kaścid api vādaḥ samasti

original: adṛṣṭakāraṇodbhūtaṃ anāvirbhūtabādhakam /
analyzed: adṛṣṭa kāraṇa udbhūtam anāvirbhūta bādhakam

original: asandigdhaṃ ca vijñānaṃ kathaṃ mithyeti kathyate //
analyzed: asandigdham ca vijñānam katham mithyā iti kathyate

original: na ca senāvanavad avayavigrahaṇaṃ abhidhātum ucitam abādhitatvāt senādau bādhakasadbhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca senā vana vat avayavi grahaṇam abhidhātum ucitam abādhita tvāt senā ādau bādhaka sadbhāvāt

original: api ca gajavājipadātipīlupalāśaśiṃśapādidarśanasya tatra ghaṭamānatvāt tatsamavāyi senāvanādipratītir upapadyetāpi /
analyzed: api ca gaja vāji padāti pīlu palāśa śiṃśapā ādi darśanasya tatra ghaṭamāna tvāt tad samavāyi senā vana ādi pratītiḥ upapadyeta api

original: iha tu kiṃ samudāyaviṣayaḥ paṭapratyaya iti cintyam /
analyzed: iha tu kim samudāya viṣayaḥ paṭa pratyayaḥ iti cintyam

original: tantusamudāyālambana iti cet tantupratyaya idānīṃ kim ālambanaḥ so 'pi svāvayavālambana ity evam avayavāvayavanirūpaṇe paramāṇavaḥ pratyaśvaśamīśiṃśapādisthānīya vaktavyāḥ /
analyzed: tantu samudāya ālambanaḥ iti ced tantu pratyayaḥ idānīm kim ālambanaḥ saḥ sva avayava ālambanaḥ iti evam avayava avayava nirūpaṇe paramāṇavaḥ vaktavyāḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca tadvat grahaṇam anupapannaṃ atīndriyatvād iti na tadālambano 'vayavipatyayaḥ tasmād avayavī pratyakṣagrāhyo 'stīti siddham //
analyzed: teṣām ca tadvat grahaṇam anupapannam atīndriya tvāt iti na tad ālambanaḥ vayavi patyayaḥ tasmāt avayavī pratyakṣa grāhyaḥ sti iti siddham

original: paramāṇavo 'pi kāryānumānapariniścitanityaniravayavasvarūpāḥ santīti pūrvam eva samarthitam /
analyzed: paramāṇavaḥ pi kārya anumāna pariniścita nitya niravayava svarūpāḥ santi iti pūrvam eva samarthitam

original: ato na ṣaṭkayogādinā sāvayavatvam eṣāṃ upapādayituṃ pāryate /
analyzed: atas na ṣaṭka yoga ādinā sāvayava tvam eṣām upapādayitum pāryate

original: mūrtatvam apy anityatāyām aprayojakam iti darśayiṣyate //
analyzed: mūrta tvam api anitya tāyām aprayojakam iti darśayiṣyate

original: ataḥ prameyaparyālocanavartmanā 'pi śūnyavādasamarthanaṃ na suśakam /
analyzed: atas prameya paryālocana vartmanā pi śūnyavāda samarthanam na suśakam

original: prameyavicāne 'pi hi pramāṇavṛttam eva parīkṣyate /
analyzed: prameya vicāne hi pramāṇa vṛttam eva parīkṣyate

original: ataś ca pramāṇacarcāto bibhyadbhiḥ prapalāyya yā prameyakathābīthī tathāgataivalambitā tasyām api saiva bhīṣaṇamukhī pramāṇacarcikaivopanatā //
analyzed: atas ca pramāṇa carcātaḥ bibhyadbhiḥ prapalāyya yā prameya kathā bīthī tathāgata eva lambitā tasyām api sā eva bhīṣaṇa mukhī pramāṇa carcikā evā upanatā

original: sarvatī vipadā mārga ādeśayitum udyate /
analyzed: sarvatī vipadā mārgaḥ ādeśayitum udyate

original: vidhau vidhuratāṃ yati prapalāpya kva gamyate /
analyzed: vidhau vidhura tām yati prapalāpya kva gamyate

original: tasmāt pramāṇato 'śakye śakye vā vastunirṇaye /
analyzed: tasmāt śakye śakye vā vastu nirṇaye

original: evaṃ prāyam ayuktaṃ vaḥ kuśakāśāvalambanam //
analyzed: evam prāyam ayuktam vaḥ kuśa kāśa avalambanam

original: evaṃ niṣphalam utsṛthya śūnyavādabakavratam /
analyzed: evam niṣphalam utsṛthya śūnyavāda bakavratam

original: bāhyenaivārthajātena vyavahāro vidhīyatām //
analyzed: bāhyena eva artha jātena vyavahāraḥ vidhīyatām

original: atha asthāśaithilpajananāya sarvaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ sarvaṃ nirālambanaṃ ity upadiśyate tarhi kim anena mṛṣodyena saty apy ātmani satsv api sreṣu padārtheṣu viṣayadoṣadarśanadvāreṇa bhavaty eva vivekavatāṃ vairāgyam iti tadupajananāya śūnyavādādivarṇanaṃ vakraḥ panthāḥ /
analyzed: atha asthā śaithilpa jananāya sarvam śūnyam sarvam kṣaṇikam sarvam nirālambanam iti upadiśyate tarhi kim anena mṛṣodyena sati api ātmani satsu api sreṣu padārtheṣu viṣaya doṣa darśana dvāreṇa bhavati eva vivekavatām vairāgyam iti tad upajananāya śūnya vāda ādi varṇanam vakraḥ panthāḥ

original: pratyuta pājāo mumukṣuḥ kṣaṇikanirātmyaśūnyatādivacanaṃ yuktibādhitam avabuddhyamānaḥ vaṃcanām ayam iva tadupadeśam āśaṅkate //
analyzed: pratyuta mumukṣuḥ kṣaṇika nirātmya śūnyatā ādi vacanam yukti bādhitam avabuddhyamānaḥ ayam iva tad upadeśam āśaṅkate

original: sa eṣa buddhiśūnyānāṃ śūnyavādaparigrahaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eṣa buddhi śūnyānām śūnyavāda parigrahaḥ

original: pratāraṇaparāṇāṃ vā na tu tattvārthadarśinām //
analyzed: pratāraṇa parāṇām vā na tu tattva artha darśinām

original: tasmāt parīkṣyamāṇo 'yaṃ śabdādyadvaitapakṣavat /
analyzed: tasmāt parīkṣyamāṇaḥ yam śabda ādi advaita pakṣa vat

original: vjñānādvaitapakṣo 'pi gandharvanagarāyate //
analyzed: gandharvanagarāyate

original: tad evam advaitadṛśā na dṛśyate janasya niḥśreyasasaṃpadāgamaḥ /
analyzed: tat evam advaita dṛśā na dṛśyate janasya niḥśreyasa saṃpad āgamaḥ

original: ato yathoktātmasutattvacintayā kṛtī vyavasyed apavargasiddhaye //
analyzed: atas yathā ukta ātma su tattva cintayā kṛtī vyavasyet apavarga siddhaye

original: sāṅkhyair yas tv apavargasādhanavidhāv uktaḥ prakṛtyātmanoḥ anyatvāvagamo 'bhyupāya iti sa prāg eva nirvāsitaḥ /
analyzed: sāṅkhyaiḥ yaḥ tu apavarga sādhana vidhau uktaḥ prakṛti ātmanoḥ anya tva avagamaḥ bhyupāyaḥ iti sa prāk eva nirvāsitaḥ

original: ajñā śaktimati vikārabahulā badhnaty kiṃcitkaraṃ bhūyo na prakṛtiḥ pumāṃsam iti vā kas tāṃ niyantuṃ kṣamaḥ //
analyzed: ajñā śaktimati vikāra bahulā badhnatī kiṃcitkaram bhūyas na prakṛtiḥ pumāṃsam iti vā kaḥ tām niyantum kṣamaḥ

original: puṃsā na kiṃcid api bandhanidhānabhūtaṃ atyalpamātram api karma kṛtaṃ kadācit /
analyzed: puṃsā na kiṃcid api bandha nidhāna bhūtam ati alpa mātram api karma kṛtam kadācid

original: mathnāti taṃ prakṛtir eva niraṅkuśaiṣā mattā kareṇur iva padmavanāni bhūyaḥ //
analyzed: mathnāti tam prakṛtiḥ eva niraṅkuśā eṣā mattā kareṇuḥ iva padma vanāni bhūyas

original: kacaniluṃcanadikpaṭadhāraṇakṣitidharākramaṇakramapūrvakam /
analyzed: kaca niluṃcana diś paṭa dhāraṇa kṣitidhara ākramaṇa krama pūrvakam

original: kṣapaṇākās tv apavargamuśantyamī hy tiratāṃ paramārthavidas tu te //
analyzed: kṣapaṇākāḥ tu apavargam uśanti amī hi tiratām parama artha vidaḥ tu te

original: lomnāṃ nityasaṃbhavāt khalatayo mokṣaṃ kṣaṇāt prāpnuyuḥ saṃsāroparamo digambaratayā sadyastiraścāṃ bhavet /
analyzed: lomnām nitya saṃbhavāt kha latayaḥ mokṣam kṣaṇāt prāpnuyuḥ saṃsāra uparamaḥ digambara tayā sadyas tiraścām bhavet

original: muktāḥ syuḥ giriśṛṅgavāsi na ime śaśvattadārohaṇāt jantunām apavargavatmaṃ nikaṭaṃ kenedṛśaṃ darśitam //
analyzed: muktāḥ syuḥ giri śṛṅga vāsi na ime śaśvat tad ārohaṇāt jantunām nikaṭam kena īdṛśam darśitam

original: tasmād ātmajñānaṃ santaḥ mokṣaprāptau hetuṃ prāhuḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ātma jñānam santaḥ mokṣa prāptau hetum prāhuḥ

original: tīrthe tīrthe tac cācāryaiḥ tais tair uktaṃ saṃjñābhedaiḥ //
analyzed: tīrthe tīrthe tat ca ācāryaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ uktam saṃjñā bhedaiḥ

original: yad apīha kecid vikalpam īśvarapraṇidhānam āhur apavargaṃ sādhanam /
analyzed: yat api iha kecid vikalpam īśvara praṇidhānam āhuḥ apavargam sādhanam

original: idam ātmadarśanam avādi tair api prathito hi pūraṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ //
analyzed: idam ātma darśanam avādi taiḥ api prathitaḥ hi pūraṣa viśeṣaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: dṛṣṭā vādyantarāṇāṃ gatir iyam iyatī nāpavargasya mārgaṃ spraṣṭuṃ draṣṭuṃ samarthāsti iti ciram iha śvabhra eva bhramanti /
analyzed: dṛṣṭā vādi antarāṇām gatiḥ iyam iyatī na apavargasya mārgam spraṣṭum draṣṭum samarthā asti iti ciram iha śvabhre eva bhramanti

original: nedīyān eṣa tasmād bhavamarupatitaiḥ akṣapādopadiṣṭaḥ panthāḥ kṣemāyā mokṣādhigamasamucitaḥ kṣipram ālambanīyaḥ //
analyzed: nedīyān eṣa tasmāt bhava maru patitaiḥ akṣapāda upadiṣṭaḥ panthāḥ kṣemāyāḥ mokṣa adhigama samucitaḥ kṣipram ālambanīyaḥ

original: //iti śrī Bhaṭṭajayantakṛtau nyāyamañjaryā navamam āhnikam //
analyzed: iti śrī bhaṭṭa jayanta kṛtau nyāyamañjaryāḥ navamam āhnikam

original: daśamam āhnikam samśayaparīkṣā saṃśayādeḥ padārthagaṇasya pramāṇaprameyapadasaṃgṛhītasyāpi nyāyapravṛttiprayojanatayā pṛthagvyutpādanīyatvasya prāg eva samarthitatvāt prathamasūtre ca prameyānantaraṃ saṃśayoddeśāt uddeśānukrameṇa tasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayitum āha samānānekadharmopapatter vipratipatter upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthātaś ca viśeṣāpekṣo vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: daśamam āhnikam samśaya parīkṣā saṃśaya ādeḥ padārtha gaṇasya pramāṇa prameya pada saṃgṛhītasya api nyāya pravṛtti prayojana tayā pṛthak vyutpādanīya tvasya prāk eva samarthita tvāt prathama sūtre ca prameya anantaram saṃśaya uddeśāt uddeśa anukrameṇa tasya lakṣaṇam pratipādayitum āha samāna aneka dharma upapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ ca viśeṣa apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ

original: 1-1-23 nanu saṃśayasya samānadharmopapattyādikāraṇabhedena paṃcavidhatvāt sāmānyasakṣaṇam vibhāgaḥ viśeṣalakṣaṇāni ca vaktavyāni /
analyzed: nanu saṃśayasya samāna dharma upapatti ādi kāraṇa bhedena paṃcavidha tvāt sāmānya sakṣaṇam vibhāgaḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni ca vaktavyāni

original: tatra sāmānyalakṣaṇe vibhāge ca sūtradvayam viśeṣalakṣaṇārthaṃ ca paṃcānāṃ tatprabhedānāṃ sūtrapaṃcakam ity evaṃ saptra sūtrāṇi praṇetuṃ yuktāni /
analyzed: tatra sāmānya lakṣaṇe vibhāge ca sūtra dvayam viśeṣa lakṣaṇa artham ca paṃcānām tad prabhedānām sūtra paṃcakam iti evam saptra sūtrāṇi praṇetum yuktāni

original: ekaṃ cedaṃ sutraṃ śrūyate /
analyzed: ekam ca idam sutram śrūyate

original: tat katham etad bhaviṣyati ucyate satyam āha bhavān /
analyzed: tat katham etat bhaviṣyati ucyate satyam āha bhavān

original: kiṃ tv ekam evedaṃ sūtram āvṛttinyāyam āśritya saptadhā kalpayiṣyate //
analyzed: kim tu ekam evā idam sūtram āvṛtti nyāyam āśritya saptadhā kalpayiṣyate

original: tatra ācāryās tāvad evaṃ vyācakṣate samānadharmopapatteḥ upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāto viśeṣāpekṣo vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ itīyatsūtraṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇā pratipādikam /
analyzed: tatra ācāryāḥ tāvat evam vyācakṣate samāna dharma upapatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ viśeṣa apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti iyat sūtram sāmānya lakṣaṇā pratipādikam

original: samānānekadharmopapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthātaś ceti vibhāgasutram /
analyzed: samāna aneka dharma upapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ ca iti vibhāga sutram

original: punaś ca samānadharmopapatteḥ upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāto viśeṣāpekṣo vimarśaḥ saṃśaya ity etad eva sūtraṃ prathamasya saṃśayasya viśeṣalakṣaṇapratipādikam iti //
analyzed: punar ca samāna dharma upapatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ viśeṣa apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti etat eva sūtram prathamasya saṃśayasya viśeṣa lakṣaṇa pratipādikam iti

original: nanu etad eva sūtraṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇārtham iyad eva ced ayam anyūnānatiriktaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇārtham iti katham etat ucyate viśeṣasmaraṇakāraṇabhūtasādhāraṇadharmagrahaṇāt viśeṣāgrahaṇāt viśeṣāsmṛteś ca saṃśayo bhavatīti pratyātmavedanīyaṃ tāvad etat /
analyzed: nanu etat eva sūtram sāmānya lakṣaṇa artham iyat eva ced ayam anyūna anatiriktam viśeṣa lakṣaṇa artham iti katham etat ucyate viśeṣa smaraṇa kāraṇa bhūta sādhāraṇa dharma grahaṇāt viśeṣa agrahaṇāt viśeṣa asmṛteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ bhavati iti pratyātma vedanīyam tāvat etat

original: sūtre viśeṣāpekṣa ity anena padena viśeṣasmaraṇam upadiṣṭam /
analyzed: sūtre viśeṣa apekṣaḥ iti anena padena viśeṣa smaraṇam upadiṣṭam

original: upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāpadena ca viśeṣāgrahaṇam itīyattāvat dvayoraṇi sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇayoḥ tulyam /
analyzed: upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthā padena ca viśeṣa agrahaṇam iti iyat tāvat dvayoḥ aṇi sāmānya viśeṣa lakṣaṇayoḥ tulyam

original: samānaśabdas tv ākṣiptasāmānyavacanaḥ san tatsāmānyalakṣaṇam āha /
analyzed: samāna śabdaḥ tu ākṣipta sāmānya vacanaḥ san tad sāmānya lakṣaṇam āha

original: anugatasāmānyavacanas tu viśeṣalakṣaṇam iti /
analyzed: anugata sāmānya vacanaḥ tu viśeṣa lakṣaṇam iti

original: kathaṃ punar ayam evākṣiptasāmānyavacanaḥ kathaṃ cānugatasāmānyavacana iti ucyate saṃśayotpattyaiva samānadharyamātram ākṣipyate yad gṛhyamāṇaṃ viśeṣasmaraṇabījasaṃskārodvodhanimittatāṃ pratipadyate tadvyatirekeṇa saṃśayānutpādāt //
analyzed: katham punar ayam eva ākṣipta sāmānya vacanaḥ katham ca anugata sāmānya vacanaḥ iti ucyate saṃśaya utpattyā eva samāna dharya mātram ākṣipyate yat gṛhyamāṇam viśeṣa smaraṇa bīja saṃskāra udvodha nimitta tām pratipadyate tad vyatirekeṇa saṃśaya anutpādāt

original: tathā hi viruddhaviśeṣāvamarśasvabhāvas tāvat saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi viruddha viśeṣa avamarśa svabhāvaḥ tāvat saṃśayaḥ

original: na ca viruddhaviśeṣṇāṃ puro 'vasthite dharmiṇi sannihitānām avamarśanam viruddhatayaivaikatra sannidhānābhāvāt /
analyzed: na ca viruddha viśeṣṇām puras vasthite dharmiṇi sannihitānām avamarśanam viruddha tayā eva ekatra sannidhāna abhāvāt

original: ataḥ smṛtyupārūḍhānām avamarśanam /
analyzed: atas smṛti upārūḍhānām avamarśanam

original: smṛtiś ca nākasmāt udbhavatīti yatsahacaritānāṃ teṣāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ paryāyeṇa grahaṇaṃ vṛttam taddarśanasaṃskāraprabodhadvāreṇa smaraṇakāraṇam avaśyam evāśrayaṇīyam /
analyzed: smṛtiḥ ca na akasmāt udbhavati iti yat sahacaritānām teṣām viśeṣāṇām pūrvam paryāyeṇa grahaṇam vṛttam tad darśana saṃskāra prabodha dvāreṇa smaraṇa kāraṇam avaśyam eva āśrayaṇīyam

original: tat tu anugataṃ vā bhavatu vyāvṛttaṃ vā vipratipattyātmakaṃ vā āntaram upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthārūpaṃ vety evam ākṣiptasāmānyavācini samānaśabde paṃcasādhāraṇarūpāvagamāt sāmānyalakṣaṇārthatā //
analyzed: tat tu anugatam vā bhavatu vyāvṛttam vā vipratipatti ātmakam vā āntaram upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthā rūpam vā iti evam ākṣipta sāmānya vācini samāna śabde paṃca sādhāraṇa rūpa avagamāt sāmānya lakṣaṇa artha tā

original: yadā uv anugatam eva dharmam ārohapariṇāhādisvabhām ācaṣṭe samānaśabdaḥ tadāviśeṣalakṣaṇārtha iti //
analyzed: anugatam eva dharmam āroha pariṇāha ādi svabhām ācaṣṭe samāna śabdaḥ tadā aviśeṣa lakṣaṇa arthaḥ iti

original: tatra cetthaṃ sūtrayojanā samāno dharmaḥ pariṇāhādiḥ tasya guṇatvena prati dravyam anyatve 'pi tulyarūpāvagativiṣayīkṛtatvāt samānatvam upapadyate /
analyzed: tatra ca ittham sūtra yojanā samānaḥ dharmaḥ pariṇāha ādiḥ tasya guṇa tvena prati dravyam anya tve pi tulya rūpa avagati viṣayīkṛta tvāt samāna tvam upapadyate

original: tasyopapattiḥ upalabdhiḥ /
analyzed: tasya upapattiḥ upalabdhiḥ

original: athāpi sattā upapattiśabdenocyate /
analyzed: atha api sattā upapatti śabdena ucyate

original: sā 'py upalabdhyadhīnasthitir eva bhavatīti sarvathā samānadharmopalabdheḥ saṃśaya ity uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: sā pi upalabdhi adhīna sthitiḥ eva bhavati iti sarvathā samāna dharma upalabdheḥ saṃśayaḥ iti uktam bhavati

original: nanu samānadharmaḥ arthāntaraṃ dharmiṇaḥ /
analyzed: nanu samāna dharmaḥ artha antaram dharmiṇaḥ

original: na cārthāntaree dṛṣṭe 'nyatra saṃśayo bhavitum arhati na arthāntaraviśeṣatvāt /
analyzed: na ca artha antare dṛṣṭe nyatra saṃśayaḥ bhavitum arhati na artha antara viśeṣa tvāt

original: arthāntaraviśeṣas tu dharmy evocyate arthāntareṇa pariṇāhādinā viśeṣyata iti tasminn eva sādhāraṇa dharmādhyāsitavastuṣi dharmiṇi nayanapathavartini tadgataviśeṣāvamarśātmā tatraiva saṃśayo jāyate /
analyzed: artha antara viśeṣaḥ tu dharmī evā ucyate artha antareṇa pariṇāha ādinā viśeṣyate iti tasmin eva sādhāraṇa dharma adhyāsita vastuṣi dharmiṇi nayana patha vartini tad gata viśeṣa avamarśa ātmā tatra eva saṃśayaḥ jāyate

original: yo 'yam ūrdhvatvaviśiṣṭo dharmo dṛśyate saḥ sthāṇur vā syāt puruṣo veti nārthāntaratvaṃ dūṣaṇam //
analyzed: yaḥ yam ūrdhva tva viśiṣṭaḥ dharmaḥ dṛśyate saḥ sthāṇuḥ vā syāt puruṣaḥ vā iti na artha antara tvam dūṣaṇam

original: tathāpi vakrakotaratvakaracaraṇādiviśeṣadarśinaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ saṃśaya iti kāraṇāntaram ucyate upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāta iti /
analyzed: tathā api vakraka utara tva kara caraṇa ādi viśeṣa darśinaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti kāraṇa antaram ucyate upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ iti

original: viśeṣāgrahaṇād ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣa agrahaṇāt iti arthaḥ

original: kathaṃ punar upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāta ity anena viśeṣāgrahaṇam ucyate ittham ucyate idantayā 'nidantayā vā tatropalabdhiḥ na vyavatiṣṭate anupalabdhir vā iti /
analyzed: katham punar upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ iti anena viśeṣa agrahaṇam ucyate ittham ucyate idantayā nidantayā vā tatra upalabdhiḥ na vyavatiṣṭate anupalabdhiḥ vā iti

original: viśeṣagrahaṇe hi sati tadvyavasthānaṃ saṃbhavati sthāṇur ayam na puruṣa iti vakrakoṭarādiyiśeṣagrahaṇe /
analyzed: viśeṣa grahaṇe hi sati tad vyavasthānam saṃbhavati sthāṇuḥ ayam na puruṣaḥ iti vakra koṭara ādi yiśeṣa grahaṇe

original: śirāpāṇyādiparicchede tu puruṣo 'yam na sthāṇur iti //
analyzed: śirā pāṇi ādi paricchede tu puruṣaḥ yam na sthāṇuḥ iti

original: evam anena padena viśeṣāgrahaṇam uktam /
analyzed: evam anena padena viśeṣa agrahaṇam uktam

original: tathāpi praṅkhārūḍhasya sādhāraṇadharmadarśinaḥ viśeṣānupalambhamānasyāpi na dṛṣṭaḥ saṃśaya iti kāranāntaram ucyate viśeṣāpekṣa iti /
analyzed: tathā api praṅkha ārūḍhasya sādhāraṇa dharma darśinaḥ viśeṣa anupalambha mānasya api na dṛṣṭaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti kārana antaram ucyate viśeṣa apekṣaḥ iti

original: viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣa ity arthaḥ //
analyzed: viśeṣa smṛti apekṣaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanu viśeṣāṇāṃ saṃśayotpattāv apekṣā nānabhūyamānatayā anubhūyamāneṣu hi teṣu saṃśayacchedo bhavati na saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: nanu viśeṣāṇām saṃśaya utpattau apekṣā na an abhūyamānatayā anubhūyamāneṣu hi teṣu saṃśaya chedaḥ bhavati na saṃśayaḥ

original: apkeṣāśabdārthanirūpaṇād eva vā smṛtir labhyate /
analyzed: apkeṣā śabda artha nirūpaṇāt eva vā smṛtiḥ labhyate

original: viśeṣāṇāṃ apkekṣā ākāṅkṣā te cānupalabhyamānāḥ pūrvānubhūtāś ca ākāṅkṣyante itīyaṃ sā teṣāṃ smṛtiḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣāṇām ākāṅkṣā te ca anupalabhyamānāḥ pūrva anubhūtāḥ ca ākāṅkṣyante iti iyam sā teṣām smṛtiḥ

original: saṃpratyupalabhyamāneṣu ekāntān anubhūteṣu vā teṣv ākāṅkṣā ' nupapatteḥ //
analyzed: saṃpratyupalabhyamāneṣu ekāntān anubhūteṣu vā teṣu ākāṅkṣā anupapatteḥ

original: nanu samānadharmopapatteḥ viśeṣasmṛteś ceti kāraṇadvayam evāstu kiṃ viśeṣāgrahaṇena /
analyzed: nanu samāna dharma upapatteḥ viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca iti kāraṇa dvayam eva astu kim viśeṣa agrahaṇena

original: api ca viśeṣasmaraṇād eva nanv ākṣiptas tadā 'grahaḥ /
analyzed: api ca viśeṣa smaraṇāt eva nanu ākṣiptaḥ tadā grahaḥ

original: grahaṇaṃ smaraṇaṃ caiva bhavetāṃ yugapat katham //
analyzed: grahaṇam smaraṇam ca eva bhavetām yugapad katham

original: asty etat kintu nātidūragatāyāṃ nijapramadāyāṃ anurāgavataḥ kāminaḥ samānadharmadarśane tadgataviśeṣādarśane tadanusmaraṇe ca sany api na bhavaty eva saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: asti etat kintu na ati dūra gatāyām nija pramadāyām anurāgavataḥ kāminaḥ samāna dharma darśane tad gata viśeṣa adarśane tad anusmaraṇe ca sani api na bhavati eva saṃśayaḥ

original: ataḥ saṃśayotpattyavyabhicāre deśakālavyavahitaviśeṣāgrahaṇasiddhaye padāntaram upādīyate deśāntare kālāntare vā ciradṛṣṭānāṃ viśeṣāṇām idānīm agrahaṇaṃ saṃśayakāraṇam na viśeṣāgrahaṇamātram /
analyzed: atas saṃśaya utpatti avyabhicāre deśa kāla vyavahita viśeṣa agrahaṇa siddhaye pada antaram upādīyate deśa antare kāla antare vā cira dṛṣṭānām viśeṣāṇām idānīm agrahaṇam saṃśaya kāraṇam na viśeṣa agrahaṇa mātram

original: evam amunā padatrayeṇa saṃśayalakṣaṇam idam uktam //
analyzed: evam amunā pada trayeṇa saṃśaya lakṣaṇam idam uktam

original: nanu ca saṃbhūya kārakaiḥ kāryam ārabhata iti nyāyāt samānadharmopalabdhiviśeṣānupalabdhi tatsmṛtilakṣaṇakāraṇatrayajanye saṃśaye jñānayaugapadyam āpadyate /
analyzed: nanu ca saṃbhūya kārakaiḥ kāryam ārabhate iti nyāyāt samāna dharma upalabdhi viśeṣa anupalabdhi tad smṛti lakṣaṇa kāraṇa traya janye saṃśaye jñāna yaugapadyam āpadyate

original: kramabhāvitve hi buddhīnāṃ naikakāryotpattau yugapadvyāpāraḥ samasti /
analyzed: krama bhāvi tve hi buddhīnām na eka kārya utpattau yugapad vyāpāraḥ samasti

original: viśeṣāś ca bahavo 'pi saṃbhavatīti tatsmaraṇāny api yugapad bhūyāṃsi bhaveyuḥ naitad evam samānadharmagrahaṇānantaraṃ pūrvopajātavividhaviśeṣānubhavaparamparopacita pīvarasaṃskāradvārakam ekam eva tadviṣayaṃ smaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā varṇānām arthapratītau varṇitam //
analyzed: viśeṣāḥ ca saṃbhavati iti tad smaraṇāni api yugapad bhūyāṃsi bhaveyuḥ na etat evam samāna dharma grahaṇa anantaram pūrva upajāta vividha viśeṣa anubhava paramparā upacita pīvara saṃskāra dvārakam ekam eva tad viṣayam smaraṇam bhaviṣyati yathā varṇānām artha pratītau varṇitam

original: upalabdyanupalabdyavyavasthāsūcitā ca viśeṣānupalabdhiḥ anupalabdhir eva na sā jñānātmikā kintu jñānānutpāda iti tat tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇam api bhavan na jñānātmakam iti dve eva jñānātmake kāraṇe samānadharmagrahaṇam viśeṣasmaraṇaṃ ca /
analyzed: upalabdi anupalabdya vyavasthā sūcitā ca viśeṣa anupalabdhiḥ anupalabdhiḥ eva na sā jñāna ātmikā kintu jñāna anutpādaḥ iti tat tṛtīyam kāraṇam api bhavat na jñāna ātmakam iti dve eva jñāna ātmake kāraṇe samāna dharma grahaṇam viśeṣa smaraṇam ca

original: tayoḥ prathamaṃ samānadharmagrahaṇaṃ vinaśyadavasthaṃ viśeṣasmaraṇaṃ ca dvitīyam avinaśyadavasthaṃ saṃśayam upajanayataḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ prathamam samāna dharma grahaṇam vinaśyat avastham viśeṣa smaraṇam ca dvitīyam avinaśyat avastham saṃśayam upajanayataḥ

original: īdṛśayoś ca jñānayoḥ yougapadyam aviruddham iti śāstre sthitam //
analyzed: īdṛśayoḥ ca jñānayoḥ yougapadyam aviruddham iti śāstre sthitam

original: evaṃ samānadharmagrahaṇāt viśeṣāgrahaṇāt viśeṣāsmṛteś ca saṃśaya iti paratrayeṇa saṃśayalakṣaṇam anavadyam ucyata iti //
analyzed: evam samāna dharma grahaṇāt viśeṣa agrahaṇāt viśeṣa asmṛteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ iti para trayeṇa saṃśaya lakṣaṇam anavadyam ucyate iti

original: tad etad ācāryavyākhyānam arocayantah pare 'parathā vyācakṣate sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tāvat vimarśapadenaiva pratipādyate /
analyzed: tat etat ācārya vyākhyānam arocayantaḥ pare parathā vyācakṣate sāmānya lakṣaṇam tāvat vimarśa padena eva pratipādyate

original: na hi paryāyoccāraṇamātram idaṃ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti /
analyzed: na hi paryāya uccāraṇa mātram idam vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti

original: kintu saṃśaya iti lakṣyapadam vimarśa iti lakṣaṇapadam /
analyzed: kintu saṃśayaḥ iti lakṣya padam vimarśaḥ iti lakṣaṇa padam

original: pramāṇapadavac ca nirvacanasavyapekṣam etatpadaṃ lakṣaṇapratipādanakṣamaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: pramāṇa pada vat ca nirvacana sa vyapekṣam etat padam lakṣaṇa pratipādana kṣamam bhavati

original: viruddhārthāvamarśo vimarśaḥ sthāṇur vā puruṣo veti /
analyzed: viruddha artha avamarśaḥ vimarśaḥ sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti

original: iyatā ca sajātīyasaṃśayapaścakānugataṃ vijātītebhyaḥ pramāṇādibhyo vyavaccinnaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: iyatā ca sajātīya saṃśaya paścaka anugatam vijātītebhyaḥ pramāṇa ādibhyaḥ vyavaccinnam sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktam bhavati

original: saṃśayītpādakakāraṇaparigaṇanaṃ punar indriyārthasannikarṣotpannagrahaṇavad ihāpi nopayujyate kāraṇāntrāṇām api ātmamanaśannikarṣādīnāṃ aparihāryatvāt //
analyzed: punar indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna grahaṇa vat iha api na upayujyate kāraṇa antrāṇām api ātma mana sannikarṣa ādīnām aparihārya tvāt

original: athānyāsādhāraṇakāraṇanirdeśaś cikīrṣitaḥ tenāpi ko 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: atha anyā sādhāraṇa kāraṇa nirdeśaḥ cikīrṣitaḥ tena api kaḥ rthaḥ

original: sāmānyalakṣaṇasya pratipādayiṣitatvāt tasya ca vimarśapadād eva siddhatvāt //
analyzed: sāmānya lakṣaṇasya tasya ca vimarśa padāt eva siddha tvāt

original: upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāpadapratipādyamānaviśeṣāgrahaṇavarṇanaṃ cātīvakliṣṭam iti punaś ca viśeṣalakṣaṇaprasaṅge yathāśrutam eva tadvyākhyeyam ity atibhāraḥ //
analyzed: upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthā pada pratipādyamāna viśeṣa agrahaṇa varṇanam ca atīva kliṣṭam iti punar ca viśeṣa lakṣaṇa prasaṅge yathāśrutam eva tat vyākhyeyam iti atibhāraḥ

original: evaṃ vimarśapadena vijātiyavyavacchedakāriṇi sāmānyalakṣaṇe varṇite samānadharmopapatteḥ ity ekam eva padaṃ sajātīyasaṃśayāntaravyavacchedakāri viśeṣalakṣaṇakṣamaṃ bhavatīti tatrāpi padatrayajojanaṃ nopāyujyata iti //
analyzed: evam vimarśa padena vijātiya vyavaccheda kāriṇi sāmānya lakṣaṇe varṇite samāna dharma upapatteḥ iti ekam eva padam sajātīya saṃśaya antara vyavaccheda kāri viśeṣa lakṣaṇa kṣamam bhavati iti tatra api pada traya jojanam na upāyujyate iti

original: atra vyākhyānadvaye 'pi kataras sādhv iti tadvidaḥ pramāṇam //
analyzed: atra vyākhyāna dvaye pi kataraḥ sādhu iti tad vidaḥ pramāṇam

original: anekadharmopapatteh ity atrāpi tripadaparigrahaṇenaina lakṣaṇam ācāryā varṇayanti /
analyzed: aneka dharma upapattyā iha iti atra api lakṣaṇam ācāryāḥ varṇayanti

original: anekadharmopapatteḥ upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāto viśeṣāpekṣa ity asādhāraṇadharmagrahaṇāt viśeṣagrahaṇāt viśeṣasmṛteś ca saṃśaya ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: aneka dharma upapatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ viśeṣa apekṣaḥ iti asādhāraṇa dharma grahaṇāt viśeṣa grahaṇāt viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: ekaikapadopādānaphalaṃ ca pūrvavad atrāpi darśayitavyam /
analyzed: ekaika pada upādāna phalam ca pūrvavat atra api darśayitavyam

original: na cendriyamanaśaṃyogādikāraṇāntaraparigaṇanacodanaṃ yuktam teṣāṃ sarvabuddhijanmasutulyatvāt /
analyzed: na ca indriya manaḥ śaṃyoga ādi kāraṇa antara parigaṇana codanam yuktam teṣām sarva buddhi janma su tulya tvāt

original: ihāsādhāraṇasaṃśayajñānakāraṇopadeśaprastāvād iti //
analyzed: iha asādhāraṇa saṃśaya jñāna kāraṇa upadeśa prastāvāt iti

original: anye tu sāmānyalakṣaṇasampādite vijātīyavyavacchede kevalasajatīyavyavacchinnalakṣaṇapradhitapādananipuṇam anekadharmopapattipadam eva pūrvavad varṇayācakruḥ //
analyzed: anye tu sāmānya lakṣaṇa sampādite vijātīya vyavacchede kevala sajatīya vyavacchinna lakṣaṇa pradhita pādana nipuṇam aneka dharma upapatti padam eva pūrvavat varṇayācakruḥ

original: nanu anekadharmaśabdena katham asādhāraṇo dharma ucyate evam ucyate samānajātīyam asamānajātīyaṃ cānekam /
analyzed: nanu aneka dharma śabdena katham asādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ ucyate evam ucyate samāna jātīyam asamāna jātīyam ca anekam

original: tasmāt parāvṛtto dharmaḥ anekadharma iti //
analyzed: tasmāt parāvṛttaḥ dharmaḥ aneka dharmaḥ iti

original: yad vā kim anayā kliṣṭakalpanayā asty ayam ekaśabdaḥ samānaparyāyaḥ /
analyzed: yat vā kim anayā kliṣṭa kalpanayā asti ayam eka śabdaḥ samāna paryāyaḥ

original: tatra spaṣṭa eva nañsamāsenāsamānadharmaḥ anekadharmaḥ sādhāraṇadharma ucyate eveti //
analyzed: tatra spaṣṭaḥ eva nañ samāsena asamāna dharmaḥ aneka dharmaḥ sādhāraṇa dharmaḥ ucyate eva iti

original: bhavatv evam asādhāraṇadharmasya tu kathaṃ saṃśayakāraṇatvam iti cintyam /
analyzed: bhavatu evam asādhāraṇa dharmasya tu katham saṃśaya kāraṇa tvam iti cintyam

original: viruddhaviśeṣānusmaraṇakāraṇakaṃ hi saṃśayam āhuḥ /
analyzed: viruddha viśeṣa anusmaraṇa kāraṇakam hi saṃśayam āhuḥ

original: viśeṣāṇāṃ ca smaraṇahetoḥ saṃskārasya tadudbodhakaṃ bhavati yena sahaite pūrvaṃ paryāyeṇopalabdhāḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣāṇām ca smaraṇa hetoḥ saṃskārasya tat udbodhakam bhavati yena saha ete pūrvam paryāyeṇa upalabdhāḥ

original: asādhāraṇadharmasya tu asādhāraṇadharmatvād eva na kenacit saha pūrvaṃ grahaṇam abhavat /
analyzed: asādhāraṇa dharmasya tu asādhāraṇa dharma tvāt eva na kenacid saha pūrvam grahaṇam abhavat

original: bhāve tu asādhāraṇadharmataiva hīyetety ataḥ katham asau tatsmṛtihetuḥ /
analyzed: bhāve tu asādhāraṇa dharma tā eva hīyeta iti atas katham asau tad smṛti hetuḥ

original: vyāvṛttatayaiva tu smṛtihetutve 'sya tailokyasmaraṇanimittatā prasajyeta tato 'pi vyāvṛttatvād iti //
analyzed: vyāvṛtta tayā eva tu smṛti hetu tve tailokya smaraṇa nimitta tā prasajyeta vyāvṛtta tvāt iti

original: naiṣa doṣaḥ prakārāntareṇāsya smṛtihetutvāt /
analyzed: na eṣa doṣaḥ prakāra antareṇa asya smṛti hetu tvāt

original: iha hi keṣucit keṣucit asādhāraṇadharmā dharmiṣu bhavantaḥ tadgatasādhāraṇadharmāntarasahacaritā bhavanti /
analyzed: iha hi keṣucid keṣucid asādhāraṇa dharmāḥ dharmiṣu bhavantaḥ tad gata sādhāraṇa dharma antara sahacaritāḥ bhavanti

original: tad yathā pṛthivītvagandhatvādayo dharmāḥ pṛthivyām asādhāraṇās santaḥ snehavattvādidharmāś ca tathaivāpsu dravyatvasahacāriṇo dṛṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā pṛthivī tva gandha tva ādayaḥ dharmāḥ pṛthivyām asādhāraṇāḥ santaḥ snehavat tva ādi dharmāḥ ca tathā eva apsu dravya tva sahacāriṇaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ

original: rūpādiṣu rūpatvādidharmāḥ guṇatvasahacāriṇaḥ utkṣepaṇādiṣu utkṣepaṇatvādidharmāḥ karmatvasahacāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: rūpa ādiṣu rūpa tva ādi dharmāḥ guṇa tva sahacāriṇaḥ utkṣepaṇa ādiṣu utkṣepaṇa tva ādi dharmāḥ karma tva sahacāriṇaḥ

original: evaṃ prakṛte 'pi dharmiṇi kaimiścid asādhāraṇo dharma upalabyamānaḥ kenāpi sādhāraṇadharmam antareṇa sahacarito bhavatīti bhavati viśeṣānusmṛtidvāreṇa saṃśayasādhanam //
analyzed: evam prakṛte dharmiṇi kaimiścid asādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ upalabyamānaḥ kena api sādhāraṇa dharmam antareṇa sahacaritaḥ bhavati iti bhavati viśeṣa anusmṛti dvāreṇa saṃśaya sādhanam

original: nanu evaṃ tarhi vyāvṛttatvād eva samānadharmādeṣu saṃśayaḥ nānekadharmād iti maivam anekadharma evāsau tena vartmanā viśeṣān smārayan saṃśayajanmane kalpate /
analyzed: nanu evam tarhi vyāvṛtta tvāt eva samāna dharmāt eṣu saṃśayaḥ na aneka dharmāt iti mā evam aneka dharmaḥ eva asau tena vartmanā viśeṣān smārayan saṃśaya janmane kalpate

original: asati hi tasmin kim ālambanaṃ vyāvṛttatvaṃ syād ity alam atisūkṣmekṣikayā //
analyzed: asati hi tasmin kim ālambanam vyāvṛtta tvam syāt iti alam ati sūkṣma īkṣikayā

original: tasyodāharaṇaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitaṃ  śabde vibhāgajatvam /
analyzed: tasya udāharaṇam bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitam śabde vibhāga ja tvam

original: yathā hi pṛthivyādau pṛthivītvādiḥ vyāvṛtto dharmaḥ dravyatvādyanugatadharmasahacarī dṛṣṭaḥ evaṃ śabde vibhāgajatvaṃ dharmaḥ kenacit dravyatvādīnām anyatamena dharmeṇa sahacaritaḥ syād iti saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: yathā hi pṛthivī ādau pṛthivī tva ādiḥ vyāvṛttaḥ dharmaḥ dravya tva ādi anugata dharma sahacarī dṛṣṭaḥ evam śabde vibhāga ja tvam dharmaḥ kenacid dravya tva ādīnām anyatamena dharmeṇa sahacaritaḥ syāt iti saṃśayaḥ

original: nanu vibhāgajatvam asādhāraṇo na bhavaty eva śabdadharmaḥ vibhāgajavibhāge 'pi bhāvāt /
analyzed: nanu vibhāga ja tvam asādhāraṇaḥ na bhavati eva śabda dharmaḥ vibhāga ja vibhāge pi bhāvāt

original: tathā ca prayogah guṇaḥ śabdaḥ vibhāgajatvāt vibhāgajavibhāgavat iti tatra kecid āhuḥ satyam asti vibhāge 'pi vibhāgajatvam /
analyzed: tathā ca prayoga h guṇaḥ śabdaḥ vibhāga ja tvāt vibhāga ja vibhāgavat iti tatra kecid āhuḥ satyam asti vibhāge pi vibhāga ja tvam

original: śabde tu viśeṣo vivakṣitaḥ //
analyzed: śabde tu viśeṣaḥ vivakṣitaḥ

original: dvividho hi vibhāgajo vibhāgaḥ kāraṇavibhāgapūrvakaḥ kāraṇākāraṇavibhāgapūrvakaś ca /
analyzed: dvividhaḥ hi vibhāga jaḥ vibhāgaḥ kāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ kāraṇa akāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ ca

original: kāraṇaṃ samavāyikāraṇam atrābhipretam /
analyzed: kāraṇam samavāyi kāraṇam atra abhipretam

original: kāraṇavibhāgapūrvakas tāvat tantuvibhāgāt tantvākāśavibhāgaḥ //
analyzed: kāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ tāvat tantu vibhāgāt tantu ākāśa vibhāgaḥ

original: kāraṇākāraṇavibhāgapūrvakas tu aṅgulyākāśavibhāgāt hastākāśavibhāgaḥ hastākāśavibhāgād api śarīrākāśavibhāga iti //
analyzed: kāraṇa akāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ tu aṅguli ākāśa vibhāgāt hasta ākāśa vibhāgaḥ hasta ākāśa vibhāgāt api śarīra ākāśa vibhāgaḥ iti

original: śabdas tu niyamenaiva kāraṇavibhāgapūrvakavibhāgaprabhavaḥ vaṃśadalavibhāgāt dalākāśavibhātaḥ dalākāśavibhāgāc cāsamavāyikāraṇāt śabdo niṣpadyata ity anena viśeṣeṇāsyedṛśavibhāgajatvasyāsādhāraṇatvaṃ śabdadharmasyocyata iti //
analyzed: śabdaḥ tu niyamena eva kāraṇa vibhāga pūrvaka vibhāga prabhavaḥ vaṃśa dala vibhāgāt dala ākāśa vibhātaḥ dala ākāśa vibhāgāt ca asamavāyi kāraṇāt śabdaḥ niṣpadyate iti anena viśeṣeṇa asya īdṛśa vibhāga ja tvasya asādhāraṇa tvam śabda dharmasya ucyate iti

original: anye tu vibhāgajaṃ vibhāgam amṛṣyamāṇāḥ yathāśrutasyaiva śabde vibhāgajatvasyāsādhāraṇadharmatām ācakṣate //
analyzed: anye tu vibhāga jam vibhāgam amṛṣyamāṇāḥ yathāśrutasya eva śabde vibhāga ja tvasya asādhāraṇa dharma tām ācakṣate

original: nanu kim iti vibhāgajaṃ vibhāgaṃ te na mṛṣyante asti hy ayaṃ tatsiddhau nyāyaḥ yadā hy avayave karmotpannaṃ avayavāntarād vibhāgaṃ karoti na tadākāśādideśāt yadā tv ākāśādideśāt na tadā 'ayavāntarād iti sthitiḥ //
analyzed: nanu kim iti vibhāga jam vibhāgam te na mṛṣyante asti hi ayam tad siddhau nyāyaḥ yadā hi avayave karma utpannam avayava antarāt vibhāgam karoti na tadā ākāśa ādi deśāt yadā tu ākāśa ādi deśāt na tadā ayava antarāt iti sthitiḥ

original: kiṃ kṛtā punar ayaṃ sthitir asti cet ucyate yā hy avayavakriyānabhobhāgavibhāgakāriṇī nāsau dravyārambhakasaṃyogapratipakṣabhūtaṃ vibhāgam ārabhamāṇā dṛśyate dinakarakiraṇaparāmarśopajanitakam aladalavikāsakārikriyāvat /
analyzed: kim kṛtā punar ayam sthitiḥ asti ced ucyate yā hi avayava kriyā nabhaḥ bhāga vibhāga kāriṇī na asau dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratipakṣa bhūtam vibhāgam ārabhamāṇā dṛśyate dinakara kiraṇa parāmarśa upajanitakam ala dala vikāsa kāri kriyā vat

original: tad eva katham iti cet kamalasya mukulavikāsadaśayoḥ pratyabhijñāyamānatvenāvināśaniścayāt //
analyzed: tat eva katham iti ced kamalasya mukula vikāsa daśayoḥ pratyabhijñāyamāna tvena avināśa niścayāt

original: iyaṃ tu pāṭyamānavaṃśalakriyā dravyārambhakasaṃyogapratidvandvibhūtavibhāgārambhikā dravyānāraṃbhika saṃyogapratidvaṃddvivibhāgajanikopalabhyate iti nāsau nabhao vibhāgam ārabhetety ata eṣā sthitir astīti vibhāgajavibhāgakalpanā krityate //
analyzed: iyam tu pāṭyamāna vaṃśala kriyā dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratidvandvi bhūta vibhāga ārambhikā dravya anāraṃbhika saṃyoga pratidvaṃddvi vibhāga janikā upalabhyate iti na asau nabhaḥ vibhāgam ārabheta iti atas eṣā sthitiḥ asti iti vibhāga ja vibhāga kalpanā krityate

original: saṃyogāntaṃ karmeti tāvat sthitam /
analyzed: saṃyoga antam karma iti tāvat sthitam

original: anyathā hi tasya kālāntarasthāyitvaṃ nityadravyasamavetasya ca nityatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: anyathā hi tasya kāla antara sthāyi tvam nitya dravya samavetasya ca nitya tvam syāt

original: tasmāt karmaṇo ' cirajīvitatvāt tadvināśakena saṃyogena bhavitavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt karmaṇaḥ cira jīvita tvāt tad vināśakena saṃyogena bhavitavyam

original: uttaras tu saṃyogaḥ pūrvasaṃyogoparame sati jāyate nānyathā /
analyzed: uttaraḥ tu saṃyogaḥ pūrva saṃyoga uparame sati jāyate na anyathā

original: na ca vibhāgavyatiriktaḥ kaścana saṃyogasya hantā samasti //
analyzed: na ca vibhāga vyatiriktaḥ kaścana saṃyogasya hantā samasti

original: karma tūttarasaṃyogajanmanirjātakauśalam /
analyzed: karma tu uttara saṃyoga janma nirjāta kauśalam

original: na hi prāktanasaṃyogavināśāya prakalpate //
analyzed: na hi prāktana saṃyoga vināśāya prakalpate

original: tasmāt vibhāgenaiva saṃyogavirodhinā bhavitavyam //
analyzed: tasmāt vibhāgena eva saṃyoga virodhinā bhavitavyam

original: yad adhikaraṇo vibhāgaḥ tadadhikaraṇam eva saṃyogam upaśamayati na tv aṅgulivibhāgaḥ kuṇḍavadarasaṃyogopamardāya prabhavatīty ataḥ na vaṃśadalavṛttivibhātaḥ dalākāśasaṃyogam upahantum alam iti nūnaṃ dalākāśasaṃyogavairiṇā dalākāśavibhāgena bhavitavyam //
analyzed: yad adhikaraṇaḥ vibhāgaḥ tad adhikaraṇam eva saṃyogam upaśamayati na tu aṅguli vibhāgaḥ kuṇḍa vadara saṃyoga upamardāya prabhavati iti atas na vaṃśa dala vṛtti vibhātaḥ dala ākāśa saṃyogam upahantum alam iti nūnam dala ākāśa saṃyoga vairiṇā dala ākāśa vibhāgena bhavitavyam

original: tad idānīṃ tasyotpattikāraṇacintāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ vaṃśadalavibhāgamātropajanane caritārthatvāt taṃ nirmāya vibhāgāntaranirmāṇe viramya vyāpārāsaṃvedanāt avaśyaṃ vaṃśadalavibhāta eva prtyāsannatayā dalākāśavibhātārambhako 'bhyupagamanīyaḥ /
analyzed: tat idānīm tasya utpatti kāraṇa cintāyām kriyāyām vaṃśa dala vibhāga mātra upajanane caritārtha tvāt tam nirmāya vibhāga antara nirmāṇe viramya vyāpāra asaṃvedanāt avaśyam vaṃśa dala vibhātaḥ eva prtyāsanna tayā dala ākāśa vibhāta ārambhakaḥ bhyupagamanīyaḥ

original: evam anabhyupagame karmanityatvaprasaṅgād iti //
analyzed: evam anabhyupagame karma nitya tva prasaṅgāt iti

original: atra vadanti /
analyzed: atra vadanti

original: na karmanityatvaṃ anabhyupagamyamāne 'pi vibhāgaje vibhāge bhaviṣyati uttarayogasya karmavināśahetor astitvāt /
analyzed: na karma nitya tvam an abhyupagamyamāne vibhāga je vibhāge bhaviṣyati uttara yogasya karma vināśa hetoḥ astitvāt

original: pūrvasaṃyogānuparame kathaṃ tadutpāda iti cet bāḍham uparata eva pūrvasaṃyogaḥ /
analyzed: pūrva saṃyoga anuparame katham tad utpādaḥ iti ced bāḍham uparataḥ eva pūrva saṃyogaḥ

original: kas tasyoparamahetur iti cet karma hy uttarasaṃyoganimittaṃ yad upeyate /
analyzed: kaḥ tasya uparama hetuḥ iti ced karma hi uttara saṃyoga nimittam yat upeyate

original: tad eva pūrvasaṃyogadhvaṃsakāri bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: tat eva pūrva saṃyoga dhvaṃsa kāri bhaviṣyati

original: na yajjanane śaktam aśaktaṃ tadvināśane /
analyzed: na yad janane śaktam aśaktam tad vināśane

original: hetur dahanasaṃyogaḥ pākajotpādanāśayoḥ //
analyzed: hetuḥ dahana saṃyogaḥ pāka ja utpāda nāśayoḥ

original: yathā ca vibhāve 'dhikaraṇaniyamaḥ yadādhāro vibhāgaḥ tadādharam eva saṃyogaṃ niruṇaddhi tathā karmaṇy api niyamaḥ /
analyzed: yathā ca vibhāve adhikaraṇa niyamaḥ yad ādhāraḥ vibhāgaḥ tad ādharam eva saṃyogam niruṇaddhi tathā karmaṇi api niyamaḥ

original: karmāpi svāśrayasya yad anya diksaṃyoganibandhanaṃ tat tadviruddhadigvṛtteḥ saṃyogasyopamardakam iti nātiprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: karma api sva āśrayasya yat anya diś saṃyoga nibandhanam tat tad viruddha diś vṛtteḥ saṃyogasya upamardakam iti na atiprasaṅgaḥ

original: evaṃ karmāviṣṭasyottarasaṃyogadarśanam adūṣaṇaṃ vigantarasaṃyogasya tenopamardanāt //
analyzed: evam karma āviṣṭasya uttara saṃyoga darśanam adūṣaṇam viś antara saṃyogasya tena upamardanāt

original: api ca yad eva karma vaṃśadalanavibhāgakāri kathyate tad eva dalākāśavibhāgakāri bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: api ca yat eva karma vaṃśa dalana vibhāga kāri kathyate tat eva dala ākāśa vibhāga kāri bhaviṣyati

original: ko doṣaḥ nanu vyomavibhāgakāri karma na dravyārambhakasaṃyogapratyanīkabhūtavibhārambhakaṃ ambhoruhakarmavat ity uktam satyam uktam ayuktaṃ tu śatapatrapatrakarmaṇo 'pi dravyārambhakasaṃyogapratikūlavibhāgārambhakatvāt /
analyzed: kaḥ doṣaḥ nanu vyoma vibhāga kāri karma na dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratyanīka bhūta vibhā ārambhakam ambhoruha karma vat iti uktam satyam uktam ayuktam tu dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratikūla vibhāga ārambhaka tvāt

original: tac ca karma kuṅmalakamalāt vikacakamalasyānyatvaniścayāniścitam //
analyzed: tat ca karma kuṅmala kamalāt vikaca kamalasya anya tva niścaya aniścitam

original: nanu tad evedam aravindam iti saṃdehaviparyayarahitatāmarasapratyabhijñādarśanāt kathaṃ saṃkocavikāsadaśāmātrabhedāt tadanyatvam iti kṛtam anayā durā śayā /
analyzed: nanu tat evā idam aravindam iti saṃdeha viparyaya rahita tāmarasa pratyabhijñā darśanāt katham saṃkoca vikāsa daśā mātra bhedāt tad anya tvam iti kṛtam anayā durā śayā

original: śarīre 'pi suspaṣṭopalabhyamānaśaiśavayauvanavārdhakādidaśābhedabhinnasvarūpe pratyabhijñānadarśanāt /
analyzed: śarīre pi su spaṣṭa upalabhyamāna śaiśava yauvana vārdhaka ādi daśā bheda bhinna svarūpe pratyabhijñāna darśanāt

original: na ca śarīrakuśeśayayoḥ viśeṣaleśam atikṛśam api paśyāma iti kutas tad ekatvam //
analyzed: na ca śarīra kuśeśayayoḥ viśeṣa leśam ati kṛśam api paśyāmaḥ iti kutas tat ekatvam

original: bhavatu vā puṇḍarikasyāvināśaḥ nidarśanamātram idaṃ tu varṇitam na tu pratibaddhaḥ kaścana hetur astīty abhyadhāyi yena vaṃśadalakarmaṇaḥ kokanadapallavakarmasāmyaṃ kalpyeta /
analyzed: bhavatu vā puṇḍarikasya avināśaḥ nidarśana mātram idam tu varṇitam na tu pratibaddhaḥ kaścana hetuḥ asti iti abhyadhāyi yena vaṃśa dala karmaṇaḥ kokanada pallava karma sāmyam kalpyeta

original: kriyātvaṃ tv aprayojakam eva tatkarmaṇām vicitrakāryahetutvāt //
analyzed: kriyā tvam tu aprayojakam eva tad karmaṇām vicitra kārya hetu tvāt

original: yadi vā nānyo vaṃśadalavibhāgaḥ nānyaś ca tatkāryo dalākāśavibhāgaḥ /
analyzed: yadi vā na anyaḥ vaṃśa dala vibhāgaḥ na anyaḥ ca tad kāryaḥ dala ākāśa vibhāgaḥ

original: kintu eka eva vibhāgo 'yaṃ bhedo 'syāśrayabhedataḥ /
analyzed: kintu ekaḥ eva vibhāgaḥ yam sya āśraya bhedataḥ

original: ekatra deśe 'vasthānāt vyomno vaṃśadalasya ca //
analyzed: ekatra deśe vyomnaḥ vaṃśa dalasya ca

original: samānadeśe vṛttitvaṃ mūrtānāṃ hi viruddhyate /
analyzed: samāna deśe vṛtti tvam mūrtānām hi

original: vyomnas sarvagatatvāt tu vidyate tatra sannidhiḥ //
analyzed: vyomnaḥ sarva gata tvāt tu vidyate tatra sannidhiḥ

original: ekadeśāśrayatve tu yad ekasmād vibhāgakṛt /
analyzed: eka deśa āśraya tve tu yat ekasmāt vibhāga kṛt

original: tad evānyata ity asti na vibhāgo vibhāgajaḥ //
analyzed: tat eva anyatas iti asti na vibhāgaḥ vibhāga jaḥ

original: apare punaḥ vibhāgajavibhāgaparākaraṇopārūḍharabhasāḥ saṃgirnte tiṣṭatu tāvat dūrata eva vibhāgajo vibhāgaḥ /
analyzed: apare punar vibhāga ja vibhāga parākaraṇa upārūḍha rabhasāḥ saṃgirnte tiṣṭatu tāvat dūratas eva vibhāga jaḥ vibhāgaḥ

original: karmajo 'pi na vibhāgo nāma kaścid asti /
analyzed: karma jaḥ pi na vibhāgaḥ nāma kaścid asti

original: saṃyogavirodhini tasminn abhyupagamyamāne mudagarādivat pūrvasiddhatā 'vaśyaṃ bhāvinī /
analyzed: saṃyoga virodhini tasmin abhyupagamyamāne muda gara ādi vat pūrva siddha tā vaśyam bhāvinī

original: tataś ca pūrvasiddho vibhāgaḥ saṃyogam unmūlayatīti ghaṭamudgarayor iva saṃyogavibhāgayor ekatra yugapadupalabdhir bhavet /
analyzed: tatas ca pūrva siddhaḥ vibhāgaḥ saṃyogam unmūlayati iti ghaṭa mudgarayoḥ iva saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ ekatra yugapad upalabdhiḥ bhavet

original: na caivam asti /
analyzed: na ca evam asti

original: tasmāt saṃyogābhāvaviṣaya eva bibhaktaprtyaya iti na vibhāgālambanatāṃ pratipadyate //
analyzed: tasmāt saṃyoga abhāva viṣayaḥ eva iti na vibhāga ālambana tām pratipadyate

original: saty api vibhāge tasmin kṣaṇe saṃyogasyāvināśāt na bhavati vibhaktapratibhāsaḥ /
analyzed: sati api vibhāge tasmin kṣaṇe saṃyogasya avināśāt na bhavati vibhakta pratibhāsaḥ

original: kṣaṇāntare ca saṃyogavināśe sati bhavatīty anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ saṃyogābhāvaviṣaya evāvasīyate ity ato na pratyakṣagamyatā vibhāgasya /
analyzed: kṣaṇa antare ca saṃyoga vināśe sati bhavati iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām saṃyoga abhāva viṣayaḥ eva avasīyate iti atas na pratyakṣa gamya tā vibhāgasya

original: saṃyogabhaṅgaliṅgena ca tatparikalpanakriyeva taṃ hinastīti purastād upapāditam //
analyzed: saṃyoga bhaṅga liṅgena ca tad parikalpana kriyā iva tam hinasti iti purastāt upapāditam

original: kathaṃ tarhi vibhāgajatvaṃ śabdasya bhāṣyakāra udāhṛtavān ucyate trividhaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāryotpatti pratividhatte samayāyikāraṇaṃ asamavāyikāraṇaṃ nimittakāraṇaṃ ceti /
analyzed: katham tarhi vibhāga ja tvam śabdasya bhāṣyakāraḥ udāhṛtavān ucyate trividham kāraṇam kārya utpatti pratividhatte samayāyi kāraṇam asamavāyi kāraṇam nimitta kāraṇam ca iti

original: tatra samavāyikāraṇaṃ tad ucayte yatrāśritaṃ kāryam upalabhyate yathā paṭasya tantavaḥ //
analyzed: tatra samavāyi kāraṇam tat ucayate yatra āśritam kāryam upalabhyate yathā paṭasya tantavaḥ

original: asamavāyikāraṇaṃ tu dvividham kāryaikārthasamavāyalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā pratyāsannaṃ kāraṇaikārthasamavāyalakṣaṇayā vā saṃbaddham /
analyzed: asamavāyi kāraṇam tu dvividham kārya eka artha samavāya lakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā pratyāsannam kāraṇa eka artha samavāya lakṣaṇayā vā saṃbaddham

original: tatra kāryaikārthasamavāyena pratyāsannaṃ yathā paṭasya tantusaṃyogaḥ /
analyzed: tatra kārya eka artha samavāyena pratyāsannam yathā paṭasya tantu saṃyogaḥ

original: kāraṇaikārthasamavāyena tu pratyāsannaṃ yathā paṭarūpasya tanturūpam iti //
analyzed: kāraṇa eka artha samavāyena tu pratyāsannam yathā paṭa rūpasya tantu rūpam iti

original: avadhṛtakāranaṃ ca tadasamavāyikāraṇam āśrayaṇīyaṃ ato buddhijanmani saty apy ekārtham amavāye nānyeṣām ātmaguṇānām icchādīnām asamavāyikāraṇatvaṃ api tv avadhṛtasāmarthyasyātmamanaśaṃyogasyaiveti //
analyzed: avadhṛta kāranam ca tat asamavāyi kāraṇam āśrayaṇīyam atas buddhi janmani sati api ekārtham amavāye na anyeṣām ātma guṇānām icchā ādīnām asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam api tu avadhṛta sāmarthyasya ātma mana śam yogasya eva iti

original: samavāyasamavāyivyatiriktaṃ tu kāryotpattau nirjñātasāmarthyaṃ yat kāraṇaṃ tat nimittakāraṇam ucyata iti //
analyzed: samavāya samavāyi vyatiriktam tu kārya utpattau nirjñāta sāmarthyam yat kāraṇam tat nimitta kāraṇam ucyate iti

original: evaṃ sthite śabdasya nityatve niraste kārtyatve ca sādhite tadutpattau ākāśaṃ tāvat samavāyikāraṇam /
analyzed: evam sthite śabdasya nitya tve niraste kārtya tve ca sādhite tad utpattau ākāśam tāvat samavāyikāraṇam

original: nimittakāraṇāni tu bhūyāṃsi santy eva /
analyzed: nimitta kāraṇāni tu bhūyāṃsi santi eva

original: asamavāyikāraṇaṃ tu cintyam /
analyzed: asamavāyi kāraṇam tu cintyam

original: tac cākāśāśritam avaśyam /
analyzed: tat ca ākāśa āśritam avaśyam

original: anyathā pratyāsattyabhāvāt /
analyzed: anyathā pratyāsatti abhāvāt

original: tadguāṇntarāṇāṃ ca vibhūtvādīnāṃ anavadhṛtaśaktitvāt vaṃśadalapāṭanasamanantaraṃ ca śabdotpādadarśanāt evaṃ manyāmahe //
analyzed: ca vibhūti ādīnām anavadhṛta śakti tvāt vaṃśa dala pāṭana samanantaram ca śabda utpāda darśanāt evam manyāmahe

original: kriyā yadaiva saṃyogaṃ hanti vaṃśadalāśritam /
analyzed: kriyā yadā eva saṃyogam hanti vaṃśa dala āśritam

original: tadaiva gagate kaṃcana karoty atiśayaṃ ghruvam //
analyzed: tadā eva gagate kaṃcana karoti atiśayam ghruvam

original: ākāśātiśayo yaś ca kriyājaḥ śabdakāraṇam /
analyzed: ākāśa atiśayaḥ yaḥ ca kriyā jaḥ śabda kāraṇam

original: asau vibhāganāmeti śabde tajjanyatocyate //
analyzed: asau vibhāga nāmā iti śabde tad janya tā ucyate

original: tad evam etat yathāgamamācāryamatam abhihitam asmābhiḥ //
analyzed: tat evam etat yathāgamam ācārya matam abhihitam asmābhiḥ

original: etac ca matimadbhivicāraṇīyam kim ākāśātiśayamātraṃ kiṃcit asamavāyikāraṇam uta yathā mudgaradaṇḍasaṃyogakāryaṃ śabde bherīgaganasaṃyogasyāsamavāyikāraṇatvam evaṃ vaṃśadalavibhāgakārye tasmin dalagaganavibhāgasyeti /
analyzed: etat ca matimadbhiḥ vicāraṇīyam kim ākāśa atiśaya mātram kiṃcid asamavāyi kāraṇam uta yathā mudgara daṇḍa saṃyoga kāryam śabde bherī gagana saṃyogasya asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam evam vaṃśa dala vibhāga kārye tasmin dala gagana vibhāgasya iti

original: dalākāśavibhāto 'pi kiṃ dalavibhāgajaḥ uta karmaja eveti //
analyzed: kim dala vibhāga jaḥ uta karma jaḥ eva iti

original: sarvathā kaścid asādharaṇo dharmaḥ saṃśayahetur udāhartavya itīyatā na prayojanam //
analyzed: sarvathā kaścid asādharaṇaḥ dharmaḥ saṃśaya hetuḥ udāhartavyaḥ iti iyatā na prayojanam

original: viruddhā pratipattiḥ vipratipattiḥ /
analyzed: viruddhā pratipattiḥ vipratipattiḥ

original: asty ātmety eke nāsty ātmety apre /
analyzed: asti ātmā iti eke na asti ātmā iti apre

original: seyaṃ vipratipattir upalabhyamānā viśeṣasmaraṇadvāreṇa saṃśayam āvahati /
analyzed: sā iyam vipratipattiḥ upalabhyamānā viśeṣa smaraṇa dvāreṇa saṃśayam āvahati

original: na ceha kaścid anugato vyāvṛtto vā dharmaḥ saṃśayakāraṇaṃ api tu vipratipattir eveti /
analyzed: na ca iha kaścid anugataḥ vyāvṛttaḥ vā dharmaḥ saṃśaya kāraṇam api tu vipratipattiḥ eva iti

original: kiṃ tatrāpi tripadaparigraheṇa lakṣaṇavarṇanam ekenaiva vā padeneti pūrvavad ācāryadvayamatam anusaraṇīyam //
analyzed: kim tatra api tri pada parigraheṇa lakṣaṇa varṇanam ekena eva vā padena iti pūrvavat ācārya dvaya matam anusaraṇīyam

original: upalabdhyavyavasthātaḥ lhalvavapi bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: upalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ bhavati saṃśayaḥ

original: sac codakam upalabhyate yathā hradādiṣu /
analyzed: sat ca udakam upalabhyate yathā hrada ādiṣu

original: kvacid asac ca bhāskarakarnikarapratiphalanataralitāsu maruthālīṣu /
analyzed: kvacid asat ca bhāskara karnikara pratiphalana taralitāsu maru thālīṣu

original: tad evam upalabdhekhyavasthitatvāt kvacid upalabhyamāne bhavati saṃśayaḥ kim idaṃ sad upalabhyate kim asad iti //
analyzed: tat evam kvacid upalabhyamāne bhavati saṃśayaḥ kim idam sat upalabhyate kim asat iti

original: anupalabdhyavyavasthātaś ca bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ ca bhavati saṃśayaḥ

original: kiṃcid asad eva nopalabhyate nabhaḥsamādi /
analyzed: kiṃcid asat eva nā upalabhyate nabhaḥ sama ādi

original: kiṃcitsad api nopalabhyate mṛdantaritaśaṅkumūlajalādi /
analyzed: kiṃcid sat api nā upalabhyate mṛd antarita śaṅku mūla jala ādi

original: tadanyatrānupalabhyamāne saṃśete pumān kim idam asad eva nopalabhyete uta sad iti //
analyzed: tad anyatra anupalabhyamāne saṃśete pumān kim idam asat eva na upalabhyete uta sat iti

original: avyavasthaśabdenātra pūrvaṃ paryeyeṇa pravṛttasadasadāśritaviśeṣādarśanaṃ sūcitam idānīṃ punaḥ arthakriyāsamarthatādiviśeṣadarśanaśūnyacetasāṃ upalabdhyanupalabdhimātropapatteḥ saṃśayo bhavatīti varṇyate /
analyzed: avyavastha śabdena atra pūrvam paryeyeṇa pravṛtta sat asat āśrita viśeṣa adarśanam sūcitam idānīm punar arthakriyā samartha tā ādi viśeṣa darśana śūnya cetasām upalabdhi anupalabdhi mātra upapatteḥ saṃśayaḥ bhavati iti varṇyate

original: na caivaṃ sati sarvatrānāśvāsa iti śaṅkanīyam yathānubhavaṃ saṃśayābhyupagamāt /
analyzed: na ca evam sati sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ iti śaṅkanīyam yathānubhavam saṃśaya abhyupagamāt

original: sarvatra ca tadutpādakaviśeṣāgrahaṇatatsmaraṇādikāraṇasānidhyāsaṃbhavād iti /
analyzed: sarvatra ca tad utpādaka viśeṣa agrahaṇa tad smaraṇa ādi kāraṇa sānidhya asaṃbhavāt iti

original: atrāpi padatrayeṇa ekena vā padena lakṣaṇopapādanaṃ pūrvavaddraṣṭavyam //
analyzed: atra api pada trayeṇa ekena vā padena lakṣaṇa upapādanam pūrvavat draṣṭavyam

original: nanu ca upalabdhyanupalabdhī sadasatoḥ samāna eva dharma iti pūveṇa gatārthatvam naitat pūrvanirdiṣṭasyordhvatvāder dharmasya jñeyasthatvāt upalabdhyanupalabdhyīś ca jñātṛsthatvāt //
analyzed: nanu ca upalabdhi anupalabdhī sat asatoḥ samānaḥ eva dharmaḥ iti pūveṇa gatārtha tvam na etat pūrva nirdiṣṭasya ūrdhva tva ādeḥ dharmasya jñeya stha tvāt upalabdhi anupalabdhyīḥ ca jñātṛ stha tvāt

original: ata eva ca mānasam imaṃ saṃśayam ācakṣate na bāhyadharmisaṃbaddhasādhāraṇordhvatādidharmādhigamādhīnasaṃśayavat bāhyendriyajam //
analyzed: atas eva ca mānasam imam saṃśayam ācakṣate na bāhya dharmi saṃbaddha sādhāraṇa ūrdhva tā ādi dharma adhigama adhīna saṃśaya vat bāhya indriya jam

original: nanu ca upalabdhitvaṃ anupalabdhitvaṃ vā 'tra saṃśayakāraṇam /
analyzed: nanu ca upalabdhi tvam anupalabdhi tvam vā saṃśaya kāraṇam

original: tad dhi na jñātari vartate kuntu buddhāv iti katham ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ satyam evam asamānadharmo 'py upalabdhitādikaḥ yadāśritaḥ tad dhi boddhati vartate /
analyzed: tat hi na jñātari vartate kuntu buddhau iti katham ayam viśeṣaḥ satyam evam asamāna dharmaḥ upi upalabdhi tā ādikaḥ yad āśritaḥ tat hi boddhati vartate

original: ato viśeṣāt pṛthag eva kathyate /
analyzed: atas viśeṣāt pṛthak eva kathyate

original: yathā hy asādhāraṇatāśrayaḥ evaṃ  prakāram eva ca viśeṣam āśritya kiṃcit paṃcavidhatvaṃ vipaṃcyate //
analyzed: yathā hi asādhāraṇa tā āśrayaḥ evam prakāram eva ca viśeṣam āśritya kiṃcid paṃcavidha tvam vipaṃcyate

original: paramārtatas tu sarvatrānugatasaṃbandho duṣpariharaḥ viśeṣasmaraṇajanyatvāt saṃśayasya /
analyzed: parama ārtataḥ tu sarvatra anugata saṃbandhaḥ duṣpariharaḥ viśeṣa smaraṇa janya tvāt saṃśayasya

original: viśeṣāṇāṃ ca yena saha pūrvaṃ darśanabhūta tasminn anupalabhyamāne smaraṇāsambhavāt /
analyzed: viśeṣāṇām ca yena saha pūrvam tasmin an upalabhyamāne smaraṇa asambhavāt

original: atas tasyānekaviśeṣānugāmitvāt samānatvam aparihāryam /
analyzed: atas tasya aneka viśeṣa anugāmi tvāt samāna tvam aparihāryam

original: ata eva cākṣiptasāmānyavācinaṃ samānaśabdaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇe vyācakhyur ācāryā ity alam vistareṇa //
analyzed: atas eva ca ākṣipta sāmānya vācinam samāna śabdam sāmānya lakṣaṇe vyācakhyuḥ ācāryāḥ iti alam vistareṇa

original: iti paṃcavidhaḥ prapaṃcitaḥ muninā darśita eṣa saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: iti paṃcavidhaḥ prapaṃcitaḥ muninā darśitaḥ eṣa saṃśayaḥ

original: phalavad vyavahārahetutāṃ anumānāṅgatayā vibharti yaḥ //
analyzed: phala vat vyavahāra hetu tām anumāna aṅga tayā vibharti yaḥ

original: anumānirapkeṣa eva vā kila dṛṣṭe viṣaye 'rthasaṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: eva vā kila dṛṣṭe viṣaye ṛtha saṃśayaḥ

original: vahati vyavahāravartanīṃ iti pūrvaṃ ca vicāritaṃ budhaiḥ //
analyzed: vahati vyavahāra vartanīm iti pūrvam ca vicāritam budhaiḥ

original: iti saṃśayaparīkṣā yamartham adhikṛtya pravartate tat prayojanam //1-1-24 //
analyzed: iti saṃśaya parīkṣā yam artham adhikṛtya pravartate tat prayojanam

original: yam ity atra deśakālapuruṣadaśābhedabhinnaprayojanaviśeṣavyāptaye vīpsā draṣṭavyā /
analyzed: yam iti atra deśa kāla puruṣa daśā bheda bhinna prayojana viśeṣa vyāptaye vīpsā draṣṭavyā

original: arthaḥ arthyamānaḥ ucyate na vasturūpa eva abhāvasyāpi prayojanatvasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: arthaḥ arthyamānaḥ ucyate na vastu rūpaḥ eva abhāvasya api prayojana tva saṃbhavāt

original: adhikāraḥ arthasya vyavasāyaḥ /
analyzed: adhikāraḥ arthasya vyavasāyaḥ

original: yaṃ yam arthaṃ āptavyaṃ hātavyaṃ vā 'dhikṛtya vyavasāyaḥ pravartate tat prāptaye parihārāya vā ceṣṭate puruṣaḥ tat prayojanam iti //
analyzed: yam yam artham āptavyam hātavyam vā dhikṛtya vyavasāyaḥ pravartate tad prāptaye parihārāya vā ceṣṭate puruṣaḥ tat prayojanam iti

original: tac ca gauṇamukhyabhedena dvividham /
analyzed: tat ca gauṇa mukhya bhedena dvividham

original: mukhyaṃ sukhaprāptiḥ duḥkhaparihāraś ca /
analyzed: mukhyam sukha prāptiḥ duḥkha parihāraḥ ca

original: tatsādhanaṃ tu gauṇam /
analyzed: tad sādhanam tu gauṇam

original: sukhasādhanam api candanadhanasārahāramahilāri prāptavyatvāt mukhyatvena yadā vivakṣitaṃ bhavati tadā tadavāptyupāye gauṇatā draṣṭavyā //
analyzed: sukha sādhanam api candana dhana sāra hāra mahilāri prāptavya tvāt mukhya tvena yadā vivakṣitam bhavati tadā tad avāpti upāye gauṇa tā draṣṭavyā

original: tac ca prayojanaṃ deśakālapuruṣaviśeṣābhedād avyavasthitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tat ca prayojanam deśa kāla puruṣa viśeṣa abhedāt avyavasthitam bhavati

original: tad yathā grīṣme marusthale niśātamalātakanikaram iva kirati kiraṇamiṣeṇa pūṣaṇi tṛṣāturasya tuṣārakaṇotkaradanturamambu paramaṃ sukhasādhanam tad eva śiśire sakalajagatkampakāriṇi dāruṇasamīraṇaśithilīkṛtanīreṣu kāśmīreṣu śleṣmopacayajanitajaḍimajaṭharaśikhinaḥ khedāya jāyate /
analyzed: tat yathā grīṣme maru sthale niśāta mala ataka nikaram iva kirati kiraṇa miṣeṇa pūṣaṇi tṛṣā āturasya tuṣāra kaṇa utkara danturam ambu paramam sukha sādhanam tat eva śiśire sakala jagat kampa kāriṇi dāruṇa samīraṇa śithilīkṛta nīreṣu kāśmīreṣu śleṣma upacaya janita jaḍima jaṭhara śikhinaḥ khedāya jāyate

original: tasyād aniyata evāyaṃ sukhaduḥkhasādhanabhāvo bhāvānām //
analyzed: tasyāt aniyataḥ eva ayam sukha duḥkha sādhana bhāvaḥ bhāvānām

original: yady api ca yad ekadā sukhasādhanam iti viditam upayuktam atikrāntaṃ vastu tat tathāpi tajjātīyatvaliṅgāvadhṛtasukhasādhanabhāve bhāvāntare 'dipravartanta eva tadarthinaḥ //
analyzed: yadi api ca yat ekadā sukha sādhanam iti viditam upayuktam atikrāntam vastu tat tathā api tad jātīya tva liṅga avadhṛta sukha sādhana bhāve bhāva antare eva tad arthinaḥ

original: nanu prayojanasya pravartatvam yuktam sadasadvikalpābhyām anupapatteḥ /
analyzed: nanu prayojanasya pravarta tvam yuktam sat asat vikalpābhyām anupapatteḥ

original: sattve karṇanāsādivat na tadarthā pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: sattve karṇa nāsā ādi vat na tad arthā pravṛttiḥ

original: asattve tu khapuṣpādivat na tarām naiṣa doṣaḥ īpsājihāsāviṣayīkṛtasya tasya pravartakatvāt /
analyzed: asattve tu kha puṣpa ādi vat na tarām na eṣa doṣaḥ īpsā jihāsā viṣayīkṛtasya tasya pravartaka tvāt

original: na hi tat khapuṣpādivad asādhyam /
analyzed: na hi tat khapuṣpa ādi vat asādhyam

original: nāpi śiraḥpāṇyādivat siddham eva /
analyzed: nā api śiraḥ pāṇi ādi vat siddham eva

original: api tu sādhyatvena buddhyupārūḍhaṃ tat pravartakam iti sarvalokasākṣikam etat /
analyzed: api tu sādhya tvena buddhi upārūḍham tat pravartakam iti sarva loka sākṣikam etat

original: tasmāt icchāviṣayīkṛtaṃ tat pravartakam  iti yuktam //
analyzed: tasmāt icchā viṣayīkṛtam tat pravartakam iti yuktam

original: itthaṃ pravartakatve  prayojanasyopapadite muninā /
analyzed: ittham pravartaka tve prayojanasya upapadite muninā

original: bhagnā bhavanti sarve prerakapakṣāḥ parābhihitāḥ //
analyzed: bhagnāḥ bhavanti sarve preraka pakṣāḥ para abhihitāḥ

original: prayojanamato 'khilaividhivacobhir ādiśyate prayojananibandhanās tanubhṛtām aśeṣāḥ kriyāḥ //
analyzed: ādiśyate prayojana nibandhanāḥ tanubhṛtām aśeṣāḥ kriyāḥ

original: krimer api yathā tathā kim api jīvitaṃ bibhrataḥ prayojanabahiṣkṛtaṃ na khalu ceṣṭitaṃ dṛśyate //
analyzed: krimeḥ api yathā tathā kim api jīvitam bibhrataḥ prayojana bahiṣkṛtam na khalu ceṣṭitam dṛśyate

original: vaitaṇḍikaḥ prayatate nijapakṣasiddhayai tāṃ caiṣa veda parapakṣaniṣedhalakṣyām /
analyzed: vaitaṇḍikaḥ prayatate nija pakṣa siddhayai tām ca eṣa veda para pakṣa niṣedha lakṣyām

original: tasmād iyaṃ svamatasādhanavarjitā 'pi yuktā prayojanavatī bhavituṃ vitaṇḍā //
analyzed: tasmāt iyam sva mata sādhana varjitā yuktā prayojanavatī bhavitum vitaṇḍā

original: iti prayojanaparīkṣā laukikaparīkṣakānāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisamyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ //1-1-25 //
analyzed: iti prayojana parīkṣā laukika parīkṣakānām yasmin arthe buddhi samyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: laukikaparīkṣikau vādiprativādinau dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇaprastāvād veditavyau /
analyzed: laukika parīkṣikau vādi prativādinau dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇa prastāvāt veditavyau

original: na tu mūrkhapaṇḍitau prakṛtāsaṅgateḥ /
analyzed: na tu mūrkha paṇḍitau prakṛta asaṅgateḥ

original: tayoś ca saṅgatyabhāvāt /
analyzed: tayoḥ ca saṅgati abhāvāt

original: tayoś ca yasminn arthe bhāvasvabhāve abhāvatmake vā buddhisāmyaṃ prayojyaprayojakabhāvavyavasthitasādhyasādhanadharmādhikaraṇatve sādhyavyāvṛttipūrvakasādhanadharmavyāvṛttatāyāṃ vā tulyarūpā buddhiḥ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ ca yasmin arthe bhāva svabhāve abhāva tmake vā buddhi sāmyam prayojya prayojaka bhāva vyavasthita sādhya sādhana dharma adhikaraṇa tve sādhya vyāvṛtti pūrvaka sādhana dharma vyāvṛtta tāyām vā tulya rūpā buddhiḥ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: tasya tathāvidhadharmādhāratvaṃ tadrahitatvaṃ vā vakṣyamāṇād udāharaṇalakṣaṇān mantavyam //
analyzed: tasya tathāvidha dharma ādhāra tvam tad rahita tvam vā vakṣyamāṇāt udāharaṇa lakṣaṇāt mantavyam

original: yathā cānumānalakṣaṇe tatpūrvakaṃ iti pratibandhagrahaṇopāyamātram praipāditam tatsvarūpaṃ tu avayavalakṣaṇe nirṇītaṃ udāharaṇasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ tathā vaidharmyāt iti evam hi vādipraivādiprasiddhimātraṃ dṛṣṭāntasya darśitam /
analyzed: yathā ca anumāna lakṣaṇe tad pūrvakam iti pratibandha grahaṇa upāya mātram tad svarūpam tu avayava lakṣaṇe nirṇītam udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ tathā vaidharmyāt iti evam hi vādi praivādi prasiddhi mātram dṛṣṭāntasya darśitam

original: rūpaṃ tu tasya dvividham api tatraiva vakṣyate sādhyasādharmyāt taddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam tadviparyayād vā viparītam iti //
analyzed: rūpam tu tasya dvividham api tatra eva vakṣyate sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam tad viparyayāt vā viparītam iti

original: anityaḥ śabdah kṛtakatvāt yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa iti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: yat punar anityaṃ na bhavati tat kṛtakam api na bhavaty eva yathā ''kāśa iti vaidharmyadṛṣṭānataḥ /
analyzed: yat punar anityam na bhavati tat kṛtakam api na bhavati eva yathā kāśaḥ iti vaidharmya dṛṣṭānataḥ

original: yathoktalakṣaṇavaikalyāt tu dṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhavati //
analyzed: yathā ukta lakṣaṇa vaikalyāt tu dṛṣṭānta ābhāsa tā bhavati

original: ābhāsabhedavibhavaḥ kathayiṣyate tu teṣām udāharaṇalakṣaṇavākprasaṅge /
analyzed: ābhāsa bheda vibhavaḥ kathayiṣyate tu teṣām udāharaṇa lakṣaṇa vāc prasaṅge

original: ābhāsatā vcanadoṣakṛtā 'pi kācit astīti sā 'vayavalakṣaṇa eva vācyā //
analyzed: ābhāsa tā kācid asti iti sā vayava lakṣaṇe eva vācyā

original: dvividho 'pi dṛṣṭāntaḥ sudṛṣṭibhir yatno 'dhigantavyaḥ /
analyzed: dvividhaḥ pi dṛṣṭāntaḥ su dṛṣṭibhiḥ yatnaḥ dhigantavyaḥ

original: sa hi niścalaḥ phalanidheḥ anumānamahātaroḥ skandhaḥ //
analyzed: sa hi niścalaḥ phala nidheḥ anumāna mahā taroḥ skandhaḥ

original: iti dṛṣṭāntaparīkṣā tantrādhikaraṇābhyupagamasaṃsthitiḥ siddhantaḥ //1-1-26 //
analyzed: iti dṛṣṭānta parīkṣā tantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama saṃsthitiḥ siddhantaḥ

original: tantryate 'nena padārthasthitir iti tantraṃ pramāṇam ucyate /
analyzed: tantryate nena padārtha sthitiḥ iti tantram pramāṇam ucyate

original: adhikaraṇam āśrayaḥ /
analyzed: adhikaraṇam āśrayaḥ

original: tantram adhikaraṇaṃ yasya saḥ tantrādhikaraṇaḥ pramāṇamūlaka ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tantram adhikaraṇam yasya saḥ tantra adhikaraṇaḥ pramāṇa mūlakaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: abhyupagamaḥ svīkāraḥ tasya saṃsthitiḥ itthaṃbhāvavayvasthā dharmaniyamaḥ idam ittham iti idam iti sāmānyanirdeśaḥ ittham iti viśeṣanirdeśaḥ /
analyzed: abhyupagamaḥ svīkāraḥ tasya saṃsthitiḥ itthaṃbhāva vayvasthā dharma niyamaḥ idam ittham iti idam iti sāmānya nirdeśaḥ ittham iti viśeṣa nirdeśaḥ

original: evaṃ ca tantrādhikaraṇābhyupagamasaṃsthitiḥ pramāṇamūlābhyupagamaviṣayīkṛtaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣavān arthaḥ siddhānta iti sāmānyalakṣaṇam uktaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: evam ca tantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama saṃsthitiḥ pramāṇa mūla abhyupagama viṣayīkṛtaḥ sāmānya viśeṣavān arthaḥ siddhāntaḥ iti sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktam bhavati

original: anye tu vyācakṣate tantram itaretarasaṃbaddhasyārthasamūhasyopadeśaḥ śāstraṃ /
analyzed: anye tu vyācakṣate tantram itaretara saṃbaddhasya artha samūhasya upadeśaḥ śāstram

original: adhikriyate ity adhikaraṇaṃ pakṣa ucyate /
analyzed: adhikriyate iti adhikaraṇam pakṣaḥ ucyate

original: abhyupagamaḥ yathoktaeva /
analyzed: abhyupagamaḥ yathā uktaḥ eva

original: saṃsthitiśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate /
analyzed: saṃsthiti śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate

original: tantrasaṃśitiḥ adhikaraṇasaṃsthitiḥ abhyupagamasaṃsthitiḥ ity anena tantranirdeśasāmyāt sarvatantrapratitantrasiddhāntayoḥ sūcanam /
analyzed: tantra saṃśitiḥ adhikaraṇa saṃsthitiḥ abhyupagama saṃsthitiḥ iti anena tantra nirdeśa sāmyāt sarva tantra prati tantra siddhāntayoḥ sūcanam

original: itarābhyāṃ padābhyāṃ uttarayoḥ adhikaraṇabhyupāgamasiddhāntayor iti //
analyzed: itarābhyām padābhyām uttarayoḥ adhikaraṇa abhyupāgama siddhāntayoḥ iti

original: etat tu apavyākhyānam /
analyzed: etat tu apavyākhyānam

original: na hy evaṃ siddhāntacatuṣṭayānugataṃ kiṃcit sāmānyalakṣaṇam uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na hi evam siddhānta catuṣṭaya anugatam kiṃcid sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktam bhavati

original: na cedaṃ vibhāgārthaṃ viśeṣasakṣaṇārtha vā sūtram tatpratipādanasyottarasūtraiḥ kariṣyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: na ca idam vibhāga artham viśeṣa sakṣaṇa artha vā sūtram tad pratipādanasya uttara sūtraiḥ kariṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: ukatasya ca punarvacane prayojanābhāvāt /
analyzed: ukatasya ca punarvacane prayojana abhāvāt

original: ataḥ pūrvaprakrameṇaiva siddhāntasya sāmānyalakṣaṇavarṇanaṃ śreyaḥ //
analyzed: atas pūrva prakrameṇa eva siddhāntasya sāmānya lakṣaṇa varṇanam śreyaḥ

original: tasya svakaṇṭhena vibhāgam āha sa caturvidhaḥ sarvatantrapratitantrādhikaraṇābhyupagamasaṃsthityarthāntarabhāvāt //1-1-26 //
analyzed: tasya sva kaṇṭhena vibhāgam āha sa caturvidhaḥ sarva tantra prati tantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama saṃsthiti arthāntara bhāvāt

original: caruṣprakāro hi siddhāntaḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ pratitantrasiddhāntaḥ adhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ abhyupagamasiddhānta iti //
analyzed: caruṣprakāraḥ hi siddhāntaḥ sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ prati tantra siddhāntaḥ adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti
