original: tatra sarvatantrāviruddhaḥ svatantre 'dhikṛte 'rthaḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ //
analyzed: tatra sarva tantra aviruddhaḥ svatantre dhi kṛte rthaḥ sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ

original: atra tantraśabdena śāstram ucyate svaśāstre ya upadiṣṭo 'rthaḥ sarvaśāstrāviruddhaś ca sa sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ /
analyzed: atra tantra śabdena śāstram ucyate sva śāstre yaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ rthaḥ sarva śāstra aviruddhaḥ ca sa sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ

original: yathā cākṣuṣaṃ pramāṇam iti //
analyzed: yathā cākṣuṣam pramāṇam iti

original: nanu atrāpi vividante /
analyzed: nanu atra api vividante

original: brahmavādināṃ hi sarvaiveyaṃ avidyā /
analyzed: brahma vādinām hi sarvā eva iyam avidyā

original: avidyā ca kathaṃ pramāṇam iti na vyavahārāvasthāyāṃ tair api tatprāmāṇyābhyupagamāt saṃkhyālakṣaṇaviṣayavipratipattis tu pratiśāstraṃ bhavatu /
analyzed: avidyā ca katham pramāṇam iti na vyavahāra avasthāyām taiḥ api tad prāmāṇya abhyupagamāt saṃkhyā lakṣaṇa viṣaya vipratipattiḥ tu pratiśāstram bhavatu

original: cākṣuṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ itīyati sarvavādinām avivādaḥ //
analyzed: cākṣuṣam pramāṇam iti iyati sarva vādinām avivādaḥ

original: tantre adhikṛte 'rtha iti varthate /
analyzed: tantre adhikṛte rthaḥ iti

original: yathā 'smākam īśvarecchāpreritaparamāṇunimitāni samānatantre kaṇavratamate tathaiva siddhāni paratantre ca saṃkhyāśāstre tathā nābhyupagamyanta iti /
analyzed: yathā smākam īśvara icchā prerita paramāṇu nimitāni samāna tantre kaṇavrata mate tathā eva siddhāni paratantre ca saṃkhyā śāstre tathā na abhyupagamyante iti

original: yathā vā guṇatryātmikāyāḥ prakṛteḥ mahadahaṅkarādirūpeṇa bhūtasargati sāṃkhyānāṃ svatantrasiddho 'rthaḥ samānatantre 'pi pātaṃjale yogāśāte siddha eva paratantraṃ tu vaiśeṣikādimate na siddha iti /
analyzed: yathā vā guṇa tri ātmikāyāḥ prakṛteḥ mahat ahaṅkara ādi rūpeṇa sāṃkhyānām svatantra siddhaḥ rthaḥ samāna tantre siddhaḥ eva paratantram tu vaiśeṣika ādi mate na siddhaḥ iti

original: nanu asya kathaṃ pramāṇamūlatā sthāne praśnaḥ satyam etat āsmākīne hi pratitantrasiddhānte pramāṇamūlatvaṃ yathārtham eva /
analyzed: nanu asya katham pramāṇa mūla tā sthāne praśnaḥ satyam etat āsmākīne hi prati tantra siddhānte pramāṇa mūla tvam yathārtham eva

original: sāṃkhyasiddhāntasya tu pramāṇa mūlatvābhāve 'pi paratantratvakhyāpanāyodāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: sāṃkhya siddhāntasya tu pramāṇa mūla tva abhāve pi paratantra tva khyāpanāya udāhṛtaḥ

original: tadabhiprāyeṇa vā 'sya pramāṇamūlatā vaktavyeti //
analyzed: tad abhiprāyeṇa vā sya pramāṇa mūla tā vaktavyā iti

original: yatsiddhāv anyaprakaraṇasiddhaḥ sā 'dhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ //1-1-30 //
analyzed: yad siddhau anya prakaraṇa siddhaḥ sā adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ

original: prakriyata iti prakaraṇaṃ pakṣa ucyate /
analyzed: prakriyate iti prakaraṇam pakṣaḥ ucyate

original: yasyārthasya siddhau satyāṃ prakaraṇāntarasiddhiḥ bhavati so 'dhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ tad adhikaraṇānām artāntarāṇāṃ siddheḥ //
analyzed: yasya arthasya siddhau satyām prakaraṇa antara siddhiḥ bhavati saḥ adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ tat adhikaraṇānām arta antarāṇām siddheḥ

original: kaḥ punaḥ yatsiddhau iti sarvanāmnā pratyavamṛśyate pakṣaḥ hetur vā kiṃcātaḥ pakṣaḥ kathaṃ pakṣāntarasiddhaye kalpate /
analyzed: kaḥ punar yad siddhau iti sarvanāmnā pratyavamṛśyate pakṣaḥ hetuḥ vā kiṃca atas pakṣaḥ katham pakṣa antara siddhaye kalpate

original: hetunā hi pakṣasiddhiḥ kriyate na pakṣeṇa hetoḥ /
analyzed: hetunā hi pakṣa siddhiḥ kriyate na pakṣeṇa hetoḥ

original: hetos tv adhikaraṇasiddhāntatve kathaṃ siddhāntāśrayā nyāyapravṛttir iti tad uddeśaprayojanaṃ varṇitam /
analyzed: hetoḥ tu adhikaraṇa siddhānta tve katham siddhānta āśrayā nyāya pravṛttiḥ iti tat uddeśa prayojanam varṇitam

original: nyāyo hi hetur eva /
analyzed: nyāyaḥ hi hetuḥ eva

original: sa eva cādhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva ca adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ

original: na ca hetur hatv āśraya iti //
analyzed: na ca hetuḥ hatu āśrayaḥ iti

original: ucyate ubhayathā 'py adoṣaḥ /
analyzed: ucyate ubhayathā pi adoṣaḥ

original: hetur api kvacit pakṣībhavati pakṣo 'pi hetubhavaty eva /
analyzed: hetuḥ api kvacid pakṣībhavati pakṣaḥ u pi hetu bhavati eva

original: tatra tāvad āṃjasyena hetvadhinā pakṣasiddhir iti hetur eva sarvanāmnā 'vamṛśyate /
analyzed: tatra tāvat āṃjasyena hetvadhinā pakṣa siddhiḥ iti hetuḥ eva sarvanāmnā vamṛśyate

original: tatsiddhāv anyaprakaraṇasiddheḥ sa evādhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ //
analyzed: tad siddhau anya prakaraṇa siddheḥ saḥ eva adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhi tadāśrayā nyāyapravṛttiḥ ucyate hetur api tadanyatarā siddha iva sādhyamānatvāt pakṣībhavan nyāyāntarāśrayatāṃ pratipatsyate //
analyzed: katham tarhi tad āśrayā nyāya pravṛttiḥ ucyate hetuḥ api tad anyatarā siddhaḥ iva sādhyamāna tvāt pakṣībhavan nyāya antara āśraya tām pratipatsyate

original: api vā pakṣa eva sarvanāmnā 'vamṛśyamānaḥ bhavatv adhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ /
analyzed: api vā pakṣaḥ eva sarvanāmnā vamṛśyamānaḥ bhavatu adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ

original: sa ca spaṣṭa eva nyāyasyāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca spaṣṭaḥ eva nyāyasya āśrayaḥ

original: sa ca siddhyan pakṣāntarāṇy ākṣipann eva siddhyatity adhikaraṇasiddhāntatāṃ bhajate //
analyzed: sa ca siddhyan pakṣa antarāṇi ākṣipan eva adhikaraṇa siddhānta tām bhajate

original: tasyodāharaṇaṃ indriyavyatiriktaḥ jñātā darśanasparśanābhyām ekārthagrahaṇād iti /
analyzed: tasya udāharaṇam indriya vyatiriktaḥ jñātā darśana sparśanābhyām eka artha grahaṇāt iti

original: atra indriyavyatirikte jñātati siddhyati tadanuṣaṅgīṇy arthāntarāṇy api siddhyanti nānā indriyāṇi niyataviṣayāṇi guṇavyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ ity evamādīni //
analyzed: atra indriya vyatirikte siddhyati tad anuṣaṅgīṇi artha antarāṇi api siddhyanti nānā indriyāṇi niyata viṣayāṇi guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam iti evamādīni

original: aparīkṣitābhyupagamāt tadviśeṣaparīkṣaṇaṃ abhyupagamasiddhānataḥ //1-1-31 //
analyzed: aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt tad viśeṣa parīkṣaṇam abhyupagama siddhānataḥ

original: atra aparīkṣitābhyupagamāt iti yathāśrutapaṃcamīnirdeśam anurudhyamānāḥ pramāṇamūlābhyupagamaviṣayīkṛto 'rthaḥ siddhāntaḥ iti ca sāmānyalakṣaṇam anusarantaḥ kecit evaṃ vyācakṣate dharmiṇaḥ śabdādeḥ nityānityatvavicāracarcāyāṃ aparīkṣitasyaiva ākāśaviśeṣaguṇatvādidharmaparīkṣārahitasyaivā 'bhyupagamaḥ kartavyaḥ /
analyzed: atra aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt iti yathāśruta paṃcamī nirdeśam anurudhyamānāḥ pramāṇa mūla abhyupagama viṣayīkṛtaḥ rthaḥ siddhāntaḥ iti ca sāmānya lakṣaṇam anusarantaḥ kecid evam vyācakṣate dharmiṇaḥ śabda ādeḥ nitya anitya tva vicāra carcāyām aparīkṣitasya eva ākāśa viśeṣa guṇa tva ādi dharma parīkṣā rahitasya eva abhyupagamaḥ kartavyaḥ

original: tato 'parīkṣitābhyupagamāt kiṃ siddhyati ucyate tadviśeṣaparīkṣaṇam iti /
analyzed: parīkṣita abhyupagamāt kim siddhi ati ucyate tad viśeṣa parīkṣaṇam iti

original: tadgatanityānityatvaparīkṣaṇaṃ hi sāmānyena dharmiṇy upādīyamāne vyomaviśeṣaguṇatvādidharmaparīkṣārahite saty upapadyate /
analyzed: tad gata nitya anitya tva parīkṣaṇam hi sāmānyena dharmiṇi upādīyamāne vyoma viśeṣa guṇa tva ādi dharma parīkṣā rahite sati upapadyate

original: yadi punar ākāśaviśeṣaguṇatvaviśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ dharmitvenopādīyate paraṃ pratyasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣo bhaved iti //
analyzed: yadi punar ākāśa viśeṣa guṇa tva viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ dharmi tvena upādīyate param prati asiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣaḥ bhavet iti

original: evam api kṛte yadi purodharmiṇaṃ vikalpayet kīdṛśasya sataḥ śabdasya bhavatā nityatvaṃ sādhyate dravyasya guṇasya veti /
analyzed: evam api kṛte yadi puras dharmiṇam vikalpayet kīdṛśasya sataḥ śabdasya bhavatā nitya tvam sādhyate dravyasya guṇasya vā iti

original: sa evaṃ vikalpayan arthāntaragamanāt tāvat parājita eva bhavati /
analyzed: saḥ evam vikalpayan artha antara gamanāt tāvat parājitaḥ eva bhavati

original: jitam apy enaṃ punar jetuṃ svabuddhyatiśayacikhyāpayiṣayā parabuddhyavajñayā ca vādī bravīti astu dravyaṃ śabda iti //
analyzed: jitam api enam punar jetum sva buddhi atiśaya cikhyāpayiṣayā para buddhi avajñayā ca vādī bravīti astu dravyam śabdaḥ iti

original: etat tu vyākhyānaṃ na buddhyāmahe /
analyzed: etat tu vyākhyānam na buddhyāmahe

original: evaṃ vyācakṣāṇānām eṣāṃ abhyupagamasiddhānta iti ko nu vyavasita iti /
analyzed: evam vyācakṣāṇānām eṣām abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti kaḥ nu vyavasitaḥ iti

original: yadi tāvat anityaḥ śabda iti dravyaguṇādiviśeṣarahitaḥ śabdākhyadharminirdeśo yaḥ prathamam upāttaḥ sa evābhyupagamasiddhāntaḥ /
analyzed: yadi tāvat anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti dravya guṇa ādi viśeṣa rahitaḥ śabda ākhya dharmi nirdeśaḥ yaḥ prathamam upāttaḥ saḥ eva abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ

original: tatra abhyupāgamārthaḥ kīdṛśaḥ kaś ca pratitantrasiddhāntād asya viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: tatra abhyupāgama arthaḥ kīdṛśaḥ kaḥ ca prati tantra siddhāntāt asya viśeṣaḥ

original: athāstu dravyaṃ śabda iti svabuddhyatiśayābhimānena paścād abhyupagamyamānadravyatvaviśiṣṭaśabdanirdeśaḥ abhyupagamasiddhāntaḥ tarhi sūtram aparīkṣitābhyupagamāt iti na yojitam anyatraiva tais sūtrārtho nīta iti //
analyzed: atha astu dravyam śabdaḥ iti sva buddhi atiśaya abhimānena paścāt abhyupagamyamāna dravya tva viśiṣṭa śabda nirdeśaḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ tarhi sūtram aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt iti na yojitam anyatra eva taiḥ sūtra arthaḥ nītaḥ iti

original: tasmād evaṃ vyākhyāyate aparīkṣitābhyupagama eva svamatikauśalyena kriyamāṇaḥ abhyupagamasiddhāntaḥ astu dravyaṃ śabda iti /
analyzed: tasmāt evam vyākhyāyate aparīkṣita abhyupagamaḥ eva sva mati kauśalyena kriyamāṇaḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ astu dravyam śabdaḥ iti

original: pramāṇamūlābhyupagamaviṣayīkaraṇaṃ tu sāmānyalakṣaṇe pauḍhavādyabhiprāyeṇaiva yojyam /
analyzed: pramāṇa mūla abhyupagama viṣayīkaraṇam tu sāmānya lakṣaṇe pauḍhava ādi abhiprāyeṇa eva yojyam

original: dravyatvam api pramāṇamūlaṃ śabdasya bhavatu tathāpi tasyānityatvam iti /
analyzed: dravya tvam api pramāṇa mūlam śabdasya bhavatu tathā api tasya anitya tvam iti

original: kila niravayavaṃ dravyaṃ anityam iti nāsty eva śabdasya tu tādṛśasyāpy anityatvam ahaṃ sādhayāmīti //
analyzed: kila niravayavam dravyam anityam iti na asti eva śabdasya tu tādṛśasya api anitya tvam aham sādhayāmi iti

original: kathaṃ tarhi paṃcamī kiṃ paṃcamyā vastu tāvad īdṛśaṃ yathā vyākhyatam asmābhiḥ //
analyzed: katham tarhi paṃcamī kim paṃcamyāḥ vastu tāvat īdṛśam yathā vyākhyatam asmābhiḥ

original: paṃcamy api cetthaṃ yojyate /
analyzed: paṃcamī api ca ittham yojyate

original: kimarthaṃ punar ayam parīkṣita eva śabdagatadvavyatvābhyupagamaḥ kriyata iti pṛcchate uttaraṃ paṃcamyā 'bhidhīyate yasmād aparīkṣitābhyupagamāt tadviśeṣānityatvaparīkṣaṇam avakalpate tasmād aparīkṣitābhyupagamo 'pi abhyupagamasiddhānta iti /
analyzed: kimartham punar ayam parīkṣitaḥ eva śabda gata dvavya tva abhyupagamaḥ kriyate iti pṛcchate uttaram paṃcamyā abhidhīyate yasmāt aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt tad viśeṣa anitya tva parīkṣaṇam avakalpate tasmāt aparīkṣita abhyupagamaḥ api abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti

original: na tu tadviśeṣaṇaparīkṣaṇam eva sāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśāt abhyupagamasiddhānta iti mantavyaṃ parīkṣaṇasya siddhantāśritatvāt /
analyzed: na tu tad viśeṣaṇa parīkṣaṇam eva sāmānādhikaraṇya nirdeśāt abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti mantavyam parīkṣaṇasya siddhanta āśrita tvāt

original: tasmāt tadviśeṣaparīkṣaṇārthaḥ aparīkṣitābhyupagamaprauḍhavādinā kriyamāṇaḥ abhyupagamasiddhānta iti sūtrārthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt tad viśeṣa parīkṣaṇa arthaḥ aparīkṣita abhyupagama prauḍha vādinā kriyamāṇaḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti sūtra arthaḥ

original: ittham eva ca tatra tatra pravādukānāṃ vyavahāraḥ //
analyzed: ittham eva ca tatra tatra pravādukānām vyavahāraḥ

original: imāś ca siddhāntabhidāś catasraḥ nyāyapravṛtteḥ prathamaṃ nimittam /
analyzed: imāḥ ca siddhānta bhidāḥ catasraḥ nyāya pravṛtteḥ prathamam nimittam

original: pravartate naiva parīkṣakāṇāṃ anāśritā nyāyakathā kadācit //
analyzed: pravartate na eva parīkṣakāṇām anāśritā nyāya kathā kadācid

original: iti prayojanaparīkṣā iha hi svayam avagatam arthaṃ anumānena parasmai pratipādayatā dādhanīyasyārthasya yāvati śabdasamūhe siddhiḥ parisamāpyate tāvat prayoktavyaḥ /
analyzed: iti prayojana parīkṣā iha hi svayam avagatam artham anumānena parasmai pratipādayatā dādhanīyasya arthasya yāvati śabda samūhe siddhiḥ parisamāpyate tāvat prayoktavyaḥ

original: tam eva ca parārthānumānam ācakṣate nītividaḥ //
analyzed: tam eva ca parārtha anumānam ācakṣate nīti vidaḥ

original: nanu naiva parārthānumānaṃ nāma kiṃcid asti vaktrapekṣayā śrotrapekṣayā vā tadanupapatteḥ //
analyzed: nanu nā eva parārtha anumānam nāma kiṃcid asti vaktra apekṣayā śrotra apekṣayā vā tad anupapatteḥ

original: vaktrānvamāyi sa hy arthaḥ nedānīm anumīyate /
analyzed: vaktrā anvamāyi sa hi arthaḥ na idānīm anumīyate

original: śrotuḥ svārthānumānaṃ tat vākyāvagatihetukam //
analyzed: śrotuḥ sva artha anumānam tat vākya avagati hetukam

original: yathā pratyakṣato dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā 'gnim avagacchati /
analyzed: yathā pratyakṣatas dhūmam dṛṣṭvā gnim avagacchati

original: tathā tadīyād vacanād iti kasya parārthatā //
analyzed: tathā tadīyāt vacanāt iti kasya parārtha tā

original: āgamas tv eṣa bhidyeta kaścid arthopadeśakaḥ /
analyzed: āgamaḥ tu eṣa bhidyeta kaścid artha upadeśakaḥ

original: kaścit tatpratyayopāyanyāyamārgopadeśakaḥ //
analyzed: kaścid tad pratyaya upāya nyāya mārga upadeśakaḥ

original: iti //
analyzed: iti

original: satyam na paramārthataḥ parārthānumānam upapadyate /
analyzed: satyam na paramārthataḥ para artha anumānam upapadyate

original: kintu dvividhaḥ pratipattā /
analyzed: kintu dvividhaḥ pratipattā

original: svayam avagatayathāprakṛtaliṅgavyāptikaḥ tadviparītaś ca /
analyzed: svayam avagata yathā prakṛta liṅga vyāptikaḥ tad viparītaḥ ca

original: tatra svayam avadhṛtapratibandhaṃ prati nopadiśyata evam anumānam svata eva tasya tīty upapatteḥ /
analyzed: tatra svayam avadhṛta pratibandham prati nā upadiśyate evam anumānam svatas eva tasya upapatteḥ

original: anavadhṛtavyāptikasya tu vyāptir eva vyutpādyata iti taṃ prati parārthānumānaṃ tadupadeśakaṃ vākyam evākhyāyate /
analyzed: anavadhṛta vyāptikasya tu vyāptiḥ eva vyutpādyate iti tam prati parārtha anumānam tad upadeśakam vākyam eva ākhyāyate

original: tathā hi vaktā svapratyayenedaṃ na hi vākyaṃ prayujyate /
analyzed: tathā hi vaktā sva pratyayena idam na hi vākyam prayujyate

original: pato madvacanād eva tamarthaṃ buddhyatām iti //
analyzed: mad vacanāt eva tam artham buddhyatām iti

original: kiṃ tv enam anumānena bodhayāmīti manyate //
analyzed: kim tu enam anumānena bodhayāmi iti manyate

original: kintu vyāptimato liṅgāt svayaṃ tat tu na paśyati /
analyzed: kintu vyāptimataḥ liṅgāt svayam tat tu na paśyati

original: tatpratītyabhyupāyatvāt parārtham idam ucyate //
analyzed: tad pratīti abhyupāya tvāt para artham idam ucyate

original: ataś ca śrotuḥ svārthānumānam evedam /
analyzed: atas ca śrotuḥ sva artha anumānam eva idam

original: vaktā tu tathā paraṃ pratipādayan parārthānumānaṃ prayuṅkta ity ucyate //
analyzed: vaktā tu tathā param pratipādayan para artha anumānam prayuṅkte iti ucyate

original: na cānuvādamātraṃ tat vaktur ity upapadyate /
analyzed: na ca anuvāda mātram tat vaktuḥ iti upapadyate

original: yato vyāpriyate samyak parasya pratipattaye //
analyzed: yatas vyāpriyate samyak parasya pratipattaye

original: tenānadhitarārthopadeśakatvāt nānuvādamātram /
analyzed: tena an adhi tara artha upadeśaka tvāt na anuvāda mātram

original: svāvagamāpekṣayā tv anuvādatve nedānīm āptravacanaṃ ananuvādarupaṃ kiṃcid bhavet sarvasya svopalabudhipūrvakatvād iti //
analyzed: sva avagama apekṣayā tu anuvāda tve na idānīm āptṛ avacanam an anuvāda rupam kiṃcid bhavet sarvasya sva upala budhi pūrvaka tvāt iti

original: tasmāt parārthānumānavākyopapatteh tad ekadeśāḥ avayavā yuktā iti lakṣyante //
analyzed: tasmāt parārtha anumāna vākya upapattā iha tat eka deśāḥ avayavāḥ yuktāḥ iti lakṣyante

original: pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayananigamanāvayavāḥ //
analyzed: pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanayana nigamana avayavāḥ

original: 1-1-32 etac ca sūtram ekam eva sāmānyalakṣaṇam avayavānām abhidhatte vibhāgaṃ ca pramāṇānām iva pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdāh pramāṇāni iti /
analyzed: etat ca sūtram ekam eva sāmānya lakṣaṇam avayavānām abhidhatte vibhāgam ca pramāṇānām iva pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabdāḥ pramāṇāni iti

original: tatra avayavāḥ bhāgāḥ aṃśāḥ ekadeśāḥ ity evaṃ avayavaśabdaḥ sādhanīyārthapratipattiparyantavacanakalāpaikadeśatvam avayavānāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam ācaṣṭe //
analyzed: tatra avayavāḥ bhāgāḥ aṃśāḥ eka deśāḥ iti evam avayava śabdaḥ sādhanīya artha pratipatti paryanta vacana kalāpa eka deśa tvam avayavānām sāmānya lakṣaṇam ācaṣṭe

original: yady api caikavacanavinirgatānāṃ nisargabhaṅgurāṇāṃ adīrghāyuṣāṃ aparihāryakramajanmanāṃ varṇānāṃ drūmāṇām iva pāramārthikas samūho na samasty eva tathāpi siṣādhayiṣitārthapratipādanarupaikakāryopayogamūlīkṛtātmanāṃ teṣāṃ kālpanikaḥ kalāpaḥ pūrvam eva vākyakalpanāvasare samarthita iti tadbhāgā api saṃbhavaty eva //
analyzed: yadi api ca eka vacana vinirgatānām nisarga bhaṅgurāṇām adīrgha āyuṣām aparihārya krama janmanām varṇānām drūmāṇām iva pāramārthikaḥ samūhaḥ na samasti eva tathā api siṣādhayiṣita artha pratipādana rupa eka kārya upayoga mūlīkṛta ātmanām teṣām kālpanikaḥ kalāpaḥ pūrvam eva vākya kalpanā avasare samarthitaḥ iti tad bhāgāḥ api saṃbhavati eva

original: na ca padānām evānumānavākyavatvam api tu khaṇḍākyānām ekaikena padena pratijñodāharaṇādīnām abhidhātum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: na ca padānām eva anumāna vākyavatvam api tu khaṇḍa ākyānām ekaikena padena pratijñā udāharaṇa ādīnām abhidhātum aśakya tvāt

original: hetuvacanaṃ tu ekam api padaṃ kvacid bhavati kṛtakatvāt iti /
analyzed: hetu vacanam tu ekam api padam kvacid bhavati kṛtaka tvāt iti

original: tad api vā saviśeṣaṇaṃ prayujyamānaṃ padam udāyenaiva pratipādyate vastutve sati kṛtakatvāt iti //
analyzed: tat api vā sa viśeṣaṇam prayujyamānam padam udāyena eva pratipādyate vastu tve sati kṛtaka tvāt iti

original: udāharaṇavacanam api ghaṭavat ity ālasād eva prayujate /
analyzed: udāharaṇa vacanam api ghaṭa vat iti ālasāt eva prayujate

original: tad dhi vyāptipradarśanāya evaṃ vaktavyam yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ iti //
analyzed: tat hi vyāpti pradarśanāya evam vaktavyam yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti

original: tasmād avayavānām avayavatvam eva lakṣaṇaṃ na padatvam //
analyzed: tasmāt avayavānām avayava tvam eva lakṣaṇam na pada tvam

original: vibhāgo 'pi pratijñādipadasannidhāv avayavaśruter evāvagamyate pratijñādayaḥ paṃcāvayavāḥ na nyūnāḥ nātiriktā iti //
analyzed: vibhāgaḥ pi pratijñā ādi pada sannidhau avayava śruteḥ eva avagamyate pratijñā ādayaḥ paṃca avayavāḥ na nyūnāḥ na atiriktāḥ iti

original: nanu atra vivadante kecit nūnatām avayavānām ācakṣate /
analyzed: nanu atra vivadante kecid nūnatām avayavānām ācakṣate

original: tryavayavaṃ dvyavayavaṃ vā sādhanavākyaṃ vadantaḥ //
analyzed: tri avayavam dvi avayavam vā sādhana vākyam vadantaḥ

original: anye tu jijñāsā saṃśayaḥ śakyaprāptiḥ prayojanam śśayavyudāsa iti paṃcabhis saha pratijñādīn daśāvayavān āhuḥ //
analyzed: anye tu jijñāsā saṃśayaḥ śakya prāptiḥ prayojanam śśaya vyudāsaḥ iti paṃcabhiḥ saha pratijñā ādīn daśa avayavān āhuḥ

original: ucyate nyūnatā yathā 'vasaraṃ pratisamādhāsyate /
analyzed: ucyate nyūna tā yathā vasaram pratisamādhāsyate

original: ādhikyam apy ayuktam jijñāsādīnāṃ aśabdasvabhāvatvena vākyāvayavatvāyogāt //
analyzed: ādhikyam api ayuktam jijñāsā ādīnām a śabda svabhāva tvena vākya avayava tva ayogāt

original: tathā hi apratīyamāne 'rthe pratītiprayojanasya pravartikā jijñāsā /
analyzed: tathā hi a pratīyamāne rthe pratīti prayojanasya pravartikā jijñāsā

original: sā cecchāsvabhāvatvād ānantaraḥ pramātṛdharmaḥ na vākyāvayavaḥ //
analyzed: sā ca icchā svabhāva tvāt ānantaraḥ pramātṛ dharmaḥ na vākya avayavaḥ

original: arthakriyāsādhane 'rthe vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ kim evam ayam ayathaivam iti /
analyzed: artha kriyā sādhane rthe vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ kim evam ayam ayathā evam iti

original: so 'pi jñānātmakatvān na vākyāvayavaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ u pi jñāna ātmaka tvāt na vākya avayavaḥ

original: pramātuḥ pramāṇāni pravartamānāni prameyam arpayituṃ pārayantīti sambhāvanā śakyaprāptiḥ /
analyzed: pramātuḥ pramāṇāni pravartamānāni prameyam arpayitum pārayanti iti sambhāvanā śakya prāptiḥ

original: sā 'pi tathaiva na vākyāvayavaḥ //
analyzed: sā pi tathā eva na vākya avayavaḥ

original: prayojanaṃ saṃśayitasya nirṇayaḥ kathaṃ vākyāvayavatāṃ spṛśet //
analyzed: prayojanam saṃśayitasya nirṇayaḥ katham vākya avayava tām spṛśet

original: saṃśayavyudāsas tu pratyakṣopālambhaḥ /
analyzed: saṃśaya vyudāsaḥ tu pratyakṣa upālambhaḥ

original: sa ca vacanasvabhāvatve 'pi na sādhanavākyasyāvayavatvaṃ pratipadyate //
analyzed: sa ca vacana svabhāva tve pi na sādhana vākyasya avayava tvam pratipadyate

original: tad ime saṃśayādayaḥ prakaraṇapravṛttihetavo bhavati na vākyāvayavā iti sūktaṃ pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayanigamanāny avayavāḥ iti //
analyzed: tat ime saṃśaya ādayaḥ prakaraṇa pravṛtti hetavaḥ bhavati na vākya avayavāḥ iti sūktam pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamanāni avayavāḥ iti

original: teṣām sādhyanirdeśaḥ pratijñā //1-1-33 pratijñeti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā pratijñā iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ

original: sādhyanirdeśa iti lakṣaṇam /
śuddhasya dharmiṇo vā dharmasya vā dvayor vā svatantrayoḥ dharmiviśiṣṭasya vā dharmasya sādhyatvānupapatteḥ dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī sādhya ity anumānalakṣaṇe nirṇītam etat /
analyzed: śuddhasya dharmiṇaḥ vā dharmasya vā dvayoḥ vā svatantrayoḥ dharmi viśiṣṭasya vā dharmasya sādhya tva anupapatteḥ dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ iti anumāna lakṣaṇe nirṇītam etat

original: tasya nirdeśaḥ parigrahavacanaṃ pratijñeti //
analyzed: tasya nirdeśaḥ parigraha vacanam pratijñā iti

original: nanu sāvadhāraṇatvād vākyānāṃ kiṃ sādhyanirdeśa eva pratijñety avadhāraṇam uta pratijñaiva sādhyanirdeśa iti //
analyzed: nanu sāvadhāraṇa tvāt vākyānām kim sādhya nirdeśaḥ eva pratijñā iti avadhāraṇam uta pratijñā eva sādhya nirdeśaḥ iti

original: yadi sādhyanirdeśa eva pratijñety avadhāryate tadā yata evakārakaraṇam tato 'nyatrāvadhāraṇam iti pratijñā niyamyate sādhyanirdeśa mā hāsīr iti sādhyanirdeśas tv aniyamita iti pratijñām apahāyāpi bhaved ity ativyāpakaṃ lakṣaṇam //
analyzed: yadi sādhya nirdeśaḥ eva pratijñā iti avadhāryate tadā yatas evakāra karaṇam tatas nyatra avadhāraṇam iti pratijñā niyamyate sādhya nirdeśa mā hāsīḥ iti sādhya nirdeśaḥ tu aniyamitaḥ iti pratijñām apahāya api bhavet iti ati vyāpakam lakṣaṇam

original: atha pratijñaiva sādhyanirdeśa ity avadhāryate tataḥ sādhyanirdeśo niyamyate pratijñā mā tyākṣīd iti /
analyzed: atha pratijñā eva sādhya nirdeśaḥ iti avadhāryate tatas sādhya nirdeśaḥ niyamyate pratijñā mā tyākṣīt iti

original: pratijāñ tv aniyamiteti sādhyanirdeśam apahāyāpi bhaved iti sādhyanirdeśena pratijñāyā avyāptatvāt avyāpakaṃ lakṣaṇam iti //
analyzed: pratijām tu aniyamitā iti sādhya nirdeśam apahāya api bhavet iti sādhya nirdeśena pratijñāyāḥ avyāpta tvāt avyāpakam lakṣaṇam iti

original: tad etad ayuktam /
analyzed: tat etat ayuktam

original: na hi sarvaṃ vākyaṃ sāvadhāraṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na hi sarvam vākyam sa avadhāraṇam bhavati

original: yathā eṣa panthāḥ srudhnaṃ gacchati iti /
analyzed: yathā eṣa panthāḥ srudhnam gacchati iti

original: na hi tatra eśa eveti srudhnam eveti vā gacchaty eveti vā niyantuṃ śakyata iti //
analyzed: na hi tatra eśaḥ eva iti srudhnam eva iti vā gacchati eva iti vā niyantum śakyate iti

original: athāpi avadhāraṇam amaśyāśrayaṇīyaṃ tadbhavatu sādhyanirdeśa eva pratijñati /
analyzed: atha api avadhāraṇam tat bhavatu sādhya nirdeśaḥ eva

original: na cātivyāptiḥ pratijñām apahāyānyatra sādhyanirdeśasyādarśanāt aniyamito 'py asāv anyatra na ca dṛśyate eveti /
analyzed: na ca ativyāptiḥ pratijñām apahāya anyatra sādhya nirdeśasya adarśanāt aniyamitā u pi asau anyatra na ca dṛśyate eva iti

original: tasmāt sādhyanirdeśa eva pratijñeti sthitam /
analyzed: tasmāt sādhya nirdeśaḥ eva pratijñā iti sthitam

original: tad yathā anityaś śabda iti /
analyzed: tat yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: nanu atrāpi kim anitya eva śabdaḥ ity avadharaṇam uta śabda evānitya iti /
analyzed: nanu atra api kim anityaḥ eva śabdaḥ iti avadharaṇam uta śabdaḥ eva anityaḥ iti

original: tatra anitya eva śabda ity ukte tadgatadharmāntaratiraskārāt kṛtakatvam api tatra na bhaved ity asiddho hetuḥ /
analyzed: tatra anityaḥ eva śabdaḥ iti ukte tad gata dharma antara tiraskārāt kṛtaka tvam api tatra na bhavet iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ

original: śabda evānityaḥ iti tv avadhāryamāṇe ghaṭāv anityatvapratiṣedhād anvayaśūnyatā hetoḥ syād iti naiśa doṣaḥ niravadhāraṇasyāpi vacanaprayogasya darśitatvāt /
analyzed: śabdaḥ eva anityaḥ iti tu avadhāryamāṇe ghaṭau anitya tva pratiṣedhāt anvaya śūnyatā hetoḥ syāt iti doṣaḥ niravadhāraṇasya api vacana prayogasya darśita tvāt

original: anitya eva śabda ity avadhāraṇe vā nānityatvavyatiriktatadaviruddhakṛtakatvādyaśeṣadharmāntaraniṣedhas tatra vidhīyate /
analyzed: anityaḥ eva śabdaḥ iti avadhāraṇe vā na anitya tva vyatirikta tad aviruddha kṛtaka tva ādi aśeṣa dharma antara niṣedhaḥ tatra vidhīyate

original: kintu tadviruddhanityatvamātraniṣedha eva anitya eva śabdaḥ na nitya ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: kintu tad viruddha nitya tva mātra niṣedhaḥ eva anityaḥ eva śabdaḥ na nityaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: taduktam niyamas tadviruddhāc ca kalpyate nāvirodhinaḥ iti tasmān na hetor asiddhatvam //
analyzed: tat uktam niyamaḥ tad viruddhāt ca kalpyate na avirodhinaḥ iti tasmāt na hetoḥ asiddha tvam

original: nanu sādhanavākye pratijñāvacanam asaṃcatam asādhanāṃgavacanatvāt /
analyzed: nanu sādhana vākye pratijñā vacanam a saṃcatam a sādhana aṃga vacana tvāt

original: hetudṛṣṭāntavacanābhyāṃ hi sādhyasiddheḥ te eva vaktavye /
analyzed: hetu dṛṣṭānta vacanābhyām hi sādhya siddheḥ te eva vaktavye

original: na ca svapratipattāv upalabdhaṃ sarvam eva parasmai ākhyeyam /
analyzed: na ca sva pratipattau upalabdham sarvam eva parasmai ākhyeyam

original: ākhyāne vā dharmimātram ākhyāyatām /
analyzed: ākhyāne vā dharmi mātram ākhyāyatām

original: svapratipattau hi pūrvaṃ parvatādeḥ śuddhasya dharmiṇo grahaṇam /
analyzed: sva pratipattau hi pūrvam parvata ādeḥ śuddhasya dharmiṇaḥ grahaṇam

original: siṣādhayiṣitahutavahādidharmaviśeṣarūṣitavapuṣaḥ evam abhyupagame 'numānavaiphalyaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: evam abhyupagame numāna vaiphalya prasaṅgāt

original: ataḥ kathaṃ prathamam eva sādhyadharmādhyāsitasvarūpadharminirdeśakaraṇam //
analyzed: atas katham prathamam eva sādhya dharma adhyāsita svarūpa dharmi nirdeśa karaṇam

original: api ca vivādād eva pratijñārtho labhyate iti kiṃ svakaṇṭhoktena tena prayojanam //
analyzed: api ca vivādāt eva pratijñā arthaḥ labhyate iti kim sva kaṇṭha uktena tena prayojanam

original: ucyate svapratipattim anusaratā parasya pratipattir utpādanīyeti svapratipattau prathamam upalabdho dharmī tāvat ākhyeya eva /
analyzed: ucyate sva pratipattim anusaratā parasya pratipattiḥ utpādanīyā iti sva pratipattau prathamam upalabdhaḥ dharmī tāvat ākhyeyaḥ eva

original: anucyamāne hi dharmiṇi niradhikaraṇo hetuḥ kva sādhyaṃ sādhyeta /
analyzed: an ucyamāne hi dharmiṇi niradhikaraṇaḥ hetuḥ kva sādhyam sādhyeta

original: dharmiṇy anavacchinne ca dharmamāte 'numānam anarthakam avivādasiddhatvāt asti hi yatra kvacit anityatvam iti //
analyzed: dharmiṇi anavacchinne ca dharma māte numānam anarthakam avivāda siddha tvāt asti hi yatra kvacid anitya tvam iti

original: āśrayāsiddhaś ca dharminirdeśād vinā hetur bhaved iti avaśyanirdeśyo dharmo //
analyzed: āśraya asiddhaḥ ca dharmi nirdeśāt vinā hetuḥ bhavet iti avaśya nirdeśyaḥ

original: yady api dharmimātradarśanam eva prathamam abhūt tathāpi kiṃ sādhayitum eṣa hetuh prayukto bhavet ity upaplavaśamanāya sādhyadharmanirdeśo 'pi kartavyaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api dharmi mātra darśanam eva prathamam abhūt tathā api kim sādhayitum eṣa hetuḥ prayuktaḥ bhavet iti upaplava śamanāya sādhya dharma nirdeśaḥ api kartavyaḥ

original: śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād iti hi prayujyamānaṃ tad idaṃ andhapadam ivāsādhanaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti hi prayujyamānam tat idam andha padam iva asādhanam bhavet

original: atha vyāptipradarśanapravaṇena yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ iti dṛṣṭāntavacasā tasmād anityaḥ iti nigamanavacanena vā viraṃsyati sa upaplava iti tathāpi śrotṛbubhutsoparamapariśramaphale sādhanavākye sādhanādhigamākāṅkṣā saṃpādanāya sādhyaṃ nirdeṣṭavyam /
analyzed: atha vyāpti pradarśana pravaṇena yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam iti dṛṣṭānta vacasā tasmāt anityaḥ iti nigamana vacanena vā viraṃsyati saḥ upaplavaḥ iti tathā api śrotṛ bubhutsā uparama pariśrama phale sādhana vākye sādhana adhigama ākāṅkṣā saṃpādanāya sādhyam nirdeṣṭavyam

original: na hi śabda ity etāvat yukte tatra sādhanam ākāṅkṣati kaścid iti sādhanavacanāvasaratatprayogasāphalyotpādanāyaiva nūnaṃ anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāvacanaṃ prayotavyam //
analyzed: na hi śabdaḥ iti etāvat yukte tatra sādhanam ākāṅkṣati kaścid iti sādhana vacana avasara tad prayoga sāphalya utpādanāya eva nūnam anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñā vacanam prayotavyam

original: yac ca vivādād eva pratijñārthasya labdhatvam abhidhīyate tadabhyupagamanam eva śābdāntareṇa pratijñāyāḥ /
analyzed: yat ca vivādāt eva pratijñā arthasya labdha tvam abhidhīyate tad abhyupagamanam eva śābda antareṇa pratijñāyāḥ

original: yataḥ viruddho vādaḥ vivādaḥ /
analyzed: yatas viruddhaḥ vādaḥ vivādaḥ

original: eka āha nityaḥ śabdaḥ itras tu anityaḥ ity āha /
analyzed: ekaḥ āha nityaḥ śabdaḥ itraḥ tu anityaḥ iti āha

original: so 'yaṃ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho vivādaḥ pratijñaiva /
analyzed: saḥ yam pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ vivādaḥ pratijñā eva

original: sa tu pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahaḥ tad ahar eva bhavatu dināntare veti kim anena viśeṣeṇa /
analyzed: sa tu pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ tat ahar eva bhavatu dina antare vā iti kim anena viśeṣeṇa

original: aparihāryaṃ pratijñāvacanam iti //
analyzed: aparihāryam pratijñā vacanam iti

original: pratijñaiva ca pakṣa ity ucyate /
analyzed: pratijñā eva ca pakṣaḥ iti ucyate

original: tad evaṃvidhe pakṣalakṣaṇe pradarśite balāt pakṣābhāsāḥ pratikṣiptāḥ bhavanti /
analyzed: tat evaṃvidhe pakṣa lakṣaṇe pradarśite balāt pakṣa ābhāsāḥ pratikṣiptāḥ bhavanti

original: tad yathā anuṣṇo 'gniḥ iti pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā anuṣṇaḥ gniḥ iti pratyakṣa viruddhaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: na rūpagrāhi cakṣuḥ iti anumānaviruddhaḥ //
analyzed: na rūpa grāhi cakṣuḥ iti anumāna viruddhaḥ

original: śabdaviruddhas tu vahuśākhaḥ brāhmaṇena surā peyā ity āgamaviruddhaḥ /
analyzed: śabda viruddhaḥ tu vahu śākhaḥ brāhmaṇena surā peyā iti āgama viruddhaḥ

original: janayitrī me vandhyā pitā me brahmacārī iti dharmidharmaparayor eva vipratiṣedhāt svavacanaviruddhaḥ /
analyzed: janayitrī me vandhyā pitā me brahmacārī iti dharmi dharma parayoḥ eva vipratiṣedhāt sva vacana viruddhaḥ

original: na candraḥ śaśī iti lokaprasiddhiviruddhaḥ //
analyzed: na candraḥ śaśī iti loka prasiddhi viruddhaḥ

original: upamānaviruddhas tu na gavayapadavācyo 'yaṃ gosadṛśaḥ iti /
analyzed: upamāna viruddhaḥ tu na gavaya pada vācyaḥ yam go sadṛśaḥ iti

original: aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ nabhuḥkusumakṛtāvataṃsaḥ caitraḥ iti /
analyzed: aprasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ nabhuḥ kusuma kṛta avataṃsaḥ caitraḥ iti

original: aprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ sugandhi gaganakamalam iti /
analyzed: aprasiddha viśeṣyaḥ sugandhi gagana kamalam iti

original: aprasiddhobhyayaḥ khapuṣpakṛtaśekharaḥ bandhyā sutaḥ iti /
analyzed: aprasiddhaḥ abhyayaḥ khapuṣpa kṛta śekharaḥ bandhyā sutaḥ iti

original: yatrāpi viśeṣyaṇayor ubhayor pai pramāṇantarataḥ svarūpaṃ niścitam eva tannirdeśo 'pi pakṣābhāsa eva śītaṃ tuhinaṃ uṣṇo 'gniḥ iti sādhyatvābhāvena anumānaprayogāvasaravirahād iti /
analyzed: yatra api viśeṣyaṇayoḥ ubhayoḥ pramāṇa antarataḥ sva rūpam niścitam eva pakṣa ābhāse eva śītam tuhinam uṣṇaḥ gniḥ iti sādhya tva abhāvena anumāna prayoga avasara virahāt iti

original: iyam eva ca sā siddhyasādhyatocyata iti //
analyzed: iyam eva ca sā siddhi asādhya tā ucyate iti

original: ye caite pratyakṣaviruddhatādayaḥ pakṣadoṣāḥ ye ca vakṣyamāṇāḥ sādhanavikalatvādayo dṛṣṭāntadoṣāḥ te vastusthityā sarve hetudoṣā eva /
analyzed: ye ca ete pratyakṣa viruddha tā ādayaḥ pakṣa doṣāḥ ye ca vakṣyamāṇāḥ sādhana vikala tva ādayaḥ dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ te vastu sthityā sarve hetu doṣāḥ eva

original: prapaṃcamātraṃ tu pakṣadṛṣṭāntadoṣavarṇanam /
analyzed: prapaṃca mātram tu pakṣa dṛṣṭānta doṣa varṇanam

original: tathā cābādhitatvaṃ hetulakṣaṇam evoktam /
analyzed: tathā ca abādhita tvam hetu lakṣaṇam eva uktam

original: dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭayā ca hetor eva lakṣaṇaṃ anvayavyatirekayor anyat hīyata iti sarve ca te hetudoṣā eva //
analyzed: dṛṣṭānta dṛṣṭayā ca hetoḥ eva lakṣaṇam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ anyat hīyate iti sarve ca te hetu doṣāḥ eva

original: ata eva ca śāstre 'smin muninā tattvadarśinā /
analyzed: atas eva ca śāstre smin muninā tattva darśinā

original: pakṣābhāsādayo noktāḥ hetvābhāsās tu darśitāḥ //
analyzed: pakṣābhāsa ādayaḥ na uktāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ tu darśitāḥ

original: kaścid dhetvanapekṣo 'pi pakṣamātrapratiṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: kaścid hetu anapekṣaḥ pi pakṣa mātra pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: bodho 'numānānurūpasya svāvākyādikṛto yathā //
analyzed: bodhaḥ numāna anurūpasya svā vākya ādi kṛtaḥ yathā

original: evaṃ lakṣaṇako hetur iti tatsvarūpāvadhāraṇe sati tadabhidhāyakaṃ vacanaṃ mukham eva lakṣyate ity arthātmakahetulakṣaṇaṃ tāvad ucyate udāharaṇasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ //1-1-34 //
analyzed: evam lakṣaṇakaḥ hetuḥ iti tad svarūpa avadhāraṇe sati tad abhidhāyakam vacanam mukham eva lakṣyate iti artha ātmaka hetu lakṣaṇam tāvat ucyate udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ  /

original: iti //
analyzed: iti

original: nanu arthātmako hetuḥ anumānam /
analyzed: nanu artha ātmakaḥ hetuḥ anumānam

original: tac ca lakṣitam eva pūrvam tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānam iti sātyam tatra tatpūrvakaṃ iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭapratyakṣamūlatopavarṇanena pratipandhaparicchedopāyamātranirūpaṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: tat ca lakṣitam eva pūrvam tad pūrvakam trividham anumānam iti sātyam tatra tad pūrvakam iti sarva nāmnā parāmṛṣṭa pratyakṣa mūla tā upavarṇanena pratipandha pariccheda upāya mātra nirūpaṇam kṛtam

original: iha tu pratibandhasvarūpam api pratipādyate //
analyzed: iha tu pratibandha svarūpam api pratipādyate

original: tathā hi arthātmake hetau lakṣye paṃcamīmapāsya udāharaṇasādharmye sādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ iti sūtraṃ paṭhanti /
analyzed: tathā hi artha ātmake hetau lakṣye paṃcamīm apāsya udāharaṇa sādharmye sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti sūtram paṭhanti

original: vyācakṣate ca sādharmya hetur ity ucyamāne gandhavattvāder asādhāraṇahetoḥ sādhyadharmivyaktibhedavṛttitvena sādharmyarūpasaṃbhavāt viruddhasya ca pakṣavipakṣavṛtteḥ tatsādharmyasvabhāvatvāt hetutvaṃ prasajyata iti tannivṛttyarthaṃ udāharaṇagrahaṇam /
analyzed: vyācakṣate ca sādharmya hetuḥ iti ucyamāne gandhavat tva ādeḥ asādhāraṇa hetoḥ sādhya dharmi vyakti bheda vṛtti tvena sādharmya rūpa saṃbhavāt viruddhasya ca pakṣa vipakṣa vṛtteḥ tad sādharmya svabhāva tvāt hetu tvam prasajyate iti tad nivṛtti artham udāharaṇa grahaṇam

original: udāhṛyate 'smin sādhyasādhanayorḥ prayojyaprayojakabhāva ity udāharaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: udāhṛyate smin sādhya sādhanayoḥ prayojya prayojaka bhāvaḥ iti udāharaṇam dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: tena sādharmyaṃ kasyeti prakṛtatvāt pratyāsatteś ca sādhyadharmiṇa ity avagamyate /
analyzed: tena sādharmyam kasya iti prakṛta tvāt pratyāsatteḥ ca sādhya dharmiṇaḥ iti avagamyate

original: udāharaṇasādharmye sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmisādhāraṇo dharmo hetur iti nāsādhāraṇādau tathāvaprasaktir iti //
analyzed: udāharaṇa sādharmye sādhya dṛṣṭānta dharmi sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ hetuḥ iti na asādhāraṇa ādau tathau aprasaktiḥ iti

original: evam api prameyatvāder naikāntikahetoḥ tathā bhāgasiddhasyānityatvasiddhaye caturvidhaparamāṇupakṣīkaraṇe gandhavattvādeḥ prakaraṇasamakālātyayāpadiṣṭayoś ca udāharaṇasādharmyasaṃbhavāt hetutvaṃ bhaved iti tadvyavacchedāya sādhyasādhanagrahaṇam /
analyzed: evam api prameya tva ādeḥ na aikāntika hetoḥ tathā bhāgasiddhasya anitya tva siddhaye caturvidha paramāṇu pakṣīkaraṇe gandhavat tva ādeḥ prakaraṇa sama kāla atyaya apadiṣṭayoḥ ca udāharaṇa sādharmya saṃbhavāt hetu tvam bhavet iti tad vyavacchedāya sādhya sādhana grahaṇam

original: sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmiṇoś ca samāno dharma sādhyo 'py anityatvādiḥ bhavaty eveti tasyāpi hetutā mā prasāṅkṣīt iti sādhyasādhanagrahaṇam /
analyzed: sādhya dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇoḥ ca samānaḥ dharma sādhyaḥ api anitya tva ādiḥ bhavati eva iti tasya api hetutā mā prasāṅkṣīt iti sādhya sādhana grahaṇam

original: liṅgasāmānyalābhārthaṃ sādhyasādhanaṃ yad udāharaṇasādharmyaṃ sa hetur iti //
analyzed: liṅga sāmānya lābha artham sādhya sādhanam yat udāharaṇa sādharmyam sa hetuḥ iti

original: sādhyasādhanaśabdena ca pratibandho lakṣyate /
analyzed: sādhya sādhana śabdena ca pratibandhaḥ lakṣyate

original: sa ca savyabhicārādiṣu nāstīti na te hetavaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca savyabhicāra ādiṣu na asti iti na te hetavaḥ

original: pratibandhaś ca paṃcalakṣaṇaka ity ekaikalakṣaṇāpāyakṛtahetvābhāsapaṃcakanirdeśād eva sūtritavānācāryaḥ //
analyzed: pratibandhaḥ ca paṃca lakṣaṇakaḥ iti ekaika lakṣaṇa apāya kṛta hetvābhāsa paṃcaka nirdeśāt eva sūtritavān ācāryaḥ

original: nanu evaṃ tarhi sādhyasādhanagrahaṇam eva hetulakṣaṇam astu /
analyzed: nanu evam tarhi sādhya sādhana grahaṇam eva hetu lakṣaṇam astu

original: tad adhisakalahetvābhāsavyudādasamartham iti kim udāharaṇasādharmyagrahaṇena na samānajātīyavyavacchedārthatvāt /
analyzed: tat adhi sakala hetvābhāsa vyudāda samartham iti kim udāharaṇa sādharmya grahaṇena na samāna jātīya vyavaccheda ārtha tvāt

original: ahetavo hi vijātīyāḥ /
analyzed: ahetavaḥ hi vijātīyāḥ

original: tadvyavacchedaḥ sādhyasādhanagrahaṇāt /
analyzed: tad vyavacchedaḥ sādhya sādhana grahaṇāt

original: samānajātīyasya kevalavyatirekiṇaḥ vyavacchedāya udāharaṇasādharmyagrahaṇam iti //
analyzed: samāna jātīyasya kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ vyavacchedāya udāharaṇa sādharmya grahaṇam iti

original: tat kiṃ kevalānvayī hetur iti lakṣyatvena vivakṣitaḥ na tathāvidhasya hetor abhāvāt /
analyzed: tat kim kevala anvayī hetuḥ iti lakṣya tvena vivakṣitaḥ na tathāvidhasya hetoḥ abhāvāt

original: anvayavyatirekavān eva lakṣyaḥ /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekavān eva lakṣyaḥ

original: tatrodāharaṇasādharmyavaidharmyasaṃbhave tu sati sādharmyam apy asty eveti /
analyzed: tatra udāharaṇa sādharmya vaidharmya saṃbhave tu sati sādharmyam api asti eva iti

original: na sāvadhāraṇaṃ vā viśeṣavidhirūpeṇaivedam udāharaṇasādharmyagrahaṇaṃ kevalānvayilakṣaṇaṃ varṇīyam iti //
analyzed: na sa avadhāraṇam vā viśeṣa vidhi rūpeṇa eva idam udāharaṇa sādharmya grahaṇam kevala anvayi lakṣaṇam varṇīyam iti

original: nanu yadi dvividho hetur iṣyate tarhi sāmānyalakṣaṇam ādau vaktavyam tato viśeṣalakṣaṇam iti ucyate sādhyasādhanagrahaṇam eva pratibandhasūcakaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: nanu yadi dvividhaḥ hetuḥ iṣyate tarhi sāmānya lakṣaṇam ādau vaktavyam tatas viśeṣa lakṣaṇam iti ucyate sādhya sādhana grahaṇam eva pratibandha sūcakam sāmānya lakṣaṇam bhaviṣyati

original: udāharaṇasādharmyagrahaṇaṃ tu anvayavyatirekiṇo lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: udāharaṇa sādharmya grahaṇam tu anvaya vyatirekiṇaḥ lakṣaṇam

original: uttarasūtraṃ ca kevalavyatirekiṇaḥ /
analyzed: uttara sūtram ca kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ

original: kevalānvayī hetur nāsty evety evaṃ paṃcamīm upekṣyārthātmakahetulakṣaṇam ācakhyuḥ //
analyzed: kevala anvayī hetuḥ na asti eva iti evam paṃcamīm upekṣya artha ātmaka hetu lakṣaṇam ācakhyuḥ

original: api vā bhavatu tatrāpi saṃśayavyavacchedaphalaḥ paṃcamīpāṭhaḥ /
analyzed: api vā bhavatu tatra api saṃśaya vyavaccheda phalaḥ paṃcamī pāṭhaḥ

original: kaścid evam abhidhīta sādhyasādhanam iti paryāyapaṭhanamātram etat na hetulakṣaṇam /
analyzed: kaścid evam abhidhīta sādhya sādhanam iti paryāya paṭhana mātram etat na hetu lakṣaṇam

original: api ca yatraiva dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi hetudharmaprayuktatayā sādhyadharmo 'vadhāritaḥ tatraiva punaḥ asāv upalabhyamānaḥ tam upasthāpayatu /
analyzed: api ca yatra eva dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi hetu dharma prayukta tayā sādhya dharmaḥ vadhāritaḥ tatra eva punar asau upalabhyamānaḥ tam upasthāpayatu

original: dharmyantare tu tad upalambhāt bhavatu saṃśayaḥ kiṃ tat sādhyāvinābhūtam iha hetos sattvaṃ utānyatheti /
analyzed: dharmi antare tu tat upalambhāt bhavatu saṃśayaḥ kim tat sādhya avinābhūtam iha hetoḥ sattvam uta anyathā iti

original: tasyedam uttaram ucyate udāharaṇasādharmyāt iti //
analyzed: tasya idam uttaram ucyate udāharaṇa sādharmyāt iti

original: ayam arthaḥ deśakālavyaktiviśeṣāṇāṃ vyabhicārāt na teṣu pratibandhāvadhāraṇam api tu sāmānyadharmayor eva //
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ deśa kāla vyakti viśeṣāṇām vyabhicārāt na teṣu pratibandha avadhāraṇam api tu sāmānya dharmayoḥ eva

original: vyaktibhedāśrayatve hi naiva vyāptigraho bhavet /
analyzed: vyakti bheda āśraya tve hi nā eva vyāpti grahaḥ bhavet

original: dṛṣṭānte 'py abhyanujñaivaṃ bhavatā dīyate katham //
analyzed: dṛṣṭānte pi abhyanujñā evam bhavatā dīyate katham

original: tadabhyaujñānāt tu sāmānyena vyāptigrahaṇam aṅgikṛtam eva bhavati /
analyzed: tad abhyaujñānāt tu sāmānyena vyāpti grahaṇam aṅgi kṛtam eva bhavati

original: tasmiṃś ca sati udāharaṇasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanam eva bhavati na saṃśayaḥ saṃśayasya viśeṣāgrahaṇakatvāt /
analyzed: tasmin ca sati udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam eva bhavati na saṃśayaḥ saṃśayasya viśeṣa agrahaṇaka tvāt

original: iha ca udāharaṇasādharmyapadopāttaṃ liṅgasāmānyam eva viśeṣo gṛhyata iti kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: iha ca udāharaṇa sādharmya pada upāttam liṅga sāmānyam eva viśeṣaḥ gṛhyate iti kutas saṃśayaḥ

original: sādhyasādhanapadam api na paryāyamātram api tu paṃcalakṣaṇakapratibandhasūcanena hetoḥ hetutvasamarthanārtham eva /
analyzed: sādhya sādhana padam api na paryāya mātram api tu paṃca lakṣaṇaka pratibandha sūcanena hetoḥ hetu tva samarthana artham eva

original: kasmāt hetur hetur bhavati sādhyasādhanatvāt gamakatvād ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: kasmāt hetuḥ hetuḥ bhavati sādhya sādhana tvāt gamaka tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: sādhyasādhanatā cāsya paṃcalakṣaṇakāt pratibandhād vinā na nirvahatīti asau sādhyasādhanapadena lakṣyate /
analyzed: sādhya sādhana tā ca asya paṃca lakṣaṇakāt pratibandhāt vinā na nirvahati iti asau sādhya sādhana padena lakṣyate

original: so 'pi ca prayojyaprayojakabhāvagarbhaḥ sādhanatāṅgatām etīti tathāvidha eva sūcyate //
analyzed: saḥ pi ca prayojya prayojaka bhāva garbhaḥ sādhanatā aṅga tām eti iti tathāvidhaḥ eva sūcyate

original: ata eva cāprayojaka evaikaḥ paramārthato hetvābhāsa iti vakṣyate //
analyzed: atas eva ca aprayojakaḥ evā ekaḥ paramārthataḥ hetvābhāsaḥ iti vakṣyate

original: tad idam īdṛśaṃ sādhyasādhanatvaṃ hetoḥ kuto bhavatīti udāharaṇasādharmyāt iti saṃśayaṃ vyavacchindantyā paṃcamyā kathyate //
analyzed: tat idam īdṛśam sādhya sādhana tvam hetoḥ kutas bhavati iti udāharaṇa sādharmyāt iti saṃśayam vyavacchindantyā paṃcamyā kathyate

original: ataś ca yad ucyate paraiḥ sādharmyaṃ yadi hetuḥ syāt na vākyāṃśo na paṃcamī iti tad idam anupapannam paṃcamyā arthātmakatve hetāv anupayogāt /
analyzed: atas ca yat ucyate paraiḥ sādharmyam yadi hetuḥ syāt na vākya aṃśaḥ na paṃcamī iti tat idam anupapannam paṃcamyāḥ artha ātmaka tve hetau anupayogāt

original: tatrāpi vā tayās samarthitatvāt /
analyzed: tatra api vā tayāḥ samarthita tvāt

original: vākyāṃśe lakṣanāntarakaraṇāt /
analyzed: vākya aṃśe lakṣanā antara karaṇāt

original: tac cedam idānīm ucyate udāharaṇasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ /
analyzed: tat ca idam idānīm ucyate udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ

original: yathoktād udāharaṇasādharmyāt vivakṣādikrameṇa yadvacanaṃ pravartate sa hetuḥ //
analyzed: yathā uktāt udāharaṇa sādharmyāt vivakṣā ādi krameṇa yat vacanam pravartate sa hetuḥ

original: yady api ca jñānasyāpy udāharaṇasādharmyāt karmabhūtāt karaṇātmakād vā bhavaty abhinirvṛttiḥ tathāpi vākyāvayavakaraṇasāmarthyāt vacanam avasīyate //
analyzed: yadi api ca jñānasya api udāharaṇa sādharmyāt karma bhūtāt karaṇa ātmakāt vā bhavati abhinirvṛttiḥ tathā api vākya avayava karaṇa sāmarthyāt vacanam avasīyate

original: yadi vākyāvayavakaraṇam idam kim arthaṃ tarhy arhtavyutpādanam uktam atra tadaupayikatvād iti //
analyzed: yadi vākya avayava karaṇam idam kim artham tarhi arhta vyutpādanam uktam atra tad aupayika tvāt iti

original: sādhyasādhanagrahaṇaṃ vacanalakṣaṇe kim arhtam hetvābhāsavacananirasanam arthātmakahetunirasanād eva hi siddham na hetvābhāsavacanavyavacchedārthaṃ tat /
analyzed: sādhya sādhana grahaṇam vacana lakṣaṇe kim arhtam hetvābhāsa vacana nirasanam artha ātmaka hetu nirasanāt eva hi siddham na hetvābhāsa vacana vyavaccheda artham tat

original: kin tu hetuvacanaviśeṣapratipattyartham /
analyzed: kim tu hetuvacana viśeṣa pratipatti artham

original: na svarūpamātranirdeśakaṃ vacanam kṛtakatvam ity evamādi prayoktavyam api tu hetuvibhaktyantaṃ kṛtakatvāt iti kṛtakatvena iti kṛtako 'yam asmāt iti vā 'bhidhātavyam /
analyzed: na svarūpa mātra nirdeśakam vacanam kṛtaka tvam iti evamādi prayoktavyam api tu hetu vibhakti antam kṛtaka tvāt iti kṛtaka tvena iti kṛtakaḥ yam asmāt iti vā bhidhātavyam

original: evaṃ hi tat sādhyasādhanaṃ bhavatīti //
analyzed: evam hi tat sādhya sādhanam bhavati iti

original: tathā vaidharmyāt //1-1-35 //
analyzed: tathā vaidharmyāt

original: udāharaṇagrahaṇam anuvartate sādhyasādhanam iti ca /
analyzed: udāharaṇa grahaṇam anuvartate sādhya sādhanam iti ca

original: etac ca tathā śabdopādānasāmarthyād gamyate udāharaṇavaidharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ /
analyzed: etat ca tathā śabda upādāna sāmarthyāt gamyate udāharaṇa vaidharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ

original: atrāpy arthātmakahetupūrvakanvāt tadvacanasyārthātmaka eva hetuḥ prathamaṃ prayujyata iti tallakṣaṇāya pūrvavat paṃcamīpāṭhaśūnyam eva sūtraṃ varṇayanti /
analyzed: atra api artha ātmaka hetu pūrvaka nvāt tad vacanasya artha ātmakaḥ eva hetuḥ prathamam prayujyate iti tad lakṣaṇāya pūrvavat paṃcamī pāṭha śūnyam eva sūtram varṇayanti

original: vaidharmyahetuḥ ity ucyamāne pakṣavaidharmyasyāpi vipakṣavṛtteḥ aśeṣāśvavyaktipakṣīkaraṇe turagā ime viṣāṇitvāt ity evam āder hetutvaṃ syāt iti udāharaṇagrahaṇam //
analyzed: vaidharmya hetuḥ iti ucyamāne pakṣa vaidharmyasya api vipakṣa vṛtteḥ aśeṣa aśva vyakti pakṣīkaraṇe turagāḥ ime viṣāṇi tvāt iti evam ādeḥ hetu tvam syāt iti udāharaṇa grahaṇam

original: tathāpy asādhāraṇādeḥ udāharaṇavaidharmyasya hetutā prasajyata iti pūrvavat sādhyasādhanagrahaṇaṃ pratibandhasūcakaṃ sakalahetvābhāsavyavacchedakaṃ yojanīyam //
analyzed: tathā api asādhāraṇa ādeḥ udāharaṇa vaidharmyasya hetutā prasajyate iti pūrvavat sādhya sādhana grahaṇam pratibandha sūcakam sakala hetvābhāsa vyavacchedakam yojanīyam

original: tasmād eva sakalahetvābhāsavyavacchedasiddheḥ udāharaṇavaidharmyagrahaṇaṃ samānajātīyānvayavyatirekihetuvyavacchedāya vyākhyeyam //
analyzed: tasmāt eva sakala hetvābhāsa vyavaccheda siddheḥ udāharaṇa vaidharmya grahaṇam samāna jātīya anvaya vyatireki hetu vyavacchedāya vyākhyeyam

original: nanu vaidharmyaśabdah kevalānvayinam eva hetuṃ avyatirekaṃ vyavacchettum alam tasya vaidhrmyaṃśūnyatvāt /
analyzed: nanu vaidharmya śabdaḥ kevala anvayinam eva hetum avyatirekam vyavacchettum alam tasya vaidhrmya śūnya tvāt

original: anvayavyatirekiṇas tu hetoḥ udāharaṇasādharmyavat tadvaidharmyasyāpi bhāvāt katham anena vyāvartanam ucyate vaidharmyaśabdopādānāt kevalānvayino yathā /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekiṇaḥ tu hetoḥ udāharaṇa sādharmya vat tad vaidharmyasya api bhāvāt katham anena vyāvartanam ucyate vaidharmya śabda upādānāt kevala anvayinaḥ yathā

original: nivrttir gamyate tadvat anvayavyatirekiṇaḥ //
analyzed: nivrttiḥ gamyate tadvat anvaya vyatirekiṇaḥ

original: sādhyasādhanaśabdo hi pratibandhopalakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: sādhya sādhana śabdaḥ hi pratibandha upalakṣaṇaḥ

original: vyākhyātah pratibandhaś ca vyatirekānvayātmakaḥ //
analyzed: vyākhyātaḥ pratibandhaḥ ca vyatireka anvaya ātmakaḥ

original: vaidharmyasādhane 'py asmin sa eva yadi varṇyate /
analyzed: vaidharmya sādhane pi asmin saḥ eva yadi varṇyate

original: pūrvatrakathanād vyarthaṃ vaidharmyagrahanaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: vyartham vaidharmya grahanam bhavet

original: kevalavyatirekākhyapratibandhābhidhitsayā /
vaidharmyavacanaṃ tasmāt saphalaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate //
analyzed: vaidharmya vacanam tasmāt saphalam vyavatiṣṭhate

original: adhyāhṛtaivakāram vā tadvyudāsāya paṭhyatām /
analyzed: adhyāhṛta eva kāram vā tad vyudāsāya paṭhyatām

original: 1 viśeṣavidhirūpeṇa vyākhyānaṃ vā vidhīyatām //
analyzed: viśeṣa vidhi rūpeṇa vyākhyānam vā vidhīyatām

original: kevalānvayihetuś ca na kaścid upalabhyate /
analyzed: kevala anvayi hetuḥ ca na kaścid upalabhyate

original: tena pūrvokta evāsya vyavacchedyo bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: tena pūrva uktaḥ eva asya vyavacchedyaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: nanu evaṃ tarhi anenaiva nyāyena pūrvasūtraṃ kevalātvayilakṣaṇārthaṃ syāt yatheiha vaidharmyagrahaṇaṃ sādharmyavyavacchedakam evaṃ  tatra sādharmyagrahanaṃ vaidharmyavyavacchedāya syād iti uktam atra na kevālānvayī nāma hetuḥ saṃbhavatīty alakṣaṇīya evāsau /
analyzed: nanu evam tarhi anena eva nyāyena pūrva sūtram syāt yathā iha vaidharmya grahaṇam sādharmya vyavacchedakam evam tatra sādharmya grahanam vaidharmya vyavacchedāya syāt iti uktam atra na kevāla anvayī nāma hetuḥ saṃbhavati iti alakṣaṇīyaḥ eva asau

original: tad evam anvayavyatirekavato hetoḥ lakṣaṇāya pūrvasūtram /
analyzed: tat evam anvaya vyatirekavataḥ hetoḥ lakṣaṇāya pūrva sūtram

original: idaṃ tu kevalavyatirekilakṣaṇāyeti sthitam //
analyzed: idam tu kevala vyatireki lakṣaṇāya iti sthitam

original: arthātmakahetulakṣaṇapakṣe 'pi paṃcamīpāṭhaḥ pūrvavat saṃśayaparākaraṇaphalatvena varṇanīyaḥ /
analyzed: artha ātmaka hetu lakṣaṇa pakṣe pi paṃcamī pāṭhaḥ pūrvavat saṃśaya parākaraṇa phala tvena varṇanīyaḥ

original: vacanātmakahetulakṣaṇe 'pi tathaiva sūtraṃ yojyam /
analyzed: vacana ātmaka hetu lakṣaṇe tathā eva sūtram yojyam

original: yathoktavaidharmyāt pravṛttaṃ vacanaṃ sādhyasādhanaṃ hetuvibhaktyantaṃ prayoktavyam iti //
analyzed: yathā ukta vaidharmyāt pravṛttam vacanam sādhya sādhanam hetu vibhakti antam prayoktavyam iti

original: tad etad ākṣipanti lakṣye sati lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tat etat ākṣipanti lakṣye sati lakṣaṇam vaktavyam bhavati

original: kevalavyatireki tu nāma na samasty eva hetur iti kasyedaṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate /
analyzed: kevala vyatireki tu nāma na samasti eva hetuḥ iti kasya idam lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: pratibandhena hi hetor gamakatvam uktam /
analyzed: pratibandhena hi hetoḥ gamaka tvam uktam

original: pratibandhaś ca paṃcalakṣaṇako vyākhyātaḥ /
analyzed: pratibandhaḥ ca paṃca lakṣaṇakaḥ vyākhyātaḥ

original: ekaikalakṣaṇavirahanibandhanāś ca paṃcahetvābhāsā bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: ekaika lakṣaṇa viraha nibandhanāḥ ca paṃca hetvābhāsāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: tat pakṣadharmatvavirahiṇa ivāsiddhasya hetor anvayaśūnyasyāpi na hetutā yuktā /
analyzed: tat pakṣa dharma tva virahiṇaḥ iva asiddhasya hetoḥ anvaya śūnyasya api na hetutā yuktā

original: kevalavyatirekamātraśaraṇena hetunā sādhyasiddhau tathāvidhasiddhisubhikṣasaṃbhavāt yat yasmai rocate sa tat sarvaṃ sādhayet /
analyzed: kevala vyatireka mātra śaraṇena hetunā sādhya siddhau tathāvidha siddhi subhikṣa saṃbhavāt yat yasmai rocate sa tat sarvam sādhayet

original: asādhāraṇasya vā kim iti hetutvaṃ vyatirekavato 'pi niṣyate //
analyzed: asādhāraṇasya vā kim iti hetu tvam vyatirekavataḥ pi niṣyate

original: api ca anvayasyāparicchedāt vyatireko 'pi saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: api ca anvayasya aparicchedāt saṃśayaḥ

original: sādhyābhāvakṛtā tasmāt vyāvṛttir uta vā 'nyathā //
analyzed: sādhya abhāva kṛtā tasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ uta vā nyathā

original: anvaye hi kvacid gṛhīte 'nyatra hetuvyāvṛttir avagamyamānā sādhyavyāvṛttikṛtaiveti avadhāryate netarathā /
analyzed: anvaye hi kvacid gṛhīte nyatra hetu vyāvṛttiḥ avagamyamānā sādhya vyāvṛtti kṛtā evā iti avadhāryate na itarathā

original: ittham eva ca sandigdhavyatirekata vyāvartate nānyatheti //
analyzed: ittham eva ca vyāvartate na anyathā iti

original: sandigdhavyatireke ca sādhyasādhanatā katham /
analyzed: sandigdha vyatireke ca sādhya sādhana tā katham

original: lakṣyābhāvād ataś cedaṃ kathyate tasya lakṣanam //
analyzed: lakṣya abhāvāt atas ca idam kathyate tasya lakṣanam

original: tasmān na sādhyasādhanagrahaṇena hetudvayasāmānyalakṣaṇam abhidhāya udāharaṇasādharmyagrahaṇena anvayavyatirekiṇo lakṣaṇam udāharaṇavaidharmyagrahaṇena ca kevalavyatirekiṇo varṇanīyam /
analyzed: tasmāt na sādhya sādhana grahaṇena hetu dvaya sāmānya lakṣaṇam abhidhāya udāharaṇa sādharmya grahaṇena anvaya vyatirekiṇaḥ lakṣaṇam udāharaṇa vaidharmya grahaṇena ca kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ varṇanīyam

original: api tu sūtradvayenaikasyaivānvayavyatirekavato hetor lakṣaṇaṃ vyākhyeyam /
analyzed: api tu sūtra dvayena ekasya eva anvaya vyatirekavataḥ hetoḥ lakṣaṇam vyākhyeyam

original: anvayavyatirekayor gamakāṅgatvāt ekenānvayanirūpaṇaṃ apareṇa ca sūtreṇa vyatirekavyutpādanam /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekayoḥ gamaka aṅga tvāt ekena anvaya nirūpaṇam apareṇa ca sūtreṇa vyatireka vyutpādanam

original: ata eva bhāṣyakāraḥ kim etāvad dhetulakṣaṇam nety ucyate tathā vaidharmyāt ity ekavākyatayaiva vyākhyātavān /
analyzed: atas eva bhāṣyakāraḥ kim etāvat hetu lakṣaṇam na iti ucyate tathā vaidharmyāt iti ekavākyatayā eva vyākhyātavān

original: udāharaṇam api ca sūtradvaye tulyam eva anvayavyatirekihetor uktavān utpattidharmakatvāt iti //
analyzed: udāharaṇam api ca sūtra dvaye tulyam eva anvaya vyatireki hetoḥ uktavān utpatti dharmaka tvāt iti

original: atra vadanti yadi vayaṃ kaṃcana śuṣkam eva kevalavyatirekiṇaṃ hetum upagacchema tata evam anuyujyemahi /
analyzed: atra vadanti yadi vayam kaṃcana śuṣkam eva kevala vyatirekiṇam hetum upagacchema tatas evam anuyujyemahi

original: kin tva anvayavyatirekavān eṣa hetuḥ kvacit sādhyaviśeṣe viśeṣaṇavaśāt kevalavyatirekitām avalambata iti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: kin tva anvaya vyatirekavān eṣa hetuḥ kvacid sādhya viśeṣe viśeṣaṇa vaśāt kevala vyatireki tām avalambate iti brūmaḥ

original: tad yathā icchādigataṃ kāryatvam ātmasiddhau /
analyzed: tat yathā icchā ādi gatam kāryatvam ātma siddhau

original: tatra hi kāryatvamātraṃ āśritatvamātreṇa vyāptam upalabdham anvayavyatirekayuktam eva ghaṭādeḥ kāryasyāśritasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: tatra hi kāryatva mātram āśrita tva mātreṇa vyāptam upalabdham anvaya vyatireka yuktam eva ghaṭa ādeḥ kāryasya āśritasya dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: yatra cāśritatvaṃ nāsti tatra kāryatvam api nāsty eva vyomādau /
analyzed: yatra ca āśrita tvam nā asti tatra kārya tvam api nā asti eva vyoma ādau

original: so 'yam anvayavyatirekavān eva hetuḥ yadā paridṛśyamānaśarīrādyāśrayavyatiriktāśrayāśritatve sādhye dehādiṣu bādhakopapattau satyāṃ kāryatvāt iti saviśeṣaṇaḥ prayujyate tadā kavalavyatirekī saṃpadyate /
analyzed: saḥ yam anvaya vyatirekavān eva hetuḥ yadā paridṛśyamāna śarīra ādi āśraya vyatirikta āśraya āśrita tve sādhye deha ādiṣu bādhaka upapattau satyām kārya tvāt iti sa viśeṣaṇaḥ prayujyate tadā kavala vyatirekī saṃpadyate

original: dehādi yatiriktasyāśrayasyātmano nityaparokṣatvenānvayānupalambhād iti //
analyzed: deha ādi yatiriktasya āśrayasya ātmanaḥ nitya parokṣa tvena anvaya anupalambhāt iti

original: dṛśyasya cānvayamūlasya tasyāṃ daśāyāṃ kevalavyatirekitām upagatasya hetutvopagamāt na pūrvoktadoṣāvasarah /
analyzed: dṛśyasya ca anvaya mūlasya tasyām daśāyām kevala vyatireki tām upagatasya hetu tva upagamāt na pūrva ukta doṣa avasaraḥ

original: na hīdṛśā hetunā sarvaḥ sarvasādhayitum utsahate /
analyzed: na hi īdṛśā hetunā sarvaḥ sarva sādhayitum utsahate

original: na cāsādhāraṇasya hetutvaṃ itthaṃ sthite prasajyeta /
analyzed: na ca asādhāraṇasya hetu tvam ittham sthite prasajyeta

original: paṃcalakṣaṇatvam api pūrvāśrayāpekṣam asya bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: paṃca lakṣaṇa tvam api pūrva āśraya apekṣam asya bhaviṣyati

original: yac ca sandigdhavyatirekitvam āśaṅkitaṃ tad py anvayavyatirekamūle kevalavyatirekiṇi niravakāśam kāryasyāśritasyopalambhāt aśritatvavyāvṛttyā vyomādau ca kāryatvavyāvṛttidarśanāt /
analyzed: yat ca sandigdha vyatireki tvam āśaṅkitam tat pi anvaya vyatireka mūle kevala vyatirekiṇi niravakāśam kāryasya āśritasya upalambhāt aśrita tva vyāvṛttyā vyoma ādau ca kārya tva vyāvṛtti darśanāt

original: idānīṃ ghaṭādau śarīre vā saviśeṣavyāvṛttir dṛśyamānā viśiṣṭāśrayavyāvṛttikṛtaivāvagamyata iti na sandigdho vyatirekaḥ /
analyzed: idānīm ghaṭa ādau śarīre vā sa viśeṣa vyāvṛttiḥ dṛśyamānā viśiṣṭa āśraya vyāvṛtti kṛtā eva avagamyate iti na sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ

original: etac cātmasiddhiprasaṅge nirṇītam iti nirapavādaḥ kevalavyatirekī hetur asty eva lakṣya iti tallakṣaṇārtham uttarasūtram /
analyzed: etat ca ātma siddhi prasaṅge nirṇītam iti nirapavādaḥ kevala vyatirekī hetuḥ asti eva lakṣyaḥ iti tad lakṣaṇa artham uttara sūtram

original: anvayavyatirekihetulakṣaṇārthaṃ pūrvasūtram /
analyzed: anvaya vyatireki hetu lakṣaṇa artham pūrva sūtram

original: kevalānvayī hetur nāsty eva /
analyzed: kevala anvayī hetuḥ na asti eva

original: sāmānyalakṣaṇe tu anumānalakṣaṇavat sādhyasādhanapadād vā 'vagantavyam //
analyzed: sāmānya lakṣaṇe tu anumāna lakṣaṇa vat sādhya sādhana padāt vā vagantavyam

original: bhāṣyākārāṇi tu kāmam upakṣiṣyāmahe /
analyzed: bhāṣya ākārāṇi tu kāmam upakṣiṣyāmahe

original: athavā yathā kathaṃcid vā vyākhyāsyāmaḥ /
analyzed: athavā yathā kathaṃcid vā vyākhyāsyāmaḥ

original: kevalavyatirekiṇaṃ tv īdṛśam ātmādiprasādhane paramamastram upekṣituṃ na śaknum iti ayathābhāṣyam api vyākhyānaṃ śreyaḥ //
analyzed: kevala vyatirekiṇam tu īdṛśam ātma ādi prasādhane paramam astram upekṣitum na śaknum iti ayathā bhāṣyam api vyākhyānam śreyaḥ

original: sādhyasādharmyāt taddharmabhāvi dṛṣṭānta udāharaśṇam //1-1-36 //
analyzed: sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvi dṛṣṭānte

original: yathā [tatpūrvakam anumānam] ity atra pratibandhagrahaṇopāyamātraṃ pratipāditam /
analyzed: yathā tad pūrvakam anumānam iti atra pratibandha grahaṇa upāya mātram pratipāditam

original: iha tu pratibandhasvarūpam udāharaṇasādharmyam uktam /
analyzed: iha tu pratibandha svarūpam udāharaṇa sādharmyam uktam

original: evaṃ laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭānta ity atra vādiprativādipratipannatvaṃ dvividhasyāpi dṛṣṭāntasya sāmānyalakṣaṇam uktam /
analyzed: evam laukika parīkṣakāṇām yasmin arthe buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti atra vādi prativādi pratipanna tvam dvividhasya api dṛṣṭāntasya sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktam

original: iha tu prayojyaprayojakabhāvavyavasthitasādhyasādhanadharmādhikaraṇatvam ekasya dvitīyasya ca tadrahitatvaṃ lakṣaṇam upapadyate //
analyzed: iha tu prayojya prayojaka bhāva vyavasthita sādhya sādhana dharma adhikaraṇa tvam ekasya dvitīyasya ca tad rahita tvam lakṣaṇam upapadyate

original: tatra sādhyasādharmyāt taddharmabhāvī iti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntasya lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: tatra sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī iti sādharmya dṛṣṭāntasya lakṣaṇam

original: vacanādhikāre 'pi arthātmakadṛṣṭāntacintanaṃ tadaupayikatvāt hetuvat kartavyam //
analyzed: vacana adhikāre pi artha ātmaka dṛṣṭānta cintanam tad aupayika tvāt hetu vat kartavyam

original: sādhyaḥ dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī tena sādharmyaṃ samāno dharmaḥ liṅgasāmānyaṃ yat udāharaṇasādharmyaṃ pūrvam uktaṃ tad eva dviṣṭhatvāt ubhābhyāṃ vyapadiśyate iti iha ca sādhyasādharmyapadenoktam /
analyzed: sādhyaḥ dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī tena sādharmyam samānaḥ dharmaḥ liṅga sāmānyam yat udāharaṇa sādharmyam pūrvam uktam tat eva dviṣṭha tvāt ubhābhyām vyapadiśyate iti iha ca sādhya sādharmya padena uktam

original: tasmāt sādhyasādharmyāt yaḥ taddharmabhāvi tasya sādhyasya dharmaḥ nityatvādiḥ yasmin bhavati saḥ taddharmabhāvī /
analyzed: tasmāt sādhya sādharmyāt yaḥ taddharma bhāvi tasya sādhyasya dharmaḥ nitya tva ādiḥ yasmin bhavati saḥ taddharma bhāvī

original: paṃcamyā prayojakatvam ucyate /
analyzed: paṃcamyā prayojaka tvam ucyate

original: hetu dharmaprayukto hi sādhyadharmaḥ yatrāsti saḥ sādharmyadṛṣṭānta ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: hetu dharma prayuktaḥ hi sādhya dharmaḥ yatra asti saḥ sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: sa eva ca vacasaḥ karmatāṃ pratipadyamānaḥ udāharaṇaṃ bhavatīti arthavacanavācinoḥ dṛṣṭāntodāharaṇaśabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam aviruddham //
analyzed: saḥ eva ca vacasaḥ karmatām pratipadyamānaḥ udāharaṇam bhavati iti artha vacana vācinoḥ dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇa śabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam aviruddham

original: dṛṣṭānta evānvayakhyāpakena vacanenocyamānaḥ udāharaṇaṃ ity ukte sati tadabhidhāyakaṃ vacanaṃ udāharaṇaṃ bhavaty eva /
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva anvaya khyāpakena vacanena ucyamānaḥ udāharaṇam iti ukte sati tad abhidhāyakam vacanam udāharaṇam bhavati eva

original: yad yat kṛtakaṃ tat tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭa iti //
analyzed: yat yat kṛtakam tat tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti

original: nanu evaṃ yatra hetukṛtā sādharmyavattā yathā jaladharonnamanavṛṣṭyādau tādṛśa eva dṛṣṭānta upadiṣṭo bhavet na yatra sādhyadharmakṛtā hetusattā yathā dhūmānumāna iti adarśanajño devānāṃpriyaḥ nātrotpattyapekṣayā prayojyaprayojakabhāvo vivakṣitaḥ kin tu jñāptyabhiprāyena /
analyzed: nanu evam yatra hetu kṛtā sādharmyavat tā yathā jaladhara unnamana vṛṣṭi ādau tādṛśaḥ eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ bhavet na yatra sādhya dharma kṛtā hetu sattā yathā dhūma anumāne iti adarśana jñaḥ devānāṃpriyaḥ na atra utpatti apekṣayā prayojya prayojaka bhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ kin tu jñāpti abhiprāyena

original: jñāptau ca dhūma evāgneḥ prayojakatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: jñāptau ca dhūmaḥ eva agneḥ prayojaka tām pratipadyate

original: na hi dhūmāgnyoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena gamyagamakabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na hi dhūma agnyoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvena gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ

original: kin tu nityasāhacaryeṇaiva niyamanāmnā saṃbandhenety asakṛd uktam //
analyzed: kin tu nitya sāhacaryeṇa eva niyama nāmnā saṃbandhena iti asakṛt uktam

original: dhūmaḥ svarūpato nāma jāyatāṃ jātavedasaḥ /
analyzed: dhūmaḥ svarūpataḥ nāma jāyatām jātavedasaḥ

original: agnis tu nākṣipaty enaṃ sa eva hy agnim ākṣipet //
analyzed: agniḥ tu na ākṣipati enam saḥ eva hi agnim ākṣipet

original: prayojakatvam agenś ca paṃcamyā yadi kathyate /
analyzed: prayojaka tvam ca paṃcamyāḥ yadi kathyate

original: yatra yatrāgnir ity evaṃ tannirdeśaḥ prasajyate //
analyzed: yatra yatra agniḥ iti evam tad nirdeśaḥ prasajyate

original: yasya prayojakatvaṃ hi cikhyāpayiṣitaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: yasya prayojaka tvam hi cikhyāpayiṣitam bhavet

original: yac chabdena ca pūrvatra sa hi nirdeśam arthati //
analyzed: yat śabdena ca pūrvatra sa hi nirdeśam arthati

original: bhaved evaṃ ca hetutvaṃ dhūmaṃ prati vibhāvasoḥ /
analyzed: bhavet evam ca hetu tvam dhūmam prati vibhāvasoḥ

original: na ca tad yujyate vaktuṃ anaikāntikadoṣataḥ //
analyzed: na ca tat yujyate vaktum anaikāntika doṣataḥ

original: prayojakatvam icchanti tasmān notpattyapekṣayā /
analyzed: prayojaka tvam icchanti tasmāt na utpatti apekṣayā

original: api tu jñaptyabhiprāyaṃ hetor evocitaṃ ca tat //
analyzed: api tu jñapti abhiprāyam hetoḥ eva ucitam ca tat

original: tasmāt hetudharmaprayuktaḥ sādhyadharmaḥ yatra khyāpyate sa sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt hetu dharma prayuktaḥ sādhya dharmaḥ yatra khyāpyate sa sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: tadvacanam udāharaṇam iti siddham //
analyzed: tad vacanam udāharaṇam iti siddham

original: tadviparyayād vā viparītam //3-2-37 //
analyzed: tad viparyayāt vā viparītam

original: dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇaṃ iti vartate /
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam iti vartate

original: tad iti sādhyasādharmyaparāmarśaḥ /
analyzed: tat iti sādhya sādharmya parāmarśaḥ

original: tac ca yady api pūrvasūtre liṅgasāmānyaṃ vyākhyātam tathāpy ubhayasya saṃbhavād ihānumeyasāmānyaṃ sādhyasādharmyaṃ dṛṣṭavyam /
analyzed: tat ca yadi api pūrva sūtre liṅga sāmānyam vyākhyātam tathā api ubhayasya saṃbhavāt iha anumeya sāmānyam sādhya sādharmyam dṛṣṭavyam

original: tadviparyayāt sādhyābhāvati tadviparītaḥ ataddharmabhāvi sādhanarahitaḥ yo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ pūrvavat vacasaḥ karmatām āpadyamānaḥ vaidharmyodāharaṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tad viparyayāt tad viparītaḥ atad dharma bhāvi sādhana rahitaḥ yaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ pūrvavat vacasaḥ karmatām āpadyamānaḥ vaidharmya udāharaṇam bhavati

original: viparītaṃ ity udāharaṇāpekṣayā napuṃsakaliṅganirdeśaḥ //
analyzed: viparītam iti udāharaṇa apekṣayā napuṃsaka liṅga nirdeśaḥ

original: kimarthaṃ punaḥ sādhyābhāvāt sādhanābhāvo vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto varṇyate na punaḥ sādharmyadṛṣṭāntasthityā sādhanābhāvād eva sādhyābhāva iti uktam atra vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo yaḥ sādhyasādhanadharmayoḥ /
analyzed: kimartham punar sādhya abhāvāt sādhana abhāvaḥ vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ varṇyate na punar sādharmya dṛṣṭānta sthityā sādhana abhāvāt eva sādhya abhāvaḥ iti uktam atra vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ yaḥ sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ

original: sa eva vaiparītyena mantavyas tadabhāvayoḥ iti //
analyzed: saḥ eva vaiparītyena mantavyaḥ tad abhāvayoḥ iti

original: kiṃ kāraṇam /
analyzed: kim kāraṇam

original: sādhanadharme hi dhūme sādhyadharmaṇāgninā vyāpte 'nagniḥ tatra niveśamalabhamāno 'nyatrānavakāśād dhūma eva niviśate /
analyzed: sādhana dharme hi dhūme sādhya dharmaṇā agninā vyāpte na agniḥ tatra niveśam alabhamānaḥ nyatra anavakāśāt dhūmaḥ eva niviśate

original: evaṃ sādhyadharmābhāve 'nagnau sādhanadharmābhāvenādhūmena vyāpte sati dhūmas tatrālabdhāvakāśaḥ ananyagatitvāt agnāv eva niviṣata iti //
analyzed: evam sādhya dharma abhāve nagnau sādhana dharma abhāvena adhūmena vyāpte sati dhūmaḥ tatra alabdha avakāśaḥ ananyagati tvāt agnau eva niviṣate iti

original: yati tu sādharmyadṛṣṭāntavat tathaiva vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ khyāpyate sādhanābhāve sādhyaṃ nāstīti tadā dhūmābhāvenānagnitā vyāptena agnti tatrālabdhaniveśaḥ dhūmam evāvalambeteti syāt /
analyzed: yati tu sādharmya dṛṣṭānta vat tathā eva vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ khyāpyate sādhana abhāve sādhyam na asti iti tadā dhūma abhāvena anagni tā vyāptena agnti tatra alabdha niveśaḥ dhūmam eva avalambeta iti syāt

original: na caitan nirvahati adhūme 'pi vahnidarśanāt ity evaṃ sapakṣaikadeśavṛtter hetutvam api prasiddhaṃ hīret vyāptivaidharmyād iti //
analyzed: na ca etat nirvahati adhūme vahni darśanāt iti evam sapakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ hetu tvam api prasiddham vyāpti vaidharmyāt iti

original: api ca dhūmābhāvenāgnyabhāve vyāpte kathyamāne saty adhūmo niyamito bhavati anagni mā hāsīt iti /
analyzed: api ca dhūma abhāvena agni abhāve vyāpte kathyamāne sati a dhūmaḥ niyamitaḥ bhavati anagni mā hāsīt iti

original: agnis tv anityam iti svātantryād dhūmavad dhūmam pai spṛśed iti vyabhicārāt praibandho viplavet /
analyzed: agniḥ tu anityam iti svātantryāt dhūma vat dhūmam spṛśet iti vyabhicārāt

original: tad uktam yadā tu sādhyābhāvena hetvābhāvo viruddhyate /
analyzed: tat uktam yadā tu sādhya abhāvena hetvābhāvaḥ viruddhyate

original: tadā sādhyaṃ tato dṛṣṭaṃ avatiṣṭheta sādhane //
analyzed: tadā sādhyam tatas dṛṣṭam avatiṣṭheta sādhane

original: evaṃ niyavitaṃ sādhyaṃ sādhane khyāpitaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: evam sādhyam sādhane khyāpitam bhavet

original: sādhanaṃ tu svatantratvāt sādhyābhāve 'pi saṃbhavet //
analyzed: sādhanam tu svatantra tvāt sādhya abhāve pi saṃbhavet

original: tasmāt yatrāpi samavyāptikau sādhyasādhanadharmāv iti sapakṣaikadeśavṛttitvenāhetutvam āśāṅkyate tatrāpi sādhanadharmasya vipakṣāt vyāvṛttirm abhidhitsatrā sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāvo darśayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yatra api sama vyāptikau sādhya sādhana dharmau iti sapakṣa eka deśa vṛtti tvena ahetu tvam āśāṅkyate tatra api sādhana dharmasya vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ abhidhitsatrā sādhya abhāve sādhana abhāvaḥ darśayitavyaḥ

original: yatrānityatvaṃ nāsti tatra kṛtakatvam api nāsti yathā ''kāśa iti //
analyzed: yatra anitya tvam na asti tatra kṛtaka tvam api nā asti yathā kāśe iti

original: yo 'py avidyamānavipakṣo hetuḥ so 'pi sutarāṃ tato vyāvṛtto bhavati tadabhāvāt tatrāvṛtter iti /
analyzed: yaḥ pi avidyamāna vipakṣaḥ hetuḥ saḥ u pi sutarām tatas vyāvṛttaḥ bhavati tad abhāvāt tatra avṛtteḥ iti

original: ataś ca sarvapadārthānityatvavādī evam api vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaṃ pradarśayan na vāryate yatra nityatvaṃ nāsti tatra kṛtakatvam api nāsti yathāśaśaviṣāṇādāv iti //
analyzed: atas ca sarva padārtha anitya tva vādī evam api vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntam pradarśayan na vāryate yatra nitya tvam na asti tatra kṛtaka tvam api nā asti yathā śaśaviṣāṇa ādau iti

original: te ete sādharmyavaidharmyodāharaṇe anvayavyatirekavati hetāu ubhe api saṃbhavantī vikalpena prayoktavye /
analyzed: te ete sādharmya vaidharmya udāharaṇe anvaya vyatirekavati hetau ubhe api saṃbhavantī vikalpena prayoktavye

original: ekenaiva vyāpteḥ pradarśanāt kim anyena kṛtyam //
analyzed: ekena eva vyāpteḥ pradarśanāt kim anyena kṛtyam

original: kecit tu vyāptisauṣṭhavapradarśanāya dvayor api prayogam icchanti /
analyzed: kecid tu vyāpti sauṣṭhava pradarśanāya dvayoḥ api prayogam icchanti

original: sa bhavatu mā vā bhūt /
analyzed: sa bhavatu mā vā bhūt

original: nedaṃ mahadvimadasthānam //
analyzed: na idam mahat vimada sthānam

original: nanu hetūdāharaṇādhikam iti nigrahasthānam idam ādiṣṭam na samānajātīyābhiprāyaṃ tad bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: nanu hetu udāharaṇa adhikam iti nigrahasthānam idam ādiṣṭam na samāna jātīya abhiprāyam tat bhaviṣyati

original: sādharmyadṛṣṭāntānekatve vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntānekatve vā tan nigrahasthānam ity āstām etat //
analyzed: sādharmya dṛṣṭānta aneka tve vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta aneka tve vā tat nigrahasthānam iti āstām etat

original: itthaṃ sādharmyadharmyadṛṣṭāntasvarūpe vyupādite basātallakṣaṇarahitadṛṣṭāntābhāsā bhavanti /
analyzed: ittham sādharmya dharmya dṛṣṭānta svarūpe vyupādite basā tad lakṣaṇa rahita dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ bhavanti

original: tatra sādhyavikalaḥ sādhanavikalah ubhayavikala iti vastudoṣakṛtās trayaḥ sādharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ /
analyzed: tatra sādhya vikalaḥ sādhana vikalaḥ ubhaya vikalaḥ iti vastu doṣa kṛtāḥ trayaḥ sādharmya dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ

original: ananvayaḥ viparītānvaya iti dvau vacanadoṣakṛtau /
analyzed: ananvayaḥ viparīta anvayaḥ iti dvau vacana doṣa kṛtau

original: yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ amūrtatvāt ity atra buddhivat iti sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ amūrta tvāt iti atra buddhi vat iti sādhya vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: paramāṇuvat iti sādhanavikalaḥ ghaṭavat iti ubhayavikalaḥ /
analyzed: paramāṇu vat iti sādhana vikalaḥ ghaṭa vat iti ubhaya vikalaḥ

original: vyomni nityatvānmūrtatvaṃ vidyata ity ananvayaḥ /
analyzed: vyomni nitya tvāt mūrta tvam vidyate iti ananvayaḥ

original: yad amūrtaṃ tan nityam iti vaktavye yan nityaṃ tad amūrtam iti viparītānvaya iti //
analyzed: yat amūrtam tat nityam iti vaktavye yat nityam tat amūrtam iti viparīta anvayaḥ iti

original: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāsā api paṃcaiva sādhyavyāvṛttaḥ sādhanavyāvṛta ubhayāvyāvṛtta iti vastudoṣās trayah /
analyzed: vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ api paṃca eva sādhya vyāvṛttaḥ sādhana vyāvṛtaḥ ubhaya avyāvṛttaḥ iti vastu doṣāḥ trayaḥ

original: avyatirekaḥ viparītavyatireka iti vacanadoṣau dvau /
analyzed: avyatirekaḥ viparīta vyatirekaḥ iti vacana doṣau dvau

original: yathā tatraiva hetau yatra nityatvaṃ nāsti tatrāmūrtatvam api nāsti yathā paramāṇuṣv iti sādhyāvyāvṛttaḥ /
analyzed: yathā tatra eva hetau yatra nitya tvam na asti tatra amūrta tvam api nā asti yathā paramāṇuṣu iti sādhya avyāvṛttaḥ

original: yathā buddhāv iti sādhanāvyāvṛttaḥ /
analyzed: yathā buddhau iti sādhanā vyāvṛttaḥ

original: yathā ''kāśa ity ubhayāvyāvṛttaḥ /
analyzed: yathā kāśaḥ iti ubhaya a vyāvṛttaḥ

original: nityatvāmūrtatve ghaṭe na vidyate ity avyatirekaḥ /
analyzed: nitya tva amūrta tve ghaṭe na vidyate iti avyatirekaḥ

original: yatra nityatvaṃ nāsti tatrāmūrtatvam api nāsti iti vaktavye yatrāmūrtatvaṃ nāsti tatra nityatvam api nāsti iti viparītavyatireka iti //
analyzed: yatra nitya tvam nā asti tatra amūrta tvam api nā asti iti vaktavye yatra amūrta tvam nā asti tatra nitya tvam api nā asti iti viparīta vyatirekaḥ iti

original: ete ca vastuvṛttena hetudoṣā eva tadanuvidhāyitvāt /
analyzed: ete ca vastu vṛttena hetu doṣāḥ eva tad anuvidhāyi tvāt

original: ata eva hetvābhāsavat sūtrakṛtā nopadiṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: atas eva hetvābhāsa vat sūtrakṛtā na upadiṣṭāḥ

original: asmābhis tu śiṣyahitāya pradarśitā evam //
analyzed: asmābhiḥ tu śiṣya hitāya pradarśitāḥ evam

original: udāharaṇāpekṣaḥ tathety upasaṃhāre na tatheti vā sādhyasyopanayaḥ //1-1-39 //
analyzed: udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāre na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ

original: udāharaṇam ātmalābhe apekṣata iti udāharaṇāpekṣaḥ pakṣadharmopasaṃhāraḥ upanayaḥ /
analyzed: udāharaṇam ātma lābhe apekṣate iti udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ pakṣa dharma upasaṃhāraḥ upanayaḥ

original: dvividhaś cāsau tatheti na tatheti vā udāharaṇadvaividhyāt /
analyzed: dvividhaḥ ca asau tathā iti na tathā iti vā udāharaṇa dvaividhyāt

original: tatra sādharmyodāharaṇāpekṣaḥ tathety upanayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra sādharmya udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ tathā iti upanayaḥ

original: yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ na ca tathā kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti /
analyzed: yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ na ca tathā kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: vaidharmyodāharaṇāpekṣas tu na tathety upanayaḥ yan nityaṃ tad akṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ''kāśaḥ na ca tathā kṛtakaḥ śabda iti /
analyzed: vaidharmya udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ tu na tathā iti upanayaḥ yat nityam tat akṛtakam dṛṣṭam yathā kāśaḥ na ca tathā kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: atrāpi niṣedhadvayayogād vidhir eva gamyate //
analyzed: atrā api niṣedha dvaya yogāt vidhiḥ eva gamyate

original: nanu sādhyasya ity avācakaḥ sūtrāvayavaḥ /
analyzed: nanu sādhyasya iti avācakaḥ sūtra avayavaḥ

original: pakṣadharmopasaṃhāro hy upanayaḥ na sādhyopasaṃhāraḥ /
analyzed: pakṣa dharma upasaṃhāraḥ hi upanayaḥ na sādhya upasaṃhāraḥ

original: sādhyo hi dharmaḥ dharmī vā syāt na tayor anyatarasyāpy ayam upasaṃhāra iti ucyate sādhyo dharmy eva na dharma iha vivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: sādhyaḥ hi dharmaḥ dharmī vā syāt na tayoḥ anyatarasya api ayam upasaṃhāraḥ iti ucyate sādhyaḥ dharmī eva na dharmaḥ iha vivakṣitaḥ

original: tatrāyaṃ hetor upasaṃhāraḥ tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti seyaṃ sādhyasyeti saptamy arthe ṣaṣṭhī mantavyā /
analyzed: tatra ayam hetoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti sā iyam sādhyasya iti saptamī arthe ṣaṣṭhī mantavyā

original: sādhye dharmiṇi hetor upasaṃhāra upanaya iti //
analyzed: sādhye dharmiṇi hetoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ upanayaḥ iti

original: nanv ādhāravivakṣāyām iha prāpnoti saptamī /
analyzed: nanu ādhāra vivakṣāyām iha prāpnoti saptamī

original: saṃbandhamātre vā vācye katham ādharatocyate //
analyzed: saṃbandha mātre vā vācye katham ādhara tā ucyate

original: naitat saṃbandhasāmānye 'py ukte bhavati dharmiṇā yogo viśeṣacintāyāṃ tasya tv ādhāratā bhavet //
analyzed: na etat saṃbandha sāmānye pi ukte bhavati dharmiṇā yogaḥ viśeṣa cintāyām tasya tu ādhāra tā bhavet

original: viśeṣe 'ntarnigūḍhe ca prāyaḥ ṣaṣṭhī prayujyate /
analyzed: viśeṣe ntar nigūḍhe ca prāyas ṣaṣṭhī prayujyate

original: śeṣā nāmāvivakṣaiva kārakāṇām iti sthitiḥ //
analyzed: śeṣā nāma avivakṣā eva kārakāṇām iti sthitiḥ

original: tathā ca rājaḥ puruṣaḥ brāhmaṇasya kamaṇḍaluḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca rājaḥ puruṣaḥ brāhmaṇasya kamaṇḍaluḥ

original: taroḥ śākheti sarvatra viśeṣo 'ntarvyavasthitaḥ //
analyzed: taroḥ śākhā iti sarvatra viśeṣaḥ ntar vyavasthitaḥ

original: ataś ca dharmāya jijñāsā dharmajijñāsā /
analyzed: atas ca dharmāya jijñāsā dharma jijñāsā

original: sā hi tasya jñātum icchā itivat saṃbandhamātrasamarpikā 'pi se 'yaṃ ṣaṣṭhī viśeṣayarya vasānā bhaviṣyatīti sūktaṃ sādhyasyopasaṃhāra iti //
analyzed: sā hi tasya jñātum icchā iti vat saṃbandha mātra samarpikā yam ṣaṣṭhī vasānā bhaviṣyati iti sūktam sādhyasya upasaṃhāraḥ iti

original: nanu upanayavacanam anarthakam /
analyzed: nanu upanaya vacanam anarthakam

original: pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntavacanaiḥ kiṃ na paryāptam yad artham upanayavacanam uccāryate /
analyzed: pakṣa hetu dṛṣṭānta vacanaiḥ kim na paryāptam yat artham upanaya vacanam uccāryate

original: yadi dharmiṇi hetoḥ sattvasiddhaye tad adhigānam tadaiṣa vṛthaiṣa vṛthaiva śramaḥ /
analyzed: yadi dharmiṇi hetoḥ sattva siddhaye tat adhigānam tadā eṣa vṛthā eṣa vṛthā eva śramaḥ

original: pakṣadharmavacanenaiva kṛtakatvāt ity evamādinā siddhatvāt //
analyzed: pakṣa dharma vacanena eva kṛtaka tvāt iti evamādinā siddha tvāt

original: atha sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmiṇoḥ sāmyāpādanāya tad ucchāraṇaṃ tad api na caturaśram udāharaṇasādharmyāt ity anenaiva gatārthatvāt /
analyzed: atha sādhya dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇoḥ sāmya āpādanāya tat ucchāraṇam tat api na caturaśram udāharaṇa sādharmyāt iti anena eva gatārtha tvāt

original: udāharaṇasādharmyavacanaṃ hi hetuvacanam eva bhavet //
analyzed: udāharaṇa sādharmya vacanam hi hetu vacanam eva bhavet

original: atha svapratipattau tadarthadarśanāt paraṃ prati tadvacana tatrāpi parāmarśajñāne vivadante //
analyzed: atha sva pratipattau tad artha darśanāt param prati tatra api parāmarśa jñāne vivadante

original: api ca svayaṃ dadhibhakṣaṇasamanantaraṃ yadi kadācid anumeyam atirupajāyate tat kim aparasmai tad upadiśyatām //
analyzed: api ca svayam dadhi bhakṣaṇa samanantaram yadi kadācid anumeyam atiḥ upajāyate tat kim aparasmai tat upadiśyatām

original: yo 'py ayaṃ pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayanigamanaprayogakrama āśrīyate so 'pi svaprakriyānurāganimitta eva na vastubalapravṛttaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ pi ayam pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamana prayoga kramaḥ āśrīyate saḥ pi sva prakriyā anurāga nimittaḥ eva na vastu bala pravṛttaḥ

original: tathā hi yad yat kṛtakam tat tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭam kṛtakaś ca śabda itīyato vacanāt ko nāma śabdānityatāṃ nāvagacchet /
analyzed: tathā hi yat yat kṛtakam tat tat anityam dṛṣṭam kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti iyataḥ vacanāt kaḥ nāma śabda anitya tām na avagacchet

original: tvam evātra satyavratadhanaḥ pramāṇam /
analyzed: tvam eva atra satya vrata dhanaḥ pramāṇam

original: ḍiṇḍikarāgaṃ parityajyākṣiṇīnimīlya cintaya tāvat kim iyatārthaṃ buddhyase na vā /
analyzed: ḍiṇḍika rāgam parityajya akṣiṇī nimīlya cintaya tāvat kim iyatā artham buddhyase na vā

original: tasmāt svaprakriyāpakṣapātam apāsya paṃcāvayavam evaṃ kramakaṃ vākyaṃ upekṣya yathoktam eva vākyaṃ prayuṅkṣveti //
analyzed: tasmāt sva prakriyā pakṣapātam apāsya paṃca avayavam evam kramakam vākyam upekṣya yathā uktam eva vākyam prayuṅkṣva iti

original: atrocyate idaṃ tāvat bhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām /
analyzed: atrā ucyate idam tāvat bhavān pṛṣṭaḥ vyācaṣṭām

original: kiṃ svapratpattim anusarantaḥ parapratipādanāya vākyatacanāṃ kurmaḥ uta parahṛdayānuvarthaneneti /
analyzed: kim sva pratpattim anusarantaḥ para pratipādanāya vākya tacanām kurmaḥ uta para hṛdaya anuvarthanena iti

original: tatra parābhiprāyasya vaicitryāt parokṣatvāc ca duravagamatvena na vidmaḥ kiṃ viddhmahe kiṃ bhūvam utkṣipāmaḥ kim aratninā paraṃ pīḍayāmaḥ uta hastasaṃjñayā vyavahārāmaḥ āho hetumātram eva kevalaṃ prayujmahe kiṃ vā tryavayavaṃ vākyam abhidadhmaḥ uta paṃcāvayavāt api vākyād abhyadhikam ākhyānakam asmai ity evam anavasthitatvāt parābhiprāyasya svapratipattim evānusaratā paraḥ pratyāyyaḥ //
analyzed: tatra para abhiprāyasya vaicitryāt parokṣa tvāt ca duravagama tvena na vidmaḥ kim viddhmahe kim utkṣipāmaḥ kim aratninā param pīḍayāmaḥ uta hasta saṃjñayā vyavahārāmaḥ āho hetu mātram eva kevalam prayujmahe kim vā tri avayavam vākyam abhidadhmaḥ uta paṃca avayavāt api vākyāt abhyadhikam ākhyānakam asmai iti evam anavasthita tvāt para abhiprāyasya sva pratipattim eva anusaratā paraḥ pratyāyyaḥ

original: tatra svapratipattau parvatādidharmī prathamaṃ dṛṣṭa iti sa pratijñāya kathyate /
analyzed: tatra sva pratipattau parvata ādi dharmī prathamam dṛṣṭaḥ iti sa pratijñāya kathyate

original: tato 'pi dhūmādiliṅgam upalabdham iti hetuvacanena tadāvedyate /
analyzed: dhūma ādi liṅgam upalabdham iti hetu vacanena tat āvedyate

original: tato yatra dhūmas tatrāgniḥ yathā mahānasaḥ iti vyāptismaraṇam abhavad iti dṛṣṭāntavacasā tad abhidhīyate /
analyzed: tatas yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ yathā mahānasaḥ iti vyāpti smaraṇam abhavat iti dṛṣṭānta vacasā tat abhidhīyate

original: tataḥ tathā cāyaṃ dhūmaḥ iti parāmarśajñānam udapādīti tadupanayavacanena pratipādyate /
analyzed: tatas tathā ca ayam dhūmaḥ iti parāmarśa jñānam udapādi iti tad upanaya vacanena pratipādyate

original: tataḥ tasmād atrāgniḥ ity anumeyajñānam upajāyate iti nigamanena tad ucyate /
analyzed: tatas tasmāt atra agniḥ iti anumeya jñānam upajāyate iti nigamanena tat ucyate

original: tataḥ parapratipattiparyavasānāt kim anyad upadiśyamānam iti /
analyzed: tatas para pratipatti paryavasānāt kim anyat upadiśyamānam iti

original: na ca dadhithakṣaṇasadṛśaṃ ato 'nyatamam api bhavitum arhati anumeyapratipattāv upādayatvāt //
analyzed: na ca dadhi thakṣaṇa sadṛśam atas nyatamam api bhavitum arhati anumeya pratipattau upādaya tvāt
