original: yeṣām api mate parāmarśajñānaṃ nāti tair apy upanayavacanam avaśyam evāparihāryam anumeyapratipattaye dṛṣṭānte darśitaśaktir eva hetuḥ prabhavati nānyatheti /
analyzed: yeṣām api mate parāmarśa jñānam na ati taiḥ api upanaya vacanam avaśyam evā aparihāryam anumeya pratipattaye dṛṣṭānte darśita śaktiḥ eva hetuḥ prabhavati na anyathā iti

original: ato yady api pakṣadharmavacanena hetudharmisaṃbandhamātram upapāditam tathāpi adhunā dṛṣṭānte darśitaśaktidharmaḥ saḥ tasmin dharmiṇi tathāvidho hetuḥ syāt na vati asiddhyāśaṅkāśamanam upanayavacanam antareṇa na bhavaty evety avaśyaṃ prayoktavyaṃ tad iti /
analyzed: atas yadi api pakṣa dharma vacanena hetu dharmi saṃbandha mātram upapāditam tathā api adhunā dṛṣṭānte darśita śakti dharmaḥ saḥ tasmin dharmiṇi tathāvidhaḥ hetuḥ syāt na asiddhi āśaṅkā śamanam upanaya vacanam antareṇa na bhavati eva iti avaśyam prayoktavyam tat iti

original: svapratītyanusaraṇena ca vākyaracanāyāḥ sthatatvāt kramo 'pi yathokta upayujyate //
analyzed: sva pratīti anusaraṇena ca vākya racanāyāḥ yathā uktaḥ upayujyate

original: ata eva ca yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ity abhidhānaṃ anupapannam anavagate dharmiṇi tadvartini ca hetau prathamam eva vyāptismaraṇāsaṃbhavena tadvacanāyogāt /
analyzed: atas eva ca yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam iti abhidhānam anupapannam anavagate dharmiṇi tad vartini ca hetau prathamam eva vyāpti smaraṇa asaṃbhavena tad vacana ayogāt

original: tad idam avayaviviparyāsavacanaṃ aprāptakālanigrahasthānam upadekṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: tat idam avayavi viparyāsa vacanam aprāpta kāla nigrahasthānam upadekṣyāmaḥ

original: api ca yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kṛtakaś ca śabdaḥ ity etāvad eva prayoktavyam iti vadatā bhavatā kṛtakaś ca śabdaḥ itīdam uapnayanavacanam anujñātam kṛtakatvād iti pakṣadharmavacanaṃ tu hihnutam /
analyzed: api ca yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti etāvat eva prayoktavyam iti vadatā bhavatā kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti idam uapnayana vacanam anujñātam kṛtaka tvāt iti pakṣa dharma vacanam tu hihnutam

original: kṛtakaś ca śabdaḥ ity etāvad eva hetuvacanam iti cet na prayojakasya paṃcamyādinā nirdeśārhatvād iti yat kiṃcid etat //
analyzed: kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti etāvat eva hetu vacanam iti ced na prayojakasya paṃcamī ādinā nirdeśa arha tvāt iti yat kiṃcid etat

original: yad apy ucyate viduṣāṃ vācyo hetur eva hi kevalaḥ iti tad apy acāru vidvadbhir vittvād eva hetor api prajñānāt /
analyzed: yat api ucyate viduṣām vācyaḥ hetuḥ eva hi kevalaḥ iti tat api acāru vidvadbhiḥ vittvāt eva hetoḥ api prajñānāt

original: apūrvā ime vidvāṃsaḥ ye pratijñādyavayavacatuṣṭayasyārthaṃ jānānti hetuvacanasya tu na vindantīti /
analyzed: apūrvāḥ ime vidvāṃsaḥ ye pratijñā ādi avayava catuṣṭayasya artham jānānti hetuvacanasya tu na vindanti iti

original: tasmāt parāśayasya sarvathā durbodhatvāt pūrvoktenaiva krameṇa svānubhavasākṣikeṇa vākyaracanāṃ kṛtvā paraḥ pratyayya iti //
analyzed: tasmāt para āśayasya sarvathā durbodha tvāt pūrvoktena eva krameṇa sva anubhava sākṣikeṇa vākya racanām kṛtvā paraḥ pratyayyaḥ iti

original: hetvapadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ nigamanam //1-1 //
analyzed: hetu apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam

original: hetuḥ dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi nirjñātaśaktiḥ sādhye dharmiṇi apadiśyate 'neneti hetvapadeśa upanayaḥ /
analyzed: hetuḥ dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi nirjñāta śaktiḥ sādhye dharmiṇi apadiśyate nena iti hetvapadeśaḥ upanayaḥ

original: tasmāt hetvapadeśāt pravṛttaṃ pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ nigamanam /
analyzed: tasmāt hetu apadeśāt pravṛttam pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam

original: nigamyate 'nena pūrvoktāḥ avayavāḥ ekatra sādhye 'rthe samarpyante niyojyanta iti nigamanam /
analyzed: nigamyate nena pūrvoktāḥ avayavāḥ ekatra sādhye rthe samarpyante niyojyante iti nigamanam

original: tasmāt kṛtakatvād anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti /
analyzed: tasmāt kṛtaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: tad idaṃ nigamanaṃ sādharmyavaidharmyabhedena hetoḥ dṛṣṭāntasya ca tadapekṣiṇaś ca tathā na tathā ity upanayasya dvaividhye 'pi pratiśāvacanavat tulyam eva bhavati //
analyzed: tat idam nigamanam sādharmya vaidharmya bhedena hetoḥ dṛṣṭāntasya ca tad apekṣiṇaḥ ca tathā na tathā iti upanayasya dvaividhye pi pratiśā vacana vat tulyam eva bhavati

original: nanu pratijñāvacanam eva tāvat asādhanāṅgavacanatvāt apārthakam /
analyzed: nanu pratijñā vacanam eva tāvat asādhana aṅga vacana tvāt apārthakam

original: tasyā eva punarvacanaṃ nigamanam adhunā saphalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti keyaṃ kathā pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam iti ca na vācako granthaḥ sādhyanirdeśo hi pratijñā siddhanirdeśas tu nigamanam iti //
analyzed: tasyāḥ eva punarvacanam nigamanam adhunā saphalam bhaviṣyati iti kā iyam kathā pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam iti ca na vācakaḥ granthaḥ sādhya nirdeśaḥ hi pratijñā siddha nirdeśaḥ tu nigamanam iti

original: vācake vā granthe paunaruktyād eva nigamanasya vaiphalyam /
analyzed: vācake vā granthe paunaruktyāt eva nigamanasya vaiphalyam

original: svapratipattau ca parāmarśajñānāntaraṃ sādhyāvagatir eva bhavantī dṛśyate /
analyzed: sva pratipattau ca parāmarśa jñāna antaram sādhya avagatiḥ eva bhavantī dṛśyate

original: sā parasyāpy upanayavacanaśravaṇasamanantaram upajāyata eveti kiṃ tad uktyā prayojanam /
analyzed: sā parasya api upanaya vacana śravaṇa samanantaram upajāyate eva iti kim tat uktyā prayojanam

original: ucyate pratijñāyās tāvat sāphalyaṃ samarthitam eva /
analyzed: ucyate pratijñāyāḥ tāvat sāphalyam samarthitam eva

original: tasyāś cedaṃ punarvacanaṃ siddhasādhyabhede saty api dharmidharmanirdeśamātrasāmyād ucyate /
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca idam punarvacanam siddha sādhya bhede sati api dharmi dharma nirdeśa mātra sāmyāt ucyate

original: siddhadādhyabhedād eva ca na paunaruktyakṛtāphalyam /
analyzed: siddha dādhya bhedāt eva ca na paunaruktya kṛta āphalyam

original: svapratipattaye ca parāmarśajñānānantaraṃ sādhyabuddhir utpannā sā parasmai kathyamānā na niṣprayojanā bhavati //
analyzed: sva pratipattaye ca parāmarśa jñāna anantaram sādhya buddhiḥ utpannā sā parasmai kathyamānā na niṣprayojanā bhavati

original: asmād dhetor idaṃ sādhyaṃ aham ajñāsiṣaṃ yathā /
analyzed: asmāt hetoḥ idam sādhyam aham ajñāsiṣam yathā

original: tathā tvam api jānīhi mā sma vidhno 'tra te bhavet //
analyzed: tathā tvam api jānīhi mā sma vidhnaḥ tra te bhavet

original: evamukte saṃśayānasya saṃśayaḥ śabhyati viparyastamateś ca viparyayaḥ /
analyzed: evam ukte saṃśayānasya saṃśayaḥ viparyasta mateḥ ca viparyayaḥ

original: tadarthaś cāyaṃ parārthānumānopanyāsaśramaḥ /
analyzed: tad arthaḥ ca ayam parārtha anumāna upanyāsa śramaḥ

original: tad idaṃ viparīta prasaṅgapratiṣedhārthaṃ nigamanam āhuḥ //
analyzed: tat idam prasaṅga pratiṣedha artham nigamanam āhuḥ

original: ye tu yathāśrutasādhyanirdeśātmakapratijñāpunarvacanasamarthanalobhādadyāpi pratijñāyāḥ siddhim abudhyamānāḥ asādhāranāśaṅkāyāḥ dṛṣṭāntavacanenaiva nirastatvāt /
analyzed: ye tu yathāśruta sādhya nirdeśa ātmaka pratijñā punarvacana samarthana lobhāt adya api pratijñāyāḥ siddhim a budhyamānāḥ asādhārana āśaṅkāyāḥ dṛṣṭānta vacanena eva nirasta tvāt

original: viśeṣasya hi hetutvasaṃbhāvanāyām asādhāraṇāśaṅkā syāt /
analyzed: viśeṣasya hi hetu tva saṃbhāvanāyām asādhāraṇa āśaṅkā syāt

original: yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ iti tu dṛṣṭāntavacasā sāmānsyasya hetutve kathite katham asādhāraṇatvam āṅkyeta /
analyzed: yat kṛtakam tat anityam iti tu dṛṣṭānta vacasā sāmānsyasya hetu tve kathite katham asādhāraṇa tvam āṅkyeta

original: yadi punar upanayavacanena sādhye dharmini hetor upasaṃhārāt asādhāraṇatvam āśaṅkyeta tan punardṛṣṭāntadharmivṛttitvam asya darśayitavyam /
analyzed: yadi punar upanaya vacanena sādhye dharmini hetoḥ upasaṃhārāt asādhāraṇa tvam āśaṅkyeta tat punar dṛṣṭānta dharmi vṛtti tvam asya darśayitavyam

original: tasmin darśite punaḥ tadvṛttitvāt dharmiṇyasiddhatvam āśaṅkanīyam /
analyzed: tasmin darśite punar tad vṛtti tvāt dharmiṇī asiddha tvam āśaṅkanīyam

original: punas tadvyāvṛttaye dharmiṇi hetor upasaṃhāro vidheya ity evam asādhāraṇāsiddhāyaśaṅkābhyāṃ gacched iti na kadācit sādhyapratītir bhaved iti nāsādhāraṇaśaṅkāvyudādāya tatprayogaḥ kintu pūrvarītyaiveti //
analyzed: punar tad vyāvṛttaye dharmiṇi hetoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ vidheyaḥ iti evam asādhāraṇa asiddhāya śaṅkābhyām gacchet iti na kadācid sādhya pratītiḥ bhavet iti na asādhāraṇa śaṅkā vyudādāya tad prayogaḥ kintu pūrva rītyā eva iti

original: tasmād vivakṣite 'rthe yathoditakramaniveśino 'vayavān /
analyzed: tasmāt vivakṣite rthe yathā udita krama niveśinaḥ vayavān

original: ekatra saṃghaṭayituṃ nigamanavacanaṃ prayoktavyam //
analyzed: ekatra saṃghaṭayitum nigamana vacanam prayoktavyam

original: na ime pratijñādayo nigamanaparyantāḥ paṃcāvayavāḥ yathāsaṃbhavam āgamādimāṇānugṛhītāḥ parasparānuṣaktāś ca svārtha sādhayanti /
analyzed: na ime pratijñā ādayaḥ nigamana paryantāḥ paṃca avayavāḥ yathāsaṃbhavam āgama ādi māṇa anugṛhītāḥ paraspara anuṣaktāḥ ca sva artha sādhayanti

original: tatra mukhyayā vṛttyā pratipādyenānumānenaiva sarve 'vayavā anugṛhyante /
analyzed: tatra mukhyayā vṛttyā pratipādyena anumānena eva sarve vayavāḥ anugṛhyante

original: prapaṃcāya tu pramāṇāntarānugraha eṣām ucyate //
analyzed: prapaṃcāya tu pramāṇa antara anugrahaḥ eṣām ucyate

original: pratijñāyās tāvad āgamo 'nugrāhakaḥ upeyate upadeśasvabhāvatvāt /
analyzed: pratijñāyāḥ tāvat āgamaḥ nugrāhakaḥ upeyate upadeśa svabhāva tvāt

original: anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti vaktā tu evaṃvidhe viṣaye ṛṣivad svātantratvāt /
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti vaktā tu evaṃvidhe viṣaye ṛṣivat svātantra tvāt

original: anumānam upadiśati /
analyzed: anumānam upadiśati

original: pratijñāvacanaṃ tu tacchāyānupātitvāt /
analyzed: pratijñā vacanam tu tad chāyā anupāti tvāt

original: śabdaprāmāṇyasiddhyarthe vā śāstre tatpratijñāyāḥ śabdaviṣayatvād āgamānugṛhītatvam ucayte //
analyzed: śabda prāmāṇya siddhi arthe vā śāstre tad pratijñāyāḥ śabda viṣaya tvāt āgama anugṛhīta tvam ucayte

original: hetuvacanam anumānenānugṛhyate //
analyzed: hetu vacanam anumānena anugṛhyate

original: udāharaṇaṃ tu pratyakṣeṇa tanmūlatvād vyāptipāricchedasya //
analyzed: udāharaṇam tu pratyakṣeṇa tad mūla tvāt vyāpti pāricchedasya

original: yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ itivat yathā ghaṭas tathā śabdaḥ ity anayā cchāyayā upamānakāraṇabhūta vanecarādivacanasadṛśatvāt upamānaṃ upanayasyānugāhakam abhidhīyate //
analyzed: yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ itivat yathā ghaṭaḥ tathā śabdaḥ iti anayā chāyayā upamāna kāraṇa bhūta vanecara ādi vacana sadṛśa tvāt upamānam upanayasya anugāhakam abhidhīyate

original: nigamanasya tu sarvāvayavānām ekatra niyojanārthatvāt sarvapramāṇānugrāhyataiva //
analyzed: nigamanasya tu sarva avayavānām ekatra niyojana artha tvāt sarva pramāṇa anugrāhya tā eva

original: itaretarānuṣaktatvāt pratijñāṃ vinā nirāśrayo hetur bhaved iti sā pūrvaṃ prayoktavyā anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti /
analyzed: itaretara anuṣakta tvāt pratijñām vinā nirāśrayaḥ hetuḥ bhavet iti sā pūrvam prayoktavyā anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: tato hetuṃ paro jijñāsata iti hetuvacanam uccāryate kṛtakatvāt iti /
analyzed: tatas hetum paraḥ jijñāsate iti hetu vacanam uccāryate kṛtaka tvāt iti

original: hetau śrute kvāsya vyāptir avadhṛteti darśayitum udāharaṇam ucyate yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ iti /
analyzed: hetau śrute kva asya vyāptiḥ avadhṛtā iti darśayitum udāharaṇam ucyate yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti

original: evamukte īdṛśo nirjñātaśaktir eṣa hetuḥ sādhye dharmiṇi bhavet na vety asiddhatā śaṅām apākartum upanayaḥ prasajyate /
analyzed: evam ukte īdṛśaḥ nirjñāta śaktiḥ eṣa hetuḥ sādhye dharmiṇi bhavet na vā iti asiddha tā śaṅām apākartum upanayaḥ prasajyate

original: tataḥ amunā krameṇa tavāpi sādhyapratītir bhavatu iti sarvāvayavān ekatra sādhye 'rthe samarthayituṃ nigamanam abhidhīyate /
analyzed: tatas amunā krameṇa tava api sādhya pratītiḥ bhavatu iti sarva avayavān ekatra sādhye rthe samarthayitum nigamanam abhidhīyate

original: anyatamam avayavam antarena sakalam idam anuṣaktārthavākyaṃ syād iti paṃcāvayavam eva yathopadiṣṭakramakaṃ vākyaṃ prayoktavyam //
analyzed: anyatamam avayavam antarena sakalam idam anuṣakta artha vākyam syāt iti paṃca avayavam eva yathā upadiṣṭa kramakam vākyam prayoktavyam

original: ity ārabdhopakāraḥ tadanuguṇaphalaiḥ āgamādipramāṇaiḥ anyonyāpekṣiṇo 'mī niyatam avayavāḥ sādhayanty arthajātam /
analyzed: iti ārabdha upakāraḥ tad anuguṇa phalaiḥ āgama ādi pramāṇaiḥ anyonya apekṣiṇaḥ niyatam avayavāḥ sādhayanti artha jātam

original: yac caiteṣāṃ prameye kvasi ca caturastasya jātiprayogaprāyaiḥ śakyo na pakṣaḥ kṣapayitum iti hi vyāharad vṛttikāraḥ //
analyzed: yat ca eteṣām prameye ca caturastasya jāti prayoga prāyaiḥ śakyaḥ na pakṣaḥ kṣapayitum iti hi vyāharat vṛtti kāraḥ

original: ity avayavaparīkṣā //
analyzed: iti avayava parīkṣā

original: iti śrī bhaṭṭajayantakṛtau nyāyāmañjaryā daśamam āhnikam //
analyzed: iti śrī bhaṭṭa jayanta kṛtau nyāyāmañjaryāḥ daśamam āhnikam

original: avayavānantaraṃ prathamasūtre tarkasyoddeśāt uddeśānukrameṇa tasya lakṣaṇam āha avijñātatattve 'rthe kāraṇopapattitaḥ tattvajñānārtham ūhas tarkaḥ //1-1-40 [avijñātatattve 'rthe] iti sāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśāt artha eva anyapadārthaḥ na puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: avayava anantaram prathama sūtre tarkasya uddeśāt uddeśa anukrameṇa tasya lakṣaṇam āha avijñāta tattve rthe kāraṇa upapattitaḥ tattva jñāna artham ūhaḥ tarkaḥ avijñāta tattve rthe iti sāmānādhikaraṇya nirdeśāt arthe eva anya padārthaḥ na puruṣaḥ

original: puruṣāṃ hi ṣaṣṭḥyā nirdekṣyata [avijñātaṃ tattvaṃ asya] iti /
analyzed: puruṣām hi nirdekṣyata a vijñātam tattvam asya iti

original: tattvapadupādānena dharmiṇah sāmānyadharmamānn aviśiṣṭasya vijñātatvaṃ sūcayati /
analyzed: tattva pad upādānena a viśiṣṭasya vijñāta tvam sūcayati

original: [kāraṇopapattitaḥ] iti saṃśayajñānollikhyamānapakṣadvayānyatarapakṣotthāpanānukūlakāraṇāvalokanaṃ tarkasyotthāpakam āha /
analyzed: kāraṇa upapattitaḥ iti saṃśaya jñāna ullikhyamāna pakṣa dvaya anyatara pakṣa utthāpana anukūla kāraṇa avalokanam tarkasya utthāpakam āha

original: ata eva avijñātatattve'rthe bhavantāv api bubhutsāvimarśau na tarkatāṃ prāpunutaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva avijñāta tattva irthe bhavantau api bubhutsā vimarśau na tarka tām prāpunutaḥ

original: [tattvajñānārtham] iti sākṣāt pramāṇatām asya nirasyati /
analyzed: tattva jñāna artham iti sākṣāt pramāṇa tām asya nirasyati

original: pramāṇānugrahaṃ tu viṣayapariśodhanadvareṇa vidadhat tattvajñānāya kalpate /
analyzed: pramāṇa anugraham tu viṣaya pariśodhana dvareṇa vidadhat tattva jñānāya kalpate

original: [tarkaḥ ūhaḥ] iti paryāyapadopādānasya prayojanaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: tarkaḥ ūhaḥ iti paryāya pada upādānasya prayojanam vakṣyāmaḥ

original: tenāyaṃ sūtrārthaḥ avijñātatattve sāmānyato jñāte dharmiṇi ekapakṣānukūlakāraṇadarśanāt tasmin saṃbhāvanāpratyayaḥ bhavitavyatāvabhāsaḥ taditarapakṣaśaithilyāpādanena tadgrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ anugṛhṇat sukhaṃ pravartayan tattvajñānārthaṃ ūhas tarka iti /
analyzed: tena ayam sūtra arthaḥ avijñāta tattve sāmānyatas jñāte dharmiṇi eka pakṣa anukūla kāraṇa darśanāt tasmin saṃbhāvanā pratyayaḥ bhavitavya tā avabhāsaḥ tad itara pakṣa śaithilya āpādanena tad grāhakam pramāṇam anugṛhṇat sukham pravartayan tattva jñāna artham ūhaḥ tarkaḥ iti

original: yathā vāhakelipradeśādau ūrdhvatvaviśiṣṭadharmidarśanāt puruṣeṇānena bhavitavyam iti pratyayaḥ //
analyzed: yathā vāha keli pradeśa ādau ūrdhva tva viśiṣṭa dharmi darśanāt puruṣeṇa anena bhavitavyam iti pratyayaḥ

original: nanu [tattvajñānārtham] iti ukte sati sāmārthyād avijñātatattvatā labhyata eveti kimartham kaṇṭhena punar anūdyate /
analyzed: nanu tattva jñāna artham iti ukte sati sāmārthyāt avijñāta tattva tā labhyate eva iti kimartham kaṇṭhena punar anūdyate

original: bāḍham /
analyzed: bāḍham

original: kin tu kvacid viṣaye jñātatattve 'pi pūrvatarkeṇāvasṛṣṭe sati uttarakālaṃ [tarkito mayā 'yam artha] iti smaryamāṇatarkaviśeṣaṇatayā gṛhyamāṇaḥ viśeṣaṇībhūtas tarkaḥ tattvajñānārtho bhavatīti tadvyudāsāya punar avijñātatattvagrahaṇam /
analyzed: kin tu kvacid viṣaye jñāta tattve pi pūrva tarkeṇa avasṛṣṭe sati uttara kālam tarkitaḥ mayā yam arthaḥ iti smaryamāṇa tarka viśeṣaṇa tayā gṛhyamāṇaḥ viśeṣaṇībhūtaḥ tarkaḥ tattva jñāna arthaḥ bhavati iti tad vyudāsāya punar avijñāta tattva grahaṇam

original: mārgaśodhanadvareṇa tarkasya tattvajñānārthatvam iha vivakṣitam /
analyzed: mārga śodhana dvareṇa tarkasya tattva jñāna artha tvam iha vivakṣitam

original: tac ca avijñātatattve 'rthe saṃbhavatīti //
analyzed: tat ca avijñāta tattve rthe saṃbhavati iti

original: nanu naiva saṃśayanirṇayāntarālavartī tarkapratyayaḥ kaścid asti /
analyzed: nanu nā eva saṃśaya nirṇaya antarāla vartī tarka pratyayaḥ kaścid asti

original: tathā hi yadi tāvad anavagataviśeṣasya saṃbhavaty asau pratyayaḥ tarhi saṃśaya eva bhavet /
analyzed: tathā hi yadi tāvat anavagata viśeṣasya saṃbhavati asau pratyayaḥ tarhi saṃśayaḥ eva bhavet

original: avagataviśeṣasya bhavan nirṇayatām eva spṛśet /
analyzed: avagata viśeṣasya bhavat nirṇaya tām eva spṛśet

original: [puruṣa eva" iti evakārārthāsamunmeṣarahito 'pipratyayaḥ nānirṇayo bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ eva iti na a nirṇayaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: turagaparisaraṇasamuvitadeśadarśanam api yadi sthāṇupakṣaṃ sthagayitum alam iti manyate tatkaracaraṇādinaraviśeṣadarśanavat tannirṇayakāraṇam eva syāt /
analyzed: turaga parisaraṇa samuvita deśa darśanam api yadi sthāṇu pakṣam sthagayitum alam iti manyate tat kara caraṇa ādi nara viśeṣa darśana vat tat nirṇaya kāraṇam eva syāt

original: atha tasyām api turagaviharaṇabhuvi niśi nikhanati kaścana sthāṇum iti śaṅkase yady evaṃ sthāṇupakṣānupāyāt punaḥ saṃśaya eva syāt iti na tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ samastīti lakṣyābhāvāt kasyedaṃ lakṣaṇam iti //
analyzed: atha tasyām api turaga viharaṇa bhuvi niśi nikhanati kaścana sthāṇum iti śaṅkase yadi evam sthāṇu pakṣa anupāyāt punar saṃśayaḥ eva syāt iti na tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ samasti iti lakṣya abhāvāt kasya idam lakṣaṇam iti

original: ucyate na khalu svamatiparikalpitavikalpavitānena pratyātmaveda nīyāḥ pratītayo 'panetuṃ śakyāḥ /
analyzed: ucyate na khalu sva mati parikalpita vikalpa vitānena pratyātma veda nīyāḥ pratītayaḥ upanetum śakyāḥ

original: tathā hi [sthāṇur vā puruṣo vā] iti pratītir ekā [puruṣa evāyam] ity anyā /
analyzed: tathā hi sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti pratītiḥ ekā puruṣaḥ eva ayam iti anyā

original: anyā ca [puruṣeṇānena bhavitavyaṃ] iti madhyavartinī tṛtīyā saṃbhāvanāpratītiḥ svahṛdayasākṣikaiva //
analyzed: anyā ca puruṣeṇa anena bhavitavyam iti madhya vartinī tṛtīyā saṃbhāvanā pratītiḥ sva hṛdaya sākṣikā eva

original: sāmyena hi samullekhaḥ saṃśaye pakṣayor dvayoḥ /
analyzed: sāmyena hi samullekhaḥ saṃśaye pakṣayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: nirṇaye tv itaraḥ pakṣaḥ spṛśyate na manāg api //
analyzed: nirṇaye tu itaraḥ pakṣaḥ spṛśyate na manāk api

original: tarkas tv ekataraṃ pakṣaṃ vibhāty utthāpayann iva /
analyzed: tarkaḥ tu ekataram pakṣam vibhāti utthāpayan iva

original: narasaṃbhāvanābījavājivāhanadarśanāt //
analyzed: nara saṃbhāvanā bīja vāji vāhana darśanāt

original: vāhakelipradeśaviśeṣadarśanaṃ hi puṃsi saṃbhāvanāmātram upajanayitum alaṃ na tu śiraḥpāṇyādiviśeṣadarśanavat sarvātmanā sthāṇupakṣāpasāraṇena puruṣasya nirṇayāya prabhavati /
analyzed: vāha keli pradeśa viśeṣa darśanam hi puṃsi saṃbhāvanā mātram upajanayitum alam na tu śiraḥ pāṇi ādi viśeṣa darśana vat sarva ātmanā sthāṇu pakṣa apasāraṇena puruṣasya nirṇayāya prabhavati

original: ato 'yam agṛhītaviśeṣasyaiva bhavati pratyayaḥ na tu saṃśayaḥ ekatarapakṣānukūlakāraṇopapattyā jāyamānatvāt //
analyzed: atas yam agṛhīta viśeṣasya eva bhavati pratyayaḥ na tu saṃśayaḥ ekatara pakṣa anukūla kāraṇa upapattyā jāyamāna tvāt

original: kathaṃ punaḥ pāṇipādādipuruṣaviśeṣavat aśvavāhanadeśaviśeṣaḥ viśeṣakāryaṃ na kuryāt /
analyzed: katham punar pāṇi pāda ādi puruṣa viśeṣa vat aśva vāhana deśa viśeṣaḥ viśeṣa kāryam na kuryāt

original: [karaṇe] vā sthānupakṣotsāraṇāt nirṇaya evāyam iti kasyaiṣa paryanuyogaḥ yathā hi śiraḥpāṇyādidarśane sati puruṣanirṇayo bhavati na tathā turagavahanadarśane sati /
analyzed: karaṇe vā sthānu pakṣa utsāraṇāt nirṇayaḥ eva ayam iti kasya eṣa paryanuyogaḥ yathā hi śiraḥ pāṇi ādi darśane sati puruṣa nirṇayaḥ bhavati na tathā turaga vahana darśane sati

original: ananuyojyāś ca padārthāḥ [evaṃ bhavata] [evaṃ mā bhūt] iti /
analyzed: ananuyojyāḥ ca padārthāḥ evam bhavataḥ evam mā bhūt iti

original: yathā ca deśāntare spardhamāna eva sthāṇupakṣa āste na tathā vāhakelibhūmaubhūmau api tu śithilībhavati /
analyzed: yathā ca deśa antare spardhamānaḥ eva sthāṇu pakṣaḥ āste na tathā vāha keli bhūmau bhūmau api tu śithilībhavati

original: saṃbhavatpramādatvāc ca na sarvātmanā nivartate //
analyzed: saṃbhavat pramāda tvāt ca na sarva ātmanā nivartate

original: nanu yadi na nivartate tarhi spardhatām /
analyzed: nanu yadi na nivartate tarhi spardhatām

original: mā vā spardhaṣṭa /
analyzed: mā vā spardhaṣṭa

original: sthitas tāvad sthāṇupakṣa iti saṃśaya evāyam iti maivam /
analyzed: sthitaḥ tāvat sthāṇu pakṣaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ eva ayam iti mā evam

original: na sthāṇupakṣaḥ sarvātmanā nivartate nāpy āste /
analyzed: na sthāṇu pakṣaḥ sarva ātmanā nivartate na api āste

original: evam eveyaṃ triśaṅkur iva lambamānaḥ pratyayāntaranivṛttaye prabhavatīti tathāvidhapratyayānubhavād eva parikalpyate /
analyzed: evam evā iyam triśaṅkuḥ iva lambamānaḥ pratyaya antara nivṛttaye prabhavati iti tathāvidha pratyaya anubhavāt eva parikalpyate

original: vāhakelipradeśadarśanepradeśadarśane hi yathā puruṣaviśeṣāḥ  smaraṇapatham avataranti na tathā sthāṇuviśeṣāḥ /
analyzed: vāha keli pradeśa darśane pradeśa darśane hi yathā puruṣa viśeṣāḥ smaraṇa patham avataranti na tathā sthāṇu viśeṣāḥ

original: ubhayaviśeṣasmaraṇajanmā ca saṃśaya iti so 'yaṃ vāhakelipradeśaviśeṣaḥ śithilayati sthāṇupakṣaṃ na sarvātmanocchinattīti /
analyzed: ubhaya viśeṣa smaraṇa janmā ca saṃśayaḥ iti saḥ yam vāha keli pradeśa viśeṣaḥ śithilayati sthāṇu pakṣam na sarva ātmanā ucchinatti iti

original: tat darśanāt bhavati pratyayāntaram ūharūpaṃ puruṣeṇānena bhavitavyam itīty alam ativistareṇa //
analyzed: tat darśanāt bhavati pratyaya antaram ūha rūpam puruṣeṇa anena bhavitavyam iti iti alam ati vistareṇa

original: yat tu bhāṣyakāreṇa tarkodāharaṇam abhyadhāyi janmocchedadarśanāt kṛtakatatkāraṇapratyaya iti na tadd hṛdayaṅgamam /
analyzed: yat tu bhāṣyakāreṇa tarka udāharaṇam abhyadhāyi janma uccheda darśanāt kṛtaka tad kāraṇa pratyayaḥ iti na tat hṛdayaṅgamam

original: tena krameṇa nirṇaya evāsau tatkāraṇatathātvaṃ na tarka iti //
analyzed: tena krameṇa nirṇayaḥ eva asau tad kāraṇa tathātvam na tarkaḥ iti

original: atha vā kāryodāharaṇatvād asya tatrāpi saṃśayanirṇayāntarālavartī tarkapratyayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
analyzed: atha vā kārya udāharaṇa tvāt asya tatra api saṃśaya nirṇaya antarāla vartī tarka pratyayaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: sa udāharaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: saḥ udāharaṇam bhaviṣyati

original: ūha iti paryāyābhidhāne kiṃ prayojanam /
analyzed: ūhaḥ iti paryāya abhidhāne kim prayojanam

original: lakṣaṇapratipādanam eva tarkasya lakṣaṇam yat ūharūpatvam /
analyzed: lakṣaṇa pratipādanam eva tarkasya lakṣaṇam yat ūha rūpa tvam

original: itaras tu sūtre kāraṇaviśeṣāya phalanirdeśaḥ /
analyzed: itaraḥ tu sūtre kāraṇa viśeṣāya phala nirdeśaḥ

original: [kāraṇopapattitaḥ] iti kāraṇanirdeśaḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇa upapattitaḥ iti kāraṇa nirdeśaḥ

original: [avijñātatattve 'rthe] iti viṣayanirdeśaḥ /
analyzed: avijñāta tattve rthe iti viṣaya nirdeśaḥ

original: [tattvajñānārthaḥ] iti phalanirdeśaḥ //
api ca tarkaśabdaṃ kecit anumāne prayuṃjate /
analyzed: api ca tarka śabdam kecid anumāne prayuṃjate

original: yathā smṛtikārāḥ paṭhanti !"ārṣaṃ dharmopadeśaṃ ca vedaśāstrāvirodhinā /
analyzed: yathā smṛti kārāḥ paṭhanti ārṣam dharma upadeśam ca veda śāstra avirodhinā

original: !yas tarkeṇānusandhatte sa dharmaṃ veda netaraḥ] //
analyzed: yaḥ tarkeṇa anusandhatte sa dharmam veda na itaraḥ

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: tad ihāpi tarko 'numānaṃ mā vijñāyity ūhagrahaṇam /
analyzed: tat iha api tarkaḥ numānam mā ūha grahaṇam

original: ūho 'tra tarka ucyate nānumānam /
analyzed: ūhaḥ tra tarkaḥ ucyate na anumānam

original: tattvajñānārthatā 'py asya pramāṇānugrāhakatvena na sākṣāt /
analyzed: tattva jñāna arthatā pi asya pramāṇa anugrāhaka tvena na sākṣāt

original: tathaiva cārthaṃ sādhayitum eṣa vāde prayujyate hṛdayaśuddhiprakāśanārtham //
analyzed: tathā eva ca artham sādhayitum eṣa vāde prayujyate hṛdaya śuddhi prakāśana artham

original: kāpilās tu buddhidharmam ūham āhuḥ /
analyzed: kāpilāḥ tu buddhi dharmam ūham āhuḥ

original: saḥ tatsiddhāntaprasiddhasattvarajastamorūpaprakṛtiprabhavabhuvanasargādivyavahāranirākaraṇavartmanā pūrvam eva nirastaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ tad siddhānta prasiddha sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ rūpa prakṛti prabhava bhuvana sarga ādi vyavahāra nirākaraṇa vartmanā pūrvam eva nirastaḥ

original: jaiminīyās tu bruvate yuktyā prayoganirūpaṇam ūha iti /
analyzed: jaiminīyāḥ tu bruvate yuktyā prayoga nirūpaṇam ūhaḥ iti

original: iha hi kiṃcid upadiṣṭadṛṣṭādṛṣṭasvabhāvasakaletukartavyatākalāpaṃ karma bhavati /
analyzed: iha hi kiṃcid upadiṣṭa dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa svabhāva sakala itu kartavya tā kalāpam karma bhavati

original: yathā [agneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ] iti darśapūrṇamāsakāṇḍe paṭhitam /
analyzed: yathā agneyaḥ ṣṭākapālaḥ iti darśa pūrṇamāsa kāṇḍe paṭhitam

original: kvacit punaḥ pradhānakarmamātram upadiśyate itikartavyatā tu kācana nāmnāyate /
analyzed: kvacid punar pradhāna karma mātram upadiśyate itikartavya tā tu kācana nāmnā āyate

original: yathā [sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvaped brahmavarcasakāmaḥ] iti //
analyzed: yathā sauryam carum nirvapet brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ iti

original: tatra vicāryate kim itikartavyatāvirahitayathāśrutapradhanamātrasaṃpādanena tatra śāstrarthaprayogaḥ parisamāpyate uta tad api setikartavyatākaṃ pradhānam anuṣṭheyam iti//
analyzed: tatra vicāryate kim itikartavyatā virahita yathāśruta pradhana mātra saṃpādanena tatra śāstṛ artha prayogaḥ parisamāpyate uta tat api sa itikartavyatākam pradhānam anuṣṭheyam iti

original: tatra apūrvaprayuktatvena dharmāṇāṃ pratikaraṇaṃ bhede sthite niraṅgasya pradhānasyānanuṣṭheyatvāt vidhyantādhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyena prākṛtavat vaikṛtakarma kartavyam iti setikartavyatākaṃ tad anuṣṭhīyate /
analyzed: tatra apūrva prayukta tvena dharmāṇām pratikaraṇam bhede sthite niraṅgasya pradhānasya ananuṣṭheya tvāt vidhi anta adhikaraṇa siddhānta nyāyena prākṛta vat vaikṛta karma kartavyam iti sa itikartavyatākam tat anuṣṭhīyate

original: evaṃ sāmānyātideśe sthite sati kasya vaikṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kutaḥ prakṛteḥ dharmā adhigantavyā iti cintāyaṃ dravyadevatādicodanāsārūpyaparyalocanopanatahṛdayasannidhānaprākṛtakarmaviśeṣasaṃbandhina eva tatra dharmā bhavitum arhantīti sthāpite yugapad upanipatadanargalacodakavyāpāropanītanikhilākhaḍamaṇḍalavidhyantakāṇḍādhigamyadharmaprabandhaprāptau satyāṃ te dharmāḥ kathaṃ prayoktavyā iti yuktya prayoganirūpaṇaṃ ūha ucyate yena itthaṃ prayoktavyā iti dharmā vyavasthapyate //
analyzed: evam sāmānya atideśe sthite sati kasya vaikṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kutas prakṛteḥ dharmāḥ adhigantavyāḥ iti cintā ayam dravya devatā ādi codanā sārūpya paryalocana upanata hṛdaya sannidhāna prākṛta karma viśeṣa saṃbandhinaḥ eva tatra dharmāḥ bhavitum arhanti iti sthāpite yugapad upanipatat anargala codaka vyāpāra upanīta nikhila a khaḍa maṇḍala vidhi anta kāṇḍa adhigamya dharma prabandha prāptau satyām te dharmāḥ katham prayoktavyāḥ iti ūhaḥ ucyate

original: sa ca trividhaḥ mantrasāmasaṃskāraviṣayaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca trividhaḥ mantra sāma saṃskāra viṣayaḥ

original: mantraviṣayas tāvat yathā'traiva saurye carau prakṛtivad bhāvena agnneyāt [agnaye tvā juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi] iti nirvāpamantraḥ prāptaḥ kathaṃ prayoktavya iti vicāraṇāyāṃ uccāraṇamātreṇa mantrāṇām anupayogāt prayogasamavetadravyadevatādiprakāśanadvareṇa tad upayuogasya vyavasthitatvāt iha ca prākṛta evāyaṃ [agnaye juṣṭaṃ] iti prayujyamāno mantraḥ prayogasamavetasyārthasyāprakāśanāt asaṅgato bhavet /
analyzed: mantra viṣayaḥ tāvat yathā atra eva saurye carau prakṛti vat bhāvena agnaye iyāt agnaye tvā juṣṭam nirvapāmi iti nirvāpa mantraḥ prāptaḥ katham prayoktavyaḥ iti vicāraṇāyām uccāraṇa mātreṇa mantrāṇām anupayogāt prayoga samaveta dravya devatā ādi prakāśana dvareṇa tat upayuogasya vyavasthita tvāt iha ca prākṛtaḥ eva ayam agnaye juṣṭam iti prayujyamānaḥ mantraḥ prayoga samavetasya arthasya aprakāśanāt asaṅgataḥ bhavet

original: sarvātmanā cotsṛjyamāne mantre mantraprakāśitakarmānanuṣṭhānāt na prakṛtivat kṛtaṃ bhaved ity agnipoddhāreṇa sūryapadaprakṣepeṇa mantraḥ prayoktavya iti gamyate [sūryāya tvā juṣṭaṃ nirvapāma] iti //
analyzed: sarva ātmanā ca utsṛjyamāne mantre mantra prakāśita karma ananuṣṭhānāt na prakṛti vat kṛtam bhavet iti sūrya pada prakṣepeṇa mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ iti gamyate sūryāya tvā juṣṭam nirvapāmaḥ iti

original: nanu ūhapravaranāmadheyānām amantratvād ittham api na mantreṇa smṛtaṃ karma kṛtaṃ syāt naitat [ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavad bhavati] iti nyāyāt //
analyzed: nanu ūha pravara nāmadheyānām amantra tvāt ittham api na mantreṇa smṛtam karma kṛtam syāt na etat eka deśa vikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti nyāyāt

original: sāmaviṣayas tu [gītayas sāmāni] iti sthite kvacit karmaṇi [rathantaram uttarayor gāyati] [bṛhad uttarayor gāyati] iti śruteḥ sā bṛhadrathantaragītiḥ yasyām ṛci yonibhūtāyām utthitā tato 'nyasyām api prayujyate /
analyzed: sāma viṣayaḥ tu gītayaḥ sāmāni iti sthite kvacid karmaṇi rathantaram uttarayoḥ gāyati bṛhat uttarayoḥ gāyati iti śruteḥ sā bṛhat rathantara gītiḥ yasyām ṛci yoni bhūtāyām utthitā tatas nyasyām api prayujyate

original: tādṛgakṣarāpāye 'pi sā gītiḥ ṛgantarākṣreṇv api pratyabhijñāyate [rathantaram anena śloko kena gītam] iti vyavahāradarśanāt //
analyzed: tādṛś akṣara apāye sā gītiḥ ṛk antara akṣreṇu api pratyabhijñāyate rathantaram anena kena gītam iti vyavahāra darśanāt

original: saṃskāraḥ khalv api prākṛtau [prokṣitābhyām ulūkhalamusalābhyām avahanti] iti sāmskāraś coditaḥ kvacic ca vikṛtau śrūyate [nakhanirbhinnaś carur bhavati] iti /
analyzed: saṃskāraḥ khalu api prākṛtau prokṣitābhyām ulūkhala musalābhyām avahanti iti sāmskāraḥ coditaḥ kvacid ca vikṛtau śrūyate nakha nirbhinnaḥ caruḥ bhavati iti

original: tatrolūkhalamusalayoḥ prakṛtau puroḍāśāpekṣitatuṣakaṇavipramokapūrvakataūḍulībhāvasaṃpādanadvāreṇopayogāt vikṛtāv api tatkāryāpannānāṃ nakhānāṃ prokṣaṇākhyaḥ saṃskāraḥ kriyata iti /
analyzed: tatra ulūkhala musalayoḥ prakṛtau puroḍāśa apekṣita tuṣa kaṇa vipramoka pūrvakata ūḍulībhāva saṃpādana dvāreṇa upayogāt vikṛtau api tad kārya āpannānām nakhānām prokṣaṇa ākhyaḥ saṃskāraḥ kriyate iti

original: so 'yaṃ trividha ūhaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ yam trividhaḥ ūhaḥ

original: keccit tu paṃcavidham ūham ācakṣate /
analyzed: keccid tu paṃcavidham ūham ācakṣate

original: [dharmasyārthakṛtatvāt] [dravyaguṇasaṃskāravyatiriktakramaprateṣedhe codanānubandhaḥ samanvayāt] iti sūtram anusarantaḥ /
analyzed: dharmasya artha kṛta tvāt dravya guṇa saṃskāra vyatirikta krama prateṣedhe codanā anubandhaḥ samanvayāt iti sūtram anusarantaḥ

original: etat tu pratanyamānam atiprasaṅgam āvahati /
analyzed: etat tu pratanyamānam atiprasaṅgam āvahati

original: trividham eva cohaṃ yājñikā anumanyanta iti /
analyzed: trividham eva ca ūham yājñikāḥ anumanyante iti

original: atra vadanti so 'yam ūhaśabdaḥ śrotriyair anumāne prayuktaḥ /
analyzed: atra vadanti saḥ yam ūha śabdaḥ śrotriyaiḥ anumāne prayuktaḥ

original: yathā smṛtikāraiḥ tatra tarkaśabdaḥ [yas tarkeṇānusaṃdhatte] iti /
analyzed: yathā smṛti kāraiḥ tatra tarka śabdaḥ yaḥ tarkeṇa anusaṃdhatte iti

original: tathā hi vaikṛtaṃ karma dharmitatsamavetārthaprakāśakamantraprayoganirvartyam iti sādhyo dharmaḥ karmatvāt prākṛtakarmavat iti /
analyzed: tathā hi vaikṛtam karma dharmi tad samaveta artha prakāśaka mantra prayoga nirvartyam iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ karma tvāt prākṛta karma vat iti

original: prākṛteṣu ca karmasu tathā tathā vyāptigrahaṇāt sarvo 'yam anumānamārga eva /
analyzed: prākṛteṣu ca karmasu tathā tathā vyāpti grahaṇāt sarvaḥ yam anumāna mārgaḥ eva

original: nakhāḥ prokṣaṇīyāḥ prayogopayogi taṇḍulanirvartakatvād iti //
analyzed: nakhāḥ prokṣaṇīyāḥ prayoga upayogi taṇḍula nirvartaka tvāt iti

original: sāmasu tu spaṣṭam eva vacanam asti [rathantaram uttarayor gāyati] iti /
analyzed: sāmasu tu spaṣṭam eva vacanam asti rathantaram uttarayoḥ gāyati iti

original: tadabhāve 'pi mantrasaṃskārasamānayogakṣematvam eva //
analyzed: tad abhāve pi mantra saṃskāra samāna yogakṣema tvam eva

original: api ca śabdapṛṣṭhasthitanyāyasahasravyutpādanātmake mīmāṃsāśāstre tannyāyalabhyo 'rthaḥ codanārtha eveti sthāpitam /
analyzed: api ca śabda pṛṣṭha sthita nyāya sahasra vyutpādana ātmake mīmāṃsā śāstre tad nyāya labhyaḥ rthaḥ codanā arthaḥ eva iti sthāpitam

original: ataś ca yathoktohalabhyasyārthasya codanārthatā mātivartiṣṭheti so 'yam ūhaḥ śabda evāntarbhāvaṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca yathā uktā ūha labhyasya arthasya codana artha tā mā ativartiṣṭha iti saḥ yam ūhaḥ śabdaḥ eva antar bhāvaṇīyaḥ

original: pramāṇāntaragocaro vā dharmaḥ syāt /
analyzed: pramāṇa antara gocaraḥ vā dharmaḥ syāt

original: nyāyaviśeṣātmakas tūhaḥ nānumānād arthāntaraṃ syād /
analyzed: nyāya viśeṣa ātmakaḥ tu ūhaḥ na anumānāt artha antaram syāt

original: [agnaye] ity asya sthāne [sūryāya] iti padasya prayoga ūhasya phalam nohaḥ /
analyzed: agnaye iti asya sthāne sūryāya iti padasya prayogaḥ ūhasya phalam na ūhaḥ

original: tasmān na yājñikaiḥ pramāṇād arthāntaram ūha uktaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt na yājñikaiḥ pramāṇāt artha antaram ūhaḥ uktaḥ

original: iha tu pūrvoktayā nītyā pramāṇavyatirikta ūhaḥ upapāditaḥ /
analyzed: iha tu pūrvoktayā nītyā pramāṇa vyatiriktaḥ ūhaḥ upapāditaḥ

original: śrotri yās tu tadanabhijñatayā nyāye nyāyaphale ca ūhaśabdam upacaritavanta ity alaṃ śāstrāntarodgāragahanābhiḥ kathābhiḥ //
analyzed: śrotri yāḥ tu tad anabhijña tayā nyāye nyāya phale ca ūha śabdam upacaritavantaḥ iti alam śāstra antara udgāra gahanābhiḥ kathābhiḥ

original: tad eṣa mīmāṃsakakalpyamānaḥ nohaḥ pramāṇavyatirekam eti /
analyzed: tat eṣa mīmāṃsaka kalpyamānaḥ na ūhaḥ pramāṇa vyatirekam eti

original: pramāṇasandehadaśāntarālavartī tu tarkaḥ kathito 'tra śāstre //
analyzed: pramāṇa sandeha daśa antarāla vartī tu tarkaḥ śāstre

original: tarkānantaraṃ nirṇayo bhavati paṭhitaś ceti sa lakṣyate vimṛśya pakṣapratipakṣābhyām arthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇayaḥ //1.1.41//
analyzed: tarka anantaram nirṇayaḥ bhavati paṭhitaḥ ca iti sa lakṣyate vimṛśya pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ

original: avadhāraṇaṃ nirṇaya ity ucyamāne mithyāvadhāraṇam api tathā syād ity arthagrahaṇam /
analyzed: avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ iti ucyamāne mithyā avadhāraṇam api tathā syāt iti artha grahaṇam

original: indriyādijanitam api tattvāvadhāraṇam asty eva /
analyzed: indriya ādi janitam api tattva avadhāraṇam asti eva

original: nyāyoparamahetos tu nirṇayasyoddeśāt sa evānumānajanyo lakṣaṇīya iheti pakṣapratipakṣābhyā ity uktam //
analyzed: nyāya uparama hetoḥ tu nirṇayasya uddeśāt saḥ eva anumāna janyaḥ lakṣaṇīyaḥ iha iti pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām iti uktam

original: ekādhikaraṇau dharmau tulyakālau virodhinau /
analyzed: eka adhikaraṇau dharmau tulya kālau virodhinau

original: pṛthakparigrahau pakṣapratipakṣāv udāhṛtau //
analyzed: pṛthak parigrahau pakṣa pratipakṣau udāhṛtau

original: na tarhi tābhyāṃ nirṇayaḥ tayor anyataraviṣayo hi bhavati nirṇayaḥ na tatkaraṇaka eveti satyam iha tu pakṣapratipakṣaśabdābhyāṃ tadviṣayau sādhanatadupālambhau lakṣyete /
analyzed: na tarhi tābhyām nirṇayaḥ tayoḥ anyatara viṣayaḥ hi bhavati nirṇayaḥ na tad karaṇakaḥ eva iti satyam iha tu pakṣa pratipakṣa śabdābhyām tad viṣayau sādhana tad upālambhau lakṣyete

original: tau ca tasmin karaṇam eva /
analyzed: tau ca tasmin karaṇam eva

original: kimarthaṃ punaḥ lakṣaṇā ''śrīyate [sādhanopālambhābhyāṃ] ity eva kathaṃ na sūtritam evam abhidhīyamāne punas tayor viṣayo mṛgyaḥ /
analyzed: kimartham punar lakṣaṇā śrīyate sādhana upālambhābhyām iti eva katham na sūtritam evam abhidhīyamāne punar tayoḥ viṣayaḥ mṛgyaḥ

original: lakṣaṇāprayoge tu so 'py avagato bhavet /
analyzed: lakṣaṇā prayoge tu saḥ pi avagataḥ bhavet

original: mukhyam abhidhāya taditaro lakṣyate //
analyzed: mukhyam abhidhāya tad itaraḥ lakṣyate

original: bhavaty evam dvābhyāṃ tu kathaṃ nirṇayaḥ ekam eva hi sādhanaṃ nirṇayāya kalpyate evam etat na dvitīyam api sādhanaṃ nirṇayanimittam ācakṣmahe kin tu tadupālambhasādhanaṃ ca sādhanopālambhaś ca sādhanopālambhau tābhyāṃ nirṇayaḥ //
analyzed: bhavati evam dvābhyām tu katham nirṇayaḥ ekam eva hi sādhanam nirṇayāya kalpyate evam etat na dvitīyam api sādhanam nirṇaya nimittam ācakṣmahe kin tu tad upālambha sādhanam ca sādhana upālambhaḥ ca sādhana upālambhau tābhyām nirṇayaḥ

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati svapakṣe sādhanam adhigacchan parapakṣasādhane ca dūṣaṇam utprekṣamāṇah svapakṣaṃ pramātā nirṇayatīti //
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati sva pakṣe sādhanam adhigacchan para pakṣa sādhane ca dūṣaṇam utprekṣamāṇaḥ sva pakṣam pramātā nirṇayati iti

original: na khalv evaṃ na jāne /
analyzed: na khalu evam na jāne

original: kin tu upālambhasya ka iva nirṇayajanmani vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: kin tu upālambhasya kaḥ iva nirṇaya janmani vyāpāraḥ

original: sa hi parapakṣasādhanam evocchindyād iti asty etat taducchedadvāreṇāpi tu svapakṣasādhanābhimānam āviṣkurvan kalpata eva nirṇayāyeti yuktaḥ dvayor api kāraṇabhāvaḥ //
analyzed: sa hi para pakṣa sādhanam eva ucchindyāt iti asti etat tad uccheda dvāreṇa api tu sva pakṣa sādhana abhimānam āviṣkurvan kalpate eva nirṇayāya iti yuktaḥ dvayoḥ api kāraṇa bhāvaḥ

original: nanu idānīm arthagrahaṇam anarthakam iva /
analyzed: nanu idānīm artha grahaṇam anarthakam iva

original: na hy evaṃvidhasādhanādhīnajanmā nirṇayābhāsaḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na hi evaṃvidha sādhana adhīna janmā nirṇaya ābhāsaḥ saṃbhavati

original: sādhanopālambhalakṣaṇārthāv api pakṣapratipakṣaśabdau viṣayam abhivadituṃ na śaknuta ity uktam eveti ko 'rtho 'rthagrahaṇena ucyate pakṣapratipakṣayos tu dvayoḥ anyatarārthe 'vadhāraṇaṃ bhavati nobhayatra /
analyzed: sādhana upālambha lakṣaṇa arthau api pakṣa pratipakṣa śabdau viṣayam abhivaditum na śaknutaḥ iti uktam eva iti kaḥ rthaḥ rtha grahaṇena ucyate pakṣa pratipakṣayoḥ tu dvayoḥ anyatara arthe bhavati na ubhayatra

original: sa eva ca paramārthato 'rthaḥ itaras tu bhrāntikalpita iti pradarśanāyārthapadopādānam //
analyzed: saḥ eva ca paramārthataḥ rthaḥ itaraḥ tu bhrānti kalpitaḥ iti pradarśanāya artha pada upādānam

original: lakṣyamāṇasādhanopālambhaniṣṭhatvāt tu pakṣapratipakṣaśabdayoḥ viṣayanirdeśārthaṃ arthapadam ity eke //
analyzed: lakṣyamāṇa sādhana upālambha niṣṭha tvāt tu pakṣa pratipakṣa śabdayoḥ viṣaya nirdeśa artham artha padam iti eke

original: [vimṛśya] iti kimartham vastusvarūpakathanārtham eva /
analyzed: vimṛśya iti kimartham vastu svarūpa kathana artham eva

original: amumānakāraṇako hi nirṇayaḥ iha lakṣyata ity uktam /
analyzed: amumāna kāraṇakaḥ hi nirṇayaḥ iha lakṣyate iti uktam

original: anumānaṃ ca saṃśayaviṣaye pravartata iti tarkānantaram api /
analyzed: anumānam ca saṃśaya viṣaye pravartate iti tarka anantaram api

original: anenaivāśayena asyopādānam /
analyzed: anena eva āśayena asya upādānam

original: saṃśayād anantaraṃ tarkaḥ tarkād ūrdhvaṃ ca nirṇayo dṛṣṭaḥ pravartamānaḥ /
analyzed: saṃśayāt anantaram tarkaḥ tarkāt ūrdhvam ca nirṇayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ pravartamānaḥ

original: atas sa tatpūrvaka iṣyate //
analyzed: atas sa tad pūrvakaḥ iṣyate

original: nirṇaye tu samutpanne bubhutsā vinivartate /
analyzed: nirṇaye tu samutpanne bubhutsā vinivartate

original: ata eva hi manyante tadantaṃ nyāyacintanam //
analyzed: atas eva hi manyante tad antam nyāya cintanam

original: bhavatv evam idan tu cintyatām kva niyamaḥ kiṃ vimarśe kiṃ pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ kiṃ nirṇaye iti /
analyzed: bhavatu evam idan tu cintyatām kva niyamaḥ kim vimarśe kim pakṣa pratipakṣayoḥ kim nirṇaye iti

original: traye 'pi ca nopapadyata iti /
analyzed: traye pi ca na upapadyate iti

original: na vimṛśyaiva nirṇayaḥ avimṛśyāpi bhāvāt /
analyzed: na vimṛśya eva nirṇayaḥ a vimṛśya api bhāvāt

original: na pakṣapratipakṣābhyām eva indriyāder api tadutpādāt /
analyzed: na pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām eva indriya ādeḥ api tad utpādāt

original: na nirṇaya eva tarkasyāpi kvacid anivṛtteḥ uktam atra uddeśasūtre tattvajñānapadopādānāt pramāṇapadena ca tatphalākṣepāt na nirṇayamātreṇoddiṣṭena kim api prayojanam /
analyzed: na nirṇayaḥ eva tarkasya api kvacid anivṛtteḥ uktam atra uddeśa sūtre tattva jñāna pada upādānāt pramāṇa padena ca tad phala ākṣepāt na nirṇaya mātreṇa uddiṣṭena kim api prayojanam

original: viśiṣṭas tu nirṇayaḥ lakṣyatvena vivakṣitaḥ //
analyzed: viśiṣṭaḥ tu nirṇayaḥ lakṣya tvena vivakṣitaḥ

original: parīkṣāviṣayo yo hi nirṇayo nyāyanirmitaḥ /
analyzed: parīkṣā viṣayaḥ yaḥ hi nirṇayaḥ nyāya nirmitaḥ

original: niyamatrayam apy etat tasmin na hi na yujyate //
analyzed: niyama trayam api etat tasmin na hi na yujyate

original: sa hi vimṛśyaiva bhavati vimarśapūrvakatvāt parīkṣāyāḥ /
analyzed: sa hi vimṛśya eva bhavati vimarśa pūrvaka tvāt parīkṣāyāḥ

original: anumānaṃ ca saṃdighe viṣaye pravartat iti prāyeṇa tadvyavahāraḥ //
analyzed: anumānam ca saṃdighe viṣaye pravartat iti prāyeṇa tad vyavahāraḥ

original: yady api kvacid asaṃdigdhe 'pi viṣaye dṛṣṭaṃ pravartamānam anumānam analārthitāyām atarkitopanataparvatanitambanirgatadhūmadarśanena kṛśānukalpam iva tathāpi vastuyogyatāvaśena saṃdigdhaviṣayam evānumānam icchanti nyāyavidaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api kvacid asaṃdigdhe viṣaye dṛṣṭam pravartamānam anumānam anala arthitāyām atarkita upanata parvata nitamba nirgata dhūma darśanena kṛśānu kalpam iva tathā api vastu yogya tā vaśena saṃdigdha viṣayam eva anumānam icchanti nyāya vidaḥ

original: prakṛtaś ca nirṇayaḥ pakṣapratipakṣābhyām eva nirṇaya eveti na śakyate niyantum anyathā nyāyānuparamād iti /
analyzed: prakṛtaḥ ca nirṇayaḥ pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām eva nirṇayaḥ eva iti na śakyate niyantum anyathā nyāya anuparamāt iti

original: śāstre tu vināpi saṃśayād asti nirṇayaḥ //
analyzed: śāstre tu vinā api saṃśayāt asti nirṇayaḥ

original: yady api ca tatrāpi sūtrakṛtā sarvaparīkṣāṇāṃ saṃśayapūrvakatvam upadeśātideśābhyām abhyadhāyi tathāpi nāsau śāstrīyo nirṇayaḥ parīkṣākāryatvāt //
analyzed: yadi api ca tatra api sūtrakṛtā sarva parīkṣāṇām saṃśaya pūrvaka tvam upadeśa atideśābhyām abhyadhāyi tathā api na asau śāstrīyaḥ nirṇayaḥ parīkṣā kārya tvāt

original: yas ty śāstrata eva kvacid viṣayanirṇayaḥ sa vimarśavarjam utpadyate /
analyzed: yaḥ ti śāstrataḥ eva kvacid viṣaya nirṇayaḥ sa vimarśa varjam utpadyate

original: vāde 'pi vimarśarahito bhavati nirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: vāde pi vimarśa rahitaḥ bhavati nirṇayaḥ

original: ubhau niścitau vādaṃ kurutaḥ saṃdigdhasya tarānadhikārāt /
analyzed: ubhau niścitau vādam kurutaḥ saṃdigdhasya tara anadhikārāt

original: kathaṃ tarhe eṣa pravādaḥ [saṃśayacchedo vādasya phalam] iti prathamam ubhayor api niścitayor vādapravṛttau antarāle balād āpatati yuktidvayopanipātakṛtaḥ saṃśaya iti vastunirṇayāvasānatvād vādasya saṃśayacchedaphalatvam ācakṣate //
analyzed: katham tarhe eṣa pravādaḥ saṃśaya chedaḥ vādasya phalam iti prathamam ubhayoḥ api niścitayoḥ vāda pravṛttau antarāle balāt āpatati yukti dvaya upanipāta kṛtaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti vastu nirṇaya avasāna tvāt vādasya saṃśaya cheda phala tvam ācakṣate

original: yady apy aniścitamatiḥ kurute na vādaṃ śrutvā tathā@i parakīyanayaprayogam /
analyzed: yadi api aniścita matiḥ kurute na vādam śrutvā parakīya naya prayogam

original: antarmatadvayabalābalacintanena saṃśayya nirṇayato nūnam asau svapakṣam //
analyzed: antar mata dvaya balābala cintanena saṃśayya nirṇayataḥ nūnam asau sva pakṣam

original: nyāyaparīdṣādvārakavastuvicārayogyāḥ kathā vādināṃ bhavanti vādaḥ jalpaḥ vitaṇḍeti /
analyzed: nyāya parīdṣā dvārakā vastu vicāra yogyāḥ kathāḥ vādinām bhavanti vādaḥ jalpaḥ vitaṇḍā iti

original: tatra vādas tāvad ucyate pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pañcāvayavopapannaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho vādaḥ //1.2.1//
analyzed: tatra vādaḥ tāvat ucyate pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ siddhānta aviruddhaḥ pañcāvayava upapannaḥ pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ vādaḥ

original: pakṣapratipakṣau vyākhyātau /
analyzed: pakṣa pratipakṣau vyākhyātau

original: tayoḥ parigrahaḥ abhyupagamaniyamaḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ parigrahaḥ abhyupagama niyamaḥ

original: eko vakti [nityaḥ śabdaḥ] iti /
analyzed: ekaḥ vakti nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: aparas tu [anityaḥ śabdaḥ] ity āha /
analyzed: aparaḥ tu anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti āha

original: so 'yaṃ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho vādaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ yam pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ vādaḥ

original: etac ca rūpaṃ kathātraye 'pi sādhāraṇam iti viśeṣam āha pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambha iti /
analyzed: etat ca rūpam kathā traye sādhāraṇam iti viśeṣam āha pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ iti

original: pramāṇaiḥ tarkeṇa ca sādhanam upālambhaś cāsmin kriyate iti pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhaḥ /
analyzed: pramāṇaiḥ tarkeṇa ca sādhanam upālambhaḥ ca asmin kriyate iti pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ

original: na tv īdṛśī vitaṇḍā tasyāḥ pratipakṣasādhanopanyāsaūśūnyasvabhāvatvāt /
analyzed: na tu īdṛśī vitaṇḍā tasyāḥ

original: nanu pratyakṣādeḥ pramāṇasya parapratītyanupāyatvāt na tena vāde sādhanopālambhau śakyakriyau /
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣa ādeḥ pramāṇasya para pratīti anupāya tvāt na tena vāde sādhana upālambhau śakya kriyau

original: tarkasya tu pratītisādhanatvam api tāvat na saṃbhavati saṃbhāvanāpratyayasvabhāvatvāt /
analyzed: tarkasya tu pratīti sādhana tvam api tāvat na saṃbhavati saṃbhāvanā pratyaya svabhāva tvāt

original: kim uta parapratyāyanāṅgateti na tarāṃ tasya sādhanopālambhahetutvam /
analyzed: kim uta para pratyāyana aṅga tā iti na tarām tasya sādhana upālambha hetu tvam

original: satyam evam iha tu na pramāṇaśandena pratyakṣāder abhidhānam api tu pramāṇamūlā avayavāḥ ucyante /
analyzed: satyam evam iha tu na pramāṇa śandena pratyakṣa ādeḥ abhidhānam api tu pramāṇa mūlāḥ avayavāḥ ucyante

original: taiś ca siddhyupālabdhī kriyete /
analyzed: taiḥ ca siddhi upālabdhī kriyete

original: evaṃ tarkasya tu svataḥ sādhanopālambhakaraṇakauśalaśūnyātmano 'pi pramāṇānugrāhakatvāt pāramparyeṇa taddhetor āśayaśuddhipradarśanārtham upādānam /
analyzed: evam tarkasya tu svatas sādhana upālambha karaṇa kauśala śūnya ātmanaḥ api pramāṇa anugrāhaka tvāt pāramparyeṇa tad hetoḥ āśaya śuddhi pradarśana artham upādānam

original: yady evaṃ pramāṇapadenaiva tanmūlāvayavapratipādanāt paṃcāvayavopapannagrahaṇam atiricyate //
analyzed: yadi evam pramāṇa padena eva tad mūla avayava pratipādanāt paṃca avayava upapanna grahaṇam atiricyate

original: tatra kecid ācakṣate pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambha iti vādalakṣaṇe chalajātinigrahasthānasādhanopālambha iti ca jalpalakṣaṇe śravaṇāt vāde sarvātmanā chalādiniṣedhaprasaktau katipayanigrahasthānodbhāvanābhyanujñānārthaṃ paṃcāvayavopapannagrahaṇam //
analyzed: tatra kecid ācakṣate pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ iti vāda lakṣaṇe chala jāti nigrahasthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ iti ca jalpa lakṣaṇe śravaṇāt vāde sarva ātmanā chala ādi niṣedha prasaktau katipaya nigrahasthāna udbhāvana abhyanujñāna artham paṃca avayava upapanna grahaṇam

original: anena ca hīnaṃ anyatamenāpy avayavena nyūnam hetūdāharaṇābhyām adhikaṃ adhikam iti nyūnādhikayor udbhāvanam anujñāyate /
analyzed: anena ca hīnam anyatamena api avayavena nyūnam hetu udāharaṇābhyām adhikam adhikam iti nyūna adhikayoḥ udbhāvanam anujñāyate

original: siddhāntāviruddhagrahaṇenāpi [siddhāntam abhyupetya tadvirodhī virodhaḥ] iti viruddhākhyahetvābhāsodbhāvanam anujñātam ity evaṃ vāde trīṇi nigrahasthānāny udbhāvanīyāni //
analyzed: siddhānta aviruddha grahaṇena api siddhāntam abhyupetya tad virodhī virodhaḥ iti viruddha ākhya hetvābhāsa udbhāvanam anujñātam iti evam vāde trīṇi nigrahasthānāni udbhāvanīyāni

original: anye vadanti viruddha eva hetvābhāso vāde codyate nānaikāntikādir iti /
analyzed: anye vadanti viruddhaḥ eva hetvābhāsaḥ vāde codyate na anaikāntika ādiḥ iti

original: katham etat yujyate [nigrahasthānebhyaḥ pṛthagupadiṣṭā hetvābhāsā vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyanti] iti bhāṣyakāravacanāt pramāṇapadena ca tanmūlāvayavākṣepāt pramāṇābhāsamūlanirāse sati sakalahetvābhāsodbhāvanam api tatra siddham iti //
analyzed: katham etat yujyate nigrahasthānebhyaḥ pṛthak upadiṣṭāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ vāde codanīyāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti bhāṣyakāra vacanāt pramāṇa padena ca tad mūla avayava ākṣepāt pramāṇa ābhāsa mūla nirāse sati sakala hetvābhāsa udbhāvanam api tatra siddham iti

original: siddhāntāviruddhagrahaṇena [siddhāntam abhyupetyāniyamāt kathāprasaṅgaḥ apasidd hāntaḥ] ity apasiddhāntākhyanigrahasthānābhyanujñānam ity evam aṣṭau nigrahasthānāni vāde udbhāvyanta iti tad anupapannam na hi trīṇi vā aṣṭau vā vāde nigrahasthānāni codanīyānīei codanā vaidikī rājaśāsanaṃ vā /
analyzed: siddhānta aviruddha grahaṇena siddhāntam abhyupetya aniyamāt kathā prasaṅgaḥ hāntaḥ iti apasiddhānta ākhya nigrahasthāna abhyanujñānam iti evam aṣṭau nigrahasthānāni vāde udbhāvyante iti tat anupapannam na hi trīṇi vā aṣṭau vā vāde nigrahasthānāni codanīyāni codanā vaidikī rāja śāsanam vā

original: vastupariśuddhisādhanaṃ sarvam eva tatra prayogārham /
analyzed: vastu pariśuddhi sādhanam sarvam eva tatra prayoga arham

original: ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ jalpe kasyāṃcid avasthāyāṃ buddhi@ūrvakam api chalādiprayogaḥ kriyate /
analyzed: ayam tu viśeṣaḥ jalpe kasyāṃcid avasthāyām buddhi ūrvakam api chala ādi prayogaḥ kriyate

original: vāde tu na tathā teṣāṃ prayogaḥ /
analyzed: vāde tu na tathā teṣām prayogaḥ

original: bhrāntyā tu kathaj cit prayuktānām avśyam udbhāvanam anudbhāvane vastupariśuddher abhāvāt /
analyzed: bhrāntyā tu kathak cit prayuktānām udbhāvanam an udbhāvane vastu pariśuddheḥ abhāvāt

original: kathaṃ tarhīdaṃ padadvayaṃ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ paṃcāvayavopapanna iti /
analyzed: katham tarhi idam pada dvayam siddhānta aviruddhaḥ paṃca avayava upapannaḥ iti

original: apasiddhāntādisamyagdūṣaṇdikpradarśanena evaṃprakāravastuśuddhyanuguṇanigrahasthānajātābhyanujñānāṛtham evety abhiyuktāḥ /
analyzed: apasiddhānta ādi samyak dūṣaṇ diś pradarśanena evaṃprakāra vastu śuddhi anuguṇa nigrahasthāna jāta abhyanujñāna aṛtham eva iti abhiyuktāḥ

original: apratibhāvikṣepādayo hi na vāde parājayahetavaḥ kṣaṇāntareṇāpy āgatya anusmṛtya ca sādhanam upālambhaṃ vā tatra pravadan na parājīyate /
analyzed: apratibhā vikṣepa ādayaḥ hi na vāde parājaya hetavaḥ kṣaṇa antareṇa api āgatya anusmṛtya ca sādhanam upālambham vā tatra pravadan na parājīyate

original: pratijñāhānyādi tu samyakparājayakāraṇam akhilam ābhyāṃ padābhyām abhyanujñātam atreti //
analyzed: pratijñā hāni ādi tu samyak parājaya kāraṇam akhilam ābhyām padābhyām abhyanujñātam atra iti

original: nanu idānāṃi pramāṇatarkagrahaṇam apārthakam paṃcāvayavopapannapadenaiva pramāṇamūlāvayavopadeśāt vastupariśuddhyanuguṇanigrahasthānābhyanujñānāc ca kim iva noktam na abhiprāyanair malyānivedanadvārakavādajalpavivekapratipādanārthatvāt /
analyzed: nanu pramāṇa tarka grahaṇam apārthakam paṃcāvayava upapanna padena eva pramāṇa mūla avayava upadeśāt vastu pariśuddhi anuguṇa nigrahasthāna abhyanujñānāt ca kim iva na uktam na abhiprāyanaiḥ

original: svapratipattisādhanam api pratyakṣādi vāde prayoktum ucitaṃ āśayaśuddhim upadarśayitum /
analyzed: sva pratipatti sādhanam api pratyakṣa ādi vāde prayoktum ucitam āśaya śuddhim upadarśayitum

original: [atra vastuni mama prathamaṃ tarkaḥ itthaṃ pravṛtta āsīt tataḥ pramāṇam idaṃ pravṛttam] ity evamādy api tatra vaktavyam /
analyzed: atra vastuni mama prathamam tarkaḥ ittham pravṛttaḥ āsīt tatas pramāṇam idam pravṛttam iti evamādi api tatra vaktavyam

original: ata eva cānyatarapakṣanirṇayāvasāna eva bhavati vādaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva ca anyatara pakṣa nirṇaya avasānaḥ eva bhavati vādaḥ

original: na jalpavat alīkadūṣaṇāḍambaraviracitaparaparibhavaparyavasāno 'pīti tathā buddhipūrvam abhāsānam aprayoga iti nirmatsarakathātvam asyoktam iti akaluṣākūtakathanāya pramāṇa tarkapadam //
analyzed: na jalpa vat alīka dūṣaṇa āḍambara viracita para paribhava paryavasānā u pi iti tathā buddhi pūrvam abhāsānam aprayogaḥ iti nirmatsara kathā tvam asya uktam iti akaluṣa ākūta kathanāya

original: api ca sādhanopālambhavyatiṣaṅgapratipādanam api tasya phalam /
analyzed: api ca sādhana upālambha vyatiṣaṅga pratipādanam api tasya phalam

original: ubhāv api parasparam anubandhena vādibhyām parīkṣyamāṇau pakṣapratipakṣau vādatāṃ prayojayataḥ na tu svaguhe śāstre vā vivicyamānau /
analyzed: ubhau api parasparam anubandhena vādibhyām parīkṣyamāṇau pakṣa pratipakṣau vāda tām prayojayataḥ na tu sva guhe śāstre vā vivicyamānau

original: pramāṇair eva vāde chalādibhir eva jalpe vyavahāra iti niyamaśaṅkānirasanam api tatpadopādānaprayojanam uktvam anyair iti kṛtam ativistareṇa /
analyzed: pramāṇaiḥ eva vāde chala ādibhiḥ eva jalpe vyavahāraḥ iti niyama śaṅkā nirasanam api tad pada upādāna prayojanam anyaiḥ iti kṛtam ati vistareṇa

original: sarvathā vādalakṣaṇaṃ sustham //
analyzed: sarvathā vāda lakṣaṇam sustham

original: vādaṃ tu nirṇayaphalārthibhir eva śiṣyasabrahmacārigurubhiḥ sahavītarāgaiḥ /
analyzed: vādam tu nirṇaya phala arthibhiḥ eva śiṣya sabrahmacāri gurubhiḥ saha vīta rāgaiḥ

original: na khyātilābharabhasaprativardhamānaspardhānubandhavidhur ātmabhir ārabheta //
analyzed: na khyāti lābha rabhasa prativardhamāna spardhā anubandha vidhuḥ ātmabhiḥ ārabheta

original: yathoktopapannaḥ chalajātinigrahsthānasādhan0palālambhāh jalpaḥ //1.2.2//
analyzed: yathā ukta upapannaḥ jalpaḥ

original: yathoktopapannagrahaṇena sarvātideśe vādajalpayor aviśeṣa iti śaṅkamānāḥ kecana pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahamatrātideśama eva vyācakṣate /
analyzed: yathā ukta upapanna grahaṇena sarva atideśe vāda jalpayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ iti śaṅkamānāḥ kecana pakṣa pratipakṣa parigraham atra atideśam eva vyācakṣate

original: iyatas tu pūrvasūtrānuvṛttyāpi siddheḥ mandaphalam eva [yathoktopapanna]vacanaṃ bhaved iti samastātideśa eva varam /
analyzed: iyataḥ tu pūrva sūtra anuvṛttyā api siddheḥ manda phalam eva yathā ukta upapanna vacanam bhavet iti samasta atideśaḥ eva varam

original: na ca tatrāpi vādajalpayoḥ sāmyam gamyamānārthānatideśāt /
analyzed: na ca tatra api vāda jalpayoḥ sāmyam gamyamāna artha anatideśāt

original: śrauta evārthaḥ atidiśyate na gamyamānaḥ /
analyzed: śrautaḥ eva arthaḥ atidiśyate na gamyamānaḥ

original: tatkṛta eva ca tayor bhedaḥ //
analyzed: tad kṛtaḥ eva ca tayoḥ bhedaḥ

original: tathā ca pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambha ity atra gamyamāno 'rthaḥ abhiprāyaniyamaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ iti atra gamyamānaḥ rthaḥ abhiprāya niyamaḥ

original: sa nātidiśyate /
analyzed: sa na atidiśyate

original: siddhāntāviruddhaḥ paṃcāvayavopapannaḥ ity atrāpi buddhipūrvakajātyādiprayogapratiṣedhatadudbhāvananiyamarūpaḥ gamyamāno 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: siddhānta aviruddhaḥ paṃca avayava upapannaḥ iti atra api buddhi pūrvaka jāti ādi prayoga pratiṣedha tad udbhāvana niyama rūpaḥ gamyamānaḥ rthaḥ

original: so 'pi nātidiśyata iti kutas tayor avivekaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ u pi na atidiśyate iti kutas tayoḥ avivekaḥ

original: ata eva ca buddhipurvakaprayoganujñnānāya chalajātinigrahasthānasādhanopālambha ity uktam //
analyzed: atas eva ca buddhi purvaka prayoga anujñnānāya chala jāti nigrahasthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ iti uktam

original: bhavatv evam chalāḍīnāṃ tv asduttaratvāt katham iva sādhanopālambhahetutvam /
analyzed: bhavatu evam chalāḍīnām tu ast uttara tvāt katham iva sādhana upālambha hetu tvam

original: parapakṣapratikṣepadvārakam iti cet na asaduttaratvena pratikṣepe 'pi teṣām asāmarthyātevam api ca sādhanagrahaṇam anarthakam eveti satyam evedam kin tu kasyāṃcid avasthāyāṃ svapratipattisādhanopahitatattvajñānarakṣāyai tāny api vyāpriyante /
analyzed: parapakṣa pratikṣepa dvārakam iti ced na asat uttara tvena pratikṣepe teṣām asāmarthyāt evam api ca sādhana grahaṇam anarthakam eva iti satyam evā idam kin tu kasyāṃcid avasthāyām sva pratipatti sādhana upahita tattva jñāna rakṣāyai tāni api vyāpriyante

original: yadā jānann api parapakṣakraśimānam svapakṣe draḍhimānaṃ ca kvacid avasare paraprayukte sādhane dūṣaṇaṃ sapadi na paśyati svapakṣasādhanaṃ ca jhaṭiti na smarati tadā chālādibhir apy upakramya param abhi bhavati ātmānāṃ ca rakṣatīti //
analyzed: yadā jānan api para pakṣa kraśimānam sva pakṣe draḍhimānam ca kvacid avasare para prayukte sādhane dūṣaṇam sapadi na paśyati sva pakṣa sādhanam ca jhaṭiti na smarati tadā śāla ādibhiḥ api upakramya param abhi bhavati ātmānām ca rakṣati iti

original: nanu yadi paro 'pi chalādīni jānīyāt teṣu cānurūpam uttaram abhidadhīta kathaṃ jīyeta pratyuta jayaty eva satyam tathāpy ekāntaparājayāt varaṃ saṃdeha iti yuktam eva tatprayogeṇa sphuṭāṭopakaraṇam //
analyzed: nanu yadi paraḥ api chala ādīni jānīyāt teṣu ca anurūpam uttaram abhidadhīta katham jīyeta pratyuta jayati eva satyam tathā api ekānta parājayāt varam saṃdehaḥ iti yuktam eva tad prayogeṇa sphuṭa āṭopa karaṇam

original: nanu īdṛśi prayojanāni jigīṣato janasya jānapadasadasi bhavanti /
analyzed: nanu īdṛśi prayojanāni jigīṣataḥ janasya jānapada sadasi bhavanti

original: tasyāpi na nipuṇam atipariṣadi /
analyzed: tasya api na nipuṇam ati pariṣadi

original: mumukṣos tu dūrāpetaiva katheyam iti katham iha mokṣaśāstre jalpādyupadeśaḥ naitad evam mumukṣor api kvacit prasaṅge tadupayogāt /
analyzed: mumukṣoḥ tu dūra apetā eva kathā iyam iti katham iha mokṣa śāstre jalpa ādi upadeśaḥ na etat evam mumukṣoḥ api kvacid prasaṅge tad upayogāt

original: tathoktāṃ [tattvādhyavasāyasaṃrakṣaṇāṛthaṃ jalpavitaṇḍe bījaprarohasaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ kaṇṭakaśādkhāvaraṇavat] iti //
analyzed: tathā uktām jalpa vitaṇḍe bīja praroha saṃrakṣaṇa artham iti

original: yadi hi kvacid āśrame sukham āsīnaṃ anekaśiṣyagaṇopāsyamānaṃ rahasyatattvam upadiśantaṃ śāntamānasamācārya anāryaḥ kaścid vipaścid āgatya duradhigatakatipayākṣaracayajanitagurutaragarvagadgadayā girā [bhos tapasvin kiṃ vyākhyāyate huṃ ānvīkṣakī saralam atipriyeyaṃ vidyā /
analyzed: yadi hi kvacid āśrame sukham āsīnam aneka śiṣya gaṇa upāsyamānam rahasya tattvam upadiśantam śānta mānasam ācārya anāryaḥ kaścid vipaścit āgatya duradhigata katipaya akṣara caya janita gurutara garva gadgadayā girā bhoḥ tapasvin kim vyākhyāyate hum ānvīkṣakī saralam ati priyā iyam vidyā

original: kva vedāḥ kva vedaprāmānyam kvātmajñānam kvāpavargaḥ ityādi mandaṃ mandaṃ vihasya sahasā duṣṭamedha iva prakaṭitākāṇḍadaṇḍakāśaḍambaravitrāsitāśramamṛgavargam udgrāhayan ākulayati tadā jagajjālam indrajālapaṇḍitavilasitam iti jānann apy ācāryaḥ yadi tam upekṣate tiraskaroti sadyaḥ samyaksādhanāpratibhāse 'pi yadi chalādibhir enaṃ na śamayati tadā tasmin gate tata utthāya śiṣyagaṇā brūyuḥ [kaṣṭam asthāne kliṣṭāḥ smaḥ //
analyzed: kva vedāḥ kva veda prāmānyam kva ātma jñānam kva apavargaḥ ityādi mandam mandam vihasya sahasā duṣṭa medhaḥ iva prakaṭita akāṇḍa daṇḍa kāśa ḍambara vitrāsita āśrama mṛga vargam udgrāhayan ākulayati tadā jagat jālam indrajāla paṇḍita vilasitam iti jānan api ācāryaḥ yadi tam upekṣate tiraskaroti sadyas samyak sādhana apratibhāse yadi chala ādibhiḥ enam na śamayati tadā tasmin gate tatas utthāya śiṣya gaṇāḥ brūyuḥ kaṣṭam asthāne kli

original: yo 'sāv asmākam ācāryaḥ prakhyāto nyāyavittamaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sau asmākam ācāryaḥ prakhyātaḥ nyāya vittamaḥ

original: atha tv āgatya so 'nyena paṇḍitena parājitaḥ //
analyzed: atha tu āgatya saḥ nyena paṇḍitena parājitaḥ

original: tacchrutvā jana itaro 'pi satpathāsthāśaithilyāt sapadi tam eva mā 'nuyāsīt /
analyzed: tat śrutvā janaḥ sat patha āsthā śaithilyāt sapadi tam eva mā

original: tan nūnaṃ paribhavabhūmikāmasabhyo netavyaḥ sadasi sa vāvadūkapāśaḥ //
analyzed: tat nūnam paribhava bhūmi kāma sabhyaḥ netavyaḥ sadasi sa vāvadūka pāśaḥ

original: tavidhānaghaṭane nirargalaṃ jalpam astram upadiṣṭavān muniḥ /
analyzed: nirargalam jalpam astram upadiṣṭavān muniḥ

original: ānuṣaṅgikam api prayojanaṃ tasya rāgijanatāsu varṇitam //
analyzed: ānuṣaṅgikam api prayojanam tasya rāgi janatāsu varṇitam

original: sa pratipakṣasthāpanāhīno vitaṇḍā //1.2.3//
analyzed: sa pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīnaḥ vitaṇḍā

original: sa eva yathoktalakṣaṇakaḥ jalpaḥ vitaṇḍā bhavati /
analyzed: saḥ eva yathā ukta lakṣaṇakaḥ jalpaḥ vitaṇḍā bhavati

original: ko viśeṣa iti cet āha pratipakṣasthāpanāhīna iti /
analyzed: kaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti ced āha pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīnaḥ iti

original: uttarapakṣavādī vaitaṇḍikaḥ /
analyzed: uttarapakṣa vādī vaitaṇḍikaḥ

original: prathamavādī prathamasādhyamānapakṣāpekṣayā /
analyzed: prathamavādī prathama sādhyamāna pakṣa apekṣayā

original: tatpakṣaḥ hastipratihastinyāyena pratipakṣa ity ucyate /
analyzed: tad pakṣaḥ hasti pratihasti nyāyena pratipakṣaḥ iti ucyate

original: tam asāv abhypagacchaty eva na tatra sādhanam upadiśati parapakṣam evākṣipannās te /
analyzed: tam asau abhypagacchati eva na tatra sādhanam upadiśati parapakṣam eva ākṣipan nāḥ te

original: tarhi sādhanād vinā pakṣo 'pi so 'sya nāsty evety //
analyzed: tarhi sādhanāt vinā saḥ sya na asti eva iti

original: pratipakṣahīno vitaṇḍety ucyatām kiṃ sthāpanāgrahaṇena na abhyupagamamātreṇa tadbhāvāṭ /
analyzed: pratipakṣa hīnaḥ vitaṇḍā iti ucyatām kim sthāpanā grahaṇena na abhyupagama mātreṇa tad bhāvāt

original: tam anabhyupagamy pralapataḥ kas tasya śṛṇuyāt /
analyzed: tam an abhyupagamī pralapataḥ kaḥ tasya śṛṇuyāt

original: aupacāriko vā paramataparākaraṇarūpa evāsya pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: aupacārikaḥ vā para mata parākaraṇa rūpaḥ eva asya pakṣaḥ

original: tasmin hi sati svapakṣo hi tasya siddhyed iti /
analyzed: tasmin hi sati sva pakṣaḥ hi tasya siddhyet iti

original: paramatākṣepapravaṇapravṛtteś ca balāt dvitīyapakṣavādy eva vaitaṇḍika iti /tad evaṃ pakṣo 'styāstīti sādhanaṃ tu nāstīti samyaksūtritaṃ [sa pratipakṣasthāpanāhīno vitaṇḍā] iti //
analyzed: paramata ākṣepa pravaṇa pravṛtteḥ ca balāt dvitīya pakṣa vādī eva vaitaṇḍikaḥ iti tat evam sādhanam tu na asti iti samyak sūtritam sa pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīnaḥ vitaṇḍā iti

original: ity udāhṛtam idaṃ kathātrayaṃ yat parasparaviviktalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: iti udāhṛtam idam kathā trayam yat paraspara vivikta lakṣaṇam

original: sthūlam apy anavalokya kathyate vāda eka iti śākyaśiṣyakaiḥ //
analyzed: sthūlam api an avalokya kathyate vādaḥ ekaḥ iti śākya śiṣyakaiḥ

original: pakṣadharmatvāni paṃca lakṣaṇāni hetor uktāni /
analyzed: pakṣa dharma tvāni paṃca lakṣaṇāni hetoḥ uktāni

original: teṣām ekaikāpāyāt paṃcahetvābhāsā bhavantīti tān darśayitum āha savyabhicāraviruddhaprakaraṇasamasādhyasamātītakālā hetvābhāsāḥ //2.2.4//
analyzed: teṣām ekaika apāyāt paṃca hetvābhāsāḥ bhavanti iti tān darśayitum āha savyabhicāra viruddha prakaraṇasama sādhyasama atīta kālāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ

original: atra hetvābhāsaśrutir eva nirvacanasahitā sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ bodhayati [ahetavaḥ hetuvad ābhāsanta iti hetvābhāsāḥ] iti /
analyzed: atra hetvābhāsa śrutiḥ eva nirvacana sahitā sāmānya lakṣaṇam bodhayati ahetavaḥ hetu vat ābhāsantaḥ iti hetvābhāsāḥ iti

original: lakṣaṇaikadeśayogāc ca hetuvad ābhāsanaṃ ahetor apy upapadyate /
analyzed: lakṣaṇa eka deśa yogāt ca hetu vat ābhāsanam ahetoḥ api upapadyate

original: sakalalakṣaṇāpāye 'pi paṃcamīnirdeśādiḥ bhramahetur ity eke //
analyzed: sakala lakṣaṇa apāye pi paṃcamī nirdeśa ādiḥ bhrama hetuḥ iti eke

original: savyabhicārādipadaparyantavartinī tu saiva śrutiḥ vibhāgam avagamayati pramāṇaśrutivad ity uktam /
analyzed: savyabhicāra ādi pada paryanta vartinī tu sā eva śrutiḥ vibhāgam avagamayati pramāṇa śruti vat iti uktam

original: pakṣadharmatādilakṣaṇānāṃ ca kramaniyamābhāvāṭ sādhyasamaviruddhasavyabhicārātītakālaprakaraṇasamā hetvābhāsā iti pāṭho nāśritaḥ //
analyzed: pakṣa dharmatā ādi lakṣaṇānām ca krama niyama abhāvāt sādhyasama viruddha savyabhicāra atīta kāla prakaraṇasamāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ iti pāṭhaḥ na āśritaḥ

original: nanu traya eva hetvābhāsā iti śakyāḥ na pratyakṣāgamabādhitasya ca hetoh pūrvaṃ pradarśitatvāt //
analyzed: nanu trayaḥ eva hetvābhāsāḥ iti śakyāḥ na pratyakṣa āgama bādhitasya ca pūrvam pradarśita tvāt

original: nanu ekasyaiva rūpadvayavaikalyāt kathaṃ na ṣaṣṭhādayaḥ tatprabhedāḥ syuḥ yathā [anityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣatvāt] iti /
analyzed: nanu ekasya eva rūpa dvaya vaikalyāt katham na ṣaṣṭha ādayaḥ tad prabhedāḥ syuḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt iti

original: eṣa hi pakṣe vṛttyabhāvād asiddha ucyatām uta sāmānyādeḥ vipakṣād apracyutaḥ savyabhicāraḥ uta jātyantaram eva tābhyām iti naitad evam ekaikarūpāpāyanimittabhedapaṃcakapratipādane kṛte dvitrirūpāpāyāt na rūpāntaram avatarati kin tu teṣām eva samāveśaḥ syāt //
analyzed: eṣa hi pakṣe vṛtti abhāvāt asiddhaḥ ucyatām uta sāmānya ādeḥ vipakṣāt apracyutaḥ savyabhicāraḥ uta jāti antaram eva tābhyām iti na etat evam eka eka rūpa apāya nimitta bheda paṃcaka pratipādane kṛte dvi tri rūpa apāyāt na rūpa antaram avatarati kin tu teṣām eva samāveśaḥ syāt

original: api ca prathamagṛhītānyatamarūpavaikalyalabdhahetvābhāsarūpe 'smin kiṃ rūpāntaranirūpaṇenety āstām etat //
analyzed: api ca prathama gṛhīta anyatama rūpa vaikalya labdha hetvābhāsa rūpe smin kim rūpa antara nirūpaṇena iti āstām etat

original: nanu apryojako nām ṣaṣṭho hetvābhāsaḥ samastīti na punar api paṃcatvam na tasyānyathāsiddhatvena asiddha evāntarbhāvaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: nanu apryojakaḥ nām ṣaṣṭhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ samasti iti na punar api paṃcatvam na tasya anyathā asiddha tvena asiddhe eva antarbhāvam vakṣyāmaḥ

original: avāntarabhedavivakṣāyāṃ tu paṃcaiva hetvābhāsā iti siddham //
analyzed: avāntarabheda vivakṣāyām tu paṃca eva hetvābhāsāḥ iti siddham

original: teṣāṃ savyabhicāras tāvad ucyate anaikāntikaḥ savyabhicāraḥ//1.2.5//
analyzed: teṣām savyabhicāraḥ tāvat ucyate anaikāntikaḥ

original: vyabhicāraḥ ekatra vyavasthāniyamaḥ /
tena saha vartata iti savyabhicāraḥ vipakṣād apravyuta ity arthaḥ ekasmin ante bhavan aikāntikaḥ /
analyzed: tena saha vartate iti savyabhicāraḥ vipakṣāt a pravyutaḥ iti arthaḥ ekasmin ante bhavan aikāntikaḥ

original: tadviparyāyād anaikāntika iti sa evāṛthaḥ evam iha lakṣyalakṣaṇapadayoḥ yathākāmam abhyupagamaḥ na pratyakṣādivat vyavasthayā //
analyzed: tad viparyāyāt anaikāntikaḥ iti saḥ eva aṛthaḥ evam iha lakṣya lakṣaṇa padayoḥ yathākāmam abhyupagamaḥ na pratyakṣa ādi vat vyavasthayā

original: savyabhicārapade lakṣyābhidhāyini lakṣaṇavacanam anaikāntukapadam anaikāntikapade tu lakṣyavācini savyabhicārapadaṃ lakṣaṇapratipādakaṃ prasiddhyaprasiddhivibhāgāpekṣayā pikakokilavat draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: savyabhicāra pade lakṣya abhidhāyini lakṣaṇa vacanam anaikāntuka padam anaikāntika pade tu lakṣya vācini savyabhicāra padam lakṣaṇa pratipādakam prasiddhi aprasiddhi vibhāga apekṣayā pika kokila vat draṣṭavyam

original: [pikaḥ kokilaḥ ity ukte yasya pikaśabdārthaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa tataḥ kokilaśabdārtham avabhotsyate /
analyzed: pikaḥ kokilaḥ iti ukte yasya pika śabda arthaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa tatas kokila śabda artham avabhotsyate

original: prasiddhakokilaśabdāṛthas tu pikaśabdāṛtham iti //
analyzed: prasiddha kokila śabdāṛthaḥ tu pika śabdāṛtham iti

original: āha bhavatv evam idaṃ tu cintyatām /
analyzed: āha bhavatu evam idam tu cintyatām

original: [anikāntikaḥ] iti kim ayaṃ paryudāsaḥ prasajyapratiṣedho vā paryudāsapakṣe svapakṣaniyatād anaikāntikād anyaḥ yaḥ sa evānaikāntika iti sa evaiko hetvābhāsaḥ syāt /
analyzed: anikāntikaḥ iti kim ayam paryudāsaḥ prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ vā paryudāsa pakṣe sva pakṣa niyatāt anaikāntikāt anyaḥ yaḥ saḥ eva anaikāntikaḥ iti saḥ eva ekaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ syāt

original: prasajyapratiṣedhe tv ekaikāntikābhāvasya nivṛttirūpasya hetvābhāsatā bhavet na lakṣyatvenābhimatasya vipakṣavṛtteḥ hetvantarasya prameyatvāder iti ucyate praśna evāyam anupapannaḥ /
analyzed: prasajya pratiṣedhe tu eka aikāntika abhāvasya nivṛtti rūpasya hetvābhāsa tā bhavet na lakṣya tvena abhimatasya vipakṣa vṛtteḥ hetu antarasya prameya tva ādeḥ iti ucyate praśnaḥ eva ayam anupapannaḥ

original: saṃśayāno hiparaṃ pṛcchati /
analyzed: saṃśayānaḥ hi param pṛcchati

original: saṃśayaś cobhayathā darśanād bhavati /
analyzed: saṃśayaḥ ca ubhayathā darśanāt bhavati

original: na ca nāmapada saṃbaddhasya nañ saṃbadhyate [śrāddha na bhuṅkte] iti na tu nāmnā śrāddheneti //
analyzed: na ca nāma pada saṃbaddhasya saṃbadhyate śrāddha na bhuṅkte iti na tu nāmnā śrāddhena iti

original: ākhyātenāpi prasajyamānāḥ kvacit prakaraṇasāmarthyānurodhāt pratyayārthasaṃbandham avdhūya dhātvartham eva kevalam  āliṅgan paryudāsavṛttir bhavati [nekṣetodyantam ādityam] iti /
analyzed: ākhyātena api prasajyamānāḥ kvacid prakaraṇa sāmarthya anurodhāt pratyaya artha saṃbandham dhātu artham eva kevalam āliṅgan paryudāsa vṛttiḥ bhavati na īkṣeta udyantam ādityam iti

original: na tu nāmnā saṃbadhyamānaḥ kvacid api paryudāsavṛttim ullaṅghya prasajyapratiṣedhamāṭraparatām avalambano dṛśyate /
analyzed: na tu nāmnā saṃbadhyamānaḥ kvacid api paryudāsa vṛttim ullaṅghya prasajya pratiṣedha māṭra para tām avalambanaḥ dṛśyate

original: abrāhmaṇādau sarvatra tadanyāvagatidarśanāt iti kutastyaḥ saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: abrāhmaṇa ādau sarvatra tad anya avagati darśanāt iti kutastyaḥ saṃśayaḥ

original: atha vā kim anayā 'vāntaracintayā yathā pṛṣṭaṃ kṛta evottaram ucyate /
analyzed: atha vā kim anayā vā antara cintayā yathā pṛṣṭam kṛte eva uttaram ucyate

original: ekasminn anityapakṣe nityapakṣe vā niyataḥ aikāntikaḥ ekapakṣavṛttir ucyate /
analyzed: ekasmin anitya pakṣe nitya pakṣe vā niyataḥ aikāntikaḥ eka pakṣa vṛttiḥ ucyate

original: tato 'nyaḥ pakṣadvayavṛttiḥ anaikāntiko bhavati /
analyzed: tatas nyaḥ pakṣa dvaya vṛttiḥ anaikāntikaḥ bhavati

original: evaṃ na sarve hetvābhāsāḥ pakṣadvayavṛttaya iti na saṃkhyāhāniḥ ataḥ paryudāsapakṣe tāvan na doṣaḥ //
analyzed: evam na sarve hetvābhāsāḥ pakṣa dvaya vṛttayaḥ iti na saṃkhyā hāniḥ atas paryudāsa pakṣe tāvat na doṣaḥ

original: prasajyapratiṣedhe 'pi aikāntiko na bhavati yaḥ sa evāhetur iti na nivṛttimātraparatvam /
analyzed: prasajya pratiṣedhe pi aikāntikaḥ na bhavati yaḥ saḥ eva ahetuḥ iti na nivṛtti mātra paratvam

original: aśrāddhabhojīti kṛtā puruṣa ucyate na śrāddhabhojanābhāvamātram /
analyzed: aśrāddha bhojī iti kṛtā puruṣaḥ ucyate na śrāddha bhojana abhāva mātram

original: evam ihāpi taddhitenaikāntaniyatatāpratiṣedhaviśiṣṭaḥ hetur evocyate nābhāvamātram ity evam ubhayathā 'pi na doṣaḥ //
analyzed: evam iha api tad hitena ekānta niyata tā pratiṣedha viśiṣṭaḥ hetuḥ evā ucyate na abhāva mātram iti evam ubhayathā na doṣaḥ

original: tasyodāharaṇaṃ nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvāt iti /
analyzed: tasya udāharaṇam nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāt iti

original: eṣa hi nityānityapakṣayor enyatarasminn api na niyata iti vipakṣavṛttitvād anaikāntika ukto bhavati //
analyzed: eṣa hi nitya anitya pakṣayoḥ api na niyataḥ iti vipakṣa vṛtti tvāt anaikāntikaḥ uktaḥ bhavati

original: nanu ṣaṭprakāraḥ parair anaikāntika iṣyate /
analyzed: nanu ṣaṣ prakāraḥ paraiḥ anaikāntikaḥ iṣyate

original: sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ vipakṣa vyāpī vipakṣaikavṛttiḥ sapakṣavyāpī ubhayapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ ubhayapakṣavyāpīti sādhāraṇaḥ catuṣprakāṛaḥ /
analyzed: sapakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ vipakṣa vyāpī vipakṣa eka vṛttiḥ sapakṣa vyāpī ubhaya pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ ubhaya pakṣa vyāpī iti sādhāraṇaḥ catuṣprakāṛaḥ

original: asādhāraṇaḥ viruddhāVyabhicārī ceti /
analyzed: asādhāraṇaḥ viruddha avyabhicārī ca iti

original: sa katham iha na nirdiśyate ucyate sapakṣavyāptyādibhedadarśanaṃ tāvat aprayojanakam aśkyaṃ ca hetvābhāsānām avāntarabheānantyāt /
analyzed: sa katham iha na nirdiśyate ucyate sapakṣa vyāpti ādi bheda darśanam tāvat aprayojanakam ca hetvābhāsānām avāntarabheda ānantyāt

original: vipakṣād vyāvṛttir yasya nāsti sa vyabhicāraḥ ity anyatamaheturūpaparahitatvam anaikāntikalakṣaṇam iha vivakṣitam /
analyzed: vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ yasya na asti sa vyabhicāraḥ iti anyatama hetu rūpa para hita tvam anaikāntika lakṣaṇam iha vivakṣitam

original: tac coktam eva /
analyzed: tat ca uktam eva

original: kim avāntarabhedaparigaṇanena //
analyzed: kim avāntarabheda parigaṇanena

original: asādhāraṇaviruddhāvyabhicāṛiṇau tu na saṃs ta eva hetvābhāsāv iti na vyākhyāyete //
analyzed: asādhāraṇa viruddha avyabhicāṛiṇau tu na san te eva hetvābhāsau iti na vyākhyāyete

original: nanu sādhāraṇavad asādhāraṇasyāpi gandhavattvādeḥ saṃśayahetutvadarśanāt katham aśbhavaḥ anekadharmopapatteś ca saṃśayaḥ bhavadhir api vyākhyāta eva naitad evam ubhayaviśeṣasahacaritadharmadarśanaṃ hi tadanusmaraṇayuktena saṃśayam upajanayati /
analyzed: nanu sādhāraṇa vat asādhāraṇasya api gandhavat tva ādeḥ saṃśaya hetu tva darśanāt katham aneka dharma upapatteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ bhavadhiḥ api vyākhyātaḥ eva na etat evam ubhaya viśeṣa sahacarita dharma darśanam hi tad anusmaraṇa yuktena saṃśayam upajanayati

original: asādhāraṇas tu asādhāraBatvād eva na tatsahacaraḥ kdācid upalabdha iti kathaṃ saṃśayahetuḥ kathaṃ tarhy anekadharmopapatter iti varṇyate varṇitam etat /
analyzed: asādhāraṇaḥ tu asādhāraba tvāt eva na tad sahacaraḥ kdācid upalabdhaḥ iti katham saṃśaya hetuḥ katham tarhi aneka dharma upapatteḥ iti varṇyate varṇitam etat

original: vastuno hi viśeṣadharmaḥ kaścid asādhāraṇaḥ kenāpi dharmāntareṇa sahacarito dṛṣṭaḥ so 'sya śabde vibhāgajatvākhyo dharmaḥ kenacid dharmāntareṇa dravyatvena guṇatvena vā sahacarito bhaved itīttham anekadharmopapatteḥ saṃśayo varṇitaḥ //
analyzed: vastunaḥ hi viśeṣa dharmaḥ kaścid asādhāraṇaḥ kena api dharma antareṇa sahacaritaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ saḥ sya śabde vibhāga ja tva ākhyaḥ dharmaḥ kenacid dharma antareṇa dravya tvena guṇa tvena vā sahacaritaḥ bhavet iti ittham aneka dharma upapatteḥ saṃśayaḥ varṇitaḥ

original: tad ihāpi gandhavattvam asādharaṇam eva yadi saṃśayahetutayā varṇyata tarhi sādharaṇāt vastudharmatvād eva saṃśayo bhavet nāsādhāraṇāt gandhavattvāt /
analyzed: tat iha api gandhavat tvam asādharaṇam eva yadi saṃśaya hetu tayā varṇyata tarhi sādharaṇāt vastu dharma tvāt eva saṃśayaḥ bhavet na asādhāraṇāt gandhavat tvāt

original: na hi tan nityānityayor anyatareṇāpi sahacaritam upalabdham /
analyzed: na hi tat nitya anityayoḥ anyatareṇa api sahacaritam upalabdham

original: vastudharmas tu dharmāntarānuyāyī dṛśyata iti vastudharmatvam eva tatkāraṇam /
analyzed: vastu dharmaḥ tu dharma antara anuyāyī dṛśyate iti vastu dharma tvam eva tad kāraṇam

original: ataḥ [nityā bhūḥ gandhavattvāṭ] ity asādhāraṇānaikāntikaḥ na vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: atas nityā bhūḥ gandhavat tvāt iti asādhāraṇa anaikāntikaḥ na vaktavyaḥ

original: viruddhāvyabhicāry pi na vācya eva ekatra dharmiṇi parasparaviruddhadvayaprayojakahetudvayopanipātasyānupapatteḥ //
analyzed: viruddha avyabhicārī na vācyaḥ eva ekatra dharmiṇi paraspara viruddha dvaya prayojaka hetu dvaya upanipātasya anupapatteḥ

original: nanu [pratyakṣo vāyuḥ sparśavattvāt ghaṭavat] [apratyakṣo vāyuḥ arūpatvāt ākāśavat] ity asti hetudvayasannipātaḥ /
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣaḥ vāyuḥ sparśavat tvāt ghaṭa vat apratyakṣaḥ vāyuḥ arūpa tvāt ākāśa vat iti asti hetu dvaya sannipātaḥ

original: ta eva ca viruddhāvyabhicāry ucyata iti atra tāvat etad eva vaktavyam ko 'yam apūrvaḥ prāmāṇikavyavahāraḥ īdṛśaḥ yat anumānena pratyakṣatvam apratyakṣatvaṃ vā sādhyata iti /
analyzed: te eva ca viruddha avyabhicāri ucyate iti atra tāvat etat eva vaktavyam kaḥ yam apūrvaḥ prāmāṇika vyavahāraḥ īdṛśaḥ yat anumānena pratyakṣa tvam apratyakṣa tvam vā sādhyate iti

original: indriyajapramitiviṣayo hy arthaḥ pratyakṣo bhavato /
analyzed: indriya ja pramiti viṣayaḥ hi arthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ

original: sa eṣa vāyuḥ yad indriyaje pratyaye pratibhāty eva kim anumānena /
analyzed: saḥ eṣa vāyuḥ yat indriya je pratyaye pratibhāti eva kim anumānena

original: atha tatra na pratibhāti tathāpi kim anumāneneti //
analyzed: atha tatra na pratibhāti tathā api kim anumānena iti

original: kiṃ ca anayor anyataro hetuḥ avaśyam aprayojakaḥ vastunaḥ dvairūpyānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: kim ca anayoḥ anyataraḥ hetuḥ avaśyam aprayojakaḥ vastunaḥ dvairūpya anupapatteḥ

original: hetau ca prayukte tadguṇadoṣaparīkṣaṇam eva prativādī vidhattām ko 'vasaraḥ pratihetūpanyāsasya /
analyzed: hetau ca prayukte tad guṇa doṣa parīkṣaṇam eva prativādī vidhattām kaḥ vasaraḥ pratihetu upanyāsasya

original: viḍambanārthas tad upanyāsa iti cet na viḍambanopanyāsasya jātyuttaraprakāratvāt /
analyzed: viḍambana arthaḥ tat upanyāsaḥ iti ced na viḍambana upanyāsasya jāti uttara prakāra tvāt

original: iha ca hetvābhāsāḥ vāstavā evānumānadoṣāḥ /
analyzed: iha ca hetvābhāsāḥ vāstavāḥ eva anumāna doṣāḥ

original: ekatra prayojakavad dhetudvayasamāveśāsaṃbhavasyoktatvāt /
analyzed: ekatra prayojaka vat hetu dvaya samāveśa asaṃbhavasya ukta tvāt

original: kathaṃ tarhi prakaraṇasama iti cet tatraiva viśeṣaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: katham tarhi prakaraṇasamaḥ iti ced tatra eva viśeṣam vakṣyāmaḥ

original: atha hetuprayogarahitobhayavādiparigṛhītapakṣapratipakṣopanyāsamātraṃ viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo rūpam ucyate so 'yaṃ vipratipatteḥ saṃśayo bhavati na hetvābhāsād asmād iti //
analyzed: atha hetu prayoga rahita ubhaya vādi parigṛhīta pakṣa pratipakṣa upanyāsa mātram viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ rūpam ucyate saḥ yam vipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ bhavati na hetvābhāsāt asmāt iti

original: api ca yadi samśayajanakatvaṃ anaikāntikalakṣaṇam ucyeta kāmam asādhāṛaṇasya vā viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo vā yathā tathā samśayahetutām adhiropya kathyatām anaikāntikatā na tu saṃśayajanakatvaṃ tallakṣaṇam indriyāder api tajjanakatvena tathābhāvaprasakteḥ /
analyzed: api ca yadi samśaya janaka tvam anaikāntika lakṣaṇam ucyeta kāmam vā viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ vā yathā tathā samśaya hetutām adhiropya kathyatām anaikāntika tā na tu saṃśaya janaka tvam tat lakṣaṇam indriya ādeḥ api tad janaka tvena tathā bhāva prasakteḥ

original: api tu pakṣadvayavṛttitvam anaikāntikalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: api tu pakṣa dvaya vṛtti tvam anaikāntika lakṣaṇam

original: sa tu pakṣadvayavṛttitvāt saṃśayam api janayatīti vastusvabhāvo'yam /
analyzed: sa tu pakṣa dvaya vṛtti tvāt saṃśayam api janayati iti vastu svabhāvaḥ yam

original: ataḥ asādhāraṇaviruddhāvyabhicāriṇoḥ kathaj cit saṃśayahetutve 'pi pakṣadvayavṛttyabhāvāt nānaikāntikavarge 'ntarbhāvaḥ /
analyzed: atas asādhāraṇa viruddha avyabhicāriṇoḥ kathaj cit saṃśaya hetu tve pi pakṣa dvaya vṛtti abhāvāt na anaikāntika varge ntarbhāvaḥ

original: kva tarhi tāv antarbhaviṣyataḥ jātyuttarāṇām ānantyāṭ teṣv iti vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: kva tarhi tau antarbhaviṣyataḥ jāti uttarāṇām ānantyāt teṣu iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: tasmād asādhāraṇasaṃjñakasya hetor viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo vā /
analyzed: tasmāt asādhāraṇa saṃjñakasya hetoḥ viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ vā

original: vipakṣavṛttitvam atarkayantaḥ vadanty anaikāntikatāṃ na tadjñāḥ //
analyzed: vipakṣa vṛtti tvam a tarkayantaḥ vadanti anaikāntika tām na tad jñāḥ

original: siddhāntam abhyupetya tadvirodhī viruddhaḥ //1.2.6//
analyzed: siddhāntam abhyupetya tad virodhī viruddhaḥ

original: sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ vṛttyavṛttī hetor lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ vṛtti avṛttī hetoḥ lakṣaṇam

original: te yasya viparyaste dṛśyete yaḥ sapakṣe na vartate vipakṣe ca vartate saḥ sādhyaviparyayasādhanāt viruddho bhavati so 'yam ucyate siddhāntam abhyupetyeti //
analyzed: te yasya viparyaste dṛśyete yaḥ sapakṣe na vartate vipakṣe ca vartate saḥ sādhya viparyaya sādhanāt viruddhaḥ bhavati saḥ yam ucyate siddhāntam abhyupetya iti

original: siddhāntaśabdaḥ yady api dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi vyākhyātaḥ ayam ittham ity abhyupagamaviṣayīkṛto 'rthaḥ siddhānta iti tathāpīha tadekadeśasādhyadharmaviṣayo lakṣyate /
analyzed: siddhānta śabdaḥ yadi api dharma viśiṣṭe dharmiṇi vyākhyātaḥ ayam ittham iti abhyupagama viṣayīkṛtaḥ rthaḥ siddhāntaḥ iti tathā api iha tad eka deśa sādhya dharma viṣayaḥ lakṣyate

original: taṃ siddhāntaṃ sādhyadharmam abhyupagamya yo viruṇaddhi vyāhanti tadviparyayaṃ sādhayati sa viruddha ity arthaḥ //
analyzed: tam siddhāntam sādhya dharmam abhyupagamya yaḥ viruṇaddhi vyāhanti tad viparyayam sādhayati sa viruddhaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanu samānakartṛkayoḥ ktvāpratyayaḥ smaryate /
analyzed: nanu samāna kartṛkayoḥ ktvā pratyayaḥ smaryate

original: iha ca hetor acetanasyābhyupagamena kartṛevāsaṃbhavāt puruṣas tatkartā bhavet /
analyzed: iha ca hetoḥ acetanasya abhyupagamena kartṛ eva asaṃbhavāt puruṣaḥ tad kartā bhavet

original: [siddhāntaṃ ca viruṇaddhi hetuḥ] iti bhinnakartṛkatvam ucyate samānakartṛkatvasiddhaye hetor evābhyupagame kartṛtvam upacārād varṇayiṣyate /
analyzed: siddhāntam ca viruṇaddhi hetuḥ iti bhinna kartṛkatvam ucyate samāna kartṛkatva siddhaye hetoḥ eva abhyupagame kartṛ tvam upacārāt varṇayiṣyate

original: hetubalāt puruṣābhyupagamaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ hetunaiva kṛto bhavati /
analyzed: hetu balāt puruṣa abhyupagamaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ hetunā eva kṛtaḥ bhavati

original: evaṃ ca sa evābhyupagantā sa eva viruṇaddhīti na bhinnakartṛkatvam //
analyzed: evam ca saḥ eva abhyupagantā saḥ eva viruṇaddhi iti na bhinna kartṛkatvam

original: nanu upacāraparigrahaś ced abhimataḥ tad atra tritayaṃ vaktavyam mukhye 'rthe pramāṇabādhaḥ nimittam prayojanaṃ ceti /
