analyzed: nanu upacāra parigrahaḥ ced abhimataḥ tat atra tritayam vaktavyam mukhye rthe pramāṇa bādhaḥ nimittam prayojanam ca iti

original: mukhye 'rthe pramāṇabādhaḥ ukta eva hetor acetanatvam /
analyzed: mukhye rthe pramāṇa bādhaḥ ukte eva hetoḥ acetana tvam

original: nimittam apy asti hetusādhanako hy abhyupagama iti /
analyzed: nimittam api asti hetu sādhanakaḥ hi abhyupagamaḥ iti

original: prayojanaṃ tu viśeṣaviruddhānāṃ hetvābhāsatvanivāraṇam //
analyzed: prayojanam tu viśeṣa viruddhānām hetvābhāsa tva nivāraṇam

original: siddhāntaśabdasyāpi samudāyavācinaḥ yad ekadeśe avasthāpanaṃ tasyāpi viśeṣaviruddhavyavaccheda eva phalam //
analyzed: siddhānta śabdasya api samudāya vācinaḥ yat eka deśe avasthāpanam tasya api viśeṣa viruddha vyavacchedaḥ eva phalam

original: viśeṣaviruddhānāṃ hi hetvābhāsatvābhyupagame sarvānumānocchedaprasaṅgaḥ na hi tathāvidho hetur iha jagati kaścid avāpyate yaḥ sādhyasiddhaye 'bhidhīyamānaḥ dharmasya vā dharmiṇo vā viśeṣaṃ na kathaṃcana bādhate /
analyzed: viśeṣa viruddhānām hi hetvābhāsa tva abhyupagame sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgaḥ na hi tathāvidhaḥ hetuḥ iha jagati kaścid avāpyate yaḥ sādhya siddhaye bhidhīyamānaḥ dharmasya vā dharmiṇaḥ vā viśeṣam na kathaṃcana bādhate

original: tathā hi [anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt] iti sakalatāṛkikagṛhaprasiddha eṣa hetuḥ anityatāṃ sādhayann api [yad yat kṛtakam tat tad aśrāvaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: tathā hi anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti sakala tāṛkika gṛha prasiddhaḥ eṣa hetuḥ anitya tām sādhayan api yat yat kṛtakam tat tat aśrāvaṇam dṛṣṭam

original: yo yaḥ kṛtaka sa sa vyomaviśeṣaguṇo na bhavati iti dharmiṇo viśe?Qṣaṃ bādhata evety ahetuḥ syāt /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ kṛtaka sa sa vyoma viśeṣa guṇaḥ na bhavati iti dharmiṇaḥ viśeśam bādhate eva iti ahetuḥ syāt

original: na caivaṃ yuktam iti na viśeṣaviruddho nāma hetvābhāsaḥ abhupagantavyaḥ kin tu sādhyasvarūpaviparyayasādhana eveti /
analyzed: na ca evam yuktam iti na viśeṣaviruddhaḥ nāma hetvābhāsaḥ abhupagantavyaḥ kin tu sādhya svarūpa viparyaya sādhane eva iti

original: ata eva yathā tīrthāntare varṇyate viruddhāś vatuṣprakāraḥ dharmasvarūpaviparītasādhanaḥ dharmisvarūpaviparītasādhanaḥ dharmiviśeṣaviparītasādhanah dharmiviśeṣaviparītasādhana iti /
analyzed: atas eva yathā tīrtha antare varṇyate viruddhāḥ vatuṣprakāraḥ dharma svarūpa viparīta sādhanaḥ dharmi svarūpa viparīta sādhanaḥ dharmi viśeṣa viparīta sādhanaḥ dharmi viśeṣa viparīta sādhanaḥ iti

original: tatheha neṣyate atiprasaṅgasya darśitatvāt iti /
analyzed: tathā iha na iṣyate atiprasaṅgasya darśita tvāt iti

original: asyodāharaṇaṃ [nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt] ityādi //
analyzed: asya udāharaṇam nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ityādi

original: nanu ekaikalakṣaṇāpāyāt paṃca hetvābhāsā ity uktam /
analyzed: nanu ekaika lakṣaṇa apāyāt paṃca hetvābhāsāḥ iti uktam

original: asy ca hetor ubhe lakṣaṇe na staḥ /
analyzed: asi ca hetoḥ ubhe lakṣaṇe na staḥ

original: yathā hy asya sapakṣE vṛttir nāsti tathā vipakṣād api vyāvṛttiḥ /
analyzed: yathā hi asya sapakṣe vṛttiḥ na asti tathā vipakṣāt api vyāvṛttiḥ

original: yadi hi sapakṣād iva vipakṣād api vyāvṛtta eṣa bhavet gandhavattvavad asādhāraṇa eva syād iti satyam evam vipakṣād avyāvṛttiḥ vyabhicāraṃ prati prayojakatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: yadi hi sapakṣāt iva vipakṣāt api vyāvṛttaḥ eṣa bhavet gandhavat tva vat asādhāraṇaḥ eva syāt iti satyam evam vipakṣāt avyāvṛttiḥ vyabhicāram prati prayojaka tām pratipadyate

original: pratipakṣagāmī hi vyabhicarita ity ucyate /
analyzed: pratipakṣa gāmī hi vyabhicaritaḥ iti ucyate

original: sapakṣe vṛttivicchedas tu viparyayasiddhau orayojaka iti satyām api vipakṣavṛttau sapakṣavṛttivicchedanibandhanam evāsya viruddhatvam ucyate /
analyzed: sapakṣe vṛtti vicchedaḥ tu viparyaya siddhau iti satyām api vipakṣa vṛttau sapakṣa vṛtti viccheda nibandhanam eva asya viruddha tvam ucyate

original: vipakṣād apracyutaḥ svasādhyam eva na sādhayet /
analyzed: vipakṣāt apracyutaḥ sva sādhyam eva na sādhayet

original: sapakṣE tv avartamāno 'sau viparītam api sādhayatīti tallakṣaṇāpāyakṛtam evāsya viruddhatvam ācakṣata ity alaṃ sūkṣmekṣikayā /
analyzed: sapakṣe tu a vartamānaḥ sau viparītam api sādhayati iti tad lakṣaṇa apāya kṛtam eva asya viruddha tvam ācakṣate iti alam sūkṣma īkṣikayā

original: tad idam uktaṃ [siddhāntam abhyupetya tadvirodhī viruddhaḥ] iti //
analyzed: tat idam uktam siddhāntam abhyupetya tad virodhī viruddhaḥ iti

original: anye tv anyathā vyācakṣate kila sādhyadharmaviparyayasādhakavat apasiddhāntapratijñāvirodhād anyo 'pi siddhāntavirodhinah saṃgṛhītuṃ yuktā eva /
analyzed: anye tu anyathā vyācakṣate kila sādhya dharma viparyaya sādhaka vat apasiddhānta pratijñā virodhāt siddhānta virodhinaḥ saṃgṛhītum yuktāḥ eva

original: te caivaṃ vyākhyāyamāne na saṃgṛhītāḥ syuḥ /
analyzed: te ca evam vyākhyāyamāne na saṃgṛhītāḥ syuḥ

original: ktvāpratyayasiddhāntaśabdau ca na samnvitau syātām /
analyzed: ktvā pratyaya siddhānta śabdau ca na sam nvitau syātām

original: tasmād abhyupagatasiddhāntavirodhī iti sūtrārthe varṇite abhyupagataṃ siddhāntaṃ yo viruṇaddhi sa viruddhaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt abhyupagata siddhānta virodhī iti sūtra arthe varṇite abhyupagatam siddhāntam yaḥ viruṇaddhi sa viruddhaḥ

original: tatkālopattapratijñāviṣayīkṛtaṃ vā 'vasarāntavyavasthāpitaṃ vety etet saṃgrahaś ca kṛto bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tad kāla upatta pratijñā viṣayīkṛtam vā vasara anta vyavasthāpitam vā iti saṃgrahaḥ ca kṛtaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: siddhāntaśabdaś ca na saṅkocito bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: siddhānta śabdaḥ ca na saṅkocitaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: ktvāpratyayas tu asaṅgatatvād upekṣyata eva bhinnakartṛkatvāt ānantaryasya gamyamānasya cānupayuktatvāḍ iti //
analyzed: ktvāpratyayaḥ tu asaṅgata tvāt upekṣyate eva bhinna kartṛka tvāt ānantaryasya gamyamānasya ca anupayukta tvāt iti

original: tathā ca bhāsyakāreṇa aviśeṣeṇa pūrvābhyupagatasiddhāntaviruddham evodāharaṇam uktaṃ [so 7Yam vikāro vyakter apaiti nityatvapratiṣedhāt /
analyzed: tathā ca bhāsya kāreṇa aviśeṣeṇa pūrva abhyupagata siddhānta viruddham eva udāharaṇam uktam saḥ yam vikāraḥ vyakteḥ apaiti nitya tva pratiṣedhāt

original: apeto 'py asti vināśapratiṣedhāt] iti /
analyzed: apeta u pi asti vināśa pratiṣedhāt iti

original: atra hi pratiṣiddhanitydharmatvād ity ayaṃ hetuḥ vyakter apeto 'pi vikāro 'py astīty amuṃ siddhāntaṃ viruṇaddhi anena vā viruddhyata iti //
analyzed: atra hi pratiṣiddha nitya dharma tvāt iti ayam hetuḥ vyakteḥ asti iti amum siddhāntam viruṇaddhi anena vā viruddhyate iti

original: etat tv ahṛdayaṅgamam iva vyākhyānam /
analyzed: etat tu ahṛdayaṅgamam iva vyākhyānam

original: apasiddhāntapratijñāvirodhādeh nigrahasthānasutre hetvābhāsebhyaḥ pṛthagupadeśāt kim iha tatsaṅgraheṇa /
analyzed: apasiddhānta pratijñā virodhāt ā ih nigrahasthāna sutre hetvābhāsebhyaḥ pṛthak upadeśāt kim iha tad saṅgraheṇa

original: pratyuta saṅgraha eva doṣaḥ /
analyzed: pratyuta saṅgrahaḥ eva doṣaḥ

original: yo hi [mīmāṃsako 'ham] ity abhyupagamya [anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt ghaṭavat] iti brūyāt na tasyāyaṃ hetuḥ viruddho bahvet api tu apasiddhāntanaivāsau nigṛhyeta /
analyzed: yaḥ hi mīmāṃsakaḥ ham iti abhyupagamya anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti brūyāt na tasya ayam hetuḥ viruddhaḥ api tu apasiddhāntanā eva asau nigṛhyeta

original: tasmāt sādhyaviparyayasādhana eva virddha ucyate na tu pūrvābhyupagatasvasiddhāntaviruddhaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt sādhya viparyaya sādhanaḥ eva virddhaḥ ucyate na tu pūrva abhyupagata sva siddhānta viruddhaḥ

original: na ca nirabhiprāya eva sūtrakṛtā ktvānirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ kin tu tataḥ pratīyamāna ānantaryam apy apekṣamāṇena /
analyzed: na ca nirabhiprāyaḥ eva sūtrakṛtā ktvānirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ kin tu tatas pratīyamāne ānantaryam api apekṣamāṇena

original: yo hi siddhāntam abhyupetya pratijñāya tatsiddhyarthatayopādīyamānaḥ tam eva viruṇaddhi sa viruddho hetvābhāsa iti prāktanam eva vyākhyānam anavadyam //
analyzed: yaḥ hi siddhāntam abhyupetya pratijñāya tad siddhi artha tayā upādīyamānaḥ tam eva viruṇaddhi sa viruddhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ iti prāktanam eva vyākhyānam anavadyam

original: ataḥ pratijñāviparītasādhanāt viruddhatām eti na hetur anyathā /
analyzed: atas pratijñā viparīta sādhanāt viruddha tām eti na hetuḥ anyathā

original: viśeṣabādhādinibandhanaṃ punaḥ bahuprakāratvam amuṣya neṣyate //
analyzed: viśeṣa bādhā ādi nibandhanam punar bahu prakāra tvam amuṣya na iṣyate

original: yasmāt prakaracintā sa nirṇayāṛtham updiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ //1.2.7//
analyzed: yasmāt prakara cintā sa nirṇaya aṛtham updiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ

original: ekaikalakṣaṇāpāyanimittahetvābhāsapaṃcakapratijñānāt asat pratipakṣatvalakṣaṇavaikalyāt kila prakaraṇasamo nāma hetvābhāsp vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: ekaika lakṣaṇa apāya nimitta hetvābhāsa paṃcaka pratijñānāt asat pratipakṣa tva lakṣaṇa vaikalyāt kila prakaraṇasamaḥ nāma vaktavyaḥ

original: sa ca na saṃbhavati sapratipakṣasya hetor abhāvāṭ /
analyzed: sa ca na saṃbhavati sa pratipakṣasya hetoḥ abhāvāt

original: advyātmakatvād dhi vastūnām ekatra parasparavirodhidharmadvayaprayojakahetusamāVeśo nāstīty askṛd uktam /
analyzed: a dvi ātmaka tvāt hi vastūnām ekatra paraspara virodhi dharma dvaya prayojaka hetu samāveśaḥ na asti iti uktam

original: ata eva hi viruddhāvyabhicārī nirastaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva hi viruddha avyabhicārī nirastaḥ

original: anumānaviruddham anumānaṃ ca neṣyata eva /
analyzed: anumāna viruddham anumānam ca na iṣyate eva

original: tatkṛtaḥ sapratipakṣo hetvābhāsaḥ ataś ca lakṣyābhāvāṭ kasyedaṃ lakṣaṇam ity atrāha yasmād ityādi //
analyzed: tad kṛtaḥ sa pratipakṣaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ atas ca lakṣya abhāvāt kasya idam lakṣaṇam iti atra āha yasmāt ityādi

original: vicāryamāṇau prāguktalakṣaṇakau pakṣapratipakṣau prakaraṇam /
analyzed: vicāryamāṇau prāgukta lakṣaṇakau pakṣa pratipakṣau prakaraṇam

original: tasya cintā saṃśayāt prabhṛtyānirṇayāt yady api bhavato tathāpīha vimarśātmikaiva gṛhyate /
analyzed: tasya cintā saṃśayāt prabhṛti anirṇayāt yadi api tathā api iha vimarśa ātmikā eva gṛhyate

original: sā yasmāt bhavati //
analyzed: sā yasmāt bhavati

original: kasmāc ca sā bhavato viśeṣānupalambhāṭ /
analyzed: kasmāt ca sā bhavataḥ viśeṣa anupalambhāt

original: sa eva viśeṣānupalambhaḥ yadi nirṇayārtham upadiśyate tatprakaraṇam ativartamānatvāt prakaraṇasamo bhavati /
analyzed: saḥ eva viśeṣa anupalambhaḥ yadi nirṇaya artham upadiśyate tad prakaraṇam ativartamāna tvāt prakaraṇasamaḥ bhavati

original: nityaḥ śabdaḥ anityadharmānupalabdheḥ ākāśavat /
analyzed: nityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ākāśa vat

original: anityaḥ śabdaḥ nityadharmānupalabdheḥ ghaṭavat iti /
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ghaṭa vat iti

original: so 'yaṃ sapratipakṣo hetur iha lakṣyo vidyate //
analyzed: saḥ yam sa pratipakṣaḥ hetuḥ iha lakṣyaḥ vidyate

original: na ca dvyātmakāni vastūni pramātāṛas tu rūpam eṣāṃ niyatam avadhāratitum aśaknuvanta evaṃ bhrāmyatīti /
analyzed: na ca dvi ātmakāni vastūni pramātāṛaḥ tu rūpam eṣām niyatam a śaknuvantaḥ evam bhrāmyati iti

original: tathā hi ekas tadviśeṣānupalabdheḥ pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekāt paśyaṃs tatheti sādhyaṃ budhyeta tathaiva paraṃ pratyāyayed iti /
analyzed: tathā hi ekaḥ tad viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatirekāt paśyan tathā iti sādhyam budhyeta tathā eva param pratyāyayet iti

original: itaro 'pi dvitīyaviśeṣānupabdheḥ sādhanatāṃ buddhvā pratyvasthānaṃ ca karotīti svapratipattisākṣika evaiṣa prakaraṇasamo hetvābhāsaḥ //
analyzed: dvitīya viśeṣa an upabdheḥ sādhanatām buddhvā pratyvasthānam ca karoti iti sva pratipatti sākṣikaḥ eva eṣa prakaraṇasamaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ

original: tathā ca na tāvad ayaṃ samyagghetuḥ pratipakṣopahatatvena svasādhyopasthānasāmartyaśūnyatvāṭ /
analyzed: tathā ca na tāvat ayam samyak hetuḥ pratipakṣa upahata tvena sva sādhya upasthāna sāmartya śūnya tvāt

original: hetvābhāso 'pi bhavan na tāvad siddhaḥ sādhye dharmiṇi śabde 'nupalabhyamānanityadharmatvasya hetoh sadbhāvāt /
analyzed: hetvābhāsaḥ u pi bhavan na tāvat siddhaḥ sādhye dharmiṇi śabde n upalabhyamāna nitya dharma tvasya hetoḥ sadbhāvāt

original: nāpi viruddhaḥ sādhyaviparyayasādhananimittabhūtasapakṣavṛttyaviyogānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: nā api viruddhaḥ sādhya viparyaya sādhana nimitta bhūta sapakṣa vṛtti aviyoga anupapatteḥ

original: nāpy anaikāntikaḥ pakṣadvyayasādhāraṇatvānavadhāraṇāt /
analyzed: na api anaikāntikaḥ pakṣa dvyaya sādhāraṇa tva anavadhāraṇāt

original: saṃśayajanakatvaṃ tu na tasya lakṣaṇam ity uktam eva //
analyzed: saṃśaya janaka tvam tu na tasya lakṣaṇam iti uktam eva

original: nanu ekasmin pakṣe niyataḥ aikāntika tadviparyayād anaikāntikaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ekasmin pakṣe niyataḥ aikāntika tad viparyayāt anaikāntikaḥ

original: sa cāyaṃ nityānityapakṣayor anyataratrāpi na niyata iti anaikāntika eva syāt /
analyzed: sa ca ayam nitya anitya pakṣayoḥ anyataratra api na niyataḥ iti anaikāntikaḥ eva syāt

original: api cāhuṇ [aprāmāṇyaṃ tridhā bhinnaṃ mityātvājñānasaṃśayaiḥ] iti /
analyzed: api ca āhuḥ a prāmāṇyam tridhā bhinnam mityātva ajñāna saṃśayaiḥ iti

original: tatra yathā indriyāder abodhakatvād vā saṃśayaviparyayasvabhāvāvabhāsasamutpādanadaurātmayād vā bhavaty aprāmāṇyavyavahāraḥ evam anumānam api tenaiva vartmanā pramāṇābhāsatām avalamnate //
analyzed: tatra yathā indriya ādeḥ abodhaka tvāt vā saṃśaya viparyaya svabhāva avabhāsa samutpādana daurātmayāt vā bhavati aprāmāṇya vyavahāraḥ evam anumānam api tena eva vartmanā pramāṇa ābhāsa tām

original: tatrāsiddhas tāvad alabhamāno dharmiṇi vṛttiṃ tatra sādhyadharmadhiyam ādhātum anadhikṛta ity ajñānaphalatvād aprāmāṇyaphalam anubhavati //
analyzed: tatra asiddhaḥ tāvat alabhamānaḥ dharmiṇi vṛttim tatra sādhya dharma dhiyam ādhātum anadhikṛtaḥ iti ajñāna phala tvāt aprāmāṇya phalam anubhavati

original: viruddhas tu viparyayasādhana iti bhavanta eva ppratipannāḥ //
analyzed: viruddhaḥ tu viparyaya sādhanaḥ iti bhavantaḥ eva ppratipannāḥ

original: saṃśayakajanakas tv anaikāntiko bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: saṃśayaka janakaḥ tu anaikāntikaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: na tu pāribhāṣikavipakṣa vṛtti tvam eva tasya lakṣaṇam ucitam /
analyzed: na tu pāribhāṣika vipakṣa vṛtti tvam eva tasya lakṣaṇam ucitam

original: ubhayam api cānyatarapakṣaniyamavirahitatanur iti kim iti na bhavato vimarśam upadadhad anaikāntika iti traya eva hetvābhāsāḥ //
analyzed: ubhayam api ca anyatara pakṣa niyama virahita tanuḥ iti kim iti na bhavataḥ vimarśam upadadhat anaikāntikaḥ iti trayaḥ eva hetvābhāsāḥ

original: ucyate na phalaniyamena lakṣaṇaniyamaḥ kartum śakyate /
analyzed: ucyate na phala niyamena lakṣaṇa niyamaḥ kartum śakyate

original: yady api dvividhaṃ trividhaṃ bhavaty apramāṇaphalam tathāpi na trilakṣaṇake liṅge 'vinābhāvaḥ parisamāpyate api tu paṃcalakṣaṇaka iti prasādhito 'yam arthaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api dvividham trividham bhavati apramāṇa phalam tathā api na tri lakṣaṇake liṅge vinābhāvaḥ parisamāpyate api tu paṃca lakṣaṇakaḥ iti prasādhitaḥ yam arthaḥ

original: tadvaikalyāc ca hetvābhāsānām api paṃcatvam eva /
analyzed: tad vaikalyāt ca hetvābhāsānām api paṃcatvam eva

original: phalaṃ tu dividham astu trividhaṃ vā /
analyzed: phalam tu dividham astu trividham vā

original: na hy apratipattijanakaṃ kiṃcil liṅgam upalabhāmahe /
analyzed: na hi a pratipatti janakam kiṃcid liṅgam upalabhāmahe

original: na cāpratipattiḥ prayatnajanyā prāgabhāvasya nisargasiddhatvāt ity alam avāntaracintanena /
analyzed: na ca apratipattiḥ prayatna janyā prāgabhāvasya nisarga siddha tvāt iti alam avāntara cintanena

original: na phalākṣepaḥ liṅgalakṣaṇaniyamaḥ /
analyzed: na phala ākṣepaḥ liṅga lakṣaṇa niyamaḥ

original: tatra yathā pakṣadharmarahitatvam asiddhalakṣaṇam evaṃ vyatirekasvaikalyaṃ anaikāntikalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: tatra yathā pakṣa dharma rahita tvam asiddha lakṣaṇam evam vyatireka svaikalyam anaikāntika lakṣaṇam

original: eṣa ca hetuḥ pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekāṇām anyatamenāpi rūpeṇa na vikala iti katham anaikāntikatāṃ pratipadyeta vyastatāyāṃ hi sarvāṇy etāni santi lakṣaṇāni /
analyzed: eṣa ca hetuḥ pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatirekāṇām anyatamena api rūpeṇa na vikalaḥ iti katham anaikāntika tām pratipadyeta vyasta tāyām hi sarvāṇi etāni santi lakṣaṇāni

original: samastas tu nopanyasta eva hetutvena nityānityadharmānupalabdher iti /
analyzed: samastaḥ tu na upanyastaḥ eva hetu tvena nitya anitya dharma anupalabdheḥ iti

original: nanu yady asya pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekā nirapavādāḥ santi kathaṃ tarhi na hetur evāyam /
analyzed: nanu yadi asya pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatirekāḥ nirapavādāḥ santi katham tarhi na hetuḥ eva ayam

original: itarasyāpi pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekāṇāṃ nirapavādānām asaṃbhavāt so 'pi na kathaṃ hetuḥ astv iti cet na vastunaḥ dvairūpyānupapatteḥ/
analyzed: itarasya api pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatirekāṇām nirapavādānām asaṃbhavāt saḥ u pi na katham hetuḥ astu iti ced na vastunaḥ dvairūpya anupapatteḥ

original: evam imau hetū pakṣadvaye 'pi buddhiṃ janayantau saṃśayam āvahataḥ nānaikāntikavat vipakṣavṛttitveneti hetvābhāsāntaratvam //
analyzed: evam imau hetū pakṣa dvaye buddhim janayantau saṃśayam āvahataḥ na anaikāntika vat vipakṣa vṛtti tvena iti hetvābhāsa antara tvam

original: evvaṃvidhasya cāsya prakaṛaṇasamasya viruddhāvyabhicārīti nām yadi kriyate tad api bhavatu /
analyzed: evvaṃvidhasya ca asya prakaṛaṇa samasya viruddha avyabhicāri iti nām yadi kriyate tat api bhavatu

original: na punar anaikāntikaprabhedatām avalambate tallakṣaṇāsaṃsparśāt /
analyzed: na punar anaikāntika prabheda tām avalambate tad lakṣaṇa a saṃsparśāt

original: ubhayapratītijanakau hīmau hetū bhavataḥ nobhayapakṣavṛttīti //
analyzed: ubhaya pratīti janakau hi imau hetū bhavataḥ na ubhaya pakṣa vṛtti iti

original: nāpy ayaṃ kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣāgamayor anyatarasyāpi bādhakasyānupalambhāt /
analyzed: nā api ayam kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ anyatarasya api bādhakasya anupalambhāt

original: anumānaṃ tu nānumānasya bādhakaṃ bhavituṃ kṣamam ity uktam /
analyzed: anumānam tu na anumānasya bādhakam bhavitum kṣamam iti uktam

original: na cetaretaravāḍy apekṣayā 'nayor asiddhatvam abhidheyam saṃśayajanakatve 'nubhavasiddhe sati viśeṣānupalabdher apratyākhyeyatvāt //
analyzed: na ca itaretara vāḍī apekṣayā nayoḥ asiddha tvam abhidheyam saṃśaya janaka tve nubhava siddhe sati viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ apratyākhyeya tvāt

original: nanu niścitasya sādhanaprayogādhikārāt kathaj cit tāvat sādhanaṃ prayuṃjīta /
analyzed: nanu niścitasya sādhana prayoga adhikārāt katham cit tāvat sādhanam prayuṃjīta

original: niścitatve ca taddharmānupalabdhyoḥ parasparam asiddhatvaṃ sthitam eva naitad evam anyataradharmānupalabdher eva pakṣadharmatvānvayavyatirekāt paśyann asau niścitatāṃ prāptaḥ na dvitīyadharmānupalabdheḥ asiddhatāṃ budhyamānaḥ /
analyzed: niścita tve ca tad dharma anupalabdhyoḥ parasparam asiddha tvam sthitam eva na etat evam anyatara dharma anupalabdheḥ eva pakṣa dharma tva anvaya vyatirekāt paśyan asau niścita tām prāptaḥ na dvitīya dharma anupalabdheḥ asiddha tām budhyamānaḥ

original: ata eva bhrāntimūla eṣa hetvābhāsaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva bhrānti mūlaḥ eṣa hetvābhāsaḥ

original: dvitīyadharmanupalabdhisiddhatvaniścaye tu samyagghetur eva syāt /
analyzed: dvitīya dharma anupalabdhi siddha tva niścaye tu samyak hetuḥ eva syāt

original: tadasiddhatvānavadhāraṇe 'py asau svasya hetos trairūpyadarśanāt niścitamatir bhūtvā sādhanaṃ prayuṃjāna itareṇa t athāiva niścitamatinā pratiprayoge kṛte tasyāpi trairūpyam upalambhamānaḥ saṃśayam adhigacchatīty alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: tad asiddha tva anavadhāraṇe pi asau svasya hetoḥ trairūpya darśanāt niścita matiḥ bhūtvā sādhanam prayuṃjānaḥ itareṇa niścita matinā pratiprayoge kṛte tasya api trairūpyam upalambhamānaḥ saṃśayam adhigacchati iti alam prasaṅgena

original: tad evaṃ asiddhādilakṣaṇavaiparītyāt pratītyanuguṇaḥ prakaraṇasamo nāmāsiddho hetvābhāsaḥ //
analyzed: tat evam asiddha ādi lakṣaṇa vaiparītyāt pratīti anuguṇaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ nāma asiddhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ

original: apare punaḥ udāharaṇāntarama asya vyāharanti nityaḥ śabdaḥ pakṣasapakṣayoranyataratvāt ākāśavat /
analyzed: apare punar udāharaṇa antaram asya vyāharanti nityaḥ śabdaḥ pakṣa sapakṣayoḥ anyatara tvāt ākāśa vat

original: anityaḥ śabdaḥ pakṣasapakṣāyor anyataratvād eva gahaṭavad iti //
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ pakṣa sapakṣayoḥ anyatara tvāt eva gahaṭa vat iti

original: nanu pakṣasapakṣayor anyataraḥ somo bhavitm arhati /
analyzed: nanu pakṣa sapakṣayoḥ anyataraḥ somaḥ bhavitm arhati

original: tatra pakṣe 'nyataraśabdavācye 'nanvayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra pakṣe nyatara śabda vācye nanvayaḥ

original: na hi śabdākhyaḥ pakṣaḥ dharmī dharmyantare vartate /
analyzed: na hi śabda ākhyaḥ pakṣaḥ dharmī dharmi antare vartate

original: sapakṣe tv anyatamābhiddheye pakṣadharmatā nāsti /
analyzed: sapakṣe tu anyatama abhiddheye pakṣa dharma tā na asti

original: na hy ākāśādiḥ sapakṣaḥ śandākhye dharmiṇi vartate //
analyzed: na hi ākāśa ādiḥ sapakṣaḥ śanda ākhye dharmiṇi vartate

original: ucyate na pakṣatvād iti hetuḥ prayuktaḥ sapakṣatvād iti vā yenaivaṃ syāt pakṣasapakṣayor anyataratvād iti /
analyzed: ucyate na pakṣa tvāt iti hetuḥ prayuktaḥ sapakṣa tvāt iti vā yena evam syāt pakṣa sapakṣayoḥ anyatara tvāt iti

original: tac ca dvayor api kim api sādhāraṇaṃ rūpam /
analyzed: tat ca dvayoḥ api kim api sādhāraṇam rūpam

original: na hi varuṇo yaṣṭavyaḥ] iti yādṛśī buddhiḥ tādṛśy eva [mitrāvaruṇayor anyataro yaṣṭavyaḥ] iti /
analyzed: na hi varuṇaḥ yaṣṭavyaḥ iti yādṛśī buddhiḥ tādṛśī eva mitrāvaruṇayoḥ anyataraḥ yaṣṭavyaḥ iti

original: viśeṣaniṣṭhatāyāṃ tu balād āpādyamānāyāṃ sakalānumānocchedaḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣa niṣṭha tāyām tu balāt āpādyamānāyām sakala anumāna ucchedaḥ

original: na cānyataratvaṃ śabdamātrāropitaṃ rūpam avāstavam iti vaditum ucitaṃ arthāsaṃsparśitāyāḥ pratikṣiptatvāt //
analyzed: na ca anyataratvam śabda mātra āropitam rūpam avāstavam iti vaditum ucitam artha asaṃsparśi tāyāḥ pratikṣipta tvāt

original: anyataratvād ity asiddho hetur iti cet kila pakṣaevāyaṃ na pakṣasapakṣayor anyatara iti tad ayuktam yata evāyaṃ pakṣaḥ tata evāyaṃ pakṣasapakṣayor anyataraḥ /
analyzed: anyatara tvāt iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ iti ced kila pakṣaḥ eva ayam na pakṣa sapakṣayoḥ anyataraḥ iti tat ayuktam yatas eva ayam pakṣaḥ tatas eva ayam pakṣa sapakṣayoḥ anyataraḥ

original: na hy apakṣaḥ pakṣasapakṣayor anyatarah syāt /
analyzed: na hi apakṣaḥ pakṣa sapakṣayoḥ anyataraḥ syāt

original: na hy avaruṇo mitrāvaruṇayor anyatara ity uktam eva //
analyzed: na hi a varuṇaḥ mitrāvaruṇayoḥ anyataraḥ iti uktam eva

original: pakṣo 'pi ca bhavann eṣaḥ na pakṣatvād ity anena rūpeṇa hetūkriyate kin tu anyataratvād iti /
analyzed: pakṣaḥ u pi ca bhavan eṣaḥ na pakṣa tvāt iti anena rūpeṇa hetūkriyate kim tu anyatara tvāt iti

original: itthaṃ ca hetūkaraṇe naiko 'pi doṣa iti //
analyzed: ittham ca hetūkaraṇe na ekaḥ pi doṣaḥ iti

original: aparam udāharaṇam [san sarvajñaḥ itaratadviparītavinirmuktatvāt ghaṭavat] [asan sarvajñaḥ itaratadviparītavinirmuktatvāt kharaviṣāṇavat] iti atrāpy ākṣe@papratisamādhānaprakāraḥ pūrvavad anusaraṇīyam //
analyzed: aparam udāharaṇam san sarvajñaḥ itara tad viparīta vinirmukta tvāt ghaṭa vat asan sarvajñaḥ itara tad viparīta vinirmukta tvāt khara viṣāṇa vat iti atra api ākṣepa pratisamādhāna prakāraḥ pūrvavat anusaraṇīyam

original: dharmyasiddhatādi ca yatnataḥ paricintanīyam //
analyzed: dharmya siddha tā ādi ca yatnataḥ paricintanīyam

original: evaṃjātīyakaṃ tudāharaṇaṃ nānumodante matimantaḥ /
analyzed: evaṃjātīyakam tud āharaṇam na anumodante matimantaḥ

original: yatra hi hetunā sāyam arthaṃ samyagasamyag vā 'numāya pramātā parapratyāyanāya tam eva hetuṃ prayyuṃjīta sa prayujyamānaḥ vastuvalapravṛttatayā hetūbhavati hetvābhāsībhavati vā //
analyzed: yatra hi hetunā sāyam artham samyak asamyak vā numāya pramātā para pratyāyanāya tam eva hetum prayyuṃjīta sa prayujyamānaḥ vastu vala pravṛtta tayā hetūbhavati hetvābhāsībhavati vā

original: tathā hi ārophapariṇāhavati puro 'vasthite dharmiṇi sthāṇugataviśeṣānupalambhāt ekasya puruṣa iti pratītiḥ itarasua tu puruṣagataviśeṣānupalabdheḥ sthāṇur iti bhavati matiḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi āropha pariṇāhavati puras vasthite dharmiṇi sthāṇu gata viśeṣa anupalambhāt ekasya puruṣaḥ iti pratītiḥ tu puruṣa gata viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ sthāṇuḥ iti bhavati matiḥ

original: evaṃ ca yadā 'sāv ekaK puruṣatvasiddhaye paraṃ prati sthānudharmāgrahaṇaṃ hetutvena brūyāt itaro 'pi puruṣadharmāgrahaṇena sthāṇutāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayan pratyavatiṣṭheta tadā svapratītyanusaraṇapuraśarasādhanābhidhānāṭ bhrāntisaṃbhavāc ca yuktaṃ tathāvidhodāharaṇakīrtanam /
analyzed: evam ca yadā sau ekak puruṣa tva siddhaye param prati sthānu dharma agrahaṇam hetu tvena brūyāt puruṣa dharma agrahaṇena sthāṇu tām pratiṣṭhāpayan pratyavatiṣṭheta tadā sva pratīti anusaraṇa pura śara sādhana abhidhānāt bhrānti saṃbhavāt ca yuktam tathāvidha udāharaṇa kīrtanam

original: evaṃ [nityaḥ śabdaḥ anityadharmānupalabdheḥ ākāśavat [anityaḥ śabdaḥ nityadharmā nupalabdheḥ ghaṭavat] ity api draṣṭāvyam /
analyzed: evam nityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ākāśa vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya dharmāḥ nupalabdheḥ ghaṭa vat iti api draṣṭāvyam

original: yas tu na vastumūlaḥ kevalotprekṣāmātrāvalambanaḥ svapratītiṣu na dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ kiṃ tadupanyāsena etena sadvitīyaprayogā api pratuktāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu na vastu mūlaḥ kevala utprekṣā mātra avalambanaḥ sva pratītiṣu na dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ kim tad upanyāsena etena sa dvitīya prayogāḥ api pratuktāḥ

original: yathā kvacit sādhānaprayoge kṛte sati tatraivaṃ paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate prastutasādhyadharmādhikaraṇatvaśūnya dharmighaṭānyatarasadvitīyo ghaṭaḥ anutpannatvāt kuḍyavad iti /
analyzed: yathā kvacid sādhāna prayoge kṛte sati tatra evam paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate prastuta sādhya dharma adhikaraṇa tva śūnya dharmi ghaṭa anyatara sa dvitīyaḥ ghaṭaḥ anutpanna tvāt kuḍya vat iti

original: yathā prastutena siṣādhayiṣitena dharmeṇa śūnyaḥ yaḥ prakṛto dharmī ghaṭaś ca tayor anyatareṇa sadvitīyo 'yaṃ ghaṭakhyo dharmī tatra hetuḥ anutpannatvam tasya kuḍyādau vyāptir iti //
analyzed: yathā prastutena siṣādhayiṣitena dharmeṇa śūnyaḥ yaḥ prakṛtaḥ dharmī ghaṭaḥ ca tayoḥ anyatareṇa sa dvitīyaḥ yam ghaṭa khyaḥ dharmī tatra hetuḥ anutpanna tvam tasya kuḍya ādau vyāptiḥ iti

original: satyaṃ vadata yady asti like kvacid īdṛśaḥ pratītikramaḥ ghaṭaś ca dharmī dharmighaṭayor anyatareṇa sadvitīya ity atra anyataraśabdaḥ sāmānyavacano 'pi dharmiṇi vyākhyeyaḥ /
analyzed: satyam vadata yadi asti like kvacid īdṛśaḥ pratīti kramaḥ ghaṭaḥ ca dharmī dharmi ghaṭayoḥ anyatareṇa sa dvitīyaḥ iti atra anyatara śabdaḥ dharmiṇi vyākhyeyaḥ

original: na hi ghaṭa eva ghaṭena sadivitīyo bhavitum arhati ity alam alīkakalpanākauśalapratyākhyānena //
analyzed: na hi ghaṭaḥ eva ghaṭena sa divitīyaḥ bhavitum arhati iti alam alīka kalpanā kauśala pratyākhyānena

original: samyag vā yadi vā 'nyathā vidadhate ye hetavaḥ saṃvidaṃ dṛṣṭāḥ svātmani te prayoktum ucitāḥ kāmaṃ parajñaptaye /
analyzed: samyak vā yadi vā nyathā vidadhate ye hetavaḥ saṃvidam dṛṣṭāḥ sva ātmani te prayoktum ucitāḥ kāmam para jñaptaye

original: ye tu svapratipattim eva na tathā kartuṃ kṣamāḥ kalpanāsāmarthyotthitavastuśūnyaghaṭanāḥ kiṃ tatprayoge phalam //
analyzed: ye tu sva pratipattim eva na tathā kartum kṣamāḥ kalpanā sāmarthya utthita vastu śūnya ghaṭanāḥ kim tad prayoge phalam

original: ye tu sūkṣmotpreKṣaṇakṣamaprajñātiśayābhimānadurvudagdhāḥ tathāvidhān api prayuṃjate kṛtakaracanācāturyaṃ taiḥ pradarśitam ātmanaḥ bhavati na punaś śuddhiḥ kācit prameyadiśaḥ kṛtā /
analyzed: ye tu sūkṣma utprekṣaṇa kṣama prajñā atiśaya abhimāna durvudagdhāḥ tathāvidhān api prayuṃjate kṛtaka racanā cāturyam taiḥ pradarśitam ātmanaḥ bhavati na punar śuddhiḥ kācid prameya diśaḥ kṛtā

original: kvacid avasare evaṃprāyāḥ parabhramakāriṇaḥ kila saphalatāṃ dadhyuḥ jalpe yathā kathitaṃ purā //
analyzed: kvacid avasare evaṃprāyāḥ para bhrama kāriṇaḥ kila saphala tām dadhyuḥ jalpe yathā kathitam purā

original: tatra tv etān kathayati parañ prajñamānī yadā vā tasyākhyeyo nipuṇamatinā pūrvanītyā samādhiḥ /
analyzed: tatra tu etān kathayati param prajña mānī yadā vā tasya ākhyeyaḥ nipuṇa matinā pūrva nītyā samādhiḥ

original: drāghīyasyā tad alam anayā tārkikam manyagoṣṭhyā hetvābhāsaḥ prakaraṇasamas tv eṣa nirṇīta eva //
analyzed: drāghīyasyā tat alam anayā tārkikam manya goṣṭhyā hetvābhāsaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ tu eṣa nirṇītaḥ eva

original: sādhyāviśiṣṭah sādhyatvāt sādhyasamaḥ //1/2/8//
analyzed: sādhya aviśiṣṭaḥ sādhya tvāt sādhyasamaḥ

original: anyataravādiprasiddhaṃ anyataraṃ prati yat sādhayitum upādīyate tat sādhyam /
analyzed: anyatara vādi prasiddham anyataram prati yat sādhayitum upādīyate tat sādhyam

original: tadaviśiṣṭo hetuḥ sādhyasamaḥ //
analyzed: tad aviśiṣṭaḥ hetuḥ sādhyasamaḥ

original: kathaṃ sādhyena tulyatā hetor iti cet āha sādhyatvād iti /
analyzed: katham sādhyena tulya tā hetoḥ iti ced āha sādhya tvāt iti

original: yathā sadhyam asiddhatvāt sādhyam tathā tatsiddhyartham upātto hetur api yaḥ asiddhatvāt sādhyaḥ saḥ sādhyāviśiṣṭatvāt sādhyasama ucyate //
analyzed: yathā sadhyam asiddha tvāt sādhyam tathā tad siddhi artham upāttaḥ hetuḥ api yaḥ asiddha tvāt sādhyaḥ saḥ sādhya aviśiṣṭa tvāt sādhyasamaḥ ucyate

original: etac cānyatarāsiddhasyaiva lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: etat ca anyatara asiddhasya eva lakṣaṇam

original: yathā mīmāṃśkaṃ prati [anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt ghaṭavat]iti /
analyzed: yathā mīmāṃśkam prati anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭavat iti

original: na cākṣuṣatvāder ubhayāsiddhasya sādhyatvaṃ saṃbhavatīty ataḥ sakalāsiddhabhedasaṅgrahāya [sādhyatvāt] ity etatpadarahitaṃ [sādhyāviśiṣṭaḥ] ity evāsiddhalakṣaṇam upavarṇanīyam //
analyzed: na cākṣuṣa tva ādeḥ ubhaya asiddhasya sādhya tvam saṃbhavati iti atas sakala asiddha bheda saṅgrahāya sādhya tvāt iti etad pada rahitam sādhya aviśiṣṭaḥ iti eva asiddha lakṣaṇam upavarṇanīyam

original: sādhyasya ca rūpadvayam asti asiddhatvaṃ sādhyatvaṃ ca /
analyzed: sādhyasya ca rūpa dvayam asti asiddha tvam sādhya tvam ca

original: tatrāsiddhatvam eva bhavati tadaviśiṣṭatvakāraṇaṃ ihāśrīyate sarvāsiddhabhedasādhāraṇam na tu sādhyatvam anyatarāsiddhyekalagnam iti /
analyzed: tatra asiddha tvam eva bhavati tad aviśiṣṭa tva kāraṇam iha āśrīyate sarva asiddha bheda sādhāraṇam na tu sādhya tvam anyatara asiddhi eka lagnam iti

original: evaṃ cāsiddhatvam evāsiddhasya lakṣaṇam uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: evam ca asiddha tvam eva asiddhasya lakṣaṇam uktam bhavati

original: pakṣadharmatvaṃ yasya nāsti sādhye dharmiṇi yo na vartate hetuḥ so 'siddha iti /
analyzed: pakṣa dharma tvam yasya na asti sādhye dharmiṇi yaḥ na vartate hetuḥ saḥ siddhaḥ iti

original: tasya tu bhūyāṃso bhedā bhavanti hetusvarūpe tāvat anyatarasya vādinoḥ dvayor vā ajñānam saṃdehaḥ viparyaya iti /
analyzed: tasya tu bhūyāṃsaḥ bhedāḥ bhavanti hetu svarūpe tāvat anyatarasya vādinoḥ dvayoḥ vā ajñānam saṃdehaḥ viparyayaḥ iti

original: tathā tadāśraye 'pi dharmiṇi ekasya vā dvayor vā tathaivājñānasandehaviparyayā iti /
analyzed: tathā tad āśraye dharmiṇi ekasya vā dvayoḥ vā tathā eva ajñāna sandeha viparyayāḥ iti

original: bhūyasi ca pakṣikṛte 'rthe tadekadeśe kvacid vṛttiḥ taditaratrāvṛttir iti /
analyzed: bhūyasi ca pakṣi kṛte rthe tad eka deśe kvacid vṛttiḥ tad itaratra avṛttiḥ iti

original: ekadeśavṛttāv api dvayor ekasya vā tathaivājñānasaṃśayaviparyayā ity evaṃ prakārabhedodāharaṇavarṇanam alpaprayojanam iti na prastūyate //
analyzed: eka deśa vṛttau api dvayoḥ ekasya vā tathā eva ajñāna saṃśaya viparyayāḥ iti evam prakāra bheda udāharaṇa varṇanam alpa prayojanam iti na prastūyate

original: anyatarāsiddhe tu na vivadante pramāṇasyāpakṣapātitvāt /
analyzed: anyatara asiddhe tu na vivadante pramāṇasya apakṣapāti tvāt

original: yadi tāvat kṛtakatvaṃ śabde pramāṇato niścitaṃ tarhi mīmāṃsakasyāpi tārkikasyeva tat siddham eva /
analyzed: yadi tāvat kṛtaka tvam śabde pramāṇataḥ niścitam tarhi mīmāṃsakasya api tārkikasya iva tat siddham eva

original: atha tatra kṛtakatvaniścayanipuṇaṃ nāsty eva pramāṇam tadā tārkiko 'pi tūṣṇīm āstām /
analyzed: atha tatra kṛtaka tva niścaya nipuṇam na asti eva pramāṇam tadā tūṣṇīm āstām

original: dvayor apy asau cakṣuṣatvādivāt na siddho hetuḥ /
analyzed: dvayoḥ api asau na siddhaḥ hetuḥ

original: vāṅmātreṇa tv asiddhikathanam asāmpratam atiprasaṅgād iti /
analyzed: vāc mātreṇa tu asiddhi kathanam asāmpratam atiprasaṅgāt iti

original: satyam evaṃ na sarvadā 'nyatarāsiddhasya hetvābhāsatvaṃ samabhidadhmahe /
analyzed: satyam evam na sarvadā nyatara asiddhasya hetvābhāsa tvam samabhidadhmahe

original: kin tu kiñcit kālam iti /
analyzed: kin tu kiñcid kālam iti

original: yadaikena vādinā hetau prayukte dvitīyo vadati [maṃ prati na siddha eṣa hetuḥ] iti /
analyzed: yadā ekena vādinā hetau prayukte dvitīyaḥ vadati mam prati na siddhaḥ eṣa hetuḥ iti

original: tadā hetoḥ prayoktrā tatsādhanam abhi dheyam /
analyzed: tadā hetoḥ prayoktrā tat sādhanam abhi dheyam

original: anabhidhānāt siddhau nopanyastaṃ sādhanaṃ tāvad evāsau anyatarāsiddhaḥ /
analyzed: anabhidhānāt siddhau na upanyastam sādhanam tāvat eva asau anyatara asiddhaḥ

original: anantaraṃ tu samyagdhetuḥ ubhayāsiddho vā bhaviṣyatīti /
analyzed: anantaram tu samyak hetuḥ ubhaya asiddhaḥ vā bhaviṣyati iti

original: vyadhikaraṇāsiddhis tu yathoktabhedāntargata eva /
analyzed: vyadhikaraṇa asiddhiḥ tu yathā ukta bheda antargataḥ eva

original: yathā [nityaḥ śabdaḥ kākasya kāṣṇryāt] iti //
analyzed: yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ kākasya kāṣṇryāt iti

original: kvacit punaś ca vyadhikaraṇāsiddho 'pi bhavati gamaka ity eke /
analyzed: kvacid punar ca vyadhikaraṇa asiddhaḥ u pi bhavati gamakaḥ iti eke

original: tad yathā bahalabahalaḥ pracalajaladharaśyāmlavapuḥ ambaratalam ākrāman dhūmaprabandhaḥ kṣoṇīdhrakandarādipradeśadharmatvānavadhārane 'pi tatra gamayitum alam analam iti /
analyzed: tat yathā bahala bahalaḥ pracala jaladhara śyāmla vapuḥ ambara talam ākrāman dhūma prabandhaḥ kṣoṇīdhra kandara ādi pradeśa dharma tva anavadhārane tatra gamayitum alam analam iti

original: yadā vā [agnimān eṣa deśaḥ dhūmopalabdheḥ:] iti prayujyate tadā upalabdher ātmadharmatayā vaiyadhikaraṇye 'pi gamakatā 'sti //
analyzed: yadā vā agnimān eṣa deśaḥ dhūma upalabdheḥ iti prayujyate tadā upalabdheḥ ātma dharma tayā vaiyadhikaraṇye pi gamaka tā sti

original: anye tu anyathāsiddhatvaṃ nām tadbhedam udāharanti /
analyzed: anye tu anyathāsiddha tvam nām tad bhedam udāharanti

original: yasya hetoḥ dharmiṇi vṛttir bhavanty api sādhyadharmapravṛttā na bhavati so 'nyathāsiddhaḥ /
analyzed: yasya hetoḥ dharmiṇi vṛttiḥ bhavanti api sādhya dharma pravṛttā na bhavati saḥ nyathāsiddhaḥ

original: yathā [anityāḥ manaḥparamāṇavaḥ mūrtatvāt ghaṭavat] iti //
analyzed: yathā anityāḥ manaḥparamāṇavaḥ mūrta tvāt ghaṭa vat iti

original: nanu katham ayam anyathāsiddha ucyate kim iti sad dhetur eva na bhavati kiṃ paramāṇuṣu mūrtatvaṃ na vartate kiṃ ghaṭādāv anityatā vyāptaṃ na dṛśyate kim ākāśādeḥ khapuṣpāder vā vipakṣān na pravyavate kiṃ pratyakṣeṇāgamena vā bādhyate kiṃ pratipakṣeṇa prabādhyate yenābhāsatāṃ bhajate na pratibandhyābhāvāt //
analyzed: nanu katham ayam anyathāsiddhaḥ ucyate kim iti sat hetuḥ eva na bhavati kim paramāṇuṣu mūrta tvam na vartate kim ghaṭa ādau anitya tā vyāptam na dṛśyate kim ākāśa ādeḥ khapuṣpa ādeḥ vā vipakṣāt na pravyavate kim pratyakṣeṇa āgamena vā bādhyate kim pratipakṣeṇa prabādhyate yena ābhāsa tām bhajate na pratibandhya abhāvāt

original: nanu paṃcānāṃ pratibandhalakṣaṇānāṃ katamad asya ślathībhūtam nānyatamasyāpi śaithilyaṃ brūmaḥ /
analyzed: nanu paṃcānām pratibandha lakṣaṇānām katamat asya ślathībhūtam na anyatamasya api śaithilyam brūmaḥ

original: tat kiṃ paṃcasv api lakṣaṇeṣu na parisamāptaḥ pratibandhaḥ na na parisamāpyate tāni cāsya santy eva /
analyzed: tat kim paṃcasu api lakṣaṇeṣu na parisamāptaḥ pratibandhaḥ na na parisamāpyate tāni ca asya santi eva

original: na caiṣa pratibandhaḥ iti kaitavam ucyate prayojyaprayojakabhāvena sādhyasādhanadharmayoḥ dhūmāgnivat pratibandho 'vadhāryate /
analyzed: na ca eṣa pratibandhaḥ iti kaitavam ucyate prayojya prayojaka bhāvena sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ dhūma agni vat pratibandhaḥ vadhāryate

original: sa cātra prayojyaprayojakabhāvo nāstīti /
analyzed: sa ca atra prayojya prayojaka bhāvaḥ na asti iti

original: ata evāyam anyathāsiddhaḥ aprayojaka iti kathyate //
analyzed: atas eva ayam anyathā asiddhaḥ aprayojakaḥ iti kathyate

original: kathaṃ punar asyāprayojakatvam avagatam ucyate mūrtatvaṃ hi sarvagatetaradravyaparimāṇaviśeṣādidharmaḥ vastusvabhāvamātranibandhaḥ na kṛtakatvādivad anityatāṃ prayoktum utsahate /
analyzed: katham punar asya aprayojaka tvam avagatam ucyate mūrta tvam hi sarva gata itara dravya parimāṇa viśeṣa ādi dharmaḥ vastu svabhāva mātra nibandhaḥ na kṛtaka tva ādi vat anitya tām prayoktum utsahate

original: tathā hi paramāṇuṣu siddheṣu satsu tatra vartamānaṃ mūrtatvaṃ anityatām sādhayet anyathātvāśrayāsiddhatām upeyāt /
analyzed: tathā hi paramāṇuṣu siddheṣu satsu tatra vartamānam mūrta tvam anitya tām sādhayet anyathātva āśraya asiddha tām upeyāt

original: sidhyata eva ca sāvayavakāṛyānumānamārtgeṇa loṣṭapravibhaṃgāvabhāsamānabhāgaparamparāparikalpanakrameṇa vā paramāṇavo niravayavāḥ sidhyanti /
analyzed: sidhyate eva ca sa avayava kāṛya anumāna mārtgeṇa loṣṭa pravibhaṃga avabhāsamāna bhāga paramparā parikalpana krameṇa vā paramāṇavaḥ niravayavāḥ sidhyanti

original: sāvayavatve hi tadavayavāḥ paramāṇavo bhaveyuḥ na te /
analyzed: sa avayava tve hi tad avayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ bhaveyuḥ na te

original: teṣām apy avayavāntaraparikalpanāyām api avayavānām ānantyāviśeṣāt sarṣapasya meroś ca sāmyam apadyate /
analyzed: teṣām api avayava antara parikalpanāyām api avayavānām ānantya aviśeṣāt sarṣapasya meroḥ ca sāmyam apadyate

original: na ca tad asti /
analyzed: na ca tat asti

original: tad evaṃ niravayaveṣu paramāṇuṣu nisargasiddham anāśritatvam /
analyzed: tat evam niravayaveṣu paramāṇuṣu nisarga siddham anāśrita tvam

original: ataś ca āśrayavināśāvayavavibhāgādivināśakāraṇābhāvāt svābhāvikavināśavādarirākaraṇāc ca kathaṃ paramāṇū na nityatā spṛśet /
analyzed: atas ca āśraya vināśa avayava vibhāga ādi vināśa kāraṇa abhāvāt svābhāvika vināśa vāda rirākaraṇāt ca katham paramāṇū na nitya tā spṛśet

original: mūrtatvaṃ tu vastudharmatvād bhavad api prameyatvāt na prayojakam //
analyzed: mūrta tvam tu vastu dharma tvāt bhavat api prameya tvāt na prayojakam

original: iyāṃs tu viśeṣaḥ prameyatvaṃ ubhayapakṣasparśād anaikāntikaṃ bhavad aprayojakam /
analyzed: iyān tu viśeṣaḥ prameya tvam ubhaya pakṣa sparśāt anaikāntikam bhavat aprayojakam

original: idaṃ tu mūrtatvaṃ anityavyatiriktas tv anataraparicayavirahitam api na prayojakam iti //
analyzed: idam tu mūrta tvam anitya vyatiriktaḥ tu anatara paricaya virahitam api na prayojakam iti

original: nanu idam api prameyatvavat vipakṣavṛtty eva mūrtatvam /
analyzed: nanu idam api prameya tva vat vipakṣa vṛtti eva mūrta tvam

original: kva vipakṣe vartate paramāṇuṣv eva . nanu teṣāṃ pakṣīkṛtatvāt kathaṃ vipakṣatā na puruṣecchānurodhena vastu viparivartate /
analyzed: kva vipakṣe vartate paramāṇuṣu eva nanu teṣām pakṣīkṛta tvāt katham vipakṣa tā na puruṣa icchā anurodhena vastu viparivartate

original: vipakṣo hi nāma sa ucyate yaḥ siṣādhayiṣitadharmaviparītadharmāḍhyāsitatayā dṛḍhapramāṇasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: vipakṣaḥ hi nāma saḥ ucyate yaḥ siṣādhayiṣita dharma viparīta dharma āḍhya asita tayā dṛḍha pramāṇa siddhaḥ

original: paramāṇavaś caite 'nantaranirdiṣṭanītikrameṇa nirṇītanityatvāḥ paramārthato vipakṣā evānityatvavādinaḥ /
analyzed: paramāṇavaḥ ca ete nantara nirdiṣṭa nīti krameṇa nirṇīta nitya tvāḥ paramārthataḥ vipakṣāḥ eva anitya tva vādinaḥ

original: sa tu rāgadveṣakaluṣitahṛdayatayā yadi tāvat pakṣatayā bravīti bravītu nāma /
analyzed: sa tu rāga dveṣa kaluṣita hṛdaya tayā yadi tāvat pakṣa tayā bravīti bravītu nāma

original: na tu suspaṣṭāsiddhinityayanāṃ vipakṣabhāvo nivartata iti //
analyzed: na tu vipakṣa bhāvaḥ nivartate iti

original: tad idam anupapannam anena krameṇa dhūmānumānasyāpy anaikāntikatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: tat idam anupapannam anena krameṇa dhūma anumānasya api anaikāntika tva prasaṅgāt

original: dhūmo hi mahībhṛti hutavahavirahitavapuṣi vipakṣe vartata eva /
analyzed: dhūmaḥ hi mahībhṛti hutavaha virahita vapuṣi vipakṣe vartate eva

original: na tatra citrabhānor abhāvo niścita iti cet kin nu khalu sadbhāvo 'sya tatra gṛhītaḥ tathā sati vā kṛtam anumānena //
analyzed: na tatra citrabhānoḥ abhāvaḥ niścitaḥ iti ced kim nu khalu sadbhāvaḥ sya tatra gṛhītaḥ tathā sati vā kṛtam anumānena

original: atha sattvam asattvaṃ vā nāvadhāritam eva dharādhare dhūmaketos tarhi sandigdhā tatra vipakṣatā /
analyzed: atha sattvam asattvam vā nā avadhāritam eva dharādhare dhūmaketoḥ tarhi sandigdhā tatra vipakṣa tā

original: niścitavipakṣavṛttivat saṃśayitavipakṣavṛttir api nānaikāntikatām ativartata iti sarvānumānānām eva nivāpāṃjalir dattaḥ syāt //
analyzed: niścita vipakṣa vṛtti vat saṃśayita vipakṣa vṛttiḥ api na anaikāntika tām ativartate iti sarva anumānānām eva nivāpa aṃjaliḥ dattaḥ syāt

original: na ca vādihṛdayaparikalpanopārūḍhasthitir api pakṣo nāma nāsti /
analyzed: na ca vādi hṛdaya parikalpanā upārūḍha sthitiḥ api pakṣaḥ nāma nā asti

original: tadabhāve kimapekṣaḥ sapakṣavipakṣavyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: tad abhāve kim apekṣaḥ sapakṣa vipakṣa vyavahāraḥ

original: buddhyārūḍhatvapakṣe 'pi na sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ pakṣatvam /
analyzed: buddhi ārūḍha tva pakṣe pi na sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ pakṣa tvam

original: na ca vastūnām ubhayātmakatā bhavet /
analyzed: na ca vastūnām ubhaya ātmaka tā bhavet

original: kin tu kaṃcit kālam anyatarāsiddhivat vimatipathāpatitasya vastunaḥ pakṣatvam upeyate /
analyzed: kin tu kaṃcid kālam anyatara asiddhi vat vimati patha āpatitasya vastunaḥ pakṣa tvam upeyate

original: nirṇayajanmā tu vipamtiviratau nūnan anyataravargapatito 'sau bhaviṣyatīti sarvathā na tasyāṃ daśāyāṃ tenānaikāntikatvodbhāvanaṃ yuktam //
analyzed: tu sau bhaviṣyati iti sarvathā na tasyām daśāyām tena anaikāntika tva udbhāvanam yuktam

original: nanu anena pathā pṛthakkṛte sapakṣavipakṣābhyāṃ @akṣena tatrānvayavyatirekayoḥ anyatarasyāpi grahaṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: nanu anena pathā pṛthakkṛte sapakṣa vipakṣābhyām akṣena tatra anvaya vyatirekayoḥ anyatarasya api grahaṇam bhavet

original: sapakṣe hy anvayo gṛhyate vipakṣe ca vyatirekaḥ /
analyzed: sapakṣe hi anvayaḥ gṛhyate vipakṣe ca vyatirekaḥ

original: eṣa tu tābhyām arthāntaram iti tatrāgṛhītānvayavyatirekātmaniyame hetuḥ ṣaṇḍha iva sutajanmani na samartha eva sādhyopasthāpane bhavet //
analyzed: eṣa tu tābhyām artha antaram iti tatra agṛhīta anvaya vyatireka ātma niyame hetuḥ ṣaṇḍhaḥ iva suta janmani na samarthaḥ eva sādhya upasthāpane bhavet

original: alam anayā ḍimbhabibhīṣikayā /
analyzed: alam anayā ḍimbhabibhīṣikayā

original: na hi sakalasapakṣavipakṣasākṣātkaraṇakāraṇakekollekhapuraśaraṃ vyāptigrahaṇam iti pūrvam eva nirṇīto 'yam arthaḥ /
analyzed: na hi sakala sapakṣa vipakṣa sākṣātkaraṇa kāraṇa kekā ullekha pura śaram vyāpti grahaṇam iti pūrvam eva nirṇītaḥ yam arthaḥ

original: na ca tadvarjam iti vyāptigrahaṇaṃ bhavati yena ṣaṇḍhasutasāmyacodanāvakāśaḥ syāt /
analyzed: na ca tad varjam iti vyāpti grahaṇam bhavati yena ṣaṇḍha suta sāmya codana avakāśaḥ syāt

original: sāmanyena hi vyāptir gṛhyamāṇā tatrāpi gṛhītā bhavty eva /
analyzed: sāmanyena hi vyāptiḥ gṛhyamāṇā tatra api gṛhītā bhavti eva

original: tenāpi ca kālāntare sapakṣavipakṣānyataravargānupraveśinā bhavitavyam eva /
analyzed: tena api ca kāla antare sapakṣa vipakṣa anyatara varga anupraveśinā bhavitavyam eva

original: vimatyavasthāyāṃ tu pṛthag eva tābhyām asāv iti na tatra vartamāno hetur anaikāntiko bhavati //
analyzed: vimati avasthāyām tu pṛthak eva tābhyām asau iti na tatra vartamānaḥ hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ bhavati

original: etena īśvarādyanumānānām apy anaikāntikatvam apākṛtaṃ veditavyam tasmān nānaikāntikatvenāgamakaṃ mūrtatvam api tv anyathāsiddhatvenaiveti //
analyzed: etena īśvara ādi anumānānām api anaikāntika tvam apākṛtam veditavyam tasmāt na anaikāntika tvena āgamakam mūrta tvam api tu anyathāsiddha tvena eva iti

original: nanu evam api paramāṇuprasādhanānumanamahimahataśaktitayā mūrtatvam anityatvasiddhāv akṣamaṃ jātam iti tataś ca kālātyayāpadiṣṭatvāt nānyathāsiddhatām adhigacchet naitad evam kālātyayāpadiṣṭo hi pratyakṣāṅamāpahṛtaviṣaya ucyate [anuṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇavartmā] [madirā dvijaiḥ pātavyā] ityādau /
analyzed: nanu evam api mūrta tvam anitya tva siddhau akṣamam jātam iti tatas ca kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvāt na anyathā siddha tām adhigacchet na etat evam kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ hi ucyate anuṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇavartmā madirā dvijaiḥ pātavyā ityādau

original: darśitaḥ [yat punar anumānaṃ pratyakṣāgamaviruddhaṃ nyāyābhāsaḥ saḥ] iti /
analyzed: darśitaḥ yat punar anumānam pratyakṣa āgama viruddham nyāya ābhāsaḥ saḥ iti

original: na ca paramāṇuṣu paramāṇutayaiva satataparokṣeṣu pratyakṣam anityatāviparyayagrāhi pravartitaṃ śaktam /
analyzed: na ca paramāṇuṣu parama aṇu tayā eva satata parokṣeṣu pratyakṣam anitya tā viparyaya grāhi pravartitam śaktam

original: āgamas tunāsty eveti kutaḥ kālātyayāpadiṣṭatā /
analyzed: āgamaḥ tu na asti eva iti kutas kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tā

original: nanu kim idam avanipativacanam uta vaidikī codanā yat pratyakṣāgamayor eva bādhakatvam anumānaṃ prati nānumānāntarasyeti /
analyzed: nanu kim idam avanipati vacanam uta vaidikī codanā yat pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ eva bādhaka tvam anumānam prati na anumāna antarasya iti

original: paramāṇuprasādhanānumānaṃ hi dṛḍhaṃ adṛḍhasya tadanityatānumānasya mūrtatvāder yadi bādhakaṃ syāt ko doṣaḥ syād iti //
analyzed: paramāṇu prasādhana anumānam hi dṛḍham adṛḍhasya tad anitya tā anumānasya mūrta tva ādeḥ yadi bādhakam syāt kaḥ doṣaḥ syāt iti

original: atha manuṣe niyama evaiṣaḥ pratyakṣānumānayor virodhe pratyakṣam eva balīya iti tadevānumanasya bādhamam ucitam nānumānāntaram iti tad asat alātacakrādau pratyakṣam apy anumānenānanyathāsiddhena bādhyata eva //
analyzed: atha niyamaḥ eva eṣaḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ virodhe pratyakṣam eva balīyaḥ iti tat eva anumanasya ucitam na anumāna antaram iti tat asat alāta cakra ādau pratyakṣam api anumānena ananyathāsiddhena bādhyate eva

original: nanu bhramaṇaviratau parimitaparimāṇolmukagrāhi pratyakṣam eva tatra pratyakṣasya bādhakam nānumānam iti naivam anavarataparibhramaṇasamudbhūtacakrāvabhāsasamaya eva anumānena tatra bhrāntatāniścayāt //
analyzed: nanu bhramaṇa viratau parimita parimāṇa ulmuka grāhi pratyakṣam eva tatra pratyakṣasya bādhakam na anumānam iti na evam anavarata paribhramaṇa samudbhūta cakra avabhāsa samaye eva anumānena tatra bhrānta tā niścayāt

original: pūrvapravṛttaṃ acakrākāratadalātaparicchedi pratyakṣaṃ bādhakam iti cet na pūrvapravṛttatvenaivātikrāntatvāt /
analyzed: pūrva pravṛttam a cakra ākāra tad alāta paricchedi pratyakṣam bādhakam iti ced na pūrva pravṛtta tvena eva atikrānta tvāt

original: tasmād anumānam eva cakrajñānabādhakarm /
analyzed: tasmāt anumānam eva cakra jñāna bādha karm

original: evaṃ ca ananyathāsiddhatayā mūlastambhabhūtam akhilānumānapratiṣṭhāyatanaṃ pratyakṣam api bādhate tat anumānasya tapasvinaḥ kathaṃ na bādhakam ataś ca pratyakṣāgamagrahaṇasyopalakṣaṇārthatvāt anumānabādhitam api kalātyayāpadidiṣṭam eveti //
analyzed: evam ca ananyathā asiddha tayā mūla stambha bhūtam akhila anumāna pratiṣṭhā āyatanam pratyakṣam api bādhate tat anumānasya tapasvinaḥ katham na bādhakam atas ca pratyakṣa āgama grahaṇasya upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt anumāna bādhitam api kalā atyaya apadidiṣṭam eva iti

original: tad etad asamīcīnam anumanāder bādhyabādhakabhāvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: tat etat asamīcīnam anumana ādeḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāva anupapatteḥ

original: sarvatra khalu pramāṇābhāsarūpaṃ bādhyate na tu pramāṇaṃ nāma śakyate bādhitum /
analyzed: sarvatra khalu pramāṇa ābhāsa rūpam bādhyate na tu pramāṇam nāma śakyate bādhitum

original: alātacakrādāv api pratyakṣābhāsasya bādhakam anumānaṃ na pratyakṣasya /
analyzed: alāta cakra ādau api pratyakṣa ābhāsasya bādhakam anumānam na pratyakṣasya

original: evam atrāpi anumanābhāsasya bādhyatā nānumanasya //
analyzed: evam atra api anumana ābhāsasya bādhya tā na anumanasya

original: tad idānīm anumānābhāsatvam asya kiṃkṛtam iti cintyatām /
analyzed: tat idānīm anumāna ābhāsa tvam asya kiṃkṛtam iti cintyatām

original: svalakṣaṇavaidhuryād iti cet kim anumānāntareṇa bādhakena /
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇa vaidhuryāt iti ced kim anumāna antareṇa bādhakena

original: tad bādhyatayā tu tadābhāsatvakathanam itarasyāpi tādṛśam eva /
analyzed: tat bādhya tayā tu tad ābhāsa tva kathanam itarasya api tādṛśam eva

original: paramāṇupradhānānumānam ananyathāsiddham /
analyzed: paramāṇu pradhāna anumānam ananyathā siddham

original: idaṃ tu mūrtatvam anyathāsiddham iti cet āgato 'si madīyaṃ panthānam /
analyzed: idam tu mūrta tvam anyathā asiddham iti ced āgataḥ si madīyam panthānam

original: anyathāsiddhatvād eva tadaprāmāṇye siddhe kiṃ tadbādhayā //
analyzed: anyathā asiddha tvāt eva tad aprāmāṇye siddhe kim tad bādhayā

original: anyathāsiddhatvam eva katham iti cet na ghaṭāḍau mūrtatvaprayuktam anityatvam api tu kāryatvaprayuktam /
analyzed: anyathā asiddha tvam eva katham iti ced na ghaṭa āḍau mūrta tva prayuktam anitya tvam api tu kārya tva prayuktam

original: kāryasya hi kāraṇavibhāgād vā tadvināśād vā vināśopaptteḥ kāryatvam evānityatvaprayojaka yuktam na mūrtatvam /
analyzed: kāryasya hi kāraṇa vibhāgāt vā tad vināśāt vā vināśa upaptteḥ kārya tvam eva anitya tva prayojaka yuktam na mūrta tvam

original: mūrtatve tv anityatākṣepiṇi paramāṇutaiva hīyetety uktam /
analyzed: mūrta tve tu anitya tā kṣepiṇi paramāṇu tā eva hīyeta iti uktam

original: tasmān na mūrtatvam anityatāyāṃ kārakaṃ jñāpakaṃ veti bhavaty anyathāsiddham //
analyzed: tasmāt na mūrta tvam anitya tāyām kārakam jñāpakam vā iti bhavati anyathā asiddham

original: bhavaty evam asiddhavarge tu katham eṣa hetur gaṇyate sādhyadharmayuktā dharmiṇi vṛttir asya nāstīti cet yady evaṃ paṃcānām api tatprayuktavṛttirahitatvāt asiddha evaiko hetvābhāsaḥ syāt //
analyzed: bhavati evam asiddha varge tu katham eṣa hetuḥ gaṇyate sādhya dharma yuktā dharmiṇi vṛttiḥ asya na asti iti ced yadi evam paṃcānām api tad prayukta vṛtti rahita tvāt asiddhaḥ eva ekaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ syāt

original: atha saty api prayojakatve vipakṣavṛttyādyavāṃtararūpabhedanibandhanānaikāntitvādivyapadeśepaṃcakabhāja ime hetvābhāsā iṣyate /
analyzed: atha sati api prayojaka tve vipakṣa vṛtti ādi avāṃtara rūpa bheda nibandhana anaikāntitva ādi vyapadeśa paṃcaka bhājaḥ ime hetvābhāsāḥ iṣyate

original: hanta tarhi prakṛto 'yaṃ hetuḥ [mūrtatvāt] iti kim anaikāntika ucyatām atha kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ āhosvid viruddhaḥ uta prakaraṇasamaḥ iti /
analyzed: hanta tarhi prakṛtaḥ yam hetuḥ mūrta tvāt iti kim anaikāntikaḥ ucyatām atha kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ āhosvit viruddhaḥ uta prakaraṇasamaḥ iti

original: naiṣām anyatamo 'pi vaktuṃ śakyate etal lakṣaṇānupapatter iti cet kāmam asiddho 'pi mā vādi pakṣe vartamānatvena tallakṣaṇānupapatter iti //
analyzed: na eṣām vaktum śakyate etat lakṣaṇa anupapatteḥ iti ced kāmam asiddhaḥ u pi mā vādi pakṣe vartamāna tvena tad lakṣaṇa anupapatteḥ iti

original: astu tarhi ṣaṣṭha evāyaṃ hetvābhāsaḥ /
analyzed: astu tarhi ṣaṣṭhaḥ eva ayam hetvābhāsaḥ

original: samyagdhetutāṃ tāvad yathoktanayena nāśnuta eva /
analyzed: samyak hetutām tāvat yathā ukta nayena na aśnute eva

original: na caiteśv antarbhavati iti balāt ṣaṣṭha evāvatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: na ca eteśu antarbhavati iti balāt ṣaṣṭhaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate

original: kathaṃ vibhāgasūtram iti cet atikramiṣyāma idaṃ sūtram /
analyzed: katham vibhāga sūtram iti ced atikramiṣyāmaḥ idam sūtram

original: atikrāmantaḥ suspaṣṭadṛṣṭam apīmaṃ aprayojakaṃ hetvābhāsam apahnuvīmahi na caivaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: atikrāmantaḥ su spaṣṭa dṛṣṭam api imam aprayojakam hetvābhāsam apahnuvīmahi na ca evam yuktam

original: ato varaṃ sūtrātikramaḥ na vastvatikrama iti //
analyzed: atas varam sūtra atikramaḥ na vastu atikramaḥ iti

original: atha vā na sūtrakāraniyamollaṅghanaṃ śreyaḥ /
analyzed: atha vā na sūtrakāra niyama ullaṅghanam śreyaḥ

original: pramādyan khalu parimitadarśī mādṛśaḥ anyathā brūyāt /
analyzed: pramādyan khalu parimita darśī mādṛśaḥ anyathā brūyāt

original: na nyāyamahodadheḥ pāradṛśvā bhagavān akṣapādaḥ /
analyzed: na nyāya mahā udadheḥ bhagavān akṣapādaḥ

original: tad enaṃ hetvābhāsaṃ asiddhavarga eva nikṣipāmaḥ //
analyzed: tat enam hetvābhāsam asiddha varge eva nikṣipāmaḥ

original: nanu pakṣe vartamānaḥ kathaṃ tatra nikṣeptuṃ śakyate yathā sādhyadharmaprayojakatayā pakṣe 'pi vartituṃ yuktam tathā na vartata evāyaṃ tatrety adūraviprakarṣeṇa bhavaty evāyam asiddhaḥ /
analyzed: nanu pakṣe vartamānaḥ katham tatra nikṣeptum śakyate yathā sādhya dharma prayojaka tayā pakṣe vartitum yuktam tathā na vartate eva ayam tatra iti adūra viprakarṣeṇa bhavati eva ayam asiddhaḥ

original: ata evāyam anyathāsiddha ity ucyate /
analyzed: atas eva ayam anyathā asiddhaḥ iti ucyate

original: yat hā'siddhaḥ siddho bhavati tathā na siddhaḥ anyathā tu siddha ity anayā nītyottānavṛttimātralābhe py ayam asiddhaḥ /
analyzed: yat ha asiddhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati tathā na siddhaḥ anyathā tu siddhaḥ iti anayā nītyā uttānavṛtti mātra lābhe pi ayam asiddhaḥ

original: evaṃ anyeṣu tu hetvābhāseṣu bhaṅgyāpi nāntarbhavatīy uktam etat //
analyzed: evam anyeṣu tu hetvābhāseṣu bhaṅgyā api na antarbhavati it uktam etat

original: atha vā sarvahetvābhāsānuvṛttam idaṃ anyathāsiddhatvaṃ nāma rūpam iti na ṣaṣṭho 'yaṃ hetvābhāsaḥ /
analyzed: atha vā sarva hetvābhāsa anuvṛttam idam anyathāsiddha tvam nāma rūpam iti na ṣaṣṭhaḥ yam hetvābhāsaḥ

original: tat tu kvacit kevalam eva dṛśyate /
analyzed: tat tu kvacid kevalam eva dṛśyate

original: kvacid vyabhicārādir upāntarasahacārita /
analyzed: kvacid vyabhicāra ādiḥ

original: ataś ca vyabhicārādirūpāpekṣam eva paṃcatvam upadiṣṭavān munir iti na vibhāgasūtravirodha ity alam ativistareṇa //
analyzed: atas ca vyabhicāra ādi rūpa apekṣam eva paṃcatvam upadiṣṭavān muniḥ iti na vibhāga sūtra virodhaḥ iti alam ati vistareṇa

original: yuktas tasmād anyathāsiddhanāmā hetvābhāsaḥ so 'yam ekaprajāraḥ /
analyzed: yuktaḥ tasmāt anyathā asiddha nāmā hetvābhāsaḥ saḥ yam eka prajāraḥ

original: yasyottānā vidyāmānā 'pi pakṣe vṛttir na syāt sādhyadharmaprayuktā //
analyzed: yasya uttānā pakṣe vṛttiḥ na syāt sādhya dharma prayuktā

original: hetvābhāsakudumbakasya tad idaṃ sarvasya sādhāraṇaṃ rūpaṃ yady api lakṣaṇāntarakṛtaḥ bhedas tathā nānyataḥ /
analyzed: hetvābhāsa kudumbakasya tat idam sarvasya sādhāraṇam rūpam yadi api lakṣaṇa antara kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ tathā na anyatas

original: sāmānyam tu viśeṣarūparahitaṃ nāsti pramāṇaṃ yathā mā bhūd atra tatheti nāsya viṣayaś codyasya vastusthitiḥ //
analyzed: sāmānyam tu viśeṣa rūpa rahitam nā asti pramāṇam yathā mā bhūt atra tathā iti na asya viṣayaḥ codyasya vastu sthitiḥ

original: kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ kālātītaḥ //1.2.9//
analyzed: kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ kāla atītaḥ

original: yathāprāptaṃ hetuprayogakālam atītya yo hetur apadiśyate sa kālatyayāpadiṣṭaḥ kālātīta ucyate //
analyzed: yathāprāptam hetu prayoga kālam atītya yaḥ hetuḥ apadiśyate sa kāla tyaya apadiṣṭaḥ kālātītaḥ ucyate

original: tatra kecid ācakṣate /
analyzed: tatra kecid ācakṣate

original: pratijñānantaraṃ hi hetuḥ prayoktuṃ yuktaḥ /
analyzed: pratijñā anantaram hi hetuḥ prayoktum yuktaḥ

original: tatra yaḥ pratijñāyāḥ pūrvam eva dṛṣṭāntavacanāder apy ūrdhvaṃ vā prayujyate sa kālātyayāpadiṣṭa iti tad anupapannam akṣatapratibandhasya sādhyāvagatikāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: tatra yaḥ pratijñāyāḥ pūrvam eva dṛṣṭānta vacana ādeḥ api ūrdhvam vā prayujyate sa kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ iti tat anupapannam akṣata pratibandhasya sādhya avagati kāriṇaḥ

original: kramātikramamātreṇa na hetvābhāsatā bhavet //
analyzed: krama atikrama mātreṇa na hetvābhāsa tā bhavet

original: kiyāṃś caiṣa doṣaḥ padāntaravyāvahitOccāraṇaṃ nāma /
analyzed: kiyān ca eṣa doṣaḥ pada antara vyāvahita uccāraṇam nāma

original: vyavahitam api yena saha samucitasamayam anvetum adhikṛtaṃ itarad atinikaṭapaṭhitam api parāṇudya davīyasā 'pi tenaiva saṃbandham anubhavati /
analyzed: vyavahitam api yena saha samucita samayam anvetum adhikṛtam itarat ati nikaṭa paṭhitam api parāṇudya davīyasā pi tena eva saṃbandham anubhavati

original: yathā [ayasā pathi gacchantīṃ aouṣadhīṃ dīrghalocanām /
analyzed: yathā ayasā pathi gacchantīm ā ouṣadhīm dīrgha locanām

original: dṛṣṭavān asi kedāre yo lunāsi mama priyām] iti //
analyzed: dṛṣṭavān asi kedāre yaḥ lunāsi mama priyām iti

original: api ca aprāptakālam etat kathitaṃ pṛthag eva nigrahasthānam /
analyzed: api ca aprāpta kālam etat kathitam pṛthak eva nigrahasthānam

original: tac ca punar ucyamānaṃ na kaṃcana svārtham āvahati tasmād apavyākhyānam etat //
analyzed: tat ca punar ucyamānam na kaṃcana sva artham āvahati tasmāt apavyākhyānam etat

original: apara āha saviśeṣaṇasya hetoḥ prayujyamānasya yasya viśeṣaṇaṃ kāryakālam atyeti na tatparyantam avatiṣṭhate sa kālātyayāpadiṣṭa iti /
analyzed: aparaḥ āha sa viśeṣaṇasya hetoḥ prayujyamānasya yasya viśeṣaṇam kārya kālam atyeti na tad paryantam avatiṣṭhate sa kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ iti

original: yathā [kākāntarasthāyī śabdaḥ saṃyogavyaṅgyatvāt rūpavat] iti /
analyzed: yathā kāka antara sthāyī śabdaḥ saṃyoga vyaṅgya tvāt rūpa vat iti

original: atra na vyaṅgyatvamātraṃ hetutvena vivakṣitam api tu saviśeṣaṇaṃ saṃyogavyaṅgyatvam /
analyzed: atra na vyaṅgya tva mātram hetutvena vivakṣitam api tu sa viśeṣaṇam saṃyoga vyaṅgya tvam

original: sa cāyaṃ saṃyogaḥ vyaṃjakaḥ dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi rūpe tadavagatiparyantasthitir upalabhyate dīpādisaṃyogaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ayam saṃyogaḥ vyaṃjakaḥ dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi rūpe tad avagati paryanta sthitiḥ upalabhyate dīpa ādi saṃyogaḥ

original: sādhyadharmiṇi tu śabde na tathā 'vasthānam iti dūrato hi dāruparaśusaṃyogavicchinne chetrā punar udyamyamāne paraśvathe śrūyate śabdaḥ iti tadupalabdhikāle tadatyayāt kālātyayāpadiṣṭo 'yaṃ hetur iti //
analyzed: sādhya dharmiṇi tu śabde na tathā vasthānam iti dūratas hi dāru paraśu saṃyoga vicchinne chetrā punar udyamyamāne paraśvathe śrūyate śabdaḥ iti tad upalabdhi kāle tad atyayāt kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ yam hetuḥ iti

original: etad api na saṅgatam asiddhatvenāsya hetvābhāsāntaratvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: etat api na saṅgatam asiddha tvena asya hetvābhāsa antara tva anupapatteḥ

original: tasmād ayam arthaḥ hetoḥ prayogakālaḥ pratyakṣāgamānupahatapakṣaparigrahasamaya eva /
analyzed: tasmāt ayam arthaḥ hetoḥ prayoga kālaḥ pratyakṣa āgama anupahata pakṣa parigraha samayaḥ eva

original: tam atītya prayujyamānaḥ pratyakṣāgamabādhite viṣaye vartamānaḥ kālātyayāpadiṣṭo bhavati /
analyzed: tam atītya prayujyamānaḥ pratyakṣa āgama bādhite viṣaye vartamānaḥ kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ bhavati

original: tasyodāharaṇaṃ pūrvam eva pradarśitam //
analyzed: tasya udāharaṇam pūrvam eva pradarśitam

original: uṣṇo na tejo 'vayavī kṛtakatvād ghaṭādivat /
analyzed: uṣṇaḥ na tejaḥ vayavī kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat

original: brāhmaṇena surā peyā dravyatvāt kṣīranīravat //
analyzed: brāhmaṇena surā peyā dravya tvāt kṣīra nīra vat

original: yac ca kiñcid abhidheyam atra tat sarvam uktam anumānalakṣaṇe /
analyzed: yat ca kiñcid abhidheyam atra tat sarvam uktam anumāna lakṣaṇe

original: aprayojakanirūpaṇe punaḥ kaṃcanoditam ato viramyate //
analyzed: aprayojaka nirūpaṇe punar kaṃcana uditam atas viramyate

original: hetvābhāsās ta ete 'vagatiniyamitānanyasaṃkīrṇarūpāḥ nirṇītāḥ paṃcaye 'rthe vidadhati mahatīṃ śuddhim abhyasyamānāḥ /
analyzed: hetvābhāsāḥ te ete vagati niyamita an anya saṃkīrṇa rūpāḥ nirṇītāḥ paṃcaye rthe vidadhati mahatīm śuddhim abhyasyamānāḥ

original: pakṣādau vṛttibhedākalanagurutarakleśaniṣpādyamānaiḥ tainayattā tadīyā kvacana phalavatī nādatās tena tadjñaiḥ //
analyzed: pakṣa ādau vṛtti bheda akalana gurutara kleśa niṣpādyamānaiḥ taina yattā tadīyā kvacana phalavatī tena tad jñaiḥ

original: tattvādhyavasāyasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ prayojanam uktam /
analyzed: tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇam jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ prayojanam uktam

original: tadaṅgabhūtāni chalajātinigrahasthānāni /
analyzed: tad aṅga bhūtāni chala jāti nigrahasthānāni

original: yady api ca vāde keṣāṃcid abhyanujñānam asti /
analyzed: yadi api ca vāde keṣāṃcid abhyanujñānam asti

original: tathāpi jalpavitaṇḍe eva teṣāṃ prācuryeṇa kṣetram iti tadaupayikatayā tatsvarūpanirūpaṇaṃ yuktam ity uddeśakrameṇa chalasya tāval lakṣaṇam āha vacanavighāto 'rthavikalpopapattyā cchalam //1.2.10//
analyzed: tathā api jalpa vitaṇḍe eva teṣām prācuryeṇa kṣetram iti tad aupayika tayā tad svarūpa nirūpaṇam yuktam iti uddeśa krameṇa chalasya tāvat lakṣaṇam āha vacana vighātaḥ rtha vikalpa upapattyā chalam

original: chalasya bhedavattvāt sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāgaḥ viśeṣalakṣaṇāni ca vaktavyāni /
analyzed: chalasya bhedavat tvāt sāmānya lakṣaṇam vibhāgaḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni ca vaktavyāni

original: tānīha sarvāṇi svakaṇṭhena kila [tatpūrvakam anumānam] ity atra tricaturākṣarasamarpitāparimitaviṣayavitatānumānalakṣaṇalabdhaniratiśayasūtrakaraṇakauśalyasya me kim adhunā śiṣyajanamanaḥkleśakāriṇā saṃkṣiptābhidhānadohadeneti manyamānaḥ sūtrakṛd uktavān //
analyzed: tāni iha sarvāṇi sva kaṇṭhena kila tad pūrvakam anumānam iti atra tri catur akṣara samarpita aparimita viṣaya vitata anumāna lakṣaṇa labdha niratiśaya sūtra karaṇa kauśalyasya me kim adhunā śiṣya jana manaḥ kleśa kāriṇā saṃkṣipta abhidhāna dohadena iti manyamānaḥ sūtrakṛt uktavān

original: tatra [vacanavighātaḥ] iti sūtraṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇapratipādakam /
analyzed: tatra vacana vighātaḥ iti sūtram sāmānya lakṣaṇa pratipādakam

original: parasya vadataḥ vacanavighātaḥ abhidhānanirodhaḥ chalam /
analyzed: parasya vadataḥ vacana vighātaḥ abhidhāna nirodhaḥ chalam

original: kim āsyapidhānādinā nety āha arthavikalpopapattyeti /
analyzed: kim āsya pidhāna ādinā na iti āha artha vikalpa upapattyā iti

original: vaktuḥ anabhipretam arthāt tad ukte vacasi samāropya tanniṣedhaṃ chalavādī karoti /
analyzed: vaktuḥ anabhipretam arthāt tat ukte vacasi samāropya tad niṣedham chala vādī karoti

original: katham arthāntarāropaṇam iti cet arthavikalpopapattyā /
analyzed: katham artha antara āropaṇam iti ced artha vikalpa upapattyā

original: vukalpamānārthaghaṭanayety arthaḥ //
analyzed: arthaḥ

original: kim udāharaṇam viśeṣalakṣaṇeṣu vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: kim udāharaṇam viśeṣa lakṣaṇeṣu vakṣyāmaḥ

original: ihaiva kasmān nocyate asāṃbhavād iti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: iha eva kasmāt na ucyate asāṃbhavāt iti brūmaḥ

original: na hi nirviśeṣaṃ sāmānyam upapadyata iti /
analyzed: na hi nirviśeṣam sāmānyam upapadyate iti

original: tad udāhriyamāṇaṃ balād viśeṣaniṣṭham evāvatiṣṭhate //
analyzed: tat udāhriyamāṇam balāt viśeṣa niṣṭham eva avatiṣṭhate

original: anyeṣv api [gaur na padā spraṣṭavyā] iti sāmānyopadeśeṣu nāmūrtāyāṃ ākāśanirviśeṣavapuṣi jātau sparśaprasaktaḥ tanniṣedho vā 7vakalpate /
analyzed: anyeṣu api gauḥ na padā spraṣṭavyā iti sāmānya upadeśeṣu na amūrtāyām ākāśa nirviśeṣa vapuṣi jātau sparśa prasaktaḥ tad niṣedhaḥ vā

original: kin tu vyaktiṣv eveti viśeṣaviṣaya eva sarvatra kriyāyoga iti tatraivodāharaṇavarṇanaṃ yuktam //
analyzed: kin tu vyaktiṣu eva iti viśeṣa viṣaye eva sarvatra kriyā yogaḥ iti tatra eva udāharaṇa varṇanam yuktam

original: kathaṃ tarhi sakalahetvābhāsasārthasāmānyalakṣaṇam aprayojakatvam anapekṣitasavyabhicāraviruddhādiviśeṣam apy udāharaṇadvāreṇa darśitam [anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ mūrtatvāt ghaṭavat] iti ucyate pramāṇe tarhi pratyakṣādiviśeṣanirapekṣaṃ pramāṇasāmānyaṃ nodāhṛtam nanu ayam aparo doṣo'stu /
analyzed: katham tarhi sakala hetvābhāsa sārtha sāmānya lakṣaṇam aprayojaka tvam anapekṣita savyabhicāra viruddha ādi viśeṣam api udāharaṇa dvāreṇa darśitam anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ mūrta tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ucyate pramāṇe tarhi pratyakṣa ādi viśeṣa nirapekṣam pramāṇa sāmānyam na udāhṛtam nanu ayam aparaḥ doṣaḥ astu

original: tad apy ayuktam evānuṣṭhitam atrocyate na śakyam udāhartum asaṃbhavād iti tan nodāhṛtam na punar ālasyāt pramādād vā /
analyzed: tat api ayuktam eva anuṣṭhitam atrā ucyate na śakyam udāhartum asaṃbhavāt iti tat na udāhṛtam na punar ālasyāt pramādāt vā

original: hetvābhāsasamūhasādhāraṇaṃ rūpaṃ tv aprayojakatvaṃ tathā saṃbhavād udāhṛtam /
analyzed: hetvābhāsa samūha sādhāraṇam rūpam tu aprayojaka tvam tathā saṃbhavāt udāhṛtam

original: na ca tasāmānyāt atrāpi tathā 'stv iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: na ca ta sāmānyāt atra api tathā stu iti vaktavyam

original: na hi cākṣuṣeṇa paṃcāśad bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: na hi cākṣuṣeṇa paṃcāśat bhavitum arhati

original: tasmān naivaṃ vaktuṃ śakyam //
analyzed: tasmāt na evam vaktum śakyam

original: yathā viruddhādiviśeṣarūparahitam aprayojakatvaṃ hetvābhāseṣu sāmānyarūpaṃ dṛśyate tathā pramāṇeṣv api pratyakṣādiviśeṣarūparahitaṃ tad dṛśyatām /
analyzed: yathā viruddha ādi viśeṣa rūpa rahitam aprayojaka tvam hetvābhāseṣu sāmānya rūpam dṛśyate tathā pramāṇeṣu api pratyakṣa ādi viśeṣa rūpa rahitam tat dṛśyatām

original: yathā vā pramāṇeṣu tan na dṛśyate tathā hetvābhāseṣv api mā darśīta vastusvabhāvānām anuyogakṣetratā 'nupapatteḥ //
analyzed: yathā vā pramāṇeṣu tat na dṛśyate tathā hetvābhāseṣu api mā vastu svabhāvānām anuyogakṣetra tā nupapatteḥ

original: api ca aprayojakatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ viruddhādiviśeṣeṣv iva tadrūparahiteṣu tadviśeṣeṣv api saṃbhavad dṛśyate /
analyzed: api ca aprayojaka tvam sāmānyam viruddha ādi viśeṣeṣu iva tad rūpa rahiteṣu tad viśeṣeṣu api saṃbhavat dṛśyate

original: ata eva tad api svaviśeṣaniṣṭham evodāhṛtaṃ [anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ mūrtatvāt] iti /
analyzed: atas eva tat api sva viśeṣa niṣṭham evā udāhṛtam anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ mūrta tvāt iti

original: na cākāśavad anālambanam eva kiñcid aprayojakatvasāmānyam iti /
analyzed: na ca ākāśa vat anālambanam eva kiñcid aprayojaka tva sāmānyam iti

original: tasmāt suṣṭhūktaṃ [na sāmānyalakṣaṇe śakyam udāhartum] iti //
analyzed: tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam na sāmānya lakṣaṇe śakyam udāhartum iti

original: evaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam abhidhāya chalasya vibhāgam āha tat trividhaṃ vākchalaṃ sāmānyacchalam upacāracchalaṃ ca //1.2.11//
analyzed: evam sāmānya lakṣaṇam abhidhāya chalasya vibhāgam āha tat trividham vākchalam sāmānyacchalam upacāracchalam ca

original: nigadavyākhyātaṃ sūtram /
analyzed: nigada vyākhyātam sūtram

original: vibhāgasāmānyalakṣaṇayoś ca upadeśapaurvāparyaniyamo nāstīti pūrvam evoktam //
analyzed: vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇayoḥ ca upadeśa paurvāparya niyamaḥ na asti iti pūrvam eva uktam

original: atha vibhāgakrameṇa lakṣaṇāny āha /
analyzed: atha vibhāga krameṇa lakṣaṇāni āha

original: tatra aviśeṣabhihite 'rthe vaktur abhiprāyā arthāntarakalpanā vākchalam //1.2.12//
analyzed: tatra aviśeṣa abhihite rthe vaktuḥ abhiprāyāḥ artha antara kalpanā vākchalam

original: saṃbhavadviśeṣe 'py aviśeṣasādhāraṇārthasamarpaṇakauśalaśālini śleṣālaṅkāravati śabde prayukte sati vaktur abhipretam artham apahnutya tato 'rthāntaraṃ parikalpya tanniṣedhavacanam vāci nimittabhūtāyāṃ chalaṃ vākchalam //
analyzed: saṃbhavat viśeṣe pi aviśeṣa sādhāraṇa artha samarpaṇa kauśala śālini śleṣa alaṅkāravati śabde prayukte sati vaktuḥ abhipretam artham apahnutya tatas rtha antaram parikalpya tat niṣedha vacanam vāci nimitta bhūtāyām chalam vākchalam

original: [navakambalo 'yaṃ māṇavakaṃ] iti [navaḥ kambalo 'sya] [nava kambalā asya] iti vigrahadaśādṛśyamānaviśeṣam api samāsapadam idaṃ arthadvaye 'py aviśiṣtam /
analyzed: nava kambalaḥ yam māṇavakam iti navaḥ kambalaḥ sya nava kambalāḥ asya iti vigraha daśā dṛśyamāna viśeṣam api samāsa padam idam artha dvaye pi aviśiṣtam

original: tatra abhinavakambalayogaṃ vaktur abhipretaṃ pramāṇopapannaṃ ca nihnutya navasaṃkhyāsaṃbandham adhyāropya tatpratiṣedhena paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate [kuto 'sya navakambalāḥ] iti tad eta sādhāraṇaśabde vāci chalaṃ vākchalam iti //
analyzed: tatra abhinava kambala yogam vaktuḥ abhipretam pramāṇa upapannam ca nihnutya nava saṃkhyā saṃbandham adhyāropya tad pratiṣedhena paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate kutas nava kambalāḥ iti tat sādhāraṇa śabde vāci chalam vākchalam iti

original: yathā ca kasyāṃcid avasthāyāṃ jalpādau chalādiprayogo yukta iti tadvyutpādanam e vaṃ paraprayuktasyāpi sataḥ praisamādhānam abhideheyam iti tad api vyutpādyate /
analyzed: yathā ca kasyāṃcid avasthāyām jalpa ādau chala ādi prayogaḥ yuktaḥ iti tad vyutpādanam para prayuktasya api sataḥ praisamādhānam iti tat api vyutpādyate

original: nava kambalā asyeti mama vivakṣitam iti kutaḥ pratipannam āyuṣmatā kim ayam abhinavakambalayogapratipādako na bhavaty eva bahuvrīhiḥ /
analyzed: nava kambalāḥ asya iti mama vivakṣitam iti kutas pratipannam āyuṣmatā kim ayam abhinava kambala yoga pratipādakaḥ na bhavati eva bahuvrīhiḥ

original: pakṣadvaye 'pi ca saṃbhavati /
analyzed: pakṣa dvaye pi ca saṃbhavati

original: yadi tāvad arthaprakaraṇādisāmarthyaparyālocanāvasitaniyatābhidheyavṛttiśandavyavahārābhijño 'si tadarthasiddham artham abhinavakambalasambandham eva buddhvā tūṣṇīm āsva /
analyzed: yadi tāvat tad artha siddham artham abhinava kambala sambandham eva buddhvā tūṣṇīm āsva

original: atha śuṣkatārkikakuṭumbakagarbhadāsa iva śabdavṛttānabhijña eva tvam tarhi pakṣadvayasaṃbhavena samśayāno mām eva pṛccha [kiṃ te vivakṣitam] iti /
analyzed: atha śuṣka tārkika kuṭumbaka garbha dāsaḥ iva śabda vṛtta anabhijñaḥ eva tvam tarhi pakṣa dvaya saṃbhavena samśayānaḥ mām eva pṛccha kim te vivakṣitam iti

original: niṣedhakas san vaktum upakramase //
analyzed: niṣedhakaḥ san vaktum upakramase

original: nanu tvam apy arthaprāptyādiphalaparyantaśabdaprayogapravṛttaḥ kim iti sādhāraṇam idam andhapadaprāyaṃ vacaḥ prayuṅkṣe ayi bāliśa tavaivehedam andhapadam //
analyzed: nanu tvam api artha prāpti ādi phala paryanta śabda prayoga pravṛttaḥ kim iti sādhāraṇam idam andha pada prāyam vacaḥ prayuṅkṣe ayi bāliśa tava eva iha idam andha padam

original: arthaprakaraṇādhīnaniyatasvārthavṛttitām /
analyzed: artha prakaraṇa adhīna niyata sva artha vṛtti tām

original: yo na jānāti śabdānāṃ sa evam apabhāṣate //
analyzed: yaḥ na jānāti śabdānām saḥ evam apabhāṣate

original: idam arthadvaye tāvat sādhāraṇapadaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: idam artha dvaye tāvat sādhāraṇa padam bhavet

original: jātiśabdāḥ punari vyaktisahasrākṣepakāriṇaḥ //
analyzed: jāti śabdāḥ vyakti sahasra ākṣepa kāriṇaḥ

original: spṛśanti niyataṃ vācyaṃ te 'pi prakaraṇādinā /
analyzed: spṛśanti niyatam vācyam te prakaraṇa ādinā

original: brāhmaṇān bhojuayetyādau tadbālena na śikṣitam //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān tat bālena na śikṣitam

original: tasmāc chabdārthasandehe prayoktā vā sa pṛcchyate /
analyzed: tasmāt śabda artha sandehe prayoktā vā sa pṛcchyate

original: na tv arthāntaram āropya tanniṣedho vidhīyate //
analyzed: na tu artha antaram āropya tad niṣedhaḥ vidhīyate

original: saṃbhavato 'rthasyātisāmānyayogād asadbhūtārthakalpanā sāmānyacchalam //1.2.13//
analyzed: saṃbhavataḥ rthasya ati sāmānya yogāt asat bhūta artha kalpanā sāmānyacchalam

original: ativyapakaṃ sāmānyam atisāmānyam /
analyzed: ati vyapakam sāmānyam ati sāmānyam

original: tadyogāt tatsaṃbhavāt kvacid vyaktārthasya kasyacit saṃbhavataḥ saṃbhāvyamānaniṣpatteḥ vaktrā 'bhihitasya sataḥ yā asadbhutarthakalpanā vaktur anabhipretātisāmanyahetutvakalpanā tayā ca pratyavasthānaṃ tatsāmānyanimittaṃ chalaṃ sāmānyacchalam //
analyzed: tad yogāt tad saṃbhavāt kvacid vyakta arthasya kasyacid saṃbhavataḥ saṃbhāvyamāna niṣpatteḥ vaktrā abhihitasya sataḥ yā asadbhuta artha kalpanā vaktuḥ anabhipreta ati sāmanya hetu tva kalpanā tayā ca pratyavasthānam tad sāmānya nimittam chalam sāmānyacchalam

original: yathā kvacid ucitopacāravacanārādhyamānapraguṇabrahmakule tatkathābahule rājakule kaścit sujanmā kaṃcid agrajanmānaṃ stauti [aho nu khalv asau brāhmaṇaḥ vidyā caraṇasaṃpannaḥ] iti /
analyzed: yathā kvacid ucita upacāra vacana ārādhyamāna praguṇa brahma kule tad kathā bahule rāja kule kaścid sujanmā kaṃcid agrajanmānam stauti aho nu khalu asau brāhmaṇaḥ vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ iti

original: tasmin prasaṅge tathāvidha evāparaḥ tam utsāhayan kathayati [saṃbhavati brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṇasaṃpat] iti /
analyzed: tasmin prasaṅge tathāvidhaḥ eva aparaḥ tam utsāhayan kathayati saṃbhavati brāhmaṇe vidyā caraṇa saṃpad iti

original: tatra piśunaśchalavādy āha [yadi brāhmaBe vidyācaraṇasaṃpat saṃbhavati tarhi vrātye 'pi brāhmaṇatvajātyanapāyāt sā bhavet] iti //
analyzed: tatra piśunaḥ chala vādī āha yadi vidyā caraṇa saṃpad saṃbhavati tarhi vrātye brāhmaṇa tva jāti anapāyāt sā bhavet iti

original: tatredam ativyāpakaṃ brāhmaṇatvasāmānyaṃ yato vidyācaraṇasaṃpadam atyeti spṛśati ca tadyogāt brahmaṇavyktau /
analyzed: tatra idam ati vyāpakam brāhmaṇa tva sāmānyam yatas vidyā caraṇa saṃpadam atyeti spṛśati ca tad yogāt

original: saṃbhavataḥ vidyācaraṇasaṃpadrūpasyārthasya vaktrā 'bhihitasya sataḥ tatra vaktranabhimatam evātisāmānyahetutām āropya cchalavādī pratyavatiṣṭhata iti //
analyzed: saṃbhavataḥ vidyā caraṇa saṃpad rūpasya arthasya vaktrā abhihitasya sataḥ tatra vaktṛ anabhimatam eva ati sāmānya hetutām āropya chala vādī pratyavatiṣṭhate iti

original: atrottaraṃ kena brāhmaṇatvasyātra hetutvam abhihitam yad anaikāntikīkurvan pratyavasthito 'si /
analyzed: atra uttaram kena brāhmaṇa tvasya atra hetu tvam abhihitam yat anaikāntikīkurvan

original: saṃbhāvanāvacanam idaṃ stutyartham upanyastam /
analyzed: saṃbhāvanā vacanam idam stuti artham upanyastam

original: vidyācaraṇasaṃpadāṃ pātra< hi brāhmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: vidyā caraṇa saṃpadām hi brāhmaṇaḥ

original: sati brāhmaṇatve pūrvajanmopacitasukṛtapariṇāmāt bhavati vidyācaraṇasaṃpat /
analyzed: sati brāhmaṇa tve pūrva janma upacita sukṛta pariṇāmāt bhavati vidyā caraṇa saṃpad

original: na ca tad eva tasyā hetur iti //
analyzed: na ca tat eva tasyāḥ hetuḥ iti

original: yathā [saṃbhavanty asmin kṣetre śālayaḥ] iti kṣetrapraśaṃsāpare vākye preyukte naivaṃ vaktum āpadyate [yadi kṣetram eva śālisaṃbhavahetuḥ tarhi vinā 'pi halabalīvardādisāmagrīṃ mahatyavagrahe 'pi śālayo 'smin bhaveyuḥ] iti /
analyzed: yathā saṃbhavanti asmin kṣetre śālayaḥ iti kṣetra praśaṃsā pare vākye preyukte na evam vaktum āpadyate yadi kṣetram eva śāli saṃbhava hetuḥ tarhi vinā hala balīvarda ādi sāmagrīm mahati avagrahe smin bhaveyuḥ iti

original: tad idam arthavādagatyanabhijñasya bhavataḥ bhāṣitam ity āstām etat /
analyzed: tat idam arthavāda gati anabhijñasya bhavataḥ bhāṣitam iti āstām etat

original: idaṃ tu bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmi bho mahātman svabhāvaśuddhā pariniścitārthasaṃsparśinī puṇyasahasralabhyā /
analyzed: idam tu bhavantam pṛcchāmi bho mahātman svabhāva śuddhā pariniścita artha saṃsparśinī puṇya sahasra labhyā

original: kenedṛśī sarvajanānukūlā kalyāṇinī te niramāyi vāṇī //
analyzed: kena īdṛśī sarva jana anukūlā kalyāṇinī te niramāyi vāṇī

original: dharmavikalpanirdeśe 'rthasadbhavapratiṣedhaḥ upacāracchalam //1.2.14//
abhidhānasya dharmaḥ anekaprakāraḥ /
analyzed: abhidhānasya dharmaḥ aneka prakāraḥ

original: mukhyayā vṛttyā gauṇyā vā lākṣaṇikayā vā yat arthe pratyāyanaṃ tad anena vikalpamānena dharmeṇa gauṇena lākṣaṇikena vā nirdeśe prayoge kṛte yaḥ arthasadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ mukhyārthaniṣedhaḥ sa upacāranimittaṃ chalaṃ upacāracchalam //
analyzed: mukhyayā vṛttyā gauṇyā vā lākṣaṇikayā vā yat arthe pratyāyanam tat anena vikalpamānena dharmeṇa gauṇena lākṣaṇikena vā nirdeśe prayoge kṛte yaḥ artha sadbhāva pratiṣedhaḥ mukhya artha niṣedhaḥ sa upacāra nimittam chalam upacāracchalam

original: yathā [maṃcāḥ krośanti] ity ukte chalavādy āha [katham acetanāḥ kāṣṭharacanātmānaḥ maṃcāḥ krośanti maṃcasthāḥ puruṣā ete krośanti na maṃcāḥ] iti //
analyzed: yathā maṃcāḥ krośanti iti ukte chala vādī āha katham acetanāḥ kāṣṭha racanā ātmānaḥ maṃcāḥ krośanti maṃca sthāḥ puruṣāḥ ete krośanti na maṃcāḥ iti

original: atra samādhiḥ vṛddhavyavahārāc chabdārthavyutpattiḥ /
analyzed: atra samādhiḥ vṛddha vyavahārāt śabda artha vyutpattiḥ

original: tatra ca kevalayaiva mukhyayā vṛttyā śabdāḥ pravartamānāḥ dṛśyante vṛttyantaravyavahārasyāpi suprasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: tatra ca kevalayā eva mukhyayā vṛttyā śabdāḥ pravartamānāḥ dṛśyante vṛtti antara vyavahārasya api su prasiddha tvāt

original: na ca nirnimittam eva paraśabdaṃ paratra prayuktavanto vayam sahacāraṇādisutraniveditanimittanikurumbānyatamanimittapūrvakatvāt asya prayogasya /
analyzed: na ca nirnimittam eva para śabdam paratra prayuktavantaḥ vayam sahacāraṇa ādi sutra nivedita nimitta nikurumba anyatama nimitta pūrvaka tvāt asya prayogasya

original: sthānād ayaṃ tavad upacāraḥ /
analyzed: sthānāt ayam ta vat upacāraḥ

original: sa tvaṃ gauṇalākṣaṇikādiśabdaprayogāvagatibāhya eva ya evaṃ pratyavatiṣṭhate //
analyzed: sa tvam gauṇa lākṣaṇika ādi śabda prayoga avagati bāhyaḥ eva yaḥ evam pratyavatiṣṭhate

original: gauṇalākṣaṇikayoḥ kathaṃ viśeṣaḥ iti cet ucyate satyaṃ gauṇe 'pi lakṣaṇā vidyate /
analyzed: gauṇa lākṣaṇikayoḥ katham viśeṣaḥ iti ced ucyate satyam gauṇe lakṣaṇā vidyate

original: evaṃsati gośabdaḥ svārtham abhidhāya sāsnādimantaṃ tadīyān guṇān eva jāḍyamauḍhyatiṣṭhan mūtraṇādīn lakṣayati /
analyzed: evaṃsati go śabdaḥ svārtham abhidhāya sāsnādimantam tadīyān guṇān eva jāḍya mauḍhya tiṣṭhan mūtraṇa ādīn lakṣayati

original: na tu tāvaty eva viramati /
analyzed: na tu tāvatī eva viramati

original: sa tu sāmānādhikaraṇyena vāhīke 'pi pravartate /
analyzed: sa tu sāmānādhikaraṇyena pravartate

original: [gaur vāhīkaḥ] ity evaṃ prayujyamānaḥ sa gauṇo bhavati //
analyzed: gauḥ vāhīkaḥ iti evam prayujyamānaḥ sa gauṇaḥ bhavati

original: yas tu svārthābhidhānānantaraṃ taditaram arthaṃ guṇam aguṇaṃ vā lakṣayaty eva na sāmānādhikaraṇyena paratra prayujyate śabdaḥ sa lākṣaṇiko bhavati [gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ prativasati] iti /
analyzed: yaḥ tu svārtha abhidhāna anantaram tad itaram artham guṇam aguṇam vā lakṣayati eva na sāmānādhikaraṇyena paratra prayujyate śabdaḥ sa lākṣaṇikaḥ bhavati gaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ prativasati iti

original: tathā coktaṃ [gauṇe hi prayogaḥ na lakṣaṇāyām] ity alaṃ śāstrāntarodgāragahanābhiḥ kathābhiḥ //
analyzed: tathā ca uktam gauṇe hi prayogaḥ na lakṣaṇāyām iti alam śāstra antara udgāra gahanābhiḥ kathābhiḥ

original: mukhyam artham atha lākṣaṇikaṃ vā gauṇam apy avagamayya ca śabdaḥ /
analyzed: mukhyam artham atha lākṣaṇikam vā gauṇam api avagamayya ca śabdaḥ

original: lokavedavihitaṃ vyavahāraṃ santanoti tadabhijñamatīnām //
analyzed: loka veda vihitam vyavahāram santanoti tad abhijña matīnām

original: kuryād ākṣepaṃ yaś ca bhākte prayoge mukhyaṃ matvārthaṃ tatra vaktur na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: kuryāt ākṣepam yaḥ ca bhākte prayoge mukhyam matvā artham tatra vaktuḥ na doṣaḥ

original: tena tv ātmīyaṃ śabdavṛttānabhijñaṃ rūpaṃ vyaktaṃ syād atre vṛddhāḥ pramāṇam //
analyzed: tena tu ātmīyam śabda vṛtta anabhijñam rūpam vyaktam syāt atre vṛddhāḥ pramāṇam

original: evaṃ chalasya viśeṣalakṣaṇāny abhidhāya tatparīkṣāṛtham ākṣepaṃ karoti vākcchalam evopacāracchalam tadaviśeṣāt //1.2.15//
analyzed: evam chalasya viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni abhidhāya tad parīkṣā ṛtham ākṣepam karoti vākcchalam eva upacāracchalam tad aviśeṣāt

original: na khalu vāgupacāracchalayoḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: na khalu vāc upacāra chalayoḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ

original: anekadhā śabdārthe saṃbhavati vaktrabhimatād arthād anyasya kalpanaṃ tatpratiṣedhanaṃ cobhayatrāpi samānam /
analyzed: anekadhā śabda arthe saṃbhavati vaktṛ abhimatāt arthāt anyasya kalpanam tad pratiṣedhanam ca ubhayatra api samānam

original: avāntaraviśeṣakṛtanānātvābhyupagame ca tadānantyaprasaṅgaḥ //
analyzed: avāntara viśeṣa kṛta nānātva abhyupagame ca tad ānantya prasaṅgaḥ

original: atra samādhim āha na tadarthāntarabhāvāt //1.2.16//
analyzed: atra samādhim āha na tad artha antara bhāvāt

original: naitad evam vākchalam evopacāracchalam iti tato 'rthāntaratvāt /
analyzed: na etat evam vākchalam eva upacāracchalam iti tatas rtha antara tvāt

original: vākchale hi [navakambalaḥ] iti navasu kambaleṣu nave ca kambale mukhyārtha eva śabdaḥ [sarāmaḥ] ityādivat /
analyzed: vāc chale hi nava kambalaḥ iti navasu kambaleṣu nave ca kambale mukhya arthe eva śabdaḥ sarāmaḥ ityādi vat

original: tatas tv ekataraṃ vaktur anabhipretaṃ chalavādinā ''ropya niṣidhyate /
analyzed: tatas tu ekataram vaktuḥ anabhipretam chalavādinā ropya niṣidhyate

original: upacāracchale tu kāṣṭhasanniveśe mukhyārthe maṃcaśabdaḥ puruṣe bhaktyā pravṛttaḥ /
analyzed: upacāra chale tu kāṣṭha sanniveśe mukhya arthe maṃca śabdaḥ puruṣe bhaktyā pravṛttaḥ

original: mukhyam abhidhāya ca gauṇaḥ pratyāyyo bhavati /
analyzed: mukhyam abhidhāya ca gauṇaḥ pratyāyyaḥ bhavati

original: na tv eṣa kramaḥ sādhāraṇaśabdeṣv iti mahān bhedaḥ //
analyzed: na tu eṣa kramaḥ sādhāraṇa śabdeṣu iti mahān bhedaḥ

original: vākcchale cārthasattaiva niṣidhyate [kuto 'sya nava kambalāḥ] iti /
analyzed: vāc chale ca artha sattā eva niṣidhyate kutas nava kambalāḥ iti

original: iha tu sato maṃcasya krośanaśaktir niṣidhyate //
analyzed: iha tu sataḥ maṃcasya krośana śaktiḥ niṣidhyate

original: samādhir api sādhāraṇaśabdānabhijñatāṃ parasya pradarśayatā vākchale vācyaḥ /
