analyzed: samādhiḥ api sādhāraṇa śabda anabhijña tām parasya pradarśayatā vākchale vācyaḥ

original: upacāracchale tu gauṇaśabdavṛttyanabhijñatām iti mahān viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: upacāra chale tu gauṇa śabda vṛtti anabhijña tām iti mahān viśeṣaḥ

original: aviśeṣe vā kiñcit sādharmyād anekacchalaprasaṅgaḥ //1.2.17//
analyzed: aviśeṣe vā kiñcid sādharmyāt aneka chala prasaṅgaḥ

original: chalasya dvitvam abhyanujñāya tritvaṃ bhavatā pratiṣidhyate yataḥ sāmānyacchalaṃ pārśve kṛtvā vāgupacāracchalayor abhedam abhihitavān asi /
analyzed: chalasya dvi tvam abhyanujñāya tri tvam bhavatā pratiṣidhyate yatas sāmānya chalam pārśve kṛtvā vāc upacāra chalayoḥ abhedam abhihitavān asi

original: yathā cāyaṃ tadaviśeṣād iti tritvapratiṣedhah tathā dvitvasyāpi kiñcit sādharmyasya sāmānyacchale 'pi bhāvāt //
analyzed: yathā ca ayam tad aviśeṣāt iti tri tva pratiṣedhaḥ tathā dvi tvasya api kiñcid sādharmyasya sāmānya chale bhāvāt

original: tathā hi yadi tāvad vāci nimittabhūtāyāṃ idaṃ pravṛeeaṃ chalam idaṃ ceti tadabhedaṃ manyase tarhi sāmānyacchalam api mā pṛthag vocaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi yadi tāvat vāci nimitta bhūtāyām idam chalam idam ca iti tad abhedam manyase tarhi sāmānya chalam api mā pṛthak vocaḥ

original: tad api hi na śarīre manasi buddhau vā pravṛttam api tu vācyeveti vākchalam evaikaṃ syāt //
analyzed: tat api hi na śarīre manasi buddhau vā pravṛttam api tu vācī eva iti vākchalam eva ekam syāt

original: athaivaṃ saty api tadviśeṣo dṛśyamānaḥ na parāṇudyate sāmānyacchale 'pi na śabdārtho 'nyathākṛtaḥ kin tu sāmānyasya hetutvam anuktam āropitam iti pṛthag iṣyate tarhi vāgupacāracchale api bhidyate eveti darśitam /
analyzed: athā evam sati api tad viśeṣaḥ dṛśyamānaḥ na parāṇudyate sāmānya chale pi na śabda arthaḥ nyathākṛtaḥ kin tu sāmānyasya hetu tvam anuktam āropitam iti pṛthak iṣyate tarhi vāc upacāra chale api bhidyate eva iti darśitam

original: ato yuktaṃ chalatritvam //
analyzed: atas yuktam chalatri tvam

original: na cānantyam iyattāniyamakāriṇaḥ nimittatrayasya darśitatvāt /
analyzed: na ca ānantyam iyat tā niyama kāriṇaḥ nimitta trayasya darśita tvāt

original: avāntarabhedakṛtaṃ tu tadānantyam iṣyate eva jātivad ity alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: avāntarabheda kṛtam tu tad ānantyam iṣyate eva jāti vat iti alam prasaṅgena

original: tasmāt parasparaviviktanijasvarūpaṃ īdṛk chalatritayam etad ihopadiṣṭam /
analyzed: tasmāt paraspara vivikta nija sva rūpam īdṛś chala tritayam etat iha upadiṣṭam

original: tasya kvacit svayam api kriyate prayogaḥ vācyaḥ parair abhihitasya tathā samādhiḥ //
analyzed: tasya kvacid svayam api kriyate prayogaḥ vācyaḥ paraiḥ abhihitasya tathā samādhiḥ

original: chalānantaraṃ jāter uddeśāt tasyās sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tāvad āha sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānaṃ jātiḥ //1.2.18//
analyzed: chala anantaram jāteḥ uddeśāt tasyāḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇam tāvat āha sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānam jātiḥ

original: atra traikālyasamādisakalaviśeṣasaṃgrahāya sādharmyavaidharmyādipadanirapekṣam eva pratyavasthānapadaṃ jātisāmānyalakṣaṇapratipādakam āhuḥ //
analyzed: atra traikālya sama ādi sakala viśeṣa saṃgrahāya sādharmya vaidharmya ādi pada nirapekṣam eva pratyavasthāna padam jāti sāmānya lakṣaṇa pratipādakam āhuḥ

original: pratīpaṃ avasthānaṃ pratyavasthānam /
analyzed: pratīpam avasthānam pratyavasthānam

original: tāvanmātram eva ca yat kiñcid uttaraṃ paraprayukte hetau jāyamānatvāj jātir ity abhidhīyate tad anupapannam pratyavasthānamātrasya sādharmyādinirapekṣasya jātitve hetvābhāsodbhāvanam api jātitām aśnuvīta //
analyzed: tāvanmātram eva ca yat kiñcid uttaram para prayukte hetau jāyamāna tvāt jātiḥ iti abhidhīyate tat anupapannam pratyavasthāna mātrasya sādharmya ādi nirapekṣasya jāti tve hetvābhāsa udbhāvanam api jāti tām aśnuvīta

original: atha tasya samyaguttaratvāt iha ca nirviśeṣaṇapratyavasthānamātropapādanāt phalguprāyam asaduttaraṃ jātitvena vivakṣitam ity ucyate tathāpi chalasya jā titva prasaktir aparihāryaiva /
analyzed: atha tasya samyak uttara tvāt iha ca nirviśeṣaṇa pratyavasthāna mātra upapādanāt phalgu prāyam asat uttaram jāti tvena vivakṣitam iti ucyate tathā api chalasya prasaktiḥ a parihāryā eva

original: tadvyudāsāya tu [tadanyatve sati] ityādikaṃ yadi kiñcid adhyāhriyate tad amuṣya śrūyamāṇasya sādharmyavaidharmyagrahaṇasyai ko doṣaḥ nanu traikālyasamādīnām asaṃgrahaḥ kiṃ na doṣaḥ na hi traikālyasamādiṣu sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā pratyavasthānam astīti naiṣa doṣaḥ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyām ity asamāsakaraṇena dikpradarśanasya sucanāt /
analyzed: tad vyudāsāya tu tad anya tve sati ityādikam yadi kiñcid adhyāhriyate tat amuṣya śrūyamāṇasya sādharmya vaidharmya grahaṇa syai kaḥ doṣaḥ nanu traikālya sama ādīnām asaṃgrahaḥ kim na doṣaḥ na hi traikālya sama ādiṣu sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā pratyavasthānam asti iti na eṣa doṣaḥ sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām iti a samāsa karaṇena diś pradarśanasya sucanāt

original: sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā katham eṣa hetuḥ hetur bhavatīti vā kim anena kriyate iti vā yad evaṃprakāraṃ pratyavasthānaṃ hetupratibibavartmanā kriyate sā jātiḥ ity ucyamāne bhaviṣyati sakalaviśeṣasaṅgrahaḥ /
analyzed: sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā katham eṣa hetuḥ hetuḥ bhavati iti vā kim anena kriyate iti vā yat evaṃprakāram pratyavasthānam hetu pratibiba vartmanā kriyate sā jātiḥ iti ucyamāne bhaviṣyati sakala viśeṣa saṅgrahaḥ

original: traikālyasamādiṣv api vā yādṛśasya tādṛśasya sādharmyavaidharmyaprakārasya yojayituṃ śakyatvāt /
analyzed: traikālya sama ādiṣu api vā yādṛśasya tādṛśasya sādharmya vaidharmya prakārasya yojayitum śakya tvāt

original: na hy udāharaṇasādharmyaṃ sādhyasādhanam iha vivakṣitam tadvaidharmyaṃ vā sādharmyādimātraṃ tu /
analyzed: na hi udāharaṇa sādharmyam sādhya sādhanam iha vivakṣitam tad vaidharmyam vā sādharmya ādi mātram tu

original: tatrāpi nātyantāya duravagamam iti yathāśrutam eva sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratavasthānaṃ jātir iti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ yuktam //
analyzed: tatra api na atyantāya duravagamam iti yathāśrutam eva sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratava sthānam jātiḥ iti sāmānya lakṣaṇam yuktam

original: atha bhedavattvāj fāteḥ caturviṃśatidhā vibhāgam āha sādharmyavaidharmyotkarṣāpakarṣavarṇyavikalpasādhyaprāptyaprāptiprasaṅgapratidṛṣṭāntānutpattisaṃśayaprakaraṇahetvarthāpattyaviśeṣopapattyupalabdhyanupalabdhinityānityakāryasamāḥ //5.1.1.//
analyzed: atha bhedavat tvāt fāteḥ caturviṃśatidhā vibhāgam āha sādharmya vaidharmya utkarṣa apakarṣa varṇya vikalpa sādhya prāpti aprāpti prasaṅga pratidṛṣṭānta anutpatti saṃśaya prakaraṇa hetu arthāpatti aviśeṣa upapatti upalabdhi anupalabdhi nitya anitya kārya samāḥ

original: atra samā iti striyāṃ puṃsi ca tulyatvān nirdeśasya jātyapekṣayā strīnirdeśo vā pratiṣedhāpekṣayā puṃnirdeśo vā varṇanīyaḥ /
analyzed: atra samāḥ iti striyām puṃsi ca tulya tvāt nirdeśasya jāti apekṣayā strī nirdeśaḥ vā pratiṣedha apekṣayā pum nirdeśaḥ vā varṇanīyaḥ

original: viśeṣalakṣaṇasūtreṣu punaḥ prāyeṇa pulliṅganirdeśo dṛśyate /
analyzed: viśeṣa lakṣaṇa sūtreṣu punar prāyeṇa pulliṅga nirdeśaḥ dṛśyate

original: sa tu pratiṣedhāpekṣayā teṣu vyākyeya iti tadvyākhyānāvasara eva vakṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: sa tu pratiṣedha apekṣayā teṣu vyākyeyaḥ iti tad vyākhyāna avasare eva vakṣyāmaḥ

original: nanu āstāṃ tāvad viśeṣalakṣaṇavarṇanam /
analyzed: nanu āstām tāvat viśeṣa lakṣaṇa varṇanam

original: idam eva tv ādau cintyatām /
analyzed: idam eva tu ādau cintyatām

original: kimartham evaṃvidham asaduttarajātaṃ śāstre vyutpādyate /
analyzed: kimartham evaṃvidham asat uttara jātam śāstre vyutpādyate

original: evaṃprakārāṇāṃ ca dhūliprakṣepasadṛśānāṃ sāretaraparīkṣaṇakṣamavicakṣaṇopekṣaṇīyānām asaduttarāṇāṃ ānantyāt caturviṃśatisaṃkhyāpi katham iti mahān vismayo 'smākam //
analyzed: evaṃprakārāṇām ca dhūli prakṣepa sadṛśānām sāra itara parīkṣaṇa kṣama vicakṣaṇa upekṣaṇīyānām asat uttarāṇām ānantyāt caturviṃśati saṃkhyā api katham iti mahān vismayaḥ smākam

original: yad api ca tattvādhyavasāyasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ tatprayojanam abhidhīyate tad api na hṛdayaṅgamam asaduttaropanyāsena tattvādhyavasāyasya saṃrakṣitum aśakyatvāt //
analyzed: yat api ca tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇam tad prayojanam abhidhīyate tat api na hṛdayaṅgamam asat uttara upanyāsena tattva adhyavasāyasya saṃrakṣitum aśakya tvāt

original: atha vikaṭāṭopaprakaṭanapāṭavopahitāparasaṃmohanadvāreṇa tadrakṣaṇaṃ āsthīyate tarhi niṣṭhīvanahasitatarjanāṃsamardanakaupīnāVaraṇavidāraṇacaraṇāvasphoṭanāḍy api vyutpādyatām iha mokṣavidyāyām //
analyzed: atha vikaṭa āṭopa prakaṭana pāṭava upahita apara saṃmohana dvāreṇa tad rakṣaṇam āsthīyate tarhi niṣṭhīvana hasita tarjana aṃsa mardana kaupīna āvaraṇa vidāraṇa caraṇa avasphoṭa nāḍī api vyutpādyatām iha mokṣa vidyāyām

original: api cedaṃ vicāryatām kva jātiprayogaiḥ pratyavastheyam samyaksādhane pareṇa prayukte tadābhāse vā na tāvat sādhanābhāse tasya hi yena nimittenā siddhatvādinā sādhanābhāsatvam upnataṃ tad eva tatra prayoktum ucitam jātayaḥ /
analyzed: api ca idam vicāryatām kva jāti prayogaiḥ pratyavastheyam samyak sādhane pareṇa prayukte tad ābhāse vā na tāvat sādhana ābhāse tasya hi yena nimittena siddha tva ādinā sādhana ābhāsa tvam tat eva tatra prayoktum ucitam jātayaḥ

original: tenaiva ca paraḥ parājīyate /
analyzed: tena eva ca paraḥ parājīyate

original: nāpi samyaksādhane tatra prayuktānām api tāsām akiñcitkratvāt /
analyzed: na api samyaksādhane tatra prayuktānām api tāsām a kiñcitkratvāt

original: na hi jātiprayogakaluṣitam api samyasādhanam asādhanībhavitum arhati //
analyzed: na hi jāti prayoga kaluṣitam api samyak sādhanam asādhanībhavitum arhati

original: athaikāntaparājayād varaṃ saṃdeha iti tābhir upakramyate tatrāpi na tathopakramamāṇaḥ kam iva pratyāyayet na nītividaḥ nītividas tāvaj jānanty eva [so 'yaṃ yathocitam abhivaditum apārayan kim apy ālajālam ālapituṃ pravṛttaḥ iti /
analyzed: atha ekānta parājayāt varam saṃdehaḥ iti tābhiḥ upakramyate tatra api na tathā upakramamāṇaḥ kam iva pratyāyayet na nīti vidaḥ nīti vidaḥ tāvat jānanti eva saḥ yam yathocitam abhivaditum a pārayan kim api āla jālam ālapitum pravṛttaḥ iti

original: śākaṭikādipratyāyanaṃ tu pratyantagahvarajanapadeṣu grāmyasadasi lābhādikāmasya kasyacit prayojanavad bhaved api kadācit na tu mokṣaśāstre tathāvidhopadeśaḥ peśala iti //
analyzed: śākaṭika ādi pratyāyanam tu pratyanta gahvara janapadeṣu grāmya sadasi lābha ādi kāmasya kasyacid prayojana vat bhavet api kadācid na tu mokṣa śāstre tathāvidha upadeśaḥ peśalaḥ iti

original: atrābhidhīyate samāhitam etad bhagavatā sutrakāreṇaiva [tattvādhyavasāyasaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ kaṇṭakaśākhāparivaraṇavat] iti vadatā /
analyzed: atrā abhidhīyate samāhitam etat bhagavatā sutra kāreṇa eva tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇa artham kaṇṭaka śākhā parivaraṇa vat iti vadatā

original: jalpavitaṇḍāṅgabhūtāni chalajātinigrahasthānāni /
analyzed: jalpa vitaṇḍā aṅga bhūtāni chala jāti nigrahasthānāni

original: tad uktaṃ [chalajātinigrahasthānānāṃ pṛthgupadeśa upalakṣaṇārthaḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam chala jāti nigrahasthānānām pṛthu upadeśaḥ upalakṣaṇa arthaḥ

original: upalakṣitānāṃ svavākye parivarjanaṃ paravākye ca paryanuyogaḥ /
analyzed: upalakṣitānām sva vākye parivarjanam para vākye ca paryanuyogaḥ

original: jātes tu pareṇa prayujyamānāyāḥ suvacaḥ samādhiḥ svayaṃ ca sukaraḥ prayogaḥ] iti //
analyzed: jāteḥ tu pareṇa prayujyamānāyāḥ su vacaḥ samādhiḥ svayam ca sukaraḥ prayogaḥ iti

original: yadā hi mumukṣoḥ āgamād vā yuktito vā tattvajñānam utpannaṃ na cāḍyāpi bhāvanābhyāsaprasādasamāsāditataddraḍhimātiśayaḥ vartate tasyām avasthāyāṃ yadi kenacit kim apy anumānaprāyam abhidhāya tadākulīkriyeta tadā 'sau viditayuktyāgamagauravo 'pi sapadi tadutpādite tattvajñāne manāṅasaṃbhāvanāleśam ivādhigacchet /
analyzed: yadā hi mumukṣoḥ āgamāt vā yuktitaḥ vā tattva jñānam utpannam na bhāvanā abhyāsa prasāda samāsādita tad draḍhima atiśayaḥ vartate tasyām avasthāyām yadi kenacid kim api anumāna prāyam abhidhāya tadā ākulīkriyeta tadā sau sapadi tad utpādite tattva jñāne iva adhigacchet

original: tasmin vā dṛḍhapratyaye 'pi tatpārśvavartinaḥ śiṣyāḥ śithilitāsthā bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: tasmin vā dṛḍha pratyaye tad pārśva vartinaḥ śiṣyāḥ śithilita āsthāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: ato jhaṭiti sa dūṣaṇam apaśyan pratipakṣaṃ jātiprayogair apy asau śamayed eva nodāsītety uktaṃ jalpalakṣaṇe //
analyzed: atas jhaṭiti sa dūṣaṇam a paśyan pratipakṣam jāti prayogaiḥ api asau śamayet eva na udāsīta iti uktam jalpa lakṣaṇe

original: paroditā vā jātīḥ pratyabhijñāya tatkṣaṇam eva parihared iti saphalaṃ jātivyutpādanam /
analyzed: para uditāḥ vā jātīḥ pratyabhijñāya tad kṣaṇam eva pariharet iti sa phalam jāti vyutpādanam

original: yathā kvacid aciravyuptasasye saṃpratyudbhidyamānakomalāṅkuranikaradanturitasīmani kedāre tadupadravaḥ drutataragāmino yataḥ kutaścana catuṣpadād dvipādā vā 'bhiśaṅkyata iti tatparihārāya samantato nirantarakaṇṭakaśākhāsantatiparicaraṇam ādhīyate evam ihāpi jātyādiprayogataduddhāradvārakaṃ tattvādhyavasāyasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam iti //
analyzed: yathā kvacid acira vyupta sasye saṃprati udbhidyamāna komala aṅkura nikara danturita sīmani kedāre tad upadravaḥ drutatara gāminaḥ yatas kutaścana catuṣpadāt dvi pādāḥ vā bhiśaṅkyate iti tad parihārāya samantataḥ nirantara kaṇṭaka śākhā santati paricaraṇam ādhīyate evam iha api jāti ādi prayoga tad uddhāra dvārakam tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇam kartavyam iti

original: yat tu vikalpitaṃ kva jāteḥ prayogaḥ samyaksādhane tadābhāseveti tad ucyate samyagdūṣaṇam apaśyatā kila jātyādi prayoktavyam /
analyzed: yat tu vikalpitam kva jāteḥ prayogaḥ samyak sādhane tad ābhāsā iva iti tat ucyate samyak dūṣaṇam a paśyatā kila jāti ādi prayoktavyam

original: tac ca saddūṣaṇādarśanaṃ samyaksādhane tadabhāvād eva bhavatu sādhanābhāse vā pramādādineveti ko 'tra viśeṣaḥ mumukṣos tu jñātatattvasya tatpratikūlavādinā kenacid ākṣiptasya tatprayukte tattvapratikṣepabalāt sādhanābhāsaviṣaya eva samyagdūṣaṇam apaśyataḥ jātiprayogāvasaraḥ /
analyzed: tat ca sat dūṣaṇa adarśanam samyak sādhane tad abhāvāt eva bhavatu sādhana ābhāse vā pramāda ādinā iva iti kaḥ tra viśeṣaḥ mumukṣoḥ tu jñāta tattvasya tad pratikūla vādinā kenacid ākṣiptasya tad prayukte tattva pratikṣepa balāt sādhana ābhāsa viṣaye eva samyak dūṣaṇam apaśyataḥ jāti prayoga avasaraḥ

original: jñtvā 'pi sādhanānām ābhāsatāṃ yathā tathā satvaram eva nirbhartsyatām ayaṃ durācāraḥ] iti pārśvasthitasukumāram atiśiṣyajanotsāhajananāya jātyādyāḍambaraviracamucitam eva mumukṣoḥ /
analyzed: jñtvā sādhanānām ābhāsa tām yathā tathā sa tvaram eva nirbhartsyatām ayam durācāraḥ iti pārśva sthita su kumāram ati śiṣya jana utsāha jananāya jāti ādi āḍambara viracam ucitam eva mumukṣoḥ

original: mumukṣuṃ prati ca śāstrārambhāt āṃjasyena tadapekṣayā sādhanābhāsaviṣaya eva jātiprayogaḥ /
analyzed: mumukṣum prati ca śāstra ārambhāt āṃjasyena tad apekṣayā sādhana ābhāsa viṣayaḥ eva jāti prayogaḥ

original: ata eva ca bhāsyakṛtā prathamaṃ sādhanābhāsā eva jātyudāharaṇaṃ darśitam //
analyzed: atas eva ca bhāsya kṛtā prathamam sādhana ābhāsāḥ eva jāti udāharaṇam darśitam

original: lābhādikānānāṃ tu samyaksādhane 'pi prayukte yukta eva jātyādupakramaḥ /
analyzed: lābha ādi kānānām tu samyak sādhane prayukte yuktaḥ eva jātyāt upakramaḥ

original: itarathā hi niśaṃśaya eva parājayaḥ syāḍ ity etac ca ānuṣaṅgikaṃ prayojanam ity uktam //
analyzed: itarathā hi niśaṃśayaḥ eva parājayaḥ syāt iti etat ca ānuṣaṅgikam prayojanam iti uktam

original: yat punar abhihitaṃ asaduttarakathane kathaṃ na capeṭādikaṃ prayujyata iti tad apy asat tasyātyantam alaukikatvāt /
analyzed: yat punar abhihitam asat uttara kathane katham na capeṭa ādikam prayujyate iti tat api asat tasya atyantam alaukika tvāt

original: loko hi tadaivaṃ manyeta nūnam eṣa na jānāti vaktuṃ sadṛśam uttaram /
analyzed: lokaḥ hi tadā evam manyeta nūnam eṣa na jānāti vaktum sadṛśam uttaram

original: anyathā vācam utsṛjya pāṇinā praharet katham //
analyzed: anyathā vācam utsṛjya pāṇinā praharet katham

original: khedayed vādinaṃ yas tu hastapādādicāpalaiḥ /
analyzed: khedayet vādinam yaḥ tu hasta pāda ādi cāpalaiḥ

original: sa saṃsady ucyate sadbhiḥ bhaṇḍa eva na piṇḍitaḥ //
analyzed: sa saṃsadi ucyate sadbhiḥ bhaṇḍaḥ eva na piṇḍitaḥ

original: jātyopakramamāṇas tu na tathaiṣa vihasyate /
analyzed: jātyā upakramamāṇaḥ tu na tathā eṣa vihasyate

original: na hi saṃdūṣaṇacchāyā tatrātyantam asaṅgatā //
analyzed: na hi saṃdūṣaṇa chāyā tatra atyantam asaṅga tā

original: tan na kaupīnavasanāpanayādisāmyaṃ jātyuttarāṇām iti //
analyzed: tat na kaupīna vasana apanaya ādi sāmyam jātyuttarāṇām iti

original: yat ty kas taiḥ pratyāyyat iti tan na na sarvaḥ sarvajñakalpo bhavati na ca śākaṭikatulyaḥ /
analyzed: yat kaḥ taiḥ iti tat na na sarvaḥ sarvajña kalpaḥ bhavati na ca śākaṭika tulyaḥ

original: santi hi madhyamadaśāvartinaḥ janāḥ /
analyzed: santi hi madhyamadaśāvartinaḥ janāḥ

original: ta ārodhhayiṣyanta ity alaṃ prasaṅgena //
analyzed: te ārodhhayiṣyantaḥ iti alam prasaṅgena

original: yat punaḥ asaduttarāṇām ānantyāt kathaṃ caturviṃśatisaṃkhyete tatrāpy ucyate saty apy ānantye jātīnām asaṃkīrṇodāharaṇavivakṣayā caturviṃśatiprakāratvam upavarṇitaṃ na tu tatsaṃkhyāniyamaḥ kṛta iti //
analyzed: yat punar asat uttarāṇām ānantyāt katham caturviṃśati saṃkhyete tatra api ucyate sati api ānantye jātīnām asaṃkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā caturviṃśati prakāra tvam upavarṇitam na tu tad saṃkhyā niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ iti

original: tad atra sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ aviśiṣyamāṇaṃ sthāpanāhetoḥ tatsādharmyasamā jātiḥ /
analyzed: tat atra sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam a viśiṣyamāṇam sthāpanā hetoḥ tad sādharmyasamā jātiḥ

original: sā ca sāḍharmyahetau vaidharmyahetau ca prayujyate vaidharmyeṇa pravartamānaṃ tathaiva vaidharmyasamā jātiḥ /
analyzed: sā ca sāḍharmya hetau vaidharmya hetau ca prayujyate vaidharmyeṇa pravartamānam tathā eva vaidharmyasamā jātiḥ

original: utkarṣāpakarṣābhyāṃ pratavasthānaṃ utkarṣāpakarṣasame jātī ity evaṃ sarvatra yojyam //
analyzed: utkarṣa apakarṣābhyām utkarṣa apakarṣa same jātī iti evam sarvatra yojyam

original: sthāpanāhetutaś cāviśeṣyamāṇatvaṃ jātivādyabhiprāyeṇa tāsāṃ draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: sthāpanā hetutaḥ ca a viśeṣyamāṇa tvam jāti vādi abhiprāyeṇa tāsām draṣṭavyam

original: jātivādī hy evaṃ vadati yathā bhavatprayuktaṃ sādhanaṃ tathedam api kim iti na bhavatīti /
analyzed: jāti vādī hi evam vadati yathā bhavat prayuktam sādhanam tathā idam api kim iti na bhavati iti

original: ata eva hetupratibimbanadvāraka eva jātyupanyāsa ity uktam //
analyzed: atas eva hetu pratibimbana dvārakaḥ eva jāti upanyāsaḥ iti uktam

original: atha viśeṣalakṣaṇāny āha /
analyzed: atha viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni āha

original: tatra sādharmyavaidharmyābhyām upasaṃhāre taddharmaviparyayopapatteḥ sādharmyavaidharmyasamau //5.1.2//
analyzed: tatra sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām upasaṃhāre tad dharma viparyaya upapatteḥ sādharmya vaidharmya samau

original: pratiṣedhāpekṣā puṃliṅganirdeśa iti tatra tatra draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: pratiṣedha apekṣā puṃliṅga nirdeśaḥ iti tatra tatra draṣṭavyam

original: tatra ca sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā sādhanam abhidhāya siṣādhayiṣitapakṣopasaṃhāre sādhanavādinā kṛte sādhyadharmaviparyayopapādanāya sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇaṃ sthāpanāhetutaḥ sādharmyasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ //
analyzed: tatra ca sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā sādhanam abhidhāya siṣādhayiṣita pakṣa upasaṃhāre sādhana vādinā kṛte sādhya dharma viparyaya upapādanāya sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam a viśiṣyamāṇam sthāpanā hetutaḥ sādharmyasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: udāharaṇaṃ tu anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvāt yat prayatnānantarīyakaṃ tat anityaṃ dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti sādharmyeṇa hetau prayukte jātivādī sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavatiṣṭhate nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayavatvāt /
analyzed: udāharaṇam tu anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt yat prayatna ānantarīyakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti sādharmyeṇa hetau prayukte jāti vādī sādharmyeṇa eva pratyavatiṣṭhate nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt

original: niravayavaṃ dravyaṃ ākāśādi nityaṃ dṛṣṭam iti /
analyzed: niravayavam dravyam ākāśa ādi nityam dṛṣṭam iti

original: na cātra viśeṣahetur asti ghaṭasādharmyāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād anityaḥ śabdaḥ na punaḥ ākāśasādharmyān niravayavatvān nityaḥ śabda iti //
analyzed: na ca atra viśeṣa hetuḥ asti ghaṭa sādharmyāt prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ na punar ākāśa sādharmyāt niravayava tvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: tathā 'traiva vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayavatvāt yat punar anityaṃ tat sāvayavaṃ dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭādi dravyam iti /
analyzed: tathā vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt yat punar anityam tat sa avayavam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa ādi dravyam iti

original: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ ghaṭasādharmyāt prayatnānantarīyakatvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ na punaḥ ghaṭavaidharmyāt niravayavatvāt nitya iti //
analyzed: na ca asti viśeṣa hetuḥ ghaṭa sādharmyāt prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ na punar ghaṭa vaidharmyāt niravayava tvāt nityaḥ iti

original: vaidharmyahetāv api sādhanādinā prayukte anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānanta rīyakatvāt yad anityaṃ na bhavati tat prayatnānantarīyakam api na bhavati ākāśādivat ity atra etad eva pūrvoktaṃ sādharmyavaidharmyapratyavasthānadvayam udāhartavyam iti //
analyzed: vaidharmya hetau api sādhana ādinā prayukte anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt yat anityam na bhavati tat prayatna ānantarīyakam api na bhavati ākāśa ādi vat iti atra etat eva pūrva uktam sādharmya vaidharmya pratyavasthāna dvayam udāhartavyam iti

original: yathā kvacid avasare svayaṃ prayogo jātīnām upayujyata iti tatsvarūpavyutpādanam upakrāntam evaṃ paraprayuktānāṃ tāsāṃ uttaram api vaktavyam /
analyzed: yathā kvacid avasare svayam prayogaḥ jātīnām upayujyate iti tad svarūpa vyutpādanam upakrāntam evam para prayuktānām tāsām uttaram api vaktavyam

original: atas tadvyutpādanārtham āha gotvād vosiddhivat tatsiddhiḥ //5.1.3//
analyzed: atas tad vyutpādana artham āha go tvāt tad siddhiḥ

original: sādharmyavaidharmyasamayor idam uttaram /
analyzed: sādharmya vaidharmya samayoḥ idam uttaram

original: yadi sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ vā sādhyasādhanaṃ pratijñāyeta syād iyam anavasthā /
analyzed: yadi sādharmya mātram vaidharmya mātram vā sādhya sādhanam pratijñāyeta syāt iyam anavasthā

original: bhavec ca bhavatprayuktānām īdṛśām api sthāpanāhetor aviśeṣah /
analyzed: bhavet ca bhavat prayuktānām īdṛśām api sthāpanā hetoḥ aviśeṣaḥ

original: viśiṣṭaṃ tu sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vā prayojakam ucyamānaṃ naivaṃvidhaiḥ pratyavasthānaiḥ upahanyate /
analyzed: viśiṣṭam tu sādharmyam vaidharmyam vā prayojakam ucyamānam na evaṃvidhaiḥ pratyavasthānaiḥ upahanyate

original: yathā saty api sattādisāmānyasaṃbandhe saty api śuklādiguṇasaṃbandhe saty api calanādikarmayoge na gauḥ tathātvena tatsādharmyāt siddhyati aśvādivaidharmyād vā kin tu avyabhicāriṇaḥ gotvādisaṃbandhād eva /
analyzed: yathā sati api sattā ādi sāmānya saṃbandhe sati api śukla ādi guṇa saṃbandhe sati api calana ādi karma yoge na gauḥ tathātvena tad sādharmyāt siddhi ati aśva ādi vaidharmyāt vā kin tu avyabhicāriṇaḥ go tva ādi saṃbandhāt eva

original: tathehāpy askhalitaniyamaṃ sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vā sādhyasiddhinibandhanam na sādharmyādimātram iti //
analyzed: tathā iha api a skhalita niyamam sādharmyam vaidharmyam vā sādhya siddhi nibandhanam na sādharmya ādi mātram iti

original: sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor dharmavikalpā ubhayasādhyatvāc cotkarṣāpakarṣavarṇyāvarṇyavikalpasādhyasamāḥ //5.1.4//
analyzed: sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vikalpāḥ ubhaya sādhya tvāt ca utkarṣa apakarṣa varṇya a varṇya vikalpa sādhyasamāḥ

original: dṛṣṭāntadharmaṃ sādhye dharmiṇi yojayan asantam adhyāropayan utkarṣeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ yat karoti sa utkarṣasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭānta dharmam sādhye dharmiṇi yojayan asantam adhyāropayan utkarṣeṇa pratyavasthānam yat karoti saḥ utkarṣasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvāt ghaṭavat ity ukte apara āha yadi prayatnānantarīyakatvāt ghaṭavad anityaḥ śabdaḥ ghaṭavad eva murto 'pi bhavati /
analyzed: yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ukte aparaḥ āha yadi prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ ghaṭa vat eva bhavati

original: na cen mūrtaḥ ghaṭavad anityo 'pi mā bhūd iti mūrtatvasya dharmāntarasya prasaṃjanam utkarṣasamaḥ //
analyzed: na ced mūrtaḥ ghaṭa vat anityaḥ mā bhūt iti mūrta tvasya dharma antarasya prasaṃjanam utkarṣasamaḥ

original: dṛṣṭāntadharmavikalpanenaiva sādhyadharmiṇi siddhasyāpi dharmasyāpakarṣeṇa pratyavasthānam apakarṣasamaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭānta dharma vikalpanena eva sādhya dharmiṇi siddhasya api dharmasya apakarṣeṇa pratyavasthānam apakarṣasamaḥ

original: pūrvasminn eva prayoge  ghaṭaḥ khalu prayatnānantarīyakas san aśrāvaṇo dṛṣṭaḥ evaṃ śabdo 'pi prayatnānantarīyakatvād aśrāvaṇo'stu /
analyzed: pūrvasmin eva prayoge ghaṭaḥ khalu prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ san aśrāvaṇaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ evam śabdaḥ api prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt

original: na ced aśrāvaṇaḥ ghaṭavad anityo 'pi mā bhūd iti sataḥ śrāvaṇatvasyāpasaraṇam apakarṣasamaḥ //
analyzed: na ced aśrāvaṇaḥ ghaṭa vat anityaḥ mā bhūt iti sataḥ śrāvaṇa tvasya apasaraṇam apakarṣasamaḥ

original: khyāpanīyaḥ varṇyaḥ pratipipādayiṣitaḥ sādhyadharmaḥ /
analyzed: khyāpanīyaḥ varṇyaḥ pratipipādayiṣitaḥ sādhya dharmaḥ

original: tadviparyayāt avarṇyaḥ siddhaḥ dṛṣṭāntadharmaḥ /
analyzed: tad viparyayāt avarṇyaḥ siddhaḥ dṛṣṭānta dharmaḥ

original: tāv etau varṇāvarṇyau viparyasyan itaram itareṇa samīkurvan pratyavasthānaṃ yat karoti tau varṇyāvarṇyasamau pratiṣedhau bhavataḥ /
analyzed: tau etau varṇa a varṇyau viparyasyan itaram itareṇa samīkurvan pratyavasthānam yat karoti tau varṇya a varṇya samau pratiṣedhau bhavataḥ

original: yadi śabdaḥ nityatvena varṇyate sādhyate ghaṭo 'pi varṇyatām iti varṇyasamaḥ /
analyzed: yadi śabdaḥ nitya tvena varṇyate sādhyate ghaṭaḥ pi varṇyatām iti varṇyasamaḥ

original: ghaṭaś cen na varṇyate śabdo 'pi mā varṇīty avarṇyasamaḥ //
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ ced na varṇyate avarṇyasamaḥ

original: dharmāntaravikalpena pratyavasthānaṃ vikalpasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: dharma antara vikalpena pratyavasthānam vikalpasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: tatraiva prayoge prayatnānantarīyakaṃ kiṃcin mṛdu dṛṣṭaṃ dukūlarāṅkavaśayyādi kiñcit kaṭhinaṃ karparaparaśvadhādi /
analyzed: tatra eva prayoge prayatna ānantarīyakam kiṃcid mṛdu dṛṣṭam dukūla rāṅkava śayyā ādi kiñcid kaṭhinam karpara paraśvadha ādi

original: evaṃ prayatnānantarīyakaṃ kiñcid anityaṃ bhaviṣyati ghaṭādi kiṃcin nityaṃ śabdādīti //
analyzed: evam prayatna ānantarīyakam kiñcid anityam bhaviṣyati ghaṭa ādi kiṃcid nityam śabda ādi iti

original: ubhayor api sādhyadṛṣṭāntayoḥ sādhyatvāpādanena pratyavasthānaṃ sādhyasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: ubhayoḥ api sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ sādhya tva āpādanena pratyavasthānam sādhyasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: yadi yathā ghaṭas tathā śabdaḥ prāptaṃ tarhi yathā śabdaḥ tathā ghaṭa iti /
analyzed: yadi yathā ghaṭaḥ tathā śabdaḥ prāptam tarhi yathā śabdaḥ tathā ghaṭaḥ iti

original: śabdaś ca anityatayā sāḍhya iti ghaṭo 'pi sādhya eva syāt /
analyzed: śabdaḥ ca anitya tayā sāḍhyaḥ iti ghaṭaḥ pi sādhyaḥ eva syāt

original: anyathā hi na tena tulyo bhaved iti //
analyzed: anyathā hi na tena tulyaḥ bhavet iti

original: atra paṃcānām uttaram kiñcit sādharmyāḍ upasaṃhārasiddher vaidharmyād apratiṣedhaḥ //5.1.5//
analyzed: atra paṃcānām uttaram kiñcid sādharmyāt upasaṃhāra siddheḥ vaidharmyāt apratiṣedhaḥ

original: kiñcit sādharmyād upasaṃhāraḥ siddhyati [yathā gauḥ evam ayaṃ gavayaḥ] iti /
analyzed: kiñcid sādharmyāt upasaṃhāraḥ siddhi ati yathā gauḥ evam ayam gavayaḥ iti

original: na tu sarvathā rūpābhedaḥ tayoḥ āpādayituṃ śakyaḥ /
analyzed: na tu sarvathā rūpa abhedaḥ tayoḥ āpādayitum śakyaḥ

original: pramāṇāvagatasvabhāvabhedānāṃ bhāvānām itaretararūpasaṃkarasya kartum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: pramāṇa avagata svabhāva bhedānām bhāvānām itaretara rūpa saṃkarasya kartum aśakya tvāt

original: evaṃ ca svapratibandhasādharmye susthite svasādhyam upasthāpayati sthāpanāhetau sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor dharmavikalpam āpāḍayatā vaidharmyaṃ ca kiñcid abhidadhatā pratiṣedhaḥ kartuṃ na labhyata iti //
analyzed: evam ca sva pratibandha sādharmye susthite sva sādhyam upasthāpayati sthāpanā hetau sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vikalpam āpāḍayatā vaidharmyam ca kiñcid abhidadhatā pratiṣedhaḥ kartum na labhyate iti

original: atha ṣaṣṭhasyottaram sādhyātodeśāc ca dṛṣṭāntopapatteḥ //5.1.6//
analyzed: atha ṣaṣṭhasya uttaram sādhya atas deśāt ca dṛṣṭānta upapatteḥ

original: yad ucyate ghaṭo 'pi śabdavat sādhyo bhavatv iti tan naviam laukilaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminn arhte buddhisāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: yat ucyate ghaṭaḥ pi śabda vat sādhyaḥ bhavatu iti tat laukila parīkṣakāṇām yasmin arhte buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: tenāViparītatayā śabde 'tidiśyate /
analyzed: tena a viparīta tayā śabde tidiśyate

original: yathā ghaṭaḥ prayatnānantarīyakaḥ san anityaḥ evaṃ śabdo ' pīti /
analyzed: yathā ghaṭaḥ prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ san anityaḥ evam śabdaḥ api iti

original: evaṃ sādhyātideśāt dṛṣṭānta upapadyamāne na tasya sādhyatvābhidhānam upapadyate //
analyzed: evam sādhya atideśāt dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne na tasya sādhya tva abhidhānam upapadyate

original: prāpya sādhyam aprāpya va hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvād aprāpyāsādhakatvāc ca prāptyaprāptisamau//5.1.7//
analyzed: prāpya sādhyam a prāpya hetoḥ prāptyā a viśiṣṭa tvāt a prāpya a sādhaka tvāt ca

original: prāptyaprāptivikalpanapūrvakam ubhatrāpi doṣāpādānaṃ prāptyaprāptisamaupratiṣedhau bhavataḥ hetau sādhanavādinā prayukte para āha [so 'yaṃ hetuḥ prāpya vāsādhyaṃ sādhayet aprāpya vā] prāpya cet dvayor labdhasvarūpayor eva prāptir bhavatīti /
analyzed: prāpti aprāpti vikalpana pūrvakam ubhatra api doṣa apādānam bhavataḥ hetau sādhana vādinā prayukte paraḥ āha saḥ yam hetuḥ prāpya vā asādhyam sādhayet a prāpya vā prāpya ced dvayoḥ labdha svarūpayoḥ eva prāptiḥ bhavati iti

original: kiṃ kasya sādhyam sādhanaṃ vety aviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: kim kasya sādhyam sādhanam vā iti aviśeṣaḥ

original: aprāpyatu sādhakatvam anupapannaṃ atprśaṅgāṭ/
analyzed: sādhaka tvam anupapannam

original: na hy aprāpya pradīpaḥ prakāśyaṃ prakāśayed iti //
analyzed: na hi a prāpya pradīpaḥ prakāśyam prakāśayet iti

original: anayor uttaram ghaṭāḍiniṣpatteḥ pīḍane cābhicārād apratiṣedhaḥ //5.1.8//
analyzed: anayoḥ uttaram pīḍane ca abhicārāt apratiṣedhaḥ

original: nāyaṃ pratiṣedhaupapadyate ubhayathā 'pi kāraṇabhāvasya darśanāt /
analyzed: na ayam ubhayathā kāraṇa bhāvasya darśanāt

original: daṇḍacakrasūtrādikārakāni prāpya mṛdaṃ ghaṭādikāryaṃ niṣpādayanti dṛśyante /
analyzed: daṇḍa cakra sūtra ādi kārakāni prāpya mṛdam ghaṭa ādi kāryam niṣpādayanti dṛśyante

original: abhicārakarmaṇā ca śyenādinā durasthasyāpi śatroḥ pāṭanaṃ saṃpādyate iti //
analyzed: abhicāra karmaṇā ca śyena ādinā durasthasya api śatroḥ pāṭanam saṃpādyate iti

original: dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇānapadeśāt pratyavasthānāc ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṃgapratidṛṣṭāntasamau //5.1.9//
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇa anapadeśāt pratyavasthānāt ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṃga pratidṛṣṭānta samau

original: atiprasaṅgāpādanena pratyavasthānaṃ prasaṅgasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: atiprasaṅga āpādanena pratyavasthānam prasaṅgasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: pūrvodāhṛta eva hetau yady apy anityatve prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ sādhanam /
analyzed: pūrva udāhṛte eva hetau yadi api anitya tve prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam sādhanam

original: prayatnānantarīyakatve idānīṃ kiṃ sādhanam tatsādhane kim iti dṛṣṭāntasya ghaṭāder anityatāyāṃ kāraṇaṃ na kiñcid apadiśyate /
analyzed: prayatna ānantarīyaka tve idānīm kim sādhanam tad sādhane kim iti dṛṣṭāntasya ghaṭa ādeḥ anitya tāyām kāraṇam na kiñcid apadiśyate

original: tena tatkāraṇānveṣaṇātiprasaṅgāt prasaṅgasamo 'yaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ //
analyzed: tena tad kāraṇa anveṣaṇa atiprasaṅgāt prasaṅgasamaḥ yam pratiṣedhaḥ

original: pratidṛṣṭāntena pratyavasthānaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: pratidṛṣṭāntena pratyavasthānam pratidṛṣṭāntasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: yathā ghaṭaḥ prayatnānantarīyakas san anityo dṛṣṭaḥ evam ākāśaṃ prayatnānantarīyakaṃ nityaṃ dṛśyate tadvac chabdo 'pi nityaḥ syād iti /
analyzed: yathā ghaṭaḥ prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ san anityaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ evam ākāśam prayatna ānantarīyakam nityam dṛśyate tadvat śabdaḥ api nityaḥ syāt iti

original: kaḥ punar ākāśasya prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ vadet kūpakhananādinā ''kāśakaranaṃ manvāna evaṃ brūyād api kaścit //
analyzed: kaḥ punar ākāśasya prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam vadet kūpa khanana ādinā kāśa karanam manvānaḥ evam brūyāt api kaścid

original: nanu evam api vyabhicārodbhāvanam etat samyaguttaram nāsaduttaraprakāro jātiprayogaḥ naitad evam na hi hetor anaikāntikatvam udbhāvayann asau sādhur iva jātivādī pratyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: nanu evam api vyabhicāra udbhāvanam etat samyak uttaram na asat uttara prakāraḥ jāti prayogaḥ na etat evam na hi hetoḥ anaikāntika tvam udbhāvayan asau sādhuḥ iva jāti vādī pratyavatiṣṭhate

original: api tu pratidṛṣṭāntabalena nityatvam eva sādhayann utthita iti jātiprayoga evāyaṃ /
analyzed: api tu pratidṛṣṭānta balena nitya tvam eva sādhayan utthitaḥ iti jāti prayogaḥ eva ayam

original: hetvābhāsā api svarūpanigūhanapuraśaram aparahetupratibimbavartmanā pradarśyamānā jātitāṃ pratipadyanta eva //
analyzed: hetvābhāsāḥ api sva rūpa nigūhana pura śaram apara hetu pratibimba vartmanā pradarśyamānāḥ jāti tām pratipadyante eva

original: atra prasaṅgasamasya tāvad uttaram āha pradīpopādānaprasaṅgavinivṛttivat tadvinivṛttiḥ //5.1.10//
analyzed: atra prasaṅga samasya tāvat uttaram āha pradīpa upādāna prasaṅga vinivṛtti vat tad vinivṛttiḥ

original: asiddhaṃ hi nāma sādhyate na siddham tatra prayatnavaiphalyāt /
analyzed: asiddham hi nāma sādhyate na siddham tatra prayatna vaiphalyāt

original: sāndhakāre hi sadmani piṭharādipadārthadarśanāya pradīpam upāḍadadate laukikāḥ na dīpadarśanāya dīpāntaram āharantīti /
analyzed: sa andhakāre hi sadmani piṭhara ādi padārtha darśanāya pradīpam laukikāḥ na dīpa darśanāya dīpa antaram āharanti iti

original: antareṇāpi hi dīpāntarāṇi dṛśyata eva pradīpaḥ /
analyzed: antareṇa api hi dīpa antarāṇi dṛśyate eva pradīpaḥ

original: evaṃ laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ ghaṭādau prayatnānantarīyakatvasya siddhatvāt tatra kāraṇāpadeśo niṣprayojana iti /
analyzed: evam laukika parīkṣakāṇām ghaṭa ādau prayatna ānantarīyaka tvasya siddha tvāt tatra kāraṇa apadeśaḥ niṣprayojanaḥ iti

original: tasmān nāyam atiprasaṅāpādanasya viṣayaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na ayam atiprasaṅga āpādanasya viṣayaḥ

original: atha pratidṛṣṭāntasamasyottaram pratidṛṣṭāntahetutve ca nāhetur dṛṣṭāntaḥ //5.1.11//
analyzed: atha pratidṛṣṭānta samasya uttaram pratidṛṣṭānta hetu tve ca na ahetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: pratidṛṣṭānta eva sādhakabuddhyā yadi tvayopanyastaḥ tarhi viśeṣahetur vaktavyaḥ anena hetunā pratidṛṣṭānta eva sādhakaḥ na dṛṣṭānta iti /
analyzed: pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ eva sādhaka buddhyā yadi tvayā upanyastaḥ tarhi viśeṣa hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ anena hetunā pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ eva sādhakaḥ na dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti

original: na cāsau viśeṣe hetur ucyate /
analyzed: na ca asau viśeṣe hetuḥ ucyate

original: tasmān na pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ siddhihetur iti dṛṣṭānta eva sādhako bhavati /
analyzed: tasmāt na pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ siddhi hetuḥ iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva sādhakaḥ bhavati

original: pratidṛṣṭāntahetutve 'pi sthite sati ahetur dṛṣṭāntaḥ na hi sādhakaḥ syāt /
analyzed: pratidṛṣṭānta hetu tve sthite sati ahetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ na hi sādhakaḥ syāt

original: na ca tad astīty uktam /
analyzed: na ca tat asti iti uktam

original: ato nāhetur dṛṣṭāntaḥ //
analyzed: atas na ahetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: atha yathā pratidṛṣṭānto na sādhakaḥ evaṃ dṛṣṭānto 'pi mā bhūd ity anayā nītyā pratyavatiṣṭhate sa hanta tarhi pratidṛṣṭāntasya tāvad ahetutvaṃ svakaṇṭhena kathitam iti tasminn asādhake sati dṛṣṭānta eva sādhaka iti //
analyzed: atha yathā pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ na sādhakaḥ evam dṛṣṭāntaḥ mā bhūt iti anayā nītyā pratyavatiṣṭhate sa hanta tarhi pratidṛṣṭāntasya tāvat ahetu tvam sva kaṇṭhena kathitam iti tasmin asādhake sati dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva sādhakaḥ iti

original: prāg utpatteḥ kāraṇābhāvād anutpattisamaḥ //5.1.12//
analyzed: prāk utpatteḥ kāraṇa abhāvāt anutpattisamaḥ

original: anutpattyā pratyavasthānam anutpattisamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: anutpattyā pratyavasthānam anutpattisamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: prāktana eva prayoge jātivādy āha anitya ity utpattidharmaka ucyate /
analyzed: prāktane eva prayoge jāti vādī āha anityaḥ iti utpatti dharmakaḥ ucyate

original: yaś cotpattidharmakaḥ tasyotpatteḥ pūrvam anutpattyā bhavitavyam /
analyzed: yaḥ ca utpatti dharmakaḥ tasya utpatteḥ pūrvam anutpattyā bhavitavyam

original: anutpanne ca śabdākhya dharmiṇi prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ dharmaḥ kva vartatām alabdhapakṣavṛttiś ca katham anityatvaṃ sādhayatu /
analyzed: anutpanne ca śabda ākhya dharmiṇi prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam dharmaḥ kva vartatām alabdha pakṣa vṛttiḥ ca katham anitya tvam sādhayatu

original: asiddhe cānityatve śabdasya balān nityatvam eva bhavati kāraṇābhāvād iti /
analyzed: asiddhe ca anitya tve śabdasya balāt nitya tvam eva bhavati kāraṇa abhāvāt iti

original: anityatvasiddhikāraṇasya prayatnānantarīyakatvasyābhāvād ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: anitya tva siddhi kāraṇasya prayatna ānantarīyaka tvasya abhāvāt iti arthaḥ

original: atha vā śabdotpādakakāraṇābhāvād anutpanne śabde nirāśrayo hetur iti //
analyzed: atha vā śabda utpādaka kāraṇa abhāvāt anutpanne śabde nirāśrayaḥ hetuḥ iti

original: asyottaram tathābhāvād utpannasya kāraṇopapatteḥ na kāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ //5.1.13//
analyzed: asya uttaram tathābhāvāt utpannasya kāraṇa upapatteḥ na kāraṇa pratiṣedhaḥ

original: śabdākhyadharmiṇaḥ siddhasya sataḥ nityatvam anityatvaṃ vā vicāryate /
analyzed: śabda ākhya dharmiṇaḥ siddhasya sataḥ nitya tvam anitya tvam vā vicāryate

original: tadasiddhau hi nityatvam api kasya bhavānabhidadhīta utpannasya cāsya tathā bhāvo bhavati nānutpannasya /
analyzed: tad asiddhau hi nitya tvam api kasya bhavān abhidadhīta utpannasya ca asya tathā bhāvaḥ bhavati na anutpannasya

original: utpannaḥ khalv ayaṃ śabda iti bhavati nānutpannaḥ /
analyzed: utpannaḥ khalu ayam śabdaḥ iti bhavati na anutpannaḥ

original: prāg utpatter alabdhātmanaḥ kim ucyate labdhasvarūpasya punaḥ anityatvakāraṇaprayatnānantarīyakatvasya sadbhāvād ayukta evāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ //
analyzed: prāk utpatteḥ alabdha ātmanaḥ kim ucyate labdha svarūpasya punar anitya tva kāraṇa prayatna ānantarīyaka tvasya sadbhāvāt ayuktaḥ eva ayam pratiṣedhaḥ

original: nityānityatvasādharmyāt saṃśayaḥ //5.1.14//
analyzed: nitya anitya tva sādharmyāt saṃśayaḥ

original: nityānityasādharmyopanyāsena saṃśayāpādanapravaṇaṃ pratyavasthānaṃ saṃśayasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: nitya anitya sādharmya upanyāsena saṃśaya āpādana pravaṇam pratyavasthānam saṃśayasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: [anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvāt] ity asminn eva hetau asti śabdasyānityasādharmyaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvam asti ca nityena sāmānyena sādharmyaṃ eindriyakatvam /
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt iti asmin eva hetau asti śabdasya anitya sādharmyam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam asti ca nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam eindriyaka tvam

original: ataḥ [kim anityasādharmyāt prayatnānantarīyakatvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ uta nityasādharmyāt eindriyakatvān nityaḥ] iti saṃśayaḥ evaṃ paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: atas kim anitya sādharmyāt prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ uta nitya sādharmyāt eindriyaka tvāt nityaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ evam paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate

original: na ca sādharmyasamaprayoga evāyam āśaṅkanīyaḥ saṃśayāpādanapravaṇatvād asyeti //
analyzed: na ca sādharmya sama prayogaḥ eva ayam āśaṅkanīyaḥ saṃśaya āpādana pravaṇa tvāt asya iti

original: asyottaram sādharmyāt saṃśayaḥ vaidharmyād ubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyantasaṃśayo nityatvānabhyupagamāc ca sāmānyasyāpratiṣedhaḥ //5.1.15//
analyzed: asya uttaram sādharmyāt saṃśayaḥ vaidharmyāt ubhayathā vā saṃśaye tyanta saṃśayaḥ nitya tva anabhyupagamāt ca sāmānyasya apratiṣedhaḥ

original: sthāṇur vā puruṣo veti sthāṇupuruṣayos sādharmyād ūrdhvatvādeḥ saṃśayo bhavati na tu śiraḥpāṇyādivaidharmyāt /
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti sthāṇu puruṣayoḥ sādharmyāt ūrdhva tva ādeḥ saṃśayaḥ bhavati na tu śiraḥ pāṇi ādi vaidharmyāt

original: pratyuta tato 7sau nivartate /
analyzed: pratyuta sau nivartate

original: yadi punar ubhayathā 'pi sādharmyād iva vaidharmyād api samśayaḥ syāt tathā saty atyantasaṃśayaḥ prāpnoti /
analyzed: yadi punar ubhayathā sādharmyāt iva vaidharmyāt api samśayaḥ syāt tathā sati atyanta saṃśayaḥ prāpnoti

original: iha cani viśeṣadarśanasthānīyam anityatvasādhanaṃ śabde prayatnānantarīyakatvam astīti nityatvaṃ sāmānyagataṃ saṃśayakāraṇam iti nābhyupagamyate/
analyzed: iha viśeṣa darśana sthānīyam anitya tva sādhanam śabde prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam asti iti nitya tvam sāmānya gatam saṃśaya kāraṇam iti na abhyupagamyate

original: tasmād apratiṣedho 'yaṃ nityasāmānyasādharmyanibandhanasaṃśayāpādanarūpaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt apratiṣedhaḥ yam nitya sāmānya sādharmya nibandhana saṃśaya āpādana rūpaḥ

original: ubhayasādharmyāt prakriyāsiddheḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ //5.1.16//
analyzed: ubhaya sādharmyāt prakriyā siddheḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ

original: pakṣapratipakṣau nirṇayalakṣaṇe vyākhyātau /
analyzed: pakṣa pratipakṣau nirṇaya lakṣaṇe vyākhyātau

original: tāv eva prakaraṇam /
analyzed: tau eva prakaraṇam

original: prakaraṇam anativartamānaḥ prakarṇasamaḥ pratiṣedho bhavati /
analyzed: prakaraṇam an ativartamānaḥ prakarṇasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati

original: pūrvasminn eva prayoge [nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayavatvāt ākāśavat] ity evaṃjātīyakaṃ pratiprayogamu upanyasya svapakṣam utthāpayati jātivādī /
analyzed: pūrvasmin eva prayoge nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt ākāśa vat iti evaṃjātīyakam upanyasya sva pakṣam utthāpayati jātivādī

original: sādharmyagrahaṇaṃ copalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: sādharmya grahaṇam ca upalakṣaṇam

original: vaidharmyeṇāpi pratiprayogopanyāse prakaraṇasama eva pratiṣedho bhavati /
analyzed: vaidharmyeṇa api pratiprayoga upanyāse prakaraṇasamaḥ eva pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati

original: ubhayavaidharmyāt prakriyāsiddheḥ prakaraṇasama iti /
analyzed: ubhaya vaidharmyāt prakriyā siddheḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ iti

original: mūlahetāv api sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā prayukte prayogadvayam etad veditavyam //
analyzed: mūla hetau api sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā prayukte prayoga dvayam etat veditavyam

original: nanu ca te evaite sādharmyavaidharmyasame jātī sādharmyahetau vaidharmyahetau vā prayujumānatvāc caturdhā sthite iti tābhyām eva gatatvāt nābhinavo 'yaṃ jātiprayogaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ca te eva ete sādharmya vaidharmya same jātī sādharmya hetau vaidharmya hetau vā prayujumāna tvāt caturdhā sthite iti tābhyām eva gata tvāt na abhinavaḥ yam jāti prayogaḥ

original: catasraś caite jātaya ity ekatvam api na saṅgatam ucyate tatra parapakṣapratiṣedhapravaṇatayaiva pratyavasthānam udāhṛtam ihatu pakṣasādhanacchāyayeti /
analyzed: catasraḥ ca ete jātayaḥ iti ekatvam api na saṅgatam ucyate tatra parapakṣa pratiṣedha pravaṇa tayā eva pratyavasthānam udāhṛtam iha tu pakṣa sādhana chāyayā iti

original: ata eva prakaraṇasamo 'yam ucyate jātiḥ /
analyzed: atas eva prakaraṇasamaḥ yam ucyate jātiḥ

original: anityapakṣavan nityapakṣo 'pi pratikriyate 'smākam iti /
analyzed: anitya pakṣa vat nitya pakṣaḥ u pi pratikriyate smākam iti

original: udbhāvanabhaṅgibhedāc ca jātinānātvam /
analyzed: udbhāvana bhaṅgi bhedāt ca jāti nānātvam

original: asaṅkīrṇodāharaṇavivakṣayā caturviṃśabhedatvam /
analyzed: asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā caturviṃśa bheda tvam

original: vastutas tu tāsām ānntyam ity uktam //
analyzed: vastutas tu tāsām ānntyam iti uktam

original: atrottaram pratipakṣāt prakaraṇasiddheḥ pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ pratipakṣopapatteḥ //5.1.17//
analyzed: atra uttaram pratipakṣāt prakaraṇa siddheḥ pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ pratipakṣa upapatteḥ

original: nirṇayotpattyā prakaraṇaṃ paryavasitaṃ bhavati prāṅ nirṇayāt tadavastham eva /
analyzed: nirṇaya utpattyā prakaraṇam paryavasitam bhavati prāk nirṇayāt tad avastham eva

original: tad iha prakaraṇam utthāpayatā bhavatā ubhayasādharmyaṃ tadutthāpanakāraṇam abhihitam ubhayasādharmyāt prakriyāsiddher iti bruvatā /
analyzed: tat iha prakaraṇam utthāpayatā bhavatā ubhaya sādharmyam tad utthāpana kāraṇam abhihitam ubhaya sādharmyāt prakriyā siddheḥ iti bruvatā

original: ubhayasādharmyaṃ ca maduktam api sādharmyam asty eva anyathā ubhayaśabdārthaḥ kaḥ evaṃ ca tadabhyanujñātaṃ prakaraṇakāraṇaṃ sidhyatīti /
analyzed: ubhaya sādharmyam ca mad uktam api sādharmyam asti eva anyathā ubhaya śabda arthaḥ kaḥ evam ca tat abhyanujñātam prakaraṇa kāraṇam sidhyati iti

original: nirṇayotpattinimittaṃ ca prakaraṇoparamāya na kiñcid uktam ubhayasādharmyābhidhānād iti //
analyzed: nirṇaya utpatti nimittam ca prakaraṇa uparamāya na kiñcid uktam ubhaya sādharmya abhidhānāt iti

original: traikālyānupapatter hetor ahetusamaḥ //5.1.18//
analyzed: traikālya anupapatteḥ hetoḥ ahetusamaḥ

original: kālatrayānupapattyā hetum ākṣipya kriyamāṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ahetusamo bhavati /
analyzed: kāla traya anupapattyā hetum ākṣipya kriyamāṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ahetusamaḥ bhavati

original: hetuḥ sādhanaṃ /
analyzed: hetuḥ sādhanam

original: sādhanaṃ ca sādhyāt pūrvaṃ paścād vā saha vā bhavet yadi pūrvam asati sādhye tat kasya sādhanam atha paścāt sādhanaṃ pūrvaṃ sādhyam tad asati sādhane kasyedaṃ sādhyaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: sādhanam ca sādhyāt pūrvam paścāt vā saha vā bhavet yadi pūrvam asati sādhye tat kasya sādhanam atha paścāt sādhanam pūrvam sādhyam tat asati sādhane kasya idam sādhyam bhavet

original: pūrvasiddhe vā sādhye kiṃ sādhanena atha yugapat sādhyasādhane bhavataḥ na tarhi tayoḥ savyetaragoviṣāṇayor iva sādhyasādhanabhāvo bhavet ity evam ayaṃ hetuḥ ahetor na viśiṣyate //
analyzed: pūrva siddhe vā sādhye kim sādhanena atha yugapad sādhya sādhane bhavataḥ na tarhi tayoḥ savyetara go viṣāṇayoḥ iva sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ bhavet iti evam ayam hetuḥ ahetoḥ na viśiṣyate

original: asyottaram na hetutvas sādhyasiddhes traikālyāsiddhiḥ //5.1.19//
analyzed: asya uttaram na sādhya siddheḥ traikālya asiddhiḥ

original: na traikālyāsiddhiḥ /
analyzed: na traikālya asiddhiḥ

original: kasmāt hetutaḥ sādhyasiddheḥ /
analyzed: kasmāt hetutaḥ sādhya siddheḥ

original: utpattau tāvad ayaṃ paryanuyogaḥ pūrvasiddhena hetunā tantvādinā paścād bhāvino 'sata eva kāryasya paṭādeḥ siddhir ity uktatvāt /
analyzed: utpattau tāvat ayam paryanuyogaḥ pūrva siddhena hetunā tantu ādinā paścāt sataḥ eva kāryasya paṭa ādeḥ siddhiḥ iti ukta tvāt

original: [buddhisiddhaṃ tu tad asat] iti /
analyzed: buddhi siddham tu tat asat iti

original: jñaptāv api parihṛta eṣa doṣaḥ upalabdhihetoḥ upalabdhiviṣayasya cārthasya pūrvāparasahabhāvāniyamāt /
analyzed: jñaptau api parihṛtaḥ eṣa doṣaḥ upalabdhi hetoḥ upalabdhi viṣayasya ca arthasya pūrva apara sahabhāva aniyamāt

original: yathādarśanaṃ vyavastheti pramāṇaparīkṣayām abhidhānāt /
analyzed: yathādarśanam vyavasthā iti pramāṇa parīkṣayām abhidhānāt

original: dṛśyate ca nirvartanahetunā nirvartanīyanirvṛttiḥ upalabdhihetunā ca upalabhyasyopalambhaḥ iti /
analyzed: dṛśyate ca nirvartana hetunā nirvartanīya nirvṛttiḥ upalabdhi hetunā ca upalabhyasya upalambhaḥ iti

original: pramāṇasiddhe ca vastuni ko 'yam ākṣepaḥ pratiṣedhe ca tulyo 'yam anuyoga ity āha pratiṣedhānupapatteś ca pratiṣeddhavyāpratiṣedhaḥ //5.1.20//
analyzed: pramāṇa siddhe ca vastuni kaḥ yam ākṣepaḥ pratiṣedhe ca tulyaḥ yam anuyogaḥ iti āha pratiṣedha anupapatteḥ ca pratiṣeddhavya apratiṣedhaḥ

original: pratiṣedho 'pi pratiṣedhyāt purvaṃ paścāt saha vā bhavet iti vikalpyamāne na pratiṣeddhavyaṃ pratiṣeddhum utsahata iti //
analyzed: pratiṣedhyāt purvam paścāt saha vā bhavet iti vikalpyamāne na pratiṣeddhavyam pratiṣeddhum utsahate iti

original: arthāpattitaḥ pratipakṣasiddher arthāpattisamaḥ //5.1.21//
analyzed: arthāpattitaḥ pratipakṣa siddheḥ arthāpattisamaḥ

original: arthād āpadyate pratipakṣasiddhiḥ ity evaṃ kriyamāṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ arthāpattisamo bhavati /
analyzed: arthāt āpadyate pratipakṣa siddhiḥ iti evam kriyamāṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ arthāpattisamaḥ bhavati

original: pūrvasminn eva prayoge yadi ghaṭasādharmyāt prayatnānantarīyakatvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ arthād āpadyate ākāśasādharmyān nitya iti /
analyzed: pūrvasmin eva prayoge yadi ghaṭa sādharmyāt prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ arthāt āpadyate ākāśa sādharmyāt nityaḥ iti

original: asti cāsya nityena sādharmyam ākāśādinā dravyeṇa niravayavatvam iti /
analyzed: asti ca asya nityena sādharmyam ākāśa ādinā dravyeṇa niravayava tvam iti

original: udbhāvanaprakārabhedāc ca jātibheda ity kutam //
analyzed: udbhāvana prakāra bhedāt ca jāti bhedaḥ iti kutam

original: asyottaram anuktasyārthād āpatteḥ pakṣahāner upapattiḥ //5.1.22//
analyzed: asya uttaram anuktasya arthāt āpatteḥ pakṣa hāneḥ upapattiḥ

original: anupapāḍitasādhanam anuktam apy arthād āpadyata iti vadataḥ pakṣahānir apy upapadyate /
analyzed: anupapāḍita sādhanam anuktam api arthāt āpadyate iti vadataḥ pakṣa hāniḥ api upapadyate

original: māmakānityapakṣasiddhau hi satyām arthād āpadyate tāvakasya nityapakṣasya hānir iti //
analyzed: māmaka anitya pakṣa siddhau hi satyām arthāt āpadyate tāvakasya nitya pakṣasya hāniḥ iti

original: doṣāntaram āha anaikāntikatvāc cārthāpatteḥ //5.1.23//
analyzed: doṣa antaram āha anaikāntika tvāt ca arthāpatteḥ

original: ubhayapakṣasamāneyam arthāpattiḥ viparyayeṇāpi prayoktuṃ śakyatvāt /
analyzed: ubhaya pakṣa samānā iyam arthāpattiḥ viparyayeṇa api prayoktum śakya tvāt

original: [nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayavatvāt] ity evam apy ukte śakyaṃ vaktumyadi nityākāśasādharmyāt niravayavatvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ arthād āpadyate anityaghaṭādisādharmyāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād anitya iti /
analyzed: nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt iti evam api ukte śakyam vaktum yadi nitya ākāśa sādharmyāt niravayava tvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ arthāt āpadyate anitya ghaṭa ādi sādharmyāt prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ iti

original: na caivam api kācid arthasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: na ca evam api kācid artha siddhiḥ

original: na khalu vai ghanasya grāvṇaḥ patanam ity ukte arthād āpadyate dravasya variṇaḥ patanābhāva iti //
analyzed: na khalu vai ghanasya grāvṇaḥ patanam iti ukte arthāt āpadyate dravasya variṇaḥ patana abhāvaḥ iti

original: ekadharmopapatteḥ kvacid anupapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //5.1.25//
analyzed: eka dharma upapatteḥ kvacid anupapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ

original: aviśeṣopapādena pratyavasthānaṃ aviśeṣasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: a viśeṣa upapādena pratyavasthānam aviśeṣasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: yadi śabdaghaṭayor ekadharmaḥprayatnānantarīyakatvam astīti tayor anityatvāviśeṣa ucyate tarhi sarvabhāvānām aviśeṣaprasṅgaḥ /
analyzed: yadi śabda ghaṭayoḥ eka dharmaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam asti iti tayoḥ anitya tva aviśeṣaḥ ucyate tarhi sarva bhāvānām aviśeṣa prasṅgaḥ

original: katham sadbhāvopapatteḥ sattāsambandhād ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: katham sadbhāva upapatteḥ sattā sambandhāt iti arthaḥ

original: so 'yam aviśeṣasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ yam aviśeṣasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: etasyottaram kvacit taddharmopapatteḥ kvacid anupapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //5.1.25//
analyzed: etasya uttaram kvacid tad dharma upapatteḥ kvacid anupapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ

original: kvacid aviśeṣāpādanahetur upapadyate dharmaḥ kvacit nopapadyata ity evam ayam apratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: kvacid aviśeṣa āpādana hetuḥ upapadyate dharmaḥ kvacid na upapadyate iti evam ayam apratiṣedhaḥ

original: śabdaghaṭayor eko dharmaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvam asti yena tayor dharmāntaram anityatvam aviśeṣarūpam upapādyate /
analyzed: śabda ghaṭayoḥ ekaḥ dharmaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam asti yena tayoḥ dharma antaram anitya tvam aviśeṣa rūpam upapādyate

original: na tu sarvabhāvānām īdṛśam aviśeṣakāraṇaṃ dharmajātam asti //
analyzed: na tu sarva bhāvānām īdṛśam aviśeṣa kāraṇam dharma jātam asti

original: yat tu sadbhāvopapatter iti tena kiṃ dharmāntaram aviśeṣarūpaṃ sādhyeta anityatvam eveti cet tarhy ayaṃ pratijñāṛtho vyavatiṣṭheta [anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sattvāt] iti /
analyzed: yat tu sadbhāva upapatteḥ iti tena kim dharma antaram aviśeṣa rūpam sādhyeta anitya tvam eva iti ced tarhi ayam pratijñā ṛthaḥ vyavatiṣṭheta anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sattvāt iti

original: sa cāyam anupapannaḥ dṛṣṭāntānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ayam anupapannaḥ dṛṣṭānta anupapatteḥ

original: sarvabhāvānāṃ pakṣīkṛtatvāt /
analyzed: sarva bhāvānām pakṣīkṛta tvāt

original: dṛṣṭānto na kaścid avaśiṣyate /
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntaḥ na kaścid avaśiṣyate

original: na ca pratijñātaikadeśa eva dṛṣṭāntīkartuṃ śakyaḥ siddhasādhyabhedāt /
analyzed: na ca pratijñāta eka deśaḥ eva dṛṣṭāntīkartum śakyaḥ siddha sādhya bhedāt

original: sādhyaḥ pratiññāto 'rtho bhavati siddhaś ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: sādhyaḥ pratiññātaḥ rthaḥ bhavati siddhaḥ ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: na ca dṛṣṭāntarahito hetuḥ svasādhyopasthāpanasādmarthyam aśnute //
analyzed: na ca dṛṣṭānta rahitaḥ hetuḥ sva sādhya upasthāpana sādmarthyam aśnute

original: na ca saugatoktanītyā nityebhyo vyāpakānupalabdhyā sattvaṃ vyāvartitam anityeṣv eva pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate /
analyzed: na ca saugata uktanītyā nityebhyaḥ vyāpaka anupalabdhyā sattvam vyāvartitam anityeṣu eva pratiṣṭhām labhate

original: yaiva vipakṣād vyāvṛttiḥ sa eva sādhyenānugama iti vaktavyam tannīteḥ prāg eva pratikṣepāt /
analyzed: yā eva vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ saḥ eva sādhyena anugamaḥ iti vaktavyam tad nīteḥ prāk eva pratikṣepāt

original: pratyuktaṃ hi vistarataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhanam iti //
analyzed: pratyuktam hi vistarataḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga sādhanam iti

original: kiñcid dhi sattvayogi bhāvajātam anityaṃ bhavato kiṃcin nityaṃ iti nāyam ekāntaḥ sattvād anityāḥ sarve bhāvā iti //
analyzed: kiñcid hi sattva yogi bhāva jātam anityam bhavataḥ kiṃcid nityam iti na ayam ekāntaḥ sattvāt anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ iti

original: api ca sarvabhāvānām anityatve sādhyamāne tadantargatatvāc chabdabdasyāpy anityatvam abhyupagataṃ bhaved ity evam apy ayam apratiṣedhaḥ //
analyzed: api ca sarva bhāvānām anitya tve sādhyamāne tad antargata tvāt śabda bdasya api anitya tvam abhyupagatam bhavet iti evam api ayam apratiṣedhaḥ

original: ubhayakāraṇopapatter upapattisamaḥ //5.1.26//
analyzed: ubhaya kāraṇa upapatteḥ upapattisamaḥ

original: ubhayakāraṇopapattyā pakṣadvayopapattivarṇanam upapattisamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ //
yady anityatvakāraṇaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvam upapadyate śabdaseti anityaḥ śabdaḥ nityatvakāraṇam api niravayavayatvam asyopapadyata iti nityaḥ syāt /
analyzed: yadi anitya tva kāraṇam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam upapadyate anityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya tva kāraṇam api niravayavayatvam asya upapadyate iti nityaḥ syāt

original: ubhayatrāpi kāraṇopapatteḥ //
analyzed: ubhayatra api kāraṇa upapatteḥ

original: nanu saiveyaṃ sādharmyādisamā prakaraṇasamā vā jātiḥ na bhedāntaram maivam udbhāvanāprakāreṇa bhedāt /
analyzed: nanu sā evā iyam sādharmya ādi samā prakaraṇa samā vā jātiḥ na bheda antaram mā evam udbhāvanā prakāreṇa bhedāt

original: parapakṣopamardabuddhyā sādharmyāḍisamā jātiḥ prasajyate /
analyzed: parapakṣa upamarda buddhyā sādharmya āḍisamā jātiḥ prasajyate

original: pakṣāntarotthāpanāsthayā prakaraṇasamā /
analyzed: pakṣa antara utthāpana āsthayā prakaraṇa samā

original: apratipattiparyavasāyitvāśayeneyam upapattisameti //
analyzed: apratipatti paryavasāyi tva āśayena iyam upapatti samā iti

original: atrottaram upapattikāraṇānujñānād apratiṣedhaḥ ubhayakāraṇopapattyā pratiṣedham abhidadhatā pakṣadvayakāraṇopapattiḥ anujñātā bhavati /
analyzed: atra uttaram upapatti kāraṇa anujñānāt apratiṣedhaḥ ubhaya kāraṇa upapattyā pratiṣedham abhidadhatā pakṣa dvaya kāraṇa upapattiḥ anujñātā bhavati

original: sā ced anujñātā katham ekatarapakṣapratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: sā ced anujñātā katham ekatara pakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ

original: ekatarapakṣapratiṣedhaś cet katham ubhayakāraṇopapattiḥ /
analyzed: ekatara pakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ ced katham ubhaya kāraṇa upapattiḥ

original: ubhayapakṣakāraṇopapattiḥ ekatarapakṣapratiṣedhaś ceti vipratiṣiddham /
analyzed: ubhaya pakṣa kāraṇa upapattiḥ ekatara pakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham

original: vyāghātād eva tatapratiṣedho avakalpata iti cet samāno vyāghātaḥ /
analyzed: vyāghātāt eva tata pratiṣedhaḥ avakalpate iti ced samānaḥ vyāghātaḥ

original: tena hi parapakṣavat svapakṣo 'pi pratihanyata iti /
analyzed: tena hi para pakṣa vat sva pakṣaḥ u pi pratihanyate iti

original: na hi vyāghāta ekaṃ pakṣaṃ sādhayati ekaṃ bādhata iti //
analyzed: na hi vyāghātaḥ ekam pakṣam sādhayati ekam bādhate iti

original: nirdiṣṭakāraṇābhāve 'py upalambhād upalabdhisamaḥ nirdiṣṭasya sādhyadharmasiddhikāraṇasyābhāve 'pi sādhyadharmopalabdhyā pratyavasthānaṃ upalabdhisamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: nirdiṣṭa kāraṇa abhāve pi upalambhāt upalabdhisamaḥ nirdiṣṭasya sādhya dharma siddhi kāraṇasya abhāve pi sādhya dharma upalabdhyā pratyavasthānam upalabdhisamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: yad etad anityatāyāṃ śabdasya prayanānantarīyakatvaṃ kāraṇam upadiṣṭam tasyābhāve 'pi prabalaprabhaṃjanajavabhajyamānajaratpādapapātaprabhave 'pi śabde dṛśyata evānityatvam /
analyzed: yat etat anitya tāyām śabdasya prayana ānantarīyaka tvam kāraṇam upadiṣṭam tasya abhāve pi śabde dṛśyate eva anitya tvam

original: anyatrāpi vidyudādau vinā 'pi prayatnānantarīyakatvam upalabhyata evānityateti //
analyzed: anyatra api vidyut ādau vinā pi prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam upalabhyate eva anitya tā iti

original: asyottaram kāraṇāntarād api taddharmopapatter apratiṣedhaḥ //5.1.29//
analyzed: asya uttaram kāraṇa antarāt api tad dharma upapatteḥ apratiṣedhaḥ

original: atraitad eva tāvad vaktavyam sapakṣaikadeśavṛttitvam idam asya hetor udbhāvitam /
analyzed: atra etat eva tāvat vaktavyam sapakṣa eka deśa vṛtti tvam idam asya hetoḥ udbhāvitam

original: na ca sapakṣaikadeśavṛttir agamakaḥ /
analyzed: na ca sapakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ agamakaḥ

original: prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatve pratibaddham na punar anityaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatve /
analyzed: prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam anitya tve pratibaddham na punar anityam prayatna ānantarīyaka tve

original: [yat prayatnāntarīyakam tad anityam] iti hi vyāptiḥ na tu [yad anityam tat prayatnānantarīyakam] iti /
analyzed: yat prayatna āntarīyakam tat anityam iti hi vyāptiḥ na tu yat anityam tat prayatna ānantarīyakam iti

original: yathā [yatnāgnis tatra dhūmaḥ] iti na /
analyzed: yathā yatna agniḥ tatra dhūmaḥ iti na

original: [yatra dhūmas tatrāgniḥ] iti //
analyzed: yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti

original: evaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvam antareṇa samīraṇarayapātyamānavanasoatyādiśabde vidyudādau vā yeyam anityatopalabdhiḥ na sā tasya hetutām apahantīti //
analyzed: evam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam antareṇa samīraṇa raya pātyamāna vanasoati ādi śabde vidyut ādau vā yā iyam anitya tā upalabdhiḥ na sā tasya hetutām apahanti iti

original: api ca prayatnānantarīyakatvam iti kāṛaṇād utpattir iyam abhidhīyate na tu kāraṇaṃ niyamyate prayatna eveti /
analyzed: api ca prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam iti kāṛaṇāt utpattiḥ iyam abhidhīyate na tu kāraṇam niyamyate prayatnaḥ eva iti

original: tatra pavananodanajanitataruśabdavat asaty api prayatne kāraṇāntaraṃ tadutpādakaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tatra pavana nodana janita taru śabda vat asati api prayatne kāraṇa antaram tad utpādakam bhaviṣyati

original: kāraṇāntarajanye'py anityatvaṃ śabde vidyudāday vā na viruddham iti //
analyzed: kāraṇa antara janye pi anitya tvam śabde vā na viruddham iti

original: kathaṃ punar idam eva gamyate prayatnādibhir asann utpādyate śabdaḥ na punas sann abhivyajyata iti sato 'nupalabdhau nimittābhāvāt /
analyzed: katham punar idam eva gamyate prayatna ādibhiḥ asan utpādyate śabdaḥ na punar san abhivyajyate iti sataḥ nupalabdhau nimitta abhāvāt

original: āvaraṇaṃ nimittam iti cet na mūlodakādinā tulyaḥ śabdaḥ ity asann eva prayatnādinā kriyata iti //
analyzed: āvaraṇam nimittam iti ced na mūla udaka ādinā tulyaḥ śabdaḥ iti asan eva prayatna ādinā kriyate iti

original: tadanupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhau tadviparītopapatteḥ anupalabdhisamaḥ //5.1.30//
analyzed: tad anupalabdheḥ anupalambhāt abhāva siddhau tad viparīta upapatteḥ anupalabdhisamaḥ

original: anupalabdher anupalambhopanyāsena pratyavasthānam anupalabdhisamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: anupalabdheḥ anupalambha upanyāsena pratyavasthānam anupalabdhisamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: yad uktam āvaraṇānupalambhād asaty āvaraṇe prāg uccāraṇād agrahaṇād asann eva śabdaḥ prayatnenābhinirvartyata iti tad ayuktam āvaraṇānupalabdher apy anupalambhāt tasyāś cānupalambhād abhāvaḥ anupalabdher abhāvāt upalabdhir bhavati pratiṣedhadvayena vidher eva pratīteḥ /
analyzed: yat uktam āvaraṇa anupalambhāt asati āvaraṇe prāk uccāraṇāt agrahaṇāt asan eva śabdaḥ prayatnena abhinirvartyate iti tat ayuktam āvaraṇa anupalabdheḥ api anupalambhāt tasyāḥ ca anupalambhāt abhāvaḥ anupalabdheḥ abhāvāt upalabdhiḥ bhavati pratiṣedha dvayena vidheḥ eva pratīteḥ

original: āvaraṇopalabdheś cāvaraṇasattā siddhyatīti tatkṛtam eva śabdasyāgrahaṇam nāsattvakṛtam ity abhivyaṃjakam evāsya prayatnādi kāraṇam iti //
analyzed: āvaraṇa upalabdheḥ ca āvaraṇa sattā siddhyati iti tad kṛtam eva śabdasya agrahaṇam na asattva kṛtam iti abhivyaṃjakam eva asya prayatna ādi kāraṇam iti

original: asyottaram anupalambhātmakatvād anupalabdher ahetuḥ //5.1.31//
analyzed: asya uttaram anupalambha ātmaka tvāt anupalabdheḥ ahetuḥ

original: [āvaraṇānupalabdhir nāsti anupalabdheḥ] iti yo 'yaṃ hetur uktaḥ sa na hetuḥ /
analyzed: āvaraṇa anupalabdhiḥ na asti anupalabdheḥ iti yaḥ yam hetuḥ uktaḥ sa na hetuḥ

original: kutaḥ anupalambhasvabhāvatvād anupalabdheḥ upalambhapratiṣedhātmakatvād ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: kutas anupalambha svabhāva tvāt anupalabdheḥ upalambha pratiṣedha ātmaka tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: astitvanāstitve hi bhāvānāṃ upalambhānupalambhābhyām avasthāpyete yad upalabhyate tad asti śaśavat yan nopalabhyate tan nāsti tadviṣāṇavat /
analyzed: astitva nāstitve hi bhāvānām upalambha anupalambhābhyām avasthāpyete yat upalabhyate tat asti śaśa vat yat na upalabhyate tat na asti tat viṣāṇa vat

original: nopalabhyate ca śabdasyāvaraṇaṃ mūlodakāder iva mṛttikā ity anupalambhān nāstīti gamyate /
analyzed: na upalabhyate ca śabdasya āvaraṇam mūla udaka ādeḥ iva mṛttikā iti anupalambhāt na asti iti gamyate

original: anupalambho gamayati nānupalabdher iti anupalabdher bhāvād āvaraṇam eva nāstīti //
analyzed: anupalambhaḥ gamayati na anupalabdheḥ iti anupalabdheḥ bhāvāt āvaraṇam eva na asti iti

original: jñānvikalpānāṃ ca bhāvābhāvasaṃvedanād adhyātmam //5.1.32//
analyzed: jñāna vikalpānām ca bhāva abhāva saṃvedanāt adhyātmam

original: jñānavikalpāḥ pratītiprakārāḥ /
teṣāṃ bhāvābhāvau pratiprāṇisaṃvedyau bhavataḥ /
analyzed: teṣām bhāva abhāvau prati prāṇi saṃvedyau bhavataḥ

original: [asti me jñānam] ity evaṃ sarvaḥ pratyakṣānumānāgamajñānāni pramāṇaphalāni smaraṇasaṃśayādijñānāni ca pramāṇaphalāṇy anubhavatīti /
analyzed: asti me jñānam iti evam sarvaḥ pratyakṣa anumāna āgama jñānāni pramāṇa phalāni smaraṇa saṃśaya ādi jñānāni ca pramāṇa phalāṇi anubhavati iti

original: sā ceyam āvaraṇānupalabdhiḥ upalabdhivad adhyātmaṃ saṃvedyate [nopalambe śabdasyāvaraṇaṃ mṛd iva mūlodakādeḥ] iti /
analyzed: sā ca iyam āvaraṇa anupalabdhiḥ upalabdhi vat adhyātmam saṃvedyate na upalambe śabdasya āvaraṇam mṛd iva mūla udaka ādeḥ iti

original: tad evaṃ bāhyapadārthabhāvābhāvavat āntarajñānabhāvābhāvayor api pratyakṣatvād aparyanuyogo 'yaṃ [anupalabdher anupalambhād āvaraṇam asti śabdasya] iti /
analyzed: tat evam bāhya padārtha bhāva abhāva vat āntara jñāna bhāva abhāvayoḥ api pratyakṣa tvāt aparyanuyogaḥ yam anupalabdheḥ anupalambhāt āvaraṇam asti śabdasya iti

original: tasmāt prāg uccāraṇād asann eva śabda iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt prāk uccāraṇāt asan eva śabdaḥ iti siddham

original: sādhyāt tulyadharmopapatterḥ sarvānityatvaprasaṅgād anityasamaḥ //5.1.33//
analyzed: sādhyāt tulya dharma upapatteḥ sarva anitya tva prasaṅgāt anityasamaḥ

original: sarvabhāvānityatvaprasaṅgena pratyavasthānam anityasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: sarva bhāva anitya tva prasaṅgena pratyavasthānam anityasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: anityena ghaṭena sādharmyam astīti śabdasyeti yadi tasyānityatvam ucyate tarhi sarvabhāvānām api ghaṭena kim api sādharmyam astīti sarva evānityāḥ syuḥ //
analyzed: anityena ghaṭena sādharmyam asti iti śabdasya iti yadi tasya anitya tvam ucyate tarhi sarva bhāvānām api ghaṭena kim api sādharmyam asti iti sarve eva anityāḥ syuḥ

original: aviśeṣasamaiveyaṃ jātir iti cet na tatra hi sattābhiyogāt sarvabhāvānām aviśeṣa āpādāditaḥ iha tu ghaṭasādharmyād evānityatvām āpadyata iti /
analyzed: aviśeṣa samā evā iyam jātiḥ iti ced na tatra hi sattā abhiyogāt sarva bhāvānām aviśeṣaḥ āpāda āditaḥ iha tu ghaṭa sādharmyāt āpadyate iti

original: udbhāvanabhaṅgibhedāc ca jātinānātvam ity asakṛd uktam //
analyzed: udbhāvana bhaṅgi bhedāt ca jāti nānātvam iti asakṛt uktam

original: atrottaram sādharmyād apy asiddheḥ pratiṣedhāsiddhiḥ pratiṣedhyasādharmyāt //5.1.34//
analyzed: atra uttaram sādharmyāt api asiddheḥ pratiṣedha asiddhiḥ pratiṣedhya sādharmyāt

original: atiprasaṅgam āpādayato hy etad vivakṣitaṃ bhavati ghaṭasādharmyādisiddhir anityatvasyeti /
analyzed: atiprasaṅgam āpādayataḥ hi etat vivakṣitam bhavati ghaṭa sādharmya ādi siddhiḥ anitya tvasya iti

original: yadi ca ghaṭasādharmyādinityatvasyāsiddhiḥ tarhi tāvakasyāsya pratiṣedhavākyasyāpy asiddhiḥ prati?pṣedhyavākyasādharmyāt /
analyzed: yadi ca ghaṭa sādharmya ādi nitya tvasya asiddhiḥ tarhi tāvakasya asya pratiṣedha vākyasya api asiddhiḥ pratipṣedhya vākya sādharmyāt

original: asti hi pratiṣedhavākyasya pratiṣedhyavākyena sādharmyaṃ pratjñādyavayavayogitvam iti //
analyzed: asti hi pratiṣedha vākyasya pratiṣedhya vākyena sādharmyam pratjñā ādi avayava yogi tvam iti

original: kiṃ ca dṛṣṭānte sādhyasādhanabhāvena pratijñātasya dharmasya hetutvāt tasya cobhayathā bhāvānn aviśeṣaḥ //5.1.35//
analyzed: kim ca dṛṣṭānte sādhya sādhana bhāvena pratijñātasya dharmasya hetu tvāt tasya ca ubhayathā bhāvāt aviśeṣaḥ

original: na hi sādharmyamātraṃ sādhanaṃ bhavati api tu dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇy avadhṛtasāmarthyaṃ sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vā /
analyzed: na hi sādharmya mātram sādhanam bhavati api tu dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi avadhṛta sāmarthyam sādharmyam vaidharmyam vā

original: tathāvidhaṃ cet sarvabhāvānām asti bhavatu teṣām apy anityatvam ko dveṣaḥ nāsti cet ko 'yam atiprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: tathāvidham ced sarva bhāvānām asti bhavatu teṣām api anitya tvam kaḥ dveṣaḥ na asti ced kaḥ yam atiprasaṅgaḥ

original: na hi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi prajñātasāmarthyaṃ sādharmyam ubhayathā bhavati pakṣāntaraṃ spṛśati /
analyzed: na hi dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi prajñāta sāmarthyam sādharmyam ubhayathā bhavati pakṣa antaram spṛśati

original: tena sādharmyaviśeṣasya hetutvāt tasya ca sarvatrāsaṃbhavāt na sarvānityatvam /
analyzed: tena sādharmya viśeṣasya hetu tvāt tasya ca sarvatra asaṃbhavāt na sarva anitya tvam

original: aniveśeṣasamāyāṃ ca jātau yat samādhānam uktaṃ tad ihāpi vaktavyam iti //
analyzed: ca jātau yat samādhānam uktam tat iha api vaktavyam iti

original: nityam anityabhāvād anitye nityatvopapatter nityasamaḥ //5.1.36//
analyzed: nityam anitya bhāvāt anitye nitya tva upapatteḥ nityasamaḥ

original: anityatvākhyasādhyadharmasvarūpavikalpanena śabdanityatvāpādanaṃ nityasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: anitya tva ākhya sādhya dharma svarūpa vikalpanena śabda nitya tva āpādanam nityasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: [anityaḥ śabdaḥ] iti pratijñāte hi jātivādī vikalpayati [kim idam anityatvaṃ śabdasya nityam athānityam] iti /
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāte hi jāti vādī vikalpayati kim idam anitya tvam śabdasya nityam atha anityam iti

original: yadi tāvad anityam tat kadācit pracyaveta /
analyzed: yadi tāvat anityam tat kadācid pracyaveta

original: tatpracyuteḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ /
analyzed: tad pracyuteḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ

original: atha nityam anityatvam tarhi dharmasya nityatvāt tasya ca nirādhārasyānupapatteḥtadāśrayasya śabdayāpi nityatvam /
analyzed: atha nityam anitya tvam tarhi dharmasya nitya tvāt tasya ca nirādhārasya anupapatteḥ tad āśrayasya nitya tvam

original: anityatve hi śabde vināṣṭe tadādhāro dhrmaḥ kva varteteti //
analyzed: anitya tve hi śabde vināṣṭe tad ādhāraḥ dhrmaḥ kva varteta iti

original: asyottaram pratiṣedhye nityam anityabhāvāt anityatvopapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //5.1.37//
analyzed: asya uttaram pratiṣedhye nityam anitya bhāvāt anitya tva upapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ

original: pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anityatvasya bhāvaś ced ucyate tad anitya evāsāv ukto bhavati /
analyzed: pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anitya tvasya bhāvaḥ ced ucyate tat anityaḥ eva asau uktaḥ bhavati

original: anityatvopapatteś ca tatpratiṣedho nopapadyate /
analyzed: anitya tva upapatteḥ ca tad pratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate

original: [nityam anityatvaṃ śabdasya] iti ca bravīṣi nityatāṃ ca tadyogasyopapādayasīti mahān ayam āyuṣmato bhramaḥ //
analyzed: nityam anitya tvam śabdasya iti ca bravīṣi nitya tām ca tad yogasya upapādayasi iti mahān ayam āyuṣmataḥ bhramaḥ

original: atha niradhikaraṇo dharmaḥ kathaṃ syād iti tad ucyate anityatvaṃ hi nām nirodhaḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ abhāvaḥ ity anarthāntaram /
analyzed: atha niradhikaraṇaḥ dharmaḥ katham syāt iti tat ucyate anitya tvam hi nām nirodhaḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ abhāvaḥ iti anarthāntaram

original: anityatvādabhāva iti tu vyavahāramātram /
analyzed: anitya tvāt abhāvaḥ iti tu vyavahāra mātram

original: sā ceyam anityatā śabdāvacchinnā na śabdādhikaraṇā /
analyzed: sā ca iyam anitya tā śabda avacchinnā na śabda adhikaraṇā

original: na ghaṭābhāvaḥ ghaṭāśrayo bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: na ghaṭa abhāvaḥ ghaṭa āśrayaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: bhāvasvabhāvā hi dharmāḥ dharmāśritā bhavanti nābhāvaḥ /
analyzed: bhāva svabhāvāḥ hi dharmāḥ dharma āśritāḥ bhavanti na abhāvaḥ

original: abhāvatvāśrito 'pi na pratiyogyāśrito bhavati kin tv arthāntaravṛttiḥ bhūpradeśa iva ghaṭabhāva iti //
analyzed: abhāva tva āśritaḥ na pratiyogi āśritaḥ bhavati kin tu artha antara vṛttiḥ bhū pradeśaḥ iva ghaṭa bhāvaḥ iti

original: bnityānityatvavirodhāc ca nityatvam anityatvasya bhāvān nityaḥ śabda iti //
analyzed: ca nitya anitya tva virodhāt ca nitya tvam anitya tvasya bhāvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: prayatnakāryānekatvāt kāryasamaḥ //5.1.38//
analyzed: prayatna kārya aneka tvāt kāryasamaḥ

original: prayatnakāryanānātvopanyāsena pratyavasthānaṃ kāryasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: prayatna kārya nānātva upanyāsena pratyavasthānam kāryasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: [anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvāt] ity ukte apara āha prayatnasya hi kāryadvaidham upalabdham kiñcid asad eva prayatnena nirvartyate yathā ghaṭādi /
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt iti ukte aparaḥ āha prayatnasya hi kārya dvaidham upalabdham kiñcid asat eva prayatnena nirvartyate yathā ghaṭa ādi

original: kiñcit sad evāvaraṇavyapanayanādinā prayatnenābhivyajyate yathā mṛdantaritam udakādi /
analyzed: kiñcid sat eva āvaraṇa vyapanayana ādinā prayatnena abhivyajyate yathā mṛd antaritam udaka ādi

original: evaṃ prayatjakāryanānātvāt kiṃ prayatnenāvidyamānaḥ śabdo nirvartyate ghaṭavat uta vidyamāna evābhivyajyate mṛdantaritasalilavad iti saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: evam kim prayatja kārya nānātvāt kim prayatnena avidyamānaḥ śabdaḥ nirvartyate ghaṭa vat uta vidyamānaḥ eva abhivyajyate mṛd antarita salila vat iti saṃśayaḥ

original: na ceyaṃ saṃśayasamā jātiḥ hetvarthavikalpnenātra pratyavasthānāt /
analyzed: na ca iyam saṃśayasamā jātiḥ hetu artha vikalpnena atra pratyavasthānāt

original: tatra hi niravayavatvādyākāśadharmopanyāsena saṃśaya āpāditaḥ iha tu sādhanavādyuktaprayatnānantarīyakatvahetvarthanirūpaṇeneti /
analyzed: tatra hi niravayava tva ādi ākāśa dharma upanyāsena saṃśayaḥ āpāditaḥ iha tu sādhanavādi ukta prayatna ānantarīyakatva hetu artha nirūpaṇena iti

original: udbhāvanāprakārabhedaś ca jātīnāṃ vaicitryakāraṇam ity uktam eva //
analyzed: udbhāvanā prakāra bhedaḥ ca jātīnām vaicitrya kāraṇam iti uktam eva

original: atrottaram kāryānyatve prayatnāhetutvam anupalabdhikāraṇānupapatteḥ //5.1.39//
analyzed: atra uttaram kārya anya tve prayatna ahetu tvam anupalabdhi kāraṇa anupapatteḥ

original: yady api prayatnakāryānyatvam upalabhyate tathāoi prakṛte śabde prayatnasyābhivyaktāv ahetutvam /
analyzed: yadi api prayatna kārya anya tvam upalabhyate prakṛte śabde prayatnasya abhivyaktau ahetu tvam

original: na prayatnataḥ śabdam abhivyanakti kin tv abhūtaprādurbhāvam eva vidhatte /
analyzed: na prayatnataḥ śabdam abhivyanakti kin tu abhūta prādurbhāvam eva vidhatte

original: kasmāt [anupalabdhikāraṇānupapatteḥ] /
analyzed: kasmāt anupalabdhi kāraṇa anupapatteḥ

original: yatra hi sataḥ padārthasya prayatno 'bhivyaktihetuḥ tatra tasya sataḥ salilāder anupalabdhikāraṇam asti mṛdādivyavadhānam /
analyzed: yatra hi sataḥ padārthasya prayatnaḥ bhivyakti hetuḥ tatra tasya sataḥ salila ādeḥ anupalabdhi kāraṇam asti mṛd ādi vyavadhānam

original: tadaphoham ācaratā prayatnena tad abhivyaktiḥ saṃpādyate /
analyzed: ācaratā prayatnena tat abhivyaktiḥ saṃpādyate

original: śabdasya tu na kiñcid anupalabdhinibandhanaṃ vyavadhānādi saṃbhavatīti varṇitam /
analyzed: śabdasya tu na kiñcid anupalabdhi nibandhanam vyavadhāna ādi saṃbhavati iti varṇitam

original: atas tasyāsata evātmalābhābhinimittam uccāraṇādiprayatnaḥ na sato 'bhivyaktinimittam /
analyzed: atas tasya asataḥ eva ātma lābha abhinimittam uccāraṇa ādi prayatnaḥ na sataḥ bhivyakti nimittam

original: tasmād anityaḥ śabda iti siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti siddham

original: tadevam anena caturviṃśatividhajātyudāharaṇapratisamādhānopadeśavartmanā śabdānityatvasādhame parakīyam upālambhajātam evaṃprāyam akhilam apākṛtam āmrasekapitṛtarpaṇanyāyena bhavati bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa //
analyzed: tat evam anena caturviṃśatividha jāti udāharaṇa pratisamādhāna upadeśa vartmanā śabda anitya tva sādhame parakīyam upālambha jātam evaṃprāyam akhilam apākṛtam āmra seka pitṛ tarpaṇa nyāyena bhavati bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa

original: idam aparam idānīm upadiśyate caturviṃśatāv api jātivādinā prayuktāsu mūlasādhanavādī vispaṣṭānumāmodantaparīkṣaṇapuraśaraṃ sad evottaraṃ yathopadiṣṭam abhidadhīta na tu jātiprayogānukāriduruttarālāpacāpalena ṣaṭpakṣīṃ pravartayet /
analyzed: idam aparam idānīm upadiśyate caturviṃśatau api jātivādinā prayuktāsu mūla sādhana vādī sat eva uttaram yathā upadiṣṭam abhidadhīta na tu jāti prayoga anukāri duruttara ālāpa cāpalena ṣaṭpakṣīm pravartayet

original: tasyāṃ hi prastutāyāṃ ubhayor api vādiprativādinor asiddhiḥ asadvācitvāt /
analyzed: tasyām hi prastutāyām ubhayoḥ api vādi prativādinoḥ asiddhiḥ asat vāci tvāt

original: kathaṃ punaḥ ṣaṭpakṣī pravartata iti tatpathaṃ darśayitum āha pratiṣedhe hi samāno doṣaḥ //5.1.40//
analyzed: katham punar ṣaṭpakṣī pravartate iti tad patham darśayitum āha pratiṣedhe hi samānaḥ doṣaḥ

original: sthāpanāhetutvavādinā prathamapaṣasthena sthāpanāhetuḥ prayuktaḥ [anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvāṭ] iti //
analyzed: sthāpanā hetu tva vādinā prathama paṣa sthena sthāpanā hetuḥ prayuktaḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt iti

original: tato jātivādī dvitīyapakṣasthaḥ [prayatnakāṛyānekatvāt] iti [prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ abhivyaṅgye 'pi śabde bhavati] iti hetor anaikāntikatvam āha //
analyzed: tatas jāti vādī dvitīya pakṣa sthaḥ iti prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam abhivyaṅgye pi śabde bhavati iti hetoḥ anaikāntika tvam āha

original: tad adhunā tṛtīyapakṣasthaḥ sthāpanāhetuvādī yadi yathopadiṣṭam āvaraṇānupalabdhikramam anusṛtya viśeṣam upadarśayan anaikāntikatām uddharati tatas tāvaty eva paryavasyati kathā iti caturthādipakṣāvasravirahāt nāvataraty eva ṣaṭpakṣī //
analyzed: tat adhunā tṛtīya pakṣa sthaḥ sthāpanā hetuvādī yadi yathā upadiṣṭam āvaraṇa anupalabdhi kramam anusṛtya viśeṣam upadarśayan anaikāntika tām uddharati tatas tāvatī eva paryavasyati kathā iti caturtha ādi pakṣa avasra virahāt na avatarati eva ṣaṭpakṣī

original: yadi tu taṃ kramam apahāryaiva tṛtīyapakṣastho 'sau vadati [hetoś ced anaikāntikatvam udbhāvayati anaikāntikatvā asādhakaḥ syād iti nanv ayaṃ tāvakaḥ pratiṣedho 'py anaikāntikaḥ kiñcit pratiṣedhati kiṃcin neti hetos sādhamatvaṃ pratiṣe dhati na svarūpam iti /
analyzed: yadi tu tam kramam apahārya eva tṛtīya pakṣa sthaḥ u sau vadati hetoḥ ced anaikāntika tvam udbhāvayati anaikāntika tvāḥ asādhakaḥ syāt iti nanu ayam tāvakaḥ anaikāntikaḥ kiñcid pratiṣedhati kiṃcid na iti hetoḥ sādhamatvam na svarūpam iti

original: ata evetthaṃ pratiṣEdhasyānaikāntikatvāt so 'pi hi nābhivyaktipakṣam eva sādhayet utpattipakṣe 'pi prayatnasāphalyopapatteḥ /
analyzed: atas evā ittham pratiṣedhasya anaikāntika tvāt saḥ u pi hi na abhivyakti pakṣam eva sādhayet utpatti pakṣe pi prayatna sāphalya upapatteḥ

original: ubhayatrāpi ca viśeṣahetor anapadeśāṭ /
analyzed: ubhayatra api ca viśeṣa hetoḥ anapadeśāt

original: evam anaikāntikatvam abhihitavati sādhanavādini bahvati pratiṣedhavādino 'pi vacanāvasara iti avatarati ṣaṭpakṣī //
analyzed: evam anaikāntika tvam abhihitavati sādhana vādini vacana avasaraḥ iti avatarati ṣaṭpakṣī

original: sa hi caturthapakṣastha evaṃ vadati pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe tatpratiṣedhadoṣavad doṣaḥ //5.1.41//
analyzed: sa hi caturtha pakṣa sthaḥ evam vadati pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe tad pratiṣedha doṣa vat doṣaḥ

original: vividhaḥ pratiṣedhaṃḥ ihocyate na vyāghātaḥ prakṛtasaṅgater abhāvāṭ /
analyzed: vividhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iha ucyate na vyāghātaḥ prakṛta saṅgateḥ abhāvāt

original: yo 'yaṃ pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno 'naikāntikatvadoṣa ucyate sa pratiṣedhapratiṣedhe 'pi bhavatprayukte samānaḥ so 'pi hi pūrvavad anaikāntika eveti tataḥ paṃcamaṃ pakṣam avalambya mūlasādhanavādī matānujñām udbhāvayati //
analyzed: yaḥ yam pratiṣedhe samānaḥ na aikāntika tva doṣaḥ ucyate sa pratiṣedha pratiṣedhe bhavat prayukte samānaḥ saḥ pi hi pūrva vat anaikāntikaḥ eva iti tatas paṃcamam pakṣam avalambya mūla sādhana vādī mata anujñām udbhāvayati

original: sā ca pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhaviparatiṣedhe samānadoṣaprasaṃgo matānujñā //5.1.42//
analyzed: sā ca pratiṣedham sa doṣam abhyupetya samāna doṣa prasaṃgaḥ matānujñā

original: pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa iti samudbhāvitaṃ doṣam anuddhṛtya taṃ pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya madukte pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samānadoṣaprasaṅgam āpādayatas te matānujñā nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: pratiṣedhe samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti samudbhāvitam doṣam an uddhṛtya tam pratiṣedham sa doṣam abhyupetya mad ukte pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe samāna doṣa prasaṅgam āpādayataḥ te matānujñā nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: [coro bhavān] ity ukte 'bhiyuktena cauryam ātmano nirākaraṇīyam na tu [bhavān api coraḥ] iti paraḥ pratipattavyaḥ iti //
analyzed: coraḥ bhavān iti ukte bhiyuktena cauryam ātmanaḥ nirākaraṇīyam na tu bhavān api coraḥ iti paraḥ pratipattavyaḥ iti

original: evaṃ paṃcamapakṣasthe mūlasādhanavādini kathitavati paraḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ pakaṣam āsthāya punar abhidhatte yadi svapakṣadoṣānuddharaṇapuraśaraparapakṣadoṣāpādanopanatamatānujñānigrahasthānapātram aham āḍiśye hanta tarhi tavāpi tad eva nigrahasthānam avatarati tvam apy evam akārṣīḥ /
analyzed: evam paṃcama pakṣa sthe mūla sādhana vādini kathitavati paraḥ ṣaṣṭham pakaṣam āsthāya punar abhidhatte yadi sva pakṣa doṣa anuddharaṇa pura śara para pakṣa doṣa āpādana upanata mata anujñā nigrahasthāna pātram aham āḍiśye hanta tarhi tava api tat eva nigrahasthānam avatarati tvam api evam akārṣīḥ

original: tathā hi dvitīyapakṣasthena mayā [prayatnakāryānekatvāt] iti yad anaikāntikatvam udbhāvitam /
analyzed: tathā hi dvitīya pakṣa sthena mayā prayatna kārya aneka tvāt iti yat anaikāntika tvam udbhāvitam

original: tad anuddhṛtyaiva pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣaḥ] iti mayy eva pratīpam āpāditam /
analyzed: tat an uddhṛtya eva pratiṣedhe samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti mayi eva pratīpam āpāditam

original: tae evaṃ tvat ta eva śikṣitvā 'ham api caturthapakṣasthaḥ tathaiva tvayi doṣam arpitavān iti mama cen matānujñā prathamataraṃ tavāsau bhaved iti //
analyzed: evam tvat te eva śikṣitvā ham api caturtha pakṣa sthaḥ tathā eva tvayi doṣam arpitavān iti mama ced matā anujñā prathamataram tava asau bhavet iti

original: tad etad āha svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhārahetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāṭ samāno doṣaḥ //5.1.43//
analyzed: tat etat āha sva pakṣa lakṣaṇa apekṣā upapatti upasaṃhāra hetu nirdeśe para pakṣa doṣa abhyupagamāt samānaḥ doṣaḥ

original: svapakṣaḥ mūlasādhanavādyuktaḥ [prayatnānantarīyakatvād anityaḥ śabdaḥ] iti /
analyzed: sva pakṣaḥ mūla sādhana vādi uktaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: tatlakṣaṇaḥ tatsamutthānaḥ tadviṣayaḥ [prayatnakāryānekatvāṭ]iti pratiṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: tad lakṣaṇaḥ tad samutthānaḥ tad viṣayaḥ prayatna kārya aneka tvāt iti pratiṣedhaḥ

original: tam apekṣamāṇaḥ tam anuddhṛtya anujñāya pravṛttaḥ [pratiśedhe 'pi samāno doṣaḥ] ity upapadyamānaḥ parapakṣe 'naikāntikatvadoṣopasaṃhāraḥ /
analyzed: tam apekṣamāṇaḥ tam an uddhṛtya anujñāya pravṛttaḥ pratiśedhe pi samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti upapadyamānaḥ para pakṣe na aikāntika tva doṣa upasaṃhāraḥ
