original: tasya ca hetunirdeśa ity ayam anaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedha iti tasmin sati parapakṣakathitānaikāntikatvadoṣābhyupagamāt tad anuddharaṇena tasyaiva pratīpadoṣodbhāvanāt samāno matānujñādoṣa iti ṣaṣṭhaḥ pakṣaḥ //
analyzed: tasya ca hetu nirdeśaḥ iti ayam anaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti tasmin sati parapakṣa kathita anaikāntika tva doṣa abhyupagamāt tat an uddharaṇena tasya eva pratīpa doṣa udbhāvanāt samānaḥ mata anujñā doṣaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: seyaṃ ṣaṭpakṣī /
analyzed: sā iyam ṣaṣ pakṣī

original: tasyāṃ prathamatṛṭīyapaṃvamāḥ /
analyzed: tasyām prathama tṛṭīya paṃvamāḥ

original: sthāpanāhetuvādinaḥ pakṣāḥ /
analyzed: sthāpanā hetuvādinaḥ pakṣāḥ

original: dvitīyacaturthaṣaṣṭhāḥ pratiṣedhavādinaḥ ete ca sādhyasādhakatayā parīkṣyamāṇāh paunaruktyamatānujñādidoṣāpahatatvāt anyatarasyāpi vādinaḥ sādhyasiddhaye na prakalpante //
analyzed: dvitīya caturtha ṣaṣṭhāḥ pratiṣedha vādinaḥ ete ca sādhya sādhaka tayā parīkṣyamāṇāḥ paunaruktya mata anujñā ādi doṣa apahata tvāt anyatarasya api vādinaḥ sādhya siddhaye na prakalpante

original: tathā hi caturthaṣaṣṭhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ arthāviśeṣāt punar uktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi caturtha ṣaṣṭhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ artha aviśeṣāt punar ukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ

original: caturthe pakṣe parasya samānadoṣatvam ucyate /
analyzed: caturthe pakṣe parasya samāna doṣa tvam ucyate

original: ṣaṣṭhe 'pi tathaiva samānaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhe pi tathā eva samānaḥ

original: tṛtīyapaṃcamayos tṛtīye pakṣe parokṣaṃ samānadoṣatvam abhyupagamyate /
analyzed: tṛtīya paṃcamayoḥ tṛtīye pakṣe parokṣam samāna doṣa tvam abhyupagamyate

original: paṃcame 'pi mat ā-nujñām udbhāvayatā tadaṅgīkṛtam eva bhavati /
analyzed: paṃcame pi mat ānujñām udbhāvayatā tat aṅgīkṛtam eva bhavati

original: trtīyacaturthayoś ca paroktadoṣānuddharaṇāt tu matānujñety evaṃ ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayor asiddhiḥ /
analyzed: trtīya caturthayoḥ ca para ukta doṣa anuddharaṇāt tu mata anujñā iti evam ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayoḥ asiddhiḥ

original: tasmāt saduttarair eva doṣacikitsā sādhīyasī nāsaduttaraiḥ ṣaṭpakṣiprasaṅgāditi //
analyzed: tasmāt sat uttaraiḥ eva doṣa cikitsā sādhīyasī na asat uttaraiḥ ṣaṣ pakṣi prasaṅgāt iti

original: nanu asaduttarakathane 'pi ṣaṭapakṣyām eva virāmaḥ śatapakṣī sahasrapakṣī vā kathaṃ na pravartate ko 'tra niyamaḥ iti cet ucyate iyaty eva nivartate vacanāvakāśa iti nānantapakṣatā saṃbhavati /
analyzed: nanu asat uttara kathane eva virāmaḥ śata pakṣī sahasra pakṣī vā katham na pravartate kaḥ tra niyamaḥ iti ced ucyate iyatī eva nivartate vacana avakāśaḥ iti na ananta pakṣa tā saṃbhavati

original: tathā hi pūrvottarapakṣavādinau tāvat sādhanadūṣaṇavādinau bhavata eva ko 'tra vicāraḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi pūrva uttarapakṣa vādinau tāvat sādhana dūṣaṇa vādinau bhavataḥ eva kaḥ vicāraḥ

original: tatra sthāpanāhetuvādinā tāvat vacasi vartamānaḥ sādhanavādī samyaṅnītyopakramamāṇaḥ taddūṣaṇam uddhartuṃ śaknuyān na veti tasyām eva daśāyāṃ prāṅvivākāyatto nirṇayaḥ //
analyzed: tatra sthāpanā hetuvādinā tāvat vacasi vartamānaḥ sādhana vādī samyak nītyā upakramamāṇaḥ tad dūṣaṇam uddhartum śaknuyāt na vā iti tasyām eva daśāyām prāṅvivāka āyattaḥ nirṇayaḥ

original: asaduttaropanyāse tu tṛtīyavacasā tena kṛte dūṣaṇavādy api labdhāvakāśaḥ tata eva śikṣitvā caturthe vacasi vartamānaḥ tatpratīpaṃ yojayati /
analyzed: asat uttara upanyāse tu tṛtīya vacasā tena kṛte dūṣaṇa vādī api labdha avakāśaḥ tatas eva śikṣitvā caturthe vacasi vartamānaḥ tad pratīpam yojayati

original: tataḥ sthāpanāhetuvādī pratīpayojanāyām aphalāyāṃ duruttarāyāṃ samavyayaphalāyāṃ aśakyakriyāyāṃ ca nirudyogaḥ kiñcid abhinavaṃ dūṣaṇam utprekṣya paṃcame acasi sthito matānujñām āha //
analyzed: tatas sthāpanā hetuvādī pratīpa yojanāyām aphalāyām duruttarāyām sama vyaya phalāyām aśakya kriyāyām ca nirudyogaḥ kiñcid abhinavam dūṣaṇam utprekṣya paṃcame acasi sthitaḥ mata anujñām āha

original: tatas tām api parapakṣamanativartamānāṃ paśyan pratiṣedhavādī ṣaṣṭhe vacasi sthitvā tāṃ tatpakṣa eva yojayati ity evaṃ vāṛtte dūṣaṇāntarāsaṃbhavāt pratīpayojane ca bhagnarasatvāt tūṣṇīm evāsitum ucitam iti tāvaty eva bhavati vacanaviratiḥ na śatasahasrādipakṣaprasaṅgaḥ pravartata ity ataḥ ṣaṭpakṣīm eva darśitavān ācāṛyaḥ /
analyzed: tatas tām api para pakṣam an ativartamānām paśyan pratiṣedha vādī ṣaṣṭhe vacasi sthitvā tām tad pakṣe eva yojayati iti evam vā āṛtte dūṣaṇa antara asaṃbhavāt pratīpa yojane ca bhagna rasa tvāt tūṣṇīm eva āsitum ucitam iti tāvatī eva bhavati vacana viratiḥ na śata sahasra ādi pakṣa prasaṅgaḥ pravartate iti atas ṣaṭpakṣīm eva darśitavān ācāṛyaḥ

original: sa cāntevāsinaṃ bodhayitum evam upā diśad anena pathā pravarteta bhavān anyena mā pravartiṣṭeti /
analyzed: sa ca antevāsinam bodhayitum evam upa ā diśat anena pathā pravarteta bhavān anyena mā pravartiṣṭa iti

original: vācyam uttaram ato niravadyaṃ jātivādinam api prati tajjñaiḥ /
analyzed: vācyam uttaram atas niravadyam jāti vādinam api prati tad jñaiḥ

original: kaśmalottaragirā na tu kāryā paskṣaṣaṭkaparikalpanagoṣṭhī //
analyzed: kaśmala uttara girā na tu kāryā paskṣa ṣaṭka parikalpana goṣṭhī

original: yādṛg yajño balir api tathety evam ādāya buddhau yas tu bruyāt kaluṣam aphalas tasya śuddho 'pi hetuḥ /
analyzed: yādṛś yajñaḥ baliḥ api tathā iti evam ādāya buddhau yaḥ tu bruyāt kaluṣam aphalaḥ tasya hetuḥ

original: ṣaṭpakṣādiprasaraṇaparimlānakāntir na buddhiṃ śaktaḥ svārthe janayitum asāv agrataḥ prāśnikānām //
analyzed: ṣaṣ pakṣa ādi prasaraṇa parimlāna kāntiḥ na buddhim śaktaḥ sva arthe janayitum asau agratas prāśnikānām

original: itīdaṃ vyākhyātaṃ nijasaraṇisāgkaryarahitaṃ svarūpaṃ jātīnāṃ sphuṭam iha caturviṃśatividham /
analyzed: iti idam vyākhyātam nija saraṇi sāgkarya rahitam svarūpam jātīnām sphuṭam iha caturviṃśatividham

original: amūṣāṃ tattvajñaḥ paraviracitānāṃ parihṛtau svayaṃ copanyāse na i sadasi saṃmuhyato naraḥ //
analyzed: amūṣām tattva jñaḥ para viracitānām parihṛtau svayam ca upanyāse na sadasi saṃmuhyataḥ naraḥ

original: jātyanantaraṃ nigrahasthānoddeśāt tallakṣaṇapratipādanārtham āha vipratipattir apratipattiś ca nigrahasthānam //1.2.60//
analyzed: jāti anantaram nigrahasthāna uddeśāt tad lakṣaṇa pratipādana artham āha vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca nigrahasthānam

original: nigrahaḥ parājayaḥ tasya sthānam āśrayaḥ kāraṇam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: nigrahaḥ parājayaḥ tasya sthānam āśrayaḥ kāraṇam iti arthaḥ

original: kiṃ ca parājayanimittaṃ vipratipattiḥ apratipattiś ca /
analyzed: kim ca parājaya nimittam vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca

original: viparītā kutsitā dūṣaṇabuddhiḥ /
analyzed: viparītā kutsitā dūṣaṇa buddhiḥ

original: apratipattis tu ārambhaviṣaye 'nārambhaḥ /
analyzed: apratipattiḥ tu ārambha viṣaye na ārambhaḥ

original: ārambhasya viṣayaḥ sādhane dūṣaṇaṃ dūṣaṇe coddhāraḥ /
analyzed: ārambhasya viṣayaḥ sādhane dūṣaṇam dūṣaṇe ca uddhāraḥ

original: tayor ekakaraṇaṃ apratipattiḥ //
analyzed: tayoḥ eka karaṇam apratipattiḥ

original: dvidhā hi vādī parājīyate yathākartavyam anārambhamāṇaḥ viparīta< vā pratipādyamānaḥ /
analyzed: dvidhā hi vādī parājīyate yathākartavyam anārambhamāṇaḥ viparīta vā pratipādyamānaḥ

original: ata eva na karmakaraṇayor nigraham ādiśanti /
analyzed: atas eva na karma karaṇayoḥ nigraham ādiśanti

original: na hi tābhyāṃ kiñcid aparāddham svaviṣaye prayujyamānayoḥ sāmarthyānapāyāt /
analyzed: na hi tābhyām kiñcid aparāddham sva viṣaye prayujyamānayoḥ sāmarthya anapāyāt

original: kartā tu pramādyan aprayojyaṃ prayuṃjānaḥ prayojyam aprayuṃjāno vā nigraha arhat i /
analyzed: kartā tu pramādyan aprayojyam prayuṃjānaḥ prayojyam a prayuṃjānaḥ vā nigraha arhat

original: prāyeṇa cātattvavādino nigṛhyā bhavanti //
analyzed: prāyeṇa ca atattva vādinaḥ nigṛhyāḥ bhavanti

original: tattvavādy pi kadācana jalpe vitaṇḍāyāṃ vā samyaksādhanam apy apadiśya prativādipratipāditadūṣaṇābhāsanirākaraṇasraṇim anuguṇām apaśyan nigṛhyata eva /
analyzed: tattva vādī kadācana jalpe vitaṇḍāyām vā samyak sādhanam api apadiśya prativādi pratipādita dūṣaṇa ābhāsa nirākaraṇa sraṇim anuguṇām a paśyan nigṛhyate eva

original: ata eva ca bhāṣyakṛtoktam [tattvavādinam atattvavādinaṃ cābhiplavante nigrahasṭhānāni] iti /
analyzed: atas eva ca bhāṣyakṛtā uktam tattva vādinam atattva vādinam ca abhiplavante nigrahasṭhānāni iti

original: asamāsakaraṇam anekanigrahasthānabhedāvarodhayārtham //
analyzed: asamāsa karaṇam aneka nigrahasthāna bheda avarodhayā artham

original: ata evānantaram āha tadvikalpāj jātinigrahasthānabahutvam //1.2.61//
analyzed: atas eva anantaram āha tad vikalpāt jāti nigrahasthāna bahu tvam

original: tad iti sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānasya vipratipattyapratipattyoś ca parāmarśaḥ /
analyzed: tat iti sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānasya vipratipatti apratipattyoḥ ca parāmarśaḥ

original: nānākalpo vikalpaḥ prakārabheda ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: nānā kalpaḥ vikalpaḥ prakāra bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānaprakārasya bahutvāt jātibahutvam /
analyzed: sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthāna prakārasya bahu tvāt jāti bahu tvam

original: tad vyākhyātam /
analyzed: tat vyākhyātam

original: vipratipattyapratipattiprakārabahutvān nigrahasthānabahutvam //
analyzed: vipratipatti apratipatti prakāra bahu tvāt nigrahasthāna bahu tvam

original: tad dvāviṃśatidhāvibhajya darśayati pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaraṃ pratijñāvirodhaḥ pratijñāsannyāsaḥ hetvantaram arthāntaraṃ nirarthakam avijñātārthakam apārthakam aprāptakālaṃ nyūnam adhikaṃ punarkutam ananubhāṣaṇām ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ niranuyojyānuyogo 'pasiddhānto hetvābhāsāś ca nigrahasthānāni //5.1.2//
analyzed: tat dvāviṃśatidhā vibhajya darśayati pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaram pratijñāvirodhaḥ pratijñā sannyāsaḥ hetvantaram arthāntaram nirarthakam avijñātārthakam apārthakam aprāpta kālam nyūnam adhikam punarkutam ananubhāṣaṇām ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepaḥ matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam niranuyojyānuyogaḥ upasiddhāntaḥ hetvābhāsāḥ ca nigrahasthānāni

original: atra ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepaḥ paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam iti apratipattyā saṅgṛhītāni śeṣāṇi vipratipattyā /
analyzed: atra ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepaḥ paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam iti apratipattyā saṅgṛhītāni śeṣāṇi vipratipattyā

original: [punaruktam adhikam] ity asamāsakaraṇena vipratipattyaiva vābhimatam /
analyzed: punar uktam adhikam iti a samāsa karaṇena vipratipattyā eva vā abhimatam

original: kim asamāsakliṣṭakalpanayā /
analyzed: kim asamāsa kliṣṭa kalpanayā

original: sā 'pi hi kutsitaiva pratipattiḥ yat punaruktam adhikaṃ vā prayujyata iti /
analyzed: sā pi hi kutsitā eva pratipattiḥ yat punar uktam adhikam vā prayujyate iti

original: asaṅkīrṇodāharaṇavivakṣayā ca dvāviṃśatibhedasaṅkīrtanam /
analyzed: asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā ca dvāviṃśati bheda saṅkīrtanam

original: avāntarabhedais tu jātivad ānantyam eva teṣām iti //
analyzed: avāntarabhedaiḥ tu jāti vat ānantyam eva teṣām iti

original: atra kīrtir āha dvāviṃśatidhā nigrahasthānāni vibhajyante /
analyzed: atra kīrtiḥ āha dvāviṃśatidhā nigrahasthānāni vibhajyante

original: teṣāṃ ca pratipadam idānīṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇāni varṇyanta iti na mṛṣyāmahe /
analyzed: teṣām ca pratipadam idānīm viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni varṇyante iti na mṛṣyāmahe

original: kutaḥ asādhanāṅgavacanam adośodbhāvanaṃ dvayoḥ /
analyzed: kutas asādhana aṅga vacanam dvayoḥ

original: nigrahasthānam anyat tu na yuktam iti neṣyate //
analyzed: nigrahasthānam anyat tu na yuktam iti na iṣyate

original: vādinā siṣādhayiṣitapakṣasiddhaye sādhanam abhidheyam /
analyzed: vādinā siṣādhayiṣita pakṣa siddhaye sādhanam abhidheyam

original: sa ced asādhanāṅgaṃ brūyāt nigṛhyeta /
analyzed: sa ced asādhana aṅgam brūyāt nigṛhyeta

original: prativādinā 'pi vādyukte sādhane dūṣaṇam udbhāvanīyam /
analyzed: prativādinā pi vādi ukte sādhane dūṣaṇam udbhāvanīyam

original: sa ced adoṣam eva doṣatvenodbhāvayet nigṛhyeta /
analyzed: sa ced adoṣam eva doṣa tvena udbhāvayet nigṛhyeta

original: te eva dvayor vādiprativādinor nigrahasthāne /
analyzed: te eva dvayoḥ vādi prativādinoḥ nigrahasthāne

original: ato 'nyathā nigrahakaraṇam anyāyyam eva /
analyzed: atas nyathā nigraha karaṇam anyāyyam eva

original: pratijñhānyādiṣu tatprabhedeṣu ca pratipadam ayuktatāṃ darśayiṣyate /
analyzed: pratijñhānī ādiṣu tad prabhedeṣu ca pratipadam ayukta tām darśayiṣyate

original: katicchātraśiśupralāpaprāyāṇi nigrahasthānāni nirdiṣṭāni /
analyzed: kati chātra śiśu pralāpa prāyāṇi nigrahasthānāni nirdiṣṭāni

original: tādṛśi śāstre kalṣyanta iti paramam apratiṣṭhānam //
analyzed: tādṛśi śāstre kalṣyante iti paramam apratiṣṭhānam

original: atrocyate saṃkṣepavivakṣayā dve eva nigrahasthāne iti /
analyzed: atrā ucyate saṃkṣepa vivakṣayā dve eva nigrahasthāne iti

original: vayam api kiṃ noktavantaḥ [vipratipattir apratipattiś ca nigrahasthānam] iti /
analyzed: vayam api kim na uktavantaḥ vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca nigrahasthānam iti

original: etac ca sāmānyalakṣaṇam akhilabhedasaṅgrahakṣamaṃ bhavati na bhavaduktam //
analyzed: etat ca sāmānya lakṣaṇam akhila bheda saṅgraha kṣamam bhavati na bhavat uktam

original: tathā hi uttarāpratibhānena vādinor anyataraḥ parājīyate na vā na parājīyata iti katham ucyate tat kiṃ mūla eva jitvā gacchatu /
analyzed: tathā hi uttara a pratibhānena vādinoḥ anyataraḥ parājīyate na vā na parājīyate iti katham ucyate tat kim mūle eva jitvā gacchatu

original: nigṛhyate cet kim anenāparāddham nādoṣa udbhāvitaḥ //
analyzed: nigṛhyate ced kim anena aparāddham na a doṣaḥ udbhāvitaḥ

original: atha prasajyapratiṣedhenodbhāvanābhāva eva vyākhyāyate tarhi dūṣaṇābhāsodbhāvanam anumataṃ syāt /
analyzed: atha prasajya pratiṣedhena udbhāvana abhāvaḥ eva vyākhyāyate tarhi dūṣaṇa ābhāsa udbhāvanam anumatam syāt

original: atha doṣānudbhāvanam ādau vyākhyāya punar adoṣodbhāvanam āvṛttya paryudāsena varṇyate hanta tarhi te evaite vipratipattyapratipattī ukte syātām /
analyzed: atha doṣa anudbhāvanam ādau vyākhyāya punar adoṣa udbhāvanam āvṛttya paryudāsena varṇyate hanta tarhi te eva ete vipratipatti apratipattī ukte syātām

original: doṣānudbhāvanam apratipattiḥ viparītadoṣodbhāvanaṃ vipratipattiḥ //
analyzed: doṣa anudbhāvanam apratipattiḥ viparīta doṣa udbhāvanam vipratipattiḥ

original: evam asādhanāṅgavacanam api vikalpanīyam /
analyzed: evam asādhana aṅga vacanam api vikalpanīyam

original: prasajyapratiṣedhavṛttyā sādhanāṅgasyāvacanaṃ cet seyam apratipattiḥ /
analyzed: prasajya pratiṣedha vṛttyā sādhana aṅgasya avacanam ced sā iyam apratipattiḥ

original: paryudāsavṛttyā sādhanāṅgād anyac cet vacanaṃ seyaṃ vipratipattiḥ /
analyzed: paryudāsa vṛttyā sādhana aṅgāt anyat ced vacanam sā iyam vipratipattiḥ

original: ataḥ śabdāntareṇākṣapādapādebhya eva śiśikṣitvā tad eva nigrahasthānadvayam anena ślokadvayena nibaddham na punar abhinavam alpam api kiñcid utprekṣitam iti //
analyzed: atas śabda antareṇa akṣapāda pādebhyaḥ eva śiśikṣitvā tat eva nigrahasthāna dvayam anena śloka dvayena nibaddham na punar abhinavam alpam api kiñcid utprekṣitam iti

original: na ca yathāsaṃkhyaniyamena dvayor dve nigrahasthāne varṇanīye api tu yathā saṃbhavam ubhayor api yathāvasaraṃ tat tan nigrahasthānam ādeṣṭavyam /
analyzed: na ca yathāsaṃkhya niyamena dvayoḥ dve nigrahasthāne varṇanīye api tu yathā saṃbhavam ubhayoḥ api yathāvasaram tat tat nigrahasthānam ādeṣṭavyam

original: dvāviṃśat ibhedatvaṃ ca nigrahasthānānām asaṅkīrṇOdāharaṇavivakṣayā kathyate na niyamāyety uktam eva /
analyzed: dvāviṃśat i bheda tvam ca nigrahasthānānām asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā kathyate na niyamāya iti uktam eva

original: parasparavisadṛśaṃ ca lakṣaṇam eṣāṃ idānīm upadiśyata eva /
analyzed: paraspara visadṛśam ca lakṣaṇam eṣām idānīm upadiśyate eva

original: tatraiva cāyuktatvam eṣām bāliśapralāpakaplatvaṃ vā parākriyata evety alam atiprasaṅgena //
analyzed: tatra eva ca ayukta tvam eṣām vā parākriyate eva iti alam atiprasaṅgena

original: evaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāgaṃ cābhidhāya viśeṣalakṣaṇāny āha pratidṛṣṭāntadharmānujñā svadṛṣṭānte pratijñāhāniḥ //5.2.2.//
analyzed: evam sāmānya lakṣaṇam vibhāgam ca abhidhāya viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni āha pratidṛṣṭānta dharma anujñā sva dṛṣṭānte pratijñāhāniḥ

original: pratijññsiddhaye vādinā sādhane 'bhihite tatra pratipādinā ca dūṣaṇe udbhāvite tṛtīye vacasi tu vartamāno vādī yadi pratidṛṣṭāntadharmaṃ svadṛṣṭānte 'nujānāti tad asya pratijñā hīyata iti pratijñhānir nām nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: pratijñā siddhaye vādinā sādhane bhihite tatra pratipādinā ca dūṣaṇe udbhāvite tṛtīye vacasi tu vartamānaḥ vādī yadi pratidṛṣṭānta dharmam sva dṛṣṭānte nujānāti tat asya pratijñā hīyate iti pratijñhāniḥ nām nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: tad yathā [anityaḥ śabdaḥ eindriyakatvāt ghaṭavat] ity ukte para āha[sāmānyam aindriyakam api nityaṃ dṛṣṭam ity anaikantiko hetuḥ] iti //
analyzed: tat yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ eindriyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ukte paraḥ āha sāmānyam aindriyakam api nityam dṛṣṭam iti anaikantikaḥ hetuḥ iti

original: tatra sādhanavādy āha [sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ nityam tarhi tathaiva ghaṭo'pi nityo '7stu] iti /
analyzed: tatra sādhana vādī āha sāmānyam aindriyakam nityam tarhi tathā eva ghaṭaḥ api iti

original: ayam asyaivaṃvadato bhramaḥ kila nityānityapakṣavṛttiḥ anaikāntiko bhavato hetuḥ /
analyzed: ayam asya evam vadataḥ bhramaḥ kila nitya anitya pakṣa vṛttiḥ anaikāntikaḥ bhavataḥ hetuḥ

original: ghaṭasya tu nityatāyāṃ ekasmin nityapakṣa eva vṛtteḥ anaikāntikatām eṣa vijahyād iti /
analyzed: ghaṭasya tu nitya tāyām ekasmin nitya pakṣe eva vṛtteḥ anaikāntika tām eṣa vijahyāt iti

original: tad evam asya bruvat pratijñāhānir bhavati /
analyzed: tat evam asya bruvat pratijñā hāniḥ bhavati

original: ghaṭasya hi nityatve taddṛṣṭāntabalād eva śabdo 'pi nityaḥ syād iti /
analyzed: ghaṭasya hi nitya tve tad dṛṣṭānta balāt eva śabdaḥ api nityaḥ syāt iti

original: atra kīrtir āha pratijñaiva tāvad asādhanāṅgavacanam iti tadabhidhānaṃ nigrahasthānaṃ bhavitum arhati na taddhāniḥ /
analyzed: atra kīrtiḥ āha pratijñā eva tāvat asādhana aṅga vacanam iti tat abhidhānam nigrahasthānam bhavitum arhati na tad hāniḥ

original: na ca hānir apy asti /
analyzed: na ca hāniḥ api asti

original: yadi nāma ghaṭasya dṛṣṭāntīkṛtasya pratidṛṣṭāntadharmaṃ nityatvam ayam abhyupaiti kim iyat ā śabdānityatvapratijñām avajahāti //
analyzed: yadi nāma ghaṭasya dṛṣṭāntīkṛtasya pratidṛṣṭānta dharmam nitya tvam ayam abhyupaiti kim iyat ā śabda anitya tva pratijñām avajahāti

original: api ca hetvābhāsā api nigrahasthānavarge gaṇitā eva /
analyzed: api ca hetvābhāsāḥ api nigrahasthāna varge gaṇitāḥ eva

original: sa cāyamm anaikāntikahetvābhāsaprayogād eva parājīyate na pratijñāhāny eti tasyā viṣayāntaraṃ vaktavyam //
analyzed: sa ca ayam anaikāntika hetvābhāsa prayogāt eva parājīyate na pratijñā hānī eti tasyāḥ viṣaya antaram vaktavyam

original: atrocyate pratijñāyās tāvad asādhanāṅgavacanatā nāstīty avayavalakṣaṇe nirṇītam etat /
analyzed: atrā ucyate pratijñāyāḥ tāvat asādhana aṅga vacana tā na asti iti avayava lakṣaṇe nirṇītam etat

original: pratijñāsiddhyartha eva sarvavādināṃ prayāsaḥ /
analyzed: pratijñā siddhi arthaḥ eva sarva vādinām prayāsaḥ

original: anirdiṣṭā ca sā sādhayitum aśakyaiveti na tadvacanam asādhanāṅgavacanam /
analyzed: anirdiṣṭā ca sā sādhayitum aśakyā evā iti na tat vacanam asādhana aṅga vacanam

original: laukikeṣv api ṛṇādānādivivādapadeṣu pratijñāhanim eva mukhyaṃ parājayakāraṇam āhuḥ /
analyzed: laukikeṣu api ṛṇa ādāna ādi vivāda padeṣu pratijñā hanim eva mukhyam parājaya kāraṇam āhuḥ

original: yathā ''ha nāradaḥ [sāras tu vyavahārāṇāṃ pratijñā samudāhṛtā /
analyzed: yathā ha nāradaḥ sāraḥ tu vyavahārāṇām pratijñā samudāhṛtā

original: taddhānau hīyate vādī taraṃs tām uttaro bhavet] iti //
analyzed: tad hānau hīyate vādī taran tām uttaraḥ bhavet iti

original: pratidṛṣṭāntadharmaṃ ca svadṛṣṭānte 'bhyupagacchan utsṛjaty eva pratijñām/
analyzed: pratidṛṣṭānta dharmam ca sva dṛṣṭānte bhyupagacchan utsṛjati eva pratijñām

original: nityatvaṃ hi sāmānyavat ghaṭasyāpi sahate /
analyzed: nitya tvam hi sāmānya vat ghaṭasya api sahate

original: taddṛṣṭāntabalena śabde 'pi siṣādhayiṣatīti nūnam idānīṃ nityatvam eva ghaṭadharmaḥ śabde siddhyed iti kathaṃ tadanityatvapratijñā 'sya na hīyate //
analyzed: tad dṛṣṭānta balena śabde siṣādhayiṣati iti nūnam idānīm nitya tvam eva ghaṭa dharmaḥ śabde siddhyet iti katham tad anitya tva pratijñā sya na hīyate

original: yat tūktaṃ hetvābhāsaprayoga eva nigrahanimittam na pratijñāhānir iti syād etad evam yadi dvitīye vacasi vyavasthitena prativādinā vyabhicārodbhāvanayā pratyavasthito vādī tāvaty eva viramet /
analyzed: yat tu uktam hetvābhāsa prayogaḥ eva nigraha nimittam na pratijñāhāniḥ iti syāt etat evam yadi dvitīye vacasi vyavasthitena prativādinā vyabhicāra udbhāvanayā pratyavasthitaḥ vādī tāvati eva viramet

original: sa tu tṛtīye vacasi vartamānaḥ taduddharaṇabuddhyā tathāvidham abhidhatte yena pratijñāṃ jahāti /
analyzed: sa tu tṛtīye vacasi vartamānaḥ tad uddharaṇa buddhyā tathāvidham abhidhatte yena pratijñām jahāti

original: ataś ca vyabhicārapariharaṇalobhābhihitapratidṛṣṭāntadharmābhyanujñāvacanopanatatadarthapratijñāhāninibandhana evāsya nigraho yuktaḥ na hetvābhāsaprayogakṛta iti ayam eva mukhyaḥ pratijñāhāner viṣayaḥ //
analyzed: atas ca vyabhicāra pariharaṇa lobha abhihita pratidṛṣṭānta dharma abhyanujñā vacana upanata tad artha pratijñāhāni nibandhanaḥ eva asya nigrahaḥ yuktaḥ na hetvābhāsa prayoga kṛtaḥ iti ayam eva mukhyaḥ pratijñāhāneḥ viṣayaḥ

original: pratijñātāṛthapratiṣedhe dharme vikalpāt tadarthanirdeśaḥ pratijñāntaram //5.2.3//
analyzed: pratijñāta aṛtha pratiṣedhe dharme vikalpāt tad artha nirdeśaḥ pratijñāntaram

original: pratijñātāṛthapratiṣedhe pareṇa kṛte tatraiva dharmiṇi dharmāntaraṃ sādhanīyavādinaḥ pratisāntaraṃ mabhidadhato nāma nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: pratijñāta aṛtha pratiṣedhe pareṇa kṛte tatra eva dharmiṇi dharma antaram sādhanīyavādinaḥ nāma nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: [anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyakatvāt] ity ukte pūrvavat sāmānyena vyabhicārodbhāvanayā pratyavasthita āha [sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ yan nityaṃ tad yuktam /
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt iti ukte pūrvavat sāmānyena vyabhicāra udbhāvanayā pratyavasthitaḥ āha sāmānyam aindriyakam yat nityam tat yuktam

original: tad dhi sarvagatam /
analyzed: tat hi sarva gatam

original: asarvagatas tu śabda iti no darśanam] iti /
analyzed: a sarva gataḥ tu śabdaḥ iti na u darśanam iti

original: so 'yaṃ [anityaḥ śabdaḥ] iti pūrvapratijñātaḥ anyam [asarvagataḥ śabdaḥ] iti pratijñāṃ kurvan pratijñāntareṇa nigṛhīto bhavati //
analyzed: saḥ yam anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pūrva pratijñātaḥ anyam a sarva gataḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñām kurvan pratijñā antareṇa nigṛhītaḥ bhavati

original: atrāha nedam aprastutapratijñāntarakaraṇam api tu parodbhāvitavyabhicāranirākaraṇaviśeṣotpādanam //
analyzed: atrā āha na idam aprastuta pratijñāntara karaṇam api tu para udbhāvita vyabhicāra nirākaraṇa viśeṣa utpādanam

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati asarvagatatve saty aindriyakatvād anityaḥ śabda iti /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati asarvagata tve sati aindriyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: tad idam asarvagatatvapratijñāsiddhyartham upāttaṃ kathaṃ nigrahasthānam /
analyzed: tat idam a sarvagata tva pratijñā siddhi artham upāttam katham nigrahasthānam

original: yo hi mīmāṃsakaṃ prati [anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt] ity uktavān tena kṛtakatvam asiddham ity upālabdhaḥ kṛtakatvasiddhaye yateta sa kiṃ kṛtakatvapratijāntarakaraṇān nigṛhyeta //
analyzed: yaḥ hi mīmāṃsakam prati anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti uktavān tena kṛtaka tvam asiddham iti upālabdhaḥ kṛtaka tva siddhaye yateta sa kim kṛtaka tva pratijā antara karaṇāt nigṛhyeta

original: yas tu pūrvapratijñām avadhīrya tad anaupayikam akasmād eva pratijñāntaram ārabheta sa tadā unmatta eva bhavet /
analyzed: yaḥ tu pūrva pratijñām avadhīrya tat anaupayikam akasmāt eva pratijñāntaram ārabheta sa tadā unmattaḥ eva bhavet

original: na conmattapralāpānāṃ śāstre lakṣaṇakaraṇaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: na ca unmatta pralāpānām śāstre lakṣaṇa karaṇam yuktam

original: spaṣṭe ca nigrahahetau hetvābhāsābhidhāne saṃbhavati kim iti pratijñāntaraṃ nigrahasthānam ucyata iti //
analyzed: spaṣṭe ca nigraha hetau hetvābhāsa abhidhāne saṃbhavati kim iti pratijñāntaram nigrahasthānam ucyate iti

original: atrocyate pratijñāsiddhaye hetudṛṣṭāntau prayoktavyau na punaḥ pratijñāntaraṃ karaṇīyam iti sthitiḥ /
analyzed: atrā ucyate pratijñā siddhaye hetu dṛṣṭāntau prayoktavyau na punar pratijñāntaram karaṇīyam iti sthitiḥ

original: iha ca yo hetuḥ anenopāttaḥ tasmin pareṇānaikāntikīkṛte sati na tatparihāraprakāram anuguṇam ayam āsthitavān /
analyzed: iha ca yaḥ hetuḥ anena upāttaḥ tasmin pareṇa anaikāntikīkṛte sati na tad parihāra prakāram anuguṇam ayam āsthitavān

original: api tu asarvagatatvapratijñām anyām ārūḍhaḥ //
analyzed: api tu asarvagata tva pratijñām anyām ārūḍhaḥ

original: nanu viśeṣaṇam etad anaikāntikatvaparihārārtham na pratijñāntaram ity uktam na asiddatvāt /
analyzed: nanu viśeṣaṇam etat anaikāntika tva parihāra artham na pratijñāntaram iti uktam na asiddha tvāt

original: siddhaṃ hi viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: siddham hi viśeṣaṇam bhavati

original: nityatvavādinaṃ ca prati śabdasyāsarvagatatvam asiddham /
analyzed: nitya tva vādinam ca prati śabdasya asarvagata tvam asiddham

original: sādhyate cet tarhi pratijñāntaram evedam hetvādyavayavavailakṣaṇyāt pratijñālakṣaṇasya ca sādhyanirdeśasyopapatteḥ /
analyzed: sādhyate ced tarhi pratijñāntaram evā idam hetu ādi avayava vailakṣaṇyāt pratijñā lakṣaṇasya ca sādhya nirdeśasya upapatteḥ

original: anaikāntikatvaparihṛtaye hi hetuviśeṣaṇaṃ siddhaṃ vācyam na tu dharmiviśeṣaṇaṃ sādhyaṃ ceti //
analyzed: anaikāntika tva parihṛtaye hi hetu viśeṣaṇam siddham vācyam na tu dharmi viśeṣaṇam sādhyam ca iti

original: anyatarāsiddhe tu hetvābhāse tatsamarthanaṃ prakramānurūpam eveti na pratijñāntaraṃ nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: anyatara asiddhe tu hetvābhāse tad samarthanam prakrama anurūpam eva iti na pratijñāntaram nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: iha tu anaikāntikatvaparihārāya yatamānaḥ mārgam anuguṇam apaśyan skhalita iti nigṛhyate /
analyzed: iha tu anaikāntika tva parihārāya yatamānaḥ mārgam anuguṇam a paśyan skhalitaḥ iti nigṛhyate

original: na ca hetūdāharaṇādiprayoganipuṇamater api bhramād evaṃvidham abhidhānaṃ na saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na ca hetu udāharaṇa ādi prayoga nipuṇa mateḥ api bhramāt evaṃvidham abhidhānam na saṃbhavati

original: na ca pratijñāmātreṇa soddhim icchann evaṃ bravīti api tu vyabhicāraṃ parijihīrṣann iti //
analyzed: na ca pratijñā mātreṇa soddhim icchan evam bravīti api tu vyabhicāram parijihīrṣan iti

original: na cāyam unmattapralāpa eva prastutānuguṇyabuddhyā prayogāt /
analyzed: na ca ayam unmatta pralāpaḥ eva prastuta ānuguṇya buddhyā prayogāt

original: api ca [anityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣatvāt] ity ubhayāsiddho nāma hetvābhāsaḥ bhavadbhir api śāstre lakṣita eva /
analyzed: api ca anityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt iti ubhayāsiddhaḥ nāma hetvābhāsaḥ bhavadbhiḥ api śāstre lakṣitaḥ eva

original: sa unmattapralāpo na bhavati yathodāhṛtam tat pratijñāntaram unmattapralāpa ity apūrva eṣa bhikṣoḥ svadarśane rāgaḥ paradarśane dveṣo vā /
analyzed: saḥ unmatta pralāpaḥ na bhavati yathā udāhṛtam tat pratijñāntaram unmatta pralāpaḥ iti apūrvaḥ eṣa bhikṣoḥ sva darśane rāgaḥ para darśane dveṣaḥ vā

original: ko hi nāma śiśur api śabde cākṣuṣatāṃ brūyāt /
analyzed: kaḥ hi nāma śiśuḥ api śabde cākṣuṣa tām brūyāt

original: idaṃ tu saṃbhavaty evābhidhānam /
analyzed: idam tu saṃbhavati eva abhidhānam

original: kevalaṃ hetuviśeṣaṇe siddhe ca vaktavye bhramāt dharmiviśeṣaṇaṃ sādhyaṃ cāyam uktavān iti nigṛhyate //
analyzed: kevalam hetu viśeṣaṇe siddhe ca vaktavye bhramāt dharmi viśeṣaṇam sādhyam ca ayam uktavān iti nigṛhyate

original: tṛtīye vacasi sthitaś caivam asāv uktavān iti nimittāntaram idam asya nigrahe nirūpitam /
analyzed: tṛtīye vacasi sthitaḥ ca evam asau uktavān iti nimitta antaram idam asya nigrahe nirūpitam

original: dvitīya eva tu vacasi kathāviratau hetvābhāsaprayogād eva nigraham āpnuyād iti pratijñāhāniprastāva evoktam //
analyzed: dvitīye eva tu vacasi kathā viratau hetvābhāsa prayogāt eva nigraham āpnuyāt iti pratijñāhāni prastāve eva uktam

original: pratijñāhetvor virodhaḥ pratijñāvirodhaḥ //5.2.4//
analyzed: pratijñā hetvoḥ virodhaḥ pratijñāvirodhaḥ

original: yatra pratijñā hetunā viruddhyate hetur vā pratijñayā saḥ pratijñāvirodho nāma nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yatra pratijñā hetunā viruddhyate hetuḥ vā pratijñayā saḥ pratijñāvirodhaḥ nāma nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: [guṇavyatiriktaṃ dravyam] iti pratijñā [rūpādibhyo 'rthāntarasyānupalabdheḥ] iti hetuḥ /
analyzed: guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam iti pratijñā rūpa ādibhyaḥ ṛtha antarasya anupalabdheḥ iti hetuḥ

original: so 'yaṃ pratijñāhetvor virodhaḥ yadi guṇavyatiriktaṃ dravyam na tarhi rūpādibhyo 'rthāntarasyānupalabdhiḥ /
analyzed: saḥ yam pratijñā hetvoḥ virodhaḥ yadi guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam na tarhi rūpa ādibhyaḥ ṛtha antarasya anupalabdhiḥ

original: atha rūpādibhyo 'rthāntarasyānupalabdhiḥ na tarhi guṇavyatiriktaṃ dravyam /
analyzed: atha rūpa ādibhyaḥ ṛtha antarasya anupalabdhiḥ na tarhi guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam

original: guṇavyatiriktaṃ ca dravyaṃ ca rūpādivyatiriktasyānupalabdhir iti vyāhatam //
analyzed: guṇa vyatiriktam ca dravyam ca rūpa ādi vyatiriktasya anupalabdhiḥ iti vyāhatam

original: atrāha nedaṃ pratijñāhetvor virodhodāharaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati hetor asaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: atra āha na idam pratijñā hetvoḥ virodha udāharaṇam bhavitum arhati hetoḥ asaṃbhavāt

original: saṃbhavan hi hetuḥ pratijñāyā viruṇaddhi /
analyzed: saṃbhavan hi hetuḥ pratijñāyāḥ viruṇaddhi

original: tayā vā viruddhyate /
analyzed: tayā vā viruddhyate

original: iha tu upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ na samasty eva rūpādibhyo 'rthāntarasya pṛthaktvenopalabdhiyogyatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: iha tu upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdhiḥ na samasti eva rūpa ādibhyaḥ ṛtha antarasya pṛthaktvena upalabdhi yogya tva anupapatteḥ

original: saṃbhavann api caivaṃvidhe viṣaye pratijñāvirodhe hetuḥ na dvayīṃ doṣajātim ativartate viruddhatvam asiddhatvaṃ vā /
analyzed: saṃbhavan api ca evaṃvidhe viṣaye pratijñā virodhe hetuḥ na dvayīm doṣa jātim ativartate viruddha tvam asiddha tvam vā

original: guṇavyatiriktadravyavādino hi bhedenāgrahaṇam asiddho hetuḥ /
analyzed: guṇa vyatirikta dravya vādinaḥ hi bhedena agrahaṇam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ

original: siddhatve vā sādhyaviparyayasādhanāt viruddha iti /
analyzed: siddha tve vā sādhya viparyaya sādhanāt viruddhaḥ iti

original: ato hetvābhāsagrahaṇena gatārthatvāt na pṛthagvaktavyam idaṃ nigrahasthānam //
analyzed: atas hetvābhāsa grahaṇena gatārtha tvāt na pṛthak vaktavyam idam nigrahasthānam

original: yat anyad anyair udāharaṇam abhāṇi [nityaḥ śabdaḥ sarvasyānityatvāt] iti tad apy asādhu vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasyānena prakāreṇa kuśikṣitair abhidhānāt /
analyzed: yat anyat anyaiḥ udāharaṇam abhāṇi nityaḥ śabdaḥ sarvasya anitya tvāt iti tat api asādhu vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntasya anena prakāreṇa kuśikṣitaiḥ abhidhānāt

original: [nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayavatvāt] iti /
analyzed: nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt iti

original: tatra vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyābhāve hetor abhāvaṃ pradarśayatā vaktavyam nityaḥ śabdaḥ anityasarvatvāt sāvayavatvāt iti /
analyzed: tatra vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya abhāve hetoḥ abhāvam pradarśayatā vaktavyam nityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya sarva tvāt sāvayava tvāt iti

original: so 'yam aśikṣitavaidharmyadṛṣṭāṃtapradarśanaprakramaiḥviparyayeṇa vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta eva kathitaḥ [sarvasyānityatvāt] iti /
analyzed: saḥ yam a śikṣita vaidharmya dṛṣṭāṃta pradarśana prakramaiḥ viparyayeṇa vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva kathitaḥ sarvasya anitya tvāt iti

original: tad uktaṃ sa hi dṛṣṭānta evoktaḥ vaidharmyeṇa suśikṣitaiḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam sa hi dṛṣṭāntaḥ evā uktaḥ vaidharmyeṇa su śikṣitaiḥ

original: iti tasmān nedam api pratijñāhetuvirodhodāharaṇam iti //
analyzed: iti tasmāt na idam api pratijñā hetu virodha udāharaṇam iti

original: atrocyate yad uktaṃ hetor asaṃbhavān nedaṃ nigrahasthānam iti tad acāru paṃcamyantanirdiṣṭasya hetoḥ pradarśitatvāt /
analyzed: atrā ucyate yat uktam hetoḥ asaṃbhavāt na idam nigrahasthānam iti tat acāru paṃcamī anta nirdiṣṭasya hetoḥ pradarśita tvāt

original: niravadyahetvābhāvāt tu yadi tadasaṃbhava ucyate tarhi hetvābhāsavyākaraṇam apy akaraṇīyaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: niravadya hetu ābhāvāt tu yadi tad asaṃbhavaḥ ucyate tarhi hetvābhāsa vyākaraṇam api akaraṇīyam bhavet

original: puruṣabuddhipramādanibandhanahetuprayogas tu tathāvidham  apy abhidhānaṃ saṃbhavaty eva //
analyzed: puruṣa buddhi pramāda nibandhana hetu prayogaḥ tu tathāvidham api abhidhānam saṃbhavati eva

original: yat punar abhyadhāyi saṃbhavann api hetur ayam asiddhaviruddhayor anyataro bhavet na dūṣaṇāntaram iti tatra brūmaḥ satyam etat kin tu hetusvarūpanirūpaṇāvasare sa yadi tadgatadoṣād adoṣadarśanāt viruddhatā tasyābhidhīyate /
analyzed: yat punar abhyadhāyi saṃbhavan api hetuḥ ayam asiddha viruddhayoḥ anyataraḥ bhavet na dūṣaṇa antaram iti tatra brūmaḥ satyam etat kin tu hetu svarūpa nirūpaṇa avasare sa yadi tad gata doṣāt adoṣa darśanāt viruddha tā tasya abhidhīyate

original: yathā bhavadbhiḥ [nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt] iti viruddhahetau varṇite kvacit siddhasādhyavtvadṛṣṭāntahāniṭādisoṣāntarasaṃbhave tadavadhīraṇayā virddhatvem eva darśitam /
analyzed: yathā bhavadbhiḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti viruddha hetau varṇite kvacid tad avadhīraṇayā eva darśitam

original: yathā vā hetvābhāsalakṣaṇe kathitam asmābhiḥ [anityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣatvāt] ity asyānaikāntikatvadoṣe saty api prathamataram asiddhataiva hṛdayapatham avatarati tenāsiddhho 'yam ucyate na savyabhicāra iti /
analyzed: yathā vā hetvābhāsa lakṣaṇe kathitam asmābhiḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣa tvāt iti asya anaikāntika tva doṣe sati api prathamataram asiddha tā eva hṛdaya patham avatarati tena asiddhhaḥ yam ucyate na savyabhicāraḥ iti

original: evam ihāpi hetuguṇadoṣavicāre kriyamāṇe viruddhatādihetvābhāsatā 'sya kathyate //
analyzed: evam iha api hetu guṇa doṣa vicāre kriyamāṇe viruddha tā ādi hetvābhāsa tā kathyate

original: yadā tu parārthānumānavākyasya paṃcāvayavasya paramatena vā tryavayavasya parasparānvitapadārthasamudāyātmā vākyārthaś cintyate tatra itaretaravyāhatārthavādinoḥ pratijñāhetupadayoḥ asaṃsargāt tadvirodha eva jhaṭiti manaso viparivartata iti sa eva nigrahanimittaṃ bhavitum arhati yata itaretaravirodhinam anvitārtham abhidadhati vākye 'pi vipratipattir apratipattir vā bhaved ity ada eva nigrahasthānam //
analyzed: yadā tu parārtha anumāna vākyasya paṃca avayavasya para matena vā tri avayavasya paraspara anvita padārtha samudāya ātmā vākya arthaḥ cintyate tatra itaretara vyāhata artha vādinoḥ pratijñā hetu padayoḥ a saṃsargāt tad virodhaḥ eva jhaṭiti manasaḥ viparivartate iti saḥ eva nigraha nimittam bhavitum arhati yatas itaretara virodhinam anvita artham abhidadhati vākye vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ vā bhavet iti adaḥ eva nigrahasthānam

original: api ca sāḍhyaviparyayasādhaka eva viruddhahetur ucyate yaḥ pratijñām eva bādhate /
analyzed: api ca sāḍhya viparyaya sādhakaḥ eva viruddha hetuḥ ucyate yaḥ pratijñām eva bādhate

original: iha tu pratijñayā hetur bādhyate pratijñā vā hetuneti vikalpyamānatvāt /
analyzed: iha tu pratijñayā hetuḥ bādhyate pratijñā vā hetunā iti vikalpyamāna tvāt

original: nigrahasthānāntaram evedam //
analyzed: nigrahasthāna antaram eva idam

original: ittham asyaivodāharaṇasyopapatteḥ udāharaṇāntaranirūpaṇaṃ vṛthā 'ṭāṭYaiva //
analyzed: ittham asya eva udāharaṇasya upapatteḥ udāharaṇa antara nirūpaṇam vṛthā ṭāṭyā eva

original: bhāṭṭais tu bhavadīyaṃ nirālambanasādhanaṃ pratijñāvirodhodāharaṇaṃ varṇitam [nirālambanāḥ sarve pratyayāḥ pratyayatvāt] iti /
analyzed: bhāṭṭaiḥ tu bhavadīyam nirālambana sādhanam pratijñā virodha udāharaṇam varṇitam nirālambanāḥ sarve pratyayāḥ pratyaya tvāt iti

original: yataḥ pratyayatvahetugrāhakajñānasālambanatve tenaivaiṣā pratijñā viruddhyate /
analyzed: yatas pratyaya tva hetu grāhaka jñāna sa ālambana tve tena eva eṣā pratijñā viruddhyate

original: tannirālambanatve tu hetvabhāva eva syād iti /
analyzed: tad nirālambana tve tu hetu abhāvaḥ eva syāt iti

original: tad uktam [vispaṣṭaś cākṣapādokto virodho hetusādhyayoḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam vispaṣṭaḥ ca akṣapāda uktaḥ virodhaḥ hetu sādhyayoḥ

original: yam adṛṣṭvā parair uktam adūṣaṇam idaṃ kila] iti //
analyzed: yam a dṛṣṭvā paraiḥ uktam adūṣaṇam idam kila iti

original: tat sarvathā sulabhodāharaṇam idaṃ pratijñāhetuvirodhākhyaṃ nigrahasthānam iti sthitiḥ //
analyzed: tat sarvathā sulabha udāharaṇam idam pratijñā hetu virodha ākhyam nigrahasthānam iti sthitiḥ

original: pakṣapratiṣedhe pratijñātāṛthāpanayanaṃ pratijñāsannyāsaḥ //5.2.5//
analyzed: pakṣa pratiṣedhe pratijñāta aṛtha apanayanam pratijñā sannyāsaḥ

original: pakṣasādhane pareṇa dūṣite taduddhāraṇāśaktyā pratijñām eva nihnuvānasya pratijñāsannyāso nāma nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: pakṣa sādhane pareṇa dūṣite tad uddhāraṇa aśaktyā pratijñām eva nihnuvānasya pratijñāsannyāsaḥ nāma nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: [anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyakatvāt] ity ukte tathaiva sāmānyenānaikāntikatāyām udghāṭitāyāṃ yat pratibravīti [ka evam āhānityaḥ śabda iti so 'yam evaṃ bruvan pratijñāsannyāsāt parājīyate //
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt iti ukte tathā eva sāmānyena anaikāntika tāyām udghāṭitāyām yat pratibravīti kaḥ evam āha anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti saḥ yam evam bruvan pratijñā sannyāsāt parājīyate

original: atrāha astisthūlaḥ khalv ayaṃ pramādaḥ /
analyzed: atra āha asti sthūlaḥ khalu ayam pramādaḥ

original: ko hi nāma prativādī prāśnikasannidhāne pratijñāṃ kṛtvā tadaiva teṣām evābhraṣṭasaṃskārāṇāṃ purataḥ apasmārakāḍyanupaplutamatiḥ tām eva nihnuvīta //
analyzed: kaḥ hi nāma prativādī prāśnika sannidhāne pratijñām kṛtvā tadā eva teṣām eva abhraṣṭa saṃskārāṇām puratas apasmāra kāḍī anupapluta matiḥ tām eva nihnuvīta

original: api ca dyutaparājitapaṇarahitaśaṭhakitavavad udāsīnaḥ pratijñām ajahad api hetāv anaikāntike kim asau na nigṛhyate /
analyzed: api ca dyuta parājita paṇa rahita śaṭha kitava vat udāsīnaḥ pratijñām ajahat api hetau anaikāntike kim asau na nigṛhyate

original: na hi pratijñāyās tyāgātyāgau tadīyayoḥ nigrahānigrahayoḥ prayojakau api tu hetuguṇadoṣāv eva /
analyzed: na hi pratijñāyāḥ tyāga atyāgau tadīyayoḥ nigraha anigrahayoḥ prayojakau api tu hetu guṇa doṣau eva

original: sa cāyaṃ sādhanavyabhicārād evānityapakṣaḥ parājīyata ity alaṃ sannyāseneti //
analyzed: sa ca ayam sādhana vyabhicārāt eva anitya pakṣaḥ parājīyate iti alam sannyāsena iti

original: atrocyate parodbhāvitahetvanaikāntikatvadūṣaṇoddharaṇaraṇaraṇakataralitamateḥ bhaved apy evaṃvadataḥ kila saṃyogavibhāgānabhivyaṅgyatve mayā pakṣīkṛte sāmānyena vyabhicāro na bhaviṣyatīti /
analyzed: atrā ucyate para udbhāvita hetu anaikāntika tva dūṣaṇa uddharaṇa raṇaraṇaka taralita mateḥ bhavet api evam vadataḥ kila saṃyoga vibhāga anabhivyaṅgya tve mayā pakṣīkṛte sāmānyena vyabhicāraḥ na bhaviṣyati iti

original: tad api hi tādṛśam eva svāśrayavyaṅgyatvād iti muhyataḥ nātisthūlam amum īdṛśaṃ pramādaṃ pratipannasya bhavaty eva nigrahahetuḥ /
analyzed: tat api hi tādṛśam eva sva āśraya vyaṅgya tvāt iti muhyataḥ na ati sthūlam amum īdṛśam pramādam pratipannasya bhavati eva nigraha hetuḥ

original: apramādinos tu nigraho nāma bāsty eva kaścid iha loke paraloke vā //
analyzed: apramādinoḥ tu nigrahaḥ nāma bā asti eva kaścid iha loke para loke vā

original: yat tu tadīyayoḥ pratijñātyāgātyāgayor anaikāntikatvenaivāsau nigṛhyata iti syād etad evaṃ yadi vyabhicārodbhāvanasamanantaram asau tūṣṇīm evāsīta /
analyzed: yat tu tadīyayoḥ pratijñā tyāga atyāgayoḥ anaikāntika tvena eva asau nigṛhyate iti syāt etat evam yadi vyabhicāra udbhāvana samanantaram asau tūṣṇīm eva āsīta

original: tathāvidhaṃ tu bravāṇas tasyaiva parājayahetos sannikṛṣṭatvāt tenaiva nigṛhīto bhavati nānaikāntikaprayogeṇeti //
analyzed: tathāvidham tu bravāṇaḥ tasya eva parājaya hetoḥ sannikṛṣṭa tvāt tena eva nigṛhītaḥ bhavati na anaikāntika prayogeṇa iti

original: aviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchato hetvantaram //5.2.6//
analyzed: a viśeṣa ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchataḥ hetvantaram

original: aviśeṣābhihite hetau pratiṣeddhe tadviśeṣam abhidadhatah hevantaraṃ nām nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: aviśeṣa abhihite hetau pratiṣeddhe tad viśeṣam abhidadhataḥ hevantaram nām nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: yathā sāṃkhyasyetthaṃvadataḥ ekaprakṛtīdaṃ vyaktam parimāṇāt ghaṭādivat iti /
analyzed: yathā sāṃkhyasya ittham vadataḥ eka prakṛti idam vyaktam parimāṇāt ghaṭa ādi vat iti

original: dvividhaṃ ca vikāreṣu dṛṣṭam iyattālakṣaṇam aṅkurādeḥ phalāntarasya caturaśratā ca ghaṭādeḥ mṛtpūrvakasya /
analyzed: dvividham ca vikāreṣu dṛṣṭam iyat tā lakṣaṇam aṅkura ādeḥ phala antarasya caturaśra tā ca ghaṭa ādeḥ mṛd pūrvakasya

original: tad etat parimitaṃ nikārajātam ekaprakṛtikaṃ dṛṣṭam ity ataḥ sarvam idam ekaprakṛti bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: tat etat parimitam nikāra jātam eka prakṛtikam dṛṣṭam iti atas sarvam idam eka prakṛti bhavitum arhati

original: yā ca saikā prakṛtiḥ tat pradhānam iti //
analyzed: yā ca sā ekā prakṛtiḥ tat pradhānam iti

original: asya hetor vyabhicāraḥ nānāprakṛtīnām api pariṇāmadarśanād iti /
analyzed: asya hetoḥ vyabhicāraḥ nānā prakṛtīnām api pariṇāma darśanāt iti

original: tatparijihīrṣayā viśeṣaṇam āha samanvayād iti /
analyzed: tad parijihīrṣayā viśeṣaṇam āha samanvayāt iti

original: sukhaduḥkhamohasamanvitaṃ hi sarvaṃ vyaktaṃ parimitaṃ dṛśyata iti /
analyzed: sukha duḥkha moha samanvitam hi sarvam vyaktam parimitam dṛśyate iti

original: tasya prakṛtyantararūpasamanvayābhāvād ekaprakṛtikatvām iti /
analyzed: tasya prakṛti antara rūpa samanvaya abhāvāt iti

original: tad idaṃ hetvantaraṃ nigrahasthānam prāguktāviśeṣaṇahetoḥ svayam eva hetutvāmarṣaṇāḍ iti //
analyzed: tat idam hetvantaram nigrahasthānam prāgukta a viśeṣaṇa hetoḥ svayam eva hetu tva amarṣaṇāt iti

original: atrāha kim ayaṃ dagdho dahyate mṛto vā māryate /
analyzed: atra āha kim ayam dagdhaḥ dahyate mṛtaḥ vā māryate

original: anaikāntikahetūpanyāsenaiva khalv ayaṃ tapasvī nigṛhīta eva asādhanāṅgavacanād iti kṛtaṃ hetvantarākhyanigrahasthānāntarodīraṇeneti atrocyate yad uktam eva tat dvitīye vacasi kathāsamāptau yathā tu bhavān āha /
analyzed: anaikāntika hetu upanyāsena eva khalu ayam tapasvī nigṛhītaḥ eva asādhana aṅga vacanāt iti kṛtam hetvantara ākhya nigrahasthāna antara udīraṇena iti atra ucyate yat uktam eva tat dvitīye vacasi kathā samāptau yathā tu bhavān āha

original: yadā tu vyabhicāranirākaraṇāya viśeṣaṇam aparam adhikam adhunā 'bhidhātuṃ pravṛttaḥ tadā tadupādānād eva nigṛhyata iti piṣṭapeṣaṇaṃsaṃpratyevāyam iṣyate /
analyzed: yadā tu vyabhicāra nirākaraṇāya viśeṣaṇam aparam adhikam adhunā abhidhātum pravṛttaḥ tadā tad upādānāt eva nigṛhyate iti piṣṭa peṣaṇam saṃprati eva ayam iṣyate

original: puruṣaśaktiparīkṣātmake ca jalpe nigrahasthānam idam /
analyzed: puruṣa śakti parīkṣā ātmake ca jalpe nigrahasthānam idam

original: vāde tu viśuddhāśayatayā vastuniparīkṣyamāṇe viśeṣaṇāntaropādāne 'pi tadvicāraḥ prastotavyaḥ na nigrahaḥ kārya ity abhiyuktāḥ //
analyzed: vāde tu viśuddha āśaya tayā vastuni parīkṣyamāṇe viśeṣaṇa antara upādāne tad vicāraḥ prastotavyaḥ na nigrahaḥ kāryaḥ iti abhiyuktāḥ

original: prakṛtād arthād apratisaṃbaddhārham arthāntaram //5.2.7//
analyzed: prakṛtāt arthāt a pratisaṃbaddha arham arthāntaram

original: prakṛtād arhād arthantaraṃ tadanaupanikam abhidadhataḥ arthāntaraṃ nāma nigrahasthāne bhavati //
analyzed: prakṛtāt arhāt arthantaram tat anaupanikam abhidadhataḥ arthāntaram nāma nigrahasthāne bhavati

original: yathā kaścid vaiyākaraṇaviṭaḥ sphoṭātmānaṃ śabdaṃ cetasi nidhāya tannityatvasiddhaye [nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayavatvāt] ity abhidhitsur eva duritakarmādibhiḥ anaikāntikatām āśaṅkamānaḥ arthāntaraṃ nāma nigrahasthānaṃ jigamiṣuḥ tatraiva vākyaśeṣacchāyayottiṣṭhati [nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayavatvāt] iti vayaṃ pāṇinīyāḥ pratipannāḥ ye bhagavataḥ pāṇineś chātrāḥ iti /
analyzed: yathā kaścid vaiyākaraṇa viṭaḥ sphoṭa ātmānam śabdam cetasi nidhāya tad nitya tva siddhaye nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt iti abhidhitsuḥ eva durita karma ādibhiḥ anaikāntika tām āśaṅkamānaḥ arthāntaram nāma nigrahasthānam jigamiṣuḥ tatra eva vākyaśeṣa chāyayā uttiṣṭhati nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt iti vayam pāṇinīyāḥ pratipannāḥ ye bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ chātrāḥ iti

original: kaḥ punar bhagavān pāṇinir iti yenākṣarasamāmnāyam adhigamya maheśvarāt /
analyzed: kaḥ punar bhagavān pāṇiniḥ iti yena akṣara samāmnāyam adhigamya maheśvarāt

original: kṛtsnaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ proktaṃ ācāryo nas sa pāṇiniḥ //
analyzed: kṛtsnam vyākaraṇam proktam ācāryaḥ naḥ sa pāṇiniḥ

original: kaḥ punar maheśvaraḥ yato 'kṣarasamāmnāyam adhijagāma pāninir iti atyudbhaṭajaṭājuṭākoṭigrathitacandramāḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ punar maheśvaraḥ yatas kṣara samāmnāyam adhijagāma pāniniḥ iti ati udbhaṭa jaṭā juṭā koṭi grathita candramāḥ

original: viśvasthitibhavadhvaṃsahetur eko maheśvaraḥ //
analyzed: viśva sthiti bhava dhvaṃsa hetuḥ ekaḥ maheśvaraḥ

original: api ca acintyaveṣābharaṇasya tattvataḥ yadṛcchayā yasya niśāsu tāṇḍavam /
analyzed: api ca acintya veṣa ābharaṇasya tattvataḥ yadṛcchayā yasya niśāsu tāṇḍavam

original: sa bhasmabhaktīni bibharti maulinā kṛtāṃjaliḥ pādarajāṃsi vāsavaḥ //
analyzed: sa bhasma bhaktīni bibharti maulinā kṛtāṃjaliḥ pāda rajāṃsi vāsavaḥ

original: kīdṛśaṃ punas tāṇḍavaṃ tanoti khaṇḍaparaśur iti itthaṃcārī kramo yasmin itthaṃ ca karavartanāḥ /
analyzed: kīdṛśam punar tāṇḍavam tanoti khaṇḍaparaśuḥ iti itthaṃcārī kramaḥ yasmin ittham ca kara vartanāḥ

original: itthaṃ yatra kaṭicchedāḥ daṇḍapādās tathedṛśāḥ //
analyzed: ittham yatra kaṭi chedāḥ daṇḍa pādāḥ tathā īdṛśāḥ

original: ity ekaikam upadeśayan utthāya nṛtyati /
analyzed: iti ekaikam upadeśayan utthāya nṛtyati

original: tad etad arthāntaraṃ nigrahasthānam asādhanāṅgam iti //
analyzed: tat etat arthāntaram nigrahasthānam asādhana aṅgam iti

original: kīrtinā 'py anumoditam dvayor api ca vādiprativādinoḥ prakṛtānanuguṇam abhidadhatoḥ bhavaty ado nigrahasthānam /
analyzed: kīrtinā pi anumoditam dvayoḥ api ca vādi prativādinoḥ prakṛta ananuguṇam abhidadhatoḥ bhavati adaḥ nigrahasthānam

original: yathākramam ekasya sādhanam anavadyam apaśyato dvitīyasya dūṣaṇam iti /
analyzed: yathākramam ekasya sādhanam anavadyam a paśyataḥ dvitīyasya dūṣaṇam iti

original: varṇakramanirdeśavan nirarthakam //5.2.8//
analyzed: varṇa krama nirdeśa vat nirarthakam

original: abhidheyarahitavarṇānupūrvīprayogamātraṃ nirarthakaṃ nām nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati [anityaḥ śabdaḥ kacaṭatapānāṃ gajaḍadabatvāt ghajhaḍhadhabhavat ] ity evaṃ nigrahasthānam /
analyzed: abhidheya rahita varṇa ānupūrvī prayoga mātram nirarthakam nām nigrahasthānam bhavati anityaḥ śabdaḥ ka ca ṭa ta pānām ga ja ḍa da ba tvāt gha jha ḍha dha bhavat iti evam nigrahasthānam

original: yathākramaṃ sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ ca yathocitam abhidhātum ajānatoḥ pūrvavad ubhayor api nigrahasthānam //
analyzed: yathākramam sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca yathā ucitam abhidhātum a jānatoḥ pūrvavat ubhayoḥ api nigrahasthānam

original: atrāha so 'yam unnmattapralāpam eva śāstre lakṣayitum upakrāntaḥ /
analyzed: atrā āha saḥ yam unnmatta pralāpam eva śāstre lakṣayitum upakrāntaḥ

original: na hy anunmattānām īdṛśyakṣarāṇi mukhān nirgacchanti /
analyzed: na hi an unmattānām īdṛśī akṣarāṇi mukhāt nirgacchanti

original: īdṛśāṃ ca nirdeśe kapolavāditrakakṣyābhitāḍanādīny api kāmaṃ śāstre nirdiśyantām //
analyzed: īdṛśām ca nirdeśe kapola vāditra kakṣyā abhitāḍana ādīni api kāmam śāstre nirdiśyantām

original: api ca varṇakramanirdeśavad iti matupā nirdeśa eva sūtre [vad]iti vatiprayogo vā matuppakṣe sarvaṃ varṇakramanirdeśayuktaṃ nigrahasthānaṃ bhaved iti hastasaṃjñādibhir idānīm udgrāhiṇikāḥ prastūyeran //
analyzed: api ca varṇa krama nirdeśa vat iti matupā nirdeśaḥ eva sūtre vat iti vati prayogaḥ vā matup pakṣe sarvam varṇa krama nirdeśa yuktam nigrahasthānam bhavet iti hasta saṃjñā ādibhiḥ idānīm udgrāhiṇikāḥ prastūyeran

original: athānarthakakramanirdeśayuktam iti vyākhyāyate tathā 'pi niyamānupapattiḥ /
analyzed: atha anarthaka krama nirdeśa yuktam iti vyākhyāyate tathā niyama anupapattiḥ

original: na hy artharahitavarṇoccāraṇam eva prakṛtānupayogān nirarthakam eva /
analyzed: na hi artha rahita varṇa uccāraṇam eva prakṛta anupayogāt nirarthakam eva

original: varṇakramanirdeśasyāpi ca kvacit prakarane sārthakatā dṛśyata eva pratyāhāravat //
analyzed: varṇa krama nirdeśasya api ca kvacid prakarane sārthaka tā dṛśyate eva pratyāhāra vat

original: vatipakṣe tu bhavati divapradarśanam etat kin tv arthāntaraeṇaiva gatārthatvāt pṛthaṅ navaktavyam //
analyzed: vati pakṣe tu bhavati diva pradarśanam etat kin tu gatārtha tvāt pṛthak na vaktavyam

original: atrocyate matupā vatinā vā 'bhidheyaśūnyatvamātram atra vivakṣitam /
analyzed: atrā ucyate matupā vatinā vā abhidheya śūnya tva mātram atra vivakṣitam

original: abhidheyaśūnyaṃ vaco nirarthakam ity uktam iti bhavati /
analyzed: abhidheya śūnyam vacaḥ nirarthakam iti uktam iti bhavati

original: eṣa eva cārthāntarād asya viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva ca artha antarāt asya viśeṣaḥ

original: tatrābhidheyasya bhāve 'pi prakṛtānupayogaḥ /
analyzed: tatra abhidheyasya bhāve prakṛta anupayogaḥ

original: iha tv abhidheyam eva nāstīti yatra kvacit prakaraṇavaśena varṇakramanirdeśasyāpi sārthakatā na tad ihodāharaṇam //
analyzed: iha tu abhidheyam eva na asti iti yatra kvacid prakaraṇa vaśena varṇa krama nirdeśasya api sārthaka tā na tat iha udāharaṇam

original: udāharaṇaṃ yadi sphuṭaṃ pṛcchasi na kupyasi cet tad bhavadīyaṃ sarvam eva vacanam ihodāharaṇam /
analyzed: udāharaṇam yadi sphuṭam pṛcchasi na kupyasi ced tat bhavadīyam sarvam eva vacanam iha udāharaṇam

original: saugatadarśane śabdānām arthāsaṃsparśitvāt svalakṣaṇe teṣām apravṛtteḥ /
analyzed: saugata darśane śabdānām artha asaṃsparśi tvāt sva lakṣaṇe teṣām apravṛtteḥ

original: apohasya cātitucchatvāt sarvaṃ tad abhidhānaṃ nirathakam //
analyzed: apohasya ca ati tuccha tvāt sarvam tat abhidhānam nirathakam

original: ata eva conmattapralāpinaḥ śākyabhikṣavo 'pi pariśuddhavṛttayaḥ paralokayāthārthyadarśanaḥ śaucācāravyavahāreṣu abāhyāḥ mahānto vidvāṃsas te kāmam arthaśūnyam api kathayantaḥ nonmattā bhavitum arhanti /
analyzed: atas eva ca unmatta pralāpinaḥ śākya bhikṣavaḥ pi pariśuddha vṛttayaḥ para loka yāthārthya darśanaḥ śauca ācāra vyavahāreṣu abāhyāḥ mahāntaḥ vidvāṃsaḥ te kāmam artha śūnyam api kathayantaḥ na unmattāḥ bhavitum arhanti

original: evam anyasyāpi prajñāpramādāt kacaṭatapādi vyāharato nonmattatā //
analyzed: evam anyasya api prajñā pramādāt ka ca ṭa ta pādi vyāharataḥ na unmatta tā

original: yac coktaṃ īdṛṣāṃ gaṇane kā pariniṣṭheti tat parihṛtam asakṛt asaṅkīrṇodāharaṇavivakṣayā dvāviṃśatibhedatvam āśritam iti //
analyzed: yat ca uktam īdṛṣām gaṇane kā pariniṣṭhā iti tat parihṛtam asakṛt asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā dvāviṃśati bheda tvam āśritam iti

original: kapolavādnādīni punaḥ akathāsvabhāvatvād acintyāny eva /
analyzed: kapola vādna ādīni punar akathā svabhāva tvāt acintyāni eva

original: yasya cāsmin kathāprasaṅge gaṇḍavāditrādi cetasi sphurati tasyānyad atijaghanyam api hṛdayam avatared ity alaṃ kaśmalagoṣṭhyeti //
analyzed: yasya ca asmin kathā prasaṅge gaṇḍa vāditra ādi cetasi sphurati tasya anyat ati jaghanyam api hṛdayam avataret iti alam kaśmala goṣṭhyā iti

original: parṣatprativādibhyāṃ trirabhihitam apy avijñātam avijñātāṛtham //5.2.9//
analyzed: parṣad prativādibhyām tris abhihitam api a vijñātam a vijñātāṛtham

original: yat sādhanavākyaṃ dūṣaṇavākyaṃ vā trirabhihitaṃ parṣadā prativādinā na vijñāyate kliṣṭaśabdaprayogam aprasiddhaprayogam atidrutoccaritam ity evaṃprakāram avijñātāṛthaṃ nām nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yat sādhana vākyam dūṣaṇa vākyam vā tris abhihitam parṣadā prativādinā na vijñāyate kliṣṭa śabda prayogam aprasiddha prayogam atidruta uccaritam iti evaṃprakāram avijñātāṛtham nām nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: asāmarthyasaṃvaraṇāu ca dhūrtair idam āśrīyate //
analyzed: a sāmarthya saṃvaraṇau ca dhūrtaiḥ idam āśrīyate

original: atrāha arthāsaṃpratyayasya samānatvāt ko 'sya nirarthakād bhedaḥ /
analyzed: atra āha artha asaṃpratyayasya samāna tvāt kaḥ sya nirarthakāt bhedaḥ

original: atha prakṛtopayogayogyam arthm asau vadati tadā parṣatprativādinor amedhāvitā kāmaṃ bahvet na tu viduṣaḥ vaktuṃ vivadataḥ parājayo bhavitum arhati //
analyzed: atha prakṛta upayoga yogyam artham asau vadati tadā parṣad prativādinoḥ amedhāvitā kāmam na tu viduṣaḥ vaktum vivadataḥ parājayaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: kiṃkṛtaś caiṣa triruccāraṇaniyamaḥ kiṃ rājājñayā uta svākyena iti na vidmaḥ //
analyzed: kiṃkṛtaḥ ca eṣa tris uccāraṇa niyamaḥ kim rāja ājñayā uta sva ākyena iti na vidmaḥ

original: atrocyate nirarthake sarveṇa sarvārthaśūnyatā iha tu bhavann apy artho bāvagamyate drutataroccāraṇādivyatiriktavaśād iti katham aviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: atrā ucyate nirarthake sarveṇa sarva artha śūnyatā iha tu bhavan api arthaḥ drutatara uccāraṇa ādi vyatirikta vaśāt iti katham aviśeṣaḥ

original: tatra ca kalpyate nūnam asāmarthyam ātmīyam āvarītumanāḥ evam abhidhatte na hi samartho vidvān vispaṣṭaṃ na vaktīti //
analyzed: tatra ca kalpyate nūnam a sāmarthyam ātmīyam āvarītu manāḥ evam abhidhatte na hi samarthaḥ vidvān vispaṣṭam na vakti iti

original: tritvaniyamo 'pi na vedavacananarapatiśāsananibandhanaḥ kin tu vastusthity upanata eva /
analyzed: tri tva niyamaḥ pi na veda vacana narapati śāsana nibandhanaḥ kin tu vastu sthitī upanataḥ eva

original: yataḥ sakṛt dvir apy abhihitam apy anavadhānādinā na gṛhītam iti saṃbhāvyate /
analyzed: yatas sakṛt dvis api abhihitam api anavadhāna ādinā na gṛhītam iti saṃbhāvyate

original: tris tu yad uktaṃ na jñāyate tatravaktur eva jāḍyam /
analyzed: tris tu yat uktam na jñāyate tatravaktuḥ eva jāḍyam

original: anekaprāśnikādisamāje kathitam avaśyaṃ kenāpy avagamyate /
analyzed: aneka prāśnika ādi samāje kathitam avaśyam kena api avagamyate

original: sarvai anavagamāt tu vaktaiva nigṛhyate /
analyzed: sarvaiḥ an avagamāt tu vaktā eva nigṛhyate

original: caturdhā paṃcadhā vā 'bhidhāne tv iṣyamāṇe niravadhitā 'bhidhānasya prasajyata iti yuktas trirvacananiyama iti //
analyzed: caturdhā paṃcadhā vā bhidhāne tu iṣyamāṇe niravadhi tā bhidhānasya prasajyate iti yuktaḥ trirvacana niyamaḥ iti

original: paurvāparyādiyāgād apratisaṃbaddhārtham apārthakam //5.2.10//
analyzed: paurvāparī ādi yāgāt a pratisaṃbaddha artham apārthakam

original: pūrvāparāsaṅgatapadakadambakoccāraṇād apratiṣṭhitavākyārtham apārthakaṃ nām nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: apratiṣṭhita vākya artham apārthakam nām nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: tad yathā daśadāḍimāni ṣaḍ apūpā kuṇḍamajājinaṃ palalapiṇḍaḥ kumāryāś caitrasya pitā pratiśīna iti //
analyzed: tat yathā daśa dāḍimāni ṣaḍ apūpā kuṇḍam aja ajinam palala piṇḍaḥ kumāryāḥ caitrasya pitā pratiśīnaḥ iti

original: atrāha apratisaṃbaddhavad evāsaṃbaddhavākyaṃ asaṃbaddhaprakaraṇaṃ ca nigrahasthānāntaraṃ kasmān noktam etenaiva gatāṛthatvād iti cet yady evam anarthakenaiva gatārthatvād apārthakam api pṛthaṅ na vaktavyam atrocyate nirarthke na padārthah na vākyārthaḥ kevalaṃ varṇā eva śuṣkā uccāryate /
analyzed: atra āha apratisaṃbaddha vat eva asaṃbaddha vākyam asaṃbaddha prakaraṇam ca nigrahasthāna antaram kasmāt na uktam etena eva gata aṛtha tvāt iti ced yadi evam anarthakena eva gatārtha tvāt apārthakam api pṛthak na vaktavyam atra ucyate nirarthke na vākya arthaḥ kevalam varṇāḥ eva śuṣkāḥ uccāryate

original: arthāntare'pi samanvitapadārthe vyavasthāpitavākyārtham anupakṛtaṃ tūcyate /
analyzed: artha antare api samanvita padārthe vyavasthāpita vākya artham anupakṛtam tu ucyate

original: iah tu padārthasaṃpratyaye 'pi tadanvayāsaṃbhavena vākyārthānavasāya iti spaṣṭo bhedaḥ //
analyzed: tu padārtha saṃpratyaye tad anvaya asaṃbhavena vākya artha anavasāyaḥ iti spaṣṭaḥ bhedaḥ

original: prakṛtavivādāspadībhute vastuni ko vā viśeṣa iti cet uktam atra saṃkṣepavivakṣāyāṃ dve eva nigrahasthāne /
analyzed: prakṛta vivāda āspadībhute vastuni kaḥ vā viśeṣaḥ iti ced uktam atra saṃkṣepa vivakṣāyām dve eva nigrahasthāne

original: asaṃkīrṇodāharaṇavivakṣayā tu dvāviṃśatibhedatvam /
analyzed: asaṃkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā tu dvāviṃśati bheda tvam

original: prakṛtavastusiddhis tu dvāviṃśatāv api tulyaiva //
analyzed: prakṛta vastu siddhiḥ tu dvāviṃśatau api tulyā eva

original: yat tu asaṃbaddhavākyaṃ aśbaddhaprakaraṇaṃ ca pṛthagupasaṃkhyeyam iti tan na apratisaṃbaddhapadārthenaiva tatsaṃgrahāt /
analyzed: yat tu asaṃbaddha vākyam ca pṛthak upasaṃkhyeyam iti tat na apratisaṃbaddha padārthena eva tad saṃgrahāt

original: yadi tv asaṃbaddhavākyam asaṃbaddhaprakaraṇaṃ cāvaśyaṃ vaktavyam tad yuktam eva bhavadīyaṃ śāstram /
analyzed: yadi tu asaṃbaddha vākyam asaṃbaddha prakaraṇam ca avaśyam vaktavyam tat yuktam eva bhavadīyam śāstram

original: tathā hi vaibhāṣikāṇām asti bāhyo 'rthaḥ sa ca pratyakṣaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi vaibhāṣikāṇām asti bāhyaḥ rthaḥ sa ca pratyakṣaḥ

original: sautrāntikānāṃ ca sann apy asāv anumeyaḥ /
analyzed: sautrāntikānām ca san api asau anumeyaḥ

original: yogācārāṇāṃ sākāraṃ jñānam eva na bāhyo 'rthaḥ sa ca pratyakṣaḥ /
analyzed: yoga ācārāṇām sa ākāram jñānam eva na bāhyaḥ rthaḥ sa ca pratyakṣaḥ

original: mādhyamikānāṃ ākāraśūnyaṃ svacchaṃ jñānamātram eva ity evam itaretarānanvitavākyaprakaraṇam idam aśeṣam eva śākyaśāstram /
analyzed: mādhyamikānām ākāra śūnyam svaccham jñāna mātram eva iti evam itaretara ananvita vākya prakaraṇam idam aśeṣam eva śākyaśāstram

original: āha ca daśadāḍimavākyasya bauddhaśāstrasya cedṛśaḥ /
analyzed: āha ca daśa dāḍima vākyasya bauddha śāstrasya ca īdṛśaḥ

original: anyasya cāpy abaddhasya pratiṣṭhā kena labhyate //
analyzed: anyasya ca api abaddhasya pratiṣṭhā kena labhyate

original: avayavaviparyāsavacanam aprāptakālam //5.2.11//
analyzed: avayava viparyāsa vacanam aprāpta kālam

original: pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayanigamanavacanakramam atilaṅghya avayavaviparyāsena prayujuamānam anumānavākyam aprāptakālaṃ nāma nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamana vacana kramam atilaṅghya avayava viparyāsena anumāna vākyam aprāptakālam nāma nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: atrāha na hi padānāṃ vākyeṣu niyataḥ kramaḥ kaścid asti /
analyzed: atra āha na hi padānām vākyeṣu niyataḥ kramaḥ kaścid asti

original: niyatakramakā hi varṇāḥ padatām āpadyata iti yuktam tad antareṇa tadarthānavaga māt /
analyzed: niyata kramakāḥ hi varṇāḥ pada tām āpadyate iti yuktam tat antareṇa tad artha an avaga māt

original: na hi ṭagha ity kute ghaṭāvagatir bhavati /
analyzed: na hi ṭaghaḥ iti kute ghaṭa avagatiḥ bhavati

original: vākyeṣu tu [devadatta gām śuklām ābhyāja daṇḍena] [daṇḍena śuklāṃ gām abhyāja devadattena] iti kramāntareṇāpi tathaivārthapratipatteḥ kiṃ krameṇa /
analyzed: vākyeṣu tu devadatta gām śuklām ā abhyāja daṇḍena daṇḍena śuklām gām abhyāja devadattena iti krama antareṇa api tathā eva artha pratipatteḥ kim krameṇa

original: anumānavākye tu [paṃcāvayavāḥ] ity etad eva tāvat prathamam asāṃpratam pratijñādyavayavānām asādhanāṅgavacanatvāt /
analyzed: anumāna vākye tu paṃca avayavāḥ iti etat eva tāvat prathamam asāṃpratam pratijñā ādi avayavānām asādhana aṅga vacana tvāt

original: tatra teṣāṃ paṃcāvayavānām api prayogaḥ prayoge 'pi ca kramo vivakṣitaḥ tadullṅghanaṃ ca nigrahasthānam iti mahatī mūrkhapratikryeti //
analyzed: tatra teṣām paṃca avayavānām api prayogaḥ prayoge ca kramaḥ vivakṣitaḥ tad ullṅghanam ca nigrahasthānam iti mahatī mūrkha pratikryā iti

original: atrocyate vākyāntareṣu kramavivakṣā bhavatu mā vā bhut nānena naḥ prayojanam /
analyzed: atrā ucyate vākya antareṣu krama vivakṣā bhavatu mā vā bhut na anena naḥ prayojanam

original: anumānavākye tu ārthaḥ kramaḥ balād āpatati svapratipattyanusāreṇa parapratipatter utpādanād /
analyzed: anumāna vākye tu ārthaḥ kramaḥ balāt āpatati sva pratipatti anusāreṇa para pratipatteḥ utpādanāt

original: svapratipattau ca dharmidarśana-tadgatahetudharmāvadhāraṇapratibandhasmaraṇaparāmarśajñānasādhyaniścayānāṃ krameṇa darśanāt paraṃ prati tathaiva tadabhidhānaṃ kartavyam iti savistaram avayavalakṣaṇaṃ nirṇītam etat /
analyzed: sva pratipattau ca dharmi darśana tad gata hetu dharma avadhāraṇa pratibandha smaraṇa parāmarśa jñāna sādhya niścayānām krameṇa darśanāt param prati tathā eva tad abhidhānam kartavyam iti sa vistaram avayava lakṣaṇam nirṇītam etat

original: asādhanāṅgavacanatvam api pratijñādyavayavānāṃ tatraiva nirastam /
analyzed: asādhana aṅga vacana tvam api pratijñā ādi avayavānām tatra eva nirastam

original: ataḥ kramasyeha yuktiyuktatvāt tadatikramo bhavaty eva nigrahasthānam //
analyzed: atas kramasya iha yukti yukta tvāt tad atikramaḥ bhavati eva nigrahasthānam

original: hīnam anyatamenāpy avayavena nyūnam //5.2.12//
analyzed: hīnam anyatamena api avayavena nyūnam

original: paṃcāvayave vākye prayoktavye sthite tadanyatamenāpy avayavena hīnaṃ prayuṃjānasya nyūnaṃ nāma nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: paṃca avayave vākye prayoktavye sthite tad anyatamena api avayavena hīnam prayuṃjānasya nyūnam nāma nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: atrāha pratijñādyavayavajātam asādhanāṅgavacanam ity ataḥ tad anabhidadhato na nigrahaḥ pratyuta vadato nigraho yukta iti atrocyate anantaram evaitat parihṛtam vistarataś cāvayavalakṣaṇe /
analyzed: atra āha pratijñā ādi avayava jātam asādhana aṅga vacanam iti atas tat anabhidadhataḥ na nigrahaḥ pratyuta vadataḥ nigrahaḥ yuktaḥ iti atra ucyate anantaram eva etat parihṛtam vistarataḥ ca avayava lakṣaṇe

original: tathā hi śrotur ākāṅkṣānivṛttaye 'numānavākyaṃ prayujyata iti prathamaṃ tadākāṅkṣāviṣayaḥ sādhyadharmaviśiṣṭo dharmo pradarśyate /
analyzed: tathā hi śrotuḥ ākāṅkṣā nivṛttaye numāna vākyam prayujyate iti prathamam tad ākāṅkṣā viṣayaḥ sādhya dharma viśiṣṭaḥ pradarśyate

original: tataḥ kāraṇākāṅkṣāyāṃ hetuvacanam abhidhīyate /
analyzed: tatas kāraṇa ākāṅkṣāyām hetu vacanam abhidhīyate

original: kvāsya pratibandho dṛṣṭa iti bubhutsāyāṃ udāharaṇam upapādyate /
analyzed: kva asya pratibandhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti bubhutsāyām udāharaṇam upapādyate

original: ittham eṣa siddhapratibandho hetuḥ dharmiṇi bhavat /
analyzed: ittham eṣa siddha pratibandhaḥ hetuḥ dharmiṇi bhavat

original: na veti śaṅkāyām upanayavacanam uccāryate /
analyzed: na vā iti śaṅkāyām upanaya vacanam uccāryate

original: tadanantaraṃ sarvāvayavānām ekatropasaṃhārāya nigamanaṃ prayujyata ity anyatamasyāprayogāt nigrahārthatā bhavaty evety akam atraiva vastuni pade pade kalahaprastāvaneneti //
analyzed: tad anantaram sarva avayavānām ekatra upasaṃhārāya nigamanam prayujyate iti anyatamasya a prayogāt nigraha artha tā bhavati eva iti atra eva vastuni pade pade kalaha prastāvanena iti

original: hetūdāharaṇādhikam adhikam //5.2.13//
analyzed: hetu udāharaṇa adhikam adhikam

original: ekenaiva hetunā dṛṣṭāntena vā pratipādite 'rthe hetvantaraṃ dṛṣṭāntāntaraṃ vā prayuṃjānasya adhikaṃ nām nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: ekena eva hetunā dṛṣṭāntena vā pratipādite rthe hetvantaram dṛṣṭānta antaram vā prayuṃjānasya adhikam nām nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: etac ca vāde tāvad vītarāgakathātmake vastunirṇayaphale neṣyata eva /
analyzed: etat ca vāde tāvat vīta rāga kathā ātmake vastu nirṇaya phale na iṣyate eva

original: jalpe 'pi niyamābhyupagamena vadato vādinaḥ idaṃ nigrahasthānam /
analyzed: jalpe niyama abhyupagamena vadataḥ vādinaḥ idam nigrahasthānam

original: yo hi na mayā āvābhyāṃ vā sādhanam adhikam abhidheyam udāharaṇaṃ veti niyamyodgrāhayati sa eva tathā nigṛhyate nānya iti //
analyzed: yaḥ hi na mayā āvābhyām vā sādhanam adhikam abhidheyam udāharaṇam vā iti niyamya udgrāhayati saḥ eva tathā nigṛhyate na anyaḥ iti

original: etac ca kīrtinā 'py evam eva kathitam [prapaṃcakathāyāṃ tu na doṣaḥ] iti //
analyzed: etat ca kīrtinā pi evam eva kathitam prapaṃca kathāyām tu na doṣaḥ iti

original: apara āha niyamābhyupagame 'pi nāyaṃ doṣaḥ pratipattidraḍhimne tadabhidhānād iti tad ayuktam abhyupagataniyamatyāgād asau nigrahārho bhavet /
analyzed: aparaḥ āha niyama abhyupagame na ayam doṣaḥ pratipatti draḍhimne tad abhidhānāt iti tat ayuktam abhyupagata niyama tyāgāt asau nigraha arhaḥ bhavet

original: kaś cāyaṃ pratipattidraḍhimā prathamaprayuktasya hi hetoḥ mṛdupratipattikāriṇaḥ hetutvam eva na syāt /
analyzed: kaḥ ca ayam pratipatti draḍhimā prathama prayuktasya hi hetoḥ mṛdu pratipatti kāriṇaḥ hetu tvam eva na syāt

original: utpannasya pratyayasya punar utpādanaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: utpannasya pratyayasya punar utpādanam yuktam

original: tatra na pūrvahetur adraḍhimne /
analyzed: tatra na pūrva hetuḥ a draḍhimne

original: nāpy uttaro draḍhimne /
analyzed: na api uttaraḥ draḍhimne

original: tasmān niyamābhyupagame 'dhikābhidhānaṃ doṣa eva //
analyzed: tasmāt niyama abhyupagame dhika abhidhānam doṣaḥ eva

original: aparaṃ matam akṛtaniyamasyāpi doṣa eva /
analyzed: aparam matam akṛta niyamasya api doṣaḥ eva

original: prapaṃcakathāyām apy ekena hetunā dṛṣṭāntena vā kṛte nirṇaye dvitīyasya hetoḥ prayogānarhatvād iti //
analyzed: prapaṃca kathāyām api ekena hetunā dṛṣṭāntena vā kṛte nirṇaye dvitīyasya hetoḥ prayoga anarha tvāt iti

original: śabdārthayoḥ punaruccaraṇaṃ punarvacanam anyatrānuvādāt //5.2.14//
analyzed: śabda arthayoḥ punar uccaraṇam punarvacanam anyatra anuvādāt

original: arthād āpannasya svakaṇṭhena punarvacanam śabdasya vā 'rthasya vā 'bhihitasya punar abhidhānaṃ punaruktaṃ nām nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati anuvādaṃ varjayitvā //
analyzed: arthāt āpannasya sva kaṇṭhena punarvacanam śabdasya vā rthasya vā bhihitasya punar abhidhānam punaruktam nām nigrahasthānam bhavati anuvādam varjayitvā

original: śabdapunaruktaṃ tāvat yatra pūrvoccārita eva śabdaḥ punar uccāryate yathā [nityaḥ śabdaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ] iti //
analyzed: śabda punaruktam tāvat yatra pūrva uccāritaḥ eva śabdaḥ punar uccāryate yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: arthapunaruktaṃ tu yatra so 'rthaḥ pūrvam anyena śabdenoktaḥ paryāyāntareṇa punaru ucyate /
analyzed: artha punaruktam tu yatra saḥ rthaḥ pūrvam anyena śabdena uktaḥ paryāya antareṇa ucyate

original: yathā [anityaḥ śabdaḥ nirodhadharmako dhvānaḥ] iti //
analyzed: yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ nirodha dharmakaḥ dhvānaḥ iti

original: yady api ca śabdapunarukte 'py arthapaunaruktyam asty eva tathāpi śabdapūrvakatvād arthapratyabhijñāyāḥ prathamataraṃ śabdapratyabhijñānāt tatpaunaruktyam eva tad ucyate /
analyzed: yadi api ca śabda punarukte pi artha paunaruktyam asti eva tathā api śabda pūrvaka tvāt artha pratyabhijñāyāḥ prathamataram śabda pratyabhijñānāt tad paunaruktyam eva tat ucyate

original: jātyapekṣaś ca śabdapaunaruktyavyavahāraḥ na vyaktyapekṣaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgitvād varṇānām punaḥ prayogāsaṃbhavāt //
analyzed: jāti apekṣaḥ ca śabda paunaruktya vyavahāraḥ na vyakti apekṣaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgi tvāt varṇānām punar prayoga asaṃbhavāt

original: anuvāde tu paunaruktyam adoṣaḥ /
analyzed: anuvāde tu paunaruktyam adoṣaḥ

original: yathā [hetvapadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ nigamanam] iti //
analyzed: yathā hetu apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam iti

original: arthād āpannasyāpi svaśabdena punarvacanaṃ bhavaty eva punaruktam /
analyzed: arthāt āpannasya api sva śabdena punarvacanam bhavati eva punaruktam

original: yathā [asatsu mehgeṣu vṛṣṭir na bhavati] ity ukte arthād āpadyate [satsu bhavati] iti /
analyzed: yathā asatsu mehgeṣu vṛṣṭiḥ na bhavati iti ukte arthāt āpadyate satsu bhavati iti

original: tat kimarthaṃ svakaṇṭhena punar ucyate /
analyzed: tat kimartham sva kaṇṭhena punar ucyate

original: arthapratītyartho hi śabdaprayogaḥ /
analyzed: artha pratīti arthaḥ hi śabda prayogaḥ

original: pratīte 'rthe kiṃ teneti //
analyzed: pratīte rthe kim tena iti

original: etac ca niyamābhyupagame nigrahasthānaṃ veditavyam /
analyzed: etat ca niyama abhyupagame nigrahasthānam veditavyam

original: akṛtaniyamasya tu nātīva mahān aymam aparādhaḥ //
analyzed: a kṛta niyamasya tu na atīva mahān aparādhaḥ

original: atrāha nārthapunaruktā anyac chabdapunaruktam upapadyate śabdasāmye 'py arthabhdeadarśanāt /
analyzed: atra āha na artha punaruktāḥ anyat śabda punaruktam upapadyate śabda sāmye pi

original: [smarata giriśaṃ giriśo nagarī yasyāsamaradveṣasya ka iva yadīyasya mudā na garīyasyā samasmaradveṣasya] iti /
analyzed: smarata giriśam giriśaḥ nagarī yasya a samara dveṣasya kaḥ iva yadīyasya mudā na garīyasyā samasmara dveṣasya iti

original: tasmād arthata eva paunaruktyaṃ na śabdataḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt arthataḥ eva paunaruktyam na śabdataḥ

original: api ca vistarakathāsu kadācana samyagaśravaṇaśaṅkāyāṃ punar abhidhānaṃ nāma kiyān pramādaḥ arthād āpannasya ca svaśabdena punarvacanaṃ yadi nigrahasthānam ucyate tarhi pratijñāvacanam eva prathamaṃ nigrahasthānam //
analyzed: api ca vistara kathāsu kadācana samyak aśravaṇa śaṅkāyām punar abhidhānam nāma kiyān pramādaḥ arthāt āpannasya ca sva śabdena punarvacanam yadi nigrahasthānam ucyate tarhi pratijñā vacanam eva prathamam nigrahasthānam

original: adhikapunaruktayor vā ko viśeṣa iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: adhika punaruktayoḥ vā kaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti vaktavyam

original: yādṛśaṃ tādṛśaṃ ca viśeṣaleśam āśritya pṛthagabhidhāne nigrahasthānabhedaparigaṇanam aśakyakriyaṃ syāt //
analyzed: yādṛśam tādṛśam ca viśeṣa leśam āśritya pṛthak abhidhāne nigrahasthāna bheda parigaṇanam aśakya kriyam syāt

original: anuvādaś ced ucyate hetvapadeśāt praijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ nigamanam iti tatra pratijñaiva tāvad asādhvī /
analyzed: anuvādaḥ ced ucyate hetu apadeśāt praijñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam iti tatra pratijñā eva tāvat asādhvī

original: tasyāḥ punarvacanaṃ sādhu bhaviṣyatīti keyaṃ kathā //
analyzed: tasyāḥ punarvacanam sādhu bhaviṣyati iti kā iyam kathā

original: atrocyate yad uktam arthapunaruktād anyan na śabdapunaruktam iti tad evam eva /
analyzed: atra ucyate yat uktam artha punaruktāt anyat na śabda punaruktam iti tat evam eva

original: pṛthaṅnirdeśas tv anayā vivakṣayā yo hi śaktyatiśayacikhyāpayiṣayā [sakṛtprayuktaḥ śabdaḥ punar mayā na prayoktavyaḥ] iti pratijñāya jalpaṃ pravartayati sa śabdapunaruktenāpi nigṛhyata iti niyamyavādina eva nigrahāt /
analyzed: pṛthak nirdeśaḥ tu anayā vivakṣayā yaḥ hi śakti atiśaya cikhyāpayiṣayā sakṛt prayuktaḥ śabdaḥ punar mayā na prayoktavyaḥ iti pratijñāya jalpam pravartayati sa śabda punaruktena api nigṛhyate iti niyamya vādinaḥ eva nigrahāt

original: tataḥ anyasya samyagaśravaṇaśaṅkayā punar vadato 'pi na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatas anyasya samyak aśravaṇa śaṅkayā punar vadataḥ pi na doṣaḥ

original: arthākṣiptakathanam api kṛtaniyamasyaiva doṣaḥ nānyasyei //
analyzed: artha ākṣipta kathanam api kṛta niyamasya eva doṣaḥ

original: ata eva vāde na nigrahasthānam idam api tu jalpavitaṇḍayor eva vijigīṣukathayoḥ /
analyzed: atas eva vāde na nigrahasthānam idam api tu jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ eva vijigīṣu kathayoḥ

original: tayoś ca saprayojanatvam kathāntaratvaṃ ca purā samarthitam eva //
analyzed: tayoḥ ca saprayojana tvam kathā antara tvam ca purā samarthitam eva

original: yat tu pratijñoccāraṇam arthākṣiptatvāt tadanuvādaś ca nigamanavacanam aphlataram iti tadavayavalakṣaṇe vistareṇa samāhitam //
analyzed: yat tu pratijñā uccāraṇam artha ākṣipta tvāt tad anuvādaḥ ca nigamana vacanam aphlataram iti tat avayava lakṣaṇe vistareṇa samāhitam

original: adhikapunaruktayos tv ayaṃ vispaṣṭa eva viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: adhika punaruktayoḥ tu ayam vispaṣṭaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ

original: anyaṃ hetum anyaṃ vā dṛṣṭāntaṃ tatraiva sādhye 'bhidadhad adhikavādī bhavati tam eva hetuṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ vā punar vadan punaruktavādīti //
analyzed: anyam hetum anyam vā dṛṣṭāntam tatra eva sādhye bhidadhat adhikavādī bhavati tam eva hetum dṛṣṭāntam vā punar vadan punaruktavādī iti

original: yat tu evaṃvidhaviśeṣāśrayaṇe parigaṇanam aghaṭamānam iti tat avāntaraviśeṣavivakṣayaivam eva /
analyzed: yat tu evaṃvidha viśeṣa āśrayaṇe parigaṇanam aghaṭamānam iti tat avāntara viśeṣa vivakṣayā evam eva

original: asaṅkīrṇodāharaṇapradarśanāya tu dvāviṃśatinirdeśa ity uktam //
analyzed: asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa pradarśanāya tu dvāviṃśati nirdeśaḥ iti uktam

original: vijñātasya parṣadā trir abhihitasyāpy anuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam //5.2.17//
analyzed: vijñātasya parṣadā tris abhihitasya api an uccāraṇam an anubhāṣaṇam

original: parṣadā viditasya vādinā trir uccāritasyāpi yad apratyuccāraṇaṃ tat ananubhāṣaṇaṃ nāma nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: parṣadā viditasya vādinā tris uccāritasya api yat a pratyuccāraṇam tat ananubhāṣaṇam nāma nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: apratyuccārayan kimāspadaṃ dūṣaṇam abhidadhīta //
analyzed: a pratyuccārayan kim āspadam dūṣaṇam abhidadhīta

original: nanu yady ananubhāṣyāpi tatrottaraṃ brūyāt kim iti nigṛhyeta /
analyzed: nanu yadi an anubhāṣya api tatra uttaram brūyāt kim iti nigṛhyeta

original: na ca yo 'nubhāṣitum asamarthaḥ sa uttaram api dātum akṣamo bhavati vicitratvāt puruṣaśaktīnām naitad evam ananubhāṣaṇe taduttaraviṣayāparijñānāt kvottaraṃ prayujyeta /
analyzed: na ca yaḥ nubhāṣitum asamarthaḥ saḥ uttaram api dātum akṣamaḥ bhavati vicitra tvāt puruṣa śaktīnām na etat evam an anubhāṣaṇe tad uttara viṣaya aparijñānāt kva uttaram prayujyeta

original: prayuktaṃ vā katham avadhāryeta /
analyzed: prayuktam vā katham avadhāryeta

original: na caivaṃ brūmaḥ yāvat kiñcit vādinā savistaram abhidhīyate tad akhilam anyūnānatiriktam anujjitakramakaṃ prativādī tathaivānubhāṣeteti /
analyzed: na ca evam brūmaḥ yāvat kiñcid vādinā sa vistaram abhidhīyate tat akhilam anyūna anatiriktam anujjita kramakam prativādī tathā eva anubhāṣeta iti

original: yas tu samastānubhāṣaṇaṃ tathā kuryād api nāma tena svakauśalam eva kevalam upadarśitaṃ bhavati medhāvitvaṃvā /
analyzed: yaḥ tu samasta anubhāṣaṇam tathā kuryāt api nāma tena sva kauśalam eva kevalam upadarśitam bhavati medhāvi tvam vā

original: na tv evam akurvan pratyaveyād iti /
analyzed: na tu evam a kurvan pratyaveyāt iti

original: stokastokam anubhāṣamāṇaḥ tathaiva ca krameṇa dūṣayan na nigraham āpnuyād iti //
analyzed: stoka stokam anubhāṣamāṇaḥ tathā eva ca krameṇa dūṣayan na nigraham āpnuyāt iti

original: atrāha yadi vādī svapakṣasādhanavivaraṇavartmanā bahutaram akṛtakam aprakṛtārtham upakṣipet tat kiṃ prativādinā sarvam anubhāṣaṇīyam /
analyzed: atra āha yadi vādī sva pakṣa sādhana vivaraṇa vartmanā bahutaram akṛtakam aprakṛta artham upakṣipet tat kim prativādinā sarvam anubhāṣaṇīyam

original: hetumātraṃ tv anūdya dūṣaṇam udbhāvayataḥ nāsya nigraho yuktaḥ /
analyzed: hetu mātram tu anūdya dūṣaṇam udbhāvayataḥ na asya nigrahaḥ yuktaḥ

original: dūṣaṇaviṣayaṃ tu hetumātram api yo 'nubhāṣitum akauśalaḥ sa uttaraviṣayāparijñānāt uttaram api pratipattum asamrtha evety apratibhayā nigṛhyatām /
analyzed: dūṣaṇa viṣayam tu hetu mātram api yaḥ nu bhāṣitum akauśalaḥ saḥ uttara viṣaya aparijñānāt uttaram api pratipattum asamrthaḥ evā iti apratibhayā nigṛhyatām

original: kim ananubhāṣaṇena //
analyzed: kim an anubhāṣaṇena

original: api ca trir abhihitasyeti keyaṃ paribhāṣā tathā ca vādī parāvabodhārthaṃ vākyaṃ prayuṃjīta paropadravārthaṃ vā tatra parāvabodhārthe vākye parāvabodha evābhidhānavidhiḥ na dvis trir vā niyamaḥ /
analyzed: api ca tris abhihitasya iti kā iyam paribhāṣā tathā ca vādī para avabodha artham vākyam prayuṃjīta para upadrava artham vā tatra para avabodha arthe vākye para avabodhaḥ eva abhidhāna vidhiḥ na dvis tris vā niyamaḥ

original: yāvat kṛtvaḥ prayukte vākye parasyāvabodho jāyate tāvat kṛtvaḥ prayoktavyam /
analyzed: yāvat kṛtvas prayukte vākye parasya avabodhaḥ jāyate tāvat kṛtvas prayoktavyam

original: paropadravārthaṃ tu vākyoccāraṇam akṣata eva dharmaḥ prāśnikān yathā tathā saṅketenāpi bodhayitvā duḥśliṣṭakaṣṭaśabdaprayogādyāḍambaraviracanayāpi āndhyam utpādya parān uparudhyeteti mahat kaśmalam etat /
analyzed: para upadrava artham tu vākya uccāraṇam akṣataḥ eva dharmaḥ prāśnikān yathā tathā saṅketena api bodhayitvā duḥśliṣṭa kaṣṭa śabda prayoga ādi āḍambara viracanayā api āndhyam utpādya parān uparudhyeta iti mahat kaśmalam etat

original: na cedāśaṃ śāstre vyutpādanārham /
analyzed: na ced āśam śāstre vyutpādana arham

original: tasmāt bahukṛtvo 'py abhidhāya prativādī bodhayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt bahu kṛtvas u pi abhidhāya prativādī bodhayitavyaḥ

original: na tu dvir uccāritam apratyuccaran nigṛhītavya iti //
analyzed: na tu dvis uccāritam a pratyuccaran nigṛhītavyaḥ iti

original: atrocyate na khalu sakṛd eva sakalaparaviracitavacanasaṃdarbhānubhāṣaṇam avilambitakramakam asmābhir api kartavyatayopadiṣṭaṃ /
analyzed: atrā ucyate na khalu sakṛt eva sakala para viracita vacana saṃdarbha anubhāṣaṇam avilambita kramakam asmābhiḥ api kartavya tayā upadiṣṭam

original: api tu yathocitadūṣaṇaviṣayānubhāṣaṇamātram eva //
analyzed: api tu yathā ucita dūṣaṇa viṣaya anubhāṣaṇa mātram eva

original: yas tu stokam apy anubhāṣitum apragalbhaḥ tasyottarapratibhānam api nāstīti yad ucyate tad asamyak anyad ananubhāṣaṇam anyad uttarāpratibhānam /
analyzed: yaḥ tu stokam api anubhāṣitum a pragalbhaḥ tasya uttara pratibhānam api nā asti iti yat ucyate tat asamyak anyat ananubhāṣaṇam anyat uttara a pratibhānam

original: kasyacid aśeṣam anubhāṣitavato 'pi uttarāpratibhānadarśanāt /
analyzed: kasyacid aśeṣam anubhāṣitavataḥ pi uttara a pratibhāna darśanāt

original: tad idaṃ anuttaraviṣayānudghoṣaṇaṃ nigrahasthānam ucyate nottarāpratibhānam /
analyzed: tat idam anuttara viṣaya an udghoṣaṇam nigrahasthānam ucyate na uttara a pratibhānam

original: uttarāpratibhānam anantaraṃ vakṣyate //
analyzed: uttara a pratibhānam anantaram vakṣyate

original: yat tu trir uccāraṇaparibhāṣā kutastyeti vikalpitam tad avijñātārthanāmni nigrahasthāne prativihitam /
analyzed: yat tu tris uccāraṇa paribhāṣā kutastyā iti vikalpitam tat avijñāta artha nāmni nigrahasthāne prativihitam

original: vītarāgakathātmake vāde śiṣṭādibhis saha kriyamāṇe kāmam astu parāvabodhāvadhi vākyoccāraṇam /
analyzed: vīta rāga kathā ātmake vāde śiṣṭa ādibhiḥ saha kriyamāṇe kāmam astu para avabodha avadhi vākya uccāraṇam

original: jalpe tu vijigīṣukathāyāṃ puruṣaśaktiparīkṣaṇāt avaśyam uccāraṇaniyama āśrayaṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: jalpe tu vijigīṣu kathāyām puruṣa śakti parīkṣaṇāt avaśyam uccāraṇa niyamaḥ āśrayaṇīyaḥ

original: tatra sakṛd vā dvir vā 'bhihitasyāgrahaṇam anavadhānādināpi saṃbhavan na nigrahāy kalpate /
analyzed: tatra sakṛt vā dvis vā abhihitasya agrahaṇam anavadhāna ādinā api saṃbhavat na nigrahāy kalpate

original: trir abhihitasya tu sarvair agrahaṇe vaktur evāparādhaḥ /
analyzed: tris abhihitasya tu sarvaiḥ agrahaṇe vaktuḥ eva aparādhaḥ

original: anyair gṛhītasya prativādinā tv agrahaṇe tasya nigrahaḥ /
analyzed: anyaiḥ gṛhītasya prativādinā tu agrahaṇe tasya nigrahaḥ

original: vāratrayād ūrdhvam apyabhidhāne tv āśrīyamāṇe jalpādau kathāsamāptir eva na syāt /
analyzed: vāra trayāt ūrdhvam api abhidhāne tu āśrīyamāṇe jalpa ādau kathā samāptiḥ eva na syāt

original: chātraśālā hy asau bhavet nodgrāhiṇikābhūmir iti //
analyzed: chātra śālā hi asau bhavet na udgrāhiṇikā bhūmiḥ iti

original: avijñānaṃ vājñānam //5.2.18//
analyzed: a vijñānam vā ajñānam

original: pariṣadā vijñātasyāpi vādivākyasya prativādinā yad avijñānaṃ tat avijñānaṃ nāma nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: pariṣadā vijñātasya api vādi vākyasya prativādinā yat avijñānam tat avijñānam nāma nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: aviditottaraviṣayo hi kvottaraṃ brūyād iti //
analyzed: a vidita uttara viṣayaḥ hi kva uttaram brūyāt iti

original: [ajñānam] [apratibhā] iti nānayor viśeṣaṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ atrocyate bhinnaviṣayatvād adoṣaḥ /
analyzed: ajñānam apratibhā iti na anayoḥ viśeṣaṇam paśyāmaḥ atrā ucyate bhinna viṣaya tvāt adoṣaḥ

original: uttaraviṣayāpratipattiḥ ajñānam uttarāpratipattis tv apratibheti //
analyzed: uttara viṣaya apratipattiḥ ajñānam uttara apratipattiḥ tu apratibhā iti

original: nanu uttaraviṣayaṃ yo na jānāti sa uttaram api na jānāty eva maivam uttaraviṣayaṃ jānann api kiñcit uttaraṃ na jānātīti lokadṛṣṭam etat /
analyzed: nanu uttara viṣayam yaḥ na jānāti saḥ uttaram api na jānāti eva mā evam uttara viṣayam jānan api kiñcid uttaram na jānāti iti loka dṛṣṭam etat

original: evaṃ tarhi ananubhāṣaṇena gatārtham ajñānam ajñāte hi parakīye vākyārthe tadanubhāṣaṇe sāmarthyābhāvadarśanāt santi hi kecit ye 'nubhāṣitum aśaknuvantaḥ patrikādilikhitaṃ tad āvedayantīti /
analyzed: evam tarhi ananubhāṣaṇena gatārtham ajñānam ajñāte hi parakīye vākya arthe tad anubhāṣaṇe sāmarthya abhāva darśanāt santi hi kecid ye nubhāṣitum a śaknuvantaḥ patrikā ādi likhitam tat āvedayanti iti

original: evaṃ trayāṇām api tad apratyuccāraṇaṃ ananubhāṣaṇam /
analyzed: evam trayāṇām api tat a pratyuccāraṇam an anubhāṣaṇam

original: anubhāṣite py uttarāpratipattiḥ apratibheti //
analyzed: anubhāṣite pi uttara a pratipattiḥ apratibhā iti
