original: nanu yady ajñānasāmye 'pi viṣayabhedam āśritya nigrahasthānanānātvam ittham abhidhīyate tarhy ajñānaprakāravaicitryāt bhedāntarāṇy api vaktavyānīti uktam atra sārasaṃgrahavivakṣayā dve eva nigrahasthāne vipratipattiḥ apratipattiś ceti /
analyzed: nanu yadi ajñāna sāmye viṣaya bhedam āśritya nigrahasthāna nānātvam ittham abhidhīyate tarhi ajñāna prakāra vaicitryāt bheda antarāṇi api vaktavyāni iti uktam atra sāra saṃgraha vivakṣayā dve eva nigrahasthāne vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca iti

original: itaretaravisadṛśodāharaṇadikpradarśanāya dvāviṃśatibhedatvam ucyat e /
analyzed: itaretara visadṛśa udāharaṇa diś pradarśanāya dvāviṃśati bheda tvam

original: avāntaraviśesais tu tadānantyam abhyupagamya eva /
analyzed: avāntara viśesaiḥ tu tad ānantyam abhyupagamya eva

original: tathā ca dvāviṃśativarge [hetvābhāsāś ca] iti paṭhitam /
analyzed: tathā ca dvāviṃśati varge hetvābhāsāḥ ca iti paṭhitam

original: te ca svarūpeṇaiva tāvat paṃca [savyabhicāraviruddhaprakaraṇasamasādhyasamātītakālā hetvābhāsā] iti /
analyzed: te ca sva rūpeṇa eva tāvat paṃca savyabhicāra viruddha prakaraṇasama sādhyasama atīta kālāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ iti

original: avāntarabhedāś ca teṣām atibahavaḥ santy eva /
analyzed: avāntarabhedāḥ ca teṣām ati bahavaḥ santi eva

original: iha tv ekam eva tan nigrahasthānam ādiṣṭaṃ [hetvābhāsāś ca yathoktāḥ] iti /
analyzed: iha tu ekam eva tat nigrahasthānam ādiṣṭam hetvābhāsāḥ ca yathā uktāḥ iti

original: tasmād itthaṃ samāsavyāsavarṇanāt alaṃ pade pade paryanuyogeneti //
analyzed: tasmāt ittham samāsa vyāsa varṇanāt alam pade pade paryanuyogena iti

original: uttarasyāpratipattir apratibhā //5.2.19//
analyzed: uttarasya a pratipattiḥ a pratibhā

original: parapakṣe gṛhīte 'pi tasminn uttarāpratibhānam apratibhā nām prativādino nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: parapakṣe gṛhīte tasmin uttarā apratibhānam apratibhā nām prativādinaḥ nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: ajñānādibhyo bhinnatā 'sya darśitaiva /
analyzed: ajñāna ādibhyaḥ bhinna tā sya darśitā eva

original: kīrtir api caitad anumanyata eva nigrahasthānam //
analyzed: kīrtiḥ api ca etat anumanyate eva nigrahasthānam

original: nanu uttaram apratipadyamānaḥ sadasi prativādī katham āsīta yat kiñcid vikatthamānaḥ /
analyzed: nanu uttaram a pratipadyamānaḥ sadasi prativādī katham āsīta yat kiñcid vikatthamānaḥ

original: tad yathā hṛtpuṇḍarīkavikasatsakalānavadyavidyāvadātavadanaḥ kva jano 'smadādiḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā hṛd puṇḍarīka vikasat sakala anavadya vidyā avadāta vadanaḥ kva jano smad ādiḥ

original: kvāyaṃ vaṭuḥ katipayākṣaraleśaliptajihvānvitaḥ katham anena sahābhidaddhmaḥ //
analyzed: kva ayam vaṭuḥ katipaya akṣara leśa lipta jihvā anvitaḥ katham anena saha abhidaddhmaḥ

original: dānārdragandhagajakumbhakapāṭabhedibhīmasphurannakhaśikharaḥ kva sīmhaḥ /
analyzed: dāna ārdra gandha gaja kumbha kapāṭa bhedi bhīma sphurat nakha śikharaḥ kva sīmhaḥ

original: kvāmī samīraṇavidhūtapūrāṇaparṇapātodbhavadbhayavuloladṛśaḥ kuraṅgāḥ //
analyzed: kvāmī samīraṇa vidhūta pūrāṇaparṇa pāta udbhavat bhaya vulola dṛśaḥ kuraṅgāḥ

original: ityādi yad vā tad vā pralapann āste //
analyzed: ityādi yat vā tat vā pralapan āste

original: kāryavyāsaṃgāt kathāvicchedo vikṣepaḥ //5.2.20//
analyzed: kārya vyāsaṃgāt kathā vicchedaḥ vikṣepaḥ

original: udgrāhaṇikām upakramya vā tad grāhaitavyaṃ mayeti pratiśritya vā 'bhimukhaṃ prativādini sannihiteṣu prāśnikeṣu kārtavyāsaṅgaṃ vyapadiśati [idaṃ me karaṇīyam apahīyate gacchāmi] ity abhidhāya kathāṃ vicchinatti yaḥ sa vikṣepeṇa parājīyate /
analyzed: udgrāhaṇikām upakramya vā tat grāha etavyam mayā iti pratiśritya vā abhimukham prativādini sannihiteṣu prāśnikeṣu kārtavya āsaṅgam vyapadiśati idam me karaṇīyam apahīyate gacchāmi iti abhidhāya kathām vicchinatti yaḥ sa vikṣepeṇa parājīyate

original: anyataranigrahāntā hi kathā bhavati /
analyzed: anyatara nigraha antā hi kathā bhavati

original: sa cetthaṃ kathāṃ kurvan ātmanaivātmānaṃ nigṛhṇāti /
analyzed: sa ca ittham kathām kurvan ātmanā eva ātmānam nigṛhṇāti

original: [pratiśyāyena me kaṇṭhoparodhaḥ udapādi padam api vaktuṃ na yujyate] /
analyzed: pratiśyāyena me kaṇṭha uparodhaḥ udapādi padam api vaktum na yujyate

original: [jananī me jīvitaṃ jahāti sma tāṃ śmaśānabhuvaṃ prāpayya vahnisātkaromī] iti //
analyzed: jananī me jīvitam jahāti sma tām śmaśāna bhuvam prāpayya vahnisātkaromi iti

original: atrāha yadi tāvat paramārthata eva mātṛmaraṇādikāryam asyopasthitaṃ tat kim iti tapasvī parājīyate udgrāhaṇikājito mā bhūvam iti kim asau mṛtāṃ mātaram api mā dhākṣīd iti mahat subhāṣitam iti //
analyzed: atra āha yadi tāvat paramārthataḥ eva mātṛ maraṇa ādi kāryam asya upasthitam tat kim iti tapasvī parājīyate udgrāhaṇikā jitaḥ mā bhūvam iti kim asau mṛtām mātaram api mā dhākṣīt iti mahat subhāṣitam iti

original: pīnasāvaruddhasthānakaraṇo vā kathaṃ vācam udīrayatu /
analyzed: pīnasa avaruddha sthāna karaṇaḥ vā katham vācam udīrayatu

original: athāsāmarrthyasthaganāya vitatham api kathayati tathāvidham asau kāryavyāsaṅgam tarhi satyaṃ nigṛhyate /
analyzed: atha asāmarrthya sthaganāya vitatham api kathayati tathāvidham asau kārya vyāsaṅgam tarhi satyam nigṛhyate

original: na tu vikṣepeṇa kin tu anyenaiva /
analyzed: na tu vikṣepeṇa kin tu anyena eva

original: vādī tāvat drutakartavyavyājavyapadeśāt arthāntaragamanādinā nigṛhyate prativādī tv apratibhayaiveti /
analyzed: vādī tāvat druta kartavya vyāja vyapadeśāt artha antara gamana ādinā nigṛhyate prativādī tu apratibhayā eva iti

original: atiprasaṅgaś caivaṃprakāraṇāṃ nirdeśe bhaved iti //
analyzed: atiprasaṅgaḥ ca evaṃprakāraṇām nirdeśe bhavet iti

original: atrocyate kathām upakramya pratijñāṃ vā hetum abhidhāya tadvvivaraṇasaraṇimiṣam avalambya kiñcid arthāntaram upanyasyati yat tat arthāntaram udāhṛtam ādāv eva /
analyzed: atrā ucyate kathām upakramya pratijñām vā hetum abhidhāya tad vivaraṇa saraṇi miṣam avalambya kiñcid arthāntaram upanyasyati yat tat arthāntaram udāhṛtam ādau eva

original: iha tu kathāpūrvaraṅge kathāyāṃ vā kim api karaṇīyanibham abhidhāya sabhayam apasarati sadasa iti katham iva tattulyatā bhavati apratibhayā 'pi śrutapūrvapakṣaḥ parājīyate /
analyzed: iha tu kathā pūrvaraṅge kathāyām vā kim api karaṇīya nibham abhidhāya sa bhayam apasarati sadasaḥ iti katham iva tad tulya tā bhavati apratibhayā śruta pūrvapakṣaḥ parājīyate

original: iha tu pūrvapakṣam eva na śṛṇoti vā na karoti vā /
analyzed: iha tu pūrvapakṣam eva na śṛṇoti vā na karoti vā

original: prathamam eva palāyata iti mahān viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: prathamam eva palāyate iti mahān viśeṣaḥ

original: atiprasaṅgas tv asakṛt parākṛtaḥ //
analyzed: atiprasaṅgaḥ tu asakṛt parākṛtaḥ

original: yat tu hetvābhāseṣv antarbhāvam asya kīrtir akīrtaya tad atīva subhāsitam kva hetvābhāsaḥ kva kāryavyāsaṅgaḥ saṃpradhāraṇaiva ramaṇīyeyam /
analyzed: yat tu hetvābhāseṣu antarbhāvam asya kīrtiḥ akīrtaya tat atīva su bhāsitam kva hetvābhāsaḥ kva kārya vyāsaṅgaḥ saṃpradhāraṇā eva ramaṇīyā iyam

original: ahetavo hetuvad avabhāsamānāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ kim asya kārya vyāsaṅgasyāhetor hetuvad ābhāsanaṃ kīrtinā dṛṣṭam iti paraṃ naḥ kutūhalam //
analyzed: ahetavaḥ hetu vat avabhāsamānāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ kim asya kārya vyāsaṅgasya ahetoḥ hetu vat ābhāsanam kīrtinā dṛṣṭam iti param naḥ kutūhalam

original: svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaprasaṃgo matānujñā //5.2.22//
analyzed: sva pakṣe doṣa abhyupagamāt para pakṣe doṣa prasaṃgaḥ matānujñā

original: svapakṣe parāpāditadoṣam anuddhṛtya abhyupagamya tam eva parapakṣe pratīpam āpādayataḥ paramatānujñānāt matānujñā nāma nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: sva pakṣe para āpādita doṣam an uddhṛtya abhyupagamya tam eva para pakṣe pratīpam āpādayataḥ para mata anujñānāt matānujñā nāma nigrahasthānam bhavati

original: yathā cauro bhavān puruṣatvāt prasiddhacauravat] ity ukte sati āha [bhavān api cauraḥ puruṣatvāt] iti /
analyzed: yathā cauraḥ bhavān puruṣa tvāt prasiddha caura vat iti ukte sati āha bhavān api cauraḥ puruṣa tvāt iti

original: so 'yam evaṃ vadan ātmanaḥ parāpāditaṃ doṣam abhyupagatavān iti matānujñayā nigṛhyate //
analyzed: saḥ yam evam vadan ātmanaḥ parāpāditam doṣam abhyupagatavān iti mata anujñayā nigṛhyate

original: atrāha anaikāntkike hetau pareṇokte tadudbhāvanam anena prakāreṇa prativādī karoti iti kim iti nigṛhyate /
analyzed: atra āha anaikāntkike hetau pareṇa ukte tad udbhāvanam anena prakāreṇa prativādī karoti iti kim iti nigṛhyate

original: vādy eva hetvābhāsaprayogān nigṛhyata iti //
analyzed: vādī eva hetvābhāsa prayogāt nigṛhyate iti

original: atrocyate uktam ādāv eva hetuḥ acaure 'pi puruṣatvasya darśanād iti /
analyzed: atrā ucyate uktam ādau eva hetuḥ a caure pi puruṣa tvasya darśanāt iti

original: evaṃ hi sa doṣa uddhṛto bhavati /
analyzed: evam hi sa doṣaḥ uddhṛtaḥ bhavati

original: evaṃ tv anabhidhāya [bhavān apicoraḥ puruṣatvāt] iti vadan anujānāty eva paramatam /
analyzed: evam tu an abhidhāya bhavān api coraḥ puruṣa tvāt iti vadan anujānāti eva para matam

original: ato 'naikāntikatve vaktavye tadudbhāvanānukramam avadhīrya atiprasaṅgam āpādayan nigrahārho bhavaty eveti /
analyzed: atas na aikāntika tve vaktavye tad udbhāvana anukramam avadhīrya atiprasaṅgam āpādayan nigraha arhaḥ bhavati eva iti

original: vādiś cānaikāntikahetuprayoge 'pi tadanudbhāvanān aparājayaḥ /
analyzed: vādiḥ ca anaikāntika hetu prayoge tad anudbhāvanān a parājayaḥ

original: prativādina eva hīdaṃ sannikṛṣṭaṃ nigrhasthānam iti //
analyzed: prativādinaḥ eva hi idam sannikṛṣṭam nigrhasthānam iti

original: nigrahaprāptasyānigrahaḥ paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam //5.2.22//
analyzed: nigraha prāptasya anigrahaḥ paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam

original: paryanuyojyo nāma nigrahopapattyā codanīyaḥ [idaṃ te nigrahasthānam upanatam ato nigṛhīto 'si] ity evaṃ vacanīyam /
analyzed: paryanuyojyaḥ nāma nigraha upapattyā codanīyaḥ idam te nigrahasthānam upanatam atas nigṛhītaḥ si iti evam vacanīyam

original: taṃ ya upekṣate nānuyuṅkte sa paryanuyojyopekṣaṇān nigṛhyate //
analyzed: tam yaḥ upekṣate na anuyuṅkte sa paryanuyojya upekṣaṇāt nigṛhyate

original: atrāha kah kasyedaṃ nigrahasthānam āpādayati kiṃ paryanuyojyaḥ uta tadupekṣakaḥ upekṣakas tāvad asya paryanuyojyatām eva na jānāti /
analyzed: atra āha kasya idam nigrahasthānam āpādayati kim paryanuyojyaḥ uta tad upekṣakaḥ upekṣakaḥ tāvat asya paryanuyojya tām eva na jānāti

original: jānan vā katham enam upekṣeta /
analyzed: jānan vā katham enam upekṣeta

original: upekṣya vā kim ātmana eva nigrahasthānam udbhāvayann evam ācaṣṭāṃ [eṣa paryanuyojyo 'pi mayopekṣita iti nigṛhīto 'smi] iti /
analyzed: upekṣya vā kim ātmanaḥ eva nigrahasthānam udbhāvayan evam ācaṣṭām eṣa mayā upekṣitaḥ iti nigṛhītaḥ smi iti

original: paryanuyojyo 'pi katham ātmīyam avadyaṃ prakāśayet idaṃ me dūṣaṇam /
analyzed: paryanuyojyaḥ u pi katham ātmīyam avadyam prakāśayet idam me dūṣaṇam

original: tac ca bhavatā nodbhāvitam /
analyzed: tat ca bhavatā na udbhāvitam

original: ato bhavān jitaḥ] iti /
analyzed: atas bhavān jitaḥ iti

original: sa khalv evam abhidadhat amedhyaṃ pāṇau nidhāya paraṃ kalaṅkayitukāmaḥ paraṃ kalaṅkayann evātmakalaṅkam anubhavaty eveti //
analyzed: sa khalu evam abhidadhat amedhyam pāṇau nidhāya param kalaṅkayitu kāmaḥ param kalaṅkayan eva ātma kalaṅkam anubhavati eva iti

original: api ca nedaṃ nigrahasthānāntaram apadiśyate kin tv apratibhaiveti /
analyzed: api ca nā idam nigrahasthāna antaram apadiśyate kin tu apratibhā eva iti

original: tathā hi yadi tāvad uttarapākṣikaḥ pūrvapākṣikaṃ sādhanābhāsam vyācakṣāṇa upekṣeta tatra dūṣaṇaṃ nodbhāvayet /
analyzed: tathā hi yadi tāvat uttara pākṣikaḥ pūrva pākṣikam sādhana ābhāsam vyācakṣāṇaḥ upekṣeta tatra dūṣaṇam na udbhāvayet

original: taduttarāpratipattyā na nigṛhyate na paryanuyojyopekṣaṇena //
analyzed: tad uttara a pratipattyā na nigṛhyate na paryanuyojya upekṣaṇena

original: vastutas tu dvayor api tatra jayaparājayanirdhāraṇam anupapannam ekastya sādhanābhāsavāditvāt itarasya ca taduttarāpratibhānāt //
analyzed: vastutas tu dvayoḥ api tatra jaya parājaya nirdhāraṇam anupapannam sādhana ābhāsa vādi tvāt itarasya ca tad uttara a pratibhānāt

original: atha pūrvapāksikaḥ dūṣaṇābhāsavādinaṃ doṣaprāptaṃ uttarapākṣikaṃ na nigṛjṇāti tathāpi tasya duruttarāpratibhaiva /
analyzed: atha pūrva pāksikaḥ dūṣaṇa ābhāsa vādinam doṣa prāptam uttara pākṣikam na nigṛjṇāti tathā api tasya duruttara a pratibhā eva

original: na cānyatarasyāpi jayaḥ parājayo vā nirdhāryate /
analyzed: na ca anyatarasya api jayaḥ parājayaḥ vā nirdhāryate

original: ekasya dūṣaṇābhāsavāditvāt itarasya ca tadanudbhāvanāt //
analyzed: ekasya dūṣaṇa ābhāsa vādi tvāt itarasya ca tad anudbhāvanāt

original: atrocyate na apratibhāyāḥ samyaksādhanaviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: atra ucyate na apratibhāyāḥ samyak sādhana viṣaya tvāt

original: samyaksādhane ca prayukte taduttarasyāpratipattiḥ apratibhā bhavati /
analyzed: samyak sādhane ca prayukte tad uttarasya apratipattiḥ apratibhā bhavati

original: sādhanābhāse tu prayukte tadābhāsatānudbhāvanāt paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: sādhana ābhāse tu prayukte tad ābhāsa tā an udbhāvanāt paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam bhavati

original: atra tu sādhanābhāsavādī paryanuyojyaḥ /
analyzed: atra tu sādhana ābhāsa vādī paryanuyojyaḥ

original: sa upekṣitaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ upekṣitaḥ

original: tatra samyaksādhanavādī tu aparyanuyojya eveti viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: tatra samyak sādhana vādī tu aparyanuyojyaḥ eva iti viśeṣaḥ

original: yat tu vastuvṛttena na kasyacid api jayaḥ parājayo veti tad evam eva kin tu jalpe puruṣaśaktiparīkṣāyām idaṃ nigrahasthānam ucyate //
analyzed: yat tu vastu vṛttena na kasyacid api jayaḥ parājayaḥ vā iti tat evam eva kin tu jalpe puruṣa śakti parīkṣāyām idam nigrahasthānam ucyate

original: tad udbhāvayitāpi yad vikalpitaḥ tatrapy ucyate pūrvapākṣikeṇa sādhanābhāse prayukte uttarapākṣikeṇa tasmiṃs tathātvenānudbhāvite prāśnikānām apṛṣṭānāṃ vaktum avasarābhāvāt sa eva sādhanābhāsavādī kadācid vaiyātyād evaṃ brūyāt [mayā 'sya śaktiṃ jijñāsamānena sādhanābhāsaprayogaḥ kṛtaḥ eṣa tu mūkhaḥ taṃ na jānāti] iti tadā kathaṃ na nigṛhyate /
analyzed: tat udbhāvayitā api yat vikalpitaḥ tatra api ucyate pūrva pākṣikeṇa sādhana ābhāse prayukte uttara pākṣikeṇa tasmin tathātvena an udbhāvite prāśnikānām apṛṣṭānām vaktum avasara abhāvāt saḥ eva sādhana ābhāsa vādī kadācid vaiyātyāt evam brūyāt mayā sya śaktim jijñāsamānena sādhana ābhāsa prayogaḥ kṛtaḥ eṣa tu mūkhaḥ tam na jānāti iti tadā katham na nigṛhyate

original: etena dūṣaṇābhasavādy api vyākhyātaḥ //
analyzed: etena dūṣaṇa ābha sava ādi api vyākhyātaḥ

original: atha vā ubhayābhyarthitāḥ sabhāpatiniyuktā vā prāśnikāḥ tathā kathayanto nigṛhṇanty eva paryanuyojyopekṣiṇam /
analyzed: atha vā ubhaya abhyarthitāḥ sabhāpati niyuktāḥ vā prāśnikāḥ tathā kathayantaḥ nigṛhṇanti eva paryanuyojya upekṣiṇam

original: sādhanābhāsavādino hi dhūrtatayā tadabhidhānam /
analyzed: sādhana ābhāsa vādinaḥ hi dhūrta tayā tat abhidhānam

original: samyaksādhanam ajānataḥ arthasaṃśayād vā saṃbhavati /
analyzed: samyak sādhanam a jānataḥ artha saṃśayāt vā saṃbhavati

original: uttarapākṣikasya tu tadanudbhāvanaṃ mohād eveti sa eva parījīyate //
analyzed: uttara pākṣikasya tu tad anudbhāvanam mohāt evā iti saḥ eva parījīyate

original: anigrahasthāne nigrahasthānābhiyogaḥ niranuyojyānuyogaḥ //5.2.23//
analyzed: anigrahasthāne nigrahasthāna abhiyogaḥ niranuyojyānuyogaḥ

original: anujjhitayathocitakramaṃ upapannavādinaṃ apramādinam anigrahārham api nigṛhīto 'sīti yo brūyāt sa evābhūtadoṣodbhāvanān nigṛhyate //
analyzed: anujjhita yathā ucita kramam upapannavādinam apramādinam anigrahārham api yaḥ brūyāt saḥ eva a bhūta doṣa udbhāvanāt nigṛhyate

original: atrāha yadi tāvad uttarapākṣikaḥ pūrvapākṣikam aduṣṭasādhanavādinam abhūtair eva doṣair abhiyuṅkte tathā sati bhūtadoṣodbhāvanasyottarasyāpratipatteḥ apratibhayaiva sa nigṛhyatām kiṃ niranuyojyānuyogākhyanūtananigrahasthānaparājīyate /
analyzed: atra āha yadi tāvat uttara pākṣikaḥ pūrva pākṣikam aduṣṭa sādhana vādinam abhūtaiḥ eva doṣaiḥ abhiyuṅkte tathā sati bhūta doṣa udbhāvanasya uttarasya apratipatteḥ apratibhayā eva sa nigṛhyatām kim niranuyojyānuyoga ākhya nūtana nigrahasthāna parājīyate

original: bhūtadoṣābhiyogapakṣe tu pūrvapākṣika eva sādhanābhāsayogāt anuyojya eva khalv asau na niranuyojyānuyogasya viṣayo bhavitum arhati //
analyzed: bhūta doṣa abhiyoga pakṣe tu pūrva pākṣikaḥ eva sādhana ābhāsa yogāt anuyojyaḥ eva khalu asau na niranuyojya anuyogasya viṣayaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: kathanena /
analyzed: kathanena

original: atrocyate aho nu khalv ayaṃ tapasvī paryudāsasya prasajyapratiṣedhasya ca viśeṣam apaśyann atimātraṃ muhyati /
analyzed: atrā ucyate aho nu khalu ayam tapasvī paryudāsasya prasajya pratiṣedhasya ca viśeṣam a paśyan atimātram muhyati

original: bhūtadoṣāpratibhānam anyat anyac cābhutadoṣapratibhānam /
analyzed: bhūta doṣa apratibhānam anyat anyat ca abhuta doṣa pratibhānam

original: ekatrāpratipattiḥ itaratra viparītapratipattiḥ /
analyzed: ekatra apratipattiḥ itaratra viparīta pratipattiḥ

original: tatra bhūtadoṣāpratipattiḥ apratibhā /
analyzed: tatra bhūta doṣa apratipattiḥ apratibhā

original: abhutadoṣapratipattiḥ ananuyojyānuyogaḥ //
analyzed: a bhuta doṣa pratipattiḥ ananuyojyānuyogaḥ

original: api ca asādhanāṅgavacanam adoṣodbhāvanaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: api ca asādhana aṅga vacanam adoṣa udbhāvanam ca yat

original: bhavatā nigrahasthānam ākhyātaṃ tatra kathyate //
analyzed: bhavatā nigrahasthānam ākhyātam tatra kathyate

original: tatra prasajyapratiṣedha eva kevalam āśriyamāṇe hetvābhāsā api na nigrhasthāne bhaveyuḥ sādhanaṅgasyānabhidhānaṃ maukyam eva kevalaṃ nigrahasthānaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tatra prasajya pratiṣedhe eva kevalam āśriyamāṇe hetvābhāsāḥ api na nigrahasthāne bhaveyuḥ sādhanaṅgasya anabhidhānam maukyam eva kevalam nigrahasthānam bhavet

original: tasmād asādhanāṅgavacanaṃ adoṣodbhāvanam api paryudāsavyākhyānārhaṃ bhavaty eva /
analyzed: tasmāt asādhana aṅga vacanam adoṣa udbhāvanam api paryudāsa vyākhyāna arham bhavati eva

original: tataś ca bhūtadoṣānudbhāvanam apratibhā abhutadoṣoubhāvanaṃ ca niranuyojyānuyogaḥ //
analyzed: tatas ca bhūta doṣa anudbhāvanam apratibhā ca niranuyojya anuyogaḥ

original: atha abhūtadoṣodbhāvane 'pi bhūtadoṣāpratibhānam asty eveti tadevāstu nigrahasthānam ity ucyate tarhi mūkatvam evaikaṃ nigrahasthānaṃ syāt asādhanāṅgavacane 'py evaṃ vaktuṃ śakyatvād ity uktam eva //
analyzed: atha abhūta doṣa udbhāvane bhūta doṣa apratibhānam asti eva iti tat eva astu nigrahasthānam iti ucyate tarhi mūkatvam eva ekam nigrahasthānam syāt asādhana aṅga vacane pi evam vaktum śakya tvāt iti uktam eva

original: siddhāntam abhyupetyāniyamāt /
analyzed: siddhāntam abhyupetya aniyamāt

original: kathāprasaṅo 'pasiddhāntaḥ //5.2.24//
analyzed: kathā prasaṅā upasiddhāntaḥ

original: yaḥ kaṃcana prathamaṃ siddhāntam abhyupagamya kathām upakramate /
analyzed: yaḥ kaṃcana prathamam siddhāntam abhyupagamya kathām upakramate

original: tathā pravṛttaś ca siṣādhayisitārthasamarthanarabhasena dūṣaṇoddharaṇaśraddhayā vā siddhāntaviruddham abhidhatte saḥ apasiddhāntena parājīyate /
analyzed: tathā pravṛttaḥ ca siṣādhayi sita artha samarthana rabhasena dūṣaṇa uddharaṇa śraddhayā vā siddhānta viruddham abhidhatte saḥ apasiddhāntena parājīyate

original: tad yathā sāṃkhyaḥ prativādisannidhāne [nāsato vidyate bhāvaḥ nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ] iti svasiddhāntaṃ prathamaṃ pratijñāya pradhānasiddhaye sādhanaprayogaṃ karoti vyaktaṃ vikārajātam ekaprakṛti samanvayadarśanāt/
analyzed: tat yathā sāṃkhyaḥ prativādi sannidhāne na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ iti sva siddhāntam prathamam pratijñāya pradhāna siddhaye sādhana prayogam karoti vyaktam vikāra jātam eka prakṛti samanvaya darśanāt

original: mṛdanvitā hi mṛdvikārāḥ kuṇḍapiṭharaśarāvaprabhṛtaya ekaprakṛtikā dṛṣṭāḥ evam asyāpi gavāś vādivikārajātasya sukhduḥkhamohānvayadarśanāt tadātmaikaprakṛtiprabhavatvena bhavitavyam //
analyzed: mṛd anvitāḥ hi mṛd vikārāḥ kuṇḍa piṭhara śarāva prabhṛtayaḥ eka prakṛtikāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ evam asya api gavāḥ vā ādi vikāra jātasya sukha duḥkha moha anvaya darśanāt tad ātma eka prakṛti prabhava tvena bhavitavyam

original: evam uktavān asau naiyāyikenānuyujyate atha kā prakṛtir nām kā ca vikṛtir iti /
analyzed: evam uktavān asau naiyāyikena anuyujyate atha kā prakṛtiḥ nām kā ca vikṛtiḥ iti

original: aviditaprakṛtivikṛtisvarūpo hi kathaṃ vikṛtīnāṃ ekaprakṛtitvam ekatvaṃ jānīyād iti /
analyzed: a vidita prakṛti vikṛti sva rūpaḥ hi katham vikṛtīnām eka prakṛti tvam ekatvam jānīyāt iti

original: evam anuyuktaḥ kāpilaḥ āha yasyāvasthitasya dharmāntaranivṛttau dharmāntaraṃ pravartate sā prakṛtiḥ /
analyzed: evam anuyuktaḥ kāpilaḥ āha yasya avasthitasya dharma antara nivṛttau dharma antaram pravartate sā prakṛtiḥ

original: yat taddharmāntaraṃ pravartate sā vikṛtir iti /
analyzed: yat tad dharma antaram pravartate sā vikṛtiḥ iti

original: so 'yam evaṃ vadan prāgabhyupagatasadasannirodhaprabhavābhāvasiddhāntaviruddhābhidhānāt apasiddhāntena nigṛhyate //
analyzed: saḥ yam evam vadan prāc abhyupagata sat asat nirodha prabhava abhāva siddhānta viruddha abhidhānāt apasiddhāntena nigṛhyate

original: yadi pūrvadharmanirodhe dharmāntaraprādurbhāvaḥ tadā [nāsato vidyate bhāvaḥ nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ] iti svasiddhānto hīyate /
analyzed: yadi pūrva dharma nirodhe dharma antara prādurbhāvaḥ tadā na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ iti sva siddhāntaḥ hīyate

original: atha siddhānto na tyajuate tarhi prakṛtivikārāniścayāt hetvasiddhau sādhyābhāvaḥ prasajyata iti //
analyzed: atha siddhāntaḥ na tarhi prakṛti vikāra aniścayāt hetu asiddhau sādhya abhāvaḥ prasajyate iti

original: atrāha hetuprayogaṃ kṛtavati kapile naiyāyikas tadaśiddhatodbhāvanayā pratyavatiṣṭhatāṃ prakṛtivikṛtisvarūpapraśnastya ko 'vasaraḥ tad idam arthāntaragamanam asya bhavet /
analyzed: atrā āha hetu prayogam kṛtavati kapile naiyāyikaḥ tad aśiddha tā udbhāvanayā pratyavatiṣṭhatām kaḥ vasaraḥ tat idam artha antara gamanam asya bhavet

original: evaṃ pṛcchataḥ arthāntaragamanaṃ svagranthe nigrahasthānaṃ ucyate atha ca adhunā tenaiva vyavahriyata iti ko 'yaṃ nayaḥ yadi tu sāṃkhyamataṃ nirācikīrṣitaṃ tad asiddhatvenaiva hetor uddhāvyatām prakṛtyanvayasya vikāreṣu asaṃbhavād iti /
analyzed: evam pṛcchataḥ artha antara gamanam sva granthe nigrahasthānam ucyate atha ca adhunā tena eva vyavahriyate iti kaḥ yam nayaḥ yadi tu sāṃkhya matam nirācikīrṣitam tat asiddha tvena eva hetoḥ uddhāvyatām prakṛti anvayasya vikāreṣu asaṃbhavāt iti

original: vikāro hi pravṛttinivṛttidharmakāḥ /
analyzed: vikāraḥ hi pravṛtti nivṛtti dharmakāḥ

original: na caivaṃprakāram avyaktam avyaktam avyaktadharmānvaye hi vikārāṇāṃ pravṛttinivṛttyātmakatvaṃ hīyetety evam asiddhatvād dhetoḥ hetvābhāsaprayogād eva sāṃkhyo nigṛhīta iti na nigrahasṭhānāntaram apasiddhānta iti //
analyzed: na ca evaṃprakāram avyaktam avyaktam avyakta dharma anvaye hi vikārāṇām pravṛtti nivṛtti ātmaka tvam hīyeta iti evam asiddha tvāt hetoḥ hetvābhāsa prayogāt eva sāṃkhyaḥ nigṛhītaḥ iti na nigrahasṭhāna antaram apasiddhāntaḥ iti

original: atrocyate satyam asiddho bhavaty ayaṃ kāpilakalpito hetuḥ /
analyzed: atrā ucyate satyam asiddhaḥ bhavati ayam kāpila kalpitaḥ hetuḥ

original: prakṛtivikṛtipraśnakrameṇāpi tadasiddhatvam avadhārayituṃ śakyata eva /
analyzed: prakṛti vikṛti praśna krameṇa api tad asiddha tvam avadhārayitum śakyate eva

original: kin tu heturūpe 'vadhārite taddūṣaṇam abhidhānīyam anavadhāritasya duṣayitum aśakyatvād iti tatpraśno nārthāntaragamanam /
analyzed: kin tu hetu rūpe vadhārite tat dūṣaṇam abhidhānīyam anavadhāritasya duṣayitum aśakya tvāt iti tad praśnaḥ na artha antara gamanam

original: praśnottaram eva bhāṣamāṇaḥ parāmarśe nikaṭataraparisphuradapasiddhāntābhidhānanibandhananigrahāntaraviṣayatāṃ pratipanna iti hetvābhāsavartmani na duraṃ gamyate //
analyzed: praśna uttaram eva bhāṣamāṇaḥ parāmarśe nikaṭatara parisphurat apasiddhānta abhidhāna nibandhana nigraha antara viṣaya tām pratipannaḥ iti hetvābhāsa vartmani na duram gamyate

original: kvacid api paranigrahasya hetau hṛdayapathaṃ prathamaṃ kilāvatīrṇe /
analyzed: kvacid api para nigrahasya hetau hṛdaya patham prathamam kila avatīrṇe

original: aparam api na kāraṇam vicintyam kim iva phalaṃ khalu piṣṭopeṣaṇasya //
analyzed: aparam api na kāraṇam vicintyam kim iva phalam khalu piṣṭa upeṣaṇasya

original: hetvābhāsāś ca yathoktāḥ //5.2.25//
analyzed: hetvābhāsāḥ ca yathā uktāḥ

original: hetvābhāsās tu pūrvoktalakṣaṇair eva lakṣitāḥ /
analyzed: hetvābhāsāḥ tu pūrva ukta lakṣaṇaiḥ eva lakṣitāḥ

original: nigrahasthānatāṃ yānti yathoktā ity ato 'bravīt //
analyzed: nigrahasthāna tām yānti yathā uktāḥ iti atas bravīt

original: pramāṇasya prameyatvaṃ prameyasya pramāṇatā /
analyzed: pramāṇasya prameya tvam prameyasya pramāṇa tā

original: yathā lakṣaṇabhedena na tathaiteṣu dṛśyate //
analyzed: yathā lakṣaṇa bhedena na tathā eteṣu dṛśyate

original: bhedenoktāḥ kimarthaṃ ta iti nigaditā pūrvam evātra yuktiḥ vāde hy ete prayojyāḥ praguṇanayavidā tattvaśuddhiṃ vidhātum /
analyzed: bhedena uktāḥ kimartham te iti nigaditā pūrvam eva atra yuktiḥ vāde hi ete prayojyāḥ praguṇa naya vidā tattva śuddhim vidhātum

original: eteṣāṃ dharmakīrter api ca na vimatiḥ nigrahasthānabhedāḥ //
analyzed: eteṣām dharma kīrteḥ api ca na vimatiḥ nigrahasthāna bhedāḥ

original: ity evaṃ sūtrakārāgamam anusaratā 'nujjhatā bhāṣyabhūmiṃ sthāne sthāne pareṣāṃ matam atulagati kṣiṇvatā tāṛkikāṇām /
analyzed: iti evam sūtrakāra āgamam anusaratā n ujjhatā bhāṣya bhūmim sthāne sthāne pareṣām matam kṣiṇvatā tāṛkikāṇām

original: kāṃcid vākyārthacarcām api viracayatā 'nukrameṇāvatīrṇā nirṇītāḥ sve nibandhane nipuṇam iha mayā ṣoḍaśaite padārthāḥ //
analyzed: kāṃcid vākya artha carcām api viracayatā nukrameṇa avatīrṇāḥ nirṇītāḥ sve nibandhane nipuṇam iha mayā ṣoḍaśā ete padārthāḥ

original: nyāyodgāragambhīranirmalagirā gaurīpatis toṣitaḥ vāde yena kirīṭineva samare devaḥ kirātākṛtiḥ /
analyzed: nyāya udgāra gambhīra nirmala girā gaurīpatiḥ toṣitaḥ vāde yena kirīṭinā iva samare devaḥ kirāta ākṛtiḥ

original: prāptodāravaraḥ tatas sa jayati jñānāmṛtaprārthanā namrānekamaharṣimastakavalatpāḍo 'kṣapādo muniḥ //
analyzed: prāpta udāra varaḥ tatas sa jayati jñāna amṛta prārthanā namra aneka mahā ṛṣi mastaka valat pāḍaḥ kṣapādaḥ muniḥ

original: vādeṣv āttajayo jayanta iti yaḥ khyātas satām agraṇīḥ anvartho navavṛttikāra iti yaṃ śaṃsanti nāmnā budhāḥ /
analyzed: vādeṣu ātta jayaḥ jayantaḥ iti yaḥ khyātaḥ satām agraṇīḥ anvarthaḥ nava vṛtti kāraḥ iti yam śaṃsanti nāmnā budhāḥ

original: sūnur vyāptadigantarasya yaśasā candrasya candratviṣā cakre candrakalārdhacūḍacaraṇadhyāyī sa dhanyāṃ kṛtim //
analyzed: sūnuḥ vyāpta digantarasya yaśasā candrasya candra tviṣā cakre candra kalā ardha cūḍa caraṇa dhyāyī sa dhanyām kṛtim

original: namaś śaśikalākoṭikalpyamānāṅkuraśriye /
analyzed: namaḥ śaśi kalā koṭi kalpyamāna aṅkura śriye

original: prapannajanasaṃkalpakalpavṛkṣāya śambhave //
analyzed: prapanna jana saṃkalpa kalpavṛkṣāya śambhave
